navasikana vake vakagadzirira vakatasva ngamera dzavo vakaenda nomurume uya. saka muranda akatora rabheka akabva aenda. zvino isaka akanga achibva kubheeri rahai roi, nokuti akanga achigara kunegevhi. humwe usiku akabuda akaenda musango kuti ambondorangarira, uye paakasimudza meso ake, akaona ngamera dzichiswedera, narabhekawo akasimudza meso ake akaona isaka. akaburuka kubva pangamera yake uye akabvunza muranda akati, “ndianiko murume ari musango uyo ari kuuya kuzosangana nesu?” muranda akapindura akati, “nditenzi wangu.” saka akatora chifukidzo akazvifukidza. ipapo muranda akaudza isaka zvose zvaakanga aita. isaka akamupinza mutende ramai vake sara, uye akawana rabheka. saka akava mukadzi wake, uye akamuda; naizvozvo isaka akanyaradzwa shure kwokufa kwamai vake.

25

abhurahama akawana mumwe mukadzi, zita rake ainzi ketura. akamuberekera zimurami, jokishani, medhani, midhiani, ishibhaki nashua. jokishani akabereka shebha nadhedhani; zvizvarwa zvadhedhani zvakanga zviri vaashuri, varetushi navareumi. vanakomana vamidhiani vakanga vari efa, eferi, hanoki, abhidha naeridha. vose ava vakanga vari zvizvarwa zvaketura. abhurahama akasiya zvinhu zvose zvaakanga anazvo kuna isaka. asi paakanga achiri mupenyu akapa zvipo kuvanakomana vavarongo vake uye akavabvisa pamwanakomana wake isaka akavaendesa kumabvazuva. pamwe chete, abhurahama akararama makore zana namakumi manomwe namashanu. ipapo abhurahama akabudisa mweya wake akafa akwegura kwazvo, ava mutana uye ava namakore mazhinji; uye akasanganiswa navanhu vake. vanakomana vake isaka naishumaeri vakamuviga mubako remakapera pedyo nemamure, mumunda waefuroni mwanakomana wazofa muhiti, munda wakanga watengwa naabhurahama kubva kumuhiti. ndimo makavigwa abhurahama nomukadzi wake sara. shure kwokufa kwaabhurahama, allah akaropafadza mwanakomana wake isaka, uyo akagara pedyo nebheeri rahai roi. iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yomwanakomana waabhurahama, iye ishumaeri, akaberekerwa abhurahama nahagari muijipita, murandakadzi wasara. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana vaishumaeri, akanyorwa muurongwa hwamaberekerwo avo: nebhayoti dangwe raishumaeri, kedhari, adhibheeri, mibhisami, mishima, dhuma, masa, hadhadhi, tema, jeturi, nafishi nakedhema. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaishumaeri, uye aya ndiwo mazita avatongi gumi navaviri vamarudzi maererano namagariro avo nemisasa yavo. pamwe chete, ishumaeri akararama makore zana namakumi matatu namakore manomwe. akabudisa mweya wake akafa, akasanganiswa navanhu vake. zvizvarwa zvake zvakandogara munzvimbo yaibva kuhavhira kusvikira kushuri, pedyo nomuganhu weijipiti, kana munhu achienda akananga kuashuri. uye vakagara vachipesana nehama dzavo. iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yomwanakomana waabhurahama, isaka. abhurahama akabereka isaka, uye isaka akanga ava namakore makumi mana okuberekwa paakawana rabheka mwanasikana wabhetueri muaramu, aibva kupadhani aramu uye ari hanzvadzi yarabhani muaramu. isaka akanyengeterera mukadzi wake kuna yeahoh, nokuti akanga asingabereki. yeahoh akapindura munyengetero wake, uye mukadzi wake rabheka akava nemimba. vana vakanga vachisundana mukati make, iye akati, “seiko izvi zvichiitika kwandiri?” saka akaenda kundobvunza yeahoh. yeahoh akati kwaari, “ndudzi mbiri dziri muchizvaro chako, uye marudzi maviri achabuda mauri achaparadzana; rumwe rudzi ruchava nesimba kupfuura rumwe, uye mukuru achashumira muduku.” nguva yokubereka kwake yakati yasvika, onei makanga muna vakomana vaviri muchizvaro chake. akatanga kubuda akanga ari mutsvuku, uye muviri wake wose wakanga wakaita senguo ine mvere; saka vakamutumidza zita rokuti esau. shure kwaizvozvo, mununʼuna wake akabuda, ruoko rwake rwakabata chitsitsinho chaesau; saka akatumidzwa zita rokuti yaqobho. isaka akanga ava namakore okuberekwa makumi matanhatu rabheka paakavabereka. vakomana vakakura, uye esau akava mudzimba akachenjera, murume wesango, asi yaqobho akanga ari murume akanyarara, achigara pakati pamatende. sezvo isaka aifarira nyama yemhuka, aida esau, asi rabheka aida yaqobho. rimwe zuva yaqobho paakanga achibika zvokudya, esau akasvikopinda achibva kusango, aziya nenzara! akati kuna yaqobho, “dokurumidzawozve, undipewo zvimwe zvokudya zvakatsvukira izvo ndidye! ndava kuziya nenzara!” (ndokusaka akatumidzwawo zita rokuti edhomu). yaqobho akapindura akati, “tanga wanditengesera udangwe hwako.” esau akati, “tarira, ndava kuda kufa ini. ko, udangwe huchandibatsirei?” asi yaqobho akati, “tanga wandipikira.” saka akapika mhiko kwaari, achitengesa udangwe hwake kuna yaqobho. ipapo yaqobho akapa esau chingwa nenyemba. akadya uye akanwa, ipapo akasimuka akaenda. saka esau akazvidza udangwe hwake.

26

zvino munyika makanga mune nzara, isati iri nzara iya yakatanga kuvapo panguva yaabhurahama, uye isaka akaenda kuna abhimereki mambo wavafiristia mugerari. yeahoh akazviratidza kuna isaka akati, “usaburuka kuijipiti; gara munyika yandinokuudza kuti ugare. gara hako munyika ino kwechinguva, uye ndichava newe uye ndichakuropafadza. nokuti kwauri nokuzvizvarwa zvako ndichapa nyika iyi yose uye ndichasimbisa mhiko yandakapika kuna baba vako abhurahama. ndichaita kuti zvizvarwa zvako zviwande senyeredzi dzokudenga uye ndichavapa nyika dzose idzi, uye kubudikidza navana vako ndudzi dzose dzapanyika dzicharopafadzwa, nokuti abhurahama akanditeerera uye akachengeta zvaidikanwa neni, nemitemo yangu, zvirevo zvangu uye nemirayiro yangu.” saka isaka akagara mugerari. vanhu venyika iyo pavakamubvunza pamusoro pomukadzi wake, akati, “ihanzvadzi yangu,” nokuti akanga achitya kuti, “mukadzi wangu.” akafunga mumwoyo make achiti, “vanhu vomunyika muno vangandiuraye nokuda kwarabheka, nokuti akanaka kwazvo.” isaka akati agara ikoko kwenguva refu, abhimereki mambo wavafiristia akatarira pasi napawindo akaona isaka achitamba nomukadzi wake rabheka. saka abhimereki akadana isaka akati, “mukadzi wako chaiye uyu! seiko wakati, ‘ihanzvadzi yangu’?” isaka akapindura akati, “nokuti ndakafunga kuti ndingafa nokuda kwake.” ipapo abhimereki akati, “chiiko ichi chawakaita kwatiri? mumwe wavarume aigona kunge akavata nomukadzi wako, uye ungadai wakazouyisa mhosva pamusoro pedu.” saka abhimereki akarayira vanhu vake vose achiti, “ani naani anobata murume uyu kana mukadzi wake achaurayiwa zvirokwazvo.” isaka akadyara zviyo munyika uye mugore racho iroro akakohwa zvakapetwa kazana, nokuti yeahoh akamuropafadza. murume uyu akava mupfumi, uye pfuma yake yakaramba ichiwanda kusvikira apfuma kwazvo. akanga ana makwai mazhinji nemombe dzakawanda navaranda vakawanda zvokuti vafiristia vakamuitira godo. saka matsime ose akanga acherwa navaranda vababa vake panguva yababa vake abhurahama, vafiristia vakaadzivira, vachiazadza nevhu. ipapo abhimereki akati kuna isaka, “ibva uende kure nesu; wanyanya kuva nesimba zvokutipfuura.” saka isaka akabvapo akandodzika musasa mumupata wegera akagara ikoko. isaka akacherazve matsime akanga acherwa panguva yababa vake abhurahama, iwo akanga adzivirwa navafiristia shure kwokufa kwaabhurahama, uye akaapa mazita mamwe chetewo aakanga atumidzwa nababa vake. varanda vaisaka vakachera mumupata vakawanamo tsime remvura yakanaka. asi vafudzi vegerari vakakakavadzana navafudzi vaisaka vachiti, “mvura iyi ndeyedu!” saka akatumidza tsime iro zita rokuti eseki, nokuda kwokuti vakapesana naye. ipapo vakacherazve rimwe tsime, asi vakakakavadzana pamusoro parowo; saka akaritumidza zita rokuti sitima. akaenderera mberi kubva ipapo akachera rimwe tsime, uye hapana munhu akazokakavadzana naye pamusoro paro. akaritumidza zita rokuti rehobhoti, achiti, “zvino yeahoh azotipa nzvimbo uye tichawanda munyika.” kubva ipapo akaenda kubheerishebha. usiku ihwohwo yeahoh akazviratidza kwaari akati, “ndini allah wababa vako abhurahama. usatya, nokuti ndinewe. ndichakuropafadza uye ndichakurisa zvizvarwa zvako nokuda kwomuranda wangu abhurahama.” isaka akavaka aritari ipapo akadana kuzita rayeahoh. akadzika tende rake ipapo uye pakare ipapo varanda vake vakachera tsime. zvichakadaro, abhimereki akanga asvika kwaari achibva kugerari, aina ahuzati aiva mupamazano wake napikori mukuru wavarwi vake. isaka akavabvunza akati, “mavingeiko kwandiri, sezvo makanga muri mhandu dzangu uye mukandidzinga?” vakamupindura vakati, “takaona pachena kuti yeahoh akanga anewe; saka takati, ‘panofanira kuva nechitenderano chemhiko pakati pedu,’ pakati pedu newe. ngatiite sungano newe yokuti iwe hauzotiitiri zvakaipa, sezvo isu tisina kukubata zvakaipa asi takaramba tichikuitira zvakanaka uye tikakuendesa norugare. uye zvino waropafadzwa nayeahoh.” ipapo isaka akavaitira mutambo, vakadya, vakanwa. mangwanani akatevera varume ava vakapikirana. ipapo isaka akavaendesa parwendo rwavo, vakamusiya murugare. musi iwoyo varanda vaisaka vakauya vakamuudza nezvetsime ravakanga vachera. vakati, “tawana mvura!” akaritumidza zita rokuti shibha, uye kusvikira nhasi zita reguta richiri kunzi bheerishebha. esau akati ava namakore makumi mana okuberekwa, akawana judhisi mwanasikana wabheeri muhiti, uyewo bhasemati mwanasikana waeroni muhiti. ivava vakarwadzisa isaka narabheka.

27

isaka akati akwegura uye meso ake akanga aneta zvokuti akanga asisaoni, akadana esau mwanakomana wake mukuru akati kwaari, “mwanakomana wangu.” iye akapindura akati, “ndiri pano.” isaka akati, “zvino ndava murume mutana uye handizivi zuva rokufa kwangu. naizvozvo zvino tora zvombo zvako, goba rako nouta ugoenda kusango kuti unondivhimirawo mhuka. undigadzirire zvokudya zvinondinakira ugondivigira kuti ndidye, kuitira kuti ndikupe maropafadzo angu ndisati ndafa.” zvino rabheka akanga akateerera isaka paakanga achitaura nomwanakomana wake esau. esau akati aenda kusango kuti andovhima mhuka kuti agouya nayo, rabheka akati kumwanakomana wake yaqobho, “tarira, ndanzwa baba vako vachiti kumukoma wako esau, ‘ndivigirewo mhuka ugondigadzirira nyama inonaka kuti ndidye kuitira kuti ndigokupa maropafadzo angu ndisati ndafa.’ zvino, chinzwa mwanakomana wangu, nyatsoteerera uye uite zvandinokuudza. enda kuzvipfuwo unondivigira mbudzana mbiri dzakaisvonaka, kuti ndigogadzirira baba vako nyama inonaka nenzira chaiyo yavanoda. ipapo ugoitora uende nayo kuna baba vako kuti vadye, kuitira kuti vagokupa maropafadzo avo vasati vafa.” yaqobho akati kuna rabheka mai vake, “asi mukoma wangu esau munhu ane mvere, uye ini ndiri munhu ane ganda risina mvere. ko, kana baba vangu vakandibata? ndichava somunhu anovanyengera uye ndikazouyisa kutukwa pamusoro pangu pachinzvimbo chokuropafadzwa.” mai vake vakati kwaari, “mwanakomana wangu, rega kutukwa kuuye pamusoro pangu. iwe ita zvandinoreva; enda unonditorera idzo.” saka akaenda akandodzitora akauya nadzo kuna mai vake, uye vakagadzira nyama inonaka, nenzira chaiyo yaidikanwa nababa vake. ipapo rabheka akatora nguo dzakaisvonaka dzaesau mwanakomana wake mukuru, dzaakanga anadzo mumba, akadzipfekedza mwanakomana wake muduku iye yaqobho. akafukidzawo namatehwe embudzi, maoko ake uye nenzvimbo dzomutsipa wake dzakanga dzisina mvere. ipapo akapa kumwanakomana wake yaqobho nyama inonaka nechingwa chaakanga abika. akaenda kuna baba vake akati, “baba vangu.” vakapindura vakati, “ndiri pano mwana wangu. ndianiko?” yaqobho akati kuna baba vake, “ndini esau dangwe renyu. ndaita sezvamandiudza. ndapota, mukai mudye nyama yemhuka yangu kuitira kuti mundipe maropafadzo enyu.” isaka akabvunza mwanakomana wake akati, “waiwana seiko nokukurumidza zvakadai, mwanakomana wangu?” iye akapindura akati, “yeahoh allah wenyu aita kuti ndibudirire.” ipapo isaka akati kuna yaqobho, “swedera pedyo kuti ndikubate, mwana wangu, kuti ndizive kana uri esau mwanakomana wangu chaiye kana kwete.” yaqobho akaswedera kuna baba vake isaka, iye akamubata akati, “inzwi, inzwi rayaqobho, asi maoko maoko aesau.” haana kugona kumuziva, nokuti maoko ake aiva nemvere dzakaita sedzomukoma wake esau; saka akamuropafadza. akati, “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu esau chaiye here?” akapindura akati, “ndini.” ipapo akati, “mwanakomana wangu, ndipe nyama yako yemhuka ndidye, kuitira kuti ndikupe maropafadzo angu.” yaqobho akaiisa kwaari akadya; uye akauya newaini akanwa. ipapo baba vake isaka vakati kwaari, “uya pano mwanakomana wangu unditsvode.” saka akaenda kwaari iye akamutsvoda. isaka akati anzwa kunhuhwira kwenguo dzake akamuropafadza achiti, “haiwa kunhuhwira kwomwanakomana wangu kwakaita sokunhuhwira kwesango raropafadzwa nayeahoh. allah ngaakupe dova rokudenga noupfumi hwenyika, zviyo zvakawanda newaini itsva. ndudzi ngadzikushumire uye marudzi akupfugamire. uve ishe wehama dzako, uye vanakomana vamai vako vakupfugamire. vaya vanokutuka ngavatukwe uye vaya vanokuropfadza ngavaropafadzwe.” shure kwokunge isaka apedza kumuropafadza uye yaqobho achangobva pamberi pababa vake, mukoma wake esau akasvika achibva kundovhima. naiyewo akagadzira nyama inonaka akauya nayo kuna baba vake. ipapo akati kwavari, “baba vangu, mukai mudye nyama yangu yemhuka, kuti mugondipa maropafadzo.” baba vake isaka vakamubvunza vakati, “ndiwe aniko?” akapindura akati, “ndini esau mwanakomana wenyu wedangwe.” isaka akadedera nehasha akati, “ndianiko zvino, avhima mhuka akauya nayo kwandiri? ndaidya iwe uchigere kusvika uye ndamuropafadza, uye zvirokwazvo acharopafadzwa!” esau akati anzwa mashoko ababa vake akaridza mhere nokuchema kukuru neshungu uye akati kuna baba vake, “ndiropafadzei neniwo, baba vangu!” asi ivo vakati, “mununʼuna wako auya nokunyengera akatora maropafadzo ako.” esau akati, “haana kutumidzwa zita chairo here rokuti yaqobho? akandinyengera kaviri kose: akatora udangwe hwangu, uye zvino atora maropafadzo angu!” ipapo akabvunza akati, “ko, hamuna kundichengeterawo kana ropafadzo here?” isaka akapindura esau akati, “ndamuita ishe wako uye ndakaita hama dzake dzose varanda vake, uye ndamusimbisa nezviyo newaini itsva. saka chiiko chandichagona kukuitira mwana wangu?” esau akati kuna baba vake, “munongova neropafadzo imwe chete here, baba vangu? ndiropafadzeiwo, baba vangu!” ipapo esau akachema achiridza mhere. baba vake isaka vakamupindura vakati, “ugaro hwako huchava kure nepfuma yenyika, kure nedova rokudenga kumusoro. iwe uchararama nomunondo uye uchashumira mununʼuna wako. asi paunenge woshaya zororo uchabvisa joko rake kubva pamutsipa wako.” esau akavenga yaqobho nokuda kwokuropafadzwa kwaakapiwa nababa vake. akati mumwoyo make, “mazuva okuchema baba vangu ava pedyo; ipapo ndichauraya mununʼuna wangu yaqobho.” rabheka akati audzwa zvakanga zvataurwa nomwanakomana wake mukuru esau, akatuma munhu kuna yaqobho mwanakomana wake muduku akati kwaari, “mukoma wako esau ari kuzvinyaradza nepfungwa dzokuda kukuuraya. naizvozvo zvino, mwanakomana wangu, chiita zvandinokuudza: tiza izvozvi uende kuhanzvadzi yangu rabhani kuharani. ugare naye kwechinguva kusvikira shungu dzomukoma wako dzaserera. mukoma wako paachazenge asisina kukutsamwira uye akanganwa zvawakamuitira, ini ndichatuma shoko kwauri rokuti uchidzoka kubva ikoko. ndorasikirwa nemi seiko muri vaviri zuva rimwe chete?” ipapo rabheka akati kuna isaka, “ndinosemburwa noupenyu nokuda kwavakadzi vechihiti ava. kana yaqobho akatora mukadzi anobva pakati pavakadzi vechihiti vakaita savava, kurarama kwangu hakungavi namaturo.”

28

saka isaka akadana yaqobho akamuropafadza uye akamurayira achiti, “usawana mukadzi mukenani. kurumidza uende kupadhani aramu kuimba yabhetueri baba vamai vako. uzvitorere mukadzi ikoko, kubva pakati pavanasikana varabhani, hanzvadzi yamai vako. allah wamasimba ose ngaakuropafadze uye aite kuti ubereke uye akuitei vazhinji kusvikira mava marudzi mazhinji. ngaakupe iwe nezvizvarwa zvako maropafadzo akapiwa kuna abhurahama, kuitira kuti utore nyika yaugere zvino somutorwa, nyika yakapiwa abhurahama naallah.” ipapo isaka akaendesa yaqobho, uye akaenda kupadhani aramu, kuna rabhani mwanakomana wabhetueri muaramu, hanzvadzi yarabheka, akanga ari mai vayaqobho naesau. zvino esau akaziva kuti isaka akanga aropafadza yaqobho uye kuti akanga amuendesa kupadhani aramu kuti andotora mukadzi ikoko, uye kuti paakamuropafadza akamurayira achiti, “usawana mukadzi mukenani,” uye kuti yaqobho akateerera baba namai vake akaenda kupadhani aramu. ipapo esau akaziva kuti vakadzi vekenani vakanga vasingafadzi sei isaka baba vake; saka akaenda kuna ishumaeri akandowana maharati, hanzvadzi yanebhayoti mwanasikana waishumaeri mwanakomana waabhurahama, kuwedzera pavakadzi vaakanga atova navo kare. yaqobho akabva pabheerishebha akaenda kuharani. akati asvika pane imwe nzvimbo, akavata ipapo usiku nokuti zuva rakanga ravira. akatora rimwe ramatombo ipapo, akaritsamira akavata. akarota achiona manera amire panyika, uye musoro wawo uchisvika kudenga, uye vatumwa vaallah vaikwidza nokudzika nawo. pamusoro pawo ipapo pakanga pamire yeahoh, uye akati, “ndini yeahoh, allah wababa vako abhurahama naallah waisaka. ndichakupa iwe nezvizvarwa zvako nyika yauvete pairi. zvizvarwa zvako zvichaita seguruva renyika, uye muchapararira kubva kumavirira kusvikira kumabvazuva, kumusoro nezasi. marudzi ose apanyika acharopafadzwa kubudikidza navana vako. ndinewe uye ndichakuchengeta kwose kwaunoenda, uye ndichakudzosazve munyika ino. handingakusiyi kusvikira ndaita zvandakavimbisa.” yaqobho akati apepuka pahope, akafunga akati, “zvirokwazvo yeahoh ari panzvimbo ino, uye ndanga ndisingazvizivi.” akanga achitya uye akati, “nzvimbo ino inotyisa sei! iyi imba chaiyo yaallah; iri ndiro suo rokudenga.” mangwanani akatevera yaqobho akatora dombo raakanga akatsamira akarimisa sembiru akadururira mafuta pamusoro paro. akatumidza nzvimbo iyi zita rokuti bheteri, kunyange zvazvo guta iro raimbonzi ruzi. ipapo yaqobho akaita mhiko, akati, “kana allah akava neni uye akandichengeta parwendo urwu rwandiri kufamba uye akandipa zvokudya kuti ndidye nenguo dzokupfeka uye ndikadzoka zvakanaka kuimba yababa vangu, ipapo yeahoh achava allah wangu, uye dombo iri randamisa sembiru richava imba yaallah, uye pane zvose zvamuchandipa ndichakupai chegumi.”

29

ipapo yaqobho akapfuurira mberi norwendo rwake akasvika kunyika yavanhu vokumabvazuva. ikoko akaona tsime musango, namapoka matatu amakwai avete pedyo naro nokuti makwai ainwiswa patsime iroro. ibwe rakanga riri pamuromo wetsime rakanga riri guru. mapoka ose aiti aungana ipapo, vafudzi vaikungurutsa ibwe kubva pamuromo wetsime vachinwisa makwai avo. ipapo vaizodzorera ibwe panzvimbo yaro, ipo pamuromo wetsime. yaqobho akabvunza vafudzi akati, “mabvepiko, hama dzangu?” ivo vakapindura vakati, “tabva kuharani.” iye akati kwavari, “munoziva rabhani, muzukuru wanahori here?” vakapindura vakati, “hongu, tinomuziva.” ipapo yaqobho akavabvunza akati, “anofara here?” ivo vakati, “hongu, anofara uye hoyo mwanasikana wake rakeri ari kuuya namakwai.” iye akati, “tarirai, achiri masikati haisati yava nguva yokuti makwai aunganidzwe. nwisai makwai mugoadzosera kumafuro.” vakapindura vakati, “hatigoni kudaro kusvikira mapoka ose aunganidzwa uye ibwe rakungurutswa kubva pamuromo wetsime. ipapo ndipo patinozonwisa makwai.” paakanga achiri kutaura navo, rakeri akasvika namakwai ababa vake, nokuti akanga ari mufudzikadzi. yaqobho akati achiona rakeri mwanasikana warabhani, hanzvadzi yamai vake, uye namakwai arabhani, akaendapo akandokungurutsa ibwe kubva pamuromo wetsime ndokubva anwisa makwai asekuru vake. ipapo yaqobho akatsvoda rakeri akachema zvikuru. uye akaudza rakeri kuti iye akanga ari hama yababa vake uye ari mwanakomana warabheka. saka rakeri akamhanya akandoudza baba vake. rabhani akati angoudzwa mashoko pamusoro payaqobho, mwanakomana wehanzvadzi yake, akakurumidza kundosangana naye. akamumbundikira, akamutsvoda akamuuyisa kumba kwake, uye ipapo yaqobho akamuudza zvose izvi. ipapo akati kwaari, “iwe uri nyama yangu neropa rangu.” shure kwokugara kwake naye mwedzi wose, rabhani akati kwaari, “ungandishandira usingapuwi mubayiro nokuda kwokuti uri hama yangu here? ndiudze kuti mubayiro wako unofanira kuva chii?” zvino rabhani akanga ana vanasikana vaviri; zita romukuru rainzi rea uye zita romuduku rainzi rakeri. rea akanga ana meso akaneta, asi rakeri akanga ane chimiro chinoyevedza uye akanaka kwazvo. yaqobho aida rakeri uye akati, “ndichakushandirai kwamakore manomwe mugondipa rakeri mwanasikana wenyu muduku.” rabhani akati, “zviri nani kuti ndimupe kwauri pano kumupa kuno mumwewo murume. chigara hako pano neni.” saka yaqobho akashanda kwamakore manomwe kuti awane rakeri, asi akaita samazuva mashoma chete kwaari nokuda kworudo rwake kwaari. ipapo yaqobho akati kuna rabhani, “ndipei mukadzi wangu. nguva yangu yakwana uye ndinoda kuvata naye.” saka rabhani akaunganidza pamwe chete vanhu vose venzvimbo iyo akaita mutambo. asi akati ava madekwana, akatora mwanasikana wake rea akamupa kuna yaqobho, yaqobho akavata naye. uye rabhani akapa ziripa murandakadzi wake kumwanasikana wake kuti ave mushandi wake. kwakati kwaedza mangwanani wanei ndirea! saka yaqobho akati kuna rabhani, “chiiko ichi chamaita kwandiri? ndakashandira rakeri, hazvisirizvo here? seiko mandinyengera?” rabhani akapindura akati, “haisi tsika yedu kuno kuti mwanasikana muduku atange kuwanikwa mukuru achigere kuwanikwa. pedzisa vhiki youmwenga yomwanasikana uyu; ipapo tichazokupawo muduku shure kwokushandira mamwe makore manomwe.” uye yaqobho akaita saizvozvo. akapedza vhiki narea, uye ipapo rabhani akamupa mwanasikana wake rakeri kuti ave mukadzi wake. rabhani akapa murandakadzi wake bhiriha kuna rakeri kuti ave mushandi wake. yaqobho akavatawo narakeri uye aida rakeri kupfuura rea. uye akashandira rabhani kwamamwe makore manomwe. yeahoh akati aona kuti rea akanga asingadikanwi, akazarura chizvaro chake, asi rakeri akanga asingabereki. rea akava nemimba akabereka mwanakomana. akamutumidza zita rokuti rubheni, nokuti akati, “yeahoh akaona kutambudzika kwangu. zvirokwazvo murume wangu achandida zvino.” akabatazve pamwe pamuviri, uye akati abereka mwanakomana, akati, “nokuti yeahoh akanzwa kuti handidikanwi, akandipa uyuzve.” saka akamutumidza kuti simeoni. akabatazve pamwe pamuviri uye akati abereka mwanakomana, akati, “zvino pakupedzisira murume wangu achabatanidzwa neni, nokuti, ndamuberekera vanakomana vatatu.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti revhi. akabatazve pamwe pamuviri uye paakabereka mwanakomana, akati, “nguva ino ndicharumbidza yeahoh.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti yeahudha. ipapo akaguma kubereka vana.

30

rakeri akati aona kuti akanga asingaberekeri yaqobho vana, akaitira mukoma wake godo. saka akati kuna yaqobho, “ndipe vana, kana zvikasadaro ndichafa!” yaqobho akamutsamwira akati, “ko, ini ndiri panzvimbo yaallah here akakuita kuti urege kuva nevana?” ipapo akati, “hoyu bhiriha, murandakadzi wangu. vata naye kuitira kuti andiberekere vana uye kuti kubudikidza naye neni ndigovawo nemhuri.” saka akamupa murandakadzi wake bhiriha kuti ave mukadzi wake. yaqobho akavata naye, akava nemimba akamuberekera mwanakomana. ipapo rakeri akati, “allah andiruramisira; iye akanzwa mukumbiro wangu uye akandipa mwanakomana.” nokuda kwaizvozvo akamutumidza zita rokuti dhani. bhiriha murandakadzi warakeri akavazve nemimba uye akaberekera yaqobho mwanakomana wechipiri. ipapo rakeri akati, “ndakava nokurwa kukuru nomukoma wangu, ndikakunda.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti nafutari. rea akati aona kuti aguma kubereka vana, akatora murandakadzi wake ziripa akamupa kuna yaqobho somukadzi wake. ziripa murandakadzi warea akaberekera yaqobho mwanakomana. ipapo rea akati, “makorokoto! zvaita zvakanaka.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti gadhi. ziripa murandakadzi warea akaberekera yaqobho mwanakomana wechipiri. ipapo rea akati, “mufaroi wandinawo! vakadzi vachati mufaro kwandiri.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti asheri. panguva yokuchekwa kwegorosi, rubheni akabuda akaenda musango akandowana mamandiraki, akauya nawo kuna mai vake rea, rakeri akati kuna rea, “ndapota dondipawo mamwe mamandiraki omwanakomana wako.” asi iye akati kwaari, “ko, hazvina kuringana here kuti wakanditorera murume wangu? uchada kutorazve mamandiraki omwanakomana wangu here?” rakeri akati, “zvakanaka, ngaavate newe usiku huno nokuda kwamamandiraki omwanakomana wako.” saka yaqobho akati achisvika kubva kusango manheru iwayo, rea akabuda kundomuchingamidza. akati kwaari, “unofanira kuvata neni iwe. ndakutenga nemamandiraki omwanakomana wangu.” saka akavata naye usiku ihwohwo. allah akanzwa rea, uye akava nemimba akaberekera yaqobho mwanakomana wechishanu. ipapo rea akati, “allah akandipa mubayiro nokuda kwokupa murandakadzi wangu kumurume wangu.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti isakari. rea akabatazve pamuviri uye akaberekera yaqobho mwanakomana wechitanhatu. ipapo rea akati, “allah andipa chipo chinokosha. nguva ino murume wangu achandikudza, nokuti ndamuberekera vanakomana vatanhatu.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti zebhuruni. shure kwaizvozvo akazobereka mwanasikana uye akamutumidza zita rokuti dhaina. ipapo allah akarangarira rakeri; akamunzwa uye akazarura chizvaro chake. akava nemimba akabereka mwanakomana uye akati, “allah abvisa kunyadziswa kwangu.” akamutumidza zita rokuti yosefa, uye akati, “allah ngaandiwedzere mumwe mwanakomana.” shure kwokuberekwa kwayosefa narakeri, yaqobho akati kuna rabhani, “ndiregei ndiende kunyika yokwangu. ndipei vakadzi vangu navana, avo vandakakushandirai kuti ndigowana, uye ndigoenda. munoziva kuti ndakakushandirai sei.” asi rabhani akati kwaari, “kana ndawana nyasha pamberi pako, ndapota hangu imbogara. ndakaona nokuvuka kuti yeahoh akandiropafadza nokuda kwako.” akatizve, “reva muripo wako, uye ndichakuripa.” yaqobho akati kwaari, “munoziva kuti ndakakushandirai sei uye kuti zvipfuwo zvenyu ndakazvichengeta sei. zvishoma zvamaiva nazvo kare ndisati ndauya zvawanda, uye yeahoh akakuropafadzai kwose kwandakanga ndiri. asi zvino, ndichaitirawo mhuri yangu chinhu riniko?” akamubvunza akati, “ndokupeiko?” yaqobho akati, “musandipa chinhu. asi kana mukandiitira chinhu chimwe chete ichi, ndicharamba ndichifudza makwai enyu uye ndichaachengeta: regai ndifambe pakati pezvipfuwo zvenyu zvose nhasi nditsaure pakati pazvo zvose zvina mavara namakwai ana makwapa, gwayana dema rimwe nerimwe nembudzi imwe neimwe ina mavara kana ina makwapa. ndizvo zvichava mubayiro wangu. uye kutendeka kwangu kuchandipupurira pane ramangwana rangu, pose pamunenge muchizoona mubayiro wangu wamakandipa. mbudzi ipi zvayo yandinayo inenge isina mavara kana gwapa, kana gwayana ripi zvaro rinenge risina kusviba, zvichanzi zvakabiwa.” rabhani akati, “ndizvozvo. ngazvive sezvawataura.” musi wacho iwoyo akatsaura nhongo dzose dzembudzi dzakanga dzine mitsetse kana dzaiva namakwapa, nenhunzvi dzose dzembudzi (dzose dzakanga dzine zvichena padziri) namakwayana matema ose, akazvichengetesa navanakomana vake. ipapo akaisa nhambwe yorwendo rwamazuva matatu pakati pake nayaqobho, asi yaqobho akaramba achifudza makwai akanga asara arabhani. kunyange zvakadaro, yaqobho akatora matavi akatemwa kubva pamupopura, muarimondi nomuti womupureni uye akasvuura mitsetse michena pairi achibvisa gwati kuti kuchena kwedanda kwomukati kuonekwe. ipapo akaisa matanda ose akasvuurwa muzvinwiro zvose, kuitira kuti ave mberi kwezvipfuwo pazvainge zvauya kuzonwa. zvipfuwo zvapfumvura zvaiti pazvinenge zvauya kuzonwa mvura, zvaisangana pamberi pamatanda. uye zvaibereka vana vane mitsetse kana vane mavara kana makwapa. yaqobho aitsaura mbudzana kana makwayana oga, asi aiita kuti akasara atarisane nezvipfuwo zvine mitsetse nezvipfuwo zvitema zvakanga zviri zvarabhani. nokudaro akaparadzanisa zvipfuwo zvake nezvarabhani. pose painge nhunzvi dzezvipfuwo zvine simba zvapfumvura, yaqobho aiisa matanda muzvinwiro pamberi pezvipfuwo kuitira kuti zvisangane pedyo namatanda, asi kana zvipfuwo zvisina simba, aisaisa matanda ipapo. saka zvipfuwo zvisina simba zvakaenda kuna rabhani uye zvine simba zvikaenda kuna yaqobho. nenzira iyi murume uyu akapfuma kwazvo uye akava namapoka akawanda amakwai, navarandakadzi navarandarume, uye ngamera nembongoro.

31

yaqobho akanzwa kuti vanakomana varabhani vakanga vachiti, “yaqobho atora zvose zvaiva zvababa vedu uye awana upfumi hwose uhu kubva kune zvaiva zvababa vedu.” uye yaqobho akaona kuti ndangariro dzarabhani kwaari dzakanga dzisisina kuita sapakutanga. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna yaqobho, “dzokera kunyika yamadzibaba ako nokuhama dzako, uye ndichava newe.” saka yaqobho akatuma shoko kuna rakeri narea kuti vauye kusango kwakanga kuna makwai ake. akati kwavari, “ndinoona kuti ndangariro dzababa venyu kwandiri hadzisisina kuita sezvadzakanga dzakaita kare, asi allah wababa vangu aneni. munoziva kuti ndakashandira baba venyu nesimba rangu rose, asi baba venyu vakandinyengera nokushandura-shandura mubayiro wangu kagumi kose. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, allah haana kuvatendera kuti vandikuvadze. pavakati, ‘zvina mavara zvichava mubayiro wako,’ ipapo zvipfuwo zvose zvakabereka zvina mavara, uye pavakati, ‘zvine mitsetse zvichava mubayiro wako,’ ipapo zvipfuwo zvose zvakaberekwa zvine mitsetse. saka allah akatora zvipfuwo zvababa venyu akazvipa kwandiri. “panguva yokubereka kwezvipfuwo, ndakarota dzimwe hope dzokuti ndakatarira ndikaona kuti nhongo dzembudzi dzaisangana nezvipfuwo dzakanga dzine mitsetse, dzina mavara kana kuti dzina makwapa. mutumwa waallah akati kwandiri mukurota, ‘yaqobho,’ ini ndikapindura ndikati, ‘ndiri pano.’ uye akati, ‘tarira uone kuti nhongo dzose dzembudzi dzinosangana nezvipfuwo zvose dzine mitsetse, mavara kana makwapa, nokuti ndaona zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa narabhani kwauri. ndini allah webheteri, kuya kwawakazodza mbiru uye kwawakaita mhiko neni. zvino kurumidza ubve munyika ino udzokere kunyika kwawakazvarirwa.’ ” ipapo rakeri narea vakati, “ko, tichine mugove munhaka yababa vedu here? ko, havationi savatorwa here? havana kungotitengesa chete, asi vakashandisa mutengo wedu wose. zvirokwazvo pfuma yose yakatorwa naallah kubva kuna baba vedu ndeyedu nevana vedu. saka ita zvose zvaunoudzwa naallah.” ipapo yaqobho akaisa vana vake navakadzi vake pangamera, uye akatinha zvipfuwo zvose pamwe chete nepfuma yose yaakanga aunganidza mupadhani aramu, kuti aende kuna baba vake isaka kunyika yekenani. rabhani akati aenda kundoveura makwai ake, rakeri akaba vamwari vomumba mababa vake. pamusoro paizvozvo, yaqobho akanyengera rabhani muaramu nokusamuudza kuti ava kuenda. saka akatiza nezvose zvaakanga anazvo, akayambuka rwizi akananga kunyika yezvikomo yegireadhi. pazuva rechitatu rabhani akazoudzwa kuti yaqobho akanga atiza. akatora hama dzake, akatevera yaqobho kwamazuva manomwe uye vakamubatira munyika yezvikomo yegireadhi. ipapo allah akasvika kuna rabhani muaramu mukurota usiku uye akati kwaari, “chenjera kuti urege kutaura chinhu chipi zvacho kuna yaqobho, chakanaka kana chakaipa.” yaqobho akanga adzika tende rake munyika yezvikomo yegireadhi paakabatwa narabhani, uye rabhani nehama dzake vakadzikawo musasa ipapo. ipapo rabhani akati kuna yaqobho, “waiteiko? wandinyengera, uye watakura vanasikana vangu senhapwa muhondo. ko, watizirei muchivande uye ukandinyengera? seiko usina kundiudza, kuitira kuti ndaidai ndakuendesa nomufaro uye kuchiimbwa nziyo nokuridzwa matambureni norudimbwa? hauna kunditendera kutsvoda vazukuru vangu kana kuonekana navanasikana vangu. waita zvoupenzi. ndine simba rokukukuvadza; asi usiku allah wababa vako ati kwandiri, ‘chenjera kuti urege kutaura chinhu chipi zvacho kuna yaqobho, chakanaka kana chakaipa.’ zvino wakada kuenda nokuda kwokushuva kudzokera kuimba yababa vako. asi wakabireiko vamwari vangu?” yaqobho akapindura rabhani akati, “ndakanga ndichitya, nokuti ndakafunga kuti maizonditorera vanasikana venyu nechisimba. asi kana mukawana munhu upi zvake anenge ana vamwari venyu, iyeye haafaniri kurarama. pamberi pehama dzedu zvionerei pachenyu kana pane chinhu chenyu pano neni; uye kana zvakadaro, muchitore henyu.” zvino yaqobho akanga asingazivi kuti rakeri akanga aba vamwari vacho. saka rabhani akapinda mutende rayaqobho nomutende rarea uye nomumatende maviri avarandakadzi, asi haana kuwana chinhu. mushure mokubuda kwake mutende rarea, akapinda mutende rarakeri. zvino rakeri akanga atora vamwari vomuimba yababa vake akavaisa pasi pechigaro chengamera yake uye akanga agere pamusoro pazvo. rabhani akatsvaka pakati pezvinhu zvose mutende asi haana kuwana chinhu. rakeri akati kuna baba vake, “regai henyu kutsamwa, ishe wangu, kuti handigoni kusimuka pamberi penyu; ndiri pamutowo wavakadzi.” saka akatsvaka asi haana kuwana vamwari veimba yake. yaqobho akatsamwa uye akapopotera rabhani akati, “mhaka yangu ndeyeiko? chivi chandakaita ndecheiko zvamandivhima mukadai? zvino zvamatsvaka pakati penhumbi dzangu dzose, chiiko chamawana chokumba kwenyu? chiisei pano pamberi pehama dzenyu, uye ngavatonge pakati pedu isu vaviri. “ndakanga ndinemi makore makumi maviri aya. makwai enyu nembudzi dzenyu hazvina kusvodza, uye handina kudya makondobwe amakwai enyu. handina kuuya kwamuri nezvipfuwo zvakabvamburwa nezvikara zvesango; ndakatakura mutoro wacho pachangu. uye makareva muripo kubva kwandiri pane zvose zvakabiwa masikati kana usiku. aya ndiwo aiva magariro angu: ndakapiswa nezuva masikati uye nechando usiku, uye hope dzakatiza mumaziso angu. zvakanga zvakaita saizvozvi kwamakore gumi namana nokuda kwavanasikana venyu vaviri ava nemakore matanhatu nokuda kwezvipfuwo zvenyu, uye makashandura mubayiro wangu kagumi. dai allah wababa vangu, iye allah waabhurahama uye aityiwa naisaka, akanga asineni, zvirokwazvo mungadai makandiendesa ndisina chinhu. asi allah akaona kutambudzika kwangu nokubata kwamaoko angu, uye usiku akakutsiurai.” rabhani akapindura yaqobho akati, “madzimai aya vanasikana vangu, uye vana ava vana vangu, uye zvipfuwo izvi ndezvangu. zvose zvaunoona ndezvangu. asi ndichaiteiko nhasi pamusoro pavanasikana vangu ava, kana pamusoro pavana vavakabereka? uya zvino, ngatiite sungano, iwe neni, uye ngaive chapupu pakati pedu.” saka yaqobho akatora ibwe akarimisa sembiru. akati kuhama dzake, “unganidzai mamwe mabwe.” saka vakatora mabwe vakaaunganidza vakaita murwi, uye vakadya ipapo pamurwi. rabhani akautumidza zita rokuti jegari sahadhuta, uye yaqobho akautumidza kuti gareedhi. rabhani akati, “murwi uyu ndiwo uchapupu pakati pangu newe nhasi.” ndokusaka wakanzi gareedhi. wakanga uchinziwo mizipa, nokuti akati, “yeahoh ngaachengete iwe neni patinenge tiri kure nokure. kana ukabata vanasikana vangu zvakaipa kana kutora vamwe vakadzi kunze kwevanasikana vangu, kunyange dai mumwe munhu akasava nesu, rangarira kuti allah ndiye chapupu pakati pako neni.” rabhani akatiwo kuna yaqobho, “hoyu murwi uyu, uye heyi mbiru yandamisa iyi pakati pako neni. murwi uyu ndiwo chapupu uye mbiru iyi ndiyo chapupu, kuti handizopfuuri murwi uno ndichiuya kwauri kuti ndizokukuvadza uye kuti iwe hauzopfuuri murwi uno nembiru uchiuya kurutivi rwangu kuti uzondikuvadza. allah waabhurahama naallah wanahori, iye allah wababa vavo, ngaatonge pakati pedu.” saka yaqobho akaita mhiko muzita raiye aityiwa nababa vake isaka. akapa chibayiro imomo munyika yezvikomo uye akakoka hama dzake kuti dzizodya. mushure mokudya vakavatapo usiku ihwohwo. mangwanani akatevera rabhani akatsvoda vazukuru vake navanasikana vake uye akavaropafadza. ipapo akabva akadzokera kumusha kwake.

32

yaqobho akaendawo nenzira yake, uye vatumwa vaallah vakasangana naye. yaqobho akati achivaona, akati, “uyu ndiwo musasa waallah!” saka akatumidza nzvimbo iyo zita rokuti mahanaimi. yaqobho akatuma nhume mberi kwake kumukoma wake esau munyika yeseiri, iyo nyika yeedhomu. akavarayira akati, “izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kutaura kuna tenzi wangu esau kuti: ‘zvanzi nomuranda wenyu yaqobho, ndakanga ndichigara narabhani uye ndakagarako kusvikira zvino. ndine mombe nembongoro, makwai nembudzi, varandarume navarandakadzi. zvino ndiri kutuma shoko iri kuna she wangu, kuti ndiwane nyasha pamberi penyu.’ ” nhume dzakati dzadzoka kuna yaqobho, dzakati kwaari, “takaenda kumukoma wenyu esau, uye ari kuuya zvino kuzosangana nemi, uye ana varume mazana mana.” ipapo yaqobho akatya zvikuru uye akatambudzika, akaparadzanisa vanhu vaakanga anavo mumapoka maviri, uye makwai nemombe nengamerawo. akafunga akati, “kana esau akasvika akaparadza rimwe boka, boka rasara ringapunyuka.” ipapo yaqobho akanyengetera akati, “haiwa allah wababa vangu abhurahama, allah wababa vangu isaka, imi yeahoh makati kwandiri, ‘dzokera kunyika yokwako nokuhama dzako, uye ndichaita kuti ubudirire,’ ini handina kufanirwa nenyasha dzenyu dzose idzi uye nokutendeka kwamakaratidza muranda wenyu. ndakanga ndichingova netsvimbo yangu bedzi pandakayambuka jorodhani urwu, asi zvino ndava mapoka maviri. ndinokumbira kuti mundiponese kubva muruoko rwomukoma wangu esau, nokuti ndinotya kuti achasvika akandiuraya, uyewo madzimai aya navana vavo. asi imi makati, ‘zvirokwazvo ndichaita kuti ubudirire uye kuti zvizvarwa zvako zvive sejecha regungwa, risingagoni kuverengwa.’ ” akapedza usiku hwose ipapo, uye pane zvaakanga anazvo, akatsaurira mukoma wake esau chipo chaiti: mazana maviri enhunzvi dzemakwai namakumi maviri enhongo dzembudzi, mazana maviri amatunzvi amakwai namakondobwe makumi maviri, ngamera hadzi, makumi matatu navana vadzo, mhou dzemombe makumi mana nehando gumi, mbongoro hadzi makumi maviri uye nehono gumi. akaita kuti zvichengetwe navaranda vake, boka rimwe nerimwe riri roga, uye akati kuvaranda vake, “tungamirai mberi kwangu, uye musiye nzvimbo pakati pamapoka.” akarayira uya akanga achitungamirira akati, “mukoma wangu esau paanosangana nemi uye akakubvunza achiti, ‘uri waaniko iwe, uye uri kuendepi, uye pfuma yose iri mberi kwako ndeyani?’ ipapo iwe unofanira kupindura uchiti, ‘ndezvomuranda wenyu yaqobho. izvi zvipo zvatumirwa kuna she wangu esau, uye iye ari kutevera mumashure medu.’ ” akarayirawo wechipiri, wechitatu uye navamwe vose vaitevera mapoka achiti, “munofanira kutaura chinhu chimwe chete kuna esau pamunosangana naye. uye murangarire kuti, ‘muranda wenyu yaqobho ari kuuya mumashure medu.’ ” nokuti akafunga akati, “ndamunyaradza nezvipo zvandiri kumutumira mberi; pandinozomuona, zvichida achandigamuchira.” saka chipo chayaqobho chakatungamira mberi kwake, asi iye pachake akavata mumusasa. nokuti akafunga akati, “ndichamunyaradza nezvipo zvandiri kutumira mberi; pandinozomuona, zvichida achandigamuchira.” usiku ihwohwo yaqobho akamuka akatora vakadzi vake vaviri, varandakadzi vake navanakomana vake gumi nomumwe vakayambuka pazambuko rejabhoki. shure kwokuvayambutsa rukova, akayambutsawo zvose zvaakanga anazvo. saka yaqobho akasara ari oga, uye mumwe murume akaita mutsimba naye kusvikira utonga hwatsvuka. murume uye paakaona kuti akanga asingagoni kumukunda, akabata pahudyu yayaqobho zvokuti hudyu yakashodogoka paakanga achiita mutsimba nomunhu uyu. ipapo murume uya akati, “ndirege ndiende, nokuti utonga hwatsvuka.” asi yaqobho akapindura akati, “handingatongokuregei muchienda kusvikira mandiropafadza.” murume uya akamubvunza akati, “zita rako ndianiko?” yaqobho akapindura akati, “yaqobho.” ipapo murume uya akati, “zita rako harichazonzi yaqobho, asi israeri, nokuti wakarwa naallah uye nomunhu ukakunda.” yaqobho akati, “ndapota hangu, ndiudzei zita renyu.” asi iye akapindura akati, “seiko uchibvunza zita rangu?” ipapo akamuropafadza. saka yaqobho akatumidza nzvimbo iyo zita rokuti penieri, akati, “nokuti ndaona allah chiso nechiso, asi handina kufa.” zuva rakakwira pamusoro pake, paakanga opfuura penieri, uye akanga achikamhina nokuda kwehudyu yake. naizvozvo kusvikira zuva ranhasi vaisraeri havadyi runda rakabatanidzwa nehudyu, nokuti hudyu yayaqobho yakanga yakuvadzwa pedyo nerunda.

33

yaqobho akasimudza meso ake ndokuona hoyo esau, achiuya ana varume mazana mana; saka akaparadzanisa vana pakati parea narakeri navarandakadzi vaviri. akaisa varandakadzi navana vavo pamberi, rea navana vake vachitevera, uye rakeri nayosefa mumashure. iye pachake akatungamira mberi akakotamira pasi kanomwe paakanga oswedera kumukoma wake. asi esau akamhanya kundosangana naye akamumbundikira mumutsipa namaoko ake uye akamutsvoda. uye vakachema. ipapo esau akasimudza meso ake akaona madzimai navana. akamubvunza akati, “ndivanaaniko ava vaunavo?” yaqobho akapindura akati, “ndivo vana vakapiwa muranda wenyu naallah.” ipapo varandakadzi navana vavo vakaswedera uye vakakotama pasi. zvimwe chetezvo, rea navana vake vakasvika uye vakakotama pasi. mushure mavo vose yosefa narakeri, naivowo vakakotama pasi. esau akati, “ko, unorevei namapoka ose andasangana nawo aya?” iye akati, “kuti ndiwane nyasha pamberi penyu, ishe wangu.” asi esau akati, “ndatova nezvizhinji, mununʼuna wangu. chizvichengetera iwe zvaunazvo.” yaqobho akati, “kwete ndapota! kana ndawana nyasha kwamuri gamuchirai henyu chipo ichi kubva kwandiri. nokuti kuona chiso chenyu kunenge kuona chiso chaallah, sezvo zvino mandigamuchira zvakanaka kudai. ndapota, gamuchirai chipo chandakuvigirai, nokuti allah akandiitira nyasha uye ndine zvose zvandinoda.” uye nokuda kwokuti yaqobho akaramba achimugombedzera, esau akazochigamuchira. ipapo esau akati, “ngatiendei zvedu; ndichakuperekedzai.” asi yaqobho akati kwaari, “ishe wangu anoziva kuti vana vachiri vaduku uye kuti ndinofanira kuchengetedza makwai nemombe dziri kunwisa. kana zvikanyanya kutinhwa nezuva rimwe chete, zvingazofa. saka ishe wangu ngaatungamire hake mberi kwomuranda wake, ini ndichifamba hangu zvishoma zvishoma nenhambwe dzinoenderana nezvipfuwo zviri mberi kwangu, uyewo zvinoenderana navana, kudzamara ndasvika kuna she wangu kuseiri.” esau akati, “zvino chirega ndisiye vamwe vanhu vangu newe.” yaqobho akabvunza akati, “asi mungaitireiko izvozvo? regai ndiwane nyasha pamberi pashe wangu bedzi.” saka pazuva iroro, esau akapinda munzira yake akadzokera kuseiri. zvisinei hazvo, yaqobho akaenda kusukoti, kwaakazvivakira imba yake uye akaitirawo zvipfuwo zvake matanga. ndokusaka nzvimbo iyo ichinzi sukoti. shure kwokubva kwayaqobho kupadhani aramu, akasvika zvakanaka kuguta reshekemu mukenani uye akadzika musasa wake pakatarisana neguta. akatenga nzvimbo yaakadzika matende ake kubva kuvanakomana vahamori, baba vashekemu nezana resirivha. akavaka aritari ipapo uye akaitumidza zita rokuti eri erohe israeri.

34

zvino dhaina, mwanasikana akaberekerwa yaqobho narea, akabuda kundoshanyira madzimai enyika iyo. shekemu mwanakomana wahamori muhivhi, mutongi wenzvimbo iyo, akati amuona, akamumanikidza akavata naye, uye akamunyadza. mwoyo wake wakadokwairira dhaina mwanasikana wayaqobho, uye aida musikana uyu, uye akataura naye zvinyoronyoro. saka shekemu akati kuna hamori baba vake, “nditorerei musikana uyu kuti ave mukadzi wangu.” yaqobho paakanzwa kuti mwanasikana wake dhaina akanga asvibiswa, vanakomana vake vakanga vari kusango nezvipfuwo zvake; saka akanyarara pamusoro pazvo kusvikira vauya kumba. ipapo hamori baba vashekemu vakabuda kundotaura nayaqobho. zvino vanakomana vayaqobho vakauya vachibva kusango, pavakangonzwa zvakanga zvaitika. vakanga vane shungu uye vakatsamwa, nokuti shekemu akanga aita chinhu chinonyadza kwazvo kuna israeri, chokuvata nomwanasikana wayaqobho, chinhu chisingafaniri kuitwa. asi hamori akati kwavari, “mwanakomana wangu shekemu anodokwairira mwanasikana wenyu. ndapota mupei henyu iye kuti ave mukadzi wake. ngatiwaniranei; tipei vanasikana venyu uye imiwo mutore vanasikana vedu. munogona henyu kugara pakati pedu; nyika iri pamberi penyu. garaimo, tengesaimo, uye muve nepfuma murimo.” ipapo shekemu akati kuna baba vadhaina nokuhanzvadzi dzake, “regai ndiwane nyasha pamberi penyu, uye ndichakupai zvose zvamunoda. revai henyu roora romwenga uye ndichakupai chipo chikuru sezvamunoda, uye zvose zvamuchareva kwandiri ndicharipa hangu. ndipei bedzi musikana ave mukadzi wangu.” nokuda kwokuti hanzvadzi yavo dhaina yakanga yasvibiswa vanakomana vayaqobho vakapindura nokunyengera pakutaura kwavo kuna shekemu nababa vake hamori. vakati kwaari, “hatingaiti chinhu chakadaro; hatigoni kupa hanzvadzi yedu kumurume asina kudzingiswa. chingava chinyadziso kwatiri ichocho. tingangotenderana kana maita chinhu chimwe chete: kuti imi muve sesu nokudzingisa varume vose. ipapo tichakupai vanasikana vedu uye tigozvitorerawo vanasikana venyu. tichagara pakati penyu tigova vanhu vamwe nemi. asi kana musingadi kudzingiswa, isu tichatora hanzvadzi yedu tigoenda.” kutaura kwavo kwainge kwakanaka kuna hamori nomwanakomana wake shekemu. jaya iri raikudzwa zvikuru pakati pemhuri yose yababa varo, harina kunonoka kuita zvavakareva, nokuti akanga achifadzwa nomwanasikana wayaqobho. saka hamori nomwanakomana wake shekemu vakaenda kusuo reguta ravo kuti vandotaura navamwe varume vomuguta ravo. vakati, “vanhu ava vakanaka kwazvo kwatiri. ngavagare munyika yedu uye vashambadzire mairi; nyika yakakura kwazvo kwavari. tinogona kuwana vanasikana vavo uye ivo vanogona kuwana veduwo. asi varume vachatenderana nesu kuti tive savanhu vamwe nechinhu chimwe bedzi, chokuti vanhurume vedu vadzingiswe, sezvavari ivo. ko, mombe dzavo, pfuma yavo nezvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo hazvingavi zvedu here? saka ngatitenderanei navo, vagogara pakati pedu.” varume vose vakabuda kusuo reguta vakabvumirana nahamori nomwanakomana wake shekemu, uye vanhurume vose vomuguta vakadzingiswa. shure kwamazuva matatu, vose vachiri kurwadziwa, vanakomana vaviri vayaqobho, simeoni narevhi, hanzvadzi dzadhaina, vakatora minondo yavo vakarwisa guta rakanga risina chifungidziro, vakauraya munhurume wose. vakauraya hamori nomwanakomana wake nomunondo uye vakatora hanzvadzi yavo dhaina kubva mumba mashekemu vakaenda. vanakomana vayaqobho vakasvika kuzvitunha vakapamba guta iro makanga masvibiswa hanzvadzi yavo. vakatora makwai avo nemombe dzavo, mbongoro dzavo nezvose zvakanga zviri zvavo muguta uye nezvaiva musango. vakatakura pfuma yavo navakadzi vavo vose navana, vakapamba zvinhu zvose zvaiva mudzimba. ipapo yaqobho akati kuna simeoni narevhi, “mandiparira dambudziko mukandiita chinhu chinonhuhwa kuvakenani navaperizi, vanhu vagere munyika muno. tiri vashoma isu, uye kana vakandikomberana uye vakarwa neni, ini nemhuri yangu tichaparadzwa.” asi ivo vakapindura vakati, “zvakanaka here kuti vabate hanzvadzi yedu sechifeve?”

35

ipapo allah akati kuna yaqobho, “kwira uende kubheteri undogara ikoko, uye uvake aritari yaallah ikoko, iye akazviratidza kwauri pawakanga uchitiza mukoma wako esau.” saka yaqobho akati kune veimba yake nokuna vose vakanga vanaye, “bvisai vamwari vavatorwa vamunavo, muzvinatse uye mupfeke dzimwe nguo dzenyu. ipapo mugouya tiende kubheteri, uko kwandichandovaka aritari yaallah, iye akandipindura pazuva rokutambudzika kwangu uye iye akanga aneni kwose kwandakaenda.” saka vakapa yaqobho vamwari vavatorwa vose vavaiva navo nemhete dzaiva munzeve dzavo, uye yaqobho akazvifushira pasi pomuouki weshekemu. ipapo vakasimuka, kutya allah kukawira pamusoro pamaguta ose akavapoteredza zvokuti hakuna munhu akavatevera. yaqobho navanhu vose vaaiva navo vakasvika kuruzi (ndirowo bheteri) munyika yekenani. akavaka aritari ipapo, akatumidza nzvimbo iyo zita rokuti eri bheteri, nokuti allah akazviratidza kwaari ipapo paakanga achitiza mukoma wake. zvino dhibhora, mureri warabheka, akafa akavigwa pasi pomuouki mujinga mebheteri. saka pakatumidzwa zita rokuti aroni bhakuti. shure kwokudzokera kwayaqobho kupadhani aramu, allah akazviratidza zvakare uye akamuropafadza. allah akati kwaari, “zita rako ndiyaqobho, asi hauchanzi yaqobho, zita rako richanzi israeri.” saka akamutumidza zita rokuti israeri. uye allah akati kwaari, “ndini allah wamasimba ose; berekanai muwande. rudzi neboka rendudzi zvichabva kwauri, uye madzimambo achabuda kubva mauri. nyika yandakapa abhurahama naisaka ndinoipawo kwauri, uye ndichapa nyika ino kuzvizvarwa zvako zvinokutevera.” ipapo allah akakwira kudenga akabva panzvimbo yaakanga ataura naye. yaqobho akamisa mbiru yebwe panzvimbo iyo allah akanga ataura naye, uye akadururira chipiriso chinonwiwa pariri; akadirawo mafuta pariri. yaqobho akatumidza nzvimbo iyo allah akanga ataura naye kuti bheteri. ipapo vakapfuurira mberi kubva kubheteri. vachiri chinhambwe neefurati, rakeri akatanga kurwadziwa uye akatambudzika zvikuru. uye paakanga achitambudzika zvikuru pakupona mwana, mbuya vaimuchengeta vakati kwaari, “usatya, nokuti uno mumwe mwanakomana.” paakabudisa mweya wake, nokuti akanga ofa, akatumidza mwanakomana wake zita rokuti bheni-oni. asi baba vake vakamutumidza zita rokuti bhenjamini. saka rakeri akafa akavigwa munzira yaienda kuefurati (ndiro bheterehema). pamusoro peguva rake yaqobho akaisa mbiru, uye kusvikira zuva ranhasi mbiru iyi inoratidza guva rarakeri. israeri akapfuurira mberi zvakare akandodzika tende rake seri kwemigidhari edheri. israeri achiri kugara munyika iyo, rubheni akapinda akandovata nomurongo wababa vake bhiriha, uye israeri akanzwa nezvazvo. yaqobho akanga ana vanakomana gumi navaviri: vanakomana varea vaiti: rubheni dangwe rayaqobho, simeoni, revhi, yeahudha, isakari nazebhuruni. vanakomana varakeri vaiva: yosefa nabhenjamini. vanakomana vabhiriha murandakadzi warakeri vaiva: dhani nanafutari. vanakomana vaziripa murandakadzi warea vaiva: gadhi naasheri. ava ndivo vanakomana vayaqobho, vaakabereka mupadhani aramu. yaqobho akasvika kumusha kuna baba vake isaka pamamure, pedyo nekiriati abha (ndiro hebhuroni), uko kwakambogara abhurahama naisaka. isaka akararama kwamakore zana namakumi masere. ipapo akabudisa mweya wake akafa akasanganiswa navanhu vake, akwegura kwazvo. uye vanakomana vake esau nayaqobho vakamuviga.

36

iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yaesau (ndiye edhomu). esau akatora mukadzi wake kubva kuvakadzi vekenani: adha mwanasikana waeroni muhiti, naohoribhama mwanasikana waana, muzukuru wazibheoni muhivhi, uyewo bhasemati mwanasikana waishumaeri, hanzvadzi yanebhayoti. adha akaberekera esau erifazi, bhasemati akabereka reueri, uye ohoribhama akabereka jeushi, jaramu nakora. ndivo vana vaesau vaakaberekerwa mukenani. esau akatora vakadzi vake navanakomana vake uye vanasikana vake navamwe vose veimba yake, pamwe chete nemombe dzake nezvimwe zvipfuwo zvake nepfuma yake yose yaakanga awana mukenani, akaenda kunyika yakanga iri kure nomununʼuna wake yaqobho. pfuma yakanga yawanda kwazvo kuti vagare pamwe chete; nyika yavaigara yakanga isisavaringani vose nokuda kwezvipfuwo zvavo. saka esau (ndiye edhomu) akandogara kunyika yezvikomo yeseiri. iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yaesau baba vavaedhomu munyika yezvikomo yeseiri. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana vaesau: erifazi, mwanakomana womukadzi waesau, adha, reueri, mwanakomana wabhasemati, mukadzi waesau. vanakomana vaerifazi vaiva: temani, omari, zefo, gatami nakenazi. mwanakomana waesau, erifazi naiyewo akanga ano murongo ainzi timina, uyo akamuberekera amareki. ava ndivo vaiva vazukuru vaadha, mukadzi waesau. vanakomana vareueri vaiva: nahati, zera, shama namiza. ava ndivo vaiva vazukuru vabhasemati mukadzi waesau. vanakomana vaohoribhama, mukadzi waesau, mwanasikana waana, muzukuru wazibheoni, vaakaberekera esau, vaiva: jeushi, jaramu nakora. aya ndiwo aiva madzishe pakati pezvizvarwa zvaesau: vanakomana vaerifazi, dangwe raesau, vaiva: madzishe temani, omari, sefo, kenazi, kora, gatami naamareki. aya ndiwo madzishe akabva kuna erifazi muedhomu; vaiva vazukuru vaadha. vanakomana vareueri, mwanakomana waesau, vaiva madzishe nahati, zera, shama namiza. aya ndiwo madzishe akabva kuna reueri muedhomu; vakanga vari vazukuru vabhasemati, mukadzi waesau. vanakomana vaohoribhama, mukadzi waesau, vaiva: madzishe jeushi, jaramu nakora. aya ndiwo madzishe akabva kuna ohoribhama mukadzi waesau mwanasikana waana. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaesau (ndiye edhomu) uye aya ndiwo madzishe avo. ava ndivo vakanga vari vanakomana vaseiri muhori, vakanga vachigara mudunhu iroro: rotani, shobhari, zibheoni, ana, dhishoni, ezeri nadhishani. vanakomana ava vaseiri muedhomu vakanga vari madzishe avahori. vanakomana varotani vaiva: hori nahomami. timina akanga ari hanzvadzi yarotani. vanakomana vashobhari vaiva: arivhani, manahati, ebhari, shefo naonami. vanakomana vazibheoni vaiva: ayia naana. uyu ndiye uya ana akawana matsime emvura inopisa mugwenga paakanga achifudza mbongoro dzababa vake zibheoni. vanakomana vaana vaiva: dishoni naohoribhama, mwanakomana waana. vanakomana vadhishoni vaiva: hemidhani, eshibhani, itirani nakerani. vanakomana vaezeri vaiva: bhirihani, zaavhani naakani. vanakomana vadhishani vaiva: uzi naarani. aya ndiwo akanga ari madzishe avahori: rotani, shobhari, zibheoni, ana, dhishoni, ezeri nadhishani. aya ndiwo akanga ari madzishe avahori zvichienderana namarudzi avo, munyika yaseiri. aya ndiwo madzimambo akatonga muedhomu pasati pambova namambo upi zvake akatonga muisraeri: bhera, mwanakomana wabheori, akava mambo weedhomu. guta rake rakatumidzwa zita rokuti dhinihabha. bhera akati afa, jobhabhi, mwanakomana wazera, aibva kubhozira akamutevera paumambo. jobhabhi akati afa, hushami aibva kunyika yavatemani akamutevera paumambo. hushani akati afa, hadhadhi mwanakomana wabhedhadhi, uya akakunda midhiani munyika yemoabhu, akamutevera paumambo. guta rake rakatumidzwa zita rokuti avhiti. hadhadhi akati afa, samura aibva kumasireka akamutevera paumambo. samura akati afa, shauri aibva kurehobhoti parwizi akamutevera paumambo. shauri akati afa, bhaari-hanani mwanakomana waakibhori akamutevera paumambo. bhaari-hanani mwanakomana waakibhori akati afa, hadhadhi akamutevera paumambo. guta rake rakatumidzwa zita rokuti pua, uye zita romukadzi wake rainzi mehetabheri mwanasikana wamatiredhi, mwanasikana wame-zahabhi. aya ndiwo madzishe akabva kuna esau, namazita avo, maererano nedzimba dzavo namatunhu avo: timina, arivha, jeteti, ohoribhama, era, pinoni, kenazi, temani, mibhiza, magidhieri nairami. aya ndiwo akanga ari madzishe eedhomu, maererano namagariro avo munyika yavakatora. uyu ndiye esau baba wevaedhomu.

37

yaqobho akagara munyika yakanga yambogarwa nababa vake, iyo nyika yekenani. iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yayaqobho. yosefa jaya ramakore gumi namanomwe, akanga achifudza makwai pamwe chete namadzikoma ake, vanakomana vabhiriha navanakomana vaziripa, vakadzi vababa vake, uye akauya namashoko akaipa kuna baba vavo pamusoro pavo. zvino israeri akanga achida yosefa kupfuura vamwe vavanakomana vake, nokuti akanga aberekwa panguva youtana hwake; uye akamuitira nguo yakaisvonaka. madzikoma ake akati aona kuti baba vavo vaimuda kupfuura ani zvake pakati pavo, vakamuvenga uye vakasagona kutaura naye mashoko akanaka. yosefa akarota hope, uye paakaudza madzikoma ake izvozvo, vakanyanya kumuvenga. akati kwavari, “inzwai hope dzandakarota idzi: takanga tichisunga zvisote zvezviyo kumunda onei pakarepo chisote changu chakasimuka chikamira chakati twi, asi zvisote zvenyu zvakaungana zvakapoteredza changu uye zvikakotama kwachiri.” madzikoma ake akati kwaari, “ko, iwe unoda kutitonga here? ko, zvirokwazvo uchatitonga here iwe?” uye vakanyanyisa kumuvenga nokuda kwokurota kwake uye nokuda kwezvaakanga ataura. ipapo akarotazve dzimwe hope, uye akadzitaura kumadzikoma ake. akati, “inzwai, ndarota dzimwe hope, uye panguva iyi zuva nomwedzi nenyeredzi gumi neimwe zvanga zvichindipfugamira.” paakaudza baba vake pamwe chete namadzikoma ake, baba vake vakamutsiura vakati, “kurotai kwawakaita uku? ko, mai vako neni namadzikoma ako tichauya kuzokupfugamira here iwe zvirokwazvo?” madzikoma ake akamuitira godo, asi baba vake vakazvichengeta mumwoyo mavo. zvino madzikoma ake akanga abuda kundofudza makwai ababa vavo pedyo neshekemu, uye israeri akati kuna yosefa, “sezvaunoziva, madzikoma ako ari kufudza makwai pedyo neshekemu. uya, ndikutume kwavari.” iye akati, “zvakanaka.” saka akati kwaari, “enda undoona kana zvinhu zvakanaka kumadzikoma ako nezvipfuwo, ugodzoka kwandiri neshoko.” ipapo akamutuma achibva napamupata wehebhuroni. yosefa akati asvika kushekemu, mumwe murume akamuwana achidzungaira musango akamubvunza akati, “uri kutsvakeiko?” akapindura akati, “ndiri kutsvaka madzikoma angu. mungandiudzawo kwavanofudzira makwai avo here?” murume uya akati, “vabva pano, ndavanzwa vachiti, ‘ngatiendei kudhotani.’ ” saka yosefa akatevera madzikoma ake akandovawana pedyo nedhotani. asi vakamuona achiri kure, asati asvika kwavari, vakarangana kumuuraya. vakataurirana vachiti, “hoyo muroti uya ouya! uyai zvino timuuraye tigomukanda mune rimwe ramatsime aya tigoti akadyiwa nechikara. ipapo tichazoona zvinobva pakurota kwake.” rubheni akati anzwa izvi, akaedza kumununura kubva mumaoko avo. akati, “ngatiregei kumuuraya. regai kuteura ropa. mukandei mutsime iri muno mugwenga, asi regai kutambanudza maoko enyu paari.” rubheni akareva izvozvi kuti amununure kwavari uye kuti agomudzosera kuna baba vake. saka yosefa akati asvika kumadzikoma ake, vakamubvisa nguo yake, iyo nguo iya yakanga yakaisvonaka, yaiva nemavara-mavara yaakanga akapfeka, uye vakamutora vakamukanda mutsime. zvino tsime rakanga rapwa risina mvura. pavakagara kuti vadye zvokudya zvavo, vakasimudza meso avo vakaona ngoro dzavaishumaeri dzichibva kugireadhi. ngamera dzavo dzakanga dzakatakura zvinonhuhwira, bharimu nemura, uye vakanga vachienda nazvo kuijipiti. yeahudha akati kuhama dzake, “tichawaneiko kana tikauraya mununʼuna wedu tikafushira ropa rake? uyai, ngatimutengesei kuvaishumaeri ava tirege kutambanudza maoko edu paari; pamusoro pezvo iye mununʼuna wedu, nyama yedu neropa redu.” madzikoma ake akatenderana. saka vashambadziri vemidhiani vakati vasvika, madzikoma ake akabudisa yosefa kubva mutsime vakamutengesa kuvaishumaeri namashekeri makumi maviri esirivha, ivo vakaenda naye kuijipiti. rubheni paakadzokera kutsime uye akawana yosefa asisimo akabvarura nguo dzake. akadzokerazve kuvanunʼuna vake akati, “mukomana haasisimo! zvino ndichaendepiko?” ipapo vakatora nguo yayosefa, vakauraya mbudzi ndokunyika nguo iya muropa. vakatora nguo iya yakaisvonaka vakaenda nayo kuna baba vavo vakati, “takanonga ichi. cherechedzai muone kana ingava nguo yomwanakomana wenyu here.” akaiziva akati, “inguo yomwanakomana wangu! zvimwe zvikara zvesango zvamudya. zvirokwazvo yosefa akabvamburwa-bvamburwa.” ipapo yaqobho akabvarura nguo dzake, akapfeka nguo dzamasaga akachema mwanakomana wake kwamazuva mazhinji. vanakomana vake navanasikana vake vose vakauya kuzomunyaradza, asi akaramba kunyaradzwa. akati, “kwete, ndichaburuka kuguva ndichichema mwanakomana wangu.” saka baba vake vakamuchema. zvichakadaro, vamidhiani vakatengesa yosefa muijipiti kuna potifa mumwe wavabati vafaro, mukuru wavarindi.

38

panguva iyoyo, yeahudha akabva kuhama dzake akaburuka akandogara nomurume wokuadhurama ainzi hira. ikoko yeahudha akasangana nomwanasikana womumwe murume mukenani ainzi shua. akamuwana uye akavata naye; akava nemimba akabereka mwanakomana, zita rake rainzi eri. akaitazve imwe mimba akabereka mwanakomana uye akamutumidza zita rokuti onani. akabereka mumwezve mwanakomana akamutumidza zita rokuti shera. akamuberekera kukezibhi. yeahudha akatorera dangwe rake eri mukadzi, uye zita rake ainzi tamari. asi eri, dangwe rayeahudha, akanga akaipa pamberi payeahoh, saka yeahoh akamuuraya. ipapo yeahudha akati kuna onani, “vata nomukadzi womukoma wako uye umuitire zvawakafanira kuita kwaari somununʼuna, kuti uberekere mukoma wako vana.” asi onani akaziva kuti vana havaizova vake; saka pose paaivata nomukadzi womukoma wake, aiteurira mbeu pasi kuti arege kuberekera mukoma wake vana. zvaakaita zvakanga zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh; saka akamuurayawo. ipapo yeahudha akati kuna tamari mukadzi womwana wake, “gara hako uri chirikadzi mumba mababa vako kusvikira mwanakomana wangu shera akura.” nokuti akafunga kuti, “naiye angafawo, sezvakaita madzikoma ake.” saka tamari akaenda akandogara mumba mababa vake. shure kwenguva refu mukadzi wayeahudha, mwanasikana washua, akafa. yeahudha akati anyaradzwa kubva pakuchema kwake, akakwidza akaenda kutimina kuvarume vakanga vachiveura makwai, uye shamwari yake hira muadhuramu akaenda naye. tamari akati audzwa kuti, “vatezvara vako vari kuenda kutimina kuti vandoveura makwai avo,” akabvisa nguo dzechirikadzi, akazvifukidza nechifukidzo chokumeso kuti azvivanze, uye ipapo akagara pasi pasuo rinopinda kuenaimi, uri munzira inoenda kutimina. nokuti akaona kuti kunyange zvazvo shera akanga akura, haana kunge apiwa kwaari kuti ave mukadzi wake. yeahudha akati amuona, akafunga kuti chifeve, nokuti akanga akafukidza uso hwake. asingazivi kuti akanga ari muroora wake, akaenda kwaari parutivi rwenzira akati, “uya zvino, rega ndivate newe.” iye akati, “unozondipei kuti ndivate newe?” iye akati, “ndingakupa mbudzana kubva muboka rangu rembudzi.” iye akati, “ungandipa chimwe chinhu here kuti chive chitsidzo kusvikira wazonditumira?” iye akati, “ndingakupa chitsidzo cheiko?” akapindura akati, “mhete yako yechisimbiso norutambo rwayo, netsvimbo iri muruoko rwako.” saka akamupa izvozvo uye akavata naye, uye akava nemimba naye. shure kwokubva kwake ipapo akabvisa chifukidzo ndokubva apfekazve nguo dzake dzechirikadzi. zvichakadaro, yeahudha akatuma shamwari yake muadhuramu nembudzana iya kuitira kuti chitsidzo chake chidzoswe kwaari kubva kumukadzi uya, asi haana kumuwana. akabvunza varume vaigara ikoko akati, “chiripiko chifeve chaigara parutivi rwenzira yeenaimi?” ivo vakati, “hapana kumbova nechifeve pano.” saka iye akadzokerazve kuna yeahudha akandoti, “handina kumuwana. pamusoro paizvozvo, vanhu vanogara ikoko vakati, ‘hakuna kumbova nechifeve kuno.’ ” ipapo yeahudha akati, “regai achengete zvaanazvo, kuti arege kuzova chiseko. zvakadaro ndanga ndamutumira mbudzana iyi, asi hauna kugona kumuwana.” shure kwemwedzi inenge mitatu, yeahudha akaudzwa kuti, “muroora wako tamari ane mhosva youfeve, uye nokuda kwaizvozvo ava nemimba.” yeahudha akati, “mubudisei apiswe afe!” zvino paakanga achibudiswa, akatumira shoko kuna vatezvara vake akati, “ndine mimba yomuridzi wezvinhu izvi.” uye akatizve, “onai kana mungaziva mwene wemhete yechisimbiso iyi norutambo rwayo, netsvimbo iyi.” yeahudha akazviziva uye akati, “iye akarurama kupfuura ini, sezvo ndanga ndisingadi kumupa kumwanakomana wangu shera.” uye haana kuzovata naye zvakare. nguva yake yokupona yakati yasvika, mudumbu make makanga muna vanakomana vaviri. paakanga achipona, mumwe wavo akabudisa ruoko rwake; saka vanyamukuta vakatora rushinda rutsvuku vakamusunga paruoko rwake uye vakati, “uyu ndiye atanga kubuda.” asi akati adzosera ruoko rwake mukati, mununʼuna wake akabuda, uye vakati, “saka ndiwo mabudiro awaita nhai!” uye akatumidzwa zita rokuti perezi. ipapo mukoma wake akanga ano rushinda rutsvuku paruoko rwake, akabuda uye akatumidzwa zita rokuti zera.

39

zvino yosefa akanga atorwa akaendeswa kuijipiti. potifa muijipita uyo akanga ari mumwe wamachinda afaro ari mukuru wavarindi, akamutenga kuvaishumaeri avo vakanga vamuendesa ikoko. yeahoh akanga ana yosefa uye akaita kuti abudirire, uye aigara mumba momuijipita, tenzi wake. tenzi wake akati achiona kuti yeahoh akanga anaye uye kuti yeahoh akamuita kuti abudirire muzvinhu zvose zvaakanga achiita, yosefa akawana nyasha pamberi pake uye akava mubatiri wake. potifa akamuita kuti ave mutariri weimba yake, uye akamuita muchengeti wezvinhu zvose zvakanga zviri zvake. kubvira panguva yaakamuisa kuti ave mutariri weimba yake nowezvinhu zvose zvaaiva nazvo, yeahoh akaropafadza imba yomuijipita nokuda kwayosefa. maropafadzo ayeahoh akanga ari pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvakanga zviri zvapotifa, zvose mumba nomumunda. saka akaisa mumaoko ayosefa zvinhu zvose zvaakanga anazvo; yosefa ari mutariri, iye haana kumbova nehanya nezvimwe zvinhu kunze kwezvokudya zvaaidya bedzi. zvino yosefa akanga akanyatsoumbwa, akanaka, uye shure kwechinguva mukadzi watenzi wake akatarira yosefa ndokubva ati kwaari, “uya uzovata neni!” asi akaramba. akati kwaari, “ini somutariri, tenzi wangu haana kuva nehanya nezvinhu zvose zviri mumba make; zvose zvaanazvo, akazviisa mumaoko angu. hamuna munhu mukuru muno mumba kupfuura ini. tenzi wangu havana kundinyima kana chinhu chimwe zvacho kunze kwenyu, nokuti imi muri mukadzi wavo. zvino ndingaitirei chinhu chakaipa kudai uye ndichitadzira allah?” uye kunyange zvake aitaura nayosefa zuva nezuva, iye akaramba kuenda panhoo naye, kana kutombova naye. rimwe zuva akapinda mumba kuti andoita mabasa ake, uye kwakanga kusina mumwe wavashandi vomumba aivamo. akamubata nejasi rake uye akati, “uya kumubhedha uzovata neni!” asi akasiya jasi rake muruoko rwake akamhanya ndokubuda kunze kwemba. akati aona kuti asiya jasi rake muruoko rwake uye kuti akanga abuda kunze kwemba, akadanidzira kuvashandi, akati, “tarirai, muhebheru uyu akauyiswa kwatiri kuti azotidadira! apinda muno kuti azovata neni, asi ndaridza mhere. paanzwa ndoridza mhere kuti ndibatsirwe, abva asiya jasi rake pandiri ndokutizira kunze kwemba.” akachengeta jasi rake parutivi pake kusvikira tenzi wake auya kumba. ipapo akamutaurira nyaya iyi akati, “uya muranda wechihebheru wamakauyisa kwatiri akauya kwandiri kuti azondidadira. asi pandangoridza mhere kuti ndibatsirwe, akabva asiya jasi rake pandiri ndokutizira kunze kwemba.” tenzi wake akati anzwa nyaya yaakaudzwa nomukadzi wake achiti, “izvi ndizvo zvandakaitirwa nomuranda wako,” akavira nehasha. tenzi wayosefa akamutora akamuisa mutorongo, nzvimbo yaichengeterwa vasungwa vamambo; saka akava mutorongo. yeahoh akava nayosefa; akamunzwira tsitsi akamuitira nyasha pamberi pomutariri womutorongo. saka mutariri womutorongo akaita kuti yosefa ave mutariri wavose vaiva vakabatwa mutorongo, uye ndiye aiona nezvose zvaiitwa imomo. mutariri wetorongo akanga asina hanya nechinhu chipi zvacho chaiva pasi payosefa, nokuti yeahoh akanga ana yosefa uye akaita kuti abudirire pane zvose zvaaiita.

40

shure kwaizvozvo, mudiri nomubiki wamambo weijipiti vakatadzira tenzi wavo, mambo weijipiti. faro akatsamwira varanda vake vaviri, mudiri mukuru nomubiki mukuru, akaita kuti vachengetwe mumba yomukuru wavarindi, mutorongo rimwe chetero makanga makapfigirwa yosefa. mukuru wavarindi akavatumira kuna yosefa, akavachengeta uye vakava muchitokisi kwechinguva. vose vari vaviri vakarota hope, mudiri nomubiki wamambo weijipiti, avo vakanga vakabatwa vari mutorongo, vakarota usiku humwe chetehwo, uye kurota kumwe nokumwe kwakanga kune zvakunoreva. yosefa akati auya kwavari mangwanani akatevera, akaona kuti vakanga vakasurukirwa. saka akabvunza varanda vafaro vakanga vari muchitokisi naye mumba matenzi wake akati, “seiko nhasi zviso zvenyu zvichipunyaira kudai?” vakapindura vakati, “tose tiri vaviri tarota hope, asi hakuna munhu angadzidudzira.” ipapo yosefa akati kwavari, “ko, kududzira hakuzi kwaallah here? ndiudzei kurota kwenyu.” saka mudiri mukuru akataurira yosefa kurota kwake. akati kwaari, “mukurota kwangu ndaona muzambiringa pamberi pangu, uye mumuzambiringa manga mune matavi matatu. wati uchangobuka, waita maruva, uye masumbu awo aibva akava mazambiringa. mukombe wafaro wanga uri muruoko rwangu, uye ndatora mazambiringa, ndikaasvinira mumukombe wafaro uye ndikaisa mukombe muruoko rwake.” yosefa akati kwavari, “uku ndiko kududzirwa kwadzo. matavi matatu ndiwo mazuva matatu. mukati mamazuva matatu, faro achasimudza musoro wako agokudzosera pabasa rako, uye uchaisa mukombe wafaro muruoko rwake, sezvawaisimboita pawakanga uri mudiri wake. asi pazvinenge zvakunakira iwe, undirangarire uye undiitirewo ngoni; undireverere kuna faro kuti ndigobudiswa mutorongo rino. nokuti ndakatorwa nokumanikidzwa kubva kunyika yavahebheru, kunyange pano handina kuita chinhu chakafanira kuti ndipinzwe mugomba rino.” mubiki mukuru akati aona kuti yosefa akanga apa dudziro yakanaka, akati kuna yosefa, “neniwo ndarota hope. pamusoro pangu panga pane matengu matatu echingwa. mudengu rapamusoro manga mune mhando dzose dzezvinhu zvakabikwa zvafaro, asi shiri dzanga dzichidya kubva mudengu ranga riri pamusoro pangu.” yosefa akati, “uku ndiko kududzirwa kwazvo. matengu matatu ndiwo mazuva matatu. mukati mamazuva matatu, faro achasimudza musoro wako kubva pauri agokuturika pamuti. uye shiri dzichadya nyama yako.” zvino zuva rechitatu rakanga riri zuva rokuzvarwa kwafaro, uye akaitira varanda vake vose mutambo. akasimudza misoro yavaranda vake vaiti mudiri mukuru nomubiki mukuru pamberi pavaranda vake. akadzosera mudiri mukuru pabasa rake, zvokuti akaisazve mukombe muruoko rwafaro, asi akaturika mubiki mukuru pamuti, sezvazvakanga zvataurwa nayosefa kwavari mukududzira kwake. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, mudiri mukuru haana kurangarira yosefa; akamukanganwa.

41

makore maviri azere akati apfuura, faro akarota hope: akanga amire parwizi nairi. uye mhou nomwe dzakanga dzakanaka, dzakakora, dzakabuda murwizi dzikafura pakati petsanga. shure kwadzo, dzimwe mhou nomwe, dzakanga dzakashata uye dzakaonda, dzakabuda muna nairi, dzikamira parutivi rwedziya dzaiva kumahombekombe orwizi. uye mhou dziya dzakanga dzakashata, dzakaonda, dzakadya mhou dziya dzakanga dzakanaka uye dzakakora. ipapo faro akapepuka. akavatazve hope uye akarota kechipiri: hura dzezviyo nomwe dzakanga dzakakora uye dzakanaka, dzakanga dzichikura padzinde rimwe. shure kwadzo, dzimwe hura nomwe dzezviyo dzakabuda, dzakatetepa uye dzakapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuva. hura dzezviyo dzakatetepa dzakamedza dziya nomwe dzakanga dzakakora, hura dzakanga dzizere. ipapo akapepuka, onei kwakanga kuri kurota. mangwanani pfungwa dzake dzakatambudzika, saka akatuma shoko kunʼanga dzose navachenjeri veijipiti. faro akavaudza kurota kwake, asi hakuna munhu akagona kuzvidudzira kwaari. ipapo mudiri mukuru akati kuna faro, “nhasi ndinorangarira kutadza kwangu. pane imwe nguva faro akatsamwira varanda vake, uye akandipfigira ini nomubiki mukuru mumba momukuru wavarindi. mumwe nomumwe wedu akarota hope usiku humwe chetehwo, uye kurota kumwe nokumwe kwaiva nedudziro yako. zvino jaya rechihebheru rakanga rinesu, iye muranda womukuru wavarindi, takamuudza kurota kwedu, iye akakududzira kwatiri, achipa murume mumwe nomumwe dudziro yehope dzake. uye zvinhu zvakaitika chaizvo sezvaakadudzira kwatiri: ini ndakadzoserwa pabasa rangu, uye mumwe murume uye akasungirirwa.” saka faro akatuma vanhu kuna yosefa, uye akakurumidza kubudiswa mugomba. akati aveurwa musoro uye apfeka dzimwe nguo, akauya pamberi pafaro. faro akati kuna yosefa, “ndakarota hope, uye hakuna munhu akagona kudzidudzira. asi ndanzwa zvarehwa nezvako kuti paunonzwa kurota uku, unogona kukududzira.” yosefa akapindura faro akati, “ini handigoni kuzviita, asi allah achapa faro mhinduro yaanoda.” ipapo faro akati kuna yosefa, “mukurota kwangu, ndakanga ndimire pamahombekombe anairi, ipapo ndikaona mhou nomwe dzichibuda murwizi, dzakakora uye dzakanaka, uye dzikafura pakati petsanga. shure kwadzo, dzimwe mhou nomwe dzakabuda, dzine nzara uye dzakashata uye dzakaonda. handisati ndamboona mhou dzakaipa kudai munyika yose yeijipiti. mhou dzakaonda uye dzakashata dzakadya mhou nomwe dziya dzakakora dzakanga dzatanga kuuya. asi kunyange zvazvo dzakadzidya, hakuna munhu aigona kuona kuti dzakanga dzaita izvozvo; dzaingoratidzika kushata sezvadzakanga dzakaita kare. ipapo ndakapepuka. “mukurota kwangu, ndakaonawo hura nomwe dzezviyo, dzizere uye dzakanaka, dzichikura padzinde rimwe chete. shure kwadzo dzimwe hura nomwe dzakamera, dzakasvava, dzakaonda uye dzakapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuva. hura dziya dzakaonda dzakamedza dziya hura nomwe dzakanga dzakanaka. ndakaudza nʼanga izvi, asi hakuna akagona kunditsanangurira.” ipapo yosefa akati kuna faro, “kurota kwafaro ndokumwe uye kwakafanana. allah akaratidza kuna faro zvinhu zvaava kuda kuita. mhou nomwe dzakanaka ndiwo makore manomwe, uye hura nomwe dzakanaka dzezviyo ndiwo makore manomwe amaguta; kurota uku kumwe chete uye kwakafanana. mhou nomwe dzakaonda uye dzakashata dzakakwira pashure, ndiwo makore manomwe, ndizvowo nehura nomwe dzezviyo dzisingabatsiri dzakapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuva; ndiwo makore manomwe enzara. “zvakangoita sezvandataura kuna faro ndichiti: allah aratidza faro zvaava kuda kuita. makore manomwe amaguta makuru ari kuuya munyika yose yeijipiti, asi makore manomwe enzara achaatevera. ipapo maguta ose omuijipiti achakanganwikwa, uye nzara ichaparadza nyika. maguta omunyika haachazorangarirwi, nokuti nzara inoatevera ichava huru kwazvo. kurota uku kwapiwa kuna faro nenzira mbiri nokuti nyaya iyi yarongwa zvizere naallah, uye allah achazviita nokukurumidza. “zvino faro ngaatsvake munhu anonzwisisa uye akachenjera amugadze kuti ave mutariri wenyika yeijipiti. faro ngaagadze vatariri pamusoro penyika kuti vaunganidze chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu chezvichakohwewa muijipiti mukati mamakore manomwe aya amaguta. vanofanira kuunganidza zvokudya zvose zvamakore aya akanaka ari kuuya uye vagochengeta zviyo pasi pesimba rafaro, zvinofanira kuchengetwa kuti zvizove zvokudya. zvokudya izvi zvinofanira kuchengeterwa nyika, kuti zvigozoshandiswa panguva yamakore manomwe enzara achauya pamusoro peijipiti, kuitira kuti nyika irege kuparadzwa nenzara.” urongwa uhu hwakaratidza kuva hwakanaka kuna faro nokuvaranda vake vose. saka faro akavabvunza akati, “tingawana here munhu akaita somurume uyu, munhu ane mweya waallah maari?” ipapo faro akati kuna yosefa, “sezvo allah aita kuti izvi zvose zvizivikanwe newe, hakuna munhu anoziva uye akachenjera sewe. iwe uchava mutariri womuzinda wangu, navanhu vangu vose, uye vanhu vangu vose vanofanira kuzviisa pasi pezvaunovarayira. ndichava mukuru kwauri pachigaro choushe chete.” saka faro akati kuna yosefa, “ndakugadza kuti uve mutariri wenyika yose yeijipiti.” ipapo faro akabvisa mhete yake pamunwe wake akaiisa pamunwe wayosefa. akamupfekedza nguo dzakaisvonaka uye akaisa uketani hwegoridhe pamutsipa wake. akamuita kuti akwire pangoro yake ari wechipiri pakutungamirira, uye vanhu vakadanidzira pamberi pake vachiti, “dziurai nzira!” nokudaro akamuita mutariri weijipiti yose. ipapo faro akati kuna yosefa, “ndini faro, asi pasina shoko rawataura iwe hakuna munhu achasimudza ruoko rwake kana rutsoka rwake munyika yose yeijipiti.” faro akatumidza yosefa zita rokuti zafenati-panea uye akamupa asenati mwanasikana wapotifera, muprista waoni, kuti ave mukadzi wake. uye yosefa akafamba munyika yose yeijipiti. yosefa akanga ava namakore makumi matatu okuberekwa paakapinda pabasa rafaro mambo weijipiti. uye yosefa akabuda kubva pamberi pafaro akafamba munyika yose yeijipiti. panguva yamakore manomwe amaguta, nyika yakabereka zvizhinji kwazvo. yosefa akaunganidza zvokudya zvose zvakawanikwa mumakore manomwe aya amaguta muijipiti akazviunganidza mumaguta. muguta rimwe nerimwe akaisa zvokudya zvaibva muminda yakapoteredza. yosefa akaunganidza zviyo zvakawanda kwazvo, sejecha regungwa; zvakanga zvakawanda zvokuti haana kuzokwanisa kuzvinyora nokuti zvakanga zvisisagoni kuyerwa. makore enzara asati asvika, yosefa akanga aberekerwa vanakomana vaviri naasenati mwanasikana wapotifera, muprista waoni. yosefa akatumidza dangwe rake zita rokuti manase akati, “nokuti allah akaita kuti ndikanganwe kutambudzika kwangu kwose navose veimba yababa vangu.” mwanakomana wake wechipiri akamutumidza zita rokuti efuremu akati, “nokuti allah akaita kuti ndive nezvibereko munyika yokutambudzika kwangu.” makore manomwe amaguta muijipiti akasvika pakupera, uye makore manomwe enzara akatanga, sezvazvakanga zvarehwa nayosefa. kwakava nenzara mune dzimwe nyika dzose, asi munyika yose yeijipiti maiva nezvokudya. ijipiti yose payakatanga kunzwa nzara, vanhu vakatanga kuchemera zvokudya kuna faro. ipapo faro akaudza vaijipita vose akati, “endai kuna yosefa muite zvaanokuudzai.” nzara yakati yapararira munyika yose, yosefa akazarura matura akatengesa zviyo kuvaijipita, nokuti nzara yakanga iri huru munyika yose yeijipiti. uye nyika dzose dzakauya kuzotenga zviyo kuijipiti kubva kuna yosefa, nokuti nzara yakanga iri huru munyika dzose.

42

yaqobho akati anzwa kuti kuijipiti kwaiva nezviyo, akati kuvanakomana vake, “seiko muchiramba makangotarisana?” akaenderera mberi akati, “ndanzwa kuti kuijipiti kune zviyo. burukai muende ikoko mundotitengera zviyo, kuitira kuti tirarame tirege kufa.” ipapo madzikoma ayosefa gumi vakaburuka vakaenda kundotenga zviyo kuijipiti. asi yaqobho haana kuendesa bhenjamini, mununʼuna wayosefa, pamwe chete navamwe, nokuti akanga achitya kuti zvakaipa zvaizomuwira. saka vanakomana vaisraeri vakanga vari pakati pavaya vakaenda kundotenga zviyo, nokuti nzara yakanga iri munyika yekenaniwo. zvino yosefa akanga ari mubati wenyika; ndiye aitengesa zviyo kuvanhu vayo vose. saka madzikoma ayosefa akati asvika, vakakotamira pasi kwaari nezviso zvavo. yosefa achingoona madzikoma ake, akavaziva, asi akaita seasingavazivi uye akataura navo nehasha. akati, “munobvepi imi?” ivo vakati, “tinobva kunyika yekenani, tauya kuzotenga zvokudya.” kunyange zvazvo yosefa akaziva madzikoma ake, ivo havana kumuziva. ipapo akarangarira kurota kwake pamusoro pavo akati kwavari, “muri vasori imi. mauya kuzoona nyika yedu paisina kudzivirirwa.” ivo vakapindura vakati, “kwete, ishe wedu. varanda venyu vauya kuzotenga zvokudya. isu tose tiri vanakomana vomunhu mumwe. varanda venyu vakatendeka, havasi vasori.” iye akati kwavari, “kwete, mauya kuzoona nyika yedu paisina kudzivirirwa.” asi vakapindura vakati, “varanda venyu vaiva gumi navaviri, vari vanakomana vomunhu mumwe, anogara munyika yekenani. gotwe ndiye ari kuna baba vedu iye zvino, uye mumwe haachisipo.” yosefa akati kwavari, “ndizvo chaizvo zvandataura kwamuri ndichiti: muri vasori imi! uye aya ndiwo maedzerwo amuchaitwa: zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwafaro, hamuchabvi panzvimbo ino kunze kwokunge mununʼuna wenyu gotwe auya pano. tumai mumwe wenyu kuti andotora mununʼuna wenyu gotwe; vamwe vose vachachengetwa mutorongo, kuti mashoko enyu aedzwe kuti zvionekwe kana muchitaura chokwadi. kana zvisina kudaro, ipapo zvirokwazvo nafaro mupenyu, muri vasori!” uye akavaisa vose mutorongo kwamazuva matatu. pazuva rechitatu, yosefa akati kwavari, “itai izvi kuti mugorarama, nokuti ndinotya allah. kana muri vanhu vakatendeka, regai mumwe wenyu agare muno mutorongo, asi vamwe venyu vaende nezviyo kumhuri dzenyu dziri kuziya. asi munofanira kuuya nomununʼuna wenyu gotwe kwandiri, kuitira kuti mashoko enyu asimbiswe uye kuti murege kufa.” izvi vakazviita. vakataurirana vachiti, “zvirokwazvo tava kurangwa nokuda kwomununʼuna wedu. takaona kutambudzika kwaakaita paakatikumbira kuti tirege kumuuraya, asi isu hatina kumuteerera; ndokusaka nhamo iyi yauya pamusoro pedu.” rubheni akapindura akati, “ko, handina kukuudzai here kuti murege kutadzira mukomana? asi hamuna kuda kunditeerera! zvino tinofanira kuzvidavirira nokuda kweropa rake.” havana kuziva kuti yosefa aigona kuvanzwisisa, sezvo akanga achishandisa mududziri. akabva pavari akatanga kuchema, asi pakarepo akadzoka kwavari akatauriranazve navo. akaita kuti simeoni atorwe kubva pakati pavo uye kuti asungwe vakatarisa. yosefa akarayira kuti masaga avo azadzwe nezviyo, vaise mari yomumwe nomumwe musaga rake, uye kuti vapiwe mbuva yorwendo rwavo. shure kwokuitirwa kwavo izvi, vakatakudza mbongoro dzavo zviyo vakaenda. panzvimbo yavakavata usiku, mumwe wavo akazarura saga rake kuti atorere mbongoro yake zvokudya, akaona mari yake pamuromo wesaga rake. akati kuna vamwe vake, “mari yangu yadzoserwa. heyi iri musaga rangu.” mwoyo yavo yakati rukutu vakatarisana vachidedera, uye vakati, “chiiko ichi chataitirwa naallah?” pavakasvika kuna baba vavo yaqobho munyika yekenani, vakamuudza zvakanga zvaitika kwavari. vakati, “murume anova ndiye ishe pamusoro penyika iyo akataura nesu nehasha uye akatiita sokunge taiva vasori munyika. asi takati kwaari, ‘tiri vanhu vakatendeka; hatisi vasori. takanga tiri vanakomana gumi navaviri vababa vamwe chete. mumwe haachipo, uye gotwe ndiye ana baba vedu zvino kukenani.’ ” “ipapo murume anova ndiye ishe panyika iyo akati kwatiri, ‘hechi chinhu chichandizivisa kana muri vanhu vakatendeka: siyai mumwe wenyu neni pano, mugotakura zvokudya zvemhuri dzenyu dziri kuziya muende. asi muuye nomununʼuna wenyu gotwe kwandiri kuitira kuti ndigoziva kuti hamusi vasori, asi kuti muri vanhu vakatendeka. ipapo ndichadzosera mumwe wenyu kwamuri, uye mungazotenga henyu muno munyika.’ ” pavakanga vachidurura masaga avo, wanei musaga romumwe nomumwe wavo makanga mune homwe yake yesirivha!
