ivo nababa vavo pavakaona mari muhomwe, vakatya. baba vavo yaqobho vakati, “mandipedzera vana vangu. yosefa haasisipo nasimeoni haasisipo, uye zvino munoda kutora bhenjamini. zvinhu zvose zviri kundimukira!” ipapo rubheni akati kuna baba vake, “mungauraya henyu vanakomana vangu vaviri ava kana ndisina kudzoka naye kwamuri. muisei mumaoko angu, ndichadzoka naye.” asi yaqobho akati, “mwanakomana wangu haangaburuki nemi kuti aende ikoko; mukoma wake akafa uye ndiye chete asara. kana zvakaipa zvikamuwira parwendo rwamuri kufamba, muchaburutsira musoro wangu wachena muguva mukusuwa.”

43

zvino nzara yakanga ichakanyanya munyika. saka vakati vadya zviyo zvose zvavakanga vabva nazvo kuijipiti, baba vavo vakati kwavari, “dzokerai mundotitengera zvimwe zvokudya.” asi yeahudha akati kwavari, “murume uya akatiyambira kwazvo akati, ‘hamungazooni chiso changuzve kunze kwokunge mununʼuna wenyu auya nemi.’ kana mukaendesa mununʼuna wedu nesu, tichaenda kundokutengerai zvokudya. asi kana mukasamuendesa, hatingatongoendi, nokuti murume uya akati, ‘hamungazooni chiso changuzve kunze kwokunge mununʼuna wenyu auya nemi.’ ” israeri akabvunza akati, “seiko makauyisa dambudziko iri pamusoro pangu zvamakaudza murume uyu kuti muno mumwe mununʼuna?” ivo vakapindura vakati, “murume uyu akatibvunzisisa kwazvo nezvedu uye nezvemhuri yedu. akati, ‘baba venyu vachiri vapenyu here? muno mumwe mununʼuna here?’ takangopindura mubvunzo wake zvakanaka. ko, taiziva sei kuti aizoti, ‘uyai nomununʼuna wenyu kuno?’ ” ipapo yeahudha akati kuna israeri baba vake, “tumai mukomana pamwe chete neni tibve taenda izvozvi, kuitira kuti isu nemi navana vedu tirarame uye tirege kufa. ini pachangu ndichava rubatso rwokuchengetedzeka kwake; musiyei muruoko rwangu pachangu. kana ndikasadzoka naye kwamuri ndikamumisa pamberi penyu, ini ndichava nemhosva pamberi penyu muupenyu hwangu hwose. izvozvi dai tisina kunonoka, tingadai takatoenda uye takatodzoka kaviri kwose.” ipapo baba vavo israeri vakati kwavari, “kana zvakadaro, itai izvi zvino: isai zvimwe zvibereko zvemichero yenyika ino zvakaisvonaka mumasaga enyu uye mugoenda nazvo sezvipo kumurume uyo, bharimu shoma shoma, nouchi hushoma shoma, zvinonhuhwira nemura, nzungu dzomupistakio namaarimondi. mutakure mari yakapetwa kaviri, nokuti munofanira kudzorera mari yakanga yadzoserwa pamiromo yamasaga enyu. zvichida kwaiva kukanganisa. toraiwo mununʼuna wenyu mudzokere izvozvi kumunhu uyo. uye allah wamasimba ose ngaakunzwirei ngoni pamberi pomunhu uyo kuitira kuti asunungure mumwe mununʼuna wenyu nabhenjamini uye vagodzokazve nemi. kana ndirini, kana ndafirwa navana vangu, ndafirwa hangu.” saka varume vakatora zvipo nemari yakapetwa kaviri, nabhenjaminiwo. vakakurumidza kuburuka kuijipiti vakandozviratidza kuna yosefa. yosefa akati achiona bhenjamini anavo, akati kuvatariri veimba yake, “torai varume ava muende navo kumba kwangu, muuraye chipfuwo mugogadzira zvokudya; vanofanira kudya neni masikati ano.” varume vakaita sezvavakanga vaudzwa nayosefa vakabva vatora varume vaya vakaenda navo kumba kwayosefa. zvino varume vaya vakatya pavakatorwa vakaendwa navo kumba kwake. vakafunga vakati, “tauyiswa muno nokuda kwemari iya yakadzoserwa mumasaga edu panguva yokutanga. anoda kutirwisa, agotikunda, agotisunga senhapwa uye agotora mbongoro dzedu.” saka vakaenda kumutariri wayosefa vakandotaura naye pamukova wokupinda mumba make. vakati kwaari, “tapota ishe, takauya kuno panguva yokutanga kuti tizotenga zvokudya. asi patakamira pane imwe nzvimbo usiku, takazarura masaga edu uye mumwe nomumwe wedu akawana mari yake iri pamuromo wesaga, iyo mari yacho yose zvayo. saka tadzoka nayo. tauyawo neimwe mari yokuti tizotenga zvokudya. hatizivi akaisa mari yedu mumasaga edu.” iye akati, “zvakanakai. musatya henyu allah wenyu, iye allah wababa venyu, ndiye akakupai pfuma mumasaga enyu, ini ndakagamuchira mari yenyu.” ipapo akabudisa simeoni akamuuyisa kwavari. mutariri uya akauyisa varume vaya mumba mayosefa, akavapa mvura kuti vashambe tsoka dzavo uye akapa mbongoro dzavo zvokudya. vakagadzira zvipo zvokupa yosefa pakusvika kwake masikati, nokuti vakanga vanzwa kuti vachandodya ikoko. yosefa akati auya kumba, ivo vakamupa zvipo zvavakanga vapinda nazvo mumba, uye vakakotamira pasi kwaari. akavabvunza mufaro, uye akati, “vakadii baba venyu, mutana, vamakandiudza nezvavo? vachiri vapenyu here?” vakapindura vakati, “muranda wenyu, ivo baba vedu vachiri vapenyu uye vanofara.” uye vakakotama pasi kuti vamuremekedze. paakatarisa-tarisa akaona mununʼuna wake bhenjamini, mwanakomana wamai vake chaiye, akabvunza akati, “uyu ndiye mununʼuna wenyu gotwe, wamakandiudza nezvake here?” uye akati, “allah akuitire nyasha, mwanakomana wangu.” adumbirwa pakuona kwake mununʼuna wake, yosefa akakurumidza kubuda uye akatsvaka nzvimbo paangachema ari. akapinda muimba yake yomukati akandochema ari imomo. shure kwokushamba uso hwake, akabuda uye akazvidzora, akati “pakurai zvokudya.” vakamupakurira ari oga, madzikoma vari voga, uye vaijipita vaidya naye vari voga, nokuti vaijipita vakanga vasingagoni kudya pamwe chete navahebheru, nokuti zvinonyangadza kuvaijipita. varume vakanga vakagariswa pamberi pake zvaienderana namazera avo, kubva kudangwe kusvikira kugotwe; uye vakatarisana zvikavakatyamadza. pavakagoverwa migove kubva patafura yayosefa, mugove wabhenjamini wakanga wakawanda kashanu kupinda ani zvake pakati pavo. saka vakadya nokunwa naye vakasununguka.

44

zvino yosefa akarayira mutariri weimba yake achiti, “zadza masaga avarume ava nezvokudya zvakawanda zvavanokwanisa kutakura, uye uise mari yomumwe nomumwe mumuromo wesaga. ipapo ugoisa mukombe wangu, iwo wesirivha, mumuromo wesaga remuduku kuna vose, pamwe chete nemari yezviyo zvake.” uye akaita sezvaakanga audzwa nayosefa. kwakati kuchiedza, varume vaya vakaendeswa panzira yavo pamwe chete nembongoro dzavo. vakanga vasati vava kure neguta yosefa paakati kumutariri wake, “tevera varume vaya izvozvi, uye paunovabata, uti kwavari, ‘seiko matsiva chakanaka nechakaipa? ko, uyu hauzi mukombe unonwira tenzi wangu uye wavanoshandisa pakuvuka here? chinhu chamaita ichi chakaipa.’ ” paakavabata, akadzokorora mashoko aya kwavari. asi ivo vakati kwaari, “seiko ishe wangu achitaura zvinhu zvakadai? ngazvive kure navaranda venyu kuti vaite chinhu chakadaro! takadzoka kwamuri kubva kunyika yekenani kunyange nemari yatakawana mumiromo yamasaga edu. saka taizobireiko sirivha kana goridhe mumba matenzi wenyu? kana mumwe upi zvake wavaranda venyu akawanikwa anayo, ngaafe; uye isu tose tichava nhapwa dzashe wangu.” iye akati, “zvakanaka chaizvo, ngazvive sezvamataura. ani naani anowanikwa anayo achava nhapwa yangu; vamwe mose hamungapiwi mhosva.” mumwe nomumwe wavo akakurumidza kuburutsa saga rake pasi uye akarizarura. ipapo mutariri akatanga kutsvaka, akatanga kumukuru akapedzisira kumuduku wavose. uye mukombe wakawanikwa musaga rabhenjamini. ipapo, vakabvarura nguo dzavo. ipapo vakatakudza mbongoro dzavo uye vakadzokera kuguta. yosefa akanga achiri mumba pakapinda yeahudha navanunʼuna vake, uye vakazviwisira pasi pamberi pake. yosefa akati kwavari, “chiiko ichi chamaita? hamuzivi kuti munhu akaita seni anogona kuziva zvinhu nokuvuka here?” yeahudha akapindura akati, “chiiko chatingataura kuna ishe wangu? tingataureiko? tingazvipembedza seiko? allah afukura mhosva yavaranda venyu. zvino tava nhapwa dzashe wedu, isu pachedu naiye awanikwa ano mukombe.” asi yosefa akati, “ngazvive kure neni kuti ndiite chinhu chakadai! munhu awanikwa ano mukombe wangu chete ndiye achava nhapwa yangu. imi mose, dzokerai kuna baba venyu norugare.” ipapo yeahudha akaenda kwaari akati, “ndapota, ishe wangu, regai muranda wenyu ataure shoko rimwe kuna she wangu. regai kutsamwira muranda wenyu, kunyange hazvo makaenzana nafaro pachake. ishe wangu akabvunza varanda vake akati, ‘muna baba kana mununʼuna here?’ uye isu takapindura tikati, ‘tina baba vava vatana, uye pano mukomana muduku akaberekwa pautana hwavo. mukoma wake akafa, uye ndiye oga asara mwanakomana wamai vake, uye baba vake vanomuda.’ “ipapo imi makati kuvaranda venyu, ‘uyai naye kuno kwandiri kuti ndimuone, ini pachangu.’ uye isu takati kuna she wangu, ‘mukomana haangasiye baba vake; kana akavasiya, baba vake vangafa.’ asi imi makati kuvaranda venyu, ‘kunze kwokunge mauya nomununʼuna wenyu gotwe, hamungazooni chiso changu.’ patakadzokera kumuranda wenyu, baba vangu, takavaudza zvakanga zvarehwa naishe wangu. “ipapo baba vedu vakati, ‘dzokerai mundotengazve zvimwe zvokudya zvishoma.’ asi isu takati, ‘hatigoni kuenda. tichaenda bedzi kana mununʼuna wedu anesu. hatigoni kuona chiso chomurume uyo kunze kwokunge mununʼuna wedu gotwe aenda nesu.’ “muranda wenyu baba vangu vakati kwatiri, ‘imi munoziva kuti mukadzi wangu akandiberekera vanakomana vaviri. mumwe wavo akabva kwandiri, uye ndikati, “zvirokwazvo akabvamburwa-bvamburwa.” uye handina kuzomuona kubvira ipapo. kana mukanditorera iyeyuwo uye kana zvakaipa zvikamuwira, muchaendesa musoro wangu wachena kuguva mukusuwa.’ “saka zvino, kana mukomana akasava nesu pandinodzokera kumuranda wenyu, baba vangu, uye kana baba vangu, avo vakasunganidza upenyu hwavo kuupenyu hwomukomana, vakaona kuti mukomana haapo, vachafa. muranda wenyu achaendesa musoro wachena wababa vedu kuguva mukusuwa. muranda wenyu akapa rubatso rwokuchengetedzeka kwomukomana kuna baba vangu. ndakati, ‘kana ndikasadzoka naye kwamuri, ndini ndichava nemhosva pamberi penyu, baba vangu, upenyu hwangu hwose!’ “zvino, ndapota, regai henyu muranda wenyu asare kuno senhapwa yashe wangu pachinzvimbo chomukomana, uye murege mukomana adzokere namadzikoma ake. ndingadzokera sei kuna baba vangu kana mukomana ndisinaye? kwete! musandirega ndichiona njodzi ichiuya pamusoro pababa vangu.”

45

ipapo yosefa akanga asisagoni kuzvidzora pamberi pavashandiri vake vose, uye akadanidzira akati, “munhu wose ngaabve pamberi pangu!” saka pakanga pasisina mumwe munhu pana yosefa paakazvizivisa kuhama dzake. uye akachema zvikuru kwazvo zvokuti vaijipita vakamunzwa, uye veimba yafaro vakanzwa nezvazvo. yosefa akati kuhama dzake, “ndini yosefa! ko, baba vangu vachiri vapenyu here?” asi hama dzake hadzina kugona kumupindura, nokuti vakanga vachitya pamberi pake. ipapo yosefa akati kuhama dzake, “swederai henyu kwandiri.” vakati vaita izvozvo, akati, “ndini yosefa hama yenyu, wamakatengesa kuijipiti! uye zvino, musatambudzika uye musazvitsamwira nokuda kwokuti makanditengesa kuno, nokuti allah akandituma mberi kwenyu kuti ndigoponesa upenyu hwavanhu. nokuti pava namakore maviri zvino nzara yava munyika, uye makore mashanu ari kutevera kuchange kusingarimwi kana kukohwewa. asi allah akandituma mberi kwenyu kuti ndikuchengeterei vanosara panyika uye kuti ndiponese upenyu hwenyu nokusunungurwa kukuru. “saka zvino, hamusimi makandituma kuno, asi allah. akandiita baba kuna faro, ishe weimba yake yose nomutongi weijipiti yose. zvino kurumidzai mudzokere kuna baba vangu mundoti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nomwanakomana wenyu yosefa: allah akandiita ishe weijipiti yose. burukai muuye kwandiri; musanonoka. muchandogara munyika yegosheni muve pedyo neni, imi, vana venyu navazukuru venyu, zvipfuwo zvenyu nemombe dzenyu nezvose zvamunazvo. ndichakuriritirai ikoko, nokuti mamwe makore mashanu enzara ari kuuya. kana zvikasadaro imi neveimba yenyu navose vamunavo mungazova varombo.’ “muri kuzvionera pachenyu, uye kana mununʼuna wangu uyu bhenjamini, kuti ndini chaiye ari kutaura nemi. muudze baba vangu pamusoro pokukudzwa kwangu muijipiti uye napamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvamaona. uye muuye nababa vangu kuno nokukurumidza.” ipapo akawira pamutsipa womununʼuna wake bhenjamini akachema, uye bhenjamini akamumbundikirawo achichema. uye akatsvoda madzikoma ake ose uye akachema pamusoro pavo. shure kwaizvozvo, madzikoma ake akataura naye. shoko rakati rasvika kumuzinda wafaro kuti madzikoma ayosefa akanga auya, faro namachinda ake ose vakafara. faro akati kuna yosefa, “taurira hama dzako uti, ‘itai izvi: takudzai zvipfuwo zvenyu mudzokere kunyika yekenani, mundouya nababa venyu uye nemhuri kuno kwandiri. ndichakupai nyika yakaisvonaka yeijipiti uye mugofara nezvakakora zvenyika.’ “iwe unorayirwawo kuti uvaudze kuti, ‘itai izvi: torerai vana navakadzi venyu dzimwe ngoro dzinobva muijipiti uye mundotora baba venyu mugodzoka. musafunganya henyu nezvenhumbi dzenyu, nokuti zvakaisvonaka zvose zveijipiti zvichava zvenyu.’ ” saka vanakomana vaisraeri vakaita saizvozvo. yosefa akavapa ngoro, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nafaro, uye akavapawo mbuva yorwendo rwavo. akapa mumwe nomumwe wavo nguo itsva, asi akapa bhenjamini mazana matatu amashekeri esirivha nenguo shanu dzokupfeka. uye izvi ndizvo zvaakatumira kuna baba vake: mbongoro hono gumi dzakanga dzakatakura zvinhu zvakaisvonaka zveijipiti, nembongoro hadzi gumi dzakanga dzakatakura zviyo nechingwa nezvimwe zvembuva yorwendo. ipapo akaendesa hama dzake uye pavakanga voenda akati kwavari, “musakakavadzana munzira!” saka vakabuda muijipiti uye vakaenda vakandosvika kuna baba vavo yaqobho kunyika yekenani. uye vakati kwavari, “yosefa mupenyu! uye ndiye mutongi weijipiti yose.” yaqobho akati rukutu; haana kuvatenda. asi pavakavaudza zvose zvakanga zvarehwa nayosefa kwavari, uye paakaona ngoro dzakanga dzatumirwa kwavari nayosefa kuti dzizovatakura, mweya wababa wavo yaqobho wakamutsiridzwa. uye israeri akati, “ndagutsikana! mwana wangu yosefa achiri mupenyu. ndichaenda kundomuona ndisati ndafa.”

46

saka israeri akasimuka nezvose zvakanga zviri zvake, uye akati asvika kubheerishebha, akapa zvibayiro kuna allah wababa vake isaka. uye allah akataura kuna israeri muchiratidzo usiku akati, “yaqobho! yaqobho!” iye akati, “ndiri pano.” allah akati, “ndini allah, iye allah wababa vako. usatya kuenda kuijipiti, nokuti ndichakuita rudzi rukuru ikoko. ndichaburuka kuijipiti pamwe chete newe, uye zvirokwazvo ndichakudzosazve. uye ruoko rwayosefa chairwo ndirwo ruchazarira meso ako.” ipapo yaqobho akabva pabheerishebha, uye vanakomana vaisraeri vakatora baba vavo yaqobho navana vavo navakadzi vavo vakavakwidza mungoro dzakanga dzatumirwa nafaro kuti dzivatakure. vakaendawo nezvipfuwo zvavo nepfuma yose yavakanga vawana mukenani, uye yaqobho navana vake vose vakaenda kuijipiti. akaenda pamwe chete navanakomana vake, navazukuru vake navanasikana vake navanasikana vavo, vana vake vose. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana vaisraeri (yaqobho nezvizvarwa zvake) vakaenda kuijipiti: rubheni dangwe rayaqobho. vanakomana varubheni vaiva: hanoki, paru, hezironi nakami. vanakomana vasimeoni vaiva: jemueri, jamini, ohadhi, jakini, zohari nashauri, mwanakomana womukadzi mukenani. vanakomana varevhi vaiva: gerishoni, kohati namerari. vanakomana vayeahudha vaiva: eri, onani, shera, perezi nazera (asi eri naonani vakanga vafira munyika yekenani). vanakomana vaperezi: hezironi nahamuri. vanakomana vaisakari vaiva: tora, pua, jashubhi nashimironi. vanakomana vazebhuruni vaiva: seredhi, eroni najareri. ava ndivo vanakomana vakaberekerwa yaqobho narea mupadhani aramu, kunze kwadhaina mwanasikana wake. vanakomana navanasikana vake ava vakanga vari makumi matatu navatatu pamwe chete. vanakomana vagadhi vaiva: zefoni, hagi, shuni, ezibhoni, eri, arodhi naareri. vanakomana vaasheri vaiva: imina, ishivha, ishivhi nabheria. hanzvadzi yavo yakanga iri sera. vanakomana vabheria vaiva: hebheri namarikieri. ava ndivo vana vakaberekerwa yaqobho naziripa, uyo akanga apiwa narabhani kuna rea mwanasikana wake, gumi navatanhatu pamwe chete. vanakomana varakeri mukadzi wayaqobho vaiva: yosefa nabhenjamini. muijipiti, manase naefuremu vakaberekerwa yosefa naasenati mwanasikana wapotifera, muprista waoni. vanakomana vabhenjamini vaiva: bhera, bhekeri, gera, naamani, ehi, roshi, mupimi, hupimi naaridhi. ava ndivo vakanga vari vanakomana varakeri vakanga vaberekerwa yaqobho, gumi navana pamwe chete. mwanakomana wadhani aiva: hushimi. vanakomana vanafutari vaiva: jazieri, guni, jezeri nashiremi. ava ndivo vanakomana vakaberekerwa yaqobho nabhiriha, uya akapiwa narabhani kuna rakeri mwanasikana wake, vanomwe pamwe chete. vose vakaenda nayaqobho kuijipiti, vaya vakanga vari zvizvarwa zvake chaizvo, tisingaverengi vakadzi vavanakomana vake, vaiva vanhu makumi matanhatu navatanhatu pakuwanda. pamwe chete navanakomana vaviri vakaberekerwa yosefa muijipiti, vose vemhuri yayaqobho, avo vakaenda kuijipiti, vakanga vari makumi manomwe pamwe chete. zvino yaqobho akatuma yeahudha pamberi pake kuna yosefa kuti aratidzwe nzira yokuenda nayo kugosheni. vakati vasvika mudunhu regosheni, yosefa akaita kuti ngoro yake igadzirirwe uye akaenda kugosheni kundosangana nababa vake israeri. yosefa paakangosvika pamberi pavo, akambundikira baba vake uye akachema kwenguva refu. israeri akati kuna yosefa, “zvino ndagadzirira kufa, sezvo ndazvionera pachangu kuti uchiri mupenyu.” ipapo yosefa akati kuhama dzake nokune veimba yababa vake, “ini ndichaenda kuti ndinotaura nafaro uye ndichandoti kwaari, ‘madzikoma angu neveimba yababa vangu, vakanga vachigara kunyika yekenani, vauya kwandiri. vanhu ava vafudzi; vanochengeta zvipfuwo, uye vauya namakwai avo nemombe dzavo nezvose zvavanazvo.’ pamunodanwa nafaro uye akakubvunzai achiti, ‘basa renyu ndereiko?’ imi munofanira kupindura muchiti, ‘varanda venyu vaiva vachengeti vezvipfuwo kubvira pauduku hwavo, sezvakanga zvichiitawo madzibaba edu.’ ipapo muchatenderwa kugara munyika yegosheni, nokuti vafudzi vose vanonyangadza kuvaijipita.”

47

yosefa akaenda akandoudza faro akati, “baba vangu namadzikoma angu, pamwe chete nezvipfuwo zvavo uye nemombe dzavo nezvavo zvose, vauya vachibva kunyika yekenani uye vava mugosheni zvino.” akasarudza vashanu pamadzikoma ake akavaendesa pamberi pafaro. faro akabvunza madzikoma ayosefa akati, “basa renyu ndereiko?” ivo vakapindura faro vakati, “varanda venyu vafudzi, sezvakanga zvakangoita madzibaba edu.” vakatizve kwaari, “tauya kuzogara kuno kwechinguva, nokuti nzara yakanyanya mukenani uye zvipfuwo zvavaranda venyu hazvisisina mafuro. saka zvino, tapota regai varanda venyu vagare mugosheni.” faro akati kuna yosefa, “baba vako namadzikoma ako vauya kwauri, uye nyika yeijipiti iri pamberi pako; garisa baba vako namadzikoma ako panzvimbo yakanakisisa munyika ino. ngavagare mugosheni. uye kana uchiziva kuti pakati pavo pane vamwe vane zvavanokwanisa kuita, uvaite kuti vave vatariri vezvipfuwo zvangu.” ipapo akapinza baba vake yaqobho akavaendesa pamberi pafaro. shure kwokuropafadzwa kwafaro nayaqobho, faro akavabvunza akati, “mava namakore manganiko?” uye yaqobho akati kuna faro, “makore okufamba kwangu panyika izana namakumi matatu. makore angu akanga ari mashoma uye akaoma, uye haaenzani namakore okufamba kwamadzibaba angu.” ipapo yaqobho akaropafadza faro akabva pamberi pake. saka yosefa akagarisa baba vake namadzikoma ake munyika yeijipiti uye akavapa nzvimbo mudunhu rakanakisisa munyika, dunhu reramasesi, sokurayira kwafaro. yosefa akapa baba vake namadzikoma ake navose veimba yababa vake zvokudya, zvakaenzana nouwandu hwavana vavo. kunyange zvakadaro, kwakanga kusina zvokudya munyika yose nokuti nzara yakanga iri huru, nyika yeijipiti nenyika yekenani dzakaziya nokuda kwenzara. yosefa akaunganidza mari yose yaiwanikwa muijipiti nekenani yomuripo wezviyo zvavaitenga, uye akaenda nayo kumuzinda wafaro. mari yavanhu veijipiti nevokukenani yakati yapera, vanhu veijipiti yose vakauya kuna yosefa vakati, “tipei zvokudya. tofireiko pamberi penyu? mari yedu yapera.” ipapo yosefa akati, “uyai nezvipfuwo zvenyu. ndichakutengeserai zvokudya ndichitsinhanisa nezvipfuwo zvenyu, sezvo mari yenyu yapera.” saka vakauya nezvipfuwo zvavo kuna yosefa, uye akavapa zvokudya achitsinhanisa namabhiza avo, makwai nembudzi dzavo, mombe nembongoro dzavo. uye akavabudisa mugore iro nezvokudya zvokutsinhana nezvipfuwo zvavo zvose. gore iroro rakati rapera, vakauya kwaari mugore rakatevera vakati, “hatingavanziri ishe wedu chokwadi chokuti sezvo mari yedu yakapera uye zvipfuwo zvedu zvava zvenyu, hapasisina chasara chatingapa ishe wedu kunze kwemiviri yedu nenyika yedu. tichafireiko pamberi penyu, isu nenyika yeduwo? titengei isu nenyika yedu titsinhane nezvokudya, uye isu nenyika yedu tichava varanda vafaro. tipeiwo mbeu kuitira kuti tirarame uye tirege kufa, uye kuti nyika irege kuparara.” saka yosefa akatengera faro nyika yose iri muijipiti. vaijipita vakatengesa, mumwe nomumwe munda wake, nokuti nzara yakanga iri huru kwazvo. nyika yakava yafaro, uye yosefa akaita kuti vanhu vave varanda kubva kuna mamwe magumo eijipiti kusvikira kuna mamwe. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, haana kutenga nyika yavaprista, nokuti ivo vaigamuchira migove nguva dzose kubva kuna faro uye vakanga vane zvokudya zvakakwana kubva pamugove wavaipiwa nafaro. ndokusaka vasina kutengesa nyika yavo. yosefa akati kuvanhu, “zvino zvandakutengai nhasi imi nenyika yenyu kuti muve vafaro, heyi mbeu yokuti mudyare muminda. asi pamunokohwa, mupe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvishanu chazvo kuna faro. zvimwe zvikamu zvina kubva muzvishanu mungazvichengeta henyu sembeu dzomuminda nezvokudya zvenyu navari mudzimba dzenyu navana venyu.” ivo vakati, “makaponesa upenyu hwedu. ngatiwanei hedu nyasha pamberi penyu ishe wedu; tichava varanda kuna faro.” saka yosefa akasimbisa izvi somurayiro pamusoro penyika muijipiti, murayiro uyu uchiri kushanda nanhasi, kuti chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvishanu chezvibereko ndechafaro. nyika yavaprista bedzi ndiyo yakanga isiri yafaro. zvino vaisraeri vakagara muijipiti mudunhu regosheni. vakawana pfuma ikoko, vakabereka vana uye vakawanda zvikuru. yaqobho akagara muijipiti kwamakore gumi namanomwe, uye akararama kwamakore zana namakumi mana namanomwe. nguva yokufa kwaisraeri yakati yaswedera, akadana mwanakomana wake yosefa uye akati kwaari, “kana ndawana nyasha pamberi pako, isa ruoko rwako pasi pechidya changu uye ugovimbisa kuti uchandinzwira ngoni uye uchava wakatendeka. usandiviga muijipiti, asi pandinozorora namadzibaba angu, mundibudise muijipiti munondiviga pavakavigwa.” iye akati, “ndichaita sezvamareva.” ivo vakati, “ndipikire.” ipapo yosefa akapika kwaari, uye israeri akanamata akasendamira pamusoro wetsvimbo yake.

48

shure kwaizvozvo yosefa akaudzwa kuti, “baba vako vanorwara.” saka akatora vanakomana vake vaviri manase naefuremu pamwe chete naye. yaqobho akati audzwa kuti, “mwanakomana wako yosefa auya,” israeri akazvisimbaradza uye akagara panhoo. yaqobho akati kuna yosefa, “allah wamasimba ose akazviratidza kwandiri paruzi munyika yekenani, uye akandiropafadza ipapo, uye akati kwandiri, ‘ndichakuita kuti ubereke vana uye ndichaita kuti muwande. ndichakuita vanhu vazhinji, uye ndichakupa nyika ino kuti ive yako nokuzvizvarwa zvako nokusingaperi.’ “ipapo zvino, vanakomana vako vaviri vawakaberekerwa muijipiti ndisati ndasvika kwauri kuno vachanzi ndevangu; efuremu namanase vachava vangu, sarubheni nasimeoni vari vangu. vana vose vawakaberekerwa mumashure mavo vachava vako; munyika yavo yenhaka vachazivikanwa pasi pamazita amadzikoma avo. pandakanga ndichibva kupadhani, ndakasuwa nokuti rakeri akafira munyika yekenani patakanga tichiri munzira, nhambwe pfupi kubva kuefurati. saka ndakamuviga ipapo parutivi rwomugwagwa unoenda kuefurati” (ndiro bheterehema). israeri akati aona vanakomana vayosefa, akabvunza akati, “ndivanaani ava?” yosefa akati kuna baba vake, “ndivo vanakomana vandakapiwa kuno naallah.” ipapo israeri akati, “uya navo pano ndivaropafadze.” zvino meso aisraeri akanga aneta nokuda kwokukwegura, uye akanga asisagoni kuona zvakanaka. saka yosefa akauya navanakomana vake pedyo naye, baba vake vakavatsvoda uye vakavambundikira. israeri akati kuna yosefa, “handina kumbofunga kuti ndichaona chiso chakozve, uye zvino allah anditendera kuti ndione vana vakowo.” ipapo yosefa akavabvisa pamabvi aisraeri akakotama pasi nechiso chake. uye yosefa akavatora vose vari vaviri, efuremu kurudyi kwake akatarira kuruoko rworuboshwe rwaisraeri, uye manase kuruboshwe, akatarira kuruoko rworudyi rwaisraeri, uye akavaswededza pedyo navo. asi israeri akatambanudza ruoko rwake rworudyi akaruisa pamusoro waefuremu, kunyange zvake akanga ari muduku, uye akachinjika maoko ake, akaisa ruoko rwake rworuboshwe pamusoro wamanase, kunyange hazvo manase akanga ari iye dangwe. ipapo akaropafadza yosefa akati, “allah uyo madzibaba angu, ivo abhurahama naisaka, vakafamba pamberi pake, iye allah akanga ari mufudzi wangu upenyu hwangu hwose kusvikira nhasi, mutumwa akandisunungura kubva pane zvakaipa zvose, ngaaropafadze vakomana ava. ngavadanwe nezita rangu uye namazita amadzibaba angu abhurahama naisaka, uye ngavawande zvikuru pamusoro penyika.” yosefa paakaona baba vake vachiisa ruoko rwavo rworudyi pamusoro waefuremu haana kufadzwa nazvo; saka akabata ruoko rwababa vake kuti arubvise pamusoro waefuremu aruise pamusoro wamanase. yosefa akati kwavari, “kwete, baba vangu, uyu ndiye dangwe; isai ruoko rwenyu rworudyi pamusoro wake.” asi baba vakaramba vakati, “ndinozviziva, mwana wangu, ndinozviziva. naiyewo achava rudzi, uye naiyewo achava mukuru. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo muduku achava mukuru kupfuura iye, uye zvizvarwa zvake zvichava boka rendudzi zhinji.” akavaropafadza pazuva iro akati, “muzita rako, israeri achataura ropafadzo iyi achiti: ‘allah ngaakuite saefuremu namanase.’ ” saka akaisa efuremu pamberi pamanase. ipapo israeri akati kuna yosefa, “ndava pedyo nokufa, asi allah achava newe uye achakudzoserai kunyika yamadzibaba enyu. uye kwauri, sezvo uri munhu ari pamusoro pamadzikoma ako, ndinokupa mugove wenyika yandakatorera vaamori nomunondo wangu uye nouta hwangu.”

49

ipapo yaqobho akadana vanakomana vake akati, “unganai kuti ndikuudzei zvichaitika kwamuri pamazuva anouya. “unganai muteerere, imi vanakomana vayaqobho; teererai kuna baba venyu israeri. “rubheni, iwe uri dangwe rangu, simba rangu, chiratidzo chokutanga chesimba rangu, unokunda mukukudzwa, unokunda musimba. unozunguzika semvura zhinji, hauchazokundizve, nokuti wakakwira panhoo yababa vako, panhoo yangu uye ukaisvibisa. “simeoni narevhi mukoma nomununʼuna, minondo yavo zvombo zvokurwa. ngandirege kupinda parangano yavo, ngandirege kuva paungano yavo, nokuti vakauraya vanhu mukutsamwa kwavo uye vakagura marunda enzombe sezvavaida. kutsamwa kwavo ngakutukwe, kunotyisa zvakadai, uye hasha dzavo, dzaiva noutsinye kudai! ndichavaparadzira muna yaqobho uye ndigovatsaura muna israeri. “yeahudha, hama dzako dzichakurumbidza; ruoko rwako ruchava pamitsipa yavavengi vako; vanakomana vababa vako vachakotama kwauri. uri mwana weshumba, iwe yeahudha; unodzoka kubva kune zvaunouraya, mwana wangu. seshumba anonyangira uye anovata pasi, seshumbakadzi, ndiani anotsunga kumumutsa? tsvimbo youshe haingabvi kuna yeahudha, uye mudonzvo womutongi pakati pamakumbo ake, kusvikira asvika kumuridzi wawo, uye kuteerera kwendudzi ndokwake. achasungirira mbongoro yake pamuzambiringa, nomwana wayo padavi rakaisvonaka; achasuka nguo dzake muwaini, zvokufuka zvake muropa ramazambiringa. meso ake achasviba kupfuura waini, meno ake achachena kupfuura mukaka. “zebhuruni achagara kumahombekombe egungwa uye achava zororo rezvikepe; muganhu wake uchasvika pasidhoni. “isakari imbongoro ine simba, ivete pasi pakati pamatanga amakwai. paanoona nzvimbo yake yokuzorora kuti yanaka sei uye kuti nyika yake inofadza sei, acharerekera pfudzi rake kumutoro uye achava mubatiri wechibharo. “dhani acharuramisira vanhu vake somumwe wamarudzi aisraeri. dhani achava nyoka iri parutivi pomugwagwa, semhakure iri munzira, inoruma chitsitsinho chebhiza kuitira kuti mutasvi waro awire pasi neshure. “ndakamirira rusununguko rwenyu, imi yeahoh. “gadhi acharohwa neboka ravapambi, asi achavarova pazvitsitsinho zvavo. “zvokudya zvaasheri zvichava zvakakora; achauya nezvinonaka zvakafanira madzimambo. “nafutari isheche yemhembwe yakasunungurwa, inobereka tsvana dzakaisvonaka. “yosefa muzambiringa unobereka mazambiringa, unobereka uri pedyo netsime, matavi awo anokwira pamadziro. neshungu vapfuri vanomurwisa; vanomupfura noruvengo. asi uta hwake hwakaramba hwakasimba, maoko ake akasimba, akagwinya, nokuda kworuoko rwaiye anesimba wayaqobho, nokuda kwomufudzi, iye dombo raisraeri, nokuda kwaallah wababa vako anokubatsira, nokuda kwowamasimba ose anokuropafadza namaropafadzo okumatenga kumusoro, maropafadzo okwakadzika kuri pasi, maropafadzo amazamu neechizvaro. maropafadzo ababa vako makuru kupfuura maropafadzo amakomo ekare, kupfuura zvakawanda zvezvikomo zvamakore ekare. zvose izvi ngazvigare pamusoro wayosefa, pamusoro womuchinda ari pakati pehama dzake. “bhenjamini ibere rinoparadza; mangwanani anodya nyama, madekwana anogovera zvaapamba.” ava vose ndiwo marudzi gumi namaviri aisraeri, uye izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nababa vavo kwavari pavakavaropafadza, vachipa mumwe nomumwe kuropafadzwa kwakamufanira. ipapo akavarayira akati, “ini ndava kuzosanganiswa navanhu vokwangu. mundivige namadzibaba angu mubako mumunda waefuroni muhiti, bako riri mumunda wemakapera, pedyo nemamure mukenani, rakatengwa kubva kuna efuroni naabhurahama senzvimbo yokuviga pamwe chete nomunda. ndipo pakavigwa abhurahama nomukadzi wake sara, ndipozve pakavigwa isaka nomukadzi wake rabheka, uye rea akavigwa ipapo. munda nebako riri mauri zvakatengwa kubva kuvahiti.” yaqobho akati apedza kurayira vanakomana vake, akadzora tsoka dzake mumubhedha, akabudisa mweya wake akasanganiswa navanhu vokwake.

50

yosefa akazviwisira pamusoro pababa vake akachema pamusoro pavo uye akavatsvoda. ipapo yosefa akarayira varapi vaimushandira kuti vasasike baba vake israeri. saka varapi vakamusasika, vakapedza mazuva makumi mana azere, nokuti ndiyo yakanga iri nguva yaidikanwa yokusasika mutumbi. uye vaijipiti vakamuchema kwamazuva makumi manomwe. mazuva okuchema akati apera, yosefa akati kune veimba yafaro, “kana ndawana nyasha pamberi penyu, nditaurireiwo kuna faro. mumuudze kuti, ‘baba vangu vakaita kuti ndipike mhiko uye vakati, “ini ndava kufa; mundivige muguva randakazvicherera munyika yekenani.” zvino regai hangu ndikwidze ndinoviga baba vangu; ipapo ndigozodzoka hangu.’ ” faro akati, “kwira hako undoviga baba vako, sezvo vakaita kuti upikire kuita izvozvo.” saka yosefa akakwidza kundoviga baba vake. varanda vose vafaro vakamuperekedza, vanokudzwa vomumba make navose vanokudzwa vomuijipiti, tisingaverengi vose vomumhuri yayosefa namadzikoma ake uye navose veimba yababa vake. vana vavo chete namakwai avo nemombe dzavo, ndivo vakasiyiwa mugosheni. ngoro navatasvi vamabhiza vakaendawo naye. rakanga riri boka guru kwazvo. vakati vasvika paburiro raatadhi, pedyo nejorodhani, vakachema zvikuru neshungu; uye ipapo yosefa akatara mazuva manomwe okuchema baba vake. vakenani vaigara ikoko vakati vachiona kuchema ikoko paburiro raatadhi, vakati, “vaijipita vari pakuchema kukuru.” ndokusaka nzvimbo iyo iri pedyo nejorodhani yakatumidzwa zita rokuti abheri miziraimi. saka vanakomana vayaqobho vakaita sezvaakavarayira: vakamutakura vakaenda naye kunyika yekenani uye vakamuviga mubako mumunda wemakapera, pedyo nemamure, rakatengwa naabhurahama senzvimbo yokuviga kubva kuna efuroni muhiti, pamwe chete nomunda wacho. shure kwokuvigwa kwababa vake, yosefa akadzokera kuijipiti, pamwe chete namadzikoma ake navamwe vose vakanga vaenda naye kundoviga baba vake. madzikoma ayosefa akati aona kuti baba vavo vakanga vafa, vakati, “zvimwe yosefa angadaro achiri kutivenga uye akatitsiva pane zvakaipa zvose zvatakaita kwaari?” saka vakatuma shoko kwaari vakati, “baba vako vakasiya varayira vasati vafa vachiti: ‘izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kutaura kuna yosefa: ndinokumbira kuti ukanganwire madzikoma ako zvivi zvavo nezvitadzo zvavakaita pavakakuitira zvakaipa kwazvo. zvino ndapota kanganwira hako zvivi zvavaranda vaallah wababa vako.’ ” pakasvika shoko ravo kwaari, yosefa akachema. ipapo madzikoma ake akauya akazviwisira pasi pamberi pake. vakati, “tiri varanda venyu.” asi yosefa akati kwavari, “musatya. ko, ini ndiri pachinzvimbo chaallah here? imi makafunga kundiitira zvakaipa, asi allah akafunga kuita zvakanaka kuti apedzise zviri kuitwa iye zvino, iko kuponeswa kwemweya mizhinji. naizvozvo zvino, musatya. ndichakuriritirai imi navana venyu.” akavasimbaradza uye akataura nounyoro kwavari. yosefa akagara muijipiti pamwe chete nemhuri yose yababa vake. akararama kwamakore zana negumi, uye akaona vana vaefuremu vorudzi rwechitatu. uyewo vana vamakiri mwanakomana wamanase vakaiswa pamakumbo ayosefa pavakaberekwa. ipapo yosefa akati kumadzikoma ake, “ini ndava kuzofa. asi zvirokwazvo allah achakubatsirai nokukubudisai munyika muno achikuendesai kunyika yakavimbiswa nemhiko kuna abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho.” uye yosefa akaita kuti vanakomana vaisraeri vapike mhiko uye akati, “zvirokwazvo allah achakubatsirai, uye ipapo munofanira kutakura mapfupa angu kubva munzvimbo ino.” saka yosefa akafa ava namakore zana negumi. uye shure kwokumusasika, akaiswa mubhokisi muijipiti.

exodus

1

aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana vaisraeri vakaenda nayaqobho kuijipiti, mumwe nomumwe nemhuri yake: rubheni, simeoni, revhi nayeahudha; isakari, zebhuruni nabhenjamini; dhani nanafutari; gadhi naasheri. zvizvarwa zvose zvayaqobho zvakanga zviri makumi manomwe pakuwanda; yosefa akanga atova muijipiti. zvino yosefa nehama dzake dzose navose vezera iroro vakafa, asi vaisraeri vakaberekana vakawanda zvikuru uye vakava vazhinji kwazvo, zvokuti nyika yakanga yazara navo. ipapo mambo mutsva, akanga asingazivi nezvayosefa, akatanga kutonga muijipiti. akati kuvanhu vake, “tarirai, vaisraeri vanyanya kuwanda kwazvo. uyai tivafungire zano nokuti vangazonyanya kuwanda uye kana hondo ikamuka, vangazobatana navavengi vedu, vakarwa nesu vakazobva munyika.” saka vakagadza vatariri vebasa pamusoro pavo kuti vavadzvinyirire nebasa rechibharo, uye vakavaka pitomu neramesesi kuti ave maguta amatura afaro. asi pavakanyanya kudzvinyirirwa ndipo pavakanyanya kuwanda uye nokupararira; saka vaijipita vakasvika pakutya vaisraeri uye vakavashandisa zvino utsinye. vakashungurudza upenyu hwavo nebasa rakaoma rezvidhina nedhaka uye nemhando dzose dzebasa romuminda; vaijipita vakavashandisa noutsinye mubasa rakaoma. mambo weijipiti akati kuna vananyamukuta vechihebheru vainzi shifura napua, “pamunobatsira vakadzi vechihebheru pakusununguka uye mukavacherechedza vachisununguka, kana ari mukomana, mumuuraye; kana ari musikana murege ari mupenyu.” asi, vananyamukuta vakanga vachitya allah, uye havana kuita zvavakanga varayirwa namambo weijipiti kuti vaite; vakarega vanakomana vari vapenyu. ipapo mambo weijipiti akadana vananyamukuta akavabvunza achiti, “seiko maita izvi? seiko marega vana vechikomana vari vapenyu?” vananyamukuta vakapindura faro vachiti, “vakadzi vechihebheru havana kufanana navakadzi veijipiti; vane simba uye vanosununguka vananyamukuta vasati vasvika.” saka allah akaitira vananyamukuta zvakanaka uye vanhu vakawedzerwa vakava vazhinji kwazvo. uye nokuda kwokuti vananyamukuta vaitya allah, iye akavapa mhuri dzavo pachavo. ipapo faro akarayira vanhu vose kuti, “vanakomana vose vanoberekwa munofanira kuvakanda murwizi nairi, asi murege vanasikana vose vari vapenyu.”

2

zvino mumwe murume weimba yarevhi akawana mukadzi, uye mukadzi uyu akava nemimba akabereka mwanakomana. paakaona kuti akanga ari mwana akanaka, akamuvanza kwemwedzi mitatu. asi akati asisagoni kumuvanza, akamutorera tswanda yenhokwe akainama netara nenamo. ipapo akaisa mwana imomo ndokuiisa pakati petsanga dzaiva mumahombekombe anairi. hanzvadzi yake yakamira iri chinhambwe kuti ione kuti chii chaizoitika kwaari. ipapo mwanasikana wafaro akaburuka akaenda kurwizi nairi kuti andoshamba, uye varandakadzi vake vakanga vachifamba vachitevedza mahombekombe. akaona tswanda pakati petsanga ndokubva atuma murandakadzi wake kuti andoitora. akaizarura akaona mwana. akanga achichema, uye akamunzwira tsitsi. akati, “uyu ndomumwe wavana vavahebheru.” ipapo hanzvadzi yake yakakumbira mwanasikana wafaro ikati, “ndingaenda here ndikandokutorerai mumwe wavakadzi vechihebheru kuti azokurererai mwana?” uye mwanasikana wafaro akapindura akati, “hongu.” uye musikana akaenda akandotora mai vomwana. mwanasikana wafaro akati kwavari, “tora mwana uyu unondirererawo, uye ini ndichakupa muripo wako.” saka mukadzi akatora mwana akamurera. mwana akati akura, akamutora akaenda naye kumwanasikana wafaro akava mwanakomana wake. akamutumidza zita rokuti mozisi, achiti, “ndakamutora mumvura.” rimwe zuva mozisi akura, akaenda kwakanga kuna vanhu vokwake uye akavatarira vari pabasa ravo rakaoma. akaona muijipita achirova muhebheru, mumwe wavanhu vokwake. akaringa-ringa ndokuona kusina munhu achibva auraya muijipita, ndokumuviga mujecha. zuva rakatevera, akabuda akaona vahebheru vaviri vachirwa. akabvunza uya akanga akanganisa akati, “seiko uchirova mumwe wako muhebheru?” murume uya akati, “ndianiko akakuita mubati nomutongi pamusoro pedu? uri kuda kundiuraya sokuuraya kwawakaita muijipita nhai?” ipapo mozisi akatya akafunga akati, “zvandakaita zvinofanira kuva zvava kuzivikanwa.” faro akati anzwa izvi, akaedza kuuraya mozisi, asi mozisi akatiza faro akaenda kundogara kumidhiani, uye akagara patsime. zvino muprista wemidhiani akanga ana vanasikana vanomwe uye vakauya kuzochera mvura yokuti vazadze midziyo yainwira zvipfuwo zvababa vavo. vamwe vafudzi vakasvika vakavadzinga, asi mozisi akasimuka akavanunura uye akanwisa zvipfuwo zvavo. vasikana pavakadzokera kuna reueri baba vavo, akavabvunza akati, “makurumidza seiko kudzoka nhasi?” vakapindura vakati, “tanunurwa nomuijipita kubva kuvafudzi. abva aticherera mvura uye akanwisa zvipfuwo.” akabvunza vanasikana vake akati, “aripiko? mamusiyirei? mudanei, auye azodya.” mozisi akabvuma kugara nomurume uyu, uyo akazopa mwanasikana wake zipora kuna mozisi kuti ave mukadzi wake. zipora akabereka mwanakomana, uye mozisi akamutumidza zita rokuti gerishomi, achiti, “ndava mueni munyika yavatorwa.” zvino makore mazhinji akati apfuura, mambo weijipiti akafa. vaisraeri vakagomera muutapwa hwavo uye vakachema, kuchemera rubatsiro rwavo nokuda kwoutapwa hwavo kukakwira kuna allah. allah akanzwa kugomera kwavo uye akarangarira sungano yake naabhurahama, naisaka uye nayaqobho. saka allah akatarisa pamusoro pavaisraeri akava nehanya navo.

3

zvino mozisi akanga achifudza makwai ajeturo tezvara wake, muprista wemidhiani, uye akatungamirira makwai kurutivi rwuri kure mugwenga akasvika kuhorebhi, gomo raallah. ikoko, mutumwa wayeahoh akazviratidza kwaari mumarimi omoto aiva mugwenzi. mozisi akaona kuti kunyange zvazvo gwenzi rakanga richipfuta, rakanga risingatsvi. saka mozisi akafunga akati, “ndichaenda apo ndinoona chishamiso ichi, kuti seiko gwenzi risingatsvi.” yeahoh akati aona kuti akanga aendako kuti andoona, allah akadana kwaari kubva mugwenzi akati, “mozisi! mozisi!” uye mozisi akati, “ndiri pano hangu.” allah akati, “usaswedera pedyo. bvisa shangu dzako nokuti nzvimbo yaumire itsvene.” ipapo akati, “ndini allah wababa vako, allah waabhurahama, allah waisaka naallah wayaqobho.” uye mozisi akafukidza chiso chake, nokuti akanga achitya kutarisa allah. yeahoh akati, “zvirokwazvo ndaona kutambudzika kwavanhu vangu muijipiti. ndanzwa kuchema kwavo nokuda kwavatariri vavo vamabasa, uye ndinoziva kutambudzika kwavo. saka ndaburuka kuti ndivanunure vabve muruoko rwavaijipita uye kuti ndivabudise munyika iyo ndivaise kunyika yakanaka uye yakakura, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi, nzvimbo yavakenani, vahiti, vaamori, vaperezi, vahivhi navajebhusi. uye zvino kuchema kwavaisraeri kwasvika kwandiri, uye ndaona nzira yavanotambudzwa nayo navaijipita. saka chienda, zvino, ndiri kukutuma kuna faro kuti undobudisa vanhu vangu vaisraeri kubva muijipiti.” asi mozisi akati kuna allah, “ndini aniko ini kuti ndiende kuna faro kuti ndinobudisa vaisraeri kubva muijipiti?” uye allah akati, “ndichava newe. uye ichi chichava chiratidzo kwauri chokuti ndini ndakutuma: paunenge wabudisa vanhu kubva muijipiti, muchanamata allah pagomo rino.” mozisi akati kuna allah, “ko, kana ndikaenda kuvaisraeri uye ndikanoti kwavari, ‘allah wamadzibaba enyu andituma kwamuri,’ uye ivo vakandibvunza kuti, ‘zita rake ndiani?’ ipapo ndichavaudzeiko?” allah akati kuna mozisi, “ndiri wandiri. izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kutaura kuvaisraeri: ‘ndiri’ andituma kwamuri.” allah akatiwo kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu, allah waabhurahama, allah waisaka naallah wayaqobho andituma kwamuri.’ iri ndiro zita rangu nokusingaperi, zita randinofanira kurangarirwa naro kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. “enda undounganidza vakuru vavaisraeri ugoti kwavari, ‘yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu, allah waabhurahama, allah waisaka, naallah wayaqobho, akazviratidza kwandiri uye akati, “ndakatarira pamusoro penyu uye ndikaona zvakanga zvichiitwa kwamuri muijipiti. uye ndakavimbisa kukubudisai mukutambudzika kwenyu muijipiti ndikuisei kunyika yavakenani, navahiti, vaamori, vaperezi, vahivhi navajebhusi, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi.” ’ “vakuru vavaisraeri vachakuteerera. ipapo iwe navakuru vavaisraeri munofanira kuenda kuna mambo weijipiti munoti kwaari, ‘yeahoh allah wavahebheru akasangana nesu. regai tifambe rwendo rwamazuva matatu tiende kurenje kuti tindobayira kuna yeahoh allah wedu.’ asi ndinoziva kuti mambo weijipiti haasi kuzokutenderai kunze kwokunge ruoko rune simba rwamumanikidza. saka ndichatambanudza ruoko rwangu ndigorova vaijipiti nezvishamiso zvose zvandichaita pakati pavo. shure kwaizvozvo achakutenderai kuenda. “uye ndichaita kuti vaijipita vaitire vanhu ava nyasha, zvokuti pamunoenda hamuendi musina chinhu. mukadzi mumwe nomumwe anofanira kukumbira muvakidzani wake nomukadzi upi zvake waagere naye mumba make, zvishongo zvesirivha nezvegoridhe uye nguo dzamuchapfekedza vanakomana venyu nevanasikana venyu. uye saizvozvo muchapamba vaijipita.”

4

mozisi akapindura akati, “ko, kana vakasanditenda kana kunditeerera uye vakati, ‘yeahoh haana kuzviratidza kwauri’?” ipapo yeahoh akati kwaari, “chiiko icho chiri muruoko rwako?” akapindura akati, “itsvimbo.” yeahoh akati, “ikande pasi.” mozisi akaikanda pasi ikava nyoka, uye akaitiza. ipapo yeahoh akati kwaari, “tambanudza ruoko ugoibata nokumuswe.” saka mozisi akatambanudza ruoko ndokubata nyoka uye ikadzokera pakare pakuva tsvimbo muruoko rwake. yeahoh akati, “izvi ndezvokuti vagotenda kuti yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, allah waabhurahama, allah waisaka, naallah wayaqobho, azviratidza kwauri.” ipapo yeahoh akati, “isa ruoko rwako muchipfuva chako.” saka mozisi akaisa ruoko rwake muchipfuva chake, uye paakarubudisa, rwakanga rwachena maperembudzi, sechando. iye akati, “zvino chirudzorerazve muchipfuva chako,” uye paakarubudisa, rwakanga rwavandudzwa, rwaita somuviri wake wose. ipapo yeahoh akati, “kana vasingakutendi kana kuteerera kuchiratidzo chokutanga, vangangotendawo chechipiri. asi kana vasingatendi zviratidzo zviviri izvi kana kukuteerera, utore mvura kubva muna nairi ugoidira pasi. mvura yaunotora kubva murwizi ichava ropa pamusoro pevhu.” mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “haiwa yeahoh, handina kumbogona kutaura, kunyange nakare, kana kubva pamataura nomuranda wenyu. ndinokakama pakutaura uye rurimi rwangu runononoka.” yeahoh akati kwaari, “ndianiko akapa munhu muromo? ndianiko anomuita matsi kana mbeveve? ndiani anomusvinudza kana kumuita bofu? handisini here, yeahoh? zvino chienda, ini ndichakubatsira kutaura uye ndichakudzidzisa zvokutaura.” asi mozisi akati, “haiwa yeahoh, ndapota hangu, tumai henyu mumwe kuti aite izvozvo.” ipapo kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapisa pamusoro pamozisi uye akati, “ko, mukoma wako, aroni murevhi? ndinoziva kuti anogona kutaura zvakanaka. ari munzira kuzokuchingamidza izvozvi, uye mwoyo wake uchafara paachakuona. uchataura naye ugoisa mashoko mumuromo make; ndichakubatsirai mose uye ndichakudzidzisai zvokuita. uye achataura kuvanhu panzvimbo yako, uye zvichaita sokunge iye ndiye muromo wako uye sokunge iwe ndiwe allah kwaari. asi takura tsvimbo iyi muruoko rwako yauchaita zviratidzo nayo.” ipapo mozisi akadzokera kuna jeturo tezvara wake akati kwaari, “regai ndidzokere kuvanhu vokwangu kuijipiti kuti ndinoona kana vachiri vapenyu.” jeturo akati, “enda hako, ufambe zvakanaka.” zvino yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi ari mumidhiani, “dzokera kuijipiti, nokuti vanhu vose vaida kukuuraya vakafa.” saka mozisi akatora mukadzi wake navanakomana vake akavakwidza pambongoro akasimuka akadzokera kuijipiti. uye akatakura tsvimbo yaallah muruoko rwake. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “paunodzokera kuijipiti, uone kuti waita zvishamiso zvose pamberi pafaro, ndakupa simba rokuita izvozvo. asi ndichaomesa mwoyo wake zvokuti haazotenderi vanhu kuenda. ipapo uti kuna faro, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: israeri ndiye mwanakomana wangu wedangwe, uye ndinoti kwauri, “rega mwanakomana wangu aende, kuti anondinamata.” asi kana ukaramba kumutendera kuti aende, ndichauraya mwanakomana wako wedangwe.’ ” ari paimba yavaeni pavakavata, yeahoh akasangana namozisi uye akada kumuuraya. asi zipora akatora banga rebwe romusarasara akacheka chikanda chapamberi chomwanakomana wake uye akabata tsoka dzamozisi nacho. akati, “zvirokwazvo uri murume weropa kwandiri.” saka yeahoh akamurega. panguva iyoyo zipora akati kwaari, “murume weropa,” achireva nezvokudzingiswa. yeahoh akati kuna aroni, “enda kurenje undosangana namozisi.” saka akasangana namozisi pagomo raallah uye akamutsvoda. ipapo mozisi akaudza aroni zvinhu zvose zvaakanga atumwa nayeahoh kuti azozvitaura, uyewo pamusoro pezvishamiso zvose zvaakanga amurayira kuti aite. mozisi naaroni vakaunganidza vakuru vose vavana vaisraeri, uye aroni akavaudza zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvaudzwa mozisi nayeahoh. akaitawo zviratidzo pamberi pavanhu, vakatenda. uye pavakanzwa kuti yeahoh akanga ane hanya navo, uye kuti akanga aona kutambudzika kwavo, vakakotama pasi vakanamata.

5

shure kwaizvozvo mozisi naaroni vakaenda kuna faro vakati, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: ‘rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuti vanondiitira mutambo kurenje.’ ” faro akati, “yeahoh ndianiko, kuti ndigomuteerera uye ndigorega vaisraeri vachienda? handimuzivi yeahoh iyeye uye handidi kurega vaisraeri vachienda.” ipapo vakati, “allah wavahebheru akasangana nesu. zvino tiregei tifambe rwendo rwamazuva matatu kurenje kuti tinobayira zvipiriso kuna yeahoh allah wedu, kuti arege kutirova namatambudziko kana nomunondo.” asi mambo weijipiti akati, “mozisi naaroni, munobvisireiko vanhu pabasa ravo? dzokerai kubasa renyu!” ipapo faro akati, “tarirai, vanhu vawanda zvino munyika, uye muri kuvakonesa kushanda.” musi mumwe chetewo faro akarayira vatariri vebasa navakuru vakuru vavanhu achiti, “imi hamuchazovigiri vanhu uswa hwokuita zvidhina; varegei vandozviunganidzira uswa pachavo. asi vanofanira kuita zvidhina zvakaenzana pakuwanda nezvavaisimboita kare; musazvitapudza. isimbe; ndokusaka vachichema vachiti, ‘tiregei tiende kundobayira kuna allah wedu.’ itai kuti basa rinyanye kuomera vanhu kuitira kuti varambe vachishanda uye varege kuteerera kunhema.” ipapo vatariri vebasa navakuru vakuru vakabuda vakandoti kuvanhu, “zvanzi nafaro, ‘handichazokupaizve uswa. endai mundozvitsvakira uswa kana kupi zvako kwamungahuwana, asi basa renyu haritapudzwi kana napaduku.’ ” saka vanhu vakapararira muijipiti yose kundounganidza mashanga kuti vaashandise pachinzvimbo chouswa. vatariri vebasa vakaramba vachivamanikidza vachiti, “pedzai basa ramakatarirwa pazuva rimwe nerimwe, sezvamaiita pamaiwana uswa.” vakuru vakuru vavaisraeri vakanga vagadzwa navatariri vebasa vafaro vakarohwa uye vakabvunzwa kuti, “seiko musina kupedza basa renyu rezvidhina zvanezuro nezvanhasi, sezvamaichiita kare pamaipuwa uswa.” ipapo vakuru vakuru vavaisraeri vakaenda nechichemo kuna faro vakati, “seiko muchibata varanda venyu nenzira yakadai? varanda venyu havapiwi uswa, asi tinonzi, ‘itai zvidhina!’ varanda venyu vari kurohwa, asi mhosva ndeyavanhu venyu.” faro akati, “simbe, ndizvo zvamuri imi, muri simbe! ndokusaka muchingoramba muchiti, ‘tiregei tindobayira kuna yeahoh.’ zvino chiendai kubasa. hamuzombopiwi kana uswa, asi munofanira kuita basa renyu rezvidhina zvakakwana.” vakuru vakuru vavaisraeri vakaona kuti vapinda mudambudziko pavakaudzwa kuti, “hamufaniri kutapudza uwandu hwezvidhina zvamakatarirwa pazuva rimwe.” pavakabva pana faro, vakawana mozisi naaroni vakavamirira, uye vakati, “yeahoh ngaakutarirei uye akutongei! matiita chinhu chinonhuhwa kuna faro namachinda ake uye maisa munondo muruoko rwavo kuti vatiuraye.” mozisi akadzokera kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa yeahoh, mauyisireiko dambudziko pamusoro pavanhu ava? ndizvo zvamakanditumira here? kubva pandakaenda kuna faro kuti ndinotaura muzita renyu, iye akauyisa dambudziko pamusoro pavanhu ava, uye imi hamuna kutongonunura vanhu venyu napaduku.”

6

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “zvino uchaona zvandichaita kuna faro. nokuda kworuoko rwangu rune simba achavaregera kuti vaende; nokuda kworuoko rwangu rune simba achavadzinga munyika make.” allah akatiwo kuna mozisi, “ndini yeahoh. ndakazviratidza kuna abhurahama, kuna isaka, nokuna yaqobho saallah wamasimba ose, asi nezita rangu, yeahoh, handina kuzvizivisa kwavari. ndakasimbisawo sungano yangu navo kuti ndivape nyika yekenani, nyika yavakagara savatorwa. pamusoro paizvozvo, ndanzwa kugomera kwavaisraeri, vakabatwa muutapwa navaijipita, uye ndarangarira sungano yangu. “naizvozvo, uti kuvaisraeri, ‘ndini yeahoh, uye ndichakubudisai kubva pasi pejoko ravaijipita. ndichakusunungurai kuti musava nhapwa kwavari, uye ndichakudzikinurai noruoko rwakatambanudzwa uye nokutonga kwamabasa makuru. ndichakutorai savanhu vangu, uye ndichava allah wenyu. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, akakubvisai pasi pejoko ravaijipita. uye ndichakuuyisai kunyika yandakapika ndakasimudza ruoko kuna abhurahama, kuna isaka nokuna yaqobho. ndichaipa kwamuri senhaka yenyu. ndini yeahoh.’ ” mozisi akazivisa izvi kuvaisraeri, asi havana kumuteerera nokuda kwokuora mwoyo kwavo uye nousungwa hune utsinye. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “enda undotaurira faro mambo weijipiti kuti arege vaisraeri vabude munyika yake.” asi mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “kana vaisraeri vasinganditeereri, faro anganditeerera seiko, sezvo ndichitaura nemiromo inokakama?” zvino yeahoh akataura kuna mozisi naaroni pamusoro pavaisraeri napamusoro pafaro mambo weijipiti, uye akavarayira kuti vabudise vaisraeri kubva muijipiti. ava ndivo vaiva vakuru vemhuri dzavo: vanakomana varubheni mwanakomana wedangwe waisraeri vaiva hanoki naparu, hezironi nakami. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri dzimba dzarubheni. vanakomana vasimeoni vaiva jemueri, jamini, ohadhi, jakini, zohari nashauri mwanakomana womukadzi mukenani. idzi ndidzo dzaiva dzimba dzasimeoni. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana varevhi maererano nokunyorwa kwawo: gerishoni, kohati namerari. (revhi akararama makore zana namakumi matatu namanomwe.) vanakomana vagerishoni, nedzimba dzavo, vaiva ribhini nashimei. vanakomana vakohati vaiva amurami, izhari, hebhuroni nauzieri. kohati akararama kwamakore zana namakumi matatu namatatu. vanakomana vamerari vaiva mari namushi. idzi ndidzo dzaiva dzimba dzarevhi sokunyorwa kwadzo. amurami akawana hanzvadzi yababa vake jokebhedhi, uyo akamuberekera aroni namozisi. (amurami akararama kwamakore zana namakumi matatu namanomwe.) vanakomana vaizhari vaiva kora, nefegi nazikiri. vanakomana vauzieri vaiva mishaeri, erizafani nasitiri. aroni akawana erishebha mwanasikana waaminadhabhi nehanzvadzi yanashoni, uye akamuberekera nadhabhi naabhihu, ereazari naitamari. vanakomana vakora vaiva asiri, erikana naabhiasafu. idzi ndidzo dzaiva dzimba dzavakora. ereazari mwanakomana waaroni akawana mumwe wavanasikana vaputieri, uye akamuberekera finehazi. ava ndivo vakanga vari vakuru vemhuri dzavarevhi, mhuri nemhuri. ndivo vaya vanaaroni namozisi vakanzi nayeahoh, “budisai vaisraeri muijipiti namapoka avo.” ndivo vakataura kuna faro mambo weijipiti pamusoro pokubudisa vaisraeri kubva muijipiti. ndivo vamwe chetevo mozisi naaroni. zvino yeahoh paakataura namozisi muijipiti, akati kwaari, “ndini yeahoh. taurira faro mambo weijipiti zvose zvandinokuudza.” asi mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “sezvo ndichitaura nemiromo inokakama, faro angateerera kwandiri seiko?”

7

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi. “tarira, ndakuita saallah kuna faro, uye mukoma wako aroni achava muprofita wako. unofanira kutaura zvinhu zvose zvandinokurayira, uye mukoma wako aroni anofanira kuudza faro kuti arege vaisraeri vabude munyika yake. asi ndichaomesa mwoyo wafaro uye kunyange ndikawanza zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvangu muijipiti, haazombokuteereri. ipapo ndichaisa ruoko rwangu pamusoro peijipiti uye namabasa okutonga kukuru ndichabudisa hondo dzangu, ivo vanhu vangu vaisraeri. uye vaijipita vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh pandichatambanudza ruoko rwangu pamusoro peijipiti uye ndichabudisa vaisraeri kubva mairi.” mozisi naaroni vakaita sezvavakanga varayirwa nayeahoh. mozisi akanga ana makore makumi masere uye aroni makumi masere namatatu pavakataura kuna faro. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “faro paanoti kwamuri, ‘itai chiratidzo,’ ipapo uti kuna aroni, ‘tora tsvimbo yako uikande pasi pamberi pafaro,’ uye ichava nyoka.” saka mozisi naaroni vakaenda kuna faro vakandoita sezvavakarayirwa nayeahoh. aroni akakanda tsvimbo yake pasi pamberi pafaro namachinda ake, uye ikava nyoka. ipapo faro akadana varume vakachenjera navaroyi, uye nʼanga dzeijipiti dzakaitawo zvimwe chetezvo nouroyi hwadzo. mumwe nomumwe akakanda tsvimbo yake pasi uye ikava nyoka. asi tsvimbo yaaroni yakamedza tsvimbo dzavo. asi mwoyo wafaro wakava wakaoma uye haana kuvateerera, sezvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “mwoyo wafaro mukukutu; haabvumi kuti vanhu vaende. enda kuna faro mangwanani paanenge achienda kumvura. umire pamahombekombe anairi kuti ugosangana naye, uye ubate muruoko rwako tsvimbo iya yakashandurwa ikava nyoka. ipapo uti kwaari, ‘yeahoh, allah wavahebheru, andituma kuti ndizoti kwauri: rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuitira kuti vanondinamata murenje. asi kusvikira zvino hauna kunditeerera.’ zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh nechinhu ichi: ndicharova mvura yenairi netsvimbo iri muruoko rwangu uye ichashanduka ikava ropa. hove dziri muna nairi dzichafa, uye rwizi ruchanhuhwa; vaijipita havazokwanisi kunwa mvura yarwo.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira aroni uti, ‘tora tsvimbo yako uye utambanudze ruoko rwako pamusoro pemvura yeijipiti, pamusoro pehova pamusoro pemigero, pamusoro pamadziva uye napamusoro pamagawa,’ uye zvichashanduka zvikava ropa. ropa richava pose pose muijipiti, kunyange mukati memidziyo yemiti neyamabwe.” mozisi naaroni vakaita sezvavakarayirwa nayeahoh. akasimudza tsvimbo yake pamberi pafaro namachinda ake akarova mvura yenairi, mvura yose ikashanduka ikava ropa. hove dzaiva muna nairi dzakafa, uye rwizi rwakanhuhwa zvakaipa kwazvo zvokuti vaijipita havana kugona kunwa mvura yarwo. ropa rakanga riri pose pose muijipiti. asi nʼanga dzavaijipita dzakaita zvimwe chetezvo nouroyi hwadzo, mwoyo wafaro ukava mukukutu; haana kuda kuteerera mozisi naaroni, sezvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh. asi akadzokera mumuzinda wake, uye haana kunyange kuzviisa mumwoyo make. uye vaijipita vose vakachera mujinga manairi kuti vawane mvura yokunwa, nokuti vakanga vasingagoni kunwa mvura yomurwizi. mazuva manomwe akapfuura mushure mokunge yeahoh arova nairi.

8

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “enda kuna faro undoti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuti vanondinamata. kana ukaramba kuti vaende, ndichatambudza nyika yako yose namatatya. nairi ruchazara namatatya. achakwira agopinda mumuzinda wako nomuimba yako yokuvata uye napamubhedha wako, nomudzimba dzamachinda ako uye napavanhu vako uye nomuzvoto zvako nepokukanyira chingwa. matatya achakwira pamusoro pako napamusoro pavanhu vako napamusoro pamachinda ako ose.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira aroni uti, ‘tambanudza ruoko rwako pamwe chete netsvimbo yako pamusoro pehova napamusoro pemigero napamadziva, uye uite kuti matatya auye pamusoro penyika yeijipiti.’ ” saka aroni akatambanudzira ruoko rwake pamusoro pemvura yeijipiti, matatya akauya akafukidza nyika. asi nʼanga dzakaitawo zvimwe chetezvo nouroyi hwadzo; vakaitawo matatya kuti auye pamusoro penyika yeijipiti. faro akadana mozisi naaroni akati, “nyengeterai kuna yeahoh kuti abvise matatya aya kwandiri uye nokuvanhu vangu, uye ini ndichatendera vanhu venyu kuti vaende kundobayira zvipiriso kuna yeahoh.” mozisi akati kuna faro, “ndinopa ruremekedzo kwamuri kuti mureve nguva yokuti ndikunyengetererei imi navaranda venyu uye navanhu venyu kuti imi nedzimba dzenyu mubvisirwe matatya, kuti asare muna nairi chete.” faro akati, “mangwana.” mozisi akapindura akati, “zvichaitika sezvamareva, kuitira kuti mugoziva kuti hakuna mumwe akaita sayeahoh allah wedu. matatya achabva kwamuri nomudzimba dzenyu, kumachinda enyu nokuvanhu venyu; achasara muna nairi chete.” ipapo mozisi naaroni vakabva pana faro, mozisi akadana kuna yeahoh pamusoro pamatatya aakanga auyisa kuna faro. uye yeahoh akaita zvakanga zvakumbirwa namozisi. matatya akafa mudzimba, nomuruvazhe uye nomuminda. akaunganidzwa akaita mirwi uye nyika yakanhuhwa nokuda kwawo. asi faro akati aona kuti rusununguko rwakanga rwavapo, akaomesa mwoyo wake uye akasada kuteerera mozisi naaroni, sezvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira aroni uti, ‘tambanudza tsvimbo yako ugorova guruva revhu,’ uye munyika yose yeijipiti, guruva richava umhutu.” vakaita izvozvo uye aroni akati atambanudza ruoko rwaiva netsvimbo akarova guruva umhutu hukauya pamusoro pavanhu nezvipfuwo. guruva rose munyika yose yeijipiti rakava umhutu. asi nʼanga dzakakundikana, padzakaedza nouroyi hwadzo kubudisa umhutu. nʼanga dzakati kuna faro, “uyu munwe waallah.” asi mwoyo wafaro wakava mukukutu uye haana kuda kuteerera, sezvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “muka mangwanani-ngwanani undosangana nafaro paanenge achienda kumvura ugoti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuti vanondinamata. kana usingatenderi vanhu vangu kuti vaende, ndichatumira bute renhunzi pamusoro pako napamusoro pamachinda ako, napamusoro pavanhu vako uye nomudzimba dzenyu. dzimba dzavaijipita dzichazara nenhunzi, uye kunyange pavhu pavamire. “ ‘asi pazuva iroro ndichatsaura nyika yegosheni uko kunogara vanhu vangu; hakuna bute renhunzi richawanikwa ikoko kuitira kuti ugoziva kuti ini, yeahoh, ndiri munyika muno. ndichaita mutsauko pakati pavanhu vangu navanhu vako. chiratidzo ichi chichaitika mangwana.’ ” uye yeahoh akaita izvozvo. mabute enhunzi akapinda mumuzinda mafaro uye nomudzimba dzamachinda ake, uye muijipiti yose, nyika yakaparadzwa namabute enhunzi. ipapo faro akadana mozisi naaroni akati, “endai mundobayira kuna allah wenyu munyika muno.” asi mozisi akati, “hazvina kunaka kuita saizvozvo. zvipiriso zvatinoda kubayira kuna yeahoh allah wedu zvingazonyangadza vaijipita. uye kana tikapa zvibayiro zvinonyangadza pamberi pavo, havangazotitaki namabwe here? tinofanira kufamba rwendo rwamazuva matatu kuti tinobayira kuna yeahoh allah wedu murenje, sezvaakatirayira.” faro akati, “ndichakutenderai kuenda kunobayira zvipiriso kuna yeahoh allah wenyu murenje, asi hamufaniri kuenda kure kure. zvino chindinyengetererai.” mozisi akapindura akati, “ndichangobva pauri, ndichanonyengetera kuna yeahoh, uye mangwana nhunzi dzichabva pana faro namachinda ake uye napavanhu vake. ivai nechokwadi chete kuti faro haazonyengerizve achirambidza vanhu kuenda kundopa zvibayiro kuna yeahoh.” ipapo akabva pana faro akandonyengetera kuna yeahoh, uye yeahoh akaita zvaakakumbirwa namozisi. nhunzi dzakabva pana faro nokumachinda ake uye nokuvanhu vake; hakuna nhunzi yakasara. asi panguva inozve, faro akaomesa mwoyo wake uye akaramba kutendera vanhu kuti vaende.

9

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “enda kuna faro undoti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: allah wavahebheru: rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuti vanondinamata. kana uchiramba kuti vaende uye ukaramba uchivadzivisa, ruoko rwayeahoh ruchauyisa hosha yakaipa pakati pezvipfuwo zvako zviri muminda napamusoro pamabhiza ako nembongoro dzako nengamera napamusoro pemombe dzako uye napamusoro pamakwai nembudzi. asi yeahoh achaisa mutsauko pakati pezvipfuwo zveisraeri nezveijipiti, kuitira kuti parege kuva nezvipfuwo zvavaisraeri zvichafa.’ ” yeahoh akatsaura nguva uye akati, “mangwana yeahoh achaita izvi munyika.” uye chifumi chamangwana yeahoh akazviita: zvipfuwo zvose zvavaijipita zvakafa, asi hapana kana chipfuwo chimwe chete chavaisraeri chakafa. faro akatuma vanhu kundoferefeta uye akawana kuti pakanga pasina kunyange chipfuwo chimwe chete chavaisraeri chakanga chafa. asi mwoyo wake wakanga uri mukukutu saka haana kutendera vanhu kuenda. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “torai tsama dzamadota kubva pachoto mugoita kuti mozisi aakushe mumhepo pamberi pafaro. richava guruva rakatsetseka pamusoro penyika yose yeijipiti, uye mamota anoputika achamera pavanhu napazvipfuwo munyika yose.” saka vakatora madota pachoto vakandomira pamberi pafaro. mozisi akaakusha mumhepo, mamota anoputika akamera pamusoro pavanhu napamusoro pezvipfuwo. nʼanga hadzina kugona kumira pamberi pamozisi nokuda kwamamota akanga ari pavari uye napavaijipita vose. asi yeahoh akaomesa mwoyo wafaro uye haana kuda kuteerera kuna mozisi naaroni, zvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “muka mangwanani-ngwanani undosangana nafaro ugoti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh allah wavahebheru: rega vanhu vangu vaende, kuti vanondinamata, kana zvikasadaro nenguva ino ndichatuma matambudziko angu ose pamusoro pako napamusoro pavaranda vako uye napamusoro pavanhu vako, kuti ugoziva kuti hakuna mumwe akafanana neni munyika yose. nokuti iye zvino ndingadai ndakatambanudza ruoko rwangu ndikakurova iwe navanhu vako nehosha yaigona kukuparadzai panyika. asi ndakakumutsa nokuda kwechinangwa ichi, kuti ndikuratidze simba rangu uye kuti zita rangu riparidzwe munyika yose. iwe wakazvigadzirira kurwa navanhu vangu uye haudi kuvatendera kuti vaende. naizvozvo, nenguva ino mangwana ndichatuma chimvuramabwe chakaipisisa kwazvo chisina kumbovapo pamusoro peijipiti, kubva pazuva rayakavambwa kusvikira zvino. chirayira izvozvi kuti zvipfuwo zvako nezvose zviri musango zvipinde mumatanga, nokuti chimvuramabwe chichawira pamusoro pomunhu wose napamusoro pezvipfuwo zvisina kupfigirwa zvichiri musango, uye zvichafa.’ ” machinda afaro ayo akanga achitya shoko rayeahoh akakurumidza kupinza vatapwa vavo nezvipfuwo zvavo mukati. asi vaya vakazvidza shoko rayeahoh vakarega vatapwa vavo nezvipfuwo zviri musango. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tambanudzira ruoko rwako kudenga kuti chimvuramabwe chiwire pamusoro peijipiti yose, pamusoro pavanhu napamusoro pezvipfuwo napamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvinomera muminda yeijipiti.” mozisi akati atambanudzira tsvimbo yake kudenga, yeahoh akatuma kutinhira nechimvuramabwe, uye mheni yakapenya yakananga pasi. saka yeahoh akanayisa chimvuramabwe pamusoro penyika yeijipiti; chimvuramabwe chakawa uye mheni yakapenya mberi neshure. ndiro rakava dutu rakaipisisa kwazvo munyika yose yeijipiti, kubva panguva yavakatanga kuva rudzi. munyika yose yeijipiti, chimvuramabwe chakarova zvinhu zvose zvakanga zviri musango, zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo; chakarovera pasi zvose zvaimera musango ndokuparadza miti yose. nzvimbo yachisina kunaya chete inyika yegosheni, uko kwaiva navaisraeri. ipapo faro akadana mozisi naaroni akati, “nguva ino ndatadza. yeahoh ndiye akarurama asi ini navanhu vangu hatina kururama. nyengeterai kuna yeahoh, nokuti kutinhira nechimvuramabwe zvanyanya. ndichakutenderai kuti muende; hamuchafaniri kuramba mugerezve muno.” mozisi akapindura akati, “pandichabuda muguta, ndichatambanudza maoko angu ndichinyengetera kuna yeahoh. mutinhiro uchapera uye hakuchazovazve nechimvuramabwe, kuti ugoziva kuti nyika ndeyayeahoh. asi ndinoziva kuti iwe namachinda ako hamutyi yeahoh allah nazvino.” (miti yeshinda nebhari zvakanga zvaparadzwa, sezvo bhari rakanga rava nehura uye miti yava namaruva. kunyange zvakadaro gorosi nesipereti, hazvina kuparadzwa, nokuti zvakanga zvisati zvaibva.) ipapo mozisi akabva pana faro akabuda muguta. akatambanudzira maoko ake kuna yeahoh; kutinhira nechimvuramabwe zvakamira, uye mvura haina kuzonayazve panyika. faro akati aona kuti mvura nechimvuramabwe uye nokutinhira zvapera, akatadzazve: iye namachinda ake vakaomesa mwoyo yavo. saka mwoyo wafaro wakaoma uye akasada kutendera vaisraeri kuenda, sokutaura kwakanga kwaita yeahoh kubudikidza namozisi.

10

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “enda kuna faro nokuti ndaomesa mwoyo wake uye nemwoyo yamachinda ake kuitira kuti ndiite zviratidzo zvangu izvi pakati pavo, kuti mugoudza vana venyu navazukuru venyu marangiro akaoma andakaita vaijipita uye kuti ndakaita zviratidzo zvangu sei pakati pavo, uye kuti imi mugoziva kuti ndini yeahoh.” saka mozisi naaroni vakaenda kuna faro vakandoti kwaari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: allah wavahebheru, ‘uchasvika riniko uchiramba kuzvininipisa pamberi pangu? rega vanhu vangu vaende kuti vanondinamata. kana uchiramba kuvatendera kuenda, ini ndichauyisa mhashu munyika yako mangwana. dzichafukidza nyika yose zvokuti pasi hapangaonekwi. dzichadya zvishoma zvawakanga wasiyirwa shure kwechimvuramabwe, pamwe chete nemiti yose iri kumera muminda yako. dzichazadza dzimba dzako nedzamachinda ako nedzavaijipita vose, chinhu chisina kumboonekwa namadzibaba ako kana madzitateguru ako kubva pazuva ravakagara munyika ino kusvika zvino.’ ” ipapo mozisi akatendeuka akabva pana faro. machinda afaro akati kwaari, “munhu uyu acharamba ari musungo kwatiri kusvikira riniko? regai vanhu vaende, kuti vagonamata yeahoh allah wavo. ko, hamusi kuzviona here nazvino kuti ijipiti yaparara?” ipapo mozisi naaroni vakadzoswazve kuna faro. iye akati, “endai mundonamata yeahoh allah wenyu. asi vachaenda ndivanaaniko?” mozisi akapindura akati, “tichaenda navaduku vedu uye navakuru, pamwe chete navanakomana vedu navanasikana vedu, uye namakwai edu nemombe dzedu, nokuti tinofanira kuita mutambo wokupemberera yeahoh.” faro akati, “yeahoh ngaave nemi, kana ndikakutenderai kuenda, pamwe chete navakadzi navana venyu! zviri pachena kuti imi muri kuda kuita zvakaipa. kwete! varume chete ngavaende; vandonamata yeahoh, sezvo zviri izvo zvamanga muchikumbira.” ipapo mozisi naaroni vakadzingwa pamberi pafaro. uye yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tambanudza ruoko rwako pamusoro peijipiti kuitira kuti mhashu dzigoita bute pamusoro dzigodya zvose zvinomera muminda, zvose zvakasiyiwa nechimvuramabwe.” saka mozisi akatambanudza tsvimbo yake pamusoro peijipiti, uye yeahoh akaita kuti mhepo yokumabvazuva ivhuvhute munyika zuva rose nousiku hwose. mangwanani, mhepo yakanga yauyisa mhashu; dzakazadza ijipiti yose uye dzikamhara munzvimbo dzose dzenyika dzakawanda zvikuru. hakuna kutongova nedambudziko remhashu rakadai, uye harichazombovapozve. dzakafukidza pasi pose kusvikira pasviba kuti svi-i. dzakadya zvose zvakanga zvasara shure kwechimvuramabwe, zvinhu zvose zvaimera muminda uye michero yaiva pamiti. hakuna chakasvibirira chakasara mumiti kana zvirimwa zvomunyika yose yeijipiti. faro akakurumidza kudana mozisi naaroni akati, “ndatadzira yeahoh allah wenyu uye nemi. zvino ndiregerereizve chivi changu uye munyengetere kuna yeahoh allah wenyu kuti abvise kwandiri dambudziko rinouraya iri.” ipapo mozisi akabva pana faro akanyengetera kuna yeahoh. uye yeahoh akashandura mhepo ikava mhepo ine simba yokumavirira ikasimudza mhashu ikadzikanda mugungwa dzvuku. hapana mhashu yakasara papi zvapo muijipiti. asi yeahoh akaomesa mwoyo wafaro, uye akasatendera vaisraeri kuti vaende. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tambanudzira ruoko rwako kudenga kuti rima ripararire pamusoro peijipiti, rima rinonzwikwa.” saka mozisi akatambanudzira ruoko rwake kudenga, rima guru rikafukidza ijipiti yose kwamazuva matatu. hapana aigona kuona mumwe munhu papi zvapo kana kubva panzvimbo yake kwamazuva matatu. asi vaisraeri vainge vane chiedza munzvimbo dzavaigara. ipapo faro akadana mozisi akati, “endai mundonamata yeahoh. kunyange vakadzi venyu navana vangaenda havo nemi; musiye chete makwai enyu nemombe.” asi mozisi akati, “munofanira kutitendera kuti tive nezvibayiro uye nezvipiriso zvinopiswa kuti tipe kuna yeahoh allah wedu. zvipfuwo zvedu zvinofanira kuendawo nesu; hapana hwanda rinofanira kusara. tinofanira kuzvishandisa zvimwe zvacho mukunamata yeahoh allah wedu, uye kusvikira tasvikako hatingazivi zvatingashandisa kuti tinamate yeahoh.” asi yeahoh akaomesa mwoyo wafaro, saka haana kuda kuvatendera kuti vaende. faro akati kuna mozisi, “ibvai pano! chenjerai kuti murege kuzoonekwazve pamberi pangu! musi wamuchaona chiso changu muchafa.” mozisi akapindura akati, “sezvamareva, handichazoonekwazve pamberi penyu.”

11

zvino yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi, “ndichauyisa rimwezve dambudziko pamusoro pafaro napamusoro peijipiti. shure kwaizvozvo, achakutenderai kubva muno, uye paanozviita, achakudzingirai kunze zvachose. udza vanhu kuti varume navakadzi, pamwe chete, vakumbire vavakidzani vavo zvishongo zvesirivha nezvegoridhe.” yeahoh akaita kuti vanhu vawanirwe nyasha navaijipita, uye mozisi pachake akanga achikudzwa zvikuru muijipiti namachinda afaro uye navanhu. saka mozisi akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘pakati pousiku ndichafamba napakati peijipiti. mwanakomana wose wedangwe ari muijipiti achafa, kubva pamwanakomana wedangwe wafaro, iye agere pachigaro choushe, kusvikira kumwanakomana wedangwe womurandakadzi, ari paguyo rake, namatangwe ose emombewo. pachava nokuchema kukuru muijipiti yose, kwakadaro hakuna kumbovapo uye hakungavepozve. asi pakati pavaisraeri hapana kana imbwa ichahukura munhu zvake kana chipfuwo.’ ipapo uchaziva kuti yeahoh anoita mutsauko pakati peijipiti neisraeri. machinda ako ose aya achauya kwandiri, vachipfugama pamberi pangu vachiti, ‘chiendai, imi navanhu vose vanokuteverai!’ shure kwaizvozvo ndichaenda.” ipapo mozisi, atsamwa kwazvo, akabva pana faro. yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi, “faro acharamba kukuteerera, kuitira kuti zvishamiso zvangu zviwande muijipiti.” mozisi naaroni vakaita zvishamiso zvose izvi pamberi pafaro, asi yeahoh akaomesa mwoyo wafaro uye haana kuda kutendera vaisraeri kuti vabude munyika yake.

12

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni vari muijipiti, “mwedzi uno unofanira kuva mwedzi wokutanga kwamuri, mwedzi wokutanga wegore renyu. udzai ungano yose yeisraeri kuti pazuva regumi romwedzi uno, murume mumwe nomumwe anofanira kutorera mhuri yake gwayana, rimwe chete paimba imwe neimwe. kana imba ipi zvayo iri duku kwazvo pagwayana rose, vanofanira kugovana rimwe chete nomuvakidzani ari pedyo zvichienderana nouwandu hwavanhu varipo. munofanira kuona mugove unodikanwa maererano nezvingadyiwa nomunhu mumwe nomumwe. zvipfuwo zvamunosarudza zvinofanira kuva mikono yegore rimwe chete isina chainopomerwa, uye munogona kuzvitora kubva kumakwai kana kumbudzi. muzvichengete kusvikira pazuva regumi namana romwedzi, ipapo ungano yose yeisraeri inofanira kuzviuraya panguva yamadekwana. ipapo vanofanira kutora rimwe ropa vagoriisa pamagwatidziro maviri egonhi napazvivivo zvedzimba dzavanodyira makwayana vari. usiku ihwohwo vanofanira kudya nyama yakagochwa pamoto, pamwe chete nemiriwo inovava, nechingwa chisina mbiriso. musadya nyama iri mbishi kana yakabikwa mumvura, asi mugoche pamoto, musoro, makumbo uye nezvomukati. musasiya kana chimwe charo kusvikira mangwanani; kana zvimwe zvikasara kusvikira mangwanani, munofanira kuzvipisa. aya ndiwo madyiro amunoriita: majasi akasungwa nebhanhire, makapfeka shangu mutsoka dzenyu, uye tsvimbo dzenyu dziri mumaoko enyu. muridye nokukurumidza; ndiyo pasika yayeahoh. “nousiku ihwohwo ndichapfuura napakati peijipiti ndigorova matangwe ose, zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo, uye ndichatonga vamwari vose veijipiti. ndini yeahoh. ropa richava chiratidzo kwamuri mudzimba dzamunogara; uye ndikaona ropa, ndichapfuura pamuri. hapana hosha inoparadza ichakubatai pandicharova ijipiti. “iri ndiro zuva ramunofanira kurangarira; kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera mucharipemberera somutambo kuna yeahoh, mutemo wokusingaperi. kwamazuva manomwe, munofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso. pazuva rokutanga mubvise mbiriso mudzimba dzenyu, nokuti ani naani anodya chinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso mukati macho kubva pazuva rokutanga kusvikira pazuva rechinomwe anofanira kubviswa pakati pavaisraeri. pazuva rokutanga muite ungano tsvene, uye mugoitazve imwe ungano pazuva rechinomwe. musatomboshanda pamazuva iwayo, kunze bedzi kwokugadzira zvokudya zvokuti munhu wose adye, ndizvo chete zvamungaita. “mupemberere mutambo wezvingwa zvisina mbiriso, nokuti pazuva irori ndipo pandakabudisa mapoka enyu kubva muijipiti. mupemberere zuva irori uve mutemo wokusingaperi kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. mumwedzi wokutanga munofanira kudya chingwa chakabikwa chisina mbiriso, kubva pamadekwana ezuva regumi namana kusvikira madekwana ezuva ramakumi maviri nerimwe. kwamazuva manomwe, mbiriso ngairege kuwanikwa mudzimba dzenyu. uye ani naani anodya chinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso anofanira kubviswa pakati peungano yaisraeri, angava mutorwa kana akaberekerwa munyika imomo. musadya chinhu chakabikwa nembiriso. pose pamunogara, munofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso.” ipapo mozisi akadana vakuru vose veisraeri akati kwavari, “endai izvozvi mundosarudza zvipfuwo zvemhuri dzenyu mugouraya gwayana repasika. mutore sumbu rehisopi, murinyike muropa riri mumudziyo uye mugoisa rimwe ropa nechapamusoro pechivivo uye napamativi maviri amagwatidziro egonhi. parege kuva nomumwe wenyu anobuda pamukova weimba yake kusvikira mangwanani. yeahoh paanopinda napakati penyika kuti arove vaijipita, achaona ropa pamusoro pechivivo nomumativi amagwatidziro egonhi uye achapfuura pamikova yenyu, uye haangatenderi muparadzi kuti apinde mudzimba dzenyu kuti akurovei. “muteerere mirayiro iyi ive mitemo kwamuri nokuzvizvarwa zvenyu nokusingaperi. pamunopinda munyika yamuchapiwa nayeahoh sezvaakavimbisa, mucherechedze chirevo ichi. uye pamuchabvunzwa navana venyu vachiti, ‘zvinoreveiko izvi kwamuri?’ ipapo muvaudze kuti, ‘ndicho chibayiro chepasika yayeahoh, uyo akapfuura napadzimba dzavaisraeri muijipiti akaponesa dzimba dzedu paakarova vaijipita.’ ” ipapo vanhu vakapfugama vakanamata. vaisraeri vakaita sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi naaroni. pakati pousiku yeahoh akarova matangwe ose omuijipiti, kubva padangwe rafaro, iye aizogara pachigaro choushe, kusvika kudangwe romusungwa, akanga ari mutorongo, nedangwe rezvipfuwo zvosewo. faro namachinda ake ose uye navaijipita vose vakamuka usiku, uye kwakava nokuungudza kukuru muijipiti, nokuti kwakanga kusina imba isina munhu akanga afa. faro akadana mozisi naaroni usiku akati, “simukai, mubve pakati pavanhu vangu, imi navaisraeri! endai, mundonamata yeahoh sezvamakakumbira. mutore makwai enyu nemombe, sezvamakareva, mugoenda. uyewo mundiropafadze.” vaijipita vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vakurumidze kubva munyika. nokuti vakati, “zvimwe tingafa tose!” saka vanhu vakatora mukanyiwa wavo usati waiswa mbiriso, vakatakura pamapfudzi avo mumidziyo yokukanyira vakazviputira mumicheka. vaisraeri vakaita sezvavakarayirwa namozisi vakakumbira zvishongo zvesirivha, negoridhe uye nezvokupfeka. yeahoh akapa vanhu nyasha pamberi pavaijipita, uye vakavapa zvavakakumbira; saka vakapamba vaijipita. vaisraeri vakafamba kubva paramesesi kusvikira kusukoti. kwakanga kuna varume mazana matanhatu ezviuru vaifamba netsoka, pasingaverengwi vakadzi navana. vamwe vanhu vazhinji vakaendawo navo, pamwe chete namapoka makuru ezvipfuwo, zvose makwai nemombe. vakabika makeke ezvingwa zvisina mbiriso nomukanyiwa wavakabva nawo kuijipiti. mukanyiwa uyu wakanga usina mbiriso nokuti vakanga vadzingwa kubva muijipiti uye havana kuwana nguva yokuti vazvigadzirire zvokudya. zvino nguva yakagara vanhu veisraeri muijipiti yakanga iri makore mazana mana namakumi matatu. pakupera kwamakore mazana mana namakumi matatu, kusvikira pazuva racho iroro, ungano yose yavanhu vayeahoh yakabva muijipiti. usiku uhwo hunofanira kurangarirwa yeahoh, nokuti akavabudisa muijipiti nahwo. ndihwo usiku hwayeahoh, hunofanira kurangarirwa kwazvo navana vaisraeri vose namarudzi avo ose. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “iyi ndiyo mitemo yepasika: “mutorwa haafaniri kuidya. nhapwa ipi zvayo yawakatenga ingadya hayo mushure mokunge wamudzingisa, asi mueni uye nomunhu anoshandira mari haafaniri kuidya. “inofanira kudyirwa muimba imwe chete; musabuda neimwe nyama kunze kwemba. musavhuna kana bvupa. ungano yose yeisraeri inofanira kuipemberera. “mutorwa wose agere pakati penyu anoda kupemberera pasika yayeahoh anofanira kudzingisa varume vose vari mumba make; ipapo achadya hake somunhu akaberekerwa munyika imomo. murume asina kudzingiswa haafaniri kuidya. murayiro mumwe chete iwoyo unobata kuna vose vakaberekerwa munyika imomo nokumutorwa agere pakati penyu.” vaisraeri vose vakaita sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi naaroni. uye pazuva racho iroro yeahoh akabudisa vaisraeri kubva muijipiti namapoka avo.

13

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “nditsaurire matangwe echirume ose. chibereko chokutanga chechizvaro pakati pavaisraeri ndechangu, chingava chomunhu kana chechipfuwo.” ipapo mozisi akati kuvanhu, “rangarirai zuva iri, iro zuva ramakabuda muijipiti, munyika youtapwa, nokuti yeahoh akakubudisai mairi noruoko rune simba. musadya chinhu chine mbiriso. nhasi, mumwedzi waabhibhi muri kubuda. pamunosvitswa nayeahoh munyika yavakenani, vahiti, vaamori, vahivhi, navajebhusi, iyo nyika yaakapikira madzibaba enyu kuti vazokupai iyo, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi, munofanira kucherechedza chirevo ichi mumwedzi uno. kwamazuva manomwe munofanira kuitira yeahoh mutambo. mudye chingwa chisina mbiriso pamazuva manomwe iwayo; chinhu chine mbiriso hachifaniri kuonekwa pakati penyu, uye mbiriso zvayo haifaniri kuonekwa panzvimbo ipi zvayo pakati pemiganhu yenyu. pazuva iroro uudze mwanakomana wako kuti, ‘ndinoita izvi nokuda kwezvandakaitirwa nayeahoh pandakabuda muijipiti.’ mucherechedzo uyu uchava kwauri sechiratidzo paruoko rwako uye sechirangaridzo pahuma yako chokuti murayiro wayeahoh unofanira kuva pamiromo yako. nokuti yeahoh akakubudisa muijipiti noruoko rwake rune simba. unofanira kuchengeta mutemo uyu panguva dzakatarwa gore negore. “shure kwokunge yeahoh akusvitsa munyika yavakenani uye aipa kwauri, sezvaakavimbisa nemhiko kwauri nokumadzitateguru ako, unofanira kupa kuna yeahoh chibereko chokutanga chezvizvaro zvose. zvikono zvezvipfuwo zvako zvose zvinotanga kuzarura chibereko ndezvayeahoh. udzikinure negwayana mwana wose wokutanga wembongoro, asi kana usingaudzikinuri, uvhune mutsipa wawo. udzikinure matangwe ose pakati pavanakomana vako. “mumazuva anouya, paunenge uchibvunzwa nomwanakomana wako kuti, ‘zvinoreveiko izvi?’ uti kwaari, ‘noruoko rune simba yeahoh akatibudisa muijipiti, munyika youtapwa. faro paakasindimara achiramba kuti tiende, yeahoh akauraya matangwe ose omuijipiti, zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo. ndokusaka ndichibayira kuna yeahoh mukono wokutanga wechibereko chechizvaro chose uye ndichidzikinura dangwe rimwe nerimwe ravanakomana vangu.’ uye chichava chiratidzo paruoko rwako nerundanyara pahuma yako kuti yeahoh akatibudisa kubva muijipiti noruoko rune simba.” faro akati atendera vanhu kuti vaende, allah haana kuvatungamirira nenzira yaipinda nomunyika yavafiristia, kunyange zvazvo yakanga iri pfupi. nokuti allah akati, “kana vakasangana nehondo, vangashandura pfungwa dzavo vakadzokera kuijipiti.” saka allah akatungamirira vanhu vachipoterera nomumugwagwa womurenje vakananga kugungwa dzvuku. vaisraeri vakabuda kubva muijipiti vakapakata nhumbi dzehondo. mozisi akatora mapfupa ayosefa nokuti yosefa akanga aita kuti vanakomana vaisraeri vapike mhiko. akanga ati, “zvirokwazvo allah achakubatsirai, uye ipapo munofanira kutakura mapfupa angu kubva panzvimbo ino.” vakati vabva pasukoti vakadzika musasa paetamu pamucheto werenje. masikati yeahoh aivatungamirira neshongwe yegore kuti avatungamirire munzira yavo uye usiku aivatungamirira neshongwe yomoto kuti vavhenekerwe, kuti vafambe masikati kana usiku. shongwe yegore masikati kana shongwe yemoto usiku hazvina kubva panzvimbo yazvo pamberi pavanhu.

14
