ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira vaisraeri kuti vadzoke vagondodzika musasa pedyo nepi hahiroti, pakati pemigidhori negungwa. vanofanira kudzika misasa pedyo nepagungwa, pakatarisana nebhaari zefoni. faro achafunga kuti, ‘vaisraeri vari kungodzungaira nenyika vakanganisika, vadzimira murenje.’ uye ndichaomesa mwoyo wafaro, agovatevera. asi ini ndichazviwanira kukudzwa kubudikidza nafaro nehondo yake yose, uye vaijipita vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.” saka vaisraeri vakaita izvozvo. mambo weijipiti akati audzwa kuti vanhu vatiza, faro namachinda ake vakapindura pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pavo vakati, “ko, taitei? tarega vaisraeri vachienda uye havachatishandiri!” saka akaita kuti ngoro dzake dzigadzirwe uye akatora hondo yake akaenda nayo. akatora ngoro dzakanakisisa dzaisvika mazana matanhatu, pamwe chete nedzimwe ngoro dzeijipiti dzina vatariri vadzo dzose. yeahoh akaomesa mwoyo wafaro mambo weijipiti, kuti atevere vaisraeri, avo vakanga vachifamba vakashinga kwazvo. vaijipita, mabhiza ose afaro nengoro dzake, vatasvi vamabhiza namauto, vakatevera vaisraeri vakavabata pavakanga vadzika musasa pagungwa pedyo nepi hahiroti, pakatarisana nebhaari zefoni. faro paakanga osvika, vaisraeri vakasimudza meso avo, uye vakaona vaijipita vachifamba vachivatevera. vakavhunduka uye vakachema kuna yeahoh. vakati kuna mozisi, “zvinoreva kuti muijipiti makanga musina makuva here zvawatiuyisa kurenje kuti tife? chiiko chawaita kwatiri zvawatibudisa muijipiti? ko, tiri muijipiti hatina kuti, ‘tisiye takadaro; rega tishandire vaijipita here’? zvaiva nani kwatiri kuti tishandire vaijipita pano kuti tifire murenje!” mozisi akapindura vanhu akati, “musatya. mirai nesimba uye muchaona kusunungura kwayeahoh kwaachakuitirai nhasi. vaijipita vamunoona nhasi hamuchazovaonizve. yeahoh achakurwirai; imi ingonyararai bedzi.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “seiko uchidanidzira kwandiri? taurira vaisraeri kuti vapfuurire mberi. simudza tsvimbo yako ugotambanudzira ruoko rwako pamusoro pegungwa kuti mvura iparadzane kuitira kuti vaisraeri vapinde mugungwa napavhu rakaoma. ndichaomesa mwoyo yavaijipita zvokuti vachapinda vachivatevera. uye ndichawana kukudzwa kubudikidza nafaro nehondo yake yose, nengoro dzake uye navatasvi vake vamabhiza. vaijipita vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh pandichawana kukudzwa kubudikidza nafaro, ngoro dzake navatasvi vake vamabhiza.” ipapo mutumwa waallah, uyo akanga achifamba ari mberi kwehondo yavaisraeri, akadzokera shure kwavo. shongwe yegore yakabvawo mberi kwavo ikandomira shure kwavo, iri pakati pehondo dzeijipiti nedzeisraeri. usiku hwose gore rakauyisa rima kuno rumwe rutivi uye chiedza kuno rumwe rutivi; saka hakuna akaswedera kuno mumwe usiku hwose. ipapo mozisi akatambanudzira ruoko rwake pamusoro pegungwa, uye usiku hwose ihwohwo yeahoh akasunda gungwa nemhepo ine simba yokumabvazuva rikashanduka pakava nenyika yakaoma. mvura yakakamurana, uye vaisraeri vakapinda nomugungwa napavhu rakaoma uye madziro emvura ari kuruoko rworudyi nokuruboshwe kwavo. vaijipita vakavatevera, uye mabhiza ose afaro nengoro dzake navatasvi vamabhiza vakatevera mugungwa. panguva yamangwanani yeahoh akatarira pasi nomushongwe yomoto uye nomugore raiva kurutivi rwehondo yavaijipita, akainyonganisa. akaita kuti mavhiri engoro dzavo abve zvokuti zvakanga zvaoma kudzifambisa. uye vaijipita vakati, “ngatitizei kubva kuvaisraeri. yeahoh ari kuvarwira achirwa navaijipita.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tambanudzira ruoko rwako pamusoro pegungwa kuitira kuti mvura iyerere napamusoro pavaijipita napamusoro pengoro dzavo napamusoro pavatasvi vavo vamabhiza.” mozisi akatambanudzira ruoko rwake pamusoro pegungwa, uye kwaedza, gungwa rakadzokera panzvimbo yaro. vaijipita vakanga vachitizira kwariri, uye yeahoh akavakukurira mugungwa. mvura yakadzokera pakare ikafukidza ngoro navatasvi vamabhiza, hondo yose yafaro yakanga yatevera vaisraeri ikanyura mugungwa. hapana kana mumwe wavo akararama. asi vaisraeri vakapinda nomugungwa napavhu rakaoma uye madziro emvura ari kuruoko rwavo rworudyi nokuruboshwe. zuva iroro yeahoh akaponesa vaisraeri kubva mumaoko avaijipita, uye vaisraeri vakaona vaijipita vakanga vafa pamahombekombe. uye vaisraeri pavakaona simba guru rayeahoh richiratidzwa pamusoro pavaijipita, vanhu vakatya yeahoh uye vakatenda kwaari namozisi muranda wake.

15

ipapo mozisi navaisraeri vakaimba rwiyo urwu kuna yeahoh: “ndichaimbira yeahoh, nokuti iye anokudzwa zvikurukuru. bhiza nomutasvi waro akazvikanda mugungwa. “yeahoh ndiye simba rangu norwiyo rwangu; iye ava ruponeso rwangu. ndiye allah wangu, uye ndichamurumbidza, allah wababa vangu, uye ndichamukudza. yeahoh imhare; yeahoh ndiro zita rake. ngoro dzafaro nehondo yake akazvikanda mugungwa. machinda afaro akanakisisa akanyudzwa mugungwa dzvuku. mvura yakadzika yakavafukidza; vakanyura kwakadzika sedombo. “ruoko rwenyu rworudyi, imi yeahoh, rwakakudzwa nesimba. ruoko rwenyu rworudyi, imi yeahoh, rwakaparadza muvengi. “muukuru hwoumambo hwenyu makakanda pasi vaya vaikupikisai. makasunungura kutsamwa kwenyu kunopisa, kukavapisa sehundi. nokufema kwemhino dzenyu mvura zhinji yakaita murwi. mvura yamasaisai yakamira yakasimba semadziro; mvura yakadzika yakaungana mukati megungwa. “muvengi akazvikudza achiti, ‘ndichavatevera, ndichavabata. ndichagova zvakapambwa; ndichazvimbirwa navo. ndichavhomora munondo wangu uye ruoko rwangu ruchavaparadza.’ asi makafuridza nokufema kwenyu, gungwa rikavafukidza. vakanyura somutobvu mukati memvura ine simba. “ndianiko pakati pavamwari akaita semi, imi yeahoh? ndiani akaita semi, paumambo noutsvene, mukubwinya kunotyisa, anoita zvishamiso? makatambanudza ruoko rwenyu rworudyi, nyika ikavamedza. “murudo rwenyu rusingaperi muchatungamirira vanhu vamakadzikinura. musimba renyu imi muchavatungamirira kuugaro hwenyu hutsvene. ndudzi dzichazvinzwa uye dzichadedera; kurwadziwa kuchabata vanhu vokufiristia. madzishe eedhomu achavhundutswa, vatungamiri vemoabhu vachabatwa nokudedera, vanhu vekenani vachanyunguduka; kutya nokuvhunduka zvichavawira. nesimba roruoko rwenyu vachanyarara kunge dombo, kusvikira vanhu venyu vapfuura, imi yeahoh, kusvikira vanhu vamakatenga vapfuura. muchaenda navomo uye mugovasima pagomo renhaka yenyu, nzvimbo tsvene yakasimbiswa namaoko enyu, imi yeahoh. “yeahoh achatonga nokusingaperi-peri.” mabhiza afaro, ngoro navatasvi vamabhiza vakapinda mugungwa, yeahoh akauyisa mvura yomugungwa pamusoro pavo, asi vaisraeri vakafamba napakati pegungwa pavhu rakaoma. ipapo miriamu muprofitakadzi, hanzvadzi yaaroni, akatora tambureni muruoko rwake, uye vakadzi vose vakamutevera, vana matambureni uye vachitamba. miriamu akavaimbira akati: “imbirai yeahoh, nokuti anokudzwa zvikuru kuru. bhiza nomutasvi waro akazvikanda mugungwa.” ipapo mozisi akatungamirira vaisraeri kubva pagungwa dzvuku uye vakapinda murenje reshuri. vakafamba kwamazuva matatu murenje vachishayiwa mvura. vakati vasvika pamara, havana kugona kunwa mvura yacho nokuti yaivava. (ndokusaka nzvimbo yacho ichinzi mara.) saka vanhu vakapopotera mozisi vachiti, “tonweiko?” ipapo mozisi akachema kuna yeahoh, yeahoh akamuratidza chimuti. akachikanda mumvura, mvura ikanaka. yeahoh akavaitirapo mutemo nomurayiro, uye akavaedza ipapo. akati, “kana mukanyatsoteerera inzwi rayeahoh allah wenyu uye mukaita zvakarurama pamberi pake, kana mukarerekera nzeve dzenyu kumirayiro yake uye mukachengeta mitemo yose, haangauyisi pamusoro penyu zvirwere zvose zvandakauyisa pamusoro pavaijipita, nokuti ndini yeahoh anokuporesai.” ipapo vakasvika paerimu, paiva namatsime gumi namaviri uye nemiti yemichindwe makumi manomwe, uye vakadzika misasa ipapo pedyo nemvura.

16

ungano yose yavaisraeri yakasimuka kubva paerimu vakasvika kurenje resini, riri pakati peerimu nesinai, pazuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wechipiri shure kwokubuda kwavo muijipiti. murenje imomo ungano yose yavaisraeri yakapopotera mozisi naaroni. vaisraeri vakati kwavari, “dai takafa zvedu noruoko rwayeahoh tiri muijipiti! uko kwataikomba makate enyama uye tichidya zvokudya zvose zvataida, asi makatibudisa kurenje kuno kuti ungano ino yose iziye nenzara kusvikira pakufa.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ndichakunayisirai chingwa chichabva kudenga. vanhu vanofanira kubuda zuva rimwe nerimwe vagounganidza zvinoringana nezuva iroro. nenzira iyoyi ndichavaedza ndigoona kana vachitevera zvandinovarayira. pazuva rechitanhatu vanofanira kugadzira zvavanouya nazvo, uye zvinofanira kuva zviyero zviviri kupfuura zvavanosiunganidza pane mamwe mazuva.” saka mozisi naaroni vakati kuvaisraeri vose, “madekwana muchaziva kuti akanga ari yeahoh akakubudisai kubva muijipiti, uye mangwanani muchaona kubwinya kwayeahoh, nokuti akanzwa kugununʼuna kwenyu pamusoro pake. tisu vanaaniko, zvamunotipopotera?” mozisi akatiwo, “muchaziva kuti akanga ari yeahoh paachakupai nyama kuti mudye madekwana uye zvokudya zvose zvamunoda mangwanani nokuti akanzwa kugununʼuna kwenyu pamusoro pake. tisu vanaaniko? hamusi kupopotera isu, asi yeahoh.” ipapo mozisi akati kuna aroni, “udza ungano yose yaisraeri kuti, ‘uyai pamberi payeahoh, nokuti anzwa kupopota kwenyu.’ ” aroni achiri kutaura neungano yose yavaisraeri vakatarisa kurenje vakaona kubwinya kwayeahoh kuchiratidzwa mugore. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ndanzwa kupopota kwavaisraeri. vaudze kuti, ‘panguva yorubvunzavaeni muchadya nyama, uye mangwanani muchaguta nechingwa. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ” madekwana iwayo zvihuta zvakauya zvikafukidza musasa, uye mangwanani pakanga pane dova rakapoteredza musasa. dova rakati rapera, mahwendefa matete akanga akaita samazaya echando akaonekwa pasi murenje. vaisraeri vakati vazviona, vakati kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo, “chiiko ichi?” nokuti vakanga vasingazivi kuti chaiva chii. mozisi akati kwavari, “ndicho chingwa chamapiwa nayeahoh kuti mudye. izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh achiti, ‘mumwe nomumwe anofanira kuunganidza zvinomukwanira. utorere munhu mumwe nomumwe waunaye mutende rako omeri rimwe chete.’ ” vaisraeri vakaita sezvavakaudzwa; vamwe vakaunganidza zvakawanda, vamwe zvishoma. uye pavakayera neomeri, uya akaunganidza zvizhinji haana kusara nezvakawanda, uye uya akaunganidza zvishoma haana kusara nezvishoma. mumwe nomumwe akaunganidza zvaimukwanira. ipapo mozisi akati kwavari, “hakuna munhu anofanira kusara nezvimwe kusvikira mangwanani.” kunyange zvakadaro, vamwe vavo havana kuteerera kuna mozisi, vakachengeta zvimwe zvacho kusvikira mangwanani, asi zvakanga zvazara nehonye uye zvatanga kunhuhwa. saka mozisi akavatsamwira. mangwanani oga oga munhu mumwe nomumwe akaunganidza zvaimukwanira, uye zuva parakanga ropisa, zvakanyungudika. pazuva rechitanhatu, vakaunganidza zviyero zviviri, maomeri maviri pamunhu mumwe nomumwe, uye vatungamiri veungano vakauya vakazivisa izvi kuna mozisi. iye akati kwavari, “izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh: ‘mangwana izuva rokuzorora, sabata dzvene kuna yeahoh. saka bikai zvamunofanira kubika uye muvidze zvamunofanira kuvidza. chengetai zvose zvinenge zvasara, mugozvichengeta kusvikira mangwanani.’ ” saka vakazvichengeta kusvikira mangwanani, sezvavakarayirwa namozisi, uye hazvina kunhuhwa kana kuva namakonye mazviri. mozisi akati, “muzvidye iye nhasi, nokuti nhasi isabata kuna yeahoh. hamuzombowani chimwe chazvo pasi iye nhasi. muzviunganidze kwamazuva matanhatu, asi pazuva rechinomwe, isabata, hakuzombovi nechinhu.” kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, vamwe vanhu vakabuda kundounganidza nezuva rechinomwe, asi havana chavakawana. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “muchasvika riniko muchiramba kuchengeta mirayiro yangu nezvandakakurayirai? rangarirai kuti yeahoh akakupai sabata; ndokusaka pazuva rechitanhatu achikupai chingwa chamazuva maviri. munhu mumwe nomumwe anofanira kuramba agere paari ipapo pazuva rechinomwe; hakuna anobuda kunze.” saka vanhu vakazorora pazuva rechinomwe. vanhu veisraeri vakatumidza chingwa icho kuti mana. chakanga chakachena semhodzi yekorianda uye chainaka sechingwa chine uchi. mozisi akati, “izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh, ‘mutore omeri yemana mugoichengetera zvizvarwa zvinotevera, kuti vagoona chingwa chandakakupai kuti mudye muri murenje pandakakubudisai kubva munyika yeijipiti.’ ” saka mozisi akati kuna aroni, “tora mudziyo ugoisa omeri yemana imomo. ipapo ugozviisa pamberi payeahoh kuti zvichengeterwe zvizvarwa zvinotevera.” sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi, aroni akaisa mana pamberi pechipupuriro, kuti ichengetwepo. vaisraeri vakadya mana kwamakore makumi mana, kusvikira vasvika kunyika yaiva navanhu; vakadya mana kusvikira vasvika pamuganhu wekenani. (omeri ndiro chegumi cheefa.)

17

ungano yose yavaisraeri yakasimuka kubva parenje resini, vachifamba nzvimbo nenzvimbo sokurayira kwayeahoh. vakadzika musasa parefidhimu, asi pakanga pasina mvura yokuti vanhu vanwe. saka vanhu vakakakavadzana namozisi uye vakati, “tipe mvura tinwe.” mozisi akapindura akati, “seiko muchikakavadzana neni? seiko muchiedza yeahoh?” asi vanhu vakanga vane nyota yemvura ipapo, saka vakapopotedzana namozisi. vakati, “seiko wakatibudisa muijipiti kuti isu navana vedu nezvipfuwo zvedu tife nenyota?” ipapo mozisi akachema kuna yeahoh akati, “ndoiteiko navanhu ava? votoda kunditaka namabwe.” yeahoh akapindura mozisi akati, “famba pamberi pavanhu. tora vamwe vavakuru vavaisraeri uye ubate muruoko rwako tsvimbo yawakarova nayo mvura yenairi, ugoenda. ndichamira ipapo pamberi pako padombo riri pahorebhi. urove dombo, uye mvura ichabuda pariri, kuti vanhu vanwe.” saka mozisi akaita izvi pamberi pavakuru vavaisraeri. uye akatumidza nzvimbo iyi kuti masa nemeribha nokuti vaisraeri vakakavadzana naye uye nokuti vakaedza yeahoh vachiti, “ko, yeahoh ari pakati pedu here kana kuti kwete?” vaamareki vakauya vakarwa navaisraeri parefidhimu. mozisi akati kuna yeahoshua, “sarudza vamwe varume vokwedu ugobuda kundorwa navaamareki. mangwana ndichandomira pamusoro pechikomo ndine tsvimbo yaallah mumaoko angu.” saka yeahoshua akarwa navaamareki sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa namozisi, uye mozisi, aroni nahuri vakakwira pamusoro pechikomo. mozisi paainge akasimudza maoko ake, vaisraeri vaikunda, asi paaingoderedza maoko ake, vaamareki vaikunda. maoko amozisi akati aneta, vakatora dombo ndokuriisa pasi pake iye akagara pamusoro paro. aroni nahuri vakabata maoko ake vakamutsigira, mumwe kuno rumwe rutivi, mumwe kuno rumwe rutivi, kuitira kuti maoko ake arambe akatsiga kusvikira madekwana. saka yeahoshua akakunda hondo yavaamareki nomunondo. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “nyora izvi mubhuku chive chinhu chicharangarirwa uye uve nechokwadi kuti yeahoshua azvinzwa, nokuti ndichabvisa chirangaridzo chose cheamareki pasi pedenga.” mozisi akavaka aritari akaitumidza kuti “yeahoh ndiye mureza wangu.” akati, “nokuti maoko akasimudzirwa kumusoro kuchigaro choushe chayeahoh. yeahoh acharwa neamareki kubva kune chimwe chizvarwa kusvikira kune nechimwe chizvarwa.”

18

zvino jeturo, muprista wemidhiani uye ari tezvara wamozisi, akanzwa zvinhu zvose zvakaitirwa mozisi naallah uye nokuvanhu vake vaisraeri, uye kuti yeahoh akanga abudisa vaisraeri sei kubva muijipiti. shure kwokunge mozisi adzosera zipora mukadzi wake, tezvara wake jeturo akagamuchira zipora navanakomana vake vaviri. mumwe mwanakomana akatumidzwa kunzi gerishomi nokuti akati, “ndava mutorwa munyika yavamwe;” uye mumwe akatumidzwa kunzi eriezeri, nokuti akati, “allah wababa vangu akanga ari mubatsiri wangu; akandiponesa kubva pamunondo wafaro.” jeturo, tezvara wamozisi, pamwe chete navanakomana vamozisi nomukadzi wake, vakauya kwaari kurenje, kwaakanga akadzika musasa pedyo negomo raallah. jeturo akanga atumira shoko kwaari achiti, “ini, tezvara wako jeturo, ndiri kuuya kwauri nomukadzi wako navanakomana vako vaviri.” saka mozisi akabuda kundochingamidza tezvara vake uye akakotama pasi akamutsvoda. vakakwazisana ndokubva vapinda mutende. mozisi akataurira tezvara wake zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa nayeahoh kuna faro nokuvaijipita nokuda kwavaisraeri, uyewo nokutambudzika kwavakasangana nako munzira, uye kuti yeahoh akavaponesa sei. jeturo akafara kunzwa nezvezvinhu zvose zvakanaka zvakaitirwa vaisraeri nayeahoh, mukuvanunura kubva muruoko rwavaijipita. akati, “yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, iye akakununura kubva muruoko rwavaijipita norwafaro, uye iye akanunura vanhu kubva muruoko rwavaijipita. zvino ndava kuziva kuti yeahoh mukuru kupfuura vamwe vamwari vose, nokuti akaita izvi kuna avo vakabata vaisraeri nokuzvikudza.” ipapo jeturo, tezvara wamozisi, akauya nechipiriso chinopiswa nezvimwewo zvibayiro kuna allah, uye aroni akauya navakuru vose veisraeri kuti vazodya chingwa pamwe chete natezvara wamozisi pamberi paallah. fume mangwana, mozisi akagara pachigaro chake kuti ashande somutongi wavanhu, uye ivo vakamira vakamupoteredza kubva mangwanani kusvikira madekwana. tezvara wake akati aona zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa namozisi kuvanhu, akati, “chiiko ichi chauri kuitira vanhu? seiko iwe uchitonga uri woga, asi vanhu vose ava vamire vakakupoteredza kubva mangwanani kusvikira madekwana?” mozisi akamupindura akati, “nokuti vanhu vanouya kwandiri kuzotsvaka kuda kwaallah. pose pavanouya negakava vanouya kwandiri, uye ini ndotonga pakati pavo uye ndovazivisa mitemo nemirayiro yaallah.” tezvara wamozisi akapindura akati, “zvauri kuita hazvina kunaka. iwe navanhu ava vanouya kwauri muchangozvinetesa chete. basa iri rinorema kwazvo kwauri; haungagoni kuriita uri woga. nditeerere iye zvino ndigokupa zano, uye allah ngaave newe. unofanira kuva mumiririri wavanhu pamberi paallah uye ugouyisa magakava avo kwaari. uvadzidzise mitemo nemirayiro, ugovaratidza nzira yokurarama namabasa avanofanira kuita. asi sarudza varume vanokwanisa kubva pakati pavanhu vose, varume vanotya allah, varume vakatendeka vanovenga fufuro, ugovagadza samachinda pamusoro pezviuru, pamusoro pamazana, pamusoro pamakumi mashanu napamusoro pegumi. uvaite kuti vashande savatongi vavanhu panguva dzose, asi uvaite kuti vauye kwauri nenyaya dzose dzakaoma; nyaya dzakareruka ngavatonge ivo pachavo. izvozvo zvicharerutsa mutoro wako, nokuti vanenge vachigovana newe. kana uchiita izvi uye allah achikurayira, uchagona kutakura mutoro uyu, uye vanhu vose ava vachaenda kudzimba vagutsikana.” mozisi akateerera tezvara wake akaita zvinhu zvose zvaakareva. akasarudza varume vaikwanisa kubva pakati pavaisraeri vose akavaita vatungamiriri vavanhu, akavaita vabati vezviuru, vabati vamazana, vabati vamakumi mashanu, navabati vegumi. vakashanda savatongi vavanhu nguva dzose. mhaka dzakaoma ndidzo dzavakauya nadzo kuna mozisi, asi dzakareruka ndivo vaitonga ivo pachavo. ipapo mozisi akatendera tezvara vake kuti vaende havo, uye jeturo akadzokera kunyika yake.

19

mumwedzi wechitatu shure kwokunge vaisraeri vabva kuijipiti, pazuva racho iroro, vakasvika kurenje resinai. shure kwokusimuka kwavo kubva parefidhimu, vakapinda murenje resinai, uye vaisraeri vakadzika misasa imomo murenje pamberi pegomo. ipapo mozisi akakwira kuna allah, uye yeahoh akadana kwaari ari mugomo akati, “izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kutaura kuimba yayaqobho uye zvaunofanira kuudza vanhu veisraeri: ‘iwe pachako wakaona zvandakaita kuijipiti, uye kuti ndakakutakurai sei pamapapiro egondo ndikakusvitsai kwandiri. zvino kana muchinditeerera nomwoyo wose uye mukachengeta sungano yangu, ipapo muchava pfuma yangu chaiyo pakati pendudzi dzose. kunyange hazvo nyika yose iri yangu, muchava kwandiri umambo hwavaprista uye rudzi rutsvene.’ aya ndiwo mashoko aunofanira kutaura kuvaisraeri.” saka mozisi akadzokera akadana vakuru vavanhu akaisa pamberi pavo mashoko ose aakanga arayirwa nayeahoh kuti ataure. vanhu vose vakapindura pamwe chete vachiti, “tichaita zvose zvakarehwa nayeahoh.” saka mozisi akadzosera mhinduro yavo kuna yeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ndiri kuzouya kwauri ndiri mugore gobvu, kuitira kuti vanhu vagondinzwa ndichitaura newe vagoramba vachivimba newe.” ipapo mozisi akaudza yeahoh zvakanga zvarehwa navanhu. uye yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “enda kuvanhu undovanatsa nhasi namangwana. uite kuti vawache nguo dzavo uye vange vagadzirira nezuva rechitatu, nokuti pazuva iroro yeahoh achaburuka pagomo resinai pamberi pavanhu vose. uisire vanhu miganhu yakapoteredza gomo ugovaudza kuti, ‘chenjerai kuti murege kukwira mugomo kana kubata mujinga maro. ani naani achabata gomo achaurayiwa, zvirokwazvo. zvirokwazvo achatakwa namabwe kana kubayiwa nemiseve; hakuna ruoko ruchamubata. angava munhu kana chipfuwo, haangatenderwi kurarama.’ vangakwira havo kugomo kana bedzi hwamanda yorunyanga rwegondobwe yaramba ichirira.” shure kwokuburuka kwamozisi mugomo achienda kuvanhu, akavanatsa, uye ivo vakashambidza nguo dzavo. ipapo akati kuvanhu, “zvigadzirirei nezvezuva rechitatu. murege kurara navakadzi venyu.” panguva yamangwanani yezuva rechitatu pakava nokutinhira uye nemheni, negore gobvu rakafukidza gomo, uye kurira kukuru kwehwamanda. munhu wose aiva mumisasa akadedera. ipapo mozisi akatungamirira vanhu vachibuda mumisasa kuti vandosangana naallah, uye vakandomira mujinga megomo. gomo resinai rakanga rakafukidzwa noutsi, nokuti yeahoh akanga aburukira pamusoro paro ari mumoto. utsi hwakapfungaira huchikwira kumusoro soutsi hwakanga huchibva pavira romoto, gomo rose rakazungunuka nesimba guru, uye inzwi rehwamanda rakanyanya kurira nokurira kukuru. ipapo mozisi akataura uye inzwi raallah rikamupindura. yeahoh akaburukira pamusoro pegomo resinai uye akadana mozisi kuti auye pamusoro pegomo. saka mozisi akakwirako uye yeahoh akati kwaari, “buruka unoyambira vanhu kuti varege kumanikidzira kupinda kuti vandoona yeahoh vazhinji vavo vakazofa. kunyange vaprista, vanoswedera kuna yeahoh, vanofanira kuzvinatsa, kuti yeahoh arege kuvaparadza.” mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “vanhu havangakwiri mugomo resinai, nokuti imi pachenyu makatiyambira mukati, ‘isai miganhu yakapoteredza gomo uye muritsaure kuti rive dzvene.’ ” yeahoh akapindura akati, “buruka undotora aroni ukwire naye kuno. asi vaprista navanhu havafaniri kumanikidzira kusvika kuno kuna yeahoh, nokuti angavaparadza.” saka mozisi akaburuka akaenda kuvanhu akandovaudza.

20

uye allah akataura mashoko aya ose akati: “ndini yeahoh allah wako, akakubudisa kubva muijipiti, munyika youranda. “usava navamwe vamwari kunze kwangu. usazviitira mufananidzo wechinhu chipi zvacho chiri kudenga kumusoro kana wechiri panyika pasi kana wechiri mumvura. usazvipfugamira kana kuzvinamata, nokuti ini yeahoh allah wako, ndiri allah ane godo, ndinoranga vana nokuda kwechivi chamadzibaba kusvikira kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina cheavo vanondivenga, asi ndicharatidza rudo kuzvizvarwa zvine chiuru, avo vanondida uye vanochengeta mirayiro yangu. usareva zita rayeahoh allah wako pasina nokuti yeahoh haazoregi kupa mhosva munhu upi zvake anoreva zita rake pasina. rangarira zuva resabata kuti urichengete riri dzvene. uchashanda mazuva matanhatu nokuita basa rako rose, asi zuva rechinomwe isabata kuna yeahoh allah wako. pazuva iroro hamufaniri kuita basa ripi zvaro, iwe kana mwanakomana wako, kana mwanasikana wako, murandarume wako kana murandakadzi wako, uye zvipfuwo zvako kana mutorwa ari mukati mamasuo ako. nokuti mumazuva matanhatu yeahoh akaita matenga nenyika, gungwa, nezvose zviri mariri, asi akazorora nomusi wechinomwe. naizvozvo yeahoh akaropafadza zuva resabata akariita dzvene. kudza baba vako namai vako, kuti ugorarama mazuva mazhinji munyika yaunopiwa nayeahoh allah wako. usauraya. usaita upombwe. usaba. usapupurira muvakidzani wako nhema. usachiva imba yomuvakidzani wako. usachiva mukadzi womuvakidzani wako, kana murandarume wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana nzombe yake, kana mbongoro yake, kana chinhu chipi zvacho chomuvakidzani wako.” vanhu vakati vaona mheni nokutinhira uye vanzwa hwamanda, uye vaona gomo richipfungaira utsi, vakadedera nokutya. vakagara vari chinhambwe vakati kuna mozisi, “taura iwe kwatiri uye tichakuteerera. asi usarega allah achitaura nesu, kuti tirege kufa.” mozisi akati kuvanhu, “musatya. allah auya kuzokuedzai, kuitira kuti kutya allah kugova nemi, kuti murege kutadza.” vanhu vakaramba vari chinhambwe, mozisi paakanga achiswedera kurima gobvu kwakanga kuna allah. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira vaisraeri kuti, ‘mazvionera pachenyu kuti ndataura kwamuri ndiri kudenga ndikati: musaita vamwari vapi zvavo kunze kwangu; musazviitira vamwari vesirivha kana vamwari vegoridhe. “ ‘mundiitire aritari yevhu mugobayira pamusoro payo zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye zvipiriso zvokuwadzana, makwai enyu, mbudzi dzenyu nemombe dzenyu. pose pandichaita kuti zita rangu rikudzwe, ndichauya kwamuri ndigokuropafadzai. kana muchindiitira aritari yamabwe, musaivaka namabwe akavezwa, nokuti mungazoisvibisa kana mukashandisa mbezo pairi. uye musakwira kuaritari yangu namatanho, kuti kusasimira kwenyu kurege kuonekwa muri pairi.’

21

“iyi ndiyo mirayiro yaunofanira kumisa pamberi pavo: “kana ukatenga muranda wechihebheru, anofanira kukushandira kwamakore matanhatu. asi mugore rechinomwe, anofanira kusunungurwa aende, asina chinhu chaanoripa. kana akauya ari oga, anofanira kusunungurwa aende ari oga; asi kana ano mukadzi pakuuya kwake, anofanira kuenda nomukadzi wake. kana tenzi wake akamupa mukadzi uye akamuberekera vanakomana kana vanasikana, mukadzi navana vake vachava vatenzi wake, uye murume chete ndiye achasunungurwa kuti aende hake. “asi muranda akati, ‘ndinoda tenzi wangu, mukadzi wangu navana vangu asi handisi kuda kusunungurwa,’ ipapo tenzi wake anofanira kuenda naye pamberi pavatongi. achaenda naye pamukova kana pagwatidziro romukova agomuboora nzeve yake norunji. ipapo achava muranda wake kwoupenyu hwake hwose. “kana munhu akatengesa mwanasikana wake kuti ave murandakadzi, iyeye haafaniri kusunungurwa kuti aende sezvinoita varandarume. kana asingafadzi tenzi akamusarudza kuti ave wake, anofanira kumurega kuti adzikinurwe. haana mvumo yokumutengesa kuvatorwa, nokuti aputsa chitenderano naye. kana akamusarudzira mwanakomana wake, anofanira kumupa kodzero dzomwanasikana. kana akawana mumwe mukadzi, haafaniri kunyima mukadzi wokutanga zvokudya, nguo kana kodzero dzake dzokuwanikwa. kana asingamupi zvinhu zvitatu izvi, anofanira kuenda akasununguka pasina kana mari yaanoripa. “ani naani anorova munhu uye akamuuraya, zvirokwazvo naiye achaurayiwa. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, kana asingazviiti nobwoni, asi allah atendera kuti zviitike, iye anofanira kutizira kunzvimbo yandichatsaura. asi kana munhu akaronga uye akauraya mumwe munhu nobwoni, mumubvise paaritari yangu uye mumuuraye. “ani naani anorova baba vake kana mai vake anofanira kuurayiwa. “ani naani anoba mumwe munhu uye akamutengesa kana kuti akawanikwa achinaye paanenge abatwa, anofanira kuurayiwa. “ani naani anotuka baba vake kana mai vake anofanira kuurayiwa. “kana vanhu vakakakavadzana uye mumwe akarova mumwe nebwe kana nechibhakera chake uye akasafa asi akavata panhoo, munhu arova haazobatwi nemhosva kana mumwe wacho akamuka akafamba-famba kunze nomudonzvo wake; kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, anofanira kuripa munhu akakuvara nokuda kwokurasikirwa kwake nenguva yake uye aone kuti apora zvachose. “kana munhu akarova murandarume wake kana murandakadzi netsvimbo uye muranda akafa nokuda kwokurohwa, anofanira kurangwa, asi haafaniri kurangwa kana muranda akamuka shure kwezuva rimwe chete kana maviri, sezvo muranda ari mudziyo wake. “kana varume vachirwa vakarova mukadzi ane mimba uye akabereka gavamwedzi asi asina kukuvara zvakanyanya, nyakupara mhosva anofanira kuripiswa zvose zvazvo zvinodiwa nomurume wacho uye zvinobvumirwa nedare remhosva. asi kana pane kukuvara kwakaipisisa, unofanira kutora upenyu noupenyu, ziso neziso, zino nezino, ruoko noruoko, tsoka netsoka, kutsva nokutsva, ronda neronda, vanga nevanga. “kana munhu akarova murandarume kana murandakadzi paziso uye akariparadza, anofanira kurega muranda achienda akasununguka kuti atsive ziso rake. uye kana akabvisa zino romurandarume kana romurandakadzi, anofanira kurega muranda aende akasununguka kuti atsive zino rake. “kana hando ikatunga murume kana mukadzi akafa, hando iyoyo inofanira kutakwa namabwe kusvika yafa, uye nyama yayo haifaniri kudyiwa. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, kana hando yanga ine tsika yokutunga uye muridzi wayo akamboyambirwa hake asi akasaipfigira mudanga uye ikauraya murume kana mukadzi, hando iyo inofanira kutakwa namabwe uyewo muridzi wayo anofanira kuurayiwa. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, kana pachidikanwa muripo unobva kwaari angadzikinura hake upenyu hwake nokuripa zvose zvazvo zvinodikanwa. murayiro uyu unobatawo kana hando iyi yatunga mwanakomana kana mwanasikana. kana hando ikatunga murandarume kana murandakadzi, muridzi wayo anofanira kuripa mashekeri esirivha makumi matatu kuna tenzi womuranda, uye hando inofanira kutakwa namabwe. “kana munhu akafukunura gomba kana kuchera rimwe gomba uye akarega kurifushira uye nzombe kana mbongoro ikawira mariri, muridzi wegomba anofanira kuripa kurasikirwa uku; anofanira kuripira muridzi wayo, uye chipfuwo chafa chichava chake. “kana hando yomumwe munhu ikakuvadza hando yomumwe uye ikafa, vanofanira kutengesa mhenyu yacho vagogovana zvakaenzana mari yacho vari vaviri, uye nemombe yakafawo. kunyange zvakadaro, kana zvakanga zvichizivikanwa kuti hando iyi yagara ine tsika yokutunga, asi muridzi akasaipfigira mudanga, muridzi anofanira kuripa chipfuwo nechipfuwo, uye chipfuwo chafa chichava chake.

22

“kana munhu akaba nzombe kana gwai uye akauraya kana kutengesa anofanira kuripa mombe shanu nokuda kwenzombe uye makwai mana pagwai rimwe chete. “kana mbavha ikabatwa ichipaza uye ikarohwa ikafa, nyakudzivirira haana mhosva yokuteura ropa; asi kana zvikaitika shure kwokubuda kwezuva, anenge ane mhosva yokuteura ropa. “mbavha inofanira kudzora zvayaba, asi kana isina chinhu, inofanira kutongeswa kuti iripe umbavha hwayo. “kana chipfuwo chakabiwa chikawanikwa chichiri chipenyu muruoko rwake, ingava nzombe kana mbongoro kana gwai, iye anofanira kuripa zvava zviviri. “kana munhu akafudza zvipfuwo zvake mumunda kana mumunda womuzambiringa uye akarega zvipfuwo zvake zvichidya mumunda womunhu, anofanira kudzorera zvakaisvonaka zvinobva mumunda wake kana mumunda wake womuzambiringa. “kana moto ukapfuta uye ukapararira muzvikwenzi zveminzwa zvokuti unopisa mirwi yezviyo kana zviyo zvimire, kana munda wose, munhu abatidza moto anofanira kudzorera nomuripo. “kana munhu akapa muvakidzani wake sirivha kana zvinhu kuti achengete zvichibva zvabiwa kubva mumba momuvakidzani, mbavha yacho, kana ikabatwa, inofanira kuripa zvakapetwa kaviri. asi kana mbavha isina kuwanikwa, muridzi wemba anofanira kumira pamberi pavatongi kuti zvionekwe kana akaisa ruoko rwake pazvinhu zvomumwe munhu. panyaya dzose dzokuchengeta zvisiri pamutemo, nzombe, mbongoro, gwai, nguo kana chimwewo zvacho chakarasika chinonzi nomumwe munhu, ‘ndechangu ichi’, vaviri ava vanofanira kuuya nenyaya dzavo pamberi pavatongi. munhu uyo achanzi ane mhosva navatongi anofanira kuripira muvakidzani wake zvakapetwa kaviri. “kana munhu akapa mbongoro, nzombe, gwai kana chipfuwo chipi zvacho kumuvakidzani wake kuti achengete chichibva chafa kana kukuvara kana kutorwa pasina anozviona, nyaya iri pakati pavo inofanira kugadziriswa nokuita mhiko pamberi payeahoh yokuti muvakidzani haana kuisa maoko ake pazvinhu zvomumwe munhu. muridzi anofanira kugamuchira izvi, uye hapana muripo unodikanwa apa. asi kana chipfuwo chakabiwa kubva kumuvakidzani, iye anofanira kudzorera kumuridzi nomuripo. kana chakabvarurwa-bvarurwa nechikara chesango, iye achauyisa zvakasara zvacho zvive umboo uye haazosungirwi kuripa chipfuwo chakabvamburwa. “kana munhu akakwereta chipfuwo kubva kumuvakidzani wake uye chikakuvara kana kufa, muridzi wacho asipo, anofanira kuripa. asi kana muridzi ane chipfuwo chacho, akwereta haafaniri kuzoripa. kana chipfuwo ichi changa chichiripirwa mari yokuchishandisa, mari yakaripwa yacho ndiyo inozozadzisa kurasikirwa kwake. “kana murume akanyengera musikana anenge ari mhandara asina kutsidzira kuti awanikwe uye akavata naye, iye anofanira kubvisa roora, uye achava mukadzi wake. kana baba vake vasingadi zvachose kuti vamupe kwaari, anofanira bedzi kubvisa roora rinobvisirwa mhandara. “usatendera muroyikadzi kuti ararame. “ani naani anoita chipfuwo mukadzi anofanira kuurayiwa. “ani naani anobayira kuna mwari upi zvake kunze kwangu anofanira kuparadzwa. “usabata mutorwa zvakaipa kana kumudzvinyirira, nokuti imi makanga muri vatorwa muijipiti. “musaitira zvakaipa chirikadzi nenherera. kana mukaita izvozvo uye ivo vakachema kwandiri, zvirokwazvo ndichanzwa kuchema kwavo. kutsamwa kwangu kuchamuka, uye ndichakuurayai nomunondo; vakadzi venyu vachava chirikadzi uye vana venyu vachava nherera. “kana mukakweretesa mari kuno mumwe wavanhu vangu vari pakati penyu vanoshaya, musaita somunhu webasa rokukweretesa; musamuripisa yava nemhindu. kana ukatora jasi romuvakidzani wako sechitsidzo, uridzorere kwaari zuva rodoka, nokuti jasi rake ndicho chifukidzo bedzi chaanacho chomuviri wake. achavata akafukeiko? paanochema kwandiri, ini ndichanzwa, nokuti ndine tsitsi. “usamhura allah kana kutuka mutongi wavanhu vako. “usarega kupa zvipiriso zvinobva mumatura ako kana muzvisviniro zvako. “unofanira kundipa dangwe ravanakomana vako. muite zvimwe chetezvo kumombe dzenyu nokumakwai enyu. murege zvigare mazuva manomwe navanamai vazvo, asi muzvipe kwandiri pazuva rorusere. “munofanira kuva vanhu vangu vatsvene. saka musadya nyama yechipfuwo chakabvamburwa nezvikara zvesango, muikandire kumbwa.

23

“usaparadzira mashoko enhema. usabatsira munhu akaipa nokuva chapupu chakaipa. “usatevedzera vanhu vazhinji pakuita zvakaipa. paunopa umboo mudare redzimhosva, usaminamisa kururamisira uchienda kurutivi rworuzhinji, uye usatsaura munhu murombo uchienda kudivi rake pamhaka yake. “kana ukaona nzombe yomuvengi wako kana mbongoro yake yarasika, ona kuti waidzosera kwaari. kana ukaona mbongoro yomunhu anokuvenga yawira pasi nokuda kwokuremerwa, usaisiya ipapo; iva nechokwadi kuti wamubatsira pairi. “usaramba kururamisira varombo vavanhu vokwako pamatare edzimhosva. usava nechokuita nokupomerwa kwemhosva yenhema uye usatongera rufu munhu asina mhosva, kana munhu akatendeka, nokuti ini handizopembedzi munhu ane mhosva. “usagamuchira fufuro, nokuti fufuro inopofumadza vaya vanoona uye inomonyorora mashoko owakarurama. “musadzvinyirira mutorwa; imi pachenyu munoziva kuti zvakaita sei kuva mutorwa, nokuti makanga muri vatorwa muijipiti. “makore matanhatu munofanira kudyara minda yenyu mugokohwa zvirimwa, asi pagore rechinomwe nyika ngairege kurimwa kana kushandiswa. ipapo varombo vari pakati pavanhu venyu vangawanawo zvokudya kubva mairi, uye zvikara zvesango zvigodya zvavanenge vasiya. muitewo zvimwe chetezvo kuminda yenyu yemizambiringa neyemiorivhi. “muite basa renyu mazuva matanhatu, asi pazuva rechinomwe musashanda, kuitira kuti nzombe yako nembongoro yako zvizorore uye nhapwa yakaberekerwa mumba mako, nomutorwa, vazororewo. “muchenjerere kuti muite zvose zvandakareva kwamuri. musareva mazita avamwe vamwari; ngaarege kunzwikwa pamiromo yenyu. “katatu pagore munofanira kupemberera mutambo kwandiri. “mupemberere mutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso; mazuva manomwe, munofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso, sezvandakakurayirai. muite izvi panguva dzakatarwa mumwedzi waabhibhi, nokuti mumwedzi iwoyo ndipo pamakabuda kubva muijipiti. “hakuna munhu anofanira kumira pamberi pangu asina chinhu. “mupemberere mutambo wokukohwa nezvibereko zvokutanga zvezvirimwa zvamakadyara muminda yenyu. “mupemberere mutambo wokuunganidza pakupera kwegore, pamunounganidza zvirimwa zvenyu kubva mumunda. “varume vose vanofanira kumira pamberi paishe yeahoh katatu pagore. “musapa ropa rechibayiro kwandiri pamwe chete nechinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso. “mafuta ezvipiriso zvangu zvomutambo haafaniri kuchengetwa kusvikira mangwana mangwanani. “muuye nezvakanakisisa zvezvibereko zvokutanga zvevhu renyu kuimba yayeahoh allah wenyu. “musabika mbudzana mumukaka wamai vayo. “tarirai, ndiri kutumira mutumwa pamberi penyu kuti akuchengetei munzira uye kuti akusvitsei kunzvimbo yandakakugadzirirai. murerekere nzeve dzenyu kwaari mugoteerera zvaanoreva. musamumukira; iye haangazoregereri kumukira kwenyu, sezvo zita rangu riri maari. kana mukanyatsoteerera kune zvaanoreva nokuita zvose zvandinoreva, ini ndichava muvengi kuvavengi venyu uye ndichapikisa avo vanokupikisai. mutumwa wangu achakutungamirirai uye achakupinzai munyika yavaamori, vahiti, vaperezi, vakenani, vahivhi navajebhusi, uye ndichavapedza chose. musapfugamira vamwari vavo kana kuvanamata kana kuwadzana namabasa avo. munofanira kuvaparadza uye mugoputsa matombo avo anoyera. namatai yeahoh allah wenyu, uye ipapo maropafadzo ake achava pane zvokudya zvenyu nemvura yenyu. ndichabvisa urwere kubva pakati penyu, uye hakuna achabva pamuviri kana asingabereki munyika yenyu. ndichakupai upenyu huzere. “ndichatuma kuvhundutsa kwangu pamberi penyu uye ndichauyisa nyonganiso pamusoro pendudzi dzose dzamunosangana nadzo. ndichaita kuti vavengi venyu vose vatendeuke vagotiza. ndichatuma mago pamberi penyu kuti adzinge vahivhi, vakenani navahiti kuti vabve munzira yenyu. asi handizovadzingi mugore rimwe chete, nokuti nyika ingazoita sango uye mhuka dzesango dzikakuwandirai. ndichavabvisa pamberi penyu zvishoma zvishoma, kusvikira manyatsowanda kuti mutore nyika. “ndichasimbisa miganhu yenyu kubva kugungwa dzvuku kusvikira kugungwa ravafiristia, uye kubva kurenje kusvikira kurwizi. ndichaisa mumaoko enyu vanhu vagere munyika iyi uye imi muchavadzinga pamberi penyu. musaita sungano navo kana navamwari vavo. musavatendera kuti vagare munyika yenyu kuti varege kukuitai kuti munditadzire, nokuti kunamata vamwari vavo kuchava musungo kwamuri zvirokwazvo.”

24

ipapo akati kuna mozisi, “kwira kuna yeahoh, iwe naaroni, nadhabhi naabhihu, navakuru vavaisraeri makumi manomwe. munamate muri chinhambwe, asi mozisi oga ndiye anofanira kuswedera kuna yeahoh; vamwe havafaniri kuswedera pedyo. uye vanhu havangakwiri naye.” mozisi akati aenda kundoudza vanhu mashoko ose nemirayiro yose yayeahoh, ivo vakati nenzwi rimwe chete, “tichaita zvinhu zvose zvakarehwa nayeahoh.” ipapo mozisi akanyora zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh. akamuka mangwana acho mangwanani akavaka aritari mujinga megomo uye akamisa mbiru dzamabwe gumi nembiri dzichimirira marudzi gumi namaviri avaisraeri. ipapo akatuma majaya avaisraeri, uye vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye vakabayira hando duku sezvipiriso zvokuwadzana kuna yeahoh. mozisi akatora hafu yeropa akariisa mumidziyo, uye imwe hafu akaisasa paaritari. ipapo akatora bhuku resungano akariverengera vanhu. ivo vakati, “tichaita zvinhu zvose zvakarehwa nayeahoh; tichazviteerera.” ipapo mozisi akatora ropa, akarisasa pamusoro pavanhu uye akati, “iri iropa resungano yaitwa nayeahoh nemi maererano namashoko aya ose.” mozisi naaroni, nadhabhi naabhihu uye navakuru makumi manomwe vavaisraeri vakakwira uye vakaona allah waisraeri. pasi petsoka dzake pakanga pane chimwe chinhu chakaita sechivakwa chesafire, chakanga chichionekwa sedenga pacharo. asi allah haana kusimudza ruoko rwake pamusoro pavatungamiri vavaisraeri ava; vakaona allah, uye vakadya vakanwa. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “kwira kuno kwandiri pamusoro pegomo ugare pano, ndigokupa mahwendefa amabwe, ane mirayiro nemitemo zvandanyora kuti varayirwe.” ipapo mozisi akasimuka nayeahoshua mubatsiri wake, uye mozisi akakwira mugomo raallah. akati kuvakuru, “timirirei pano kusvikira tadzoka kwamuri. aroni nahuri vanemi, uye ani naani zvake anopesana nomumwe anogona kuenda kwavari.” mozisi akati akwira mugomo, gore rakarifukidza, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakagara pamusoro pegomo resinai. gore rakafukidza gomo iro kwamazuva matanhatu, uye pazuva rechinomwe, yeahoh akadana mozisi ari mukati megore. kuvaisraeri, kubwinya kwayeahoh kwairatidzika somoto unoparadza uri pamusoro pegomo. ipapo akapinda mugore paakanga achikwira mugomo. uye akagara mugomo kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana.

25

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira vaisraeri kuti vandivigire chipiriso. unofanira kugamuchira chipiriso changu kubva kumunhu upi noupi anosundwa nomwoyo wake kuti ape. “izvi ndizvo zvipiriso zvaunofanira kugamuchira kubva kwavari: “goridhe, sirivha, ndarira; wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nemicheka yakaisvonaka; makushe embudzi; matehwe amakondobwe akapendwa zvitsvuku namatehwe emombe dzomugungwa; matanda omuunga; mafuta omuorivhi emwenje; zvinonhuhwira zvemafuta okuzodza anonhuhwira uye nezvimwe zvinonhuhwira; mabwe eonikisi nezvimwe zvinokosha zvinofanira kuiswa paefodhi napachidzitiro chechipfuva. “ipapo uite kuti vaite nzvimbo yangu tsvene, uye ini ndichagara pakati pavo. muite tabhenakeri iyi nemidziyo yayo yose nomufananidzo wandichakuratidza. “uite kuti vaite bhokisi ramatanda omuunga, rakareba makubhiti maviri nehafu, upamhi kubhiti nehafu, uye kubhiti nehafu pakukwira. murifukidze negoridhe rakaisvonaka, mukati nokunze, uye muite hata yegoridhe yakaripoteredza. muiumbire mhete ina dzegoridhe mugodzisungira pamakumbo aro mana, nemhete mbiri pano rumwe rutivi uye mhete mbiri kuno rumwe rutivi. ipapo mugoita matanda omuunga uye negoridhe. muise matanda aya mukati memhete dziri parutivi rwebhokisi kuti mutakure bhokisi nawo. matanda anofanira kugara ari mumhete dzebhokisi iri; haafaniri kubviswa. ipapo mugoisa muareka chipupuriro, chandichakupai. “muite chifunhiro chokuyananisa chegoridhe rakaisvonaka, makubhiti maviri nehafu pakureba uye kubhiti nehafu paupamhi. uye muite makerubhi maviri egoridhe rakapambadzirwa kumacheto echifunhiro. muite kerubhi rimwe chete kuno rumwe rutivi uye kerubhi rechipiri kuno rumwe rutivi; muite bandi rimwe chete rekerubhi nechifukidzo, pamativi maviri. mapapiro amakerubhi anofanira kutambanudzirwa kumusoro, akafukidzira chifunhiro. makerubhi anofanira kutarisana, akatarira kuchifunhiro. muise chifunhiro pamusoro peareka uye mugoisa muareka, chipupuriro chandichakupai. ipapo, pamusoro pechifunhiro chiri pakati pamakerubhi maviri ari pamusoro peareka yechipupuriro, ndichasangana newe ndigokupa mirayiro yangu yose yavaisraeri. “uite tafura namatanda omuunga yakareba makubhiti maviri, kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi uye kubhiti nehafu pakukwirira. muifukidzire negoridhe rakaisvonaka uye mugoipoteredza nezvakaumbwa zvegoridhe. uyewo uite vhiri rinoipoteredza rino upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruoko ugoisa goridhe rakaumbwa pamusoro pevhiri. uite mhete ina dzegoridhe dzetafura ugodzisungira kumakona mana, pane makumbo ayo. mhete idzi dzinofanira kuva pedyo nevhiri kuti dzibate matanda anoshandiswa kutakura tafura. uite matanda omuunga, uafukidze negoridhe uye mugotakura tafura nawo. uye uite ndiro dzayo namadhishi negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uyewo namatende ayo nembiya dzokudirisa zvipiriso. uise chingwa chokuratidza patafura iyi kuti chive pamberi pangu nguva dzose. “uite chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye ugoipambadzira pasi payo pamwe chete nerwiriko rwayo; mbiya dzayo, mabukira namaruva acho zvichava chinhu chimwe chete nacho. matavi matanhatu anofanira kutambarara achibva mumativi echigadziko chomwenje, matatu kuno rumwe rutivi uye matatu kuno rumwezve. mikombe mitatu yakaumbwa samaruva omuarimondi namabukira uye namaruva zvinofanira kuva padavi rimwe chete, matatu kune rimwe davi, uye zvimwe chetezvo kumativi matanhatu ose anotambarara kubva pachigadziko chomwenje. uye pachigadziko chomwenje panofanira kuva nemikombe mina yakaumbwa samaruva omuarimondi ane mabukira namaruva. bukira rimwe chete richava pasi pamatavi maviri okutanga anotambarara kubva pachigadziko chomwenje, bukira rechipiri riri pasi pamamwe matavi maviri, uye bukira rechitatu riri pasi pamamwezve pamatavi maviri, mativi ose ari matanhatu. mabukira namatavi achava ebandi rimwe chete nechigadziko chomwenje, negoridhe rakaisvonaka rakapambadzirwa. “ipapo ugoita mwenje yacho minomwe uye ugoigadzika pamusoro pacho kuitira kuti zvigovhenekera nzvimbo iri mberi kwacho. mbato dzacho nendiro dzacho zvinofanira kuva zvegoridhe rakaisvonaka. tarenda regoridhe rakaisvonaka rinofanira kushandiswa pachigadziko chomwenje nemimwe midziyo yose iyi. uone kuti wazviita zvichienderana nomufananidzo wawakaratidzwa pagomo.

26

“uite tabhenakeri nezvidzitiro gumi zvomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, nowebhuruu, pepuru nomutsvuku, namakerubhi akasonerwa mairi nemhizha dzamabasa amaoko. zvidzitiro zvose zvinofanira kuva zvakaenzana, zvakareba makubhiti makumi maviri namasere uye makubhiti mana paupamhi. ubatanidze zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete, ugoita zvimwe chetezvo nezvimwe zvishanu. uite zvishwe zvomucheka webhuruu kurutivi rwokumucheto wechidzitiro zvakabatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye ugoita zvimwe chete nechidzitiro chokumucheto mune zvimwe zvakabatanidzwa. uite zvishwe makumi mashanu pachidzitiro chimwe chete uye makumi mashanu ezvishwe pamucheto wechidzitiro chezvimwe zvakabatanidzwa, zvishwe zvitarisane chimwe nechimwe. ipapo ugoita zvikoreko zvegoridhe makumi mashanu uye uzvishandise kubatanidza zvidzitiro pamwe chete kuitira kuti tabhenakeri ive chinhu chimwe. “uite zvidzitiro zvamakushe embudzi zvetende riri pamusoro petabhenakeri, zvose zvive gumi nerimwe pamwe chete. zvidzitiro zvose zviri gumi nerimwe zvinofanira kuenzana, makubhiti makumi matatu pakureba uye makubhiti mana paupamhi. ubatanidze zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete zviite chinhu chimwe chete uye zvimwe zvitanhatu zvivewo chinhu chimwe chete. upete chidzitiro chechitanhatu kaviri pamberi petende. uite zvishwe makumi mashanu pamupendero wechidzitiro chokumucheto zvakabatanidzwa uyewo pamupendero wechidzitiro chokumucheto kwezvimwe zvakabatanidzwa. ipapo ugoita zvikorekedzo zvendarira makumi mashanu ugozviisa muzvishwe kuti zvibatanidze tende pamwe chete chigova chinhu chimwe chete. kana zviri zvokuwedzera urefu hwezvidzitiro zvetende, hafu yechidzitiro inenge yasara inofanira kurembera necheshure kwetabhenakeri. zvidzitiro zvetende zvinofanira kurebesa nekubhiti rimwe chete pamativi ose ari maviri; zvinenge zvasara zvinofanira kurembera pamativi etabhenakeri kuti zvigoifukidza. uite chifukidzo chetende chamatehwe amakondobwe akapendwa nezvitsvuku, uye pamusoro paizvozvo chifukidzo chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa. “uitire tabhenakeri mapuranga akati twi amatanda omuunga. puranga rimwe nerimwe rinofanira kureba makubhiti gumi uye kubhiti nehafu paupamhi, nembambo mbiri dzakamiswa dzakatarisana. uite mapuranga ose etabhenakeri nenzira iyoyi. uite mapuranga makumi maviri okurutivi rwezasi rwetabhenakeri uye uite zvigadziko zvesirivha makumi mana kuti zvive pasi pawo, zvigadziko zviviri papuranga rimwe nerimwe, chimwe chete pasi pembambo imwe neimwe. kuno rumwe rutivi, rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri, uite mapuranga makumi maviri, uye zvigadziko zvesirivha makumi mana. zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. uite mapuranga matanhatu kurutivi rwokumucheto cheto, ndiko kumavirira etabhenakeri, uye uite mapuranga maviri amakona okumucheto cheto. pamakona maviri aya, anofanira kuva maviri maviri kubva pasi kusvikira kumusoro, uye agadzikwe mumhete imwe chete; ose ari maviri ngaave saizvozvo. saka pachava namapuranga masere uye zvigadziko zvesirivha gumi nezvitanhatu, zviviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. “uyewo uite mbariro dzamatanda omuunga: shanu dzamapuranga okuno rumwe rutivi rwetabhenakeri, shanu dzaaya ari pano rumwe rutivi, uye shanu dzamapuranga okumavirira, kumucheto cheto kwetabhenakeri. mbariro yapakati inofanira kutandavara kubva kumucheto kusvikira kuno mumwe mucheto napakati pamapuranga. ufukidze mapuranga negoridhe uye ugoita mhete dzegoridhe kuti dzigobata mbariro. uyewo ufukidze mbariro negoridhe. “umise tabhenakeri maererano nomufananidzo wawakaratidzwa mugomo. “uite chidzitiro chebhuruu, nechepepuru nechitsvuku chomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, namakerubhi akasonerwapo nenyanzvi yokusona. urirembedze nezvikorekedzo zvegoridhe pamatanda mana omuunga akafukidzwa negoridhe uye amire pamusoro pezvigadziko zvina zvesirivha. urembedze chidzitiro pazvikorekedzo uye ugoisa areka yechipupuriro shure kwechidzitiro. chidzitiro ichi chichaparadzanisa nzvimbo tsvene nevnzvimbo tsvene-tsvene. uise chifukidziro chokuyananisa pamusoro peareka yechipupuriro iri munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene. uise tafura kunze kwechidzitiro nechokumusoro kwetabhenakeri ugogadzika chigadziko chomwenje chakatarisana nayo nechezasi. “pamukova wokupinda mutende uite chidzitiro chewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romusoni anogona. uite zvikorekedzo zvegoridhe zvechidzitiro ichi uye matanda mashanu omuunga akafukidzwa negoridhe. uye uaumbire zvigadziko zvishanu zvendarira.

27

“uvake aritari yamatanda omuunga, makubhiti matatu pakukwirira kwayo; inofanira kuva namativi mana akaenzana, kureba kwayo makubhiti mashanu uye upamhi hwayo makubhiti mashanu. uite runyanga pamakona ayo mana, kuti nyanga nearitari zvive chinhu chimwe, uye ufukidze aritari nendarira. uite midziyo yayo yose nendarira, hari dzayo dzokubvisisa madota, uye foshoro dzayo, mbiya dzokusasa nadzo, zvibayiso zvenyama nemakango apamoto. uyiitire chiparo, sefa yendarira, uye ugoita mhete yendarira pakona imwe neimwe yesefa. uchiise pasi pechitsiko chearitari kuitira kuti chive pakati nepakati pearitari. uitire aritari matanda omuunga uye ugoafukidza nendarira. matanda aya anofanira kupinzwa mukati memhete kuti agova kumativi maviri earitari painenge yotakurwa. uite aritari namapuranga, isina chinhu mukati mayo. inofanira kugadzirwa sokuratidzwa kwawakaitwa pagomo. “uitire tabhenakeri ruvazhe. rutivi rwezasi runofanira kureba makubhiti zana uye runofanira kuva nezvidzitiro zvakarembedzwa zvomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, namatanda makumi maviri uye zvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri uye zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamatanda. rutivi rwokumusoro rucharebawo makubhiti zana uye runofanira kuva nezvidzitiro zvakarembedzwa, namatanda makumi maviri, nezvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri, uye zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamatanda. “kumucheto kworuvazhe, nechokumavirira, kunofanira kuva noupamhi hwamakubhiti makumi mashanu uye zvidzitiro zvakarembedzwa, namatanda gumi uye zvigadziko gumi. kumucheto nechokumabvazuva kwakatarisana nokunobuda nezuva, upamhi hworuvazhe hunofanira kuva makubhiti makumi mashanu. zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanu zvinofanira kuva kuno rumwe rutivi rwomukova, namatanda matatu nezvigadziko zvitatu, uye zvimwe zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanu ngazvivewo kuno rumwe rutivi, namatanda matatu nezvigadziko zvitatuwo. “pamukova wokupinda muruvazhe, uise chidzitiro chakareba makubhiti makumi maviri, chewuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romusoni anogona, namatanda mana uyewo zvigadziko zvina. matanda ose akapoteredza ruvazhe anofanira kuva nezvisungiso zvesirivha nezvikorekedzo, uye zvigadziko zvendarira. ruvazhe ruchareba makubhiti zana uye makubhiti makumi mashanu paupamhi, nezvidzitiro zvemicheka yakarukwa zvakaisvonaka yakareba makubhiti mashanu, uye nezvigadziko zvendarira. mimwe midziyo inoshandiswa paushumiri hwetabhenakeri, ringava basa ripi zvaro, kusanganisira mbambo dzose dzetende neiya yomuruvazhe, inofanira kuva yendarira. “urayire vaisraeri kuti vakuvigire mafuta omuorivhi akachena, akasvinwa omwenje, kuitira kuti mwenje irambe ichipfuta. mutende rokusangana, kunze kwechidzitiro chiri pamberi pechipupuriro, aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kurega mwenje ichiramba ichipfuta pamberi payeahoh, kubva madekwana kusvikira mangwanani. uyu unofanira kuva mutemo usingaperi pakati pavaisraeri nokuzvizvarwa zvinotevera.

28

“uite kuti aroni mukoma wako pamwe chete navanakomana vake vanoti nadhabhi naabhihu, ereazari naitamari vauyiswe kwandiri kubva pakati pavaisraeri kuti vandishumire savaprista. uitire mukoma wako nguo tsvene, kuti apiwe ruremekedzo uye kukudzwa. utaurire varume voumhizha vose vandakapa uchenjeri hwokuita zvakadaro kuti vanofanira kusonera aroni nguo, dzokutsaurwa kwake, kuti agondishumira somuprista. idzi ndidzo nguo dzavanofanira kuita: chidzitiro chapachipfuva, efodhi, jasi, nenguo yakarukwa, nguwani nendaza. vanofanira kuitira mukoma wako aroni navanakomana vake, nguo tsvene idzi. uvaite kuti vashandise wuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye mucheka wakaisvonaka. “vaite efodhi yewuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romunhu ano umhizha. ngaive namapenga maviri apamapfudzi akabatanidzwa pamakona ayo maviri, kuitira kuti igogona kubatanidzwa. bhanhire rayo rakarukwa noumhizha rinofanira kufanana nayo, rive rebenga rimwe chete neefodhi uye rakagadzirwa newuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. “utore mabwe maviri eonikisi ugonyora runyoro rwakatemwa pamusoro pawo mazita avanakomana vaisraeri zvichienderana nokuberekwa kwavo, mazita matanhatu padombo rimwe chete uye mamwe matanhatu asara anyorwe pane rimwe dombo. nyora mazita avanakomana vaisraeri pamatombo maviri nenzira inoitwa nomuvezi wamatombo achitema runyoro pachisimbiso. ipapo ugoamisa muzvirukwa zvegoridhe uye ugoasungirira pamapenga apapfudzi eefodhi ave matombo echirangaridzo kuvana vaisraeri. aroni anofanira kutakura mazita aya pamapfudzi ake chive chirangaridzo pamberi payeahoh. uite zvirukwa zvegoridhe uye nengetani mbiri dzakarukwa setambo negoridhe rakaisvonaka, ugobatanidza ngetani nezvirukwa. “uite chidzitiro chapachipfuva chokutanga, basa romunhu woumhizha. uchiite chifanane neefodhi yewuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye mucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. ngachienzane mativi ose ari mana, kureba kwacho sechanza choruoko uye upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruoko, uye chipetwe kaviri. ipapo uronge mitsara mina yamatombo anokosha pamusoro pacho. mumutsara wokutanga muchava nerubhi, netopazi uye bheriri; mumutsara wechipiri muchava neturikoisi, safire neemaradhi; mumutsara wechitatu muchava nejasindi, agati neametisiti; mumutsara wechina muchava nekirisoriti, onekisi uye nejasipa. uaise muzvirukwa zvegoridhe. panofanira kuva namatombo gumi namaviri, rimwe chete richimirira zita rimwe nerimwe ravanakomana vaisraeri, rimwe nerimwe rakatemwa runyoro padombo sezvinoita chisimbiso chezita romumwe wavamarudzi gumi namaviri. “uite ngetani dzechidzitiro chapachipfuva dzakarukwa negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uzvimone setambo. uite mhete mbiri dzegoridhe ugodzisungirira pamakona maviri echidzitiro chapachipfuva. usungirire ngetani mbiri dzegoridhe pamhete dziri pamakona echidzitiro chapachipfuva, nemimwe micheto yengetani inoenda kuzvirukwa zviviri uchizvibatanidza, kuzvipenga zvapamapfudzi zveefodhi nechokumberi. uite mhete mbiri dzegoridhe ugodzibatanidza kuna mamwe makona echidzitiro chapachipfuva pamupendero wechomukati kunotevererana neefodhi. uitezve dzimwe mhete dzegoridhe ugodzibatanidza pasi pemapenga apamapfudzi nechokumberi kweefodhi, pedyo nomusono uri nechapamusoro pebhanhire romuchiuno reefodhi. mhete dzepachidzitiro chechipfuva dzinofanira kusungirirwa pamhete dzeefodhi netambo yebhuruu, dzichibatanidzwa nebhanhire romuchiuno, kuitira kuti chidzitiro chapachipfuva chirege kubva paefodhi. “nguva dzose aroni paanenge achipinda munzvimbo tsvene, achange akatakura mazita avanakomana vaisraeri pamwoyo wake pachidzitiro chechipfuva chokutonga sechirangaridzo chenguva dzose pamberi payeahoh. uyezve uise urimi netumimi muchidzitiro chechipfuva, kuitira kuti vagare vari pamwoyo waaroni pose paanenge achipinda pamberi payeahoh. nokudaro aroni acharamba akatakura zvinhu zvokutonga nazvo vaisraeri pamwoyo wake pamberi payeahoh. “uite jasi rose zvaro reefodhi nomucheka webhuruu, neburi romusoro pakati paro. panofanira kuzova nomupendero wakarukwa wakaita sekora unopoteredza buri iri, kuitira kuti rirege kubvaruka. uite matamba ewuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku akapoteredza mupendero wejasi, namatare egoridhe pakati pawo. matare egoridhe namatamba zvinofanira kukayana zvichipoteredza mupendero wejasi. aroni anofanira kuripfeka paanenge achishumira. kurira kwamatare kuchanzwikwa paanenge achipinda munzvimbo tsvene pamberi payeahoh uye nepaanenge achibuda, kuitira kuti arege kufa. “uite ndiro yegoridhe ugotema runyoro pairi sezvinoitwa pachisimbiso kuti: mutsvene kuna jehovha. usungire tambo yebhuruu pairi kuti ibatanidzwe nenguwani; inofanira kuva mberi kwenguwani. ichava pahuma yaaroni, uye iye achatakura mhosva dzingava pazvipo zvitsvene zvinotsaurwa navaisraeri, zvingava zvipo zvipi hazvo. zvichava pahuma yaaroni nguva dzose kuitira kuti zvigamuchirwe nayeahoh. “uruke jasi romucheka wakaisvonaka ugoita nguwani yomucheka wakaisvonaka. ndaza inofanira kuva basa romuruki. uite majasi, ndaza namabhanhire omumusoro avanakomana vaaroni, kuti vapiwe ruremekedzo nokukudzwa. shure kwokunge wapfekedza mukoma wako aroni navanakomana vake, uvazodze uye ugovagadza. uvatsaure kuti vagondishumira savaprista. “uite nguo dzapasi dzomucheka dzive chifukidzo chomuviri, dzinobva muchiuno kusvikira kumabvi. aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kudzipfeka pose pavanenge vachipinda mutende rokusangana kana kuswedera paaritari kuti vashumire vari munzvimbo tsvene, kuitira kuti varege kuva nemhosva vakafa. “uchava mutemo wokusingaperi kuna aroni nezvizvarwa zvake.

29

“izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kuita kuti uvanatse, kuti vandishumire savaprista: utore hando duku namakondobwe maviri asina chinongo. uye ubike chingwa noupfu hwakatsetseka hwegorosi, husina mbiriso, uye ubike makeke akavhenganiswa namafuta, nezvingwa zvitete zvakazorwa mafuta. uzviise mudengu uye ugozvikumikidza zviri imomo, pamwe chete nehando uye makondobwe maviri. ipapo ugouya naaroni navanakomana vake kumukova wokupinda nawo kutende rokusangana ugovashambidza nemvura. tora hanzu ugopfekedza aroni jasi, nguo yeefodhi neefodhi pachayo uye nechidzitiro chapachipfuva. usungire efodhi paari nebhanhire romuchiuno rakarukwa nounyanzvi. uise nguwani pamusoro wake uye ugoibatanidza nekorona tsvene. utore mafuta okuzodza ugomuzodza uchiita zvokuadira pamusoro pake. uye vanakomana vake ugovapfekedza majasi uye ugoisa mabhanhire omumusoro pamusoro pavo. ipapo ugosungira ndaza pana aroni navanakomana vake. uprista ndohwavo nomutemo usingaperi. nenzira iyi uchagadza aroni navanakomana vake. “uuye nehando pamberi petende rokusangana, uye aroni navanakomana vake vachaisa maoko avo pamusoro payo. uiuraye pamberi pomukova wokupinda kutende rokusangana. utore rimwe reropa rehando ugoriisa panyanga dzearitari nomunwe wako, uye ugodira rasara racho pahwaro hwearitari. ipapo ugotora mafuta ose akapoteredza zvomukati, zvinoti chiropa, neitsvo dziri mbiri namafuta ari pamusoro padzo, ugoapisa pamusoro pearitari. asi upise nyama yehando nedehwe rayo namazvizvi ayo kunze kwomusasa. ndicho chipiriso chechivi. “utore rimwe regondobwe, uye aroni navanakomana vake vagoisa maoko avo pamusoro paro. uriuraye ugotora ropa raro urisase pamativi ose earitari. ucheke gondobwe kuita muzvidimbu zvidimbu uye ugosuka zvomukati, uye makumbo, uchiaisa pamwe chete nomusoro nezvimwe zvidimbu. ipapo ugopisa gondobwe rose paaritari. ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. “utore rimwe gondobwe, uye aroni navanakomana vake vachaisa maoko avo pamusoro waro. uriuraye, utore rimwe ropa raro ugoriisa pamucheto wenzeve dzorudyi dzavanakomana vaaroni, napazvigunwe zvikuru zvamaoko avo orudyi, nokuzvigunwe zvikuru zvokutsoka dzavo dzorudyi. ipapo ugosasa ropa pamativi ose earitari. uye ugotora rimwe ropa riri paaritari namamwe mafuta okuzodza usase pana aroni napanguo dzake uye napavanakomana vake napanguo dzavo. ipapo iye navanakomana vake nenguo dzavo vachanatswa. “utore pagondobwe iri mafuta, mafuta apamuswe, mafuta akapoteredza zvomukati, akafukidza chiropa, itsvo dzose dziri mbiri namafuta ari padziri, uye nechidya chokurudyi. (iri ndiro gondobwe rokugadzwa.) kubva padengu rechingwa chakabikwa chisina mbiriso, chiri pamberi payeahoh, utore chimwe chete, nekeke rakavhenganiswa namafuta, uye nechingwa chitete. uise izvi zvose mumaoko aaroni navanakomana vake ugozvininira pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. ipapo uzvitore kubva mumaoko avo ugozvipisa paaritari pamwe chete nechipiriso chinopiswa chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. shure kwokunge watora chityu chegondobwe rokugadzwa kwaaroni, uchininire pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira uye chichava mugove wako. “unatse mitezo iyo yegondobwe rokugadza raaroni navanakomana vake: chityu chakaninirwa uye chakakumikidzwa. uyu unofanira kuva mugove wenguva dzose unobva kuvaisraeri, waaroni navanakomana vake. uyu ndiwo mugove unofanira kupiwa navaisraeri kuna yeahoh kubva pazvipiriso zvavo zvokuwadzana. “nguo tsvene dzaaroni dzichava dzezvizvarwa zvake kuitira kuti vazodzwe uye vagogadzwa vakadzipfeka. mwanakomana wake achamutevera pauprista uye anouya kutende rokusangana kuti azoshumira ari munzvimbo tsvene, anofanira kudzipfeka kwamazuva manomwe. “utore gondobwe rokugadzwa ugobika nyama yaro munzvimbo tsvene. aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kudya nyama yegondobwe uye nechingwa chiri mudengu vari pamukova wokupinda patende rokusangana. vanofanira kudya zvipiriso izvi zvavakaitirwa yananiso yokugadzwa kwavo uye nokunatswa kwavo nazvo. asi hakuna mumwe munhu anofanira kuzvidya nokuti zvitsvene. uye kana pakava nenyama yegondobwe rokugadzwa inosara kana chingwa chipi zvacho chinosara kusvikira mangwana mangwanani, muzvipise. hazvifaniri kudyiwa, nokuti zvitsvene. “uitire aroni navanakomana vake zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayira, uchitora mazuva manomwe okuvagadza. ubayire hando zuva rimwe nerimwe sechipiriso chechivi chive chokuyananisa. unatse aritari nokuiitira yananiso, uye ugoizodza kuti uiite tsvene. mazuva manomwe uyananisire aritari uye uinatse. ipapo aritari ichava tsvene-tsvene, uye chose chichaigunzva chichava chitsvene. “izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kupa paaritari nguva dzose zuva rimwe nerimwe: makwayana maviri egore rimwe chete. ubayire rimwe chete mangwanani uye nerimwe chete madekwana. negwayana rokutanga ubayire nechegumi cheefa choupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvina chehini chamafuta akabva mumaorivhi akasvinwa, uye chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvina chehini yewaini chive chipiriso chinonwiwa. ubayire rimwe gwayana zuva richangovira pamwe chete nechipiriso chimwe chetecho chezviyo nechipiriso chacho chinonwiwa sechamangwanani, chive chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chakaitirwa yeahoh nomoto. “chipiriso chinopiswa ichi chinofanira kuitwa nguva dzose pamukova wetende rokusangana pamberi payeahoh kuzvizvarwa zvose. ipapo ndipo pandichasangana newe uye ndigotaura kwauri, ndipozve pandichasangana navaisraeri, uye nzvimbo iyi ichatsaurwa nokubwinya kwangu. “saka ndichatsaura tende rokusangana nearitari uye ndichatsaura aroni navanakomana vake kuti vandishumire savaprista. ipapo ndichagara pakati pavaisraeri uye ndigova allah wavo. vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh allah wavo, akavabudisa kubva muijipiti kuitira kuti ndigogara pakati pavo. ndini yeahoh allah wavo.

30

“uite aritari yokupisira zvinonhuhwira namatanda omuunga. inofanira kuenzana mativi ayo ose ari mana, yakareba kubhiti rimwe chete uye kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, uye kukwirira kwayo makubhiti maviri, nyanga dzayo dzive chinhu chimwe chete nayo. ufukidze pamusoro payo namativi ose uye nenyanga dzayo negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uye uite hata mbiri kumativi akatarisana. kuti dzibate mapango anoshandiswa kuitakura. uite mapango aya nomuti womuunga uye uafukidze negoridhe. uise aritari mberi kwechidzitiro chiri pamberi peareka yechipupuriro, pamberi pechifunhiro chokuyananisa chiri pamusoro pechipupuriro, pandichasangana newe. “aroni anofanira kupisa zvinonhuhwira pamusoro pearitari mangwanani oga oga paanogadzira mwenje. anofanira kupisazve zvinonhuhwira paanenge achitungidza mwenje zuva richangovira saka zvinonhuhwira zvinofanira kupiswa nguva dzose pamberi payeahoh kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. musapisira pamusoro pearitari iyi zvimwewo zvazvo zvinonhuhwira kana zvipiriso zvipi zvazvo zvinopiswa kana zvipiriso zvezviyo, uye musadururire chipiriso chinonwiwa pamusoro payo. aroni achaita yananiso panyanga idzi kamwe chete pagore. yananiso yapagore iyi inofanira kuitwa neropa rokuyananisa rechipiriso chechivi kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. chitsvene-tsvene kuna yeahoh.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “paunoverenga vaisraeri kuti uvanyore, mumwe nomumwe anofanira kupa yeahoh rudzikinuro rwoupenyu hwake panguva yaanoverengwa. ipapo hapana denda richazouya pamusoro pavo paunovaverenga. mumwe nomumwe anoyambukira kuna avo vatoverengwa anofanira kupa hafu yeshekeri, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, rinorema magera makumi maviri. hafu yeshekeri iyi chipiriso kuna yeahoh. vose vanoyambuka, vaya vana makore makumi maviri kana anopfuura iwayo, vanofanira kupa chipiriso kuna yeahoh. vapfumi havafaniri kupa zvinopfuura hafu yeshekeri uye varombo havafaniri kupa zvishoma pamunoita chipiriso kuna yeahoh kuti muyananiswe upenyu hwenyu. ugamuchire mari yeyananiso kubva kuvaisraeri ugoishandisa paushumiri hwetende rokusangana. chichava chirangaridzo kuvaisraeri pamberi payeahoh, muchiyananisira upenyu hwenyu.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uite mudziyo wokushambira wendarira, nechigadziko chawo chendarira. ugouisa pakati petende rokusangana nearitari uye ugoisa mvura mauri. aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kushamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo nemvura. pose pavachapinda mutende rokusangana vachashamba kuitira kuti varege kufa. uyezve, pavanoswedera paaritari kuti vazoshumira nokupa chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, vachashamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo kuitira kuti varege kufa. uyu unofanira kuva mutemo usingaperi waaroni nezvizvarwa zvake kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora zvinonhuhwira zvinotevera izvi: mazana mashanu amashekeri emura inoerera, hafu yakadaro (ndiwo mazana maviri namakumi mashanu amashekeri) ezvinonhuhwira zvesinamoni, mazana maviri namakumi mashanu enzimbe, mashekeri omuunga mazana mashanu, zvose zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, nehini yamafuta omuorivhi. vhenganisa izvi kuti zvive mafuta matsvene okuzodza, anonhuhwira akavhenganiswa, basa romuvhenganisi wezvinonhuhwira. achava mafuta matsvene okuzodza. ipapo ugoashandisa kuzodza tende rokusangana, neareka yechipupuriro, tafura nemidziyo yayo yose, chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho dzose, aritari yezvinonhuhwira, aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nemidziyo yayo, uye mudziyo wokushambira nechigadziko chawo. unofanira kuzvitsaura kuti zvigova zvitsvene-tsvene, uye zvose zvichazvigunzva zvichava zvitsvene. “uzodze aroni navanakomana vake uye uvatsaure kuitira kuti vagondishandira savaprista. uti kuvaisraeri, ‘aya achava mafuta angu matsvene okuzodza kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. musaadira pamiviri yavanhu uye musaita mafuta api zvawo nenzira imwe cheteyo. matsvene, uye munofanira kuaita matsvene. ani naani anoita mafuta anonhuhwira akafanana nawo uye ani naani anoaisa pamunhu upi zvake kunze kwomuprista anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora zvinonhuhwira zvinoti sitaketi, onika negaribhanamu, uye zvinonhuhwira zvakaisvonaka, zvose zvakaenzana, uye ugoita zvinonhuhwira zvakavhenganiswa, basa romuvhenganisi wezvinonhuhwira. zvinofanira kurungwa nomunyu, uye zvitsvene. ukuye zvimwe zvacho zvive upfu ugozviisa pamberi pechipupuriro chiri mutende rokusangana, umo mandichasangana newe. zvichava zvitsvene-tsvene kwauri. usazviitira zvinonhuhwira zvipi zvazvo nenzira imwe cheteyo; uzvicherechedze kuti zvitsvene kuna yeahoh. ani naani achaita chipi zvacho chakafanana nacho kuti afadzwe nokunhuhwira kwacho, anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.”

31

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tarira ndasarudza bhezareri mwanakomana wauri, mwanakomana wahuri, worudzi rwayeahudha, uye ndamuzadza nomweya waallah, nouchenjeri, nokugona nokuziva mhando dzose dzoumhizha, kuita unyanzvi hwebasa regoridhe, sirivha nendarira, kuveza nokuronga mabwe, kushanda pabasa rokuveza matanda, nokubata mumhando dzose dzoumhizha. pamusoro paizvozvo ndakagadza ohoriabhi mwanakomana waahisamaki, worudzi rwadhani, kuti amubatsire. “uyezve ndapa unyanzvi kumhizha kuti vaite zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayira zvinoti: “tende rokusangana, areka yechipupuriro ine chifukidzo chokuyananisa pamusoro payo, nenhumbi dzose dzetende, tafura nemidziyo yayo, chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka nenhumbi dzacho dzose, aritari yezvinonhuhwira, aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nemidziyo yayo dzose, mudziyo wokushambira nechigadziko chawo, uyewo nguo yakarukwa, dzose nguo tsvene dzaaroni muprista uye nenguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista, namafuta okuzodza uye nezvinonhuhwira kwazvo zvenzvimbo tsvene. “vanofanira kudzigadzira sezvandakakurayira iwe.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘munofanira kucherechedza sabata rangu. ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo pakati pangu nemi kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera, kuti mugoziva kuti ndini yeahoh, anokuitai vatsvene. “ ‘cherechedzai sabata, nokuti idzvene kwamuri. munhu upi zvake anorizvidza anofanira kuurayiwa; ani naani anobata basa ripi zvaro pazuva iroro anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. kwamazuva matanhatu, basa rinofanira kuitwa, asi zuva rechinomwe isabata rokuzorora, idzvene kuna yeahoh. ani naani anoita basa ripi zvaro nomusi wesabata anofanira kuurayiwa. vaisraeri vanofanira kucherechedza sabata, vachiripemberera kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera sesungano isingaperi. richava chiratidzo pakati pangu navaisraeri nokusingaperi, nokuti mukati mamazuva matanhatu yeahoh akasika denga nenyika, uye nomusi wechinomwe akarega kushanda uye akazorora.’ ” yeahoh akati apedza kutaura namozisi pagomo resinai, akamupa mahwendefa maviri echipupuriro, mahwendefa amabwe akanyorwa nomunwe waallah.

32

vanhu vakati vaona kuti mozisi akanga anonoka kwazvo kuburuka kubva mugomo, vakaungana pana aroni vakati, “uya, tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira. kana ari munhu uyu mozisi akatibudisa muijipiti, hatizivi zvakaitika kwaari.” aroni akavapindura akati, “bvisai mhete dzegoridhe dzakapfekwa navakadzi venyu, vanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu mugouya nadzo kwandiri.” saka vanhu vose vakabvisa mhete dzavo vakauya nadzo kuna aroni. akatora zvavakamupa akaita nazvo chifananidzo chakaumbwa muchimiro chemhuru, achichiveza nembezo. ipapo vakati, “ava ndivo vamwari venyu, imi israeri, vakakubudisai kubva muijipiti.” aroni akati aona izvi, akavaka aritari pamberi pemhuru iya akazivisa vanhu kuti, “mangwana kuchava nomutambo kuna yeahoh.” saka zuva rakatevera vanhu vakamuka mangwanani vakabayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye vakapa zvipiriso zvokuwadzana. shure kwaizvozvo vakagara pasi vakadya, vakanwa uye vakasimuka kuti vatambe. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “buruka, nokuti vanhu vako, vawakabudisa muijipiti, vaora. vakurumidza kutsauka pane zvandakavarayira uye vakazviitira chifananidzo chakavezwa muchimiro chemhuru. vapfugamira pachiri uye vakabayira kwachiri uye vakati, ‘ava ndivo vamwari venyu, imi vaisraeri, vakakubudisai kubva muijipiti.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ndaona vanhu ava, uye vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu. zvino ndirege hangu kuti kutsamwa kwangu kupfute pamusoro pavo ndivaparadze. ipapo iwe ndichakuita rudzi rukuru.” asi mozisi akatsvaka nyasha dzayeahoh allah wake, akati, “haiwa yeahoh, kutsamwa kwenyu kungapfuta seiko pamusoro pavanhu venyu, vamakabudisa kubva muijipiti nesimba guru uye noruoko rune simba? vaijipita vachataurireiko vachiti, ‘akavabudisa muijipiti nomurangariro wakaipa, kuti avauraye mumakomo uye nokuvaparadza panyika’? dzokai henyu pakutsamwa kwenyu kunotyisa; dzokai murege kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro pavanhu venyu. rangarirai varanda venyu vanaabhurahama, isaka naisraeri, vamakapika kwavari nemi pachenyu muchiti, ‘ndichaita kuti zvizvarwa zvenyu zviwande senyeredzi dzokudenga, uye ndichapa zvizvarwa zvenyu nyika iyi yose yandakavavimbisa, uye ichava nhaka yavo nokusingaperi.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akazvidemba uye akarega kuuyisa njodzi yaakanga oda kuisa pamusoro pavanhu vake. mozisi akadzoka akaburuka mugomo ane mahwendefa maviri echipupuriro mumaoko ake. akanga akanyorwa kumativi ose ari maviri, mberi neshure. mahwendefa aya rakanga riri basa raallah; runyoro rwakanga rwuri runyoro rwaallah, rwakatemwa pamahwendefa. yeahoshua akati anzwa mheremhere yavanhu vaidanidzira, akati kuna mozisi, “mune ruzha rwehondo mumusasa.” mozisi akapindura akati, “harusi ruzha rwokukunda, harusi ruzha rwokukundwa; ruzha rwokuimba rwandinonzwa.” mozisi akati aswedera pamusasa akaona mhuru uye nokutamba, kutsamwa kwake kukavira uye akakanda mahwendefa achibva mumaoko ake, akaaputsa kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu pajinga regomo. uye akatora mhuru yavakanga vagadzira ndokuipisa nomoto; ipapo akaikuya kuita upfu, akahuparadzira pamusoro pemvura uye akaita kuti vaisraeri vainwe. akati kuna aroni, “ko vanhu ava vakaiteiko kwauri, zvawakavatungamirira muchivi chikuru zvakadai?” aroni akapindura akati, “regai kutsamwa, ishe wangu. munoziva kuti vanhu ava vanorerekera sei pakutadza. vakati kwandiri, ‘tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira. kana ari munhu uyu mozisi akatibudisa kubva muijipiti, hatizivi zvakaitika kwaari.’ saka ndakati kwavari, ‘ani naani ane zvishongo zvegoridhe, ngaabvise.’ ipapo vakandipa goridhe ndikarikanda mumoto, uye ndipo pakabuda mhuru iyi!” mozisi akaona kuti vanhu vakanga vatopenga zvavo uye kuti aroni akanga avarega vasisazvidzori uye kuti vakanga vava chiseko kuvavengi vavo. saka akamira pamukova wokupinda nawo mumusasa akati, “ani naani ari kurutivi rwayeahoh, ngaauye kwandiri.” uye varevhi vose vakaenda kwaari. ipapo akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah waisraeri, ‘murume mumwe nomumwe ngaapakate munondo parutivi rwake. mufambe mumusasa kubva kuno rumwe rutivi kusvika kuno rumwe, mumwe nomumwe achiuraya hama yake neshamwari yake nomuvakidzani wake.’ ” varevhi vakaita sezvavakarayirwa namozisi, uye nomusi uyo vanhu zviuru zvitatu vakafa. ipapo mozisi akati, “imi matsaurirwa yeahoh nhasi, nokuti makanga muchirwa navanakomana venyu uye nehama dzenyu, uye akuropafadzai nhasi.” fume mangwana mozisi akati kuvanhu, “maita chitadzo chikuru. asi zvino ndichaenda kuna yeahoh; zvimwe ndingagona kukuitirai yananiso nokuda kwechivi chenyu.” saka mozisi akadzokera kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa vanhu ava vaita chivi chikuru sei! vazviitira vamwari vegoridhe. asi zvino, ndapota hangu varegererei chivi chavo, asi kana zvisina kudaro, ipapo ndidzimei henyu mubhuku ramakanyora.” yeahoh akapindura mozisi akati, “ani naani anenge atadzirana neni ndichamudzima mubhuku rangu. zvino chienda, tungamirira vanhu kunzvimbo yandakataura nezvayo, uye mutumwa wangu achakutungamirirai. kunyange zvakadaro, nguva yokuti ndirange painosvika, ndichavaranga nokuda kwechivi chavo.” uye yeahoh akarova vanhu nedenda nokuda kwezvavakaita nemhuru yakaitwa naaroni.

33

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ibva panzvimbo ino, iwe navanhu vawakabudisa kubva muijipiti uye ukwidze kunyika yandakavimbisa nemhiko kuna abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho ndichiti, ‘ndichaipa kuzvizvarwa zvako.’ ndichatuma mutumwa pamberi pako agodzinga vakenani, vaamori, vahiti, vaperezi, vahivhi navajebhusi. kwidzai kunyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi. asi ini handiendi nemi, nokuti muri vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu uye ndingazokuparadzai munzira.” vanhu vakati vachinzwa mashoko anotambudza aya, vakatanga kuchema uye hapana munhu akashonga zvinoyevedza. nokuti yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi, “taurira vaisraeri uti, ‘muri vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu. kana dai ndingaende nemi kunyange kwenguva duku, ndingakuparadzai. zvino bvisai zvishongo zvenyu uye ini ndichafunga zvokuita nemi.’ ” saka vaisraeri vakabvisa zvishongo zvavo pagomo rehorebhi. zvino mozisi aisitora tende achiridzika kunze kwomusasa kachinhambwe, achiti ndiro “tende rokusangana.” munhu upi zvake ainge ane chaanoda kubvunza kuna yeahoh aienda kutende rokusangana kunze kwomusasa. uye pose paibuda mozisi achienda kutende, vanhu vose vaisimuka vachibva vamira pamikova yamatende avo, vakatarira mozisi kusvikira apinda mutende. kana mozisi apinda mutende, shongwe yegore yaiburuka yobva yamira pamukova, yeahoh achitaura namozisi. vanhu vaiti vangoona shongwe yegore pamukova wokupinda mutende, vose vaimira vobva vanamata, mumwe nomumwe pamukova wetende rake. yeahoh aizotaura namozisi uso nouso, somunhu anotaura neshamwari yake. ipapo mozisi aizodzokera kumusasa, asi mubatsiri wake yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni akanga asingabudi mutende. mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “imi manga muchiti kwandiri, ‘tungamirira vanhu ava,’ asi hamusati mandizivisa wamuchandituma naye. manga muchingoti, ‘ndinokuziva nezita rako uye wawana nyasha kwandiri.’ kana muchifadzwa neni, ndidzidzisei nzira dzenyu kuitira kuti ndigokuzivai uye ndirambe ndichiwana nyasha kwamuri. rangarirai kuti rudzi urwu vanhu venyu.” yeahoh akapindura akati, “kuvapo kwangu kuchaenda newe, uye ndichakupa zororo.” ipapo mozisi akati kwaari, “kana kuvapo kwenyu kusingaendi nesu, musatibvisa pano. vanhu vachaziva sei kuti munofadzwa neni uye navanhu venyu kana musina kuenda nesu? chiizve chicharatidza mutsauko pakati pangu navanhu venyu navamwe vanhu vose vari pamusoro penyika?” uye yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ndichaita chinhu ichocho chawakumbira, nokuti ndinofadzwa newe uye ndinokuziva nezita.” ipapo mozisi akati, “zvino ndiratidzei kubwinya kwenyu.” uye yeahoh akati, “ndichaita kuti kunaka kwangu kupfuure napamberi pako, uye ndichaparidza zita rangu, iro yeahoh, pamberi pako. ndichanzwira nyasha iye wandichanzwira nyasha, uye ndichanzwira tsitsi uyo wandichanzwira tsitsi.” akati, “asi haugoni kuona chiso changu, nokuti hapana munhu angandiona uye akararama.” ipapo yeahoh akati, “pane nzvimbo iri pedyo neni paungamira padombo. panopfuura kubwinya kwangu, ndichakuisa mumukaha wedombo uye ndichakufukidza noruoko rwangu kusvikira ndapfuura. ipapo ndichabvisa ruoko rwangu uye uchaona shure kwangu; asi chiso changu hachifaniri kuonekwa.”

34

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “veza matombo maviri amahwendefa akaita seokutanga, uye ndichanyora paari mashoko akanga ari pamahwendefa okutanga, awakaputsa. ugadzirire mangwanani, uye ipapo ugouya pamusoro pegomo resinai. uzviise kwandiri iwe ipapo pamusoro pegomo. hapana munhu anofanira kuuya newe kana kuonekwa papi zvapo pamusoro pegomo; kunyange makwai kana mombe zvinopfuura pamberi pegomo.” saka mozisi akaveza mahwendefa maviri amabwe akaita seokutanga uye akakwira pamusoro pegomo resinai mangwanani-ngwanani, sezvaakanga arayirwa nayeahoh; uye akatakura mahwendefa maviri amabwe mumaoko ake. ipapo yeahoh akaburuka kwaari ari mugore akamira naye ipapo uye akazivisa zita rake, yeahoh. uye akapfuura napamberi pamozisi, achizivisa achiti, “yeahoh, yeahoh, allah ane tsitsi nenyasha, anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo uye akatendeka, anoitira rudo kuzviuru zvamazana, uye achikanganwira zvakaipa, kumukira nechivi. asi haaregi ane mhosva asingarangwi; anoranga vana navana vavo nokuda kwechivi chamadzibaba avo kusvikira kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina.” mozisi akakotamira pasi akanamata. akati, “haiwa yeahoh, kana ndawana nyasha pamberi penyu, ipapo yeahoh ngaaende nesu. kunyange vanhu ava vane mitsipa mikukutu, regererai henyu kuipa kwedu nechivi chedu, uye mutitore senhaka yenyu.” ipapo akati, “ndava kuita sungano newe. ndichaita zvishamiso pamberi pavanhu vako zvisina kumboitwa kare mundudzi dzipi zvadzo munyika yose. vanhu vaunogara pakati pavo vachaona kuti basa randichakuitira ini, yeahoh rinotyisa sei. uteerere zvandinokurayira nhasi. ndichadzinga pamberi pako vaamori, vakenani, vahiti, vaperezi, vahivhi navajebhusi. uchenjerere kuti urege kuita sungano naavo vagere munyika yamunoenda kuti varege kuva musungo pakati penyu. putsirai aritari dzavo pasi, pwanyai matombo avo anoyera uye muteme matanda avo aashera. musanamata vamwe vamwari vapi zvavo, nokuti yeahoh, iye ane zita rinonzi godo, ndiye allah ane godo. “uchenjerere kuti urege kuita sungano naavo vanogara munyika;
