nokuti pavanenge voita ufeve hwavo kuna vamwari vavo uye vakabayira kwavari, vachakukokai uye muchadya zvibayiro zvavo. uye pamunosarudza vamwe vanasikana vavo kuti vave vakadzi vavanakomana venyu uye vanasikana avo vakaita ufeve navamwari vavo, vachatungamirira vanakomana venyu kuita zvimwe chetezvo. “musaita zvifananidzo zvakaumbwa. “mupemberere mutambo wezvingwa zvisina mbiriso. mudye chingwa chisina mbiriso kwamazuva manomwe, sezvandakurayirai. muite izvi panguva yakatarwa mumwedzi waabhibhi, nokuti mumwedzi iwoyo makabuda muijipiti. “chibereko chose chinotanga kuzarura chizvaro ndechangu, kusanganisira matangwe ose makono ezvipfuwo zvako, dzingava mombe kana makwai. udzikinure dangwe rembongoro negwayana, asi kana usingaridzikinuri, urivhune mutsipa waro. udzikinure matangwe ose kuvanakomana venyu. “hapana munhu anofanira kumira pamberi pangu asina chinhu. “mubate basa mazuva matanhatu, asi nezuva rechinomwe munofanira kuzorora; kunyange munguva dzokurima nedzokukohwa munofanira kuzorora. “mupemberere mutambo wemavhiki nezvibereko zvokutanga zvegorosi yakohwewa, uye mutambo wokuunganidza pakupera kwegore. katatu pagore, varume vose vanofanira kumira pamberi paishe yeahoh, allah waisraeri. ndichadzinga ndudzi pamberi penyu uye ndichakurisa nyika yenyu, uye hakuna munhu achachiva nyika yenyu pamunokwidzako katatu gore rimwe nerimwe, kuti mumire pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu. “musapa kwandiri ropa rezvibayiro pamwe chete nechinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso, uye musarega chimwe chezvibayiro zvomutambo wepasika chichisara kusvikira mangwanani. “muuyise zvakaisvonaka zvezvibereko zvevhu renyu zvokutanga kuimba yayeahoh allah wenyu. “musabika mbudzana mumukaka wamai vayo.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “nyora mashoko aya, nokuti maererano namashoko aya ndaita sungano newe uye neisraeri.” mozisi akanga ariko kuna yeahoh kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku makumi mana, asingadyi chingwa kana kunwa mvura. uye akanyora pamahwendefa mashoko esungano, iyo mirayiro gumi. mozisi akati aburuka mugomo resinai aine mahwendefa maviri echipupuriro mumaoko ake, akanga asingazivi kuti chiso chake chaibwinya nokuti akanga ataura nayeahoh. aroni navaisraeri vose pavakaona mozisi, chiso chake chakanga chichibwinya, uye vakatya kuswedera pedyo naye. asi mozisi akavadana; uye aroni navatungamiri vose vavanhu vakadzokera kwaari, uye akataura navo. shure kwaizvozvo vaisraeri vose vakaswedera pedyo naye akavapa mirayiro yose yaakanga apiwa nayeahoh mugomo resinai. mozisi akati apedza kutaura navo, akaisa chifukidzo pachiso chake. asi pose paaipinda pakuvapo kwayeahoh kuti ataure naye, aibvisa chifukidzo kusvikira abuda kunze. uye aiti paaibuda achiudza vaisraeri zvaainge arayirwa, vaiona kuti chiso chake chakanga chichibwinya. ipapo mozisi aizoisazve chifukidzo pachiso chake kusvikira apinda kundotaura nayeahoh.

35

mozisi akaunganidza ungano yose yavaisraeri akati kwavari, “izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvamakarayirwa nayeahoh kuti muite: mubate basa, mazuva matanhatu, asi zuva rechinomwe richava zuva dzvene kwamuri, sabata rokuzorora kuna yeahoh. ani naani anoita basa ripi zvaro pazuva iro anofanira kuurayiwa. musabatidze moto panzvimbo ipi zvayo yamugere pazuva resabata.” mozisi akati kuungano yose yavaisraeri, “izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh: kubva pane zvamunazvo, mutore chipiriso chayeahoh. ani naani anoda ngaauyise kuna yeahoh chipiriso: “chegoridhe, sirivha uye nendarira; wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka; mvere dzembudzi; matehwe amakondobwe akapendwa zvitsvuku namatehwe emombe dzomugungwa; matanda omuunga; mafuta omuorivhi emwenje; zvinonhuhwira zvamafuta okuzodza uye namafuta anonhuhwira kwazvo; mabwe eonikisi namamwe mabwe anokosha okuisa paefodhi nechidzitiro chechipfuva. “vose vane umhizha pakati penyu ngavauye vazogadzira zvinhu zvose zvakarayirwa nayeahoh: “tabhenakeri netende rayo uye nechifukidzo chayo, zvikorekedzo, mapuranga, mbariro, mapango nezvigadziko; areka namapango ayo, chifunhiro chokuyananisa uye nechidzitiro chinochidzivirira; tafura namapango ayo uye midziyo yayo yose uye nechingwa chokuratidza; chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho, mwenje namafuta omwenje; aritari yezvinonhuhwira namapango ayo, mafuta okuzodza uye nezvinonhuhwira kwazvo; chidzitiro chapamukova wokupinda kutabhenakeri; aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pamwe chete nechiparo chacho chendarira, mapango ayo nemidziyo yayo yose; mudziyo wokushambira wendarira nechigadziko chawo; zvidzitiro zvaparuvazhe namatanda azvo nezvigadziko, uye chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda paruvazhe; hoko dzetende retabhenakeri uye dzeparuvazhe, netambo dzacho; nguo dzakarukwa dzinopfekwa pakushumira munzvimbo tsvene, zvose nguo tsvene yaaroni muprista nenguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista.” ipapo ungano yose yavaisraeri yakabva pamberi pamozisi, uye munhu wose aida uye akasundwa nomwoyo wake akauya nechipiriso kuna yeahoh chebasa rapatende rokusangana, noushumiri hwayo hwose, nezvenguo tsvene. vose vakanga vachida, zvose varume navakadzi, vakauya nezvishongo zvegoridhe zvemhando dzose zvaiti: zvikorekedzo, mhete dzenzeve, mhete uye nezvishongo zvoukomba. vose vakapa goridhe ravo sechipiriso chokuninira kuna yeahoh. munhu wose akanga aine wuru yebhuruu, pepuru kana tsvuku kana mucheka wakaisvonaka, kana mvere dzembudzi, matehwe amakondobwe akapendwa zvitsvuku kana matehwe emombe dzomugungwa, vakauya nazvo. vaya vaipa chipiriso chesirivha kana ndarira vakauya nazvo sechipiriso kuna yeahoh, uye vose vaiva namatanda omuunga echikamu chipi zvacho chebasa vakauya nawo. mukadzi wose aigona kuruka akaruka namaoko ake uye akauyisa zvaakanga aruka, wuru yebhuruu, pepuru kana tsvuku kana mucheka wakaisvonaka. uye vakadzi vose vaida zvavo uye vaiva nounyanzvi hwokuruka, vakaruka mvere dzembudzi. vatungamiriri vakauya namabwe eonikisi namamwewo mabwe kuti azoiswa paefodhi napachidzitiro chechipfuva. vakauyawo nezvinonhuhwira namafuta omuorivhi emwenje uye namafuta okuzodza namafuta anonhuhwira kwazvo. vaisraeri vose, varume navakadzi vakanga vachida havo, vakavigira yeahoh zvipiriso zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira zvebasa rose rakanga rarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh kuti vaite. ipapo mozisi akati kuvaisraeri, “tarirai, yeahoh asarudza bhezareri mwanakomana wauri, mwanakomana wahuri, worudzi rwayeahudha, uye amuzadza nomweya waallah, nenjere, nokugona uye noruzivo rwemhando dzose dzoumhizha, kuti aite zvinhu zvinoyevedza zvebasa regoridhe, sirivha nendarira, kuveza nokuronga mabwe, kushanda mukuveza matanda uye nokuita mhando dzose dzoumhizha. uye apa vose vari vaviri iye naohoriabhu mwanakomana waahisamaki, worudzi rwadhani kugona kudzidzisa vamwe. avazadza nenjere dzokuita mhando dzose dzebasa semhizha, vasoni, navasuki vewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka, vose zvavo imhizha huru navasoni.”

36

“saka bhezareri, ohoriabhu uye nomunhu wose wounyanzvi apiwa unyanzvi nayeahoh uye kugona kuziva maitirwo ebasa rokuvaka imba tsvene ngavaite basa sezvakarayirwa nayeahoh.” ipapo mozisi akadana bhezareri naohoriabhu uye nomunhu wose wounyanzvi uyo akapiwa kugona nayeahoh uye akanga achida hake kuuya kuzoshanda basa. vakagamuchira kubva kuna mozisi zvipo zvose zvakanga zvauya navaisraeri kuti zvishandiswe pabasa rokuvaka imba tsvene. uye vanhu vakaramba vachiuyisa zvipo zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira mangwanani oga oga. saka varume vose voumhizha vakanga vachiita basa rose rapaimba tsvene vakasiya basa ravo vakati kuna mozisi, “vanhu vari kuuya nezvakawandisa zvokuitisa basa rakarayirwa nayeahoh kuti riitwe.” ipapo mozisi akarayira uye vakatuma shoko iri pakati pomusasa wose vachiti, “ngakurege kuva nomurume kana mukadzi achaitazve chimwe chinhu sechipo chenzvimbo tsvene.” nokudaro vanhu vakadziviswa kuuyisa zvimwe, nokuti zvavakanga vatova nazvo zvakanga zvatowandisa pane zvaidiwa kuita basa rose. varume vose vounyanzvi vakaita tabhenakeri nezvidzitiro gumi zvemicheka yakarukwa zvakaisvonaka newuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, namakerubhi akasonerwa mazviri nemhizha ino unyanzvi. zvidzitiro zvose zvakanga zvakaenzana, zvakareba makubhiti makumi maviri namasere uye makubhiti mana paupamhi. vakabatanidza zvimwe zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete uye vakaita zvimwe chetezvo pane zvimwe zvishanu. ipapo vakaita zvishwe zvomucheka webhuruu zvichitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokumucheto mumubatanidzwa mumwe chete, zvimwe chetezvo zvikaitwawo kune chimwe chidzitiro chokumucheto. vakaitawo zvishwe makumi mashanu pachidzitiro chimwe chete uye zvishwe makumi mashanu pachidzitiro chokupedzisira chezvimwe zvakabatanidzwa nezvishwe zvakanga zvakatarisana. ipapo vakaita zvikorekedzo zvegoridhe makumi mashanu ndokuzvishandisa kusonanidza zvibatanidzwa zviviri zvezvidzitiro pamwe chete kuitira kuti tabhenakeri ive chinhu chimwe chete. vakaita zvidzitiro zvemvere dzembudzi zvetende rapamusoro petabhenakeri, gumi nechimwe pamwe chete. zvidzitiro zvose zviri gumi nechimwe zvakanga zvakaenzana, makubhiti makumi matatu pakureba uye makubhiti mana paupamhi. vakabatanidza zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete kuti zvive mubatanidzwa mumwe chete, uye zvimwe zvitanhatu kuti zvive pamwe chete. ipapo vakaita zvishwe makumi mashanu zvaitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokupedzisira muchibatanidzwa chimwe chete uyewo zvichitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokupedzisira muno mumwe mubatanidzwa. vakaita zvikorekedzo zvendarira makumi mashanu kuti zvisunganidze tende pamwe chete zvive sechinhu chimwe chete. ipapo vakagadzirira tende chifukidzo chamatehwe amakondobwe akapendwa zvitsvuku, uye pamusoro pacho chifunhiro chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa. vakaita mapuranga akamiswa amatanda omuunga etabhenakeri. puranga rimwe nerimwe rakanga rakareba makubhiti gumi uye kubhiti rimwe nehafu paupamhi, nembambo mbiri dzakamiswa dzakatarisana. vakaita mapuranga ose etabhenakeri nenzira iyi. vakaita mapuranga makumi maviri kurutivi rwezasi kwetabhenakeri uye vakaita makumi mana ezvigadziko zvesirivha kuti zviende pasi pazvo, zvigadziko zviviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe, chimwe chete pasi pembato imwe neimwe. kuno rumwe rutivi, rutivi rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri, vakaita mapuranga makumi maviri uye makumi mana ezvigadziko zvesirivha, zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. vakaita mapuranga matanhatu okumucheto cheto, iko kumavirira kwetabhenakeri, uye mapuranga maviri akanga akagadzirirwa makona etabhenakeri nechokumucheto cheto. pamakona maviri aya mapuranga aiva maviri kubva pasi kusvikira kumusoro uye akaiswa mumhete imwe chete; ose akanga akagadzirwa zvakafanana. saka pakanga pana mapuranga masere uye zvigadziko gumi nezvitanhatu zvesirivha, zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. vakaitawo mbariro dzomuti womuunga: shanu dzamapuranga aiva pano rumwe rutivi rwetabhenakeri, shanu dzaaya aiva kuno rumwe rutivi, uye shanu dzamapuranga aiva kumavirira, pamucheto cheto kwetabhenakeri. vakaita mbariro yapakati kuitira kuti ichinjike kubva kumucheto kusvikira kumucheto pakati pamapuranga. vakafukidza mapuranga negoridhe uye vakaita mhete dzegoridhe kuti dzibate mbariro. vakafukidzawo mbariro negoridhe. vakaita zvidzitiro zvewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, namakerubhi akasonerwa pauri nemhizha ino unyanzvi. vakaita matanda mana omuti womuunga vakaafukidza negoridhe. vakaaitira zvikorekedzo zvegoridhe uye vakaumba zvigadziko zvawo zvina zvesirivha. vakaita chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda mutende chewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye mucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romuruki; uye vakaita matanda mashanu nezvikorekedzo zvawo. vakafukidza misoro yamatanda nehata dzawo negoridhe uye vakaita zvigadziko zvawo zvishanu zvendarira.

37

bhezareri akaita areka yamatanda omuunga, yakareba makubhiti maviri nehafu, kubhiti rimwe nehafu paupamhi, uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafu pakukwirira. akaifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka, zvose mukati nokunze, uye akaita hata yegoridhe yakaipoteredza. akaiumbira mhete dzegoridhe ina akadziisa pamakumbo ayo mana, nemhete mbiri pano rumwe rutivi uye dzimwe mbiri kuno rumwezve rutivi. ipapo akaita mapango omuti womuunga uye akaafukidza negoridhe. uye akapinza mapango mukati memhete parutivi rweareka okuitakura nawo. akagadzira chifunhiro chokuyananisa chegoridhe rakaisvonaka, makubhiti maviri nehafu pakureba uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafu paupamhi. ipapo akaita makerubhi maviri negoridhe rakapambadzirwa kumacheto echifunhiro. akaita kerubhi rimwe chete kurutivi rumwe chete rwokumucheto uye kerubhi rechipiri kuno rumwezve rutivi, mativi okumucheto ari maviri akaaita chinhu chimwe chete nechifunhiro. mapapiro amakerubhi akanga akatambanudzirwa kumusoro, achifukidza chifunhiro nomumvuri wawo. makerubhi akanga akatarisana, akatarisa kuchifunhiro. vakagadzira tafura namatanda omuunga, yakareba makubhiti maviri, uye kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafu pakukwirira. ipapo vakaifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakagadzira hata yegoridhe yakaipoteredza. vakaiitirawo mukombero wakaipoteredza une upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruoko ndokuisa hata yegoridhe pamukombero. vakaumba mhete ina dzegoridhe dzetafura uye vakadzisungirira pamakona mana, paya pakanga pana makumbo. mhete dzakaiswa pedyo nomukombero kuti dzibate mapango aishandiswa pakutakura tafura. mapango okutakura tafura akagadzirwa namatanda omuunga uye akanga akafukidzwa negoridhe. uye vakaita nhumbi dzetafura negoridhe rakaisvonaka, ndiro dzayo, madhishi nemikombe uye nezvirongo zvayo zvokudururira zvipiriso zvinonwiwa. vakagadzira chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakaripambadzira, chigadziko nerwiriko; mikombe inenge maruva, mabukira namaruva zvaiva chinhu chimwe chete nacho. mapazi matanhatu akaiswa kubva kumativi echigadziko chomwenje, matatu kurutivi rumwe chete uye mamwe matatu kuno rumwe rutivi. mikombe mitatu yakanga yakaumbwa seruva remuarimondi namabukira namaruva makuru zvakanga zviri pane rimwe davi, matatu padavi raitevera uye zvakanga zvakaita saizvozvo pamatavi ose ari matanhatu aibva pachigadziko chomwenje. uye pamusoro pechigadziko chomwenje paiva nemikombe mina yakanga yakaumbwa seruva romuarimondi namabukira uye namaruva makuru. bukira rimwe chete rakanga riri pasi pamatavi maviri okutanga aibva pachigadziko chomwenje, bukira rechipiri rakanga riri pasi pamatavi maviri aitevera, uye bukira rechitatu rakanga riri pasi pamatavi mamwezve maviri, ose ari matanhatu pamwe chete. mabukira namatavi zvaiva chinhu chimwe chete nechigadziko chomwenje, chegoridhe rakaisvonaka rakapambadzirwa. vakaita mwenje yacho minomwe, pamwe chete nembato dzacho uye nendiro dzacho, dzegoridhe rakaisvonaka. vakaita chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho dzose kubva patarenda rimwe chete regoridhe rakaisvonaka. vakaita aritari yezvinonhuhwira namatanda omuunga. yakanga yakaenzana mativi ose ari mana, yakareba kubhiti rimwe chete uye kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, uye makubhiti maviri pakukwirira kwayo, nyanga dzayo dziri chinhu chimwe chete nayo. vakafukidza pamusoro payo nokumativi ose uye nenyanga, negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uye vakagadzira hata yakaipoteredza. vakaita mhete dzegoridhe mbiri pasi pehata, mbiri kuno rumwe rutivi, kuti dzibate mapango aishandiswa pakuitakura. vakagadzira mapango omuti womuunga uye vakaafukidza negoridhe. vakagadzirawo mafuta matsvene okuzodza uye nezvinonhuhwira kwazvo zvakaisvonaka, basa romuvhenganisi wezvinonhuhwira.

38

vakavaka aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa yamatanda omuunga, yakakwirira makubhiti matatu; yakanga yakaenzana mativi ayo mana ina makubhiti mashanu pakureba uye namakubhiti mashanu paupamhi hwayo. vakagadzira runyanga pamakona mana ose zvokuti nyanga nearitari zvakanga zvava chinhu chimwe chete, uye vakafukidza aritari nendarira. vakaita midziyo yayo yose nendarira, hari dzayo, foshoro dzayo, midziyo yokusasa zvibayiso zvenyama uye namakango apamoto. vakaitira aritari chiparo, mumbure wendarira, kuti chive pasi pechitsiko chayo, pakati napakati pokukwirira kwearitari. vakaumba mhete dzendarira kuti dzibate mapango amakona mana echiparo chendarira. vakaita mapango omuti womuunga vakaafukidza nendarira. vakapinza mapango mukati memhete kuitira kuti agova pamativi earitari, kuti vaitakure nawo. vakaiita namapuranga, isina chinhu mukati. vakagadzira mudziyo wokushambira wendarira uye nezvigadziko zvawo zvendarira kubva pazvionioni zvamadzimai aishumira pamukova wokupinda mutende rokusangana. pashure vakaita ruvazhe. rutivi rwezasi rwakanga rwakareba makubhiti zana uye rwaiva nezvidzitiro zvomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, namatanda makumi maviri uye nezvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri, nezvikorekedzo zvesirivha uye nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. rutivi rwokumusorowo rwakanga runa makubhiti zana pakureba uye rwakanga rune matanda makumi maviri nezvigadziko zvendarira, ine zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. mucheto wokumavirira wakanga una makubhiti makumi mashanu paupamhi, uye kwaiva nezvidzitiro, namatanda gumi uye nezvigadziko gumi, nezvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. kumucheto wokumabvazuva, wakananga kunobuda nezuva, kwaivawo noupamhi hwamakubhiti makumi mashanu. zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanu zvaiva kurutivi rumwe chete rwomukova, namatanda matatu ezvigadziko zvitatu, uye zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanu zvaiva kuno rumwe rutivi rwokupinda muruvazhe, namatanda matatu uye nezvigadziko zvitatu. zvidzitiro zvose zvaipoteredza ruvazhe zvaiva zvomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. zvigadziko zvamatanda zvakanga zviri zvendarira. zvikorekedzo nezvisungo zvaiva pamatanda zvaiva zvesirivha, uye misoro yawo yakanga yakafukidzwa nesirivha; saka matanda ose oruvazhe akanga ane zvisungo zvesirivha. chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda muruvazhe chaiva chewuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romuruki. chakanga chakareba makubhiti makumi maviri, chakaita sechidzitiro chaparuvazhe, makubhiti mashanu kukwirira kwacho, namatanda mana uye nezvigadziko zvendarira zvina. zvikorekedzo zvazvo nezvisungo zvazvo zvaiva zvesirivha, uye misoro yacho yakanga yakafukidzwa nesirivha. mbambo dzose dzetende retabhenakeri nezvaipoteredza ruvazhe zvaiva zvendarira. uku ndiko kuwanda kwezvinhu zvakashandiswa patabhenakeri, iyo tabhenakeri yechipupuriro, zvakanyorwa pakurayira kwamozisi navarevhi vari pasi paitamari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista. bhezareri mwanakomana wauri, mwanakomana wahuri, worudzi rwayeahudha, akagadzira zvose zvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh; aiva nadhoriabhu mwanakomana waahisamaki, worudzi rwadhani, mhizha nomusoni, uye musoni wewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakaisvonaka. kuwanda kwegoridhe rose rakabva kuzvipiriso zvokuninira rakashandiswa pabasa rose rapaimba tsvene kwaiva matarenda makumi maviri namapfumbamwe namashekeri mazana manomwe ana makumi matatu, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene. sirivha yakawanikwa yakabva kuna avo veungano vakaverengwa pakunyorwa, yaiva matarenda zana, uye chiuru chimwe namazana manomwe namakumi manomwe namashanu amashekeri, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, bheka rimwe chete pamunhu, ndiyo hafu yeshekeri, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, kubva kumunhu wose akanga ayambukira kuna avo vakanga vatoverengwa, vana makore makumi maviri kana kupfuura, varume vakanga vari zviuru mazana matanhatu navatatu namazana mashanu ana makumi mashanu. matarenda zana esirivha akashandiswa kugadzira zvigadziko zvenzvimbo tsvene pachidzitiro, zvigadziko zana zvaibva pamatarenda zana, tarenda rimwe chete pachigadziko chimwe nechimwe. vakashandisa mashekeri chiuru chimwe chete namazana manomwe namakumi manomwe namashanu uye kuti vagadzire zvikorekedzo zvamatanda, kufukidza misoro yamatanda, uye vagadzire zvisungo zvawo. ndarira yakabva kuzvipiriso zvokuninira yaiva matarenda makumi manomwe namashekeri zviuru zviviri namazana mana. vakaishandisa kugadzira nheyo dzomukova wetende rokusangana, aritari yendarira, chiparo chayo chendarira nemidziyo yayo yose, nheyo dzepakapoteredza ruvazhe nedzomukova warwo nembambo dzose dzetende retabhenakeri uye nezvose zvakapoteredza ruvazhe.

39

kubva pawuru yebhuruu nepepuru netsvuku, vakaita nguo dzakarukwa dzoushumiri munzvimbo tsvene. vakaitawo nguo tsvene dzaaroni, sokurayira kwakaita yeahoh kuna mozisi. vakaita efodhi yegoridhe, wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. vakapambadzira goridhe rikava marata matete uye vakagura tuwaya kuti tupfekerwe muwuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku uye mumucheka wakaisvonaka, basa remhizha ino unyanzvi. vakaita zvipenga zvapapfudzi zveefodhi, zvaibatanidzwa pana mamwe makona ayo maviri, kuti isimbiswe. bhanhire rayo romuchiuno rakarukwa nounyanzvi rakanga rakafanana nayo, zvaive chinhu chimwe neefodhi uye zvakagadzirwa negoridhe, newuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, sokurayirwa kwakaitwa mozisi nayeahoh. vakagadzira matombo eonikisi vakaanyudza mukati mamaruva egoridhe uye vakanyora norunyoro rwokutema padombo sezvinoitwa padombo rechisimbiso ramazita avanakomana vaisraeri. ipapo vakaisa pamapenga apamapfudzi eefodhi matombo echirangaridzo chavana vaisraeri sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. vakaita chidzitiro chechipfuva, basa remhizha ino unyanzvi. vakachiita seefodhi: negoridhe, uye wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. chakanga chakaenzana mativi acho ose ari mana, chakaenzana nechanza paurefu uye chakaenzana nechanza paupamhi uye chakapetwa kaviri. ipapo vakagadzira mitsara mina yamatombo anokosha pamusoro pacho. mumutsara wokutanga makanga mune ibwe rerubhi, topazi nebheriri; mumutsara wechipiri maiva netekoisi, nesafire uye neemaradhi; mumutsara wechitatu maiva nejasindi, neagati uye neametisiti; mumutsara wechina maiva nekirisoriti, neonikisi uye nejasipa. akanga akagadzirwa mukati mamaruva egoridhe. paiva namatombo gumi namaviri, rimwe richimirira rimwe ramazita avanakomana vaisraeri, rimwe nerimwe rakanyorwa, sorunyoro rwakatemwa padombo sechisimbiso, chine rimwe ramazita amarudzi gumi namaviri. chidzitiro chechipfuva vakachiitirawo uketani hwakarukwa negoridhe rakaisvonaka, rwakaita setambo. vakaita maruva maviri egoridhe nemhete mbiri dzegoridhe, uye vakasungirira mhete idzi pana mamwe amakona maviri echidzitiro chechipfuva. vakasungirira humwe uketani huviri hwegoridhe pamhete dzapamakona echidzitiro chechipfuva, uye mimwe miromo youketani pamaruva maviri, zvichibatanidzwa pazvipenga zvapamapfudzi eefodhi nechemberi. vakagadzira mhete dzegoridhe mbiri vakadzibatanidza namamwe makona maviri echidzitiro chechipfuva pamupendero nechomukati pedyo neefodhi. ipapo vakagadzira dzimwezve mhete mbiri dzegoridhe uye vakadzibatanidza nechepasi pezvipenga zvamapfudzi pamberi peefodhi, pedyo nemusono uri nechapamusoro pebhanhire romuchiuno refodhi. vakasungirira mhete dzapachidzitiro chapachipfuva pamhete dzapaefodhi netambo yebhuruu, ichiibatanidza nebhanhire romuchiuno kuitira kuti chidzitiro chechipfuva chirege kubva paefodhi, sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. vakaita jasi reefodhi nomucheka webhuruu yoga, basa romuruki, rakazaruka pakati pejasi sokuzaruka kwekora, uye mupendero wakapoteredza buri iri, kuitira kuti rirege kubvaruka. vakaita matamba ewuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka wakapoteredza mupendero wejasi. uye vakaita matare egoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakaabatanidza achipoteredza mupendero pakati pamatamba. matare namatamba akanga achipesana akapoteredza mupendero wejasi rinofanira kupfekwa pakushumira, sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. vakaitira aroni navanakomana vake, majasi omucheka wakaisvonaka, basa romuruki, uye nguwani yomucheka wakaisvonaka, bhanhire romucheka romumusoro uye nenguo dzapasi dzomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka. ndaza yacho yakanga iri yomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka wewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, basa romuruki, sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. vakagadzira ndiro, korona tsvene, yegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye yakanyorwa pairi, sorunyoro rwapachisimbiso, kuti: mutsvene kuna jehovha. ipapo vakasungirira tambo yebhuruu pairi kuti ibatanidzwe nenguwani, sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. saka basa rose patabhenakeri, tende rokusangana, rakapera. vaisraeri vakaita zvinhu zvose sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi. ipapo vakauya netabhenakeri kuna mozisi: tende nenhumbi dzaro dzose, zvikorekedzo zvayo, mapuranga, mbariro, matanda nezvigadziko; chifukidzo chamatehwe amakondobwe akapendwa zvitsvuku, chifukidzo chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa nezvidzitiro zvokudzivirira; areka yechipupuriro namapango ayo nechifunhiro chokuyananisa; tafura nemidziyo yayo dzose nechingwa chokuratidza; zvigadziko zvomwenje zvegoridhe rakaisvonaka nemitsara yacho yemwenje, nhumbi dzayo dzose, namafuta omwenje; aritari yegoridhe, mafuta okuzodza, zvinonhuhwira kwazvo nechidzitiro chapamukova wetende; aritari yendarira, chiparo chayo chendarira, mapango ayo nemidziyo yayo yose; dhishi nechigadziko charo; zvidzitiro zvoruvazhe namatanda nezvigadziko zvarwo, uye chidzitiro chapamukova woruvazhe; tambo nembambo dzetende dzaparuvazhe; midziyo yose yetabhenakeri, tende rokusangana; uye jasi rakarukwa rinopfekwa pakushumira munzvimbo tsvene, zvose nguo tsvene dzaaroni muprista nenguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista. vaisraeri vakanga vaita basa rose sokurayira kwayeahoh kuna mozisi. mozisi akaongorora basa uye akaona kuti vakanga variita sokurayira kwakanga kwaita yeahoh. saka mozisi akavaropafadza.

40

ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “dzika tabhenakeri, tende rokusangana, pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wokutanga. uise areka yechipupuriro mairi uye ugofukidza areka nechidzitiro. upinze tafura ugoisa zvinhu zvayo pairi. ipapo ugopinza chigadziko chomwenje ugomisa mwenje yacho. uise aritari yezvinonhuhwira yegoridhe pamberi peareka yechipupuriro uye ugoisa chidzitiro pamukova wokupinda mutabhenakeri. “uise aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pamberi pomukova wokupinda kutabhenakeri, tende rokusangana; uise dhishi pakati petende rokusangana nearitari ugoisa mvura mariri. ugadzire ruvazhe rwakaipoteredza uye ugoisa chidzitiro pamukova woruvazhe. “utore mafuta okuzodza ugozodza tabhenakeri nezvinhu zvose zvirimo; uinatse nemidziyo yayo yose, uye ichava tsvene. ipapo ugozodza aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nemidziyo yayo yose; unatse aritari, uye ichava tsvene-tsvene. uzodze dhishi nechigadziko charo ugozvinatsa. “uuye naaroni navanakomana vake kumukova wetende rokusangana ugovashambidza nemvura. ipapo ugopfekedza aroni nguo tsvene, umuzodze uye ugomunatsa kuti agondishumira somuprista. uuyise vanakomana vake ugovapfekedza majasi. uvazodze sokuzodza kwawaita baba vavo, kuti vagondishumira savaprista. kuzodzwa kwavo kuchava kwouprista hucharamba huripo kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera.” mozisi akaita zvose sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh. saka tabhenakeri yakamiswa pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wokutanga mugore rechipiri. mozisi akati amisa tabhenakeri, akaisa zvigadziko panzvimbo yazvo, akadzika mapuranga, akapinza mbariro uye akamisa matanda. ipapo akatambanudza tende akariisa pamusoro petabhenakeri ndokuisa chifukidzo pamusoro petende, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh. akatora chipupuriro akachiisa muareka, akabatanidza mapango paareka uye akaisa chifunhiro chokuyananisa pamusoro payo. ipapo akauyisa areka mutabhenakeri ndokuturika chidzitiro chokufukidzira akafukidza areka yechipupuriro, sokurayira kwakaita yeahoh. mozisi akaisa tafura mutende rokusangana nechokurutivi rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri kunze kwechidzitiro uye akaisa chingwa pamusoro payo pamberi payeahoh, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh. akaisa chigadziko chomwenje mutende rokusangana chakatarisana netafura nechokurutivi rwezasi rwetabhenakeri uye akamisa mwenje pamberi payeahoh, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh. mozisi akaisa aritari yegoridhe mutende rokusangana pamberi pechidzitiro, uye akapisa zvinonhuhwira pairi, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh. ipapo akaisa chidzitiro pamukova wetabhenakeri. akamisa aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pedyo nomukova wetabhenakeri, tende rokusangana, akapa pairi zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezviyo, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh. akaisa dhishi pakati petende rokusangana nearitari uye akaisa mvura yokushamba mariri, uye mozisi naaroni navanakomana vake vakaishandisa kushamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo. vaishamba pose pavaipinda mutende rokusangana kana kuswedera paaritari, sokurayirwa kwakaitwa mozisi nayeahoh. ipapo mozisi akaita ruvazhe rwakapoteredza tabhenakeri nearitari uye akaturika chidzitiro pamukova wokupinda muruvazhe. nokudaro mozisi akapedza basa. ipapo gore rakafukidza tende rokusangana, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakazadza tabhenakeri. mozisi haana kugona kupinda mutende rokusangana nokuti gore rakanga ragara pariri, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakazadza tabhenakeri. mukufamba kwose kwavaisraeri, pose paisimuka gore kubva pamusoro petabhenakeri, ivo vaisimuka vachienda; asi kana gore risina kubva, vakanga vasingafambi, kusvikira pazuva rarinosimuka. saka gore rayeahoh raiva pamusoro petabhenakeri masikati; uye moto wakanga uri mugore usiku, pamberi peimba yose yaisraeri panguva yokufamba kwavo kwose.

leviticus

1

yeahoh akadana mozisi akataura naye ari mutende rokusangana akati, “taura kuvana vaisraeri uti kwavari, ‘kana munhu upi zvake pakati penyu achiuya nechipiriso kuna yeahoh ngaauye nechipiriso chezvipfuwo, zvemombe kana zvamakwai. “ ‘kana chipiriso chake chiri chinopiswa chinobva mudanga remombe, ngaape chikono chisina kuremara. ngaachibayire pamusuo wetende rokusangana kuti chigamuchirwe pamberi payeahoh. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro pechibayiro chinopiswa uye chichagamuchirwa chakamumirira iye kuti chimuyananisire. ngaabaye hando diki pamberi payeahoh uye ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vaprista vachauya neropa vagorisasa paaritari kumativi ose pamusuo wokupinda nawo mutende rokusangana. anofanira kuvhiya chipiriso chinopiswa agochicheka kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu. vanakomana vaaroni, muprista, vanofanira kuisa moto paaritari vagoronga huni pamoto. ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vaprista vacharonga zvidimbu zvenyama, zvichisanganisira musoro namafuta pamusoro pehuni dzinenge dzichipfuta paaritari. anofanira kusuka nyama yomukati namakumbo nemvura, uye muprista agopisa zvose paaritari. chipiriso chinopiswa, chipiriso chinogadzirwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. “ ‘kana chipiriso chiri chinopiswa, chinobva muzvipfuwo, chiri chegwai kana chembudzi, anofanira kupa chikono chisina kuremara. ngaachibayire parutivi rwearitari nechokumusoro pamberi payeahoh, vanakomana vaaroni vaprista vagosasa ropa kumativi ose earitari. anofanira kucheka nyama muzvidimbu uye muprista achaironga pamwe chete nomusoro namafuta pamusoro pehuni dzinenge dzichipfuta paaritari. anofanira kusuka nyama yomukati namakumbo nemvura, uye muprista anofanira kuuyisa zvose agozvipisa pamusoro pearitari. chibayiro chinopiswa, chibayiro chakagadzirwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. “ ‘kana chipiriso chake kuna yeahoh chiri chipiriso chinopiswa cheshiri, ngaape njiva kana hangaiwa ichiri diki. muprista achaiisa paaritari agodambura musoro, oipisa paaritari; ropa rayo richaerera parutivi pearitari. ngaabvise chihururu neminhenga agozvikanda kumabvazuva kwearitari kunenge kune madota. achaibvambura namapapiro ayo asingaiparadzanisi zvachose, muprista agoipisa pahuni dziri pamoto uri paaritari. chipiriso chinopiswa, chipiriso chakagadzirwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh.

2

“ ‘kana munhu achiuya kuna yeahoh nechipiriso chezviyo, chipiriso chake chinofanira kuva choupfu hwakatsetseka. anofanira kudira mafuta pachiri agoisa zvinonhuhwira pamusoro pacho, agoenda nacho kuvanakomana vaaroni vaprista. muprista achatora tsama youpfu hwakatsetseka namafuta, pamwe chete nezvinonhuhwira, agozvipisa sechikamu chechirangaridzo paaritari. chipiriso chakagadzirwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. zvimwe zvose zvinosara pazvipiriso zvezviyo ndezvaaroni navanakomana vake, chikamu chitsvene-tsvene chezvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. “ ‘kana ukauya nechipiriso chezviyo zvakabikwa muchitofu chinofanira kuva choupfu hwakatsetseka: makeke anenge aitwa asina mbiriso uye akasanganiswa namafuta kana kuti makeke matete asina mbiriso akazorwa mafuta. kana chipiriso chako chezviyo chagadzirirwa mugango, chinofanira kugadzirwa noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa namafuta pasina mbiriso. unofanira kuchipfupfunyura ugodira mafuta pachiri; ichi chipiriso chezviyo. kana chipiriso chako chezviyo chakabikwa mugango chinofanira kuva choupfu hwakatsetseka namafuta. uuye nechipiriso chezviyo chakaitwa nezvinhu izvi kuna yeahoh, ugochipa kumuprista achachiendesa kuaritari. muprista achatora kubva muchipiriso chezviyo chikamu chechirangaridzo agochipisa paaritari sechipiriso chinogadzirwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. zvinosara pazvipiriso zvezviyo ndezvaaroni navanakomana vake, chikamu chitsvene-tsvene chezvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. “ ‘zvipiriso zvose zvezviyo zvamunouya nazvo kuna yeahoh zvinofanira kugadzirwa pasina mbiriso nokuti hamufaniri kupisa chero mbiriso kana uchi muchipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. munokwanisa kuzviuyisa kuna yeahoh sechipiriso chezvirimwa zvamunotanga kukohwa asi hazvifaniri kuuyiswa paaritari somunhuwi unonhuhwira zvinofadza. rungai zvipiriso zvenyu zvose zvezviyo nomunyu. musasiya munyu wesungano yaallah wenyu pazvipiriso zvenyu zvose zvezviyo; muise munyu muzvipiriso zvenyu zvose zvezviyo. “ ‘kana uchiuyisa chipiriso chezviyo zvokutanga kuna yeahoh upe hura dzezviyo zvitsva zvakakangwa pamoto uye zvakakuyiwa. uise mafuta nezvinonhuhwira pazviri, chipiriso chezviyo. muprista achapisa chikamu chechirangaridzo chezviyo zvakakuyiwa, namafuta, pamwe chete nezvose zvinonhuhwira, sechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto.

3

“ ‘kana chipiriso chomumwe chiri chokuwadzana, uye akapa chipfuwo, chichibva mudanga, chingava chikono kana chikadzi, anofanira kuuyisa pamberi payeahoh chipfuwo chisina kuremara. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro pechibayiro chake agochibayira pamusuo wetende rokusangana. ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vaprista vachasasa ropa kumativi ose earitari. kubva pachipiriso chokuwadzana anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinoitwa nomoto kuna yeahoh, mafuta ose anofukidza ura, kana akabatana nahwo, itsvo mbiri namafuta ari pamusoro padzo, pedyo napachiuno, nezvinofukidza chiropa, zvaachabvisa pamwe chete neitsvo. ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vanofanira kuzvipisa paaritari pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa chinenge chichitsva pamoto, sechibayiro chinoitwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. “ ‘kana achipa gwai sechipiriso chokuwadzana kuna allah anofanira kupa gono kana gadzi risina kuremara. kana achipa gwayana, anofanira kuriuyisa pamberi payeahoh. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro pechibayiro chake agochiuraya pamberi petende rokusangana. ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vachasasa ropa paaritari kumativi ose. kubva pachipiriso chokuwadzana anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, mafuta acho, ose mafuta echimuswe chakakora chakadimurwa, nechapamusana, ose mafuta akafukidza ura neakabatana nahwo, itsvo mbiri namafuta ari padziri pedyo nechiuno nezvakafukidza chiropa, achazvibvisa pamwe chete neitsvo. muprista achazvipisa paaritari sezvokudya, chipiriso chinoitwa kuna allah nomoto. “ ‘kana chipiriso chake chiri mbudzi, anofanira kuipa kuna yeahoh. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro payo agoibayira pamberi petende rokusangana. ipapo vanakomana vaaroni vachasasa ropa rayo paaritari kumativi ose. kubva kune zvaanopa anofanira kupa kuna yeahoh chipiriso ichi chakaitwa nomoto, mafuta ose anofukidza zvose zvomukati kana zvakabatana nazvo, itsvo mbiri namafuta ari padziri pedyo nechiuno neakafukidza chiropa, zvichabviswa pamwe chete neitsvo. vaprista vachazvipisa paaritari sezvokudya, chipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza. mafuta ose ndeayeahoh. “ ‘uyu murayiro usingaperi kumarudzi achatevera, kwose kwamuchagara: hamufaniri kudya mafuta kana ropa.’ ”

4

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvana veisraeri, ‘kana munhu upi zvake akatadza nokusaziva akaita zvisingabvumirwi pamurayiro upi zvawo wayeahoh, kana muprista akazodzwa, akatadza akauyisa mhosva pamusoro pavanhu, anofanira kuuya kuna yeahoh nehando diki isina kuremara sechibayiro chechivi, nokuda kwechivi chaakaita. anofanira kupa hando diki pamusuo wetende rokusangana pamberi payeahoh. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro payo agoibaya pamberi payeahoh. ipapo muprista akazodzwa achatora rimwe reropa rehando iyi agoritakura agopinda naro mutende rokusangana. anofanira kunyika munwe muropa agosasa rimwe racho kanomwe pamberi payeahoh; pamberi pechidzitiro chenzvimbo tsvene. muprista achatora rimwe ropa agoisa panyanga dzearitari yezvinonhuhwira zviri pamberi payeahoh mutende rokusangana. rimwe ropa rose acharidira mujinga mearitari yezvibayiro zvinopiswa pamusuo wetende rokusangana. achabvisa mafuta anofukidza zvose zvomukati kana akabatana nazvo, itsvo mbiri namafuta ari padziri pedyo nechiuno nezvakafukidza chiropa, achazvibvisa pamwe chete neitsvo, sokubviswa kunoitwa mafuta pahando inopiwa sechibayiro chokuwadzana. ipapo muprista achazvipisa paaritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa. asi dehwe rehando, nyama yose pamwe chete nomusoro namakumbo, ura zvomukati namazvizvi, zvinoreva kuti zvose zvehando, anofanira kuzvibudisa kunze kwemisasa panzvimbo yakacheneswa, panorasirwa madota agozvipisa pamoto wehuni padurunhuru. “ ‘kana ungano yose yaisraeri ikatadza nokusaziva ikaita zvisingatenderwi pamirayiro ipi zvayo yayeahoh, kunyange ungano isingazivi kuti chii chakaitika, vose vane mhosva. kana vakaziva chivi chavakaita, ungano ichapa hando diki sechipiriso chechivi vagouya nayo kutende rokusangana. vakuru veungano vanofanira kuisa maoko avo pamusoro wehando pamberi payeahoh uye hando ichabayiwa pamberi payeahoh. ipapo muprista akazodzwa achatora rimwe ropa rehando agopinda naro mutende rokusangana. achanyika munwe wake muropa agorisasa pamberi payeahoh kanomwe, pamberi pechidzitiro. anofanira kuisa rimwe ropa panyanga dzearitari iri pamberi payeahoh mutende rokusangana. rimwe ropa rose acharidururira mujinga mearitari yechibayiro chinopiswa pamusuo wetende rokusangana. achabvisa mafuta ose pairi agoapisa paaritari agoita nehando iyi zvaakaita nehando yechipiriso chezvivi. nenzira iyi muprista anofanira kuvayananisira, uye vacharegererwa. ipapo achaenda nehando kunze kwomusasa agoipisa sokupisa kwaakaita hando yokutanga. ichi ndicho chipiriso chezvivi cheungano yavanhu. “ ‘kana mutungamiri akatadza nokusaziva, akaita zvinorambidzwa pamirayiro ipi zvayo yayeahoh allah wake, ane mhosva. kana akaziviswa chivi chaakaita, anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chake chenhongo yembudzi isina kuremara. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro wembudzi agoibayira panzvimbo panobayirwa chipiriso chinopiswa pamberi payeahoh. ichi chipiriso chezvivi. ipapo muprista achatora rimwe ropa rechibayiro chezvivi nomunwe wake agoriisa panyanga dzearitari yechibayiro chinopiswa agodurura rimwe rose mujinga mearitari. achapisa mafuta ose paaritari sokupisa kwaakaita mafuta echibayiro chokuwadzana. nenzira iyi muprista achayananisira munhu pazvivi zvake uye acharegererwa. “ ‘kana nhengo yeungano yavanhu ikatadza nokusaziva uye ikaita zvisingabvumirwi mumurayiro upi noupi wayeahoh, ine mhosva. kana akaziviswa chivi chaakaita, anofanira kuuya nechibayiro chake chechivi chaakaita mbudzi hadzi isina kuremara. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro wechibayiro chechivi agochiuraya panzvimbo yechipiriso chinopiswa. ipapo muprista achatora rimwe ropa nomunwe wake agoriisa panyanga dzearitari yechibayiro chinopiswa agodira rimwe ropa rose mujinga mearitari. achabvisa mafuta ose sokubviswa kunoitwa mafuta pachibayiro chokuwadzana uye muprista achazvipisa paaritari sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira uye acharegererwa. “ ‘kana akauya negwayana rechipiriso chake chezvivi, anofanira kuuya nesheshe isina kuremara. anofanira kuisa ruoko rwake pamusoro waro agoribaya sechibayiro chezvivi panzvimbo inobayirwa chipiriso chinopiswa. ipapo muprista achatora rimwe ropa racho nomunwe wake agoriisa panyanga dzearitari yechibayiro chinopiswa agodurura rimwe ropa rose mujinga mearitari. achabvisa mafuta ose sokubviswa kunoitwa mafuta pagwayana rechibayiro chokuwadzana, uye muprista achazvipisa paaritari pamusoro pezvipiriso zvinoitwa kuna allah nomoto. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira pachivi chaakaita, uye acharegererwa.

5

“ ‘kana munhu akatadza nokuti aramba kupa uchapupu iye achinzi ape uchapupu pamusoro pezvaakaona kana zvaakanzwa, achava nemhosva. “ ‘kana kuti munhu akabata zvinhu zvipi zvazvo zvisina kuchena, zvingava zvitunha zvemhuka dzesango dzisina kuchena, kana mombe isina kuchena, kana zvipuka zvisina kuchena zvinofamba pavhu, kunyange asingazvizivi, atova asina kuchena uye ane mhosva. “ ‘kana kuti akabata zvisakachena zvavanhu, chinhu chipi zvacho chinoita kuti asava akachena, kunyange asingazvizivi, paanozozviziva, achava nemhosva. “ ‘kana kuti munhu asina kunyatsofungisisa akaita mhiko yokuti achaita chimwe chinhu, chingava chakanaka kana chakaipa, panyaya ipi zvayo, munhu yaanenge apika pamusoro payo asina kufungisisa, kunyange zvazvo asingazvizivi, paanozozviziva achava nemhosva. “ ‘kana munhu akava nemhosva pane chimwe chaizvozvi anofanira kureurura nzira yaakatadza nayo uye somuripo wechivi chaakaita, anofanira kuuya kuna yeahoh negwayana sheshe kana mbudzana sechipiriso chechivi uye muprista achamuyananisira chivi chake. “ ‘kana asingakwanisi kuuya negwayana anofanira kuuya nenjiva mbiri kana hangaiwa diki mbiri kuna yeahoh somuripo wechivi chake, imwe somuripo wechivi, imwe sechipiriso chinopiswa. anofanira kudziuyisa kumuprista uyo achatanga kupa imwe yacho sechipiriso chechivi. anofanira kumonyorora mutsipa wayo asingabvisi musoro zvachose. achasasa rimwe ropa rechipiriso chezvivi kumativi earitari, rimwe ropa rose rinofanira kudururwa mujinga mearitari. ichi chipiriso chechivi. ipapo muprista achapa chimwe chacho sechipiriso chinopiswa nenzira yakatarwa agomuyananisira pachivi chaakaita, uye acharegererwa. “ ‘asi, kana asingakwanisi kuuya nenjiva mbiri kana hangaiwa diki mbiri, anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chezvivi zvake chiri chegumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka sechipiriso chezvivi. haafaniri kuisa mafuta kana zvinonhuhwira pazviri nokuti chipiriso chechivi. anofanira kuzviuyisa kumuprista uyo achatora tsama sechikamu chechirangaridzo agozvipisa paaritari pamusoro pezvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. ichi chipiriso chezvivi. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira pazvivi zvose zvaakaita uye acharegererwa. zvimwe zvose zvezvipiriso zvinosara zvichava zvomuprista, sezvinoitwa nezvipiriso zvezviyo.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi: “kana munhu akakanganisa chimwe chinhu uye akatadza nokusaziva maererano nezvinhu zvose zvitsvene zvayeahoh, anofanira kuuya kuna yeahoh nomuripo wegondobwe risina kuremara, uye rine muripo unokwanirana nesirivha, maererano neshekeri repanzvimbo tsvene. ichi chipiriso chezvivi. anofanira kuripira zvaakatadza kuita maererano nezvinhu zvitsvene, agowedzera chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvishanu agopa zvose kumuprista, achamuyananisira negondobwe sechipiriso chemhosva, uye acharegererwa. “kana munhu akatadza uye akaita zvisingabvumirwi pamirayiro ipi zvayo yayeahoh, kunyange asingazvizivi, ane mhosva uye achava nemhaka. anofanira kuuya kumuprista nechipiriso chemhosva gondobwe risina kuremara uye rine muripo wakafanira. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira pakukanganisa kwaakaita nokusaziva, uye acharegererwa. ichi chipiriso chezvivi, akabatwa nemhosva yaakapara kuna yeahoh.”

6

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “kana mumwe akatadza uye akasavimbika kuna yeahoh nokunyengedza muvakidzani wake pazvinhu zvaakachengeteswa, kana zvaakabatiswa kana zvakabiwa, kana kuti akamubiridzira, kana kuti akawana nhumbi dzakarasika akareva nhema pamusoro padzo, kana kuti akapika nhema kana kuti akaita chivi chipi zvacho chingaitwa navanhu, kana akatadza kudaro akava nemhosva, anofanira kudzosa zvaakaba kana zvaakatora nokumanikidza, kana kuti zvaakachengeteswa kana kuti zvakarasika zvaakawana, kana kuti chipi zvacho chaakapupura nhema pamusoro pacho. anofanira kudzorera zvakazara owedzera chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvishanu pazviri agopa zvose kumuridzi pazuva raanouya nechipiriso chemhosva. somuripo anofanira kuuyisa kumuprista, ndiko kuti kuna yeahoh, chipiriso chake chemhosva chegondobwe, kubva mumakwai, risina kuremara uye rine mutengo unokwanirana. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira pamberi payeahoh uye acharegererwa pane zvose zvaakaita zvakamuita kuti ave nemhosva.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ipa aroni navanakomana vake murayiro uyu uti, ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechipiriso chinopiswa: chipiriso chinopiswa chinofanira kuramba chiri pachoto paaritari usiku hwose, kusvikira mangwanani, uye moto unofanira kuramba uchibvira paaritari. ipapo muprista achapfeka hanzu dzake dzomucheka, nebhurukwa rake romucheka pamuviri wake, uye achabvisa madota echipiriso chinopiswa nomoto paaritari agoaisa parutivi pearitari. ipapo anofanira kubvisa nguo idzi ogopfeka dzimwe, uye ogotakura madota aya agoenda nawo kunze kwomusasa kunzvimbo yakacheneswa. moto uri paaritari unofanira kuramba uchibvira, haufaniri kudzima. mangwanani oga oga muprista anofanira kuwedzera huni agoronga chipiriso chinopiswa pamoto, agopisa mafuta ezvipiriso zvokuwadzana pairi. moto unofanira kuramba uchibvira paaritari nguva dzose; uye haufaniri kudzima. “ ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechipiriso chezviyo: vanakomana vaaroni vanofanira kuuya nacho pamberi payeahoh, pamberi pearitari. muprista anofanira kutora tsama youpfu hwakatsetseka namafuta, pamwe chete nezvinonhuhwira zvose pachipiriso chezviyo agopisa chikamu chechirangaridzo paaritari sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. aroni navanakomana vake vachadya zvinosara zvacho, asi zvinofanira kudyiwa zvisina mbiriso panzvimbo tsvene, vanofanira kuzvidyira muchivanze chetende rokusangana. hazvifaniri kubikwa nembiriso, ndazvipa kwavari sechikamu chezvibayiro zvinoitwa kwandiri nomoto. sechipiriso chezvivi nechipiriso chemhosva, zvitsvene-tsvene. munhurume wose wechizvarwa chaaroni anogona kuzvidya. chikamu chake chaanofanira kugara achiwana pazvipiriso zvinopiwa kuna yeahoh nomoto kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera. munhu wose achabata izvi achava mutsvene.’ ” uye yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ichi ndicho chibayiro chaaroni navanakomana vake chavanofanira kuuyisa kuna yeahoh pazuva raanozodzwa: chegumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka sechipiriso chezviyo chamazuva ose, hafu yacho mangwanani neimwe hafu manheru. zvibikei namafuta mugango. muuye nazvo zvakasanganiswa zvakanaka, mugouya nechipiriso chezviyo chakamedurwa-medurwa sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. mwanakomana achamutevera somuprista akazodzwa achazvigadzira. chikamu chamazuva ose chayeahoh uye chinofanira kupiswa chose. zvose zvipiriso zvezviyo zvomuprista zvichapiswa chose, hazvifaniri kudyiwa.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuna aroni navanakomana vake, ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechipiriso chechivi. chipiriso chechivi chinofanira kubayiwa pamberi payeahoh panzvimbo inobayirwa chipiriso chinopiswa; chitsvene-tsvene. muprista anopa izvozvo achazvidya; zvinofanira kudyirwa panzvimbo tsvene muchivanze chetende rokusangana. chose chinogunzva nyama chichava chitsvene, uye kana rimwe ropa rikawira panguo, unofanira kuisukira panzvimbo tsvene. hari yevhu inobikirwa nyama inofanira kuputswa; asi kana zvikabikwa mupoto yendarira, poto inofanira kukweshwa igosukurudzwa nemvura. murume wose ari mumhuri yomuprista anogona kuidya; itsvene-tsvene. asi chipiriso chechivi, chipi nechipi chine ropa richauyiswa mutende rokusangana kuti rizoyananisira munzvimbo tsvene, hachifaniri kudyiwa; chinofanira kupiswa.

7

“ ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechipiriso chemhosva chitsvene-tsvene. chipiriso chemhosva chinofanira kubayirwa panzvimbo panobayirwa chipiriso chinopiswa uye ropa racho rinofanira kusaswa paaritari kumativi ose. mafuta acho ose achapiswa sechipiriso, chimuswe chakakora namafuta akafukidza zvomukati, itsvo mbiri namafuta ari padziri pedyo nechiuno, uye zvakafukidza chiropa, zvinofanira kubviswa pamwe chete neitsvo. muprista anofanira kuzvipisa paaritari sechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. ichi chipiriso chemhosva. munhurume upi zvake weimba yomuprista angachidya, asi chinofanira kudyirwa munzvimbo tsvene; chitsvene-tsvene. “ ‘chipiriso chemhosva chinofanira kuitwa sezvinoitwa nechipiriso chezvivi: ndechomuprista anoyananisira nazvo. muprista anopisa chipiriso chinopiswa chomunhu upi zvake anogona kuzvichengetera dehwe racho. zvipiriso zvose zvezviyo zvinobikwa muchitofu kana zvinobikwa mugango kana muhari ndezvomuprista anozvipa, uye zvipiriso zvose zvezviyo zvingava zvakasangana namafuta kana zvakaoma, ndezvavanakomana vaaroni, mumwe nomumwe, zvakamuringana. “ ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechipiriso chokuwadzana, chinogona kupiwa nomunhu kuna yeahoh. “ ‘kana akachipa sechiratidzo chokuvonga ipapo pamwe chete nechipiriso chokuvonga ichi, anofanira kupa makeke echingwa chakabikwa chisina mbiriso, chakaiswa mafuta, makeke matete akabikwa pasina mbiriso, akazorwa mafuta, namakeke oupfu hwakatsetseka akanyatsokanywa akaiswa mafuta. pamwe chete nechipiriso chake chokuwadzana chokuvonga anofanira kupa chipiriso chamakeke akabikwa nembiriso. anofanira kuuya nemhando imwe neimwe sechipiriso, chikamu chinopiwa kuna yeahoh; ndezvomuprista anosasa ropa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. nyama yechipiriso chake chokuwadzana chokuvonga inofanira kudyiwa musi wainopiwa. haafaniri kusiya imwe kusvikira mangwanani. “ ‘kana chipiriso chake chiri chemhiko kana kuti chiri chipiriso chokungopawo, chibayiro ichocho chichadyiwa musi wachinopiwa, asi chinhu chose chinosara chinogona kudyiwa musi unotevera. nyama yose yechibayiro inosara kusvikira zuva rechitatu inofanira kupiswa. kana nyama yechipiriso chokuwadzana ikadyiwa nomusi wechitatu haizogamuchirwi. hazvigamuchirwi panzvimbo yomunhu anenge azvipa nokuti hazvina kuchena, munhu achadya chikamu chipi chazvo achava nemhosva yacho. “ ‘nyama inogunzva chisina kucheneswa haifaniri kudyiwa, inofanira kupiswa. kana iri imwe nyama, munhu wose akacheneswa anogona kuidya. asi kana munhu asina kuchena akadya nyama iyi yokuwadzana yayeahoh, munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. kana munhu akabata chinhu chisina kuchena, kunyange kusachena kwavanhu, kana mhuka isina kuchena, kana chose chisina kuchena, chinhu chinonyangadza, uye akazodya nyama ipi yechipiriso chokuwadzana chayeahoh, munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvana veisraeri, ‘musadya mafuta api zvawo emombe, makwai kana mbudzi. mafuta echipfuwo chinenge chawanikwa chakafa kana chabvamburwa nezvikara zvesango anogona kushandiswa pana mamwe mabasa asi hamufaniri kuadya. munhu wose anodya mafuta emhuka inoitwa nayo chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. kwose kwose kwamunogara hamufaniri kudya ropa reshiri kana mhuka ipi zvayo. kana munhu upi zvake akadya ropa, munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvana veisraeri, ‘munhu wose anouya nechipiriso chokuwadzana kuna yeahoh anofanira kuuya nechikamu chacho sechibayiro kuna yeahoh. namaoko ake anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, anofanira kuuya namafuta pamwe chete nechityu, agoninira chityu kuna yeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. muprista achapisa mafuta paaritari, asi chityu ndechaaroni navanakomana vake. munofanira kupa bandauko rorudyi pazvipiriso zvenyu zvokuwadzana kumuprista somugove wakewo. mwanakomana waaroni anopa ropa namafuta echipiriso chokuwadzana achatora bandauko rokurudyi somugove wake. kubva kuzvipiriso zvokuwadzana zvavana veisraeri ndatora chityu chinoninirwa nebandauko rinouyiswa ndikazvipa kuna aroni muprista navanakomana vake somugove wavo wavanofanira kugara vachiwana kubva kuvaisraeri.’ ” uyu ndiwo mugove wezvibayiro zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto zvakapiwa kuna aroni navanakomana vake pazuva ravakagadzwa kuti vashumire yeahoh savaprista. pazuva ravakazodzwa, yeahoh akarayira kuti vaisraeri vape izvi kwavari somugove wavanofanira kugara vachiwana kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera. zvino iyi ndiyo mirayiro yezvipiriso zvinopiswa, chipiriso chezviyo, chipiriso chechivi, chipiriso chemhosva, chipiriso chokugadzwa nechipiriso chokuwadzana, zvakapiwa mozisi nayeahoh pagomo resinai pazuva raakarayira vaisraeri kuti vauye nezvipiriso kuna yeahoh mugwenga resinai.

8

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uya naaroni navanakomana vake, nguo dzavo, mafuta okuzodza nawo, hando yechipiriso chechivi, makondobwe maviri nedengu rine chingwa chisina mbiriso, ugounganidza ungano yose pamusuo wetende rokusangana.” mozisi akaita sezvaakaudzwa nayeahoh, uye ungano ikaungana pamusuo wetende rokusangana. mozisi akati kuungano, “izvi ndizvo zvarayirwa nayeahoh kuti zviitwe.” ipapo mozisi akauya naaroni navanakomana vake mberi akavashambidza nemvura. akapfekedza aroni nguo akamusunga bhanhire, akamupfekedza jasi, uye akamupfekedza efodhi. akasungirirawo efodhi paari nendaza yakanga yakasonwa nounyanzvi; saka yakasungirirwa paari. akaisa chidzitiro chepachipfuva paari uye akaisa urimi netumimi pachidzitiro chepachipfuva. ipapo akaisa nguwani pamusoro waaroni, nechemberi akaisa hwendefa regoridhe, iyo korona tsvene, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. ipapo mozisi akatora mafuta okuzodza akazodza tabhenakeri nezvose zvakanga zvirimo, naizvozvo akazvitsaura. akasasa mamwe mafuta paaritari kanomwe, achizodza aritari nemidziyo yayo yose nedhishi nechigadziko charo kuti azvitsaure. akadurura mamwe mafuta okuzodza pamusoro waaroni, akamuzodza achimutsaura. ipapo akauya navanakomana vaaroni mberi, akavapfekedza nguo, akavasunga zviuno namabhanhire akavapfekedza nguwani mumusoro sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. akazouya nehando yechipiriso chechivi, aroni navanakomana vake vakaisa maoko avo pamusoro wayo. mozisi akabaya hando akatora rimwe ropa rayo, akariisa panyanga dzose dzearitari kuti achenese aritari. akadurura rimwe ropa rose mujinga mearitari. naizvozvo akaitsaura kuti aiyananisire. mozisi akatora mafuta ose akanga akafukidza nhengo dzomukati, akanga akafukidza chiropa, neitsvo mbiri namafuta adzo, akazvipisa paaritari. asi hando nedehwe rayo nenyama nezvomukati akazvipisa kunze kwomusasa sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. akauya zvino negondobwe sechipiriso chinopiswa, aroni navanakomana vake vakaisa maoko avo pamusoro waro. ipapo mozisi akauraya gondobwe akasasa ropa raro paaritari kumativi ose. akacheka gondobwe kuita zvidimbu uye akapisa musoro, zvidimbu namafuta. akasuka ura namakumbo nemvura uye akapisa gondobwe rose paaritari sechipiriso chinopiswa, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. akauya zvino nerimwe gondobwe, gondobwe rokugadza, uye aroni navanakomana vake vakaisa maoko avo pamusoro waro. mozisi akauraya gondobwe akatora rimwe ropa raro akariisa pamucheto wenzeve yaaroni yokurudyi napamunwe wake woruoko rwokurudyi napagunwe guru retsoka yake yokurudyi. mozisi akauyawo navanakomana vaaroni mberi akaisa ropa pamucheto wezasi wenzeve dzavo dzokurudyi, paminwe mikuru yamaoko avo okurudyi napazvigunwe zvikuru zvamakumbo avo okurudyi. akasasa ropa paaritari kumativi ose. akatora mafuta, chimuswe chakakora, mafuta ose akafukidza ura, akafukidza chiropa, itsvo mbiri namafuta adzo nechidya chokurudyi. ipapo kubva mudengu rechingwa chisina mbiriso raiva pamberi payeahoh, akatora chingwa, keke rakabikwa namafuta nekeke dete, akaisa izvi panzvimbo dzina mafuta pamusoro pebandauko rokurudyi. akaisa zvose mumaoko aaroni neevanakomana vake uye vakazvininira kuna yeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. ipapo mozisi akazvitora kubva mumaoko avo akazvipisa paaritari pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa sechipiriso chokugadza, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. akatorawo chityu, mugove wamozisi pagondobwe rokugadza, akazvininira kuna yeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. ipapo mozisi akatora mamwe mafuta okuzodza nerimwe ropa kubva paaritari akarisasa pana aroni navanakomana vake nenguo dzavo. saizvozvo, akatsaura aroni nenguo dzake navanakomana vake nenguo dzavo. ipapo mozisi akati kuna aroni navanakomana vake, “bikai nyama pamusuo wetende rokusangana mugoidyira ipapo nechingwa chomudengu rezvipiriso zvokugadzwa sezvandakarayira ndichiti, ‘aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kuchidya.’ ipapo mugopisa zvose zvasara panyama nechingwa. musabva pamusuo wetende rokusangana kwamazuva manomwe kusvikira mazuva okugadzwa kwenyu apera, nokuti kugadzwa kwenyu kuchapedza mazuva manomwe. zvaitwa nhasi zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kuti akuyananisirei. munofanira kugara pamusuo wetende rokusangana usiku namasikati kwamazuva manomwe mugoita zvinoda yeahoh kuti musafe nokuti ndizvo zvandarayirwa.” saka aroni navanakomana vake vakaita zvose zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi.

9

pazuva rorusere mozisi akadana aroni navanakomana vake navakuru veisraeri. akati kuna aroni, “tora hando diki yechipiriso chako chechivi negondobwe rechipiriso chako chinopiswa zvose zvisina kuremara ugouya nazvo kuna yeahoh. uti kuvana veisraeri, ‘torai nhongo yembudzi yechipiriso chechivi, mhuru negwayana zvose zvine gore uye zvisina kuremara sechipiriso chinopiswa nehando negondobwe zvechipiriso chokuwadzana kuti mubayire pamberi payeahoh, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo chakasanganiswa namafuta. nokuti nhasi yeahoh achazviratidza kwamuri.’ ” vakatora zvinhu zvakarayirwa namozisi vakaenda nazvo mberi kwetende rokusangana uye ungano yose ikauya ikamira pamberi payeahoh. ipapo mozisi akati, “izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kuti muite kuti kubwinya kwayeahoh kugoratidzwa kwamuri.” mozisi akati kuna aroni, “uya kuaritari ugobayira chipiriso chako chechivi nechipiriso chako chinopiswa ugozviyananisira iwe navanhu; bayira chipiriso chavanhu ugovayananisira sezvakarayirwa nayeahoh.” saka aroni akauya kuaritari akabaya mhuru sechipiriso chechivi chake. vanakomana vake vakauya neropa kwaari akanyika munwe wake muropa akariisa panyanga dzearitari. rimwe ropa rose akaridururira mujinga mearitari. akapisa mafuta, itsvo namafuta akafukidza chiropa kubva pachipiriso chechivi paaritari sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. nyama nedehwe akazvipisa kunze kwomusasa. ipapo akabaya chipiriso chinopiswa, uye vanakomana vake vakamutambidza ropa akarisasa paaritari kumativi ose. vakamutambidza chipiriso chinopiswa chidimbu nechidimbu zvichisanganisira musoro akazvipisa paaritari. akasuka ura namakumbo akazvipisa pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa paaritari. ipapo aroni akauya nechipiriso chavanhu akatora mbudzi yechipiriso chavanhu chechivi akaiuraya uye akaipa sechipiriso chechivi sezvaakaita neyokutanga. akauya nechipiriso chinopiswa akachipa nenzira yakatarwa. akauyawo nechipiriso chezviyo, akatora tsama yacho akaipisa paaritari achiwedzera pachipiriso chinopiswa mangwanani. akabaya hando negondobwe sechipiriso chokuwadzana chavanhu. vanakomana vake vakamutambidza ropa akarisasa paaritari kumativi ose. asi mafuta ehando neegondobwe, chimuswe chakakora, fukidziro yamafuta, itsvo nezvinofukidza chiropa, izvi vakazviisa pazvityu. aroni akapisa mafuta paaritari. aroni akaninira zvityu nebandauko rokurudyi pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira sokurayirwa kwamozisi. ipapo aroni akasimudzira maoko ake kuvanhu akavaropafadza. apedza kubayira chipiriso chechivi, chipiriso chinopiswa nechipiriso chokuwadzana akaburuka pasi. mozisi naaroni vakapinda mutende rokusangana. pavakabuda vakaropafadza vanhu, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kukaonekwa navanhu vose. moto wakabuda kubva pamberi payeahoh ukapisa chipiriso chinopiswa namafuta paaritari. vanhu vose pavakazviona vakadanidzira nomufaro uye vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo.

10

zvino nadhabhi naabhihu, vanakomana vaaroni vakatora, mumwe nomumwe, hadyana yake yezvinonhuhwira, vakaisamo moto, vakaisawo zvinonhuhwira, vakaisa moto usingabvumirwi pamberi payeahoh zvaakanga asina kuvarayira. saka naizvozvo moto wakabuda kubva pamberi payeahoh ukavapisa vose ndokubva vafa pamberi payeahoh. ipapo mozisi akati kuna aroni, “izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nayeahoh paakati: “ ‘pakati peavo vachaswedera kwandiri ndicharatidza utsvene hwangu, pamberi pavanhu vose ndichakudzwa.’ ” aroni akaramba anyerere. mozisi akadana mishaeri naerizafani, vanakomana vauzieri, babamunini vaaroni, akati kwavari, “uyai pano mutakure madzikoma enyu muende navo kunze kwomusasa vabve pamberi penzvimbo tsvene.” saka vakauya vakavatakura vachakapfeka hanzu dzavo vakaenda navo kunze kwomusasa sezvazvakanga zvarayirwa namozisi. ipapo mozisi akati kuna aroni navanakomana vake, ereazari naitamari, “musarega bvudzi renyu risina kukamwa uye musabvarura nguo dzenyu nokuti mungafa, allah akatsamwira ungano yose. asi hama dzenyu, imba yose yaisraeri, vanogona kuchema avo vakaparadzwa nomoto nayeahoh. musabva pamusuo wetende rokusangana nokuti mungafa nokuti mafuta ayeahoh okuzodza ari pamuri.” saka vakaita sezvakataurwa namozisi. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna aroni, “iwe navanakomana vako hamufaniri kunwa waini kana zvimwe zvinwiwa zvakaviriswa pose pose pamunopinda mutende rokusangana nokuti mungafa. uyu mutemo usingaperi kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. munofanira kuisa mutsauko pakati pezvitsvene nezvisingakoshi, pakati pezvakachena nezvisina kuchena. uye munofanira kudzidzisa vaisraeri mirayiro yose yavakapiwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi.” mozisi akati kuna aroni navanakomana vake vakanga vasara, ereazari naitamari, “torai chipiriso chezviyo kubva pazvipiriso zvakaitirwa yeahoh nomoto, zvakagadzirwa pasina mbiriso mugochiisa parutivi pearitari nokuti chitsvene-tsvene. zvidyei munzvimbo tsvene, nokuti mugove wenyu nomugove wavanakomana venyu, wezvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, nokuti ndakarayirwa saizvozvo. asi iwe navanakomana vako navanasikana vako, munogona kudya chityu chakaninirwa nebandauko rakakumikidzwa. zvidyei munzvimbo yakacheneswa; izvi zvakapiwa kwauri navana vako somugove wenyu wezvipiriso zvokuwadzana zvavana vaisraeri. bandauko rakakumikidzwa nechityu chakaninirwa zvinofanirwa kuuyiswa namafuta nezvipiriso zvinoitwa nomoto, kuti zvininirwe pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. uyu uchava mugove wamuchagara muchiwana navana venyu sezvakarayirwa nayeahoh.” mozisi akati abvunza nezvembudzi yechipiriso chechivi akawana yatopiswa, akatsamwira ereazari naitamari vanakomana vaaroni vakanga vasara akabvunza akati, “sei musina kudyira chipiriso chechivi munzvimbo tsvene? chitsvene-tsvene, chakapiwa kwamuri kuti chibvise mhosva yeungano nokuvayananisira pamberi payeahoh. sezvo ropa racho risina kuuyiswa kunzvimbo tsvene, maifanira kudyira mbudzi munharaunda yenzvimbo tsvene, sezvandakarayira.” aroni akapindura mozisi achiti, “nhasi vabayira chipiriso chavo chechivi nechipiriso chavo chinopiswa pamberi payeahoh asi zvinhu zvakaita seizvi zvaitika kwandiri. yeahoh aidai afara here dai ndadya chipiriso chechivi nhasi?” mozisi paakanzwa izvi akagutsikana.

11

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “taurai kuvaisraeri muti, ‘pamhuka dzose dzinofamba panyika, idzi ndidzo dzamunogona kudya: munogona kudya mhuka ipi zvayo ina mahwanda, akapararana zvachose, uye inozeya zvokudya. “ ‘asi kune dzimwe dzinongozeya kudya chete, kana kuti dzimwe dzine mahwanda akaparadzana chete, idzi hamufaniri kudzidya. ngamera, kunyange ichizeya zvokudya, haina mahwanda akapatsanuka; haina kuchena kwamuri. mbira kunyange ichizeya zvokudya, haina mahwanda akapatsanuka, haina kuchena kwamuri. tsuro kunyange ichizeya zvokudya, haina mahwanda akapatsanuka, haina kuchena kwamuri. nguruve kunyange ine mahwanda akanyatsopatsanuka, haizeyi zvokudya, haina kuchena kwamuri. hamufaniri kudya nyama yazvo kana kubata zvitunha zvazvo; hazvina kuchena kwamuri. “ ‘pazvisikwa zvose zvinogara mumvura yamakungwa nenzizi, munogona kudya dzose dzine zvimbi namakwati. asi zvipuka zvose zvomugungwa kana munzizi zvisina zvimbi namakwati, kunyange pakati pezvinouya samatutu kana pakati pezvose zvisikwa zvinorarama mumvura, zvinonyangadza kwamuri. uye sezvo zvichinyangadza kwamuri hamufaniri kudya nyama yazvo uye munofanira kusema zvitunha zvazvo. chose chinhu chinorarama mumvura chisina zvimbi namakwati chinonyangadza kwamuri. “ ‘idzi ndidzo shiri dzamunofanira kusema, uye musadzidya nokuti dzinonyangadza kwamuri: gondo, gora, chapungu, njerere, marudzi ose oruvangu rutema, marudzi ose amakunguo, marudzi ose amazizi, shiri yegungwa namarudzi ose oruvangu, nezizi duku, nekanyururahove, nezizi guru, nejichidza, nekondo, negora, neshuramurove, namarudzi ose ekondo, nemhupupu nechiremwaremwa. “ ‘zvose zvipukanana zvinobhururuka, zvinofamba namakumbo mana zvinonyangadza kwamuri. kunyange zvakadaro, kunewo zvimwe zvipuka zvine mapapiro zvinofamba namakumbo mana zvamunogona kudya, izvo zvine makumbo akabatanidzwa okukwakuka nawo. pakati pezvizvi munogona kudya marudzi ose emhashu, namarudzi ose amakurwe namarudzi ebambamukota. asi zvimwe zvose zvipukanana zvine mapapiro zvine makumbo mana munofanira kuzvisema. “ ‘musazvisvibisa nezvizvi; ani naani anobata zvitunha zvazvo achava akasviba kusvikira manheru. ani naani achanhonga chimwe chezvitunha zvazvo anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye achava akasviba kusvikira manheru. “ ‘mhuka yose yose ina mahwanda akapararana asi asina kunyatsopararana, isingazeyi kudya, haina kuchena kwamuri; ani naani anobata chitunha chayo achava asina kuchena. pamhuka dzose dzinofamba namakumbo mana, idzo dzine tsoka dzakafara hadzina kuchena kwamuri; ani naani anobata chitunha chadzo achava akasviba kusvikira manheru. ani naani achanhonga zvitunha zvadzo anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye achava akasviba kusvikira manheru. hadzina kuchena kwamuri. “ ‘pamhuka dzinokambaira panyika, idzi hadzina kuchena kwamuri: chidembo, gonzo, namarudzi ose egwavava, chifurira, namarudzi ose amadzvinyu, dhambakura nerwaivhi. pane zvose zvinokambaira panyika, izvi hazvina kuchena kwamuri. asi ani naani anozvibata kana zvafa achava akasviba kusvikira manheru. kana chimwe chazvo chikafa, chikawira pamusoro pechimwe chinhu, chinhu ichocho hazvinei kuti chinoshandiswei, chinova chisina kuchena kunyange chakagadzirwa nomuti, mucheka, dehwe, kana saga. chiisei mumvura; chichava chisina kuchena kusvikira manheru, uye ipapo chichava chakachena. kana chimwe chazvo chikawira muhari yevhu, zvose zviri mairi zvichava zvisina kuchena, uye munofanira kuputsa hari yacho. chokudya chipi zvacho chinogona kudyiwa, asi chine mvura pachiri, yabva muhari iyoyo chichava chisina kuchena uye kana chipi zvacho chinganwiwa kubva imomo hachina kuchena. chose chinhu chinowirwa nechitunha chazvo chinova chisina kuchena; choto kana hari yokubikira zvinofanira kuputswa. hazvina kuchena uye munofanira kuzvibata sezvisina kuchena. asi chitubu, kana tsime rokuchera mvura zvinoramba zvakachena, asi ani naani anobata chimwe chezvitunha izvi achava asina kuchena. kana chitunha chikawira pambeu ipi zvayo inofanira kudyarwa, inoramba yakachena. asi kana mvura yaiswa pambeu, uye chitunha chikawira pairi, inova isina kuchena kwamuri. “ ‘kana mhuka yamunobvumirwa kudya ikafa yoga, munhu wose achabata mutumbi wayo achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. munhu wose achadya imwe nyama yacho anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agova asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘chisikwa chose chinokambaira panyika chinonyangadza, hachifaniri kudyiwa. hamufaniri kudya chisikwa chipi zvacho chinokambaira panyika, chingava chinofamba nedumbu kana chinofamba namakumbo mana kana namakumbo akawanda, chinonyangadza. musazvisvibisa nechimwe chezvisikwa izvi. musazvisvibisa nazvo kana nokuda kwazvo. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, zvitsaurei mugova vatsvene, nokuti ndiri mutsvene. musazvisvibisa nechipuka chipi zvacho chinofamba-famba pasi. ndini yeahoh akakubudisai muijipiti kuti ndive allah wenyu; saka ivai vatsvene nokuti ndiri mutsvene. “ ‘ndiyo mitemo iri maererano nemhuka, shiri, zvipenyu zvose zvinofamba mumvura nezvipuka zvose zvinofamba panyika. munofanira kuisa mutsauko pakati pezvisina kuchena nezvakachena, pakati pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvinogona kudyiwa nezvisingagoni kudyiwa.’ ”

12

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘mukadzi akava napamuviri akabereka mwanakomana, achava asina kuchena kwamazuva manomwe, sezvaanova asina kuchena paanoenda kumwedzi. pazuva rorusere mukomana uyo anofanira kudzingiswa. zvino mukadzi anofanira kumirira mazuva makumi matatu namatatu kuti acheneswe pakubuda ropa kwake. haafaniri kubata chinhu chipi zvacho chitsvene kana kusvika kunzvimbo tsvene kusvikira mazuva okucheneswa kwake apera. kana akabereka mwanasikana, kwevhiki mbiri mukadzi achava asina kuchena sepaanoenda kumwedzi. ipapo anofanira kumira mazuva makumi matanhatu namatanhatu kuti acheneswe kubva pakubuda ropa. “ ‘kana mazuva okucheneswa nokuda kwomwanakomana kana mwanasikana apera, anofanira kuuya kumuprista pamusuo wetende rokusangana, negwayana rine gore rimwe chete sechipiriso chinopiswa nehangaiwa diki kana njiva yechipiriso chechivi. achazvibayira pamberi payeahoh kuti agomuyananisira, achava akacheneswa kubva pakubuda ropa kwake. “ ‘iyi ndiyo mirayiro yomukadzi anobatsirwa nomwanakomana kana mwanasikana. kana asingakwanisi kuuya negwayana, anofanira kuuya nenjiva mbiri kana hangaiwa diki mbiri, imwe yechipiriso chinopiswa imwe yechipiriso chechivi. nenzira iyi muprista achamuyananisira uye achava akachena.’ ”

13

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “kana ani naani ane pakazvimba kana kuti ane tumapundu kana chivara chichena paganda rake chinogona kunge chiri chirwere chinotapukira anofanira kuuyiswa kuna aroni muprista kana kuno mumwe wavanakomana vake muprista. muprista achatarisa chironda chiri paganda rake, uye kana bvudzi riri pachironda rachena uye ronda roratidza kudzika kudarika paganda, chirwere cheganda chinotapukira. kana muprista akamuongorora achamuzivisa kuvanhu somunhu asina kuchena. kana gwapa riri paari riri jena asi risingaratidzi kudzika kudarika paganda uye bvudzi risina kuchena, muprista anofanira kugarisa munhu iyeye oga kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye akaona kuti chironda hachina kupinduka uye hachina kupararira muganda anofanira kumuchengeta pake oga kwamamwe mazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista anofanira kumuongorora zvakare, uye kana chironda chaserera uye chisina kupararira neganda, muprista achamuzivisa somunhu akachena, tunongova tumapundu. munhu anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye achava akachena. asi kana tumapundu tukapararira nomuviri wake shure kwokunge azviratidza kumuprista kuti zviziviswe kuti akachena, anofanira kuenda kumuprista zvakare. muprista anofanira kumuongorora, uye kana tumapundu twapararira neganda, achazivisa kuti haana kuchena; chirwere chinotapukira. “kana munhu upi zvake ane chirwere chinotapukira, anofanira kuuyiswa kumuprista. muprista anofanira kumuongorora, uye kana pane kuzvimba nokucheneruka paganda, uye zvapindura bvudzi kuti rive jena, uye kana pane nyama yakatsvuka, pakazvimba, chirwere cheganda chava nenguva uye muprista achazivisa kuti haana kuchena. haafaniri kumugarisa ari oga, nokuti atogara asina kuchena. “kana chirwere chikabuda paganda rake rose uye sokuona kwomuprista, chakafukidza ganda rose romunhu abatwa nehosha, kubva kumusoro kusvika kutsoka, muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye kana chirwere chapararira nomuviri wake wose, achazivisa kuti munhu uyu akachena, sezvo zvose zvachenuruka, akachena. asi pose panoonekwa ronda paari, achava asina kuchena. muprista paachaona ronda, achazivisa kuti haana kuchena. ronda harina kuchena ane chirwere chinotapukira. zvikaitika kuti ronda richeneruke, anofanira kuenda kumuprista. ipapo muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye kana zvironda zvachenuruka, muprista achazivisa kuti munhu ane hosha uyu akachena, ipapo achava akachena. “kana munhu akava nemota paganda rake rikapora, uye panzvimbo panga pane mota pakazvimba pakacheneruka kana kuti pakatsvuka, anofanira kuzviratidza kumuprista. muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye kana zvikaratidza kudzika kudarika paganda uye bvudzi riri pachiri rikapinduka rikava jena, muprista achazivisa kuti haana kuchena, chirwere chinotapukira cheganda chabuda panga pane mota. asi kana muprista achiongorora, pasina bvudzi jena pachiri uye paserera, ipapo muprista anofanira kumugarisa oga kwamazuva manomwe. kana zviri kupararira muganda, muprista achazivisa kuti haana kuchena, zvinotapukira. asi kana gwapa risina kupinduka uye risina kupararira, rinongova vanga kubva pamota uye muprista achazivisa kuti akachena. “kana munhu akatsva paganda uye akabuda gwapa dzvuku kana rakacheneruka paronda rokutsva, muprista anofanira kutarisa gwapa uye kana bvudzi riri pariri rapinduka rikava jena uye zvakadzika kudarika ganda, chirwere chinotapukira cheganda chabuda pakatsva. asi kana muprista akachiongorora, pasina bvudzi jena pagwapa uye kana zvisina kudzika kudarika ganda uye zvaserera, ipapo muprista anofanira kumugarisa oga kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye kana zvichipararira neganda, muprista achazivisa kuti haana kuchena; chirwere chinotapukira cheganda. asi kana gwapa rikasapinduka uye risina kupararira neganda, asi raserera, kuzvimba kunobva pakutsva uye muprista achazivisa kuti akachena, rinongova vanga rinobva pakutsva. “kana munhurume kana munhukadzi akava nechironda mumusoro kana pachirebvu, muprista anofanira kuongorora chironda, uye kana chichiratidza kudzika kudarika ganda, uye bvudzi riri machiri riri renhundurwa uye riri dete, muprista achazivisa kuti munhu iyeye haana kuchena, kuvava, chirwere chinotapukira chomusoro kana chechirebvu. asi kana muprista akaongorora ronda iri uye kana risingaratidzi kudzika kudarika ganda uye pasina bvudzi dema pariri, zvino muprista anofanira kuchengeta munhu ane hosha ari oga kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista anofanira kuongorora ronda, uye kana kuvava kusina kupararira uye pasina bvudzi renhundurwa uye risingaratidzi kudzika kudarika ganda, anofanira kuveurwa bvudzi pachisiyiwa nzvimbo ine hosha, uye muprista anofanira kumuchengeta ari oga kwamamwe mazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista anofanira kuongorora panovava, uye kana pasina kupararira neganda zvichiratidza kuti hazvina kudzika kudarika ganda, muprista achazivisa kuti akachena. anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agova akachena. asi kana kuvava kukaparira neganda iye aziviswa kuti akachena, muprista anofanira kumuongorora, uye kana kuvava kwapararira neganda, muprista haafaniri kutsvaga bvudzi renhundurwa, nokuti munhu iyeye haana kuchena. zvisinei hazvo, kana zvikaitika kuti sokuona kwake hazvina kupinduka, uye bvudzi dema ramera mazviri, kuvava kwaporeswa, achena uye muprista achazivisa kuti akachena. “kana munhurume kana munhukadzi ane makwapa machena paganda muprista anofanira kuaongorora uye kana makwapa asina kunyanyochena, tumapundu tusingakuvadzi twabuda paganda, munhu iyeye akachena. “kana bvudzi romumwe rikabva akasara asisina bvudzi, ava nemhanza, akachena. kana akabva bvudzi pahuma uye akasara ava nemhanza, akachena. asi kana ane chironda chichena chakatsvukuruka pamhanza yake kana pahuma, chirwere chinotapukira chabuda pamusoro pake kana pahuma. muprista anofanira kumuongorora uye kana kuzvimba kuri pamusoro pake kana pamhanza kwakatsvukuruka nokuchena sechirwere chinotapukira cheganda, murume iyeye arwara uye haana kuchena. muprista anofanira kuzivisa kuti haana kuchena nokuda kwechironda chiri pamusoro wake. “munhu ane chirwere chinotapukira ichi anofanira kupfeka nguo dzakabvaruka, osiya bvudzi rake risina kukamwa, ofukidza chikamu chepasi cheuso hwake, odanidzira achiti, ‘handina kuchena! handina kuchena!’ kana aramba ane chirwere ichocho anongoramba asina kuchena. anofanira kugara oga; anofanira kugara kunze kwomusasa. “kana nguo ipi neipi yazadzwa maperembudzi, ingava nguo yeshinda, kana yewuru kana yomucheka, ungava mucheka wakarukwa kana mucheka wewuru kana wedehwe kana chinhu chakagadzirwa nedehwe, uye kana utachiona huri muchipfeko kana dehwe kana mucheka wakarukwa kana chinhu chedehwe, chiri choruvara rwezerere kana chakatsvukuruka, chirwere chinopararira chamaperembudzi uye chinofanira kuratidzwa kumuprista. muprista anofanira kuchiongorora agochengeta chinhu chacho pacho choga kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe anofanira kuchiongorora uye kana maperembudzi apararira muchipfeko kana nguo yakarukwa, zvisinei kuti chinoshandiswei, chirwere chinoparadza chamaperembudzi; chinhu ichocho hachina kuchena. anofanira kupisa nguo yacho, kana mucheka wakarukwa wewuru kana mucheka weshinda, kana wedehwe une utachiona mauri, nokuti maperembudzi anoparadza, chinhu ichocho chinofanira kupiswa. “asi kana muprista akachiongorora, maperembudzi asina kupararira muchipfeko kana mucheka wakarukwa, kana chinhu chakagadzirwa nedehwe, acharayira kuti chinhu chine utachiona chisukwe. ipapo anofanira kuchigarisa choga kwamamwe mazuva manomwe. mushure mokunge chinhu chine utachiona chasukwa, muprista anofanira kuchiongorora uye kana maperembudzi asina kuratidza kupinduka maonekero awo, kunyange zvisina kupararira, hachina kuchena. pisai chinhu ichocho nomoto kunyange maperembudzi akanganisa divi rimwe chete. kana muprista akachiongorora, maperembudzi akange aumbuka mushure mokunge chinhu chasukwa, anofanira kubvarura chidimbu chapinda utachiona kubva panguo, kana padehwe kana pamucheka wakarukwa. asi kana zvikabuda zvakare pachipfeko, kana pamucheka wakarukwa, kana pachinhu chedehwe, zviri kupararira uye chose chine maperembudzi chinofanira kupiswa nomoto. nguo iyi, kana mucheka wakarukwa, kana chinhu chedehwe chasukwa uye chabviswa maperembudzi, chinofanira kusukwa zvakare uye chichava chakachena.” iyi ndiyo mirayiro inoenderana nokuzadzwa namaperembudzi kwechipfeko chewuru kana chomucheka, mucheka wakarukwa kana chinhu chose chedehwe kuti zvigoziviswa kuti zvakachena kana kuti hazvina kuchena.

14

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi: “iyi ndiyo mirayiro yomunhu ane chirwere panguva yake yokucheneswa kana auyiswa kumuprista: muprista anofanira kuenda kunze kwomusasa agonomuongorora. kana munhu aporeswa kubva kumaperembudzi, muprista acharayira kuti shiri mbiri mhenyu dzakachena, nedanda romusidhari, nomucheka mutsvuku, nehisopi zviuyiswe kuti acheneswe. ipapo muprista acharayirwa kuti imwe yeshiri idzi iurayiwe pamusoro pemvura yakachena muhari yevhu. anofanira zvino kutora shiri mhenyu oinyika pamwe chete nedanda romusidhari, mucheka mutsvuku nehisopi muropa reshiri yaurayiwa pamusoro pemvura yakachena. achasasa uyo anofanira kucheneswa kubva kuchirwere chamaperembudzi kanomwe, agozivisa kuti akachena. ipapo anofanira kuregera shiri mhenyu ichienda musango. “munhu anofanira kucheneswa anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoveura bvudzi rake rose agoshamba nemvura, ipapo achava akacheneswa. mushure maizvozvi anogona kuuya mumusasa asi anofanira kugara kunze kwetende rake kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe anofanira kuveura bvudzi rake rose. anofanira kuveura musoro wake, ndebvu dzake, tsiye dzake, nerimwe bvudzi rake rose. anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agozvishambidza nemvura uye achava akachena. “pazuva rorusere anofanira kuuya namakwayana maviri amakondobwe nesheshe imwe chete, dzose dzine gore dzisina kuremara, pamwe chete nezvikamu zvitatu kubva mugumi zveefa zvoupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo nerogi imwe chete yamafuta. muprista achazivisa kuti akachena, anofanira kuuya nouya anofanira kucheneswa nezvipiriso zvake pamberi payeahoh pamusuo wetende rokusangana. “ipapo muprista anofanira kutora gwayana rimwe chete gono agoripa sechipiriso chemhosva pamwe chete nerogi ramafuta; achazvininira pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. anofanira kubaya gwayana panzvimbo tsvene apo panobayirwa chipiriso chezvivi nechipiriso chinopiswa. sezvakaita chipiriso chezvivi, chipiriso chemhosva ndechomuprista, chitsvene-tsvene. muprista anofanira kutora rimwe ropa rechipiriso chemhosva agoriisa pamucheto wenzeve yokurudyi yomunhu anocheneswa, pamunwe wake mukuru wokuruoko rwokurudyi uye napachigunwe chikuru chetsoka yake yokurudyi. ipapo muprista achatora imwe rogi yamafuta agodira muchanza choruoko rwake rworuboshwe, agonyika munwe wake wokutendeka nawo wokurudyi mumafuta ari muchanza choruoko rwake agosasa mamwe
