acho nomunwe kanomwe pamberi payeahoh. muprista achaisa mamwe mafuta anosara muchanza panzeve yokurudyi youyo anofanira kucheneswa, pamunwe mukuru woruoko rwake rwokurudyi nepachigunwe chikuru chegumbo rake rokurudyi pamusoro peropa rechipiriso chemhosva. mamwe mafuta ose ari muchanza make muprista achaaisa pamusoro pouyo achada kucheneswa, agomuyananisira pamberi payeahoh. “ipapo muprista achabayira chipiriso chechivi agoyananisira uyo anofanira kucheneswa kubva pakusachena kwake. mushure maizvozvo muprista achabaya chipiriso chinopiswa agochipa paaritari pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo, agomuyananisira, uye achava akachena. “asi kana ari murombo asingakwanisi kuuya naizvozvi, anofanira kutora gwayana gono sechipiriso chemhosva kuti aninire agomuyananisira pamwe chete nechikamu chimwe chete kubva mugumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka hwakasangana namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo, zvikamu zviviri kubva muzvitatu zverogi ramafuta, njiva mbiri kana hangaiwa mbiri dzaanokwanisa kuuya nadzo, imwe yechipiriso chechivi neimwe yechipiriso chinopiswa. “pazuva rorusere anofanira kuzviuyisa kumuprista pamusuo wetende rokusangana pamberi payeahoh, kuti acheneswe. muprista anofanira kutora gwayana rechipiriso chemhosva nerogi ramafuta agozvininira pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira. achabaya gwayana rechipiriso chemhosva agotora rimwe ropa raro agoriisa panzeve yokurudyi yomunhu anoda kucheneswa, pamunwe mukuru woruoko rwokurudyi napachigunwe chikuru chepagumbo rokurudyi. muprista achadira mamwe mafuta muchanza choruoko rwake rworuboshwe uye nomunwe wake wokurudyi wokutendeka nawo agomwaya mamwe mafuta anobva muchanza chake kanomwe pamberi payeahoh. mamwe mafuta ari muchanza chake anofanira kuaisa munzvimbo dzimwe chetedzo dzaakaisa ropa rechipiriso chemhosva panzeve yokurudyi youyo anoda kucheneswa, pamunwe mukuru woruoko rwake rwokurudyi napachigunwe chikuru chegumbo rake rokurudyi. mamwe mafuta ose achasara muchanza muprista achaaisa mumusoro mouyo anofanira kucheneswa, kuti ayananisirwe pamberi payeahoh. ipapo achabayira njiva kana hangaiwa diki izvo zvaanogona kuwana, imwe sechipiriso chechivi neimwe sechipiriso chinopiswa pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo. nenzira iyi muprista achayananisira pamberi payeahoh, panzvimbo youya anofanira kucheneswa.” iyi ndiyo mirayiro pamusoro pouyo ane chirwere chamaperembudzi uye asingakwanisi kuuya nezvipiriso zvinofanira kupiwa kuti acheneswe. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “kana mapinda munyika yekenani iyo yandiri kukupai senhaka, ndikaita chirwere chinopararira chamaperembudzi muimba iri munyika iyoyo, muridzi weimba anofanira kuenda kundoudza muprista kuti, ‘ndaona chimwe chinhu chinenge maperembudzi mumba mangu.’ ipapo muprista anofanira kurayira kuti vabudise zvose zviri mumba muprista asati apinda kundotarira hosha, kuti kurege kuva nechinhu chiri mumba chichanzi hachina kuchena. mushure maizvozvo muprista anofanira kupinda agoongorora imba. anofanira kuongorora chakwindi chiri mumadziro eimba uye kana pane makomba makomba ane ruvara rwezerere kana akatsvukuruka, muprista anofanira kubuda napamusuo wemba agoipfiga kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechinomwe muprista achadzoka kuzoongorora imba. kana maperembudzi apararira pamadziro, anofanira kurayira kuti matombo ane utachiona abviswe agorasirwa kunzvimbo isina kuchena kunze kweguta. ipapo ngaarayire kuti madziro ose omukati memba aparwe uye zvaparwa zvigoraswa kunzvimbo isina kuchena kunze kweguta. ipapo vanofanira kutora mamwe matombo vagotsiva aya vagotora ivhu idzva vakodzura imba. “kana chakwindi chikaonekwa zvakare mumba mushure mokunge matombo abviswa imba yaparwa uye yadzurwa, muprista anofanira kuenda kunozvinanʼanidza. kana maperembudzi apararira ihosha inoparadza, imba haina kuchena. inofanira kupazwa, matombo ayo, mapuranga nokudzura kwose, zvotorwa zvoendeswa kunze kweguta kunzvimbo isina kuchena. “munhu upi noupi achapinda muimba iyi painenge ichakapfigwa achava asina kuchena kusvika manheru. munhu wose achavata kana kuti achadya ari mumba iyoyo anofanira kusuka nguo dzake. “asi kana muprista akauya kuzoiongorora, akaona kuti maperembudzi haana kupararira mumba mushure mokunge yadzurwa, achati imba yakachena nokuti maperembudzi aenda. kuti anatse imba, anofanira kutora shiri mbiri nedanda romusidhari, mucheka mutsvuku nehisopi. achaurayira imwe shiri pamusoro pemvura yakachena iri muhari yevhu. ipapo anofanira kutora puranga romusidhari, hisopi, mucheka mutsvuku, shinda neshiri mhenyu ozvinyika muropa reshiri yafa nemvura yakachena, uye agosasa mumba kanomwe. achanatsa imba neropa reshiri, mvura yakachena, shiri mhenyu, danda romusidhari, hisopi uye nomucheka mutsvuku. ipapo anofanira kuregedza shiri mhenyu kuti iende hayo kunze kweguta kusango. nenzira iyi achayananisira imba uye ichava yakachena.” iyi ndiyo mirayiro yechirwere chamaperembudzi, kuvava, maperembudzi pamucheka kana mumba, uye kuzvimba, kufunuka, kana gwapa rakacheneruka, kuti mugoziva kuti chinhu chakachena kana kuti hachina kuchena. iyi ndiyo mirayiro yezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa zvamaperembudzi.

15

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “taurai navaisraeri muti kwavari, ‘kana murume upi zvake ane zvimwe zvinoerera, zvinobuda pamuviri wake, uye achava asina kunaka nokuda kwokuerera uku. kunyange zvikaramba zvichibuda mumuviri wake kana kuti zvikamira zvichamuita kuti ave asina kuchena. izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti kuerera uku kumuite kuti ave asina kuchena. “ ‘mubhedha upi zvawo unorarwa nomurume anobuda zvinoerera mumuviri wake uchava usina kuchena, uye chose chaachagara pachiri chichava chisina kuchena. ani naani anobata mubhedha wake anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. ani naani achagara pachigaro chagarwa nomurume anobuda zvinoerera anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘ani naani achabata murume iyeye anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘kana murume ane zvinoerera akasvipira mumwe munhu akachena, munhu iyeye anofanira kushambidza nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘chinhu chose chichatasvwa nomurume iyeye chichava chisina kuchena, uye ani naani achabata zvinhu zvanga zviri pasi pake achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru; ani naani anonhonga zvinhu izvozvo anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘ani naani achabatwa nomurume iyeye asina kushamba maoko ake anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘hari yevhu ichabatwa nomurume iyeye inofanira kuputswa uye mudziyo upi zvawo wakagadzirwa nomuti unofanira kusukwa nemvura. “ ‘kana murume acheneswa kubva pakuerera kwake, anofanira kuverenga mazuva manomwe okucheneswa kwake; anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura yakachena, uye achava akachena. pazuva rorusere anofanira kutora njiva mbiri kana hangaiwa diki mbiri agouya nadzo pamberi payeahoh pamusuo wetende rokusangana agodzipa kumuprista. muprista anofanira kudzibayira, imwe sechipiriso chechivi uye imwe sechipiriso chinopiswa. nenzira iyi achamuyananisira pamberi payeahoh nokuda kwokuerera kwake. “ ‘kana mbeu yomurume upi noupi ikabuda kwaari, anofanira kushamba muviri wake wose nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. chipfeko chipi zvacho chake kana dehwe rine mbeu pariri rinofanira kusukwa nemvura uye richava risina kuchena kusvikira manheru. kana murume akavata nomukadzi uye akabuda mbeu, vaviri ava vanofanira kushamba nemvura uye vachava vasina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘kana mukadzi ari kumwedzi, kusachena kwokuenda kumwedzi kwake kuchapera mushure mamazuva manomwe, uye ani naani achamubata achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘chinhu chose chaachavata pachiri achiri kutevera chichava chisina kuchena uye chose chaachagara pachiri chichava chisina kuchena. ani naani achabata paanovata anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. ani naani achabata chinhu chaachagara anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. mubhedha kana chimwe chinhu chaanga akagara, kana munhu upi noupi akachibata achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘kana murume akavata naye uye kuerera kwake kwomwedzi kukasangana naye, achava asina kuchena kwamazuva manomwe, kunyange mubhedha waanovata pauri uchava usina kuchena. “ ‘kana mukadzi ano kuerera kweropa kwamazuva akawanda panguva isiri yokuva kwake kumwedzi, kana kuti akava nokuerera kunoenderera kupfuura nguva yake yokuva kumwedzi kwake, achava asina kuchena kwenguva yaanobuda ropa sapamazuva ake okuva kumwedzi. mubhedha upi zvawo waachavata pauri panguva yaanenge achiri kubuda ropa, uchava usina kuchena somubhedha wapakuva kwake kumwedzi, chose chaachagara chichava chisina kuchena sapanguva yokuva kwake kumwedzi. ani naani achazvibata achava asina kuchena; anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura, uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. “ ‘kana achinge acheneswa kubva pakuerera kwake anofanira kuverenga mazuva manomwe, mushure maizvozvo achava akachena. pazuva rorusere anofanira kutora njiva mbiri kana hangaiwa mbiri diki agouya nadzo kumuprista pamusuo wetende rokusangana. muprista anofanira kubayira imwe sechipiriso chechivi, uye imwe sechipiriso chinopiswa. nenzira iyi achamuyananisira pamberi payeahoh pakusachena kwake kwokubuda ropa. “ ‘munofanira kutsaura vaisraeri kubva pazvinhu zvose zvinoita kuti vave vasina kuchena, kuitira kuti vasafa mukusachena kwavo nokuda kwokuti vasvibisa nzvimbo yandinogara, iri pakati penyu.’ ” iyi ndiyo mirayiro yomurume anenge ane zvinoerera, youpi noupi anenge asvibiswa nokubuda kwezvinoerera, yomukadzi anenge ari kumwedzi, yomurume kana mukadzi anenge ane zvinoerera, uye neyomurume anovata nomukadzi anenge asina kuchena.

16

yeahoh akataura namozisi mushure mokufa kwavanakomana vaaroni vaviri avo vakafa pavakaswedera kuna yeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “udza mukoma wako aroni kuti asangopinda paanodira munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene kuseri kwechidzitiro pamberi pechigaro chenyasha paareka, nokuti angangofa, nokuti ndinozviratidza mugore pamusoro pechigaro chenyasha. “aya ndiwo mapindiro anofanira kuita aroni munzvimbo tsvene: apinde nehando diki yechipiriso chechivi uye negondobwe rechipiriso chinopiswa. anofanira kupfeka nguo tsvene yomucheka, nguo dzomukati dzomucheka pamuviri wake; anofanira kusunga bhanhire romucheka muchiuno chake agopfeka nguwani yomucheka. idzi ndidzo nguo tsvene, saka anofanira kushamba nemvura asati adzipfeka. kubva kuungano yavaisraeri anofanira kutora nhongo mbiri dzechipiriso chechivi uye negondobwe rechipiriso chinopiswa. “aroni anofanira kupa hando yechipiriso chechivi chake kuti azviyananisire iye nemhuri yake. ipapo anofanira kutora mbudzi mbiri agouya nadzo pamberi payeahoh pamusuo wetende rokusangana. anofanira kukanda mijenya pambudzi mbiri idzi, mumwe mujenya wayeahoh nomumwe wembudzi yokutakudzwa. aroni anofanira kuuya nembudzi yakabatwa nomujenya wayeahoh agoibayira sechipiriso chechivi. asi mbudzi inosarudzwa nomujenya sembudzi yokutakudzwa ichauyiswa iri mhenyu pamberi payeahoh igoshandiswa pakuyananisira, icharegedzwa ichienda kurenje sembudzi yokutakudzwa. “aroni anofanira kuuya nehando yake yechipiriso chake chechivi, kuti azviyananisire iye nemhuri yake, uye anofanira kubaya hando yechipiriso chake chechivi. anofanira kutora hadyana yakazara namazimbe ari kubvira kubva paaritari pamberi payeahoh nezvanza zviviri zvezvinonhuhwira zvakatsetseka agoenda nazvo seri kwechidzitiro. anofanira kuisa zvinonhuhwira pamusoro pomoto pamberi payeahoh, uye utsi hwezvinonhuhwira huchafukidza chigaro chenyasha pamusoro pechipupuriro, kuti asafa. anofanira kutora rimwe ropa rehando uye nomunwe wake agorisasa pamberi pechigaro chenyasha. “ipapo anofanira kubaya mbudzi yechipiriso chechivi chavanhu agotora agoenda neropa racho seri kwechidzitiro agoita naro sezvaakaita neropa rehando. acharisasa pachigaro chenyasha napamberi pacho. nenzira iyi achayananisira nzvimbo tsvene-tsvene nokuda kwokudarika uye nokumukira kwavaisraeri, zvisinei kuti zvivi zvavo zvanga zviri zvipi. anofanira kuitira tende rokusangana zvimwe chetezvo, iro riri pakati pavo, pakati pokusachena kwavo. hapana munhu anofanira kunge ari mutende rokusangana panguva inopindwamo naaroni kunoyananisira munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene kusvikira abuda, azviyananisira iye nemhuri yake uye neungano yose yavaisraeri. “ipapo achabuda oenda kuaritari iri pamberi payeahoh agoiyananisira. achatora rimwe ropa rehando nerembudzi agoriisa panyanga dzose dzearitari. achasasa rimwe ropa racho pairi nomunwe wake kanomwe kuti aichenese uye aitsaure kubva pakusachena kwavaisraeri. “kana aroni apedza kuyananisira nzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, tende rokusangana nearitari, achauya nembudzi mhenyu. anofanira kuisa maoko ake ose pamusoro wembudzi mhenyu agoreurura pamusoro payo kuipa nokumukira kwose kwavaisraeri, zvivi zvavo zvose agozviisa pamusoro pembudzi. acharega mbudzi ichienda kurenje nomunhu anenge apiwa basa iroro. mbudzi iyi ichatakura pairi zvivi zvavo zvose kunzvimbo isina vanhu, uye munhu uyu achairegedzera murenje. “ipapo aroni achapinda mutende rokusangana agobvisa nguo dzomucheka dzaapfeka asati apinda munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene uye achadzisiya imomo. achashamba nemvura munzvimbo tsvene agopfeka nguo dzake dzamazuva ose. ipapo achabuda agobayira chipiriso chake chinopiswa nechipiriso chinopiswa chavanhu, agozviyananisira iye navanhu. achapisawo mafuta echipiriso chechivi paaritari. “murume achandoregedzera mbudzi yokutakudzwa, anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura; mushure maizvozvo agozopinda mumusasa. hando yechipiriso chezvivi nembudzi yechipiriso chezvivi, zvine ropa rinenge rauyiswa munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene kuti zviyananisire, zvinofanira kuendeswa kunze kwomusasa, matehwe acho, nyama namazvizvi zvinofanira kupiswa. munhu anozvipisa anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura mushure maizvozvo agozopinda mumusasa. “uyu unofanira kuva mutemo unogara nokusingaperi kwamuri: pazuva regumi romwedzi wechinomwe munofanira kutsanya musingaiti kana basa, chingava chizvarwa chenyu kana mutorwa agere pakati penyu, nokuti pazuva iri muchayananisirwa, kuti mucheneswe. ipapo, pamberi payeahoh muchava vakachena pazvivi zvenyu zvose. isabata rokuzorora, uye munofanira kuzvinyima; uyu murayiro unogara nokusingaperi. muprista akazodzwa nokugadzwa kuti atevere baba vake somuprista mukuru anofanira kuyananisira. anofanira kupfeka nguo dzomucheka, nguo tsvene agoyananisira nzvimbo tsvene-tsvene netende rokusangana, nearitari uye navaprista navamwe vanhu vose veungano. “uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kwamuri: kuyananisira uku kunofanira kuitwa kamwe chete pagore, nokuda kwezvivi zvose zvavaisraeri.” uye zvakaitwa, sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.

17

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuna aroni navanakomana vake nokuvaisraeri vose uti kwavari, ‘izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh: muisraeri upi zvake anobayira nzombe, gwayana kana mbudzi mumusasa kana kunze kwawo, panzvimbo yokuuya nayo pamusuo wetende rokusangana kuti aipe sechipiriso kuna yeahoh pamberi petabhenakeri yayeahoh, murume iyeye achanzi ane mhosva yokudeura ropa; adeura ropa saka anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. izvi zvinoitirwa kuti vaisraeri vauye nezvibayiro zvavo zvavanobayira kusango, kuna yeahoh. vanofanira kuuya nazvo kumuprista, ndiko kuti, kuna yeahoh, pamusuo wokupinda mutende rokusangana vagozvibayira sezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. muprista achasasa ropa paaritari yayeahoh pamusuo wetende rokusangana agopisa mafuta kuti ave chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. havafanirizve kupa zvibayiro zvavo zvakare kuzvifananidzo zvembudzi izvo zvavanoita ufeve nazvo. uyu uchava murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kwavari uye nokuzvizvarwa zvichatevera.’ “uti kwavari: ‘muisraeri upi zvake kana mutorwa agere pakati pavo anopa chipiriso chinopiswa kana chibayiro uye agorega kuuya nacho kumusuo wetende rokusangana kuzochipa kuna yeahoh, munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. “ ‘muisraeri upi zvake kana mutorwa agere pakati pavo anodya ropa ripi zvaro ndichanangana nomunhu iyeye anodya ropa uye ndichamubvisa pakati pavanhu vokwake. nokuti upenyu hwenyama huri muropa uye ndaripa kwamuri kuti rikuyananisirei paaritari; ropa ndiro rinoyananisira upenyu hwomunhu. naizvozvo ndinoti kuvaisraeri, “hapana mumwe wenyu anofanira kudya ropa, uye hapana mutorwa agere pakati penyu anofanira kudya ropa.” “ ‘muisraeri upi zvake kana mutorwa agere pakati penyu anovhima mhuka ipi neipi ingadyiwa, anofanira kudurura ropa rayo agorifushira nevhu, nokuti upenyu hwechisikwa chose iropa racho. ndiko kusaka ndati kuvaisraeri, “hamufaniri kudya ropa rechisikwa chipi zvacho nokuti upenyu hwechisikwa huri muropa; ani naani anoridya anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.” “ ‘ani naani, angava chizvarwa chenyu kana mutorwa, anodya chinhu chinowanikwa chakafa, kana kuti chinowanikwa chakabvarurwa nemhuka dzomusango, anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agoshamba nemvura uye achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru; ipapo achava akachena. asi kana akarega kusuka nguo dzake akashamba iye, achapiwa mhosva.’ ”

18

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari, ‘ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. hamufaniri kuita sezvavanoita kuijipiti, kwamaigara uye hamufaniri kuita sezvavanoita kukenani, kwandiri kukuendesai. musatevera zviito zvavo. munofanira kutevera mitemo yangu uye mugochenjerera kuti mutevere mirayiro yangu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. chengetai mirayiro nemitemo yangu nokuti munhu anoiteerera achararama nayo. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘hapana anofanira kuswedera kuhama yepedyo kuti avate naye. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usazvidza baba vako nokusangana namai vako. ndimai vako usasangana navo. “ ‘usasangana nomukadzi wababa vako, izvi zvingazvidza baba vako. “ ‘usasangana nehanzvadzi yako kana mwanasikana wababa vako kana mwanasikana wamai vako, zvisinei kuti akaberekwa mumba mumwe chete kana kumwewo. “ ‘usasangana nomwanasikana womwanakomana wako kana mwanasikana womwanasikana wako; izvi zvingauyisa kuzvidzwa kwauri. “ ‘usasangana nomwanasikana womukadzi wababa vako akaberekwa nababa vako, ihanzvadzi yako. “ ‘usasangana nehanzvadzi yababa vako, ihama yababa vako yepedyo. “ ‘usasangana nomukoma kana mununʼuna wamai vako nokuti ihama yamai vako yepedyo. “ ‘usazvidza mununʼuna kana mukoma wababa vako nokuswedera kumukadzi wavo kuti uvate naye; nokuti ndimaiguru kana mainini. “ ‘usasangana nomuroora wako, mukadzi womwanakomana wako; usasangana naye. “ ‘usasangana nomukadzi womukoma kana mununʼuna wako; izvi zvingauyisa kuzvidzwa kwomukoma kana mununʼuna wako. “ ‘usasangana nomukadzi pamwe chete nomwanasikana wake. usasangana nomwanasikana womwanakomana wake kana mwanasikana womwanasikana wake; ihama dzake dzepedyo. zvakaipa izvozvo. “ ‘usatora mununʼuna womukadzi wako kuti ave mukadzinyina, varwisane, ugosangana naye mukadzi wako achiri mupenyu. “ ‘usaswedera kumukadzi kuti usangane naye panguva yokusachena kwokuenda kumwedzi kwake. “ ‘usasangana nomukadzi womuvakidzani wako ugozvisvibisa naye. “ ‘usapa ani zvake pakati pavana vako kuti vabayirwe kuna moreki nokuti haufaniri kumhura zita rayeahoh. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usavata nomurume somurume anovata nomukadzi; zvinonyangadza. “ ‘usasangana nemhuka uye ugozvisvibisa nayo. mukadzi haafaniri kuzvipa kumhuka kuti asangane nayo; uku kunyangadza kukuru. “ ‘musazvisvibisa neimwe yenzira idzi nokuti ndudzi dzandichadzinga pamberi penyu dzakazvisvibisa naizvozvo. kunyange nyika yakasvibiswa; naizvozvo ndakairanga nokuda kwezvakaipa zvayo uye nyika yakarutsa vagari vayo. asi imi munofanira kuchengeta mirayiro yangu nemitemo yangu. zvizvarwa zvenyu navatorwa vagere pakati penyu havafaniri kuita kana chimwe chezvinhu zvinonyangadza izvi, nokuti zvinhu zvose izvi zvakaitwa navanhu vaigara munyika iyoyo musati mavamo, uye nyika ikasvibiswa. uye kana mukasvibisa nyika, ichakurutsirai kunze sokurutsa kwayakaita ndudzi dzaigaramo imi musati mavamo. “ ‘ani naani anoita zvinonyangadza izvi, vanhu vakadaro vanofanira kubviswa kubva pavanhu vokwavo. chengetai zvandakakurayirai uye musatevedzera kana imwe yetsika dzinonyangadza dzaiitwa musati mauya, uye musazvisvibisa nadzo. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ”

19

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuungano yose yeisraeri uti kwavari, ‘ivai vatsvene nokuti ini yeahoh allah wenyu ndiri mutsvene. “ ‘mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kuremekedza mai nababa vake uye munofanira kuchengetedza masabata angu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘musava nehanya nezvifananidzo kana kuzviitira vamwari vesimbi dzakanyungudutswa. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘kana uchipa yeahoh chibayiro chechipiriso chokuwadzana, unofanira kuchipa nenzira inoita kuti chigamuchirwe pachinzvimbo chako. chichadyiwa nomusi waunochibayira kana zuva rinotevera; chinhu chipi nechipi chinosiyiwa kusvika pazuva rechitatu chinofanira kupiswa. kana zvimwe zvacho zvikadyiwa pazuva rechitatu hazvina kuchena uye hazvigamuchirwi. ani naani anozvidya achapiwa mhosva nokuti asvibisa chitsvene kuna allah; munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. “ ‘kana uchikohwa mumunda wako usakohwa kusvika kumuchetocheto womunda wako, kana kunhongera zvawira pasi pakukohwa. musakohwa kechipiri mumunda wemizambiringa kana kunhonga mazambiringa adonha. zvisiyire varombo kana vatorwa. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘usaba. “ ‘usareva nhema. “ ‘musanyengedzana. “ ‘usapika nhema nezita rangu ugozvidza zita raallah wako. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usabiridzira muvakidzani wako kana kumutorera chinhu nechisimba. “ ‘usachengeta mubayiro womushandi kusvikira mangwana. “ ‘usatuka matsi kana kuisa chigumbuso mberi kwebofu, asi itya allah wako. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usaminamisa kururamisira, usatsaura murombo uchifarira mupfumi, asi tonga muvakidzani wako zvakakodzera. “ ‘usafamba uchiparadzira makuhwa pakati pavanhu vokwako. “ ‘usaita chinhu chinoisa upenyu hwomuvakidzani wako panjodzi. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usavenga hama yako mumwoyo mako. tsiura muvakidzani wako zviri pachena kuitira kuti usazova nomugove pamhosva yake. “ ‘usatsvaka kutsiva kana kugara nedaka nomumwe wavanhu vokwako, asi ida muvakidzani wako sokuda kwaunozviita iwe. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘chengeta mirayiro yangu. “ ‘usaberekesa mhando dzemhuka dzakasiyana. “ ‘usadyara mbeu mbiri dzakasiyana mumunda mako. “ ‘usapfeka nguo yakarukwa nemicheka miviri yakasiyana. “ ‘kana murume akavata nomukadzi ari murandakadzi akavimbiswa kuno mumwe murume, asi mukadzi asina kudzikinurwa kana kupiwa rusununguko rwake, panofanira kuva nokurangwa kwakakodzera. asi haafaniri kuurayiwa nokuti mukadzi uyu anga asati asunungurwa. zvisinei, murume uyu anofanira kuuya negondobwe kumusuo wetende rokusangana rechipiriso chemhosva kuna yeahoh. negondobwe rechipiriso chemhosva muprista anofanira kumuyananisira pamberi payeahoh nokuda kwechivi chaakaita, uye chivi chake chicharegererwa. “ ‘kana mapinda munyika iyo mukadyara muchero upi noupi, torai michero yacho seisingabvumirwi. kwamakore matatu munofanira kuitora seisingabvumirwi. haifaniri kudyiwa. mugore rechina, michero yacho yose ichava mitsvene, chipiriso chokurumbidza kuna yeahoh. asi mugore rechishanu mungadya michero yacho. nenzira iyi gohwo renyu richawedzerwa. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘usadya nyama ipi neipi ichine ropa. “ ‘usaita zvokushopera kana zvouroyi. “ ‘musacheka bvudzi renyu kumativi omusoro kana kudimurira ndebvu dzenyu. “ ‘musacheka miviri yenyu nokuda kwavakafa kana kuzviisa nyora. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usaderedza unhu hwomwanasikana wako nokumuita chifeve nokuti nyika yose ichaita ufeve ikazara nouipi. “ ‘chengetedza masabata angu uye uremekedze nzvimbo yangu tsvene. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘usaenda kumasvikiro nokune vezvemidzimu nokuti uchasvibiswa navo. ndini yeahoh allah wako. “ ‘unofanira kusimukira vachena bvudzi, ratidza rukudzo kuna vakuru uye utye allah wako. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘kana mutorwa akagara nemi munyika, musamubate zvakaipa. mutorwa anogara nemi anofanira kubatwa sechizvarwa chenyu. mudei sokuda kwamunozviita imi nokuti maiva vatorwa muijipiti. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘musashandise zviero zvokubiridzira kana muchiera urefu, uremu kana uwandu. shandisai zviyero zvechokwadi efa rechokwadi nehini yechokwadi. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu akakubudisai muijipiti. “ ‘chengetai mirayiro yangu yose nemitemo yangu yose, mugoitevera. ndini yeahoh.’ ”

20

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘muisraeri upi noupi kana mutorwa upi noupi agere muisraeri achapa vana vake kuna moreki anofanira kuurayiwa. vanhu vomunyika yake vanofanira kumutaka namabwe. ndichanangana nomunhu iyeye uye ndichamubvisa pakati pavanhu vokwake, nokuti, nokuda kwokupa vana vake kuna moreki, asvibisa nzvimbo yangu tsvene uye amhura zita rangu dzvene. kana vanhu vomunyika yake vakashaya hanya kana munhu uyu achipa mumwe wavana vake kuna moreki vakasamuuraya, ndichanangana nomunhu uyo nemhuri yake, uye ndichamubvisa pakati pavanhu vokwake, iye pamwe chete navose vanomutevera pakuita ufeve namoreki. “ ‘ndichanangana nomunhu uyo achaenda kumasvikiro, nokuvadzimu achiita ufeve nokuvatevera uye ndichamubvisa pakati pavanhu vokwake. “ ‘zvitsaurei mugove vatsvene nokuti ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. chengetai mitemo yangu mugoitevera. ndini yeahoh anokuitai vatsvene. “ ‘ani naani anotuka baba kana mai vake anofanira kuurayiwa. atuka baba kana mai vake uye ropa rake richava pamusoro pake. “ ‘kana mumwe akaita upombwe nomukadzi womumwe murume, kana nomukadzi womuvakidzani wake, vose murume mhombwe nomukadzi chifeve vanofanira kuurayiwa. “ ‘kana murume akavata nomukadzi wababa vake azvidza baba vake. vose murume nomukadzi vanofanira kuurayiwa. ropa ravo richava pamusoro pavo. “ ‘kana mumwe akavata nomuroora wake, vose vari vaviri vanofanira kuurayiwa, zvavaita kunyangadza kukuru; ropa ravo richava pamusoro pavo. “ ‘kana mumwe akavata nomurume seanovata nomukadzi vose vari vaviri vaita zvinonyangadza. vanofanira kuurayiwa. ropa ravo richava pamusoro pavo. “ ‘kana mumwe akawana mukadzi pamwe chete namai vake, zvakaipa. vose iye naivo vanofanira kupiswa mumoto kuitira kuti pasawanikwe kuipa pakati penyu. “ ‘kana murume akavata nemhuka anofanira kuurayiwa uye munofanira kuuraya mhuka yacho. “ ‘kana mukadzi akaswedera kumhuka kuti avate nayo, urayai zvose mukadzi nemhuka yacho. vanofanira kuurayiwa; ropa ravo richava pamusoro pavo. “ ‘kana murume akawana hanzvadzi yake mwanasikana wababa vake, kana kuti wamai vake, uye vakavata vose, ichi chinyadziso. vanofanira kubviswa pamberi pameso avanhu vokwavo. azvidza hanzvadzi yake uye achava nemhosva. “ ‘kana murume akavata nomukadzi panguva yokuva kwake kumwedzi akasangana naye, afumura chaipo panobva kuyerera kwake, mukadziwo azvifumura. vose vari vaviri vanofanira kubviswa pavanhu vokwavo. “ ‘usavata namainini kana vatete vako nokuti uku kuzvidza hama yapedyo; mose muri vaviri muchava nemhosva. “ ‘kana murume akavata nomukadzi wababamunini vake azvidza babamunini vake. vachava nemhosva; vachafa vasina vana. “ ‘kana murume akawana mukadzi womukoma kana womununʼuna ichi chinhu chisina kunaka, azvidza mukoma kana mununʼuna wake. vachashaya vana. “ ‘chengetai mirayiro yangu nemitemo yangu mugoitevera kuitira kuti nyika yandiri kukuendesai kwairi irege kukurutsirai kunze. hamufaniri kutevera tsika dzendudzi dzandichadzinga pamberi penyu. nokuti dzakaita zvinhu zvose izvi, ndikadzisema. asi ndakati kwamuri, “muchatora nyika yavo. ndichaipa kwamuri senhaka, nyika inoerera mukaka nouchi.” ndini yeahoh allah wenyu uyo akakutsaurai kubva kune dzimwe ndudzi. “ ‘naizvozvo unofanira kuisa mutsauko pakati pemhuka dzakachena nedzisina kuchena uye pakati peshiri dzakachena nedzisina kuchena. musazvisvibisa nemhuka ipi zvayo kana shiri kana chimwe chinhu chinofamba pavhu, idzo dzandakatsaura sedzisina kuchena kwamuri. munofanira kuva vatsvene kwandiri nokuti ini yeahoh ndiri mutsvene. ndakakutsaurai kubva kundudzi kuti muve vangu ndoga. “ ‘murume kana mukadzi svikiro kana anoita zvemidzimu pakati penyu anofanira kuurayiwa. munofanira kuvataka namabwe. ropa ravo richava pamusoro pavo.’ ”

21

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaprista vanakomana vaaroni uti kwavari: ‘muprista haafaniri kuzvisvibisa, achiitira kunyange ani zvake pakati pavanhu vake vanofa. kunze kwehama yepedyo yakaita samai kana baba vake, mwanakomana kana mwanasikana wake, mukoma kana mununʼuna wake, kana hanzvadzi yake isina kuroorwa yaanochengeta sezvo asina murume nokuda kwaiyeyu angagona kuzvisvibisa. haafaniri kuzvisvibisa nokuda kwavanhu vano ukama naye hwokuwanana, akadaro azvisvibisa. “ ‘vaprista havafaniri kuveurwa misoro kana kudimburira ndebvu dzavo kana kutema miviri yavo nyora. vanofanira kuva vatsvene kuna allah wavo uye havafaniri kumhura zita raallah wavo. nokuti vanouyisa kuna yeahoh zvipiriso zvinoitwa nomoto, nezvokudya zvaallah wavo; naizvozvo vanofanira kuva vatsvene. “ ‘havafaniri kuwana vakadzi vakasvibiswa noufeve kana kuti vakarambwa navarume vavo nokuti muprista mutsvene kuna allah wake. mutsaurei somutsvene nokuti ndiye anouya nezvokudya zvaallah wenyu. mutsaurei somutsvene nokuti ini yeahoh ndiri mutsvene, ini ndinokuitai vatsvene. “ ‘kana mwanasikana womuprista akazvisvibisa nokuva chifeve, anonyadzisa baba vake; anofanira kupiswa mumoto. “ ‘muprista mukuru, uyo ari pakati pamadzikoma ake navanunʼuna vake, akadirwa mafuta okuzodzwa pamusoro pake uye akagadzwa kuti apfeke nguo dzouprista, haafaniri kurega bvudzi rake risina kukamiwa, kana kubvarura nguo dzake. haafaniri kupinda munzvimbo ine chitunha. haafaniri kuzvisvibisa kunyange nokuda kwababa vake kana mai vake, kana kubva munzvimbo tsvene yaallah kana kuisvibisa, nokuti akakumikidzwa namafuta okuzodza aallah wake. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘mukadzi waanowana anofanira kunge ari mhandara izere. haafaniri kuwana chirikadzi, mukadzi akarambwa kana mukadzi akasvibiswa noufeve asi mhandara yakazara bedzi kubva kuvanhu vokwake, kuitira kuti arege kuzosvibisa zvizvarwa zvake pakati pavanhu vokwake. ndini yeahoh ndinomuita mutsvene.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuna aroni, ‘kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera hakuna mumwe wezvizvarwa zvako akaremara angaswedera pedyo kuzopa zvokudya zvaallah wake. hapana munhu ano urema hupi zvahwo angaswedera pedyo: hakuna bofu kana anokamhina kana akaremara; hakuna munhu ane gumbo rakaremara kana ruoko rwakaremara, kana ane musana wakakombama, munhu akapfupikisa kana ano urema hwamaziso kana ane mamota kana ane mhezi, kana akakuvara manhu ake. hapana wechizvarwa chaaroni akaremara neipi nzira angaswedera pedyo kuzopa zvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. ano urema; haafaniri kuswedera pedyo kuzopa zvokudya zvaallah wake. angadya hake zvokudya zvitsvene-tsvene zvaallah wake, pamwe chete nezvokudya zvitsvene; asi nokuda kwourema hwake, haafaniri kusvika pedyo nechidzitiro kana kusvika paaritari, agosvibisa nzvimbo yangu tsvene. ndini yeahoh ndinovaita vatsvene.’ ” saka mozisi akataura izvi kuna aroni navanakomana vake nokuvaisraeri vose.

22

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “udza aroni navanakomana vake kuti varemekedze zvipiriso zvitsvene zvavaisraeri zvavanditsaurira kuti varege kusvibisa zita rangu dzvene. ndini yeahoh. “uti kwavari, ‘kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera, kana mumwe wezvizvarwa zvenyu asina kuchena akaswedera pedyo nezvinhu zvakatsaurirwa yeahoh navaisraeri, munhu iyeye anofanira kubviswa pamberi pangu. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘kana chizvarwa chaaroni chikava nechirwere chamaperembudzi kana akava nezvinoyerera pamuviri wake, haangadyi zvipiriso zvitsvene kusvikira acheneswa. achavawo asina kuchena kana akabata chimwe chinhu chakasvibiswa nechitunha kana nomumwe murume anobuda mbeu, kana kuti akabata chose chinokambaira chingamusvibisa kana munhu upi zvake angamusvibisa, kungava kusachena kupi zvako. munhu uyo achabata kusachena uku achava asina kuchena kusvikira manheru. haafaniri kudya zvipiriso zvipi zvazvo zvitsvene kusvikira ashamba nemvura. kana zuva rovira, achava akachena, uye mushure maizvozvo angadya zvipiriso zvitsvene, nokuti ndizvo zvokudya zvake. haafaniri kudya chimwe chinhu chinowanikwa chakafa kana kuti chabvamburwa nemhuka dzesango, akazosvibiswa nayo. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘vaprista vanofanira kuchengeta zvandakarayira kuitira kuti vasava nemhosva uye vakazofa nokuda kwokuti vashora zvandakarayira. ndini yeahoh anovaita vatsvene. “ ‘hakuna wokunze kwemhuri yomuprista angadya chipiriso chitsvene, kana mueni womuprista kana mushandi wake angachidya. asi kana muprista akatenga nhapwa nemari, kana kuti nhapwa ikaberekerwa mumba make, nhapwa iyoyo inogona kudya chokudya chake. kana mwanasikana womuprista akawanikwa nomumwe munhu asiri muprista haagoni kudya chipi zvacho chezvitsvene zvinouyiswa kumuprista. asi kana mwanasikana womuprista akava chirikadzi kana kuti akarambwa, iye asina vana, akadzoka kuzogara mumba mababa vake sapaudiki hwake, anogona kudya chokudya chababa vake. asi munhu asina kukodzera haangadyi kudya uku. “ ‘kana munhu upi zvake akadya chipiriso chitsvene nokusaziva, anofanira kudzorera kumuprista chipiriso ichi agowedzera chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu pamusoro. vaprista havafaniri kusvibisa zvipiriso zvitsvene zvinopiwa navaisraeri kuna yeahoh, nokuvabvumira kudya zvipiriso zvitsvene nokudaro vakazviuyisira mhosva pamusoro pavo inoda muripo. ndini yeahoh, anovaita vatsvene.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuna aroni navanakomana vake nokuvaisraeri vose uti kwavari, ‘kana mumwe wenyu, angava muisraeri kana mutorwa, anogara muisraeri, akapa chipo kuti chive chipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh, kungava kuzadzisa mhiko kana kungopawo chipo, munofanira kupa mukono usina kuremara wemombe, kana gwai, kana mbudzi kuitira kuti zvigogamuchirwa panzvimbo yenyu. musauya nechinhu chipi zvacho chakaremara nokuti hachizogamuchirwi panzvimbo yenyu. kana munhu akauyisa kubva mudanga remombe kana ramakwai chipiriso chokuwadzana kuna yeahoh achizadzisa kupika kwake kana kuti sechipo chokungopawo, chinofanira kuva chisina kuremara kana chisina gwapa kuti chigamuchirwe. musapa kuna yeahoh zvakapofumara, zvakakuvara kana zvakaremara, kana chinhu chine mhezi kana chine maronda anopararira. musaisa chipi zvacho chezvinhu izvi paaritari sechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. munogona kupa zvakadaro sechipo chokungopawo, nzombe kana gwai rakaremera kana zvine mitezo yakarebesa kana yakapfupikisa, asi hazvigamuchirwi pakuzadzisa mhiko. hamufaniri kupa kuna yeahoh chipiriso chemhuka ina manhu akakuvara, akatswanywa, akabvamburwa kana akachekwa. hamufaniri kuita izvi munyika menyu. uye hamufaniri kugamuchira mhuka dzakadai kubva mumaoko omutorwa muchizodzipa sechokudya chaallah wenyu. hadzizogamuchirwi panzvimbo yenyu nokuti dzakaremara uye hadzina kukwana.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “mhuru, kana gwai, kana mbudzi ikaberekwa, inofanira kugara namai vayo kwamazuva manomwe. kubva pazuva rorusere zvichienda mberi, ichagamuchirwa sechipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. musauraya mombe nomwana wayo kana gwai nomwana waro musi mumwe chete. “kana muchibayira yeahoh chibayiro chokuvonga, chibayirei nenzira inoita kuti chigogamuchirwa panzvimbo yenyu. chinofanira kudyiwa musi iwoyo, musasiya zvimwe zvacho kusvikira mangwana. ndini yeahoh. “chengetai mirayiro yangu mugoitevera. ndini yeahoh. musamhura zita rangu dzvene. ndinofanira kuzivikanwa somutsvene navaisraeri. ndini yeahoh anokuitai vatsvene uye akakubudisai kubva muijipiti kuti ndive allah wenyu. ndini yeahoh.”

23

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari, ‘iyi ndiyo mitambo yangu yandakatara, mitambo yakatarwa yayeahoh yamunofanira kudaidzira seungano tsvene. “ ‘pane mazuva matanhatu amunoshanda asi zuva rechinomwe isabata rokuzorora, zuva reungano tsvene. hamufaniri kuita basa ripi zvaro kwose kwamunogara, isabata kuna yeahoh. “ ‘iyi ndiyo mitambo yakatarwa yayeahoh, ungano tsvene dzamunodaidzira panguva dzakatarwa. pasika yayeahoh inotanga madekwana pazuva regumi namana romwedzi wokutanga. pazuva regumi namashanu romwedzi iwoyo mutambo wayeahoh wechingwa chisina mbiriso unotanga; kwamazuva manomwe munofanira kudya chingwa chinobikwa chisina mbiriso. pazuva rokutanga itai ungano tsvene uye musaita mabasa amazuva ose. kwamazuva manomwe mupe chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. uye pazuva rechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano tsvene uye musaita basa ramazuva ose.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari, ‘kana mapinda munyika yandichakupai, mukakohwa gohwo rayo, uyai kumuprista nechisote chezviyo zvamunotanga kukohwa. anofanira kuninira chisote pamberi payeahoh kuti chigamuchirwe panzvimbo penyu. muprista anofanira kuchininira pazuva rinotevera sabata. pazuva ramunoninira chisote, munofanira kubayira sechipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh, gwayana rine gore rimwe chete risina kuremara, pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chezviyo chinokwana zvikamu zviviri kubva mugumi zveefa, zvoupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa namafuta, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, nechipiriso chacho chokunwa chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvina zvehini rewaini. hamufaniri kudya chingwa chipi zvacho, kana zviyo zvakakangwa, kana zviyo zvitsva, kusvikira zuva chairo ramunouya nechipiriso ichi kuna allah wenyu. uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera, kwose kwamuchagara. “ ‘kubva pazuva rinotevera sabata, zuva ramakauya nechisote chechipiriso chokuninira, verengai mavhiki manomwe azere. verengai mazuva makumi mashanu kusvika pazuva rinotevera sabata rechinomwe, ipapo mugopa chipiriso chezviyo zvitsva kuna yeahoh. kubva kupi kwose kwamunogara, uyai nezvingwa zviviri zvakaitwa nezvikamu zviviri kubva mugumi zveefa zvoupfu hwakatsetseka zvakabikwa nembiriso sechipiriso chokuninira chezvibereko zvokutanga kuna yeahoh. pamwe chete nechingwa ichi mupe makwayana manomwe asina kuremara egore rimwe nehando imwe chete diki namakondobwe maviri. zvichava zvipiriso zvinopisirwa yeahoh, pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvinonwiwa, chive chipiriso chinoitwa nomoto chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. ipapo bayirai nhongo imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi namakwayana maviri, ose egore rimwe chete, sechipiriso chokuwadzana. muprista anofanira kuninira makwayana maviri pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira pamwe chete nechingwa chegohwo rokutanga. izvi zvipiriso zvitsvene kuna yeahoh zvomuprista. pazuva rimwe chetero munofanira kudaidzira ungano tsvene murege basa ramazuva ose. uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kuzvizvarwa zvichauya, kwose kwamuchagara. “ ‘kana muchikohwa gohwo renyika yenyu musakohwa kusvikira kumucheto kwomunda wenyu, kana kunhongera zvinosara pakukohwa kwenyu. zvisiyirei varanda navatorwa. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechinomwe munofanira kuva nezuva rokuzorora, ungano tsvene inocherechedzwa nokuridza hwamanda. musaita basa ramazuva ose, asi mupe chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “zuva regumi romwedzi iwoyo wechinomwe izuva rokuyananisa. muite ungano tsvene uye muzvinyime zvokudya, mugopa chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. musashanda pazuva iroro, nokuti izuva rokuyananisira, pamunoyananisirwa pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu. munhu wose asingazvinyimi musi iwoyo anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. munhu upi noupi achaita basa ripi zvaro, nomusi iwoyo, ndichamuparadza pakati pavanhu vokwake. hamufaniri kutomboita basa. uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kumarudzi ose achauya, kwose kwamuchagara. iri isabata renyu rokuzorora, uye munofanira kuzvinyima. kubva manheru ezuva repfumbamwe romwedzi kusvikira manheru anotevera munofanira kucherechedza sabata.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘pazuva regumi neshanu romwedzi wechinomwe mutambo wayeahoh wamatumba unotanga, uye uchapedza mazuva manomwe. zuva rokutanga iungano tsvene; musaita basa ramazuva ose. kwamazuva manomwe mupe kuna yeahoh zvipiriso zvinoitwa nomoto uye pazuva iroro muite ungano tsvene mugopa chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. iyi ndiyo ungano yokupedzisira; musaita basa ramazuva ose. “ ‘iyi ndiyo mitambo yayeahoh yakatarwa yamunofanira kuparidzira ungano tsvene kuti dziuye nezvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, nezvipiriso zvinopiswa uye nezvinopiswa zvezviyo, zvibayiro nezvipiriso zvokunwa zvinodiwa mazuva ose. zvipiriso izvi zvinowedzerwa pamusoro pezviya zvamasabata ayeahoh uye pamusoro pezvipo zvenyu nezvose zvamakapikira nezvipiriso zvose zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira zvamunopa kuna yeahoh. “ ‘zvino kutanga pazuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wechinomwe, mushure mokunge mapedza kukohwa zvirimwa zvenyika, muite mutambo wokupemberera kuna yeahoh kwamazuva manomwe; zuva rokutanga izuva rokuzorora, uye zuva rorusere izuva rokuzororawo. pazuva rokutanga munofanira kutsara michero yakanakisisa yemiti, nemichero yemichindwe, namatavi ana mashizha akawanda, nemikonachando, uye mugofara pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu kwamazuva manomwe. munofanira kuitira yeahoh mutambo uyu kwamazuva manomwe gore negore. uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kuzvizvarwa zvichauya; muupemberere mumwedzi wechinomwe. garai mumatumba kwamazuva manomwe: zvizvarwa zvose zvavaisraeri zvinofanira kugara mumatumba kuitira kuti zvizvarwa zvenyu zvigoziva kuti ndakaita kuti vaisraeri vagare mumatumba pandakavabudisa kubva muijipiti. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ” saka mozisi akazivisa kuvaisraeri mitambo yakatarwa yayeahoh.

24

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “rayira vaisraeri kuti vauye kwauri namafuta akaisvonaka amaorivhi akasvinwa, omwenje, kuitira kuti mwenje irambe ichibvira nguva dzose. kunze kwechidzitiro chechipupuriro mutende rokusangana, aroni anofanira kuchengetedza mwenje iyi pamberi payeahoh kubva manheru kusvikira kwaedza, nguva dzose. uyu unofanira kuva murayiro unogara nokusingaperi kuzvizvarwa zvichauya. mwenje iri pachigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka chiri pamberi payeahoh inofanira kuchengetedzwa nguva dzose. “torai upfu hwakatsetseka mugobika zvingwa gumi nezviviri muchishandisa zvikamu zviviri kubva mugumi zveefa pachingwa chimwe nechimwe. zviisei mumitsara miviri, zvitanhatu mumutsara mumwe nomumwe, patafura yegoridhe rakaisvonaka pamberi payeahoh. pamutsetse mumwe nomumwe isai zvinonhuhwira zvive chirangaridzo chinomirira chingwa uye zvive chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. chingwa ichi chinofanira kuiswa pamberi payeahoh nguva nenguva, sabata nesabata zvakamirira vaisraeri sesungano inogara nokusingaperi. ndechaaroni navanakomana vake, vanofanira kuchidyira munzvimbo tsvene, nokuti ichi chikamu chitsvene-tsvene chezvipiriso zvavo zvenguva nenguva zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto.” zvino mwanakomana wavamwe mai vechiisraeri uye baba vake vari vechiijipita, akafamba pakati pavana vaisraeri, uye mwanakomana womukadzi muisraeri akarwa nomurume muisraeri mumusasa. mwanakomana womukadzi muisraeri akatuka zita rayeahoh nechituko; naizvozvo vakauya naye kuna mozisi. (zita ramai vake rainzi sheromiti, mwanasikana wadhibhiri worudzi rwadhani.) vakamuisa mutorongo kusvikira kuda kwayeahoh kwaiswa pachena kwavari. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora mutuki uende naye kunze kwomusasa. vose vakamunzwa vanofanira kuisa maoko avo pamusoro wake uye ungano yose inofanira kumutaka namabwe. uti kuvaisraeri, ‘kana munhu upi zvake akatuka allah wake achava nemhosva; ani naani anotuka zita rayeahoh anofanira kuurayiwa. ungano yose inofanira kumutaka namabwe. kunyange ari mutorwa kana chizvarwa chenyu, akatuka zita rayeahoh anofanira kuurayiwa. “ ‘ani naani anouraya munhu, anofanira kuurayiwa. munhu wose anouraya chipfuwo chomumwe munhu anofanira kuripa, upenyu hunotsiviwa noupenyu. kana munhu akakuvadza muvakidzani wake, zvose zvaaita zvinofanira kuitwa kwaari. kutyora kunotsiviwa nokutyora, ziso rinotsiviwa neziso, zino rinotsiviwa nezino. sezvaakuvadza mumwe saka naiye anofanira kukuvadzwa. ani naani anouraya mhuka anofanira kuripa asi ani naani anouraya munhu anofanira kuurayiwa. munofanira kuva nomutemo mumwe chete pamutorwa napachizvarwa chemo. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ” ipapo mozisi akataura navaisraeri, vakatora mutuki vakaenda naye kunze kwomusasa, vakamutaka namabwe akafa. vaisraeri vakaita sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.

25

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi pagomo resinai, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mapinda munyika yandichakupai, nyika pachayo inofanira kucherechedza sabata kuna yeahoh. kwamakore matanhatu dyarai minda yenyu, uye kwamakore matanhatu, dimurirai mizambiringa yenyu mugounganidza michero yayo. asi mugore rechinomwe, nyika inofanira kuva nesabata rokuzorora, sabata kuna yeahoh. musadyara minda yenyu kana kudimurira mizambiringa yenyu. musakohwa zvinomera zvoga kana kukohwa mazambiringa amagoko. nyika inofanira kuva negore rokuzorora. gohwo ripi neripi renyika resabata richava zvokudya zvenyu, zvako iwe, murandarume wako nomurandakadzi wako, uye mushandi nomueni agere pakati penyu, pamwe chete nezvipfuwo zvenyu nemhuka dzesango dziri munyika yenyu. zvibereko zvose zvomunyika zvingadyiwa. “ ‘verengai masabata manomwe amakore, makore manomwe akapetwa kanomwe, kuitira kuti masabata manomwe amakore akwane nguva inoita makore makumi mana namapfumbamwe. ipapo urayire kuti hwamanda iridzwe kwose pazuva regumi romwedzi wechinomwe; pazuva rokuyananisira ridzai hwamanda munyika yenyu yose. tsaurai gore ramakumi mashanu mugoparidza rusununguko munyika yose kuvagari vayo vose. richava jubhiri kwamuri; mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kudzokera kune zvake, uye mumwe nomumwe kumhuri yake. gore ramakumi mashanu richava gore rejubhiri kwamuri. musadyara uye musakohwa mazambiringa amagoko. nokuti ijubhiri uye rinofanira kuva dzvene kwamuri. idyai chete zvinotorwa kubva muminda. “ ‘mugore iri rejubhiri munhu wose anofanira kudzokera kune zvake. “ ‘kana mukatengesa munda kuno mumwe womunyika menyu kana kutenga kwaari, musabiridzirana. munofanira kutenga kubva kuvagari venyika yenyu zvichienderana nouwandu hwamakore kubva pagore rejubhiri. uye iye anofanira kutengesa zvichienderana nouwandu hwamakore asara okukohwa zvirimwa. kana makore awanda, munofanira kuwedzera mutengo, uye kana makore ari mashoma, munofanira kudzikisa mutengo, nokuti zvaari kukutengeserai ndizvo chaizvoizvo uwandu hwezvirimwa. musabiridzirana, asi ityai allah wenyu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘teverai mitemo yangu mugochenjerera kuti muteerere mirayiro yangu, ipapo muchagara makachengetedzeka munyika. ipapo nyika ichabereka zvibereko zvayo uye imi muchadya kusvikira maguta, mugogara makachengetedzeka. mungabvunza muchiti, “ko, tichadyei mugore rechinomwe kana tisingadyari kana kukohwa zvirimwa zvedu?” ndichakutumirai ropafadzo mugore rechitanhatu zvokuti nyika ichabereka zvinokwana makore matatu. pamunenge muchidyara mugore rorusere muchadya kubva kuzvirimwa zvakare, uye mucharamba muchidya kubva kwazviri kusvika gohwo regore rechipfumbamwe rasvika. “ ‘munda haufaniri kutengeswa nokusingaperi, nokuti nyika ndeyangu uye imi muri vatorwa navaeni kwandiri. munyika yose yamuchatora, munofanira kutendera kudzikinurwa kwenyika. “ ‘kana mumwe wavagari venyika yenyu akava murombo akatengesa zvimwe zvezvinhu zvake, hama yake yepedyo inofanira kuuya kuzodzikinura zvakatengeswa nehama yake. zvisinei, kana munhu ashaya angamudzikinurira zvinhu izvi, asi iye akazobudirira akawana nzira dzakakwana dzokuzvidzikinura, anofanira kupima kukosha kwomutengo wazvo kubva pagore raakazvitengesa, agodzosera zvasara pamuripo wazvo, kumurume waakazvitengesera; ipapo angadzokera kune zvake. asi kana akashaya nzira dzokumudzorera nadzo, zvaakatengesa zvicharamba zviri mumaoko omutengi kusvikira gore rejubhiri. zvichadzoserwa mugore rejubhiri uye iye achagona kudzokera kune zvake. “ ‘kana munhu akatengesa imba muguta rino rusvingo, anoramba aine mvumo yokuidzikinura kwegore rose shure kwokutengeswa kwayo. munguva iyoyo anogona kuidzikinura. kana isina kudzikinurwa gore risati rapfuura, imba iri muguta rino rusvingo ichava yowakatenga nezvizvarwa zvake nokusingaperi. haifaniri kudzorerwa pajubhiri. asi dzimba dziri mumisha isina kukomberedzwa namasvingo dzinofanira kuonekwa sesango. dzinogona kudzikinurwa uye dzinofanira kudzoserwa mujubhiri. “ ‘varevhi vane mvumo nguva dzose yokudzikinura dzimba dzavo mumaguta avarevhi, anova avo. naizvozvo zvinhu zvavarevhi zvinogona kudzikinurwa, zvichireva kuti imba inotengeswa muguta ravo ripi neripi inofanira kudzoserwa mujubhiri, nokuti dzimba dziri mumaguta avarevhi zvinhu zvavo pakati pavaisraeri. asi mafuro amaguta avo haafaniri kutengeswa; inhaka yavo inogara nokusingaperi. “ ‘kana mumwe wehama dzenyu akava murombo uye asisagoni kuzviriritira pakati penyu, mubatsirei sezvamunoita mutorwa kana mueni kuti arambe achigara pakati penyu. musatora mhindu yemhando ipi zvayo kubva kwaari, asi ityai allah wenyu kuitira kuti hama yenyu irambe ichigara pakati penyu. hamufaniri kumukweretesa mari muchiti ichazobereka mhindu kana kumutengesera zvokudya zvine mhindu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu akakubudisai kubva muijipiti kuti ndikupei nyika yekenani uye kuti ndive allah wenyu. “ ‘kana mumwe wehama dzenyu akava murombo pakati penyu akazvitengesa kwamuri, musamuita kuti ashande somuranda. anofanira kubatwa somushandi wamaricho kana kuti mushanyi ari pakati penyu; anofanira kukushandirai kusvikira gore rejubhiri. ipapo iye navana vake vanofanira kusunungurwa, uye achadzokera kurudzi rwake nokuzvinhu zvamadzitateguru ake. nokuti vaisraeri varanda vangu vandakabudisa kubva muijipiti, havafaniri kutengeswa senhapwa. musavatonga neutsinye, asi ityai allah wenyu. “ ‘nhapwa dzenyu dzechirume nedzechikadzi dzinofanira kubva mundudzi dzakakukomberedzai; munogona kutenga nhapwa kubva kwavari. munogona kutengawo vatorwa vashanyi vagere pakati penyu nemhuri dzavo dzakaberekerwa munyika yenyu, uye vachava pfuma yenyu. munogona kuvaita nhaka yavana venyu uye kuvaita nhapwa kweupenyu hwavo hwose, asi hamufaniri kutonga vamwe vaisraeri zvakaomarara. “ ‘mutorwa kana mushanyi pakati penyu akava mupfumi, uye mumwe wavanhu venyika yenyu akava murombo akazvitengesa kumutorwa agere pakati penyu, kana kumhuri yomutorwa, anoramba ane mvumo yokudzikinurwa mushure mokunge azvitengesa. mumwe wehama dzake anogona kumudzikinura: babamunini vake kana mwanakomana wababamunini vake, kana hama yake yapedyo worudzi rwake angamudzikinura. iye neanomutenga vanofanira kuverenga nguva kubva pagore raakazvitengesa kusvikira pagore rejubhiri. mutengo wokusunungurwa kwake unofanira kuenzaniswa nemari inoripwa mushandi wemaricho kwamakore iwayo. kana kuchine makore akawanda asara, anofanira kuripira rudzikinuro rwake, chikamu chikuru chemari yaakaripirwa. kana kwasara makore mashoma shoma gore rejubhiri risati rasvika, anofanira kurangana naye agodzosera mari yorudzikinuro rwake zvichienzaniswa namakore ake. anofanira kubatwa somushandi wemaricho gore rimwe nerimwe; munofanira kuona kuti tenzi wake haamutongi zvakaomarara. “ ‘kunyange zvake asina kudzikinurwa neimwe yenzira idzi, iye navana vake vanofanira kusunungurwa mugore rejubhiri, nokuti vaisraeri ndevangu savaranda vangu. varanda vangu vandakabudisa kubva muijipiti. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.

26

“ ‘musaita zvifananidzo kana kumisa chifananidzo kana ibwe rinoyera kwamuri, uye musaisa dombo rakavezwa munyika yenyu kuti mukotamire pamberi paro. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. “ ‘chengetai masabata angu uye muremekedze nzvimbo yangu tsvene. ndini yeahoh. “ ‘kana mukatevera mitemo yangu uye mukachenjerera kuti muteerere mirayiro yangu, ndichakutumirai mvura nenguva yayo, uye ivhu richabereka zvirimwa zvaro uye miti yesango ichabereka michero yayo. kupura kwenyu kuchasvika pakukohwa mazambiringa uye kukohwa mazambiringa kuchasvika pakudyara, uye muchadya zvose zvamunoda uye mugogara makachengetedzeka munyika menyu. “ ‘ndichapa rugare panyika, uye muchavata pasi pasina achakuvhundutsai. ndichabvisa zvikara zvesango panyika, uye munondo haungazopfuuri nomunyika yenyu. muchadzinganisa vavengi venyu, uye vachawa nomunondo pamberi penyu. vashanu venyu vachadzinganisa zana, uye zana renyu richadzinganisa zviuru gumi uye vavengi venyu vachawa nomunondo pamberi penyu. “ ‘ndichakutarisai nenyasha uye ndichaita kuti muve nezvibereko uye muwande, uye ndichachengeta sungano yangu nemi. muchange muchiri kudya gohwo regore rakapera pamuchazobvisa kuti muise zvitsva. ndichadzika tabhenakeri yangu pakati penyu uye handizokusemai. ndichafamba pakati penyu ndigova allah wenyu, uye muchava vanhu vangu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, ndakakubudisai kubva munyika yeijipiti kuti musazova varanda kuvaijipita zvakare, ndakatyora matanda ejoko renyu ndikakufambisai makati twi. “ ‘asi kana mukasanditeerera uye mukasaita zvose izvi zvandinorayira, uye mukaramba mitemo yangu, mukasema mirayiro yangu, mukatadza kuzadzisa zvose zvandakarayira, saizvozvo mukaputsa sungano yangu, ipapo ndichaita izvi kwamuri: ndichauyisa pamusoro penyu zvinotyisa, zvirwere zvinoparadza nedenda richaparadza meso enyu, uye rigokusvetai upenyu hwenyu. muchadyarira zviyo zvenyu pasina nokuti vavengi venyu vachazvidya. chiso changu chichanangana nemi zvokuti muchakundwa navavengi venyu. avo vanokuvengai vachakutongai, uye muchatiza kunyange pasina anokudzinganisai. “ ‘kana mukasanditeerera mushure maizvozvi zvose, ndichakurangai kakapetwa kanomwe nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu. ndichaputsa kuzvikudza kwenyu ndigoita kuti denga renyu rive sesimbi, uye ivhu riri pasi penyu sendarira. simba renyu richaperera pasina nokuti ivhu renyu harizobereki zvibereko, kana miti yenyika yenyu, michero yayo. “ ‘kana mukaramba muchirwisana neni uye mukaramba kunditeerera, ndichawedzera matambudziko enyu zvakapetwa kanomwe, sezvakafanira zvivi zvenyu. ndichatuma zvikara zvesango kuti zvizokurwisai, uye zvichakutorerai vana venyu, zvigoparadza mombe dzenyu zvigokuitai vashoma zvokuti nzira dzenyu dzichasara dzisina vanhu. “ ‘ipapo kana musingadi kudzorwa neni pazvinhu izvi, asi mukaramba muchirwisana neni, ini pachangu ndicharwisana nemi, uye ndichakurangai kakapetwa kanomwe nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu. uye ndichauyisa munondo wehondo pamusoro penyu kuti unditsivire kuputswa kwesungano. kana mukatizira mumaguta enyu ndichatumira denda pakati penyu, uye muchaiswa mumaoko avavengi. kana ndikamisa mugove wenyu wechingwa, vakadzi gumi vachagona kubika chingwa chenyu pachoto chimwe chete, uye vachakanya chingwa chenyu zviri pamwero. muchadya, asi hamungaguti. “ ‘mushure maizvozvi, mukaramba musinganditeereri asi mukaramba muchienderera mberi nokundirwisa, ipapo mukutsamwa kwangu ndicharwisana nemi, uye ini pachangu ndichakurangai nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu kakapetwa kanomwe. muchadya nyama yavanakomana venyu nenyama yavanasikana venyu. ndichaparadza nzvimbo dzenyu dzakakwirira, ndigotemera pasi aritari dzenyu dzezvinonhuhwira uye ndigounganidza zvitunha zvenyu pamusoro pavamwari venyu vasina upenyu, uye ndichakusemai. ndichaita kuti maguta enyu ave matongo uye ndigoparadza nzvimbo dzenyu tsvene, uye handizofariri munhuwi unonhuhwira zvinofadza wezvipiriso zvenyu. ndichaparadza nyika yenyu, zvokuti vavengi venyu vanogaramo vachashamiswa. ndichakuparadzirai pakati pendudzi uye ndichabudisa munondo wangu ndigokudzingirirai. nyika yenyu ichaparara, uye maguta enyu achava matongo. ipapo nyika ichafarira makore ayo esabata panguva yose yokuparadzwa kwayo pamunenge muri munyika yavavengi venyu; ipapo nyika ichazorora igofadzwa namasabata ayo. panguva yose yokuparadzwa kwayo nyika ichava nezororo rayakashayiwa pamasabata panguva yamakararama mairi. “ ‘kana vari vamwe venyu vanosara, ndichaita kuti hana dzavo dzizare nokutya munyika dzavavengi vavo zvokuti kurira kweshizha rinopeperetswa nemhepo kuchaita kuti vatize. vachamhanya vachiwirana sokunge vari kutiza munondo, vachawa kunyange pasina ari kuvadzinganisa. vachabonderana sokunge vanotiza munondo, kunyange pasina anovadzinganisa. saka hamuzogoni kumira pamberi pavavengi venyu. muchaparara pakati pendudzi; nyika yavavengi venyu ichakuparadzai. avo pakati penyu vachasara, vachaonda munyika dzavavengi vavo nokuda kwezvivi zvavo; uye vachaonda nokuda kwezvivi zvamadzibaba avo. “ ‘asi kana vakareurura zvivi zvavo nezvivi zvamadzibaba avo, kundimukira kwavo noruvengo rwavo kwandiri, zvakaita kuti ndivarwise kusvikira ndavaendesa kunyika yavavengi vavo, ipapo kana mwoyo yavo isina kudzingiswa yaninipiswa, varipira zvivi zvavo, ndicharangarira sungano yangu nayaqobho nesungano yangu naisaka uye nesungano yangu naabhurahama; uye ndicharangarira nyika iyi. nokuti nyika yavachasiya icharamba ichifarira masabata ayo kunyange yaparadzwa saizvozvo vasimo. vacharipira zvivi zvavo nokuti vakaramba mirayiro yangu vakasema mitemo yangu. asi kunyange zvakadaro, kana vari munyika yavavengi vavo, handizovarambi kana kuvasema kuti ndivaparadze zvachose, ndichiputsa sungano yangu navo. ndini yeahoh allah wavo. asi nokuda kwavo ndicharangarira sungano yandakaita namadzitateguru avo vandakabudisa kubva muijipiti pamberi pendudzi dzose kuti ndive allah wavo. ndini yeahoh.’ ” iyi ndiyo mitemo, mirayiro nezvakatemwa zvakamiswa nayeahoh pagomo resinai pakati pake navaisraeri kubudikidza namozisi.

27

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura navaisraeri uti kwavari, ‘kana munhu akaita mhiko yakasarudzika yokuti akumikidze vanhu kuna yeahoh nokupa mutengo wakaenzanirana, utare mutengo womunhurume ane makore ari pakati pamakumi maviri namakumi matanhatu pamashekeri makumi mashanu esirivha, zvichienzaniswa neshekeri rapanzvimbo tsvene; uye kana ari munhukadzi, utare mutengo wake pamashekeri makumi matatu. kana ari munhu ana makore ari pakati pamashanu namakore makumi maviri, utare mutengo womunhurume pamashekeri makumi maviri, uye munhukadzi pamashekeri gumi. kana ari munhu ari pakati pomwedzi mumwe namakore mashanu, utare mutengo womunhurume pamashekeri mashanu esirivha uye utare pamunhukadzi mashekeri matatu esirivha. kana munhu ane makore makumi matanhatu kana anopfuura, utare mutengo womunhurume pamashekeri gumi namashanu, uye pamunhukadzi mashekeri gumi. kana munhu wose anenge achiita mhiko ari murombo zvikuru zvokutotadza kuripa muripo wakatarwa, anofanira kuuya nomunhu uyu kumuprista, achatara mutengo wake zvichienderana nezvinokwaniswa nomunhu ari kuita mhiko. “ ‘kana chaakapika chiri mhuka inogamuchirika sechipiriso kuna yeahoh, mhuka yakadai inopiwa kuna yeahoh ichava tsvene. haafaniri kuchitsinhanisa kana kuisa chakanaka panzvimbo yechakaipa, kana chakaipa panzvimbo yechakanaka; kana akaisa mhuka pachinzvimbo cheimwe, dzose dziri mbiri neyatsinhanisa dzichava tsvene. kana chaakapika chiri mhuka isina kuchena, iyo isingagamuchiriki sechipiriso kuna yeahoh, mhuka iyi inofanira kupiwa kumuprista, uyo achatara kukosha kwayo, kuti yakanaka kana kuti yakaipa. mutengo upi noupi uchatemwa nomuprista, ndiwo uchave mutengo wayo. kana muridzi achida kudzikinura mhuka iyi, anofanira kupamhidzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu pamutengo wayo. “ ‘kana munhu akakumikidza imba yake sechinhu chitsvene kuna yeahoh, muprista achatara kukosha kwayo kuti yakanaka here kana kuti yakaipa. mutengo upi noupi uchatemwa nomuprista, ndiwo ucharamba uripo. kana murume anokumikidza imba yake akaidzikinura, anofanira kupamhidzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu zvomutengo wayo. uye imba ichava yake zvakare. “ ‘kana munhu akakumikidza kuna yeahoh chikamu chomunda wemhuri yake, mutengo wawo unofanira kutarwa zvichienderana nouwandu hwezviyo zvinodiwa ipapo, mashekeri makumi mashanu esirivha pahomeri yezviyo yebhari. kana akakumikidza munda wake mugore rejubhiri, mutengo wakatarwa unoramba uripo. asi kana akakumikidza munda wake mushure mejubhiri, muprista achatara mutengo zvichienderana namakore asara jubhiri rinotevera risati rasvika, uye mutengo wawo wakatarwa uchaderedzwa. kana murume anokumikidza munda achida kuudzikinura, anofanira kupamhidzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu pamutengo wacho, uye munda uchava wake zvakare. kunyange zvakadaro, kana asingadzikinuri munda wake, kana akautengesera mumwe munhu, hauzogoni kudzikinurwa. kana munda ukasunungurwa mujubhiri, uchava mutsvene, somunda wakapiwa kuna yeahoh; uchava munda wavaprista. “ ‘kana munhu akakumikidza kuna yeahoh munda waakatenga, usiri chikamu chomunda wemhuri yake, muprista achatara mutengo wawo kusvikira mugore rejubhiri, uye munhu uyu anofanira kuripa mutengo wawo musi iwoyo sechinhu chitsvene kuna yeahoh. mugore rejubhiri munda uchadzokera kumunhu waakatengeserana naye uyo aiva muridzi womunda. mutengo wose unofanira kutarwa zvichienderana neshekeri repanzvimbo tsvene, makumi maviri amagera pashekeri rimwe. “ ‘zvisinei hazvo, hapana munhu angakumikidza dangwe remhuka, sezvo dangwe ragara riri rayeahoh kare; ingava mombe kana gwai; ndezvayeahoh. kana iri imwe yemhuka dzisina kuchena, anogona kuidzikinura nomutengo wayo wakatarwa, achipamhidzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu pamutengo wayo. kana isina kudzikinurwa, inofanira kutengeswa nomutengo wayo wakatarwa. “ ‘asi hakuna chinhu chomunhu chinopiwa kuna yeahoh, angava munhu kana mhuka kana munda wemhuri, chinogona kutengeswa kana kudzikinurwa; chinhu chose chinopiwa saizvozvo chinova chitsvene kwazvo kuna yeahoh. “ ‘hakuna munhu anopiwa kuti aparadzwe angadzikinurwa; anofanira kuurayiwa. “ ‘chegumi chezvinhu zvose zvinobva mumunda, zvingava zviyo zvinobva muvhu kana michero yemiti, ndezvayeahoh; zvitsvene kuna yeahoh. kana munhu akadzikinura chimwe chinhu pazvegumi zvake, anofanira kupamhidzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu pamutengo wacho. chegumi chose chemombe namakwai, mhuka yose yegumi inopfuura napasi petsvimbo yomufudzi, ichava tsvene kuna yeahoh. haafaniri kusarudza zvakanaka kubva mune zvakaipa kana kuzvitsinhanisa. kana akazvitsinhanisa, mhuka dzose dziri mbiri, yatsiviwa neyatsiva, dzichava tsvene uye hadzigoni kudzikinurwa.’ ” iyi ndiyo mirayiro yavaisraeri yakapiwa mozisi nayeahoh pagomo resinai.

numbers

1

yeahoh akataura namozisi mutende rokusangana, vari murenje resinai, nezuva rokutanga romwedzi wechipiri, mugore rechipiri shure kwokubuda kwavaisraeri muijipiti, achiti, “verenga ungano yose yavaisraeri nedzimba dzavo uye nemhuri dzavo, uchinyora murume wose wose nezita rake, mumwe nomumwe. iwe naaroni munofanira kuverenga varume vose vari muisraeri namapoka avo vane makore makumi maviri kana anodarika vanogona kurwa muhondo. murume mumwe chete kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe, mumwe nomumwe ari mukuru wemhuri yake achakubatsira. “aya ndiwo mazita avarume vanofanira kukubatsira: “kubva kwarubheni, erizuri mwanakomana washedheuri; kubva kwasimeoni, sherumieri mwanakomana wazurishadhai; kubva kwayeahudha, nashoni mwanakomana waaminadhabhi; kubva kwaisakari, netaneri mwanakomana wazuari; kubva kwazebhuruni, eriabhi mwanakomana waheroni; kubva kuvanakomana vayosefa: kubva kuna efuremu, erishama mwanakomana waamihudhi; kubva kuna manase, gamarieri mwanakomana wapedhazuri; kubva kwabhenjamini, abhidhani mwanakomana wagidheoni; kubva kwadhani, ahiezeri mwanakomana waamishadhai; kubva kwaasheri, pagieri mwanakomana waokirani; kubva kwagadhi, eriasafi mwanakomana wadheueri; kubva kwanafutari, ahira mwanakomana waenani.” ava ndivo varume vakatsaurwa kubva paungano, vatungamiri vamarudzi amadzibaba avo. ndivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzavaisraeri. mozisi naaroni vakatora varume ava vane mazita avakanga vapiwa, vakaunganidza ungano yose pamwe chete pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechipiri. vanhu vakaratidza madzitateguru avo, dzimba dzavo nemhuri dzavo, uye varume vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vakanyorwa mazita avo mumwe nomumwe, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. nokudaro akavaverenga murenje resinai: kubva kuzvizvarwa zvarubheni mwanakomana wedangwe waisraeri: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakaverengwa uye vakanyorwa mazita, mumwe nomumwe, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwarubheni vaiva zviuru makumi mana nezvitanhatu, namazana mashanu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvasimeoni: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakaverengwa uye vakanyorwa mazita, mumwe nomumwe, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa vaibva kurudzi rwasimeoni vaisvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe, namazana matatu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvagadhi: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika, vaigona kurwa muhondo, vakanyorwa mazita maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwagadhi vaisvika zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu, namazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvayeahudha: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwayeahudha vaisvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvina, namazana matanhatu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaisakari: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwaisakari vaisvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina, namazana mana. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvazebhuruni: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni vaisvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe, namazana mana. kubva kuvanakomana vayosefa: kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaefuremu: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwaefuremu vaisvika zviuru makumi mana, namazana mashanu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvamanase: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwamanase vaisvika zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri, namazana maviri. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvabhenjamini: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwabhenjamini vaisvika zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, namazana mana. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvadhani: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika, vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwadhani vaisvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri, namazana manomwe. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaasheri: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo uye nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwaasheri vaisvika zviuru makumi mana nechimwe chete, namazana mashanu. kubva kuzvizvarwa zvanafutari: varume vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo vakanyorwa mazita, maererano nezvinyorwa zvedzimba dzavo nezvemhuri dzavo. vakaverengwa kubva kurudzi rwanafutari vaisvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu, namazana mana. ava ndivo varume vakaverengwa namozisi naaroni navatungamiri veisraeri gumi nevaviri, mumwe nomumwe achimiririra mhuri yake. vaisraeri vose vaiva namakore makumi maviri kana anodarika vaigona kurwa muhondo yeisraeri vakaverengwa maererano nemhuri dzavo. vose vakaverengwa vakasvika zviuru mazana matanhatu nezvitatu, namazana mashanu ana makumi mashanu. kunyange zvakadaro, mhuri dzavarevhi hadzina kuverengwa pamwe chete navamwe. yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi: “haufaniri kuverenga rudzi rwarevhi kana kuvabatanidzira pakuverengwa kwavamwe vaisraeri. asi ugadze varevhi kuti vave vatariri vetabhenakeri yechipupuriro, napamusoro pemidziyo yayo yose; vanofanira kutakura tabhenakeri nemidziyo yayo yose; vanofanira kuichengeta nokuikomberedza nemisasa yavo. panguva yose inobviswa tabhenakeri, varevhi ndivo vanofanira kuidzikisa pasi, uye panguva yose yainomiswa, varevhi ndivo vanofanira kuita izvozvo. ani zvake mumwewo anoswedera kwairi achaurayiwa. vaisraeri vanofanira kudzika matende avo namapoka avo, murume mumwe nomumwe mumusasa wake pasi pomureza wokwake. zvakadaro hazvo, varevhi, vanofanira kudzika matende avo vakapoteredza tabhenakeri yechipupuriro kuitira kuti hasha dzirege kuwira pamusoro peungano yavaisraeri. varevhi ndivo vane basa rokuchengeta tabhenakeri yechipupuriro.” vaisraeri vakaita izvi zvose sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.

2

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni: “vaisraeri vanofanira kuvaka musasa vakapoteredza tende rokusangana nechokure, mumwe nomumwe pasi pomureza wokwake nezviratidzo zvedzimba dzamadzibaba ake.” kumabvazuva, kwakanangana nokunobuda nezuva, mapoka okwayeahudha anofanira kuvaka misasa yawo pasi pomureza wavo. mutungamiri wavanhu vayeahudha ndinashani mwanakomana waaminadhabhi. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvina, namazana matanhatu. rudzi rwaisakari ruchavaka misasa pedyo navo. mutungamiri wavanhu vaisakari ndinetaneri mwanakomana wazuari. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina, namazana mana. rudzi rwazebhuruni ndirwo ruchatevera. mutungamiri wavanhu vazebhuruni ndieriabhi mwanakomana waheroni. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe, namazana mana. varume vose vanodiwa kumusasa wayeahudha maererano namapoka avo, vanokwana zviuru zana namakumi masere nezvitanhatu, namazana mana. ava ndivo vachatanga kusimuka. kurutivi rwezasi kuchava namapoka emisasa yarubheni ichange iri pasi pomureza wavo. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwarubheni ndierizuri mwanakomana washedheuri. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mana nezvitanhatu, namazana mashanu. rudzi rwasimeoni ruchavaka misasa pedyo navo. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwasimeoni ndisharumiri mwanakomana wazurishadhai. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe, namazana matatu. rudzi rwagadhi ndirwo ruchatevera. eriasafi mwanakomana wadheueri ndiye mutungamiri wavanhu vokwagadhi. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu, namazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu. varume vose vakadanwa kumusasa warubheni maererano namapoka avo, vaisvika zviuru zana namakumi mashanu nerimwe chete, namazana mana namakumi mashanu. ndivo vachava vechipiri pakusimuka. ipapo tende rokusangana nomusasa wavarevhi zvichasimuka pakati pemisasa. vachasimuka zvimwe chetezvo zvavanoita pakumisa misasa, mumwe nomumwe panzvimbo yake, pasi pomureza wake. nechokumavirira kuchava namapoka emisasa yaefuremu ari pasi pemireza yawo. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwaefuremu ndierishama mwanakomana waamihudhi. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mana, namazana mashanu. rudzi rwamanase ndirwo ruchavatevera. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwamanase ndigamarieri mwanakomana wapedhazuri. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri, namazana maviri. rudzi rwabhenjamini ndirwo ruchatevera. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwabhenjamini ndiabhidhani mwanakomana wagidheoni. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, namazana mana. varume vose vakadanwa kumusasa waefuremu, maererano namapoka avo, vanosvika zviuru zana nezvisere, nezana rimwe chete. vachava vechitatu pakusimuka. nechokumusoro kuchava namapoka emisasa yadhani, pasi pomureza wavo. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwadhani ndiahiezeri mwanakomana waamishadhai. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri, namazana manomwe. rudzi rwaasheri ruchadzika misasa pedyo navo. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwaasheri ndipagieri mwanakomana waokerani. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mana nechimwe chete namazana mashanu. rudzi rwanafutari ndirwo ruchatevera. mutungamiri wavanhu vokwanafutari ndiahira mwanakomana waenani. boka rake rina vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu, namazana mana. varume vose vakadanwa kumusasa wadhani vanosvika zviuru zana namakumi mashanu nezvinomwe, namazana matanhatu. ndivo vachava vokupedzisira pakusimuka, vari pasi pemireza yavo. ava ndivo vaisraeri vakaverengwa maererano nemhuri dzavo. vose vakanga vari mumisasa, namapoka avo vanosvika zviuru mazana matanhatu nezvitatu, namazana mashanu ana makumi mashanu. kunyange zvakadaro, varevhi havana kuverengwa pamwe chete navamwe vaisraeri, sokurayirwa kwakanga kwaitwa mozisi nayeahoh. saizvozvo vaisraeri vakaita zvose zvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh; ndiyo nzira yavakamisa nayo misasa yavo pasi pemireza yavo, uye ndiyo nzira yavakasimuka nayo, mumwe nomumwe neimba yake nemhuri yake.

3

iyi ndiyo nhoroondo yemhuri yaaroni namozisi panguva iyo yeahoh akataura namozisi pagomo resinai. mazita avanakomana vaaroni aiva nadhabhi dangwe rake, naabhihu, naereazari naitamari. ndiwo akanga ari mazita avanakomana vaaroni, ivo vaprista vakazodzwa, vakanga vagadzwa kuti vashumire savaprista. kunyange zvakadaro, nadhabhi naabhihu, vakafa pamberi payeahoh panguva yavakaita chipiriso nomoto wakanga usingabvumirwi pamberi pake murenje resinai. vakanga vasina vanakomana; saka ereazari naitamari chete ndivo vakashumira sevaprista, aroni baba vavo vachiri vapenyu. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uyisa rudzi rwarevhi ugovaisa pamberi paaroni muprista kuti vagomubatsira. vanofanira kuita mabasa ake uye vagoshandira ungano yose patende rokusangana nokubata basa retabhenakeri. vanofanira kuchengeta midziyo yose yetende rokusangana, vazadzise mabasa avaisraeri pakuita kwavo basa retabhenakeri. varevhi uvape kuna aroni navanakomana vake; ndivo vaisraeri vanofanira kupiwa kwaari zvachose. ugadze aroni navanakomana vake kuti vagoshumira savaprista; ani zvake mumwewo anoswedera panzvimbo tsvene anofanira kuurayiwa.” yeahoh akatizve kuna mozisi, “ndakatora varevhi kubva pakati pavaisraeri pachinzvimbo chedangwe romukomana rinoberekwa nomukadzi wose weisraeri. varevhi ndevangu, nokuti matangwe ose ndeangu. pandakauraya matangwe muijipiti, ndakazvitsaurira dangwe rimwe nerimwe muisraeri, angava munhu kana mhuka. zvinofanira kuva zvangu. ndini yeahoh.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi ari murenje resinai, “verenga varevhi nemhuri dzavo uye nedzimba dzavo. uverenge vanhurume vose vane mwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa.” saka mozisi akavaverenga. sezvaakanga arayirwa neshoko rayeahoh. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana varevhi: gerishoni, kohati namerari. aya ndiwo aiva mazita edzimba dzavagerishoni: ribhini nashimei. dzimba dzavakohati: amurami, izhari, hebhuroni nauzieri. dzimba dzavamerari: mari namushi. idzi ndidzo dzaiva dzimba dzavarevhi maererano nemhuri dzavo. kuna gerishoni ndiko kwaiva nedzimba dzavaribhini navashimei; ndivo vakanga vari vedzimba dzavagerishoni. kuwanda kwavanhurume vose vaiva nomwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa kwaisvika zviuru zvinomwe, namazana mashanu. vedzimba dzavagerishoni vaifanira kuvaka misasa nechokumavirira, shure kwetabhenakeri. mutungamiri wemhuri yavagerishoni akanga ari eriasafi mwanakomana waraeri. vagerishoni ndivo vaifanira kuchengeta tabhenakeri netende, zvifukidzo zvaro, chidzitiro chapamukova wokutende rokusangana, zvidzitiro zvaparuvazhe, chidzitiro chapamukova wokupinda paruvazhe runopoteredza tabhenakeri nearitari, uye netambo, nezvinhu zvose zvaishandiswapo. kuna kohati ndiko kwaiva nedzimba dzavaamiramu, vaisraeri, vahebhuroni navaizhari; ava ndivo vakanga vari vedzimba dzavakohati. kuwanda kwavanhu vose vaiva nomwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa kwaisvika zviuru zvisere namazana matanhatu. vakohati ndivo vaiva nebasa rokuchengeta nzvimbo tsvene. vakohati vaifanira kudzika matende avo nechezasi kwetabhenakeri. mutungamiri wemhuri yedzimba dzavakohati akanga ari erizafani mwanakomana wauzieri. ndivo vaiva nebasa rokuchengeta areka, tafura, chigadziko chomwenje, aritari, midziyo yomunzvimbo tsvene yaishandiswa pakushumira, chidzitiro, nezvose zvaidiwa pakuzvishandisa. mutungamiri mukuru wavarevhi akanga ari ereazari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista. ndiye akagadzwa kuti ave pamusoro paavo vaiva nebasa rokuchengeta nzvimbo tsvene. kuna merari ndiko kwaiva nedzimba dzavamari navamushi; ava ndivo vakanga vari vedzimba dzavamerari. kuwanda kwavanhurume vose vaiva nomwedzi mumwe chete, kana kupfuura, pakuberekwa avo vakaverengwa, vakanga vachisvika zviuru zvitanhatu, namazana maviri. mutungamiri wemhuri yedzimba dzavamerari akanga ari zurieri mwanakomana waabhihairi; uye ndivo vaifanira kuvaka misasa yavo nechokumusoro kwetabhenakeri. vamerari vakanga vagadzwa kuti vave vachengeti vamatende etabhenakeri, mbariro dzayo, mbiru, hwaro, nhumbi dzayo dzose, nezvinhu zvose zvaishandiswa pamwe chete nazvo, pamwe chete nembiru dzinopoteredza ruvazhe nehwaro hwadzo, mbambo dzetende netambo dzadzo. mozisi naaroni navanakomana vake vaifanira kudzika misasa yavo nechokumabvazuva kwetabhenakeri, kwakatarisana nokumabudazuva, mberi kwetende rokusangana. ndivo vaiva nebasa rokuchengeta nzvimbo tsvene vakamirira vaisraeri. ani zvake mumwewo aiswedera panzvimbo tsvene aifanira kuurayiwa. kuwanda kwavarevhi vakaverengwa pakurayira kwayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi naaroni maererano nedzimba dzavo, zvichisanganisira vanhurume vose vaiva nomwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa, kwaisvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “verenga matangwe ose avanhurume avaisraeri ano mwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa ugonyora mazita avo. unditorere varevhi pachinzvimbo chamatangwe ose avaisraeri, uye nezvipfuwo zvavarevhi pachinzvimbo chezvibereko zvokutanga zvose zvezvipfuwo zvavana vavaisraeri. ndini yeahoh.” saka mozisi akaverenga matangwe ose avaisraeri, sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh. kuwanda kwamatangwe avanhurume vaiva nomwedzi mumwe kana kupfuura pakuberekwa vakanyorwa mazita avo, kwaisvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri, namazana maviri namakumi manomwe navatatu. yeahoh akatizve kuna mozisi, “tora varevhi pachinzvimbo chamatangwe ose eisraeri, uye zvipfuwo zvavarevhi pachinzvimbo chezvipfuwo zvavo. varevhi vanofanira kuva vangu. ndini yeahoh. kuti udzikinure mazana maviri namakumi manomwe navatatu vamatangwe avaisraeri, unofanira kutora mashekeri mashanu kubva kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo maererano namashekeri enzvimbo tsvene, anorema magera makumi maviri. upe mari yokudzikinurwa kwavaisraeri vanopfuura uwandu hunodiwa kuna aroni navanakomana vake.” saka mozisi akatora mari yedzikinuro kubva kuna vakanga vapfuurira uwandu hwavaya vakanga vadzikinurwa navarevhi. kubva kumatangwe eisraeri akatora sirivha yairema chiuru chimwe, namazana matatu namakumi matanhatu namashanu amashekeri, maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene. mozisi akapa mari yedzikinuro kuna aroni navanakomana vake, sezvaakanga arayirwa neshoko rayeahoh.

4

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni: “verenga vakohati ivo bazi ravarevhi nedzimba dzavo nemhuri dzavo. uverenge varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vanouya kuzoshanda basa romutende rokusangana. “iri ndiro basa ravakohati mutende rokusangana: kuchengetedza zvinhu zvitsvene-tsvene. kana ungano yosimuka aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kupinda vagobvisa chidzitiro vagofukidza areka yechipupuriro nacho. ipapo vanofanira kuchifukidza namatehwe emhou dzomugungwa, vagowarira mucheka webhuruu pamusoro pacho uye vagoisa matanda panzvimbo yawo. “pamusoro petafura yokuvapo, vanofanira kuwarira mucheka webhuruu vagoisa pamusoro pawo ndiro, madhishi uye mbiya, nemikombe yezvipiriso zvinonwiwa; chingwa chamazuva ose chinofanira kuramba chiri pamusoro payo. pamusoro pezvinhu izvi, vanofanira kuwarira mucheka mutsvuku, vagoifukidza namatehwe emhou dzomugungwa, vagoisa matanda acho panzvimbo yawo. “vanofanira kutora mucheka webhuruu vagofukidza chigadziko chomwenje wokuvhenekesa, pamwe chete nemwenje yacho netambo netireya dzacho nemidziyo yacho yose yamafuta anoshandiswa pakuvhenekesa. ipapo vanofanira kuchiputira pamwe chete nezvimwe zvacho muchifukidzo chamatehwe emhou dzomugungwa vagochiisa pamatanda okutakurisa nawo. “pamusoro pearitari yegoridhe, vanofanira kuwarira mucheka webhuruu vagoufukidza namatehwe emhou dzomugungwa vagopinza matanda panzvimbo yawo. “vanofanira kutora midziyo yose inoshandiswa pakushumira munzvimbo tsvene, vagoiputira mumucheka webhuruu, vagofukidza izvozvo namatehwe emhou dzegungwa
