uye vagozviisa pamatanda okutakurisa nawo. “vanofanira kubvisa madota paaritari yendarira vagowarira mucheka wepepuru pamusoro payo. ipapo vanofanira kuisa pamusoro payo midziyo yose inoshandiswa pakushumira paaritari kusanganisira namakango, forogo dzenyama, foshoro nembiya dzokusasa. vanofanira kuwarira chifukidzo chamatehwe emhou dzegungwa pamusoro payo, vagopinza matanda ayo panzvimbo yawo. “mushure mokunge aroni navanakomana vake vapedza kufukidza midziyo yose mitsvene, uye kana vava kusimuka, vakohati ndivo vanofanira kuuya kuzotakura. asi havafaniri kubata zvinhu zvitsvene, kuti varege kufa. vakohati ndivo vanofanira kutakura zvinhu zviri mutende rokusangana. “ereazari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista, anofanira kuva mutariri wamafuta emwenje, zvinonhuhwira, chipiriso chezviyo chamazuva ose uye namafuta okuzodza. anofanira kuva mutariri wetabhenakeri yose nezvinhu zvose zviri mairi, kusanganisira nemidziyo yayo mitsvene.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “uone kuti rudzi rwavakohati haruna kuparadzwa kubva pakati pavarevhi. kuti vararame uye varege kufa pavanoswedera pedyo nezvinhu zvitsvene, uvaitire izvi: aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kupinda munzvimbo tsvene vagorayira murume mumwe nomumwe basa rake nezvaanofanira kuita. asi vakohati havafaniri kupinda kundotarisa zvinhu zvitsvene, kana kwechinguva, kuti varege kufa.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “verengawo vagerishoni nemhuri dzavo uye nedzimba dzavo. uverenge varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vanouya kuzoshanda basa romutende rokusangana. “ndiro basa redzimba dzavagerishoni pavanoshanda vachitakura mitoro. vanofanira kutakura zvidzitiro zvetabhenakeri, tende rokusangana, zvifukidzo zvaro uye zvifukidzo zvokunze zvamatehwe emhou dzegungwa, zvidzitiro zvapamukova wokupinda kutende rokusangana, zvidzitiro zvaparuvazhe runopoteredza tabhenakeri nearitari, chidzitiro chapamukova, tambo nemidziyo yose inoshandiswa pakushumira. vagerishoni vanofanira kuita zvose zvinofanira kuitwa pakushandisa zvinhu izvi. mabasa avo ose kungava kutakura kana kuita rimwe basa, zvinofanira kuitwa nokurayira kwaaroni navanakomana vake. muchavatuma sebasa ravo zvose zvavanofanira kutakura. ndiro basa redzimba dzavagerishoni patende rokusangana. vanofanira kurayirwa pamabasa avo naitamari mwanakomana waaroni muprista. “verenga vamerari nedzimba dzavo nemhuri dzavo. verenga varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vanouya kuzoshanda basa mutende rokusangana. iri ndiro basa ravo pavanoshanda patende rokusangana: kutakura matanda etabhenakeri, mbariro dzayo, mbiru nehwaro, pamwe chete nembiru dzinopoteredza ruvazhe nehwaro hwadzo, mbambo dzetende, tambo, midziyo yavo yose uye nezvose zvinoshandiswa pamwe chete nazvo. govera murume mumwe nomumwe zvinhu zvaanofanira kutakura. uhu ndihwo ushumiri hwedzimba dzavamerari pakushanda kwavo patende rokusangana vachitungamirirwa naitamari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista.” mozisi, aroni navatungamiri veungano vakaverenga vakohati nedzimba dzavo uye nemhuri dzavo. varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vakauya kuzoshanda basa romutende rokusangana, vachiverengwa nedzimba dzavo, vaisvika zviuru zviviri, namazana manomwe namakumi mashanu. uku ndiko kwaiva kuwanda kwavose vedzimba dzavakohati vaishanda mutende rokusangana. mozisi naaroni vakavaverenga maererano nokurayira kwayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. vagerishoni vakaverengwa nedzimba dzavo nemhuri dzavo. varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu, vakauya kuzoshanda pabasa romutende rokusangana, vachiverengwa nedzimba dzavo nemhuri dzavo, vaisvika zviuru zviviri, namazana matanhatu namakumi matatu. ndiko kwakanga kuri kuwanda kwaavo vakanga vari vedzimba dzavagerishoni vaishanda mutende rokusangana. mozisi naaroni vakavaverenga maererano nokurayira kwayeahoh. vamerari vakaverengwa nedzimba dzavo uye nemhuri dzavo. varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vakauya kuzoshanda basa mutende rokusangana, vachiverengwa nedzimba dzavo, vaisvika zviuru zvitatu, namazana maviri. uku ndiko kwakanga kuri kuwanda kwaavo vaiva mudzimba dzavamerari. mozisi naaroni vakavaverenga maererano nokurayira kwayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. saka mozisi, aroni navatungamiri veisraeri vakaverenga varevhi vose nedzimba dzavo uye nemhuri dzavo. varume vose kubvira pane vane makore makumi matatu kusvikira pane vane makore makumi mashanu vakauya kuzoshanda basa uye vachitakura tende rokusangana, vakasvika zviuru zvisere, mazana mashanu namakumi masere. mumwe nomumwe akagoverwa basa rake akaudzwa zvokuita sokurayira kwayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. saizvozvo vakaverengwa, sokurayirwa kwakaitwa mozisi nayeahoh.

5

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “rayira vaisraeri kuti vabudise mumusasa ani zvake ane chirwere cheganda romuviri kana kuerera kupi zvako, kana akasvibiswa nokuda kwechitunha. uvabudise vose varume navakadzi zvimwe chetezvo; uvabudise kunze kwomusasa kuitira kuti varege kusvibisa musasa wavo, wandigere pakati pavo.” vaisraeri vakaita saizvozvo, vakavabudisa kunze kwomusasa. vakaita sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuvaisraeri: ‘kana murume kana mukadzi akakanganisira mumwe nenzira ipi zvayo uye saizvozvo akasava akatendeka kuna yeahoh, munhu uyo ane mhosva, uye anofanira kureurura chivi chaakaita. anofanira kuripira zvizere mhosva yake, achiwedzera chikamu chimwe chete muzvishanu chayo agozvipa zvose kumunhu waakatadzira. asi kana munhu uyo asina hama yepedyo uyo angapiwa zviri kuripirwa mhosva, muripo uyu ndowayeahoh uye unofanira kupiwa kumuprista, pamwe chete negondobwe rokumuyananisira. zvinotsaurwa zvose zvinopiwa navaisraeri kumuprista zvichava zvake. zvipo zvakatsaurwa zvomunhu mumwe nomumwe ndezvake iye pachake, asi zvaanopa kumuprista zvichava zvomuprista.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mukadzi womunhu akatsauka, akasava akatendeka kwaari, akavata nomumwe murume, uye izvi zvikavanzwa kumurume wake uye kusvibiswa kwake kusati kwabatwa (sezvo pasina chapupu pamusoro pake uye asati abatwa achiita izvozvo), uye murume wake akava neshanje mukati make uye akafungira mukadzi wake, uye iye mukadzi achinge akasvibiswa, kana dai akava neshanje uye achimufungira kunyange zvake iye asina kusvibiswa, ipapo anofanira kutora mukadzi wake agoenda naye kumuprista. anofanira kuendawo nechipiriso chechegumi cheefa youpfu hwebhari pachinzvimbo chake. haafaniri kudira mafuta pamusoro pacho kana zvinonhuhwira pachiri, nokuti chipiriso chezviyo cheshanje, chipiriso chechiyeuchidzo chokurangaridza mhosva. “ ‘muprista achamuuyisa agoita kuti amire pamberi payeahoh. ipapo anofanira kutora mvura tsvene mumudziyo wevhu agoisa guruva rinobva pauriri hwetabhenakeri mumvura. shure kwokunge muprista amisa mukadzi uyu pamberi payeahoh, achasunungura vhudzi rake agoisa mumaoko ake chipiriso chokuyeuchidza, chipiriso chezviyo cheshanje, muprista pachake akabata mvura inovava inouyisa chituko. ipapo muprista anofanira kuita kuti mukadzi uyu apike uye agoti kwaari, “kana kusina mumwe murume akavata newe uye usina kumbotsauka ukava wakasvibiswa panguva yokuwanikwa kwako nomurume wako, mvura inovava iyi, iyo inouyisa kutukwa, ngairege kukukuvadza. asi kana wakatsauka iwe wakawanikwa nomurume wako uye ukazvisvibisa nokuvata nomumwe murume pachinzvimbo chomurume wako,” ipapo muprista anofanira kuisa mukadzi uyu pachituko ichi chemhiko achiti, “yeahoh ngaaite kuti vanhu vako vakutuke uye vakurambe paanoita kuti chidya chako chionde uye kuti dumbu rako rizvimbe. mvura iyi inouyisa kutuka ngaipinde mumuviri wako kuitira kuti dumbu rako rizvimbe uye chidya chako chionde.” “ ‘ipapo mukadzi anofanira kuti, “ameni. ngazviite saizvozvo.” “ ‘muprista anofanira kunyora zvituko izvi papepa ipapo agozvisuka mumvura inovava. anofanira kunwisa mukadzi uyu mvura inovava, inouyisa kutukwa, uye mvura iyi ichapinda maari igouyisa kutambudzika nokuvaviwa. muprista anofanira kutora kubva mumaoko omukadzi chipiriso chezviyo cheshanje, agochininira pamberi payeahoh nokuchiuyisa kuaritari. ipapo muprista anofanira kutora tsama yechipiriso chezviyo sechipiriso chokurangaridza agochipisa paaritari; shure kwaizvozvo, anofanira kunwisa mukadzi uyu mvura. kana akazvisvibisa uye anga asina kutendeka kumurume wake, ipapo kana zvaitwa kuti anwe mvura inouyisa kutukwa, ichapinda maari igoita kuti arwadziwe zvikuru; dumbu rake richazvimba uye chidya chake chichaonda, uye achava akatukwa pakati pavanhu vokwake. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, kana mukadzi uyo asina kuzvisvibisa uye akachena achasunungurwa pamhosva iyo uye achagona kubereka vana. “ ‘uyu, zvino ndiwo murayiro weshanje kana mukadzi atsauka, akazvisvibisa iye ari mukadzi womunhu, uye kana murume akava neshanje nokuda kwokufungira mukadzi wake. muprista anofanira kumumisa pamberi payeahoh agotevedza murayiro uyu wose kwaari. murume achange asina mhosva pakukanganisa kupi zvako, asi mukadzi achava nemhosva yechivi chake.’ ”

6

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana murume kana mukadzi akada kuita mhiko yakasarudzika, iyo mhiko yokuzvitsaurira kuna yeahoh somunaziri, anofanira kusanwa waini nezvimwe zvinodhaka uye haafaniri kunwa vhiniga yakaitwa newaini kana nezvimwe zvinonwiwa zvinodhaka. haafaniri kunwa muto wamazambiringa, kana kudya mazambiringa, kana akaomeswa. panguva yose younaziri hwake, haafaniri kudya chinhu chipi zvacho chinobva pamuti womuzambiringa, dzingava mhodzi kana mateko zvawo. “ ‘mazuva ose okupika kwake kwokuzvitsaura hapana chisvo chichashandiswa kuveura musoro wake. anofanira kuva mutsvene kusvikira nguva yokutsaurirwa kwake kuna yeahoh yapera; anofanira kurega bvudzi romusoro wake rirebe. haafaniri kuswedera pachitunha mazuva ose aakazvitsaurira kuna yeahoh. kunyange kana baba vake chaivo, kana mai vake, kana mununʼuna kana hanzvadzi vafa, haafaniri kuzvisvibisa nokuda kwavo, nokuti chiratidzo chokuzvitsaurira kuna allah chiri pamusoro wake. mutsvene kuna yeahoh pamazuva ake ose aakazvitsaura. “ ‘kana mumwe munhu akafa pakarepo iye ari ipapo, nokudaro akasvibisa bvudzi raakakumikidza, anofanira kuveura musoro wake nezuva rokunatswa kwake, iro zuva rechinomwe. ipapo nezuva rorusere anofanira kuuya nenjiva mbiri kana twana tuviri twenjiva kumuprista ari pamusuo wetende rokusangana. muprista anofanira kupa imwe yacho sechipiriso chechivi uye imwe yacho sechipiriso chinopiswa kuti amuyananisire nokuti iye akatadza paakava pedyo nechitunha. anofanira kunatsa musoro wake nezuva iroro. anofanira kuzvikumikidza kuna yeahoh panguva yokuzvitsaura kwake uye anofanira kuuya nomukono wegwayana regore rimwe chete sechipiriso chemhosva. “ ‘zvino uyu ndiwo murayiro womunaziri panopera nguva yokuzvitsaura kwake. anofanira kuuyiswa kumusuo wetende rokusangana. anofanira kupa kuna yeahoh chipiriso chake ipapo: mukono wegore rimwe chete wegwayana risina charingapomerwa kuti rive chipiriso chinopiswa, sheshe yegwayana regore rimwe chete isina kuremara kuti chive chipiriso chokuwadzana, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo nechipiriso chokunwa, uye dengu rechingwa chisina mbiriso, keke rakaitwa noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta, nezvingwa zvitete zvakazorwa mafuta. “ ‘muprista anofanira kuuya nazvo pamberi payeahoh agoita chipiriso chechivi nechipiriso chinopiswa. anofanira kuuyisa dengu rechingwa chisina mbiriso uye agobayira gondobwe sechipiriso chokuwadzana kuna yeahoh, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo nechipiriso chinonwiwa. “ ‘zvino pamusuo wetende rokusangana, munaziri anofanira kuveura bvudzi riya raakakumikidza. anofanira kutora bvudzi iro agoriisa mumoto uri pasi pechibayiro chokuwadzana. “ ‘shure kwokunge munaziri aveura bvudzi rokuzvikumikidza kwake, muprista anofanira kuisa mumaoko ake bandauko rakabikwa regondobwe, uye keke nechingwa chitete kubva mudengu, zvose zvakabikwa zvisina mbiriso. ipapo muprista achazvininira pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira; izvi zvitsvene uye ndezvomuprista, pamwe chete nechipfuva chakaninirwa uye chidya chakakumikidzwa. shure kwaizvozvo, munaziri anganwa hake waini. “ ‘uyu ndiwo murayiro womunaziri anenge apikira chipiriso kuna yeahoh maererano nokuzvitsaura kwake pamusoro pezvimwe zvose zvaanenge achigona kupa. anofanira kuzadzisa mhiko yaakaita, zviri maererano nomurayiro womunaziri.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “udza aroni navanakomana vake uti, ‘munofanira kuropafadza vaisraeri nomutoo uyu. muti kwavari: “ ‘yeahoh akuropafadzei uye akuchengetei; yeahoh ngaapenyese chiso chake pamusoro penyu uye akunzwirei tsitsi; yeahoh ngaarinzire chiso chake kwamuri uye akupei rugare.’ ” “saka vachaisa zita rangu pamusoro pavaisraeri, uye ndichavaropafadza.”

7

mozisi akati apedza kumisa tabhenakeri, akaizodza akaitsaura pamwe chete nemidziyo yayo yose. akazodzawo nokutsaura aritari nemidziyo yayo yose. ipapo vatungamiri veisraeri, vakuru vedzimba avo vakanga vari vatungamiri vamarudzi vari vatariri vavaya vakanga vaverengwa, vakapa zvipiriso. vakauyisa sezvipiriso zvavo pamberi payeahoh, ngoro nhanhatu dzakafukidzirwa nenzombe gumi nembiri, nzombe kubva kumutungamiri mumwe nomumwe uye ngoro kubva kuvaviri vaviri. izvi zvakaiswa pamberi petabhenakeri. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “gamuchira izvi kubva kwavari kuti zvigoshandiswa mubasa patende rokusangana. uzvipe kuvarevhi maererano nebasa romunhu mumwe nomumwe.” saka mozisi akatora ngoro nenzombe akazvipa kuvarevhi. akapa kuvagerishoni ngoro mbiri nenzombe ina, maererano nezvaidiwa pabasa ravo, uye akapa ngoro ina nenzombe tsere kuvamerari, maererano nezvaidiwa pabasa ravo. vose vakanga vachirayirwa naitamari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista. asi mozisi haana kupa chinhu kuvanakomana vakohati, nokuti vaifanira kutakura zvinhu zvitsvene pamapfudzi avo, iri ndiro raiva basa ravo. aritari yakati yazodzwa, vatungamiri vakauya nezvipiriso zvavo zvokukumikidzwa kwayo vakazviisa pamberi pearitari. nokuti yeahoh akanga ati kuna mozisi, “zuva rimwe nerimwe, mutungamiri mumwe chete anofanira kuuya nechipiriso chake chokukumikidza aritari.” nashoni mwanakomana waaminadhabhi worudzi rwayeahudha, ndiye akauya nechipiriso chake pazuva rokutanga. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, uye mbiya imwe chete yokusasa yesirivha yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, rimwe nerimwe rizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete negwayana rimwe chete romukono wegore rimwe chete, zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo imwe chete yembudzi yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chaiva chipiriso chanashoni mwanakomana waaminadhabhi. pazuva rechipiri, netaneri mwanakomana wazuari, mutungamiri waisakari, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chaakauya nacho chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, uye mbiya imwe chete yokusasa yesirivha yairema makumi manomwe amashekeri, zvose zviri zviviri zvaiva zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo, maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete nomukono wegwayana regore rimwe chete, zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo imwe chete yembudzi yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chaiva chipiriso chanetaneri mwanakomana wazuari. pazuva rechitatu, eriabhi mwanakomana waheroni, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwazebhuruni, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, uye mbiya imwe chete yokusasa yesirivha yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chechivi; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete nomukono wegwayana regore rimwe chete zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo imwe chete yembudzi yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chaiva chipiriso chaeriabhi mwanakomana waheroni. pazuva rechina, erizuri mwanakomana washedheuri, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwarubheni, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya imwe chete yokusasa yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete nomukono mumwe chete wegwayana regore rimwe chete zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chaiva chipiriso chaerizuri mwanakomana washedheuri. pazuva rechishanu, sherumieri mwanakomana wazurishadhai, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwasimeoni akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yakanga ichirema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye mukono wegwayana mumwe chete wegore rimwe chete zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chaiva chipiriso chasherumieri mwanakomana wazurishadhai. pazuva rechitanhatu, eriasafi mwanakomana wadheueri, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwagadhi, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri ndiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye mukono mumwe chete wegwayana regore rimwe chete, zvechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo imwe chete yembudzi yechipiriso chechivi; nenzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chaeriasafi mwanakomana wadheueri. pazuva rechinomwe, erishama mwanakomana waamihudhi, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwaefuremu, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, uye mbiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo, dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye mukono wegwayana wegore rimwe chete, kuti zvive chipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chaerishama mwanakomana waamihudhi. pazuva rorusere gamarieri mwanakomana wapedhazuri, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwamanase akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye mukono mumwe chete wegwayana regore rimwe chete, sechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu uye makwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chagamarieri mwanakomana wapedhazuri. pazuva repfumbamwe, abhidhani mwanakomana wagidheoni mutungamiri wavanhu vokwabhenjamini, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, uye nembiya yesirivha yokusasa yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo. ndiro yegoridhe imwe chete yairema mashekeri gumi, izere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye mukono mumwe chete wegwayana regore rimwe chete, sechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri makondobwe mashanu, nhongo dzembudzi shanu namakwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chaabhidhani mwanakomana wagidheoni. pazuva regumi, ahiezeri mwanakomana waamishadhai, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwadhani, akauya nechipiriso. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviri zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete nomukono mumwe chete wegwayana wegore rimwe chete, sechipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi namakwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chaahiezeri mwanakomana waamishadhai. pazuva regumi nerimwe, pagieri mwanakomana waokirani, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwaasheri, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro imwe chete yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe, zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, zvose zviviri zvakanga zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete nomukono wegwayana wegore rimwe chete, kuti zvive chipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi namakwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete, kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chapagieri mwanakomana waokirani. pazuva regumi namaviri, ahira mwanakomana waenani, mutungamiri wavanhu vokwanafutari, akauya nechipiriso chake. chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro imwe chete yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu, nembiya yesirivha yokusasa imwe chete yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe zvose zviri zviviri zvizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo; dhishi rimwe chete regoridhe rairema mashekeri gumi, rizere nezvinonhuhwira; hando duku imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete uye nomukono wegwayana wegore rimwe chete, kuti zvive chipiriso chinopiswa; nhongo yembudzi imwe chete yechipiriso chechivi; uye nzombe mbiri, makondobwe mashanu, nhongo shanu dzembudzi namakwayana makono mashanu egore rimwe chete kuti zvizobayirwa sechipiriso chokuwadzana. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chipiriso chaahira mwanakomana waenani. izvi ndizvo zvakanga zviri zvipiriso zvavatungamiri veisraeri pakukumikidzwa kwearitari payakazodzwa; ndiro dzesirivha gumi nembiri, mbiya dzesirivha dzokusasa gumi nembiri namadhishi egoridhe gumi namaviri. ndiro imwe neimwe yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu uye mbiya imwe neimwe yokusasa yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe. pamwe chete madhishi esirivha airema zviuru zviviri namazana mana amashekeri, maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene. madhishi egoridhe gumi namaviri akanga azere nezvinonhuhwira airema mashekeri zana namakumi maviri. uwandu hwezvipfuwo zvechipiriso chinopiswa pamwe chete hwaiti hando duku gumi nembiri, makondobwe gumi namaviri namakondobwe maduku egore rimwe chete gumi namaviri, pamwe chete nechipiriso chadzo chezviyo. nhongo dzembudzi gumi nembiri dzakashandiswa pachipiriso chechivi. uwandu hwezvipfuwo zvechibayiro chokuwadzana pamwe chete hwaiti nzombe makumi maviri neina, makondobwe makumi matanhatu, nhongo dzembudzi makumi matanhatu namakondobwe maduku egore rimwe chete makumi matanhatu. izvi ndizvo zvakanga zviri zvipiriso zvokukumikidzwa kwearitari shure kwokuzodzwa kwayo. mozisi akati apinda mutende rokusangana kundotaura nayeahoh, akanzwa inzwi richitaura naye richibva napakati pamakerubhi maviri pamusoro pechifukidzo cheareka yechipupuriro. uye akataura naye.

8

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura naaroni uti kwaari, ‘kana uchimisa mwenje minonwe, inofanira kuvhenekera nzvimbo iri mberi kwechigadziko chomwenje.’ ” aroni akaita saizvozvo; akamisa mwenje yakatarisa mberi kuchigadziko chomwenje, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. aya ndiwo magadzirirwo akanga akaitwa chigadziko chomwenje: chakanga chakaitwa negoridhe rakapambadzirwa kubva pahwaro hwacho kusvikira pamaruva acho. chigadziko chomwenje chakanga chakagadzirwa zvakanyatsofanana nomufananidzo wakanga waratidzwa mozisi nayeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi: “bvisa varevhi pakati pavamwe vaisraeri ugovanatsa. pakuvanatsa, unofanira kuita izvi: sasa pamusoro pavo mvura yokuvachenesa; ipapo ugoita kuti vaveure miviri yavo yose vagosuka nguo dzavo, kuitira kuti vazvinatse. uite kuti vatore hando duku nechipiriso chayo chezviyo choupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta, ipapo munofanira kutorazve imwe hando duku yechipiriso chechivi. uuye navarevhi mberi kwetende rokusangana ugounganidza ungano yose yavaisraeri. unofanira kuuya navarevhi pamberi payeahoh, uye vaisraeri vanofanira kuisa maoko avo pamusoro pavo. aroni anofanira kuisa varevhi pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira chinobva kuvaisraeri, kuitira kuti vagadzirire kuita basa rayeahoh. “mushure mokunge varevhi vaisa maoko avo pamisoro yehando, ushandise imwe yacho sechipiriso chechivi kuna yeahoh uye imwe yacho sechipiriso chinopiswa, kuti uyananisire varevhi. uite kuti varevhi vamire pamberi paaroni navanakomana vake ipapo ugovakumikidza sechipiriso chokuninira kuna yeahoh. nenzira iyi unofanira kutsaura varevhi pakati pavamwe vaisraeri, uye varevhi vachava vangu. “mushure mokunge wanatsa varevhi nokuvakumikidza sechipiriso chokuninira, vanofanira kuuya kuzoita basa ravo patende rokusangana. ivo ndivo vaisraeri vachapiwa zvachose kwandiri. ndakavatora kuti vave vangu pachinzvimbo chamatangwe, vanakomana vokutanga vomukadzi mumwe nomumwe womuisraeri. chibereko chose chokutanga chechikono muisraeri, angava munhu kana chipfuwo, ndechangu. pandakauraya matangwe ose muijipiti, ndakazvitsaurira ivo kwandiri. uye ndakatora varevhi panzvimbo yavanakomana veisraeri vamatangwe. pavaisraeri vose, ndakapa varevhi sezvipo kuna aroni navanakomana vake kuti vaite basa patende rokusangana vakamirira vaisraeri uye kuti vayananisire vaisraeri kuti varege kuurayiwa nedenda pavanenge vaswedera kunzvimbo tsvene.” mozisi, aroni neungano yose yeisraeri vakaitira varevhi sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. varevhi vakazvinatsa vakasuka nguo dzavo. ipapo aroni akavaisa pamberi payeahoh sechipiriso chokuninira akavayananisira kuti vanatswe. shure kwaizvozvo, varevhi vakauya kuzoshanda basa ravo patende rokusangana vachitungamirirwa naaroni navanakomana vake. vakaitira varevhi sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “izvi ndizvo zvichaitwa navarevhi: vamwe vana makore makumi maviri namashanu kana anopfuura vachauya kuzoshanda basa patende rokusangana, asi kana vasvika makore makumi mashanu, vanofanira kuregedza basa ravo uye varege kuzoshandazve. vangabatsira havo hama dzavo kuita mabasa apatende rokusangana, asi ivo pachavo havafaniri kushanda basa. zvino, izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kurayira varevhi kuti vaite.”

9

yeahoh akataura kuna mozisi murenje resinai mumwedzi wokutanga wegore rechipiri shure kwokubuda kwavo muijipiti. akati kwaari, “ita kuti vaisraeri vapemberere pasika panguva yakatarwa. muipemberere panguva yakatarwa, panguva yorubvunzavaeni pazuva regumi namana romwedzi, maererano nemitemo yayo nemirayiro yayo yose.” saka mozisi akataurira vaisraeri kuti vapemberere pasika, ivo vakaita saizvozvo murenje resinai panguva yorubvunzavaeni nezuva regumi namana romwedzi wokutanga. vaisraeri vakaita zvose sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. asi vamwe vavo havana kupemberera pasika nomusi iwoyo nokuti vakanga vasina kuchena nokuda kwechitunha. saka vakauya kuna mozisi naaroni musi iwoyo uye, vakati kuna mozisi, “isu tava vasina kuchena nokuda kwechitunha, asi tinodzivisirweiko kuvigira yeahoh chipiriso pamwe chete navamwe vaisraeri panguva yakatarwa?” mozisi akavapindura akati, “mirai kusvikira ndanzwa zvinorayirwa nayeahoh pamusoro penyu.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira vaisraeri kuti: ‘mumwe wenyu kana zvizvarwa zvenyu kana vasvibiswa nokuda kwechitunha uye kana kuti vari parwendo, naivowo vangapemberera pasika yayeahoh. vanofanira kuipemberera nezuva regumi namana romwedzi wechipiri panguva dzorubvunzavaeni. vanofanira kudya gwayana, pamwe chete nechingwa chisina mbiriso nomuriwo unovava. havafaniri kusiya chinhu kusvikira mangwanani kana kuvhuna mapfupa aro. pavanopemberera pasika, vanofanira kutevedza mitemo yose. asi kana munhu akachena uye asiri parwendo akakundikana kupemberera pasika, munhu uyo anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake nokuti haana kuvigira yeahoh chipiriso panguva yakatarwa. munhu uyo achatakura zvivi zvake. “ ‘mutorwa agere pakati penyu anoda kupemberera pasika yayeahoh anofanira kuita izvozvo maererano nemitemo nemirayiro yayo. munofanira kuva nomutemo mumwe chete kumutorwa nokuna akaberekerwa munyika.’ ” pazuva rakamiswa tabhenakeri, iyo tende yechipupuriro, gore rakaifukidza. kubva panguva dzamadekwana kusvikira mangwanani, gore rakanga riri pamusoro petabhenakeri rakanga rakaita somoto. ndizvo zvarakaramba rakaita; gore rakaifukidza, uye usiku rairatidzika somoto. gore raiti kana rasimudzwa kubva pamusoro petende, vaisraeri vaifamba; pose paimira gore, vaisraeri vaidzika musasa ipapo. pakurayira kwayeahoh, vaisraeri vaifamba, uye pakurayira kwake, vaibva vadzika musasa. gore paraimira pamusoro petabhenakeri, ivo vairamba vakadzika musasa. dzimwe nguva gore raigara pamusoro petabhenakeri kwamazuva mashomanana chete; vaidzika musasa wavo sokurayira kwayeahoh uye pakurayira kwake, vaibva vafamba. dzimwe nguva gore raingogara kubva panguva dzamadekwana kusvikira mangwanani, uye paraingosimuka mangwanani vaibva vafamba. paingosimuka gore, angava masikati kana usiku, vaibva vafamba. kana gore rikagara pamusoro petabhenakeri kwamazuva maviri kana mwedzi, kana gore rimwe chete, vaisraeri vairamba vari mumusasa uye vasingafambi; asi kana rikasimuka ivo vaibva vafamba. sokurayira kwayeahoh, vaidzika musasa, uye sokurayira kwayeahoh, vaifamba. vakateerera kurayira kwayeahoh, maererano nokurayira kwake kubudikidza namozisi.

10

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ita hwamanda mbiri dzesirivha yakapambadzirwa, ugodzishandisa kudana ungano pamwe chete uye kuti mapoka afambe. dzikaridzwa dzose dziri mbiri, ungano yose inofanira kuungana pamberi pako pamukova wetende rokusangana. kana imwe chete ikaridzwa, vatungamiri, vakuru vedzimba dzaisraeri, vanofanira kuungana pamberi pako. hwamanda yeyambiro painoridzwa marudzi akavaka kumabvazuva anofanira kutanga kufamba. paunoridza hwamanda yechipiri, misasa yezasi inofanira kufamba. kurira kwehwamanda kuchava chiratidzo chokuti mufambe. kuti ungano iungane, muridze hwamanda, asi kwete namaridziro mamwe chetewo. “vanakomana vaaroni, vaprista ndivo vanofanira kuridza hwamanda. uyu unofanira kuva mitemo usingaperi kwamuri nokuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. kana muchindorwa munyika yenyu nomuvengi anokumanikidzai, muridze hwamanda. ipapo mucharangarirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu uye muchanunurwa kubva kuvavengi venyu. uyezve, panguva dzenyu dzokufara, pamitambo yenyu yakatarwa uye nemitambo yokugara kwomwedzi, munofanira kuridza hwamanda pamusoro pezvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana, uye zvichava chirangaridzo kwamuri pamberi paallah wenyu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.” pazuva ramakumi maviri romwedzi wechipiri, wegore rechipiri, gore rakasimuka kubva pamusoro petabhenakeri yechipupuriro. ipapo vaisraeri vakasimuka kubva murenje resinai, vakafamba vachienda kunzvimbo nenzvimbo kusvikira gore randomira murenje reparani. nguva ino, kwokutanga, vakafamba sezvavakanga varayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. mapoka omusasa wayeahudha ndiwo akatanga kuenda, pasi pomureza wavo. nashoni mwanakomana waaminadhabhi akanga achivatungamirira. netaneri mwanakomana wazuari akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwaisakari. uye eriabhi mwanakomana waheroni akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwazebhuruni. ipapo tabhenakeri yakabviswa, uye vagerishoni navamerari, vakanga vachiitakura, vakatanga kufamba. mapoka omusasa warubheni akatevera, vari pasi pomureza wavo. erizuri mwanakomana washedheuri ndiye akanga achivatungamirira. sherumieri mwanakomana wazurishadhai akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwasimeoni, uye eriasafi mwanakomana wadheueri akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwagadhi. ipapo vakohati vakasimuka, vakatakura zvinhu zvitsvene. tabhenakeri yaifanira kumiswa vasati vasvika. mapoka omusasa waefuremu akatevera; vari pasi pomureza wavo. erishama mwanakomana waamihudhi akanga achivatungamirira. gamarieri mwanakomana wapedhazuri akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwamanase. uye abhidhani mwanakomana wagidheoni akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwabhenjamini. pakupedzisira, samapoka aichengetedza kumashure kwamapoka ose, mapoka omusasa wadhani akasimuka, ari pasi pomureza wavo. ahiezeri mwanakomana waamishadhai ndiye akanga achivatungamirira. pagieri mwanakomana waokirani akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwaasheri; uye ahira mwanakomana waenani akanga ari mukuru weboka rorudzi rwanafutari. aya ndiwo akanga ari mafambiro amapoka avaisraeri pakusimuka kwavo. zvino mozisi akati kuna hobhabhi mwanakomana wareueri mumidhiani, tezvara wamozisi, “tava kuenda kunzvimbo yatakanzi nayeahoh, ‘ndichakupai imi.’ handei tose tigokuitirai zvakanaka, nokuti yeahoh avimbisa zvinhu zvakanaka kuna israeri.” iye akapindura akati, “kwete, handingaendi; ndiri kudzokera kunyika yangu nokuvanhu vokwangu.” asi mozisi akati kwaari, “ndapota hangu regai kutisiya. munoziva patinofanira kuvaka musasa wedu murenje, uye imi mungava meso edu. kana mukaenda nesu, tichagovana nemi chinhu chipi nechipi chatichapiwa nayeahoh.” saka vakasimuka kubva pagomo rayeahoh vakafamba kwamazuva matatu. areka yayeahoh yesungano yakavatungamirira pamazuva matatu iwayo kuti vatsvakirwe nzvimbo yokuzororera. gore rayeahoh rakanga riri pamusoro pavo masikati pavakasimuka kubva pamusasa. paingosimuka areka, mozisi aiti, “haiwa yeahoh, simukai! vavengi venyu ngavaparadzirwe, vavengi venyu ngavatize pamberi penyu.” payaigadzikwa pasi, iye aiti, “haiwa yeahoh, dzokai kuzviuru nezviuru zvavaisraeri.”

11

zvino vanhu vakanyunyuta, yeahoh achizvinzwa, pamusoro pokuomerwa kwavo, uye paakavanzwa hasha dzake dzakamutswa. ipapo moto wakabva kuna yeahoh ukapisa pakati pavo uye ukaparadza vamwe kumucheto womusasa. vanhu vakati vachema kuna mozisi, akanyengetera kuna yeahoh moto ukadzima. saka nzvimbo iyo yakanzi tabhera, nokuti moto wakabva kuna yeahoh ukapisa pakati pavo. vatorwa vakanga vari pakati pavo vakatanga kupanga zvimwewo zvokudya, uyezve vaisraeri vakatanga kuungudza vachiti, “ndianiko achatipa nyama kuti tidye? tinorangarira hove dzataidya muijipiti tisingatengi; magaka, manwiwa, hanyanisi huru, hanyanisi diki nemhiripiri. asi zvino tafinhwa; hapana chimwe chinhu chatiri kuwana kunze kwemana iyi.” mana yakanga yakaita semhodzi yekorianda uye ichiratidzika samazambiringa akaoma. vanhu vaitenderera vachiinhonga, uye, vaizoikuya paguyo kana kuidzvura muduri. vaiibika muhari kana kuita makeke. uye yainaka kunge chinhu chakabikwa namafuta omuorivhi. dova raiti rawira pamusoro pomusasa usiku, mana yaiwawo. mozisi akanzwa vanhu vemhuri dzose vachiungudza, mumwe nomumwe pamukova wetende rake. yeahoh akatsamwa kwazvo, uye mozisi akatambudzika. akabvunza yeahoh akati, “seiko makauyisa dambudziko iri pamuranda wenyu? chiiko chandakaita chisingakufadzei zvokuti makaisa mutoro wavanhu ava vose pamusoro pangu? ko, ndini ndakaita kuti vanhu vose ava vaumbwe here? ko, ndini ndakavabereka here? seiko muchindiita kuti ndivatakure mumaoko angu, somureri anotakura mwana mucheche kuti ndiende navo kunyika yamakavimbisa nemhiko kumadzitateguru avo? ndingawanepiko nyama yandingapa vanhu vose ava? vanoramba vachingondichemera vachiti, ‘tipe nyama yokudya.’ handingatakuri vanhu ava vose ndoga; mutoro unondiremera kwazvo. kana muchida kundiitira saizvozvo, ndiurayei henyu iye zvino, kana ndawana hangu nyasha pamberi penyu, uye musandirega ndichiona kuparara kwangu.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, uya navakuru vavaisraeri makumi manomwe vaunoziva savatungamiri namachinda pakati pavanhu. uite kuti vauye kutende rokusangana, kuti vamire newe ipapo. ini ndichaburuka ndigozotaura newe ipapo, uye ndichatora mweya uri pamusoro pako ndigoisa mweya iwoyo pamusoro pavo. ivo vachakubatsira kutakura mutoro wavanhu kuitira kuti iwe urege kuutakura woga. “udza vanhu kuti: ‘zvinatsei mugadzirire zvamangwana, pamuchadya nyama. yeahoh akakunzwai pamakaungudza muchiti, “dai bedzi taiva nenyama yokudya! takanga tiri nani muijipiti!” zvino yeahoh achakupai nyama, uye muchaidya. hamungaidyi kwezuva rimwe chete, kana mazuva maviri kana mashanu, gumi kana makumi maviri, asi kwomwedzi wose, kusvikira yabuda nomumhino dzenyu uye mukaisema, nokuti makaramba yeahoh, ari pakati penyu, uye maichema pamberi pake muchiti, “takambobvireiko kuijipiti?” ’ ” asi mozisi akati, “hezvi ndiri pakati pavanhu mazana matanhatu ezviuru vanofamba netsoka, zvino imi munoti, ‘ini ndichavapa nyama kuti vadye kwomwedzi wose!’ zvichavaringana here kana dai vakaurayirwa makwai nemombe? zvichavaringana here kana dai vakabatirwa hove dzose dziri mugungwa?” yeahoh akapindura mozisi achiti, “ko, ruoko rwayeahoh rwakapfupiswa here? zvino uchaona kuti zvandinoreva zvichaitika here kana kuti kwete.” saka mozisi akabuda akandoudza vanhu zvakanga zvataurwa nayeahoh. akaunganidza vakuru vavo makumi manomwe akavaita kuti vamire vakapoteredza tende. ipapo yeahoh akaburuka ari mugore akataura navo uye akatora mweya wakanga uri pamusoro pake akaisa mweya uyu pamusoro pavakuru makumi manomwe. mweya wakati wagara pamusoro pavo vakaprofita, asi havana kuzopamhazve. kunyange zvakadaro, varume vaviri, vainzi eridhadhi namedhadhi, vakanga vasara mumusasa. ivo vakanga vaverengwa pakati pavakuru, asi havana kubuda kuti vaende kutende. asi mweya wakagarawo pamusoro pavo uye, vakaprofita vari mumusasa. mumwe mujaya akamhanya akandoudza mozisi akati, “eridhadhi namedhadhi vari kuprofita vari mumusasa.” yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, uyo akanga ari mubatsiri wamozisi kubva paujaya hwake, akataura nesimba akati, “mozisi, ishe wangu, vadzivisei!” asi mozisi akapindura akati, “ko, iwe une godo nokuda kwangu here? ndinoshuva kuti dai vanhu vayeahoh vose vava vaprofita uye kuti dai yeahoh aisa mweya wake pamusoro pavo!” ipapo mozisi navakuru vavaisraeri vakadzokera kumusasa. zvino mhepo yakabuda ichibva kuna yeahoh ikasunda zvihuta zvichibva kugungwa. yakazvikanda pasi kumativi ose omusasa zvikaita murwi ungada kuita makubhiti maviri kubva pasi, kusvika pangafambwa rwendo rwezuva rimwe chete kumativi ose. zuva rose iroro nousiku hwose uye nezuva rose rakatevera vanhu vakabuda kundounganidza zvihuta. hakuna akaunganidza zvaiva pasi pamahomeri gumi. ipapo vakazviyanika vakapoteredza musasa. asi nyama ichiri pakati pamazino avo uye isati yatsengwa, kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapfuta pamusoro pavanhu, akavarova nehosha yakaipisisa. naizvozvo nzvimbo iyo yakatumidzwa kunzi kibhuroti hataavha, nokuti vakaviga vanhu vakanga vakarira zvimwewo zvokudya. vanhu vakabva pakibhuroti hataavha vakaenda kuhazeroti vakandogara ikoko.

12

miriamu naaroni vakatanga kupopotera mozisi nokuda kwomukadzi wake aiva muetiopia, nokuti akanga awana muetiopia. “ko, yeahoh akangotaura namozisi oga here? ko, haana kutaura kubudikidza nesuwo here?” uye yeahoh akazvinzwa. zvino mozisi akanga ari munhu akazvininipisa kwazvo, akazvininipisa kupfuura ani zvake pamusoro penyika. pakarepo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, aroni namiriamu, “budai muuye kutende rokusangana, mose muri vatatu.” saka vakabuda ivo vari vatatu. ipapo yeahoh akaburuka ari mushongwe yegore; akamira pamukova wokupinda kutende akadana aroni namiriamu. vakati vachibuda vari vaviri, akati kwavari, “teererai mashoko angu: “kana pano muprofita pakati penyu, ndinozviratidza kwaari nezviratidzo, ndinotaura naye muzviratidzo, ndinotaura naye muzviroto. asi hazvina kudaro kuna mozisi muranda wangu; iye akatendeka muimba yangu yose. ndinotaura naye takatarisana, pachena kwete nezvirahwe; iye anoona chimiro chayeahoh. zvino makarega seiko kutya kutaura muchipopotera muranda wangu mozisi?” kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapfuta pamusoro pavo, uye akavasiya. gore rakati rabva pamusoro petende, onei miriamu amirepo ava namaperembudzi, akachena sechando. aroni akatendeukira kwaari akaona kuti akanga ava namaperembudzi. ipapo akati kuna mozisi, “ndapota, ishe wangu, regai kuisa pamusoro pedu chivi chataita noupenzi. musarega achifanana nomwana akazvarwa akafa mudumbu ramai vake hafu yenyama yake yakadyiwa.” saka mozisi akachema kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa allah, ndapota hangu muporesei!” yeahoh akapindura mozisi achiti, “dai baba vake vanga vamupfira kumeso kwake, haazainyara kwamazuva manomwe here? mubudise kunze kwomusasa kwamazuva manomwe; mugomudzosa henyu pashure.” saka miriamu akabudiswa kunze kwomusasa kwamazuva manomwe, uye vanhu havana kupfuurira mberi kusvikira adzoswa. shure kwaizvozvo, vanhu vakabva pahazeroti vakandodzika musasa murenje reparani.

13

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tuma vamwe varume kuti vandosora nyika yekenani, yandiri kupa kuvaisraeri. tuma mutungamiri mumwe kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwamadzitateguru avo.” saka, sokurayira kwayeahoh, mozisi akavatuma vachibva nokurenje reparani. vose vakanga vari vatungamiri vavaisraeri. haano mazita avo: kubva kurudzi rwarubheni, shamua mwanakomana wazakuri; kubva kurudzi rwasimeoni, shafati mwanakomana wahori; kubva kurudzi rwayeahudha, karebhu mwanakomana wajefune; kubva kurudzi rwaisakari, igari mwanakomana wayosefa; kubva kurudzi rwaefuremu, hoshea mwanakomana wanuni; kubva kurudzi rwabhenjamini, pareti mwanakomana warafu; kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni, gadhieri mwanakomana wasodhi; kubva kurudzi rwamanase (rudzi rwayosefa), gadhi mwanakomana wasusi; kubva kurudzi rwadhani, amieri mwanakomana wagemari; kubva kurudzi rwaasheri, seturi mwanakomana wamikaeri; kubva kurudzi rwanafutari, nabhi mwanakomana wavhofisi; kubva kurudzi rwagadhi, generi mwanakomana wamaki. aya ndiwo mazita avarume vakatumwa namozisi kundosora nyika. (mozisi akatumidza hoshea mwanakomana wanuni zita rokuti yeahoshua). mozisi akati avatuma kundosora nyika yekenani, akati kwavari, “kwidzai mupinde nechokunegevhi uye nomunyika yamakomo. mundoona kuti nyika yakadini uye kuti vanhu vanogarako vakasimba here kana kuti havana, vashoma here kana kuti vazhinji. nyika yavanogara yakadini? yakanaka here kana kuti yakaipa? maguta avagere maari akadiniko? haana masvingo here kana kuti akakomberedzwa? ko, ivhu racho rakadini? rakaorera here kana kuti kwete? mune miti here kana kuti hamuna? muedze kwazvo kuti muuye nezvimwe zvezvibereko zvenyika iyo.” (yakanga iri nguva yokutanga kuibva kwamazambiringa). naizvozvo vakakwidza vakandosora nyika kubva kurenje rezini kusvikira kurehobhi, kwakanangana nerebho hamati. vakakwidza vachipinda nechokunegevhi vakasvika kuhebhuroni paigara ahimeni, sheshai natarimai, zvizvarwa zvaanaki. (hebhuroni rakanga ravakwa makore manomwe zoani risati ravakwa muijipiti). vakati vasvika pamupata weeshikori, vakatema davi rimwe raiva nesumbu ramazambiringa. vaviri vavo vakaritakura nedanda pakati pavo pamwe chete namatamba uye namaonde. nzvimbo iyo yakanzi mupata weeshikori nokuda kwesumbu ramazambiringa rakatemwa ipapo navaisraeri. mazuva makumi mana akati apera, vakadzoka kubva kundosora nyika. vakadzokera kuna mozisi naaroni nokuungano yose yavaisraeri pakadheshi murenje reparani. ipapo vakazivisa kwavari nokuungano yose uye vakavaratidza zvibereko zvenyika. vakapa nhoroondo iyi kuna mozisi: “takaenda kunyika yamakatituma, uye inoerera mukaka nouchi! hezvi zvibereko zvayo. asi vanhu vanogarako vane simba kwazvo, uye maguta akakomberedzwa uye makuru kwazvo. takaona kunyange zvizvarwa zvaanaki ikoko. vaamareki vanogara nechokunegevhi; vahiti, vajebhusi navaamori vanogara munyika yamakomo; uye vakenani vanogara pedyo negungwa uye nomunzvimbo inotevedza jorodhani.” ipapo karebhu akanyaradza vanhu pamberi pamozisi akati, “tinofanira kukwidza tindotora nyika nokuti zvirokwazvo tinogona kuitora.” asi varume vakanga vaenda naye vakati, “hatigoni kurwisa vanhu ava; vakasimba kutipfuura isu.” saka vakaparadzira mashoko akaipa pakati pavaisraeri pamusoro penyika yavakanga vandosora. vakati, “nyika yatakandosora inodya vaya vanogaramo. vanhu vose vatakaona ikoko vakakura kwazvo. takaona vanefirimi (izvo zvizvarwa zvavaanaki vanobva kuvanefirimi) ikoko. isu tainge mhashu pakuona kwedu, uye tainge takadarowo pakuona kwavo.”

14

usiku ihwohwo vanhu vose veungano vakasimudza manzwi avo vakachema zvikuru. vaisraeri vose vakapopotera mozisi naaroni uye ungano yose yakati kwavari, “dai bedzi takanga tafira muijipiti! kana murenje rino! ko, yeahoh ari kuuyireiko nesu kunyika ino zvoongotirega tichindourayiwa nomunondo? vakadzi navana vedu vachatorwa senhapwa. hazvaiva nani here kuti tidzokere kuijipiti?” zvino vakataurirana vachiti, “tinofanira kusarudza mutungamiri tidzokere kuijipiti.” ipapo mozisi naaroni vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo pamberi peungano yose yavaisraeri yakanga iri ipapo. yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni nakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune, avo vakanga vari pakati pavaya vakanga vandosora nyika, vakabvarura nguo dzavo. vakati kuungano yose yavaisraeri, “nyika yatakapfuura napakati payo tikaisora yakanaka kwazvo. kana yeahoh achifadzwa nesu, achatitungamirira kuti tipinde munyika iyoyo, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi, agoipa kwatiri. chete imi regai kumukira yeahoh. uye musatya vanhu venyika iyo, nokuti tichavamedza. kudzivirirwa kwavo kwabviswa, asi yeahoh anesu. musavatya.” asi ungano yose yakataura nezvokuti vatakwe namabwe. ipapo kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakaonekwa patende rokusangana navaisraeri vose. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “vanhu ava vachasvika riniko vachingondizvidza? vacharamba kunditenda kusvikira riniko, kunyange ndakaita zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvose pakati pavo? ndichavarova nedenda ndigovaparadza, asi iwe ndichakuita rudzi rukuru kwazvo uye rwakasimba kukunda ivo.” mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “ipapo vaijipita vachanzwa pamusoro pazvo! kuti makabudisa vanhu ava kubva pakati pavo nesimba renyu. uye vachaudza vanhu vanogara munyika ino pamusoro pazvo. vakatozvinzwa kare kuti imi, yeahoh, mugere navanhu ava uye kuti imi, yeahoh, makaonekwa chiso nechiso, uye kuti gore renyu rinogara pamusoro pavo, uye kuti munovatungamirira neshongwe yegore masikati uye neshongwe yomoto usiku. kana mukauraya vanhu vose ava panguva imwe chete, ndudzi dzakanzwa mukurumbira uyu pamusoro penyu dzichati, ‘yeahoh akanga asingagoni kuisa vanhu ava kunyika yaakanga avavimbisa nemhiko; saka akavauraya murenje.’ “zvino simba rayeahoh ngariratidzwe, sezvamakataura muchiti: ‘yeahoh anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo uye anoregerera zvivi nokumukira. kunyange zvakadaro haangaregi kuranga ane mhosva, anoranga vana nokuda kwechivi chamadzibaba kusvikira kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina.’ zvichienderana norudo rwenyu rukuru, regererai chivi chavanhu ava, sezvamakavaregerera kubva panguva yavakabva kuijipiti kusvikira zvino.” yeahoh akapindura akati, “ndavaregerera sezvawakumbira iwe. asi hazvo, noupenyu hwangu zvirokwazvo, uye zvirokwazvo sokuzara kunoita nyika yose nokubwinya kwayeahoh, hakuna mumwe wavarume vakaona kubwinya kwangu nezvishamiso zvandakaita muijipiti nomurenje asi vakasanditeerera, uye vakandiedza kanokwana kagumi, hakuna mumwe wavo achazoona nyika yandakavimbisa madzitateguru avo nemhiko. hakuna kana mumwe akandizvidza achazofa akaona nyika yandakavimbisa madzitateguru avo nemhiko. hakuna kana mumwe akandizvidza achazofa akaiona. asi nokuda kwokuti muranda wangu karebhu ano mweya wakasiyana navamwe uye anonditevera nomwoyo wose, ndichamupinza munyika yaakaenda kwairi, uye ichava nhaka yezvizvarwa zvake. sezvo vaamareki navakenani vachigara mumipata, dzokai mangwana mufambe makananga kurenje muchitevedza nzira inoenda nokugungwa dzvuku.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “ungano iyi icharamba ichindipopotera kusvikira riniko? ndanzwa kunyunyuta kwavaisraeri vokungopopota havo ava. saka vaudze kuti, ‘zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ndichakuitirai zvinhu zvacho zvandakanzwa muchireva muchiti: zvitunha zvenyu zvichawira murenje rino, imi mose muna makore makumi maviri kana makumi maviri neanoraudza makaverengwa pakuverengwa uye mukandipopotera. hakuna mumwe wenyu achapinda munyika yandakakupikirai noruoko rwakasimudzwa kuti uve musha wenyu, kunze kwakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni. asi kana vari vana venyu vamakati vachatapwa, ndichavapinza kuti vafare munyika yamaramba imi. asi imi zvitunha zvenyu zvichawira murenje rino. vana venyu vachava vafudzi muno kwamakore makumi mana, vachitambudzika nokuda kwokusatendeka kwenyu, kusvikira chitunha chenyu chokupedzisira chavata murenje rino. kwamakore makumi mana, gore richimirira zuva rimwe nerimwe ramazuva makumi mana amakasora nyika, muchatambudzika nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu uye muchaziva kuti zvinoita sei kuti ini ndirwe nemi.’ ini, yeahoh, ndazvitaura, uye zvirokwazvo ndichaita zvinhu izvi kuungano yose iyi yakaipa, yakabatana pamwe chete kuti indirwise. vachaperera murenje muno; vachafira muno.” saka varume vakanga vatumwa namozisi kundosora nyika, vaya vakadzoka vakaita kuti ungano yose ipopotere mozisi nemhaka yokuparadzira mashoko akaipa pamusoro payo: varume ava vakanga vaparadzira mashoko akaipa pamusoro penyika, vakarohwa vakaurayiwa nedenda pamberi payeahoh. pavarume vakaenda kundosora nyika, yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni nakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune ndivo bedzi vakararama. mozisi akati azivisa izvi kuvaisraeri vose, vakachema zvikuru. mangwana acho mangwanani, vakakwidza vakananga kumusoro kunyika yamakomo marefu. vakati, “takatadza hedu. tichakwidza tiende kunyika yatakavimbiswa nayeahoh.” asi mozisi akati kwavari, “sei musingateereri kurayira kwayeahoh? izvi hazvibudiriri! musakwidza kumusoro nokuti yeahoh haazi pakati penyu. muchakundwa navavengi venyu, nokuti vaamareki navakenani vachasangana nemi ikoko. nokuti makafuratira yeahoh, iye haangavi nemi uye muchaurayiwa nomunondo.” kunyange zvakadaro, nepfungwa dzavo, vakaenda vakananga kunyika yamakomo marefu, kunyange mozisi asina kuenda uye areka yayeahoh yesungano isina kubviswawo pamusasa. ipapo vaamareki navakenani vaigara munyika yamakomo vakaburuka vakavarwisa vakavadzingirira kusvikira kuhoma.

15

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mapinda munyika yandinokupai kuti mugare, uye mukauya nezvipiriso zvinopiswa kuna yeahoh, kubva kumombe kana makwai, kuti muite zvinonhuhwira zvinofadza yeahoh, zvingava zvinopiswa kana zvibayiro, zvemhiko dzakasarudzika kana zvipo zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira kana zvipiriso zvemitambo, ipapo munhu anouya nechipiriso chake achapa kuna yeahoh chipiriso chezvipo chiri chegumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa nechikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini yamafuta. pagwayana rimwe nerimwe rechipiriso chinopiswa kana rechibayiro, munofanira kugadzira chikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini yewaini chive chipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘munofanira kugadzira negondobwe chipiriso chezviyo chezvikamu zviviri mugumi zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chehini yamafuta, uye nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chehini yewaini chive chipiriso chokunwa. muchipe sechinonhuhwira chinofadza kuna yeahoh. “ ‘pamunogadzirira yeahoh nzombe duku sechipiriso chinopiswa kana sechibayiro, chemhiko yakasarudzika kana chipiriso chokuwadzana, munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chezviyo chezvikamu zvitatu kubva mugumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa nehafu yehini yamafuta pamwe chete nehando. uyezve muuye nehafu yehini yewaini sechipiriso chokunwa. chichava chipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira chinofadza yeahoh. hando imwe neimwe kana gondobwe, gwayana rimwe nerimwe kana mbudzana, zvinofanira kugadzirwa nenzira iyoyi. munofanira kuita izvi pane chimwe nechimwe chazvo, sokuwanda kwezvamunenge magadzira. “ ‘munhu wose anoberekwa munyika yenyu, anofanira kuita zvinhu izvi nenzira iyi paanenge achiuya nechipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chive chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera kana mutorwa kana mumwe munhuwo zvake agere pakati penyu akapa chipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza yeahoh, anofanira kuita zvakangofanana nezvamunoita imi. ungano inofanira kuva nomutemo mumwe chete kumutorwa agere pakati penyu; uyu murayiro usingaperi kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. muchafanana pamberi payeahoh imi nomutorwa. mirayiro mimwe cheteyo ichashanda kwamuri mose, imi nomutorwa agere pakati penyu.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mopinda munyika yandinokuendesai uye mukadya zvokudya zvenyika iyo, munofanira kupa chikamu kuna yeahoh sechipiriso. munofanira kupa keke rinoitwa noupfu hwenyu hwokutanga mugoripa sechipiriso chinobva paburiro. kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera munofanira kupa chipiriso ichi kuna yeahoh kubva paupfu hwenyu hwokutanga. “ ‘zvino kana musingatadzi nobwoni kuchengeta mirayiro iyi yakapiwa kuna mozisi nayeahoh, zvipi zvazvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi, kubva nezuva razvakapiwa nayeahoh uye zvichienda mberi kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera, uye kana izvi zvikaitwa kwete nobwoni zvisina kuzivikanwa neungano, ungano yose inofanira kupa hando duku sechipiriso chinopiswa, sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh, nenhongo yembudzi kuti ive chipiriso chechivi. muprista anofanira kuyananisira ungano yose yavaisraeri, uye vachakanganwirwa, nokuti zvakanga zvisina kuitwa nobwoni, uye, nokuda kwokukanganisa kwavo, vakavigira yeahoh chipiriso chinopiswa uye nechipiriso chechivi. ungano yose yavaisraeri navatorwa vagere pakati pavo vachakanganwirwa, nokuti vanhu vose vakatadza vasingazivi. “ ‘asi kana munhu mumwe chete akatadza nokusaziva, anofanira kuuya nembudzana hadzi yegore rimwe chete kuti chive chipiriso chechivi. muprista anofanira kuyananisira uyo akatadza pamberi payeahoh nokutadza nokusaziva, uye kana ayananisirwa, achakanganwirwa. murayiro mumwe chete iwoyu unoshanda kuna vose vanotadza vasingazivi, angava akaberekerwa muisraeri kana mutorwa. “ ‘asi ani naani anotadza nokuzvikudza, angava akaberekwa muisraeri kana mutorwa, anomhura yeahoh, munhu uyo anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. nokuti akazvidza shoko rayeahoh uye akaputsa mirayiro yake, munhu uyo anofanira kubviswa zvachose; mhosva yake inogara pamusoro pake.’ ” vaisraeri vachiri murenje, mumwe murume akawanikwa achiunganidza huni nezuva resabata. avo vakamuwana achiunganidza huni vakauya naye kuna mozisi naaroni nokuungano yose, uye vakamuchengeta mutorongo, nokuti vakanga vasingazivi zvaifanira kuitwa kwaari. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “murume uyo anofanira kufa. ungano yose inofanira kumutaka namabwe kunze kwomusasa.” saka ungano yakamubudisa kunze kwomusasa vakamutaka namabwe kusvikira afa, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvichatevera, munofanira kugadzira pfunha pamakona enguo dzenyu, dzinenge dzine tambo yebhuruu papfunha imwe neimwe. muchava nepfunha idzi kuti mudzitarire uye naizvozvo mucharangarira zvakarayirwa nayeahoh zvose, kuti muzviteerere mugorega kuita ufeve muchitevera kuchiva kwemwoyo yenyu nameso enyu. ipapo mucharangarira kuteerera mirayiro yangu yose uye muchazvitsaura kuti muve vanhu vaallah wenyu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, akakubudisai kubva muijipiti kuti ndive allah wenyu. ndini yeahoh allah wenyu.’ ”

16

kora mwanakomana waizhari, mwanakomana wakohati, mwanakomana warevhi, navamwe varubheni, dhatani naabhiramu, vanakomana vaeriabhi, naoni mwanakomana waporeti, vakazvikudza uye vakamukira mozisi. vakanga vane varume mazana maviri namakumi mashanu avaisraeri, vatungamiri vaizivikanwa kwazvo muungano vakanga vagadzwa kuti vave nhengo dzamakurukota. vakauya vari chikwata kuti vazopikisa mozisi naaroni vakati kwavari, “mazonyanya zvino! ungano yose itsvene, mumwe nomumwe wavo zvake, uye yeahoh ari pakati pavo. zvino munozviisireiko pamusoro peungano yayeahoh?” mozisi akati anzwa izvozvo, akawira pasi nechiso. ipapo akati kuna kora navateveri vake vose, “mangwanani yeahoh acharatidza kuti vanhu vake ndavapi uye kuti mutsvene ndiani, uye achaita kuti munhu uyo aswedere kwaari. munhu waachasarudza ndiye waachaswededza kwaari. iwe kora, navateveri vako vose munofanira kuita izvi: torai hadyana dzezvinonhuhwira uye mangwana muise moto nezvinonhuhwira madziri mugoenda nadzo pamberi payeahoh. munhu achasarudzwa nayeahoh ndiye achava mutsvene. imi varevhi mazonyanya zvino!” mozisi akatizve kuna kora, “chinzwai zvino, imi varevhi! ko, hazvina kukwana kwamuri here kuti allah wavaisraeri akakutsaurai pakati peungano yavaisraeri vose akakuswededzai pedyo naye kuti muite basa patabhenakeri yayeahoh uye kuti mumire pamberi peungano mugovashandira? akakuswededzai imi nehama dzenyu ivo varevhi, asi zvino mava kuedza kubvuta upristawo. uku kurwa nayeahoh zvamadai kusungana pamwe chete iyemi navose vanokuteverai. aroni ndianiko wamunopopotera?” ipapo mozisi akadana dhatani naabhiramu, vanakomana vaeriabhi. asi ivo vakati, “hatiuyiko! hazvina kukwana here kuti makatibudisa munyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi kuti muzotiurayira murenje? uye iye zvino munoda kubata ushe pamusoro pedu here? pamusoro pezvo, hamuna kutisvitsa kunyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi kana kutipa nhaka yeminda neminda yemizambiringa. muchada kutumbura meso avanhu ava here? haiwa, isu hatiuyiko!” ipapo mozisi akatsamwa zvikuru akati kuna yeahoh, “musagamuchira chipiriso chavo. handina kutovatorera kana mbongoro, uye handina kutadzira kana mumwe wavo.” mozisi akati kuna kora, “iwe navose vanokutevera munofanira kumira pamberi payeahoh mangwana, iwe, naivo naaroni. murume mumwe nomumwe ngaatore hadyana yake aise zvinonhuhwira mairi, hadyana mazana maviri namakumi mashanu pamwe chete mugodziisa pamberi payeahoh. iwe naaroni munofanira kuuyawo nehadyana dzenyu.” saka murume mumwe nomumwe akatora hadyana yake, akaisa moto nezvinonhuhwira mairi, uye vakamira namozisi naaroni pamukova wokupinda mutende rokusangana. kora akati aunganidza vateveri vake vose vaipikisana navo pamukova wokupinda mutende rokusangana, kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakaonekwa neungano yose. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “zvitsaurei imi paungano iyi kuitira kuti ndivaparadze izvozvi.” asi mozisi naaroni vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo vakadanidzira zvikuru vachiti, “haiwa allah, allah wemweya yavanhu vose, mungatsamwira ungano yose here munhu mumwe chete angotadza?” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uti kuungano, ‘sudurukai mubve pamatende akora, dhatani naabhiramu.’ ” mozisi akasimuka akaenda kuna dhatani naabhiramu uye vakuru veisraeri vakamutevera. akayambira ungano akati, “sudurukai mubve pamatende avanhu vakaipa ava! musabata chinhu chipi zvacho chinenge chiri chavo, kuti murege kuparadzwa nokuda kwezvivi zvavo zvose.” saka vakasuduruka vakabva pamatende akora, dhatani naabhiramu. dhatani naabhiramu vakanga vabuda kunze uye vakanga vakamira navakadzi vavo, vana navacheche vari pamukova pamatende avo. ipapo mozisi akati, “muchaziva nezvizvi kuti yeahoh akandituma kuti ndiite zvinhu izvi zvose uye kuti dzakanga dzisiri pfungwa dzangu: kana varume ava vakafa savamwe vanhu uye vakasangana nezvinongoitika kuvanhu vose, ipapo yeahoh anenge asina kundituma. asi kana yeahoh akauyisa chimwe chinhu chitsva, uye nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo ikavamedza, nezvose zvavo, uye vakaburukira muguva vari vapenyu, ipapo muchaziva kuti varume ava vazvidza yeahoh.” akati achangopedza kutaura zvose izvi, pasi pavo pakatsemuka uye nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo ikavamedza, nenhumbi dzavo navanhu vose vakora nezvinhu zvavo zvose. vakaburukira muguva vari vapenyu, nezvinhu zvavo zvose; nyika ikavafukidza, vakaparara vakabva pakati peungano. pavakachema, vaisraeri vose vakanga vakavakomba vakatiza, vachidanidzira vachiti, “nyika ichatimedza nesuwo!” ipapo moto wakabuda uchibva kuna yeahoh ukaparadza varume mazana maviri namakumi mashanu vakanga vachipisira zvinonhuhwira. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taurira ereazari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista, kuti abvise hadyana parufuse agoparadzira mazimbe kure nokuti hadyana itsvene, idzo hadyana dzavarume vaye vakatadza vakaurayiwa. pwanyai hadyana mugoita chifukidziro chearitari nadzo, nokuti dzakauyiswa pamberi payeahoh dzikava tsvene. ngadzive chiratidzo kuvaisraeri.” saka ereazari muprista akaunganidza hadyana dzendarira dzakauya navaya vakanga vapiswa, akaita kuti dzipwanyiwe kuti dzigova chifukidzo chearitari, sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. ichi chaiva chirangaridzo kuvaisraeri chokuti hakuna munhu anofanira kupisira zvinonhuhwira pamberi payeahoh kunze kwechizvarwa chaaroni kuti aregere kuzofanana nakora navateveri vake. fume mangwana, ungano yose yavaisraeri yakapopotera mozisi naaroni. vakati, “imi makauraya vanhu vayeahoh.” asi ungano yakati yaungana pamwe chete ichipikisana namozisi naaroni vakatarira kutende rokusangana, pakarepo gore rikaifukidza uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kukaonekwa. ipapo mozisi naaroni vakaenda mberi kwetende rokusangana, uye yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “ibva paungano iyi kuti ndivaparadze iye zvino.” ipapo vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo. zvino mozisi akati kuna aroni, “tora hadyana yako ugoisa zvinonhuhwira mairi pamwe chete nomoto unobva paaritari, uchimbidze kuenda kuungano undovayananisira. hasha dzabuda dzichibva kuna yeahoh; denda ratotanga.” saka aroni akaita sezvakarehwa namozisi, akamhanyira pakati peungano. denda rakanga ratotanga pakati pavanhu, asi aroni akapisira zvinonhuhwira akavayananisira. akamira pakati pavapenyu navakafa, denda rikamirawo. asi vanhu zviuru gumi nezvina namazana manomwe vakafa nedenda, vachiwedzera pane vaya vakanga vafa nokuda kwakora. ipapo aroni akadzokera kuna mozisi pamukova wokupinda mutende rokusangana, nokuti denda rakanga rapera.

17

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri utore tsvimbo gumi nembiri kubva kwavari, imwe chete kubva kuno mumwe nomumwe wavatungamiri vamarudzi amadzitateguru avo. unyore zita romurume mumwe nomumwe patsvimbo yake. patsvimbo yarevhi unyore zita raaroni, nokuti panofanira kuva netsvimbo imwe chete yomukuru mumwe nomumwe worudzi rwamadzitateguru avo. udziise mutende rokusangana pamberi pechipupuriro, pandinosangana nemi. tsvimbo yomunhu wandichasarudza ichabukira mashizha, uye ndichagumisa kupopota uku kwavaisraeri kuri kuramba kuripo pamusoro pako.” saka mozisi akataura navaisraeri, uye vatungamiri vavo vakamupa tsvimbo gumi nembiri, imwe chete iri yomutungamiri mumwe nomumwe wamarudzi amadzitateguru avo, uye tsvimbo yaaroni yakanga iri pakati padzo. mozisi akaisa tsvimbo idzi pamberi payeahoh mutende rechipupuriro. fume mangwana mozisi akapinda mutende rechipupuriro uye akaona kuti tsvimbo yaaroni, iyo yaiva yakamirira imba yarevhi, yakanga isina kungobukira bedzi asi yakanga yatungira, yava namaruva uye yabereka maarimondi. ipapo mozisi akatora tsvimbo dzose kubva pamberi payeahoh akaenda nadzo kuvaisraeri vose. vakadzitarisa, ipapo murume mumwe nomumwe akatora tsvimbo yake. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “dzorera tsvimbo yaaroni pamberi petende rechipupuriro, kuti ichengetwe sechiratidzo kuvanhu vanondimukira. izvozvi zvichagumisa kundipopotera kwavo, kuti varege kufa.” mozisi akaita sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh, izvozvo ndizvo zvaakaita. vaisraeri vakati kuna mozisi, “isu tichafa hedu! takarasika, takarasika isu tose! ani naani achaswedera patabhenakeri yayeahoh achafa. ko, isu tose tichafa here?”

18

yeahoh akati kuna aroni, “iwe, navanakomana vako nemhuri yababa vako munofanira kuva nebasa rokutakura mhosva dzinotadzirwa nzvimbo tsvene, uye iwe navanakomana vako bedzi ndimi munofanira kuita basa rokutakura mhosva dzinotadzirwa basa rouprista. uya nehama dzako ivo varevhi vanobva kurudzi rwamadzitateguru ako kuti vazobatana newe uye vagokubatsira iwe navanakomana vako pamunoshumira pamberi petende rechipupuriro. vanofanira kuva pasi pako uye vanofanira kuita mabasa ose etende asi havafaniri kuswedera pedyo nemidziyo yenzvimbo tsvene kana aritari, kana kuti mose ivo newe muchafa. vanofanira kubatana newe vagoita basa rokuchengeta tende rokusangana, basa rose rapatende uye hakuna mumwezve anofanira kuswedera pauri. “munofanira kuva nebasa rokuchengeta nzvimbo tsvene nearitari, kuti hasha dzirege kuwira pavaisraerizve. ini pachangu ndakasarudza hama dzako ivo varevhi pakati pavaisraeri kuti vave sechipo kwauri, vakumikidzwe kuna yeahoh kuti vaite basa patende rokusangana. asi iwe chete navanakomana vako ndimi mungashanda savaprista pazvinhu zvose zviri paaritari nezviri mukati mechifukidziro. ndiri kukupai basa rouprista sechipo. ani naani anoswedera panzvimbo tsvene anofanira kuurayiwa.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna aroni, “ini ndimene ndakugadza kuti uve muchengeti wezvipiriso zvinopiwa kwandiri; zvipiriso zvose zvitsvene zvinopiwa kwandiri navaisraeri ndinozvipa kwauri iwe navanakomana vako somugove wako uye ugova mugove wako wamazuva ose. iwe unofanira kuva nomugove wezvipiriso zvitsvene-tsvene zvinosara pane zvinopiswa. pazvipo zvose zvavanondivigira sezvipiriso zvitsvene-tsvene, zvingava zvezviyo kana zvechivi kana chipiriso chemhosva, chikamu ichocho ndechako iwe navanakomana vako. muchidye sechinhu chitsvene-tsvene; murume wose achachidya. chinofanira kuva chitsvene kwamuri. “izvi ndezvako zvakare: chimwe nechimwe chinotsaurwa kubva pazvipo zvose zvezvipiriso zvinoninirwa zvavaisraeri. ndinokupa izvi iwe navanakomana vako navanasikana vako somugove wako wamazuva ose. munhu wose weimba yako anenge akachena angazvidya hake. “ndinokupa mafuta omuorivhi akaisvonaka uye waini yose yakaisvonaka nezviyo zvavanovigira yeahoh sezvibereko zvokutanga zvegohwo ravo. zvibereko zvose zvenyika zvavanovigira yeahoh zvichava zvako. munhu wose weimba yako anenge akachena angazvidya. “zvinhu zvose zvakatsaurirwa yeahoh muisraeri ndezvako. chibereko chinotanga kuzarura chizvaro, chingava chomunhu kana chechipfuwo, chinopiwa kuna yeahoh, ndechako. asi unofanira kudzikinura mwanakomana wose wedangwe uye dangwe rose remhuka dzisina kunaka. kana zvava nomwedzi mumwe chete, unofanira kuzvidzikinura nomutengo wedzikinuro wakatarwa wamashekeri mashanu esirivha, maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, rinorema magera makumi maviri. “asi haufaniri kudzikinura mhuru nzombe yedangwe, gwai kana mbudzi, zvitsvene. usase ropa razvo paaritari ugopisa mafuta azvo sechipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chive chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. nyama yazvo ichava yako, sezvakangoita chityu chechipiriso chokuninira nechidya chokurudyi zvagara zviri zvako. ndinokupa zvose zvipiriso zvitsvene zvakatsaurirwa yeahoh navaisraeri, iwe navanakomana navanasikana vako somugove wako wenguva yose. isungano yemunyu nokusingaperi pamberi payeahoh kwamuri mose iwe nezvizvarwa zvako.” yeahoh akati kuna aroni, “iwe haungawani nhaka munyika mavo, uye haungavi nomugove nenhaka pakati pavaisraeri. “varevhi ndinovapa zvegumi zvose zvavaisraeri senhaka yavo kutsiva basa ravanoita pavanenge vachishumira patende rokusangana. kubva zvino zvichienda mberi, vaisraeri havafaniri kuswedera kutende rokusangana, kuti varege kuva nemhosva yezvivi zvavo vakazofa. varevhi ndivo vanofanira kuita basa patende rokusangana uye vagotakura zvakaipa zvavanhu. uyu mutemo uchagara uripo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera. ivo havangawani nhaka pakati pavaisraeri. pachinzvimbo chaizvozvo ndinopa kuvarevhi nhaka yezvegumi zvinopiwa kuna yeahoh navaisraeri. ndokusaka ndakati kwavari: ‘havangavi nenhaka pakati pavaisraeri.’ ” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvarevhi uti kwavari: ‘pamunogamuchira zvegumi kubva kuvaisraeri zvandinokupai senhaka yenyu, munofanira kupa chegumi chezvegumi sechipiriso chayeahoh. chipiriso chako chichaverengwa kwauri sechezviyo zvinobva paburiro kana muto wewaini unobva pachisviniro chewaini. nenzira iyi nemiwo munofanira kupa chipiriso kuna yeahoh kubva pazvegumi zvose zvamunogamuchira kubva kuvaisraeri. kubva pazvegumi izvi, munofanira kupa mugove wayeahoh kuna aroni muprista. munofanira kupa somugove wayeahoh chakanakisisa uye chikamu chitsvene chezvinhu zvose zvamunenge mapiwa.’ “uti kuvarevhi: ‘pamunouyisa chikamu chakanakisisa, chichagamuchirwa kubva kwamuri sechakabva paburiro kana pachisviniro chewaini, iwe nemhuri yako mungadya henyu zvakasara zvose chero pamunenge muri, nokuti ndiwo mubayiro wenyu webasa renyu rapatende rokusangana. hamungazovi nemhosva pachinhu kana muchiuyisa chikamu chakanakisisa chacho; ipapo hamungazosvibisi zvitsvene zvavaisraeri, uye hamuzofi.’ ”

19

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “izvi ndizvo zvinodikanwa pamurayiro wakarayirwa nayeahoh. udza vaisraeri kuti vakuvigire tsiru dzvuku risina kuremara, kana charingapomerwa uye risina kumbosungwa pajoko. uripe kuna ereazari muprista; rinofanira kubudiswa kunze kwomusasa rigourayiwa pamberi pake. ipapo ereazari muprista anofanira kutora rimwe reropa raro nomunwe agorisasa kanomwe akananga mberi kwetende rokusangana. akatarisa, tsiru rinofanira kupiswa, dehwe raro, nyama yaro namazvizvi aro. muprista anofanira kutora huni dzomusidhari, hisopi newuru tsvuku agozvikanda pamusoro petsiru riri kutsva. shure kwaizvozvo, muprista anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye azvishambidze nemvura. ipapo angachipinda hake mumusasa, asi achange asina kunatswa kusvikira madekwana. munhu acharipisa naiyewo anofanira kusuka nguo dzake uye agoshamba nemvura uye iyewo achava asina kuchena kusvikira madekwana. “munhu akachena achaunganidza madota etsiru agoaisa panzvimbo yakanaka iri kunze kwomusasa. achachengetwa neungano yavaisraeri kuti agoshandiswa pamvura yokunatsa; ndeyokunatswa kubva pachivi. munhu anounganidza madota etsiru anofanirawo kusuka nguo dzake, naiyewo achava asina kuchena kusvikira madekwana. mutemo uyu uchagara uripo pakati pavaisraeri navatorwa vagere pakati pavo. “ani naani anobata chitunha chaani zvake achava asina kuchena kwamazuva manomwe. anofanira kuzvinatsa nemvura nezuva retatu uye nezuva rechinomwe; ipapo achava akachena. ani naani anobata chitunha chaani zvake akasazvinatsa anosvibisa tabhenakeri yayeahoh. munhu uyu anofanira kubviswa pakati pavaisraeri. nokuti mvura yokunatsa haina kumbosaswa pamusoro pake, haana kuchena; kusachena kwake kucharamba kuri paari. “uyu ndiwo murayiro unobata pamunhu anofira mutende: ani naani anopinda mutende uye ani zvake ari mariri achava asina kuchena kwamazuva manomwe, uye midziyo yose yakazarurwa, isina kukwidibirwa, ichava isina kuchena. “ani naani ari musango anobata munhu akaurayiwa nomunondo kana mumwe munhu akangofawo zvake, kana munhu anobata bvupa romunhu kana guva, achava asina kuchena kwamazuva manomwe. “kana munhu asina kuchena, utore dota rinobva pachipiriso chokunatsa chakapiswa ugoriisa muchirongo ugoridira mvura yakachena. ipapo munhu akachena anofanira kutora hisopi, ainyike mumvura agosasa tende nemidziyo yose uye navanhu vanga varimo. anofanira kusasawo ani zvake akabata bvupa romunhu kana guva kana mumwe munhu akaurayiwa kana munhu akangofawo zvake. munhu akachena anofanira kusasa munhu asina kuchena nezuva rechitatu uye nerechinomwe, uye pazuva rechinomwe anofanira kumunatsa. munhu ari kunatswa anofanira kusuka nguo dzake agozvishambidza nemvura, uye manheru iwayo anofanira kuva akachena. asi kana munhu asina kuchena akasazvinatsa, anofanira kubviswa paungano, nokuti iye asvibisa nzvimbo tsvene yayeahoh. mvura yokunatsa haina kumbosaswa paari, nokudaro haana kuchena. uyu mutemo uchagara uripo kwavari. “munhu anosasa mvura yokunatsa anofanirawo kusuka nguo dzake, uye ani naani anobata mvura yokunatsa achava asina kunaka kusvikira madekwana. chinhu chose chinobatwa nomunhu asina kuchena chinova chisina kuchena, uye ani naani anochibata anova asina kuchena kusvikira madekwana.”

20

mumwedzi wokutanga, ungano yose yeisraeri yakasvika murenje rezini, uye vakandogara pakadheshi. ndipo pakafira miriamu uye akavigwapo. zvino pakanga pasisina mvura yeungano, uye vanhu vakaungana vakapopotera mozisi naaroni. vakapopotera mozisi vachiti, “dai zvedu takafa pakafira hama dzedu pamberi payeahoh! seiko wakauya neungano yayeahoh murenje rino, kuti isu nezvipfuwo zvedu tifire muno. seiko wakatibudisa muijipiti uchitiuyisa munzvimbo yakaipa kudai? haina zviyo kana maonde, mazambiringa kana matamba. uye mvura yokunwa hapana!” mozisi naaroni vakabva paungano vakaenda kumukova wetende rokusangana vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo, kubwinya kwayeahoh kukaratidzwa kwavari. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora tsvimbo uye iwe nomukoma wako aroni muunganidze ungano pamwe chete. utaure kudombo pamberi pavo rigobudisa mvura yaro. iwe uchabudisa mvura kubva mudombo kuti vanwe ivo nezvipfuwo zvavo.” saka mozisi akatora tsvimbo pamberi payeahoh, sezvaakanga amurayira. iye naaroni vakaunganidza ungano pamwe chete pamberi pedombo, mozisi akati kwavari, “teererai imi vokumukira, tinofanira kukubudisirai mvura padombo iri here?” ipapo mozisi akasimudza ruoko rwake akarova dombo kaviri netsvimbo yake. mvura yakabuda, ungano nezvipfuwo zvikanwa. asi yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “nokuti hamuna kuvimba neni zvakakwana kuti mundikudze somutsvene pamberi pavaisraeri, imi hamuchapinzi ungano iyi munyika yandakavapa.” iyi ndiyo mvura yemeribha, apo vaisraeri vakarwa nayeahoh uye paakazviratidza kuti mutsvene pakati pavo. mozisi akatuma nhume ari kukadheshi kuna mambo weedhomu, achiti: “zvanzi nomununʼuna wako israeri: iwe unoziva matambudziko ose akatiwira. madzibaba edu akaburuka achienda kuijipiti, tikandogarako kwamakore mazhinji. vaijipita vakatibata zvakaipa isu namadzibaba edu, asi takati tadana kuna yeahoh, akatinzwa akatuma mutumwa akatibudisa muijipiti. “zvino tiri pano pakadheshi, guta riri kumucheto wenyika yenyu. tapota titendereiwo kupfuura nomunyika yenyu. hatizopindi nomuminda ipi zvayo kana minda yemizambiringa kana kunwa zvako mvura mutsime ripi zvaro. tichafamba hedu nomunzira huru yamambo uye hatingatsaukiri kurudyi kana kuruboshwe kusvikira tapfuura nomunyika yenyu.” asi edhomu akapindura akati: “hamupfuuri napano; kana mukaedza, tichabuda tigokurwisai nomunondo.” vaisraeri vakapindura vakati: “tichaenda nenzira huru, uye kana isu kana zvipfuwo zvedu zvikanwa mvura yenyu, ticharipa. tinongoda kupfuura tichifamba netsoka, hapanazve chimwe.” vakapindurazve vachiti: “hamungapfuuri.” ipapo edhomu akauya kuzovarwisa nehondo huru uye ine simba. sezvo edhomu akaramba kuvabvumira kupfuura nomunyika yavo, vaisraeri vakatsauka havo kubva kwavari. ungano yose yeisraeri yakasimuka kubva kukadheshi uye vakasvika pagomo rehori. pagomo rehori, pedyo nomuganhu weedhomu, yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naaroni, “aroni achachengetwa kuvanhu vokwake. haangapindi munyika yandakapa vaisraeri, nokuti mose muri vaviri makamukira murayiro wangu pamvura yepameribha. tora aroni nomwanakomana wake ereazari ukwire navo mugomo rehori. ubvise nguo dzaaroni udzipfekedze mwanakomana wake ereazari nokuti aroni achasanganiswa navanhu vokwake; achafira ipapo.” mozisi akaita sezvaakanga arayirwa nayeahoh: vakakwira mugomo rehori pamberi peungano yose. mozisi akabvisa nguo dzaaroni akadzipfekedza mwanakomana wake ereazari. uye aroni akafira ipapo pamusoro pegomo. ipapo mozisi naereazari vakaburuka kubva mugomo. uye ungano yose yakati yazvinzwa kuti aroni akanga afa, imba yose yeisraeri yakamuchema kwamazuva makumi matatu.

21

mambo wearadhi mukenani aigara kunegevhi, akati anzwa kuti vaisraeri vakanga vachiuya nenzira inoenda kuatarimi, akarwisa vaisraeri akatapa vamwe vavo. ipapo vaisraeri vakaita mhiko iyi kuna yeahoh, vakati: “kana mukaisa vanhu ava mumaoko edu, tichaparadza maguta avo zvachose.” yeahoh akateerera chikumbiro chavaisraeri akapa vakenani kwavari. vakavaparadza zvachose ivo namaguta avo; naizvozvo nzvimbo iyo ikatumidzwa kunzi homa. vakafamba vachibva nokugomo rehori vachitevedza nzira yaienda nokugungwa dzvuku, kuti vapoterere edhomu. asi vanhu vakaora mwoyo panzira; vakapopotera allah namozisi, vachiti, “makatibudisireiko muijipiti kuti tizofira murenje? chingwa hapana! mvura hapana! uye hatidi zvokudya zvokungotamburira izvi!” ipapo yeahoh akatuma nyoka dzino uturu pakati pavo, dzikaruma vanhu uye vaisraeri vazhinji vakafa. vanhu vakauya kuna mozisi vakati, “takatadza, patakapopotera yeahoh nemi. nyengeterai kuti yeahoh atibvisire nyoka idzi pakati pedu.” saka mozisi akanyengeterera vanhu. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “gadzira nyoka ino uturu ugoiturika padanda; ani naani anorumwa, akatarira kwairi achararama.” saka mozisi akagadzira nyoka yendarira akaiturika padanda. ipapo vaiti kana ani naani akange arumwa nenyoka, akatarisa panyoka yendarira, airarama. vaisraeri vakaramba vachifamba vakandodzika musasa paobhoti. ipapo vakasimuka kubva paobhoti vakandodzika musasa paiye abharimi, mugwenga rakatarisana nemoabhu kwakanangana nokumabudazuva. kubva ipapo vakaenderera mberi vakandodzika musasa mumupata wezeredhi. vakasimuka vakabvapo vakandodzika musasa mujinga meanoni, riri murenje rinosvika kunyika yavaamori. anoni ndiwo muganhu wemoabhu, pakati pemoabhu navaamori. ndokusaka bhuku rehondo dzayeahoh richiti: “wahebhi musufa nehova, anoni nemateru ehova dzinonanga kunzvimbo yeari uye dzinowanikwa pamuganhu wemoabhu.” kubva ipapo vakapfuurira mberi vachienda vakasvika kubheeri, patsime apo pakanzi nayeahoh kuna mozisi, “unganidza vanhu pamwe chete uye ini ndichavapa mvura.” ipapo vaisraeri vakaimba rwiyo urwu: “tubuka, iwe tsime!
