imbai pamusoro paro, pamusoro petsime rakacherwa namachinda, rakacherwa namakurukota avanhu, makurukota akanga ane tsvimbo dzoushe nemidonzvo.” ipapo vakabva murenje vakaenda kumatana, vachibva kumatana vakaenda kunaharieri, vachibva kunaharieri vakaenda kubhamoti, uye vachibva kubhamoti vakaenda kumupata uri mumoabhu pamusoro pegomo repisiga rinotarira pasi kurenje. vaisraeri vakatuma nhume kundoti kuna sihoni mambo wavaamori: “titendereiwo kupfuura nomunyika yenyu. hatingatsaukiri muminda yenyu kana minda yemizambiringa, kana kunwa mvura kubva patsime ripi zvaro. tichangofamba hedu nomunzira huru yamambo kusvikira tapfuura munyika yenyu.” asi sihoni haana kutendera vaisraeri kupfuura nomunyika yake. akaunganidza hondo yake yose vakafamba vachienda kurenje kundorwisa vaisraeri. akati asvika pajahazi, vakarwa navaisraeri. kunyange zvakadaro, vaisraeri vakamukunda nomunondo vakamutorera nyika yake kubva paanoni kusvikira kujabhoki, asi kusvikira kuvaamoni bedzi, nokuti muganhu wavo wakanga wakasimba. vaisraeri vakatapa maguta ose avaamori vakagaramo, pamwe chete neheshibhoni nenzvimbo dzaro dzose dzokugara. heshibhoni rakanga riri guta rasihoni mambo wavaamori, akanga arwa namambo akanga ari wemoabhu kare akamutorera nyika yake yose kundosvika kuanoni. ndokusaka vadetembi vachiti: “uyai kuheshibhoni uye ngarivakwezve; guta rasihoni ngaridzorerwezve. “moto wakabuda muheshibhoni, iwo murazvo kubva muguta rasihoni. wakaparadza ari remoabhu, ivo vagari vokwakakwirira kweanoni. une nhamo, iwe moabhu! maparadzwa, imi vanhu vekemoshi! akapa vanakomana vake savatizi navanasikana vake senhapwa kuna sihoni mambo wavaamori. “asi takavakunda; heshibhoni yakaparadzwa yose kusvikira kudhibhoni. takavaparadza kusvikira kunofa, iyo inosvika kumedhebha.” saka vaisraeri vakagara munyika yavaamori. shure kwokunge mozisi atuma vasori kujazeri, vaisraeri vakatapa nzvimbo dzaro dzakanga dzakaripoteredza uye vakadzinga vaamori vakanga vageremo. ipapo vakadzoka vakakwidza nenzira inoenda nokubhashani, uye ogi mambo webhashani nehondo yake yose akabuda kuti andosangana navo kuti arwe navo paedhirei. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “usamutya, nokuti ndamupa kwauri, nehondo yake yose uye nenyika yake. umuitire zvawakaitira sihoni mambo wavaamori, uyo aitonga muheshibhoni.” saka vakamuuraya, pamwe chete navanakomana vake nehondo yake yose, vakasiya pasina kana mupenyu. uye vakatora nyika yake.

22

ipapo vaisraeri vakafamba vachienda kumapani emoabhu vakadzika misasa yavo vakatevedza jorodhani nechemhiri kwejeriko. zvino bharaki mwanakomana wazipori akaona zvose zvakanga zvaitwa navaisraeri kuvaamori, moabhu akatya nokuti pakanga pane vanhu vazhinji. zvirokwazvo, moabhu yakazara nokudedera nokuda kwavaisraeri. vamoabhu vakati kuvakuru vemidhiani, “vanhu vazhinji ava vachananzva zvinhu zvose zvakatipoteredza, semombe inonanzva sora romusango.” saka bharaki mwanakomana wazipori, uyo akanga ari mambo wemoabhu panguva iyoyo, akatuma nhume kundodana bharamu mwanakomana wabheori, uyo akanga ari papetori, pedyo norwizi, munyika yaakaberekerwa. bharaki akati: “vanhu vakabva kuijipiti, vakazadza nyika yose, uye vagara pedyo neni. zvino, uya utuke vanhu ava, nokuti simba ravo iguru kwazvo kwandiri. zvichida ipapo ndingagona kuvakunda ndikavadzinga vabude munyika ino. nokuti ndinoziva kuti avo vaunoropafadza vanoropafadzwa, uye vaunotuka vanotukwa.” vakuru vemoabhu nevemidhiani vakabva, vakatora mari yokuripa kuvuka. vakati vasvika kuna bharamu vakamuudza zvakanga zvarehwa nabharaki. bharamu akati kwavari, “chivatai pano, ndichauya nemhinduro yandichapiwa nayeahoh.” saka machinda emoabhu akagara naye. allah akauya kuna bharamu akamubvunza akati, “vanhu vaunavo ndivanaaniko?” bharamu akati kuna allah, “bharaki mwanakomana wazipori, mambo wemoabhu, akanditumira nhume idzi achiti, ‘vanhu vakabuda kubva kuijipiti vakazadza nyika yose. zvino uya unditukire vanhu ava. zvichida izvozvi ndingagona kurwa navo ndikavadzingira kure.’ ” asi allah akati kuna bharamu, “usaenda navo. haufaniri kutuka vanhu avo, nokuti vakaropafadzwa.” fume mangwana, bharamu akamuka akati kumachinda abharaki, “dzokerai kunyika yokwenyu, nokuti yeahoh aramba kuti ndiende nemi.” saka machinda emoabhu akadzokera kuna bharaki akati, “bharamu akaramba kuuya nesu.” ipapo bharaki akatumazve mamwe machinda, akawanda chose uye aikudzwa kupinda vokutanga. vakasvika kuna bharamu vakati: “zvanzi nabharaki mwanakomana wazipori: usatendera chimwe chinhu kukukonesa kuuya kwandiri, nokuti ndichakupa mubayiro wakanaka kwazvo uye ndichaita zvose zvaunoreva. uya unditukire vanhu ava.” asi bharamu akavapindura akati, “kunyange dai bharaki akandipa muzinda wake uzere nesirivha negoridhe, handingagoni kuita chimwe chinhu chikuru kana chiduku kuti tiite zvinodarika murayiro wayeahoh allah wangu. zvino chivatai pano manheru ano sezvakaita vamwe, ini ndichanzwa kana yeahoh ane zvimwe zvaangandiudza.” usiku ihwohwo allah akauya kuna bharamu akati kwaari, “sezvo vanhu ava vauya kuzokudana, enda hako navo, asi uite chete zvandinokuudza.” bharamu akamuka mangwanani, akaisa chigaro pambongoro yake akaenda namachinda emoabhu. asi allah akamutsamwira zvikuru paakaenda, uye mutumwa wayeahoh akamira munzira kuti amukonese. bharamu akanga akatasva mbongoro yake, uye varanda vake vaviri vaiva naye. mbongoro yakati ichiona mutumwa wayeahoh amire munzira ane munondo wakavhomorwa muruoko rwake, yakabuda munzira ikapinda mumunda. bharamu akairova kuti idzokere munzira. ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akamira pakamanikana pakati peminda miviri yemizambiringa, paiva namasvingo kumativi ose. mbongoro yakati ichiona mutumwa wayeahoh, yakazvimanikidzira kurusvingo ikatsimbirira rutsoka rwabharamu parwuri. saka akapamhazve kuirova. ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akapfuurira mberi akandomira panzvimbo yakamanikana pakanga pasina mukana wokutendeukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. mbongoro yakati ichiona mutumwa wayeahoh, yakavata pasi pabharamu, iye akatsamwa zvikuru akairova netsvimbo yake. ipapo yeahoh akashamisa muromo wembongoro, ikati kuna bharamu, “ndaiteiko kwamuri zvaita kuti mundirove katatu kose aka?” bharamu akapindura mbongoro akati, “wandiita benzi iwe! dai ndanga ndiine munondo muruoko rwangu ndingadai ndakuuraya izvozvi.” mbongoro yakati kuna bharamu, “ko, handisi mbongoro yenyu, yamunogara muchitasva kusvikira zuva rino here? ko, ndinogara ndichikuitirai zvakadai here?” iye akati, “kwete.” ipapo yeahoh akasvinudza meso abharamu, iye akaona mutumwa wayeahoh amire munzira ane munondo wake wakavhomorwa. saka akakotama akawira pasi nechiso chake. mutumwa wayeahoh akamubvunza achiti, “warovereiko mbongoro yako rutatu rwose urwu? ini ndauya pano kuzokudzivisa nokuti nzira yako haina kururama kwandiri. mbongoro yandiona ikatsauka ichibva pandiri katatu aka kose. dai isina kutsauka, zvirokwazvo ndingadai ndakuuraya izvozvi, asi iyo ndairaramisa.” bharamu akati kumutumwa wayeahoh, “ndatadza. handina kuziva kuti manga mumire munzira kuti mundidzivise. zvino kana musingafari, ndodzokera hangu.” mutumwa wayeahoh akati kuna bharamu, “chienda hako navarume ava, asi utaure zvandinokuudza zvoga.” saka bharamu akaenda namachinda abharaki. bharaki akati anzwa kuti bharamu akanga achiuya, akabuda kuti andosangana naye paguta ravamoabhu pamuganhu weanoni, kumagumo kwenyika yake. bharaki akati kuna bharamu, “handina kukudana nokukurumidza here? seiko usina kuuya kwandiri? ini handigoni kukupa mubayiro here?” bharamu akapindura akati, “zvakanaka, zvino ndauya kwauri. asi ndingataura zvose zvose here? ndinofanira kungotaura chete zvinenge zvaiswa mumuromo mangu naallah.” ipapo bharamu akaenda nabharaki kukiriati huzoti. bharaki akabayira mombe namakwai, akapa zvimwe kuna bharamu namachinda akanga anaye. fume mangwana, bharaki akatora bharamu akakwidza naye kubhamoti bhaari, uye ikoko akaona chikamu chavanhu.

23

bharamu akati, “ndivakirei aritari nomwe pano, mugondigadzirira hando nomwe namakondobwe manomwe.” bharaki akaita sezvakataurwa nabharamu, uye vose vari vaviri vakabayira hando negondobwe paaritari imwe neimwe. ipapo bharamu akati kuna bharaki, “gara pano parutivi pechipiriso chako, ini ndimbotsaukira parutivi apa. zvichida yeahoh angauya kuzosangana neni. zvose zvaanondiratidza, ndichazokuudza.” ipapo akabva akaenda pakakwirira, pakanga pasina chinhu. allah akasangana naye, bharamu akati, “ndagadzira aritari nomwe uye paaritari imwe neimwe ndabayira hando negondobwe.” yeahoh akaisa shoko mumuromo wabharamu akati, “dzokera kuna bharaki utaure kwaari shoko iri.” saka akadzokera kwaari akamuwana amire parutivi rwechipiriso chake, ana machinda ose emoabhu. ipapo bharamu akataura chirevo chake akati: “bharaki akanditora kubva kuaramu, iye mambo wemoabhu kubva kumakomo okumabvazuva. akati, ‘uya unditukirewo yaqobho; uya, utsoropodze israeri.’ ndingatuka seiko avo vasina kutukwa naallah? ndingatsoropodza seiko avo vasina kutsoropodzwa nayeahoh? ndiri pamusoro pamatombo, ndinovaona, ndiri pakakwirira, ndinovaona. ndinoona vanhu vanogara vari voga uye havazviverengi pakati pendudzi. ndianiko angaverenga guruva rayaqobho kana kuverenga chikamu chechina chaisraeri? regai ndife rufu rwowakarurama, uye kuguma kwangu ngakuve sokwavo!” bharaki akati kuna bharamu, “waiteiko kwandiri? ndakakutora kuti uzotuka vavengi vangu, asi hauna chinhu chawaita asi kutovaropafadza!” iye akapindura akati, “ko, handifaniri kuti nditaure zvaiswa mumuromo mangu nayeahoh here?” ipapo bharaki akati kwaari, “uya uende neni kune imwe nzvimbo yaunogona kuvaona; uchangoona chikamu chavo asi kwete vose. uye uri ipapo ugonditukira vanhu ava.” saka akamutora akaenda naye kumunda wazofimi pamusoro pepisiga, uye akavaka aritari nomwe ipapo akabayira hando negondobwe paaritari imwe neimwe. bharamu akati kuna bharaki, “gara pano iwe parutivi rwechipiriso chako ini ndichindosangana naye uko.” yeahoh akasangana nabharamu akaisa shoko mumuromo make akati, “dzokera kuna bharaki undotaura mashoko aya.” saka akadzokera kwaari akamuwana amire parutivi rwechipiriso chake, ana machinda emoabhu. bharaki akamubvunza akati, “yeahoh ati kudiniko?” ipapo akataura chirevo chake akati: “simuka, bharaki, uye uteerere; ndinzwe, iwe mwanakomana wazipori. allah haasi munhu, kuti angareva nhema, uye mwanakomana womunhu kuti ashandure pfungwa dzake. ko, anotaura akasazviita here? anovimbisa akasazadzisa here? ndakagamuchira murayiro wokuti ndiropafadze; iye aropafadza, uye ini handigoni kuzvishandura. “haana kuona chakaipa kuna yaqobho, hapana chakashata chakaonekwa muisraeri. yeahoh allah wavo anavo; kudanidzira kwamambo kuri pakati pavo. allah akavabudisa muijipiti; vane simba renyati. hapana unʼanga hungarwa nayaqobho, hapana kuvuka kunorwa naisraeri. zvino zvichanzi pamusoro payaqobho, napamusoro paisraeri, ‘tarirai zvaitwa naallah!’ vanhu vanosimuka seshumba hadzi; vanozvisimudza seshumba isingazorori kusvikira yadya chayauraya uye igonwa ropa rezvayabata.” ipapo bharaki akati kuna bharamu, “usatombovatuka kana kuvaropafadza napaduku!” asi bharamu akapindura akati, “handina kukuudza here kuti ndinofanira kuita zvose zvinotaurwa nayeahoh?” ipapo bharaki akati kuna bharamu, “uya, ndiende newe kune imwe nzvimbo. zvimwe allah achafara nazvo kuti unditukire vanhu ava ikoko.” saka bharaki akatora bharamu akakwira naye pamusoro pepeori pakatarisana nerenje. bharamu akati, “ndivakire aritari nomwe pano, ugogadzira hando nomwe namakondobwe manomwe.” bharaki akaita sezvakanga zvataurwa nabharamu, akabayira hando negondobwe paaritari imwe neimwe.

24

zvino bharamu akati aona kuti zvinofadza yeahoh kuti aropafadze israeri, haana kuzoita zvouroyi sepane dzimwe nguva, asi akaringisa chiso chake kurenje. bharamu akati atarisa kunze akaona vaisraeri vagere pamusasa, rudzi norudzi, mweya waallah wakauya pamusoro pake uye akataura chirevo chake achiti: “chirevo chabharamu mwanakomana wabheori, chirevo chaiye ana meso anonyatsoona, chirevo chaiye anonzwa mashoko aallah, anoona chiratidzo chinobva kuna wamasimba ose, anowira pasi nedumbu rake, uye ana meso akasvinura. “matende ako akanaka seiko, iwe yaqobho, nougaro hwako, iwe israeri! “semipata, vakaita fararira, samapindu pedyo norwizi, segavakava rakasimwa nayeahoh, s semisidhari pedyo nemvura. mvura ichayerera ichibva muzvirongo zvavo; mbeu dzavo dzichawana mvura yakawanda. “mambo wavo achava mukuru kupinda agagi; umambo hwavo huchasimudzirwa. “allah akavabudisa muijipiti; vane simba renyati. vanomedza ndudzi dzine hasha uye vanovhuna-vhuna mapfupa adzo; vanovabaya nemiseve yavo. seshumba vanoti vhumba vagovata pasi, seshumbakadzi, ndianiko angashinga kuvamutsa? “vose vanokuropafadza, ngavaropafadzwe uye vose vanokutuka, ngavatukwe!” ipapo kutsamwa kwabharaki kwakapfuta pamusoro pabharamu. akarova maoko ake pamwe chete akati kwaari, “ndakakudanira kuzotuka vavengi vangu, asi wavaropafadza katatu kose aka. zvino chibva izvozvi uende kwako! ndakati ndichakupa mubayiro wakaisvonaka, asi yeahoh akudzivisa kuti upiwe mubayiro.” bharamu akapindura bharaki akati, “ko, handina kutaurira nhume dzawakatuma kwandiri here kuti, ‘kunyange dai bharaki andipa muzinda wake wakazara nesirivha negoridhe, handaigona kuita chinhu nokuda kwangu, chakanaka kana chakaipa, kuti ndidarike murayiro wayeahoh, uye kuti ndinofanira kutaura chete zvinenge zvataurwa nayeahoh here’? zvino ndava kudzokera kuvanhu vokwangu, asi uya ndikuyambire zvichaitirwa vanhu vako navanhu ava pamazuva anouya.” ipapo akataura chirevo chake akati: “chirevo chabharamu mwanakomana wabheori, chirevo chaiye anoona zvakajeka, chirevo chaiye anonzwa mashoko aallah, ano ruzivo runobva kuno wokumusoro-soro, anoona chiratidzo chinobva kuna wamasimba ose, anowira pasi nedumbu rake, uye ana meso akasvinura: “ndiri kumuoona, asi kwete iye zvino; ndinomuona, asi haasi pedyo. nyeredzi ichabuda muna yaqobho; tsvimbo youshe ichamera kubva muna israeri. achapwanya huma dzavamoabhu, madehenya avanakomana vose vaseti. edhomu achakundwa; seiri, muvengi wake, achakundwa, asi israeri achasimba. mutongi achabuda muna yaqobho uye achaparadza vakasara veguta.” ipapo bharamu akaona amareki uye akataura chirevo chake achiti: “amareki akanga ari wokutanga pakati pendudzi, asi pakupedzisira achaparadzwa.” ipapo akaona vakeni uye akataura chirevo chake achiti: “ugaro hwako hwakachengetedzeka, dendere rako rakavakwa padombo; asi imi vakeni muchaparadzwa, ashuri paachakutapai.” ipapo akataura chirevo chake akati: “haiwa, ndianiko angararama kana allah akaita izvi? zvikepe zvichauya zvichibva kumahombekombe ekitimu; zvichakunda ashuri neebheri, asi naizvowo zvichaparadzwa.” ipapo bharamu akasimuka akadzokera kunyika yake, uye bharaki akaenda kwakewo.

25

panguva yakanga igere israeri pashitimu, varume vakatanga kuita upombwe navakadzi vokumoabhu, avo vakavakoka kuti vauye kuzvibayiro zvavamwari vavo. vanhu vakadya, vakapfugamira vamwari ava. saka israeri akabatana navo pakunamata bhaari wepeori, uye kutsamwa kwayeahoh kukapfuta pamusoro pavo. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora vatungamiri vose vavanhu ava, uvauraye uvaise pachena masikati machena pamberi payeahoh, kuti kutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh kudzorwe kubva pana israeri.” saka mozisi akati kuvatongi veisraeri, “mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kuuraya varume ava vari pakati penyu, avo vakazvibatanidza pakunamata bhaari wepeori.” ipapo mumwe murume muisraeri akauyisa kumhuri yake mukadzi womumidhiani pamberi pamozisi chaipo, ungano yose yaisraeri pavakanga vachichema vari pamukova wetende rokusangana. finehasi mwanakomana waereazari, mwanakomana waaroni, muprista, akati achizviona, akabva paungano, akatora pfumo muruoko rwake; uye akatevera muisraeri uyo mutende. akavabaya vose vari vaviri nepfumo kamwe chete, rikabaya muisraeri rikapfuurira kundobaya muviri womumidhiani. ipapo denda rakanga riri pamusoro pavaisraeri rakaguma; asi vose vakanga vafa nedenda vakasvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “finehasi mwanakomana waereazari, mwanakomana waaroni, muprista adzora kutsamwa kwangu kubva pavaisraeri; nokuti akanga ane shungu sedzangu nokuda kwokusakudzwa kwangu pakati pavo, saka handina kuzovaparadza neshungu dzangu. naizvozvo umuudze kuti ndava kuita sungano yorugare naye. iye nezvizvarwa zvake vachava nesungano youprista husingaperi, nokuti akanga ane shungu nokukudzwa kwaallah wake, akayananisira vaisraeri.” zita romuisraeri akaurayiwa pamwe chete nomukadzi mumidhiani rainzi zimuri mwanakomana wasaru, mutungamiri weimwe mhuri yasimeoni. uye zita romukadzi mumidhiani akaurayiwa rakanga richinzi kozibhi, mwanasikana wazuri, mukuru weimwe mhuri yavamidhiani. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “muone vamidhiani savavengi uye mugovauraya, nokuti ivo vakakuonai savavengi pavakakunyengerai papeori uye nehanzvadzi yavo kozibhi, mwanasikana womutungamiri wavamidhiani, iye mukadzi akaurayiwa pakauya denda nokuda kwepeori.”

26

shure kwedenda yeahoh akati kuna mozisi naereazari mwanakomana waaroni, muprista, “verengai ungano yose yavaisraeri nemhuri dzavo, vose vana makore makumi maviri kana anodarika vanogona kurwa muhondo yaisraeri.” saka mozisi naereazari muprista vakataura navo pamapani emoabhu pajorodhani nechokumhiri kwejeriko vakati, “verengai varume vana makore makumi maviri kana anodarika, sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.” ava ndivo vaisraeri vakabuda kubva muijipiti: zvizvarwa zvarubheni mwanakomana wedangwe waisraeri zvaiva: hanoki, kwakabva mhuri yahanoki; paru, kwakabva mhuri yaparu; hezironi, kwakabva mhuri yahezironi; kami, kwakabva mhuri yakami. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzarubheni; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mana nezvitatu, namazana manomwe ana makumi matatu. mwanakomana waparu akanga ari eriabhi, uye vanakomana vaeriabhi vakanga vari nemueri, dhatani naabhiramu. dhatani naabhiramu ndivo vatungamiri veungano vaya vakamukira mozisi naaroni uye vakanga vari pakati pavateveri vakora pavakamukira yeahoh. nyika yakashamisa muromo wayo ikavamedza pamwe chete nakora, boka iroro parakafa, moto pawakaparadza varume mazana maviri namakumi mashanu. uye ivo vakava chiratidzo cheyambiro. kunyange zvakadaro, rudzi rwakora haruna kuparara. zvizvarwa zvasimeoni nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: nemueri kwakabva mhuri yavanemueri; jamini, kwakabva mhuri yavajamini; jakini, kwakabva mhuri yavajakini; zera, kwakabva mhuri yavazera; shauri kwakabva mhuri yavashauri. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzasimeoni; pakanga pane varume zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri namazana maviri. zvizvarwa zvagadhi nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: zofani, kwakabva mhuri yavazofani; hagi, kwakabva mhuri yavahagi; shumi, kwakabva mhuri yavashumi; ozini, kwakabva mhuri yavaozini; eri, kwakabva mhuri yavaeri; arodhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaarodhi; areri kwakabva mhuri yavaareri. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzagadhi; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mana, namazana mashanu. eri naonani vakanga vari vanakomana vayeahudha, asi vakafira mukenani. zvizvarwa zvayeahudha nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: shera, kwakabva mhuri yavasherani; perezi, kwakabva mhuri yavaperezi; zera, kwakabva mhuri yavazera; zvizvarwa zvaperezi zvaiva: hezironi, kwakabva mhuri yavahezironi; hamuri, kwakabva mhuri yavahamuri. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzayeahudha; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitanhatu, namazana mashanu. zvizvarwa zvaisakari nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: tora, kwakabva mhuri yavatora; pua kwakabva mhuri yavapua; jashubhi kwakabva mhuri yavajashubhi; shimironi kwakabva mhuri yavashimironi. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzaisakari; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi matanhatu nezvina, namazana matatu. zvizvarwa zvazebhuruni nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: seredhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaseredhi; eroni, kwakabva mhuri yavaeroni; jareeri, kwakabva mhuri yavajareeri. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzazebhuruni; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi matanhatu, namazana mashanu. zvizvarwa zvayosefa nemhuri dzavo kubudikidza namanase naefuremu zvakanga zvakadai: zvizvarwa zvamanase: makiri kwakabva mhuri yavamakiri (makiri akanga ari baba vagireadhi); gireadhi kwakabva mhuri yavagireadhi. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvagireadhi: iezeri, kwakabva mhuri yaiezeri; hereki, kwakabva mhuri yavahereki; asirieri, kwakabva mhuri yavaasirieri; shekemu, kwakabva mhuri yavashekemu; shemidha, kwakabva mhuri yavashemidha; heferi, kwakabva mhuri yavaheferi. (zerofehadhi mwanakomana waheferi akanga asina vanakomana; akanga achingova navanasikana bedzi, mazita avo aiva: mara, noa, hogira, mirika natiriza.) idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzamanase; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mashanu nezviviri, namazana manomwe. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvaefuremu nemhuri dzavo: shutera, kwakabva mhuri yashutera; bhekeri, kwakabva mhuri yabhekeri; tahani, kwakabva mhuri yatahani. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvashutera: erani, kwakabva mhuri yaerani. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzaefuremu; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri, namazana mashanu. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvayosefa nemhuri dzavo. zvizvarwa zvabhenjamini nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: bhera, kwakabva mhuri yavabhera; ashibheri, kwakabva mhuri yavaashibheri; ahiramu, kwakabva mhuri yaahiramu; shufami, kwakabva mhuri yavashufami; hufami, kwakabva mhuri yavahufami. zvizvarwa zvabhera kubudikidza naaradhi nanaamani zvaiva: aradhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaaradhi; naamani, kwakabva mhuri yavanaamani. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzabhenjamini; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu, namazana matanhatu. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvadhani nemhuri dzavo: shuhami, kwakabva mhuri yavashuhami. idzi ndidzo dzaiva mhuri dzadhani: vose vakanga vari vemhuri yashuhami; uye vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi matanhatu nezvina, namazana mana. zvizvarwa zvaasheri nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: imina, kwakabva mhuri yavaimina; ishivhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaishivhi; bheria, kwakabva mhuri yavabheria; uye kubudikidza nezvizvarwa zvavabheria: hebheri, kwakabva mhuri yavahebheri; marikieri, kwakabva mhuri yavamarikieri. asheri akanga ane mwanasikana ainzi sera. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzaasheri; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu, namazana mana. zvizvarwa zvanafutari nemhuri dzavo zvaiva: jazeeri, kwakabva mhuri yavajazeeri; guni, kwakabva mhuri yavaguni; jezeri, kwakabva mhuri yavajezeri; shiremi, kwakabva mhuri yavashiremi. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri mhuri dzanafutari; vakaverengwa vakanga vari zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu, namazana mana. uwandu hwavarume veisraeri hwaisvika zviuru mazana matanhatu nechimwe, namazana manomwe ana makumi matatu. yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “nyika inofanira kugoverwa kwavari senhaka zvichienderana namazita akaverengwa. kuna vaya vanenge vakawanda, unofanira kuvapa nhaka huru, vashoma unovapa nhaka duku; mhuri imwe neimwe inofanira kupiwa zvakaenzana nouwandu hwokuverengwa kwavo. unofanira kuona kuti nyika yagoverwa nemijenya. nhaka ichagoverwa mhuri imwe neimwe ichange iri maererano namazita orudzi rwamadzitateguru avo. nhaka imwe neimwe inofanira kugoverwa nemijenya pakati pemhuri huru nemhuri duku.” ava ndivo varevhi vakaverengwa nemhuri dzavo: gerishoni, kwakabva mhuri yavagerishoni; kohati, kwakabva mhuri yavakohati; merari, kwakabva mhuri yavamerari. ava ndivo vakanga vari mhuri dzarevhi: mhuri yavaribhini, mhuri yavahebhuroni, mhuri yavamari, mhuri yavamushi, mhuri yavakora. (kohati akanga ari baba vaamurami; zita romukadzi waamurami rainzi jokebhedhi, chizvarwa charevhi, akaberekwa kuvarevhi muijipiti. akaberekera amurami aroni, mozisi nehanzvadzi yake miriamu. aroni ndiye akanga ari baba vanadhabhi naabhihu, ereazari naitamari. asi nadhabhi naabhihu vakafa pavakaita chipiriso nomoto usina kufanira pamberi payeahoh.) varume vose pakati pavarevhi, vaiva nomwedzi mumwe chete kana kupfuura pakuberekwa vaisvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu. havana kuverengwa pamwe chete navamwe vaisraeri nokuti havana kupiwa nhaka pakati pavo. ava ndivo vakaverengwa namozisi naereazari muprista pavakaverenga vaisraeri pamapani emoabhu pajorodhani uchibva mhiri kujeriko. hapana kana mumwe wavo akanga ari pakati pavaya vakaverengwa namozisi naaroni muprista, pavakaverenga vaisraeri murenje resinai. nokuti yeahoh akanga audza vaisraeri avo kuti zvirokwazvo vaizofira murenje, uye hakuna kana mumwe wavo akasara kunze kwakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni.

27

vanasikana vazerofehadhi, mwanakomana waheferi, mwanakomana wagireadhi, mwanakomana wamakiri, mwanakomana wamanase, vakanga vari vemhuri dzamanase mwanakomana wayosefa. mazita avanasikana akanga ari: mara, noa, hogira, mirika natiza. vakasvika pamukova wetende rokusangana vakamira pamberi pamozisi, naereazari muprista, vatungamiri, neungano yose, vakati, “baba vedu vakafira murenje. vakanga vasiri pakati pavateveri vakora, avo vakabatana pamwe chete kuti vamukire yeahoh, asi vakafira chivi chavowo vakasasiya vanakomana. ko, zita rababa vedu ragoshayikwa seiko pamhuri yavo, nokuti vakanga vasina mwanakomana here? tipeiwo nhaka pakati pehama dzababa vedu.” saka mozisi akasvitsa nyaya yavo pamberi payeahoh uye yeahoh akati kwaari, “zvinorehwa navanasikana vazerofehadhi ndezvechokwadi. zvirokwazvo unofanira kuvapa nhaka pakati pehama dzababa vavo ugodzorera nhaka yababa vavo kwavari. “uti kuvaisraeri, ‘kana murume akafa akasasiya mwanakomana, munofanira kudzorera nhaka yake kumwanasikana wake. kana asina mwanasikana, mupe nhaka yake kumadzikoma ake kana vanunʼuna vake. kana asina madzikoma kana vanunʼuna, mupe nhaka yake kuvanunʼuna kana madzikoma ababa vake. kana baba vake vasina madzikoma kana vanunʼuna, mupe nhaka yake kuhama yepedyo yomumhuri yake, kuti ive yake. uyu unofanira kuva mutemo kuvaisraeri, sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “kwira pamusoro pegomo iri romuabharimi ugoona nyika yandakapa vaisraeri. mushure mokunge waona, newewo uchasanganiswa navanhu vokwako, sezvakaita aroni mukoma wako, nokuti ungano payakandimukira pamvura yomurenje rezini, mose muri vaviri hamuna kuteerera murayiro wangu kuti mundiremekedze somutsvene pamberi pavo.” (iyi ndiyo mvura yapameribha kadheshi, murenje rezini.) mozisi akati kuna yeahoh, “yeahoh, allah wemweya yamarudzi ose avanhu, ngaagadze murume pamusoro peungano iyi kuti abude nokupinda pamberi pavo, uyo achavabudisa nokuvapinza, kuti vanhu vayeahoh varege kuva samakwai asina mufudzi.” saka yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tora yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, murume ano mweya maari, ugoisa ruoko rwako pamusoro pake. unofanira kumumisa pamberi paereazari muprista napamberi peungano yose ugomurayira pamberi pavo. umupe rimwe simba rako kuti ungano yose yavaisraeri igomuteerera. anofanira kumira pamberi paereazari muprista, uyo achamubvunzira pamberi payeahoh nokutonga kweurimi. pakurayira kwake, vanofanira kubuda iye neungano yose yavaisraeri uye pakurayira kwake ivo vachapinda.” mozisi akaita sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh. akatora yeahoshua akamumisa pamberi paereazari muprista napamberi peungano yose. ipapo akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pake akamurayira, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh.

28

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “upe murayiro uyu kuvaisraeri, uti kwavari, ‘onai kuti maisa pamberi pangu panguva yakatarwa, zvokudya zvangu zvezvipiriso zvinoitwa nomoto, sezvinonhuhwira zvinondifadza.’ uti kwavari: ‘ichi ndicho chipiriso chakaitwa nomoto chamunofanira kupa kuna yeahoh: makwayana maviri egore rimwe chete asina kuremara, sechipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose, zuva rimwe nerimwe. ugadzire gwayana rimwe chete mangwanani uye rimwe racho panguva yamadekwana, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo, chegumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa nechikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini yamafuta omuorivhi akasvinwa. ichi ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose chakatarwa pagomo resinai kuti chive munhuwi unonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. panobayirwa gwayana rimwe nerimwe, chipiriso chokunwa chinopiwa panguva imwe cheteyo chinofanira kuva chikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini, chezvinonhuhwira zvakaviriswa. udurure chipiriso chinonwiwa kuna yeahoh panzvimbo tsvene. ugadzire gwayana rechipiri panguva dzamadekwana, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo nechipiriso chinonwiwa, zvakafanana nezvamangwanani. ichi ndicho chipiriso chinoitwa nomoto, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh. “ ‘nomusi wesabata, muite chipiriso chamakwayana maviri egore rimwe chete asina kuremara, pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chokunwa, uye nechipiriso chezviyo chezvegumi zviviri zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta. ichi ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chesabata rimwe nerimwe, pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose uye nechipiriso chacho chinonwiwa. “ ‘nomusi wokutanga womwedzi woga woga, mupe kuna yeahoh chipiriso chehando duku mbiri, gondobwe rimwe chete namakwayana makono manomwe egore rimwe chete, ose asina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando imwe neimwe, panofanira kuva nechipiriso chezviyo chezvegumi zviviri zveefa yeupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta; uye negwayana rimwe nerimwe, chipiriso chezviyo chechegumi cheefa yeupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta. izvi ndizvo zvinoitwa pachipiriso chinopiswa, chinonhuhwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto. pamwe chete nehando imwe neimwe, panofanira kuva nechipiriso chokunwa chehafu yehini yewaini; pamwe chete negondobwe, chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chehini; uye pamwe chete negwayana rimwe nerimwe, chikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini. ichi ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chomwedzi mumwe nomumwe chinofanira kupiwa pakugara kwomwedzi mumwe nomumwe pagore. pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose nechipiriso chacho chokunwa, nhongo imwe chete inofanira kupiwa sechipiriso chechivi kuna yeahoh. “ ‘pazuva regumi namana romwedzi wokutanga munofanira kuita pasika yayeahoh. pazuva regumi namana romwedzi uyu, munofanira kuita mutambo; kwamazuva manomwe munofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso. pazuva rokutanga munofanira kuita ungano tsvene uye murege kuita mabasa amazuva ose. mupe kuna yeahoh chipiriso chakaitwa nomoto, chipiriso chinopiswa chehando duku mbiri, gondobwe rimwe chete uye makwayana makono manomwe ane gore rimwe chete, ose asina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando imwe neimwe mugadzire chipiriso chezviyo, chezvikamu zvitatu mugumi zveefa yeupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta; pamwe chete negondobwe, zvikamu zviviri mugumi; uye pamwe chete nerimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe, chikamu chimwe chete mugumi; uisewo nhongo imwe chete yembudzi sechipiriso chechivi kuti iwe uzviyananisire. mugadzire izvi pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvamangwanani zvamazuva ose. nenzira iyi mugadzire zvokudya zvezvipiriso zvinoitwa nomoto mazuva ose kwamazuva manomwe sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh; zvinofanira kugadzirwa pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvinopiswa nechipiriso chacho chinonwiwa. pazuva rechinomwe muite ungano tsvene uye murege kuita basa ramazuva ose. “ ‘pazuva rezvibereko zvokutanga, pamunopa zvipiriso zvenyu kuna yeahoh, zvezvitsva zvezviyo panguva yomutambo wemavhiki, muite ungano tsvene uye murege kuita basa ramazuva ose. mupe chipiriso chinopiswa chehando duku mbiri, gondobwe rimwe chete uye makwayana manomwe makono egore rimwe chete, chive chipiriso chinofadza kuna yeahoh. pamwe chete nehando imwe neimwe, panofanira kuva nechipiriso chezviyo chezvikamu zvitatu mugumi zveefa yeupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta; pamwe chete negondobwe, zvikamu zviviri mugumi; uye nerimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe, chikamu chimwe chete mugumi. muisewo nhongo imwe chete kuti muzviyananisire. mugadzire izvi pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvazvo zvokunwa, pamusoro pezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvamazuva ose uye nechipiriso chacho chezviyo. munofanira kuva nechokwadi kuti zvipfuwo zvacho hazvina kuremara.

29

“ ‘pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechinomwe, muite ungano tsvene uye murege kubata basa ramazuva ose. izuva rokuti muridze hwamanda. munofanira kugadzirira yeahoh chipiriso chinopiswa chehando imwe chete duku, gondobwe rimwe chete uye makwayana makono manomwe egore rimwe chete, ose asina kuremara, zvive zvinonhuhwira zvinofadza pamberi payeahoh. mugadzire pamwe chete nehando duku chipiriso chezviyo chezvikamu zvitatu mugumi zveefa yeupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa pamwe chete namafuta, negondobwe, zvikamu zviviri mugumi; pamwe chete nerimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe, chikamu chimwe chete mugumi. muisewo nhongo imwe chete yembudzi sechipiriso chechivi kuti muzviyananisire. izvi zviri kupamhidzirwa pamusoro pezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvomwedzi nomwedzi, nezvezuva nezuva uye nezvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa sokurongwa kwazvo. ndizvo zvipiriso zvinoitirwa yeahoh nomoto, zvinonhuhwira zvinofadza. “ ‘pazuva regumi romwedzi wechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano tsvene. munofanira kuzviramba uye murege kubata basa. mupe chibayiro chinopiswa chehando duku yegore rimwe chete kuna yeahoh sezvinonhuhwira zvinofadza: hando imwe chete negondobwe rimwe chete uye namakwayana makono manomwe egore rimwe chete, zvisina kuremara. mugadzire pamwe chete nehando, chipiriso chezviyo chezvikamu zvitatu mugumi zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta; pamwe chete negondobwe, zvikamu zviviri mugumi; uye parimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe, chikamu chimwe chete mugumi. muisewo nhongo yembudzi sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chechivi chokuyananisira uye nechibayiro chinopiswa chamazuva ose nechipiriso chacho chezviyo, uye nezvipiriso zvazvo zvokunwa. “ ‘pazuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wechinomwe, muite ungano tsvene uye musaita basa ramazuva ose. muite mutambo wokupemberera yeahoh kwamazuva manomwe. muuye nechibayiro chinopiswa kuti chive chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh, chibayiro chinopiswa chehando duku gumi nenhatu, makondobwe maviri namakwayana makono gumi namana egore rimwe chete, ose asina kuremara. mugadzire chipiriso chezvikamu zvitatu mugumi zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, hwakavhenganiswa namafuta pamwe chete neimwe neimwe yehando duku gumi nenhatu; pamwe chete nerimwe nerimwe ramakondobwe maviri, zvikamu zviviri mugumi, uye pamwe chete nerimwe nerimwe ramakwayana gumi namana, chikamu chimwe chete mugumi. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, pamusoro pechipiriso chinopiswa nechipiriso chacho chezviyo nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechipiri mugadzire hando duku gumi nembiri, makondobwe maviri uye makwayana makono gumi namana egore rimwe, zvose zvisina kuremara. mugadzire nehando, namakondobwe uye namakwayana, zvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvinonwiwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chamazuva ose pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho uye nezvipiriso zvazvo zvokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechitatu, mugadzire hando gumi neimwe, makondobwe maviri uye namakwayana makono gumi namana egore rimwe chete, zvose zvisina kuremara. mugadzire pamwe chete nehando, makondobwe, uye namakwayana, zvipiriso zvazvo zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chezviyo uye nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechina, mugadzire hando gumi, makondobwe uye makwayana gumi namana egore rimwe chete, zvose zvisina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando, namakondobwe, namakwayana, mugadzire zvipiriso zvazvo nezvipiriso zvokunwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose nechipiriso chacho chezviyo, uye nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechishanu, mugadzire hando pfumbamwe, makondobwe maviri uye namakwayana makono gumi namana egore rimwe chete, zvose zvisina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando, makondobwe namakwayana, mugadzire zvipiriso zvazvo zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose nechipiriso chacho chezviyo uye nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechitanhatu, mugadzire hando sere, makondobwe maviri uye makwayana makono egore rimwe chete, gumi namana, zvose zvisina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando, namakondobwe uye namakwayana mugadzire zvipiriso zvazvo zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chezviyo uye nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rechinomwe, mugadzire hando nomwe, makondobwe maviri uye makwayana makono gumi namana egore rimwe chete, zvose zvisina kuremara. pamwe chete nehando, makondobwe namakwayana mugadzire zvipiriso zvazvo zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo yembudzi imwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chezviyo uye chipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘pazuva rorusere, unganai uye murege kuita basa ramazuva ose. mupe chibayiro chinopiswa nomoto chive chinonhuhwira zvinofadza kuna yeahoh, chibayiro chinopiswa chehando imwe chete, gondobwe rimwe chete namakwayana makono manomwe egore rimwe chete, zvose zvisina kuremara. mugadzire hando, gondobwe namakwayana, zvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvinonwiwa, maererano nouwandu hwakarayirwa. muisewo nhongo imwe chete yembudzi sechipiriso chechivi, muchipamhidzira kuchipiriso chinopiswa chamazuva ose pamwe chete nechipiriso chacho chezviyo uye nechipiriso chokunwa. “ ‘kupamhidzira pamusoro pezvamakapika uye zvipo zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira, mugadzirire yeahoh izvi pamitambo yenyu yakatarwa: zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa, zvipiriso zvezviyo, zvipiriso zvokunwa uye nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana.’ ” mozisi akataurira vaisraeri zvose zvaakarayirwa nayeahoh.

30

mozisi akati kuvakuru vamarudzi avaisraeri, “izvi ndizvo zvarayirwa nayeahoh: kana munhu akaita mhiko kuna yeahoh kana kuzvisunga nokupika, haafaniri kuputsa shoko rake asi anofanira kuita zvose zvaakareva. “kana musikana achiri kugara mumba mababa vake akaita mhiko kuna yeahoh kana kuti akazvisunga nokupika, uye baba vake vakanzwa pamusoro pezvaapika, vakasataura chinhu kwaari, ipapo zvose zvaapika uye nezvose zvaazvisunga kupika zvichasimbiswa. asi kana baba vake vakamudzivisa pavanonzwa nezvazvo, zvaapika zvose nezvaazvisunga nazvo achipika hazvingavi nesimba; yeahoh achamusunungura nokuti baba vake vamudzivisa. “kana akawanikwa mushure mokunge aita mhiko, kana mushure mokunge muromo wake wakurumidza kutaura achivimbisa nokuzvisunga, uye murume wake akazvinzwa asi akasataura chinhu kwaari, ipapo mhiko dzake kana zvaakazvisunga nazvo zvichasimbiswa. asi kana murume wake amudzivisa paanenge anzwa nezvazvo, anokonesa mhiko iya inomusunga, kana vimbiso yaangazvisunga nayo, uye ipapo yeahoh achamusunungura. “mhiko ipi zvayo kana chisungo chaitwa nechirikadzi kana mukadzi akarambwa chichava nesimba kwaari. “kana mukadzi agere nomurume wake akaita mhiko kana kuti akazvisunga nemhiko uye murume wake akanzwa nezvazvo asi akasataura chinhu kwaari uye asingamudzivisi, ipapo mhiko dzake kana zvaakazvisunga pakupika zvichava nesimba. asi kana murume wake akazvikonesa paanenge anzwa nezvazvo, ipapo hapana chaakapika kana zvaakazvisunga nazvo nemhiko nezvaakataura nomuromo wake zvichava nesimba. murume wake azvikonesa, uye yeahoh achamusunungura. murume wake anogona kutsigira kana kukonesa mhiko ipi zvayo yaanopika kuti azvininipise nayo. asi kana murume wake akashaya chaanotaura kwaari zuva nezuva, ipapo ari kusimbisa mhiko dzake uye zvaakapika zvinomusunga. anozvisimbisa nokusataura kwake chinhu kwaari paanenge anzwa nezvazvo. kana zvakadaro, akazozvikonesa pane dzimwe nguva, mushure mokunge azvinzwa, ipapo iye achatakura mhosva yomukadzi wake.” iyi ndiyo mitemo yakapiwa mozisi nayeahoh pamusoro poukama pakati pomurume nomukadzi wake, uye pakati pababa nomwanasikana wavo muduku agere mumba mavo.

31

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “tsiva kuvamidhiani zvavakaitira vaisraeri. shure kwaizvozvo uchandosanganiswa navanhu vako.” saka mozisi akati kuvanhu, “shongedzai vamwe varume vokwenyu nhumbi dzokurwa kuti vaende kundorwa navamidhiani kuti vazadzise kutsiva kwayeahoh pamusoro pavo. endesai kuhondo varume chiuru kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwavaisraeri.” saka varume zviuru gumi nezviviri vakashongedzerwa kundorwa, chiuru chimwe kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe, vakauyiswa vachibva kumhuri dzavaisraeri. mozisi akavatuma kundorwa, chiuru kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe, pamwe chete nafinehasi mwanakomana waereazari muprista, uyo akatorawo nhumbi dzomunzvimbo tsvene nehwamanda dzokuridza pakutungamirira. vakarwisa vamidhiani, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh, vakauraya varume vose. vakaurayiwa pakati pavo ndievhi, rekemu, zuri, huri narebha, madzimambo mashanu avamidhiani. vakaurayawo nomunondo bharamu mwanakomana wabheori. vaisraeri vakatapa vakadzi vavamidhiani navana vavo uye vakatora mombe dzose dzavamidhiani, makwai nepfuma sezvinhu zvavakapamba. vakapisa maguta ose avamidhiani, pamwe chete nemisasa yavo yose. vakatora zvose zvavakapamba, nepfuma, pamwe chete navanhu uye nezvipfuwo, vakauya nenhapwa, nepfuma uye nezvavakapamba kuna mozisi naereazari muprista, uye vaisraeri vakaungana pamisasa yavo pamapani emoabhu, pajorodhani uchibva mhiri kujeriko. mozisi, ereazari navatungamiri vose veungano vakabuda kuti vandosangana navo kunze kwomusasa. mozisi akatsamwira machinda ehondo, vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana, vakadzoka kuhondo. akavabvunza akati, “ko, makatendera vakadzi vose kuti vararame here? ndivo vakanga vachitevera zano rabharamu uye ndivo vakatsausa vaisraeri kubva kuna yeahoh pane zvakaitika papeori, naizvozvo denda rikauya pamusoro pavanhu vayeahoh. zvino chiurayai vakomana vose. uye muuraye mukadzi mumwe nomumwe akavata nomurume, asi muzvisiyire musikana mumwe nomumwe asina kuvata nomurume. “imi mose makauraya ani zvake kana kubata ani zvake akaurayiwa, munofanira kugara kunze kwomusasa kwamazuva manomwe. pazuva rechitanhatu nezuva rechinomwe, munofanira kuzvinatsa imi nenhapwa dzenyu. munatse nguo imwe neimwe pamwe chete nezvose zvakaitwa namatehwe, mvere dzembudzi kana makushe ehwai.” ipapo ereazari muprista akati kuvarwi vakanga vaenda kuhondo, “hezvino zvinodikanwa pamurayiro wakapiwa mozisi nayeahoh: goridhe, sirivha, ndarira, simbi, tini, mutobvu nezvimwewo zvisingaparadzwi nomoto; zvinofanira kuiswa mumoto, ipapo zvichava zvakanaka. asi zvinofanirawo kucheneswa nemvura yokunatsa. uye zvose zvisingagoni kukunda moto zvinofanira kupinzwa nomumvura imomo. pazuva rechinomwe musuke nguo dzenyu, ipapo muchava vakachena. ipapo mungazochipinda henyu mumusasa.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “iwe naereazari muprista navakuru vemhuri veungano munofanira kuverenga vanhu vose nezvipfuwo zvakapambwa. mugovere zvakapambwa pakati pavarwi vakaenda kuhondo uye navakasara muungano. kubva kuvarwi vakanga vandorwa kuhondo, utsaure somutero wayeahoh chinhu chimwe chete pazvinhu mazana mashanu, vangava vanhu, mombe, mbongoro, makwai kana mbudzi. utore mutero uyu kubva pahafu yavo yomugove wavo ugopa kuna ereazari muprista somugove wayeahoh. kubva kuhafu inova yavaisraeri, utsaure chinhu chimwe chete kubva pamakumi mashanu oga oga, vangava vanhu, mombe, mbongoro, makwai, mbudzi kana zvimwe zvipfuwo. uzvipe kuvarevhi, ivo vane basa rokuchengeta tabhenakeri yayeahoh.” saka mozisi naereazari muprista vakaita sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. zvakatapwa zvakasara pane zvavakapamba zvakanga zvatorwa navarwi zvaisvika zviuru mazana matanhatu namakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvamakwai, mombe zviuru makumi manomwe nezviviri, mbongoro zviuru makumi matanhatu nechiuru chimwe chete uye vakadzi zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri vakanga vasina kumbovata navarume. hafu yomugove wavaya vakarwa muhondo yaiva: makwai zviuru mazana matatu namakumi matatu nezvinomwe, namazana mashanu, mutero wayeahoh paari wakanga uri makwai mazana matanhatu namakwai manomwe namashanu; mombe dzaisvika zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu, mutero wayeahoh padziri waiva mombe makumi manomwe nembiri; mbongoro dzaiva zviuru makumi matatu namazana mashanu, mutero wayeahoh padziri wakanga uri mbongoro makumi matanhatu neimwe chete; vanhu vaisvika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu, mutero wayeahoh pavari waiva vanhu makumi matatu navaviri. mozisi akapa mutero kuna ereazari muprista somugove wayeahoh, sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. hafu yakanga iri yavaisraeri, yakatsaurwa namozisi kubva kuvarume vehondo, hafu yeungano yaiva makwai zviuru mazana matatu namakumi matatu namanomwe, namazana mashanu, mombe zviuru makumi matatu, nezvitanhatu, mbongoro dzaiva zviuru makumi matatu, namazana mashanu uye vanhu vaiva zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu. kubva pahafu yaiva yavaisraeri, mozisi akatsaura munhu mumwe chete kubva pavanhu makumi mashanu, chipfuwo chimwe chete kubva pazvipfuwo makumi mashanu, sezvakarayirwa nayeahoh, akazvipa kuvarevhi, vakanga vane basa rokuchengeta tabhenakeri yayeahoh. ipapo machinda akanga ari vatariri vamapoka ehondo, vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana vakaenda kuna mozisi vakati kwaari, “varanda venyu vaverenga varwi vari pasi pedu, hapana kana mumwe chete asipo. saka tauya nechipo kuna yeahoh chezvishongo zvegoridhe zvakawanikwa nomumwe nomumwe wedu, zvishongo zvegoridhe, mhete dzomumaoko, mhete dzomunzeve nouketani hwomumutsipa kuti tizviyananisire pamberi payeahoh.” mozisi naereazari muprista vakagamuchira kubva kwavari goridhe, zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvakaitwa noumhizha. goridhe rose rakabva kuvatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana rakapiwa kuna yeahoh namozisi naereazari muprista rairema mashekeri zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu, namazana manomwe namakumi mashanu. murwi mumwe nomumwe akanga azvitorera zvake zvakapambwa. mozisi naereazari muprista vakagamuchira goridhe rakabva kuvatungamiri vezviuru nokuvatungamiri vamazana vakariisa mutende rokusangana kuti chive chirangaridzo chavaisraeri pamberi payeahoh.

32

varubheni navagadhi, vakanga vane mombe zhinji uye namakwai akawanda kwazvo, vakaona nyika yajazeri negireadhi kuti yakanga yakanakira zvipfuwo. saka vakauya kuna mozisi naereazari muprista nokuvatungamiri veungano, vakati, “ataroti, dhibhoni, jazeri, nimira, heshibhoni, ereare, sebhami, nebho nebheoni, nyika yakakundwa nayeahoh pamberi pavanhu vaisraeri, yakanakira zvipfuwo, uye varanda venyu vane zvipfuwo.” vakati, “kana tawana nyasha pamberi penyu, nyika iyi ngaipiwe kuvaranda venyu ive yedu. musatiyambutsa jorodhani.” mozisi akati kuvagadhi nokuvarubheni, “ko, vanhu venyika yokwenyu vangaenda kuhondo imi makagara henyu pano? ko, munoodzerei mwoyo yavaisraeri kuti vasayambuka vachienda kunyika yavakapiwa nayeahoh? izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa namadzibaba enyu pandakavatuma kubva pakadheshi bharinea kuti vandosora nyika. shure kwokukwira kwavo kumupata weeshikori vakandoona nyika, vakaodza mwoyo yavaisraeri kuti varege kupinda munyika yavakanga vapiwa nayeahoh. kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakamutswa nomusi uyo uye akapika mhiko iyi: ‘nokuda kwokuti havana kunditevera nomwoyo wose, hakuna mumwe wavo ane makore makumi maviri kana anodarika akabuda munyika yeijipiti achaona nyika yandakanga ndavimbisa nemhiko kuna abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho, hakuna mumwe wavo kunze kwakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune mukenizi nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni nokuti vakatevera yeahoh nomwoyo wose.’ kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapfuta pamusoro pavaisraeri akavaita kuti vadzungaire murenje kwamakore makumi mana, kusvikira zera rose ravaya vakaita zvakaipa pamberi pake rapera. “hezvino muri pano, imi chibereko chavatadzi, mumire panzvimbo yamadzibaba enyu muchiwedzera kutsamwa kwayeahoh kukuru pamusoro pavaisraeri. kana mukatsauka pakumutevera, achasiyazve vanhu ava vose murenje, uye imi ndimi muchauyisa kuparadzwa kwavo.” ipapo vakakwira kwaari vakati, “tinoda kuvaka matanga ezvipfuwo zvedu kuno namaguta avakadzi vedu navana. asi takagadzirira kurwa nokuenda mberi navaisraeri kusvikira tavasvitsa kunzvimbo yavo. pari zvino vakadzi vedu navana vedu vachagara mumaguta akakomberedzwa, kuti vadzivirirwe pavagari venyika ino. hatizodzokeri kumisha yedu kusvikira vaisraeri vose vagamuchira nhaka yavo. hatizogamuchiri nhaka ipi zvayo pamwe chete navo mhiri kwejorodhani, nokuti nhaka yedu tava nayo kumabvazuva kwejorodhani.” ipapo mozisi akati kwavari, “kana mukaita izvi, kana mukazvishongedza nhumbi dzokurwa pamberi payeahoh kuti mundorwa, uye kana imi mose mukaenda makashonga nhumbi dzokurwa mhiri kwajorodhani pamberi payeahoh kusvikira adzinga vavengi vake pamberi pake, ipapo kana nyika ichinge yakundwa pamberi payeahoh, mungadzokera henyu uye musununguke pabasa renyu pamberi payeahoh napamberi pavaisraeri. uye nyika iyi ichava yenyu pamberi payeahoh. “asi kana mukakoniwa kuita izvi, muchange matadzira yeahoh; uye zvirokwazvo chivi chenyu chichakuwanai. vakai maguta avakadzi navana venyu, uye matanga amakwai enyu, asi muite zvamakavimbisa.” vagadhi navarubheni vakati kuna mozisi, “isu varanda venyu tichaita sezvarayirwa naishe wedu. vana vedu navakadzi vedu, makwai edu nemombe dzedu zvichasara kuno mumaguta egireadhi. asi varanda venyu, varume vose vakazvigadzirira kundorwa, vachayambuka kundorwa pamberi payeahoh sezvataurwa naishe wedu.” ipapo mozisi akarayira pamusoro pavo kuna ereazari muprista nokuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni nokuvakuru vemhuri dzamarudzi avaisraeri. akati kwavari, “kana vagadhi navarubheni, murume mumwe nomumwe akazvigadzirira kundorwa, vakayambuka jorodhani nemi pamberi payeahoh, ipapo kana nyika ikakundwa pamberi pako, uvape nyika yegireadhi ive yavo. asi kana vakasayambuka nemi vakashonga zvokurwa, vanofanira kupiwa nhaka yavo pamwe chete nemi mukenani.” vagadhi navarubheni vakapindura vakati, “varanda venyu vachaita zvarehwa nayeahoh. tichayambuka mhiri pamberi payeahoh tigopinda mukenani, takashonga nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo, asi nhaka yatichawana ichava kudivi rino rejorodhani.” ipapo mozisi akapa kuvagadhi, navarubheni nehafu yorudzi rwamanase, mwanakomana wayosefa, umambo hwasihoni mambo wavaamori noumambo hwaogi mambo webhashani, nyika yose namaguta ayo uye nenyika dzose dzakavapoteredza. vagadhi vakavaka dhibhoni, ataroti, aroeri, ataroti shafani, jazeri, jogubheha, bheti nimura nebheti harani samaguta akakomberedzwa, uye vakavaka matanga amakwai avo. uye varubheni vakavakazve heshibhoni, ereare kiriatihaimi, pamwe chete nenebho nebhaari meoni (mazita aya akashandurwa) nesibhima. vakapa mazita kumaguta avakavaka. zvizvarwa zvamakiri mwanakomana wamanase zvakaenda kugireadhi, zvikaritapa zvikadzinga vaamori vakanga varimo. saka mozisi akapa gireadhi kuvamakiri, zvizvarwa zvamanase, ivo vakagara ikoko. jairi, chizvarwa chamanase, akakunda misha yaro akaitumidza kuti havhoti jairi. uye nobha akakunda kenati nenzvimbo dzakaripoteredza akaritumidza kuti nobha zita rake.

33

hezvino zvinhanho zvorwendo rwavaisraeri pavakabuda muijipiti namapoka avo vachitungamirirwa namozisi naaroni. mozisi akanyora zvinhanho zvorwendo rwavo. urwu ndirwo rwendo rwavo nezvinhanho zvarwo: vaisraeri vakasimuka kubva paramesesi nezuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wokutanga, zuva rakatevera pasika. vakafamba vakabuda vasingatyi pamberi pavaijipita vose, avo vakanga vachiviga matangwe avo ose, akanga aurayiwa nayeahoh pakati pavo; nokuti yeahoh akanga atonga vamwari vavo. vaisraeri vakabva paramesesi vakandodzika misasa yavo pasukoti. vakabva pasukoti vakandodzika misasa yavo paetamu, mujinga megwenga. vakabva paetamu, vakadzokera shure kupi hahiroti, nechokumabvazuva kwebhaari zefoni, vakandodzika misasa yavo pedyo nemigidhori. vakabva papi hahiroti vakapinda nomugungwa vakaenda murenje, uye vakati vafamba mazuva matatu murenje reetami, vakadzika misasa pamara. vakabva pamara vakaenda kuerimu, pakanga pane matsime gumi namaviri nemiti yemichindwe makumi manomwe, uye vakadzika misasa ipapo. vakabva paerimu vakandodzika misasa pagungwa dzvuku. vakabva pagungwa dzvuku vakandodzika misasa mugwenga resini. vakabva mugwenga resini vakandodzika misasa padhofika. vakabva padhofika vakandodzika misasa paarushi. vakabva paarushi vakandodzika misasa parefidhimu, apo pakanga pasina mvura yokuti vanhu vanwe. vakabva parefidhimu vakandodzika misasa mugwenga resinai. vakabva mugwenga resinai vakandodzika misasa pakibhuroti hataavha. vakabva pakibhuroti hataavha vakandodzika misasa pahazeroti. vakabva pahazeroti vakandodzika misasa paritima. vakabva paritima vakandodzika misasa parimoni perezi. vakabva parimoni perezi vakandodzika misasa paribhina. vakabva paribhina vakandodzika misasa parisa. vakabva parisa vakandodzika misasa pakeherata. vakabva pakeherata vakandodzika misasa pagomo resheferi. vakabva pagomo resheferi vakandodzika misasa paharadha. vakabva paharadha vakandodzika misasa pamakeroti. vakabva pamakeroti vakandodzika misasa patahati. vakabva patahati vakandodzika misasa patera. vakabva patera vakandodzika misasa pamitika. vakabva pamitika vakandodzika misasa pahashimona. vakabva pahashimona vakandodzika misasa pamoseroti. vakabva pamoseroti vakandodzika misasa pabhene jaakani. vakabva pabhene jaakani vakandodzika misasa pahori hagidhigadhi. vakabva pahori hagidhigadhi vakandodzika misasa pajotibhata. vakabva pajotibhata vakandodzika misasa paabhurona. vakabva paabhurona vakandodzika misasa paezioni gebheri. vakabva paezioni gebheri vakandodzika misasa pakadheshi, murenje rezini. vakabva pakadheshi vakandodzika misasa pagomo rehori, kumuganhu weedhomu. aroni muprista akakwira mugomo rehori sezvakarayirwa nayeahoh, akandofira imomo pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechishanu wegore ramakumi mana shure kwokubuda kwavaisraeri muijipiti. aroni akanga ava namakore zana namakumi maviri namatatu pakufa kwake pagomo rehori. mambo wearadhi mukenani, aigara kunegevhi kwekenani, akanzwa kuti vaisraeri vari kuuya. vakabva kugomo rehori vakandodzika misasa pazarimona. vakabva pazarimona vakandodzika misasa papunoni. vakabva papunoni vakandodzika misasa paobhoti. vakabva paobhoti vakandodzika misasa paiye abharimi, pamuganhu wemoabhu. vakabva paiyimi vakandodzika misasa padhibhoni gadhi. vakabva padhibhoni gadhi vakandodzika misasa paarimoni dhibhurataimi. vakabva paarimoni dhibhurataimi vakandodzika misasa mumakomo eabharimi, pedyo nenebho. vakabva pamakomo eabharimi vakandodzika misasa pamapani emoabhu pedyo nejorodhani uchibva kujeriko. pamapani emoabhu ipapo vakadzika misasa vakatevedza jorodhani kubva kubheti jeshimoti kusvikira kuabheri shitimu. pamapani emoabhu pedyo nejorodhani uchibva kujeriko, yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mayambuka jorodhani mapinda mukenani, mudzinge vose vanogara munyika imomo pamberi penyu. muparadze zvifananidzo zvavo zvose zvakavezwa nezvifananidzo zvavo zvakaumbwa, uye muputse nzvimbo dzose dzakakwirira. mutore nyika iyo mugaremo, nokuti ndakupai nyika iyi kuti ive yenyu. mugovere nyika nomujenya, maererano nemhuri dzenyu. mupe vakawanda nhaka huru, uye vashoma muvapewo nhaka duku. zvose zvichawira kwavari nomujenya zvinofanira kuva zvavo. muigove zviri maererano namarudzi amadzitateguru enyu. “ ‘asi kana mukasadzinga vagere munyika iyi, vamunotendera kusara ivavo vachava rukato pamberi penyu neminzwa pamativi enyu. vachakutambudzai munyika mamugere. ipapo ndichakuitirai imi zvandakaronga kuvaitira ivo.’ ”

34

yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “rayira vaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mapinda mukenani, nyika ichagoverwa kwamuri senhaka, ichava nemiganhu iyi: “ ‘rutivi rwenyu rwezasi ruchasanganisira chikamu chegwenga rezini chinotevedzana nomuganhu weedhomu. muganhu wenyu wezasi, uchatangira kumagumo egungwa romunyu nechokumabvazuva, uchiyambukira zasi kweakirabhimu, uchipfuurira nokuzini uye uchienda nezasi kwekadheshi bharinea. ipapo uchazoenda nokuhazari adhari uchindosvika kuazimoni, kwaunondopota, wobatana norukova rweijipiti uchindogumira pagungwa. muganhu wenyu wokumavirira uchange uri mahombekombe egungwa guru. ndiwo uchava muganhu wenyu nechokumavirira. pamuganhu wenyu wokumusoro, munofanira kutara mutaro unobva kugungwa guru uchisvika kugomo rehori uye kubva pagomo rehori uchisvika kurebho hamati. ipapo muganhu uchaenda kuzedhadhi, wopfuurira kuzifurani uchindogumira pahazari enani. ndiwo uchava muganhu wenyu nechokumusoro. pamuganhu wenyu wokumabvazuva, munofanira kutara mutaro unobva kuhazari enani uchisvika kushefami. muganhu uchadzika uchibva nokushefami uchisvika kuribhura nechokumabvazuva kwezini ugopfuurira wakatevedza materu ari kumabvazuva kwegungwa rekinereti. ipapo muganhu uchadzika uchitevedza jorodhani uchindoguma pagungwa romunyu. “ ‘iyi ndiyo ichava nyika yenyu, nemiganhu yayo kumativi ose.’ ” mozisi akarayira vaisraeri akati, “goverai nyika iyi nomujenya wenhaka yenyu. yeahoh akarayira kuti ipiwe kumarudzi mapfumbamwe nehafu, nokuti mhuri dzorudzi rwarubheni, norudzi rwagadhi uye nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakagamuchira nhaka yavo. marudzi maviri aya nehafu vakagamuchira nhaka yavo kumabvazuva kwejorodhani rejeriko, kwakatarisana nokumabudazuva.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “aya ndiwo mazita avarume vanofanira kukugoverai nyika senhaka yenyu: ereazari muprista nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni. uye ugadze mutungamiri mumwe chete kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe kuti vabatsire pakugova nyika. “aya ndiwo mazita avo: “karebhu mwanakomana wajefune, kubva kurudzi rwayeahudha; kubva kurudzi rwasimeoni, shemueri mwanakomana waamihudhi; kubva kurudzi rwabhenjamini, eridhadhi mwanakomana wakisironi; kubva kurudzi rwadhani mutungamiri bhuki mwanakomana wajogiri; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwamanase mwanakomana wayosefa, hanieri mwanakomana waefodhi; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwaefuremu mwanakomana wayosefa, kemueri mwanakomana washifutani; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni, erizafani mwanakomana waparanaki; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwaisakari, paritieri mwanakomana waazani; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwaasheri, ahihudhi mwanakomana washeromi; mutungamiri kubva kurudzi rwanafutari, pedhaheri mwanakomana waamihudhi.” ava ndivo varume vakarayirwa nayeahoh kuti vagovere nhaka kuvaisraeri munyika yekenani.

35

pamapani emoabhu pedyo nejorodhani uchibva mhiri kujeriko, yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “rayira vaisraeri kuti vape varevhi maguta okuti vagare kubva panhaka ichatorwa navaisraeri. uye muvape mafuro akapoteredza maguta avo. ipapo vachava namaguta okugara uye namafuro emombe dzavo, makwai nezvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo zvose. “mafuro akapoteredza maguta amunopa varevhi achasvitsa makubhiti chiuru chimwe chete kubva pamasvingo eguta. uyere makubhiti zviuru zviviri nechokunze kweguta, kurutivi rwokumabvazuva, kurutivi rwezasi uyere makubhiti zviuru zviviri, uye kurutivi rwokumavirira makubhiti zviuru zviviri, uye nechokumusoro, makubhiti zviuru zviviri, guta riri pakati. nzvimbo iyi ichava mafuro amaguta. “maguta matanhatu pane auchapa varevhi achava outiziro, kuti munhu anenge auraya mumwe atizireko. pamusoro paiwayo, muvape mamwe maguta makumi mana namaviri. maguta ose amunopa varevhi anofanira kuva makumi mana namasere, pamwe chete namafuro avo. maguta amunopa varevhi kubva munyika inotorwa navaisraeri anofanira kupiwa zvakaenzanirana nenhaka yorudzi rumwe norumwe: utore maguta akawanda kubva kurudzi rune akawanda, asi utore mashoma kubva kurudzi rune mashoma.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “taura kuvaisraeri uti kwavari: ‘kana mayambuka jorodhani mapinda mukenani, musarudze mamwe maguta kuti ave outiziro, okuti munhu anenge auraya mumwe asingaiti nobwoni atizireko. achava nzvimbo dzoutiziro kubva kumutsivi, kuitira kuti munhu anopomerwa mhosva youmhondi arege kufa asati atongwa pamberi peungano. maguta matanhatu amunopa aya achava maguta enyu outiziro. mupe maguta matatu mhiri kwajorodhani uye mamwe matatu mukenani kuti ave maguta outiziro. maguta matanhatu aya achava nzvimbo youtiziro yavaisraeri, vatorwa kana vamwe vanhu vagere pakati pavo, kuitira kuti ani naani anenge auraya mumwe asingaiti nobwoni atizireko. “ ‘kana munhu akarova mumwe nesimbi akafa, iye imhondi; mhondi ichafanira kuurayiwa. uye kana ani naani aine dombo muruoko rwake rinogona kuuraya, akarova mumwe munhu naro akafa, iye imhondi; mhondi inofanira kuurayiwa. uye kana ani naani akange ane danda muruoko rwake rinogona kuuraya, uye akarova mumwe munhu akafa, iye imhondi; mhondi ichaurayiwa. mutsivi weropa achauraya mhondi iyo; paanosangana naye, achamuuraya. kana ani zvake anga ane ruvengo kare akasundidzira mumwe kana kupotsera chimwe chinhu kwaari nobwoni iye akafa, uye kana akamurova nechibhakera achimuvenga munhu uyo akafa, munhu iyeye anofanira kuurayiwa; munhu iyeye imhondi. mutsivi weropa achauraya mhondi iyo paanosangana naye. “ ‘asi kana panga pasina ruvengo mumwe akakaruka asundidzira mumwe kana kupotsera chimwe chinhu kwaari asingaiti nobwoni, kana anga asingamuoni, akapotsera dombo kwaari rinogona kumuuraya, uye iye akafa, ipapo sezvo anga asiri muvengi wake uye anga asingafungi kumukuvadza, ungano inofanira kutonga pakati pake nomutsivi weropa maererano nemitemo iyi. ungano inofanira kudzivirira munhu anopomerwa umhondi kubva pamutsivi weropa uye vachamudzosera kuguta routiziro uko kwaakanga atizira. anofanira kugara ikoko kusvikira muprista mukuru afa, uyo akanga akazodzwa namafuta matsvene. “ ‘asi kana uyo anopomerwa akangobuda kunze akadarika muganhu weguta routiziro, uko kwaakatizira, uye mutsivi weropa akamuwana ari kunze kweguta, mutsivi weropa achauraya muurayi uyu akasapiwa mhosva youmhondi. muurayi anofanira kugara muguta rake routiziro kusvikira pakufa kwomuprista mukuru; anofanira kudzokera chete kunzvimbo yake kana muprista mukuru afa. “ ‘izvi zvinofanira kuva murayiro wokutonga nawo kusvikira kumarudzi enyu ose anotevera, kwose kwamunogara. “ ‘ani naani anouraya munhu anofanira kuurayiwa semhondi kana chete pane zvapupu. asi hapafaniri kuva nomunhu anourayiwa kana pachingova nechapupu chimwe chete. “ ‘murege kugamuchira dzikinuro youpenyu hwemhondi, inofanira kufa. anofanira kufa zvirokwazvo. “ ‘murege kugamuchira dzikinuro yomunhu upi zvake akatiza kuguta routiziro nokudaro muchimutendera kudzokera kuti andogarazve munyika yake muprista mukuru asati afa. “ ‘murege kusvibisa nyika yamunogara. kuteura ropa kunosvibisa nyika, uye nyika haingayananisirwi pamusoro peropa rakateurirwamo, asi chete neropa romunhu akariteura. musasvibisa nyika yamugere uye yandinogara, nokuti ini yeahoh, ndigere pakati pavaisraeri.’ ”

36

vakuru vemhuri yeimba yagireadhi mwanakomana wamakiri, mwanakomana wamanase, vaibva kudzimba dzezvizvarwa zvayosefa, vakauya vakataura pamberi pamozisi navatungamiri, ivo vakuru vemhuri dzavaisraeri. vakati, “yeahoh paakarayira ishe wangu kuti ape nyika kuvaisraeri nomujenya ive nhaka yavo, akakurayirai kuti mupe nhaka yehama yedu zerofehadhi kuvanasikana vake. zvino ivo kana vakawanikwa navarume vanobva kuna mamwe marudzi aisraeri, ipapo nhaka yavo ichabviswa panhaka yamadzitateguru edu ikawedzerwa kurudzi urwo rwavawanikwa narwo. nokudaro chikamu chenhaka yakagoverwa kwatiri nemijenya chichabviswa. gore rejubhiri ravaisraeri parinosvika, nhaka yavo ichawedzerwa kunhaka yorudzi urwo rwavakawanikwa kwarwuri, uye pfuma yavo ichatorwa kubva kunhaka yorudzi rwamadzibaba edu.” ipapo mozisi akarayira murayiro uyu kuvaisraeri sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh achiti, “zvinotaurwa norudzi rwezvizvarwa zvayosefa ndizvozvo. uku ndiko kurayira kwayeahoh kuvanasikana vazerofehadhi: vangawanikwa havo naani zvake anovafadza kana chete ari worudzi rweimba yamadzibaba avo. hakuna nhaka muvaisraeri inofanira kubva kuno rumwe rudzi ichienda kuno rumwe rudzi, nokuti muisraeri wose anofanira kuchengeta nyika yorudzi rwake iri nhaka inobva kumadzibaba avo. mwanasikana mumwe nomumwe anogara nhaka yenyika murudzi rupi zvarwo rwavaisraeri anofanira kuwanikwa nomunhu anobva muimba yorudzi rwababa vake, kuitira kuti muisraeri wose awane nhaka yamadzibaba ake. hakuna nhaka inobva kuno rumwe rudzi ichienda kuno rumwe rudzi, nokuti rudzi rwose rwavaisraeri runofanira kuchengeta nyika yavakapiwa senhaka.” saka vanasikana vazerofehadhi vakaita sezvakarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. vanasikana vazerofehadhi, mara, tiza, hogira, mirika nanoa vakawanikwa navanakomana vababamunini vavo. vakawanikwa mukati medzimba dzezvizvarwa zvamanase mwanakomana wayosefa, uye nhaka yavo yakaramba iri mumba yorudzi rwababa vavo. iyi ndiyo mirayiro nemitemo yakapiwa kuvaisraeri nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi pamapani emoabhu pedyo nejorodhani uchibva mhiri kujeriko.

deuteronomy

1

aya ndiwo mashoko akataurwa namozisi kuvaisraeri vose murenje kumabvazuva kwejorodhani, mumupata wearabha wakatarisana nesufi, pakati peparani netoferi, rabhani, hazeroti nedhizahabhi. (zvinotora mazuva gumi nerimwe kubva pahorebhi kuenda kukadheshi bharinea nenzira yokugomo reseiri.) mugore ramakumi mana, nezuva rokutanga romwedzi wegumi nomumwe, mozisi akazivisa vaisraeri zvose izvo yeahoh akamurayira pamusoro pavo. izvi zvakaitika mushure mokunge akunda sihoni mambo wavaamori, akanga achitonga paheshibhoni, uye paedhirei akanga akunda ogi mambo webhashani, akanga achitonga muashitaroti. mozisi akatanga kududzira murayiro uyu, vari nechokumabvazuva kwejorodhani munzvimbo yemoabhu, achiti: yeahoh allah wedu akataura kwatiri pahorebhi akati, “magara nguva yakakwana pagomo rino. putsai musasa mugoenda kunyika yezvikomo yavaamori; muende kumarudzi ose akavakidzana muarabha, mumakomo, nemuzasi mezvikomo zvokumadokero, nomunegevhi uye kumahombekombe egungwa, nokunyika yavakenani uye nokurebhanoni, kusvikira kurwizi rukuru, irwo yufuratesi. tarirai, ndakupai nyika iyi. endaimo mundotora nyika iyo yeahoh akapika kuti achaipa kumadzibaba enyu, kuna abhurahama, naisaka, nayaqobho, uye nokuzvizvarwa zvavo zvaizovatevera.” panguva iyoyo ndakati kwamuri, “mava mutoro unorema kwazvo kuti ndikutakurei ndiri ndoga. yeahoh allah wenyu akawedzera kuwanda kwenyu zvokuti nhasi mawanda senyeredzi dzokudenga. yeahoh allah wamadzibaba enyu, ngaakuwedzerei rune chiuru uye ngaakuropafadzei sezvaakavimbisa! asi ini ndingatakure seiko matambudziko enyu nemitoro yenyu uye nokupokana kwenyu ndiri ndoga? zvisarudzirei varume vakachenjera, vanonzwisisa uye vanokudzwa kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwamarudzi enyu, ndingovagadza pamusoro penyu.” makandipindura muchiti, “izvo zvamataura kuti zviitwe zvakanaka.” saka ndakatora varume vaitungamirira marudzi enyu, varume vakachenjera uye vaikudzwa, ndikavagadza kuti vave vakuru pamusoro penyu, vave vakuru vezviuru, navakuru vamazana, navakuru vamakumi mashanu, navakuru vevane gumi uye navatariri vamarudzi. zvino panguva iyoyo ndakarayira vatongi venyu, ndikati: inzwai kupokana kuri pakati pehama dzenyu mugovatonga zvakanaka, ingava mhaka iri pakati pavaisraeri voga kana pakati pomumwe wavo nomutorwa. musaita rusarura pakutonga; inzwai vose muduku kana mukuru zvakaenzanirana. musatya munhu upi zvake, nokuti kutonga ndokwaallah. uyisai kwandiri mhaka yakanyanya kukuomerai, ndigoinzwa. uye panguva iyoyo ndakakurayirai zvose zvamaifanira kuita. ipapo takasimuka kubva pahorebhi tikafamba takananga kunyika yamakomo yavaamori tikapfuura nomurenje iro rose guru rinotyisa ramakaona, uye tikasvika pakadheshi bharinea, sezvatakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wedu. ipapo ndakati kwamuri, “masvika munyika yamakomo yavaamori, yatinopiwa nayeahoh allah wedu. tarirai, yeahoh allah wenyu akupai nyika iyo. kwirai munoitora, sezvamakaudzwa nayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu. musatya; musaora mwoyo.” ipapo imi mose makauya kwandiri mukati, “ngatitumei varume vanofanotungamira kuti vatisorere nyika vagodzoka kuzotiudza pamusoro penzira yatingafamba nayo uye namaguta atichandosvika kwaari.” pfungwa iyoyo yakanga yakandinakira; nokudaro ndakasarudza varume vane gumi navaviri pakati penyu, murume mumwe kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe. ivo vakabva vakaenda munyika yamakomo, vakasvika kumupata weeshikori vakaisora. vakatora mimwe yemichero yenyika iyoyo, vakauya nayo kwatiri, vakati, “inyika yakanaka yatiri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wedu.” asi makanga musingadi kuenda; mukamukira kurayira kwayeahoh allah wenyu. makanyunyuta muri mumatende enyu, mukati, “yeahoh anotivenga; naizvozvo akatibudisa muijipiti kuti azotiisa mumaoko avaamori kuti vatiparadze. tichaendepiko? hama dzedu dzatiita kuti tiore mwoyo. dzinoti, ‘vanhu vacho vanotikunda pasimba napakureba; maguta acho makuru uye ane masvingo akareba zvokusvika kudenga. takaona kunyange navaanaki ikoko.’ ” ipapo ini ndakati kwamuri, “musavhunduka; musavatya. yeahoh allah wenyu, iye anokutungamirirai, achakurwirai, sezvaakakuitirai muijipiti, pamberi penyu chaipo, uye nomurenje. imomo makaona kuti yeahoh allah wenyu akakutakurai sei, sezvinoita baba kana vachitakura mwanakomana wavo, nzira dzose dzamakafamba nadzo kudzamara muchisvika panzvimbo ino.” kunyange zvakadaro, hamuna kuvimba nayeahoh allah wenyu, iye akakutungamirirai parwendo rwenyu, mumoto usiku nomugore pamasikati kuti akutsvagirei nzvimbo dzokudzika matende enyu uye kuti akuratidzei nzira yamunofanira kufamba nayo. yeahoh paakanzwa zvamakataura, akatsamwa akapika, achiti, “hakungavi nomunhu mumwe wechizvarwa ichi achaona nyika yakanaka yandakapika ndichiti ndichaipa kumadzibaba enyu, kunze kwakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune achaiona, uye ndichamupa iye nezvizvarwa zvake nyika yaakatsika netsoka dzake nokuti akateerera yeahoh nomwoyo wose.” nokuda kwenyu yeahoh akanditsamwira neniwo, akati, “newewo hauchazoipindi. asi mutevedzeri wako, yeahoshua, mwanakomana wanuni, ndiye achapindamo. asi vaduku venyu avo vamakati vachatapwa, vana venyu vasati vaziva zvakanaka kubva pane zvakaipa ndivo vachapinda munyika iyi. ndichaipa kwavari uye vachaitora. asi kana murimi, dzokai mufambe makananga kurenje nenzira yokugungwa dzvuku.” ipapo imi makapindura mukati, “takatadzira yeahoh. tichaenda tigondorwa, sezvatakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wedu.” nokudaro makashonga mumwe nomumwe nhumbi dzokurwa, muchifunga kuti zvaiva nyore kukwidza kunyika yamakomo. asi yeahoh akataura kwandiri, akati, “vaudze kuti, ‘musakwidza kundorwa, nokuti handiendi nemi. muchakundwa navavengi venyu.’ ” naizvozvo ndakakutaurirai, asi imi hamuna kuda kuteerera. makamukira murayiro wayeahoh uye mukuzvikudza kwenyu makafamba mukapinda munyika yamakomo. vaamori vakanga vagere mumakomo iwayo vakauya kuzokurwisai; vakakudzinganisai sezvinoita nyuchi uye vakakurovai kubva paseiri kusvikira pahoma. makadzoka mukachema pamberi payeahoh, asi iye haana kuteerera kuchema kwenyu uye haana kurerekera nzeve yake kwamuri. naizvozvo makagara pakadheshi mazuva mazhinji, nguva yose yamakagarapo.

2

zvino takadzoka tikafamba takananga kurenje nenzira inoenda kugungwa dzvuku, sezvandakanga ndarayirwa nayeahoh. kwenguva yakareba takafamba nenzira yaipoterera nenyika yamakomo yeseiri. ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “mafamba nenzira yokupoterera nyika iyi yamakomo kwenguva yakakwana, zvino chidzokai muende nechokumusoro. rayira vanhu uti, ‘mava pedyo kuti mupfuure nomunyika yehama dzenyu zvizvarwa zvaesau, vagere paseiri. ivo vachakutyai, asi muchenjere kwazvo. musavatanga kuti murwe, handingakupei chikamu chipi zvacho chenyika yavo, kunyange pangakwana kuisa rutsoka rwenyu. ndakapa esau nyika yamakomo yeseiri kuti ive yake. munofanira kuvaripa nesirivha zvokudya zvamuchadya nemvura yamuchanwa.’ ” yeahoh allah wenyu akakuropafadzai pamabasa ose amaoko enyu. akakutarirai parwendo rwenyu murenje iri guru. yeahoh allah wenyu akava nemi, makore makumi mana aya, uye hapana chinhu chamakashayiwa. naizvozvo takapfuura hama dzedu zvizvarwa zvaesau, vanogara museiri. takasiya nzira inoenda kuarabha, yearabha, inobva kuerati neezioni gebheri, ndokufamba nenzira yomurenje remoabhu. ipapo yeahoh akataura kwandiri, akati, “musafurusa vamoabhu kana kuvadenha, nokuti handizokupai chikamu chipi zvacho chenyika yavo. ndakapa ari kuzvizvarwa zvaroti kuti ive yavo.” (vaemi vaisigarako vaiva vanhu vakasimba, vakawanda uye vakareba savaanaki. savaanaki ivowo vaionekwa savarefaimu, asi vamoabhu vaivadana nezita rokuti vaemi. vahori vaimbogarawo museiri, asi vana vaesau vakavadzinga kubva imomo. vakaparadza vahori vakanga varimo ivo vasati vavamo vakagara munzvimbo yavo, sezvakangoitawo israeri munyika yavakapiwa nayeahoh kuti ive yavo). uye yeahoh akati, “zvino chisimukai muyambuke mupata wezeredhi.” saka takayambuka mupata. makore makumi matatu namasere akanga apfuura kubva panguva yatakabva pakadheshi bharinea kusvikira patakazoyambuka mupata wezeredhi. panguva iyoyi chizvarwa chose chavarume vezera rokurwa chakanga chaparara kubva pamisasa, sezvakanga zvapikirwa nayeahoh kwavari. ruoko rwayeahoh rwakaramba ruchivarwisa kusvikira rwavaparadza zvachose. zvino wokupedzisira pakati pavarume ava vokurwa akati afa, yeahoh akati kwandiri, “nhasi unofanira kupfuura nomunyika yemoabhu, paari. kana woswedera pedyo navaamoni, usavafurusa kana kuvadenha kuti murwisane, nokuti handingakupei kuti mutore nyika ipi zvayo yavaamori. ndakaipa kuti ive yezvizvarwa zvaroti.” (naiyowo yainzi inyika yevarafaimu, vaisimbogaramo; asi vaamoni vaivadaidza kuti vazamuzumi. vaiva vanhu vakasimba, vakawanda, uye vakareba savaanaki. yeahoh akavaparadza pamberi pavaamoni, avo vakavadzinga ndokugara munzvimbo yavo. yeahoh akanga aitira zvimwe chetezvo kuzvizvarwa zvaesau, vaigara museiri, paakaparadza vahori pamberi pavo. vakavadzinga ndokugara munzvimbo yavo kusvikira nhasi. uye kana vari vaavhi vakanga vagere mumisha kusvikira kugaza, vakafitori vaibva kafitori vakavaparadza ndokugara munzvimbo yavo.) budai zvino muende, muyambuke mupata wearinoni. tarirai ndakaisa muruoko rwenyu sihoni muamori, mambo weheshibhoni, nenyika yake. tangai kuitora mugorwa naye. nhasi chaiye ndichatanga kuvhundutsa nokutyisa ndudzi dzose dziri pasi pedenga nokuda kwenyu. ivo vachanzwa guhu pamusoro penyu vagodedera nokutya kwazvo pamusoro penyu. ndakatuma nhume kubva murenje rekedhemoti kuna sihoni mambo weheshibhoni ndichikumbira rugare, uye ndikati, “titenderei kuti tipfuure nomunyika yenyu. tichafamba nemugwagwa mukuru; hatizotsauki kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. mutitengesere zvokudya nemvura yokunwa nomutengo wazvo wesirivha. chingotitenderai henyu kuti tipfuure netsoka, sezvatakaitirwa nezvizvarwa zvaesau vagere museiri, nevamoabhu vagere muari. kusvikira tayambuka jorodhani tichipinda munyika iyo yatinopiwa nayeahoh allah wedu.” asi sihoni mambo weheshibhoni akaramba kutitendera kuti tipfuure nomo. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu akanga aomesa mweya wake uye akanga arambidza mwoyo wake, kuti agomuisa mumaoko enyu, sezvaaita iye zvino. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “tarira ndatanga kuisa sihoni nenyika yake kwauri. zvino chitanga kuikunda ugotora nyika yake.” sihoni nehondo yake yose akati auya kuzorwa nesu pajahazi, yeahoh allah wedu akamuisa kwatiri uye takamuparadza, iye pamwe chete navanakomana vake nehondo yake yose. panguva iyoyo takatora maguta ake ose tikaaparadza chose, varume navakadzi uye navana. hapana watakasiya ari mupenyu. asi zvipfuwo nezvatakapamba kubva mumaguta takazvitora kuti zvive zvedu. kubva paaroeri pamahombekombe omupata wearinoni, nokubva kuguta rokumupata, kunyange kusvikira kugireadhi, hakuna kumbova kana neguta rimwe chete rakatikunda. yeahoh allah wedu akatipa vose. asi maererano nokurayira kwayeahoh allah wedu hamuna kuswedera kunyika ipi zvayo yavaamoni, kunyange kunyika iri kurutivi rwejabhoki kana kunyika yakapoteredza maguta ari mumakomo.

3

mushure maizvozvo takadzoka tikakwidza nenzira inoenda kubhashani, uye ogi mambo webhashani nehondo yake yose vakauya kuzorwa nesu paedhirei. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “usatya nokuda kwake, nokuti ndakamuisa kwauri uye nenyika yake. muitire sezvamakaita kuna sihani mambo wavaamoni, akanga achitonga muheshibhoni.” naizvozvo yeahoh allah wedu akaisawo ogi mambo webhashani nehondo yake yose mumaoko edu. takavaparadza tikasasiya kana mumwe chete mupenyu. panguva iyoyo takatora maguta ake ose. hapana kana guta rimwe chete ratisina kuvatorera pamaguta makumi matanhatu, nyika yose yearigobhu, noushe hwaogi mubhashani. maguta ose iwaya akanga akapoteredzwa namasvingo marefu namasuo namazariro, uye kwakanga kunewo misha mizhinji kwazvo yakanga isina kukomberedzwa namasvingo. takaaparadza zvachose, sezvatakaitira sihoni mambo weheshibhoni, takaparadza guta rimwe nerimwe, varume, navakadzi uye navana. asi zvipfuwo zvose nezvatakapamba kubva mumaguta avo takazvitora zvikava zvedu. saka nenguva iyoyo takatorera madzimambo maviri aya avaamoni nyika yokumabvazuva kwejorodhani, kubva pamupata wearinoni kusvikira kugomo reherimoni. (herimoni rinonzi sirioni navasidhoni; vaamori vanoriti seniri). takatora maguta ose enzvimbo yakakwirira negireadhi yose, uye nebhashani yose kusvikira pasareka needhirei, maguta oushe hwaogi mubhashani. (ogi mambo webhashani ndiye chete akasara pane vakasara vevarefaiti. mubhedha wake wakanga wakagadzirwa nesimbi uye wakanga wakareba makubhiti mapfumbamwe uye makubhiti mana paupamhi. uchiriko murabha ravaamoni.) panyika yatakatora panguva iyoyo, ndakapa varubheni navagadhi nyika yokumusoro kwearoeri mupata wearimoni, kusanganisira nehafu yenyika yamakomo yegireadhi, pamwe chete namaguta ayo. imwe nyika yose yegireadhi uyewo nebhashani yose, muumambo hwaogi ndakapa kuhafu yorudzi rwamanase. (nyika yose yearigobhu mubhashani yaimbozivikanwa senyika yavarefaimu. jairi mwana wamanase, akatora nyika yose yearigobhu, kusvikira kumuganhu wavageshuri navamaakati, akaitumidza zita rake zvokuti nanhasi bhashani inonzi havhoti jairi.) uye ndakapa gireadhi kuna makiri. asi varubheni navagadhi ndakavapa nyika inobva pagireadhi zvichidzika kusvikira pamupata wearinoni (pakati pemupata uriwo muganhu) uye kubuda kusvikira kurwizi jabhoki, unova ndiwo muganhu wavaamoni. muganhu wayo wokumavirira waiva jorodhani muarabha, kubva kinereti kusvika kugungwa rearabha (gungwa romunyu), mujinga mamawere episiga. panguva iyo ndakakurayirai, ndikati, “yeahoh allah wenyu akakupai nyika iyi kuti ive yenyu. asi varume vose vakasimba vanofanira kuyambuka pamberi pehama dzenyu vaisraeri, vakashonga nhumbi dzokurwa. asi, vakadzi venyu navana venyu uye nezvipfuwo zvenyu (ndinoziva kuti mune zvipfuwo zvakawanda) zvinosara mumaguta andakakupai, kusvikira yeahoh apa hama dzenyu zororo sezvaakarayira kwamuri, uye naivowo vatora nyika yavanopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu mhiri kwajorodhani. shure kwaizvozvo mumwe nomumwe wenyu achadzoka kunhaka yandakakupai.” panguva iyo ndakarayira yeahoshua, ndikati, “wakaona nameso ako zvose zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wako kumadzimambo maviri aya. yeahoh achaita zvimwe chetezvo kuushe hwose mhiri uko kwamunoenda. usavatya; yeahoh allah wako pachake achakurwira.” zvino ndakanyengetera kuna yeahoh panguva iyo, ndikati, “imi ishe yeahoh, makatanga kuratidza muranda wenyu ukuru hwenyu noruoko rwenyu rune simba. nokuti ndoupiko allah kudenga kana panyika angaita zvakafanana namabasa enyu uye namabasa makuru amunoita? nditenderei henyu kuti ndiyambuke ndinoona nyika yakanaka iri mhiri kwajorodhani, iyo nyika yamakomo yakanaka nerebhanoni.” asi nokuda kwenyu, yeahoh akanditsamwira akasandinzwa yeahoh akati kwandiri, “zvaringana. usataurazve kwandiri pamusoro peshoko iri. kwira pamusoro pegomo repisiga ugotarisa kumadokero nokumusoro nezasi nokumabvazuva, uone nyika yacho nameso ako, sezvo usingazoyambuki jorodhani urwu. asi rayira yeahoshua, ugomukurudzira nokumusimbisa nokuti achatungamirira vanhu ava pakuyambuka uye achaita kuti vagare nhaka yenyika yauchaona.” saka takagara mumupata uri pedyo nebheti peori.

4
