teererai zvino, imi vaisraeri, mitemo nemirayiro yandava kukudzidzisai. muitevere kuti murarame uye mugopinda mugotora nyika iyo munopiwa nayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu. musawedzera kana kutapudza kubva pane zvandinokurayirai, asi chengetai mirayiro yayeahoh allah wenyu yandinokupai. makaona nameso enyu zvakaitwa nayeahoh pabhaari peori, yeahoh allah wenyu akaparadza mumwe nomumwe pakati penyu aitevera bhaari peori. asi imi mose makanamatira pana yeahoh allah wenyu muchiri vapenyu nhasi. tarirai, ndakudzidzisai mitemo nemirayiro sezvandakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wangu, kuti muitevere munyika yamuri kupinda kuti muitore ive yenyu. muichengete zvakanaka, nokuti izvi zvicharatidza uchenjeri nokunzwisisa kwenyu kundudzi dzichanzwa pamusoro pemitemo iyi yose uye vachati, “zvirokwazvo rudzi urwu rukuru, vanhu vakachenjera uye vanonzwisisa.” ndorupi rumwe rudzi rukuru runa vamwari varwo vari pedyo navo sayeahoh allah wedu ari pedyo nesu nguva ipi neipi zvayo yatinonyengetera kwaari? uye ndorupiko rudzi rukuru rune mitemo nemirayiro yakarurama semirayiro iyi yandiri kuisa pamberi penyu nhasi? asi zvichenjererei, mugonyatsozvichengetedza kuitira kuti murege kukanganwa zvinhu zvakaonekwa nameso enyu kana kuzvirega zvichibuda mumwoyo menyu mazuva ose oupenyu hwenyu. muzvidzidzise nokuvana venyu. murangarire zuva ramakamira pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu pahorebhi, paakati kwandiri, “unganidza vanhu pamberi pangu kuti vanzwe mashoko angu vagodzidza kunditya mazuva ose avachagara panyika uye kuti vagozoadzidzisa kuvana vavo.” makaswedera mukamira pajinga pegomo, gomo paraipfuta nomoto waisvika kumatenga chaiko, pamwe chete nemakore matema nerima guru. ipapo yeahoh akataura kwamuri ari mukati memoto. makanzwa inzwi chete asi hamuna kuona kuti ndiani; kwaingova nenzwi roga. akataura sungano yake kwamuri, mirayiro gumi, yaakakurayirai kuti muitevere uye ipapo akainyora pamahwendefa maviri amabwe. zvino yeahoh akanditungamirira panguva iyo kuti ndikudzidzisei mitemo nemirayiro yamunofanira kundotevera munyika iyo yamunoyambukira jorodhani kuti ive yenyu. nokuti hamuna kuona zvaakanga akaita nezuva iro yeahoh akataura kwamuri pahorebhi ari mumoto. naizvozvo zvichenjererei zvikuru, kuitira kuti murege kuzvisvibisa muchizvigadzirira chifananidzo, chifananidzo chechinhu chipi zvacho, chingava chakaitwa somurume kana somukadzi, kana semhuka ipi zvayo panyika kana seshiri ipi zvayo inobhururuka mudenga, kana sechisikwa chipi zvacho chinofamba pasi kana hove ipi zvayo iri pasi mumvura. uye kuti kana muchitarisa kudenga mukaona zuva, nomwedzi nenyeredzi, zvose zviri kudenga, musatsauswa kuti muzvipfugamire nokunamata zvinhu izvo yeahoh allah wenyu akagovera ndudzi dzose dziri pasi pedenga. asi kana muri imi, yeahoh akakutorai akakubudisai muchoto chamatare, akakubudisai muijipiti, kuti muve vanhu venhaka yake, sezvamuri nhasi. yeahoh akanditsamwira nokuda kwenyu, akapika kuti handingayambuki jorodhani nokupinda munyika yakanaka iyo munopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ive nhaka yenyu. ini ndichafira munyika ino; handichayambuki jorodhani; asi imi mava kuzoyambuka nokutora nyika yakanaka. muzvichenjerere kuti murege kukanganwa sungano yayeahoh allah wenyu yaakaita nemi; musazviitira chifananidzo chorudzi rwechinhu chipi zvakadziviswa nayeahoh allah wenyu. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu moto unoparadza, ndiallah ane godo. mushure mokunge mava navana navazukuru uye magara nguva refu munyika, kana mukazvishatisa nokugadzira chifananidzo chorudzi rupi zvarwo, mukaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu muchimuita kuti atsamwe, ndinodana denga napasi sezvapupu pamusoro penyu nhasi, kuti muchakurumidza kuparara kubva panyika yamuri kuyambukira jorodhani kuti ive yenyu. hamungagarimo nguva refu asi muchaparadzwa zvirokwazvo. yeahoh achakuparadzirai pakati pamarudzi, uye vashoma venyu chete ndivo vachapona pakati pendudzi uko kwamuchadzingirwa nayeahoh. ikoko muchanamata vamwari vakaitwa navanhu, vamatanda navamabwe, vasingagoni kana kunzwa kana kudya kana kunhuhwidza. asi kana mava ikoko mukatsvaka yeahoh allah wenyu, muchamuwana kana mukamutsvaka nomwoyo wenyu wose nomweya wenyu wose. kana muchinge matambudzika uye zvinhu zvose izvi zvaitika kwamuri, ipapo pamazuva achatevera muchadzoka kuna yeahoh allah wenyu mugomuteerera. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiallah ane ngoni, haangakusiyei kana kukuparadzai, kana kukanganwa sungano yamadzibaba enyu, yaakasimbisa kwavari nemhiko. bvunzai zvino pamusoro pamazuva akapfuura kare imi musati mavapo, kubva nezuva iro allah akasika munhu panyika; bvunzai kubva kuno rumwe rutivi rwedenga kusvikira kuno rumwe. kune chinhu chakamboitika chakakura seichi here, kana chimwe chakafanana nacho chakambonzwika? kune vamwe vanhu vakambonzwa inzwi raallah achitaura ari mukati momoto here, sezvamakanzwa imi uye vakararama? kune mumwe mwari here akaedza kundozvitsaurira rudzi pakati porumwe rudzi, nemiedzo, nezviratidzo, nezvishamiso, nehondo, noruoko rune simba, noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, kana namabasa makuru anotyisa, sezvinhu zvose zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu pamberi penyu muijipiti? makaratidzwa zvinhu zvose izvi kuti muzive kuti yeahoh ndiallah; kunze kwake hakuna mumwe. kubva kudenga akaita kuti munzwe inzwi rake kuti akudzidzisei. panyika akakuratidzai moto wake mukuru, uye makanzwa mashoko ake kubva mukati momoto. nokuti akada madzibaba enyu uye akazvitsaurira zvizvarwa zvavo zvakavatevera shure kwavo, akakubudisai muijipiti nokuvapo kwake nesimba rake guru, kuti adzinge pamberi penyu ndudzi dzinokupfuurai pakukura napasimba uye nokukuuyisai munyika yavo kuti aipe kwamuri senhaka sezvazviri nhasi. zvizivei nokuzvichengeta mumwoyo nhasi kuti yeahoh ndiallah ari kudenga kumusoro uye napanyika pasi. hakunazve mumwe. chengetai mitemo nemirayiro yake yandinokupai nhasi, kuitira kuti zvigokuitirai zvakanaka imi navana venyu vanokuteverai uye kuti mugogara mazuva mazhinji panyika yamunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu nokusingaperi. zvino mozisi akatsaura maguta matatu kumabvazuva mhiri kwajorodhani, uko ani naani anenge auraya munhu aitizira kana achinge auraya muvakidzani wake asingaiti nobwoni uye asingazvifungiri. aigona kutizira mune rimwe ramaguta aya kuti ararame. maguta aya aiti: bhezeri mudunhu rakakwirira rokurenje raiva ravarubheni; ramoti pagireadhi, raiva ravagadhi; negorani pabhashani, raiva ravamanase. uyu ndiwo murayiro wakaiswa namozisi pamberi pavaisraeri: izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa namozisi, mitemo nemirayiro yaakavapa pavakabuda kubva muijipiti uye vari kumabvazuva kwajorodhani mumupata uri pedyo nebheti peori, munyika yasihoni mambo wavaamori, aitonga muheshibhoni uyo akakundwa navaisraeri pavakabuda muijipiti. vakatora nyika yake nenyika yaogi mambo webhashani, madzimambo maviri avaamori aiva kumabvazuva kwejorodhani. nyika iyi yaibva paaroeri pamahombekombe omupata wearinoni kusvika pagomo resioni (ndiro herimoni), uye kusanganisira arabha yose kumabvazuva kwajorodhani, kusvikira kugungwa rearabha, mujinga memateru episiga.

5

mozisi akadana vaisraeri vose, akati: inzwai imi vaisraeri, mitemo nemirayiro yandinotaura muchinzwa nhasi. idzidzei muchenjerere kuti muiteerere yeahoh allah wedu akaita sungano nesu pahorebhi. yeahoh haana kuita sungano iyi namadzibaba edu, asi akaiita nesu, nesu tose vapenyu nhasi pano. yeahoh akataura nemi chiso nechiso ari mukati memoto pagomo. panguva iyo ndakanga ndimire pakati payeahoh nemi kuti ndizivise kwamuri shoko rayeahoh, nokuti makanga muchitya moto mukasakwira mugomo. uye iye akati: “ndini yeahoh allah wako akakubudisa kubva munyika yeijipiti, munyika youranda. “usava navamwe vamwari kunze kwangu. usazviitira mufananidzo wechinhu chipi zvacho chiri kudenga kumusoro kana panyika pasi kana pasi mumvura. usazvipfugamira kana kuzvinamata; nokuti ini, yeahoh allah wako, ndiri allah ane godo, ndinoranga vana nokuda kwechivi chamadzibaba kusvikira kurudzi rwechitatu norwechina rwaavo vanondivenga, asi ndichiratidza rudo kune chiuru chemarudzi avanondida, vanochengeta mirayiro yangu. usareva zita rayeahoh allah wako pasina, nokuti yeahoh haangaregi kupa mhosva ani naani anoreva zita rake pasina. chengeta zuva resabata rive dzvene, sezvawakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wako. ubate basa mazuva matanhatu, nokuita basa rako rose, asi zuva rechinomwe isabata kuna yeahoh allah wako. nomusi uyo usabata basa ripi zvaro, kunyange iwe, kana mwanakomana wako, kana mwanasikana wako, uye murandarume kana murandakadzi wako, nenzombe yako kana mbongoro yako kana chimwe chezvipfuwo zvako, nomutorwa ari mukati mamasuo ako, kuitira kuti murandarume nomurandakadzi wako azorore sewe. murangarire kuti imi maimbova varanda munyika yeijipiti uye kuti yeahoh allah wenyu akakubudisai nechanza chine simba noruoko rwakatambanudzwa. naizvozvo yeahoh allah wako anokurayira kuti uchengete zuva resabata. kudza baba vako namai vako, sezvawakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wako, kuti mazuva ako ave mazhinji uye kuti zvigokuitira zvakanaka panyika yaunopiwa nayeahoh allah wako. usauraya. usaita upombwe. usaba. usapupura nhema pamusoro pomuvakidzani wako. usachiva mudzimai womuvakidzani wako. usachochora imba kana munda womuvakidzani wako, muranda kana murandakadzi wake, nzombe kana mbongoro kana chimwe chinhu chomuvakidzani wako.” iyi ndiyo mirayiro yakataurwa nayeahoh nenzwi guru kuungano yenyu yose pagomo paya ari mukati memoto, mugore nerima guru, uye haana kuwedzera mamwe. ipapo akaanyora pamahwendefa maviri amabwe ndokuapa kwandiri. pamakanzwa inzwi richibva mukati merima, negomo richipfuta nomoto, varume vose vanotungamira marudzi enyu, navakuru venyu vakauya kwandiri. uye makati, “yeahoh allah wedu atiratidza kubwinya kwake noukuru hwake, tikanzwa inzwi rake richibva mumoto. nhasi taona kuti munhu anogona kurarama kunyange dai allah akataura naye. asi zvino, tingafireiko? uyu moto mukuru uchatiparadza, uye tichafa kana tikaramba tichinzwa inzwi rayeahoh allah wedu. nokuti ndianiko munhu anofa akambonzwa inzwi raallah mupenyu achitaura ari mumoto, sesu, uye akararama? swedera undonzwa zvose zvicharehwa nayeahoh allah wedu. zvino iwe ugozotiudza zvose hazvo zvauchaudzwa nayeahoh allah wedu. tichazvinzwa tigozviita.” yeahoh akakunzwai pamakataura kwandiri uye yeahoh akati kwandiri, “ndanzwa zvataurwa navanhu kwauri. zvose zvavataura zvakanaka. haiwa, dai mwoyo yavo yainditya nokuchengeta zvose zvandakarayira nguva dzose, kuti zvivaitire zvakanaka ivo navana vavo nokusingaperi! “enda undovaudza kuti vadzokere kumatende avo. asi iwe mira pano pandiri kuti ndikupe zvandakarayira, mitemo nemirayiro yose yaunofanira kuvadzidzisa kuti vazviite panyika yandinovapa kuti ive yavo.” saka chenjerai kuti muite zvamakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu; musatsauka kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. mufambe nenzira yose yamakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, kuti murarame nokubudirira uye kuti mazuva enyu ave mazhinji panyika iyo ichava yenyu.

6

iyi ndiyo mitemo, nemirayiro zvandakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ndikudzidzisei kuti muzviite munyika yamunoyambukira jorodhani kuti ive yenyu, kuitira kuti iwe, navana vako navana vavo vachavatevera mutye yeahoh allah wenyu pakurarama kwenyu nokuchengeta mitemo nemirayiro yake yose yandinokupai, uye kuitira kuti muve namazuva mazhinji okurarama. chinzwa, iwe israeri, uchenjere kuti uzviite kuitira kuti zvikunakire uye kuti muwande kwazvo munyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi, sezvamakavimbiswa nayeahoh, iye allah wamadzibaba enyu. chinzwa iwe israeri: yeahoh allah wedu, ndiyeahoh mumwe chete. ida yeahoh allah wako nomwoyo wako wose nomweya wako wose uye nesimba rako rose. mirayiro iyi yandinokupai nhasi inofanira kuva mumwoyo yenyu. zvisimbisei kuvana venyu. taurai pamusoro payo kana mugere mudzimba dzenyu uye kana muchifamba munzira, kana muchivata pasi uye kana muchimuka. isungirirei pamaoko enyu sechiratidzo mugoisungira pahuma dzenyu. muinyore pamagwatidziro emikova yedzimba dzenyu uye napamasuo enyu. zvino kana yeahoh allah wenyu achinge akupinzai munyika yaakapikira kumadzibaba enyu, abhurahama, naisaka, nayaqobho, kuti achakupai, nyika ina maguta makuru akanaka, amusina kuvaka imi, dzimba dzizere nezvinhu zvakanaka zvamarudzi ose zvamusina kutsvaka imi, matsime amusina kuchera, minda yemizambiringa namasango nemiti yemiorivhi yamusina kusima, zvino kana muchinge madya uye mukaguta, muchenjerere kuti murege kukanganwa yeahoh, akakubudisai kubva muijipiti, kubva munyika youranda. itya yeahoh allah wako, ushumire iye oga ugoita mhiko dzako muzita rake. musatevera vamwe vamwari, vamwari vendudzi dzakakupoteredzai; nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ari pakati penyu ndiallah ane godo uye hasha dzake dzichapisa pamusoro penyu, uye achakuparadzai kubva pamusoro penyika. musaedza yeahoh allah wenyu sezvamakaita pamasa. chenjererai kuchengeta mirayiro yayeahoh allah wenyu nezvaakatema nemitemo yaakakupai. itai zvakarurama nezvakanaka pamberi payeahoh, kuitira kuti zvigokunakirai, mugopinda mugotora nyika yakanaka iyo yeahoh akavimbisa nemhiko kumadzitateguru enyu, agoparadza vavengi venyu vose pamberi penyu, sezvakataurwa nayeahoh. panguva inotevera, kana mwanakomana wako akakubvunza achiti, “ko, zvakatemwa izvi, mitemo nemirayiro yamakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wedu zvinorevei?” umuudze kuti, “takanga tiri varanda vafaro muijipiti, asi yeahoh akatibudisa muijipiti noruoko rune simba. yeahoh akatumira pamberi pedu zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvinotyisa pamusoro peijipiti nafaro neimba yake yose. asi akatibudisamo kuti atipinze nokutipa nyika yaakavimbisa nemhiko kumadzibaba edu. yeahoh akatirayira kuti titeerere mitemo iyi yose nokutya yeahoh allah wedu, kuitira kuti tibudirire nguva dzose nokurarama sezvatakaita nhasi. uye kana tichichenjerera kuteerera murayiro uyu wose pamberi payeahoh allah wedu, sezvaakatirayira, ndiko kuchava kururama kwedu.”

7

zvino kana yeahoh allah wenyu akusvitsai munyika yamuri kupinda kuti ive yenyu akadzinga ndudzi zhinji pamberi penyu dzinoti: vahiti, vagirigashi, vaamori, vakenani vaperizi, vahivhi, navajebhusi, ndudzi nomwe dzakakura uye dzakasimba kukupfuurai, uye kana yeahoh allah wenyu akavaisa mumaoko enyu akavakunda, ipapo munofanira kuvaparadza zvachose. musaita chibvumirano navo, uye musavanzwira tsitsi. musaroorerana navo. musapa vanasikana venyu kuvanakomana vavo kana kutorera vanakomana venyu vanasikana vavo, nokuti vachatsausa vanakomana venyu kubva pakunditevera kuti vashumire vamwe vamwari, uye kutsamwa kwayeahoh kuchapisa pamusoro penyu uye achakuparadzai nokukurumidza. izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kuvaitira: putsai aritari dzavo, pwanyai matombo avo anoera, temai mapango avo aashera mugopisa zvifananidzo zvavo. nokuti muri rudzi rutsvene kuna yeahoh allah wenyu, yeahoh allah wenyu akakutsaurai kubva kundudzi dzose dziri panyika kuti muve vanhu vake, pfuma yake inokosha. yeahoh haana kukudai kana kukutsaurai nokuti makanga makawanda kupfuura dzimwe ndudzi nokuti imi makanga muri vashoma kwazvo pandudzi dzose. asi nokuda kwokuti yeahoh anokudai uye akachengeta mhiko yaakaita kumadzitateguru enyu nokuda kwaizvozvo akakubudisai noruoko rune simba uye akakudzikinurai kubva munyika youranda, kubva pasimba rafaro mambo weijipiti. naizvozvo zivai kuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiallah; iye ndiallah akatendeka anochengeta sungano yake yorudo kusvikira kumarudzi ane chiuru chamarudzi kuna avo vanomuda uye vanochengeta mirayiro yake. asi vaya vanomuvenga achatsiva pamberi pavo nokuparadza; haachazononoki kutsiva pamberi pavo ivo vaya vanomuvenga. naizvozvo, chenjerai kuti mutevere zvakarayirwa, mitemo nemirayiro yandinokupai nhasi. kana mukanyatsoteerera mirayiro iyi uye mukachenjerera kuti muitevere, ipapo yeahoh allah wenyu achachengeta sungano yake yorudo nemi, sezvaakapika kumadzitateguru enyu. achakudai uye achakuropafadzai uye achakuwedzerai uwandu hwenyu. acharopafadza zvibereko zvomuviri wako, zvirimwa zvomunda wako, zviyo zvako, waini itsva namafuta, mhuru dzemombe uye makwayana amapoka ako munyika iyo yaakapikira madzitateguru enyu, kuti achakupai. mucharopafadzwa kupfuura mamwe marudzi ose, hapangavi nomurume kana mukadzi asingabereki, kana chipfuwo chipi zvacho chisingabereki. yeahoh achakuchengetedzai kubva pahosha dzose. haangaisi pamusoro penyu hosha dzakaipisa dzamaiziva muijipiti, asi achadziisa pamusoro paavo vose vanokuvengai. munofanira kuparadza marudzi ose akaiswa mumaoko enyu nayeahoh allah wenyu. musavanzwira tsitsi uye musashumira vamwari vavo nokuti izvozvo zvichava musungo kwamuri. mungati mumwoyo menyu, “ndudzi idzi dzakasimba kutipfuura. tingadzidzinga seiko?” hamufaniri kuvatya; nyatsorangarirai zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuna faro neijipiti yose. makazviona nameso enyu matambudziko makuru, zviratidzo nezvishamiso, ruoko rune simba uye rwakatambanudzwa urwo yeahoh allah wenyu akakubudisai narwo. yeahoh allah wenyu achaita zvimwe chetezvo kumarudzi aya ose amava kutya zvino. pamusoro pezvo yeahoh allah achatumira mago pakati pavo kusvikira kunyange nevachasara vari vapenyu vakavanda kubva kwamuri vaparadzwa. musatyiswa navo, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu, ari pakati penyu ndiallah mukuru anotyisa. yeahoh allah wenyu achadzinga ndudzi idzi kubva pamberi penyu, zvishoma nezvishoma. hamungatenderwi kuvaparadza vose kamwe chete, kuti zvikara zvesango zvirege kuwanda munzvimbo dzakakupoteredzai. asi yeahoh allah wenyu achavapa kwamuri, achivakanganisa zvikuru kusvikira vaparadzwa. achaisa madzimambo avo muruoko rwenyu, uye achabvisa mazita avo pasi pedenga. hapana achagona kumira pamberi penyu; muchavaparadza. zvifananidzo zvavamwari vavo munofanira kuzvipisa. musachiva sirivha kana negoridhe riri pazviri, uye musaritora kuti rive renyu, nokuti ringava musungo kwamuri, nokuti rinonyangadza kuna yeahoh allah wenyu. usauyisa chinhu chinonyangadza mumba mako, kuti iwe, saicho, urege kutsaurirwa kuparadzwa. chiseme kwazvo ugochivenga, nokuti chinhu chakatsaurirwa kuparadzwa.

8

muchenjerere kutevera murayiro mumwe nomumwe, wandinokupai nhasi, kuitira kuti mugorarama, mugowanda, mugopinda mugotora nyika iyo yeahoh akavimbisa madzitateguru enyu nemhiko. rangarirai matungamirirwo amakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu munzira yose yomurenje makore ose aya makumi mana, achikuninipisai uye achikuedzai kuti azive zvaiva mumwoyo menyu, kana makanga muchida kuchengeta mirayiro yake kana kuti kwete. akakuninipisai, akakuitai kuti muziye nenzara akakugutsai nemana, iyo yakanga isingazivikanwi nemi kunyange namadzibaba enyu, kuti akudzidzisei kuti munhu haararame nechingwa chete asi neshoko rimwe nerimwe rinobva mumuromo mayeahoh. nguo dzenyu hadzina kusakara uye tsoka dzenyu hadzina kuzvimba pamakore aya makumi mana. naizvozvo zvizive mumwoyo wako kuti yeahoh allah wako anokuranga, somunhu anoranga mwanakomana wake. chengeta mirayiro yayeahoh allah wako, ufambe munzira dzake uye umukudze. nokuti yeahoh allah wako ari kukuuyisa kunyika yakanaka, nyika ine hova dzemvura namatsime, nezvitubu zvinoerera mumupata nomumakomo; nyika ine zviyo nebhari, mizambiringa nemiti yemionde, neyemitamba, namafuta emiorivhi nouchi; nyika isingashayikwi chingwa uye hamuchazoshayiwi chinhu; nyika ine mabwe endarira uye uchachera mhangura mumakomo ayo. kana uchinge wadya waguta rumbidza yeahoh allah wako nokuda kwenyika yakanaka yaakakupa, chenjera kuti urege kukanganwa yeahoh allah wako uchirega kuchengeta zvaakarayira, mirayiro yake nemitemo yake yandinokupai nhasi. nokuti zvichida kana wadya ukaguta, kana ukavaka dzimba dzakanaka uye wagadzikana, uye kana mombe dzako namapoka amakwai ako zvawanda, nesirivha negoridhe rako zvawanda uye zvose zvaunazvo zvikawanda, ipapo mwoyo wako uchazvikudza zvino uchakanganwa yeahoh allah wako, akakubudisa kubva kuijipiti, kubva kunyika youranda. akakutungamirirai murenje guru rinotyisa, munyika iyo yakaoma isina mvura, nenyoka dzayo nezvinyavada zvine uturu. akakubudisirai mvura kubva padombo rakaoma. akakupai mana kuti mudye murenje, chinhu chakanga chisingambozivikanwi namadzibaba enyu, kuti akuninipisei nokukuedzai kuitira kuti zvikuitirei zvakanaka pakupedzisira. ungati mumwoyo mako, “simba rangu nesimba ramaoko angu ndizvo zvakandiitira upfumi uhu.” asi urangarire yeahoh allah wako, nokuti ndiye anokupa simba rokuita upfumi, naizvozvo achisimbisa sungano yake, yaakapikira madzitateguru enyu, sezvazviri nhasi. kana mukangokanganwa yeahoh allah wenyu muchitevera vamwe vamwari nokuvanamata uye nokuvapfugamira, ndinokupupurirai nhasi kuti zvirokwazvo muchaparadzwa. imi muchaparadzwa sendudzi dzakaparadzwa nayeahoh pamberi penyu, kana mukaramba kuteerera yeahoh allah wenyu.

9

inzwa, iwe israeri. wava kuda kuyambuka jorodhani zvino kuti upinde ugotorera ndudzi dzakakura uye dzakasimba kukupfuura, dzina maguta makuru ane masvingo akareba kwazvo. vanhu vacho vakasimba uye varefu vaanaki! unoziva nezvavo uye wakanzwa zvichinzi, “ndiani angamira kuti arwise vaanaki?” asi nhasi uzive kuti yeahoh allah wako ndiye achayambuka ari pamberi pako somoto unoparadza. achavaparadza; achavakunda pamberi pako. uye uchavadzinga ugovaparadza nokukurumidza sezvawakavimbiswa nayeahoh. shure kwokunge yeahoh allah wako avadzinga pamberi pako, usataura mumwoyo mako uchiti, “yeahoh akandiuyisa muno kuti nditore nyika ino nokuda kwokururama kwangu.” kwete, yeahoh achadzinga ndudzi idzi pamberi pako nokuda kwokuipa kwadzo. haupindi munyika yavo kuti ive yako nokuda kwokururama kwako kana kururama kwomwoyo wako; asi yeahoh allah wako achadzinga ndudzi idzi pamberi pako, nokuda kwokuipa kwadzo, kuti azadzise zvaakapika kumadzibaba ako, kuna abhurahama, kuna isaka, nokuna yaqobho. naizvozvo nzwisisa kuti yeahoh allah wako haakupi nyika iyi yakanaka kuti ive yako nokuda kwokururama kwako, nokuti uri rudzi rune mutsipa mukukutu. rangarirai izvi uye musakanganwa kuti makatsamwisa yeahoh allah wenyu sei murenje. kubva nezuva ramakabuda muijipiti kusvikira muchisvika pano, makaramba muchimukira yeahoh. pahorebhi makamutsa hasha dzayeahoh zvokuti akatsamwa zvokuda kukuparadzai. pandakakwira pagomo kundogamuchira mahwendefa amabwe, iwo mahwendefa esungano iyo yakanga yaitwa nayeahoh nemi, ndakagara mugomo kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana; ndakanga ndisingadyi zvokudya kana kunwa mvura. yeahoh akandipa mahwendefa maviri amabwe akanga akanyorwa nomunwe waallah. paari pakanga pakanyorwa mirayiro yose yakanga yataurwa kwamuri nayeahoh pagomo ari mukati memoto, nezuva reungano. pakupera kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana yeahoh akandipa mahwendefa maviri amabwe, iwo mahwendefa esungano. ipapo yeahoh akandiudza kuti, “buruka ubve pano iye zvino, nokuti vanhu vako vawakabudisa kubva muijipiti vaita zvakaipa. vatsauka nokukurumidza kubva pane zvandakavarayira uye vazviitira chifananidzo chakaumbwa.” uye yeahoh akati kwandiri, “ndaona rudzi urwu, uye rudzi rune mutsipa mukukutu kwazvo! rega ndivaparadze ndigodzima zita ravo pasi pedenga. uye ndichakuita rudzi rwakasimba rwakawanda kupfuura zvavari.” saka ndakadzoka ndikaburuka kubva pagomo richiri kupfuta nomoto. uye ndakanga ndine mahwendefa maviri esungano mumaoko angu. pandakatarira, ndakaona kuti makanga matadzira yeahoh allah wenyu; makanga mazviitira chifananidzo chakaumbwa mumufananidzo wemhuru. makanga matsauka nokukurumidza kubva panzira yamakanga marayirwa nayeahoh. saka ndakatora mahwendefa maviri ndikaakanda pasi kubva mumaoko angu, akaputsika kuita zvimedu zvimedu muchizviona. ipapo zvakare ndakawira pasi nechiso changu pamberi payeahoh kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana; handina kudya zvokudya kana kunwa mvura, nokuda kwechivi chose chamakanga maita, muchiita zvakanga zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh nokudaro mukamutsa hasha dzake. ndakatya hasha nokutsamwa kwayeahoh, nokuti akanga atsamwa zvokuti angakuparadzai. asi yeahoh akandinzwa. uye yeahoh akatsamwira aroni zvokuti akada kumuparadza, asi panguva iyoyo ndakanyengetererawo aroni. uyezve ndakatora chitadzo chenyu, chimhuru chamakanga magadzira, ndikachipisa mumoto. mushure maizvozvo ndakachiparadza ndikachikuya kusvikira chakuyika seguruva uye ndikakanda guruva racho murukova rwaiyerera kubva mugomo. makatsamwisazve yeahoh patabhera, napamasa uye napakibhuroti hataavha. zvino nenguva iyo makatumwa nayeahoh kubva pakadheshi bharinea, iye akati, “endai mundotora nyika iyo yandakakupai.” asi imi makamukira murayiro wayeahoh allah wenyu. hamuna kuvimba naye kana kumuteerera. makagara muchimukira yeahoh kubvira pazuva randakatanga kukuzivai. ndakawira pasi nechiso changu pamberi payeahoh kwamazuva iwayo ane makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana nokuda kwokuti yeahoh akanga ati aizokuparadzai. ndakanyengetera kuna yeahoh ndikati, “nhai imi ishe yeahoh, musaparadza vanhu venyu, nhaka yenyu yamakadzikinura nesimba renyu guru mukavabudisa kubva kuijipiti noruoko rune simba. rangarirai varanda venyu abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho. musatarira kusindimara kworudzi urwu, uipi hwavo nechivi chavo. nokuti nyika yamakatibudisa kubva mairi ingazoti, ‘yeahoh akavabudisa akavaurayira murenje, nokuti akanga asingagoni kuvapinza munyika yaakanga avapikira, uye nokuti akanga achivavenga.’ asi ava vanhu venyu, nhaka yenyu yamakabudisa nesimba renyu guru noruoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa.”

10

panguva iyoyo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “veza mahwendefa maviri amabwe akaita saaya okutanga ugouya kwandiri pagomo. ugadzirewo zvakare areka yomuti. ndichanyora pamahwendefa mashoko akanga ari pamahwendefa okutanga awakaputsa. zvino unofanira kuaisa muareka.” saka ndakagadzira areka ndichishandisa muti womuunga uye ndikaveza mahwendefa maviri amabwe akanga akaita seokutanga, ndikakwira mugomo ndakabata mahwendefa maviri aya mumaoko angu. yeahoh akanyora pamahwendefa aya zvakafanana nezvaakanga anyora pakutanga, mirayiro gumi yaakanga akuudzai pagomo, ari mumoto, pazuva reungano. uye yeahoh akaipa kwandiri. ipapo ndakadzoka ndikaburuka pagomo ndikaisa mahwendefa muareka yandakanga ndagadzira, sezvandakanga ndarayirwa nayeahoh, uye ndimo maari nazvino. (vaisraeri vakasimuka vakabva pamatsime avajaakani vakaenda kumosera. ipapo ndipo pakafira aroni akavigwa, uye ereazari mwanakomana wake akatora chinzvimbo chake somuprista. vakasimukapo vakaenda kugudhugodha vakapfuurira kuenda kujotibhata, nyika ine hova dzemvura. panguva iyoyo yeahoh akatsaura rudzi rwavarevhi kuti vatakure areka yesungano yayeahoh, kuti vamire pamberi payeahoh vachishumira, uye kuti varopafadze vanhu muzita rayeahoh, sezvavanoita nanhasi. ndokusaka varevhi vasina mugove wenhaka pakati pehama dzavo; yeahoh ndiye nhaka yavo sezvavakaudzwa nayeahoh allah wenyu.) zvino ini ndakanga ndagara pagomo mazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana, sezvandakaita pakutanga, uye yeahoh akandinzwa panguva iyoyo zvakare. kwakanga kusiri kuda kwake kuti akuparadzei. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “enda, utungamirire vanhu panzira yavo, kuitira kuti vapinde uye vatore nyika yandakapikira madzibaba avo kuti ndichavapa.” zvino, iwe israeri, yeahoh allah wako anodeiko kwauri kunze kwokuti utye yeahoh allah wako, ufambe munzira dzake dzose, umude, uye ushumire yeahoh allah wako nomwoyo wako wose nomweya wako wose, uye uchengete mirayiro yayeahoh nemitemo yake yandinokupai nhasi kuti zvikunakire? denga, kunyange nedenga ramatenga, nenyika nezvose zviri mairi ndezvayeahoh allah wako. kunyange zvakadaro yeahoh akafarira madzitateguru enyu akavada uye akakutsaurai, imi zvizvarwa zvavo, pamusoro pedzimwe ndudzi dzose sezvazviri nhasi. naizvozvo, dzingisai mwoyo yenyu, uye murege kuva nemitsipa mikukutu zvakare. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiallah wavamwari naishe wamadzishe, allah mukuru, ane simba guru uye anotyisa, asingatsauri vanhu uye asingagamuchiri fufuro. anoruramisira nherera nechirikadzi, uye anoda mutorwa, agomupa zvokudya nezvokupfeka. uye munofanira kuda vatorwa, nokuti imi maimbovawo vatorwa muijipiti. ityai yeahoh allah wenyu mugomushumira. batirirai paari uye muite mhiko dzenyu muzita rake. ndiye rumbidzo yenyu; ndiye allah wenyu, iye akakuitirai zvinhu zvikuru nezvishamiso zvinotyisa zviya zvamakaona nameso enyu. madzitateguru enyu akaenda kuijipiti vari makumi manomwe pamwe chete, uye zvino yeahoh allah wenyu akaita kuti muwande senyeredzi dzokudenga.

11

idai yeahoh allah wenyu uye muchengete zvaakatema, mitemo yake, nemirayiro yake uye nezvaakarayira, nguva dzose. murangarire nhasi kuti vana venyu havasivo vakaona uye vakaziva kuranga kwayeahoh allah wenyu: noukuru hwake, noruoko rwake rune simba, noruoko rwake rwakatambanudzwa; nezviratidzo zvaakaita uye zvinhu zvaakaita pakati peijipiti, nokuna faro mambo weijipiti uye nokunyika yake yose; zvaakaita kuhondo yavaijipita, nokumabhiza nengoro dzayo, mafukidzirwo avakaitwa nemvura yomugungwa dzvuku pavakanga vachikuteverai, uye kuuyisa kwakaita yeahoh kuparadzwa pamusoro pavo zvachose. havasi vana venyu vakaona zvaakakuitirai murenje kusvikira masvika panzvimbo ino, uye nezvaakaita kuna dhatani naabhiramu vanakomana vaeriabhi murubheni, apo nyika yakashamisa muromo wayo ikavamedza ivo nevedzimba dzavo, namatende avo nezvipenyu zvose zvakanga zviri zvavo, pakati pavaisraeri vose. asi aiva meso enyu akaona zvinhu zvose izvi zvakaitwa nayeahoh. naizvozvo chengetai mirayiro yose yandinokupai nhasi, kuti muve nesimba rokupinda nokutora nyika yamuri kuyambuka jorodhani kuti mundoita yenyu, uye kuti mazuva enyu ave mazhinji munyika iyo yeahoh akapikira kumadzitateguru enyu kuti achavapa ivo nezvizvarwa zvavo, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi. nyika yamuri kupinda kundotora haina kufanana nenyika yeijipiti, uko kwamakabva, uko kwamaidyara mbeu dzenyu muchidiridza netsoka sezvinoitwa mubindu romuriwo. asi nyika yamuri kuyambuka jorodhani kundotora kuti ive yenyu inyika yamakomo nemipata zvinonwa mvura kubva kudenga. inyika inochengetwa nayeahoh allah wenyu; meso ayeahoh allah wenyu anoramba akaitarira kubva pakutanga kwegore kusvikira pakupera kwegore. saka kana mukateerera mirayiro yandinokupai nhasi makatendeka, mukada yeahoh allah wenyu uye mukamushumira nomwoyo wenyu wose uye nomweya wenyu wose, ipapo ndichanayisa mvura panyika yenyu nemwaka wayo, mvura yamasutso neyomunakamwe, kuitira kuti mugone kukohwa zviyo zvenyu newaini itsva namafuta. ndichameresa uswa hwemombe dzenyu kumafuro uye muchadya muchiguta. chenjerai kuti murege kunyengerwa mumwoyo yenyu kuti mutsauke muchinamata vamwe vamwari uye nokuvapfugamira. ipapo kutsamwa kwayeahoh kuchapfuta pamusoro penyu, uye achapfiga denga kuti mvura iregere kunaya uye nyika icharega kubereka zvibereko zvayo, uye imi muchakurumidza kuparara kubva panyika yakanaka yamunopiwa nayeahoh. isai mashoko angu aya mumwoyo yenyu nepfungwa dzenyu; asungirei pamaoko enyu sezviratidzo uye muasungire pahuma dzenyu. adzidzisei kuvana venyu, muchitaura pamusoro pawo pamunogara pasi uye nepamunenge muchifamba panzira, pamunorara pasi uye nepamunomuka. anyorei pamagwatidziro emikova yedzimba dzenyu uye napamasuo enyu, kuitira kuti mazuva enyu namazuva avana venyu awande panyika yakapikirwa madzitateguru enyu nayeahoh kuti achavapa, awande samazuva ayo denga richava pamusoro penyika. kana mukachenjerera kuchengeta mirayiro yangu iyi yandinokupai kuti mutevere, kuti mude yeahoh allah wenyu, kuti mufambe munzira dzake dzose nokubatirira paari, ipapo yeahoh achadzinga ndudzi dzose pamberi penyu, uye muchatorera nyika ndudzi dzakakura uye dzine simba kukupfuurai. nzvimbo ipi neipi yamuchatsika netsoka dzenyu ichava yenyu: nyika yenyu ichabva kurenje ichisvika kurebhanoni, uye ichabva kurwizi yufuratesi ichisvika kugungwa rokumavirazuva. hakuna munhu achagona kumira kuti akurwisei. yeahoh allah wenyu sezvaakakuvimbisai, achaita kuti vanhu vakutyei uye vagokuvhundukai munyika yose, kwose kwose kwamunoenda. tarirai, nhasi ndiri kuisa pamberi penyu kuropafadzwa nokutukwa, kuropafadzwa kana muchiteerera mirayiro yayeahoh allah wenyu yandinokupai nhasi; kutukwa kana mukasateerera mirayiro yayeahoh allah wenyu uye mukatsauka kubva panzira yandinokurayirai nhasi muchitevera vamwe vamwari, avo vamusati maziva. kana yeahoh allah wenyu akuendesai munyika yamuri kupinda kuti muitore, munofanira kudaidzira kuropafadzwa kuzhinji pagomo regerizimu, uye kutukwa kuzhinji pagomo reebhari. sezvamunoziva, makomo aya ari mhiri kwejorodhani, nechokumavirira kwomugwagwa, makananga kumavirazuva, pedyo nemiti mikuru yemore, munyika yavakenani vagere muarabha pedyo negirigari. mava kuda kuyambuka jorodhani kuti mupinde uye mutore nyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. kana muchinge maitora uye mava kugaramo, chenjerai kuti muteerere mitemo nemirayiro yose yandiri kuisa pamberi penyu nhasi.

12

iyi ndiyo mitemo nemirayiro yamunofanira kuchenjera kuti mutevere munyika iyo yeahoh, iye allah wamadzibaba enyu, akakupai kuti ive yenyu, mazuva ose amuchagara munyika iyi. paradzai chose nzvimbo dzose dziri pamakomo akakwirira nepazvikomo zvose uye napasi pemiti yose yakapfumvutira apo ndudzi dzose dzamunotorera nyika dzinoshumira vamwari vadzo. putsai aritari dzavo, pwanyai matombo avo ose anoera uye mupise matanda avo aashera; temai zvifananidzo zvavo nevamwari vavo uye mugodzima mazita avo panzvimbo idzodzo. hamufaniri kushumira yeahoh allah wenyu nenzira yavo. asi munofanira kutsvaka nzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh allah wenyu pakati pamarudzi enyu ose kuti aise zita rakepo agogarapo. kunzvimbo iyoyo ndiko kwamunofanira kuenda; ipapo ndipo panofanira kuuyiswa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvibayiro zvenyu, zvegumi zvenyu nezvipo zvamakatsaura, zvamakapikira kuti muchapa uye nezvipo zvokuda kwenyu, nezvibereko zvokutanga zvenzombe dzenyu uye nezvibereko zvokutanga zvamakwai enyu. ipapo pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu, imi nemhuri dzenyu muchadya mugopembera pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvamakabata namaoko enyu, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu akuropafadzai. hamufaniri kuita sezvatinoita pano nhasi, mumwe nomumwe achiita zvaanoona zvakakodzera kuita, sezvo musati masvika panzvimbo yezororo nenhaka yamunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. asi muchayambuka jorodhani mugogara munyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu senhaka, uye achakupai zororo kubva kuvavengi venyu vose vakakukomberedzai kuitira kuti mugare murugare. zvino kunzvimbo ichatsaurwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti zita rake rigarepo, ipapo munofanira kuuyisa zvose zvandakakurayirai zvinoti: zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa nezvibayiro, zvegumi zvenyu nezvipo zvakatsaurwa, uye zvinhu zvose zvakaisvonaka zvamakapikira kuna yeahoh. zvino ipapo mugopembera pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu, imi navanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu, varanda venyu navarandakadzi venyu, uye navarevhi vari mumaguta enyu, avo vasina mugove kana nhaka yavo. muchenjerere kuti musabayira zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa pose pose pamunoda. muzvipe chete panzvimbo ichatsaurwa nayeahoh mune rumwe rwamarudzi enyu, uye ipapo muchapa zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa uye muchaita zvose zvandinokurayirai. zvisinei hazvo, mungabaya henyu zvipfuwo zvenyu mumaguta enyu uye mugodya nyama pamunodira, sokunge nyama yemhara kana yenondo maererano nokuropafadzwa kwamunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. vose vasina kuchena navakachena vangadya havo. asi hamufaniri kudya ropa; munofanira kuriteurira pasi semvura. hamufaniri kudyira mumaguta enyu chegumi chezviyo zvenyu nechewaini yenyu itsva nechamafuta, kana chezvibereko zvokutanga zvenzombe dzenyu namakwai enyu, kana chipi zvacho chamakapikira kupa, kana zvipo zvokuda kwenyu kana zvipo zvakatsaurwa. asi, munofanira kuti muzvidye muri pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu panzvimbo iyo yeahoh allah wenyu achasarudza, imi, vanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu, varandarume navarandakadzi venyu, navarevhi vari mumaguta enyu uye munofanira kupembera pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvamuchabata namaoko enyu. chenjerai kuti murege kukanganwa varevhi nguva yose yamuchagara munyika yenyu. kana yeahoh allah wako achinge akurisa nyika yako sezvaakakuvimbisa, uye iwe ukapanga nyama ukati, “ndinoda nyama,” ipapo uchadya nyama yakawanda sezvaunoda. kana nzvimbo iyo inosarudzwa nayeahoh allah wako kuti aise zita rakepo iri kure newe zvikuru, ungabaya hako zvipfuwo kubva pamombe dzako namakwai ako zvawakapiwa nayeahoh, sezvandakurayira, mumaguta ako ungadya nyama yakawanda sezvaunoda. uzvidye sounodya nyama yemhara kana yenondo. vose vasina kuchena navakachena vangadya havo. asi uchenjere kuti urege kudya ropa, nokuti ropa ndihwo upenyu, naizvozvo haufaniri kudya upenyu pamwe chete nenyama. haufaniri kudya ropa, uriteurire pasi semvura. usaridya, kuti zvive zvakakunakira iwe navana vako vachakutevera, nokuti unenge uchiita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh. asi utore zvinhu zvako zvitsvene nazvose zvawakapika kuti uchazvipa, ugoenda nazvo kunzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh. uise zvipiriso zvako zvinopiswa paaritari yayeahoh allah wako, zvose zviri zviviri, nyama neropa. ropa rezvibayiro zvako rinofanira kudururwa parutivi pearitari yayeahoh allah wako, asi ungadya zvako nyama yacho. uchenjerere kuteerera mitemo yose yandinokupa, kuti zvive zvakakunakira nguva dzose iwe navana vako vachatevera mushure mako, nokuti unenge uchiita zvakanaka nezvakarurama pamberi payeahoh allah wako. yeahoh allah wenyu achaparadza kubva pamberi penyu ndudzi dzamava kuda kurwisa nokutorera nyika. asi kana muchinge madzidzinga uye magara munyika yavo, uye mushure mokunge vaparadzwa pamberi penyu, muchenjerere kuti murege kunyengerwa muchibvunza nezvavamwari vavo, muchiti, “ko, ndudzi idzi dzinoshumira vamwari vadzo sei? tichaitawo sezvavanoita.” hamufaniri kushumira yeahoh allah wenyu nenzira yavo, nokuti mukushumira vamwari vavo, vanoita zvinhu zvose zvose zvinonyangadza zvinovengwa nayeahoh. vanopisa kunyange vanakomana navanasikana vavo mumoto sezvibayiro kuna vamwari vavo. munofanira kuita zvose zvandakakurayirai; musawedzera pazviri kana kubvisa kubva pazviri.

13

kana muprofita, kana muvuki wezviroto, akasvika pakati penyu uye akakuzivisai chishamiso kana chiratidzo, uye kana chiratidzo ichi kana chishamiso chaataura nezvacho chikaitika, uye akati, “ngatiteverei vamwe vamwari” (vamwari vamusingazivi) “uye ngativanamatei,” hamufaniri kuteerera mashoko omuprofita kana muroti uyo. yeahoh allah wenyu ari kukuedzai kuti aone kana muchimuda nomwoyo wenyu wose uye nomweya wenyu wose. ndiyeahoh allah wenyu wamunofanira kutevera, uye ndiye wamunofanira kukudza. chengetai mirayiro yake mugomuteerera; mumushumire uye munamatire kwaari. muprofita kana muroti uyo anofanira kuurayiwa, nokuti akaparidza kumukira yeahoh allah wenyu, akakubudisai kubva muijipiti uye akakudzikinurai kubva munyika youranda; akaedza kukutsausai kubva panzira yayeahoh allah wenyu yamakarayirwa kuti muitevere. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. kana hama yako chaiyo, kana mwanakomana wako kana mwanasikana wako, kana mudzimai wako waunoda, kana shamwari yako yepedyo ikauya kuzokutsausa muchivande, ichiti, “handei tindonamata vamwe vamwari,” (vamwari vausina kumboziva iwe kana madzibaba ako, vamwari vendudzi dzakakupoteredzai, kunyange vari pedyo kana vari kure, kubva kuno rumwe rutivi rwenyika kusvika kuno rumwe rutivi rwenyika), usatenda zvaanotaura kana kumuteerera. usamunzwira tsitsi. usamurega ari mupenyu kana kumudzivirira. unotofanira kumuuraya zvirokwazvo. ruoko rwako ndirwo runofanira kutanga kumuuraya, zvino maoko avamwe vanhu ozotevera pakumuuraya. mutake namabwe afe, nokuti akaedza kukutsausa kubva kuna yeahoh allah wako, uyo akakubudisa kubva kuijipiti, kubva kunyika youranda. ipapo israeri yose ichazvinzwa ikatya, uye hapana kana mumwe pakati penyu achazoita chinhu chakaipa kudaro zvakare. kana ukanzwa zvichitaurwa pamusoro perimwe ramaguta amuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti mugaremo kuti vanhu vakaipa vamuka pakati penyu uye vatsausa vanhu vomuguta ravo, vachiti, “handei tindonamata vamwe vamwari,” (vamwari vausina kumboziva), ipapo unofanira kubvunzisisa, nokutsvakisisa uye nokuferefeta kwazvo. zvino kana zviri zvechokwadi uye zvanyatsoonekwa kuti ndizvo, kuti chinhu ichi chinonyangadza chakaitwa pakati penyu, munofanira zvirokwazvo kuuraya nomunondo vanhu vose varo nezvipfuwo zvaro. unganidzai zvose zvakapambwa zveguta pakati poruvazhe mugopisa chose guta uye nazvose zvakapambwa zvaro sechipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh allah wako. rinofanira kugara riri dongo nokusingaperi, risingazovakwizve. ngapasava nechimwe chezvinhu izvo zvakatongwa chinoonekwa mumaoko enyu, kuti yeahoh adzore kutsamwa kwake kukuru; achakunzwirai tsitsi, agokunzwirai ngoni uye achakuwedzerai uwandu hwenyu, sezvaakakuvimbisai nemhiko kumadzitateguru enyu, nokuti munoteerera yeahoh allah wenyu, muchichengeta mirayiro yandiri kukupai nhasi uye muchiita zvakanaka pamberi pake.

14

imi muri vana vayeahoh allah wenyu. musazvicheka kana kuzviveura pamberi pomusoro muchiitira vakafa, nokuti muri rudzi rutsvene kuna yeahoh allah wenyu. yeahoh akakutsaurai kubva pakati pendudzi dzose dziri panyika kuti muve rudzi rwake runokosha. musadya chinhu chipi zvacho chinonyangadza. idzi ndidzo mhuka dzamungadya: mombe, hwai, mbudzi, nondo, mhara, mhembwe, ngururu, mharapara, nyati nehwai yomugomo. mungadya henyu mhuka ipi neipi ina mahwanda akaparadzana kuita maviri uye inodzeya. zvisinei, pane idzo dzinodzeya kana dzina mahwanda akaparadzana, mahwanda akanyatsoparadzana, hamufaniri kudya ngamera, tsuro kana mbira. kunyange zvazvo dzichidzeya hadzina mahwanda akaparadzana; hadzina kuchena kwamuri. nguruvewo haina kuchena; kunyange zvayo ina mahwanda akaparadzana, haidzeyi. hamufaniri kudya nyama yadzo kana kubata zvitunha zvadzo. pazvipuka zvose zvinogara mumvura, mungadya henyu zvose zvine zvimbi namakwande. asi chipi nechipi zvacho chisina zvimbi namakwande hamufaniri kudya; nokuti hachina kuchena. mungadya henyu shiri ipi neipi yakachena. asi dzamusingafaniri kudya ndeidzi: gondo, gora, gora dema, njerere tsvuku, njerere nhema, rukodzi namarudzi arwo, gunguo namarudzi aro ose, zizi renyanga, kazizimbori, shiri yegungwa, namarudzi ose eruvangu, zizi duku, zizi guru, zizi jena, zizi romurenje, hukurwizi nekanyururahove, neshuramurove namarudzi ose ekondo, nemhupupu uye nechiremwaremwa. zvipuka zvose zvina mapapiro zvinokambaira hazvina kuchena kwamuri; hamufaniri kuzvidya. asi zvipuka zvose zvina mapapiro zvakachena mungadya henyu. musadya chii zvacho chamunoona chakafa. mungapa zvenyu kumutorwa agere mune rimwe ramaguta enyu, uye angadya zvake kana kuti mungatengesera zvenyu kumutorwa. asi imi muri rudzi rutsvene kuna yeahoh allah wenyu. musabika mbudzana mumukaka wamai vayo. chenjera kuti utsaure chegumi chezvinhu zvose zvaunokohwa muminda yako gore negore. udye chegumi chezviyo, newaini itsva namafuta uye nezvibereko zvokutanga zvemombe dzako nezvamakwai ako pamberi payeahoh allah wako panzvimbo yaachasarudza kuti zita rake rigarepo, kuitira kuti udzidze kutya yeahoh allah wako nguva dzose. asi kana nzvimbo yacho iri kure uye waropafadzwa nayeahoh allah wako, uye usingagoni kutakura chegumi chako (nokuti nzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh kuti zita rake rigarepo iri kure), ipapo unofanira kutsinhanisa chegumi chako nesirivha, ugotora sirivha ugoenda nayo kunzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh allah wako. shandisa sirivha yacho kutenga zvaungada, zvakadai sezvizvi: mombe, makwai, waini kana zvimwe zvokunwa zvinobata, kana chinhu chipi zvacho chaunoda. ipapo iwe neimba yako muchadya pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu mugofara. uye musazokanganwa varevhi vagere mumaguta enyu, nokuti havana mugove kana nhaka yavowo. panopera makore matatu oga oga, munofanira kuuya nezvegumi zvegore iroro uye mugozvichengetera mumaguta enyu, kuitira kuti varevhi (avo vasina mugove kana nhaka yavowo) uye nomweni, nherera nechirikadzi vanogara mumaguta enyu, vauye vagodya vachiguta, uye kuitira kuti yeahoh allah wenyu akuropafadzei pamabasa ose amaoko enyu.

15

pakupera kwamakore manomwe oga oga munofanira kudzima zvikwereti. iyi ndiyo nzira yazvinofanira kuitwa nayo: mumwe nomumwe akapa chikwereti anofanira kudzima icho chaakakweretesa hama yake muisraeri. haangarevi chikwereti kune wokwake muisraeri, kana hama yake, nokuti nguva yayeahoh yokudzima zvikwereti yaparidzwa. ungareva hako chikwereti kubva kumutorwa, asi unofanira kudzima chikwereti chipi zvacho chakakweretwa nehama yako. kunyange zvakadaro, hapafaniri kuva nomurombo pakati penyu, nokuti munyika iyo yeahoh allah wenyu yaari kukupai kuti ive yenyu senhaka, achakuropafadzai kwazvo, kana chete mukanyatsoteerera yeahoh allah wenyu nokuchenjerera kutevera mirayiro yake yose yandiri kukupai nhasi. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu achakuropafadzai sezvaakavimbisa, uye imi muchapa zvikwereti kundudzi zhinji asi imi hamungakwereti kubva kurudzi rupi zvarwo. muchatonga ndudzi zhinji asi hapana rudzi ruchakutongai. kana pane murombo pakati pehama dzenyu mune ripi zvaro guta renyika iyo yeahoh ari kukupai musaomesa mwoyo kana kupfumbatira ruoko kuhama yenyu inoshayiwa. asi munofanira kutambanudzira ruoko uye mugopa hama yenyu pachena chipi nechipi chaanoshayiwa. muchenjerere kuti murege kuva nomufungo wakaipa uyu wokuti: “gore rechinomwe, gore rokudzima zvikwereti, rava pedyo,” kuitira kuti murege kuratidza mwoyo wakaipa kuhama yenyu inoshayiwa nokurega kumupa chinhu. iye achachema kuna yeahoh pamusoro penyu, uye imi muchabatwa nemhosva yokuita chivi. upe zvakawanda uye urege kumupa nomwoyo unogununʼuna; ipapo nokuda kwechinhu ichi yeahoh allah wako achakuropafadza mumabasa ako ose uye pane chimwe nechimwe chaunobata noruoko rwako. varombo vachagara varimo munyika. naizvozvo ndinokurayira kuti utambanudze maoko kuhama dzako varombo navanoshayiwa munyika yako. kana mumwe wako wechihebheru, murume kana mukadzi, achinge azvitengesa kwauri uye achinge akushandira kwamakore matanhatu, mugore rechinomwe unofanira kumusunungura umurege aende. zvino kana uchinge wamusunungura usamusiya achienda asina chinhu. mugovere zvakawanda kubva pamakwai ako, napaburiro rako uye napachisviniro chako chewaini. mupe sokuropafadzwa kwawakaitwa nayeahoh allah wako. rangarirai kuti imi maimbova varanda muijipiti uye yeahoh allah wenyu akakudzikinurai. nokudaro ndinokupai murayiro uyu nhasi. asi kana muranda wako akati kwauri, “handidi kukusiyai,” nokuti anokuda iwe nemhuri yako uye zvakamunakira kuva newe, ipapo utore runji ugourura nzeve yake narwo pagonhi, uye achava muranda wako nokusingaperi. uite zvimwe chetezvo kumurandakadzi wako. usachiona sechinhu chakaoma kusunungura muranda wako, nokuti kukushandira kwake pamakore matanhatu kwakapfuura kakapetwa kaviri kushanda kwouyo anoshandira mubayiro. uye yeahoh allah wako achakuropafadza mune zvose zvaunoita. tsaurira yeahoh allah wako chikono chose chokutanga chemombe dzako, makwai ako. zvikono zvokutanga pakuberekwa zvemombe dzako hazvifaniri kuitiswa basa uye usaveura makushe amakwai ako akatanga kuberekwa. gore rimwe nerimwe iwe nemhuri yako munofanira kuzvidya muri pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu panzvimbo yaachasarudza. kana chipfuwo chine chachinopomerwa, chakaremara kana kuti chiri bofu, kana kuti chine chimwe chinhu chakanyanyoipa pachiri, haufaniri kuchibayira kuna yeahoh allah wako. unofanira kuchidyira mumaguta ako. vose vasina kuchena navakachena vangazvidya havo sokunge vanodya mhara kana nondo. asi haufaniri kudya ropa; riteurire pasi semvura.

16

rangarira mwedzi waabhibhi upemberere pasika yayeahoh allah wako, nokuti mumwedzi waabhibhi akakubudisa kubva muijipiti usiku. bayira yeahoh allah wako chipfuwo kubva pamakwai ako kana kubva pamombe dzako sepasika panzvimbo iyo yeahoh achasarudza kuti zita rake rigarepo. usaidya nechingwa chine mbiriso, asi kwamazuva manomwe unofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso, chingwa chokutambudzika, nokuti makabuda muijipiti muchikurumidza, kuitira kuti murangarire nguva yamakabuda kubva muijipiti. pamazuva manomwe aya ngapasawanikwa mbiriso panyika yenyu yose. musarega nyama yamunobayira usiku hwezuva rokutanga ichisara kusvikira mangwanani. hamufaniri kubayira pasika mune ripi zvaro ramaguta amunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, kunze kwenzvimbo yaachasarudza kuti zita rake rigarepo. ipapo ndipo pamunofanira kubayira pasika madekwana, kana zuva ravira, nezuva rokurangarira kwamakaita kubva muijipiti. igochei mugoidyira panzvimbo yamuchasarudzirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti zita rake rigarepo. zvino kana ava mangwanani mudzokere kumatende enyu. kwamazuva matanhatu mudye chingwa chisina mbiriso uye pazuva rechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano kuna yeahoh allah wenyu uye murege kushanda. verengai mavhiki manomwe kubva panguva yamunotanga kucheka gorosi. ipapo upemberere yeahoh allah wako mutambo wamavhiki nokupa chipo chokuda kwako maererano nokuropafadzwa kwawakaitwa nayeahoh allah wako. uye ufare pamberi payeahoh allah wako panzvimbo yaachasarudza kuti zita rake rigarepo, iwe, navanakomana vako navanasikana vako, varandarume vako navarandakadzi vako, navarevhi vari mumaguta ako, uye navatorwa, nenherera nechirikadzi dzigere pakati penyu. rangarirai kuti maiva varanda muijipiti, uye muchenjerere kuchengeta mirayiro iyi. upemberere mutambo wamatumba mazuva manomwe mushure mokunge wapedza kuunganidza zvawawana paburiro rako napachisviniro chako. ufare kwazvo pamutambo wako, iwe, navanakomana vako navanasikana vako, varandarume vako navarandakadzi vako, navarevhi vari mumaguta ako, uye navatorwa, nenherera nechirikadzi dzigere mumaguta enyu. kwamazuva manomwe upemberere mutambo kuna yeahoh allah wako panzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh, nokuti yeahoh allah wako achakuropafadza mukukohwa kwako kwose nomubasa rako rose ramaoko ako, uye mufaro wako uchazadziswa. katatu pagore varume vose pakati penyu vanofanira kuuya pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu panzvimbo iyo achasarudza: panguva yomutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso, nomutambo wamavhiki uye nomutambo wamatumba. hapana munhu anofanira kuuya asina chaakabata pamberi payeahoh: mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kuuya nechipo chakaenzanirana nokuropafadzwa kwaakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. gadzai vatongi navakuru kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwenyu muguta rimwe nerimwe ramuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, uye vagotonga vanhu nokutonga kwakanaka. musatsauka pakururamisira uye musaita rusarura. musagamuchira fufuro, nokuti fufuro rinopofumadza meso owakachenjera uye rinominamisa mashoko avakarurama. teverai kururamisira uye kururamisira chete, kuitira kuti mugorarama uye mugotora nyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. musazvimisira matanda api zvawo aashera parutivi pearitari yamunovakira yeahoh allah wenyu. uye musamisa dombo rinoera, nokuti izvi yeahoh allah wenyu anozvivenga.

17

musabayira yeahoh allah wenyu mombe kana gwai rine chakaipa pariri kana rakaremara, nokuti izvozvo zvinomunyangadza. kana pakati penyu mune rimwe ramaguta amuri kupiwa nayeahoh pakawanikwa murume kana mukadzi achiita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu, achiputsa sungano, uye akapesana nomurayiro wangu anamata vamwe vamwari, achivapfugamira kana kupfugamira zuva kana mwedzi kana nyeredzi dzokudenga, uye izvi zvaziviswa kwamuri, ipapo munofanira kunyatsozvibvunzisisa kwazvo. kana chiri chokwadi uye zvanyatsoonekwa kuti chinhu ichi chinonyangadza chakaitwa muisraeri, torai murume uyu kana mukadzi uyu akaita chinhu ichi chakaipa muende naye kusuo reguta renyu mugomutaka namabwe afe. nokupupura kwezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu munhu achaurayiwa, asi hapana munhu anofanira kuurayiwa nokupupura kwechapupu chimwe chete. maoko ezvapupu ndiwo anofanira kutanga pakumuuraya, zvino pashure maoko avanhu vose. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. kana mhaka dzikauya kumatare enyu dzakanyanya kukuomerai kuti mutonge, dzingava dzokudeurwa kweropa, dzokuendesana kumatare kana dzokurwa, endai nadzo kunzvimbo iyo yeahoh allah wenyu achasarudza. endai kuvaprista, vanova varevhi uye kuvatongi vanenge vachitonga panguva iyoyo. muvabvunze uye ivo vachakuudzai mutongo wakafanira. muite sezvavanenge vakutongerai panzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh. muchenjerere kuita zvose zvavanenge vakurayirai kuti muite. muite maererano nomurayiro wavanokudzidzisai uye nokutonga kwavanokuudzai. hamufaniri kutsauka kubva pane zvavanokuudzai, kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. munhu anozvidza mutongi kana muprista anomira achishumira pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu anofanira kufa. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa muisraeri. vanhu vose vachazvinzwa uye vagotya, uye havazozvidzi zvakare. kana muchinge mapinda munyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu uye kana muchinge maitora kuti ive yenyu, uye magara mairi, uye mukati, “ngatizvigadzirei mambo sezvakaita ndudzi dzose dzakapoteredza,” chenjererai kuti mugadze mambo achasarudzwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. anofanira kubva pakati pehama dzenyu. musazvigadzira mutorwa, uyo asiri hama yenyu muisraeri. mambo haafaniri kuva namabhiza akawanda kana kuita kuti vanhu vadzokere kuijipiti kundotora mamwe, nokuti yeahoh akutaurirai kuti, “hamufaniri kudzoka nenzira iyoyo zvakare.” haafaniri kutora madzimai akawanda, nokuti mwoyo wake ungazotsauswa. haafaniri kuunganidza sirivha negoridhe zvakawanda. kana achinge agara pachigaro chake choushe, anofanira kuzvinyorera bhuku romurayiro uyu, achitora kubva mumirayiro yavaprista vanova varevhi. anofanira kugara naro uye anofanira kuriverenga mazuva ose oupenyu hwake kuitira kuti adzidze kutya yeahoh allah wake uye agochenjerera kutevera mashoko ose omurayiro uyu nemitemo iyi. uye haafaniri kuzviona seari nani kupfuura hama dzake agotsauka kubva pamurayiro kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. ipapo iye nezvizvarwa zvake achagara nguva huru paushe hwake muisraeri.

18

vaprista vanova varevhi, zvirokwazvo rudzi rwose rwarevhi, havafaniri kuva nomugove kana nhaka pamwe chete neisraeri. vachararama nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvayeahoh, nokuti ndiyo nhaka yavo. havazovi nenhaka pakati pehama dzavo: yeahoh ndiye nhaka yavo sezvaakavavimbisa. uyu ndiwo mugove wakafanira vaprista kubva kuvanhu vanobayira nzombe kana gwai: bandauko neshaya dzacho uye nezvemukati. munofanira kuvapa zvibereko zvokutanga zvezviyo, waini itsva namafuta, uye namakushe okutanga amakwai ako, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu akavasarudza ivo nezvizvarwa zvavo, kubva pakati pamarudzi ose kuti vamire vachishumira muzita rayeahoh nguva dzose. kana murevhi akabva mune rimwe ramaguta enyu, kupi zvako muisraeri kwaanenge achigara, uye akauya nomwoyo wake wose kunzvimbo ichasarudzwa nayeahoh, anogona hake kushumira muzita rayeahoh allah wake savamwe vake vose varevhi vanoshumira ipapo pamberi payeahoh. anofanira kuwana mugove wakaenzana newavo, kunyange zvake akawana mari paakatengesa nhaka yemhuri yake. kana muchinge mapinda munyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, musadzidzira kutevedzera nzira dzinonyangadza dzendudzi dzirimo. ngapasava nomumwe pakati penyu anoita mwanakomana wake kana mwanasikana wake chibayiro chinopiswa, kana anovuka kana anoita zvamazango kana anotenda zvamashura, kana kuita zvouroyi, kana anoita zvounʼanga, kana anotenda zvamasvikiro kana anobvunza vakafa. ani naani anoita zvinhu izvi anonyangadza pamberi payeahoh, uye nokuda kwetsika idzi dzinonyangadza yeahoh allah wenyu achadzinga ndudzi idzi pamberi penyu. unofanira kuva wakarurama pamberi payeahoh allah wako. ndudzi dzamunotorera nyika dzinoteerera kuna avo vanoita zvamazango kana kuvuka. asi kana muri imi yeahoh allah wenyu haana kukutenderai kuti muite izvozvo. yeahoh allah wenyu achakumutsirai muprofita akaita seni kubva pakati pehama dzenyu. munofanira kumuteerera. nokuti izvi ndizvo zvamakakumbira yeahoh allah wenyu pahorebhi pazuva reungano apo makati, “hatidi kunzwa inzwi rayeahoh allah wedu kana kuona moto mukuru uyu zvakare, nokuti tingafa.” yeahoh akati kwandiri, “zvavataura zvakanaka. ndichavamutsira muprofita anobva pakati pehama dzavo akaita sewe; ndichaisa mashoko angu mumuromo wake, uye achavaudza zvose zvandichamurayira. kana pane munhu acharega kuteerera mashoko angu anotaurwa nomuprofita muzita rangu, ini pachangu ndichamubvunza pamusoro pazvo. asi muprofita achataura muzita rangu mashoko api zvawo andisina kumurayira kuti ataure, kana muprofita anotaura muzita ravamwe vamwari, anofanira kuurayiwa.” ungati zvako mumwoyo mako, “tingaziva seiko kuti shoko iri rataurwa nayeahoh?” kana zvakataurwa nomuprofita muzita rayeahoh zvikasaitika kana zvikasava chokwadi, shoko iroro harina kutaurwa nayeahoh. muprofita iyeye ataura zvomusoro wake. musamutya.

19

kana yeahoh allah wenyu aparadza ndudzi dzaari kukupai nyika yadzo, uye kana muchinge madzidzinga mukagara mumaguta avo nedzimba dzavo, ipapo muzvitsaurire maguta matatu ari pakati penyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ive yenyu. mugadzire migwagwa inoenda kwaari uye mugoganhura, muzvikamu zvitatu nyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu senhaka, kuitira kuti ani naani anenge auraya munhu agotizirako. uyu ndiwo murayiro pamusoro pomunhu anenge auraya mumwe munhu anotizirako kuti aponese upenyu hwake, munhu anouraya muvakidzani wake asingazivi, asina kunge amuvenga kare. somuenzaniso, munhu anogona kupinda musango nomuvakidzani wake kundotema huni, paanosimudza demo kuti ateme muti, demo rovhomoka rotema muvakidzani wake ofa. munhu iyeye anogona kutizira kune rimwe ramaguta aya agoponesa mweya wake. zvimwe, mutsivi weropa angamutevera mukutsamwa, akamubata kana rwendo rwuri rurefu kwazvo, akamuuraya kunyange zvake akanga asingafaniri kufa, sezvo asina kuzviita kumuvakidzani wake noruvengo. ndokusaka ndichikurayirai kuti muzvitsaurire maguta matatu. kana yeahoh allah wenyu achinge azokurisa nyika yenyu, sezvaakavimbisa madzitateguru enyu nemhiko, uye kana achinge akupai nyika yose yaakavimbisa, nokuti mukachenjerera kutevera mirayiro iyi yose yandinokurayirai nhasi, kuti mude yeahoh allah wenyu uye mufambe munzira dzake nguva dzose, ipapo munofanira kutsaura maguta matatu. muite izvi kuitira kuti ropa risina mhosva rirege kuteurwa munyika yenyu, yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ive nhaka yenyu, uye kuti murege kuva nemhosva yokuteura ropa. asi kana munhu achivenga muvakidzani wake akamuvandira, akamurova uye akamuuraya, akatizira kune rimwe ramaguta aya, vakuru veguta rake vanofanira kutuma munhu kuti andomutora kubva kuguta, uye vagomuisa mumaoko omutsivi weropa kuti afe. musamunzwira tsitsi. munofanira kubvisa muisraeri mhosva yokuteurwa kweropa risina mhaka, kuitira kuti zvigokunakirai. musabvisa dombo romuganhu nomuvakidzani wenyu, rakaiswa nevakakutangirai munhaka yamunogamuchira munyika yamunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ive yenyu. chapupu chimwe chete hachifaniri kupupurira munhu kuti agobatwa nemhosva yokupupura mhaka, kunyange dai akapara mhaka. nyaya inofanira kusimbiswa nouchapupu hwevaviri kana vatatu. kana chapupu chenhema chikapupurira munhu kuti ane mhaka, varume ava vari vaviri vari kuitirana nharo vanofanira kumira pamberi payeahoh napamberi pavaprista navatongi vanenge vachitonga panguva iyoyo. vatongi vanofanira kunyatsoferefeta nyaya iyi, zvino kana chapupu ichi chikabatwa kuti chinoreva nhema, chichipa uchapupu hwenhema pamusoro pehama yake, ipapo itai kwaari sezvaanga achida kuita kuhama yake. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. vanhu vose vachanzwa izvi vagotya uye chakaipa chakadai hachizoitwizve pakati penyu. musaratidza tsitsi, upenyu noupenyu, ziso neziso, zino nezino, ruoko noruoko, tsoka netsoka.

20

kana muchienda kundorwa navavengi venyu uye mukaona mabhiza nengoro nehondo huru kupfuura yenyu, musavatya, nokuti yeahoh allah, uyo akakubudisai kubva muijipiti, achava nemi. kana muchinge mava kuda kurwa, muprista anofanira kuuya kuzotaura kuvarwi. achati, “inzwai, imi israeri, nhasi muri kuenda kundorwa navavengi venyu. mwoyo yenyu ngairege kupera simba kana kutya; regai kutyiswa kana kuvhundutswa pamberi pavo. nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiye anoenda nemi kundokurwirai kuvavengi venyu kuti akukundisei.” vakuru vachatiwo kuvarwi, “pane akavaka imba yake itsva here asati aikumikidza? ngaadzokere kumba kwake, nokuti angafa pakurwa uye mumwewo akazoikumikidza. pane akarima munda womuzambiringa here uye asati atanga kudya michero yawo? ngaadzokere kumba kwake, nokuti angafa pakurwa uye mumwewo akazodya michero yawo. pane akatsidzirana nomusikana here uye asati amuwana? ngaadzokere kumba kwake, nokuti angafa pakurwa uye mumwewo akazomuwana.” ipapo vakuru vachati zvakare, “pane anotya here kana ane mwoyo unovhunduka? ngaadzokere kumba kwake kuitira kuti hama dzake dzisazorwadziwawo mwoyo saiye.” kana vakuru vachinge vapedza kutaura kuvarwi, vanofanira kugadza vatungamiri vehondo. pamunofamba muchinorwisa guta, munofanira kuriparidzira rugare. kana varugamuchira vakazarura masuo avo, vanhu vose vomo vanofanira kumanikidzwa kushanda uye vanofanira kukushandirai. kana vakaramba rugare uye vakarwa nemi, munofanira kukomba guta iroro. kana yeahoh allah wenyu achinge ariisa mumaoko enyu, muuraye varume vose vari mariri. asi kana vari vakadzi, navana nezvipfuwo uye nezvimwe zvose zviri muguta, munogona kuzvitora sezvakapambwa. uye mungashandisa zvenyu zvakapambwa izvi zvamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kubva kuvavengi venyu. izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kuita kumaguta ose ari chinhambwe kubva kwamuri uye asiri maguta endudzi dziri pedyo. asi, mumaguta endudzi amuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu senhaka, musasiya chinhu chipi zvacho chipenyu. vaparadzei zvachose, ivo vahiti, vaamori, vakenani, vaperizi, vahivhi navajebhusi, sezvamakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. nokuti vangazokudzidzisai tsika dzavo dzinonyangadza dzavanoita vachinamata vamwari wavo, mugotadzira yeahoh allah wenyu. kana mukakomba guta kwenguva refu, muchirirwisa kuti muripambe, musaparadza miti yaro nokuitema nokuti munogona kudya michero yayo. musaitema. ko, miti yomusango vanhu here, zvokuti mungaikomba? zvisinei, mungatema zvenyu miti yamunoziva kuti haisi miti yemichero mugoshandisa pakukomba kusvikira makunda guta ramuri kurwa naro.

21

kana munhu akawanikwa akafa, akatandavara musango munyika iyo yeahoh allah wako ari kukupai kuti ive yenyu, uye musingazivi kuti ndiani amuuraya, vakuru venyu navatongi vachaenda kundoera chinhambwe kubva pachitunha kusvika kumaguta akakomberedza. ipapo vakuru veguta riri pedyo nechitunha vanofanira kutora tsiru remombe risina kumboshandiswa uye risina kumbokweva pajoko, vagoenda naro kumupata usina kumborimwa kana kudyarwa uye pane rwizi runoerera. imomo mumupata vanofanira kuvhuna mutsipa wetsiru. vaprista, vanakomana varevhi vanofanira kuuya pamberi, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu akavasarudza kuti vashumire nokuropafadza muzita rayeahoh uye vanofanira kutonga pamhaka dzose dzegakava nedzokurwa. ipapo vakuru vose veguta riri pedyo nechitunha vanofanira kushamba maoko avo pamusoro petsiru rakavhunwa mutsipa mumupata. ipapo vanofanira kuti, “maoko edu haana kudeura ropa iri, uye kana meso edu haana kuona zvichiitwa. gamuchirai henyu yananiso yavanhu venyu vaisraeri, vamakadzikinura, imi yeahoh, uye musabata vanhu venyu nemhosva yokuteura ropa romunhu asina mhaka.” zvino kuteurwa kweropa kuchayananisirwa. saka muchabvisa pakati penyu mhosva yokuteurwa kweropa risina mhaka sezvo maita chinhu chakanaka pamberi payeahoh. kana muchinge maenda kundorwa navavengi venyu uye kana yeahoh allah wenyu avaisa mumaoko enyu uye mavatapa, kana ukaona pakati pavakatapwa mukadzi akanaka ukamuda, unogona kumutora ave mukadzi wako. uya naye mumba mako ugomuveura musoro, ugogurira nzara dzake, uye ugorasha nguo dzaakatapwa nadzo. mushure mokunge agara mumba mako nokuchema baba namai vake kwomwedzi wose, ipapo ugopinda kwaari, uve murume wake naiye achava mukadzi wako. kana usina kufadzwa naye, murege aende chero kwaanoda. haufaniri kumutengesa kana kumubata somuranda, sezvo uriwe wamunyadzisa. kana munhu aine vakadzi vaviri, uye achida mumwe asi asingadi mumwe, uye vose vakamuberekera vanakomana asi wedangwe ari mwanakomana womukadzi waasingadi, kana ogova pfuma yake kuvanakomana vake, haafaniri kupa kodzero yedangwe kumwanakomana womukadzi waanoda pachinzvimbo chomwana wake wedangwe chaiye, mwanakomana womukadzi waasingadi. anofanira kugamuchira mwanakomana womukadzi wake waasingadi sedangwe nokumupa mugove wakapetwa kaviri wezvose zvaanazvo. mwanakomana iyeye ndiye chiratidzo chokutanga chesimba rababa vake. kodzero yomwana wedangwe ndeyake. kana munhu aine mwanakomana akasindimara asingateereri baba vake namai vake uye asingavateereri kana vachimuranga, baba vake namai vake vanofanira kumubata vagoenda naye kuvakuru pasuo reguta. vachati kuvakuru, “mwanakomana wedu uyu akasindimara uye anotimukira. haatiteereri. anoparadza pfuma uye chidhakwa.” ipapo varume vose vomuguta rake vachamutaka namabwe afe. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. israeri yose ichazvinzwa igotya. kana munhu achinge aine mhosva yakafanira rufu, akaurayiwa uye chitunha chake chikasungirirwa pamuti, hamufaniri kusiya chitunha chake chiri pamuti usiku hwose. muone kuti mamuviga zuva rimwe chetero, nokuti ani naani akasungirirwa akatukwa naallah. hamufaniri kusvibisa nyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu senhaka.

22

kana ukaona nzombe yehama yako kana gwai rake rarasika, usarishayira hanya asi uone kuti waridzorera kwaari. kana hama iyi ichigara kure newe kana kuti usingaizivi kuti ndiani, ritore uende naro kumba undorichengeta kusvikira muridzi waro auya achiritsvaga. ipapo uridzosere kwaari. uite zvimwe chetezvo kana uchinge waona mbongoro yehama yako kana nguo yake kana chinhu chipi zvacho chaanenge arasikirwa nacho. usachisiya. kana ukaona mbongoro yehama yako kana nzombe yake yakawa panzira, usairega. ibatsire kuti imire netsoka dzayo. mukadzi haafaniri kupfeka nguo dzomurume, uye murume haafaniri kupfeka nguo dzomukadzi, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu anonyangadzwa nomunhu anoita izvi. kana ukaona dendere reshiri panzira, ringava riri mumuti kana riri pasi, uye mai vacho vachivhuvatira vana kana mazai, usatora mai pamwe chete navana vacho. unogona kutora vana vacho, asi unofanira kurega mai vacho vaende, kuitira kuti zvikunakire, uye uchava namazuva mazhinji oupenyu. kana uchinge wavaka imba itsva, unofanira kuisa rumhanda padenga remba yako kuitira kuti urege kuuyisa mhosva yeropa pamusoro pemba yako kana mumwe munhu azowa kubva padenga rayo. usadyara mbeu dzamarudzi maviri mumunda wako wemizambiringa; kana ukaita izvi hazvisi zvirimwa zvawadyara chete zvasvibiswa asi kuti nezvibereko zvomunda wemizambiringa wako zvakare. usarima nenzombe nembongoro zvakasungwa pajoko rimwe chete. usapfeka nguo dzamakushe nomucheka zvakarukwa pamwe chete. unofanira kuzviitira pfunha pamakona mana enguo yaunopfeka. kana munhu akawana mukadzi uye mushure mokuvata naye, akasamufarira, akamunyomba uye akamupa zita rakaipa achiti, “ndakawana mukadzi uyu, asi mushure mokuva naye, ndakamuwana asiri mhandara,” ipapo baba namai vomusikana uyu vanofanira kuuya nechiratidzo chokuti aiva mhandara kuvakuru veguta pasuo. baba vomusikana uyu vachati kuvakuru, “ndakapa mwanasikana wangu kuti awanikwe nomurume uyu, asi haana kumufarira. zvino anomunyomba achiti, ‘handina kuwana mwanasikana wenyu ari mhandara.’ asi hechi chiratidzo choumhandara hwomwanasikana wangu.” ipapo vabereki vake vanofanira kuwarira nguo pamberi pavakuru veguta, uye vakuru vachatora murume uyu vagomuranga. vachamuripisa mashekeri esirivha anosvika zana vagopa kuna baba vomusikana, nokuti murume uyu apa zita rakaipa kumhandara yeisraeri. iye acharamba ari mukadzi wake; haafaniri kumuramba upenyu hwake hwose. asi, kana mhaka iyi iri yechokwadi uye pasina chiratidzo choumhandara hwomusikana uyu, anofanira kuuyiswa pamukova wemba yababa vake uye ipapo varume veguta vagomutaka namabwe afe. akaita chinhu chinonyadzisa muisraeri nokuda kwokupata kwake paaiva achiri mumba mababa vake. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. kana murume akawanikwa akavata nomukadzi akawanikwa nomumwe murume, vose vari vaviri murume nomukadzi waakavata naye vanofanira kufa. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa muisraeri. kana murume akasangana muguta nemhandara yakapiwa nduma kuti iwanikwe nomumwe murume uye akavata naye, munofanira kutora vose vari vaviri mugoenda navo pasuo reguta mugovataka namabwe vafe, musikana nokuda kwokuti akanga ari muguta akasaridza mhere kuti anunurwe, uye murume uyu nokuda kwokuti akakanganisa mukadzi womumwe murume. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. asi kana murume akasangana nomusikana kunze kusango akamumanikidza kuvata naye, uye achinge akapiwa nduma yokuzowanikwa, murume aita izvi ndiye anofanira kufa chete. musaita chinhu kumusikana wacho; haana kuita chivi chinofanira rufu. mhaka iyi yakafanana neyomunhu anorwisa uye agouraya muvakidzani wake. nokuti murume uyu akawana musikana uyu kunze musango, uye kunyange musikana uyu akaita mhiko akaridza mhere, pakanga pasina aigona kumununura. kana murume akasangana nomusikana asina kupiwa nduma yokuwanikwa akamumanikidza kuvata naye uye vakawanikidzwa, acharipa baba vomusikana uyu mashekeri makumi mashanu esirivha. anofanira kuwana musikana wacho, nokuti amukanganisa. haafaniri kumuramba mazuva ose oupenyu hwake. murume haafaniri kuwana mukadzi wababa vake; haafaniri kuzvidza nhoo yababa vake.

23

hapana murume akakuvadzwa manhu ake kana kubviswa nhengo yake achapinda paungano yayeahoh. hapana munhu akaberekwa noupombwe, kana vana vake, anofanira kupinda paungano yayeahoh, kusvikira kuchizvarwa chegumi. hapana muamoni kana mumoabhu, kana munhu upi worudzi rwake anofanira kupinda paungano yayeahoh, kusvikira kuchizvarwa chegumi. nokuti havana kuuya kuzokuchingamidzai nechingwa nemvura parwendo rwenyu pamakabuda kubva muijipiti, uye vakaripa bharamu mwanakomana wabheori wepetori muaramu naharaimu kuti akutukei. asi, yeahoh allah wenyu haana kuteerera bharamu asi akashandura kutuka akakuropafadzai, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu anokudai. usatsvaka rugare kana ushamwari navo mazuva ose oupenyu hwako! haufaniri kusema muedhomu, nokuti ihama yako. usasema muijipita nokuti wakagara somutorwa munyika yake. rudzi rwechitatu rwavana vake runogona harwo kupinda paungano yayeahoh. kana muchinge maungana kuti murwe navavengi venyu, zvichengetedzei kubva pazvinhu zvose zvakaipa. kana mumwe wavarume venyu asina kuchena nokuda kwokuti akazvirotera usiku, anofanira kubuda kunze kwomusasa agareko. asi kana ava madekwana anofanira kuzvigeza, uye pakuvira kwezuva ngaapinde zvake mumusasa. munofanira kuva nenzvimbo kunze kwomusasa kwamunofanira kuenda muchinozvibatsira. sezvo panhumbi dzenyu dzokurwa nadzo paine zvokucheresa, zvino kana uchinge wapedza kuzvibatsira, unofanira kufushira gomba rawazvibatsira. nokuti yeahoh allah wako anofamba-famba pamusasa wenyu achikuchengetedzai nokukurwirai kubva kuvavengi venyu. musasa wenyu unofanira kuva mutsvene, kuitira kuti arege kuona zvisakarurama pakati penyu uye akazokufuratirai. kana muranda atizira kwauri, usamudzosera kuna tenzi wake. murege agare pakati penyu paanoda hake uye muguta ripi raachasarudza. usamumanikidza. hakuna muisraeri, murume kana mukadzi achava mhombwe. hamufaniri kuuya nomubayiro wechifeve kana wemhombwe mumba mayeahoh allah wenyu kuti mupike nawo. nokuti zvose izvi zviri zviviri zvinonyangadza yeahoh allah wenyu. usaripisa hama yako mhindu, ingava yemari kana zvokudya kana chinhu chipi zvacho chaungawane mhindu kubva pachiri. ungaripisa zvako mutorwa mhindu, asi kwete hama yako muisraeri, kuitira kuti yeahoh allah wako akuropafadze pane zvose zvaungabate noruoko rwako munyika yauri kupinda kuti ive yenyu. kana ukaita mhiko pamberi payeahoh allah wako, usanonoka kuiripa, nokuti yeahoh allah wako zvirokwazvo achaibvunza kwauri uye uchava nemhosva yechivi. asi kana ukarega kuita mhiko, haungavi nemhosva. uchenjerere kuti uite zvose zvaunotaura nomuromo wako, nokuti wakaita mhiko nokuda kwako kuna yeahoh allah wako nomuromo wako. kana ukapinda mumunda womuzambiringa womuvakidzani wako, ungadya mazambiringa ose aunoda asi haufaniri kuisa mamwe mudengu rako. kana ukapinda mumunda wezviyo womuvakidzani wako, ungavhuna hako hura noruoko rwako, asi haufaniri kucheka zviyo zvake nejeko.

24

kana murume akawana mukadzi akasafadzwa naye nokuti awana chinhu chisina kufanira paari, akamupa rugwaro rwokumuramba, uye akamudzinga kubva mumba make, uye kana mushure mokunge abva mumba make akandowanikwa nomumwe murume, uye murume wake wechipiri akasamufarira, akamupa rugwaro rwokumuramba, uye akamudzinga kubva mumba make, kana kuti murume uyu akafa, ipapo murume wake wokutanga, akambomuramba, haabvumirwi kumuwana zvakare mushure mokunge asvibiswa. izvozvo zvinonyangadza pamberi payeahoh. musauyisa chivi pamusoro penyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu senhaka. kana murume achangobva kuwana, haafaniri kuendeswa kuhondo kana kupiwa rimwe basa zvaro rokuita. kwegore rimwe chete anofanira kusununguka kuti agare pamba agofadza mukadzi wake waakawana. usatora guyo kana huyo sorubatso rwechikwereti, nokuti unenge watora zvinoraramisa munhu sorubatso. kana munhu akawanikwa achitapa hama yake yomuisraeri uye achimubata senhapwa kana kumutengesa, nyakubata munhu anofanira kufa. munofanira kubvisa chakaipa pakati penyu. muchenjere kwazvo pachirwere chamaperembudzi kuti muite chaizvoizvo zvamakarayirwa navaprista vanova varevhi. munofanira kuchenjerera kutevera zvandakavarayira. murangarire zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuna miriamu panzira mushure mokunge mabuda muijipiti. kana ukakweretesa chinhu chipi zvacho kumuvakidzani wako, usapinda mumba momuvakidzani wako kundotora zvaari kukupa sorubatso. gara panze urege munhu wauri kupa chikwereti akuvigire rubatso. kana munhu uyu ari murombo, usaende kundovata une rubatso rwake. dzosera jasi rake kwaari pakuvira kwezuva kuti agovata mariri. ipapo achakutenda, uye zvigoonekwa sokuita kwakarurama pamberi payeahoh allah wako. usamanikidza mushandi wako kana ari murombo kana munhu anoshayiwa, hazvinei kuti ihama yako muisraeri kana kuti mutorwa anogara mune rimwe ramaguta enyu. mupe mubayiro wake zuva risati ravira, nokuti iye murombo akatotarirawo pamugove wake. nokuti angazochema kuna yeahoh pamusoro pako, uye uchazova nemhosva yokutadza. madzibaba haafaniri kuurayiwa nokuda kwevana vavo, kana vana kuurayiwa nokuda kwamadzibaba avo; mumwe nomumwe achafira chivi chake. usarega kururamisira mutorwa kana nherera, uye usatora nguo yechirikadzi sorubatso. murangarire kuti maimbova varanda muijipiti uye yeahoh allah wenyu akakudzikinurai kubva ikoko. ndokusaka ndichikurayirai kuti muite izvi. kana uchikohwa munda wako ukakanganwa chisote, usachidzokera kundochitora. chisiyire mutorwa, nherera kana chirikadzi, kuitira kuti yeahoh allah wako agokuropafadza mumabasa ose amaoko ako. kana wazunza miti yako yamaorivhi, usandozunzazve rwechipiri. siyira asara kumutorwa, nherera nechirikadzi. kana uchikohwa mazambiringa mumunda wako womuzambiringa, usadzokorora kukohwa. siyira zvinosara kumutorwa, nherera nechirikadzi. murangarire kuti maiva varanda muijipiti. ndokusaka ndichikurayirai kuti muite izvi.

25

kana vanhu vane gakava, vanofanira kuenda kudare uye vatongi vachatonga nyaya iyi, vachiruramisira asina mhosva nokupa mhosva uyo akatadza. kana munhu ane mhosva achifanira kurohwa, mutongi anofanira kumuti arare pasi agoita kuti arohwe pamberi pake neshamhu dzakafanira mhosva yake. asi haafaniri kupiwa shamhu dzinodarika makumi mana. kana akarohwa zvakapfurikidza mwero, hama yako inenge yazvidzwa pamberi pako. usasunga muromo wenzombe kana ichipura zviyo. kana hama dzichigara pamwe chete mumwe wavo akafa asina mwanakomana, chirikadzi yake haifaniri kuwanikwa kunze kwemhuri. hama yomurume wake inofanira kumutora nokumuwana uye agoita zvinofanira kuitwa nehama yomurume wake kwaari. mwanakomana wokutanga waachabereka anofanira kutora zita rehama yake yakafa kuitira kuti zita rake rirege kudzimwa muisraeri. asi, kana munhu asingadi kuwana mukadzi wehama yake, mukadzi achaenda kuvakuru pasuo reguta agoti, “hama yomurume wangu yaramba kumutsa zita romukoma wake muisraeri. haadi kuita zvinofanira kuitwa nehama yomurume kwandiri.” ipapo vakuru veguta romurume uyu vanofanira kumudana vataure naye. kana akaramba achiti, “handidi zvangu kumuwana,” chirikadzi yehama yake inofanira kuenda kwaari pamberi pavakuru, agomubvisa imwe yeshangu dzake, uye agomusvipira mate kumeso achiti, “izvi ndizvo zvinoitwa kumurume anoramba kuvaka imba yomukoma wake.” imba yomurume uyu ichazivikanwa muisraeri nezita rokuti imba yomurume akabviswa shangu yake. kana varume vaviri vachirwa ipapo mukadzi womumwe wavo akauya kuzonunura murume wake pane anomurwisa, uye akaswedera akabata murume uya nhengo dzake, munofanira kugura ruoko rwake. musamunzwira tsitsi. usava nezviyereso zviviri zvisina kuenzana muhomwe yako, chimwe chinorema, chimwe chakareruka. usava nezvipimiso zviviri zvakasiyana mumba mako, chimwe chikuru, chimwe chiduku. unofanira kuva nezviereso nezvipimiso zvakanaka uye zvechokwadi kuitira kuti ugorarama mazuva mazhinji munyika yauri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wako. nokuti yeahoh allah wako anonyangadzwa nomunhu anoita zvinhu izvi, munhu upi zvake, anoita zvinhu nokusatendeka. murangarire zvamakaitirwa navaamareki parwendo rwenyu pamakabuda kubva muijipiti. pamakanga maziya uye maneta, vakasangana nemi parwendo rwenyu vakauraya vose vakanga vachisaririra shure; vakanga vasingatyi allah. kana yeahoh allah wenyu akupai zvose kubva kuvavengi vakakupoteredzai munyika yaari kukupai kuti ive yenyu senhaka, munofanira kudzima kurangarirwa kwaamareki kubva pasi pedenga. musazokanganwa!

26

kana uchinge wapinda munyika yauri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wako senhaka uye kana uchinge waitora wava kugara mairi, utore zvimwe zvezvibereko zvose zvokutanga zvauchakohwa kubva pavhu renyika yauri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wako ugozviisa mudengu. ipapo ugoenda kunzvimbo iyo yeahoh allah wako achasarudza kuti zita rake rigarepo, uye ugoti kumuprista ari kushumira panguva iyoyo, “ndinozvireva nhasi pamberi payeahoh allah wako kuti ndasvika munyika yakapikirwa madzitateguru edu nayeahoh kuti achatipa.” muprista anofanira kutora dengu kubva mumaoko ako agoriisa pasi pamberi pearitari yayeahoh allah wake. ipapo uchataura pamberi payeahoh allah wako, uchiti, “baba vangu vakanga vari muaramu mufambi, vakadzika vakaenda kuijipiti navanhu vashoma uye vakagarako vakazova rudzi rukuru, rune simba uye runa vanhu vazhinji. asi vaijipita vakatiitira zvakaipa, vakatitambudza, vachitibatisa basa rinorema. ipapo takadana kuna yeahoh, iye allah wamadzibaba edu, uye yeahoh akanzwa inzwi redu akaona kutambudzika kwedu, kushandiswa nokumanikidzwa kwedu. saka yeahoh akatibudisa muijipiti nechanza chine simba uye noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, nezvinotyisa, nezviratidzo uye nezvishamiso. akatiuyisa panzvimbo ino akatipa nyika ino, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi. zvino ndauya nezvibereko zvokutanga zvevhu ramakandipa imi, iyemi yeahoh.” uise dengu pamberi payeahoh allah wako uye ugopfugama pamberi pake. uye iwe navarevhi, navatorwa vari pakati penyu muchafara mune zvose zvakanaka zvawakaitirwa nayeahoh allah wako, iwe nemhuri yako. kana uchinge wapedza kutsaura chegumi chezvose zvawakawana mugore rechitatu, gore rechegumi, uchachipa kuvarevhi, nokumutorwa, nokunherera uye nokuchirikadzi, kuitira kuti vagodya vachiguta mumaguta enyu. ipapo ugoti kuna yeahoh allah wako, “ndabvisa mugove mutsvene paimba yangu uye ndaupa kumurevhi, nokumutorwa, nokunherera uye nokuchirikadzi, maererano nezvose zvamakarayira. handina kutsauka kubva pamirayiro yenyu kana kukanganwa kunyange mumwe chete zvawo. handina kudya kana chikamu zvacho chomugove mutsvene panguva yandaiva pakuchema, kana kubvisa chikamu chawo panguva yandaiva ndisina kunatswa, kana kupa chikamu chawo kuvakafa. ndakateerera yeahoh allah wangu; ndaita zvose zvamakandirayira. tarirai muri kudenga, panzvimbo yougaro hwenyu tsvene, mugoropafadza vanhu venyu israeri uye nenyika yamakatipa sezvamakavimbisa nemhiko kumadzitateguru edu, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi.” yeahoh allah wenyu anokurayirai nhasi kuti muteerere mitemo nemirayiro iyi; muchenjerere kuichengeta nomwoyo wenyu wose uye nomweya wenyu wose. mareva nhasi kuti yeahoh ndiye allah wenyu uye kuti muchafamba munzira dzake, uye kuti muchamuteerera. uye yeahoh azvireva nhasi kuti imi muri vanhu vake, pfuma yake inokosha sezvaakavimbisa, uye kuti imi muchachengeta mirayiro yake. ati achakukurisai kwazvo kupfuura ndudzi dzose dzaakaita pakurumbidzwa, napamukurumbira napakukudzwa kuti muve rudzi rutsvene kuna yeahoh allah wenyu, sezvaakavimbisa.

27
