zvino mozisi navakuru veisraeri vakarayira vanhu vachiti, “chengetai mirayiro iyi yose yandinokupai nhasi. kana muchinge mayambuka jorodhani muchipinda munyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, munofanira kumisa mabwe makuru mugoapenda nesuko. mugonyora pamusoro pawo mashoko ose nomurayiro uyu kana muchinge mayambuka mhiri kuti mupinde munyika yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi, sezvamakavimbiswa nayeahoh, iye allah wamadzibaba enyu. zvino kana muchinge mayambuka jorodhani, misai mabwe aya pagomo reebhari, sezvandakurayirai nhasi, mugoapenda nesuko. muvake aritari yayeahoh allah wenyu ipapo, aritari yamabwe. musashandisa simbi pakumisa mabwe aya. muvake aritari yayeahoh allah wenyu namabwe asina kuvezwa uye mugobayirapo kuna yeahoh allah wenyu zvipiriso zvinopiswa. mubayire zvipiriso zvokuwadzana ipapo, muzvidye muchipembera pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu. uye munofanira kunyora mashoko aya ose omurayiro pamabwe amakamisa aya zvinonyatsoonekwa.” ipapo mozisi navaprista vanova varevhi, vakataura kuvaisraeri vose vakati, “nyararai imi israeri, uye muteerere! iye zvino mava rudzi rwayeahoh allah wenyu. naizvozvo teererai yeahoh allah wenyu uye mugotevera mirayiro nemitemo yandinokupai nhasi.” pazuva rimwe chetero mozisi akarayira vanhu achiti: kana muchinge mayambuka jorodhani, aya ndiwo marudzi anofanira kundomira pamusoro pegomo regerizimu kuti varopafadze vanhu: simeoni, revhi, yeahudha, isakari, yosefa nabhenjamini. uye marudzi aya ndiwo achamira pagomo reebhari kuti vadanidzire kutuka: rubheni, gadhi, asheri, zebhuruni, dhani, nanafutari. varevhi vachataura kuvanhu vose veisraeri nenzwi guru vachiti: “ngaatukwe munhu anoita chifananidzo chakavezwa kana chakaumbwa, chinhu chinonyangadza yeahoh, basa ramaoko emhizha, uye agochimisa pakavanzwa.” “ngaatukwe munhu anozvidza baba kana mai vake.” “ngaatukwe munhu anoshandura muganhu womuvakidzani wake.” “ngaatukwe munhu anotsausa bofu panzira.” “ngaatukwe munhu anorega kururamisira mutorwa, nherera kana chirikadzi.” “ngaatukwe munhu anovata nomukadzi wababa vake, nokuti azvidza nhoo yababa vake.” “ngaatukwe munhu anovata nemhuka ipi zvayo.” “ngaatukwe munhu anovata nehanzvadzi yake, mwanasikana wababa vake, kana mwanasikana wamai vake.” “ngaatukwe munhu anovata namai vomukadzi wake.” “ngaatukwe munhu anouraya muvakidzani pakavanda.” “ngaatukwe munhu anogamuchira fufuro kuti auraye munhu asina mhosva.” “ngaatukwe munhu asingasimbisi mashoko omurayiro uyu nokuaita.”

28

kana muchiteerera zvakanaka yeahoh allah wenyu nokuchenjerera kutevera mirayiro yake yose yandinokupai nhasi, yeahoh allah wenyu achakuisai pamusoro-soro pendudzi dzose dzapanyika. maropafadzo aya ose achauya pamusoro penyu uye achava nemi kana muchiteerera yeahoh allah: ucharopafadzwa muguta uye ucharopafadzwa mumunda. zvibereko zvomuviri wako zvicharopafadzwa, uye zvibereko zvevhu rako nezvibereko zvemombe dzako, mhuru dzemhou dzako uye namakwayana amakwai ako. dengu rako nomudziyo waunokanyira chingwa zvicharopafadzwa. ucharopafadzwa kana uchipinda uye ucharopafadzwa kana uchibuda. yeahoh achaita kuti vavengi vako, vanokumukira kuti vakurwise, vakundwe pamberi pako. vachauya kwauri nenzira imwe chete asi vagotiza vachibva kwauri nenzira nomwe. yeahoh achakutumira kuropafadzwa pamatura ako uye nepane zvose zvauchabata namaoko ako. yeahoh allah wako achakuropafadza munyika yaari kukupa. yeahoh achakusimbisai sorudzi rwake rutsvene, sezvaakakuvimbisai nemhiko, kana mukachengeta mirayiro yayeahoh allah wenyu uye mukafamba munzira dzake. ipapo marudzi ose ari panyika achazviona kuti munodanwa nezita rayeahoh, uye vachakutyai. yeahoh achakupa pfuma zhinji, muzvibereko zvomuviri wako, zvibereko zvezvipfuwo zvako uye nezvirimwa zvevhu rako, munyika yaakapikira kumadzitateguru ako kuti achakupa. yeahoh achazarura matenga, matura ake epfuma zhinji, kuti atumire mvura panyika yako nenguva uye acharopafadza mabasa ose amaoko ako. iwe uchakweretesa ndudzi zhinji asi iwe haungakwereti. yeahoh achakuita musoro, kwete muswe. kana ukanyatsoteerera kumirayiro yayeahoh allah wako yandinokupa nhasi uye ukachenjerera kuitevera, ucharamba uri pamusoro chete, haungavi pasi. usatsauka kubva pane mumwe wemirayiro yandinokupa nhasi, kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe, uchitevera vamwe vamwari kuti uvashumire. asi, kana usingateereri yeahoh allah wako uye usingachenjereri kutevera mirayiro yake yose nemitemo yandinokupa nhasi, kutukwa kwose uku kuchava pamusoro pako, uchakundwa nako: uchatukwa muguta uye uchatukwa mumunda. dengu rako nomudziyo wako wokukanyira chingwa zvichatukwa. chibereko chomuviri wako chichatukwa, uye zvirimwa zvevhu rako, nemhuru dzemhou dzako namakwayana amakwai ako. uchatukwa kana uchipinda uye uchatukwa kana uchibuda. yeahoh achatuma kutukwa pamusoro pako, nokunyonganiswa uye nokurangwa pazvinhu zvose zvaunobata namaoko ako, kusvikira waparadzwa uye kusvikira waparara nokukurumidza nokuda kwezvakaipa zvawakaita zvokumuramba. yeahoh achakurova nedenda nezvirwere kusvikira akuparadza kubva panyika yauri kupinda kuti uitore. yeahoh achakurova nechirwere chinoondesa, nefivha nokupisa kwomuviri, nokupisa kukuru, nokusanaya kwemvura nenyunje, nokuvhuvha, uye zvichakutevera kusvikira waparara. denga riri pamusoro pako richaita sendarira, nenyika iri pasi pako sedare. yeahoh achashandura mvura yenyika yako ikava guruva nemhukuta; richanaya kubva kudenga kusvikira waparadzwa. yeahoh achaita kuti mukundwe navavengi venyu. muchauya nenzira imwe chete kuzorwa navo asi mugotiza pamberi pavo nenzira nomwe, uye muchava chinhu chinotyisa kumarudzi ose apanyika. zvitunha zvenyu zvichava zvokudya zveshiri dzedenga nezvikara zvenyika, uye hapana achazvidzinga. yeahoh achakurovai namamota eijipiti uye namaronda, nemhezi nokuswinya zvicharamba kupora. yeahoh achakurovai nokupenga, upofu nokunyonganiswa kwepfungwa. panguva yamasikati uchatsvanzvadzira sebofu murima. haungabudiriri pane zvose zvauchaita; zuva nezuva uchamanikidzwa uye uchabirwa pasina anokununura. uchatsidzirana nomukadzi kuti umuwane, asi mumwe murume achamuwana agovata naye. uchavaka imba asi haungagarimo. uchasima munda womuzambiringa asi haungatongotangi kana kudya michero yawo. nzombe yako ichaurayiwa pamberi pako, asi haungadyi nyama yacho. mbongoro yako ichatorwa nechisimba kubva kwauri uye haizodzorerwi. makwai ako achapiwa kuvavengi vako, uye hapana achaanunura. vanakomana vako navanasikana vako vachapiwa kuno rumwe rudzi, uye meso ako achaneta nokuvatsvaka zuva nezuva, usisina kana simba rokusimudza ruoko. rudzi rwausingazivi ruchadya zvibereko zvevhu rako nesimba rako, uye uchava nokumanikidzwa kuno utsinye mazuva ose. zvauchaona zvichakupengesa. yeahoh achakurova mumabvi nomumakumbo namamota anorwadza asingarapiki, achibva pasi petsoka dzako kusvikira pamusoro pomusoro wako. yeahoh achakudzingirai, imi namambo wamakagadza kuti akutongei, kunyika yamusingazivi imi kana madzibaba enyu, ikoko muchandonamata vamwe vamwari, vamwari vamatanda namabwe. muchava chinhu chinotyisa, chinhu chinotukwa uye chinozvidzwa kundudzi dzose kwamuchadzingirwa nayeahoh. uchadyara mbeu yakawanda mumunda mako asi uchakohwa zvishoma, nokuti zvichaparadzwa nemhashu. ucharima minda yemizambiringa ugoitimbira, asi haunganwi waini yacho kana kutanha mazambiringa acho, nokuti achadyiwa namakonye. muchava nemiti yemiorivhi munyika yenyu yose asi haungashandisi mafuta acho, nokuti miorivhi yako ichazuka. uchabereka vanakomana navanasikana asi haungavachengeti, nokuti vachaenda kuutapwa. miti yako yose nezvibereko zvevhu rako zvose zvichadyiwa nemhashu. mutorwa anogara pakati penyu acharamba achibudirira kupfuura iwe, asi iwe ucharamba uchidzikira pasi pasi. achakukweretesa, asi iwe haungamukweretesi. achava musoro asi iwe uchava muswe. kutukwa kwose uku kuchauya pamusoro pako. vachakutevera vagokubata kusvikira vakuparadza, nokuti hauna kuteerera yeahoh allah wako nokuchengeta mirayiro nemitemo yake yaakakupa. ivo vachava chiratidzo nechishamiso kwamuri uye nokuzvizvarwa zvenyu nokusingaperi. nokuti hamuna kushumira yeahoh allah wenyu nomufaro nokupembera panguva yokubudirira, naizvozvo munzara nenyota, mukushama nomuurombo hwakaipisisa, muchashandira vavengi vakatumwa nayeahoh kuzokurwisai. achaisa joko resimbi pamutsipa wako kusvikira akuparadza. yeahoh achauyisa rudzi kubva kure kuzokurwisai, kubva kumigumo yenyika, segondo rinobhururuka, rudzi rune mutauro wamusinganzwisisi, rudzi runotyisa kutarisa rusingakudzi vatana kana kunzwira tsitsi vaduku. vachaparadza zvibereko zvezvipfuwo zvenyu nezvirimwa zveminda yenyu kusvikira maparadzwa. havangakusiyirei zviyo, waini itsva kana mafuta, kunyange mhuru dzemhou dzenyu kana makwayana amakwai enyu kusvikira maparadzwa. vachakomba maguta ose munyika yenyu yose kusvikira masvingo marefu amunovimba nawo awira pasi. vachakomba maguta ose ari munyika yenyu yose yamuri kupiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. nokuda kwokutambudzwa nomuvengi panguva yaachakukombai, muchadya zvibereko zvezvizvaro zvenyu, nyama yavanakomana navanasikana vamakapiwa nayeahoh. kunyange munhu uya munyoro anonzwisisa pakati penyu haazovi netsitsi kuhama yake chaiyo kana kumukadzi wake waanoda kana kuvana vake vaanoda vapenyu, uye haangapi kune mumwe wavo nyama yevana vake yaari kudya. ndiyo yoga yaachange asarirwa nayo nokuda kwokutambudzwa kwamuchaitwa nomuvengi wenyu panguva yaachakomba maguta enyu ose. mukadzi ane unyoro uye anonzwisisa pakati penyu, ane unyoro nokunzwisisa zvokuti haangatsiki pasi norutsoka rwake pakati penyu, achava nomufungo wakaipa kumurume waanoda nokumwanakomana kana mwanasikana wake achangobva kuzvarwa kubva muchizvaro chake uye nevana vaanobereka. nokuti anenge achida kuzovadya pakavanzika panguva yokukombwa nokutambudzwa kwamuchaitwa nomuvengi wenyu muri mumaguta enyu. kana mukasachenjerera kutevera mashoko ose omurayiro uyu, akanyorwa mubhuku iri, uye mukasatya zita iri rinobwinya uye rinotyisa, yeahoh achatumira hosha dzinotyisa pamusoro penyu imi nezvizvarwa zvenyu, njodzi namatambudziko asingaperi, nezvirwere zvakaipisisa zvisingaperi. achauyisa hosha dzose dzokuijipiti pamusoro penyu, idzo dzamunotya, uye dzichabatirira pamuri. yeahoh achauyisawo pamusoro penyu zvirwere zvamarudzi ose nenjodzi dzisina kunyorwa mubhuku iri romurayiro, kusvikira maparadzwa. imi maimbova makawanda senyeredzi dzokudenga muchasara mangova vashoma, nokuti hamuna kuteerera yeahoh allah wenyu. sezvazvakafadza yeahoh kuti imi mubudirire uye muwande, naizvozvo zvichamufadza kuti akuitirei zvakaipa uye akuparadzei. muchadzurwa kubva munyika yamuri kupinda kuti ive yenyu. yeahoh achakuparadzirai pakati pendudzi, kubva kuno rumwe rutivi rwenyika kusvika kuno rumwe. ikoko muchanamata vamwe vamwari, vamwari vamatanda namabwe, vamusina kumboziva imi kana madzibaba enyu. pakati pendudzi idzodzo haungawani zororo, kana nzvimbo yokuisa rutsoka rwako. ikoko yeahoh achakupa kufunganya, meso akaneta nokutarisira uye nokuora mwoyo. uchararama upenyu hwako hwakarembera nguva dzose, wakazadzwa nokutya usiku namasikati, usina chokwadi pamusoro poupenyu hwako. mangwanani muchati, “dai chete anga ari madekwana!” uye madekwana muchati, “dai chete anga ari mangwanani!”—nokuda kwokutya kuchazadza mwoyo yenyu nokuda kwezvinhu zvamuchaona nameso enyu. yeahoh achakudzoserai kuijipiti muri muzvikepe parwendo rwandakati hamufaniri kuzoruonazve. ikoko muchada kuzvitengesa kuvavengi venyu savarandarume kana varandakadzi, asi hapana angada kukutengai.

29

aya ndiwo mashoko esungano akarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh kuti aaite navana veisraeri munyika yemoabhu, kupamhidzira pamusoro pesungano yaakaita navo pahorebhi. mozisi akadana vaisraeri vose akati kwavari: meso enyu akaona zvose zvakaitwa nayeahoh muijipiti kuna faro, namachinda ake ose uye nokunyika yake yose. nameso enyu chaiwo makaona miedzo iya mikuru, nezviratidzo nezvishamiso zviya zvikuru. asi kusvikira nanhasi yeahoh haana kukupai pfungwa dzokunzwisisa kana meso okuona kana nzeve dzokunzwa. pamakore makumi mana andakakutungamirirai nomurenje, nguo dzenyu hadzina kusakara, kunyange neshangu dzenyu dzamaiva makapfeka. hamuna kudya chingwa kana kunwa waini kana zvimwe zvinodhaka. ndakaita izvi kuti muzive kuti ndini yeahoh allah wenyu. pamakasvika panzvimbo ino, sihoni mambo weheshibhoni naogi mambo webhashani vakauya kuzotirwisa, asi takavakunda. takatora nyika yavo tikaipa kuvarubheni, navagadhi nokuhafu yorudzi rwamanase kuti ive nhaka yavo. chenjerai kuti munyatsotevera mashoko esungano iyi kuitira kuti muzobudirira pazvinhu zvose zvamunoita. imi mose nhasi makamira pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu, vatungamiri venyu navarume vose veisraeri, pamwe chete navana venyu navakadzi venyu, navatorwa vanogara pamisasa yenyu vanokutemerai huni dzenyu uye vanokukuchererai mvura. makamira pano kuti muite sungano nayeahoh allah wenyu, sungano iyo yeahoh ari kuita nemi nhasi achiisimbisa nemhiko, kuti akusimbisei nhasi savanhu vake, kuti ave allah wenyu sezvaakavimbisa uye sezvaakapika kumadzibaba enyu, abhurahama, naisaka, nayaqobho. ndiri kuita sungano iyi, nemhiko yacho, kwete nemi chete, imi makamira nesu pano nhasi uno pamberi payeahoh allah wedu, asi navayawo vasiri pano nhasi. imi pachenyu munoziva magariro atakaita muijipiti uye namapfuuriro atakaita nomunyika dzatakafamba nemadziri parwendo kusvikira tasvika pano. makaona pakati padzo zvifananidzo nezviumbwa zvinonyangadza zvamatanda namabwe, zvesirivha negoridhe. muchenjerere kuti parege kuva nomurume kana mukadzi, mhuri kana rudzi pakati penyu nhasi vano mwoyo unotsauka kubva kuna yeahoh allah wenyu kuti vaende vachindonamata vamwari vendudzi idzodzo; chenjererai kuti pakati penyu parege kuva nomudzi unobereka muchetura unovava kudaro. kana munhu akadaro akanzwa mashoko emhiko iyi, anozviropafadza uye naizvozvo agofunga kuti, “ndichava norugare, kunyange ndikaramba ndichifamba nenzira yangu.” izvi zvichauyisa njodzi panyika nyoro uye napanyika yakaoma. yeahoh haazombodi kumukanganwira; hasha dzake neshungu dzake zvichapisa pamusoro pomunhu uyo. kutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubhuku iri kuchawira pamusoro pake, uye yeahoh achadzima zita rake kubva pasi pedenga. yeahoh achamutsaura iye ari oga kubva pamarudzi ose eisraeri kuti amuise panjodzi, maererano nokutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubhuku iri romurayiro. vana venyu, ivo zvizvarwa zvichazokuteverai uye navatorwa vachauya kubva kunyika dziri kure pavachazoona matambudziko achawira nyika uye nezvirwere zvaicharohwa nazvo nayeahoh. nyika yose inenge ichitsva nokuparadzwa nomunyu nesafuri, pasina zvakadyarwa, pasina zvinomeramo, pasina uswa nemiti zvinokuramo. zvichaita sokuparadzwa kwesodhomu negomora kana kuparadzwa kweadhama nezebhoimi, idzo yeahoh akaparadza mukutsamwa kwake kunotyisa. ndudzi dzose dzichabvunza dzichiti, “ko, sei yeahoh akaita izvi kunyika iyi. sei akatsamwa zvinotyisa kudai?” zvino mhinduro yacho ichava yokuti, “nemhaka yokuti vanhu vake vakasiya sungano yayeahoh, iye allah wamadzibaba avo, sungano yaakaita navo paakavabudisa kubva muijipiti. vakabva vakaenda vakandonamata vamwe vamwari uye vakavapfugamira, vamwari vavakanga vasingazivi, vamwari vaakanga asina kuvapa. naizvozvo kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapisa pamusoro penyika iyi, zvokuti akauyisa pamusoro payo kutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubhuku iri. mukutsamwa kunotyisa nehasha huru yeahoh akavadzura kubva munyika yavo akavarasira kune imwe nyika sezvazvakaita iye zvino.” zvinhu zvakavanzika ndezvayeahoh allah wedu, asi zvinhu zvakaratidzwa ndezvedu isu navana vedu nokusingaperi, kuti tigotevera mashoko ose omurayiro uyu.

30

kana kuropafadzwa nokutukwa uku kwose kwandaisa pamberi penyu kwakuwirai uye mazviisa pamwoyo kwose kwamunoparadzirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu pakati pendudzi, uye kana iwe navana vako ukadzokera kuna yeahoh allah wako ukamutereera nomwoyo wako wose nomweya wako wose maererano nezvose zvandakurayirai nhasi, ipapo yeahoh allah wenyu achakudzorerai pfuma yenyu agokunzwirai tsitsi nokukuunganidzai kubva kundudzi dzose kwaakakuparadzirai. kunyange dai manga makarasirwa kunyika iri kure kwazvo pasi pedenga, kubva ikoko yeahoh allah wenyu achakuunganidzai uye agokudzosai. achakudzosai kunyika yamadzibaba enyu, uye muchaitora igova yenyu. achakuitai kuti munyanyobudirira uye muwande kupfuura madzibaba enyu. yeahoh allah wenyu achadzingisa mwoyo yenyu nemwoyo yezvizvarwa zvenyu, kuitira kuti mugomuda nomwoyo wenyu wose uye nomweya wenyu wose, mugorarama. yeahoh allah wenyu achaisa kutukwa uku kwose pamusoro pavavengi venyu vanokuvengai nokukutambudzai. muchateererazve yeahoh uye muchatevera mirayiro yake yose yandiri kukupai nhasi. ipapo yeahoh allah wako achakupfumisa zvikuru mumabasa ose amaoko ako nechibereko chomuviri wako, nezvibereko zvezvipfuwo zvako uye nezvibereko zvevhu rako. yeahoh achafadzwazve newe agokupfumisa, sokufadzwa kwaakaitwa namadzibaba ako, kana ukateerera yeahoh allah wako uye ukachengeta mirayiro yake nemitemo yake yakanyorwa mubhuku iri romurayiro uye ukadzoka kuna yeahoh allah wako nomwoyo wako wose nomweya wako wose. zvino zvandiri kukurayirai nhasi hazvina kunyanya kukuomerai kana kuva kure nemi. hauzi kudenga, zvokuti mungabvunza muchiti, “ndiani achatikwirira kudenga kundoutora agotiparidzira kuti tiuite?” kana kuti uri mhiri kwegungwa zvokuti mungabvunza muchiti, “ndiani angatiyambukira mhiri kundotitorera kuti atiparidzire kuti tiuite.” kwete, shoko riri pedyo newe kwazvo; riri mumuromo mako nomumwoyo mako kuti uriite. tarira, ndaisa pamberi pako nhasi upenyu noupfumi, uye rufu nokuparadzwa. nokuti ndinokurayira kuti ude yeahoh allah wako nhasi, kuti ufambe munzira dzake nguva dzose uye uchengete zvaakarayira, mitemo nemirayiro yake; ipapo uchararama ugowanda, uye yeahoh allah wako achakuropafadza munyika yauri kupinda kuti uitore. asi kana mwoyo wako ukatsauka uye kana usingateereri, uye kana ukakwezvwa kuti undopfugamira vamwe vamwari ugovanamata, ndinokuudza nhasi kuti uchaparadzwa zvirokwazvo. haungararami kwenguva refu munyika yamuri kuyambuka jorodhani kuti mupinde mugoitora. nhasi uno ndinodana denga nenyika kuti zvikupupurirei kuti ndaisa pamberi penyu upenyu nerufu, maropafadzo nokutukwa. zvino sarudza upenyu, kuitira kuti iwe navana vako mugorarama. uye ugoda yeahoh allah wako, uteerere inzwi rake, uye ugobatirira paari. nokuti yeahoh ndiye upenyu hwako, uye achakupa makore mazhinji munyika yaakapika kuti achaipa kumadzibaba enyu abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho.

31

ipapo mozisi akaenda akandotaura mashoko aya kuvaisraeri vose achiti: “zvino ndava namakore zana namakumi maviri uye handichagoni kukutungamirirai. yeahoh akati kwandiri, ‘iwe haufaniri kuyambuka jorodhani urwu.’ yeahoh allah wenyu pachake ndiye achayambuka ari pamberi penyu. achaparadza ndudzi idzi dzose pamberi penyu, mugotora nyika yavo. yeahoshua ndiye achayambuka ari pamberi penyu, sezvakataurwa nayeahoh. zvino yeahoh achavaitira ivo zvaakaitira sihoni naogi, madzimambo avaamori, vaakaparadza pamwe chete nenyika yavo. yeahoh achavaisa kwamuri, uye munofanira kuvaitira zvose zvandakakurayirai. simbai mutsunge mwoyo. musatya kana kuvhundutswa nokuda kwavo, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu achaenda nemi; haangakusiyei kana kukurasai.” ipapo mozisi akadana yeahoshua akati kwaari, pamberi pavaisraeri vose, “simba utsunge mwoyo, nokuti unofanira kuenda navanhu ava munyika iyo yeahoh akapika kumadzitateguru avo kuti achavapa, uye unofanira kuigovera kwavari senhaka. yeahoh pachake achakutungamirira uye achava newe; haangakusiyi kana kukurasa. usatya kana kuora mwoyo.” saka mozisi akanyora murayiro uyu akaupa kuvaprista, vanakomana varevhi, vaitakura areka yesungano yayeahoh, uye nokuvakuru vose veisraeri. ipapo mozisi akavarayira, akati, “panopera makore manomwe nguva dzose, mugore rokukanganwira zvikwereti, panguva yomutambo wamatumba, vaisraeri vose pavanouya kuzozviratidza pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu panzvimbo yaachasarudza, muchaverenga murayiro uyu pamberi pavo vachinzwa. unganidzai vanhu, varume, vakadzi navana uye navatorwa vagere mumaguta enyu, kuti vanzwe uye vazive kutya yeahoh allah wenyu nokutevera zvakanaka mashoko ose omurayiro uyu. vana vavo, vasingazivi murayiro uyu, vanofanira kuunzwa uye vagodzidza kutya yeahoh allah wenyu panguva yose yamuchagara munyika yamuri kuyambuka jorodhani kuti muitore.” yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “zvino zuva rokufa kwako rava pedyo. dana yeahoshua mugondomira mutende rokusangana kuti ndimurayire.” saka mozisi nayeahoshua vakauya vakazviratidza patende rokusangana. ipapo yeahoh akazviratidza patende mushongwe yegore, uye gore rikamira pamusuo wetende. zvino yeahoh akati kuna mozisi, “uchavata namadzibaba ako, uye vanhu ava, zvino zvino, vachaita ufeve navamwari vavatorwa venyika yavari kupinda. vachandirasa uye vachaputsa sungano yandakaita navo. pazuva iroro ndichavatsamwira ndigovarasa: ndichavanza chiso changu kubva kwavari, uye vachaparadzwa. njodzi namatambudziko mazhinji zvichavawira uye pazuva iro vachabvunza vachiti, ‘ko, hatina kuwirwa nenjodzi idzi nokuti allah wedu haasi pakati pedu here?’ zvino ndichaviga chiso changu zvirokwazvo nezuva iro nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavo zvose zvokutsaukira kuna vamwe vamwari. “zvino zvinyorerei rwiyo urwu mugorudzidzisa kuvaisraeri uye mugovaita kuti varuimbe, kuitira kuti chigova chapupu kwandiri pamusoro pavo. kana ndichinge ndavauyisa munyika inoerera mukaka nouchi, nyika iyo yandakavimbisa nemhiko kumadzitateguru avo, uye kana vachinge vadya vaguta uye vakora, vachatsaukira kuna vamwe vamwari vagovanamata, vachindiramba uye vachiputsa sungano yangu. zvino kana njodzi namatambudziko mazhinji zvavawira, rwiyo urwu ruchavapupurira pamusoro pavo, nokuti haruzombokanganwikwi nezvizvarwa zvavo. ini ndinoziva zvavachazoita, kunyange ndisati ndavauyisa munyika yandakavavimbisa nemhiko.” saka mozisi akanyora rwiyo urwu nomusi uyu uye akarudzidzisa kuvaisraeri. yeahoh akapa murayiro uyu kuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni akati, “simba utsunge mwoyo, nokuti uchauyisa vaisraeri munyika yandakavavimbisa nemhiko, uye ini pachangu ndichava newe.” mushure mokunge mozisi apedza kunyora mubhuku mashoko omurayiro uyu kubva pokutanga kusvikira pokupedzisira, akapa murayiro uyu kuvarevhi vaitakura areka yesungano yayeahoh achiti, “torai bhuku iri romurayiro muriise parutivi peareka yesungano yayeahoh allah wenyu. ipapo richagara sechapupu pamusoro penyu. nokuti ndinoziva kuti vanomukira sei uye kuti mitsipa yavo mikukutu sei. kana maimukira yeahoh ndichiri mupenyu uye ndiri pakati penyu, ko, kuzoti ndikange ndafa muchamumukira zvakadii! ndiunganidzirei vakuru vose vamarudzi enyu namachinda enyu ose, kuti nditaure kwavari mashoko vachinzwa uye ndigodana denga nenyika zvivapupurire. nokuti ndinoziva kuti mushure mokunge ndafa imi muchazvishatisa kwazvo uye muchatsauka kubva panzira yandakakurayirai. pamazuva anouya, njodzi ichakuwirai nokuti muchaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh muchimutsamwisa nokuda kwezvakaitwa namaoko enyu.” zvino mozisi akataura mashoko orwiyo urwu kubva kumavambo kusvikira kumagumo, ungano yose yeisraeri ichinzwa:

32

inzwai, imi matenga, zvino ndichataura; inzwa, iwe nyika, mashoko omuromo wangu. regai dzidziso yangu inaye semvura uye mashoko angu ayerere sedova, sokupfunha pauswa hunyoro, semvura zhinji papfumvudza nyoro. ndichaparidza zita rayeahoh. haiwa, rumbidzai ukuru hwaallah wedu! ndiye ibwe, mabasa ake akakwana, uye nzira dzake dzakarurama. allah akatendeka asina chaanotadza, akarurama uye ndowezvokwadi. vakaita zvakaipa kwaari; vakazvinyadzisa uye havasisiri vana vake, asi vava rudzi rwakatsauka rwakakombama, ko, iyi ndiyo nzira yamunoripira nayo yeahoh here, imi mapenzi navanhu vasina kuchenjera? ko, haazi iye baba wenyu, nomusiki wenyu here, akakuitai nokukuumbai? rangarira mazuva akare; ufunge marudzi akare kare. ubvunze baba vako, uye vachakuudza, vakuru vako vachakutsanangurira. wokumusoro-soro paakapa ndudzi nhaka, nguva yaakakamura marudzi ose, akaisira vanhu miganhu, zvichienderana nouwandu hwavanakomana veisraeri. nokuti mugove wayeahoh ndivo vanhu vake, yaqobho ndiyo nhaka yake yaakayererwa. akamuwana munyika yomurenje, musina chinhu, munotyisa. akamudzivirira uye akamuchengeta; akamuchengetedza semboni yeziso rake, segondo rinogadziridza dendere raro nokuengerera pamusoro pavana varo, rinotambanudza mapapiro aro kuti rivagamhe, rovabereka pamapapiro aro. yeahoh oga ndiye akamutungamirira; kwakanga kusina mwari wokumwe akanga anaye. akamuita kuti atasve panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika uye akamupa zvibereko zveminda kuti adye. akamusimbisa nouchi hwakabva padombo, uye namafuta akabva padombo romusarasara, noruomba nomukaka kubva pamombe namakwai uye namakwayana nembudzi zvakakodzwa, namakondobwe akaisvonaka ebhashani, netsanga dzakanakisisa dzegorosi. akanwa furo reropa ramazambiringa. jeshuruni akazokora uye akapfura; aguta nezvokudya, akava mukobvu uye akava namafuta. akasiya allah akamuita uye akaramba ibwe, muponesi wake. vakamuita kuti ave negodo nokuda kwavamwari vokumwe uye vakamutsamwisa nezviumbwa zvinonyangadza. vakabayira kumadhimoni, asiri allah, vamwari vavakanga vasingazivi, vamwari vatsva vakanga vachangomuka, vamwari vakanga vasingazivikanwi namadzibaba enyu. wakasiya ibwe rakakubereka; wakakanganwa allah akakubereka. yeahoh akaona izvi akavaramba nokuti akanga atsamwiswa navakomana vake navanasikana vake. “ndichavanza chiso changu kubva kwavari,” iye akadaro, “tigoona kuti magumo avo achazodii; nokuti rudzi rwakatsauka, vana vasina kutendeka. vakamutsa godo rangu nokuda kwechinhu chisati chiri allah, vakanditsamwisa nokuda kwezviumbwa zvavo zvisina maturo. ndichaita kuti vagodorwe navaya vasati vari vanhu; ndichavaita kuti vatsamwiswe norudzi rusinganzwisisi. nokuti moto watungidzwa nehasha dzangu, idzo dzinopisa kusvikira pasi pegomba rorufu. dzichaparadza nyika nezvibereko zvayo uye dzichapisa nheyo dzamakomo. “ndichatutira njodzi pamusoro pavo uye ndichapedza miseve yangu ndichivapfura. ndichatumira nzara inoondesa pamusoro pavo, nokuparadza kunopisa zvikuru nedenda rakaipisisa; ndichatumira meno ezvikara zvesango kwavari, uturu hwenyoka dzomuguruva. munzira munondo uchaparadza vana vavo vose; mudzimba dzavo vachagara vachivhundutswa. majaya nemhandara vachaparadzwa, vacheche navatana vachaparadzwawo. ndakati ndichavaparadzira ndigodzima kurangarirwa kwavo kubva pakati pamarudzi, asi ndakazotya kutuka kwomuvengi, kuti vavengi vavo vasazozvinzwisisa uye vakazoti, ‘ruoko rwedu rwatikundisa; haazi yeahoh akaita izvi zvose.’ ” nokuti ivo rudzi rusina mano, havagoni kunzvera pakati pavo. dai chete vakanga vakachenjera uye dai vaizonzwisisa izvi nokunzvera kuti magumo avo achazova akaita sei! ko, munhu mumwe chete angadzinga sei chiuru chavanhu, kana kuti vanhu vaviri vangaita kuti vanhu zviuru gumi vatize sei, kunze kwokunge dombo ravo ravatengesa, kunze kwokunge yeahoh ari iye avaisa mumaoko avo? nokuti dombo ravo harina kufanana nedombo redu, sezvinofungwa navavengi vedu. nokuti mazambiringa avo anobva pamizambiringa yesodhomu nokuminda yegomora. mazambiringa avo azere nomuchetura, uye masumbu avo azere nokuvava. waini yavo uturu hwenyoka, uturu hwakaipisisa hwemhakure. “ko, handina kuchengeta izvi here, uye ndikazvipfigira mumatura angu? kutsiva ndokwangu; ndichatsiva. nenguva yakafanira tsoka dzavo dzichatedzemuka; zuva renjodzi yavo rava pedyo uye kuparadzwa kwavo kunokurumidza kuuya pamusoro pavo.” yeahoh achatonga vanhu vake uye achanzwira tsitsi varanda vake, paanoona simba ravo rapera uye pasina asara, akatapwa kana asina. achati, “ko, zvino vamwari vavo varipiko, dombo ravakahwanda mariri, vamwari vakadya mafuta ezvibayiro zvavo nokunwa waini yezvipiriso zvavo zvinonwiwa? ngavasimuke kuti vakubatsirei! ngavakupei pokuvanda! “chionai zvino kuti ini pachangu ndini iye! hakuna mumwe allah kunze kwangu, ndinouraya uye ndinopa upenyu, ndakakuvadza uye ndichaporesa, uye hapana anogona kudzikinura muruoko rwangu. ndinosimudza ruoko rwangu kudenga ndichiti: zvirokwazvo, noupenyu hwangu husingaperi, kana ndichirodza munondo wangu unopenya uye ruoko rwangu rwaubata mukutonga, ndichatsiva kuvavengi vangu uye ndigotsiva vaya vanondivenga. ndichaita kuti miseve yangu idhakwe neropa ravo, uye munondo wangu uchadya nyama: ropa revakaurayiwa nevatapwa, nemisoro yavatungamiri vavavengi vangu.” farai, imi ndudzi, navanhu vake, nokuti achatsiva ropa ravaranda vake; achatsiva kuvavengi vake agoyananisira nyika yake navanhu vake. mozisi akauya nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni uye akataura kwaari mashoko ose aya orwiyo urwu vanhu vachinzwa. mozisi akati apedza kutaura mashoko ose aya kuvaisraeri vose, akati kwavari, “isai mumwoyo menyu mashoko ose andakupupurirai nhasi, kuitira kuti mugozorayira vana venyu kuti vachenjerere kuita mashoko ose omurayiro uyu. haasi mashoko asina maturo kwamuri, asi kuti ndihwo upenyu hwenyu. namashoko aya muchararama mazuva mazhinji munyika yamuri kuyambuka jorodhani kuti muitore.” pazuva rimwe chetero yeahoh akataura kuna mozisi akati, “kwira kumakomo eabharimu uende mugomo renebho mumoabhu, riri mhiri kwejeriko, ugoona nyika yekenani, nyika yandiri kupa vaisraeri kuti ive yavo. ipapo pagomo pauchakwira ndipo pauchafira uye ugova pamwe navanhu vako, sokufa kwakaita mukoma wako aroni akafira pagomo rehori uye akava navanhu vake. izvi zvakaitika nokuti imi muri vaviri hamuna kutendeka kwandiri pamberi pavaisraeri pamvura yemeribha kadheshi murenje rezini uye nokuti hamuna kusimudzira utsvene hwangu pakati pavaisraeri. naizvozvo, uchaona nyika iyi uri chinhambwe; asi haungapindi munyika yandiri kupa kuvanhu veisraeri.”

33

uku ndiko kuropafadza kwamozisi munhu waallah kwaakataura kuvaisraeri asati afa. akati: “yeahoh akabva kusinai akavabudira samambakwedza achibva kuseiri; akapenya kubva pagomo reparani. akauya nezviuru gumi zvavatsvene kubva rutivi rwezasi, kubva kumawere amakomo ake. zvirokwazvo ndimi makada vanhu; vatsvene vose vari muruoko rwenyu. patsoka dzenyu vose vanopfugama, uye kubva kwamuri vanogamuchira kurayirwa, murayiro watakapiwa namozisi, nhaka yeungano yayaqobho. akanga ari mambo wejeshuruni vatungamiriri vavanhu pavakanga vakaungana, pamwe chete namarudzi aisraeri. “rubheni ngaararame arege kufa, uye vanhu vake ngavarege kuva vashoma.” uye izvi ndizvo zvaakataura pamusoro payeahudha: “inzwai, imi yeahoh, kuchema kwayeahudha; muuyisei kuvanhu vake. namaoko ake acharwira mhaka yake. haiwa, ivai mubatsiri wake pavavengi vake!” pamusoro parevhi akati, “tumimi yenyu neurimi yenyu ndezvomunhu wamunoda. makamuedza pamasa; makarwa naye pamvura dzemeribha. akati pamusoro pababa namai vake, ‘handivakudzi.’ haana kurangarira hama dzake kana kuziva vana vake, asi akava mutariri weshoko renyu akachengetedza sungano yenyu. anodzidzisa mitemo yenyu kuna yaqobho uye nemirayiro kuna israeri. achapa zvinonhuhwira pamberi penyu nezvipiriso zvose zvinopiswa paaritari yenyu. ropafadzai kubata kwake kwose, imi yeahoh, mugofadzwa namabasa amaoko ake. paradzai zviuno zvaavo vanomumukira: rovai vavengi vake kusvikira vasisamukizve.” pamusoro pabhenjamini akati: “regai mudikanwa wayeahoh agare norugare maari, nokuti anomudzivirira zuva rose, uye regai uyo anodikanwa nayeahoh agare pakati pamapfudzi ake.” pamusoro payosefa akati: “yeahoh ngaaropafadze nyika yake nedova rinokosha rokudenga kumusoro nemvura zhinji dzakadzika dziri pasi; nezvakanakisisa zvinouyiswa nezuva uye zvakaisvonaka zvinopiwa nomwedzi; nezvipo zvakanakisisa zvokumakomo ekare uye nezvibereko zvemakomo okusingaperi; nezvipo zvakanakisisa zvenyika nokuzara kwayo uye nenyasha dzake iye anogara mugwenzi rinopfuta. zvose ngazvigare pamusoro wayosefa, pahuma yomuchinda pakati pehama dzake. muumambo hwake anoita semhongora yenzombe; nyanga dzake dzakaita senyanga dzenyati. nadzo achatunga ndudzi, kunyange vaya vari kumagumo enyika. ava ndivo zviuru zvamanase.” pamusoro pazebhuruni akati: “fara, iwe zebhuruni, pakubuda kwako, newe isakari mumatende ako. vachadanira vanhu kumakomo uye ikoko vagopa zvibayiro zvokururama; vachaguta nezvizhinji zvamakungwa, nepfuma yakavigwa mujecha.” pamusoro pagadhi akati: “ngaaropafadzwe iye anokurisa nyika yagadhi! gadhi anogaramo seshumba, achibvambura ruoko kana musoro. akazvisarudzira nyika yakanakisisa; mugove womutungamiri waakachengeterwa iye. vakuru vavanhu pavakaungana, iye akaita kuda kwayeahoh kwakarurama, uye nokutonga kwake pamusoro paisraeri.” pamusoro padhani akati: “dhani mwana weshumba, anokwakuka achibva mubhashani.” pamusoro panafutari akati: “nafutari azere nenyasha dzayeahoh uye azere kuropafadza kwake: achatora nhaka nechezasi kugungwa.” pamusoro paasheri akati: “akaropafadzwa kupfuura vanakomana vose ndiasheri: ngaadikanwe nehama dzake, uye ngaashambe tsoka dzake mumafuta. zvipfigiso zvemasuo ako zvichava zvesimbi nendarira, uye simba rako richafanana namazuva ako. “hapana akafanana naallah wajeshuruni, iye anotasva denga kuti akubatsire uye namakore muumambo hwake. allah anogara nokusingaperi ndiye utiziro hwako, uye pasi pake pane maoko anogara nokusingaperi. achadzinga vavengi vako kubva pamberi pako, achiti, ‘muparadzei!’ naizvozvo israeri achagara murugare oga; tsime rayaqobho rakachengetedzeka munyika yezviyo newaini itsva, ndiko kunodonhedzerwa dova nedenga. wakaropafadzwa, iwe israeri! ndiani akafanana newe, rudzi rwakaponeswa nayeahoh? ndiye nhoo nomubatsiri wako uye nomunondo wako unobwinya. vavengi vako vachazviisa pasi pako, uye iwe uchatsika-tsika nzvimbo dzavo dzakakwirira.”

34

ipapo mozisi akakwira mugomo renebho kubva pamapani amoabhu kusvika pamusoro pepisiga, mhiri uchibva kujeriko. ipapo yeahoh akamuratidza nyika yose, kubva kugireadhi kusvika kudhani. nafutari yose, nenyika yaefuremu namanase, nenyika yose yayeahudha zvichibva nechokugungwa rokumavirira, negevhi uye dunhu rose zvichibvira kumupata wejeriko. neguta remichindwe, kusvika kuzoari. ipapo yeahoh akati kwaari, “iyi ndiyo nyika yandakavimbisa nemhiko kuna abhurahama, isaka nayaqobho pandakati, ‘ndichaipa kuzvizvarwa zvako.’ ndakuita kuti uione nameso ako, asi haungayambuki mhiri kuti upinde mairi.” zvino mozisi muranda wayeahoh akafira ipapo munyika yamoabhu, sezvakanga zvataurwa nayeahoh. akamuviga mumoabhu, mumupata wakatarisana nebheti peori, kusvikira nanhasi hapana anoziva pane guva rake. mozisi akanga ava namakore zana namakumi maviri panguva yaakafa, asi kunyange zvakadaro, meso ake akanga achigere kuonera madzerere uye simba rake rakanga richigere kuderera. vaisraeri vakachema mozisi pamapani emoabhu kwamazuva makumi matatu, kusvikira mazuva okuchema nokuungudza apera. zvino yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni akanga azere nomweya wouchenjeri nokuti mozisi akanga aisa maoko ake pamusoro pake. saka naizvozvo vaisraeri vakamuteerera uye vakaita zvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. kubva ipapo hakuna kuzomukazve muprofita muisraeri akafanana namozisi, uyo akazivana nayeahoh chiso nechiso, uyo akaita zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvaakatumwa nayeahoh kuti aite muijipiti, kuna faro nokumachinda ake nokunyika yake yose. nokuti hapanazve mumwe akaratidza simba guru kana akaitazve mabasa anotyisa seayo akaitwa namozisi pamberi pavaisraeri vose.

joshua

1

zvino shure kwokufa kwamozisi muranda wayeahoh, yeahoh akataura nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, muranda wamozisi achiti, “mozisi muranda wangu afa. zvino iwe navanhu ava chigadzirirai kuyambuka rwizi rwejorodhani mupinde munyika yandava kupa vana vaisraeri. ndakupai nzvimbo yose yose yamuchatsika netsoka dzenyu, sezvandakavimbisa mozisi. nyika yenyu ichabva kugwenga ichisvika kurebhanoni, uye ichabva kurwizi rukuru, yufuratesi, nenyika yose yavahiti, ichisvika kugungwa guru riri kumavirazuva. hakuna achagona kurwisana newe kwamazuva ose oupenyu hwako. sezvandaiva namozisi, ndichava newe; handizokusiyi kana kukurasa. “simba utsunge mwoyo, nokuti uchatungamirira vanhu ava kuti vatore nyika yandakapikira madzitateguru avo kuti ndivape senhaka yavo. simba ushinge kwazvo. chenjerera kuti uteerere mirayiro yose yawakapiwa namozisi muranda wangu; usatsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe, kuti ubudirire kwose kwose kwaunoenda. bhuku iri romurayiro harifaniri kubva pamuromo wako; fungisisa pamusoro paro usiku namasikati, kuti uchenjerere kuita zvose zvakanyorwa mariri uye ipapo uchabudirira kwazvo. handina kukurayira here? simba utsunge mwoyo. usavhunduka; usaora mwoyo, nokuti yeahoh allah wako achava newe kwose kwaunoenda.” ipapo yeahoshua akarayira vatungamiri vavanhu achiti, “pindai mumusasa mutaurire vanhu kuti, ‘gadzirirai mbuva yenyu. mukati memazuva matatu muchayambuka jorodhani urwu kuti mupinde mutore nyika yamunopiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kuti ive yenyu.’ ” uye yeahoshua akati kurudzi rwarubheni, norudzi rwagadhi nokuhafu yorudzi rwamanase, “rangarirai shoko ramakapiwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh achiti: ‘yeahoh allah wenyu anokupai zororo uye akupai nyika iyi.’ vakadzi venyu, vana venyu nezvipfuwo zvenyu zvichasara munyika yamakapiwa namozisi kudivi rino rejorodhani, asi varume venyu vose vehondo, vakabata zvombo, vanofanira kuyambukira mhiri mberi kwehama dzenyu. munofanira kubatsira hama dzenyu kusvikira yeahoh avapa zororo, sezvaakakuitirai, uye kusvikira vatorawo nyika yavari kupiwa nayeahoh allah wavo. mushure maizvozvo, munogona kudzokera munogara munyika yenyu, yamakapiwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh iri kumabvazuva kwejorodhani.” ipapo vakapindura yeahoshua vachiti, “chipi nechipi chamuchatirayira tichaita, uye kwose kwose kwamuchatituma tichaenda. tichakuteererai zvizere sokuteerera kwatakaita mozisi. chete, yeahoh allah wenyu ngaave nemi sezvaaiva namozisi. ani naani achamukira shoko renyu uye asingateereri mashoko enyu, kana chipi nechipi chamungavarayira, achaurayiwa. asi simbai mutsunge mwoyo!”

2

zvino yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni akatuma vasori vaviri muchivande kubva kushitimu. akati, “endai munotarisa nyika, kunyanya jeriko.” naizvozvo vakaenda vakandopinda mumba mechifeve chainzi rahabhi vakagaramo. zvino mambo wejeriko akaudzwa kuti, “tarirai! kune vamwe vaisraeri vauya muno manheru anhasi kuzosora nyika.” naizvozvo mambo wejeriko akatumira shoko kuna rahabhi achiti, “budisa varume vauya kwauri vakapinda mumba mako, nokuti vauya kuzosora nyika yose.” asi mukadzi uyu akanga atora varume vaviri vaya akavavanza. iye ndokuti, “ichokwadi, varume ava vakauya kwandiri, asi handina kuziva kuti vakanga vabvepi. zvino kwati zvarara yava nguva yokupfiga suo reguta, varume ava vakaenda. handizivi kuti vakaenda vakanangepi. vateverei nokukurumidza, pamwe mungangovabata.” (asi iye akanga avatora ndokuvaisa pamusoro pemba ndokuvavanza mumashanga aakanga aunganidza pamusoro pemba.) naizvozvo varume vakasimuka votevera vasori nenzira yainanga kumazambuko ejorodhani, uye vaitevera vachangobuda, suo rakabva rapfigwa. vasori vasati varara, iye akakwira padenga remba, ndokuti kwavari, “ndinozviziva kuti yeahoh akupai nyika ino, uye kuti kutyiwa kwenyu kukuru kuri pamusoro pedu, zvokuti vose vanogara munyika muno vari kubvunda nokutya nokuda kwenyu. takanzwa maomeserwo akaitwa mvura yegungwa dzvuku nayeahoh nokuda kwenyu pamakabuda muijipiti, uye zvamakaita kuna sihoni naogi, madzimambo maviri avaamori kumabvazuva kwejorodhani, avo vamakaparadza zvachose. patakazvinzwa mwoyo yedu yakarukutika, uye hapana akasara nokutsunga maari nokuda kwenyu, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiallah kumusoro kudenga napasi panyika. zvino ndapota, pikai kwandiri nayeahoh kuti muchaitira mhuri yangu tsitsi, nokuti ini ndakuitiraiwo tsitsi. ndipei chiratidzo chechokwadi chakasimba chokuti muchararamisa baba vangu namai vangu, hanzvadzi dzangu namadzikoma angu, nemhuri dzavo dzose, uye kuti muchatiponesa kubva parufu.” ipapo varume vaya vakamuvimbisa vachiti, “isu ngatife pachinzvimbo chenyu. kana ukasareva zvatiri kuita tichakubata zvakanaka nokutendeka kana yeahoh atipa nyika ino.” saka akavadzikisa pasi netambo napawindo, nokuti imba yaaigara yaiva mumasvingo eguta. zvino akati kwavari, “endai kumakomo kuitira kuti vateveri varege kukuwanai. muvande ikoko kwamazuva matatu kusvikira vadzoka, mozoenda henyu nenzira yenyu.” varume vaya ndokuti kwaari, “mhiko yawatipikisa iyi haizotisungi kunze kwokuti, patinopinda munyika, uchange wasungirira tambo tsvuku iyi pawindo rawatidzikisa naro, uye kunze kwokunge wapinza baba vako namai vako, hanzvadzi dzako nemhuri yako yose mumba mako. ani naani anobuda mumba mako achienda panze, ropa rake richava pamusoro wake, isu hatizova nemhosva. asi wose anenge ari mumba pamwe chete newe, ropa rake richava pamisoro yedu kana pakangowana anomubata chete. asi ukangoreva zvatiri kuita, tichasunungurwa pamhiko yawatipikisa.” iye akapindura akati, “ngazviitwe sokutaura kwenyu.” naizvozvo akavati vaende ivo ndokuenda. ipapo akabva asungirira tambo tsvuku pawindo. pavakabva, vakaenda mumakomo vakagaramo kwamazuva matatu, kusvikira vateveri vatsvaka nzira yose vakavashayiwa vakadzoka. ipapo varume vaviri vaya vakatanga kudzokera. vakadzika kubva muzvikomo ndokuyambuka rwizi vakasvika kuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni vakamuudza zvose zvakanga zvaitika kwavari. vakati kuna yeahoshua, “zvirokwazvo yeahoh aisa nyika yose mumaoko edu; vanhu vose vari kugwagwadza nokutitya.”

3

mangwanani-ngwanani yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vakasimuka kubva pashitimu vakaenda kujorodhani, pavakavaka misasa vasati vayambukira mhiri. shure kwamazuva matatu vatungamiri vavanhu vakapinda mumisasa, vachirayira vanhu vachiti, “pamunoona areka yesungano yayeahoh allah wenyu, navaprista, varevhi, voitakura, munofanira kubva panzvimbo dzenyu moitevera. ipapo muchaziva nzira yamunofanira kuenda nayo, nokuti hamusati mambofamba nenzira iyi. asi munofanira kusiya nzvimbo inosvika makubhiti zviuru zviviri pakati penyu neareka. regai kuswedera pedyo nayo.” zvino yeahoshua akati kuvanhu, “zvinatsei, nokuti mangwana yeahoh achaita zvinhu zvinoshamisa pakati penyu.” yeahoshua akati kuvaprista, “simudzai areka yesungano mutungamirire vanhu.” naizvozvo vakaisimudza vakatungamirira vanhu. zvino yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “nhasi ndichatanga kukusimudzira pamberi pavaisraeri vose, kuitira kuti vazive kuti ndinewe sezvandaiva namozisi. taurira vaprista vanotakura areka yesungano uti: ‘kana masvika panotangira mvura yejorodhani, munofanira kupinda momira mujorodhani.’ ” yeahoshua akati kuvaisraeri, “uyai pano muteerere mashoko ayeahoh allah wenyu. ichi ndicho chinhu chamuchaziva nacho kuti allah wenyu mupenyu ari pakati penyu uye kuti zvirokwazvo achadzinga vakenani mberi kwenyu, navahiti, navaperizi, navagirigashi, navaamoni navajebhusi. tarirai, areka yesungano yashe wenyika yose ichakutungamirirai pakuyambuka jorodhani. naizvozvo, sarudzai varume gumi navaviri kubva kumarudzi avaisraeri, mumwe chete kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe. uye vaprista vanotakura areka yayeahoh, ishe wenyika yose, pavanongotsika netsoka dzavo mujorodhani, mvura yarwo inoerera ichibva kumusoro ichamira yoita murwi.” naizvozvo vanhu pavakasimuka kubva pamisasa kuti vayambuke jorodhani, vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka yesungano vakavatungamirira. zvino jorodhani runogara ruzere nguva yose yokukohwa. asi vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka pavakangosvika pajorodhani tsoka dzavo dzichitsika kumucheto kwemvura, mvura yaibva kumusoro yakabva yamira kuerera. yakaungana ikaita murwi iri kure chaizvo, paguta rinonzi adhama pedyo nezaretani, mvura yaiererawo ichidzika kugungwa rearabha (gungwa romunyu) yakagurwa zvachose. naizvozvo vanhu vakayambuka mhiri kwakatarisana nejeriko. vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka yesungano yayeahoh vakaramba vamire pavhu rakaoma pakati pejorodhani, vaisraeri vose pavaipfuura, kusvikira rudzi rwose rwapedza kuyambuka napavhu rakaoma.

4

rudzi rwose parwakapedza kuyambuka jorodhani, yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “sarudza varume gumi navaviri kubva pakati pavanhu, mumwe chete parudzi rumwe norumwe, ugovaudza kuti vatore mabwe gumi namaviri kubva pakati pejorodhani panga pakamira vaprista chaipo, mugoatakura mugoaisa pamunorara nhasi manheru.” saka yeahoshua akadaidza varume gumi navaviri vaakanga asarudza kubva kuvaisraeri, mumwe chete kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe, akati kwavari, “endai pamberi peareka yayeahoh mupinde pakati pejorodhani. mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kutakura dombo pafudzi pake zvichienderana nokuwanda kwamarudzi avaisraeri, kuti ave chiratidzo pakati penyu. mumazuva anotevera kana vana venyu vobvunza vachiti, ‘ko, matombo aya anorevei?’ muvataurire kuti mvura yejorodhani yaiyerera yakaganhurwa pamberi peareka yesungano yayeahoh. pavakayambuka jorodhani, mvura yejorodhani yakaganhurwa. matombo aya anofanira kuva chirangaridzo kuvanhu veisraeri nokusingaperi.” saka vaisraeri vakaita sezvavakarayirwa nayeahoshua. vakatora matombo gumi namaviri kubva pakati pejorodhani, aienderana nokuwanda kwamarudzi avaisraeri, sezvakanga zvataurirwa yeahoshua nayeahoh; vakaatakura vakaenda nawo kumisasa yavo kwavakanoaisa pasi. yeahoshua akamisa matombo gumi namaviri akanga ari pakati pejorodhani pakanga pakamira vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka yesungano. uye achiripo nanhasi uno. vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka vakaramba vakamira pakati pejorodhani kusvikira zvose zvakanga zvarayirwa yeahoshua nayeahoh zvaitwa navanhu, sokurayirwa kwakanga kwaitwa yeahoshua namozisi. vanhu vakakurumidza kuyambuka uye vose vachangoyambuka, areka yayeahoh navaprista vakayambukawo vanhu vakavatarisa. varume vokwarubheni nevokwagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakayambuka, vakatakura zvombo zvokurwa nazvo, pamberi pavaisraeri, sokurayirwa kwavakanga vaitwa namozisi. vanenge zviuru makumi mana vakanga vakatakura zvombo zvokurwa nazvo, vakayambukira mhiri pamberi payeahoh vakaenda kumapani ejeriko kundorwa. pazuva iroro yeahoh akasimudzira yeahoshua pamberi pavaisraeri vose; vakamuremekedza mazuva ose oupenyu hwake sokuremekedza kwavakanga vaita mozisi. zvino yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “rayira vaprista vakatakura areka yechipupuriro kuti vabude kubva mujorodhani.” saka yeahoshua akarayira vaprista achiti, “budai mujorodhani.” zvino vaprista vakanga vakatakura areka yesungano yayeahoh vachangobuda kubva pakati pejorodhani, tsoka dzavo dzichangotsika ivhu rakaoma, mvura yejorodhani yakadzokera panzvimbo yayo ikazara kusvika nokumahombekombe ose. pazuva regumi romwedzi wokutanga, vanhu vakabuda kubva mujorodhani vakavaka misasa pagirigari pamuganhu wokumabvazuva ejeriko. zvino yeahoshua akamisa matombo gumi namaviri pagirigari avakanga vatora kubva mujorodhani. akati kuvaisraeri, “mumazuva anotevera kana vana venyu vobvunza madzibaba avo vachiti, ‘ko, matombo aya anorevei?’ muvataurire kuti, ‘israeri yakayambuka jorodhani pavhu rakaoma.’ nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu akaomesa jorodhani pamberi penyu kusvikira mayambuka. yeahoh allah wenyu akaita kujorodhani sezvaakaita kugungwa dzvuku paakariomesa pamberi pedu kusvikira tayambuka. akaita izvi kuitira kuti ndudzi dzose dzapanyika dzizive kuti ruoko rwayeahoh rune simba uye kuti vatye yeahoh allah wenyu nokusingaperi.”

5

zvino madzimambo ose avaamoni aigara kumavirazuva ejorodhani namadzimambo ose avakenani vaigara pedyo negungwa vakanzwa kuti yeahoh akanga aomesa jorodhani pamberi pavaisraeri kusvikira vayambuka, mwoyo yavo yakarukutika vakasazova nokushinga nokuda kwavaisraeri. panguva iyoyo yeahoh akataura nayeahoshua akati, “gadzira mapanga amatombo anopinza ugodzingisa vaisraeri zvakare.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akagadzira mapanga amatombo akadzingisa vaisraeri pagibhea hararoti (chikomo chezvikanda zvepamberi). yeahoshua akavadzingisa nokuda kwechikonzero ichi: varume vose vakabuda muijipiti, varume vezera rehondo, vakafira munzira mugwenga mushure mokubuda muijipiti. vanhu vose vakabuda vakanga vadzingiswa asi vose vakaberekerwa mugwenga vachibva kuijipiti vakanga vasina. vaisraeri vakanga vafamba mugwenga kwamakore makumi mana kusvikira varume vose vaiva vezera rehondo pavakabuda muijipiti vafa, nokuti vakanga vasina kuteerera yeahoh. nokuti yeahoh akanga apika kwavari kuti havaizoona nyika iyo yaakanga avimbisa madzitateguru avo kuti achatipa, nyika inoerera mukaka nouchi. zvino akasimudza vanakomana vavo pachinzvimbo chavo, uye ivava ndivo vakanga vasati vadzingiswa nayeahoshua. vakanga vasati vadzingiswa nokuti havana kunge vadzingiswa munzira. shure kwokunge rudzi rwose rwadzingiswa, vakagara pavakanga vari pamisasa kusvikira vapora. zvino yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “nhasi ndabvisa kuzvidzwa kweijipiti pamuri.” saka nzvimbo iyoyo yakanzi girigari, kusvikira nanhasi. madekwana ezuva regumi namana romwedzi, vaisraeri vari pamisasa pagirigari pamapani ejeriko, vakapemberera pasika. zuva raitevera shure kwepasika, musi wacho chaiwo, vakadya zvimwe zvezvibereko zvenyika iyoyo: chingwa chisina mbiriso nezviyo zvakakangwa. mana yakabva yaguma musi wakatevera shure kwokudya zvokudya zvenyika iyoyo; vaisraeri havana kuzova nemanazve, asi vakadya zvibereko zvenyika yekenani gore iroro. zvino yeahoshua akati ava pedyo nejeriko, akasimudza meso ake akaona murume amire pamberi pake akabata munondo wakavhomorwa muruoko rwake. yeahoshua akaenda kwaari akabvunza achiti, “uri mumwe wedu here kana wavavengi vedu?” iye akapindura achiti, “kwete, asi ndauya ini mukuru wehondo yayeahoh.” ipapo yeahoshua akawira pasi nechiso chake akanamata, uye akamubvunza achiti, “ishe wangu, mune shoko reiko kumuranda wenyu?” mukuru wehondo yayeahoh akapindura achiti, “bvisa shangu dzako mutsoka dzako nokuti nzvimbo yaumire itsvene.” yeahoshua akaita saizvozvo.

6

zvino guta rejeriko rakanga rapfigwa zvakasimba kwazvo nokuda kwavaisraeri. hapana akabuda kunze uye hapana akapinda mukati. zvino yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “tarira, ndaisa jeriko mumaoko ako, pamwe chete namambo waro navarume varo vehondo. fambai mutenderere guta kamwe chete pamwe navarume vose vehondo. muite izvi kwamazuva matanhatu. ngapave navaprista vanomwe vanotakura hwamanda dzenyanga dzamakondobwe pamberi peareka. pazuva rechinomwe fambai muchitenderera guta kanomwe, vaprista vachiridza hwamanda. kana mukazovanzwa varidza hwamanda kwenguva refu, vanhu vose vanofanira kudanidzira zvikuru; ipapo rusvingo rweguta ruchakoromoka, vanhu vagopinda, mumwe nomumwe pakanangana naye.” saka yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni akadana vaprista akati kwavari, “takurai areka yesungano yayeahoh uye vaprista vanomwe ngavatakure hwamanda pamberi pavo.” akarayira vanhu akati, “endai mberi! fambai muchipoterera guta, varume vakatakura zvombo zvokurwa nazvo vaende mberi kweareka yayeahoh.” yeahoshua paakapedza kutaura navanhu, vaprista vanomwe vakatakura hwamanda nomwe pamberi payeahoh vakaenda pamberi, vachiridza hwamanda dzavo, areka yesungano yayeahoh ikavatevera. vakanga vakatakura zvombo zvokurwa nazvo vakafamba mberi kwavaprista vairidza hwamanda, navarindi veshure vakatevera areka. nguva yose iyi hwamanda dzairira. asi yeahoshua akanga arayira vanhu achiti, “musadanidzira, musasimudzira manzwi enyu, musamboti bufu kusvikira zuva randinokuudzai kuti mudanidzire, ipapo ndipo pamunozodanidzira!” naizvozvo akarayira kuti areka yayeahoh itakurwe ipoterere guta, iripoterere kamwe chete. ipapo vanhu vakadzokera kumisasa vakararako. yeahoshua akamuka rungwanangwana zuva raitevera vaprista ndokutakura areka yayeahoh. vaprista vanomwe vakatakura hwamanda nomwe vakaenda pamberi, vakafamba pamberi peareka yayeahoh vachiridza hwamanda. varume vakanga vakatakura zvombo zvokurwa nazvo vakavatungamirira uye varindi veshure vakatevera areka yayeahoh, hwamanda dzichingoridzwa. naizvozvo pazuva rechipiri vakafamba vachipoteredza guta kamwe chete vakadzokera kumisasa. vakaita izvi kwamazuva matanhatu. pazuva rechinomwe, vakamuka mambakwedza vakafamba vachipoteredza guta kanomwe nenzira imwe chete, asi musi uyu vakapoterera guta kanomwe. panguva yechinomwe, vaprista pavakaridza hwamanda, yeahoshua akarayira vanhu achiti, “danidzirai! nokuti yeahoh akupai guta! guta nezvose zviri mariri rinofanira kupiwa kuna yeahoh. asi rahabhi chifeve bedzi navose vaainavo mumba make ndivo vachasiyiwa, nokuti akavanza vasori vatakatuma. asi imi musaswedera pazvinhu zvakatukwa, kuti murege kuzviunzira kuparara, nokutora kana chimwe chazvo. dzimwe nguva mungaunza kuparara pamusasa weisraeri mukaipinza padambudziko. sirivha yose negoridhe nemidziyo yendarira neyesimbi zvakatsaurirwa yeahoh uye zvinofanira kuiswa munochengeterwa pfuma yake.” hwamanda padzakarira, vanhu vakadanidzira, uye pakurira kwehwamanda, vanhu pavakadanidzira zvikuru, rusvingo rwakakoromoka; naizvozvo murume mumwe nomumwe akamhanya achipinda napakanga pakanangana naye, vachibva vatora guta. vakapa guta kuna yeahoh kuti riparadzwe nomunondo, chipi nechipi chairarama mariri, varume navakadzi, vaduku navakuru, mombe, makwai nembongoro. yeahoshua akati kuvarume vaviri vakanga vasora nyika, “pindai mumba mechifeve mumubudise iye navose vokwake, sezvamakapika kwaari.” naizvozvo majaya akanga asora akapindamo akabudisa rahabhi, baba vake namai vake nehanzvadzi dzake navose vokwake. vakabudisa mhuri yose vakavaisa kunze kwomusasa weisraeri. ipapo vakabva vapisa guta rose nazvose zvaiva mariri, asi vakaisa sirivha negoridhe nemidziyo yendarira neyesimbi munochengeterwa pfuma yemba yayeahoh. asi yeahoshua akasiya rahabhi chifeve, nemhuri yake navose vokwake, nokuti akanga avanza varume vakatumwa nayeahoshua savasori kujeriko, uye agere pakati pavaisraeri nanhasi uno. panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akareva mhiko iyi achiti, “ngaatukwe pamberi payeahoh munhu achazoedza kuvakazve guta iri jeriko: “acharasikirwa nomwanakomana wake wedangwe paachaisa nheyo dzaro; acharasikirwa negotwe rake paachamisa masuo aro.” naizvozvo yeahoh akava nayeahoshua, mbiri yake ikapararira nenyika yose.

7

asi vaisraeri vakaita zvisina kutendeka pamusoro pezvinhu zvakatukwa; akani mwanakomana wakami, mwanakomana wazimiri, mwanakomana wazera, worudzi rwayeahudha, akatora zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakatukwa. naizvozvo hasha dzayeahoh dzakamukira vaisraeri. zvino yeahoshua akatuma vanhu kubva kujeriko kuenda kuai, iri pedyo nebheti avheni kumabudazuva kwebheteri, akavaudza kuti, “endai munosora nzvimbo iyi.” naizvozvo varume vakaenda vakanosora ai. pavakadzoka kuna yeahoshua, vakati, “hazvifaniri kuti vanhu vose vaende kundorwa neai. tumirai varume zviuru zviviri kana zvitatu kuti vaitore, mugorega kunetsa vanhu vose ava, nokuti ikoko kuna vanhu vashomanana chete.” naizvozvo kwakaenda varume zviuru zvitatu; asi vakamhanyiswa zvakaipisisa navarume veai, avo vakauraya vaisraeri makumi matatu navatanhatu vavo. vakavadzinganisa kubva pasuo reguta kusvikira kushebharimu vakavaurayira pamawere, ipapo mwoyo yavanhu yakanyongodeka ikaita semvura. zvino yeahoshua akabvarura nguo dzake akawira pasi nechiso chake pamberi peareka yayeahoh akaramba aripo kusvikira madekwana. vakuru vavaisraeri vakaitawo saizvozvo, vakadira guruva pamisoro yavo. zvino yeahoshua akati, “haiwa! ishe yeahoh, makamboyambutsirei vanhu ava jorodhani kuti mutiise mumaoko avaamori kuti vatiparadze? dai takangogutsikana hedu takagara mhiri kwejorodhani! haiwa ishe, ndingatiiko zvino vaisraeri zvavakundwa navavengi vavo? vakenani navamwe vanhu vari munyika muno vachazvinzwa vagotikomberedza nokubvisa zita redu pano pasi. zvino muchagozoitei nezita renyu guru?” yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “simuka! wawireiko pasi nechiso chako? vaisraeri vatadza; vadarika sungano yangu, yandakavarayira kuti vaichengete. vatora zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakatukwa; vaba, vanyepa, vazvivhenganisa nezvinhu zvavo. ndokusaka vaisraeri vasingagoni kumisidzana navavengi vavo; vanofuratira vachitiza nokuti vava vanhu vakatukwa. “enda unonatsa vanhu. uvataurire kuti, ‘zvinatsei muchigadzirira zuva ramangwana; nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: chinhu chakatukwa chiri pakati penyu, imi vaisraeri. hamungagoni kumisidzana navavengi venyu kusvikira machibvisa. “ ‘zvino mangwana mangwanani, munofanira kuzviratidza rudzi norudzi. rudzi ruchabatwa nayeahoh runofanira kuuya mberi imba neimba; imba ichabatwa nayeahoh inofanira kuuya mberi, mhuri nemhuri; mhuri ichabatwa nayeahoh inofanira kuuya mberi munhu nomunhu. uyo achawanikwa ane zvinhu zvakatukwa achaparadzwa nomoto, nazvose zvaanazvo. akanganisa sungano yayeahoh uye aita chinhu chinonyadzisa muisraeri!’ ” mangwana mangwanani yeahoshua akati vaisraeri vauye rudzi norudzi; rudzi rwayeahudha rukabatwa. dzimba dzokwayeahudha dzakauya mberi imba yavazera ikabatwa. akauyisa imba yavazera nemhuri dzayo, zimiri akabatwa. yeahoshua akauyisa mhuri yake munhu nomunhu, uye akani mwanakomana wakami, mwanakomana wazimiri, mwanakomana wazera, worudzi rwayeahudha, akabatwa. ipapo akati kuna akani, “mwanakomana wangu, ipa mbiri kuna yeahoh, allah waisraeri, ureurure kwaari. ndiudze kuti chii chawaita; usandivanzira.” akani akapindura achiti, “ichokwadi! ndakatadzira yeahoh, allah waisraeri. izvi ndizvo zvandakaita: pandakaona pakati pezvakapambwa nguo yakanaka yokubhabhironi, mashekeri mazana maviri esirivha negoridhe rairema mashekeri makumi mashanu, ndakazvichiva ndikazvitora. zvakavigwa pasi mutende, sirivha iri pasi pazvo.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akatuma nhume, vakamhanyira kutende, vakanowana zviriko, zvakavigwa mutende rake, sirivha iri pasi. vakazvibvisa mutende, vakauya nazvo kuna yeahoshua nokuvaisraeri vose, vakazviwadzira pamberi payeahoh. ipapo yeahoshua, pamwe chete navaisraeri vose vakatora akani mwanakomana wazera, nesirivha, nenguo, negoridhe, navanakomana navanasikana vake, mombe dzake, nembongoro dzake namakwai ake, netende rake nezvose zvaaiva nazvo, vakaenda nazvo kumupata weakori. yeahoshua akati, “watipinzireiko mudambudziko iri? yeahoh achakupinza mudambudziko nhasi.” ipapo vaisraeri vose vakamutema namatombo, uye shure kwokuvatema vose, vakavapisa nomoto. vakaunganidza murwi wamatombo mukuru pamusoro paakani, uchiripo nanhasi. ipapo yeahoh akadzora kutsamwa kwake kukuru. naizvozvo nzvimbo iyi yakanzi mupata weakori kubvira ipapo.

8

zvino yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “usatya kana kuvhundutswa. tora varwi vose uende unorwisa ai. nokuti ndaisa mambo weai, navanhu vake, neguta rake nenyika yake mumaoko ako. munofanira kuita kuai namambo waro sezvamakaita kujeriko namambo waro, kunze kwokuti apa munofanira kuzvitakurira zvamunotapa zvavo nezvipfuwo. muise vangavandira guta necheseri kwaro.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akasimuka nehondo yose kuti andorwisa ai. akasarudza mhare dzokurwa dzinokwana zviuru makumi matatu akavatuma usiku. akavarayira achiti, “nyatsoteererai. munofanira kuvandira guta necheseri kwaro. musaende kure naro. mose munofanira kugara makagadzirira. ini navanhu vose vandinavo tichafamba takananga guta, zvino kana varume vakauya kuti vazorwa nesu, sezvavakaita pakutanga, tichavatiza. vachatidzinganisa kusvikira tavakwezvera kure neguta, nokuti vachati, ‘vari kutitiza sezvavakamboita pakutanga.’ naizvozvo kana tavatiza, imi munofanira kusimuka kubva pamunenge makavanda motora guta. yeahoh allah wenyu acharipa mumaoko enyu. kana matora guta, ripisei nomoto. muite zvamarayirwa nayeahoh, tarirai, ndakurayirai.” ipapo yeahoshua akavatuma, vakaenda kunzvimbo yokunovandira vakagara pakati pebheteni neai, kumavirazuva kweai, asi yeahoshua akarara kuvanhu usiku ihwohwo. mangwana mangwanani yeahoshua akaronga vanhu, uye iye navatungamiri veisraeri vakafamba pamberi pavo vachienda kuai. hondo yose yaiva naye yakafamba vakaswedera pedyo neguta vakasvika nechemberi kwaro. vakadzika musasa kumusoro kweai, mupata uri pakati pavo neguta. yeahoshua akanga atora varume vangasvika zviuru zvishanu akavarayira kuti vavandire pakati pebheteri neai, kumavirazuva kweguta. vakarayira varwi kuti vatore nzvimbo dzavo, vose vaiva mumusasa nechokumusoro kweguta navakanga vakavandira kumavirazuva kwaro. usiku ihwohwo yeahoshua akapinda mumupata. zvino mambo weai paakaona izvi, iye navarume vose veguta vakakurumidza kubuda mangwanani kuti vasangane navaisraeri varwe panzvimbo yakanga yakatarisana nearabha. asi haana kuziva kuti akanga avandirwa seri kweguta. yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vakavarega vachivadzingirira vachidzokera shure, vakatiza vakananga kugwenga. varume vose veai vakadaidzwa kuti vavadzingirire, uye vakadzingirira yeahoshua vachibva vakwezvwa kubva kuguta. hapana murume kana mumwe akasara muai kana mubheteri asina kudzingirira vaisraeri. vakasiya guta rakashama vakadzingirira vaisraeri. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “simudza pfumo rawakabata muruoko rwako urinongedzere kuai, nokuti ndichaisa guta iri muruoko rwako.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akanongedzera pfumo rake kuai. akati achangoita izvi varume vaiva vakavandira vakasimuka kubva panzvimbo dzavo nokukurumidza vakamhanya vachienda mberi. vakapinda muguta vakaripamba ndokukurumidza kuritungidza nomoto. varume veai vakacheuka vakaona utsi hweguta huchikwira kudenga, asi vakashayiwa pokupukunyuka napo kumativi ose, nokuti vaisraeri vakanga vachitizira kugwenga vakatendeukira vaivatevera. yeahoshua navaisraeri vose pavakaona kuti vavandiri vakanga vatora guta uye utsi hwakanga huchikwira kubva muguta, vakatendeuka vakarwisa varume veai. varume vakanga vakavandira vakabudawo muguta kuzorwa navo, naizvozvo vakabva vaiswa pakati pavaisraeri, vamwe nechokuno, vamwe nechokoko. vaisraeri vakavauraya zvokusasiya kana mumwe chete wavo ari mupenyu kana vakatiza. asi vakatora mambo weai ari mupenyu vakauya naye kuna yeahoshua. vaisraeri pavakapedza kuuraya varume vose veai nomunondo kusango nokurenje kwavakanga vavadzinganisira, uye mushure mokunge mumwe nomumwe wavo aurayiwa nomunondo, vose vakadzokera kuai vakauraya vose vaivamo. zuva iroro kwakafa varume navakadzi vaisvika zviuru gumi nezviviri, vanhu vose veai. nokuti yeahoshua haana kudzosa ruoko rwake rwakanga rwakasimudza pfumo kusvikira aparadza vose vaigara muai. asi vaisraeri vakazvitorera zvipfuwo nezvakapambwa muguta iri, sezvakanga zvarayirwa yeahoshua nayeahoh. naizvozvo yeahoshua akapisa ai akariita murwi, rikava dongo kusvika nanhasi. akasungirira mambo weai mumuti akamusiya kusvikira manheru. zuva rodoka, yeahoshua akavarayira kuti vaturure chitunha chake mumuti vachikande pasi pasuo reguta. vakaitawo murwi mukuru wamatombo, uchiripo nanhasi. zvino yeahoshua akavakira yeahoh, allah waisraeri, aritari pagomo reebhari, sezvakanga zvarayirwa vaisraeri namozisi muranda wayeahoh. akaivaka sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku romurayiro wamozisi. yakanga iri aritari yamabwe asina kuvezwa, hapana kumboshandiswa mudziyo wesimbi pairi. vakapa kuna yeahoh zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye vakabayira zvipiriso zvokuwadzana pairi. zvino ipapo, pamberi pavaisraeri, yeahoshua akanyorazve pamabwe murayiro wamozisi, waakanga ambonyora. vaisraeri vose navatorwa, navakuru vavo navatariri vavo, navatongi vavo, vakanga vakamira kumativi maviri eareka yesungano yayeahoh, vakatarisa avo vakanga vakaitakura, vaprista, vakanga vari varevhi. imwe hafu yavanhu yakanga yakamira pamberi pegomo regerizimu uye imwe hafu yakamira pamberi pegomo reebhari, sezvakanga zvarayirwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh pakutanga paakati vanhu veisraeri varopafadzwe. mushure maizvozvo, yeahoshua akaverenga mashoko ose omurayiro, maropafadzo nezvituko sokunyorwa kwazvakaitwa mubhuku romurayiro. hapana shoko kana rimwe pane zvose zvakanga zvarayirwa namozisi, risina kuverengerwa ungano yose yavaisraeri nayeahoshua, kusanganisira vakadzi navana, navatorwa vaigara pakati pavo.

9

zvino madzimambo ose aigara kumavirira kwejorodhani navaiva munyika yamakomo, mujinga mamakomo kumadokero, mumahombekombe ose egungwa guru kusvikira kurebhanoni (madzimambo avahiti, navaamori, navakenani, navaperizi, navahivhi navajebhusi) vakanzwa nezvazvo. vakaungana pamwe chete kuti varwisane nayeahoshua navaisraeri. asi vanhu vegibheoni pavakanzwa zvakanga zvaitwa jeriko neai nayeahoshua, vakafunga zano: vakaenda senhume nembongoro dzavo dzakatakura masaga akasakara nehomwe dzewaini dzakasakara, dzakatsemuka dzikasonanidzwazve. varume vakapfeka shangu dzakasakara. zvingwa zvose zvembuva yavo zvakanga zvakaoma nokuvhuvha. ipapo vakaenda kuna yeahoshua mumusasa pagirigari ndokubva vati kwaari nokuvarume veisraeri, “tabva kunyika iri kure; zvino itai sungano nesu.” zvino varume veisraeri vakati kuvahivhi, “asi zvichida munogara pedyo nesu. tingagoita sungano nemi sei?” ivo ndokuti kuna yeahoshua, “tiri varanda venyu.” asi yeahoshua akavabvunza achiti, “ndimi vanaani uye munobvepi?” ivo vakati kwaari, “varanda venyu vabva kunyika iri kure kure nokuda kwomukurumbira wayeahoh allah wenyu. nokuti takanzwa nezvake: zvose zvaakaita muijipiti, uye nezvose zvaakaita kumadzimambo maviri avaamoni kumabvazuva ejorodhani nokuna sihoni mambo weheshibhoni, naogi mambo webhashani, aitonga muashitaroti. zvino vakuru vedu navagari vose vomunyika yedu vakati kwatiri, ‘torai mbuva yerwendo rwenyu; muende munosangana navo muti kwavari, “tiri varanda venyu; itai sungano nesu.” ’ zvingwa zvedu izvi zvakanga zvichidziya patakazvitora mudzimba dzedu zuva ratakasimuka tichiuya kuno. asi zvino chionai kuoma nokuvhuvha kwazvaita. uye homwe dzewaini idzi dzaiva itsva patakadzizadza, asi chionai kubvaruka kwadzaita. uye mbatya dzedu neshangu dzedu zvasakara nokuda kworwendo rurefu refu.” varume veisraeri vakaravira mbuva yavo asi havana kubvunza yeahoh. ipapo yeahoshua akaita sungano yorugare navo kuti vavarege vari vapenyu, uye vakuru veungano vakaisimbisa nemhiko. zvino mushure mamazuva matatu vaita sungano navagibheoni, vaisraeri vakanzwa kuti vakanga vari vavakidzani, vagere pedyo navo. naizvozvo vaisraeri vakasimuka vakasvika mumaguta avo zuva rechitatu: aiti gibheoni, nekefira, nebheroti, nekiriati jearimi. asi vaisraeri havana kuvarwisa, nokuti vakuru veungano vakanga vaita mhiko kwavari nayeahoh, allah waisraeri. ungano yose yakapopotera vatungamiri, asi vatungamiri vose vakapindura vachiti, “takapika kwavari nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, zvino hatigoni kuita chinhu kwavari. izvi ndizvo zvatichaita kwavari: tichavarega vari vapenyu, kuitira kuti kutsamwa kwaallah kurege kutiwira nokuda kwokuputsa mhiko yatakapika kwavari.” vakaenderera mberi vachiti, “varegei vari vapenyu, asi ngavave vatemi vehuni navacheri vemvura veungano yose.” naizvozvo zvakanga zvarehwa navatungamiri zvakaitwa. ipapo yeahoshua akadana vagibheoni akati kwavari, “sei makatinyengedza muchiti, ‘tinogara kure kure nemi,’ asi imi muchigara pedyo nesu? naizvozvo mava vanhu vakatukwa: hamuchazofi makarega kuva vatemi vehuni navacheri vemvura veimba yaallah wangu.” ivo vakapindura yeahoshua vachiti, “varanda venyu vakanga vaudzwa pachena kuti yeahoh allah wenyu akanga arayira mozisi muranda wake sei kuti akupei nyika yose nokuparadza vose vageremo pamberi penyu. naizvozvo taityira upenyu hwedu nokuda kwenyu, zvino ndicho chikonzero takaita izvi. zvino tava mumaoko enyu. itai kwatiri chero zvamunoona zvakanaka uye zvakarurama.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akavaponesa kubva kuvaisraeri, ivo vakasavauraya. zuva iroro yeahoshua akaita vagibheoni vatemi vehuni navacheri vemvura yeungano neyearitari yayeahoh panzvimbo yaizosarudzwa nayeahoh. uye ndizvo zvavari kusvikira nanhasi.

10

zvino adhoni-zedheki mambo wejerusarema akanzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga atora ai akariparadza zvachose, akaitira ai namambo waro sezvaakanga aitira jeriko namambo wayo, uye kuti vanhu vegibheoni vakanga vaita sungano yorugare navaisraeri uye kuti vaigara pedyo navo. iye navanhu vake vakavhundutswa kwazvo nazvo, nokuti gibheoni rakanga riri guta guru, rakaita serimwe ramaguta oumambo; rakanga riri guru kupfuura ai, uye varume varo vose vaiva mhare pakurwa. naizvozvo adhoni-zedheki mambo wejerusarema akatuma nhume kuna hohani mambo wehebhuroni, nokuna piramu mambo wejarumuti, nokuna jafia mambo werakishi nokuna dhebhiri mambo weegironi. akati, “uyai kuno mundibatsire kurwisa gibheoni, nokuti vakaita sungano yorugare nayeahoshua navaisraeri.” ipapo madzimambo mashanu avaamori, madzimambo ejerusarema, nehebhuroni, nejarumuti, nerakishi neegironi, vakaunganidza varwi vavo. vakaenda nehondo dzavo dzose vakavaka musasa pamberi pegibheoni, vakairwisa. zvino vagibheoni vakatuma nhume kuna yeahoshua kumusasa waiva pagirigari, vachiti, “musasiya henyu varanda venyu. uyai kuno kwatiri nokukurumidza muzotiponesa! tibatsirei, nokuti madzimambo ose avaamori vanogara munyika yamakomo vaungana kuti vatirwise.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akafamba achibva pagirigari, iye navarwi vose vaaiva navo, navarume vose vesimba noumhare. yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “usavatya; ndavaisa mumaoko ako. hapana kana mumwe wavo achagona kumira pamberi pako.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akavarwisa vasingafungiri, shure kwokunge afamba achibva kugirigari usiku hwose. zvino yeahoh akaita kuti vavhunduke pamberi pavaisraeri, avo vakavauraya nokuuraya kukuru pagibheoni, vakavadzingirira nenzira inoenda kubheti horoni, vakavaparadza kusvikira kuazeka nokumakedha. pavaitiza pamberi pavaisraeri nenzira yaidzika kubva kubheti horoni ichienda kuazeka, yeahoh akakanda pamusoro pavo matombo makuru akanga achibva kudenga, vazhinji vavo vakafa nechimvuramabwe kupfuura avo vakaurayiwa neminondo yavaisraeri. pazuva iro yeahoh akapa vaamori kuvaisraeri, yeahoshua akati kuna yeahoh pamberi pavaisraeri: “iwe zuva, mira pamusoro pegibheoni, iwe mwedzi, pamusoro pemupata weaijaroni.” naizvozvo zuva rakamira, nomwedziwo ukamira, kusvikira rudzi rwatsiva vavengi varwo, sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku rajashari. zuva rakamira pakati pedenga rikanonoka kuvira kwenguva ingaita zuva rose. hakuna kumboita zuva rakaita seiri nguva yakapfuura kana yakatevera, pazuva iri yeahoh akateerera munhu. zvirokwazvo yeahoh akanga achirwira israeri! ipapo yeahoshua akadzokera navaisraeri vose kumusasa pagirigari. zvino madzimambo mashanu akanga atiza akandovanda mubako rokumakedha. yeahoshua paakaudzwa kuti madzimambo mashanu aya akanga awanikwa akavanda mubako pamakedha, akati, “kungurutsirai matombo makuru pamuromo webako, mugoisa vamwe varume ipapo kuti varichengete. asi musamira! teverai vavengi venyu, muvarwise necheshure kwavo uye musavarega vachisvika kumaguta avo, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu avapa mumaoko enyu.” naizvozvo yeahoshua navaisraeri vakavaparadza zvachose, asi vashoma vavo vakasara vakasvika kumaguta avo akavakirwa masvingo. ipapo vanhu vose vakadzokera kuna yeahoshua kumusasa pamakedha norugare, uye hapana kana mumwe akataura shoko pamusoro pavaisraeri. yeahoshua akati, “vhurai muromo webako mugondiigira madzimambo mashanu aya.” naizvozvo vakabudisa madzimambo mashanu aya mubako, mambo wejerusarema, nowehebhuroni, nowejarumuti, nowerakishi noweegironi. pavakauya namadzimambo aya kuna yeahoshua, akadana varume vose veisraeri akati kuvatungamiri vehondo vakanga vauya naye, “uyai pano muise tsoka dzenyu pamitsipa yamadzimambo aya.” naizvozvo vakaenda mberi vakaisa tsoka dzavo pamitsipa yavo. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “musatya; musaora mwoyo. simbai mutsunge mwoyo. izvi ndizvo zvichaitwa nayeahoh kuvavengi venyu vose vamucharwa navo.” ipapo yeahoshua akavabaya akauraya madzimambo aya ndokuvasungirira pamiti mishanu, uye vakasiyiwa vakarembera pamiti kusvikira madekwana. zuva rava kuvira yeahoshua akarayira vanhu vakavaturura mumiti ndokuvakanda mubako mavakanga vambovanda. vakaisa matombo makuru pamuromo webako, ayo achiripo nanhasi. musi iwoyo yeahoshua akatora makedha. akabayira guta namambo waro nomunondo akaparadza zvachose vanhu vose vakanga varimo. haana kusiya vapenyu. uye akaita kuna mambo wemakedha sezvaakaita kuna mambo wejeriko. ipapo yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vaakanga anavo vakafamba kubva kumakedha vakaenda kuribhina ndokuirwisa. yeahoh akapawo guta iroro namambo waro muruoko rwaisraeri. yeahoshua akaparadza guta navose vaiva mariri nomunondo. hapana waakasiya ari mupenyu. akaita kuna mambo waro zvaakanga aita kuna mambo wejeriko. ipapo yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vaakanga anavo vakabva kuribhina vakaenda kurakishi; vakavaka misasa yavo pedyo naro vakarirwisa. yeahoh akapa rakishi kuvaisraeri, yeahoshua akaritora nezuva rechipiri. akaparadza guta navose vaiva mariri nomunondo, sezvaakaita ribhina. ipapo horamu mambo wegezeri akauya kuzobatsira rakishi, asi yeahoshua akamukunda pamwe chete nehondo yake, kusvikira pasisina mupenyu akasara. ipapo yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vaakanga anavo vakafamba kubva kurakishi vakaenda kuegironi, vakavaka misasa pedyo naro vakarirwisa. vakaritora musi iwoyo vakariparadza nomunondo zvachose navose vaiva mariri, sezvavakaita kurakishi. ipapo yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vaakanga anavo vakafamba kubva kuegironi vakaenda kuhebhuroni vakarirwisa. vakatora guta vakariparadza nomunondo, pamwe chete namambo waro, namaguta aro, navanhu vose vaiva mariri. hapana wavakasiya ari mupenyu. vakariparadza zvachose navanhu vose vaiva mariri sezvavakaita kuegironi. ipapo yeahoshua navaisraeri vose vaakanga anavo vakadzokera kudhebhiri vakarirwisa. vakatora guta, namambo waro nemisha yaro, vakazviparadza nomunondo. vakaparadza zvachose vose vaivamo. hapana wavakasiya ari mupenyu. vakaita kudhebhiri nokuna mambo waro sezvavakanga vaita kuribhina nokuna mambo waro uye nokuhebhuroni. naizvozvo yeahoshua akaparadza nharaunda yose, zvichisanganisira nyika yamakomo, nenegevhi, neyemujinga mezvikomo zvokumavirira nemitenusirwa yamakomo pamwe chete namadzimambo acho ose. hapana waakasiya ari mupenyu. akaparadza zvachose vose vaifema, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh, allah waisraeri. yeahoshua akavaparadza kubva kukadheshi bharinea kusvikira kugaza uye nokubva kudunhu rose regosheni kusvikira kugibheoni. madzimambo aya ose nenyika dzawo akakundwa nayeahoshua panguva imwe chete, nokuti yeahoh, allah waisraeri, akarwira israeri. ipapo yeahoshua akadzokera navaisraeri vose kumusasa kugirigari.

11

zvino jabhini mambo wehazori akati anzwa pamusoro paizvozvi, akatumira shoko kuna jobhabhi mambo wemadhoni, nokuna madzimambo eshimuroni neakishafi, uye nokumadzimambo okumusoro aigara mumakomo, muarabha zasi kwekinereti, kumadokero kwamajinga ezvikomo uye nokuzvikomo zvenafoti dhori kumadokero; nokuvakenani kumabudazuva nokumadokero, nokuvaamori, vahiti, vaperizi navajebhusi munyika yamakomo; uye nokuvahivhi muzasi mehemoni mudunhu remizipa. vakauya nehondo dzavo dzose namabhiza nengoro zhinji zhinji, navanhu vazhinji kwazvo, vakanga vakawanda sejecha rapamahombekombe egungwa. madzimambo ose aya akaungana vakavaka musasa pamwe chete pamvura yemeromi, kuti vazorwa navaisraeri. yeahoh akati kuna yeahoshua, “usavatya nokuti mangwana nguva ino ndichavaisa vose vakatofa mumaoko avaisraeri. munofanira kutema marunda amakumbo amabhiza avo nokupisa ngoro dzavo.” naizvozvo yeahoshua nehondo yake vakavavinga pakarepo pamvura yemeromi vakavarwisa, uye yeahoh akavaisa mumaoko avaisraeri. vakavakunda vakavadzinganisa kusvikira kuguta residhoni, nokumisirefoti maimi, nokumupata wemizipa kumabvazuva, kusvikira pasisina mupenyu akasara. yeahoshua akaita kwavari zvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh: akatema marunda amabhiza akapisa ngoro dzavo. panguva iyoyo, yeahoshua akadzokera akatora hazori ndokuuraya mambo waro. (hazori waiva muzinda woumambo hwose uhu.) vakauraya nomunondo munhu wose aivamo. vakavaparadza zvachose, vakasasiya chipi nechipi chaifema, uye akapisa hazori pacharo nomoto. yeahoshua akakunda maguta oumambo ose aya namadzimambo awo ndokuvauraya nomunondo. akavaparadza zvachose, sezvakanga zvarayirwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh. asi vaisraeri havana kupisa kana rimwe ramaguta akanga akavakwa pazvikomo zvavo, kusara kwehazori chete, rakapiswa nayeahoshua. vaisraeri vakatakura zvose zvavakapamba nezvipfuwo zvamaguta iwaya, asi vakaparadza zvachose vanhu vose, vakasasiya kana mumwe aifema. sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi muranda wake nayeahoh, saizvozvo mozisi akarayira yeahoshua, uye yeahoshua akazviita; hapana chaakasiya chisina kuitwa pane zvose zvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. naizvozvo yeahoshua akatora nyika yose iyi nyika yamakomo, nenegevhi, dunhu rose regosheni, majinga ezvikomo zvokumavirira, nearabha namakomo eisraeri namajinga awo, kubvira kugomo reharaki, rinokwidza rakananga kuseiri, kubhaari gadhi mumupata werebhanoni, zasi kwegomo rehemoni. akabata madzimambo avo ose akavaparadza, akavauraya. yeahoshua akarwa namadzimambo ose aya kwenguva refu. hakuna guta kana rimwe rakaita sungano yorugare navaisraeri kunze kwavahivhi vaigara mugibheoni, vavakatora vose pakurwa. nokuti yeahoh ndiye akaomesa mwoyo yavo kuti varwe navaisraeri, kuti vavaparadze zvachose, vavaparadze pasina kunzwira tsitsi, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akaenda akandoparadza vaanaki munyika yamakomo: kubva kuhebhuroni, nokudhebhiri nokuanabhi, nokubva munyika yose yamakomo yeyeahudha, uye nokubva munyika yose yamakomo yavaisraeri. yeahoshua akavaparadza zvachose namaguta avo. hakuna vaanaki vakasara munyika yeisraeri: kusara kwomugaza, nomugati nomuashidhodhi makasara vamwe. naizvozvo yeahoshua akatora nyika yose, sezvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh, uye akaipa kuvaisraeri kuti ive nhaka yavo zvichienderana namarudzi avo. ipapo nyika yakazorora pakurwa.

12

aya ndiwo madzimambo enyika iyoyo akakundwa navaisraeri uye nenyika yavo yavakatora kumabvazuva ejorodhani, kubva kumupata weanoni kusvikira kugomo rehemoni, zvichisanganisira divi rose rokumabvazuva earabha: sihoni mambo wavaamori, aitonga muheshibhoni. aitonga kubva kuaroeri kumucheto womupata weanoni, kubva pakati pomupata, kusvikira kurwizi rwejabhoki, unova muganhu wavaamori. izvi zvaisanganisira hafu yegireadhi. akatongawo kumabvazuva earabha kubva kugungwa rekinereti kusvikira kugungwa rearabha (gungwa romunyu), kusvikira kubheti jeshimoti, nokurutivi rwezasi nyasi kwemawere episiga. uyewo nenyika yaogi mambo webhashani, mumwe wevokupedzisira wavarefi, akatonga muashitaroti nomuedhirei. akatonga gomo rehemoni, nesareka, nebhashani yose kusvikira kumuganhu wavanhu vegesheri nemaaka, nehafu yegireadhi kusvikira kumuganhu wasihoni mambo weheshibhoni. mozisi, muranda wayeahoh, navaisraeri vakavakunda. uye mozisi muranda wayeahoh akapa nyika yavo kurudzi rwarubheni, norudzi rwagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase kuti ive nhaka yavo. aya ndiwo madzimambo enyika iyoyo akakundwa nayeahoshua navaisraeri kurutivi rwokumavirazuva ejorodhani, kubva pabhaari gadhi mumupata werebhanoni kusvikira kugomo reharaki, rinokwidza richienda kuseiri (nyika dzavo yeahoshua akadzipa kumarudzi avaisraeri kuti ive nhaka yavo zvichienderana namarudzi avo, nyika yamakomo, mujinga mamakomo kwakadziva kumavirazuva, arabha, mawere amakomo, gwenga nenegevhi, inova nyika yavahiti, vaamori, vakenani, vaperizi, vahivhi navajebhusi): mambo wejeriko mumwe chete namambo weai (pedyo nebheteri) mumwe chete mambo wejerusarema mumwe chete mambo wehebhuroni mumwe chete mambo wejarumuti mumwe chete mambo werakishi mumwe chete mambo weegironi mumwe chete mambo wegezeri mumwe chete mambo wedhebhiri mumwe chete mambo wegedheri mumwe chete mambo wehoma mumwe chete mambo wearadhi mumwe chete mambo weribhina mumwe chete mambo weadhuramu mumwe chete mambo wemakedha mumwe chete mambo webheteri mumwe chete mambo wetapua mumwe chete mambo weheferi mumwe chete mambo weafeki mumwe chete mambo werasharoni mumwe chete mambo wemadhoni mumwe chete mambo wehazori mumwe chete mambo weshimuroni meroni mumwe chete mambo weakishafi mumwe chete mambo wetaanaki mumwe chete mambo wemegidho mumwe chete mambo wekadheshi mumwe chete mambo wejokineamu mukarimeri mumwe chete mambo wedhori (munafoti dhori) mumwe chete mambo wegoyimi mugirigari mumwe chete mambo wetiriza mumwe chete, madzimambo makumi matatu nomumwe pamwe chete.

13

yeahoshua akati akwegura ava namakore mazhinji kwazvo, yeahoh akati kwaari, “wakwegura kwazvo, uye kuchine nzvimbo zhinji dzinofanira kutorwa. “iyi ndiyo nyika yasara: nyika dzose dzavafiristia, navageshuri: “kubva kurwizi rweshihori kumabvazuva kweijipiti, kusvikira kudunhu reekironi nechokumusoro, iyo yose yainzi ndeyavakenani (matunhu amadzishe mashanu avafiristia mugaza, ashidhodhi, ashikeroni, gati, neekironi yavaavhiti); kubva zasi nyika yose yavakenani, kubva kuara yevasidhoni kusvikira kuafeki, nyika yavaamori, nenyika yavagebhari, uye nerebhanoni yose kumabvazuva, kubva pabhaari gadhi muzasi megomo rehemoni, kusvikira parebho hamati. “kana vari vanhu vose vanogara munyika dzamakomo kubva kurebhanoni kusvika kumisirefoti maimi, zvichireva vasidhoni vose, ini pachangu ndichavadzinga pamberi pavana vaisraeri. unofanira kugovera nyika iyi kuvana vaisraeri kuti ive nhaka yavo sezvandakurayira, uye ugoigovanisa senhaka pakati pamarudzi mapfumbamwe nehafu yorudzi
