rwamanase.” imwe hafu yamanase, navarubheni navagadhi, vakanga vagamuchira nhaka yavakanga vapiwa namozisi kumabvazuva kwejorodhani, sokuvagovera kwaakanga aita, iye muranda wayeahoh. yaibva kuaroeri nechokumusoro kwomupata wearinoni ichibvawo kuguta riri pakati pomupata, zvichibatanidzira bani rose remedhebha kusvikira kudhibhoni, uye maguta ose asihoni mambo wavaamori, aitonga muheshibhoni, kusvikira kumuganhu wavaamoni. yaibatanidzirawo gireadhi, nenyika yavanhu vegeshuri nemaaka negomo rose rehemoni uye nebhashani kusvikira kusareka, zvichireva umambo hwose hwaogi mubhashani, akanga akambotonga muashitaroti needhirei uye akanga apunyuka akava mumwe wavakanga vasara pakati pavarefaiti. mozisi akanga avakunda akavatorera nyika yavo. asi vaisraeri havana kudzinga vanhu vegeshuri nemaaka, naizvozvo vagere pakati pavaisraeri kusvikira nhasi. asi kurudzi rwarevhi haana kupa nhaka, sezvo zvipiriso zvaiitwa nomoto kuna yeahoh allah waisraeri, zviri izvo nhaka yavo, sezvaakavavimbisa. iyi ndiyo nhaka yakanga yapiwa rudzi rwarubheni namozisi, mhuri nemhuri: nyika yose kubva kuaroeri, nechokumucheto kwomupata wearinoni, uye kubva muguta pakati pomupata, bani rose kupfuura medhebha kusvikira kuheshibhoni namaguta ose ari mubani, kusanganisa dhibhoni, bhamoti bhaari, bheti bhaari meoni, jahazi, kedhemoti, mefaati, kiriataimi, sibhima zereti shahari pachikomo chiri mumupata, bheti-peori, nemitenusirwa yepisiga, nebheti jeshimoti, anova maguta ebani, noushe hwose hwasihoni, mambo wavaamori, uyo aitonga paheshibhoni. mozisi akanga amukunda pamwe chete namadzishe emidhiani vaiti evhi, rekemu, zuri, huri, narebha, machinda aibatsirana nasihoni, akanga agere munyika iyoyo. kuchiverengwa navaya vakanga vaurayiwa muhondo, vaisraeri vakanga vauraya nomunondo bharamu mwanakomana wabheori uyo aiita zvokuvuka. muganhu wavarubheni wakanga uri mahombekombe erwizi rwejorodhani. maguta aya nemisha yawo ndiwo aiva nhaka yavarubheni mhuri nemhuri. izvi ndizvo zvakapiwa rudzi rwavagadhi namozisi, mhuri nemhuri: nyika yejazeri, namaguta ose egireadhi, nehafu yenyika yavaamoni, kusvikira kuaroeri, pedyo nerabha; nokubva kuheshibhoni, kusvikira kuramati mizipa nebhetonimu, uye kubva kumabhanaimu kusvika kunyika yedhebhiri; nomumupata, bheti haramu, bheti nimura, sukoti nezafoni nohumwe ushe hwakanga hwasara hwasihoni mambo weheshibhoni, (kumabvazuva kwejorodhani nenyika inosvika panogumira gungwa rekinereti). maguta aya nemisha yawo akanga ari nhaka yavagadhi, mhuri nemhuri. izvi ndizvo zvakanga zvapiwa hafu yorudzi rwamanase namozisi, ndiko kuti, kuhafu yemhuri yezvizvarwa zvamanase, mhuri nemhuri: nyika yavo yaibva pamahanaimi, ichibatanidzira nebhashani yose, noushe hwose hwaogi mambo webhashani nemisha yose yejairi, yaiva pabhashani, maguta makumi matanhatu; hafu yegireadhi, neashitaroti needhirei, (maguta oushe hwaogi mubhashani). iyi ndiyo yaiva nhaka yezvizvarwa zvamakiri mwanakomana wamanase, zvehafu yavanakomana vamakiri, mhuri nemhuri. ndiyo nhaka yakagoverwa namozisi pamapani emoabhu, mhiri kwajorodhani, kumabvazuva kwejeriko. asi rudzi rwarevhi haruna kupiwa nhaka namozisi; yeahoh, allah wavaisraeri, ndiye nhaka yavo, sezvaakavavimbisa.

14

zvino idzi ndidzo nzvimbo dzakagamuchirwa navana vaisraeri senhaka munyika yekenani, dzavakagoverwa nomuprista ereazari, nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, navakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba amarudzi avana vaisraeri. nhaka yavo yakagoverwa nemijenya kumarudzi mapfumbamwe nehafu yamarudzi, sezvakanga zvaraiyirwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi. mozisi akanga apa marudzi maviri ane hafu nhaka yawo kumabvazuva kwejorodhani; asi varevhi haana kuvapa nhaka pakati pavo, nokuti vana vayosefa vakanga vava marudzi maviri, rwamanase norwaefuremu. varevhi havana kuwana mugove wenyika asi maguta okugara, namafuro amakwai avo nemombe dzavo. naizvozvo vana vaisraeri vakakamura-kamura nyika, sezvazvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi nayeahoh. zvino vanhu veyeahudha vakaenda kuna yeahoshua pagirigari, uye karebhu, mwanakomana wajefune mukenizi, akati kwaari, “imi munoziva zvakataurwa nayeahoh kuna mozisi munhu waallah, pamusoro pangu nemi, pakadheshi bharinea. ndakanga ndava namakore makumi mana pandakatumwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh, pakadheshi bharinea kundosora nyika, uye ndakadzoka neshoko kwaari sezvandakafunga ini, asi hama dzangu dzakanga dzakwidza neni dzakaodza mwoyo yavanhu, nokutya. kunyange zvakadaro ini ndakatevera yeahoh allah wangu nomwoyo wose. saka pazuva iro mozisi akapika kwandiri akati, ‘nyika yose yauchafamba pairi netsoka dzako, ichava nhaka yako, navana vako nokusingaperi, nokuti wakatevera yeahoh allah wangu nomwoyo wako wose.’ “zvino ipapo, sokuvimbiswa kwakaitwa nayeahoh, akandiraramisa kwamakore makumi mana namashanu, kubva panguva yaakataura izvi kuna mozisi, vaisraeri pavaidzungaira murenje. naizvozvo nhasi ndiri pano, ndava namakore makumi masere namashanu! ndichakangosimba nanhasi sezvandakanga ndakaita musi wandakatumwa namozisi; ndichine simba guru rokuti ndinokwanisa kuenda kundorwa sezvandakanga ndakaita kare. zvino chindipa nyika iyo yamakomo, yandakavimbiswa nayeahoh musi iwoyo. iwe pachako wakanzwa kare kuti vaanaki vakanga varipo uye kuti maguta avo akanga ari makuru uye akakomberedzwa, asi yeahoh achindibatsira, ndichavadzinga sezvaakataura.” ipapo yeahoshua akaropafadza karebhu, mwanakomana wajefune akamupa hebhuroni senhaka yake. naizvozvo hebhuroni yakava nhaka yakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune mukenizi kubvira ipapo, nokuti akatevera yeahoh, allah waisraeri, nomwoyo wake wose. (hebhuroni yaimbonzi kiriati abha ichibva pana abha akanga ano mukurumbira pakati pavaanaki vose.) ipapo nyika yakazorora pakurwa hondo.

15

nzvimbo yakapiwa rudzi rwayeahudha, mhuri nemhuri, yaisvika kunyika yeedhomu kugwenga rezini zasi kumagumo chaiko. muganhu wavo wezasi waitangira pamuganhu wegungwa romunyu, uchiyambukira zasi kwomupata wechinyavada uchipfuurira kuenda kuzini uchizopfuurira kuenda nechezasi kwekadheshi bharinea. ipapo waienda uchipfuura nepahezironi kusvika kuadhari uchikombamira kukarika. ipapo waipfuurira kuazimoni uchindobatana nerwizi rweijipiti wogumira kugungwa. uyu ndiwo muganhu wavo wezasi. muganhu wokumabvazuva ndiwo gungwa romunyu kusvikira kumuromo werwizi rwejorodhani. muganhu wokumusoro waitangira kugungwa pamuromo wejorodhani, uchienda kubheti hogira, ndokupfuurira nokumusoro kwebheti arabha kusvika kubwe rabhohani mwanakomana warubheni. ipapo muganhu waizokwira kudhebhiri uchibva pamupata weakori uye uchidzokera nechokumusoro wakananga kugirigari, pakatarisana nomupata weadhumimi nechezasi kwomupata. waipfuurira napamvura yeeni shemeshi ndokuzobudira kueri rogeri. ipapo waikwira napamupata wabheni wahinomi wakanga uri zasi kwamateru eguta ravajebhusi (rinova jerusarema). kubva ipapo waikwira kumusoro kwechikomo kumavirira kwomupata wahinomi nechokumusoro kwamagumo omupata werefaimi. kubva pamusoro pechikomo, muganhu wainanga kuchitubu chemvura zhinji yenefutoa, uchibudira kumaguta egomo reefuroni ndokuzoburuka wakananga bhaara iro kiriati. ipapo waikombamira kumavirira uchibva pabhaara kusvika pagomo reseiri uchienda nokumawere egomo rejearimi (iro kesaroni), ndokupfuurira pasi kubheti shemeshi uchizoyambukira kutimina. waiendawo nokumawere echokumusoro kweekironi, uchidzoka wakananga kushikeroni, uchipfuura nokugomo rebhaara uchisvika kujabhuneeri. muganhu waindogumira kugungwa. muganhu wokumavirira ndiwo mahombekombe egungwa guru. iyi ndiyo miganhu yakapoteredza yeahudha zvichienderana nedzimba dzavo. yeahoshua akapa karebhu mwanakomana wejefune mugove pakati pavana vayeahudha sezvaakarayirwa nayeahoh, akamupa kiriati abha, iro hebhuroni. (abha akanga ari tateguru waanaki.) karebhu akadzinga vanakomana vatatu vaanaki vaiti sheshai, ahimani natarimani zvizvarwa zvaanaki kubva pahebhuroni. kubva ipapo akandorwa navanhu vaigara kudhebhiri (yaimbonzi kiriati seferi). karebhu akati, “munhu anorwa nekenati seferi akarikunda ndichamupa mukunda wangu, akisa ave mukadzi wake.” otinieri mwanakomana wakenazi, mununʼuna wakarebhu akarikunda; saka karebhu akamupa mwanasikana wake akisa akava mukadzi wake. akisa akati achisvika kuna otinieri nerimwe zuva, akamukurudzira kuti akumbire munda kubva kuna baba vake. paakaburuka pambongoro yake karebhu akati kwaari, “ndingakuitireiko?” iye akati, “ndiitirei nyasha. zvamakandipa nyika yenegevhi, ndipeiwo zvakare matsime emvura.” naizvozvo karebhu akamupa matsime okumusoro neezasi. iyi ndiyo nhaka yorudzi rwayeahudha, mhuri nemhuri: maguta ezasi zasi erudzi rwayeahudha kunegevhi kwakanangana nomuganhu weedhomu aiva: kabhizeeri, edheri, jaguri, kina, dhimona, adhadha, kedheshi, hazori, itinani, zifi, teremi, bhearoti, hazori hadhata, kerioti hezironi (iro hazori), amami, shema, moradha, hazari gadha, heshimoni, bheti pereti, hazari shuari, bheerishebha, bhiziotia, bhaara, riyimi, ezemi, eritoradhi, kesiri, hurima, zikiragi, madhimana, sanisana, rebhaoti, shirimi, aini, rimoni, maguta anokwana makumi maviri namapfumbamwe pamwe chete nemisha yawo. mujinga mamakomo okumavirira maiva ne: eshitaori, zora neashina, zanoa, eni ganimi, tapuwa, enami, jarimuti, adhuramu, soko, azeka, shaaraimi, adhitaimi, negedhera (kana kuti gedherotaimi) anova maguta gumi namana pamwe chete nemisha yawo. zenani, hadhasha, migidhari gadhi, dhireani, mizipa, jokiteeri, rakishi, bhozikati, egironi, kabhoni, ramasi, kitireishi, gedheroti, bheti dhagoni, naama, nemakedha anova maguta gumi namatanhatu pamwe chete nemisha yawo. ribhina, eteri, ashani, ifita, ashina, nezibhi, keira, akizibhi, maresha anova maguta mapfumbamwe pamwe chete nemisha yawo. ekironi, nenzvimbo dzakaripoteredza nemisha yaro; uye nokumavirira kwekironi namaguta ose akanga ari pedyo neashidhodhi pamwe chete nemisha yawo; ashidhodhi nemisha yaro yakaripoteredza negaza nemisha yaro kusvikira kurukova rweijipiti namahombekombe egungwa guru. munyika yamakomo maiva ne: shamiri, jatiri, soko, dhana, kiriati sana (iro dhebhiri), anabhi, ashitemo, animi, gosheni, horoni, negiro anova maguta gumi nerimwe pamwe chete nemisha yawo. arabha, dhuma, eshani, janimi, bheti tapua, afeka. humuta, kiriati abha, (iro hebhuroni) neziori ndiwo maguta mapfumbamwe pamwe chete nemisha yawo. maoni, kameri, zifi, juta, jezirieri, jokidheami, zanoa, kaini, gibhea, netimuna, ndiwo maguta gumi nemisha yawo. hariuri, bheti zuri, gedhori, maarati, bheti anoti, neeritekoni ndiwo maguta matanhatu pamwe chete nemisha yawo. kiriati bhaari (iro kiriati jearimi) nerabha ndiwo maguta maviri nemisha yawo. murenje maiva ne: bheti arabha, midhini, sekaka, nibhishani, guta romunyu, neeni gedhi ndiwo maguta matanhatu pamwe chete nemisha yawo. yeahudha haana kukwanisa kudzinga vajebhusi vakanga vachigara mujerusarema; nanhasi vajebhusi vageremo navanhu veyeahudha.

16

mugove wayosefa waitangira pajorodhani pajeriko kumabvazuva kwemvura zhinji yejeriko, ndokukwidza uchibva ikoko nomugwenga uchienda kunyika yezvikomo yebheteri. waienderera mberi uchibva pabheteri (iro ruzi), ndokuyambukira kunyika yavaariki muataroti, ndokuburukira kumabvazuva kunyika yavajafereti uchindosvika kunyika yebheti horoni rezasi nokugezeri, uchigumira pagungwa. saka manase naefuremu zvizvarwa zvayosefa, vakagamuchira nhaka yavo. iyi ndiyo yaiva nyika yaefuremu, mhuri nemhuri: muganhu wenhaka yavo waibvira paataroti adhari kumabvazuva uchisvika kubheti horoni yokumusoro uye uchindosvika kugungwa, kubva kumikimetati nechokumusoro waikombamira kumabvazuva uchindosvika pataanati shiro, ndokupfuura ipapo wakananga kujanoa nechokumabvazuva. ipapo wakadzika uchibva kujanoa uchienda kuataroti nokunaara, ndokundobata jeriko, ndokubudira pajorodhani. kubva patapuwa muganhu waienda kumavirazuva kurwizi rwekana uchindogumira pagungwa. iyi ndiyo yaiva nhaka yorudzi rwavaefuremu mhuri nemhuri. waisanganisirawo maguta ose nemisha yawo yakanga yakatsaurirwa vaefuremu pakati penhaka yavamanase. havana kudzinga vakenani vakanga vagere mugezeri; nanhasi vakenani vagere pakati pavaefuremu asi vanoshandiswa mabasa echibharo.

17

uyu ndiwo mugove worudzi rwamanase sedangwe rayosefa, ndiko kuti mugove wamakiri dangwe ramanase. makiri ndiye akanga ari tateguru wavagireadhi, uye akanga apiwa gireadhi nebhashani nokuti vamakiri vakanga vari varwi vakuru. saka mugove uyu wakanga uri wavanhu vakasara vamanase dzimba dzaabhiezeri, hereki, asirieri, shekemu, hefa nashemidha. izvi ndizvo zvimwe zvizvarwa zvechirume zvamanase mwanakomana wayosefa nedzimba dzavo. zvino zerofehadhi mwanakomana waheferi, mwanakomana wagireadhi, mwanakomana wamakiri, mwanakomana wamanase, akanga asina vanakomana asi vanasikana chete. mazita avo aiti mara, noa, hogira, mirika, natiriza. ivo vakaenda kuna ereazari muprista nokuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, nokuvatungamiri vakandoti, “yeahoh akarayira mozisi kuti atipe nhaka pakati pehama dzedu.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akavapa nhaka pamwe chete navanunʼuna vababa vavo, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh. mugove wamanase waisanganisira matunhu gumi tisingaverengi gireadhi nebhashani dzaiva kumabvazuva kwejorodhani, nokuti vanasikana vorudzi rwamanase vakapiwa nhaka pakati pavanakomana. nyika yegireadhi yakanga iri yezvimwe zvizvarwa zvose zvamanase. nyika yamanase yaitangira kuasheri ichindosvika kumikimetati kumabvazuva kweshekemu. muganhu wainanga nechezasi uchibva ikoko uye waisanganisira vanhu vakanga vagere mueni tapua. (nyika yetapua yakanga iri yamanase asi guta retapua pacharo raiva pamuganhu wamanase, rakanga riri ravaefuremu.) zvino muganhu waipfuurira zasi kurwizi rwekana. kwakanga kuna maguta aiva aefuremu akanga ari pakati pamaguta amanase, asi muganhu wamanase wakanga uri nechokumusoro kworwizi uchindogumira pagungwa. nechezasi nyika iyi yakanga iri yaefuremu uye kurutivi rwokumusoro yakanga iri yamanase. nyika yamanase yaisvika kugungwa uye yaiganhurana naasheri nechokumusoro uye naisakari kumabvazuva. mukati meisakari neasheri, manase akanga ainewo bheti shani, ibhireami navanhu vedhori, enidhori, tanaki nemegidho, pamwe chete nemisha yakapoteredza (yechitatu pakuverengwa inafoti). asi vana vamanase havana kugona kugara mumaguta aya, nokuti vakenani vakashinga kugara munyika iyoyo. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, vaisraeri vakati vava nesimba, vakaisa vakenani pasi pavo ndokuvashandisa chibharo, asi havana kuvadzinga zvachose. vanhu vayosefa vakati kuna yeahoshua, “makatipireiko mugove mumwe chete nechikamu chimwe chete kuti ive nhaka yedu? tiri vanhu vazhinji uye yeahoh akatiropafadza zvikuru.” yeahoshua akapindura achiti, “kana muri vanhu vazhinji, uye kana nyika yezvikomo yaefuremu iri diki chaizvo kwamuri, endai kudondo munozvitemera nzvimbo ikoko kunyika yavaperizi neyavarefaiti.” vanhu vayosefa vakati, “nyika yamakomo haitikwaniri, uye vakenani vose vanogara mubani vane ngoro dzesimbi, ivo vose vari mubheti sheani nemisha yaro pamwe chete navari mumupata wejezireeri.” asi yeahoshua akati kuimba yayosefa, imba yaefuremu namanase, “imi muri vanhu vazhinji uye mune simba guru. hamungave nomugove mumwe chete asi nyika yamakomo ichava yenyu; nokuti kunyange riri dondo, muchafanira kuritema rigova renyu kusvikira kwarinoperera, nokuti munofanira kudzinga vakenani, kunyange vane ngoro dzesimbi uye vane simba.”

18

ungano yose yavaisraeri yakaungana pashiro vakadzikapo tende rokusangana. nyika yakanga yava pasi pavo, asi kwakanga kwasara marudzi manomwe avaisraeri akanga asati agoverwa nhaka yawo. saka yeahoshua akati kuvaisraeri, “muchamirira kusvika rinhiko musati matora nyika yamakapiwa nayeahoh allah wamadzibaba enyu? zvitsaurirei varume vatatu kurudzi rumwe norumwe. ndichavatuma kuti vanosora nyika uye kuti vagonyora vachirondedzera zvayakaita maererano nenhaka imwe neimwe. ipapo vachadzoka kwandiri. munofanira kuganhura kuti iite zvikamu zvinomwe. yeahudha anofanira kuramba ari munyika yezasi uye imba yayosefa munyika yokumusoro. mushure mokunge manyora rondedzero yezvikamu zvinomwe zvenyika, muuye nazvo kwandiri ndigokukandirai mujenya pamberi payeahoh allah wenyu. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, varevhi havawani mugove pakati penyu, nokuti uprista hwayeahoh ndihwo nhaka yavo. uye gadhi, rubheni nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakapiwa kare nhaka yavo kumabvazuva kwejorodhani. mozisi muranda wayeahoh ndiye akavapa nhaka iyoyo.” varume vakati vaenda kundotara muganhu wenyika, yeahoshua akavarayira achiti, “endai mundosora nyika mugonyora rondedzero yayo. ipapo mugodzoka kwandiri, uye ndichakukandirai mujenya pano pashiro pamberi payeahoh.” saka varume vakaenda, vakafamba nenyika. vakanyora rondedzero yayo mubhuku, guta neguta, muzvikamu zvinomwe, ndokudzokera kuna yeahoshua kumusasa pashiro. ipapo yeahoshua akavakandira mujenya mushiro pamberi payeahoh, ndokugovera vaisraeri nyika ipapo maererano namarudzi avo. rudzi rwabhenjamini rwakapiwa mugove warwo, mhuri nemhuri. nyika yavakagoverwa yakanga iri pakati pamarudzi ayeahudha neayosefa: kumusoro muganhu wavo waitangira pajorodhani, uchipfuura nokumusoro kwamateru ejeriko ndokunanga kumavirira okunyika yamakomo, uchindobuda kurenje rebheti avheni. kubva ikoko wakayambukira kumateru ezasi kweruzi (iro bheteri) uchizoburukira kuataroti adhari pagomo riri zasi kwebheti horoni yezasi. kubva pachikomo chakatarisana nebheti horoni nechokumusoro, muganhu wakadzokera zasi kudivi rokumavirira ndokundobudira pakiriati bhaari (iro kiriati jearimi), guta ravanhu veyeahudha. iri ndiro raiva divi rokumavirira. rutivi rwezasi rwakatangira panogumira kiriati jearimi kumavirira, uye muganhu wakandobudira patsime remvura zhinji renefitoa. muganhu wakaburukira mujinga megomo rakatarisana nomupata webheni hinomi kumusoro kwomupata werefaimi. wakaramba uchidzika nokumupata wehinomi mujinga memateru echezasi kweguta ravajebhusi kusvikira kueni rogeri. ipapo wakazokombamira kumusoro uchienda kueni shemeshi, uchipfuurira mberi kugeriroti yakatarisana nomupata weadhumimi, ndokuburikira kudombo rabhohani mwanakomana warubheni. wakaramba uchienda nokurutivi rwokumusoro kwamateru ebheti arabha. ipapo wakananga nechokumusoro kwamateru ebheti hogira ndokubudira kumusoro kwegungwa romunyu, pamuromo wejorodhani nechezasi. uyu ndiwo wakanga uri muganhu wezasi. jorodhani ndirwo rwakanga rwuri muganhu kumabvazuva. iyi ndiyo yakanga iri miganhu yairatidza nhaka yemhuri dzabhenjamini kumativi ose. rudzi rwabhenjamini, mhuri nemhuri, rwakanga runa maguta anotevera anoti: jeriko, bheti hogira, emeki kezizi, bheti arabha, zamaraini, bheteri, avhimi, para, ofira, kefari amoni, ofini, negebha, maguta gumi namaviri pamwe chete nemisha yawo. ghibheoni, rama, bheeroti, mizipa, kefira, moza, rekemu, iripeeri, tarara, zera, haerefi guta ravajebhusi, (iro jerusarema) gibhea nekiriati, maguta gumi namana pamwe chete nemisha yawo. iyi ndiyo yakanga iri nhaka yemhuri dzabhenjamini.

19

mugove wechipiri wakapiwa kuna simeoni, mhuri nemhuri. nhaka yavo yakanga iri pakati penyika yavayeahudha. nhaka yavo yaisanganisira: bheerishebha (kana kuti shebha), moradha, hazari shuari, bhara, ezemi, eritoradhi, bheturi, homa, zikiragi, bheti makabhoti, hazari susa, bheti rebhaoti neshareheni, maguta gumi namatatu nemisha yawo; aini, rimoni, eteri neashani, maguta mana nemisha yawo, nemisha yose yakanga yakapoteredza maguta ose aya kusvikira kubhaarati bheeri (rama munegevhi). iyi ndiyo yakanga iri nhaka yorudzi rwavasimeoni, mhuri nemhuri. nhaka yavasimeoni yakanga yatorwa pamugove wayeahudha, nokuti mugove wayeahudha wakanga wakakura kupfuura zvavaida. saka vasimeoni vakapiwa nhaka mukati menyika yayeahudha. mugove wechitatu wakapiwa kuna zebhuruni, mhuri nemhuri: muganhu wenyika yavo waisvika kusaridhi. wainanga kumavirira uchisvika kumarara, ndokundobata dhabhesheti, uye waitandavara kusvika kurukova rwuri pedyo nejokineami. wakanga uchidzokera kumabvazuva uchibva kusaridhi wakananga kumabvazuva uchienda kunyika yekisiroti tabhori ndokupfuurira kudhabherati uchindokwidza kujafia. ipapo wakaramba wakananga kumabvazuva uchienda kugati hefa neeti kazini; uchindobudira parimoni ndokudzoka wakananga kunea. ipapo muganhu wakapoterera nechokumusoro uchienda kuhanatoni ndokugumira pamupata weifita eri. waisanganisirawo katati, naharari, shimironi, idhara nebheterehema. pakanga pane maguta gumi namaviri nemisha yawo. maguta aya nemisha yawo ndiwo akanga ari nhaka yazebhuruni, mhuri nemhuri. mugove wechina wakapiwa isakari, mhuri nemhuri. nyika yavo yaisanganisira: jezireeri, kesuroti, shunami, hafaraimi, shioni, anaharati, rabhiti, kishioni, ebhezi, remeti, eni ganimi, eni hadha, bheti pazezi. muganhu waindobatawo tabhori, shahazuma, nebheti shameshi ndokuguma pajorodhani. paiva namaguta gumi namatanhatu nemisha yawo. maguta aya nemisha yawo akanga ari nhaka yorudzi rwaisakari, mhuri nemhuri. mugove wechishanu wakapiwa rudzi rwavana vaasheri, mhuri nemhuri. nyika yavo yaisanganisira: herikati, hari, bheteni, akishafi, aramereki, amadhi, nemishari. nechokumavirira, muganhu waibata karimeri neshihori ribhinati. ipapo waidzokera kumabvazuva wakananga kumusoro kubheti dhagoni, ugobata zebhuruni nomupata weifita eri, uye ugonanga kumusoro kubheti emeki nokuneyeri, uchipfuura kabhuri iri nechokuruboshwe. wakananga kuadhudhoni, rehobhu, hamoni nekana, kusvikira kusidhoni huru. ipapo muganhu wakadzokera kumashure wakananga kurama ukaenda kuguta rakakomberedzwa retire, ndokudzokera kuhosa ukandobudira pagungwa riri mudunhu reakizibhi, uma, afeki nerehobhi. pakanga pane maguta makumi maviri namaviri nemisha yawo. maguta aya nemisha yawo ndiwo akanga ari nhaka yorudzi rwaasheri, mhuri nemhuri. mugove wechitanhatu wakapiwa kuna nafutari, mhuri nemhuri: muganhu wavo wakatangira paherefi napamuti mukuru wezaananimi, uchipfuura napaadhoni nekebhi, nejabhuneeri, kusvikira parakumi uye uchigumira pajorodhani. muganhu wakaenda kumavirira ndokupfuura napaazinoti tabhori uye ukandobudira pahukoki. waindobata zebhuruni nechezasi, asheri riri kumavirira nejorodhani rwuri kumabvazuva. maguta akanga ane masvingo aiti zidhimu, zeri, hamati, rakati, kinereti, adhama, rama, hazori, kedheshi, edhirei, eni hazori, ironi, migidhari eri, horemi, bheti anati nebheti shemeshi. paiva namaguta gumi namapfumbamwe nemisha yawo. maguta aya nemisha yawo ndiwo akanga ari nhaka yorudzi rwanafutari, mhuri nemhuri. mugove wechinomwe wakapiwa kurudzi rwadhani, mhuri nemhuri. nyika yenhaka yavo yaisanganisira: zora, eshitaori, iri shemeshi, shaarabhini, aijaroni, itira, eroni, timuna, ekironi, eriteke, gibhetoni, bhaarati, jehudhi, bhene bheraki, gati rimoni, me jakironi, rakoni nenyika yakatarisana nejopa. (asi vana vadhani vakaomerwa nokutora nyika yavo, saka vakaenda vakandorwisa reshemi, vakaitora, vakaibaya nomunondo, ndokugara mairi. vakagara mureshemi ndokuitumidza kuti dhani zita ratateguru wavo.) maguta aya nemisha yawo ndiwo akanga ari nhaka yorudzi rwadhani, mhuri nemhuri. pavakapedza kugoverana nyika muzvikamu zvakafanira, vaisraeri vakapa yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni nhaka yake pakati pavo, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh. vakamupa guta raakanga akumbira, timunati sera panyika yamakomo yaefuremu. uye akavaka guta iri akagaramo. idzi ndidzo nyika dzakagoverwa nemijenya pashiro pamberi payeahoh pamukova wetende rokusangana, nomuprista ereazari nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, navakuru vedzimba dzamarudzi avana vaisraeri. naizvozvo vakapedza kukamura-kamura nyika.

20

ipapo yeahoh akataura nayeahoshua akati, “udza vana vaisraeri kuti vatsaure maguta outiziro, sezvandakarayira kubudikidza namozisi, kuitira kuti ani naani anouraya munhu netsaona uye asina kuita namaune, agone kutizira ikoko uye adzivirirwe kumutsivi weropa. “kana atizira kune rimwe ramaguta aya, anofanira kumira pasuo reguta agorondedzera nyaya yake pamberi pavakuru veguta. ipapo vanofanira kumupinza muguta ravo vagomupa nzvimbo yokugara. ipapo kana mutsivi weropa akamutevera, havafaniri kutendera muurayi kuti amubate nokuti akauraya wokwake asingaiti namaune uye asinazve kumuvenga kubva kare. iye anofanira kugara muguta iroro kusvikira amira pamberi peungano uyezve kusvikira muprista ari kushumira panguva iyoyo afa. ipapo angazodzokera kumusha kwake kwaakanga atiza.” saka vakatsaura kedheshi mugarirea munyika yamakomo yanafutari, neshekemu munyika yamakomo yaefuremu, nekiriati abha (iyo hebhuroni) munyika yamakomo yayeahudha. kurutivi rwokumabvazuva kwejorodhani rejeriko vakatsaura bhezeri pamatunhu akakwirira omugwenga rokurudzi rwagadhi, negorani mubhashani murudzi rwamanase. muisraeri upi zvake kana mutorwa aigona kutizira hake kumaguta akatsaurwa uye aisazourayiwa nomutsivi weropa asati ambomiswa pamberi peungano.

21

zvino vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avarevhi vakaenda kumuprista ereazari, nokuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, nokuvakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba amarudzi avana vaisraeri. pashiro panyika yekenani vakati kwavari, “yeahoh akarayira kubudikidza namozisi kuti utipe maguta atingagara namafuro emombe dzedu.” saka sokurayira kwakanga kwaita yeahoh, vaisraeri vakapa varevhi panhaka dzavo maguta anotevera namafuro kubva panhaka yavo: mugove wokutanga wakapiwa vakohati, mhuri nemhuri. varevhi, avo vakanga vari zvizvarwa zvaaroni muprista, vakagoverwa nemijenya maguta gumi namatatu kubva kumarudzi ayeahudha, asimeoni nabhenjamini, ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zvakohati vakagoverwa nemijenya maguta gumi pakati pemhuri dzamarudzi aefuremu, adhani nehafu yorudzi rwamanase. zvizvarwa zvagerishoni zvakagoverwawo nemijenya maguta gumi namatatu pamhuri dzorudzi rwaisraeri, rwaasheri, rwanafutari, nehafu yorudzi rwamanase mubhashani. zvizvarwa zvamerari zvakapiwa maguta gumi namaviri kumarudzi arubheni, gadhi nazebhuruni, mhuri nemhuri. saka vaisraeri vakagovera maguta aya namafuro awo, nemijenya kuvarevhi sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. kubva pamarudzi avayeahudha navasimeoni, vakavapa maguta akarehwa namazita awo pano (maguta aya akapiwa kuzvizvarwa zvaaroni zvaibva kumhuri yakohati vari varevhi, nokuti ndivo vakatanga kugoverwa nemijenya): vakavapa kiriati abha (iro hebhuroni), namafuro akaripoteredza, munyika yamakomo yayeahudha. (abha ndiye akanga ari tateguru wavaanaki.) asi minda nemisha yakapoteredza guta zvakanga zvapiwa kuna karebhu mwanakomana wajefune. saka vakapa zvizvarwa zvomuprista aroni hebhuroni (guta routiziro kune anenge apomerwa mhosva yokuponda munhu), ribhina, jatiri, eshitemoa, horoni, dhebhiri, aini, juta nebheti shemeshi, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mapfumbamwe kubva pamarudzi maviri aya. kubva parudzi rwabhenjamini, vakavapa gibheoni, gebha, anatoti, nearimoni, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana. maguta ose avaprista, izvo zvizvarwa zvaaroni muprista akanga ari gumi namatatu, pamwe chete namafuro awo. vamwe vose vedzimba dzavakohati, vorudzi rwarevhi vakagoverwa maguta kurudzi rwaefuremu: munyika yamakomo yaefuremu vakapiwa shekemu (guta routiziro rouya anopomerwa mhosva yokuuraya munhu) negezeri, kibhizaimi nebheti horoni, pamwe namafuro awo, maguta mana. uyewo kubva parudzi rwadhani vakapiwazve eriteke, gibheoni, aijaroni, negati rimoni pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana. pakati kuhafu yorudzi rwamanase vakapiwa taanaki negati rimoni pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta maviri. maguta ose aya ari gumi pamwe chete namafuro aro akapiwa kuna vakasara vedzimba dzakohati. dzimba dzavarevhi dzokwagerishoni dzakapiwa: kubva kuhafu yorudzi rwamanase, gorani mubhashani (guta routiziro rouya anenge apomerwa mhosva yokuponda munhu) nebhe eshitara, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta maviri; kubva kurudzi rwaisakari, kishioni, dhabherati, jarimuti neeni ganimi, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana; kubva kurudzi rwaasheri, mishari, abhudhoni, herikati nerehobhi, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana; kubva kurudzi rwanafutari, kedheshi mugarirea (guta routiziro rouya anenge apomerwa mhosva yokuponda munhu), hamoti dhori nekaritani, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta matatu. maguta ose emhuri dzavagerishoni akanga ari gumi namatatu pamwe chete namafuro awo. dzimba dzavamerari (vakasara vavarevhi) vakapiwa: kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni, jokineami, katira, dhimina nenaharari, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana; kubva kurudzi rwarubheni, bhezeri, jahazi, kedhemoti nemefaati, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana; kubva kurudzi rwagadhi, ramoti mugireadhi (guta routiziro rouya anenge apomerwa mhosva yokuuraya munhu), heshibhoni nejazeri, pamwe chete namafuro awo, maguta mana pamwe chete. maguta ose akanga agoverwa dzimba dzavamerari, avo vakanga vari varevhi vakasara, akanga ari gumi namaviri. maguta avarevhi munyika yaiva yavaisraeri aiva makumi mana namasere pamwe chete namafuro awo. rimwe nerimwe ramaguta aya rakanga rakapoteredzwa namafuro; ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita maguta ose aya. saka yeahoh akapa vaisraeri nyika yose yaakanga apika kuti achapa madzitateguru avo, ikava yavo vakagara mairi. yeahoh akavapa zororo kumativi ose, sezvaakanga apikira madzitateguru avo. hapana kana muvengi wavo mumwe chete akamira pamberi pavo; yeahoh akaisa vavengi vavo vose mumaoko mavo. hakuna kana chinhu chimwe chete zvacho chezvinhu zvakanaka zvakanga zvavimbiswa nayeahoh kuimba yaisraeri chakakona; zvose zvakazadziswa.

22

zvino yeahoshua akadana varubheni navagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase akati kwavari, “makaita zvose zvamakarayirwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh uye makateerera zvose zvandakakurayirai. kwenguva refu, kusvikira nhasi, hamuna kurasa hama dzenyu, asi makaita zvamakarayirwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. zvino yeahoh allah wenyu zvaakazorodza hama dzenyu sezvaakavimbisa, imi chidzokerai kumisha yenyu munyika yamakapiwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh mhiri kwejorodhani. asi muchenjerere kwazvo kuti muchengete murau nomurayiro wake, munamatire paari uye mumushumire nemwoyo yenyu yose, uye nemweya yenyu yose.” ipapo yeahoshua akavaropafadza akati vaende havo, ivo vakaenda kumisha yavo. (rudzi rwehafu rwamanase, mozisi akanga apa nyika yomubhashani, uye imwe hafu yorudzi rwamanase yakapiwa nyika nayeahoshua kumavirazuva pamwe chete nehama dzavo.) yeahoshua akati avaendesa kumusha, akavaropafadza, achiti, “dzokerai kumisha yenyu nepfuma yenyu zhinji, nemombe dzakawanda, nesirivha, negoridhe, ndarira nesimbi, nenhumbi dzakawanda chose, mundogovana nehama dzenyu zvamakapamba kuvavengi venyu.” saka varubheni, vagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakasiya vaisraeri pashiro munyika yekenani vakadzokera kunyika yegireadhi, nyika yavakanga vapiwa kuti ive yavo, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi. vakati vasvika pageriroti pedyo nejorodhani munyika yekenani, varubheni, vagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakavaka aritari huru kwazvo ipapo pajorodhani. zvino vaisraeri vakati vanzwa kuti vakanga vavaka aritari pamuganhu wekenani pageriroti pedyo nejorodhani kudivi reisraeri, ungano yose yavaisraeri yakaungana pashiro kuti vaende kundorwa navo. naizvozvo vaisraeri vakatuma finehasi mwanakomana womuprista ereazari, kunyika yegireadhi, kuna rubheni, nagadhi nokuhafu yorudzi rwamanase. akatumwa iye pamwe chete navakuru vamachinda gumi, mumwe chete akamirira rudzi rumwe chete rwavaisraeri, mumwe nomumwe wavo ari mukuru weimba pakati pamarudzi aisraeri. vakati vaenda kugireadhi, kuna rubheni, gadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase, vakati kwavari, “ungano yose yayeahoh inoti, ‘makarasirei kutenda muna allah waisraeri sezvizvi? mungadzokera shure seiko muchibva kuna yeahoh mukazvivakira aritari muchimumukira zvino. ko, chivi chepapeori chakanga chisina kutiringana here? kusvikira pazuva ranhasi hatina kuzvichenesa pachivi ichocho kunyange zvazvo hasha dzakawira ungano yayeahoh! ko, zvino mava kutsauka kubva pana yeahoh here? “ ‘kana mukamukira yeahoh nhasi, mangwana achatsamwira ungano yose yavaisraeri. kana nyika yamunayo yakasvibiswa, yambukirai kuno kunyika yayeahoh, kwakamira tabhenakeri yayeahoh mugogovana nyika nesu. asi regai kumukira yeahoh, kana kutimukira isu, pakuzvivakira imwe aritari parutivi rwearitari yayeahoh allah wedu. akani mwanakomana wazera paakadarika nokusatenda pachinhu chakatsaurwa nayeahoh, kutsamwa hakuna kuwira ungano yose yaisraeri here? haasi iye oga akafira chivi chake.’ ” ipapo rubheni, gadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakapindura vakuru vedzimba dzaisraeri vakati, “iye oga wamasimba, allah, yeahoh! iye oga wamasimba, allah, yeahoh! anoziva! uye israeri ngaizive! kana izvi kwanga kuri kumukira kana kusateerera yeahoh, musatiponesa nhasi. kana takazvivakira aritari yedu kuti tifuratire yeahoh uye kuti tipe zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezviyo, kana kuti tibayire zvibayiro zvokuwadzana pamusoro payo, yeahoh pachake ngaatitonge. “kwete! takazviita tichitya kuti rimwe zuva zvizvarwa zvenyu zvichazoti kuzvizvarwa zvedu, ‘mune chii chokuita nayeahoh allah waisraeri? yeahoh akaita kuti jorodhani uve muganhu pakati pedu nemi, imi varubheni navagadhi! hamuna mugove muna yeahoh.’ saka zvizvarwa zvenyu zvingangokonzera kuti zvizvarwa zvedu zvirege kutya yeahoh. “ndokusaka takati, ‘ngatizvigadzirirei tivake aritari, asi isiri yezvipiriso zvinopiswa kana yezvibayiro.’ asi kuti ive chapupu pakati pedu nemi uye napakati pezvizvarwa zvedu zvinotevera, kuti tichanamata yeahoh panzvimbo yake tsvene, nezvipiriso zvedu zvinopiswa, nezvibayiro uye nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. ipapo panguva inouya zvizvarwa zvenyu hazvingazoti kuzvizvarwa zvedu, ‘hamuna mugove muna yeahoh.’ “uye isu tikati, ‘kana vakazotaura izvo kwatiri, kana kuzvizvarwa zvedu, tichazopindura tichiti: tarirai muone mufananidzo wearitari yayeahoh, wakaitwa namadzibaba edu; usiri wezvipiriso zvinopiswa kana wokubayira ipapo, asi sechapupu pakati pedu nemi.’ “ngazvirege kutomboitika kuti isu timukire yeahoh tichitsauka nhasi kubva kwaari nokuvaka aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa, zvipiriso zvezviyo, nezvibayiro kunze kwearitari yayeahoh allah wedu, imire pamberi petabhenakeri yake.” finehasi muprista, navatungamiri veungano, vakuru vemhuri dzavaisraeri, vakati vanzwa zvakanga zvataurwa narubheni nagadhi namanase, vakafara. zvino finehasi mwanakomana waereazari, muprista, akati kuna rubheni, gadhi namanase, “nhasi tinoziva kuti yeahoh ari pakati pedu, nokuti hamuna kutadzira yeahoh pachinhu ichi. zvino madzikinura vana vaisraeri paruoko rwayeahoh.” ipapo finehasi, mwanakomana waereazari muprista, navatungamiri vakadzokera kukenani, vachibva kumusangano wavo navarubheni navagadhi mugireadhi uye vakandozivisa vaisraeri zvakanga zvaitika. vakafara kunzwa shoko iri vakarumbidza allah. uye havana kuzotaurazve kuti vachandorwa navo, kuti vaparadze nyika yakanga igere varubheni navagadhi. zvino varubheni navanakomana vagadhi vakatumidza aritari iyi kuti: aritari yechapupu pakati pedu kuti yeahoh ndiye allah.

23

zvino mazuva mazhinji akati apfuura uye yeahoh akanga azorodza vaisraeri pavavengi vavo vose vakanga vakavapoteredza, yeahoshua akanga akwegura kwazvo ava namakore mazhinji panguva iyoyo. akadana vaisraeri vose, vakuru vavo, navatungamiri vavo, vatongi vavo, navatariri vavo, akati kwavari, “ndakwegura uye ndava namakore mazhinji. imi pachenyu makaona zvose zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wenyu kunyika idzi dzose nokuda kwenyu; ndiyeahoh allah wenyu akakurwirai. rangarirai kuti ndakakugoverai kuti ive nhaka yamarudzi enyu, nyika yose yendudzi dzakasara, ndudzi dzandakakunda pakati pejorodhani negungwa guru kumavirazuva. yeahoh allah pachake achavadzinga pamberi penyu. achavabvisa pamberi penyu, uye imi muchatora nyika yavo ive yenyu, sezvamakavimbiswa nayeahoh allah wenyu. “simbai kwazvo; muchenjerere kuti muteerere zvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku romurayiro wamozisi, musingatsaukiri kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. musafambidzana nendudzi dzakasara pakati penyu, kana kudana kumazita avamwari vavo, kana kupika navo. hamufaniri kuvashumira, kana kuvapfugamira. asi namatirai pana yeahoh allah wenyu sezvamakaita kusvikira nhasi. “yeahoh akadzinga pamberi penyu ndudzi huru dzaiva nesimba, asi kana muri imi hakuna munhu akagona kumira pamberi penyu kusvikira nhasi. munhu mumwe chete kwamuri achadzinga vanhu vane chiuru, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ndiye anokurwirai sezvaakavimbisa. saka chenjererai kuti mude yeahoh allah wenyu. “asi kana mukangodzokera mukandobatana navakasara vendudzi idzi, dzigere pakati penyu uye kana mukawanana navo mukafambidzana navo, ipapo zvirokwazvo yeahoh allah wenyu haangazodzingi ndudzi pamberi penyu. asi vachava musungo neriva kwamuri, netyava kumisana yenyu neminzwa pameso enyu, kusvikira mapera panyika ino yakanaka, yamakapiwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. “zvino ini ndava kuenda nenzira yenyika yose. imi munoziva mumwoyo yenyu yose nomumweya yenyu yose, kuti hapana chinhu chimwe pazvose zvakanaka zvakavimbiswa nayeahoh allah wenyu chakakona. asi sezvo zvakanaka zvose zvakavimbiswa nayeahoh allah wenyu zvakaitika, saizvozvo yeahoh achauyisa pamusoro penyu zvakaipa zvose zvaakareva kusvikira akuparadzai panyika iyi yakanaka, yaakakupai. kana mukaputsa sungano yayeahoh allah wenyu, yaakakurayirai, mukandoshumira vamwe vamwari uye mukavapfugamira kutsamwa kwayeahoh kuchakumukirai, mukakurumidza kuparara panyika yakanaka yaakakupai.”

24

ipapo yeahoshua akaunganidza marudzi ose aisraeri pashekemu. akadana vakuru vavaisraeri, vatungamiri, vatongi, navatariri vavo vakazviisa pamberi paallah. yeahoshua akati kuvanhu vose, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah waisraeri: ‘kare madzitateguru enyu pamwe chete natera, baba vaabhurahama nanahori, vaigara mhiri kworwizi vachishumira vamwe vamwari. asi ndakatora baba wenyu abhurahama kubva kunyika iri mhiri kwerwizi ndikamufambisa munyika yose yekenani ndikamupa vana vazhinji. ndakamupa isaka, uye kuna isaka ndakapa yaqobho naesau. ndakapa esau nyika yezvikomo yeseiri, asi yaqobho navanakomana vake vakaenda kuijipiti. “ ‘ipapo ndakatuma mozisi naaroni uye ndakatambudza vaijipita nezvandakaita ikoko, uye ndakakubudisai. pandakabudisa madzibaba enyu muijipiti, vakasvika pagungwa, vaijipita vakavatevera vaine ngoro navatasvi vamabhiza kusvikira pagungwa dzvuku. asi ivo vakachema kuna yeahoh, akaisa rima pakati penyu navaijipita; akauyisa gungwa pamusoro pavo rikavafukidza. makaona nameso enyu chaiwo zvandakaita kuvaijipita. ipapo makagara murenje kwenguva refu. “ ‘ndakauya nemi kunyika yavaamori vaigara kumabvazuva kwejorodhani. vakakurwisai asi ndakavaisa mumaoko enyu. ndakavaparadza pamberi penyu, imi mukatora nyika yavo. zvino bharaki mwanakomana wazipori mambo wemoabhu, akati agadzirira kundorwa naisraeri, akatuma nhume kundodana bharamu mwanakomana wabheori kuti akutukei. asi ini ndakaramba kunzwa bharamu, naizvozvo akaramba achingokuropafadzai, ini ndikakurwirai paruoko rwake. “ ‘ipapo makayambuka jorodhani, mukasvika pajeriko. vanhu vejeriko vakarwa nemi, sezvakaitawo vaamori, vaperizi, vakenani, vahiti, vagirigashi, vahivhi navajebhusi, asi ndakavaisa mumaoko enyu. ndakatuma mago pamberi penyu, iwo akavadzinga pamberi penyu, uyewo namadzimambo maviri avaamori. hamuna kuzviita nomunondo wenyu kana nouta hwenyu. saka ndakakupai nyika yamusina kushandira namaguta amusina kuvaka; uye mugere maari uye munodya zvinobva muminda yemizambiringa nemiorivhi yamusina kusima.’ “zvino ityai yeahoh uye mumushumire nokutendeka kwose. rasai vamwari vainamatwa namadzitateguru enyu mhiri kworwizi nokuijipiti, uye mushumire yeahoh. asi kana kushumira yeahoh kusingakufadzei, zvino zvisarudzirei nhasi wamuchashumira, vamwari vaishumirwa namadzitateguru enyu mhiri kworwizi kana vamwari vavaamori, munyika mamugere. asi kana ndirini neimba yangu tichashumira yeahoh.” ipapo vanhu vakapindura vachiti, “ngazvive kure nesu kuti tisiye yeahoh kuti tishumire vamwe vamwari! yeahoh allah wedu pachake, ndiye akatibudisa isu namadzibaba edu kubva muijipiti, nyika youranda, uye akaita zviratidzo zvikuru zvatakaona. akatidzivirira parwendo rwedu rwose rwatakafamba pakati pendudzi dzose dzatakapfuura nokwadziri. uye yeahoh akadzinga pamberi pedu ndudzi dzose pamwe chete navaamori vakanga vagere munyika ino. nesuwo tichashumira yeahoh, nokuti ndiye allah wedu.” yeahoshua akapindura vanhu achiti, “hamungagoni kushumira yeahoh. ndiallah mutsvene; ndiallah ane godo. haangakukanganwirei kumumukira kwenyu nezvivi zvenyu. kana mukarasa yeahoh, mukashumira vamwari vavatorwa, iye achakupindukirai agouyisa njodzi pamusoro penyu agokuparadzai.” asi vanhu vakati kuna yeahoshua, “kwete! isu tichashumira yeahoh.” ipapo yeahoshua akati, “ndimi zvapupu zvezvamaita kuti masarudza kushumira yeahoh.” ivo vakapindura vachiti: “hongu, tiri zvapupu.” yeahoshua akati, “naizvozvo rasai vamwari vavatorwa vari pakati penyu murerekere mwoyo yenyu kuna yeahoh allah waisraeri.” vanhu vakati kuna yeahoshua, “tichashumira yeahoh allah wedu, uye tichamuteerera.” pazuva iro yeahoshua akaitira vanhu sungano, akavadzikira mitemo nemirayiro ipapo pashekemu. yeahoshua akanyora mashoko aya mubhuku romurayiro waallah. ipapo akatora ibwe guru akariisa pasi pomuouki, pedyo nenzvimbo tsvene yayeahoh. akati kuvanhu vose, “tarirai! ibwe iri richava chapupu pamusoro pedu. ranzwa mashoko ose ataurwa nayeahoh kwatiri. richava chapupu pamusoro penyu kana musina kutendeka kuna allah wenyu.” ipapo yeahoshua akaendesa vanhu, mumwe nomumwe kunhaka yake. mushure mezvinhu izvi yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, muranda wayeahoh, akafa ava namakore zana negumi. uye vakamuviga munyika yenhaka yake, patimunati sera, munyika yamakomo yaefuremu, nechokumusoro kwegomo regaashi. vaisraeri vakashumira yeahoh nguva dzose dzoupenyu hwayeahoshua, uye napamazuva ose avakuru vakasara vari vapenyu yeahoshua afa, avo vakaona zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvaitirwa israeri nayeahoh. mapfupa ayosefa, ayo akanga auyiwa nawo navana vaisraeri kubva kuijipiti, akavigwa pashekemu, munzvimbo yakanga yatengwa nayaqobho kuvanakomana vahamori, baba vashekemu, nezana remari yesirivha. iyi yakava nhaka yezvizvarwa zvayosefa. uye ereazari mwanakomana waaroni akafa, akavigwa pagibhea munzvimbo yakanga yapiwa mwanakomana wake finehasi, munyika yamakomo yaefuremu.

judges

1

mushure mokufa kwayeahoshua, vaisraeri vakabvunza yeahoh vakati, “ndiani pakati pedu achatanga kukwidza kundorwa navakenani?” yeahoh akapindura akati, “yeahudha ngaaende; ndapa nyika mumaoko ake.” ipapo varume veyeahudha vakati kuvasimeoni hama dzavo, “ngatiendei tose kunyika yatakagoverwa, kuti tindorwa navakenani. nesuwo tichaenda nemi kumugove wenyu.” saka vasimeoni vakaenda navo. yeahudha paakarwisa, yeahoh akaisa vakenani navaperizi mumaoko avo uye vakauraya varume zviuru gumi pabhezeki. ipapo ndipo pavakawana adhoni bhezeki vakarwa naye. adhoni bhezeki akatiza, asi vakamudzinganisa vakamubata, vakagura zvigunwe zvake zvikuru zvomumaoko nezvigunwe zvake zvikuru zvomumakumbo. ipapo adhoni bhezeki akati, “madzimambo makumi manomwe, vagurwa zvigunwe zvikuru zvomumaoko nezvigunwe zvikuru zvokumakumbo, vakanonga zvimedu zvezvokudya pasi petafura yangu. zvino allah anditsiva pane zvandakaita kwavari.” vakaenda naye kujerusarema akandofira ikoko. varume veyeahudha vakarwisawo jerusarema vakaritora. vakakunda guta nomunondo uye vakaripisa. shure kwaizvozvo, varume veyeahudha vakaburuka vakandorwa navakenani vaigara munyika yezvikomo, kunegevhi uye nomujinga mezvikomo zvokumavirira. vakaenda vakandorwa navakenani vaigara muhebhuroni (rainzi kiriati abha kare) vakakunda sheshai, ahimani netarimai. vachibva ipapo, vakaenda vakandorwa navanhu vaigara mudhebhiri (rainzi kiriati seferi kare.) uye karebhu akati, “ndichapa mwanasikana wangu akisa kuti ave mukadzi kumurume acharwisa uye achatapa kiriati seferi.” otinieri mwanakomana wakenazi, mununʼuna wakarebhu, akarikunda, saka karebhu akapa mwanasikana wake akisa kuti awanikwe naye. rimwe zuva akati achisvika kuna otinieri, akamukurudzira kuti akumbire munda kuna baba vake. akati aburuka pambongoro yake, karebhu akamubvunza akati, “ndingakuitireiko?” iye akapindura akati, “ndiitirei zvakanaka. sezvo makandipa nyika kunegevhi, ndipeiwo matsime emvura.” ipapo karebhu akamupa matsime okumusoro neezasi. zvizvarwa zvatezvara vamozisi, vakeni, vakakwidza vachibva kuguta remichindwe vaine varume veyeahudha kuti vandogara pakati pavanhu vokugwenga reyeahudha riri kunegevhi pedyo nearadhi. ipapo varume veyeahudha vakaenda navasimeoni hama dzavo vakandorwisa vakenani vaigara muzefati, uye vakaparadza guta iri zvachose. naizvozvo rakatumidzwa kuti horima. varume veyeahudha vakakundazve gaza, ashikeroni neekironi, guta rimwe nerimwe nenyika yaro. yeahoh akanga ana vanhu veyeahudha. vakatora nyika yezvikomo kuti ive yavo, asi havana kugona kudzinga vanhu vaibva mumapani, nokuti vakanga vane ngoro dzesimbi. sokuvimbisa kwamozisi, hebhuroni yakapiwa kuna karebhu, uyo akabudisa mairi vanakomana vatatu vaanaki. kunyange zvakadaro, vabhenjamini vakatadza kudzinga vajebhusi, vaigara mujerusarema; kusvikira nhasi vajebhusi vageremo navabhenjamini. zvino veimba yayosefa vakarwisa bheteri, uye yeahoh aiva navo. vakati vatuma vanhu kundosora bheteri (rainzi ruzi kare), vasori vakaona murume achibuda muguta vakati kwaari, “tiratidze kuti tingapinda sei muguta tigokuitira zvakanaka.” saka akavaratidza, uye vakakunda guta nomunondo asi vakaponesa murume uya nemhuri yake. ipapo akaenda kunyika yavahiti, kwaakandovaka guta akaritumidza kuti ruzi, rinova ndiro zita raro nanhasi. asi manase haana kudzinga vanhu vebheti shani kana vetanaki kana vedhori kana veibhireami kana vemegidho uye nenzvimbo dzavo dzokugara dzakapoteredza, nokuti vakenani vakanga vazvipira kuti vagare munyika iyoyo. vaisraeri vakati vasimba vakamanikidza vakenani kuti vashande basa rechibharo asi havana kumbovadzinga zvachose. uye efuremu haana kudzingawo vakenani vaigara mugeeri, asi vakenani vakaramba vagere pakati pavo. nazebhuruniwo haana kudzinga vakenani vaigara mukitironi kana munaharori, avo vakaramba vagere pakati pavo; asi vakaita kuti vaite basa rechibharo. uye asheri haanawo kudzinga vaya vaigara muako kana vesidhoni kana ahirabhi kana akizibhi kana heribha kana afeki kana rehobhi, uye nokuda kwaizvozvo vanhu veasheri vakagara pakati pavakenani avo vaigara munyika. nafutari haana kudzinga avo vaigara mubheti shemeshi kana mubheti anati; asi vanafutari vakagarawo pakati pavakenani vaigara munyika, uye vaya vaigara mubheti shemeshi nebheti anati vakava vashandi vebasa rechibharo. vaamori vakasundira vadhani kunyika yezvikomo, vakasavatendera kuburuka kuti vauye kumapani. uye vaamori vakashingirira kuti varambe vari mugomo reheresi, aijaroni neshaaribhimi, asi simba reimba yayosefa rakati richiwanda, naivowo vakamanikidzwa kushanda basa rechibharo. muganhu wavaamori waibva pamupata wechinyavada uchisvika kusera uye uchipfuurira mberi.

2

mutumwa wayeahoh akakwidza achibva kugirigari akaenda kubhokimi akati, “ndakakubudisai kubva muijipiti uye ndikakutungamirirai munyika yandakapikira madzitateguru enyu. ndakati, ‘handichazomboputsi sungano yangu nemi, uye imi musazoita sungano navanhu venyika ino, asi munofanira kuputsa aritari dzavo.’ asi hamuna kunditeerera. makaitireiko izvozvo? naizvozvo zvino ndinokuudzai kuti handichazovadzingi pamberi penyu, vachava minzwa kumativi enyu uye vamwe vavo vachava musungo kwamuri.” mutumwa wayeahoh akati ataura zvinhu izvi kuvaisraeri vose, vanhu vakachema kwazvo, uye vakatumidza nzvimbo iyo kuti bhokimi. ipapo, vakabayira zvipiriso kuna yeahoh. shure kwokunge yeahoshua ati vaisraeri vaende, vakaenda vakandotora nyika, mumwe nomumwe kunhaka yake. vanhu vakashumira mazuva ose okurarama kwayeahoshua uye napamazuva avakuru vakasara vari vapenyu uye vakanga vaona zvinhu zvikuru zvose zvakanga zvaitirwa israeri nayeahoh. yeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni, muranda wayeahoh, akafa ava namakore zana negumi rimwe chete. uye vakamuviga munyika yenhaka yake, patiminati heresi munyika yezvikomo yeefuremu, kumusoro kwegomo regaashi. mushure mokunge chizvarwa chake chose chasanganiswa namadzibaba acho, chimwe chizvarwa chakanga chisingazivi yeahoh kana zvaakanga aitira israeri chakamuka. ipapo vaisraeri vakaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh uye vakashumira vanabhaari. vakarasa yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, akanga avabudisa kubva muijipiti. vakatevera uye vakanamata vamwari vakasiyana-siyana vendudzi dzakanga dzakavapoteredza. vakatsamwisa yeahoh, nokuti vakamurasa uye vakashumira bhaari navaashitoreti. mukutsamwira kwake vaisraeri, yeahoh akavaisa mumaoko avapambi avo vakazovapamba. akavatengesa kuvavengi vavo vakanga vakavapoteredza, avo vavakanga vasisagoni kudzivisa. pose paienda israeri kundorwa, ruoko rwayeahoh rwairwa navo kuti ruvakunde, sezvaakanga apika kwavari. vakanga vari munhamo huru. ipapo yeahoh akavamutsira vatongi vakavaponesa kubva mumaoko avapambi ava. kunyange zvakadaro havana kuzoteerera kuvatongi vavo asi vakaita ufeve navamwe vamwari uye vakavanamata. havana kuita samadzibaba avo, nokuti vakakurumidza kutsauka munzira yaifamba madzibaba avo, nzira yokuteerera kumirayiro yayeahoh. pose pavaimutsirwa mutongi nayeahoh, iye aiva nomutongi uyo, uye aivaponesa kubva mumaoko avavengi vavo, mutongi paainge achiri mupenyu; nokuti yeahoh ainge avanzwira ngoni pavaigomera vari pasi pavaya vaivadzvinyirira uye vachivarwadzisa. asi mutongi paainge afa, vanhu vaidzokera kunzira dzakaipisisa kupinda dziya dzamadzibaba avo, vachitevera vamwe vamwari, vachivashandira uye vachivanamata. vakaramba kusiya mabasa avo akaipa nokusindimara kwemwoyo yavo. naizvozvo yeahoh akavatsamwira zvikuru akati, “nemhaka yokuti rudzi urwu rwakaputsa sungano yangu yandakaita namadzitateguru avo uye vakasanditeerera, handichadzingizve pamberi pavo rudzi rupi zvarwo rwedzimwe ndudzi dzakasiyiwa nayeahoshua pakufa kwake. ndichavashandisa kuti vaedze vaisraeri, kuti ndione kuti vachachengeta here nzira yayeahoh vagofamba mairi sezvakaitwa namadzitateguru avo.” yeahoh akatendera ndudzi idzo kuti dzisare; haana kudzidzinga pakarepo uye haana kudziisa mumaoko ayeahoshua.

3

idzi ndidzo ndudzi dzakasiyiwa nayeahoh kuti aedze vaisraeri vaya vose vakanga vasina kumboziva kana hondo ipi zvayo mukenani, (akaita izvi bedzi kuti adzidzise zvehondo kuzvizvarwa zvavaisraeri izvo zvakanga zvisina kumborwa hondo): vatongi vashanu vavafiristia, vakenani vose, vasidhoni, uye vahivhi vaigara mumakomo erebhanoni kubva pagomo rebhaari herimoni kusvikira kurebho hamati. vakasiyiwa kuti vaedze vaisraeri kuti aone kana vaizoteerera mirayiro yayeahoh, yaakanga apa madzitateguru avo kubudikidza namozisi. vaisraeri vakagara pakati pavakenani, vahiti, vaamori, vaperezi, vahivhi navajebhusi. vakatora vanasikana vavo kuti vave vakadzi vavo uye vakapa vanasikana vavowo kuvanakomana vavo, uye vakashumira vamwari vavo. vaisraeri vakaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh; vakakanganwa yeahoh allah wavo vakashumira vabhaari navaashera. kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakapisa pamusoro paisraeri zvokuti akavatengesa mumaoko akushani-rishataimi mambo wearamu naharaimu, avo vakashandirwa navaisraeri kwamakore masere. asi vakati vachema kuna yeahoh, akavamutsira musununguri, otinieri mwanakomana wakenazi, mununʼuna wakarebhu, uyo akavaponesa. mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pake kuti ave mutongi weisraeri uye akaenda kuhondo. yeahoh akaisa kushani-rishataimi mambo wavaaramu mumaoko aotinieri, akamukunda. saka nyika yakava norugare kwamakore makumi mana, kusvikira otinieri mwanakomana wakenazi afa. vaisraeri vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, uye nokuda kwokuti vakaita zvakaipa izvi, yeahoh akapa simba kuna egironi mambo wemoabhu kuti akunde israeri. egironi akatora vaamoni navaamareki kuti vaende naye kundorwisa israeri, uye vakatora guta remichindwe kuti rive ravo. vaisraeri vakava varanda vaegironi mambo wemoabhu kwamakore gumi namasere. vaisraeri vakachemazve kuna yeahoh, iye akavapa musununguri, ehudhi murume aiva neziboshwe, mwanakomana wagera mubhenjamini. vaisraeri vakamutuma nomutero kuna egironi mambo wemoabhu. zvino ehudhi akanga aita munondo wakarodzwa kumativi ose uchikarosvika kubhiti rimwe chete pakureba kwawo waakanga akasungira pasi penguo dzake pachidya chake chokurudyi. akapa mutero kuna egironi mambo wemoabhu, murume akanga akafuta kwazvo. mushure mokunge ehudhi apa mutero, akati vanhu vakanga vauya vakatakura mutero wacho vaende. pazvifananidzo zvaiva pedyo negirigari iye pachake akadzoka akati, “ndine shoko renyu rakavanzika, imi mambo.” mambo akati, “nyararai!” uye varanda vake vose vakamusiya. ipapo ehudhi akaswedera kwaari iye agere ari oga muimba yake yapamusoro yomuzinda wake wenguva yezhizha akati, “ndine shoko renyu rabva kuna allah,” mambo akati achisimuka achibva pachigaro chake, ehudhi akatambanudza ruoko rwake rworuboshwe, akavhomora munondo kubva pachidya chake chokurudyi akaunyudza mudumbu ramambo. kunyange chibato chomunondo chakanyura chichitevera chese, ukandobuda nokumusana kwake. ehudhi haana kuvhomora munondo, uye mafuta akaputira pamusoro pawo. ipapo ehudhi akabuda akaenda kubiravira; akapfiga mikova yeimba yapamusoro shure kwake akaikiya. mushure mokuenda kwake, varanda vakasvika vakawana mikova yeimba yapamusoro yakiyiwa. ivo vakati, “anofanira kunge achimbozvizorodza zvake ari mukamuri romukati reimba.” vakarindira kusvikira vanyadziswa nazvo asi paakarega kuzarura mikova yekamuri, vakatora kiyi vakaikiyinura. onei ipapo ishe wavo akawira pasi, afa. vachakamirira, ehudhi akaenda. akapfuura napazvifananidzo akapunyuka akaenda kuseira. akati asvika ikoko, akaridza hwamanda ari munyika yezvikomo yaefuremu, uye vaisraeri vakaburuka naye vachibva kuzvikomo, iye achivatungamirira. akati kwavari, “nditeverei, nokuti yeahoh aisa moabhu muvengi wenyu, mumaoko enyu.” saka vakaburuka vakamutevera, uye vakatora mazambuko ejorodhani okuenda kumoabhu, vakasatendera munhu kuyambuka. panguva iyoyo vakauraya zviuru zvinenge gumi zvavamoabhu, vose vakanga vakagwinya uye vane simba; hapana akapunyuka. zuva iroro moabhu yakava pasi peisraeri, uye nyika yakava norugare kwamakore makumi masere. shure kwaehudhi kwakauya shamuga mwanakomana waanati, uyo akauraya vafiristia mazana matanhatu norutanda rwokubaya narwo mombe. naiyewo akaponesa israeri.

4

shure kwokufa kwaehudhi, vaisraeri vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. saka yeahoh akavatengesa mumaoko ajabhini, mambo wekenani, aitonga ari muhazori. mukuru wehondo yake akanga ari sisera, uyo aigara muharosheti hagoyimi. nokuda kwokuti akanga ane ngoro dzesimbi mazana mapfumbamwe uye akadzvinyirira vaisraeri zvakaipisisa kwazvo kwamakore makumi maviri, vakachemera rubatsiro kuna yeahoh. dhibhora, muprofitakadzi, mukadzi warapidhoti, akanga achitungamirira vaisraeri panguva iyoyo. aitonga mhaka ari pasi pomuchindwe wadhibhora pakati perama nebheteri munyika yezvikomo yaefuremu, uye vaisraeri vaiuya kwaari kuzotongerwa mhosva dzavo. akatuma shoko kuna bharaki mwanakomana waabhinoami aibva kukadheshi munafutari akati kwaari, “yeahoh, allah waisraeri anokurayira kuti, ‘enda undotora zviuru gumi zvavarume venafutari nevezebhuruni ugovatungamirira kugomo retabhori. ndichakwezva sisera, mukuru wehondo yajabhini, nengoro dzake uye namauto ake kurwizi rwekishoni ndigomuisa mumaoko ako.’ ” bharaki akati kwaari, “kana imi mukaenda neni, ini ndichaenda; asi kana musingaendi neni, neni handingaendi.” dhibhora akati, “zvakanaka hazvo, ndichaenda newe. asi nokuda kwenzira yauri kuda kuita nayo izvi, kukudzwa hakungavi kwako, nokuti yeahoh achaisa sisera muruoko rwomukadzi.” saka dhibhora akaenda nabharaki kukadheshi, uko kwaakandodana zebhuruni nanafutari. varume zviuru gumi vakamutevera, nadhibhorawo akaenda navo. zvino hebheri mukeni akanga asiya vamwe vakeni, zvizvarwa zvahobhabhi, hanzvadzi yomukadzi wamozisi akandodzika tende rake pamuti mukuru muzaananimi pedyo nekadheshi. vakati vaudza sisera kuti bharaki mwanakomana waabhinoami akanga akwidza kugomo retabhori, sisera akaunganidza pamwe chete ngoro dzesimbi mazana mapfumbamwe navarume vose vaaiva navo, kubva kuharosheti hagoyimi kusvikira kurwizi rwekishoni. ipapo dhibhora akati kuna bharaki, “enda! iri ndiro zuva rapiwa sisera mumaoko ako nayeahoh. ko, yeahoh haasi mberi kwako here?” saka bharaki akaburuka mugomo retabhori, achiteverwa navarume zviuru gumi. pakungofamba kwabharaki, yeahoh akakunda nomunondo sisera nengoro dzake dzose nehondo yake, uye sisera akasiya ngoro yake akatiza netsoka. asi bharati akatevera ngoro nehondo yasisera akandosvika kuharosheti hagoyimi. mauto ose asisera akaurayiwa nomunondo; hapana munhu akasara. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, sisera akatiza netsoka akaenda kutende rajaeri, mukadzi wahebheri mukeni, nokuti pakati pajabhini mambo wehazori nemhuri yahebheri pakanga pane kunzwanana. jaeri akabuda kuti andosangana nasisera akati kwaari, “uyai ishe wangu, pindai zvenyu mukati chaimo. musatya.” saka akapinda mutende rake, uye akaisa chifukidzo pamusoro pake. akati, “ndine nyota. ndapota, ndipeiwo mvura.” akadziura guchu romukaka, akamupa kuti anwe, ndokubva amufukidza hake. akatizve kwaari, “mira pamukova wetende. kana mumwe munhu akauya pano akakubvunza achiti, ‘pano munhu here pano?’ uti, ‘kwete.’ ” asi jaeri, mukadzi wahebheri, akatora mbambo yetende nenyundo akaenda paari chinyararire, iye akafa nehope, aneta. akaroverera mbambo napachavovo, ikanyura muvhu, akafa. bharaki akasvika achitevera sisera, uye jaeri akabuda kundomuchingamidza, achiti, “uyai, ndizokuratidzai munhu wamuri kutsvaka.” saka akapinda naye mukati, onei hoyo sisera avete uye mbambo yetende iri muchavovo chake, afa. pazuva iro, allah akakunda jabhini, mambo wavakenani, pamberi pavaisraeri. uye ruoko rwavaisraeri rwakaramba ruchiwedzera simba pakurwisa jabhini, mambo wavakenani kusvikira vamuparadza.

5

nomusi uyo dhibhora nabharaki mwanakomana waabhinoami vakaimba rwiyo urwu runoti: “kana machinda aisraeri achitungamirira, kana vanhu vachizvipira pachavo yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe!” “inzwai izvi, imi madzimambo! teererai imi vatongi! ndichaimbira yeahoh, ini ndichaimba; ndichaimbira yeahoh, allah waisraeri. “haiwa yeahoh, pamakabuda kubva museiri, pamakafamba muchibva munyika yeedhomu, nyika yakadengenyeka, matenga akadurura, makore akadurura mvura pasi. makomo akadengenyeka pamberi payeahoh, iye wesinai, pamberi payeahoh, allah weisraeri. “mumazuva ashamugari mwanakomana waanati, mumazuva ajaeri, migwagwa yakasiyiwa; vafambi vakafamba nenzira dzinopoterera. upenyu hwomumisha hwakapera, hwakapera kusvikira ini dhibhora, ndasimuka, ndasimuka ini mai muisraeri. pavakasarudza vamwari vatsva, hondo yakauya ichibva nokumasuo eguta, uye hakuna nhoo kana pfumo zvakaonekwa pakati pezviuru makumi mana muisraeri. mwoyo wangu uri pamachinda eisraeri, navaya vanozvipira pakati pavanhu. rumbidzai yeahoh! “imi munotasva mbongoro chena, mugere pamachira ezvigaro zvenyu, nemi munofamba munzira, cherechedzai inzwi ravaimbi panzvimbo dzemvura. vanodetemba mabasa akarurama ayeahoh, mabasa akarurama avarwi vake muisraeri. “ipapo vanhu vayeahoh vakaburuka vakaenda kusuo reguta. ‘muka, muka, dhibhora! muka, muka, uimbe rwiyo! simuka, bharaki! tapa vatapwa vako, iwe mwanakomana waabhinoami.’ “ipapo varume vakanga vasara vakaburuka vakaenda kumakurukota; vanhu vayeahoh vakauya kwandiri navane simba. vamwe vakauya vachibva kwaefuremu, midzi yavo yakanga iri muna amareki; bhenjamini akanga ari pakati pavanhu vakakutevera iwe. kubva kuna makiri vatungamiri vakaburuka, kubva kuzebhuruni avo vanotakura tsvimbo yomutungamiri wehondo. machinda aisakari akanga ana dhibhora; hongu isakari akanga ana bharaki, vachimhanyira kumupata vachimutevera. mudunhu rarubheni makanga muno kunzvera kwomwoyo kukuru. seiko wakagara pakati pezvoto kuti unzwe muridzo unoridzirwa matanga emakwai? mudunhu rarubheni makanga muno kunzvera kwomwoyo kukuru. gireadhi akagara mhiri kwajorodhani. uye dhani akasarireiko pazvikepe? asha akasara zvake pamahombekombe uye akagara zvake panopinda mvura dzegungwa. vanhu vezebhuruni vakaisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi; nenafutari yakadarowo panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzeminda. “madzimambo akauya, akarwa; madzimambo ekenani akarwa pataanaki pamvura zhinji yemegidho, asi havana kudzoka vakatakura sirivha, kana zvakapambwa. kubva kumatenga nyeredzi dzakarwa, dziri panzira dzadzo dzakarwa nasisera. rwizi kishoni rwakavakukura, irwo rwizi rwakare, rwizi kishoni. pfuurira mberi, mweya wangu, simba! ipapo mahwanda amabhiza akatinhira, kumhanya, kumhanya kwoune simba. mutumwa wayeahoh akati, ‘tuka merozi. tuka vanhu varo zvikuru kwazvo, nokuti havana kuuya kuzobatsira yeahoh, kubatsira yeahoh kurwisa vane simba.’ “jaeri ngaave mukadzi akaropafadzwa zvikuru, iye mukadzi wahebheri mukeni, akaropafadzwa kwazvo kupfuura vakadzi vagere mutende. akakumbira mvura, iye akamupa mukaka; akamuvigira mukaka wakakora mundiro yakafanira makurukota. ruoko rwake rwakatambanudzirwa pambambo yetende, ruoko rwake rworudyi kunyundo yomuvezi. akabaya sisera, akapwanya musoro wake, akapwanya uye akabvoora zvavovo zvake. patsoka dzake, akanyura, akawa; hoyo akatandavarapo. patsoka dzake akanyura, akawa; paakanyura, ndipo paakawira, akafa. “napawindo mai vasisera vakadongorera; vari seri kworutanda, vakadanidzira vachiti, ‘seiko ngoro yake yanonoka kusvika? seiko kurira kwengoro dzake kwanonoka?’ vakadzi vokwake vakachenjera kukunda vose vanomupindura; zvirokwazvo, anoramba achiti, ‘ko, havasi kuwana nokugoverana zvakapambwa here vachiti, musikana mumwe chete kana vaviri pamurume mumwe chete, nguo dzina mavara dzezvakapambwa zvasisera, nguo dzina mavara dzakarukwa, nguo dzakanyatsorukwa dzomutsipa wangu, zvose izvi zviri zvakapambwa?’ “saka vavengi venyu vose ngavaparare, imi yeahoh! asi vanokudai ngavave sezuva parinobuda nesimba raro.” ipapo nyika yakava norugare kwamakore makumi mana.

6

vaisraeri vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, uye akavaisa mumaoko avamidhiani kwamakore manomwe. nokuda kwokuti ruoko rwavamidhiani rwakavadzvinyirira kwazvo, vaisraeri vakazvigadzirira nzvimbo dzokuvanda mumakomo, mumapako uye nenhare. vaisraeri vaingoti vakadyara mbeu dzavo, vamidhiani, vaamareki navamwe vanhu vokumabvazuva, vaiuya kuzorwisa nyika yavo. vakadzika misasa yavo munyika uye vakaparadza zvirimwa kubva kugaza yose, uye havana kusiyira vaisraeri chinhu, makwai, mombe kana mbongoro. vakauya nezvipfuwo zvavo namatende avo vakawanda sechimokoto chemhashu. zvakanga zvisingagoneki kuti uverenge vanhu nengamera dzavo; vakapinda munyika kuti vaiparadze. vamidhiani vakaita kuti vaisraeri vave varombo zvokuti vakachema kuna yeahoh kuti avabatsire. vaisraeri vakati vachema kuna yeahoh nokuda kwavamidhiani, akatuma muprofita, akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: allah waisraeri: ndakakubudisai kubva muijipiti, munyika youtapwa. ndakakubvutai kubva musimba reijipiti, nokubva muruoko rwavadzvinyiriri venyu vose. ndakavadzinga pamberi penyu ndikakupai nyika yavo. ndakati kwamuri, ‘ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, musanamata vamwari vavaamori, vamugere munyika yavo.’ asi hamuna kunditeerera.” mutumwa wayeahoh akauya akagara pasi pomuouki muofira rajoashi muabhiezeri, paipurwa gorosi nagidheoni mwanakomana wake muchisviniro chewaini, kuti aivanze kubva kuvamidhiani. mutumwa wayeahoh akati azviratidza kuna gidheoni, akati kwaari, “yeahoh anewe, iwe murume wesimba noumhare.” gidheoni akapindura akati, “asika, ishe wangu, kana yeahoh anesu, seiko izvi zvose zvakaitika kwatiri? zvishamiso zvake zvose zviripiko zvatakaudzwa namadzibaba edu pavakati, ‘yeahoh haana kutibudisa muijipiti here?’ asi zvino yeahoh akatisiya uye akatiisa muruoko rwavamidhiani.” yeahoh akatendeukira kwaari akati, “enda nesimba raunaro uponese israeri muruoko rwavamidhiani. handizini ndakutuma here?” gidheoni akabvunza akati, “asika ishe, ndingaponesa israeri seiko? imba yangu ndiyo dukusa mamanase, uye ini ndiri mudukusa mumhuri yangu.” yeahoh akapindura akati, “ndichava newe, uye iwe uchauraya vamidhiani vose pamwe chete.” gidheoni akapindura akati, “zvino kana ndawana nyasha pamberi penyu, ndipei chiratidzo kuti ndizive kuti ndimi munotaura neni. ndapota hangu, musabva pano kusvikira ndadzoka uye ndauya nechipiriso changu ndigochiisa pamberi penyu.” uye yeahoh akati, “ndichamira pano kusvikira wadzoka.” gidheoni akapinda, akandogadzira mbudzana, uye akaita chingwa chisina kuviriswa cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka. akaisa nyama mudengu uye muto wayo akauisa muhari, akabuda nazvo akazvipa kwaari pasi pomuouki. mutumwa waallah akati kwaari, “tora nyama nechingwa chisina mbiriso, uzviise paruware urwu, uye ugodirapo muto wacho.” uye gidheoni akaita saizvozvo. mutumwa wayeahoh akagunzva nyama nechingwa chisina mbiriso nomuromo wetsvimbo yaiva muruoko rwake. moto wakabuda paruware, ukapisa nyama nechingwa. ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akanyangarika. gidheoni akati aziva kuti akanga ari mutumwa wayeahoh, akadanidzira akati, “maiwe, ishe yeahoh! ndaona mutumwa wayeahoh chiso nechiso!” asi yeahoh akati kwaari, “rugare! usatya. hausi kuzofa.” saka gidheoni akavakira yeahoh aritari ipapo akaitumidza kuti yeahoh ndiye rugare. nanhasi ichakamirapo muofira ravaabhiezeri. usiku hwacho ihwohwo yeahoh akati kwaari, “tora hando yechipiri kubva pamombe dzababa vako iyo ina makore manomwe. uputsire pasi aritari yababa vako yabhaari uye ugotema danda raashera riri pairi. ipapo ugovakira yeahoh allah wako aritari kwayo pamusoro penhare iyi. utore hando yechipiri ugoibayira sechipiriso chinopiswa uchishandisa huni dzedanda raashera rawakatema.” saka gidheoni akatora varanda vake gumi akaita sezvaakaudzwa nayeahoh. asi nokuda kwokuti akanga achitya vemhuri yake uye navanhu vomuguta, akaita izvi usiku pano kuzviita masikati. vanhu vomuguta vakati vachimuka mangwanani, vakaona heyo aritari yabhaari yakaputswa, nedanda raashera parutivi rwayo rakatemwa, uye hando yechipiri yakabayirwa paaritari itsva yakanga yavakwa! vakabvunzana vakati, “ndianiko aita izvi?” vakati vanyatsoferefeta, vakaudzwa kuti, “gidheoni mwanakomana wajoashi ndiye aita izvi.” vanhu vomuguta vakati kuna joashi, “budisa mwanakomana wako. anofanira kufa, nokuti akaputsa aritari dzabhaari uye akatema danda raashera parutivi payo.” asi joashi akapindura ungano yakanga ine hasha kwazvo yakamukomberedza akati, “ko, imi munoda kurwira bhaari here? muri kuda kuedza kumuponesa here? ani naani achamurwira achaurayiwa mangwanani ano! kana bhaari ari mwari chaiye, anogona kuzvidzivirira kana mumwe munhu achiputsa aritari yake.” saka pazuva iroro vakatumidza gidheoni zita rokuti, “jerubhi-bhaari,” vachiti, “bhaari ngaarwe naye, nokuti akaputsa aritari yabhaari.” zvino vamidhiani, vaamareki navamwe vanhu vokumabvazuva vakabatana vakayambuka jorodhani vakandodzika matende avo mumupata wejezireeri. ipapo mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pagidheoni, uye akaridza hwamanda, achidana vaabhiezeri kuti vamutevere. akatuma nhume munyika yose yamanase, achivakoka kuhondo, uyewo muasheri, zebhuruni nenafutari, kuti naivowo vakwidze kundosangana navo. gidheoni akati kuna allah, “kana muchizoponesa israeri noruoko rwangu sezvamakavimbisa, tarirai, ndichaisa chisumbu chewuru paburiro. kana dova rikava pachisumbu chewuru chete uye pasi pose pakaoma, ipapo ndichaziva kuti muchaponesa israeri noruoko rwangu, sezvamakareva.” uye izvi ndizvo zvakaitika. gidheoni akamuka mangwanani ezuva rakatevera; akasvina chisumbu chewuru akabudisa dova, akazadza mbiya nemvura. ipapo gidheoni akati kuna allah, “musanditsamwira henyu. regai ndiite hangu chimwezve chikumbiro. nditenderei ndiedzezve nechisumbu chewuru. panguva ino itai kuti chisumbu chewuru chiome asi pasi pose pafukidzwe nedova.” usiku ihwohwo allah akaita izvozvo. wuru yakanga yakaoma; pasi pose pakanga pakafukidzwa nedova.

7

mangwanani-ngwanani, jerubhi-bhaari (ndiye gidheoni) navanhu vose vaiva naye vakadzika matende avo patsime raharodhi. musasa wavamidhiani wakanga uri nechokumusoro kwavo mumupata waiva pedyo nechikomo chemore. yeahoh akati kuna gidheoni, “varume vaunavo vakawandisa kuti ini ndiise vamidhiani mumaoko avo. kuti vaisraeri varege kuzvikudza pamberi pangu vachiti, simba ravo ndiro ravaponesa, zivisa vanhu izvozvi kuti, ‘ani naani ari kudedera nokutya ngaadzoke hake abve pagomo regireadhi.’ ” saka varume vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri vakabva, kukasara zviuru gumi. asi yeahoh akati kuna gidheoni, “vanhu vachakangowandisa. enda navo kumvura, uye ini ndichavasanangurira ikoko. kana ndikati, ‘uyu achaenda newe,’ ndiye achaenda; asi kana ndikati, ‘uyu haafaniri kuenda newe,’ iyeye haaendi.” saka gidheoni akatora varume akaburuka navo kumvura. yeahoh akamuudza ikoko kuti, “paradzanisa avo vanonwa mvura vachikapa norurimi rwavo sezvinoita imbwa kubva kuna avo vanonwa vakapfugama.” zvino uwandu hweavo vakanwa vachikapa, vachiisa maoko kumiromo yavo, hwakasvika mazana matatu. vamwe vose vakanwa vakapfugama namabvi avo. yeahoh akati kuna gidheoni, “namazana matatu avarume vanwa mvura vachikapa ava, ndichakuponesai uye ndichaisa vamidhiani mumaoko enyu. vamwe vanhu vose ngavaende zvavo, mumwe nomumwe kunzvimbo yake.” saka gidheoni akaendesa vamwe vose vavaisraeri kumatende avo asi akasara namazana matatu, avo vakazotora mbuva nehwamanda dzavaya vamwe. zvino musasa wavamidhiani wakanga uri nechezasi mumupata. usiku ihwohwo, yeahoh akati kuna gidheoni, “simuka, buruka uende kumusasa, nokuti ndiri kuzouisa mumaoko ako. asi kana uchitya kuenda, buruka uende kumusasa napura muranda wako. uchanzwa zvavanotaura. shure kwaizvozvo uchanzwa kukurudzirwa kuti urwise musasa.” saka iye napura muranda wake vakaburuka vakasvika kuvarindi vokunze kwomusasa. vamidhiani, vaamareki navamwe vanhu vose vokumabvazuva vakanga vagara mumupata, vakawanda semhashu. ngamera dzavo dzakanga dzisingaverengeki, dzakawanda sejecha remahombekombe egungwa. gidheoni akasvika mumwe munhu achiri kurondedzera shamwari yake kurota kwake, achiti, “ndarota chingwa chakaurungana chichikungurukira mumusasa wavamidhiani. charova tende nesimba guru zvokuti tende rakudubuka rikawa.” shamwari yake yakapindura ikati, “hachingavi chimwe chinhu kunze kwomunondo wagidheoni mwanakomana wajoashi, muisraeri. allah aisa vamidhiani nomusasa wose mumaoko ake.” gidheoni akati anzwa kurota uku nokududzirwa kwokurota kwacho, akanamata allah. akadzoka kumusasa wavaisraeri akadanidzira achiti, “simukai! yeahoh aisa musasa wavamidhiani mumaoko enyu.” akakamura varume mazana matatu akavaisa mumapoka matatu, akaisa hwamanda nezvirongo zvisina chinhu, asi mwenje mukati, mumaoko avo. akati kwavari, “mutarise kwandiri uye mutevedzere zvandinoita. pandinosvika kumucheto kwomusasa, mubve maita sezvandinoita. kana ini navose vandinavo tikaridza hwamanda dzedu, ipapo imi mose makapoteredza musasa muridzewo dzenyu mugodanidzira muchiti, ‘rwirai yeahoh nagidheoni!’ ” gidheoni navarume zana vaiva naye vakasvika kumucheto kwomusasa pakutanga kwenguva yapakati pousiku yokurinda, pachangoiswa mumwe murindi. vakaridza hwamanda dzavo uye vakaputsa zvirongo zvaiva mumaoko avo. mapoka matatu akaridza hwamanda uye akaputsawo zvirongo. vakabata mwenje mumaoko avo oruboshwe uye vakabata noruoko rworudyi hwamanda dzavaizoridza, vakadanidzira vachiti, “munondo wayeahoh nowagidheoni!” murume mumwe nomumwe akaramba ari panzvimbo yake vakapoteredza musasa, vamidhiani vose vakamhanya vachiridza mhere, vachitiza. vane mazana matatu pavakaridza hwamanda, yeahoh akaita kuti varume vose mumusasa vapandukirane, vabayane neminondo yavo. hondo yakatizira kubheti shita yakananga kuzerera kusvikira kumuganhu weabheri mehora pedyo netabhati. vaisraeri vakadanwa kubva kunafutari, asheri nemanase yose, uye vakatevera vamidhiani. gidheoni akatuma nhume munyika yose yezvikomo yaefuremu achiti, “burukai tindorwa navamidhiani titore mvura zhinji dzejorodhani mberi kwavo kusvikira kubheti bhara.” saka varume vose veefuremu vakadanwa uye vakatora mvura zhinji dzejorodhani kusvikira kubheti bhara. vakatapawo vatungamiri vaviri vavamidhiani, orebhi nazeebhi. vakauraya orebhi paruware rwaorebhi, uye zeebhi vakamuurayira pachisviniro chewaini chazeebhi. vakatevera vamidhiani uye vakauya nemisoro yaorebhi nazeebhi kuna gidheoni, akanga ari pajorodhani.

8

zvino vaefuremu vakabvunza gidheoni vakati, “makatibatireiko zvakadai? makaregerei kutidana pamakaenda kundorwa navamidhiani?” uye vakamutsoropodza zvikuru. asi akavapindura akati, “ko, chii chandaita kuti ndizvienzanise nemi? handiti zvakanongwa zvamazambiringa aefuremu zviri nani kupfuura mukohwo uzere wamazambiringa aabhiezeri? allah akaisa orebhi nazeebhi, vatungamiri vavamidhiani mumaoko enyu. ko, ini ndaizokwanisa kuitei kuti ndienzaniswe nemi?” ipapo, kutsamwa kwavo pamusoro pake kwakaserera. gidheoni navanhu vake mazana matatu, vakaramba vachingotevera, vakasvika kurwizi jorodhani uye vakaruyambuka havo, asi vakanga vaneta kwazvo. akati kuvarume vesukoti, “ipai henyu mauto angu chingwa; vaneta, uye ndichiri kutevera zebha nazarumuna, madzimambo emidhiani.” asi machinda esukoti akati, “matova namaoko azebha nazarumuna mumaoko enyu here? ko, tingapirei chingwa kumauto enyu?” ipapo gidheoni akapindura akati, “nokuda kwaizvozvo, yeahoh paanongoisa zebha nazarumuna muruoko rwangu, ini ndichabvambura nyama yenyu neminzwa yomurenje uye norukato.” kubva ipapo akaenda kupenieri vakaita chikumbiro chimwe chetecho, asi naivowo vakapindura sezvakaita varume vesukoti. saka iye akati kuvarume vepenieri, “pandinodzoka ndakunda, ndichakoromora shongwe iyi.” zvino zebha nazarumuna vakanga vari mukarikori vaine hondo yavarume zviuru gumi nezvishanu, vose vakanga vasara pahondo yavanhu vokumabvazuva; varume vomunondo zviuru makumi maviri vakanga vafa. gidheoni akakwidza nenzira yavaigara mumatende kumabvazuva kwenobha nejogibheha vakandokunda hondo yakanga isina chayakatarisira. zebha nazarumuna, madzimambo maviri emidhiani, vakatiza, asi akavatevera akavabata, akakunda hondo yavo yose. gidheoni mwanakomana wajoashi akadzoka kubva kuhondo napamupata weheresi. akabata jaya rokusukoti uye akaribvunza, uye jaya rikanyora pasi mazita amachinda makumi manomwe navanomwe vokusukoti, vakuru veguta. ipapo gidheoni akasvika akati kuvarume vesukoti, “havano vanazebha nazarumuna, vaya vamakandiseka muchiti, ‘ko, watova namaoko azebha nazarumuna kare here? tinopireiko chingwa kuvanhu vako vaneta ava?’ ” akatora vakuru veguta akadzidzisa varume vesukoti chidzidzo nenzira yokuvaranga neminzwa yomurenje uye norukato. akakoromorawo shongwe yepenieri uye akauraya varume vomuguta. ipapo akabvunza zebha nazarumuna akati, “varume vamakauraya patabhori vakanga vakadiniko?” vakapindura vakati, “varume vakaita semi, mumwe nomumwe airatidzika somwanakomana wamambo.” gidheoni akati, “ivavo vakanga vari vanunʼuna vangu vanakomana vamai vangu chaivo. zvirokwazvo nayeahoh mupenyu, dai makanga mavaponesa, ini handaizokuurayai.” akatendeukira kuna jeta mwanakomana wake mukuru, akati, “vauraye!” asi jeta haana kuvhomora munondo wake, nokuti akanga achiri mukomana uye aitya. zebha nazarumuna vakati, “uyai muzviite imi. ‘munhu sezvaari ndizvo zvakaita simba rake.’ ” saka gidheoni akaswedera akavauraya, uye akatora zvishongo kubva mumitsipa yengamera dzavo. vaisraeri vakati kuna gidheoni, “titonge iwe, mwanakomana wako nomuzukuru wako nokuti wakatiponesa kubva muruoko rwavamidhiani.” asi gidheoni akati kwavari, “ini handingakutongei, uye mwanakomana wangu haangakutongei. yeahoh ndiye achakutongai.” uye akati, “ndine chikumbiro chimwe chete, chokuti mumwe nomumwe wenyu andipe mhete yomunzeve kubva pamugove wezvamakapamba.” (yakanga iri tsika yavaishumaeri yokushonga mhete dzegoridhe dzomunzeve.) vakapindura vakati, “tichafara kudzipa kwamuri.” saka vakawaridza nguo pasi, uye murume mumwe nomumwe akakanda mhete yezvaakapamba pamusoro payo. uremu hwemhete dzegoridhe dzaakakumbira hwakasvika mashekeri chiuru chimwe namazana manomwe, pasingaverengwi zvishongo, uketani, nguo dzepepuru dzaipfekwa namadzimambo emidhiani kana uketani hwakanga huri pamitsipa yengamera dzavo. gidheoni akaita nazvo efodhi yegoridhe iyo yaakaisa muofira, guta rake. vaisraeri vose vakaita ufeve nokuinamata ipapo, uye yakava musungo kuna gidheoni nokumhuri yake. naizvozvo vamidhiani vakakundwa pamberi pavaisraeri uye havana kuzosimudzazve musoro wavo. pamazuva okurarama kwagidheoni, nyika yakava norugare kwamakore makumi mana. jerubhi-bhaari mwanakomana wajoashi akadzokerazve kundogara kumusha kwake. akanga ana vanakomana vake chaivo makumi manomwe, nokuti akanga ana vakadzi vazhinji. murongo wake, aigara mushekemu, akamuberekerawo mwanakomana, akamutumidza kuti abhimereki. gidheoni mwanakomana wajoashi akafa akwegura zvikuru uye akavigwa muguva rababa vake joashi muofira ravaabhiezeri. gidheoni akati achangofa, vaisraeri vakafevazve vakatevera vabhaari. vakamisa bhaari bheriti samwari wavo uye havana kurangarira yeahoh allah wavo, akanga avanunura kubva mumaoko avavengi vavo kumativi ose. vakatadza kuitira mhuri yajerubhi-bhaari (iye gidheoni) zvakanaka pazvinhu zvose zvakanaka zvaakanga avaitira.

9

abhimereki mwanakomana wajerubhi-bhaari akaenda kuhanzvadzi dzamai vake vaiva mushekemu akati kwavari uye nokuna vose veimba yamai vake, “bvunzai vose vanogara mushekemu kuti, ‘zviri nani kwamuri ndezvipi: kuti mutongwe navanakomana vose vajerubhi-bhaari vari makumi manomwe kana kungotongwa nomunhu mumwe chete?’ murangarire kuti ini ndiri nyama neropa renyu.” hanzvadzi dzamai vake dzakarondedzerazve zvose izvi kuvagari veshekemu, vakada kutevera abhimereki, nokuti vakati, “ihama yedu.” vakamupa mashekeri esirivha makumi manomwe aibva mutemberi yabhaari-bheriti, uye abhimereki akaishandisa kutenga varume vakanga vakaipa uye vasina tsitsi, vakava vateveri vake. akaenda kuimba yababa vake muofira uye akaponda paruware rumwe chete vanakomana vababa vake makumi manomwe, ivo vanakomana vajerubhi-bhaari. asi jotamu, muduku pane vose kuvanakomana vajerubhi-bhaari, akapunyuka nokuti akavanda. ipapo vagari vose vomushekemu nokubheti miro vakaungana parutivi pomuti mukuru pambiru iri mushekemu kuti vagadze abhimereki samambo. jotamu akati azvinzwa, akakwira pamusoro pegomo regerizimu akadanidzira kwavari akati, “nditeererei imi vagari veshekemu, kuti allah agoteerera kwamuri. rimwe zuva miti yakabuda kundozodza mambo wayo. vakati kumuti womuorivhi, ‘iva mambo wedu.’ “asi muti womuorivhi wakapindura ukati, ‘ko, ndingada kusiya mafuta angu, anoremekedzwa nezvose, vamwari navanhu, kuti ndinozengaira hangu pamusoro pemiti here?’ “shure kwaizvozvo, miti yakati kumuonde, ‘uya uzova mambo wedu.’ “asi muonde wakapindura ukati, ‘ndingada hangu kusiya muchero wangu, wakanaka kudai uye unotapira, kuti ndinozengaira pamusoro pemiti here?’ “ipapo miti ikati kumuzambiringa, ‘uya uzova mambo wedu.’ “asi muzambiringa wakapindura ukati, ‘ndingada hangu kusiya waini yangu inofadza vose vamwari navanhu, kuti ndinozengaira pamusoro pemiti here?’ “pakupedzisira, miti yose yakati kurukato, ‘uya uve mambo wedu.’ “rukato rukati kumiti, ‘kana muchida kundizodza kuti ndive mambo wenyu zvirokwazvo, uyai muvande pamumvuri wangu; asi kana zvisizvo, moto ngaubude murukato ugopisa misidhari yerebhanoni!’ “zvino kana imi makaita zvinokudzwa uye zvakatendeka pamakaita abhimereki mambo, uye kana makaita zvakanaka kuna jerubhi-bhaari nokumhuri yake, uye kana makamubata sezvaanofanira, uye nokufunga kuti baba vangu vakakurwirai, vakaisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi kuti vakununurei kubva muruoko rwemidhiani (asi nhasi mapandukira mhuri yababa vangu, mukaponda vanakomana vavo makumi manomwe padombo rimwe chete, uye mukaisa abhimereki, mwanakomana womurandakadzi wavo kuti ave mambo pamusoro pavagere mushekemu nokuda kwokuti ihama yenyu), kana zvino makaita norukudzo uye nokutenda kwakanaka kuna jerubhi-bhaari nemhuri yake, nhasi abhimereki ngaave mufaro wenyu, nemiwo muve wakewo! asi kana musina kudaro, moto ngaubude kubva kuna abhimereki, uye uparadze imi, vagari veshekemu nebheti miro, uye moto ngaubude kwamuri, vagari veshekemu nebheti miro, ugoparadza abhimereki!” ipapo jotamu akatiza, akapunyukira kubheeri, uye akagara ikoko nokuti akanga achitya mukoma wake abhimereki. shure kwamakore matatu aabhimereki achitonga israeri, allah akatuma mweya wakaipa pakati paabhimereki navagari vomushekemu, ukanyengera abhimereki. allah akaita izvi kuitira kuti zvakaipa zvakaitirwa vanakomana makumi manomwe vajerubhi-bhaari, kuteurwa kweropa ravo, kutsiviwe pamusoro pomununʼuna wavo abhimereki uye napamusoro pavagari veshekemu, avo vakanga vamubatsira kuponda vanakomana vababa vake. mukumurwisa kwavo, vagari ava veshekemu vakaisa varume pamusoro pezvikomo kuti vavandire nokupamba mumwe nomumwe aipfuura, uye izvi zvakaziviswa kuna abhimereki. zvino gaari mwanakomana waebhedhi akaenda navanunʼuna vake kundogara mushekemu, uye vagari
