vomo vakavimba naye. vakaenda kuminda vakandounganidza mazambiringa vakaasvina uye vakaita mutambo. vakapinda mutemberi yamwari wavo, vakadya vakanwa uye vakatuka abhimereki. ipapo gaari mwanakomana waebhedhi akati, “abhimereki ndianiko uye shekemu ndianiko, kuti tive varanda vake? ko, haazi mwanakomana wajerubhi-bhaari, uye zebhuri haazi mutevedzeri wake here? shandirai vanhu vahamori, baba vashekemu! seiko tichishandira abhimereki? dai chete vanhu ava vanga vari pasi pangu! ipapo ndaimubvisa. ndaizoti kuna abhimereki, ‘dana hondo yako yose!’ ” zebhuri mubati weguta akati anzwa zvakataurwa nagaari mwanakomana waebhedhi, akatsamwa zvikuru. akatuma nhume kuna abhimereki muchivande achiti, “gaari mwanakomana waebhedhi uye navanunʼuna vake vakasvika kushekemu uye vari kukuchidzira guta kuti rikurwisei. saka zvino, usiku, imi navanhu venyu munofanira kuzovandira muri muminda. panguva dzamangwanani, zuva robuda, mupinde murwise guta. panouya gaari navanhu vake kuti vabude kuzorwa nemi, muite zvose zvamunogona noruoko rwenyu.” saka abhimereki namauto ake akasimuka usiku akaenda kunzvimbo dzakavanda pedyo neshekemu mumapoka mana. zvino gaari mwanakomana waebhedhi akanga abuda uye akanga amire pamukova wamasuo eguta apo abhimereki navarwi vake vakasimuka pavakanga vakavanda. gaari akati achivaona, akati kuna zebhuri, “tarira, vanhu vari kuburuka kubva pamusoro pamakomo!” zebhuri akapindura akati, “uri kuona mimvuri yamakomo savanhu iwe.” asi gaari akadanidzirazve akati, “tarira vanhu vari kuburuka kubva pakati penyika, rimwe boka riri kubva nenzira yomuti wavavuki.” ipapo zebhuri akati kwaari, “kutaura kwako kukuru kuripiko zvino, iyewe waiti, ‘abhimereki ndianiko kuti isu tive varanda kwaari?’ handiti ava ndivo vanhu vawaizvidza here? chibuda undorwa navo!” saka gaari akabuda akatungamirira vanhu veshekemu akarwa naabhimereki. abhimereki akamudzinganisa uye vazhinji vakafa vakuvadzwa mukutiza uku nzira yose kusvikira pamukova wokupinda pasuo reguta. abhimereki akagara muaruma, uye zebhuri akadzinga gaari navanunʼuna vake mushekemu. fume mangwana vanhu veshekemu vakabuda vakaenda kuminda, uye izvi zvakaziviswa kuna abhimereki. saka akatora vanhu vake, akavakamura akavaisa mumapoka matatu akavandira musango. akati achiona vanhu vachibuda muguta, akasimuka kuti avarwise. abhimereki namapoka aakanga anawo vakamhanyira pamukova wokupinda pasuo reguta. ipapo mapoka maviri akamhanyira vaya vakanga vari kuminda vakavauraya. zuva rose iroro, abhimereki akarwisa kwazvo guta kusvikira aritapa uye auraya vanhu varo. ipapo akaparadza guta uye akakusha munyu pamusoro paro. vachinzwa izvi vagari vomushongwe yeshekemu, vakapinda munhare dzetemberi yaeri-bheriti. abhimereki akati anzwa kuti vakanga vakaungana ipapo, iye navanhu vake vose vakakwira mugomo rezarimoni. akatora demo akagura matavi, akaasimudza akaaisa pamapfudzi ake. akarayira varume vaaiva navo akati, “kurumidzai! itai zvamandiona ndichiita!” saka varume vose vakagura matavi vakatevera abhimereki. vakaatutira pamusoro penhare ndokuitungidza nomoto vanhu vari mukati. saka vanhu vose vaiva mushongwe yeshekemu, varume navakadzi vanenge chiuru chimwe chete vakafawo. shure kwaizvozvo abhimereki akaenda kutebhezi akarikomba uye akaritapa. kunyange zvakadaro, mukati meguta makanga mune shongwe yakasimba, munova ndimo makatizira varume vose navakadzi, navanhu vose veguta. vakazvikiyira mukati vakakwira padenga reshongwe. abhimereki akaenda kushongwe iyo uye akairwisa. asi akati achiswedera pamukova weshongwe kuti aipise nomoto, mukadzi akakanda guyo pamusoro pake rikatsemura dehenya rake. pakarepo akadana mutakuri wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa akati, “vhomora munondo wako undiuraye, kuti vasazoti, ‘akaurayiwa nomukadzi.’ ” saka muranda wake akamubaya akafa. vaisraeri vakati vaona kuti abhimereki afa, vakaenda kumusha. naizvozvo yeahoh akatsiva kuipa kwaabhimereki kwaakaita kuna baba vake nokuponda vanakomana vababa vake makumi manomwe. allah akaitawo kuti varume veshekemu varipe zvakaipa zvavo zvose. kutuka kwajotamu, mwanakomana wajerubhi-bhaari kwakauya pamusoro pavo.

10

shure kwenguva yaabhimereki murume weisraeri, tora mwanakomana wapua, mwanakomana wadhodho, akasimuka kuti aponese israeri. akanga achigara mushamiri munyika yezvikomo yeefuremu. akatungamirira israeri kwamakore makumi maviri namatatu, ipapo akafa, uye akavigwa mushamiri. akazoteverwa najairi mugireadhi, uyo akatungamirira israeri kwamakore makore makumi maviri. akanga ana vanakomana makumi matatu, vaitasva mbongoro makumi matatu. vaitonga maguta makumi matatu mugireadhi, ayo anodaidzwa nhasi kunzi havhoti jairi. jairi paakafa, akavigwa mukamoni. vaisraeri vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. vakashumira vanabhaari, vanaashitoreti, navamwari vearamu, vamwari vesidhoni, vamwari vemoabhu, vamwari vavaamoni navamwari vavafiristia. uye nokuti vaisraeri vakasiya yeahoh vakasazomushumirazve, iye akavatsamwira. akavatengesa mumaoko avafiristia neavaamoni, avo vakavanetsa uye vakavapwanya mugore iroro. vakadzvinyirira vaisraeri vose vakanga vari nechokumabvazuva kwejorodhani mugireadhi, munyika yavaamori, kwamakore gumi namasere. vaamoni vakayambukawo jorodhani kuti vandorwa neyeahudha, bhenjamini uye neimba yaefuremu; uye vaisraeri vakashushikana zvikuru. ipapo vaisraeri vakachema kuna yeahoh vakati, “takakutadzirai nokuti takarasa allah wedu uye tikashumira vabhaari.” yeahoh akapindura akati, “pamakadzvinyirirwa navaijipita, vaamori, vaamoni, vafiristia, vasidhoni, vaamareki, navamaoni uye mukachema kwandiri kuti ndikubatsirei, handina kukuponesai mumaoko avo here? asi imi makandirasa mukashumira vamwe vamwari, saka handichadi kukuponesaizve. endai mundochema kuna vamwari vamakasarudza. ngavakuponesei pamunenge mava kutambudzika!” asi vaisraeri vakati kuna yeahoh, “takatadza hedu. tiitirei zvose zvamunoona kuti zvakanaka kwamuri, asi tapota tinunurei henyu nhasi.” ipapo vakarasa vamwari vatorwa pakati pavo vakashumira yeahoh. uye haana kuzotenderazve kutambudzika kweisraeri. vaamoni pavakadanwa kuhondo uye vakadzika musasa mugireadhi, vaisraeri vakaungana vakadzika musasa pamizipa. vatungamiri vavanhu vegireadhi vakati kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo, “ani naani achatanga kundorwa navaamoni ndiye achava mukuru wavose vanogara mugireadhi.”

11

jefuta mugireadhi, akanga ari murwi ane simba. baba vake vainzi gireadhi; mai vake vakanga vari chifeve. mukadzi wagireadhi akamuberekerawo vanakomana, uye vakati vakura, vakadzinga jefuta. vakati, “iwe hauna nhaka ipi zvayo yauchawana mumhuri yedu, nokuti uri mwanakomana womumwe mukadzi.” saka jefuta akatiza kubva pavanunʼuna vake akandogara munyika yetobhi, uko kwaakandounganirwa navarume vakaipa uye vakamutevera. mushure menguva yakati kuti, vaamoni vakarwa navaisraeri, vakuru vegireadhi vakaenda kundotora jefuta kubva kunyika yetobhi. vakati, “uya uzova mutungamiri wehondo, kuti tigorwa navaamoni.” jefuta akati kwavari, “hamuna kundivenga here mukandidzinga mumba mababa vangu? sei mava kuuya kwandiri zvino, imi mava munhamo?” vakuru vegireadhi vakati kwaari, “zvisinei hazvo, isu hedu tiri kudzokera kwamuri iye zvino; handei tose kundorwa navaamoni, uye muchava mukuru wedu pamusoro pavose vagere mugireadhi.” jefuta akapindura akati, “ngatimboti madzokera neni kundorwa navaamoni uye yeahoh akavapa kwandiri, ndichava mukuru wenyu zvechokwadi here?” vakuru vegireadhi vakapindura vakati, “yeahoh ndiye chapupu chedu; zvirokwazvo tichaita sezvaunoreva.” saka jefuta akaenda navakuru vegireadhi, vanhu vakamuita mukuru wavo uye nomutungamiri wehondo. uye akadzokorora mashoko ake ose pamberi payeahoh mumizipa. ipapo jefuta akatuma nhume kuna mambo wavaamoni nomubvunzo wokuti, “mhosva yamunayo nesu ndeyeiko zvamunorwisa nyika yedu?” mambo wavaamoni akapindura nhume dzajefuta achiti, “vaisraeri pavakabuda muijipiti, vakatora nyika yangu kubva kuarinoni kusvikira kujabhoki, kwose nokujorodhani. zvino idzosei norugare.” jefuta akatumazve nhume kuna mambo wavaamoni achiti, “zvanzi najefuta: israeri haina kutora nyika yemoabhu kana nyika yavaamoni. asi pavakabuda muijipiti, israeri yakaenda nomurenje kusvikira kugungwa dzvuku uye nokumusoro kukadheshi. ipapo israeri yakatuma nhume kuna mambo weedhomu, ichiti, ‘titendereiwo kupfuura nomunyika yenyu,’ asi mambo weedhomu akaramba kunzwa. vakatumawo nhume kuna mambo wemoabhu, naiyewo akaramba. saka vakagara pakadheshi. “shure kwaizvozvo vakafamba nomurenje, vachitenderera nyika dzeedhomu nemoabhu, vakandodzika musasa kuno rumwe rutivi rwearinoni. havana kupinda munyika yemoabhu, nokuti arinoni waiva muganhu wayo. “ipapo vaisraeri vakatuma nhume kuna sihoni mambo wavaamori, akanga achitonga muheshibhoni, akati kwaari, ‘titendereiwo kupfuura nomunyika yenyu tichienda kunzvimbo yedu.’ kunyange zvakadaro, sihoni haana kuvimba navaisraeri kuti vapfuure nomunyika yake. akaunganidza vanhu vake vose vakandodzika musasa pajahazi uye vakarwa navaisraeri. “ipapo yeahoh, allah waisraeri, akaisa sihoni navanhu vake vose mumaoko avaisraeri, uye vakavakunda. israeri yakatora nyika yose yavaamori vaigara munyika iyo, vakaitapa yose kubva paarinoni kusvikira kujabhoki uye kubva kurenje kusvikira kujorodhani. “zvino sezvo yeahoh, allah waisraeri akadzinga vaamori pamberi pavanhu vake israeri, iwe une kodzero ipi yokuti uitore? ko, hautori here zvaunopiwa namwari wako kemoshi? naizvozvo zvose zvatinopiwa nayeahoh allah wedu, ndizvo zvatichatora. ko, iwe uri nani kupfuura bharaki mwanakomana wazipori mambo wemoabhu here? akambopopotedzana navaisraeri kana kurwa navo here? israeri yakagara muheshibhoni, aroeri, nemisha yakapoteredza uye namaguta ose akatarisana nearinoni. wakaregereiko kuatora panguva iyoyo? ini handina kukutadzira asi iwe ndiwe wava kundikanganisira nokuda kurwa neni. yeahoh, iye mutongi ngaatonge, ngaatonge gakava iri nhasi riri pakati pavaisraeri navaamoni.” kunyange zvakadaro, mambo weamoni, haana kuteerera nhume dzajefuta dzaakatuma. ipapo mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pajefuta. akayambuka gireadhi nemanase, akapfuura napamizipa yegireadhi, uye kubva ipapo akafamba akandorwa navaamoni. uye jefuta akaita mhiko kuna yeahoh akati, “kana mukaisa vaamoni mumaoko angu, chose chichabuda napamukova weimba yangu kuzosangana neni pakudzoka kwangu ndakunda vaamoni, chichava chayeahoh, uye ndichachibayira sechipiriso chinopiswa.” ipapo jefuta akabuda kundorwa navaamoni, uye yeahoh akavapa mumaoko ake. akaparadza maguta makumi maviri kubva kuaroeri kusvikira pedyo neminiti, akandoguma kuabheri keramimi. nokudaro israeri yakakunda amoni. jefuta akati odzokera kumusha kwake kumizipa, ndiani akazouya kuzomuchingamidza kunze kwomwanasikana wake, achitamba, matambureni achiridzwa! ndiye akanga achingova mwana wake oga. akanga asina mwanakomana kana mwanasikana kunze kwake iye oga. akati achimuona akabvarura nguo dzake uye akachema achiti, “haiwa mwanasikana wangu! wandishungurudza nokuti ndaita mhiko kuna yeahoh yandisingagoni kuputsa.” akapindura akati, “baba vangu, mapa shoko renyu kuna yeahoh. ndiitirei henyu sezvamakavimbisa, sezvo zvino yeahoh akatsivira vavengi venyu, ivo vaamoni. asi nditenderei henyu chikumbiro chimwe chete ichi. ndipei henyu mwedzi miviri kuti ndiende kuzvikomo ndinochema pamwe chete neshamwari dzangu, nokuti handichazowanikwi.” iye akati, “ungaenda hako.” uye akamutendera kuti aende kwemwedzi miviri. iye navamwe vasikana vakaenda kuzvikomo vakandochema nokuti akanga asingazombowanikwi. shure kwemwedzi miviri akadzoka kuna baba vake uye vakaita kwaari sezvavakanga vapika. uye akanga ari mhandara. ndipo pakabva tsika yavaisraeri yokuti gore rimwe nerimwe, vanasikana veisraeri vanobuda kwamazuva mana kundoita chirangaridzo chomwanasikana wajefuta mugireadhi.

12

varume veefuremu vakadana varwi vavo, vakayambuka mhiri vakaenda kuzafani vakandoti kuna jefuta, “wakaendereiko kundorwa navaamoni ukasatidana kuti tiende newe? tichapisa imba yako iwe uri mukati.” jefuta akapindura akati, “ini navanhu vangu takanga tiri pakurwisana kukuru navaamoni, uye kunyange ndakadana, imi hamuna kundiponesa kubva mumaoko avo. pandakaona kuti hamusi kuda kubatsira, ndakaisa upenyu hwangu mumaoko angu ndikayambuka kundorwa navaamoni, uye yeahoh akandipa kukunda pamusoro pavo. zvino mauyireiko nhasi kuzorwa neni?” ipapo jefuta akaunganidza varume vegireadhi akarwa neefuremu. vagireadhi vakavauraya nokuti vaefuremu vakanga vati, “imi vagireadhi muri vanhu vakatiza kubva kuna efuremu namanase.” vagireadhi vakatora mazambuko ejorodhani aienda kuefuremu, uye upi noupi wavakasara veefuremu aiti akati, “regai hangu ndiyambukire mhiri,” varume vegireadhi vaimubvunza vachiti, “uri muefuremu here?” kana akapindura achiti, “kwete,” vaiti, “zvakanaka, iti, ‘shibhoreti.’ ” kana akati, “sibhoreti” nokuda kwokuti akanga asingagoni kureva shoko iro zvakanaka, vaimubata vomuuraya pamazambuko ejorodhani. zviuru makumi mana nezviviri zvavaefuremu zvakaurayiwa panguva iyoyo. jefuta akatungamirira vaisraeri kwamakore matanhatu. ipapo jefuta mugireadhi akafa, uye akavigwa muguta riri mugireadhi. shure kwake, ibhizani webheterehema akatungamirira israeri. akanga ana vanakomana makumi matatu uye vanasikana makumi matatu. akawanisa vanasikana vake kuvanhu vakanga vasiri vorudzi rwake, uye akavigira vanakomana vake vanasikana vakanga vasiri vorudzi rwake makumi matatu kuti vave vakadzi vavo. ibhizani akatungamirira israeri kwamakore manomwe. ipapo ibhizani akafa, uye akavigwa mubheterehema. shure kwake, eroni muzebhuruni akatungamirira vaisraeri kwamakore gumi. ipapo eroni akafa, uye akavigwa muaijaroni munyika yazebhuruni. shure kwake, abhudhoni mwanakomana wahireri aibva kupiratoni, akatungamirira israeri. akanga ana vanakomana makumi mana uye vazukuru makumi matatu, vaitasva mbongoro makumi manomwe. akatungamirira vaisraeri kwamakore masere. ipapo abhudhoni mwanakomana wahireri akafa, uye akavigwa papiratoni muefuremu, munyika yezvikomo yavaamareki.

13

vaisraeri vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, saka yeahoh akavaisa mumaoko avafiristia kwamakore makumi mana. mumwe murumwe wezora ainzi manoa, aibva muimba yavadhani, akanga ane mukadzi akanga asingabereki, asina mwana. mutumwa wayeahoh akazviratidza kwaari uye akati, “iwe haubereki uye hauna mwana, asi uchava nemimba uye ugova nomwanakomana. zvino uone kuti warega kunwa waini kana zvimwe zvokunwa zvakaviriswa uye kuti urege kudya chinhu chipi zvacho chisina kuchena, nokuti uchava nemimba uye uchabereka mwanakomana. chisvo hachifaniri kuveura musoro wake, nokuti mukomana anofanira kuva munaziri, akatsaurirwa kuna allah kubva pakuzvarwa kwake, uye ndiye achatanga kusunungura vaisraeri kubva mumaoko avafiristia.” ipapo mukadzi akaenda kumurume wake akandomuudza akati, “munhu waallah asvika kwandiri. anga achiratidzika somutumwa waallah, anotyisa kwazvo. handina kumubvunza kuti abva kupi, uye haana kundiudza zita rake. asi ati kwandiri, ‘uchava nemimba uye uchabereka mwanakomana. zvino, chirega kunwa waini kana zvimwe zvokunwa zvakaviriswa uye usadya chinhu chipi zvacho chisina kuchena, nokuti mukomana achava munaziri waallah kubva pakuzvarwa kwake kusvikira pazuva raanofa.’ ” ipapo manoa akanyengetera kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa yeahoh, ndinokukumbirai, regai munhu waallah wamakatuma kwatiri adzokezve kuti azotidzidzisa kurera kwatingaita mukomana achazozvarwa.” allah akanzwa manoa, uye mutumwa waallah akauyazve kumukadzi panguva yaakanga ari kumunda; asi murume wake manoa akanga asipo paari. mukadzi akakurumidza kundoudza murume wake kuti, “ari pano! murume uya akazviratidza kwandiri zuva riya!” manoa akasimuka akatevera mukadzi wake. akati asvika pamurume uya, akati, “ndimi here makataura kumukadzi wangu?” iye akati, “ndini.” saka manoa akamubvunza akati, “mashoko enyu paachazadziswa, mutemo unofanira kutevedzwa paupenyu hwomukomana napabasa rake ndoupi?” mutumwa wayeahoh akapindura akati, “mukadzi wako anofanira kuita zvose zvandakamuudza. haafaniri kudya chinhu chipi zvacho chinobva pamuzambiringa, uye kunwa waini ipi zvayo kana zvimwe zvokunwa zvakaviriswa kana kudya chinhu chipi zvacho chisina kuchena. anofanira kuita zvose zvandakamurayira.” manoa akati kumutumwa wayeahoh, “tingada kuti mumbogara kusvikira takugadzirirai kambudzana.” mutumwa wayeahoh akapindura akati, “kunyange dai mukandibata henyu, handingadyi chokudya chenyu chipi zvacho. asi kana muchigadzira chipiriso chinopiswa, chipei kuna yeahoh.” (manoa haana kuziva kuti akanga ari mutumwa yeahoh.) ipapo manoa akabvunza mutumwa wayeahoh akati, “zita renyu ndianiko, kuitira kuti tigokukudzai pachazadziswa shoko renyu?” akapindura akati, “unobvunzireiko zita rangu? haringanzwisisiki.” ipapo manoa akatora kambudzana, pamwe chete nechipiriso chezviyo, akazvibayira kuna yeahoh paruware. uye yeahoh akaita chinhu chinoshamisa, manoa nomukadzi wake vakatarisa: murazvo wemoto wakati uchikwira kubva paaritari wakananga kudenga, mutumwa wayeahoh akakwira ari mumurazvo. vakati vaona izvi, manoa nomukadzi wake vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo. asi mutumwa wayeahoh haana kuzozviratidzazve kuna manoa nomukadzi wake, ipapo manoa akaziva kuti akanga ari mutumwa wayeahoh. akati, “tichafa zvirokwazvo! taona allah!” asi mukadzi wake akati, “kana yeahoh anga achida kutiuraya, angadai asina kugamuchira chipiriso chinopiswa nechipiriso chezviyo kubva mumaoko edu, uye angadai asina kutiratidza zvinhu zvose izvi kana kutiudza izvi zvino.” mukadzi akasununguka mwanakomana uye akamutumidza zita rokuti samusoni. akakura uye yeahoh akamuropafadza, uye mweya wayeahoh wakatanga kumumutsa paakanga ari pamahane dhani, pakati pezora neeshitaori.

14

samusoni akaburuka akaenda kutimina akandoona ikoko mukadzi muduku wechifiristia. akati adzoka, akasvikoti kuna baba namai vake, “ndaona mukadzi wechifiristia mutimina; zvino nditorerei kuti ave mukadzi wangu.” baba namai vake vakapindura vakati, “hapana here mukadzi akakodzera pakati pehama dzako kana pakati pavanhu vokwedu vose? ungaenda here kuvafiristia vasina kudzingiswa kuti undotora mukadzi?” asi samusoni akati kuna baba vake, “nditorerei iye. ndiye akanaka kwandiri.” (vabereki vake vakanga vasingazivi kuti izvi zvakanga zvichibva kuna yeahoh, akanga achitsvaka mukana wokurwa navafiristia; nokuti nenguva iyo ndivo vakanga vachitonga vaisraeri.) samusoni akaburuka akaenda kutimina pamwe chete nababa vake namai vake. vakati vasvika kuminda yemizambiringa yetimina, pakarepo shumba yakauya yakananga kwaari ichiomba. mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pake nesimba zvokuti akabvambura shumba napakati namaoko ake kunge anobvambura mbudzana. ipapo akaburuka akandotaura nomukadzi, uye aimuda. mushure menguva yakati kuti, paakadzokera kundomuroora, akatsauka kundoona mutumbi weshumba. mukati macho makanga mava nebumha renyuchi nouchi, akahubura namaoko ake akadya achifamba. akati asvika kuvabereki vake akavapa humwe vakadyawo naivo. asi haana kuvaudza kuti akanga atora uchi mumutumbi weshumba. zvino baba vake vakaburuka kundoona mukadzi uya. uye samusoni akaita mutambo ikoko, setsika yaiitwa nezvikomba. paakasvika, akapiwa shamwari makumi matatu. samusoni akati kwavari, “regai ndikutaurirei chirahwe. kana mukagona kuchidudzira mukati mamazuva manomwe omutambo, ini ndichakupai nguo dzomucheka dzinosvika makumi matatu nehanzu makumi matatu. kana musingagoni kudzidudzira, imi munofanira kundipa nguo dzomucheka makumi matatu namakumi matatu ehanzu.” ivo vakati, “tiudze chirahwe chako. rega tichinzwe.” akapindura akati, “kumudyi kwakabuda chokudya; kubva kune chine simba kwakabuda zvinotapira.” havana kugona kupa mhinduro kwamazuva matatu. pazuva rechina, vakati kumukadzi wasamusoni, “nyengetedza murume wako kuti atsanangure chirahwe kuti tiregere kukupisai mukafa iwe neveimba yababa vako. munotikoka pano kuzotibira nhai?” ipapo mukadzi wasamusoni akazviwisira paari, achichema akati, “unondivenga iwe! haundidi chaizvo izvo. wakapa vanhu vokwangu chirahwe, asi hauna kundiudza dudziro yacho.” akapindura akati, “handina kutongochitsanangurira baba vangu kana mai vangu, saka ndingachitsanangura seiko kwauri?” akachema kwamazuva manomwe ose omutambo. saka akapedzisira amuudza pazuva rechinomwe, nokuti akaramba achingomumanikidza. iye akabva azotsanangurira vanhu vake chirahwe. pazuva rechinomwe, zuva risati radoka, varume vomuguta vakati kwaari, “chiiko chinotapira souchi? chiiko chine simba seshumba?” samusoni akati kwavari, “dai manga musina kurima netsiru rangu, mungadai musina kugona kududzira chirahwe changu.” ipapo mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pake nesimba. akaburuka akaenda kuashikeroni, akandouraya varume makumi matatu, akakutunura zvinhu zvavo akapa nguo dzavo kuna avo vakadudzira chirahwe. akatsamwa kwazvo akaenda kumba kwababa vake. uye mukadzi wasamusoni akapiwa kushamwari yakanga yamuperekedza pasvitsa.

15

mushure mechinguva, panguva yokukohwa gorosi, samusoni akatora mbudzana akaenda kundoshanyira mukadzi wake. akati, “ndinoda kupinda mumba nomukadzi wangu.” asi baba vomukadzi wake havana kumutendera kupinda. baba vomukadzi wake vakati, “ndakanga ndine chokwadi chaizvo kuti unomuvenga kwazvo zvokuti ndakamupa kushamwari yako. ko, mununʼuna wake haana kunaka kukunda iye here? chimutora iye panzvimbo yake.” samusoni akati kwaari, “panguva ino ndine mvumo yokuti nditsive kuvafiristia; ndichavaitira zvakaipa chaizvo.” saka akabuda akandobata makava mazana matatu akaasunganidza miswe yawo achiita maviri maviri. ipapo akaisa zhenje pakati pemiswe miviri miviri yacho. akatungidza mazhenje akaregedza makava akapinda muzviyo zvavafiristia zvakanga zvimire. akapisa zviyo zvakanga zvakohwewa nezvakanga zvimire mumunda, pamwe chete neminda yemizambiringa neyemiorivhi. vafiristia pavakabvunza kuti, “ndianiko aita izvi?” vakaudzwa kuti, “ndisamusoni, mukuwasha womutimina, nemhaka yokuti mukadzi wake akapiwa kushamwari yake.” saka vafiristia vakaenda vakandomupisa iye nababa vake vakafa. samusoni akati kwavari, “sezvo maita kudai, ini handitombomiri kusvikira ndakutsivai.” akavarwisa zvakasimba uye akauraya vazhinji vavo. ipapo akaburuka akandogara mubako redombo reetami. vafiristia vakakwidza vakandodzika musasa wavo muyeahudha, vakapararira kusvika pedyo nerehi. varume veyeahudha vakavabvunza vakati, “mauyireiko kuzorwa nesu?” ivo vakapindura vakati, “tauya kuzotora samusoni kuti ave musungwa, uye kuti tiite kwaari zvaakatiitira isu.” ipapo varume zviuru zvitatu vaibva kuyeahudha vakaburuka kubako reetami vakandoti kuna samusoni, “ko, haunzwi here kuti vafiristia vanotitonga? chiiko chawatiitira?” akapindura akati, “ndakangovaitira zvavakandiitira.” ivo vakati kwaari, “tauya kuzokusunga kuti tikuise kuvafiristia.” samusoni akati, “pikai kwandiri kuti imi hamundiurayi pachenyu.” ivo vakati, “hongu, isu tichangokusunga bedzi tigokuisa mumaoko avo. hatikuurayi isu.” saka vakamusunga namabote matsva maviri vakamutungamirira kuruware. akati aswedera kurehi, vafiristia vakauya kwaari vachidanidzira. mweya wayeahoh wakauya paari nesimba. mabote akanga ari mumaoko ake akaita sorushinda, uye zvisungo zvikadonha mumaoko ake. akawana rushaya rutsva rwembongoro, akarubata akauraya varume chiuru. ipapo samusoni akati, “norushaya rwembongoro ndavaita mbongoro. norushaya rwembongoro ndauraya varume chiuru.” akati apedza kutaura, akakanda rushaya kure; uye nzvimbo iyoyo ikanzi ramati rehi. nokuti akanga ava nenyota chaizvo, akadanidzira kuna yeahoh akati, “mapa muranda wenyu kukunda kukuru. zvino ndofira pano nenyota here ndigowira mumaoko avasina kudzingiswa?” ipapo allah akazarura mukaha murehi, mvura ikabuda mauri. samusoni akati anwa, simba rake rakadzoka maari uye akamutsiridzwazve. saka tsime iro rakanzi eni hakore, uye richirimo murehi. samusoni akatungamirira vaisraeri kwamakore makumi maviri mumazuva avafiristia.

16

rimwe zuva samusoni akaenda kugaza, kwaakandoona chifeve. akapinda usiku kuti andovata nacho. vanhu vegaza vakaudzwa kuti, “samusoni ari pano!” saka vakakomba nzvimbo iyo vakamuvandira usiku pasuo reguta. havana kumbosuduruka panguva yousiku vachiti, “tichamuuraya panguva yamambakwedza.” asi samusoni akavatamo kusvikira pakati pousiku chete. ipapo akamuka akabata masasa amasuo eguta, pamwe chete namagwatidziro acho maviri akaavhomora, mazariro nezvose. akaasimudza pamapfudzi ake akaatakura akaenda nawo pamusoro pechikomo chakatarisana nehebhuroni. mushure menguva yakati kuti, akadanana nomukadzi aigara mumupata wesoreki; zita rake rainzi dherira. vatongi vavafiristia vakaenda kwaari vakati, “uone kana ungagona kumunyengetedza kuti akuratidze chakavanzika chesimba rake guru, uye kuti tingamukunda sei kuitira kuti tigomusunga timupfavise. mumwe nomumwe wedu achakupa mashekeri esirivha mazana gumi nezana rimwe chete.” saka dherira akati kuna samusoni, “ndiudzewoka chakavanzika chesimba rako guru uye kuti ungasungwa sei kuti ukundwe.” samusoni akamupindura akati, “kana munhu upi zvake akandisunga netambo itsva nomwe dzisina kuomeswa, ndichava munhu asina simba, somumwewo munhu zvake.” ipapo vatongi vavafiristia vakamuvigira tambo nomwe itsva dzisina kuomeswa, akamusunga nadzo. varume vakavanda mukamuri, akadanidzira kwaari akati, “samusoni, vafiristia vasvika!” asi akadambura tambo zviri nyore sokudambuka kunoita shinda kana yaiswa pedyo nomurazvo womoto. saka chakavanzika chesimba rake hachina kuzivikanwa. ipapo dherira akati kuna samusoni, “wandiita benzi; wareva nhema kwandiri. zvino chindiudza kuti ungasungwa sei?” iye akati, “kana munhu akandisunga zvakasimba namabote matsva asati amboshandiswa, ndichava munhu asina simba somumwewo munhu zvake.” saka dherira akatora mabote matsva akamusunga nawo. ipapo, aiva navarume vakanga vakavanda mukamuri, uye akadanidzira kwaari achiti, “samusoni, vafiristia vasvika!” asi akadambura mabote mumaoko ake kunge akanga ari shinda. ipapo dherira akati kuna samusoni, “kusvikira zvino, wanga uchingondiita benzi uye uchireva nhema kwandiri. ndiudze kuti ungasungwa sei.” akapindura akati, “kana ukarukira mhotsi dzangu nomwe dzebvudzi rangu mumucheka wakarukwa uye ukadzirovera pasi nembambo, ini ndichava munhu asina simba somumwewo munhu zvake.” saka paakanga avata, dherira akatora mhotsi nomwe dzebvudzi romusoro wake, akadzirukira mumucheka unorukwa, akadzirovera pasi nembambo. akadanidzira kwaari zvakare akati, “samusoni, vafiristia vasvika!” akapepuka pahope dzake akavhomora mbambo nomucheka wakarukwa. ipapo akati kwaari, “unoti ‘ndinokuda’ sei iwe usingandiudzi zvakavanzika zvako? aka kava ketatu uchingondiita benzi uye hauna kutongonditaurira chakavanzika chesimba rako guru.” pakupedzisira mushure mokunge atambudzwa namashoko ake, zuva nezuva, achimugombedzera, akaneta zvokusvika parufu. saka akamuudza zvose. akati, “hapana chisvo chakatomboshandiswa kuveura musoro wangu, nokuti ndakaitwa munaziri akatsaurirwa kuna allah kubva pakuberekwa kwangu. kana musoro wangu ukaveurwa, simba rangu rinobva pandiri, uye ndinozova munhu asina simba, somumwewo munhu zvake.” dherira paakaona kuti akanga amuudza zvose, akatuma shoko kuvatongi vavafiristia achiti, “dzokai, zvakare; andiudza zvose.” saka vatongi vavafiristia vakadzoka vaine sirivha mumaoko avo. akati amurarisa pamakumbo ake, akadana munhu kuti azoveura mhotsi nomwe dzebvudzi rake, nokudaro akatanga kumukunda. uye simba rake rakabva paari. ipapo akadana samusoni akati, “samusoni, vafiristia vasvika!” akapepuka pahope dzake akafunga akati, “ndichabuda sezvandaiita kare uye ndichazvisunungura.” asi akanga asingazivi kuti yeahoh akanga abva paari. ipapo vafiristia vakamubata vakatumbura meso ake vakamuendesa kundokuya mutorongo. asi bvudzi romusoro wake rakatanga kukurazve shure kwokumboveurwa. zvino vatongi vavafiristia vakaungana kuti vabayire chibayiro chikuru kuna dhagoni mwari wavo uye kuti vapemberere vachiti, “allah wedu aisa samusoni, muvengi wedu, mumaoko edu.” vanhu vakati vamuona, vakarumbidza mwari wavo vachiti, “allah wedu aisa muvengi wedu mumaoko edu, iye akaparadza nyika yedu akawanza vakaurayiwa vedu.” vari pakufara kukuru, vakadanidzira vachiti, “budisai samusoni kuti auye kuzotitandadza.” saka vakadana samusoni kuti abude mutorongo, uye akatamba pamberi pavo. vakati vamumisa pakati pembiru, samusoni akati kumuranda akanga akabata ruoko rwake, “ndiise pandinogona kubata mbiru dzinotsigira temberi, kuitira kuti ndisendamire padziri.” zvino temberi yakanga izere navarume navakadzi; vatongi vose vavafiristia vakanga varimo uye padenga pakanga pane varume navakadzi vanenge zviuru zvitatu vakatarira samusoni achitamba. ipapo samusoni akanyengetera kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa ishe yeahoh, ndirangarirei. imi allah, ndapota hangu, ndisimbisei henyu nguva ino bedzi, uye nditenderei kamwe chete kuti nditsive vafiristia nokuda kwameso angu maviri.” ipapo samusoni akabata mbiru mbiri dzapakati dzakanga dzakatsigira temberi paakanga amire. akadzisunda, ruoko rwake rworudyi rwuri pane imwe uye rworuboshwe rwuri pane imwe yacho. samusoni akati, “regai ndife hangu navafiristia!” ipapo akasunda nesimba rake rose, temberi ikaondomokera pamusoro pavatongi vavafiristia navanhu vose vaiva mairi. naizvozvo akauraya vanhu vazhinji kwazvo pakufa kwake kupfuura paakanga ari mupenyu. ipapo vanunʼuna vake nemhuri yose yababa vake vakaburuka, vakandomutora. vakadzoka naye vakandomuviga pakati pezora neeshitaori muhwiro ramanoa baba vake. akanga atungamirira israeri kwamakore makumi maviri.

17

zvino mumwe murume ainzi mika aibva kunyika yezvikomo yaefuremu akati kuna mai vake, “mashekeri aya esirivha chiuru nezana rimwe chete akatorwa kubva kwamuri andakanzwa muchituka munhu wacho akatora, sirivha yacho ndini ndinayo; ndini ndakaitora.” ipapo mai vake vakati, “yeahoh ngaakuropafadze, mwanakomana wangu!” akati adzorera mashekeri esirivha chiuru nezana rimwe chete, kuna mai vake, ivo vakati, “ndinotsaurira yeahoh sirivha yangu nomwoyo wose kuti mwanakomana wangu aite chifananidzo chakavezwa nomufananidzo wakaumbwa wesimbi. ndichazoidzosera kwauri.” saka akadzosera sirivha kuna mai vake, uye mai vake vakatora mazana maviri amashekeri esirivha vakaapa kumupfuri wesirivha, akaita nawo mufananidzo wakavezwa nomufananidzo wakaumbwa. uye zvakaiswa mumba mamika. zvino murume uyu mika, akanga ane imba yavamwari, uye akaita efodhi nezvimwe zvifananidzo uye akagadza mumwe wavanakomana vake kuti ave muprista wake. mumazuva iwayo israeri yakanga isina mambo; mumwe nomumwe akaita zvaaiona zvakamunakira. zvino kwakanga kune jaya murevhi aibva kubheterehema muyeahudha, aigara mukati morudzi rwayeahudha, akabva muguta iroro achindotsvaka imwe nzvimbo yokugara. ari munzira yake akasvika napaimba yamika munyika yezvikomo yeefuremu. mika akamubvunza akati, “unobvepiko?” iye akati, “ndiri murevhi anobva kubheterehema muyeahudha, uye ndiri kutsvaka nzvimbo yokugara.” ipapo mika akati kwaari, “gara hako neni ugova baba vangu nomuprista wangu, uye ndichakupa mashekeri esirivha gumi pagore, nguo dzako dzokupfeka uye nezvokudya zvako.” saka murevhi akabvuma kugara naye, uye jaya iri rakanga rakaita somumwe wavanakomana vake. ipapo mika akagadza murevhi, jaya rikava muprista wake akagara mumba make. uye mika akati, “zvino ndinoziva kuti yeahoh achandiitira zvakanaka, sezvo murevhi uyu ava muprista wangu.”

18

mumazuva iwayo israeri yakanga isina mambo. uye mumazuva iwayo vorudzi rwavadhani vakanga vachitsvaka nzvimbo yavo pachavo yavangagara, nokuti vakanga vasati vapiwa nhaka pakati pamarudzi eisraeri. saka vadhani vakatuma varwi vashanu vaibva kuzora neeshitaori kuti vandosora nyika uye vaitarisise. varume ava vakanga vachimirira dzimba dzavo dzose. vakavaudza kuti, “endai munotarisisa nyika.” varume vakapinda munyika yezvikomo yaefuremu vakasvika paimba yamika, vakavatapo. vakati vava pedyo nemba yamika, vakaziva inzwi rejaya murevhi; saka vakatsaukiramo vakamubvunza vachiti, “ndianiko akakuuyisa kuno? unobatei pano? seiko uri pano?” akavataurira zvaakanga aitirwa namika, akati, “akandipa basa uye ndiri muprista wake.” ipapo vakati kwaari, “tapota, tibvunzire allah kuti tizive kana rwendo rwedu ruchabudirira.” muprista akavapindura akati, “endai henyu norugare. rwendo rwenyu rwatendwa nayeahoh.” saka varume vashanyi vaya vakabvapo vakandosvika kuraishi, uko kwavakandoona kuti vanhu vakanga vagere zvakanaka, sezvakaita vasidhoni, vasina chavanofungidzira uye vagere zvakanaka. uye sezvo nyika yavo yakanga isingashayiwi chinhu, vakanga vakabudirira. uyezve, vakanga vagere kure nava sidhoni uye vakanga vasina ushamwari naani zvake. vakati vadzokera kuzora neeshitaori, hama dzavo dzakavabvunza dzikati, “makazviona sei zvinhu imi?” vakapindura vakati, “uyai, tivarwise! takaona kuti nyika yacho yakanaka kwazvo. hamungaiti chimwe chinhu here? musanonoka kuendako kundoitora. pamunosvikako muchawana mumaoko enyu naallah, nyika isina kana chainoshayiwa.” ipapo mazana matanhatu avarume vaibva kumhuri yavadhani vakapakata zvombo kuti vandorwa, vakasimuka vachibva kuzora neeshitaori. vari munzira yavo vakadzika misasa pedyo nekiriati jearimi muyeahudha. ndokusaka nzvimbo iri kumavirira ekiriati jearimi ichinzi mahane dhani kusvikira zuva ranhasi. kubva ipapo vakaenda kunyika yezvikomo yaefuremu uye vakasvika kumba kwamika. ipapo varume vashanu vakanga vandosora nyika yeraishi vakati kuhama dzavo, “munoziva here kuti imwe yedzimba idzi ine efodhi, vamwe vamwari, chifananidzo chakavezwa nechifananidzo chakaumbwa? zvino imi munoziva zvokuita.” saka vakatsaukiramo vakaenda kumba kwejaya murevhi kumba kwamika vakandomukwazisa. mazana matanhatu avadhani, vakapakata zvombo zvokurwa, vakamira pamukova wokupinda nawo pasuo. varume vashanu vakanga vandosora nyika vakapinda mukati vakatora chifananidzo chakavezwa, efodhi, vamwe vamwari nechifananidzo chakaumbwa asi muprista namazana matanhatu avarume vakanga vakapakata zvombo zvokurwa nazvo vakamira pamukova wesuo. varume ava vakati vapinda mumba mamika, vakatora mufananidzo wakavezwa, efodhi, vamwe vamwari nechifananidzo chakaumbwa, muprista akati kwavari, “muri kuiteiko?” vakamupindura vakati, “nyarara! usambotaura shoko. handei tose, ugova baba vedu nomuprista wedu. handiti zviri nani kushumira rudzi neimba iri muisraeri somuprista pachinzvimbo cheimba yomunhu mumwe here?” ipapo muprista akafara. akatora efodhi, vamwe vamwari nechifananidzo chakavezwa akaenda pamwe chete navanhu. vakaisa vana vavo vaduku, zvipfuwo zvavo nenhumbi dzavo pamberi pavo, vakasimuka vakaenda. vakati vafamba chinhambwe kubva pamba yamika varume vaigara pedyo namika vakadanwa pamwe chete vakatevera vadhani vakavabata. pavakadaidzira mushure mavo, vadhani vakatendeuka vakati kuna mika, “wakaita seiko iwe, zvawadana vanhu vako kuti vazorwa?” akapindura akati, “makatora vamwari vandakaita, uye muprista wangu mukaenda naye. chii zvino chandasarirwa nacho? mungabvunza seiko muchiti, ‘wakaita seiko iwe?’ ” vadhani vakapindura vakati, “usaita nharo nesu, kuti varume vane hasha varege kukurwisa, uye iwe nemhuri yako mukazorasikirwa noupenyu hwenyu.” saka vadhani vakaenda zvavo, uye mika, achiona kuti vakanga vaine simba kukunda iye, akadzoka akaenda kumusha kwake. ipapo vakatora zvakanga zvagadzirwa namika, uye muprista wake, vakaenda kuraishi, vakandorwa navanhu vakanga vasina chavanofungidzira vano rugare. vakavauraya nomunondo vakavapisira maguta avo nomoto. pakanga pasina munhu anovanunura nokuti vaigara kure nesidhoni uye vasina ushamwari naani zvake. guta rakanga riri mumupata waiva pedyo nebheti rehobhi. vadhani vakavakazve guta vakagaramo. vakaritumidza kuti dhani zita ratateguru wavo dhani, akanga aberekerwa israeri, kunyange raimbonzi raishi. ikoko vadhani vakazvimisira chifananidzo, uye jonatani mwanakomana wagerishomi, mwanakomana wamozisi, uye vanakomana vake vakava vaprista vorudzi rwadhani kusvikira panguva youtapwa hwenyika. vakaramba vachishandisa zvifananidzo zvakaitwa namika, nguva dzose imba yaallah payakanga iri mushiro.

19

mumazuva iwayo israeri yakanga isina mambo. zvino mumwe murevhi akanga achigara munyika iri kure yezvikomo yeefuremu akatora murongo aibva kubheterehema muyeahudha. asi akanga asina kutendeka kwaari. akamusiya akadzokerazve kumba kwababa vake kubheterehema, yeahudha. mushure mokunge agarako kwemwedzi mina, murume wake akaenda kwaari kundomunyengetedza kuti adzoke. akanga ane muranda wake nembongoro mbiri. akamupinza mumba mababa vake, uye baba vake vakati vamuona, vakamugamuchira nomufaro. tezvara vake, ivo baba vomusikana, vakamugombedzera kuti agare; saka akagara naye kwamazuva matatu, vachidya nokunwa uye achivatapo. pazuva rechina vakamuka mangwanani vakagadzirira kuti vaende, asi baba vomusikana vakati kumukuwasha wavo, “simbisa mwoyo wako nechokudya; ipapo mugoenda henyu.” saka vose vari vaviri vakagara pasi kuti vadye nokunwa pamwe chete. mushure maizvozvo, baba vomusikana vakati, “ndapota chivata hako usiku uno uye umbofara.” uye murume uyu akati asimuka kuti aende, tezvara vake vakamunyengetedza, saka akavatapo usiku uhwo. mangwanani ezuva reshanu, paakamuka kuti aende, baba vomusikana vakati, “simbisa mwoyo wako. gara kusvikira masikati!” saka vose vari vaviri vakadya pamwe chete. ipapo murume, murongo wake uye nomuranda wake, vakati vasimuka kuti vaende, tezvara wake, baba vomusikana vakati, “zvino chiona kwava kudoka. chivata hako pano usiku huno; kwavira. gara ufadze mwoyo wako. mangwana mangwanani, ungamuka ugopinda hako munzira yako.” asi, nokusada kuvatazve humwe usiku, murume uya akabuda akaenda akananga kujebhusi (ndiro jerusarema), nembongoro dzake mbiri dzakaiswa zvigaro, nomurongo wake. vakati vava pedyo nejebhusi uye zuva rakanga rovira, muranda akati kuna tenzi wake, “uyai, titsaukire muguta iri ravajebhusi tindovatamo.” tenzi wake akapindura akati, “kwete. hatingapindi muguta ravatorwa, vanhu varo zvavasiri vaisraeri. tichapfuurira kugibhea.” akaenderera mberi akati, “uyai, tiedze kusvika kugibhea kana kurama tigovata mune imwe yenzvimbo idzi.” saka vakapfuurira mberi, uye zuva rakavira pavakanga vasvika mugibhea mubhenjamini. imomo, ndimo mavakamira kuti vavate. vakaenda vakandogara muchivara cheguta, asi hapana munhu akavatora akavapinza mumba make usiku. madekwana iwayo, imwe harahwa yaibva munyika yezvikomo yeefuremu, yaigara mugibhea (vanhu venzvimbo vaiva vabhenjamini), yakasvika ichibva kubasa rayo kumunda. yakati yatarira ikaona mufambi ari muchivara cheguta, harahwa yakabvunza ikati, “uri kuendepiko? wabvepiko?” akapindura akati, “tiri kubva kubheterehema muyeahudha; tiri kuenda kure kunyika yezvikomo yeefuremu, ndiko kwandinogara. ndakanga ndiri kubheterehema muyeahudha, asi iye zvino ndiri kuenda kumba kwayeahoh. hapana munhu anditora akandipinza mumba make. tine zvose mashanga nouswa hwembongoro dzedu uye chingwa chedu newaini yedu, isu varanda venyu, ini, murandakadzi wenyu, nejaya ratinaro. hatina chinhu chatingada hedu.” harahwa yakati, “munogona kuuya kumba kwangu. ndichakupai zvose zvamunoshayiwa. asi bedzi usavata pachivara.” saka akamutora akamupinza mumba make uye akapa mbongoro dzake zvokudya. vakati vashamba tsoka dzavo, vakadya zvokudya uye vakanwa. vachiri pakufara havo, vamwe vanhu vakaipa vomuguta vakakomba imba. vachigogodza pamukova, vakadanidzira kuharahwa yakanga iri iyo muridzi weimba vachiti, “budisa murume uyo apinda mumba mako kuti tivate naye.” muridzi wemba akabuda panze akati kwavari, “kwete, shamwari dzangu, regai kuita zvakaipa kudai. sezvo murume uyu ari mueni wangu, regai kuita chinhu ichi chinonyadzisa kudai. tarirai, heyi mhandara mwanasikana wangu uyu, nemurongo wake. ndichavabudisa kwamuri izvozvi, uye munogona kuvabata mugoita kwavari zvose zvamunoda. asi kumurume uyu, regai kuita chinhu chinonyadzisa zvakadaro.” asi varume ava havana kuda kumuteerera. saka murume uyu akatora murongo wake akamuendesa kunze kwavari, uye vakamubata chibharo vakamuchinya usiku hwose, uye panguva dzamambakwedza vakamuregedza kuti aende. kwaedza, mukadzi akadzokera kumba kwaigara tenzi wake, akawira pasi pamukova wemba uye akavatapo kusvikira kwaedza. tenzi wake akati achimuka mangwanani akazarura mukova wemba akabuda panze kuti afambire mberi norwendo rwake, onei hoyo murongo wake avete akawira pasi pamukova wemba, maoko ake ari pachikumbaridzo. iye akati kwaari, “muka; handei.” asi pakanga pasina mhinduro. ipapo murume uya akamuisa pambongoro akasimuka akaenda kumusha. akati achisvika kumusha, akatora banga akagura-gura murongo wake, mutezo muzvidimbu gumi nezviviri akazvitumira munzvimbo dzose dzeisraeri. mumwe nomumwe akazviona akati, “chinhu chakadai hachina kutongoonekwa kana kuitwa, kubva pazuva rakabuda vaisraeri muijipiti. fungai pamusoro pazvo! zvicherechedzei! tiudzei zvokuita!”

20

ipapo vaisraeri vose kubva kudhani kusvikira kubheerishebha uye nokubva munyika yegireadhi vakabuda somunhu mumwe chete vakaungana pamberi payeahoh mumizipa. vatungamiriri vavanhu vose vamarudzi eisraeri vakandomira panzvimbo dzavo paungano yavanhu vaallah, zviuru zvamazana mana zvavarwi vakapakata minondo. (vabhenjamini vakanzwa kuti vaisraeri vakanga vakwidza kumizipa.) ipapo vakati, “dotiudzai kuti chinhu chakaipisisa kudai chakaitika sei?” saka murevhi, murume womukadzi akapondwa akati, “ini nomurongo wangu takasvika pagibhea mubhenjamini kuti tindovatamo. panguva dzousiku, varume vegibhea vakauya kwandiri vakakomba imba vachida kundiuraya. vakabata murongo wangu chibharo, uye akafa. ndakatora murongo wangu, ndikamugura-gura uye ndikatumira chidimbu chimwe chete kunharaunda imwe neimwe yenhaka yeisraeri, nokuti ndivo vakaita chinhu ichi chinonyangadza uye nokuita kunonyadzisa muisraeri. zvino, imi vaisraeri mose, taurai uye mupe mutongo wenyu.” vanhu vose vakasimuka somunhu mumwe chete vakati, “hakuna mumwe wedu achaenda kumba. kwete, hakuna mumwe wedu achadzokera kumba kwake. asi zvino izvi ndizvo zvatichaita kugibhea: tichakwidza kundorwa nayo sokuratidza kwomujenya. tichatora varume gumi kubva muzana roga roga kubva kumarudzi ose eisraeri, uye zana kubva muchiuru, uye chiuru kubva mugumi rezviuru, kuti vavigire varwi mbuva. ipapo, hondo painosvika pagibhea mubhenjamini, ichavapa zvakavafanira zvouipi hwavo uhu hwakaitwa muisraeri.” saka varume vose veisraeri vakaungana pamwe chete somunhu mumwe chete kuti vandorwisa guta. marudzi aisraeri akatuma varume kurudzi rwose rwabhenjamini, vachiti, “munoti kudiniko pamusoro pemhosva yakaipisisa yakaparwa pakati penyu? zvino tipei varume avo vakaipa vegibhea kuti tivauraye tigobvisa chakaipa muisraeri.” asi vabhenjamini havana kuda kuteerera hama dzavo vaisraeri. vakabva mumaguta avo vakaungana pamwe chete pagibhea kuti vazorwa navaisraeri. pakarepo vabhenjamini vakaunganidza varume veminondo zviuru makumi maviri nezvitanhatu kubva mumaguta avo, pamusoro pamazana manomwe akasarudzwa kubva kuna avo vaigara mugibhea. pakati pavarwi ava vose pakanga pane mazana manomwe avarume vakasarudzwa vakanga vane ziboshwe, mumwe nomumwe wavo aigona kupotsera ibwe kutsuro asingapotsi. kuisraeri, kunze kwabhenjamini vakaverenga varume veminondo zviuru mazana mana, vose vakanga vari varwi. vaisraeri vakakwidza kubheteri vakandobvunza allah. vakati, “ndiani wedu achatanga kundorwa navabhenjamini?” yeahoh akapindura akati, “yeahudha ndiye achatanga kuenda.” fume mangwana, vaisraeri vakamuka vakadzika misasa pedyo negibhea. varume veisraeri vakabuda kundorwa navabhenjamini uye vakamira panzvimbo dzokurwa navo pagibhea. vabhenjamini vakabuda mugibhea vakauraya vaisraeri zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri munhandare yehondo pazuva iroro. asi varume veisraeri vakakurudzirana uyezve vakamira panzvimbo dzavo dzavakanga vatora pazuva rokutanga. vaisraeri vakakwira vakandochema pamberi payeahoh kusvikira madekwana, uye vakabvunza yeahoh. vakati, “tichakwirazve kundorwa navabhenjamini, idzo hama dzedu here?” yeahoh akapindura akati, “kwirai mundorwa navo.” ipapo vaisraeri vakaswedera pedyo navabhenjamini pazuva repiri. nguva iyi, vabhenjamini pavakabuda kubva mugibhea kuti vandovarwisa, vakauraya vamwezve zviuru gumi nezvisere zvavaisraeri, vose vakanga vakapakata minondo. ipapo vaisraeri, vanhu vose vakakwira kubheteri, uye ikoko vakandogara pasi vachichema pamberi payeahoh. vakatsanya pazuva iro kusvikira madekwana uye vakapa kuna yeahoh zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. uye vaisraeri vakabvunza yeahoh. (pamazuva iwayo, areka yesungano yaallah yakanga iripo, uye finehasi mwanakomana waereazari, mwanakomana waaroni, achishumira pamberi payo.) vakabvunza vakati, “tichaendazve kundorwa nabhenjamini hama yedu here kana kuti kwete?” yeahoh akati, “endai, nokuti mangwana ndichavaisa mumaoko enyu.” ipapo vaisraeri vakandovandira vakakomberedza gibhea. vakakwidza kundorwa navabhenjamini pazuva retatu uye vakamira panzvimbo dzavo dzehondo kuti varwe negibhea sezvavakamboita kare. vabhenjamini vakabuda kuzosangana navo uye vakakwezverwa kure neguta. vakatanga kubaya vaisraeri sapakutanga, zvokuti varume vanenge makumi matatu vakafa musango uye nomumigwagwa, inoti mumwe unoenda kubheteri nomumwe wacho kugibhea. vabhenjamini pavaiti, “tiri kuvakunda sapakutanga,” vaisraeri vaiti, “ngatidududzirei mumashure tivakwezvere kure neguta kumigwagwa.” varume vose veisraeri vakafamba kubva panzvimbo dzavo uye vakandomira pabhaari tamari, uye vaisraeri vakanga vakavandira vakabuda munzvimbo dzavo pamavirira egibhea. ipapo zviuru gumi zvavarume veisraeri vakanga vakasarudzwa vakavarwisa nechemberi pagibhea. kurwa kwakanga kwanyanya kwazvo zvokuti vabhenjamini havana kuziva kuti njodzi yakanga yava pedyo zvakaita sei. yeahoh akakunda bhenjamini pamberi peisraeri, uye pazuva iro vaisraeri vakauraya vabhenjamini, vose vakanga vakapakata minondo zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nezana rimwe chete. ipapo vabhenjamini vakaona kuti vakanga vakundwa. zvino varume veisraeri vakanga vachitiza pamberi pavabhenjamini, nokuti vakanga vachisimba nokuvandira kwavakanga varonga pedyo negibhea. varume vakanga vakavandira vakapinda mugibhea pakarepo, vakapararira uye vakaparadza guta rose nomunondo. varume veisraeri vakanga varonga navakanga vakavandira kuti pavaizorwisa, vamwe vaifanira kubatidza moto unobuda utsi huzhinji muguta, uye ipapo varume veisraeri vaizovashandukira pakurwa. vabhenjamini vakanga vatotanga kuuraya varume veisraeri (vanenge makumi matatu), uye vakati, “tiri kuvakunda sapahondo yokutanga.” asi utsi pahwakatanga kukwira kubva muguta, vabhenjamini vakacheuka vakaona utsi hweguta rose huchikwira kudenga. ipapo varume veisraeri vakavadzokera, uye varume vebhenjamini vakavhundutswa, nokuti vakaziva kuti njodzi yakanga yavawira. saka vakatiza pamberi pavaisraeri nenzira inoenda kurenje, asi havana kugona kupunyuka pahondo. uye varume veisraeri vakabuda kubva mumaguta vakavauraya ipapo. vakakomba vabhenjamini, vakavadzinganisa vakavabata nyore nyore pedyo negibhea nechokumabvazuva. vabhenjamini zviuru gumi nezvisere vakafa, vose vaiva varwi voumhare. vakati vadzoka vakatiza vakananga kurenje kuruware rwarimoni, vaisraeri vakauraya varume zviuru zvishanu (mumigwagwa). vakaramba vachitevera vabhenjamini kusvikira pagidhomi uye vakaurayazve vamwe zviuru zviviri. pazuva iroro, kwakafa varume vabhenjamini veminondo zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu, vose varwi voumhare. asi varume mazana matanhatu vakatendeuka vakatizira murenje kuruware rwerimoni, kwavakandogara kwemwedzi mina. varume veisraeri vakadzokera kubhenjamini uye vakaparadza maguta ose nomunondo, kusanganisira mhuka nezvimwe zvose zvavakawana. maguta ose avakaona vakaapisa.

21

varume veisraeri vakanga vaita mhiko pamizipa vachiti: “hapana mumwe wedu acharoodza mwanasikana wake kumubhenjamini.” vanhu vakaenda kubheteri, uko kwavakagara pamberi paallah kusvikira madekwana, vachisimudza manzwi avo uye vachichema zvikuru. vakachema vachiti, “haiwa yeahoh, allah waisraeri, seiko izvi zvakaitika kuisraeri? seiko rumwe rudzi rwashayikwa muisraeri nhasi?” mangwanani ezuva rakatevera, vanhu vakavaka aritari vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. ipapo vaisraeri vakabvunza vakati, “ndianiko kubva kumarudzi ose aisraeri akatadza kuungana navamwe pamberi payeahoh?” nokuti vakanga vaita mhiko kuti ani zvake anotadza kuungana navamwe pamberi payeahoh pamizipa anofanira kuurayiwa zvirokwazvo. zvino vaisraeri vakasuwa nokuda kwehama dzavo, vabhenjamini. vakati, “nhasi rumwe rudzi rwabviswa pana israeri. tichapa seiko vakadzi kuna avo vakasara, sezvo takapika kuna yeahoh kuti tirege kupa upi zvake wavanasikana vedu kuti awanikwe navo.” ipapo vakabvunza vakati, “ndavapiko pamarudzi aisraeri vakatadza kuungana navamwe pamberi payeahoh pamizipa?” vakawana kuti kwakanga kusina munhu aibva kujabheshi gireadhi akanga auya kumusasa kuungano. nokuti vakati vaverenga vanhu, vakaona kuti kwakanga kusina munhu wejabheshi gireadhi akanga aripo. saka ungano yakatuma varume vehondo zviuru gumi nezviviri vakavarayira kuti vaende kujabheshi gireadhi vandouraya nomunondo vanhu vaigarako, kusanganisira vakadzi navana. vakati, “hezvi zvamunofanira kuita: urayai murume mumwe nomumwe nomukadzi mumwe nomumwe asiri mhandara.” vakawana pakati pavanhu vaigara mujabheshi gireadhi mhandara mazana mana vakanga vasina kumbovata navarume, vakaenda navo kumusasa pashiro mukenani. ipapo ungano yose yakatuma nhume neshoko rorugare kuvabhenjamini paruware rwerimoni. saka vabhenjamini vakadzoka panguva iyoyo vakapiwa vakadzi vejabheshi gireadhi vakanga vasara. asi vakanga vasina kuvakwanira vose. vanhu vakasuwa nokuda kwebhenjamini, nokuti yeahoh akanga aisa mukaha mumarudzi avaisraeri. uye vakuru veungano vakati, “sezvo vakadzi vebhenjamini vakaparadzwa, tichawanira seiko varume vakasara vakadzi?” vakati, “vabhenjamini vakasara vanofanira kuva navadyi venhaka kuitira kuti rudzi rwaisraeri rurege kurova. hatigoni kuvapa vanasikana vedu kuti vave vakadzi vavo sezvo isu vaisraeri takapika tichiti, ‘ngaatukwe munhu anopa mukadzi kumubhenjamini.’ asi tarirai, kune mutambo wayeahoh wegore negore pashiro, nechokumusoro kwebheteri, kumabvazuva omugwagwa unobva kubheteri uchienda kushekemu, nezasi kwerebhona.” saka vakarayira vabhenjamini vakati, “endai mundovanda muminda yemizambiringa uye mutarire. vasikana veshiro pavanobuda kuti vandotamba navamwe, ipapo mumhanye muchibva muminda yemizambiringa mumwe nomumwe wenyu azvitorere mukadzi kubva kuvasikana veshiro mugoenda henyu kunyika yavabhenjamini. madzibaba avo kana hanzvadzi dzavo pavanouya kuzomhanʼara kwatiri, isu tichati kwavari, ‘tiitirei henyu zvakanaka nokuvabatsira, nokuti hatina kuvawanira vakadzi panguva yehondo, uye imi hamuna mhosva, sezvo musina kupa vanasikana venyu kwavari.’ ” saka ndizvo zvakaitwa navabhenjamini. vasikana vachiri kutamba, murume mumwe nomumwe akabata musikana ndokuenda naye kuti ave mukadzi wake. ipapo vakadzokera kunhaka yavo uye vakavakazve maguta vakagara maari. panguva iyoyo vaisraeri vakabva panzvimbo iyo vakaenda kumusha kumarudzi avo nokudzimba dzavo, mumwe nomumwe kunhaka yake pachake. mumazuva iwayo kwakanga kusina mambo pakati paisraeri; mumwe nomumwe aiita zvaaifunga kuti zvakanaka.

1_samuel

1

zvino kwakanga kuno mumwe murume weramataimu, muzufi, wenyika yamakomo yaefuremu, ainzi erikana, mwanakomana wajerohamu, mwanakomana waerihu, mwanakomana watohu, mwanakomana wazufi muefuremu. aiva navakadzi vaviri; mumwe ainzi hana mumwe achinzi penina. penina akanga ana vana asi hana akanga asina. gore negore murume uyu aibuda achibva muguta rake kuti andonamata nokubayira zvibayiro kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose pashiro, hofini nafinehasi, vanakomana vaeri, vari vaprista vayeahoh. nguva dzose zuva rokuti erikana abayire chibayiro raiti kana rasvika, aipa migove yenyama kumukadzi wake penina nokuvanakomana vake navanasikana vake vose. asi aipa hana mugove wakapetwa kaviri nokuti aimuda, uye yeahoh akanga azarira chibereko chake. zvino nokuti yeahoh akanga azarira chibereko chake, muvengi wake penina akaramba achingomudenha kuti amutsamwise. izvi zvakaitika gore negore. nguva dzose hana paaienda kuimba yayeahoh, muvengi wake aimudenha kusvikira achema obva atadza kudya. murume wake erikana aibva ati kwaari, “hana, uri kuchemei? sei usingadyi? wakasuwa neiko? handikoshi here kwauri kudarika vanakomana gumi?” vakati vachangopedza kudya nokunwa mushiro, hana akasimuka. zvino eri muprista akanga akagara pachigaro pamukova wetemberi yayeahoh. nokurwadziwa kwomwoyo, hana akachema zvikuru akanamata kuna yeahoh. uye akaita mhiko achiti, “yeahoh wamasimba ose, dai mukangotarira bedzi pamusoro pokutambura kwomuranda wenyu mugondirangarira, mugorega kukanganwa muranda wenyu asi mumupe mwanakomana, ipapo ndichamupa kuna yeahoh kwamazuva ose oupenyu hwake, uye hakuna chisvo chichashandiswa pamusoro wake.” zvaakaramba achinamata kuna yeahoh, eri akacherechedza muromo wake. hana akanga achinamata mumwoyo make uye miromo yake yakanga ichifamba asi inzwi rake rakanga risinganzwiki. eri akafunga kuti akanga akadhakwa, akati kwaari, “ucharamba uchidhakwa kusvika riniko? siyana newaini yako.” hana akapindura akati, “kwete, ishe wangu, ndiri mukadzi ane shungu pamweya. ndanga ndisinganwi waini kana doro; ndanga ndichidurura mwoyo wangu kuna yeahoh. musatora muranda wenyu somukadzi akaipa; ndanga ndichinyengetera pano zvichibva mukushushikana nokutambudzika kwangu kukuru.” eri akapindura achiti, “enda norugare, uye allah waisraeri ngaakupe zvawakumbira kwaari.” akati, “murandakadzi wenyu ngaawane nyasha pamberi penyu.” ipapo akaenda hake akandodya, uye uso hwake hahuna kuzoramba hwakasuruvara. mangwanani omusi waitevera vakamuka vakanamata pamberi payeahoh vakadzokera kumusha kwavo kurama. erikana akasangana nahana mukadzi wake, yeahoh akamurangarira. naizvozvo nokufamba kwenguva, hana akabata pamuviri akabereka mwana mukomana. akamutumidza zita rokuti samueri, achiti, “nokuti ndakamukumbira kuna yeahoh.” zvino murume uyu erikana paakaenda nemhuri yake yose kundopa zvibayiro zvapagore kuna yeahoh nokundozadzisa mhiko yake, hana haana kuenda. akati kumurume wake, “mushure mokunge mukomana uyu ndamurumura, ndichamutora ndigomupa kuna yeahoh, uye achagara ikoko nguva dzose.” erikana murume wake akati kwaari, “ita zvaunoona zvakakunakira. gara pano kusvikira wamurumura; dai yeahoh asimbisa shoko rake bedzi.” naizvozvo mukadzi uyu akagara kumba akarera mwanakomana wake kusvikira amurumura. mushure mokunge arumurwa, akatora mukomana uyu, ari mudiki sezvaaiva, pamwe chete nehando yamakore matatu neefa youpfu hwakatsetseka nedende rewaini, uye akaenda naye kuimba yayeahoh kushiro. vakati vauraya hando, vakaenda nomukomana kuna eri, uye hana akati kwaari, “zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwenyu ishe wangu, ndini mukadzi uya akamira parutivi penyu ndichinyengetera kuna yeahoh. ndakakumbira mwana uyu, uye yeahoh andipa zvandakamukumbira. saka iye zvino ndinomupa kuna yeahoh. kwoupenyu hwake hwose achapiwa kuna yeahoh.” uye akanamata yeahoh ipapo.

2

ipapo hana akanyengetera achiti: “mwoyo wangu unofara muna yeahoh; muna yeahoh runyanga rwangu rwasimudzirwa kumusoro. muromo wangu unotaura usingatyi pamusoro pavavengi vangu, nokuti ndinofarira ruponeso rwenyu. “hakuna mutsvene akaita sayeahoh; hakuna mumwe kunze kwenyu; hakuna dombo rakaita saallah wedu. “usaramba uchitaura uchizvikudza uye manyawi ngaarege kubuda mumuromo mako, nokuti yeahoh ndiallah anoziva, uye naye mabasa anoyerwa. “uta hwavarwi hwatyorwa, asi avo vakagumburwa vashongedzwa simba. avo vaiva vakaguta vakandoshandira zvokudya zvavo, asi avo vaiva nenzara havachanzwi nzara zvakare. uyo aiva asingabereki abereka vana vanomwe, asi iye akanga ana vana vazhinji oshayiwa simba. “yeahoh ndiye anouraya uye ndiye anoraramisa; anodzikisa kuguva uye anomutsawo. yeahoh ndiye anopa urombo uye noupfumi; uye anoninipisa uye anosimudzira. anosimudza varombo kubva paguruva uye anosimudza vanoshaya kubva padurunhuru ramadota; anovagarisa namachinda uye anovaita kuti vagare nhaka yechigaro choumambo chokukudzwa. “nokuti nheyo dzenyika ndedzayeahoh, pamusoro padzo akamisa nyika. acharinda tsoka dzavatsvene vake, asi vakaipa vachanyaradzwa murima. “nokuti hakuna munhu achakunda nesimba rake. avo vanopikisa yeahoh vachaparadzwa. achavatinhirira ari kudenga; yeahoh achatonga magumo enyika. “achapa simba kuna mambo wake, uye achasimudzira runyanga rwomuzodziwa wake.” zvino erikana akaenda kumusha kwake kurama, asi mukomana akashumira pamberi payeahoh ari pasi paeri muprista. vanakomana vaeri vakanga vari vanhu vakaipa; vakanga vasina hanya nayeahoh. zvino yakanga iri tsika yavaprista kuvanhu kuti munhu paaibayira chibayiro uye nyama ichiri kubikwa, muranda womuprista aiuya neforogo ine zvibayiso zvitatu muruoko rwake. aiinyudza mugango, kana muhadyana, kana mugate kana mupoto, ipapo muprista ozvitorera chero zvainge zvabudiswa neforogo. aya ndiwo mabatiro avaiita nawo vaisraeri vose vaiuya kushiro. asi, kunyange mafuta asati atsva, muranda womuprista aiuya achiti kumurume aibayira chibayiro, “ipa muprista nyama yokugocha; haasi kuzogamuchira nyama yakabikwa kubva kwauri, asi mbishi chete.” kana murume uya aiti kwaari, “rega mafuta ambotanga atsva uye iwe ugozotora chero zvaunoda,” muranda aibva apindura achiti, “kwete, ndipe kuno izvozvi; kana ukasandipa ndichaitora nechisimba.” ichi chivi chamajaya aya chaiva chakakura kwazvo pamberi payeahoh, nokuti vaizvidza chipo chayeahoh. asi samueri aishumira pamberi payeahoh, mukomana aive akapfeka efodhi yomucheka. gore rimwe nerimwe, mai vake vaimuitira nguo diki uye vaienda nayo kwaari pavaienda nomurume wavo kundopa chibayiro chegore. eri aibva aropafadza erikana nomukadzi wake achiti, “yeahoh ngaakupe vana nomukadzi uyu kuti vatore nzvimbo youyo waakakumbira uye akamupa kuna yeahoh.” ipapo vaibva vaenda kumusha kwavo. zvino yeahoh akava nenyasha kuna hana; akabata pamuviri akabereka vanakomana vatatu navanasikana vaviri. zvichakadaro, mukomana uyu samueri akakura ari pamberi payeahoh. zvino eri, uyo akanga akwegura kwazvo, akanzwa zvose zvaiitwa navanakomana vake kuvaisraeri vose zvokuti vairara namadzimai aishumira pasuo retende rokusangana. saka akati kwavari, “sei muchiita zvinhu zvakadai? ndinonzwa navanhu vose pamusoro pezviito zvenyu zvakaipa izvi. kwete, vana vangu; harisi shoko rakanaka randinonzwa richipararira pakati pavanhu vayeahoh. kana munhu akatadzira mumwe munhu, allah angamumiririre, asi kana munhu akatadzira yeahoh, ndiani angamumiririre?” kunyange zvakadaro, vanakomana vake havana kuteerera kutsiura kwababa vavo, nokuti kwaiva kuda kwayeahoh kuti avauraye. zvino mukomana uyu samueri akaramba achikura pamumhu uye napakudiwa nayeahoh navanhu. zvino munhu waallah akauya kuna eri akati kwaari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘handina kuzviratidza pachena kuimba yababa vako here pavaiva muijipiti pasi pafaro? ndakasarudza baba vako kubva kumarudzi ose aisraeri kuti vave muprista wangu, kuti vakwire kuaritari yangu, kundopisa zvinonhuhwira, uye kuti vapfeke efodhi pamberi pangu. ndakapawo imba yababa vako zvose zvipiriso zvaipiswa navaisraeri. sei muchizvidza chibayiro changu nechipiriso changu, zvandakarayira mumba mangu? sei muchikudza vanakomana venyu kudarika ini nokuzvikudza pachenyu nezvikamu zvakanakisisa zvezvipiriso zvose zvinopiwa navanhu vangu veisraeri?’ “naizvozvo yeahoh, allah weisraeri, anoti, ‘ndakavimbisa kuti imba yako neimba yababa vako dzichashumira pamberi pangu nokusingaperi.’ asi zvino yeahoh anoti, ‘ngazvive kure neni! avo vanondikudza ndichavakudza, asi avo vanondizvidza vachadzikisiswa. nguva iri kuuya yandichagura simba rako nesimba reimba yababa vako, zvokuti hakuchazova nomutana mumhuri yako uye uchaona kutambudzika muimba yangu. kunyange zvazvo zvakanaka zvichizoitirwa israeri, mumhuri yako hamuzofi makava nomutana. mumwe nomumwe wenyu wandisingabvisi paaritari yangu achasiyiwa kuti apofumadze meso enyu nemisodzi uye kuti arwadzise mwoyo yenyu, uye zvizvarwa zvako zvose zvichafa zvichine simba. “ ‘uye zvichaitika kuvanakomana vako vaviri, hofini nafinehasi zvichava chiratidzo kwauri, vachafa vose zuva rimwe chete. ndichazvimutsira muprista akatendeka, achaita zvinoenderana nezviri mumwoyo mangu nomundangariro dzangu. ndichamisa imba yake zvakasimba, uye achashumira pamberi pomuzodziwa wangu nguva dzose. ipapo wose achasara mumhuri yako achauya agokotama pamberi pake kuti apiwe mari yesirivha nechimedu chechingwa agokumbirisa achiti, “dondipaiwo rimwe basa rouprista kuti ndingowana zvokudya.” ’ ”

3

mukomana uyu samueri aishumira pamberi payeahoh ari pasi paeri. mumazuva iwayo shoko rayeahoh rakanga risinganzwiki zvakanyanya, kwakanga kusina zviratidzo zvizhinji. rimwe zuva usiku, eri akanga akavata panzvimbo yake yamazuva ose, uye meso ake akanga oonera madzerere, asisagoni kuona zvakanaka. mwenje waallah wakanga usati wadzimwa, uye samueri akanga akarara pasi mutemberi yayeahoh, maiva neareka yaallah. ipapo yeahoh akadana samueri. samueri akadavira achiti, “ndiri pano.” akamhanya kuna eri akasvikoti, “ndiri pano, nokuti mandidana.” eri akati, “handina kukudana; dzokera unorara.” saka akaenda akanorara. yeahoh akadana zvakare achiti, “samueri!” uye samueri akasimuka akaenda kuna eri akati, “ndiri pano, nokuti mandidana.” eri akati, “mwanakomana wangu, handina kukudana; dzokera unorara.” zvino samueri akanga asati aziva yeahoh. shoko rayeahoh rakanga risati razarurirwa kwaari. yeahoh akadana samueri kechitatu, samueri akasimuka akaenda kuna eri akati, “ndiri pano, nokuti mandidana.” ipapo eri akaona kuti yeahoh akanga achidana mukomana uyu. saka eri akaudza samueri kuti, “enda unorara pasi, kana akakudana, uti, ‘taurai yeahoh, nokuti muranda wenyu akateerera.’ ” saka samueri akaenda akandorara pasi, panzvimbo yake. yeahoh akauya akamirapo, akadana sapanguva dzimwe dzose achiti, “samueri! samueri!” ipapo samueri akati, “taurai, nokuti muranda wenyu akateerera.” zvino yeahoh akati kuna samueri, “tarira, ndava kuda kuita chimwe chinhu muisraeri chichaita kuti nzeve dzavose vanochinzwa dziunge. panguva iyoyo ndichaitira eri zvose zvandakataura pamusoro peimba yake kubva kumavambo kusvika kumagumo. nokuti ndakamuudza kuti ndichatonga mhuri yake nokusingaperi nokuda kwechivi chaaiziva pamusoro pacho, vanakomana vake vakazvigadzirira kutukwa asi iye haana kuvadzora. naizvozvo ndakatsidza kuimba yaeri ndichiti, ‘mhosva yeimba yaeri haingayananisirwi nechibayiro kana nechipo.’ ” samueri akarara kusvika mangwanani uye akazozarura misuo yeimba yayeahoh. akatya kuudza eri chiratidzo chake, asi eri akamudana akati, “samueri, mwanakomana wangu.” samueri akapindura akati, “ndiri pano.” eri akabvunza akati, “wakaudzweiko nayeahoh? usandivanzira hako. allah ngaakurange zvakanyanya kana ukandivanzira kana chinhu chimwe zvacho chaakakuudza.” saka samueri akamuudza zvose, akasamuvanzira chinhu. ipapo eri akati, “ndiyeahoh, regai aite zvaanoona zvakanaka.” samueri akakura uye yeahoh aiva naye; uye yeahoh haana kurega kunyange shoko rake rimwe chete richiwira pasi. uye israeri yose kubva kudhani kusvika kubheerishebha vakaziva kuti samueri akanga asimbiswa somuprofita wayeahoh. yeahoh akaramba achionekwa pashiro, uye ipapo akazviratidza kuna samueri kubudikidza neshoko rake.

4

uye shoko rasamueri rakasvika kuisraeri yose. zvino vaisraeri vakaenda kundorwa navafiristia. vaisraeri vakaungana paebhenezeri, vafiristia vakavaka misasa yavo paafeki. vafiristia vakagadzirira varwi vavo kuti vandosangana neisraeri, uye hondo payakanga yava kupararira, israeri yakakundwa navafiristia avo vakauraya varume zviuru zvina zvavo pavairwira. varwi pavakadzoka kumusasa, vakuru veisraeri vakabvunza vakati, “sei yeahoh aita kuti tikundwe nhasi pamberi pavafiristia? ngatitorei areka yesungano yayeahoh kubva kushiro, kuti igoenda nesu uye igotiponesa kubva muruoko rwavavengi vedu.” naizvozvo vanhu vakatuma varume kushiro, uye vakadzosa areka yayeahoh wamasimba ose uye agere pachigaro choushe pakati pamakerubhi. zvino vanakomana vaviri vaeri, hofini nafinehasi, vaivapo neareka yesungano yaallah. areka yesungano yayeahoh payakauya mumusasa, israeri yose yakapururudza uye vakaita ruzha rukuru zvokuti pasi pakatinhira. pavakanzwa mheremhere, vafiristia vakabvunza vakati, “mheremhere iri mumusasa wavahebheru ndeyei?” vakati vazvinzwa kuti areka yayeahoh yakanga yauya mumusasa, vafiristia vakatya. vakati, “allah asvika mumusasa. tava munhamo! hapana chinhu chakadai seichi chati chamboitika. tine nhamo! ndianiko achatirwira pamaoko avamwari ava vane simba? ndivo vamwari vakarova vaijipita namarudzi ose amatambudziko mugwenga. simbai vafiristia! ivai varume, mukasadaro muchava varanda vavahebheru sezvavakanga vakaita kwamuri. ivai varume, murwe!” saka vafiristia vakarwa, vaisraeri vakakundwa uye munhu wose akatiza achidzokera kutende rake. pakava nokuurayiwa kukuru; israeri yakarasikirwa navarwi vetsoka zviuru makumi matatu. areka yayeahoh yakapambwa uye vanakomana vaviri vaeri, hofini nafinehasi, vakafa. zuva rimwe chetero, mumwe murume webhenjamini akamhanya achibva kuhondo akaenda kushiro, nguo dzake dzakabvaruka uye ane guruva pamusoro wake. paakasvikako, eri akanga akagara pachigaro chake parutivi rwenzira, akangotarisa, nokuti mwoyo wake waityira areka yayeahoh. murume uyu paakapinda muguta akataura zvakanga zvaitika, guta rose rakachema. eri akanzwa kuchema akandobvunza achiti, “mheremhere iyi yose ndeyeiko?” murume uyu akachimbidza kuenda kuna eri, akanga ava namakore makumi mapfumbamwe namasere okuberekwa uye meso ava norutara zvokuti akanga asisaoni. akati kuna eri, “ndiri kubva kuhondo izvozvi; ndatotizako nhasi chaiye.” eri akabvunza akati, “chiiko chaitika mwanakomana wangu?” murume akauya neshoko akapindura achiti, “israeri yatiza vafiristia, uye hondo yarasikirwa zvikuru. uyewo vanakomana venyu vaviri hofini nafinehasi vafa, uye areka yaallah yapambwa.” paakataura nezveareka yaallah, eri akawa negotsi kubva pachigaro chake parutivi rwesuo. mutsipa wake wakatyoka akabva afa nokuti aiva murume akanga akwegura uye ari mukobvu. akanga atungamirira israeri kwamakore makumi mana. muroora wake, mukadzi wafinehasi, akanga ane pamuviri ava pedyo nokuda kubatsirwa. paakanzwa nhau idzi dzokuti areka yayeahoh yakanga yapambwa uye kuti vatezvara vake nomurume wake vakanga vafa, akarwadziwa napamuviri akabereka mwana, asi akakurirwa namarwadzo ake pakusununguka. paakanga ava kufa madzimai aimubatsira akati, “usaora mwoyo wabatsirwa nomwana mukomana.” asi haana kumbopindura kana kuzviteerera. akatumidza mukomana uyu kuti ikabhodhi, achiti, “kubwinya kwabva muisraeri,” nokuda kwokutorwa kweareka yaallah uye nokufa kwatezvara vake nomurume wake. akati, “kubwinya kwabva muisraeri, nokuti areka yaallah yapambwa.”

5

mushure mokunge vafiristia vapamba areka yaallah, vakaitora kubva kuebhenezeri vakaenda nayo kuashidhodhi. ipapo vakatakura areka vakapinda nayo mutemberi yadhagoni vakaiisa parutivi rwadhagoni. vanhu veashidhodhi pavakamuka mangwanani-ngwanani zuva raitevera, wanei hoyo dhagoni akawira pasi nechiso pamberi peareka yayeahoh! vakatora dhagoni vakamudzosera panzvimbo yake. asi mangwanani aitevera pavakamuka wanei hoyo dhagoni akawira pasi nechiso pamberi peareka yayeahoh! musoro wake namaoko zvakanga zvadimbuka zvisisipo uye zviri pasi pachikumbaridzo chomukova, muviri wake bedzi ndiwo wakanga wangosara. ndokusaka kusvika nanhasi kusina vaprista vadhagoni kana vamwewo zvavo vanopinda mutemberi yadhagoni paashidhodhi vanotsika pachikumbaridzo chomukova. ruoko rwaallah rwakatambudza zvikuru vanhu veashidhodhi nenzvimbo dzakaikomberedza; akauyisa kuparadzwa pamusoro pavo uye akavarova namamota. vanhu veashidhodhi pavakaona zvakanga zvichiitika vakati, “areka yaallah weisraeri haifaniri kugara pano nesu nokuti ruoko rwake rwatitambudza zvikuru isu nadhagoni mwari wedu.” saka vakadana pamwe chete vatongi vose vavafiristia vakavabvunza vachiti, “toitei neareka yaallah weisraeri?” vakapindura vachiti, “itai kuti areka yaallah weisraeri iendeswe kugati.” saka vakabvisa areka yaallah weisraeri. asi mushure mokunge vaibvisa, ruoko rwaallah rwakarwisana neguta iroro, uye akarivhundutsa nokuvhundutsa kukuru. akarova vanhu veguta iroro, vakuru navadiki, namamota. saka vakaendesa areka yaallah kuekironi. areka yaallah payakanga yava kupinda muekironi, vanhu veekironi vakadanidzira, vachiti, “vauyisa areka yaallah weisraeri kuti vatiuraye isu navanhu vedu.” saka vakadana pamwe chete vatongi vose vavafiristia vakati, “dzoserai areka yaallah weisraeri kwakare, regai idzokere kunzvimbo kwayo, nokuti ichatiuraya isu navanhu vedu.” nokuti rufu rwakanga rwazadza guta nokuvhunduka; ruoko rwaallah rwakanga rwaritambudza zvikuru. avo vasina kufa vakarohwa namamota uye kuchema kweguta kwakakwira kudenga.

6

areka yayeahoh yakati yava nemwedzi minomwe iri munyika yavafiristia, vafiristia vakadana vaprista navavuki vakati, “toitei neareka yayeahoh? tiudzei kuti toidzosera sei kunzvimbo yayo.” vakapindura vachiti, “kana muchidzosera areka yamwari weisraeri, musaidzosera isina chinhu, asi edzai nepamunogona kumutumira chipiriso chemhosva. ipapo muchaporeswa, uye muchaziva kuti sei ruoko rwake rusina kubviswa pamusoro penyu.” vafiristia vakabvunza vakati, “chipiriso chemhosva chatinofanira kumutumira ndecheiko?” vakapindura vachiti, “mamota mashanu egoridhe nembeva shanu dzegoridhe, zvichienderana nouwandu hwavatongi vavafiristia, nokuti nedenda rimwe chetero akakurovai imi navatongi venyu. itai zviumbwa zvamamota nembeva dzacho, izvo zviri kuparadza nyika, uye mugopa kukudzwa kuna allah weisraeri. zvikada achasimudza ruoko rwake kubva pamuri napana vamwari venyu nenyika yenyu. sei muchiomesa mwoyo yenyu sezvakaitwa navaijipita nafaro? paakavabata nehasha, havana kubudisa vaisraeri here kuti vaende? “naizvozvo torai mugadzirire ngoro itsva, nemhou mbiri dzinonwisa uye dzisina kumbosungwa pajoko. sungai mhou pangoro, asi torai mhuru dzadzo mugodzipfigira muchirugu. torai areka yayeahoh mugoiisa pangoro, uye mubhokisi parutivi payo isai zviumbwa zvegoridhe zvamuri kutumirako kwaari sechipo chemhosva. mugoituma iende, asi, murambe makaitarisa. kana ikakwidza kuenda kunyika yayo, kwakadziva kubhetishemeshi, zvoreva kuti yeahoh ndiye anenge auyisa njodzi pamusoro pedu. asi kana ikarega, ipapo tichaziva kuti harusi ruoko rwake rwakatirova uye kuti zvakangotiwirawo.” saka vakaita izvi. vakatora mhou mbiri dzakadai vakadzisungirira pangoro uye vakapfigira mhuru dzadzo muchirugu. vakaisa areka yayeahoh pangoro pamwe chete nebhokisi rakanga rine mbeva dzegoridhe nezviumbwa zvamamota. ipapo mhou dzakakwidza kuenda bhetishemeshi, dzakati tande nenzira uye dzichikuma nzira yose; hadzina kutendeukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. vatongi vavafiristia vakadzitevera kusvikira kumuganhu webhetishemeshi. zvino vanhu vebhetishemeshi vakanga vachikohwa gorosi ravo mumupata, uye pavakasimudza misoro yavo vakaona areka, uye vakafara nokuiona. ngoro yakauya kumunda wayeahoshua webhetishemeshi uye ipapo yakamira parutivi rwedombo guru. vanhu vakatema-tema mapuranga engoro uye vakabayira mhou idzi sechipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh. varevhi vakaburutsa areka yayeahoh, pamwe chete nebhokisi raiva nezviumbwa zvegoridhe, vakazvigadzika padombo guru. musi iwoyo vanhu vebhetishemeshi vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa vakabayira zvibayiro kuna yeahoh. vatongi vashanu vavafiristia vakaona zvose izvi vakadzokera kuekironi musi iwoyo. aya ndiwo mamota egoridhe akatumirwa navafiristia sechipiriso chemhosva kuna yeahoh, rimwe kuashidhodhi, rimwe kugaza, rimwe kuashikeroni, rimwe kugati nerimwe kuekironi. uye uwandu hwembeva dzegoridhe hwaienderana nouwandu hwamaguta avafiristia akanga ari avatongi vashanu, maguta aiva namasvingo nemisha yawo yomumaruwa. dombo guru ravakagadzika areka yayeahoh, riripo nanhasi sechapupu mumunda wayeahoshua webhetishemeshi. asi allah akauraya vamwe vavarume vebhetishemeshi, akauraya vanhu makumi manomwe vavo nokuti vakanga vadongorera mukati meareka yayeahoh. vanhu vakachema nokuti yeahoh akanga auraya vanhu nokuuraya kukuru, uye varume vebhetishemeshi vakabvunza vachiti, “ndiani angamira pamberi payeahoh, allah uyu mutsvene? areka iyi ichaenda kuna ani ichibva pano?” ipapo vakatumira nhume kuvanhu vekiriati jearimi vachiti, “vafiristia vadzosa areka yayeahoh. dzikai kuno muzoitora kuti muende nayo kwenyu.”

7

saka varume vekiriati jearimi vakauya vakatora areka yayeahoh. vakaiendesa kuimba yaabhinadhabhi pachikomo uye vakatsaura ereazari mwanakomana wake kuti achengete areka yayeahoh. areka yakaramba iri pakiriati jearimi kwenguva yakareba kwazvo, makore makumi maviri pamwe chete, uye vanhu vose veisraeri vakachema uye vakatsvaka yeahoh. ipapo samueri akati kuimba yeisraeri, “kana muchidzokera kuna yeahoh nemwoyo yenyu yose, zvino chibvisai pakati penyu vamwari vavatorwa navaashitoreti mugozvikumikidza kuna yeahoh uye mumushumire iye bedzi, uye achakudzikinurai kubva muruoko rwavafiristia.” saka vaisraeri vakarasa vose vabhaari vavo navaashitoreti, vakashumira yeahoh chete. ipapo samueri akati, “unganidzai israeri yose pamizipa uye ndichakukumbirirai kuna yeahoh.” vakati vaungana pamizipa, vakachera mvura vakaidururira pamberi payeahoh. nomusi iwoyo vakatsanya ipapo vakareurura vachiti, “takatadzira yeahoh.” uye samueri akava mutungamiri weisraeri yose pamizipa. vafiristia vakati vanzwa kuti israeri yakanga yaungana pamizipa, vatungamiri vavafiristia vakauya kuzovarwisa. zvino vaisraeri vakati vazvinzwa, vakatya nokuda kwavafiristia. vakati kuna samueri, “musarega henyu kuramba muchidanidzira kuna yeahoh allah nokuda kwedu, kuti atirwire pamaoko avafiristia.” ipapo samueri akatora gwayana rainwa akaribayira sechipiriso chinopiswa kuna yeahoh. akachema kuna yeahoh pamusoro peisraeri, yeahoh akamupindura. samueri paakanga achibayira chipiriso chinopiswa, vafiristia vakaswedera pedyo kuti varwise israeri. asi zuva iroro yeahoh akatinhira nokutinhira kukuru pamberi pavafiristia akavavhundutsa zvokuti vakakundwa pamberi pavaisraeri. varume veisraeri vakachimbidza kubuda mumizipa vakadzingirira vafiristia, vakavauraya munzira kusvikira kunzvimbo iri zasi kwebhetikari. ipapo samueri akatora dombo akarimisa pakati pemizipa nesheni. akaritumidza kuti ebhenezeri akati, “yeahoh akatibatsira kusvikira pano.” saka vafiristia vakakurirwa uye havana kuzorwisa nyika yavaisraeri zvakare. uye ruoko rwayeahoh rwakarwa navafiristia mazuva ose asamueri. maguta anobva kuekironi kusvikira kugati akanga apambwa navafiristia kubva kuisraeri akadzorerwa kwairi, uye israeri yakasunungura rimwe dunhu rayo kubva muruoko rwavafiristia. uye pakazova norunyararo pakati peisraeri navaamori. samueri akaramba ari mutongi weisraeri kwoupenyu hwake hwose. gore negore aitenderera kubva kubheteri achienda kugirigari nokumizipa, achitonga israeri munzvimbo dzose idzodzo. asi aipota achidzokera kurama, kwaiva nomusha wake, uye ikokowo akatonga israeri. uye akavakira yeahoh aritari ikoko.

8

samueri akati akwegura, akagadza vanakomana vake kuti vave vatongi veisraeri. zita redangwe rake rainzi joere uye zita rowechipiri rainzi abhia, uye vaishanda vari pabheerishebha. asi vanakomana vake vakatsaukira kupfuma yakaipa, vakatambira fufuro, vakasaruramisira pakutonga. saka vakuru vose veisraeri vakaungana pamwe chete vakauya kuna samueri parama. vakati kwaari, “makwegura, uye vana venyu havafambi munzira dzenyu; naizvozvo gadzai mambo kuti atitungamirire, sezvakaita mamwe marudzi ose.” asi pavakati, “tipei mambo kuti atitungamirire,” izvi hazvina kufadza samueri; saka akanyengetera kuna yeahoh. uye yeahoh akamuudza kuti: “teerera zvose zvinotaura vanhu kwauri; havana kuramba iwe, asi varamba ini samambo wavo. sezvavakaita kubva pazuva randakavabudisa muijipiti kusvikira nhasi, vachindisiya uye vachishumira vamwe vamwari, ndizvo zvavari kuita nokwauri. zvino, teerera zvavanotaura; asi uvayambire zvakasimba uye uvazivise zvichaitwa namambo achavatonga.” samueri akataura mashoko ose ayeahoh kuvanhu vakanga vachimukumbira mambo. akati, “izvi ndizvo zvichaitwa neachakutongai: achatora vanakomana venyu agoita kuti vashande nengoro dzake dzehondo namabhiza, uye vachamhanya vari mberi kwengoro dzake. vamwe vavo achavaita vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamakumi mashanu, uye achaita kuti vamwe varime minda yake pamwe chete nokuikohwa, uye achaita kuti vamwe vagadzire zvombo zvehondo nemidziyo yengoro dzake. achatora vanasikana venyu kuti vave vagadziri vamafuta anonhuhwira navabiki vezvokudya navabiki vechingwa. achatora minda yenyu yakaisvonaka neminda yemizambiringa neminda yemiorivhi agozvipa kuvatariri vake. achatora chegumi chembeu dzenyu namazambiringa enyu agozvipa kumachinda ake nevanomushandira. varandarume venyu navarandakadzi venyu nemombe dzenyu dzakaisvonaka nembongoro achazvitora kuti azvishandise pamabasa ake. achatora chegumi chamakwai enyu, uye imi pachenyu muchava nhapwa dzake. zuva iroro parichasvika muchachema kwazvo nokuda kwamambo iyeye wamazvisarudzira, uye yeahoh haazokupindurai pazuva iroro.” asi vanhu vakaramba kuteerera samueri. vakati, “kwete! tinoda mambo kuti atitonge. ipapo tichava sedzimwe nyika dzose, tiina mambo anotitungamirira nokutiendera pamberi achitirwira hondo dzedu.” samueri akati anzwa zvose zvakanga zvataurwa navanhu, akandozvitaura zvakare pamberi payeahoh. yeahoh akapindura achiti, “vateerere uye uvape mambo.” ipapo samueri akati kuvarume veisraeri, “munhu wose ngaadzokere kuguta rake.”

9

kwakanga kuno murume worudzi rwabhenjamini, ainzi kishi mwanakomana waabhieri, mwanakomana wazerori, mwanakomana wabhekorati, mwanakomana waafia mubhenjamini, murume wesimba noumhare. aiva nomwanakomana ainzi sauro, jaya raiyemurika rakanga risina akaenzana naro pakati pavaisraeri, rakanga rakareba kupfuura vose. zvino mbongoro dzakishi, baba vasauro, dzakanga dzarasika, kishi akati kuna sauro mwanakomana wake, “tora mumwe wavaranda uende naye kundotsvaga mbongoro.” saka akapfuura nomunyika yamakomo yeefuremu, akapfuurawo nomunzvimbo yakapoteredza sharisha, asi havana kudziwana. vakapfuurira mberi nomudunhu resharimu, asi mbongoro dzakanga dzisiko. ipapo akapfuura nomunyika yabhenjamini, asi havana kudziwana. pavakasvika mudunhu rezufi, sauro akati kumuranda waaiva naye, “uya tidzokere, zvimwe baba vangu vangarega kufunga nezvembongoro vakatanga kufunganya pamusoro pedu.” asi muranda akapindura achiti, “tarirai, muguta rino mune munhu waallah; anoremekedzwa zvikuru uye zvinhu zvose zvaanotaura zvinoitika. handei ikoko iye zvino. zvichida achatiudza nzira yokuenda nayo.” sauro akati kumuranda, “kana tikaenda, murume uyu tingandomupei? zvokudya zvanga zviri mumasaga edu zvapera. hatina chipo chokundopa munhu waallah. chii chatinacho?” muranda akamupindura zvakare achiti, “tarirai, ndine chikamu chimwe chete muzvina cheshekeri resirivha. ndichachipa kumunhu waallah kuti agotiudza nzira yokuenda nayo.” kare munyika yeisraeri, kana munhu achienda kundobvunza allah, aiti, “handei kumuoni,” nokuti muprofita wanhasi ainzi muoni kare. sauro akati kumuranda wake, “zvakanaka, uya tiende.” saka vakasimuka vakananga kuguta kwaiva nomunhu waallah. pavaikwira gomo kuenda kuguta iri, vakasangana navasikana vaienda kundochera mvura, vakavabvunza vachiti, “muoni aripo here?” vakapindura vachiti, “aripo. ari mberi kwenyu. kurumidzai achangosvika iye zvino muguta redu, nokuti vanhu vane chibayiro panzvimbo yakakwirira. muchingopinda muguta muchamuwana asati aenda kunzvimbo yakakwirira kundodya. vanhu havatangi kudya asati auya, nokuti anofanira kuropafadza chibayiro; mushure maizvozvo, avo vanenge vakakokwa vozodya. endai iye zvino; munofanira kumuwana nguva idzo dzino.” vakakwidza kuguta, uye pavakanga vava kupindamo vakaona samueri achiuya nokwavakanga vari, ari munzira yake achikwidza kunzvimbo yakakwirira. nezuro wacho sauro asati asvika, yeahoh akanga aratidza izvi kuna samueri: “nenguva inenge ino mangwana ndichakutumira mumwe anobva kunyika yabhenjamini. muzodze kuti ave mambo pamusoro pavanhu vangu veisraeri; achanunura vanhu vangu kubva muruoko rwavafiristia. ndatarira vanhu vangu, nokuti kuchema kwavo kwasvika kwandiri.” samueri paakangoona sauro, yeahoh akati kwaari, “uyu ndiye murume wandakataura newe pamusoro pake;
