denda zvikauya panyika, kana nyunje, kana muhuvhe, mhashu, kana ndongwe kana muvengi wavo akavakomba mune ripi zvaro ramaguta avo, zvisinei kuti inyatwa ipi kana kuti idenda ripi rauya, uye, kana munyengetero kana chikumbiro chaitwa naani zvake wavanhu venyu israeri, mumwe nomumwe achiziva zvinomutambudza mumwoyo make, akatambanudzira maoko ake kutemberi ino, ipapo inzwai muri kudenga kwamunogara. regererai mugowana zvamunoita; mugoitira mumwe nomumwe maererano nazvose zvaanoita, sezvo muchiziva mwoyo wake (nokuti imi chete ndimi munoziva zviri mumwoyo momunhu wose), kuti vakutyei mazuva ose avanorarama panyika yamakapa madzibaba edu. “zvino kana ari mutorwa, asiri wavanhu venyu israeri asi anouya achibva kunyika iri kure nokuda kwezita renyu, nokuti vanhu vachanzwa nezvezita renyu guru, ruoko rwenyu rune simba noruoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa, paanouya akanyengetera akatarisa kutemberi ino, ipapo inzwai muri kudenga kwamunogara, uye mugoita chinhu chipi nechipi chinokumbirwa kwamuri nomutorwa uyu, kuti marudzi ose enyika azive zita renyu uye agokutyai, sezvinoitwa navanhu venyu israeri, uye kuti vazive kuti imba ino yandavaka ine zita renyu. “kana vanhu venyu vakaenda kundorwa navavengi vavo, kwose kwamunovatuma, uye pavanonyengetera kuna yeahoh vakatarisa kuguta ramakasarudza netemberi yandavakira zita renyu, ipapo muri kudenga, inzwai munyengetero wavo nechikumbiro chavo, uye mugovabatsira pane zvavanorwira. “kana vakakutadzirai, nokuti hakuna munhu asingatadzi, imi mukavatsamwira, mukavaisa mumaoko omuvengi, uye akavaita nhapwa munyika yake, kure kana pedyo; uye kana vakapinduka pamwoyo munyika umo mavari nhapwa, uye vakatendeuka nokudemba kwamuri munyika yavatapi vavo, vakati, ‘takaita, zvakaipa zvisakarurama;’ uye kana vakadzokera kwamuri nomwoyo nomweya wavo wose munyika yavavengi vavo avo vakavatapa vakanyengetera kwamuri vakatarisa kunyika yamakapa madzibaba avo, vakatarisa kuguta ramakasarudza netemberi yandavakira zita renyu; ipapo, muri kudenga, kwamunogara, inzwai munyengetero wavo nechikumbiro chavo, uye mugovabatsira pane zvavanorwira. muregerere vanhu venyu, vakakutadzirai; muvaregerere pamhosva dzose dzavakapara kwamuri, mugoita kuti vakavatapa vavanzwire tsitsi; nokuti vanhu venyu nenhaka yenyu vamakabudisa kubva muijipiti, vira romoto. “meso enyu ngaaone chikumbiro chomuranda wenyu nechikumbiro chavanhu venyu israeri, uye muteerere kwavari nguva dzose pavanochema kwamuri. nokuti makavasarudza pamarudzi ose enyika kuti vave nhaka yenyu, sezvamakataura nokumuranda wenyu mozisi, imi yeahoh allah, pamakabudisa madzibaba edu kubva muijipiti.” zvino soromoni akati apedza munyengetero uyu wose nokukumbira uku kuna yeahoh, akasimuka achibva pamberi pearitari yayeahoh, paakanga akapfugama namabvi ake, maoko ake akatambanudzirwa kudenga. akamira akaropafadza ungano yose yeisraeri nenzwi guru akati: “yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, iye akapa zororo kuvanhu vake israeri sezvaakavimbisa chaizvoizvo. hapana kana shoko rimwe chete risina kuitika pazvivimbiso zvose zvakanaka zvaakapa nokumuranda wake mozisi. yeahoh allah wedu ngaave nesu sezvaaiva namadzibaba edu; ngaarege kuzotisiya kana kutirasa. ngaaite kuti mwoyo yedu yose ive yake, kuti tifambe munzira dzake dzose tichichengeta mirayiro, mitemo nezvaakareva izvo zvaakapa madzibaba edu. zvino mashoko angu aya, andanyengetera pamberi payeahoh, ngaave pedyo nayeahoh allah wedu masikati nousiku, kuti asimudzire zvinorwirwa nomuranda wake nezvinorwirwa navanhu vake israeri nezvinenge zvichidiwa zuva nezuva, kuti vanhu vose vapanyika vazive kuti yeahoh ndiallah, uye kuti hakuna mumwe. asi mwoyo yenyu inofanira kuva yakapiwa zvachose kuna yeahoh allah wedu, kuti murarame nemitemo yake uye muteerere mirayiro yake sezvamuri kuita iye zvino.” zvino mambo navaisraeri vose vakabayira zvibayiro pamberi payeahoh. soromoni akabayira chibayiro chezvipiriso zvokuwadzana kuna yeahoh; zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri zvemombe nezviuru zana namakumi maviri zvamakwai nembudzi. saizvozvo mambo navaisraeri vose vakakumikidza temberi yayeahoh. musi iwoyo mambo akakumikidza chikamu chapakati chechivanze chaiva pamberi petemberi yayeahoh, uye ndipo paakabayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa, zvipiriso zvezviyo, namafuta ezvipiriso zvokuwadzana nokuti aritari yendarira yaiva pamberi payeahoh yakanga yakanyanya kuita duku kuti ikwane zvipiriso zvinopiswa, zvipiriso zvezviyo, namafuta ezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. saka soromoni akaita mutambo uyu panguva iyoyo, neisraeri yose pamwe chete naye, ungano huru kwazvo, vanhu vachibva kurebho hamati vachisvika kuwadhi yeijipiti. vakaupemberera pamberi payeahoh allah wedu kwamazuva manomwe namamwe manomwe pamusoro, mazuva gumi namana pamwe chete. pazuva rakatevera akaita kuti vanhu vaende. vanhu vakaropafadza mambo vakaenda kumisha yavo vane rufaro mumwoyo mavo nokuda kwezvinhu zvakanaka zvose yeahoh zvaakanga aitira muranda wake dhavhidhi navanhu vake israeri.

9

zvino soromoni akati apedza kuvaka temberi yayeahoh nomuzinda wamambo nezvose zvaaida kuvaka, yeahoh akazviratidza kwaari kechipiri, sezvaakazviratidza kwaari pagibheoni. yeahoh akati kwaari: “ndanzwa munyengetero wako nechikumbiro chako chawaita pamberi pangu; temberi iyi yawavaka ndaiita tsvene, nokuisa zita rangu mairi nokusingaperi. meso angu nomwoyo wangu zvichavamo nguva dzose. “zvino iwe, kana ukafamba pamberi pangu nomwoyo wakanaka nokururama, sezvakaitwa nadhavhidhi baba vako, uye ukaita zvose zvandinorayira uye ukatevera mitemo nemirayiro yangu, ndichasimbisa chigaro chako choushe pamusoro peisraeri nokusingaperi sezvandakavimbisa dhavhidhi baba vako pandakati, ‘hapangashayikwi munhu anokutevera pachigaro choushe chaisraeri.’ “asi kana mukarega kunditevera, imi kana vana venyu, uye mukarega kuchengeta mirayiro yangu nemitemo yangu yandakaisa pamberi penyu, asi mukaenda kundoshumira vamwe vamwari uye mukavanamata, ipapo ndichaparadza israeri panyika yandakavapa ndigofuratira temberi iyi yandaita tsvene nokuda kwezita rangu. ipapo israeri ichazova chirevo nechiseko pakati pamarudzi ose avanhu. kunyange zvazvo temberi iyi ichishamisa kwazvo iye zvino, avo vachazopfuura napairi vachazoshamiswa vagoshora vachiti, ‘yeahoh aitirei chinhu chakadai kunyika iyi nokutemberi iyi?’ vanhu vachapindura vachiti, ‘nokuti vakasiya yeahoh allah wavo akabudisa madzibaba avo muijipiti, uye vakanamatira vamwe vamwari, vachivanamata nokuvashandira, ndokusaka yeahoh akauyisa dambudziko guru rakadai pavari.’ ” makore makumi maviri akati apera, panguva yakavakwa dzimba idzi mbiri nasoromoni, temberi yayeahoh nomuzinda wamambo, mambo soromoni akapa hiramu mambo wetire maguta makumi maviri mugarirea, nokuti hiramu akanga amupa misidhari, misipuresi negoridhe, zvose zvaaida. asi hiramu paakabva kutire akaenda kundoona maguta aya aakanga apiwa nasoromoni, haana kufadzwa nawo. akabvunza akati, “maguta erudzii aya awandipa, hama yangu?” naizvozvo akaatumidza zita rokuti nyika yekabhuru, rinova ndiro zita rawo nanhasi. zvino hiramu akanga atumira mambo matarenda zana namakumi maviri egoridhe. heino nhoroondo yechibharo chakashandiswa namambo soromoni pakuvaka temberi yayeahoh, muzinda wake, miro, rusvingo rwejerusarema nehazori, megidho negezeri. faro mambo weijipiti akanga arwisa uye akatora gezeri. akanga aripisa nomoto. akauraya vakenani vaigara mariri akaripa kumwanasikana wake, mukadzi wasoromoni sechipo pakuwanikwa kwake. uye soromoni akavaka gezeri patsva. akavaka bheti horoni yezasi, bhaarati, netadhimori murenje, munyika imomo, pamwe chete namaguta ake ose amatura, namaguta engoro dzake namabhiza ake, zvose zvaakada kuvaka mujerusarema, murebhanoni nomunyika yose yaaitonga. vanhu vose vakanga vasara pavaamori, vahiti, vaperizi, vahivhi navajebhusi (vanhu ava vakanga vasiri vaisraeri), vana vavo vakanga vasara munyika, vasina kugona kuparadzwa zvachose navaisraeri, ivava soromoni akavaunganidza kuti vashande savaranda vake, sezvazviri kusvikira nhasi. asi soromoni haana kuita varanda pakati pavaisraeri; ndivo vaiva mauto ake, makurukota ake ehurumende, machinda ake, vatungamiri vake vamauto, varayiri vezvengoro navachairi vengoro. ndivozve vaiva machinda makuru aiona nezvamabasa aiitwa nasoromoni, vatariri mazana mashanu namakumi mashanu vaitungamirira vanhu vaiita basa. mushure mokunge mwanasikana wafaro abva kuguta radhavhidhi akauya kumuzinda wake waakanga avakirwa nasoromoni, soromoni akavaka miro. katatu pagore soromoni akabayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuyananisa paaritari yaakanga avakira yeahoh, akapisa zvinonhuhwira pamwe chete nazvo pamberi payeahoh. saizvozvo akapedza nezvetemberi. mambo soromoni akavakawo zvikepe paezioni gebheri, iri pedyo neeroti muedhomu, pamahombekombe egungwa dzvuku. uye hiramu akatuma varanda vake, vafambisi vezvikepe vaiziva gungwa kuti vazoshandisa zvikepe pamwe chete navaranda vasoromoni. vakaenda kuofiri, vakandodzokako namazana mana namakumi maviri amatarenda egoridhe, ayo avakandopa mambo soromoni.

10

zvino mambokadzi weshebha akati anzwa nezvomukurumbira wasoromoni noukama hwake nezita rayeahoh, akauya kuzomuedza nemibvunzo yakaoma. akasvika pajerusarema navanhu vakawanda, nengamera dzakanga dzakatakura zvinonhuhwira, goridhe rakawanda kwazvo, namatombo anokosha, akauya kuna soromoni akataura naye pamusoro pezvose zvaiva mupfungwa dzake. soromoni akapindura mibvunzo yake yose; hapana chakanga chakanyanya kuomera mambo kuti amutsanangurire. mambokadzi weshebha akati aona uchenjeri hwose hwasoromoni nomuzinda waakanga avaka, zvokudya zvaiva patafura yake, urongwa hwokugara kwamachinda ake, varanda vake vaimushandira nezvipfeko zvavo, vadiri vake, nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvaaiita patemberi yayeahoh, akapererwa. akati kuna mambo, “zvose zvandakanzwa munyika mangu pamusoro pamabasa enyu nouchenjeri hwenyu zvaiva zvechokwadi. asi handina kutenda zvinhu izvi kusvikira ndauya ndikazviona nameso angu chaiwo. zvechokwadi, zvandakaudzwa hazvisviki pahafu yezviripo; muuchenjeri nomuupfumi mapfuura zvose zvandakanzwa. vanhu venyu vanofanira kuva vanofara sei! machinda enyu anofara sei, ivo vanomira pamberi penyu nguva dzose nokunzwa uchenjeri hwenyu! yeahoh allah wenyu ngaarumbidzwe, iye akafadzwa nemi akakuisai pachigaro choushe chaisraeri. yeahoh akada israeri nokusingaperi, nokuda kwaizvozvo akuitai mambo kuti muchengetedze kururamisira noutsvene.” akapa mambo matarenda zana namakumi maviri egoridhe, zvinonhuhwira kwazvo, namatombo anokosha. hapana mumwe akazouya nezvinonhuhwira zvakawanda sezvakauyiwa nazvo namambokadzi weshebha kuna mambo soromoni. zvikepe zvahiramu zvakauya negoridhe kubva kuofiri; uyewo zvakauya nemiti yemiarumugi namatombo anokosha kubva ikoko. mambo akashandisa miarumugi iyi kuita mbiru dzetemberi yayeahoh, nedzomuzinda wamambo, uye kugadzira mbira nemitengeranwa zvaishandiswa navaimbi. miti yemiarumugi yakawanda kudai haina kuzombouyiswa munyika zvakare kana kuonekwa zvakare kubvira musi iwoyo. mambo soromoni akapa mambokadzi weshebha zvaaida nezvaakakumbira, pamusoro pezvaakamupa zvaibva papfuma yake youmambo. ipapo akabva asimuka navaranda vake akadzokera kunyika yake. uremu hwegoridhe raitambirwa nasoromoni gore negore hwaisvika matarenda mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu namatanhatu, pasingaverengerwi mari yomutero yairipiswa vatengesi vakuru navatengesi vadiki, namadzimambo ose earabhia navabati venyika. mambo soromoni akaita mazana maviri enhoo huru dzegoridhe rakarohwa nenyundo; nhoo imwe neimwe yaiva yakagadzirwa namazana matanhatu amashekeri egoridhe. akaitawo mazana matatu enhoo diki dzegoridhe rakarohwa nenyundo, nhoo imwe neimwe yakagadzirwa nemamina matatu egoridhe. mambo akadziisa mumuzinda wesango rerebhanoni. mambo akaitawo chigaro chikuru choushe chenyanga dzenzou akachifukidza negoridhe rakanakisisa. chigaro ichi chaiva namatanhiko matanhatu, uye musoro wechigaro wakanga uri wedenderedzwa shure kwacho. kumativi maviri echigaro kwaiva nezvitsigiro zvamaoko zviviri, uye shumba mbiri dzakanga dzakamira pamativi ezvitsigiro zviviri izvi. shumba gumi nembiri dzakanga dzakamira pamatanhiko matanhatu, imwe chete kwaiperera danhiko rimwe nerimwe. hakuna zvakadai zvakanga zvamboitirwa humwe umambo. midziyo yose yamambo soromoni yokunwira yaiva yegoridhe rakanakisisa. hapana chakanga chakagadzirwa nesirivha, nokuti sirivha yakanga isingakoshi zvikuru mumazuva asoromoni. mambo aiva nechitsama chezvikepe zvetashishi pagungwa izvo zvaiva pamwe chete nezvikepe zvahiramu. zvikepe zvetashishi izvi zvaiuya kamwe chete mumakore matatu zviine goridhe, sirivha, nyanga dzenzou, mapikoko namakudo. mambo soromoni aikunda mamwe madzimambo ose panyika paupfumi napauchenjeri. nyika yose yakada kuzosangana nasoromoni kuti inzwe uchenjeri hwakanga waiswa mumwoyo make naallah. gore negore munhu wose aiuya nechipo, zvinhu zvakagadzirwa nesirivha nezvegoridhe, mbatya, zvombo nezvinonhuhwira, namabhiza namanyurusi. soromoni akaunganidza ngoro namabhiza; akanga ane ngoro dzinokwana chiuru namazana mana namabhiza anokwana zviuru gumi nezviviri, zvaaichengeta kumaguta engoro nomujerusarema maaivawo. mambo akaita kuti sirivha iwanikwe pose pose samatombo mujerusarema uye misidhari yakawanda kunge mionde yomuzasi mamakomo. mabhiza asoromoni aitengwa kuijipiti nokukuwe vatengesi vamambo vainoatengera kukuwe. vakatenga imwe ngoro kuijipiti namashekeri esirivha mazana matanhatu, rimwe bhiza rikaita zana namakumi mashanu. vaitengeserawo kumadzimambo avahiti navaaramu.

11

zvisinei, mambo soromoni akada vakadzi vazhinji vamamwe marudzi pamwe chete nomwanasikana wafaro, wechimoabhu, vechiamoni, vechiedhomu, vechisidhoni nevechihiti. vaiva vamarudzi ayo akanga anzi nayeahoh kuvana vaisraeri, “musaroorerane navo nokuti vachapindura mwoyo yenyu ikatevera vamwari vavo.” zvakadaro, soromoni akanamatira kwavari murudo. aiva navakadzi mazana manomwe, vanasikana vamadzimambo, navamwe varongo mazana matatu; vakadzi vake vakatsausa mwoyo wake. zvino soromoni akati akwegura, vakadzi vake vakatsausa mwoyo wake akatevera vamwe vamwari, uye mwoyo wake wakanga usina kuzvipira zvizere kuna yeahoh allah wake, sezvakanga zvakaita mwoyo wadhavhidhi baba vake. akatevera ashitoreti, mwarikadzi wavasidhoni, namoreki mwari anonyangadza wavaamoni. saka soromoni akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh; haana kutevera yeahoh zvizere sezvakanga zvaitwa nadhavhidhi baba vake. pagomo riri kumabvazuva kwejerusarema, soromoni akavakira kemoshi, mwari anonyangadza wavamoabhu nzvimbo yakakwirira, akavakirawo moreki, mwari anonyangadza wavaamoni. akaitira vakadzi vake vose vaibva kuna mamwe marudzi zvimwe chetezvo, ivo vaipisa zvinonhuhwira nokubayira zvibayiro kuna vamwari vavo. yeahoh akatsamwira soromoni nokuti mwoyo wake wakanga watsauka kubva kuna yeahoh, allah waisraeri, uyo akanga azviratidza kwaari kaviri. kunyange akanga adzivisa soromoni kutevera vamwe vamwari, soromoni haana kuchengeta murayiro wayeahoh. saka yeahoh akati kuna soromoni, “sezvo aya ari iwo mafungiro ako uye usina kuchengeta sungano yangu nemitemo yangu yandakakurayira, zvirokwazvo ndichabvarura umambo uhu ndichihubvisa kwauri ndigohupa kuno mumwe wavaranda vako. zvisinei, nokuda kwadhavhidhi baba vako, handisi kuzozviita uchiri mupenyu. ndichahubvisa kubva muruoko rwomwanakomana wako. zvakadaro hazvo, handizobvisi umambo hwose, kubva kwaari, asi ndichamupa rudzi rumwe chete nokuda kwadhavhidhi muranda wangu uye nokuda kwejerusarema, randakasarudza.” ipapo yeahoh akamutsa hadhadhi muedhomu, weimba youmambo yeedhomu kuti arwise soromoni. dhavhidhi panguva yaakanga achirwa needhomu, joabhu, mutungamiri wehondo, uyo akanga aenda kundoviga vakanga vafa, akauraya varume vose muedhomu. joabhu navaisraeri vose vakagarako kwemwedzi mitanhatu, kusvikira vauraya varume vose muedhomu. asi hadhadhi, uyo akanga achiri mukomana, akatizira kuijipiti namamwe machinda echiedhomu aimboshandira baba vake. vakasimuka vachibva kumidhiani vakaenda kuparani. ipapo vakatora vamwe varume vokuparani vakaenda pamwe chete kuijipiti, kuna mambo faro weijipiti, uyo akapa hadhadhi imba nomunda, akamupawo zvokudya. faro akafadzwa nahadhadhi zvokuti akamupa muramu wake, mununʼuna wavahosi vake tapenesi, kuti ave mukadzi wake. mununʼuna watapenesi uyu akamuberekera mwanakomana anonzi genubhati, akakurira mumuzinda wamambo. imomo, genubhati akagara pamwe chete navana vafaro. ari muijipiti, hadhadhi akanzwa kuti dhavhidhi akanga azorora namadzibaba ake uye kuti joabhu mutungamiri wehondo akanga afawo. ipapo hadhadhi akati kuna faro, “chindiregai ndiende hangu, ndidzokere kunyika yangu.” faro akamubvunza akati, “washayeiko kuno zvowoda kudzokera kunyika yako?” hadhadhi akapindura akati, “hapana, asi regai ndiende zvangu!” allah akamutsira soromoni mumwe muvengi, rezoni, mwanakomana waeriadha, akanga atiza kubva kuna tenzi wake hadhadhezeri mambo wezobha. akazviunganidzira varume akabva ava mutungamiri wechikwata chavapanduki panguva yakaparadzwa mauto okuzobha nadhavhidhi; vapanduki ava vakaenda kudhamasiko, kwavakagara uye vakatonga. rezoni akava muvengi weisraeri kwoupenyu hwasoromoni hwose, akapamhidzira padambudziko raikonzerwa nahadhadhi. rezoni akatonga muaramu uye akanga achivenga israeri. jerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati akapandukirawo mambo. aiva mumwe wamachinda asoromoni, ari worudzi rwaefuremu wokuzaredha, uye mai vake vainzi zeruya vari chirikadzi. heino nhoroondo yokupandukira mambo kwaakaita: soromoni akavaka miro, akagadzira pakanga paputsika murusvingo rweguta rababa vake dhavhidhi. zvino jerobhoamu aiva murume wesimba noumhare, uye soromoni akaona kuti jaya iri raishanda kwazvo akabva amuita mutariri wavashandi vose veimba yayosefa. zvino panguva iyoyo jerobhoamu akati achibva mujerusarema, ahija muprofita wokushiro akasangana naye panzira, akapfeka jasi idzva nomucheka. vaviri ava vaiva voga kusango, ipapo ahija akatora jasi idzva romucheka raakanga akapfeka akaribvarura-bvarura kuita zvipenga gumi nezviviri. ipapo akati kuna jerobhoamu, “zvitorere zvipenga gumi, nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, ‘tarira, ndichabvarura umambo kubva muruoko rwasoromoni ndigokupa marudzi gumi. asi nokuda kwomuranda wangu dhavhidhi neguta rejerusarema, randakasarudza kubva pamarudzi ose aisraeri, achava norudzi rumwe chete. ndichaita izvi nokuti vakandirasa vakanamata ashitoreti, mwarikadzi wavasidhoni, kemoshi, mwari wavamoabhu, namoreki, mwari wavaamoni, uye havana kufamba munzira dzangu, kana kuita zvakarurama pamberi pangu, kana kuchengeta mitemo yangu nemirayiro yangu sezvakaitwa nadhavhidhi, baba vasoromoni. “ ‘asi handizobvisi umambo hwose kubva muruoko rwasoromoni; ndamuita mutongi mazuva ose oupenyu hwake nokuda kwadhavhidhi muranda wangu, wandakasarudza, akachengeta mirayiro yangu nemitemo yangu. ndichatora umambo kubva mumaoko omwanakomana wake ndigokupa marudzi gumi. ndichapa mwanakomana wake rudzi rumwe chete kuitira kuti dhavhidhi muranda wangu arambe ane mwenje nguva dzose pamberi pangu mujerusarema, guta randakasarudza kuisa zita rangu. zvisinei, kana uri iwe, ndichakutora, uye uchatonga pamusoro pezvose zvinodiwa nomwoyo wako; uchava mambo weisraeri. kana ukaita chipi nechipi chandicharayira uye ukafamba munzira dzangu ukaita zvakarurama pamberi pangu uye ukachengeta mitemo nemirayiro yangu, sezvakaita dhavhidhi muranda wangu, ndichava newe. ndichakuvakira imba seyandakavakira dhavhidhi uye ndichakupa israeri. ndichatambudza vana vadhavhidhi nokuda kwenyaya iyi, asi kwete nokusingaperi.’ ” soromoni akaedza kuuraya jerobhoamu, asi jerobhoamu akatizira kuijipiti, kuna mambo shishaki, akagarako kusvikira soromoni afa. zvino mamwe mabasa asoromoni, nezvose zvaakaita nouchenjeri hwake, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzasoromoni? soromoni akatonga israeri yose mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mana. ipapo akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi baba vake. ipapo rehobhoamu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

12

rehobhoamu akaenda kushekemu, nokuti vaisraeri vose vakanga vaendako kundomuita mambo. zvino jerobhoamu, mwanakomana wanebhati, akati azvinzwa (akanga achiri kuijipiti, kwaakanga aenda akatiza mambo soromoni) akadzoka kubva kuijipiti. vakatuma nhume kundodana jerobhoamu, iye neungano yose yeisraeri vakaenda kuna rehobhoamu vakati kwaari, “baba venyu vakaisa joko rinorema pamusoro pedu, asi zvino chitirerutsirai basa rakaoma iri nomutoro unorema uyu wavakaisa pamusoro pedu, isu tigokushandirai.” rehobhoamu akapindura akati, “chimboendai kwamazuva matatu mugodzoka kwandiri.” saka vanhu vakaenda. ipapo mambo rehobhoamu akabvunza vakuru vakambenge vachishandira baba vake soromoni vachiri vapenyu. akati, “mungandipa zano ripiko randingapindura naro vanhu ava?” vakapindura vakati, “kana nhasi mukava muranda wavanhu ava mukavashandira nokuvapa mhinduro inofadza, vachazova varanda venyu nguva dzose.” asi rehobhoamu akaramba zano raakanga apiwa navakuru akandobvunza majaya ezera rake aakanga akura nawo, avo vakanga vava kumushandira. akavabvunza akati, “mungandipa zano ripiko? tingavapindure seiko vanhu ava vanoti kwandiri, ‘tirerutsirei joko rakaiswa pamusoro pedu nababa venyu?’ ” majaya aakanga akura nawo akapindura akati, “udzai vanhu ava vati kwamuri, ‘baba venyu vakaisa joko rinorema pamusoro pedu, asi imi chitirerutsirai joko redu’ vaudzei kuti, ‘munwe wangu muduku, mukobvu kupfuura chiuno chababa vangu. baba vangu vakaisa joko rinorema pamusoro penyu; ini ndichaita kuti rireme kupfuura zvariri. baba vangu vakakurovai nezvamboko; ini ndichakurovai nezvinyavada.’ ” mushure mamazuva matatu jerobhoamu navanhu vose vakadzoka kuna rehobhoamu, sezvo mambo akanga ati, “mudzoke kwandiri mumazuva matatu.” mambo akapindura vanhu nehasha. akarasa zano raakanga apiwa navakuru, akatevera zano ramajaya akati, “baba vangu vakaita kuti mutoro wenyu ureme kwazvo; ini ndichaita kuti ureme kupfuura ipapo. baba vangu vakakurovai nezvamboko; ini ndichakurovai nezvinyavada.” naizvozvo mambo haana kuteerera vanhu, nokuti zvakaitika izvi zvakanga zvabva kuna yeahoh, kuti shoko rayeahoh raakanga ataura kuna jerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati kubudikidza naahija mushiro rizadziswe. zvino vaisraeri vose pavakaona kuti mambo akanga aramba kuvateerera, vakapindura mambo vakati: “tino mugove weiko muna dhavhidhi, nhaka yedu ndeipiko mumwanakomana wajese? kumatende enyu, imi vaisraeri! iwe dhavhidhi, chizvichengetera imba yako!” saka vaisraeri vakaenda kumisha yavo. asi vaisraeri vaigara mumaguta eyeahudha, rehobhoamu akaramba achivatonga. mambo rehobhoamu akatuma adhoniramu, aiva mutariri wezvechibharo, asi vaisraeri vose vakamutaka namabwe akafa. zvisinei, mambo rehobhoamu akakwanisa kupinda mungoro yake akatizira kujerusarema. saka israeri yakapandukira imba yadhavhidhi kusvikira nhasi. vaisraeri vose pavakanzwa kuti rehobhoamu akanga adzoka, vakatuma nhume kuti auye kwakanga kwakaungana vanhu, vakabva vamuita mambo weisraeri yose. rudzi rwayeahudha chete ndirwo rwakaramba ruchishandira imba yadhavhidhi. rehobhoamu paakasvika mujerusarema, akaunganidza imba yose yayeahudha norudzi rwabhenjamini, varume vehondo vaikwana zviuru zana namakumi masere, kuti varwe neimba yaisraeri kuti vadzosere umambo kuna rehobhoamu mwanakomana wasoromoni. asi shoko raallah rakasvika kuna shemaya munhu waallah richiti, “uti kuna rehobhoamu, mwanakomana wasoromoni, mambo weyeahudha, nokuimba yose yayeahudha neyabhenjamini, nokuvamwe vanhu vose, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: musakwidza kumusoro kundorwa nehama dzenyu, vaisraeri. endai kumisha yenyu mumwe nomumwe wenyu, nokuti ndini ndaita izvi.’ ” naizvozvo vakateerera shoko rayeahoh vakaenda kumisha yavo zvakare, sezvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh. ipapo jerobhoamu akavaka shekemu munyika yamakomo yaefuremu akagarako. achibvako akaenda akandovaka penueri. jerobhoamu akafunga akati, “zvino umambo huchagona kudzokera kuimba yadhavhidhi. kana vanhu ava vakakwidza kumusoro kundobayira zvibayiro kutemberi yayeahoh mujerusarema, vachazozvipira zvakare kuna ishe wavo, rehobhoamu. vachandiuraya vagodzokera kuna mambo rehobhoamu.” mushure mokubvunza vamwe, mambo akaumba zvimhuru zvegoridhe zviviri. akati kuvanhu, “zviri kukuremerai kukwidza kumusoro kujerusarema. vaisraeri, ava ndivo vamwari venyu vakakubudisai kubva muijipiti.” akaisa imwe pabheteri, neimwe padhani. zvino chinhu ichi chakava chivi; vanhu vaifamba zvokutosvika kudhani kundonamata chaiva ikoko. jerobhoamu akavaka dzimba panzvimbo dzakakwirira akatora vanhu vose vose akavaita vaprista, kunyange vaisava varevhi. akatangisa mutambo wezuva regumi namashanu romwedzi worusere, wakafanana nomutambo wokuyeahudha, akabayira zvibayiro paaritari. izvi akazviita mubheteri, akabayira kumhuru dzaakanga agadzira, uye pabheteri akagadzawo vaprista panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzaakanga aita. nomusi wegumi neshanu womwedzi worusere, mwedzi waakanga angosarudzawo, akabayira zvibayiro paaritari yaakanga avaka pabheteri. saizvozvo akatangisa mutambo wavaisraeri akaenda kuaritari kundopisa zvinonhuhwira.

13

nokuda kweshoko rayeahoh munhu waallah akabva kuyeahudha akauya kubheteri, jerobhoamu paakanga akamira pedyo nearitari ava kupirisa zvinonhuhwira. akadanidzira kuaritari akati, “iwe aritari, aritari! zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘mwanakomana anonzi josia achaberekwa muimba yadhavhidhi. vaprista vamatunhu akakwirira vari kupisira zvinonhuhwira pano zvino, achavabayira pamusoro pako, uye mapfupa avanhu achapiswa pamusoro pako.’ ” musi mumwe chete iwoyo munhu waallah akapa chiratidzo akati, “ichi ndicho chiratidzo chataurwa nayeahoh: aritari ichatsemuka uye madota ari pamusoro payo acharasirwa pasi.” zvino mambo jerobhoamu paakanzwa zvakanga zvadanidzirwa nomunhu waallah kuaritari pabheteri, akatambanudza ruoko rwake ruchibva kuaritari akati, “mubatei!” asi ruoko rwaakatambanudzira kumurume uyu rwakaoma, zvokuti akatadza kurudzosa zvakare. aritariwo yakatsemuka uye madota ayo akarasikira pasi zvichienderana nechiratidzo chakanga chapiwa nomunhu waallah nokuda kweshoko rayeahoh. ipapo mambo akati kumunhu waallah, “ndinamatirewo kuna yeahoh allah wako uchindinamatira kuti ruoko rwangu ruporeswe.” naizvozvo munhu waallah akamunamatira kuna yeahoh ruoko rwamambo rukaporeswa rukaita sezvarwakanga rwakaita pakutanga. mambo akati kumunhu waallah, “handei kumba kwangu undowana zvaungadya, uye ndichakupa chipo.” asi munhu waallah akapindura mambo akati, “kunyange maindipa hafu yezvose zvamunazvo, handaimboenda nemi, uye handaimbodya chingwa kana kunwa mvura kuno. nokuti ndakarayirwa neshoko rayeahoh kuti, ‘haufaniri kudya chingwa kana kunwa mvura kana kudzoka nenzira yawabva nayo.’ ” saka akaenda neimwe nzira, haana kudzokera nenzira yaakanga auya nayo kubheteri. zvino paiva nomumwe muprofita akanga ava harahwa aigara mubheteri, vana vake vakauya vakamuudza zvose zvakanga zvaitwa nomunhu waallah musi iwoyo mubheteri. vakaudzawo baba vavo zvaakanga ataura kuna mambo. baba vavo vakavabvunza kuti, “aenda nenzira ipiko?” zvino vana vake vakamuratidza nzira yakanga yaendwa nayo nomunhu waallah aibva kuyeahudha. saka akati kuvana vake, “ndisungirirei chigaro pambongoro.” zvino vakati vamusungirira chigaro pambongoro, akaitasva. akatevera munhu waallah. akamuwana agere pasi pomuti womuouki akamubvunza akati, “ndiwe here munhu waallah akabva kuyeahudha?” akapindura akati, “ndini.” ipapo muprofita akati kwaari, “handei kumba kwangu undodya.” munhu waallah akati, “handigoni kudzoka nemi, zvakare handigoni kudya chingwa kana kunwa mvura nemi panzvimbo ino. ndakaudzwa neshoko rayeahoh kuti, ‘haufaniri kudya chingwa kana kunwa mvura ikoko kana kudzoka nenzira yaunenge wauya nayo.’ ” muprofita akanga ava harahwa akapindura akati, “neniwo ndiri muprofita sezvawakaita. zvino mutumwa ati kwandiri neshoko rayeahoh, ‘dzoka naye kumba kwako kuitira kuti adye chingwa uye anwe mvura.’ ” asi akanga achimunyepera. saka munhu waallah akadzokera naye akandodya uye akanwa mumba make. zvavakanga vachakagara patafura, shoko rayeahoh rakauya kumuprofita akanga ava harahwa, uyo akanga amudzosa. akadanidzira kumunhu waallah akanga abva kuyeahudha akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘hauna kuteerera shoko rayeahoh uye hauna kuchengeta murayiro wawakapiwa nayeahoh allah wako. wadzoka ukadya chingwa uye ukanwa mvura munzvimbo yaakakuudza kuti usadya kana kunwa. naizvozvo mutumbi wako hausi kuzovigwa muguva ramadzibaba ako.’ ” munhu waallah paakapedza kudya nokunwa, muprofita akanga amudzosa akamusungirira chigaro pambongoro. akati ava munzira, shumba yakasangana naye panzira, ikamuuraya, mutumbi wake ukakandwa munzira, mbongoro neshumba zvikamira pauri. vamwe vanhu vaipfuura nepo vakaona mutumbi uyu wakakandwa panzira, shumba yakamira parutivi pomutumbi, vakaenda vakandozvitaura muguta maigara muprofita uya akanga ava harahwa. muprofita akanga amudzosa parwendo rwake paakazvinzwa, akati, “ndiye munhu waallah asina kuteerera shoko rayeahoh. yeahoh amupa kushumba, iyo yamubvambura nokumuuraya, sokumuyambira kwakanga kwaita shoko rayeahoh.” muprofita akati kuvanakomana vake, “ndisungirirei chigaro pambongoro,” ivo vakaita saizvozvo. ipapo akaenda akandoona mutumbi wakakandwa panzira, mbongoro neshumba zvakamira parutivi pawo. shumba yakanga isina kudya mutumbi kana kubvambura mbongoro. saka muprofita akasimudza mutumbi womunhu waallah, akauisa pamusoro pembongoro akadzoka nawo kuguta rake kuti andomuchema uye amuvige. akaisa mutumbi wake muguva rake, vakamuchema vakati, “yowe-e, hama yangu!” mushure mokumuviga, akati kuvanakomana vake, “kana ndafa, mundivige muguva mataviga munhu waallah; muise mapfupa angu parutivi peake. nokuti zvaakataura neshoko rayeahoh pamusoro pearitari iri mubheteri napamusoro pedzimba dzose dziri panzvimbo dzakakwirira mumaguta esamaria zvichaitika saizvozvo.” kunyange shure kwaizvozvi, jerobhoamu haana kupinduka pamaitiro ake akaipa, asi akasarudzazve vaprista venzvimbo dzakakwirira kubva kuvanhu vakangosiyana-siyana. munhu wose wose aida kuva muprista aigadzwa kuti ashande panzvimbo dzakakwirira. ichi ndicho chivi cheimba yajerobhoamu chakaita kuti iwe uye iparare pamusoro penyika.

14

panguva iyoyo abhija, mwanakomana wajerobhoamu, akarwara, jerobhoamu akati kumukadzi wake, “enda undozvivanza, kuti urege kuzivikanwa kuti ndiwe mukadzi wajerobhoamu. ipapo ugoenda kushiro. ahija muprofita ariko ikoko, uya akandiudza kuti ndichava mambo wavanhu ava. tora zvingwa gumi, makeke negaba rouchi ugoenda nazvo kwaari. achakuudza zvichaitika kumukomana.” naizvozvo mukadzi wajerobhoamu akaita sezvaakataura akaenda kumba kwaahija mushiro. zvino ahija akanga asisaoni; meso ake akanga asisaoni nokuti akanga akwegura. asi yeahoh akaudza ahija kuti, “mukadzi wajerobhoamu ari kuuya kuzokubvunza nezvomwanakomana wake, nokuti ari kurwara. zvino iwe uchamupa mhinduro yokuti neyokuti. paachasvika achazviita somumwe munhu.” zvino ahija paakanzwa mutsindo wetsoka dzake pamusuo, akati, “pinda, mukadzi wajerobhoamu. sei uchizviita somumwe munhu? ndatumwa kwauri namashoko asina kunaka. enda undoudza jerobhoamu kuti izvi ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, allah waisraeri: ‘ndakakusimudza kubva pakati pavanhu ndikakuita mutungamiri wavanhu vangu israeri. ndakabvarura umambo kubva muimba yadhavhidhi ndikahupa kwauri, asi hauna kuva somuranda wangu dhavhidhi, akachengeta mirayiro yangu uye akanditevera nomwoyo wake wose, akaita zvakanaka chete pamberi pangu. iwe wakaita zvakaipa kupfuura vose vakararama iwe usati wavapo. wakazviitira vamwe vamwari, zviumbwa zvakaitwa nesimbi; waita kuti nditsamwe uye ukandirasira shure kwako. “ ‘nokuda kwezvinhu izvi ndichauyisa dambudziko paimba yajerobhoamu. ndichauraya varume vose vajerobhoamu nhapwa, neakasununguka. ndichapisa imba yajerobhoamu sezvinoita munhu anopisa ndove, kusvikira pasisina chinhu. imbwa dzichadya vose vachafira muguta, uye shiri dzedenga dzichadya avo vachafira kusango. yeahoh ataura!’ “kana uriwe, dzokera kumba. panotsika tsoka yako muguta rako, mwanakomana achafa. israeri yose ichamuchema igomuviga. ndiye oga wajerobhoamu achavigwa, nokuti ndiye oga mumba majerobhoamu aonekwa nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, kuti ane chakanaka maari. “yeahoh achazvimutsira mambo waisraeri achaparadza mhuri yajerobhoamu. nhasi ndiro zuva racho! hongu, kana iye zvino. zvino yeahoh acharova israeri, zvokuti ichaita setsanga iri kuzungunuswa mumvura. achadzura israeri kubva munyika yakanaka iyi yaakapa kumadzitateguru avo agovaparadzira mhiri kworwizi, nokuti vakaita kuti yeahoh atsamwe nehasha pavakaitira ashera mapango. acharamwa israeri nokuda kwezvivi zvakaitwa najerobhoamu nezvaakaita kuti israeri iite.” ipapo mukadzi wajerobhoamu akasimuka akaenda, akasvika kutiza. achingoti tsikei pachikumbaridzo cheimba, mwanakomana akabva afa. vakamuviga, uye israeri yose yakamuchema, sezvazvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh kubudikidza nomuranda wake muprofita ahija. zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwajerobhoamu, hondo dzake namatongero ake, zvakanyorwa mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri. akatonga kwamakore makumi maviri namaviri akazorora namadzibaba ake. nadhabhi mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. rehobhoamu mwanakomana wasoromoni akanga ari mambo munyika yeyeahudha. akanga ana makore makumi mana nerimwe chete paakava mambo, uye akatonga kwamakore gumi namanomwe mujerusarema, guta rakanga rasarudzwa nayeahoh kubva pamarudzi ose aisraeri kuti aise zita rake mariri. zita ramai vake raiva naama; vaiva muamoni. vayeahudha vakaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. vakamutsa godo rake, kupfuura zvakaitwa namadzibaba avo, nezvivi zvavakaita. vakazvivakirawo nzvimbo dzakakwirira, matombo anoera namapango aashera pazvikomo zvose zvakakwirira napasi pemiti yose mikuru. kwaivawo navarume vaizviita vakadzi vavamwe varume munyika, vanhu vakaita zvose zvinonyangadza zvaiitwa nendudzi idzo dzakanga dzadzingwa nayeahoh pamberi pavaisraeri. mugore rechishanu ramambo rehobhoamu, shishaki, mambo weijipiti, akarwisa jerusarema. akatora pfuma yose yetemberi yayeahoh nepfuma yose yomuzinda wamambo. akatora zvinhu zvose, kusanganisira nenhoo dzose dzegoridhe dzakanga dzagadzirwa nasoromoni. naizvozvo mambo rehobhoamu akagadzira nhoo dzendarira kuti dzitore nzvimbo yadzo uye akadzipa kuvatungamiri vavarindi vaichengeta suo romuzinda wamambo. nguva dzose paienda mambo kutemberi yayeahoh, varindi vaitakura nhoo, mushure mezvo vachizodzidzosera kuimba yavarindi. zvino mamwe amabasa okutonga kwarehobhoamu nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? rehobhoamu najerobhoamu vaingogara vachirwisana. rehobhoamu akazorora namadzibaba ake uye akavigwa pavakanga vakavigwa muguta radhavhidhi. zita ramai vake raiva naama; vaiva muamoni. abhija mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

15

mugore regumi namasere roumambo hwajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati, abhija akagadzwa samambo weyeahudha. akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore matatu. zita ramai vake rainzi maaka mwanasikana waabhisharomu. akaita zvivi zvose zvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake asati ava mambo; mwoyo wake wakanga usina kuzvipira zvizere kuna yeahoh allah wake sezvakanga zvakaita mwoyo watateguru wake dhavhidhi. zvisinei, nokuda kwadhavhidhi, yeahoh allah wake akamupa mwenje mujerusarema nokumutsa mwanakomana kuti amutevere paumambo uye nokusimbisa jerusarema. nokuti dhavhidhi akanga aita zvakanga zvakarurama pamberi payeahoh uye akanga asina kutadza kuchengeta kana ipi zvayo yemirayiro yayeahoh mumazuva ose oupenyu hwake, kunze kwenyaya yauria muhiti. paiva nehondo pakati parehobhoamu najerobhoamu muupenyu hwose hwaabhija. kana zviri zvimwe zvinhu zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaabhija, nazvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo ayeahudha? pakati paabhija najerobhoamu pakanga pane hondo. abhija akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi. asa, mwanakomana wake, akamutevera paumambo. mugore ramakumi maviri rajerobhoamu mambo weisraeri, asa akava mambo weyeahudha, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mana negore rimwe chete. zita rambuya vake rainzi maaka, mwanasikana waabhisharomu. asa akaita zvakarurama pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake dhavhidhi. akabvisa varume vaizviita zvifeve zvavamwe varume panzvimbo dzokupira munyika uye akabvisa zvifananidzo zvose zvakanga zvaitwa namadzibaba ake. akabvisawo mbuya vake maaka pachinzvimbo chavo samai vamambo, nokuti vakanga vagadzira danda rinonyangadza raashera. asa akatema danda iri akaripisa mumupata wekidhironi. kunyange asina kubvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira, mwoyo waasa wakanga wakazvipira zvizere kuna yeahoh muupenyu hwake hwose. akauyisa mutemberi yayeahoh sirivha negoridhe nezvinhu zvaakanga akumikidza iye nababa vake. pakanga pane hondo pakati paasa nabhaasha, mambo weisraeri munguva yose yavakanga vachitonga. bhaasha, mambo weisraeri, akaenda kundorwa neyeahudha, akasimbisa rama kuti adzivise ani naani zvake kubuda kana kupinda munyika yaasa mambo weyeahudha. ipapo asa akatora sirivha yose negoridhe rose rakanga rasara mumatura epfuma yetemberi yayeahoh nezvose zvaiva mumuzinda wake. akazvipa kumachinda ake akazvitumira kuna bheni-hadhadhi, mwanakomana watabhirimoni, mwanakomana wahezioni, mambo wearamu, akanga achitonga mudhamasiko. akati, “ngatinyoreranei chibvumirano imi neni, sezvazvakanga zvakaita pakati pababa vangu nababa venyu. tarirai, ndakutumirai chipo chesirivha negoridhe. zvino imi chiputsai chibvumirano chenyu nabhaasha mambo weisraeri kuitira kuti abve kuno kwandiri.” bheni-hadhadhi akabvumirana namambo asa akatumira vatungamiri vamauto ake kuti vandorwisa maguta eisraeri. akakunda ijoni, dhani, abheri bheti maaka nekinereti yose pamwe chete nenafutari. bhaasha paakanzwa izvi akaregera kuvaka rama akadzokera kutiza. ipapo mambo asa akarayira yeahudha yose, hapana akasiyiwa, ivo vakatora kubva kurama matombo namatanda akanga achishandiswa nabhaasha ikoko. mambo asa akaashandisa kuvaka gebha mubhenjamini, nemizipawo. kana zviri zvimwe zvose zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaasa, zvose zvaakaita, namaguta aakavaka, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? zvisinei, panguva yokukwegura kwake, tsoka dzake dzakabatwa nechirwere. ipapo asa akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa pamwe chete navo muguta rababa vake dhavhidhi. zvino mwanakomana wake jehoshafati akamutevera paumambo. nadhabhi, mwanakomana wajerobhoamu akava mambo weisraeri mugore rechipiri raasa mambo weyeahudha, uye akatonga israeri kwamakore maviri. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, achifamba munzira dzababa vake nomuchivi chavo, icho chaakaita kuti israeri iite. bhaasha, mwanakomana waahija, weimba yaisakari, akamumukira, akamuuraya pagibhetoni guta romufiristia, panguva yarakanga rakombwa nanadhabhi navaisraeri vose. bhaasha akauraya nadhabhi mugore rechitatu raasa, mambo weyeahudha, uye akamutevera paumambo. achingoti tangei kutonga, akabva auraya mhuri yose yajerobhoamu. haana kusiyira jerobhoamu mumwe chete achifema, asi akavaparadza vose sezvazvakarehwa nayeahoh kubudikidza nomuranda wake ahija mushiro, nokuda kwezvivi zvakanga zvaitwa najerobhoamu nezvaakaita kuti israeri iite, uye nokuti akaita kuti yeahoh, allah waisraeri, atsamwe. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwanadhabhi, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri? pakati paasa nabhaasha, mambo weisraeri, pakanga pane hondo panguva yose yokutonga kwavo. mugore rechitatu raasa mambo weyeahudha, bhaasha, mwanakomana waahija, akava mambo weisraeri yose mutiza, uye akatonga kwamakore makumi maviri namana. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, achifamba munzira dzajerobhoamu nomuchivi chake, chaakaita kuti israeri iite.

16

zvino shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jehu mwanakomana wahanani richipikisana nabhaasha richiti, “ndakakusimudza kubva muguruva ndikakuita mutungamiri wavanhu vangu israeri, asi wakafamba munzira dzajerobhoamu ukaita kuti vanhu vangu israeri vaite chivi, nokuita kuti nditsamwe nokuda kwezvivi zvavo. naizvozvo ndava kuda kuparadza bhaasha neimba yake, uye ndichaita kuti imba yako ifanane neimba yajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati. imbwa dzichadya vose vabhaasha vachafira muguta, uye shiri dzedenga dzichadya avo vachafira kusango.” kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwabhaasha, nesimba rake, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri? bhaasha akazorora namadzibaba ake uye akavigwa mutiza. zvino era, mwanakomana wake, akamutevera paumambo. pamusoro paizvozvo, shoko rayeahoh rakauyawo nokumuprofita jehu mwanakomana wahanani kuna bhaasha neimba yake, nokuda kwezvakaipa zvose zvaakanga aita pamberi payeahoh achimutsamwisa nezvaakaita, achifanana neimba yajerobhoamu, uyewo nokuti akaiparadza. mugore ramakumi maviri namatanhatu raasa mambo weyeahudha, era, mwanakomana wabhaasha akava mambo weisraeri, uye akatonga mutiza kwamakore maviri. zimuri, mumwe wamachinda ake, aitungamirira hafu yengoro dzake, akamumukira. era akanga ari mutiza panguva iyoyo, achidhakwa zvake pamba paaza, murume aichengeta muzinda wamambo patiza. zimuri akapinda, akamubaya akamuuraya, mugore ramakumi maviri namanomwe raasa, mambo weyeahudha. ipapo akabva amutevera paumambo. paakatanga kutonga, achangogara pachigaro choushe, akauraya mhuri yose yabhaasha. haana kusiya murume mumwe chete, hama kana shamwari. saizvozvo zimuri akaparadza mhuri yose yabhaasha, sezvakanga zvarehwa neshoko rayeahoh rakataurwa richipikisa bhaasha nokumuprofita jehu, nokuda kwezvivi zvose zvakanga zvaitwa nabhaasha nomwanakomana wake era nezvaakaita kuti israeri iite, zvokuti vakaita kuti yeahoh, allah waisraeri, atsamwe, nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvavo zvisina maturo. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaera, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri? mugore ramakumi maviri namanomwe raasa, mambo weyeahudha, zimuri akatonga mutiza kwamazuva manomwe. varwi vakanga vakadzika misasa pedyo negibhetoni, guta ravafiristia. vaisraeri vakanga vari kumisasa pavakanzwa kuti zimuri akanga amukira mambo akamuuraya, vakagadza omuri mutungamiri wehondo, kuti ave mambo weisraeri musi iwoyo mumusasa. zvino omuri, navaisraeri vose vaaiva navo, vakabva kugibhetoni vakauya kuzokomba tiza. zimuri paakaona kuti guta rakanga ratorwa, akaenda kunhare yomuzinda wamambo akabva azvipisira mumuzinda. naizvozvo akafa, nokuda kwezvivi zvaakanga aita, achiita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh uye achifamba munzira dzajerobhoamu nomuchivi chaakanga aita, uye nechivi chaakanga aita kuti israeri iite. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwazimuri, nokumukira kwake kwaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo aisraeri? ipapo vanhu veisraeri vakaparadzana vakaita zvikwata zviviri; hafu ikatevera tibhini, mwanakomana waginati, kuti ave mambo, uye imwe hafu ikatevera omuri. asi vateveri vaomuri vakakunda vateveri vatibhini, mwanakomana waginati. saka tibhini akafa, omuri akava mambo. mugore ramakumi matatu nerimwe raasa, mambo weyeahudha, omuri akava mambo weisraeri, uye akatonga kwamakore gumi namaviri, matanhatu acho mutiza. akatenga gomo resamaria kubva kuna shemeri namatarenda maviri esirivha uye akavaka guta pagomo iri, achiritumidza kuti samaria, zvichibva pana shemeri, zita rouyo aimbova muridzi wegomo. asi omuri akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, akatadza kupfuura vose vakanga vamutangira. akafamba munzira dzose dzajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati nomuchivi chake, chaakaita kuti israeri iite, zvokuti vakaita kuti yeahoh, allah waisraeri, atsamwe nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvavo zvisina maturo. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaomuri, nezvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri? omuri akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa musamaria. uye ahabhu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. mugore ramakumi matatu namasere raasa, mambo weyeahudha, ahabhu, mwanakomana waomuri, akava mambo weisraeri, uye akatonga israeri musamaria kwamakore makumi maviri namaviri. ahabhu, mwanakomana waomuri, akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh kupfuura vose vakamutangira. akazviona zviri zvinhu zvidiki kuita zvivi zvajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati, uye pamusoro pezvo akawana jezebheri mwanasikana waetibhaari mambo wavasidhoni, akatanga kushandira bhaari uye akamunamata. akavakira bhaari aritari mutemberi yabhaari yaakavaka musamaria. ahabhu akagadzirawo danda raashera akaita kuti yeahoh, allah waisraeri, atsamwe kupfuura zvakaita madzimambo akamutangira. munguva yaahabhu, hieri wokubheteri akavakazve jeriko. mwanakomana wake wedangwe, abhiramu, akafa paakavaka hwaro hweguta, uye mwanakomana wake wegotwe segubhi akafa paakamisa masuo aro, sezvazvakarehwa neshoko rayeahoh nayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni.

17

zvino eria mutishibhi aigara mugireadhi, akati kuna ahabhu, “nayeahoh, allah waisraeri mupenyu, wandinoshumira, hakuchazova nedova kana mvura inonaya mumakore anotevera kunze kwokutenge ndareva ini.” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna eria richiti, “ibva pano, nanga kumabvazuva undovanda parukova rwekeriti, kumabvazuva kwejorodhani. uchanwa mvura yorukova urwu, uye ndarayira makunguo kuti akupe zvokudya ikoko.” saka akaita zvaakanga audzwa nayeahoh. akaenda kurukova rwekeriti, kumabvazuva kwejorodhani, akagarako. makunguo akamuvigira chingwa nenyama mangwanani, nechingwa nenyama manheru, uye akanwa mvura murukova. mushure menguva yakati, rukova rwakapwa nokuti mvura yakanga isinganayi panyika. zvino shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwaari richiti, “simuka izvozvi uende kuzarefati kunyika yesidhoni undogarako. ndarayira chirikadzi iri munzvimbo iyoyo kuti ikupe zvokudya.” naizvozvo akaenda kuzarefati. paakasvika pasuo reguta, chirikadzi yakanga iripo ichitsvaga huni. akamudana akamubvunza akati, “mungandivigirawo mvura shoma shoma mumukombe here kuti ndinwe?” paakanga ava kuenda kundoitora, iye akadanidzira akati, “mundivigirewo chimedu chechingwa, ndapota.” iye akapindura akati, “zvirokwazvo nayeahoh allah wenyu mupenyu, handina chingwa. ndinongova netufurawu tushoma shoma muhari namafuta mashoma shoma muhari. ndiri kunhonga huni shoma shoma kuti ndiende nadzo kumba ndinozvibikira kudya ini nomwanakomana wangu, kuti tigodya, tife hedu.” eria akati kwaari, “usatya. enda kumba undoita sezvawareva. asi tanga wandibikira chingwa chiduku pane zvaunazvo ugouya nacho kwandiri, mushure ugozvigadzirira iwe nomwanakomana wako. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, ‘furawu iri muhari imomo haizoperi uye mafuta ari muhari haazoperi kusvikira zuva iro richanayiswa mvura panyika nayeahoh.’ ” akaenda akandoita sezvaakanga audzwa naeria. saka zvokudya zvaeria zvakavapo mazuva ose uyewo nezvomukadzi nemhuri yake. furawu yaiva muhari haina kupera uye mafuta aiva muhari haana kupera, sezvazvakanga zvarehwa neshoko rayeahoh rakataurwa naeria. kwapera nguva yakati, mwanakomana womukadzi, muridzi weimba, akarwara. kurwara kwake kwakanyanya kwazvo, pakupedzisira akamira kufema. mukadzi akati kuna eria, “ndakakutadzireiko, munhu waallah? wakauya here kuzondirangaridza chivi changu nokuuraya mwanakomana wangu?” eria akapindura akati, “ndipe mwanakomana wako kuno.” akamutora kubva mumaoko ake, akamutakura akaenda naye kuimba yapamusoro yaaigara, akamuradzika pamubhedha wake. ipapo akadanidzira kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa, yeahoh allah wangu, mauyisawo here dambudziko pachirikadzi iyi yandiri kugara nayo, nokuuraya mwanakomana wayo?” ipapo akazvambarara pamusoro pomukomana katatu akadanidzira kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa yeahoh allah wangu, itai kuti mweya womukomana uyu udzokere maari!” yeahoh akanzwa kudanidzira kwaeria, mweya womukomana ukadzokera maari, akararama. eria akatora mwana akamutakura achibuda mumba maakanga ari akaenda naye mumba huru. akamupa kuna mai vake akati, “tarirai, mwanakomana wenyu mupenyu!” ipapo mukadzi akati kuna eria, “zvino ndazoziva kuti muri munhu waallah uye kuti shoko rayeahoh rinobuda mumuromo menyu nderechokwadi.”

18

zvino mushure menguva huru, mugore rechitatu, shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna eria richiti, “enda undozviratidza kuna ahabhu, uye ini ndichanayisa mvura panyika.” saka eria akaenda kundozviratidza kuna ahabhu. zvino nzara yakanga yanyanya kwazvo musamaria, uye ahabhu akanga adana obhadhia uyo akanga ari mutariri womuzinda wake. (obhadhia akanga achitenda kuna yeahoh zvikuru kwazvo. jezebheri paakanga achiuraya vaprofita vayeahoh, obhadhia akanga atora vaprofita zana akavaviga mumapako maviri, makumi mashanu mune rimwe nerimwe. uye akavapa kudya nemvura.) ahabhu akanga ati kuna obhadhia, “enda munyika umu kuzvitubu zvose nemipata yose. zvimwe tingawana uswa tiraramise mabhiza namanyurusi kuitira kuti tirege kuzouraya kana chimwe chete chezvipfuwo zvedu.” saka vakagovana nzvimbo dzavaizoenda, ahabhu achienda kune rimwe divi, obhadhia kune rimwewo divi. obhadhia akati achifamba, eria akasangana naye. obhadhia akamuziva akakotamira pasi, akati, “chaizvoizvo chokwadi, ndimi here ishe wangu eria?” akapindura akati, “hongu. enda undoudza ishe wako kuti, ‘eria ari kuno.’ ” obhadhia akabvunza akati, “ndatadzeiko zvamava kuendesa muranda wenyu kuna ahabhu kuti andourayiwa? zvirokwazvo nayeahoh allah wenyu mupenyu, hakuna rudzi kana nyika, ishe wangu, kwaasina kutuma mumwe munhu kuti andokutsvagai. uye kana pane nyika kana rudzi vaiti makanga musiko, aitovamanikidza kuti vapike kuti vakanga vakushayai. asi zvino mava kundiudza kuti ndiende kuna ishe wangu ndinoti, ‘eria ari kuno.’ ini handizivi kuti mweya wayeahoh uchakuendesai kupi kana ndabva pano pamuri. kana ndikaenda kundoudza ahabhu, iye akazokushayai, anondiuraya. asi ini muranda wenyu ndakashumira yeahoh kubvira pauduku hwangu. ishe wangu, hamuna kunzwa here zvandakaita, jezebheri paakanga achiuraya vaprofita vayeahoh? ndakaviga vaprofita vayeahoh zana mumapako maviri, makumi mashanu mune rimwe nerimwe uye ndakavapa kudya nemvura. zvino mava kundiudza kuti ndiende kuna ishe wangu ndinoti, ‘eria ari kuno.’ anondiuraya!” eria akati, “nayeahoh wamasimba ose mupenyu, wandinoshandira, zvirokwazvo ndichazvipira kuna ahabhu nhasi.” saka obhadhia akaenda kundosangana naahabhu akamuudza, uye ahabhu akaenda kundosangana naeria. paakaona eria, akati kwaari, “ndiwe here, iwe mutambudzi weisraeri?” eria akapindura akati, “handina kuuyisa dambudziko kuisraeri, asi imi nemhuri yenyu ndimi makadaro. makasiya mirayiro yayeahoh mukatevera bhaari. zvino danai vanhu muisraeri yose kuti vazosangana neni pagomo rekarimeri. muuyewo namazana mana namakumi mashanu avaprofita vabhaari namazana mana avaprofita vaashera vanodya patafura yajezebheri.” saka ahabhu akatuma shoko muisraeri yose akaunganidza vaprofita pagomo rekarimeri. eria akaenda pamberi pavanhu akati, “mucharamba muchifunga mifungo miviri kusvikira riniko? kana yeahoh ari allah, muteverei; asi kana bhaari ari allah, muteverei.” asi vanhu havana chavakataura. zvino eria akati kwavari, “ini chete pavaprofita vayeahoh ndini ndasara, asi bhaari ane vaprofita mazana mana namakumi mashanu. titorerei hando mbiri. ivo ngavazvisarudzire yavo, uye ngavaicheke-cheke kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu vagoiisa pamusoro pehuni, asi havafaniri kudzitungidza nomoto. ini ndichagadzira imwe hando yacho ndigoiisa pamusoro pehuni asi handizodzitungidzi nomoto. ipapo mudane kuzita ramwari wenyu, uye ini ndichadana kuzita rayeahoh. allah achapindura nomoto ndiye allah.” ipapo vanhu vose vakati, “zvawataura zvakanaka.” eria akati kuvaprofita vabhaari, “sarudzai imwe yehando idzi mugotanga imi kuigadzira, sezvo makawanda. danai kuzita ramwari wenyu, asi musatungidza moto.” saka vakatora hando yavakanga vapiwa vakaigadzira. ipapo vakadana kuzita rabhaari kubvira mangwanani kusvikira masikati. vakadanidzira vakati, “bhaari, tipindure!” asi mhinduro haina kuwanikwa; hapana akapindura. vakatamba vachipoterera aritari yavakanga vaita. ava masikati, eria akatanga kuvatuka akati, “danidzirisai! zvirokwazvo ndimwari! zvichida ari kufunga zvakadzama kwazvo, kana kuti ane basa kwazvo, kana kuti ari parwendo. zvimwe akavata zvokuti anotofanira kumutswa.” saka vakatonyanyisa kudanidzira, vakazvicheka-cheka neminondo namapfumo, setsika yavo, kusvikira ropa ravo raerera. masikati akapfuura, ivo vakaramba vachiprofita zveshungu kusvikira nguva yechibayiro chamanheru. asi hapana chakaitika, hapana akapindura, hapana akaratidza hanya. ipapo eria akati kuvanhu vose, “uyai kuno kwandiri.” vakauya kwaari, iye akagadzira aritari yayeahoh yakanga yaputswa. eria akatora mabwe gumi namaviri, rimwe chete rakamirira rudzi rumwe chete rwavanakomana vayaqobho, uyo akanga audzwa nayeahoh kuti, “zita rako richava israeri.” akashandisa mabwe aya kuvaka aritari muzita rayeahoh, uye akachera mugero waipoteredza aritari wakanga wakakura zvokuti waikwana maseya maviri embeu. akaronga huni, akacheka hando kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu, akaiisa pamusoro pehuni. ipapo akati kwavari, “zadzai zvirongo zvikuru zvina nemvura mugoidira pamusoro pechipiriso napamusoro pehuni.” akati, “pamhidzai zvakare,” ivo vakapamhazve. akatizve, “pamhidzai kechitatu.” mvura yakaerera ichipoteredza aritari ikazadzawo nomugero. panguva yechibayiro, muprofita eria akaenda pamberi akanamata akati, “haiwa yeahoh, allah waabhurahama, isaka naisraeri, ngazvizivikanwe nhasi kuti ndimi allah munyika yeisraeri uye kuti ini ndiri muranda wenyu, uyewo kuti ndaita zvinhu zvose izvi sezvamakandirayira. haiwa yeahoh, ndipindurei, ndipindurei, kuitira kuti vanhu ava vazive kuti imi, yeahoh, ndimi allah, uye kuti muri kudzora mwoyo yavo zvakare.” ipapo moto wayeahoh wakaburuka ukapisa chibayiro, nehuni namabwe nevhu, ukananzva mvura yose yaiva mumugero. vanhu vose pavakaona izvi, vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo, vakadanidzira vachiti, “yeahoh ndiye allah! yeahoh ndiye allah!” ipapo eria akavarayira akati, “batai vaprofita vabhaari. musarega kana mumwe chete achipunyuka!” vakavabata, uye eria akaita kuti vaendeswe zasi kumupata wekishoni vakandourayirwako. uye eria akati kuna ahabhu, “chienda undodya uye unwe, nokuti kune kutinhira kwemvura zhinji.” saka ahabhu akaenda kundodya nokunwa, asi eria akakwira pamusoro pegomo rekarimeri, akakotamira pasi akaisa chiso chake pakati pamabvi ake. akaudza muranda wake kuti, “enda undotarisa kwakadziva kugungwa.” akakwira akandotarisa. akati, “hakuna chiriko uku.” eria akati, “dzokerazve,” kanomwe. kechinomwe muranda akati, “gore duku rakaenzana nechanza chomunhu riri kukwira richibva mugungwa.” saka eria akati, “enda undoudza ahabhu kuti, ‘sunga ngoro yako uburuke usati wadzivirirwa nemvura.’ ” panguva imwe cheteyo denga rakasviba namakore, mhepo ikavhuvhuta, mvura zhinji ikauya, ahabhu akaenda nengoro kujezireeri. simba rayeahoh rakauya pana eria, akasunga jasi rake nebhanhire, akamhanya pamberi paahabhu nzira yose kusvika kujezireeri.

19

zvino ahabhu akaudza jezebheri zvose zvakanga zvaitwa naeria nokuuraya kwaakanga aita vaprofita vose nomunondo. ipapo jezebheri akatuma nhume kuna eria kundoti, “vamwari ngavandirange, vanyanyise kudaro, kana nenguva ino mangwana, ndikasaita kuti upenyu hwako hufanane nehwomumwe wavo.” eria akatya akatiza kuti aponese upenyu hwake. paakasvika kubheerishebha muyeahudha, akasiya muranda wake ikoko, iye pachake akafamba rwendo rwezuva rimwe chete achipinda mugwenga. akasvika pamuti womurara, akagara pasi pawo akanamata kuti achifa. akati, “zvaringana hazvo, yeahoh. chitorai upenyu hwangu; handipfuuri madzitateguru angu pakururama.” ipapo akarara pasi pomuti akabatwa nehope. pakarepo mutumwa akamubata akati, “simuka udye.” akatarisa-tarisa, akaona chingwa chakanga chabikwa pamazimbe omoto pedyo nomusoro wake, nechirongo chemvura. akadya, akanwa, akabva arara zvakare. mutumwa wayeahoh akadzoka kechipiri akamubata akati, “simuka udye, nokuti rwendo rungakuremera.” naizvozvo akamuka akadya, akanwa. zvokudya izvozvo zvakamupa simba zvokuti akafamba kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku makumi mana kusvikira asvika pahorebhi, gomo raallah. ipapo akapinda mubako akarara usiku hwose. zvino shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwaari richiti, “uri kuiteiko pano, eria?” akapindura akati, “ndakanga ndichishingairira yeahoh allah wamasimba ose kwazvo. vaisraeri vakaramba sungano yenyu, vakaputsa aritari dzenyu, uye vakauraya vaprofita venyu nomunondo. ndini ndoga ndasara, zvino vava kuedza kundiurayawo.” yeahoh akati, “buda panze umire pagomo pamberi payeahoh, nokuti yeahoh ari kuda kuzopfuura nepo.” ipapo mhepo huru ine simba yakapamura makomo ikapwanya mabwe pamberi payeahoh, asi yeahoh akanga asiri mumhepo. mushure memhepo, pakava nokudengenyeka kwenyika, asi yeahoh akanga asiri mukudengenyeka ikoko. mushure mokudengenyeka kwenyika kwakauya moto, asi yeahoh akanga asiri mumoto. uye shure kwomoto akanzwa inzwi richitaura nakazevezeve kakapfava. eria paakarinzwa, akafukidza chiso chake nejasi rake akabuda panze akamira pamuromo webako. ipapo inzwi rakati kwaari, “uri kuiteiko pano, eria?” akapindura akati, “ndakanga ndichishingairira yeahoh allah wamasimba ose kwazvo. vaisraeri vakaramba sungano yenyu, vakaputsa aritari dzenyu, uye vakauraya vaprofita venyu nomunondo. ndini ndoga ndasara, zvino vava kuedza kundiurayawo.” yeahoh akati kwaari, “dzokera nenzira yawauya nayo, ugoenda kugwenga redhamasiko. kana wasvikako, uzodze hazaeri kuti ave mambo wearamu. uzodzezve jehu, mwanakomana wanimishi kuti ave mambo weisraeri, ugozodza erisha, mwanakomana washafati wokuabheri mehora kuti atore nzvimbo yako somuprofita. jehu achauraya vose vachapunyuka munondo wahazaeri, uye erisha achaurayawo vose vachapunyuka munondo wajehu. kunyange zvakadaro, ndakachengeta zviuru zvinomwe zvavanhu muisraeri, vose vane mabvi asina kupfugamira bhaari uye vane miromo isina kumutsvoda.” naizvozvo eria akabvapo akandowana erisha mwanakomana washafati. akanga achirima nehando dzakasungwa pamajoko gumi namaviri, iye achichaira joko regumi namaviri. eria akaenda kwaari akakanda jasi rake paari. ipapo erisha akasiya hando dzake akamhanya achitevera eria. akati, “regai ndimbonotsvoda baba namai vangu ndichionekana navo, ndigozoenda nemi.” eria akati, “dzokera zvako. ndakuiteiko?” naizvozvo erisha akamusiya akadzokera. akatora hando dzejoko rake akadzibaya. akashandisa zvaairimisa sehuni dzokubikisa nyama yacho, akaipa kuvanhu, ndokubva vadya. ipapo akasimuka akatevera eria akabva ava muranda wake.

20

zvino bheni-hadhadhi mambo wearamu akaunganidza varwi vake vose. achibatsirwa namadzimambo makumi matatu namaviri vaine mabhiza avo nengoro, akaenda akakomba samaria akarirwisa. akatuma nhume muguta kuna ahabhu mambo weisraeri kundoti, “zvanzi nabheni-hadhadhi, ‘sirivha yako negoridhe ndezvangu, uye vakadzi vako navana vako vakanyanyisa kunaka ndevangu.’ ” mambo weisraeri akapindura akati, “sezvamataura, ishe wangu mambo. ini nezvose zvandinazvo ndiri wenyu.” nhumwa dzakauya zvakare ndokusvikoti, “zvanzi nabheni-hadhadhi, ‘ndakatumira shoko rokuti ndinoda sirivha yako negoridhe, navakadzi vako navana vako. asi mangwana nenguva yakaita seino ndichatuma varanda vangu kuti vazotsvagisisa mumuzinda wako nomudzimba dzavaranda vako. vachatora zvose zvaunokoshesa vagoenda nazvo.’ ” mambo weisraeri akadana vakuru vose venyika akati kwavari, “tarisai muone kuti murume uyu ari kutsvaga muromo sei! paakati ari kuda kutora vakadzi vangu navana vangu, nesirivha yangu negoridhe rangu, handina kurambira.” vakuru navanhu, vose vakapindura vakati, “musateerera kwaari kana kubvumirana nezvaari kuda.” naizvozvo akapindura nhume dzabheni-hadhadhi akati, “udzai ishe wangu mambo kuti, ‘muranda wenyu achaita zvose zvamakamukumbira pakutanga, asi chikumbiro ichi chazvino handigoni kuchizadzisa.’ ” vakasimuka vakaenda nemhinduro kwavakanga vabva, kuna bheni-hadhadhi. saka bheni-hadhadhi akatumira rimwe shoko kuna ahabhu achiti, “vamwari ngavaitewo kwandiri, vanyanyise kudaro, kana guruva ringakwana kupa mumwe nomumwe wamauto angu kuti azadze chanza chake rikasara musamaria.” mambo weisraeri akapindura akati, “muudzei kuti, ‘uyo anoshonga nhumbi dzokurwa ngaarege kuzvirumbidza souyo anodzibvisa.’ ” bheni-hadhadhi akanzwa shoko iri iye namadzimambo pavakanga vachinwa vari mumisasa, akabva arayira mauto ake akati, “gadzirirai kundorwisa.” saka vakagadzirira kundorwisa guta. panguva iyoyo mumwe muprofita akauya kuna ahabhu mambo weisraeri, akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘uri kuona hondo huru huru iyi here? ndichaiisa muruoko rwako nhasi, ipapo uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.’ ” ahabhu akabvunza akati, “asi ndiani achaita izvi?” muprofita akapindura akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘majaya amachinda omumatunhu ndiwo achazviita.’ ” akabvunza akati, “zvino ndiani achatanga hondo yacho?” muprofita akapindura akati, “ndiwe uchaitanga.” saka ahabhu akaunganidza majaya amachinda omumatunhu, varume vaikwana mazana maviri namakumi matatu navaviri. mushure akaunganidza vamwe vaisraeri, pamwe chete zviuru zvinomwe. vakasimuka masikati, bheni-hadhadhi namadzimambo makumi matatu navaviri vaiva kudivi rake panguva yavakanga vari mumisasa yavo vachidhakwa. majaya amachinda omumatunhu ndiwo akatanga kuenda. zvino bheni-hadhadhi akanga atuma vasori uye vakamuudza kuti, “kune varume vari kubva kusamaria.” akati, “kana vauya kuzotsvaga rugare, vabatei vari vapenyu; kana vauya kuzorwa, vabatei vari vapenyu.” majaya amachinda omumatunhu akafamba achibuda muguta varwi vari mumashure mavo uye mumwe nomumwe wavo akauraya waakarwisana naye. vaaramu vakatiza, vaisraeri vachivadzingirira. asi bheni-hadhadhi mambo wearamu akatiza akatasva bhiza, navamwe vavarwi vake vaiva namabhiza. mambo weisraeri akabuda akakunda mabhiza nengoro, akauraya vaaramu vakawanda kwazvo. mushure maizvozvo, muprofita akauya kuna mambo weisraeri akati, “simbisa chinzvimbo chako ugoona zvinofanira kuitwa, nokuti muchirimo chiri kutevera mambo wearamu achakurwisa zvakare.” panguva imwe cheteyo, varanda vamambo wearamu vakati kwaari, “vamwari vavo ndavamwari vamakomo. ndicho chikonzero vakatikurira. asi tikarwa navo mumapani, zvirokwazvo tichavakurira. itai izvi: bvisai madzimambo ose panzvimbo dzavo dzokutonga mugovatsiva navamwe vabati. munofanirawo kuzviunganidzira hondo yakafanana neyamakarasikirwa nayo, bhiza nebhiza nengoro nengoro, kuitira kuti tikwanise kurwa navaisraeri mumapani. ipapo zvirokwazvo tichavakurira.” akabvumirana navo akaita saizvozvo. muchirimo chakatevera bheni-hadhadhi akaunganidza vaaramu akakwidza kuafeki kundorwa neisraeri. vaisraeri vakati vaunganidzwawo uye vapiwa zvose zvinodiwa pakurwa hondo, vakafamba vachienda kundosangana navo. vaisraeri vakadzika musasa wavo vakatarisana navo, vachinge mapoka maduku maviri embudzi, ukuwo vaaramu vakazadza nyika. munhu waallah akauya akaudza mambo weisraeri kuti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘nokuda kwokuti vaaramu vanofunga kuti yeahoh ndimwari wamakomo, uye kuti haasi mwari wemipata, ndichaisa hondo huru huru iyi mumaoko ako, uye uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.’ ” kwamazuva manomwe vakagara pamisasa yavo vakatarisana, uye nezuva rechinomwe hondo yakatanga. vaisraeri vakauraya zana rezviuru zvamauto etsoka avaaramu musi mumwe chete. vakasara vakatizira kuguta reafeki, uko kwakandowira rusvingo pamusoro pezviuru makumi maviri nezvinomwe zvavo. uye bheni-hadhadhi akatizira kuguta akandohwanda muimba yomukati. varanda vake vakati kwaari, “tarirai, takanzwa kuti madzimambo eimba yaisraeri ane tsitsi. ngatiendei kuna mambo weisraeri takasungirira masaga muzviuno zvedu, uye takasunga misoro yedu netambo. zvichida angakuregai muri mupenyu.” vakasungirira masaga muzviuno zvavo vakasunga misoro yavo netambo, vakabva vaenda kuna mambo weisraeri vakasvikoti, “muranda wenyu bheni-hadhadhi ati, ‘ndapota, dai mangondirega ndararama.’ ” mambo akapindura akati, “achiri mupenyu nazvino? ihama yangu.” varume ava vakazviona sechiratidzo chakanaka ndokukurumidza kutevedzera zvaakanga areva. vakati, “hongu, hama yenyu bheni-hadhadhi!” mambo akati, “endai munomutora.” bheni-hadhadhi akati achibuda, ahabhu akamukwidza mungoro yake. bheni-hadhadhi akati kwaari, “ndichadzosera maguta akatorwa nababa vangu kuna baba vako. unogonawo kuisa misika yako mudhamasiko, sezvakaitwa nababa vangu musamaria.” ahabhu akati, “nokuda kwechibvumirano ichi, ndichakusunungura.” saka akaita chibvumirano naye, akamurega achienda. mumwe wavanakomana vavaprofita arayirwa nayeahoh, akati kushamwari yake, “ndirove!” asi murume uyu akaramba. naizvozvo muprofita akati, “zvausina kuteerera yeahoh, uchingobva pano pandiri, uchaurayiwa neshumba.” zvino murume uyu achangobva paakanga ari, shumba yakamuwana ikamuuraya. muprofita akawana mumwe murume akati, “ndapota, ndirove.” naizvozvo murume uyu akamurova, akamukuvadza. ipapo muprofita akaenda akandomirira mambo pamugwagwa. akazviita somumwe munhu akakwevera pasi mucheka wake womusoro kuti uvharidzire maziso ake. mambo paakanga ava kupfuura nepo muprofita akadanidzira kwaari akati, “muranda wenyu akaenda pakatikati pehondo payakanga ichirwiwa, mumwe munhu akauya kwandiri nomusungwa akati, ‘chengeta murume uyu. kana akashayikwa upenyu hwako huchatsiva hwake, kana kuti ucharipa netarenda resirivha.’ muranda wenyu paakanga ari mubishi rokuita basa pano nekoko, murume uya akanyangarika.” mambo weisraeri akati, “iwoyo ndiwo mutongo wako. ndiwe wautaura woga.” ipapo muprofita akakurumidza kubvisa mucheka pamaziso ake, mambo weisraeri akabva amuziva kuti aiva mumwe wavaprofita. akati kuna mambo, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘wakasunungura munhu wandakanga ndati anofanira kufa. naizvozvo upenyu hwako huchatsiva hwake, vanhu vako vachatsiva vanhu vake.’ ” mambo weisraeri akaenda kumuzinda wake musamaria aora mwoyo uye ashatirwa.

21

kwapera nguva yakati, pane imwe nyaya yakaitika pamusoro pomunda wemizambiringa wanabhoti mujezireeri. munda wemizambiringa uyu waiva mujezireeri, pedyo nomuzinda waahabhu mambo wesamaria. ahabhu akati kuna nabhoti, “ndipe munda wako wemizambiringa kuti ndiuite bindu romuriwo, sezvo uri pedyo nomuzinda wangu. ini ndichatsinhanhisa nokukupa munda wemizambiringa uri nani, kana kuti, kana uchida, ndichakuripa mari inoenderana nomutengo wawo.” asi nabhoti akapindura akati, “yeahoh ngaazvirambidze kuti ndikupei nhaka yamadzibaba angu.” saka ahabhu akaenda kumba akasuwa uye akashatirwa nokuti nabhoti mujezireeri akanga ati, “handisi kuzokupai nhaka yamadzibaba angu.” akarara pamubhedha wake akazvidya mwoyo, akaramba kudya. jezebheri, mukadzi wake, akapindamo akamubvunza akati, “sei makasuwa kudai? sei musiri kudya?” akamupindura akati, “nokuti ndati kuna nabhoti mujezireeri, ‘nditengesere munda wako wemizambiringa; kana kuti, kana uchida, ndichakupa mumwe munda wemizambiringa kune imwe nzvimbo kuti, utsive uyu.’ asi iye ati, ‘handisi kuzokupai munda wangu wemizambiringa.’ ” jezebheri, mukadzi wake akati, “izvi ndizvo here zvamunoita samambo weisraeri? simukai mudye! faranukai. ndichakuwanirai munda wemizambiringa wanabhoti mujezireeri.” naizvozvo akanyora matsamba muzita raahabhu, akadhinda chidhindo chake padziri, akadzitumira kuvakuru nokumachinda aaigara nawo muguta ranabhoti. mumatsamba aya akanyora akati: “daidzirai zuva rokutsanya mugogadzika nabhoti panzvimbo yakakwirira pakati pavanhu. asi gadzai nhubu mbiri pakatarisana naye uye mugoita kuti dzipupure dzichiti akatuka allah namambo. ipapo mutorei muende naye kunze mugomutaka namabwe kusvikira afa.” saka vakuru namachinda vaigara muguta ranabhoti vakaita sezvakanga zvarayirwa najezebheri mumatsamba aakanga avanyorera. vakadaidzira zuva rokutsanya ndokugadzika nabhoti panzvimbo yakakwirira pakati pavanhu. ipapo nhubu mbiri dzakauya dzikagara dzakatarisana naye dzikapomera nabhoti mhosva pamberi pavanhu, dzichiti, “nabhoti akatuka allah namambo.” naizvozvo vakamutora vakaenda naye kunze kweguta vakamutaka namabwe kusvikira afa. ipapo vakatumira shoko kuna jezebheri vachiti, “nabhoti atakwa namabwe uye afa.” jezebheri paakangonzwa chete kuti nabhoti akanga atakwa namabwe akafa, akati kuna ahabhu, “simukai muende mundotora munda wemizambiringa wanabhoti mujezireeri waakaramba kukutengeserai. haachisiri mupenyu, asi afa.” ahabhu paakanzwa kuti nabhoti akanga afa, akasimuka akaenda kundotora munda wemizambiringa wanabhoti. zvino shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna eria mutishibhi richiti, “buruka pasi undosangana naahabhu mambo weisraeri, uyo ari kutonga musamaria. iye zvino ari mumunda wemizambiringa wanabhoti, waaenda kundotora. uti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: hauna here kuuraya munhu ukamutorera zvinhu zvake?’ ipapo uti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: panzvimbo yakananzvwa ropa ranabhoti nembwa, imbwa dzichananzva ropa rakowo ipapo, hongu, rako!’ ” ahabhu akati kuna eria, “saka wandiwanaka, muvengi wangu!” akapindura akati, “ndakuwana nokuti wazvitengesa kuti uite zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. ‘ndichauyisa dambudziko guru pamusoro pako. ndichaparadza vana vako ndigouraya murume wose weimba yaahabhu muisraeri, muranda neasiri muranda. ndichaita kuti imba yako ifanane neyajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati neyabhaasha mwanakomana waahija, nokuti waita kuti ndishatirwe uye waita kuti israeri iite chivi.’ “zvino kana ari jezebheriwo, yeahoh anoti: ‘imbwa dzichadya jezebheri pamasvingo ejezireeri.’ “imbwa dzichadya avo vaahabhu vachafira muguta, uye shiri dzedenga dzichadya avo vachafira musango.” hapana kumbova nomunhu akaita saahabhu, akazvitengesa kuti aite zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, achikurudzirwa najezebheri mukadzi wake. akaita zvinonyangadza kwazvo nokutevera zvifananidzo, sezvakanga zvaitwa navaamori, avo vakanga vadzingwa nayeahoh pamberi pavaisraeri. ahabhu paakanzwa mashoko aya, akabvarura nguo dzake, akapfeka masaga akatsanya. akapfeka masaga akafamba achizvininipisa. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna eria mutishibhi richiti, “waona here kuti ahabhu azvininipisa sei pamberi pangu? nokuti azvininipisa, handichauyisa dambudziko guru iri mumazuva ake, asi ndichariuyisa paimba yake mumazuva omwanakomana wake.”

22

kwamakore matatu pakati pearamu neisraeri pakanga pasina hondo. asi mugore rechitatu, jehoshafati mambo weyeahudha akaburuka zasi kundoona mambo weisraeri. mambo weisraeri akanga ati kuvaranda vake, “hamuzivi here kuti ramoti gireadhi ndeyedu asi hapana chatiri kuita kuti tiitore zvakare kubva kuna mambo wearamu?” uye akakumbira jehoshafati akati, “uchaenda neni here kundorwa neramoti gireadhi?” jehoshafati akapindura mambo weisraeri achiti, “ini ndakangofanana newe, vanhu vangu vakafanana nevako, mabhiza angu samabhiza ako.” asi jehoshafati akatiwo kuna mambo weisraeri, “tanga watsvaga zvinorayirwa nayeahoh.” saka mambo weisraeri akaunganidza pamwe chete, vaprofita, vangangoita varume mazana mana, akavabvunza akati, “ndoenda here kundorwa neramoti gireadhi, kana kuti ndoregera?” vakapindura vakati, “endai nokuti yeahoh achaiisa muruoko rwamambo.” asi jehoshafati akabvunza achiti, “hapana here mumwe muprofita wayeahoh pano watingabvunza?” mambo weisraeri akapindura jehoshafati akati, “pachine murume mumwe chete watinogona kubvunza yeahoh naye, asi ndinomuvenga nokuti haamboprofiti chinhu chakanaka pamusoro pangu asi zvakaipa nguva dzose. ndimikaya, mwanakomana waimura.” jehoshafati akapindura akati, “mambo haafaniri kutaura kudaro.” saka mambo weisraeri akadana mumwe wavaranda vake akati, “uyisa mikaya mwanakomana waimura izvozvi.” mambo weisraeri najehoshafati, mambo weyeahudha, vakanga vakagara pazvigaro zvavo vakapfeka nguo dzavo dzoumambo vari paburiro, pedyo nesuo resamaria, vaprofita vose vachiprofita pamberi pavo. zvino zedhekia mwanakomana wakenaana akanga agadzira nyanga dzesimbi, akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘nedzidzi muchatunga vaaramu kusvikira vaparara!’ ” vamwe vaprofita vose vakanga vachiprofita zvimwe chetezvo. vakati, “rwisai ramoti gireadhi mukunde, nokuti yeahoh achariisa muruoko rwamambo.” nhume yakanga yaenda kundodana mikaya yakati kwaari, “tarirai, somunhu mumwe chete, vamwe vaprofita vari kutaura kuti mambo vachabudirira. shoko renyu ngaribvumirane neravo, uye mutaurewo zvakanaka.” asi mikaya akati, “nayeahoh mupenyu, ndinogona chete kumuudza zvandinoudzwa nayeahoh.” paakasvika, mambo akamubvunza akati, “mikaya, toenda here kundorwa neramoti gireadhi, kana kuti torega?” akapindura akati, “rwisai mukunde nokuti yeahoh achariisa muruoko rwamambo.” mambo akati kwaari, “ndinofanira kukupikisa kangani kuti undiudze chokwadi pasina chimwe chinhu muzita rayeahoh?” ipapo mikaya akapindura akati, “ndakaona israeri yose yakapararira pamakomo samakwai asina mufudzi, uye yeahoh akati, ‘vanhu ava havana tenzi. mumwe nomumwe wavo ngaaende kumba norugare.’ ” mambo weisraeri akati kuna jehoshafati, “handina kukuudza here kuti haamboprofiti chinhu chakanaka pamusoro pangu, asi zvakaipa chete?” mikaya akaenderera mberi akati, “naizvozvo chinzwai shoko rayeahoh: ndakaona yeahoh akagara pachigaro chake choushe, uye hondo dzose dzokudenga dzakamira dzakamupoteredza kurudyi nokuruboshwe kwake. zvino yeahoh akati, ‘ndiani achaenda kundokwezva ahabhu kuti arwise ramoti gireadhi agoenda kundofira ikoko?’ “mumwe akataura izvi, mumwe akataura izvo. pakupedzisira, mumwe mweya wakauya ukamira pamberi payeahoh ukati, ‘ndichandomukwezva ini.’ “yeahoh akabvunza akati, ‘nenzira ipi?’ “iwo wakati, ‘ndichaenda ndonova mweya unoreva nhema mumiromo yavaprofita vake vose.’ “yeahoh akati, ‘uchabudirira mukumukwezva. enda undozviita.’ “saka iye zvino yeahoh aisa mweya unoreva nhema mumiromo yavaprofita venyu vose ava. yeahoh atema kuti muchawira mudambudziko guru kwazvo.” ipapo zedhekia mwanakomana wakenaana akaenda kwaari akarova mikaya nembama. akamubvunza achiti, “mweya wayeahoh wakafamba nenzira ipiko uchibva kwandiri kuti uzotaura kwauri?” mikaya akapindura akati, “uchazviziva musi wauchaenda kundohwanda muimba yomukati.” ipapo mambo weisraeri akarayira akati, “torai mikaya mumudzosere kuna amoni mutongi weguta nokuna joashi mwanakomana wamambo muti, ‘zvanzi namambo: isai munhu uyu mutorongo murege kumupa chimwe chinhu kunze kwechingwa nemvura kusvikira ndadzoka norugare.’ ” mikaya akati, “kana zvikaitika kuti madzoka norugare, yeahoh haana kutaura neni.” ipapo akatizve, “inzwai mashoko angu imi vanhu mose!” saka mambo weisraeri najehoshafati mambo weyeahudha vakaenda kuramoti gireadhi. mambo weisraeri akati kuna jehoshafati, “ndichapinda muhondo iyi ndichinge mumwe munhu, asi iwe pfeka mbatya dzako dzoumambo.” saka mambo weisraeri akazviita somumwe munhu akaenda kundorwa. zvino mambo wearamu akanga arayira vatungamiri vake vengoro makumi matatu navaviri achiti, “musarwa nomunhu upi zvake, muduku kana mukuru, kunze kwamambo weisraeri.” vatungamiri vengoro pavakaona jehoshafati, vakafunga kuti, “zvirokwazvo uyu ndiye mambo weisraeri.” naizvozvo vakatendeuka kuti vamurwise, asi jehoshafati paakaridza mhere, vatungamiri vengoro vakaona kuti akanga asiriye mambo weisraeri ndokubva varega kumutevera. asi mumwe murume akapfura museve wake chipfurepfure akabva abaya mambo weisraeri paisangana zvipenga zvembatya dzake dzehondo. mambo akati kumuchairi wengoro yake, “tendeutsa ngoro undibvise pano pari kurwiwa. ndakuvadzwa.” hondo yakarwiwa zuva rose, uye mambo akaita zvokutsigirwa mungoro yake akatarisa vaaramu. ropa rakabva paronda rake rakaerera rikaenda mukati mengoro, uye manheru iwayo akabva afa. zuva parakanga rava kuvira, kwakadaidzirwa kuhondo yose kuti, “munhu wose kuguta rake; munhu wose kunyika yake!” naizvozvo mambo akafa, akauyiswa kusamaria, akavigwa ikoko. vakasuka ngoro padziva resamaria (panova ndipo paishambira zvifeve), imbwa dzikananzva ropa rake, sezvakanga zvarehwa neshoko rayeahoh. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaahabhu, zvichisanganisira zvose zvaakaita, muzinda waakavaka nenyanga dzenzou, namaguta aakavaka, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eisraeri? ahabhu akazorora namadzibaba ake. ipapo ahazia mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. jehoshafati mwanakomana waasa akava mambo weyeahudha mugore rechina raahabhu, mambo weisraeri. jehoshafati akanga ane makore makumi matatu namashanu okuberekwa paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi maviri namashanu. zita ramai vake raiva azubha, mwanasikana washirihi. pazvinhu zvose akafamba munzira dzababa vake asa uye haana kurasika achibva padziri; akaita zvakanga zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh. zvisinei, nzvimbo dzakakwirira hadzina kubviswa, uye vanhu vakaramba vachipa zvibayiro uye vachipisa zvinonhuhwira ikoko. jehoshafati akanga ane rugarewo namambo weisraeri. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwajehoshafati, zvinhu zvaakaita nehondo dzaakarwa, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? akabvisa panyika zvifeve zvavarume zvakanga zvasara kunyange mushure menguva yokutonga kwababa vake asa. panguva iyoyo muedhomu makanga musina mambo; maitongwa nejinda. zvino jehoshafati akavaka chitsama chezvikepe chokutakurisa zvinhu zvokutengesa kuti zviende kuofiri kundotora goridhe, asi hazvina kuenda nokuti zvakaparara paezioni gebheri. panguva iyoyo ahazia mwanakomana waahabhu akati kuna jehoshafati, “regai varanda vangu vaende navaranda venyu nezvikepe zvenyu.” asi jehoshafati akaramba. ipapo jehoshafati akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa pavakavigwa muguta radhavhidhi baba vake. ipapo jehoramu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. ahazia mwanakomana waahabhu akava mambo weisraeri musamaria mugore regumi namanomwe rajehoshafati mambo weyeahudha, uye akatonga israeri kwamakore maviri. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh nokuti akafamba munzira dzababa namai vake nomunzira dzajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati, akaita kuti israeri iite chivi. akashandira uye akanamata bhaari, akaita kuti yeahoh, allah weisraeri atsamwe, sezvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake.

2_kings

1

mushure mokufa kwaahabhu, vamoabhu vakamukira israeri. zvino ahazia akanga awira pasi napawindo rekamuri reimba yake yapamusoro kusamaria akakuvara. saka akatuma nhume akati kwavari, “endai mundobvunza bhaari-zebhubhi, mwari weekironi, kuti aone kana ndichizopora pakukuvara uku.” asi mutumwa wayeahoh akati kuna eria mutishibhi, “kwira kumusoro undosangana nenhume dzamambo wesamaria uti kwavari, ‘imhaka yokuti muisraeri hamuna allah here zvamunondobvunza bhaari-zebhubhi, mwari weekironi?’ naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘hauchabva pamubhedha pawakarara ipapo. zvirokwazvo uchafa!’ ” naizvozvo eria akaenda. nhume dzakati dzadzokera kuna mambo, akavabvunza akati, “madzokereiko?” ivo vakamupindura vakati, “mumwe murume akauya akasangana nesu. zvino akati kwatiri, ‘dzokerai kuna mambo akutumai mundoti kwaari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: imhaka yokuti muisraeri hamuna allah here zvaunotuma nhume kundobvunza bhaari-zebhubhi, mwari weekironi? naizvozvo hauchaburuki pamubhedha pawakarara ipapo. zvirokwazvo uchafa!” ’ ” mambo akavabvunza akati, “ko, murume akauya akasangana nemi akakutaurirai izvi akanga akadini?” ivo vakapindura vakati, “akanga ari murume akapfeka nguo dzine mvere nebhanhire reganda muchiuno chake.” mambo akati, “ndieria mutishibhi.” ipapo akatuma mukuru weboka ravarume makumi mashanu navanhu vake kuna eria. mukuru uyu akaenda kuna eria akanga akagara pamusoro pechikomo, ndokuti kwaari, “munhu waallah, zvanzi namambo, ‘burukai!’ ” eria akamupindura akati, “kana ndiri munhu waallah, moto ngauburuke uchibva kudenga ukuparadze iwe navanhu vako makumi mashanu!” ipapo moto wakaburuka uchibva kudenga ukamuparadza iye navanhu vake. zvadaro mambo akazotumazve mumwe mukuru weboka ravarume makumi mashanu navanhu vake makumi mashanu! mukuru uyu akati kuna eria, “munhu waallah, zvanzi namambo, ‘burukai izvozvi!’ ” eria akati kwaari, “kana ndiri munhu waallah, moto ngauburuke uchibva kudenga ukuparadze iwe navanhu vako vana makumi mashanu.” ipapo moto waallah wakaburuka uchibva kudenga ukamuparadza iye navanhu vake makumi mashanu. saka mambo akatumazve mumwe mukuru wechitatu ana varume makumi mashanu. uyu mukuru wechitatu akakwira akazviwisira pasi namabvi ake pamberi paeria. akamukumbira akati, “haiwa, munhu waallah, ndapota, upenyu hwangu nohwavarume ava makumi mashanu, isu varanda venyu, ngahuve hunokosha pamberi penyu. tarirai moto wakabva kudenga ukaparadza vakuru vaviri vokutanga navanhu vavo vose. asi zvino upenyu hwangu ngahuve chinhu chinokosha pamberi penyu.” zvino mutumwa wayeahoh akati kuna eria, “buruka pamwe chete naye; usamutya.” naizvozvo eria akasimuka akaenda naye kuna mambo. akaudza mambo kuti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: imhaka yokuti muisraeri hamuna allah here zvawatuma nhume kundobvunza bhaari-zebhubhi, mwari weekironi?
