chete here kuti nditaure mashoko aya ndisingatauri kuvarume vagere parusvingo, ivo pamwe chete newe vanofanira kudya tsvina yavo nokunwa mvura yemiviri yavo?” ipapo mukuru wehondo akasimuka akadanidzira norurimi rwechihebheru achiti, “inzwai shoko ramambo mukuru, mambo weasiria! zvanzi namambo: musarega hezekia achikunyengerai. haagoni kukudzikinurai kubva muruoko rwangu musarega hezekia achikukurudzirai kuti muvimbe nayeahoh paanoti, ‘zvirokwazvo yeahoh achatirwira; guta rino harizopiwi muruoko rwamambo weasiria.’ “musateerera hezekia. zvanzi namambo weasiria: itai rugare neni mugouya kuno kwandiri. ipapo mumwe nomumwe wenyu achadya zvinobva pamuzambiringa wake napamuonde wake, uye achanwa mvura inobva muchirongo chake, kusvikira ndauya ndikakutorai ndigokuisai kunyika yakafanana neyenyu, nyika ine zvokudya newaini itsva, nyika yechingwa neminda yemizambiringa, nyika yemiti yemiorivhi nouchi. sarudzai upenyu kwete rufu! “musateerera hezekia, nokuti anokutsausai kana akati, ‘yeahoh achatirwira.’ pana mwari wenyika ipi zvayo akamborwira nyika yake kubva muruoko rwamambo weasiria? vamwari vehamati nevearipadhi varipi? vamwari vesefarivhaimi, nehena neivha varipi? vakanunura samaria muruoko rwangu here? ndiani wavamwari vose venyika idzi akagona kuponesa nyika yake kubva kwandiri? zvino yeahoh achanunura jerusarema sei kubva muruoko rwangu?” asi vanhu vakaramba vakanyarara vakasataura chinhu, nokuti mambo akanga arayira akati, “musamupindura.” ipapo eriakimi mwanakomana wahirikia mutariri womuzinda wamambo, nashebhina munyori najoa mwanakomana waasafi munyori wenhoroondo vakaenda kuna hezekia, nenguo dzavo dzakabvaruka, vakamuudza zvakanga zvataurwa nomukuru wavarwi.

19

mambo hezekia akati achizvinzwa, akabvarura nguo dzake akafuka masaga akapinda mutemberi yayeahoh. akatuma eriakimi mutariri womuzinda wamambo, nashebhina munyori navatungamiri vavaprista, vose vakapfeka masaga, kumuprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi. vakati kwaari, “zvanzi nahezekia: nhasi izuva rokutambudzika, nerokutukwa, nokunyadziswa, sezvinoita vana vasvika pakuzvarwa ipo pasina simba rokusununguka. zvimwe yeahoh allah wenyu achanzwa mashoko ose omukuru wavarwi, akatumwa natenzi wake, mambo weasiria, kuzozvidza allah mupenyu, uye kuti azomutuka nokuda kwamashoko akanzwikwa nayeahoh allah wenyu. naizvozvo unyengeterere vakasara avo vachiri vapenyu.” vabati vahezekia vakati vasvika kuna isaya, isaya akati kwavari, “udzai tenzi wenyu kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: usatya mashoko awakanzwa, mashoko andakamhurwa nawo navaranda vamambo weasiria. tarira, ndichaisa mweya maari wokuti paanonzwa mamwe mashoko, achadzokera kunyika yake, uye ndichaita kuti aurayiwe nomunondo ikoko.’ ” mukuru wavatariri paakanzwa kuti mambo weasiria akanga abva kurakishi, akadzoka akabva akaenda akandowana mambo achirwa neribhina. zvino senakeribhi akagamuchira chiziviso chaiti tirihaka, mambo weetiopia akanga achifamba achiuya kuzorwa naye. saka akatumazve nhume kuna hezekia neshoko iri rokuti: “muti kuna hezekia mambo weyeahudha: musarega allah wamunovimba naye achikunyengedzai paanoti, ‘jerusarema harizopiwa mumaoko amambo weasiria.’ zvirokwazvo makanzwa zvakaitwa namadzimambo easiria kunyika dzose, vachidziparadza zvachose. zvino imi mucharwirwa here? ko, vamwari vedzimwe ndudzi dzakaparadzwa namadzitateguru angu: vamwari vegozani, neharani, nerezefi navanhu veedheni vakanga vari muteri asari, vakavarwira here? ko, mambo wehamati aripi, namambo wearipadhi, namambo weguta resefarivhaimi, wehena kana neivha?” hezekia akagamuchira tsamba kubva kunhume uye akaiverenga. ipapo akaenda kutemberi yayeahoh akaipetenura pamberi payeahoh. uye hezekia akanyengetera kuna yeahoh achiti, “haiwa yeahoh, allah waisraeri, imi mugere pakati pamakerubhi, imi moga ndimi allah pamusoro poushe hwose hwapasi. rerekerai nzeve, imi yeahoh, munzwe; svinudzai meso enyu, imi yeahoh, muone; inzwai mashoko senakeribhi aakatuma kuti azozvidza nawo allah mupenyu. “haiwa yeahoh, ichokwadi kuti madzimambo easiria akaparadza chose ndudzi idzi nenyika dzavo. vakakanda vamwari vavo mumoto vakavaparadza, nokuti vakanga vasiri vamwari asi matanda chete namatombo, akaumbwa namaoko avanhu. haiwa yeahoh allah wedu, zvino chitirwirai kubva muruoko rwake, kuitira kuti umambo hwose hwapanyika huzive kuti imi moga, ndimi allah.” ipapo isaya mwanakomana waamozi akatuma shoko kuna hezekia akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: allah waisraeri: ndanzwa munyengetero wako pamusoro pasenakeribhi mambo weasiria. iri ndiro shoko rakataurwa nayeahoh pamusoro pake: “ ‘mhandara mwanasikana wezioni anokushora uye anokuseka. mwanasikana wejerusarema anogutsurira musoro uchitiza. ndianiko wawakazvidza uye ukamhura? wakasimudzira inzwi rako kuna aniko uye ukasimudza meso ako mukuzvikudza? ndiye mutsvene waisraeri! nenhume dzako wakaunganidza zvituko kuna yeahoh. uye wakati, “nengoro dzangu zhinji ndakakwira makomo marefu, nzvimbo refu refu dzerebhanoni. ndakatemera pasi misidhari yayo yakareba, nemipaini yayo yakaisvonaka. ndakasvika kumasango ayo kure kure, masango ayo akanakisisa. ndakachera matsime munyika yavatorwa, uye ndikanwa mvura ikoko. netsoka dzangu ndakaomesa hova dzose dzeijipiti.” “ ‘hauna kunzwa here? ndakazviita kare kare. mumazuva akare ndakazvironga; zvino ndaita kuti zviitike, kuti wakashandura maguta akakomberedzwa akava murwi wamatombo. vanhu vawo, vakapedzwa simba, vakavhundutswa uye vakanyadziswa. vakafanana nembesa dziri muminda, samabukira omuriwo mutete akasvibira, souswa huri pamusoro pemba, hwakatsva husati hwakura. “ ‘asi ndinoziva paunogara, uye kwaunobva nokwaunoenda, uye kuti wakanditsamwira sei. nokuti wakanditsamwira uye kuzvikudza kwako kwasvika munzeve dzangu, ndichaisa chiredzo changu mumhino dzako, nematomhu angu mumuromo mako, uye ndichakuita kuti udzokere nenzira yawakauya nayo.’ “ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo chako, iwe hezekia: “gore rino uchadya zvinongomera zvoga, uye mugore rechipiri zvinobva muna izvozvo. asi mugore rechitatu mudyare mugokohwa, mudyare mizambiringa uye mugodya michero yawo. uyezve vakasara veimba yayeahudha vachadzika midzi pasi vagobereka michero pamusoro. nokuti mujerusarema muchabuda vakasara, uye mugomo rezioni muchabuda chikwata chavachapunyuka. kushingaira kwayeahoh wamasimba ose kuchazviita. “naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pamambo weasiria: “ ‘haazopindi muguta iri kana kupfura museve pano. haangauyi mberi kwaro nenhoo, kana kurikomberedza negomo revhu; nenzira yaakauya nayo achadzokera, haazopindi muguta rino, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ndichadzivirira guta rino uye ndichariponesa, nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwadhavhidhi muranda wangu.’ ” usiku ihwohwo mutumwa wayeahoh akaenda akauraya varume zviuru zana namakumi masere nezvishanu mumusasa wavaasiria. vanhu pavakati vachimuka mangwana acho, wanei heyo mitumbi yavakafa! saka senakeribhi mambo weasiria akaparadza musasa akadzokera kuninevhe akandogarako. rimwe zuva, paakanga achinamata mutemberi yamwari wake nisiroki, vanakomana vake, adhiramereki nasharezeri vakamuuraya nomunondo, vakatizira kunyika yeararati. esarihadhoni mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

20

mumazuva iwayo hezekia akarwara zvokuda kufa. muprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi akaenda kwaari akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: gadzira imba yako, nokuti uchafa, hausi kuzorarama.” hezekia akatendeukira kumadziro uye akanyengetera kuna yeahoh akati, “haiwa yeahoh, rangarirai kuti ndakafamba sei pamberi penyu nokutendeka uye nomwoyo wose uye ndikaita zvakanaka pamberi penyu.” hezekia akachema zvikuru. isaya asati abva paruvanze rwapakati, shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwaari richiti, “dzokera undoudza hezekia, mutungamiri wavanhu vangu kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah wababa vako dhavhidhi: ndanzwa munyengetero wako uye ndaona misodzi yako; ndichakuporesa. nezuva retatu kubva zvino uchakwira kutemberi yayeahoh. ndichawedzera paupenyu hwako makore gumi namashanu. uye ndichakurwira iwe neguta rino. ndicharwira guta iri kubva muruoko rwamambo weasiria nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwomuranda wangu dhavhidhi.’ ” ipapo isaya akati, “gadzirai bundu ramaonde.” vakaita saizvozvo vakariisa pamota, uye akapora. hezekia akanga abvunza isaya achiti, “chiratidzo chichava chei chokuti yeahoh achandiporesa uye kuti ndichakwira kutemberi yayeahoh pazuva retatu kubva zvino here?” isaya akapindura akati, “ichi ndicho chiratidzo chayeahoh kwauri kuti yeahoh achaita zvaavimbisa: ko, ungada kuti mumvuri uende nhambwe gumi mberi here kana kudzoka mushure nhambwe gumi?” hezekia akati, “zvakareruka kuti mumvuri uende mberi nhambwe gumi. saka ngaudzoke nhambwe gumi mushure.” ipapo muprofita isaya akadana kuna yeahoh, yeahoh akadzorera mumvuri shure nhambwe gumi pamanera aahazi. panguva iyo yamerodhaki-bharadhani, mwanakomana wabharadhani mambo webhabhironi, akatumira tsamba nechipo kuna hezekia, nokuti akanga anzwa nezvokurwara kwahezekia. hezekia akagamuchira nhume akadziratidza zvose zvakanga zviri mumatura ake, sirivha negoridhe, nezvinonhuhwira, namafuta anokosha, nedura rezvombo nezvose zvaiwanikwa pakati pepfuma yake. hezekia haana chaasina kuvaratidza mumuzinda make kana muushe hwake hwose. ipapo muprofita isaya akaenda kuna mambo hezekia akamubvunza akati, “zvanzi kudini navarume avo, uye vabvepi?” hezekia akapindura akati, “vabva kunyika iri kure. vabva kubhabhironi.” muprofita akamubvunza akati, “chii chavaona mumuzinda mako?” hezekia akapindura akati, “vaona zvose zviri mumuzinda mangu. hapana chinhu chiri pakati pepfuma yangu chandisina kuvaratidza.” ipapo isaya akati kuna hezekia, “chinzwa shoko rayeahoh: zvirokwazvo nguva ichasvika yokuti zvose zviri mumuzinda mako, nezvose zvakaunganidzwa nababa vako kusvikira pazuva ranhasi, zvichatakurwa zvichiendeswa kubhabhironi. hapana chichasara, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. uye vamwe vavanakomana vako, venyama yako chaivo neropa rako, vauchabereka, vachatorwa kubva kwauri, uye vachava varanda mumuzinda wamambo webhabhironi.” hezekia akapindura akati, “shoko rayeahoh rawataura rakanaka.” nokuti akafungawo akati, “hakuchavi here norugare nokudzivirirwa munguva youpenyu hwangu?” kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwahezekia, nezvose zvaakaita uye namavakiro aakaita dziva nomugero waakauyisa nawo mvura muguta, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? hezekia akazorora namadzibaba ake. manase mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

21

manase akanga ava namakore gumi namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mashanu namashanu. zita ramai vake rainzi hefizibha. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, achitevera zvinonyangadza zvendudzi dzakadzingwa pamberi pavaisraeri nayeahoh. akavakazve matunhu akakwirira akanga aparadzwa nababa vake hezekia; uye akavaka aritari dzabhaari akaita danda raashera, sezvakanga zvaitwa naahabhu mambo weisraeri. akapfugamira nyeredzi dzose dzedenga akadzinamata. akavaka aritari mutemberi yayeahoh, makanga manzi nayeahoh, “ndichaisa zita rangu mujerusarema.” muzvivanze zvose zviri zviviri zvetemberi yayeahoh, akavakira nyeredzi dzose dzokudenga aritari. akabayira mwanakomana wake mumoto, akaita uroyi nokuvuka, akabvunza masvikiro navavuki. akaita zvakaipa zvakawanda pamberi payeahoh, akamutsa hasha dzake. akatora mufananidzo waashera wakavezwa waakanga aita akauisa mutemberi, yakanga yanzi nayeahoh kuna dhavhidhi nokumwanakomana wake soromoni, “mutemberi iyi nomujerusarema, mandakasarudza pakati pamarudzi ose aisraeri, ndichaisamo zita rangu nokusingaperi. handichaitizve kuti tsoka dzavaisraeri dzidzungaire kubva munyika yandakapa madzitateguru avo, kana vakangochenjera chete kuita zvose zvandakavarayira uye vakachengeta murayiro wose wavakapiwa nomuranda wangu mozisi.” asi vanhu havana kuteerera. manase akavatsausa, zvokuti vakanyanya kuita zvakaipa kupfuura dzimwe ndudzi dzakaparadzwa pamberi pavaisraeri nayeahoh. yeahoh akataura kubudikidza navaranda vake ivo vaprofita akati, “manase mambo weyeahudha aita zvivi zvinonyangadza izvi. aita zvakaipa zvakawanda kupfuura vaamori vakamutangira uye atungamirira yeahudha muzvivi nezvifananidzo zvake. naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: ndichauyisa dambudziko pamusoro pejerusarema neyeahudha zvokuti nzeve dzomumwe nomumwe achanzwa nezvazvo dzichaunga. ndichatambanudzira kujerusarema tambo yokuyeresa yandakayera nayo samaria nerwodzi rwandakashandisa kuyera narwo imba yaahabhu. ndichapukuta jerusarema somunhu anonopukuta ndiro, anoipukuta uye agoitsindikira. ndichafuratira vakasara venhaka yangu uye ndichavapa kuvavengi vavo. vachabirwa uye vachapambwa navavengi vavo, nokuti vakaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu vakanditsamwisa kubva pazuva rakabuda madzitateguru avo kubva muijipiti kusvikira zuva ranhasi.” pamusoro pezvo, manase akateura ropa risina mhosva rakawanda zvokuti akazadza jerusarema kubva kuno rumwe rutivi kusvika kuno rumwe, zvisiri izvozvo chete, asi nezvivi zvaakaita kuti yeahudha iite, zvokuti vakaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwamanase, nezvose zvaakaita, pamwe chete nechivi chaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? manase akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa mubindu romumuzinda wake, bindu rauza. uye amoni mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. amoni akanga ava namakore makumi maviri namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore maviri. zita ramai vake rainzi meshuremeti mwanasikana waharuzi; akanga achibva kujotibha. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaita manase baba vake. akafamba munzira dzose dzababa vake; akanamata zvifananidzo zvakanga zvanamatwa nababa vake, akazvipfugamira. akafuratira yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba ake, haana kufamba munzira yayeahoh. vabati vaamoni vakamumukira vakauraya mambo mumuzinda wake. ipapo vanhu venyika vakauraya vose vakanga vamukira mambo amoni, vakagadza mwanakomana wake josia kuti ave mambo panzvimbo yake. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwaamoni, nezvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? akavigwa muguva rake mubindu rauza. josia mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

22

josia akanga ava namakore masere paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi matatu nerimwe. zita ramai vake rainzi jedhidha mwanasikana waadhaya; aibva kubhozikati. akaita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh uye akafamba munzira dzose dzababa vake dhavhidhi, akasatsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. mugore regumi namasere rokutonga kwake, mambo josia akatuma munyori, shafani mwanakomana waazaria, mwanakomana wameshurami, kutemberi yayeahoh. akati kwaari, “enda kuna hirikia muprista mukuru umuudze kuti averenge mari yakauyiswa mutemberi yayeahoh, iya yakaunganidzwa navarindi vomukova ichibva kuvanhu. uite kuti vaipe kuvarume vakagadzwa kuti vatarire basa rapatemberi. uye varume ava vanofanira kuripa vabati vanogadzira temberi yayeahoh, vavezi, navavaki navavezi vamatombo. uyezve uite kuti vatenge matanda namatombo akavezwa kuti vagadzirise temberi. asi havafaniri kubvunzwa pamusoro pemari yakaiswa mumaoko avo, nokuti ivo vakatendeka pakubata kwavo.” hirikia muprista mukuru akati kuna shafani munyori, “ndawana bhuku romurayiro mutemberi yayeahoh.” akaripa kuna shafani, uyo akariverenga. ipapo shafani munyori akaenda kuna mambo akandomuzivisa kuti: “vabati venyu varipa mari iya yakanga iri mutemberi yayeahoh vakaipa kuvashandi navatariri vapatemberi.” ipapo shafani munyori akazivisa mambo achiti, “hirikia muprista andipa bhuku.” uye shafani akariverenga pamberi pamambo. mambo akati anzwa mashoko ebhuku romurayiro, akabvarura nguo dzake. akarayira hirikia muprista, naahikami mwanakomana washafani, naakibhori mwanakomana wamikaya, nashafani munyori, naasaya muranda wamambo achiti, “endai munondibvunzirawo yeahoh, ini navanhu ava, uye navanhu vose veyeahudha, pamusoro pezvakanyorwa mubhuku rakawanikwa iri. nokuti kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwaakatitsamwira nako kukuru nokuda kwamadzibaba edu asina kuteerera mashoko ebhuku iri; havana kuita zvose zvakafanira zvakanyorwa pamusoro pedu.” hirikia muprista, naahikami, naakibhori, nashafani naasaya vakaenda kundotaura nahuridha muprofitakadzi, akanga ari mukadzi washarumi mwanakomana watikivha, mwanakomana waharihasi, muchengeti wenguo. aigara mujerusarema, mudunhu rechipiri. akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah weisraeri: udzai murume akutumai kwandiri kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndichauyisa dambudziko pamusoro penzvimbo ino navanhu vayo, zvichienderana nezvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku rakaverengwa namambo weyeahudha. nokuti vakandirasa, vakapisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari, vakanditsamwisa nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvose zvavakaita namaoko avo, kutsamwa kwangu kuchapfuta pamusoro penzvimbo ino uye hakungadzimwi.’ udzai mambo weyeahudha, akutumai kuzobvunza yeahoh, kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, pamusoro pamashoko amakanzwa: nokuti mwoyo wako wakanga uri munyoro uye ukazvininipisa pamberi payeahoh pawakanzwa zvandakataura pamusoro penzvimbo ino navanhu vayo, kuti vachatukwa uye kuti vachaitwa dongo, uye nokuti wakabvarura nguo dzako ukachema pamberi pangu, ndakunzwa, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. naizvozvo ndichakurongedza kumadzibaba ako, uye uchavigwa murugare. meso ako haachazooni matambudziko ose andichauyisa panzvimbo ino.’ ” naizvozvo vakaendesa mhinduro yake kuna mambo.

23

ipapo mambo akaunganidza vakuru vose veyeahudha nejerusarema pamwe chete. akakwidza achienda kutemberi yayeahoh navarume veyeahudha, navanhu vejerusarema, vaprista navaprofita, navanhu vose kubva kuvaduku kusvikira kuvakuru. akaverenga vachinzwa mashoko ose ebhuku resungano, rakanga rawanikwa mutemberi yayeahoh. mambo akamira pambiru akavandudza sungano pamberi payeahoh, kuti atevere yeahoh uye achengete zvaakarayira, nezvaakatema nemitemo yake nomwoyo wake wose, nomweya wake wose nokudaro achisimbisa mashoko esungano akanyorwa mubhuku iri. ipapo vanhu vose vakazvipira kusungano. zvino mambo akarayira hirikia muprista mukuru, navaprista vaimutevera paukuru navarindi vemikova kuti vabvise mutemberi yayeahoh zvose zvakanga zvaitirwa bhaari naashera nenyeredzi dzose dzokudenga. akazvipisira kunze kwejerusarema muminda yomupata wekidhironi, akaendesa madota azvo kubheteri. akabvisa vaprista vezvifananidzo vakanga vagadzwa namadzimambo eyeahudha kuti vapisire zvinonhuhwira pamatunhu akakwirira amaguta eyeahudha napamusoro penzvimbo dzakapoteredza jerusarema, vaya vaipisira zvinonhuhwira kuna bhaari, nokuzuva nomwedzi nokunyeredzi dzose dzokudenga. akabvisa danda raashera mutemberi yayeahoh akariisa kumupata wekidhironi kunze kwejerusarema akaripisirako. akarikuya rikava madota, akaparadzira madota acho pamusoro pamarinda avanhuwo zvavo. akaputsawo dzimba dzezvifeve zvavarume zvapatemberi dzaiva mutemberi yayeahoh mairukira vakadzi machira aashera. josia akabudisa vaprista vose vaibva mumaguta eyeahudha akashatisa matunhu akakwirira, kubva kugebha kusvikira kubheerishebha, kwaipisirwa zvinonhuhwira navaprista. akaputsa dzimba dzapamatunhu akakwirira apamasuo apamukova wesuo rayeahoshua, mutongi weguta, raiva kuruboshwe rwesuo reguta. kunyange zvazvo vaprista vamatunhu akakwirira vakanga vasingashumiri paaritari yayeahoh mujerusarema, vakadya zvingwa zvisina mbiriso pamwe chete nehama dzavo vaprista. akashatisa tofeti iri mumupata webheni hinomi, kuitira kuti pasava nomunhu angapashandisa kubayira mwanakomana wake kana mwanasikana wake mumoto kuna moreki. akabvisa pasuo retemberi yayeahoh mabhiza akanga akumikidzwa kuzuva namadzimambo eyeahudha, akanga ari muchivanze pedyo nekamuri romubati ainzi natani-mereki. ipapo josia akapisa ngoro dzakanga dzakakumikidzwa kuzuva. akaputsira pasi aritari dzakanga dzavakwa namadzimambo eyeahudha pamusoro pedenga, pedyo nekamuri rapamusoro raahazia, nearitari dzakanga dzavakwa namanase muzvivanze zviviri zvetemberi yayeahoh. akadzibvisapo, akadziputsa-putsa uye akakanda marara acho mumupata wekidhironi. mambo akashatisawo matunhu akakwirira akanga ari kumabvazuva kwejerusarema nechezasi kwechikomo chouori, izvo zvakanga zvavakwa nasoromoni mambo weisraeri achivakira ashitoreti mwari anonyangadza wavasidhoni nakemoshi mwari anonyangadza wavamoabhu, namoreki mwari anonyangadza wavaamoni. josia akaputsa-putsa shongwe dzamatombo aiera akatema matanda aashera akafukidza nzvimbo dzacho namapfupa avanhu. pamusoro paizvozvo, akaparadza aritari pabheteri nenzvimbo yakakwirira yakaitwa najerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati, uyo akaita kuti israeri itadze, kunyange aritari iyoyo nenzvimbo yakakwirira akazviputsa. akapisa nzvimbo yakakwirira akaikuya kuita upfu, uye akapisawo danda raashera. ipapo josia akatarira-tarira uye paakaona makuva akanga aripo pamusoro pechikomo, akarayira kuti mapfupa abviswe maari uye apiswe paaritari kuti aishatise, maererano neshoko rayeahoh rakaparidzwa nomunhu waallah akaprofita zvinhu izvi. mambo akabvunza akati, “ko, shongwe yeguva yandinoona iyo ndeyani?” varume vomuguta vakati, “ndiyo inoratidza guva romunhu waallah akabva kuyeahudha akaprofita pamusoro pearitari yebheteri nezvinhu izvi zvamaita kwairi.” iye akati, “regai azorore. ngakurege kuva nomunhu anokanganisa mapfupa ake.” naizvozvo vakarega mapfupa ake pamwe chete neomuprofita akanga abva kusamaria. josia akaita zvimwe chetezvo sezvaakanga aita pabheteri akabvisa uye akashatisa temberi dzose dzapamatunhu akakwirira dzakanga dzavakwa namadzimambo eisraeri mumaguta esamaria, akanga atsamwisa yeahoh, josia akauraya vaprista vose vokumatunhu akakwirira pamusoro pearitari uye akapisirapo mapfupa avanhu. ipapo akabva adzokera kujerusarema. mambo akarayira vanhu vose akati, “itirai yeahoh allah wenyu pasika sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku iri resungano.” hakuna kumbova nepasika yakadai kubvira pamazuva avatongi vakatungamirira israeri kana pamazuva amadzimambo avaisraeri, namadzimambo eyeahudha. asi mugore regumi namasere ramambo josia, pasika iyi yakaitirwa yeahoh mujerusarema. pamusoro paizvozvo, josia akabvisa masvikiro ose navavuki, navaiita zvemidzimu, nezvifananidzo nezvimwe zvose zvinonyangadza zvaionekwa muyeahudha nomujerusarema. akaita izvi kuti azadzise zvaidikanwa nomurayiro wakanga wakanyorwa mubhuku rakanga rakawanikwa nomuprista hirikia mutemberi yayeahoh. hapana kumbova namambo akaita sajosia kuna vakamutangira kana vakamutevera, akatendeukira kuna yeahoh nomwoyo wake wose, nomweya wake wose, uye nesimba rake rose, sezvaakaita achitevera murayiro wose wamozisi. kunyange zvakadaro, yeahoh haana kushanduka pakupisa kwehasha dzake dzinotyisa, dzaipisira yeahudha nokuda kwezvose zvakaitwa namanase achimutsamwisa. naizvozvo yeahoh akati, “ndichabvisawo yeahudha pamberi pangu sokubvisa kwandakaita israeri, uye ndicharamba jerusarema, guta randakasarudza, netemberi iyi, yandakataura pamusoro payo ndichiti, ‘zita rangu richagarapo.’ ” kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika pakutonga kwajosia, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? josia paakanga ari mambo, faro neko mambo weijipiti akaenda kurwizi yufuratesi kuti andobatsira mambo weasiria. mambo josia akaenda kundorwisana naye, asi neko akamuona akamuuraya pamegidho. varanda vajosia vakatakura mutumbi wake mungoro kubva kumegidho kusvika kujerusarema vakamuviga muguva rake. vanhu vomunyika imomo vakatora jehoahazi mwanakomana wajosia vakamuzodza uye vakamuita mambo panzvimbo yababa vake. jehoahazi akanga ava namakore makumi maviri namatatu paakava mambo, akatonga kwemwedzi mitatu mujerusarema. zita ramai vake rainzi hamutari mwanasikana wajeremia, vaibva kuribhina. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaitwa namadzibaba ake. faro neko akamusunga nengetani paribhira munyika yehamati kuti asatonga mujerusarema, uye akaisa mutero pamusoro peyeahudha wamatarenda zana esirivha netarenda regoridhe. faro neko akagadza eriakimi mwanakomana wajosia kuti ave mambo panzvimbo yababa vake uye josia akashandura zita raeriakimi kuti rive jehoyakimi. asi akatora jehoahazi akaenda naye kuijipiti, uye ndiko kwaakafira. jehoyakimi akapa faro neko sirivha negoridhe sezvaakanga areva. kuti aite izvozvo, akaripisa vanhu vomunyika imomo mutero achitora sirivha negoridhe kubva kuvanhu venyika maererano nezvavakanga vatarirwa. jehoyakimi akanga ava namakore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, uye akatonga kwamakore gumi nerimwe mujerusarema. zita ramai vake rainzi zebhidha mwanasikana wapedhaya; vaibva kuruma. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaitwa namadzibaba ake.

24

mumazuva okutonga kwajehoyakimi nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akakunda nyika, jehoyakimi akava muranda wake kwamakore matatu. asi akazoshandura pfungwa dzake akamukira nebhukadhinezari. yeahoh akatuma vabhabhironi navaaramu navamoabhu uye navaamoni kuti vazorwisa. akavatuma kunoparadza yeahudha, sezvakarehwa neshoko rayeahoh rakataurwa navaranda vake navaprofita. zvirokwazvo zvinhu izvi zvakaitika kuna yeahudha sezvazvakarayirwa nayeahoh, kuitira kuti avabvise pamberi pake nokuda kwezvivi zvamanase nezvose zvaakaita, zvinosanganisira kuteura ropa risina mhosva. nokuti akanga azadza jerusarema neropa risina mhosva, uye yeahoh akanga asingadi kumukanganwira. kana zviri zvimwe zvakaitika pakutonga kwajehoyakimi, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo eyeahudha? jehoyakimi akazorora namadzibaba ake. uye jehoyakini, mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. mambo weijipiti haana kuzobudazve kubva munyika yake nokuti mambo webhabhironi akanga atora nyika yake yose, kubva kurwizi rweijipiti kusvikira kurwizi yufuratesi. jehoyakini akanga ava namakore gumi namasere paakava mambo, uye akatonga kwemwedzi mitatu mujerusarema. zita ramai vake rainzi nehushita mwanasikana waerinatani; vaibva mujerusarema. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake. panguva iyoyo varanda vanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi vakaenda kujerusarema vakarikomba, uye nebhukadhinezari pachake akasvika kuguta, varanda vake pavakanga vakarikomba. jehoyakini mambo weyeahudha, namai vake, navaranda vake, namakurukota ake, navabati vake vakazvipira vose kwaari. mugore regumi namasere rokutonga kwamambo webhabhironi, akatora jehoyakini akamuita musungwa. sezvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh, nebhukadhinezari akabvisa pfuma yose mutemberi yayeahoh nomumuzinda wamambo, uye akatora midziyo yose yegoridhe yakanga yaitirwa temberi yayeahoh nasoromoni mambo weisraeri. akatapa jerusarema rose: vabati vose navarume vehondo vose, navarume voumhizha vose, navapfuri vesimbi, vaiva vanhu zviuru gumi. varombo vokupedzisira ndivo vakasara chete munyika imomo. nebhukadhinezari akatora jehoyakini akamuita nhapwa kubhabhironi. akatorawo mai vamambo, navakadzi vake, navabati vake navarume vaitungamirira nyika mujerusarema akavaendesa kubhabhironi. mambo webhabhironi akabudisawo hondo yose yavarume zviuru zvinomwe, vakasimba pakurwa, nechiuru chimwe chete chavarume voumhizha navapfuri vesimbi akavaendesa kubhabhironi. akaita matania babamunini vajehoyakini, mambo panzvimbo yajehoyakini uye akashandura zita rake akamutumidza kuti zedhekia. zedhekia akanga ana makore makumi maviri nerimwe chete paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi nerimwe. zita ramai vake rainzi hamutari mwanasikana wajeremia; vaibva kuribhina. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaita jehoyakini. izvi zvakaitika kujerusarema neyeahudha nokuda kwehasha dzayeahoh, uye pakupedzisira akavabvisa pamberi pake. zvino zedhekia akamukira mambo webhabhironi.

25

naizvozvo mugore repfumbamwe rokutonga kwazedhekia, pazuva regumi romwedzi wegumi, nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akaenda kundorwisana nejerusarema nehondo yake yose. akavaka misasa akakomberedza guta uye akavakawo nhare dzakanga dzakarikomberedza. guta rakaramba rakakombwa kusvikira pagore regumi nerimwe chete ramambo zedhekia. pazuva repfumbamwe romwedzi wechina nzara yakanyanya muguta zvokuti makanga musisina zvokudya zvavanhu. ipapo rusvingo rweguta rwakapwanyiwa, hondo yose ikatiza usiku napasuo raiva pakati pamasvingo maviri pedyo nebindu ramambo, kunyange vebhabhironi vakanga vakakomba guta. vakatiza vakananga kuarabha, asi hondo yavabhabhironi yakadzinganisa mambo ikamubatira mumapani ejeriko. varwi vake vose vakaparadzaniswa naye vakapararira. akabatwa akaendeswa kuna mambo webhabhironi paribhira, kwaakandotongwa. vakauraya vanakomana vazedhekia pamberi pake achizviona. ipapo vakamutushura meso ake, vakamusunga nezvisungo zvamatare vakamutora vakaenda naye kubhabhironi. pazuva rechinomwe romwedzi wechishanu, mugore regumi nepfumbamwe ranebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, nebhuzaradhani mukuru wehondo yavachengeti vamambo, muranda wamambo webhabhironi, akauya kujerusarema. akapisa temberi yayeahoh, nomuzinda wamambo nedzimba dzose dzejerusarema. akapisa, dzimba dzose dzaikosha. hondo yose yebhabhironi yaiva pasi pomukuru wavarindi vamambo yakaputsa masvingo aipoteredza jerusarema. nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akaendesa kuutapwa vanhu vakanga vasara muguta, pamwe chete navamwe vanhu vose zvavo navaya vakanga vaenda kuna mambo webhabhironi. asi mukuru wavarindi akasiya vanhu vakanga vari varombo vokupedzisira munyika kuti vashande muminda yemizambiringa nemimwe minda. vanhu vebhabhironi vakaputsa mbiru dzendarira, zvigadziko negungwa rendarira zvakanga zviri mutemberi yayeahoh vakatakura ndarira vakaenda nayo kubhabhironi. vakatorawo hari, nefoshoro, nezvidzimiso zvemwenje, nemadhishi uye nemidziyo yose yendarira yaishandiswa mutemberi. mukuru wehondo yavarindi vamambo akatora zvaenga zvezvinonhuhwira namadhishi okusasa nawo, nezvose zvakanga zvakagadzirwa negoridhe rakaisvonaka kana sirivha. ndarira yakabva pambiru mbiri, gungwa nezvigadziko zvakanga zvagadzirirwa temberi yayeahoh nasoromoni, yakanga yakawanda zvokuti yaisagona kuyerwa. mbiru imwe neimwe yaiva yakareba makubhiti gumi namasere. musoro wendarira waiva pamusoro pembiru wakanga wakareba makubhiti matatu uye wakanga wakashongedzwa nomumbure uye namatamba endarira akanga akaupoteredza. imwe mbiru nomumbure wayo yakanga yakadarowo. mukuru wavarindi akatora seraya muprista mukuru nazefania muprista aimutevera paukuru navachengeti vomukova vatatu akavaita vasungwa. pane avo vakanga vasara muguta, akatora mukuru wavarwi navapi vamazano vamambo vashanu. akatorawo munyori akanga ari mubati mukuru ainyoresa vanhu venyika kuti vave varwi navamwe vanhu vake vaisvika makumi matanhatu vakawanikwa muguta. nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akavatora vose akavaendesa kuna mambo webhabhironi paribhura. ipapo paribhura munyika yehamati, mambo akarayira kuti vaurayiwe. saka yeahudha yakaenda kuutapwa, kure nenyika yayo. nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akagadza gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani, kuti atonge vanhu vaakanga asiya muyeahudha. vakuru vose vehondo navanhu vavo pavakanzwa kuti mambo webhabhironi akanga agadza gedharia kuti ave mutongi, vakauya kuna gedharia pamizipa, ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, najohanani mwanakomana wakarea, naseraya mwanakomana watanhumeti munetofati, najaazania mwanakomana womumaakati, navanhu vavo. gedharia akaita mhiko kuti avasimbise, ivo navanhu vavo. akati kwavari, “musatya vabati vomubhabhironi. garai munyika mushandire mambo webhabhironi zvigokunakirai.” kunyange zvakadaro, mumwedzi wechinomwe ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, mwanakomana waerishama, akanga ari weropa roushe, akauya navarume gumi akauraya gedharia navarume veyeahudha nevebhabhironi vaiva naye pamizipa. zvadai, vanhu vose kubva kuvadiki kusvika kuvakuru navakuru vehondo pamwe chete vakatizira kuijipiti, vachitya vabhabhironi. mugore ramakumi matatu namanomwe rokutapwa kwajehoyakini mambo weyeahudha, mugore rakatanga evhiri-merodhaki mambo webhabhironi kutonga, akasunungura jehoyakini kubva muusungwa pazuva ramakumi manomwe romwedzi wegumi nemiviri. akataura zvakanaka kwaari akamupa chigaro chokukudzwa chakapfuura chamamwe madzimambo akanga anaye mubhabhironi. naizvozvo jehoyakini akabvisa nguo dzake dzousungwa uye akadya patafura yamambo nguva nenguva pamazuva ose oupenyu hwake. zuva nezuva mambo akapa jehoyakini mugove wezuva rimwe nerimwe mazuva ose oupenyu hwake.

isaiah

1

chiratidzo chaisaya mwanakomana waamozi, chaakaona pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema pamazuva auzia najotamu, naahazi nahezekia, madzimambo eyeahudha. inzwai imi matenga! teerera iwe nyika! nokuti yeahoh akataura achiti, “ndakarera vana ndikavakudza, asi ivo vakandimukira. nzombe inoziva vatenzi vayo, nembongoro inoziva chidyiro chomwene wayo, asi israeri haizivi, vanhu vangu havanzwisisi.” haiwa, rudzi runotadza, vanhu vakaremerwa nezvakaipa, vana vavaiti vezvakaipa, vana vanoita zvakaora! vakasiya yeahoh; vakashora mutsvene waisraeri vakamufuratira. mucharambireiko muchingorohwa? munorambireiko muchimukira yeahoh? musoro wenyu wose wakuvadzwa, mwoyo wenyu wose warwadziwa. kubvira pasi porutsoka rwako kusvikira panhongonya yomusoro wako hapana pakukutu, anongova maronda nokurwadziwa namavanga akazaruka, asina kusukwa kana kusungwa kana kuzorwa mafuta. nyika yenyu yaparadzwa, maguta enyu apiswa nomoto; minda yenyu iri kutorwa navatorwa pamberi penyu chaipo, nyika yaparadzwa sapanoparadza vatorwa. mwanasikana wezioni asiyiwa sedumba mumunda wemizambiringa, seimba mumunda wamanwiwa, seguta rakakombwa. dai yeahoh wamasimba ose asina kutisiyira vakapunyuka, tingadai takafanana nesodhomu, tingadai takaita segomora. inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi vabati vesodhomu; teererai kumurayiro waallah wedu, imi vanhu vegomora! “zvibayiro zvenyu zvizhinji, zvinyiko kwandiri?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “zvibayiro zvinopiswa zvawandisa, zvamakondobwe namafuta ezvipfuwo zvakakodzwa; handifadzwi neropa renzombe, ramakwayana nerembudzi. pamunouya kuzozviratidza pamberi pangu, ndianiko akambokukumbirai izvi kwamuri, naikoku kutsika-tsika pavazhe dzangu? regai kuuya nezvipiriso zvisina maturo! zvinonhuhwira zvenyu zvinondinyangadza. nguva dzokugara kwomwedzi, masabata nenguva dzekokorodzano, handigoni kufarira ungano dzenyu dzakaipa. mitambo yenyu yokugara kwomwedzi nemitambo yenyu yakatsaurwa inovengwa nomweya wangu. zvava mutoro kwandiri; ndaneta nokuzvitakura. pamunotambanudza maoko enyu muchinyengetera, ini ndichakuvanzirai chiso changu; kunyange mukawanza munyengetero, handisi kuzokunzwai. maoko enyu azere neropa; shambai muzvinatse. bvisai mabasa enyu akaipa pamberi pangu! regai kuita zvakaipa, dzidzai kuita zvakarurama. tsvakai kururamisira, kurudzirai vakamanikidzwa. dzivirirai nherera, mukumbirire chirikadzi. “chiuyai zvino titaurirane,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kunyange zvivi zvenyu zviri zvitsvuku zvichachena sechando; kunyange zviri zvishava somuti mushava, zvichaita samakushe amakwai. kana muchida uye muchiteerera muchadya zvakanakisa zvenyika; asi kana muchiramba uye muchindimukira, muchaparadzwa nomunondo.” nokuti muromo wayeahoh wazvitaura. tarirai guta rakatendeka rava chifeve sei! iro rakanga rizere nokururamisira; kururama kwaigara mariri, asi zvino mogara mhondi! sirivha yako yava nengura, waini yako yakavhenganiswa nemvura. machinda ako vapanduki, ishamwari dzembavha; vose vanoda fufuro, uye vanomhanyira zvipo. havana hanya nokudzivirira nherera; mhaka yechirikadzi haiuyiswi pamberi pavo. naizvozvo ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose, anesimba waisraeri, anotaura achiti, “haiwa, ndichadurura hasha dzangu pamusoro pavadzivisi vangu, nokuzvitsivira vavengi vangu. ndichatambanudzira ruoko rwangu kwauri; ndichapedza chose ngura yako ndigobvisa kusachena kwako kwose. ndichadzosera vatongi vako sapamazuva akare, namakurukota ako sapamazuva okutanga. shure kwaizvozvo uchanzi guta rokururama, guta rakatendeka.” zioni richadzikinurwa nokururamiswa, navanotendeuka varo, nokururama. asi vapanduki navatadzi vachaparadzwa vose, uye vose vanosiya yeahoh vachaparara. “nokuti muchanyadziswa nokuda kwemiti yomuouki yamunoeresa, yamunofadzwa nayo; muchanyadziswa nokuda kwamapindu amakasarudza. muchafanana nomuouki wasvava mashizha, sebindu risina mvura. murume ane simba achava serwodzi nebasa rake sesasaradzi; zvose zvichatsva pamwe chete, pasina achadzima moto.”

2

izvi ndizvo zvakaonekwa naisaya mwanakomana waamozi, pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema: mumazuva okupedzisira, gomo retemberi yayeahoh richasimbiswa, richava guru pakati pamakomo; richakwiridzirwa pamusoro pezvikomo, uye ndudzi dzose dzichamhanyira kwariri. ndudzi zhinji dzichauya dzichiti, “uyai ngatiendei kugomo rayeahoh, kuimba yaallah wayaqobho iye achatidzidzisa nzira dzake, kuitira kuti tigofamba mumakwara ake.” nokuti murayiro uchabva pazioni, shoko rayeahoh richabva kujerusarema. achatonga pakati pendudzi uye achapedza gakava pakati pamarudzi mazhinji. vachapfura minondo yavo vagoiita miromo yamagejo, namapfumo avo vagoaita mapanga okuchekerera miti nawo. rudzi rumwe harungazosimudziri munondo kuno rumwe rudzi, kana kuzodzidzirazve kurwa. uyai, imi imba yayaqobho, ngatifambei muchiedza chayeahoh. nokuti makasiya vanhu venyu, ivo imba yayaqobho. vakazara nezvinamato zvokumabvazuva; vanoita zvokuvuka kufanana navafiristia, vachibatana maoko nevedzimwe ndudzi. nyika yavo izere nesirivha negoridhe; pfuma yavo haiperi. nyika yavo izere namabhiza; ngoro dzavo hadziperi. nyika yavo izere nezvifananidzo; vanopfugamira mabasa amaoko avo, kuzvinhu zvakaitwa neminwe yavo. naizvozvo munhu achaderedzwa uye marudzi avanhu achaninipiswa, musavakanganwira. pinda mumapako, uvande muguruva, ubve mukutyisa kwayeahoh nokubwinya kwoumambo hwake! meso omunhu anozvikudza achaninipiswa, uye kuzvikudza kwavanhu kuchaderedzwa; asi yeahoh oga ndiye achakudzwa pazuva iro. nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose ane zuva raakachengetera avo vose vanozvikudza navanodada, navose vanokudzwa (uye vachaninipiswa), nemisidhari yose yerebhanoni, yakareba neyakakwirira, nemiouki yose yebhashani, namakomo ose akakwirira, nezvikomo zvose zvakakwirira, neshongwe dzose dzakakwirira, namasvingo ose akasimba, nezvikepe zvose zvetashishi, nemidziyo yose yakanaka. kuzvikudza kwomunhu kuchaderedzwa, uye kuzvikudza kwavanhu kuchaninipiswa; yeahoh oga ndiye achakudzwa pazuva iro, uye zvifananidzo zvichapera zvachose. vanhu vachatizira kumapako amatombo, nokumwena yapasi nokuda kwayeahoh anotyisa, uye nokubwinya kwoumambo hwake, paanosimuka achizungunutsa nyika. pazuva iro vanhu vacharasira kumakonzo nokuzviremwaremwa, zvifananidzo zvavo zvesirivha nezvifananidzo zvegoridhe, zvavakaita kuti vazvinamate. vachatizira kumapako amatombo nokumikaha yakarembera, nokuda kwokutya yeahoh, uye nokubwinya kwoumambo hwake, paanosimuka kuti azungunutse nyika. regai kuvimba nomunhu, anongova nokufema mumhino dzake. anobatsireiko?

3

tarirai zvino, ishe yeahoh wamasimba ose ava kuda kutora zvose rutsigiro nomudonzvo, kubva kujerusarema neyeahudha; rutsigiro rwose rwezvokudya norutsigiro rwose rwemvura, mhare nomurwi, mutongi nomuprofita, muvuki nomukuru, mukuru wamakumi mashanu nomunhu anokudzwa, gurukota nomurume weumhizha, nomuvuki anoziva. ndichaita kuti majaya ave vabati vavo; vana vadiki ndivo vachavatonga. vanhu vachadzvinyirirana, munhu nomunhu, muvakidzani nomuvakidzani. vadiki vachamukira vakuru, nounozvidza achamukira anokudzwa. murume achabata mumwe wavanunʼuna vake paimba yababa vake achiti, “ndiwe une nguo, chiva mutungamiri wedu; iva mutariri wedutu roungwandangwanda uhu!” asi pazuva iro achadanidzira achiti, “handigoni kugadzirisa zvinhu. handina chokudya kana chokufuka mumba mangu; musandiita mutungamiri wavanhu.” jerusarema rozungunuka, yeahudha riri kuwa; mashoko avo nezviito zvavo zvinopesana nayeahoh, vachizvidza kuvapo kwake kunobwinya. zvinoonekwa pazviso zvavo zvinovapupurira; vanoburitsa chivi chavo pachena sesodhomu; havambochivanzi. vane nhamo! vanouyisa njodzi pamusoro pavo. udzai vakarurama kuti zvichavanakira, nokuti vachanakirwa nezvibereko zvamabasa avo. vane nhamo vakaipa! njodzi yava kuda kuvawira! vacharipirwa zvakabatwa namaoko avo. vadiki vanomanikidza vanhu vangu, vakadzi vanovatonga. haiwa, vanhu vangu, vatungamiri venyu vanokutsausai; vanokubvisai munzira. yeahoh anotora nzvimbo yake muimba yokutonga; anosimuka kuti atonge vanhu. yeahoh anopinda mukutonga vakuru navatungamiri vavanhu vake achiti, “ndimi makaparadza munda wangu womuzambiringa; zvakapambwa zvinobva kuvarombo zviri mudzimba dzenyu. munoreveiko zvamunopwanya vanhu vangu, uye muchikuya zviso zvavarombo?” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh wamasimba ose. yeahoh anoti, “vakadzi vezioni vanozvikudza, vanofamba vakamisa mitsipa yavo. vachichonya nameso avo, uye vanofamba vachinzenzeta, vaine zvishongo zvinorira muzviziso zvamakumbo avo. naizvozvo yeahoh achauyisa maronda pamisoro yavakadzi vezioni; yeahoh achaitisa misoro yavo mhanza.” pazuva iro yeahoh achabvisa pazviziso zvamakumbo avo: mabhenguro, nezvishongo zvomusoro, neungetani hwomutsipa hunonʼaima, nemhete dzenzeve, nezvingetani zvomumaoko, namavhoiri nezvishongo zvebvudzi, nezvingetani zvomuzviziso zvamakumbo, nemasikavha, namabhodhoro amafuta anonhuhwira, namazango, nemhete, noukomba hwemhino, nenguo dzakanaka dzomutambo, nezvijasi, namakepesi namajasi nezvikwama, nezvionioni, nenguo dzomucheka wakaisvonaka, nezvishongo namashaweri. pachinzvimbo chezvinonhuhwira, pachava nokunhuhwa; pachinzvimbo chesikavha, pachava netambo; pachinzvimbo chebvudzi rakashongedzwa zvakanaka, pachava nemhanza; pachinzvimbo chembatya dzakaisvonaka, pachava nechipfeko chesaga; pachinzvimbo chorunako, pachava nokupiswa. varume venyu vachafa nomunondo, varwi venyu vachafa muhondo. masuo ezioni achachema uye achaungudza; nokutambura kwaro, richagara pasi.

4

pazuva iro vakadzi vanomwe vachabata murume mumwe vagoti, “tichadya zvokudya zvedu uye tichazvitsvakira zvokufuka. tinongoda kudanwa nezita rako bedzi. bvisa kunyadziswa kwedu!” pazuva iro, davi rayeahoh richava rakanaka uye richabwinya, uye zvibereko zvenyika zvichava chidadiso nokukudzwa kwavakapunyuka muisraeri. vaya vakasara muzioni, navakasara mujerusarema, vachanzi vatsvene, navose vakanyorwa pakati pavapenyu mujerusarema. yeahoh achashambidza tsvina yevakadzi vezioni; achanatsa makwapa eropa kubva mujerusarema nomweya wokutonga uye nomweya womoto. ipapo yeahoh achasika pamusoro pegomo rose rezioni napamusoro pavose vanoungana ikoko gore routsi masikati nezhenje romoto unopfuta usiku; pamusoro pokubwinya kwose pachava nechidzitiro. chichava chifukidzo nomumvuri kubva pakupisa kwezuva, noutiziro, nenzvimbo yokuvanda kubva padutu nemvura inonaya.

5

ndichaimbira mudiwa wangu rwiyo pamusoro pomunda wake wemizambiringa: mudiwa wangu akanga ane munda wake wemizambiringa, pachikomo chakaorera. akautimbira akabvisa mabwe akasimamo mazambiringa akaisvonaka. akavaka shongwe mukati mawo uye akauchererawo chisviniro chewaini. ipapo akatarisa kuti awane zvibereko zvamazambiringa akanaka, asi iwo wakangobereka muchero wakaipa chete. “zvino imi vagari vomujerusarema nemi varume veyeahudha, chitongai pakati pangu nomunda wemizambiringa wangu. chiiko chimwezve chaifanira kuitirwa munda wangu wemizambiringa chandisina kuuitira? pandakatsvaka mazambiringa akanaka, wakagoberekerei akaipa oga? zvino ndichakuudzai zvandichaitira munda wangu wemizambiringa: ndichabvisa ruzhowa rwawo, ugoparadzwa; ndichaputsa rusvingo rwawo, ugochatsikwa-tsikwa. ndichauita nzvimbo yamarara, hauzochekererwi kana kusakurirwa, uye minzwa norukato zvichakuramo. ndicharayira makore kuti arege kunayisa mvura pamusoro pawo.” munda womuzambiringa wayeahoh wamasimba ose ndiwo imba yaisraeri, uye varume veyeahudha ndivo bindu rake rinomufadza. zvino akatarisira kururamisira asi akaona kuteuka kweropa; akatsvaka kururuma, asi akanzwa kuchema kwokutambudzika. mune nhamo imi munowedzera dzimba nedzimba uye munobatanidza munda nomunda, kusvikira pasisina nzvimbo yasara, mugogara moga munyika. yeahoh wamasimba ose akataura ndichinzwa akati, “zvirokwazvo dzimba zhinji dzichava matongo, dzimba huru dzakanaka dzichashaya vanogaramo. maeka gumi omunda wemizambiringa achabereka bhati rimwe chete rewaini, uye homeri rembeu richabereka efa imwe chete rezviyo.” vane nhamo avo vanomuka mangwanani kuti vatsvake doro rinodhaka, vanogara kusvikira usiku, kusvikira vapengeswa newaini. vanenge vane rudimbwa, nemitengeranwa pamabiko avo, namatambureni, nenyere newaini, asi havana hanya namabasa ayeahoh, havana rukudzo nebasa ramaoko ake. naizvozvo vanhu vangu vachapinda muutapwa, nokuda kwokushayiwa zivo; vanokudzwa vavo vachafa nenzara, uye vazhinji vavo vachafa nenyota. naizvozvo gehena rakawedzera kukara kwaro, uye rakazarura muromo waro zvinodarika mwero; mariri muchaburukira vanokudzwa vavo nevoruzhinji, navose vanokakavara vavo navanofara vavo. naizvozvo munhuwo zvake achadzikiswa, marudzi avanhu achaninipiswa, nameso avanozvikudza achaninipiswa. asi yeahoh wamasimba ose achakudzwa, nokuda kwokururamisira kwake, uye allah, mutsvene achazviratidza pachake kuti mutsvene, mukururama kwake. ipapo makwai achafura saari mumafuro awo; makwayana achadya pakati pamatongo avapfumi. vane nhamo avo vanokweva chivi nerwodzi rwokunyengera, uye zvakaipa sezvinenge mabote engoro, uye nevanoti, “allah ngaakurumidze, ngaachimbidzike nebasa rake kuti tirione. ngarisvike, urongwa hwomutsvene waisraeri ngahuuye, kuti tihuzive.” vane nhamo avo vanoti zvakaipa ndizvo zvakanaka, uye zvakanaka ndizvo zvakaipa, vanoisa rima panzvimbo yechiedza nechiedza panzvimbo yerima, vanoisa zvinovava panzvimbo yezvinotapira, nezvinotapira panzvimbo yezvinovava. vane nhamo avo vanoti vakachenjera pameso avo, uye vakangwara pakuona kwavo. vane nhamo avo vanova mhare pakunwa waini, uye shasha pakuvhenganisa zvokunwa zvinodhaka, vanopembedza ane mhosva nokuda kwefufuro, asi vanoramba kururamisira vasina mhosva. naizvozvo, samarimi omoto anonanzva mashanga, uye souswa hwakaoma hunomedzwa nemirazvo yemoto, naizvozvo midzi yavo ichaora uye maruva avo achapeperetswa seguruva; nokuti vakaramba murayiro wayeahoh wamasimba ose, uye vakazvidza shoko romutsvene waisraeri. naizvozvo kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwopfuta pamusoro pavanhu vake; ruoko rwake rwasimudzwa uye anovarovera pasi. makomo anozungunuka, uye mitumbi yavakafa yaita samarara mumigwagwa. kunyange zvakadaro nokuda kwezvose izvi, kutsamwa kwake hakuna kudzorwa, ruoko rwake rwaramba rwakasimudzwa. anosimudzira ndudzi dziri kure mureza, anoridzira muridzo kuna avo vari kumigumo yenyika. havo vouya, nokukurumidza uye nokuchimbidzika! hapana kana mumwe wavo anoneta kana kugumburwa, hapana kana mumwe wavo achakotsira kana kuvata; hapana kana bhanhire richasunungurwa pachiuno, hapana kana rukanda rweshangu ruchadambuka. miseve yavo inopinza, uta hwavo hwose hwakakungwa; mahwanda amabhiza avo anenge omusarasara, mavhiri engoro dzavo akaita sechamupupuri. kuomba kwavo kwakaita sokweshumba, vanoomba kufanana neshumba diki; vanodzvova pavanobata mhuka yavo vagoitakura pasina kana angairwira. pazuva iro vachaomba pamusoro payo, sokutinhira kwegungwa. uye kana mumwe akatarisa panyika, achaona rima nokutambudzika; kunyange chiedza chichasvibiswa namakore.

6

mugore rakafa mambo uziya, ndakaona ishe agere pachigaro choushe, chirefu chakakwirira uye mupendero wenguo dzake wakazadza temberi. kumusoro kwake kwaiva neserafimi, imwe neimwe yaiva namapapiro matanhatu: namapapiro maviri, dzakafukidza uso hwadzo, namaviri dzakafukidza makumbo adzo, uye namaviri dzakanga dzichibhururuka. zvino imwe yaidanidzira kune imwe ichiti: “mutsvene, mutsvene, mutsvene, iye yeahoh wamasimba ose; nyika yose izere nokubwinya kwake.” nokutinhira kwamanzwi adzo, nheyo dzezvikumbaridzo dzakazungunuka uye temberi yakazadzwa noutsi. ipapo ndakachema ndichiti, “ndine nhamo! ndaparara! nokuti ndiri munhu ane miromo ine tsvina uye ndigere pakati pavanhu vane miromo ine tsvina uye meso angu aona mambo, yeahoh wamasimba ose.” ipapo imwe yesarafimi yakabhururukira kwandiri ine zimbe romoto muruoko rwayo, rayakanga yatora nembato kubva paaritari. yakagunzva muromo wangu naro ikati, “tarira, zimbe iri ragunzva miromo yako; mhosva yako yabviswa uye chivi chako chadzikinurwa.” ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi rayeahoh richiti, “ndiani wandichatuma? uye ndiani achatiendera?” ini ndakati, “ndiri pano! nditumei!” iye akati, “enda undoudza vanhu ava uti, “ ‘munogara muchinzwa, asi hamumbonzwisisi; munogara muchiona, asi hamuonesesi.’ ita kuti mwoyo yavanhu ava isindimare; ita kuti nzeve dzavo dzisanzwisise uye vatsinzine meso avo. nokuti vangaona nameso avo, nokunzwa nenzeve dzavo, vakanzwisisa nemwoyo yavo, vakadzoka vakaporeswa.” ipapo ndakati, “haiwa, ishe, kusvikira riniko?” iye akapindura achiti, “kusvikira maguta ava matongo uye pasisina anogaramo, kusvikira dzimba dzasiyiwa dzisina vanhu, neminda yaparadzwa zvachose, kusvikira yeahoh adzingira vanhu kure, uye nyika yasiyiwa zvachose. uye kunyange kukasara chegumi munyika, naichowo chichaparadzwa. asi somuterabhiniti nomuouki zvichasara zvava zvigutsa pazvinotemwa, saizvozvo rudzi rutsvene ruchavawo sechigutsa munyika.”

7

zvino ahazi mwanakomana wajotamu, mwanakomana wauzia, paakanga ari mambo weyeahudha, mambo rezini wearamu napeka mwanakomana waramaria mambo weisraeri vakauya kuzorwa nejerusarema, asi havana kugona kurikunda. zvino imba yadhavhidhi yakaudzwa kuti, “aramu yabatana neefuremu;” saka mwoyo waahazi nemwoyo yavanhu vake yakazungunuswa, sokuzungunuswa kunoitwa miti yesango nemhepo. ipapo yeahoh akati kuna isaya, “buda, iwe nomwanakomana wako sheari-jashubhi, unosangana naahazi kumucheto womugero wedziva rokumusoro, mumugwagwa unoenda kumunda womusuki. uti kwaari, ‘chenjera, dzikama hako, uye usatya. usaora mwoyo nokuda kwamatsiga maviri ehuni, nokuda kwokutsamwa kunotyisa kwarezini naaramu uye nekwomwanakomana waremaria. aramu naefuremu nomwanakomana waremaria vakarangana kukuparadza vachiti, “handei tindorwa neyeahudha; ngatiribvarurei tigorigovana pakati pedu, tigogadza tabheeri kuti ave mambo pamusoro paro.” asi zvanzi naishe yeahoh: “ ‘izvi hazvingamiri, hazvingaitiki, nokuti musoro wearamu idhamasiko, uye musoro wedhamasiko irezini bedzi. makore makumi matanhatu namashanu asati apera, vaefuremu vachaputswa-putswa zvokusazova rudzizve. musoro weefuremu isamaria, uye musoro wesamaria mwanakomana waramaria bedzi. kana usingamiri zvakasimba mukutenda kwako, hauchazomiri zvachose.’ ” yeahoh akataurazve kuna ahazi akati, “kumbira chiratidzo kuna yeahoh allah wako, kunyange pakadzikadzika kana pamusoro-soro.” asi ahazi akati, “handizokumbiri; handingaedzi yeahoh.” ipapo isaya akati, “inzwai zvino, imi imba yadhavhidhi! hazvina kuringana here kuedza mwoyo murefu wavanhu? ko, imi muchaedzawo mwoyo murefu waallah wangu here? naizvozvo yeahoh pachake achakupai chiratidzo: mhandara ichava nemimba uye ichabereka mwanakomana igomutumidza kuti imanueri. iye achadya ruomba nouchi paachaziva zvakakwana kuti arambe zvakaipa achisarudza zvakarurama. asi mwana asati anyatsoziva kuramba zvakaipa nokusarudza zvakanaka, nyika yamadzimambo maviri aunotya ichava dongo. yeahoh achauyisa pamusoro pako napamusoro pavanhu vako napamusoro peimba yababa vako nguva isina kumbovapo kubva nguva iya yaakazvipatsanura kubva kuna yeahudha, achauyisa mambo weasiria.” pazuva iroro yeahoh acharidzira muridzo kunhunzi dzichibva kuhova dziri kure dzeijipiti nokunyuchi dzichibva kunyika yeasiria. dzichauya dzose dzigogara mumawere emipata nomumikaha yamatombo, nomumakwenzi ose eminzwa uye napamadziva ose. pazuva iro yeahoh achashandisa chisvo chakakumbirwa kubva mhiri kworwizi, kuna mambo weasiria, kuti aveure misoro yenyu nemvere dzomumakumbo enyu, uye kuti abvisewo ndebvu dzenyu. pazuva iro, murume achapfuwa mhou duku imwe chete nembudzi mbiri. uye nokuda kwokuwanda kwomukaka wadzinopa, achadya ruomba. vose vachasara munyika vachadya ruomba nouchi. pazuva iro munzvimbo imwe neimwe maimbova nemizambiringa inokwana chiuru yaitengwa namashekeri anokwana chiuru esirivha, pachazova norukato neminzwa chete. varume vachaendako neuta nemiseve, nokuti nyika ichange yafukidzwa norukato neminzwa. kana zviri zvikomo zvose zvaichimbosakurirwa nebadza, hakuna achada kuendako nokuda kwokutya rukato neminzwa; dzichava nzvimbo dzokusundira mombe nokunomhanyirwa namakwai.

8

yeahoh akati kwandiri, “tora bhuku guru unyore pamusoro paro nechinyoreso: pamusoro pamaheri-sharari-hashi-bhazi. ndichadana uriya muprista nazekariyeah mwanakomana wajebherekia sezvapupu zvakatendeka kwandiri.” ipapo ndakaenda kumuprofitakadzi, akatora pamuviri akabereka mwanakomana. zvino yeahoh akati kwandiri, “mutumidze kuti maheri-sharari-hashi-bhazi; nokuti mwana asati aziva kuti, ‘baba vangu’ kana kuti, ‘mai vangu,’ pfuma yedhamasiko nezvakapambwa zvesamaria zvichatakurwa namambo weasiria.” yeahoh akataurazve kwandiri akati, “nokuti vanhu ava vakaramba mvura inoyerera zvinyoronyoro yeshiroa, uye vanofarira rezini nomwanakomana waremaria, naizvozvo yeahoh ava kuda kuuyisa pamusoro pavo mafashamu makuru orwizi, mambo weasiria nokukudzwa kwake kwose. ruchapfachukira hova dzarwo dzose, uye rugopfachukira kumahombekombe arwo ose, ruchakukura kusvikira kuyeahudha, ruchipafuma nomukati mayo, rugopfuura nomairi ruchisvika muhuro. kutandavara kwamapapiro arwo kuchafukidza upamhi hwenyika yako, iwe imanueri!” ridzai mhere yehondo, imi ndudzi, mugoputswa-putswa! teererai, imi nyika dzose dziri kure. gadzirirai kurwa, mugoputswa-putswa! gadzirirai urongwa hwenyu, asi huchakona; taurai zvourongwa hwenyu, asi hauzomiri, nokuti allah anesu. yeahoh akataura kwandiri ruoko rwake rune simba rwuri pamusoro pangu, achindiyambira kuti ndirege kutevera nzira yavanhu ava, akati: “musati irangano zvinhu zvose zvinonzi navanhu ava irangano; musatya zvavanotya, musazvivhunduka. yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiye wamunofanira kuita mutsvene, ndiye wamunofanira kuvhunduka, ndiye achava nzvimbo tsvene; asi padzimba dzose dzaisraeri achava dombo rinoita kuti vanhu vagumburwe; nedombo rinoita kuti vapunzike. uye kuvanhu vejerusarema iye achava musungo norugombe. vazhinji vavo vachagumburwa; vachawa vagovhunika, vachateyiwa vagobatwa.” sungai chipupuriro mugosimbisa murayiro pakati pavadzidzi vangu. ndichamirira yeahoh, iye ari kuvanzira imba yayaqobho chiso chake. ndichaisa ruvimbo rwangu maari. ndiri pano, navana vandakapiwa nayeahoh. tiri zviratidzo nemifananidzo muisraeri inobva kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose pagomo rezioni. kana vanhu vachiti kwamuri bvunzai masvikiro navavuki, vanozevezera nokunguruma, ko, vanhu havangabvunzi kuna allah wavo here? munobvunzirei vakafa pamusoro pavapenyu? endai kumurayiro nokuzvipupuriro! kana vasingatauri maererano neshoko iri havana chiedza chamambakwedza. vatambudzika, vava vane nzara vachafamba-famba nenyika; pavachatambudzika vachava neshungu, uye vachatarira kudenga, vagotuka mambo wavo naallah wavo. ipapo vachatarira pasi vagoona nhamo chete nerima nokusafara kunotyisa, uye vachakandirwa kurima guru.

9

kunyange zvakadaro, hakuchazovazve nerima kuna avo vakanga vari munhamo. pamazuva akare akaninipisa nyika yezebhuruni nenyika yenafutari, asi panguva inouya achakudza garirea revedzimwe ndudzi, nenzira yokugungwa mhiri kwajorodhani. vanhu vaifamba murima vakaona chiedza chikuru; avo vaigara munyika yomumvuri worufu, chiedza chakavavhenekera. makakurisa rudzi mukawedzera mufaro wavo; vanofara pamberi penyu savanhu vanofara panguva yokukohwa, sokufara kwavarume, kana vachigoverana zvakapambwa. nokuti sapamazuva okukundwa kwavamidhia, vamakaparadzira joko raivaremera, nedanda raichinjika mafudzi avo, iyo tsvimbo yavamanikidzi vavo. shangu imwe neimwe yomurwi yakashandiswa muhondo, nenguo imwe neimwe yakaumburudzwa muropa, zvichapiswa, zvichava huni dzomoto. nokuti takazvarirwa mwana, takapiwa mwanakomana, uye umambo huchava pamapfudzi ake. uye achanzi gota rinoshamisa, allah ane simba, baba vokusingaperi, muchinda worugare. kukura kwoumambo hwake nekworugare rwake hazvizovi namagumo. achatonga pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi napamusoro poumambo hwake, achihusimbisa nokuhutsigira, nokururamisira uye nokururama, kubva panguva iyoyo kusvikira nokusingaperi. kushingaira kwayeahoh wamasimba ose kuchazviita. yeahoh akatuma shoko pamusoro payaqobho; richawira pamusoro paisraeri. vanhu vose vachariziva, efuremu navagari vomusamaria, ivo vanoti nokuzvikudza kwavo uye namanyawi emwoyo, “zvidhinha zvakoromokera pasi, asi tichavakazve namatombo; mionde yatemerwa pasi, asi tichaitsiva nemisidhari.” asi yeahoh akamutsira rezini vadzivisi akakurudzira vavengi vavo. vaaramu vachibva nokumabvazuva navafiristia vachibva nokumavirira vakapedza vaisraeri nomuromo wakashama. kunyange zvakadaro, kutsamwa kwake hakuna kudzorwa, asi ruoko rwake ruchatongotambanudzwa. asi vanhu havana kutendeukira kuna iye akavarova, kana kutsvaka yeahoh wamasimba ose. naizvozvo yeahoh achadimura vaisraeri vose musoro nomuswe, zvose davi romuchindwe norutsanga pazuva rimwe; vakuru navarume vanokudzwa ndivo musoro, vaprofita vanodzidzisa nhema ndivo muswe. vanotungamirira vanhu ava vanovatsausa, navose vanotungamirirwa vanotsauswa. naizvozvo yeahoh haachazofariri majaya, kana kuva netsitsi nenherera nechirikadzi, nokuti mumwe nomumwe wavo haana umwari uye akaipa, muromo mumwe nomumwe unotaura zvoupenzi. kunyange zvakadaro, kutsamwa kwake hakuna kudzorwa, ruoko rwake ruchakangosimudzwa. zvirokwazvo zvakaipa zvinopfuta somoto; unopisa rukato neminzwa, unopisa matenhere edondo zvokuti unokwira kudenga mushongwe youtsi. kubudikidza nokutsamwa kwayeahoh wamasimba ose nyika ichapiswa kwazvo uye vanhu vachava huni dzomoto; hapana achaponesa hama yake. kurudyi vachadya asi vacharamba vane nzara; kuruboshwe, vachadya asi havangaguti. mumwe nomumwe achadya nyama yomwana wake. manase achadya efuremu uye efuremu achadya manase; pamwe chete vachamukira yeahudha. kunyange zvakadaro, kutsamwa kwake hakuna kudzorwa, ruoko rwake ruchakangosimudzwa.

10

vane nhamo vanodzika mitemo isina kururama, neavo vanopa mitemo inodzvinyirira, kuti vadzivise varombo kodzero dzavo uye vadzivise kururamisirwa kwavakadzvinyirirwa vavanhu vangu, vachipamba chirikadzi uye vachibira nherera. muchaita sei pazuva rokutongwa, njodzi painouya ichibva kure? muchatizira kuna aniko kuti mubatsirwe? upfumi hwenyu muchahusiyepiko? hapana chichasara asi kungokotama pakati penhapwa, kana kuwira pakati pavakaurayiwa. kunyange zvakadaro, kutsamwa kwake hakuna kudzorwa, ruoko rwake ruchakangosimudzwa. “une nhamo iwe asiria, shamhu yokutsamwa kwangu, iye akabata tsvimbo yehasha dzangu mumaoko ake! ndiri kumutuma kurudzi rusina allah, ndinomutuma kuvanhu vanonditsamwisa, kundokomba nokutora nokubvuta zvakapambwa, nokuvatsikirira pasi sedope riri mumigwagwa. asi izvi handizvo zvaanoda, izvi handizvo zvaanga achifunga; vavariro yake ndeyokuparadza, kupedza chose marudzi mazhinji. anoti, ‘ko, machinda angu haazi madzimambo ose here? karino harina kuita sezvakaita karikemishi here? ko, hamati harina kufanana nearipadhi, uye samaria harina kufanana nedhamasiko here? ruoko rwangu sezvarwakatora umambo hwezvifananidzo, umambo hune zvifananidzo zvakakunda zvejerusarema nesamaria, ko, handichaitiri jerusarema nezvifananidzo zvaro sezvandakaitira samaria nezvifananidzo zvayo here?’ ” kana ishe achinge apedza basa rake rose pamusoro pegomo rezioni nejerusarema, achazoti, “ndicharanga mambo weasiria nokuda kwokuzvikudza kwomwoyo wake namanyawi emeso ake. nokuti iye anoti, “ ‘nesimba ramaoko angu ndakaita izvi, uye nouchenjeri hwangu, nokuti ndinonzwisisa. ndakabvisa miganhu yendudzi, ndikapamba pfuma yavo; semhare ndakakunda madzimambo avo. sezvinoita munhu anosvasvavira mudendere, saizvozvo ruoko rwangu rwakananavira pfuma yamarudzi; savarume vanounganidza mazai akasiyiwa, saizvozvo ndakaunganidza nyika dzose; hakuna yakapfakanyisa bapiro, kana kushamisa muromo wayo kuti irire.’ ” ko, demo ringazvirumbidza kupfuura iye anoritemesa here? kana jeko ringazvirumbidza pamusoro pounorishandisa here? zvinozoita sokunge tsvimbo inosimudza uyo anoitakura, kana mudonzvo kusimudza uyo asati ari huni! naizvozvo, ishe yeahoh wamasimba ose, achatumira denda rinoonza pamusoro pavarwi vakafuta; pasi pokubwinya kwake moto uchatungidzwa kufanana nemirazvo inopfuta. chiedza chaisraeri chichava moto, nomutsvene wavo murazvo womoto; muzuva rimwe chete uchapfuta ugopedza minzwa yake norukato rwake. kubwinya kwamasango ake neminda yake yakaorera kuchaparadzwa chose, kufanana nomurwere anoramba achipera. uye miti yakasara yamasango ake ichava mishoma kwazvo, zvokuti mwana angagona kuinyora pasi. pazuva iro vakasara veisraeri, vakapunyuka veimba yayaqobho, havachazovimbi naye iye akavarova, asi zvirokwazvo vachavimba nayeahoh, mutsvene waisraeri. vakasara vachadzokera, vakasara vayaqobho, vachadzokera kuna allah ane simba. kunyange vanhu vako, iwe israeri, vakaita sejecha regungwa, vachasara chete ndivo vachadzokera. kuparadzwa kwakatotemwa, kuzere nokururama. ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose achapedzisa kuparadzwa kwakatemerwa nyika yose. naizvozvo zvanzi naishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose: “haiwa, vanhu vangu vanogara muzioni, musatya vaasiria, vanokurovai nomudonzvo nokukusimudzirai tsvimbo, sezvakaitwa neijipiti. nokuti nenguva duku duku kutsamwa kwangu pamusoro penyu kuchapera, uye hasha dzangu dzichanangana nokuparadzwa kwavo.” yeahoh wamasimba ose achavarova netyava, samarovero aakaita vamidhia padombo reorebhi, uye achasimudza tsvimbo yake pamusoro pemvura zhinji, sezvaakaita muijipiti. pazuva iro mitoro yavo ichabviswa pamapfudzi enyu, nejoko ravo pamitsipa yenyu; joko richavhuniwa, nokuti manyanya kufuta. vanopinda muayati; vopfuura nomumigironi; vochengeta nhumbi pamikimashi. vanopfuura napamupata, vagoti, “tichadzika matende pagebha usiku.” rama rinobvunda; gibhea rasauro rinotiza. ridza mhere, iwe mukunda wegarimi! teerera, iwe raisha! newe anatoti unonzwisa urombo! madhimena riri kutiza; vanhu vegebhimi vanovanda. zuva ranhasi vachamira panobhi; vachakunga chibhakera chavo pagomo remwanasikana wezioni, pachikomo chejerusarema. tarirai, ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose, achatema matavi nesimba guru. miti mirefu refu ichawiswa, uye yakareba ichadzikiswa. achatema matenhere esango nedemo; rebhanoni ichawa pamberi paiye ane simba.

11

bukira richabva kudzinde rajese; davi rinobva pamidzi yake richabereka muchero. mweya wayeahoh uchagara pamusoro pake, mweya wouchenjeri newokunzwisisa, mweya wokurayira nowesimba, mweya wokuziva newokutya yeahoh, uye achafarira kutya yeahoh. haazotongi nezvaanoona nameso ake, kana kutonga nezvaanonzwa nenzeve dzake, asi nokururama achatongera varombo, nokururamisira achatongera vanyoro vapanyika. acharova nyika neshamhu yomuromo wake; nokufema kwemiromo yake achauraya vakaipa. kururuma ndiro richava bhanhire rake uye kutendeka bhanhire romuchiuno chake. bere richagara negwayana, ingwe ichavata pasi nembudzi, mhuru neshumba nezvakakodzwa zvichafura pamwe chete; uye mwana mudiki achazvitungamirira. mhou ichafura nebere, vana vazvo vachavata pasi pamwe chete, uye shumba ichadya uswa senzombe. mwana mucheche achatambira pedyo nomwena wemhakure, uye mwana mudiki achaisa ruoko rwake mumwena wenyoka. hazvingazokuvadzi kana kuparadza pagomo rangu rose dzvene, nokuti nyika ichazara nokuziva yeahoh semvura zhinji inofukidza gungwa. pazuva iro mudzi wajese uchamira somureza wamarudzi; ndudzi dzichamhanyira kwaari, uye nzvimbo yake yokuzorora ichabwinya. pazuva iro yeahoh achatambanudza ruoko rwake kechipiri kuti adzorezve vakasara ivo vanhu vake vakasiyiwa kubva kuasiria, kubva zasi kweijipiti, nokubva kumusoro kweijipiti nokubva kuetiopia, nokubva kueramu, nokubva kubhabhironi, nokuhamati uye nokubva kuzviwi zvegungwa. achasimudzira marudzi mureza uye achaunganidza vakadzingwa vaisraeri; achaunganidza vakaparadzirwa vavanhu veyeahudha, kubva kumativi mana enyika. godo raefuremu richapera uye vavengi vavayeahudha vachagurwa; efuremu haachazovi negodo nayeahudha, nayeahudha haangaitire efuremu hasha. asi vachawira pamusoro pamateru efiristia kumavirazuva; pamwe chete vachapamba vanhu vokumabvazuva. vachatora edomu nemoabhu, uye vaamoni vachava varanda vavo. yeahoh achaomesa chose chikamu chegungwa reijipiti; nemhepo inopisa achatsvaira noruoko rwake pamusoro perwizi rweyufuratesi. acharukamura-kamura agoruita hova nomwe, kuitira kuti vanhu vagone kuyambuka vachienda mhiri vakapfeka shangu. pachava nomugwagwa mukuru wavanhu vake vakasara, vakasiyiwa kubva kuasiria, sezvazvakanga zviri kuvaisraeri pavakabva kuijipiti.

12

pazuva iro muchati, “ndichakurumbidzai, imi yeahoh, kunyange makanga makanditsamwira, kutsamwa kwenyu kwakadzorwa uye makandinyaradza. zvirokwazvo allah ndiye ruponeso rwangu; ndichavimba naye uye handingatyi. yeahoh, yeahoh ndiye simba rangu nerwiyo rwangu; ava ruponeso rwangu.” nomufaro muchachera mvura kubva mumatsime oruponeso. pazuva iro muchati, “vongai yeahoh, danai kuzita rake; zivisai zvaakaita pakati pendudzi, uye muparidze kuti zita rake risimudzirwe. imbirai yeahoh, nokuti akaita zvinhu zvinoshamisa; izvi ngazvizivikanwe pasi pose. pururudzai uye muimbe nomufaro, imi vanhu vezioni, nokuti mutsvene waisraeri mukuru pakati penyu.”

13

shoko rakaonekwa naisaya mwanakomana waamozi pamusoro pebhabhironi: simudzai mireza pamusoro pechikomo chisina miti, danidzirai kwavari; muninire kwavari kuti vapinde pamasuo amakurukota. ndakarayira vatsvene vangu; ndakadana varwi vangu kuti vazadzise kutsamwa kwangu, avo vanofadzwa nokukunda kwangu. inzwai, kutinhira pamusoro pamakomo, kwakafanana nokwavanhu vazhinji zhinji! inzwai, mheremhere pakati poumambo, sendudzi dziri kuungana pamwe chete! yeahoh wamasimba ose ari kugadzirira mauto kundorwa. vanobva kunyika dziri kure, kubva kumagumo amatenga, yeahoh nezvombo zvokutsamwa kwake, kuti aparadze nyika yose. ungudzai, nokuti zuva rayeahoh rava pedyo; richauya nokuparadza kunobva kuna wamasimba ose. naizvozvo maoko ose achashaya simba, mwoyo mumwe nomumwe wavanhu uchanyungudika. kutya kuchavabata, kurwadziwa nokugomera zvichavabata, vachamonyoroka somukadzi ari kusununguka. vachatarisana vachishamisika mumwe nomumwe wavo, zviso zvavo zvichipfuta. tarirai, zuva rayeahoh riri kuuya, zuva rakaipisisa, rine hasha nokutsamwa kunotyisa, kuti nyika ive dongo uye nokuzoparadza vatadzi vari mukati mayo. nyeredzi dzokudenga namapoka adzo hadzizoratidzi chiedza chadzo. zuva rinobuda richasvibiswa uye mwedzi hauzopi chiedza chawo. ndicharanga nyika nokuda kwokuipa kwayo, navakaipa nokuda kwezvivi zvavo. ndichagumisa vanozvikudza pakudada kwavo, uye ndichaderedza kuzvikudza kwavasina tsitsi. ndichaita kuti munhu ashayikwe kudarika goridhe, ashayikwe kudarika kushayikwa kwegoridhe reofiri. naizvozvo ndichabvundisa matenga; uye nyika ichazungunuka kubva panzvimbo yayo, nehasha dzayeahoh wamasimba ose, pazuva rokutsamwa kwake kunopisa. semhara inovhimwa, samakwai asina mufudzi, mumwe nomumwe achadzokera kuvanhu vokwake, mumwe nomumwe achatizira kunyika yake. mumwe nomumwe achabatwa achabayiwa, vose vanobatwa vachaurayiwa nomunondo. vacheche vavo vacharoverwa pasi vagobvamburwa-bvamburwa vachizviona; dzimba dzavo dzichapambwa uye vakadzi vavo vachachinyiwa. tarirai, ndichavamutsira vamedhia vasina hanya nesirivha, uye vasingafariri goridhe. uta hwavo huchabaya majaya; havazovi nengoni navacheche kana kutarira vana netsitsi. zvino bhabhironi rembiri paumambo, kubwinya kwokuzvikudza kwavabhabhironi, richaparadzwa naallah kufanana nesodhomu negomora. haringatongogarwizve navanhu uye hakuna vachazogaramo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose; hapana muarabhu achadzika tende rake ikoko, hakuna mufudzi achazorodza makwai ake ikoko. asi zvisikwa zvomugwenga ndizvo zvichagara ikoko, makava achazadza dzimba dzavo; mazizi achagara ikoko, uye imomo ngururu dzichakwakuka-kwakuka. mapere achachema ari munhare dzavo, makava mudzimba dzavo dzinoyevedza dzamadzimambo. nguva yake yaswedera, uye mazuva aro haazowedzerwi.

14

yeahoh achanzwira yaqobho tsitsi; achasarudza israeri zvakare uye achavagarisa munyika yavo. vatorwa vachabatana navo vachanamatirana neimba yayaqobho. ndudzi dzichavatora dzigovadzosera kunzvimbo yavo chaiyo. uye imba yaisraeri ichatora ndudzi kuti vave varandarume navarandakadzi munyika yayeahoh. vachaita nhapwa vaya vaimbova vatapi vavo, uye vachabata ushe pamusoro pavaya vaimbova vamanikidzi vavo. pazuva ramuchapiwa rusununguko nayeahoh kubva pakutambudzika, nokusagadzikana, nokubatwa noutsinye, uchasveeredza mambo webhabhironi uchiti: haiwa, mumanikidzi apera sei! haiwa, hasha dzake dzapera sei! yeahoh akavhuna tsvimbo yavakaipa netsvimbo yamadzimambo, yaakarova nayo marudzi mukutsamwa nokurova kusingaperi, uye akakunda ndudzi nehasha nokurwisa kusingaperi. nyika dzose dzazorora uye dzava norugare; votanga kufara nokuimba. kunyange nemiti yemisipuresi nemisidhari yokurebhanoni inofara pamusoro pako ichiti, “zvino zvawaparadzwa, hakuna varume vanotsvaka huni vachauya kuzotitema.” pasi, iro sheori razungunuka kuti rinangane newe pakuuya kwako; riri kumutsa mweya yavakaenda kuti izokukwazisai, vose vakaenda vari vatungamiri munyika; rinoita kuti vasimuke pazvigaro zvavo zvoushe, vose vakanga vari madzimambo endudzi. vose vachapindura, vachati kwauri, “newewo hauchisina simba, sesu; wangofanana nesu.” kuzvikudza kwako kwose kwaderedzwa kusvika muguva, pamwe chete nokurira kworudimbwa rwako; honye dzawarirwa pasi pako uye makonye anokufukidza. haiwa, wawa seiko, uchibva kudenga, iwe nyamasase yamangwanani, mwanakomana wamambakwedza! wakakandwa panyika, iyewe wakambowisira ndudzi pasi! wakati mumwoyo mako, “ndichakwira kudenga; ndichasimudzira chigaro changu choushe pamusoro penyeredzi dzaallah; ndichagara pachigaro changu choushe pagomo reungano, pamusoro pegomo dzvene. ndichakwira pamusoro-soro pamakore; ndichazviita sewokumusoro-soro.” asi waderedzwa kusvika kuguva, kwakadzika dzika kwegomba. vose vanokuona vanokunanʼanidza, vachafungisisa zvamagumo ako vachiti, “ndiye here murume uya akazungunutsa nyika, akadederesa ushe, murume akaita kuti nyika ive gwenga, akaparadza maguta ayo, akasatendera vasungwa vake kudzokera kumusha?” madzimambo ose endudzi ave mukukudzwa, mumwe nomumwe muguva rake. asi iwe warasirwa kunze kweguva rako, kufanana nedavi rakaraswa; wakafukidzwa navakaurayiwa, naavo vakabayiwa nomunondo, avo vakadzika kumatombo egomba. kufanana nechitunha chinotsikwa-tsikwa netsoka, hauzobatani navo pakuvigwa kwako, nokuti wakaparadza nyika yako ukauraya vanhu vako. vana vowakaipa havazotaurwi nezvavozve. gadzirirai nzvimbo yokuurayira vanakomana vake nokuda kwezvivi zvamadzitateguru avo; havazosimuki kuti vagare nhaka yenyika vagozadza nyika namaguta avo “ndichavamukira ini,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ndichabvisa zita rake navakasara vake kubva kubhabhironi, vana vake navana vavana vake,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichaishandura kuti ive nzvimbo yamazizi nenyika yamachawi; ndicharitsvaira nomutsvairo wokuparadza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. yeahoh wamasimba ose akapika achiti: “zvirokwazo sezvandakafunga ndizvo zvichaitika, uye sezvandakarangarira ndizvo zvichaitika. ndichapwanya muasiria munyika yangu; ndichamutsikirira pasi pamusoro pegomo rangu. joko rake richabviswa kubva pavanhu vangu, nomutoro wake wokubva pamabvudzi avo.” iyi ndiyo pfungwa yakarongerwa nyika yose; urwu ndirwo ruoko rwakatambanudzirwa pamusoro pamarudzi ose. nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose akazvironga zvino ndianiko angamukonesa? ruoko rwake rwakatambanudzwa ndianiko angarudzora? shoko iri rakauya mugore rakafa mambo ahazi richiti: musafara imi mose vafiristia, muchiti shamhu yakakurovai imi, yavhunika; nokuti kubva pamudzi wenyoka iyo pachabuda mvumbi, chibereko chayo chichava nyoka ino uturu hunobaya. murombo wavarombo achawana mafuro, uye vanoshayiwa vacharara pasi murugare. asi ndichaparadza mudzi wako nenzara; ichauraya vakasara vako. ungudza iwe suo! chema, iwe guta! nyungudukai, imi vafiristia mose! gore routsi riri kuuya richibva kumusoro, uye hapana achatiza pasimba raro. ko, imhinduroi ichapiwa kunhume dzorudzi urwo? “yeahoh akasimbisa zioni, uye mariri vanhu vake vanotambudzika vachawana pokuvanda.”

15

chirevo chayeahoh maererano nemoabhu: ari romumoabhu rava dongo, rakaparadzwa usiku! kiri romumoabhu rava dongo, rakaparadzwa usiku! dhibhoni rakwira kutemberi yaro, kunzvimbo dzaro dzakakwirira kundochema; moabhu ari kuungudza pamusoro penebho napamusoro pemedhebha. misoro yose yaveurwa ndebvu dzose dzabviswa. munzira dzomuguta vakapfeka masaga: pamusoro pamatenga edzimba uye nomumatare, vanoungudza vose, vakazvambarara vachichema. heshibhoni neerieri dzinodanidzira, manzwi avo anonzwika kusvikira kujahazi. naizvozvo varwi vemoabhu vanodanidzira, uye mwoyo yavo yaziya. mwoyo wangu unodanidzira pamusoro pemoabhu; vatizi varo vanotiza kusvikira kuzoari, kusvikira kuegirati-sherishiya. vanokwidza nenzira yokuruhiti, vanofamba vachichema, munzira yokuhoronaimi vanochema kuparadzwa kwavo. mvura yokunimirimi yakapwa uye uswa hwaoma; bumhudza rapera uye hapachina chakasvibirira chakasara. saka pfuma yavakawana neyavakaunganidza vanoiyambutsira mhiri kworukova rwemikonachando. kudanidzira kwavo kwaita maungira kuchitevedza muganhu wemoabhu; kuungudza kwavo kunosvikira kuegiraimi, kuchema kwavo kunosvikira kubheeri erimi. mvura yapadhimoni yakazara neropa, asi ndichauyisazve zvakawanda pamusoro pedhimoni, shumba pamusoro pavatizi vemoabhu uye napamusoro pavaya vakasara munyika.

16

tumirai mutero wamakwayana kumutongi wenyika, kubva kusera, zvichiyambukira kurenje, kugomo romwanasikana wezioni. kufanana neshiri dzadzungaira dzichisundidzirwa kubva mudendere, ndizvo zvakaita vakadzi vemoabhu pamazambuko eamoni. “tipeiwo zano, ruramisirai. ita mumvuri wako kuti ufanane nousiku, pamasikati makuru. viga vatizi, usapandukira vapoteri. rega vatizi vemoabhu vagare newe, iva utiziro hwavo kubva kumuparadzi.” mutambudzi achasvika kumagumo, uye kuparadza kuchapera; mudenhi achatsakatika panyika. murudo, chigaro choushe chichasimbiswa; mukutendeka, munhu achagarapo, mumwe anobva kuimba yadhavhidhi, uyo anoti achitonga anotsvaka kururamisira, uye achikurumidza kuita zvakarurama. takanzwa nezvokuzvikudza kwamoabhu, namanyawi ake makuru uye kuzvida kwake, kuzvikudza kwake nokuvirima kwake, asi kuzvirumbidza kwake hakuna maturo. naizvozvo vamoabhu voungudza, vanoungudzira moabhu pamwe chete. chemai musuwe nokuda kwavarume vekiri hareseti. minda yeheshibhoni yaoma uye mazambiringa esibhima aomawo. vatongi vendudzi vatsika-tsika mizambiringa yakaisvonaka, iyo yaimbosvika kujazeri uye yaitandira yakananga kurenje. mabukira ayo aitandira kusvika kugungwa. saka ndinochema, sokuchema kwejazeri, nokuda kwemizambiringa yesibhima. haiwa heshibhoni, haiwa ereare, ndichakudiridza nemisodzi! ruzha rwomufaro pamusoro pemizambiringa yakaibva napamusoro pezvamakakohwa rwanyaradzwa. mufaro nokufarisisa zvabviswa paminda yemizambiringa; hapana anoimba kana kuita ruzha muminda yemizambiringa; hapana anosvina waini pazvisviniro, nokuti ndagumisa ruzha rwacho. mwoyo wangu unorira nokuda kwamoabhu, kufanana nokurira kwembira, mukati kati mangu munorira nokuda kwekiri hareseti. zvino kana moabhu achizviratidza panzvimbo dzake dzakakwirira, anenge achingozvinetsa pachake; paanoenda kuimba yake kunonyengetera, zvinenge zvisina chazvinobatsira, iri ndiro shoko rakataurwa kare nayeahoh pamusoro pemoabhu. asi zvino yeahoh anoti, “makore matatu asati apfuura, sokuverengwa kwaangaitwa nomuranda akazvisunga kubatira mubayiro, kukudzwa kwemoabhu navanhu vake vose vakawanda kuchazvidzwa, uye vakapunyuka vake vachava vashoma kwazvo uye vasina simba.”

17

chirevo pamusoro pedhamasiko: “tarirai, dhamasiko harichazovazve guta, asi richava murwi wamatongo. maguta earoeri achasiyiwa uye achava mafuro ezvipfuyo, izvo zvichavata pasi, pasina anozvivhundutsa. maguta akakomberedzwa namasvingo achanyangarika achibva pana efuremu, uye simba roushe kubva padhamasiko; vakasara vearamu vachava sembiri yavaisraeri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “pazuva iro kukudzwa kwayaqobho kuchapera; mafuta omuviri wake achapera. zvichafanana nomukohwi anokohwa madzinde akamira, uyo anokohwa zviyo noruoko rwake, sezvinoita murume anononga hura dzezviyo mumupata werefaimi. kunyange zvakadaro dzimwe tsanga dzichasara, sezvinoita muorivhi kana wazunzwa, uchisiya maorivhi maviri kana matatu pamatavi okumusoro-soro, mana kana mashanu pamatavi makuru anobereka,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh allah waisraeri. pazuva iro vanhu vachatarira kumusiki wavo, vagodzorera meso avo kumutsvene waisraeri. havachazotarisi kuaritari, iro basa ramaoko avo, uye havachazovi nehanya nematanda aashera nearitari dzezvinonhuhwira dzakaitwa neminwe yavo. pazuva iro maguta avo akasimba avakasiya nokuda kwavaisraeri, achafanana nenzvimbo dzakaregerwa kuti dzive matenhere nezvinomera pasi pavo. uye ose achava matongo. nokuti wakanganwa allah muponesi wako, hauna kurangarira dombo, iyo nhare yako. naizvozvo, kunyange ukazvisimira miti yakanakisisa, uye ukadyara mizambiringa inobva kune dzimwe nyika, kunyange pazuva raunoisima, ugoita kuti ikure, ugoita kuti ive namaruva, asi mukohwo uchava sapasina pazuva rehosha nokurwadziwa kusingarapiki. haiwa, kutinhira kwendudzi zhinji, dzinotinhira sokutinhira kwegungwa! haiwa, kuomba kwamarudzi anoomba kufanana nokutinhira kwemvura zhinji! kunyange vanhu vakaomba sokutinhira kwamafungu emvura, paanovatuka vachatizira kure, vachidzingirirwa nemhepo sehundi pamusoro pezvikomo, kufanana nouswa hunozungunuswa pamberi pedutu guru. munguva yamadekwana, pachava nokutyisa! kusati kwaedza, havachipo! uyu ndiwo mugove wavaya vanotibira, nomubayiro wavanotipamba.

18

ine nhamo nyika yokutinhira kwamapapiro inotevedza nzizi dzeetiopia, inotuma nhume nenzira yomugungwa, muzvikepe zvenhokwe pamusoro pemvura. endai, imi nhume dzinokurumidza, kuvanhu vakareba uye vane ganda rinotsvedzerera, kuvanhu vanotyiwa kure napedyo, rudzi rune hasha nomutauro usinganzwisisiki, rune nyika yakakamurwa nenzizi. imi mose muri pasi pose, imi munogara panyika, kana mureza wasimudzwa pamusoro pamakomo, muchauona, uye kana hwamanda yarira, muchainzwa. zvanzi nayeahoh kwandiri: “ndicharamba ndinyerere uye ndichatarira ndiri paugaro hwangu, samanyirinyiri omushana unopisa, segore redova mukupisa kwokukohwa.” nokuti, kukohwa kusati kwasvika, kana kutungira kwamaruva kwaguma, uye ruva rova muzambiringa woibva, achagura mabukira namapanga okurangura, achatemera pasi uye agorasira kure matavi akatandavara. zvose zvichasiyirwa magora omugomo nokuzvikara zvesango; shiri dzichazvidya chirimo chose, uye zvikara zvesango zvichazvidya muchando chose. panguva iyoyo, zvipo zvichavigirwa yeahoh wamasimba ose, zvichibva kuvanhu vakareba vane ganda rinotsvedzerera, kubva kuvanhu vanotyiwa kwose kwose, rudzi rune hasha nomutauro usinganzwisisiki, rudzi rune nyika yakakamurwa nenzizi, zvipo zvichauyiswa kuzioni, nzvimbo yezita rayeahoh wamasimba ose.

19

chirevo pamusoro peijipiti: tarirai, yeahoh akatasva gore rinomhanya, uye ari kuuya kuijipiti. zvifananidzo zveijipiti zviri kudedera pamberi pake, uye mwoyo yavaijipita yonyungudika mukati mavo. “ndichakuchidzira kumukirana pakati pavaijipita, mununʼuna acharwa nomukoma, muvakidzani acharwa nowaakavakidzana naye, guta richarwisana nerimwe guta, umambo hucharwisana nohumwe umambo. vaijipita vachaora mwoyo, uye ndichaita kuti zvavanoronga zvive pasina; vachabvunza zvifananidzo nemweya yavakafa, nokumasvikiro navavuki. ndichaisa vaijipita mumaoko amambo ano utsinye uye mambo anotyisa achatonga pamusoro pavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose. mvura yomurwizi ichapwa, uye mahombekombe erwizi achapwa agova akaoma. migero ichanhuhwa; hova dzeijipiti dzichaderera uye dzichapwa. tsanga nenhokwe zvichauna, uyewo zvinomera zvichitevedza nairi, pamuromo werwizi. minda yose yakadyarwa mujinga menairi ichaoma, mbesa dzichapeperetswa nemhepo, hazvingazovapozve. vabati vehove vachagomera uye vagorira, vose vanokanda zviredzo muna nairi; vaya vanokanda mimbure pamusoro pemvura vacharukutika. vanobata neshinda yakanaka vachapera simba, varuki vemicheka yakanaka vachashaya tariro. vanobata nemicheka vachaora mwoyo, uye vose vanobatira mubayiro vacharwadziwa mwoyo. machinda ezoani haasi chinhu asi mapenzi; makurukota afaro akachenjera anopa zano risina mano. mungareva sei kuna faro, kuti, “ndini mumwe wavakachenjera, mudzidzi wamadzimambo akare?” zvino vakachenjera venyu varipiko?
