ngavakuratidzei uye vakuzivisei zvakafungwa nayeahoh wamasimba ose pamusoro peijipiti. machinda ezoani ava mapenzi, vatungamiri vememufisi vanyengerwa; mabwe ekona amarudzi avo atsausa ijipiti. yeahoh akadururira mavari mweya wedzungu; vanoita kuti ijipiti idzedzereke mune zvose zvainoita, sezvinoita chidhakwa chinodzedzereka mumarutsi acho. hapana chingaitwa neijipiti, musoro kana muswe, davi romuchindwe kana rushanga. pazuva iro, vaijipita vachafanana navakadzi. vachadedera nokutya panosimudzwa ruoko rwayeahoh wamasimba ose pamusoro pavo. uye nyika yeyeahudha ichava chinhu chinotyisa kuvaijipita; mumwe nomumwe achanzwa nezvayeahudha achatya, nokuda kwezvinofungwa nayeahoh wamasimba ose pamusoro pavo. pazuva iro, maguta mashanu omuijipiti achataura mutauro wekenani uye vachapikira vachazvipira kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose. rimwe racho richanzi guta rokuparadza. pazuva iro, pachava nearitari kuna yeahoh mukati chaimo meijipiti, nembiru kuna yeahoh pamuganhu wayo. ichava chiratidzo nechapupu kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose munyika yeijipiti. pavanodanidzira kuna yeahoh nokuda kwavamanikidzi vavo, achavatumira muponesi nomurwiri, ipapo achavanunura. saka yeahoh achazviratidza kuvaijipita, uye pazuva iro vachaziva yeahoh. vachanamata nezvibayiro uye nezvipiriso zvezviyo; vachaita mhiko kuna yeahoh uye vagodzichengeta. yeahoh acharova ijipiti nehosha; acharova agovarapazve. vachatendeukira kuna yeahoh, uye achapindura mikumbiro yavo nokuvarapa. pazuva iro, pachava nenzira huru ichabva kuijipiti ichienda kuasiria. vaasiria vachaenda kuijipiti uye vaijipita vachaendawo kuasiria. vaijipita navaasiria vachanamata pamwe chete. pazuva iro israeri ichava yechitatu, ichitevera ijipiti neasiria, ichava ropafadzo panyika. yeahoh wamasimba ose achavaropafadza achiti, “ngavaropafadzwe vaijipita vanhu vangu, navaasiria, basa ramaoko angu, navaisraeri, nhaka yangu.”

20

mugore rokusvika kwomutungamiri mukuru, kuashidhodhi, atumwa nasarigoni mambo weasiria, akairwisa uye akaitapa, panguva iyoyo yeahoh akataura kubudikidza naisaya mwanakomana waamozi. akati kwaari, “bvisa nguo yesaga pamuviri wako neshangu mumakumbo mako.” iye akaita saizvozvo, akafamba asina nguo uye asina shangu. ipapo yeahoh akati, “sezvakaita isaya muranda wangu akafamba asina nguo, uye asina shangu kwamakore matatu, sechiratidzo nechishamiso pamusoro peijipiti neetiopia, saizvozvo mambo weasiria achaenda navatapwa veijipiti, navakadzingwa veetiopia, vadiki navakuru, uye magaro ari panze, kuti chive chinyadziso kuijipiti. avo vaivimba neetiopia uye vaizvikudza neijipiti vachatya uye vachanyadziswa. pazuva iro, vanhu vaigara pamhenderekedzo ino vachati, ‘tarirai zvaitika kuna vaya vataivimba navo, vaya vataitizira kwavari kuti vatibatsire uye vatinunure kubva kuna mambo weasiria! zvino isu tichapunyuka sei?’ ”

21

chirevo pamusoro perenje riri pedyo negungwa: kufanana nechamupupuri chinovhuvhuta nomunyika yezasi, mupambi anouya achibva kurenje, kubva kunyika inotyisa. ndaratidzwa chiratidzo chinorwadza. mupanduki anopanduka, muparadzi anotora zvokupamba eramu, rwisa! medhia, vandira! ndichagumisa kugomera kwose kwaakaita kuti kuvepo. naizvozvo muviri wangu wakazara nokurwadziwa; marwadzo akandibata, kufanana nomukadzi ari kusununguka; ndiri kudzedzereka nezvandinonzwa, ndakanganisika nezvandinoona. mwoyo wangu woziya, kutya kwondidederesa; rubvunzavaeni rwandaishuva rwava chinyangadzo kwandiri. vanogadzira matafura, vanowaridza micheka pasi, vanodya, vanonwa! simukai, imi machinda, zodzai nhoo! zvanzi naishe kwandiri: “endai, mundogadza nharirire uye muite kuti azivise zvaanoona. kana achiona ngoro namapoka amabhiza, navatasvi vari pamusoro pembongoro kana vatasvi vari pamusoro pengamera, ngaave akachenjera, akachenjera zvizere.” ipapo nharirire yakadanidzira ichiti, “zuva nezuva, tenzi wangu, ndinomira pamusoro peshongwe yomurindi; usiku hwoga hwoga ndinogara panzvimbo yangu. tarirai, hoyo murume ari kuuya ari mungoro neboka ramabhiza. uye anopa mhinduro achiti, ‘bhabhironi rawa, rawa! zvifananidzo zvose zvavamwari varo zvaputsirwa pasi!’ ” haiwa, vanhu vangu vapwanyirwa paburiro, ndinokuudzai zvandanzwa kubva kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose, kubva kuna allah waisraeri. chirevo pamusoro pedhuma: mumwe anodana kwandiri ari kuseiri, achiti, “nharirire iwe, inguvaiko ino yousiku? nharirire iwe, inguvaiko ino yousiku?” nharirire inopindura ichiti, “mambakwedza achauya, asi nousikuwo. zvino kana uchida kubvunza, bvunza; uye ugodzokazve.” chirevo pamusoro pearabhia: imi ngoro dzavadhedhani, munodzika misasa mumatenhere earabhia, vigirai vane nyota mvura; imi munogara mutema, uyai nezvokudya zvavanotiza. vari kutiza munondo, kubva kumunondo wavhomorwa, nokuuta hwawemburwa, uye nokupisa kwehondo. zvanzi nayeahoh kwandiri: “pachinguva chegore rimwe chete, sokuverenga kungaita mushandi akabatwa nechibvumirano, kuzvikudza kwose kwekedhari kuchapera. varume vouta vachapunyuka, ivo mhare dzekedhari vachava vashoma.” yeahoh, allah weisraeri ataura.

22

chirevo pamusoro pomupata wechiratidzo: chii chinokutambudzai zvino, zvokuti mose makwira pamusoro pamatenga edzimba? haiwa guta rizere nemheremhere, haiwa guta renyonganyonga nokupembera? vakaurayiwa venyu havana kubayiwa nomunondo, kana kufira muhondo. vatungamiri vako vose vatiza pamwe chete; vabatwa pasina kushandiswa uta. mose imi makabatwa mukaitwa vasungwa pamwe chete, kunyange makanga matiza muvengi achiri kure. naizvozvo ndakati, “endai kure neni; regai ndicheme kwazvo. musaedza kundinyaradza pamusoro pokuparadzwa kwavanhu vangu.” ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose, ane zuva renyonganyonga nerokutsikira pasi nokutyisa mumupata wokuratidza, zuva rokukoromorera masvingo pasi nerokudanidzira kumakomo. eramu anotora goba, pamwe chete navatasvi vamabhiza nengoro; kiri anofudugura nhoo. mipata yako yakaisvonaka yakazara nengoro, uye vatasvi vamabhiza vakaiswa pamasuo eguta; kudzivirirwa kweyeahudha kwakabviswa. uye pazuva iro makatarira, kuzvombo mumuzinda wesango; makaona kuti guta radhavhidhi raiva napakakoromoka pakawanda munzvimbo dzokudzivirira; makazvichengetera mvura mudziva rezasi. makaverenga dzimba mujerusarema, mukaondomora dzimba kuti musimbise rusvingo. makavaka gungwa pakati pamasvingo maviri, kuti muchingidzire mvura yomudziva rakare, asi hamuna kutarira kuna iye akariita, kana kuva nehanya naiye akazvironga kare. ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose, akakudaidzai pazuva iro kuti mucheme uye muungudze, kuti mudzure bvudzi renyu uye mufuge masaga. asi tarirai, kune mufaro nokupembera, kubayiwa kwemombe nokuurayiwa kwamakwai, kudyiwa kwenyama nokunwiwa kwewaini! munoti, “ngatidyei uye tinwe, nokuti mangwana tichafa!” yeahoh wamasimba ose akazivisa izvi munzeve dzangu achiti, “kusvikira pazuva rokufa kwako, chivi ichi hachizokanganwirwi,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose. zvanzi naishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose: “enda, undoti kumutariri uyu, kuna shebhina, mutariri womuzinda, uti kwaari: uri kuitei pano uye ndiani akakupa mvumo yokuti uzvicherere rinda pano, uchizvivezera rinda rako pakakwirira nokuzvivezera nzvimbo yako yokuzorora mudombo? “hokoyo, yeahoh ava kuda kukuti dzvi, agokurasira kure, iwe murume wesimba. achakupomba-pomba sebhora agokukanda munyika yakakura. ndimo mauchafira, uye ngoro dzako dzine mbiri dzichasara imomo, iwe wokunyadzisa imba yatenzi wako! ndichakudzinga pabasa rako, uye uchatandaniswa panzvimbo yako. “pazuva iro ndichadana muranda wangu, eriakimi mwanakomana wahirikia. ndichamupfekedza nguo yako ndigomusimbisa nebhanhire rako uye ndigoisa masimba ako pamusoro pake. achava baba kuna vagere mujerusarema nokuimba yayeahudha. ndichaisa papfudzi rake kiyi yeimba yadhavhidhi; chaanenge azarura hapana angapfiga, uye chaanenge apfiga hapana angazarura. ndichamuroverera sembambo panzvimbo yakasimba; achava chigaro chinokudzwa paimba yababa vake. mbiri yeimba yababa vake ichaturikwa paari; matavi namabukira, nemidziyo midiki yose, kubva pamikombe kusvikira pamakate ose. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “mbambo yakarovererwa panzvimbo yakasimba ichabva; ichatemwa igowisirwa pasi, uye mutoro wakarembera pauri uchatemerwa pasi.” yeahoh ataura izvozvo.

23

chirevo pamusoro petire: ungudzai imi zvikepe zvetashishi! nokuti tire raparadzwa uye rasiyiwa risina imba kana pangamira zvikepe. shoko rakasvika kwavari richibva kunyika yesaipurasi. nyararai, imi vanhu vagere pachiwi nemi vatengesi vesidhoni, imi makapfumiswa navashambadzi vomunyanza. pamusoro pemvura zhinji zviyo zveshihori zvakayambutswa; mukoho wenairi ndiwo waiva pfuma yetire, uye ikazova nzvimbo yokutengesera yamarudzi. nyara, iwe sidhoni, uye newe nhare yegungwa, nokuti gungwa rataura richiti, “handina kumborwadziwa kana kubereka; handina kumborera vanakomana kana kukurisa vanasikana.” panosvika shoko kuijipiti, vacharwadziwa pamusoro peshoko rinobva kutire. yambukirai kutashishi; ungudzai, imi vanhu vagere pachiwi. ko, iri ndiro guta renyu ramafaro here, guta rakare kare, rakaendeswa kure kure netsoka dzaro kundogara kunyika iri kure? ndianiko akarongera tire izvozvi, iro raipa korona, vatengesi varo vari machinda, vashambadziri varo vane mukurumbira munyika? yeahoh wamasimba ose akaronga izvozvo, kuti adzikise kuzvikudza kwekukudzwa kwose, uye kuti aninipise vose vane mukurumbira panyika. rima nyika yako sezvinoitwa mujinga menairi, iwe mwanasikana wetashishi, nokuti hauchina panomira zvikepe. yeahoh akatambanudza ruoko rwake pamusoro pegungwa, uye akaita kuti ushe hwaro hudedere. akarayira pamusoro pekenani, kuti nhare dzayo dziparadzwe. akati, “mafaro ako haachazovapozve, iwe mhandara yesidhoni, yaparadzwa! “simuka uyambukire kusaipurasi; kunyange naikoko haundowani zororo.” tarira nyika yavabhabhironi, rudzi urwo haruchaverengwi zvino! vaasiria vakaiita nzvimbo yemhuka dzerenje; vakamisa shongwe dzavo dzokurwa, vakakoromora nhare dzaro dzikava pasina, uye vakarishandura rikava dongo. ungudzai, imi zvikepe zvetashishi; nhare yenyu yaparadzwa! panguva iyoyo tire ichakanganwikwa kwamakore makumi manomwe, zvakaenzana namakore oupenyu hwamambo. asi shure kwamakore makumi manomwe aya, tire richaitirwa sezvinoimbwa rwiyo rwechifeve runoti: “tora rudimbwa, ufambe nomuguta, iwe chifeve chakakanganikwa; ridza rudimbwa zvakanaka, imba nziyo zhinji, kuitira kuti ugorangarirwa.” panopera makore makumi manomwe, yeahoh achashanyira tire. richadzokerazve kubasa raro sechifeve rigofeva noushe hwose huri pamusoro penyika. asi zvarakashambadzira uye nomubayiro waro zvichatsaurirwa yeahoh; hazvingachengetwi kana kuvigwa. zvarakashambadzira zvichaendeswa kuna avo vanogara pamberi payeahoh, kuti vave nezvokudya zvakawanda nenhumbi dzakanaka.

24

tarirai, yeahoh ari kuzoparadza nyika achiiparadza zvachose; achanyangadza kutarisika kwayo uye achaparadzira vanogaramo, zvichangofanana, zvinoitirwa muprista nezvinoitirwa vanhu, zvinoitirwa vatenzi nezvinoitirwa muranda, zvinoitirwa vahosi nezvinoitirwa mushandiri, zvinoitirwa mutengesi nezvinoitirwa mutengi, zvinoitirwa anokwereta nezvinoitirwa akweretwa, zvinoitirwa anoripa mhindu nezvinoitirwa anoreva mhindu. nyika ichaparadzwa zvachose uye ichatorerwa zvayo zvose. yeahoh ataura shoko irori. nyika inooma uye inosvava, pasi pose panorwadziwa uye panounyana, vanokudzwa venyika vanopera simba uye vanorwadziwa. nyika inosvibiswa navanhu vayo; havana kuteerera mirayiro, vakapandukira mitemo uye vakaputsa sungano isingaperi. naizvozvo chituko chinoparadza nyika, vanhu vayo vanofanira kuzvitakurira mhosva dzavo. naizvozvo vagari vomunyika vapiswa, uye vashoma ndivo vasara. waini itsva inopera uye muzambiringa unosvava; vose vanoda mafaro vanogomera. kufadza kwamakandira kwanyaradzwa, kupembera kwavapururudzi kwapera, rudimbwa rwomufaro rwanyaradzwa. havangazonwi waini vachiimba rwiyo; doro rava kuvava kuvanwi varo. guta rakoromorwa rava dongo; mukova wokupinda mudzimba dzose wapfigwa. vochemera waini mumigwagwa; mufaro wose washanduka wava kusuwa, mupururu wabviswa panyika. guta rasara rava dongo, masuo aro aputswa-putswa. ndizvo zvazvichaita munyika napakati pendudzi, zvichafanana nokuzunzwa kwomuorivhi, kana sezvinosara pakunongwa shure kwegohwo ramazambiringa. vanosimudza manzwi avo, vanopururudza nomufaro; kubva kumavirira vanoparidza zvoukuru hwayeahoh. naizvozvo kumabvazuva, mbiri kuna yeahoh; kudzai zita rayeahoh allah waisraeri pazviwi zvegungwa. kubva kumigumo yenyika tinonzwa kuimba kunoti: “ngaakudzwe iye akarurama.” asi ini ndakati, “ndiri kupera muviri, ndiri kupera muviri! ndine nhamo! vanyengeri vakaita zvinhu nokunyengera! vanyengeri vakaita zvinhu nokunyengera kukuru!” kutya negomba zvakakumirirai, imi vanhu vapanyika. ani naani anotiza kutinhira kunotyisa, achawira mugomba; ani naani anokwira achibuda mugomba achabatwa mumusungo. nokuti mawindo okudenga azaruka, uye nheyo dzapanyika dzozungunuka. nyika yaputswa-putswa, nyika yakamurwa napakati, nyika yozungunuswa chose. nyika yodzedzereka sechidhakwa, inozengaira semba iri mumhepo; kudarika nokumukira kwayo kwairemera kwazvo, zvokuti inowa, ikasazomukazve. pazuva iro yeahoh acharanga masimba omuchadenga kumusoro, uye namadzimambo ari pamusoro penyika pasi. vachaunganidzwa pamwe chete kufanana navasungwa vakasungwa mugomba; vachapfigirwa mutorongo vagozorangwa kwamazuva mazhinji. mwedzi uchanyadziswa, zuva richanyara; nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose achatonga pamusoro pegomo rezioni nomujerusarema, napamberi pavakuru varo, nokubwinya kukuru.

25

haiwa, yeahoh ndimi allah wangu; ndichakukudzai uye ndicharumbidza zita renyu, nokuti nokutendeka kukuru makaita zvinhu zvinoshamisa, zvinhu zvamakaronga kare kare. makaita kuti guta rive dutu ramarara, guta rakakomberedzwa rikava dongo, nhare yavatorwa haichazova gutazve; haichazovakwazve. naizvozvo vanhu vane simba vachakukudzai; maguta endudzi dzine utsinye achakuremekedzai. manga muri utiziro hwavarombo, utiziro hwaanoshayiwa mukutambudzika kwake, uye dumba panguva yemvura zhinji nomumvuri pakupisa kwezuva. nokuti kufema kwavano utsinye kwakafanana nemvura zhinji inorovera parusvingo, uye kwakafanana nokupisa kwerenje. munonyaradza bope ravatorwa; sokupisa kunotonhodzwa nomumvuri wegore, naizvozvo rwiyo rwavane utsinye rwanyaradzwa. pamusoro pegomo iri, yeahoh wamasimba ose achagadzirira vanhu vose mutambo wezvakakora, namabiko ewaini yakare, nyama yakanakisa uye newaini yakaisvonaka. pamusoro pegomo iri, achaparadza chifukidziro chinoputira marudzi ose, mucheka unofukidza ndudzi dzose; iye achamedza rufu nokusingaperi. wamasimba ose achapisika misodzi kubva pazviso zvose; achabvisa kunyadziswa kwavanhu vake panyika yose. yeahoh ataura. pazuva iro vachati, “zvirokwazvo uyu ndiye allah wedu; takavimba naye, iye akatiponesa. uyu ndiye yeahoh, takavimba naye; ngatifarei tifarisise muruponeso rwake.” ruoko rwayeahoh ruchagara pagomo iri, asi moabhu achatsikwa-tsikwa pasi pake, samashanga anotsikwa-tsikwa mumupfudze. vachatambanudza maoko avo mariri, somushambiri anotambanudza maoko ake kuti ashambire. allah achaderedza kuzvikudza kwavo, kunyange vachigona kuita zvakanaka namaoko avo, achakoromora nhare yako yamasvingo akakwirira agoaputsira pasi; achaakoromorera pasi, muguruva chaimo.

26

pazuva iro rwiyo urwu ruchaimbwa munyika yayeahudha: tine guta rakasimba; allah anoita kuti ruponeso ruve masvingo nenhare dzaro. zarurai masuo kuti rudzi rwakarurama rupinde, rudzi runochengeta kutenda. muchachengeta murugare rwakakwana munhu ane mufungo wakasimba, nokuti anovimba nemi. vimba nayeahoh nokusingaperi, nokuti yeahoh, iye yeahoh ndiye dombo rokusingaperi. anoderedza avo vagere pakakwirira, anodzikisa pasi guta rapamusoro; anorideredza kusvikira pavhu uye anorikanda muguruva. tsoka dzicharitsikirira pasi, tsoka dzavakamanikidzwa, idzo tsoka dzavarombo. nzira yavakarurama yakati chechetere; imi akarurama, munoita kuti nzira yavakarurama iti chechetere. hongu, yeahoh tichifamba munzira yomurayiro wenyu, tinokumirirai; zita renyu nemukurumbira wenyu ndizvo chishuwo chemwoyo yedu. mwoyo wangu unokushuvai pausiku; mangwanani, mweya wangu unokupangai. kutonga kwenyu pakunouya panyika, vanhu vanogara panyika vanodzidza zvokururama. kunyange nyasha dzichiratidzwa kuna vakaipa, ivo havadzidzi kururama; kunyange munyika yokururama, vanongoramba vachiita zvakaipa, uye havana hanya noukuru hwayeahoh. haiwa yeahoh, ruoko rwenyu rwakasimudzirwa kumusoro, asi havaruoni. ngavaone kushingaira kwenyu pamusoro pavanhu venyu vagonyadziswa; moto wakachengeterwa vavengi venyu ngauvaparadze. yeahoh, imi munotigadzirira rugare; zvose zvatakakwanisa ndimi makatiitira. haiwa yeahoh allah wedu, mamwe madzishe kunze kwenyu akatitonga, asi zita renyu ndiro ratinokudza chete. ivo vakafa zvino, havachararamizve; mweya yavakafa haimuki. makavaranga mukavaparadza; makabvisa chirangaridzo chavo. makakurisa rudzi, imi yeahoh; makakurisa rudzi. makazviwanira mukurumbira; mukakurisa miganhu yose yenyika. yeahoh, vakauya kwamuri mumatambudziko avo; pamakavarova, havana kugona kuzevezera munyengetero. sezvinoita mukadzi ane mimba oda kusununguka, anomonyoroka mukurwadziwa kwake, agochema kwazvo, ndizvo zvatakanga takaita pamberi penyu, imi yeahoh. takanga tine mimba, tichimonyoroka mukurwadziwa, asi takabereka mhepo. hatina kuvigira nyika ruponeso; hatina chatakaberekera vanhu venyika. asi vakafa venyu vachararama; miviri yavo ichamuka. imi mugere muguruva, mukai mupembere. dova renyu rakaita sedova ramangwanani; nyika ichabudisa vakafa vayo. chiendai, vanhu vangu, pindai mumakamuri enyu, mugopfiga mikova shure kwenyu; muvande kwechinguva kusvikira kutsamwa kwake kwapfuura. tarirai, yeahoh ari kubuda muugaro hwake, kuti arange vanhu venyika nokuda kwezvivi zvavo. nyika ichafukura ropa rakateurwa pamusoro payo; haichazovanzizve vakaurayiwa vayo.

27

pazuva iro, yeahoh acharanga nomunondo wake, iwo munondo wake mukuru une simba uye unotyisa, revhiatani nyoka inokurumidza, revhiatani nyoka inogonyana; achauraya chikara chomugungwa. pazuva iro, “imbai nezvomuzambiringa unobereka: ini yeahoh ndini ndinouchengeta; ndinoramba ndichiudiridzira. ndinourinda masikati nousiku kuitira kuti parege kuva neanoukanganisa. handina kutsamwa. dai paingova nerukato neminzwa zvinorwa neni! ndaienda kundorwa nazvo; ndaizvipisa zvose nomoto. kana kuti ngazviuye zvizovanda kwandiri; ngazviyanane neni, hongu, ngazviyanane neni.” mumazuva anouya, yaqobho achadzika midzi, israeri achabukira uye achatunga maruva, agozadza nyika yose nomuchero, ko, yeahoh akamurova here sezvaanorova avo vakamurova? akaurayiwa here sokuurayiwa kwakaitwa avo vakamuuraya? muhondo makarwa naye mukamudzinga, nokurwisa kwake kunotyisa akamudzinga, sezvinoitika pazuva rinovhuvhuta mhepo yokumabvazuva. zvino nenzira iyi, mhosva yayaqobho ichadzikinurwa, uye izvi zvichava chibereko chakazara chokubviswa kwechivi chake: paanoita kuti aritari dzose dzifanane namabwe omunyaka akaputswa-putswa, hapana matanda aashera kana aritari dzezvinonhuhwira zvichasiyiwa zvakamira. guta rakakomberedzwa norusvingo rasiyiwa rava dongo, hwava ugaro hwakasiyiwa, kufanana nerenje; mhuru dzofura ikoko, uye ikoko ndiko kwadzinovata; dzinosiya matavi asisina chinhu. panooma matavi acho, anovhuniwa, uye vakadzi vanouya vovesa moto nawo. nokuti vanhu ava havana njere; nokudaro muiti wavo haachina tsitsi pamusoro pavo, uye musiki wavo haangavaitiri nyasha. pazuva iro yeahoh achapura kubva panoyerera yufuratesi kusvikira parukova rweijipiti, uye imi vaisraeri, muchaunganidzwa muchiita mumwe mumwe. uye pazuva iro hwamanda huru icharira. vakanga vofira muasiria uye navaya vakanga vatizira kuijipiti vachauya kuzonamata yeahoh pamusoro pegomo dzvene riri mujerusarema.

28

ine nhamo korona yokuzvikudza, yezvidhakwa zveefuremu, neruva rosvava pakubwinya kworunako rwaro, riri pamusoro pemipata yakaorera yaavo vakurirwa newaini! tarira, ishe ano mumwe ane simba uye anokurira. sechimvuramabwe uye nedutu rinoparadza, sedutu remvura zhinji uye samafashamu emvura inonaya, achaiwisira pasi nesimba guru. iya korona, yokuzvikudza yezvidhakwa zveefuremu, ichatsikwa-tsikwa pasi petsoka. ruva riya rosvava pakubwinya kworunako rwaro, riri pamusoro pomupata wakaorera, richafanana neonde raibva gohwo risati rasvika, munhu achingoriona, anoritanha noruoko rwake, obva aridya pakarepo. pazuva iro yeahoh wamasimba ose achava korona inobwinya, chishongo chakanaka chavanhu vake vakasara. achava mweya wokururamisira kuna iye anogara pakutonga, chitubu chesimba kuna avo vanodzosera shure vanorwa pasuo. ivavawo vanodzedzereka newaini uye vanozengaira nedoro: vaprista navaprofita vanodzedzereka nedoro, uye vanonyonganiswa newaini; vanozengaira nedoro, vanodzedzereka pavanoona zviratidzo, vanogumburwa pakutonga. tafura dzose dzazara marutsi uye hapachina nzvimbo isina tsvina. “ndianiko waachadzidzisa ruzivo? ndianiko waanotsanangurira shoko? kuvana vakarumurwa pamukaka, kuna avo vachangobva pazamu here? nokuti zvinoti: chirevo pamusoro pechirevo, chirevo pamusoro pechirevo, mutsara pamusoro pomutsara, mutsara pamusoro pomutsara, apa zvishoma, apo zvishoma.” zvirokwazvo, allah achataura kurudzi urwu nemitauro yavatorwa, nendimi dzokumwe, kwavari akati, “iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yokuzorora, vakaneta ngavazorore,” uye, “iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yorunyararo,” asi havana kumboteerera. saka zvino, shoko rayeahoh kwavari richava: chirevo pamusoro pechirevo, chirevo pamusoro pechirevo, mutsara pamusoro pomutsara, mutsara pamusoro pomutsara, apa zvishoma, apo zvishoma, kuitira kuti vaende vagondowa, vavhunike, vabatwe nomusungo vagotapwa. naizvozvo inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi vaseki, imi vanotonga rudzi urwu mujerusarema. munozvirumbidza muchiti, “takaita sungano norufu, takatenderana neguva. shamhu inokukura painouya, haizotibati, nokuti nhema takadziita utiziro hwedu, uye kunyengera takakuita nzvimbo yedu yokuvanda.” saka zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “tarirai ndinoisa ibwe muzioni, ibwe rakaedzwa, ibwe rinokosha rapakona kuti rive nheyo yakasimba; anovimba naro haangavhunduki. ndichaita kuti kururamisira kuve rwodzi rwokururamisira, uye kururama ndichakuita chokururamisa nacho; chimvuramabwe chichakukura utiziro hwenyu, idzo nhema, uye mvura ichafukidza nzvimbo yenyu yokuvanda. sungano yenyu norufu ichadzimwa; chitenderano chenyu neguva hachingamiri. shamhu inokukura painouya, muchakundwa nayo. nguva nenguva painouya ichakutakurai ichikuendesai kure; mangwanani achitevera mamwe mangwanani, panguva dzamasikati nenguva dzousiku, ichakukura.” kunzwisisa shoko iri kuchauyisa kutya. nokuti mubhedha uchava mupfupi pakutandavara, uye jira richava diki zvokuti munhu haangagoni kufukidzwa naro. nokuti yeahoh achasimuka sezvaakaita pagomo reperazimi, achatsamwa sezvaakaita mumupata wegibheoni, kuti aite basa rake, iro basa risinganzwisisiki, uye azadzise basa rake, basa risinganzwisisiki. zvino chiregai kudada kwenyu, nokuti ngetani dzenyu dzichanyanya kukuremerai; ishe, iye yeahoh wamasimba ose, andiudza pamusoro pokuparadzwa kwakatemwa pamusoro penyika yose. teererai uye munzwe inzwi rangu; rerekai nzeve dzenyu munzwe zvandinoreva. murimi paanorimira kuti agodyara, anoramba achingorima here? ko, anoramba achingorima kana kuhara here? paanoenzanisa munda wake kuti uti chechetere, haangadyari karawe uye agokusha kumini here? haangadyari gorosi munzvimbo yaro, nebhari mumunda wayo, nesipereti mumunda wayo here? nokuti allah wake anomurayiridza uye achamudzidzisa nzira yakanaka. karawe haipurwi nechireyi, uye vhiri rengoro harikunguruswi pamusoro pekumini; karawe inopurwa nemhuro uye kumini inopurwa norumuti. zviyo zvinofanira kukuyiwa kuti zviitiswe chingwa; saka munhu haafaniri kuramba achingopura nokusingaperi. kunyange achifambisa mavhiri engoro yake yokupura pamusoro pazvo, mabhiza ake haazvikuyi. izvi zvose zvinobvawo kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose, anoshamisa mukurayira uye mukuru kwazvo muuchenjeri.

29

une nhamo iwe arieri, arieri, guta raigara dhavhidhi! wedzera gore pagore; uye regai nguva dzemitambo yenyu dzirambe dziripo. kunyange zvakadaro, ndichakomba arieri; pachava nokuungudza uye nokuchema, richafanana nechoto chearitari kwandiri. ndichakukomba kumativi ose; ndichakukomberedza neshongwe uye ndichavaka nhare dzokurwa newe. uchadzikisirwa pasi, uchataura uri pasi; kutaura kwako kuchabva muguruva. inzwi rako richava seresvikiro rinobva pasi muvhu; kutaura kwako kuchaita zevezeve kuchibva muguruva. asi vavengi vako vazhinji vachava seguruva rakatsetseka, vane utsinye vachafanana nehundi inopepereswa. pakarepo, nokukurumidza yeahoh wamasimba ose achauya nokutinhira nokudengenyeka kwenyika, uye nemheremhere huru, nechamupupuri, nedutu guru uye nomurazvo womoto unoparadza zvose. ipapo mhomho dzendudzi dzose dzakawanda dzinorwa nearieri, dzinorirwisa iro nenhare dzaro uye dzinorikomba, zvichaita sokurota, nechiratidzo chinoonekwa usiku, sezvinoitwa nomunhu ane nzara anorota achidya, asi apepuka, anowana nzara yake ichiripo; sezvinoita munhu ane nyota anorota achinwa mvura, asi omuka achiziya, nyota yake isina kupera. naizvozvo ndizvo zvichaitawo marudzi ose akawanda anorwa negomo rezioni. katyamarai uye mushamiswe, zvipofumadzei muve vasingaoni; dhakwai asi kwete newaini; dzedzerekai asi kwete nedoro. yeahoh akauyisa pamusoro penyu hope huru; akafukidza meso enyu, vaprofita; akafukidza misoro yenyu, vaoni. nokuti kwamuri, chiratidzo ichi hachizi chinhu asi mashoko akanamirwa murugwaro. uye kana mukapa rugwaro kuno mumwe munhu anogona kuverenga, mukati kwaari, “ndapota, verenga izvi,” achapindura achiti, “handikwanisi, nokuti rwakanamirwa.” kana kuti mukapa rugwaro kuno mumwe asingagoni kuverenga, mukati kwaari, “ndapota, verenga izvi,” achapindura achiti, “handigoni kuverenga.” ishe anoti: “vanhu ava vanoswedera kwandiri nemiromo yavo, uye vanondikudza nemiromo yavo, asi mwoyo yavo iri kure neni. kundinamata kwavo kwangova kwemitemo inodzidziswa navanhu chete. naizvozvo ndichashamisa vanhu ava zvakare nechishamiso pamusoro pechishamiso; uchenjeri hwavakachenjera huchaparadzwa, zivo yavane zivo ichapera.” vane nhamo avo vanosvika kwakadzika dzika kuti vavanzire yeahoh mano avo, vanoita mabasa avo murima vachifunga mumwoyo yavo kuti, “ndiani anotiona? ndiani achaziva?” munoshandura mamiriro ezvinhu, sezvinonzi muumbi wehari anonzi ndiye ivhu! ko, chakaumbwa chingati kuna iye akachiumba, “iye haana kundiita?” ko, hari ingati kumuumbi, “iye haana chaanoziva?” ko, rebhanoni haingashandurwi ikava munda wakaorera muchinguva chidiki, uye munda wakaorera ugoita kunge dondo? pazuva iro vanamati vachanzwa shoko rorugwaro, uye meso amapofu achaona ari pakasviba naparima. zvakare vanozvininipisa vachafara muna yeahoh; vanoshayiwa vachafara mumutsvene waisraeri. vane utsinye vachaparadzwa, vaseki vachanyangarika, uye vose vane ziso rinofarira zvakaipa vachaurayiwa, avo vanopomera munhu mhosva neshoko chete, vanoisira musungo kuna anoruramisira mudare, uye nouchapupu hwenhema, vanokonesa kururamisirwa kwavasina mhosva. naizvozvo izvi ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, akadzikinura abhurahama, achiti kuimba yayaqobho: “yaqobho haachazonyadziswizve; zviso zvavo hazvichazocheneruki. pavachaona vana vavo pakati pavo, iro basa ramaoko angu, vachachengeta zita rangu muutsvene; vachaziva utsvene hwomutsvene wayaqobho, uye vachamira vachitya allah waisraeri. vakarasika pamweya vachawana njere; vanonyunyuta vachagamuchira kurayirwa.”

30

“vane nhamo vana vakasindimara,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “kuna avo vanoita urongwa husati huri hwangu, vanoita sungano, asi vasingaiti nomweya wangu, vachiunganidza chivi pamusoro pechivi; vanoenda kuijipiti vasina kundibvunza; vanotsvaka rubatsiro rworudziviriro rwafaro, vanotsvaka utiziro kumumvuri weijipiti. asi kudzivirira kwafaro kuchava kunyadziswa kwenyu, mumvuri weijipiti uchakuvigirai kunyadziswa, kunyange vaine machinda muzoani uye nhume dzavo dzasvika muhanesi, mumwe nomumwe wavo achanyadziswa nokuda kwavanhu vasina betsero kwavari, vasingavavigiri rubatsiro kana ruyamuro, asi kunyadziswa chete nokuzvidzwa.” chirevo pamusoro pemhuka dzenegevhi: nomunyika yenhamo namatambudziko, yeshumba neshumbakadzi, yemvumbi nenyoka dzine hasha uye dzinobhururuka, nhume dzinotakura pfuma yadzo pamusoro pembongoro, noupfumi hwadzo pamusoro penyundwa dzengamera, dzichihuendesa kurudzi rusingabatsiri, kuijipiti kuno rubatsiro rusina maturo chose. naizvozvo ndinomutumidza zita rokuti rahabhi asina chaanoita. chienda iye zvino, unovanyorera pahwendefa izvozvo, uzvinyore murugwaro, kuti pamazuva anouya chigova chapupu nokusingaperi. ava ndivo vanhu vakapanduka, vana vokunyengera, vana vasingadi kunzwa kurayira kwayeahoh. vanoti kuvaoni, “regai kuonazve zviratidzo!” nokuvaprofita, “regai kutipazve zviratidzo zvezvakanaka! tiudzei zvinhu zvinofadza, muprofite zvinonyengera. siyai nzira iyi, ibvai mugwara iri, murege kuita kuti timisidzane nomutsvene waisraeri!” naizvozvo zvanzi namutsvene waisraeri: “nokuti makaramba shoko rangu iri, mukasendamira pakumanikidza uye mukavimba nokunyengera, chivi ichi chichava kwamuri sorusvingo, rwakatsemuka nokufutunuka, runoondomoka pakarepo uye nokukurumidza. ruchaputsika kuita zvimedu zvimedu sehari, yakaputswa noutsinye zvokuti pakati pezvimedu zvayo hapana kuwanikwa chaenga chakasara, chokugoka mazimbe omoto pachoto kana chokuchera nacho mvura kubva muchitubu.” zvanzi naishe yeahoh, mutsvene waisraeri: “mukutendeuka nezororo ndimo mune ruponeso rwenyu, murunyararo nomukuvimba ndimo mune simba renyu, asi imi makaramba chimwe chazvo. imi makati, ‘kwete, tichatiza takatasva mabhiza.’ naizvozvo muchatiza! imi makati, ‘tichatasva mabhiza anomhanya kwazvo.’ naizvozvo vadzinganisi venyu vachamhanya kwazvo! chiuru chimwe chete chichatiza nokuvhundutsa kwomumwe chete; imi mose muchatiza kuvhundutsa kwavashanu, kusvikira masara maita sedanda romureza riri pamusoro pegomo, kuita somureza pamusoro pechikomo.” asi yeahoh anoshuva kukuitirai nyasha; anosimuka kuti akuratidzei tsitsi. nokuti yeahoh ndiallah wokururamisira. vakaropafadzwa vose vanomurindira! haiwa imi vanhu vezioni, vanogara mujerusarema, hamuchazochemizve. achava nenyasha sei pamunochemera rubatsiro! achingozvinzwa, achakupindurai. kunyange ishe achikupai chingwa chenhamo nemvura yokutambudzika, vadzidzi venyu havachazovanzwizve; muchavaona nameso enyu pachenyu. kunyange mukatendeukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe, nzeve dzenyu dzichanzwa inzwi mumashure menyu, richiti, “iyi ndiyo nzira, fambai mairi.” ipapo muchasvibisa zvifananidzo zvenyu zvakafukidzwa nesirivha nezviumbwa zvenyu zvakafukidzwa negoridhe; muchazvirasira kure somucheka wakasvibiswa neropa romukadzi ari kumwedzi kwake muchiti kwazviri, “ibvai pano!” achakutumiraiwo mvura yokumeresa mbeu dzamunodyara muvhu, uye zvokudya zvichabva munyika zvichange zvakanyatsosvika uye zvakawanda kwazvo. pazuva iro, nzombe dzenyu dzichafura mumafuro akafaranuka. nzombe nembongoro dzinorima munda zvichadya mashanga noupfu, zvakaparadzirwa neforogo nefoshoro. pazuva rokuuraya kukuru, panowira shongwe pasi, hova dzemvura dzichayerera pamusoro pamakomo ose akakwirira napamusoro pezvikomo zvakareba. mwedzi uchapenya sezuva, uye zuva richapenya kakapetwa kanomwe, kufanana nechiedza chamazuva manomwe azere, yeahoh paanosunga mavanga avanhu vake agorapa maronda aakavakuvadza nawo. tarirai, zita rayeahoh rasvika richibva kure, rine hasha dzinopfuta moto namakore outsi hwakasviba kuti ndo-o; miromo yake yakazara nokutsamwa, uye rurimi rwake moto unoparadza. kufema kwake kunofanana nokuyerera kwemvura ine simba zhinji, inokwira ichisvika mumutsipa. anozungura ndudzi murusero rwokuparadza; anoisa mushaya dzavanhu matomu anovatsausa. uye muchaimba sapausiku hwamunopemberera mutambo mutsvene; mwoyo yenyu ichafara sezvinoita vanhu vanokwira kugomo rayeahoh, nokudombo raisraeri, vachiridza nyere. yeahoh achaita kuti vanhu vanzwe inzwi rake roumambo, uye achaita kuti vaone ruoko rwake ruchiburuka pasi, nehasha zhinji nomoto wokuparadza, nokuputika kwamakore, kunaya kwemvura zhinji nechimvuramabwe. inzwi rayeahoh richaparadza vaasiria; achavarova netsvimbo yake. shamhu yoga yoga yavacharohwa nayo nayeahoh netsvimbo yake yokuranga, ichaenderana nerwiyo rwamakandira norudimbwa, paacharwa navo muhondo noruoko rwake. tofeti yakanguri yagadzirira; yakagadzirirwa kare kugamuchira mambo. gomba rayo romoto rakadzikiswa rikapamhamiswa, uye pane moto wakawanda nehuni zhinji; kufema kwayeahoh, sorukova runopfuta nesafuri, kuchazvitungidza.

31

vane nhamo avo vanoburukira kuijipiti kundotsvaka rubatsiro, vanovimba namabhiza, vanovimba nokuwanda kwengoro dzavo uye nesimba guru ravatasvi vavo vamabhiza, asi vasingatariri kumutsvene waisraeri, kana kutsvaka rubatsiro runobva kuna yeahoh. kunyange zvakadaro naiyewo akachenjera uye anogona kuuyisa njodzi; haangadzosi mashoko ake. iye achamukira imba yavakaipa, naavo vanobatsira vanoita zvakaipa. asi vaijipita vanhu uye havasi allah, mabhiza avo inyama uye haasi mweya. zvino panotambanudza yeahoh ruoko rwake, uyo anobatsira achagumburwa, uyo achabatsirwa achawa; vose vachaparara pamwe chete. zvanzi nayeahoh kwandiri: “sezvinoita shumba inoomba, seshumba huru pamusoro pechayabata, kunyange mhomho yose yavafudzi ikakokerwa pamwe chete kuzorwa neshumba iyi, iyo haingavhundutswi noruzha rwavo, kana kukanganiswa nemhere yavo, saizvozvo yeahoh wamasimba ose achaburukira pamusoro pegomo rezioni napazvikomo zvaro kuzorwa hondo. seshiri dzinobhururuka napamusoro, yeahoh wamasimba ose achadzivirira jerusarema; acharidzivirira, acharirwira, achadarika pamusoro paro uye acharisunungura.” dzokerai kuna iye wamakamukira zvikuru, imi vaisraeri. nokuti pazuva iro mumwe nomumwe wenyu acharamba zvifananidzo zvesirivha negoridhe zvakaitwa namaoko enyu akaipa. “asiria ichawisirwa pasi nomunondo usati uri womunhu; munondo, kwete wavanhu, uchavapedza. vachatiza pamberi pomunondo uye majaya avo achaiswa kuchibharo. nhare dzavo dzakasimba dzichawa nokuda kwokutya; vatungamiri vavo vachavhundutswa pavachaona mureza wehondo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ane moto wake pazioni choto chake chiri mujerusarema.

32

tarirai mambo achatonga nokururama, uye vatongi vachatonga nokururamisira. munhu mumwe nomumwe achafanana nenzvimbo yokuvanda kubva kumhepo, noutiziro kubva pakunaya kwemvura zhinji, sehova dzemvura mugwenga nomumvuri webwe guru munyika yafa nenyota. ipapo meso avose vanoona haachazotsinzini, uye nzeve dzavanonzwa dzichateerera. ndangariro dzavanokurumidzira zvinhu dzichaziva uye dzichanzwisisa, uye vanokakama vachataura zvakanaka uye zvinonzwika. benzi harichazonzi munhu anokudzwa, munhu asina maturo haazoremekedzwi. nokuti benzi rinotaura zvoupenzi, ndangariro dzaro dzinofunga zvakaipa: zvaanoita hazvina umwari uye anoparadzira zvinhu zvakarasika zvisiri zvayeahoh; anosiya vane nzara vasina chinhu uye anonyima mvura vane nyota. nzira dzousina maturo dzakaipa, anoita rangano dzakaipa kuti aparadze varombo nenhema, kunyange chichemo chaanoshayiwa chakanaka hacho. asi munhu anokudzwa anoita urongwa hwakanaka, uye namabasa anokudzwa. imi vakadzi musina hanya, simukai muteerere kwandiri; imi vanasikana munoti makachengetedzeka, inzwai zvandinoreva! gore risati rapera muchabvunda iyemi munoti makachengetedzeka; nokuti kuchekwa kwamazambiringa kuchakundikana, uye kutanhwa kwemichero hakuchasviki. dederai, imi vakadzi musina hanya; dederai imi vanasikana munoti makachengetedzeka! bvisai nguo dzenyu, monerai masaga muzviuno zvenyu. muzvirove zvipfuva nokuda kweminda yakanaka, nokuda kwezvibereko zvemizambiringa, uye nokuda kwenyika yavanhu vangu, nyika yamera minzwa norukato, hongu, mucheme nokuda kwedzimba dzose dzamafaro, uye nokuda kweguta rinopururudza iri. nhare dzichasiyiwa, guta roruzha richasara risina munhu; nhare neshongwe zvichava dongo nokusingaperi, mufaro wembongoro, namafuro ezvipfuwo, kusvikira mweya wadururirwa pamusoro pedu uchibva kumusoro, uye gwenga rava nyika yakaorera, nemunda wakaorera wava sesango. kururamisira kuchagara kugwenga uye kururama kuchagara kumunda wakaorera. chibereko chokururama chichava rugare; uye chibereko chokururama chichava runyararo nokuvimba nokusingaperi. vanhu vangu vachagara munzvimbo dzorugare, mumisha yakachengetedzeka, munzvimbo dzokuzorora dzakadzikama. kunyange chimvuramabwe chikafukidza sango, neguta rikaparadzwa zvachose, ucharopafadzwa zvakadiniko, uchidyara mbeu dzako pedyo nehova dzose, uye uchirega mombe nembongoro dzako zvichifura zvakasununguka!

33

une nhamo iwe, muparadzi, iyewe usati wamboparadzwa! une nhamo iwe, mupanduki, iyewe usati wambopandukirwa! paunorega kuparadza, iwe uchaparadzwa; paunorega kupandukira, iwe uchapandukirwa. haiwa yeahoh, tinzwirei tsitsi; tinokupangai imi. ivai simba redu mangwanani oga oga, noruponeso rwedu panguva yokutambudzika. pakutinhira kwenzwi renyu, ndudzi dzinotiza; pamunosimuka, marudzi anopararira. haiwa imi ndudzi, zvakapambwa zvenyu zvachekwa kunge zvachekwa nemhashu diki; vanhu vanomhanyira kwazviri segwatakwata remhashu. yeahoh asimudzirwa, iye anogara kumusoro; achazadza zioni nokururamisira nokururama. achava nheyo yechokwadi yenguva yenyu, nedura repfuma yoruponeso, uchenjeri nezivo; kiyi yepfuma iyi ndiko kutya yeahoh. tarirai, mhare dzavo dzinodanidzira munzira dzomumisha; nhume dzorugare dzinochema zvikuru. migwagwa mikuru yasiyiwa, vafambi havachisimo mumigwagwa. sungano yaputswa, zvapupu zvayo zvazvidzwa, hapachina anoremekedzwa. nyika inochema uye yoparara, rebhanoni yanyadziswa uye yasvava; sharoni yafanana nearabha, uye bhashani nekarimeri dzakurumuka mashizha adzo. “zvino ini ndichasimuka,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “zvino ini ndichakudzwa; zvino ini ndichasimudzirwa pamusoro. munoita mimba yehundi, munobereka mashanga; kufema kwenyu ndiwo moto unokuparadzai. marudzi achapiswa kunge suko; vacharirima kunge huni dzeminzwa dzakatemwa.” imi vari kure, inzwai zvandakaita; imi vari pedyo, bvumai kuti ndine simba! vatadzi vari muzioni vavhundutswa; vasina allah vodedera: “ndianiko pakati pedu angagare nomoto unopisa nokusingaperi?” iye anofamba nokururama uye anotaura zvakanaka, anoramba pfuma inobva pakumanikidza uye anodzivisa ruoko rwake kugamuchira fufuro, anodzivisa nzeve dzake kunzwa rangano dzokuuraya, uye anotsinzina meso ake kuti arege kuona zvakaipa, uyu ndiye munhu achagara pakakwirira, nhare dzegomo dzichava utiziro hwake. zvokudya zvake achazvipiwa, uye haangashayiwi mvura. meso ako achaona mambo pakunaka kwake; uye achatarira nyika yakakura kwazvo. mundangariro dzako ucharangarira zvaimbokutyisa ugoti: “aripiko muchinda mukuru uya? aripiko uya aimbotora mutero? aripiko muchinda aiva mutariri weshongwe?” vanhu vaya vokuzvikudza hauchazovaonazve, ivo vanhu vomutauro wakavanzika, vorurimi rwavo, rusinganzwiki. tarirai zioni, iro guta remitambo yedu; meso enyu achaona jerusarema, ugaro hworunyararo, tende risingazozungunuswi; mbambo dzaro hadzingadzurwi, kana mabote aro kudamburwa. asi yeahoh achava wamasimba ose kwatiri. richafanana nenzvimbo yenzizi dzakapamhamha uye nehova. magwa anokwasviwa haangasvikiko, uye zvikepe zvikuru hazvingapfuuri. nokuti yeahoh ndiye mutongi wedu, yeahoh ndiye anotipa murayiro, yeahoh ndiye mambo wedu; ndiye achatiponesa. mabote ako ava dembutembu: haagoni kusimbisa mbambo yechikepe, sairi harina kutambanudzwa. ipapo zvakapambwa zvakawanda zvichagoverwa, uye kunyange chirema chichawanawo zvakapambwa. hapana agere muzioni achati, “ndinorwara,” uye zvivi zvavanogaramo zvicharegererwa.

34

swederai pedyo, imi ndudzi dzavanhu, munzwe. teererai, imi vanhu! nyika ngainzwe, nezvose zviri mairi, pasi pose, nezvose zvinobudamo! yeahoh akatsamwira ndudzi dzose; hasha dzake dziri pamusoro pehondo dzavo dzose. achavaparadza chose, achaita kuti vaurayiwe. vakaurayiwa vavo vacharasirwa kunze, mitumbi yavo ichanhuhwa; makomo achanyorova neropa ravo. nyeredzi dzokudenga dzose dzichanyungudika, uye denga richapetwa sorugwaro; marudzi ose enyeredzi achawa samashizha akaoma abva pamuzambiringa, samaonde akasvava abva pamuonde. munondo wangu wakanwa ukaguta kumatenga; tarirai, unoburukira kuzotonga edhomu, vanhu vandakaparadza chose. munondo wayeahoh wakanyura muropa, wakafukidzwa namafuta, iro ropa ramakwayana nerembudzi, namafuta anobva paitsvo dzamakondobwe. nokuti yeahoh ane chibayiro mubozira uye nokuuraya kukuru muedhomu. nyati dzichawa pamwe navo nehono dzemhuru nehando huru. nyika yavo ichanyorova neropa, uye guruva richazara mafuta. nokuti yeahoh ane zuva rokutsiva negore rokuripira kuti atsigire zvinodiwa nezioni. hova dzeedhomu dzichashanduka kuva namo, guruva rayo richapisa sesafuri; nyika yayo ichava namo inopfuta! haingadzimwi usiku namasikati; utsi hwayo huchakwira nokusingaperi. richava dongo kubva kune chimwe chizvarwa kusvikira kune chimwe chizvarwa; hapana munhu achazopfuura napozve. asi zvichava zvezizi romugwenga nehukurwizi; zizi guru negunguo zvichaita matenderemo. allah achatambanudzira edhomu rwodzi rwokuyera, rwenyonganiso nerwokuparadza. makurukota ake haazovi nechinhu ikoko chingazonzi umambo, machinda ake ose achapera. minzwa ichatandira nhare dzayo, utumbambeva norukato munzvimbo dzayo dzakakomberedzwa. ichava ugaro hwamakava, nomusha wamazizi. zvikara zvomugwenga zvichasangana namapere, uye ngururu dzichadaidzirana; zvikara zvousiku zvichazororapo, uye zvichazviwanira nzvimbo yokuzorora. zizi richaita dendere rigokandira mazaipo, richaachochonyerapo, rigochengeta mazana aro pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro aro; makondo achaunganapo, rimwe nerimwe neshamwari yaro. tarirai murugwaro rwayeahoh mugorava: hapana chimwe chezvinhu izvi chichashayikwa, kana chichashaya shamwari. nokuti muromo wake ndiwo warayira izvozvo, uye mweya wake uchavaunganidza pamwe chete. anozvigovera migove yazvo; ruoko rwake runozvigovera nechiyero. zvichava zvazvo nokusingaperi uye zvichagaramo kubva kune chimwe chizvarwa kusvikira kune chimwe chizvarwa.

35

gwenga nenyika yakaoma zvichafara; sango richafara kwazvo uye richatumbuka; seruva, richatumbuka; richafara zvikuru uye richapembera nomufaro. mbiri yerebhanoni ichapiwa kwariri, kunaka kwekarimeri nesharoni; vachaona kubwinya kwayeahoh, nokunaka kwaallah wedu. simbisai maoko asina simba, tsigirai mabvi anodedera; muti kuna avo vane mwoyo inotya, “simbai, musatya; allah wenyu achauya, achauya nokutsiva, nokuripira kutsvene achauya kuzokuponesai.” ipapo meso amapofu achasvinudzwa uye nzeve dzematsi dzichazarurwa. ipapo akaremara achakwakuka senondo, uye rurimi rwechimumu ruchaimba nomufaro. mvura ichatubuka murenje, uye nehova dzemvura mugwenga. jecha rinopisa richashanduka rikava dziva, ivhu rine nyota richava zvitubu zvemvura. maigara makava noumo maaimbovata, muchamera uswa, netsanga nenhokwe. ipapo pachava nomugwagwa; uchanzi nzira youtsvene. vane tsvina havangazofambi mairi; ichava yaivavo vanofamba munzira iyoyo; vakaipa namapenzi havangazofambi mairi. hapangavi neshumba ipapo, kana chikara chipi zvacho chichawanikwapo. asi vakadzikinurwa voga ndivo vachafambamo, uye vakasunungurwa vayeahoh vachadzoka. vachapinda muzioni vachiimba; mufaro usingaperi uchava pamusoro pavo. vachawana mufaro nokufarisisa, kusuwa nokuneta zvichatiza.

36

mugore regumi namana rokutonga kwamambo hezekia, senakeribhi mambo weasiria akarwisa maguta ose akakomberedzwa ayeahudha akaapamba. ipapo mambo weasiria akatuma mukuru wehondo yake nehondo huru achibva kurakishi kuna mambo hezekia mujerusarema. mukuru wehondo akati amira pamugero wedziva rokumusoro, pamugwagwa unoenda kumunda womusuki, ipapo eriakimu mwanakomana wahirikia, mufambisi webasa mumuzinda wamambo, nashebhina munyori, najoa mwanakomana waasafi munyori wenhoroondo, akabuda kundosangana naye. mukuru wehondo akati kwavari, “udzai hezekia kuti: “ ‘zvanzi namambo mukuru, iye mambo weasiria: uri kuvimba nei chaizvo? iwe unoti une urongwa nesimba rokurwa, asi uri kutaura mashoko asina maturo. ko, unovimba naaniko, zvawandimukira? tarira zvino, unovimba neijipiti, ruya rushanga rwomudonzvo rwakavhunika, runobaya ruoko rwomunhu nokumupa vanga kana azendamira parwuri! ndizvo zvakaita faro mambo weijipiti kuna vose vanovimba naye. asi kana ukati kwandiri, “isu tinovimba nayeahoh allah wedu,” haasi iye here ane nzvimbo dzakakwirira nearitari dzakabviswa nahezekia, iye akati kuyeahudha nejerusarema, “munofanira kunamata pamberi pearitari iyi”? “ ‘zvino chiuya, ita sungano natenzi wangu, mambo weasiria: ndichakupa mabhiza anokwana zviuru zviviri, kana ukagona kuisa vatasvi pamusoro pawo! ungagona seiko kukunda mubati mumwe wavabati vadiki vatenzi vangu, kunyange uchivimba nengoro dzeijipiti navatasvi vadzo vamabhiza? pamusoro pezvo, ndauya kuzorwa nenyika ino nokuiparadza ndisina yeahoh here? yeahoh pachake andiudza kuti ndiuye munyika ino ndizoiparadza.’ ” ipapo eriakimu, nashebhina, najoa vakati kumukuru wehondo, “tapota hedu, taurai kuvaranda venyu norurimi rwechiaramu, sezvo tichirunzwa. musataura nesu nechihebheru vanhu vari parusvingo vachinzwa.” asi mukuru wehondo akapindura akati, “ko, ndakatumwa natenzi wangu kuna tenzi wenyu nemi chete ndisingatauriwo kuvarume vagere parusvingo, ivo vanofanira kudya tsvina yavo nokunwa mvura yavo kufanana nemi here?” ipapo mukuru wehondo akasimuka akadanidzira nechihebheru achiti, “inzwai mashoko amambo mukuru, mambo weasiria! zvanzi namambo: musarega hezekia achikunyengerai. iye haangagoni kukurwirai! musarega hezekia achikunyengetedzai kuti muvimbe nayeahoh achiti, ‘yeahoh achakurwirai zvirokwazvo; guta rino harizoiswa muruoko rwamambo weasiria.’ “musateerera hezekia. zvanzi namambo weasiria: itai rugare neni mugouya kwandiri. ipapo mumwe nomumwe wenyu achadya zvinobva pamuzambiringa wake napamuonde wake uye achanwa mvura inobva muchitubu chake, kusvikira ndauya ndizokutorai, ndigokuendesai kunyika yakaita seyenyu, nyika ine zviyo newaini itsva, nyika ine chingwa neminda yemizambiringa. “musarega hezekia achikutsausai achiti, ‘yeahoh achatirwira.’ ndimwari weipi nyika zvayo akamborwira nyika yake muruoko rwamambo weasiria? vamwari vehamati nearipadhi varipi? vamwari vesefarivhaimi varipi? vakarwira samaria muruoko rwangu here? ndavapi pakati pavamwari vendudzi dzose vakambogona kuponesa nyika dzavo kubva kwandiri? ko, yeahoh achagona seiko kurwira jerusarema muruoko rwangu?” asi vanhu vakaramba vanyerere, vakasapindura chinhu, nokuti mambo akanga arayira achiti, “musamupindura.” ipapo eriakimu mwanakomana wahirikia mutariri womuzinda wamambo, nashebhina munyori, najoa mwanakomana waasafi munyori wenhoroondo vakaenda kuna hezekia, nenguo dzavo dzakabvaruka, vakamuudza zvakanga zvataurwa nomukuru wehondo.

37

mambo hezekia akati anzwa izvi, akabvarura nguo dzake akafuka masaga akapinda mutemberi yayeahoh. akatuma eriakimu mutariri womuzinda wamambo, nashebhina munyori, navakuru vavaprista, vose vakapfeka masaga, kumuprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi. vakati kwaari, “zvanzi nahezekia: nhasi izuva renhamo nokutukwa uye kunyadziswa, sezvinoitika kana vana vakasvika pakuzvarwa asi simba rokusununguka pasina. zvimwe yeahoh allah wenyu achanzwa mashoko omukuru wehondo, akatumwa naishe wake, mambo weasiria, kuzomhura allah mupenyu, uye kuti azomutuka pamusoro pamashoko aakanzwa iye yeahoh allah wenyu. naizvozvo nyengetererai vakasara vari vapenyu.” vabati vahezekia vakati vasvika kuna isaya, isaya akati kwavari, “udzai ishe wenyu kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: usatya hako zvawakanzwa, mashoko andakamhurwa nawo navaranda vamambo weasiria. teererai! ndichaisa mweya maari wokuti akangonzwa rimwe guhu, achadzokera kunyika yake, uye ikoko, ndichaita kuti aurayiwe nomunondo.’ ” mukuru wehondo akati anzwa kuti mambo weasiria akanga abva kubhakishi, akadzoka akawana mambo achirwa neribhina. zvino senakeribhi akagamuchira mashoko okuti tirihaka, muetiopia mambo weijipiti, akanga achiuya kuzorwa naye. akati anzwa izvozvo, akatuma nhume kuna mambo hezekia neshoko iri rokuti: “udzai hezekia mambo weyeahudha muti: allah waunovimba naye ngaarege kukunyengera achiti, ‘jerusarema harizoiswa muruoko rwamambo weasiria.’ zvirokwazvo wakanzwa zvakaitwa namadzimambo easiria kunyika dzose vachidziparadza chose. zvino iwe ucharwirwa here? ko, vamwari vamamwe marudzi akaparadzwa namadzibaba angu vakavarwira here, vamwari vegezani, neharani nerezefi navanhu vokuedheni vakanga vari kuteri asari? mambo wehamati aripiko, namambo wearifadhi namambo weguta resefarivhaimi, kana hena kana ivha?” hezekia akagamuchira tsamba kubva mumaoko enhume, akaiverenga. ipapo akakwidza kutemberi yayeahoh akaitambanudza pamberi payeahoh. uye hezekia akanyengetera kuna yeahoh achiti, “haiwa yeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, mugere pakati pamakerubhimi, imi moga ndimi allah aripo pamusoro poumambo hwose hwenyika. makasika denga nepasi. rerekai nzeve yenyu, yeahoh, munzwe; zarurai meso enyu, yeahoh muone; teererai mashoko ose asenakeribhi aakatuma kuzozvidza nawo allah mupenyu. “ichokwadi, yeahoh, kuti madzimambo easiria akaparadza chose ndudzi idzi dzose nenyika dzadzo. vakakanda vamwari vavo mumoto vakavaparadza, nokuti vakanga vasiri vamwari asi matanda chete namatombo akaitwa namaoko avanhu. zvino, yeahoh allah wedu, tidzikinurei kubva muruoko rwake, kuitira kuti madzimambo ose enyika azive kuti imi moga, yeahoh, ndimi allah.” ipapo isaya mwanakomana waamozi akatumira shoko kuna hezekia achiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: nokuda kwokuti wanyengetera kwandiri pamusoro pasenakeribhi mambo weasiria, heri shoko rakataurwa nayeahoh pamusoro pake: “mhandara mwanasikana wezioni anokuzvidza uye anokuseka. mwanasikana wejerusarema anokudzungudzira musoro wake paunenge uchitiza. ndianiko wawatuka uye ukamhura? ndianiko wawasimudzira inzwi rako, uye ukasimudzira meso ako uchizvikudza? ndiye mutsvene waisraeri! navaranda vako watutira kutuka pamusoro paishe. uye wakati, ‘nengoro dzangu zhinji ndakakwira makomo marefu, kumusoro-soro kwerebhanoni. ndakatema misidhari yayo mirefu refu, nemisipuresi yayo yakanakisisa. ndakasvika kumusoro-soro kwayo, nokumasango ayo akanakisisa. ndakachera matsime munyika yavamwe, ndikanwa mvura imomo. netsoka dzangu ndakapwisa hova dzose dzeijipiti.’ “hauna kunzwa here? izvi ndakazviita kare. ndakazvironga pamazuva akare; zvino ndaita kuti zviitike, nokuti wakaparadza maguta akakomberedzwa akava mirwi yamatombo. vanhu vawo, vapererwa nesimba, vavhundutswa uye vanyadziswa. vafanana nembeu mumunda, namabukira manyoro, sebundo ramera padenga remba, ratsva risati rakura. “asi ndinoziva paunogara uye nguva yaunouya neyaunoenda uye kuti unondiitira hasha zvakadii. nokuda kwehasha dzako kwandiri uye nokuda kwokuti kusateerera kwako kwasvika munzeve dzangu, ndichaisa chiredzo changu mumhuno dzako namatomu angu mumuromo mako, uye ndichaita kuti udzokere nenzira yawakauya nayo. “ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo kuvarwi, iwe hezekia: “gore rino muchadya zvinomera zvoga, uye mugore rinotevera muchadya mabukira azvo. asi mugore rechitatu mudyare mugokohwa, mudyare minda yemizambiringa mugodya michero yayo. zvakare, vakasara veimba yayeahudha vachava nemidzi pasi uye vachabereka michero kumusoro. nokuti mujerusarema muchabuda vachasara, uye muzioni muchabuda boka ravachapunyuka. kushingaira kwayeahoh kuchazviita. “naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pamambo weasiria, “haazopindi muguta iri kana kupfura museve pano. haazosviki mberi kwaro nenhoo kana kuvaka gomo revhu pariri. achadzokera nenzira yaakauya nayo; haazopindi muguta rino,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichadzivirira guta rino uye ndichariponesa, nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwadhavhidhi muranda wangu!” ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akabuda akauraya varume zviuru zana namakumi masere nezvishanu pamusasa wavaasiria. vanhu vakati vachimuka mangwanani, onei mitumbi yavakafa! naizvozvo senakeribhi mambo weasiria akaputsa musasa. akadzokera kuninevhe akandogara ikoko. mumwe musi achinamata ari mutemberi yamwari wake nisiroki, adhiramereki nasharezeri, vanakomana vake vakamuuraya nomunondo, ndokutizira kunyika yeararati. mwanakomana waesarihadhoni akamutevera paushe.

38

mumazuva iwayo hezekia akarwara kusvikira oda kufa. muprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi akaenda kwaari akati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: gadzirisa zveimba yako, nokuti uri kuzofa; hausi kuzopona.” hezekia akatendeukira kumadziro akanyengetera kuna yeahoh achiti, “rangarirai henyu, yeahoh, kuti ndakafamba sei nokutendeka pamberi penyu nomwoyo wose nechokwadi uye ndikaita zvakanaka pamberi penyu.” hezekia akachema kwazvo. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna isaya richiti, “enda undoti kuna hezekia, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah wababa vako dhavhidhi: ndanzwa munyengetero wako uye ndaona misodzi yako; ndichawedzera makore gumi namashanu paupenyu hwako. uye ndichakurwira iwe neguta rino kubva muruoko rwamambo weasiria. ndicharwira guta rino. “ ‘ichi ndicho chiratidzo chayeahoh kwauri kuti yeahoh achaita zvose zvaakavimbisa: ndichaita kuti mumvuri waitwa pazuva udzokere shure nhambwe gumi pamutaro wawanga wafamba pamanera aahazi.’ ” saizvozvo zuva rakadzokera shure nhambwe gumi dzarakanga radzika. chinyorwa chahezekia mambo weyeahudha mushure mokurwara nokupora kwake: ndakati, “mazuva oupenyu hwangu achangotanga ndingafanira kupinda mumasuo orufu here? ndigotorerwa makore angu asara here?” ndakati, “handichazoonizve yeahoh, iye yeahoh, munyika yavapenyu; handichazotarisizve kuvanhu kana kuva naavo vagere munyika ino zvino. setende romufudzi, imba yangu yakoromorwa uye yatorwa. somuruki ndapeta upenyu hwangu, uye iye andigura kubva pachirukiso; masikati namadekwana makaita kuti ndigume. ndakamirira nomwoyo murefu kusvikira mambakwedza, asi iye akavhuna mapfupa angu ose kufanana nezvinoitwa neshumba; masikati namadekwana makaita kuti ndigume. ndakarira senyenganyenga kana kondo. ndakachema sokuchema kunoita njiva. meso angu akaneta nokutarisa kudenga. haiwa yeahoh, ndine nhamo, uyai mundinunure!” asi ndingati kudiniko? iye ataura neni, uye iye ndiye aita izvi. ndichafamba nokuzvininipisa pamakore angu ose, nokuda kwokurwadziwa kwomwoyo wangu. ishe, vanhu vanorarama nezvinhu zvakadai; uye mweya wangu unowana upenyu mazviriwo. makandiporesa mukandiraramisa. zvirokwazvo kutambudzika kwangu kukuru kwakandivigira rugare. murudo rwenyu makandirwira pagomba rokuparadzwa; makaisa zvivi zvangu zvose shure kwenyu, nokuti guva haringagoni kukurumbidzai, rufu harugoni kukurumbidzai nenziyo; vanodzika kugomba havangagoni kutarisira kutendeka kwenyu. vapenyu, ivo vapenyu, ndivo vanokurumbidzai, sezvandiri kuita iye nhasi; madzibaba anoudza vana vavo nezvokutendeka kwenyu. yeahoh achandiponesa, uye tichaimba nemitengeranwa, mazuva ose oupenyu hwedu mutemberi yayeahoh. zvino isaya akanga ati, “gadzirai bundu ramaonde mugoriisa pamota, uye achapora.” hezekia akanga abvunza achiti, “chiratidzo chichava chei chokuti ndiende kutemberi yayeahoh?”

39

panguva iyoyo merodhaki-bharadhani mwanakomana wabharadhani mambo webhabhironi, akatumira matsamba nechipo kuna hezekia, nokuti akanga anzwa nezvokurwara nokupora kwake. hezekia akagamuchira nhume nomufaro akavaratidza zvakanga zviri mumatura ake: sirivha, goridhe, zvinonhuhwira namafuta anokosha nenhumbi dzake dzose dzokurwa uye nezvose zvaiwanikwa papfuma yake. hapana chinhu mumuzinda wake kana muumambo hwake chavasina kuratidzwa nahezekia. ipapo muprofita isaya akaenda kuna mambo hezekia akabvunza achiti, “varume avo vakati kudini, uye vakabvepi?” hezekia akapindura achiti, “vakabva kunyika iri kure. vakauya kwandiri vachibva kubhabhironi.” muprofita akamubvunza achiti, “vakaoneiko mumuzinda menyu?” hezekia akati, “vakaona zvose zviri mumuzinda mangu. pakati pepfuma yangu hapana chandisina kuvaratidza.” ipapo isaya akati kuna hezekia, “inzwa shoko rayeahoh wamasimba ose: zvirokwazvo nguva ichauya iyo zvose zviri mumba mako, nezvose zvakaunganidzwa namadzibaba ako kusvikira nhasi, zvichatakurwa zvichiendeswa kubhabhironi. hapana chichasara, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. uye vamwe vavana vako, venyama neropa rako chairo vauchabereka, vachatorwa uye vachava varanda mumuzinda wamambo webhabhironi.” hezekia akapindura achiti, “shoko rayeahoh rawataura rakanaka.” nokuti akafunga kuti, “pachava norugare nokudzivirirwa pamazuva oupenyu hwangu.”

40

nyaradzai, nyaradzai vanhu vangu, ndizvo zvinotaura allah wenyu. taurai nounyoro kujerusarema, mudanidzire kwariri kuti kubata kwaro kukuru kwapera, uye kuti chivi charo charipirwa, kuti ragamuchira kubva muruoko rwayeahoh zvakapetwa kaviri pamusoro pezvivi zvaro. inzwi rounodanidzira achiti, “gadzirai nzira yayeahoh mugwenga, ruramisai mugwagwa waallah wedu murenje. mipata yose ichasimudzirwa, makomo ose nezvikomo zvichaenzaniswa; nzvimbo dzisakaenzana dzichava bani. uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kucharatidzwa, uye marudzi ose avanhu achazviona. nokuti muromo wayeahoh wazvitaura.” inzwi rinoti, “danidzirai.” ini ndokuti, “ndodanidzireiko?” “vanhu vose vakaita souswa, uye kubwinya kwavo kwose kwakaita samaruva omunda. uswa hunooma uye maruva anowa, nokuti mweya wayeahoh unofuridzira pamusoro pazvo. zvirokwazvo vanhu uswa. uswa hunooma uye maruva anowa, asi shoko raallah wedu rinogara nokusingaperi.” imi munoparidzira zioni zvinhu zvakanaka, kwirai pagomo refu. imi munoparidzira jerusarema mashoko akanaka, danidzirai nesimba, musatya; muti kumaguta eyeahudha, “hoyu allah wenyu!” tarirai, ishe yeahoh ari kuuya nesimba, uye ruoko rwake runomubatira ushe. tarirai, mubayiro wake anawo, uye zvaanoripira nazvo anazvo. anofudza makwai ake somufudzi: anounganidza makwayana mumaoko ake agoatakurira pedyo nomwoyo wake; zvinyoronyoro anotungamirira nhunzvi dzinonwisa. ndianiko akayera mvura zhinji muchanza chake, kana kuyera denga noupamhi hwechanza chake? ndianiko akaisa guruva rose rapasi mudengu, kana kuyera kurema kwamakomo nechiyero, nezvikomo pachiyero? ndiani akanzwisisa murangariro wayeahoh, kana kumudzidzisa somudzidzisi wake? ndiani akabvunzwa nayeahoh kuti amujekesere, uye ndiani akamudzidzisa nzira yakanaka? ndianiko akamudzidzisa ruzivo kana kumuratidza nzira yokunzwisisa? zvirokwazvo ndudzi dzavanhu dzakaita sedonhwe remvura riri muchirongo; vanongova seguruva riri pamusoro pechiyero; anoyera zviwi kunge guruva rakatsetseka. rebhanoni harina huni dzinoringana kuvesa moto wearitari, uye zvipfuwo zvaro hazvikwani kuita chipiriso chinopiswa. ndudzi dzose dzakaita sepasina chinhu pamberi pake; iye anodziona sedzisina maturo, kunge dzisipo. zvino, mungafananidza allah naaniko? ndoupi mufananidzo wamungamuenzanisa nawo? kana chiri chifananidzo, muumbi anochiumba, mupfuri wegoridhe ochinamira negoridhe, uye anochiitira uketani hwesirivha. murombo anoshayiwa chipo anosarudza danda risingaori. anotsvaka mhizha kuti imuvezere chifananidzo chisingazozungunuki. hamuzivi here? hamuna kunzwa here? hamuna kumbozviudzwa kubva pakutanga here? hamuna kunzwisisa kubva pakuvamba kwenyika here? anogara samambo pamusoro pedenderedzwa renyika, uye vanhu vayo vakaita semhashu. anotambanudza matenga setende, agoawaridzira setende kuti agaremo. anoita kuti machinda ave pasina, uye anoderedza vatongi venyika ino kuti vave pasina. vachangosimwa, vachangodyarwa, vachangodzika midzi muvhu, iye anofuridza pamusoro pavo vachibva vaoma, uye chamupupuri chinovakukura sehundi. “mungandienzanisa naaniko? kana kuti ndiani akaenzana neni?” ndizvo zvinotaura iye mutsvene. simudzai meso enyu mutarire kumatenga. ndianiko akasika zvose izvi? iye anobudisa nyeredzi imwe imwe, achidzidana imwe neimwe nezita rayo. nokuda kwesimba rake guru uye noukuru hwesimba rake, hapana kana imwe zvayo inoshayikwa. unoreveiko, iwe yaqobho, unogununʼuna chii, iwe israeri uchiti, “nzira yangu haizivikanwi nayeahoh; allah wangu haana hanya nezvandinorwira?” hauzivi here? hauna kunzwa here? yeahoh ndiye allah nokusingaperi, musiki wamagumo enyika. haaneti kana kuziya, uye hakuna angayera kunzwisisa kwake. anopa simba kuna vakarukutika, uye anowedzera simba kuna vasina simba. kunyange majaya anoneta uye anorukutika, uye majaya anogumburwa agowa; asi avo vane tariro muna yeahoh vachavandudza simba ravo. vachabhururuka namapapiro samakondo; vachamhanya vasinganeti; vachafamba vasingaziyi.

41

“nyararai pamberi pangu, imi zviwi! ndudzi ngadzivandudze simba radzo! ngadziswedere mberi dzitaure; ngatisanganei pamwe chete panzvimbo inotongerwa mhaka. “ndianiko akamutsa mumwe kubva kumabvazuva, akamudana nokururama kuushumiri hwake? anopa ndudzi kwaari, uye anoisa madzimambo pasi pake. anovashandura vagova guruva nomunondo wake, vagova hundi inopepereswa nemhepo nouta hwake. anovadzinganisa agopfuurira mberi asina vanga, nenzira yaasina kumbotsika netsoka dzake kare. ndiani akabata basa iri akaripedza, akadana zvizvarwa kubva pakutanga? ini, yeahoh, iye wokutanga wavo newokupedzisira, ndini iye.” zviwi zvakazviona zvikatya; magumo enyika anodedera. vanoswedera uye vagouya mberi; mumwe nomumwe anobatsira wokwake, achiti kuhama yake, “simba!” mhizha inokurudzira mupfuri wegoridhe, uye iye anotsetsenura nenyundo anokurudzira uyo anorova panhera. anoti kune chakanamwa nomoto, “ichi chakanaka.” anoroverera chifananidzo pasi nechipikiri kuti chisazungunuka. “asi iwe, israeri, muranda wangu, yaqobho, wandakasarudza, imi vana vaabhurahama, shamwari yangu, ndakakutora kubva kumagumo enyika, ndikakudana kubva kumakona ayo ari kure. ndakati kwauri, ‘uri muranda wangu,’ ndakakusarudza uye handina kukuramba. naizvozvo usatya, nokuti ndinewe; usavhunduka, nokuti ndini allah wako. ndichakusimbisa uye ndichakubatsira; ndichakutsigira noruoko rwangu rworudyi rwokururama. “vose vanokutsamwira zvirokwazvo vachanyadziswa uye vachanyara; vose vanokakavadzana newe vachava sechinhu chisipo uye vachaparara. kunyange ukatsvaka vavengi vako, hauzovawani. avo vanorwa newe vachava sechinhu chisipo chose. nokuti ndini yeahoh, allah wako, anobata ruoko rwako rworudyi achiti kwauri, usatya; ndichakubatsira. usatya yaqobho iwe honye, iwe mudiki israeri, nokuti ini iyeni ndichakubatsira,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, mudzikinuri wako, mutsvene waisraeri. “tarira, ndichakuita mupuro, mutsva unopinza, una meno mazhinji. uchapura makomo ugoapwanya, uye uchaderedza zvikomo zvikava hundi. uchaapepeta, achatorwa nemhepo, uye chamupupuri chichaaparadzira. asi iwe uchafara muna yeahoh, uye uchazvirumbidza mumutsvene waisraeri. “varombo navanoshaya vanotsvaka mvura asi hakuna; ndimi dzavo dzaoma nenyota. asi ini yeahoh ndichavapindura; ini, allah waisraeri, handizovasiya. ndichaita kuti nzizi dziyerere pamitunhu isina miti, namatsime pakati pemipata. ndichashandura gwenga rikava madziva emvura, nenyika yakaoma ikava matsime. ndichaisa mugwenga musidhari nomuakasiya, mumite nomuorivhi. ndichaisa mipaini musango, misipuresi nemifiri pamwe chete, kuitira kuti vanhu vaone uye vagoziva, varangarire vagonzwisisa, kuti ruoko rwayeahoh rwakaita izvozvi, kuti mutsvene waisraeri ndiye akazvisika. “sumai mhaka yenyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “uyai namashoko enyu akasimba,” ndizvo zvinotaura mambo wayaqobho. “uyai nezvifananidzo zvenyu zvitiudze zvichaitika. tiudzei zvinhu zvakare kuti zvaiva zvipi, kuti zvimwe tizviongorore tigoziva magumo azvo. kana kuti tizivisei, zvinhu zvichaitika, tiudzei kuti ramangwana rinei, kuti tizive kana imi muri vanamwari. itai chimwe chinhu, chingava chakanaka kana chakaipa, kuitira kuti tigoshamiswa tigozadzwa nokutya. asi imi hamusi chinhu, uye mabasa enyu haana maturo chose; anokusarudzai anonyangadza. “ndamutsa mumwe anobva kumusoro, zvino ari kuuya, mumwe anobva kumabvazuva anodana kuzita rangu. iye anotsika pamusoro pavabati kunge anotsika dope, kuita sokunge muumbi wehari anokanya ivhu. ndianiko akazvireva kubva pakutanga, kuti zvimwe, tingaziva, kana kuti zvichigere kuitika, kuti zvimwe tigoti, ‘akanga anatsa?’ hapana akataura izvozvi, hapana akataura kuti zvichauya, hapana akanzwa kana shoko kubva kwamuri. ndini akava wokutanga kuudza zioni kuti, ‘tarira, ava vari pano!’ ndakapa kujerusarema nhume yamashoko akanaka. ndinotarisa asi hapana munhu, hapana pakati pavo anopa zano, hapana anondipindura pandinovabvunza. tarirai, vose inhema dzoga! mabasa avo haana maturo; zvifananidzo zvavo imhepo nenyonganiso.

42

“tarirai muranda wangu, wandinotsigira, musanangurwa wangu wandinofarira; ndichaisa mweya wangu pamusoro pake, uye achavigira ndudzi kururamisirwa. haazodanidziri kana kuridza mhere, kana kusimudza inzwi munzira dzomuguta. rutsanga rwakapwanyika haangaruvhuni, uye nomwenje unopfungaira haazoudzimi. mukutendeka, achavigira vanhu kururamisira; haangakoniwi uye haangaperi simba kusvikira asimbisa kururamisirwa panyika. zviwi zvichaisa tariro yazvo mumurayiro wake.” zvanzi naallah yeahoh, iye akasika matenga akaatatamura, akatambanudza nyika nezvose zvinobuda mairi, anopa kufema kuvanhu vayo, noupenyu kuna avo vanofamba pamusoro payo: “ini, yeahoh, ndakakudana mukururama; ndichabata ruoko rwako. ndichakuchengeta ndigokuita kuti uve sungano yavanhu nechiedza kune vedzimwe ndudzi, kuti usvinudze meso asingaoni, usunungure vakasungwa mutorongo uye usunungure vari mugomba, avo vagere murima. “ndini yeahoh; ndiro zita rangu! handizopi kukudzwa kwangu kuno mumwe, kana kurumbidzwa kwangu kuzvifananidzo. tarira, zvinhu zvakare zvaitika, uye ndiri kutaura zvinhu zvitsva; izvo zvisati zvavapo ndinozvizivisa kwamuri.” imbirai yeahoh rwiyo rutsva, murumbidzei kubva kumagumo enyika, imi munoburukira kugungwa, nezvose zviri mariri, imi zviwi, navose vanogaramo. gwenga namaguta aro ngazvidanidzire; nzvimbo dzinogara kedhari ngadzifare. vanhu vesera ngavaimbe nomufaro; ngavapururudze pamusoro pemakomo. ngavape rukudzo kuna yeahoh uye vaparidze rumbidzo yake kuzviwi. yeahoh achabuda somunhu ane simba, semhare, achamutsa kushingaira kwake; nokudanidzira, achamutsa kurwa uye achakunda vavengi vake. “nokuti ndanga ndakanyarara kwenguva refu, ndanga ndinyerere uye ndichizvidzora. asi zvino kufanana nomukadzi ari kusununguka, ndiri kudanidzira, ndiri kufemedzeka nokutakwaira. ndichaparadza makomo nezvikomo, uye ndichaomesa zvose zvawo zvinomera; ndichashandura nzizi dzikava zviwi, uye madziva ndichaaomesa. ndichatungamirira mapofu nenzira dzavasingazivi, nomumakwara avasina kuziva, ndichavatungamirira; ndichashandura rima rikava chiedza pamberi pavo uye ndichaita kuti nzvimbo dzakaipa dziti chechetere. izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvandichaita; handizovasiya. asi ivo vanovimba nezvifananidzo, vanoti kune zvakaumbwa, ‘ndimi vamwari vedu,’ vachadzoserwa shure mukunyadziswa kukuru. “inzwai, imi matsi; tarirai, imi mapofu, muone! ndianiko bofu, asi muranda wangu, uye matsi kufanana nenhume yandinotuma? ndianiko bofu rakafanana naiye akazvipira kwandiri, kana bofu rakafanana nomuranda wayeahoh? wakaona zvinhu zvizhinji, asi hauna kuva nehanya; nzeve dzako dzakazaruka, asi hauna chaunonzwa.” zvakafadza yeahoh nokuda kwokururama kwake, kuti akudze murayiro wake uye aubwinyise. asi ava ndivo vanhu vakapambwa uye vakabirwa, vose vakasungwa mumakomba kana kuti vakavanzwa mumatorongo. vakava vabatwa, pasina anovarwira; vakaitwa chinhu chakapambwa, pasina anoti, “vadzoserei kwavakabva.” ndiani pakati penyu achateerera izvi, kana kurerekera nzeve dzake zvikuru panguva inouya? ndiani akarega yaqobho achipambwa, akaendesa israeri kuvapambi? akanga asiri yeahoh here, iye watakatadzira? nokuti havana kuda kutevera nzira dzake; havana kuteerera murayiro wake. naizvozvo akadururira hasha dzake dzinopisa pamusoro pavo, iro bongozozo rehondo. rakavaputira muvira romoto, asi havana kunzwisisa; rakavapisa, asi mwoyo yavo yakashaya hanya nazvo.

43

asi zvino, zvanzi nayeahoh, iye akasika iwe yaqobho, iye akakuumba iwe israeri: “usatya, nokuti ndakakudzikinura; ndakakudana nezita rako; uri wangu. paunopfuura nomumvura zhinji ini ndichava newe; uye paunopinda nomunzizi, hadzizokukukuri. paunofamba nomumoto, haungazotsvi; murazvo haungazokupisi. nokuti ndini yeahoh, allah wako, mutsvene waisraeri, muponesi wako; ndinopa ijipiti kuti ive rusununguko rwako, etiopia neshebha pachinzvimbo chako. sezvo uchikosha uye uchikudzwa pamberi pangu, uye nokuti ndinokuda, ndichaisa vanhu panzvimbo yako, namarudzi avanhu pachinzvimbo choupenyu hwako. usatya, nokuti ndinewe; ndichauyisa vana vako kubva kumabvazuva, ndichakuunganidzai kubva kumavirira. ndichati kurutivi rwokumusoro, ‘varegedze!’ uye kurutivi rwezasi, ‘usavadzivisa.’ uyisai vanakomana vangu kubva kure, uye navanasikana vangu vabva kumigumo yenyika, vose vanodanwa nezita rangu, vandakasikira kukudzwa kwangu vandakaumba uye ndikaita.” uyai neavo vane meso asi vari mapofu, vane nzeve asi vari matsi. ndudzi dzose ngadziungane pamwe chete, uye marudzi ngaaungane. ndianiko pakati pavo akati izvi zvichaitika, akatiparidzira zvinhu zvakare? ngavauye nezvapupu zvavo kuti zvionekwe kuti havana mhosva, kuitira kuti vamwe vanzwe vagoti, “ichokwadi.” “imi muri zvapupu zvangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye nomuranda wangu wandakasarudza, kuti mugoziva uye mugonditenda uye mugonzwisisa kuti ndini iye. hakuna kumbova nomumwe mwari akaumbwa ndisati ndavapo, uye hakuchazova nomumwe shure kwangu. ini, iyeni, ndini yeahoh, uye kunze kwangu hakuna muponesi. ini ndakaratidza ndikaponesa, ndikaparidza, ini, kwete vamwe vamwari vedzimwe ndudzi vari pakati penyu. imi muri zvapupu zvangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, kuti, “ndini allah. hongu, kubva pamazuva akare ndini iye. hakuna angarwira munhu muruoko rwangu. pandinoita chinhu, ndianiko angachikonesa?” zvanzi nayeahoh, mudzikunuri wenyu, mutsvene waisraeri: “ndichatuma vanhu kubhabhironi nokuda kwenyu, uye ndichaburitsa vabhabhironi vose vachitiza, muzvikepe zvavaidada nazvo. ndini yeahoh, mutsvene wenyu, musiki waisraeri, mambo wenyu.” zvanzi nayeahoh, iye akaita nzira pakati pegungwa, nenzira mukati memvura zhinji, iye akabudisa ngoro namabhiza, hondo pamwe chete nezvinosimbisa, vakavata ipapo, havana kuzombomukazve, vadzimwa, vadzimwa somwenje: “chikanganwai zvinhu zvakare; musaramba muri pane zvakapfuura. tarirai, ndava kuita chinhu chitsva! zvino chava kumera; hamuchioni here? ndiri kuita nzira mugwenga nehova musango. zvikara zvesango zvinondikudza, makava namazizi, nokuti ndinozvipa mvura mugwenga nehova musango, kuti ndipe vanhu vangu chokunwa, vasanangurwa vangu, vanhu vandakazviumbira, kuti vaparidze kurumbidzwa kwangu. “kunyange zvakadaro hauna kudana kwandiri, iwe yaqobho; hauna kuzvinetesa nokuda kwangu, iwe israeri. hauna kundivigira makwai ezvipiriso zvinopiswa, kana kundikudza nezvibayiro zvako. handina kukuremedza nezvipiriso zvezviyo, kana kukunetesa nokuda zvinonhuhwira. hauna kundivigira kana zvinotapira, kana kundigutsa namafuta ezvibayiro zvako. asi wakandiremedza nezvivi zvako uye ukandinetesa nokudarika kwako. “ini, iyeni, ndini ndinodzima kudarika kwako, nokuda kwangu, handizorangaririzve zvakaipa zvako. ndiyeuchidze zvakapfuura, ngatitaurirane nyaya iyi pamwe chete; zvipupurire kuti hauna mhosva. tateguru wako akatadza; vamiririri vako vakandimukira. naizvozvo ndichanyadzisa vanokudzwa vomutemberi yako, uye ndichaita kuti yaqobho aparadzwe uye israeri asekwe.

44

“asi zvino chinzwa, iwe yaqobho, muranda wangu, israeri, wandakasarudza. zvanzi nayeahoh, iye akakuita, akauumba mudumbu uye iye achakubatsira: usatya, iwe yaqobho, muranda wangu, jeshuruni, wandakasarudza. nokuti ndichadurura mvura panyika ine nyota, nehova pamusoro pevhu rakaoma; ndichadurura mweya wangu pamusoro porudzi rwako, nemikomborero yangu pamusoro pavana vako. vachamera souswa mudekete, semiti yemikonachando pahova dzinoyerera. mumwe achati, ‘ndiri wayeahoh’; mumwe achazvitumidza nezita rayaqobho; zvakadaro, mumwe achanyora muruoko rwake achiti, ‘ndiri wayeahoh,’ uye achatora zita rokuti israeri. “zvanzi nayeahoh, mambo waisraeri nomudzikinuri, yeahoh wamasimba ose: ndini wokutanga uye ndini wokupedzisira; kunze kwangu hakuna allah. ndianiko zvino akafanana neni? ngaazvitaure. ngaadanidzire, azviise mberi kwangu izvo zvakaitika kubva pandakasimbisa vanhu vangu vekare, uye kuti chiiko chichaitika hongu, ngaataure zvichaitika. musadedera, musatya. handina kuparidza izvi here uye ndikazvitaura kare kare? imi muri zvapupu zvangu. kune mumwe allah kunze kwangu here? kwete, hakuna rimwe dombo; hakuna rimwe randinoziva.” vose vanoita zvifananidzo havana maturo, uye zvinhu zvavanofarira hazvibatsiri. vose vangada kuvapupurira mapofu; havazivi, ndiko kuchava kunyadziswa kwavo. ndiani anoveza mwari uye anoumba chifananidzo, chisingamubatsiri chinhu? iye navamwe vake vachanyadziswa; mhizha hadzizi chinhu asi vanhu zvavo. ngavaungane vose pamwe chete uye vamire vasingazungunuswi; vachaderedzwa, uye vachatya vachanyadziswa. mupfuri anotora chokupfurisa agochishandisa mumazimbe; anoita chifananidzo nenyundo, agochiumba nesimba roruoko rwake. anonzwa nzara agorasikirwa nesimba rake. mukusanwa kwake mvura anobva aziya. muvezi anoyera nerwodzi ozoita mutsetse nechokunyoresa; anounatsa nembezo, uye anoutara nezvienzaniso. anouumba mumufananidzo womunhu, womunhu nokunaka kwake kwose, kuti ugare mumba. akatema misidhari, kana zvimwe akatora musipuresi kana muouki. akaurega uchikura pakati pemiti yesango, kana kuti akasima mupaini, mvura ikaita kuti ukure. ndidzo huni dzomunhu dzokuvesa moto; dzimwe dzacho anodzitora agozvidziyisa nadzo, anovesa moto agobika chingwa nadzo. asizve anoveza chimwari agochinamata; anoita chifananidzo agochipfugamira. hafu yehuni anopisa mumoto, nadzo anobika zvokudya zvake, anogocha nyama yake agoidya achiguta. anozvidziyisazve, agoti, “haiwa! ndadziyirwa; moto ndiri kuuona.” nezvasara anoita nazvo chimwari, icho chifananidzo chake; anochipfugamira agochinamata. anonyengetera kwachiri achiti, “ndiponesei; ndimi mwari wangu.” havana chavanoziva, havanzwisisi chinhu, meso avo akanamwa kuitira kuti varege kuona, uye ndangariro dzavo dzakafukidzirwa kuitira kuti varege kunzwisisa. hapana anombomira kuti afunge, hapana ane ruzivo kana kunzwisisa kuti ati, “hafu yacho ndaishandisa pakuvesa moto; ini iyeni ndabikira chingwa pamazimbe acho, ndagocha nyama ndikadya. ndichaita zvinonyangadza pane zvasara here? ndichapfugamira kudanda rehuni here?” anodya madota, mwoyo wakanyengerwa unomutsausa; haagoni kuzviponesa kana kuti ati, “ko, chinhu ichi chiri muruoko rwangu rworudyi hachisi chenhema here?” “rangarira zvinhu izvi, iwe yaqobho, nokuti uri muranda wangu, iwe israeri. ndakakuita, uri muranda wangu; haiwa israeri, handichakukanganwizve. ndakadzima kudarika kwako segore, nezvivi zvako semhute yamangwanani. dzokera kwandiri, nokuti ndakakudzikinura.” imbai nomufaro imi matenga, nokuti yeahoh akaita izvozvi; danidzira nesimba, iwe nyika iri pasi. imbai nziyo, imi makomo, nemi masango nemiti yose, nokuti yeahoh adzikinura yaqobho, akaratidza kubwinya muisraeri. “zvanzi nayeahoh, mudzikinuri wako, iye akakuumba uri mudumbu: “ndini yeahoh, akaita zvinhu zvose, iye oga akatatamura matenga, akatambanudza nyika oga, “iye anokonesa zviratidzo zvavaprofita venhema, anoita kuti vavuki vave mapenzi, iye anoparadza kudzidza kwevane njere, uye anokushandura kuti kuve upenzi, anozadzisa mashoko omuranda wake, uye anozadzisa zvakaprofitwa nenhume dzake, “anoti kujerusarema, ‘richagarwa,’ nokumaguta eyeahudha, ‘achavakwa,’ nokumatongo awo, ‘ndichaavandudza,’ iye anoti kumvura yakadzika, ‘oma, uye ndichaomesa hova dzako,’ iye anoti pamusoro pasirasi, ‘ndiye mufudzi wangu uye achaita zvose zvandinoda; iye achati pamusoro pejerusarema, “ngarivakwezve,” uye pamusoro petemberi achati, “nheyo dzayo ngadziteyiwe.” ’

45

“zvanzi nayeahoh kumuzodziwa wake, kuna sirasi, ane ruoko rworudyi rwandakabata kuti akunde ndudzi pamberi pake, uye kuti atorere madzimambo zvombo zvavo, kuti ndizarure mikova pamberi pake, masuo agorega kupfigwa: ndichaenda mberi kwako uye ndichaenzanisa makomo; ndichaputsa masuo endarira uye ndichacheka ndigopinda napamazariro esimbi. ndichakupa pfuma yerima, upfumi hwakavigwa panzvimbo dzakavanda, kuti uzive kuti ndini yeahoh, allah waisraeri, anokudana nezita rako. nokuda kwayaqobho muranda wangu, nokwaisraeri musanangurwa wangu, ndinokudana nezita rako, uye ndinoisa pamusoro pako zita rokukudzwa, kunyange iwe usingandizivi. ndini yeahoh, uye hakuna mumwe; kunze kwangu ini hakuna allah. ndichakusimbisa, kunyange usina kundiziva, kuti kubva kumabudazuva kusvikira kwarinovirira, vanhu vazive kuti hakuna mumwe kunze kwangu. ndini yeahoh uye hakuna mumwe. ndinoumba chiedza uye ndinosika rima, ndinoita rugare uye ndinosika njodzi; ini yeahoh, ndini ndinoita zvinhu izvi zvose. “imi matenga kumusoro, nayisai kururama; makore ngaakudonhedze pasi. nyika ngaizaruke kwazvo, ruponeso ngarutubuke, kururama ngakukure pamwe chete narwo; ini yeahoh, ndini ndakazvisika. “ane nhamo uyo anokakavadzana nomuiti wake, iye anongova chaenga pakati pezvaenga pamusoro pevhu. ko, ivhu ringati kumuumbi, ‘uri kugadzirei?’ ko, basa rako rinoti here, ‘uyu haana maoko?’ ane nhamo uyo anoti kuna baba vake, ‘chiiko chamakabereka?’ kana kuna mai vake, ‘chiiko chamakazvara?’ “zvanzi nayeahoh, iye mutsvene waisraeri, nomuiti wake: pamusoro pezvinhu zvichauya, unondibvunza here pamusoro pavana vangu, kana kundirayira pamusoro pebasa ramaoko angu? ndini ndakaita nyika uye ndikasika vanhu vendudzi dzose pamusoro payo. maoko angu pachangu akatatamura matenga; ndakarayira hondo dzawo dzose dzenyeredzi. ndichamutsa sirasi mukururama kwangu: ndichaita kuti nzira dzake dzose dzirurame. achavakazve guta rangu, uye achasunungura vatapwa vangu, asi pasina muripo kana mubayiro, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “zvibereko zveijipiti nezvinoshambadzirwa zveetiopia, navasabhea varefu, vachauya kwauri uye vachava vako; vachatevera mushure mako, vachiuya kwauri vakasungwa nengetani. vachapfugama pamberi pako uye vachakunyengetedza, vachiti, ‘zvirokwazvo allah anewe, uye hakunazve mumwe; hakuna mumwe mwari.’ ” zvechokwadi muri allah anozvivanza, imi allah nomuponesi waisraeri. vose vanoita zvifananidzo vachava nenyadzi uye vachanyadziswa, vachasvika pakunyadziswa pamwe chete. asi israeri achaponeswa nayeahoh noruponeso rusingaperi; hamuchazombonyadziswi kana kuva nenyadzi, kusvikira kumakore asingaperi. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, iye akasika matenga, ndiye allah; iye akaumba uye akaita nyika, ndiye akaisimbisa; haana kuisikira kuti igare isina chinhu, asi akaiumba kuti igarwe, anoti: “ndini yeahoh, uye hakuna mumwe. handina kutaura ndiri pakavanda, ndichibva kumwe kunyika yerima; handina kuti kuvana vayaqobho, ‘nditsvakei pasina.’ ini, yeahoh ndinotaura chokwadi; ndinoparidza zvakarurama. “unganai pamwe chete muuye; unganai, imi vatizi vanobva kune dzimwe ndudzi. vose vanotakura mifananidzo yamatanda havazivi, vanonyengetera kuna vamwari vasingagoni kuponesa. paridzai zvichauya, muzvibudise pachena: ngavarangane pamwe chete. ndianiko akazvitaura kare, ndiani akazvireva kubva kare nakare? handizini yeahoh here? uye kunze kwangu ini hakuna allah, allah akarurama nomuponesi; hakuna mumwe asi ini. “dzokerai kwandiri mugoponeswa, imi mose migumo yenyika; nokuti ndini allah, uye hakuna mumwe. ndakapika neni pachangu, muromo wangu wakataura nokururama kwose shoko risingazoshandurwi: mabvi ose achapfugama pamberi pangu; ndimi dzose dzichapika neni. vachati pamusoro pangu, ‘muna yeahoh chete ndimo muno kururama nesimba.’ ” vose vakamutsamwira vachauya kwaari uye vachanyadziswa. asi rudzi rwose rwaisraeri ruchawanikwa rwakarurama muna yeahoh uye ruchafara.

46
