bheri rinokotamira pasi, nebho rinokotama; zvifananidzo zvavo zvinotakurwa nezvipfuwo zvinotakura mutoro. zvifananidzo zvacho zvinotakurwa zvinorema, mutoro pazvipfuwo zvakaneta. zvinokotama uye zvinokotamira pasi pamwe chete; zvisingagoni kurwira mutoro, izvo pachazvo zvinoenda kuutapwa. “ndinzwei, imi imba yayaqobho, imi mose vakasara veimba yaisraeri, imi vandakasimudzira kubvira muchiri mudumbu, uye ndikakutakurai kubvira pakuzvarwa kwenyu. kunyange kusvikira pakuchembera kwenyu, bvudzi rachena, ndini iye, ndini ndichakururamisai. ndakakuitai uye ndichakutakurai; ndichakuraramisai uye ndichakununurai. “mungandienzanisa naaniko kana kunditi ndakaita saani? mungandifananidza naaniko wandingaenzaniswa naye? vamwe vanodurura goridhe kubva muhomwe dzavo, uye vanoyera sirivha pazviyero; vanotsvaka mupfuri kuti avaitire chimwari, vagopfugama kuti vachinamate. vanochisimudzira pamapfudzi avo vagochitakura; vanochigadzika panzvimbo yacho, uye hecho chomira, hachigoni kufamba kuti chibvepo. kunyange mumwe akadanidzira kwachiri, hachipinduri; hachigoni kumuponesa kubva pamatambudziko ake. “rangarirai chinhu ichi, muchiise mupfungwa dzenyu, muise pamwoyo yenyu, imi vapanduki. rangarirai zvinhu zvakare, zviya zvekare kare; ndini allah, uye hakuna mumwe; ndini allah, hakuna akafanana neni. ndinozivisa magumo kubva pakutanga, kubva panguva yekare kare, izvo zvichiri kuuya. ndinoti: zvandakaronga zvichaitika, uye ndichaita zvose zvandinoda. kubva kumabvazuva ndinodana gondo; kubva kunyika iri kure kure ndinodana munhu achazadzisa kuda kwangu. zvandakareva ndichaita kuti zviitike; zvandakaronga, ndichazviita. nditeererei, imi vane mwoyo yakasindimara, iyemi muri kure nokururama. ndiri kuswededza pedyo kururama kwangu, hakusi kure; uye ruponeso rwangu haruzononotswi. ndichapa ruponeso kuzioni, nokubwinya kwangu kuna israeri.

47

“buruka, ugare muguruva, iwe mhandara yebhabhironi; gara pasi usina chigaro choushe, iwe mhandara yavabhabhironi. hauchazonzi uri munyoro kana munhu akapfava. tora makuyo ukuye upfu; bvisa vhoiri rako. fukura nguo dzako, makumbo ako aonekwe, uyambuke hova. kushama kwako kuchava pachena, uye kunyadzwa kwako kuchaonekwa. ndichatsiva; handizosiyi munhu.” mudzikinuri wedu, yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake; ndiye mutsvene waisraeri. gara unyerere, enda murima, mhandara yavabhabhironi; hauchazonzi mambokadzi wenyika dzakasiyana-siyana. ndakatsamwira vanhu vangu ndikasvibisa nhaka yangu; ndakavapa muruoko rwako, iwe ukasavanzwira ngoni. kunyange vakakwegura wakavatakudza joko rinorema kwazvo. wakati, “ndicharamba ndiri mambokadzi nokusingaperi!” asi hauna kufunga zvinhu izvi, kana kucherechedza zvaizogona kuitika. naizvozvo zvino, chinzwa, iwe chisikwa chisingagutsikani, ugere zvakachengetedzeka, uchiti, mumwoyo mako, “ndini, hakuna mumwe kunze kwangu. handizovi chirikadzi, uye handizotambudziki nokurasikirwa navana.” zviviri izvozvi zvichakuwira nechinguva chidiki diki, pazuva rimwe chete zvinoti: kufirwa navana nouchirikadzi. zvichauya pamusoro pako nechiyero chizere, kunyange uine unʼanga hwako huzhinji, nouroyi hwako hwakawanda. wakavimba nezvakaipa zvako uye wakati, “hapana anondiona.” uchenjeri hwako nezivo yako zvinokutsausa paunoti, mumwoyo mako, “ndini, uye hakuna mumwe kunze kwangu.” dambudziko richakuwira, uye haugoni kuzoziva kuti ungaritanda sei. njodzi ichakuwira yausingagoni kubvisa nomuripo; pakarepo kuparadza kwausingagoni kuziva, kuchawira pamusoro pako. “zvino, enderera hako mberi nouroyi hwako, uye nounʼanga hwako huzhinji, hwawakashandira kubva paudiki hwako. zvichida uchabudirira, zvichida uchavhundutsira vamwe. mazano ose awakagamuchira, akakunetesa chete! vanhu vako vanocherechedza nyeredzi ngavauye mberi, avo vanotarira nyeredzi vachifembera mwedzi nomwedzi, ngavakuponese pane zviri kuuya pamusoro pako. zvirokwazvo vakafanana namashanga; moto uchaapisa akapera. havangatongogoni kuzvirwira, pasimba romurazvo womoto. asi hapana mazimbe okuti munhu adziyirwe; hapana moto wokudziya ipapo. izvozvi ndizvo chete zvavangakuitira, ava vawakashanda navo, uye ukafamba navo kubva paudiki hwako. mumwe nomumwe wavo anoenderera mberi nokukanganisa kwake; hapana kana mumwe angakuponesa.

48

“inzwai izvi, imi imba yayaqobho, makatumidzwa zita raisraeri, uye muchibva kurudzi rwayeahudha, imi munoita mhiko muzita rayeahoh, uye munodana kuna allah waisraeri, asi musingaiti muzvokwadi kana mukururama, imi munozviti vagari vomuguta dzvene, muchivimba naallah weisraeri; yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake: ndakazivisa zvinhu zvakare, kare kare, muromo wangu wakazvireva uye ndakaita kuti zvizivikanwe; ipapo nokukurumidza ndakazviita, uye zvikaitika. nokuti ndaiziva kuti mwoyo wako wakanga wakasindimara sei; nokuti mutsipa wako wakanga uri runda rwesimbi, huma yako yakanga iri ndarira. naizvozvo ndakakuudza zvinhu izvi kare kare; zvisati zvaitika ndakazvizivisa kwauri, kuitira kuti urege kuzoti, ‘zvifananidzo zvangu, ndizvo zvakazviita; mufananidzo wangu wedanda namwari wangu wesimbi ndizvo zvakarayira izvozvo.’ wakazvinzwa zvinhu izvi; zvitarire zvose. haungazvibvumi here? “kubva zvino ndichakuzivisa zvinhu zvitsva, zvakavanzika zvausingazivi. zvava kusikwa zvino, uye hakusi kare; hauna kumbozvinzwa zuva ranhasi risati rasvika. saka haugoni kuti, ‘hongu, ndaizviziva.’ hauna kumbonzwa kana kunzwisisa; kubva kare nzeve yako yakanga isina kudziurwa. ndinoziva kwazvo kuti uri munyengeri akadii; wakanzi mhandu kubva pakuzvarwa kwako. nokuda kwezita rangu ndinononoka kutsamwa; nokuda kwokurumbidzwa kwangu ndinozvidzora pamusoro pako, kuti ndisakuparadza. tarira, ndakakunatsa, kunyange zvisina kuita sesirivha; ndakakuedza muchoto chokutambudzika. nokuda kwangu, nokuda kwangu, ndinoita izvi. ko, ndingaregererei zita rangu richimhurwa? handingapi kukudzwa kwangu kuno mumwe. “nditeerere, iwe yaqobho, israeri, wandakadaidza; ndini iye: ndini wokutanga uye ndini wokupedzisira. ruoko rwangu ndirwo rwakateya nheyo dzenyika, uye ruoko rwangu rworudyi rwakatambanudza matenga; pandinozvidana, zvose zvinomira pamwe chete. “unganai pamwe chete, imi mose muteerere; ndechipiko chimwe chezvifananidzo chakakuudzai kuti zvinhu izvi zvichaitika? iye anodikanwa nayeahoh achaita zvakarongwa nayeahoh pamusoro pebhabhironi; ruoko rwake rucharwisa vabhabhironi. ini, iyeni ndataura; hongu, ndamudana. ndichauya naye, uye achabudirira pane zvaanotumwa. “swederai kwandiri muteerere izvi: “kubvira pachiziviso chokutanga handina kumbotaura muchivande; panguva yazvinoitika, ndinenge ndiripo.” uye zvino ishe yeahoh andituma nomweya wake. zvanzi nayeahoh mudzikinuri wako, mutsvene waisraeri: “ndini yeahoh allah wako, anokudzidzisa zvinokubatsira, anokutungamirira munzira yaunofanira kufamba nayo. dai chete wakanga wateerera mirayiro yangu, rugare rwako rungadai rwakaita sorwizi, kururama kwako samafungu egungwa. zvizvarwa zvako zvingadai zvakaita sejecha, navana vako vakaita setsanga dzejecha dzisingaverengeki; zita ravo haraimboparara kana kuparadzwa pamberi pangu.” mudai mubhabhironi, tizai vabhabhironi! zivisai izvi nomufaro mukuru, uye muzviparidze. zvitumirei kumagumo enyika; muti, “yeahoh adzikinura muranda wake yaqobho.” havana kunzwa nyota paakavatungamirira mugwenga; akaita kuti mvura iyerere ichibva mudombo, achiitira ivo; akatsemura dombo mvura ikatubuka. “vakaipa havana rugare,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

49

ndinzwei, imi zviwi; inzwai izvi, imi ndudzi dziri kure; yeahoh akandidana ndisati ndaberekwa; kubva pakuzvarwa kwangu akataura zita rangu. akaita muromo wangu somunondo unopinza, akandiviga mumumvuri wechanza chake; akandiita museve unopenya, akandiviga mugomba rake. akati kwandiri, “ndiwe muranda wangu, israeri, wandicharatidza kubwinya kwangu maari.” asi ndakati, “ndakashandira pasina, ndapedza simba rangu pane zvisina maturo uye pasina. nyamba zvakandifanira ini zviri muruoko rwayeahoh, uye mubayiro wangu uri kuna allah.” zvino yeahoh anoti, iye akandiumba ndiri muchizvaro kuti ndive muranda wake, kuti ndidzorere yaqobho kwaari uye kuti israeri vaunganidzwezve kwaari, nokuti ndinokudzwa pamberi payeahoh, uye allah wangu ndiye anga ari simba rangu, iye anoti: “chinhu chiduku kwazvo kuti iwe uve muranda wangu, anomutsazve marudzi ayaqobho uye achadzosa avo vaisraeri vandakachengeta. uyezve ndichakuita chiedza chevedzimwe ndudzi, kuti uuyise ruponeso rwangu kumigumo yenyika.” zvanzi nayeahoh, mudzikinuri nomutsvene waisraeri, kuna iye akanga azvidzwa uye akasemwa norudzi, kumuranda wavatongi: “madzimambo achakuona agosimuka, machinda achaona agokotamira pasi, nokuda kwayeahoh akatendeka, mutsvene waisraeri, akakusarudza.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “munguva yangu yakafanira, ndichakupindura, uye pazuva roruponeso ndichakubatsira; ndichakuchengeta uye ndichakuita kuti uve sungano yavanhu, kuti uvandudze nyika uye uvagarise patsva nhaka yakaparara, kuti uti kunhapwa, ‘budai,’ nokuna avo vari murima, ‘uyai muchiedza!’ “vachadya zvokudya parutivi rwenzira, uye vachawana mafuro pazvikomo zvose zvisina zvibereko. havangavi nenzara kana nyota, havangabayiwi nokupisa kwegwenga, kana nokupisa kwezuva. iye anovanzwira tsitsi achavatungamirira, uye achavafambisa napazvitubu zvemvura. ndichashandura makomo angu ose kuti ave migwagwa, uye migwagwa yangu mikuru ichasimudzirwa. tarirai vachauya vachibva kure: vamwe vachibva nechokumusoro, vamwe nechokumavirazuva, vamwe nokurutivi rweasiwani.” imbai, imi matenga, pembera iwe nyika; imbai rwiyo imi makomo! nokuti yeahoh anonyaradza vanhu vake, uye achava netsitsi navanhu vake vanotambudzika. asi zioni rakati, “yeahoh akandisiya, yeahoh akandikanganwa.” “ko, mai vangakanganwa mucheche anonwa ari pachipfuva chavo, uye vangasanzwira tsitsi mwana wavakazvara here? kunyange hazvo ivo vakakanganwa, ini handizokukanganwi! tarira, ndakakunyora pazvanza zvamaoko angu; madziro ako anogara ari mberi kwangu. vanakomana vako vanokurumidza kudzoka shure, uye vose vaikuparadza vachabva kwauri. simudza meso ako utarise kwose kwose; vanakomana vako vose vanoungana vachiuya kwauri. zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uchavafuka vose sezvishongo: uchavapfeka, somwenga. “kunyange wakaparadzwa ukaitwa dongo, uye nyika yako yakasiyiwa yava dongo, zvino vanhu vako havachakwani mauri, uye vose vaikumedza vachava kure. vana vakaberekwa panguva yokufirwa kwako vachatizve munzeve dzako, ‘nzvimbo iyi yava diki kwatiri: tipeiwo nzvimbo yakatambanuka yatingagara.’ ipapo uchati mumwoyo mako, ‘ndianiko akandiberekera ava? ndakanga ndafirwa uye ndisina mwana; ndakanga ndadzingwa uye ndarambwa. ndianiko akarera ava? ndakasiyiwa ndiri ndoga, asi ava, vabvepiko?’ ” zvanzi naishe yeahoh, “tarira ndichasimudza ruoko rwangu kune vedzimwe ndudzi, ndichasimudzira mureza wangu kumarudzi; vachauya navanakomana vako vari mumaoko avo, uye vachatakura vanasikana vako pamapfudzi avo. madzimambo achava madzibaba anokurerai, uye vanamambokadzi vavo vachava vanamai vanokurerai. vachakupfugamirai uso hwavo hwakatsikitsira pasi, vachananzva guruva patsoka dzenyu. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh; vanovimba neni havachazonyadziswi.” ko, mhare ingapambwa here, kana vatapwa vanganunurwa kubva kune anotyisa here? asi zvanzi nayeahoh, “hongu vatapwa vachatorwa kubva kumhare, uye zvakapambwa kubva kune anotyisa; ndicharwa nevanorwa newe, uye vana vako ndichavaponesa. ndichaita kuti vamanikidzi vako vadye nyama yavo; vachadhakwa neropa ravo, sevadhakwa newaini. ipapo vanhu vose vachaziva kuti ini yeahoh, ndini muponesi wako, mudzikinuri wako, wamasimba ose wayaqobho.”

50

zvanzi nayeahoh: “ko, rugwaro rwokurambwa kwamai venyu rwuripiko rwandakavadzinga narwo? uye ndevapiko vandakakwereta ndikazokutengesai kwavari? makatengeswa nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu; mai venyu vakadzingwa nokuda kwokudarika kwenyu. sei ndakashaya munhu, pandakauya? sei pasina akapindura pandakadana? ko, ruoko rwangu rwakanga rwakapfupika here kuti ndikudzikinurei? handina simba rokukununurai here? nokungorayira chete ndinopwisa gungwa; ndinoshandura nzizi dzikava gwenga; hove dzadzo dzinoora nokushayiwa mvura, uye dzinofa nenyota. ndinoshongedza denga nerima uye ndinoita masaga chifukidzo charo.” ishe yeahoh akandipa rurimi rwakadzidziswa, kuziva shoko rinosimbisa vakarukutika. anondimutsa mangwanani namangwanani, anomutsa nzeve yangu kuti iteerere somunhu anodzidziswa. ishe yeahoh akazarura nzeve dzangu, uye handina kumumukira; handina kudzokera shure. ndakapa musana wangu kuna avo vaindirova, namatama angu kuna avo vakadzura ndebvu dzangu; handina kuvanza chiso changu pakusekwa nokupfirwa mate. nokuti ishe yeahoh anondibatsira, handizonyadziswi. naizvozvo ndakaita kuti chiso changu chive sebwe romusarasara, uye ndinoziva kuti handizonyadziswi. iye anondiruramisira ari pedyo. ndianiko zvino achandipa mhosva? ngatitarisanei! ndianiko mupomeri wangu? ngaanangane neni! ndiye ishe yeahoh anondibatsira. ndianiko achandipa mhosva? vose vachasakara senguo; vachadyiwa nezvipfuno. ndiani pakati penyu anotya yeahoh, uye anoteerera shoko romuranda wake? ngaafambe murima, iye asina chiedza, ngaavimbe nezita rayeahoh uye avimbe naallah wake. asi zvino, imi mose munotungidza moto muchava nemwenje inopfuta, endai, mufambe muchiedza chomoto wenyu nechemwenje yamakabatidza. izvi ndizvo zvamuchagamuchira kubva paruoko rwangu: muchavata pasi mukurwadziwa.

51

nditeererei, imi munotevera kururama uye munotsvaka yeahoh: tarirai kudombo ramakabviswa pariri naparuware pamakacherwa; tarirai kuna abhurahama, baba venyu, nokuna sara, akakuberekai. pandakamudana akanga achingova mumwe chete, ndikamuropafadza ndikamuita vazhinji. zvirokwazvo yeahoh achanyaradza zioni, uye achatarira netsitsi pamusoro pamatongo aro ose; achaita magwenga aro kuti afanane needheni, marenje aro achafanana nebindu rayeahoh. kupembera nomufaro zvichawanikwa mariri, kuvonga nenzwi rokuimba. “nditeererei, imi vanhu vangu; ndinzwei imi rudzi rwangu: ndichakupai murayiro; kururamisira kwangu kuchava chiedza kundudzi. kururama kwangu kwoswedera pedyo nokukurumidza, ruponeso rwangu rwuri munzira, uye ruoko rwangu ruchauyisa kururamisira kundudzi. zviwi zvichatarira kwandiri uye zvichamirira ruoko rwangu netariro. simudzirai meso enyu kumatenga, tarirai pasi panyika; matenga achanyangarika soutsi, nyika ichasakara senguo, uye vanogaramo vachafa senhunzi. asi ruponeso rwangu ruchagara nokusingaperi, kururama kwangu hakuzombogumi. “ndinzwei, imi munoziva zvakarurama, imi vanhu vane murayiro wangu mumwoyo yenyu: musatya kuzvidza kwavanhu, uye musavhundutswa nokutuka kwavo. nokuti chipfuno chichavadya senguo; honye ichavadya sewuru. asi kururama kwangu kuchagara nokusingaperi, ruponeso rwangu kuzvizvarwa zvose.” muka, muka! zvishongedze nesimba, iwe ruoko rwayeahoh; muka, sepamazuva akare, sepazvizvarwa zvakare. ko, hausiwe wakagura-gura rahabhi, ukabaya chikara chiya here? hausiwe wakaomesa gungwa here, iyo mvura yokwakadzika zvikuru, ukaita mugwagwa makadzika megungwa kuitira kuti vakadzikinurwa vayambuke? vakasunungurwa vayeahoh vachadzoka. vachapinda muzioni vachiimba; mufaro usingaperi uchava korona pamisoro yavo. mufaro nokupembera zvichafashukira, uye kusuwa nokukahadzika zvichatiza. “ini, iyeni, ndini iye anokunyaradzai. ndiwe aniko unotya vanhu vanofa, vanakomana vavanhu, ivo uswa zvahwo, kuti ukanganwe yeahoh muiti wako, akatatamura matenga, akateya nheyo dzenyika, kuti ugare uchitya mazuva ose nokuda kwehasha dzomumanikidzi, uyo akarerekera kukuparadza? ko, hasha dzomumanikidzi dziripi? vasungwa vakatapwa vachakurumidza kusunungurwa; havazofiri mumakomba avo, kana kuzoshayiwa chingwa. nokuti ndini yeahoh allah wako, anomutsa gungwa kuti mafungu aro atinhire, yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake. ndakaisa mashoko angu mumuromo mako, ndikakufukidza nomumvuri woruoko rwangu, iyeni ndakagadzika matenga panzvimbo yawo, iyeni ndakateya nheyo dzenyika, uye ndinoti kuzioni, ‘muri vanhu vangu.’ ” muka, muka! simuka, iwe jerusarema, iwe wakanwa kubva muruoko rwayeahoh, mukombe wehasha dzake, iwe wakasveta kusvikira wapera kuti tsvai, iwo mukombe unoita kuti vanhu vadzedzereke. pavanakomana vose vaakabereka pakanga pasina anomutungamirira; pavanakomana vose vaakarera pakanga pasina aimusesedza noruoko rwake. njodzi mbiri idzi dzauya pamusoro pako, ndianiko angakunyaradza? dzinoti: kuva dongo nokuparadzwa, nzara nomunondo; ndianiko anogona kukunyaradza? vanakomana vako vaziya; vanovata panotangira migwagwa, kufanana nemhara yabatwa mumumbure. vakazadzwa nehasha dzayeahoh nokutuka kwaallah wako. naizvozvo inzwa izvi, iwe munhu wokutambudzika, wakadhakiswa asi kwete newaini. zvanzi naishe yeahoh allah wako, anodzivirira vanhu vake, “tarira, ndabvisa muruoko rwako mukombe wakakuita kuti udzedzereke; kubva pamukombe uyo, iwo mukombe wehasha dzangu, hauchazounwizve. ndichauisa mumaoko avatambudzi vako, ivo vanoti kwauri, ‘zvambarara pasi kuti tifambe napamusoro pako.’ iwe wakaita kuti musana wako uve sapasi, kufanana nomugwagwa unofambwa nawo.”

52

muka, muka iwe zioni, zvifukidze nesimba. fuka nguo dzako dzakanakisa, iwe jerusarema, guta dzvene. vasina kudzingiswa navakasvibiswa havachapindizve mauri. zunza guruva rako: simuka, ugare paushe, iwe jerusarema. zvisunungure pangetani dziri pamutsipa wako, iwe nhapwa, mwanasikana wezioni. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, “wakatengeswa pasina mutengo, uye uchadzikinurwa pasina mari.” nokuti zvanzi naishe yeahoh, “pakutanga vanhu vangu vakaenda kuijipiti kundogarako; iye zvino asiria inovamanikidza. “uye zvino ndinei pano?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti vanhu vangu vakabviswa pasina, uye avo vanovatonga vanovaseka,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “uye zuva rose zita rangu rinogara richimhurwa. naizvozvo vanhu vangu vachaziva zita rangu; naizvozvo pazuva iro vachaziva kuti ndini ndakazvitaura. hongu, ndini iye.” dzakanaka sei pamusoro pamakomo tsoka dzavanouya namashoko akanaka, vanoparidza rugare, vanouya namashoko akanaka, vanoparidza ruponeso, vanoti kuzioni, “allah wako anotonga!” chinzwa! nharirire dzako dzinodanidzira namanzwi adzo; vanopembera nomufaro pamwe chete. panodzokera yeahoh kuzioni, vachazviona nameso avo pachavo. pururudzai muimbe nziyo dzomufaro pamwe chete, imi matongo ejerusarema, nokuti yeahoh anyaradza vanhu vake, akadzikinura jerusarema. yeahoh acharatidza ruoko rwake rutsvene pamberi pendudzi dzose, uye magumo ose enyika achaona ruponeso rwaallah wedu. ibvai, ibvai, budai ikoko! musabata chinhu chine tsvina! budaimo mugova vakachena, imi munotakura midziyo yayeahoh. asi hamungazobudi nokukurumidza kana kuenda muchitiza; nokuti yeahoh achakutungamirirai, allah waisraeri achakurindai mushure. tarirai muranda wangu achaita nouchenjeri; achasimudzirwa uye achakwidzwa pamusoro, uye achakudzwa kwazvo. sezvo vazhinji vakashamiswa naye, chiso chake chakanga chakakuvadzwa zvikuru, kupfuura chomunhu upi zvake, uye chimiro chake chakanga chakanganiswa, kupfuura kuratidzika kwomunhu, saka iye achasasa ndudzi zhinji, uye madzimambo achafumbira miromo nokuda kwake. nokuti zvavakanga vasina kuudzwa, vachazviona, uye zvavasina kumbonzwa, vachazvinzwisisa.

53

ndianiko akatenda zvatakaparidza, uye ruoko rwayeahoh rwakaratidzwa kuna aniko? akamera pamberi pake sebukira nyoro, uye somudzi pavhu rakaoma. akanga asina runako kana chimiro choumambo kuti atikwezve kwaari, hapana chatingada pakuratidzika kwake. akazvidzwa uye akarambwa navanhu, murume wokusuwa, uye anoziva kutambudzika. somunhu anovanzirwa chiso navanhu, akazvidzwa, uye isu hatina kumukudza. zvirokwazvo akatakura matenda edu, uye akatakura kurwadziswa kwedu; asi isu takafunga kuti akarohwa naallah, akarohwa naye uye akarwadziswa. asi akabayiwa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu, akakuvadzwa nokuda kwezvakaipa zvedu; kurohwa kwakativigira rugare kwaiva pamusoro pake, uye namavanga ake takaporeswa. isu tose takanga takarasika samakwai, mumwe nomumwe nenzira yake, asi yeahoh akaisa pamusoro pake kuipa kwedu tose. akamanikidzwa uye akarwadziswa, asi haana kushamisa muromo wake; akatungamirirwa segwayana riri kundobayiwa, uye sokunyarara kwegwai pamberi pomuveuri waro, saizvozvo haana kushamisa muromo wake. akabviswa achimanikidzwa uye akatongwa. uye ndianiko angataura rudzi rwake? nokuti akagurwa kubva panyika yavapenyu, nokuda kwokudarika kwavanhu vangu, akarohwa. akapiwa guva rake pakati pavatadzi, uye akava navapfumi pakufa kwake, kunyange akanga asina kuita zvechisimba, uye kunyengera kusina kuwanikwa mumuromo make. asi kwakanga kuri kuda kwayeahoh kuti amukuvadze uye aite kuti atambudzike, uye kunyange zvazvo yeahoh akaita kuti upenyu hwake huve chipiriso chezvivi, achaona zvibereko zvake uye achawedzera mazuva ake, uye kuda kwayeahoh kuchabudirira muruoko rwake. shure kwokutambudzika kwomweya wake, achaona chiedza choupenyu uye achagutsikana; nokuziva kwake, muranda wangu akarurama acharuramisira vazhinji, uye achatakura kuipa kwavo. naizvozvo ndichamupa mugove pakati pavakuru vakuru, uye achagoverana zvakapambwa navane simba, nokuti akadurura upenyu hwake kusvika parufu, akaverengwa pamwe chete navadariki. nokuti akatakura chivi chavazhinji, akanyengeterera vadariki.

54

“imba, iwe mukadzi asina mwana, iwe usina kumbobereka mwana pururudza uimbe rwiyo, pembera nomufaro, iwe usina kumborwadziwa; nokuti vana vomukadzi akasiyiwa ari oga vazhinji kupfuura veane murume,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. wedzera nzvimbo yetende rako, tambanudza micheka yetende rako ifare, usarega kuita izvozvo; rebesa tambo dzako, simbisa mbambo dzako. nokuti uchapararira kurudyi nokuruboshwe; vana vako vachatorera dzimwe ndudzi uye vachagara mumatongo amaguta avo. “usatya hako: haunganyadziswi. usatya kunyadziswa; haunganinipiswi. uchakanganwa nyadzi dzapaudiki hwako, uye hauzorangaririzve kunyadzisa kwouchirikadzi hwako. nokuti muiti wako ndiye murume wako, yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake, mutsvene waisraeri ndiye mudzikinuri wako; anonzi allah wenyika yose. yeahoh achakudanazve sokunge wanga uri mukadzi akasiyiwa, uye anotambudzika pamweya, mukadzi akawanikwa achiri mudiki, pedzezvo ndokurambwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura allah wako. “kwechinguvana ndakakusiya, asi netsitsi huru ndikakudzosazve. ndichisundwa nehasha ndakavanza chiso changu kwauri kwechinguva, asi nounyoro husingaperi ndichava netsitsi, pamusoro pako,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh mudzikinuri wako. “kwandiri izvi zvakafanana namazuva anoa, pandakapika kuti mvura zhinji yanoa haizofukidzizve nyika. naizvozvo zvino ndapika kuti ndirege kukutsamwira, kana kukutukazve. kunyange makomo akazungunuswa, uye zvikomo zvikabviswa, rudo rwangu rusingaperi harungazungunuswi, uye sungano yangu yorugare haingabviswi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh anokunzwira tsitsi. “haiwa, iwe guta rokutambudzika wakarohwa nedutu ukasanyaradzwa, ndichakuvaka namabwe ana mavara, nheyo dzako namabwe esafire. ndichakuitira zviruvi zvamabwe matsvuku, masuo amabwe anovaima, uye masvingo ako ose amabwe anokosha. vanakomana venyu vose vachadzidziswa nayeahoh, uye rugare rwavana venyu ruchava rukuru. muchasimbiswa mukururama: kumanikidzwa kuchava kure nemi: hapana chamuchazotya. kutya kuchava kure nemi; hakuchazosviki pedyo nemi. kana mumwe akakurwisa, handisini ndinenge ndazviita; ani naani anokurwisa achazvipira kwauri. “tarira, ndini ndakasika mupfuri wesimbi anopfutidza mazimbe moto ugonganduma, uye anopfura munondo wakakodzera pabasa rawo. uye ndini ndakasika muparadzi kuti aparadze; hapana munondo ucharwisana newe ukakunda, uye uchakonesa rurimi rumwe norumwe runokupomera mhosva. iyi ndiyo nhaka yavaranda vayeahoh, uye uku ndiko kururamisirwa kwavo kunobva kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

55

“uyai imi mose mune nyota, uyai kumvura zhinji; nemi musina mari, uyai, mutenge uye mudye! uyai mutenge waini nomukaka pasina mari uye pasina mutengo. ko, munopedzerei mari pazvinhu zvisati zviri zvokudya, nesimba renyu pazvinhu zvisingagutsi? teererai, nditeererei mugodya zvakanaka, uye mweya yenyu ichafarira zvakakora zvezvakanaka. rerekai nzeve yenyu muuye kwandiri; ndinzwei kuti mweya yenyu irarame. ndichaita sungano isingaperi nemi, iko kutendeka kworudo rwangu rwakavimbiswa kuna dhavhidhi. tarirai, ndakamuita chapupu kumarudzi, mutungamiri nomukuru wamarudzi. zvirokwazvo uchakoka ndudzi dzausina kumboziva, uye ndudzi dzisingakuzive dzichamhanyira kwauri, nokuda kwayeahoh allah wako, mutsvene waisraeri, nokuti iye akakufukidza nokubwinya.” tsvakai yeahoh achawanikwa: danai kwaari achiri pedyo. akashata ngaasiye nzira yake, nomunhu akaipa mirangariro yake. ngaadzokere kuna yeahoh, uye iye achamunzwira ngoni, nokuna allah wedu, nokuti achakanganwirwa zvikuru. “nokuti ndangariro dzangu hadzizi ndangariro dzenyu, uye nzira dzenyu hadzizi nzira dzangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “sokukwirira kwakaita matenga kupfuura nyika, saizvozvo nzira dzangu dzakakwirira kupinda dzenyu, nendangariro dzangu kupfuura ndangariro dzenyu. sezvinoita mvura nechando zvinoburuka kubva kudenga, zvisingadzokeriko zvisina kudiridza nyika nokuita kuti ibukire uye ibereke zvakawanda, kuitira kuti iberekere mudyari wembeu, uye ipe chingwa kune anodya, saizvozvo neshoko rangu rinobuda mumuromo mangu: haringadzokeri kwandiri risina chinhu, asi richaita zvinondifadza, uye richaita zvandakarituma. muchabuda nomufaro, uye muchafambiswa murugare; makomo nezvikomo zvichapururudza uye zvichaimba rwiyo pamberi penyu, uye miti yose yeminda ichauchira maoko ayo. pachinzvimbo chomunzwa pachamera muti womupaini, pachinzvimbo chorukato pachamera mumite. izvi zvichava mukurumbira wayeahoh, nechiratidzo chokusingaperi, chisingazoparadzwi.”

56

zvanzi nayeahoh: “chengetedzai kururamisira mugoita zvakanaka, nokuti ruponeso rwangu rwava pedyo, uye kururama kwangu kuchakurumidza kuratidzwa. akaropafadzwa munhu anoita izvi, munhu anozvibatisisa, anochengeta sabata asingarisvibisi, uye anodzivisa ruoko rwake kuita chinhu chakaipa.” mutorwa akanamatira kuna yeahoh ngaarege kuti, “zvirokwazvo yeahoh achandiparadzanisa navanhu vake.” uye nomuyunaki ngaarege kugununʼuna achiti, “ndinongova zvangu muti wakaoma.” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: “kuvayunaki vanochengeta masabata angu, vanosarudza zvinondifadza, uye vanobatirira pasungano yangu, kwavari ndichapa, mukati metemberi yangu namasvingo ayo, chirangaridzo nezita riri nani kupfuura vanakomana navanasikana; ndichavapa zita risingaperi, risingazoparadzwi. uye vatorwa vakazvipira kuna yeahoh kuti vamushumire, kuti vade zita rayeahoh, uye vamunamate, vose vanochengeta sabata vasingarisvibisi vachibatisisa sungano yangu, ivava ndichavauyisa kugomo rangu dzvene ndigovapa mufaro muimba yangu yokunyengetera. zvipiriso zvavo zvinopiswa nezvibayiro zvichagamuchirwa paaritari yangu; nokuti imba yangu ichanzi imba yokunyengetera yendudzi dzose.” ishe yeahoh anoti, iye anounganidza vakatapwa vaisraeri, “ndichaunganidzazve vamwe kwavari, tisingaverengeri avo vakaunganidzwa kare.” uyai, imi mose zvikara zvesango, uyai mudye, imi mose zvikara zvesango! nharirire dzeisraeri mapofu, vose vanoshayiwa zivo; vose imbwa dzisingahukuri, hadzigoni kuhukura; dzinovata pose pose dzichingorota, dzinofarira kuvata. imbwa dzinokara zvikuru; dzisingamboguti. vafudzi vanoshayiwa kunzwisisa: vose vanotsaukira kunzira yavo pachavo, mumwe nomumwe anotsvaka zvinomupfumisa. mumwe nomumwe anodanidzira achiti, “uyai, regai nditore waini! regai tinwe tigute nedoro! uye mangwana achafanana nanhasi, kana kutopfuura.”

57

vakarurama vanoparara, uye hakuna anofunga izvi mumwoyo make; vanhu vanoda allah vanobviswa, uye hakuna anonzwisisa kuti vakarurama vanobviswa kuti vanunurwe kubva pane zvakaipa. vose vanofamba mukururama vanopinda murugare, vanowana zororo pavanovata murufu. “asi imi, uyai pano, imi vanakomana vomuroyi, imi chibereko chemhombwe nezvifeve! muri kuseka aniko? ndiani wamunohomera uye wamunobudisira rurimi rwenyu? ko, hamusi chibereko chemhandu here, nechizvarwa chavanoreva nhema? munotsva noruchiva pakati pemiti yemuouki napasi pomuti mumwe nomumwe wakapfumvutira; munobayira vana venyu mumipata napasi pamapazi akarembera. zvifananidzo zviri pakati pamatombo anotsvedzerera emipata ndiwo mugove wenyu; izvozvo, ndiwo mugove wenyu. hongu, wakadururira chipiriso chokunwa kwazviri, uye ukapa chipiriso chezviyo. ko, ini muchagona kundiripira zvinhu izvi here? wakawaridza nhoo pakakwirira napachikomo chirefu; ikoko wakakwira kundobayira zvibayiro. seri kwamakonhi ako nezvivivo zvako wakaisa chirangaridzo chavamwari vako. uchindisiya ini, wakafukura mubhedha wako, wakakwira pauri ukaushamisa kwazvo; wakaita sungano naavo vane mibhedha yaunoda, uye wakatarisa kusasimira kwavo. wakaenda kuna moreki namafuta omuorivhi ukawedzera zvinonhuhwira zvako. wakatumira nhume dzako kure; wakaburukira kuguva chaiko! wakaneteswa nenzira dzako dzose, asi hauna kumboti, ‘hazvina maturo.’ wakawana kuvandudzwa kwesimba rako, nokudaro hauna kuziya. “ndianiko wawakatya uye ukavhunduka zvokuti wakazoreva nhema kwandiri, uye hauna kumbondirangarira kana kumbozvifunga izvi mumwoyo mako? hakuzi kuti ndakaramba ndakanyarara iwe ukasanditya here? ndichaisa pachena kururama kwako namabasa ako, uye hazvizombokubatsiri. paunochemera rubatsiro, zvifananidzo zvawakaunganidza ngazvikubatsire! mhepo ichazvikukura zvose, mweya wokungofema zvawo uchazvifuridzira kure. asi munhu anondiita utiziro hwake achagara nhaka yenyika, uye gomo rangu dzvene richava rake.” uye zvichazonzi: “vakai, vakai, gadzirai mugwagwa! bvisai zvipinganidzo munzira yavanhu vangu.” nokuti zvanzi naiye akakwirira ari kumusoro, iye anorarama nokusingaperi, ane zita dzvene: “ndinogara pakakwirira panzvimbo tsvene, asi naiyewo ane mweya wakapwanyika uye anozvininipisa, kuti ndimutsiridze mweya yavanozvininipisa uye ndimutsiridze mwoyo yavakapwanyika. handichapi mhosva nokusingaperi, kana kugara ndakatsamwa, nokuti ipapo mweya yavanhu ingaziya pamberi pangu, kufema kwomunhu wandakasika. ndakatsamwiswa nechivi chake chokukara; ndakamuranga, ndikavanza chiso changu mukutsamwa kwangu, asi akaramba ari munzira dzaaida. ndakaona nzira dzake, asi ndichamuporesa; ndichamutungamirira uye ndichamunyaradza, ndichisika rumbidzo pamiromo yavanochema muisraeri. rugare, rugare kuna vari kure navari pedyo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “uye ndichavaporesa.” asi vakaipa vakafanana negungwa rinozungunuka, risingagoni kuzorora, rina mafungu anorasa marara namatope. allah wangu anoti, “vakaipa havana rugare.”

58

“danidzira nesimba, usanyarara. simudza inzwi rako sehwamanda. paridzira vanhu vangu kupanduka kwavo, neimba yayaqobho zvivi zvavo. nokuti zuva nezuva vanonditsvaka; vanoita savane chido chokuziva nzira dzangu, kunge vanga vari rudzi runoita zvakanaka uye rusina kusiya mirayiro yaallah wavo. vanondikumbira kutonga kwakarurama sokunge vanofarira kuti allah auye pedyo navo. vanoti, ‘takatsanyireiko, uye imi mukasazviona? takazvininipisireiko, imi mukasazviona?’ “asi pazuva rokutsanya kwenyu munoita zvamunoda muchimanikidza vashandi venyu. kutsanya kwenyu kunogumisira mukukakavadzana nemhirizhonga, uye kurovana netsiva dzakaipisisa. hamungatsanyi sezvamunoita mazuva ano, mugotarisira kuti inzwi renyu richanzwika kumusoro. ko, ndiko here kutsanya kwandakasarudza, zuva rimwe chete rokuti munhu azvininipise? ndezvokukotamisa musoro chete sorushanga here, nokungovata pamusoro penguo dzamasaga namadota? ndiko kwamunoti kutsanya here, pazuva rinodikanwa nayeahoh? “uku handiko kutsanya kwandakasarudza here: kusunungura ngetani dzokusaruramisira nokusunungura zvitirobho zvejoko, kusunungura vakamanikidzwa nokuvhuna joko rimwe nerimwe? hakuzi kugoverana zvokudya zvako nevane nzara, nokupa varombo vanodzungaira pokugara here, paunoona vakashama, kuvapfekedza, uye kusafuratira venyama neropa rako? ipapo chiedza chako chichabuda samambakwedza, uye kuporeswa kwako kucharatidzwa nokukurumidza; ipapo kururama kwako kuchakutungamirira, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kuchakurinda mumashure. ipapo uchadana, yeahoh achakupindura; uchadanidzira uchida rubatsiro, uye iye achati: ndiri pano. “kana ukabvisa joko roudzvinyiriri, kutendeka nomunwe nokutaura kwakaipa, uye ukapa zvokudya zvako kune vane nzara uye ukagutsa vakamanikidzwa pakushaya kwavo, ipapo chiedza chako chichabuda murima, uye usiku hwako huchashanduka hukafanana namasikati. yeahoh achakutungamirira nguva dzose; achakugutsa pakushaya kwako munyika yakapiswa nezuva uye achasimbisa mapfupa ako. uchafanana nebindu rinodiridzwa nemvura yetsime, sechitubu chine mvura isingapwi. vanhu vako vachavakazve matongo akare vachasimudza nheyo dzakare; iwe uchanzi mugadziri wamasvingo akakoromoka, muvandudzi wemigwagwa ine dzimba. “kana ukachengeta tsoka dzako kuti dzisaputsa sabata, uye kuti dzisaita zvinokufadza iwe pazuva rangu dzvene, kana ukati sabata izuva rinofadza, uye ukati zuva dzvene rayeahoh izuva rinokudzwa, uye kana ukarikudza nokusafamba munzira yako, uye usingaiti zvinokufadza kana kutaura mashoko asina maturo, ipapo uchawana mufaro wako muna yeahoh, uye ndichakuita kuti ukwire pakakwirira penyika, uye ndichakugutsa nenhaka yababa vako yaqobho.” muromo wayeahoh wazvitaura.

59

zvirokwazvo ruoko rwayeahoh haruna kupfupika kuti rukonewe kuponesa, uye nzeve yake haina kudzivira kuti irege kunzwa. asi zvakaipa zvenyu zvakakuparadzanisai naallah wenyu; zvivi zvenyu zvakavanza chiso chake kwamuri kuti arege kunzwa. nokuti maoko enyu akasvibiswa neropa, minwe yenyu nezvakaipa. miromo yenyu yakareva nhema, rurimi rwenyu runonguruma zvinhu zvakaipa. hapana anochemera kururamisira; hapana anokwidza mhaka yake nokutendeka. vanongovimba negakava risina maturo uye nokureva nhema; vanoita mimba yezvakashata uye vanobereka zvakaipa. vanochochonya mazai emvumbi, uye vanoruka dandira redandemutande. ani naani anodya mazai avo achafa, uye rimwe rikaputsika, panochochonywa nyoka. matandira avo haabatsiri pakupfeka; havagoni kuzvifukidza nezvavanogadzira. mabasa avo mabasa akaipa, uye kuita nechisimba kuri mumaoko avo. tsoka dzavo dzinomhanyira kundopinda muchivi; vanokurumidza kuteura ropa risina mhosva. mirangariro yavo mirangariro yakaipa; kuputsa nokuparadza zviri munzira dzavo. nzira yorugare havaizivi; hapana kururamisira pamakwara avo. vakashandura nzira dzavo dzikava dzakaminama; hakuna anofamba madziri achaziva rugare. naizvozvo kururamisira kuri kure nesu, uye kururama hakusviki kwatiri. tinotsvaka chiedza, asi zvose irima; tinotsvaka kujeka, asi tiri kufamba mumumvuri werima. sebofu tinotsvanzvadzira tichitevedza madziro, tichitsvaka nzira yedu savanhu vasina meso. panguva yamasikati tinogumburwa kunge nguva yorubvunzavaeni; pakati pavane simba, tangoita savakafa. tose tiri kuomba samapere; tinorira nokurira kukuru senjiva. tinotsvaka kururamisira, asi hatikuwani; tinotsvaka kurwirwa, asi kuri kure kure. nokuti kutadza kwedu kwawanda pamberi penyu, uye zvivi zvedu zvinotipupurira zvakaipa. kudarika kwedu kunogara nesu, uye tinobvuma kutadza kwedu: kumukira nokunyengera yeahoh, kufuratira allah wedu, kukuchidzira udzvinyiriri nokupanduka, nokutaura mashoko enhema anobva mumwoyo yedu. naizvozvo kururamisirwa kwadzorerwa shure, uye kururama kwamira kure; chokwadi chakagumburwa munzira dzomumusha, kutendeka hakuchagoni kupinda. zvokwadi haichawanikwi uye vanovenga zvakaipa ndivo vopambwa. yeahoh akatarisa akasafara kuti pakanga pasisina kururamisira. akaona kuti pakanga pasina munhu, akashamiswa kuti pakanga pasina munhu aipindira; naizvozvo ruoko rwake rwakamuvigira ruponeso, uye kururama kwake kwakamuraramisa. akashonga kururama sechidzitiro chechipfuva, nenguwani yoruponeso mumusoro make; akashonga nguo dzokutsiva akazviputira mukushingaira kwake seanozviputira nejasi. sezvavakaita, saizvozvo acharipira hasha kuvavengi vake nokutsiva kuvadzivisi vake; acharipira zvakafanira kuzviwi. kubva kumavirira, vanhu vachatya yeahoh, uye kubva pakubuda kwezuva, vachakudza kubwinya kwake. nokuti achauya sokudira kworwizi runosundwa nokufema kwayeahoh. “mudzikinuri achauya kuzioni, kuna avo vari muna yaqobho vanotendeuka pazvivi zvavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kana ndirini, iyi ndiyo sungano yangu navo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mweya wangu uri pamusoro pako, namashoko angu andakaisa mumuromo mako hazvichabvi pamuromo wako, kana pamiromo yavana venyu, kana pamiromo yezvizvarwa zvavo kubva zvino nokusingaperi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

60

“simuka, upenye nokuti chiedza chako chasvika, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwabuda pamusoro pako. tarira, rima rakafukidza nyika uye rima guru riri pamusoro pavanhu, asi yeahoh anobuda pamusoro pako uye kubwinya kwake kunoratidzwa pamusoro pako. ndudzi dzichauya kuchiedza chako, uye madzimambo kukubwinya kwamambakwedza ako. “simudza meso ako utarise zvakakukomberedza: vose vanoungana uye vanouya kwauri, vanakomana vako vanobva kure, uye vanasikana vako vanotakurwa pamaoko. ipapo uchatarisa ugopenya, mwoyo wako uchakwata uye uchazara nomufaro; upfumi huri pamusoro pamakungwa huchauyiswa kwauri, pfuma yendudzi ichauya kwauri. mapoka engamera achazadza nyika yako, mhuru dzengamera dzemidhiani neefa. uye vose vanobva kushebha vachauya, vakatakura goridhe nezvinonhuhwira vachiparidza kurumbidzwa kwayeahoh. mapoka ekedhari achaunganidzirwa kwauri makondobwe enebhayoti achakushumira: achagamuchirwa sezvipo paaritari yangu, uye ndichashongedza temberi yangu yokukudzwa. “ndivanaani ava vanobhururuka samakore, senjiva dzinoenda kumatendere adzo? zvirokwazvo zviwi zvinotarira kwandiri; zvikepe zvetashishi zvinotungamira zvichiuya navanakomana venyu vari kubva kure, nesirivha yavo negoridhe, kuzokudza yeahoh allah wako, iye mutsvene waisraeri, nokuti akakushongedza nokubwinya. “vatorwa vachavakazve masvingo ako, uye madzimambo avo achakushandira. kunyange ndakakurova mukutsamwa kwangu, munyasha dzangu ndichakunzwira tsitsi. masuo ako achagara akashama haachazombozarirwi, masikati kana usiku kuitira kuti vanhu vakuvigire upfumi hwendudzi, madzimambo adzo achafambiswa ari mumudungwe akundwa. nokuti rudzi kana ushe husingakushumiri huchaparadzwa; huchaparadzwa zvachose. “kubwinya kwerebhanoni kuchauya kwauri, mipaini nemifiri nemisipuresi pamwe chete, kuzoshongedza nzvimbo yetemberi yangu tsvene; uye ndichabwinyisa nzvimbo yetsoka dzangu. vanakomana vavamanikidzi venyu vachauya vachikotama pamberi penyu; vose vanokuzvidzai vachapfugama patsoka dzenyu uye vachakutumidzai kuti guta rayeahoh, zioni romutsvene waisraeri. “kunyange wanga wasiyiwa uye uchivengwa, pasina munhu anopfuura nemauri, ndichakuita kuti ukudzwe nokusingaperi uye uve mufaro wezvizvarwa zvinotevera. uchanwa mukaka wendudzi uye ucharerwa pamazamu oumambo. ipapo uchaziva kuti ini, iyeni yeahoh, ndini muponesi wako, mudzikinuri wako, wamasimba ose wayaqobho. ndichakuvigira goridhe pachinzvimbo chendarira, nesirivha pachinzvimbo chesimbi. ndichakuvigira ndarira pachinzvimbo chamatanda, nesimbi pachinzvimbo chamabwe. ndichaita rugare mubati wako nekururama mutongi wako. kuita nechisimba hakuchazonzwikwa munyika yako, kana dongo kana kuparadzwa mukati memiganhu yako, asi uchatumidza masvingo ako zita rokuti ruponeso nemasuo ako kuti rumbidzo. zuva harichazovi chiedza chako masikati, uye kupenya kwomwedzi hakungavi pamusoro pako, nokuti yeahoh ndiye achava chiedza chako chisingaperi, uye allah wako achava kubwinya kwako. zuva rako harichazovirizve, uye mwedzi wako hauchazoperizve; yeahoh achava chiedza chako chisingaperi, uye mazuva okuchema kwako achaguma. ipapo vanhu vako vose vachava vakarurama, uye vachatora nyika kuti ive yavo nokusingaperi. ndivo mabukira andakadyara, basa ramaoko angu, kuti ndiratidze kubwinya kwangu. mudikisa wako achava chiuru, mudiki achava rudzi rune simba. ndini yeahoh, munguva yacho ndichazviita nokukurumidza.”

61

mweya waishe yeahoh uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti yeahoh akandizodza kuti ndiparidze vhangeri kuvarombo. akandituma kuti ndirape vane mwoyo yakaputsika, kuti ndiparidze kusunungurwa kwavakatapwa, nokubudiswa kwavasungwa kuti vabve murima, kuti ndiparidze gore rengoni dzayeahoh uye nezuva rokutsiva kwaallah wedu, kuti ndinyaradze vose vanochema, uye ndiriritire avo vanochema muzioni, kuti ndiise pamusoro pavo korona yorunako pachinzvimbo chamadota, mafuta omufaro pachinzvimbo chokuchema, uye nenguo yokurumbidza pachinzvimbo chomweya wakarukutika. vachanzi miouki yokururama, yakasimwa nayeahoh kuti aratidze kubwinya kwake. vachavakazve matongo akare uye vachamutsazve nzvimbo dzakaparadzwa kare; vachavandudza matongo amaguta akaparadzwa kwezvizvarwa nezvizvarwa zvakapfuura. vatorwa vachafudza mapoka amakwai enyu; vatorwa vachashanda muminda yenyu nomuminda yenyu yemizambiringa. ipapo imi muchanzi vaprista vayeahoh, muchanzi vashumiri vaallah. muchadya pfuma yendudzi, uye muchazvirumbidza nepfuma yavo. pachinzvimbo chokunyadziswa kwavo vanhu vangu vachagamuchira migove miviri, uye pachinzvimbo chokunyadziswa vachafara munhaka yavo; nokudaro vachagara nhaka yemigove miviri munyika yavo, uye mufaro usingaperi uchava wavo. “nokuti ini, yeahoh, ndinoda kururamisira; ndinovenga kupamba nezvakaipa. mukutendeka kwangu, ndichavapa mubayiro uye ndichaita sungano isingaperi navo. zvizvarwa zvavo zvichazivikanwa pakati pendudzi uye navana vavo pakati pamarudzi. vose vanovaona vachaziva kuti vanhu vakaropafadzwa nayeahoh.” ndinofara zvikuru muna yeahoh; mweya wangu unofara muna allah. nokuti akandifukidza nenguo dzoruponeso, uye akandishongedza nenguo yokururama, sechikomba chinoshongedza musoro wacho somuprista, uye somwenga anozvishongedza nezvishongo zvamatombo anokosha. nokuti ivhu sezvarinomeresa mbeu, nebindu richiita kuti mbeu dzikure, saizvozvo ishe yeahoh achaita kuti kururama nerumbidzo zvimere pamberi pendudzi dzose.

62

nokuda kwezioni handinganyarari, nokuda kwejerusarema handingarambi ndinyerere, kusvikira kururama kwake kwapenya samambakwedza, noruponeso rwake somwenje unopfuta. ndudzi dzichaona kururama kwako, uye madzimambo ose achaona kubwinya kwako; iwe uchadaidzwa nezita idzva richataurwa nomuromo wayeahoh. uchava korona yokubwinya muruoko rwayeahoh, ukomba hwoumambo muruoko rwaallah wako. havachazokutizve musiyiwa, kana kutumidza nyika yako kuti dongo. asi uchatumidzwa kuti hefizibha uye nyika yako ichanzi bhiyura; nokuti yeahoh achakufarira, uye nyika yako icharoorwa. sejaya zvarinowana mhandara, saizvozvo vanakomana vako vachakuwana; sechikomba chinofarira mwenga, saizvozvo allah wako achafara pamusoro pako. ndakagadza nharirire pamasvingo ako, iwe jerusarema; havangambonyarari masikati kana usiku. imi munodana kuna yeahoh, musazorora, uye musamupa zororo kusvikira asimbisa jerusarema, uye ariita rumbidzo yenyika. yeahoh akapika noruoko rwake rworudyi, noruoko rwake rune simba achiti, “handichazopizve zviyo zvenyu sezvokudya kuvavengi venyu, uye vatorwa havachazonwizve waini itsva yamakatamburira; asi ivo vanokohwa ndivo vachadya uye vacharumbidza yeahoh, uyewo vaya vanounganidza mazimbiringa ndivo vachainwa mumavazhe eimba yangu tsvene.” pfuurai, pfuurai napamasuo! gadzirirai vanhu nzira. vakai, vakai mugwagwa mukuru! bvisai mabwe. simudzirai ndudzi mureza. yeahoh akaparidzira kumagumo enyika achiti, “uti kumwanasikana wezioni, ‘tarira, muponesi wako ouya! tarira, mubayiro wake anawo, uye kuripira kwake kunomutevera.’ ” vachanzi vanhu vatsvene, vakadzikinurwa vayeahoh; uye iwe uchanzi mutsvakwa, iro guta risina kuzova dongo.

63

ndianiko uyu anobva kuedhomu, anobva kubhozira, ane nguo dzakatsvuka seropa? ndianiko uyu, akafuka zvinobwinya, anofamba muukuru hwesimba rake? “ndini ndinotaura nokururama, ndine simba rokuponesa.” seiko nguo dzenyu dzakatsvuka sedzomunhu anotsika chisviniro chewaini? “ndakatsika chisviniro chewaini ndoga; kubva kundudzi dzose hapana akanga aneni. ndakavatsika-tsika mukutsamwa kwangu uye ndakavapwanyira pasi muhasha dzangu; ropa ravo rikatsatikira panguo dzangu, ndikasvibisa nguo dzangu dzose. nokuti zuva rokutsiva rakanga riri mumwoyo mangu, uye gore rokudzikinura kwangu rasvika. ndakatarisa, asi pakanga pasina angabatsira, ndakashamiswa nokuti hapana akatsigira; naizvozvo ruoko rwangu rwakandivigira ruponeso, uye hasha dzangu dzakanditsigira. ndakatsika-tsika ndudzi mukutsamwa kwangu; muhasha dzangu ndakaita kuti vadhakwe uye ndakadurura ropa ravo pasi.” ndichataura nezvounyoro hwayeahoh, iwo mabasa aanofanira kukudzwa nawo, nokuda kwezvose zvatakaitirwa nayeahoh, hongu, izvo zvinhu zvizhinji zvaakaitira imba yaisraeri, nokuda kwetsitsi dzake uye nengoni dzake zhinji. akati, “zvirokwazvo ndivo vanhu vangu, ivo vanakomana vasingazovi venhema kwandiri,” naizvozvo akava muponesi wavo. mumatambudziko avo ose naiyewo akatambudzika, uye mutumwa wokuvapo kwake akavaponesa. murudo rwake nengoni akavadzikinura; akavasimudza uye akavatakura mumazuva ose akare. asi vakamumukira vakachemedza mweya wake mutsvene. saka akashanduka akava muvengi wavo, uye iye amene akarwa navo. ipapo vanhu vake vakarangarira mazuva akare, mazuva amozisi navanhu vake, vakati, aripiko akavayambutsa gungwa, nomufudzi wamakwai ake? aripiko akaisa mweya wake mutsvene pakati pavo, iye akavatumira ruoko rwake rwokukudzwa nesimba kuti ruve paruoko rworudyi rwamozisi, iye akaparadzanisa mvura pamberi pavo, kuti azviwanire mukurumbira usingaperi, iye akavatungamirira nomakadzika? sebhiza murenje, havana kugumburwa; semombe dzinoburukira kubani, vakapiwa zororo nomweya wayeahoh. ndiwo matungamiriro amakaita vanhu venyu kuti muzviitire zita rine mukurumbira. tarirai pasi muri kudenga uye muone, kubva pachigaro chenyu chakakwirira chitsvene uye chinobwinya. kushingaira kwenyu nesimba renyu zviripiko? unyoro hwenyu netsitsi dzenyu zvakabviswa kwatiri. asi muri baba vedu, kunyange abhurahama asingatizivi kana naisraeri asingatiziviwo; imi, yeahoh, ndimi baba vedu, mudzikinuri wedu kubva kare ndiro zita renyu. haiwa yeahoh, munotiregereiko tichidzungaira, kubva panzira dzenyu muchiomesa mwoyo yedu kuti tirege kukutyai? dzokai nokuda kwavaranda venyu, iwo marudzi enhaka yenyu. kwenguva duku vanhu venyu vakatora nzvimbo yenyu tsvene, asi zvino vavengi vedu vakatsika-tsika nzvimbo yenyu tsvene. isu tiri venyu kubva kare; asi ivo hamuna kumbovatonga, havana kumbodaidzwa nezita renyu.

64

haiwa, dai maibvarura matenga mukaburuka pasi, kuti makomo adedere pamberi penyu! sezvinoita moto paunopisa tsotso uchiita kuti mvura ivire, burukai muzoita kuti zita renyu rizivikanwe kuvavengi venyu, uye muite kuti ndudzi dzidedere pamberi penyu! nokuti pamakaita zvinhu zvinotyisa zvatakanga tisina kutarisira, makaburuka pasi, makomo akabvunda pamberi penyu. kubva panguva dzekare hakuna munhu akanzwa, hakuna nzeve yakanzwisisa, hakuna ziso rakaona mumwe allah kunze kwenyu, anobatsira avo vanomumirira. munouya kuzobatsira avo vanofarira kuita zvakarurama, vanorangarira nzira dzenyu. asi patakaramba tichivatadzira, imi makatsamwa. zvino tingaponeswa seiko? isu tose tafanana nousina kuchena, uye mabasa edu ose okururama afanana namamvemve enguo dzine tsvina; isu tose tinooma seshizha, semhepo zvivi zvedu zvinotitsvairira kure. hakuna anodana kuzita renyu kana anoshingairira kuti akubatei; nokuti makativanzira chiso chenyu mukaita kuti tiperezeke nokuda kwezvivi zvedu. haiwa, yeahoh, kunyange zvakadaro muri baba vedu. isu tiri ivhu, imi muri muumbi; isu tose tiri basa ramaoko enyu. regai kutsamwa zvikuru imi yeahoh; regai kurangarira zvivi zvedu nokusingaperi. haiwa yeahoh, ringirai kwatiri, tinokumbira, nokuti tose tiri vanhu venyu. maguta enyu matsvene ava renje; kunyange zioni irenje, jerusarema rava dongo. temberi yedu tsvene inobwinya, umo madzibaba edu akakurumbidzai, yakapiswa nomoto, uye nzvimbo dzose dzataikoshesa dzaparara. haiwa yeahoh, mushure maizvozvi mungazvidzorawo here? mucharamba munyerere, uye mugotiranga zvinopfuura mwero here?

65

“ndakazviratidza kuna avo vasina kundibvunza; ndakawanikwa neavo vasina kunditsvaka. kurudzi rwakanga rusina kudana kuzita rangu ndakati, ‘ndiri pano, ndiri pano.’ zuva rose ndakatambanudzira maoko angu kurudzi rwakasindimara, vanofamba munzira dzisina kunaka vachitevera zvavanofunga, vanhu vanogara vachindigumbura ipo pamberi pangu chaipo, vachibayira zvibayiro pamapindu uye vachipisira zvinonhuhwira paaritari dzezvitinha; vanogara pakati pamarinda uye vanopedza usiku hwavo vachinyengetera vari munzira yakavanda: vanodya nyama yenguruve, uye hari dzavo dzine furo renyama yakasvibiswa; vanoti, ‘gara kure; usaswedera pedyo neni, nokuti ndiri mutsvene kupfuura iwe.’ vanhu vakadaro utsi mumhuno dzangu, moto unoramba uchipfuta zuva rose. “tarirai, zvakanyorwa pamberi pangu zvinoti: handinganyarari asi ndicharipira zvakazara; ndichazviripa pamakumbo avo, zvakaipa zvenyu nezvamadzibaba enyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti vakapisira zvibayiro pamusoro pezvikomo, ndichayera pamakumbo avo muripo wakazara wamabasa avo akare.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “sezvazvakangoita kana musvi uchiri kuwanikwa musumbu ramazambiringa uye vanhu vachiti, ‘musauparadza, muchine zvakanaka mauri,’ saizvozvo ndizvo zvandichaitira varanda vangu; handingavaparadzi vose. ndichabudisa marudzi kuna yaqobho, uye nokubva kuna yeahudha avo vachatora makomo angu; vasanangurwa vangu vachagara nhaka, uye varanda vangu vachagara ikoko. sharoni richava mafuro amakwai, uye mupata weakori uchava uvato hwemombe dzavanhu vangu vanonditsvaka. “asi kana murimi munosiya yeahoh uye munokanganwa gomo rangu dzvene, munowaridzira rombo rakanaka tafura, uye munozadza zvirongo newaini yakavhenganisirwa magumo, ndichakuendesai kumunondo, uye mose muchakotamira pasi kuti mubayiwe, nokuti ndakadana asi hamuna kudavira, ndakataura asi hamuna kuteerera. makaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu mukasarudza zvisingandifadzi.” naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: “varanda vangu vachadya, asi imi muchanzwa nzara; varanda vangu vachanwa, asi imi muchava nenyota; varanda vangu vachafara, asi imi muchanyadziswa. varanda vangu vachaimba zvichibva mumufaro wemwoyo yavo, asi imi muchachema nokurwadziwa nemwoyo uye muchaungudza mukupwanyika kwomweya. muchasiyira zita renyu kuvasanangurwa vangu sechituko; ishe yeahoh achakuurayai, asi achapa varanda vake rimwe zita. ani naani achati nyika iropafadzwe achazviita naallah wechokwadi; ani naani achaita mhiko munyika achapika naallah wechokwadi. nokuti matambudziko akare achakanganwikwa, uye achavanzirwa meso angu. “tarirai, ndichasika matenga matsva nenyika itsva. zvinhu zvakare hazvichazorangarirwi, kana kuuya mundangariro. asi farai mupembere nokusingaperi mune zvandichasika, nokuti ndichasika jerusarema kuti rifadze uye kuti vanhu varo vave mufaro. ndichapembera pamusoro pejerusarema, uye ndichafarira vanhu vangu; maungira okuchema kana kurira haachazonzwikwazve imomo. “mariri hamungazovazve nomucheche achararama mazuva mashoma shoma, kana mutana asingasvitsi makore ake okurarama; uyo anofa ane zana ramakore achangotorwa somujaya; uyo anotadza kusvika pazana ramakore achatorwa sowakatukwa. vachavaka dzimba vagogara madziri; vachadyara mazambiringa vagodya michero yawo. havachazovakazve dzimba dzinozogarwa navamwe, kana kudyara vamwe vachizodya. nokuti sezvakaita mazuva omuti, ndizvo zvichaita mazuva avanhu vangu; vasanangurwa vangu vachafara kwenguva refu mumabasa amaoko avo. havachazoshandira pasina kana kubereka vana vanoparadzwa; nokuti vachava vanhu vakaropafadzwa nayeahoh, ivo nezvizvarwa zvavo. vasati vadana ndichavapindura; vachiri kutaura ndichavanzwa. bumhi negwayana zvichafura pamwe chete, uye shumba ichadya uswa senzombe, asi guruva richava chokudya chenyoka. hazvichazokuvadza kana kuparadza pamusoro pegomo rangu dzvene rose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

66

zvanzi nayeahoh: “denga ndicho chigaro changu, uye nyika chitsiko chetsoka dzangu. ko, iripi imba yamungandivakira? nzvimbo yangu yokuzorora ichava kupiko? haruzi ruoko rwangu rwakaita izvozvi zvose here, nokudaro zvikavapo?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “munhu akadai ndiye wandichakudza: iye anozvininipisa uye ane mweya wakapwanyika, uye anodedera paanonzwa shoko rangu. asi ani naani anobayira hando akafanana nouyo anouraya munhu, uye anobayira gwayana, anofanana nouyo anovhuna mutsipa wembwa; ani naani anoita chipiriso chezviyo anofanana nomunhu anopa ropa renguruve, uye ani naani anopisira zvinonhuhwira zvokurangaridza, anofanana nounonamata chifananidzo. vakasarudza nzira dzavo, uye mweya yavo inofarira zvinonyangadza zvavo; naizvozvo neniwo ndichavasarudzira kuranga kuchavaomera, uye ndichauyisa pamusoro pavo izvo zvavanotya. nokuti pandakadana, hapana akapindura, pandakataura, hapana akateerera. vakaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu vakasarudza zvisingandifadzi.” inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi munodedera pamunonzwa shoko rake: “hama dzenyu dzinokuvengai, uye dzinokutsaurai nokuda kwezita rangu, dzakati, ‘yeahoh ngaaratidze kukudzwa kwake, kuti tione mufaro wenyu!’ asi ivo vachanyadziswa. inzwai maungira ebope anobva muguta, inzwai mheremhere inobva mutemberi! ndiwo maungira ayeahoh achiripira vavengi vake zvose zvakavakodzera. “asati arwadziwa nemimba, anosununguka; kurwadza kusati kwauya pamusoro pake, anosununguka mwanakomana. ndiani akambonzwa chinhu chakadai? ndiani akamboona zvinhu zvakadai? ko, nyika ingazvarwa pazuva rimwe here kana rudzi rungazvarwa pakarepo here? kunyange zvakadaro, zioni rakangoti kurwadziwa, pakarepo ndokubereka vana varo. ndingasvitsa panguva yokubereka ndikasaberekesa here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, ndinozarira chizvaro pandinoberekesa here?” ndizvo zvinotaura allah wenyu. “pemberai pamwe chete nejerusarema uye mufarisise nokuda kwaro, imi mose munorida; farisisai pamwe chete naro, imi mose munochema pamusoro paro. nokuti muchanwa mukaguta pamazamu ake anonyaradza; muchanwa zvikuru kwazvo uye muchafadzwa nezvakawanda zvake zvinopfachukira.” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: “ndichawedzera rugare kwaari sorwizi, uye upfumi hwendudzi sokudira kworukova; muchayamwa uye muchatakurwa paruoko rwake, uye muchavaraidzwa pamabvi ake. samai vanonyaradza mwana wavo, saizvozvo ndichakunyaradzai; uye muchanyaradzwa pamusoro pejerusarema.” pamuchaona izvozvo, mwoyo wenyu uchafara, uye muchaita bumhudza sebundo; ruoko rwayeahoh rucharatidzwa kuvaranda vake, asi hasha dzake dzicharatidzwa kuvavengi vake. tarirai, yeahoh ari kuuya nomoto, uye ngoro dzake dzakaita sechamupupuri; achaburutsa kutsamwa kwake nehasha huru, uye kutuka kwake nomurazvo womoto. nokuti nomoto uye nomunondo wake yeahoh achatonga vanhu vose, uye vazhinji vachava vaya vanourayiwa nayeahoh. “vaya vanozvinatsa nokuzvichenesa kuti vaende mumapindu, vachitevera munhu ari pakati paavo vanodya nyama yenguruve nembeva uye nezvimwe zvinhu zvinonyangadza, magumo avo achava mamwe chete,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti ini nokuda kwamabasa avo nepfungwa dzavo, ndiri kuuya kuzounganidza marudzi ose nendimi dzose; vachauya uye vachaona kubwinya kwangu. “ndichaisa chiratidzo pakati pavo, uye ndichatumira vamwe vavakapunyuka kundudzi, kutashishi, nokuvaribhiya navaridhia (vane mbiri yokuwembura uta), nokutubhari nokugirisi, nokuzviwi zviri kure zvisina kumbonzwa nezvembiri yangu kana kuona kubwinya kwangu. vachaparidza kubwinya kwangu pakati pendudzi. uye vachauyisa hama dzenyu dzose, kubva kundudzi dzose, kugomo rangu dzvene mujerusarema, sechipo kuna yeahoh, pamusoro pamabhiza, nomungoro uye mungoro dzina matenga, napamanyurusi uye napangamera,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vachazviuyisa, savaisraeri vanouyisa zvipiriso zvavo zvezviyo, kutemberi yayeahoh mumidziyo yakacheneswa. ipapo ndichasarudza vamwe vavo kuti vave vaprista navarevhi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti sezvakaita matenga matsva nenyika itsva zvandinoita zvichazogara pamberi pangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “saizvozvo zita renyu nezvizvarwa zvenyu zvichagara. kubva pakugara kwomwedzi kusvikira kuno mumwe, uye kubva pasabata rimwe kusvikira kune rimwe, marudzi ose achauya kuzokotama pamberi pangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vachabudapo vachindotarira zvitunha zvaavo vaindimukira; honye yavo haizofi, moto wavo haungadzimwi, uye vachasemesa vanhu vose.”

jeremiah

1

mashoko ajeremia mwanakomana wahirikia, mumwe wavaprista paanatoti munyika yabhenjamini. shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwaari mugore regumi namatatu rokutonga kwajosia mwanakomana waamoni mambo weyeahudha, uye nomunguva yokutonga kwajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, kusvikira pamwedzi wechishanu wegore regumi nerimwe razedhekia mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, vanhu vejerusarema pavakazoenda kuutapwa. shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri, richiti, “ndisati ndakuumba mudumbu ramai vako, ndakakuziva iwe, usati waberekwa, ndakakutsaura; ndakakugadza somuprofita kumarudzi.” ini ndikati, “haiwa, ishe yeahoh, handigoni kutaura; ndinongova mwana hangu.” asi yeahoh akati kwandiri, “usati, ‘ndinongova mwana hangu.’ unofanira kuenda kuna ani naani wandinokutuma kwaari undotaura zvose zvandinokurayira. usavatya, nokuti ini ndinewe uye ndichakurwira,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ipapo yeahoh akatambanudza ruoko rwake akabata muromo wangu akati kwandiri, “zvino ndaisa mashoko angu mumuromo mako. tarira, nhasi ndakugadza pamusoro pendudzi napamusoro poushe kuti udzure, ubvarure, uparadze, ukoromore, uvake uye usime.” shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri richiti, “jeremia, uri kuonei?” ndakapindura ndikati, “ndiri kuona davi romuti womuarimondi.” yeahoh akati kwandiri, “waona zvakanaka, nokuti ndiri kutarira kuti ndione kuzadziswa kweshoko rangu.” shoko rayeahoh rakauyazve kwandiri richiti, “uri kuoneiko?” ndakapindura ndikati, “ndiri kuona hari iri kuvira, yakarerekera kubva kumusoro.” yeahoh akati kwandiri, “njodzi ichadururirwa pamusoro pavanhu vagere munyika ichibva nokumusoro. nokuti iye zvino ndiri kudana vanhu vose voushe hwokumusoro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “madzimambo avo achauya achizoisa zvigaro zvavo zvoushe pamasuo ejerusarema; vachauya kuzorwisa masvingo aro ose akarikomberedza uye namaguta ose eyeahudha. ndichareva zvandakatonga pamusoro pavanhu vangu nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavo zvavakaita vachindisiya, vachipisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari uye vachinamata zvakaumbwa namaoko avo. “iwe chigadzirira! simuka uvataurire zvose zvandinokurayira. usavhundutswa navo, kuti ini ndirege kuzokuvhundutsa pamberi pavo. nhasi ndakuita guta rakakomberedzwa nembiru yesimbi namasvingo endarira, kuti urwe nenyika yose, urwe namadzimambo eyeahudha, namachinda avo, navaprista vavo uye navanhu venyika. vacharwa newe asi havangakukundi, nokuti ndinewe uye ndichakurwira,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

2

shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri richiti, “enda unoparidza munzeve dzejerusarema uchiti: “ ‘ndinorangarira kunamata kwouduku hwako, kuti somwenga waindida sei uye uchinditevera nomukati merenje, uye nomunyika isina munhu anogaramo. israeri akanga ari mutsvene kuna yeahoh, ari chibereko chokutanga chokukohwa kwake; vose vakanga vachimudya vaipiwa mhosva, uye njodzi yakavawira,’ ” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. inzwai shoko rayeahoh imi imba yayaqobho, nemi mose vorudzi rweimba yaisraeri. zvanzi nayeahoh: “madzibaba enyu akawana mhosva yei kwandiri, zvavakaenda kure neni? vakatevera zvifananidzo zvisina maturo ivo vakava vasina maturo pachavo. havana kubvunza kuti, ‘yeahoh aripiko, iye akatibudisa kubva munyika yeijipiti akatitungamirira nomugwenga risina miti, nomunyika yamarenje namakoronga, iyo nyika yakaoma uye yerima, nyika isina munhu anofambamo uye isina munhu anogaramo?’ ndakakupinzai munyika yakaorera kuti mudye zvibereko zvayo nezvakanaka zvayo. asi makasvika mukasvibisa nyika yangu, mukaita nhaka yangu kuti ive chinhu chinonyangadza. vaprista havana kubvunza kuti, ‘yeahoh aripiko?’ vakanga vachifambisa murayiro havana kundiziva; vatungamiri vakandimukira. vaprofita vakaprofita nabhaari, vachitevera zvifananidzo zvisina maturo. “naizvozvo ndinokupai mhosva zvakare,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichapazve mhosva vana vavana venyu. yambukirai kumiganhu yekitimi muone, tumai vanhu kukedhari mugonyatsocherechedza; muone kana pakambova nechimwe chinhu chakadai: ko, rudzi rwakambotsinhanisa vamwari varwo here? uye havasi vamwari zvachose. asi vanhu vangu vakatsinhanisa kukudzwa kwavo nezvifananidzo zvisina maturo. haiwa, imi matenga, shamiswai nechinhu ichi, uye mudedere nokutya kukuru,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vanhu vangu vakaita zvakaipa zviviri: vakandisiya ini, tsime remvura mhenyu, vakazvicherera zvirongo zvisingachengeti mvura. ko, israeri muranda here, kana nhapwa pakuberekwa? nemhaka yeiko apambwa zvino? shumba dzakaomba; dzikanguruma kwaari. dzakaparadza nyika yake; maguta ake akapiswa uye haachina vanhu. uyezve, vanhu venofi nevetapanesi vakaveura musoro wako. ko, hauna kuzvivigira izvozvo pachako here pawakasiya yeahoh allah wako paakanga achikutungamirira munzira? zvino, unoendereiko kuijipiti kundonwa mvura inobva mushihori? uye unodireiko kuenda kuasiria kundonwa mvura inobva murwizi? zvakaipa zvako zvichakuranga; kudzokera shure kwako kuchakutuka. rangarira uye uyeuke zvino kuti zvakaipa sei uye zvinovava sei kwauri, ukange wasiya yeahoh allah wako, uye usingandityi,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose. “wakavhuna joko rako kare kare uye wakadambura makashu ako; ukati, ‘handidi kukushumirai!’ zvirokwazvo, pamusoro pechikomo chirefu choga choga, uye pasi pomuti woga woga wakapfumvutira, wakarara pasi pawo sechifeve. ndakanga ndakusima somuzambiringa wakanakisa, uri mbeu kwayo inovimbika. ko, zvino wakazondishandukira sei ukava muzambiringa webundo wakaora? kunyange ukazvishambidza nesoda uchishandisa sipo yakawanda, gwapa remhosva yako rinoramba riri mberi kwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. “unoreva sei, uchiti, ‘handina kusvibiswa; handina kutevera bhaari’? tarisa zvawakaita mumupata; funga zvawakaita. iwe uri ngamera yehadzi inomhanya apa nepapo, uri mbizi yakarovedzwa mugwenga, inofembedza mhepo mukushuva kwayo; ndiani angaidzora pakupfumvura kwayo? mukono upi noupi unoitevera haufaniri kuzvinetesa; panguva yokusangana uchaiwana. usamhanya kusvikira tsoka dzako dzisisina shangu nehuro yako yava nenyota. asi iwe wakati, ‘hazvibatsiri! ndinoda vamwari vokumwe, uye ndinofanira kuvatevera.’ “sokunyadziswa kwembavha yabatwa, saizvozvo imba yaisraeri yanyadziswa, ivo namadzimambo avo uye namachinda avo, vaprista vavo navaprofita vavo. vanoti kudanda, ‘ndiwe baba vangu,’ uye kuibwe, ‘ndiwe wakandibereka.’ vakandifuratira ini asi zviso zvavo hazvina, nyamba pavanenge vava munhamo, vanoti kwandiri, ‘uyai mutiponese!’ ko, zvino vamwari vamakazviitira varipi? ngavauye kana vachigona kukuponesai pamunenge mava munhamo! nokuti muna vamwari vakawanda kupfuura maguta amunawo, imi yeahudha. “seiko muchindipa mhosva? imi mose makandimukira,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndakaranga vana venyu pasina; havana kuteerera kurangwa. munondo wenyu wakamedza vaprofita, kufanana neshumba inoparadza. “haiwa, imi vechizvarwa ichi, rangarirai shoko rayeahoh rinoti: “ndanga ndiri renje kuna israeri here kana nyika yerima guru? ko, vanhu vangu vanotaurireiko vachiti, ‘takasununguka kuenda kwatada; hatichazouyizve kwamuri?’ ko, murandakadzi angakanganwa zvishongo zvake here, nomwenga angakanganwa nguo dzake dzomuchato here? asi vanhu vangu vakandikanganwa ini, mazuva asingaverengeki. mune ruzivo rwakadii pakutevera rudo! kunyange vakadzi vakaipisisa vangadzidza kubva panzira dzenyu. panguo dzako vanhu vanowanapo ropa ravarombo vasina mhaka, kunyange usina kuvabata vachipaza. asi kunyange zvakadaro unoti, ‘handina mhosva; uye haana kunditsamwira.’ asi ndichatema mutongo wangu pauri nokuti unoti, ‘handina kutadza.’ ko, unofambireiko pose pose zvakadai, uchishandura nzira dzako? iwe uchagumburwa neijipiti, sezvawakaitwa neasiria. uchabvawo panzvimbo iyoyo wakaisa maoko ako pamusoro pako, nokuti yeahoh akaramba vose vaunovimba navo; iwe hauchazobatsirwi navo.

3

“kana murume akaramba mukadzi wake, iye akamusiya hake akandowanikwa nomumwe murume, murume uyu angadzokerazve kwaari here? ko, nyika haingasvibiswi here? asi iwe wakararama sechifeve navadiwa vazhinji, zvino ungadzokera kwandiri here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “tarira kunzvimbo dzakakwirira dzisina miti uone. iripo here nzvimbo yausina kumboitira ufeve? mujinga menzira wakagaramo wakamirira zvikomba, wakagara kunge vanhu vouragu vari murenje. wakasvibisa nyika noufeve hwako uye nezvakaipa zvako. naizvozvo wakanyimwa mvura inopfunha, uye nemvura yomuchirimo haina kunaya. ko, handiti uchangobva pakundidana here uchiti, ‘baba vangu, shamwari yangu kubva pauduku hwangu, muchagara makatsamwa here? kutsamwa kwenyu kucharamba kuripo nokusingaperi here?’ aya ndiwo matauriro ako, asi unoita zvakaipa zvose zvaunogona kuita.” panguva yokutonga kwamambo josia, yeahoh akati kwandiri, “waona here zvaitwa naisraeri wokusatendeka? ari kuenda pamusoro pezvikomo zvose zvakakwirira nepasi pemiti yose yakapfumvutira achindoita ufevepo. ndakafunga kuti mushure mokuita kwake izvi zvose, achadzokera kwandiri asi iye haana, uye mununʼuna wake yeahudha wokusatendeka akazviona. ndakapa israeri wokusatendeka tsamba yokurambana ndikamudzinga nokuda kwoufeve hwake. kunyange zvakadaro ndakaona kuti yeahudha mununʼuna wake wokusatenda haatyi; naiyewo akabuda akandoita ufeve. nokuti ufeve hwaisraeri hahuna zvahwakareva kwaari, akasvibisa nyika nokufeva namabwe namatanda. kunyange izvi zvakadaro, mununʼuna wake yeahudha wokusatendeka haana kudzokera kwandiri nomwoyo wake wose, asi kunyengera chete,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “israeri wokusatenda akarurama kukunda yeahudha wokusatendeka. enda undoparidza shoko iri kurutivi rwokumusoro uchiti, “ ‘dzokai imi israeri vokusatenda,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘handichazorambi ndakafinyamisa chiso changu kwamuri, nokuti ndizere nengoni,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘handingarambi ndakatsamwa nokusingaperi. imi zivai mhosva yenyu chete, kuti makamukira yeahoh allah wenyu, mukafadza vamwari vavatorwa muri pasi pomuti mumwe nomumwe wakapfumvutira, uye hamuna kunditeerera,’ ” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “dzokai, imi vanhu vokusatenda,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “nokuti ndini murume wenyu. ndichakusarudzai, ndichatora mumwe chete kubva kune rimwe guta, uye vaviri kubva kuno rumwe rudzi, ndigokuuyisai kuzioni. ipapo ndichakupai vafudzi vanofadza mwoyo wangu, ivo vachakutungamirirai noruzivo nokunzwisisa. mumazuva iwayo, pamunenge mawanda zvikuru munyika,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “vanhu havangazoti, ‘areka yesungano yayeahoh.’ hazvingazopindi mundangariro dzavo kana kurangarirwa; havazoishuvi, havangagadziri imwezve. panguva iyoyo vachatumidza jerusarema kuti chigaro choushe chayeahoh, uye ndudzi dzose dzichaungana mujerusarema kuzokudza zita rayeahoh. havachazoteverizve kusindimara kwemwoyo yavo yakaipa. mumazuva iwayo imba yayeahudha ichabatana neimba yaisraeri, uye vose pamwe chete vachauya vachibva kunyika yokumusoro vachienda kunyika yandakapa madzibaba enyu kuti ive nhaka. “ini pachangu ndakati, “ ‘ndichafara sei pakukubatai savanakomana vangu uye ndichikupai nyika inoyevedza, iyo nhaka yakaisvonaka yorudzi rupi zvarwo.’ ndakafunga kuti muchanditi ‘baba’ mukasazotsauka pakunditevera. asi sezvinoita mukadzi asina kutendeka kumurume wake, saizvozvo makanga musina kutendeka kwandiri, imi imba yaisraeri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. kuchema kunonzwika panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzisina miti, iko kuchema nokuteterera kwavanhu veisraeri, nokuti vakaminamisa nzira dzavo uye vakakanganwa yeahoh allah wavo. “dzokai, imi vanhu vokusatenda; ndichakurapai pakudzokera kwenyu shure.” “hongu, tichauya kwamuri, nokuti imi muri yeahoh allah wedu. zvirokwazvo mheremhere youfeve iri pazvikomo, napamakomo unyengeri; zvirokwazvo muna yeahoh allah wedu ndimo mune ruponeso rwaisraeri. kubva pauduku hwedu nyadzi dzakadya zvibereko zvamabasa amadzibaba edu, makwai avo, nemombe dzavo, vanakomana navanasikana vavo. ngativatei pasi munyadzi dzedu, uye kunyara kwedu ngakutifukidze. takatadzira yeahoh allah wedu, isu tose namadzibaba edu; kubva pauduku hwedu kusvikira nhasi hatina kuteerera yeahoh allah wedu.”

4

“haiwa israeri, kana muchida kudzoka, dzokai kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kana mukabvisa pamberi pangu zvifananidzo zvenyu zvinonyangadza uye mukasarasikazve, kana mukapika muchokwadi, nokururama uye nenzira yakarurama muchiti: ‘zvirokwazvo nayeahoh mupenyu,’ ipapo ndudzi dzicharopafadzwa naye uye dzichazvirumbidza maari.” izvi ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh kuvanhu veyeahudha nejerusarema: “zviundirei gombo murege kudyara pakati peminzwa. zvidzingisirei kuna yeahoh, dzingisai mwoyo yenyu, imi varume veyeahudha nemi vanhu vejerusarema, kuti kutsamwa kwangu kurege kukubudirai kukapisa somoto, nokuda kwezvakaipa zvamakaita, iko kupisa kusina angakudzima. “zivisai munyika yayeahudha uye muparidze mujerusarema muchiti: ‘ridzai hwamanda munyika yose!’ danidzirai nesimba muchiti: ‘unganai pamwe chete! ngatitizirei kumaguta akakomberedzwa!’ simudzai mureza wokuenda kuzioni! tizai muvande musinganonoki! nokuti ndiri kuuyisa njodzi inobva kumusoro, iko kuparadza kwakaipisisa.” shumba yabuda mudenhere rayo; muparadzi wendudzi abuda. asiya nzvimbo yake kuti aparadze nyika yenyu. maguta enyu achava matongo pasina achagaramo. naizvozvo pfekai masaga, chemai muungudze, nokuti kutsamwa kwayeahoh kunotyisa hakuna kubva kwatiri. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “mambo namachinda vachaora mwoyo, vaprista vachatyiswa, uye vaprofita vachavhundutswa.” ipapo ndakati, “haiwa, ishe yeahoh, makanyengera kwazvo vanhu ava nejerusarema muchiti, ‘muchava norugare,’ nyamba munondo uri pahuro dzedu.” panguva iyoyo vanhu ava nejerusarema vachaudzwa kuti, “mhepo inopisa inobva kunzvimbo dzakakwirira dzisina miti mugwenga inovhuvhuta yakananga vanhu vangu, asi isingapepeti kana kunatsa; mhepo ine simba kwazvo kudarika iyoyo ichabva kwandiri. zvino ndiwo wava mutongo wangu pamusoro pavo.” tarirai! ari kuuya samakore, ngoro dzake dzinouya sechamupupuri, mabhiza ake anomhanya kupfuura makondo, tine nhamo! taparara! haiwa jerusarema, shamba zvakaipa zviri mumwoyo mako ugoponeswa. ucharamba uchingoviga pfungwa dzako dzakaipa kusvikira riini? inzwi rinodanidzira richibva kudhani, richizivisa nezvenjodzi inobva kuzvikomo zveefuremu. “zivisai izvi kumarudzi, zviparidzei kujerusarema muchiti: ‘hondo ichakukombai iri kuuya ichibva kunyika iri kure, ichidanidzira zvehondo yokurwisa maguta eyeahudha. vanorikomba savanhu vakarinda munda, nokuti rakandimukira,’ ” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “tsika dzako namabasa ako ndizvo zvauyisa izvi pamusoro pako. ichi ndicho chirango chako. haiwa, zvinovava sei! haiwa, zvinobaya sei mwoyo!” maiwe, kurwadziwa kwangu, kurwadziwa kwangu! ndiri kubidirika nokurwadziwa. haiwa, kurwadza kwomwoyo wangu! hana yangu inorova mukati mangu, handinganyarari. nokuti ndanzwa kurira kwehwamanda; ndanzwa mheremhere yehondo. njodzi inotevera njodzi; nyika yose yava dongo. munguva shoma shoma, matende angu aparadzwa, musha wangu nenguva diki diki. ndicharamba ndichiona mureza wehondo kusvikira riniko, uye ndichanzwa kurira kwehwamanda kusvikira riniko? “vanhu vangu mapenzi; havandizivi ini. vana vasina pfungwa; havanzwisisi. vakangwarira kuita zvakaipa; havazivi kuita zvakanaka.” ndakatarira nyika, yakanga isina kugadzirwa, isina chinhu; uye nokumatenga, chiedza chawo chakanga chisisipo. ndakatarira pamakomo, tarirai, aidengenyeka; zvikomo zvose zvaizeya. ndakatarira, ipapo pakanga pasina vanhu; shiri dzose dzedenga dzakanga dzabhururuka dzikaenda kure. ndakatarira, ndokuona nyika yaibereka zvibereko yava gwenga; maguta ayo ose ava matongo pamberi payeahoh, pamberi pehasha dzake dzinotyisa. zvanzi nayeahoh: “nyika yose ichaparadzwa, kunyange hangu ndisingazoiparadzi zvachose. naizvozvo nyika ichachema uye matenga kumusoro achava rima nokuti ndini ndazvitaura uye handingaregi kuzviita, ndini ndazvisarudza uye handingadzokeri shure.” paanonzwa kutinhira kwavatasvi vamabhiza nokwavawemburi vouta, maguta ose anotiza. vamwe vanopinda mumatenhere; vamwe vanokwira pakati pamatombo. maguta ose asara asina munhu; hapana anogaramo. uchaiteiko, iwe wokuparadzwa? wapfekereiko nguo tsvuku, uye unoshongereiko zvishongo zvegoridhe? wazorereiko meso ako pendi? unongozvishongedzera pasina. zvikomba zvako zvinokushora; zvinotsvaka kukuuraya. ndiri kunzwa kuchema sekwomukadzi anorwadziwa pakusununguka, kugomera sekwomukadzi opona dangwe rake, kuchema kwomwanasikana wezioni ari kufemedzeka, achitambanudza maoko ake achiti, “maiwe! ndoziya; upenyu hwangu hwaiswa kuvaurayi.”

5

“kwirai nokudzika nemigwagwa yejerusarema, tarirai pose pose mugofunga, tsvakai muzvivara zvaro muone kana mukawana kana munhu mumwe anoita zvakanaka uye anotsvaka zvokwadi, ipapo ndicharegerera guta iri. kunyange vachiti havo, ‘nayeahoh mupenyu,’ vanenge vachingopika nhema.” haiwa yeahoh, meso enyu haatsvaki chokwadi here? makavarova, asi havana kunzwa kurwadziwa; makavapwanya, asi vakaramba kurayirwa. vakaomesa zviso zvavo kupfuura dombo uye vakaramba kutendeuka. ndakafunga ndikati, “ava varombo bedzi; mapenzi, nokuti havazivi nzira yayeahoh, nezvinodikanwa naallah wavo. naizvozvo ndichaenda kuvatungamiri ndigotaura navo; zvirokwazvo vanoziva nzira yayeahoh, zvinodiwa naallah wavo.” asi nomwoyo mumwe, naivowo vakanga vavhuna joko, vakadambura makashu. saka shumba inobva musango ichavauraya, bere rinobva mugwenga richavabvambura, ingwe ichavavandira pedyo namaguta avo kuti ibvamburanye vose vanobudamo, nokuti kundimukira kwavo kukuru uye kudzokera shure kwavo kwawanda. “ndingakukanganwirai seiko? vana venyu vakandisiya, uye vakapika navamwari vasati vari vamwari. ndakavapa zvose zvavaishayiwa, asi ivo vakaita ufeve vakandoungana kudzimba dzezvifeve. ivo mabhiza anodya achiguta azere ruchiva, mumwe nomumwe achidokwairira mukadzi womumwe. ko, handingavarangi nokuda kwaizvozvi here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, handingazvitsiviri here parudzi rwakadai? “endai nomuminda yavo yamazambiringa muiparadze, asi musaiparadza zvachose. bvisai matavi awo, nokuti vanhu ava havasi vayeahoh. imba yaisraeri neimba yayeahudha vanga vasina kutendeka kwandiri zvachose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. vakarevera yeahoh nhema, vachiti, “haana chaachaita! hakuna chakaipa chichaitika kwatiri; hatichazombooni hondo kana nzara. vaprofita vangova mhepo, uye shoko harimo mavari. saka zvavanotaura ngazviitwe kwavari.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose: “nokuti vanhu vakataura mashoko aya, ndichaita kuti mashoko angu ave moto mumuromo mako, uye vanhu ava kuti vave huni dzinopiswa nawo. haiwa imi imba yaisraeri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndiri kuuyisa rudzi runobva kure kuzokurwisai, rudzi rwakare kare uye rudzi rwakashinga, vanhu vane rurimi rwamusinganzwi, vano mutauro wamusinganzwisisi. magoba avo akafanana neguva rakashama; vose zvavo varwi vane simba. vachadya zvamakakohwa nezvokudya zvenyu, vachauraya vanakomana navanasikana venyu; vachadya makwai enyu nemombe dzenyu, vachadya mazambiringa namaonde enyu. vachaparadza nomunondo, maguta enyu akakomberedzwa iwo amunovimba nawo. “kunyange mumazuva iwayo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “handingakuparadzei zvachose. zvino kana vanhu vakabvunza kuti, ‘ko, yeahoh allah wedu aitirei izvi kwatiri?’ imi muchavaudza kuti, ‘sezvo makandisiya mukandoshumira vamwari vavatorwa munyika yenyu chaiyo, saizvozvowo zvino muchashandira vatorwa munyika isiri yenyu.’ “zivisai izvi kuimba yayaqobho mugozviparidza mayeahudha muchiti: inzwai izvi imi mapenzi navanhu vasina pfungwa, vane meso, asi vasingaoni, vane nzeve, asi vasinganzwi: ko, hamufaniri kunditya here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, hamufaniri kudedera pamberi pangu here? ndakaita jecha kuti rive muganhu wegungwa, muganhu warisingadariki nokusingaperi. mafungu angafashama, asi haangakundi; angavirima asi haangaudariki. asi vanhu ava vane mwoyo yakasindimara uye inondimukira; vakatsauka vakaenda kure. havati mumwoyo yavo, ‘ngatityei yeahoh allah wedu, anotipa mvura yamatsutso neyomunakamwe nenguva yayo, anotitsidzira mavhiki akatarwa okukohwa.’ zvakaipa zvenyu zvakadzingira izvi kure; zvivi zvenyu zvakadzivisa kuti zvinhu zvakanaka zviuye kwamuri. “pakati pavanhu vangu pane vanhu vakaipa vanovandira kufanana savanhu vanoteya shiri nougombe uye savaya vanoisa misungo yokubata vanhu. sedendere rizere neshiri, dzimba dzavo dzizere nokunyengera; vapfuma uye vava nesimba, uye vafuta uye vobwinya. zvakaipa zvavo hazvina magumo, havatambi mhaka dzenherera kuti vakunde, havadziviriri kodzero dzavarombo. ko, handifaniri kuvaranga pane izvi here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, handingazvitsiviri here parudzi rwakadai? “chinhu chinosemesa uye chinovhundutsa chaitika panyika. vaprofita vanoprofita nhema, vaprista vanotonga nesimba ravo uye vanhu vangu vanofarira izvozvo. asi muchaiteiko pakupedzisira?

6

“tizai kuti murarame, imi vana vebhenjamini! tizai mubve mujerusarema! ridzai hwamanda mutekoa! simudzai chiratidzo pamusoro pebheti hakeremu! nokuti njodzi yava pedyo ichibva kumusoro, iko kuparadza kwakaipisisa. ndichaparadza mwanasikana wezioni, akanakisa uye anoyevedza. vafudzi namapoka amakwai avo vachauya kuzomurwisa; vachadzika matende avo vakamukomba, mumwe nomumwe achifudza chikamu chake.” gadzirirai kurwa naye! simukai, ngatimurwisei masikati! “asi, yowe-e, zuva rovira, uye mimvuri yamadekwana yoreba. naizvozvo simukai, ngatimurwisei usiku, uye tiparadze nhare dzake!” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “temerai miti pasi, mugovakira jerusarema mirwi yokurikomba. guta iri rinofanira kurangwa; rizere nokumanikidza. setsime rinoeredza mvura yaro, saizvozvo jerusarema rinodurura zvakaipa zvaro. kuita nechisimba nokuparadza zvinonzwikwa mariri, kurwara kwaro namavanga zvinoramba zviri pamberi pangu. inzwa yambiro, iwe jerusarema, kuti ndisakufuratira ndikaita nyika yako dongo, kuti isava nomunhu angagara mairi.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “ngavatanhe zvakasara zvaisraeri vatanhe zvachose samazambiringa; utambanudzirezve ruoko rwako kumatavi, sezvinoita munhu anounganidza mazambiringa.” ndingataura naaniko wandingayambira? ndianiko achandinzwa? nzeve dzavo dzakadzivirwa kuti varege kunzwa. shoko rayeahoh chigumbuso kwavari; havawani mufaro mariri. asi ini ndizere nehasha dzayeahoh, uye handichagoni kuzvidzora. “dzidururire pamusoro pavana vari munzira dzomuguta, napamusoro pamajaya akaungana pamwe chete; zvose murume nomukadzi vachabatwa imomo, navatana, vaya vabva zera. dzimba dzavo dzichapiwa vamwe, minda yavo pamwe chete navakadzi vavo, pandichatambanudza ruoko rwangu pamusoro pavagere panyika,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kubva kumudiki kusvikira kuvakuru, vose vanokarira pfuma; vaprofita navaprista zvimwe chetezvo, vose vanoita zvokunyengera. vanosunga ronda ravanhu vangu sokunge vasina kukuvara zvikuru. vanoti, ‘rugare, rugare,’ ipo pasina rugare. ko, vanonyadziswa nokusemesa kwamafambiro avo here? kwete, havana nyadzi zvachose; havambozivi kuratidza nyadzi. naizvozvo vachawira pakati pavakawa; vachadzikiswa pandichavaranga,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh: “mirai pamharadzano dzenzira muone; mubvunze nzira dzekare, mubvunze kune nzira yakanaka, mugofamba mairi, ipapo muchawana zororo remweya yenyu. asi imi makati, ‘hatizofambi mairi.’ ndakagadza nharirire pamusoro penyu ndikati, ‘teererai inzwi rehwamanda!’ asi imi makati, ‘hatizoteereri.’ naizvozvo inzwai, imi ndudzi, nemi zvapupu, cherechedzai zvichaitika kwavari. inzwa, iwe nyika: ndiri kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro pavanhu ava, icho chibereko chendangariro dzavo, nokuti havana kuteerera mashoko angu, uye vakaramba murayiro wangu. ndine hanya yeiko nezvinonhuhwira zvinobva kushebha, kana karamisi inotapira inobva kunyika iri kure?
