zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa handizvidi; zvibayiro zvenyu hazvindifadzi.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: “ndichaisa zvipinganidzo pamberi pavanhu ava. madzibaba navanakomana vachagumburwa nazvo pamwe chete, vavakidzani neshamwari vachaparara.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “tarirai, hondo iri kuuya kubva kunyika yokumusoro; rudzi rukuru rwuri kumutswa kubva kumigumo yenyika. vakapakata uta nepfumo; vane utsinye uye havana ngoni. vanonzwikwa sokutinhira kwegungwa vakatasva mabhiza avo; vari kuuya savanhu vazvigadzirira kurwa hondo kuti vakurwise, iwe mwanasikana wezioni.” takanzwa guhu ravo, uye maoko edu oshayiwa simba. tabatwa nokurwadziwa, kurwadziwa kwakaita sekwomukadzi ari kusununguka. regai kuenda kumunda, kana kufamba mumigwagwa, nokuti muvengi ane munondo, uye kumativi ose kune zvinotyisa. haiwa, vanhu vangu, pfekai masaga mugoumburuka mumadota; chemai nokuchema kukuru kwazvo kunge munochemera mwanakomana mumwe chete, nokuti muparadzi achatiwira pakarepo. “ndakakuita muedzi wamatare navanhu vangu mhangura, kuti ucherechedze uye uedze nzira dzavo. vose vamukiri vakaoma mwoyo, vanongofamba-famba vachiita makuhwa. ivo indarira nesimbi; vose vanoita zvakaora. mvuto inovhutira zvinotyisa kuti ipise mutobvu nomoto, asi kunatswa kunongova pasina; nokuti vakaipa havasi kubviswa. vanonzi sirivha yakarambwa, nokuti yeahoh akavaramba.”

7

iri ndiro shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh: “mira pasuo reimba yayeahoh, uparidzepo shoko iri rokuti: “ ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh imi mose vanhu veyeahudha vanopinda napamasuo aya kuzonamata yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: shandurai nzira dzenyu namaitiro enyu, ndigokugarisai munzvimbo ino. musavimba namashoko anonyengedza muchiti, “iyi ndiyo temberi yayeahoh, temberi yayeahoh, temberi yayeahoh!” kana mukashandura chaizvoizvo nzira dzenyu namaitiro enyu mukaitirana zvakarurama, kana mukasamanikidza vatorwa, nenherera kana chirikadzi uye mukasateura ropa risina mhosva panzvimbo ino, uye kana mukasatevera vamwe vamwari muchizvipinza munjodzi, ipapo ndichakugarisai munzvimbo ino, munyika yandakapa madzitateguru enyu nokusingaperi-peri. asi tarirai, munovimba namashoko okunyengera asina maturo. “ ‘mungaba mugouraya, mugoita upombwe mugopika nhema, muchipisira zvinonhuhwira kuna bhaari, mugotevera vamwe vamwari vamusina kumboziva, ndokuzouya zvino momira pamberi pangu muimba ino, iyo ine zita rangu, muchiti, “takasunungurwa,” makasunungurwa kuti muite izvi zvose zvinonyangadza here? ko, imba ino, inodanwa nezita rangu, yava bako ramakororo here? asika, ndanga ndichizviona, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ ‘chiendai zvino kunzvimbo iri mushiro pandakagarisa zita rangu pakutanga mugoona zvandakuitirai nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavanhu vangu israeri. pamakanga muchiita zvinhu zvose izvi, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ndakataura nemi ndataurazve asi hamuna kuteerera; ndakakudanai asi hamuna kupindura. naizvozvo, zvandakaitira shiro ndizvo zvandichaita iye zvino kuimba inodanwa nezita rangu, iyo temberi yamunovimba nayo, nzvimbo yandakakupai imi namadzibaba enyu. ndichakubvisai pamberi pangu sezvandakaita kuhama dzenyu dzose, ivo vanhu vaefuremu.’ “naizvozvo iwe chirega kunyengeterera vanhu ava kana kupa chikumbiro chipi zvacho kana kuvareverera; usavakumbirira kwandiri, nokuti handingakunzwi. hauoni here zvavari kuita mumaguta eyeahudha nomumigwagwa yejerusarema? vana vanounganidza huni, madzibaba ndokubatidza moto, uye madzimai anokanya furawu ndokuitira mambokadzi wokudenga makeke echingwa. vanodurura zvipiriso zvokunwa kuna vamwe vamwari kuti vanditsamwise. asi ndini here wavanotsamwisa? ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ko, hakuzi kuzvikuvadza pachavo here kuti vanyadziswe? “ ‘naizvozvo ishe yeahoh anoti: kutsamwa kwangu nehasha dzangu zvichadururirwa pamusoro penzvimbo iyi, pamusoro pavanhu nezvipfuwo, napamusoro pemiti yesango napamusoro pezvibereko zvevhu, uye zvichatsva zvikasadzimwa. “ ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: endererai mberi, wedzerai zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa pamusoro pezvimwe zvibayiro mugodya nyama yacho pachenyu! nokuti pandakabudisa madzitateguru enyu kubva muijipiti ndikataura navo, handina kungovapa mirayiro pamusoro pezvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvibayiro, asi ndakavapa murayiro uyu wokuti nditeererei, uye ndichava allah wenyu nemi muchava vanhu vangu. mufambe munzira dzose dzandakakurayirai, kuti zvigova zvakanaka kwamuri. asi havana kuteerera kana kurereka nzeve dzavo; asi vakatevera kutsauka kwoukukutu hwemwoyo yavo yakaipa. vakadzokera shure vakasaenda mberi. kubvira panguva yakabuda madzitateguru enyu muijipiti kusvikira zvino, zuva nezuva, ndakatuma varanda vangu vaprofita ndavatumazve. asi havana kunditeerera kana kuita hanya. vaiva nemitsipa mikukutu uye vakaita zvakaipa kupfuura madzitateguru avo.’ “pauchavataurira zvose izvi, havasi kuzokuteerera; pauchavadana, havasi kuzokupindura. naizvozvo iwe uti kwavari, ‘urwu ndirwo rudzi rusina kuteerera yeahoh allah warwo kana kubvuma kurayirwa. chokwadi chakaparara, hachisisipo pamiromo yavo. veurai bvudzi renyu mugorirasira kure; chemai muri pazvikomo zvisina miti, nokuti yeahoh akaramba uye akasiya chizvarwa ichi chaakatsamwira. “ ‘vanhu veyeahudha vakaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. vakamisa zvifananidzo zvavo zvinonyangadza mumba yakapiwa zita rangu vakaisvibisa. vakavaka nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzetofeti mumupata wabheni hinomi kuti vapise vanakomana navasikana vavo mumoto, chinhu chandisina kuvarayira, chisina kumbopinda mupfungwa dzangu. saka chenjerai, mazuva anouya, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, apo vanhu vasingazopadaidzi kuti tofeti kana mupata wabheni hinomi, asi mupata wokuurayiwa kwavanhu, nokuti vachaviga vakafa mutofeti kusvikira pasisina nzvimbo. ipapo mitumbi yavanhu ava ichava zvokudya zveshiri dzedenga nemhuka dzenyika, uye hapazovi nomunhu angazvivhundutsira kuti zvibve. ndichaita kuti inzwi rokupembera nomufaro uye namanzwi omwenga nechikomba mumaguta eyeahudha nomumigwagwa yejerusarema zvigume nokuti nyika ichava dongo.

8

“ ‘panguva iyoyo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, mapfupa amadzimambo namachinda eyeahudha, namapfupa avaprista navaprofita, uye mapfupa avanhu vejerusarema, achabviswa kubva mumakuva avo. achava pamhene agorohwa nezuva uye achavhenekwa nomwedzi nenyeredzi dzose dzedenga, zvavakada vakazvishumira vakazvitevera uye vakabvunza kwazviri, vakazvinamata. haangaunganidzwi kana kuvigwa, asi achafanana nomupfudze uri panyika. kwose zvako kwandichavadzingira, vakasara vose vorudzi urwu rwakaipa, vachademba rufu pachinzvimbo choupenyu, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.’ “uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘vanhu pavanowira pasi, havamukizve here? munhu akange ambotsauka, haadzokizve here? zvino nemhaka yei ava vadzokera shure? nemhaka yei jerusarema richingogara richitsauka? vanobatirira pakunyengera, vanoramba kudzoka. ndakanyatsoteereresa, asi ivo havambotauri zvakarurama. hakuna anotendeuka pane zvakaipa zvake achiti, “ndaiteiko?” mumwe nomumwe anongotevedza nzira yake sebhiza rinomhanyira kurwa hondo. kunyange shohori riri mudenga rinoziva nguva dzaro dzakatarwa, uye njiva, nenyenganyenga nekondo zvinocherechedza nguva yazvo yokutama. asi vanhu vangu havazivi zvinodikanwa nayeahoh. “ ‘munoreva seiko muchiti, “takachenjera, nokuti tino murayiro wayeahoh,” asi zvirokwazvo chinyoreso chenhema chavanyori chakanyora nhema? vakachenjera vachanyadziswa, vachavhunduka uye vachabatwa. sezvo vakaramba shoko rayeahoh, kuchenjera kwavanako kwakadiniko? naizvozvo ndichapa vakadzi vavo kuna vamwe varume, neminda yavo kuvaridzi vatsva. kubva kumuduku kusvikira kumukuru vose vanokarira pfuma; vaprofita navaprista saizvozvo, vose vanoita nokunyengera. vanosunga vanga ravanhu vangu sokunge duku duku. vanoti, “rugare, rugare,” ipo pasina rugare. ko, vanonyadziswa netsika dzavo dzinonyangadza here? kwete, havana kana nyadzi zvachose; havambozivi kuti zvinonyadzisa sei. saka vachawa pakati pavakawa; vachaderedzwa pavacharangwa, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ ‘ndichavatorera zvavakakohwa, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. hapangazovi namazambiringa pamuzambiringa. hakungazovi namaonde pamuti womuonde, uye mashizha azvo achaoma. zvandakavapa vachazvitorerwa.’ ” “ko, takagarireiko pano? unganai pamwe chete! ngatitizirei kumaguta akakomberedzwa tindofira ikoko! nokuti yeahoh allah wedu atitongera kufa, nokuti akatipa mvura ino muchetura kuti tinwe, nokuti takamutadzira. takanga takatarisira rugare asi hakuna chakanaka chakauya; takatarisira kuporeswa asi paingova nokuvhundutswa. kufemedzeka kwamabhiza omuvengi kunonzwika kuchibva kudhani; panorira makono awo nyika yose inodedera. auya kuzoparadza nyika nezvose zviri mairi, guta navose vanogara imomo.” “tarirai ndichatumira nyoka dzino uturu pakati penyu, mvumbi dzicharamba kuimbirwa, uye dzichakurumai,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. haiwa, munyaradzi wangu, pakuchema kwangu, mwoyo wangu woziya mukati mangu. inzwai kuchema kwavanhu vangu kunobva kunyika iri kure kure: “ko, yeahoh haazi muzioni here? mambo waro haachimo here?” “vakanditsamwisireiko nezvifananidzo zvavo, nezvifananidzo zvavo zvavatorwa zvisingabatsiri?” “kucheka kwapfuura, zhizha rapera, asi tigere kuponeswa.” sezvo vanhu vangu vapwanyiwa, neniwo ndapwanyiwa; ndiri kuchema, uye ndiri kutya zvikuru. ko, mugireadhi hamuna muti webharisamu here? hakuna murapi ikoko here? seiko zvino ronda ravanhu vangu risina kurapwa?

9

haiwa, dai musoro wangu waiva chitubu chemvura uye meso angu riri tsime remisodzi! ndingadai ndaichema masikati nousiku nokuda kwavakaurayiwa vavanhu vangu. haiwa, dai ndaiva nenzvimbo mugwenga yokugara yavafambi, kuitira kuti ndisiye vanhu vangu ndiende kure navo; nokuti vose imhombwe, ungano yavanhu vasina kutendeka. “vanokunga rurimi rwavo souta, kuti vapfure nhema; havaiti nechokwadi pakukunda kwavanoita munyika. vanobva pane chimwe chivi vachienda pane chimwe; havandizivi ini,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “chenjererai shamwari dzenyu; musavimba nehama dzenyu. nokuti hama ipi neipi inonyengera, uye shamwari ipi neipi inoita makuhwa. shamwari inonyengera shamwari, uye hakuna anotaura chokwadi. vakadzidzisa ndimi dzavo kureva nhema; vanozvinetsa nokuita zvakaipa. munogara pakati pounyengeri; mukunyengera kwavo vanoramba kundiziva ini,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “tarirai, ndichavanatsa uye ndichavaedza, ndechipi chimwe chandingaita nokuda kwechivi chavanhu vangu? rurimi rwavo museve unouraya; runotaura nokunyengera. nomuromo wake mumwe nomumwe anotaura zvakanaka kune wokwake, asi mumwoyo make anomuteyera musungo. ko, handigavarangi nokuda kwechinhu ichi here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, handingazvitsiviri pamusoro porudzi rwakadai here?” ndichachema uye ndichaungudza nokuda kwamakomo, uye ndichachema pamusoro pamafuro egwenga. aparara uye hakuna anofambako, uye kukuma kwemombe hakunzwiki. shiri dzedenga dzatiza, uye mhuka dzaenda. “ndichaita jerusarema murwi wedongo, panogara makava; uye ndichaparadza maguta eyeahudha, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu anogarako.” ndoupiko munhu akachenjera zvokuti anganzwisisa izvi? ndianiko akarayirwa nayeahoh uye angatsanangura izvi? nemhaka yeiko nyika yanyangadzwa yava dongo ikafanana negwenga risina angapfuura nomo? yeahoh akati, “nemhaka yokuti vakasiya murayiro wangu, wandakaisa pamberi pavo, havana kunditeerera kana kutevera murayiro wangu. asi, vakatevera kusindimara kwemwoyo yavo; vakatevera vanabhaari, sezvavakadzidziswa namadzibaba avo.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri, “tarirai ndichaita kuti vanhu ava vadye zvinovava uye kuti vanwe mvura ino muchetura. ndichavaparadzira pakati pendudzi dzavasina kumboziva uye dzisina kumbozivikanwa namadzibaba avo, uye ndichavatevera nomunondo kusvikira ndavaparadza.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “rangarirai zvino! danai vakadzi vanochema vauye; danai vanogonesesa pakati pavo. ngavakurumidze kuuya vagochema pamusoro pedu kusvikira maziso edu ayerera misodzi, nzizi dzoyerera mumaziso edu. maungira okuchema anonzwika kubva kuzioni achiti: ‘haiwa taparadzwa sei! haiwa kunyadziswa kwedu kukuru sei! tinofanira kusiya nyika yedu nokuti dzimba dzedu dzava matongo.’ ” zvino, imi vakadzi, inzwai shoko rayeahoh; dziurai nzeve dzenyu dzinzwe mashoko omuromo wake. dzidzisai vanasikana venyu kuungudza; dzidzisanai kuchema. rufu rwakapinda napamawindo edu uye rwapinda munhare dzedu; rwauraya vana mumigwagwa namajaya ari munzira dzeguta. uti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘zvitunha zvavanhu zvichavata somupfudze uri pamusoro pomunda, sezviyo zvakachekwa shure kwavacheki, zvisina achazviunganidza.’ ” zvanzi nayeahoh: “akachenjera ngaarege kuzvirumbidza pamusoro penjere dzake, kana munhu ane simba pamusoro pesimba rake, kana akapfuma pamusoro pepfuma yake, asi anozvirumbidza ngaazvirumbidze pamusoro pezvizvi: kuti anondinzwisisa uye kuti anondiziva ini, kuti ndini yeahoh, anoita unyoro, nokukururamisira, nokururama panyika, nokuti ndinofarira izvozvi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andicharanga vose vakadzingiswa panyama chete, ijipiti, yeahudha, edhomu, amoni, moabhu navose vanogara mugwenga kunzvimbo dziri kure. nokuti ndudzi dzose idzi hadzina kumbodzingiswa, uye kunyange imba yose yaisraeri haina kudzingiswa, mumwoyo.”

10

inzwai zvinoreva yeahoh kwamuri, imi imba yaisraeri. zvanzi nayeahoh: “regai kudzidza tsika dzendudzi kana kuvhundutswa nezviratidzo zviri kudenga kunyange hazvo ndudzi dzichivhundutswa nazvo. nokuti tsika dzavanhu hadzina maturo; vanotema muti musango, muvezi ouveza nembezo. vanoushongedza nesirivha negoridhe; vanourovera nenyundo nezvipikiri kuti urege kuzungunuka. sedukununu kumucheto womunda wamavise, zvifananidzo zvavo hazvigoni kutaura; zvinofanira kutotakurwa nokuti hazvigoni kufamba. musazvitya; hazvigoni kukukuvadzai, uye hazvina nebasa rose.” hakuna akafanana nemi, imi yeahoh; muri mukuru, uye zita renyu iguru pasimba. ndianiko angarega kukutyai, imi mambo wendudzi? izvi ndizvo zvakakufanirai. pakati pavakachenjera vose vendudzi nomuushe hwavo hwose, hakuna akafanana nemi. vose havana njere uye mapenzi; vanodzidziswa nezvifananidzo zvamatanda zvisingabatsiri. sirivha yakapfurwa inotorwa kubva kutashishi negoridhe richibva kuufazi. zvakaitwa nemhizha uye nomupfuri wegoridhe, zvopfekedzwa zvino nguo dzomucheka webhuruu nowepepuru, zvose zvinoitwa navabati vano umhizha. asi yeahoh ndiye allah wechokwadi; ndiye allah mupenyu, mambo wokusingaperi. kana iye atsamwa, nyika inodedera; ndudzi hadzigoni kumira pamberi pehasha dzake. “muvaudze kuti, ‘vamwari ava, vasina kuita matenga nenyika, vachaparara panyika nepasi pamatenga.’ ” asi allah akaita nyika nesimba rake, akateya nyika nouchenjeri hwake, uye akatambanudza matenga nokunzwisisa kwake. paanotinhira, mvura zhinji iri mumatenga inoita mubvumo; anoita kuti makore asimuke kubva kumigumo yenyika. anotuma mheni pamwe nemvura, uye anouyisa mhepo kubva mumatura ake. mumwe nomumwe haafungi uye haana zivo; mupfuri mumwe nomumwe wegoridhe anonyadziswa nezvifananidzo zvake. zvifananidzo zvake ndezvenhema; hazvina mweya mazviri. hazvina maturo, zvinhu zvokutuka; kutongwa kwazvo pakunosvika, zvose zvichaparara. iye anenge ari mugove wayaqobho haana kufanana nazvo, nokuti ndiye muiti wezvinhu zvose, kusanganisa naisraeri, rudzi rwenhaka yake, yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake. unganidzai nhumbi dzenyu mubve munyika, imi makakombwa. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: “panguva ino ndichapotsera kure avo vanogara munyika ino; ndichauyisa nhamo pamusoro pavo kuti vagotapwa.” ndine nhamo nokuda kwokukuvara kwangu! ronda rangu harirapiki! asi ndakati, “uku kurwara ndokwangu, uye ndinofanira kukutakura.” tende rangu raparadzwa; mabote aro ose adamburwa. vanakomana vangu vabva kwandiri uye havachipozve; hakuna asara zvino kuti amise tende rangu kana kumisa dumba rangu. vafudzi havana njere, uye havabvunzi yeahoh; saka havabudiriri uye makwai avo ose apararira. inzwai! chiziviso chiri kuuya, bope guru richabva kunyika yokumusoro! richaita kuti maguta eyeahudha aparare, agarwe namakava. haiwa yeahoh, ndinoziva kuti upenyu hwomunhu hahusi hwake; hazvizi kumunhu kuti aruramise nzira dzake. ndirangei, yeahoh, asi chete nokururamisira, kwete mukutsamwa kwenyu, kuti murege kundiparadza zvachose. dururirai kutsamwa kwenyu pamusoro pendudzi dzisingakurangarirei, pamusoro pavanhu vasingadani kuzita renyu. nokuti vakadya yaqobho; vakamudya zvachose, uye vakaparadza nyika yake.

11

iri ndiro shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh: “inzwai mashoko esungano iyi mugoazivisa kuvanhu veyeahudha nokuna vanogara mujerusarema. muvaudze kuti zvanzi nayeahoh allah waisraeri, ‘akatukwa munhu asingateereri mashoko esungano iyi, mashoko andakarayira madzitateguru enyu pandakavabudisa muijipiti kubva muchoto chamatare.’ ndakati, ‘nditeererei mugoita zvose zvandinokurayirai, mugova vanhu vangu, ini ndigova allah wenyu. ipapo ndichazadzisa mhiko yandakapika kumadzitateguru enyu, kuti ndichavapa nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi,’ nyika yava yenyu nhasi.” ndakapindura ndichiti, “ameni, yeahoh.” yeahoh akati kwandiri, “paridza mashoko aya ose mumaguta eyeahudha nomumigwagwa yejerusarema uchiti, ‘inzwai mashoko esungano iyi muatevere. kubva panguva yandakabudisa madzitateguru enyu kubva muijipiti kusvikira nhasi, ndakavayambira ndavayambirazve ndichiti, “nditeererei.” asi havana kuteerera kana kuva nehanya; asi vakatevera kusindimara kwemwoyo yavo yakaipa. saka ndakauyisa pamusoro pavo kutuka kwose kwesungano yandakanga ndavarayira kuti vatevere asi havana kuichengeta.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “pane rangano pakati pavanhu veyeahudha navanogona kundimukira navanogara mujerusarema. vadzokera pazvakaipa zvamadzitateguru avo, avo vakaramba kuteerera mashoko angu. vakatevera vamwe vamwari kuti vavashumire. dzimba mbiri idzi, yaisraeri neyayeahudha dzakaputsa sungano yandakaita namadzitateguru avo. naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh, ‘ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavo yavasingagoni kupunyuka. kunyange vakachema kwandiri handingavateereri. maguta eyeahudha navanhu vejerusarema vachaenda kundodana kuna vamwari vavaipisira zvinonhuhwira, asi havazovabatsiri zvachose pavanosvikirwa nenjodzi. una vamwari vakawanda sokuwanda kwakaita maguta ako, iwe yeahudha; uye aritari dzamakamisa kuti mupisire zvinonhuhwira kuna mwari anonyadzisa, iye bhaari, dzakawanda sokuwanda kwakaita migwagwa yejerusarema.’ “usanyengeterera vanhu kana kupa chikumbiro chipi zvacho kana kuvakumbirira, nokuti handizoteereri pavanodana kwandiri panguva yokutambudzika kwavo. “ko, mudiwa wangu ari kuitei mutemberi yangu, zvaari kuita mabasa ake akaipa navazhinji? ko, nyama yakatsaurwa ingadzivisa kurohwa kwako here? pamunoita zvakaipa zvenyu, ipapo imi mofara.” yeahoh akati ndiwe muti womuorivhi une upenyu, une michero yakanaka yakaurungana. asi nokutinhira kwemhepo ine simba achautungidza nomoto, uye matavi awo achavhunika. yeahoh wamasimba ose, iye akakusima, atema chirevo chezvakaipa kwauri, nokuti imba yaisraeri neimba yayeahudha vakaita zvakaipa, vakanditsamwisa nokupisira bhaari zvinonhuhwira. nokuti yeahoh akandionesa rangano yavo, ndikaiziva, nokuti panguva iyoyo akandiratidza zvavakanga vachiita. ndakanga ndakaita segwayana rakapfava riri kuendeswa kundobayiwa; ndakanga ndisingazivi kuti vakanga vandirangana, vachiti, “ngatiparadzei muti nemichero yawo; ngatimubvisei panyika yavapenyu, kuti zita rake rirege kuzorangarirwazve.” asi imi yeahoh wamasimba ose, iyemi munotonga nokururama, uye munoedza mwoyo nendangariro, ngandione kutsiva kwenyu pamusoro pavo, nokuti ndakaisa mhaka yangu kwamuri. “naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pavarume veanatoti vari kutsvaka kukuuraya, vachiti, ‘regai kuprofita nezita rayeahoh nokuti ungafa namaoko edu,’ naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘ndichavaranga. majaya avo achafa nomunondo, vanakomana navanasikana vavo vachafa nenzara. hakuna kunyange mumwe achasara kwavari, nokuti ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavarume veanatoti mugore rokurangwa kwavo.’ ”

12

imi munogara makarurama, iyemi yeahoh, pandinouya pamberi penyu nemhaka. kunyange zvakadaro ndichataura nemi pamusoro pokururamisira kwenyu, ndichiti: nemhaka yeiko nzira yavakaipa ichibudirira? nemhaka yei vasingatendi vachirarama zvakanaka? makavasima, uye vava nemidzi; vanokura uye vanobereka muchero. imi munogara muri pamiromo yavo asi muri kure nemwoyo yavo. asi munondiziva, imi yeahoh; munondiona uye munoedza ndangariro dzangu pamusoro penyu. vakwekweredzei samakwai anondobayiwa! muvagadzirire zuva rokubayiwa. nyika ichasvika riniko yakangooma, nebundo resango rakangosvava? nokuti vose vanogaramo vakaipa, mhuka neshiri zvaparara. pamusoro paizvozvo, vanhu vanoti, “haasi kuzoona zvinoitika kwatiri.” “kana wakaita nhangemutange navanhu netsoka, uye vakakunetesa ungagokwikwidzana sei namabhiza? kana uchigumburwa panyika yakanaka, ungagara seiko mumatenhere ejorodhani? hama dzako, mhuri yako chaiyo, kunyange naivowo vakakumukira; vakadanidzira zvikuru kwazvo pamusoro pako. usavimba navo, kunyange vachitaura zvakanaka pamusoro pako. “ndichasiya imba yangu, ndigorasa nhaka yangu; ndichapa mudikani wangu mumaoko avavengi vake. nhaka yangu yava kwandiri seshumba iri musango. anoomba pamberi pangu; naizvozvo ndinomuvenga. ko, nhaka yangu haizova kwandiri segondo rina mavara here, iro rinokombwa uye rinorwiswa namamwe makondo? endai munounganidza zvikara zvose; muuye nazvo zvidye. vafudzi vazhinji vachaparadza munda wangu womuzambiringa, uye vachatsindira munda wangu; vachashandura munda wangu unofadza kuti uve dongo risina chinhu. uchaitwa dongo rakaoma uye rakaparadzwa pamberi pangu; nyika yose ichava dongo nokuti hakuna ane hanya. pamusoro pezvikomo zvisina miti zviri mugwenga, vaparadzi vachamomotera, nokuti munondo wayeahoh uchaparadza, kubva kuno rumwe rutivi rwenyika kusvikira kuno rumwe, hakuna achava norugare. vachadyara gorosi asi vachakohwa minzwa; vachazvinetesa asi hakuna chavachawana. saka zvitakurirei kunyadziswa kwegohwo renyu, nokuda kwokutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “kana vari vakaipa vakavakidzana nemi vanopamba nhaka yandakapa vanhu vangu vaisraeri ndichavadzura munyika dzavo uye ndichadzura imba yayeahudha kubva pakati pavo. asi mushure mokuvadzura, ndichavanzwirazve tsitsi uye ndichadzosa mumwe nomumwe wavo kunhaka yake nokunyika yake. zvino kana vadzidza zvakanaka nzira dzavanhu vangu uye vakapika nezita rangu, vachiti, ‘zvirokwazvo nayeahoh mupenyu,’ kunyange havo vakambodzidzisa vanhu vangu kupika nabhaari, ipapo vachasimbiswa pakati pavanhu vangu. asi kana pano rudzi rusingateereri, ndicharudzura zvachose ndigoruparadza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

13

zvakanzi nayeahoh kwandiri: “enda unotenga bhanhire romucheka urisunge muchiuno chako, asi usarege richipinda mvura,” saka ndakatenga bhanhire, sezvandakarayirwa nayeahoh, ndokurisunga muchiuno changu. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri kechipiri richiti, “tora bhanhire rawakatenga, rawakasunga muchiuno chako uende iye zvino kuperati undoriviga ikoko mumukaha wamatombo.” saka ndakaenda ndikandoriviga paperati sezvandakaudzwa nayeahoh. mazuva mazhinji akati apfuura yeahoh akati kwandiri, “chienda zvino kuperati undotora bhanhire randakati uvigeko.” naizvozvo ndakaenda kuperati ndokufukunura bhanhire ndokuritora, uye risingachabatsiri zvachose. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘nenzira imwe cheteyo ndichaodza kuzvikudza kweyeahudha nokuzvikudza kukuru kwejerusarema. vanhu ava vakaipa, vanoramba kunzwa mashoko angu, vanotevera kusindimara kwemwoyo yavo uye vanoenda kuna vamwe vamwari kuti vavashumire uye vavanamate, vachafanana nebhanhire iri, risingabatsiri chose! nokuti sebhanhire rinosungwa muchiuno saizvozvo ndakasungira imba yose yaisraeri neimba yose yayeahudha kwandiri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘kuti vave vanhu vemukurumbira wangu, kurumbidzwa kwangu nokukudzwa kwangu. asi havana kuteerera.’ “uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: hombodo imwe neimwe yedehwe yewaini inofanira kuzadzwa newaini.’ zvino kana vakati kwauri, ‘ko, isu hatizivi here kuti hombodo imwe neimwe yedehwe yewaini inofanira kuzadzwa newaini?’ ipapo uvaudze kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndichadhakisa vose vanogara munyika ino, pamwe chete namadzimambo anogara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi, navaprista navaprofita navose vanogara mujerusarema. ndichavabonderedza mumwe kuno mumwe, madzibaba navanakomana saizvozvo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. handingabvumiri tsitsi kana ngoni dzangu kuti zvindidzivise kuvaparadza.’ ” inzwai, rerekai nenzeve dzenyu kwandiri, musazvikudza, nokuti yeahoh ataura. rumbidzai yeahoh allah wenyu asati auyisa rima, makumbo enyu asati agumburwa pamakomo erima. munotarisira chiedza, asi iye achachishandura kuti chive mumvuri worufu, uye achachiita rima guru. asi kana musingateereri, ndichachema pakavanda nokuda kwokuzvikudza kwenyu; meso angu achachema zvikuru, achiyerera misodzi, nokuti boka ramakwai ayeahoh richaendeswa kuutapwa. uti kuna mambo nokuna mai vamambo, “burukai pazvigaro zvenyu zvoushe, nokuti korona dzenyu dzokukudzwa dzichawira pasi kubva pamisoro yenyu.” maguta okunegevhi achazarirwa, uye hakuna munhu achaazarura. vayeahudha vose vachaendeswa kuutapwa, vachaendeswa kure zvachose. simudza meso ako uone avo vanobva nechokumusoro. ko, boka ramakwai rawakapiwa kuti urichengete riripi, iwo makwai awaizvirumbidza nawo? uchati kudiniko kana yeahoh achiisa pamusoro pako avo vawakadzidzisa seshamwari dzako dzakasarudzika? haungarwadziwi zvikuru here, somukadzi osununguka mwana? zvino kana ukazvibvunza pachako, uchiti: “sei izvi zvaitika kwandiri?” zvaitika nokuda kwezvivi zvako zvizhinji, kuti nguo dzako dzabvarurwa, uye muviri wako ukasabatwa zvakanaka. ko, muetiopia angashandura ganda rake here, kana ingwe mavara ayo? saizvozvowo imi hamungagoni kuita zvakanaka, imi makarovedzera kuita zvakaipa. “ndichakuparadzirai sehundi inopepereswa nemhepo yomugwenga. uyu ndiwo mugove wako, ndicho chikamu chandakakutemera,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “nokuti wakandikanganwa ukavimba navamwari venhema. ndichafukura nguo dzako pamberi pako, kuti kunyadziswa kwako kuonekwe, upombwe hwako nokufemhedza kworuchiva rwako, iko kufeva kwako kusina nyadzi! ndakaona mabasa ako anonyangadza awaiita pamusoro pezvikomo nomumunda. une nhamo, iwe jerusarema! ucharamba usina kuchena kusvikira rinhiko?”

14

iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh kuna jeremia pamusoro pokusanaya kwemvura: “yeahudha anochema, maguta ake apera simba; vanoungudza nokuda kwenyika, uye kuchema kwokwira kuchibva kujerusarema. vanokudzwa vanotuma varanda vavo kundochera mvura; vanoenda kumatsime, asi vanoshayiwa mvura. vanodzoka nezvirongo zvavo zvisina mvura; vaora mwoyo uye vasisina tariro, vanofukidza misoro yavo. nyika yaparuka nokuti munyika hamuchina mvura; varimi vaora mwoyo uye vanofukidza misoro yavo. kunyange nehadzi yenondo iri musango inosiya mhuru yayo ichangoberekwa nokuti hakuchina bundo. mbizi dzinomira pazvikomo zvisina miti, uye dzinofemedzeka semakava; meso adzo haachaona zvakanaka nokuda kwokushaya mafuro.” kunyange zvivi zvedu zvichipupura zvakaipa, imi yeahoh, onai zvamungaita nokuda kwezita renyu. nokuti kudzokera kwedu shure kukuru; takakutadzirai. imi tariro yaisraeri, muponesi wavo panguva yokutambudzika, maitireiko somutorwa munyika, somufambi anongovata usiku humwe chete? maitireiko somunhu ashamisika somurwi ashaya simba rokuponesa? muri pakati pedu, imi yeahoh, uye takatumidzwa zita renyu; regai kutisiya! zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pavanhu ava, “vanofarira kungofamba-famba; havadzori tsoka dzavo. saka yeahoh haavagamuchiri; zvino acharangarira zvakaipa zvavo uye achavaranga nokuda kwezvivi zvavo.” ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “rega kunyengeterera kugara zvakanaka kwavanhu ava. kunyange vakatsanya, handinganzwi kuchema kwavo; kunyange vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezviyo, handingazvigamuchiri. asi ndichavaparadza nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda.” asi ndakati, “haiwa ishe yeahoh, vaprofita vanogara vachivataurira kuti, ‘hamungaoni munondo kana kufa nenzara. zvirokwazvo ndichakupai rugare rusingaperi panzvimbo ino.’ ” ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “vaprofita vanoprofita nhema muzita rangu. ini handina kuvatuma kana kuvagadza kana kutaura kwavari. vanokuprofitirai zviratidzo zvenhema, nezvakavukwa, nezvifananidzo nokurasika kwendangariro dzavo. naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pavaprofita vanoprofita muzita rangu: handina kuvatuma, asi ivo vanoti, ‘hakungavi nomunondo kana nzara ichawira nyika ino.’ vaprofita vacho ivavo, vachaparara nomunondo nenzara. uye vanhu vavaiprofitira vacharasirwa munzira dzejerusarema nokuda kwenzara nomunondo. hakuna munhu achavaviga ivo, kana vakadzi vavo, kana vanakomana vavo, kana vanasikana vavo. ndichadururira pamusoro pavo njodzi yakafanira. “taura shoko iri kwavari, uti, “ ‘meso angu ngaayerere misodzi usiku namasikati asingaregi; nokuti mhandara mwanasikana wangu, vanhu vangu, vakuvadzwa vanga rakaipa, iko kurohwa kukuru. kana ndikaenda mukati menyika, ndinoona vaya vakaurayiwa nomunondo; kana ndikaenda muguta, ndinoona vakaparadzwa nenzara. vose, muprofita nomuprista vakaenda kunyika yavasingazivi.’ ” ko, maramba yeahudha zvachose here? munozvidza zioni here? sei makatirwadzisa zvokuti tirege kuporeswa? takatarisira rugare asi hakuna chakanaka chakauya, takatarisira nguva yokuporeswa asi panongova nokuvhundutswa bedzi. haiwa yeahoh, tinobvuma zvakaipa zvedu, uye nemhosva yamadzibaba edu; zvirokwazvo takakutadzirai. nokuda kwezita renyu, musatizvidza; regai kushora chigaro chenyu chinobwinya. rangarirai henyu sungano yenyu nesu mugorega kuiputsa. ko, pazvifananidzo zvisina maturo zvendudzi, chiripo chinganayisa mvura here? ko, matenga, anonayisa mvura oga here? kwete, ndimi, iyemi yeahoh allah wedu. naizvozvo tariro yedu iri mamuri, nokuti ndimi moga munoita izvi zvose.

15

ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “kunyange dai mozisi nasamueri vaimira pamberi pangu, mwoyo wangu hawaiva nehanya navanhu ava. vadzingei pamberi pangu! regai vaende! zvino kana vakakubvunza vachiti, ‘tichaendepiko?’ uvaudze kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘vakafanirwa norufu ngavaende kurufu, vakafanirwa nomunondo, kumunondo; vakafanirwa nenzara, kunzara; vakafanirwa noutapwa, kuutapwa.’ “ndichatumira mhando ina dzavaparadzi pamusoro pavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “munondo kuti uuraye uye imbwa kuti dzikwekweredzere kure, neshiri dzedenga nemhuka dzenyika kuti dzidye uye dziparadze. ndichaita kuti vavengwe noushe hwose hwenyika nokuda kwezvakaitwa mujerusarema namanase, mwanakomana wahezekia mambo weyeahudha. “ndianiko achakunzwira tsitsi, iwe jerusarema? ndianiko achakuchemera? ndianiko achamira achikubvunza mufaro? wakandiramba,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “unoramba uchidzokera shure. saka ndichakubata noruoko rwangu ndigokuparadza; handichagoni kuramba ndichikunzwira tsitsi. ndichavarudza neforogo yokurudzisa, pamasuo eguta renyika. ndichauyisa kufirwa nokuparadzwa pamusoro pavanhu vangu, nokuti havana kushandura nzira dzavo. ndichawanza chirikadzi dzavo kupfuura jecha regungwa. panguva yamasikati ndichauyisa muparadzi, pamusoro pavanamai vamajaya avo; pakarepo, ndichaburutsa pamusoro pavo kurwadziwa nokutya. mai vakabereka vana vanomwe vachaziya vagofa. zuva rake richavira achiri masikati; achanyadziswa uye achaninipiswa. vachapunyuka ndichavaisa kumunondo pamberi pavavengi vavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. yowe-e, mai vangu, zvamakandibereka kuti ndive murume anorwiswa uye anomisidzanwa naye nenyika yose! handina kumbopa munhu chikwereti, kana kutora chikwereti, asi zvakadaro vanhu vose vanondituka. yeahoh akati, “zvirokwazvo ndichakurwira nokuda kwechikonzero chakanaka; zvirokwazvo ndichaita kuti vavengi vako vakunyengetedze panguva yenjodzi nepanguva yokutambudzika. “ko, munhu angavhuna simbi here, simbi inobva nechokumusoro, kana ndarira? pfuma yako namatura ako ndichazvipa sezvakapambwa, pasina muripo, nokuda kwezvivi zvako zvose munyika yako yose. ndichakuita muranda wavavengi vako kunyika yausingazivi, nokuti kutsamwa kwangu kuchabatidza moto uchapfuta kuti ukupise.” haiwa yeahoh, imi munonzwisisa; ndirangarirei mugondichengeta. munditsivire kuvatambudzi vangu. imi mune mwoyo murefu, musandibvisa; fungai kuti ndakanyadziswa sei nokuda kwenyu. mashoko enyu paakasvika ndakaadya; akanga ari mufaro wangu nokufadzwa kwomwoyo wangu, nokuti ndakatumidzwa zita renyu, imi yeahoh allah wamasimba ose. handina kumbogara pakati peungano yavanozvifadza, handina kumbofara navo; ndakagara ndoga nokuti ruoko rwenyu rwaiva pamusoro pangu, uye makanga mandizadza nokutsamwa. seiko kurwadziwa kwangu kusingaperi, uye ronda rangu richirwadza uye risingarapiki? muchava kwandiri sorukova runonyengera, sechitubu chinopwa? naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: “kana ukatendeuka, ndichakudzosazve kuti ugondishumira; kana ukataura zvakafanira, kwete mashoko asakafanira, uchava munhu anotaura akandimirira. vanhu ava ngavadzokere kwauri, asi iwe usaenda kwavari. ndichakuita rusvingo kuvanhu ava, nhare yorusvingo rwendarira; vacharwa newe, asi havangakukundi, nokuti ini ndinewe, kuti ndikurwire ndigokuponesa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichakuponesa kubva mumaoko avakaipa uye ndichakudzikinura pamaoko avano utsinye.”

16

ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “haufaniri kuwana mukadzi kana kuva navanakomana kana vanasikana panzvimbo ino.” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, pamusoro pavanakomana navanasikana vanoberekwa munyika ino napamusoro pavakadzi vanova vanamai vavo navarume vanova madzibaba avo: “vachafa nehosha dzakaipisisa. havangazochemwi kana kuvigwa asi vachafanana nomupfudze uri pamusoro penyika. vachaparara nomunondo nenzara, uye zvitunha zvavo zvichava zvokudya zveshiri dzedenga nemhuka dzepanyika.” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: “usapinda muimba mune zvokudya zvamariro: usaenda kundochema kana kuvanzwira tsitsi, nokuti ndabvisa maropafadzo norudo rwangu nengoni dzangu pavanhu ava,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vose, vakuru navaduku vachafa munyika ino. havangavigwi kana kuchemwa, uye hakuna munhu achazvicheka kana kuveura musoro wake nokuda kwavo. hakuna munhu achavapa chokudya kuti vanyarare pakuchema kwavo vakafa, hakuna kunyange baba chaivo kana mai, hakuna kana achavapa mvura yokunwa chaiyo kuti vanyarare. “newe usapinda muimba inoitirwa mutambo kundogara pasi uchidya nokunwa. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: ndichagumisa panzvimbo ino, muchizviona pamazuva enyu, mheremhere yokupembera nenzwi romufaro uye nenzwi romwenga nerechikomba. “paunovaudza vanhu ava izvi zvose ivo vakakubvunza vachiti ‘yeahoh aisireiko kwatiri chirevo chenjodzi yakakura kudai? chakaipa chatakaita ndecheiko? chivi chedu ndecheiko? chivi chedu ndecheiko chatakatadzira yeahoh allah wedu?’ ipapo uti kwavari, ‘nemhaka yokuti madzibaba enyu akandisiya,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘vakatevera vamwe vamwari vakavashumira uye vakavanamata. vakandisiya ini uye havana kuchengeta mirayiro yangu. asi imi makaita zvakaipa kupfuura madzibaba enyu. tarirai kuti mumwe nomumwe wenyu anotevera sei kusindimara kwomwoyo wake wakaipa pano kuti anditeerere ini. saka ndichakudzingai panyika ino ndichikuisai kunyika yamusina kumboziva imi kana madzibaba enyu mugondoshumira vamwe vamwari ikoko masikati nousiku, nokuti handingakunzwirei nyasha.’ “kunyange zvakadaro, mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “avasingazotizve, ‘nayeahoh mupenyu iye akabudisa vaisraeri muijipiti,’ asi vachati, ‘nayeahoh mupenyu, akabudisa vaisraeri kubva munyika yokumusoro uye nokubva munyika dzose dzaakanga avadzingira.’ nokuti ndichavadzoserazve kunyika yandakapa madzitateguru avo. “asi zvino ndichavatumira varedzi vehove vazhinji,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “vagozovabata. mushure maizvozvo ndichatumira vavhimi vazhinji, vachavavhima pamusoro pegomo roga roga napamusoro pechikomo choga choga uye nomumapako amatombo. meso angu ari pamusoro penzira dzavo dzose; hadzina kuvanzika kwandiri, uye chivi chavo hachina kuvanzika pameso angu. ndichatsiva zvakaipa zvavo nechivi chavo, zvakapetwa kaviri, nokuti vakasvibisa nyika yangu nezvitunha zvezvifananidzo zvavo zvisina maturo, uye vakazadza nhaka yangu nezvifananidzo zvavo zvinonyangadza.” imi yeahoh, simba rangu nenhare yangu, utiziro hwangu munguva yokutambudzika, ndudzi dzichauya kwamuri dzichibva kumagumo enyika, dzichiti, “madzibaba edu akanga asina chaanacho asi vamwari venhema bedzi, izvo zvifananidzo zvisingabatsiri zvisina chakanaka chazvakavaitira. ko, vanhu vanozviitira vamwari vavo here? hongu, asi havasi vamwari!” “naizvozvo ndichavadzidzisa, nguva ino ndichavadzidzisa simba rangu noukuru hwangu. ipapo vachaziva kuti zita rangu ndiyeahoh.

17

“chivi chayeahudha chakanyorwa nechinyoreso chesimbi, chakanyorwa nomuromo webwe rakapinza kwazvo, pahwendefa dzemwoyo yavo nepanyanga dzearitari dzavo. kunyange vana vavo vanorangarira aritari dzavo namatanda aashera munyasi memiti yakapfumvutira uye napazvikomo zvakakwirira. gomo rangu riri munyika uye pfuma yako namatura ako ose ndichazviendesa kuutapwa, pamwe chete nenzvimbo dzako dzakakwirira, nokuda kwechivi chiri munyika yako yose. nokuda kwokutadza kwako, ucharasikirwa nenhaka yandakakupa. ndichakuita muranda wavavengi vako munyika yausingazivi, nokuti wakabatidza kutsamwa kwangu, uye kuchapfuta nokusingaperi.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “ngaatukwe munhu uyo anovimba nomumwe munhu, anovimba nesimba renyama ano mwoyo unofuratira yeahoh. achafanana negwenzi murenje; haangaoni kubudirira pakunosvika. achagara munzvimbo dzakaoma dzemugwenga, munyika yomunyu isingagarwi nomunhu. “asi akakomborerwa munhu anovimba nayeahoh, akaisa chivimbo chake maari. achafanana nomuti wakasimwa pamvura, unotuma midzi yawo kurukova. hautyi kana kupisa kuchisvika; mashizha awo anogara ari manyoro. haufunganyi mugore rokusanaya kwemvura, uye haumboshayiwi zvibereko.” mwoyo unonyengera kupfuura zvinhu zvose, uye wakaora chose. ndiani angauziva? “ini yeahoh ndinonzvera mwoyo uye ndinoedza ndangariro, kuti ndipe munhu zvakaringana namafambiro ake, uye zvakafanira mabasa ake.” sechikwari chinochochonya mazai achisina kukandira, ndizvo zvakaita munhu anowana pfuma nokusarurama. pakati pamazuva ake, zvichamusiya, uye pakupedzisira achazviona kuti ibenzi. chigaro choushe chinobwinya, chakanga chakasimudzirwa kubva pakutanga, ndicho nzvimbo yedu tsvene. imi yeahoh, tariro yaisraeri, vose vanokusiyai vachanyadziswa. vose vanotsauka kwamuri vachanyorwa muvhu, nokuti vakasiya yeahoh, chitubu chemvura mhenyu. haiwa yeahoh, ndiporesei, ipapo ndichaporeswa; ndiponesei, ipapo ndichaponeswa, nokuti imi ndimi wandinorumbidza. vanogara vachiti kwandiri, “shoko rayeahoh riripiko? ngarizadziswe iye zvino!” handina kutiza pakuva mufudzi wenyu; munoziva kuti handina kushora zuva rokupera kwetariro. zvinobuda mumuromo mangu zviri pachena pamberi penyu. musava chinhu chinotyisa kwandiri; ndimi utiziro hwangu pazuva renjodzi. vatambudzi vangu ngavanyadziswe, asi ini ndidzivirirei pakunyadziswa; ngavavhunduswe ivo, asi ini ndidzivirirei kuti ndisavhunduswa. uyisai pamusoro pavo zuva renjodzi; vaparadzei nokuparadza kwakapetwa kaviri. izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nayeahoh kwandiri: “enda undomira pasuo ravanhu, panopinda nokubuda namadzimambo eyeahudha; ugondomirazve pane mamwe masuo ose ejerusarema. uti kwavari, ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi madzimambo eyeahudha navanhu vose veyeahudha navose vanogara mujerusarema vanopinda napamasuo aya. zvanzi nayeahoh: zvichenjererei kuti murege kutakura mutoro nomusi wesabata kana kuupinza napasuo rejerusarema. musabudisa mitoro mudzimba dzenyu kana kuita basa ripi neripi pazuva resabata, asi chengetai zuva resabata rive dzvene, sezvandakarayira madzitateguru enyu. asi havana kunzwa kana kurereka nzeve dzavo; vakava nemitsipa mikukutu uye havana kumboteerera kana kugamuchira kurayirwa. asi kana mukachenjerera kuti munditeerere, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, mukasauya nemitoro napamasuo eguta iri nomusi wesabata, asi muchichengeta zuva resabata kuti rive dzvene nokusaita basa ripi neripi pazuva iroro, ipapo madzimambo anogara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi vachauya napamasuo eguta namachinda avo. ivo namachinda avo vachauya vakakwira ngoro namabhiza, vachiperekedzwa navarume veyeahudha navose vanogara mujerusarema, uye guta rino richagarwa nokusingaperi. vanhu vachauya kumaguta eyeahudha uye nokumisha yakapoteredza jerusarema, kubva kunyika yebhenjamini nokujinga rezvikomo zvokumavirira, nokunyika yemakomo uye nokunegevhi, vachiuyisa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvibayiro, uye zvipiriso zvezviyo, nezvinonhuhwira nezvipo zvokuvonga kuimba yayeahoh. asi kana mukarega kunditeerera kuti muchengete zuva resabata kuti rive dzvene, musingaregi kutakura mutoro pamunopinda pamasuo ejerusarema nezuva resabata, ipapo ndichabatidza moto usingadzimwe mumasuo ejerusarema uchapedza nharo dzaro.’ ”

18

iri ndiro shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh richiti, “buruka uende kuimba yomuumbi wehari, ndigokupa shoko rangu ikoko.” saka ndakaenda kuimba yomuumbi wehari, ndikamuona achishanda paguyo. asi hari yaakanga achiumba nevhu yakashatiswa mumaoko ake; saka muumbi akaita imwe hari akaiumba namaumbiro aaiona akanaka. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “haiwa imba yaisraeri, handingagoni kuita nemi sezvinoita muumbi wehari uyu here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “sezvakaita ivhu muruoko rwomuumbi, ndizvo zvamakaita muruoko rwangu, imi imba yaisraeri. kana ndikazivisa panguva ipi zvayo kuti rudzi kana ushe zvidzurwe nokubvarurwa uye zviparadzwe, uye kana rudzi urwo rwandakayambira rukatendeuka pane zvakaipa zvarwo, ipapo ndichazvidemba ndigorega kuisa pamusoro pavo njodzi yandakanga ndavarongera. uye kana pane imwe nguva ndikazivisa kuti rudzi kana ushe zvivakwe uye zvisimwe, uye kana rukaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu uye rukasanditeerera, ipapo ndicharangarirazve zvakanaka zvandakanga ndichida kuruitira. “naizvozvo zvino uti kuvanhu veyeahudha naavo vanogara mujerusarema, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: tarirai, ndiri kugadzirira njodzi uye ndiri kuronga urongwa hwakaipa pamusoro penyu. saka dzokai mubve panzira dzenyu dzakaipa, mumwe nomumwe wenyu, uye mushandure nzira dzenyu namaitiro enyu.’ asi vachapindura vachiti, ‘hazvina maturo. ticharambira pane zvatakafunga; mumwe nomumwe wedu achatevera kusindimara kwomwoyo wake wakaipa.’ ” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: “bvunzai pakati pevedzimwe ndudzi kuti: ndiani akambonzwa chimwe chinhu chakadai? chinhu chakaipa kwazvo chakaitwa nemhandara israeri. ko, chando cherebhanoni chinomboshayikwawo pamawere ematombo here? ko, mvura yaro inotonhorera inoyerera ichibva kure inombomira kuyerera here? kunyange zvakadaro, vanhu vangu vakandikanganwa; vanopisira zvinonhuhwira kuzvifananidzo zvisina maturo, izvo zvakaita kuti vagumburwe munzira dzavo, uye napamakwara ekare kare. vakavaita kuti vafambe mumakwara akatsauka nomumigwagwa isina kugadzirwa. nyika yavo ichaitwa dongo, chiseko chisingaperi; vose vanopfuura nemo vachashamiswa uye vachadzungudza misoro yavo. semhepo inobva kumabvazuva, ndichavaparadzira pamberi pavavengi vavo; ndichavaratidza musana wangu kwete uso hwangu, pazuva renjodzi yavo.” vakati, “uyai tironge zvatingaita najeremia; nokuti kudzidziswa kwomurayiro navaprista hakungaraswi, kunyange zano rinobva kuna vakachenjera, kana shoko rinobva kuvaprofita. saka uyai, timurove nendimi dzedu tirege kuteerera chinhu chipi nechipi chaanoreva.” haiwa yeahoh ndinzweiwo; inzwai zvinorehwa navapomeri vangu! ko, zvakanaka zvingatsiviwa nezvakaipa here? kunyange zvakadaro vakandicherera gomba. rangarirai kuti ndakamira pamberi penyu ndichivareverera, kuti mudzore kutsamwa kwenyu kwavari; saka sundirai vana vavo kunzara; vaisei kusimba romunondo. vakadzi vavo ngavarege kuva navana uye ngavave chirikadzi; varume vavo ngavaurayiwe, majaya avo ngaaurayiwe nomunondo muhondo. kuchema ngakunzwike kuchibva kudzimba dzavo, pamunouyisa vapambi pamusoro pavo pakarepo, nokuti vakachera hunza kuti vandibate, uye vakavanzira tsoka dzangu misungo. asi munoziva, imi yeahoh, rangano dzavo dzose dzokundiuraya. musavakanganwira mhaka dzavo kana kudzima zvivi zvavo pamberi penyu. ngavawisirwe pasi pamberi penyu, muvarove panguva yokutsamwa kwenyu.

19

zvanzi nayeahoh: “enda undotenga chirongo chevhu kumuumbi wehari. uende navamwe vakuru vavanhu navaprista. muende kumupata wabheni hinomi, pedyo napamuromo wesuo rezvaenga. uparidzepo mashoko andinokuudza, uchiti, ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi madzimambo navanhu vejerusarema. zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: teererai, ndiri kuuyisa njodzi panzvimbo ino ichaita kuti nzeve yomumwe nomumwe anonzwa nezvayo iwunge. nokuti vakandisiya vakaita nzvimbo ino kuti ive yamwari wavatorwa; vakapisira zvibayiro mairi kuna vamwari vavasina kuziva ivo kana madzibaba avo kana madzimambo eyeahudha, uye vakazadza nzvimbo ino neropa ravasina mhosva. vakavaka nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzabhaari kuti vapise vanakomana vavo mumoto sezvipiriso kuna bhaari, chinhu chandisina kuvarayira kana kureva, uye hachina kumbopinda mupfungwa dzangu. saka chenjerai, mazuva anouya, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, apo vanhu vasingazotumidzi nzvimbo ino kuti tofeti kana kuti mupata wabheni hinomi, asi kuti mupata wokuuraya. “ ‘ndichaparadza urongwa hwayeahudha nejerusarema munzvimbo ino. ndichavawisira pasi nomunondo pamberi pavavengi vavo, pamaoko avanotsvaka kuvauraya, uye ndichapa zvitunha zvavo sezvokudya kushiri dzedenga nezvikara zvenyika. ndichaparadza guta rino uye ndichariita chinhu chinosekwa; vose vanopfuura napo vachashamiswa uye vacharihomera nokuda kwamaronda aro ose. ndichaita kuti vadye nyama yavanakomana vavo neyavanasikana vavo, uye nyama yomumwe nomumwe wavo panguva yokurema kwokukombwa kunenge kwaiswa pamusoro pavo navavengi vavo vanotsvaka kuvauraya.’ “ipapo uputse chirongo vaya vanoenda newe vakatarisa, ugoti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose: ndichaputsa rudzi urwu neguta rino sokuputsika kwechirongo chemuumbi wehari uye hachingagoni kugadzirwazve. vachaviga vakafa mutofeti kusvikira pasisina nzvimbo. izvi ndizvo zvandichaitira nzvimbo ino nokuna vose vanogara muno, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ndichaita guta rino setofeti. dzimba dziri mujerusarema nedzamadzimambo eyeahudha dzichasvibiswa senzvimbo ino, tofeti, dzimba dzose dzavaipisira zvinonhuhwira pamatenga adzo, vachipisira hondo dzenyeredzi dzose dzokudenga uye vachidururira vamwe vamwari zvipiriso zvokunwa.’ ” ipapo jeremia akabva kutofeti, kwaakanga atumwa nayeahoh kundoprofita, akandomira muruvazhe rwetemberi yayeahoh ndokuti kuvanhu vose, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ‘inzwai! ndichauyisa pamusoro peguta rino nemisha yakaripoteredza, njodzi imwe neimwe yandakazivisa pamusoro paro, nokuti ivo vakaomesa mitsipa yavo vakaramba kunzwa mashoko angu.’ ”

20

muprista pashuri mwanakomana waimeri, mutariri mukuru mutemberi yayeahoh, akati anzwa jeremia achiprofita zvinhu izvi, akarayira kuti jeremia muprofita arohwe agoiswa muchitokisi pasuo rokumusoro rabhenjamini raiva patemberi yayeahoh. chifumi chamangwana, pashuri akati amusunungura kubva muchitokisi, jeremia akati kwaari, “zita rinopiwa kwauri nayeahoh harisi pashuri, asi magori-misabhibhi (zvichireva zvinotyisa kumativi ose). nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘ndichakuita chinhu chinokutyisa iwe pachako nokushamwari dzako dzose; uchadziona nemeso ako dzichiwisirwa pasi nomunondo wavavengi vavo. ndichaisa yeahudha rose mumaoko amambo webhabhironi, uye achavaendesa kubhabhironi kana kuvauraya nomunondo. ndichaisa pfuma yose yeguta rino, nezvose zvavakawana, nezvose zvinokosha zvaro, nepfuma yose yamadzimambo eyeahudha, mumaoko avavengi vavo. vachazvipamba ndokuzviendesa kubhabhironi. zvino iwe pashuri, navose vanogara mumba mako muchatapwa mugondogariswa kubhabhironi. uchandofira ikoko, iwe neshamwari dzako dzose dzawaiprofitira nhema.’ ” haiwa yeahoh makandinyengera, uye ndakanyengerwa; makandikurira uye mukakunda, vanondiseka zuva rose; munhu wose anondiseka. pandinotaura pose, ndinodanidzira ndichitaura nezvokuita nechisimba nokuparadza. saka shoko rayeahoh rakandivigira kutukwa nokunyadziswa zuva rose. asi kana ndikati, “handicharevi zita rake, kana kutaurazve muzita rake,” shoko rake riri mumwoyo mangu rakaita somoto, moto wakapfigirwa mumapfupa angu. ndaneta nokuridzivisa; zvirokwazvo, handigoni. ndinonzwa vazhinji vachizevezera vachiti, “zvinotyisa kumativi ose! mureverei! ngatimureverei!” shamwari dzangu dzose dzakarindira kutedzemuka kwangu, dzichiti, “zvimwe achanyengererwa; ipapo tigomukunda tigozvitsiva paari.” asi yeahoh aneni semhare ine simba; saka vatambudzi vangu vachagumburwa, uye havangakundi. vachakundikana uye vachanyadziswa kwazvo; kusakudzwa kwavo hakungatongokanganwiki. haiwa yeahoh wamasimba ose, iyemi munoedza vakarurama uye munonzvera mwoyo nendangariro, regai ndione kutsiva kwenyu pamusoro pavo, nokuti ndaisa mhaka yangu kwamuri. imbirai yeahoh! ipai rumbidzo kuna yeahoh! iye anorwira upenyu hwavanoshayiwa kubva mumaoko avakaipa. ngaritukwe zuva randakaberekwa! zuva randakaberekwa namai vangu ngarirege kuropafadzwa! ngaatukwe munhu akazivisa baba vangu shoko, iye akaita kuti vafare kwazvo, achiti, “waberekerwa mwana, iye mwanakomana!” munhu uyo ngaave semaguta akaparadzwa nayeahoh asingazvidembi. ngaanzwe kuungudza mangwanani, nokudanidzirwa kwehondo masikati. nokuti haana kundiuraya ndiri mudumbu, mai vangu vangadai vari guva rangu, vairamba vane mimba. ndakambobudireiko mudumbu kuti ndione nhamo nokuchema uye ndigogumisa mazuva angu mukunyadziswa?

21

shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh panguva yakatuma mambo zedhekia kwaari pashuri mwanakomana wamarikiya, nomuprista zefania mwanakomana wamaaseya. vakati, “dotibvunzirawo kuna yeahoh iye zvino nokuti nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi ari kurwa nesu. zvichida yeahoh angatiitira zvishamiso sepanguva dzakapfuura kuitira kuti uyu abve kwatiri.” asi jeremia akavapindura achiti, “udzai zedhekia kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: ndava pedyo nokunangisa kwauri zvombo zvehondo zviri mumaoko ako, zvaunoshandisa kurwa namambo webhabhironi navabhabhironi vakakukombai kunze kwamasvingo. uye ndichazviunganidza mukati meguta rino. ini ndimene ndicharwa newe noruoko rwakatambanudzwa noruoko rune simba mukutsamwa neshungu nehasha huru. ndicharova vanogara muguta rino, zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo, uye zvichafa nedenda rakaipisisa. shure kwaizvozvo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ndichaisa zedhekia mambo weyeahudha, namachinda ake navanhu vari muguta rino vanopunyuka padenda, napamunondo, nepanzara, kuna nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi nokuvavengi vavo vanotsvaka kuvauraya. achavaisa kumunondo; haangavanzwiri urombo, kana ngoni, kana tsitsi.’ “zvakare, uti kuvanhu, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: tarirai, ndiri kuisa pamberi penyu nzira youpenyu neyorufu. ani naani achagara muguta rino achafa nomunondo, nenzara kana nedenda. asi ani naani achabuda akandozvipira kuvabhabhironi vakakukombai achararama; achatiza noupenyu hwake. ndafunga kuitira guta rino zvakaipa kwete zvakanaka, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. richaiswa mumaoko amambo webhabhironi, uye achariparadza nomoto.’ “pamusoro paizvozvo, uti kuimba youshe yayeahudha, ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi imba yadhavhidhi. zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘tongai nokururamisira mangwanani ari ose, nunurai akabirwa, kubva muruoko rwomudzvinyiriri wake, kuti kutsamwa kwangu kurege kubuda kukakupisai somoto, nokuda kwezvakaipa zvamakaita, kuchipfuta pasina angakudzima. ndine mhosva newe, jerusarema, iwe ugere pamusoro pomupata uno pamutunhu wematombo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, iyemi munoti, “ndiani angatirwisa? ndiani angapinda pautiziro hwedu?” ndichakurovai sezvakafanira mabasa enyu, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ndichabatidza moto mumasango enyu uchapisa zvose zvakakupoteredzai.’ ”

22

zvanzi nayeahoh: “burukira kumuzinda wamambo weyeahudha undoparidza shoko iri ikoko uchiti, ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi mambo weyeahudha, iyemi munogara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi, imi namachinda enyu navanhu venyu vanopinda napamasuo aya. zvanzi nayeahoh: itai zvakanaka nezvakarurama. rwirai akabirwa muruoko rwounomumanikidza. regai kuitira zvakaipa kana chisimba kumutorwa nenherera kana chirikadzi, uye musateura ropa risina mhosva panzvimbo ino. nokuti kana mukachenjerera kuteerera mirayiro, ipapo madzimambo anogara pachigaro chadhavhidhi achapinda napamasuo omuzinda uyu, vakakwira mungoro nepamabhiza vachiperekedzwa namachinda avo navanhu vavo. asi kana mukaramba kunzwa mirayiro iyi, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ndinopika neni ndimene kuti nzvimbo ino ichava dongo.’ ” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pomuzinda wamambo weyeahudha: “kunyange wakaita segireadhi kwandiri, wakaita somusoro werebhanoni, zvirokwazvo ndichakuita segwenga, semaguta asingagarwi. ndichatumira vaparadzi pamusoro penyu, mumwe nomumwe nezvombo zvake, uye vachatema matanda enyu emisidhari akanaka vagoakanda mumoto. “marudzi mazhinji avanhu achapfuura nepaguta rino uye vachabvunzana vachiti, ‘yeahoh aitireiko chinhu chakadai kuguta rino?’ zvino mhinduro ichati, ‘nokuti vakasiya sungano yayeahoh allah wavo vakanamata uye vakashumira vamwe vamwari.’ ” musachema mambo akafa kana kuungudza nezvake; asi muchemere kwazvo uyo akatapwa, nokuti haachambodzoki kana kuzoonazve nyika yaakaberekerwa. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pasharumi mwanakomana wajosia, uyo akatevera baba vake samambo weyeahudha asi akabva panzvimbo ino: “haazombodzoki. achafira munzvimbo yavakamuendesa kuutapwa; haachazombooni nyika inozve.” “ane nhamo uyo anovaka muzinda wake nokusarurama, namakamuri ake okumusoro nokusaruramisira, anoshandisa vanhu vokwake pasina chaanovapa, asingavaripiri pakushanda kwavo. iye anoti, ‘ndichazvivakira muzinda wakakura una makamuri okumusoro anoyevedza.’ saka anoita mawindo makuru mairi, achiabatanidza nomusidhari, agoashongedza nezvitsvuku. “izvozvo zvinokuita mambo here, kuva nemisidhari yakawandawanda? ko, baba vako havana kuwana zvokudya nezvokunwa here? iye akaita zvakarurama uye nokururamisira, saka zvose zvakamufambira zvakanaka. akatongera varombo nevaishayiwa mhaka dzavo, nokudaro zvose zvakafamba zvakanaka. hazvisizvo zvinoreva kundiziva here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “asi meso enyu nemwoyo yenyu zvakangotarisa chete papfuma isakarurama, pakuteura ropa risina mhosva napakumanikidza nokuita nechisimba.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh, pamusoro pajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia, mambo weyeahudha: “havangamuchemi vachiti: ‘yowe-e, mununʼuna wangu! yowe-e, hanzvadzi yangu!’ havangamuchemi vachiti: ‘yowe-e, tenzi wangu! yowe-e, ukuru hwake!’ achavigwa sokuvigwa kunoitwa mbongoro, achakwekweredzwa agoraswa kure, kunze kwamasuo ejerusarema.” “kwirai kurebhanoni mudanidzire, inzwi renyu ngarinzwike pabhashani, danidzirai kubva paabharimi, nokuti shamwari dzenyu dzose dzaparadzwa. ndakakuyambira uchigere zvakanaka, asi iwe wakati, ‘handidi kuteerera!’ ndiyo yanga iri nzira yako kubva pauduku hwako; hauna kunditeerera. mhepo ichadzingira kure vafudzi vako vose, uye shamwari dzako dzichaenda kuutapwa. ipapo iwe uchanyara uye uchanyadziswa, nokuda kwokuipa kwako kwose. imi mugere mu‘rebhanoni,’ iyemi makavakirwa matendere mudzimba dzemisidhari, muchagomera sei kurwadza pakuchauya pamusoro penyu, kurwadziwa sekwomukadzi anosununguka! “zvirokwazvo, noupenyu hwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “kunyange kana iwe jehoyakini mwanakomana wajehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha, wakanga uri mhete muruoko rwangu rworudyi, ndaingokubvisa zvakadaro. ndichakuisa mumaoko aavo vanotsvaka kukuuraya, ivo vaunotya, kuna nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi nokuvabhabhironi. ndichapotsera iwe namai vakakubereka kune imwe nyika kwamusina kuberekerwa, uye ikoko kwamuchandofira muri vaviri. hamuzombodzokizve kunyika yamunoshuva kudzokera kwairi.” ko, murume uyu jehoyakini munhu akazvidzika, ihari yakaputsika, chinhu chisina angada here? seiko iye navana vake vapotserwa kunze, vakarasirwa kunyika yavasingazivi? iwe nyika, nyika, nyika, inzwa shoko rayeahoh! zvanzi nayeahoh: “nyora munhu uyu seasina mwana, munhu asingazobudiriri pamazuva oupenyu hwake, nokuti hakuna mwana wake achapfuma, hakuna achagara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi, kana kutongazve munyika yeyeahudha.”

23

“vane nhamo vafudzi vari kuparadza uye vari kuparadzira makwai amafuro angu!” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, kuvafudzi vanofudza vanhu vangu: “nemhaka yokuti makaparadzira makwai angu mukaadzingira kure uye mukasava nehanya nawo, ndichaisa rushamhu pamusoro penyu nokuda kwezvakaipa zvamakaita,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ini pachangu ndichaunganidza akasara amakwai angu kubva kunyika dzose dzandakanga ndaadzingira uye ndichaadzosera kumafuro awo, kwaachava nezvibereko uye kwaachawanda. ndichagadza vafudzi pamusoro pavo vachaafudza, uye havazotyi kana kuvhunduka, uye hakuna rimwe rawo ringashayikwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mazuva achauya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “pandichamutsira dhavhidhi davi rakarurama, mambo achatonga nouchenjeri nokururamisira uye nokuita zvakarurama munyika. pamazuva ake yeahudha achaponeswa uye israeri achagara norugare. zita rake raachatumidzwa ndirori rokuti: yeahoh ndiye kururama kwedu. naizvozvo zvino mazuva achauya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “avasingazoti, ‘nayeahoh mupenyu iye akabudisa vaisraeri kubva muijipiti,’ asi vachazoti, ‘nayeahoh mupenyu, akabudisa vana vaisraeri kubva kunyika yokumusoro nokunyika dzose kwaakanga avadzingira.’ ipapo vachagara munyika yavo.” kana vari vaprofita: mwoyo wangu waputsika mukati mangu; mapfupa angu ose anodedera. ndakaita somunhu akadhakwa, somunhu akundwa newaini, nokuda kwayeahoh uye nokuda kwamashoko ake matsvene. nyika izere nemhombwe; nyika yaoma nokuda kwokutukwa uye mafuro omugwenga aoma. vaprofita votevera nzira yakaipa uye vanoshandisa simba ravo nokusarurama. “muprofita nomuprista vose havana umwari; kunyange mutemberi yangu ndinowana kuipa kwavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “naizvozvo nzira yavo ichatsvedza; vachadzingirwa kurima uye ikoko ndiko kwavachawira. ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavo mugore ravacharangwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “pakati pavaprofita vesamaria ndakaona chinhu chinonyangadza ichi: vakaprofita nabhaari, uye vakatungamirira vanhu vangu vaisraeri mukurasika. uye pakati pavaprofita vejerusarema ndakaona chimwe chinhu chinonyangadza: vanoita upombwe uye vanoreva nhema. vanosimbisa maoko evaiti vezvakaipa, zvokuti hakuna anodzoka pazvakaipa zvake. vose vakaita sesodhomu kwandiri; vanhu vejerusarema vakaita segomora.” naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, pamusoro pavaprofita: “ndichaita kuti vadye kudya kunovava, uye kuti vanwe mvura ine muchetura, nokuti zvichibva nokumuprofita wejerusarema, kushaya umwari kwapararira panyika yose.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “regai kuteerera zvamunoprofitirwa navaprofita; vanokuzadzai netariro dzenhema. vanotaura zviratidzo zvinobva pandangariro dzavo, zvisingabvi mumuromo mayeahoh. vanoramba vachiti kuna avo vanondizvidza, ‘yeahoh anoti: muchava norugare.’ uye kuna vaya vose vanotevera kusindimara kwemwoyo yavo, vanoti, ‘hakuna chakaipa chichakuwirai.’ asi ndiani pakati pavo akamira parangano yayeahoh, kuti aone kana kunzwa shoko rake? ndiani akateerera akanzwa shoko rake? tarirai, dutu rayeahoh richaputika muhasha dzake, chamupupuri chichimona chakananga pamisoro yavakaipa. kutsamwa kwayeahoh hakungadzoki, kusvikira apedza zvinovavarirwa nomwoyo wake. pamazuva achauya muchazvinzwisisa zvakanyatsojeka. handina kutuma vaprofita ava, kunyange zvakadaro vakamhanya neshoko ravo; ini handina kutaura navo, kunyange zvakadaro vakaprofita. asi dai vakamira parangano yangu, vangadai vakaparidza mashoko angu kuvanhu vangu, uye vangadai vakavadzora panzira dzavo dzakaipa, napamabasa avo akaipa. “ko, ini ndinongori allah ari pedyo here,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndisati ndiri allah ari kure? pano munhu angavanda, panzvimbo dzakavanzika zvokuti handingamuoni here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ko, handizadzi denga nenyika here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndakanzwa zvakataurwa navaprofita vanoprofita nhema muzita rangu. vanoti, ‘ndakarota! ndakarota!’ ko, izvi zvicharamba zviri mumwoyo yavaprofita venhema ava kusvikira rinhi ivo vanoprofita zvokunyengera kwendangariro dzavo? vanofunga kuti zviroto zvavanoudzana zvichaita kuti vanhu vangu vakanganwe zita rangu sezvakaita madzibaba avo akakanganwa zita rangu nokuda kwokunamata bhaari. muprofita ane chiroto ngaataure kurota kwake, asi ane shoko rangu ngaataure nokutendeka. nokuti mashanga ane basa rei pazviyo?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “shoko rangu harina kufanana nomoto here,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye nenyundo inoputsanya dombo?” “naizvozvo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “handina ukama navaprofita vanobirana mashoko anofungidzirwa kuti anobva kwandiri. hongu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “handina ukama navaprofita vanoshandisa ndimi dzavo vachiti, ‘yeahoh ari kutaura.’ zvirokwazvo handina ukama neavo vanoprofita zviroto zvenhema,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vanovaudza uye vanotsausa vanhu vangu nenhema dzavo dzisina maturo, asi handina kuvatuma kana kuvagadza. havambobatsiri vanhu ava napaduku pose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “paunobvunzwa navanhu ava, vaprofita kana vaprista, vachiti, ‘chirevo ichi chayeahoh ndecheiko?’ uti kwavari, ‘chirevo cheiko? ndichakurasai, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.’ kana muprofita kana muprista kana ani zvake achiti, ‘ichi ndicho chirevo chayeahoh,’ ndicharanga munhu uyo nemhuri yake. izvi ndizvo zvamunoramba muchitaura mumwe nomumwe wenyu kushamwari kana kuhama yake muchiti: ‘mhinduro yayeahoh inoti kudiniko?’ kana kuti ‘yeahoh akataureiko?’ hamufaniri kutaura ‘chirevo chayeahoh’ zvakare, nokuti shoko romunhu mumwe nomumwe richava chirevo chake, uye saizvozvo munominamisa mashoko aallah mupenyu, yeahoh wamasimba ose, allah wedu. izvi ndizvo zvamucharamba muchitaura kumuprofita muchiti: ‘yeahoh akakupindurei?’ kana kuti ‘yeahoh akataurei?’ kunyange muchiti, ‘ichi ndicho chirevo chayeahoh,’ izvi ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh: makashandisa mashoko anoti, ‘ichi ndicho chirevo chayeahoh,’ kunyange ndakanga ndakuudzai kuti musati, ‘ichi ndicho chirevo chayeahoh’. naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndichakukanganwai uye ndichakurasai mubve pamberi pangu imi neguta randakakupai uye namadzibaba enyu. ndichauyisa pamusoro penyu kunyadziswa kusingaperi, nyadzi dzisingaperi dzisingazokanganwiki.”

24

shure kwokutapwa kwajehoyakini mwanakomana wajehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha pamwe chete namachinda, navavezi, navapfuri vesimbi veyeahudha vachibviswa kujerusarema vachiendeswa kubhabhironi nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, yeahoh akandiratidza tswanda mbiri dzine maonde dzakaiswa pamberi petemberi yayeahoh. imwe tswanda yaiva namaonde akanaka kwazvo, akaita seaya anotanga kuibva; imwe yacho yaive namaonde akaipa chose, zvokuti akanga asingagoni kudyiwa. ipapo yeahoh akandibvunza achiti, “uri kuoneiko jeremia?” ini ndakapindura ndikati, “maonde. akanaka acho, akanaka kwazvo, asi akaipa acho akaipa zvokuti haangadyiwi.” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri rikati, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah weisraeri, ‘sezvakaita maonde aya akanaka, saizvozvo ndicharangarira zvakanaka vatapwa vakabva kuyeahudha vandakatuma kubva panzvimbo ino ndichivaendesa kunyika yebhabhironi. meso angu acharingira kwavari nokuda kwokunaka kwavo, uye ndichavadzosazve munyika ino. ndichavavaka uye handingavakoromori; ndichavasima uye handingavadzuri. ndichavapa mwoyo wokundiziva, kuti ndini yeahoh. vachava vanhu vangu, uye ini ndichava allah wavo, nokuti vachadzokera kwandiri nomwoyo wavo wose. “ ‘asi sezvakaita maonde akaipa, iwo akaipa kwazvo zvokusagona kudyiwa,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘saizvozvo ndichaitira zedhekia mambo weyeahudha, namachinda ake, navaya vakasara mujerusarema, kunyange vakasara munyika ino kana vagere muijipiti. ndichavaita chinhu chinovengwa, nechinhu chakaipa kuushe hwose hwenyika, chinhu chinoshorwa, neshumo, chinhu chinosekwa nechinotukwa kwose kwose kwandinovadzingira. ndichavatumira munondo, nzara, nehasha pamusoro pavo kusvikira vaparadzwa kubva panyika yandakavapa ivo namadzibaba avo.’ ”

25

shoko rakauya kuna jeremia pamusoro pavanhu vose veyeahudha mugore rechina rajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, iro rakanga riri gore rokutanga ranebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi. saka jeremia muprofita akati kuvanhu vose veyeahudha nokuna vose vaigara mujerusarema: kwamakore makumi maviri namatatu, kubva pagore regumi namatatu rajosia mwanakomana waamoni mambo weyeahudha kusvikira zuva ranhasi, shoko rayeahoh ranga richiuya kwandiri uye ini ndikataura ndataurazve kwamuri, asi hamuna kuteerera. uye kunyange yeahoh akatuma varanda vake kwamuri ivo vaprofita nguva nenguva, imi hamuna kuteerera kana kurereka nzeve dzenyu. ivo vakati, “dzokai zvino mumwe nomumwe wenyu, kubva panzira dzenyu dzakaipa nepamabasa enyu akaipa, mugogara munyika yamakapiwa nayeahoh imi namadzibaba enyu nokusingaperi. regai kutevera vamwe vamwari kuti muvashumire uye muvanamate; murege kunditsamwisa nezvakaitwa namaoko enyu. ipapo handingakuitirei zvakaipa.” “asi imi hamuna kunditeerera,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye makanditsamwisa nezvakaitwa namaoko enyu, mukaita kuti zvakaipa zvikuwirei.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “nemhaka yokuti hamuna kuteerera mashoko angu, ndichadana marudzi ose okumusoro uye nomuranda wangu nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye ndichavauyisa kuzorwa nenyika ino navanogaramo uye nendudzi dzose dzakavapoteredza. ndichavaparadza zvachose uye ndichavaita chinhu chinovengwa nechinosekwa, nedongo nokusingaperi. ndichabvisa pakati pavo manzwi okupembera nomufaro, namanzwi emwenga neechikomba, nenzwi reguyo nechiedza chemwenje. nyika ino yose ichava dongo, uye marudzi aya achashandira mambo webhabhironi kwemakore makumi manomwe. “asi kana makore makumi manomwe apera, ndicharova mambo webhabhironi norudzi rwake, nenyika yavabhabhironi, pamusoro pemhosva yavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye ndichaiita dongo nokusingaperi. ndichauyisa pamusoro penyika iyo zvinhu zvose zvandakataura pamusoro payo, zvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku iri nezvakaprofitwa najeremia pamusoro pendudzi dzose. ivo pachavo vachatapwa nendudzi zhinji namadzimambo makuru; ini ndichavaripira zvakaenzana nokubata kwavo uye namabasa emaoko avo.” izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, kwandiri: “tora kubva muruoko rwangu mukombe uyu wakazara newaini yokutsamwa kwangu unwise ndudzi dzose dzandinokutuma kwadziri. kana vachinge vainwa vachadzedzereka nokupenga nokuda kwomunondo wandichatuma pakati pavo.” saka ndakatora mukombe muruoko rwayeahoh ndikaita kuti ndudzi dzose dzaakandituma kwadziri dzinwe: jerusarema namaguta eyeahudha, namadzimambo, namachinda aro, kuti aitwe matongo, chinhu chinovengwa nechinosekesa, nechinotukwa, sezvaakaita iye nhasi; faro mambo weijipiti, navaranda vake, namachinda ake uye navanhu vake vose, navatorwa vose variko; namadzimambo ose euzi; namadzimambo ose efiristia (neavo veashikeroni, negaza, neekironi, navanhu vakasiyiwa kuashidhodhi); edhomu nemoabhu neamoni; namadzimambo ose etire nesidhoni; namadzimambo emuzviwi mhiri kwegungwa; nedhedhani, netema, nebhuzi navose vari kunzvimbo dziri kure; madzimambo ose earabhia namadzimambo ose enyika dzavatorwa vanogara mugwenga; namadzimambo ose ezimuri, neeramu nefiristia, namadzimambo ose okumusoro vepedyo nevokure, mumwe achitevera mumwe, ushe hwose huri pamusoro penyika. shure kwaivava vose, mambo wesheshaki achazoinwawo. “ipapo uvaudze kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: inwai mudhakwe, murutse, muwe, uye murege kuzomukazve nokuda kwomunondo wandichatuma pakati penyu.’ asi kana vakaramba kutora mukombe muruoko rwako kuti vamwe, uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: munofanira kuinwa! tarirai, ndava kutanga kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro peguta rinodanwa nezita rangu, ko, imi mungarega kurangwa here? hamungaregi kurangwa nokuti ndava kudana munondo pamusoro pavose vagere panyika, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.’ “zvino chiprofita mashoko aya ose pamusoro pavo uchiti: “ ‘yeahoh achaomba ari kumusoro; achatinhira ari pachigaro chake chitsvene uye achaomba zvikuru pamusoro penyika yake. achadanidzira sezvinoita vanotsika mazambiringa, achidanidzira kuna vose vagere panyika. bope richaunga kusvikira kumagumo enyika, nokuti yeahoh achapa ndudzi mhosva; achauyisa kutonga pamusoro pamarudzi ose avanhu uye achaisa vakaipa kumunondo,’ ” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “tarirai, njodzi iri kupararira ichibva kuno rumwe rudzi ichienda kuno rumwe; dutu guru rasimuka richibva kumagumo enyika.” panguva iyo vakaurayiwa nayeahoh vachava pose pose vachibva kuno mumwe mugumo wenyika kusvikira kuno mumwe. havangachemwi kana kuunganidzwa, kana kuvigwa, asi vachava somupfudze uri pamusoro penyika. chemai uye muungudze, imi vafudzi; umburukai muguruva, imi vatungamiri veboka. nokuti nguva yokuurayiwa kwenyu yasvika; muchawa mugopwanyika somudziyo wakanaka wevhu. vafudzi vachashayiwa kwokutizira, uye vakuru veboka vachashayiwa kwokutizira. inzwai kuchema kwavafudzi, kuungudza kwavatungamiri veboka, nokuti yeahoh ari kuparadza mafuro avo. mafuro ano runyararo achaparadzwa nokuda kwokutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh. seshumba, achabva panzvimbo yake yokuvanda, uye nyika yavo ichaparadzwa nokuda kwomunondo womumanikidzi, uye nokuda kwokutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh.

26

pamazuva okutanga kubata ushe kwajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, shoko iri rakabva kuna yeahoh richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: mira paruvazhe rweimba yayeahoh utaure kuvanhu vose vomumaguta eyeahudha vanouya kuzonamata muimba yayeahoh. uvaudze zvose zvandinokurayira, usadarikira kana shoko rimwe chete, zvimwe vachanzwa mumwe nomumwe akadzoka panzira dzake dzakaipa. ipapo ndichazvidemba ndikarega kuisa pamusoro pavo njodzi yandanga ndichifunga kuvaitira nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavakaita. uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: kana musinganditeereri, uye musingateveri murayiro wangu, wandakaisa pamberi penyu, uye kana musingateereri mashoko avaranda vangu ivo vaprofita, vandakatuma ndikatumazve kwamuri (kunyange musina kuteerera), ipapo ndichaita kuti imba ino ive seshiro uye guta rino kuti rive chinhu chinotukwa pakati pendudzi dzose dzepanyika.’ ” vaprista navaprofita navanhu vose vakanzwa jeremia achitaura mashoko aya ari mumba mayeahoh. asi jeremia akati achangopedza kuudza vanhu vose zvose zvaakanga arayirwa nayeahoh kuti ataure, vaprista navaprofita navanhu vose vakamubata vakati, “unofanira kufa! unoprofitirei muzita rayeahoh uchiti imba ino ichava seshiro uye guta rino richava dongo uye richashaya anogaramo?” vanhu vose vakaunganira jeremia mumba mayeahoh. machinda eyeahudha akati anzwa nezvezvinhu izvi, vakakwidza vachibva kumuzinda wamambo vakaenda kuimba yayeahoh vakandogara pamukova wepasuo idzva weimba yayeahoh. ipapo vaprista navaprofita vakati kumachinda nokuvanhu vose, “munhu uyu anofanira kutongerwa rufu nokuti akaprofita zvakaipa pamusoro peguta rino. mazvinzwira imi nenzeve dzenyu!” ipapo jeremia akati kumachinda ose nokuvanhu vose, “yeahoh akandituma kuzoprofita pamusoro peimba ino napamusoro peguta rino, zvinhu zvose zvamakanzwa. zvino, chinatsai nzira dzenyu nezviito zvenyu muteerere yeahoh allah wenyu. ipapo yeahoh achazvidemba akarega kuuyisa pamusoro penyu njodzi yaakareva. asi kana ndirini, ndiri mumaoko enyu; itai henyu zvamunofunga pamusoro pangu sezvamunoona zvakanaka uye zvakarurama. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, zivai kuti, kana mukandiuraya muchamisa mhosva yeropa risina mhaka pamusoro penyu uye napamusoro peguta rino, nepamusoro pevose vanogara mariri, nokuti zvirokwazvo yeahoh akandituma kwamuri kuti nditaure mashoko ose aya munzeve dzenyu.” ipapo machinda navanhu vose vakati kuvaprista nokuvaprofita, “munhu uyu haafaniri kutongerwa rufu! ataura kwatiri muzita rayeahoh allah wedu.” vamwe vavakuru venyika vakasimuka vakati kuungano yose yavanhu, “mikaya wokumorasheti akaprofita pamazuva ahezekia mambo weyeahudha. akaudza vanhu vose veyeahudha kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “ ‘zioni richarimwa somunda, jerusarema richava murwi wamabwe, negomo retemberi richava chikomo chakamera miti.’ ko, hezekia mambo weyeahudha kana mumwewo zvake weyeahudha ndiye akamuuraya here? ko, hezekia haana kutya yeahoh akatsvaka nyasha dzake here? uye yeahoh haana kuzvidemba, akarega kuuyisa njodzi yaakanga ataura pamusoro pavo here? tava kuda kuzviunzira dambudziko rakaipisisa pamusoro pedu!” (zvino uria mwanakomana washemaya aibva kukiriati tearimi ndiye mumwe murume akaprofita muzita rayeahoh; akaprofita zvinhu zvimwe chetezvo pamusoro peguta rino nenyika ino sezvakangoitwawo najeremia. mambo jehoyakimi namakurukota ake ose namachinda ake vakati vanzwa mashoko ake, mambo akatsvaka kumuuraya. asi uria akazvinzwa akatya ndokubva atizira kuijipiti. kunyange zvakadaro, mambo jehoyakimi akatuma erinatani mwanakomana waakibhori kuijipiti, pamwe chete navamwe varume. vakabudisa uria kubva kuijipiti vakamuendesa kuna mambo jehoyakimi uyo akaita kuti aurayiwe uye mutumbi wake ukakandwa kunzvimbo yaivigirwa vanhuwo zvavo). pamusoro paizvozvo ahikami mwanakomana washafani akatsigira jeremia, nokudaro haana kuzoiswa mumaoko avanhu kuti aurayiwe.

27

pakutanga kwokubata ushe kwazedhekia mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, shoko iri rakasvika kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh, richiti: izvi ndizvo zvataurwa nayeahoh kwandiri: “ita joko remakashu namatanda ugoriisa pamutsipa wako. ipapo ugotuma shoko kuna mambo weedhomu, nokuna mambo wemoabhu, noweamoni, nowetire nesidhoni noruoko rwenhume dzinouya kujerusarema kuna zedhekia mambo weyeahudha. uvape shoko ravanatenzi vavo uchiti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose iye allah waisraeri, “taurai izvi kuna vanatenzi venyu kuti: ndakaita nyika navanhu vayo, nemhuka dziri mairi nesimba rangu guru uye noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, uye ndinoipa kuna ani zvake anondifadza. zvino, ndichapa nyika dzako dzose kumuranda wangu nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi; uye kuti kunyange zvikara zvesango zvive pasi pake. ndudzi dzose dzichamushandira, iye nemwanakomana wake, nomuzukuru wake, kusvikira nguva yenyika yake yasvika; ipapo ndudzi zhinji namadzimambo makuru vachamuita muranda. “ ‘ “kunyange zvakadaro, kana rudzi rupi norupi kana ushe hupi nohupi hukasazoshandira nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi kana hukazoisa mutsipa warwo pasi pejoko rake, ndicharanga rudzi urwo nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda, kusvikira ndarupedza noruoko rwake, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. saka musateerera vaprofita venyu, navavuki venyu, kana vanodudzira hope kana vafemberi kana varoyi vanokuudzai kuti, ‘hamungashandiri mambo webhabhironi’. vanokuprofitirai nhema dzichangoita kuti mubviswe muendeswe kure nenyika dzenyu; ndichakudzingai uye muchaparara. asi kana rudzi rupi norupi rukazoisa mutsipa warwo pasi pejoko ramambo webhabhironi rukamushandira, ndichaita kuti rudzi urwo rurambe rwuri munyika yarwo kuti varime vagogaramo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.” ’ ” ndakapa shoko rimwe chetero kuna zedhekia mambo weyeahudha. ndakati, “isa mutsipa wako pasi pejoko ramambo webhabhironi; umushandire iye navanhu vake, ugorarama. ko, iwe navanhu vako muchafireiko nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda izvo zvakanzi nayeahoh ndichaitira rudzi rupi norupi rucharega kushandira mambo webhabhironi? regai kuteerera mashoko avaprofita vanoti kwamuri, ‘hamungashandiri mambo webhabhironi,’ nokuti vanoprofita nhema pamusoro penyu. ‘ini handina kuvatuma,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘vari kuprofita nhema muzita rangu. naizvozvo, ndichakudzingai, mugoparara mose imi navaprofita vanoprofita kwamuri.’ ” ipapo ndakati kuvaprista navanhu vose ava, “zvanzi nayeahoh: regai kuteerera vaprofita vanoti, ‘iye zvino, nokukurumidza, midziyo yakabviswa mutemberi yayeahoh ichadzoswazve kubva kubhabhironi.’ vari kukuprofitirai nhema. regai kuvateerera. shandirai mambo webhabhironi, mugorarama. guta rino richaitireiko dongo? kana vari vaprofita uye vane shoko rayeahoh ngavakumbirise kuna yeahoh, wamasimba ose kuti midziyo yakasara muimba yayeahoh, nomumuzinda wamambo weyeahudha nejerusarema irege kutakurwa ichiendeswa kubhabhironi. nokuti izvi ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose pamusoro pembiru, negungwa, napamusoro pezvigadziko zvinofambiswa nemimwe midziyo yakasara muguta rino, zvisina kutorwa nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi paakatapa jehoyakini, mwanakomana wajehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha, pamwe chete navakuru vose veyeahudha nejerusarema, kubva kujerusarema achivaendesa kubhabhironi. hongu, zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, pamusoro pezvinhu zvakasiyiwa mutemberi yayeahoh nomumuzinda wamambo weyeahudha uye nomujerusarema: ‘zvichatakurwa zvichiendeswa kubhabhironi uye ndiko kwazvichagara kusvikira pazuva randichavavinga,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘ipapo ndichavadzosa ndigovagarisazve panzvimbo ino.’ ”

28

pakutanga kwokubata ushe kwazedhekia mambo weyeahudha, mugore rechina, nomwedzi wechishanu wegore racho iroro, muprofita hanania mwanakomana waazuri, aibva kugibheoni, akati kwandiri tiri mumba yayeahoh pamberi pavaprista navanhu vose, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, ‘ndichavhuna joko ramambo webhabhironi. makore maviri asati apera, ndichadzosa kunzvimbo ino midziyo yose yeimba yayeahoh yakanga yatorwa nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi kubva kuno akaiendesa kubhabhironi. ndichadzosazve kunzvimbo ino jehoyakini mwanakomana wajehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha navose vakatapwa kubva kuyeahudha, vakaenda kubhabhironi,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘nokuti ndichavhuna joko ramambo webhabhironi.’ ” ipapo muprofita jeremia akapindura muprofita hanania pamberi pavaprista navanhu vose vakanga vamire muimba yayeahoh. akati, “ameni! yeahoh ngaaite izvozvo! yeahoh ngaazadzise mashoko awakaprofita, nokudzosa midziyo yeimba yayeahoh nevakatapwa vose kunzvimbo ino vachibva kubhabhironi. kunyange zvakadaro, chinzwa zvandinokutaurira munzeve dzako nomunzeve dzavanhu vose: kubva kare, vaprofita vakakutangira iwe neni vakaprofitira nyika zhinji noushe ukuru pamusoro pehondo, nenjodzi uye denda. asi muprofita anoprofita zvorugare ndiye achazivikanwa somunhu akatumwa nayeahoh zvechokwadi kana chete shoko raakaprofita rikaitika.” ipapo muprofita hanania akabvisa joko pamutsipa womuprofita jeremia akarivhuna, uye akati, pamberi pavanhu vose, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘saizvozvi ndichavhuna joko ranebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi kubva pamutsipa wendudzi dzose makore maviri asati apera.’ ” adaro, muprofita jeremia akaenda hake. mushure mokunge muprofita hanania avhuna joko pamutsipa wajeremia, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia richiti, “enda unoudza hanania kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: wavhuna joko redanda, asi panzvimbo yaro uchawana joko resimbi. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri, ndichaisa joko resimbi pamitsipa yendudzi idzi dzose kuti vashandire nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, uye vachamushandira. ndichaita kuti ave nesimba kunyange nepamusoro pezvikara zvesango.’ ” ipapo muprofita jeremia akati kuna hanania muprofita, “inzwa, hanania! yeahoh haana kukutuma iwe, asi wakanyengera rudzi urwu kuti ruvimbe nenhema dzako. naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh, ‘ndava pedyo nokukubvisa pamusoro penyika. gore iro rino chairo uchafa, nokuti wakaparidza zvinomukira yeahoh.’ ” mumwedzi wechinomwe wegore racho iroro, muprofita hanania akafa.

29

zvino aya ndiwo mashoko etsamba yakatumwa nomuprofita jeremia kubva kujerusarema ichienda kuvakuru vakanga vachiri vapenyu pakati pavatapwa, nokuvaprista navaprofita, navamwe vanhu vose vakanga vaendeswa kuutapwa kubhabhironi nanebhukadhinezari vachibviswa kujerusarema. (izvi zvakaitika shure kwokunge mambo jehoyakini namai vake, namachinda omuruvazhe rwamambo, navatungamiri veyeahudha nejerusarema, navavezi, navapfuri, vaendeswa kuutapwa vachibviswa kujerusarema.) akaendesa tsamba iyi noruoko rwaerasa, mwanakomana washafani, nagemaria mwanakomana wahirikia, avo vakatumwa nazedhekia mambo wayeahudha kuna mambo nebhukadhinezari kubhabhironi. yaiti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, kuna vose vandakaendesa kuutapwa kubhabhironi vachibva kujerusarema: “zvivakirei dzimba mugare; murime mapindu mugodya zvibereko zvawo. wananai mugova navanakomana navanasikana; tsvakirai vanakomana venyu vakadzi uye muwanise vanasikana venyu, kuti naivowo vave navanakomana navanasikana. muwande ikoko; musadzikira pakuwanda. uyezve, mutsvake rugare
