nokubudirira kweguta randakakuendesai kuutapwa. murinyengeterere kuna yeahoh, nokuti kana rikabudirira, nemiwo muchabudirira.” nokuti, zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri, “musarega vaprofita navavuki vari pakati penyu vachikunyengerai. musateerera kurota kwamunovakurudzira kuti varote. vanokuprofitirai nhema muzita rangu. handina kuvatuma,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: “panopera makore makumi manomwe ebhabhironi, ndichauyazve kwamuri ndigozadzisa zvakanaka zvandakavimbisa kuti ndichakudzoserai kunzvimbo ino. nokuti ndinoziva urongwa hwandinahwo pamusoro penyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “urongwa hwokuti mubudirire, kwete kukuitirai zvakaipa, urongwa hunokupai tariro neramangwana rakanaka. ipapo muchadana kwandiri uye muchauya kuzonyengetera kwandiri, neni ndichakunzwai. muchanditsvaka mukandiwana, pamunonditsvaka nemwoyo yenyu yose. ndichawanikwa nemi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye ndichakudzosai kubva kuutapwa. ndichakuunganidzai kubva kundudzi dzose nokunzvimbo dzandakanga ndakudzingirai,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye ndichakudzoseraizve kunzvimbo yandakanga ndakubudisai ndichikuendesai kuutapwa.” imi mungati henyu, “yeahoh akatimutsira vaprofita mubhabhironi,” asi zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pamambo achagara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi navanhu vose vanosara vari muguta rino, vanhu venyika yenyu vasina kuenda nemi kuutapwa, hongu, zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, “ndichatuma munondo, nzara nedenda pamusoro pavo uye ndichavaita samaonde akaipa akaora zvokuti haangadyiwi. ndichavatevera nomunondo, nzara nedenda uye ndichavaita chinhu chinovengwa noushe hwose hwenyika uye chinhu chinotukwa, nechinotyisa, nechinosekwa, nechinoshorwa pakati pendudzi dzose kwandakavadzingira. nokuti havana kuteerera kumashoko angu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “mashoko andakatuma ndatumazve kwavari navaranda vangu vaprofita. nemiwo vakatapwa makaramba kuateerera,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. naizvozvo, chinzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi mose makatapwa vandakadzingira kubhabhironi muchibva kujerusarema. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri, pamusoro paahabhu mwanakomana wakoraya nazedhekia mwanakomana wamaaseya, vari kukuprofitirai nhema muzita rangu: “ndichavaisa muruoko rwanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, uye achavauraya pamberi penyu muchizviona. nokuda kwavo, vatapwa vose vakabva kuyeahudha vari mubhabhironi vachashandisa chituko ichi: ‘yeahoh akuitire sezvaakaita kuna zedhekia naahabhu avo vakapiswa mumoto namambo webhabhironi.’ nokuti vakaita zvinhu zvinonyangadza muisraeri; vakaita upombwe navakadzi vavavakidzani vavo uye vakareva nhema muzita rangu, izvo zvandisina kuvaudza kuti vaite. ndinozviziva uye ndiri chapupu chazvo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. udza shemaya muneherami kuti, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: wakatumira matsamba muzita rako kuvanhu vose vomujerusarema, kuna zefania mwanakomana wamaaseya muprista, nokuna vamwe vaprista vose. wakati kuna zefania, ‘yeahoh akakugadza kuva muprista panzvimbo yajehoyadha kuti uve mutariri weimba yayeahoh; unofanira kuisa muchitokisi nomumangetani munhu upi zvake anopenga achiita somuprofita. saka wakaregererei kuranga jeremia weanatoti, anozviti muprofita pakati penyu? akatuma shoko iri kwatiri pabhabhironi, achiti: zvichatora nguva yakareba. naizvozvo zvivakirei dzimba mugogara; murime mapindu mugodya zvibereko zvawo.’ ” uye, zefania muprista akaverengera muprofita jeremia tsamba iyi. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “tumira shoko iri kuvatapwa vose, uti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pashemaya, muneherami: nokuti shemaya akuprofitirai, kunyange ini ndisina kumutuma, uye aita kuti mutende nhema, zvanzi nayeahoh: zvirokwazvo ndicharanga shemaya muneherami nezvizvarwa zvake. haangavi nomunhu achasara pakati pavanhu ava, kana kuona zvinhu zvakanaka zvandichaitira vanhu vangu, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, nokuti akaparidza zvokundimukira.’ ”

30

iri ndiro shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, ‘nyora mubhuku mashoko ose andakakuudza. mazuva anouya,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘andichadzosa vanhu vangu, vaisraeri navayeahudha kubva kuutapwa. uye ndichavadzosera kunyika yandakapa madzitateguru avo kuti ive yavo,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.” aya ndiwo mashoko akataurwa nayeahoh pamusoro peisraeri neyeahudha: “zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘tinonzwa kuchema kwevanotya, kwokutyisidzirwa, kwete kworugare. bvunzai muone: ko, murume angagona kusununguka mwana here? zvino, seiko ndichiona murume mumwe nomumwe akasimba akabata padumbu pake namaoko ake somukadzi orwadziwa, zviso zvose zvachenuruka? haiwa, zuva iro richatyisa seiko! hakuna richafanana naro. ichava nguva yayaqobho yokutambudzika, asi achaponeswa pairi. “ ‘pazuva iro,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘ndichavhuna joko pamitsipa yavo uye ndichadambura zvisungo zvavo; havachazoitwizve varanda navatorwa. asi, vachashumira yeahoh allah wavo nadhavhidhi mambo wavo, iye wandichavamutsira. “ ‘saka, usatya, iwe yaqobho muranda wangu; usavhunduka, iwe israeri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘zvirokwazvo ndichakuponesa kubva kunyika iri kure, zvizvarwa zvako kubva kunyika youtapwa hwavo. yaqobho achavazve norunyararo uye nokuchengetedzeka, uye hakuna achazomutyisa. ndinewe uye ndichakuponesa,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘kunyange zvazvo ndakaparadza chose ndudzi dzose dzandakakuparadzira pakati padzo, handingazokuparadze zvachose iwe. ndichakuranga asi nokururamisira chete; handingakusiyi usina kurangwa zvachose.’ “zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘ronda rako harirapiki, kukuvadzwa kwako hakupori. hakuna anokureverera mhaka yako, vanga rako harina mushonga, hapana kuporeswa kwako. vose vaikuda vakakukanganwa; havachina hanya newe. ndakakurova sezvinoitwa nomuvengi ndikakuranga sezvinoitwa neano utsinye nokuti mhosva yako ihuru uye zvivi zvako zvakawanda. unochemeiko pamusoro pevanga rako, nokurwadziswa kwako kusingarapike? nokuda kwokukura kwemhaka yako nezvivi zvizhinji ndakaita zvinhu izvi kwauri. “ ‘asi vose vanokudya iwe vachadyiwawo; vavengi vako vose vachaenda kuutapwa. vanokupamba, vachapambwawo; vose vanokuparadza, ndichavaparadzawo. asi ndichakudzorera pautano uye ndichaporesa maronda ako,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘nokuti iwe wakanzi murashwa, zioni zvaro risina ane hanya naro.’ “zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘ndichadzosazve pfuma yamatende ayaqobho uye ndichanzwira ugaro hwake tsitsi; guta richavakwazve pamatongo aro, nomuzinda uchamira panzvimbo yawo yakafanira. nziyo dzokuvonga dzichabva kwavari uye nenzwi romufaro. ndichawedzera kuwanda kwavo, uye havangatapudzwi; ndichavavigira kukudzwa, uye havangadukupiswi, vana vavo vachava sepamazuva ekare, uye ungano yavo ichasimbiswa pamberi pangu; ndicharanga vose vanovamanikidza. mutungamiri wavo achava mumwe wokwavo; anovabata ushe achamutswa pakati pavo. ndichamuswededza pedyo uye iye achaswedera pedyo neni, nokuti ndianiko achazvipira kuti ave pedyo neni?’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘saka muchava vanhu vangu, neni ndichava allah wenyu.’ ” tarirai, dutu rayeahoh richaputika mukutsamwa kwake, mhepo inovhuvhuta ichimona pamisoro yavakaipa. kutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh hakungadzoki, kusvikira apedza zvinovavarirwa nomwoyo wake. mumazuva anouya muchanzwisisa izvozvi.

31

“panguva iyo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndichava allah wamarudzi ose aisraeri, naivo vachava vanhu vangu.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “vanhu vakapunyuka pamunondo vachawana nyasha mugwenga; ndichauya kuzopa zororo kuna israeri.” yeahoh akazviratidza kwatiri kare, achiti: “ndakakudai norudo rusingaperi; ndakakukwevai nokunaka kworudo rwangu. ndichakuvakazve, ipapo uchavakwa, iwe mhandara israeri. uchatorazve matambureni ako ugoenda kundotamba navanofara. zvakare, muchasima minda yemizambiringa pamusoro pezvikomo zvesamaria; varimi vachaisima, vagofadzwa nezvibereko zvayo. pachava nezuva richadanidzira nharirire dziri pamusoro pezvikomo zveefuremu, dzichiti, ‘uyai, ngatikwidzei kuzioni, kuna yeahoh allah wedu.’ ” zvanzi nayeahoh: “imbirai yaqobho nomufaro; pururudzirai mukuru wendudzi. paridzai, rumbidzai, muchiti, ‘haiwa yeahoh, ponesai vanhu venyu, ivo vakasara vaisraeri.’ tarirai, ndichavauyisa vachibva kunyika yokumusoro, uye ndigovaunganidza kubva kumigumo yenyika. pakati pavo pachava namapofu nezvirema, navanamai vane pamuviri navakadzi vanorwadziwa; boka guru richadzoka kuno. vachauya vachichema; vachanyengetera pandinenge ndichivadzosa. ndichavafambisa nepahova dzemvura, napanzira yakati chechetere yavasingagumburwi, nokuti ndiri baba vaisraeri, uye efuremu ndiye dangwe rangu. “inzwai shoko rayeahoh imi ndudzi dzose; muriparidze kuzviwi zviri kure muchiti: ‘iye akaparadzira israeri ndiye achavaunganidza, uye achavachengeta somufudzi anochengeta boka ramakwai ake.’ nokuti yeahoh achasunungura yaqobho, uye agovadzikinura kubva muruoko rwaivo vane simba kupinda ivo. vachauya vachipembera nomufaro pamusoro pezioni; vachafara nokupa zvakanaka kwayeahoh, nokuda kwezviyo, newaini itsva uye namafuta, makwayana nemombe. vachafanana nebindu rakanyatsodiridzwa, uye havachazosuwazve. ipapo varandakadzi vachatamba uye vachafara, majaya navatana vachafarawo. ndichashandura kuchema kwavo kuti kuve mufaro; ndichavanyaradza uye ndichavapa mufaro pachinzvimbo chokusuwa. ndichagutsa vaprista nezvakawanda, uye vanhu vangu vachazadzwa nokupa zvakanaka kwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh: “inzwi rinonzwikwa murama, rokuungudza nokuchema kukuru, rakeri achichema vana vake uye achiramba kunyaradzwa, nokuti vana vake havachipo.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “dzora inzwi rako pakuchema nameso ako pamisodzi, nokuti basa rako richaripirwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vachadzoka vachibva kunyika yomuvengi. saka ramangwana rako rine tariro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “vana vako vachadzokera kunyika yavo.” “zvirokwazvo ndanzwa kuchema kwaefuremu achiti: ‘makandirova semhuru isina kupingudzwa, nokudaro ndakarangwa. ndidzorei, ipapo ndichadzoka, nokuti imi ndimi yeahoh allah wangu. mushure mokutsauka kwangu, ndakatendeuka; ndakati ndanzwisisa ndakazvirova chipfuva. ndakanyadziswa uye ndakaninipiswa nokuti ndakatakura nyadzi dzouduku hwangu.’ ko, efuremu haasi mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, mwana anondifadza here? kunyange ndichimupikisa kazhinji, ndinoramba ndichimurangarira. naizvozvo, mwoyo wangu unomushuva; ndinomunzwira tsitsi kwazvo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “zvimisirei shongwe dzenzira; misai zvikwangwani. cherechedzai mugwagwa mukuru, mugwagwa wamunofamba nawo. dzoka, iwe mhandara israeri, dzokera kumaguta ako. uchadzungaira kusvikira rinhiko, iwe mwanasikana wokusatendeka? yeahoh achasika chinhu chitsva panyika, zvokuti mukadzi achambundikira murume.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: “pandichavadzosazve kubva kuutapwa, vanhu vari munyika yeyeahudha nomumaguta ayo vachataurazve mashoko aya okuti, ‘yeahoh ngaakuropafadze, iwe ugaro hwakarurama, iwe gomo dzvene.’ vanhu vachagara pamwe chete muyeahudha nomumaguta ayo ose, varimi navaya vanofamba namapoka avo. ndichasimbisa vanenge vaneta uye ndichagutsa vanenge vaziya.” ipapo ndakamuka ndokuringa-ringa. ndakanga ndarara zvakanaka. “mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andichasima muimba yaisraeri nomuimba yayeahudha zvibereko zvavanhu nezvibereko zvemhuka. sezvandakavarindira kuti ndidzure, ndikoromore, uye ndiwisire pasi, ndiparadze, ndiuyise njodzi, saizvozvo ndichavarindira, kuti ndivake uye ndisime,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mumazuva iwayo vanhu havangazoti, “ ‘madzibaba akadya mazambiringa anovava, mazino avana akaita hwadzira.’ asi, mumwe nomumwe achafa nokuda kwezvakaipa zvake; ani naani anodya mazambiringa anovava, mazino ake achaita hwadzira. “nguva inouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “yandichaita sungano itsva neimba yaisraeri uye neimba yayeahudha. haingazofanani nesungano yandakaita namadzitateguru avo, pandakavabata ruoko kuti ndivabudise munyika yeijipiti, nokuti vakaputsa sungano yangu, kunyange ndakanga ndiri murume kwavari,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “iyi indiyo sungano yandichaita neimba yaisraeri shure kwamazuva iwayo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichaisa murayiro wangu mundangariro dzavo uye ndigounyora mumwoyo yavo. ndichava allah wavo, uye ivo vachava vanhu vangu. hakuna munhu achadzidzisa muvakidzani wake kana hama yake, achiti, ‘ziva yeahoh,’ nokuti vose vachandiziva, kubva kumuduku wavo kusvikira kumukuru,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti ndichavakanganwira kuipa kwavo, uye handingarangaririzve zvivi zvavo.” zvanzi nayeahoh, iye anogadza zuva kuti rivhenekere masikati, anoisa chirevo kumwedzi nenyeredzi kuti zvivhenekere usiku, iye anomutsa gungwa kuti mafungu aro atinhire, yeahoh wamasimba ose, ndiro zita rake: “kana chete mitemo iyi ikabva pamberi pangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndiko kuti zvizvarwa zvaisraeri zvigume kuva rudzi pamberi pangu.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “kana chete matenga ari kumusoro akagona kuyerwa, uye nheyo dzenyika dziri pasi dzikagona kunzverwa, ipapo ndipo pandingarambe zvizvarwa zvaisraeri nokuda kwezvose zvavakaita,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andichavakirazve guta kubva pashongwe yehananeri kusvikira pasuo rekona. rwodzi rwokuyera ruchatandavara kubva ipapo kusvikira kuchikomo chegarebhi ndokudzoka ruchisvika kugoa. mupata wose unorasirwa zvitunha namadota, neminda yose kusvikira kumupata wekidhironi kumabvazuva kusvikira kukona resuo ramabhiza, zvichava zvitsvene kuna yeahoh. guta harichazombodzurwi kana kuparadzwazve.”

32

iri ndiro shoko rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh mugore regumi razedhekia mambo weyeahudha, riri gore regumi namasere ranebhukadhinezari. hondo yamambo nebhukadhinezari yakanga yakakomberedza jerusarema, uye jeremia muprofita akanga akapfigirwa muruvazhe rwavarindi rwakanga rwuri mumuzinda wamambo weyeahudha. zvino zedhekia mambo weyeahudha akanga amupfigira imomo, achiti, “unoprofitirei sezvaunoita? unoti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndava kuda kuisa guta rino mumaoko amambo webhabhironi, uye acharipamba. zedhekia mambo weyeahudha haangapukunyuki pamaoko avabhabhironi, asi zvirokwazvo achaiswa muruoko rwamambo webhabhironi, vagotaurirana vakatarisana chiso nechiso achimuona nameso ake. iye achaendesa zedhekia kubhabhironi, kwaachagara kusvikira ndagadzirisana naye, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. kana ukarwa navabhabhironi haungavakundi.’ ” jeremia akati, “shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti: hanameri mwanakomana wasekuru vako sharumi achauya kwauri achiti, ‘tenga munda wangu uri paanatoti, nokuti sezvo uriwe hama yepedyo, ndiwe une kodzero yokuutenga.’ “ipapo, sokutaura kwakanga kwaita yeahoh, sekuru wangu hanameri akauya kwandiri ndiri muruvazhe rwavarindi akati, ‘tenga munda wangu uri paanatoti munyika yebhenjamini. chizvitengera iwe kuti uve wako sezvo uriwe une kodzero yokuudzikinura.’ “ndakazviziva kuti iri raiva shoko rayeahoh; saka ndakatenga munda waiva paanatoti kubva kuna sekuru vangu hanameri ndokumuyerera mashekeri gumi namanomwe esirivha. ndakanyora rugwaro rwokutenga ndikarunama, ndikaita kuti pave nezvapupu, ndikamuyerera sirivha pazviyero. ndakatora gwaro rokutengeserana, riya rakanga rakanamwa riine mirayiro nezvimwe, pamwe chete neriya rakanga risina kunamwa, ndokupa gwaro iri kuna bharuki mwanakomana waneria, mwanakomana wamaseya, pamberi pahanameri mwanakomana wasekuru vangu napamberi pezvapupu zvakanga zvaisa runyoro pagwaro rokutengeserana, napamberi pavayeahudha vose vakanga vagere muruvazhe rwavarindi. “ndakarayira bharuki pamberi pavo, ndichiti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: tora magwaro aya, okutengeserana ari maviri akanamwa neasina kunamwa, ugoisa muhari yevhu kuitira kuti agare kwamazuva mazhinji. nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: dzimba, minda, uye minda yemizambiringa zvichatengwazve munyika ino.’ “mushure mokunge ndapa bharuki mwanakomana waneria gwaro rokutengeserana, ndakanyengetera kuna yeahoh, ndichiti: “haiwa, ishe yeahoh, ndimi makaita matenga nenyika nesimba renyu guru noruoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa. hakuna chinhu chakaoma kwamuri. imi munoratidza rudo rwenyu kuzviuru nezviuru asi muchiuyisa shamhu yezvivi zvamadzibaba pamakumbo avana vavo vanovatevera. haiwa imi allah mukuru ane simba guru, mune zita rinonzi yeahoh wamasimba ose, zvinangwa zvenyu zvikuru uye mabasa enyu makuru. meso enyu akasvinurira nzira dzose dzavanhu; munopa mumwe nomumwe zvakafanira mafambiro ake uye nezvakafanira mabasa ake. makaita zviratidzo nezvishamiso muijipiti uye mukaramba muchizviita kusvikira pazuva ranhasi, pakati peisraeri napakati pendudzi dzimwe dzose, uye mukazviwanira mukurumbira sezvazvakaita nanhasi. makabudisa vanhu venyu veisraeri kubva muijipiti nezviratidzo nezvishamiso, noruoko rune simba uye noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, uye nokutyisa kukuru. makavapa nyika ino yamakanga mapikira kupa madzibaba avo, nyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi. vakapinda vakaitora kuti ive yavo, asi havana kukuteererai kana kutevera murayiro wenyu; havana kuita zvamakanga mavarayira kuti vaite. saka makauyisa njodzi yose iyi pamusoro pavo. “tarirai mavakirwo ari kuitwa mirwi yokukomba kuti vatore guta. nokuda kwomunondo, nenzara uye denda, guta richaiswa mumaoko avabhabhironi vari kurirwisa. zvamakataura zvaitika sezvamuri kuona zvino. kunyange hazvo guta rino richizoiswa mumaoko avabhabhironi, imi, ishe yeahoh makati kwandiri, ‘zvitengere munda nesirivha uye uite kuti zvapupu zvivepo pakutengeserana uku.’ ” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna jeremia, richiti, “ndini yeahoh, allah wavanhu vose. ko, pane chinhu chingandiomera here? naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: ndava pedyo nokuisa guta rino mumaoko avabhabhironi, nokuna nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, uyo acharikunda. vabhabhironi vari kurwisa guta rino vachauya vagopinda vagoritungidza nomoto; vacharipisa, pamwe chete nedzimba dzavanhu vakanditsamwisa nokupisira zvinonhuhwira kuna bhaari pamusoro pamatenga adzo uye nokudururira zvipiriso zvokunwa kuna vamwe vamwari. “vanhu veisraeri navanhu veyeahudha havana kugona kuita chinhu chakanaka asi zvakaipa chete pamberi pangu kubva pauduku hwavo; zvirokwazvo vanhu veisraeri havana kumbogona kuita zvakanaka asi vakanditsamwisa nezvavakaita namaoko avo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. kubva pazuva rakavakwa guta rino kusvikira zvino, guta rino rakamutsa hasha dzangu nokunditsamwisa zvikuru zvokuti ndinofanira kuribvisa pamberi pangu. vanhu veisraeri navanhu veyeahudha vakanditsamwisa nezvakaipa zvose zvavakaita, ivo namadzimambo avo, namachinda avo, navaprista vavo, navaprofita vavo, ivo vanhu veyeahudha navanhu vejerusarema. vakandifuratira uye havana kunditarisa nezviso zvavo; kunyange ndakavadzidzisa ndadzidzisazve, havana kuteerera kana kutsiurika. vakaisa zvifananidzo zvavo zvinonyangadza mumba yakatumidzwa zita rangu vakaisvibisa. vakavakira bhaari nzvimbo dzakakwirira mumupata webheni hinomi kuti vabayire vanakomana navanasikana vavo kuna moreki, kunyange ndisina kuvarayira, kana kuzviisa mupfungwa dzangu, kuti vaite chinhu chinonyangadza zvakadai, nokudaro vagoita kuti yeahudha itadze. “imi munotaura pamusoro peguta rino muchiti, ‘guta rino richaiswa muruoko rwamambo webhabhironi, nomunondo, nenzara, uye nedenda’; zvanzi nayeahoh, allah weisraeri: zvirokwazvo ndichavaunganidza kubva kunyika dzose dzandakanga ndavadzingira pakutsamwa kwangu kukuru nehasha dzangu huru; ndichavadzosazve kunzvimbo ino ndigovagarisa zvakanaka. vachava vanhu vangu, ini ndichava allah wavo. ndichavapa mwoyo mumwe namaitiro mamwe, kuitira kuti vagare vachinditya zvigovanakira ivo navana vavo vanovatevera. ndichaita sungano isingaperi navo: handingatongomiri pakuvaitira zvakanaka uye ndichavakurudzira kuti vanditye, kuitira kuti varege kuzotsauka kubva kwandiri. ndichafarira kuvaitira zvakanaka uye zvirokwazvo ndichavasima munyika ino, nomwoyo wangu wose uye nomweya wangu wose. “zvanzi nayeahoh: sezvandakauyisa njodzi huru yose iyi pamusoro pavanhu ava, saizvozvo ndichavapa kubudirira kwose kwandakavavimbisa. zvakare, minda ichatengwa munyika ino yamunoti, ‘idongo, haina vanhu kana zvipfuwo, nokuti yakaiswa mumaoko avabhabhironi.’ minda ichatengwa nesirivha, uye magwaro okutengeserana achanyorwa, agonamwa uye agopupurirwa munyika yebhenjamini, mumisha yakapoteredza jerusarema, nomumaguta eyeahudha nomumaguta omunyika yezvikomo, nomujinga mezvikomo zvokumavirira, nokunegevhi, nokuti ndichadzosazve pfuma yavo, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.”

33

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kechipiri kuna jeremia panguva yaakanga akapfigirwa muruvazhe rwavarindi richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, iye akaita nyika, naiye akaiumba uye akaisimbisa, yeahoh ndiro zita rake, ‘danai kwandiri uye ndichakupindurai uye ndichakuudzai zvinhu zvikuru zvakavanzika zvamusingazivi.’ nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, pamusoro pedzimba dziri muguta rino uye nomuzinda wamadzimambo eyeahudha zvakakoromorerwa pasi kuti zvishandiswe pakuputsa mirwi yakakomba guta neminondo, mukurwisana navabhabhironi, ‘zvichazadzwa nezvitunha zvavanhu vandichauraya pakutsamwa kwangu nehasha dzangu. ndichavanzira guta rino chiso changu nokuda kwokuipa kwaro kwose. “ ‘kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, ndicharivigira utano nokurapwa; ndicharapa vanhu vangu uye ndichaita kuti vave norugare rwakawanda uye nokuchengetedzeka. ndichabvisazve yeahudha neisraeri norugare kubva kuutapwa ndivavakezve sepakutanga. ndichavanatsa pachivi chose chavakanditadzira ndigovakanganwira zvivi zvavo zvose zvokundimukira. ipapo guta rino richandivigira mukurumbira, mufaro, kurumbidzwa nokukudzwa pamberi pendudzi dzose dzepanyika dzinonzwa zvakanaka zvose zvandinoriitira; dzichatya uye dzichadedera nokuda kwokukura kwokubudirira norugare rwandinoripa.’ “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘munoti pamusoro penzvimbo ino, “yaparara, haina vanhu vanogaramo kana mhuka dzinogaramo.” asi mumaguta eyeahudha nomumigwagwa yejerusarema makasiyiwa musina chinhu, musisagarwi navanhu kana nemhuka, muchanzwikwazve manzwi nomufaro nokufarisisa, namanzwi emwenga nechikomba, namanzwi avaya vanouya nezvipo zvokuvonga kuimba yayeahoh, vachiti, “ ‘ “vongai yeahoh wamasimba ose, nokuti yeahoh akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” nokuti ndichadzosazve pfuma yenyika iyi sezvayaiva iri kare,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘munzvimbo ino, yakaparara uye isina vanhu kana mhuka, mumaguta ayo ose aripo muchava namafuro avafudzi okuvatisa makwai avo. mumaguta enyika yezvikomo, neemujinga mezvikomo zvokumavirira neokunegevhi, munyika yabhenjamini, nomumisha yakapoteredza jerusarema nomumaguta eyeahudha, makwai achapfuurazve napasi poruoko rwounoaverenga,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ ‘mazuva anouya,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, andichazadzisa chivimbiso chenyasha chandakaita kuimba yaisraeri nokuimba yayeahudha. “ ‘mumazuva iwayo uye nenguva iyoyo ndichameresa davi rakarurama rinobva kurudzi rwadhavhidhi; iye achatonga nyika nokururamisira uye nokururama. mumazuva iwayo yeahudha achaponeswa, uye jerusarema richagara rakachengetedzeka. iri ndiro zita rarichatumidzwa: yeahoh ndiye kururama kwedu.’ nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘dhavhidhi haangatongoshayiwi munhu angagara pachigaro choushe cheimba yaisraeri, kana vaprista, vorudzi rwarevhi, havangashayiwi munhu angamira pamberi pangu nguva dzose kuti apisire zvipiriso, apisire zvipiriso zvezviyo uye ape zvibayiro.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti: “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘kana mukagona kuputsa sungano yangu namasikati uye nesungano yangu nousiku, zvokuti masikati nousiku zvirege kuvapo nenguva yakatarwa, ipapo sungano yangu nadhavhidhi muranda wangu, nesungano yangu navarevhi avo vanova vaprista vanoshumira pamberi pangu, ingagona kuputsika uye dhavhidhi haangazovizve nomwanakomana angatonga ari pachigaro chake choushe. ndichawanza vana vomuranda wangu dhavhidhi navarevhi vanoshumira pamberi pangu zvokusaverengeka senyeredzi dzedenga uye zvokusagona kuyerwa sejecha regungwa.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “hauna kucherechedza here kuti vanhu ava vanoti, ‘yeahoh akaramba umambo hwose huri huviri hwaakanga asarudza’? saka vari kushora vanhu vangu nokusavaona sorudzi. zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘kana ndikasasimbisa sungano yangu namasikati nousiku nemitemo yakatemwa yematenga napasi, ipapo ndicharamba vana vayaqobho nadhavhidhi muranda wangu uye handingasarudzi mumwe wavanakomana vake kuti abate ushe pamusoro pavana vaabhurahama, isaka nayaqobho. nokuti ndichadzosa nhaka yavo uye ndichavanzwira tsitsi.’ ”

34

shoko iri rakasvika kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh, panguva iyo nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi nehondo yake yose, noushe hwose hwapanyika hwaakanga akabata, navanhu vose vakanga vachirwa nejerusarema namaguta ose akanga akaripoteredza, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri: enda kuna zedhekia mambo weyeahudha umuudze kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndava pedyo nokuisa guta rino muruoko rwamambo webhabhironi, uye acharipisa. iwe haungapukunyuki muruoko rwake asi zvirokwazvo uchabatwa ugoiswa mumaoko ake. uchaona mambo webhabhironi nameso ako, uye achataura newe makatarisana. uye iwe uchaenda kubhabhironi. “ ‘asi chinzwa chivimbiso chayeahoh, iwe zedhekia mambo weyeahudha. zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pako iwe: haungafi nomunondo; uchafa murunyararo. vanhu sezvavakavesa moto pamariro vachiremekedza madzibaba ako, iwo madzimambo akare akakutangira, saizvozvo vachavesa moto vachikuremekedza vagochema vachiti, “yowe-e, nhai tenzi!” ndini pachangu ndavimbisa izvi, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.’ ” ipapo muprofita jeremia akataurira zedhekia mambo weyeahudha zvose izvi, ari mujerusarema, hondo yamambo webhabhironi payakanga ichirwa nejerusarema namamwe maguta eyeahudha akanga achakashingirira, rakishi neazeka. aya ndiwo chete maguta akanga asara muyeahudha akakomberedzwa namasvingo. shoko rakasvika kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh mushure mokunge mambo zedhekia aita sungano navanhu vose vemujerusarema kuti vadanidzire kusunungurwa kwenhapwa. mumwe nomumwe aifanira kusunungura varanda vake vechihebheru, vose varume navakadzi; hakuna aifanira kurega hama yake yechiyeahudha iri pausungwa. saka machinda ose navanhu vose vakapinda pasungano iyi, vakatenderana ndokuvasunungura. asi mushure maizvozvo vakashandura pfungwa dzavo, vakadzosa nhapwa dzavakanga vasunungura ndokuvaita varanda zvakare. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah weisraeri: ndakaita sungano namadzitateguru enyu pandakavabudisa kubva muijipiti, munyika youranda. ndakati, ‘gore rechinomwe roga roga, mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kusunungura hama ipi zvayo yechihebheru yakazvitengesa kwaari. mushure mokukushandira makore matanhatu, unofanira kumurega aende.’ kunyange zvakadaro, madzibaba enyu haana kunditeerera kana kundirerekera nzeve dzavo. munguva shoma yakapfuura, makatendeuka mukaita zvakanaka pamberi pangu: mumwe nomumwe wenyu akadanidzira rusununguko kuvanhu venyika yokwake. makabva maita sungano pamberi pangu muimba inodanwa nezita rangu. asi zvino mashanduka ndokuzvidza zita rangu; mumwe nomumwe wenyu adzosa nhapwa dzavarume navakadzi vamakanga masunungura kuti vaende kwavaida. mavamanikidza kuti vave nhapwa dzenyu zvakare. “naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: hamuna kunditeerera; hamuna kudanidzira rusununguko kuvanhu venyika yokwenyu. saka, zvino ini ndava kukudanidzirai rusununguko, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘rusununguko’ rwokufa nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda. ndichakuitai chinhu chinonyangadza kuushe hwose hwenyika. varume vakadarika sungano yangu uye vakasazadzisa zvakatemwa zvesungano yavakaita pamberi pangu, ndichavaita semhuru yavakagura kuita mapandi maviri vakafamba napakati pamapandi acho. vatungamiri veyeahudha nejerusarema, namachinda omuruvazhe, navaprista navanhu vose venyika vakafamba napakati pamapandi emhuru, ndichavaisa mumaoko avavengi vavo vanotsvaka kuvauraya. zvitunha zvavo zvichava zvokudya zveshiri dzedenga nezvikara zvenyika. “ndichaisa zedhekia mambo weyeahudha namachinda ake mumaoko avavengi vavo avo vanotsvaka kuvauraya, nomumaoko ehondo yamambo webhabhironi, iyo yakabva kwamuri. ndicharayira, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, uye ndichavadzosa kuguta rino. vacharwa naro, vagorikunda, uye vagoripisa. uye ndichaparadza maguta eyeahudha, zvokuti hakuna angagaramo.”

35

iri ndiro shoko rakasvika kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh pamazuva okutonga kwajehoyakimi, mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, richiti, “enda kumhuri yavarekabhi undovakoka kuti vauye mune rimwe kamuri raparutivi rweimba yayeahoh ugovapa waini vanwe.” saka ndakaenda ndikandotora jaazania mwanakomana wajeremia, mwanakomana wahabhazinia, nehama dzake navakomana vake vose, mhuri yose yavarekabhi. ndakavapinza mumba mayeahoh, mukamuri ravanakomana vahanani mwanakomana waigidharia munhu waallah. yakanga iri pedyo nekamuri ramachinda, rakanga riri pamusoro peramaaseya mwanakomana washarumi, mutariri womukova. ipapo ndakagadzika hari dzizere newaini nemikombe pamberi pavarume vemhuri yavarekabhi ndikati kwavari, “inwai waini.” asi ivo vakapindura vakati, “hatinwi waini, nokuti tateguru wedu jonadhabhi mwanakomana warekabhi akatipa murayiro uyu wokuti, ‘imi kana vana venyu hamufaniri kunwa waini zvachose. zvakare, hamufaniri kutombovaka dzimba, kana kudyara mbeu kana kurima minda yemizambiringa; hamufaniri kuva nechimwe chezvinhu izvi, asi munofanira kugara mumatende nguva dzose. ipapo muchararama mazuva akawanda munyika iyo yamuri vatorwa.’ takateerera zvose zvatakarayirwa natateguru wedu jonadhabhi mwanakomana warekabhi. hapana akambonwa waini, isu kana vakadzi vedu, kana vanakomana vedu, kana vanasikana vedu, kana kuvaka dzimba dzokugara, kana kuva neminda yemizambiringa, kana minda, kana mbeu. takagara mumatende uye takanyatsoteerera zvose zvatakarayirwa natateguru wedu jonadhabhi. asi nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akati apinda munyika ino, isu takati, ‘uyai, tiende kujerusarema titize hondo yavabhabhironi neyavaaramu.’ saka takaramba tiri mujerusarema.” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: enda unoudza varume veyeahudha navanhu vejerusarema kuti, ‘hamudzidziwo chidzidzo here mugoteerera mashoko angu?’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘jonadhabhi mwanakomana warekabhi akarayira vanakomana vake kuti varege kunwa waini uye murayiro uyu wanga uchingochengetwa. kusvikira zuva ranhasi havanwi waini, nokuti vanoteerera murayiro watateguru wavo. asi ini ndakataura ndataurazve nemi, asi hamuna kunditeerera. ini ndakatuma ndatumazve kwamuri varanda vangu vose ivo vaprofita. ivo vakati kwamuri, “mumwe nomumwe wenyu anofanira kudzoka panzira dzakaipa dzake dzose mugonatsa zviito zvenyu; murege kutevera vamwe vamwari kuti muvashumire. ipapo muchagara munyika yandakakupai imi namadzibaba enyu.” asi hamuna kumborerekera nzeve dzenyu kwandiri kana kundinzwa. zvizvarwa zvajonadhabhi mwanakomana warekabhi vakachengeta murayiro wavakapiwa natateguru wavo, asi vanhu ava havana kunditeerera.’ “naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri: ‘inzwai! ndava kuuyisa pamusoro peyeahudha napamusoro pavose vagere mujerusarema njodzi dzose dzandakareva pamusoro pavo. ndakataura kwavari, asi havana kuteerera; ndakavadana, asi havana kudavira.’ ” ipapo jeremia akati kumhuri yavarekabhi, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ‘makateerera murayiro watateguru wenyu jonadhabhi, mukatevera zvaakarayira zvose uye mukaita zvose zvaakatema.’ naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ‘jonadhabhi mwanakomana warekabhi haangamboshayiwi munhu angandishumira.’ ”

36

mugore rechina rajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, shoko iri rakauya kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh, richiti, “tora rugwaro rwakapetwa unyoremo mashoko ose andakataura kwauri pamusoro peisraeri, napamusoro peyeahudha nedzimwe ndudzi dzose kubvira panguva yandakatanga kutaura kwauri panguva yokutonga kwajosia kusvikira iye zvino. zvimwe vanhu veyeahudha vakanzwa pamusoro penjodzi imwe neimwe yandakaronga kuisa pamusoro pavo, vangadzoka mumwe nomumwe wavo kubva pazvakaipa zvake; ipapo ndichavakanganwira zvakaipa zvavo nechivi chavo.” saka jeremia akadana bharuki mwanakomana waneria, najeremia, paaimuverengera mashoko ose akanga ataurwa nayeahoh kwaari, bharuki ainge achianyora murugwaro rwakapetwa. ipapo jeremia akataurira bharuki kuti, “ini ndakadziviswa, handigoni kuenda kutemberi yayeahoh. saka iwe enda kuimba yayeahoh pazuva rokutsanya undoverengera vanhu mashoko ayeahoh awakanyora murugwaro rwakapetwa ini ndichikutaurira. uverengere vanhu vose veyeahudha vanouya vachibva kumaguta avo. zvimwe vanganyengetera kuna yeahoh uye mumwe nomumwe wavo akadzoka kubva panzira dzake dzakaipa, nokuti kutsamwa nehasha dzakarehwa nayeahoh pamusoro pavanhu ava kukuru.” bharuki mwanakomana waneria akaita zvose zvaakataurirwa nomuprofita jeremia kuti aite; akaverenga mashoko ayeahoh kubva murugwaro rwakapetwa, ari patemberi yayeahoh. mumwedzi wepfumbamwe wegore rechishanu rajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, nguva yokutsanya pamberi payeahoh yakadanidzirwa kuvanhu vose mujerusarema navose vakanga vabva kumaguta eyeahudha. bharuki akaverengera vanhu vose mashoko ajeremia aiva murugwaro rwakapetwa, ari mumba mayeahoh, mukamuri ragemaria mwanakomana washafani munyori, raiva muruvazhe rwokumusoro pamuromo wesuo idzva retemberi yayeahoh. mikaya mwanakomana wagemaria, mwanakomana washafani, akati anzwa mashoko ose ayeahoh aibva murugwaro rwakapetwa, akaburuka akaenda kukamuri romunyori mumuzinda wamambo, makanga mugere machinda ose, aiti: erishama munyori, dheraya mwanakomana washemaya, erinatani mwanakomana waakibhori, gemaria mwanakomana washafani, zedhekia mwanakomana wahanania, nemamwe machinda ose. mushure mokunge mikaya avaudza zvose zvaakanga anzwa bharuki achiverengera vanhu kubva murugwaro rwakapetwa, machinda ose akatuma jehudhi mwanakomana wanetamia, mwanakomana washeremia, mwanakomana wakushi, kundoti kuna bharuki, “tora rugwaro rwakapetwa rwawaverengera vanhu, ugouya kuno.” saka bharuki mwanakomana waneria akaenda kwavari norugwaro rwakapetwa muruoko rwake. ivo vakati kwaari, “tapota, gara pasi utiverengerewo.” saka bharuki akavaverengera. vakati vanzwa mashoko ose aya, vakatarisana vachitya ndokuti kuna bharuki, “tinofanira kuzivisa mashoko ose aya kuna mambo.” ipapo vakabvunza bharuki, vakati, “tiudze, wakanyora sei izvi zvose? jeremia ndiye akakutaurira here?” bharuki akapindura akati, “hongu, akanditaurira mashoko ose aya, ini ndikaanyora neingi murugwaro rwakapetwa.” ipapo machinda akati kuna bharuki, “iwe najeremia endai munovanda. ngakurege kuva nomunhu anoziva kwamunenge muri.” vakati vaisa rugwaro rwakapetwa mukamuri yomunyori erishama, vakaenda kuna mambo muruvazhe ndokumuzivisa mashoko ose. mambo akatuma jehudhi kundotora rugwaro rwakapetwa, jehudhi ndokurutora mukamuri yaerishama munyori ndokuverengera mambo namachinda ose akanga amire parutivi rwake. wakanga uri mwedzi wepfumbamwe uye mambo akanga akagara muimba yakavakirwa nguva yechando, moto uchipfuta mumbaura yaiva pamberi pake. jehudhi aiti kana apedza kuverenga zvikamu zvitatu kana zvina zvorugwaro rwakapetwa, mambo aibva azvicheka nebanga ozvikanda mumbaura, kusvikira gwaro rose rapiswa mumoto. mambo navaranda vake vose vakanzwa mashoko aya ose havana kumboratidza kutya, kana kubvarura nguo dzavo. kunyange hazvo erinatani, dheraya, nagemaria vakakurudzira mambo kuti arege kupisa rugwaro rwakapetwa haana kuda kuvanzwa. pachinzvimbo chezvo, mambo akarayira jerameeri, mwanakomana wamambo, naseraya mwanakomana waazirieri nasheremia mwanakomana waabhudhieri kuti asunge bharuki munyori najeremia muprofita. asi yeahoh akanga avaviga. mambo akati apisa rugwaro rwakapetwa rwaiva namashoko akanga anyorwa nabharuki achitaurirwa najeremia, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “tora rumwe rugwaro rwakapetwa unyore pamusoro parwo mashoko ose akanga ari parugwaro rwokutanga rwuya rwakapiswa najehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha. uyezve uudze jehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha, kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: wakapisa rugwaro rwuya uchiti, “wakanyorerei parwuri uchiti zvirokwazvo mambo webhabhironi achauya kuzoparadza nyika ino nokuparadza zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo?” naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh pamusoro pajehoyakimi mambo weyeahudha: haangawani mumwe achagara pachigaro choushe chadhavhidhi; mutumbi wake uchakandwa kunze kunopisa masikati uye kune chando usiku. ndichamuranga navana vake uye navaranda vake nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavo; ndichauyisa pamusoro pavo navose vanogara mujerusarema navanhu veyeahudha njodzi imwe neimwe yandakareva pamusoro pavo, nokuti havana kuteerera.’ ” saka jeremia akatora rumwe rugwaro rwakapetwa ndokurupa kuna bharuki munyori, mwanakomana waneria, bharuki ndokunyora pamusoro parwo mashoko ose orugwaro rwakanga rwapiswa najehoyakimi, mambo weyeahudha, jeremia achimutaurira. mashoko akawanda akafanana nawo akawedzerwa.

37

zedhekia mwanakomana wajosia akagadzwa kuva mambo weyeahudha nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi; iye akabata ushe panzvimbo yajehoyakini mwanakomana wajehoyakimi. asi iye kana varanda vake kana vanhu venyika iyoyo, havana kuteerera mashoko akanga ataurwa nayeahoh kubudikidza najeremia muprofita. kunyange zvakadaro, mambo zedhekia akatuma jehukari mwanakomana washeremia, nomuprista zefania mwanakomana wamaaseya kuna jeremia muprofita namashoko aya: “ndapota tinyengetererewo kuna yeahoh allah wedu.” zvino jeremia akanga akasununguka kupinda nokubuda pakati pavanhu, nokuti akanga asati apfigirwa mutorongo. hondo yafaro yakanga yauya ichibva kuijipiti, zvino vabhabhironi vakanga vakakomba jerusarema vakati vanzwa shoko pamusoro pavo, vakabva pajerusarema. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia muprofita, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah weisraeri: udza mambo weyeahudha, iye akakutuma kuzondibvunza, kuti, ‘hondo yafaro yakauya kuzokubatsirai, ichadzokera kuijipiti kunyika yavo. ipapo vabhabhironi vachadzokazve vagorwisa guta rino; vacharikunda uye vacharipisa nomoto.’ “zvanzi nayeahoh: musazvinyengera muchifunga kuti, ‘zvirokwazvo vabhabhironi vachabva kwatiri.’ kwete, havangabvi! kunyange dai mungakunda hondo yose yavabhabhironi iri kukurwisai uye kugosara vakakuvara bedzi mumatende, ivavo vachauya vagopisa guta rino.” shure kwokubva kwehondo yavabhabhironi mujerusarema nokuda kwehondo yafaro, jeremia akatanga kubuda muguta kuti aende kunyika yebhenjamini kundotora mugove wake wenhaka pakati pavanhu ikoko. asi akati asvika pasuo rabhenjamini, mukuru wavarindi, ainzi irija mwanakomana washeremia, mwanakomana wahanania, akamusunga ndokuti, “iwe wava kutiza uchienda kuvabhabhironi!” jeremia akati, “handizvo, kwete! handizi kutiza ndichienda kuvabhabhironi!” asi irija haana kuda kumunzwa; asi akasunga jeremia ndokumuendesa kumachinda. ivo vakatsamwira jeremia vakaita kuti arohwe uye kuti aiswe mutorongo mumba majonatani munyori, yavakanga vaita torongo. jeremia akaiswa mutorongo romugomba, umo maakagara nguva yakareba. ipapo mambo zedhekia akatuma nhume kundomutora akaita kuti aiswe kumuzinda, kwaakamubvunza pakavanda, achiti, “pane shoko rabva kuna yeahoh here?” jeremia akapindura akati, “hongu, muchaiswa muruoko rwamambo webhabhironi.” ipapo jeremia akati kuna mambo zedhekia, “mhaka yandakapara nemi kana machinda enyu kana navanhu ava, ndeyeiko kuti mundipfigire mutorongo? varipiko vaprofita venyu vakakuprofitirai vachiti, ‘mambo webhabhironi haazi kuzokurwisai kana kurwisa nyika ino’? asi zvino ishe wangu mambo, ndapota inzwai. regai ndisvitse kwamuri chikumbiro changu: musandidzoserazve kumba kwajonatani munyori nokuti ndingafirako.” ipapo mambo zedhekia akarayira kuti jeremia aiswe muruvazhe rwavarindi uye kuti apiwe chingwa chaibva mumugwagwa wavabiki zuva rimwe nerimwe kusvikira musisina chingwa muguta. saka jeremia akaramba ari muruvazhe rwavarindi.

38

shefania mwanakomana wamatani nagedharia mwanakomana wapashuri mwanakomana wamarikiya vakanzwa zvaitaurwa najeremia kuvanhu vose paakati, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘ani naani achagara muguta rino achafa nomunondo, nenzara kana denda, asi ani naani achazvipira kuvabhabhironi achararama. achatiza noupenyu hwake; achararama.’ zvakare, zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘zvirokwazvo guta rino richaiswa mumaoko ehondo yamambo webhabhironi, ndiye acharikunda.’ ” ipapo machinda akati kuna mambo, “munhu uyu anofanira kufa. ari kuodza mwoyo yavarwi vakasara muguta rino, pamwe chete navanhu vose, nezvinhu zvaanotaura kwavari. uyu munhu haatsvaki zvakanakira vanhu ava asi kuparadzwa kwavo.” mambo zedhekia akapindura akati, “ari mumaoko enyu, mambo haana zvaangagona kupikisana nemi.” saka vakatora jeremia vakamuisa mugomba ramarikiya, mwanakomana wamambo, rakanga riri muruvazhe rwavarindi. vakaburutsira jeremia mugomba netambo: rakanga risina mvura mariri, asi madhaka bedzi, nokudaro jeremia akanyura mumadhaka. asi ebhedhi-mereki muetiopia aiva muchinda mumuzinda woushe, akazvinzwa kuti vakanga vaisa jeremia mugomba. panguva yakanga yakagara mambo pasuo rabhenjamini, ebhedhi-mereki akabuda mumuzinda woushe akati kwaari, “ishe wangu mambo, varume ava vaita zvakaipa kwazvo pane zvose zvavaita kumuprofita jeremia. vamukanda mugomba umo maachaziya nenzara akafa kana chingwa chapera muguta.” ipapo mambo akarayira ebhedhi-mereki muetiopia, akati, “tora varume makumi matatu pano uende navo munobudisa muprofita jeremia mugomba asati afa.” saka ebhedhi-mereki akatora varume akaenda navo kumba yaiva pasi pechivigiro chepfuma mumuzinda wamambo. akatorawo mamvemve nenguo tsaru kubva ipapo ndokuzvidzikisa pasi netambo kuna jeremia mugomba. ebhedhi-mereki muetiopia akati kuna jeremia, “isa mamvemve nenguo dzakasakara idzi muhapwa dzako kuti zviputire tambo.” jeremia akaita saizvozvo, ndokubva vamukweva netambo ndokumubudisa kubva mugomba. nokudaro jeremia akaramba ari paruvazhe rwavarindi. ipapo mambo zedhekia akatuma nhume akauyisa muprofita jeremia pamukova wechitatu wokupinda patemberi yayeahoh. mambo akati kuna jeremia, “ndinoda kukubvunza chimwe chinhu. usandivanzira chinhu.” jeremia akati kuna zedhekia, “kana ndikakupai mhinduro, hamuzondiurayi here? kunyange ndikakupai zano, hamunganditeereri.” asi mambo zedhekia akapikira jeremia mhiko iyi pakavanda achiti, “zvirokwazvo nayeahoh mupenyu, iye akatipa mweya watinofema, handingakuurayi kana kukuisa mumaoko eavo vanotsvaka kukuuraya.” ipapo jeremia akati kuna zedhekia, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ‘kana ukazvipira kuvaranda vamambo webhabhironi, upenyu hwenyu hucharwirwa uye guta rino haringapiswi; imi nemhuri muchararama. asi kana mukaramba kuzvipira kuvaranda vamambo webhabhironi, guta rino richaiswa mumaoko avabhabhironi uye vacharipisa; nemi pachenyu hamungapukunyuki pamaoko avo.’ ” mambo zedhekia akati kuna jeremia, “ndinotya vayeahudha vakaenda kuvabhabhironi, kuti vabhabhironi vangangondiisa mumaoko avo vakandiitira zvakaipa.” jeremia akati kwaari, “havangakuisiyi kwavari. teererai yeahoh nokuita zvandakuudzai. ipapo zvichakunakirai imi, uye upenyu hwenyu huchararamiswa. asi kana mukaramba kuzvipira, hezvino zvandakaratidzwa nayeahoh. vakadzi vose vakasara mumuzinda wamambo weyeahudha vachabudiswa vachiendeswa kumachinda amambo webhabhironi. vakadzi ivavo vachati kwamuri: “ ‘vakakutsausai uye vakakukundai, ivo shamwari dzamaivimba nadzo. tsoka dzenyu dzanyura mumadhaka; shamwari dzenyu dzakakutizai.’ “vakadzi venyu vose navana vachabudiswa vachiendeswa kuvabhabhironi. nemi pachenyu hamungapukunyuki mumaoko avo, asi muchabatwa namambo webhabhironi; uye guta rino richapiswa.” ipapo zedhekia akati kuna jeremia, “ngakurege kuva nomunhu anoziva zvatakurukura izvi nokuti ungafa. kana machinda akanzwa kuti ndakataura newe, vakauya kwauri vachiti, ‘tiudze zvawataura kuna mambo uye zvarehwa namambo kwauri; usativanzira kuti tirege kukuuraya,’ ipapo uvaudze kuti, ‘ndanga ndichikumbira kuna mambo kuti arege kundidzoserazve kuimba yajonatani kuti ndinofirako.’ ” machinda ose akauya kuna jeremia ndokumubvunza, iye akavaudza zvinhu zvose zvaakanga arayirwa namambo kuti ataure. naizvozvo vakarega kutaura naye zvakare, nokuti hapana akanga anzwa zvaakanga akurukura namambo. naizvozvo jeremia akaramba ari muruvazhe rwavarindi kusvikira pazuva rakapambwa jerusarema.

39

uku ndiko kutorwa kwakaitwa jerusarema: mugore repfumbamwe ramambo zedhekia mambo weyeahudha, mumwedzi wegumi, nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akauya kuzorwisa jerusarema nehondo yake yose uye akarikomba. zvino mugore regumi nerimwe razedhekia, pazuva repfumbamwe romwedzi wechina, masvingo eguta akakoromorwa. ipapo machinda ose amambo webhabhironi akauya ndokugara pasuo rapakati, vaiti: nerigari-sharezeri wesamugari nanebho-saresekimi mukuru wavaranda vamambo webhabhironi, nanerigari-sharezeri mukuru aiva nechinzvimbo chapamusoro, namamwe machinda ose amambo webhabhironi. zedhekia mambo weyeahudha navarwi vose vakati vavaona, vakatiza; vakabuda muguta usiku vakaenda nenzira yokubindu ramambo, napasuo raiva pakati pamasvingo maviri, ndokunanga kuarabha. asi hondo yavabhabhironi yakavadzinganisa ndokubatira zedhekia mumapani ejeriko. vakamubata ndokumuendesa kuna nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi paribhira munyika yehamati kwaakamupa mutongo wake. ipapo paribhira mambo webhabhironi akauraya vanakomana vazedhekia pamberi pake uye akaurayawo makurukota ose eyeahudha. ipapo akatumbura meso azedhekia ndokumusunga nengetani kuti aende naye kubhabhironi. vabhabhironi vakapisa muzinda wamambo nedzimba dzavanhu vakakoromora masvingo ejerusarema. nebhuzaradhani mukuru wehondo yavarindi akaendesa kubhabhironi vanhu vakanga vasara muguta pamwe chete navaya vakanga vazvipira kwaari uye noruzhinji rwavanhu. asi nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akasiya munyika yeyeahudha vamwe varombo vakanga vasina chinhu; uye panguva iyoyo akavapa minda yemizambiringa nemimwe minda. zvino nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akanga arayira izvi pamusoro pajeremia kubudikidza nanebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi, achiti, “mutorei mumuchengete; musamuitira zvakaipa asi mumuitire zvose zvaanokumbira.” saka nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi, nanebhushazibhani mukuru wavaranda, nanerigari-sharezeri aiva mukuru wenʼanga namamwe machinda ose amambo webhabhironi vakatumira nhume kuti jeremia abviswe paruvazhe rwavarindi. vakamuendesa kuna gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani, kuti vamudzosere kumusha kwake. saka akaramba agere pakati pavanhu vokwake. shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia achakapfigirwa muruvazhe rwavarindi, richiti, “enda undoudza ebhedhi-mereki muetiopia kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ndava pedyo kuzadzisa mashoko angu pamusoro peguta rino nenjodzi, kwete kubudirira. panguva iyoyo zvichazadzisika pamberi pako. asi iwe ndichakurwira pazuva iro, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, haungaiswi mumaoko evaunotya. ndichakuponesa; haungaurayiwi nomunondo asi uchatiza noupenyu hwako, nokuti unovimba neni, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.’ ”

40

shoko rakasvika kuna jeremia richibva kuna yeahoh mushure mokusunungurwa kwake parama nanebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi. akanga awana jeremia akasungwa nengetani ari pakati pavatapwa vose vaibva kujerusarema neyeahudha avo vakanga vachiendeswa kuutapwa kubhabhironi. mukuru wavarindi akati awana jeremia, akati kwaari, “yeahoh allah wako akatenda kuti njodzi iyi iwire nzvimbo ino. zvino yeahoh aita kuti zviitike, aita sezvaakareva kuti achaita. izvi zvose zvakaitika nokuti imi vanhu makatadzira yeahoh uye hamuna kumuteerera. asi nhasi ndinokusunungura kubva pangetani dziri mumaoko ako. uya tiende tose kubhabhironi, kana uchida, ini ndichakuchengeta; asi kana usingadi, usauya. tarira, nyika yose iri pamberi pako; enda hako kwose kwaunoda.” kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, jeremia asati atendeuka kuti aende, nebhuzaradhani akaenderera mberi achiti, “dzokera kuna gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani uyo akagadzwa namambo webhabhironi kuti ave mubati wemaguta eyeahudha, undogara naye pakati pavanhu, kana kuti woenda kwose kwaunoda.” ipapo mukuru wavarindi akamupa zvokudya zvokutakura nezvipo akamurega achienda. saka jeremia akaenda kuna gedharia mwanakomana waahikami pamizipa akandogara naye pakati pavanhu vakanga vasara munyika. vakuru vehondo navanhu vakanga vachigara mumasango enyika vakati vanzwa kuti mambo webhabhironi akanga agadza gedharia mwanakomana waahikami kuti ave mubati wenyika uye kuti mambo akanga amuita mutariri wavarume, vakadzi navana, avo vakanga vari varombo zvakanyanya munyika uye vakanga vasina kuendeswa pautapwa kubhabhironi, vakauya kuna gedharia pamizipa, ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, johanani najonatani vanakomana vakarea, naseraya mwanakomana watanhumeti, mwanakomana waefai munetofati, najaazania mwanakomana womumaakati, ivo navanhu vavo. gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani, akapika mhiko yokuvasimbisa ivo navanhu vavo achiti, “musatya kushandira vabhabhironi. garai henyu munyika mushandire mambo webhabhironi, zvigokuitirai zvakanaka. ini pachangu ndichagara pamizipa kuti ndikumirirei pamberi pavabhabhironi vanouya kwatiri, asi imi munofanira kukohwa waini, nezvibereko zvezhizha namafuta mugozviisa mumidziyo yenyu, mugogara mumaguta amakakunda.” vayeahudha vose vaiva mumoabhu, muamoni, nevemuedhomu nedzimwe nyika dzose vakati vanzwa kuti mambo webhabhironi akanga asiya vamwe vanhu muyeahudha uye kuti akanga agadza gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani, somubati pamusoro pavo, vose vakadzoka kunyika yeyeahudha, kuna gedharia pamizipa, vachibva kunyika dzose kwavakanga vakaparadzirwa. uye vakakohwa waini yakawanda nezvibereko zvezhizha zvizhinji kwazvo. johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vose vehondo vakanga vachiri kumasango vakauya kuna gedharia pamizipa. vakati kwaari, “hauzivi here kuti bhaarisi mambo wavaamoni atuma ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania kuti azokuuraya?” asi gedharia mwanakomana waahikami haana kuvatenda. ipapo johanani mwanakomana wakarea akati kuna gedharia muchivande vari pamizipa, “rega ndinouraya ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, uye hapana achazviziva. anodirei kukuuraya nokuita kuti vayeahudha vose vakaungana, vakakupoteredza, vaparadzirwe uye vakasara veyeahudha vaparare?” asi gedharia mwanakomana waahikami akati kuna johanani mwanakomana wakarea, “usaita chinhu chakadaro! zvauri kutaura pamusoro paishumaeri hazvisi zvechokwadi.”

41

mumwedzi wechinomwe, ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, mwanakomana waerishama, uyo akanga ari worudzi rwamambo, uye akanga ari mumwe wamachinda amambo, akauya ane varume gumi kuna gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, pamizipa. vachiri kudya pamwe chete ipapo, ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania navarume gumi vakanga vanaye vakasimuka vakabaya gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, mwanakomana washafani, nomunondo, vakamuuraya iye akanga agadzwa namambo webhabhironi kuti ave mubati wenyika iyo. ishumaeri akaurayawo vayeahudha vose vaiva nagedharia pamizipa, pamwe chete navarwi vebhabhironi vaivapo. zuva rakatevera kuurayiwa kwagedharia, pasati pava nomunhu aizviziva, varume makumi masere vaibva kushekemu, neshiro nesamaria vakasvikapo vakaveura ndebvu dzavo, vakabvarura nguo dzavo uye vakazvicheka-cheka, vachiuya nezvipiriso zvezviyo nezvinonhuhwira kuimba yayeahoh. ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania akabuda pamizipa kuti andovachingamidza, akafamba achichema. paakasangana navo, akati kwavari, “uyai kuna gedharia mwanakomana waahikami.” vakati vapinda muguta, ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania navarume vakanga vanaye vakavauraya ndokuvakanda mugomba. asi vamwe vavo gumi vakati kuna ishumaeri, “musatiuraya! isu tine gorosi nebhari, namafuta uye nouchi, zvakavigwa musango.” naizvozvo akavarega akasavauraya pamwe chete navamwe. zvino gomba raakakandira mitumbi yose yavarume vaakanga auraya pamwe chete nagedharia ndiro rakanga racherwa namambo asa kuti azvidzivirire kubva kuna bhaasha mambo weisraeri. ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania akarizadza navakaurayiwa. ishumaeri akatapa vanhu vose vakanga vari pamizipa, vanasikana vamambo pamwe chete navamwe vose vakanga vasara ikoko, vaiswa nanebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi pasi pagedharia mwanakomana waahikami. ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania akavatapa ndokubvapo achida kuti ayambukire kuvaamoni. johanani mwanakomana wakarea namachinda ose ehondo vaiva naye vakati vanzwa pamusoro pemhaka dzose dzakanga dzaparwa naishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania, vakatora varume vose ndokuenda kundorwa naishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania. vakanomubatira pedyo nedziva guru regibheoni. vanhu vose vaiva naishumaeri vakati vachiona johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vehondo vakanga vainaye, vakafara. vanhu vose vakanga vatapwa naishumaeri pamizipa vakadzoka vakaenda kuna johanani mwanakomana wakarea. asi ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania navarume vasere vakapunyuka kubva kuna johanani vakatizira kuvaamoni. ipapo johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vose vehondo vaiva naye vakatungamirira vose vakasara kubva pamizipa avo vaakanga anunura kubva kuna ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania shure kwokunge auraya gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, vaiti: varwi, vakadzi, vana namachinda edare vaakanga abva navo kugibheoni. vakaenderera mberi ndokunomira vava pageruti kimihami pedyo nebheterehema parwendo rwavo rwokuenda kuijipiti kuti vatize vabhabhironi. vakanga vachitya nokuti ishumaeri mwanakomana wanetania akanga auraya gedharia mwanakomana waahikami, uyo akanga agadzwa kuti ave mubati wenyika iyo namambo webhabhironi.

42

ipapo vakuru vose vehondo, pamwe chete najohanani mwanakomana wakarea najezania mwanakomana wahoshaya, navanhu vose kubva kuvaduku kusvikira kuvakuru vakasvika kuna jeremia muprofita vakati kwaari, “tapota inzwai chikumbiro chedu mutinyengeterere kuna yeahoh allah wenyu nokuda kwavose ava vakasara. nokuti sezvamunoona zvino, kuti kunyange taiva vazhinji, iye zvino kwangosara vashoma chete. nyengeterai kuti yeahoh allah wenyu atiudze kwatinofanira kuenda uye zvatinofanira kuita.” jeremia muprofita akapindura achiti, “ndakunzwai. zvirokwazvo ndichakunyengetererai kuna yeahoh allah wenyu sezvamakumbira, ndichakuzivisai zvinhu zvose zvicharehwa nayeahoh uye handingambokuvanzirai chinhu.” ipapo vakati kuna jeremia, “yeahoh ngaave chapupu chezvokwadi uye chakatendeka pamusoro pedu kana tisingaiti zvose zvamunenge matumwa nayeahoh kuzotiudza. kana zvakanaka, kana zvisina kunaka tichateerera yeahoh allah wedu, watinokutumai kwaari kuti zvigotiitira zvakanaka, nokuti tichateerera yeahoh allah wedu.” mazuva gumi akati apera, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia. naizvozvo akaunganidza johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vose vehondo vaaiva navo navanhu vose kubva kuvaduku kusvikira kuvakuru. akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, iye wamakanditumira kwaari kuti ndisvitse chikumbiro chenyu: ‘kana mukagara munyika ino, ndichakuvakai handizokukoromorei; ndichakusimai uye handingakudzurei, nokuti ndinorwadziwa nokuda kwenjodzi yandakaisa pamusoro penyu. musatya mambo webhabhironi, iye wamunotya zvino. musamutya, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, nokuti ndinemi uye ndichakuponesai nokukuponesai kubva mumaoko ake. ndichakunzwirai tsitsi kuitira kuti agokunzwirai tsitsi, agokudzoserai kunyika yenyu.’ “kunyange zvakadaro, kana mukati, ‘hatidi kugara munyika ino,’ nokudaro musingateerere yeahoh allah wenyu, uye kana mukati, ‘kwete tichaenda kundogara kuijipiti, kwatisingazooni hondo kana kunzwa hwamanda kana kunzwa nzara yechingwa,’ zvino chinzwai shoko rayeahoh imi vakasara vayeahudha. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, ‘kana mashinga kuenda kuijipiti kana mukaenda kundogarako, ipapo munondo wamunotya uchakukundai ikoko uye nenzara yamunotya ichakuteverai kuijipiti, uye muchafira ikoko. zvirokwazvo, vose vashinga kuenda kuijipiti kundogarako vachafa nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda; hakuna achasara pakati pavo kana kupukunyuka njodzi yandichauyisa pamusoro pavo.’ zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, ‘sokudururwa kwakaitwa hasha dzangu nokutsamwa kwangu pamusoro peavo vaigara mujerusarema, saizvozvo kutsamwa kwangu kuchadururirwa pamusoro penyu kana maenda kuijipiti. muchava chinhu chinotukwa nechinosemwa, nechinomhurwa, nokuzvidzwa; hamuchazombooni nzvimbo ino zvakare.’ “haiwa imi vakasara veyeahudha, yeahoh akuudzai kuti, ‘musaenda kuijipiti.’ ivai nechokwadi: ndinokuyambirai nhasi kuti makakanganisa kwazvo pamakandituma kuna yeahoh allah wenyu muchiti, ‘tinyengeterere kuna yeahoh allah wedu, utiudze zvose zvaanoreva uye isu tichazviita.’ ndakuudzai nhasi, asi kunyange zvakadaro hamuna kuteerera yeahoh allah wenyu pane zvose zvaakandituma kuzokuzivisai imi. saka zvino, ivai nechokwadi nezvizvi: muchafa nomunondo, nenzara, uye nedenda kunzvimbo yamunoda kuenda kundogara.”

43

jeremia akati apedza kuudza vanhu mashoko ose ayeahoh allah wavo, zvose zvaakanga atumwa nayeahoh kuti avaudze, azaria mwanakomana wahoshaya najohanani mwanakomana wakarea navarume vose vaizvikudza vakati kuna jeremia, “unoreva nhema iwe! yeahoh allah wedu haana kukutuma kuti uzoti, ‘hamufaniri kuenda kuijipiti kundogara ikoko.’ asi bharuki mwanakomana waneria ndiye anokukurudzirai pamusoro pedu kuti tiendeswe kuvabhabhironi, kuti vagotiuraya kana kutitora vachitiendesa kubhabhironi.” naizvozvo johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vose vehondo navanhu vose havana kuteerera murayiro wayeahoh kuti vagare munyika yeyeahudha. panzvimbo paizvozvo johanani mwanakomana wakarea navakuru vose vehondo vakatora vakasara vose veyeahudha vakanga vadzoka kuzogara munyika yeyeahudha kubva kundudzi dzose kwavakanga vaparadzirwa. vakatorawo varume vose, vakadzi navana navanasikana vamambo vakanga vasiyiwa nanebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi vamambo kuna gedharia mwanakomana washafani, najeremia muprofita uye nabharuki mwanakomana waneria. saka vakapinda muijipiti vasingateereri yeahoh vakaenda zvokutosvika kutapanesi. vari patapanesi, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia, richiti, “tora mabwe makuru uavige mudhaka pakati pezvitinha panopindwa napo kumuzinda wafaro uri patapanesi, vayeahudha vakatarisa. ipapo uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ndichatuma shoko kumuranda wangu nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, uye ndichaisa chigaro chake choushe pamusoro pamabwe aya andaviga pano; achatambanudza denga rake roushe pamusoro pawo. achauya agorwisa ijipiti, achivigira rufu kuna avo vakatongerwa rufu, kutapwa kuna vakatongerwa utapwa, nomunondo kuna avo vakatongerwa munondo. achapisa temberi dzavamwari veijipiti; achapisa temberi dzavo agotapa vamwari vavo. sokumonera kunoita mufudzi nguo yake, saizvozvo achamonera nyika yeijipiti agobvako asina vanga. imomo, mutemberi yezuva iri muijipiti, achaputsa mbiru dzinoera uye achapisa temberi dzavamwari veijipiti.’ ”

44

shoko iri rakasvika kuna jeremia pamusoro pavayeahudha vose vakanga vagere zasi kweijipiti, mumigidhori nomutapanesi nomunofi, nokumusoro kweijipiti, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: makaona njodzi huru yandakauyisa pamusoro pejerusarema nomumaguta ose eyeahudha. nhasi uno asiyiwa angova matongo nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavakaita. vakanditsamwisa nokuda kwokupisira zvinonhuhwira uye nokunamata vamwe vamwari vavasina kumboziva ivo kana imi kana madzibaba enyu. ndakatuma ndatumazve varanda vangu vaprofita kuti vati, ‘regai kuita chinhu chinonyangadza chandinovenga!’ asi havana kunzwa kana kuteerera: havana kudzoka kubva pane zvakaipa zvavo kana kurega kupisa zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari. naizvozvo kutsamwa kwangu kunotyisa kwakadururwa; kukapisa maguta eyeahudha uye nenzira dzejerusarema ndikazviparadza zvikava matongo sezvazvakaita nhasi. “zvino, zvanzi nayeahoh, wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: munouyisireiko njodzi yakakura kudai pamusoro penyu nokuparadzira kubva kuyeahudha varume navakadzi, navana, navacheche nokudaro muchisara musina kana nomumwe? munonditsamwisireiko nezvamunoita namaoko enyu, muchipisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari vomuijipiti kwamakaenda kundogara? muchazviparadza pachenyu mukazviita chinhu chinotukwa nechinozvidzwa pakati pendudzi dzose dzepanyika. makanganwa here zvakashata zvakaitwa namadzibaba enyu namadzimambo navanamambokadzi veyeahudha uye zvakashata zvakaitwa nemi navakadzi venyu munyika yeyeahudha nomunzira dzejerusarema? kusvikira pazuva ranhasi havana kuzvininipisa kana kuratidza rukudzo, kana kutevera murayiro wangu nezvirevo zvangu zvandakatema pamberi penyu napamberi pamadzibaba enyu. “naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: ndafunga kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro penyu ndigoparadza yeahudha yose. ndichabvisa vakasara veyeahudha vakanga vashinga kuenda kuijipiti kundogarako. vose vachafira muijipiti, vachafa nomunondo kana kufa nenzara. kubva kumuduku kusvikira kumukuru, vachafa nomunondo kana nenzara. vachava chinhu chinotukwa nechinosemwa, chinhu chinoshorwa nechinonyadzisa. ndicharanga vaya vanogara kuijipiti nomunondo, nenzara uye nedenda sokuranga kwandakaita jerusarema. hakuna kuna vakasara veyeahudha vakaenda kunogara kuijipiti vachapunyuka kana kurarama kuti vadzoke kunyika yeyeahudha, uko kwavanoshuva kuti vadzokere kundogara; hakuna achadzoka kunze kwavashoma vachatiza.” ipapo varume vose vaiziva kuti vakadzi vavo vaipisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari, pamwe chete navakadzi vose vaivapo, ungano huru, navanhu vose vakanga vagere kumusoro nezasi kweijipiti, vakati kuna jeremia, “hatingateereri shoko rawataura kwatiri muzita rayeahoh! zvirokwazvo tichaita zvinhu zvose zvatakati tichaita. tichapisira zvinonhuhwira kuna mambokadzi wokudenga nokumudururira zvipiriso zvokunwa sezvatakaita isu namadzibaba edu, namadzimambo edu uye namachinda edu mumaguta eyeahudha nomunzira dzomujerusarema. panguva iyoyo takanga tine zvokudya zvizhinji uye takanga tigere zvakanaka tisina zvaitirwadza. asi kubva patakamira kupisira zvinonhuhwira kuna mambokadzi wokudenga nokudururira zvipiriso zvokunwa kwaari, hapana chatakawana uye tanga tichingofa nomunondo nenzara.” vakadzi vakapamhidzira vachiti, “patakapisira zvinonhuhwira kuna mambokadzi wokudenga, uye tikadururira zvipiriso zvokunwa kwaari, varume vedu vakanga vasingazivi here kuti taimuitira makeke akaita somufananidzo wake uye tichimudururira zvipiriso zvinonwiwa?” ipapo jeremia akati kuvanhu vose, varume navakadzi, vakanga vachimupindura, “ko, yeahoh haana kurangarira here uye akafunga pamusoro pezvinonhuhwira zvaipiswa mumaguta eyeahudha nomunzira dzejerusarema nemi namadzibaba enyu namadzimambo enyu namachinda enyu uye navanhu venyika? yeahoh akati haasisina mwoyo murefu pakuipa kwezviito zvenyu nezvinhu zvinonyangadza zvamakaita, nyika yenyu ikava chinhu chinotukwa uye nedongo risina anogaramo, sezvazvakaita nhasi. nokuda kwokuti makapisira zvinonhuhwira uye makatadzira yeahoh uye hamuna kumuteerera kana kutevera murayiro wake kana zvirevo zvake kana zvaakatema, njodzi iyi yaiswa pamusoro penyu sezvamunoona zvino.” ipapo jeremia akati kuvanhu vose kusanganisira vakadzi, “inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi vanhu vose veyeahudha vari muijipiti. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: imi navakadzi venyu maratidza nezviito zvenyu, zvamakavimbisa pamakati, ‘zvirokwazvo mhiko dzedu dzatakapika tichadzizadzisa nokupisa zvinonhuhwira uye nokudururira zvipiriso zvokunwa kuna mambokadzi wokudenga.’ “endererai henyu mberi zvino, itai zvamakavimbisa! chengetai mhiko dzenyu! asi inzwai shoko rayeahoh, imi vayeahudha mose munogara muijipiti: ‘ndinopika nezita rangu guru,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘kuti hakuna anobva kuyeahudha agere papi napapi zvapo muijipiti achadana zita rangu kana kupika achiti: “zvirokwazvo naishe yeahoh mupenyu,” nokuti ndinovarindira kuti ndivaitire zvakaipa kwete zvakanaka, vayeahudha vari muijipiti vachafa nomunondo uye nenzara kusvikira vose vaparadzwa. avo vachapunyuka pamunondo vakadzokera kunyika yeyeahudha vachibva kuijipiti vachava vashoma kwazvo. ipapo vose vakasara vavayeahudha vakauya kuzogara kuijipiti vachaziva kuti shoko rinogara nderani, rangu kana ravo. “ ‘ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo kwauri chokuti ndichakuranga panzvimbo ino,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘kuitira kuti muzive kuti mashoko eyambiro yangu pamusoro penyu achamira zvirokwazvo.’ zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘ndiri kuisa faro hofira mambo weijipiti mumaoko avavengi vake vanotsvaka kumuuraya, sezvandakaita zedhekia mambo weyeahudha mumaoko anebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, iye muvengi akanga achitsvaka kumuuraya.’ ”

45

izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nomuprofita jeremia kuna bharuki mwanakomana waneria, mugore rechina rajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha, shure kwokunyora kwabharuki rugwaro rwamashoko ajeremia aakanga achimudaidzira, achiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, kunewe bharuki: iwe wakati, ‘ndine nhamo! yeahoh apamhidzira kusuwa pakurwadziwa kwangu; ndaneta nokugomera uye ndashayiwa zororo.’ ” yeahoh akati, “uti kwaari, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndichakoromora zvandakavaka uye ndichadzura zvandakasima panyika yose. iwe ungazvitsvakira zvinhu zvikuru here? usazvitsvaka. nokuti ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavanhu vose, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, asi ndichaita kuti utize noupenyu hwako kwose kwaunoenda.’ ”

46

iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna jeremia muprofita pamusoro pendudzi: pamusoro peijipiti: iri ndiro shoko pamusoro pehondo yafaro neko mambo weijipiti, yakakundwa pakarikemishi, parwizi yufuratesi nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi mugore rechina rajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajosia mambo weyeahudha: “gadzirai nhoo dzenyu, dzose huru neduku, mubude kundorwa! sungai mabhiza, sungirirai zvigaro! mirai panzvimbo yenyu makapfeka nguwani! rodzai mapfumo enyu, pfekai nguo dzenyu dzokurwa! ndinooneiko? vavhundutswa, vari kudzokera shure, mhare dzavo dzakundwa. vari kutiza nokukurumidza vasingacheuki, uye pano kutya kumativi ose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. vanogona kumhanya havangatizi, uye vakasimba havangapunyuki. nechokumusoro parwizi yufuratesi vanogumburwa vagowa. ndianiko uyu anozara serwizi nairi, senzizi dzamapopopo emvura? ijipiti yazara senairi, senzizi dzamapopopo. inoti, “ndichazara ndigofukidza nyika; ndichaparadza maguta navanhu vawo.” virimai, imi mabhiza! chairai nehasha, imi vatasvi vengoro! fambirai mberi, imi mhare, varume veetiopia neputi vanoitakura nhoo, varume veridhia vanowembura uta. asi zuva iro nderashe, iye yeahoh wamasimba ose, iro zuva rokutsiva, rokutsiva vavengi vake. munondo uchadya kusvikira waguta, kusvikira wapodza nyota yawo neropa. nokuti ishe, iye yeahoh wamasimba ose, achabayira chibayiro kunyika yokumusoro parwizi yufuratesi. “kwidza kugireadhi undotora bharimu, iwe mwanasikana mhandara yeijipiti. asi unongowanza mishonga pasina; kuporeswa kwako hapana. ndudzi dzichanzwa nezvokunyadziswa kwako; kuchema kwako kuchazadza nyika. mhare ichabondera pane imwe mhare; vachawira pasi pamwe chete.” iri ndiro shoko rakataurwa nayeahoh kuna jeremia muprofita, pamusoro pokuuya kwanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi kuzorwa neijipiti achiti: “zivisai izvi muijipiti, mugozviparidza pamigidhori; zviparidzeiwo panofi netapanesi muchiti: ‘torai nzvimbo yenyu uye muzvigadzirire, nokuti munondo unodya vakakupoteredzai.’ ko, mhare dzenyu dzingadzikisirwei? havangagoni kumira, nokuti yeahoh achavadzikisa pasi. vacharamba vachingogumburwa; vachawa mumwe nomumwe pamusoro pomumwe. vachati, ‘simukai, ngatidzokerei kuvanhu vokwedu nokunyika yedu, kure nomunondo womumanikidzi wedu.’ ikoko vachadanidzira vachiti, ‘faro mambo weijipiti anongova ruzha chete; akatadza kushandisa mukana wake.’ “zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura mambo, ane zita rinonzi yeahoh wamasimba ose, “pano mumwe achauya akaita setabhori pakati pamakomo, sekarimeri pagungwa. rongedzai zvinhu zvenyu, nokuti muchaenda kuutapwa, imi munogara muijipiti, nokuti nofi richaitwa dongo, uye richava dongo risina anogaramo. “ijipiti itsiru rakaisvonaka, asi vuvo riri kuuya kuzorwisa richibva kumusoro. varwi vanorwa kuti varipirwe mari chete vari mairi, vakaita semhuru dzakakodzwa. naivowo vachatendeuka uye vachatiza pamwe chete, havangamiri panzvimbo yavo, nokuti zuva renjodzi riri kuuya pamusoro pavo, nguva yokurangwa kwavo. ijipiti ichashinyira senyoka inotiza pakuuya nechisimba kwomuvengi; vachauya kuzorwa nayo namatemo, savarume vanotema miti. vachatemera sango raro pasi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “kunyange risingapindiki zvaro. vakawanda kupfuura mhashu, havaverengeki. mwanasikana weijipiti achanyadziswa, achaiswa mumaoko avanhu vokumusoro.” yeahoh wamasimba ose, allah weisraeri, anoti, “ndava pedyo nokuuyisa shamhu pamusoro paamoni mwari wetebhesi, napamusoro pafaro, neijipiti navamwari vayo namadzimambo ayo, napamusoro peavo vanovimba nafaro. ndichavaisa mumaoko eavo vanotsvaka kuvauraya, nokuna nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi namachinda ake. shure kwaizvozvo, ijipiti ichagarwa sepamazuva akare,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “usatya, iwe yaqobho muranda wangu; usavhunduka, iwe israeri. zvirokwazvo ndichakuponesa uri kunzvimbo iri kure, nezvizvarwa zvako kubva kunyika youtapwa hwavo, yaqobho achavazve norugare nokuchengetedzeka, uye hakuna achamutyisa. usatya, iwe yaqobho muranda wangu, nokuti ndinewe,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kunyange ndikaparadza chose marudzi ose andakakuparadzirai pakati pawo, handizokuparadzei imi zvachose. ndichakurangai, asi chete nokururamisira; handingakuregei musina kurangwa zvachose.”

47

iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kumuprofita jeremia pamusoro pavafiristia, faro asati arwisa gaza: zvanzi nayeahoh: “onai kukwira kunoita mvura zhinji yokumusoro; ivo vachava rwizi runofashukira nesimba. vachafukidza nyika nezvose zviri mairi, maguta navose vanogaramo. vanhu vachachema; vose vanogara munyika vachaungudza pavachanzwa mutsindo wemahwanda emabhiza, kutinhira kwengoro dzavavengi, nokurira kwemavhiri adzo. madzibaba haangadzoki kuzobatsira vana vavo; maoko avo acharembera seakaremara. nokuti zuva rasvika rokuparadza vafiristia vose, uye nokuuraya vose vakasara vaigona kubatsira tire nesidhoni. yeahoh ava pedyo nokuparadza vafiristia, vaya vakasara vanobva kumahombekombe ekafitori. gaza richaveura musoro waro mukuchema; ashikeroni richati mwiro. haiwa, imi vakasara vari pabani, muchapedza nguva yakadiiko muchizvicheka? “muchachema muchiti, ‘maiwe, munondo wayeahoh, uchapedza nguva yakadiiko usati wazorora? dzokera mumuhara wako; mira, unyarare.’ asi ungazorora sei, yeahoh akaurayira, sezvo akaurayira kuti urwise ashikeroni namahombekombe?”

48

pamusoro pemoabhu: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: “ine nhamo nebho, nokuti ichaparadzwa. kiriataimi ichanyadziswa uye ichakundwa; nhare dzichanyadziswa uye dzichaparadzwa. moabhu haichazorumbidzwizve; muheshibhoni varume vacharangana nezvokuwa kwaro, vachiti: ‘uyai, tiparadze rudzi urwo.’ newewo, iwe madhimeni uchati mwiro; munondo uchakutevera. inzwai kuchema kunobva kuhoronaimi, kuchema kwokukoromorwa nokuparadzwa kukuru. moabhu ichaputswa; vana vadiki varo vacharidza mhere. vachakwira nomukwidza weruhiti, vachichema zvikuru pakuenda kwavo; pamateru enzira yokuhoronaimi kuchema kwokurwadziwa pamusoro pokuparadza kunonzwika. tizai! mhanyai muponese upenyu hwenyu; mufanane negwenzi riri mugwenga. sezvo muchivimba namabasa uye nepfuma yenyu, nemiwo muchatapwa, uye kemoshi ichaenda kuutapwa, pamwe chete navaprista namachinda ayo. muparadzi acharwa namaguta ose ose, uye hapana guta richapunyuka. mupata uchaparadzwa, uye mutunhu wakakwirira uchaparadzwa nokuti yeahoh azvitaura. isai munyu pamusoro pemoabhu, nokuti ichaparadzwa; maguta ayo achava matongo, asina achazogaramo. “ngaatukwe uyo anobata basa rayeahoh asina hanya! ngaatukwe uyo anodzora munondo wake pakuteura ropa! “moabhu anga ane zororo kubvira pauduku hwake, sewaini yasarira mumasese, isina kudirwa kubva muno mumwe mudziyo ichiiswa muno mumwe, haana kuenda kuutapwa. saka anongotapira sezvaakanga ari, uye kunhuhwira kwake hakuna kushanduka. asi mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andichatuma varume vanodurura zvinobva mumudziyo, uye vachadururira pasi; vachasiya midziyo isina chinhu uye vagoputsa midziyo yake. ipapo moabhu achanyadziswa nekemoshi, sokunyadziswa kwakaitwa imba yaisraeri pavakavimba nebheteri. “ungataura sei, uchiti, ‘tiri mhare, varume vakatsunga muhondo’? moabhu ichaparadzwa, uye maguta ayo acharwiswa; majaya ake akaisvonaka achaburukira kundourayiwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura mambo, ane zita rinonzi yeahoh wamasimba ose. “kuwa kwemoabhu kwava pedyo; njodzi yayo ichasvika nokukurumidza. ichemei, imi mose mugere makaipoteredza, vose vanoziva mukurumbira wayo; muti, ‘yavhunika seiko tsvimbo yakasimba, wavhunika seiko mudonzvo wakaisvonaka!’ “burukai pakukudzwa kwenyu mugare pavhu rakaoma, imi vagari vomwanasikana wedhibhoni, nokuti iye anoparadza moabhu achauya kuzokurwisai, uye agoparadza maguta enyu akakomberedzwa. mirai panzira mutarire, imi vagari vemuaroeri. bvunzai murume ari kutiza nomukadzi apunyuka, muvabvunze kuti, ‘chii chaitika?’ moabhu yanyadziswa, nokuti yaparadzwa. ungudzai uye muridze mhere! zvizivisei paarinoni kuti moabhu yaparadzwa. kutonga kwasvika kumutunhu wakakwirira, kuhoroni, jahaza nemefaati, kudhibhoni, nebho nebheti dhibhirataimu, kukiriataimu, nebheti gamuri nebheti meoni, kukerioti nebhozira, nokumaguta ose emoabhu ari kure neari pedyo. runyanga rwemoabhu rwagurwa; ruoko rwake rwavhunika,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “itai kuti adhakwe, nokuti iye azvidza yeahoh. regai moabhu aumburuke mumarutsi ake; ngaave chinhu chinosekwa. ko, israeri haana kuva chinhu chinosekwa nemi here? ko, akabatwa ari pakati pembavha here, zvamunodzungudza musoro wenyu muchimushora pose pamunotaura nezvake? siyai maguta enyu mundogara pakati pamatombo, imi mugere mumoabhu. itai senjiva inovaka dendere rayo pamuromo webako. “takanzwa nezvokuzvikudza kwemoabhu, manyawi nokudada kwavo kukuru uye kuzvikudza kwakanyanya, kuzvikudza kwavo nokuzvitutumadza namanyawi emwoyo wayo. ndinoziva kusindimara kwayo asi hakuna maturo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “uye kuzvikudza kwake kuzhinji hakuna zvakunoreva. naizvozvo ndinoungudza pamusoro pemoabhu, nokuda kwemoabhu yose ndinodanidzira, ndinochema varume vekiri hareseti. ndinokuchema sokuchema kunoita jazeri, haiwa imi mazambiringa egibhima. matavi enyu akatandavara kundosvika kugungwa; akandosvika kugungwa rejazeri. muparadzi awira pamichero yako yaibva namazambiringa. mufaro nokufarisisa zvaenda, zvabva muminda yemichero nomuminda yemoabhu. ndagumisa kuyerera kwewaini inobva pazvisviniro; hakuna achazvitsika achidanidzira nomufaro. kunyange pano kudanidzira, hakusi kudanidzira kwomufaro. “inzwi rokuchema kwavo rinokwira richibva kuheshibhoni kusvikira kuerieri nejahazi, kubva kuzoari kusvikira kuhoronaimi neegirati sherishiya, nokuti kunyange nemvura dzenimirimi dzapwa. ndichaisa magumo mumoabhu, kuna avo vanopa zvipiriso panzvimbo dzakakwirira, uye vanopisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwari vavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “saka mwoyo wangu unorira senyere pamusoro pemoabhu; unorira senyere pamusoro pavarume vekiri hareseti. pfuma yavakawana yapera. musoro mumwe nomumwe wakaveurwa, uye ndebvu dzose dzakagurirwa; ruoko rumwe norumwe rwakagurwa, uye zviuno zvose zvakafukidzwa namasaga. pamusoro pamatenga ose emoabhu napazvivara hakuna chiriko kunze kwokuchema, nokuti ndaputsa moabhu sedende risina anorida,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “akoromorwa sei! vaungudza sei! hoyo moabhu afuratira nokuda kwokunyadziswa! moabhu yava chinhu chinosekwa, chinhu chinonyangadza kuna vose vakaipoteredza.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “tarirai achabhururuka segondo, rakatambanudzira mapapiro aro pamusoro pemoabhu. kerioti ichatapwa uye nhare dzichatorwa. pazuva iro mwoyo yemhare dzemoabhu ichafanana nomwoyo womukadzi ari kurwadziwa. moabhu ichaparadzwa serudzi nokuti yakazvidza yeahoh. kutya negomba nomusungo zvakakumirirai, imi vanhu vemoabhu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ani naani achatiza njodzi iyi achawira mugomba, ani naani achakwira achibuda mugomba, achabatwa mumusungo; nokuti ndichauyisa pamusoro pemoabhu gore rokurangwa kwake,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “mumumvuri weheshibhoni vatizi vanomirapo vasina simba, nokuti moto wabuda uchibva kuheshibhoni, murazvo pakati pesihoni; unopisa huma dzamoabhu, misoro yavanozvikudza vemheremhere. une nhamo, iwe moabhu! vanhu vekemoshi vaparara; vanakomana vako vakaendeswa kuutapwa navanasikana vako muutapwa. “kunyange zvakadaro ndichadzosazve pfuma yemoabhu pamazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. pano ndipo panogumira kutongwa kwemoabhu.

49

pamusoro paamoni: zvanzi nayeahoh: “ko, israeri haana mwanakomana here? haana vadyi venhaka here? ko, zvino moreki atorerei nhaka yagadhi? nemhaka yeiko vanhu vake vachigara mumaguta ayo? asi mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andicharidza mhere yehondo pamusoro perabha ravaamoni; richaitwa murwi wamatongo, uye misha yakaripoteredza ichapiswa nomoto. ipapo israeri achadzinga vaya vakanga vamudzinga,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ungudza, iwe heshibhoni, nokuti ai raparadzwa! ridzai mhere, imi vanogara murabha! pfekai masaga mucheme, mhanyai pano nekoko pakati porusvingo, nokuti moreki achaenda kuutapwa, pamwe chete navaprista vake namachinda ake. unozvikudzireiko nemipata yako, kuzvikudza nemipata inobereka kwazvo? haiwa mwanasikana wokusatendeka, unovimba nepfuma yako uchiti, ‘ndiani acharwa neni?’ ndichauyisa kutya pamusoro pako kunobva kuna avo vakakupoteredza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “mumwe nomumwe wenyu achadzingirwa kure, uye hakuna achaunganidza vatizi. “asi shure kwaizvozvo, ndichadzosazve pfuma yavaamoni,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. pamusoro peedhomu: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “ko, mutemani hamuchina uchenjeri here? mano atsakatika here kuna vakangwara? ko, uchenjeri hwavo hwaora here? dzokai uye mutize, muwande mumapako akadzika, imi munogara mudhedhani, nokuti ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro paesau, panguva yandinomuranga. kana vanononga mazambiringa vakasvika kwauri, havangasiyi mazambiringa mashoma here? kana mbavha dzikasvika usiku, havangabi zvavanoda chete here? asi ndichafukura esau; ndichazarura nzvimbo dzake dzokuvanda, kuitira kuti akundikane kuzvivanza. vana vake, nehama dzake navavakidzani vake vachafa, uye iye haachazovapozve. siya nherera dzako; ini ndicharwira upenyu hwavo. chirikadzi dzakowo dzichagona kuvimba neni.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “kana avo vakanga vasingafaniri kunwa pamukombe vakodzera kuunwa, iwe ucharegereiko kurangwa? haungaregi kurangwa, asi unofanira kunwa pamukombe wacho. ndinopika neni ndimene,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “kuti bhozira richava dongo nechinhu chinonyangadza, nechinhu chinotyisa, chinozvidzwa nechinotukwa; uye maguta aro ose achava matongo nokusingaperi.” ndakanzwa shoko rakabva kuna yeahoh, richiti: nhume yakatumwa kundudzi kunoti, “unganai kuti murwe naro! simukai murwe!” “zvino ndichakuita muduku pakati pendudzi, anozvidzwa pakati pavanhu. kutyisa kwaunoita, nokuzvikudza kwomwoyo wako zvakunyengera, iwe unogara mumikaha yematombo, ugere panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzechikomo. kunyange ukavaka dendere rako pakakwirira segondo, ndichakukoromora kubva ipapo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “edhomu richava chinhu chinotyisa, vose vachapfuura napo vachashamiswa, uye vachaseka nokuda kwamavanga aro ose. sokuparadzwa kwakaitwa sodhomu negomora, pamwe chete namaguta akanga akavakidzana nawo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “saka hakuna munhu achazogarako; hakuna munhu achagara mariri. “seshumba inobuda mumatenhere ejorodhani ichienda kumafuro akapfuma, ndichadzinga edhomu kubva munyika yake pakarepo. ndianiko akasarudzwa wandichagadza kuti aite izvi? ndiani akafanana neni uye ndiani angakwikwidzane neni? uye ndoupi mufudzi angamisidzana neni?” naizvozvo, inzwai zvakarongwa nayeahoh pamusoro peedhomu, zvaakafunga pamusoro peavo vagere mutemani: achakwekweredza vaduku vemapoka; achaparadza chose mafuro avo nokuda kwavo. nyika ichadedera nokuda kwomubvumo wokuwa kwavo; kuchema kwavo kuchanzwikwawo kusvikira kugungwa dzvuku. tarirai gondo richabhururuka ndokudzika nesimba, rakatambanudza mapapiro aro pamusoro pebhozira. pazuva iro mwoyo yemhare dzeedhomu ichafanana nomwoyo womukadzi orwadziwa. pamusoro pedhamasiko: “hamati nearipadhi avhundutswa, nokuti agamuchira mashoko akaipa. aora mwoyo, atambudzika segungwa risina zororo. dhamasiko harichina simba, rakatendeuka kuti ritize, kuvhunduka kukaribata;
