kugomera nokurwadziwa zvakaribata, kurwadziwa sekwomukadzi osununguka. guta remukurumbira harina kusiyiwa seiko, iro guta randinofarira? zvirokwazvo majaya aro achawa mumigwagwa; varwi varo vose vachati mwiro pazuva iroro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ndichatungidza moto kumasvingo edhamasiko; uchaparadza nhare dzose dzabheni-hadhadhi.” pamusoro pekedhari noumambo hwehazori, hwakarwiswa nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi: zvanzi nayeahoh: “simukai, murwise kedhari uye muparadze vanhu vokumabvazuva. matende avo namapoka avo amakwai achatorwa; matumba avo achatorwa achiendwa nawo, nemidziyo yavo yose nengamera. vanhu vachadanidzira kwavari vachiti, ‘zvinhu zviri kutyisa kumativi ose!’ “tizirai kure nokukurumidza! garai mumapako akadzika, imi vagari vomuhazari,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi aita zvakaipa pamusoro penyu; aronga zano pamusoro penyu. “simukai mundorwisa rudzi rwakazvigarira zvarwo, rugere zvarwo rusina hanya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “irwo rudzi rusina masuo kana mazariro; vanhu varwo vanogara voga zvavo. ngamera dzavo dzichapambwa, uye mombe dzavo dzakawanda dzichapambwa. ndichaparadzira kumhepo avo vari kunyika dzokure, uye ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavo kubva kumativi ose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “hazori richava ugaro hwamakava, dongo nokusingaperi. hapana achagarako; hakuna munhu achagara mariri.” iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jeremia muprofita pamusoro peeramu, pakutanga kwokubata ushe kwazedhekia mambo weyeahudha, richiti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “tarirai, ndichavhuna uta hweeramu, iwo musimboti wesimba ravo. ndichauyisa pamusoro paeramu mhepo ina, kubva kumativi mana ematenga; ndichavaparadzira kumhepo ina uye hakungavi norudzi rumwe kusingaendwi navavakidzani veeramu. ndichapwanya eramu pamberi pavavengi vavo, pamberi paivo vanotsvaka kuvauraya; ndichauyisa njodzi pamusoro pavo, iko kutsamwa kwangu kunotyisa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichavatevera nomunondo kusvikira ndavapedza. ndichaisa chigaro changu choushe mueramu uye ndichaparadza mambo wayo namachinda ayo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “asi ndichadzosa nhaka yeeramu mumazuva okupedzisira,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

50

iri ndiro shoko rakataurwa nayeahoh kubudikidza nomuprofita jeremia pamusoro pebhabhironi nenyika yavabhabhironi: “zivisai, uye paridzai pakati pendudzi, simudzai mureza uye paridzai; musasiya kana chinhu, asi muti, ‘bhabhironi richakundwa; bheri richanyadziswa, merodhaki richazara nokutya. zvifananidzo zvaro zvichanyadziswa uye zvifananidzo zvaro zvichazara nokutya.’ rudzi runobva kumusoro rucharirwisa, uye ruchaparadza nyika yaro. hakuna munhu achagaramo; zvose vanhu nezvipfuwo zvichatizira kure. “mumazuva iwayo, nenguva iyoyo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “vanhu veisraeri navanhu veyeahudha pamwe chete vachaenda kundotsvaka yeahoh allah wavo vachichema. vachabvunza nzira inoenda kuzioni, vagotendeutsira zviso zvavo kwairi. vachauya vagozvisunga kuna yeahoh, nesungano isingaperi isingakanganwiki. “vanhu vangu vanga vari makwai akarasika; vafudzi vavo vakavatsausa, uye vakavaita kuti vadzungaire pamusoro pamakomo. vakadzungaira pamusoro pamakomo nezvikomo, ndokukanganwa nzvimbo yavo yokuzorora. ani naani akavawana akavadya; vavengi vavo vakati, ‘isu hatina mhosva, nokuti vakatadzira yeahoh, iye mafuro avo echokwadi, iye yeahoh, tariro yamadzibaba avo.’ “tizai mubude mubhabhironi; siyai nyika yavabhabhironi, mugoita sembudzi inotungamirira makwai. nokuti ndichamutsa bhabhironi uye ndichaisa pamusoro paro ndudzi huru dzakabatana dzinobva kumusoro. vachazvigadzirira kurwa naro, uye richakundwa kubva nechokumusoro. miseve yavo ichava semhare pakurwa, dzisingadzoki dzisina chadzakabata. naizvozvo bhabhironi richapambwa; vose vanoripamba vachawana mugove wavo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuda kwokuti munofara nokufarisisa, iyemi munopamba nhaka yangu, nokuti munokwakuka setsiru rinopura zviyo, muchirira samabhiza, mai venyu vachanyadziswa kwazvo; ivo vakakuberekai vachanyadziswa. vachava mudiki pandudzi, renje, nenyika yakaoma, uye gwenga. nokuda kwokutsamwa kwayeahoh hamungagarwi, asi richava dongo chose. vose vanopfuura pedyo nebhabhironi vachatyiswa, uye vacharidza muridzo nokuda kwamavanga ake ose. “mirai panzvimbo dzenyu makakomba bhabhironi, imi mose munowembura uta. ripfurei! musasiye kana museve nokuti rakatadzira yeahoh. pururudzai pamusoro pake kumativi ose! rakanda mapfumo pasi, shongwe dzaro dzawa, masvingo aro akoromoka. sezvo kuri kutsiva kwayeahoh, tsivai pariri; riitirei sezvarakaitira vamwe. bvisai mudyari mubhabhironi, nomucheki nejeko rake pakukohwa. nokuda kwomunondo womumanikidzi mumwe nomumwe ngaadzokere kuvanhu vake, mumwe nomumwe ngaatizire kunyika yake. “israeri makwai akapararira akadzingirwa kure neshumba. akatanga kumudya akanga ari mambo weasiria; akapedzisira kupwanya mapfupa ake ndinebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi.” naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: “ndicharanga mambo webhabhironi nenyika yake, sokuranga kwandakaita mambo weasiria. asi ndichadzosera israeri kumafuro ake, uye achafura pakarimeri nepabhashani; achadya akaguta pazvikomo zveefuremu negireadhi. mumazuva iwayo, panguva iyoyo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “mhaka yaisraeri ichatsvakwa, asi pachange pasina mhosva, uye zvivi zveyeahudha zvichatsvakwa, asi hapana chichawanikwa, nokuti ndichakanganwira vakasara vandakasiya. “rwisai nyika yemarataimi neavo vagere mupekodhi. dzingirirai, urayai uye muvaparadze zvachose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “muite zvose zvandakurayirai. mheremhere yehondo iri munyika, mheremhere yokuparadza kukuru! yavhunika nokupwanyika seiko nyundo yenyika yose! bhabhironi rava dongo seiko pakati pendudzi! ndakakuisira musungo, iwe bhabhironi, uye wakabatwa usati wazviziva; wakawanikwa ukapambwa nokuti wakapikisana nayeahoh, yeahoh akazarura dura rezvombo ndokubudisa zvombo zvehasha dzake, nokuti ishe yeahoh wamasimba ose ane basa rokuita munyika yavabhabhironi. uyai murwe naro muchibva kure. zarurai matura aro; muriunganidze semirwi yezviyo. riparadzei zvachose, parege kuva navanosara. muuraye hondo diki dzaro dzose; ngadziendeswe kundobayiwa! vane nhamo! nokuti zuva ravo rasvika, nguva yokurangwa kwavo. inzwai vanotiza navapoteri vanobva kubhabhironi, vanoparidza muzioni kuti yeahoh allah wedu akatsiva sei, kutsivira temberi yake. “kokerai vapfuri vemiseve varwe nebhabhironi, vose vanowembura uta. rikombei rose; ngakurege kuva nounopukunyuka. riripirei nokuda kwamabasa avo; riitireiwo sezvarakaita. nokuti vakamhura yeahoh, iye mutsvene weisraeri. naizvozvo majaya aro achawira mumigwagwa; varwi varo vose vachanyarara kuti mwiro pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “tarira, ndinorwa newe, iwe wokuzvikudza,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh wamasimba ose, “nokuti zuva rako rasvika, nguva yokurangwa kwako. anozvikudza achagumburwa agowa, uye hapana achamusimudza; ndichatungidza moto mumaguta ake uchapisa vose vakamupoteredza.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “vanhu veisraeri vakamanikidzwa, navanhu veyeahudha vakamanikidzwawo, vapambi vavo vose vakavabata, zvakasimba, vanoramba kuvaregedza kuti vaende. asi mudzikinuri wavo ane simba; yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake. achavareverera nhaka yavo nesimba kuti azorodze nyika yavo, asi achashayisa zororo kuna avo vanogara mubhabhironi. “munondo pamusoro pavabhabhironi!” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “pamusoro peavo vagere mubhabhironi, napamusoro pamachinda aro navakachenjera varo! munondo pamusoro pavaprofita varo venhema! vachava mapenzi. munondo pamusoro pemhare dzaro! vachazadzwa nokutya. munondo pamusoro pamabhiza nengoro dzaro, napamusoro pavatorwa vose vari pazvigaro zvaro! vachava vakadzi. munondo pamusoro pepfuma yaro! ichapambwa. mvura yaro zhinji ngaipwe! ichaoma. nokuti inyika yezvifananidzo, zvifananidzo zvichapenga nokutya. “saka mhuka dzomugwenga namapere zvichagarako, uye zizi richagara imomo. haichazogarwizve, uye hapana achagaramo kusvikira kumarudzi namarudzi. sokukoromorwa kwakaitwa sodhomu negomora naallah pamwe chete namaguta akavakidzana nawo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “saizvozvo hakuna achagarako; hakuna munhu achagara mairi. “tarirai! hondo inobva nechokumusoro; rudzi rukuru namadzimambo mazhinji ari kumutswa kubva kumagumo enyika. vakapakata uta namapfumo; vano utsinye uye havana tsitsi. vanotinhira segungwa vakatasva mabhiza avo; vanouya vakaita savarume vakagadzirira kurwa, kuti vakurwise, iwe mwanasikana webhabhironi. mambo webhabhironi akanzwa guhu pamusoro pavo, maoko ake akapera simba. kutya kwakamubata, kurwadziwa sekwomukadzi wosununguka. seshumba inouya ichibva mudondo rejorodhani ichienda kumafuro akapfuma, ndichadzinga bhabhironi kubva munyika yayo pakarepo. ndianiko akatsaurwa wandichagadza pane izvi? ndiani akaita seni uye ndiani achamisidzana neni? uye ndoupi mufudzi angandidzivisa?” naizvozvo, inzwai zvakarongwa nayeahoh pamusoro pebhabhironi, zvaakaronga pamusoro penyika yavabhabhironi: makwayana emapoka avo achakwekweredzerwa kure; achaparadza mafuro awo zvachose nokuda kwavo. pachanzwikwa kutinhira kwokukundwa kwebhabhironi, nyika ichadedera; kuchema kwayo kuchanzwikwa pakati pamarudzi.

51

zvanzi nayeahoh: “tarirai, ndichamutsa mwoyo womuparadzi pamusoro pebhabhironi navanhu verebhi kamai. ndichatumira vatorwa kubhabhironi kundorirurudza nokuparadza nyika yaro; vacharirwisa kumativi ose, pazuva rokuparara kwaro. musarega mupfuri achiwembura uta hwake, kana kumurega achipfeka nhumbi dzake dzokurwa. regai kunzwira majaya aro tsitsi; paradzai hondo yaro zvachose. vachawira pasi vaurayiwa mubhabhironi, vachakuvadzwa mumigwagwa zvokuti havazorarami. nokuti israeri neyeahudha havana kuraswa naallah wavo, iye yeahoh wamasimba ose, kunyange nyika yavo yakazara nemhaka pamberi pomutsvene waisraeri. “tizai mubve mubhabhironi! mhanyai muponese upenyu hwenyu! regai kuparadzwa nokuda kwezvivi zvaro. inguva yokutsiva kwayeahoh; iye achariripira zvarinokodzera. bhabhironi rakanga riri mukombe wegoridhe muruoko rwayeahoh; rakadhakisa nyika yose. ndudzi dzakanwa waini yaro; naizvozvo dzava kupenga. bhabhironi richawa pakarepo rigoondomoka. ungudzai pamusoro paro! torai muti webharisamu murape kurwadziwa kwaro; zvimwe ringaporeswa. “ ‘taida kuporesa bhabhironi, asi haringaporeswi; ngatirisiyei mumwe nomumwe aende kunyika yake, nokuti kutongwa kwaro kunosvika kumatenga, kunokwira kusvikira kumakore.’ “ ‘yeahoh akati hatina mhosva; uyai, tiparidze muzioni zvakaitwa nayeahoh allah wedu.’ “rodzai miseve, torai nhoo! yeahoh akamutsa madzimambo avamedhia, nokuti akaronga kuparadza bhabhironi. yeahoh achatsiva, kutsivira temberi yake. simudzai mureza pamusoro pamasvingo ebhabhironi! simbisai varindi, isai nharirire panzvimbo dzavo, gadzirirai vanovandira. yeahoh achaita zvaakaronga, zvaakatema pamusoro pavanhu vebhabhironi. imi mugere pedyo nemvura zhinji uye makapfuma kwazvo, magumo enyu asvika, nguva yokuti muparadzwe. yeahoh wamasimba ose akapika naiye amene achiti: zvirokwazvo ndichakuzadza navarume, sezvinoitwa nechimokoto chemhashu, uye vachapembera nokuti vanenge vakukundai. “akaita nyika nesimba rake; akateya nheyo dzenyika nouchenjeri hwake, akatatamura matenga nokunzwisisa kwake. paanotinhira, mvura yomumatenga inotinhira; anokwidza makore kubva kumigumo yenyika. anotuma mheni pamwe chete nemvura, uye anouyisa mhepo kubva mumatura ake. “munhu mumwe nomumwe haana pfungwa uye haana zivo; mupfuri mumwe nomumwe wesimbi anonyadziswa nezvifananidzo zvake. zvifananidzo zvake ndezvenhema; hazvina mweya mazviri. hazvina maturo, zvinhu zvinosekwa; kana kutongwa kwazvo kwasvika, zvichaparadzwa. iye mugove wayaqobho haana kufanana naizvozvi, nokuti ndiye muiti wezvinhu zvose, pamwe chete norudzi rwenhaka yake, yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake. “ndiwe tsvimbo yangu yehondo, chombo changu chokurwa, newe ndinoparadza ndudzi, newe ndinoparadza umambo, newe ndinoparadza bhiza nomutasvi, newe ndinoparadza ngoro nomuchairi, newe ndinoparadza murume nomukadzi, newe ndinoparadza mutana nejaya, newe ndinoparadza jaya nomurandakadzi, newe ndinoparadza mufudzi neboka, newe ndinoparadza murimi nenzombe, newe ndinoparadza vatongi namachinda. “ndicharipira bhabhironi navose vagere mubhabhironi pamberi pako, nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavakaita muzioni,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndine mhosva newe, iwe gomo rinoparadza, iwe unoparadza nyika yose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichatambanudzira ruoko rwangu kuti ndikurwise, ndigokukungurusira kumawere, ndigokuita gomo rakatsva. hapana dombo richabviswa kwauri kuti riitwe dombo rekona, kana dombo remhepo, nokuti uchaparadzwa nokusingaperi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “simudzai mureza munyika! ridzai hwamanda pakati pendudzi! gadzirirai ndudzi kuti dzizorwa naye; kokai ushe uhu kuzorwa naye: ararati, mini neashikenazi. gadzai mukuru wehondo kuti arwe naye; tumirai mabhiza akaita sechimokoto chemhashu. gadzirirai ndudzi kuti dzizorwa naye, madzimambo avamedhia, vabati vavo namachinda avo ose, nenyika dzose dzavanotonga. nyika inodedera uye yomonyoroka, nokuti zvakarongwa nayeahoh pamusoro pebhabhironi hazvingatongokoni, zvokuparadza nyika yebhabhironi kuti pasava nomunhu achagaramo. mhare dzebhabhironi dzarega kurwa; vakarambira munhare dzavo. simba ravo rapera; vaita savakadzi. ugaro hwake hwakapiswa nomoto; mazariro amasuo ake avhunika. anotumwa namagwaro achatevera mumwe, uye nhume ichatevera nhume, kundozivisa mambo webhabhironi kuti guta rake rose rapambwa, mazambuko abatwa, mapani apiswa nomoto, uye varwi vavhundutswa.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri: “mwanasikana webhabhironi afanana neburiro panguva yokupura; nguva yokumukohwa ichasvika zvino zvino.” “nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akatidya, akatinyonganisa, akatiita chirongo chisina chinhu. akatimedza senyoka, uye akazadza dumbu rake nezvinonaka zvedu, mushure maizvozvo akatisvipa. zvechisimba zvakaitwa panyama yedu ngazvive pamusoro pebhabhironi,” ndizvo zvinotaura vanhu vomuzioni. jerusarema rinoti: “ropa redu ngarive pamusoro peavo vanogara mubhabhironi.” naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh: “tarirai, ndichakurevererai mhaka yenyu uye ndichakutsivirai; ndichapwisa gungwa raro, ndichapwisa matsime aro. bhabhironi richava murwi wamatombo, ugaro hwamakava, chinhu chinotyisa nechinosekesa, nzvimbo isina anogaramo. vanhu vake vose vanoomba seshumba diki, vanobhonʼa sembwanana dzeshumba. asi kana vamutswa, ndichavagadzirira mutambo ndigovadhakisa, kuitira kuti varidze mhere yokuseka, vagovata nokusingaperi uye varege kumuka,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichavaburutsa pasi semakwayana ari kundourayiwa, semakondobwe nembudzi. “haiwa, sheshaki richakundwa sei, kuzvirumbidza kwenyika yose kwabatwa! bhabhironi rava dongo sei pakati pendudzi! gungwa richakwira pamusoro pebhabhironi; mafungu aro anovirima acharifukidza. maguta aro achaparadzwa, achava nyika yakaoma negwenga, nyika isingagarwi nomunhu, isina angapfuura nemairi. ndicharanga bheri mubhabhironi ndigomuita kuti asvipe zvaamedza. ndudzi hadzichazomhanyiri kwaari. uye rusvingo rwebhabhironi ruchawa. “budai mariri, imi vanhu vangu! tizai kuti muponese upenyu hwenyu! tizai mubve pakutsamwa kunotyisa kwayeahoh. regai kuora mwoyo kana kutya panotekeshera, runyerekupe munyika; rumwe runyerekupe runonzwika gore rino, rumwe gore rinouya, runyerekupe rwokurwisana munyika uye rwomutongi achirwa nomumwe mutongi. nokuti zvirokwazvo nguva ichasvika yandichatonga zvifananidzo zvebhabhironi; nyika yaro yose ichanyadziswa, uye vakaurayiwa varo vachawira pasi vose mukati maro. ipapo denga nenyika nezvose zviri mazviri zvichapembera nomufaro pamusoro pebhabhironi, nokuti vachabva nechokumusoro vaparadzi vacharirwisa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “bhabhironi rinofanira kuwa nokuda kwavakaurayiwa vaisraeri, sezvakaita vakaurayiwa venyika yose vakawa nokuda kwebhabhironi. imi makapunyuka pamunondo, endai uye musamira-mira! murangarire yeahoh munyika iri kure, uye murangarire jerusarema.” “takanyadziswa, nokuti takatukwa uye nyadzi dzinofukidza zviso zvedu, nokuti vatorwa vakapinda munzvimbo tsvene dzeimba yayeahoh.” “asi mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “andichatonga zvifananidzo zvaro, uye munyika yake yose vakakuvara vachagomera. kunyange dai bhabhironi rikasvika kudenga, uye rikasimbisa nhare yaro yakareba, ndichatumira vaparadzi kuzorirwisa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “inzwi rokuchema rinobva kubhabhironi, inzwi rokuparadza kukuru rinobva kunyika yavabhabhironi. yeahoh achaparadza bhabhironi; achanyaradza ruzha rwokunyongana kwaro. mafungu avavengi achaomba semvura zhinji; kutinhira kwamanzwi avo kuchanzwikwa. muparadzi achauya kuzorwisa bhabhironi; varwi varo vachabatwa, uye uta hwavo huchavhunwa. nokuti yeahoh ndiallah wokutsiva; achatsiva zvizere. ndichaita kuti machinda ake navakachenjera vake vadhakwe, vabati, namachinda uye navarwi vakewo; vachavata nokusingaperi uye havangamuki,” ndizvo zvinotaura mambo, ane zita rinonzi yeahoh wamasimba ose. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “masvingo makobvu ebhabhironi achaparadzwa, uye masuo aro akakwirira achapiswa; vanhu vanongozvinetsa pasina, mabasa endudzi ihuni dzomurazvo bedzi.” iri ndiro shoko rakapiwa najeremia kumuchinda seraya mwanakomana waneria, mwanakomana wamaseya, paakaenda kubhabhironi nazedhekia mambo weyeahudha mugore rechina rokutonga kwake. jeremia akanga anyora murugwaro pamusoro penjodzi dzose dzaizouya pamusoro pebhabhironi, zvose zvakanga zvakanyorwa pamusoro pebhabhironi. akati kuna seraya, “paunosvika kubhabhironi, uone kuti waverenga mashoko ose aya uchidanidzirisa. ipapo uti, ‘haiwa yeahoh, makati muchaparadza nzvimbo ino, zvokuti hakuna munhu kana zvipfuwo zvingagaramo; ichaparadzwa nokusingaperi.’ paunopedza kuverenga rugwaro urwu, sungira ibwe parwuri ugorukanda muna yufuratesi. ipapo uti, ‘saizvozvo bhabhironi richanyura rikasazomukazve nokuda kwenjodzi yandichauyisa pamusoro paro. uye vanhu varo vachawa.’ ” mashoko ajeremia anogumira pano.

52

zedhekia akanga ana makore makumi maviri nerimwe paakatanga kuva mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwemakore gumi nerimwe. zita ramai vake rainzi hamutari mwanasikana wajeremia; aibva kuribhina. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakangoitwa najehoyakimi. izvi zvakaitika kujerusarema neyeahudha nokuda kwehasha dzayeahoh, uye pakupedzisira akavabvisa pamberi pake. zvino zedhekia akamukira mambo webhabhironi. naizvozvo mugore rechipfumbamwe rokutonga kwazedhekia, pazuva regumi romwedzi wegumi, nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akasvika mujerusarema nehondo yake yose. vakadzika misasa yavo kunze kweguta ndokuvaka nhare dzairipoteredza. guta rakaramba rakakombwa kusvikira pagore regumi nerimwe ramambo zedhekia. pazuva rechipfumbamwe romwedzi wechina nzara yakanyanya muguta zvokuti makanga musisina chokudya chokuti vanhu vadye. ipapo rusvingo rweguta rwakapwanyiwa, hondo yose ikatiza. vakabuda muguta usiku napasuo raiva pakati pamasvingo maviri pedyo nebindu ramambo, kunyange zvazvo vabhabhironi vakanga vakakomberedza guta. vakatiza vakananga kuarabha, asi hondo yavabhabhironi yakatevera mambo zedhekia vakamubata mumapani ejeriko. varwi vake vose vakaparadzaniswa naye ndokupararira, iye akabatwa. vakamutora vakaenda naye kuna mambo webhabhironi paribhira munyika yehamati, iye akamutongerapo. mambo webhabhironi akauraya vanakomana vazedhekia paribhira ipapo, iye achizviona; akaurayirwa machinda ose eyeahudha. ipapo akatumbura meso azedhekia ndokumusunga namatare akamuendesa kubhabhironi, uko kwaakamuisa mutorongo kusvikira pazuva rokufa kwake. pazuva regumi romwedzi wechishanu, mugore regumi namapfumbamwe ranebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi, nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi vamambo, uyo akashandira mambo webhabhironi, akauya kujerusarema. akapisa temberi yayeahoh, nomuzinda wamambo nedzimba dzose dzejerusarema. dzimba dzose dzaikosha akadzipisa. hondo yose yavabhabhironi yaiva pasi pemukuru wavarindi vamambo yakaputsira pasi masvingo ose aikomberedza jerusarema. nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akaendesa kuutapwa vamwe vakanga vari varombo chaivo navaya vakasara muguta, pamwe chete noruzhinji rwemhizha navaya vakanga vazvipira kuna mambo webhabhironi. asi nebhuzaradhani akasiya ruzhinji rwavarombo chaivo venyika iyo kuti vashande muminda yemizambiringa uye nemimwewo minda. vabhabhironi vakaputsa mbiru dzendarira, nezvingoro zvinofamba negungwa rendarira zvakanga zviri mutemberi yayeahoh vakatakura ndarira yose vakaenda nayo kubhabhironi. vakatorawo hari, nefoshoro, nembato dzemwenje, nomukombe namadhishi nemidziyo yose yendarira yaishandiswa pabasa romutemberi. mukuru wavarindi vamambo akatakurawo mbiya, nezvaenga, nemikombe nehari, nezvigadziko zvemwenje, namadhishi nemikombe yaishandiswa pazvipiriso zvokunwa, zvose zvakanga zvakagadzirwa negoridhe yakanatswa kana sirivha. ndarira yaibva pambiru mbiri, negungwa, nehando dzendarira gumi nembiri dzaiva pasi pacho, nezvingoro zvakanga zvaitirwa temberi yayeahoh namambo soromoni, zvakanga zvisingagoni kuyerwa. mbiru imwe neimwe yakanga ina makubhiti gumi namasere pakureba uye makubhiti gumi namaviri pakupoterera; paukobvu imwe neimwe yaisvika minwe mina uye yaiva nemhango. musoro wendarira waiva pane imwe mbiru wakanga wakareba makubhiti anosvika mashanu uye wakashongedzwa nezvakarukwa namatamba endarira zvaipoteredza. imwe mbiru yakanga yakafanana nayo namatamba ayowo. pakanga pane matamba makumi mapfumbamwe namatanhatu kumativi; uwandu hwamatamba aiva pamusoro pezvakarukwa zvakanga zvakapoteredzwa hwaiva zana. mukuru wavarindi akatora vasungwa vaiti, seraya muprista mukuru, nazefania muprista aimutevera pachigaro uye navarindi vokumukova vatatu. kuna avo vaiva muguta akatora muchinda mukuru wavarwi, uye vapi vamazano vanomwe. akatorawo munyori uyo akanga ari mubati mukuru aiva nebasa rokunyora mazita avanhu venyika uye navamwe varume makumi matanhatu vakawanikwa muguta. nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akavatora vose akavauyisa kuna mambo webhabhironi paribhira. ipapo paribhira, munyika yehamati, mambo akaita kuti vaurayiwe. saka vayeahudha vakaenda kuutapwa, kure nenyika yavo. uhu ndihwo uwandu hwavanhu vakatorwa nanebhukadhinezari achienda navo kuutapwa: mugore rechinomwe, zviuru zvitatu zvina makumi maviri navatatu, zvavayeahudha; mugore regumi namasere ranebhukadhinezari, mazana masere namakumi matatu navaviri avanhu vaibva kujerusarema; mugore rake ramakumi maviri namatatu, vayeahudha mazana manomwe namakumi mana navashanu vakaendeswa kuutapwa nanebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi vamambo. vose vaiva zviuru zvina namazana matanhatu pamwe chete. mugore ramakumi matatu namanomwe rokutapwa kwajehoyakini mambo weyeahudha, mugore rakava evhiri-merodhaki mambo webhabhironi, akasunungura jehoyakini mambo weyeahudha, uye akamusunungura kubva mutorongo pazuva ramakumi maviri namashanu romwedzi wegumi nemiviri. akataura zvakanaka kwaari uye akamupa chigaro chaikudzwa kupfuura zvigaro zvamamwe madzimambo vaakanga anavo mubhabhironi. saka jehoyakini akabvisa nguo dzake dzousungwa akadya patafura yamambo nguva nenguva, mazuva ose oupenyu hwake. zuva nezuva mambo webhabhironi akapa jehoyakini mugove wenguva nenguva, mazuva ose oupenyu hwake, kusvikira pazuva rokufa kwake.

ezekiel

1

mugore ramakumi matatu, nomwedzi wechina pazuva rechishanu, ndiri pakati pavakatapwa, parwizi rwekebhari, matenga akazarurwa, ndikaona zviratidzo zvaallah. pazuva rechishanu romwedzi, riri gore rechishanu rokutapwa kwamambo jehoyakini, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna ezekieri muprista, mwanakomana wabhuzi parwizi rwekebhari munyika yavabhabhironi. ipapo, ruoko rwayeahoh rwakanga rwuri pamusoro pake. ndakatarira, ndikaona dutu remhepo richibva nechokumusoro, gore guru rine mheni yaipenya uye rakakomberedzwa nechiedza chaibwinya. pakati pomoto paitarisika sedare rinopfuta, uye mumoto makanga mune zvakanga zvakaita sezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina. pakuonekwa kwazvo, chimiro chazvo chakanga chiri chomunhu, asi chimwe nechimwe chazvo chakanga chine zviso zvina namapapiro mana. makumbo azvo akanga akarurama; tsoka dzazvo dzakanga dzakaita sedzemhuru uye dzichipenya sendarira yakabwinyiswa. zvakanga zvina maoko omunhu pasi pamapapiro azvo pamativi azvo mana. zvose zviri zvina zvaiva nezviso namapapiro, uye mapapiro azvo aigunzvana. chimwe nechimwe chazvo chaienda mberi chakarurama; zvakanga zvisingacheuki pakufamba kwazvo. zviso zvazvo zvairatidzika sezvizvi: chimwe nechimwe pauna hwazvo chaiva nechiso chomunhu, uye kurudyi, chimwe nechimwe chaiva nechiso cheshumba, uye kuruboshwe, chiso chenzombe; chimwe nechimwe chaiva nechiso chegondo. ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita zviso zvazvo. mapapiro azvo akanga akatambanudzirwa kumusoro; chimwe nechimwe chakanga china mapapiro maviri rimwe richigunzva bapiro rechimwe chisikwa kumativi ose, uye mapapiro maviri akafukidza muviri wacho. chimwe nechimwe chainanga mberi chakarurama. kwose kwaienda mweya, ndiko kwazvaienda, zvisingacheuki pakufamba kwazvo. kuonekwa kwezvisikwa zvipenyu izvi kwakanga kwakaita samazimbe omoto anopfuta, kana somwenje. moto waienda mberi uchidzoka pakati pezvisikwa; wakanga uchipenya, uye mheni yaipenya mauri. zvisikwa zvaimhanya zvichienda mberi zvichidzoka semheni inopenya. ndakati ndichitarira kuzvisikwa zvipenyu, ndakaona vhiri riri pasi porutivi rwechisikwa chimwe nechimwe nezviso zvacho zvina. uku ndiko kwaiva kuratidzika namagadzirirwo amavhiri acho: akanga achivaima sebwe rekristaro, uye zvose zviri zvina zvakanga zvakafanana pakuonekwa kwazvo. pakuonekwa kwawo napamagadzirirwo awo akanga akaita sevhiri rimwe riri mukati merimwe vhiri. pakufamba kwazvo, zvaigona kuenda neimwe yenzira ina dzakanga dzakatariswa nezvisikwa zvina; mavhiri akanga asingatsauki zvisikwa pazvaifamba. marimu acho akanga akakwirira uye aishamisa, uye marimu ose ari mana akanga azere nameso kwose kwose. zvisikwa zvipenyu zvaiti kana zvofamba, mavhiri aiva parutivi ofambawo; uye kana zvisikwa zvipenyu zvikasimuka kubva pasi, mavhiri aisimukawo. kwose kwaienda mweya, zvaiendawo, uye mavhiri aisimuka pamwe chete nazvo, nokuti mweya wezvisikwa zvipenyu wakanga uri mumavhiri. zvisikwa pazvaifamba, iwo aifambawo; paimira zvisikwa, naiwo aimirawo; uye paingosimuka zvisikwa kubva pasi, mavhiri aisimukawo pamwe chete nazvo, nokuti mweya wezvisikwa zvipenyu wakanga uri mumavhiri. kumusoro kwemisoro yezvisikwa zvipenyu kwakanga kwakawaridzwa chinhu chakanga chakaita sedenga, chaivaima sechando uye chaishamisa. pasi pedenga mapapiro azvo akanga akatambanudzwa, bapiro rechimwe chisikwa richinosangana nebapiro rechimwe chisikwa, uye chimwe nechimwe chaiva namapapiro maviri akanga akafukidza muviri wacho. zvisikwa zvaiti zvofamba, ndainzwa kuunga kwamapapiro azvo, zvichitinhira semvura zhinji, senzwi rowamasimba ose, sebope ravarwi. zvaiti zvikamira zvaideredza mapapiro azvo. ipapo inzwi rakasvika richibva kumusoro kwedenga rakanga riri pamusoro pazvo, pazvakanga zvakamira zvakaderedza mapapiro azvo. kumusoro kwedenga rakanga riri pamusoro pemisoro yazvo, kwakanga kune chinhu chairatidzika sechigaro choushe chakanga chakaita sebwe resafuri uye pamusoro-soro pechigaro choushe pakanga pano mufananidzo wakanga wakaita sewomunhu. ndakaona kuti pane zvairatidzika sechiuno chake zvichikwira kumusoro, akanga akaita sedare romoto unopenya, sokunge akazara nomoto, uye kubva ipapo zvichienda pasi, airatidzika somoto; uye chiedza chaipenya kwazvo chakanga chakamukomberedza. sezvakaita muraravungu uri mumakore pazuva rokunaya kwemvura, izvozvo, ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita kubwinya kwakanga kwakamukomberedza. izvi ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita kuonekwa kwokubwinya kwayeahoh. pandakazviona izvozvo, ndakawira pasi nechiso changu, ndikanzwa inzwi romumwe akanga achitaura.

2

akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, simuka netsoka dzako nditaure newe.” akati achitaura, mweya wakapinda mandiri ukandisimudza netsoka dzangu, ndikamunzwa achitaura neni. akati, “mwanakomana womunhu, ndiri kukutuma kuvaisraeri, kurudzi runomukira irwo rwakandimukira; ivo namadzibaba avo vanga vachingondipandukira kusvikira zuva ranhasi. vanhu vandinokutuma kwavari, vakavangarara uye vakasindimara. uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh.’ uye kunyange vakanzwa kana kuti vakaramba kunzwa, nokuti ivo imba inomukira, vachaziva kuti muprofita akanga ari pakati pavo. uye iwe, mwanakomana womunhu, usavatya kana mashoko avo. usatya, kunyange wakakombwa neminzwa norukato uye ugere pakati pezvinyavada. usatya zvavanotaura kana kuvhundutswa navo, kunyange vari imba inomukira. unofanira kutaura mashoko angu kwavari kunyange vakateerera kana kuti vakaramba kuteerera, nokuti ivo vanondimukira. asi iwe, mwanakomana womunhu, teerera zvandinokuudza. usandimukira sezvinoita imba iyo inondimukira; shama muromo wako udye zvandinokupa.” ipapo ndakatarira, ndikaona ruoko rwakatambanudzirwa kwandiri. marwuri makanga mune gwaro, rakapetenurwa pamberi pangu. rakanga rakanyorwa kumativi aro ose mashoko okuchema nokuungudza nenhamo.

3

akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, idya zviri pamberi pako, idya rugwaro urwu, zvino ugoenda undotaura neimba yaisraeri.” saka ndakashama muromo wangu, iye akandipa rugwaro kuti ndidye. ipapo akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, idya zviri pamberi pako, idya rugwaro urwu rwandinokupa uzadze dumbu rako narwo.” saka ndakarudya, uye rwaitapira souchi mumukanwa mangu. ipapo akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, chienda zvino kuimba yaisraeri undotaura mashoko angu kwavari. hausi kutumwa kuvanhu vane mutauro usinganzwisisiki uye norurimi runogozha, asi kuimba yaisraeri, kwete kumarudzi mazhinji vane mitauro isinganzwisisiki norurimi rwakagozha, vana mashoko ausingagoni kunzwisisa. zvirokwazvo dai ndakanga ndakutuma kwavari, vangadai vakakunzwa. asi imba yaisraeri haidi kukuteerera nokuti haidi kunditeerera, nokuti imba yose yaisraeri yakaomeswa mwoyo uye yakavangarara. tarira ndichaomesa chiso chako sezvakaita zviso zvavo. ndichaomesa huma yako sebwe rakaomesesa, rakaoma kupfuura romusarasara. usavatya kana kuvhunduswa navo, kunyange vari imba inomukira.” zvino akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, nditeererese uye uise mashoko ose andinotaura mumwoyo mako. chienda zvino kuvanhu venyika yako vari muutapwa undotaura kwavari. uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh,’ kunyange vakateerera kana vakaramba kuteerera.” ipapo mweya wakandisimudza, ndikanzwa shure kwangu inzwi rokuunga kukuru richiti, “kubwinya kwayeahoh ngakurumbidzwe munzvimbo yaanogara!” uye ndakanzwa mubvumo wamapapiro ezvisikwa zvipenyu aigunzvana uye nomubvumo wamavhiri parutivi rwazvo, achirira zvikuru. ipapo mweya wakandisimudza ukandiendesa kure uye ndakaenda ndine shungu ndakatsamwa pamweya wangu, uye ruoko rune simba rwayeahoh rwuri pamusoro pangu. ndakasvika kuna vakatapwa vaigara kutera abhibhi pedyo norwizi rwekebhari. zvino ipapo pavaigara, ndakagara pakati pavo kwamazuva manomwe, ndichishayiwa mashoko. shure kwokupera kwamazuva manomwe, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, ndakakuita nharirire yeimba yaisraeri; saka chinzwa shoko randinotaura uye uvayambire neyambiro inobva kwandiri. kana ndikati kumunhu akaipa, ‘uchafa zvirokwazvo,’ iwe ukasamuyambira kana kutaura uchimunyevera panzira dzake dzakaipa kuti uponese mweya wake, munhu uye akaipa achafa nokuda kwechivi chake, asi ropa rake ndicharibvunza pamusoro pako. asi kana iwe ukamuyambira asi iye akaramba kutendeuka pazvakaipa zvake kana panzira dzake dzakaipa, iye achafa nokuda kwechivi chake, asi iwe uchange wazviponesa. “zvakare, kana munhu akarurama akatsauka pakururama kwake uye akaita zvakaipa, ini ndikaisa chigumbuso pamberi pake, achafa. sezvo usina kumuyambira, iye achafa nokuda kwechivi chake. zvakarurama zvaakaita hazvizorangarirwi, uye iwe uchava nemhosva yeropa rake. asi kana ukanyevera munhu akarurama uyu kuti arege kutadza uye akarega kutadza zvirokwazvo achararama nokuti akanzwa kunyeverwa, iwe uchange wazviponesa.” ruoko rwayeahoh rwakanga rwuri pamusoro pangu ipapo, uye akati kwandiri, “simuka uende kubani uye ndichataura newe ikoko.” saka ndakasimuka ndikaenda kubani. uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakanga kumire ipapo, kwakaita sokubwinya kwandakamboona parwizi rwekebhari, ndikawira pasi nechiso changu. ipapo mweya wakapinda mandiri ukandisimudza netsoka dzangu. akataura kwandiri akati, “enda undozvipfigira mumba mako. zvino iwe, mwanakomana womunhu, vachakusunga netambo; uchasungwa zvokuti haungabudi uchienda kuvanhu. ndichaita kuti rurimi rwako runamire kumusoro kwomuromo wako kuitira kuti unyarare ukonewe kuvatsiura, kunyange vari imba yokumukira. asi pandinotaura newe, ndichazarura muromo wako uye uchati kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh.’ ani naani anonzwa ngaanzwe, uye ani naani anoramba ngaarambe hake; nokuti ivo imba yokumukira.

4

“zvino, mwanakomana womunhu, tora chidhina chevhu, uchiise pamberi pako ugodhirowa jerusarema pamusoro pacho. ipapo ugorikomba: umise nhare dzokurwa naro, uvake dhunduru revhu rokusvitsa pariri, udzike misasa ugorikomberedza nezvokuparadza nazvo masvingo. ipapo utore pani yesimbi, ugoimisa sorusvingo rwesimbi pakati pako iwe neguta ugorinzira chiso chako kwariri. richakombwa, uye iwe ucharikomba. ichi chichava chiratidzo kuimba yaisraeri. “ipapo iwe ugovata norutivi rwako rworuboshwe ugoisa chivi cheimba yaisraeri pamusoro pako. iwe unofanira kutakura chivi chavo kwamazuva aunovata norutivi rwako. ndakakutarira mazuva mamwe chetewo zvakaenzana namakore echivi chavo. saka uchatakura chivi cheimba yaisraeri kwamazuva mazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamwe. “kana uchinge wapedza izvi, uvatezve pasi, panguva ino, norutivi rwako rworudyi, ugotakura chivi cheimba yayeahudha. ndakakutarira mazuva makumi mana, zuva rimwe pagore roga roga. urinzire chiso chako wakatarira kukombwa kwejerusarema uye noruoko rwako rwakashama uprofite pamusoro paro. ndichakusunga netambo kuitira kuti ukonewe kutendeukira kune rumwe rutivi uchibva kune rumwe kusvikira wapedza mazuva okukomba kwako. “utore gorosi nebhari, bhinzi nenyemba, mapfunde nesipereti; uzviise mumudziyo wokuchengetera uzvibikire chingwa. unofanira kuchidya pamazuva mazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamwe wakavata norutivi. uyere mashekeri makumi maviri ezvokudya kuti udye zuva rimwe nerimwe uye udye nenguva dzakatarwa. uyezve, uyere chikamu chimwe chete muzvitanhatu chehini yemvura ugoinwa nenguva dzakatarwa. udye chokudya chakaita sekeke rebhari sapaunoda; uzvibike pamberi pavanhu, uchishandisa ndove yavanhu sehuni dzokubikisa.” yeahoh akati, “nenzira iyi, vanhu veisraeri vachadya zvokudya zvakasvibiswa pakati pendudzi uko kwandichavadzingira.” ipapo ndakati, “kwete, ishe yeahoh! handina kumbozvisvibisa. kubva pauduku hwangu kusvikira zvino handina kumbodya chinhu chipi zvacho chakawanikwa chakafa kana chakabvamburwa nezvikara. hapana nyama yakasvibiswa yakambopinda mumukanwa mangu.” iye akati, “zvakanaka, ndichakutendera kuti ubike chingwa chako nendove yemombe pachinzvimbo chetsvina yavanhu.” zvino akazoti kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, ndichamisa kupiwa kwezvokudya mujerusarema. vanhu vachadya zvokudya zvakayerwa vachifunganya uye vachanwa mvura yakayerwa vapererwa, nokuti zvokudya nemvura zvichashayikwa. mumwe achavhunduka achiona mumwe uye vachaonda nokuda kwechivi chavo.

5

“zvino, mwanakomana womunhu, tora munondo unopinza ugoushandisa sechisvo chomugeri kuti uveure musoro wako nendebvu dzako. ipapo utore zviyero zviviri ugokamura bvudzi. panopera mazuva okukomba kwako, upise nomoto chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chebvudzi uri mukati meguta. ugotora chimwe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu uchiteme nomunondo uchipoteredza guta. ugoparadzira chimwe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu kumhepo. nokuti ini ndichavadzingirira nomunondo wakavhomorwa. asi utore rimwe bvudzi shoma shoma uriise pamipendero yenguo dzako. uyezve, utore rimwe shoma racho urikande mumoto ugoripisa. moto uchapararira kubva ipapo uchienda kuimba yose yaisraeri. “zvanzi naishe yeahoh: iri ndiro jerusarema, randakaisa pakati pendudzi, nenyika dzakaripoteredza. asi pakuipa kwaro rakamukira mirayiro yangu nemitemo yangu kupfuura ndudzi nenyika dzakaripoteredza. rakaramba mirayiro yangu uye harina kutevera mitemo yangu. “naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: wanga usingazvidzori kupfuura ndudzi dzakakupoteredza uye hauna kutevera mitemo yangu kana kuchengeta mirayiro yangu. hauna kana kumbotevedzera tsika dzendudzi dzakakupoteredza. “naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: ini iyeni ndinokurwisa iwe jerusarema, uye ndichakuranga pamberi pedzimwe ndudzi. nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvako zvinonyangadza, ndichakuitira zvandisina kumboita kare uye handichazozviitizve. naizvozvo pakati pako madzibaba vachadya vana vavo, uye vana vachadya madzibaba avo. ndichakuranga uye ndichaparadzira vakasara vako vose kumhepo zhinji. naizvozvo noupenyu hwangu zvirokwazvo, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, nokuti wakasvibisa nzvimbo yangu tsvene nezvakaumbwa zvako zvinonyangadza uye namaitiro ako anosemesa, ini ndimene ndichabvisa nyasha dzangu kwauri handichakutarisi netsitsi kana kukuponesa. chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chavanhu vako vachafa nehosha kana kufa nenzara mukati mako; chimwe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chichawa nokuda kwomunondo kunze kwamasvingo ako; uye chimwe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu ndichachiparadzira kumhepo zhinji ndigochitevera nomunondo wakavhomorwa. “ipapo kutsamwa kwangu kuchapera uye hasha dzangu dzichabva pamusoro pavo, uye ndichange ndatsiva. uye hasha dzangu padzichange dzapera pamusoro pavo, vachaziva kuti ini yeahoh ndazvitaura nokushingaira kwangu. “ndichakuita dongo nechinhu chinoshorwa pakati pendudzi dzakakupoteredza, pamberi pavose vanopfuura napo. uchava chinhu chinoshorwa nechiseko, yambiro nechinhu chinotyisa kundudzi dzakakupoteredza pandinokuranga mukutsamwa nehasha dzangu uye nechituko chinobaya. ini yeahoh ndataura. pandinokupfura nemiseve yangu yenzara, inouraya uye inoparadza, ndichapfura kuti ndikuparadze. ndichauyisa nzara pamusoro penzara pamusoro pako uye ndichamisa kupiwa kwako zvokudya. ndichatuma nzara nezvikara kuti zvizokurwisa, uye zvichakusiya usisina mwana. denda nokuteuka kweropa zvichapfuura nomauri, uye ndichauyisa munondo pamusoro pako. ini yeahoh ndataura.”

6

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, rinzira meso ako kumakomo eisraeri; uprofite pamusoro pawo uchiti, ‘imi makomo eisraeri, inzwai shoko raishe yeahoh. zvanzi naishe yeahoh kumakomo nezvikomo, kuhova nokumipata: ndava pedyo nokuuyisa munondo kuti uzokurwisai, uye ndichaparadza nzvimbo dzenyu dzakakwirira. aritari dzenyu dzichaondomorwa uye aritari dzenyu dzezvinonhuhwira dzichaputswa; uye ndichauraya vanhu venyu pamberi pezvifananidzo zvenyu. ndicharadzika zvitunha zvavaisraeri pamberi pezvifananidzo zvavo, uye ndichaparadzira mapfupa enyu pamativi ose earitari dzenyu. pose pamunogara, maguta achaparadzwa uye nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzichakoromorwa, kuitira kuti aritari dzenyu dziparadzwe ave matongo, zvifananidzo zvenyu zvipwanyiwe uye zviparadzwe, aritari dzenyu dzezvinonhuhwira dziputsirwe pasi, uye zvamakaita zvipedzwe chose. vanhu venyu vachawira pasi ivo vaurayiwa pakati penyu, uye muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. “ ‘asi ndichasiya vamwe, nokuti vamwe venyu vachapunyuka pamunondo pamuchaparadzirwa pakati penyika nendudzi. ipapo vakapunyuka vachandirangarira vari pakati pendudzi kwavakaendeswa kuutapwa, kuti ndakashungurudzwa sei nemwoyo yavo youfeve, iyo yakatsauka kubva kwandiri, uye nameso avo, akachiva zvifananidzo zvavo. vachazvisema pachavo nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavakaita nezvinyangadzo zvavo zvose. uye vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh; handina kutaura pasina kuti ndichauyisa njodzi iyi pamusoro pavo. “ ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: rovai maoko enyu pamwe chete uye mudzane-dzane netsoka dzenyu mudanidzire muchiti, “maiwe!” nokuda kwezvakaipa zvose nezvinonyangadza zveimba yaisraeri, nokuti vachaurayiwa nomunondo, nzara nedenda. ari kure achaurayiwa nedenda, uye ari pedyo achaurayiwa nomunondo, uye uyo achapona akararama, achafa nenzara. saka ndichapedzera hasha dzangu pamusoro pavo. uye vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh, kana vanhu vavo vakaurayiwa vari pakati pezvifananidzo zvavo zvakapoteredza aritari dzavo, napazvikomo zvose zvakakwirira napamusoro pamakomo ose, napasi pemiti yakapfumvutira nemiti yomuouki yose ina mashizha panzvimbo dzavaipira zvinonhuhwira kuzvifananidzo zvavo zvose. uye ndichatambanudza ruoko rwangu kuti ndivarwise ndigoparadza nyika ndigoiita dongo kubva kugwenga kusvikira kudhibhira, kwose kwose kwavanogara. ipapo vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.’ ”

7

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri, richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, zvanzi naishe yeahoh kunyika yeisraeri: kuguma! kuguma kwasvika kumativi mana enyika. kuguma kwava pamusoro pako zvino uye ndichatuma kutsamwa kwangu pamusoro pako. ndichakutonga zvakafanira tsika dzako ndigotsiva zvinyangadzo zvako zvose. handizokunzwiri ngoni kana kukuponesa; zvirokwazvo ndichakutsiva zvakafanira tsika dzako nezvinyangadzo zviri pakati pako. ipapo uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. “zvanzi naishe yeahoh: njodzi! njodzi isina kumbonzwikwa nezvayo iri kuuya! kuguma kwasvika! kuguma kwasvika! kwamuka kuti kuzokurwisai. kwauya! kuparadzwa kwauya pamusoro pako, iwe ugere panyika. nguva yasvika, zuva rava pedyo; pava nokutya, kwete mufaro, pamusoro pamakomo. ndava pedyo nokudurura hasha dzangu pamusoro pako ndigopedzera kutsamwa kwangu pamusoro pako; ndichakutonga zvakafanira mafambiro ako ndigotsiva zvinyangadzo zvako zvose. handizombokunzwiri ngoni kana kukuponesa; ndichakutsiva zvakafanira mafambiro ako nezvinyangadzo zviri pakati pako. ipapo uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh ndiri kukurova. “zuva rasvika! rauya! kuparadzwa kwabuda, shamhu yabukira, kuzvikudza kwatumbuka! kuita nechisimba kwakura kukava shamhu yokuranga zvakaipa; hakuna mumwe wavanhu ava achasara, hakuna pavazhinji vavo ivavo, kana pfuma kana chinokosha. nguva yauya, zuva rasvika. mutengi ngaarege kufara uye mutengesi ngaarege kusuwa, nokuti hasha dziri pamusoro pavazhinji vose. mutengesi haangadzorerwi nyika yaakanga atengesa kana vose vari vaviri vachiri vapenyu, nokuti chiratidzo chakaonekwa pamusoro pavazhinji vose chichazozadziswa. nokuda kwezvivi zvavo, hakuna kana mumwe wavo achachengetedza upenyu hwake. kunyange vakaridza hwamanda uye vakagadzirira zvose, hapana achaenda kuhondo, nokuti hasha dzangu dziri pamusoro pavazhinji vose. “kunze kuno munondo, mukati mune denda nenzara; vaya vari musango vachafa nomunondo, uye vari muguta vachapedzwa nenzara nedenda. vose vanorarama vachapunyuka vachange vari mumakomo, vachirira senjiva dzomumipata, mumwe nomumwe nokuda kwezvivi zvake. ruoko rumwe norumwe ruchapera simba uye ibvi rimwe nerimwe richarukutika semvura. vachafuka nguo dzamasaga uye vachafukidzwa nokutya. zviso zvavo zvichafukidzwa nenyadzi uye misoro yavo ichaveurwa. vachakanda sirivha yavo munzira dzomumisha, uye goridhe yavo ichava chinhu chisina kuchena. sirivha yavo negoridhe ravo hazvingavaponesi pazuva rokutsamwa kwayeahoh. hazvingapedzi nzara yavo kana kugutsa matumbu avo nazvo, nokuti ndizvo zvakavagumbusa vakapinda muchivi. vakanga vachizvikudza nokuda kwoukomba hwavo hwakanaka uye vachihushandisa kuita zvifananidzo zvinonyangadza nezviumbwa zvakaipisisa. naizvozvo ndichashandura izvi, zvikava chinhu chine tsvina kwavari. ndichazvipa zvose kuvatorwa sezvinhu zvakapambwa uye sepfuma ingapambwa navakaipa venyika, uye vachazvisvibisa. ndichavafuratira uye vachasvibisa nzvimbo yangu inokosha; mbavha dzichapinda mairi dzigoisvibisa. “gadzirai ngetani, nokuti nyika izere nokuteura ropa uye guta rizere nokuita nechisimba. ndichauyisa vanhu vakaipisisa vendudzi kuti vavatorere dzimba dzavo; ndichaita kuti kuzvikudza kwavane simba kugume, uye nzvimbo dzavo tsvene dzichasvibiswa. kana kutya kwauya, vachatsvaka rugare asi havangaruwani. kuchauya njodzi pamusoro penjodzi uye guhu pamusoro peguhu. vachaedza kutsvaka chiratidzo kumuprofita; kudzidziswa murayiro nomuprista kuchashayikwa, namazano anobva kuvakuruwo achashayikwa. mambo achachema, muchinda achafukidzwa nokuora mwoyo, uye maoko avanhu vomunyika achadedera. ndichavaitira zvakafanira mafambiro avo, uye ndichavatonga nemitemo yavo. ipapo vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.”

8

mugore rechitanhatu, mumwedzi wechitanhatu pazuva reshanu, pandakanga ndirere mumba mangu uye vakuru veyeahudha vagere pamberi pangu, ruoko rwaishe yeahoh rwakauya pamusoro pangu ipapo. ndakatarisa, ndikaona chimiro chakaita sechomunhu. kubva ipapo zvichikwira kumusoro, kuratidzika kwake kwainge kuchibwinya sedare rinopisa. akatambanudza chakanga chakaita soruoko akandibata nebvudzi romusoro wangu. mweya akandisimudza pakati penyika nedenga uye muzviratidzo zvaallah akanditora akandiendesa kujerusarema, kumukova wokusuo rokumusoro roruvazhe rwomukati, pakanga pamire chifananidzo chinomutsa godo. uye ipapo pamberi pangu pakanga pane kubwinya kwaallah waisraeri, sapachiratidzo chandakanga ndaona mubani. ipapo akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, tarira kumusoro.” naizvozvo ndakatarisa, uye pamukova wokumusoro kwesuo rearitari ndakaona chifananidzo ichi chegodo. uye akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, unoona zvavari kuita here, izvo zvinhu zvinonyangadza chose zvinoitwa neimba yaisraeri pano, zvinhu zvichandiisa kure neimba yangu tsvene? asika, uchaona zvimwe zvinhu zvinonyangadza kwazvo.” ipapo akaenda neni kumukova wokuruvazhe. ndakatarisa ndikaona buri pamadziro. iye akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, chichera zvino mumadziro.” saka ndakachera mumadziro ndikaona mukova imomo. ipapo akati kwandiri, “pinda mukati undoona zvinhu zvakaipa uye zvinonyangadza zvavanoita pano.” saka ndakapinda mukati ndikatarisa, ndikaona mifananidzo pamadziro ose yezvinhu zvose zvinokambaira uye nemhuka dzinonyangadza nezvifananidzo zvose zveimba yaisraeri. pamberi pazvo pakanga pamire vakuru makumi manomwe veimba yaisraeri, uye jaazania mwanakomana washafani akanga akamira pakati pavo. mumwe nomumwe akanga akabata hadyana yezvinonhuhwira muruoko rwake, uye munhuwi wegore rezvinonhuhwira wakanga uchienda kumusoro. iye akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, waona here zvinoitwa navakuru veimba yaisraeri murima, mumwe nomumwe pashongwe yechifananidzo chake? vanoti, ‘yeahoh haationi, yeahoh akaramba nyika.’ ” akatizve, “uchavaona vachiita zvinhu zvinonyangadza kupfuura izvi.” ipapo akaenda neni kumukova wokusuo rokumusoro weimba yayeahoh, ndikaona vakadzi vagerepo, vachichema tamuzi. akati kwandiri, “unoona here izvi, mwanakomana womunhu? uchaona zvinhu zvakatonyanya kuipa kupfuura izvi.” zvino akaenda neni kuruvazhe rwomukati meimba yayeahoh, uye ipapo pamukova wetemberi, pakati pebiravira nearitari, pakanga pana varume vaikarosvika makumi maviri navashanu. vakafuratira temberi yayeahoh uye zviso zvavo zvakatarisa kumabvazuva, vakanga vachipfugamira zuva kurutivi rwamabvazuva. akati kwandiri, “wazviona here izvi, iwe mwanakomana womunhu? chinhu chiduku here kuimba yayeahudha kuti vaite zvinhu zvinonyangadza zvavari kuita pano? vanofanira here kuzadzazve nyika nechisimba uye nokuramba vachinditsamwisa? vatarise vachiisa davi kumhuno dzavo. naizvozvo ndichavaranga nehasha; handingavanzwiri tsitsi kana kuvaponesa. kunyange vakaridza mhere munzeve dzangu, handingavanzwi.”

9

ipapo ndakamunzwa achidanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “uya navarindi veguta pano, mumwe nomumwe ano munondo muruoko rwake.” ipapo ndakaona varume vatanhatu vachiuya vachibva nokurutivi rwesuo rokumusoro, rakatarisa kumusoro, mumwe nomumwe ano munondo unopinza kwazvo muruoko rwake. pakati pavo pakanga pano murume akanga akapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka ane zvinyoreso parutivi rwake. ivo vakapinda vakamira parutivi rwearitari yendarira. zvino kubwinya kwaallah waisraeri kwakakwira kuchibva pamusoro pamakerubhi, pakwakanga kuri, ndokuswedera kuchikumbaridzo chetemberi. ipapo yeahoh akadana murume akanga akapfeka mucheka uya akanga ane zvinyoreso parutivi rwake akati kwaari, “pfuura nomuguta rose rejerusarema uye uise munembo pahuma dzavaya vanotsutsumwa navanochema pamusoro pezvinhu zvinonyangadza zvinoitwa mariri.” ndichakateerera, iye akati kuna vamwe, “muteverei nomukati meguta, muuraye, musingambonzwiri ngoni kana tsitsi. urayai vatana, majaya navarandakadzi, madzimai navana, asi musabata ani zvake ano munembo. mutangire paimba tsvene yangu.” saka vakatanga navakuru vakanga vari mberi kwetemberi. ipapo akati kwavari, “svibisai temberi muzadze mavazhe navakaurayiwa. endai!” naizvozvo vakaenda vakatanga kuuraya muguta rose. pavakanga vachiuraya, uye ini ndasara ndoga, ndakawira pasi nechiso, ndichidanidzira, ndichiti, “haiwa, ishe yeahoh! muchaparadza vakasara vose vaisraeri pakudururwa kwehasha dzenyu pamusoro pejerusarema here?” akandipindura achiti, “chivi cheimba yaisraeri neyeahudha chakura kwazvo; nyika yazara nokuteura ropa uye guta razara nokusaruramisira. ivo vanoti, ‘yeahoh akaramba nyika; yeahoh haaoni.’ saka handingambovanzwira tsitsi kana kuvaponesa, asi ndichauyisa pamisoro yavo zvavakaita.” ipapo murume uya akanga akapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka ane zvokunyoresa parutivi pake akadzoka neshoko, achiti, “ndaita sezvamakarayira.”

10

ndakatarisa, ndikaona chinhu chakafanana nechigaro choushe chesafire pamusoro pedenga raiva pamusoro pemisoro yamakerubhimi. yeahoh akati kumurume uya akanga akapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka, “enda pakati pamavhiri ari munyasi mamakerubhi. uzadze maoko ako namazimbe anopisa anobva pamakerubhi ugoaparadzira pamusoro peguta.” iye akapinda ini ndakatarira. zvino makerubhi akanga akamira parutivi rwezasi kwetemberi murume paakapinda, uye gore rakazadza ruvazhe rwomukati. ipapo kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakakwira pamusoro pamakerubhi kukaswedera kuchikumbaridzo chetemberi. gore rakazadza temberi, uye ruvazhe rukazadzwa nokupenya kwokubwinya kwayeahoh. mubvumo wamapapiro amakerubhi wainzwika kusvikira kuruvazhe rwokunze, senzwi raallah wamasimba ose kana achitaura. yeahoh akati arayira murume akanga akapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka, achiti, “tora moto pakati pamavhiri, kubva pamakerubhi,” murume akapinda mukati akamira parutivi rwevhiri. ipapo rimwe ramakerubhi rakatambanudzira ruoko rwaro kumoto wakanga uri pakati pawo. akatora mumwe moto ndokuuisa mumaoko omurume akanga akapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka, iye ndokuutora ndokuenda nawo panze. (pasi pamapapiro amakerubhi paionekwa chinhu chainge maoko omunhu.) ndakatarisa, ndikaona parutivi rwamakerubhi mavhiri mana, rimwe vhiri parutivi rwekerubhi rimwe nerimwe, mavhiri acho aivaima kunge ibwe rekrisorite. pakuonekwa kwawo, mana acho akanga akafanana; rimwe nerimwe rakanga rakaita sevhiri riri mukati merimwe vhiri. paaifamba aigona kuenda neimwe yenzira ina kwakanga kwakatarisa makerubhi; mavhiri haana kutsauka pakufamba kwaiita makerubhi. makerubhi akaenda munzira ipi zvayo kwakanga kwakatarira musoro, asingatsauki pakufamba kwawo. miviri yawo yose, pamwe chete nemisana yawo, maoko awo namapapiro awo, zvakanga zvakazara nameso, zvakanga zvakadarowo namavhiri awo ari mana. ndakanzwa mavhiri achitumidzwa zita rokuti “mavhiri okumonereka.” kerubhi rimwe nerimwe rakanga rine zviso zvina: chimwe chiso chakanga chiri chekerubhi, chechipiri chakanga chiri chiso chomunhu, chiso chechitatu chakanga chiri cheshumba, chiso chechina chakanga chiri chegondo. ipapo makerubhi akabhururuka achikwira kumusoro. izvi ndizvo zvisikwa zvipenyu zvandakaona ndiri parwizi rwekebhari. makerubhi aiti ofamba, mavhiri aiva parutivi rwawo ofambawo; makerubhi aiti akatambanudza mapapiro awo kuti abhururuke kubva pasi, mavhiri akanga asingabvi parutivi rwawo. kana makerubhi akamira, iwo aimirawo; uye makerubhi akabhururuka, iwo aisimuka pamwe chete nawo, nokuti mweya wezvisikwa zvipenyu wakanga uri maari. ipapo kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakabva pamusoro pechikumbaridzo chetemberi kukamira pamusoro pamakerubhi. ndichakatarisa izvi, makerubhi akatambanudza mapapiro awo ndokubhururuka kubva pasi, uye paaienda, mavhiri aiendawo nawo. akandomira pamukova wesuo rokumabvazuva kweimba yayeahoh, uye kubwinya kwaallah waisraeri kwakanga kuri pamusoro pawo. izvi ndizvo zvisikwa zvipenyu zvandakanga ndaona pasi paallah waisraeri parwizi rwekebhari, uye ndikaziva kuti akanga ari makerubhi. rimwe nerimwe rakanga rine zviso zvina namapapiro mana, uye pasi pamapapiro awo pakanga pane zvairatidzika samaoko omunhu. zviso zvawo zvakanga zvichiratidzika sezviya zvandakanga ndamboona parwizi rwekebhari. chimwe nechimwe chaifamba chakananga mberi.

11

ipapo mweya wakandisimudza ukaenda neni pasuo reimba yayeahoh rakatarira kumabvazuva. pamukova wesuo ipapo, pakanga pane varume makumi maviri navashanu, uye ndakaona pakati pavo jaazania mwanakomana waazuri naperatia mwanakomana wabhenaya, vatungamiri vavanhu. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “mwanakomana womunhu, ava ndivo varume vanorangana zvakaipa nokupa mano akaipa muguta rino. vanoti, ‘ko, nguva haisati yasvika here yokuvaka dzimba? guta rino ihari yokubikira, uye isu tisu nyama.’ naizvozvo profita pamusoro pavo; profita, mwanakomana womunhu.” ipapo mweya wayeahoh wakauya pamusoro pangu, iye akanditaurira kuti nditi: “zvanzi nayeahoh: ndizvo zvamunotaura, imi imba yaisraeri, asi ndinoziva zvamunofunga mundangariro dzenyu. makauraya vanhu vazhinji muguta rino uye mukazadza nzira dzaro nevakafa. “naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: zvitunha zvamakandamo ndiyo nyama uye guta rino ndiyo hari, asi ini ndichakubudisai mariri. munotya munondo, zvino munondo ndiwo wandichauyisa kuzokurwisai, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. ndichakubudisai kunze kweguta ndigokuisai mumaoko avatorwa uye ndichakurangai. muchaurayiwa nomunondo, uye ini ndichakutongai pamiganhu yaisraeri. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. guta rino haringavi hari kwamuri, nemi hamungavi nyama mariri; ndichakutongai ini pamiganhu yeisraeri. uye muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh, nokuti hamuna kutevera mitemo yangu kana kuchengeta mirayiro yangu asi makafamba netsika dzendudzi dzakakupoteredzai.” zvino ndakati ndichiprofita, peratia mwanakomana wabhenaya akafa. ipapo ndakawira pasi nechiso ndikachema zvikuru ndichiti, “haiwa ishe yeahoh! ko, muchaparadza chose vakasara vaisraeri here?” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri, richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, hama dzako, hama dzako dzeropa neimba yose yaisraeri, ndivo vainzi navanhu vejerusarema, ‘vari kure kwazvo nayeahoh; nyika ino takaipiwa kuti ive yedu.’ “naizvozvo uti, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: kunyange ndakavaendesa kure pakati pendudzi uye ndikavaparadzira pakati penyika, asi kwechinguva chiduku ndakanga ndiri nzvimbo yavo tsvene munyika dzavakaenda.’ “naizvozvo uti, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: ndichakuunganidzai kubva kundudzi ndigokudzosai kubva kunyika dzamakanga makaparadzirwa uye ndichakupaizve nyika yaisraeri.’ “vachadzokera kwairi vagobvisa zvifananidzo zvayo zvose zvakaipisisa nezvifananidzo zvinonyangadza. ndichavapa mwoyo mumwe uye ndichaisa mweya mutsva mukati mavo; ndichabvisa mwoyo webwe mukati mavo ndigovapa mwoyo wenyama. ipapo vachatevera mitemo yangu uye vachachenjerera kuchengeta mirayiro yangu. vachava vanhu vangu, uye ini ndichava allah wavo. asi kana vari vaya vane mwoyo inotevera zvakaumbwa zvavo zvakaipisisa nezvifananidzo zvinonyangadza, ndichaburutsa pamisoro yavo chaiyo zvavakaita, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.” ipapo makerubhi namavhiri parutivi pawo akatambanudza mapapiro awo, uye kubwinya kwaallah waisraeri kwakanga kuri pamusoro pawo. kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakakwira kuchibva mukati meguta kukandomira pamusoro pegomo nechokumabvazuva kwaro. mweya wakandisimudza ukaenda neni kuna vakatapwa vari mubhabhironi muchiratidzo chakapiwa nomweya waallah. ipapo chiratidzo chandakanga ndaona chakakwidzwa kubva pandiri, uye ndakaudza vakatapwa zvinhu zvose zvandakaratidzwa nayeahoh.

12

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, iwe ugere pakati pavanhu vanondimukira. vane meso okuona asi havaoni, vane nzeve dzokunzwa asi havanzwi, nokuti vanhu vokumukira. “naizvozvo, mwanakomana womunhu, rongedza midziyo yako utame uye utame masikati, vakakutarira, ubude ubve panzvimbo yauri uende kune imwe nzvimbo. zvimwe vachanzwisisa, kunyange vari imba inondimukira. masikati chaiwo, vakatarira, iwe budisa nhumbi dzako dzakarongedzerwa kutama. ipapo panguva yamadekwana, ivo vakatarira, buda iwe sezvinoita vaya vanoenda muutapwa. uboore masvingo vakatarira ugotora nhumbi dzako ubude napo. udziise papfudzi rako ivo vakangotarisa ugobuda nadzo kwasviba. ufukidze chiso chako kuti urege kuona nyika, nokuti ndakuita chiratidzo kuimba yaisraeri.” saka ndakaita sezvandakarayirwa. panguva yamasikati ndakabudisa zvinhu zvangu zvarongedzerwa kutama. zvino panguva yamadekwana ndakaboora masvingo namaoko angu. ndakabudisa nhumbi dzangu kwasviba, ndakazvitakura pamapfudzi angu ivo vakangotarisa. shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri panguva yamangwanani richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, imba iyo yokundimukira yaisraeri haina kukubvunza here kuti, ‘uri kuiteiko?’ “uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: chirevo ichi chinoreva muchinda wejerusarema neimba yose yaisraeri iripo.’ uti kwavari, ‘ini ndiri chiratidzo kwamuri.’ “sezvandakaita, ndizvo zvavachaitirwawo. vachaenda kuutapwa senhapwa. “muchinda ari pakati pavo achaisa zvinhu zvake papfudzi kwasviba agoenda, uye achaboorerwa buri rokubuda naro parusvingo. achafukidza chiso chake kuitira kuti arege kuona nyika. ndichamutambanudzira mumbure wangu, uye achabatwa mumusungo wangu; ndichamuendesa kubhabhironi, nyika yavakaradhea, asi haasi kuzoiona, uye ikoko ndiko kwaachafira. ndichaparadzira kumhepo vose vakamupoteredza, vashandiri vake namauto ake, uye ndichavateverera nomunondo wakavhomorwa. “vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh, pandichavaparadzira pakati pendudzi ndigovaparadzira kunyika dzose. asi ndichasiya vashoma vavo pamunondo, napanzara nedenda, kuitira kuti pakati pendudzi kwavachaenda zvimwe vangarangarira zvinyangadzo zvavo zvavakaita zvose. ipapo vachaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, udedere paunenge uchidya zvokudya zvako, uye udedere uye utye paunonwa mvura yako. uti kuvanhu venyika, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh pamusoro pavanogara mujerusarema uye nomunyika yaisraeri: vachadya zvokudya zvavo nokufunganya uye vachanwa mvura yavo vaora mwoyo, nokuti nyika yavo ichatorerwa zviri mairi nokuda kwechisimba chaavo vose vanogaramo. maguta anogarwa navanhu achava matongo uye nyika ichaparadzwa. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, chirevo ichi chamunacho munyika yaisraeri ndecheiko chinoti, ‘mazuva ari kungopera uye zviratidzo zvose zvinongova pasina?’ uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: ndichaita kuti chirevo ichi chigume, uye havachazochitauri muisraeri.’ uti kwavari, ‘mazuva aswedera okuti zviratidzo zvose zvizadziswe. nokuti hakuchazovazve nezviratidzo zvenhema kana kuvuka kunobata kumeso pakati pavanhu veisraeri. asi ini yeahoh ndichataura zvandichataura, uye zvichazadzisika zvisinganonoki. nokuti pamazuva enyu, imi imba yokumukira, ndichazadzisa zvose zvandinotaura, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, imba yaisraeri iri kuti, ‘chiratidzo chaanoona ndechamakore mazhinji kubva iye zvino, uye anoprofita zvenguva inouya zviri kure.’ “naizvozvo uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: hakuna shoko rangu richanonokazve; zvose zvandinoreva zvichazadzisika, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.’ ”

13

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, profita pamusoro pavaprofita vaisraeri vari kukuprofitirai zvino. uti kuna avo vanoprofita zvinobva pamurangariro wavo, ‘inzwai shoko rayeahoh! zvanzi naishe yeahoh: vane nhamo vaprofita mapenzi vanotevera mweya yavo pachavo ivo vasina chavakaona! vaprofita venyu, imi vaisraeri, vakafanana namakava ari pakati pamatongo. hamuna kukwira pakakoromoka porusvingo kuti mupagadzirire imba yaisraeri, kuti igomira yakasimba pahondo pazuva rayeahoh. zviratidzo zvavo ndezvenhema uye kuvuka kwavo inhema. ivo vanoti, “yeahoh anoti,” asi yeahoh asina kuvatuma; asi vanotarisira kuti mashoko avo azadzisike. hauna kuona zviratidzo zvenhema here uye mukataura nhema pakuvuka pamainge muchiti, “yeahoh anoti,” kunyange zvangu ndisina kutaura? “ ‘naizvozvo, zvanzi naishe yeahoh: nokuda kwamashoko enyu enhema nezviratidzo zvenhema ndinokupai mhosva, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. ruoko rwangu rucharwa navaprofita vanoona zviratidzo zvenhema uye vanotaura kuvuka kwenhema. havangavi pakati pamakurukota avanhu vangu kana kunyorwa muzvinyorwa zveimba yaisraeri, uye havangapindi munyika yaisraeri. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini ishe yeahoh. “ ‘nokuda kwokuti vanotsausa vanhu vangu, vachiti, “rugare,” ipo pasina rugare, uye nokuti pavanovaka rusvingo rwakatetepa vanorupenda nependi chena. naizvozvo udza ivavo vanorupenda kuti ruchawa. mvura ichanaya yakawanda, uye ndichatuma chimvuramabwe chicharova pasi, uye mhepo dzine simba dzichavhuvhuta. panoondomoka rusvingo vanhu havazokubvunzi here vachiti, “iripiko pendi chena yamakarupenda nayo?” “ ‘naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: muhasha dzangu ndichasunungura mhepo ine simba, uye pakutsamwa kwangu chimvuramabwe nemvura zhinji zvichanaya nokuparadza kunotyisa. ndichaparadza rusvingo rwawakapenda nependi chena uye ndicharukoromora ndigorusiya rwati ware ware pasi zvokuti nheyo dzarwo dzichasara dzava pachena. paruchakoromoka, nemi muchaparadzwa murimo; uye muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. saka ndichapedzera hasha dzangu parusvingo napamusoro pavaya vairupenda nependi chena. ndichati kwamuri, “rusvingo rwaparara uye naivowo vakarupenda nependi chena, vaya vaprofita veisraeri vakaprofita pamusoro pejerusarema uye vakaona zviratidzo zvorugare rwaro nyamba kwakanga kusina rugare, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.” ’ “zvino, iwe mwanakomana womunhu, rinzira chiso chako pamusoro pavanasikana vavanhu vako vanoprofita zvinobva mundangariro dzavo. profita pamusoro pavo, uti, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: vane nhamo vakadzi vanosonera mazango pamaoko avo uye vanoita zvifukidzo zvemisoro yavo zvemhando dzakasiyana-siyana pakureba vachiitira kuti vateye vanhu nazvo. ko, imi muchateya upenyu hwavanhu vangu asi muchichengetedza hwenyu here? makandisvibisa pakati pavanhu vangu nokuda kwezviyero zvishoma zvebhari namafufu echingwa. pamakareva nhema kuvanhu vangu, vanoteerera nhema, makauraya vaya vakanga vasingafaniri kufa, mukasiya vakanga vasingafaniri kurarama. “ ‘naizvozvo, zvanzi naishe yeahoh: ndinovenga mazango enyu amunoteya nawo vanhu kunge munoteya shiri, zvino ndichaadambura pamaoko enyu; ndichasunungura vanhu vamunoteya seshiri. ndichabvarura mavhoiri enyu ndigoponesa vanhu vangu pamaoko enyu, uye havachazovi nyama mumaoko enyu, uye havachazobatwizve nesimba renyu. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. nokuti makaodza mwoyo yavakarurama nenhema dzenyu, vandakanga ndisina kuchemedza ini, uye nokuti makakurudzira vakaipa kuti varege kutendeuka panzira dzavo dzakaipa nokudaro vaponese mweya yavo, naizvozvo hamuchazoonizve zviratidzo zvenhema kana kuita zvokuvuka. ndichaponesa vanhu vangu pamaoko enyu. ipapo zvino muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh.’ ”

14

vamwe vavakuru veisraeri vakauya kwandiri vakagara pasi pamberi pangu. ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, ava vanhu vakaisa zvifananidzo mumwoyo yavo vakaisa zvigumbuso zvakaipa pamberi pavo. ndingavatendera kuti vatombondibvunza here? naizvozvo taura navo ugovaudza kuti, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: kana muisraeri upi zvake akaisa zvifananidzo mumwoyo make uye akaisa chigumbuso chakaipa pamberi pake ndokuenda kumuprofita, ini yeahoh ndichamupindura pachangu zvinoenderana nokunamata kwake zvifananidzo zvake zvikuru. ndichaita izvi kuti ndibatezve mwoyo yavanhu veisraeri, ivo vakandisiya vose kuti vatevere zvifananidzo zvavo.’ “naizvozvo uti kuimba yeisraeri, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: tendeukai! dzokai mufuratire zvifananidzo zvenyu musiye mabasa enyu ose anonyangadza! “ ‘kana muisraeri upi zvake, kana mutorwa agere muisraeri, akazvitsaura kubva pandiri akaisa zvifananidzo mumwoyo make uye akaisa chigumbuso chakaipa pamberi pake ndokuenda kumuprofita kunobvunza nezvangu, ini yeahoh ndichamupindura pachangu. ndicharinzira chiso changu pamusoro pomunhu uyo kuti ndimurwise uye ndichamuita muenzaniso netsumo. ndichamubvisa pakati pavanhu vangu. ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. “ ‘uye kana muprofita akanyengerwa kuti ataure chiprofita, ini yeahoh ndini ndamunyengera, uye ndichatambanudza ruoko rwangu pamusoro pake ndigomuparadza pakati pavanhu veisraeri. vachatakura mhosva yavo ivo, muprofita achava nemhosva zvakangoenzana naiye auya kuzomubvunza. ipapo vanhu veisraeri havangazotsaukizve vachibva kwandiri kana kuzvisvibisazve nezvivi zvavo zvose. vachava vanhu vangu, uye ini ndichava allah wavo, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, kana nyika ikanditadzira nokusatendeka kwayo uye ini ndikatambanudza ruoko rwangu pamusoro payo kuti ndiparadze kugoverwa kwayo zvokudya nokutumira nzara pamusoro payo nokuuraya vanhu vayo nezvipfuwo zvayo, kunyange dai varume vatatu ava, noa, dhanieri najobho, vaiva mairi vaingogona kuzviponesa ivo pachavo nokuda kwokururama kwavo, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. “kana dai ndikatumira zvikara munyika imomo, izvo zvikaisiya isina kana mwana uye ikazoparadzwa zvokuti pashayikwe anopfuura nomo nokuda kwezvikara, zvirokwazvo, noupenyu hwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, kunyange dai varume vatatu ava vaivamo, havaizogona kuponesa vanakomana vavo kana vanasikana vavo. ivo chete ndivo vaingopona, asi nyika yaizoparadzwa. “kana dai ndaiuyisa munondo kuzorwisa nyika iyo ndikati, ‘munondo ngaupfuure nomunyika yose,’ uye ndikauraya vanhu vayo nezvipfuwo zvavo, zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, kunyange dai varume ava vatatu vaivamo, havaizogona kuponesa vanakomana vavo kana vanasikana vavo. ivo voga ndivo vaizoponeswa. “kana dai ndikatuma denda munyika ndikadurura hasha dzangu pamusoro payo nokuteura ropa, ndichauraya vanhu vayo nezvipfuwo zvavo, zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, kunyange dai noa, nadhanieri najobho vaivamo, havaigona kuponesa mwanakomana kana mwanasikana. vaingozviponesa ivo chete nokuda kwokururama kwavo. “nokuti zvanzi naishe yeahoh: zvichaipisisa sei kana ndikatuma pamusoro pejerusarema zvinotyisa zvina zvandakatonga, zvinoti munondo, nzara, zvikara nedenda, kuzouraya vanhu varo nezvipfuwo zvaro! kunyange zvakadaro hazvo pachava navanosara, vanakomana navanasikana vachabudiswa mairi. vachauya kwamuri, uye pamunoona tsika dzavo namabasa avo, muchanyaradzwa pamusoro penjodzi yandakauyisa pamusoro pejerusarema, njodzi dzose dzandakauyisa pairi. muchanyaradzwa pamunoona tsika dzavo namabasa avo, nokuti muchaziva kuti hapana chandakaita mariri pasina chikonzero, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.”

15

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, muti womuzambiringa uri nani kupfuura davi romuti zvawo musango neiko? ko, pane danda rakambotorwa pauri here kuti rigadziriswe chimwe chinhu chine basa? ko, vanhu vangaita hoko nawo kuti vanhu vaturike zvinhu ipapo here? uye shure kwokunge wakandwa mumoto sehuni uye moto ndokuupisa mativi ose ari maviri uye ndokusviba pakati, zvino uchabatsira chinhu here? kana wanga usingabatsiri chinhu uchiri wakakwana, uchagobatsireiko kana moto waupisa uye wasviba? “naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh: sezvo ndakaisa miti yemizambiringa pakati pemiti yesango sehuni dzomoto, ndizvo zvandichaita kuvanhu vagere mujerusarema. ndicharinzira chiso changu kwavari kuti ndivarwise. kunyange zvavo vakabuda mumoto, moto uchavaparadza. uye pandinorinzira chiso changu kwavari kuti ndivarwise muchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. ndichaparadza nyika nokuti vakanga vasina kutendeka, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.”

16

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, tsiura jerusarema pamwe chete nezvinyangadzo zvaro uti, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh kujerusarema: madzitateguru ako nokwaakaberekerwa ndiko kunyika yekenani; baba vako vakanga vari muamori uye mai vako vakanga vari muhiti. pazuva rawakaberekwa rukuvhute rwako haruna kugurwa, uye hauna kushambidzwa nemvura kuti uchene, uye hauna kutongokwizwa nomunyu kana kuputirwa mumucheka. hakuna munhu akakunzwira tsitsi kana kuva nengoni newe kuti akuitire chinhu chimwe chezvinhu izvi. asi, wakarasirwa kusango, nokuti musi wawakaberekwa iwe wakashorwa. “ ‘ipapo ndakapfuura napo ndikakuona uchipfakanyika uri muropa rako, uye pawakanga uvete ipapo uri muropa rako, ndakati kwauri, “rarama!” ndakakuita kuti ukure somuti wesango. wakakura ukanyatsoumbika ukava ukomba hwakaisvonaka. mazamu ako akakura nebvudzi rako rikakura, iyewe wakanga wakashama usina chinhu. “ ‘shure kwaizvozvo, ndakapfuura nepauri, uye pandakatarira pauri ndakaona kuti wakanga wakura pane zvorudo, ndikawarira rutivi rwenguo yangu pamusoro pako ndokukufukidza pakushama kwako. ndakakupikira ndikaita sungano newe, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, iwe ukava wangu. “ ‘ndakakushambidza nemvura uye ndikakugeza kubvisa ropa rako, ndokukuzodza mafuta. ndakakufukidza nezvakarukwa zvakanaka ndikakupfekedza shangu dzamatehwe. ndakakufukidza nomucheka wakaisvonaka ndikakufukidza mucheka uno murango unokosha. ndakakushongedza noukomba: ndikaisa zvishongo zvomumaoko nouketani pamutsipa wako, uye ndakaisa mhete pamhuno yako, nemhete panzeve dzako uye nekorona yakanaka pamusoro wako. saka wakashongedzwa negoridhe nesirivha; nguo dzako dzaiva dzomucheka wakaisvonaka uye mucheka womutengo mukuru nomucheka wakarukwa. zvokudya zvako zvaiva zvoupfu hwakatsetseka, nouchi namafuta omuorivhi. wakabva wanaka chose ukasimukira kusvikira wava mambokadzi. mukurumbira wokunaka kwako wakapararira pakati pendudzi, nokuti kubwinya kwandakaisa pamusoro pako kwakaita kuti kunaka kwako kuve kwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. “ ‘asi iwe wakavimba norunako rwako ukashandisa mbiri yako kuti uve chifeve. wakazadza munhu wose akapfuura napauri noufeve uye nokuda kworunako rwako ukava wake. wakatora dzimwe nhumbi dzako ukashongedza nzvimbo dzakakwirira, kwawakaramba uchiitira ufeve hwako. zvinhu zvakadaro hazvifaniri kuitika uye hazvifaniri kutomboitwa. wakatorazve ukomba hwezvishongo zvakaisvonaka zvandakakupa, ukomba hwakaitwa negoridhe nesirivha, uye ukazviitira zvifananidzo zvechirume ndokuita ufeve nazvo. uye wakatora nguo dzako dzakarukwa kuti ufukidze zvifananidzo, uye ukapira mafuta angu ezvinonhuhwira pamberi pazvo. uyezve zvokudya zvandakakupa, upfu hwakatsetseka, mafuta omuorivhi nouchi zvandakakupa kuti udye, wakazvipira sezvinonhuhwira pamberi pazvo. izvozvo ndizvo zvakaitika, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. “ ‘uye wakatora vanakomana navanasikana vawakaberekera ini ukavabayira sezvokudya kuzvifananidzo. ko, ufeve hwako hwakanga husina kuringana here? wakauraya vana vangu ukavabayira kuzvifananidzo. mumabasa ako ose anonyangadza hauna kurangarira mazuva ouduku hwako, pawakanga usina kupfeka usina chinhu, uchikava-kava uri muropa rako. “ ‘nhamo! une nhamo iwe, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. pamusoro pokumwe kuipa kwako kwose, wakazvivakira nzvimbo yakakwirira ukazviitira shongwe refu pazvivara zvose zvomusha. wakavaka shongwe dzako refu panotangira nzira dzose dzomumusha ndokuderedza runako rwako, uchipira muviri wako nokuwanza kupata kwako kuna ani zvake aipfuura napauri. wakaita ufeve navaijipita, vawakavakidzana navo ivo vazere noruchiva, ukamutsa kutsamwa kwangu, nokuwanda kwokupata kwako. saka ndakatambanudza ruoko rwangu kuti ndikurwise ndikatapudza nyika yako; ndikakuisa pasi pokukara kwavavengi vako, vanasikana vavafiristia, ivo vakavhundutswa namafambiro ako. wakaitazve ufeve navaasiria, nokuti wakanga usingagoni kuguta; kunyange shure kwaizvozvo hauna kumbogutsikana nazvo. ipapo wakawanza kupata kwako kuti kubatanidzire bhabhironi, nyika yavashambadziri, asi kunyange naizvozvi hauna kugutsikana. “ ‘unoshayiwa simba sei, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, paunoita zvinhu izvi zvose, zvinoitwa nechifeve chisinganyari. pawakavaka nzvimbo dzakakwirira pamavambo enzira dzose dzomumusha ndokuzviitira shongwe refu pazvivara zvose, wakanga usingaiti sechifeve, nokuti wakashora muripo. “ ‘iwe chifeve chomukadzi! unoshuva vatorwa kupinda murume wako! chifeve chimwe nechimwe chinogamuchira muripo, asi iwe unopa zvipo kuvadiwa vako vose, nokuvafufura kuti vauye kwauri vachibva kwose kwose nokuda kwokupata kwako kusina unhu. saka iwe wakasiyana navamwe pakufeva kwako; hakuna anokumhanyira nokuda kwokupata kwako. iwe wakasiyana chose, nokuti ndiwe unopa muripo uye iwe hauna chaunopiwa. “ ‘naizvozvo, iwe chifeve, chinzwa shoko rayeahoh! zvanzi naishe yeahoh: nokuda kwokuti wakadurura pfuma yako nokufukura kusasimira kwako mukupata kwako navadiwa vako, uye nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvako zvose zvinonyangadza, uye nokuda kwokuti wakavapa ropa ravana vako, naizvozvo ndichaunganidza vadiwa vako vose, vawaifara navo, vaya vawaida navaya vawaivenga. ndichavaunganidza kubva kwose kwose kuti vakurwise uye ndichakufukura pamberi pavo uye vachaona kusasimira kwako kwose. ndichakutonga nomutongo wavakadzi vanoita ufeve navanoteura ropa; ndichauyisa pamusoro pako ropa rokutsiva kwehasha dzangu negodo rokutsamwa kwangu. ipapo ndichakuisa mumaoko avadiwa vako, uye vachakoromora nzvimbo dzako dzakakwirira vagoparadza shongwe dzako refu. vachakubvisa nguo dzako vagotora ukomba hwako hwakanaka vagokusiya usina kupfeka wakashama. vachauya nemhomho yavanhu kuti izokurwisa, vachakutema namabwe nokukubvamburanya neminondo yavo. vachapisa dzimba dzako nokukuranga pamberi pavakadzi vazhinji. ndichagumisa ufeve hwako, uye hauchazoripirizve vadiwa vako. ipapo hasha dzangu pamusoro pako dzichaserera uye godo rokutsamwa kwangu richabva kwauri; ndichadzikama uye handingatsamwizve. “ ‘nokuti hauna kurangarira mazuva ouduku hwako asi wakanditsamwisa nezvinhu zvose izvi, zvirokwazvo ndichauyisa pamusoro pako zvawakaita, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. ko, hauna kuwedzera unzenza pane mamwe mabasa ako ose anonyangadza here? “ ‘munhu wose achataura tsumo achareva tsumo iyi pamusoro pako: “sezvakaita mai ndizvo zvakaita mwanasikana.” iwe uri mwanasikana chaiye wamai vako, vakashora murume wavo navana vavo; uye uri mununʼuna chaiye wamadzikoma ako, akashora varume vavo navana vavo. mai vako vakanga vari muhiti uye baba vako vari muamori. mukoma wako akanga ari samaria, akanga achigara kumusoro kwako navanasikana vake; uye mununʼuna wako, akanga achigara kurutivi rwezasi kwako navanasikana vake, akanga ari sodhomu. hauna kungofamba nenzira dzavo chete nokutevedzera zvinonyangadza zvavo, asi iwe munzira dzako dzose wakakurumidza kuva wakashata chose kupfuura ivo. zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, mununʼuna wako sodhomu navanasikana vake havana kumboita zvawakaita iwe nezvakaitwa navanasikana vako. “ ‘zvino ichi ndicho chaiva chivi chomununʼuna wako sodhomu: iye navanasikana vake, vaizvikudza vaidyisa uye vaiva vasina hanya; havana kubatsira varombo navanoshayiwa. vakanga vana manyawi uye vaiita zvinhu zvinonyangadza pamberi pangu. naizvozvo ndakavarasa sezvamunoona. samaria harina kuita hafu yezvivi zvawakaita iwe. iwe wakaita zvinhu zvinonyangadza kupfuura zvavakaita ivo, uye wakaita kuti vanunʼuna vako vange vakarurama nokuda kwezvinhu izvi zvawakaita iwe. takura kunyadziswa kwako iwe, nokuti wakavigira mununʼuna wako kururamisirwa. nokuti zvivi zvako zvakanga zvichinyadzisa chose kupinda zvavo, ivo vanoratidzika kunge vakarurama kupfuura iwe. saka zvino, chinyara uye zvitakurire nyadzi dzako, nokuti wakaita kuti mununʼuna wako ave akarurama. “ ‘kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, ndichadzosazve pfuma yesodhomu navanasikana varo neyesamaria navanasikana varo, uye pfuma yako pamwe chete navo, kuitira kuti ugotakura nyadzi dzako ugonyara pane zvose zvawakaita uchivanyaradza. uye vanunʼuna vako, ivo sodhomu navanasikana vake nesamaria navanasikana vake, uye iwe navanasikana vako muchadzokera pane zvavaiva kare. haungazomborevi nezvomununʼuna wako sodhomu pazuva rokuzvikudza kwako, kuipa kwako kusati kwafukurwa. kunyange zvino, uri kusekwa izvozvi navanasikana veedhomu navavakidzani varo vose, uye vanasikana vefiristia, navose vakakupoteredza vanokushora. uchazvitakurira zvibereko zvounzenza hwako namabasa ako anonyangadza, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: ndichakuitira zvakakufanira, nokuti wakazvidza mhiko dzangu nokuputsa sungano yangu. asi hazvo ndicharangarira sungano yandakaita newe pamazuva ouduku hwako, ndigosimbisa sungano isingaperi newe. ipapo ucharangarira nzira dzako ugonyora paunogamuchira vanunʼuna vako, vose vakuru kwauri uye navaduku kwauriwo. ndichavapa kwauri savanasikana, asi kwete nokuda kwesungano yangu newe. saka ndichasimbisa sungano yangu newe, uye uchaziva kuti ndini yeahoh. ipapo, kana ndayanana newe pane zvose zvawakaita, ucharangarira ugonyara uye ugozorega kushamisa muromo wako nokuda kwokuninipiswa kwako, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh.’ ”

17

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “mwanakomana womunhu, misa chinofananidzira utaurire imba yaisraeri mufananidzo. uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: gondo guru rina mapapiro ane simba, rina manhenga marefu uye rizere namambava ana mavara mavara rakasvika kurebhanoni. rakabata musoro womusidhari, rikagura davi rokumusoro-soro rikaenda naro kure kunyika yavashambadziri, rikandorisima muguta ravatengesi. “ ‘rakatora dzimwe mbeu dzenyika yenyu rikadzikavira muvhu rakaorera. rakadzisima somuti womukonachando parutivi rwemvura zhinji, ikatungira ikava muzambiringa mupfupi unotandira. matavi awo akadzoka akananga kwariri, asi midzi yawo yakaramba iri pasi pawo. saka wakabva wava muzambiringa ukabudisa matavi uye ukatungira mashizha pamatavi. “ ‘asi kwakanga kune rimwe gondo guru rakanga rina mapapiro ane simba guru uye rizere namambava. zvino muzambiringa wakatandavadza midzi yawo yakananga kwariri kubva pamunda pawakanga wasimwa ukatambanudza matavi awo kwariri kuti uwane mvura. wakanga wasimwa pavhu rakaorera pedyo nemvura zhinji kuti ubudise matavi, ubereke michero, ugova muzambiringa unoyevedza.’ “uti kwavari, ‘zvanzi naishe yeahoh: muti uyu uchakura here? hauchazodzurwi ukadimurirwa muchero wawo kuti uome here? mashizha awo matsva ose achangobukira achaoma. hakuzombotsvakwi ruoko rune simba kana vanhu vazhinji kuti udzurwe nemidzi yawo. kunyange dai ukasimwazve, uchararama here? haungazoomi chose here kana mhepo yokumabvazuva ikaurova, ukaoma mumunda mawakamera?’ ” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “uti kuimba iyi inondimukira, ‘hamuzivi here kuti zvinhu izvi zvinorevei?’ uti kwavari, ‘mambo webhabhironi akaenda kujerusarema akandotorako mambo waro namakurukota aro, akadzokera navo kubhabhironi. ipapo akatora mumwe weimba youmambo ndokuita chibvumirano naye, akamuisa pasi pemhiko. akatorawo varume vaitungamirira nyika iyo, kuitira kuti umambo huderere, husingazogoni kumukazve, huchingovapo chete nokuchengeta chibvumirano chake. asi mambo akamupandukira nokutuma nhume dzake kuijipiti kundotorako mabhiza nehondo huru. achabudirira here?
