efuremu anodya mhepo; anodzingana nemhepo yokumabvazuva zuva rose uye anowedzera nhema pamwe chete nechisimba. anoita sungano neasiria, uye anoendesa mafuta omuorivhi kuijipiti. yeahoh ane mhaka yaanopa yeahudha; acharanga yaqobho maererano nenzira dzake uye achamupa mubayiro maererano namabasa ake. muchizvaro akabata chitsitsinho chomukoma wake; somunhu akaita mutsimba naallah. akaita mutsimba nomutumwa akamukurira; akachema akakumbira kuti anzwirwe nyasha naye. akamuwana pabheteri akataura naye ipapo, yeahoh allah wamasimba ose, yeahoh ndiro zita rake raane mukurumbira naro! asi unofanira kudzokera kuna allah wako; chengetedza rudo nokururamisira, uye umirire allah wako nguva dzose. mutengesi anoshandisa chiero chinonyengera; anofarira kubiridzira. efuremu anozvikudza achiti, “ndakapfuma kwazvo; ndazova mupfumi chaiye. noupfumi hwangu hwose havangawani mandiri chakaipa chipi zvacho kana chivi mukati mangu.” “ndini yeahoh allah wako, akakubudisa kubva muijipiti; ndichakugarisazve mumatende, sapamazuva emitambo yakatarwa. ndakataura kuvaprofita, ndikavapa zviratidzo zvizhinji uye ndikataura mifananidzo kubudikidza navo.” ko, gireadhi yakaipa here? vanhu vayo havana maturo! vanobayira nzombe here pagirigari? aritari dzavo dzichava semirwi yamatombo mumunda wakarimwa. yaqobho akatizira kunyika yearamu; israeri akashandira kuti awane mukadzi, uye kuti amuwane akafudza makwai. yeahoh akashandisa muprofita kuti abudise israeri kubva muijipiti, nomuprofita akavachengeta. asi efuremu akamutsamwisa zvikuru kusvikira ashatirwa; ishe wake achaisa paari mhosva dzake dzokudeura ropa uye achamupa mubayiro wokuzvidza kwake.

13

efuremu akati ataura, vanhu vakadedera; iye akakudzwa muisraeri. asi akava nemhosva yokunamata bhaari uye akafa. zvino vanoramba vachingotadza; vanozviitira zvifananidzo zvakaumbwa nesirivha yavo, zviri zvifananidzo zvakaumbwa nenjere dzavo, zvose ari mabasa emhizha. pamusoro pavanhu ava zvinonzi, “vanobayira zvibayiro zvevanhu uye vanotsvoda zviumbwa zvemhuru.” naizvozvo vachava semhute yamangwanani, sedova rinokurumidza kupera, sehundi inopeperetswa kubva paburiro, soutsi hunobuda napawindo. “asi ndini yeahoh allah wako, akakubudisa kubva muijipiti. haungazovi nomumwe allah kunze kwangu; kana mumwe muponesi kunze kwangu. ndakakuchengeta murenje, munyika inopisa kwazvo. pandakavapa zvokudya, vakaguta; vakati vaguta, vakazvikudza ipapo vakandikanganwa. saka ndichauya kwavari seshumba, ndichavagarira panzira sembada, sebere ratorerwa vana varo, ndichavarwisa ndigovabvarura. seshumba ndichavaparadza; chikara chesango chichavabvambura. “waparadzwa iwe israeri, nokuti unondirwisa, uchirwisa mubatsiri wako. mambo wako aripiko, kuti zvimwe angakuponesa? vatongi vako varipiko mumaguta ako ose, avo vawakati, ‘ndipei mambo namachinda’? saka mukutsamwa kwangu ndakakupa mambo, uye muhasha dzangu ndakamubvisa. mhosva dzaefuremu dzakaunganidzwa pamwe chete, zvivi zvake zvakachengetedzwa muzvinyorwa. kurwadziwa sekwomukadzi anosununguka kunosvika kwaari, asi uyu mwana asina uchenjeri; kana nguva dzasvika, haauyi kumusuo wechizvaro. “ndichavadzikinura kubva pasimba reguva; ndichavadzikinura kubva parufu. dziripiko hosha dzako, nhai rufu? kuripiko kuparadza kwako, nhai guva? “handingazovi netsitsi, kunyange akabudirira pakati pamadzikoma ake. mhepo yokumabvazuva yayeahoh ichauya, ichivhuvhuta ichibva kurenje; chitubu chake chichapwa uye tsime rake richaoma. dura rake richapambwa zvose zvinokosha zviri mariri. vanhu vesamaria vanofanira kutakura mhaka yavo, nokuti vakamukira allah wavo. vachaparadzwa nomunondo; vacheche vavo vacharoverwa pasi. vakadzi vavo vane mimba vachatumburwa.”

14

iwe israeri, dzokera kuna yeahoh allah wako. zvivi zvako ndizvo zvakauyisa kuwa kwako! endai namashoko uye mudzokere kuna yeahoh. muti kwaari: “regererai zvivi zvedu zvose mutigamuchire nenyasha, kuti tigopa zvibereko zvemiromo yedu. asiria haingatiponesi; hatingatasvi mabhiza ehondo. hatizombotizve, ‘vamwari vedu’ kune zvakagadzirwa namaoko edu chaiwo, nokuti nherera dzinowana tsitsi mamuri.” “ndichaporesa kusateerera kwavo uye ndichangovada hangu, nokuti hasha dzangu dzabva kwavari. ndichava sedova kuna israeri; achatunga seruva remahapa. somusidhari werebhanoni achadzikisa midzi yake; mabukira ake achakura. kunaka kwake kuchafanana nekwomuti womuorivhi, kunhuhwira kwake sekwomusidhari werebhanoni. vanhu vachagarazve mumumvuri wake. achabudirira sezviyo. achatunga maruva somuzambiringa, uye mbiri yake ichafanana newaini yerebhanoni. nhai efuremu, ndichineiko chokuita nezvifananidzo? ndichamupindura uye ndichamuchengeta. ndakafanana nomuti womupaini wakasvibira; kubereka kwako kunobva kwandiri.” ndiani akachenjera? achacherechedza zvinhu izvi. ndiani anonzvera? achazvinzwisisa. nzira dzayeahoh dzakarurama; vakarurama vanofamba madziri, asi vatadzi vanogumburwa madziri.

joel

1

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna joere mwanakomana wapetueri. inzwai izvi, imi vakuru; teererai imi mose vagere munyika. ko, zvakadai zvakamboitika here pamazuva enyu, kana pamazuva amadzitateguru enyu? zvinhu izvi zviudzei vana venyu, uye vana venyu ngavaudzewo vana vavo, vana vavowo vaudze chizvarwa chinotevera. zvakasiyiwa nefararira remhashu zvakadyiwa nemhashu dzemagutaguta; zvakasiyiwa nemhashu dzemagutaguta zvakadyiwa negwatagwata; zvakasiyiwa negwatagwata zvakadyiwa nedzimwewo mhashu. mukai imi zvidhakwa, chemai! ungudzai imi vanwi vewaini; ungudzai nokuda kwewaini itsva, nokuti yabvutwa pamiromo yenyu. rudzi rwarwisa nyika yangu, rune simba uye haruverengeki; rune meno eshumba nameno makuru eshumbakadzi. rwakaparadza mizambiringa yangu yose, rukaparadza mionde yangu yose. rwakasvuura makwati ose emiti, rukaarasira kure, ndokusiya mapazi awo achena kuti mbe-e. chemai semhandara yakapfeka masaga inochema murume wouduku hwayo. zvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa hazvichawanikwi muimba yayeahoh. vaprista vari kuungudza, vaya vanoshumira pamberi payeahoh. minda yaparadzwa, pasi paoma; zviyo zvaparadzwa, waini itsva yapera, mafuta hakuchina. pererwai nezano, imi varimi, ungudzai, imi varimi vemizambiringa, chemerai gorosi nebhari, nokuti mukohwo weminda waparadzwa. muzambiringa waoma, uye muonde wasvava; mutamba, muchindwi nomuti womuapuro, miti yose yesango, yaoma. zvirokwazvo, mufaro wavanhu wasvava. pfekai masaga mucheme, imi vaprista; ungudzai, imi munoshanda paaritari. uyai muvate usiku hwose makapfeka masaga, imi munoshumira pamberi paallah wangu; nokuti zvipiriso zvezviyo nezvokunwa zvadziviswa muimba yaallah wenyu. tsaurai nguva yokutsanya kutsvene; danai vanhu kuungano tsvene. kokai vakuru navose vanogara munyika kuimba yayeahoh allah wedu, mugodana kuna yeahoh. rinotyisa sei zuva iro! nokuti zuva rayeahoh rava pedyo; richauya sokuparadza kunobva kuna wamasimba ose. ko, zvokudya hazvina kubviswa here pamberi pedu chaipo, mufaro nokufarisisa kubva mumba maallah wedu? mbeu dzinopetana dzisati dzamera pasi pevhu, matura aparara, tsapi dzaputswa nokuti hapachina zviyo. mombe dzinogomera sei! matanga emombe odzungaira nokuda kwokushayiwa mafuro. kunyange mapoka amakwai ari kutambudzika. haiwa yeahoh, ndinodana kwamuri, nokuti moto wapisa mafuro, uye mirazvo yemoto yapisa miti yose musango. kunyange mhuka dzesango dzinochema kwamuri; nokuti hova dzesango dzapwa uye moto waparadza mafuro ose.

2

ridzai hwamanda muzioni; ridzai hwamanda yokuyambira vanhu muri pagomo rangu dzvene. vanhu vose vagere munyika ngavadedere nokuti zuva rayeahoh riri kuuya. rava pedyo, zuva rerima nokusuwa, zuva ramakore nokusviba. samambakwedza anoonekwa pamusoro pamakomo, hondo huru ine simba guru iri kuuya; zvakadai hazvina kutombovapo munguva yakare, uye hazvichazoonekwizve munguva ichatevera. moto unoparadza pamberi padzo, marimi omoto ari kupisa shure kwadzo. pamberi padzo, nyika yakafanana nebindu reedheni, shure kwadzo kwangova gwenga risina basa, hapana chinopunyuka. pakuonekwa kwadzo dzakaita samabhiza; dzinomhanya samabhiza ehondo. nokutinhira sokwengoro dzinokwakuka pamusoro pamakomo dzichidya mashanga semoto unopisa uswa hwakaoma, sehondo ine simba yabuda kundorwa. pakungodziona chete, ndudzi dzose dzinotya; vose vanocheneruka kumeso. dzinorwisa samauto; dzinokwira madziro savarwi. dzinofamba dzakateverana dzisingatsauki padzakananga napo. hadzikwikwidzani pakufamba, imwe neimwe inofamba yakananga mberi. dzinopwanya nzvimbo dzakadzivirirwa sei, pasina chinodzikanganisa pakurongana kwadzo. dzinobhururuka dzakananga muguta; dzinomhanya pamusoro porusvingo. dzinokwira dzichipinda mudzimba; dzinopinda napamawindo sembavha. pamberi padzo, pasi panozunguzika, denga rinodedera, zuva nomwedzi zvinosviba uye nyeredzi dzinodzima. yeahoh anoomba, ari pamberi pehondo yake; mauto ake haaverengeki, uye vane simba ndivo vanoteerera kurayira kwake. zuva rayeahoh iguru; rinotyisa kwazvo. ndiani angamira musi waro? yeahoh anoti, “kunyange zvino, tendeukirai kwandiri nemwoyo yenyu yose muchitsanya, muchichema uye muchiungudza.” bvarurai mwoyo yenyu, kwete nguo dzenyu. dzokerai kuna yeahoh allah wenyu, iye ane nyasha uye ane tsitsi, anononoka kutsamwa uye ane rudo rukuru; anozvidzora pakutumira vanhu njodzi. ndiani anoziva? anogona kupinduka agonzwa tsitsi, uye agokusiyirai mukomborero wezvipiriso zvezviyo nezvipiriso zvokunwa zvinoitirwa yeahoh allah wenyu. ridzai hwamanda muzioni. sarudzai zuva rokutsanya kutsvene, danai vanhu kuungano tsvene. unganidzai vanhu, munatse ungano iyi, unganidzai pamwe chete vakuru, unganidzai vana, vachiri kuyamwa. vachangowanana, murume ngaabude muimba yake nomwenga muimba yake. vaprista vanoshumira pamberi payeahoh ngavacheme vari pakati pebiravira retemberi nearitari. ngavati, “musaparadza vanhu venyu, imi yeahoh. musaita kuti nhaka yenyu ive chinhu chinosekwa, chirevo pakati pendudzi. vachataurirei pakati pamarudzi vachiti, ‘allah wavo aripiko?’ ” ipapo yeahoh achava negodo pamusoro penyika yake, uye achanzwira vanhu vake tsitsi. yeahoh achavapindura achiti, “ndava kukutumirai zviyo, waini itsva namafuta, zvakawanda zvokuti muchaguta kwazvo, handichazokuitai zvakare chiseko chendudzi. “ndichadzingira kure nemi hondo yokumusoro, ndichaidzingira kunyika yakaoma isina chibereko, dziya dziri mberi dzichawira mugungwa rokumabvazuva, uye dziya dziri shure dzichawira mugungwa rokumadokero. uye kunhuhwa kwadzo kuchakwira; kunhuhwa kwadzo kukuru kuchakwira.” zvirokwazvo akaita zvinhu zvikuru. usatya iwe nyika; fara zvako upembere. zvirokwazvo yeahoh aita zvinhu zvikuru. musatya, imi mhuka dzesango, nokuti mafuro ava kusvibira. miti yava kubereka michero yayo; mionde nemizambiringa zvichabereka kwazvo. farai imi vanhu vezioni, farai muna yeahoh allah wenyu, nokuti akakupai mvura yokupedzisira mukururama. anokupai mvura yakawanda, yokupedzisira neyebumharutsva sakare. mapuriro enyu achazara nezviyo, uye zvisviniro zvenyu zvichazara newaini itsva namafuta. “ndichakuripirai makore ose amakadyirwa nemhashu: mhashu dzemagutaguta nedzegwatakwata, dzimwe mhashu nefararira remhashu; hondo yangu huru yandinotuma pakati penyu. muchava nezvokudya zvakawanda kusvikira maguta, ipapo mucharumbidza zita rayeahoh allah wenyu, uyo akakuitirai zvishamiso; vanhu vangu havachazonyadziswi zvakare. ipapo muchazoziva kuti ndirimo muisraeri, uye kuti ndini yeahoh allah wenyu, uyewo kuti hakuna mumwe; vanhu vangu havachazonyadziswi zvakare. “uye mushure maizvozvo, ndichadururira mweya wangu pamusoro pavanhu vose. vanakomana navanasikana venyu vachaprofita, vatana venyu vacharota hope, majaya enyu achaona zviratidzo. kunyange pamusoro pavaranda vangu, zvose varume navakadzi, ndichadururira mweya wangu mumazuva iwayo. ndicharatidza zvishamiso kudenga napanyika, ropa nomoto neshongwe dzoutsi. zuva richashanduka rigova rima, uye mwedzi uchava ropa, zuva guru rayeahoh rinotyisa risati rasvika. uye ani naani anodana kuzita rayeahoh achaponeswa; nokuti pagomo rezioni nomujerusarema muchava noruponeso, sezvakataurwa nayeahoh, pakati pavanopunyuka, avo vachadanwa nayeahoh.

3

“mumazuva iwayo, napanguva iyoyo, kana ndichinge ndadzosa pfuma yeyeahudha neyejerusarema, ndichaunganidza ndudzi dzose ndigoenda nadzo kumupata wajehoshafati. ipapo ndichavatonga nokuda kwenhaka yangu, vanhu vangu vaisraeri, nokuti vakaparadzira vanhu vangu pakati pendudzi, uye vakagovana nyika yangu. vakakanda mijenya pamusoro pavanhu vangu, vakatsinhanisa vakomana nezvifeve; vakatengesa vanasikana kuti vagotenga waini yokuti vanwe. “zvino ndakakutadzirai chiiko, imi tire nesidhoni, nemi matunhu ose efiristia? muri kundiripira chimwe chinhu chandakaita here? zvino kana muchindiripira, ini ndichadzosera zvamakaita pamisoro yenyu chaiyo nokukurumidza chaizvo. nokuti makatora sirivha negoridhe rangu, mukatakurawo midziyo yangu yakanakisisa mukandoiisa kutemberi dzenyu. makatengesa vanhu veyeahudha nevejerusarema kuvagiriki kuti muvaendese kure. “tarirai, ini ndichavamutsa kubva kunzvimbo dzamakavatengesera, uye ndichadzosera pamisoro yenyu chaiyo zvamakaita. ndichatengesa vanakomana navanasikana venyu kuvanhu veyeahudha, uye vachavatengesa kuvashebha, rudzi rwuri kure.” yeahoh ataura. paridzirai izvi kundudzi dzose: gadzirirai hondo! mutsai varwi! varwi vose ngavaswedere pedyo varwise. pfurai mapadza enyu muaite minondo, uye mapanga okuchekerera miti muaite mapfumo. asina simba ngaati, “ndine simba!” uyai nokukurumidza, imi ndudzi dzose, kubva kumativi ose mugoungana ipapo. haiwa yeahoh, burutsai varwi venyu. “ndudzi dzose ngadzimutswe; ngadziende kumupata wajehoshafati, nokuti ipapo ndipo pandichagara pasi kuti nditonge ndudzi dzose kumativi ose enyika. shandisai jeko, nokuti gohwo raibva. uyai musvine mazambiringa netsoka dzenyu, nokuti chisviniro chazara, uye zvirongo zvopfachukira, uku ndiko kukura kwakaita kuipa kwavo.” vazhinji zhinji, vazhinji zhinji, vari mumupata wokutonga. nokuti zuva rayeahoh rava pedyo mumupata wokutonga. zuva nomwedzi zvichasviba uye nyeredzi dzichadzima. yeahoh achaomba pazioni, uye achatinhira ari mujerusarema; denga nenyika zvichadedera. asi yeahoh achava utiziro hwavanhu vake, nhare yavanhu veisraeri. “ipapo muchaziva kuti ini yeahoh allah wenyu, ndinogara muzioni, gomo rangu dzvene. jerusarema richava dzvene; vatorwa havachazorirwisazve. “pazuva iroro makomo achachururuka waini itsva, uye zvikomo zvichaerera mukaka; hova dzose dzomuyeahudha dzichaerera mvura. chitubu chichaerera chichibva muimba yayeahoh, uye chichadiridzira mupata wemiti yemiunga. asi ijipiti ichava dongo, edhomu ichava gwenga risina basa, nokuda kwokurwiswa kwakaitwa vanhu veyeahudha, vakateura ropa risina mhosva munyika yavo. muyeahudha muchagara vanhu nokusingaperi, uye nomujerusarema kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. mhosva yavo yeropa yandisina kuregerera, ndichairegerera,

amos

1

mashoko aamosi mumwe wavafudzi vetekoa, zvaakaona pamusoro peisraeri makore maviri kudengenyeka kwenyika kusati kwaitika, uzia paakanga ari mambo weyeahudha uye jerobhoamu mwanakomana wajoashi ari mambo weisraeri. akati: “yeahoh anoomba ari pazioni uye anotinhira ari pajerusarema; mafuro avafudzi anooma, pamusoro pekarimeri panosvava.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvedhamasiko, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti vakapura gireadhi nemipuro ina meno amatare, ndichatumira moto paimba yahazaeri uchaparadza nhare dzabheni hadhadhi. ndichavhuna suo redhamasiko; ndichaparadza mambo agere mumupata weavheni uye nouyo akabata tsvimbo youshe mubheti edheni. vanhu vearamu vachaenda muutapwa kukiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvegaza, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti vakatapa rudzi rwose uye vakavatengesa kuedhomu, ndichatuma moto pamusoro pamasvingo egaza uchaparadza nhare dzake. ndichaparadza mambo weashidhodhi uye nouyo akabata tsvimbo youshe muashikeroni. ndichatambanudzira ruoko rwangu kuti ndirwise ekironi kusvikira vafiristia vose vapera kufa,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvetire, kunyange zvina handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti akatengesera edhomu rudzi rwose savatapwa, akasacherechedza sungano youkama, ndichatuma moto pamasvingo etire, uchaparadza nhare dzake.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvaedhomu, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti akadzinganisa mununʼuna wake nomunondo, akaramba kumunzwira tsitsi, nokuti kutsamwa kwake kwakaramba kwakangodaro, uye hasha dzake dzakapfuta, hadzina akadzimisa, ndichatuma moto pamusoro petemani uchaparadza nhare dzebhozira.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvaamoni, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti akatumbura vakadzi vane mimba vegireadhi, kuti awedzere miganhu yake, ndichatungidza moto pamasvingo erabha uchaparadza nhare dzaro, pakati pemheremhere yehondo pazuva rokurwa, pakati pemhepo huru nezuva redutu. mambo wake achaenda kuutapwa, iye namakurukota ake pamwe chete,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

2

zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvamoabhu, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti akapisa, kuita madota, mapfupa amambo weedhomu. ndichatuma moto pamusoro pamoabhu uchaparadza nhare dzekerioti. moabhu achawira pasi mubope guru pakati pemheremhere yehondo, nokurira kwehwamanda. ndichaparadza mutongi wake uye ndichauraya makurukota ake pamwe chete naye,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvayeahudha, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. nokuti vakaramba murayiro wayeahoh uye havana kuchengeta mitemo yake, nokuti vakatsauswa mukurasika navamwari venhema, vamwari vakateverwa namadzitateguru avo, ndichatuma moto pamusoro peyeahudha, uchaparadza nhare dzejerusarema.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “nemhaka yezvivi zvitatu zvaisraeri, kunyange zvina, handingadzori hasha dzangu. vanotengesa vakarurama kuti vawane sirivha, navanoshayiwa kuti vawane shangu. vanotsika-tsika pamisoro yavarombo savanotsika paguruva, uye vanoshayisa vakadzvinyirirwa kururamisirwa. baba nomwanakomana vanorara nomusikana mumwe chete, nokudaro vanosvibisa zita rangu dzvene. vanovata pasi parutivi pearitari imwe neimwe panguo dzakatorwa norubatso. mumba yamwari wavo vanonwa waini yakatorwa somuripo. “ndakaparadza amori pamberi pavo, kunyange akanga akareba somusidhari uye akasimba somuouki. ndakaparadza zvibereko zvake kumusoro nemidzi yake pasi. “ndakakubudisa kubva muijipiti, ndikakutungamirira kwamakore makumi mana murenje, kuti ndikupe nyika yavaamori. ndakamutsawo vaprofita kubva pakati pavanakomana venyu, navanaziri kubva pakati pamajaya enyu. ichi hachisi chokwadi here, nhai vanhu veisraeri?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “asi makaita kuti vanaziri vanwe waini uye mukarayira vaprofita kuti varege kuprofita. “zvino ipapo ndichakupwanyai sokupwanya kunoita ngoro izere nezviyo. vanomhanya kwazvo havangapunyuki, vakasimba havangazovi nesimba ravo, uye murwi haangazoponesi upenyu hwake. anopfura nemiseve haangazoramba amire, murwi anogona kumhanya haangapunyuki, uye mutasvi webhiza haangazoponesi upenyu hwake. kunyange mhare dzakashinga dzichatiza dzisina nguo pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

3

inzwai shoko iri rakataurwa nayeahoh pamusoro penyu, imi vanhu veisraeri, pamusoro pemhuri yose yandakabudisa kubva muijipiti: “ndimi moga vandakasarudza pamhuri dzose dzapanyika; naizvozvo ndichakurangai nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu zvose.” ko, vaviri vangafamba pamwe chete vasina kunge vatenderana here? ko, shumba ingaomba mudondo isina chayaruma here? ko, ingarira mubako rayo isina chayabata here? ko, shiri ingawira pasi mumusungo pasina kuteyiwa rugombe here? ko, musungo ungaurukira kumusoro pasina chawabata here? hwamanda ingarira muguta, vanhu vakasatya here? njodzi painowira guta, ko, haazi yeahoh anenge azviita here? zvirokwazvo, ishe yeahoh haaiti chinhu asina kuzivisa varanda vake, vaprofita, zvakavanzika zvake. shumba yaomba, ndiani angarega kutya? ishe yeahoh ataura, ndiani angarega kuprofita? paridzirai nhare dzeashidhodhi nenhare dzeijipiti muchiti: “unganai pamakomo esamaria; onai kusagadzikana kukuru kuri mukati maro, noudzvinyiriri huri pakati pavanhu varo.” “havazivi kuita zvakarurama,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ivo vanounganidza zvakapambwa nezvakabiwa munhare dzaro.” naizvozvo zvanzi naishe yeahoh, “muvengi achatora nyika; achawisira pasi nzvimbo dzako uye achapamba nhare dzako.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “mufudzi sezvaanobvuta pamuromo weshumba mapfupa maviri amakumbo chete kana chipandi chenzeve, vaisraeri vachaponeswa saizvozvowo, avo vanogara musamaria pamicheto yemibhedha yavo, nomudhamasiko pazvigaro zvavo.” “inzwai izvi, mugopupura pamusoro peimba yayaqobho,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, allah wamasimba ose. “pazuva randicharanga israeri nokuda kwezvivi zvayo, ndichaparadza aritari dzebheteri; nyanga dzearitari dzichaparadzwa uye dzichawira pasi. ndichaparadza imba yenguva yechando, pamwe chete neimba yenguva yechirimo; dzimba dzakashongedzwa nenyanga dzenzou dzichaparadzwa uye dzimba huru dzichaparadzwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

4

inzwai shoko iri, imi mhou dzebhashani pagomo resamaria, imi vakadzi vanodzvinyirira varombo uye vanopwanya vanoshayiwa muchiti kuvarume venyu, “tiunzirei zvokunwa.” ishe yeahoh apika noutsvene hwake achiti, “zvirokwazvo nguva ichasvika yamuchatorwa nezvikokovono, vokupedzisira pakati penyu nezviredzo. muchabuda pakarepo mumwe nomumwe, napakakoromoka masvingo, uye mucharasirwa kunze makananga kuhamoni,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “endai kubheteri mundotadza; endai kugirigari mundowedzera kutadza kwenyu. uyai nezvibayiro zvenyu mangwanani namangwanani, zvegumi zvenyu mushure mamakore matatu. pisai chingwa chine mbiriso sechibayiro chokuvonga muzvirumbidze pamusoro pezvipiriso zvenyu zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira, zvirumbidzei nazvo, imi vaisraeri, nokuti izvi ndizvo zvamunofarira kuita,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh. “ndakakupai matumbu asina chinhu mumaguta makuru ose uye ndikakushayisai chingwa mumaguta maduku ose, kunyange zvakadaro hamuna kudzokera kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndakamisawo mvura kuti isanaya kwasara mwedzi mitatu kuti mukohwe. ndakatumira mvura kuguta rimwe chete ndikasanayisa kune rimwe. mumwe munda wakawana mvura mumwe wakashayiwa uye ukaoma. vanhu vakadzedzereka vachibva kune rimwe guta vachienda kune rimwe kundotsvaka mvura, asi havana kuwana yaivaringana kuti vanwe, kunyange zvakadaro hamuna kudzokera kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kakawanda kwazvo ndakarova mapindu neminda yenyu yemizambiringa, ndakairova nechirwere nokuvhuvha. mhashu dzakaparadza mionde nemiti yenyu yemiorivhi, kunyange zvakadaro hamuna kudzokera kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndakatumira hosha pakati penyu sezvandakaita kuijipiti. ndakauraya majaya enyu nomunondo, pamwe chete namabhiza enyu akapambwa. ndakazadza mhino dzenyu nokunhuhwa kwemisasa yenyu, asi hamuna kudzokera kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndakaparadza vamwe venyu sokuparadza kwandakaita sodhomu negomora. makanga makaita sorukuni runotsva, rwabviswa mumoto, asi hamuna kudzokera kwandiri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “naizvozvo izvi ndizvo zvandichaita kwauri, israeri, uye nokuti ndichaita izvi kwauri, gadzirira kusangana naallah wako, iwe israeri.” iye anoita makomo, ndiye anosika mhepo, ndiyezve anozivisa pfungwa dzake kumunhu, iye anoshandura mangwanani akava rima, anotsika panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika, yeahoh allah wamasimba ose ndiro zita rake.

5

inzwai shoko iri, imi imba yaisraeri, kuchema uku kwandinoita pamusoro penyu: “yawira pasi mhandara israeri, haingazosimukizve, akasiyiwa ari oga munyika yake, pasina angamusimudza.” zvanzi naishe yeahoh: “guta richaendesa varwi chiuru vakasimba pakati peisraeri richasarirwa nezana chete; guta richaendesa varwi zana vakasimba richasarirwa negumi chete.” zvanzi nayeahoh kuimba yaisraeri: “nditsvakei murarame; musatsvaka bheteri, musaenda kugirigari, musaita rwendo rwokuenda kubheerishebha. nokuti zvirokwazvo girigari ichaendeswa kuutapwa, uye bheteri richava sapasina chinhu.” tsvakai yeahoh mugorarama, mukasadaro achatsvaira imba yayosefa sezvinoita moto; uchaparadza, uye bheteri richashaya anoudzima. imi vanoshandura kururamisira muchikuita gavakava uye muchikandira kururama pasi (iye akaita nyeredzi dzechimutanhatu neorioni, anoshandura rima richiva mambakwedza, uye anoita kuti zuva risvibe huve usiku, anodana mvura zhinji yegungwa achiidururira panyika, yeahoh ndiro zita rake, anoparadza nhare pakarepo uye anoita kuti guta rina masvingo rive dongo), munovenga anorayira padare uye munozvidza anotaura chokwadi. munotsika pamusoro pomurombo muchimumanikidza kuti akupei zviyo. naizvozvo, kunyange makavaka dzimba huru dzamabwe, hamungagari madziri; kunyange makasima minda yakasvibira yemizambiringa, hamunganwi waini yayo. nokuti ndinoziva kuwanda kwemhosva dzenyu nokukura kwakaita zvivi zvenyu. munodzvinyirira vakarurama uye munotora fufuro, uye munoshayisa varombo kururamisirwa pamatare. naizvozvo munhu akangwara anonyarara panguva dzakadai, nokuti inguva dzakaipa. tsvakai zvakanaka, kwete zvakaipa, kuti murarame. ipapo yeahoh allah wamasimba ose achava nemi, sezvamunoti ndizvo zvaari. vengai zvakaipa, mude zvakanaka; chengetedzai kururamisira mumatare. zvichida yeahoh allah wamasimba ose achanzwira tsitsi vakasara vayosefa. naizvozvo zvanzi naishe, yeahoh allah wamasimba ose, “muchava nokuchema mumigwagwa yose nemhere yokurwadziwa pazvivara zvose. varimi vachadanwa kuti vazochema uye vanochema vazoungudza. kuchava nokuungudza muminda yose yemizambiringa, nokuti ndichapfuura napakati penyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. mune nhamo imi munoshuva zuva rayeahoh! sei muchishuva zuva rayeahoh? zuva iro richava rima kwete chiedza. zvichaita somunhu akatiza shumba achibva asangana nebere, sokunge akapinda mumba make ndokubata madziro noruoko rwake achibva arumwa nenyoka. ko, zuva rayeahoh haringavi rima here, kwete chiedza, rima guru, risina kana bwerazuva? “ndinovenga, ndinozvidza mitambo yenyu yechinamato; handifadzwi neungano dzenyu. kunyange mukandivigira zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezviyo, handingazvigamuchiri. kunyange mukandivigira zvipiriso zvakaisvonaka zvokuwadzana, handingavi nehanya nazvo. ibvai pamberi pangu noruzha rwenziyo dzenyu! handidi kunzwa kurira kwembira dzenyu. asi kururamisira ngakuyerere sorwizi, kururama sorukova rusingapwi! “makandivigira zvibayiro nezvipiriso makore makumi mana muri murenje here, nhai imba yaisraeri? makasimudzira temberi yamambo wenyu, chitsiko chezvifananidzo zvenyu, nyeredzi yamwari wenyu, wamakazvigadzirira. naizvozvo ndichakutamisai muende mberi kwedhamasiko,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh ane zita rinonzi allah wamasimba ose.

6

mune nhamo imi makavarairwa muzioni, nemi munofunga kuti mugere pakasimba pagomo resamaria, imi varume vanozivikanwa vorudzi rukuru, kunoenda vanhu veisraeri! endai kukarine mundoritarisa; muchibvapo moenda kuhamati guta guru, uye mozodzika kugati mufiristia. vari nani kupfuura umambo hwenyu huviri here? munoti zuva rakaipa ngarirege kusvika muchiswededza pedyo utongi hwokuvhundutsira. munovata pamibhedha yenyanga dzenzou, muchizorora pazvigaro zvenyu. munodya makwayana akaisvonaka nemhuru dzakakodzwa. munoridza zvenyu mbira dzenyu sadhavhidhi, uye munozvigadzirira zviridzwa. munonwa waini yakawanda, muchizora mafuta akaisvonaka, asi hamuchemi nokuda kwamatongo ayosefa. naizvozvo muchava pakati pevachatanga kuenda kuutapwa; mabiko enyu nokuzorora kwenyu zvichapera. ishe yeahoh akapika naiye pachake, yeahoh allah wamasimba ose anoti, “ndinosema kuzvikudza kwayaqobho, uye ndinovenga nhare dzake; ndichaisa guta kuvavengi nezvose zviri mariri.” kana varume gumi vakasiyiwa muimba imwe chete naivowo vachafa. uye kana hama inofanira kupisa mitumbi ikauya kuzovabudisa mumba, uye ikabvunza munhu achakahwanda imomo ichiti, “pane mumwe waunaye here?” uye akati, “kwete,” ipapo iye achati, “nyarara! hatifaniri kuti titaure zita rayeahoh.” nokuti yeahoh akarayira, uye achaparadza imba huru igoita murwi, nemba duku igoti mwarara. ko, mabhiza angamhanya paruware here? ko, pane angaparima ipapo nemombe here? asi makashandura kururamisira mukakuita muchetura, nechibereko chokururama mukachiita gavakava, imi munopembera pakukundwa kwero dhibhari uye munoti, “hatina kuzvitorera karinaini nesimba redu here?” nokuti yeahoh allah wamasimba ose anoti, “ndichakumutsirai rumwe rudzi kuti rukumukirei, imi imba yaisraeri, ruchakutambudzai panzira yenyu yose, kubva kurebho hamati kusvikira kumupata wearabha.”

7

izvi ndizvo zvandakaratidzwa naishe yeahoh: akanga achigadzirira chimokoto chemhashu mushure mokukohwewa kwomugove wamambo uye mumera wechipiri uchangobuda. dzakati dzapedza zvose zvaiva munyika, ndakadanidzira ndichiti, “ishe yeahoh chikanganwirai henyu! ko, yaqobho angararame sei? muduku kwazvo!” nokudaro yeahoh akadzora mwoyo. yeahoh akati, “izvi hazvichazoitika.” izvi ndizvo zvandakaratidzwa naishe yeahoh: ishe yeahoh akanga achidanidzira kuti pave nokutonga nomoto; wakaomesa gungwa rakadzika uye ukaparadza nyika. ipapo ndakadanidzira ndichiti, “ishe yeahoh, ndinokukumbirai, imbomirai henyu. ko, yaqobho angararame sei? muduku kwazvo!” nokudaro yeahoh akadzora mwoyo. ishe yeahoh akati, “izviwo hazvichaitiki.” izvi ndizvo zvaakandiratidza: yeahoh akanga akamira pamadziro akanga akavakwa zvakaenzaniswa nerwodzi, ane rwodzi rwokuyeresa muruoko rwake. uye yeahoh akandibvunza akati, “unooneiko, amosi?” ndakapindura ndikati, “rwodzi rwokuyeresa.” ipapo yeahoh akati, “tarira, ndichaisa rwodzi rwokuyeresa pakati pavanhu vangu vaisraeri, handichavaponesazve. “nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzaisaka dzichaparadzwa, uye nzvimbo tsvene dzaisraeri dzichaitwa matongo; ndichamukira imba yajerobhoamu nomunondo wangu.” ipapo amazia muprista webheteri akatumira shoko kuna jerobhoamu mambo weisraeri achiti, “amosi akaita rangano yokukumukirai pakati chaipo pemwoyo weisraeri. nyika haigoni kugamuchira mashoko ake ose. nokuti izvi ndizvo zviri kutaurwa naamosi: “ ‘jerobhoamu achafa nomunondo, uye israeri ichaenda kuutapwa, zvirokwazvo kure nenyika yavo yechizvarwa.’ ” ipapo amazia akati kuna amosi, “ibva muno, iwe muoni! dzokera kunyika yeyeahudha. uzviwanire zvokudya zvako ikoko, uchiprofita ikoko. usaprofitazve pabheteri, nokuti iyi ndiyo nzvimbo tsvene yamambo uye netemberi youmambo.” amosi akapindura amazia achiti, “ndakanga ndisiri muprofita, kana mwanakomana womuprofita, asi ndaiva mufudzi nomutariri wemionde yemisikamo. asi yeahoh akanditora kubva paufudzi hwamakwai akati kwandiri, ‘enda uprofite kuvanhu vangu israeri.’ zvino, chinzwa shoko rayeahoh. iwe unoti, “usaprofita pamusoro paisraeri, uye rega kuparidza pamusoro peimba yaisaka.” “naizvozvo zvanzi nayeahoh: “ ‘mukadzi wako achava chifeve muguta, uye vanakomana nevanasikana vako vachaparadzwa nomunondo. nyika yako ichayerwa igoganhurwa, uyezve iwe pachako uchafira munyika yevedzimwe ndudzi, uye zvirokwazvo israeri ichaenda kuutapwa, kure nenyika yavo yechizvarwa.’ ”

8

izvi ndizvo zvandakaratidzwa naishe yeahoh: tswanda ine michero yakaibva. akabvunza akati, “unooneiko, amosi?” ndakapindura ndichiti, “tswanda ine michero yakaibva.” ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “nguva yakwana kuvanhu vangu israeri; handingavararamisizve. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, “nziyo dzomutemberi dzichashanduka dzigova kuchema. mitumbi yevakafa ichava mizhinji. munzvimbo dzose icharaswa vanhu vanyerere.” inzwai izvi imi munotsika-tsika vanoshayiwa uye muchiparadza varombo venyika, muchiti, “kugara kwomwedzi kuchapfuura riniko kuti tigotengesa zviyo, uye kupera kwesabata kuti tigotengesa gorosi?” muchitapudza chiero, muchikwidza mitengo uye muchibiridzira nezvikero zvinonyengera, muchitenga varombo nesirivha uye vanoshayiwa neshangu, muchitengesa kunyange makoto pamwe chete negorosi. yeahoh apika nokuzvikudza kwayaqobho achiti, “handizokanganwi chinhu chipi nechipi zvacho chavakaita. “ko, nyika haingadederi nokuda kwaizvozvi here uye vose vanogara mairi havangachemi? nyika yose ichadira senairi, ichabvongodzwa uye igoderera sorwizi rweijipiti. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, “ndichaita kuti zuva rivire masikati makuru uye ndichauyisa rima panyika masikati machena. ndichashandura mitambo yenyu yechinamato ive kuchema, nokuimba kwose kuti kuve mhere. ndichaita kuti mose mupfeke masaga uye mugoveura misoro yenyu. ndichaita kuti nguva iyi ive samariro omwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, uye magumo acho ave sezuva rakaipa kwazvo. “mazuva ari kuuya,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe yeahoh, “andichatumira nzara panyika yose, kwete nzara yezvokudya kana nyota yemvura, asi nzara yokunzwa mashoko ayeahoh. vanhu vachadzedzereka vachibva kugungwa vachienda kune rimwe gungwa, uye vachadzungaira vachibva kumusoro vachienda kumabvazuva, vachitsvaka shoko rayeahoh, asi havangariwani. “pazuva iro, “mhandara dzakaisvonaka namajaya akasimba vachaziya nenyota. avo vanopika nokunyadzisa kwesamaria, kana vanoti, ‘namwari wako mupenyu, iwe dhani,’ kana kuti, ‘namwari wabheerishebha mupenyu,’ vachawa, vasingazomukazve.”

9

ndakaona yeahoh amire parutivi rwearitari, uye akati, “rova misoro yembiru kuti zvikumbaridzo zvizunguzike. zviputsire pasi pamisoro yevanhu vose; avo vachasara ndichavauraya nomunondo. hapana kana mumwe chete achatiza, hapana achapunyuka. kunyange vakachera kusvikira panoperera guva, kubva imomo ruoko rwangu ruchavatora. kunyange vakakwira kumatenga, kubva ikoko ndichavadzikisa pasi. kunyange vakazvivanza pamusoro pekarimeri, ipapo ndichavavhima ndigovabata. kunyange vakahwanda kubva kwandiri pasi pegungwa, ipapo ndicharayira nyoka kuti ivarume. kunyange vakaendeswa kuutapwa navavengi vavo, ikoko ndicharayira munondo kuti uvaparadze. ndichananʼanidza meso angu pavari kuti ndivaitire zvakaipa, kwete zvakanaka.” ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose, iye anobata nyika igonyungudika, navose vagere mairi vagochema, nyika yose inozara senairi, uye igoderera serwizi rweijipiti, iye anovaka muzinda wake kumatenga agomisa hwaro hwawo panyika, anodana mvura dzegungwa agodzidururira pamusoro penyika, yeahoh ndiro zita rake. “nhai imi vaisraeri, ko, hamusi kwandiri vamwe chete savaetiopia here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “handina kubudisa israeri kubva kuijipiti here, vafiristia kubva kukafitori navaaramu kubva kukiri? “zvirokwazvo meso aishe yeahoh ari paumambo hunotadza. ndichahuparadza kubva pamusoro penyika, asi handingaparadzi zvachose imba yayaqobho,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “nokuti ndicharayira, uye ndichazunguza imba yaisraeri pakati pendudzi dzose, sokuzunguzwa kunoitwa zviyo murusero, uye hapana kana tsanga imwe chete ichawira pasi. vatadzi vose pakati pavanhu vangu vachafa nomunondo, vose vanoti, ‘njodzi haingatiwiri kana kusangana nesu.’ “pazuva iro ndichamisazve tende radhavhidhi rakawa. ndichavakazve nzvimbo dzaro dzakaputsika, ndigovakazve matongo aro, uye ndicharivaka sezvarakanga rakaita, kuti vazvitorere zvakasara zvaedhomu nendudzi dzose dzine zita rangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, iye achaita zvinhu izvi. “mazuva ari kuuya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “mucheki paachapfuurwa nomurimi, uye mudyari paachapfuurwa neanosvina mazambiringa. waini itsva ichadonha kubva kumakomo, uye ichayerera kubva pazvikomo zvose. ndichadzosazve vanhu vangu vakatapwa, ivo vaisraeri; vachavakazve maguta akaitwa matongo uye vachagara maari. vachasima minda yemizambiringa vagonwa waini yayo. vacharima mapindu uye vachadya zvibereko zvawo. ndichasima israeri munyika yavo voga, havangazodzurwizve kubva panyika yandakavapa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh allah wako.

obadiah

1

zvakaratidzwa obhadhia. zvanzi naishe yeahoh pamusoro peedhomu: takanzwa shoko rakabva kuna yeahoh richiti: nhume yakatumwa kundudzi kuti indotaura ichiti, “simukai, tiende tindorwa hondo naye.” “tarirai, ndichakudukupisai pakati pendudzi; muchamhurwa zvachose. kuzvikudza kwemwoyo yenyu kwakakunyengerai, iyemi mugere mumikaha yamatombo muchiita kwakakwirira misha yenyu, imi munoti mumwoyo yenyu, ‘ndianiko angandiburutsira pasi?’ kunyange mukabhururuka segondo mukaruka dendere renyu pakati penyeredzi, kubva ipapo ndichakukandai pasi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “kana mbavha dzikauya kwamuri, kana makororo usiku, haiwa, muchaparadzwa zvakadiniko? havazoba kusvikira pavanoda here? dai vatanhi vamazambiringa vaiuya kwamuri, ko, havaizosiya mazambiringa mashoma here? asi esau achasiyiwa seiko asina chinhu, pfuma yake yakavigwa ichatorwa! vose vaiva nesungano newe vachakumanikidza kusvikira kumuganhu; shamwari dzako dzichakunyengera dzigokukunda; vanodya zvokudya zvako vachakuisira musungo, asi haungazvizivi. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “handingazoparadzi vachenjeri veedhomu, varume vazere nokunzwisisa pakati pamakomo eedhomu here? mhare dzako, iwe temani, dzichavhunduka, uye vose vari mumakomo aesau vachaparara pakuurayiwa ikoko. nokuda kwokuti wakarwisa mununʼuna wako yaqobho, uchafukidzwa nenyadzi; uchaparadzwa nokusingaperi. zuva iro rawakamira kure, vatorwa pavakatakura pfuma yake vakaenda nayo, uye vabvakure vakapinda mumasuo ake, vakakanda mijenya pamusoro pejerusarema, iwe wakaita somumwe wavo. haufaniri kutarisira mununʼuna wako pasi, pazuva rokushayiwa kwake, kana kufara pamusoro pavanhu veyeahudha, pazuva rokuparadzwa kwavo, kana kuzvikudza zvakanyanya pazuva rokutambudzika kwavo. hamufaniri kufamba napamasuo avanhu vangu, pazuva renjodzi yavo, kana kuvatarisira pasi vava munjodzi, pazuva renjodzi yavo, kana kuvatorera pfuma yavo pazuva renhamo yavo. hamufaniri kumira pamharadzano dzenzira, kuti muuraye vanotiza vavo, kana kuisa vakasara vavo kuvavengi vavo, pazuva rokutambudzika kwavo. “zuva rayeahoh rava pedyo kundudzi dzose. sezvamakaita, ndizvo zvichaitwawo kwamuri; mabasa enyu achadzokera pamisoro yenyu chaiyo. sezvamakanwa pagomo rangu dzvene, saizvozvowo ndudzi dzose dzicharamba dzichingonwa; dzichanwa nokunwa dzikaita sedzisina kumbovapo. asi pagomo rezioni pachava nokununurwa; richava dzvene, uye imba yayaqobho ichadzoserwa nhaka yayo. imba yayaqobho ichava moto, uye imba yayosefa murazvo womoto; imba yaesau ichava mashanga, uye vachaipisa nomoto vagoipedza. hakuzovi navanopona muimba yaesau.” yeahoh ataura izvozvo. vanhu vanobva kunegevhi vachagara mumakomo aesau, uye vanhu vanobva mujinga mezvikomo vachatora nyika yavafiristia kuti ive yavo. vachatora minda yaefuremu pamwe chete nesamaria, kuti zvive zvavo, uye bhenjamini achatora gireadhi kuti ive yake. ungano iyi yavaisraeri vakadzingwa vagere mukenani ichatora nyika kusvikira kuzarefati; vakadzingwa kubva mujerusarema vagere musefaradhi vachatora maguta enegevhi. vaponesi vachakwira pamusoro pegomo rezioni, kuti vandotonga makomo aesau. uye ushe huchava hwayeahoh.

jonah

1

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jona mwanakomana waamitai, richiti, “enda kuguta guru reninevhe undoriparidzira, nokuti kuipa kwaro kwasvika pamberi pangu.” asi jona akatiza kubva pamberi payeahoh akananga kutashishi. akaburuka akaenda kujopa, kwaakawana chikepe chaienda ikoko. mushure mokubvisa mari yokufambisa, akakwidza ndokuenda kutashishi kuti atize kubva kuna yeahoh. ipapo yeahoh akatuma mhepo huru pagungwa, uye dutu raipenga kwazvo rikamuka zvokuti chikepe chakada kutsemuka-tsemuka. vafambisi vose vechikepe vakatya uye mumwe nomumwe akachema kuna mwari wake. vakakanda nhumbi mugungwa kuti chikepe chireruke. asi jona akanga aenda pasi mukati mechikepe maakasvikovata uye akakotsira hope huru. mukuru wavachairi akaenda kwaari akati, “ungarare sei iwe? muka udane kuna mwari wako! zvimwe angatirangarira tikasaparara.” ipapo vafambisi vechikepe vakati kuno mumwe nomumwe, “uyai, tikande mijenya kuti tione kuti ndiani aita kuti tiwirwe nenjodzi iyi.” vakakanda mijenya, mijenya ikawira pana jona. saka vakamubvunza vakati, “tiudze, ndiani aita kuti matambudziko ose aya atiwire? unoita basa reiko? unobvepiko? nyika yako inonzi ani? uri worudzi rupi?” akapindura akati, “ndiri muhebheru, uye ndinonamata yeahoh, allah wokudenga, akaita gungwa nenyika.” izvi zvakavatyisa uye vakabvunza vakati, “watadzeiko?” (vaiziva kuti aitiza kubva pamberi payeahoh, nokuti akanga atovaudza kudaro.) gungwa rakanga rotonyanya kupenga. saka vakamubvunza vakati, “ko, tinofanira kuitei kwauri kuti gungwa ritidzikamire?” akapindura achiti, “ndisimudzei mundikande mugungwa, ipapo richanyarara. ndinoziva kuti mhosva yangu ndiyo yaita kuti dutu guru iri rikuwirei.” pachinzvimbo chaizvozvo varume vakaedza napavaigona napo kuti vadzokere kunyika. asi vakakoniwa, nokuti gungwa rakatonyanyisa kupenga kupfuura zvapakutanga. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh vakati, “haiwa yeahoh, tapota musatiuraya nemhaka youpenyu hwomunhu uyu. musatipa mhosva yokuuraya munhu asina mhaka, nokuti, iyemi yeahoh maita sokuda kwenyu.” ipapo vakatora jona vakamukanda mugungwa, uye gungwa rikanyarara pakupenga kwaro. nokuda kwaizvozvi vakatya yeahoh kwazvo, uye vakabayira yeahoh chibayiro vakaita mhiko kwaari. asi yeahoh akatuma hove huru kuti izomedza jona, uye jona akava mudumbu mehove kwamazuva matatu nousiku hutatu.

2

kubva mudumbu rehove jona akanyengetera kuna yeahoh allah wake. akati: “mudambudziko rangu ndakadana kuna yeahoh, iye akandipindura. kubva mukati meguva ndakadanidzira kuti ndibatsirwe, uye imi makanzwa kuchema kwangu. makandikandira makadzika, mumwoyo chaimo megungwa, uye mvura zhinji ikandikomberedza; mafungu enyu ose namapopoma enyu ose zvakapfuura napamusoro pangu. ndakati, ‘ndaraswa kubva pamberi penyu, asi ndichatarirazve ndakaringa kutemberi yenyu tsvene.’ mvura zhinji dzandikomberedza dzikandityisa; pakadzikadzika pakandikomberedza; sora regungwa rakamonera musoro wangu. kumidzi yamakomo ndakanyura; nyika yapasi yakandipfigiramo nokusingaperi. asi makaburitsa upenyu hwangu kubva mugomba, imi yeahoh allah wangu. “upenyu hwangu pahwakanga hwotiza, ndakakurangarirai, imi yeahoh, uye munyengetero wangu wakauya kwamuri, kutemberi yenyu tsvene. “vaya vanobatirira kuzvifananidzo zvisina maturo, vanorasa nyasha dzingadai dziri dzavo. asi ini, norwiyo rwokuvonga, ndichabayira kwamuri. zvandakapika ndichazvizadzisa. ruponeso runobva kuna yeahoh.” uye yeahoh akarayira hove, ikandorutsira jona panyika yakaoma.

3

ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna jona kechipiri richiti, “enda kuguta reninevhe undoriparidzira shoko randinokupa.” jona akateerera shoko rayeahoh akaenda kuninevhe. zvino ninevhe raiva guta guru kwazvo, rwendo rwamazuva matatu. pazuva rokutanga jona akapinda muguta. akaparidza achiti, “kwasara mazuva makumi mana, mushure maizvozvo ninevhe richaparadzwa.” vanhu veninevhe vakatenda kuna allah. vakatara nguva yokutsanya, uye vose zvavo, kubva kumukuru mukuru kusvikira kumuduku duku vakapfeka masaga. nhau idzi padzakasvika kuna mambo weninevhe, akasimuka kubva pachigaro chake, akabvisa nguo dzake dzoumambo, akazvifukidza namasaga akagara mumadota. ipapo akazivisa chirevo muninevhe, achiti: “chirevo chamambo namachinda ake: “musarega munhu kana mhuka, chipfuwo kana gwai, zvichiravira chinhu; musazvirega zvichidya kana kunwa. asi vanhu nemhuka ngavafuke masaga. munhu wose ngaadane kuna allah iye zvino. ngavasiye nzira dzavo dzakaipa nokuita kwavo nechisimba. ndiani anoziva? zvichida allah angazvidemba uye netsitsi dzake akazvidzora kubva pakutsamwa kwake kunotyisa kuti tirege kuparara.” allah akati aona zvavakaita uye kutendeuka kwavakaita kubva panzira dzavo dzakaipa, akavanzwira tsitsi akasauyisa kuparadzwa pamusoro pavo sezvaaida kuvaitira.

4

asi jona haana kufadzwa nazvo uye akatsamwa. akanyengetera kuna yeahoh akati, “imi yeahoh, izvi hazvisizvo here zvandakataura ndiri kunyika yangu? ndokusaka ndakakurumidza kutiza ndichienda kutashishi? ndaiziva kuti muri allah ane tsitsi nenyasha, anononoka kutsamwa uye azere norudo, allah anozvidzora pakutumira zvakaipa. zvino, imi yeahoh, torai zvenyu upenyu hwangu, nokuti zviri nani kuti ndife zvangu pano kurarama.” asi yeahoh akapindura akati, “zvakanaka here kuti utsamwe?” jona akabuda akaenda akandogara pasi kunze kweguta nechokumabvazuva. ikoko akazvivakira dumba, akagara mumumvuri waro ndokumirira kuti aone zvaizoitika kuguta. ipapo yeahoh allah akameresa muti womuzambiringa, akauita kuti ukure kumusoro kwajona kuti uite mumvuri pamusoro pake, kuti shungu dzake dzidzikire, uye jona akafara kwazvo nokuda kwomuzambiringa. asi chifumi chezuva rakatevera allah akatuma gonye rikadya muzambiringa uyu zvokuti wakasvava. zuva rakati richibuda, allah akatuma mhepo yokumabvazuva yaipisa kwazvo, uye zuva rikabaya pamusoro pajona zvokuti akaziya. akademba kufa, uye akati, “zvingava nani kuti ndife zvangu pano kurarama.” asi allah akati kuna jona, “zvakanaka here kuti utsamwe nokuda kwomuzambiringa uyu?” iye akati, “hongu, ndakatsamwa zvokuti ndife.” asi yeahoh akati, “iwe wanga une hanya nomuzambiringa uyu, kunyange zvazvo usina kuuchengeta kana kuukudza. wakabuda nousiku humwe uye ukaparara nousiku humwe. asi ninevhe rine vanhu vanopfuura zviuru zana namakumi maviri avanhu vasingazivi kuti ruoko rwavo rworudyi ndorupi kana rworuboshwe ndorupi, uye nemombe zhinjiwo. handingavi nehanya here neguta iro guru?”

micah

1

shoko rayeahoh rakauya kuna mika wemoresheti panguva yokutonga kwajotamu, ahazi nahezekia, madzimambo ayeahudha, chiratidzo chaakaona pamusoro pesamaria nejerusarema. inzwai, imi marudzi avanhu, imi mose, teerera, iwe nyika navose vari mauri, kuti ishe yeahoh achakupai mhosva, yeahoh ari mutemberi yake tsvene. tarirai! yeahoh ari kubuda panzvimbo yaanogara: anoburuka pasi agotsika panzvimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika. makomo achanyongodeka pasi pake uye mipata ichapamuka, senamo pamoto, semvura inoyerera pamawere. zvose izvi zvakaitika nokuda kwokudarika kwayaqobho, nokuda kwezvivi zveimba yaisraeri. kudarika kwayaqobho ndokweiko? hakuzi samaria here? nzvimbo yakakwirira yayeahudha ndeipiko? haizi jerusarema here? “naizvozvo ndichaita samaria murwi wamabwe, nzvimbo yokusima minda yemizambiringa. zvose zvifananidzo zvaro zvichaputswa kuita zvimedu; zvose zvipo zvaro zvomutemberi zvichapiswa nomoto; ndichaparadza zvifananidzo zvaro zvose. sezvo akaunganidza zvipo zvake kubva pamibayiro yezvifeve, semibayiro yezvifeve zvichazoshandiswa zvakare.” nokuda kwaizvozvo ndichachema uye ndigoungudza; ndichafamba ndisina shangu mutsoka uye ndisina kupfeka. ndichaungudza segava uye ndichachema sezizi. nokuti ronda rake harirapiki; rasvika kuna yeahudha. rasvika pasuo ravanhu vangu chaipo, kunyange kujerusarema chaiko. musazvireva pagati; musambochema. mubheti ofira umburukai muguruva. pfuurai muende musina kupfeka mukunyara, imi munogara mushafiri. avo vanogara muzaanani havangabudi kunze. bheti ezeri riri mukuchema; kudzivirirwa kwaro kwabviswa kubva kwariri. avo vanogara mumaroti mukurwadziwa kukuru vakamirira kudzikinurwa, nokuti njodzi yasvika ichibva kuna yeahoh, kunyange pasuo rejerusarema. imi vanogara murakishi, sungai mabhiza enyu pangoro. ndimi makava mavambo echivi kumwanasikana wezioni, nokuti kudarika kwaisraeri kwakawanikwa mamuri. naizvozvo uchapa zvipo zvokuonekedzana kuna moresheti gati. guta reakizibhi richaratidza unyengeri kumadzimambo aisraeri. ndichauyisa mukundi kwauri iwe unogara mumaresha. iye anova kubwinya kwaisraeri achauya kuadhuramu. veurai misoro yenyu mukuchema nokuda kwavana vamunofarira; zviitei musvuu sowegora, nokuti vachabva kwamuri vachienda kuutapwa.

2

vane nhamo avo vanoronga zvakaipa, avo vanoronga zvakaipa pamibhedha yavo! pakuedza kwamangwanani vanozviita nokuti zviri musimba ravo kuzviita. vanochiva minda vagoipamba, nedzimba, uye vagodzitora. vanobira munhu imba yake, nomuvakidzani nhaka yake. naizvozvo yeahoh anoti, “ndiri kuronga njodzi yokurwisa nayo vanhu ava, zvamusingagoni kuzvidzivirira kwazviri. hamuchazofambizve muchizvikudza, nokuti ichava nguva yedambudziko. pazuva iro vanhu vachakutukai; vachakudenhai norwiyo urwu rwokuchema: ‘taitwa dongo chose; pfuma yavanhu vangu yagovaniswa. anonditorera! anopa minda yedu kuna vanotimukira?’ ” naizvozvo muchashayiwa munhu kana mumwe, muungano yayeahoh, kuti agove nyika nemijenya. vaprofita vavo vanoti, “musaprofita, musaprofita pamusoro pezvinhu izvi; kunyadziswa hakungatibati.” zvingataurwe here, nhai imi imba yayaqobho, kuti: “ko, mweya wayeahoh watsamwa here? iye anoita zvinhu zvakadaro here?” “ko, mashoko angu haaiti zvakanaka here kuno uyo ane nzira dzake dzakarurama? asi mazuva ano vanhu vangu vakandimukira somuvengi. munobvisa majasi anokosha pane avo vanopfuura musina kana hanya, savarume vodzoka kubva kuhondo. munodzinga madzimai avanhu vangu kubva mudzimba dzavo dzakanaka. munotora ropafadzo yangu kubva kuvana vavo nokusingaperi. simukai, ibvai pano! nokuti ino haisi nzvimbo yenyu yokuzororera, nokuti yakasvibiswa, yakaparadzwa zvisingagadziriki. kana munyepi nomunyengeri akauya oti, ‘ndichakuprofitirai waini zhinji nedoro,’ iyeyu achava muprofita wavanhu ava! “zvirokwazvo ndichakuunganidzai imi mose, iwe yaqobho; zvirokwazvo ndichaunganidza pamwe chete vakasara vaisraeri. ndichavaunganidza pamwe chete samakwai muchirugu, seboka pamafuro aro; nzvimbo yacho ichazara navanhu. uyo achaparura nzira achaenda pamberi pavo; vachapwanya napasuo vagobuda panze. mambo wavo achapfuura ari pamberi pavo, iye yeahoh achivatungamirira.”

3

ipapo ndakati, “teererai imi vatungamiri vayaqobho, imi vatongi veimba yaisraeri. hamufaniri kuziva kururamisira here, imi munovenga zvakanaka muchida zvakaipa; munofunura ganda pamapfupa; munodya nyama yavanhu vangu, munobvisa ganda ravo, muchivhuna mapfupa avo kuita zvidimbu; munovatema-tema senyama yokuisa mupani, senyama yomuhari?” ipapo vachadana kuna yeahoh, asi haangavadaviri. panguva iyoyo achavanza chiso chake kwavari nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavakaita. zvanzi nayeahoh: “kana vari vaprofita vanotsausa vanhu vangu, kana mumwe akavapa zvokudya, vanodanidzira kuti ‘rugare’; kana akasavapa, vanogadzirira kumurwisa. naizvozvo usiku huchauya pamusoro pako, pasina zviratidzo, nerima, pasina kuvuka. zuva richavirira vaprofita, uye masikati achavasvibira. vaoni vachanyadziswa uye vavuki vachanyadziswa. vachafukidza zviso zvavo nokuti hakuna mhinduro inobva kuna yeahoh.” asi kana ndirini, ndizere nesimba, nomweya wayeahoh, uye nokururamisira nesimba, kuti ndizivise yaqobho kudarika kwake naisraeri chivi chake. inzwai izvi, imi vatungamiri veimba yayaqobho, imi vatongi veimba yaisraeri, munozvidza kururamisira uye munominamisa zvose zvakanaka; munovaka zioni nokudeura ropa, uye jerusarema nouipi. vatungamiri varo vanotongera fufuro, vaprista varo vanodzidzisa kuti vapiwe mubayiro, uye vaprofita varo vanoprofita kuti vapiwe mubayiro. asi vanozendama pana yeahoh voti, “ko, yeahoh haasi pakati pedu here? hapana njodzi ingatiwira.” naizvozvo nokuda kwenyu, zioni richarimwa somunda, jerusarema richava murwi wamabwe, pachikomo pamire temberi, pachava dondo.

4

mumazuva okupedzisira gomo retemberi yayeahoh richasimbiswa segomo guru pakati pamakomo; richasimudzwa pamusoro pezvikomo, uye marudzi achaenda kwariri. ndudzi zhinji dzichauya dzichiti, “uyai, handei kugomo rayeahoh, kuimba yaallah wayaqobho. achatidzidzisa nzira dzake, kuti tigofamba munzira dzake.” murayiro uchabuda kubva pazioni, shoko rayeahoh kubva pajerusarema. achatonga pakati pamarudzi mazhinji uye achapedza gakava pakati pendudzi dzine simba dziri kure kure. vachapfura minondo yavo vagoiita mapadza, namapfumo vachiaita mapanga okuchekerera miti. rudzi harungasimudziri rumwe rudzi munondo, havangazodzidzirizve kurwa. mumwe nomumwe achagara pasi pomuzambiringa wake, napasi pomuonde wake, uye hapana anozovaita kuti vatye, nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose ataura. ndudzi dzose dzingafamba muzita ravamwari vadzo; isu tichafamba muzita rayeahoh allah wedu nokusingaperi-peri. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndichaunganidza vakaremara; ndichaunganidza vakadzingwa neavo vandakatambudza. ndicharemadza vakasara, vaya vakadzingwa, ivo rudzi rwakasimba. yeahoh achavatonga pagomo rezioni kubva pazuva iroro nokusingaperi. kana uri iwe, chirindo cheboka iwe nhare yomwanasikana wezioni, ushe hwakare huchadzoswa kwauri; umambo huchauya kumwanasikana wejerusarema.” sei muchiridza mhere iye zvino, hamuna mambo here? gota renyu raparara here zvokuti kurwadza kwakubatai sekwomukadzi anosununguka? tambura ugomere, iwe mwanasikana wezioni, somukadzi ari pakusununguka, nokuti zvino unofanira kubuda muguta unogara kusango. uchaenda kubhabhironi; ikoko uchandonunurwa. ikoko yeahoh achakudzikinura kubva paruoko rwavavengi vako. asi zvino ndudzi zhinji dzakaunganira kuzokurwisa. vanoti, “ngaasvibiswe, maziso edu ngaatarise zioni!” asi havazivi pfungwa dzayeahoh; havanzwisisi kuronga kwake, iye anovaunganidza sezvisote paburiro. “simuka upure, iwe mwanasikana wezioni, nokuti ndichakupa nyanga dzesimbi; ndichakupa mahwanda endarira uye uchapwanya kuita zvidimbu ndudzi zhinji.” uchatsaurira kuna yeahoh zvavakazviwanira nenzira dzavo, upfumi hwavo kuna ishe wenyika yose.

5

unganidza mauto ako, iwe guta ramauto, nokuti takombwa nomuvengi. vacharova mutongi waisraeri netsvimbo padama. “asi iwe, bheterehema efurata, kunyange uri muduku pakati pamarudzi ayeahudha, kwauri kuchandibudira mumwe achava mutongi pamusoro peisraeri, mavambo ake ndeakare kare, kubva pamazuva akare kare.” naizvozvo israeri achasiyiwa kusvikira panguva iyo, iye anorwadziwa azvara uye hama dzake dzose dzadzoka kuzobatana navaisraeri. achamira agofudza boka rake musimba rayeahoh, muukuru hwezita rayeahoh allah wake. uye vachagara norugare, nokuti ipapo kukura kwake kuchasvika kumagumo enyika. uye iye achava rugare rwavo. muasiria paacharwisa nyika yedu agofamba achipfuura nomunhare dzedu, tichamumutsira vafudzi vanomwe kuti vamurwise kunyange vatungamiri vasere vavanhu. vachatonga nyika yeasiria nomunondo, nyika yanimurodhi nomunondo wakavhomorwa. achatirwira kubva kumuasiria paachapinda munyika yedu nokupinda pamiganhu yedu. vakasara vayaqobho vachava pakati pamarudzi akawanda, sedova rinobva kuna yeahoh, sokunaya kwemvura pauswa, zvisingamiriri munhu kana kugaririra vanhu. vakasara vayaqobho vachava pakati pendudzi, pakati poruzhinji rwamarudzi, seshumba pakati pezvikara zvesango, seshumba duku pakati pamapoka amakwai, inotsika uye inobvambura ichienda, pasina anogona kununura. ruoko rwenyu ruchasimudzwa mukukunda uye vadzivisi venyu vose vachaparadzwa. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “ndichaparadza mabhiza enyu pakati penyu uye ndichapwanya ngoro dzenyu. ndichaparadza maguta enyika yenyu uye ndichaputsa nhare dzenyu dzose. ndichaparadza uroyi hwako uye hauchazovizve navavuki. ndichaparadza zvifananidzo zvenyu zvakavezwa neshongwe dzenyu pakati penyu; hamuchazokotamiri kubasa ramaoko enyu. ndichadzura kubva pakati penyu matanda aashera uye ndichaparadza maguta enyu. ndichatsiva nokutsamwa nehasha kundudzi dzisina kunditeerera.”

6

teererai zvinotaurwa nayeahoh: “simukai, taurai nyaya yenyu pamberi pamakomo; zvikomo ngazvinzwe zvamunoda kutaura. chinzwai imi makomo, kupomera kwayeahoh; teererai, imi hwaro hwenyika hunogara nokusingaperi. nokuti yeahoh ane mhosva yaari kupa vanhu vake; anopa israeri mhosva. “vanhu vangu, chiiko chandakakuitirai? ndakakuremedzai neiko? ndipindurei. ndakakubudisai kubva muijipiti uye akakudzikinurai kubva munyika youranda. ndakatuma mozisi kuti azokutungamirirai, naaroniwo namiriamu. vanhu vangu, rangarirai zvakaranganwa nabharaki mambo wemoabhu nezvakapindurwa nabharamu mwanakomana wabheori. rangarirai rwendo rwenyu kubva kushitimu kusvika kugirigari, kuti mugoziva mabasa akarurama ayeahoh.” ndichauya neiko pamberi payeahoh. uye ndigokotama sei pamberi paallah anokudzwa? ndingauye pamberi pake nezvibayiro zvinopiswa nemhuru dzine gore rimwe here? ko, yeahoh angafadzwa nezviuru zvamakondobwe, uye nezviuru gumi zvenzizi dzamafuta here? ndingapa dangwe rangu nokuda kwokudarika kwangu, icho chibereko chomuviri wangu pamusoro pokutadza kwomweya wangu here? akakuratidza, iwe munhu, kuti zvakanaka ndezvipi. uye ndezvipi zvinodiwa nayeahoh kubva kwauri? kuita zvakarurama uye kufarira kunzwira ngoni, nokufamba naallah wako wakazvininipisa. teererai! yeahoh anodanidzira kuguta, uye kutya zita renyu ndihwo uchenjeri: “chenjererai shamhu naiye akaituma. ndichazokanganwa here, iwe imba yakaipa, upfumi hwako hwakawanikwa nenzira dzakaipa, nechiero cheefa chakatapudzwa, chakatukwa? ndingaregerera munhu ane chiero chinonyengera nesaga rezviero zvenhema here? vapfumi vake vanoita nechisimba; vanhu vake varevi venhema, uye miromo yavo inotaura nokunyengera. naizvozvo, ndatotanga kukuparadzai, kukuitai dongo nokuda kwezvivi zvenyu. muchadya asi hamungaguti: dumbu renyu richaramba risina chinhu. muchaisa mudura asi mugoshaya zvamachengeta, nokuti zvamunounganidza ndichazviparadza nomunondo. muchadyara asi hamungakohwi; muchasvina maorivhi asi hamungazori mafuta acho, muchasvina mazambiringa asi hamunganwi waini yacho. makachengeta zvirevo zvaomuri uye namabasa ose eimba yaahabhu, uye makatevera tsika dzavo. naizvozvo ndichakuisai mukuparadzwa, nevanhu venyu mukusekwa; muchatakura kushorwa kwendudzi.”

7

inhamoi yandinayo! ndafanana nouya anounganidza michero yezhizha inosara mumunda wemizambiringa pakukohwa; hapana sumbu ramazambiringa rokudya, kana maonde okutanga andinopanga. vanhu vano umwari vabviswa panyika; hapana mumwe akarurama asara. vanhu vose vanovandira kuti vateure ropa; mumwe nomumwe anovhima hama yake nomumbure. maoko ose ari maviri ane unyanzvi pakuita zvakaipa; mubati anomanikidzira vanhu kuti vamupe zvipo, mutongi anotambira fufuro, vane simba vanomanikidzira zvido zvavo; vose vanozvironga pamwe chete. akanaka kupfuura vose akangoita sorukato, vakarurama kupfuura vose vakaipa kupfuura ruzhowa rweminzwa. zuva renharirire dzenyu rasvika, zuva rokushanyirwa kwenyu naallah. zvino ino ndiyo nguva yokukanganiswa kwavo. rega kuvimba nomuvakidzani wako; usavimba neshamwari yako. kunyange nomukadzi wawakagumbatira, uchenjerere mashoko ako. nokuti mwanakomana anozvidza baba vake, mwanasikana anomukira mai vake, muroora anomukira vamwene vake; vavengi vomunhu ndivo vanhu vemhuri yake. asi kana ndirini, ndinomirira netariro kuna yeahoh, ndinomirira allah muponesi wangu; allah wangu achandinzwa. usafara pamusoro pangu, iwe muvengi wangu! kunyange ndakawira pasi, ndichasimuka. kunyange ndigere murima, yeahoh achava chiedza changu. nokuti ndakamutadzira, ndichatakura kutsamwa kwayeahoh, kusvikira andireverera mhosva yangu uye asimbisa kodzero yangu. achandibudisira kuchiedza, ndichaona kururama kwake. ipapo muvengi wangu achazviona uye achafukidzwa, iye akati kwandiri, “aripiko yeahoh allah wako?” meso angu achaona kuwa kwake; kunyange iye zvino achatsikwa pasi petsoka sematope mumigwagwa. zuva rokuvaka masvingo enyu richasvika, zuva rokuwedzerwa kwemiganhu yenyu. pazuva iro vanhu vachauya kwauri vachibva kuasiria namaguta eijipiti, kunyange kubva kuijipiti kusvikira kuyufuratesi, uye kubva kugungwa kusvika kune rimwe gungwa, nokubva kugomo kusvika kune rimwe gomo. nyika ichava dongo nokuda kwavagari vayo, nokuda kwamabasa avo. fudza vanhu vako nomudonzvo wako, boka renhaka yako, rinogara roga musango, mumafuro akanaka. rega afure mubhashani regireadhi samazuva ekare. “sapamazuva amakabuda kubva muijipiti, ndichavaratidza zvishamiso zvangu.” ndudzi dzichazviona uye dzichanyadziswa, dzisisina simba radzo rose. vachabata miromo yavo uye nzeve dzavo dzichadzivira. vachananzva guruva senyoka, sezvipuka zvinokambaira pasi. vachabuda vachidedera kubva munzvimbo dzavo dzokuvanda; vachadzoka vachitya kuna yeahoh allah wedu, uye vachakutyai. ndiani allah akaita semi, anoregerera chivi uye anokanganwira kudarika kwavakasara venhaka yake? hamugari makatsamwa nokusingaperi, asi munofarira kunzwira ngoni. muchava nenyasha kwatiri zvakare; muchatsikira zvivi zvedu pasi petsoka uye muchakanda kuipa kwedu kwose pakadzikadzika mugungwa. muchava makatendeka kuna yaqobho, mucharatidza nyasha kuna abhurahama, sezvamakapika mhiko kumadzibaba edu mumazuva akare.

nahum

1

chirevo pamusoro peninevhe. bhuku rezvakaonekwa nanahumi muerikoshi. yeahoh ane godo uye ndiallah anotsiva; yeahoh anotsiva uye azere nehasha. yeahoh anotsiva kuvavengi vake uye anochengetera vavengi vake hasha dzake. yeahoh anononoka kutsamwa uye ane simba guru; yeahoh haangasiye ane mhosva asina kurangwa. nzira yake iri muchamupupuri nedutu, uye makore ndiwo guruva retsoka dzake. anotuka gungwa agoriomesa; anoita kuti nzizi dzose dziome. bhashani nekarimeri zvasvava uye kutumbuka kwerebhanoni kwapera. makomo anodengenyeka pamberi pake uye zvikomo zvinonyungudika. nyika inodedera pamberi pake, nyika uye navose vanogara mairi. ndiani angadzivisa hasha dzake? ndiani angashingirire pahasha dzake dzinotyisa? hasha dzake dzadururwa somoto; matombo apwanyika pamberi pake. yeahoh akanaka, utiziro panguva dzokutambudzika. anochengeta avo vanovimba naye, asi namafashamu ane simba guru, achaparadza ninevhe; achateverera vavengi vake kusvikira murima. zvose zvavakaronga pamusoro payeahoh iye achazviparadza; dambudziko haringauyi kechipiri. vachakorokodzwa pakati peminzwa uye vachadhakwa newaini yavo; vachaparadzwa samashanga akaoma. kubva mauri, iwe ninevhe, pane mumwe akabuda anoronga zvakaipa pamusoro payeahoh uye anopa zano rakaipa. zvanzi nayeahoh: “kunyange vane vabatsiri uye vakawanda, vachaurayiwa vakasazovapozve. kunyange ndakakutambudza, iwe yeahudha, handichazokutambudzazve. zvino ndichavhuna joko ravo kubva pamutsipa wako uye ndichadambura ngetani dzako.” yeahoh arayira shoko pamusoro pako, iwe ninevhe, rokuti, “hauchazovi nezvizvarwa zvinopiwa zita rako. ndichaparadza zvifananidzo zvakavezwa nezvifananidzo zvakaumbwa, zviri mutemberi yavamwari vako. ndichachera guva rako, nokuti iwe wakaipa kwazvo.” tarira, pamakomo apo, tsoka dzouyo anouya namashoko akanaka, anoparidza rugare! pemberera mitambo yako, iwe yeahudha, uye uzadzise mhiko dzako. vakaipa havachakurwisazve; vachaparadzwa zvachose.

2

murwisi anouya kuzokurwisa iwe, ninevhe; rindai nhare, tarirai kunzira, sungai zviuno zvenyu, unganidzai simba renyu rose! yeahoh achadzosa kurumbidzwa kwayaqobho sokurumbidzwa kwaisraeri, kunyange vaparadzi vakavaparadza uye vakaparadza mizambiringa yavo. nhoo dzavarwi vake dzatsvuka; mhare dzokurwa dzapfeka nguo tsvuku. matare engoro ovaima pazuva rokugadzirirwa kwadzo; mapfumo omupaini anovheyeswa-vheyeswa. ngoro dzovirima mumigwagwa, dzinomhanya dzichienda nokudzoka muchivara. dzinoita samazhenje omoto; dzinomhanya-mhanya semheni. anodana mauto ake akasarudzwa, asi vanogumburwa panzira yavo. vanomhanyira kurusvingo rweguta; nhoo yokuzvidzivirira yaiswa panzvimbo payo. masuo enzizi azarurwa uye muzinda wamambo wakoromoka. shoko ratemwa rokuti guta ritapwe, uye riendeswe kure. varandakadzi varo vanochema senjiva uye vanorova zvipfuva zvavo. ninevhe rakafanana nedziva, uye mvura yaro iri kuerera ichipera. vanochema vachiti, “mirai! mirai!” asi hapana anocheuka. pambai sirivha! pambai goridhe! kuwanda kwazvo hakuperi, ihwo upfumi hunobva pamhando dzose dzepfuma yaro! rabirwa, rapambwa, ratorerwa zvose! mwoyo yanyungudika, mabvi odedera, miviri yobvunda, zviso zvose zvachenuruka. riripiko bako reshumba, nzvimbo yadzaipira vana vadzo zvokudya, kwaienda shumba nehadzi yayo, uye navana, pasina chokutya. shumba yaiuraya zvaikwanira vana vayo uye yakadzipira hadzi yayo nyama, ichizadza mapako ayo nezvayakauraya uye mapako ayo nenyama. “ndine mhaka newe,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ndichapisa ngoro dzenyu dzive utsi, uye munondo uchaparadza shumba dzenyu duku. ndichakusiyai musina nyama panyika. mazwi enhume dzako haangazonzwikazve.”

3

rine nhamo guta reropa, rizere nenhema, rizere nezvakapambwa, harigari risina varinotambudza! kurira kwetyava, utsvikitsviki hwamavhiri, mutsindo wamabhiza nomubvumo wokutinhira kwengoro! kumhanya kwavatasvi vamabhiza, kupenya kweminondo namapfumo anovaima! vazhinji vakaurayiwa, mirwi yevakafa, mitumbi isingaverengeki, vanhu vachigumburwa nezvitunha. zvose izvi nokuda kwokuchiva kuzhinji kwechifeve, chinokwezvera, mukuru wouroyi, akatapa ndudzi noufeve hwake namarudzi avanhu nouroyi hwake. “ndine mhaka newe,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ndichafukura nguo yako ifukidze chiso chako “ndicharatidza ndudzi kushama kwako namadzimambo kunyadziswa kwako. ndichakukandidzira tsvina, ndichakuita akazvidzika uye ndichakuita chiseko. vose vachakuona vachakutiza uye vachati, ‘ninevhe raparara, ndiani acharichema?’ ndingawana kupi munhu angakunyaradza?” uri nani kupfuura tebhesi here, rakavakwa panairi, rakakomberedzwa nemvura? rwizi ndirwo rwairidzivirira, mvura iri rusvingo rwaro. etiopia neijipiti ndizvo zvaiva simba rayo guru; puti neribhiya dzaiva pakati pavabatsiri vayo. kunyange zvakadaro yakatapwa ikaendeswa kuutapwa. vacheche varo vakaputsanyiwa kumavambo kwemigwagwa yose. mijenya yakakandwa pamusoro pemachinda avo, uye vakuru vavo vakasungwa nengetani. newewo uchadhakwa; uchavanda ugotsvaka utiziro kubva kumuvengi wako. nhare dzako dzose dzafanana nemiti yemionde ine michero yokutanga yaibva; paanozunzwa, maonde anodonhera mumuromo momudyi. tarira mauto ako, vose vakadzi! masuo enyika yako akazarurirwa kuvavengi vako; moto waparadza mazariro awo. cherai mvura kuitira kukombwa, simbisai nhare dzenyu! gadzirai ivhu, kanyai dhaka, mugadzire zvidhina zvenyu! moto uchakuparadzai imomo; munondo uchakuurayai, uye uchakuparadzai semhashu. berekanai semhashu, muberekane sehwiza! makawedzera uwandu hwavatengesi venyu kusvikira vapfuura nyeredzi dzedenga kuwanda. asi sehwiza, vanoparadza nyika vobhururuka vachienda. varindi venyu vakaita sehwiza, machinda enyu segundamusaira rehwiza dzinomhara pamadziro musi wakunotonhora, asi kana zuva rabuda dzinobhururuka dzichienda, uye hapana anoziva kuti kupi. iwe mambo weasiria, vafudzi vako vanotsumwaira; machinda ako anorara pasi kuti azorore. vanhu vako vakapararira pamusoro pamakomo pasina angavaunganidza. hapana chingarapa ronda rako; kukuvara kwako kuchakuuraya. mumwe nomumwe anonzwa nezveguhu rako anorova maoko ake pakuwa kwako, nokuti ndianiko asina kunzwa utsinye hwako husina magumo?

habakkuk

1

chirevo chakaratidzwa muprofita habhakuki. haiwa yeahoh, ndicharamba ndichidanidzira, ndichitsvaka rubatsiro kusvikira riniko, asi musingandinzwi? kana kudana kwamuri ndichiti, “ndorwiswa!” asi hamundiponesi? sei muchiita kuti ndione kusaruramisira? sei muchirega zvakaipa zvichingoitwa? kuparadza nokuita nechisimba zviri pamberi pangu; pano kukakavara, uye kurwa kuri kuwanda. naizvozvo murayiro hauchisina simba, uye kutonga kwakarurama hakuchaonekwi. vakaipa vanokomba vakarurama, zvokuti kururamisira kunominamiswa. “tarisa ndudzi dzavanhu, ucherechedze, ugoshamiswa zvirokwazvo. nokuti ndichaita chimwe chinhu pamazuva ako chawanga usingazobvumi, kunyange dai waichiudzwa. ndiri kumutsa vabhabhironi ruya rudzi rune utsinye, rune hasha, runopararira pasi pose kuti rubvute nzvimbo dzokugara dzisiri dzavo. vanhu vanotyisa uye vanovhundukwa; vasina murayiro unovatonga uye vanongozvitsvakira kukudzwa. mabhiza avo anomhanya kukunda ingwe, anotyisa kukunda mhumhi mumadekwana. mauto avo amabhiza anomhanya asingadzoki; vatasvi vamabhiza vanobva kure kure. vanobhururuka segora rinotsvaka kuparadza; vanouya vose kuzoita zvechisimba. mapoka avo ehondo anouya semhepo inovhuvhuta mugwenga vachiunganidza nhapwa sejecha. vanozvidza madzimambo uye vanomhura vatongi. vanoseka maguta ose akasimbiswa; vanovaka zvikomo zvevhu voatapa. ipapo vanopfuura semhepo, vanopfuura vasingamiri, varume vane mhosva, simba ravo ndiye mwari wavo.” haiwa yeahoh, ko hamugari nokusingaperi here? allah wangu, mutsvene wangu, hatingatongofi. haiwa yeahoh, makavagadza kuti vatonge; imi dombo, makavagadza kuti varange. meso enyu akachena zvokuti haangatarisi zvakaipa; hamungatenderi zvakaipa. sei zvino muchitendera vanyengeri? ko, munonyararirei kana vakaipa vachimedza vanovapfuura mukururama? sei makaita kuti vanhu vave sehove dzegungwa, sezvisikwa zvegungwa zvisina mutongi. muvengi anovaredza vose nezviredzo, anovabata mumumbure wake, achivakokorodza murutava rwake; naizvozvo anopembera nomufaro. naizvozvo anopisira zvibayiro kumumbure wake, uye anopisira zvinonhuhwira kumumbure wake, nokuti anogarika nokuda kwomumbure wake, anodya zvokudya zvakaisvonaka. ko, acharamba achingodurura zviri mumumbure wake, achingoparadza ndudzi asina tsitsi here?

2

ndichandomira panzvimbo yangu yokurinda ndichazviisa panzvimbo yakakwirira; ndichatarisa ndione zvaachareva kwandiri uye zvandingapindura pamusoro pokuchema uku. ipapo yeahoh akapindura achiti: “nyora chiratidzo ichi, uite kuti chionekwe kwazvo pamahwendefa kuti anoverenga agoverenga achimhanya. nokuti chiratidzo ichi chakamirira nguva yakatarwa; chinotaura nezvamagumo uye hachingarevi nhema. kunyange dai chikanonoka, chimirire; zvirokwazvo chichauya, hachizononoki. “tarira, ana manyawi; zvido zvake hazvina kururama, asi akarurama achararama nokutenda kwake. zvirokwazvo, waini inomupandukira; anozvikudza uye haazombozorori. nokuti anokara sezvinoita guva uye sorufu haaguti, anozviunganidzira ndudzi dzose uye anotapa marudzi ose avanhu. “ko, vakatapwa vose havangazomuseki here nezvirahwe zvokumushora vachiti, “ ‘ane nhamo anozviunganidzira zvakabiwa anozvipfumisa nepfuma yakapambwa! zvicharamba zvakadai kusvikira riniko?’ ko, vamakakwereta havangazosimuki pakarepo here? havangazomuki vakakuvhundutsai here? ipapo ndimi muchava vakapambwa. nokuti makapamba ndudzi zhinji, vakasara vachakupambai, nokuda kweropa ravanhu ramakateura; makaparadza nyika namaguta pamwe chete navageremo. “ane nhamo anovaka umambo hwake nepfuma yakabiwa, achivaka dendere rake pakakwirira, kuti anzvenge kuparadzwa! makarangana kuparadza ndudzi dzakawanda, muchinyadzisa imba yenyu, uye muchiparadza upenyu hwenyu. mabwe ari murusvingo achadanidzira, ipapo matanda edenga remba achadairira namaungira. “ane nhamo anovaka guta nokudeura ropa uye anosimbisa guta nezvakaipa. tarirai, hazvina kubva kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose here kuti vanhu vanoshandira zvinoparadzwa nomoto, uye kuti marudzi avanhu anongozvinetesa nezvisina maturo? nokuti nyika yose ichazadzwa nokuziva kubwinya kwayeahoh, sezvakaita mvura kuzadza kwayakaita gungwa. “ane nhamo anopa vavakidzani vake zvinodhaka, achizvidurura kubva mumatende ewaini kusvikira vadhakwa, kuti aone kushama kwavo. muchazadzwa nenyadzi pachinzvimbo chokukudzwa. nhasi ndimiwo! chinwai kuti mudzedzereke! mukombe unobva kuruoko rwayeahoh rworudyi uri kuuya kwamuri, kunyadziswa kuchafukidza kukudzwa kwenyu. nokuti kuita nechisimba kwamakaitira rebhanoni kuchakukundai, uye kuparadza kwamakaita mhuka kuchakutyisai. nokuti makateura ropa ravanhu; makaparadza nyika namaguta navose vakanga vageremo! “chifananidzo chakavezwa chinobatsireiko, zvachakangogadzirwa nomuvezi? kana chifananidzo chakaumbwa, chinodzidzisa nhema? nokuti uyo anochiita anovimba nechaakazviumbira; anoita zvifananidzo zvisingagoni kutaura. ane nhamo anoti kudanda, ‘rarama!’ kana kubwe risingagoni kutaura, ‘muka!’ ko, zvingadzidzisa here? tarira, chakafukidzwa negoridhe nesirivha; hachina mweya mukati macho napaduku. asi yeahoh ari mutemberi yake tsvene; nyika yose ngairambe inyerere pamberi pake.”

3

munyengetero wamuprofita habhakuki unoimbwa neshigionoti. yeahoh, ndakanzwa zvomukurumbira wenyu; haiwa yeahoh, ndinomira ndichitya mabasa enyu. avandudzei pamazuva edu, panguva yedu ngaaziviswe; pakutsamwa kwenyu rangarirai tsitsi. allah akabva kutemani, iye mutsvene akabva kugomo reparani. sera umambo hwake hwakazadza matenga uye mbiri yake yakazadza nyika. kubwinya kwake kwakaita sokubuda kwezuva; bwerazuva hwakapenya huchibva muruoko rwake, makanga makavigwa simba rake. hosha yakaenda ichibva pamberi pake; denda rakatevera nhambwe dzake. akamira, akazungunusa nyika; akatarisa, akabvundisa ndudzi dzavanhu. makomo akare kare akakoromoka uye zvikomo zvakare zvakawira pasi. nzira dzake dzinogara nokusingaperi. ndakaona matende ekushani ari panhamo, nzvimbo dzokugara dzemidhiani dziri pakutambudzika. ko, makanga matsamwira nzizi here, nhai yeahoh? makanga matsamwira zvikova here, nhai yeahoh? makatsamwira gungwa here pamakafambisa mabhiza enyu nengoro dzenyu dzokukunda? makabudisa pachena uta hwenyu, mukadaidzira miseve mizhinji. sera makatsemura nyika nenzizi; makomo akakuonai akadedera. mvura zhinji yakapfuura; kwakadzika kwakatinhira kukasimudza mafungu pamusoro. zuva nomwedzi zvakambomira kumatenga zvichiona kuvaima kwemiseve yenyu yaipfuura, zvichiona kupenya kwepfumo renyu rinobwinya. mukutsamwa kwenyu makapfuura napanyika uye mukushatirwa kwenyu makarasa ndudzi. makauya kuzonunura vanhu venyu, kuzoponesa muzodziwa wenyu. makaparadza mutungamiri wenyika yavakaipa, mukamufukura kubva kumusoro kusvika kutsoka. sera nepfumo rake chairo makabaya musoro wake, pakauya varwi vake sechamupupuri kuzotiparadzira, vachifara savanoda kuparadza vanotambudzika vakanga vakavanda. makatsika-tsika gungwa namabhiza enyu, mukabvongodza mvura zhinji. ndakazvinzwa, hana yangu ikarova, miromo yangu yakadedera pandakanzwa maungira; kuora kwakapinda mumapfupa angu, makumbo angu akadedera. asi ndichamirira hangu zuva renjodzi kuti riuye pamusoro porudzi ruchatirwisa. kunyange dai muonde ukasatunga maruva, uye mizambiringa ikashayiwa zvibereko, kunyange kubereka kwomuorivhi kukakona, uye minda ikasabereka zvokudya, kunyange dai kukasava namakwai muchirugu uye mombe dzikashayikwa mumatanga, kunyange zvakadaro, ndichafara muna yeahoh, ndichava nomufaro muna allah muponesi wangu. ishe yeahoh ndiye simba rangu; anoita kuti tsoka dzangu dziite setsoka dzenondo, anondifambisa pamatunhu akakwirira. kumutungamiri wokuimba, nemitengeranwa yangu.

zephaniah

1

shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna zefania, mwanakomana wakushi, mwanakomana wagedharia, mwanakomana waamaria, mwanakomana wahezekia, pamazuva okutonga kwajosia mwanakomana waamoni mambo weyeahudha richiti: “ndichatsvaira zvose kubva pamusoro penyika,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichatsvaira zvose vanhu nemhuka; ndichatsvaira shiri dzedenga nehove dzegungwa. vakaipa vachasara nemirwi yamarara chete, kana ndabvisa munhu pamusoro penyika,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ndichatambanudza ruoko rwangu kuti ndirwise yeahudha uye ndicharwisa vose vanogara mujerusarema. ndichaparadza kubva panzvimbo ino vose vakasara vabhaari, mazita avaprista vechihedheni vanonamata zvifananidzo, vaya vanopfugama pamusoro pedzimba kuti vanamate nyeredzi dzedenga, vaya vanopfugama vachipika nayeahoh uye vanopikawo namoreki, vaya vanotsauka kubva pakutevera yeahoh uye vasingatsvaki yeahoh kana kubvunza kwaari. nyararai pamberi paishe yeahoh, nokuti zuva rayeahoh rava pedyo. yeahoh agadzirira chibayiro; akavaita vatsvene, vaya vaakakoka. pazuva rechibayiro chayeahoh, ndicharova machinda navanakomana vamambo, navaya vose vakapfeka nguo dzavatorwa. pazuva iro ndicharanga vose vanonyenyeredza kuti vasatsika paburiro, vanozadza temberi yavamwari vavo nechisimba nounyengeri. “pazuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “kuchema kuchanzwikwa kubva kusuo rehove, kuungudza kubva kurutivi rutsva rweguta, nokukoromoka kukuru kubva kuzvikomo. ungudzai imi munogara munharaunda yomusika, vashambadzi venyu vose vachaparadzwa, vose vanotengesa nesirivha vachaparadzwa. panguva iyoyo ndichanzvera jerusarema nomwenje; uye ndicharanga vaya vagere zvavo, vakaita sewaini yakasiyiwa mumasese ayo, vanofunga kuti, ‘yeahoh hapana zvaangaita, zvakanaka kana zvakaipa.’ upfumi hwavo huchapambwa, dzimba dzavo dzichaputswa, vachavaka dzimba, asi havangagari madziri; vachasima minda yemizambiringa, asi havanganwi waini yacho. “zuva guru rayeahoh rava pedyo, pedyo, uye riri kuuya nokukurumidza. teererai! kuchema pazuva rayeahoh kucharwadza, kuchema kwemhere ipapo. zuva iro richava rokutsamwa, zuva rokudzungaira nokumanikidzwa, zuva rokutambudzika nokuparadzwa, zuva rerima nokusuwa, zuva ramakore nezarima. zuva rehwamanda nemhere yehondo yokurwisa maguta akakomberedzwa namasvingo, nokurwisa shongwe dzomumakona. ndichauyisa kudzungaira pavanhu uye vachafamba samapofu, nokuti vakatadzira yeahoh. ropa ravo richadururwa seguruva, uye nyama yavo sendove. sirivha yavo kana goridhe ravo hazvingagoni kuvaponesa, pazuva rokutsamwa kwayeahoh. mumoto wegodo rake nyika yose ichaparadzwa, nokuti achauyisa magumo pakarepo kuna vose vanogara panyika.”

2

unganai pamwe chete, unganai pamwe chete, imi rudzi runonyadzisa, nguva dzakatarwa dzisati dzasvika uye zuva iroro risati rapfuura sehundi, kutsamwa kukuru kwayeahoh kusati kwauya pamusoro penyu, zuva rehasha dzayeahoh risati rauya pamusoro penyu. tsvakai yeahoh, imi mose vanyoro vapanyika, imi mose munoita zvaakarayira. tsvakai kururama, tsvakai unyoro; zvimwe mungadzivirirwa pazuva rokutsamwa kwayeahoh. gaza richasiyiwa uye ashikeroni richasiyiwa rava dongo. pamasikati makuru ashidhodhi richasiyiwa risisina chinhu uye ekironi radzurwa. mune nhamo imi munogara pedyo negungwa, imi vanhu vekereti; shoko rayeahoh rinokurwisa, iwe kenani nyika yavafiristia. “ndichakuparadza, uye hapana achasara.” nyika iri pedyo negungwa, panogara vakereti, ichava nzvimbo yavafudzi namatanga ehwai. ichava yavakasara veimba yavayeahudha; vachawana mafuro ikoko. mumadekwana vachavata pasi mudzimba dzaashikeroni. yeahoh allah wavo achavachengeta; achavadzorera pfuma yavo. “ndakanzwa kutuka kwamoabhu nokuzvidza kwavaamoni, avo vakatuka vanhu vangu uye vakatyisidzira nyika yavo. naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo noupenyu hwangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, “zvirokwazvo moabhu achaita sesodhomu, vaamoni segomora, nzvimbo yesora namakomba emunyu, matongo nokusingaperi. vakasara vavanhu vangu vachavapamba; vachararama vorudzi rwangu vachagara nhaka yenyika yavo.” izvi ndizvo zvavachawana nokuda kwokuzvikudza kwavo, nokuti vakatuka uye vakadadira vanhu vayeahoh wamasimba ose. yeahoh achava anotyisa kwavari paachaparadza vamwari vose venyika. ndudzi pamahombekombe ose dzichamunamata, rudzi rumwe norumwe munyika yarwo. “nemiwo, imi vaetiopia, muchaparadzwa nomunondo wangu.” achatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti arwise nyika yokumusoro agoparadza asiria, achasiya ninevhe rava dongo zvachose uye raoma segwenga. mapoka amakwai nemombe zvichavata pasi imomo, nezvipuka zvamarudzi ose. zizi romurenje nezizi romurwizi zvichavata pamusoro pembiru dzavo. kudana kwazvo kuchaungira nomumawindo, marara achava pamisuo yavo, mapango omusidhari achasiyiwa pachena. iri ndiro guta risina hanya raigara vakachengetedzeka. rakati mumwoyo maro, “ndini, uye hakuna mumwe kunze kwangu.” razova dongo rakadii, nzvimbo inovata mhuka dzesango! vose vanopfuura napariri vanoseka uye vanokunga zvibhakera zvavo.

3

rine nhamo guta ravamanikidzi, rakapanduka uye rikasvibiswa! harina warinoteerera, harigamuchiri kudzorwa. harivimbi nayeahoh, hariswederi pedyo naallah waro. machinda aro ishumba dzinoomba, vatongi varo mapere amadekwana, vasingasiyi chinhu chamangwanani. vaprofita vavo vanozvikudza; vanhu vanonyengera. vaprista varo vanozvidza nzvimbo tsvene uye vanoputsa murayiro. yeahoh ari mariri mutsvene; haaiti zvakaipa. mangwanani oga oga anotonga nokururamisira kwake, zuva rimwe nerimwe idzva anoriuyisa, asi vasakarurama havanyari. “ndakaparadza ndudzi; shongwe dzavo dzakaparara. ndakasiya nzira dzavo dzisisafambwi, hapasisina anopfuura nomo. maguta avo akaparadzwa; hapana achasiyiwa, kana mumwe zvake. ndakati kuguta, ‘zvirokwazvo uchanditya ugogamuchira kudzorwa!’ ipapo vagari varo havangaparadzwi, kana kuranga kwangu kwose hakungauyi pariri. asi vakanga vachine shungu dzokuita uori pakuita kwavo kwose. naizvozvo ndimirirei,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “zuva randichasimuka kuti ndigopupura. ndafunga kuunganidza ndudzi, kuunganidza ushe hwose uye nokudurura hasha dzangu pavari, kutsamwa kukuru kwangu kwose. nyika yose ichaparadzwa nomoto wegodo rokutsamwa kwangu. “ipapo ndichachenesa miromo yavanhu, kuti vose zvavo vadane kuzita rayeahoh uye vamushumire nomwoyo mumwe. kubva mhiri kwenzizi dzeetiopia vanamati vangu, vanhu vangu vakapararira, vachandiunzira zvipiriso. pazuva iro hamungaiswi pakunyadziswa nokuda kwezvakaipa zvamakandiitira, nokuti ndichabvisa kubva muguta rino vaya vanofara mukuzvikudza kwavo. hamungazovizve namanyawi pagomo rangu dzvene. asi ndichasiya pakati penyu vanyoro vanozvininipisa, vanovimba nezita rayeahoh. vakasara vaisraeri havangaiti zvakaipa; havangarevi nhema, uye kunyengera hakuzowanikwi mumiromo yavo. vachadya uye vagorara pasi, uye hapana angavatyisa.” imba, iwe mwanasikana wezioni, danidzira, iwe israeri!
