fara ugofarisisa nomwoyo wako wose, iwe mwanasikana wejerusarema! yeahoh abvisa kurangwa kwako kwose, adzinga muvengi wako. yeahoh, mambo waisraeri, anewe; hauzotyizve kuti ungakuvadzwa nechinhu chipi zvacho. pazuva iro vachati kujerusarema, “usatya, iwe zioni; usarega maoko ako achishayiwa simba. yeahoh allah wako anewe, ndiye ane simba rokuponesa. achafadzwa zvikuru newe, achakunyaradza norudo rwake, achafara nokuda kwako nokuimba.” “matambudziko emitambo yakatarwa ndichaabvisa kwauri; iwo mutoro nokuzvidzwa kwauri. panguva iyoyo ndichatonga vose vakakumanikidza; ndichanunura vakaremara uye ndichaunganidza vaya vakaparadzirwa. ndichavapa rumbidzo norukudzo munyika dzose dzavakaiswa pakunyadziswa. panguva iyoyo ndichakuunganidzai; panguva iyoyo ndichakuuyisai kumusha. ndichakupai rukudzo nerumbidzo pakati pavanhu vose vapanyika, pandichadzora pfuma yenyu muchizviona nameso enyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

haggai

1

mugore rechipiri ramambo dhariasi, pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechitanhatu, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kubudikidza nomuprofita hagai richienda kuna zerubhabheri mwanakomana washearitieri, mubati weyeahudha, nokuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki, muprista mukuru, richiti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “vanhu ava vanoti, ‘nguva haisati yasvika yokuti imba yayeahoh ivakwe.’ ” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika nokumuprofita hagai richiti, “ko, inguva here yokuti imi pachenyu mugare mudzimba dzenyu dzakashongedzwa namapuranga, asi imba ino ichiramba iri dongo?” zvino zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “fungisisai pamusoro penzira dzenyu. makakusha zvizhinji, asi mukacheka zvishoma. munodya, asi hamuguti. munonwa, asi hamugundwi. munopfeka nhumbi, asi hamudziyirwi. munoshandira mubayiro, kuti muuise chete muhomwe ina maburi.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “fungisisai pamusoro penzira dzenyu. kwirai kumakomo, mundouya namatanda muvake imba, kuti ini ndiifarire ndigokudzwa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “makatarisira kuwana zvizhinji, asi tarirai, zvakazova zvishoma. zvamakauya nazvo kumusha, ndakazvifuridzira kure. nemhaka yeiko?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “nemhaka yeimba yangu, yaramba ichingova dongo, asi mumwe nomumwe wenyu achishingairira imba yake. naizvozvo, nokuda kwenyu matenga aramba nedova uye nyika yaramba nezvibereko zvayo. ndakadana kuoma kuti kuuye paminda napamakomo, napazviyo, napawaini itsva, napamafuta, napazvose zvinoberekwa nevhu, napavanhu, napazvipfuwo, uye napamabasa amaoko enyu.” ipapo zerubhabheri mwanakomana washearitieri, nayeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki, muprista mukuru, navanhu vose vakanga vasara vakateerera inzwi rayeahoh allah wavo uye shoko romuprofita hagai, nokuti yeahoh allah wavo akanga amutuma. uye vanhu vakatya yeahoh. ipapo hagai, nhume yayeahoh, akasvitsa shoko iri rayeahoh kuvanhu achiti, “ndinemi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. naizvozvo yeahoh akamutsa mweya wazerubhabheri mwanakomana washearitieri, mubati weyeahudha, uye nomweya wayeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki, muprista mukuru, uye nomweya wavanhu vose vakanga vasara. vakauya vakatanga kushanda paimba yayeahoh wamasimba ose, allah wavo, pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi wechitanhatu mugore rechipiri ramambo dhariasi.

2

pazuva ramakumi maviri nerimwe romwedzi wechinomwe, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika nokuna muprofita hagai richiti, “taura nazerubhabheri mwanakomana washearitieri, mubati weyeahudha, kuna yeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki muprista mukuru, nokuvanhu vakasara. uvabvunze kuti, ‘ndiani pakati penyu vakasara akaona imba ino pakubwinya kwayo kwokutanga? munoionawo sei zvino? pakuona kwenyu haina kuita sapasina here? asi zvino chiva nesimba, iwe zerubhabheri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘iva nesimba, iwe yeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki, muprista mukuru. ivai nesimba, imi mose vanhu venyika,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘uye mushande. nokuti ndinemi,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ‘ndiro shoko resungano yandakaita nemi, nguva yamakabuda kubvira muijipiti. uye mweya wangu uchagara pakati penyu. musatya.’ “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘munguva shoma shoma, ndichazungunusa matenga nenyika, negungwa nenyika yakaoma. ndichazungunusa ndudzi dzose, uye zvinodikanwa nendudzi dzose zvichauya, uye ndichazadza imba ino nokubwinya,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ‘sirivha ndeyangu negoridhe nderangu,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ‘kubwinya kweimba iripo nhasi kuchapfuura kubwinya kweyokutanga,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ‘uye panzvimbo ino ndichauyisa rugare,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.” pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi wechipfumbamwe, mugore rechipiri radhariasi, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kumuprofita hagai, richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘bvunza vaprista kuti murayiro unorevei: kana munhu akatakura nyama tsvene mumupendero wenguo yake, uye mupendero ukagunzva chingwa kana nyama yakabikwa, kana waini, kana mafuta kana zvimwe zvokudya, zvichava zvitsvene here?’ ” vaprista vakapindura vakati, “kwete.” ipapo hagai akapindura akati, “kana munhu asvibiswa nokubata kwaaita chitunha, akabata chimwe chaizvozvi, ko, chingasvibiswa here?” vaprista vakapindura vakati, “hongu chinosvibiswa.” ipapo hagai akapindura akati, “ ‘ndizvo zvakaita vanhu ava norudzi urwu pamberi pangu,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. ‘zvose zvavanoita uye zvose zvavanopa sechibayiro ipapo zvakasvibiswa. “ ‘zvino fungisisai, kubvira pazuva ranhasi, muchidzokera shure, chimbofungai zvazvakanga zvakaita ibwe rimwe richigere kuiswa pamusoro perimwe ibwe mutemberi yayeahoh. munhu aiti kana achinge asvika pamurwi wezviyero makumi maviri, paingova negumi chete. munhu aiti kana asvika pachisviniro chewaini achida kuchera zviyero makumi mashanu, kwaingova nezviyero makumi maviri chete. ndakarova mabasa ose amaoko enyu nenyunje, nokuvhuvha nechimvuramabwe, asi hamuna kutendeukira kwandiri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. kubvira pazuva ranhasi zvichienda mberi, kubvira pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi wepfumbamwe, fungisisai zuva riya rakateyiwa nheyo dzetemberi yayeahoh. fungisisai izvozvo: ko, muchine mbeu yakasara mudura here? kusvikira zvino, muzambiringa nomuonde, mutamba nomuorivhi hazvina kubereka michero. “ ‘kubvira pazuva ranhasi ndichakuropafadzai.’ ” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna hagai kechipiri pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi richiti, “udza zerubhabheri mubati weyeahudha kuti ndichazungunusa matenga nenyika. ndichawisira pasi zvigaro zvoushe uye ndichaparadza simba roushe hwavatorwa. ndichawisira pasi ngoro navafambisi vadzo; mabhiza navatasvi vawo zvichawira pasi, mumwe nomumwe nomunondo wehama yake. “ ‘pazuva iroro,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘ndichakutora iwe, muranda wangu, zerubhabheri mwanakomana washearitieri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘uye ndichakuita sechisimbiso changu, nokuti ndakakusarudza,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.”

zechariah

1

“mumwedzi worusere wegore rechipiri radhariasi, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna muprofita zekariyeah mwanakomana wabherekia, mwanakomana waidho richiti: “yeahoh akatsamwira madzibaba enyu zvikuru. naizvozvo udza vanhu kuti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘dzokerai kwandiri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘neni ndichadzokera kwamuri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. musaita samadzibaba enyu, avo vakaudzwa navaprofita vokutanga kuti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘dzokai kubva panzira dzenyu dzakaipa nepazvakaipa zvamunoita.’ asi havana kunzwa kana kuteerera kwandiri, ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. aripiko madzibaba enyu zvino? uye vaprofita vacho, vanorarama zvandakarayira nokusingaperi here? asi mashoko angu nemitemo yangu, zvandakarayira varanda vangu ivo vaprofita, hazvina kurarama kupfuura madzibaba enyu here? “ipapo vakatendeuka ndokuti, ‘yeahoh wamasimba ose akatiitira zvakafanira mabasa edu nenzira dzedu, sezvaakafunga kuita.’ ” pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi wegumi nomumwe, mwedzi weshebhati, mugore rechipiri radhariasi, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna muprofita zekariyeah mwanakomana wabherekia mwanakomana waidho. panguva dzousiku ndakaona chiratidzo, hapo pamberi pangu paiva nomurume akanga akatasva bhiza dzvuku! akanga akamira pakati pemiti yaiva mumupata. shure kwake kwaiva namabhiza matsvuku, mashava uye namachena. ipapo ndakati, “izvi zviiko, ishe wangu?” mutumwa akanga achitaura neni akapindura akati, “ndichakuratidza kuti zvii.” ipapo murume akanga amire pakati pemiti yemitire akatsanangura achiti, “ava ndivo vakatumwa nayeahoh kuti vaende munyika yose.” uye vakapindura mutumwa wayeahoh akanga akamira pakati pemiti yemitire vachiti, “taenda munyika yose tikaona nyika yose yakazorora uye ino runyararo.” ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akati, “yeahoh wamasimba ose muchasvika rinhiko musinganzwiri jerusarema namaguta eyeahudha tsitsi amakatsamwira kwamakore makumi manomwe aya?” saka yeahoh akataura mashoko akanaka anonyaradza kumutumwa akataura neni. ipapo mutumwa aitaura neni akati, “danidzira shoko iri rokuti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘ndine godo kwazvo pamusoro pejerusarema nezioni, asi ndakatsamwira zvikuru ndudzi dzinoti dzakagarika. ndakanga ndakatsamwa zvishoma, asi ivo vakawedzera padambudziko iri.’ “naizvozvo, zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘ndichadzokera kujerusarema ndine tsitsi, uye ipapo imba yangu ichavakwazve. uye rwodzi rwokuyera ruchatambanudzwa pamusoro pejerusarema,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “danidzirazve uti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘maguta angu achafashukirazve noupfumi, uye yeahoh achanyaradzazve zioni uye agosarudza jerusarema.’ ” ipapo ndakasimudza meso angu, zvino hapo pamberi pangu paiva nenyanga ina! ndakabvunza mutumwa aitaura neni ndikati, “zviiko izvi?” akandipindura achiti, “idzi inyanga dzakaparadzira yeahudha, israeri nejerusarema.” ipapo yeahoh akandiratidza mhizha ina. ndakabvunza ndikati, “ko, ava vari kuuya kuzoitei?” akapindura akati, “idzi ndidzo nyanga dzakaparadzira yeahudha kuti pashayikwe kana mumwe angasimudza musoro wake, asi mhizha dzauya kuzodzityisa uye kuti dzigokanda pasi nyanga idzi dzendudzi dzakasimudza nyanga dzadzo kuti dzirwise nyika yeyeahudha kuti dziparadzire vanhu vayo.”

2

ipapo ndakasimudza meso angu, zvino hapo pamberi pangu paiva nomurume aiva nerwodzi rwokuyeresa muruoko rwake! ndakabvunza ndikati, “uri kuendepiko?” akandipindura achiti, “kunoyera jerusarema, kuti ndione kufara kwaro nokureba kwaro.” ipapo mutumwa aitaura neni akaenda, uye mumwe mutumwa akauya kuzosangana naye uye akati kwaari: “mhanya undoudza jaya iro kuti, ‘jerusarema richava guta risina masvingo nokuda kwokuwanda kwavanhu nezvipfuwo zviri mariri. uye ini pachangu ndichava rusvingo rwomoto rwakarikomberedza,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, ‘uye ndichava kubwinya kwaro mukati maro.’ “uyai! uyai! tizai kubva kunyika yokumusoro,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “nokuti ndakakuparadzirai kumhepo ina dzedenga,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “uya, iwe zioni! tiza, iwe unogara mumwanasikana webhabhironi!” nokuti zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, “mushure mokunge andikudza uye andituma kundorwisa ndudzi dzakakupambai, nokuti ani naani anokubatai anobata mboni yeziso rake, zvirokwazvo ndichasimudza ruoko rwangu kuti ndivarwise kuitira kuti nhapwa dzavo dzigovapamba. ipapo muchaziva kuti yeahoh wamasimba ose akandituma. “pembera uye ufare, iwe mwanasikana wezioni. nokuti ndiri kuuya, uye ndichagara pakati penyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndudzi zhinji dzichabatana nayeahoh pazuva iro uye vachava vanhu vangu. ndichagara pakati penyu uye muchaziva kuti yeahoh wamasimba ose akandituma kwamuri. yeahudha ichava nhaka yayeahoh somugove wake munyika tsvene uye achasarudzazve jerusarema. nyararai pamberi payeahoh, vanhu vose, nokuti asimuka kubva panzvimbo yake tsvene yaanogara.”

3

ipapo akandiratidza yeahoshua muprista mukuru amire pamberi pomutumwa wayeahoh, uye satani amire kurudyi rwake kuti amupomere. yeahoh akati kuna satani, “yeahoh ngaakutuke iwe, satani! yeahoh, iye akasarudza jerusarema, ngaakutuke! ko, murume uyu haazi rukuni runobvira rwabvutwa mumoto here?” zvino yeahoshua akanga akapfeka nguo dzine tsvina amire pamberi pomutumwa. mutumwa akati kuna avo vakanga vamire pamberi pake, “mubvisei nguo dzake dzine tsvina.” ipapo akati kuna yeahoshua, “tarira ndabvisa chivi chako, uye ndichakupfekedza nguo dzinokosha.” ipapo ndakati, “isai nguwani yakachena pamusoro wake.” nokudaro vakamupfekedza nguwani yakachena pamusoro wake uye vakamupfekedza nguo, mutumwa wayeahoh amirepo. mutumwa wayeahoh akarayira yeahoshua achiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘kana ukafamba nenzira dzangu uye ukachengeta mirayiro yangu, ipapo uchatonga imba yangu uye uchachengetawo mavazhe angu, uye ndichakupa nzvimbo pakati paava vakamira pano. “ ‘teerera, iwe yeahoshua muprista mukuru navanobata pamwe chete newe vagere pamberi pako, varume ava vanova chiratidzo chezvinouya: ndichauyisa muranda wangu, davi. tarirai ibwe randaisa pamberi payeahoshua! pane maziso manomwe pabwe rimwe chete iroro, uye ndichatema chinyorwa pariri,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘uye ndichabvisa chivi chenyika ino nezuva rimwe chete. “ ‘pazuva iro mumwe nomumwe wenyu achakoka muvakidzani wake kuzogara pasi pomuzambiringa napasi pomuonde wake,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose.”

4

ipapo mutumwa akataura neni akauyazve kwandiri akandimutsa, somunhu anomutswa pahope dzake. akandibvunza achiti, “unooneiko?” ndakapindura ndikati, “ndinoona chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rizere, chine mbiya pamusoro pacho nemwenje minomwe pamusoro pacho, mwenje mumwe nomumwe une mbombi nomwe. uyezve pane miti miviri yemiorivhi parutivi pacho, mumwe kurutivi rworudyi rwembiya nomumwe kurutivi rworuboshwe kwayo.” ndakabvunza mutumwa aitaura ndichiti, “izvi zviiko, ishe wangu?” akapindura akati, “hauzivi kuti izvi zvii?” ini ndakapindura ndichiti, “kwete, ishe wangu.” saka akati kwandiri, “iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh kuna zerubhabheri: ‘hazviitwi nehondo kana nesimba, asi nomweya wangu,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “uri chiiko, iwe gomo guru? pamberi pazerubhabheri uchaitwa bani. ipapo iye achabudisa ibwe rokumusoro vanhu vachidanidzira vachiti, ‘allah ngaariropafadze! allah ngaariropafadze!’ ” ipapo shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “maoko azerubhabheri akateya nheyo dzetemberi ino; maoko ake achaipedzisazve. ipapo uchaziva kuti yeahoh wamasimba ose akandituma kwauri. “ndiani anoshora zuva rezvinhu zviduku? vanhu vachafara pavachaona rwodzi rwokuyera muruoko rwazerubhabheri. “(zvinomwe izvi ndizvo maziso ayeahoh, anoona nyika yose.)” ipapo ndakabvunza mutumwa ndichiti, “ko, miti yemiorivhi miviri iyi iri kurudyi nokuruboshwe kwechigadziko chomwenje ndeyei?” uyezve ndakamubvunza kuti, “ko, matavi aya maviri omuorivhi parutivi pembombi mbiri dzegoridhe dzinodurura mafuta egoridhe ndeei?” akapindura akati, “hauzivi kuti izvi zvii?” ini ndikati, “kwete, ishe wangu.” saka akati, “ava ndivo vaviri vakazodzwa kuti vashumire ishe wenyika yose.”

5

ndakatarisazve ndikaona, hapo pamberi pangu paiva norugwaro rwakapetwa rwaibhururuka! akandibvunza akati, “unooneiko?” ndakapindura ndikati, “ndinoona rugwaro rwakapetwa rwuri kubhururuka, rwakareba makubhiti makumi maviri nokufara makubhiti gumi.” uye iye akati kwandiri, “uku ndiko kutuka kunobuda pamusoro penyika yose; nokuti sezvazvakanyorwa kune rimwe divi, mbavha imwe neimwe ichaparadzwa, uye sezvazvakanyorwa kune rimwe divi racho, mumwe nomumwe anopika zvenhema achaparadzwa. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘ndichabudisa kutuka, uye kuchapinda muimba yembavha nomumba mouyo anopika nhema nezita rangu. kucharamba kuri mumba make uye kuchaparadza zvose mapango namabwe ayo.’ ” ipapo mutumwa akanga achitaura neni akaswedera kwandiri akati, “simudza meso ako uone kuti ichi chii chiri kubuda apo.” ndakabvunza ndikati, “chiiko?” akapindura akati, “iri idengu rokuyeresa.” uye akatizve, “ichi ndicho chitadzo chavanhu vari munyika yose.” ipapo hwidibiro yomutobvu yakasimudzwa, uye mukadzi akanga akagara mudengu imomo! mutumwa akati, “uyu ndiye zvakaipa,” achibva amusundidzira zvakare mudengu uye ndokuzarira muromo wedengu nehwidibiro yomutobvu. ipapo ndakasimudza meso angu ndikaona, hapo pamberi pangu paiva navakadzi vaviri, mhepo iri mumapapiro avo! vaiva namapapiro anenge mapapiro edambiramurove, uye vakasimudza dengu vakaenda naro mudenga pakati pedenga nenyika. ndakabvunza mutumwa akanga achitaura neni ndikati, “vari kuriendesa kupiko, dengu?” akapindura akati, “kunyika yebhabhironi kundorivakira imba. kana yapera, dengu richaiswa imomo panzvimbo yaro.”

6

ndakasimudzazve meso angu ndikaona, hapo pamberi pangu paiva nengoro ina dzaibuda kubva pakati pamakomo maviri, makomo endarira! ngoro yokutanga yakanga ine mabhiza matsvuku, yechipiri ine matema, yechitatu ine machena uye yechina ine mapfumbu, ose aiva nesimba. ndakabvunza mutumwa akanga achitaura neni ndikati, “zviiko izvi, ishe wangu?” mutumwa akandipindura akati, “iyi ndiyo mweya mina yokudenga, inobuda payakanga imire pamberi paishe wenyika yose. ine mabhiza matema iri kuenda kunyika yokumusoro, ine mabhiza machena iri kuenda kumadokero, uye ine mabhiza mapfumbu iri kuenda kunyika yezasi.” mabhiza ane simba paakabuda akanga achitsvaka kuti aende nomunyika yose. uye iye akati, “endai munyika yose!” saka akaenda nomunyika yose. ipapo akadanidzira kwandiri achiti, “tarira, ayo anoenda kunyika yokumusoro, apa mweya wangu zororo munyika yokumusoro.” shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “tora sirivha negoridhe kubva kuvatapwa vanoti heridhai, natobhiya uye najedhaya, vasvika vachibva kubhabhironi. enda, zuva rimwe chetero, kuimba yajosia mwanakomana wazefania. tora sirivha negoridhe ugadzire korona, uye ugoidzika pamusoro womuprista mukuru, yeahoshua mwanakomana wajehozadhaki. muudze kuti zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ‘houno murume anonzi davi, achakura panzvimbo yake uye achavaka temberi yayeahoh. ndiye achavaka temberi yayeahoh, uye achapfekedzwa ukuru agogara achitonga pachigaro chake. uye achava muprista pachigaro chake. uye pachava norugare pakati pezviviri izvi.’ korona ichapiwa kuna heridhai, natobhiya, najedhaya uye naheni mwanakomana wazefania sechiyeuchidzo mutemberi yayeahoh. avo vari kure vachauya kuzobatsira kuvaka temberi yayeahoh, uye iwe uchaziva kuti yeahoh wamasimba ose andituma kwauri. izvi zvichaitika kana ukateerera zvakanaka yeahoh allah wako.”

7

mugore rechina ramambo dhariasi, shoko rayeahoh rakasvika kuna zekariyeah pazuva rechina romwedzi wepfumbamwe, mumwedzi wekisirevhi. vanhu vebhetieri vakanga vatuma sharezeri naregemi-mereki, pamwe chete navanhu vavo, kuti vaende kuna yeahoh kundokumbira kuvaprista veimba yayeahoh wamasimba ose nokuvaprofita vachiti, “ndochema nokutsanya nomwedzi wechishanu here, sezvandakaita kwamakore mazhinji aya?” ipapo shoko rayeahoh wamasimba ose rakasvika kwandiri richiti, “bvunza vanhu vose venyika uye navaprista kuti, ‘pamakatsanya uye mukachema mumwedzi wechishanu nowechinomwe kwamakore makumi manomwe akapfuura, makatsanyira ini zvechokwadi here? uye pamaidya nokunwa, makanga musingangozvifadzi here? aya haasiwo here mashoko ayeahoh akaparidzwa kubudikidza navaprofita vekare, jerusarema namaguta aro akaripoteredza parakanga riri parugare uye richibudirira, uye nyika yenegevhi nomujinga mezvikomo zvokumavirira muchakagarwa navanhu?’ ” uye shoko rayeahoh rakasvikazve kuna zekariyeah richiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose, ‘tongai nokururamisira kwezvokwadi; muitirane tsitsi nenyasha. musamanikidza chirikadzi kana nherera, mutorwa kana murombo. musafungirana zvakaipa mumwoyo menyu.’ “asi vakaramba kuteerera; mukuzvikudza vakafuratira uye vakadzivira nzeve dzavo. vakaomesa mwoyo yavo sedombo romusarasara uye vakasateerera kumurayiro kana kumashoko ayeahoh wamasimba ose aakanga atuma nomweya wake kubudikidza navaprofita vekare. saka yeahoh wamasimba ose akatsamwa zvikuru. “ ‘pandakadana, havana kuteerera; saka pavakadana, handina kuvateerera,’ ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. ‘ndakavaparadzira nechamupupuri pakati pendudzi dzose, uko kwavakava vatorwa. nyika yakava dongo shure kwavo zvokuti hapana aizogona kupinda kana kubudamo. izvi ndizvo zvavakaita kunyika yaifadza, ikava dongo.’ ”

8

shoko rayeahoh wamasimba ose rakasvikazve kwandiri richiti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “ndine godo kwazvo pamusoro pezioni; ndiri kutsva negodo pamusoro paro.” zvanzi nayeahoh: “ndichadzokera kuzioni uye ndichagara mujerusarema. ipapo jerusarema richanzi guta rezvokwadi, uye gomo rayeahoh wamasimba ose richanzi gomo dzvene.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “varume navakadzi vakwegura vachagarazve mumigwagwa yejerusarema, mumwe nomumwe aine mudonzvo muruoko nokuda kwokukwegura kwake. migwagwa yeguta ichazara navakomana navasikana vanotambamo.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “zvingaita sezvinoshamisa kuna vakasara vavanhu ava panguva iyoyo, asi zvichaita sezvinoshamisa here kwandiri?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “ndichaponesa vanhu vangu kubva kunyika dzokumabvazuva nedzokumavirira. ndichavadzosazve kuti vazogara mujerusarema; vachava vanhu vangu, uye ndichava akatendeka uye akarurama kwavari saallah wavo.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “imi munonzwa mashoko aya iye zvino, akataurwa navaprofita vaivapo nheyo dzemba yayeahoh wamasimba ose padzakateyiwa, maoko enyu ngaasimbe kuti temberi igovakwa. nguva iyoyo isati yasvika kwakanga kusina munhu aishandira mubayiro kana chipfuwo. hapana aienda kundoita basa rake norugare nokuda kwomuvengi wake, nokuti ndakanga ndarwisanisa munhu wose nomuvakidzani wake. asi zvino handichazoitiri vanhu ava vakasara sezvandakaita pamazuva akare,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “mbeu ichakura zvakanaka, muzambiringa uchabereka zvibereko zvawo, nyika ichabereka zvirimwa zvayo, uye matenga achaburutsa dova rawo. ndichapa zvinhu zvose izvi senhaka kuna vakasara vavanhu ava. sezvamaiva chinhu chakatukwa pakati pendudzi, imi yeahudha neisraeri, saizvozvo ndichakuponesai, uye muchava chinhu chinoropafadza. musatya, asi itai kuti maoko enyu asimbe.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “sezvandakanga ndafunga kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro penyu, uye ndikasaitira madzibaba enyu tsitsi paakanditsamwisa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “saka zvino ndafunga kuita zvakanakazve kujerusarema neyeahudha. musatya. izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvamunofanira kuita: tauriranai chokwadi, uye tongai nezvokwadi uye nokururamisira mumatare enyu usarongera muvakidzani wako zvakaipa, uye usafarira kupika nhema. ndinovenga zvose izvi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. shoko rayeahoh wamasimba ose rakasvikazve kwandiri richiti: zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “kutsanya kwomwedzi wechina, wechishanu, wechinomwe nowegumi kuchava nguva dzomufaro nokupembera, nemitambo yomufaro kuna yeahudha. naizvozvo mude zvokwadi norugare.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “vanhu vazhinji navagari vomumaguta mazhinji vachauyazve, uye vagari vomune rimwe guta vachaenda kune rimwe vachinoti, ‘ngatiendei nokuchimbidza kundokumbira nyasha kuna yeahoh, nokutsvaka yeahoh wamasimba ose. ini pachangu ndiri kuenda.’ uye vanhu vazhinji nendudzi dzine simba vachauya kujerusarema kuzotsvaka yeahoh wamasimba ose nokukumbira nyasha kwaari.” zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “mumazuva iwayo varume gumi kubva kundimi dzose nendudzi dzose vachabatirira kwazvo pamupendero wenguo yomuyeahudha vachiti, ‘ngatiendei tose, nokuti takanzwa kuti allah anewe.’ ”

9

shoko rayeahoh rinorwisana nenyika yehadhiraki uye richagara pamusoro pedhamasiko, nokuti meso avanhu naamarudzi ose eisraeri ari pana yeahoh, uye napamusoro pehamatiwo, rakaganhurana naro, uye napamusoro petire nesidhoni, kunyange zvazvo vane unyanzvi kwazvo. tire yakazvivakira nhare; yakaunganidza sirivha seguruva uye goridhe samarara omumugwagwa. asi ishe achatora upfumi hwayo uye achaparadzira simba rayo pagungwa, uye ichaparadzwa nomoto. ashikeroni richazviona, rigotya; gaza richatambura mukurwadziwa, neekironiwo, nokuti tariro yaro ichapera. gaza richarasikirwa namambo waro uye ashikeroni haringavi navanhu. vatorwa vachagara paashidhodhi, uye ndichaparadza kuzvikudza kwavafiristia. ndichabvisa ropa pamiromo yavo, kudya kusingabvumirwi pakati pamazino avo. vaya vakasara vachava vanhu vaallah wedu uye vachava vatungamiri muyeahudha, uye ekironi achava savajebhusi. asi ndichadzivirira imba yangu pavarwi vanoirwisa. hapachazovazve nomumanikidzi angakunda vanhu vangu, nokuti zvino ndiri kugara ndakatarira. fara kwazvo, iwe mwanasikana wezioni! danidzira, mwanasikana wejerusarema! tarira, mambo wako anouya kwauri, iye akarurama uye ano ruponeso, anozvininipisa akatasva mbongoro, iyo mhuru, mwana wembongoro. ndichabvisa ngoro kuna efuremu, namabhiza ehondo kujerusarema, uye uta hwehondo huchavhunwa. achaparidzira ndudzi rugare. ushe hwake huchabva kugungwa huchisvika kugungwa, uye kubva kurwizi kusvika kumigumo yenyika. kana uriwe, nokuda kweropa resungano yangu newe, ndichasunungura vasungwa vako kubva pagomba risina mvura. dzokerai kunhare yenyu, imi vasungwa vetariro; kunyange iye zvino ndichazivisa kuti ndichadzorera kwamuri zvakapetwa kaviri. ndichakunga yeahudha sendinokunga uta hwangu, uye ndichaizadza naefuremu. ndichamutsa vanakomana vako, iwe zioni, kuti varwise vanakomana vako, iwe girisi; uye ndichakuita somunondo wemhare. ipapo yeahoh achaonekwa pamusoro pavo; museve wake uchapenya semheni. ishe yeahoh acharidza hwamanda; achafamba mudutu rezasi. uye yeahoh wamasimba ose achavadzivirira. vachaparadza uye vachakunda nezvimviriri. vachanwa vagoomba sevanwa waini; vachazara sembiya dzinoshandiswa pakusasa makona earitari. yeahoh allah wavo achavaponesa pazuva iroro seboka ravanhu vake, vachavaima munyika yake samabwe anokosha ari mukorona. kuyevedza kwavo nokunaka kwavo kuchava kukuru sei! zviyo zvichaita kuti majaya abudirire, uye waini itsva kumhandara.

10

kumbirai kuna yeahoh mvura yomunakamwe; yeahoh ndiye anogadzira makore edutu. anonayisa mvura kuvanhu, uye anopa zvirimwa zveminda kuno mumwe nomumwe. zvifananidzo zvinotaura zvounyengeri, vavuki vanoona zviratidzo zvenhema; vanotaura zviroto zvenhema, vanopa varaidzo pasina. nokudaro vanhu vanodzungaira samakwai anomanikidzwa nokuda kwokushayiwa mufudzi. “kutsamwa kwangu kunomukira vafudzi, uye ndicharova vatungamiri, nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose achava nehanya namakwai ake, imba yayeahudha, uye achavaita sebhiza rinodadisa pakurwa. muna yeahudha muchabva ibwe rapakona, kubva maari mbambo yetende, kubva maari uta hwehondo, kubva maari vatungamiri vose. pamwe chete vachava savarume voumhare vanotsika migwagwa ina matope pakurwa. nokuti yeahoh anavo, vacharwa vachakunda vatasvi vamabhiza. “ndichasimbisa imba yayeahudha uye ndichaponesa imba yayosefa. ndichavadzosa nokuti ndinovanzwira tsitsi. vachava savanhu vandakanga ndisina kuramba, nokuti ndini yeahoh allah wavo uye ndichavapindura. vaefuremu vachava semhare, uye mwoyo yavo ichafara sevakabatwa newaini. vana vavo vachazviona uye vachapembera; mwoyo yavo ichafara muna yeahoh. ndichaninira kwavari ndigovaunganidza. zvirokwazvo ndichavadzikinura, vachava vakawanda sakare. kunyange ndikavaparadzira pakati pamarudzi, kunyange zvakadaro vachandirangarira vari kunyika dziri kure. ivo navana vavo vachararama, uye vachadzoka. ndichavauyisa kubva kuijipiti uye ndichavaunganidza kubva kuasiria. ndichavauyisa kugireadhi nokurebhanoni, uye hakungazovi nenzvimbo yavanokwana. vachapfuura napagungwa rokutambudzika; mafungu egungwa achaderedzwa uye pakadzika pose muna nairi pachapwa. kuzvikudza kweasiria kuchaparadzwa uye tsvimbo youshe yeijipiti ichabviswa. ndichavasimbisa muna yeahoh uye muzita rake vachafamba,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh.

11

zarura mikova yako, iwe rebhanoni, kuti moto uparadze misidhari yako! ungudza, iwe muti womupaini, nokuti musidhari wawa, miti yakaisvonaka yaparadzwa! ungudzai, imi miouki yebhashani, nokuti dondo resango ratemwa! inzwai kuungudza kwavafudzi; mafuro avo akapfuma aparadzwa! inzwai kuomba kweshumba, sango rinoyevedza rejorodhani raparadzwa! zvanzi nayeahoh allah wangu: “fudzai makwai akagadzirirwa kundobayiwa. vatengi vawo vanoabaya vagoenda nawo vasina kurangwa. avo vanoatengesa vanoti, ‘yeahoh ngaakudzwe, ndapfuma!’ vafudzi vawo havangaaponesi. nokuti handichazonzwirizve vanhu venyika tsitsi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichaisa mumwe nomumwe kumuvakidzani wake uye kuna mambo wake. vachamanikidza nyika, uye handingavanunuri kubva pamaoko avo.” saka ndakafudza makwai akatsaurirwa kundobayiwa kunyanya ainzwisa urombo. ipapo ndakatora tsvimbo mbiri ndikatumidza imwe kuti nyasha uye imwe kubatana, uye ndakafudza makwai. mumwedzi mumwe chete ndakadzinga vafudzi vatatu. boka rakandivenga, uye ndakatanga kuneta naro uye ndikati, “handichazovi mufudzi wenyu. regai makwai ari kufa afe, neari kuparara aparare. regai ayo akasara adyanane nyama.” ipapo ndakatora tsvimbo yangu yainzi nyasha ndikaivhuna, ndichiputsa sungano yandakanga ndaita nendudzi dzose. yakaputswa pazuva iroro, uye makwai airwadziwa akanga akanditarira akaziva kuti raiva shoko rayeahoh. ndakaaudza kuti, “kana muchiona zvakanaka, ndipei muripo wangu, asi kana zvisina, uchengetei.” nokudaro vakandipa mubayiro wangu wamakumi matatu esirivha. yeahoh akati kwandiri, “ikande kumuumbi wehari, muripo wakanaka wavakanditenga nawo!” saka ndakatora makumi matatu esirivha aya ndikaakanda muimba yayeahoh kumuumbi wehari. ipapo ndakavhuna tsvimbo yangu yechipiri inonzi kubatana ndichiputsa ukama hwakanga huripo pakati peyeahudha neisraeri. ipapo yeahoh akati kwandiri, “torazve nhumbi dzomufudzi benzi. nokuti ndichamutsa mufudzi panyika asingazovi nehanya neakarasika, kana kutsvaka makwayana, kana kurapa akakuvadzwa, kana kufudza akasimba, asi achadya nyama yamakwai akakora uye achabvambura mahwanda awo. “ane nhamo mufudzi asina maturo anosiya makwai! munondo ngaubaye ruoko rwake uye neziso rake rokurudyi! ruoko rwake ngaruome zvachose, ziso rake rokurudyi ripofumadzwe zvachose!”

12

iri ndiro shoko rayeahoh pamusoro peisraeri. yeahoh, iye anotatamura matenga, anoteya nheyo dzenyika, uye anoumba mweya womunhu uri mukati make, anoti: “ndichaita kuti jerusarema rive mukombe uchadzedzeresa ndudzi dzose dzavanhu vakapoteredza. yeahudha ichakombwa pamwe chete nejerusarema. pazuva iro, ndudzi dzose dzenyika padzichaungana kuti dzirirwise, ndichaita kuti jerusarema rive ibwe risingazungunuswi kundudzi dzose. vose vachaedza kurizungunusa vachazvikuvadza. pazuva iro ndicharova bhiza rimwe nerimwe nokutya uye mutasvi waro nokupenga,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndicharamba ndakatarira paimba yayeahudha, asi ndichapofumadza mabhiza ose endudzi. ipapo vatungamiri veyeahudha vachati mumwoyo yavo, ‘vanhu vejerusarema vakasimba, nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose ndiye allah wavo.’ “pazuva iro ndichaita kuti vatungamiri veyeahudha vaite segango pakati pehuni, uye sezhenje romoto pakati pezvisote. vachaparadza kurudyi nokuruboshwe ndudzi dzose dzavanhu vakapoteredza, asi jerusarema richaramba riri panzvimbo paro. “yeahoh achaponesa misha yeyeahudha kutanga, kuitira kuti kukudzwa kweimba yadhavhidhi uye nokwavagari vomujerusarema kurege kupfuura kweyeahudha. pazuva iroro yeahoh achadzivirira vaya vagere mujerusarema, zvokuti anoshayiwa simba pakati pavo achava sadhavhidhi, uye imba yadhavhidhi ichava saallah, somutumwa wayeahoh anoenda pamberi pavo. pazuva iroro ndichaenda kundoparadza ndudzi dzose dzinorwisa jerusarema. “uye ndichadurura mweya wenyasha newokunyengetera paimba yadhavhidhi uye napavagari vejerusarema. vachatarisa kwandiri, iye wavakabaya, uye vachamuchema souya anochema mwana wake mumwe oga, uye vachachema kwazvo souya anochema mwanakomana wedangwe. pazuva iro mujerusarema muchava nokuchema kukuru sokuchema kwehadhadhi rimoni mubani remegidho. nyika ichachema, mhuri imwe neimwe iri yoga, nevakadzi vavo vari voga: mhuri yeimba yarevhi navakadzi vavo, mhuri yashimei navakadzi vavo, uye nedzimwe mhuri dzose navakadzi vavo.

13

“pazuva iro imba yadhavhidhi navagari vomujerusarema, vachadziurirwa chitubu kuti vanatswe kubva pachivi nokusachena. “pazuva iro, ndichabvisa mazita ezvifananidzo panyika, uye haangazorangarirwizve,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose! “ndichabvisa zvose vaprofita nemweya wokusachena panyika. uye kana pana ani zvake acharamba achiprofita, baba vake namai vake vakamubereka, vachati kwaari, ‘unofanira kufa, nokuti wakareva nhema muzita rayeahoh.’ paachaprofita, vabereki vake vachamubaya. “pazuva iro muprofita mumwe nomumwe achanyara nokuda kwechiratidzo chechiprofita chake. haangazopfeki nguo yemvere yomuprofita kuti anyengere. achati, ‘handisi muprofita. ndiri murimi; ivhu ndiwo upenyu hwangu kubva pauduku hwangu.’ kana mumwe munhu akamubvunza achiti, ‘maronda aya ari pamuviri wako ndeeiko?’ achapindura achiti, ‘maronda andakakuvadzwa paimba yeshamwari dzangu.’ “muka, iwe munondo, urwise mufudzi, urwise munhu ari pedyo neni!” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “rova mufudzi, makwai agopararira, uye ndichasimudza ruoko rwangu kuti rurwise madiki acho. munyika yose,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “zvikamu zviviri muzvitatu zvichaurayiwa zvigoparara; asi chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu ndicho chichasaramo. chikamu chimwe chete ichochi muzvitatu ndichachiisa mumoto; ndichavanatsa sesirivha uye ndichavaedza segoridhe. vachadana kuzita rangu uye ndichavapindura; ndichati, ‘ndivo vanhu vangu.’ uye ivo vachati, ‘yeahoh ndiye allah wedu.’ ”

14

zuva rayeahoh richauya zvawakapamba pazvichagoverwa pakati penyu. ndichaunganidza ndudzi dzose kujerusarema kuti dzirwise; guta richatorwa, dzimba dzigopambwa, uye vakadzi vachachinyiwa. hafu yeguta ichatapwa, asi vamwe vanhu vose havazobviswi muguta. ipapo yeahoh achabuda kuti andorwisa ndudzi idzodzo, sokurwa kwaanoita pazuva rehondo. pazuva iroro tsoka dzake dzichamira pagomo remiorivhi, kumabvazuva kwejerusarema, uye gomo remiorivhi richapamuka napakati kubva kumabvazuva kusvikira kumadokero, pagoita mupata mukuru kwazvo, imwe hafu yegomo ichatsedukira kurutivi rwokumusoro uye imwe hafu ichatsedukira zasi. muchatiza nomumupata wegomo rangu, nokuti uchasvika kuazeri. muchatiza sokutiza kwamakaita pakudengenyeka kwenyika pamazuva auzia mambo weyeahudha. ipapo yeahoh allah wangu achauya, uye navatsvene vose pamwe chete naye. pazuva iroro hakuzovi nechiedza, kutonhora kana chando. richava zuva rakasiyana namamwe, risina nguva dzousiku kana nguva dzamasikati, zuva rinozivikanwa nayeahoh. kana madekwana asvika, chiedza chichavapo. pazuva iroro mvura mhenyu ichayerera ichibuda mujerusarema, hafu kugungwa rokumabvazuva uye imwe hafu kugungwa rokumadokero, muzhizha nomuchando. yeahoh achava mambo panyika yose. pazuva iroro pachava nayeahoh mumwe chete, uye zita rake rigova zita rimwe chete roga. nyika yose kubva kugebha kusvikira kurimoni, nechezasi kwejerusarema, ichava searabha. asi jerusarema richasimudzirwa rigogara panzvimbo paro, kubva kusuo rabhenjamini kusvikira kusuo rokutanga, kusvikirawo kusuo repakona, uye kubva kushongwe yahananeri kusvikira kuzvisviniro zvewaini zvamambo. ichagarwa; haichazoparadzwizve. jerusarema richachengetedzeka. iri ndiro denda yeahoh raacharova naro ndudzi dzose dzakarwisa jerusarema: nyama yavo ichaora vachakamira namakumbo avo, maziso avo achaorera mumakomba awo, uye rurimi rwomumwe nomumwe wavo ruchaorera mumukanwa make. pazuva iroro varume vacharohwa nayeahoh nokutya kukuru. murume mumwe nomumwe achabata ruoko rwomumwe wake, vagorwisana. yeahudhawo icharwa pajerusarema. upfumi hwendudzi dzose dzakakomberedza jerusarema huchatorwa, goridhe rakawanda, sirivha yakawanda nenguo zhinji. denda rakafanana nairori richarova mabhiza namanyurusi, ngamera nembongoro, uye nezvipfuwo zvose zviri mumisasa iyoyo. ipapo vachararama kubva kundudzi dzose dzakarwisa jerusarema vachaenda gore negore kundonamata mambo, yeahoh wamasimba ose, uye nokundopemberera mutambo wamatumba. kana marudzi ose avanhu vapanyika akasaenda kujerusarema kundonamata mambo, yeahoh wamasimba ose, mvura hainganayi munyika dzavo. kana vaijipita vakasaenda uye vakasandonamatawo, mvura hainganayi munyika yavo. yeahoh achauyisa denda pamusoro pavo, denda raanorova naro ndudzi dzisingaendi kundopemberera mutambo wamatumba. ichi ndicho chichava chirango cheijipiti uye nechirango chendudzi dzose dzisingaendi kundopemberera mutambo wamatumba. pazuva iroro pamabhero amabhiza pachanyorwa kuti, utsvene kuna jehovha, uye hari dzokubikira dziri mumba mayeahoh dzichafanana nembiya tsvene dziri pamberi pearitari. hari imwe neimwe iri mujerusarema nomuyeahudha ichava tsvene kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose, uye vose vachauya kuzobayira vachatora dzimwe hari vagodzibikira. uye pazuva iro hakuchazovazve nomukenani muimba yayeahoh wamasimba ose.

malachi

1

chirevo: shoko rayeahoh kuna israeri kubudikidza namaraki. yeahoh anoti, “ndakakudai.” asi imi munobvunza muchiti, “makatida seiko?” yeahoh anoti, “ko, esau akanga asiri mukoma wayaqobho here? asi esau ndakamuvenga, uye ndakashandura makomo ake akava matongo ndikapa nhaka yake kumakava murenje.” edhomu angati, “kunyange takaparadzwa hedu, tichavakazve matongo.” asi zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: “vangavaka havo, asi ndichakoromora. vachanzi nyika yakaipa, vanhu vachagara vakatsamwirwa nayeahoh. muchazvionera nameso enyu mugoti, ‘yeahoh mukuru zvokutopfuura miganhu yeisraeri!’ ” yeahoh wamasimba ose anoti, “mwanakomana anokudza baba vake, uye muranda anokudza tenzi wake. kana ndiri baba, kukudzwa kwangu kuripiko? kana ndiri tenzi, kuremekedzwa kwangu kuripiko? ndimi, iyemi vaprista, munozvidza zita rangu. “asi munobvunza muchiti, ‘takazvidza zita renyu seiko?’ ” “munondivigira zvokudya zvakasvibiswa paaritari yangu. “asi imi munobvunza muchiti, ‘takakusvibisai neiko?’ ” yeahoh wamasimba ose anoti, “pakutaura kwenyu muchiti tafura yayeahoh inozvidzika. pamunouya nezvipfuwo zvakapofumara kuti zvibayirwe, hazvina kuipa here? pamunobayira zvipfuwo zvakaremara kana zvinorwara, hazvina kuipa here? chimboedzai kuzvivigira mubati wenyu! angafadzwa nemi here? angakugamuchirai here?” yeahoh wamasimba ose anoti, “zvino kumbirai allah kuti atiitire nyasha. nezvipo zvakadai zvinobva mumaoko enyu, angakugamuchirai here?” “haiwa, dai mumwe wenyu aipfiga mikova yetemberi, kuitira kuti murege kubatidza moto isina maturo paaritari yangu! handifadzwi nemi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “uye handingagamuchiri zvipiriso zvinobva mumaoko enyu. zita rangu richava guru pakati pendudzi, kubva kumabvazuva kusvikira kumavirira. zvinonhuhwira nezvipiriso zvitsvene zvichauyiswa kuzita rangu munzvimbo dzose, nokuti zita rangu richava guru pakati pendudzi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “asi munoizvidza pamunoti, ‘tafura yayeahoh yakasvibiswa, uye zvokudya zvayo zvakashoreka.’ uye munoti, ‘zvinorema sei!’ uye munoifembedza muchiizvidza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “pamunouyisa zvipfuwo zvakakuvara, zvakaremara kana zvinorwara kuzozvipa sezvibayiro, ndingazvigamuchira kubva pamaoko enyu here?” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ngaatukwe munyengeri ane gondobwe rakanaka pakati pamakwai ake, anopika kuti acharipa, asi agobayira chipfuwo chine chakaipa pachiri kuna ishe. nokuti ndiri mambo mukuru,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “uye zita rangu rinofanira kutyiwa pakati pendudzi.

2

“zvino yambiro iyi ndeyenyu, imi vaprista. kana imi musingateereri, uye kana musingakudzi zita rangu nomwoyo wenyu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “ndichatuma kutukwa pamusoro penyu, uye ndichatuka ropafadzo dzenyu. hongu, ndakadzituka kare, nokuti hamuna kuzvipira nemwoyo yenyu kuti mundikudze. “nokuda kwenyu ndichabvisa zvizvarwa zvenyu; ndichadzura zviso zvenyu nendove inobva pazvibayiro zvemitambo yenyu, uye muchatakurwa pamwe chete nayo. uye muchaziva kuti ndakakutumirai yambiro iyi kuitira kuti sungano yangu narevhi irambe iripo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ndakaita sungano yangu naye, sungano youpenyu norugare, uye ndakapa izvi kwaari; zvakandivigira kukudzwa uye akandikudza, akamira achitya zita rangu. kurayira kwechokwadi kwakanga kuri mumuromo wake, uye chisakarurama hachaiwanikwa pamiromo yake. akafamba neni murugare nomukururama, uye akadzora vazhinji pazvivi. “nokuti muromo womuprista unofanira kuchengeta zivo, uye vanhu vanofanira kutsvaka dzidziso kubva pamuromo wake, nokuti ndiye nhume yayeahoh wamasimba ose. asi imi makatsauka panzira uye nedzidziso yenyu makagumbusa vazhinji; makaputsa sungano narevhi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “nokudaro ndakaita kuti muzvidzwe uye munyadziswe pamberi pavanhu vose, nokuti hamuna kuchengeta nzira dzangu asi makaita rusarura pakutonga kwenyu.” ko, isu tose hatina baba vamwe here? haasi allah mumwe akatisika here? sei tichisvibisa sungano yamadzibaba edu nokusatendeka mumwe kuno mumwe? yeahudha aputsa chitenderano. chinhu chinonyangadza chaitwa muisraeri nomujerusarema: yeahudha asvibisa nzvimbo tsvene yayeahoh, nokuwana mwanasikana wamwari wavatorwa. kumunhu anoita izvi, angava ani zvake, yeahoh ngaamubvise pamatende ayaqobho, kunyange achiuya nezvipo kuna yeahoh wamasimba ose. chimwe chinhu chaunoita: unozadza aritari yayeahoh nemisodzi. unochema uye unoungudza nokuti haacharangariri zvipiriso zvako kana kuzvigamuchira nomufaro kubva pamaoko ako. unobvunza uchiti, “seiko?” nokuda kwokuti yeahoh ndiye chapupu pakati pako nomukadzi woujaya hwako nokuti wakaputsa sungano naye, kunyange ari mumwe wako, mukadzi wawakaita sungano yewaniso naye. yeahoh haana kuvaita mumwe here? panyama nomweya ndevake. uye nemhaka yei mumwe? nokuti aitsvaka rudzi rune umwari. saka zvichenjerere pamweya wako, uye usaputsa sungano nomukadzi woujaya hwako. “ndinovenga kurambana,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh allah weisraeri, “uye ndinovenga murume anofukidza nguo yake nokumanikidza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. saka zvichenjerere pamweya uye usaputsa chitenderano. makanetesa yeahoh namashoko enyu. munoti, “takamunetesa neiko?” pamunoti, “vose vanoita zvakaipa vakanaka pamberi payeahoh, uye anofadzwa navo” kana pamunoti, “aripiko allah wokururamisira?”

3

“tarirai, ndichatuma nhume yangu, uyo achagadzira nzira pamberi pangu. ipapo ishe wamunotsvaka, achasvika pakarepo patemberi yake; mutumwa wesungano, wamunoshuva, achauya,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. asi ndiani angatsunga pazuva rokuuya kwake? ndiani angamira paanoonekwa? nokuti achava somoto womunatsi kana sipo yomusuki. iye achagara somunatsi nomuchenesi wesirivha; achachenesa varevhi uye achavanatsa segoridhe nesirivha. ipapo yeahoh achava navanhu vachamuvigira zvipiriso mukururama, uye zvipiriso zveyeahudha nejerusarema zvichagamuchirwa nayeahoh, sapamazuva akapfuura, sapamakore akare. “saka ndichaswedera kwamuri kuzotonga. ndichakurumidza kupupura ndichipikisa varoyi, mhombwe uye navanopika nhema, navaya vanobiridzira vashandi migove yavo, vanodzvinyirira chirikadzi nenherera uye vasingaruramisiri vatorwa, uye vasingandityi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ini yeahoh handishanduki. saka imi, rudzi rwayaqobho, hamuna kuparadzwa. kubva pamazuva amadzitateguru enyu makatsauka pamitemo yangu uye hamuna kuichengeta. dzokerai kwandiri, uye neni ndichadzokera kwamuri,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “asi munobvunza muchiti, ‘tichadzoka pazvinhu zvipiko?’ “ko, munhu angabire allah here? kunyange zvakadaro munondibira. “asi munobvunza muchiti, ‘tinokubirai pane zvipi?’ “pazvegumi nezvipiriso. makatukwa, rudzi rwenyu rwose, nokuti muri kundibira. uyai nezvegumi zvose kudura, kuti mumba mangu mugova nezvokudya. ndiedzei muna izvozvi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “muone kana ndisingakuzarurirei mawindo okudenga, uye ndigokudururirai maropafadzo mazhinji zvokuti muchashayiwa pokuaisa. ndichadzivisa udyi pakuparadza zvirimwa zvenyu, uye mizambiringa yeminda yenyu haingadonhedzi zvibereko zvayo,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “ipapo ndudzi dzose dzichati makaropafadzwa, nokuti nyika yenyu ichava inofadza,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. yeahoh anoti, “makataura zvinhu zvikukutu pamusoro pangu.” “kunyange zvakadaro munoti, ‘takataureiko pamusoro penyu?’ “imi makati, ‘hazvina maturo kushumira allah. takawaneiko nokuita zvaakarayira uye zvatakafamba savachemi pamberi payeahoh wamasimba ose? asi zvino tinoti vanozvikudza vakaropafadzwa. zvirokwazvo vaiti vezvakaipa vanobudirira uye naivo vaya vanoedza allah vanopunyuka.’ ” ipapo vaya vaitya yeahoh vakataurirana, uye yeahoh akateerera akanzwa. bhuku rechirangaridzo rakanyorwa pamberi pake pamusoro pavanotya yeahoh uye nevanoremekedza zita rake. “vachava vangu,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose, “pazuva randichaunganidza pfuma yangu inokosha. ndichavanzwira tsitsi, somunhu anonzwira tsitsi mwanakomana wake anomushandira. uye muchaonazve musiyano pakati pavakarurama navakaipa, pakati pavaya vanoshumira allah navaya vasingamushumiri.

4

“zvirokwazvo zuva rinouya; richapisa sechoto. vose vanozvikudza navaiti vezvakaipa vachava mashanga, uye zuva iro rinouya richavapisa,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “hapana mudzi kana davi zvichasara. asi kunemi munotya zita rangu, zuva rokururama richabuda rino kuporesa mumapapiro aro. uye muchabuda muchisvetuka semhuru dzabudiswa muchirugu. ipapo muchatsikira pasi vakaipa; vachava madota pasi petsoka dzenyu pazuva iro pandichaita zvinhu izvi,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh wamasimba ose. “rangarirai murayiro womuranda wangu mozisi, mitemo nemirayiro yandakamupa pahorebhi kuti ipiwe vaisraeri vose. “tarirai, ndichakutumirai muprofita eria, zuva iro guru rayeahoh, uye rinotyisa risati rasvika. iye achadzosera mwoyo yamadzibaba kuvana vavo, nemwoyo yavana kumadzibaba avo; kana kuti ndichauya ndigorova nyika nechituko.”

psalms

1

akaropafadzwa munhu asingafambi panorangana vakaipa, asingamiri panzira yavatadzi, asingagari pachigaro chavadadi. asi anofarira murayiro wayeahoh, uye anofungisisa murayiro wake masikati nousiku. akafanana nomuti wakasimwa pahova dzemvura, unobereka michero yawo nenguva yawo, uye mashizha awo haasvavi. chinhu chipi nechipi chaanoita chinoendeka. vakaipa havana kudaro! vakafanana nehundi inopepereswa nemhepo. naizvozvo vakaipa havangamiri pakutongwa, kana vatadzi paungano yavakarurama. nokuti yeahoh anotarira nzira yavakarurama, asi nzira yavakaipa ichaparadzwa.

2

ndudzi dzinoitireiko bope? uye vanhu vanofungireiko zvisina maturo? madzimambo enyika azvigadzirira uye vabati vanoungana pamwe chete kuti vazorwa nayeahoh, uye kuti vazorwisa muzodziwa wake. vanoti, “ngatidamburei ngetani dzavo, tigorasa mabote avo.” iye agere pachigaro choushe chokudenga anoseka; ishe anovadadira. ipapo anovatuka mukutsamwa kwake uye anovavhundutsa muhasha dzake, achiti, “ndakagadza mambo wangu pazioni, gomo rangu dzvene.” ndichaparidza chirevo chayeahoh, ndichiti: iye akati kwandiri, “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu; nhasi ndava baba vako. kumbira kwandiri, uye ndichaita kuti ndudzi dzive nhaka yako, migumo yenyika ive yako. uchavatonga netsvimbo yesimbi; uchavaputsa kuita zvimedu zvimedu sehari.” naizvozvo, imi madzimambo, ngwarai; munyeverwe, imi vabati venyika. shumirai yeahoh nokutya, uye mufare nokudedera. tsvodai mwanakomana, kuti arege kutsamwa mukazoparadzwa munzira yenyu, nokuti hasha dzake dzingakurumidza kumuka. vakaropafadzwa vose vanovanda maari.

3

pisarema radhavhidhi. panguva yaakatiza abhusaromu mwanakomana wake. haiwa yeahoh, vadzivisi vangu vakawanda sei! vakawanda sei vanondimukira! vazhinji vanoti kwandiri, “allah haangamudzikinuri.” sera asi imi yeahoh, muri nhoo yakandipoteredza; munoisa rukudzo pandiri uye munosimudza musoro wangu. kuna yeahoh ndinodana nenzwi guru, uye anondipindura ari pagomo rake dzvene. sera ndinovata pasi ndigokotsira; ndinomukazve, nokuti yeahoh anonditsigira. handizotyi makumi ezviuru vakandikomba kuti vandirwise. simukai, imi yeahoh! ndirwirei, imi allah wangu! rovai vavengi vangu vose pashaya; gurai meno avakaipa. rusununguko runobva kuna yeahoh. maropafadzo enyu ngaave pamusoro pavanhu venyu. sera

4

kumutungamiri wenziyo nemitengeranwa. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndipindurei pandinodana kwamuri, imi allah wangu makarurama. ndisunungurei pakutambudzika kwangu; ndinzwirei ngoni uye munzwe munyengetero wangu. nhai imi vanhu, muchashandura kukudzwa kwangu kukava chinyadziso kusvikira riniko? muchada kutsauswa nokutsvaka vamwari venhema kusvikira riniko? sera zivai kuti yeahoh akazvitsaurira vanomuda; yeahoh achandinzwa pandinodana kwaari. pakutsamwa kwenyu, regai kutadza; pamunenge muri pamibhedha yenyu, nzverai mwoyo yenyu uye munyarare. sera ipai zvibayiro zvakarurama uye muvimbe nayeahoh. vazhinji vanobvunza vachiti, “ndianiko angatiratidza chakanaka?” chiedza chechiso chenyu ngachipenye pamusoro pedu, imi yeahoh. makazadza mwoyo wangu nomufaro mukuru kupfuura zviyo zvavo newaini yavo itsva yakawanda. ndichavata pasi ndigokotsira norugare, nokuti imi moga, yeahoh, munoita kuti ndigare pakasimba.

5

kumutungamiri wokuimba. nenyere. pisarema radhavhidhi. rerekerai nzeve yenyu kumashoko angu, imi yeahoh. rangarirai chikumbiro changu. teererai inzwi rokuchema kwangu, mambo wangu naallah wangu, nokuti ndinonyengetera kwamuri. mangwanani, munonzwa inzwi rangu, imi yeahoh; mangwanani ndinoisa zvikumbiro zvangu pamberi penyu uye ndichimirira netariro. imi hamusi allah anofarira zvakaipa; munhu akaipa haangagari nemi. munhu anozvikudza haangamiri pamberi penyu; munovenga vose vanoita zvakaipa. munoparadza vose vanoreva nhema; vanoteura ropa navanhu vanonyengera, yeahoh anovasema. asi ini, nenyasha dzenyu huru, ndichapinda mumba menyu; norukudzo, ndichakotamira pasi pamberi penyu, ndakatarira kutemberi yenyu tsvene. nditungamirirei, imi yeahoh, mukururama kwenyu nokuda kwavavengi vangu, ruramisai nzira yenyu pamberi pangu. hakuna shoko rinobva mumuromo mavo ringavimbwa naro; mwoyo yavo izere nokuparadza. huro dzavo iguva rakashama; vanotaura zvinonyengera norurimi rwavo. haiwa allah, vapei mhosva! ngavawisirwe pasi nerangano dzavo. vabvisei nokuda kwezvivi zvavo zvizhinji, nokuti vakakumukirai. asi vose vanovanda mamuri ngavafare; ngavagare vachiimba nomufaro. tambanudzirai pamusoro pavo kudzivirira kwenyu, kuitira kuti vaya vanoda zita renyu vafare mamuri. nokuti zvirokwazvo, imi yeahoh, munoropafadza vakarurama; munovakomberedza nenyasha dzenyu sokunge nenhoo.

6

kumutungamiri wokuimba nemitengeranwa. nesheminiti. pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, regai kundirayira mukutsamwa kwenyu, kana kundiranga muhasha dzenyu. ndinzwirei ngoni, yeahoh, nokuti ndava kuziya; haiwa yeahoh, ndiporesei, nokuti mapfupa angu ava kurwadza. mweya wangu uri kurwadziwa. haiwa yeahoh, kusvikira riniko, kusvikira riniko? dzokai, imi yeahoh, mugondirwira; ndiponesei nokuda kworudo rwenyu rusingaperi. hakuna anokurangarirai kana afa. ndiani anokurumbidzai kubva muguva? ndaneta nokugomera; ndinonyorovesa mubhedha wangu nemisodzi ndichichema usiku hwose, ndinonyorovesa uvato hwangu nemisodzi. meso angu aneta nokuchema; haachaoni nokuda kwavavengi vangu vose. ibvai pandiri, imi mose munoita zvakaipa, nokuti yeahoh anzwa kuchema kwangu. yeahoh anzwa kukumbira kwangu nyasha; yeahoh anogamuchira munyengetero wangu. vavengi vangu vose vachanyadziswa uye vachavhundutswa; vachadzokera shure pakarepo mukunyadziswa.

7

rwiyo rwadhavhidhi, rwaakaimbira yeahoh pamusoro pakushi, mubhenjamini. haiwa yeahoh, allah wangu, ndinovanda mamuri; ndiponesei uye mundirwire pane vose vanondidzinganisa, kuti varege kundibvambura seshumba nokundibvambura-bvambura pasina anondinunura. haiwa yeahoh, allah wangu, kana ndichinge ndakaita izvi uye ndine mhosva pamaoko angu, kana ndakaita zvakaipa kuno uya akanga ane rugare neni kana kupamba muvengi wangu pasina mhaka, ipapo muvengi wangu ngaandidzinganise andibate; ngaatsike-tsike upenyu hwangu muvhu uye andivatise muguruva. simukai, imi yeahoh pakutsamwa kwenyu; simukai murwise hasha dzavavengi vangu. simukai, allah wangu; rayirai kururamisira. marudzi akaungana ngaaungane akakupoteredzai. vatongei imi muri kumusoro; yeahoh ngaatonge marudzi. nditongei, imi yeahoh, zvakafanira kururama kwangu, zvakafanira kukwaniswa kwangu, imi wokumusoro-soro. haiwa, allah akarurama, iyemi munonzvera ndangariro nomwoyo, gumisai kuita nesimba kwavakaipa mugoita kuti vakarurama vagare zvakanaka. nhoo yangu ndimi allah wokumusoro-soro, iye anoponesa vane mwoyo yakarurama. allah ndiye mutongi akarurama, iye allah anoratidza hasha dzake zuva nezuva. kana munhu asingatendeuki, iye acharodza munondo wake; achakunga uta hwake agogadzirira. agadzirira zvombo zvake zvinouraya; anozvigadzirira miseve yake inopisa. iye ane mimba yezvakaipa akatakura mimba yokutambudzika achabereka nhema. uyo anochera gomba, akaridzikisa achawira mugomba raachera. zvakashata zvake zvichadzokera pamusoro wake; uye kumanikidza kwake kuchauya pamusoro wake. ndichatenda yeahoh nokuda kwokururama kwake, uye ndichaimbira zita rayeahoh wokumusoro-soro nziyo dzokurumbidza.

8

kumutungamiri wokuimba negititi. pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, ishe wedu, zita renyu rakaisvonaka sei panyika yose! makaisa kubwinya kwenyu kudenga kumusoro. pamiromo yavana navacheche makaisa rumbidzo nokuda kwavavengi venyu, kuti munyaradze muvengi nomutsivi. kana ndichifunga nezvamatenga enyu, iro basa reminwe yenyu, mwedzi nenyeredzi, zvamakarongedza panzvimbo yazvo, munhu chiiko zvamunomufunga, kana mwanakomana womunhu zvamune hanya naye? makamuita muduku zvishoma pana allah, uye mukamushongedza korona yokubwinya nokukudzwa. makamuita mutongi pamusoro pebasa ramaoko enyu; mukaisa zvinhu zvose pasi petsoka dzake: makwai ose nemombe, nemhuka dzesango, neshiri dzedenga, nehove dzegungwa, zvose zvinofamba munzira dzomugungwa. haiwa yeahoh, ishe wedu, zita renyu rakaisvonaka sei panyika yose!

9

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbiro o“kufa kwomwanakomana.” pisarema radhavhidhi. ndichakurumbidzai, imi yeahoh, nomwoyo wangu wose; ndichataura pamusoro pezvishamiso zvenyu zvose. ndichafara nokufarisisa mamuri; ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi wokumusoro-soro. vavengi vangu vanodzokera shure; vanogumburwa uye vanoparara pamberi penyu. nokuti makatsigira kodzero yangu nenyaya yangu; makagara pachigaro chenyu choushe, muchitonga zvakarurama kwazvo. makatuka ndudzi mukaparadza vakaipa; makadzima zita ravo nokusingaperi. kuparadzwa kusina magumo kwakakunda muvengi, makadzura maguta avo; kunyange chiyeuchidzo chavo chakaparara. yeahoh anotonga nokusingaperi; akasimbisa chigaro chake choushe kuti atonge. achatonga nyika nokururama; achatonga marudzi nokururamisira. yeahoh ndiye nhare yavakamanikidzwa, nhare yakasimba panguva yokutambudzika. vanoziva zita renyu vachavimba nemi, nokuti imi, yeahoh hamuna kumbosiya avo vanokutsvakai. imbirai yeahoh nziyo dzokurumbidza, iye agere pachigaro choushe muzioni; paridzai zvaakaita pakati pendudzi. nokuti iye anotsiva ropa anorangarira; haashayiri hanya kuchema kwavanotambudzwa. haiwa yeahoh, onai kuti vavengi vangu vanonditambudza sei! ndinzwirei ngoni mundisimudze pamasuo orufu, kuti ndiparidze kurumbidzwa kwenyu mumasuo omwanasikana wezioni, uye ndigofara muruponeso rwenyu. ndudzi dzakawira mugomba radzakachera; tsoka dzavo dzakabatwa nemimbure yavakaviga. yeahoh anozivikanwa nokururamisira kwake; vakaipa vakateyiwa namabasa amaoko avo. higayoni. sera vakaipa vanodzokera kuguva, idzo ndudzi dzose dzinokanganwa allah. asi vanoshayiwa havangagari vachikanganwikwa, uye tariro yavanotambudzwa haingaparari. simukai, yeahoh, munhu ngaarege kukunda; ndudzi ngadzitongwe pamberi penyu. varovei nokutyisa, imi yeahoh; ndudzi ngadzizive kuti vanongova vanhu zvavo. sera

10

munomirireiko kure, imi yeahoh? munozvivanzireiko panguva yokutambudzika? pakuzvikudza kwake munhu akaipa anovhima vasina simba, vanobatwa namano okufunga kwake. anozvirumbidza pamusoro pezvinopangwa nomwoyo wake; anoropafadza vanokara uye anozvidza yeahoh. pakuzvikudza kwake akaipa haamutsvaki; mundangariro dzake dzose hamuna nzvimbo yaallah. nzira dzake dzinobudirira nguva dzose; anozvikudza uye mirayiro yenyu iri kure naye; anodadira vavengi vake vose. anoti pakufunga kwake, “hakuna chichandizungunusa; ndichagara ndakafara uye handingatongotambudziki.” muromo wake uzere nokutuka, kureva nhema, uye nokutyisidzira; matambudziko nezvakaipa zviri pasi porurimi rwake. anovandira ari pedyo nemisha; pakuvandira uku anouraya vasina mhosva, ari panzvimbo yakavanzika anotarira vaachaparadza. anovandira seshumba iri panzvimbo yayo; anovandira kuti abate vasina anovabatsira; anobata vasina anobatsira uye anovakweva achienda navo mumumbure wake. vabatwa vake anovapwanya, vanowa; vanowira pasi pesimba rake. anoti mumwoyo make, “allah akanganwa; akafukidza chiso chake uye haazoonizve.” simukai, imi yeahoh! simudzai ruoko rwenyu, imi allah. regai kukanganwa vanomanikidzwa. munhu akaipa anozvidzireiko allah? seiko achiti mumwoyo make, “haazondibvunzi?” asi imi, iyemi allah, munoona kutambudzika nokusuwa; munokutarisisa kuti mukupedze. asina simba anozviisa kwamuri; muri mubatsiri wenherera. vhunai ruoko rweakaipa nerwomunhu akaipa; ngaazvidavirire pazvakaipa zvake zvakanga zvisingazoonekwi. yeahoh ndiye mambo nokusingaperi-peri; ndudzi dzichaparara munyika yake. munonzwa henyu, imi yeahoh, zvishuvo zvavanotambura; munovakurudzira, uye munoteerera kuchema kwavo, muchiruramisira nherera nevakamanikidzwa, kuti munhu wenyika, arege kuramba achingovhundutsa.

11

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndinovanda muna yeahoh. mungareva seiko kwandiri muchiti, “tizira kugomo rako seshiri. nokuti tarira, vakaipa vanowembura uta hwavo; vanogadzirira miseve yavo parukungiso, kuti vapfure vari murima, uyo akarurama pamwoyo. kana nheyo dzaparadzwa, akarurama angaiteiko?” yeahoh ari mutemberi yake tsvene; yeahoh ari pachigaro chake choushe chokudenga. anocherechedza vanakomana vavanhu; meso ake anovaedza. yeahoh anoedza vakarurama, asi vakaipa navanoda zvechisimba mweya wake unovavenga. pane vakaipa anonayisa mazimbe omoto nesafuri inopfuta; mhepo inopisa ndiwo uchava mugove wavo. nokuti yeahoh akarurama, anoda kururamisira; vanhu vakarurama vachaona chiso chake.

12

kumutungamiri wokuimba. nesheminiti. pisarema radhavhidhi. batsirai, imi yeahoh, nokuti vanoda allah hapachina; vakatendeka vapera pakati pavanhu. mumwe nomumwe anorevera wokwake nhema; miromo yavo inobata kumeso nokutaura zvinonyengera. yeahoh ngaagure miromo yose inobata kumeso, norurimi rumwe norumwe runozvikudza ruchiti, “tichakunda nendimi dzedu; miromo ndeyedu, tenzi wedu ndiani?” “nokuda kwokumanikidzwa kwavasina simba nokugomera kwavarombo, ndichasimuka zvino,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. “ndichavadzivirira kuna avo vanovaparadza.” uye mashoko ayeahoh haana chaangapomerwa, sesirivha yakacheneswa muchoto chevhu, yakanatswa kanomwe. imi yeahoh, muchatichengeta murugare uye muchatidzivirira kubva kuvanhu vakadai nokusingaperi. vakaipa vanofamba-famba vakasununguka kana zvakashata zvichikudzwa pakati pavanhu.

13

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. kusvikira riniko, nhai yeahoh? muchandikanganwa nokusingaperi here? muchasvika riniko makandivanzira chiso chenyu? ndichaita mutsimba nepfungwa dzangu kusvikira riniko, uye ndine shungu mumwoyo mangu zuva rimwe nerimwe? muvengi wangu achandikurira kusvikira riniko? tarirai kwandiri mugondipindura, imi yeahoh allah wangu. vhenekerai meso angu, kana kuti ndichafa ndakarara; muvengi wangu achati, “ndamukurira ndamukunda,” uye vadzivisi vangu vachapembera kana ndawa. asi ini ndinovimba norudo rwenyu rusingaperi; mwoyo wangu unofarira ruponeso rwenyu. ndichaimbira yeahoh, nokuti akandinakira.

14

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. benzi rinoti mumwoyo maro, “hakuna allah.” vakaora, mabasa avo akashata; hakuna anoita zvakanaka. yeahoh ari kudenga anotarira pasi pamusoro pavanakomana vavanhu, kuti aone kana aripo anonzwisisa, naani zvake anotsvaka allah. vose vakatsauka, vose pamwe chete vakasvibiswa; hakuna anoita zvakanaka, kunyange nomumwe. ko, vaiti vezvakaipa havadzidziwo here, ivo vanodya vanhu vangu savanhu vanodya chingwa, uye vasingadani kuna yeahoh? pavari ipapo, vakazara nokutya, nokuti allah ari paungano yavakarurama. imi vaiti vezvakaipa, munokanganisa urongwa hwavarombo, asi yeahoh ndiye utiziro hwavo. haiwa, dai ruponeso rwaisraeri rwaibuda muzioni! kana yeahoh achidzosazve nhaka yavanhu vake, yaqobho ngaapembere uye israeri ngaafare.

15

pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh, ndiani angagara munzvimbo yenyu tsvene? ndiani angagara pagomo renyu dzvene? iye anofamba asina chaanopomerwa uye anoita zvakarurama, anotaura chokwadi zvichibva pamwoyo wake, uye asina makuhwa parurimi rwake, asingaitiri wokwake zvakaipa uye asingatuki waagere naye, anozvidza munhu akaipa asi anokudza vaya vanotya yeahoh, anochengeta mhiko yake kunyange kana zvichirwadza, anokweretesa mari yake asingarevi mhindu uye asingagamuchiri fufuro pamusoro pousina mhosva. munhu anoita izvi haangatongozungunuswi.

16

mikitami radhavhidhi. ndichengetedzei, imi allah, nokuti ndinovanda mamuri. ndakati kuna yeahoh, “ndimi ishe wangu; kunze kwenyu handina chinhu chakanaka.” kana vari vatsvene vari panyika, ndivo vakaisvonaka vandinofarira chose. kuchema kuchawedzerwa, kwaavo vanomhanyira vamwe vamwari. handichazodiri zvipiriso zvavo zveropa zvinodururwa kana kuisa mazita avo pamiromo yangu. yeahoh, makandigovera mugove wangu nomukombe wangu; mukaita kuti mugove wangu uchengetedzeke. ndakayererwa miganhu panzvimbo yakanaka; zvirokwazvo ndine nhaka inofadza. ndicharumbidza yeahoh, anondipa zano; kunyange usiku mwoyo wangu unondirayira. ndakaisa yeahoh pamberi pangu nguva dzose. nokuti ari kurudyi rwangu, handingatongozungunuswi. naizvozvo mwoyo wangu unofara uye rurimi rwangu runopururudza; muviri wanguwo uchazorora zvakanaka, nokuti imi hamuzondisiyi muguva, kana kurega mutsvene wenyu achiona kuora. makandizivisa nzira youpenyu; muchandizadza nomufaro uri pamberi penyu, nezvinofadza zvisingaperi muruoko rwenyu rworudyi.

17

munyengetero wadhavhidhi. inzwai, imi yeahoh, mukumbiro wangu wakarurama; inzwai kuchema kwangu. rerekerai nzeve yenyu kumunyengetero wangu, usingabvi pamiromo inonyengera. kururamiswa kwangu ngakubve kwamuri; meso enyu ngaaone zvakarurama. kunyange mukaedza mwoyo wangu uye mukandiongorora usiku, kunyange mukandiedza, hamungawani chinhu; ndakazvisunga kuti muromo wangu urege kutadza. kana ari mabasa avanhu, neshoko remiromo yenyu, ndakanzvenga nzira dzouyo anoita nechisimba. nhambwe dzangu dzakarambira panzira dzenyu; tsoka dzangu hadzina kutedzemuka. haiwa allah, ndinodana kwamuri, nokuti muchandipindura; rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri, munzwe munyengetero wangu. ratidzai kushamisa kworudo rwenyu rukuru, imi munoponesa noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, avo vanovanda vavengi vavo mamuri. ndichengetei semboni yeziso renyu; ndivanzei pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro enyu, kubva kuno wakaipa anondirwisa, kubva kuvavengi vangu, vanoda kundiuraya, vakandikomberedza. vanodzivira mwoyo yavo yakavangarara, uye miromo yavo inotaura nokuzvikudza. vakandironda, zvino vandikomba, vanocherechedza nameso avo kuti vandiwisire pasi. vakaita seshumba ine nzara yechokudya, seshumba huru yakavandira pakavanda. haiwa, yeahoh, simukai, mirai pamberi pavo, vawisirei pasi; ndirwirei nomunondo wenyu pano wakaipa. haiwa, yeahoh, ndiponesei noruoko rwenyu kubva kuvanhu vakadai, kubva kuvanhu venyika ino vano mubayiro uri muupenyu huno. munopedza nzara yaavo vamunoda; vanakomana vavo vane zvakawanda, uye vanounganidzira vana vavo pfuma. zvino ini mukururama, ndichaona chiso chenyu; pandinomuka, ndichagutswa nokuona mufananidzo wenyu.

18

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi muranda wayeahoh. akaimbira yeahoh mashoko orwiyo urwu paakarwirwa nayeahoh kubva mumaoko avavengi vake vose nomuruoko rwasauro. akati: ndinokudai, imi yeahoh, simba rangu. yeahoh ndiye dombo rangu, nhare yangu, murwiri wangu; allah wangu ndiye dombo rangu, wandinovanda maari. ndiye nhoo yangu norunyanga rworuponeso rwangu, shongwe yangu. ndinodana kuna yeahoh, iye akafanira kurumbidzwa, uye ndinoponeswa kubva kuvavengi vangu. mabote orufu akandipinganidza; mvura zhinji inoparadza yakandifukidza. mabote eguva akandimonera; misungo yorufu yakanangana neni. pakutambudzika kwangu ndakadana kuna yeahoh; ndakadana kuna allah wangu kuti ndibatsirwe. akanzwa inzwi rangu ari mutemberi yake; kuchema kwangu kwakasvika pamberi pake munzeve dzake. nyika yakadedera ikadengenyeka, uye nheyo dzamakomo dzakazunguzika; utsi hwakakwira huchibva mumhino dzake; moto unoparadza wakabuda mumuromo make, mazimbe anopisa akabuda mauri achipfuta. akatsemura matenga akauya pasi; makore erima akanga ari pasi petsoka dzake. akatasva makerubhi akabhururuka; akabhururuka pamapapiro emhepo. akaita rima chifukidzo chake, denga rake rakamupoteredza, iwo makore matema emvura okudenga. nokupenya kwaibva pamberi pake, makore akabuda akafamba, nechimvuramabwe nokupenya kwemheni. yeahoh akatinhira kudenga; inzwi rowokumusoro-soro rikanzwika. akapfura miseve yake akaparadzira vavengi vake, kupenya kukuru kwemheni kukavavhundutsa. mipata yegungwa yakaiswa pachena, uye nheyo dzenyika dzakaiswa pachena pakutuka kwenyu, imi yeahoh, nokufema kwemhino dzenyu. akadzika pasi achibva kumusoro akanditora; akandibudisa pamvura zhinji yakadzika. akandinunura kubva kuvavengi vangu vane simba, kubva kuvadzivisi vangu, vakanga vakasimba zvikuru kwandiri. vakandinanga pazuva renjodzi yangu, asi yeahoh akanga ari mutsigiri wangu. akandibudisa akandiisa panzvimbo yakafarikana; akandinunura nokuti akanga achindifarira. yeahoh akandiitira zvakafanira kururama kwangu; nokuchena kwamaoko angu. nokuti ndakachengeta nzira dzayeahoh; handina kuita zvakaipa nokubva pana allah wangu. mirayiro yake yose iri pamberi pangu; handina kutsauka pazvirevo zvake. ndakanga ndisina chandingapomerwa pamberi pake, uye ndakazvichengeta kuti ndigare kure nechivi. yeahoh akandipa mubayiro zvakaringana nokururama kwangu, zvakaringana nokuchena kwamaoko angu pamberi pake. kuna vakatendeka munoratidza kutendeka kwenyu, kuna vasina chavangapomerwa munoratidza kusapomerwa kwenyu, kuna vakachena munoratidza kuchena kwenyu, asi kuna vakatsauka munoratidza hasha dzenyu. munoponesa vanozvininipisa, asi muchideredza vane meso anozvikudza. imi, iyemi yeahoh, munoita kuti mwenje wangu urambe uchipfuta; allah wangu anoshandura rima rangu richiva chiedza. norubatsiro rwenyu ndichaenda kundorwa hondo; naallah wangu ndinogona kukwira rusvingo. kana ari allah, nzira yake yakakwana; shoko rayeahoh harina charingapomerwa. ndiye nhoo yavose vanovanda maari. nokuti ndianiko allah kunze kwayeahoh? uye ndianiko dombo kunze kwaallah wedu? ndiallah anondishongedza nesimba uye anokwanisa nzira yangu. anoita kuti tsoka dzangu dzive setsoka dzenondo; anoita kuti ndigone kumira pakakwirira. anodzidzisa maoko angu kurwa; maoko angu anowembura uta hwendarira. munondipa nhoo yenyu yokukunda, uye ruoko rwenyu rworudyi runonditsigira; munokotama pasi kuti mundiite mukuru. munondiitira nzira yakapamhama pasi pangu, kuitira kuti zvitsitsinho zvangu zvirege kutedzemuka. ndakatevera vavengi vangu ndikavabata; handina kudzokera shure kusvikira vaparadzwa. ndakavapwanya kuti vakoniwe kusimuka; vakawira pasi petsoka dzangu. makandishongedza nesimba rokurwa; makaita kuti vadzivisi vangu vapfugame patsoka dzangu. makaita kuti vavengi vangu vatize, uye ndakaparadza vavengi vangu. vakachemera kubatsirwa, asi hakuna akavaponesa, kunyange kuna yeahoh, asi haana kuvapindura. ndakavapura vakatsetseka seguruva ratakurwa nemhepo; ndakavadururira pasi sedope renzira dzomumusha. makandirwira pakurwisa kwavanhu; makandiita musoro wendudzi; vanhu vandakanga ndisingazivi vava varanda vangu. pavanongondinzwa, vanonditeerera; vatorwa vanokotama pamberi pangu. vose vanoora mwoyo; vanouya vachibva panhare dzavo vachidedera. yeahoh mupenyu! dombo rangu ngarirumbidzwe! ngaakudzwe allah muponesi wangu! ndiye allah anonditsivira, anoisa ndudzi pasi pangu, anondiponesa pavavengi vangu. makandisimudzira pamusoro pavavengi vangu. makandinunura kubva kuvanhu vechisimba. naizvozvo ndichakurumbidzai pakati pendudzi, imi yeahoh; ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza. anopa mambo wake kukunda kukuru; anoratidza unyoro hwake husingaperi kumuzodziwa wake, kuna dhavhidhi nokuvana vake nokusingaperi.

19

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. matenga anotaura kubwinya kwaallah; matenga anoparidza mabasa amaoko ake. zuva nezuva anotaura; usiku nousiku anoratidza zivo. hakuna mutauro kana rurimi rusinganzwi inzwi ravo. inzwi razvo rinosvika panyika yose, mashoko azvo kumagumo apasi. mumatenga imomo, akadzika tende rezuva, rakaita sechikomba chinobuda mumba, seshasha inopemberera kumhanya nhangemutange. rinobuda kuno rumwe rutivi rwedenga richitenderera kusvikira kuno rumwe rutivi; hakuna chinhu chakavanzika kubva pakupisa kwaro. murayiro wayeahoh wakakwana, unomutsiridza mweya. zvirevo zvayeahoh zvakavimbika, zvinopa njere kuna vasina mano. zvirevo zvayeahoh zvakarurama, zvinopa mufaro kumwoyo. murayiro wayeahoh unopenya, unopa chiedza kumaziso. kutya yeahoh kwakanaka, kunogara nokusingaperi. zvakatongwa nayeahoh ndezvechokwadi uye zvose zvakarurama. zvinokosha kupfuura goridhe, kupfuura goridhe rakanatswa; zvinotapira kupfuura uchi, kupinda uchi hwabva muzinga. muranda wenyu anoyambirwa nazvo; pakuzvichengeta pano mubayiro mukuru. ndianiko angaziva kukanganisa kwake? ndikanganwirei mhosva dzangu dzakavanzika. dzorai muranda wenyu kubva pakutadza nobwoni; ngazvirege kuva nesimba pamusoro pangu. ipapo handizovi nemhosva, ndisina mhaka yokudarika kukuru. mashoko omuromo wangu nokurangarira kwomwoyo wangu ngazvifadze pamberi penyu, imi yeahoh, dombo rangu nomudzikinuri wangu.

20

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh ngaakupindure paunotambudzika; zita raallah wayaqobho ngarikudzivirire. ngaakutumire rubatsiro runobva panzvimbo tsvene, uye akupe rutsigiro runobva kuzioni. ngaarangarire zvibayiro zvako zvose uye agogamuchira zvibayiro zvako zvinopiswa. sera ngaakupe zvinodikanwa nomwoyo wako, uye aite kuti urongwa hwako hwose hubudirire. tichadanidzira nomufaro pakukunda kwako, uye tichasimudza mireza yedu muzita raallah wedu. yeahoh ngaakupe zvose zvawakakumbira. zvino ndava kuziva kuti yeahoh anoponesa muzodziwa wake; anomupindura ari kudenga rake dzvene, nesimba rokuponesa kworuoko rwake rworudyi. vamwe vanovimba nengoro, vamwe namabhiza, asi isu tinovimba nezita rayeahoh allah wedu. vanowisirwa pasi namabvi avo vagowa, asi isu tinosimuka tigomira takasimba. haiwa yeahoh, ponesai mambo! tipindurei patinodana!

21

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, mambo anofara musimba renyu. mufaro wake mukuru sei pakukunda kwamunomupa! makamupa zvinodikanwa nomwoyo wake, uye hamuna kumunyima zvaikumbirwa nomuromo wake. sera makamugamuchira nemikomborero yakapfuma, uye makadzika pamusoro pake korona yegoridhe yakachena. akakukumbirai upenyu, mukamupa mazuva mazhinji, nokusingaperi-peri. kubudikidza nokukunda kwamakamupa, kukudzwa kwake kukuru; makaisa pamusoro pake kubwinya nokukudzwa. zvirokwazvo makamupa maropafadzo anogara nokusingaperi, mukamufadza nomufaro pamberi penyu. nokuti mambo anovimba nayeahoh; nokuda kworudo rusingaperi rwowokumusoro-soro, iye haangazungunuswi. ruoko rwenyu ruchabata vavengi venyu vose; ruoko rwenyu rworudyi ruchabata vavengi venyu. panguva yokuonekwa kwenyu muchavaita sevira romoto. yeahoh achavamedza nehasha dzake, uye moto wake uchavaparadza. muchaparadza zvizvarwa zvavo kubva panyika, vana vavo kubva pakati pavanhu. kunyange vachirangana zvakaipa pamusoro penyu nokufunga mano akaipa, havangagoni kubudirira; nokuti muchaita kuti vafuratire, pamuchavananga nouta hwakawemburwa. simudzirwai, imi yeahoh, musimba renyu; tichaimba uye ticharumbidza simba renyu.

22

kumutungamiri wokuimba. namaimbirwo e“nondo yamangwanani.” pisarema radhavhidhi. allah wangu, allah wangu, mandisiyireiko? sei muri kure zvakadai nokundiponesa, kure zvakadai namashoko okugomera kwangu? haiwa allah wangu, ndinodanidzira masikati, asi hamundipinduri, nousiku, uye handinyarari. asi imi makagadzwa saiye mutsvene; ndimi rumbidzo yaisraeri. madzibaba edu akavimba nemi; vakavimba, uye mukavarwira. vakachema kwamuri, vakaponeswa; vakavimba nemi uye havana kunyadziswa. asi ini ndiri honye kwete munhu, ndinozvidzwa navanhu uye ndinoshorwa namarudzi. vose vanondiona vanondiseka; vanoshamisa miromo yavo vachindituka, vachidzungudza misoro yavo vachiti, “anovimba nayeahoh; yeahoh ngaamununure. ngaamuponese, sezvo achimufarira.” asi ndimi makandibudisa mudumbu; mukaita kuti ndivimbe nemi ndichiri pachipfuva chamai vangu. kubva pakuzvarwa kwangu, ndakaiswa kwamuri; kubva mudumbu ramai vangu, makanga muchingova allah wangu. regai kuva kure neni, nokuti dambudziko riri pedyo uye hakuna angabatsira. hando zhinji dzakandikomba; hando dzine simba dzebhashani dzakandipoteredza. shumba dzinoomba dzichibvambura nyama, dzinondishamira miromo yadzo. ndadururwa semvura, uye mapfupa angu ose abva asvodogoka. mwoyo wangu washanduka ukava namo; wanyungudika mukati mangu. simba rangu raoma sechaenga, uye rurimi rwangu runonamatira kumusoro kwomuromo wangu; munondiradzika muguruva rorufu. imbwa dzakandikomba; boka ravanhu vakaipa rakandipoteredza, vakabvoora maoko angu netsoka dzangu. ndinokwanisa kuverenga mapfupa angu ose; vanhu vanondinanʼanidza uye vanofarira kutambudzika kwangu. vanogovana nguo dzangu pakati pavo uye vanokanda mijenya nokuda kwenguo yangu. asi imi, yeahoh, regai kuva kure neni; imi simba rangu, kurumidzai kundibatsira. rwirai upenyu hwangu pamunondo, ihwo upenyu hwangu hunokosha, kubva pasimba rembwa. ndinunurei pamuromo weshumba; ndiponesei panyanga dzenyati. ndichaparidza zita renyu kuhama dzangu; ndichakurumbidzai paungano. imi munotya yeahoh, murumbidzei! imi mose zvizvarwa zvayaqobho, mukudzei! mutyei, imi mose zvizvarwa zvaisraeri! nokuti haana kuzvidza kana kusema chibayiro chaiye akatambudzwa; haana kumuvanzira chiso chake, asi akanzwa kuchemera kwake rubatsiro. kwamuri ndiko kunobva dingindira rerumbidzo yangu paungano huru; ndichazadzisa mhiko dzangu pamberi pavanokutyai. varombo vachadya uye vagoguta; vanotsvaka yeahoh vachamurumbidza, mwoyo yenyu ngairarame nokusingaperi! migumo yose yenyika icharangarira igodzokera kuna yeahoh, uye mhuri dzendudzi dzose dzichapfugama pamberi pake, nokuti ushe ndohwayeahoh uye anotonga pamusoro pendudzi. vapfumi vose venyika vachadya uye vachamunamata; vose vanoburukira muguruva vachapfugama pamberi pake, navose vasingagoni kuzviraramisa. vana vake vachamushumira; zvizvarwa zvinotevera zvichaudzwa nezvaishe. vachaparidza kururama kwake kuvanhu vasati vaberekwa, nokuti akazviita.

23

pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh ndiye mufudzi wangu, hapana chandingashayiwa. anondivatisa pamafuro manyoro, anondisesedza pamvura inozorodza, anoponesa mweya wangu. anondifambisa panzira dzokururama nokuda kwezita rake. kunyange ndikafamba nomumupata womumvuri worufu, handingatyi zvakaipa, nokuti imi muneni; tsvimbo yenyu nomudonzvo wenyu zvinondinyaradza. munondigadzirira tafura pamberi pavavengi vangu. munozodza musoro wangu namafuta; mukombe wangu unopfachukira. zvirokwazvo kunaka kwenyu norudo rwenyu zvichanditevera, mazuva ose oupenyu hwangu, uye ndichagara mumba mayeahoh nokusingaperi.

24

pisarema radhavhidhi. nyika ndeyayeahoh, nezvose zviri mairi, nyika, navose vanogaramo; nokuti akaiteya pamusoro pamakungwa uye akaisimbisa pamusoro pemvura zhinji. ndianiko angakwira pachikomo chayeahoh? ndianiko angamira panzvimbo yake tsvene? uyo ana maoko akachena nomwoyo wakanaka, asingasimudziri mwoyo wake kuzvifananidzo, kana kupika nhema. iye achagamuchira makomborero anobva kuna yeahoh nokururamiswa kunobva kuna allah woruponeso rwake. ivava ndivo rudzi rwaavo vanomutsvaka, ivo vanotsvaka chiso chenyu, imi allah wayaqobho. sera simudzai misoro yenyu, imi masuo; muisimudze, imi makonhi akare, kuti mambo wokubwinya apinde. ndianiko uyu mambo wokubwinya? ndiye yeahoh ane simba noumhare, yeahoh ane simba pakurwa. simudzai misoro yenyu, imi masuo; muasimudze, imi makonhi akare, kuti mambo wokubwinya apinde. ndianiko, uyu mambo wokubwinya? yeahoh wamasimba ose, ndiye mambo wokubwinya. sera

25

pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh, ndinosimudzira mwoyo wangu kwamuri; haiwa allah wangu, ndinovimba nemi. musandirega ndichinyadziswa, uye musarega vavengi vangu vachindikunda. hapana munhu ane tariro mamuri achanyadziswa, asi vachanyadziswa avo vanonyengera pasina chikonzero. ndiratidzei nzira dzenyu, imi yeahoh, ndidzidzisei nzira dzenyu; nditungamirirei muzvokwadi yenyu mugondidzidzisa, nokuti ndimi allah muponesi wangu, uye tariro yangu iri pamuri zuva rose. rangarirai, imi yeahoh, ngoni dzenyu huru norudo, nokuti zvakabvira kare. regai kurangarira zvivi zvouduku hwangu, nenzira dzangu dzandaikumukirai nadzo; ndirangarirei nokuda kworudo rwenyu, nokuti makanaka, imi yeahoh. yeahoh akanaka uye akarurama; naizvozvo anodzidzisa vatadzi nzira dzake. anotungamirira vanozvininipisa mune zvakarurama, uye anovadzidzisa nzira yake. nzira dzose dzayeahoh ndedzorudo nokutendeka, kuna avo vanochengeta zvirevo zvesungano yake. nokuda kwezita renyu, imi yeahoh, kanganwirai chakaipa changu, kunyange chiri chikuru. ndiani, zvino, munhu anotya yeahoh? achamudzidzisa nzira yaakasarudzirwa. achararama upenyu hwake mukubudirira, uye zvizvarwa zvake zvichagara nhaka yenyika. yeahoh anogara pakati pavanomutya; anozivisa sungano yake kwavari. meso angu anoramba achitarira kuna yeahoh, nokuti ndiye chete anosunungura tsoka dzangu pamusungo. dzokerai kwandiri uye mundinzwire nyasha, nokuti ndiri ndoga uye ndinotambudzika. matambudziko omwoyo wangu awanda; ndisunungurei pakurwadziwa kwangu. tarirai kutambudzika kwangu nenhamo yangu, mugobvisa zvivi zvangu zvose. tarirai kuwanda kwaita vavengi vangu, uye kuti vanondivenga zvakakura sei! rindai upenyu hwangu mugondinunura; ndirege kunyadziswa, nokuti ndinovanda mamuri. kusanyengera nokururama ngazvindichengete, nokuti tariro yangu iri mamuri. dzikinurai israeri, imi allah, kuti vabve mumatambudziko avo ose!

26

pisarema radhavhidhi. nditongerei, imi yeahoh, nokuti ndakararama upenyu husina chahungapomerwa; ndakavimba nayeahoh ndisingazungunuki. ndiedzei, imi yeahoh, ndinzverei, nzverai mwoyo wangu nendangariro dzangu; nokuti rudo rwenyu rwuri pamberi pangu nguva dzose, uye ndinogara ndichifamba muzvokwadi yenyu. handigari navanhu vanonyengera, kana kufambidzana navanyengeri; ndinovenga ungano yavaiti vezvakaipa, uye ndinoramba kugara navakaipa. ndinoshamba maoko angu ndisina mhaka, uye ndinofamba-famba paaritari yenyu, imi yeahoh, ndichiparidza rumbidzo yenyu nenzwi guru, uye ndichireva zvamabasa enyu ose anoshamisa. ndinoda imba yamunogara, imi yeahoh, nzvimbo inogara kubwinya kwenyu. regai kubatanidza mweya wangu navatadzi, noupenyu hwangu navanoteura ropa, vana maoko akabata zvakaipa, vazere nefufuro mumaoko avo orudyi. asi ini ndinogara upenyu husina chahungapomerwa; ndidzikinurei uye mundinzwire ngoni. tsoka dzangu dzimire pakati chechetere; ndicharumbidza yeahoh paungano huru.

27
