pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh ndiye chiedza changu noruponeso rwangu, ndichagotya aniko? yeahoh ndiye nhare youpenyu hwangu, ndianiko wandingatya? vanhu vakaipa pavakauya kwandiri kuzodya nyama yangu, vavengi navadzivisi vangu pavanondirwisa, vanogumburwa ndokuwa. kunyange hondo ikandikomba, mwoyo wangu haungazotyi; kunyange hondo ikamuka kuzondirwisa, ipapo ndichavimba nayeahoh. chinhu chimwe chete chandinokumbira kuna yeahoh, ndicho chandinotsvaka: kuti ndigare mumba mayeahoh mazuva ose oupenyu hwangu, kuti nditarire kunaka kwayeahoh uye ndimutsvake mutemberi yake. nokuti zuva rokutambudzika achandichengeta zvakanaka munzvimbo yaanogara; achandiviga mudumba retabhenakeri yake, agondikwidza pamusoro pedombo. ipapo musoro wangu uchasimudzirwa pamusoro pavavengi vakandipoteredza; ndichamubayira zvibayiro patabhenakeri yake nomufaro mukuru; ndichaimba ndigoimbira yeahoh nziyo. inzwai inzwi rangu kana ndichidana, imi yeahoh; ndinzwirei ngoni mugondipindura. mwoyo wangu unoti kwandiri, “tsvaka chiso chake!” chiso chenyu, yeahoh, ndichachitsvaka. regai kundivanzira chiso chenyu, musadzinga muranda wenyu mukutsamwa; makanga muri mubatsiri wangu. regai kundiramba kana kundisiya, imi allah muponesi wangu. kunyange baba vangu namai vangu vakandisiya, yeahoh achandigamuchira. ndidzidzisei nzira yenyu, imi yeahoh; ndisesedzei munzira yakarurama nokuda kwavamanikidzi vangu. regai kundisundira kuzvido zvavavengi vangu, nokuti zvapupu zvenhema zvinondimukira, vachifemedzeka nehasha. ndichine chokwadi neizvi zvokuti: ndichaona kunaka kwayeahoh munyika yavapenyu. rindira yeahoh; iva nesimba, utsunge mwoyo ugomirira yeahoh.

28

pisarema radhavhidhi. ndinodana kwamuri, imi yeahoh dombo rangu; musandinyararira. nokuti kana mukaramba munyerere, ini ndichaita savaya vakaburukira kugomba. inzwai kuchemera ngoni kwangu, sezvo ndichichemera rubatsiro kwamuri, sezvo ndichisimudza maoko angu ndakatarira kunzvimbo yenyu tsvene-tsvene. musandikwekweredzera kure pamwe chete navakaipa, naavo vanoita zvakaipa, vanotaura rugare navavakidzani vavo asi vakaviga zvakaipa mumwoyo yavo. vatsivei pamabasa avo napabasa ravo rakaipa, vatsivei pane zvakaitwa namaoko avo; mugodzosera pamusoro pavo zvakavafanira. sezvo vasina hanya namabasa ayeahoh uye nezvakaitwa namaoko ake, achavaputsira pasi akasavavakazve. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, nokuti akanzwa kuchemera kwangu ngoni. yeahoh ndiye simba rangu nenhoo yangu; mwoyo wangu unovimba naye, uye ndinobatsirwa. mwoyo wangu unokwakuka nomufaro uye ndichamuvonga nenziyo. yeahoh ndiye simba ravanhu vake, nhare yoruponeso yomuzodziwa wake. ponesai vanhu venyu uye muropafadze nhaka yenyu; ivai mufudzi wavo uye muvatakure nokusingaperi.

29

pisarema radhavhidhi. ipai kuna yeahoh, imi mune simba ipai kuna yeahoh rukudzo nesimba. ipai kuna yeahoh rukudzo rwakafanira zita rake; namatai yeahoh mukubwinya kwoutsvene hwake. inzwi rayeahoh riri pamusoro pemvura zhinji. allah wokubwinya anotinhira, yeahoh anotinhira ari pamusoro pemvura zhinji. inzwi rayeahoh rine simba; inzwi rayeahoh rinokudzwa. inzwi rayeahoh rinovhuna misidhari, yeahoh anovhuna-vhuna misidhari yerebhanoni. anoita kuti rebhanoni ikwakuke semhuru, nesirioni senzombe yenyati. inzwi rayeahoh rinorova nokuvaima kwemheni. inzwi rayeahoh rinozungunusa gwenga; yeahoh anozungunusa gwenga rekadheshi. inzwi rayeahoh rinomonyorora miouki uye rinosvuura sango rigosara rati hwe-e. uye mutemberi yake zvose zvinodana zvichiti, “kubwinya!” yeahoh anogara pachigaro choushe chamafashamu emvura; yeahoh anogara ari mambo nokusingaperi. yeahoh anopa simba kuvanhu vake; yeahoh anoropafadza vanhu vake norugare.

30

pisarema. rwiyo rwokukumikidza temberi. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndichakukudzai imi yeahoh, nokuti makandisimudza kubva pakadzika, uye hamuna kutendera vavengi vangu kuti vafare pamusoro pangu. haiwa yeahoh allah wangu, ndakachemera rubatsiro kwamuri uye mukandiporesa. haiwa yeahoh, makandibudisa muguva; mukandirwira kuti ndirege kupinda mugomba. imbirai yeahoh, imi vatsvene vake; rumbidzai zita rake dzvene. nokuti kutsamwa kwake ndokwenguva duku, asi nyasha dzake ndedzoupenyu hwose; kuchema kungangovapo usiku. asi mufaro unouya mangwanani. pandakanzwa kugadzikana, ndakati, “handingatongozungunuswi.” haiwa yeahoh, pamakandinzwira tsitsi, makaita kuti gomo rangu rimire rakasimba; asi pamakavanza chiso chenyu, ini ndakavhunduka. ndakadana kwamuri, imi yeahoh; ndakachemera nyasha kuna yeahoh ndichiti, “chiiko chinowanikwa pakuparadzwa kwangu, napakupinda kwangu mugomba? ko, guruva richakurumbidzai here? richaparidza kutendeka kwenyu here? inzwai, imi yeahoh, mundinzwire ngoni; imi yeahoh, ivai mubatsiri wangu.” imi makashandura kuungudza kwangu kukava kutamba; makabvisa nguo dzangu dzamasaga mukandishongedza nomufaro, kuti mwoyo wangu ukuimbirei ugorega kunyarara. haiwa yeahoh allah wangu, ndichakuvongai nokusingaperi.

31

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndinovanda mamuri, imi yeahoh; itai kuti ndisatombonyadziswa; ndirwirei mukururama kwenyu. rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri, kurumidzai kundinunura; ivai dombo rangu rokuvanda, nhare yakasimba inondiponesa. sezvo murimi dombo rangu nenhare yangu, nditungamirirei uye mundisesedze nokuda kwezita renyu. ndisunungurei pamusungo wandakadzikirwa, nokuti imi muri utiziro hwangu. ndinoisa mweya wangu mumaoko enyu; ndidzikinurei, imi yeahoh, allah wechokwadi. ndinovenga vanonamatira kuzvifananidzo zvisina maturo; ndinovimba nayeahoh. ndichafara nokufarisisa murudo rwenyu, nokuti makaona kutambudzika kwangu mukaziva kurwadziwa kwomwoyo wangu. hamuna kundiisa kumuvengi, asi makamisa tsoka dzangu panzvimbo yakafarikana. haiwa yeahoh, ndinzwirei ngoni nokuti ndine nhamo; meso angu aneta nokuchema, mwoyo wangu nomuviri wangu zvarwadziwa. upenyu hwangu hwopera nokurwadziwa, uye namakore angu nokugomera; simba rangu rapera nokuda kwokutambudzika kwangu, uye mapfupa angu arukutika. nokuda kwavavengi vangu, ndava chinhu chinovengwa navavakidzani vangu; ndava chinhu chinotyisa kushamwari dzangu; vanondiona munzira dzomumisha vanonditiza. ndakanganwikwa navo sendakafa; ndafanana nehari yakaputsika, nokuti ndinonzwa guhwa ravazhinji; kumativi ose kune zvinotyisa; vanorangana pamusoro pangu uye vanoronga kundiuraya. asi ndinovimba nemi, imi yeahoh; ndinoti, “ndimi allah wangu.” nguva dzangu dziri mumaoko enyu; ndirwirei kuvavengi vangu nokuna avo vanonditeverera. chiso chenyu ngachipenye pamusoro pomuranda wenyu; ndiponesei norudo rwenyu rusingaperi. haiwa yeahoh, itai kuti ndisanyadziswa, nokuti ndakadana kwamuri; asi vakaipa ngavanyadziswe uye vavate vakati mwiro muguva. miromo yavo inoreva nhema ngainyaradzwe, nokuti vanotaura namanyawi nokuzvikudza pamusoro pavakarurama. haiwa, kunaka kwenyu kukuru sei, kwamakachengetera vaya vanokutyai, kwamunoisa pamberi pavanhu, pamusoro paivo vanovanda mamuri. mukudzivirira kwokuvapo kwenyu munovavanza kubva parangano dzavanhu; munovachengeta zvakanaka pamunogara kubva pandimi dzinopomera. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, nokuti akaratidza rudo rwake runoshamisa kwandiri pandakanga ndiri muguta rakakombwa. mukuvhunduka kwangu, ndakati, “ndabviswa pamberi penyu!” asi makanzwa kuchemera nyasha kwangu pandakadanidzira kwamuri ndichida rubatsiro. idai yeahoh, imi vatsvene mose! yeahoh anochengetedza vakatendeka, asi anotsiva zvizere vanozvikudza. simbai uye mutsunge mwoyo, imi mose munorindira yeahoh.

32

pisarema radhavhidhi nemasikiri. akaropafadzwa uyo akakanganwirwa kudarika kwake, akafukidzirwa zvivi zvake. akaropafadzwa munhu asingaverengerwi zvivi zvake nayeahoh, uye asina kunyengera mumwoyo make. pandakanyarara, mapfupa angu akarukutika nokuda kwokugomera kwangu zuva rose. nokuti masikati nousiku ruoko rwenyu rwakanga ruchirema pamusoro pangu; simba rangu rakasvetwa sezvinoita kupisa kwechirimo. sera ipapo ndakazivisa chivi changu kwamuri uye handina kuvanza chakaipa changu. ndakati, “ndichareurura kudarika kwangu kuna yeahoh,” uye makandiregerera mhosva yechivi changu. sera naizvozvo vose vanoda allah ngavanyengetere kwamuri muchiri kuwanikwa; zvirokwazvo mvura zhinji ine simba painokwira, haingasviki kwavari. ndimi nzvimbo yangu yokuvanda; muchandidzivirira panhamo uye muchandipoteredza nenziyo dzorusununguko. sera ndichakurairidza uye ndichakudzidzisa nzira yaunofanira kufamba nayo; ndichakupa zano uye ndichakurinda. rega kuva sebhiza kana senyurusi, zvisinganzwisisi asi zvinofanira kupingudzwa nomukaro kana namatomu, kana kuti hazvingauyi kwauri. wakaipa ana matambudziko mazhinji, asi rudo rusingaperi rwayeahoh runopoteredza munhu anovimba naye. farai muna yeahoh uye mufarisise, imi vakarurama; imbai, imi mose makarurama pamwoyo!

33

imbirai yeahoh, mufarisise, imi vakarurama; zvakanaka kuti vakarurama vamurumbidze. rumbidzai yeahoh nembira; muimbirei nziyo nomutengeranwa une hungiso gumi. muimbirei rwiyo rutsva; muridze zvakanaka, mugopururudza nomufaro. nokuti shoko rayeahoh rakarurama uye nderechokwadi; iye akatendeka pane zvose zvaanoita. yeahoh anoda kururama nokururamisira; nyika izere norudo rwake rusingaperi. kudenga denga kwakaitwa neshoko rayeahoh, hondo dzenyeredzi dzaikoko, nokufema kwomuromo wake. anounganidza mvura zhinji yegungwa muzvirongo; anoisa kwakadzika mumatura. nyika yose ngaitye yeahoh; marudzi ose enyika ngaamuremekedze. nokuti iye akataura, zvikaitika; akarayira, zvikamira zvakasimba. yeahoh anokonesa urongwa hwendudzi; anopinganidza mifungo yendudzi. asi urongwa hwayeahoh hunomira hwakasimba nokusingaperi, nendangariro dzomwoyo wake kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. rwakaropafadzwa rudzi rwakaita yeahoh allah warwo, vanhu vaakasarudza kuti vave nhaka yake. yeahoh anotarira pasi ari kudenga uye anoona marudzi ose avanhu; ari pachigaro chake anotarira vose vagere panyika, iye anoumba mwoyo yavanhu vose, anofungisisa zvose zvavanoita. hapana mambo anoponeswa nokukura kwehondo yake; hapana murwi anopunyuka nokuda kwesimba rake guru. bhiza itariro isina maturo pakurwirwa; harigoni kuponesa kunyange rine simba guru. asi meso ayeahoh ari pamusoro paavo vanomutya, napamusoro paavo vakaisa tariro yavo murudo rwake rusingaperi, kuti avarwire parufu nokuvararamisa panzara. tinomirira yeahoh netariro; ndiye mubatsiri wedu nenhoo yedu. mwoyo yedu inofara maari, nokuti tinovimba nezita rake dzvene. rudo rwenyu rusingaperi ngarugare pamusoro pedu, imi yeahoh, kunyange sezvatakaisa tariro yedu mamuri.

34

pisarema radhavhidhi. paakaita seanopenga pamberi paabhimereki; uyo akamudzinga, iye akaenda hake. ndinorumbidza yeahoh nguva dzose; kurumbidzwa kwake kucharamba kuri pamiromo yangu. mwoyo wangu uchazvirumbidza muna yeahoh; vanotambudzika ngavanzwe vafare. kudzai yeahoh pamwe chete neni; ngatikudzei zita rake pamwe chete. ndakachema kuna yeahoh akandipindura; akandisunungura pakutya kwangu kwose. vanotarira kwaari vanopenya; zviso zvavo hazvingambofukidzwi nenyadzi. murombo uyu akadana, uye yeahoh akamunzwa; akamuponesa pakutambudzika kwake kwose. mutumwa wayeahoh anokomberedza avo vanomutya, uye anovasunungura. ravirai henyu muone kuti yeahoh akanaka; akaropafadzwa munhu anovanda maari. ityai yeahoh, imi vatsvene vake, nokuti vanomutya havana chavanoshayiwa. shumba dzinopera simba uye dzinofa nenzara, asi avo vanotsvaka yeahoh havashayiwi chinhu chakanaka. uyai, vana vangu, nditeererei; ndichakudzidzisai kutya yeahoh. ani naani wenyu anoda upenyu, uye uchida kuona mazuva akawanda, dzora rurimi rwako pane zvakaipa nemiromo yako pakureva nhema. ibva pane zvakaipa ugoita zvakanaka; tsvaka rugare uye urutevere. meso ayeahoh ari pamusoro pavakarurama uye nzeve dzake dzinonzwa kuchema kwavo; chiso chayeahoh chinovenga avo vanoita zvakaipa, kuti abvise chiyeuchidzo chavo panyika. vakarurama vanodanidzira, uye yeahoh anovanzwa; anovarwira pakutambudzika kwavo kwose. yeahoh ari pedyo navane mwoyo yakaputsika uye anoponesa avo vakapwanyika pamweya. akarurama angava namatambudziko mazhinji, asi yeahoh anomurwira paari ose; anochengetedza mapfupa ake ose, hakuna nerimwe rawo richavhunika. zvakaipa zvichauraya vakaipa; vavengi vavakarurama vachapiwa mhosva. yeahoh anodzikinura varanda vake; hapana kana mumwe anovanda maari achapiwa mhosva.

35

pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, kakavadzanai navanokakavadzana neni; rwisai avo vanondirwisa. torai nhoo huru neduku; simukai, uye uyai mundibatsire. vheyesai pfumo guru nepfumo diki murwise avo vanonditevera. muti kumweya wangu, “ndini ruponeso rwako.” vanotsvaka kundiuraya ngavazvidzwe uye vanyadziswe; vanorangana kuparadzwa kwangu ngavadzoserwe shure vachitya. ngavaite sehundi pamberi pemhepo, mutumwa wayeahoh achivasundira kure; nzira yavo ngaisvibe uye itsvedze, mutumwa wayeahoh achivateverera. sezvo vakandivanzira mimbure yavo ndisina mhosva, uye vakandicherera gomba ndisina mhosva, kuparadzwa ngakuvawire pakarepo, mumbure wavakavanza ngauvapinge ivo, ngavawire mugomba ravo vaparare. ipapo mweya wangu uchafara muna yeahoh, uye uchafarira ruponeso rwake. zvandiri zvose zvichadanidzira zvichiti: “ndianiko akaita semi, yeahoh? munonunura varombo kubva kuna avo vane simba kupinda ravo.” zvapupu zvino utsinye zvinouya mberi; zvinondibvunza pamusoro pezvinhu zvandisingazivi. vanotsiva zvakanaka zvangu nezvakaipa, uye vanosiya mweya wangu uchidzungaira. asi pavairwara, ndakafuka nguo dzamasaga ndikazvininipisa nokutsanya. munyengetero wangu pawakadzokera kwandiri usina mhinduro, ndakafamba-famba ndichichema kunge ndinochemera shamwari yangu kana hama yangu. ndakakotamisa musoro wangu ndichichema, sokunge ndinochema mai vangu. asi pandakagumburwa, vakaungana vachifara; varwi vakaungana kuzondirwisa ndisingazivi. vakandireva vasingaregi. savanhu vasina allah vakandiseka muruvengo rwavo; vakandirumanyira meno avo. haiwa yeahoh, muchasvika riniko makangotarira? nunurai upenyu hwangu kubva pakuparadza kwavo, noupenyu hwangu hunokosha kubva pashumba idzi. ndichakuvongai paungano huru; ndichakurumbidzai pakati pavanhu vazhinji. ngavarege kufara pamusoro pangu avo vanondivenga ndisina mhosva; vanondivenga ndisina mhosva ngavarege kuchonyerana meso avo mukundivenga. havatauri norugare, asi vanofunga kupomera mhosva pamusoro pavanogara norunyararo munyika. vanondishamira miromo yavo vachiti, “hekani waro! hekani waro! tazviona nameso edu.” haiwa yeahoh, mazviona izvi; regai kunyarara. regai kuva kure neni, imi ishe. mukai uye simukai mundirwire! ndirwirei, allah wangu naishe wangu. ndiruramisirei mukururama kwenyu, imi yeahoh allah wangu; musarega vachifara pamusoro pangu. musarega vachifunga mumwoyo mavo vachiti, “hekani waro, ndizvo zvatanga tichida!” kana kuti vati, “tamumedza chose.” vose vanofarira kutambudzika kwangu ngavanyadziswe uye vanyonganiswe; vose vanozvisimudzira pamusoro pangu ngavafukidzwe nenyadzi nokuzvidzwa. vose vanofarira kururamisirwa kwangu ngavapembere nomufaro nokufarisisa; ngavarambe vachiti, “yeahoh ngaakudzwe, iye anofarira kugara zvakanaka kwavaranda vake.” rurimi rwangu ruchataura zvokururama kwenyu, uye nezvokurumbidzwa kwenyu zuva rose.

36

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi muranda wayeahoh. shoko riri mumwoyo mangu pamusoro pokutadza kweakaipa rinoti: hakuna kutya allah pamberi pake. pamaonero ake anozvirumbidza, nokuti anozvibata kumeso kwazvo pakuona kwake, zvokuti anotadza kuona kana kuvenga chivi chake. mashoko omuromo wake akaipa uye anonyengera; haachisiri munhu akachenjera kana anoita zvakanaka. kunyange panhoo yake anofunga zvakaipa; anozvifambisa panzira yezvakaipa uye haarambi chakaipa. rudo rwenyu, imi yeahoh, runosvika kudenga denga, kutendeka kwenyu kunosvika kumakore. kururama kwenyu kwakaita segomo guru guru, kururamisira kwenyu sepakadzika dzika. haiwa yeahoh, imi munochengetedza zvose munhu nemhuka. haiwa rudo rwenyu rusingatongoperi runokosha sei! vose vakuru navaduku pakati pavanhu vanovanda mumumvuri wamapapiro enyu. vanogutswa nezvakawanda zvomumba menyu; munovanwisa kubva parwizi rwenyu runofadza. nokuti kwamuri ndiko kune chitubu choupenyu; muchiedza chenyu tinoona chiedza. rambai muchiitira rudo kuna avo vanokuzivai, uye kururama kwenyu kuna vane mwoyo yakarurama. rutsoka rwounozvikudza ngarurege kusvika kwandiri, kunyange ruoko rweakaipa ngarurege kundidzingira kure. tarirai vaiti vezvakaipa kuti vawa sei, vakandwa pasi, havagoni kumuka.

37

pisarema radhavhidhi. usava neshungu nokuda kwavanhu vakaipa, uye usaitira godo avo vanoita zvakaipa; nokuti souswa vachaoma nokukurumidza, somuriwo wakasvibira vachakurumidza kuoma. vimba nayeahoh uite zvakanaka; gara panyika ufarikane pamafuro manyoro. farikana muna yeahoh, uye iye achakupa zvinodikanwa nomwoyo wako. isa nzira yako kuna yeahoh; uvimbe naye uye iye achaita izvi; achaita kuti kururama kwako kupenye samambakwedza, nokururamisirwa kwako sezuva ramasikati. nyarara pamberi payeahoh, umurindire unyerere; usava neshungu kana vanhu vachibudirira panzira dzavo, pavanoita mano avo akaipa avakaronga. rega kutsamwa, uzvidzore pahasha; usava neshungu zvinokutungamirira mune zvakaipa. nokuti vasakarurama vachagurwa, asi avo vanomirira yeahoh vachagara nhaka yenyika. chinguva chiduku duku, vakaipa havachazovapozve; kunyange ukavatsvaka, havazowanikwi. asi vanyoro vachagara nhaka yenyika, uye vachafarikana norugare rukuru. vakaipa vanofungira vakarurama mano akaipa, uye vanovarumanyira meno avo. asi ishe anoseka vakaipa nokuti anoziva kuti zuva ravo riri kuuya. vakaipa vanovhomora munondo uye vanowembura uta kuti vawisire pasi varombo navanoshayiwa, kuti vauraye avo vane nzira dzakarurama. asi minondo yavo ichabaya mwoyo yavo pachavo, uye uta hwavo huchavhunika. zvishoma zvowakarurama zviri nani kupinda pfuma yavakaipa vazhinji; nokuti simba ravakaipa richavhuniwa, asi yeahoh anotsigira vakarurama. mazuva avakarurama anozivikanwa nayeahoh, uye nhaka yavo ichagara nokusingaperi. panguva yamatambudziko, havanganyadziswi; mumazuva enzara ivo vachava nezvakawanda. asi vakaipa vachaparara: vavengi vayeahoh vachafanana norunako rweminda, vachanyangarika soutsi. vakaipa vanokwereta uye havadzori, asi vakarurama vanopa zvakawanda; avo vanoropafadzwa nayeahoh vachagara nhaka yenyika, asi avo vaanotuka vachaparadzwa. kana yeahoh achifarira nzira yomunhu, anosimbisa mafambiro ake; kunyange akagumburwa, haangawi, nokuti yeahoh anomutsigira noruoko rwake. ndakanga ndiri muduku uye zvino ndakwegura, asi handina kumboona vakarurama vachiraswa, kana vana vavo vachipemha chingwa. vanogara vachingopa vamwe, uye vachikweretesa pasina muripo; vana vavo vacharopafadzwa. dzoka pane zvakaipa ugoita zvakanaka; ipapo uchagara panyika nokusingaperi. nokuti yeahoh anoda vanoruramisira uye haangazosiyi vanhu vake vakatendeka. vachadzivirirwa nokusingaperi; asi vana vowakaipa vachaparadzwa; vakarurama vachagara nhaka yenyika uye vachagara mairi nokusingaperi. muromo womunhu akarurama unotaura uchenjeri, uye rurimi rwake runotaura kururamisira. murayiro waallah wake uri pamwoyo wake; tsoka dzake hadzitedzemuki. vakaipa vanovandira vakarurama, vachitsvaka upenyu hwavo chaihwo; asi yeahoh haangavasiyi vari musimba ravo, kana kuvarega vachipomerwa kana vamira pakutongwa. rindira yeahoh, uye uchengete nzira yake. achakusimudzira kuti ugare nhaka yenyika; kana vakaipa voparadzwa, iwe uchazviona. ndakaona munhu akaipa uye ano utsinye achibudirira somuti wakasvibira pavhu romunyika yawo, asi nokukurumidza akapfuura uye akasazovapozve; kunyange ndakamutsvaka, haana kuzowanikwa. cherechedza asina mhosva, ongorora akarurama; ane ramangwana rakanaka munhu worugare. asi vatadzi vose vachaparadzwa; ramangwana rowakaipa richagurwa. ruponeso rwavakarurama runobva kuna yeahoh; ndiye nhare yavo panguva yamatambudziko. yeahoh anovabatsira uye anovanunura; anovanunura kubva kuna vakaipa uye anovaponesa, nokuti vanovanda maari.

38

pisarema radhavhidhi. chikumbiro. haiwa yeahoh, musandirayira mukutsamwa kwenyu kana kundiranga muhasha dzenyu. nokuti miseve yenyu yandibaya, uye ruoko rwenyu rwawira pamusoro pangu. mumuviri mangu hamuchina utano nokuda kwehasha dzenyu; mapfupa angu apera simba nokuda kwechivi changu. mhosva yangu yandiremera somutoro unorema kwazvo kuutakura. maronda angu aora uye anosemesa nokuda kwoupenzi hwokutadza kwangu. ndakotamiswa uye ndaderedzwa kwazvo; ndinofamba ndichichema zuva rose. musana wangu wazara nokupisa kunorwadza; muviri wangu hauchina utano. ndarukutika uye ndapwanyika chose; ndiri kugomera nokurwadza kwomwoyo. haiwa ishe, zvose zvandinoshuva zviri pachena pamberi penyu, kugomera kwangu hakuna kuvanzika kwamuri. hana yangu inorova, simba rangu rapera; kunyange nechiedza chabva pameso angu. shamwari dzangu navafambidzani vondinzvenga nokuda kwamaronda angu; vavakidzani vangu vanogara kure neni. avo vanotsvaka kundiuraya vanonditeya nemisungo yavo, avo vanoda kundikuvadza vanotaura nezvokuparadzwa kwangu; zuva rose vanorangana zvounyengeri. ini ndafanana nematsi, isinganzwi, sembeveve, isingagoni kushamisa muromo wayo; ndava somunhu asinganzwi, ano muromo usingapinduri. haiwa yeahoh, ndakakumirirai; muchapindura, imi ishe allah wangu. nokuti ndakati, “musavarega vachifarira kutambudzika kwangu kana kuzvisimudzira pamusoro pangu, rutsoka rwangu parunotedzemuka.” nokuti ndava pedyo nokuwa, uye kurwadziwa kwangu kunogara neni. ndinoreurura chivi changu; chivi changu chinonditambudza. vavengi vangu vane simba vazhinji; vanondivenga ndisina mhosva vakawanda. ivavo vanotsiva zvakanaka zvangu nezvakaipa, vanondireva pandinotevera zvakanaka. haiwa yeahoh, regai kundisiya; regai kuva kure neni, imi allah wangu. haiwa ishe muponesi wangu, kurumidzai kuuya kuzondibatsira.

39

kumutungamiri wokuimba. kuna jedhutuni. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndakati, “ndichangwarira nzira dzangu nokuchengeta rurimi rwangu pachivi; ndichaisa matomu pamuromo wangu kana vakaipa vari pamberi pangu.” asi pandakanga ndinyerere uye ndakadzikama, ndisingatauri kana chakanaka zvacho, kurwadziwa kwangu kwakawedzerwa. mwoyo wangu wakapisa mukati mangu, uye pandakafungisisa, moto ukapisa; ipapo ndakataura norurimi rwangu ndikati: “ndiratidzei, imi yeahoh, magumo oupenyu hwangu nokuwanda kwamazuva angu; ndizivisei kupfuura kwoupenyu hwangu. makaita mazuva angu soupamhi hwechanza changu; kuwanda kwamakore angu kwakaita sechinhu chisipo pamberi penyu. upenyu hwomunhu mumwe nomumwe mweya bedzi. munhu anongori mumvuri zvaanofamba-famba hake: anofamba nomufaro mukuru, asi zvinongova pasina; anounganidza pfuma, asingazivi achazoitora. “asi zvino, ishe, ndakamirireiko? tariro yangu iri mamuri. ndiponesei pakudarika kwangu kwose; regai kundiita chiseko chamapenzi. ndakanga ndinyerere; handina kushamisa muromo wangu, nokuti ndimi makaita izvi. bvisai shamhu yenyu kwandiri; ndakundwa nokurova kworuoko rwenyu. munorayira uye munoranga vanhu nokuda kwezvivi zvavo, munoparadza pfuma yavo sechipfukuto, munhu mumwe nomumwe mweya zvawo. sera “inzwai munyengetero wangu, imi yeahoh, rerekerai nzeve yenyu pandinochemera rubatsiro; regai kuva matsi pakuchema kwangu. nokuti ndigere nemi somutorwa, somweni, sezvakanga zvakaita madzibaba angu ose. ringirai kure neni, kuti ndimbofarazve ndisati ndabva uye ndisisipo.”

40

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndakamirira yeahoh nomwoyo murefu; iye akatendeukira kwandiri akanzwa kuchema kwangu. akandibudisa mugomba rakadzika, kunze kwamatope netsvina; akamisa tsoka dzangu padombo akandipa nzvimbo yakasimba kuti ndimirepo. akaisa rwiyo rutsva mumuromo mangu, rwiyo rwokurumbidza allah wedu. vazhinji vachaona, uye vachatya uye vachaisa ruvimbo rwavo muna yeahoh. akaropafadzwa munhu akaita yeahoh ruvimbo rwake, asingatariri kuna vanozvikudza, kuna avo vanotsaukira kuna vamwari venhema. haiwa yeahoh, allah wangu, zvizhinji zvishamiso zvamakaita. zvinhu zvamakatitongera hakuna angazvirondedzera kwamuri; dai ndingataura nokureva pamusoro pazvo, zvaizowandisa kuzvizivisa. hamuna kufarira zvibayiro nezvipo, asi nzeve dzangu makadziboora; zvibayiro zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezvivi hamuna kuzvireva. ipapo ndakati, “ndiri pano hangu, ndauya, zvakanyorwa mubhuku pamusoro pangu. ndinofarira kuita kuda kwenyu, imi allah wangu; murayiro wenyu uri mukati momwoyo wangu.” ndinoparidza kururama paungano huru; handidziviri miromo yangu, sokuziva kwenyu, imi yeahoh. handivanzi kururama kwenyu mumwoyo mangu; ndinotaura nezvokutendeka kwenyu noruponeso rwenyu. handivanzi rudo rwenyu nechokwadi chenyu paungano huru. regai kundinyima ngoni dzenyu, imi yeahoh; rudo rwenyu nechokwadi chenyu ngazvindidzivirire nguva dzose. nokuti matambudziko asingaverengeki akandikomberedza; zvivi zvangu zvakandibata, uye handigoni kuona. zvakawanda kupfuura bvudzi romumusoro mangu, uye mwoyo wangu waneta mukati mangu. haiwa yeahoh, kundiponesa ngakukufadzei; haiwa yeahoh, kurumidzai kundibatsira. vose vanotsvaka kutora upenyu hwangu ngavanyadziswe uye vanyonganiswe; vose vanoda kuparadzwa kwangu ngavadzoserwe shure vanyadziswe. avo vose vanoti kwandiri, “hekani waro! hekani waro!” ngavavhundutswe nokuda kwenyadzi dzavo. asi vose vanokutsvakai ngavafare uye vafarisise mamuri; avo vanoda ruponeso rwenyu ngavarambe vachiti, “yeahoh ngaakudzwe!” asi ndiri murombo nomushayiwi; dai ishe vandifungawo. ndimi mubatsiri wangu nomununuri wangu; haiwa allah wangu, musanonoka henyu.

41

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. akaropafadzwa uyo ane hanya navasina simba; yeahoh anomurwira panguva dzokutambudzika. yeahoh achamudzivirira uye achachengetedza upenyu hwake; achamuropafadza panyika uye haangamuisi kuchido chavavengi vake. yeahoh achamuraramisa panhoo yake yourwere uye achamuponesa panhoo yake yourwere. ini ndakati, “haiwa yeahoh, ndinzwirei ngoni; ndiporesei, nokuti ndakakutadzirai.” vavengi vangu vachindigodora vanoti, “achafa riniko uye zita rake rigoparara?” kana mumwe achiuya kuzondiona, anotaura zvenhema, mwoyo uchiunganidza makuhwa; ipapo anobuda ondozviparadzira kumwe. vavengi vangu vose vanoita zevezeve pamwe chete pamusoro pangu; vanondifungira zvakaipisisa, vachiti, “chirwere chakaipa chakamubata, haachambomukizve panzvimbo paakarara.” kunyange neshamwari yangu yapedyo yandaivimba nayo, yandaigovana zvokudya nayo, yandisimudzira chitsitsinho chayo. asi imi, iyemi yeahoh, mune tsitsi neni, ndisimudzei, kuti ndivatsive. ndinoziva kuti munofadzwa neni, nokuti muvengi wangu haandikundi. munonditsigira pakutendeka kwangu, uye munondiisa pamberi penyu nokusingaperi. kurumbidzwa ngakuve kuna yeahoh, allah waisraeri, kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira nokusingaperi.

42

kumutungamiri wokuimba. rwiyo rwemasikiri rwavanakomana vakora. senondo inodokwairira hova dzemvura, saizvozvo mweya wangu unodokwairirai, imi allah. mweya wangu une nyota kuna allah, nyota yaallah mupenyu. ndingaenda riniko kundosangana naallah? misodzi yangu yanga iri zvokudya zvangu masikati nousiku, asi zuva rose vanhu vanoti kwandiri, “allah wako aripiko?” ndinorangarira zvinhu izvi pandinodurura mweya wangu, mafambiro andaiita navazhinji ndichitungamirira mudungwe wavanhu kuimba yaallah, nokupembera nomufaro uye nokuvonga pakati pavazhinji pamutambo. wakasuwireiko, nhai mweya wangu? unotambudzwa neiko mukati mangu? isa tariro yako muna allah, nokuti ndichamurumbidzazve, muponesi wangu naallah wangu. mweya wangu wakaneta mukati mangu; naizvozvo ndichakurangarirai ndiri kunyika yejorodhani, pamatunhu akakwirira eheremoni, kubva pagomo remizari. pakadzika panodana pakadzika mukutinhira kwamapopopo emvura; mafungu enyu ose namafashamu akapfuura napamusoro pangu. masikati, yeahoh anorayira rudo rwake, pausiku rwiyo rwake runeni, munyengetero kuna allah woupenyu hwangu. ndinoti kuna allah dombo rangu, “mandikanganwireiko? ndinofambireiko ndichichema ndakadzvinyirirwa nomuvengi?” mapfupa angu atambura nokurwadza kworufu, sezvo vavengi vangu vachindizvidza zuva rose vachiti kwandiri, “allah wako aripiko?” wakasuwireiko, nhai mweya wangu? unotambudzwa neiko mukati mangu? isa tariro yako muna allah, nokuti ndichamurumbidzazve. muponesi wangu naallah wangu.

43

ndiruramisirei, imi allah, uye mundireverere mhaka yangu parudzi rusina allah; ndinunurei pavanhu vanonyengera nevakaipa. ndimi allah nhare yangu. mandirambireiko? ndinofambireiko pose ndichichema ndichidzvinyirirwa navavengi? tumirai chiedza chenyu nechokwadi chenyu, ngazvinditungamirire; ngazvindisvitse kugomo renyu dzvene, kunzvimbo yamunogara. ipapo ndichaenda kuaritari yaallah, kuna allah, iye mufaro wangu nomudikani wangu. ndichakurumbidzai nembira, imi allah, allah wangu. wakasuwireiko, nhai mweya wangu? unotambudzwa neiko mukati mangu? isa tariro yako muna allah, nokuti ndichamurumbidzazve, muponesi wangu naallah wangu.

44

kumutungamiri wokuimba wavanakomana vakora. masikiri. haiwa allah, takanzwa nenzeve dzedu; madzibaba edu akatiudza zvamakaita pamazuva avo, pamazuva ekare. noruoko rwenyu makadzinga ndudzi uye mukasima madzibaba edu; makapwanya marudzi mukaita kuti madzibaba edu abudirire. havana kuzviwanira nyika nomunondo wavo, uye ruoko rwavo haruna kuvakundisa; rwakanga rwuri ruoko rwenyu rworudyi, irwo ruoko rwenyu, nokupenya kwechiso chenyu, nokuti imi makavada. ndimi mambo wangu naallah wangu, anorayira kukunda kwayaqobho. kubudikidza nemi, tinosunda vavengi vedu shure; kubudikidza nezita renyu, tinotsika vavengi vedu netsoka dzedu. handivimbi nouta hwangu, munondo wangu haundivigiri kukunda; asi imi munotipa kukunda pamusoro pavavengi vedu, munonyadzisa vadzivisi vedu. tinozvirumbidza muna allah zuva rose, uye ticharumbidza zita renyu nokusingaperi. sera asi zvino matiramba uye matininipisa; hamuchabudi nehondo dzedu. makaita kuti tidududze pamberi pavavengi vedu, uye vadzivisi vedu vakatipamba. makatiramwira kumudyi samakwai uye makatiparadzira pakati pendudzi. makatengesa vanhu venyu pasina, hamuna kuwana kana chinhu pakuvatengesa. makatiita chiseko kuvavakidzani vedu, chinozvidzwa nechinosekwa chaavo vakatipoteredza. makatiita tsumo pakati pendudzi; vanhu vanotidzungudzira misoro. kunyadziswa kwangu kuri pamberi pangu zuva rose, uye chiso changu chafukidzwa nenyadzi pakuseka kwaavo vanondizvidza nokundirwisa, nokuda kwomuvengi, agarira kutsiva. zvose izvi zvakaitika kwatiri kunyange takanga tisina kukukanganwai, kana kuva vasina kutendeka kusungano yenyu. mwoyo yedu yakanga isati yafuratira; tsoka dzedu dzakanga dzisati dzatsauka panzira yenyu. asi makatipwanya mukatiita nzvimbo yamakava uye mukatifukidza nerima guru. dai takanga takanganwa zita raallah wedu, kana kutambanudzira maoko edu kuna mwari wavatorwa, allah haaizviziva here, sezvo achiziva zvakavanzika zvomwoyo? asi nokuda kwenyu takatarisana norufu zuva rose; tinotorwa samakwai anobayiwa. mukai, imi ishe! munovatireiko? zvisimudzei! regai kutiramba nokusingaperi. ko, munovanzirei chiso chenyu muchikanganwa kutambudzika nokudzvinyirirwa kwedu? takawisirwa muguruva; miviri yedu inonamatira pavhu. simukai mutibatsire; tidzikinurei nokuda kworudo rwenyu rusingaperi.

45

kumutungamiri wokuimba wavanakomana vakora. masikiri nomuimbirwo wa“maruva amahapa.” rwiyo rwomuchato. mwoyo wangu unobvongodzwa nedingindira rakanaka, pandinodetembera mambo ndima dzangu; rurimi rwangu chinyoreso chomunyori anogona. imi makanakisisa pavanhu vose uye miromo yenyu yakazadzwa nenyasha, sezvo allah akakuropafadzai nokusingaperi. sungai munondo wenyu parutivi, imi wamasimba, zvishongedzei nokubwinya noumambo. paumambo hwenyu kwirai mukunde kwazvo, makamirira chokwadi, kuzvininipisa nokururama; ruoko rwenyu rworudyi ngaruratidze mabasa enyu anotyisa. miseve yenyu inopinza ngaibaye mwoyo yavavengi vamambo; ndudzi ngadziputsikire pasi petsoka dzenyu. chigaro chenyu, imi allah, chichagara nokusingaperi-peri; tsvimbo yokururamisira ichava tsvimbo youmambo hwenyu. imi munoda kururama uye munovenga zvakaipa; naizvozvo allah, allah wenyu, akakuisai pamusoro peshamwari dzenyu nokukuzodzai namafuta omufaro. nguo dzenyu dzose dzinonhuwirira mura, arosi nekasia, zvinobva kumizinda yamadzimambo yakashongedzwa nenyanga dzenzou, kurira kwehungiso kunokufadzai. vanasikana vamadzimambo vari pakati pavakadzi vanokudzwa; kuruoko rwenyu rworudyi kuno mwenga akashongedzwa negoridhe reofiri. teerera, iwe mwanasikana, rangarira, uye urereke nzeve yako: kanganwa vanhu vako neimba yababa vako. mambo ayevedzwa norunako rwako; mukudze, nokuti ndiye ishe wako. mwanasikana wetire achauya nechipo, vanhu vakapfuma vachatsvaka nyasha kwauri. mwanasikana wamambo akanaka kwazvo mukati meimba yake; nguo yake yakarukirirwa negoridhe. akapfeka nguo dzakashongedzwa achaperekedzwa kuna mambo; shamwari dzake idzo mhandara dzinomutevera uye vanouyiswa kwamuri. vanoperekedzwa vachapinda nomufaro nokufarisisa; vanopinda mumuzinda wamambo. vanakomana venyu vachatsiva nzvimbo yamadzibaba enyu; muchavaita machinda munyika yose. ndichaita kuti kurangarirwa kwenyu kurambe kuripo, kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose; naizvozvo ndudzi dzichakurumbidzai nokusingaperi-peri.

46

kumutungamiri wokuimba wavanakomana vakora. namaimbirwo earamoti. rwiyo. allah ndiye utiziro hwedu nesimba redu, ndiye mubatsiri anogara aripo panguva yokutambudzika. naizvozvo hatizotyi, kunyange nyika ikashanduka, uye makomo akawira mukatikati megungwa, kunyange mvura yaro ikatinhira uye ikapupuma furo, uye makomo akadengenyeswa namafungu aro. sera pane rwizi rwuripo rune hova dzinofadza guta raallah, nzvimbo tsvene yewokumusoro-soro. allah ari mukati maro, haringawiri pasi; allah acharibatsira panguva yemambakwedza. ndudzi dzinoita bope, umambo hunoondomoka; anotaura nenzwi guru, nyika yonyongodeka. yeahoh wamasimba ose anesu; allah wayaqobho ndiye nhare yedu. sera uyai muone mabasa ayeahoh, kuparadza kwaakaita panyika. anoita kuti hondo dzigume kusvikira kumagumo enyika; anovhuna uta uye anovhuna-vhuna mapfumo, anopisa nhoo nomoto. “mirai, muzive kuti ndini allah; ndichakudzwa pakati pendudzi, ndichasimudzirwa panyika.” yeahoh wamasimba ose anesu; allah wayaqobho ndiye nhare yedu. sera

47

kumutungamiri wokuimba wavanakomana vakora. pisarema. uchirai maoko, imi vanhu vose; pururudzai kuna allah nokudanidzira kwomufaro. yeahoh wokumusoro-soro anotyisa sei, iye mambo mukuru pamusoro penyika yose! akaisa ndudzi dzavanhu pasi pedu, marudzi pasi petsoka dzedu. akatitsaurira nhaka yedu, iyo pfuma yayaqobho, waakada. sera allah akwidza kumusoro pakati pokudanidzira kwomufaro, yeahoh pakati pokurira kwehwamanda. imbirai allah nziyo dzokurumbidza, murumbidzei nenziyo. imbirai mambo wedu nziyo dzokurumbidza, murumbidzei nenziyo. nokuti allah ndiye mambo wenyika yose; muimbirei pisarema rokurumbidza. allah anotonga pamusoro pendudzi dzose; allah agere pamusoro pechigaro chake chitsvene. makurukota amarudzi aungana savanhu vaallah waabhurahama, nokuti madzimambo enyika ndeaallah; iye anokudzwa zvikuru kwazvo.

48

rwiyo. pisarema ravanakomana vakora. yeahoh mukuru, uye anofanira kurumbidzwa kwazvo, muguta raallah wedu, mugomo rake dzvene. rakanaka pakukwirira kwaro, mufaro wenyika yose. sokumusoro-soro kwezafoni, ndizvo zvakaita gomo rezioni, guta ramambo mukuru. allah ari munhare dzaro; akazviratidza kwariri kuti ndiye nharirire yaro. madzimambo akati abatanidza mauto, vakati vafamba pamwe chete kundorwa, vakariona vakashamiswa; vakatiza nokutya. vakabatwa nokudedera ipapo, nokurwadziwa sekwomukadzi osununguka. makavaparadza sezvakaitwa zvikepe zvetashishi, zvakaputswa-putswa nemhepo yokumabvazuva. sezvatakanzwa, ndizvo zvataona, muguta rayeahoh wamasimba ose, muguta raallah wedu: allah anorisimbisa nokusingaperi. sera tiri mukati metemberi yenyu, imi allah, tinofungisisa nezvorudo rwenyu rusingaperi. sezvakaita zita renyu, imi allah, kurumbidzwa kwenyu kunosvika kumagumo enyika; ruoko rwenyu rworudyi ruzere nokururama. gomo rezioni rinofarisisa, misha yeyeahudha inofara nokuda kwokutonga kwenyu. famba-fambai muzioni, ripoteredzei, verengai shongwe dzaro, fungisisai zvakanaka nezvamasvingo aro, cherechedzai nhare dzaro, kuti mugotaura nezvazvo kuchizvarwa chinotevera. nokuti allah uyu ndiye allah wedu nokusingaperi-peri; iye achava muperekedzi wedu kusvikira kumagumo.

49

kumutungamiri wokuimba, wavanakomana vakora. pisarema. inzwai izvi, imi vanhu mose; teererai imi mose mugere panyika, vapasi navapamusoro, vapfumi navarombo pamwe chete. muromo wangu uchataura nouchenjeri; kutaura kunobva pamwoyo wangu kuchapa kunzwisisa. ndicharerekera nzeve yangu kuchirahwe; nembira ndichadudzira shoko rangu rakavanzika. ndinotyireiko kana mazuva akaipa achiuya, kana vanyengeri vakaipa vandikomberedza, vaya vanovimba nepfuma yavo vanozvikudza nepfuma yavo zhinji? hakuna munhu angadzikinura upenyu hwomumwe kana kupa allah rudzikinuro rwake, rudzikinuro rwoupenyu runokosha, hakuna muripo unoringana nahwo, kuti ararame nokusingaperi uye kuti asaona kuora. nokuti vose vanogona kuona kuti vanhu vakachenjera vanofa; mapenzi navasina pfungwa zvimwe chetezvo vanofa, uye vanosiyira vamwe pfuma yavo. marinda avo achagara ari dzimba dzavo nokusingaperi, nougaro hwavo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvisingaperi, kunyange vakanga vakapa nyika mazita avo. asi munhu, kunyange ane pfuma yake, haagari; akafanana nemhuka dzinofa. ndiwo magumo aivavo vanovimba nezvavanoita, namagumo avateveri vavo, vanotenda zvavanotaura. sera samakwai vakatarirwa kuenda kuguva, uye rufu ruchavadya. vakarurama vachavatonga mangwanani; chimiro chavo chichaora murinda, kure nedzimba dzavo dzoumambo. asi allah achadzikinura upenyu hwangu kubva muguva, zvirokwazvo achanditora iye. sera usanyanya kutya kana munhu apfuma, kana kubwinya kweimba yake kwawedzerwa; nokuti haana chaachatora paanofa; kubwinya kwake hakungaburukiri naye murinda. kunyange paairarama aizviti akaropafadzwa, uye vanhu vachirumbidza munhu paanobudirira, achabatana norudzi rwamadzibaba ake, vasingazoonizve chiedza choupenyu. munhu ane pfuma zhinji asinganzwisisi akaita semhuka dzinofa.

50

pisarema raasafi. iye wamasimba, allah, yeahoh, anotaura uye anodana nyika kubva pakubuda kwezuva kusvikira kwarinovirira. kubva kuzioni, rakakwana parunako, allah anopenya. allah wedu anouya uye haanganyarari; moto unoparadza pamberi pake, uye dutu rine hasha rakamupoteredza. anodana matenga kumusoro, uye nenyika, kuti atonge vanhu vake achiti: “ndiunganidzirei vatsvene vangu, vakaita sungano neni nechibayiro.” uye matenga anoparidza kururama kwake, nokuti allah amene ndiye mutongi. sera “inzwai, imi vanhu vangu, uye ndichataura, imi israeri, uye ndichapupura pamusoro penyu: ndini allah, allah wenyu. handikutukei nokuda kwezvibayiro zvenyu, kana zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa, zvinogara zviri pamberi pangu. handisi kuda hando inobva mudanga rako, kana mbudzi inobva muzvirugu zvako, nokuti mhuka dzose dzesango ndedzangu, nemombe pamakomo chiuru. ndinoziva shiri dzose dziri mumakomo, uye zvisikwa zvose zvesango ndezvangu. kana dai ndaiva nenzara, handaikuudza iwe, nokuti nyika ndeyangu, nezvose zviri mairi. ko, ndinodya nyama yehando kana kunwa ropa rembudzi here? “bayirai zvibayiro zvokuvonga kuna allah, zadzisai zvamakapikira wokumusoro-soro, uye mudane kwandiri pazuva rokutambudzika; ndichakurwirai, uye imi muchandikudza.” asi kuna vakaipa, allah anoti: “ko, une mvumo ipiko iwe yokuti ududzire mutemo wangu, kana kuisa sungano yangu pamiromo yako? unovenga kurayira kwangu, uye unorasira mashoko angu shure kwako. paunoona mbavha, unowadzana nayo; unogoverana nemhombwe mugove wako. unoshandisa muromo wako kuita zvakaipa, uye unorovedza rurimi rwako kukunyengera. unogara uchipomera hama yako uye unoitira mwanakomana wamai vako makuhwa. zvinhu izvi wakazviita ini ndikaramba ndinyerere; wakafunga kuti ndakafanana newe. asi ndichakutsiura uye ndichaisa mhosva iyi pamberi pako. “fungai izvi, imi vanokanganwa allah, kuti ndirege kukubvambura-bvamburai mukashaya angakununurai: munhu anobayira chibayiro chokuvonga ndiye anondikudza, uye anogadzira nzira kuitira kuti ndimuratidze ruponeso rwaallah.”

51

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. panguva yakauya muprofita natani kwaari shure kwokuita upombwe kwadhavhidhi nabhatishebha. ndinzwirei tsitsi, imi allah, nokuda kworudo rwenyu rusingaperi; dzimai kudarika kwangu nokuda kwengoni dzenyu huru. shambidzai zvakaipa zvangu zvose uye mundinatse kubva pachivi changu. nokuti ndinoziva kudarika kwangu, uye chivi changu chinogara chiri pamberi pangu. ndakakutadzirai imi, iyemi moga nokuita chinhu chakaipa pamberi penyu, kuti munzi makarurama pamunotaura uye musapomerwa mhosva pakutonga kwenyu. zvirokwazvo ndakanga ndiri mutadzi pandakaberekwa, ndiri mutadzi kubva pandakaumbwa mudumbu ramai vangu. zvirokwazvo imi munoda chokwadi pakati pomwoyo; munondidzidzisa uchenjeri panzvimbo yomukatikati. ndinatsei nehisopi, ipapo ndichachena; ndishambidzei, ipapo ndichachena sechando. ndiitei kuti ndinzwe mufaro nokufarisisa; itai kuti mapfupa amakapwanya afare. vanzai chiso chenyu pazvivi zvangu uye mudzime zvakaipa zvangu zvose. sikai mukati mangu mwoyo wakachena, imi allah, uye muvandudze mweya wakarurama mukati mangu. regai kundirasa pamberi penyu kana kubvisa mweya wenyu mutsvene kwandiri. dzoreraizve kwandiri mufaro woruponeso rwenyu, uye mundipe mweya unoda, kuti undiraramise. ipapo ndichadzidzisa vadariki nzira dzenyu, uye vatadzi vachatendeukira kwamuri. ndiponesei pamhosva yeropa, imi allah, iyemi allah anondiponesa, ipapo rurimi rwangu ruchaimba zvokururama kwenyu. haiwa ishe, zarurai miromo yangu, ipapo muromo wangu uchaparidza rumbidzo yenyu. hamufariri chibayiro, ndingadai ndakuvigirai, imi hamufariri zvipiriso zvinopiswa. zvibayiro zvaallah mweya wakaputsika; mwoyo wakaputsika nowakapwanyika, imi allah hamuzoushori. pamufaro wenyu wakanaka, itai kuti zioni ribudirire; muvake masvingo ejerusarema. ipapo pachava nezvibayiro zvakarurama, zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvakazara zvinokufadzai; ipapo hando dzichabayirwa paaritari yenyu.

52

kumutungamiri wokuimba. rwiyo rwemasikiri rwadhavhidhi. dhoegi muedhomu paakanga aenda kuna sauro akamuudza kuti: “dhavhidhi aenda kumba kwaahimereki.” ko, unozvikudzirei pane zvakaipa, iwe murume wesimba? unozvikudzirei zuva rose, iyewe unonyadzisa pamberi paallah? rurimi rwako runofarira zvokuparadza; rwakaita sechisvo chakarodzwa, iyewe unogara uchingonyengera. unoda zvakaipa pachinzvimbo chezvakanaka, kureva nhema pachinzvimbo chokutaura chokwadi. sera unoda shoko rimwe nerimwe rinoparadza, iwe rurimi runonyengera! zvirokwazvo allah achakuburutsira kukuparadzwa kusingaperi: achakubvuta agokubvisa mutende rako; achakudzura kubva munyika yavapenyu. sera vakarurama vachazviona uye vachatya; vachamuseka vachiti, “houno zvino munhu asina kuita allah nhare yake, asi aivimba nepfuma yake zhinji, uye aisimba nokuparadza vamwe!” asi ini ndakaita somuti womuorivhi unokura zvakanaka mumba maallah; ndinovimba norudo rusingaperi rwaallah, nokusingaperi-peri. ndichakurumbidzai, nokusingaperi nokuda kwezvamakaita; ndichavimba nezita renyu, nokuti zita renyu rakanaka. ndichakurumbidzai pamberi pavatsvene venyu.

53

kumutungamiri wokuimba. namaimbirwo emaharati. rwiyo rwemasikiri rwadhavhidhi. benzi rinoti mumwoyo maro, “allah hakuna.” vakaora, uye nzira dzavo dzakaipa; hakuna anoita zvakanaka. allah anotarira ari kudenga, pavanakomana vavanhu, kuti aone kana aripo anonzwisisa, kana aripo anotsvaka allah. mumwe nomumwe wavo akadzokera shure, vakava vakaora pamwe chete; hakuna anoita zvakanaka, kunyange nomumwe. ko, vaiti vezvakaipa havangadzidzi here, vaya vanodya vanhu vangu savanhu vanodya chingwa, uye vasingadani kuna allah? havo, vakazadzwa nokutya, ipo pasina chavangatya. allah akaparadzira mapfupa avanhu vaikurwisa; makavanyadzisa, nokuti allah akavazvidza. haiwa, dai ruponeso rwaisraeri rwabuda kubva muzioni; allah paachadzosera nhaka yavanhu vake; yaqobho ngaafarisise uye israeri ngaafarisise!

54

kumutungamiri wokuimba nemitengeranwa ine hungiso. rwiyo rwemasikiri rwadhavhidhi. vazefati pavakaenda kuna sauro kundoti, “ko, dhavhidhi haana kuvanda pakati pedu here?” ndiponesei, imi allah, nezita renyu; ndiruramisirei nesimba renyu. inzwai munyengetero wangu, imi allah; teererai kumashoko omuromo wangu. vatorwa vanondirwisa; vanhu vane utsinye vanotsvaka upenyu hwangu, vanhu vasingazivi allah. sera zvirokwazvo allah ndiye mubatsiri wangu; ishe ndiye anonditsigira. zvakaipa ngazvimonere pane avo vanondireva; muvaparadze pakutendeka kwenyu. ndichakubayirai chipiriso chokungopa; ndicharumbidza zita renyu, imi yeahoh, nokuti rakanaka. nokuti akandirwira pamatambudziko angu ose, uye mukukunda, meso angu akatarisa vavengi vangu.

55

kumutungamiri wokuimba nemitengeranwa ine hungiso. rwiyo rwemasikiri rwadhavhidhi. rerekerai nzeve yenyu kumunyengetero wangu, imi allah; regai kushaya hanya nokukumbira kwangu; ndinzwei, uye ndipindureiwo. pfungwa dzangu dzinondinetsa uye ndiri kushushikana, pandinonzwa inzwi romuvengi wangu, pandinodzvokorwa navakaipa; nokuti vanodururira matambudziko pamusoro pangu, uye vanondituka mukutsamwa kwavo. mwoyo wangu unorwadziwa mukati mangu; kutyisa kworufu kunondiwira. kutya nokudedera zvakandibata; kutya kukuru kwakandifukidza. ini ndakati, “haiwa, dai ndina mapapiro enjiva! ndaibhururukira kure ndikandozorora hangu, ndaitizira kure kwazvo, ndikandogara mugwenga; sera ndaikurumidza kundovanda panzvimbo yangu, kure nemafungu nedutu.” nyonganisai vakaipa, imi ishe, kanganisai mutauro wavo, nokuti ndinoona mhirizhonga nokurwa muguta. masikati nousiku vanopoterera masvingo aro chinyararire; utsinye nokumanikidza zviri mukati maro. masimba okuparadza azere muguta; kutyisidzira nenhema hazvibvi munzira dzaro. dai ndatukwa nomuvengi, ndaigona kushinga hangu; dai muvengi aindimukira, ndaigona kumuvanda hangu. asi ndiwe, munhu akaita seni, mumwe wangu, shamwari yangu yapedyo, yandaimbofarira kuwadzana nayo pataifamba navazhinji mumba maallah. rufu ngaruwane vavengi vangu vasingafungiri; ngavaburukire muguva vari vapenyu, nokuti kuipa kwakawana pokugara pakati pavo. asi ini ndinodana kuna allah, uye yeahoh anondiponesa. madekwana, mangwanani namasikati ndinochema mukushushikana, uye iye anonzwa inzwi rangu. anondidzikinura ndisina kukuvara kubva pahondo inondirwisa, kunyange zvazvo vazhinji vachindipikisa. allah, agere pachigaro choushe nokusingaperi, achavanzwa agovaninipisa, sera ivo vanhu vasingamboshanduri nzira dzavo, uye vasingatyi allah. mumwe wangu anorova shamwari dzake; anoputsa sungano yake. mutauro wake unotsvedzerera samafuta, asi kurwa kuri mumwoyo make; mashoko ake anopfavisa kukunda mafuta, asi minondo yakavhomorwa. kanda kufunganya kwako pana yeahoh uye iye achakusimbisa; haazombotenderi vakarurama kuti vawire pasi. asi imi, iyemi allah, muchaburutsira vakaipa pasi mugomba rokuora; vanhu vanokarira ropa navanyengeri havangararami hafu yamazuva avo. asi kana ndirini, ndinovimba nemi.

56

kumutungamiri wokuimba. namaririro e“njiva pamiouki iri kure.” pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo rwemikitami. paakabatwa navafiristia pagati. ndinzwirei ngoni, imi allah, nokuti vanhu vanondidzinganisa nehasha; zuva rose vanorwa neni. vavengi vangu vanondidzinganisa zuva rose; vazhinji vanorwa neni mukuzvikudza kwavo. pandinenge ndotya, ndichavimba nemi. muna allah, iye ane shoko randinorumbidza, muna allah ndinovimba; handichazotyi. ko, munhu anofa angandiitei? zuva rose vanomonyorora mashoko angu; vanogara vachirangana kundikuvadza. vanorangana, vanovandira, vanocherechedza mafambiro angu, vachishuva kundiuraya. ngavasapunyuka savasina mhaka; koromorerai ndudzi pasi mukutsamwa kwenyu imi allah. nyorai kuchema kwangu; isai misodzi yangu parugwaro rwenyu, ko, hazvina kuiswa muzvinyorwa zvenyu here? ipapo vavengi vangu vachadzokera shure pandinodanidzira kuti ndibatsirwe. nechinhu ichi, ndichaziva kuti allah ari kurutivi rwangu. muna allah, iye ane shoko randinorumbidza, muna yeahoh, ane shoko randinorumbidza, muna allah ndinovimba; handichazotyi chinhu. ko, munhu angandiitei? ndinosungwa nemhiko kwamuri, imi allah; ndichakuvigirai zvipo zvangu zvokuvonga. nokuti makandirwira parufu, uye netsoka dzangu pakugumburwa, kuti ndifambe pamberi penyu muchiedza choupenyu.

57

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbiro okuti, “musaparadza.” pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo rwemikitami. paakatiza kubva kuna sauro akapinda mubako. ndinzwirei ngoni, imi allah, ndinzwirei ngoni, nokuti mweya wangu unovanda mamuri. ndichavanda mumumvuri wamapapiro enyu, kusvikira njodzi yapfuura. ndinodanidzira kuna allah wokumusoro-soro, kuna allah anozadzisa chinangwa chake kwandiri. anotuma kubva kudenga agondiponesa, achituka vaya vanondidzingirira nehasha; sera allah anotumira rudo rwake nokutendeka kwake. ndiri pakati peshumba; ndinovata pakati pemhuka dzinokara, ivo vanhu vane meno amapfumo nemiseve, vane ndimi dzinopinza seminondo. kudzwai, imi allah, pamusoro pamatenga; kubwinya kwenyu ngakuve pamusoro penyika yose. sera vanowaririra tsoka dzangu mimbure, ndakakotamiswa pasi nenhamo. vakachera gomba panzira yangu, asi vakawiramo vamene. sera mwoyo wangu wakasimba, allah wangu, mwoyo wangu wakasimba; ndichaimba uye ndichaimba rwiyo. chimuka iwe mweya wangu! mukai imi mutengeranwa nembira! ini ndichamutsa mambakwedza. ndichakurumbidzai imi, iyemi ishe, pakati pendudzi; ndichakuimbirai pakati pamarudzi. nokuti rudo rwenyu rukuru, runosvika kudenga denga; kutendeka kwenyu kunosvika kumusoro. kudzwai, imi allah, pamusoro pamatenga; kubwinya kwenyu ngakuve pamusoro penyika yose.

58

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbiro okuti, “musaparadza.” pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo rwemikitami. ko, imi vatongi munotaura mukururama here? munotonga pakati pavanhu nokururamisira here? kwete, munofunga kusaruramisira mumwoyo menyu, uye maoko enyu anomanikidza panyika. kunyange kubvira pakuberekwa, vakaipa vanofamba mukutsauka; kubva mudumbu ramai, vakaipa uye vanoreva nhema. uturu hwavo hwakaita souturu hwenyoka, vakafanana nemhakure yadzivira nzeve dzayo, isingateereri maimbiro enʼanga kunyange zvazvo achiimba nouchenjeri hukuru. vhunai mazino mumiromo yavo, imi allah; bvisai, imi yeahoh, mazino marefu eshumba! ngavatsakatike semvura yapera kuerera; pavanowembura uta, miseve yavo ngaigomare. vafanane nehozhwa inonyakatika painofamba, kufanana negavamwedzi, ngavarege kuona zuva. hari dzenyu dzisati dzanzwa kupisa kweminzwa pamoto, ingava minyoro kana yakaoma, vakaipa vachakukurwa. vakarurama vachafara pavachatsivirwa, pavachashambidza tsoka dzavo muropa ravakaipa. ipapo vanhu vachati, “zvirokwazvo vakarurama vachiri kungowana mubayiro; zvirokwazvo allah ariko anotonga nyika.”

59

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbiro anoti, “musaparadza.” pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo rwemikitami. sauro paakanga atuma varume kundorinda imba yadhavhidhi kuti amuuraye. ndirwirei pavavengi vangu, imi allah; ndidzivirirei kubva kuna avo vanondimukira. ndirwirei pavaiti vezvakaipa, uye mundiponese pavanhu vanokarira kuteura ropa. tarirai kundivandira kwavakaita! vanhu vanotyisa vanondirangana pasina mhosva yandapara kana chivi, nhai yeahoh. handina chandakakanganisa, asi ivo vagadzirira kundirwisa. simukai mundibatsire; tarirai dambudziko rangu! haiwa yeahoh, allah wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, mukai murange ndudzi dzose; musanzwira ngoni vakaipa navapanduki. sera vanodzoka madekwana, vachihonʼa sembwa, uye vachinyahwaira muguta. onai zvavanorutsa mumiromo yavo: vanorutsa minondo kubva pamiromo yavo, uye vanoti, “ndiani angatinzwa?” asi imi, iyemi yeahoh, munovaseka; munodadira ndudzi dzose. haiwa imi simba rangu, ndinokurindirai; imi, iyemi allah, ndimi nhare yangu, allah anondida achanditungamirira uye achanditendera kuti ndifare pamusoro pavanondireva. asi musavauraya, imi ishe nhoo yedu, zvimwe vanhu vangu vangakanganwa. musimba renyu itai kuti vadzungaire, uye muvaderedze. nokuda kwezvivi zvemiromo yavo, nokuda kwamashoko emiromo yavo, ngavabatwe pakuzvikudza kwavo. nokuda kwokutuka nenhema dzavanotaura, vaparadzei nehasha dzenyu, vaparadzei kusvikira vapera. ipapo zvichazivikanwa kumigumo yenyika kuti allah anotonga pamusoro payaqobho. sera vanodzoka madekwana, vachihonʼa sembwa, uye vachinyahwaira muguta. vanodzungaira vachitsvaka zvokudya, uye vanohuhudza kana vasina kuguta. asi ini ndichaimba nezvesimba renyu, ndichaimba nezvorudo rwenyu mangwanani; nokuti imi muri nhare yangu, utiziro hwangu panguva dzokutambudzika. haiwa imi simba rangu, ndinokuimbirai nziyo dzokukurumbidzai; imi, allah, ndimi nhare yangu, allah anondida.

60

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbirwo e“ruva remahapa resungano.” rwiyo rwemikitami rwadhavhidhi. rwokudzidzisa. paakarwa nearamu naharaimu nearamu zobha, uye panguva yakadzoka joabhu akaparadza zviuru gumi nezviviri zvavaedhomu mumupata womunyu. makatiramba, imi allah, uye mukatirwisa; makanga makatsamwa, zvino tidzorei henyu! makazungunusa nyika mukaitsemura napakati; gadzirai henyu mitswe yayo, nokuti iri kudengenyeka. makaratidza vanhu venyu nguva dzakaoma; makatipa waini inotidzedzeresa. asi kuna vanokutyai, makasimudza mureza kuti urege kupfaranyurwa neuta. sera tiponesei uye tibatsirei noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, kuti avo vamunoda varwirwe. allah akataura ari muimba yake tsvene achiti: “ndichaganhura shekemu nesimba uye ndichayera mupata wesukoti. gireadhi nderangu, uye manase ndowangu; efuremu inguwani yangu yakasimba, yeahudha itsvimbo yangu. moabhu ndiwo mudziyo wangu wokushambira, pamusoro paedhomu ndipo pandinokanda shangu yangu; pamusoro pafiristia ndinopururudza mukukunda.” ndianiko achandiisa kuguta rakakomberedzwa? ndianiko achanditungamirira kuenda kuedhomu? hamusimi, iyemi allah, iyemi makatiramba here, uye mukarega kubuda nehondo dzedu? tibatsirei pavavengi vedu, nokuti rubatsiro rwavanhu haruna maturo. naallah wedu, tichakunda, uye achatsikira vavengi vedu pasi.

61

kumutungamiri wokuimba, nomutengeranwa une hungiso. pisarema radhavhidhi. inzwai kuchema kwangu, imi allah; rerekerai nzeve yenyu kumunyengetero wangu. kubva kumigumo yenyika, ndinodanidzira kwamuri, ndinodana sezvo mwoyo wangu woziya; nditungamirirei kudombo rakakwirira kundipfuura. nokuti imi makanga muri utiziro hwangu, shongwe yakasimba pamusoro pavavengi vangu. ndinopanga kugara mutende renyu nokusingaperi, uye nokuvanda mumumvuri wamapapiro enyu. sera nokuti makanzwa mhiko dzangu, imi allah; makandipa nhaka yaavo vanotya zita renyu. wedzerai mazuva oupenyu hwamambo, makore ake kumarudzi namarudzi. ngaagare pachigaro choushe pamberi paallah nokusingaperi; gadzai rudo nokutendeka kwenyu kuti zvimudzivirire. ipapo ndichagara ndichirumbidza zita renyu nenziyo, uye ndichazadzisa mhiko dzangu zuva nezuva.

62

kumutungamiri wokuimba. kuna jedhutuni. pisarema radhavhidhi. mweya wangu unozorora muna allah oga; ruponeso rwangu runobva kwaari. iye oga ndiye dombo rangu noruponeso rwangu; ndiye nhare yangu, handingambozungunuswi. muchasvika kupiko muchingorova munhu? ko, imi mose muchamukanda pasi here, iyeyu rusvingo rwakarereka, noruzhowa rwuri kuwa? vanofunga kwazvo zvokumuwisira pasi kubva panzvimbo yake yakakwirira; vanofarira nhema. vanoropafadza nemiromo yavo, asi vachituka mumwoyo yavo. sera iwe mweya wangu, zviwanire zororo muna allah oga; tariro yangu inobva kwaari. ndiye oga dombo rangu noruponeso rwangu; ndiye nhare yangu, handingazungunuswi. ruponeso rwangu nokukudzwa kwangu zvinobva kuna allah; ndiye dombo rangu guru, noutiziro hwangu. vimbai naye nguva dzose, imi vanhu; dururai mwoyo yenyu kwaari, nokuti allah ndiye utiziro hwedu. sera vanhu vasina maturo vanongova mweya zvawo, asi vanokudzwa inhema bedzi; kana vakayerwa havaremi, havasi chinhu; vose pamwe chete vanongova mweya. regai kuvimba noupambi kana kuzvikudza nezvinhu zvokuba; kunyange pfuma yenyu ichiwanda, regai kuisa mwoyo yenyu pairi. chinhu chimwe chakataurwa naallah, zvinhu zviviri zvandakanzwa: kuti imi, iyemi allah, mune simba, uye kuti imi, iyemi ishe, mune rudo. zvirokwazvo muchapa mubayiro kumunhu mumwe nomumwe maererano nezvaakaita.

63

pisarema radhavhidhi paakanga ari murenje reyeahudha. haiwa allah, ndimi allah wangu, ndinokutsvakai nomwoyo wose; mwoyo wangu une nyota kwamuri, muviri wangu unokupangai, munyika yakaoma uye yasakara isina mvura. ndakakuonai munzvimbo yenyu tsvene, uye ndikaona simba renyu nokubwinya kwenyu. nokuti rudo rwenyu runokunda upenyu, miromo yangu ichakurumbidzai. ndichakurumbidzai ndichiri mupenyu, uye ndichasimudza maoko angu muzita renyu. mweya wangu uchagutswa kunge wadya zvakakora kwazvo; muromo wangu uchakurumbidzai nemiromo inofara kwazvo. ndinokurangarirai ndiri pamubhedha wangu; ndinokufungai panguva dzose dzousiku. nokuti muri mubatsiri wangu, ndinoimba ndiri mumumvuri wamapapiro enyu. mweya wangu unonamatira kwamuri; ruoko rwenyu rworudyi runonditsigira. vanotsvaka upenyu hwangu vachaparadzwa; vachaburukira kwakadzika kwepasi. vachaiswa kumunondo vagova zvokudya zvamakava. asi mambo achafara muna allah; vose vanopika nezita raallah vachamurumbidza, asi miromo yavanoreva nhema ichafumbirwa.

64

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndinzweiwo, imi allah, pandinotaura chichemo changu; dzivirirai upenyu hwangu pakutyisidzira kwavavengi. ndivanzei pakurangana kwavakaipa, ndibve pazhowezhowe yeungano yavaiti vezvakaipa. vanorodza ndimi dzavo seminondo, uye vanonanga namashoko avo semiseve inouraya. vanopfura vari pakavanda munhu asina mhosva; vanomupfura pakarepo, vasingatyi. vanokurudzira mumwe nomumwe wavo pakufunga zvakaipa, vanotaura pamusoro pokuteya misungo yavo, uye vanoti, “ndianiko achaiona?” vanorangana kusaruramisira vachiti, “tafunga zano rakakwana!” zvirokwazvo mwoyo nomurangariro womunhu zvinonyengera. asi allah achavapfura nemiseve; pakarepo vachawira pasi. achaita kuti ndimi dzavo dzivashandukire, uye achavaisa pakuparadzwa; vose vanovaona vachavadzungudzira misoro vachivaseka. marudzi ose avanhu achatya; achaparidza mabasa aallah, uye achafungisisa zvaakaita. vakarurama ngavafare muna yeahoh uye vavande maari; vose vakarurama mumwoyo ngavamurumbidze!

65

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo. kurumbidzwa kwakakumirirai, imi allah, muzioni; kwamuri mhiko dzedu dzichazadziswa. haiwa, imi munonzwa munyengetero, vanhu vose vachauya kwamuri. patakanga takafukidzwa nezvivi, makakanganwira kudarika kwedu. vakaropafadzwa avo vamunosarudza navamunoswededza pedyo kuti vagare pavanze dzenyu! takagutswa nezvinhu zvakanaka zveimba yenyu, zvetemberi yenyu tsvene. munotipindura namabasa okururama anotyisa, imi allah muponesi wedu, tariro yemigumo yepasi pose namakungwa ari kure kure, iyemi makaumba makomo nesimba renyu, makazvishongedza nesimba, iyemi makanyaradza kutinhira kwamakungwa, iko kutinhira kwamafungu aro, nokupopota kwendudzi. vanogara kure kure vanotya zvishamiso zvenyu; uko kunobuda mambakwedza uye madekwana achipera, munodanidzira nziyo dzomufaro. mune hanya nenyika uye munoidiridza; munoipfumisa kwazvo. hova dzaallah dzizere nemvura kuti dzivigire vanhu zviyo, nokuti saizvozvo ndimi makazvirayira. munozadza mihoronga yacho nemvura, uye munoenzanisa mihomba yacho; munoinyorovesa nemvura inopfunha munoropafadza zvibereko zvayo. munoshongedza gore nekorona yezvakawanda zvenyu, uye ngoro dzenyu dzinopfachukira nezvakawanda. uswa hwomurenje hwopfachukira; zvikomo zvakafukidzwa nomufaro. mafuro azara namapoka emakwai, uye mipata yafukidzwa nezviyo; zvinodanidzira nomufaro uye zvinoimba.

66

kumutungamiri wokuimba. rwiyo. pisarema. danidzirai nomufaro kuna allah, imi nyika yose! imbirai mukurumbira wezita rake; murumbidze zvikuru kukudzwa kwake! muti kuna allah, “mabasa enyu anotyisa sei! simba renyu iguru zvokuti vavengi venyu vanodedera pamberi penyu. nyika yose inokukotamirai; vanokuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza, vanoimba nziyo dzokurumbidza zita renyu.” sera uyai muone zvaitwa naallah, mabasa ake anotyisa sei pakati pavanhu! akashandura gungwa rikava nyika yakaoma, vakafamba nomumvura zhinji netsoka dzavo, uyai, ngatifarei maari. anotonga nokusingaperi nesimba rake, meso ake anocherechedza ndudzi, vanomumukira ngavarege kumisidzana naye. sera rumbidzai allah wedu, imi vanhu, inzwi rokurumbidzwa kwake ngarinzwike; iye akachengetedza upenyu hwedu netsoka dzedu kuti dzirege kutedzemuka. nokuti imi, iyemi allah, makatiedza; mukatinatsa sesirivha. makatipinza mutorongo mukatitakudza mitoro pamisana yedu. makabvumira vanhu kukwira pamisoro yedu; takapinda mumoto nomumvura, asi makatiisa kunzvimbo ine zvakawanda. ndichauya nezvibayiro zvinopiswa kutemberi yenyu, ndigozadzisa mhiko dzangu kwamuri, mhiko dzandakavimbisa nemiromo yangu, uye muromo wangu wakataura pandakanga ndiri munhamo. ndichakubayirai mhuka dzakakora nechipiriso chamakondobwe; ndichabayirawo hando nembudzi. sera uyai munzwe, imi mose munotya allah; ndikuudzei zvaakandiitira. ndakachema kwaari nomuromo wangu; rumbidzo yake yaiva parurimi rwangu. dai ndakanga ndaviga chivi mumwoyo mangu, ishe aidai asina kundinzwa; asi zvirokwazvo allah akateerera akanzwa inzwi rangu mumunyengetero. allah ngaarumbidzwe, iye asina kuramba munyengetero wangu. kana kudzivisa rudo rwake kwandiri!

67

kumutungamiri wokuimba nemitengeranwa ine hungiso. pisarema. rwiyo. allah ngaatinzwire tsitsi atiropafadze, uye apenyese chiso chake pamusoro pedu, sera kuti nzira dzenyu dzizivikanwe panyika, ruponeso rwenyu pakati pendudzi dzose. marudzi ngaakurumbidzei, imi allah; marudzi ose ngaakurumbidzei. ndudzi ngadzifare uye dziimbe nomufaro, nokuti munotonga marudzi nokururamisira, uye munotungamirira ndudzi dzenyika. sera marudzi ngaakurumbidzei, imi allah; marudzi ose ngaakurumbidzei. ipapo nyika ichabereka mukohwo wayo, uye allah, allah wedu, achatiropafadza. allah achatiropafadza, uye migumo yose yepasi ichamutya.

68

mutungamiri mukuru wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. rwiyo. allah ngaasimuke, vavengi vake ngavaparadzirwe; vavengi vake ngavatize pamberi pake. sokupeperetswa kunoitwa utsi nemhepo, saizvozvo vapeperetsei; sokunyauka kunoita namo pamberi pomoto, vakaipa ngavaparare pamberi paallah. asi vakarurama ngavafare, vafarisise pamberi paallah; ngavafare vapembere. imbirai allah, imbirai zita rake nziyo dzokurumbidza, murumbidzei zvikuru iye anofamba pamusoro pamakore, zita rake ndiyeahoh, uye farai pamberi pake. baba venherera, mudziviriri wechirikadzi, ndiye allah ari paugaro hwake utsvene. vakanga vari voga allah akavagarisa mumhuri, anosesedza vasungwa vachiimba; asi mhandu dzinogara panyika yatsva nezuva. pamakatungamirira vanhu venyu, imi allah, pamakafamba napakati perenje, sera nyika yakazungunuka, matenga akadurura mvura, pamberi paallah, iye wesinai, pamberi paallah, iye allah waisraeri. imi allah, makanayisa mvura zhinji; mukaita kuti nhaka yenyu yakaneta ifefeterwe. vanhu venyu vakagaramo, uye imi allah, kubva pane, zvakawanda zvenyu, makariritira varombo. ishe akataura shoko, vanhu vakaparidza shoko vaiva vazhinji kwazvo: “madzimambo navarwi vakakurumidza kutiza; mumisasa, vanhu vakagovana zvakapambwa. kunyange pamunenge makavata pakati pemoto yemisasa, mapapiro enjiva yangu akafukidzwa nesirivha, minhenga yayo negoridhe rinovaima.” wamasimba ose paakaparadzira madzimambo munyika, zvakanga zvakaita sechando chawira pamusoro pezarimoni. makomo ebhashani makomo oushe; makomo ebhashani akati twi. munotaririreiko negodo, imi makomo akati twi, pagomo rakasarudzwa naallah kuti atongepo, pachagarwa nayeahoh pachake nokusingaperi? ngoro dzaallah dzinosvika makumi ezviuru nezviuru zvezviuru; ishe akasvika panzvimbo yake tsvene achibva kusinai. pamakakwira kumusoro, makatungamirira vatapwa mumudungwe wenyu; mukagamuchira zvipo zvaibva kuvanhu, kunyange zvaibva kuna vakapanduka, kuti imi, iyemi yeahoh allah, mugarepo. ishe ngaarumbidzwe, allah muponesi wedu, anotakura mitoro yedu zuva nezuva. sera allah wedu ndiallah anoponesa; kupunyuka parufu kunobva kuna ishe yeahoh. zvirokwazvo allah achapwanya misoro yavavengi vake, panhongonya dzine vhudzi dzaavo vanorambira muzvivi zvavo. ishe anoti, “ndichavabvisa kubva kubhashani; ndichavabudisa kubva kwakadzika kwegungwa, kuti unyike tsoka dzako muropa ravavengi vako, ndimi dzembwa dzako dzichiwanawo mugove wadzo.” mudungwe wenyu wakaonekwa, imi allah, mudungwe waallah wangu namambo achipinda munzvimbo tsvene. mberi kuna vaimbi, vachiteverwa navaridzi vemitengeranwa; pamwe chete navarandakadzi vachiridza matambureni. rumbidzai allah paungano huru; rumbidzai allah pagungano raisraeri. tarirai, rudzi ruduku rwabhenjamini runovatungamirira, hawo machinda mazhinji ayeahudha, uye hawo machinda azebhuruni neanafutari. danai simba renyu, imi allah; tiratidzei simba renyu, imi allah, sezvamakaita kare. nokuda kwetemberi yenyu pajerusarema, madzimambo achakuvigirai zvipo. tukai mhuka dziri pakati petsanga, mapoka ehando ari pakati pemhuru dzendudzi. ngavauye nesirivha, vakazvininipisa. paradzirai ndudzi dzinofarira kurwa. nhume dzichabva kuijipiti; etiopia ichazviisa pasi paallah. imbirai allah, imi ushe hwepasi, rumbidzai ishe nenziyo, sera kuna iye anotasva matenga akare kumusoro, iye anobudisa inzwi rake, inzwi rine simba. paridzai simba raallah, iye ano ushe huri pamusoro peisraeri, ane simba riri kudenga denga. munotyisa imi allah, muri panzvimbo yenyu tsvene; allah waisraeri anopa ushe nesimba kuvanhu vake. allah ngaarumbidzwe!

69

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbirwo a“maruva emahapa.” pisarema radhavhidhi. ndiponesei, imi allah, nokuti mvura zhinji yakwira kusvikira pamutsipa wangu. ndinonyura munhope yakadzika, pasina pangatsika makumbo angu. ndapinda mumvura yakadzika; ndafukidzwa namafashamu. ndaneta nokuridza mhere yokuti ndibatsirwe; huro dzangu dzaoma, meso angu aneta nokumirira allah wangu. vanondivenga ndisina mhosva vakawanda kupfuura bvudzi romusoro wangu; vanondivenga ndisina mhosva vazhinji, avo vanotsvaka kundiparadza. ndinomanikidzwa kudzosera zvandisina kuba. munoziva upenzi hwangu, imi allah; mhaka yangu haina kuvanzika kwamuri. vaya vane tariro mamuri ngavarege kunyadziswa nokuda kwangu, haiwa ishe, yeahoh wamasimba ose; vanokutsvakai ngavarege kunyadziswa nokuda kwangu, haiwa allah waisraeri. nokuti ndinotsunga kusekwa hangu nokuda kwenyu, uye nyadzi dzafukidza chiso changu. ndiri mutorwa kuhama dzangu, nomweni kuvanakomana vamai vangu; nokuti kushingairira imba yenyu kwandipedza, uye kutuka kwaavo vanokutukai kunowira pamusoro pangu. pandinochema uye ndichitsanya, ndinofanira kushinga pakusekwa; pandinofuka nguo dzamasaga, vanhu vanondiita shumo. vaya vanogara pasuo vanondiseka, uye ndiri rwiyo rwezvidhakwa. asi ndinonyengetera kwamuri, imi allah, panguva inokufadzai; murudo rwenyu rukuru, imi allah, ndipindurei noruponeso rwenyu rwechokwadi. ndinunurei mumatope, musandirega ndichinyura; ndirwirei kuna vanondivenga, napamvura zhinji yakadzika. musatendera mvura yamafashamu kuti indifukidze, kana kwakadzika kuti kundimedze kana kuti gomba rizarure muromo waro pamusoro pangu. ndipindurei, imi yeahoh, zvichibva pakunaka kworudo rwenyu; dzokerai henyu kwandiri nokuda kwetsitsi dzenyu huru. regai kuvanzira muranda wenyu chiso chenyu; ndipindurei nokukurumidza, nokuti ndava mudambudziko. swederai pedyo mundinunure; ndidzikinurei nokuda kwavavengi vangu. munoziva kusekwa kwangu, kunyadziswa nokusakudzwa kwangu; vavengi vangu vose vari pamberi penyu. kusekwa kwaputsa mwoyo wangu, uye kwandisiya ndisisina chingandibatsira; ndakatsvaka vangandinzwira ngoni, asi ndakavashaya, vangandinyaradza, asi ndakavashayazve. vakaisa nduru mune zvokudya zvangu, uye vakandipa vhiniga pandaiva nenyota. tafura yagadzirwa pamberi pavo ngaive musungo; ngaive shamhu yokuranga neriva. meso avo ngaapofumadzwe kuti varege kuona, uye misana yavo iminame nokusingaperi. dururirai hasha dzenyu pamusoro pavo; kutsamwa kwenyu kunotyisa ngakuvakurire. nzvimbo yavo ngaisiyiwe; ngaparege kuva nomunhu anogara mumatende avo. nokuti vanotambudza vaya vamakarova, uye vanotaura pamusoro pokurwadziwa kwavakakuvadzwa nemi. vapei mhosva pamusoro pemhosva; ngavarege kuva nomugove woruponeso rwenyu. ngavadzimwe mubhuku roupenyu, uye varege kuverengwa pamwe chete navakarurama. ndiri pakurwadziwa nenhamo; ruponeso rwenyu imi allah, ngarundidzivirire. ndicharumbidza zita raallah norwiyo, uye ndichamukudza nokuvonga. izvi zvichafadza yeahoh kukunda nzombe, kupfuura hando nenyanga dzayo, namahwanda ayo. varombo vachazviona uye vachafara, imi vanotsvaka allah, mwoyo yenyu ngairarame! yeahoh anonzwa vanoshayiwa uye haashori vanhu vake vakatapwa. denga nenyika ngazvimurumbidze, makungwa nezvose zvinofamba, imomo, nokuti allah achaponesa zioni agovakazve maguta ayeahudha. ipapo vanhu vachagarako, vagoritora; vana vavaranda vake vacharipiwa senhaka, uye avo vanoda zita rake vachagara ikoko.

70

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. chikumbiro. kurumidzai kundiponesa, imi allah; haiwa yeahoh kurumidzai kuuya mundibatsire. vanotsvaka upenyu hwangu ngavanyadziswe uye vakanganiswe; vose vanofarira kuparara kwangu ngavadzorwe shure vanyare. vanoti kwandiri, “hekani waro! hekani waro!” ngavadzorerwe shure nokuda kwenyadzi dzavo. asi vose vanokutsvakai ngavafare nokufarisisa mamuri; vanoda ruponeso rwenyu ngavagare vachiti, “allah ngaakudzwe!” asi ndiri murombo nomushayiwi; uyai nokukurumidza kwandiri, imi allah. imi muri mubatsiri wangu nomurwiri wangu; haiwa yeahoh, musanonoka.

71

ndinovanda mamuri, imi yeahoh; ngandirege kutongonyadziswa. ndinunurei uye mundirwire mukururama kwenyu; rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri uye mundiponese. ivai bako rangu rokuvanda kwandingaramba ndichienda; rayirai kuti ndiponeswe, nokuti ndimi dombo rangu nenhare yangu. haiwa allah wangu, ndirwirei, paruoko rwowakaipa, pakubatwa navanhu vakaipa uye vane utsinye. nokuti muri tariro yangu, imi ishe yeahoh, ndakavimba nemi kubva pauduku hwangu. ndakazendamira pamuri kubva pakuberekwa kwangu; ndimi makandibudisa mudumbu ramai vangu. ndicharamba ndichikurumbidzai. ndava sechishamiso kuvazhinji, asi imi muri utiziro hwangu hwakasimba. muromo wangu uzere nerumbidzo yenyu, ndinoparidza kubwinya kwenyu zuva rose. regai kundirasa pandinenge ndakwegura; musandisiya kana simba rangu rapera. nokuti vavengi vangu vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro pangu; avo vakamirira kundiuraya vanorangana pamwe chete. vanoti, “allah amusiya; muteverei mumubate, nokuti hakuna achamununura.” regai kuva kure neni, imi allah; uyai nokukurumidza, imi allah wangu, mundibatsire. vapomeri vangu ngavaparare vanyadziswe; vaya vanoda kundikuvadza ngavafukidzwe nokusekwa nokunyadziswa. asi kana ndirini, ndichagara ndine tariro; ndicharamba ndichikurumbidzai zvakanyanya. muromo wangu uchareva zvokururama kwenyu, nezvoruponeso rwenyu zuva rose, kunyange ndisingazivi chiyero charwo. ndichauya ndichiparidza mabasa enyu makuru, imi ishe yeahoh; ndichaparidza kururama kwenyu, iyemi moga. kubva pauduku hwangu, imi allah, makandidzidzisa, nanhasi uno ndinoparidza mabasa enyu anoshamisa. kunyange pandinenge ndakwegura uye bvudzi rachena, musandisiya, imi allah, kusvikira ndaparidza simba renyu kurudzi runotevera, nesimba renyu kuna vose vari kuzouya. kururama kwenyu kunosvika kudenga kumusoro, imi allah, iyemi makaita zvinhu zvikuru. haiwa allah, ndiani akafanana nemi? kunyange imi makandiratidza matambudziko mazhinji uye anorwadza, muchadzosa upenyu hwangu zvakare; kubva kwakadzika kwepasi muchandibudisazve. muchawedzera kukudzwa kwangu, uye muchandinyaradzazve. ndichakurumbidzai nembira nokuda kwokutendeka kwenyu, imi allah wangu; ndichakurumbidzai nenziyo nomutengeranwa, imi mutsvene woga waisraeri. miromo yangu ichadanidzira nomufaro pandinokurumbidzai nenziyo, iyeni, wamakadzikinura. rurimi rwangu ruchataura nezvamabasa enyu akarurama zuva rose, nokuti avo vaida kundikuvadza vanyadziswa uye vakanganiswa.

72

pisarema rasoromoni. shongedzai mambo nokururamisira kwenyu, imi allah, mwanakomana wamambo nokururama kwenyu. achatonga vanhu venyu nokururama, navanonetswa venyu nokururamisira. makomo achavigira vanhu kubudirira, nezvikomo, chibereko chokururama. achadzivirira vanonetswa pakati pavanhu, uye achaponesa vana vavanoshayiwa; achapwanya mudzvinyiriri. achashinga sokuvapo kwezuva, sokuvapo kwomwedzi, kusvikira kumarudzi ose anotevera, achafanana nemvura inonaya pamunda une uswa hwakachekererwa, seguti rinonyorovesa nyika. pamazuva ake vakarurama vachakura zvakanaka; kubudirira kuchawanda kusvikira mwedzi waguma. achatonga kubva kugungwa kusvikira kugungwa, uye kubva parwizi kusvikira kumagumo enyika. marudzi omugwenga achapfugama pamberi pake, uye vavengi vake vachananzva guruva. madzimambo etashishi navari kumahombekombe ari kure vachamuvigira mutero; madzimambo eshebha nesebha vachamupa zvipo. madzimambo ose achamupfugamira uye ndudzi dzose dzichamushandira. nokuti acharwira vanoshayiwa vanodanidzira; vanonetswa vasina anovabatsira. achanzwira ngoni vasina simba navanoshayiwa, uye achaponesa vanoshayiwa kubva parufu. achavanunura pakudzvinyirirwa nokuitirwa zvinhu nechisimba, nokuti ropa ravo rinokosha pamberi pake. iye ngaararame upenyu hurefu! goridhe rinobva kushebha ngaripiwe kwaari. vanhu ngavarambe vachimunyengeterera uye vamuropafadze zuva rose. zviyo ngazviwande munyika yose; ngazvizengaire pamusoro pezvikomo. zvibereko zvazvo ngazvikure zvakanaka serebhanoni; ngazvibukire sebundo romusango. zita rake ngarigare nokusingaperi; ngarirambe riripo sokuvapo kwezuva. ndudzi dzose dzicharopafadzwa kubudikidza naye, uye vachamuti, ano mufaro. yeahoh allah ngaarumbidzwe, allah waisraeri, iye oga anoita mabasa anoshamisa. zita rake rinobwinya ngarirumbidzwe nokusingaperi; nyika yose ngaizadzwe nokubwinya kwake. ndipo panoperera minyengetero yadhavhidhi, mwanakomana wajese.

73

pisarema raasafi. zvirokwazvo allah akanaka kuna israeri, kuna avo vakachena pamwoyo. asi kana ndirini, tsoka dzangu dzakapotsa dzatsvedza; ndakasara paduku kupunzika. nokuti ndakaitira shanje vanozvikudza, pandakaona kubudirira kwavakaipa. havatambudziki; miviri yavo ino utano uye vakasimba. vakasununguka pamitoro inowanikwa muvanhu; havatambudzwi nezvinotambudza vanhu. naizvozvo kuzvikudza ndiko ruketani rwemitsipa yavo; vanozvishongedza nechisimba. mumwoyo yavo makasindimara munobuda chitadzo; mifungo yakaipa yendangariro dzavo haina magumo. vanoseka, uye vanotaura noutsinye mukuzvikudza kwavo, vanoti vachadzvinyirira vamwe. miromo yavo inoti denga nderavo, uye ndimi dzavo dzinotora nyika. naizvozvo vanhu vavo vanodzokera kwavari, uye vanonwa mvura yakawanda. vanoti, “allah angazviziva sei? ko, wokumusoro-soro ane ruzivo here?” ndizvo zvakaita vakaipa, havana hanya nguva dzose, vanowedzera pfuma yavo. zvirokwazvo ndakanatsa mwoyo wangu, asi pasina; ndakashamba maoko angu ndisina mhosva, asi pasina. zuva rose ndanga ndichitambudzwa; ndinorangwa mangwanani ose. dai ndakanga ndati, “ndichataura zvakadai,” ndingadai ndakapandukira vana venyu. pandakaedza kunzwisisa izvi zvose, zvakandiremera kwazvo kusvikira ndapinda munzvimbo tsvene yaallah; ipapo ndikazonzwisisa magumo avo. zvirokwazvo makavaisa munzira inotsvedza; makavakanda pasi kuti vaparare. haiwa, vanoparadzwa kamwe kamwe, vanopedzwa chose nezvinotyisa! sezvakaita kurota panopepuka munhu, saizvozvo pamunomuka, imi ishe, muchavashora savanhu vanorotomoka. mwoyo wangu pawakachema uye mweya wangu ukashungurudzika, ndakanga ndava benzi uye ndisingazivi; ndakanga ndava mhuka inotyisa pamberi penyu. kunyange zvakadaro ndinogara nemi nguva dzose; munondibata noruoko rwenyu rworudyi. munondisesedza nezano renyu, uye pashure muchazonditora mondipinza mukubwinya kwenyu. ndianiko wandinaye kudenga kana musirimi? uye nyika haina chandinoshuva kunze kwenyu. nyama yangu nomwoyo wangu zvingapera hazvo, asi allah isimba romwoyo wangu nomugove wangu nokusingaperi. avo vari kure nemi vachaparara; munoparadza vose vasina kutendeka kwamuri. asi kana ndirini, zvakanaka kuva pedyo naallah. ndakaita ishe yeahoh utiziro hwangu; ndichataura zvamabasa enyu ose.

74

masikiri raasafi. haiwa allah, makatirambireiko nokusingaperi? kutsamwa kwenyu kwapfungairireiko pamusoro pamakwai anofudzwa nemi? rangarirai vanhu vamakatenga kare, rudzi rwenhaka yenyu, ivo vamakadzikinura, gomo rezioni, pamaigara. dzorai nhambwe dzenyu mutarise matongo asingaperi, kuparadza ikoku kwose kwakauya nomuvengi pamusoro penzvimbo yenyu tsvene. vavengi venyu vakaomba panzvimbo yamakasangana nesu; vakamisa mireza yavo sechiratidzo. vakaita savanhu vanosimudza matemo kuti vateme dondo remiti. vakaputsa zvose zvakavezwa namatemo avo nembezo. vakapisira pasi nzvimbo yenyu tsvene; vakamhura ugaro hwezita renyu. vakati mumwoyo yavo, “tichavaputsa zvachose!” vakapisa nzvimbo dzose dzokunamatira allah munyika. hatichaoni zviratidzo zvinoshamisa; hakuna muprofita akasara, pakati pedu hapana munhu anoziva kuti zvicharamba zvakadaro kusvikira rini. haiwa allah, muvengi acharamba achikushorai kusvikira riniko? ko, muvengi acharamba achimhura zita renyu nokusingaperi here? munodzoserereiko ruoko rwenyu shure, irwo ruoko rwenyu rworudyi? rubvisei pamupendero wenguo yenyu muvaparadze! asi imi, iyemi allah, ndimi mambo wangu kubva nakare; imi munouyisa ruponeso panyika. ndimi makaganhura gungwa napakati nesimba renyu; makaputsa misoro yechikara chomumvura. ndimi makapwanya misoro yarevhiatani, mukamuita chokudya chezvisikwa zvomugwenga. ndimi makazarura zvitubu nehova; mukapwisa nzizi dzaigara dzichierera. zuva nderenyu, uye usiku ndohwenyuwo; makasimbisa zuva nomwedzi. ndimi makatara miganhu yose yenyika; mukaita zvose zhizha nechando. rangarirai kuti muvengi akakushorai sei, imi yeahoh, uye kuti mapenzi akamhura sei zita renyu. regai kuisa upenyu hwenjiva yenyu kumhuka dzesango; regai kukanganwa nokusingaperi upenyu hwavanhu venyu vanonetswa. ivai nehanya nesungano yenyu, nokuti mweya wokurwisana wazadza nzvimbo dzerima munyika. musarega vakadzvinyirirwa vachidududza shure nenyadzi; varombo navanoshayiwa ngavarumbidze zita renyu. simukai, imi allah, mutsigire mhaka yenyu; rangarirai kuti mapenzi anokushorai sei zuva rose. regai kushayira hanya ruzha rwavadzivisi venyu, bope ravavengi venyu, rinoramba richikwira.

75

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbiro okuti, “regai kuparadza.” pisarema raasafi. rwiyo. tinokuvongai, imi allah, tinokuvongai, nokuti zita renyu riri pedyo; vanhu vanotaura nezvamabasa enyu anoshamisa. imi munoti, “ndinosarudza nguva yakatarwa; ndini ndinotonga zvakarurama. panozununguka nyika yose navanhu vayo, ini ndini ndinobata mbiru dzayo zvakasimba. sera kuna vanozvikudza ndinoti, ‘regai kuzvikudzazve,’ uye kuna vakaipa, ndinoti, ‘regai kusimudza nyanga dzenyu. regai kusimudzira nyanga dzenyu kudenga; regai kutaura nemitsipa mikukutu.’ ” hakuna munhu anobva kumabvazuva kana kumavirira, kana anobva kugwenga angasimudzira munhu. asi allah ndiye anotonga: anoderedza mumwe, achisimudzira mumwe. muruoko rwayeahoh mune mukombe uzere newaini inopupuma, yakavhenganiswa nezvinonhuhwira; anoidururira pasi, uye vakaipa vose vapanyika vanoinwa kusvikira pamasese ayo. kana ndirini, ndichaparidza izvi nokusingaperi; ndichaimbira allah wayaqobho rwiyo rwokurumbidza. ndichagura nyanga dzavakaipa vose, asi nyanga dzavakarurama dzichasimudzirwa kumusoro.

76

kumutungamiri wokuimba nomutengeranwa une hungiso. pisarema raasafi. rwiyo. allah anozivikanwa muyeahudha; zita rake iguru muisraeri. tende rake riri musaremu, ugaro hwake pazioni. ndipo paakavhuna miseve inovaima, nhoo neminondo, izvo zvombo zvokurwa. sera imi makashongedzwa nechiedza, kupfuura makomo akapfuma nemhuka. varume vakashinga vakavata pasi vapambwa, vakavata hope dzavo dzokupedzisira; hakuna mumwe wavarwi angasimudza maoko ake. pakutuka kwenyu, imi allah wayaqobho, zvose bhiza nengoro zvinovata zvakati mwiro. imi moga ndimi munofanira kutyiwa. mukatsamwa, ndianiko angamira pamberi penyu? muri kudenga makazivisa kutonga kwenyu, uye nyika yakatya ikanyarara, haiwa allah, pamakasimuka kuti mutonge, kuti muponese vanonetswa vose venyika. sera zvirokwazvo hasha dzenyu pamusoro pavanhu dzinokuvigirai kurumbidzwa, uye vanosara pahasha dzenyu vachadziviswa. itai mhiko kuna yeahoh allah wenyu mugodzizadzisa; nyika dzose dzakakupoteredzai ngadzivigire zvipo kuna iye anofanira kutyiwa. anoputsa mweya yavatongi; anotyiwa namadzimambo enyika.

77
