kumutungamiri wokuimba. kuna jedhutuni. pisarema raasafi. ndakadanidzira kuna allah kuti andibatsire; ndakadana kuna allah kuti andinzwe. pandakanga ndiri pakutambudzika, ndakatsvaka ishe; panguva yousiku ndakatambanudza maoko angu asinganeti, uye mweya wangu wakaramba kunyaradzwa. haiwa allah, ndakakurangarirai, uye ndikagomera; ndakafungisisa, mweya wangu ukaziya. sera makakonesa meso angu kutsinzina; ndakatambudzika zvokuti ndakatadza kutaura. ndakarangarira mazuva ekare, makore ekare kare; ndakarangarira nziyo dzangu panguva yousiku. mwoyo wangu wakafungisisa uye mweya wangu wakabvunza ukati, “ko, ishe acharamba nokusingaperi here? haachazombonzwiri ngonizve here? ko, rudo rwake rusingaperi rwakabva nokusingaperi here? chipikirwa chake chakakona nokusingaperi here? sera ko, allah akanganwa kuva nenyasha here? mukutsamwa kwake haachaitira tsiye dzake nyoro here?” ipapo ndakafunga ndikati, “ndichakumbira hangu pane izvozvi: makore oruoko rworudyi rewokumusoro-soro.” ndicharangarira mabasa ayeahoh; hongu, ndicharangarira zvishamiso zvenyu zvakare kare. ndichafungisisa pamusoro pamabasa enyu ose, uye ndicharangarira mabasa enyu makuru. haiwa allah, nzira dzenyu itsvene. ndoupiko mwari mukuru saallah wedu? muri allah anoita zvishamiso; munoratidza simba renyu pakati pavanhu. noruoko rwenyu rune simba, makadzikinura vanhu venyu, izvo zvizvarwa zvayaqobho nayosefa. sera mvura zhinji yakakuonai, imi allah, mvura zhinji yakakuonai ikatya; kwakadzika chaiko kwakabvunda. makore akadurura mvura, kumatenga kwakaunga nokutinhira; miseve yenyu yakapenya kuno nokoko. kutinhira kwenyu kwakanzwika muchamupupuri, kupenya kwenyu kwakavhenekera nyika; nyika yakadedera ikadengenyeka. gwara renyu rakapinda nomugungwa, nzira yenyu ikapinda nomumvura zhinji zhinji, kunyange zvazvo tsoka dzenyu dzakanga dzisingaonekwi. makatungamirira vanhu venyu seboka ramakwai noruoko rwamozisi naaroni.

78

masikiri raasafi. haiwa vanhu vangu, inzwai kudzidzisa kwangu; teererai mashoko omuromo wangu. ndichashamisa muromo wangu nditaure nomufananidzo, ndichataura zvinhu zvakavanzika, zvinhu zvakare kare, zvatakanzwa nezvatakaziva, zvatakaudzwa namadzibaba edu. hatingazozvivanziri vana vavo; tichaudza rudzi runotevera mabasa angarumbidzwa ayeahoh, simba rake, nezvishamiso zvaakaita. akatema zvirevo zvayaqobho akasimbisa murayiro muisraeri, waakarayira madzitateguru edu kuti vadzidzise vana vavo, kuti rudzi runotevera ruzvizive, kunyange vana vachazoberekwa, naivo vagozoudzawo vana vavo. ipapo vachavimba naallah wavo uye havangazokanganwi mabasa ake asi vachazochengeta mirayiro yake. havazofanani namadzitateguru avo, rudzi rwakanga rwakasindimara uye rwaimumukira, mwoyo yavo yakanga isingateereri allah, mweya yavo yakanga isina kutendeka kwaari. vanhu vokwaefuremu, kunyange vakanga vakapakata uta, vakadzokera shure pazuva rokurwa; havana kuchengeta sungano yaallah, uye vakaramba kufamba maererano nomurayiro wake. vakakanganwa zvaakaita, zvishamiso zvaakavaratidza. akaita zviratidzo pamberi pamadzibaba avo munyika yeijipiti, mudunhu rezoani. akapamura gungwa akavayambutsa napakati; akaita kuti mvura imire yakasimba sorusvingo. akavatungamirira negore masikati, uye nechiedza chomoto usiku hwose. akapamura ruware mugwenga akavapa mvura yakawanda seyamakungwa; akabudisa hova dzemvura paruware akaita kuti iyerere seyenzizi. asi vakaramba vachingomutadzira, vachimukira wokumusoro-soro mugwenga. vakaedza allah nobwoni vachimugombedzera kuti avape zvokudya zvavaipanga. vakapopotera allah, vachiti, “ko, allah angawadzira tafura mugwenga here? paakarova dombo, mvura yakatubuka, uye hova dzakayerera mvura zhinji. asi angagona kutipawo zvokudya here? angavigira vanhu vake nyama here?” yeahoh akati avanzwa, akatsamwa zvikuru kwazvo; moto wake ukaveserwa yaqobho, uye hasha dzake dzikamukira israeri, nokuti havana kutenda muna allah kana kuvimba nokurwira kwake. asi akarayira matenga kumusoro akazarura makonhi okumatenga; akanayisa mana kuti vanhu vadye, akavapa zviyo zvokudenga. vanhu vakadya chingwa chavatumwa; akavatumira zvokudya zvose zvavaigona kudya. akazarura mhepo yokumabvazuva kubva kudenga, uye akafambisa mhepo yakabva zasi nesimba rake. akavanayisira nyama pamusoro pavo seguruva, shiri dzinobhururuka dzakaita sejecha rokumhenderekedzo yegungwa. akaita kuti dziburukire mumisasa yavo, dzakapoteredza matende avo ose. vakadya kusvikira vaguta kwazvo, nokuti akanga avapa zvavakanga vachipanga. asi vasati vafuratira chokudya chavaikarira, kunyange pachakanga chichiri pamiromo yavo, kutsamwa kwaallah kwakavamukira; akauraya vakanga vakanyanya kusimba pakati pavo, akaparadza majaya eisraeri. kunyange zvakadaro, vakaramba vachingotadza; kunyange zvazvo zviratidzo zvake izvi zvaivapo, havana kutenda. saka akagumisa mazuva avo nezvisina maturo, uye makore avo mukutya. pose pavaiurayiwa naallah, ndipo pavaimutsvaka; vaishingairira kudzokerazve kwaari. vakarangarira kuti allah ndiye dombo ravo, kuti allah wokumusoro-soro ndiye mudzikinuri wavo. asizve vaingomubata kumeso nemiromo yavo, vachimurevera nhema nendimi dzavo; mwoyo yavo yakanga isina kutendeka kwaari, vakanga vasina kutendeka pasungano yake. kunyange zvakadaro iye akavanzwira tsitsi; akavakanganwira kuipa kwavo akasavaparadza. nguva nenguva akadzora kutsamwa kwake, uye haana kumutsa hasha dzake dzose. akarangarira kuti ivo vaingova nyama bedzi, mhepo inopfuura isingadzoki. vakamumukira mugwenga kazhinji sei, uye vakamuitisa shungu murenje! vakaedza allah vamuedzazve; vakagumbusa iye mutsvene waisraeri. havana kurangarira simba rake, zuva raakavadzikinura kubva pamudzvinyiriri, zuva raakaratidza zviratidzo zvake zvinoshamisa muijipiti, zvishamiso zvake mudunhu rezoani. akashandura nzizi dzavo dzikava ropa; havana kugona kunwa muhova dzavo. akavatumira mapupira enhunzi dzikavaparadza, uye matatya akavaparadza zvikuru. akapa zviyo zvavo kumagutaguta nezvibereko zvavo kumhashu. akaparadza mazambiringa avo nechimvuramabwe, uye namaonde emionde yavo nechando. mombe dzavo akadziisa kuchimvuramabwe, nezvipfuwo zvavo kukurova kwemheni. akaregedzera kutsamwa kwake kukuru pamusoro pavo, hasha dzake, shungu dzake noukasha hwake, boka ravatumwa vokuparadza. akagadzira nzira yokutsamwa kwake; haana kuponesa mweya yavo parufu asi akavaisa kudenda. akauraya matangwe ose eijipiti, chibereko chokutanga chomurume pamatende ahamu. asi akabudisa vanhu vake seboka ramakwai; akavatungamirira samakwai nomugwenga. akavafambisa norugare, asi gungwa rakamedza vavengi vavo. saizvozvo akavasvitsa kumuganhu wenyika yake tsvene, kunyika yamakomo yaakatora noruoko rwake rworudyi. akadzinga ndudzi mberi kwavo, akagovera nyika yavo kwavari senhaka; akagarisa rudzi rwaisraeri mudzimba dzavo. asi vakaedza allah uye vakamukira wokumusoro-soro; vakasachengeta zvirevo zvake. vakanga vasingazvirereki uye vasina kutendeka samadzibaba avo, vasingavimbiki souta hunonyengera. vakamutsamwisa nenzvimbo dzavo dzakakwirira; vakamutsa godo rake nokuda kwezvifananidzo zvavo. allah akati avanzwa akatsamwa zvikuru kwazvo; akaramba israeri zvachose. akasiya tabhenakeri yeshiro, iyo tende yaakanga amisa pakati pavanhu. akaendesa areka yesimba rake kuutapwa, kubwinya kwake mumaoko omuvengi. akaisa vanhu vake kumunondo; akatsamwira nhaka yake zvikuru kwazvo. moto wakaparadza majaya avo, uye varandakadzi vavo vakashayiwa nziyo dzesvitsa; vaprista vavo vakanga vaiswa kumunondo, uye chirikadzi dzavo hadzina kugona kuchema. ipapo ishe akamuka somunhu anga akakotsira, somunhu amuka pakubatwa newaini. akarova vavengi vake vakadzokera shure; akavanyadzisa nokusingaperi. ipapo akaramba matende ayosefa, haana kusarudza rudzi rwaefuremu; asi akasarudza rudzi rwayeahudha, gomo rezioni, raakada. akavaka nzvimbo yake tsvene senhare yakakwirira, senyika yaakasimbisa nokusingaperi. akasarudza dhavhidhi muranda wake, akamutora kumatanga amakwai; akamubvisa pakufudza makwai kuti ave mufudzi wavanhu vake yaqobho, vaisraeri nhaka yake. uye dhavhidhi akavafudza nokururama kwomwoyo; akavatungamirira namaoko ouchenjeri.

79

pisarema raasafi. haiwa allah, ndudzi dzapinda panhaka yenyu; vakasvibisa temberi yenyu tsvene, jerusarema varideredza rikava marara. vakapa mitumbi yavaranda venyu sezvokudya zveshiri dzedenga, nyama yavatsvene venyu kuzvikara zvenyika. vakateura ropa kunge mvura pajerusarema rose, uye hakuna munhu anoviga zvitunha. tiri chinhu chinoshorwa navatigere navo, chinosekwa nechinozvidzwa kuna avo vakatipoteredza. haiwa yeahoh, mucharamba makatitsamwira nokusingaperi kusvikira riniko? godo renyu richapisa somoto kusvikira riniko? dururirai hasha dzenyu pamusoro pendudzi dzisingakuzive, napaushe husingadani kuzita renyu; nokuti vakapedza yaqobho uye vakaparadza nyika yokwake. regai kuverengera pamusoro pedu zvivi zvamadzibaba; tsitsi dzenyu ngadzikurumidze kuuya kuzosangana nesu, nokuti tiri pakutambudzika. tibatsirei, imi allah muponesi wedu, nokuda kwokukudzwa kwezita renyu; tirwirei mutiregerere zvivi zvedu nokuda kwezita renyu. ndudzi dzichataurireiko dzichiti, “allah wavo aripi?” zivisai pakati pendudzi, pamberi pedu, kuti munotsiva ropa ravaranda venyu rakateurwa. kugomera kwavasungwa ngakusvike pamberi penyu; nesimba roruoko rwenyu chengetedzai avo vakatongerwa rufu. mutsive kanomwe pamabvi avavakidzani vedu, kutuka kwavakaita zita renyu, imi ishe. ipapo vanhu venyu, makwai amafuro enyu, vachakurumbidzai nokusingaperi; kubva kune chimwe chizvarwa kusvikira kune chimwe chizvarwa, ticharondedzera nezvokurumbidzwa kwenyu.

80

kumutungamiri wokuimba nomuimbiro wa “maruva amahapa esungano.” pisarema raasafi. tinzwei, imi mufudzi weisraeri, imi makatungamirira yosefa seboka ramakwai; iyemi munogara pachigaro choushe pakati pamakerubhi, penyai pamberi paefuremu, bhenjamini namanase. mutsai simba renyu; uyai mutiponese. tidzorei, imi allah, penyesai chiso chenyu pamusoro pedu, kuti tiponeswe. haiwa yeahoh allah wamasimba ose, kutsamwa kwenyu kucharamba kuchipisa pamusoro peminyengetero yavanhu venyu kusvikira riniko? makavapa chingwa chemisodzi kuti vadye; makaita kuti vanwe misodzi yakawanda. makatiita mavambo enharo kuna vatigere navo, uye vavengi vedu vanotiseka. tidzorei, imi allah wamasimba ose; penyesai chiso chenyu pamusoro pedu, kuti tiponeswe. makabudisa muzambiringa kubva muijipiti; makadzinga ndudzi mukaudyara. makaukurira nzvimbo, uye ukava nemidzi ukazadza nyika. makomo akanga akafukidzwa nomumvuri wawo, nemisidhari mikuru namatavi awo. wakatandavadza matavi awo kusvikira kugungwa, namabukira awo kusvikira kurwizi. seiko makaputsa masvingo awo kuti vose vanopfuura napo vanonge mazambiringa awo? nguruve dzinobva musango dzinouparadza, uye zvisikwa zvesango zvinoudya. dzokerai kwatiri, imi allah wamasimba ose! tarirai muri kudenga muone! rindai muzambiringa uyu, iwo mudzi wakasimwa noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, mwanakomana wamakazvirerera. muzambiringa wenyu watemerwa pasi, wapiswa nomoto; pakutuka kwenyu, vanhu venyu vanofa. ruoko rwenyu rworudyi ngarugare pamusoro pomunhu ari kurudyi kwenyu, mwanakomana womunhu wamakazvirerera. ipapo hatingazobvi kwamuri; timutsiridzei, tigodana kuzita renyu. tidzorei, imi allah wamasimba ose; penyesai chiso chenyu pamusoro pedu, kuti tiponeswe.

81

kumutungamiri wokuimba. namaimbirwo egititi. pisarema raasafi. imbirai allah nomufaro iye simba redu; danidzirai kuna allah wayaqobho! vambai rwiyo, muridze tambureni, ridzai mbira dzinonakidza nomutengeranwa. ridzai runyanga rwehwai pakugara kwomwedzi, uye pakuchena kwomwedzi, pazuva romutambo wedu; ichi ndicho chirevo chaisraeri, chakatarwa naallah wayaqobho. akachisimbisa somutemo wakanyorwa wayosefa panguva yaakandorwa neijipiti, uko kwatakanzwa mutauro watakanga tisinganzwisisi. iye anoti, “ndakabvisa mutoro pamapfudzi avo; maoko avo akasunungurwa padengu. pakutambudzika kwako wakadana ini ndikakununura, ndakakupindura ndiri mugore rokutinhira; ndakakuedza pamvura zhinji yemeribha. sera “inzwai, imi vanhu vangu, uye ndichakuyambirai, kana mukada chete kunditeerera, imi israeri! pakati penyu ngaparege kuva namwari wavatorwa, musapfugamira mwari wokumwe. ndini yeahoh allah wako, akakubudisa kubva munyika yeijipiti. shamisa muromo wako kwazvo, ndigouzadza. “asi vanhu vangu havana kuda kundinzwa, israeri haana kuda kuzviisa pasi pangu. saka ndakavaregera paukukutu hwemwoyo yavo, kuti vatevere mano avo. “kana vanhu vangu vakada kunditeerera, kana israeri akada kutevera nzira dzangu, ndaikurumidza kukunda sei vavengi vavo nokurova vavengi vavo noruoko rwangu! vaya vanovenga yeahoh vachatya pamberi pake, uye kurangwa kwavo kuchagara nokusingaperi. asi imi muchagutswa nezviyo zvakaisvonaka; uye ndichakugutsai nouchi hunobva padombo.”

82

pisarema raasafi. allah anogara paungano huru; anotonga pakati pa“vamwari” achiti, “muchasvika riniko muchirwira vasakarurama uye muchisanangura vanhu vakaipa? sera tongai mhaka dzavasina simba nenherera; chengetedzai kodzero dzavarombo navakadzvinyirirwa. nunurai vasina simba navanoshayiwa; varwirei paruoko rwowakaipa. “havana chavanoziva, havana chavanonzwisisa. vanongofamba-famba murima; nheyo dzose dzenyika dzinozungunuswa. “ndakati, ‘muri vamwari; imi mose muri vanakomana vewokumusoro-soro.’ asi muchafa savanhuwo zvavo; muchawa savatongi vose.” simukai, imi allah, mutonge nyika, nokuti ndudzi dzose inhaka yenyu.

83

rwiyo. pisarema raasafi. haiwa allah, regai kunyarara; musanyarara, imi allah, musati mwiro. tarirai kumutswa kwaitwa vavengi venyu, namasimudziro avaita misoro yavo. vakarangana nounyengeri pamusoro pavanhu venyu; vanorangana pamusoro paavo vamunochengeta zvakanaka. ivo vanoti, “uyai, ngativaparadzei sorudzi, kuti zita raisraeri rirove.” vanorangana pamwe chete nomwoyo mumwe chete; vanoita sungano yokuzorwa nemi, matende eedhomu nevaishumaeri, nemoabhu navahagari, gebha, amoni neamareki, firistia, navanhu vetire. kunyange neasiria yabatana navo kuti vasimbise zvizvarwa zvaroti. sera muvaitire sezvamakaitira vamidhia, sezvamakaita kuna sisera najabhini parwizi kishoni, ivo vakafira paendori uye vakava sendove pamusoro pevhu. muite makurukota avo saorebhu nazibhi, machinda avo ose sazebha nazarumuna, ivo vakati, “handei tindotora mafuro aallah.” haiwa allah wangu, vaitei sendira, sehundi inodzingwa nemhepo. somoto unopisa sango kana moto unoririma mugomo, saka vateverei nedutu renyu mugovavhundutsa nokutinhira wenyu. fukidzai zviso zvavo nenyadzi kuti vanhu vagotsvaka zita renyu, imi yeahoh. ngavarambe vachinyadziswa uye vavhundutswe; ngavafire munyadzi dzavo. ngavazive kuti imi, mune zita rinonzi yeahoh, ndimi moga wokumusoro-soro ari pamusoro penyika yose.

84

kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbirwo egititi. pisarema ravanakomana vakora. ugaro hwenyu hwakanaka sei, imi yeahoh wamasimba ose! mweya wangu unopanga, uye unotoziya, nokuda kwezvivanze zvayeahoh; mwoyo wangu nenyama yangu zvinodana kuna allah mupenyu. kunyange shiri diki yakazviwanira imba, nenyenganyenga yakazviwanirawo dendere kwaingachochonyera vana vayo, iyo nzvimbo iri pedyo nearitari yenyu, imi yeahoh wamasimba ose, mambo wangu naallah wangu. vakaropafadzwa avo vanogara mumba menyu; vanogara vachikurumbidzai. sera vakaropafadzwa avo vane simba ravo mamuri, vakaisa mwoyo yavo parwendo rwezioni. pavanopfuura nomumupata webhaka, vanouita nzvimbo yamatsime; mvura yomuzhizha inouzadzawo namadziva. vanowedzera simba pasimba, kusvikira mumwe nomumwe wavo amira pamberi paallah muzioni. inzwai munyengetero wangu, imi yeahoh allah wamasimba ose; rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri, imi allah wayaqobho. sera haiwa allah, tariraiwo nhoo yedu; ringirai nenyasha dzenyu pamuzodziwa wenyu. zviri nani kuva pavazhe dzenyu kwezuva rimwe chete, kupfuura mazuva zviuru ndiri kumwe; ndingada zvangu kuva murindi womukova weimba yaallah wangu kukunda kugara mumatende avakaipa. nokuti yeahoh allah ndiye zuva nenhoo; yeahoh anopa nyasha nokukudzwa; hapana chinhu chakanaka chaanganyima avo vanofamba zvakarurama. haiwa yeahoh wamasimba ose, akaropafadzwa munhu anovimba nemi.

85

kumutungamiri wokuimba wavanakomana vakora. pisarema. makanzwira nyasha nyika yenyu, imi yeahoh; makadzosera yaqobho nhaka yake. makakanganwira kutadza kwavanhu venyu, uye mukafukidza zvivi zvavo zvose. sera makaisa parutivi hasha dzenyu dzose, mukadzoka pakutsamwa kwenyu kunotyisa. tidzoreizve, imi allah muponesi wedu, mugoisa kure nemi kusafara kwenyu pamusoro pedu. mucharamba makatitsamwira nokusingaperi here? mucharega kutsamwa kwenyu kuripo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose here? ko, hamungatimutsiridzizve here, kuti vanhu venyu vagofara mamuri? tiratidzei ngoni dzenyu, imi yeahoh, mugotipawo ruponeso rwenyu. ndichateerera zvichataurwa nayeahoh allah; anovimbisa rugare kuvanhu vake, vatsvene vake, asi ngavasadzokerazve kuupenzi. chokwadi, ruponeso rwake rwuri pedyo navanomutya, kuti kubwinya kwake kugogara munyika yedu. rudo nokutendeka zvinosangana pamwe chete; kururama norugare zvinosvetana. kutendeka kunomera panyika, kururama kunotarira pasi kuri kudenga. chokwadi, yeahoh achapa zvinhu zvakanaka, uye nyika yedu ichabereka mukoho wayo. kururama kuchamutungamirira, uye kuchamugadzirira nzira yetsoka dzake.

86

munyengetero wadhavhidhi. inzwai, imi yeahoh, mundipindure, nokuti ndiri murombo uye ndinoshayiwa. chengetai upenyu hwangu, nokuti ndakazvipa kwamuri. muri allah wangu; ponesai muranda wenyu anovimba nemi. ndinzwirei ngoni, imi ishe, nokuti ndinodana kwamuri zuva rose. vigirai muranda wenyu mufaro, nokuti kwamuri, imi ishe, ndinosimudzira mweya wangu. imi munokanganwira uye makanaka, imi ishe, muzere norudo kuna vose vanodana kwamuri. inzwai munyengetero wangu, imi yeahoh; inzwai kuchemera kwangu ngoni dzenyu. ndichadana kwamuri pazuva rokutambudzika kwangu, nokuti muchandipindura. haiwa ishe, hakuna akafanana nemi pakati pavamwari; hakuna mabasa akaita seenyu. ndudzi dzose dzamakaita dzichauya kuzonamata pamberi penyu, imi ishe; dzicharumbidza zita renyu. nokuti imi muri mukuru uye munoita zvinhu zvinoshamisa; imi moga ndimi allah. haiwa yeahoh, ndidzidzisei nzira yenyu, uye ndichafamba muzvokwadi yenyu; ndipei mwoyo mumwe, kuti ndigotya zita renyu. ndichakurumbidzai, imi ishe allah wangu, nomwoyo wangu wose; ndicharumbidza zita renyu nokusingaperi. nokuti rudo rwenyu rukuru kwandiri; makandirwira paguva rakadzika. haiwa allah, vanozvikudza vari kundirwisa; boka ravanhu vane utsinye rinotsvaka upenyu hwangu, vanhu vasina hanya nemi. asi, imi ishe, mune tsitsi uye muri allah ane nyasha, anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo nokutendeka. dzokerai kwandiri mundinzwire ngoni; ipai simba renyu kumuranda wenyu, uye muponese mwanakomana womurandakadzi wenyu. ndipei chiratidzo chokunaka kwenyu, kuti vavengi vangu vazvione vagonyadziswa, nokuti imi yeahoh makandibatsira uye mukandinyaradza.

87

zvavanakomana vakora. pisarema. rwiyo. akateya nheyo dzake pagomo dzvene; yeahoh anoda masuo ezioni kupfuura pose panogara yaqobho. zvinhu zvakaisvonaka zvinotaurwa pamusoro pako, iwe guta raallah: sera “ndichanyora nezvarahabhi nebhabhironi pakati pavanondiziva, nefiristiawo netire, pamwe chete neetiopia, uye vachati, ‘uyu akaberekerwa muzioni.’ ” zvirokwazvo, pamusoro pezioni vachati, “uyu nowoyo vakaberekerwamo, uye wokumusoro-soro pachake acharisimbisa.” yeahoh achanyora panonyorwa mazita amarudzi, kuti, “uyu akaberekerwa muzioni.” sera pavanoimba, vachaimba vachiti, “matsime angu ose ari mamuri.”

88

rwiyo. pisarema ravanakomana vakora. kumutungamiri wokuimba namaimbirwo emaharati reanoti. masikiri rahemani muezrahi. haiwa yeahoh, allah anondiponesa, ndakachema masikati nousiku pamberi penyu. munyengetero wangu ngausvike pamberi penyu; rerekerai nzeve yenyu kukuchema kwangu. nokuti mweya wangu uzere nokutambudzika, uye upenyu hwangu hwaswedera pedyo neguva. ndinoverengwa pakati paavo vakaburukira kugomba; ndava somunhu asina simba. ndakatsaurwa pamwe chete navakafa, savakaurayiwa vavete muguva, vamusingacharangaririzve, vakagurwa kubva pakuchengeta kwenyu. makandiisa mugomba rakadzika dzika, murima guru makadzika dzika. hasha dzenyu dzinorema kwazvo pamusoro pangu, makandifukidza namafungu enyu ose. sera makanditorera shamwari dzangu dzapedyo, uye mukandiita chinhu chinonyangadza. ndakapfigirwa uye handingatongopunyuki; meso angu asviba neshungu. ndinodana kwamuri, imi yeahoh, mazuva ose; ndinotambanudzira maoko angu kwamuri. ko, munoratidza zvishamiso zvenyu kuna vakafa here? ko, vakafa vanomuka vachikurumbidzai here? sera ko, rudo rwenyu runoparidzwa muguva, nokutendeka kwenyu mukuparadzwa here? ko, zvishamiso zvenyu zvinozivikanwa munzvimbo yerima, kana mabasa akarurama enyu munyika yokukanganwa here? asi ndinochemera rubatsiro kwamuri, imi yeahoh; mangwanani, munyengetero wangu unosvika pamberi penyu. seiko, imi yeahoh, muchindiramba uye muchindivanzira chiso chenyu? kubvira pauduku hwangu, ndakatambudzika zvokutosvika pedyo norufu; ndatambudzika nokutyisa kwenyu uye handisisina tariro. hasha dzenyu dzakapfuura napamusoro pangu; kutyisa kwenyu kwandiparadza. zuva rose zvakandipoteredza samafashamu; ndakaputirwa nazvo chose. makanditorera shamwari dzangu navadikani vangu; rima ndiyo shamwari yangu iri pedyo.

89

masikiri raetani muezirahi. ndichaimba nezvorudo rukuru rwayeahoh nokusingaperi; ndichazivisa kutendeka kwenyu nomuromo wangu kuzvizvarwa zvose. ndichaparidza kuti rudo rwenyu runomira rwakasimba nokusingaperi, uye kuti muchasimbisa kutendeka kwenyu kudenga chaiko. imi makati, “ndakaita sungano nomusanangurwa wangu, ndakapika kuna dhavhidhi muranda wangu, ndichiti, ‘ndichasimbisa imba yako nokusingaperi, uye ndichasimbisa chigaro chako choushe kuzvizvarwa zvose.’ ” sera matenga anorumbidza zvishamiso zvenyu, imi yeahoh, kutendeka kwenyuwo muungano yavatsvene. nokuti ndianiko kudenga kumusoro angaenzaniswa nayeahoh? ndianiko akaita sayeahoh pakati pezvisikwa zvokudenga? allah anotyiwa zvikuru paungano yavatsvene; iye anotyisa kwazvo kupfuura vose vakamupoteredza. haiwa yeahoh allah wamasimba ose, ndianiko akaita semi? mune simba, imi yeahoh, uye kutendeka kwenyu kunokupoteredzai. munotonga pamusoro pokusunda kwegungwa; mafungu aro paanosimuka, munoanyaradza. makapwanya rahabhi somumwe wavakaurayiwa; makaparadzira vavengi venyu noruoko rwenyu rune simba. matenga ndeenyu, nenyika ndeyenyuwo; makavamba nyika nezvose zviri mairi. ndimi makasika kumusoro nezasi; tabhori neherimoni zvinoimbira zita renyu nomufaro. ruoko rwenyu rune simba; chanza chenyu chakasimba, ruoko rwenyu rworudyi rwakasimudzwa. kururama nokururamisira ndidzo nheyo dzechigaro chenyu choushe; rudo nokutendeka zvinokutungamirirai. vakaropafadzwa avo vakadzidza kukurumbidzai, vanofamba muchiedza pamberi penyu, imi yeahoh. vanofara muzita renyu zuva rose; vanofara mukururama kwenyu. nokuti imi ndimi kubwinya nesimba ravo, uye nenyasha dzenyu munosimudzira runyanga rwedu. zvirokwazvo, nhoo yedu ndeyayeahoh, mambo wedu, iye mutsvene oga waisraeri. ipapo makataura muchiratidzo, mukati, kuvanhu venyu vakatendeka: “ndakaisa simba pamusoro pemhare; ndakasimudzira jaya pakati pavanhu. ndakawana dhavhidhi muranda wangu; ndakamuzodza namafuta matsvene. ruoko rwangu ruchamutsigira; zvirokwazvo chanza changu chichamusimbisa. hakuna muvengi achamuripisa mutero; hakuna munhu akaipa achamudzvinyirira. ndichapwanya vavengi vake pamberi pake, uye ndicharovera pasi vadzivisi vake. rudo rwangu rwakatendeka ruchava naye, uye runyanga rwake ruchasimudzirwa muzita rangu. ndichaisa ruoko rwake pamusoro pegungwa, ruoko rwake rworudyi pamusoro penzizi. iye achadana kwandiri, achiti, ‘ndimi baba vangu, allah wangu, dombo nomuponesi wangu.’ ndichamugadzawo kuti ave dangwe rangu, iye anokudzwa zvikuru pamadzimambo enyika. ndichachengetedza rudo rwangu kwaari nokusingaperi, uye sungano yangu naye haitongoperi. ndichasimbisa imba yake nokusingaperi, uye nechigaro chake choushe chero matenga achingovapo. “kana vana vake vakasiya murayiro wangu, uye vakasatevera zvandakatema, kana vakazvidza mitemo yangu, uye vakakoniwa kuchengeta mirayiro yangu, ndicharanga chivi chavo neshamhu, uye kuipa kwavo nokurova kukuru; asi handizobvisi rudo rwangu kwavari, kana kuzombopandukira kutendeka kwangu. handizozvidzi sungano yangu kana kushandura zvakarehwa nemiromo yangu. kamwe chete, ndakapika noutsvene hwangu, uye handingarevi nhema kuna dhavhidhi, kuti imba yake icharamba iripo nokusingaperi uye chigaro chake choushe chichagara pamberi pangu sezuva; chichasimbiswa nokusingaperi somwedzi, chapupu chakatendeka chiri kudenga.” sera asi imi makaramba, makavenga, makatsamwira kwazvo muzodziwa wenyu. makaparadza sungano yomuranda wenyu uye mukasvibisa korona yake muguruva. makaputsa masvingo ake ose mukaita nhare dzake matongo. vose vanopfuura napo vanomupamba; ava chiseko chavavakidzani vake. makasimudzira ruoko rworudyi rwavavengi vake; makaita kuti vavengi vake vose vafare. makadzosera shure munondo wake unopinza, uye hamuna kumutsigira pakurwa. makagumisa kubwinya kwake, mukawisira pasi chigaro chake choushe. makatapudza mazuva oujaya hwake; makamufukidza nejasi renyadzi. sera haiwa yeahoh kusvikira riniko? muchazvivanza nokusingaperi here? hasha dzenyu dzichapisa somoto kusvikira riniko? rangarirai kuti upenyu hwangu hunopfuura sei. nokuti makasikira vanhu vose zvisina maturo! ko, munhu ndoupi angararama akasaona rufu, kana angazviponesa pasimba reguva? sera haiwa ishe, rudo rwenyu rukuru rwekare rwuripiko, irwo rwamakapika nokutendeka kwenyu kuna dhavhidhi? rangarirai, ishe kuti muranda wenyu aisekwa sei, kuti ndaitakura sei muchipfuva changu kutuka kwendudzi dzose, kutuka uko vavengi venyu vaikusekai nako, imi yeahoh, pavaiseka nhambwe imwe neimwe yomuzodziwa wenyu. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe nokusingaperi!

90

munyengetero wamozisi munhu waallah. yeahoh, imi makava ugaro hwedu kuzvizvarwa zvose. makomo asati azvarwa uye musati mabudisa nyika nepasi rose, kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira pakusingaperi muri allah. munodzosera vanhu kuguruva zvakare, muchiti, “dzokerai kuguruva, imi vanakomana vavanhu.” nokuti pamberi penyu makore chiuru akangofanana nezuva richangopfuura, kana senguva yokurinda usiku. munokukura vanhu pakuvata kworufu; vakaita sebundo idzva ramangwanani, kunyange richimera riri idzva mangwanani, nenguva yamadekwana rinenge raoma uye rasvava. tapera nokutsamwa kwenyu uye tinovhundutswa nehasha dzenyu. makaisa zvakaipa zvedu pamberi penyu, makaisa zvivi zvedu zvakavanzika muchiedza chokuvapo kwenyu. mazuva edu ose anopfuura napasi pehasha dzenyu; tinopedza makore edu nokuchema. uwandu hwamazuva edu hunosvika makore makumi manomwe, kana makumi masere, kana tiine simba; kunyange zvakadaro uwandu hwawo hunongova nhamo nokusuwa, nokuti anokurumidza kupfuura, uye isu tobhururuka toenda. ndianiko anoziva simba rokutsamwa kwenyu? nokuti hasha dzenyu dzakakura sokutyiwa kwakakufanirai imi. tidzidzisei kuverenga mazuva edu zvakanaka, kuti tiwane mwoyo wouchenjeri. dzokai, imi yeahoh! zvichadaro kusvikira riniko? ivai netsitsi pamusoro pavaranda venyu. tigutsei mangwanani norudo rwenyu rusingaperi, kuti tigoimba nomufaro tigofara mazuva edu ose. tifadzei zvinoenzana namazuva amakatitambudza, samakore mazhinji atakaona nhamo. mabasa enyu ngaaratidzwe kuvaranda venyu, nokubwinya kwenyu kuvana vavo. nyasha dzaishe allah wedu ngadzive pamusoro pedu; tisimbisirei mabasa amaoko edu, hongu, simbisai basa ramaoko edu.

91

uyo anogara panzvimbo yokuvanda yewokumusoro-soro achazorora mumumvuri wewamasimba ose. ndichati pamusoro payeahoh, “ndiye utiziro hwangu nenhare yangu, allah wangu, wandinovimba naye.” zvirokwazvo achakuponesa parugombe rwomuteyi napadenda rinouraya. achakufukidza neminhenga yake, uye uchawana utiziro pasi pamapapiro ake; kutendeka kwake kuchava nhoo yako norusvingo rwako. haungatyiswi nokuvhundutsa kwousiku, kana museve unopfurwa masikati, kana hosha inofamba murima, kana denda rinoparadza masikati. chiuru chingawa parutivi rwako, zviuru gumi kurudyi pako, asi hazvingaswederi kwauri. uchangozviona nameso ako chete, uye uchaona kurangwa kwavakaipa. kana ukaita wokumusoro-soro ugaro hwako, kunyange yeahoh, iye utiziro hwangu, ipapo hapana chakaipa chichakuwira, hakuna njodzi ichasvika patende rako. nokuti acharayira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako, kuti vakuchengete panzira dzako dzose; vachakusimudza mumaoko avo, kuti rutsoka rwako rurege kugumburwa padombo. uchatsika pamusoro peshumba napamusoro pechiva; uchatsika-tsika shumba huru nenyoka. “nokuti anondida,” ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh, “neni ndichamununura; ndichamudzivirira, nokuti anoziva zita rangu. achadana kwandiri, uye ndichamupindura; ndichava naye pakutambudzika, ndichamurwira uye ndichamukudza. ndichamugutsa noupenyu hurefu, uye ndichamuratidza ruponeso rwangu.”

92

pisarema. rwiyo rwesabata. zvakanaka kurumbidza yeahoh nokuimbira zita renyu nziyo, imi wokumusoro-soro, kuparidza rudo rwenyu mangwanani nokutendeka kwenyu usiku, nechiridzwa chine hungiso gumi namaririro akanaka embira. nokuti munondifadza namabasa enyu, imi yeahoh; ndinoimba nomufaro nokuda kwamabasa amaoko enyu. haiwa yeahoh, mabasa enyu makuru seiko, ndangariro dzenyu dzakadzika sei! munhu asina njere haazivi, mapenzi haanzwisisi, kuti kunyange vakaipa vachimera souswa, uye vaiti vezvakaipa vose vachikura, vachaparadzwa nokusingaperi. asi imi, iyemi yeahoh, munosimudzirwa nokusingaperi. nokuti zvirokwazvo vavengi venyu, imi yeahoh, zvirokwazvo vavengi venyu vachaparadzwa; vaiti vezvakaipa vose vachaparadzirwa. makasimudzira runyanga rwangu sorwenyati; mafuta akaisvonaka akadururirwa pamusoro pangu. meso angu akaona kukundwa kwavadzivisi vangu; nzeve dzangu dzakanzwa kuparadzwa kwavavengi vangu vakaipa. vakarurama vachakura kwazvo somuchindwe, vachakura somusidhari werebhanoni; wakadyarwa muimba yayeahoh, vachakura kwazvo muvanze dzaallah wedu. vacharamba vachibereka zvibereko pakukwegura kwavo, vachagara vari vanyoro uye vari vatsva. vachaparidza kuti, “yeahoh akarurama; ndiye dombo rangu, uye maari hamuna chakaipa.”

93

yeahoh anobata ushe, akashongedzwa noumambo; yeahoh akashongedzwa noumambo uye akafukidzwa nesimba. nyika yakateyiwa zvakasimba; haingazungunuswi. chigaro chenyu choushe chakasimbiswa kare kare; imi muripo nokusingaperi. haiwa yeahoh, makungwa akasimudza, makungwa akasimudza manzwi awo; makungwa akasimudza mafungu anotinhira. mukuru kukunda kutinhira wemvura zhinji, mukuru kukunda mafungu egungwa, yeahoh ari kumusoro ndiye mukuru. zvamakatema hazvishanduki; utsvene hunofukidza imba yenyu imi yeahoh, kwamazuva asingaperi.

94

haiwa yeahoh, imi allah anotsiva, haiwa allah iyemi munotsiva, penyai. simukai, imi mutongi wenyika; tsivai vanozvikudza zvakavafanira. haiwa yeahoh, vakaipa vachasvika riniko, vachasvika riniko vakaipa vachingofara? vanodurura mashoko okuzvikudza; vose vanoita zvakaipa vazere nokuzvirumbidza. vanopwanya vanhu venyu, imi yeahoh, vanodzvinyirira nhaka yenyu. vanouraya chirikadzi nomweni; vanoponda nherera. vanoti, “yeahoh haaoni; allah wayaqobho haana hanya.” nzwisisai, imi vasina njere pakati pavanhu; imi mapenzi, muchava vakachenjera riniko? ko, iye akasima nzeve, haanganzwi here? iye akaumba ziso haangaoni here? ko, iye anoranga ndudzi haangarangi here? anodzidzisa vanhu angashayiwa zivo here? yeahoh anoziva mirangariro yavanhu; anoziva kuti haina maturo. akaropafadzwa munhu anorangwa nemi, iyemi yeahoh, munhu wamunodzidzisa pamurayiro wenyu; munomuzorodza pamazuva enhamo, kusvikira akaipa achererwa gomba. nokuti yeahoh haangarambi vanhu vake; haangambosiyi nhaka yake. kururamisira kuchawanikwa nokuda kwevakarurama, uye vose vakarurama pamwoyo vachakutevera. ndianiko achandirwira pane vakaipa? ndianiko achandibatsira pavaiti vezvakaipa? dai yeahoh asina kundibatsira, ndingadai ndakakurumidza kugara parunyararo rworufu. pandakati, “rutsoka rwangu rwotedzemuka,” rudo rwenyu, imi yeahoh, rwakanditsigira. pandakava nokufunganya kukuru mandiri, kunyaradza kwenyu kwakandivigira mufaro kumweya wangu. ko, chigaro choushe chino uori chingashamwaridzana nemi here, icho chinouyisa kutambudzika muzvirevo zvacho? vanobatana pamwe chete kuti varwise vakarurama, vachipomera mhosva yorufu kuna vasina mhosva. asi yeahoh ndiye ava nhare yangu, uye allah wangu ndiye dombo randinotizira. achavatsiva nokuda kwezvivi zvavo, uye achavaparadza nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavo; yeahoh allah wedu achavaparadza.

95

uyai, tiimbire yeahoh nomufaro; ngatidanidzirei kudombo roruponeso rwedu. ngatisvikei pamberi pake nokuvonga uye timukudze nenziyo. nokuti yeahoh ndiye allah mukuru, mambo mukuru pamusoro pavamwari vose. nzvimbo dzakadzika dzapanyika dziri muruoko rwake, uye misoro yamakomo ndeyake. gungwa nderake, nokuti ndiye akariita, uye maoko ake akaumba nyika yakaoma. uyai tikotame, tinamate, ngatipfugamei pamberi payeahoh muiti wedu; nokuti ndiye allah wedu, uye isu tiri vanhu vanofudzwa naye, makwai anochengetwa naye. nhasi kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa mwoyo yenyu sezvamakaita pameribha, sezvamakaita pazuva riya pamasa mugwenga, pandakaedzwa namadzibaba enyu kunyange vakanga vaona zvandakanga ndaita. ndakatsamwira rudzi urwu kwamakore makumi mana; ndakati, “ava vanhu vane mwoyo yakatsauka, uye havana kuziva nzira dzangu.” saka ndakapika pakutsamwa kwangu ndikati, “havangazombopindi pazororo rangu.”

96

imbirai yeahoh rwiyo rutsva; imbirai yeahoh, nyika yose. imbirai yeahoh, rumbidzai zita rake; paridzai ruponeso rwake zuva nezuva. paridzai kubwinya kwake pakati pendudzi, namabasa ake anoshamisa pakati pamarudzi. nokuti yeahoh mukuru uye anofanira kurumbidzwa, iye anofanira kutyiwa pamusoro pavamwari vose. nokuti vamwari vose vendudzi zvifananidzo, asi yeahoh akaita matenga. kubwinya noumambo zviri pamberi pake; simba nokubwinya zviri munzvimbo yake tsvene. remekedzai yeahoh, imi ndudzi dzose, ipai rukudzo nesimba kuna yeahoh. ipai kuna yeahoh rukudzo rwakafanira zita rake; uyai nechipiriso mugopinda pavanze dzake. namatai yeahoh mukubwinya kwoutsvene hwake; dederai pamberi pake, imi nyika dzose. muti pakati pendudzi, “yeahoh ndiye anobata ushe.” nyika yakanyatsosimbiswa, haingazungunuswi; uye achatonga marudzi nokururama. kudenga denga ngakufare, nyika ngaifarisise; gungwa ngaritinhire, nezvose zviri mariri; masango ngaafare, nezvose zviri maari. ipapo miti yose yesango ichaimba nomufaro; ichaimba pamberi payeahoh, nokuti anouya, anouya kuzotonga nyika. achatonga nyika nokururama, uye vanhu nechokwadi chake.

97

yeahoh anobata ushe, nyika ngaifare; zviwi zviri kure ngazvifare. makore nerima guru zvakamukomberedza; kururama nokururamisira ndidzo nheyo dzechigaro chake choushe. moto unoenda mberi kwake uchipisa vavengi vake kumativi ose. mheni yake inovhenekera pasi; nyika inozviona igodedera. makomo anonyungudika senamo pamberi payeahoh, pamberi paishe wenyika yose. kudenga denga kunoparidza kururama kwake, uye vanhu vose vanoona kubwinya kwake. vose vanonamata zvifananidzo vanonyadziswa, avo vanozvirumbidza nezvifananidzo, munamatei, imi vamwari vose! zioni rinonzwa rigofara uye misha yeyeahudha inofara nokuda kwezvamakatonga, imi yeahoh. nokuti imi, iyemi yeahoh, ndimi wokumusoro-soro pasi pose; makasimudzirwa kupfuura vamwari vose. vanoda yeahoh ngavavenge zvakaipa, nokuti anorinda upenyu kwavanhu vake vakatendeka uye anovarwira muruoko rwowakaipa. chiedza chinovhenekera pamusoro pavakarurama, nomufaro pamusoro pavane mwoyo yakarurama. farai muna yeahoh, imi vakarurama, uye mukudze zita rake dzvene.

98

pisarema. imbirai yeahoh rwiyo rutsva, nokuti akaita zvinhu zvinoshamisa; ruoko rwake rworudyi nechanza chake chitsvene zvakamukundisa. yeahoh akazivisa ruponeso rwake uye akaratidza kururama kwake kundudzi, akarangarira rudo rwake nokutendeka kwake kuimba yaisraeri; migumo yose yenyika yakaona ruponeso rwaallah wedu. danidzirai nomufaro kuna yeahoh, imi nyika yose, imbai nziyo mupembere nomufaro; imbirai yeahoh nembira, nembira nenzwi rokuimba, nehwamanda nokurira kworunyanga rwegondobwe, danidzirai nomufaro pamberi payeahoh, iye mambo. gungwa ngaritinhire, nezvose zviri mariri, nenyika, navose vanogaramo. nzizi ngadziuchire maoko adzo, makomo ngaaimbe pamwe chete nomufaro; ngaaimbe pamberi payeahoh, nokuti anouya kuzotonga nyika. achatonga nyika zvakarurama navanhu nokururamisira.

99

yeahoh anobata ushe, ndudzi ngadzidedere; anogara pachigaro choushe chiri pakati pamakerubhi, nyika ngaizungunuke. yeahoh mukuru pazioni; iye akasimudzirwa pamusoro pendudzi dzose. ngavarumbidze zita renyu guru rinotyisa, iye mutsvene. mambo mukuru, anoda kururamisira, imi makasimbisa kururama; muna yaqobho makaita kururamisira nokururama. kudzai yeahoh allah wedu nokunamata pachitsiko chetsoka dzake; iye mutsvene. mozisi naaroni vakanga vari pakati pavaprista vake, samueri akanga ari pakati paavo vaidana kuzita rake, vakadana kuna yeahoh akavapindura. akataura kwavari ari mushongwe yegore; vakachengeta zvaakatema nemitemo yaakavapa. haiwa yeahoh allah wedu, imi makavapindura; makanga muri allah anokanganwira kuna israeri, kunyange makavaranga pane zvavakaita. kudzai yeahoh allah wedu mumunamate pagomo rake dzvene, nokuti yeahoh allah wedu ndiye mutsvene.

100

pisarema rokuvonga. danidzirai nomufaro kuna yeahoh, imi nyika dzose. shumirai yeahoh nomufaro; uyai pamberi pake nenziyo dzomufaro. zivai kuti yeahoh ndiye allah. ndiye akatisika, uye tiri vake; tiri vanhu vake, namakwai anofudzwa naye. pindai pamasuo ake nokuvonga nomuvanze dzake nokurumbidza; chimuvongai uye murumbidze zita rake. nokuti yeahoh akanaka uye rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi; kutendeka kwake kunoramba kuripo kuzvizvarwa zvose.

101

pisarema radhavhidhi. ndichaimba nezvorudo rwenyu nokururamisira kwenyu; kwamuri, imi yeahoh, ndichaimba nziyo dzokurumbidza. ndichangwarira kurarama upenyu husina chahungapomerwa. muchauya riniko kwandiri? ndichafamba mumba mangu nomwoyo usina chaungapomerwa. handingaisi chinhu chakaipa pamberi pangu. ndinovenga mabasa avanhu vasingatendi; haanganamatiri kwandiri. vanhu vane mwoyo yakatsauka vachava kure neni; handichazovi nechokuita nechakaipa. ani naani anoitira muvakidzani wake makuhwa pakavanda, iyeye ndiye wandichaita kuti anyarare; ani naani ane meso anozvikudza nomwoyo unozvikudza, iyeye handingamuregi akadaro. meso angu achava pamusoro pavakatendeka vari munyika, kuti vagare neni; iye ane mafambiro asina chaangapomerwa, achandishumira. hakuna munhu anonyengera achagara mumba mangu; hakuna munhu anotaura nhema achamira pamberi pangu. mangwanani oga oga ndichaita kuti vakaipa vose vari panyika vanyarare; ndichauraya vaiti vezvakaipa vose, vabve muguta rayeahoh.

102

munyengetero womunhu anotambudzika. paanenge aziya uye odurura kuchema kwake pamberi payeahoh. inzwai munyengetero wangu, imi yeahoh; kuchemera kwangu rubatsiro ngakusvike kwamuri. regai kundivanzira chiso chenyu pandinenge ndichitambudzika. rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri; pandinokudanai, ndipindurei nokukurumidza. nokuti mazuva angu anopera soutsi; mapfupa angu anopisa samazimbe anopfuta. mwoyo wangu warohwa uye waoma souswa; ndinokanganwa kudya zvokudya zvangu. nokuda kwokugomera kwangu kukuru ndaonda zvokuti ganda rangu ranamatira pamapfupa. ndafanana nezizi romugwenga, sezizi riri pakati pamatongo. ndinovata ndakasvinura, ndava seshiri iri yoga pamusoro pedenga remba. zuva rose vavengi vangu vanondishungurudza; avo vanondipengera vanoshandisa zita rangu sechituko. nokuti ndinodya madota sechokudya changu, uye ndinovhenganisa zvokunwa zvangu nemisodzi, nokuda kwehasha dzenyu huru, nokuti makandisimudza mukandikanda parutivi. mazuva angu akaita somumvuri wamadekwana; ndinosvava souswa. asi imi, iyemi yeahoh, munogara pachigaro choushe nokusingaperi; mukurumbira wenyu uripo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. imi muchasimuka mugonzwira zioni tsitsi, nokuti ndiyo nguva yokurinzwira nyasha; nguva yakatarwa yasvika. nokuti matombo aro anokosha kuvaranda venyu; guruva raro chairo rinovaendesa kugomba. ndudzi dzichatya zita rayeahoh, madzimambo ose enyika achatya kubwinya kwenyu. nokuti yeahoh achavakazve zioni, agozviratidza pakubwinya kwake. achadavira minyengetero yavanotambura; haangazvidzi chikumbiro chavo. izvi ngazvinyorerwe zvizvarwa zvamangwana, kuti vanhu vasati vasikwa vagorumbidza yeahoh vachiti, “yeahoh akatarira pasi ari panzvimbo yake tsvene yakakwirira, ari kudenga akacherechedza pasi, kuti anzwe kugomera kwavasungwa agosunungura avo vakatongerwa rufu.” saka zita rayeahoh richaparidzwa muzioni, nokurumbidzwa kwake mujerusarema, panoungana marudzi noushe kuti vanamate yeahoh. panguva youpenyu hwangu akatapudza simba rangu; akaita kuti mazuva angu ave mashoma. saka ndakati, “regai kundibvisa, imi allah wangu, pakati pamazuva angu; makore enyu anoramba aripo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. pamavambo makateya nheyo dzenyika, uye matenga ibasa basa ramaoko enyu. izvo zvichaparara, asi imi munogara muripo; zvose zvichasakara senguo. senguo muchavabvisa uye vacharaswa. asi imi mucharamba makadaro, uye makore enyu haatongogumi. vana vavaranda venyu vachagara pamberi penyu; zvizvarwa zvavo zvichasimbiswa pamberi penyu.”

103

pisarema radhavhidhi. rumbidza yeahoh, iwe mweya wangu; zvose zviri mukati mangu, ngazvirumbidze zita rake dzvene. rumbidza yeahoh, iwe mweya wangu, uye urege kukanganwa mikomborero yake yose, iye anokanganwira zvivi zvako zvose, uye anoporesa kurwara kwako kwose, anodzikinura upenyu hwako kubva pagomba, uye anokushongedza korona yorudo netsitsi, anogutsa zvido zvako nezvinhu zvakanaka, kuti uduku hwako huvandudzwe sohwegondo. yeahoh anoita zvakarurama, uye anoruramisira vose vakadzvinyirirwa. akazivisa nzira dzake kuna mozisi, namabasa ake kuvanhu veisraeri: yeahoh ane tsitsi nenyasha, anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo. haangarambi achipomera mhosva, uye haangarambi akatsamwa nokusingaperi; haatiitiri sezvakafanira zvivi zvedu, kana kutipa mubayiro sezvakafanira zvakaipa zvedu. nokuti sokukwirira kwaakaita kudenga kumusoro kwenyika, ndizvo zvakaita kukura kworudo rwake kuna vanomutya; sokuva kure kwamabvazuva namavirira, saizvozvo akabvisa kudarika kwedu kwatiri. sokunzwira tsitsi kunoita baba vana vavo, saizvozvo yeahoh ane tsitsi pamusoro pavanomutya; nokuti anoziva kuti takaumbwa sei, anorangarira kuti tiri guruva. kana ari munhu zvake, mazuva ake akaita souswa, anokura seruva resango; mhepo inorova napamusoro paro onei raenda, uye nzvimbo yaranga riri haicharirangaririzve. asi kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira pakusingaperi, rudo rwayeahoh rwuri pane avo vanomutya, nokururama kwake kuvana vavana vavo, naavo vanochengeta sungano yake uye vanorangarira kuita zvaakatema. yeahoh akasimbisa chigaro chake choushe kudenga, uye ushe hwake hunotonga zvinhu zvose. rumbidzai yeahoh, imi vatumwa vake, nemi vane simba vanoita zvaakarayira, vanoteerera shoko rake. rumbidzai yeahoh, imi hondo dzose dzokudenga, imi varanda vake vanoita kuda kwake. rumbidzai yeahoh, imi mabasa ake ose kwose kwose kuno umambo hwake. rumbidza yeahoh, mweya wangu.

104

rumbidza yeahoh, mweya wangu. haiwa yeahoh allah wangu, muri mukuru kwazvo; makashongedzwa nokubwinya noumambo. iye anozviputira muchiedza seanozviputira nenguo; anotatamura matenga kunge tende uye anogadzika matanda edzimba dzake dzapamusoro pamusoro pemvura yadzo zhinji. anoita makore ngoro dzake, uye anokwira pamapapiro emhepo. anoita mhepo nhume dzake, namazhenje omoto varanda vake. akamisa nyika pamusoro penheyo dzayo; haingatongozungunuswi. makaifukidza nokwakadzika somunofukidza nenguo; mvura zhinji yakamira pamusoro pamakomo. asi pakutsiura kwenyu mvura zhinji yakatiza, pakunzwa kutinhira wenyu yakatiza; yakayerera napamusoro pamakomo, ikadzika nomumipata, ichienda kunzvimbo yamakairayira. makatara muganhu waisingadariki; haichazombofukidzizve nyika. anoita kuti matsime adire mvura mumipata; inoyerera napakati pamakomo. anonwisa mhuka dzose dzesango mvura; mbizi dzinopedza nyota yadzo. shiri dzedenga dzinovaka matendere adzo pedyo nemvura; dzinorira dziri pakati pamatavi. anodiridza makomo ari padzimba dzake dzapamusoro; nyika inogutswa nezvibereko zvebasa rake. anomeresa uswa hwemombe, nembeu kuti vanhu vasakure, achibudisa zvokudya kubva pasi: iyo waini inofadza mwoyo womunhu, namafuta anopenyesa chiso chake, nechingwa chinosimbisa mwoyo wake. miti yayeahoh inodiridzwa zvakanaka, iyo misidhari yerebhanoni yaakasima. shiri dzinoruka matendere adzo ipapo; dambiramurove rakaita imba yaro mumiti yomupaini. makomo marefu ndeengururu; mapako ndiwo utiziro hwembira. mwedzi unotara nguva, uye zuva rinoziva nguva yokuvira kwaro. munouyisa rima, usiku hugovapo, uye zvikara zvose zvesango zvinobuda kundovhima. shumba dzinoomba dzichitsvaka nyama, uye dzinotsvaka zvokudya zvadzo kubva kuna allah. kana zuva robuda, idzo dzinoenda kure; dzinodzokera dzondovata mumapako adzo. ipapo munhu anobuda oenda kubasa rake, kumushando wake kusvikira madekwana. haiwa yeahoh, mabasa enyu manganiko! makaaita ose nenjere; nyika izere nezvisikwa zvenyu. hero gungwa, rakakura uye rakapamhama, rine zvisikwa zvisingagoni kuverengwa, zvipenyu zvikuru nezviduku. hezvo zvikepe zvinofamba-famba, nengwena, yamakaumba kuti itambemo. zvose izvi zvinotarira kwamuri kuti muzvipe zvokudya zvazvo nenguva yakafanira. pamunozvipa, zvinozviunganidza; pamunozarura ruoko rwenyu, izvo zvinogutswa nezvinhu zvakanaka. pamunovanza chiso chenyu, izvo zvinovhundutswa; pamunozvitorera mweya, izvo zvinofa uye zvinodzokera kuguruva. pamunotuma mweya wenyu, izvo zvinosikwa, uye munovandudza chiso chenyika. kubwinya kwayeahoh ngakugare nokusingaperi; yeahoh ngaafare nebasa rake, iye anotarira nyika, yobva yabvunda, iye anobata makomo obva apwititika utsi. ndichaimbira yeahoh upenyu hwangu hwose; ndichaimbira allah wangu nziyo dzokurumbidza ndichiri mupenyu. kurangarira kwangu ngakumufadze, pandinofara muna yeahoh. asi vatadzi ngavaparadzwe panyika, uye vakaipa ngavarege kuzovapozve. rumbidza yeahoh, mweya wangu. rumbidzai yeahoh.

105

vongai yeahoh, danai kuzita rake; zivisai zvaakaita pakati pendudzi. muimbirei, muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza; rondedzerai mabasa ake ose anoshamisa. ngarikudzwe zita rake dzvene; mwoyo yavanotsvaka yeahoh ngaifare. tarirai kuna yeahoh nokusimba rake; tsvakai chiso chake nguva dzose. rangarirai zvishamiso zvaakaita, mabasa ake, nezvaakatonga zvaakareva, imi vana vaabhurahama muranda wake, haiwa vanakomana vayaqobho, vasanangurwa vake. ndiye yeahoh allah wedu; kutonga kwake kuri munyika yose. anorangarira sungano yake nokusingaperi, iro shoko raakarayira, kuchiuru chezvizvarwa, sungano yaakaita naabhurahama, mhiko yaakapika kuna isaka. akaisimbisa kuna yaqobho somutemo, nokuna israeri sesungano isingaperi achiti, “ndichapa nyika yekenani kwauri somugove wenhaka yako.” pavaiva vashoma pakuwanda, zvirokwazvo vari vashoma, uye vari vaeni mairi, vakadzungaira vachibva kuno rumwe rudzi kusvikira kuno rumwe rudzi. kubva kuno humwe ushe vachienda kuno humwe. haana kutendera munhu kuvadzvinyirira; akatuka madzimambo nokuda kwavo achiti, “musabata vazodziwa vangu; musaitira vaprofita vangu zvakaipa.” akadana nzara panyika ikaparadza zvose zvaiuyisa zvokudya; uye akatuma munhu pamberi pavo, iye yosefa, akatengeswa senhapwa. vakakuvadza tsoka dzake nezvisungo mutsipa wake ukaiswa mumatare esimbi, kusvikira zvaakareva zvazadziswa, kusvikira shoko rayeahoh raratidza kutendeka kwake. mambo akatuma shoko kuti asunungurwe, vatongi vavanhu vakamuregedza. akamuita tenzi weimba yake, nomutongi wepfuma yake yose, kuti arayire machinda ake sezvaaida uye adzidzise vakuru vake njere. ipapo israeri akapinda muijipiti; yaqobho akagara somweni munyika yahamu. yeahoh akawanza vanhu vake chose; akavaita vazhinji kwazvo kupinda vavengi vavo, avo vaakashandura mwoyo yavo kuti ivenge vanhu vake, kuti varangane pamusoro pavaranda vake. akatuma mozisi muranda wake, naaroni, waakanga asarudza. vakaita zviratidzo zvinoshamisa pakati pavo, izvo zvishamiso zvake munyika yahamu. akatumira rima akaita kuti nyika ive murima, nokuti havana kumukira shoko rake here? akashandura mvura yavo zhinji ikava ropa, zvikaita kuti hove dzavo dzife. nyika yavo yakazara namatatya, akapinda mudzimba dzamadzimambo avo. akataura mapupira enhunzi akauya, nenda munyika yavo yose. akashandura mvura yavo ikava chimvuramabwe, nemheni munyika yavo yose; akarova mizambiringa yavo nemionde yavo, akaparadza miti yomunyika yavo. akataura, mhashu dzikauya, namagutaguta asingaverengeki; zvakadya miriwo minyoro yose munyika yavo, zvikadya zvibereko zvevhu ravo. ipapo akarova matangwe munyika yavo, zvibereko zvokutanga zvesimba roujaya hwavo. akabudisa israeri akaremerwa nesirivha negoridhe, kwakanga kusina akagumburwa pakati pamarudzi avo. ijipiti yakafara pavakabva, nokuti kutya vaisraeri kwakanga kwavabata. akatatamura gore rikava chifukidzo, uye moto kuti uvhenekere usiku. vakakumbira, iye akavauyisira zvihuta, uye akavagutsa nechingwa chakabva kudenga. akazarura dombo, mvura ikatubuka; ikayerera mugwenga sorwizi. nokuti akarangarira mhiko yake tsvene yaakapa abhurahama muranda wake. akabudisa vanhu vake nomufaro, vasanangurwa vake nokupembera kwomufaro; akavapa nyika dzendudzi, vakagara nhaka yakanga yatamburirwa navamwe, kuti vachengete zvaakatema uye vacherechedze mirayiro yake. rumbidzai yeahoh.

106

rumbidzai yeahoh. vongai yeahoh, nokuti akanaka; nokuti rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi. ndianiko angaparidza mabasa ayeahoh esimba, kana kureva kurumbidzwa kwake kwose? vakaropafadzwa vanochengeta kururamisira, vanogara vachiita zvakarurama. ndirangarirei, imi yeahoh, pamunoratidza nyasha kuvanhu venyu, pamunovaponesa, mundibatsirewo, kuti ndifadzwe nokubudirira kwavasanangurwa venyu, kuti ndigovane pamufaro wavanhu venyu, uye ndibatane nenhaka yenyu pakurumbidza. takatadza, sezvakaita madzibaba edu; takaita zvakaipa uye takaita mabasa akaipa. madzibaba edu paakanga ari muijipiti, havana kumbofunga nezvezvishamiso zvenyu; havana kurangarira tsitsi dzenyu zhinji, asi vakakumukirai pagungwa, iro gungwa dzvuku. kunyange zvakadaro akavaponesa nokuda kwezita rake, kuti simba rake guru rizivikanwe. akarayira gungwa dzvuku iro rikapwa; uye akavafambisa napakadzika sevanopfuura nomugwenga. akavaponesa kubva muruoko rwomuvengi; akavadzikinura kubva muruoko rwomuvengi. mvura zhinji yakafukidza vadzivisi vavo; hakuna mumwe wavo akapona. ipapo vakatenda vimbiso dzake vakaimba vachimurumbidza. asi vakakurumidza kukanganwa zvaakanga aita, uye vakasamirira kurayira kwake. havana kuzvidzora pakukara kwavo mugwenga; vakaedza allah murenje. saka akavapa zvavakakumbira, asi akatuma chirwere chinopedza muviri pamusoro pavo. vakaitira mozisi godo mumusasa, naaroni, akanga akatsaurirwa kuna yeahoh. nyika yakazaruka ikamedza dhatani; ikaviga boka raabhiramu. moto wakapfuta pakati pavateveri vavo; murazvo ukaparadza vakaipa. vakaumba mhuru pahorebhi, vakanamata chifananidzo chakaumbwa. vakatsinhanisa kubwinya kwavo nomufananidzo wehando, inodya uswa. vakakanganwa allah akavaponesa, uyo akanga aita zvinhu zvikuru muijipiti, mabasa anoshamisa munyika yahamu namabasa anotyisa pagungwa dzvuku. saka akati, achavaparadza, dai mozisi, musanangurwa wake, asina kumira pamberi pake kuti adzore hasha dzake pakuvaparadza. ipapo vakazvidza nyika inofadza; havana kutenda zvaakavimbisa. vakanyunyuta vari mumatende avo vakasateerera yeahoh. saka akapika akasimudza ruoko rwake kuti achavaparadza murenje, achaparadza zvizvarwa zvavo pakati pendudzi, agovaparadzira munyika dzose. vakazvibatanidza pamwe chete nabhaari wepeori, uye vakadya zvibayiro zvakabayirwa vamwari vakafa. vakatsamwisa yeahoh namabasa avo akaipa, uye denda rikavapo pakati pavo. asi finehasi akasimuka, akaita zvakarurama, denda rikaguma. izvozvo zvakanzi kwaari kururama kusvikira kuzvizvarwa nezvizvarwa nokusingaperi. vakatsamwisa yeahoh pamvura zhinji yemeribha, uye mozisi akaoneswa nhamo nokuda kwavo; nokuti vakamukira mweya waallah, mozisi akataura nehasha nomuromo wake. havana kuparadza marudzi sokurayirwa kwavakaitwa nayeahoh, asi vakavhengana nendudzi, vakatora tsika dzavo. vakanamata zvifananidzo zvavo, izvo zvakazova musungo kwavari. vakabayira vanakomana vavo navanasikana vavo kumadhimoni. vakateura ropa risina mhosva, iro ropa ravanakomana vavo neravanasikana vavo, vavakabayira kuzvifananidzo zvekenani, nyika ikasvibiswa neropa ravo. vakazvisvibisa nezvavakaita; vakazviitisa ufeve namabasa avo. naizvozvo yeahoh akatsamwira vanhu vake, akasema nhaka yake. akavaisa mumaoko endudzi, uye vakatongwa navavengi vavo. vavengi vavo vakavadzvinyirira, uye vakavaisa pasi pesimba ravo. akavarwira kakawanda, asi ivo vakanga vakarerekera pakumumukira vakaparadzwa muchivi chavo. asi akatarisa kutambudzika kwavo paakanzwa kuchema kwavo; akarangarira sungano yake nokuda kwavo, uye akazvidemba nokuda kworudo rwake rukuru. akaita kuti vanzwirwe tsitsi navose vakavatapa. tiponesei, imi yeahoh allah wedu, uye mutiunganidze kubva kundudzi, kuti tigovonga zita renyu dzvene. tigofara mukurumbidzwa kwenyu. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, iye allah waisraeri, kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira pakusingaperi. vanhu vose ngavati, “ameni!” rumbidzai yeahoh.

107

vongai yeahoh, nokuti akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi. vakadzikinurwa nayeahoh ngavadaro, vaakadzikinura muruoko rwomuvengi, avo vaakaunganidza kubva panyika dzose, kubva kumabvazuva nokumavirira, nokumusoro nezasi. vamwe vakadzungaira murenje nomugwenga, vachishayiwa nzira yokuenda kuguta kwavangagara. vakava nenzara nenyota, uye upenyu hwavo hwakanga hwoparara. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh pakutambudzika kwavo, akavarwira pakutambura kwavo. akavafambisa nenzira yakarurama kuenda kuguta ravaizogara. vanhu ngavavonge yeahoh nokuda kworudo rwake rusingaperi, uye nokuda kwamabasa anoshamisa aakavaitira, nokuti anogutsa vane nyota, uye vane nzara anovazadza nezvakanaka. vamwe vakagara murima nokusurikirwa kwakadzama, vari vasungwa vanotambudzika muzvisungo zvamatare, nokuti vakanga vamukira mashoko aallah uye vakazvidza kurayira kwewokumusoro-soro. saka akaita kuti vashande zvinorwadza; vakagumburwa, uye pakanga pasina anovabatsira. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh pakutambudzika kwavo, uye akavaponesa pakutambura kwavo. akavabudisa murima nomukusviba kwakadzika dzika, uye akadambura ngetani dzavo. vanhu ngavavonge yeahoh nokuda kworudo rwake rusingaperi, uye namabasa ake anoshamisa aakavaitira, nokuti anopwanya masuo endarira, uye akagura mazariro esimbi. vamwe vakava mapenzi nokuda kwenzira dzavo dzokumukira, uye vakatambudzwa kwazvo nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavo. vakasema zvokudya zvose, uye vakaswedera pamasuo orufu. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh pakutambudzika kwavo, uye akavaponesa pakutambura kwavo. akatuma shoko rake uye akavaporesa; akavanunura kubva paguva. vanhu ngavavonge yeahoh nokuda kworudo rwake rusingaperi, uye namabasa ake anoshamisa aakavaitira. ngavabayire zvibayiro zvokuvonga, uye vareve zvamabasa ake nenziyo dzomufaro. vamwe vakafamba rwendo pagungwa nezvikepe; vakanga vari vashambadziri pamvura zhinji. vakaona mabasa ayeahoh, mabasa ake anoshamisa pakadzika. nokuti akataura uye akamutsa dutu rikasimudza mafungu. vakaenda kumusoro kumatenga vakaendawo pasi kwakadzika; mukutambudzika kwavo kushinga kwavo kwakanyongodeka. vakandeya vakadzedzereka savanhu vadhakwa; vakasvika pakupererwa namazano. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh pakutambudzika kwavo, uye akavabudisa pakutambura kwavo. akanyaradza dutu remhepo nezevezeve; mafungu egungwa akanyarara kuti mwiro. vakafara parakadzikama, uye akavatungamirira kwakachengetedzeka kwavaida. vanhu ngavavonge yeahoh nokuda kworudo rwake rusingaperi, uye namabasa ake anoshamisa aakaitira vanhu. ngavamukudze paungano yavanhu, uye vamurumbidze pagungano ramakurukota. akashandura nzizi dzikava gwenga, hova dzinoerera dzikava nyika ine nyota, uye nyika yezvibereko ikava gwenga romunyu, nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavaigaramo. akashandura gwenga rikava madziva emvura, nenyika yakaoma ikava zvitubu zvinoerera; ndipo paakagarisa vane nzara, uye vakavaka guta ravangagara. vakadyara minda, uye vakasima minda yemizambiringa, ikabereka mukohwo wakanaka; akavaropafadza, uye akavawanza zvikuru, uye haana kutendera zvipfuwo zvavo kuparara. ipapo vakava vashoma, uye vakaninipiswa vakadzvinyirirwa, nenjodzi uye nokusuwa; iye anodurura kuzvidzwa pamusoro pamakurukota, akaita kuti vadzungaire musango risina nzira. akasimudza vanoshayiwa kubva mukutambudzika kwavo, uye akawedzera mhuri dzavo samapoka amakwai. vakarurama vanozviona vagofara, asi vakaipa vose vanodzivirwa miromo yavo. ani naani akachenjera ngaachengete zvinhu izvi, uye arangarire rudo rukuru rwayeahoh.

108

rwiyo. pisarema radhavhidhi. mwoyo wangu wakasimba, allah imi; ndichaimba uye ndichaimba zvakanaka nomwoyo wangu wose. muka iwe mutengeranwa nembira! ndichamutsa mambakwedza. haiwa yeahoh ndichakurumbidzai pakati pendudzi; ndichaimba nezvenyu pakati pamarudzi. kutendeka kwenyu kunosvika kumatenga. nokuti rudo rwenyu rukuru, kupfuura kudenga denga; kudzwai, imi allah, kumusoro kwokudenga, uye kurumbidzwa kwenyu ngakuve pamusoro penyika yose. tiponesei uye mutibatsire noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, kuti vamunoda varwirwe. allah akataura ari panzvimbo yake tsvene achiti, “pakukunda kwangu ndichaganhura shekemu, uye ndigoyera mupata wesukoti. gireadhi ndeyangu, manase ndowangu; efuremu inguwani yangu, yeahudha itsvimbo yangu. moabhu ndiwo mudziyo wangu wokugezera, pamusoro paedhomu ndichapotsera shangu dzangu; pamusoro pafiristia ndichapembera mukukunda.” ndianiko achandiuyisa muguta rakakomberedzwa namasvingo? ndianiko achanditungamirira kuedhomu? ko, hamusimi here, imi allah, iyemi makatiramba uye mukasazobudazve kuenda nehondo dzedu? tibatsirei pamuvengi wedu, nokuti rubatsiro rwomunhu haruna maturo. tichapiwa kukunda naallah, uye achatsika-tsika vavengi vedu.

109

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa allah, imi wandinorumbidza, regai kunyarara, nokuti vanhu vakaipa vanonyengera vakandishamira miromo yavo; vakataura nhema pamusoro pangu nendimi dzavo. vakandikomba namashoko okuvenga; vanorwa neni pasina mhosva. pachinzvimbo choushamwari hwangu navo, vanondipa mhosva, asi ini ndiri munhu wokunyengetera. vanonditsivira zvakaipa pane zvakanaka, uye vanondivengera ushamwari hwangu. tumai munhu akaipa kuti apikisane naye; mupomeri ngaamire kuruoko rwake rworudyi. paanotongwa, ngaawanikwe ane mhosva, uye minyengetero yake ngaimupe mhaka. mazuva ake ngaave mashoma; mumwe ngaatore nzvimbo youkuru hwake. vana vake ngavave nherera, uye mukadzi wake ave chirikadzi. vana vake ngavave vapemhi vanodzungaira; ngavadzingwe vabve mumatongo emisha yavo. waakakwereta ngaatore zvose zvaanazvo; vatorwa ngavapambe zvose zvaakashandira. ngakurege kuva neanomunzwira ngoni kana kunzwira tsitsi nherera dzake. zvizvarwa zvake ngazvirove, mazita avo adzimwe parudzi runotevera. mhosva yamadzibaba ake ngairangarirwe pamberi payeahoh; chivi chamai vake ngachirege kumbodzimwa. zvivi zvavo ngazvirambe zviri pamberi payeahoh, kuti aparadze chirangaridzo chavo panyika. nokuti haana kumbofunga kuita zvakanaka, asi akavhima varombo kusvika parufu, vanoshayiwa navane mwoyo yakaputsika. aifarira kutaura chituko, ngachichiuya pamusoro pake; iye asina kufadzwa nokuropafadza, ngakuve kure naye. aifuka kutuka senguo yake; zvakapinda mumuviri wake semvura, nomumapfupa ake samafuta. ngazvive sejasi rakamonerwa paari, sebhanhire rakasungirirwa paari nokusingaperi. uyu ngauve muripo wayeahoh kuvapomeri vangu, kuna avo vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro pangu. asi imi, ishe yeahoh, ndiitirei zvakanaka nokuda kwezita renyu; ndirwirei, kubudikidza nokunaka kworudo rwenyu. nokuti ndiri murombo uye ndinoshayiwa, uye mwoyo wangu wakuvara mukati mangu. ndinopera somumvuri wamadekwana; ndinozunzwa semhashu. mabvi angu apera simba nokutsanya; muviri wangu waonda uye ndaonda kwazvo. ndiri chinhu chinosekwa navapomeri vangu; pavanondiona, vanodzungudza misoro yavo. ndibatsirei, imi yeahoh allah wangu; ndiponesei zvakafanira rudo rwenyu. ngavazive kuti ndirwo ruoko rwenyu, kuti imi, iyemi yeahoh, makazviita. ivo vangatuka havo, asi imi mucharopafadza; vachanyadziswa pavanorwisa, asi muranda wenyu achafara. vapomeri vangu vachafukidzwa nenyadzi, uye vachaputirwa nokunyara sokunge nejasi. ndicharumbidza yeahoh nomuromo wangu zvikuru; paungano huru, ndichamurumbidza. nokuti anomira kuruoko rworudyi rwouyo anoshayiwa, kuti amuponese pane avo vanomupomera mhosva.

110

pisarema radhavhidhi yeahoh akati kuna she wangu, “gara kuruoko rwangu rworudyi, kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako.” yeahoh achatambanudza tsvimbo yesimba rako kubva muzioni; uchatonga pakati pavavengi vako. mauto ako achazvipira pazuva rako rehondo. wapfekedzwa nguo youshe, utsvene, kubva pachizvaro chamambakwedza uchagamuchira dova roujaya hwako. yeahoh akapika, uye haangashanduki, achiti, “iwe uri muprista nokusingaperi, worudzi rwamerikizedheki.” yeahoh ari kuruoko rwako rworudyi; achaparadza madzimambo pazuva rehasha dzake. achatonga ndudzi, achiunganidza vakafa, uye achiparadza vatongi venyika yose. achanwa parukova rwuri parutivi penzira; naizvozvo achasimudza musoro wake.

111

rumbidzai yeahoh. ndicharumbidza yeahoh nomwoyo wangu wose, padare ravakarurama nepagungano. mabasa ayeahoh makuru; anorangarirwa navose vanofara maari. mabasa ake ndeokukudzwa noumambo, uye kururama kwake kunogara nokusingaperi. akaita kuti zvishamiso zvake zvirangarirwe; yeahoh ane nyasha nengoni. anopa zvokudya kuna avo vanomutya; anorangarira sungano yake nokusingaperi. akaratidza vanhu vake simba ramabasa ake, achivapa nyika dzedzimwe ndudzi. mabasa amaoko ake akatendeka uye akarurama, mitemo yake yose yakavimbika. yakasimba kusvika nokusingaperi-peri, yakaitwa mukutendeka nokururama. akapa dzikinuro kuvanhu vake; akasimbisa sungano yake nokusingaperi, zita rake idzvene uye rinotyisa. kutya yeahoh ndiwo mavambo enjere; vose vanotevera mitemo yake vanonzwisisa. kurumbidzwa ndokwake nokusingaperi.

112

rumbidzai yeahoh. akaropafadzwa munhu anotya yeahoh, anofarira mirayiro yake zvikuru. vana vake vachava nesimba panyika; zvizvarwa zvavakarurama zvicharopafadzwa. pfuma nezvakawanda zviri mumba make, uye kururama kwake kunogara nokusingaperi. kunyange murima akarurama anobudirwa nechiedza, iye munhu ane nyasha nengoni uye akarurama. zvakanaka zvinouya kumunhu anopa zvizhinji uye anokweretesa pachena, anofambisa nzira dzake nokururamisira. zvirokwazvo, haangatongozungunuswi; munhu akarurama acharangarirwa nokusingaperi. haangatyi mashoko akaipa; mwoyo wake wakasimba, anovimba nayeahoh. mwoyo wake wakachengetedzeka, haangatyi chinhu; pakupedzisira achatarira nokukunda kuvavengi vake. akaparadzira zvipo zvake kuvarombo, kururama kwake kunogara nokusingaperi; runyanga rwake ruchasimudzwa mudenga mukukudzwa. akaipa achazviona uye acharwadziwa, acharumanya meno ake uye achaonda; kushuva kwowakaipa kuchava pasina.

113

rumbidzai yeahoh. rumbidzai, imi varanda vayeahoh, rumbidzai zita rayeahoh. zita rayeahoh ngarirumbidzwe, kubva zvino kusvikira narini. kubva pakubuda kwezuva kusvikira pakuvira kwaro, zita rayeahoh rinofanira kurumbidzwa. yeahoh anosimudzirwa pamusoro pendudzi dzose; kubwinya kwake kuri pamusoro pamatenga. ndianiko akaita sayeahoh allah wedu, iye anogara pachigaro choushe chokumusoro-soro, anokotamira pasi kuti aone zviri kudenga napanyika? anosimudza murombo kubva muguruva, uye anosimudza vanoshayiwa kubva padurunhuru ramadota; anovagadza namachinda, namachinda avanhu vavo. anogarisa mukadzi asingabereki mumba make, samai vavana vanofara. rumbidzai yeahoh.

114

israeri akati abuda muijipiti, imba yayaqobho ichibva kurudzi runo mutauro wokumwe, yeahudha akava imba tsvene yaallah, israeri ushe hwake. gungwa rakazviona rikatiza, jorodhani rwakadzokera shure; makomo akakwakuka samakondobwe, zvikomo samakwayana. haiwa gungwa, wakatizeiko, iwe jorodhani zvawakadzokera shure, imi makomo zvamakakwakuka samakondobwe, nemi zvikomo, samakwayana? dedera, iwe nyika pamberi pashe, pamberi paallah wayaqobho, akashandura dombo rikava dziva, dombo rakaoma rikava matsime emvura.

115

kwete kwatiri, yeahoh, kwete kwatiri, asi kukudzwa ngakupiwe kuzita renyu, nokuda kworudo rwenyu nokutendeka kwenyu. sei ndudzi dzichiti, “allah wavo aripiko?” allah wedu ari kudenga; anoita zvose zvinomufadza. asi zvifananidzo zvavo isirivha negoridhe, zvakaitwa namaoko avanhu. zvine miromo, asi hazvigoni kutaura, zvina meso, asi hazvigoni kuona; zvine nzeve, asi hazvigoni kunzwa mhino, asi hazvigoni kunhuhwidza; zvina maoko, asi hazvigoni kubata, tsoka, asi hazvigoni kufamba; uye hazvitauri napahuro pazvo. vanozviita vachafanana nazvo, navose vanovimba nazvo. haiwa imba yaisraeri, vimbai nayeahoh, ndiye mubatsiri wavo nenhoo yavo. imi imba yaaroni, vimbai nayeahoh, ndiye mubatsiri wavo nenhoo yavo. imi vanomutya, vimbai nayeahoh, ndiye mubatsiri wavo nenhoo yavo. yeahoh anotirangarira uye achatiropafadza: acharopafadza imba yaisraeri, acharopafadza imba yaaroni, acharopafadza vanotya yeahoh, vaduku navakuru zvakafanana. yeahoh ngaakuwanzei, mose iwe navana vako. yeahoh ngaakuropafadze, iye muiti wedenga napasi. kudenga denga kumusoro ndokwayeahoh, asi nyika akaipa kuvanhu. vakafa havasivo vanorumbidza yeahoh, avo vanoburukira kwakanyarara; asi tisu tinokudza yeahoh, kubva zvino kusvikira narini. rumbidzai yeahoh.

116

ndinoda yeahoh, nokuti akanzwa inzwi rangu; akandinzwira tsitsi pakuchema kwangu. nokuti akarerekera nzeve yake kwandiri, ndichadana kwaari mazuva ose oupenyu hwangu. misungo yorufu yakandipinganidza, kurwadza kweguva kwakauya pamusoro pangu; ndakakundwa nenhamo nokusuwa. ipapo ndakadana kuzita rayeahoh ndikati, “haiwa yeahoh, ndiponesei!” yeahoh ane nyasha uye akarurama; allah wedu azere netsitsi. yeahoh anodzivirira vakatendeka pamwoyo; pandakanga ndiri pakushayiwa kukuru, iye akandiponesa. haiwa mweya wangu, chizorora zvakare, nokuti yeahoh akakuitira zvakanaka. nokuti imi, iyemi yeahoh, makarwira mweya wangu parufu, meso angu pamisodzi, uye makumbo angu pakugumburwa, kuti ndifambe pamberi payeahoh munyika yavapenyu. ndakatenda; naizvozvo ndakati, “ndiri kutambudzika kwazvo.” uye pakuvhunduka kwangu ndakati, “vanhu vose vanoreva nhema.” ndingaripira seiko yeahoh pamusoro pokunaka kwake kwose kwandiri? ndichasimudza mukombe woruponeso ndigodana kuzita rayeahoh. ndichazadzisa mhiko dzangu kuna yeahoh, pamberi pavanhu vake vose. chinhu chinokosha pamberi payeahoh ndirwo rufu rwavatsvene vake. haiwa yeahoh, zvirokwazvo ndiri muranda wenyu; ndiri muranda wenyu, mwanakomana womurandakadzi wenyu; makandisunungura pangetani dzangu. ndichabayira chipo chokuvonga kwamuri, uye ndichadana kuzita rayeahoh. ndichazadzisa mhiko dzangu kuna yeahoh, pamberi pavanhu vake vose, pavanze dzeimba yayeahoh, mukati mako, iwe jerusarema. rumbidzai yeahoh.

117

rumbidzai yeahoh, imi ndudzi dzose; mukudzei, imi marudzi ose. nokuti rudo rwake kwatiri rukuru, uye kutendeka kwayeahoh kunogara nokusingaperi. rumbidzai yeahoh.

118

vongai yeahoh, nokuti akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi. israeri ngaati, “rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” imba yaaroni ngaiti, “rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” avo vanotya yeahoh ngavati, “rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” mukurwadziwa kwangu ndakadana kuna yeahoh, uye akandipindura nokundisunungura. yeahoh aneni; handingatyi. munhu angandiiteiko? yeahoh aneni; ndiye mubatsiri wangu. ndichatarira vavengi vangu nokukunda. zviri nani kutizira kuna yeahoh pano kuvimba nomunhu. zviri nani kutizira kuna yeahoh pano kuvimba namachinda. ndudzi dzose dzakandikomba, asi ndakavaparadza muzita rayeahoh. vakandikomba pamativi ose, asi ndakavaparadza muzita rayeahoh. vakandimomotera senyuchi, asi vakakurumidza kufa seminzwa inotsva, ndakavaparadza muzita rayeahoh. ndakasundidzirwa shure uye ndikada kuwa, asi yeahoh akandibatsira. yeahoh ndiye simba rangu norwiyo rwangu; ndiye ava ruponeso rwangu. kupembera kwomufaro nokukunda kunonzwika mumatende avakarurama kuchiti: “ruoko rworudyi rwayeahoh rwakaita zvinhu zvikuru! ruoko rworudyi rwayeahoh rwakasimudzirwa kumusoro; ruoko rworudyi rwayeahoh rwakaita zvinhu zvikuru!” handingafi asi ndichararama, uye ndichaparidza zvakaitwa nayeahoh. yeahoh akandiranga kwazvo, asi haana kundiisa kurufu. ndizarurireiwo masuo okururama; ndichapinda ndigovonga yeahoh. iri ndiro suo rayeahoh panopinda navakarurama. ndichakuvongai, nokuti makandipindura; makava ruponeso rwangu. dombo rakarambwa navavaki ndiro rakazova musoro wekona; yeahoh akaita izvi, uye zvinoshamisa pamberi pedu. iri ndiro zuva rakaitwa nayeahoh; ngatifarei kwazvo tifarisise mariri. haiwa yeahoh, tiponesei; haiwa yeahoh, tipeiwo kubudirira. akaropafadzwa uyo anouya muzita rayeahoh. tiri mumba mayeahoh tinokuropafadzai. yeahoh ndiye allah, uye akaita kuti chiedza chake chivhenekere pamusoro pedu. namatavi muruoko, pinda mumudungwe ubatane navamwe vari kuenda kunyanga dzearitari. imi muri allah wangu, uye ndichakuvongai; ndimi allah wangu, uye ndichakukudzai. vongai yeahoh, nokuti akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.

119

vakaropafadzwa avo vane nzira isina chaingapomerwa, vanofamba mumurayiro wayeahoh. vakaropafadzwa avo vanochengeta zvaakatema, vanomutsvaka nomwoyo wavo wose. havaiti chinhu chakaipa; vanofamba munzira yake. imi makaisa zvirevo zvinofanira kuteererwa. haiwa, dai nzira dzangu dzakasimba pakuteerera zvirevo zvenyu! ipapo handaizonyadziswa pandinorangarira mirayiro yenyu. ndichakurumbidzai nomwoyo wakarurama, sezvo ndichidzidza mirayiro yenyu yakarurama. ndichateerera mitemo yenyu; regai kundirasa zvachose. ko, jaya ringanatsa nzira yaro nei? nokurarama sezvinoreva shoko renyu. ndinokutsvakai nomwoyo wangu wose; musandirega ndichitsauka pamirayiro yenyu. shoko renyu ndakariviga mumwoyo mangu, kuti ndirege kukutadzirai. imi munofanira kukudzwa, yeahoh; ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu. nemiromo yangu ndichataurazve mirayiro yose inobva pamuromo wenyu. ndinofarira kutevera zvirevo zvenyu, somunhu anofarira pfuma huru. ndinofungisisa zvirevo zvenyu, uye ndinorangarira nzira dzenyu. ndinofarira mitemo yenyu; handingakanganwi shoko renyu. itirai muranda wenyu zvakanaka, ndigorarama; ndichateerera shoko renyu. ndisvinudzei meso angu kuti ndione. zvinhu zvinoshamisa zviri pamurayiro wenyu. ndiri mutorwa panyika; regai kundivanzira mirayiro yenyu. mweya wangu wapedzwa nokushuva mitemo yenyu nguva dzose. munotsiura vanozvikudza, avo vakatukwa, uye vanotsauka kubva pamirayiro yenyu. bvisai kwandiri kushorwa nokuzvidzwa, nokuti ndinochengeta zvirevo zvenyu. kunyange vatongi vachigara pamwe chete vachindireva, muranda wenyu achafungisisa mitemo yenyu. ndinofadzwa nezvirevo zvenyu; ndizvo zvinondipanga mazano. ndakaradzikwa pasi muguruva; chengetedzai upenyu hwangu sezvinoreva shoko renyu. ndakarevazve nzira dzangu imi mukandipindura; ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu. itai kuti ndinzwisise zvirevo zvenyu; ipapo ndichafungisisa pamusoro pezvishamiso zvenyu. mweya wangu waziya nokusuwa; ndisimbisei sezvinoreva shoko renyu. ndibvisei panzira dzokunyengera; ndinzwirei nyasha kubudikidza nomurayiro wenyu. ndakasarudza nzira yechokwadi; ndakaisa mwoyo wangu pamurayiro wenyu. haiwa yeahoh, ini ndichabatirira pazvirevo zvenyu; musandirega ndichinyadziswa. ndinomhanya munzira yomurayiro wenyu, nokuti makasunungura mwoyo wangu. ndidzidzisei, imi yeahoh, kutevera mitemo yenyu; ipapo ndichaichengeta kusvikira kumagumo. ndipei kunzwisisa, ndigochengeta murayiro wenyu uye ndigouteerera nomwoyo wangu wose. nditungamirirei munzira yemirayiro yenyu, nokuti imomo ndinowana mufaro. dzorerai mwoyo wangu pane zvamakatema kwete pakuchiva kwenyama. dzorai meso angu pazvinhu zvisina maturo; chengetedzai upenyu hwangu sezvinoreva shoko renyu. zadzisai zvamakapikira muranda wenyu, kuti mugotyiwa. bvisai kunyadziswa kwandaitya, nokuti mitemo yenyu yakanaka. ndinoshuva zvirevo zvenyu sei! chengetedzai upenyu hwangu mukururama kwenyu. rudo rwenyu rusingaperi ngaruuye kwandiri, yeahoh, noruponeso rwenyu sezvamakavimbisa; ipapo ndichapindura vanondishora, nokuti ndinovimba neshoko renyu. regai kubvisa shoko rechokwadi pamuromo pangu, nokuti ndakaisa tariro yangu mumurayiro wenyu. ndichagara ndichiteerera murayiro wenyu, nokusingaperi-peri. ndichafamba-famba ndakasununguka, nokuti ndakatsvaka zvirevo zvenyu. ndichataura zvamakatema pamberi pamadzimambo, uye handinganyadziswi, nokuti ndinofarira mirayiro yenyu nokuti ndinoida. ndinosimudzira maoko angu kumirayiro yenyu yandinoda, uye ndinofungisisa zvirevo zvenyu. rangarirai shoko renyu kumuranda wenyu, nokuti makandipa tariro. zvinondinyaradza pakutambura kwangu ndezvizvi: vimbiso yenyu inochengetedza upenyu hwangu. vanozvikudza vanondiseka vasingaregi, asi ini handitsauki pamurayiro wenyu. ndinorangarira mirayiro yenyu yekare, imi yeahoh, uye ndinonyaradzwa mairi. shungu dzinondibata nokuda kwavakaipa, vakasiya murayiro wenyu. mitemo yenyu ndiro dingindira rorwiyo rwangu pose pandinogara. haiwa, yeahoh, ndinorangarira zita renyu usiku, uye ndichachengeta murayiro wenyu. aya ndiwo anga ari maitiro angu: ndinoteerera zvirevo zvenyu. haiwa, yeahoh, ndimi mugove wangu; ndakavimbisa kuteerera mashoko enyu. ndakatsvaka chiso chenyu nomwoyo wangu wose; ndinzwirei nyasha sezvamakavimbisa. ndakacherechedza nzira dzangu ndikadzorera tsoka dzangu kune zvamakatema. ndichakurumidza uye handinganonoki kuteerera mirayiro yenyu. kunyange vakaipa vakandisunga namabote, handizokanganwi murayiro wenyu. ndinomuka pakati pousiku ndichikuvongai nokuda kwemirayiro yenyu yakarurama. ndiri shamwari yavose vanokutyai, nokuna vose vanotevera zvirevo zvenyu. haiwa yeahoh, nyika izere norudo rwenyu, ndidzidzisei zvirevo zvenyu. makaitira muranda wenyu zvakanaka, imi yeahoh, sezvakafanira shoko renyu. ndidzidzisei zivo nokutonga kwakanaka, nokuti ndakatenda mirayiro yenyu. pandakanga ndisati ndatambudzika, ndakatsauka, asi zvino ndinoteerera shoko renyu. imi makanaka, uye munoita zvakanaka; ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu. kunyange vanozvikudza vakandipomera nhema, ndinochengeta zvamakatema nomwoyo wangu wose. mwoyo yavo yakasindimara uye hainzwisisi, asi ndinofarira murayiro wenyu. zvakanga zvakanaka kuti nditambudzike, kuitira kuti ndigodzidza mitemo yenyu. murayiro unobva pamuromo wenyu unokosha kwandiri, kupfuura zviuru zvezvimedu zvesirivha negoridhe. maoko enyu akandisika uye akandiumba; ndipei kunzwisisa kuti ndigodzidza mirayiro yenyu. avo vanokutyai ngavafare pavanondiona, nokuti ndakaisa tariro yangu pashoko renyu. haiwa yeahoh, ndinoziva kuti mirayiro yenyu yakarurama, uye kuti makanditambudza mukutendeka kwenyu. rudo rwenyu rusingaperi ngarutinyaradze, maererano nechivimbiso chenyu kumuranda wenyu. tsitsi dzenyu ngadziuye kwandiri kuti ndirarame, nokuti murayiro wenyu ndiwo mufaro wangu. vanozvikudza ngavanyadziswe pakundikanganisira ndisina mhaka, asi ini ndichafungisisa zvirevo zvenyu. vanokutyai ngavadzokere kwandiri, ivo vanonzwisisa zvamakatema. mwoyo wangu ngaushaye chaungapomerwa pamitemo yenyu, kuti ndirege kunyadziswa. mweya wangu unoziya nokuda kwekushuva ruponeso rwenyu, asi ndakaisa tariro yangu pashoko renyu. meso angu aneta nokutsvaga chivimbiso chenyu; ndinoti, “muchandinyaradza riniko?” kunyange ndakaita sehomwe yewaini ndiri muutsi, handikanganwi mitemo yenyu. muranda wenyu acharindira kusvikira riniko? mucharanga vatambudzi vangu riniko? vanozvikudza vakandicherera makomba, zvinopesana nomurayiro wenyu. mirayiro yenyu yose yakavimbika, ndibatsirei, nokuti vanhu vanonditambudza ndisina mhaka. vakanga voda kundibvisa panyika, asi handina kusiya zvamakatema. chengetedzai upenyu hwangu zvakafanira rudo rwenyu, uye ini ndichateerera zvirevo zvomuromo wenyu. haiwa yeahoh, shoko renyu rinogara nokusingaperi; rinomira rakasimba kudenga denga. kutendeka kwenyu kunoramba kuripo kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose; makasimbisa nyika uye inogara nokusingaperi. mirayiro yenyu iripo kusvikira iye nhasi, nokuti zvinhu zvose zvinokushumirai. dai murayiro wenyu wanga usiri mufaro wangu, ndingadai ndakafira mumatambudziko angu. handichazokanganwi zvamakatema, nokuti nazvo makachengetedza upenyu hwangu. ndiponesei, nokuti ndiri wenyu; ndakatsvaka zvamakatema. vakaipa vakarindira kundiparadza, asi ini ndichafunga zvirevo zvenyu. ndinoona kuguma kwezvose zvakakwana, asi mirayiro yenyu haina magumo. haiwa, ndinoda murayiro wenyu sei! ndinoufungisisa zuva rose. mirayiro yenyu inoita kuti ndive akachenjera kupfuura vavengi vangu, nokuti inogara neni nguva dzose. ndinonzwisisa zvakawanda kupfuura vadzidzisi vangu, nokuti ndinofungisisa pamusoro pezvamakatema. ndinonzwisisa zvikuru kupfuura vakuru, nokuti ndinoteerera zvirevo zvenyu. ndakadzora tsoka dzangu panzira dzose dzakaipa kuti nditeerere shoko renyu. handina kubva pamirayiro yenyu, nokuti imi pachenyu makandidzidzisa. mashoko enyu anotapira seiko pakuaravira, anotapira kukunda uchi mumukanwa mangu! ndinowana kunzwisisa kubva pazvirevo zvenyu; naizvozvo ndinovenga nzira dzose dzakaipa. shoko renyu ndiwo mwenje wetsoka dzangu, nechiedza chenzira yangu. ndakaita mhiko ndikaisimbisa, kuti ndichatevera mirayiro yenyu yakarurama. ndakatambudzika kwazvo; chengetedzai upenyu hwangu, imi yeahoh, zvakafanira shoko renyu. haiwa yeahoh, gamuchirai henyu kurumbidza kwomuromo wangu, mugondidzidzisa mirayiro yenyu. kunyange ndichiramba ndakabata upenyu hwangu mumaoko angu, handizokanganwi murayiro wenyu. vakaipa vakanditeya nomusungo, asi handina kutsauka pazvirevo zvenyu. zvirevo zvenyu inhaka yangu nokusingaperi; ndizvo mufaro womwoyo wangu. mwoyo wangu wakagarira kuchengeta zvirevo zvenyu, kusvikira kumagumo. ndinovenga vanhu vane mwoyo miviri, asi ndinoda murayiro wenyu. imi muri utiziro hwangu nenhoo yangu; ndakaisa tariro yangu pashoko renyu. ibvai kwandiri, imi vaiti vezvakaipa, kuti ndichengete mirayiro yaallah wangu! nditsigirei sezvamakavimbisa, ipapo ndichararama; musarega tariro yangu ichidzimwa. nditsigirei, ipapo ndicharwirwa; ndicharamba ndine hanya nemitemo yenyu. munoramba vose vanotsauka pamitemo yenyu, nokuti kunyengera kwavo hakuna maturo. vakaipa vose venyika munovaita sengura; naizvozvo ndinoda zvamakatema. nyama yangu inodedera nokuda kwokukutyai; ndinomira ndichitya mirayiro yenyu. ndakaita zvakarurama nokururamisira; musandisiya mumaoko avadzvinyiriri vangu. itai kuti muranda wenyu agare zvakanaka; musarega vanozvikudza vachimudzvinyirira. meso angu aneta nokutsvaka ruponeso rwenyu, ndichitsvaga vimbiso yenyu yakarurama. itirai muranda wenyu zvinoringana norudo rwenyu, uye ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu. ndiri muranda wenyu; ndipeiwo kunzvera kuti ndigonzwisisa zvamakatema. haiwa yeahoh, inguva yenyu yokubata; murayiro wenyu uri kuputswa. nokuti ndinoda mirayiro yenyu kupfuura goridhe, kupfuura goridhe rakanatswa, uye nokuti ndinoti zvirevo zvenyu zvose zvakarurama, ndinovenga nzira dzose dzakaipa. zvirevo zvenyu zvinoshamisa; naizvozvo ndinozviteerera. kuzarurwa kweshoko renyu kunopa chiedza; kunopa kunzwisisa kuna vasina mano. ndinoshamisa muromo wangu ndigodokwaira, ndichishuva mirayiro yenyu. dzokerai kwandiri mugondinzwira ngoni, sezvamunogara muchiita kuna avo vanoda zita renyu. rayirai nhambwe dzetsoka dzangu zviri maererano neshoko renyu; chivi ngachirege kunditonga. ndidzikinurei pakudzvinyirira kwavanhu, kuti ndigoteerera zvirevo zvenyu. chiso chenyu ngachipenye pamusoro pomuranda wenyu, uye ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu. hova dzemisodzi dzinoerera dzichibva mumeso angu, nokuti murayiro wenyu hausi kuteererwa. haiwa yeahoh, imi makarurama, uye mirayiro yenyu yakarurama. zvirevo zvenyu zvamakadzika zvakarurama; zvakavimbika kwazvo. kushingaira kwangu kunondipedza, nokuti vavengi vangu havana hanya namashoko enyu. vimbiso dzenyu dzakaedzwa chose, uye muranda wenyu anodzida. kunyange ndakaderedzwa uye ndichizvidzwa hangu, handikanganwi zvirevo zvenyu. kururama kwenyu kunogara nokusingaperi, uye murayiro wenyu ndowezvokwadi. nhamo namatambudziko zviri pamusoro pangu, asi mirayiro yenyu ndiwo mufaro wangu. zvirevo zvenyu zvinogara zvakarurama; ndipeiwo kunzwisisa kuti ndirarame. ndinodana nomwoyo wangu wose; haiwa yeahoh ndipindureiwo, uye ndichateerera mitemo yenyu. ndinodanidzira kwamuri, ndiponesei uye ndichachengeta zvamakatema. ndinomuka mambakwedza asati asvika ndigochemera kubatsirwa;
