ndakaisa tariro yangu pashoko renyu. meso angu anogara akasvinura panguva dzose dzousiku, kuti ndifungisise pamusoro pevimbiso dzenyu. inzwai inzwi rangu sezvakafanira rudo rwenyu; haiwa yeahoh, chengetedzai upenyu hwangu zviri maererano nemirayiro yenyu. vanoita mano akaipa vari pedyo, asi vari kure nomurayiro wenyu. asi imi muri pedyo, yeahoh, uye mirayiro yenyu yose ndeyezvokwadi. ndakadzidza pane zvamakatema kare, kuti makazvisimbisa kuti zvigare nokusingaperi. tarirai kutambudzika kwangu mugondirwira, nokuti handina kukanganwa murayiro wenyu. miririrai mhosva yangu uye mundidzikinure; chengetedzai upenyu hwangu maererano nevimbiso yenyu. ruponeso rwuri kure navakaipa, nokuti havatsvaki mitemo yenyu. haiwa yeahoh, tsitsi dzenyu ihuru; chengetedzai upenyu hwangu maererano nemirayiro yenyu. vavengi vangu navanonditambudza vazhinji, asi handina kutsauka pane zvamakatema. ndinotarira kuna vasingatendi ndichisema, nokuti havateereri shoko renyu. tarirai madiro andinoita zvirevo zvenyu; haiwa yeahoh, chengetedzai upenyu hwangu, maererano norudo rwenyu. mashoko enyu ose ndeechokwadi; mirayiro yenyu yose yakarurama ndeyokusingaperi. vatongi vanonditambudza ndisina mhaka, asi mwoyo wangu unodedera pashoko renyu. ndinofarira vimbiso yenyu kufanana nouyo anowana zvakapambwa zvizhinji. ndinovenga uye ndinosema nhema, asi ndinoda murayiro wenyu. ndinokurumbidzai kanomwe pazuva, nokuda kwemirayiro yenyu yakarurama. vanoda murayiro wenyu vano rugare rukuru, uye hakuna chingavagumbusa. haiwa yeahoh, ndakamirira ruponeso rwenyu, uye ndinotevera mirayiro yenyu. ndinoteerera zvirevo zvenyu, nokuti ndinozvida zvikuru. ndinoteerera zvirevo zvenyu nezvamakatema, nokuti nzira dzangu dzose dzinozivikanwa nemi. dai kuchema kwangu kwasvika pamberi penyu, imi yeahoh; ndipeiwo kunzwisisa maererano neshoko renyu. kukumbira kwangu dai kwasvika pamberi penyu; ndirwirei maererano nevimbiso yenyu. miromo yangu dai yafashukira nerumbidzo, nokuti munondidzidzisa mitemo yenyu. rurimi rwangu dai rwaimba nezveshoko renyu, nokuti mirayiro yenyu yose yakarurama. ruoko rwenyu dai rwagadzirira kundibatsira, nokuti ndakasarudza zvirevo zvenyu. haiwa yeahoh, ndinoshuva ruponeso rwenyu, uye murayiro wenyu ndiwo mufaro wangu. regai ndirarame kuti ndigokurumbidzai, uye dai mirayiro yenyu yandibatsira. ndakatsauka segwai rakarasika. tsvakai muranda wenyu, nokuti handina kukanganwa mirayiro yenyu.

120

rwiyo rworwendo. ndinodana kuna yeahoh mukutambudzika kwangu, uye anondipindura. haiwa yeahoh, ndiponesei pamiromo inoreva nhema, nendimi dzinonyengera. achaiteiko kwauri, uye chimwe chiiko kunze kwezvizvi, iwe rurimi runonyengera? achakuranga nemiseve yakapinza yemhare, namazimbe anopfuta omuti womurara. ndine nhamo ini ndinogara mumesheki, kuti ndinogara pakati pamatende ekedhari! ndakagara nguva refu pakati pavanovenga rugare. ndiri munhu worugare; asi pandinotaura, ivo ndevehondo.

121

rwiyo rworwendo. ndinosimudzira meso angu kumakomo, kubatsirwa kwangu kunobvepiko? rubatsiro rwangu runobva kuna yeahoh, muiti wokudenga napasi. haangatenderi rutsoka rwako kuti rutedzemuke, muchengeti wako haangakotsiri; zvirokwazvo, muchengeti waisraeri haangakotsiri kana kuvata. yeahoh anokurinda, yeahoh ndiye mumvuri wako kuruoko rwako rworudyi; zuva haringakubayi masikati, kana mwedzi usiku. yeahoh achakuchengeta pane zvose zvinokuvadza, iye acharinda upenyu hwako; yeahoh achakurinda pakubuda kwako napakupinda kwako, kubva zvino uye nokusingaperi.

122

rwiyo rworwendo rwadhavhidhi. ndakafara pavakati kwandiri, “handei kumba yayeahoh.” tsoka dzedu dzimire mukati mamasuo ako, iwe jerusarema. jerusarema rakavakwa seguta rakapakata kwazvo. ndiko kunokwira marudzi, iwo marudzi ayeahoh, kundorumbidza zita rayeahoh maererano nezvakatemerwa israeri. zvigaro zvokutonga zvimire ikoko, zvigaro zvoushe zveimba yadhavhidhi. nyengetererai rugare rwejerusarema: “vanokuda dai vagara zvakanaka. dai mukati mamasvingo ako maita rugare, nokuchengetedzeka mukati menhare dzako.” nokuda kwehama neshamwari dzangu, ndichati, “rugare ngaruve mukati mako.” nokuda kweimba yayeahoh allah wedu, ndichatsvaka kubudirira kwako.

123

rwiyo rworwendo. ndinosimudzira meso angu kwamuri, kunemi mune chigaro choushe kudenga. sokutarira kunoita meso evaranda kuna vatenzi vavo, sezvinoita meso omurandakadzi achitarira ruoko rwatenzikadzi wake, saizvozvo meso edu anotarira kuna yeahoh allah wedu, kusvikira atinzwira ngoni. tinzwirei ngoni, imi yeahoh, tinzwirei ngoni, nokuti takatsunga pakuzvidzwa kwakawanda. takatsunga zvikuru pakumhurwa kunobva kuna vanozvikudza, nokuzvidzwa kuzhinji kunobva kuna vanozvikudza.

124

rwiyo rworwendo rwadhavhidhi. israeri ngaati dai yeahoh akanga asiri kurutivi kwedu, dai yeahoh akanga asiri kurutivi kwedu patakarwiswa navanhu, apo kutsamwa kwavo kwakatimukira, vangadai vakatimedza tiri vapenyu; mafashamu angadai akatifukidza, mvura zhinji ingadai yakatikukura, mvura zhinji ine hasha ingadai yakatirasira kure. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe, asina kutendera kuti tibvamburwe nameno avo. tapunyuka seshiri yabva parugombe rwomuteyi; rugombe rwadamburwa uye tapunyuka. kubatsirwa kwedu kuri muzita rayeahoh, muiti wedenga nenyika.

125

rwiyo rworwendo. vanovimba nayeahoh vakafanana negomo rezioni, risingazungunuswi asi rinogara nokusingaperi. sokupoteredzwa kwakaitwa jerusarema namakomo, saizvozvo yeahoh anopoteredza vanhu vake kubva zvino nokusingaperi. tsvimbo yavasakarurama haingagari pamusoro penyika yakagoverwa vakarurama, nokuti ipapo vakarurama vangazotambanudzira maoko avo kuita zvakaipa. haiwa yeahoh, itirai zvakanaka, kuna avo vakanaka, kuna avo vane mwoyo yakarurama. asi avo vanotsaukira kunzira dzakaminama, yeahoh achavaparadza pamwe chete navaiti vezvakaipa. rugare ngaruve pana israeri.

126

rwiyo rworwendo. yeahoh paakadzosa vatapwa kuzioni, takanga tava savanhu vairota. miromo yedu yakanga izere nokuseka, ndimi dzedu dzizere nenziyo dzomufaro. ipapo zvakanzi pakati pendudzi, “yeahoh akavaitira zvinhu zvikuru.” yeahoh atiitira zvinhu zvikuru, uye tazara nomufaro. tidzorereizve nhaka yedu, imi yeahoh, sehova dzenegevhi. avo vanodyara nemisodzi vachakohwa nenziyo dzomufaro. uyo anobuda achichema, akatakura mbeu yokudyara, achadzoka nenziyo dzomufaro, akatakura zvisote.

127

rwiyo rworwendo rwasoromoni. kana yeahoh asingavaki imba, vavaki vayo vanoshandira pasina. kana yeahoh asingachengeti guta, varindi vanomira vakarinda pasina. hazvina maturo kumuka mangwanani nokunonoka kuvata, uchitambudzikira zvokudya, nokuti anopa hope kuna vaanoda. vanakomana inhaka inobva kuna yeahoh, vana mubayiro unobva kwaari. semiseve mumaoko emhare ndizvo zvakaita vanakomana voujaya. akaropafadzwa murume ane goba rizere navo. havanganyadziswi pavanokakavadzana navavengi vavo pasuo.

128

rwiyo rworwendo. vakaropafadzwa vose vanotya yeahoh, vanofamba munzira dzake. uchadya chibereko chokushanda kwako; maropafadzo nokubudirira zvichava zvako. mukadzi wako achava somuzambiringa unobereka, pakati peimba yako; vanakomana vako vachaita samabukira omuorivhi, vakakomberedza tafura yako. ndizvo zvakaita munhu akaropafadzwa, anotya yeahoh. yeahoh ngaakuropafadzei kubva kuzioni, mazuva ose oupenyu hwenyu; muone henyu kubudirira kwejerusarema, uye murarame kuti muone vana vavana venyu. rugare ngaruve pana israeri.

129

rwiyo rworwendo. vakandidzvinyirira zvikuru kubva pauduku hwangu, israeri ngaati, “vakandidzvinyirira zvikuru kubva pauduku hwangu, asi havana kundikunda. varimi vakarima musana wangu vakaita miforo yavo mirefu.” asi yeahoh akarurama, akandisunungura pamabote avakaipa. vose vanovenga zioni ngavadzorerwe shure nenyadzi. ngavaite souswa pamusoro pedenga remba, hunooma husati hwakura; mukohwi haangazadzi maoko ake nahwo, uye anounganidza haangazadzi maoko ake. vanopfuura nepo ngavarege kuti, “maropafadzo ayeahoh ngaave pamusoro pako; tinokuropafadza muzita rayeahoh.”

130

rwiyo rworwendo. ndinodanidzira kwamuri yeahoh, ndiri pakadzika; haiwa yeahoh, inzwai inzwi rangu. nzeve dzenyu ngadzinzwe kuchemera kwangu ngoni. dai imi, iyemi yeahoh, maironda zvakaipa zvomunhu, haiwa yeahoh, ndianiko aimira? asi kwamuri kune kukanganwira; naizvozvo imi munotyiwa. ndinomirira yeahoh, mweya wangu unomirira, uye tariro yangu iri mushoko rake. mweya wangu unorindira ishe kupfuura varindi vanomirira rungwanani. haiwa israeri, isa tariro yako muna yeahoh, nokuti yeahoh ane rudo rusingaperi uye kwaari kune dzikinuro izere. iye pachake achadzikinura israeri kubva pazvivi zvavo zvose.

131

rwiyo rworwendo rwadhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, mwoyo wangu hauzvikudzi, meso angu haana manyawi; handina hanya nezvinhu zvikuru kana zvinhu zvinonyanya kushamisa. asi ndakadzikamisa uye ndakanyaradza mweya wangu; somwana akarumurwa namai vake, somwana akarumurwa, ndizvo zvakaita mweya wangu mandiri. haiwa israeri, isai tariro yenyu pana yeahoh, kubva zvino nokusingaperi.

132

rwiyo rworwendo. haiwa yeahoh, rangarirai dhavhidhi namatambudziko ake ose aakasangana nawo. akapika mhiko kuna yeahoh, akaita mhiko kuna wamasimba wayaqobho achiti, “handingapindi mumba mangu kana kuenda kundovata pamubhedha wangu, handingatenderi hope mumaziso angu, kana kutsumwaira mumeso angu, kusvikira ndawana nzvimbo yayeahoh, nzvimbo yokugara yowamasimba wayaqobho.” takazvinzwa muefurata, takasangana nazvo muminda yejaari tikati, “ngatiendei kunzvimbo yake yokugara; ngatinamatei pachitsiko chetsoka dzake, haiwa yeahoh, simukai muuye kunzvimbo yenyu yokuzorora, imi neareka yesimba renyu. vaprista venyu dai vafukidzwa nokururama; dai vatsvene venyu vaimba nomufaro.” nokuda kwadhavhidhi muranda wenyu, musaramba muzodziwa wenyu. yeahoh akapika mhiko kuna dhavhidhi, mhiko yechokwadi yaasingagoni kushandura achiti, “mumwe wechizvarwa chako ndichamugadza pachigaro chako choushe, kana vanakomana vako vakachengeta sungano yangu nezvandakatema zvandakavadzidzisa, ipapo vanakomana vavo vachagara pachigaro chako choushe nokusingaperi-peri.” nokuti yeahoh akasarudza zioni, akarida kuti huve ugaro hwake achiti, “iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yangu yokuzorora nokusingaperi-peri; ipapa ndipo pandichagara samambo, nokuti ndakapada, ndichariropafadza nezvakawanda; ndichagutsa varombo varo nezvokudya. ndichafukidza vaprista varo noruponeso, uye vatsvene varo vachagara vachiimba nomufaro. “pano ndipo pandichameresa nyanga yadhavhidhi, uye ndichatungidza mwenje womuzodziwa wangu. ndichafukidza vavengi vake nenyadzi, asi korona yake ichabwinya kwazvo.”

133

rwiyo rworwendo rwadhavhidhi. zvakanaka uye zvinofadza sei kana hama dzichigara pamwe chete mukubatana! zvakafanana namafuta anokosha adururirwa pamusoro, anoerera kundebvu, anoerera kundebvu dzaaroni, anoburukira kusvikira pamipendero yenguo dzake. zvinoita sokuti dova reherimoni riri kuwira pamusoro pegomo rezioni. nokuti ndipo pakaiswa kuropafadza kwayeahoh, ihwo upenyu husingaperi-peri.

134

rwiyo rworwendo. rumbidzai yeahoh, imi varanda vose vayeahoh, vanoshumira usiku muimba yayeahoh. simudzai maoko enyu munzvimbo tsvene, murumbidze yeahoh. dai yeahoh, iye muiti wedenga napasi, akuropafadzai kubva pazioni.

135

rumbidzai yeahoh. rumbidzai zita rayeahoh; murumbidzei, imi varanda vayeahoh, imi munoshumira muimba yayeahoh, muvanze dzeimba yaallah wedu. rumbidzai yeahoh, nokuti yeahoh akanaka; imbirai zita rake nziyo dzokurumbidza, nokuti ndizvo zvakanaka. nokuti yeahoh akasarudza yaqobho kuti ave wake, naisraeri kuti ave pfuma yake. ndinoziva kuti yeahoh mukuru, uye kuti ishe wedu mukuru kupfuura vamwari vose. yeahoh anoita zvose zvinomufadza, kudenga napasi, nomumakungwa napakadzika pose. anoita kuti makore akwire kubva kumagumo enyika; anotumira mheni nemvura, uye anobudisa mhepo kubva mumatura ake. ndiye akaparadza matangwe eijipiti, matangwe avanhu neemhuka. akatumira zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvake mukati mako, iwe ijipiti, pamusoro pafaro navaranda vake vose. akaparadza ndudzi dzakawanda uye akauraya madzimambo ane simba, sihoni mambo weamori, ogi mambo webhashani namadzimambo ose ekenani, akapa nyika yavo kuti ive nhaka, nhaka yavanhu vake israeri. haiwa yeahoh, zita renyu rinogara nokusingaperi, mukurumbira wenyu, imi yeahoh, kuzvizvarwa zvose. nokuti yeahoh achapupurira vanhu vake uye achava nenyasha pamusoro pavaranda vake. zvifananidzo zvendudzi isirivha negoridhe, zvakaitwa namaoko avanhu. zvine miromo, asi hazvigoni kutaura, zvina meso, asi hazvigoni kuona; nenzeve, asi hazvigoni kunzwa, uye hamuna kufema mumuromo mazvo. vaya vanozviita vachafanana nazvo, saizvozvowo, naivo vanovimba nazvo. haiwa imi imba yaisraeri, rumbidzai yeahoh; haiwa imba yaaroni, rumbidzai yeahoh; haiwa imi imba yarevhi, rumbidzai yeahoh; imi vanomutya, rumbidzai yeahoh. yeahoh ngaarumbidzwe kubva kuzioni, iye agere mujerusarema. rumbidzai yeahoh.

136

vongai yeahoh, nokuti akanaka: vongai allah wavamwari: vongai ishe wamadzishe: iye oga anoita zvishamiso zvikuru, iye akaita matenga nokunzwisisa kwake, iye akatambanudza nyika pamusoro pemvura zhinji, iye akaita zviedza zvikuru, zuva kuti ribate ushe masikati, mwedzi nenyeredzi kuti zvibate ushe usiku; iye akarova matangwe eijipiti, uye akabudisa israeri kubva pakati pavo, noruoko rune simba uye noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, iye akaparadzanisa gungwa dzvuku napakati, uye akayambutsa israeri napakati paro, asi akakukura faro nehondo yake mugungwa dzvuku; iye akatungamirira vanhu vake nomugwenga, akarova madzimambo makuru, uye akauraya madzimambo ane simba, sihoni mambo wavaamori, naogi mambo webhashani, akavapa nyika yavo senhaka, nhaka kumuranda wake israeri. iye akatirangarira pakudzikisirwa kwedu, uye akatisunungura kubva pavavengi vedu, uye anopa zvokudya kuzvisikwa zvose. vongai allah wokudenga,

137

panzizi dzebhabhironi takagarapo tikachema, patakarangarira zioni. pamikonachando apo ndipo patakaturika mbira dzedu, nokuti ipapo avo vakatitapa vakatikumbira nziyo, vatambudzi vedu vakatigombedzera kuti tiimbe nziyo dzomufaro, vakati, “tiimbirei rumwe rwiyo rwezioni!” tingaimba seiko nziyo dzayeahoh tiri munyika yokumwe? kana ndikakukanganwa, iwe jerusarema, ruoko rwangu rworudyi ngarukanganwe umhizha hwarwo. rurimi rwangu ngarunamatire kumusoro kwomuromo wangu, kana ndikasakurangarira iwe, kana ndisingafungi jerusarema, iwo mufaro wangu wapamusoro-soro. haiwa yeahoh, rangarirai henyu zvakaitwa navaedhomu, pazuva rakawa jerusarema. vakati, “rikoromorei! rikoromorei kusvikira panheyo dzaro!” haiwa mwanasikana webhabhironi, watongerwa kuparadzwa, achafara munhu uyo achatsiva kwauri zvawakaita kwatiri, iye achatora pwere dzako agodzirovera pamatombo.

138

pisarema radhavhidhi. ndichakurumbidzai, imi yeahoh, nomwoyo wangu wose; ndichaimba nziyo dzokukurumbidzai pamberi pa“vamwari.” ndichakotamira pasi ndakatarisa kutemberi yenyu tsvene, uye ndicharumbidza zita renyu nokuda kworudo rwenyu nokutendeka kwenyu, nokuti makakudza zita renyu neshoko renyu pamusoro pezvinhu zvose. pandakadana, imi makandipindura; makandishingisa nomwoyo wakasimba. madzimambo ose enyika ngaakurumbidzei, imi yeahoh, pavanonzwa mashoko omuromo wenyu. ngavaimbe pamusoro penzira dzayeahoh, nokuti kubwinya kwayeahoh kukuru. kunyange yeahoh ari kumusoro, anoona vanozvininipisa, asi vanozvikudza anovaziva vari kure. kunyange ndikafamba pakati penhamo, munochengetedza upenyu hwangu; munotambanudza ruoko rwenyu pamusoro pehasha dzavavengi vangu, munondiponesa noruoko rwenyu rworudyi. yeahoh achazadzisa zvirongwa zvake neni; rudo rwenyu, imi yeahoh, runogara nokusingaperi, musasiya mabasa amaoko enyu.

139

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, makandinzvera uye munondiziva. munoziva nguva yandinogara neyandinosimuka; munonzwisisa pfungwa dzangu muri kure. munonzvera kubuda kwangu nokuvata kwangu pasi; munoziva nzira dzangu dzose. shoko risati rava parurimi rwangu, tarirai, imi yeahoh, munoriziva rose. munondikomberedza shure nemberi; makaisa ruoko rwenyu pamusoro pangu. kuziva kwakadai kunondishamisa, kwakanyanya kukwirira zvokuti handingasvikiri. ndingaendepiko kuti ndibve pamweya wenyu? ndingatizirepiko kuti ndibve pamberi penyu? kana ndikakwira kumatenga, imi muriko; kana ndikawarira mubhedha wangu kwakadzika, imi muriko. kana ndikasimuka namapapiro amambakwedza, kana ndikandogara kumagumo egungwa, kunyange ipapo ruoko rwenyu runondisesedza, ruoko rwenyu rworudyi runondimbundikira. kana ndikati, “zvirokwazvo rima richandivanza, uye chiedza chinondikomberedza chichava usiku kwandiri,” kunyange rima haringavi rima kwamuri; usiku huchapenya samasikati, nokuti rima rakaita sechiedza kwamuri. nokuti imi makasika zvomukatikati mangu; makandiruka ndiri mudumbu ramai vangu. ndinokurumbidzai nokuti ndakaitwa nomutoo unotyisa uye unoshamisa; mabasa enyu anoshamisa, ndinonyatsozviziva kwazvo. mapfupa angu akanga asina kuvanzika kwamuri, pandakanga ndaiswa munzvimbo yakavanda. pandakarukwa ndiri pakadzika penyika, meso enyu akaona muviri usati waumbwa. mazuva ose andakarongerwa akanga akanyorwa mubhuku renyu, rimwe rawo risati ravapo. mirangariro yenyu inokosha sei kwandiri, imi allah! yakakura sei pakuverengwa kwayo! dai ndaiverenga, ingadai yaikunda tsanga dzejecha pakuwanda. pandinopepuka, ndinenge ndinemi. dai mukangouraya vakaipa, imi allah! endai kure neni, imi vanhu vokuteura ropa! ivo vanotaura nemi nomurangariro wakaipa; vadzivisi venyu vanoshandisa zita renyu zvakaipa. ko, ini handivengi vanokuvengai here, imi yeahoh, nokusema vaya vanokumukirai? handina chimwe chinhu asi kuvavenga ivo; ndinovati vavengi vangu. ndinzverei, imi allah, mugoziva mwoyo wangu; ndiedzei mugoziva kushuva kwendangariro dzangu. muone kana musina nzira yakaipa mandiri, mugondifambisa munzira isingaperi.

140

kumutungamiri wokuimba. pisarema radhavhidhi. ndirwirei, imi yeahoh, pavanhu vakaipa; ndidzivirirei pavanhu vanoita nechisimba. ivo vanofunga urongwa hwakaipa mumwoyo yavo, uye vanomutsa hondo mazuva ose. vanorodza ndimi dzavo kuti dzipinze sedzenyoka; uturu hwenyoka yechiva huri pamiromo yavo. sera ndichengetei, imi yeahoh, kubva mumaoko avakaipa; ndidzivirirei pavanhu vanoita nechisimba vanoronga kupinga tsoka dzangu. vanhu vanozvikudza vakandivanzira misungo; vakatambanudza mabote emimbure yavo uye vakateya ugombe munzira yandinofamba nayo. sera haiwa yeahoh, ndinoti kwamuri, “ndimi allah wangu.” haiwa yeahoh, inzwai kuchemera nyasha kwangu. haiwa ishe yeahoh, imi mudzikinuri wangu ane simba, anofukidza musoro wangu pazuva rehondo, regai kupa vakaipa zvavanoda, imi yeahoh; musarega urongwa hwavo huchibudirira, kuti varege kuzvikudza. sera misoro yaavo vakandipoteredza ngaifukidzwe nenhamo yakaparwa nemiromo yavo. mazimbe anopfuta ngaawire pamusoro pavo; ngavakandwe mumoto, mumakomba amatope, vasambomukazve. vane makuhwa ngavarege kusimbiswa panyika; njodzi ngaivhime vanhu vanoita zvinhu nechisimba. ndinoziva kuti yeahoh akachengetera varombo kururamisirwa kwavo, uye anotsigira vanoshayiwa pamhaka dzavo. zvirokwazvo vakarurama vacharumbidza zita renyu, uye vakarurama vachagara pamberi penyu.

141

pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, ndinodana kwamuri; kurumidzai kuuya kwandiri. inzwai inzwi rangu pandinodana kwamuri. munyengetero wangu ngauiswe pamberi penyu sezvinonhuhwira; kusimudzwa kwamaoko angu ngakuite sechibayiro chamadekwana. isai murindi pamuromo wangu, imi yeahoh; chengetai mukova wemiromo yangu. mwoyo wangu ngaurege kukweverwa kune zvakaipa, kuti ndiitewo mabasa akaipa navanhu vanoita zvakaipa; ngandirege kudya zvinozipa zvavo. akarurama ngaandirove, ndidzo tsitsi; ngaanditsiure, ndiwo mafuta pamusoro wangu. musoro wangu hauzorambi izvozvo. asi munyengetero wangu unorwisa mabasa avaiti vezvakaipa nguva dzose. vatongi vavo vachakandwa kumawere, uye vakaipa vachadzidza kuti mashoko angu akanga akanaka kwazvo. ivo vachati, “sezvinoita anorima achiparura pasi, saizvozvo mapfupa edu akaparadzirwa pamuromo weguva.” asi meso angu anotarira kwamuri, imi ishe yeahoh; ndinotizira kwamuri, regai kundiisa kurufu. ndichengetei pamisungo yavakanditeya nayo, napaugombe hwakadzikwa navaiti vezvakaipa. vakaipa ngavawire mumimbure yavo, ini ndichipfuura napo norugare.

142

masikiri radhavhidhi. paakanga ari mubako. munyengetero. ndinodanidzira nenzwi guru kuna yeahoh; ndinosimudzira inzwi rangu kuna yeahoh, kuti andinzwire nyasha. ndinodurura kugununʼuna kwangu pamberi pake; ndinotaura nhamo dzangu pamberi pake. mweya wangu paunoziya mandiri, imi ndimi munoziva nzira yangu. munzira mandinofamba, vanhu vakandivanzira misungo. tarirai kurudyi rwangu mugoona; hakuna ane hanya neni. handina utiziro; hakuna ane hanya noupenyu hwangu. ndinochema kwamuri, imi yeahoh; ndinoti, “ndimi utiziro hwangu, nomugove wangu munyika yavapenyu.” teererai kuchema kwangu, nokuti ndiri pakushayiwa kukuru; ndinunurei kuna avo vanondidzinganisa, nokuti vanondikurira simba. ndibudisei mutorongo, kuti ndirumbidze zita renyu. ipapo vakarurama vachandipoteredza nokuda kwokunaka kwenyu kwandiri.

143

pisarema radhavhidhi. haiwa yeahoh, inzwai munyengetero wangu, ndinzwirei ngoni pakuchema kwangu; uyai mundisunungure nokutendeka uye nokururama kwenyu. musauyisa muranda wenyu mukutongwa, nokuti hakuna mupenyu akarurama pamberi penyu. muvengi anondidzinganisa, anondirovera pasi; anondiita kuti ndigare murima savaya vakafa kare. saizvozvo mweya wangu unoziya mukati mangu; mwoyo wangu unovhundutswa mukati mangu. ndinorangarira mazuva akare kare; ndinofungisisa pamusoro pamabasa enyu ose, uye ndinofunga zvakaitwa namaoko enyu. ndinotambanudzira maoko angu kwamuri; mweya wangu unokushuvai senyika yakaoma. sera haiwa yeahoh, kurumidzai kundipindura; mweya wangu woziya. regai kundivanzira chiso chenyu nokuti ndingazova savaya vakaburukira mugomba. mangwanani ngaandivigire shoko rorudo rwenyu rusingaperi, nokuti ndinovimba nemi. ndiratidzei nzira yandinofanira kufamba nayo, nokuti ndinosimudzira mweya wangu kwamuri. ndinunurei kubva kuvavengi vangu, imi yeahoh, nokuti ndinozvivanza mamuri. ndidzidzisei kuita kuda kwenyu, nokuti muri allah wangu; mweya wenyu wakanaka ngaunditungamirire panzira yakati chechetere. haiwa yeahoh, chengetedzai upenyu hwangu nokuda kwezita renyu; ndibudisei panhamo, mukururama kwenyu. nyaradzai vavengi vangu, murudo rwenyu rusingaperi; paradzai vavengi vangu vose, nokuti ndiri muranda wenyu.

144

pisarema radhavhidhi. yeahoh dombo rangu ngaarumbidzwe, iye anodzidzisa maoko angu kurwa. ndiye allah anondida uye nhare yangu, shongwe yangu nomudzikinuri wangu, nenhoo yangu uye ndinovanda maari, iye anoisa marudzi pasi pangu. haiwa yeahoh, munhu chiiko zvamune hanya naye? kana mwanakomana womunhu zvamunomufunga? munhu akafanana nomweya wokufema; mazuva ake akaita somumvuri unopfuura. zarurai matenga enyu, imi yeahoh, uye muburuke; batai makomo, kuti apfungaire utsi. tumirai mheni mugoparadzira vavengi; pfurai miseve yenyu mugovapedza. tambanudzai ruoko rwenyu kubva kumusoro; ndirwirei uye mundinunure kubva pamvura zhinji ine simba, kubva mumaoko avatorwa vane miromo izere nenhema, maoko avo orudyi anonyengera. haiwa allah, ndichakuimbirai rwiyo rutsva; ndichakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza nomutengeranwa une hungiso gumi, iye anopa kukunda kumadzimambo, anorwira muranda wake dhavhidhi kubva pamunondo unouraya. ndirwirei uye mundinunure kubva pamaoko avatorwa, vane miromo izere nenhema, vane maoko orudyi anonyengera. ipapo vanakomana vedu pauduku hwavo vachava semiti yakakura zvakanaka, uye vanasikana vedu vachava sembiru dzakavezwa kuti dzishongedze muzinda wamambo. matura edu achazadzwa nemhando dzose dzezviyo. makwai edu achawanda nezviuru, nezviuru gumi mumafuro edu; nzombe dzedu dzichatakura mitoro inorema. hapachazova nokuputswa kwamasvingo, hapachazova nokuenda kuutapwa, hapachazova nokuchema nenhamo, munzira dzedu dzomumisha. vakaropafadzwa vanhu avo vachaitirwa saizvozvi; vakaropafadzwa vanhu avo vana yeahoh allah wavo.

145

pisarema rokurumbidza, radhavhidhi. ndichakukudzai, allah wangu mambo; ndicharumbidza zita renyu nokusingaperi-peri. ndichakurumbidzai mazuva ose, uye ndichakudza zita renyu nokusingaperi-peri. yeahoh mukuru uye akafanira kurumbidzwa; ukuru hwake hahunganzverwi nomunhu. rumwe rudzi rucharumbidza mabasa enyu kuno rumwe; vachareva zvamabasa enyu esimba. vachataura nezvokunaka kwokubwinya kwoumambo hwenyu, uye ndichafungisisa pamusoro pemabasa enyu anoshamisa. vanhu vachataura nezvesimba ramabasa enyu anotyisa, uye ndichaparidza mabasa enyu makuru. vachapemberera kuwanda kwokunaka kwenyu, uye vachaimba nomufaro pamusoro pokururama kwenyu. yeahoh ane nyasha uye ane tsitsi, anononoka kutsamwa uye azere norudo. yeahoh akanaka kuna vose; uye ane nyasha pamusoro pezvose zvaakaita. zvose zvamakaita zvichakurumbidzai, imi yeahoh; vatsvene venyu vachakukudzai. vachataura nezvokubwinya kwoumambo hwenyu, uye vachataura nezvesimba renyu, kuitira kuti vanhu vose vazive nezvamabasa enyu makuru, nokunaka kwokubwinya kwoumambo hwenyu. umambo hwenyu umambo hwokusingaperi, uye ushe hwenyu hunogara kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. yeahoh akatendeka pavimbiso dzake dzose, uye ane rudo kuzvinhu zvose zvaakaita. yeahoh anotsigira vose vanowa, uye anosimudza vose vakakotamiswa pasi. meso avose anotarira kwamuri, uye munovapa zvokudya zvavo nenguva yakafanira. munozarura ruoko rwenyu, uye munogutsa zvisikwa zvipenyu zvose nezvazvinoda. yeahoh akarurama panzira dzake dzose, uye ane rudo kuzvinhu zvose zvaakaita. yeahoh ari pedyo navose vanodana kwaari, kuna vose vanodana kwaari muchokwadi. anozadzisa zvido zvaavo vanomutya; anonzwa kuchema kwavo uye anovaponesa. yeahoh anochengeta vose vanomuda, asi achaparadza vakaipa vose. muromo wangu uchataura kurumbidzwa kwayeahoh. zvisikwa zvose ngazvirumbidze zita rake dzvene nokusingaperi-peri.

146

rumbidza yeahoh. rumbidza yeahoh, iwe mweya wangu. ndicharumbidza yeahoh mazuva ose oupenyu hwangu; ndichaimbira allah wangu nziyo dzokurumbidza ndichiri mupenyu. regai kuvimba namachinda, navanhu vanofa, vasingagoni kuponesa. mweya yavo painoenda, ivo vanodzokera kuvhu; pazuva racho iroro urongwa hwavo hunova pasina. akaropafadzwa munhu uyo ano mubatsiri wake allah wayaqobho, tariro yake iri muna yeahoh allah wake, muiti wedenga nenyika, gungwa uye nezvose zviri mariri, iye yeahoh, anogara akatendeka nokusingaperi. anomiririra zvinodiwa nevakadzvinyirirwa, uye anopa zvokudya vane nzara. yeahoh anosunungura vasungwa. yeahoh anosvinudza mapofu, yeahoh anosimudza avo vakakotamiswa pasi, yeahoh anoda vakarurama. yeahoh anorinda vatorwa uye anoriritira nherera nechirikadzi, asi anokonesa nzira dzavakaipa. yeahoh anotonga nokusingaperi, allah wako, iwe zioni, kuzvizvarwa zvose. rumbidza yeahoh.

147

rumbidzai yeahoh. zvakanaka sei kuimbira allah wedu nziyo dzokurumbidza, zvinofadza uye zvakafanira sei kumurumbidza! yeahoh anovaka jerusarema; anounganidza vakadzingwa vaisraeri. anoporesa vane mwoyo yakaputsika, uye anosunga maronda avo. anotara kuwanda kwenyeredzi, anodana imwe neimwe nezita rayo. ishe wedu mukuru uye ane simba guru; kunzwisisa kwake hakuperi. yeahoh anotsigira vanozvininipisa, asi anowisira pasi vakaipa. imbirai yeahoh nokuvonga; muimbire allah wedu nziyo dzokurumbidza nembira. anofukidza denga namakore; anopa nyika mvura, uye anomeresa uswa pazvikomo. anopa mombe zvokudya navana vamakunguo pavanochema. mufaro wake hausi musimba rebhiza, uye mufaro wake hausi pamakumbo omunhu; yeahoh anofadzwa naavo vanomutya, vanoisa tariro yavo parudo rwake rusingaperi. kudza yeahoh, iwe jerusarema; rumbidza allah wako, iwe zioni, nokuti anosimbisa mazariro amasuo ako, uye anoropafadza vanhu vako vari mauri. anopa rugare pamiganhu yako, uye anokugutsa nezviyo zvakaisvonaka. anotuma murayiro wake kunyika; shoko rake rinomhanya kwazvo. anowarira chando samakushe amakwai, uye anoparadzira chando samadota. anokanda chimvuramabwe pasi sezvimedu. ndianiko angamira kana chando chake charova? anotuma shoko rake rigozvinyungudisa; anomutsa mhepo yake, mvura zhinji igoerera. akazarurira yaqobho shoko rake, mirayiro yake nezvirevo zvake kuna israeri. haana kumboita izvi kuno rumwe rudzi; havazivi mirayiro yake. rumbidzai yeahoh.

148

rumbidzai yeahoh. rumbidzai yeahoh kubva kumatenga, murumbidzei panzvimbo dzokumusoro-soro. murumbidzei, imi vatumwa vake vose, murumbidzei, imi hondo dzake dzose dzokudenga. murumbidzei, imi zuva nomwedzi, murumbidzei, imi nyeredzi dzose dzinopenya. murumbidzei, imi matenga ari kumusoro-soro, nemi mvura zhinji iri pamusoro pamatenga. ngazvirumbidze zita rayeahoh, nokuti akarayira, izvo zvikasikwa. akazviisa panzvimbo yazvo nokusingaperi-peri, akapa chirevo chisingazombopfuuri. rumbidzai yeahoh imi nyika, imi zvisikwa zvikuru zvegungwa nokwakadzika kwenyanza, nemi mheni nechimvuramabwe, chando namakore, dutu remhepo rinoita zvaakareva, imi makomo nemi zvikomo zvose, miti inobereka nemisidhari yose, mhuka dzesango nemombe dzose, zvisikwa zvidiki neshiri dzinobhururuka, madzimambo enyika nendudzi dzose, imi machinda nemi vatongi vose panyika, majaya nemhandara, vatana navana. ngavarumbidze zita rayeahoh, nokuti zita rake iye oga iguru; kubwinya kwake kuri pamusoro penyika namatenga. akasimudzira vanhu vake runyanga, iyo rumbidzo yavatsvene vake vose, yaisraeri, vanhu vari pedyo nomwoyo wake. rumbidzai yeahoh.

149

rumbidzai yeahoh. imbirai yeahoh rwiyo rutsva, rumbidzo yake paungano yavatsvene. israeri ngavafarire muiti wavo; vanhu vezioni ngavafarire mambo wavo. ngavarumbidze zita rake vachitamba, uye vamuridzire nziyo namatambureni nembira. nokuti yeahoh anofarira vanhu vake; vanozvininipisa anovashongedza korona noruponeso. vatsvene ngavafare nokukudzwa kwake, uye vaimbe nomufaro vari pamibhedha yavo. kurumbidzwa kwaallah ngakuve pamiromo yavo, nomunondo unocheka kwose, mumaoko avo, kuti vatsive pamusoro pendudzi, uye varange marudzi avanhu, vasunge madzimambo avo nengetani, namakurukota avo nezvisungo zvamatare, kuti vaite zvavakatongwa nazvo, zvakanyorwa pamusoro pavo. ndiko kukudzwa kwavatsvene vose. rumbidzai yeahoh.

150

rumbidzai yeahoh. rumbidzai allah munzvimbo yake tsvene; murumbidzei mumatenga esimba rake. murumbidzei nokuda kwamabasa ake esimba; murumbidzei nokuda kwoukuru hwake hunokunda zvose. murumbidzei nenzwi rehwamanda, murumbidzei nembira nomutengeranwa. murumbidzei nematambureni muchitamba, murumbidzei norudimbwa nenyere. murumbidzei namakandira anorira, murumbidzei namakandira anorira kwazvo. zvinhu zvose zvinofema, ngazvirumbidze yeahoh. rumbidzai yeahoh.

proverbs

1

zvirevo zvasoromoni mwanakomana wadhavhidhi, mambo weisraeri: kuti uwane uchenjeri nokurayirwa; nokunzwisisa mashoko enjere; kuti uve noupenyu hwokuzvibata hune uchenjeri uchiita zvakarurama nokururamisira uye nokuenzanisira; kuti vasina mano vapiwe uchenjeri, jaya ripiwe ruzivo namano, vakachenjera ngavanzwe uye vagowedzera pakudzidza kwavo, uye vanonzvera ngavawane kutungamirirwa, kuti vanzwisise zvirevo nemifananidzo, mashoko nezvirahwe zvavakachenjera. kutya yeahoh ndiwo mavambo ezivo, asi mapenzi anoshora uchenjeri nokurayirwa. mwanakomana wangu, teerera, kurayira kwababa vako, uye usarasa kudzidzisa kwamai vako. zvichava chishongo chakanaka pamusoro wako nouketani hunoshongedza mutsipa wako. mwanakomana wangu, kana vatadzi vachikukwezva, usabvuma zvavari kuda kuti uite. kana vakati, “handei tose; ngativandirei munhu timuuraye; ngativandirei mweya usina mhosva; ngativamedzei vari vapenyu, seguva, uye vakakwana kudaro savaya vanodzika mugomba; tichawana marudzi ose ezvinhu zvinokosha tigozadza dzimba dzedu nezvatichapamba; isa zvinhu zvako pamwe chete nesu, tigova nechikwama chimwe chete,” mwanakomana wangu, usabvumirana navo, usaisa rutsoka panzira dzavo; nokuti tsoka dzavo dzinomhanyira muchivi, vanokurumidza kundodeura ropa. hazvibatsiri sei kutambanudza mumbure shiri dzose dzichinyatsoona! varume ava vanovandira ropa ravo vomene; vanozvivandira ivo pachavo! aya ndiwo magumo avaya vanotsvaka pfuma nenzira yakaipa; inouraya vaya vanoiwana. uchenjeri hunodanidzira nenzwi guru mumugwagwa, hunokwidza inzwi rahwo pachivara; kumusoro kwemigwagwa ine ruzha hunodanidzira, pamasuo eguta hunotaura shoko rahwo huchiti: “kusvikira riniko imi vasina mano, muchingoda kugara musina mano? kusvikira riniko vaseki vachifarira kuseka, uye mapenzi achivenga zivo? dai makateerera kutsiura kwangu, ndingadai ndakadurura mwoyo wangu kwamuri uye ndakazivisa pfungwa dzangu kwamuri. asi sezvo makandiramba pandakakudanai uye pasina kana mumwe akateerera pandakatambanudza ruoko rwangu, sezvo makashaya hanya nokurayira kwangu, uye mukasagamuchira kutsiura kwangu, iniwo ndichaseka panguva yenjodzi yenyu; ndichaseka dambudziko parichakusvikirai, dambudziko parichakukundai sedutu, njodzi paichavhuvhuta pamusoro penyu sechamupupuri, nhamo namatambudziko pazvichakukundai. “ipapo vachadana kwandiri asi ini handingavapinduri; vachanditsvaka asi havangandiwani. sezvo vakavenga zivo uye vakasasarudza kutya yeahoh, sezvo vasina kugamuchira yambiro yangu, uye vakashora kutsiura kwangu, vachadya zvibereko zvenzira dzavo uye vachazadzwa nezvibereko zvemano avo. nokuti kusateerera kwavasina mano kuchavaurayisa, uye kushaya hanya kwamapenzi kuchavaparadza; asi ani naani achanditeerera achagara murugare, uye achagara akasununguka, asingatyi kuparadzwa.”

2

mwanakomana wangu, kana ukagamuchira mashoko angu, ukachengeta mirayiro yangu mauri, ukarerekera nzeve yako kuuchenjeri uye ukaisa mwoyo wako pakunzwisisa, uye kana ukadanidzira kuti uwanze njere uye ukadanidzira nenzwi guru kuti uwane kunzwisisa, uye kana ukahutsvaka sounotsvaka sirivha nokuhutsvaka sounotsvaka pfuma yakavanzwa, ipapo uchanzwisisa kutya yeahoh uye uchawana ruzivo rwaallah. nokuti yeahoh anopa uchenjeri, uye mumuromo make munobuda zivo nokunzwisisa. anochengetera vakarurama kukunda, iye ndiye nhoo kuna avo vane mufambiro usina chaunopomerwa, nokuti anochengetedza nzira yavakarurama, uye anodzivirira nzira yavakatendeka vake. ipapo uchanzwisisa zvakarurama, kururamisira nokuenzanisira nzira dzose dzakanaka. nokuti uchenjeri huchapinda mumwoyo mako, uye ruzivo ruchafadza mweya wako. kungwara kuchakuchengetedza, uye kunzwisisa kuchakurinda. uchenjeri huchakuponesa panzira dzavanhu vakaipa, vanhu vane mashoko asakarurama, vanosiya nzira yakarurama kuti vafambe munzira dzerima, vanofarira kuita zvakaipa uye vanofarira kusarurama kwezvakaipa, vane nzira dzakaminama uye vanonyengera pamaitiro avo. zvichakuponesazve pamukadzi chifeve, kubva pamudzimai asingazvibati, anokwezva namashoko ake, uyo akasiya murume woumhandara hwake uye akashaya hanya nesungano yaakaita pamberi paallah. nokuti imba yake inoenda kurufu, uye nzira dzake kumweya yavakafa. hakuna anoenda kwaari achidzoka kana kuzowana nzira dzoupenyu. naizvozvo iwe uchafamba munzira dzavanhu vakanaka uye ucharamba uri munzira dzavakarurama. nokuti vakarurama vachagara munyika, uye vasina chavanopomerwa vacharamba vari mairi; asi vakaipa vachaparadzwa panyika, uye vasina kutendeka vachabviswa pairi.

3

mwanakomana wangu, usakanganwa kudzidzisa kwangu, asi uchengete mirayiro yangu mumwoyo mako, nokuti zvichawedzera makore mazhinji kuupenyu hwako, uye nokubudirira. rudo nokutendeka ngazvirege kukusiya; uzvisungirire pamutsipa wako, zvinyore pahwendefa romwoyo wako. ipapo uchawana nyasha nezita rakanaka pamberi paallah navanhu. vimba nayeahoh nomwoyo wako wose urege kuzendamira panjere dzako; munzira dzako dzose umutungamidze, uye acharuramisa nzira dzako. usazviita munhu akachenjera pamaonero ako; itya yeahoh uvenge zvakaipa. izvi zvichava utano pamuviri wako uye nokusimbiswa kwamapfupa ako. kudza yeahoh nepfuma yako, zvokutanga zvezvirimwa zvako; ipapo matura ako achazadzwa kusvikira pakufashukira, uye makate ako achazara kusvika pamusoro newaini itsva. mwanakomana wangu, usazvidza kuranga kwayeahoh, uye usatsamwira kutsiura kwake, nokuti yeahoh anoranga avo vaanoda, sababa nomwanakomana wavanofarira. akaropafadzwa munhu anowana uchenjeri, munhu anowana kunzwisisa, nokuti hwakanyanya kunaka kupfuura sirivha, uye hunopfumisa kupfuura goridhe. hunokosha kupfuura marubhi; zvose zvaunoshuva hazvingafananidzwi nahwo. mazuva mazhinji oupenyu ari muruoko rwahwo rworudyi; muruboshwe rwahwo mune upfumi nokukudzwa. nzira dzahwo dzinofadza, uye makwara ahwo ose rugare. ndihwo muti woupenyu kuna vose vanohumbundikira; vose vanohubata vacharopafadzwa. nouchenjeri yeahoh akateya nheyo dzenyika, nokunzwisisa akaisa matenga munzvimbo dzawo; noruzivo rwake mvura dzakadzika dzakapatsanurwa, uye makore akadonhedza dova. mwanakomana wangu, chengetedza kutonga kwakanaka nokungwara, usazvirega zvichibva pameso ako; zvichava upenyu kwauri, chishongo chakanaka pamutsipa wako. ipapo uchafamba panzira yako murugare, uye rutsoka rwako harungagumburwi; paunovata pasi, haungatyi; paunovata pasi, hope dzako dzichava dzakanaka. usatya zvako dambudziko rinovhundutsa kana kuparadza kunokunda vakaipa, nokuti yeahoh achava chivimbo chako uye achachengeta rutsoka rwako kuti rurege kubatwa. usarega kuitira zvakanaka kuno uyo akafanirwa nazvo, kana zviri musimba rako kuzviita. usati kumuvakidzani wako, “ugodzoka imwe nguva; ndichazokupa mangwana,” iwe uchitova nazvo pauri. usaronga kuitira muvakidzani wako zvakaipa, anogara nechivimbo pedyo newe. usapomera munhu mhosva pasina chikonzero, iye asina zvaakutadzira. usachiva munhu anoita zvinhu nechisimba, kana kusarudza ipi zvayo yenzira dzake, nokuti yeahoh anovenga munhu akatsauka, asi anoudza akarurama zvaanoda kuita. kutuka kwayeahoh kuri paimba yeakaipa, asi anoropafadza musha womunhu akarurama. anoseka vaseki vanozvikudza, asi anoitira nyasha vanozvininipisa. vakachenjera vanowana kukudzwa, asi mapenzi anozviwanira kunyadziswa.

4

teererai, vanakomana vangu, kurayira kwababa venyu; nyatsoteererai mugowana kunzwisisa. ndinokupai dzidziso yakanaka, saka regai kurasa dzidziso yangu. pandakanga ndiri mukomana mumba mababa vangu, ndichiri muduku uye mwana mumwe chete wamai vangu, baba vangu vakandidzidzisa vachiti, “mwoyo wako ngaubatisise mashoko angu; chengeta mirayiro yangu ugorarama. wana uchenjeri, wana kunzwisisa; usakanganwa mashoko angu kana kubva paari. usarasa uchenjeri, ipapo huchakuchengeta; hude, ihwo hugokurinda. uchenjeri chinhu chikuru; naizvozvo wana uchenjeri. kunyange huchikutorera zvose zvaunazvo, wana kunzwisisa. uhukudze; ipapo huchakusimudzira; uhumbundikire, ipapo huchakukudza. huchakupfekedza chishongo chenyasha mumusoro mako, uye huchakupa korona yokubwinya.” teerera, mwanakomana wangu, gamuchira zvandinotaura, ipapo makore oupenyu hwako achava mazhinji. ndinokudzidzisa nzira youchenjeri uye ndiri kukutungamirira panzira dzakarurama. paunofamba, tsoka dzako hadzingapinganidzwi, paunomhanya, haungagumburwi. batisisa kurayirwa, usarega kuchienda; nyatsokurinda zvakanaka, nokuti ndihwo upenyu hwako. usaisa rutsoka panzira dzavakaipa, kana kufamba panzira dzavanhu vakaipa. udzinzvenge, usafamba padziri; tsauka padziri ugopfuurira mberi. nokuti havangavati vasati vaita zvakaipa; havangabatwi nehope kusvikira vaita kuti mumwe munhu aputsike. vanodya zvokudya zvezvakaipa, uye vanonwa waini yezvechisimba. nzira yavakarurama yakafanana nechiedza chamambakwedza, chinoramba chichiwedzera kubwinya kusvikira pachiedza chamasikati makuru. asi nzira yavakaipa yakaita serima guru; havazivi zvinoita kuti vagumburwe. mwanakomana wangu, nyatsoteerera zvandinotaura; teereresa kumashoko angu. usaite kuti abve pameso ako, achengete pakati pomwoyo wako; nokuti upenyu kuna avo vanoawana uye noutano kumuviri wose womunhu. pamusoro pazvo zvose, chengetedza mwoyo wako, nokuti ndicho chitubu choupenyu. bvisa zvinotsausa pamuromo wako; kutaura kwakaora ngakuve kure nemiromo yako. meso ako ngaatarire mberi bedzi, ramba wakatarira mberi kwako. gadzirira tsoka dzako gwara ugofamba munzira dzakasimba chete. usatsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe; chengetedza rutsoka rwako kuti rusaende pane zvakaipa.

5

mwanakomana wangu, nyatsoteerera kuuchenjeri hwangu, teereresa kumashoko angu oungwaru, kuti ugare wakachengeta kungwara uye kuti miromo yako ichengetedze zivo. nokuti miromo yomukadzi chifeve inodonha uchi, nomutauriro wake unotedza kupfuura mafuta; asi pakupedzisira anovava senduru, anopinza somunondo unocheka namativi ose. tsoka dzake dzinoenda kurufu; nhambwe dzake dzinonanga kuguva. haafungi pamusoro penzira youpenyu; nzira dzake dzakaminama, asi iye haazvizivi. saka zvino, vanakomana vangu, nditeererei; musatsauka pane zvandinotaura. fambai nenzira iri kure naye, musasvika pedyo nomusuo wemba yake, kuti murege kupa vamwe zvakanaka zvesimba renyu, uye namakore enyu kuno uyo ane utsinye, kuti vatorwa varege kudya upfumi hwenyu, uye kushanda kwenyu nesimba kurege kupfumisa imba yomumwe munhu. pakupedzisira kwoupenyu hwako uchagomera, kana nyama nomuviri wako zvaparadzwa. uchazoti, “mavengero andaiita kurayirwa! mashorero aiita mwoyo wangu kudzorwa! ndakanga ndisingateereri vadzidzisi vangu, kana kunzwa varairidzi vangu. ndasvika pakuparara chaiko pakati peungano yose.” inwa mvura pachirongo chako chaicho, mvura inoerera patsime rako chairo. ko, zvitubu zvako zvinofanira kuerera mumigwagwa here; nzizi dzako dzemvura pazvivara? ngadzive dzako woga, hadzitombofaniri kugoveranwa navatorwa. tsime rako ngariropafadzwe, uye ufadzwe nomudzimai woujaya hwako. sehadzi yengururu inofadza, nehadzi yenondo yakanaka, mazamu ake ngaakufadze nguva dzose, ugare uchigutswa norudo rwake. unosungirweiko, mwanakomana wangu, nomukadzi chifeve? unombundikirireiko chipfuva chomukadzi womumwe murume? nokuti nzira dzomunhu dziri pachena pamberi payeahoh, uye anoongorora nzira dzake dzose. zviito zvakaipa zvomunhu akaipa zvichamusunga; tambo dzechivi chake dzichamubata iye kwazvo. achafa nokuda kwokushayiwa kuzvibata kwake, atsauswa noupenzi hwake hukuru.

6

mwanakomana wangu, kana uchinge waita rubatso kumuvakidzani wako, kana uchinge waita mhiko nokumbunda noruoko rwako kuno mumwe, kana uchinge wasungwa nokuda kwezvawakataura, wabatwa namashoko omuromo wako, ipapo ita izvi, mwanakomana wangu, kuti uzvisunungure, sezvo wawira mumaoko omuvakidzani wako! enda undozvininipisa; ukumbire zvikuru kumuvakidzani wako! usatendera meso ako hope, usatendera meso ako kutsumwaira. zvipukunyutse, semhara kubva paruoko rwomuvhimi, seshiri kubva paugombe hwomuteyi. enda kusvosve, iwe simbe; cherechedza nzira dzaro ugova wakachenjera! harina mutungamiri, mutariri kana mutongi, asi rinochengeta zvokudya zvaro muzhizha, uye rinounganidza zvokudya zvaro pakukohwa. uchasvika riniko wakarara ipapo, iwe simbe? uchamuka riniko kubva pahope dzako? kumbovata zvishomanana, kumbotsumwaira zvishomanana, kumbopeta maoko zvishomanana kuti ndizorore. naizvozvo urombo huchauya kwauri segororo, uye kushayiwa somurwi akashonga nhumbi dzokurwa. munhu asina maturo uye anoita zvakaipa, anofamba-famba achitaura zvakaora, anochonya nameso ake, anonongedzera netsoka dzake, uye anodudzira neminwe yake, anoronga zvakaipa nounyengeri mumwoyo make, iyeyo anogaromutsa kupesana. naizvozvo njodzi ichamuwira munguva shoma shoma; achaparadzwa nokukurumidza, pasina chingamubatsira. pane zvinhu zvitanhatu zvakavengwa nayeahoh, zvinomwe zvinomunyangadza zvinoti: meso anozvikudza, rurimi runoreva nhema, maoko anodeura ropa risina mhosva, mwoyo unoronga mano akaipa, tsoka dzinokurumidza kumhanyira muzvakaipa, chapupu chenhema chinodurura nhema, uye munhu anomutsa kupesana pakati pehama. mwanakomana wangu, chengetedza mirayiro yababa vako, uye usarasa kudzidzisa kwamai vako. zvisungirire pamwoyo wako nokusingaperi; uzvishonge pamutsipa wako. paunofamba zvichakutungamirira; paucharara, zvichakurinda; pauchamuka, zvichataura newe. nokuti mirayiro iyi ndiyo mwenje kwauri, dzidziso iyi ndiyo chiedza, uye kudzora kwokurayira ndiko nzira youpenyu, kunokuchengetedza pamukadzi asingazvibati, kubva parurimi runonyengera rwomudzimai asingazvibati. usachiva runako rwake mumwoyo mako, kana kumurega achikubata namaziso ake, nokuti chifeve chinokuderedza kusvikira wafanana nechingwa, uye mukadzi womumwe asi ari chifeve anoendesa upenyu hwako chaihwo kurufu. ko, munhu angaisa moto pamakumbo ake, nguo dzake dzikasatsva here? ko, munhu angafamba pamazimbe anopisa, tsoka dzake dzikasatsva here? ndizvo zvakaita uyo anorara nomudzimai womumwe murume; hapana angabate mukadzi iyeyo akasarangwa. vanhu havazvidzi mbavha kana ikaba kuti ipedze nzara yayo painenge yoziya. asi kana akabatwa, anofanira kuripa kakapetwa kanomwe, kunyange zvichimutorera pfuma yose yeimba yake. asi munhu anoita upombwe, anoshayiwa njere; ani naani anozviita anozviparadza iye pachake. kurohwa nokunyadziswa ndiwo mugove wake, uye kunyadziswa kwake hakungatongobviswi; nokuti godo rinomutsa hasha dzomurume, uye haanganzwiri tsitsi kana otsiva. haangagamuchiri muripo upi zvawo; acharamba fufuro, kunyange rakakura sei.

7

mwanakomana wangu, chengeta mashoko angu ugoviga mirayiro yangu mauri. chengeta mirayiro yangu ugorarama; uchengete dzidziso dzangu semboni yeziso rako. uzvisungirire paminwe yako; uzvinyore pahwendefa yomwoyo wako. uti kuuchenjeri, “uri hanzvadzi yangu,” uye uti kunzwisisa ndiyo hama yako; zvichakuchengeta kure nomukadzi chifeve; kubva pamudzimai asingazvibati anokwezva namashoko ake. napawindo remba yangu ndakatarira panze nomumagirazi. ndakaona pakati pavasina mano ndikacherechedza pakati pamajaya, rimwe jaya rakanga risina njere. rakanga richidzika nomugwagwa pedyo nepakona yomukadzi uya, richifamba rakananga kumba kwake, panguva yorubvunzavaeni, zuva ravira, kunze kwosviba. ipapo mukadzi akabuda kuzosangana naye, akapfeka sechifeve uye azere nounyengeri. anotaura noruzha uye anozvikudza, tsoka dzake hadzigari pamba; imwe nguva ari munzira, imwe nguva ari pazvivara. anorindira pamakona ose. akamubata ndokumutsvoda, uye nechiso chisina nyadzi akati: “ndine zvipiriso zvokuwadzana kumba kwangu; nhasi ndazadzisa mhiko dzangu. saka ndauya kuzosangana newe; ndanga ndichikutsvaka, zvino ndazokuwana! ndawaridza mubhedha wangu machira ane mavara, anobva kuijipiti. ndasasa zvinonhuhwira pamubhedha wangu, zvinoti: mura, gavakava nesinamoni. uya, tinwe tigute norudo kusvikira mangwanani; ngatifare zvedu norudo! murume wangu haako kumba, akafamba rwendo rurefu. akatakura homwe yake izere nemari uye haangadzoki kumba kusvikira pajenaguru.” namashoko okunyengetedza akamutsausa; akamukwezva nokutaura kwake kunonyengera. pakarepo akamutevera senzombe inoenda kundobayiwa, senondo inopinda mumusungo, kusvikira museve wabaya chiropa chake, seshiri inokurumidza kupinda muugombe, asingazivi kuti zvichamuurayisa. saka zvino, vanakomana vangu, teererai kwandiri; nyatsoteererai zvandinotaura. usarega mwoyo wako uchitsaukira kunzira dzake, kana kurasikira pamakwara ake. vazhinji vakakuvadzwa naye vakawisirwa pasi; vaakauraya vakawanda kwazvo. imba yake mugwagwa mukuru unoenda kuguva, uchitungamirira kumakamuri orufu.

8

ko, uchenjeri hahudanidziri here? kunzwisisa hakusimudziri inzwi rako here? panzvimbo dzakakwirira panzira, pamharadzano dzenzira, ndipo pahumire; parutivi rwamasuo okupinda muguta, pamikova, hunodanidzirisa huchiti, “kwamuri, imi varume, ndinodanidzira; ndinosimudzira inzwi rangu kuvanhu vose. imi vasina mano, wanai uchenjeri; imi mapenzi, wanai kunzwisisa. teererai, nokuti ndine zvinhu zvinokosha zvokutaura; ndinozarura muromo wangu kuti nditaure zvakarurama. muromo wangu unotaura zvokwadi, nokuti miromo yangu inovenga zvakaipa. mashoko ose omuromo wangu akarurama; hapana kana rimwe rakakombama kana rakaipa. kune ane njere ose zvawo akarurama, akarurama kuna avo vane zivo. sarudza kurayira kwangu panzvimbo yesirivha, ruzivo panzvimbo yegoridhe rakaisvonaka, nokuti uchenjeri hunokosha kupfuura marubhi, uye hapana chaungada chingaenzaniswa nahwo. “ini, uchenjeri ndinogara pamwe chete navakachenjera; ndine ruzivo nenjere. kutya yeahoh ndiko kuvenga zvakaipa; ndinovenga kuzvikudza namanyawi, maitiro akaipa nokutaura kunonyangadza. zano nokutonga kwakanaka ndezvangu; ndine kunzwisisa nesimba. madzimambo anobata ushe neni uye vatongi vanodzika mirayiro yakarurama; machinda anofambisa ushe neni, navakuru vose vanotonga panyika. ndinoda avo vanondida, uye vaya vanonditsvaka vanondiwana. pfuma nokukudzwa zvineni, upfumi hunogara nokururama. chibereko changu chakanaka kupfuura goridhe rakaisvonaka; zvandinobereka zvinopfuura sirivha yakaisvonaka. ndinofamba munzira dzokururama, pamakwara okururamisira, ndichipa upfumi kuna avo vanondida, uye ndichiita kuti matura avo azare. “yeahoh akandibudisa sebasa rake rokutanga pamabasa ake, kutangira mabasa ake akare; ndakagadzwa kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga, nyika isati yavapo. makungwa asati avapo, ndakaberekwa, pasati pava nezvitubu zvine mvura zhinji; makomo asati aiswa munzvimbo dzawo, zvikomo zvisati zvavapo, ndakaberekwa, asati aita nyika neminda kana guruva ripi zvaro renyika. ndakanga ndiripo paakaisa matenga munzvimbo dzawo, paakaita denderedzwa pamusoro pamakungwa, paakaita makore kudenga uye paakasimbisa zvitubu zvamakungwa, paakapa gungwa miganhu yaro kuti mvura dzirege kudarika zvaakarayira, uye paakateya nheyo dzenyika. ipapo ndini ndaiva mhizha parutivi rwake. ndaigara ndichifara zuva nezuva, ndichifara nguva dzose pamberi pake, ndichifadzwa nenyika yake yose uye ndichifadzwa navanhu vose. “saka zvino, vanakomana vangu, teererai kwandiri; vakaropafadzwa avo vanochengeta nzira dzangu. teererai kurayira kwangu mugova vakachenjera; musakushayira hanya. akaropafadzwa munhu anoteerera kwandiri, anorinda mazuva ose pamasuo angu. anomira pamukova womusuo wangu. nokuti ani naani anondiwana anowana upenyu uye anogamuchira nyasha kubva kuna yeahoh. asi ani naani asingandiwani anozvikuvadza; vose vanondivenga vanoda rufu.”

9

uchenjeri hwakavaka imba yahwo; hwakaveza mbiru dzahwo nomwe. hwakabika nyama yahwo; uye hukagadzira waini yahwo; hwakagadzirawo tafura yahwo. hwakatuma varandakadzi vahwo, uye hunodanidzira kubva panzvimbo yakakwirira kwazvo yeguta. kuna avo vanoshayiwa njere hunoti, “vose vasina uchenjeri ngavauye muno! uyai, mudye zvokudya zvangu munwe waini yandagadzira. siyai nzira dzenyu dzisina mano mugorarama; fambai munzira yokunzwisisa. “ani naani anorayira mudadi anozvitsvakira kutukwa; ani naani anotsiura munhu akaipa anozviwanira kutukwa. usatsiura mudadi kuti arege kukuvenga; tsiura munhu akachenjera uye achakuda. rayira munhu akachenjera uye achawedzera uchenjeri hwake; dzidzisa munhu akarurama uye achawedzera kudzidza kwake. “kutya yeahoh ndiwo mavambo ouchenjeri, uye kuziva iye mutsvene ndiko kunzwisisa. nokuti neni mazuva ako achava mazhinji, uye makore achawedzerwa kuupenyu hwako. kana uri wakachenjera, uchenjeri hwako huchakupa mubayiro; kana uri mudadi, iwe woga ndiwe uchatambura.” mukadzi benzi ane ruzha; haana kudzikama uye haana zivo. anogara pamusuo wemba yake, napachigaro chiri panzvimbo yakakwiririsa yeguta, achidanidzira kuna avo vanenge vachipfuura napo, vaya vanofamba zvakarurama nenzira yavo. anoti kuna vaya vasina njere, “vose vasina mano ngavauye muno! mvura yakabiwa inozipa; zvokudya zvinodyirwa muchivande zvinonaka!” asi zvavasingazivi ndezvokuti mune vakafa, uye kuti vanomushanyira vari mukati kati meguva.

10

zvirevo zvasoromoni: mwanakomana akachenjera anofadza baba vake, asi mwanakomana benzi anosuwisa mai vake. pfuma yakawanikwa zvakaipa haibatsiri chinhu, asi kururama kunorwira parufu. yeahoh haatenderi akarurama kuti anzwe nzara, asi kupanga kwowakaipa anokusundira kure. maoko ane usimbe anoita kuti munhu ave murombo, asi maoko anoshingaira anopfumisa. anounganidza zvirimwa muzhizha, mwanakomana akachenjera, asi anorara munguva yokukohwa, mwanakomana anonyadzisa. maropafadzo ndiwo korona yomusoro woakarurama, asi kuita nechisimba kuzere mumuromo womunhu akaipa. kuyeukwa kwowakarurama kuchava chikomborero, asi zita rowakaipa richaora. akachenjera pamwoyo anogamuchira mirayiro, asi benzi rinotaura zvisina maturo richaparara. munhu akarurama anofamba akachengetedzeka, asi uyo anofamba nenzira dzakaminama achabatwa. uyo anochonya neziso roruvengo anouyisa kusuwa, asi benzi rinotaura zvisina maturo richaparara. muromo womunhu akarurama chitubu choupenyu, asi kuita nechisimba kuzere mumuromo womunhu akaipa. ruvengo runomutsa kupesana, asi rudo runofukidzira zvakaipa zvose. uchenjeri hunowanikwa pamiromo yavane njere, asi shamhu yakafanira musana wouyo asina njere. vanhu vakachenjera vanochengeta zivo, asi muromo webenzi unotsvaka kuparara. upfumi hwavakapfuma ndiro guta ravo rina masvingo, asi urombo ndiko kuparadzwa kwavarombo. mubayiro wavakarurama ndihwo upenyu, asi zvinowanikwa nowakaipa ndiko kurangwa. uyo anoteerera kurayira anoratidza nzira youpenyu, asi ani naani anozvidza kudzorwa anotsausa vamwe. uyo anovanza ruvengo rwake ane miromo inoreva nhema, uye ani naani anoparadzira guhwa ibenzi. kana mashoko ari mazhinji, chivi hachingashayikwi, asi uyo anodzora rurimi rwake akachenjera. rurimi rwakarurama isirivha yakaisvonaka, asi mwoyo wowakaipa haubatsiri chinhu. miromo yemunhu akarurama inosimbisa vazhinji, asi mapenzi anofa nokuda kwokushayiwa zivo. kuropafadza kwayeahoh kunowanisa upfumi, uye haawedzeri matambudziko kwahuri. benzi rinofadzwa nokuita zvakaipa, asi munhu anonzwisisa anofarira uchenjeri. zvinotyiwa nowakaipa ndizvo zvichaitika kwaari; zvinoshuviwa nowakarurama zvichapiwa kwaari. kana dutu rapfuura napo, vakaipa havazowanikwi, asi vakarurama vachamira vakasimba nokusingaperi. sevhiniga kumazino noutsi kumaziso, ndizvo zvakaita simbe kuna avo vachamutuma. kutya yeahoh kunowedzera mazuva kuupenyu, asi makore owakaipa achatapudzwa. tarisiro yowakarurama mufaro, asi tariro dzowakaipa dzichaparadzwa. nzira yayeahoh ndiyo utiziro hwavakarurama, asi ndiko kuparadzwa kwaavo vanoita zvakaipa. akarurama haangatongodzurwi, asi vakaipa havangarambi vari munyika. muromo womunhu akarurama unobudisa uchenjeri, asi rurimi rwakaipa ruchabviswa. miromo yomunhu akarurama inoziva zvakafanira, asi muromo womunhu akaipa, zvakaipa chete.

11

yeahoh anovenga zviero zvinonyengera, asi zviero zvakakwana zvinomufadza. kana kuzvikudza kwasvika, ipapo kunyadziswa kwasvikawo, asi uchenjeri huri kune akazvininipisa. unhu hwavakarurama hunovatungamirira, asi vasina kutendeka vanoparadzwa nokunyengera kwavo. pfuma haibatsiri chinhu pazuva rokutsamwa, asi kururama kunorwira parufu. kururama kwavasina chavangapomerwa kunovaruramisira nzira yavo, asi vakaipa vachaparadzwa nezvakaipa zvavo. kururama kwavakarurama kunovarwira, asi vasina kutendeka vanosungwa nezvishuvo zvavo zvakaipa. kana munhu akaipa afa, tariro yake yaparara; zvose zvaaitarisira kubva pasimba rake zvaparadzwa. munhu akarurama anonunurwa kubva mudambudziko, uye rigoenda kuno munhu akaipa panzvimbo yake. munhu asina umwari anoparadza muvakidzani wake nomuromo wake, asi kubudikidza nezivo akarurama anopunyuka. vakarurama pavanobudirira, guta rinofara; vakaipa pavanoparara, kupembera nomufaro zvinonzwikwa. kubudikidza nokuropafadzwa kwomunhu akarurama, guta rinosimudzirwa, asi nomuromo womunhu akaipa rinoparadzwa. munhu anoshayiwa uchenjeri anoseka muvakidzani wake, asi munhu anonzwisisa anodzora rurimi rwake. guhwa rinoparadza chivimbo, asi munhu akavimbika anochengetedza zvakavanzika. nokuda kwokushaya utungamiri rudzi runoparara, asi varayiri vazhinji vanoita kuti kukunda kuvepo. uyo anoisira mumwe rubatso zvirokwazvo achaona nhamo, asi ani naani anoramba kumbundana maoko achiita mhiko achapona. mukadzi ane mwoyo munyoro achakudzwa, asi varume vane utsinye vachawana pfuma chete. munhu ane tsitsi anozviitira zvakanaka iye pachake, asi munhu ane utsinye anozviunzira dambudziko. munhu akaipa anowana mubayiro wokunyengedzera, asi uyo anodyara kururama anokohwa mubayiro wechokwadi. munhu akarurama zvechokwadi anowana upenyu, asi uyo anotevera zvakaipa anoenda kurufu rwake. yeahoh anovenga vanhu vane mwoyo yakaipa, asi anofarira avo vane nzira dzisina chadzingapomerwa. zvirokwazvo akaipa acharangwa bedzi, asi vakarurama vachasunungurwa. sezvakaita mukaro wegoridhe mumhino dzenguruve, ndizvo zvakaitawo mukadzi akanaka pachiso asi asina njere. chishuvo cheakarurama chinoguma mune zvakanaka chete, asi tariro yeakaipa inogumira mukutsamwirwa. mumwe munhu anongopa pachena, asi achitowana zvimwe zvakawanda; mumwe anonyima zvaanofanira kupa, asi agova murombo. munhu anopavhurira achabudirira; uyo anomutsiridza vamwe achamutsiridzwawo. vanhu vanotuka munhu anounganidza zviyo vamwe vasina, asi mukomborero uchava korona youyo anofarira kutengesa. uyo anotsvaka zvakanaka achawana nyasha, asi zvakaipa zvinosvika kune uyo anozvitsvaka. ani naani anovimba noupfumi hwake achawa, asi akarurama achanaka seshizha nyoro. uyo anouyisa dambudziko kumhuri yake achagara nhaka yemhepo chete, uye benzi richava muranda womunhu akachenjera. chibereko chokururama ndiwo muti woupenyu, uye anotungamirira mweya yavanhu kuruponeso ndiye akachenjera. kana vakarurama vachiwana zvakavafanira panyika, ko, kuzoti akaipa nomutadzi!

12

ani naani anofarira kuzvirovedza anoda zivo, asi uyo anovenga kudzorwa ibenzi. munhu akanaka anowana nyasha kubva kuna yeahoh, asi yeahoh anotuka munhu ane mano akaipa. munhu haangasimbiswi nezvakaipa, asi mudzi womunhu akarurama haungadzurwi. mudzimai ane unhu hwakanaka ikorona kumurume wake, asi mudzimai anonyadzisa akafanana nokuora mumapfupa omurume wake. urongwa hwomunhu akarurama hwakarurama, asi kurayira kwavakaipa kunonyengera. mashoko owakaipa anovandira ropa, asi kutaura kwavakarurama kunovanunura. vanhu vakaipa vanobviswa pachigaro uye havazovapozve, asi imba yowakarurama icharamba yakasimba. munhu anorumbidzwa maererano nouchenjeri hwake, asi vanhu vane pfungwa dzakatsauka vanozvidzwa. zviri nani kuva munhu anoninipiswa asi iwe une muranda, pane kuzviita munhu wapamusoro iwe usina zvokudya. munhu akarurama ane hanya nechipfuwo chake, asi zviito zvakanaka zvowakaipa utsinye. uyo anoshanda mumunda wake achava nezvokudya zvakawanda, asi uyo anongotevera zvisina maturo anoshayiwa zivo. vakaipa vanopanga zvakapambwa zvavanhu vakaipa, asi mudzi woakarurama unobereka zvibereko. munhu akaipa anobatwa nokutaura kwake kwakaipa, asi munhu akarurama anopunyuka padambudziko. kubva pazvibereko zvemiromo yake munhu anozadzwa nezvinhu zvakanaka, zvirokwazvo sokupiwa mubayiro kwaanoitwa nebasa ramaoko ake. nzira yebenzi inoita seyakanaka kwaari, asi munhu akachenjera anoteerera kurayira. benzi rinoratidza kutsamwa pakarepo, asi munhu akachenjera anoshayira hanya kutukwa. chapupu chezvokwadi chinopa uchapupu hwezvokwadi, asi chapupu chenhema chinoreva nhema. mashoko anotaurwa nokusarangarira anobaya somunondo, asi rurimi rwomunhu akachenjera runoporesa. miromo yezvokwadi ichasimbiswa nokusingaperi, asi rurimi runoreva nhema runogara kwechinguva chiduku. mune kunyengera mumwoyo yaavo vanoronga zvakaipa, asi rufaro rwuri kune avo vanokurudzira rugare. akarurama haangatongowirwi nezvakaipa, asi vakaipa vachava namatambudziko akavafanira. yeahoh anovenga miromo inotaura nhema, asi anofadzwa navanhu vanotaura chokwadi. munhu akachenjera anovanza zivo yake, asi mwoyo yamapenzi inotaura zvoupenzi. maoko anoshingaira achatonga, asi usimbe hunopedzisira mukushanda somuranda. mwoyo unopunyaira unoremedza munhu, asi shoko nyoro rinomufadza. munhu akarurama anochenjerera ushamwari, asi nzira yavakaipa inovatungamirira mukurasika. munhu ane usimbe haagochi mhuka yaabata, asi munhu anoshingaira anokoshesa pfuma yake. munzira yokururama mune upenyu; kwainoenda hakuna rufu.

13

mwanakomana akachenjera anoteerera kurayira kwababa vake, asi mudadi haateereri kana achitsiurwa. kubva pazvibereko zvomuromo wake munhu achadya zvinhu zvakanaka, asi vasina kutendeka vanofarira kumanikidza. uyo anobata muromo wake anochengeta upenyu hwake, asi uyo anokurumidzira kutaura achaparadzwa. simbe inopanga asi igoshayiwa chinhu, asi zvishuvo zvavanoshingaira zvichazadziswa. vakarurama vanovenga nhema, asi vakaipa vanouyisa kunyadziswa nokunyangadza. kururama kunorinda munhu ane unhu hwakanaka, asi kuipa kunowisira mutadzi pasi. mumwe munhu anozviti mupfumi, asi asina chinhu; mumwewo anozviti murombo, asi aine upfumi huzhinji. upfumi hwomunhu hunogona kudzikinura upenyu hwake, asi murombo haana chinomutyisidzira. chiedza cheakarurama chinopenya kwazvo; asi mwenje woakaipa uchadzimwa. kuzvikudza kunongouyisa kukakavara chete, asi uchenjeri hunowanikwa mune avo vanogamuchira kurayirwa. mari yakawanikwa zvisakarurama ichakurumidza kupera, asi uyo anounganidza mari zvishoma nezvishoma achaita kuti iwande. tariro kana ichinonoka inoodza mwoyo, asi chishuvo chazadziswa muti woupenyu. uyo anozvidza kurayirwa achazozviripira izvozvo, asi uyo anokudza murayiro achawana mubayiro. kudzidzisa kwowakachenjera itsime roupenyu, rinobvisa munhu pamusungo worufu. kunzwisisa kwakanaka kunowanisa nyasha, asi nzira yavasina kutendeka ihukutu. munhu wose akachenjera anoita zvinhu noruzivo, asi benzi rinoratidza upenzi hwaro. nhume yakaipa inowira munjodzi, asi munyai akatendeka anouya nokuporesa. uyo anozvidza kurayirwa achava murombo uye achanyadziswa, asi ani naani anoteerera kurayirwa achakudzwa. chishuvo chazadziswa chinozipa pamweya, asi mapenzi anovenga kusiya zvakaipa. uyo anofamba navakachenjera achachenjerawo, asi shamwari yamapenzi ichakuvadzwa. zvakaipa zvinotevera mutadzi, asi kubudirira ndiwo mugove wavakarurama. munhu akanaka anosiyira vana vevana vake nhaka, asi upfumi hwomutadzi hunounganidzirwa vakarurama. munda womurombo ungabereka zvokudya zvakawanda, asi kusaruramisira kunozvitsvairira kure. anorega kushandisa shamhu anovenga mwanakomana wake, asi uyo anomuda anochenjerera kumuranga. vakarurama vanodya zvinogutsa mwoyo yavo, asi dumbu reakaipa richanzwa nzara.

14

mukadzi akachenjera anovaka imba yake, asi benzi rinoputsa imba yaro namaoko aro. uyo ano mufambiro wakarurama anotya yeahoh, asi uyo ano mufambiro wakatsauka anomuzvidza. kutaura kwebenzi kunouyisa shamhu kumusana kwaro, asi miromo yavakachenjera inovadzivirira. kana pasina nzombe, chidyiro hachina chinhu, asi pasimba renzombe ndipo panobva kukohwa kukuru. chapupu chechokwadi hachinyengeri, asi chapupu chenhema chinodurura nhema. mudadi anotsvaka uchenjeri asi anohushaya, asi ruzivo runouya zviri nyore kune anonzvera. gara kure nomunhu benzi, nokuti haungawani ruzivo kubva pamiromo yake. uchenjeri hwomunhu akangwara ndiko kunzwisisa nzira dzake, asi upenzi hwamapenzi ndihwo unyengeri. mapenzi anoseka kutendeuka pazvivi, asi kuita zvakanaka kunowanikwa pakati pavakarurama. mwoyo mumwe nomumwe unoziva kutambudzika kwawo, uye hapana munhu angagoverana nawo mufaro wawo. imba yeakaipa ichaparadzwa, asi tende rowakarurama richabudirira. kune nzira inoita seyakanaka kumunhu, asi kumagumo inotungamirira kurufu. kunyange mukuseka mwoyo unogona kurwadziwa, uye mufaro ungangoperera mukusuwa. vasingatendi vachapiwa mubayiro wakazara wenzira dzavo, uye munhu akanaka achapiwa mubayiro wenzira dzakewo. munhu asina mano anongotenda zvose zvose, asi munhu akangwara anongwarira mafambiro ake. munhu akachenjera anotya yeahoh uye anovenga zvakaipa, asi benzi rina manyawi uye harina hanya. munhu anokurumidza kutsamwa anoita zvinhu zvoupenzi, uye munhu anoita zvounyengeri achavengwa. vasina mano vachagara nhaka youpenzi, asi vakangwara vachapfekedzwa korona yezivo. vanhu vakaipa vachagwadama pamberi pavakanaka, uye vakaipa pamasuo avakarurama. varombo vanoraswa kunyange navavakidzani vavo, asi vapfumi vane shamwari zhinji. uyo anozvidza muvakidzani wake anotadza, asi akaropafadzwa ane tsitsi kune vanoshayiwa. ko, vanoronga zvakaipa havarasiki here? asi avo vanoronga zvakanaka vanowana rudo nokutendeka. kushanda nesimba kwose kunopa mubayiro, asi kungotaura kunotungamirira kuurombo bedzi. upfumi hwavakachenjera ikorona yavo, asi upenzi hwamapenzi hunobereka upenzi. chapupu chechokwadi chinoponesa upenyu, asi chapupu chenhema chinonyengera. uyo anotya yeahoh ane nhare yakasimba, uye ichava utiziro kuvana vake. kutya yeahoh ndicho chitubu choupenyu, kunodzora munhu kubva pamisungo yorufu. mukuwanda kwavanhu ndimo mune ukuru hwamambo, asi pasina vanhu muchinda anoparadzwa. munhu ane mwoyo murefu anonzwisisa, asi munhu anokurumidza kutsamwa anoratidza upenzi. mwoyo wakagadzikana unopa upenyu kumuviri, asi ruchiva runoodza mapfupa. uyo anomanikidza varombo anoratidza kuti anozvidza musiki wavo, asi ani naani ane hanya nevanoshayiwa anokudza allah. kana njodzi yauya, akaipa anowisirwa pasi, asi kunyange murufu akarurama ane utiziro. uchenjeri hunogara mumwoyo yavanohunzvera uye kunyange pakati pamapenzi hunozvizivisa. kururama kunosimudzira rudzi, asi chivi chinonyadzisa vanhu vapi zvavo. mambo anofarira muranda akachenjera, asi muranda anonyadzisa achatsamwirwa naye.

15

mhinduro nyoro inodzora kutsamwa, asi shoko rinorwadza rinomutsa hasha. rurimi rwowakachenjera runobudisa zivo, asi muromo webenzi unodurura upenzi. meso ayeahoh ari pose pose, achicherechedza vakaipa navakanaka. rurimi runouyisa kuporesa ndirwo muti woupenyu, asi rurimi runonyengera runopwanya mweya. benzi rinoramba kurayira kwababa varo, asi ani naani anogamuchira kurayirwa anoratidza kungwara. imba yowakarurama ine pfuma zhinji, asi zvinowanikwa nowakaipa zvinomuunzira kutambudzika. miromo yavakachenjera inokusha zivo; asi mwoyo yamapenzi haidaro. yeahoh anovenga chibayiro chowakaipa, asi munyengetero womunhu akarurama unomufadza. yeahoh anovenga nzira yeakaipa, asi anoda vaya vanotevera kururama. kurangwa kwakaomarara kwakamirira uyo anotsauka kubva panzira; uyo anovenga kudzorwa achafa. rufu nokuparadzwa zviri pachena pamberi payeahoh, ko, kuzoti mwoyo yavanhu! mudadi anovenga kudzorwa; haangabvunzi vakachenjera. mwoyo wakafara, unofadza chiso, asi mwoyo une shungu unopwanya mweya. mwoyo unonzvera unotsvaka ruzivo, asi muromo webenzi unodya upenzi. mazuva ose omunhu anotambudzika akaipa, asi mwoyo unofara une mutambo nguva dzose. zviri nani kuva nezvishoma uchitya yeahoh, pane kuva nepfuma zhinji namatambudziko. zviri nani kuva nezvokudya zvomuriwo pane rudo, pane kuva nemhuru yakakodzwa pane ruvengo. munhu ane hasha anomutsa bopoto, asi munhu ane mwoyo murefu anonyaradza kukakavara. nzira yesimbe yakasoswa neminzwa, asi nzira yavakarurama mugwagwa mukuru. mwanakomana akachenjera anounzira baba vake mufaro, asi munhu benzi anozvidza mai vake. upenzi hunofadza munhu anoshayiwa njere, asi munhu anonzwisisa anochengetedza nzira yakarurama. urongwa hunoparara kana pasina vanopa mazano, asi vanopa mazano vakawanda hunobudirira. munhu anowana mufaro mukupa mhinduro yakanaka, uye rakanaka seiko shoko rinouya nenguva! nzira youpenyu kumunhu akachenjera inokwidza kumusoro, ichimuchengetedza kuti asaenda muguva. yeahoh anoparadza imba yomunhu anozvikudza, asi agochengeta miganhu yechirikadzi yakasimba. yeahoh anovenga pfungwa dzowakaipa, asi dzavakachena dzinomufadza. munhu anokara pfuma anouyisa kutambudzika kumhuri yake, asi anovenga fufuro achararama. mwoyo wokururama unoyera mhinduro dzawo, asi muromo woakaipa unodurura zvakaipa. yeahoh ari kure neakaipa, asi anonzwa munyengetero weakarurama. chiso chinobwinya chinofadza mwoyo, uye mashoko akanaka anopa utano kumapfupa. uyo anoteerera kutsiura kunopa upenyu achagara pakati pavakachenjera. uyo asina hanya nokurangwa anozvizvidza iye pachake, asi ani naani anogamuchira kurayira achawana kunzwisisa. kutya yeahoh kunodzidzisa munhu uchenjeri, uye kuzvininipisa kunotanga, kukudzwa kwozotevera.

16

kuronga kwomwoyo ndekwomunhu, asi mhinduro yorurimi inobva kuna yeahoh. nzira dzose dzomunhu dzinoita sedzakanaka pakuona kwake, asi yeahoh anoyera zvinangwa. kumikidza kuna yeahoh chose chaunoita, ipapo urongwa hwako huchabudirira. yeahoh anoitira zvinhu zvose magumo azvo; kunyange akaipa anomuitira zuva renjodzi. yeahoh anovenga vose vane mwoyo inozvikudza. zvirokwazvo, havangaregi kurangwa. kubudikidza norudo nokutendeka, chivi chinoyananisirwa, kubudikidza nokutya yeahoh munhu anorega kuita zvakaipa. kana nzira dzomunhu dzichifadza yeahoh, anoita kuti kunyange vavengi vake vagarisane naye murugare. zviri nani kuva nezvishoma mukururama, pane kuva nezvakawanda kwazvo mukusaruramisira. mumwoyo make munhu anoronga gwara rake, asi yeahoh ndiye anotonga kufamba kwake. miromo yamambo inotaura seinotaura chirevo chaallah, uye muromo wake haufaniri kurega kururamisira. zviyero nezvienzaniso zvechokwadi zvinobva kuna yeahoh; zviyero zvose zviri muhomwe ndiye akazviita. madzimambo anovenga kuita zvakaipa, nokuti chigaro choushe chinosimbiswa nokururama. madzimambo anofarira miromo inotaura chokwadi; anoremekedza munhu anotaura chokwadi. kutsamwa kwamambo inhume yorufu, asi munhu akachenjera anonyaradza kutsamwa uku. kana chiso chamambo chichibwinya, zvinoreva upenyu, nyasha dzake dzakaita segore remvura panguva yomunakamwe. zviri nani sei kuwana uchenjeri pane goridhe, kusarudza njere pane sirivha! mugwagwa mukuru wavakarurama unonzvenga zvakaipa; uye anochengeta nzira yake anochengeta upenyu hwake. kuzvikudza kunotangira kuparadzwa, mweya wamanyawi unotangira kuwa. zviri nani kuva nomweya unozvininipisa pakati pavakadzvinyirirwa pane kugoverana zvakapambwa navanozvikudza. ani naani anoteerera kurayirwa achabudirira, uye akaropafadzwa uyo anovimba nayeahoh. vakachenjera pamwoyo vanonzi ndivo vanonzvera, uye mashoko akanaka anokurudzira kurayirwa. njere itsime roupenyu kuna avo vanadzo, asi upenzi hunouyisa kurangwa kumapenzi. mwoyo womunhu akachenjera unotungamirira muromo wake, uye miromo yake inokurudzira kurayirwa. mashoko anofadza akafanana nezinga rouchi, anozipa kumweya, anoporesa mapfupa. kune nzira inoita seyakanaka kumunhu, asi magumo ayo inoenda kurufu. nzara yomushandi inomushandira; nzara yake inoita kuti arambe achishanda. munhu asina maturo anoronga zvakaipa, uye matauriro ake akaita somoto unopisa. munhu akatsauka anomutsa kupesana, uye guhwa rinoparadzanisa shamwari dzepedyo. munhu anoita nechisimba anonyengera muvakidzani wake, uye anomufambisa napanzira isina kunaka. uyo anochonya nameso ake ari kuronga zvakaipa; uyo anoruma miromo yake ari kuda kuita zvakaipa. bvudzi rakachena ikorona yakaisvonaka; inowanikwa noupenyu hwakarurama. zviri nani kuva munhu ane mwoyo murefu pane kuva murwi, munhu anozvibata pakutsamwa kwake ari nani pane uyo anotapa guta. mujenya unokandirwa pamakumbo, asi zvirevo zvose zvinobva kuna yeahoh.

17

zviri nani kuva nechimedu chakaoma chechingwa uine rugare norunyararo pane imba izere namabiko, ine kupesana. muranda akachenjera achatonga mwanakomana anonyadzisa, uye achagoverwa nhaka somumwe wehama. hari ndeyokunyautsira sirivha uye choto ndechokunatsa goridhe, asi yeahoh ndiye anoedza mwoyo. munhu akaipa anoteerera miromo yakaipa; murevi wenhema anorerekera nzeve yake kururimi runoparadza. uyo anoseka varombo anozvidza musiki wavo, ani naani anofarira njodzi dzavamwe haangaregi kurangwa. vana vevana ikorona kune vakwegura, uye vabereki ndivo kukudzwa kwavana vavo. kutaura kuna manyawi hakuna kufanira benzi, zvikuru sei kutaura nhema kwomubati! fufuro inofadza uyo anoipa; kwose kwose kwaanoenda, anobudirira. uyo anofukidzira kudarika kwomumwe anotsvaka rudo, asi ani naani anomutsazve mhaka anoparadzanisa shamwari dzepedyo. kutsiurwa kunofadza munhu ane njere kupfuura kurohwa kwebenzi kazana. munhu akaipa anongotsvaka kumukira chete; nhume isina tsitsi ichatumirwa kundomurwisa. zviri nani kusangana nechikara chatorerwa vana vacho pane benzi muupenzi hwaro. kana munhu akaripira zvakanaka nezvakaipa zvakaipa hazvizombobvi paimba yake. kuvamba kwokukakavara kwakafanana nokudziurira mvura yedhamu; saka rega nharo kurwa kusati kwatanga. kupembedza ane mhosva nokupomera asina mhaka, yeahoh anozvivenga zvose. ine basa reiko mari kana iri muruoko rwebenzi, sezvo risina chishuvo chokuwana uchenjeri? shamwari inoda panguva dzose, uye hama yakaberekerwa kupikisana. munhu anoshayiwa njere ndiye anombunda noruoko rwake pamhiko, uye anoitira muvakidzani wake rubatso. uyo anoda zvokukakavara anoda chivi; uyo anovaka suo refu anotsvaka kuparadzwa. munhu ane mwoyo wakaipa haabudiriri; uyo ane rurimi runonyengera achawira mudambudziko. kuva nomwanakomana benzi kunouyisa kurwadziwa; baba vebenzi havana mufaro. mwoyo wakafara mushonga wakanaka, asi mweya wakaputsika unoomesa mapfupa. munhu akaipa anogamuchira fufuro muchivande, kuti aminamise nzira dzokururamisira. munhu ane njere anoisa uchenjeri pamberi, asi meso ebenzi anosvika kumagumo enyika. mwanakomana benzi anorwadzisa baba vake, uye anoitisa shungu uyo akamubereka. hazvina kunaka kuranga munhu asina mhosva, kana kurova machinda nokuda kwokururama kwavo. munhu ano ruzivo anoshandisa mashoko achizvidzora, uye munhu anonzwisisa akadzikama. kunyange benzi, kana rakanyarara, rinonzi rakachenjera, uye rikabata muromo waro rinonzi rakangwara.

18

munhu asina ukama navamwe anongozvitsvakira zvake; anozvidza kutonga kwakanaka kwose. benzi harifariri kunzwisisa, asi rinofarira kungotaura zvarinofunga chete. panosvika chakaipa, kuzvidzwa kunouyawo, uye kana nyadzi dzichisvika kusakudzwa kwasvikawo. mashoko omuromo womunhu imvura yakadzika, asi tsime rouchenjeri chitubu chinoyerera. hazvina kunaka kutsaura akaipa kana kusaruramisira asina mhosva. miromo yebenzi inoriunzira kukakavara, uye muromo wake unomukokera kurohwa. muromo webenzi ndiwo kuparadzwa kwaro, uye miromo yaro ndiwo musungo kumweya waro. mashoko amakuhwa akaita semisuva yakanakisisa; anoenda pakadzikadzika mukati momunhu. uyo ano usimbe pakubata kwake ihama youyo anoparadza. zita rayeahoh inhare yakasimba; vakarurama vanomhanyira kwariri vagochengetedzwa. pfuma yavapfumi ndiro guta ravo rina masvingo; vanoriona sorusvingo rurefu pakufunga kwavo. kuparadzwa kusati kwasvika, mwoyo womunhu unozvikudza, asi kuzvininipisa kunotangira kukudzwa. uyo anopindura asati anzwa, ndihwo upenzi hwake nokunyadziswa kwake. mweya womunhu unomusimbisa panguva yokurwara, asi mweya wakapwanyika ndiani angautakura? mwoyo woune njere unowana ruzivo, nzeve dzowakachenjera dzinorutsvaka. chipo chinozarurira nzira kune achipa, uye chinomusvitsa pamberi pavakuru. anotanga kusvitsa nyaya yake anoita seakanaka, kusvikira mumwe auya mberi kuzomubvunza. kukanda mijenya kunopedza gakava, uye kunotonga pakati pavaviri vanopikisana zvikuru. hama yatadzirwa yakavangarara kupfuura guta rakakomberedzwa namasvingo, uye kukakavara kwakafanana namazariro amasuo omuzinda wamambo. kubva pazvibereko zvomuromo wake dumbu romunhu rinogutiswa; nezvinobva pamiromo yake achagutiswa. rurimi rune simba roupenyu norufu, uye vaya vanoruda vachadya chibereko charwo. uyo anowana mudzimai anowana chinhu chakanaka, uye anogamuchira nyasha kubva kuna yeahoh. murombo anokumbira kuitirwa tsitsi, asi mupfumi anopindura nehasha. munhu ane shamwari dzakawanda angangoparadzwa, asi kune shamwari inonamatira kupfuura hama.

19

zviri nani kuva murombo ane mafambiro akarurama, pane benzi rine muromo wakatsauka. hazvibatsiri kushingaira usina zivo, kana kukurumidza uchizorasika nzira. upenzi hwomunhu hunoparadza upenyu hwake, asi mwoyo wake unotsamwira yeahoh. pfuma inouyisa shamwari zhinji, asi murombo anosiyiwa neshamwari dzake. chapupu chenhema hachingaregi kurangwa, uye uyo anodurura manyepo haangaregedzwi. vazhinji vanotsvaka nyasha kumutongi, uye mumwe nomumwe ishamwari yomunhu anopa zvipo. murombo anoraswa nehama dzake dzose, kuzoti shamwari dzake, dzinomunzvenga zvakadii! kunyange akavatevera achidemba kwazvo havangawanikwi. uyo anowana uchenjeri anoda upenyu hwake; uye anochengeta kunzwisisa anobudirira. chapupu chenhema hachingaregi kurangwa, uye uyo anodurura manyepo achaparara. hazvina kufanira kuti benzi rigarike, ko, zvakanyanya kuipa sei kuti muranda atonge machinda! uchenjeri hwomunhu hunomupa mwoyo murefu; kukudzwa kwake ndiko kukanganwira kudarika kwomumwe. kutsamwa kwamambo kwakafanana nokuomba kweshumba, asi nyasha dzake dzakaita sedova pauswa. mwanakomana benzi ndiko kuparara kwababa vake, uye mukadzi anokakavara akafanana nemvura inoramba ichingodonha. dzimba nepfuma inhaka inobva kuvabereki, asi mukadzi akanaka anobva kuna yeahoh. usimbe hunouyisa hope dzakadzama, uye munhu asingashandi achafa nenzara. uyo anoteerera kurayira anochengetedza upenyu hwake, asi uyo asina hanya nenzira dzake achafa. uyo anonzwira varombo tsitsi anopa kuna yeahoh, uye achamupa mubayiro wezvaakaita. ranga mwanakomana wako, nokuti mukuranga ndimo mune tariro; usava nechikamu pakuparadzwa kwake. munhu ane hasha zvikuru anofanira kuripa mhosva yake; kana ukamununura, unofanira kuzomununurazve. teerera zano ugamuchire kurayirwa, uye pakupedzisira uchava wakachenjera. mune urongwa huzhinji mumwoyo momunhu, asi kuda kwayeahoh ndiko kunobudirira. chinodiwa nomunhu rudo rusingagumi; zviri nani kuva murombo pano kuva murevi wenhema. kutya yeahoh kunotungamirira kuupenyu: ipapo munhu achazorora zvakanaka, asingawirwi nedambudziko. simbe inoisa ruoko rwayo mundiro; igotadza kunyange kurwudzosa kumuromo wayo! rova museki, ipapo vasina mano vachadzidzawo ungwaru; tsiura munhu ane njere, ipapo achawana zivo. uyo anobira baba vake uye achidzinga mai vake mwanakomana anonyadzisa. mwanakomana wangu, ukasateerera kurayirwa, uchatsauka kubva pamashoko oruzivo. chapupu chakaipa chinoseka kururamisira, uye muromo womunhu akaipa unomedza zvakaipa. kurangwa kwakagadzirirwa vaseki, uye kurohwa misana yamapenzi.

20

waini museki uye doro mupopoti; ani naani anotsauswa nazvo haana kuchenjera. kutsamwa kwamambo kwakafanana nokuomba kweshumba; uyo anomutsamwisa anotadzira upenyu hwake. munhu achakudzwa kana akagara kure nokukakavara, asi benzi rimwe nerimwe rinokurumidza kupopota. simbe hairimi mumwaka wokurima; saka panguva yokukohwa anotsvaka asi hapana chaanowana. zvinangwa zvomwoyo womunhu imvura yakadzika, asi munhu akachenjera achaichera. vanhu vazhinji vanoti vane rudo rusingagumi, asi munhu akatendeka angawanikwa kupiko? munhu akarurama anorarama upenyu hwakanaka; vana vake vanomutevera vakaropafadzwa. kana mambo achinge agara pachigaro chake kuti atonge, anopepeta zvakaipa zvose nameso ake. ndiani angati, “ndakachengeta mwoyo wangu wakachena; ndakachena uye handina zvivi”? zviereso zvakasiyana nezvipimo zvakasiyana yeahoh anozvivenga zvose. kunyange mwana anozivikanwa nezvaanoita, kuti tsika dzake dzakanaka uye kuti dzakarurama here. nzeve dzinonzwa nameso anoona, yeahoh ndiye akazviita zvose zviri zviviri. usafarira kurara kana kuti uchava murombo; svinudza meso ako ipapo uchava nezvokudya zvakawanda. “hazvina kunaka, hazvina kunaka!” ndizvo zvinotaura mutengi; ipapo hoyo oenda achizvirumbidza pamusoro pezvaatenga. goridhe riripo, uye matombo anokosha amarubhi azere, asi miromo inotaura zivo ndicho chinhu chinokosha chisipo. mutorerei nguo yake, uyo anoitira mutorwa rubatso; itorei sorubatso kana azviitira mukadzi asingazvibati. zvokudya zvakawanikwa nokunyengera zvinonaka kumunhu, asi achapedzisira ava nomukanwa mazara jecha. ita urongwa nokutsvaga mazano; kana uchironga hondo, tsvaka kutungamirirwa. guhwa rinoputsa chivimbo; saka furatira munhu anotaurisa. kana munhu akatuka baba vake kana mai vake, mwenje wake uchadzimwa parima guru. nhaka yakakurumidza kuwanikwa pakutanga haingaropafadzwi pamagumo ayo. usati, “ndichatsiva zvawanditadzira izvi!” mirira yeahoh, uye iye achakubatsira. yeahoh anovenga zviereso zvinosiyana, uye zviero zvinonyengera hazvimufadzi. kufamba kwomunhu kunotungamirirwa nayeahoh. zvino munhu anganzwisisa sei nzira yake? musungo kumunhu kuti akumikidze chimwe chinhu nokukurumidza uye ozorangarira mhiko dzake pava paya. mambo akachenjera anopepeta zvakaipa; anofambisa vhiri rokupura pamusoro pavo. mwenje wayeahoh unonzvera mweya womunhu; unonzvera zviri mukatikati make. rudo nokutendeka zvinochengetedza mambo; kubudikidza norudo chigaro chake chinosimbiswa. kukudzwa kwamajaya ndiro simba ravo, bvudzi jena kubwinya kwavakwegura. kurohwa nokukuvadzwa zvinobvisa zvakaipa, uye kurohwa neshamhu kunovaka munhu womukati.

21

mwoyo wamambo uri muruoko rwayeahoh; anouendesa kwaanoda sehova dzemvura. nzira dzose dzomunhu dzinoita sedzakarurama kwaari, asi yeahoh anoyera mwoyo pachikero. kuita zvakarurama nokururamisira zvinonyanya kufadza yeahoh kupfuura chibayiro. meso ana manyawi nomwoyo unozvikudza, mwenje woakaipa, ndizvo chivi!
