urongwa hwavanoshingaira hunouyisa zvizhinji, sezvo, zvirokwazvo, kukurumidzisa kuchiuyisa urombo. pfuma yakaunganidzwa norurimi runoreva nhema imhute inopupurutswa uye muteyo wakaipisisa. kumanikidza kwavakaipa kuchavazvuzvurudzira kure, nokuti vanoramba kuita zvakarurama. nzira yeane mhosva yakaminama, asi kufamba kwaasina mhosva kwakarurama. zviri nani kugara pakona yedenga remba, pano kugara mumba nomudzimai anokakavara. munhu akaipa anoshuvira zvakaipa; muvakidzani wake haawani tsitsi kubva kwaari. kana museki akarangwa vasina mano vanowana uchenjeri; kana munhu akachenjera akarayirwa anowana zivo. iye akarurama anocherechedza imba yeakaipa, uye anoisa akaipa kukuparadzwa. kana munhu akadzivira nzeve dzake kumurombo, naiyewo achachema uye hapana achamunzwa. chipo chinopiwa muchivande chinonyaradza hasha, uye fufuro yakavigwa mujasi inonyaradza kutsamwa kukuru. kana kururamisira kwaitwa, kunouyisa mufaro kuna vakarurama, asi kunovhundutsa vaiti vezvakaipa. munhu anorasika panzira yokunzwisisa achandozororera muungano yavakafa. uyo anofarira mafaro achava murombo; ani naani anofarira waini namafuta haazombopfumi. akaipa achava dzikinuro yavakarurama, uye vasina kutendeka vachava dzikinuro yaakatendeka. zviri nani kugara mugwenga, pano kugara nomudzimai anokakavara uye ane hasha. mumba mowakachenjera mune zvokudya zvakaisvonaka zvakawanda namafuta, asi benzi rinodya zvose zvarinazvo. uyo anotevera kururama norudo anowana upenyu, nokubudirira norukudzo. munhu akachenjera anorwisa guta ravane simba agoputsa nhare dzaro dzavanovimba nadzo. uyo anorinda muromo wake norurimi rwake anozvidzivirira kubva panjodzi. munhu anozvikudza uye ana manyawi “mudadi” ndiro zita rake; anoita zvinhu namanyawi uye nokuzvikudza. kushuva kwesimbe kunova rufu rwake, nokuti maoko ake anoramba kushanda. muswere wose wezuva anoramba achida zvimwe, asi akarurama anopa asinganyimi. chibayiro chowakaipa chinonyangadza, zvikuru sei kana akauya nacho nomufungo wakaipa! chapupu chenhema chichaparara, uye ani naani anoteerera kwaari achaparadzwa nokusingaperi. munhu akaipa ane chiso chisinganyari, asi munhu akarurama anofunga pamusoro penzira dzake. hapana uchenjeri kana njere kana urongwa hungabudirira huchipikisana nayeahoh. bhiza rinogadzirirwa zuva rokurwa, asi kukunda kunobva kuna yeahoh.

22

zita rakanaka rinodiwa kwazvo kupfuura pfuma zhinji; kuremekedzwa kuri nani pane sirivha kana goridhe. vapfumi navarombo vakafanana pachinhu ichi: yeahoh ndiye musiki wavo vose. munhu akangwara anoona njodzi agohwanda, asi asina mano anoramba achienda uye agotambudzika nokuda kwaizvozvo. kuzvininipisa nokutya yeahoh kunouyisa pfuma nokukudzwa uye noupenyu. munzira yeakaipa mune minzwa nemisungo, asi uyo anochengeta mweya wake anogara kure nazvo. rovedza mwana munzira yaanofanira kufamba nayo, uye kana achinge akura haazotsauki kubva pairi. mupfumi anobata ushe pamusoro pomurombo, uye anokwereta anova muranda weanokweretesa. uyo anodyara kuipa anokohwa dambudziko, uye tsvimbo yokutsamwa kwake ichaparadzwa. munhu anopa zvakawanda acharopafadzwa, nokuti anopa varombo zvokudya zvake. dzinga museki, kukakavara kunobva kwaendawo; kupopotedzana nokutukana kunoguma. uyo anoda mwoyo wakachena uye anotaura zvakanaka, achava shamwari yamambo. meso ayeahoh anorinda zivo, asi anokonesa mashoko omunhu asina kutendeka. simbe inoti, “panze pane shumba,” kana kuti, “ndinourayiwa munzira!” muromo womukadzi chifeve igomba rakadzika; uyo ari pasi pokutsamwa kwayeahoh achawira mariri. upenzi hwakasungirirwa mumwoyo momwana, asi shamhu yokuranga ichahudzingira kure naye. uyo anomanikidza varombo kuti awedzere pfuma yake nouyo anopa zvipo kuvapfumi, vose vachava varombo. nyatsoteerera unzwe mashoko omuchenjeri; isa mwoyo wako kumashoko andinokudzidzisa, nokuti chinhu chinofadza kana ukaachengeta mumwoyo mako, uye ugare wakagadzirira kuataura ose. kuti uvimbe nayeahoh, ndinokudzidzisa nhasi, kunyange iyewe. handina kukunyorera zvirevo makumi matatu here, mashoko edzidziso noruzivo, kukudzidzisa mashoko echokwadi anovimbika, kuitira kuti ugopa mhinduro dzakafanira kuno uyo akakutuma? usatorera varombo nokuti varombo, uye usamanikidza vanoshayiwa mudare redzimhosva, nokuti yeahoh achavarwira pamhaka yavo, uye achapamba vanovapamba. usaita ushamwari nomunhu ane hasha, uye usafambidzana nomunhu anokurumidza kutsamwa, kuti urege kudzidza tsika dzake, uye urege kuzviteya nomusungo. usava munhu anombunda ruoko pamhiko, kana kuzviita rubatso pazvikwereti; kana usina chaungaripa nacho, uchatorerwa mubhedha wako chaiwo, paurere chaipo. usabvisa dombo romuganhu wakare, wakaiswapo namadzibaba ako. unoona munhu ane unyanzvi pabasa rake here? achashanda pamberi pamadzimambo; haangashandiri vanhu vasina maturo.

23

kana ukagara pakudya pamwe chete nomubati, nyatsocherechedza zviri pamberi pako, uise banga pahuro kana uri munhu wamadyo. usapanga zvokudya zvake zvinonaka nokuti zvokudya izvozvo zvinonyengera. usazvionza nokuda kuwana pfuma; iva nouchenjeri hunoita kuti uzvibate. kungoti tarisei papfuma, wanei yaenda, nokuti zvirokwazvo inomera mapapiro igobhururuka ichienda kudenga segondo. usadya zvokudya zvomunhu anonyima, kana kupanga zvokudya zvake zvinonaka; nokuti munhu uya anongofunga chete mutengo wazvo. anoti kwauri, “idya ugonwa,” asi mumwoyo make asingadi. ucharutsa zvishoma izvozvo zvawadya, uye unenge watambisa mashoko ako nokumutenda. usataura nebenzi, nokuti richashora uchenjeri hwamashoko ako. usabvisa dombo romuganhu wakare kana kupinda paminda yenherera, nokuti mudziviriri wavo ane simba; iye achavarwira pamhaka yavo newe. isa mwoyo wako kumurayiro nenzeve dzako kumashoko ezivo. usarega kuranga mwana; ukamuranga neshamhu, haafi. murange neshamhu ugoponesa mweya wake kubva parufu. mwanakomana wangu, kana mwoyo wako wakachenjera, ipapo mwoyo wangu uchafara; mukatikati mangu muchapembera kana miromo yako ichitaura zvakarurama. usarega mwoyo wako uchichiva vatadzi, asi nguva dzose shingairira kutya yeahoh. zvirokwazvo ramangwana rako rine tariro, uye tariro yako haingaparadzwi. teerera, mwanakomana wangu, ugova nouchenjeri, uye uchengete mwoyo wako panzira yakarurama. usabatana navaya vanonwa waini zhinji, kunyange vaya vanokara nyama, nokuti zvidhakwa nevane madyo vachava varombo, uye hope dzichavapfekedza mamvemve. teerera kuna baba vako, ivo vakakubereka, uye usazvidza mai vako kana vachinge vakwegura. tenga zvokwadi urege kuzoitengesa; uwane uchenjeri, kuzvibata nokunzwisisa. baba vomunhu akarurama vane mufaro mukuru; uyo ane mwanakomana akachenjera anofadzwa naye. baba vako namai vako ngavafare; mai vakakubereka ngavafare kwazvo! mwanakomana wangu, ndipe mwoyo wako uye meso ako ngaananʼanidze nzira dzangu, nokuti chifeve igomba rakadzika, uye mukadzi asingazvibati itsime rakamanikana. segororo anohwandira, anowedzera vasina kutendeka pakati pavarume. ndiani ane nhamo? ndiani akasuwa? ndiani anokakavara? ndiani anonyunyuta? ndiani ane mavanga pasina mhaka? ndiani ane meso akatsvuka? vaya vanogara pawaini, vanoenda kundoravira makate ewaini yakavhenganiswa. usatarisa waini kana yatsvuka, kana ichivaima iri mumukombe, kana ichidzika zvakanaka pakunwa! pakupedzisira inoruma senyoka uye ine uturu semvumbi. meso ako achaona zvisakamboonekwa uye pfungwa dzako dzichafunga zvakapesana. uchava souya akarara pamusoro pamafungu amakungwa, kana somunhu avete pamusoro pedanda rechikepe. uchati, “vakandirova, asi handina kukuvara! vakandirova asi handina kuzvinzwa! ndichamuka rinhiko kuti ndigotsvakazve waini?”

24

usachiva vanhu vakaipa, usashuva kufamba navo; nokuti mwoyo yavo inoronga kuita nechisimba, uye miromo yavo inotaura pamusoro pokuita mhirizhonga. nouchenjeri imba inovakwa, uye kubudikidza nokunzwisisa inosimbiswa; kubudikidza nezivo makamuri ayo anozadzwa nezvinhu zvinoshamisa uye nepfuma yakaisvonaka inokosha. munhu akachenjera ane simba guru, uye munhu ane zivo anowedzera simba; nokuti kundorwa hondo kunoda kutungamirirwa, uye kuti ukunde unoda vapi vamazano vazhinji. uchenjeri hahusvikirwi nebenzi; padare repasuo reguta harina chokutaura. uyo anoronga kuita zvakaipa achazivikanwa senhubu. mufungo woupenzi chivi, uye vanhu vanonyangadzwa nomuseki. kana ukapera simba panguva dzokutambudzika, simba rako ishoma sei! nunurai avo vari kuiswa kurufu; dzosai avo vari kudzedzereka vachienda kundourayiwa. asi kana mukati, “hapana zvataiziva pamusoro paizvozvi?” ko, iye anoyera mwoyo haangazvioni here? iye anorinda upenyu hwako haangazvizivi here? haangaripire munhu mumwe nomumwe maererano nezvaakaita here? idya uchi, mwanakomana wangu, nokuti hwakanaka; uchi hunobva pazinga hunozipa parurimi. uzivewo zvakare kuti uchenjeri hunozipa kumweya wako; kana wahuwana, ramangwana rako rine tariro, uye tariro yako haingaparari. usavandira sezvinoita akaipa paimba yomunhu akarurama, usaparadza paanogara; nokuti kunyange munhu akarurama achiwa runomwe, anosimukazve, asi akaipa anowisirwa pasi nenjodzi. usafara kana muvengi wako achiwa; paanogumburwa, mwoyo wako ngaurege kufara, kana kuti yeahoh achazviona akasafara nazvo uye agobvisa kutsamwa kwake kwaari. usashungurudzika nokuda kwavanhu vakaipa, kana kuchiva vakaipa, nokuti vanhu vakaipa havana tariro yeramagwana, uye mwenje wavakaipa uchadzimwa. itya yeahoh namambo, mwanakomana wangu, usabatana navanopanduka, nokuti vaviri ivavo vanouyisa kuparadzwa kwavari nokukurumidza, uye ndiani anoziva njodzi dzavangauyisa? izviwo zvirevo zvomuchenjeri: kuita rusaruro mukutonga hakuna kunaka: ani naani anoti kune ane mhosva, “hauna mhosva,” marudzi achamutuka uye ndudzi dzichamushora. asi zvichanakira vaya vanopa mhosva kune vane mhosva, uye kuropafadzwa kukuru kuchauya pamusoro pavo. mhinduro yechokwadi yakafanana nokutsvoda pamiromo. pedza basa rako rapanze ugadzirire minda yako; shure kwaizvozvo, uvake imba yako. usava chapupu chinopomera muvakidzani wako pasina mhaka, kana kushandisa miromo yako kuti unyengere. usati, “ndichamuitirawo zvaakandiitira; ndicharipira munhu uya zvaakaita.” ndakapfuura napamunda wesimbe, ndikapfuura napamunda womuzambiringa womunhu asina njere; minzwa yakanga yamera pose pose, munda wakanga wafukidzwa nesora, uye rusvingo rwamabwe rwakanga rwakoromoka. ndakafungisisa zvandakanga ndacherechedza ndikadzidza chidzidzo pane zvandakanga ndaona. kumbovata zvishomanana, kumbotsumwaira, kumbofungatira maoko kuti ndizorore, ipapo urombo huchauya pauri segororo uye kushayiwa kuchauya somunhu akashonga nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo.

25

izvi ndizvo zvimwe zvirevo zvasoromoni, zvakanyorwa namachinda ahezekia mambo weyeahudha: kukudzwa kwaallah kuviga chinhu; kunzvera nyaya ndiko kukudzwa kwamadzimambo. sokukwirira kwakaita denga nokudzika kwakaita nyika, saizvozvowo mwoyo yamadzimambo haigoni kunzverwa. bvisa marara pasirivha, panobva pabuda zvinoshandiswa nomuumbi wemidziyo yesirivha; bvisa akaipa pamberi pamambo, ipapo chigaro chake choushe chichasimbiswa kubudikidza nokururama. usazvikudza pamberi pamambo, uye usazvipa chigaro pakati pavanhu vakuru; zviri nani kuti ati kwauri, “kwira pano,” pano kuti akunyadzise pamberi pavanhu vanoremekedzwa. zvawakaona nameso ako usakurumidze kuzvikwidza kumatare edzimhosva, nokuti uchazoiteiko pamagumo, kana muvakidzani wako akakunyadzisa? kana uchipikisana nomuvakidzani wako, usarase chivimbo chomumwe munhu, kana kuti uyo achazvinzwa angangokunyadzisa, uye uchazoramba uine chimiro chakaipa. shoko rataurwa nenguva yakafanira rakafanana namaapuro egoridhe mumidziyo yesirivha. semhete yomunzeve yegoridhe kana chishongo chegoridhe rakaisvonaka, ndizvo zvakaita kutsiura kwomunhu akachenjera, kunzeve inoteerera. nhume yakatendeka kune anoituma yakafanana nokutonhorera kwechando panguva yokukohwa; inonyevenutsa mweya yavanatenzi vake. samakore nemhepo zvisina mvura, ndizvo zvakaita munhu anozvirumbidza pamusoro pezvipo zvaasingapi. kubudikidza nomwoyo murefu mutongi anogona kunyengetedzwa, uye rurimi runyoro runogona kuvhuna mapfupa. kana wawana uchi, idya hunokuringana chete, hukawandisa, ucharutsa. usanyanyoenda pamba pomuvakidzani wako, ukanyanya kuendapo, achakuvenga. setsvimbo kana munondo kana museve unopinza, ndizvo zvakaita munhu anopa uchapupu hwenhema achipikisa muvakidzani wake. sezino rakaora kana tsoka yakaremara, ndizvo zvakafanana nokuvimba nomunhu asina kutendeka panguva yokutambudzika. souya anokurura nguo musi unotonhora, kana sevhiniga inodururwa pasoda, ndizvo zvinoita uyo anoimbira nziyo kumwoyo wakaremerwa. kana muvengi wako ane nzara, mupe zvokudya adye; kana aine nyota, mupe mvura anwe. mukuita izvi, uchaunganidzira mazimbe anopisa pamusoro wake, uye yeahoh achakupa mubayiro. semhepo yokumusoro inouyisa mvura, naizvozvo rurimi rwakaipa runouyisa zviso zvakashatirwa. zviri nani kugara pakona redenga reimba pano kugara mumba nomudzimai anokakavara. semvura inotonhorera kumweya wakaneta ndizvo zvakaita nhau dzakanaka dzinobva kunyika iri kure. sechitubu chizere madhaka kana tsime rasvibiswa, ndizvo zvakaita munhu akarurama anopa mukana kumunhu akaipa. hazvina kunaka kudya uchi huzhinji, kana kuti munhu azvitsvakire kukudzwa kwake iye. seguta rakakoromoka masvingo ndizvo zvakaita munhu asingagoni kuzvibata.

26

sechando muzhizha kana mvura pakukohwa, rukudzo haruna kufanira kubenzi. sezvinoita kadhimba pakubhururuka kwako, kana nyenganyenga pakubhururuka kwayo somuseve, saizvozvowo kutuka pasina mhosva hakuna zvakunoita. tyava yakaitirwa bhiza, matomu akaitirwa mbongoro, uye shamhu musana webenzi! usapindura benzi maererano noupenzi hwaro, kana kuti iwe pachako uchafanana naro. pindura benzi maererano noupenzi hwaro, kuti rirege kuona sokuti rakachenjera. sokuzvigura tsoka kana kunwa bongozozo, ndizvo zvakaita kutumira shoko noruoko rwebenzi. samakumbo echirema akangorembera ndizvo zvakaita chirevo mumuromo webenzi. sokusungira ibwe pachipfuramabwe ndizvo zvakaita kupa rukudzo kubenzi. segwenzi reminzwa riri muruoko rwechidhakwa, ndizvo zvakaita chirevo chiri mumuromo webenzi. somuwemburi weuta anopfura pose pose, ndizvo zvakaita anoshandirwa nebenzi kana nomupfuuri zvake. sembwa inodzokera kumarutsi ayo, ndizvo zvakaita benzi rinodzokorora upenzi hwaro. unoona munhu anozviti akachenjera pakuona kwake here? benzi rinotova netariro kupfuura iye. simbe inoti, “kune shumba kunzira, shumba inotyisa iri kufamba-famba munzira dzomumusha!” segonhi rinotenderera pamahinji aro, ndizvo zvinoita simbe pamubhedha wayo. simbe inoisa ruoko rwayo mundiro; inoita usimbe hwokutadza kurudzosera kumuromo wayo. simbe inozviti yakachenjera pakuona kwayo kupfuura vanhu vanomwe vanopindura nenjere. somunhu anobata imbwa nenzeve dzayo, ndizvo zvakaita mupfuuri anopindira pagakava risinei naye. somupengo unopotsera zvitsiga zvomoto, kana miseve inouraya, ndizvo zvakaita munhu anonyengera muvakidzani wake uye achizoti, “ndanga ndichiita zvangu je-e!” pasina huni moto unodzima; pasina makuhwa kukakavara kunopera. sezvakaita mazimbe pazvitsiga zvinopfuta nehuni pamoto, ndizvo zvakaita munhu wegakava pakupfutidza rukave. mashoko eguhwa akaita semisuva yakaisvonaka inodzika mukatikati momunhu. sezvinopenya zvakanamirwa kunze kwomudziyo wevhu, ndizvo zvakaita miromo inotaura zvinoyevedza, asi nomwoyo wakaipa. muparadzi anozvivanza namatauriro ake, asi mumwoyo make akaviga ruvengo. kunyange mashoko ake achitapira, usatenda zvaanotaura, nokuti mumwoyo make mune zvinonyangadza zvinomwe. ruvengo rwake rungavigwa mukunyengera kwake, asi kuipa kwake kuchabudiswa pachena paungano. kana munhu akachera gomba, achawira mariri; kana munhu akakungurutsa ibwe, richakunguruka, richidzokera pamusoro pake. rurimi runoreva nhema runovenga varunorwadzisa, uye muromo unobata kumeso unoparadza.

27

usazvirumbidza pamusoro pezuva ramangwana, nokuti hauzivi zvingauyiswa nezuva. rega mumwe akurumbidze, kwete muromo wako; mumwe munhuwo zvake, kwete miromo yako iwe. ibwe rinorema uye jecha mutoro, asi kudenhwa nebenzi kunorema kupfuura zvose. hasha dzine utsinye uye kutsamwa kunokurira, asi ndiani angamira pamberi pomunhu ane godo? kutsiurwa pachena kuri nani pane rudo rwakavanzika. maronda okukuvadzwa neshamwari anogamuchirika, asi kutsvoda kwomuvengi kunonyengera. uyo akaguta anovenga uchi, asi kune ane nzara kunyange zvinovava zvinozipa. seshiri inorasika kubva padendere rayo, ndizvo zvakaita munhu anorasika kubva pamusha wake. mafuta nezvinonhuhwira zvinouyisa mufaro kumwoyo, uye kunaka kwoushamwari kunobva padzidziso dzake dzakanaka. usarasa shamwari yako kana shamwari yababa vako, uye usangoenda kumba yehama yako kana wawirwa nedambudziko chete, muvakidzani ari pedyo ari nani kupfuura hama iri kure. iva wakachenjera, mwanakomana wangu, ugofadza mwoyo wangu; ipapo ndichagona kupindura ani naani anondishora. munhu akangwara anoona njodzi agovanda, asi asina mano anoramba achienda uye agokuvadzwa nayo. torera nguo uyo anozviita rubatso kumutorwa; uitore semhiko kana achinge aiita rubatso kumukadzi asingazvibati. kana munhu akafumira rungwanangwana kukwazisa muvakidzani wake achidaidzirisa zvichaonekwa sechituko. mudzimai anokakavara akafanana nemvura inoramba ichidonha-donha mushure mokunge kwanaya; kumudzivisa zvakafanana nokudzivisa mhepo, kana kuchingidzira mafuta noruoko. simbi inorodza simbi, saizvozvowo mumwe munhu anorodza mumwe. uyo anochengeta muonde achadya zvibereko zvawo, uye uyo anochengeta tenzi wake achakudzwa. sezvo mvura ichiratidza chiso, saizvozvowo mwoyo womunhu unoratidza munhu. rufu nokuparadza hazvimboguti, kunyangewo maziso omunhu haaguti. hari ndeyokunyautsira sirivha uye choto ndechokunatsa goridhe, asi munhu anoedzwa nerumbidzo yaanowana. kunyange ukatswa benzi muduri, kumutswa sezviyo nomutswi, haungabvisi upenzi hwake maari. iva nechokwadi kuti unoziva mamiriro amakwai ako, uchengete zvakanaka mapoka ako; nokuti pfuma haigari nokusingaperi, uye korona haigari kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose. kana uswa hukabviswa, uye bumhudza rikabuda, nesora rikaunganidzwa kubva kuzvikomo, makwayana achakuwanisa zvokupfeka, uye mbudzi nomutengo womunda. uchava nomukaka wembudzi wakawanda wokudya iwe nemhuri yako, uye wokuraramisa varandakadzi vako.

28

munhu akaipa anotiza kusina anomudzinganisa, asi vakarurama vakashinga seshumba. kana nyika ikapanduka, inova navatungamiri vakawanda, asi munhu anonzwisisa uye ane ruzivo anochengetedza runyararo. mutongi anomanikidza varombo akaita semvura inokukura ichisiya pasina zvirimwa. avo vanorasa murayiro vanorumbidza vakaipa, asi avo vanochengeta murayiro vanovapikisa. vanhu vakaipa havanzwisisi kururamisira, asi avo vanotsvaka yeahoh vanozvinzwisisa kwazvo. zviri nani kuva murombo ane mafambiro akarurama pane mupfumi ane nzira dzakatsauka. uyo anochengeta murayiro mwanakomana akachenjera, asi anofambidzana navanhu vane madyo anonyadzisa baba vake. uyo anowedzera pfuma yake nokutengesa nomutengo uri pamusoro-soro, anozviunganidzira mumwe, uyo anozonzwira varombo tsitsi. kana munhu akaramba kunzwa murayiro nenzeve dzake, kunyange minyengetero yake inonyangadza. uyo anotungamirira vakarurama panzira yakaipa, achawira mumuteyo wake pachake, asi vasina mhosva vachagamuchira nhaka yakanaka. munhu akapfuma angazviti akachenjera pakuona kwake, asi murombo ane njere anomuonorora. kana vakarurama vachikunda, kune mufaro mukuru; asi kana akaipa akava pachigaro chokutonga, vanhu vanohwanda. uyo anofukidzira zvivi zvake haabudiriri, asi ani naani anozvireurura uye agozvirasa achawana nyasha. akaropafadzwa munhu anogara achitya yeahoh, asi uyo anoomesa mwoyo wake achawira mudambudziko. seshumba inoomba, kana bere rinodzingirira, ndizvo zvakaita munhu akaipa anobata ushe pamusoro pavarombo. mutongi anoshusha haana njere, asi uyo anovenga pfuma yakapambwa achararama kwamakore mazhinji. munhu anoshushikana nemhosva yake yokuuraya, acharamba ari wokutiza kusvikira pakufa; ngapasava nomunhu anomutsigira. uyo ano mufambiro wakarurama anogara akachengetedzeka, asi uyo ane nzira dzakatsauka achawa nokukurumidza. uyo anorima munda wake achava nezvokudya zvakawanda, asi uyo anodzinganisana nezviroto achava nourombo hwakamufanira. munhu akatendeka acharopafadzwa zvikuru, asi uyo anokara pfuma haangaregi kurangwa. kuita rusarura hakuna kunaka, asi kunyange zvakadaro munhu anogona kuita zvakaipa kuti awane chimedu chechingwa. munhu anonyima ane shungu dzokuda kupfuma asingazivi kuti urombo hwakamugaririra. uyo anotsiura munhu iye achawana nyasha dzakawanda pakupedzisira, kupfuura uyo ane rurimi runonyengera. uyo anobira baba kana mai vake achiti, “hazvina kuipa,” ndiye shamwari youya anoparadza. munhu ane ruchiva anomutsa kupesana, asi uyo anovimba nayeahoh achabudirira. uyo anovimba nesimba rake ibenzi, asi uyo anofamba muuchenjeri achachengetedzeka. uyo anopa kuvarombo haangashayiwi chinhu, asi uyo anotsinzina meso ake kuvarombo achagamuchira kutukwa kuzhinji. kana akaipa achienda pachigaro chokutonga, vanhu vanohwanda; asi kana vakaipa vachiparara, vakarurama vanowanda.

29

munhu anoramba akaomesa mutsipa wake mushure mokutsiurwa kazhinji achaparadzwa nokukurumidza, kusina chingamubatsira. kana vakarurama vachiwanda, vanhu vanofara; asi kana vakaipa vachitonga, vanhu vanogomera. munhu anoda uchenjeri anouyisa mufaro kuna baba vake, asi anoshamwaridzana nechifeve anoparadza pfuma yake. nokururamisira mambo anosimbisa nyika, asi uyo anokara fufuro anoiparadza. ani naani anonyengera muvakidzani wake anodzikira tsoka dzake mumbure. munhu akaipa anoteyiwa nezvivi zvake, asi munhu akarurama anogona kuimba uye agofara. vakarurama vane hanya nokururamisirwa kwavarombo, asi vakaipa havana hanya naizvozvo. vatuki vanomutsa bope muguta, asi vanhu vakachenjera vanodzora kutsamwa. kana munhu akachenjera akaenda kumatare nebenzi, benzi rinotsamwa uye rigotuka, zvokuti hapangavi norugare. vanhu vanofarira kudeura ropa vanovenga munhu akarurama, uye vanotsvaka kuuraya vakarurama. benzi rinobudisa hasha dzaro dzose, asi munhu akachenjera anozvibata. kana mutongi akateerera nhema machinda ake ose achava akaipa. murombo nomunhu anomanikidza vakafanana pachinhu ichi: yeahoh ndiye anoita kuti meso avo vose aone. kana mambo akatonga varombo nokururamisira, chigaro chake choushe chinogara chakachengetedzeka nguva dzose. shamhu yokuranga inopa uchenjeri, asi mwana anosiyiwa akadaro achanyadzisa mai vake. kana vakaipa vachiwanda, nezvivi zvinowandawo, asi vakarurama vachaona kuwa kwavo. ranga mwanakomana wako, ipapo achakupa rugare; achauyisa mufaro kumweya wako. pasina chizaruro, vanhu vanoramba kuzvidzora; asi akaropafadzwa uyo anochengeta murayiro. muranda haarayirwi namashoko zvawo chete, nokuti kunyange achinzwisisa, haangadaviri. unoona here munhu anotaura achikurumidza? benzi rine tariro zhinji kupfuura iye. kana munhu akaregerera muranda wake kubva paudiki, achazotarisira kodzero dzomwanakomana pakupedzisira. munhu akashatirwa anomutsa kupesana, uye munhu ane hasha anoita zvivi zvizhinji. kuzvikudza kwomunhu kunomudzikisira pasi, asi munhu ane mweya wokuzvininipisa achawana kukudzwa. anoshamwaridzana nembavha anozvivenga iye pachake; anoiswa pasi pemhiko, asi haangakwanisi kupa uchapupu. kutya munhu kuchava musungo, asi ani naani anovimba nayeahoh achagara akachengetedzeka. vazhinji vanotsvaka nyasha kumutongi, asi kururamisirwa kwomunhu kunobva kuna yeahoh. vakarurama vanovenga vasina kutendeka; vakaipa vanovenga vakarurama.

30

zvirevo zvaaguri mwanakomana wajake, shoko rake: murume uyu akati kuna itieri, kuna itieri nokuna ukari: “ndini munhu asingazivi zvikuru kwazvo pakati pavanhu; handina kunzwisisa kwomunhu. handina kudzidza uchenjeri, uye handina ruzivo rwaiye mutsvene. ndiani akakwidza kudenga uye akazoburuka? ndiani akabata mhepo mumaoko ake? ndiani akasungirira mvura munguo yake? ndiani akaisa migumo yose yenyika? zita rake ndiani, uye nezita romwanakomana wake? ndiudzei kana muchiriziva! “shoko rimwe nerimwe raallah nderechokwadi; iye chidzitiro kuna avo vanovanda maari. usawedzera kumashoko ake, kana kuti achakutsiura uye agokuratidza kuti uri murevi wenhema. “zvinhu zviviri zvandinokumbira kwamuri, imi yeahoh, musandirambira izvi ndisati ndafa: bvisai kusatendeka nenhema zvive kure neni; musandipa urombo kana pfuma, asi ndipei chete zvokudya zvemisi yose. zvichida, ndingava nezvakawanda kwazvo ndikasakukudzai, uye ndikazoti, ‘yeahoh ndianiko?’ kana kuti zvimwe ndingava murombo ndikaba, uye ndikasaremekedza zita raallah wangu. “usareva muranda kuna tenzi wake, nokuti achakutuka, uye uchazviripira izvozvo. “kuna avo vanotuka madzibaba avo uye vasingaropafadzi vanamai vavo; vaya vanozviti vakachena pamaonero avo asi vasina kusukwa tsvina yavo; vaya vane meso anozvikudza nguva dzose, vane matarisiro okushora; vaya vane meno anenge minondo nameno eshaya dzavo anenge mapanga kuti vaparadze varombo panyika, navanoshayiwa kubva pakati pavanhu. “chikwevaropa chine vanasikana vaviri. vanodanidzira vachiti, ‘tipei! tipei!’ “kune zvinhu zvitatu zvisingatongoguti, zvina zvisingamboti, ‘zvaringana!’: guva, chizvaro chisingabereki, pasi pasingaguti mvura, nomoto usingamboti, ‘zvaringana!’ “ziso rinotuka baba, rinoshora kuteerera mai, richanongorwa namakunguo omumupata, richadyiwa namagora. “pane zvinhu zvitatu zvinondishamisa kwazvo, zvina zvandisinganzwisisi, zvinoti: nzira yegondo riri mudenga, nenzira yenyoka paruware, nenzira yechikepe pagungwa, uye nzira yomurume ane musikana. “iyi ndiyo nzira yomukadzi chifeve: anodya agopukuta muromo wake uye agoti, ‘hapana chinhu chakaipa chandaita ini.’ “nyika inodedera nokuda kwezvinhu zvitatu, zvinhu zvina zvaisingadi kuona: muranda anozova mambo, benzi rine zvokudya zvizhinji, mukadzi akaroorwa asi asingadiwi, nomurandakadzi anotorera vatenzi vake murume. “panyika pane zvinhu zvina zvidiki, asi zvakachenjera kwazvo: masvosve zvipuka zvine simba duku asi anounganidza zvokudya zvawo muzhizha: mbira zvipuka zvisina simba guru, asi dzinoita imba yadzo mumatombo; mhashu hadzina mambo, asi dzinofamba pamwe chete mumapoka adzo; dzvinyu rinogona kubatwa namaoko, asi rinowanikwa mumizinda yamadzimambo. “kune zvinhu zvitatu zvino kufamba kunokudzwa kwazvo, zvina zvino kufamba kunokudzwa kwazvo; shumba, ine simba pakati pezvikara, isingadududzi pamberi pechikara chipi zvacho; mafambiro okuzvikudza ejongwe, nenhongo yembudzi, uye namambo akakomberedzwa navarwi vake. “kana uchinge waita upenzi nokuzvirumbidza pachako, kana kuti waronga zvakaipa, bata muromo wako noruoko rwako! nokuti somukaka warozva unobudisa ruomba, uye sokudzvinyirira mhino kunobudisa ropa, nokudaro kumutsa hasha kunobudisa kukakavara.”

31

zvirevo zvamambo remueri, zvirevo zvaakadzidziswa namai vake: “nhaiwe mwanakomana wangu, iwe mwanakomana wokubereka, iwe mwanakomana wemhiko dzangu, usapedzera simba rako pavakadzi, nenzira dzako pane avo vanoparadza madzimambo. “hazvisi zvamadzimambo, nhaiwe remueri, hazvina kufanira madzimambo kunwa waini, hazvina kufanira vatongi kukara doro, nokuti vangazonwa vakakanganwa zvakatemwa nomurayiro, uye vakazotadza kururamisira kodzero dzavanomanikidzwa vose. ipai doro kuna avo vari kuparara, newaini kuna avo vari mukurwadziwa: regai vanwe vakanganwe urombo hwavo, uye varege kuzorangarirazve kutambudzika kwavo. “taurai pachinzvimbo chaavo vasingagoni kuzvitaurira, pamusoro pekodzero dzavose vanoshayiwa. taura utonge zvakanaka; udzivirire kodzero dzavarombo navanoshayiwa.” mudzimai ane unhu hwakanaka ndiani angamuwana? mutengo wake unopfuura nokure matombo anokosha emarubhi. murume wake anovimba naye zvizere, uye haana chaanoshayiwa chinokosha. anoitira murume wake zvakanaka, kwete zvakaipa, mazuva ose oupenyu hwake. anosarudza wuru neshinda uye anoshanda namaoko anoshingaira. akafanana nezvikepe zvavatengesi, anondotora zvokudya zvake kure. anomuka kuchakasviba; agotsvagira mhuri yake zvokudya uye agopa varandakadzi vake basa ravo. anonanʼanidza munda agoutenga; anosima munda wemizambiringa nezvaakawana namaoko ake. anoita basa rake nesimba; maoko ake akasimba kuti aite mabasa ake. anoona kuti kushambadzira kwake kunobatsira, uye mwenje wake haudzimi pausiku. muruoko rwake anobata chirukiso, uye anobata chirukwa neminwe yake. anotambanudzira maoko ake kuvarombo, uye anotandavadzira maoko ake kune vanoshayiwa. kana kwotonhora, haatyire mhuri yake; nokuti vose vakapfeka nguo dzinodziya. anozvigadzirira zvokuwaridza panhoo yake; anozvipfekedza nguo yomucheka wakaisvonaka, uye nomucheka wepepuru. murume wake anoremekedzwa pasuo reguta, kana agere pakati pavakuru venyika. mudzimai anoita nguo dzemicheka yakanaka agodzitengesa, uye anotengesera vanotengesa micheka yokumonera muhuro. simba nokukudzwa ndizvo nguo dzake; anofara akatarisana namazuva anouya. anotaura nouchenjeri, uye kurayira kwakatendeka kuri parurimi rwake. anotarira zvakanaka mararamiro emhuri yake, uye haadyi zvokudya zvousimbe. vana vake vanosimuka vagomuti akaropafadzwa, murume wakewo, anomurumbidza: “vakadzi vazhinji vanoita zvinhu zvakanaka, asi iwe unovakunda vose.” zvinofadza zvinonyengera, uye runako ndorwenguva duku; asi mukadzi anotya yeahoh anofanira kurumbidzwa. mupeiwo mubayiro wake waakashandira, uye mabasa ake ngaamupe kurumbidzwa pasuo reguta.

job

1

munyika yeuzi maiva nomumwe murume ainzi jobho. murume uyu akanga asina chaangapomerwa uye akarurama; aitya allah uye ainzvenga zvakaipa. akanga ana vanakomana vanomwe navanasikana vatatu, uye akanga ana makwai zviuru zvinomwe, ngamera zviuru zvitatu, nenzombe dzairingana majoko mazana mashanu, uye mazana mashanu embongoro hadzi, navaranda vakawanda kwazvo. akanga ari munhu mukuru kuna vose pakati pavanhu vokumabvazuva. vanakomana vake vaisiita madzoro okuita mutambo mudzimba dzavo, uye vaikokawo hanzvadzi dzavo nhatu kuzodya nokunwa pamwe chete navo. nguva yomutambo yapera, jobho aituma nhume kundovadana kuti vazonatswa. aimuka mangwanani-ngwanani achibayira mwana mumwe nomumwe chipiriso chinopiswa, achiti, “zvichida vana vangu vakatadza uye vakatuka allah mumwoyo yavo.” aya ndiwo aiva maitiro ajobho nguva dzose. zvino rimwe zuva vatumwa vakauya kuzomira pamberi payeahoh, nasataniwo akasvika pamwe chete navo. yeahoh akati kuna satani, “wabvepiko?” satani akapindura yeahoh akati, “ndabva pakupota-pota nenyika napakukwidza nokudzika mairi.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna satani, “warangarira muranda wangu jobho here? hakuna munhu akafanana naye panyika, haana chaanopomerwa uye akarurama, munhu anotya allah uye anonzvenga chakaipa.” satani akati, “ko, jobho anongotya allah pasina here? ko, hamuna kumupoteredza noruzhowa iye neimba yake nezvose zvaanazvo here? makaropafadza basa ramaoko ake, uye pfuma yake yakatekeshera munyika yose. asi tambanudzai henyu ruoko rwenyu murove zvose zvaanazvo, zvirokwazvo achakutukai pachena.” yeahoh akati kuna satani, “saka zvakanaka, zvose zvaanazvo zviri mumaoko ako, asi iye usamubata.” ipapo satani akabva pamberi payeahoh. rimwe zuva vanakomana vajobho navanasikana vake vakati vachidya uye vachinwa waini vari paimba yomukoma wavo mukuru, nhume yakasvika kuna jobho ikati, “nzombe dzanga dzichirima uye mbongoro dzanga dzichifura nechapedyo, vasebhia vakarwisa vakazvitora vakaenda nazvo. vauraya varanda nomunondo ini ndoga ndini ndapunyuka kuti ndizokuzivisai!” achiri kutaura kudaro, imwe nhume yakasvika ikati, “moto waallah waburuka kudenga ukapisa makwai navaranda, uye ini ndoga ndini ndapunyuka kuti ndizokuzivisai!” achiri kutaura kudaro, imwe nhume yakasvika ikati, “vakaradhea vaita mapoka matatu okupamba vakatora ngamera dzenyu vakaenda nadzo. vauraya varanda venyu nomunondo, uye ini ndoga ndini ndapunyuka kuti ndizokuzivisai!” achiri kutaura kudaro, imwezve nhume yakasvika ikati, “vanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu vanga vachidya nokunwa waini vari mumba momukoma wavo mukuru, pakarepo mhepo huru yavhuvhuta ichibva kugwenga ikarova makona mana eimba. yawira pamusoro pavo uye vafa, uye ini ndoga ndini ndasara kuti ndizokuzivisai!” ipapo jobho akasimuka ndokubvarura nguo dzake akaveura musoro wake. ipapo akawira pasi akanamata achiti: “ndakabuda mudumbu ramai vangu ndiri mushwi, uye ndichadzokera ndiri mushwi. yeahoh akapa uye yeahoh akatora, zita rayeahoh ngarirumbidzwe.” pazvinhu izvi zvose, jobho haana kutadza kana kupa allah mhosva.

2

rimwe zuvazve vatumwa vakauya kuzomira pamberi payeahoh, uye satani akasvika pamwe chete navo kuti andomirawo pamberi pake. zvino yeahoh akati kuna satani, “wabvepiko?” satani akapindura yeahoh akati, “ndabva pakupota-pota nenyika napakukwidza nokudzika mairi.” ipapo yeahoh akati kuna satani, “warangarira here muranda wangu jobho? hakuna munhu akafanana naye panyika, haana chaanopomerwa uye akarurama, munhu anotya allah uye anonzvenga chakaipa. uye anoramba amire pakururama kwake, kunyange iwe wakandikurudzira pamusoro pake kuti ndimuparadze pasina chikonzero.” satani akapindura achiti, “ganda neganda! munhu achapa zvose zvaanazvo nokuda kwoupenyu hwake. asi tambanudzai ruoko murove muviri wake namapfupa ake, uye zvirokwazvo achakutukai pachena.” yeahoh akati kuna satani, “saka zvakanaka, ari mumaoko ako, asi haufaniri kubata upenyu hwake.” saka satani akabva pamberi payeahoh akandorova jobho namaronda anorwadza kubva pasi petsoka dzake kusvikira panhongonya yomusoro wake. ipapo jobho akatora chaenga akazvikwenya nacho paakanga agere pakati pamadota. mukadzi wake akati, “ucharambira pakururama kwako kusvikira riniko? tuka allah ufe!” iye akapindura akati, “iwe unotaura somukadzi benzi. ko, tichagamuchira zvakanaka kubva kuna allah, tikashayiwa zvakaipa here?” muzvinhu izvi zvose, jobho haana kutadza pane zvaakataura. shamwari nhatu dzajobho, erifazi mutemani, bhiridhadhi mushuhi nazofari munamati dzakati dzanzwa pamusoro pokutambudzika kwakanga kwawira pamusoro pake, vakabva kumisha yavo vakaungana pamwe chete vatenderana kuti vaende kundomudemba uye vamunyaradze. vakati vamuona ari chinhambwe, havana kugona kumuziva, vakatanga kuchema zvikuru, uye vakabvarura nguo dzavo uye vakazvimwaya guruva pamisoro yavo. ipapo vakagara pasi naye kwamazuva manomwe nousiku hunomwe. hakuna munhu akagona kutaura kana shoko kwaari, nokuti vakaona kukura kwokutambudzika kwake.

3

shure kwaizvozvo, jobho akashamisa muromo wake ndokutuka zuva rokuberekwa kwake. akati: “zuva rokuberekwa kwangu ngariparare, uye nousiku hwakanzi, ‘kwaberekwa mwanakomana!’ zuva iroro ngarishanduke rive rima; allah wokudenga ngaarege kuva nehanya naro; chiedza ngachirege kuvhenekera pamusoro paro. rima nomumvuri wakasviba ngazviritore zvakare; gore ngarigare pamusoro paro; kusviba ngakufukidze chiedza charo. usiku uhwo rima guru ngaribate; ngahurege kuverengwa pakati pamazuva egore kana kunyorwa pamwedzi ipi zvayo. usiku uhwo ngahushaye chibereko; ngaparege kunzwika kupembera kwomufaro mahuri. vanotuka mazuva ngavatuke zuva iro, vaya vakagadzirira kumutsa chikara chikuru chegungwa. nyeredzi dzahwo dzamangwanani ngadzisvibe; ngahumirire chiedza chamasikati pasina uye ngahurege kuona hwerazuva hwamambakwedza; nokuti hahuna kundipfigira mikova yechizvaro kuti huvanze dambudziko pamberi pangu. “ko, ndakaregererei kufa pakuberekwa kwangu, nokufa pandaibuda mudumbu? mabvi akavapo seiko kuti andigamuchire namazamu kuti ndinwe? nokuti zvino ndingadai ndakavata murugare; ndingadai ndivete uye ndakazorora namadzimambo namakurukota enyika, vakazvivakira nzvimbo dzava matongo zvino, navatongi vakanga vane goridhe, vakazadza dzimba dzavo nesirivha. kana kuti sei ndisina kuvigwa muvhu somwana asina kusvika, somucheche asina kumboona chiedza chezuva? ikoko vakaipa vanorega kutambudza, uye ikoko vakaneta vakazorora. nhapwa dzinofarirawo rugare rwadzo; havachanzwizve kudanidzira kwomuchairi wenhapwa. vaduku navakuru variko, uye nhapwa yakasunungurwa kubva pana tenzi wayo. “chiedza chinopirweiko vaya vari kusurukirwa, uye upenyu kune ane shungu pamwoyo, kuna vaya vanoshuva kufa irwo rusingauyi, vanorutsvaka kupfuura pfuma yakavanzika, vazere nomufaro uye vanofara pavanosvika muguva? upenyu hunopirweiko munhu ane nzira yakavanzika, iye akakomberedzwa naallah noruzhowa? nokuti mafemo anosvika kwandiri pachinzvimbo chezvokudya, kugomera kwangu kunodururwa semvura. zvandaitya zvakandivinga; zvandaizeza zvaitika kwandiri. handina rugare, handina runyararo; handina zororo, asi nhamo chete.”

4

ipapo erifazi mutemani akapindura achiti: “kana mumwe munhu akava neshoko newe, iwe uchashayiwa mwoyo murefu here? asi ndiani angarega kutaura? funga kuti wakadzidzisa vazhinji sei, uye kuti wakasimbisa sei maoko asina simba. mashoko ako akatsigira vaya vakagumburwa; wakasimbisa mabvi akaneta. asi zvino nhamo yasvika kwauri, uye iwe waora mwoyo; inokurova, iwe ndokuvhunduka. ko, kutya kwako allah hakuzi chivimbo chako, uye nzira dzako dzakarurama tariro yako here? “rangarira iye zvino: ndianiko, asina mhaka, akamboparadzwa? ndokupiko kwakatongoparadzwa vakarurama? sezvandakaona, vaya vanodyara zvakaipa navaya vanokusha nhamo ndizvo zvavanokohwa. vanoparadzwa nokufema kwaallah; vanoparara nokuputika kwehasha dzake. shumba dzingaomba nokunguruma, nyamba meno eshumba huru akaguduka. shumba inoparara nokuda kwokushaya nyama, uye vana veshumbakadzi vanopararira. “shoko rakauyiswa kwandiri muchivande, nzeve dzangu dzakanzwa zevezeve raro. pakati pokurota hope dzinovhundutsa usiku, hope huru padzinenge dzabata vanhu, kutya nokudedera zvakandibata zvikaita kuti mapfupa angu ose abvunde. mumwe mweya wakapfuura pamberi pechiso changu, uye bvudzi romusoro wangu rikamira. wakamira, asi ndakatadza kuziva kuti chaiva chii. chinhu chakamira pamberi pameso angu, uye ndakanzwa inzwi rakanyarara richiti: ‘ko, munhu anofa, angava akarurama kupfuura allah here? ko, munhu angagona kuchena kukunda muiti wake here? kana allah akasavimba navaranda vake, kana akakanganisa kutonga vatumwa vake, zvikuru sei kuna avo vanogara mudzimba dzevhu, nheyo dzavo dziri muguruva, dzinopwanyiwa nyore kupfuura chipfukuto! dzinoputsanyiwa pakati pamambakwedza namadekwana; dzinoparara dzisingazoonekwi nokusingaperi. ko, mabote etende ravo haana kubviswa here kuti vagofa vasina uchenjeri?’

5

“chidana zvino kana uchida, asi ndianiko achadavira? uchadzokera kuno upiko wavatsvene? kutsamwa kunouraya benzi, uye godo rinouraya asina mano. ini pachangu ndakaona benzi richidzika midzi, asi pakarepo imba yake yakatukwa. vana vake havana kuchengetedzeka, vanopwanyiwa padare vasina anovarwira. vane nzara vanodya zvaakacheka, vachizvitora kunyange pakati peminzwa, uye vane nyota vanodokwairira pfuma yake. nokuti kutambudzika hakubudi muvhu, uye nhamo haimeri muvhu. asi munhu anoberekerwa nhamo, zvirokwazvo sokubarika kwomoto kunokwira kumusoro. “asi dai ndakanga ndirini, ndaiturira mhosva yangu kuna allah; ndaiisa mhaka yangu pamberi pake. anoita minana isingagoni kuyerwa, zvishamiso zvisingagoni kuverengwa. anopa mvura panyika; anotuma mvura pamusoro penyika. vanozvininipisa anovaisa pakakwirira, uye vaya vanochema vanosimudzirwa kuchinzvimbo chokuchengetedzwa. anokonesa zvirongwa zvavanyengeri, kuitira kuti maoko avo abate pasina. anobata vakachenjera muunyengeri hwavo, uye zvirongwa zvenhubu zvinokukurwa. rima rinosvika pamusoro pavo masikati; vanotsvanzvadzira masikati makuru sapausiku. anoponesa vanoshayiwa kubva pamunondo uri pamiromo yavo; anovaponesa pakudzvinya kwavane simba. saka varombo vane tariro, uye kusaruramisira kunopfumbira muromo wako. “akaropafadzwa munhu anogadziridzwa zvaari naallah; saka usazvidza kuranga kwowamasimba ose. nokuti anopa vanga, asi achisungazve; anokuvadza, asi maoko ake anorapazve. achakurwira kubva panjodzi nhanhatu; kunyange panomwe hakuna kukuvadzwa kuchakuwira. munzara achakudzikinura kubva parufu, uye muhondo kubva pakubaya kwomunondo. uchadzivirirwa kubva pakurova kworurimi, uye haungatyi panosvika kuparadza. uchaseka kuparadza nenzara, uye haufaniri kutya zvikara zvenyika. nokuti uchaita sungano namabwe esango, uye zvikara zvesango zvichava norugare newe. uchaziva kuti tende rako rakasimba, uchaverenga zvinhu zvako ugowana zvakakwana. uchaziva kuti vana vako vachava vazhinji, uye zvizvarwa zvako zvichaita souswa hwenyika. uchasvika paguva une simba guru, sezvisote zvakaunganidzwa panguva yazvo. “takazviedza izvi, uye ndezvechokwadi. saka chizvinzwa ugozviita iwe pachako.”

6

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “dai chete kurwadziwa kwangu kwaigona kuyerwa uye kusuwa kwangu kwaiiswa pachiyero! zvirokwazvo zvairema kupfuura jecha ramakungwa, hazvishamisi kana mashoko angu aiva okuvhurumuka. miseve yowamasimba ose iri mandiri, mweya wangu unonwa muchetura wayo; kutyisa kwaallah kwagadzirira kurwa neni. ko, mbizi ingachema kana ine bundo here? ko, nzombe inokuma kana ine zvokudya here? ko, chokudya chisinganaki chingadyiwa chisina munyu here? ko, chichena chezai chinonaka here? ndinoramba kuzvibata; zvokudya zvakadai zvinondirwarisa. “haiwa, dai ndapiwa hangu zvandinokumbira kuti allah andipe zvandinotarisira, kuti dai allah aida hake kundipwanya, kuti aregere ruoko rwake rundiuraye! ipapo ndaizova hangu nokunyaradzwa uku, mufaro wangu mukurwadziwa kusingagumi, kuti handina kunge ndamboramba mashoko aiye mutsvene. “ndinaro here simba, rokuti ndirambe ndine tariro? tariro yacho ndeyeiko kuti nditsungirire? ko, ndine simba rebwe here? ko, nyama yangu indarira here? ko, ndine simba here rokuti ndione kuti ndabatsirika, sezvo zvino kubudirira kwakabviswa kwandiri? “munhu asina tariro anofanira kuwana rudo rweshamwari dzake, kunyange iye arega kutya wamasimba ose. asi hama dzangu hadzivimbike sezvinongoita hova dzava kudira. sezvinongoita hova dzopfachukira, dzinosviba pakunyungudika kwamagwada echando, uye dzinozadzwa nokunyungudika kwamagwada echando, asi dzinoguma kuyerera mumwaka wokupisa, uye mihoronga yadzo inopwa mukupisa. mihoronga inotsauka kubva munzira dzayo; inoenda kumakura ndokuparara. vafambi vetema vanotsvaka mvura, vashambadziri veshebha vanomirira netariro. vachaora mwoyo, nokuti vaivimba nesimba ravo; vasvikapo, vachashaya zvokuita. zvino nemiwo maratidza kusabatsira; munoti mukaona chinhu chinotyisa mobva matya. ko, ndakamboti, ‘ndipeiwo chipo, ndipei fufuro rinobva papfuma yenyu, ndirwirei muruoko rwomuvengi, ndidzikinurei mumaoko avanhu vano utsinye’ here? “ndidzidzisei, uye ndichanyarara hangu; ndiratidzei pandakakanganisa. mashoko echokwadi anorwadza sei! asi gakava renyu rinoratidzeiko? munoda kutsiura zvandareva, nokutora mashoko omunhu arasa tariro semhepo here? muchada kana kukanda mijenya pamusoro penherera uye nokutengesa shamwari yenyu. “asi zvino chinditarirai netsitsi. ko, ndingareva nhema pamberi penyu here? musadaro, musava vasakarurama; fungai zvakare, nokuti kururama kwangu kuchiripo. ko, pamiromo yangu pane zvakaipa here? ko, muromo wangu haugoni kunzvera zvakaipa here?

7

“ko, munhu haashandi zvakaoma panyika here? ko, mazuva ake haana kuita seomushandi here? somuranda anoshuva mimvuri yamadekwana, kana mushandi akamirira kwazvo mubayiro wake, saizvozvo ndakagoverwa mwedzi isina maturo, uye usiku hwokutambudzika hwakagoverwa kwandiri. pandinovata pasi ndinofunga kuti, ‘ndichamuka riniko?’ usiku hunononoka, uye ndinoshanduka-shanduka kusvikira mambakwedza. muviri wangu wakafukidzwa nehonye uye nemaronda, ganda rangu rakatsemuka uye raora. “mazuva angu ari kukurumidza kufamba kukunda chokurukisa chomuruki, uye anosvika kumagumo asina tariro. rangarirai henyu, imi allah, kuti upenyu hwangu hunongova mweya wokufema; meso angu haachazoonizve mufaro. ziso rinondiona zvino harichazondionizve; muchanditsvaka, asi handichazovapozve. sokunyangarika kunoita gore ndokuenda, saizvozvo uyo anoburukira kubwiro haadzokizve. haachazouyi kumba kwakezve; nzvimbo yake haichazomuzivizve. “naizvozvo handinganyarari; ndichataura pakurwadza kwomweya wangu, ndichanyunyuta mushungu dzomwoyo wangu, ko, ndiri gungwa kanhi, kana chikara chokwakadzika, zvamunondiisa pasi pomurindi? pandinofunga kuti mubhedha wangu uchandivaraidza, uye kuti mubhedha wangu uchadzikamisa kunyunyuta kwangu, ipapo munondityisidzira nezviroto uye munondivhundutsa nezviratidzo, zvokuti ndinosarudza kuti ndidzipwe ndife hangu, pachinzvimbo chomuviri wangu uno. ndinozvidza upenyu hwangu, handidi kurarama nokusingaperi. ndiregei nokuti mazuva angu haana zvaanoreva. “munhu chiiko zvamunomukoshesa kudai, zvamunomurangarira zvakadai, zvamunomunzvera mangwanani ose uye muchimuedza nguva dzose? hamusi kuzombotarirawo kudivi here, kana kumbondisiyawo ndakadaro kwechinguva? kana ndakatadza, ndakaiteiko kwamuri, imi mutariri wavanhu? makaitireiko kuti ini ndive munhu wamunovavarira? ko, ini ndava mutoro kwamuri here? nemhaka yeiko musingandikanganwiri mhaka dzangu uye musingandiregereri zvivi zvangu? nokuti ndichavata muguruva nokukurumidza. muchanditsvaka, asi handichazovapozve.”

8

ipapo bhiridhadhi mushuhi akapindura akati: “uchasvika riini uchitaura zvinhu zvakadai? mashoko ako imhepo inovhuvhuta. ko, allah angaminamisa zvakarurama here? ko, iye wamasimba ose angaminamisa kururama here? vana vako pavakamutadzira, akaita kuti varangirwe chivi chavo. asi kana ukatarisa kuna allah uye ukademba kuna wamasimba ose, kana uri wakachena uye wakarurama, kunyange izvozvi achasimuka kuti akurwire, agokudzoserazve panzvimbo yako chaiyo. kunyange mavambo ako akanga ari epasi pasi, ramangwana rako richava rokubudirira. “bvunza marudzi akare ugocherechedza zvakadzidzwa namadzibaba avo, nokuti isu takaberekwa zuro uye hatina chatinoziva, uye mazuva edu panyika akangoita somumvuri. ko, havangakudzidzisi uye vagokuudza here? ko, havangakuvigiri mashoko anobva pakunzwisisa kwavo here? ko, nhokwe dzingamera pasina nhope here? ko, tsanga dzingararama pasina mvura here? dzichiri kumera uye dzisati dzatemwa, dzinokurumidza kuoma kupinda uswa. ndizvo zvakaita magumo avose vanokanganwa allah; saizvozvo tariro yavasina allah inoparara. zvaanovimba nazvo hazvina kusimba, zvaanovimba nazvo mambure edandemutande. anosendamira padandemutande rake, asi rinobvaruka; anobatirira pariri, asi harimiri. akafanana nomuti wakanyatsodiridzwa pamushana, unotandavadza mabukira awo pamusoro pebindu; unomonera midzi yawo pamurwi wamatombo, uye unotsvaka nzvimbo pakati pamatombo. asi kana ukatsemuka ukadzurwa kubva panzvimbo yawo, nzvimbo iyo ichauramba igoti, ‘handina kumbokuona.’ zvirokwazvo upenyu hwawo, hunooma, uye mimwe miti inomera ichibuda muvhu. “zvirokwazvo allah haarambi munhu asina mhaka uye haasimbisi maoko avaiti vezvakaipa. achazadza muromo wako nokuseka uye miromo yako nokupururudza. vavengi vako vachashongedzwa kunyadziswa, uye matende avakaipa haachazovapozve.”

9

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “zvirokwazvo ndinoziva kuti ichokwadi. asi munhu anofa angava akarurama pamberi paallah seiko? kunyange dai mumwe aida kuita nharo naye, haaizogona kumupindura kamwe chete pamibvunzo chiuru. uchenjeri hwake hwakadzika, simba rake iguru kwazvo. ndianiko akamudzivisa akabuda asina vanga? anofambisa makomo iwo asingazivi agoapidigura mukutsamwa kwake kukuru. anozungunusa nyika ikabva panzvimbo yayo uye anoita kuti mbiru dzayo dzidengenyeke. anotaura kuzuva iro ndokurega kuvhenekera; anodzivira chiedza chenyeredzi. iye oga anotambanudza matenga uye anofamba pamusoro pamafungu egungwa. ndiye muiti wenyeredzi dzeakutiro neorioni, dzechimunomwe namapoka enyeredzi dzenyasi. anoita minana isingagoni kunzwisisiswa, nezvishamiso zvisingagoni kuverengwa. paanondipfuura, handigoni kumuona; paanoenda napo handingamuoni. kana achibvuta, ndiani angamudzivisa? ndiani angati kwaari, ‘unoiteiko?’ allah haadzori kutsamwa kwake; kunyange boka ravarwi rarahabhi rakawira patsoka dzake nokutya. “zvino ndingakakavadzana naye seiko? ndingawana seiko mashoko okuita nharo naye? kunyange ndakanga ndisina mhaka, handaigona kumupindura; ndaingokumbira hangu nyasha kumutongi wangu. kunyange dai ndaimudana hangu uye akandipindura, handitendi kuti aizowana nguva yokundinzwa. aizondiparadza nedutu uye achizowedzera maronda angu pasina mhosva. haaizonditenderazve kuti nditure mafemo, asi aizondizadza namatambudziko. kana zviri zvesimba, iye ane simba guru! uye kana zviri zvokururamisira, ndianiko angamudana kuti amutonge? kunyange dai ndisina mhosva, muromo wangu waizongondipa mhaka; dai zvangu ndakarurama, iwo waizongondipa mhaka. “kunyange ndisina mhosva, handina hangu hanya nazvo; ndinozvidza upenyu hwangu pachangu. zvakangofanana; ndokusaka ndichiti, ‘iye anoparadza vasina mhosva nevakaipa.’ kana dambudziko rikauyisa rufu nokukurumidza, achaseka kushaya tariro kwavasina mhosva. panowira nyika mumaoko avakaipa, vatongi vayo anovapofumadza. kana asiri iye, zvino ndianiko? “mazuva angu anokurumidza kupfuura mumhanyi; anobhururuka oenda asina kumboona mufaro. anopfuura sezvikepe zvenhokwe, kufanana namakondo anomhanyira nyama yawo. kana ndikati, ‘ndichakanganwa kunyunyuta kwangu, ndichashandura chiso changu, ndigonyemwerera,’ ndinongotya kutambura kwangu, nokuti ndinoziva kuti imi hamuregi kundipa mhosva. sezvo ndatopiwa hangu mhosva, ko, ndichagotamburirei pasina? kunyange dai ndikazvishambidza nesipo uye ndikashamba maoko angu nesoda, imi muchandinyudza mugomba rematope zvokuti kunyange nenguo dzangu dzichandisema. “iye haasi munhu akafanana neni kuti ndimupindure, kuti zvimwe iye neni tisangane mudare redzimhosva. dai chete paingova nomumwe angamira pakati pedu, kuti aise ruoko rwake patiri tose, mumwe zvake angabvise shamhu yaallah kwandiri, kuti kutyisa kwake kurege kundivhundutsazve. ipapo ndichataura ndisingamutyi, asi sezvazvakaita kwandiri iye zvino, handingakwanisi.

10

“ndinosema upenyu hwangu chaihwo, naizvozvo ndicharega kunyarara pakunyunyuta kwangu ndigotaura mukushungurudzika kwemwoyo wangu. ndichati kuna allah: musandiwanira mhosva asi mundiudze mhaka yangu nemi. ko, kundimanikidza kunokufadzai, kuti muzvidze basa ramaoko enyu, muchinyemwerera kurangano dzavakaipa here? ko, imi muna meso enyama here? munoona sokuona kunoita munhu anofa here? ko, mazuva enyu akaita seavaya vanofa, kana makore enyu samakore omunhu, kuti muongorore mhosva yangu uye mutsvage chivi changu, kunyange muchiziva kuti handina mhosva, uye kuti hakuna anogona kundinunura paruoko rwenyu here? “maoko enyu akandiumba uye akandigadzira. zvino modzoka kuzondiparadza here? rangarirai kuti makandiumba sevhu. zvino mondidzoserazve kuvhu here? hamuna kundidurura somukaka here uye mukandigwambisa sechizi, mukandifukidza neganda nenyama mukandisonanidza pamwe chete namapfupa namarunda here? makandipa upenyu mukandinzwira ngoni, uye nehanya yenyu mukachengeta mweya wangu. “asi izvi ndizvo zvamakaviga mumwoyo menyu, uye ndinoziva kuti izvi zvaiva mupfungwa dzenyu. kana ndakatadza, imi maizenge makanditarisa, uye hamaizotendera kudarika kwangu kuti kurege kurangwa. kana ndine mhosva, ndine nhamo! kunyange dai ndisina mhosva, handingasimudzi musoro wangu, nokuti ndizere nenyadzi uye ndakanyura mukutambudzika kwangu. kana ndikasimudza musoro wangu, imi munondironda sezvinoita shumba, uyezve munoratidza simba renyu rinotyisa pamusoro pangu. munouya nezvapupu zvenyu zvitsva kuzondipomera mhosva uye munowedzera hasha dzenyu pamusoro pangu, hondo dzenyu dzinondirwisa, mapoka namapoka. “ko, zvino makandibudisirei mudumbu? ndinoshuva kuti dai ndakafa hangu pasati pava neziso randiona. dai chete ndakanga ndisina kumbovapo hangu, kana kuti ndakatakurwa ndichiendeswa kubwiro ndichangobva mudumbu ramai vangu! ko, mazuva angu haasi mashoma ava kutopera here? ibvai kwandiri kuti ndimbofara hangu kwakanguva, ndisati ndaenda kusingadzokwi, kunyika yerima nomumvuri wakadzama, kunyika yerima guru, yomumvuri wakadzama nenyonganyonga, iko kunoti kunyange chiedza chakangofanana nerima.”

11

ipapo zofari munaamati akapindura akati: “mashoko aya ose haangapindurwi here? ko, mutauri uyu anofanira kushayirwa mhosva here? ko, kubvotomoka kwako kunganyaradza vanhu here? ko, pangashaya anokutsiura paunenge uchituka here? iwe unoti kuna allah, ‘zvandinotenda zvakarurama uye ndakachena pamberi penyu.’ haiwa, ndinoda sei kuti dai allah ataura, kuti dai ashamisa hake muromo wake pamusoro pako, uye akuzarurire zvakavanzika zvouchenjeri, nokuti uchenjeri hwechokwadi huri paviri. uzive izvi: allah akatokanganwa kare zvimwe zvivi zvako. “ko, unganzwisisa zvakavanzika zvaallah here? unganzwisisa panogumira wamasimba ose here? zvakakwirira kupfuura matenga, iwe ungaiteiko? zvakadzika kupfuura kudzika kwebwiro, iwe ungaziveiko? chiero chazvo chakareba kupfuura nyika uye zvakapamhama kupfuura gungwa. “kana iye akasvika akakupfigira mujeri uye akakoka dare remhosva, ndianiko angapikisana naye? zvirokwazvo anoziva vanhu vanonyengera; uye paanoona chakaipa, anoshaya hanya here? asi munhu asina kuchenjera haangagoni kuva akangwara sezvo zvisingagoneki kuti mwana wembizi angaberekwa nomunhu. “asi kana mwoyo wako ukazvipira kwaari, uye ukatambanudzira maoko ako kwaari, kana ukaisa kure chivi chiri muruoko rwako, uye ukasatendera chakaipa kugara mutende rako, ipapo uchasimudza chiso chako usina nyadzi, uchamira wakasimba uye usingatyi. zvirokwazvo uchakanganwa nhamo yako, uchangoirangarira semvura yakaerera. upenyu huchajeka kupfuura masikati makuru, uye rima richaita samangwanani. iwe uchagara zvakanaka, nokuti tariro iriko; ucharinga-ringa ugozorora murugare. uchavata hako pasi, pasina munhu anokuvhundutsa, uye vazhinji vachakumbira nyasha dzako. asi meso avakaipa achaneta, uye vachashayiwa kwokutizira; tariro yavo ichava yokufa.”

12

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “zvirokwazvo imi muri vanhu, uye uchenjeri huchafa nemi! asi neniwo ndinonzwisisa semi; handisi muduku kwamuri. ndianiko asingazivi zvinhu zvose izvi? “ndava chiseko kushamwari dzangu, kunyange ndakadana kuna allah akapindura, ndava chiseko zvacho, kunyange ndakarurama uye ndisina chandingapomerwa! varume vagere zvakanaka vanoshora nhamo, vachiti ndiwo magumo avaya vane tsoka dzinotedzemuka. matende amakororo haakanganiswe, uye vaya vanotsamwisa allah vagere zvakanaka, ivo vanotakura mwari wavo mumaoko avo. “asi bvunza mhuka, uye dzichakudzidzisa, kana shiri dzedenga, idzo dzichakuudza; kana taura kunyika, ichakudzidzisa, kana hove dzegungwa ngadzikuzivise. ndechipiko pane zvose izvi chisingazivi kuti ruoko rwayeahoh rwakaita izvi? upenyu hwezvisikwa zvose huri muruoko rwake, nokufema kwavanhu vamarudzi ose. ko, nzeve haiedzi mashoko sorurimi runoravira chokudya here? ko, uchenjeri hahuwanikwi pakati pavatana here? ko, kuwanda kwoupenyu hakuuyisi kunzwisisa here? “uchenjeri nesimba ndezvaallah; kudzidzisa nokunzwisisa ndezvake. zvaanenge akoromora hakuna anozvivakazve; murume waanenge apfigira mujeri haangasunungurwi. kana akadzivisa kunaya kwemvura, kuoma kunovapo; kana akairegedzera, nyika inoparadzwa. simba nokukunda ndezvake; anonyengerwa nomunyengeri vose ndevake. anodzinga makurukota asina nguo uye anoita kuti vatongi vave mapenzi. anobvisa zvisungo zvakaiswa namadzimambo agosunga zviuno zvavo nomucheka. anodzinga vaprista vasina nguo uye anobvisa pachigaro vanhu vakanguri vadzika midzi. anofumbira miromo yavapi vamazano vavanovimba navo, uye anobvisa kunzwisisa kwavakuru. anodurura kushorwa pamakurukota uye anokutunura zvombo zvavane simba. anobudisa pachena zvinhu zvakadzama zverima, uye anouyisa mimvuri mikuru kuchiedza. anoita kuti ndudzi dzive huru, uye anodziparadza; anowanza ndudzi, uye anodziparadzira. anotorera vatungamiri venyika kunzwisisa kwavo; anovaendesa vachingodzungaira pasina nzira. vanotsvanzvadzira murima vasina chiedza; anoita kuti vadzedzereke sezvidhakwa.

13

“meso angu akaona izvi zvose, nzeve dzangu dzakanzwa dzikazvinzwisisa. zvamunoziva imi, neniwo ndinozviziva; handisi muduku kwamuri. asi ndinoshuva kutaura nawamasimba ose uye ndigozvidavirira nyaya yangu kuna allah. kunyange zvakadaro, imi munondizora nhema; muri varapi vasina maturo, imi mose! haiwa, dai bedzi mainyarara henyu! nokuti hungava uchenjeri kwamuri. chinzwai zvino kuzvidavirira kwangu; teererai munzwe kudemba kwemiromo yangu. ko, mungataura zvakaipa muchimiririra allah here? ko, mungataura zvinonyengera muchiti matumwa naye here? mungamuitira rusaruro here? mungamiririra allah here? ko, zvingabuda zvakanaka here kana akakuedzai? ko, mungamunyengera sokunyengera kwamunoita vanhu here? zvirokwazvo iye angakutsiurai kana mukaratidza rusaruro muchivande. ko, kubwinya kwake hakungakutyisei here? ko, kutyisa kwake hakungawiri pamusoro penyu here? mashoko enyu anotendwa itsumo dzamadota; nhare dzenyu inhare dzevhu. “nyararai uye regai nditaure; ipapo chinouya kwandiri ngachiuye hacho. ko, ndinozviisirei munjodzi ndichibatira upenyu hwangu mumaoko angu? kunyange akandiuraya hake, asi ini ndichavimba naye; zvirokwazvo ndichadzivirira nzira dzangu pamberi pake. zvirokwazvo, uku ndiko kuchava kuponeswa kwangu, nokuti hakuna munhu asina umwari achasvika pamberi pake! teereresai kumashoko angu, nzeve dzenyu ngadzigamuchire zvandinoreva. zvino ndagadzirisa nyaya yangu, ndinoziva kuti ndichashayirwa mhosva. pane angagona kundipa mhaka here? kana aripo, ndichanyarara ndigofa hangu. “haiwa allah, nditsidzirei hangu zvinhu zviviri izvi. uye ipapo handingavandi pamberi penyu. bvisai ruoko rwenyu rwuve kure neni, uye murege kundivhundutsa nokutyisa kwenyu. ipapo mukandidana ndichadavira. kana kuti murege nditaure, imi mugopindura. zvivi zvandakaita nezvikanganiso zvangu zvinganiko? ndiratidzei kudarika kwangu nechivi changu. munovanzireiko chiso chenyu muchindiona somuvengi wenyu? ko, muchatambudza shizha rinopeperetswa nemhepo here? ko, muchadzingana nehundi yakaoma here? nokuti munonyora zvinhu zvinovava pamusoro pangu, uye munondigarisa nhaka yezvivi zvoujaya hwangu. munosunga tsoka dzangu nezvisungo; munocherechedza nzira dzangu dzose nokuisa mutaro panotsika tsoka dzangu. “saizvozvo munhu anopera kufanana nechinhu chakaora, senguo yakadyiwa nezvipfukuto.

14

“munhu akazvarwa nomukadzi ane mazuva mashoma azere nokutambudzika. anobuda seruva agosvava; anotiza somumvuri, haagari. ko, munotarisisa munhu akadai here? ko, muchamuuyisa kuzotongwa pamberi penyu here? ndianiko angabudisa chinhu chakachena kubva pane chine tsvina? hakuna! mazuva omunhu akatarwa; makatema kuwanda kwemwedzi yake, mukamutarira miganhu yaasingagoni kudarika. naizvozvo regai kumutarisa uye mumusiye ari oga, kusvikira apedza nguva yake somunhu anoshanda. “asi kumuti kune tariro: kana ukatemwa, unobukirazve, uye mabukira awo matsva haasvavi. midzi yawo ingava yakwegura hayo muvhu uye hunde yawo ichifa muvhu, asi uchabukira pakunhuhwira kwemvura ugomera somuti uchangotanga kumera. asi munhu anofa agoradzikwa pasi; anofema kokupedzisira uye haazovapozve. sokupera kunoita mvura mugungwa, kana kupwa nokuoma kworwizi, saizvozvo munhu anovata pasi asingazomuki; kusvikira matenga asisiko, vanhu havazomukizve kana kumutswa pakuvata kwavo. “haiwa, dai mandiviga henyu muguva chete, uye mandiviga kusvikira kutsamwa kwenyu kwapfuura! dai chete manditarira nguva, uye ipapo mugondirangarira! kana munhu akafa, angazoraramazve here? mazuva ose okushanda kwangu kwakaoma, ndicharindira kusvikira kuvandudzwa kwangu kwasvika. muchadana uye ini ndichakupindurai; muchashuva chisikwa chamakaita namaoko enyu. zvirokwazvo muchaverenga nhambwe dzangu ipapo, asi musingarondi chivi changu. kudarika kwangu kuchasungirwa musaga; muchafukidzira chivi changu. “asi sokupfupfunyuka kunoita gomo rigoondomoka, uye sokubviswa kwedombo panzvimbo yaro, semvura inochera mabwe, uye sokuyerera kwemvura zhinji inokukura ivhu, saizvozvo munoparadza tariro yomunhu. munomukunda kamwe chete zvachose, uye akasazovapo; munoshandura chiso chake mobva mamudzinga. kana vanakomana vake vachikudzwa, iye haazvizivi; kana vakadzikisirwa pasi, iye haazvioni. anongonzwa kurwadza kwomuviri wake chete, agozvichema iye pachake bedzi.”

15

ipapo erifazi mutemani akapindura akati: “ko, munhu akachenjera angapindura zvisina njere here, kana kuzadza dumbu rake nemhepo inopisa yokumabvazuva? ko, angakakavara namashoko asina maturo, kana namashoko asina basa here? asi unotorwisa umwari uye unodzivisa kunamata allah. chivi chako chinorunzira muromo wako; uye unotevera rurimi rwavanyengeri. muromo wako pachako ndiwo unokupa mhosva, kwete wangu, miromo yako pachako inokupupurira zvakaipa. “ko, ndiwe munhu wakatanga kuzvarwa here? ko, iwe wakazvarwa makomo asati avapo here? unoteererawo here panokurukurwa mazano aallah? unoti uchenjeri ndohwako woga kanhi? chiiko chaunoziva chatisingazivi isu? kunzwisisa kwaunako ndokweiko kwatisinawo isu? vane bvudzi rakachena navatana vakwegura vari kudivi redu, varume vatochembera kupinda baba vako. ko, kunyaradza kwaallah hakuna kukukwanira here, iro shoko rakataurwa kwauri zvine unyoro? ko, mwoyo wako wakurasireiko, uye meso ako anobwairireiko, zvokuti unoitira allah hasha ugobudisa mashoko akadai kubva mumuromo mako? “munhu chiiko, zvokuti angava akanaka, kana munhu akazvarwa nomukadzi, kuti angava akarurama? kana allah akasavimba navatsvene vake, kunyange dai matenga akasava akachena pamberi pake, ko, kuzoti munhu, ane uori uye akaora, anonwa zvakaipa semvura! “nditeerere ndigokutsanangurira; rega ndikuudze zvandakaona, zvakataurwa navanhu vakachenjera, vasingavanzi chinhu chavakagamuchira kubva kumadzibaba avo, ivo voga vakapiwa nyika pasina mutorwa akapfuura napakati pavo: murume akaipa anotambudzika nokurwadziwa pamazuva ake ose, makore ose outsinye akachengeterwa iye. maungira anotyisa anozadza nzeve dzake; pazvinenge zvaita sezvakanaka, vapambi vanomurwisa. anorasikirwa netariro yokupunyuka parima; munondo ndiwo waakatarirwa. anofamba-famba achiita sechokudya zvamagora; anoziva kuti zuva rerima raswedera. kutambudzika nokurwadziwa zvinomuzadza nokutya; zvinomukunda, samambo agadzirira kurwisa, nokuti anokungira allah chibhakera chake uye anozvikudza pamusoro pawamasimba ose, achimhanyira kwaari asingatyi ane nhoo hobvu, yakasimba. “kunyange chiso chake chakafukidzwa namafuta uye chiuno chake chakafuta nenyama, iye achagara mumaguta akaparadzwa nomudzimba dzisingagarwi nomunhu, dzimba dzokoromoka kuva marara. haachazovazve mupfumi uye pfuma yake haingagari, kana nepfuma yake haingazadzi nyika. haangapunyuki rima; murazvo uchasvavisa mabukira ake, uye kufema kwomuromo waallah kuchamurasira kure. ngaarege kuzvinyengera nokuvimba nezvisina maturo, nokuti haana chaachawana pazviri. acharipirwa zvakazara nguva yake isati yasvika, uye matavi ake haangawandi. achafanana nomuzambiringa wabvisirwa mazambiringa asati aibva, kufanana nomuti womuorivhi wodonhedza maruva awo. nokuti ungano yavasingadi allah ichashaya zvibereko, uye moto uchaparadza matende avaya vanofarira fufuro. vanobata mimba yokutambudzika vagozvara zvakaipa; dumbu ravo rinogadzira kunyengera.”

16

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “ndakanzwa zvinhu zvakawanda sezvizvi; mose muri vanyaradzi pasina! ko, kutaura kwenyu kwamadzokorora kwenguva refu hakuperiwo here? chii chinokurwadzai kuti murambe muchiita nharo? neniwo ndaigona kutaura semi, dai imi manga muri pachinzvimbo changu; ndaigona kutaura mashoko okukupikisai uye ndigokudzungudzirai musoro wangu. asi muromo wangu waizokukurudzirai: kunyaradza kunobva pamuromo wangu kwaizokuvigirai zororo. “asi kana ndikataura, kurwadziwa kwangu hakuperi; uye kana ndikanyarara, iko hakubvi. zvirokwazvo, imi allah, mandipedza simba; maparadza imba yangu yose. makandisunga ini, uye chava chapupu; kuondoroka kunondiwira uye kunopupurira zvinondirwisa. allah anondirova uye anondibvambura mukutsamwa kwake, uye anondirumanyira meno ake; mudzivisi wangu anondidzvokorera meso ake anobaya. vanhu vanoshamisa miromo yavo kuti vandiseke; vanondirova padama pakundimhura kwavo, uye vanobatana pamwe chete kuzondirwisa. allah akandidzorera mumaoko avanhu vakaipa, uye akandikanda mumaoko avakashata. zvose zvakanga zvakanaka hazvo kwandiri, asi iye akandivhuna; akandibata napahuro akandipwanya-pwanya. akandivavarira; vapfuri vake vemiseve vakandikomba. anobaya itsvo dzangu asina tsitsi, uye anodururira nduru yangu pasi. nguva nenguva anondirwisa; anondidzingirira somurwi. “ndakasona nguo dzamasaga kuti ndifukidze ganda rangu, uye ndaviga huma yangu muguruva. chiso changu chatsvuka nokuchema, rima guru rakomberedza meso angu; asi zvazvo maoko angu haana kuita chisimba, uye munyengetero wangu wakachena. “iwe nyika, rega kufukidza ropa rangu; kuchema kwangu ngakurege kuwana zororo! kunyange iko zvino chapupu changu chiri kudenga; murevereri wangu ari kumusoro. murevereri wangu ndiye shamwari yangu, meso angu paanodurura misodzi kuna allah; anomira pachinzvimbo chomunhu achikumbira kuna allah, somunhu anokumbirira shamwari yake. “makore mashoma bedzi asara, ndisati ndaenda parwendo rusingadzokwi.

17

mweya wangu waputsika, mazuva angu aitwa mashoma, guva rakandimirira. zvirokwazvo vaseki vakandipoteredza; meso angu anofanira kuramba akatarisa ruvengo rwavo. “ndipei, imi allah, chitsidzo chamunoda. ndianiko achandiisira rubatso? makapofumadza ndangariro dzavo pakunzwisisa; naizvozvo hamungavatenderi kukunda. kana munhu akaramba shamwari dzake nokuda kwomubayiro, meso avana vake achapofumara. “allah akandiita shumo kuvanhu vose, munhu anopfirwa mate kumeso kwake navanhu. meso angu aneta nokuchema; muviri wangu wose wangova mumvuri zvawo. vanhu vakarurama vanokatyamadzwa nazvo; vasina mhaka vachamukira vasingadi allah. kunyange zvakadaro, vakarurama vachabatirira panzira dzavo, uye vana maoko akachena vachanyanya kusimba. “asi uyai, imi mose, edzaizve! handingawani murume ane uchenjeri pakati penyu. mazuva angu apfuura, urongwa hwangu hwaparadzwa, saizvozvowo zvishuvo zvomwoyo wangu. vanhu ava vanoshandura usiku kuti huve masikati; mukati merima ivo vanoti, ‘chiedza chiri pedyo.’ kana musha wandinotarisira uri guva chete, kana ndikawaridzira mubhedha wangu murima, kana ndikati kuuori, ‘ndiwe baba vangu,’ nokuhonye ndikati, ‘ndiwe mai vangu’ kana ‘hanzvadzi yangu,’ ko, tariro yangu iripi zvino? ndianiko angaona tariro yangu? ichaburukira kumasuo orufu here? tichaburukira muguruva pamwe chete here?”

18

ipapo bhiridhadhi mushuhi akapindura akati: “muchapedza kutaura uku riiniko? chimbonyatsofungai, ipapo tigotaurirana hedu. tinobatirweiko semombe uye tichionekwa samapenzi pamberi penyu? iyewe unozvibvamburanya mukutsamwa kwako, nyika ingasiyiwa nokuda kwako here? kana matombo angafanira kubviswa panzvimbo yawo here? “mwenje weakaipa unodzimwa; murazvo womoto wake unopera kupisa. chiedza chiri mutende rake chinova rima; mwenje uri parutivi pake unodzima. simba renhambwe dzake rinorukutika; mano ake pachake anomuwisira pasi. tsoka dzake dzinomuwisira mumumbure, uye anodzungaira ari mumaburi awo. musungo unomubata chitsitsinho; rugombe runomubatisisa. chishwe chakavanzwa muvhu nokuda kwake; musungo wakaradzikwa munzira yake. kutyisa kunomuvhundutsa kumativi ose, uye kunomuteverera panhambwe dzake dzose. pfumvu inomudokwairira; njodzi yakamugaririra paanowa. inodya zvikamu zveganda rake; dangwe rorufu rinopedza mitezo yake. anodzurwa kubva patende raanovimba naro agoendeswa kuna mambo anotyisa kwazvo. moto unogara mutende rake; safuri inopisa inoparadzirwa pamusoro pougaro hwake. moto unogara mutende rake; uye matavi ake anosvava kumusoro. kurangarirwa kwake kunopera panyika; haana zita munyika. anobviswa pachiedza achiendeswa murima, uye anodzingwa panyika. haana mwana kana chizvarwa chinotevera pakati pavanhu vokwake, hakuna akasara kwaaimbogara. varume vokumavirira vakakatyamara namagumo ake; varume vokumabvazuva vakabatwa nokutya kukuru. zvirokwazvo, ndizvo zvakaita ugaro hwomurume akaipa; iyoyi ndiyo nzvimbo yomunhu asingazivi allah.”

19

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “mucharamba muchinditambudza uye muchindipwanya namashoko kusvikira riniko? zvino kava kagumi kose muchingonditsoropodza; munondirwisa musina nenyadzi dzose. kana chiri chokwadi kuti ndakatsauka, kukanganisa kwangu kuchava dambudziko rangu ndoga. kana zvechokwadi mungada henyu kuzvikudza pamusoro pangu mukashandisa kuderedzwa kwangu pakundirwisa, zvino muzive imi kuti allah akandikanganisira uye akandikomberedza nomumbure wake. “kunyange ndikachema ndichiti, ‘ndakakanganisirwa we-e!’ handiwani mhinduro; kunyange ndikadanidzira kuti ndibatsirwe, kururamisirwa hakupo. akadzivira nzira yangu kuti ndikonewe kupfuura; akaisa rima munzira dzangu. akandibvisira kukudzwa kwangu, uye akabvisa korona mumusoro mangu. anondibvamburanya kumativi ose kusvikira ndapera; anodzura tariro yangu kunge muti, kutsamwa kwake kunopfuta pamusoro pangu; anondiverenga pakati pavavengi vake. mauto ake anouya nesimba; anovaka muchinjiziri wokurwa neni, anokomba tende rangu. “akaisa hama dzangu kure neni; vazikani vangu vakaparadzaniswa neni zvachose. hama dzangu dzepedyo dzakaenda kure neni; shamwari dzangu dzandikanganwa. vaenzi vangu navarandakadzi vangu vava kundiita mubvakure; vanondiona somutorwa. ndinodana muranda wangu, asi haapinduri, kunyange ndikamukumbirisa nomuromo wangu chaiwo. kufema kwangu kunonyangadza kumukadzi wangu; ndinosemesa kuhama dzangu chaidzo. kunyange nezvikomana zviduku zvinondiseka; pandinosvika vanondituka. shamwari dzangu dzepedyo dzinondisema; vaya vandinoda vandishandukira. handisati ndichiri chinhu asi ndangova hangu ganda namapfupa; ndangopunyuka napaburi retsono. “ndinzwirei urombo, shamwari dzangu, ndinzwirei urombo nokuti ruoko rwaallah rwandirova. seiko muchindidzingirira sezvinoita allah? ko, hamungaguti nenyama yangu here? “haiwa, dai mashoko angu ainyorwa hawo, dai ainyorwa hawo mubhuku, dai ainyorwa nechinyoreso chesimbi pamutobvu, kana kuti ainyorwa padombo nokusingaperi! ndinoziva kuti mudzikinuri wangu mupenyu, uye kuti pakupedzisira achamira pamusoro penyika. uye shure kwokunge ganda rangu raparara, kunyange zvakadaro ndichaona allah munyama yangu; ini pachangu ndichamuona nameso angu pachangu, iyeni kwete mumwe. haiwa, mwoyo wangu unopanga sei mukati mangu! “kana muchiti, ‘haiwa tichamutambudza sei, sezvo mudzi wenhamo uri maari,’ munofanira kutya munondo imi pachenyu, nokuti hasha dzichauyisa kurangwa nomunondo, ipapo muchaziva kuti pano kutongwa.”

20

ipapo zofari munaamati akapindura akati: “ndangariro dzangu dzokutambudzika dzinondikurumidzisa kuti ndipindure nokuti ndakanganisika kwazvo. ndiri kunzwa kutsiura kunondizvidza, uye kunzwisisa kwangu kunondikurudzira kuti ndipindure. “zvirokwazvo unoziva zvazvakanga zvakaita kubva kare, kubvira pakaiswa munhu panyika, kuti kufara kwavakaipa kupfupi, mufaro wavasina allah ndowenguva duku. kunyange kuzvikudza kwake kuchisvika kudenga, uye musoro wake uchindobata makore, achaparara nokusingaperi, setsvina yake pachake; vaya vaichimbomuona vachati, ‘aripiko?’ anobhururuka sokurota, haachawanikwizve, adzingwa sechiratidzo chousiku. ziso rakamuona harichazomuonazve; nzvimbo yake haichazomuonazve. vana vake vanofanira kutsvaka nyasha kuvarombo; maoko ake chaiwo anofanira kudzorera pfuma yake. simba roujaya rakazadza mapfupa ake richaumburuka naye muguruva. “kunyange chakaipa chichitapira mumukanwa, uye achichiviga pasi porurimi rwake, kunyange asingagoni kuchiregedza achichichengeta mumukanwa make, asi chokudya chake chichashanduka chikavava mudumbu make; chichava uturu hwenyoka mukati make. achapfira pasi upfumi hwaakamedza; allah achaita kuti dumbu rake rizvirutse. achasveta uturu hwenyoka; mazino emvumbi achamuuraya. haangafadzwi nehova, idzo nzizi dzinoyerera uchi noruomba. zvaakatamburira anofanira kuzvidzosazve zvisina kudyiwa; haangafadzwi nezvaakawana pakutengesa kwake. nokuti akamanikidza varombo akavasiya vava vachena; akatora dzimba dzavasina chavanacho. “zvirokwazvo haangamiri kubva pahavi yake; haangazviponesi nepfuma yake. hapana chaakasiyirwa kuti adye; upfumi hwake hahungagari nokusingaperi. pakati pezvakawanda zvake, kuremerwa nepfungwa kuchamukunda; kuzara kwenjodzi kuchauya pamusoro pake. paanenge agutsa dumbu rake, allah achatuma kutsamwa kwake kunopisa pamusoro pake, uye achanayisa kurova kwake pamusoro pake. kunyange akatiza chombo chesimbi, museve unopinza wendarira unomubaya. anoudzura kubva kumusana kwake, muromo wawo unovaima uchibva pachiropa chake. kutya kuzhinji kuchauya pamusoro pake; rima guru richavandira pfuma yake. moto usina anopfutidzira uchamupisa uye uchaparadza zvichasara mutende rake. matenga achaisa pachena mhaka yake; nyika ichamumukira. mafashamu achakukura imba yake, mvura zhinji ichaerera pazuva rehasha dzaallah. aya ndiwo magumo anogoverwa vakaipa naallah, iyo nhaka yavakatemerwa naallah.”

21

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “teereresa mashoko angu; uku ngakuve kunyaradza kwaunondipa. ndiitire mwoyo murefu ndichitaura hangu, uye kana ndapedza kutaura, urambe uchiseka hako. “ko, kunyunyuta kwangu kwakanangana nomunhu here? ndingatadza seiko kuora mwoyo? nditarire ushamiswe; ufumbire muromo wako noruoko. ndinotya, pandinofunga izvi; kudedera kunobata muviri wangu. nemhaka yeiko vakaipa vachirarama, vachikwegura uye vachiwedzerwa simba? vanoona vana vavo vachikura ivo vachiri vapenyu, zvizvarwa zvavo pamberi pavo. misha yavo igere zvakanaka uye haina chainotya; shamhu yaallah haisi pamusoro pavo. hando dzavo hadzikonewi kubereka, mhou dzavo dzinobereka mhuru dzisingasvodzi. vanobudisa vana vavo seboka ramakwai; vapwere vavo vanopembera vachitamba. vanoimba vachiridzirwa tambureni nembira; vanofarira kurira kwenyere. vanopedza makore avo mukubudirira uye vanopinda muguva nenguva isipi. kunyange zvakadaro vanoti kuna allah, ‘tisiyei takadaro! hatina hanya nokuziva nzira dzenyu. wamasimba ose ndianiko, kuti timushumire? tinowaneiko kana tikamunamata?’ asi kubudirira kwavo hakusi mumaoko avo, naizvozvo ndinomira kure nerangano yevakaipa. “kunyange zvakadaro, kanganiko kanodzimwa mwenje wevakaipa? kanganiko vachiwirwa nenjodzi, magumo anotarwa naallah mukutsamwa kwake? vanofanana namakoto anopeperetswa nemhepo runganiko, sehundi inokukurwa nedutu? zvinonzi, ‘allah anochengetera vana vomunhu kutongwa.’ ngaamutsive iye amene, kuitira kuti agozviziva! meso ake pachake ngaaone kuparadzwa kwake; iye ngaanwe kutsamwa kwowamasimba ose. nokuti ane hanya yeiko nemhuri yaanosiya shure, mwedzi yaakagoverwa zvoyopera? “ko, pane munhu angagona kudzidzisa ruzivo kuna allah here, iye achitonga kunyange vari pamusoro-soro? mumwe munhu anofa achine simba rake rizere, akachengetedzeka uye akagadzikana, muviri wake wakagwinya, mapfupa ake azere nomwongo. mumwe munhu anofa ane shungu dzomwoyo, asina kumbonakidzwa nezvipi zvazvo zvakanaka. vanovata muguruva pamwe chete, uye honye dzinovafukidza vose. “ndinoziva chose zvamunofunga, iwo mano amungandikanganisa nawo. imi munoti, ‘imba yomunhu mukuru iripiko zvino, iwo matende aigarwa navanhu vakaipa?’ hauna kumbobvunza vafambi vaya here? hauna kuva nehanya nenhoroondo dzavo here, dzokuti munhu akaipa anodarikwa pazuva renjodzi, kuti anorwirwa pazuva rokutsamwa? ndianiko anotsoropodza mafambiro ake pachena? ndianiko anomuripira pane zvaakaita? iye anotakurwa achiendeswa kuguva, uye rinda rake rinorindwa. ivhu romunhika rinotapira kwaari; vanhu vose vanomutevera, uye anotungamirirwa navazhinji vasingaverengeki. “saka mungandinyaradza sei nezvisina maturo? hapana chasara pakupindura kwenyu asi nhema dzoga!”

22

ipapo erifazi mutemani akapindura akati: “ko, munhu angabatsira allah here? kunyange munhu akachenjera angamubatsira here? wamasimba ose angawana mufaro weiko dai iwe wakarurama? aibatsirwa neiko dai nzira dzako dzaiva dzakarurama? “imhaka yokumunamata kwako here zvaanokutsiura uyewo achikupa mhosva? zvakaipa zvako hazvina kukura here? handiti zvivi zvako hazviperi? wakakumbira rubatso kuhama dzako pasina; wakatorera vanhu nguo dzavo, uchivasiya vasina kupfeka. wakanyima mvura vakaneta uye wakanyima vane nzara zvokudya, kunyange wakanga uri munhu ane simba, ane minda yake, uri munhu anokudzwa, agere pairi. wakadzinga chirikadzi dzisina chinhu uye wakavhuna simba renherera. ndokusaka misungo yakakukomberedza, ndokusaka njodzi ichikuvhundutsa, ndokusaka kuine rima usingakwanisi kuona, uye mafashamu emvura achikufukidza. “ko, allah haazi kumusoro kwokudenga here? tarira kukwirira kwakaita nyeredzi dzokumusoro-soro! asi imi munoti, ‘allah anoziveiko? ko, anotonga murima rakadai here? makore matema anomufukidza, saka haationi paanofamba-famba padenderedzwa ramatenga.’ ko, iwe ucharambira munzira yakare iya yakatsikwa navanhu vakaipa here? ivo vakabvutwa nguva yavo isati yasvika, hwaro hwavo hwakakukurwa namafashamu. vakati kuna allah, ‘tisiyei takadaro! wamasimba ose angaiteiko kwatiri?’ sezvo ari iye akazadza dzimba dzavo nezvinhu zvakanaka, ndinomira kure namano avakaipa. “vakarurama vanoona kuparadzwa kwavo vagofara, vasina mhaka vanovaseka vachiti, ‘zvirokwazvo vadzivisi vedu vaparadzwa, uye moto unopedza pfuma yavo.’ “zviise pasi paallah ugova norugare naye, nenzira iyi kubudirira kuchasvika kwauri. gamuchira kurayira kunobva mumuromo make uye uchengete mashoko ake mumwoyo. kana ukadzokera kuna wamasimba ose, uchadzoredzerwa: kana ukabvisa zvakaipa uchizviisa kure netende rako, uye ukaisa goridhe rako paguruva, iro goridhe rako rokuofiri kumatombo okunzizi, ipapo wamasimba ose achava goridhe rako, iyo sirivha yako yakanyatsosanangurwa. zvirokwazvo ipapo uchawana mufaro muna wamasimba ose, uye uchasimudzira chiso chako kuna allah. uchanyengetera kwaari, uye achakunzwa, uye iwe uchazadzisa zvawakapika. zvaunotaura sechirevo zvichaitika, uye chiedza chichavhenekera panzira dzako. vanhu pavanodzikiswa iwe ukati, ‘vasimudzei!’ ipapo vakaderedzwa vachaponeswa. achadzikinura kunyange uyo ane mhosva, acharwirwa kubudikidza nokuchena kwamaoko ako.”

23

ipapo jobho akapindura akati: “kunyange nanhasi ndinonyunyuta ndine shungu; ruoko rwake runondiremera kunyange ndiri pakugomera kwangu. dai chete ndaiziva kwandingamuwana; dai chete ndaigona kuenda kwaanogara! ndaitaura hangu mhaka yangu pamberi pake, uye ndaizadza muromo wangu nenharo. ndaizoziva hangu zvaaizondipindura, uye ndaizocherechedza zvaaizoreva. kuti aizondidzivisa nesimba guru here? kwete, haaizondipomera mhaka. ipapo munhu akarurama aigona kuzotaura mhaka yake pamberi pake, uye ndaizosunungurwa kubva pamutongi wangu nokusingaperi. “asi kana ndikaenda kumabvazuva, iye haako; kana ndikaenda kumavirira, handimuwani. paanenge ari pabasa nechokumusoro, handimuoni; paanotsaukira zasi, handikwanisi kumuona. asi iye anoziva nzira yandinofamba nayo; kana apedza kundiedza, ndichabuda ndava segoridhe. tsoka dzangu dzakanyatsotevera paakatsika; ndakarambira panzira dzake ndisingambotsaukiri parutivi. handina kumbobva pamirayiro yemiromo yake; ndakakoshesa mashoko omuromo wake kupfuura chingwa changu chamazuva ose. “asi iye anomira oga, uye ndiani angapikisana naye? anoita zvaanoda. anoita zvaakatema pamusoro pangu, uye urongwa huzhinji hwakadai achinahwo mudura rake. ndokusaka ndichitya pamberi pake; pandinofunga nezvose izvi, ndomutya. allah akaita kuti mwoyo wangu unete; wamasimba ose akandivhundutsa. kunyange zvakadaro rima harina kuita kuti ndinyarare, iro rima guru rinofukidza chiso changu.

24

“seiko wamasimba ose asingatari nguva dzokutonga? seiko avo vanomuziva vachitarisira mazuva akadai pasina? vanhu vanobvisa mabwe omuganhu; vanofudza makwai avakaba. vanotinha mbongoro dzenherera, uye vanotora nzombe yechirikadzi vachiita rubatso. vanodzinga vanoshayiwa kubva panzira, uye vanomanikidza varombo vose venyika kundovanda. sezvinoita mbizi murenje, varombo vanobuda vachienda kumabasa avo, okukwara-kwara zvokudya; gwenga rinopa vana varo zvokudya. vanosunganidza uswa mumasango, uye vanononga mazambiringa muminda yavakaipa. vashaya nguo, vagovata usiku hwose vasina zvavakapfeka uye vanoshayiwa zvokufuka muchando. vanototeswa nemvura inonaya mumakomo, uye vanombundikira matombo nokuda kwokushayiwa pokuvanda. mwana nherera anobvutwa kubva pazamu; mwana mucheche womurombo anotorwa nokuda kwechikwereti. nokushayiwa zvokufuka, vanongofamba-famba havo vasina kupfeka; vanotakura zvisote, asi vane nzara. vanopwanya maorivhi pakati pemihoronga; vanotsika zvisviniro zvewaini, asi vanofa nenyota. kugomera kwavanhu vanofa kunonzwika muguta, uye mweya yavakakuvadzwa inochema kuti ibatsirwe. asi allah haana munhu waanopa mhosva. “varipo vanomukira chiedza, vasingambozivi nzira dzacho kana kugara mumakwara acho. panongovira zuva, muurayi anobva amuka, uye anouraya varombo navanoshayiwa; panguva dzousiku anonyahwaira sembavha. ziso remhombwe rinomirira rubvunzavaeni; anofunga achiti, ‘hakuna ziso richandiona,’ uye anogara akavanza chiso chake. vanhu vanopaza dzimba murima, asi masikati vanozvipfigira mukati madzo;
