saka ndakatara nguva. ndakatizve kwaari, “kana mambo achifadzwa nazvo, ndingapiwawo tsamba here dzinoenda kuvabati vari mhiri kwayufuratesi, kuitira kuti vagondipa mvumo yokupfuura kusvikira ndasvika muyeahudha? uye ndinokumbirawo tsamba inoenda kuna asafi, muchengeti wesango ramambo, kuitira kuti azondipa matanda okuchinjika pamusoro pamasuo enhare iri patemberi uye neorusvingo rweguta neeimba yandichagara?” mambo akandipa zvandakakumbira, nokuti ruoko rwenyasha rwaallah wangu rwaiva pamusoro pangu. saka ndakaenda kuvabati vaiva mhiri kwayufuratesi ndikavapa tsamba dzamambo. zvino mambo akanga atumawo pamwe chete neni vakuru vehondo navatasvi vamabhiza. sanibharati muhoroni natobhia muranda wavaamoni pavakazvinzwa vakashatirwa kwazvo vachiti kwauya mumwe anoda kusimudzira magariro akanaka avaisraeri. naizvozvo ndakaenda kujerusarema ndikagarako kwamazuva matatu. ndakamuka usiku navarume vashoma shoma. ndakanga ndisina kumboudza munhu zvakanga zvaiswa mumwoyo mangu naallah wangu kuti ndiite mujerusarema. pakanga pasina chimwe chipfuwo kunze kwechandakanga ndakatasva. ndakabuda usiku ndikapinda napasuo romupata ndakananga nokutsime reshato nokusuo ramarara, ndichiongorora masvingo ejerusarema, akanga akoromorwa, uye masuo awo, akanga aparadzwa nomoto. ipapo ndakapfuurira mberi ndakananga kusuo retsime nokudziva ramambo, asi pakanga pasina nzvimbo yokupinda nechipfuwo changu; saka ndakakwidza nokumupata nousiku, ndichiongorora rusvingo. pakupedzisira, ndakadzoka ndikapindazve napakati pesuo romupata. vabati havana kuziva kwandakanga ndaenda kana zvandakanga ndichiita, nokuti ndakanga ndisati ndambotaura chinhu kuvayeahudha kana kuvaprista kana vakuru kana vabati, kana vamwewo zvavo vaizoita basa. ipapo ndakati kwavari, “muri kuona dambudziko ratinaro here: jerusarema rava dongo, uye masuo aro akapiswa nomoto. uyai, ngativakeizve rusvingo rwejerusarema, kuti tisazonyadziswazve.” ndakavaudza pamusoro poruoko rwenyasha rwaallah wangu rwaiva pamusoro pangu uye zvakanga zvataurwa namambo kwandiri. ivo vakati, “ngatitangei kuvaka.” saka vakatanga basa rakanaka iri. asi sanibharati muhoroni, natobhia muranda wavaamoni nageshemu muarabhu vakati vazvinzwa, vakatiseka uye vakatizvidza. vakatibvunza vachiti, “chiiko ichi chamuri kuita? muri kumukira mambo kanhi?” ndakavapindura ndikati, “allah wokudenga achaita kuti tibudirire. isu varanda vake tichatanga kuvaka asi kana murimi, hamuna mugove kana simba kana chirangaridzo pajerusarema.”

3

zvino eriashibhi muprista mukuru navamwe vaprista vakaenda kundoshanda uye vakavakazve suo ramakwai. vakarikumikidza vakaisa makonhi panzvimbo yawo, vakarivaka kunosvika pashongwe yezana, iyo yavakakumikidza, kusvikira pashongwe yahananeri. varume vejeriko vakavaka chikamu chaiva pedyo, uye zakuri mwanakomana waimuri akavaka parutivi pavo. suo rehove rakavakwa navanakomana vehasenaya. vakaisa matanda okuchinjika vakaisa makonhi aro namabhaudhi uye namazariro panzvimbo yawo. meromoti mwanakomana wauria, mwanakomana wahakozi akagadzira chikamu chaitevera. aimutevera pakugadzira aiva meshurami mwanakomana wabherekia, mwanakomana wameshebhezeri, uye aitevera mushure make, zadhoki mwanakomana wabhaana, akagadzirawo. chikamu chaitevera chakagadzirwa navarume vetekoa, asi vakuru vavo vakangopeta maoko avo vakasashandira ishe wavo. suo rajeshana rakagadzirwa najoyadha mwanakomana wapasea nameshurami mwanakomana wabhesodheya. vakaisa matanda aro okuchinjika ndokuisa makonhi namabhaudhi namazariro panzvimbo yawo. zvakatevera pakugadzirwa zvakaitwa navarume vaibva kugibheoni nemizipa, nameratia wegibheoni uye najadhoni wokumeronoti, nzvimbo dzaiva pasi pomubati wemhiri kweyufuratesi. uzieri mwanakomana waharaya, mumwe wavapfuri vegoridhe, akagadzira chikamu chaitevera; uye hanania, mumwe wavavhenganisi vezvinonhuhwira, akagadzira chikamu chaitevera ichocho. vakavandudza jerusarema kudzamara vasvika parusvingo rwakapamhama. refaya mwanakomana wahuri, mutongi wehafu yerimwe dunhu rejerusarema, akagadzira chikamu chaitevera. pakabatana navo, jedhaya mwanakomana waharumafi akagadzira chikamu chakatarisana neimba yake, uye hatushi mwanakomana wahashabheneya akagadzira chikamu chaitevera. marikiya mwanakomana waharimu nahashubhi mwanakomana wapahati-moabhu vakagadzira chimwe chikamu uye neshongwe yemahovhoni. sharumi mwanakomana waharoheshi, mutongi wehafu yerimwe dunhu rejerusarema, akagadzira chikamu chaitevera achibatsirwa navanasikana vake. suo romupata rakagadzirwa nahanuni navagari vezanoa. vakarivaka patsva ndokuisa makonhi aro namabhaudhi nemazariro esimbi panzvimbo yawo. vakagadzirawo makubhiti chiuru chimwe orusvingo kudzamara vasvika pasuo rendove. marikiya mwanakomana warekabhi, mutongi wedunhu rebheti hakeremu, akagadzira suo rendove. akarivaka patsva ndokuisa makonhi aro namabhaudhi namazariro panzvimbo yawo. suo retsime rakagadzirwa nasharuni mwanakomana wakori-hoze, mutongi wedunhu remizipa. akarivaka patsva ndokuisa denga namakonhi aro namabhaudhi uye akaisa nemazariro panzvimbo yawo. akagadzirazve rusvingo rwedziva resiroami, pabindu ramambo kusvikira pamatanho anoburukira kuguta radhavhidhi. akamutevera ndinehemia mwanakomana waazubhuki mutongi wehafu yedunhu rebheti zuri, akagadzira kusvikira panzvimbo yakatarisana nemakuva adhavhidhi kusvikira padziva nokuimba yemhare. varevhi vaiva pasi parehumi mwanakomana wabhani vakamutevera pakugadzira. parutivi pake, hashabhia, mutongi wehafu yedunhu rekeira, akaita mabasa okugadzira panzvimbo yedunhu rake. vaimutevera pakugadzira, vanhu venyika yavo vaiva pasi pabhinui mwanakomana wahenadhadhi, mutongi weimwe hafu yekeira. aimutevera ndiezeri mwanakomana wajeshua, mutongi wemizipa, akagadzira chimwe chikamu kubva pamukwidza wakatarisana neimba yezvombo zvehondo kusvikira pakona. bharuki mwanakomana wazabhai akamutevera, akagadzira chimwe chikamu nomwoyo wose kubva pakona zvichienda pamusuo weimba yaeriashibhi muprista mukuru. aimutevera, ndimeromoti mwanakomana wauria, mwanakomana wahakozi, akagadzira chimwe chikamu, kubva pamusuo weimba yaeriashibhi kusvikira painoguma. zvakagadzirwa mumashure make zvakaitwa navaprista vaibva mudunhu rakapoteredza. mumashure mavo, bhenjamini nahashubhi vakazogadzira mberi kweimba yavo; uye aivatevera, azaria mwanakomana wamaaseya, mwanakomana waanania, akagadzira parutivi peimba yake. aimutevera, bhinui mwanakomana wahanadhadhi akagadzira chimwe chikamu, kubva paimba yaazaria kusvikira pakona nokune imwezve kona, uye parari mwanakomana wauzia akashanda pakatarisana nepakona uye napashongwe inobuda ichibva kumuzinda wokumusoro pedyo noruvazhe rwavarindi. aimutevera, pedhaya mwanakomana waparoshi navashandi vomutemberi vaigara pamusoro pegomo reoferi vakagadzira kusvikira panzvimbo yakatarisana nesuo remvura kwakananga kumabvazuva uye napanobudikira neshongwe. vaivatevera, varume vetekoa vakagadzira chimwe chikamu, kubva panobuda shongwe huru kusvikira kurusvingo rweoferi. vaprista vakagadzira pamusoro pesuo ramabhiza, mumwe nomumwe pamberi peimba yake. aivatevera, zadhoki mwanakomana waimeri akagadzira pakatarisana neimba yake. aimutevera ndishemaya mwanakomana washekania, murindi wokusuo rokumabvazuva, ane zvaakagadzira. vaimutevera, hanania mwanakomana washeremia nahanuni, mwanakomana wechitanhatu wazarafu, ndivo vakagadzira chimwe chikamu. aimutevera, meshurami mwanakomana wabherekia akagadzira pakatarisana nepaaigara. mumashure make marikiya, mumwe wavapfuri vegoridhe, akagadzira kusvikira kuimba yavashandi vetemberi navatengesi, pakatarisana nesuo rokuongorora, uye kusvikira paimba iri pamusoro pekona; uye pakati peimba iri pamusoro pekona nesuo ramakwai, vapfuri vegoridhe navatengesi ndivo vakapagadzira.

4

zvino sanibharati paakanzwa kuti takanga tava kuvakazve rusvingo, akatsamwa uye akava nehasha kwazvo. akashora vayeahudha pamberi pehama dzake nehondo yesamaria, achiti, “ko, vayeahudha avo vasina simba vari kuiteiko? ko, vachavakazve rusvingo rwavo here? vachapa zvibayiro here? vachapedza nezuva rimwe chete here? ko, vangadzorera upenyu pamatombo ayo akaunganidzwa, akatsva sezvaakaita izvi here?” tobhia muamoni, aiva parutivi pake, akati, “chavari kuvaka ichi, kana dai gava raikwira pamusoro pacho, raitokoromora rusvingo rwavo rwamatombo!” haiwa, allah wedu, tinzwei, nokuti tiri kuzvidzwa. dzorerai kutuka kwavo pamusoro pavo. ngavave sevakapambwa munyika yenhapwa. musafukidza kuipa kwavo kana kudzima zvivi zvavo pamberi penyu, nokuti vakakusha mashoko okutuka pamberi pavavaki. saka takavakazve rusvingo kudzamara rwose rwasvika pahafu yokukwirira kwarwo, nokuti vanhu vaishanda nemwoyo yavo yose. asi sanibharati, tobhia, navaarabhu, navaamoni navarume veashidhodhi, vakati vanzwa kuti masvingo ejerusarema ari kugadzirwa, uye kuti makakoromoka maivakwa pakare, vakatsamwa kwazvo. vakarangana vose pamwe chete kuti vazorwa nejerusarema uye kuti varimutsire mhirizhonga. asi takanyengetera kuna allah wedu tikaisawo varindi masikati nousiku kuti vapedze dambudziko rokutyisidzira uku. zvichakadaro, vanhu vokwayeahudha vakati, “simba ravabati riri kupera, uye pachine mangwandangwanda akawanda zvokuti hatingakwanisi kuvakazve rusvingo.” uyezve vavengi vedu vakati, “vasati vazviziva kana kutiona, tichatenge tavapo pakati pavo uye tichavauraya tigoparadza basa ravo.” ipapo vayeahudha vakanga vagere pedyo navo vakauya vakatitaurira rune gumi vachiti, “kupi nokupi kwamuchaenda, vachauya kuzotirwisa.” naizvozvo ndakaisa vamwe vanhu seri kwenzvimbo dzakaderera dzorusvingo napanzvimbo dzakashama, ndichivaisa nemhuri dzavo, vane minondo yavo, namapfumo uye neuta. mushure mokunge ndatarisisa zvinhu izvi, ndakasimuka ndikati kuvakuru, navabati nokuruzhinji rwavanhu, “musavatya. rangarirai yeahoh, iye mukuru, anotyisa, uye murwire hama dzenyu, vanakomana venyu, navanasikana venyu, vakadzi venyu nemisha yenyu.” vavengi vedu pavakanzwa kuti takanga taziva rangano yavo uye kuti allah akanga aikonesa, tose takadzokera kurusvingo, mumwe nomumwe pabasa rake. kubva pazuva iro, zvichienda mberi hafu yavanhu vangu vakashanda basa, asi imwe hafu vakanga vakapakata mapfumo, nhoo, uta nenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo. vatariri vakamira mumashure mavanhu vose vokwayeahudha, vaivaka rusvingo. avo vaitakura zvokuvakisa vakaita basa ravo noruoko rumwe uye rumwe ruoko vakabata chombo chokurwisa, uye muvaki mumwe nomumwe akanga akapfeka munondo wake parutivi, uku achishanda. asi munhu airidza hwamanda aiva neni. ipapo ndakati kuvakuru, navatariri noruzhinji rwavanhu, “basa iguru iri uye rapararira, uye isu tanyanya kuparadzana mumwe kubva kuno mumwe takatevedza rusvingo. pose pamuchanzwa kurira kwehwamanda, muuye tibatane ikoko. allah wedu achatirwira.” saka takafambira mberi nebasa, hafu yavarume yakabata mapfumo, kubva mambakwedza kusvikira nyeredzi dzichibuda. panguva iyo ndakati kuvanhu, “murume mumwe nomumwe nomubatsiri wake ngaagare mukati mejerusarema panguva dzousiku, kuitira kuti vatibatsire kushanda savarindi usiku uyezve savashandi masikati.” zvino ini nehama dzangu kana vanhu vangu kana varindi vaiva neni hatina kubvisa nguo dzedu; mumwe nomumwe aiva nomunondo wake, kunyange paaienda kundonwa mvura.

5

zvino kwakava nokuchema kukuru kwavarume navakadzi vavo pamusoro pehama dzavo vayeahudha. nokuti vamwe vakati, “isu navanakomana navanasikana vedu tiri vazhinji; kuti tidye uye kuti tigorarama, tinofanira kuwana zviyo.” vamwe vaiti, “isu takaita minda yedu neminda yedu yemizambiringa uye nemisha yedu kuti zvive rubatso kuti tiwane zviyo panguva yenzara.” vamwezve vakati, “takatozokwereta mari kuti tiripe mutero wamambo weminda yedu neminda yemizambiringa. kunyange tiri venyama imwe uye tiri veropa rimwe savanhu venyika yedu, uye kunyange vanakomana vedu vakangofanana nevavo, takaguma taisa vanakomana vedu navanasikana vedu kuutapwa. vamwe vavanasikana vedu vakatotapwa kare, asi isu hatina simba, nokuti minda yedu neminda yemizambiringa yava yavamwe.” pandakanzwa kuchema kwavo kukuru nezvairehwa izvi, ndakatsamwa kwazvo. zvino ndakazvirangarira mupfungwa dzangu ipapo ndikatsiura vakuru navabati ndikati kwavari, “imi muri kureva mhindu kuvanhu venyika yenyu!” saka ndakavakoka kumusangano mukuru kuti ndivarayire uye ndikati, “napataigona napo takadzikinura hama dzedu dzechiyeahudha avo vakanga vatengeswa kune vedzimwe ndudzi. zvino imi mava kutengesa hama dzenyu, kuti dzigotengeswazve kwatiri here?” vakanyarara nokuti vakashayiwa chokutaura. saka ndakaenderera mberi ndikati, “zvamunoita hazvina kunaka. ko, hamaifanira kufamba mukutya allah wedu here kuti vavengi vedu vechihedheni varege kutishora. ini nehama dzangu uye navaranda vangu tiri kukweretesa vanhu mari nezviyo. asi izvo zvokureva mhindu ngazvigume! vadzorerei minda yavo nokukurumidza, neminda yavo yemizambiringa, neyemiorivhi, nedzimba dzavo uyewo nemhindu yamunoripisa, chikamu chimwe chete muzana chemari, zviyo, newaini itsva uye namafuta.” ivo vakati, “tichavadzorera. uye hatichazorevi chimwe chinhuzve kubva kwavari. tichaita sezvamareva.” ipapo ndakadana vaprista ndikaita kuti vakuru navabati vaite mhiko kuti vagoita sezvavakanga vavimbisa. ndakazunzawo mikombero yenguo yangu ndikati, “allah ngaazunze saizvozvi kubva muimba yake nemidziyo yake, mumwe nomumwe asingachengeti vimbiso iyi. naizvozvo, munhu akadai ngaazunzwe asare asina chinhu.” ipapo ungano yose yakati, “ameni,” uye vakarumbidza yeahoh. uye vanhu vakaita sezvavakanga vavimbisa. pamusoro pezvo, kubva pagore ramakumi maviri ramambo atazekisesi, pandakagadzwa somubati wavo munyika yayeahudha, kusvikira pagore rake ramakore makumi matatu namaviri, makore gumi namaviri, ini nehama dzangu hatina kudya zvokudya zvaipiwa kumubati. asi vabati vokutanga, avo vakanditangira, vairemedza vanhu uye vaitora kubva kwavari mashekeri makumi mana esirivha, pamusoro pezvo vachitorazve zvokudya newaini. kunyange vabatsiri vavo vairemedzawo vanhu. asi ini handina kuita izvozvo nokuti ndaitya allah. panzvimbo yaizvozvo, ndakazvipira kuita basa iri rorusvingo. varanda vangu vose vakanga vakaungana pabasa ipapo; hatina kutombotora minda ipi zvayo. pamusoro paizvozvo, vayeahudha zana namakumi mashanu navabati, pamwe chete navaheti vaibva kundudzi dzakatikomberedza, vaidya patafura yangu. zuva rimwe nerimwe ndaigadzirirwa nzombe imwe, makwai akaisvonaka matanhatu nehuku, uye pagumi roga ramazuva ndaipiwa waini zhinji dzemhando dzose. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, handina kumbokumbira zvokudya zvomubati, nokuti mitoro yakanga yakatakudzwa vanhu ava yairema kwazvo. haiwa allah wangu, ndirangarirei henyu nenyasha, nokuda kwezvose zvandakaitira vanhu ava.

6

shoko rakati rasvika kuna sanibharati, tobhia nageshemu muarabhu uye noruzhinji rwavavengi vedu kuti ndakanga ndavakazve rusvingo uye pakanga pasina chakanga chasara parwuri, kunyange panguva iyoyo ndakanga ndisati ndamisa makonhi pamasuo, sanibharati nageshemu vakatuma shoko kwandiri vachiti, “uya tisangane pano mumwe wemisha iri mubani reono.” asi vakanga vachironga kundiitira zvakaipa. saka ndakatuma nhume kwavari nemhinduro ndichiti, “ndine basa guru kwazvo randiri kuita, saka handigoni kuburukira kwamuri ikoko. basa ringamirireiko ini ndichirisiya ndichimbouya kwamuri?” vakatuma shoko rimwe chetero kwandiri runa rwose, asi ndakavapindura zvimwe chetezvo nguva dzose. zvino, sanibharati akatumazve muranda wake kwandiri kechishanu, neshoko rimwe chetero netsamba mumaoko ake yakanga isina kunamwa. yakanga yakanyorwa zvinoti: “pakati pamarudzi zvinotaurwa kuti, uye geshemu anotiwo ichokwadi, iwe navayeahudha muri kurangana kumukira mambo, ndokusaka muri kuvaka rusvingo. pamusoro pezvo, iwe wava kuda kuva mambo wavo sokutaurwa kwazvo. uye wakatogadza vaprofita kuti vataure pamusoro pako mujerusarema vachiti: ‘muyeahudha mava namambo!’ zvino nyaya iyi ichasvika kuna mambo, saka uya titaurirane.” ndakatumira mhinduro kwaari ndikati, “hapana chinhu chakaita sechauri kutaura chiri kuitika; ndiwe uri kungozvifunga mumusoro mako.” vose vaingoedza kutivhundutsira vachiti mumwoyo yavo, “maoko avo achaneta nebasa, uye harizoperi.” asi ndakanyengetera ndikati, “simbisai maoko angu zvino.” rimwe zuva ndakaenda kumba kwashemaya mwanakomana wadheraya, mwanakomana wamehetabheri, uyo akanga azvipfigira mumba make, iye akati, “ngatisangane mumba yaallah mukati metemberi tigopfiga mikova yetemberi, nokuti kuna varume vari kuuya kuzokuuraya, panguva dzousiku vari kuuya kuzokuuraya.” asi ini ndakati kwaari, “murume akaita seni angatiza here? uye munhu akaita seni angatizira mutemberi kuti aponese upenyu hwake here? handidi kuenda ini!” ndakaona kuti allah akanga asina kumutuma asi kuti aiprofita zvakaipa pamusoro pangu nokuti akanga atengwa natobhia nasanibharati. akanga atengwa kuti azondivhundutsira kuitira kuti ndiite chivi nokuita izvi, uye ipapo vagondipa zita rakaipa kuti vandisvibise. haiwa allah wangu, rangarirai henyu tobhia nasanibharati, nokuda kwezvavaita; rangariraiwo muprofitakadzi noadhia uye noruzhinji rwavaprofita avo vanga vachiedza kundivhundutsira. naizvozvo rusvingo rwakapera nezuva ramakumi maviri namashanu romwedzi waeruri, mumazuva makumi mashanu namaviri. vavengi vedu vose vakati vanzwa izvi, marudzi ose akatipoteredza akatya uye vakaora mwoyo, nokuti vakaona kuti basa iri rakanga raitwa norubatsiro rwaallah wedu. uyezve, mumazuva iwayo vakuru veyeahudha vaitumira matsamba akawanda kuna tobhia, uye mhinduro dzaibva kuna tobhia dzairamba dzichiuya kwavari. nokuti vazhinji muyeahudha vakanga vaita mhiko pasi pake, sezvo akanga ari mukuwasha kuna shekania mwanakomana waara, uye mwanakomana wake jehohanani akanga akawana mwanasikana wameshurami mwanakomana wabherekia. pamusoro paizvozvo, vairamba vachingondiudza mabasa ake akanaka uye ivo vachizomuudzawo zvandinenge ndataura. uye tobhia akatumira matsamba okundivhundutsira.

7

mushure mokunge rusvingo rwavakwa uye ndaisa makonhi panzvimbo dzawo, varindi vemikova, vaimbi navarevhi vakagadzwa. ndakagadza hanani hama yangu kuti ave mutariri wejerusarema nahanania kuti ave mukuru wepanhare, nokuti aiva munhu anokudzwa uye aitya allah kupinda zvingaitwa noruzhinji rwavanhu. ndakati kwavari, “masuo ejerusarema asazarurwa kusvikira zuva rava kupisa. panguva iyo vachengeti vamasuo vanenge vachiri pabasa, vaitei kuti vapfige makonhi vaise mazariro. uyezve mugadze vagari vomujerusarema savarindi; vamwe panzvimbo dzavo dzokurinda, vamwe pedyo nedzimba dzavo.” zvino guta rakanga rakakura uye rakapamhama asi maingova navanhu vashoma mariri, uye dzimba dzakanga dzisati dzavakwazve. saka allah akaisa mumwoyo mangu kuti ndiunganidze vakuru navabati uye navamwe vanhu vose kuti vanyoreswe nemhuri dzavo. ndakawana zvinyorwa zvemhuri dzaavo vakava vokutanga kudzokera. izvi ndizvo zvandakawana zvakanyorwamo: ava ndivo vanhu vedunhu vakabudiswa pautapwa vakatapwa nanebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi (vakadzokera kujerusarema nokuyeahudha, mumwe nomumwe kuguta rake, vari pamwe chete nazerubhabheri, jeshua, nehemia, azaria, naraamia, nahamani, modhekai, bhirishani, misipereti, bhigivhai, nehumi nabhaana): mazita avarume veisraeri: zvizvarwa zvaparoshi, zviuru zviviri nezana namakumi manomwe navaviri; zvashefatia, mazana matatu namakumi manomwe navaviri; zvaara, mazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu navaviri; zvapahati-moabhu (kubudikidza nokuna jeshua najoabhu), zviuru zviviri, namazana masere ane gumi navasere; zvaeramu, chiuru chimwe, china mazana maviri namakumi mashanu navana; zvazatu, mazana masere namakumi mana navashanu; zvazakai, mazana manomwe namakumi matanhatu; zvabhinui, mazana matanhatu namakumi mana navasere; zvabhebhai, mazana matanhatu namakumi maviri navasere; zvaazigadhi, zviuru zviviri mazana matatu namakumi maviri navaviri; zvaadhonikami, mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu navanomwe; zvabhigivhai, zviuru zviviri zvina makumi matanhatu navanomwe; zvaadhini, mazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu navashanu; zvaateri (kubudikidza nahezekia), makumi mapfumbamwe navasere; zvahashumi, mazana matatu namakumi maviri navasere; zvabhezai, mazana matatu namakumi maviri navana; zvaharifi, zana negumi navaviri; zvagibheoni, makumi mapfumbamwe navashanu. varume vebheterehema nenetofa, zana namakumi masere navasere; vokuanatoti, zana namakumi maviri navasere; vokubheti azimavheti, makumi mana navaviri; vokukiriati jearimi, kefira nebheeroti, mazana manomwe namakumi mana navatatu; vokurama negebha, mazana matanhatu namakumi maviri nomumwe chete; vokumikimashi, zana namakumi maviri navaviri; vokubheteri neai, zana namakumi maviri navatatu; vokune rimwe nebho; makumi mashanu navaviri; vokune rimwe eramu, chiuru mazana maviri namakumi mashanu navana; vokuharimu, mazana matatu ana makumi maviri; vokujeriko, mazana matatu namakumi mana navashanu; vokurodhi, hadhidhi neono, mazana manomwe namakumi maviri nomumwe chete; vokusenaa, zviuru zvitatu mazana mapfumbamwe namakumi matatu. vaprista: zvizvarwa zvajedhaya (kubudikidza nokumhuri yajeshua), mazana mapfumbamwe namakumi manomwe navatatu; zvaimeri, chiuru chimwe chete namakumi mashanu navaviri; zvapashuri, chiuru chimwe chete namazana maviri namakumi mana navanomwe; zvaharimu, chiuru chimwe chine gumi navanomwe. varevhi: zvizvarwa zvajeshua (kubudikidza nakadhimieri nokumhuri yahodhavhia), vaiva makumi manomwe navana. vaimbi: zvizvarwa zvaasafi, zana namakumi mana navasere. varindi vamasuo: zvizvarwa zvasherumi, ateri, tarimoni, akubhi, hatita, nashobhai, zana namakumi matatu navasere. vashandi vomutemberi: zvizvarwa zvaziha, hasufa, tabhoati, kerosi, sia, padhoni, rebhana, hagabha, sharimai, hanani, gidheri, gehari, reaya, rezini, nekodha, gazamu, uza, pesea, bhesai, meunimi, nefusimu, bhakuki, hakufa, harihuri, bhazuruti, mehidha, harisha, bharikosi, sisera, tema, nezia, nahatifa. zvizvarwa zvavaranda vasoromoni: zvizvarwa zva: sotai, sofereti, peridha, jaara, dharikoni, gidheri, shefatia, hatiri, pokereti-hazebhaimu naamoni. vashandi vomutemberi nezvizvarwa zvavaranda vasoromoni, mazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamwe navaviri. ava vanotevera vaibva kumaguta okuteri mera, teri harisha kerubhi, adhoni neimeri, asi vakanga vasingagoni kuratidza kuti zvizvarwa zvavo zvaibva mumhuri yaisraeri: zvizvarwa zvadheraya, zvatobhia nezvanekodha zvaiva mazana matanhatu namakumi mana navaviri. uye vaibva pakati pavaprista: zvizvarwa zvahobhaya, hakozi nabharizirai (murume akanga awana mwanasikana wabharizirai mugireadhi uye aidaidzwa nezita iroro). ava vakatsvaka zvinyorwa zvemhuri dzavo, asi vakazvishaya nokudaro vakabviswa kubva kuvaprista, savasina kuchena. naizvozvo mubati akavarayira kuti vasadya zvokudya zvipi zvazvo zvakanatswa kusvikira kwava nomuprista anoshumira neurimi netumimi. ungano yose yaiva navanhu zviuru makumi mana navaviri ane mazana matatu namakumi matanhatu, pasina varanda vavo navarandakadzi vavo vaisvika zviuru zvinomwe namazana matatu ana makumi matatu navanomwe; uye vaivazve navarume navakadzi vaiva vaimbi vaisvika mazana maviri namakumi mana navashanu. paiva namazana manomwe namakumi matatu namatanhatu amabhiza, uye manyurusi mazana maviri namakumi mana nemashanu, mazana mana namakumi matatu namashanu engamera uye zviuru zvitanhatu zvina mazana manomwe namakumi maviri zvembongoro. vamwe vakuru vemhuri vakabatsira pabasa. mubati akaisa madhirakema egoridhe chiuru muchivigiro chepfuma nemidziyo makumi mashanu nenhumbi dzavaprista mazana mashanu namakumi matatu. vamwe vakuru vemhuri vakaisa muchivigiro chepfuma zviuru makumi maviri zvamadhirakema egoridhe kuitira basa, mamina esirivha zviuru zviviri namazana maviri. uwandu hwezvakapiwa navanhu vose vose hwaiva zviuru makumi maviri zvamadhirakema egoridhe, nezviuru zviviri zvamamina esirivha, uye nenhumbi dzavaprista dzinosvika makumi matanhatu nenomwe. vaprista, varevhi, varindi vemikova, vaimbi navabati vomutemberi, pamwe chete navamwe pakati poruzhinji rwavaisraeri, vakandogara mumaguta avo.

8

zvino mwedzi wechinomwe wakati wasvika, uye vaisraeri vagara mumaguta avo, vanhu vose vakaungana vakaita somunhu mumwe pachivara chakatarisana nesuo remvura. vakakumbira ezira munyori kuti auye nebhuku romurayiro wamozisi, wakanga warayirwa nayeahoh kuvaisraeri. naizvozvo pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wechinomwe, ezira muprista akauya nomurayiro pamberi peungano, yaiva yavarume navakadzi navose vaigona kunzwisisa. akauverenga nenzwi guru kubva mangwanani kusvikira masikati, akatarisa chivara chaiva pamberi pesuo remvura, pamberi pavarume navakadzi navose vaigona kunzwisisa. uye vanhu vose vakateerera zvikuru kubhuku romurayiro. ezira munyori akamira panzvimbo yakakwirira yakanga yavakwa namatanda, yavakirwa izvozvo. kurutivi rwake rworudyi kwaiva kwakamira matitia, shema, anania, uria, hirikia namaaseya; uye kuruboshwe rwake kwaiva napedhaya, mishaeri, marikiya, hashumi, hashibhadhana, zekariyeah nameshurami. ezira akazarura bhuku. vanhu vose vaigona kumuona nokuti akanga akamira pakakwirira; uye paakarizarura, vanhu vose vakasimuka. ezira akarumbidza yeahoh, allah mukuru; uye vanhu vose vakasimudza maoko avo vakapindura vachiti, “ameni! ameni!” ipapo vakakotamira pasi vakanamata yeahoh zviso zvavo zvakatsikitsira pasi. varevhi vaiti: jeshua, bhani, sherebhia, jamini, akubhi, shabhetai, hodhia, maaseya, kerita, azaria, jozabhadhi, hanani naperaya vakadzidzisa vanhu murayiro vanhu vamire ipapo. vakaverenga kubva mubhuku romurayiro waallah, vachiisa pachena nokutsanangura zvazvaireva kuitira kuti vanhu vanzwisise zvaiverengwa. ipapo nehemia mubati, ezira, muprista nomunyori, navarevhi vairayira vanhu vakati kwavari vose, “zuva iri idzvene kuna yeahoh allah wenyu. musachema kana kuungudza.” nokuti vanhu vose vainge vachichema pavaiteerera kumashoko omurayiro. nehemia akati kwavari, “endai munodya nomufaro zvokudya zvamunoda nezvokunwa zvinotapira, mugotumirawo zvimwe kuna avo vasina chavakagadzirira. zuva ranhasi idzvene kuna ishe wedu. musazvidya mwoyo, nokuti mufaro wayeahoh ndiro simba renyu.” varevhi vakanyaradza vanhu vose vakati, “nyararai, nokuti iri izuva dzvene. musazvidya mwoyo.” ipapo vanhu vose vakabva vaenda kundodya nokunwa, nokutumira migove yezvokudya vachipembera nomufaro mukuru, nokuti vakanga vanzwisisa zvino mashoko avakanga vaudzwa. pazuva rechipiri romwedzi, vakuru vemhuri, pamwe chete navaprista navarevhi, vakaungana vakakomberedza ezira munyori kuti vateerere kumashoko omurayiro. vakawana zvakanga zvakanyorwa mumurayiro, zvakanga zvarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi, zvokuti vaisraeri vaizogara mumatumba panguva dzomutambo womwedzi wechinomwe. uye kuti vaifanira kuparidza shoko iri nokuriparadzira mumaguta avo ose nomujerusarema vachiti: “endai munyika yezvikomo muuye namapazi omuorivhi nemiti yemiorivhi yomusango, neomukonachando, nemichindwe nemiti yemimvuri, kuti muite matumba sezvazvakanyorwa.” naizvozvo vanhu vakabuda vakanouya namapazi vakazvivakira matumba pamusoro pamatenga avo, nomuminhanga yavo, nomumavazhe eimba yaallah uye napachivara pasuo remvura uye napasuo raefuremu. ungano yose yakanga yadzoka kuutapwa yakavaka matumba ikagaramo. kubva pamazuva ayeahoshua mwanakomana wanuni kusvikira pazuva iroro, vaisraeri havana kumbopemberera saizvozvi. uye mufaro wavo waiva mukuru kwazvo. zuva rimwe nerimwe, kubva pazuva rokutanga kusvikira pane rokupedzisira, ezira akaverenga kubva mubhuku romurayiro waallah. vakapemberera mutambo kwamazuva manomwe, uye pazuva rorusere, maererano nezvakanga zvarayirwa, pakava neungano ipapo.

9

pazuva ramakumi maviri namana romwedzi iwoyo, vaisraeri vakaungana pamwe chete, vachizvinyima zvokudya vakapfeka masaga uye vaine guruva pamisoro yavo. avo vaiva zvizvarwa zvavaisraeri vakazvitsaura kubva pakati pavatorwa vose. vakamira panzvimbo dzavo vakareurura zvivi zvavo nezvitadzo zvavo. vakamira pavakanga vari ndokuverenga kubva mubhuku romurayiro wayeahoh allah wavo kwechikamu chimwe chete muzvina chezuva, ndokupedzazve chimwe chikamu chimwe chete muzvina chezuva, vachireurura uye vachinamata yeahoh allah wavo. varevhi vaiti jeshua, bhani, kadhimieri, shebhania, bhuni, sherebhia, bhani nakenani, vakamira pakakwirira vakadanidzira nenzwi guru kuna yeahoh allah wavo. ipapo varevhi vaiti: jeshua, kadhimieri, bhani, hashabhineya, sherebhia, hodhia, shebhania napetahia vakati, “simukai murumbidze yeahoh allah wenyu, anogara nokusingaperi-peri.” “zita renyu rinobwinya ngariropafadzwe pamusoro pamakomborero nerumbidzo dzose. imi moga ndimi yeahoh. makaita moga matenga, kunyange nokudenga denga, uye nenyeredzi zhinji dzose, nyika nezvose zviri pamusoro payo, makungwa nezvose zviri maari. munopa upenyu kuzvinhu zvose, uye zvose zviri kudenga zvinokunamatai. “ndimi yeahoh allah, makasarudza abhurahama mukamubudisa kubva munyika yeuri yavakaradhea mukamutumidza kuti abhurahama. makawana mwoyo wake wakatendeka kwamuri, uye makaita sungano naye kuti mupe kuzvizvarwa zvake nyika yavakenani, vahiti, vaamori, vaperezi, vajebhusi navagirigashi. makachengeta vimbiso yenyu nokuti makarurama. “makaona kutambudzika kwamadzitateguru edu muijipiti; mukanzwa kuchema kwavo pagungwa dzvuku. makatuma zviratidzo nezvishamiso kuna faro, navabati vake uye navanhu vose venyika yake, nokuti maiziva kuti vaijipita vaizvikudza sei pamabatiro avakavaita. makaitira zita renyu mukurumbira uripo nanhasi. makapamura gungwa pamberi pavo, naizvozvo vakayambuka napasi pakaoma, asi makamedza vaivatevera kwakadzika, sedombo mumvura ine simba. makavatungamirira neshongwe yegore masikati mukavatungamirira usiku neshongwe yomoto kuti vavhenekerwe munzira yavaizofamba nayo. “makaburuka pagomo resinai, mukataura navo kubva kudenga. makavapa mitemo nemirayiro yakarurama neyakanaka, uye mitemo nezvakarayirwa zvakanaka. makavazivisa sabata renyu dzvene mukavapa zvamakarayira, mitemo nemirayiro kubudikidza nomuranda wenyu mozisi. vari pakati penzara makavapa chingwa chaibva kudenga, uye pavakanzwa nyota makavapa mvura yakabva padombo; makavaudza kuti vapinde kundotora nyika yamakanga mapika noruoko rwakasimudzwa kuti muvape. “asi ivo madzitateguru edu, vakava namanyawi uye nemitsipa mikukutu, vakasateerera zvamakavarayira. vakaramba kuteerera uye vakasarangarira zvishamiso zvamakaita pakati pavo. vakava nemitsipa mikukutu uye pakumukira kwavo vakagadza mutungamiri kuti vadzokere kuutapwa hwavo. asi imi muri allah anokanganwira, ane nyasha nengoni, anononoka kutsamwa uye azere norudo. naizvozvo hamuna kuvasiya, kunyange zvavo vakazviitira chifananidzo chemhuru vachiti, ‘uyu ndiye mwari wenyu, akakubudisai kubva muijipiti,’ kana pavakamhura zvinonyangadza kwazvo. “nokuda kwengoni dzenyu huru hamuna kuvasiya mugwenga. shongwe yegore haina kurega kuvatungamirira masikati panzira yavo, shongwe yomoto haina kurega kuvavhenekera usiku panzira yavaifanira kufamba nayo. makavapa mweya wenyu wakanaka kuti uvarayire. hamuna kuvanyima mana yenyu, uye panyota yavo makavapa mvura. makavararamisa kwamakore makumi mana mugwenga; havana chavakashayiwa, nguo dzavo hadzina kubvaruka uye makumbo avo haana kuzvimba. “makavapa ushe nendudzi, mukavapa nyika yose kusvika kumagumo ayo. vakatora nyika yasihoni mambo weheshibhoni nenyika yaogi mambo webhashani. makaita kuti vana vavo vawande senyeredzi dziri mudenga, mukavauyisa kunyika yamakaudza madzibaba avo kuti vapinde vaitore. vanakomana vavo vakapinda vakatora nyika. makakunda vakenani pamberi pavo, vaigara munyika iyo; makapa vakenani kwavari, pamwe chete namadzimambo avo uye navanhu vomunyika, kuti vaite zvavanoda navo. vakapamba maguta akakombwa nenyika ine ivhu rakanaka, vakatora dzimba dzakanga dzakazara nemhando dzose dzezvinhu zvakanaka, matsime akacherwa kare, minda yemizambiringa, minda yemiorivhi nemiti yemichero yakawanda. vakadya vakaguta vakava vakagwinya kwazvo; vakafara muukuru hwokunaka kwenyu. “asi havana kuteerera uye vakakumukirai; vakafuratira murayiro wenyu. vakauraya vaprofita venyu, vaivarayira kuti vadzokere kwamuri; vakamhura zvainyadza kwazvo. naizvozvo makavaisa kuvavengi vavo, avo vakavadzvinyirira. asi pavakanga vava kudzvinyirirwa vakachema kwamuri. makavanzwa muri kudenga, uye nengoni dzenyu huru makavapa vadzikinuri, vakavarwira kubva mumaoko avavengi vavo. “asi pavakangowana zororo, vakaitazve zvakaipa pamberi penyu. ipapo makavasiya mumaoko avavengi vavo kuti vavatonge. zvino vakati vachemazve kwamuri, makavanzwa muri kudenga, nengoni dzenyu mukavarwira nguva nenguva. “makavayambira kuti vadzokere kumurayiro wenyu, asi ivo vakazvikudza vakasateerera kurayira kwenyu. vakatadza pane zvemirayiro, izvo zvinoraramisa munhu kana akazviteerera. nokusindimara kwavo vakakufuratirai, vakaomesa mitsipa yavo uye vakaramba kuteerera. makava nomwoyo murefu navo kwamakore mazhinji. makavayambira nomweya wenyu kubudikidza navaprofita venyu. kunyange zvakadaro havana kuita hanya, saka makavapa kuvanhu vavakavakidzana navo. asi netsitsi dzenyu huru hamuna kuvaparadza kana kuvarasa, nokuti muri allah ane nyasha netsitsi. “naizvozvo zvino, imi allah wedu, mukuru, ane simba, uye allah anotyisa, anochengeta sungano yake yorudo, matambudziko aya ose ngaarege kuva madiki pamberi penyu, matambudziko akauya pamusoro pedu, napamusoro pamadzimambo edu navatungamiri, napamusoro pavaprista vedu navaprofita, pamusoro pamadzibaba edu navanhu vose, kubva pamazuva amadzimambo avaasiria kusvikira nhasi. pane zvakaitika kwatiri, imi makanga makarurama; makanga makatendeka, asi isu takaita zvakaipa. madzimambo edu, vatungamiri vedu, vaprista vedu namadzibaba edu havana kutevera murayiro wenyu; havana kuita hanya nokurayira kwenyu kana yambiro dzamakavapa. kunyange pavakanga vachibata ushe hwavo, vachifarira kunaka kwenyu kukuru kwavari munyika yamakavapa, munyika yakakura uye ine ivhu rakanaka, havana kukushumirai kana kusiya nzira dzavo dzakaipa. “asi tarirai, tava nhapwa nhasi, nhapwa munyika yamakapa madzitateguru edu kuti vadye zvibereko zvayo uye nezvimwe zvakanaka zvainobereka. nokuda kwezvivi zvedu zvibereko zvayo zvizhinji zvava kuenda kumadzimambo amakaisa pamusoro pedu. vane simba pamusoro pemiviri yedu uye vanoita zvavanoda nemombe dzedu. tiri pakutambudzika kukuru. “nokuda kwezvose izvi, tiri kuita chitenderano chakasimba, tichichinyora, vatungamiri vedu, uye varevhi vedu navaprista vedu vachaisa chisimbiso chavo pachiri.”

10

zvino avo vakaisa chisimbiso ndeava: nehemia mubati, mwanakomana wahakaria, zedhekia, seraya, azaria, jeremia, pashuri, amaria, marikia, hakushi, shebhania, maruki, harimu, meremoti, obhadhia, dhanieri, ginetoni, bharuki, meshurami, abhija, mijamini, maazia, bharigai nashemaya. ava ndivo vaiva vaprista. varevhi vaiti: jeshua mwanakomana waazania, bhinui wokuvanakomana vahenadhadhi, kadhimieri, nehama dzavo: shebhania, hodhia, kerita, peraya, hanani, mika, rehobhi, hashabhia, zakuri, nasherebhia, shebhania, hodhia, bhani nabheninu. vatungamiri vavanhu vaiva ava: paroshi, pahati-moabhu, eramu, zatu, bhani, bhuni, azigadhi, bhebhai, adhoniya, bhigivhai, hadhini, ateri, hezekia, azuri, hodhia, hashumi, bhezai, harifi, anatoti, nebhai, magipiashi, meshurami, heziri, meshezabheri, zadhoki, jadhua, peratia, hanani, anaya hoshea, hanania, hashubhi, harosheshi, piriha, shobheki, rehumi, hashabhina, maaseya, ahia, hanani, anani, maruki, harimi nabhaana. “uye vamwe vanhu vose, vaiti vaprista, varevhi, vachengeti vemikova, vaimbi, vashandi vomutemberi, navose vakazvitsaura kubva kuvanhu vakavakidzana navo, nokuda kwomurayiro waallah, pamwe chete navakadzi vavo, navanakomana vavo vose navanasikana vavo vose vaigona kunzwisisa. zvino ava vose vakabatana pamwe chete nehama dzavo ivo vakuru, uye vakazvisunga nechituko nemhiko kuti vatevere murayiro waallah wakapiwa kubudikidza namozisi muranda waallah uye kuti vachenjerere kuteerera zvose zvakarayirwa, nezvakatemwa uye nemitemo yayeahoh ishe wedu. “tinovimbisa kuti hatizopa vanasikana vedu kuti vawanikwe navanhu vakatipoteredza kana kutorera vanakomana vedu vanasikana vavo. “kana vanhu vatakavakidzana navo vakauya nezvokutengesa kana zviyo kuzotitengesera nesabata, hatizovatengeri nomusi wesabata kana pazuva ripi zvaro dzvene. pagore rechinomwe roga roga ticharegedza kushanda muminda uye tichadzima zvikwereti zvose. “tinozvipira kuita zvakarayirwa kuti tipe chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu cheshekeri gore negore kushumiro yeimba yaallah wedu: kuchingwa chakaiswa patafura, kuzvipiriso zvenguva nenguva zvezviyo, nezvipiriso zvinopiswa nomoto, kuzvipiriso zvinopiwa pamasabata nokumitambo yokugara kwomwedzi uye nokumitambo yakatarwa, kuzvipiriso zvitsvene; kuzvipiriso zvechivi zvokuyananisira israeri, nokumabasa ose omuimba yaallah. “isu vaprista, navarevhi uye navanhu, takanda mijenya kuti tione kuti mhuri imwe neimwe yedu inouya rini kuimba yayeahoh allah wedu, nechipo chehuni dzinopiswa paaritari yayeahoh allah wedu, panguva yakatarwa, gore negore, sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro. “tazvipirazve pabasa rokuuya kuimba yayeahoh nezvibereko zvokutanga zvezviyo nezvemiti yemichero yose gore negore. “tichauya namatangwe avanakomana vedu neemombe dzedu, neezvipfuwo zvedu neemakwai edu kuimba yaallah wedu, nokuvaprista vanoshumira imomo, sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro. “pamusoro pezvo, tichauyisa kumatura eimba yaallah wedu, nokuvaprista, zvibereko zvokutanga zvevhu, zvipiriso zvedu zvezviyo, nezvemiti yose yemichero nezvewaini yedu itsva uye namafuta. uye tichauyisa chegumi chezviyo zvedu kuvarevhi, nokuti varevhi ndivo vanounganidza zvegumi mumaguta ose atinoshanda. muprista worudzi rwaaroni anofanira kuenda navarevhi pavanogamuchira zvegumi, uye varevhi vanofanira kuuya nechegumi chezvegumi kuimba yaallah wedu, kumatura eimba yepfuma. vanhu vaisraeri pamwe chete navarevhi, vanofanira kuuya nezvipo zvavo zvezviyo, newaini itsva uye namafuta kumatura kunochengeterwa midziyo yose yenzvimbo tsvene, uye kunogara vaprista vanoshumira, navarindi vemikova navaimbi. “hatizoshayiri hanya imba yaallah wedu.”

11

zvino vatungamiri vavanhu vakagara mujerusarema, uye vamwe vanhu vose vakakanda mijenya kuti vasarudze mumwe chete kubva mugumi roga roga kuti andogara mujerusarema, guta dzvene, kwozoti vapfumbamwe vanenge vasara vachizogara mumaguta avo pachavo. vanhu vakarumbidza varume vose vakanga vazvipira kugara mujerusarema. ava ndivo vakuru vamatunhu vakandogara mujerusarema (zvino vamwe vavaisraeri, vaprista, varevhi, vashandi vomutemberi nezvizvarwa zvavaranda vasoromoni vakagara mumaguta ayeahudha, mumwe nomumwe panzvimbo yake mumaguta akasiyana-siyana, kwozoti vamwe vanhu vaiva vokwayeahudha nokwabhenjamini vakagara mujerusarema): vaibva kuzvizvarwa zvayeahudha vaiti: ataya mwanakomana wauzia, mwanakomana wazekariyeah, mwanakomana waamaria, mwanakomana washefatia, mwanakomana wamaharareri, chizvarwa chaperezi; namaaseya mwanakomana wabharuki, mwanakomana wakori-hoze, mwanakomana wahazaya, mwanakomana waadhaya, mwanakomana wajoyaribhi, mwanakomana wazekariyeah, chizvarwa chashera. zvizvarwa zvaperezi avo vaigara mujerusarema vaiva mazana mana namakumi matanhatu navasere vaiva varume voumhare. vaibva kuzvizvarwa zvabhenjamini vaiti: saru mwanakomana wameshurami, mwanakomana wajoedhi, mwanakomana wapedhaya, mwanakomana wakoraya, mwanakomana wamaaseya, mwanakomana waitieri, mwanakomana wajeshaya, nevaimutevera vaiti gabhai nasarai, vaiva varume vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe namakumi maviri navasere. joere mwanakomana wazikiri akanga ari mukuru wavo, uye yeahudha mwanakomana wahasenua, aiva pamusoro pedunhu rechipiri reguta. vaibva kuvaprista ndeava: jedhaya mwanakomana wajoyaribhi najakini; seraya mwanakomana wahirikia, mwanakomana wameshurami, mwanakomana wazadhoki, mwanakomana wamerayoti, mwanakomana waahitubhi, mutariri weimba yaallah, nehama dzavo, avo vakaenderera mberi nebasa retemberi, vaiva varume vana mazana masere namakumi maviri navaviri; naadhaya mwanakomana wajerohamu, mwanakomana waperaria, mwanakomana waamuzi, mwanakomana wazekariyeah, mwanakomana wapashuri, mwanakomana wamarikiya, nehama dzake vaiva vakuru vedzimba, varume mazana maviri namakumi mana navaviri; naamashisai mwanakomana waimeri, nehama dzake, vaiva varume voumhare, zana namakumi maviri navasere. mutariri wavo mukuru aiva zadhidhieri mwanakomana wahagedhorimi. vaibva kuvarevhi ndeava: shemaya mwanakomana wahashubhi, mwanakomana waazirikami, mwanakomana wahashabhia, mwanakomana wabhuni; shabhetai najozabhadhi, vari vaviri vaiva vakuru vavarevhi, vari vatariri vamabasa okunze kweimba yaallah; matania mwanakomana wamika, mwanakomana wazabhidhi, mwanakomana waasafi, mukuru aitungamirira pakuvonga nokunyengetera; bhakubhukia, aiva wechipiri paukuru pakati pehama dzake; naabhudha mwanakomana washamua, mwanakomana wagarari, mwanakomana wajedhutuni. varevhi vaiva muguta dzvene vaisvika mazana maviri namakumi masere navana. vachengeti vamasuo: akubhi, natarimoni nehama dzavo, ndivo vaichengeta masuo, varume vaisvika zana namakumi manomwe navaviri. vamwe vaisraeri vose, navaprista navarevhi, vaiva mumaguta ose eyeahudha, mumwe nomumwe panhaka yake. vashandi vomutemberi vaigara pamusoro pegomo reoferi, uye ziha nagishipa ndivo vaiva vatungamiri vavo. mutariri mukuru wavarevhi mujerusarema aiva uzi mwanakomana wabhani, mwanakomana wahashabhia, mwanakomana wamatania, mwanakomana wamika. uzi aiva mumwe wezvizvarwa zvaasafi, vaiva vaimbi vari vabati veshumiro yeimba yaallah. vaimbi vaiva pasi pomutemo wamambo, waivataurira zvokuita zuva nezuva. petahia mwanakomana wameshezabheri, mumwe wezvizvarwa zvazera mwanakomana wayeahudha, aiva mubati wamambo panyaya dzose dzavanhu. kana iri misha neminda yavo, vanhu vokwayeahudha vakagara mukiriati abha namaruwa akaripoteredza, mudhibhoni namaruwa aro, mujekabhizeri nemisha yaro, mujeshua, mumoradha, nomubheti pereti, nomuhazari shuari, nomubheerishebha namaruwa aro, nomuzikiragi, nomumekona namaruwa aro, mueni rimoni, nomuzora, nomujarimuti, zanoa, neadhurami nemisha yawo, murakishi neminda yaro, nomuazeka namaruwa aro. naizvozvo vakanga vagere munzvimbo yose kubheerishebha kusvikira kumupata wehinomi. zvizvarwa zvabhenjamini zvaibva kugebha zvakagara mumikimashi, neaija nebheteri namaruwa acho, muanatoti, nenobhi neanania, muhazori, nerama negitaimi, muhadhidhi, zebhoimi nenebharati, murodhi neono, nomumupata wemhizha. mamwe mapoka avarevhi vokwayeahudha akandogara mubhenjamini.

12

zvino ava ndivo vaprista navarevhi vakadzokera nazerubhabheri, mwanakomana washearitieri najeshua: seraya, jeremia, naezira, amaria, maruki, hatushi, shekania, rehumi, meremoti, idho, ginetoni, abhija, mijamini moadhia, bhiriga, shemia, joirabhi, najedhaya. saru, amoki, hirikia najedhaya. ava ndivo vaiva vatungamiri vavaprista pamwe chete nehama dzavo pamazuva ajeshua. varevhi vaiti: jeshua, bhinui, kadhimieri, sherebhia, yeahudha, uyewo namatania pamwe chete nehama dzake, aiva mukuru wenziyo dzokuvonga. bhakibhukia nauni, nehama dzavo, vakamira vakatarisana navo mushumiro. jeshua aiva baba vajoyakimu, joyakimu aiva baba vaeriashibhi, eriashibhi ari baba vajoyadha, joyadha baba vajonatani, uye jonatani baba vajadhua. ava ndivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzavaprista, pamazuva ajoyakimu: wokwaseraya, aiva meraya; wokwajeremia, aiva hanania; wokwaezira, aiva meshurami; wokwaamaria, aiva jehohanani; wokwamaruki, aiva jonatani; wokwashekania, aiva yosefa; wokwaharimu, aiva adhina; wokwameremoti, aiva herikai; wokwaidho, aiva zekariyeah; wokwaginetoni aiva meshurami; wokwaabhija, aiva zikiri; wokwaminiamini, newokwamoadhia, aiva piritai; wokwabhiriga aiva shamia; wokwashemaya aiva jehonatani; wokwajoyaribhi aiva matenai; wokwajedhaya, aiva uzi; wokwasaru, aiva karai; wokwaamoki, aiva ebheri; wokwahirikia, aiva hashabhia; wokwajedhaya, aiva netaneri. vakuru vedzimba dzavarevhi mumazuva aeriashibhi, joyadha, johanani najadhua, pamwe chete neavo vaiva vevaprista, vakanyorwa mazita avo pamazuva okutonga kwadhariasi mupezhia. vakuru vedzimba pakati pezvizvarwa zvarevhi kusvikira panguva yajohanani mwanakomana waeriashibhi vakanyorwa mumabhuku enhoroondo. zvino vatungamiri vavarevhi vaiva hashabhia, sherebhia najeshua, mwanakomana wakadhimieri, nehama dzavo avo vaimira vakatarisana vachipa rumbidzo nokuvonga, uye vachiita madzoro sezvazvakanga zvarayirwa nadhavhidhi munhu waallah. matania bhakibhukia, dhadhia, meshurami, taramani, naakubhi vakanga vari varindi vemikova namatura. vakashumira pamazuva ajehoyakimi mwanakomana wajeshua, mwanakomana wajozadhaki, nomumazuva anehemia mubati naezira muprista nomunyori. zvino pakukumikidzwa kworusvingo rwejerusarema, varevhi vakatsvakwa kwavaigara vakauyiswa kujerusarema kuzopemberera kukumikidzwa uku nomufaro, nenziyo dzokuvonga, uye nokuimba, vachiridza makandira, mitengeranwa nembira. vaimbi vakaunganidzwa pamwe chete kubva kumatunhu akapoteredza jerusarema, nokumisha yavanetofati; nokubheti girigari uye kubva munzvimbo yegebha neazimavheti, nokuti vaimbi vakanga vazvivakira misha vakapoteredza jerusarema. zvino vaprista navarevhi vakati vazvinatsa, vakanatsawo vanhu, mikova norusvingo. ipapo ndakakwidza vatungamiri vavayeahudha pamusoro porusvingo. ndakarayirawo mapoka makuru maviri avaimbi kuti vavonge vachifamba mumudungwe. rimwe boka rakafamba pamusoro porusvingo kurudyi, rakananga kumukova wendove. hoshaya nehafu yavatungamiri vayeahudha vakavatevera, pamwe chete naazaria, ezira, mesharami, yeahudha, bhenjamini, shemaya, najeremia, pamwe chete navamwe vaprista vaiva nehwamanda, uyewo nazekariyeah mwanakomana wajonatani, mwanakomana washemaya, mwanakomana wamatania, mwanakomana wamikaya, mwanakomana wazakuri, mwanakomana waasafi, nehama dzake vanashemaya, azareri, mirarai, girarai, maai, nataneri, yeahudha nahanani nemidziyo yokuimbisa yakarayirwa nadhavhidhi munhu waallah. ezira munyori akavatungamirira ari pamberi. vakafamba napasuo retsime vakarurama kumatanho eguta radhavhidhi napamukwidza wokurusvingo uye vakapfuura napamusoro peimba yadhavhidhi vakananga kusuo remvura kumabvazuva. rimwe boka ravaivonga rakaenda kuruboshwe. ini ndakavatevera pamwe chete nehafu yavanhu ndiri pamusoro porusvingo, ndikapfuura napashongwe yechoto kusvikira kurusvingo rwakapamhama, napamusoro pesuo raefuremu, suo rekare, suo rehove, shongwe yahananeri napashongwe yezana, kusvikira pasuo ramakwai. vakamira pasuo ravarindi. naizvozvo mapoka maviri avavongi akamira muimba yaallah, neni ndikaita saizvozvo, pamwe chete nehafu yavabati, navapristawo, vanaeriakimi, maaseya, miniamini, mikaya, erioenai, zekariyeah nahanania, nehwamanda dzavo, uyewo maaseya, shemaya, ereazari, uzi jehonani, marikiya, eramu naezeri. vaimbi vakaimba vachitungamirirwa najezirahia. pazuva iro vakabayira zvibayiro zvikuru, vachifara nokuti allah akanga avapa mufaro mukuru. vakadzi navana vakafarawo. maungira omufaro waiva mujerusarema akanzwika kure kwazvo. panguva iyoyo varume vakagadzwa kuva vatariri vamatura okuvigira zvaiunganidzwa, uye zvibereko zvokutanga nezvegumi. vaifanira kuuya nezvaibva muminda yakapoteredza maguta kumatura okuvigira migove yakatarirwa vaprista navarevhi nomurayiro, nokuti yeahudha yakafadzwa navaprista navarevhi vaishumira. vakaita shumiro yaallah wavo neshumiro yokunatswa, pamwe chete navaimbi navachengeti vamasuo, sezvazvakanga zvarayirwa nadhavhidhi nomwanakomana wake soromoni. nokuti kare kare, mumazuva adhavhidhi naasafi, kwaiva navatungamiri vavaimbi nezvenziyo dzokurumbidza nokuvonga allah. saka mumazuva azerubhabheri nanehemia, vaisraeri vose vaipa migove yezuva nezuva kuvaimbi navachengeti vamasuo. vakatsaurawo mugove wavamwe varevhi, uye varevhi vaitsaurawo mugove wezvizvarwa zvaaroni.

13

pazuva iroro bhuku ramozisi rakaverengwa nenzwi guru vanhu vachizvinzwa uye zvakawanikwa zvakanyorwa kuti muamoni nomumoabhu havabvumirwi kupinda muungano yaallah, nokuti havana kundosangana navaisraeri nezvokudya nemvura asi vakaripira bharamu kuti avatuke. kunyange zvakadaro, allah wedu, akashandura kutuka kukava ropafadzo. vanhu vakati vanzwa murayiro uyu, vakabvisa vose vakanga vari vatorwa pakuberekwa. zvino zvisati zvaitika izvi, eriashibhi muprista akanga agadzwa kuti ave mutariri wamatura okuvigira eimba yaallah wedu. akanga ane ukama hwepedyo natobhia, uye akanga amugadzirira kamuri guru raimbochengeterwa zvipiriso zvezviyo nezvinonhuhwira uye midziyo yetemberi, nezvegumi zvezviyo, waini itsva namafuta akarayirwa kuti apiwe varevhi, vaimbi navachengeti vamasuo, uyewo nemigove yavaprista. asi pazvaiitika zvose izvi, ndakanga ndisiri mujerusarema, nokuti mugore ramakumi matatu namaviri raatazekisesi mambo webhabhironi ndakanga ndadzokera kuna mambo. mushure menguva yakati kuti ndakakumbira mvumo ndokudzokera kujerusarema. ipapo ndakanzwa pamusoro pechinhu chakaipa chakanga chaitwa naeriashibhi chokuti akagadzirira tobhia kamuri muruvazhe rweimba yaallah. ndakashatirwa zvikuru ndokurasira kunze kwemba, midziyo yose yatobhia. ndakarayira kuti makamuri acheneswe, ndokubva ndadzorera imomo midziyo yose yeimba yaallah, pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvezviyo nezvinonhuhwira. ndakaonawo kuti varevhi vakanga vasina kupiwa migove yavo, uye kuti varevhi vose navaimbi vaiva nebasa rokushumira vakanga vadzokera kuminda yavo. saka ndakatsiura vabati ndikavabvunza ndikati, “imba yaallah yashayirwa hanya neiko?” ipapo ndakavaunganidza pamwe chete ndikavadzosera kunzvimbo dzavo. vayeahudha vose vakauya nezvegumi zvezviyo, newaini itsva namafuta vakazviisa mumatura. ndakaisa sheremia muprista, zadhoki munyori, nomurevhi ainzi pedhaya kuti vave vatariri vamatura uye ndikaita kuti hanania, mwanakomana wazakuri, mwanakomana wamatania, ave mubatsiri wavo, nokuti varume ava vakaonekwa kuti vaiva vakavimbika. vaiva nebasa rokugovera hama dzavo migove yavo. haiwa allah wangu, ndirangarireiwo nokuda kwaizvozvi, uye musadzima zvandakaita nokutendeka kuimba yaallah wangu, neshumiro yayo. mumazuva iwayo ndakaona varume muyeahudha vachitsika zvisviniro zvewaini nomusi wesabata vachiuya nezviyo vachizvikwidza pambongoro, pamwe chete newaini, mazambiringa, maonde namarudzi ose emitoro. vaiuya nezvinhu zvose izvi mujerusarema nomusi wesabata. naizvozvo ndakavayambira kuti vasatengesa zvokudya pazuva iroro. varume vaibva kutire vaigara mujerusarema vaiuya nehove nemhando dzose dzezvokutengesa vachizvitengesa mujerusarema kuvanhu veyeahudha nomusi wesabata. ndakatsiura vakuru veyeahudha ndikati kwavari, “chiiko ichi chinhu chakaipa chamunoita muchizvidza zuva resabata? ko, madzitateguru enyu haana kuita zvimwe chetezvo here, zvokuti allah wedu akazouyisa dambudziko iri pamusoro pedu napamusoro peguta rino? zvino muri kumutsa hasha dzakawanda pamusoro paisraeri nokuzvidza sabata.” zvino mimvuri yezuva rovira yakati yafukidza masuo ejerusarema, sabata risati rasvika, ndakarayira kuti mikova ipfigwe uye kuti isazarurwa kusvikira sabata rapfuura. ndakaisa vamwe vavaranda vangu pamasuo kuti kurege kuva nomutoro ungauyiswa mukati nomusi wesabata. naizvozvo kamwe chete kana kaviri, vashambadziri navatengesi vemhando dzose vakarara usiku hwose kunze kwejerusarema. asi ndakavayambira ndikati, “seiko muchirara usiku hwose parusvingo? kana mukazviitazve, ndichakusungai.” kubva panguva iyoyo zvichienda mberi havana kuzouyazve nomusi wesabata. ipapo ndakarayira varevhi kuti vazvinatse uye kuti vaende kundorinda masuo kuitira kuti zuva resabata richengetwe riri dzvene. haiwa allah wangu, ndirangarireiwo pachinhu ichi, allah wangu, mugoratidza tsitsi kwandiri maererano norudo rwenyu rukuru. pamusoro pezvo, mumazuva iwayo, ndakaona varume vokwayeahudha vakanga vawana vakadzi vaibva kuashidhodhi, neamoni nemoabhu. hafu yavana vavo vaitaura mutauro wechiashidhodhi kana mutauro mumwewo wavamwe vanhu, uye vakanga vasingazivi mutauro wechiyeahudha. ndakavatsiura ndikavatuka. ndakarova vamwe varume uye ndikadzura bvudzi ravo. ndakaita kuti vapike nezita raallah uye ndikati kwavari, “hamufaniri kupa vanasikana venyu kuti vawanikwe navanakomana vavo, kana kuzvitorera imi. ko, soromoni mambo weisraeri haana kutadza here nokuda kwavakadzi vakadai? pakati pendudzi zhinji hapana kumbova namambo akaita saye. aidikanwa naallah wake, uye allah akamuita mambo pamusoro pavaisraeri vose, asi kunyange zvakadaro akapinzwa muchivi navakadzi vatorwa. ko, isu zvino tingazvinzwawo here kuti nemiwo zvakare muri kuita zvinhu zvakaipa kudai uye kuti hamuna kutendeka kuna allah wedu, muchiwana vakadzi vatorwa?” mumwe wavanakomana vajoyadha mwanakomana waeriashibhi muprista mukuru akanga ari mukuwasha wasanibharati muhoroni. zvino ndakamudzingira kure neni. haiwa allah wangu, varangarirei nokuti vakasvibisa basa rouprista uye nesungano youprista neyavarevhi. saka ndakanatsa vaprista navarevhi pazvinhu zvose zvavatorwa, ndikavapa madzoro avo, mumwe nomumwe pabasa rake. ndakapawo zvipo zvehuni panguva dzakatarwa nezvezvibereko zvokutanga. mundirangarirewo, allah wangu, mundiitire zvakanaka.

1_chronicles

1

adhamu, seti, enoshi, kenani, maharareri, jaredhi, inoki, metusera, rameki, noa. vanakomana vanoa vaiva: shemu, hamu, najafeti. vanakomana vajafeti vaiva: gomeri, magogi, madhai, javhani, tubhari, mesheki natirasi. vanakomana vagomeri vaiva: ashikenazi, rifati natogarima. vanakomana vajavhani vaiva: erisha, tashishi, kitimi narodhanimi. vanakomana vahamu vaiva: kushi, miziraimi, puti nakenani. vanakomana vakushi vaiva: sebha, havhira, sabata, raama nasabhiteka. vanakomana varaama vaiva: shebha nadedhani. kushi aiva baba vanimurodhi; uyo akakura akava murwi mukuru panyika. miziraimi aiva baba vavarudhi, vaanami, varehabhi, vanafutuhi, vapatiri, vakasiruhi (umo makazobvawo vafiristia) navakafitori. kenani aiva baba vasidhoni dangwe rake, nevahiti, vajebhusi vaamori, vagirigashi, vahivhi, vaariki, vasini, vaarivhadhi, vazemari nevahamati. vanakomana vashemu vaiva: eramu, ashua, arifakisadhi, rudhi naaramu. vanakomana vaaramu vaiva: uzi, huri, geteri namesheki. arifakisadhi aiva baba vashera, uye shera aiva baba vaebheri. vanakomana vaviri vakaberekerwa ebheri: mumwe ainzi peregi, nokuti panguva yake nyika yakanga yakakamurana; mununʼuna wake ainzi jokitani. jokitani aiva baba vaarimodhadhi, sherefi, hazarimavheti, jera, hadhoramu, uzari, dhikira, obhari, abhimaeri, shebha, ofiri, havhira najobhabhi. ava vose vaiva vanakomana vajokitani. shemu, arifakisadhi, shera, ebheri, peregi, reu, serugi, nahori, tera naabhurama (iye abhurahama). vanakomana vaabhurahama vaiva: isaka naishumaeri. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvavo: nebhayoti dangwe raishumaeri, kedhari, adhibheeri, mibhisami, mishima, dhuma, masa, hadhadhi, tema, jeturi, nafishi, nakedhema. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaishumaeri. vanakomana vakaberekwa naketura, murongo waabhurahama vaiva: zimirani, jokishani, medhani, midhiani, ishibhaki nashua. vanakomana vajokishani vaiva: shebha nadhedhani. vanakomana vamidhiani vaiva: efa, eferi, hanoki, abhidha naeridha. ava vose vaiva zvizvarwa zvaketura. abhurahama aiva baba vaisaka. vanakomana vaisaka vaiva: esau naisraeri. vanakomana vaesau vaiva: erifazi, reueri, jeushi, jaramu, nakora. vana vaerifazi vaiva: temani, omari, zefo, gatami, nakenazi; natimina, vakabereka amareki. vanakomana vareueri vaiva: nahati, zera, shama namiza. vanakomana vaseiri vaiva: rotani, shobhari, zibheoni, ana, dhishoni, ezeri nadhishani. vanakomana varotani vaiva: hori nahomami, timina aiva hanzvadzi yarotani. vanakomana vashobhari vaiva: arivhani, manahati, ebhari, shefo naonami. vanakomana vazibheoni vaiva: aya naana. mwanakomana waana ainzi dhishoni. vanakomana vadhishoni vaiva: hemidhani, eshibhani, itirani nakerani. vanakomana vaezeri vaiva: bhirihani, zaavhani naakani. vanakomana vadhishani vaiva: uzi naarani. aya ndiwo aiva madzimambo aitonga muedhomu kusati kwava namambo upi zvake aitonga muisraeri vaiva: bhera mwanakomana wabheori, guta rake rainzi dhinihabha. bhera paakafa, jobhabhi mwanakomana wazera aibva kubhozira akamutevera paumambo. jobhabhi paakafa, hushami aibva kunyika yevatemani akamutevera paumambo. hushami paakafa, hadhadhi mwanakomana wabhedhadhi uyo akakunda midhiani munyika yamoabhu akamutevera paumambo. guta rake rainzi avhiti. hadhadhi paakafa samira aibva kumasireka akamutevera paumambo. samira paakafa, shauri aibva kurehobhoti parwizi akamutevera paumambo. shauri paakafa bhaari hanani mwanakomana waakibhori akamutevera paumambo. bhaari hanani paakafa, hadhadhi akamutevera paumambo. guta rake rainzi pau uye mudzimai wake ainzi mehetabheri, mwanasikana wamatiredhi, mwanasikana wame-zahabhi. hadhadhi akafawo. madzishe eedhomu aiva: timina, arivha, jeteti ohoribhama, era, pinoni, kenazi, temani, mibhiza, magidhieri nairami. aya ndiwo aiva madzishe eedhomu.

2

ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaisraeri: rubheni, simeoni, revhi, yeahudha, isakari, zebhuruni, dhani, yosefa, bhenjamini, nafutari, gadhi naasheri. vanakomana vayeahudha vaiva: eri, onani nashera. vatatu ava akavaberekerwa nomudzimai wechikenani, mwanasikana washua. eri dangwe rayeahudha, akanga akaipa pamberi payeahoh. saka yeahoh akamuuraya. tamari muroora wayeahudha akamuberekera perezi nazera. yeahudha aiva navanakomana vashanu vose pamwe chete. vanakomana vaperezi vaiva: hezironi nahamuri. vanakomana vazera vaiva: zimuri, etani, hemani, karikori nadharidha; vose vaiva vashanu. mwanakomana wakarimi aiva: akari, uyo akauyisa matambudziko pamusoro peisraeri nokutyora murayiro wokusatora zvinhu zvakaereswa. mwanakomana waetani ainzi azaria. vanakomana vahezironi vaiva: jerameeri, rami nakarebhu. rami aiva baba vaaminadhabhi, uye aminadhabhi aiva baba vanahashoni mutungamiri wavanhu veyeahudha. nahashoni aiva baba vasarimoni, sarimoni ari baba vabhoazi, bhoazi aiva baba vaobhedhi uye obhedhi aiva baba vajese. jese aiva baba vaeriabhi dangwe rake; mwanakomana wake wechipiri ainzi abhinadhabhi, wechitatu ainzi shimea, wechina ainzi netaneri, wechishanu ainzi radhai, wechitanhatu ainzi ozemi uye wechinomwe ainzi dhavhidhi. hanzvadzi dzavo dzaiva zeruya naabhigairi. vanakomana vatatu vazeruya vaiva abhishai, joabhu naasaheri. abhigairi aiva amai vaamasa, baba vaamasa vainzi jeteri muishumaeri. karebhu mwanakomana wahezironi akabereka vana nomudzimai wake azubha (uye najerioti). ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vake: jesheri shobhabhi naaridhoni. azubha paakafa karebhu akaroora efurati uyo akamuberekera huri. huri aiva baba vauri uye uri aiva baba vabhezareri. shure kwaizvozvo, hezironi akavata nomwanasikana wamakiri baba vagireadhi; akanga amuwana paakanga ava namakore makumi matanhatu; akamuberekera segubhi. segubhi aiva baba vajairi, uyo aitonga maguta makumi maviri namatatu mugireadhi. (asi geshuri naaramu vakatapa habhoti jairi pamwe chete nekenati namaguta akaripoteredza, maguta makumi matanhatu.) ava vose vaiva vorudzi rwamakiri baba vagireadhi. mushure mokunge hezironi afira mukarebhu efurata, abhija mudzimai wahezironi akamuberekera ashuri baba vatekoa. vanakomana vajerameeri dangwe rahezironi vaiva: rami dangwe rake, bhuna, oreni, ozemi naahija. jerameeri akanga ane mumwe mukadzi, zita rake rainzi atara. akanga ari amai vaonami. vanakomana varamu dangwe rajerameeri vaiva: maazi, jamini naekeri. vanakomana vaonami vaiva: shamai najadha. vanakomana vashamai vaiva: nadhabhi naabhishuri. mukadzi waabhishuri ainzi abhihairi akamuberekera abhani namoridhi. vanakomana vanadhabhi vaiva: seredhi naapaimi. seredhi akafa asina vana. mwanakomana waapaimi ainzi ishi uyo aiva baba vasheshani. sheshani aiva baba vaarai. vanakomana vajadha, mununʼuna washamai vaiva: jeteri najonatani. jeteri akafa asina vana. vanakomana vajonatani vaiva: pereti nazaza. ava ndivo vaiva zvizvarwa zvajerameeri. sheshani aiva asina vanakomana, aiva navanasikana chete. aiva nomuranda wechiijipita ainzi jara. sheshani akapa mwanasikana wake kuti ave mukadzi womuranda wake. jara akamuberekera atai. atai aiva baba vanatani, natani aiva baba vazabhadhi, zabhadhi baba vaefirari, efirari baba vaobedhi, obhedhi baba vajehu, jehu baba vaazaria, azaria baba vaherezi, herezi baba vaereasa, ereasa baba vasisimai, sisimai baba vasharumi, sharumi baba vajekamia, uye jekamia aiva baba vaerishama. vanakomana vakarebhu mununʼuna wajerameeri vaiva: mesha dangwe rake, uyo aiva baba vazifi uye nomwanakomana wake maresha, uyo aiva baba vahebhuroni. vanakomana vahebhuroni vaiva: kora, tapuwa, rekemu nashema. shema aiva baba varahamu, uye rahamu baba vajorikeami. rekemu aiva baba vashamai. mwanakomana washamai ainzi maoni, uye maoni aiva baba vabheti zuri. mumwe murongo wakarebhu ainzi efa ndiye aiva amai vaharani, moza nagazezi. harani aiva baba vagazezi. vanakomana vajadhai vaiva: regemu, jotamu, geshani, pereti, efa nashaafi. mumwe murongo wakarebhu ainzi maaka ndiye aiva amai vashebheri natirana. akaberekawo shaafi baba vamadhimana nashevha baba vamakibhena nagibhea. mwanasikana wakarebhu ainzi akisa. izvi ndizvo zvizvarwa zvakarebhu. vanakomana vahuri dangwe raefurata: shobhari baba vakiriati jearimi, sarima baba vabheterehema, naharefi baba vabheti gadheri. zvizvarwa zvashobhari baba vakiriati jearimi zvaiva: haroe, hafu yavamanahati, uye dzimba dzakiriati jearimi dzaiva: vaitiri, vaputi, vashumati navamishirai. kuna ivava kwakabva vazorati navaeshitaori. zvizvarwa zvasarima zvaiva: bheterehema, vanetofati, atiroti bheti joabhu, hafu yavamanahati, vazori, uye dzimba dzavanyori vaigara pajabhezi dzaiva: vatirati, vashimeati navasukati. ava ndivo vakeni vakabva kuna hamati baba veimba yarekabhi.

3

ava ndivo vanakomana vadhavhidhi vaakaberekerwa ari kuhebhuroni: dangwe rake rainzi amunoni mwanakomana waahinoami wejezireeri. wechipiri ainzi dhanieri, mwanakomana waabhigairi wekarimeri; wechitatu, abhusaromu mwanakomana wamaaka mwanasikana watarimai mambo wegeshuri; wechina, adhoniya mwanakomana wahagiti, wechishanu, shefatia mwanakomana waabhitari uye wechitanhatu itireami nomukadzi wake egira. ava vatanhatu vakaberekerwa dhavhidhi muhebhuroni umo maakatonga kwamakore manomwe nemwedzi mitanhatu. dhavhidhi akazotonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi matatu namatatu uye ava ndivo vana vaakaberekerwa ikoko. vaiva: shamua, shobhabhi, natani nasoromoni. ava vana vakaberekwa nabhatishebha mwanasikana waamieri. kwaivawo naibhari, erishua, erifereti, noga, nefegi, jafia, erishama, eriadha naerifereti, vose vaiva vapfumbamwe. ava vose vaiva vanakomana vadhavhidhi, tisingaverengi vanakomana vake vaakaita navarongo vake. uye tamari aiva hanzvadzi yavo. mwanakomana wasoromoni ainzi rehobhoamu, abhija mwanakomana wake, asa mwanakomana wake, jehoshafati mwanakomana wake, jehoramu mwanakomana wake, ahazia mwanakomana wake, joashi mwanakomana wake, amazia mwanakomana wake, azaria mwanakomana wake, jotamu mwanakomana wake, ahazi mwanakomana wake, hezekia mwanakomana wake, manase mwanakomana wake, amoni mwanakomana wake, josia mwanakomana wake. vanakomana vajosia vaiva: johanani dangwe, jehoyakimi wechipiri, zedhekia wechitatu nasharumi wechina. vakatevera jehoyakimi vaiva: jehoyakini mwanakomana wake nazedhekia. zvizvarwa zvajehoyakini mutapwa zvaiva: shearitieri mwanakomana wake, marikirami, pedhaya, shenazari, jekamia, hoshama nanedhabhia. vanakomana vapedhaya vaiva: zerubhabheri nashimei. vanakomana vazerubhabheri vaiva: meshurami nahanania. sheromiti aiva hanzvadzi yavo. kwaivawo navamwe vashanu vaiti: hashubha, oheri, bherekia, hasadhia najushabhi-hesedhi. zvizvarwa zvahanania zvaiva: peratia najeshaya, navanakomana varefaya, vaarinani, vaobhadhia nevashekania. zvizvarwa zvashekania zvaiva: shemaya navanakomana vake vaiti: hatushi, igari, bharia, nearia nashafati, vatanhatu vose pamwe chete. vanakomana vanearia vaiva: erioenai, hizikia naazirikamu, vatatu pamwe chete. vanakomana vaerioenai vaiva: hodhavhia, eriashibhi, peraya, akubhi, johanani, dheraya naanani, vanomwe pamwe chete.

4

zvizvarwa zvayeahudha zvaiva: perezi, hezironi, karimi, huri nashobhari. reaya mwanakomana washobhari aiva baba vajahati, uye jahati ari baba vaahumai narahadhi. idzi ndidzo dzaiva dzimba dzavazorati. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaetami: jezireeri, ishima naidhibashi. hanzvadzi yavo yainzi hazereriponi. penueri aiva baba vagedhori uye ezeri aiva baba vahusha. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvahuri dangwe raefurata baba vabheterehema. ashuri baba vatekoa vaiva navakadzi vaviri, hera nanaara. naara akamuberekera ahuzami, heferi, temeni nahaahashitari. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvanaara. vanakomana vahera vaiva: zareti, zohari, etinani nakozi uyo aiva baba vaanubhi nahazobhebha nevedzimba dzaahareri mwanakomana waharuni. jabhezi aikudzwa zvikuru kukunda vanunʼuna vake. mai vake vakamutumidza kuti jabhezi vachiti, “ndakamubereka mukurwadziwa.” jabhezi akachema kuna allah waisraeri achiti, “haiwa, dai mandiropafadza mukakurisa nyika yangu! ruoko rwenyu ngaruve neni, rundichengete kune zvinokuvadza kuitira kuti ndisarwadziwa.” uye allah akamupa zvaakakumbira. kerubhi, mununʼuna washuha aiva baba vamehiri uyo aiva baba vaeshitoni. eshitoni aiva baba vabheti rafa, pasea natehina baba vairi nahashi. ava ndivo vaiva varume vereka. vanakomana vakenazi vaiva: otinieri naseraya. vanakomana vaotinieri vaiva: hatati nameonotai. meonotai aiva baba vaofira. seraya aiva baba vajoabhu, baba vage harashimi. vakapiwa zita iri nokuti vaiva mhizha. vanakomana vakarebhu mwanakomana wajefune vaiva: iru, era nanaami. mwanakomana waera ainzi kenazi. vanakomana vajehareri vaiva: zifi, zifa, tiria naasareri. vanakomana vaezira vaiva: jeteri, meredhi, eferi, najaroni. mumwe wavakadzi vameredhi akavaberekera miriamu, shamai naishibha baba vaeshitemoa. ava ndivo vaiva vana vomwanasikana wafaro ainzi bhitia akanga aroorwa nameredhi. mukadzi wake wechiyeahudha akabereka jeredhi baba vagedhori, hebheri baba vasoko, najekutieri baba vazanoa. vanakomana vomukadzi wahodhia, hanzvadzi yanahamu vaiva: baba vakeira mugarimi naeshitemoa mumaakati. vanakomana vashimoni vaiva: amunoni, rina, bheni-hanani natironi. zvizvarwa zvaishi zvaiva: zoheti nabheni-zoheti. vanakomana vashera mwanakomana wayeahudha vaiva: eri baba vareka, raadha baba vamaresha nedzimba dzavairuka mucheka wakaisvonaka pabheti ashibhea. jokimi, varume vekozebha najoashi nasarafi vaitonga mumoabhu najashubhi rehemi. (zvinyorwa izvi ndezvakare.) vaiva vaumbi vehari vaigara panetaimi nepagedhera; vaigarapo vachishandira mambo. zvizvarwa zvasimeoni zvaiva: nemueri, jamini, jaribhi, zera nashauri; sharumi aiva mwanakomana washauri, mibhisami ari mwanakomana wake namishima mwanakomana wake. zvizvarwa zvamishima zvaiva: hamueri mwanakomana wake, zakuri mwanakomana wake nashimei mwanakomana wake. shimei aiva navanakomana gumi navatanhatu navanasikana vatanhatu, asi vanunʼuna vake vaiva vasina vana vakawanda; saka rudzi rwavo haruna kuwanda sokuwanda kwavanhu vavayeahudha. vaigara mubheerishebha moradha, hazari shuari, bhiriha, ezemi, toradhi, bhetueri, horima, zikiragi, bheti makabhoti, hazari susimi, bheti bhiri nesharaimi. aya ndiwo aiva maguta avo kusvikira pakutonga kwadhavhidhi. misha yaiva yakaapoteredza yaiva: etami, aini, rimoni, tokeni neashani, maguta mashanu nemisha yose yakanga yakaapoteredza kusvika kubhaarati. idzi ndidzo nzvimbo dzavaigara. uye vakachengeta nhoroondo yezvizvarwa zvavo: meshobhabhi, jamireki, josha mwanakomana waamazia, joere, jehu mwanakomana wajoshibhia, mwanakomana waseraya, mwanakomana waasieri, uye erioenai, jaakobha, jeshohaya, asaya, adhieri, jesimieri, bhenaya, naziza mwanakomana washifi, mwanakomana waaroni mwanakomana wajedhaya, mwanakomana washimiri, mwanakomana washemaya. varume vakanyorwa pamusoro namazita avo vaiva vatungamiri vedzimba dzavo. mhuri dzavo dzakakura kwazvo uye vakaenda kumucheto kwegedhori kurutivi rwokumabvazuva nomupata vachitsvakira makwai avo mafuro. vakawana mafuro akanaka kwazvo akapfuma, uye nyika yakanaka ine nzvimbo huru ine runyararo norugare. vahamu ndivo vakanga vachimbogaramo kare. varume vane mazita akanyorwa vakauya pamazuva ahezekia mambo wayeahudha. vakarwisa vahamu mumatende avo navameuniwo vaivapo vakavaparadza zvachose kusvikira nhasi. ipapo vakazogarapo munzvimbo yavo nokuti paiva namafuro amakwai avo. uye mazana mashanu avo vaiva vasimeoni vachitungamirirwa naperatia, nearia, refaya nauzieri, vanakomana vaishi, vakandorwisa nyika yamakomo yeseiri. vakauraya vaamareki vakanga vasara avo vakanga vapunyuka, uye vakagarapo kusvikira nhasi.

5

vanakomana varubheni dangwe raisraeri. (ndiye aiva dangwe, asi paakasvibisa nhoo yewaniso yababa vake, kodzero dzoudangwe hwake dzakapiwa kuvanakomana vayosefa mwanakomana waisraeri; saka haana kuzoverengerwawo munhoroondo dzamadzitateguru ake maererano nekodzero yokuberekwa kwake. uye kunyange zvazvo yeahudha aiva akasimba kwazvo kupfuura vana vababa vake vose, uye kunyange zvazvo mutongi akazobuda maari, kodzero youdangwe yaiva yayosefa.) vanakomana varubheni dangwe raisraeri vaiva: hanoki, paru, hezironi nakarimi. zvizvarwa zvajoere zvaiva: shemaya mwanakomana wake, gogi mwanakomana wake, shimei mwanakomana wake, mika mwanakomana wake, reaya mwanakomana wake, nabhaari mwanakomana wake. uye nabheera mwanakomana wake uyo akatorwa akaiswa muutapwa natigirati-pireseri mambo weasiria. bheera akanga ari mutungamiri wavarubheni. hama dzavo nedzimba dzavo dzakanyorwa munhoroondo dzamadzitateguru avo dzaiva: jeyeri aiva ishe, nazekariyeah uye bhera mwanakomana waazazi, mwanakomana washema, mwanakomana wajoere. vakagara munzvimbo yaibva kuaroeri kusvikira kunebho nebhaari meoni. kumabvazuva vakatora nyika kusvikira pamuganhu wegwenga rinosvika kurwizi yufuratesi nokuti zvipfuwo zvavo zvakanga zvawanda mugireadhi. panguva yokutonga kwasauro vakarwa navahagiri vakavakunda vakagara mumatende avahagiri mudunhu rose rokumabvazuva egireadhi. vagadhi vakanga vakavakidzana navo mubhashani kusvikira kusareka: joere ndiye aiva ishe, shafami ari wechipiri, kuchizotevera janai nashafati, mubhashani. hama dzavo, tichiverenga mhuri dzavo, dzaiva: mikaeri, meshurami, shebha, jorai, jakani, zia naebheri, vanomwe pamwe chete. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaabhihairi mwanakomana wahuri, mwanakomana wajarowa, mwanakomana gireadhi, mwanakomana wamikaeri, mwanakomana wajeshishai, mwanakomana wajadho, mwanakomana wabhuzi. ahi mwanakomana waabhidhieri, mwanakomana waguni, ndiye aiva mukuru wemhuri yavo. vagadhi vaigara mugireadhi, mubhashani nomumisha yaro yakaripoteredza, uye nomumafuro ose esharoni kusvikira kwaanogumira. iva vose vakanyorwa munhoroondo dzamadzitateguru avo munguva yokutonga kwajotamu mambo weyeahudha najerobhoamu mambo weisraeri. varubheni, vagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vaiva navarume zviuru makumi mana nezvina namazana manomwe namakumi matanhatu vakanga vakagadzirira kundorwa, varume vakasimba vaigona kushandisa nhoo nomunondo, uye vaigona kushandisa uta, uye vakanga vakadzidziswa kurwa. vakarwa navahagiri, vajeturi, vanafishi navanodhabhi. vakabatsirwa pakurwa navo, uye allah akaisa vahagiri, navose vaiva kurutivi rwavo, mumaoko avo, nokuti vakanga vachema kwaari vari pakurwa. akapindura minyengetero yavo nokuti vakavimba naye. vakapamba zvipfuwo zvavahagiri zvaiti: zviuru makumi mashanu zvengamera, zviuru mazana maviri ane makumi mashanu zvamakwai nezviuru zviviri zvembongoro. vakatapawo zviuru zana zvavanhu, uye vamwe vazhinji vakaurayiwa nokuti kurwa uku kwaiva kwaallah. uye vakagara munyika iyoyi kusvikira pakutapwa. vanhu vehafu yorudzi rwamanase vaiva vazhinji kwazvo vakagara munyika yaibva kubhashani ichisvika kubhari hemoni ndiko kuseniri (gomo rehemoni). ava ndivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzavo: eferi, ishi, erieri, azireri, jeremia, hodhavhia najadhieri. ava vaiva varwi vakashinga, varume vembiri uye vari vakuru vedzimba dzavo. asi vakanga vasina kutendeka kuna allah wamadzibaba avo, vakaita ufeve hwokunamata vamwari vavanhu venyika iyi avo vakanga vaparadzwa naallah pamberi pavo. saka allah waisraeri akamutsa mweya wapuri mambo weasiria iwo mweya watigirati-pireseri mambo weasiria, akatapa varubheni, vagadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase. akavatora akandovaisa kuharahi, habhori, hara nokurwizi gozani uko kwavari kusvikira zuva ranhasi.

6

vanakomana varevhi vaiva gerishoni, kohati namerari. vanakomana vakohati vaiva: amiramu, izhari, hebhuroni nauzieri. vana vaamiramu vaiva: aroni, mozisi namiriamu. vanakomana vaaroni vaiva: nadhabhi, abhihu, ereazari naitamari. ereazari aiva baba vafinehasi, finehasi baba vaabhishua, abhishua baba vabhuki, bhuki baba vauzi, uzi baba vazerahia, zerahia baba vamerayoti, merayoti baba vaamaria, amaria baba vaahitubhi, ahitubhi baba vazadhoki, zadhoki baba vaahimaazi, ahimaazi baba vaazaria, azaria baba vajohanani, johanani baba vaazaria. (ndiye aibata basa somuprista mutemberi yakavakwa nasoromoni mujerusarema.) azaria baba vaamaria, amaria baba vaahitubhi. ahitubhi baba vazadhoki, zadhoki baba vasharumi, sharumi baba vahirikia, hirikia baba vaazaria, azaria baba vaseraya uye seraya baba vajehozadhaki. (jehozadhaki akadzingwa yeahoh paakaendesa yeahudha nejerusarema kuutapwa noruoko rwanebhukadhinezari.) vanakomana varevhi vaiva: gerishoni, kohati namerari. aya ndiwo mazita avanakomana vagerishoni: ribhini nashimei. vanakomana vakohati vaiva: amiramu, izhari, hebhuroni nauzieri. vanakomana vamerari vaiva: mairi namushi. idzi ndidzo dzimba dzavarevhi dzakanyorwa maererano namazita amadzibaba avo: vagerishoni: ribhini mwanakomana wake, jehati mwanakomana wake nazima mwanakomana wake, joa mwanakomana wake idho mwanakomana wake, zera mwanakomana wake najeaterai mwanakomana wake. zvizvarwa zvakohati zvaiva: aminadhabhi mwanakomana wake, kora mwanakomana wake, asiri mwanakomana wake, erikana mwanakomana wake, naebhiasafi mwanakomana wake, asiri mwanakomana wake, natahati mwanakomana wake, urieri mwanakomana wake, uzia mwanakomana wake nashauri mwanakomana wake. zvizvarwa zvaerikana zvaiva: amasai, ahimoti, erikana mwanakomana wake, zofai mwanakomana wake, nanahati mwanakomana wake, naeriabhi mwanakomana wake, jerohamu mwanakomana wake, naerikana mwanakomana wake, nasamueri mwanakomana wake, vanakomana vasamueri vaiva: joere dangwe rake naabhija mwanakomana wake wechipiri. zvizvarwa zvamerari zvaiva: mari, ribhini mwanakomana wake, shimei mwanakomana wake, uza mwanakomana wake, shimea mwanakomana wake, hagia mwanakomana wake naasaya mwanakomana wake. ava ndivo varume vakagadzwa nadhavhidhi kuti vafambise basa rokuimba muimba yayeahoh mushure mokunge areka yawana pokuzorora imomo. vaishumira uye vaiimba pamberi petabhenakeri, mutende rokusangana, kusvikira soromoni avaka temberi yayeahoh mujerusarema. vaibata basa ravo maererano nemitemo yavakanga vakadzikirwa. ava ndivo varume vaibata basa pamwe chete navanakomana vavo: kubva kuvakohati: hemani muimbi, mwanakomana wajoere, mwanakomana wasamueri, mwanakomana waerikana, mwanakomana wajerohamu, mwanakomana waerieri, mwanakomana watoa, mwanakomana wazufi, mwanakomana waerikana, mwanakomana wamahati, mwanakomana waamasai, mwanakomana waerikana, mwanakomana wajoere, mwanakomana waazaria, mwanakomana wazefania, mwanakomana watahati, mwanakomana waasiri, mwanakomana waebhiasafi; mwanakomana wakora, mwanakomana waizhari, mwanakomana wakohati, mwanakomana warevhi mwanakomana waisraeri. uye mubatsiri wahemani pabasa ainzi asafi akanga amire kurudyi rwake: asafi mwanakomana wabherekia mwanakomana washimea, mwanakomana wamikaeri, mwanakomana bhaaseya, mwanakomana wamarikia, mwanakomana waetini, mwanakomana wazera, mwanakomana waadhaya, mwanakomana waetani, mwanakomana wazima, mwanakomana washimei, mwanakomana wajahati, mwanakomana wagerishoni, mwanakomana warevhi; uye kubva kuvabatsiri vavo, vamerari, kuruboshwe rwake, vaiva: etani mwanakomana wakishi, mwanakomana waabhidhi, mwanakomana wamaruki, mwanakomana wahashabhia, mwanakomana waamazia, mwanakomana wahirikia, mwanakomana waamuzi, mwanakomana wabhani, mwanakomana washemeri, mwanakomana wamari, mwanakomana wamushi, mwanakomana wamerari, mwanakomana warevhi. vamwe vavo varevhi vakapiwa mamwe mabasa ose omutabhenakeri, imba yaallah. asi aroni nezvizvarwa zvake ndivo vaiisa zvipiriso paaritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa uye nepaaritari yezvinonhuhwira maererano nezvose zvaiitwa panzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, vachiyananisira israeri maererano nezvose zvakanga zvarayirwa mozisi muranda waallah. izvi ndizvo zvizvarwa zvaaroni: ereazari mwanakomana wake, finehasi mwanakomana wake, abhishua mwanakomana wake bhuki mwanakomana wake, uzi mwanakomana wake nazerahia mwanakomana wake, merayoti mwanakomana wake, amaria mwanakomana wake, ahitubhi mwanakomana wake, zadhoki mwanakomana wake naahimaazi mwanakomana wake. idzi ndidzo dzakanga dziri nzvimbo dzavo dzavakagoverwa dzokugara senyika yavo (dzakapiwa kuzvizvarwa zvaaroni, avo vaibva kuimba yakohati, nokuti mugove wokutanga wakanga uri wavo). vakapiwa hebhuroni iri muyeahudha namafuro ose akaipoteredza. asi minda nemisha yose yakapoteredza guta iri yakapiwa kuna karebhu mwanakomana wajefune. saka zvizvarwa zvaaroni zvakapiwa hebhuroni (guta routiziro) uye ribhina, jatiri, eshitemoa, hireni, dhebhiri, ashani, juta, bheti shemeshi pamwe chete namafuro awo. uye kubva kurudzi rwabhenjamini vakapiwa gibheoni, gebha aremeti neanatoti pamwe chete namafuro awo. maguta aya, akagoverwa pakati pedzimba dzavakohati akanga ari gumi namatatu pamwe chete. zvimwe zvizvarwa zvakohati zvakagoverwa maguta gumi kubva kudzimba dzorudzi rwehafu rwamanase. zvizvarwa zvagerishoni mhuri nemhuri zvakagoverwawo maguta gumi namatatu kubva kumarudzi aisakari, asheri nanafutari uye nokubva kuchikamu chorudzi rwamanase chiri mubhashani. zvizvarwa zvamerari, mhuri nemhuri zvakagoverwa maguta gumi namaviri kubva kumarudzi arubheni, gadhi nazebhuruni. saka vaisraeri vakapa varevhi maguta aya namafuro awo. kubva kurudzi rwayeahudha, rwasimeoni norwabhenjamini vakagoverwa maguta ayo akanga arehwa namazita. vamwe vedzimba dzakohati vakapiwa kuti ive nyika yavo, maguta kubva kurudzi rwaefuremu. munyika yamakomo yaefuremu vakapiwa shekemu (guta routiziro) negezeri, nejokimeami, nebheti horoni, aijaroni, negati rimoni pamwe chete namafuro awo. uye kubva kuhafu yorudzi rwamanase vaisraeri vakapawo aneri nebhireamu pamwe chete namafuro awo kuvakohati vakanga vasara. vagerishoni vakagamuchirawo zvinotevera: kubva kuimba yehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakagamuchira gorani mubhashani neashitarotiwo pamwe chete namafuro awo; kubva kurudzi rwaisakari vakagamuchira kedheshi nedhabherati, ramoti, neanemi, pamwe chete namafuro awo; kubva kurudzi rwaasheri vakagamuchira mashari, neabhidhoni, hukoki nerehobhi pamwe chete namafuro awo; uye kubva kurudzi rwanafutari vakagamuchira kedheshi mugarirea, nehamoni nekiriataimi pamwe chete namafuro awo. vamerari (varevhi vose vakanga vasara) vakagamuchira zvinotevera: kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni vakagamuchira jokineami, karita rimono, netabhori pamwe chete namafuro awo; kubva kurudzi rwarubheni mhiri kworwizi jorodhani kumabvazuva kwejeriko vakagamuchirwawo bhezeri murenje, jaza, kedhemoti nemefaati pamwe chete namafuro awo; uye kubva kurudzi rwagadhi vakagamuchira ramoti mugireadhi, mahanaimi, heshibhoni nejazeri pamwe chete namafuro awo.

7

vanakomana vaisakari vaiva: tora, puwa, jashubhi, nashimironi; vose vaiva vana. vanakomana vatora vaiva: uzi, refaya, jerieri, jamai, ibhisami nasamueri, vakuru vedzimba dzavo. pamazuva okutonga kwadhavhidhi, zvizvarwa zvatora zvakaverengwa savarwi munhoroondo yavo zvakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezviviri namazana matanhatu. mwanakomana wauzi aiva: izirahia. vanakomana vaizirahia vaiva: mikaeri, obhadhia, joere naishia. vose vari vashanu vaiva madzishe. munhoroondo yemhuri yavo, vakanga vaine varume zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu vakanga vakagadzirira kurwa, nokuti vakanga vaine vakadzi vazhinji navanakomana vazhinji. hama dzavo vakanga vari varume vokurwa vari vedzimba dzose dzaisakari, sokunyorwa kwazvakanga zvakaita munhoroondo yavo, vose vaisvika zviuru makumi masere nezvinomwe. vanakomana vabhenjamini vatatu vaiva: bhera, bhekeri, najedhiaeri. vanakomana vabhera vaiva: ezibhoni, uzi, uzieri, jerimoti nairi, vose vakuru vedzimba vashanu pamwe chete. munhoroondo yavo varwi vakanyorwa vaiva varume zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri namakumi matatu navana. vanakomana vabhekeri vaiva: zemira, joashi, eriezeri, erioenai, omiri, jeremoti, abhija, anatoti naaremeti. vose ava vaiva vakomana vabhekeri. munhoroondo yavo, vakuru vemhuri vakanyorwa uye vari varwi vaiva zviuru makumi maviri namazana maviri. mwanakomana wajedhiaeri ainzi bhirihani. vanakomana vabhirihani vaiva: jehushi, bhenjamini, ehudhi, kenana, zetani, tashishi naahishahari. vanakomana ava vose vajedhiaeri vaiva vakuru vemhuri. paiva nezviuru gumi nezvinomwe namazana maviri avarume
