vokurwa vakanga vakagadzirira kuenda kuhondo. vashupi navahupi vaiva zvizvarwa zvairi, uye vahushi vaiva zvizvarwa zvaaheri. vanakomana vanafutari vaiva: jazieri, guni, jezeri nashiremi, zvizvarwa zvabhiriha. zvizvarwa zvamanase zvaiva: asirieri chizvarwa chake kubudikidza nomurongo wake muaramu. iye akaberekawo makiri baba vagireadhi. makiri akatora mukadzi kubva pakati pavahupi navashupi. zita rehanzvadzi yake rainzi maaka. chimwezve chizvarwa chainzi zerofehadhi, akanga aine vanasikana chete. mukadzi wamakiri maaka akabereka mwanakomana akamutumidza zita rokuti pereshi. mununʼuna wake ainzi shereshi, uye vanakomana vake vaiva uramu narakemu. mwanakomana wauramu ainzi bhedhani. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vagireadhi mwanakomana wamakiri mwanakomana wamanase. hanzvadzi yake hamoreketi akabereka ishodhi, abhiezeri namara. vanakomana vashimidha vaiva: ahiani, shekemu, riki naaniami. zvizvarwa zvaefuremu zvaiva: shutera, bheredhi mwanakomana wake, tahati mwanakomana wake, ereadha mwanakomana wake, tahati mwanakomana wake, zabhadhi mwanakomana wake nashutera mwanakomana wake. (ezeri naereadha vakaurayiwa navarume vegati vakanga vakaberekerwa munyika iyi pavakaburukira kundopamba zvipfuwo zvavo. baba wavo efuremu akavachema kwamazuva mazhinji uye hama dzake dzakauya kuzomunyaradza. ipapo akarara nomukadzi wake zvakare akava nemimba uye akabereka mwanakomana. akamutumidza zita rokuti bheria nokuti mumhuri yake makanga maita dambudziko. mwanasikana wake ainzi sheera, uye akavaka bheti horoni, yezasi neyokumusoro uyewo neuzeni sheera.) refa aiva mwanakomana wake, reshefi mwanakomana wake, tera mwanakomana wake, tahani mwanakomana wake, radhani mwanakomana wake, amihudhi mwanakomana wake, erishama mwanakomana wake, nuni mwanakomana wake nayeahoshua mwanakomana wake. nyika dzavo nemisha yavo zvaisanganisira bheteri nemisha yose yakaripoteredza, naarani kumabvazuva, gezeri nemisha yaro, kumavirira neshekemu nemisha yaro kuenda kunosvika kuaya nemisha yaro. pamiganhu yamanase paiva nebheti shani, taanaki, megidho nedhori pamwe chete nemisha yawo. zvizvarwa zvayosefa mwanakomana waisraeri zvaigara mumaguta aya. vanakomana vaasheri vaiva: imina, ishivha, ishivhi nabheria. hanzvadzi yavo yainzi sera. vanakomana vabheria vaiva: hebheri namarikieri, uyo aiva baba vabhirizaiti. hebheri aiva baba vajafireti, shomeri nahotami uye nehanzvadzi yavo shua. vanakomana vajafireti vaiva: pasaki, bhimari naashivhati. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vajafireti. vanakomana vashomeri vaiva: ahi, roga, hubhai naaramu. vanakomana vomununʼuna wake heremu vaiva: zofa, imina, shereshi, naamari. vanakomana vazofa vaiva: sua, haneferi, shuari, bheri, imira, bhezeri, hodhi, shama shirisha, itirani, nabheera. vanakomana vajeteri vaiva: jefune, pisipa naara. vanakomana vaura vaiva: ara, hanieri, narizia. vose ava vaiva zvizvarwa zvaasheri, vakuru vemhuri yavo, varume vakanga vakasarudzika, varwi vakanga vakashinga uye vari vatungamiri vakasanangurika. uwandu hwavarume vakanga vakagadzirira kurwa sezvazvakanyorwa munhoroondo yavo hwaiva zviuru makumi maviri nezvitanhatu.

8

bhenjamini aiva baba vabhera dangwe rake, ashibheri mwanakomana wechipiri, ahara wechitatu, noha wechina narafa wechishanu. vanakomana vabhera vaiva: adha, gera, abhihudhi, abhishua, naamani ahoa, gera, shefufani nahurami. izvi ndizvo zvaiva zvizvarwa zvaehudhi vakanga vari vakuru vemhuri yeavo vaigara mugebha vakazodzingwa vakaendeswa kumanahati: naamani, ahifa nagera, uyo akavadzinga uya aiva baba vauza naarihudhi. vanakomana vakaberekerwa shaharaimi mumoabhu mushure mokunge arambana navakadzi vake hushini nabhaara. nomukadzi wake hodheshi akabereka johabhi, zibhia, mesha marikami, jeuzi, sakia namirima. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vake, vakuru vemhuri. nahushimi akabereka abhitubhi naeripaari. vanakomana vaeripaari vaiva: ebheri, mishamu, shemedhi (uyo akavaka ono nerodhi pamwe chete nemisha yakaapoteredza) nabheria nashema, avo vakanga vari vakuru vemhuri dzaavo vaigara muaijaroni uye vakadzinga vagari vegati. ahiyo, shashaki, jeremoti, zebhabhia, aradhi, edheri, mikaeri, ishipa najoha vaiva vanakomana vaberia. zebhadhia, meshurami, hiziki, hebheri, ishimerai, iziria najobhabhi vaiva vanakomana vaeripaari. jakimi, zikiri, zabhidhi, erienai, ziretai, erieri, adhaya, bheraya nashimirati vaiva vanakomana vashimei. ishipani, ebheri, erieri, abhidhoni, zikiri, hanani, hanania, eramu anitotiya, ifidheya napenueri vaiva vanakomana vashashaki. shamisherai, sheharia, ataria, jaareshia, eria, nazikiri vaiva vanakomana vajerohamu. vose ava vaiva vakuru vemhuri, vari madzishe sezvazvakanyorwa munhoroondo dzavo. uye vaigara mujerusarema. jeyeri, baba vagibheoni vaigara mugibheoni. zita romukadzi wake rainzi maaka, uye mwanakomana wake wedangwe ainzi abhidhoni, achiteverwa nazuri, kishi, bhaari, neri, nadhabhi, gedhori, ahio, zekeri, uye mikiroti, uyo aiva baba vashimea. ivo vaigarawo pedyo nehama dzavo mujerusarema. neri aiva baba vakishi, kishi aiva baba vasauro, uye sauro aiva baba vajonatani, mariki-shua, abinadhabhi, naeshi-bhaari. mwanakomana wajonatani ainzi meribhi-bhaari uyo aiva baba vamika. vanakomana vamika vaiva: pitoni, mereki tarea, naahazi. ahazi aiva baba vajehoadha, jehoadha aiva baba vaaremeti, azimavheti nazimiri uye zimiri aiva baba vamoza. moza aiva baba vabhinea rafa aiva mwanakomana wake, ereasa mwanakomana wake naazeri mwanakomana wake. azeri aiva navanakomana vatanhatu, uye aya ndiwo mazita avo: arizakami, bhokeru, ishumaeri, shearia, obhadhia nahanani. vose ava vaiva vanakomana vaazeri. vanakomana vomununʼuna wake esheki vaiva: uramu dangwe rake, jeushi mwanakomana wake wechipiri naerifereti wechitatu. vanakomana vauramu vaiva varwi voumhare vaigona kushandisa uta. vaiva navanakomana navazukuru vazhinji vaisvika zana namakumi mashanu pamwe chete. vose ava vaiva zvizvarwa zvabhenjamini.

9

vaisraeri vose vakanyorwa munhoroondo dzakanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eisraeri. vayeahudha vakatapwa vakaendeswa kubhabhironi nokuda kwokusatendeka kwavo. zvino vakatanga kugara panyika yavo mumaguta avo vaiva vamwe vaisraeri, vaprista, varevhi navaranda vomutemberi. avo vaibva kuyeahudha, nevaibva kwabhenjamini nevaibva kwaefuremu namanase vaigara mujerusarema vaiva: utai mwanakomana waamihudhi, mwanakomana waomuri, mwanakomana waimiri, mwanakomana wabhani, chizvarwa chaperezi mwanakomana wayeahudha. vashiro: asaya uyo aiva dangwe navanakomana vake. vazerahi: jeueri. vanhu vaibva kuyeahudha vaiva mazana matanhatu namakumi mapfumbamwe. vabhenjamini: saru mwanakomana wameshurami, mwanakomana wahodhavhia, mwanakomana wahasenua; ibhineya mwanakomana wajerohamu; era mwanakomana wauzi, mwanakomana wamikiri; nameshurami mwanakomana washefatia, mwanakomana wareueri, mwanakomana waibhiniya. vanhu vorudzi rwabhenjamini sezvazvakanyorwa munhoroondo yavo, vaisvika mazana mapfumbamwe namakumi mashanu navatanhatu. varume ava vose vakanga vari vakuru vemhuri. vaprista: jedhaya, najehoyaribhi najakini; azaria mwanakomana wahirikia, mwanakomana wameshurami, mwanakomana wazadhoki, mwanakomana wamerayoti, mwanakomana waahitubhi, mubati mukuru muimba yaallah. adhaya mwanakomana wajerohamu, mwanakomana wapashuri, mwanakomana wamarikia; namaasai mwanakomana waadhieri, mwanakomana wajahazera, mwanakomana wameshurami, mwanakomana wameshiremiti, mwanakomana waima. vaprista, vaiva vakuru vemhuri, vaisvika chiuru namazana manomwe namakumi matanhatu. vose vaiva varume vaikwanisa uye vaibata basa rokushumira muimba yaallah. varevhi: shemaya mwanakomana wahashubhi, mwanakomana waazirikami, mwanakomana wahashabhia, mumerari; bhakibhaka, hereshi, garari namatania mwanakomana wamika, mwanakomana wazikiri, mwanakomana waasafi; obhadhia mwanakomana washemaya, mwanakomana wagarari, mwanakomana wajedhutuni; nabherekia mwanakomana waasa, mwanakomana waerikana, vaigara mumisha yavanetofati. vatariri vamasuo: sharumi, akubhi, tarimoni, ahimani navanunʼuna vavo, sharumi ari mukuru wavo, vakaiswa pasuo ramambo kumabvazuva, kusvikira nanhasi. ava ndivo vaiva vatariri vamasuo, okumusasa wavarevhi. sharumi mwanakomana wakore mwanakomana waebhiasafi, mwanakomana wakora navamwe vatariri vamasuo vokumhuri yake, vakora, vaiva nebasa rokuchengetedza mikova yetende sezvaingoitwa namadzibaba avo vakanga vane basa rokurinda suo rokupinda kuugaro hwayeahoh. panguva dzapakutanga finehasi mwanakomana waereazari ndiye aiva mukuru wavatariri vamasuo, uye yeahoh aiva naye. zekariyeah mwanakomana wamesheremia aiva mutariri wesuo pamukova wetende rokusangana. vose pamwe chete vakanga vasarudzwa kuti vave vatariri vamasuo pamikova vaisvika mazana maviri negumi navaviri. vakanga vakanyorwa munhoroondo dzokuberekwa dzemisha yavo. vatariri vamasuo vakapiwa mabasa avo nenzvimbo dzavo nadhavhidhi nasamueri muoni. ivo nezvizvarwa zvavo vaiva nebasa rokurinda masuo eimba yayeahoh, imba yainzi tende. vatariri vamasuo vaiva kumativi mana, kumabvazuva, kumavirira, kumusoro nezasi. vanunʼuna vavo mumisha yavo vaiuya nguva nenguva vachizogoverana mabasa avo vachiita madzoro amazuva manomwe. asi vakuru vana pakati pavatariri vamasuo, vaiva varevhi, vakapiwa basa rokuchengetedza makamuri namatura epfuma muimba yaallah. vaipedza usiku hwose vari panzvimbo dzavo vakapoteredza imba yaallah, nokuti vaifanira kuichengetedza; uye vaiva nebasa rokuizarura mangwanani oga oga. vamwe vavo vaiva nebasa rokuchengetedza midziyo yaishandiswa mutemberi; vaiiverenga ichibuda voiverengazve yodzorerwa. vamwe vakapiwa basa rokuti vachengetedze nhumbi nemimwe midziyo yose yapanzvimbo tsvene pamwe chete noupfu hwakatsetseka newaini, namafuta, nezvinonhuhwira nemiti inonhuhwira. asi vamwe vavaprista vaiitawo basa rokusanganisa miti inonhuhwira. murevhi ainzi matitia, dangwe rasharumi mukora, akagadzwa basa rokubika chingwa chechipiriso. vamwe vehama dzavo vakohati vakapiwa basa rokubika chingwa chaizoiswa patafura pamasabata ose. avo vaiva vaimbi, vakuru vemhuri dzavarevhi, vaigara mumakamuri omutemberi uye vaisaita mamwe mabasa ose nokuti vaifanira kuita basa iri masikati nousiku. ava vose vaiva vakuru vemhuri dzavarevhi, vakuru sezvavakanyorwa munhoroondo dzokuberekwa kwavo. uye vaigara mujerusarema. jeyeri baba vagibheoni aigara mugibheoni. mukadzi wake ainzi maaka, uye dangwe rake raivawo abhidhoni, achiteverwa nazuri, kishi, bhaari, neri, nadhabhi, gedhori, ahio, zekariyeah namikiroti. mikiroti aiva baba vashimeamu. ivowo vaigara pedyo nehama dzavo mujerusarema. neri aiva baba vakishi, kishi ari baba vasauro, uye sauro aiva baba vajonatani, mariki-shua, abhinadhabhi naeshi-bhaari. mwanakomana wajonatani ainzi meribhi-bhaari uye aiva baba vamika. vanakomana vamika vaiva pitoni: mereki, tahirea naahazi. ahazi aiva baba vajadha, jadha aiva baba vaaremeti, azimavheti nazimiri, uye zimiri aiva baba vamoza. moza aiva baba vabhinea; refaya aiva mwanakomana wake, ereasa mwanakomana wake naazeri mwanakomana wake. azeri aiva navanakomana vatanhatu, uye aya ndiwo mazita avo: azirikami, bhokeru, ishumaeri, sheariya, obhadhia nahanani. ava ndivo vaiva vana vaazeri.

10

zvino vafiristia vakarwisa vaisraeri; vaisraeri vakatiza pamberi pavo, vazhinji vakaurayiwa pagomo regiribhoa. vafiristia vakatevera sauro navanakomana vake kwazvo uyezve vakauraya vanakomana vake jonatani, abhinadhabhi namariki-shua. hondo yakarwiwa zvinotyisa kumativi ose asauro uye vapfuri vouta pavakamubata, vakamukuvadza. sauro akati kumubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa, “vhomora munondo wako undibaye nawo kuti varume ava vasina kudzingiswa varege kuuya vakanditambudza.” asi mubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa akatya kwazvo akasada kuzviita; saka sauro akatora munondo wake akazviwisira pauri. mubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa paakaona kuti sauro afa, iyewo akazviwisira pamunondo wake akafa. saka sauro navanakomana vake vatatu neimba yake yose vakafa pamwe chete. zvino vaisraeri vose vakanga vagere pamupata vakati vaona kuti varwi vose vakanga vatiza uye sauro navanakomana vake vatatu vakanga vafa, vakasiya maguta avo vakatiza. uye vafiristia vakauya vakagara maari. zuva raitevera, vafiristia pavakauya kuzokutunura nhumbi dzavakanga vafa; vakawana sauro navanakomana vake vakafa pagomo regiribhoa. vakamukutunura nhumbi dzake uye vakatora musoro wake nezvombo zvake vakatuma nhume munyika yose yavafiristia kuti vandoparadzira shoko iri pakati pavamwari vavo uye navanhu vavo. vakaisa zvombo zvake mutemberi yavamwari vavo vakaturika musoro wake mutemberi yadhagoni. vagari vose vomujabheshi gireadhi pavakanzwa zvose zvakanga zvaitwa navafiristia kuna sauro, mhare dzose dzakasimuka dzikandotora zvitunha zvasauro, navanakomana vake vakauya nazvo kujabheshi vakaviga mapfupa avo pamuti mukuru wejabheshi uye vakatsanya kwamazuva manomwe. sauro akafa nokuti akanga asina kutendeka kuna yeahoh, haana kuchengeta shoko rayeahoh uyezve akandobvunzira kumasvikiro kuti atungamirirwe. haana kubvunza kuna yeahoh. saka yeahoh akamuuraya akapa umambo kuna dhavhidhi mwanakomana wajese.

11

vaisraeri vose vakaungana kuna dhavhidhi pahebhuroni vakati, “isu tiri nyama yenyu neropa renyu. kare kunyange sauro paaiva mambo ndimi maitungamirira israeri kundorwa. uye yeahoh allah wenyu akati kwamuri, ‘uchafudza vanhu vangu vaisraeri uye uchava mutongi wavo.’ ” vakuru vose veisraeri pavakauya kuna mambo dhavhidhi pahebhuroni, akaita sungano navo pahebhuroni pamberi payeahoh, uye vakazodza dhavhidhi kuti ave mambo weisraeri sezvakanga zvavimbiswa nayeahoh kubudikidza nasamueri. dhavhidhi navaisraeri vose vakaenda kujerusarema (ndiro jebhusi). vajebhusi vaigaramo vakati kuna dhavhidhi, “hamusi kuzopinda muno.” kunyange zvakadaro dhavhidhi akatapa nhare yezioni, guta radhavhidhi. dhavhidhi akanga ati, “achatungamirira kundorwisa vajebhusi ndiye achava mukuru wavarwi.” joabhu mwanakomana wazeruya ndiye akatanga kuenda, saka akapiwa utungamiri hwacho. dhavhidhi akagara munhare yezioni, saka rakazodaidzwa kuti guta radhavhidhi. akavaka guta richipoteredza, kubva pamihomba yokutsigira kusvikira kurusvingo rwakanga rwakapoteredza, joabhu achivaka patsva chimwe chikamu chose cheguta. uye dhavhidhi akaramba achiva nesimba guru nokuti yeahoh wamasimba ose aiva naye. ava ndivo vaiva vakuru pakati pavarume voumhare vaiva nadhavhidhi, avo pamwe chete neisraeri yose, vakatsigira umambo hwake zvakasimba kuti husvike munyika yose sokuvimbisa kwakanga kwaita yeahoh. aya ndiwo mazita avarume voumhare vaiva nadhavhidhi: jashobheami, muhakimoni, aiva mukuru wamachinda ehondo; akasimudza pfumo rake akarwa navarume mazana matatu, avo vaakauraya pakurwisana panguva imwe chete. aimutevera ainzi ereazari mwanakomana wadhodhai muahohi mumwe wavarume voumhare vatatu. aiva nadhavhidhi papasi dhamimi vafiristia pavakaungana ipapo kuzorwa. pane imwe nzvimbo paiva nomunda wakanga uzere nebhari, varwi vakatiza vafiristia. asi ivo vakaramba vamire pakati pomunda vakaurwira vakauraya vafiristia uye yeahoh akaita kuti vakunde nokukunda kukuru. vatatu pakati pamakumi matatu avakuru vakaburukira kuna dhavhidhi kudombo pabako readhurami, uye hondo yavafiristia yakanga yadzika matende mumupata werefaimi. panguva iyoyo dhavhidhi akanga ari munhare, uye boka rehondo yavafiristia rakanga riri pabheterehema. dhavhidhi akanzwa nyota akati, “haiwa, dai mumwe munhu ainondicherera mvura yokunwa kubva mutsime riri pedyo nesuo rebheterehema!” saka vatatu ava vakapinda napakati pehondo dzavafiristia, vakachera mvura kubva mutsime raiva pedyo nesuo rebheterehema vakaenda nayo kuna dhavhidhi. asi akaramba kuinwa akaidururira pasi pamberi payeahoh. dhavhidhi akati, “allah ngaandidzivise ndiregere kunwa izvi! ndinganwa here ropa ravarume ava vaenda vachiisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi?” nokuti vakaisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi kuti vadzoke vanayo, dhavhidhi akaramba kuinwa. aya ndiwo mamwe amabasa okukunda akaitwa navarume voumhare vatatu. abhishai mununʼuna wajoabhu akanga ari mukuru wavatatu ava. akasimudza pfumo rake kuti arwise varume mazana matatu, akavauraya, uye akava nomukurumbira savatatu vaya. akaremekedzwa zvakapetwa kaviri pamusoro pavatatu vaya uye akaitwa mutungamiri wavo, kunyange zvazvo akanga asina kuverengerwa pakati pavo. bhenaya mwanakomana wajehoyadha aiva murwi woumhare aibva kukabhizeeri, akaita mabasa makuru. akauraya mhare mbiri dzapamusoro dzavamoabhu. akapindawo mugomba mumwe musi kuine chando akauraya shumba. uye akauraya muijipita akanga akareba makubhiti mashanu. kunyange zvazvo muijipita akanga akapakata pfumo rainge tsvimbo yomuruki muruoko rwake, bhenaya akamurwisa netsvimbo. akabvuta pfumo kubva muruoko rwomuijipita akamuuraya nepfumo rake. aya ndiwo aiva mabasa abhenaya mwanakomana wajehoyadha; naiyewo akaita mukurumbira savarume vatatu voumhare. akakudzwa nokuremekedzwa kukuru kupfuura vaya makumi matatu, asi akanga asiri pakati pavatatu vaya. uye dhavhidhi akamuita mutariri wavarindi vake. varume voumhare vaiva: asaheri mununʼuna wajoabhu, erihanani mwanakomana wadhodho aibva kubheterehema. shamoti muharori, herezi muperoni, ira mwanakomana waikeshi aibva kutekoa, abhiezeri aibva kuanatoti, sibhekai muhushati, irai muahohi, maharai munetofati, heredhi mwanakomana wabhaana munetofati, itai mwanakomana waribhai aibva kugibhea mubhenjamini, bhenaya mupiratoni, hurai aibva kuhova dzegaashi, abhieri muaribhati, azimavheti mubhaharumi, eriabha mushaaribhoni, vanakomana vahashemi mugizoni, jonatani mwanakomana washage muharari, ahiami mwanakomana wasaka muharari, erifari mwanakomana wauri, heferi mumekerati, ahija muperoni, heziro mukarimeri, naarai mwanakomana waezibhai, joere mununʼuna wanatani, mibha mwanakomana wahagiri, zereki muamoni, naharai mubheroti, mubati wenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzajoabhu mwanakomana wazeruya, ira muitiri, garebhi muitiri, uria muhiti, zabhadhi mwanakomana waarai, adhina mwanakomana washiza murubheni iye aiva mukuru wavarubheni, navaya makumi matatu, vaaiva navo, hanani mwanakomana wamaaka, joshafati mumitini, uzia muashiterati, shama najeyeri vanakomana vahotamu muaroeri, jedhieri mwanakomana washimiri, mununʼuna wake joha mutizi, erieri mumahavhi, jeribhai najoshavhia vanakomana vaerinaami, itima mumoabhu, erieri, obhedhi najaasieri mumezobhai.

12

ava ndivo varume vakauya kuna dhavhidhi pazikiragi achakavanda nokuda kwasauro mwanakomana wakishi; uye ndivo vamwe vavarwi vakamubatsira muhondo. vakanga vapakata uta uye vaigona kupfura miseve nezvimviriri noruoko rworudyi kana rworuboshwe; vaiva hama dzasauro dzokurudzi rwabhenjamini. ahiezeri, mukuru wavo, najoashi, vanakomana vashemaya mugibheati; jezieri napereti vanakomana vaazimavheti; bheraka, jehu muanatoti, naishimaya mugibheoni, aiva mhare pakati pamakumi matatu; aiva mutungamiri wamakumi matatu; jeremia, jahazieri, johanani; jozabadhi mugedherati, eruzai, jerimoti, bhearia, shemaria nashafatia muharufi; erikana, ishiya, azareri, joezeri najashobheami vakorahi; najoera nazebhadhia vanakomana vajehoramu vaibva kugedhori. vamwe vagadhi vakazvitsaurawo vakaenda kwaiva nadhavhidhi kunhare yake kurenje. vaiva varwi vakashinga, vakagadzirira kurwa uye vaigona kubata nhoo nepfumo. zviso zvavo zvaiva zviso zveshumba, uye vaimhanya semharapara mumakomo. ezeri ndiye aiva mukuru, obhadhia ari wechipiri, eriabhi ari wechitatu, mishimana wechina, jeremia wechishanu, atai wechitanhatu, erieri wechinomwe, johanani worusere, erizabhadhi wechipfumbamwe, jeremia wegumi namakibhanai wegumi nomumwe. vagadhi ava ndivo vaiva vatungamiriri vamauto, mudiki ainge akaenzana nezana, uye mukuru ainge akaenzana nechiuru. ivava ndivo vaya vakayambuka jorodhani mumwedzi wokutanga parwainge rwakazara nokumahombekombe uye vakaita kuti vanhu vose vaigara mumipata, kumabvazuva nokumavirira, vatize. vamwe vabhenjamini navamwe varume vaibva kuyeahudha vakauyawo kuna dhavhidhi munhare yake. dhavhidhi akaenda kundosangana navo akati kwavari, “kana mauya kwandiri norugare, kuzondibatsira, ndakagadzirira kuti mubatane neni. asi kana mauya kuzonditengesa kuvavengi vangu iwo maoko angu asina kuita zvechisimba, allah wamadzibaba edu ngaazvione uye akutongei.” ipapo mweya wakauya pana amasi mukuru wamakumi matatu akati, “haiwa dhavhidhi, tiri vako! haiwa mwanakomana wajese, tinewe! kubudirira, kubudirira ngakuve kwauri, uye kubudirira ngakuve kuna vanokubatsira nokuti allah wako achakubatsira.” saka dhavhidhi akavagamuchira akavaita vatungamiri veboka ravarwi vake. vamwe varume vokwamanase vakabatana nadhavhidhi paakaenda navafiristia kundorwisa sauro. iye navanhu vake havana kubatsira vafiristia nokuti, vapedza kubvunzana, vatongi vavo vakamudzosa vakati, “zvichatiurayisa kana akazotitiza akandobatana namambo wake sauro.” dhavhidhi paakaenda kuzikiragi, ava ndivo vaiva varume vokwamanase vakabatana naye: adhina, jozabhadhi, jedhieri, mikaeri, jozabhadhi, erihu naziretai, vatungamiri vemapoka echiuru muna manase. vakabatsira dhavhidhi paairwisana namapoka amakororo, nokuti vose vakanga vari varwi vakashinga uye vaiva vatungamiri muhondo yake. zuva nezuva varume vakauya kuzobatsira dhavhidhi kusvikira ava nehondo huru kwazvo, sehondo yaallah. uku ndiko kuwanda kwavarume vakanga vakapakata zvombo kuti vandorwa, vakauya kuna dhavhidhi pahebhuroni kuti vatore umambo hwasauro vahupe kwaari, sezvazvakanga zvarehwa nayeahoh: varume vokwayeahudha vakanga vakapakata nhoo namapfumo vaiva zviuru zvitanhatu namazana masere uye akapakata zvombo kuti vandorwa; varume vokwasimeoni, varwi vakanga vakagadzirira kundorwa vaiva zviuru zvinomwe nezana; varume vokwarevhi zviuru zvina namazana matanhatu, pamwe chete najehoyadha, mutungamiri wemhuri yaaroni aiva navarume zviuru zvitatu namazana manomwe, nazadhoki, murwi wechidiki aiva akashinga, navakuru vamapoka makumi maviri navaviri kubva kumhuri yake; varume vokwabhenjamini, hama dzasauro vaiva zviuru zvitatu vazhinji vavo vakanga vamboramba vachitevera sauro kusvikira musi uyu; varume vokwaefuremu varwi vakashinga vaiva nomukurumbira kwazvo kumhuri dzavo vaiva zviuru makumi maviri namazana masere; varume vokuhafu yorudzi rwamanase vakadanwa namazita avo kuti vauye vazogadza dhavhidhi umambo vaiva zviuru gumi nezvisere; varume vokwaisakari vainzwisisa nguva uye vaiziva kuti israeri yaifanira kuitei, vaiva vakuru mazana maviri nehama dzavo dzose dzaiva pasi pavo; varume vokwazebhuruni, varwi vaiziva, vakanga vakagadzirira kurwa nezvombo zvemhando dzose, vakauya kuzobatsira dhavhidhi nomwoyo wakaperera, vaiva zviuru makumi mashanu; varume vokwanafutari vaiva chiuru chavakuru vamapoka, pamwe chete nezviuru makumi matatu nezvinomwe zvavarume vakanga vakatakura nhoo namapfumo; varume vokwadhani, vakanga vakagadzirira kurwa, zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere namazana matanhatu; varume vokwaasheri, vakanga vane unyanzvi hwokurwa uye vakagadzirira kurwa, vaiva zviuru makumi mana; uye kubva kumabvazuva ajorodhani, varume vokwarubheni, gadhi nehafu yorudzi rwamanase vakanga vakapakata zvombo zvemhando dzose, vaiva zviuru zana namakumi maviri. ava vose vaiva varume vokurwa vakazvipira kundorwa. vakauya pahebhuroni vakagadzirira zvizere kuzogadza dhavhidhi kuti ave mambo weisraeri. vamwe vaisraeri vose vaiva nomwoyo mumwe chete wokuti vaite dhavhidhi mambo. varume vakagara mazuva matatu ipapo vaina dhavhidhi vachidya uye vachinwa nokuti mhuri dzavo dzainge dzavavigira zvokudya. uyewo, vavakidzani vavo vokure kwazvo kunyange kwaisakari, kwazebhuruni nokwanafutari vakauya nezvokudya zviri pambongoro, ngamera, manyurusi nenzombe. pakanga paine zvokudya zvizhinji kwazvo zvaiti upfu, makeke amaonde, makeke amazambiringa akaoma, waini, mafuta, nzombe, namakwai nokuti mufaro wakanga uripo pakati peisraeri.

13

dhavhidhi akataurirana nomumwe nomumwe wavabati vake vose, vatungamiri vezviuru, navatungamiri vamazana. akati kuungano yose yeisraeri, “kana zvichiita sezvakakunakirai uye kana kuri kuda kwayeahoh allah wedu, ngatitumirei shoko kwose kwose kuhama dzedu dzakasara munyika yose yeisraeri, nokuvaprista navarevhi vavagere navo mumaguta avo nokumafuro avo kuti vauye vazobatana nesu. ngatidzorei areka yaallah wedu kwatiri zvakare, nokuti izvi hatina kuzvibvunza panguva yokutonga kwasauro.” ungano yose yakabvuma kuita izvi, nokuti zvairatidzika kunge zvakanaka kuvanhu vose. saka dhavhidhi akaunganidza vaisraeri vose kubva kurwizi shihori muijipiti kusvika kurebho hamati, kuti vatore areka yaallah kubva kukiriati jearimi. dhavhidhi navaisraeri vose vaiva naye vakaenda kubhaara reyeahudha (kiriati jearimi) kuti vandotora areka yaallah yeahoh, agere pakati pamakerubhi, iyo areka inodaidzwa nezita irori. vakatakura areka yaallah kubva muimba yaabhinadhabhi iri mungoro itsva, uza naahio vakaitungamirira. dhavhidhi navaisraeri vose vakanga vachipembera nesimba ravo rose pamberi paallah, nenziyo, nembira, nemitengeranwa, netambureni, nemakandira nehwamanda. pavakasvika paburiro rakidhoni, uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti atsigire areka nokuti nzombe dzakanga dzagumburwa. kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakamukira uza akamuuraya nokuti akanga atambanudza ruoko rwake akabata areka. saka akafa pakarepo pamberi paallah. ipapo dhavhidhi akatsamwa nokuti kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakanga kwawira pana uza, uye kusvikira nhasi nzvimbo iyoyo inonzi perezi uza. dhavhidhi akatya allah zuva iroro uye akabvunza achiti, “ko, ndingadzosa areka yaallah kwandiri seiko?” haana kutora areka kuti ive naye muguta radhavhidhi. asi akaenda nayo kuimba yaobhedhi-edhomu mugiti. areka yaallah yakasara mumhuri yaobhedhi-edhomu muimba yake kwemwedzi mitatu, uye yeahoh akaropafadza imba yake nezvose zvaakanga anazvo.

14

zvino hiramu mambo wetire akatuma nhume kuna dhavhidhi namatanda emisidhari navavaki, navavezi, kuti vamuvakire imba youmambo. uye dhavhidhi akaziva kuti yeahoh akanga amusimbisa samambo pamusoro peisraeri uye kuti umambo hwake hwakanga hwakudzwa kwazvo nokuda kwavanhu vake israeri. mujerusarema, dhavhidhi akazvitorerazve vamwe vakadzi akava baba vavanakomana navanasikana vazhinji. aya ndiwo mazita avana vaakaberekerwa ikoko: shamua, shobhabhi, natani, soromoni, ibhari, erishua, eripereti, noga, nefegi, jafia, erishama, bheeriyadha naerifereti. vafiristia pavakanzwa kuti dhavhidhi akanga agadzwa kuti ave mambo weisraeri, vakaenda nehondo yose kundomutsvaka, asi dhavhidhi akazvinzwa akabuda kundosangana navo. zvino vafiristia vakanga vauya kuzopamba mupata werefaimi; saka dhavhidhi akabvunza kuna allah akati, “ndingaenda here kundorwisa vafiristia? mungavaisa mumaoko angu here?” yeahoh akapindura akati, “enda ndichavaisa mumaoko ako.” saka dhavhidhi navanhu vake vakakwidza kubhaari perazimu uye ikoko akavakunda akati, “sokupwanya kunoita mvura, allah akapwanya vavengi vangu noruoko rwangu.” saka nzvimbo iyoyo yakatumidzwa kunzi bhaari perazimu. vafiristia vakasiya vamwari vavo ipapo, dhavhidhi akarayira kuti vapiswe mumoto. vafiristia vakarwisa zvakare mupata uya. saka dhavhidhi akabvunza allah zvakare, allah akamupindura akati, “usangonanga ikoko asi vakomberedze wozovarwisa wava pamberi pemiti yemibharisamu. pamunotanga kunzwa kutinhira kwokufamba pamisoro yemiti yemibharisamu, unofanira kubuda kundorwa, nokuti zvichange zvichireva kuti allah akutungamirira kundoparadza hondo yavafiristia.” saka dhavhidhi akaita sokurayirwa kwaakanga aitwa naallah, uye vakaparadza hondo yavafiristia, kubva kugibheoni, kusvika kugezeri. saka mukurumbira wadhavhidhi wakapararira nenyika yose uye yeahoh akaita kuti marudzi ose amutye.

15

dhavhidhi paakapedza kuzvivakira dzimba muguta radhavhidhi, akagadzira nzvimbo yainogara areka yaallah uye akaidzikira tende. ipapo dhavhidhi akati, “hakuna munhu kunze kwavarevhi anofanira kutakura areka yaallah, nokuti yeahoh akavasarudza kuti vatakure areka yayeahoh uye kuti vashumire pamberi pake nokusingaperi.” dhavhidhi akaunganidza israeri yose mujerusarema kuti vatore areka yayeahoh vagoiisa kunzvimbo yaakanga aigadzirira. akaunganidza zvizvarwa zvaaroni navarevhi: kubva kuzvizvarwa zvakohati, urieri mutungamiri nehama dzake zana namakumi maviri; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvamerari, asaya mutungamiri nehama dzake mazana maviri namakumi maviri; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvagerishoni, joere mutungamiri nehama dzake zana namakumi matatu; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaerizafani, shemaya mutungamiri nehama dzake mazana maviri; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvahebhuroni, erieri mutungamiri nehama dzake makumi masere; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvauzieri, aminadhabhi mutungamiri nehama dzake zana negumi navaviri. ipapo dhavhidhi akadana zadhoki naabhiatari vaprista, naurieri, asaya, joere, shemaya, erieri naaminadhabhi varevhi. akati kwavari, “imi muri vakuru vemhuri dzavarevhi, imi navamwe varevhi vose munofanira kuzvinatsa kuti mukwire neareka yayeahoh allah weisraeri kunzvimbo yandakaigadzirira. izvi zvakaitika nokuti imi varevhi hamuna kukwira neareka pakutanga paya yeahoh allah wedu paakatiratidza kutsamwa kukuru. hatina kunge tabvunza kwaari kuti tingazviite sei nenzira yakarayirwa.” saka vaprista navarevhi vakazvinatsa kuti vakwire neareka yayeahoh allah waisraeri. uye varevhi vakatakura areka yaallah namatanda pamapfudzi avo, sezvakanga zvarayirwa namozisi maererano neshoko rayeahoh. dhavhidhi akataurira vatungamiri vavarevhi kuti vagadze hama dzavo kuti vave vaimbi kuti vazonoimba dzimbo dzomufaro nezviridzwa zvaiti: mitengeranwa, mbira, namakandira. saka varevhi vakagadza hemani mwanakomana wajoere; kubva kuhama dzake asafi mwanakomana wabherekia; uye kubva kuhama dzavo vamerari, etani mwanakomana wakushaya; uye pamwe chete navo hama dzavo dzaitevera paukuru dzaiti: zekariyeah, jaazieri, shemiramoti, jehieri, uni, eriabhi, bhenaya, maaseya, matitia, eriferehu, mikineya, obhedhi-edhomu, jeyeri varindi vemikova. vaimbi vaiti hemani, asafi naetani vakagadzwa kuti varidze makandira endarira. zekariyeah, azieri, shemiramoti, jehieri, uni, eriabhi, maaseya, nabhenaya vaizoridza mitengeranwa, maererano nearamoti, uye matitia, eriferehu, mikineya, obhedhi-edhomu, jeyeri, naazazia vaizoridza mbira maererano neshiminiti. kenania mukuru wavarevhi ndiye aitungamirira kuimba; ndiro rakanga riri basa rake nokuti aiva nyanzvi pariri. bherekia naerikana ndivo vaizova varindi vemikova weareka. shebhania, joshafati, netaneri, amasai, zekariyeah, bhenaya naerieza vaprista vaizoridza hwamanda pamberi peareka yaallah. obhedhi-edhomu najehia vaizovawo vatariri vomusuo weareka. dhavhidhi navakuru veisraeri navakuru vamapoka ane chiuru vakaenda kundotora areka yesungano yaallah kubva kumba kwaobhedhi-edhomu, vachifara. nokuti allah akanga abatsira varevhi avo vainge vatakura areka yesungano yaallah, vakabayira allah hando nomwe namakondobwe manomwe. zvino dhavhidhi akanga akapfeka nguo yomucheka wakanaka sezvakanga zvakaita vaimbi, nakenania akanga ari mutungamiri wokuimba kuvaimbi. dhavhidhi akanga akapfekawo efodhi yomucheka. saizvozvo vaisraeri vose vakakwidza neareka yesungano yayeahoh vachidanidzira, uye vachiridza mimhanzi yenyanga dzamakondobwe nehwamanda namakandira, uye vachiridza mitengeranwa nembira. zvino areka yesungano yayeahoh yakati yasvika muguta radhavhidhi, mikaeri mwanasikana wasauro akatarira napawindo. uye akaona mambo dhavhidhi achipembera nokutamba, akamushora mumwoyo make.

16

vakauya neareka yaallah vakaiisa mukati metende rayakanga yagadzirirwa nadhavhidhi, vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana pamberi paallah. dhavhidhi akati apedza kubayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa, akaropafadza vanhu muzita rayeahoh. ipapo akapa mumwe nomumwe womudzimai nomurume wechiisraeri rofu rechingwa, keke romuchero womuchindwe nekeke ramazambiringa akaoma. akagadza vamwe vavarevhi kuti vashumire pamberi peareka yayeahoh, vakumbirire, vavonge uye kuti varumbidze yeahoh, allah waisraeri: asafi ndiye aiva mukuru wavo, zekariyeah wechipiri, kuchitevera jeyeri shemiramoti, jehieri, matitia, eriabhi, bhenaya, obhedhi-edhomu najeyeri. vaizoridza mitengeranwa nembira; asafi aizoridza makandira uye bhenaya najahazieri vaprista vaizoridza hwamanda nguva dzose pamberi peareka yesungano yaallah. zuva iroro dhavhidhi akapa kwokutanga asafi navamwe vake pisarema iri rokuvonga yeahoh: vongai yeahoh, danai kuzita rake; zivisai pakati pendudzi dzose zvaakaita. muimbirei, muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza; taurai zvose zvamabasa ake anoshamisa. zvirumbidzei muzita rake dzvene; mwoyo yaavo vanotsvaka yeahoh ngaifare. tarisai kuna yeahoh nokusimba rake; tsvakai chiso chake nguva dzose. rangarirai zvishamiso zvaakaita, zviratidzo zvake uye nemitongo yaakareva. haiwa, imi zvizvarwa zvaisraeri muranda wake, haiwa imi vanakomana vayaqobho vasanangurwa vake. ndiye yeahoh allah wedu; mitongo yake iri munyika yose. anorangarira sungano yake nokusingaperi, shoko raakarayira, kwechiuru chezvizvarwa. sungano yaakaita naabhurahama, mhiko yaakapika kuna isaka. akasimbisa kuna yaqobho somutemo, kuna israeri sesungano isingaperi, achiti: “kwauri ndichapa nyika yekenani, sechikamu chenhaka yako.” pavakanga vari vashoma, vari vashoma kwazvo, vari vatorwa mairi, vakadzungaira kubva kuno rumwe rudzi kusvika kuno rumwe, kubva kuno humwe umambo kusvika kuno humwe. haana kutendera munhu kuti avadzvinyirire; nokuda kwavo akatuka madzimambo. “musabata vazodziwa vangu; musaitira vaprofita vangu zvakaipa.” imbirai yeahoh, pasi pose; paridzai ruponeso rwake zuva nezuva. zivisai kubwinya kwake pakati pendudzi, mabasa ake anoshamisa pakati pavanhu vose. nokuti yeahoh mukuru uye anofanira kwazvo kurumbidzwa; anofanira kutyiwa pamusoro pavamwari vose. nokuti vamwari vose vendudzi zvifananidzo, asi yeahoh akasika matenga. kubwinya nokukudzwa zviri pamberi pake; simba nomufaro zviri munzvimbo yougaro hwake. ipai kuna yeahoh, imi mhuri dzendudzi, ipai yeahoh kukudzwa nesimba, ipai yeahoh kukudzwa kunofanira zita rake. uyai nezvipiriso uye muuye pamberi pake; namatai yeahoh mukubwinya kwoutsvene hwake. dederai pamberi pake, imi nyika yose! nyika yakasimbiswa kwazvo; haingazungunuswi. matenga ngaafare, nyika ngaifare; ngavati pakati pendudzi, “yeahoh anotonga!” gungwa ngaritinhire nezvose zviri mariri; minda ngaifarisise nezvose zviri mairi. ipapo miti yesango ichaimba, ichaimba nomufaro pamberi payeahoh, nokuti anouya kuzotonga nyika. vongai yeahoh nokuti akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi. danidzirai muchiti, “tiponesei, imi allah muponesi wedu; tiunganidzei uye mutirwire pandudzi, kuti tigovonga zita renyu dzvene kuti tifarisise mukukurumbidzai.” rumbidzai yeahoh, allah waisraeri, kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira pakusingaperi. ipapo vanhu vose vakati, “ameni” uye vakarumbidza yeahoh. dhavhidhi akasiya asafi navamwe vake pamberi peareka yesungano yayeahoh kuti ashumirepo nguva dzose maererano nezvaidiwa zuva rimwe nerimwe. akasiya obhedhi-edhomu navamwe vake makumi matanhatu navasere kuti vashumire navo. obhedhi-edhomu mwanakomana wajedhutuni nahosa vaiva vatariri vamasuo. dhavhidhi akasiya zadhoki muprista navamwe vaprista pamberi petabhenakeri yayeahoh panzvimbo yakakwirira mugibheoni kuti vape zvipiriso zvinopiswa, kuna yeahoh paaritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa, nguva dzose, mangwanani namanheru maererano nezvose zvakanga zvakanyorwa mumurayiro wayeahoh waakanga apa israeri. pakati pavo paiva nahemani najedhutuni navamwe vose vaiva vakasarudzwa namazita kuti vavonge yeahoh, “nokuti rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” hemani najedhutuni vaiva nebasa rokuridza hwamanda namakandira uye nokuridza zvimwe zviridzwa parwiyo rutsvene. vanakomana vajedhutuni vakaitwa vatariri vamasuo. ipapo vanhu vose vakabvapo, mumwe nomumwe akaenda kumba kwake, uye dhavhidhi akadzokera kumba kwake kundoropafadza mhuri yake.

17

shure kwokunge dhavhidhi agara mumuzinda wake akati kuna natani muprofita, “ndiri pano zvangu ndigere mumuzinda womusidhari, asi areka yesungano yayeahoh iri pasi petende.” natani akapindura kuna dhavhidhi akati, “zvose zvamunazvo mupfungwa itai nokuti allah anemi.” usiku ihwohwo shoko raallah rakasvika kuna natani richiti: “enda unotaurira muranda wangu dhavhidhi kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: hausiwe uchandivakira imba yokugara. handina kumbogara mumba kubvira zuva randakaburitsa israeri kubva muijipiti kusvikira zuva ranhasi. ndaifamba kubva mutende ndichienda mune rimwe, kubva pane imwe nzvimbo yokugara ndichienda pane imwe. kwose kwose kwandakafamba navaisraeri vose, ndakamboti here kuno mumwe zvake wavatungamiri vavo, wandairayira kuti afudze vanhu vangu, “seiko usina kundivakira imba yomusidhari?” ’ “zvino naizvozvo udza muranda wangu dhavhidhi kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh wamasimba ose: ndakakutora kubva kumafuro kwawakanga uchifudza makwai, kuti uve mutongi wavanhu vangu israeri. ndakanga ndinewe kwose kwawaienda uye ndakauraya vavengi vako vose pamberi pako. zvino ndichaita kuti zita rako rive samazita avarume vakuru kwazvo panyika. uye ndichapa nzvimbo kuvanhu vangu israeri uye ndichavadyara kuti vave nomusha wavo pachavo uye kuti vasazokanganiswa. vanhu vakaipa havangazovadzvinyiriri zvakare sezvavakavaita pakutanga uye sezvavakaita kubvira panguva yandakagadza vatungamiri vavanhu vangu israeri. ndichakundawo vavengi venyu vose. “ ‘ndinokuudza kuti yeahoh achakuvakira imba: kana mazuva ako akwana uye pauchaenda kundova namadzibaba ako, ndichasimudza mwana wako achakutevera paumambo, mumwe wavanakomana vako pachako uye ndichasimbisa umambo hwake. iyeye ndiye achandivakira imba, uye ndichasimbisa chigaro chake choumambo nokusingaperi. ndichava baba vake uye iye achava mwanakomana wangu. handizobvisi rudo rwangu kwaari zvakare sokurubvisa kwandakaita kune akakutangira. ndichamugadza kuti atonge imba yangu noumambo hwangu nokusingaperi; chigaro chake chichasimbiswa nokusingaperi.’ ” natani akandotaura kuna dhavhidhi mashoko ose echiratidzo chose ichi. ipapo mambo dhavhidhi akapinda akagara pamberi paallah akati: “ndini aniko, nhai yeahoh allah, uye mhuri yangu chiiko, kuti mandisvitsawo pano? uye sokuti izvi hazvina kukwana pamberi penyu, haiwa allah, mataurazve nezveramangwana reimba yomuranda wenyu. mandiona sokunge ndini ndinokudzwa kupinda vanhu vose, imi yeahoh allah. “chiizve chimwe chingataurwa nadhavhidhi kwamuri nokuda kwokuti maremekedza muranda wenyu kudai? nokuti munoziva muranda wenyu, imi yeahoh, nokuda kwomuranda wenyu uye maererano nokuda kwenyu maita chinhu chikuru ichi mukaita kuti zvivimbiso izvi zvikuru zviziviswe. “hakuna mumwe akaita semi, imi yeahoh, uye hakuna allah kunze kwenyu, sezvatakanzwa nenzeve dzedu pachedu. uye ndiani akaita savanhu venyu israeri, rudzi rumwe chete panyika runa allah warwo akaenda kundozvidzikinurira vanhu, kuti azviitire zita, uye kuti aite zvishamiso zvikuru zvinotyisa, nokudzinga ndudzi kubva pamberi pavanhu venyu vamakadzikinura kubva kuijipiti? makazvigadzirira vanhu venyu israeri kuti vave venyu pachenyu nokusingaperi, uye imi, imi yeahoh, mava allah wavo. “uye zvino, yeahoh, itai kuti chivimbiso chamaita kumuranda wenyu neimba yake chisimbiswe nokusingaperi. itai sezvamakavimbisa, kuitira kuti chisimbiswe uye kuti zita renyu rive guru nokusingaperi. ipapo vanhu vachati, ‘yeahoh wamasimba ose, allah waisraeri, ndiye allah waisraeri.’ uye imba yomuranda wenyu dhavhidhi ichasimbiswa pamberi penyu. “imi allah wangu, mazivisa muranda wenyu kuti muchamuvakira imba. saka muranda wenyu atsunga kuti anyengetere kwamuri. haiwa yeahoh, muri allah! mavimbisawo zvinhu izvi zvakanaka kumuranda wenyu. zvino makafadzwa kuti muropafadze imba yomuranda wenyu kuti ienderere mberi nokusingaperi pamberi penyu, nokuti imi, imi yeahoh, mairopafadza uye ichava yakaropafadzwa nokusingaperi.”

18

nokufamba kwenguva, dhavhidhi akakunda vafiristia akavaisa pasi pake, uye akavatorera gati nemisha yakaripoteredza kuti ribve pasi poruoko rwavafiristia. dhavhidhi akakundawo vamoabhu, uye vakava pasi pake, vakamuvigira mutero. pamusoro pezvo dhavhidhi akarwisa hadhadhezeri mambo wezobha kusvikira kuhamati, paakaenda kundosimbisa kutonga kwake achitevedza rwizi yufuratesi. dhavhidhi akapamba chiuru chengoro dzake, vachairi vengoro zviuru zvinomwe navarwi vetsoka zviuru makumi maviri. akadimbura marunda amakumbo amabhiza ose kusara kwezana ramabhiza engoro. vaaramu vedhamasiko pavakauya kuzobatsira hadhadhezeri mambo wezobha, dhavhidhi akauraya zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri zvavo. akaisa mapoka avarwi vake muumambo hwavaaramu vedhamasiko, uye vaaramu vakava pasi pake uye vakamuvigira mutero. yeahoh akapa dhavhidhi kukunda kwose kwose kwaakaenda. dhavhidhi akatora nhoo dzegoridhe dzaiva dzakatakurwa navatungamiri vehondo yahadhadhezeri akaenda nadzo kujerusarema. kubva kutebha nokukuni, maguta ahadhadhezeri, dhavhidhi akatora ndarira zhinji, yakazoshandiswa nasoromoni kugadzira gungwa rendarira, nembiru uye nezvimwe zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana zvakazogadzirwa nendarira. tou mambo wehamati paakanzwa kuti dhavhidhi akanga akunda hondo yose yahadhadhezeri mambo wezobha, akatuma mwanakomana wake hadhoramu akauya nezvinhu zvamarudzi ose zvegoridhe nesirivha nendarira. mambo dhavhidhi akakumikidza zvipo izvi kuna yeahoh sezvaakanga aita nesirivha negoridhe, zvaakanga atora kubva kundudzi idzi dzose dzaiti: edhomu, moabhu, vaamoni, vafiristia neamareki. abhishai mwanakomana wazeruya akauraya vaedhomu zviuru gumi nezvisere mumupata wemunyu. akaisa mapoka avarwi muedhomu uye vaedhomu vose vakava pasi poutongi hwadhavhidhi. yeahoh akapa dhavhidhi kukunda kwose kwose kwaakaenda. dhavhidhi akatonga israeri achiita zvose zvakarurama uye zvakanaka kuvanhu vake vose. joabhu mwanakomana wazeruya aitungamirira hondo; jehoshafati mwanakomana waahirudhi aiva munyori wenhoroondo; zadhoki mwanakomana waahitubhi naahimereki mwanakomana waabhiatari vaiva vaprista; shavhisha akanga ari munyori; bhenaya mwanakomana wajehoyadha aitungamirira vakereti navapereti; uye vanakomana vadhavhidhi vaiva machinda makuru parutivi pamambo.

19

mukufamba kwenguva, nahashi mambo wavaamoni akafa, mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. dhavhidhi akafunga akati, “ndicharatidza mwoyo wakanaka kuna hanuni mwanakomana wanahashi nokuti baba vake vakaratidza mwoyo wakanaka kwandiri.” saka dhavhidhi akatuma nhume kundonyaradza hanuni pamusoro pababa vake. vanhu vadhavhidhi pavakasvika kuna hanuni munyika yavaamoni kuzomunyaradza, machinda avaamoni akati kuna hanuni, “unofunga here kuti dhavhidhi ari kukudza baba vako nokutuma vanhu vake kuti vauye kuzokunyaradza? vanhu vake havana kuuya kuzosora nyika yedu here kuti vaitore?” saka hanuni akabata vanhu vadhavhidhi, akavagera ndebvu dzavo, akacheka nguo dzavo napakati kumagaro, akavadzinga. mumwe munhu akauya akaudza dhavhidhi pamusoro pavarume ava, dhavhidhi akatuma nhume kuti dzinosangana navo nokuti vakanga vanyadziswa kwazvo. mambo akati, “garai pajeriko kusvikira ndebvu dzenyu dzakura, mugozodzoka.” vaamoni vakati vaziva kuti vakanga vava chinhu chinonhuhwa mumhino dzadhavhidhi, hanuni navaamoni vakatumira chiuru chamatarenda esirivha kuti vanokumbira ngoro navachairi vadzo kubva kuaramu naharaimu, aramu maaka nokuzobha. vakakumbira ngoro zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri navachairi vadzo, pamwe chete namambo wemaaka navarwi vake, uye akauya akadzika musasa pedyo nemedebha, ukuwo vaamoni vachiungana kubva mumaguta avo, uye vakabuda kundorwa. paakanzwa izvi, dhavhidhi akatuma joabhu kuti abude nehondo yose yavarume vokurwa. vaamoni vakabudawo vakagadzirira kurwa uye vakamira vari mumitsetse yokurwa pasuo reguta ravo, uye madzimambo akanga auya akanga ari pachawo musango. joabhu akaona kuti kwaiva nemitsetse yavanhu vakagadzirira kurwa mberi kwake neshure kwake; saka akasarudza mamwe amapoka avarwi vapamusoro muisraeri akavaendesa kuti vandorwa navaaramu. akaisa vamwe varume vose pasi paabhishai mununʼuna wake uye vakaendeswa kuti vandorwa navaamoni. joabhu akati, “kana vaaramu vandikundaka, ipapo iwe unofanira kuzondinunura; asi kana vaamoni vakakukunda, ipapo ini ndichakununura. simba uye ngatirwirei vanhu vedu namaguta aallah wedu takashinga. yeahoh achaita zvakanaka pamberi pake.” ipapo joabhu navarwi vaiva naye vakaenda kundorwa navaaramu, ivo vakatiza pamberi pavo. vaamoni pavakaona kuti vaaramu vakanga vava kutiza, ivo vakatizawo pamberi pomununʼuna wake abhishai vakamhanyira mukati meguta. ipapo joabhu akadzokera kujerusarema. mushure mokunge vaaramu vaona kuti vakanga vakundwa neisraeri vakatumira nhume kunokokorodza vamwe vaaramu mberi kwerwizi, shofaki mutungamiri wehondo yahadhadhezeri achivatungamirira. dhavhidhi paakaudzwa izvi, akaunganidza israeri yose ndokuyambuka jorodhani; akaswedera kwavari kunovarwisa uye akaronga mitsetse yehondo akatarisana navo. dhavhidhi akaita kuti mitsetse yake isangane navaaramu muhondo uye ivo vakarwa naye. asi vakatiza pamberi paisraeri, uye dhavhidhi akauraya zviuru zvinomwe zvavachairi vengoro, nezviuru makumi mana zvavarwi vetsoka. akaurayawo shofaki mutungamiri wehondo yavo. varanda vahadhadhezeri pavakaona kuti vakanga vakundwa neisraeri, vakayanana nadhavhidhi uye vakava pasi pake. saka vaaramu havana kuzoda kubatsira vaamoni zvakare.

20

munguva yechirimo, panguva iyo madzimambo anoenda kuhondo, joabhu, akatungamirira mauto akashonga zvombo zvokurwa. akaparadza nyika yavaamoni akaenda kurabha akandorikomba, asi dhavhidhi akasara mujerusarema. joabhu akarwisa rabha akarisiya raparara. dhavhidhi akatora korona kubva pamusoro wamambo wavo, uremu hwayo hwakaonekwa kuti hwaiva tarenda regoridhe uye yakanga ina mabwe anokosha uye yakaiswa pamusoro padhavhidhi. akapamba zvinhu zvizhinji kwazvo muguta iri uye akabudisa vanhu vakanga varimo, akavatongera kuti vashande namajeko namapiki namatemo. dhavhidhi akaita saizvozvi kumaguta ose avaamoni. ipapo dhavhidhi nehondo yake yose akadzokera kujerusarema. nokufamba kwenguva, hondo yakatanga navafiristia pagezeri. panguva iyoyi sibhekai muhushati akauraya sipai, mumwe wezvizvarwa zvavarefa, vafiristia vakakundwa. mune kumwe kurwisana navafiristia, erihanani mwanakomana wajairi akauraya rami mununʼuna wagoriati mugiti, aiva nepfumo raiva nomubato wakafanana nedanda romuruki. mune kumwe kurwisana zvakare, kwakaitika pagati paiva nomumwe murume mukuru kwazvo aiva neminwe mitanhatu muruoko rumwe norumwe nezvigunwe zvitanhatu kugumbo rimwe nerimwe, zvose pamwe chete zvaiva makumi maviri nezvina. aivawo worudzi rwarafa. paakatuka israeri, jonatani mwanakomana washimea, mununʼuna wadhavhidhi akamuuraya. izvi ndizvo zvizvarwa zvarafa mugati, uye vakaurayiwa nadhavhidhi navanhu vake.

21

satani akamukira israeri akakurudzira dhavhidhi kuti averenge vaisraeri. saka dhavhidhi akati kuna joabhu navatungamiri vamapoka avarwi, “endai mundoverenga vaisraeri vose kubva kubheerishebha kusvikira kudhani. uye mugozondiudza kuitira kuti ndizive kuti vangani variko.” asi joabhu akapindura akati, “yeahoh ngavawedzere uwandu hwavarwi vake kakapetwa kazana. ishe wangu mambo, ava vose havasi pasi petsoka dzenyu here? seiko ishe wangu muchida kuita izvi? sei muchida kuuyisa mhosva kuna israeri?” zvisinei, shoko ramambo rakakunda rajoabhu, saka joabhu akabvapo akaenda muisraeri yose uye akadzokera kujerusarema. joabhu akataurira dhavhidhi uwandu hwavarwi achiti muisraeri yose maiva navanhu vaigona kubata munondo vaisvika miriyoni nezana rezviuru zvavarume, vachisanganisira zviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe muyeahudha. asi joabhu haana kusanganisira revhi nabhenjamini mukuverenga uku, nokuti kurayira kwamambo kwakanga kwakaipa kwazvo kwaari. kurayira uku kwakanga kwakaipawo pamberi paallah, saka akaranga israeri. ipapo dhavhidhi akati kuna allah, “ndakatadza zvikuru pandakaita chinhu ichi. zvino ndinokumbirawo kuti mubvise kuipa kwomuranda wenyu. ndakaita sebenzi kwazvo.” yeahoh akati kuna gadhi muoni wadhavhidhi, “enda undotaurira dhavhidhi kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndinokupa zvinhu zvitatu zvokusarudza. zvisarudzire chaunoda kuti ndikuitire ndichikuranga.’ ” saka gadhi akaenda kuna dhavhidhi akati kwaari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘sarudza pakati peizvi: makore matatu enzara, mwedzi mitatu yokutsvairwa pamberi pavavengi vako, minondo yavo ichikuparadzai, kana kuti mazuva matatu omunondo wayeahoh, mazuva edenda munyika mutumwa wayeahoh achiparadza panyika yose yaisraeri.’ zvino saka zvisarudzirei kuti ndinganopindura sei uyo akandituma.” dhavhidhi akati kuna gadhi, “ndiri mukutambudzika kukuru kwazvo. rega hako ndiwire mumaoko ayeahoh nokuti tsitsi dzake dzakakura kwazvo, asi musandirega ndichiwira mumaoko avanhu.” saka yeahoh akatumira denda muisraeri uye zviuru makumi manomwe zvavarume veisraeri vakawira pasi vakafa. uye yeahoh akatuma mutumwa kuti aparadze jerusarema, asi mutumwa uya paakanga achiita izvi yeahoh akazviona uye akazvidemba nokuda kwedambudziko iri akati kumutumwa aiparadza vanhu, “zvakwana! dzosa ruoko rwako.” mutumwa wayeahoh ipapo akanga akamira paburiro raarauna mujebhusi. dhavhidhi akatarisa kumusoro akaona mutumwa wayeahoh akamira pakati pedenga nenyika, aine munondo muruoko rwake akarutambanudzira pamusoro pejerusarema. ipapo dhavhidhi navakuru vose vakapfeka masaga, vakawira pasi vakatsikitsira zviso zvavo. dhavhidhi akati kuna allah, “handisini here ndakarayira kuti varwi vose vaverengwe? ndini ndakatadza ndikaita zvakaipa, ava vanongova makwai chete. vakaiteiko? haiwa yeahoh, allah wangu, regai ruoko rwenyu ruwire pandiri ini nemhuri yangu, asi musarega denda iri riri pamusoro pavanhu venyu.” ipapo mutumwa wayeahoh akarayira gadhi kuti ataurire dhavhidhi kuti akwire andovakira yeahoh aritari muburiro raarauna mujebhusi. saka dhavhidhi akakwidza mukuteerera shoko rakanga rataurwa nagadhi muzita rayeahoh. arauna paakanga achipura zviyo, akacheuka akaona mutumwa; vanakomana vake vana vaaiva navo vakanohwanda. ipapo dhavhidhi akaswedera, uye arauna paakatarisa akamuona, akasiya buriro akakotamira pasi pamberi padhavhidhi akaisa chiso chake pasi. dhavhidhi akati kwaari, “ndipewo nzvimbo yeburiro rako kuti ndigovakira yeahoh aritari, kuti denda riri pavanhu rimiswe. nditengeserewo nomutengo waro wakazara.” arauna akati kuna dhavhidhi, “ritorei henyu! ishe wangu mambo ngavaite zvinovafadza. tarirai ndichakupai nzombe yezvibayiro zvinopiswa, matanda okupurisa dzive huni, uye zviyo zvive zvipiriso zvoupfu. ndichakupai zvose izvi.” asi mambo dhavhidhi akapindura arauna akati, “kwete, ndinoda kutenga nomutengo wakazara. handingatori ndichipa yeahoh zvinhu zvako iwe kana kubayira chipiriso chinopiswa chandisina kuripira.” saka dhavhidhi akaripira arauna mashekeri mazana matanhatu egoridhe kuti apiwe nzvimbo iyi. dhavhidhi akavaka aritari kuna yeahoh ipapo uye akapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvokuwadzana. akadana kuna yeahoh uye yeahoh akamupindura nomoto wakabva kudenga ukaenda paaritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa. ipapo yeahoh akataurira mutumwa iye akadzorera munondo wake mumuhara wawo. panguva iyoyo dhavhidhi paakaona kuti yeahoh akanga amupindura paburiro raarauna mujebhusi, akapa zvipiriso ipapo. tabhenakeri yayeahoh yakanga yagadzirwa namozisi murenje. nearitari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvakanga zviri panzvimbo yakakwirira pagibheoni panguva iyoyo. asi dhavhidhi haaikwanisa kuenda pamberi payo kundobvunza allah nokuti aitya munondo womutumwa wayeahoh.

22

ipapo dhavhidhi akati, “imba yayeahoh allah inofanira kuva pano, pamwe chete nearitari yezvipiriso zvinopisirwa israeri.” saka dhavhidhi akarayira kuti vatorwa vose vaigara muisraeri vaungane pamwe chete, uye kubva mukati mavo akasarudza vavezi vamatombo kuti vagadzire matombo akavezwa zvakanaka okuvakisa imba yaallah. akapa simbi dzakawanda kwazvo kuti dzigoshandiswa kugadzirisa zvipikiri zvamakonhi apamasuo nezvikorekedzo uye ndarira yakawanda kupfuura yaigona kuiswa pachikero. akapawo zvakare matanda emisidhari akawanda kupfuura aigona kuverengwa, nokuti vasidhoni nevatire vakanga vavigira dhavhidhi matanda akawanda. dhavhidhi akati, “mwanakomana wangu soromoni mudiki kwazvo uye haasati ava noruzivo, uye imba ichavakirwa yeahoh inofanira kuva huru kwazvo, inorumbidzwa uye inokudzwa kwazvo pamberi pendudzi dzose. saka ndichaigadzirira.” saka dhavhidhi akagadzirira zvikuru kwazvo asati afa. ipapo akadana mwanakomana wake soromoni akamurayira kuti avake imba yayeahoh, allah weisraeri. dhavhidhi akati kuna soromoni, “mwanakomana wangu zvaiva mumwoyo mangu kuti ndivakire zita rayeahoh allah wangu imba. asi shoko iri rayeahoh rakauya kwandiri richiti, ‘wakadeura ropa zhinji uye ukarwa hondo dzakawanda. iwe haungavakiri zita rangu imba, nokuti wakadeura ropa rakawanda kwazvo pamberi pouso hwangu. asi uchava nomwanakomana achava murume worugare nokuzorora, uye ndichamupa zororo kubva kuvavengi vake kumativi ose. zita rake achanzi soromoni uye ndichapa israeri runyararo norugare panguva yokutonga kwake. iyeye ndiye achavakira zita rangu imba. achava mwanakomana wangu uye ini ndichava baba vake. uye ndichasimbisa chigaro choumambo hwake pamusoro peisraeri nokusingaperi.’ “zvino mwanakomana wangu, yeahoh ave newe, uye uve nokubudirira uye uvake imba yayeahoh allah wako sezvaakati uchaita. yeahoh ngaakupe uchenjeri nokunzwisisa paachakuisa pakutonga pamusoro peisraeri, kuitira kuti uchengete murayiro wayeahoh allah wako. ipapo uchava nokubudirira kana ukachenjerera kuchengetedza mitemo nemirayiro yakapiwa mozisi nayeahoh kuti ape israeri. iva nesimba utsunge mwoyo. usatya uye usaora mwoyo. “ndakatambura zvikuru kwazvo kuti ndipe kutemberi yayeahoh matarenda zviuru zana zvegoridhe, matarenda miriyoni esirivha, ndarira nesimbi yakawanda zvokuti haingayerwe pachikero, namatanda namatombo. uye unogona kuwedzera pamusoro pazvo. une varume vebasa vazhinji kwazvo: vavezi vamatombo, vavezi vamatanda navamwe varume vane unyanzvi mumabasa ose akasiyana-siyana mune zvegoridhe nesirivha, ndarira nesimbi navarume voumhizha vasingaverengeki. zvino chitanga basa uye yeahoh ave newe.” ipapo dhavhidhi akarayira vatungamiri vose veisraeri kuti vabatsire mwanakomana wake soromoni. akati kwavari, “ko, yeahoh allah wenyu haasi nemi here? uye haana kukupai zororo kumativi ose here? nokuti akaisa vagari venyika iyi muruoko rwangu, uye nyika iri pasi payeahoh nepasi pavanhu vake. zvino zvipirei mwoyo nemweya kutsvaka yeahoh allah wenyu. tangai kuvaka nzvimbo tsvene yayeahoh allah, kuitira kuti mugouyisa areka yesungano yayeahoh nemidziyo mitsvene yaallah mutemberi ichavakirwa zita rayeahoh.”

23

dhavhidhi paakanga akwegura ava namakore mazhinji, akaita kuti mwanakomana wake soromoni ave mambo pamusoro peisraeri. akaunganidzawo vatungamiri vose veisraeri pamwe chete navaprista navarevhi. varevhi vose vana makore makumi matatu zvichienda mberi vakaverengwa, uye varume vose vakasvika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere. dhavhidhi akati, “pane ava, zviuru makumi maviri nezvina vachava vatariri vebasa rokuvakwa kwetemberi yayeahoh uye zviuru zvitanhatu vachava vakuru navatongi. zviuru zvina vachava vachengeti vamasuo uye zviuru zvina vacharumbidza yeahoh nezviridzwa zvandakapa nokuda kwechikonzero ichi.” dhavhidhi akapatsanura varevhi akavaisa mumapoka zvichienderana navanakomana varevhi vaiti: gerishoni, kohati namerari. vokwagerishoni vaiva: radhani nashimei. vanakomana varadhani vaiva: jehieri dangwe, zetami najoere, vatatu pamwe chete. vanakomana vashimei vaiva: sheromoti, hazieri naharani, vatatu pamwe chete. ava ndivo vaiva vakuru vemhuri dzaradhani. uye vanakomana vashimei vaiva: jahati, ziza, jeushi nabheria. ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vashimei, vana pamwe chete. (jahati aiva wokutanga, ziza ari wechipiri, asi jeushi nabheria vakanga vasina vanakomana vakawanda; saka vakaverengwa semhuri imwe chete ine basa rimwe chete.) vanakomana vakohati vaiva: amiramu, izhari, hebhuroni nauzieri, vana pamwe chete. vanakomana vaamiramu vaiva: aroni namozisi. aroni akatsaurwa iye nezvizvarwa zvake nokusingaperi, kuti anatse zvinhu zvaiva zvitsvene-tsvene, kuti vape zvipiriso pamberi payeahoh, kushumira pamberi pake uye kutaura maropafadzo muzita rake nokusingaperi. vanakomana vamozisi munhu waallah vakaverengwa sechikamu chorudzi rwarevhi. vanakomana vamozisi vaiva: gerishomi naeriezeri. zvizvarwa zvagerishomi: shubhaeri ndiye aiva wokutanga. zvizvarwa zvaeriezeri zvaiva: rehabhia ndiye aiva wokutanga. (eriezeri haana kuzoita vamwe vanakomana, asi rehabhia akaita vanakomana vakawanda kwazvo.) vanakomana vaizhari: sheromiti ndiye aiva wokutanga. vanakomana vahebhuroni: jeria ndiye wokutanga, amaria wechipiri, jahazieri wechitatu najekameami wechina. vanakomana vauzieri: mika wokutanga naishia wechipiri. vanakomana vamerari, vaiva: mari namushi. vanakomana vamari vaiva: ereazari nakishi. (ereazari akafa asina vanakomana: aingova navanasikana chete. hama dzavo, vanakomana vakishi vakavaroora.) vanakomana vamushi vaiva: mari, edheri, najerimoti, vatatu pamwe chete. ava ndivo vaiva zvizvarwa zvarevhi nemhuri dzavo, vakuru vemhuri sezvazvakanga vakanyorwa pasi pamazita avo uye vachiverengwa mumwe nomumwe, zvichireva vashandi vaiva namakore makumi maviri naanopfuura vaishanda mutemberi yayeahoh. nokuti dhavhidhi akanga ati, “sezvo yeahoh, allah waisraeri apa zororo kuvanhu vake uye akauya kuzogara mujerusarema nokusingaperi, varevhi havachafaniri kuramba vachitakura tabhenakeri kana mimwe midziyo yose yaishandiswa pabasa rayo.” maererano nokurayira kwadhavhidhi kwokupedzisira, varevhi vakaverengwa kubva pana vana makore makumi maviri kana anopfuura ipapo. basa ravarevhi raiva rokubatsira zvizvarwa zvaaroni, mukubata basa romutemberi yayeahoh: kuvatariri voruvanze, makamuri omumativi, kunatsa zvinhu zvose zvaiera, nokuita mamwe mabasa paimba yaallah. vaiva vachengeti vechingwa chaiiswa patafura, upfu hwakatsetseka hwezvipiriso zvezviyo, zvingwa zvitete zvisina mbiriso, kubika nokusanganisa, uye zviero zvose zvouwandu noukuru. vaifanirawo zvakare kumira mangwanani oga oga vachitenda uye vachirumbidza yeahoh. vaifanira kuita zvimwe chetezvo manheru uye napose paipiwa zvipiriso zvinopiswa kuna yeahoh pamasabata uye napamitambo yokugara kwomwedzi napane mimwe mitambo yakarayirwa. vaifanira kushanda pamberi payeahoh nguva dzose nouwandu hwaidiwa uye nenzira yavakanga varayirwa kuti vaiite. nokudaro varevhi vakaita mabasa omutende rokusangana, romunzvimbo tsvene uye vari pasi pehama dzavo zvizvarwa zvaaroni, mubasa roushumiri mutemberi yayeahoh.

24

aya ndiwo aiva mapoka avanakomana vaaroni: vanakomana vaaroni vaiva: nadhabhi, abhihu, ereazari naitamari. asi nadhabhi naabhihu vakafa baba vavo vasati vafa, uye vakanga vasina vanakomana; saka ereazari naitamari vakashumira savaprista. achibatsirwa nazadhoki chizvarwa chaereazari naahimereki chizvarwa chaitamari, dhavhidhi akavapatsanura akavaisa mumapoka kuti vaite basa ravo roushumiri ravakanga varayirwa. vatungamiri vazhinji vakanyanyowanikwa pane zvizvarwa zvaereazari kupfuura pakati pezvizvarwa zvaitamari uye vakaiswa mumapoka zvakakodzerana: vakuru gumi navatanhatu kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaereazari uye vakuru vasere kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaitamari. vakavaisa mumapoka zvakakodzerana, nokukanda mijenya nokuti paiva navabati venzvimbo tsvene navabati vaallah pakati pezvizvarwa zvaereazari nezvizvarwa zvaitamari. munyori shemaya mwanakomana wanetaneri, murevhi, akanyora mazita avo pamberi pamambo, napamberi pavabati vaiti: zadhoki muprista, ahimereki mwanakomana waabhiatari navakuru vemhuri dzavaprista navarevhi mhuri imwe chete ichitorwa kubva kuna ereazari uye imwe chete kubva kuna itamari. mujenya wokutanga wakawira pana jehoyaribhi, wechipiri pana jedhaya, wechitatu kuna harimi, wechina kuna seorimi, wechishanu kuna marikia, wechitanhatu kuna miyamini, wechinomwe kuna hakozi, wechisere kuna abhija, wepfumbamwe kuna jeshua, wegumi kuna shekania, wegumi nomumwe kuna eriashibhi, wegumi nembiri kuna jakimi, wegumi nenhatu kuna hupa, wegumi neina kuna jeshebheabhi, wegumi neshanu kuna bhiriga, wegumi nenhanhatu kuna imeri, wegumi nenomwe kuna heziri, wegumi netsere kuna hapizezi, wegumi nepfumbamwe kuna petahia, wemakumi maviri kuna jehezikeri, wemakumi maviri nomumwe kuna jakini, wemakumi maviri nembiri kuna gamuri, wemakumi maviri nenhatu kuna dheraya, uye wemakumi maviri neina kuna maazia. iri ndiro raiva basa ravo roushumiri ravakanga varayirwa pavakapinda mutemberi yayeahoh, maererano nemitemo yavakanga vapiwa nababa wavo aroni sokurayirwa kwaakanga aitwa nayeahoh, allah waisraeri. kana zviri zvimwe zvizvarwa zvarevhi: kubva kuvanakomana vaamiramu, shubhaeri; kubva kuvanakomana vashubhaeri: jedheya. kana ari rehabhia, kuvanakomana vake: ishia aiva wokutanga. kubva kuvaizhari: sheromoti; kubva kuvanakomana vasheromoti: jahati. vanakomana vahebhuroni vaiva: jeria wokutanga, amaria wechipiri, jehazieri wechitatu najekameami wechina. mwanakomana wauzieri aiva: mika; kubva kuvanakomana vamika: shamiri. mununʼuna wamika: ishia; kubva kuvanakomana vaishia: zekariyeah. vanakomana vamerari vaiva: mari namushi. mwanakomana wajaazia aiva: bheno. vanakomana vamerari vaiva: kubva kuna jaazia: bheno, shoshami, zakuri, naibhiri. kubva kuna mari: ereazari, uye akanga asina vanakomana. kubva kuna kishi mwanakomana wakishi aiva: jerameeri. uye vanakomana vamushi vaiti: mari, edheri najerimoti. ava ndivo vaiva varevhi maererano nemhuri dzavo. vakakandawo mijenya sezvaingoita hama dzavo zvizvarwa zvaaroni, pamberi pamambo dhavhidhi nazadhoki, ahimereki navakuru vemhuri dzavaprista navarevhi. mhuri dzomukoma pane vose dzaingoverengwa zvimwe chetezvo sedzomudiki pane vose.

25

dhavhidhi, pamwe chete navatungamiri vehondo: vakatsaura vamwe vavanakomana vaasafi, hemani najedhutuni kuti vaite ushumiri hwokuprofita kuchiridzwa mbira, mitengeranwa namakandira. aya ndiwo mazita avarume vaiita basa iri. kubva kuvanakomana vaasafi: zakuri, yosefa, netania naasarera. vanakomana vaasafi vaitungamirirwa naasafi uyo aiprofita achitungamirirwa namambo. kana ari jedhutuni, kuvanakomana vake: gedharia, zeri, jeshaya, shimei, hashabhia namatitia, vatanhatu pamwe chete, vachitungamirirwa nababa vavo jedhutuni uyo aiprofita achishandisa mbira mukuvonga nokurumbidza yeahoh. kana ari hemani, kubva kuvanakomana vake: bhukia, matania, uzieri, shubhaeri najerimoti; hanania, hanani, eriata, gidhariti naromamiti-ezeri; joshibhekasha, maroti, hotiri namahazioti. vose ava vaiva vanakomana vahemani muoni wamambo. akavapiwa kubudikidza nezvivimbiso zvaallah kuti amukudze. allah akapa hemani vanakomana gumi navana, navanasikana vatatu. varume vose ava vaitungamirirwa namadzibaba avo mukuimba mutemberi yayeahoh, nomukuridza makandira nemitengeranwa nembira, kuti vaite ushumiri paimba yaallah. asafi, jedhutuni nahemani vaiva pasi pamambo. pamwe chete nehama dzavo, vose vakadzidzira uye vakava nyanzvi mukuimbira yeahoh, vaisvika mazana maviri amakumi masere navasere. vaduku navakuru pamwe chete, mudzidzisi pamwe chete nomudzidzi, vakakanda mijenya pakupiwa mabasa avo. mujenya wokutanga waiva waasafi, wakawira pana yosefa, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wechipiri kuna gedharia, iye nehama dzake navanakomana vake—gumi navaviri; wechitatu kuna zakuri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wechina kuna iziri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wechishanu kuna netania, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wechitanhatu kuna bhukia, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wechinomwe kuna jesarera, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; worusere kuna jeshaya, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wepfumbamwe kuna matania, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi kuna shimei, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nomumwe kuna azareri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemiviri kuna hashabhia, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemitatu kuna shubhaeri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemina kuna matitia, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemishanu kuna jerimoti, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemitanhatu kuna hanania, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi neminomwe kuna joshibhekasha, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemisere kuna hanani, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wegumi nemipfumbamwe kuna maroti, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wamakumi maviri kuna eriata, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wamakumi maviri nomumwe kuna hotiri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wamakumi maviri nemiviri kuna gidhariti, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wamakumi maviri nemitatu kuna mahazioti, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri; wamakumi maviri nemina kuna romamiti-ezeri, vanakomana vake nehama dzake—gumi navaviri.

26

mapoka avachengeti vemikova aiva: kubva kuvakora: mesheremia mwanakomana wakore, mumwe wavanakomana vaasafi. mesheremia aiva navanakomana vaiti: zekariyeah dangwe, jedhiaeri wechipiri, zebhadhia wechitatu, jatinieri wechina, eramu wechishanu, jehohanani wechitanhatu, naeriehoenai wechinomwe. obhedhi-edhomu aivawo navanakomana vaiti: shemaya dangwe, jehozabhadhi wechipiri, joa wechitatu, sakari wechina, netaneri wechishanu, amieri wechitanhatu, isakari wechinomwe napeuretai wechisere. (nokuti allah akanga aropafadza obedhi-edhomu.) mwanakomana wake shemaya aivawo navanakomana vaiva: vatungamiri mumhuri yababa vavo nokuti vaiva varume vaikwanisa kwazvo. vanakomana vashemaya vaiti: otini, refaeri, obhedhi naerizabhadhi; hama dzake erihu nasemakia vaivawo varume vaikwanisa. vose ava vaiva zvizvarwa zvaobhedhi-edhomu. ivo navanakomana vavo nehama dzavo vaiva varume vaikwanisa vaine simba rokuita basa, zvizvarwa zvaobhedhi-edhomu, vaisvika makumi matanhatu navaviri pamwe chete. mesheremia aiva navanakomana nehama vakanga vari varume voumhare vaisvika gumi navasere pamwe chete. hosa mumerati aiva navanakomana vaiti: shimiri wokutanga (kunyange zvake akanga asiri dangwe, baba vake vakamuita wokutanga.) hirikia wechipiri, tabharia wechitatu nazekariyeah wechina. vanakomana nehama dzahosa vaiva gumi navatatu vose pamwe chete. aya mapoka avachengeti vamasuo, kubudikidza navakuru vavo, vaiva nemabasa okushumira mutemberi yayeahoh, sezvaingoitawo hama dzavo. mijenya yakakandwa nokuda kwesuo rimwe nerimwe, maererano nemhuri dzavo, vadiki nevakuru pamwe chete. mujenya wesuo rokumabvazuva wakawira pana sheremia. zvino mijenya yakakandwa nokuda kwomwanakomana wake zekariyeah, mupi wamazano akachenjera uye mujenya wesuo rokumusoro wakawira paari. mujenya wesuo rezasi wakawira pana obhedhi-edhomu, uye mujenya wedura wakawira kuvanakomana vake. mijenya yesuo rokumadokero nesuo reshareketi kunzira yokumusoro yakawira kuna shupimi nahosa. murindi aimira parutivi rwomumwe murindi. kumabvazuva kwainge kuine varevhi vatanhatu pazuva, kurutivi rwokumusoro kuine vana pazuva, zasi kuine vana pazuva uye vaviri panguva imwe chete padura. kana rwuri ruvanze rwokumadokero kwaiva navana kunzira navaviri paruvanze chaipo. aya ndiwo aiva mapoka avachengeti vemasuo avo vaiva zvizvarwa zvakora namerari. pakati pehama dzavo varevhi, ahija ndiye aiva mukuru wavachengeti vepfuma yomumba yaallah nepfuma yezvinhu zvakakumikidzwa. zvizvarwa zvaradhani, avo vaiva vagerishoni kubudikidza naradhani uye vaiva vatungamiri vemhuri dzaradhani mugerishoni vaiti: jehieri, vanakomana vajeheri, zetami, nomununʼuna wake joere. vaiva nebasa rokuchengeta pfuma yetemberi yayeahoh. kubva kuvaamiramu, vaizhari, vahebhuroni navauzieri: shubhaeri chizvarwa chagerishoni mwanakomana wamozisi, ndiye aiva mukuru pakuchengetwa kwepfuma. hama dzake kubudikidza naeriezeri dzaiva: rehabhia mwanakomana wake, jeshaya mwanakomana wake, joramu mwanakomana wake, zikiri mwanakomana wake nasheromiti mwanakomana wake. (sheromiti nehama dzake vaiva nebasa rokuchengetedza pfuma yose yezvinhu zvakakumikidzwa namambo dhavhidhi, navakuru vemhuri dzavo vaiva vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana uye navamwe vatungamiri. zvimwe zvezvakapambwa muhondo vakazvikumikidza kuti zvishandiswe pakugadziridza temberi yayeahoh. uye zvose zvakakumikidzwa nasamueri muoni nasauro najoabhu mwanakomana wazeruya, nezvimwe zvinhu zvose zvakakumikidzwa zvaichengetwa nasheromiti nehama dzake.) kubva kuvaizhari: kenania navanakomana vake vakapiwa mabasa ekure netemberi vari machinda navatongi muisraeri. kubva kuvahebhuroni: hashabhia nehama dzake, varume chiuru namazana manomwe vaikwanisa ndivo vaiva vakuru muisraeri kumadokero kwejorodhani pabasa rose rayeahoh napabasa rose ramambo. kana vari vahebhuroni, jeria ndiye aiva mukuru wavo maererano nezvinyorwa zvenhoroondo dzemhuri dzavo. (mugore ramakumi mana rokutonga kwadhavhidhi, pakaitwa ongororo yezvinyorwa zvenhoroondo, uye pakawanikwa varume vaikwanisa pakati pavahebhuroni pajazeri mugireadhi. jeria aiva nehama zviuru zviviri namazana manomwe vaiva varume vaikwanisa uye vari vakuru vemhuri dzavo, uye mambo dhavhidhi akavaita kuti vave vatariri vavarubheni, vaghadhi, nehafu yorudzi rwamanase kuti vagadzirise nyaya dzose dzezvaallah nenyaya dzose dzamambo.)

27

aya ndiwo mazita avaisraeri, vakuru vemhuri, vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana, namachinda avo, vaishandira mambo mune zvose pamusoro pamapoka avarwi ainge ari pabasa mwedzi nomwedzi mugore rose. boka rimwe nerimwe raiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. aitungamirira boka rokutanga mwedzi wokutanga, aiva jashobheami mwanakomana wazabhidhieri. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. aiva chizvarwa chaperezi uyewo ari mukuru wavakuru vavavarwi vose mumwedzi wokutanga. aitungamirira boka remwedzi wechipiri ainzi dhodhai muahohi; mikiroti ndiye aiva mutungamiri weboka rake. muboka rake maiva nezviuru makumi maviri nezvina. mukuru wavarwi wechitatu mumwedzi wechitatu ainzi bhenaya mwanakomana wajehoyadha muprista. ndiye aiva mukuru uye muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. uyu ndiye bhenaya uya aiva mumwe woumhare pakati pamakumi matatu uye aiva pamusoro pamakumi matatu vacho. mwanakomana wake amizabhadhi ndiye aitungamirira boka rake. wechina pamwedzi wechina, aiva asaheri mununʼuna wajoabhu; mwanakomana wake zebhadhia ndiye akamutevera pakutungamirira boka iri. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wechishanu pamwedzi wechishanu, aiva mutungamiri shamihuti muizirahi. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wechitanhatu pamwedzi wechitanhatu, aiva ira mwanakomana waikeshi muteko. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wechinomwe pamwedzi wechinomwe, aiva herezi muperoni, muefuremu. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. worusere, pamwedzi worusere, aiva sibhekai muhushati muzerahi. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wechipfumbamwe, mumwedzi wechipfumbamwe, aiva abhiezeri muanatoti, mubhenjamini. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wegumi, mumwedzi wegumi, aiva maharai munetofati, muzerahi. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wegumi nomumwe, mumwedzi wegumi nomumwe, aiva bhenaya mupiratoni, muefuremu. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. wegumi navaviri, mumwedzi wegumi nemiviri, aiva heridhai munetofati, aibva mumhuri yaotinieri. muboka rake maiva navarume zviuru makumi maviri nezvina. machinda pamusoro pamarudzi aisraeri aiti: pamusoro pavarubheni: eriezeri mwanakomana wazikiri; pamusoro pavasimeoni: shefatia mwanakomana wamaaka; pamusoro parevhi: hashabhia mwanakomana wakemueri; pamusoro paaroni: zadhoki; pamusoro payeahudha: erihu, mununʼuna wadhavhidhi; pamusoro paisakari: omiri mwanakomana wamikaeri; pamusoro pazebhuruni: ishimaya mwanakomana waobhadhia; pamusoro panafutari: jerimoti mwanakomana waazirieri; pamusoro pavaefuremu: hoshea mwanakomana waazazia; pamusoro pehafu yorudzi rwamanase: joere mwanakomana wapedhaya; pamusoro pehafu yorudzi rwamanase mugireadhi: idho mwanakomana wazekariyeah; pamusoro pabhenjamini: jaasieri mwanakomana waabhineri; pamusoro padhani: azareri mwanakomana wajerohamu. ava ndivo vaiva machinda pamusoro pamarudzi avaisraeri. dhavhidhi haana kuverenga varume vaiva namakore makumi maviri zvichidzika, nokuti yeahoh akanga avimbisa kuti vaisraeri vaizowanda senyeredzi dziri mudenga. joabhu mwanakomana wazeruya akatanga kuverenga varume ava asi haana kuzopedza. kutsamwa kwakauya pamusoro peisraeri nokuda kwokuverengwa uku, saka uwandu uhu hahuna kuiswa mubhuku renhoroondo dzegore negore ramambo dhavhidhi. azimavheti mwanakomana waadhieri aiva muchengeti wamatura amambo. jonatani mwanakomana wauzia aiva muchengeti wamatura kumaruwa okure, mumaguta, mumisha neshongwe dzavarindi. eziri mwanakomana wakerubhi aiva mutariri pamusoro wavashandi vairima minda. shimei muramati aiva mutariri weminda yemizambiringa. zabhidhi mushifimi aiva mutariri wezvibereko zveminda yemizambiringa zvokuzoisa muzvirongo zvewaini. bhaari-hanani mugedheri aiva mutariri wemiorivhi nemionde yakanga iri mujinga mezvikomo zvokumadokero. joashi aiva mutariri wamafuta omuorivhi. shitirai musharoni, aiva mutariri wemombe dzaifura musharoni. shafati mwanakomana waadhirai ndiye aiva mutariri wemombe dzaiva mumipata. obhiri muishumaeri aiva mutariri wengamera. jedheya mumeronoti aiva mutariri wembongoro. jazizi muhagiri aiva mutariri wamakwai. ava ndivo vaiva vabati vaichengeta pfuma yamambo dhavhidhi. jonatani, babamunini vadhavhidhi vaiva mupi wamazano, murume woruzivo nomunyori. jehieri mwanakomana wahakimoni aiva muchengeti wavanakomana vamambo. ahitoferi aiva mupi wamazano kuna mambo. hushai muariki aiva shamwari yamambo. (ahitoferi akazoteverwa pachinzvimbo najehoyadha mwanakomana wabhenaya uye naabhiatari.) joabhu ndiye aiva mutungamiri wehondo yamambo.

28

dhavhidhi akarayira vabati veisraeri vose kuti vaungane pajerusarema: vabati pamusoro pamarudzi, vatungamiri vamapoka aishandira mambo, vatungamiri vezviuru navatungamiri vamazana, navabati vaichengeta zvinhu nezvipfuwo zvamambo uye navanakomana vake, pamwe chete navabati vomumuzinda wamambo, varume vane simba nemhare dzose dzakashinga. mambo dhavhidhi akasimuka akamira akati, “teererai kwandiri, hama dzangu navanhu vangu. zvakanga zviri mumwoyo mangu kuti ndivake imba senzvimbo yokuzororera yeareka yesungano yayeahoh, kuti zvive chitsiko chetsoka dzaallah wedu, uye ndakaita urongwa hwokuivaka. asi allah akati kwandiri, ‘iwe hausi kuzovakira zita rangu imba, nokuti uri murwi uye wakateura ropa.’ “asi yeahoh, allah waisraeri, akandisarudza kubva kumhuri yangu yose kuti ndive mambo pamusoro paisraeri nokusingaperi. akasarudza yeahudha kuti ave mhuri yangu, uye kubva muvanakomana vababa vangu akafadzwa nokundiita mambo pamusoro peisraeri. pavanakomana vangu vose, uye yeahoh akandipa vakawanda kwazvo, iye akasarudza mwanakomana wangu soromoni kuti agare pachigaro choumambo hwayeahoh pamusoro paisraeri. akati kwandiri, ‘soromoni mwanakomana wako ndiye achavaka imba yangu nezvivanze zvangu, ndichava baba vake. ndichasimbisa umambo hwake nokusingaperi kana iye akatsungirira mukuita zvandakarayira nemitemo yangu sezviri kuitwa panguva ino.’ “saka zvino ndinokurayira pamberi peisraeri yose uye napamberi peungano yayeahoh, uye allah wedu achinzwa: chenjerera kuti utevere kurayira kwose kwayeahoh senhaka kuvana vako nokusingaperi. “newewo mwanakomana wangu soromoni, ziva allah wababa vako, uye umushumire nomwoyo wose uye nepfungwa dzako dzose, nokuti yeahoh anonzvera mwoyo uye anonzwisisa chinangwa chipi nechipi chiri mupfungwa. ukamutsvaga achawanikwa newe, asi kana ukamurasa, iye achakuramba nokusingaperi. funga zvino, nokuti yeahoh akusarudza kuti uvake temberi senzvimbo tsvene. iva nesimba uye uite basa iri.” ipapo dhavhidhi akapa mwanakomana wake soromoni urongwa hwebiravira retemberi, dzimba dzayo, matura ayo, makamuri ayo okumusoro, makamuri ayo omukati uye nenzvimbo yokuyananisira. akamupa urongwa hwazvose zvakanga zvaiswa nomweya mupfungwa make pamusoro pezvivanze zvetemberi yayeahoh namakamuri ose akapoteredza, pamusoro pamatura epfuma yetemberi yaallah napamusoro pamatura ezvinhu zvakakumikidzwa. akamurayira zvokuita pamusoro pamapoka avaprista navarevhi uye napamusoro pebasa rose rokushumira mutemberi yayeahoh, uyewo napamusoro pemidziyo yaizoshandiswa mubasa rayo. akarayira uremu hwegoridhe remidziyo yose yaizoshandiswa mumhando dzose dzokushumira, nouremu hwesirivha yemidziyo yose yaizoshandiswa mumhando dzose dzokushumira: uremu hwegoridhe rezvigadziko zvemwenje zvegoridhe nemwenje yazvo, nouremu hwechigadziko chomwenje chimwe nechimwe, nemwenje yacho, maererano nokushandiswa kwechigadziko chemwenje chimwe nechimwe. uremu hwegoridhe retafura imwe neimwe yechingwa chakatsaurwa; uremu hwesirivha yetafura dzesirivha; uremu hwegoridhe rakanatswa reforogo, ndiro dzokusasa nemikombe; uremu hwegoridhe nedhishi rimwe nerimwe regoridhe; uremu hwesirivha yedhishi rimwe nerimwe resirivha; uye uremu hwegoridhe rakanatswa nearitari yezvinonhuhwira. akamupawo mufananidzo wengoro iyo ina makerubhi egoridhe akatambanudza mapapiro awo achifukidza areka yesungano yayeahoh. dhavhidhi akati, “zvose izvi ndakazviziviswa zvanyorwa noruoko rwayeahoh uye akaita ndinzwisise urongwa hwake hwose.” dhavhidhi akatiwo kumwanakomana wake soromoni, “simba utsunge mwoyo, uye uite basa iri. usatya kana kuora mwoyo, nokuti yeahoh allah, allah wangu, anewe. haachazokusiyi kana kukurasa, kusvikira basa rose rokushandira temberi yayeahoh rapera. mapoka avaprista navarevhi akagadzirira kuita basa rose rapatemberi yaallah, uye murume wose anoda uye ane umhizha hupi nehupi pamabasa amaoko achakubatsira pabasa iri rose. vabati vose navanhu vose vachateerera kurayira kwako kwose.”

29

ipapo mambo dhavhidhi akati kuungano yose, “mwanakomana wangu soromoni uyo asarudzwa naallah mudiki uye haasati ava kunyatsogona. basa iri iguru kwazvo nokuti muzinda uyu hausi womunhu asi ndowayeahoh allah. nokuwana kwangu kwose ndapa kutemberi yaallah wangu goridhe pabasa regoridhe, sirivha pabasa resirivha, ndarira pabasa rendarira, simbi pabasa resimbi uye matanda pabasa ramatanda, pamwe chete neonikisi, namabwe okuisa mukati namatombo amavara akasiyana-siyana, namamwe mabwe akaurungana amarudzi ose namamwe machena, zvose izvi zvakawanda kwazvo. pamusoro pezvo mukuzvipira kwangu kutemberi yaallah wangu zvino ndava kupa upfumi hwangu pachangu hwegoridhe nesirivha kutemberi yaallah wangu, ndichiwedzera pamusoro pezvose zvandakapa kutemberi iyi tsvene zvinoti: matarenda zviuru zvitatu egoridhe (goridhe reofiri) namatarenda zviuru zvinomwe esirivha yakanatswa yokufukidza madziro edzimba, kuitira basa regoridhe, nebasa resirivha uye kuti basa rose riitwe navarume voumhizha. zvino ndiani anoda kuzvitsaurira kuna yeahoh nhasi!” ipapo vatungamiri vemhuri, vakuru vamarudzi eisraeri, vatungamiri vezviuru, vatungamiri vamazana namachinda aitungamirira basa ramambo vakapa nomwoyo unoda. vakapa kubasa rapatemberi matarenda zviuru zvishanu namadhariki zviuru gumi egoridhe, matarenda zviuru gumi esirivha, matarenda zviuru gumi nezvisere endarira, namatarenda zviuru zana esimbi. ani naani akanga ane matombo anokosha akapa ose kuimba yokuchengeta pfuma yetemberi yayeahoh zvichichengetwa najehieri mugerishoni. vanhu vakapembera nomufaro pavakaona kuti vatungamiri vavo vakanga vapa nomwoyo unoda, nokuti vakanga vapa kuna yeahoh vakasununguka uye nomwoyo wose. mambo dhavhidhi akafarawo zvikuru. dhavhidhi akarumbidza yeahoh pamberi peungano yose achiti, “rumbidzwai imi yeahoh, allah wababa vedu israeri, kubva kusingaperi kusvika kusingaperi. ukuru nesimba ndezvenyu, imi yeahoh, kukudzwa noushe nokubwinya, nokuti zvose zviri kudenga napasi ndezvenyu. umambo ndohwenyu, imi yeahoh munokudzwa somusoro wezvose. upfumi nokuremekedzwa zvinobva kwamuri; ndimi mutongi wezvinhu zvose. mumaoko enyu mune simba noushe kuti musimudzire uye musimbise vanhu vose. zvino, allah wedu, tinokuvongai, uye tinorumbidza zita renyu rakanakisa. “asi ini ndini aniko, uye vanhu vangu ndivanaaniko kuti tingakwanisa kupa zvakawanda kudai? zvose zvinobva kwamuri, uye tangokupai chete zvinobva mumaoko enyu. tiri vatorwa navapfuuri pamberi penyu, sezvakanga zvakaita madzibaba edu ose. mazuva edu panyika akaita somumvuri, asina tariro. imi yeahoh, allah wedu, izvi zvose zvakawanda kudai zvatapa kuti temberi yenyu ivakwe nokuda kwezita renyu dzvene zvinobva muruoko rwenyu uye zvose ndezvenyu. ndinoziva, allah wangu, kuti munoedza mwoyo uye munofadzwa nokururama. zvinhu zvose izvi ndakupai ndichida uye nomwoyo wakatendeka. uye zvino ndaona ndikafadzwa namapiro aita vanhu venyu vari pano kwamuri nomwoyo unoda. imi yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba edu abhurahama, isaka, naisraeri, chengetedzai kudokwairira kwakadai mumwoyo yavanhu venyu nokusingaperi, uye muite kuti mwoyo yavo irambe yakazvipira kwamuri. uye ipai mwanakomana wangu soromoni mwoyo wakaperera
