kuti achengete mirayiro yenyu, zvose zvamunoda nemitemo yenyu uye kuti aite zvose kuti avake muzinda wandagadzirira zvose izvi.” ipapo dhavhidhi akati kuungano yose, “rumbidzai yeahoh allah wenyu.” saka vose vakarumbidza yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo; vakakotamira pasi vakawira pasi nezviso pamberi payeahoh namambo. zuva raitevera vakapa zvipiriso kuna yeahoh vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa kwaari zvinoti: hando chiuru, makondobwe chiuru, namakwayana makono chiuru, pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvavo zvokunwa, nezvimwe zvibayiro zvakawanda zveisraeri. vakadya uye vakanwa nomufaro mukuru pamberi payeahoh zuva iroro. ipapo vakazogamuchira soromoni mwanakomana wadhavhidhi samambo kechipiri, vakamuzodza pamberi payeahoh kuti ave mutongi, uye zadhoki ave muprista. saka soromoni akagara pachigaro choushe chayeahoh samambo panzvimbo yababa vake dhavhidhi. akabudirira uye israeri yose yakamuteerera. vatungamiri vose pamwe chete navarume voumhare, pamwe chete navanakomana vose vamambo vadhavhidhi vakavimbisa kuzviisa pasi pamambo soromoni. yeahoh akasimudzira soromoni kwazvo pamberi peisraeri yose akaisa paari kukudzwa kwoumambo kusina kumbopiwa mumwe mambo weisraeri akamutangira. dhavhidhi mwanakomana wajese aiva mambo pamusoro peisraeri yose. akatonga israeri kwamakore makumi mana, manomwe muhebhuroni uye makumi matatu namatatu mujerusarema. akafa akwegura zvikuru ararama upenyu hurefu, hune upfumi nokukudzwa. mwanakomana wake soromoni akamutevera paumambo. kana zviri zvinhu zvakaitika panguva yokutonga kwamambo dhavhidhi kubva pakutanga kusvika kumagumo, zvakanyorwa muzvinyorwa zvasamueri muoni, zvinyorwa zvanatani muprofita, uye nomuzvinyorwa zvagadhi muoni, pamwe chete nenhoroondo dzokutonga kwake, uye nesimba, nezvinhu zvakaitika kwaari iye neisraeri noumambo hwedzimwe nyika dzose.

2_chronicles

1

soromoni mwanakomana wadhavhidhi akasimbisa kwazvo ushe hwake, nokuti yeahoh allah wake akanga anaye uye akamuita kuti ave mukuru kwazvo. ipapo soromoni akataura kuisraeri yose, kuvatungamiri vezviuru nokuvatungamiri vamazana, kuvatongi nokuvatungamiri vose muisraeri, vakuru vemhuri, uye soromoni neungano yose vakaenda kunzvimbo yakakwirira yegibheoni, nokuti tende rokusangana raallah rakanga ririko, iro rakanga ragadzirwa namozisi muranda waallah murenje. zvino dhavhidhi akanga auyisa areka yaallah kubva kukiriati jearimi kunzvimbo yaakanga aigadzirira nokuti akanga aidzikira tende mujerusarema. asi aritari yendarira yakanga yagadzirwa nabhezareri mwanakomana wauri, mwanakomana wahuri, yakanga iri mugibheoni pamberi petabhenakeri yayeahoh; saka soromoni neungano vakandomubvunza ipapo. soromoni akakwira kuaritari yendarira pamberi payeahoh mutende rokusangana akandobayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvinokwana chiuru pairi. usiku ihwohwo allah akazviratidza kuna soromoni akati kwaari, “kumbira chose chaungada kuti ndikupe.” soromoni akapindura allah akati, “makaratidza unyoro hwenyu hukuru kwazvo kuna dhavhidhi baba vangu uye mukandiita mambo pachinzvimbo chavo. zvino, yeahoh allah, itai henyu kuti chivimbiso chenyu kuna baba vangu dhavhidhi chizadziswe, nokuti makandiita mambo pamusoro pavanhu vakawanda seguruva renyika. ndipeiwo uchenjeri noruzivo, kuti ndigotungamirira vanhu ava, nokuti ndiani angagona kutonga vanhu venyu vakawanda ava?” allah akati kuna soromoni, “sezvo ichi chiri chido chemwoyo wako uye hauna kukumbira upfumi hwakawanda kana kukudzwa, kana kufa kwavavengi vako, uye nokuti hauna kukumbira upenyu hurefu asi uchenjeri noruzivo kuti utonge vanhu vangu avo vandakuita mambo pamusoro pavo, naizvozvo uchapiwa uchenjeri noruzivo. uye ini ndichakupawo upfumi, hwakawanda nokukudzwa zvisati zvambowanikwa namadzimambo ose akakutangira zvakare hakunazve mambo achauya shure kwako achava nazvo.” ipapo soromoni akaenda kujerusarema achibva kunzvimbo yakakwirira pagibheoni, kubva patende rokusangana. uye akatonga israeri. soromoni akazviunganidzira ngoro namabhiza; aiva nengoro chiuru namazana mana, nezviuru gumi nezviviri zvamabhiza, zvaaichengetera mumaguta engoro uye nokujerusarema kwaaivawo. mambo akaita kuti sirivha negoridhe zviwanikwe kwose kwose mujerusarema samatombo uye misidhari ikawanda semionde mujinga mezvikomo. mabhiza asoromoni aitengwa kuijipiti nokukuwe, vatengi vamambo vaitenga kubva kukuwe. vaitenga ngoro imwe chete kubva kuijipiti ichiita mashekeri mazana matanhatu esirivha uye bhiza rimwe chete richiita mashekeri zana namakumi mashanu. ivo vaizoatengeserawo kumadzimambo ose avahiti navaaramu.

2

soromoni akada kuvaka temberi yezita rayeahoh uye nomuzinda wakewo. akatuma varume zviuru makumi manomwe kuti vave vatakuri vamabwe, navarume zviuru makumi masere kuti vave vavezi vamatombo mumakomo uye varume zviuru zvitatu namazana matanhatu kuti vave vatariri vavo. soromoni akatumira shoko iri kuna hiramu mambo wetire: “nditumireiwo matanda emisidhari sezvamakaitira baba vangu dhavhidhi pamakavatumira misidhari yokuvakisa muzinda wavo kuti vagaremo. zvino ndava kuda kuvakira zita rayeahoh allah wangu temberi ndigoikumikidza kwaari kuti ndigopisira zvinonhuhwira pamberi pake, kuti ndigoisa chingwa chakatsaurwa nguva dzose uye kuti ndigoita zvipiriso zvinopiswa mangwanani namanheru oga oga, pamasabata, pakugara kwomwedzi napamitambo yakatarwa yayeahoh allah wedu. uyu ndiwo murayiro wakapiwa israeri nokusingaperi. “temberi yandichavaka ichange iri huru nokuti allah wedu mukuru kupinda vamwari vose. asi ndiani angakwanisa kumuvakira temberi, sezvo iye asingakwani kunyange mumatenga okumusoro-soro? ko, ini ndini aniko kuti ndingamuvakirawo temberi asi chete senzvimbo yokupisira zvipiriso zvinopiswa pamberi pake? “saka zvino nditumirewo, murume ano unyanzvi hwokushandisa goridhe, nesirivha, ndarira, nesimbi uye nemicheka yepepuru nemitsvuku neyebhuruu, ane ruzivo rwezvokuveza kuti ashande muyeahudha nejerusarema pamwe chete navarume vakachenjera vakasiyiwa nadhavhidhi baba vangu. “nditumireiwo misidhari, mipaini namatanda emiarigumi kubva kurebhanoni nokuti ndinoziva kuti vanhu venyu vane unyanzvi mukutema matanda ikoko. vanhu vangu vachashanda pamwe chete nevako kuti ndiwane matanda mazhinji kwazvo nokuti temberi yandichavaka inofanira kuva huru uye yakanaka zvikuru. ndichapa varanda vako vachatema matanda, zviyero zviuru makumi maviri zvegorosi, zviyero zviuru makumi maviri zvebhari, mabhati ewaini zviuru makumi maviri uye mabhati amafuta omuorivhi zviuru makumi maviri.” hiramu mambo wetire akapindura netsamba kuna soromoni akati: “nokuti yeahoh anoda vanhu vake, akakuita mambo wavo.” uye hiramu akaenderera mberi achiti: “yeahoh allah waisraeri ngaarumbidzwe iye akaita denga nenyika! akapa mambo dhavhidhi mwanakomana akachenjera, azere noungwaru nokunzwisisa, achavakira yeahoh temberi uye uye achazvivakirawo muzinda wake. “ndiri kukutumira hurami-abhi murume ano unyanzvi kwazvo. mai vake vaibva kudhani uye baba vake vaibva kutire. akadzidziswa kushanda negoridhe, nesirivha, ndarira, nesimbi, matombo namatanda uye nemicheka yepepuru neyebhuruu, nemitsvuku, nemicheka yakaisvonaka. ane ruzivo mukuveza kwamarudzi ose uye anogona kuveza achiteedzera zvose zvaanenge arayirwa. achashanda nemhizha dzenyu pamwe chete nedzaishe wangu dhavhidhi baba vako. “zvino ishe wangu ngaatumire varanda vake gorosi nebhari namafuta omuorivhi newaini zvamakavimbisa, isu tichatema matanda ose kubva kurebhanoni omuonde uye tichaaeredzesa pamagwa nemugungwa achidzika kusvika kujopa. munogona ipapo kuzoatora moaendesa kujerusarema.” soromoni akaverenga vatorwa vose vaiva muisraeri mushure mokuverengwa kwavanhu nababa vake dhavhidhi; uye vakawanikwa vari zviuru zana namakumi mashanu nezvitatu namazana matanhatu. akarayira zviuru makumi manomwe kuti vave vatakuri vamatombo uye zviuru makumi masere kuti vave vavezi vamatombo muzvikomo, uye zviuru zvitatu namazana matanhatu kuti vave vatariri pamusoro pavo kuti vanhu varambe vachishanda.

3

ipapo soromoni akatanga kuvaka temberi yayeahoh mujerusarema pagomo remoria, apo yeahoh akanga azviratidza kuna baba vake dhavhidhi. pakanga pari paburiro raarauna mujebhusi, nzvimbo yakapiwa nadhavhidhi. akatanga kuvaka pazuva rechipiri mumwedzi wechipiri mugore rechina rokutonga kwake. nheyo dzakaiswa dzakanga dziri makubhiti makumi matanhatu pakureba uye makubhiti makumi maviri paupamhi hwayo (kana tichishandisa kubhiti rechiero chakare). biravira rapamberi petemberi rakanga rakareba makubhiti makumi maviri pamberi paupamhi hweimba uye rakanga rakareba makubhiti makumi maviri kuenda mudenga. akafukidza mukati mayo negoridhe rakaisvonaka. akaroverera muimba huru mapuranga emipaini akaifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka akaishongedza nemiti yemichindwe nezvishongo zvengetani. akashongedza temberi namatombo anokosha. uye goridhe raakashandisa raiva goridhe rokuparivhaimi. akafukidzawo matanda edenga magwatidziro, madziro, namakonhi etemberi negoridhe, uye akavezera makerubhi pamadziro. akavaka nzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, kureba kwayo kwaienderana noupamhi hwetemberi makubhiti makumi maviri, urefu hwayo uye upamhi hwayo makubhiti makumi maviri. akafukidza mukati mayo namatarenda mazana matanhatu egoridhe rakaisvonaka. zvipikiri zvegoridhe zvairema mashekeri makumi mashanu. akafukidzawo nzvimbo dzokumusoro negoridhe. munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene akagadzira makerubhi maviri akavezwa akaafukidza negoridhe. mapapiro amakerubhi pamwe chete aisvika makubhiti makumi maviri pakureba kwawo. bapiro rimwe chete rekerubhi rokutanga rakanga rakareba makubhiti mashanu uye raibata madziro etemberi, rimwe bapiro rayo rakareba makubhiti mashanu richibata rimwe bapiro reimwe kerubhi. zvimwe chetezvo bapiro rimwe rekerubhi rechipiri rakanga rakareba makubhiti mashanu uye raibata mamwe madziro etemberi uye rimwe racho rakareba zvimwe chetezvo makubhiti mashanu richibata bapiro rekerubhi rokutanga. mapapiro amakerubhi aiva akareba makubhiti makumi maviri. akanga akamira namakumbo awo, akatarisa kuimba huru. akagadzira chidzitiro nezvakarukwa zvebhuruu, zvepepuru, nezvitsvuku nomucheka wakaisvonaka, namakerubhi akasonerwapo. pamberi petemberi akagadzira mbiru mbiri, dzose pamwe chete dzakanga dzakareba makubhiti makumi matatu namashanu, mbiru imwe neimwe yaiva nomusoro pamusoro payo wakanga wakareba makubhiti mashanu. akagadzira ngetani dzakarukwa akadziisa pamusoro pembiru. akagadzirawo matamba zana akaasungirira pangetani. akamisa mbiru pamberi petemberi, imwe zasi uye imwe kumusoro. yezasi akaitumidza kuti jakini uye yokumusoro akaitumidza kuti bhoazi.

4

akavaka aritari yendarira yakanga yakareba makubhiti makumi maviri, uye upamhi hwayo hwaiva makubhiti makumi maviri uye yakareba makubhiti gumi kuenda mudenga. akaita gungwa resimbi, rakatenderera pakuvakwa kwaro, rakareba makubhiti gumi pamuromo waro kubva kune rumwe rutivi kusvika kune rumwe rutivi uye makubhiti mashanu kuenda mudenga. zvaida tambo yakareba makubhiti makumi matatu kuti ikwanise kupoteredza gungwa iri. pazasi pomuromo, zvifananidzo zvehando zvairipoteredza, zviri gumi pakubhiti rimwe chete. hando idzi dzakanga dzakaiswa mumitsara miviri dziri chinhu chimwe chete negungwa. gungwa rakanga rakamira pamusoro pehando gumi nembiri, nhatu dzakatarisa kumusoro, nhatu dzakatarisa kumavirira, nhatu dzakatarisa zasi, uye nhatu dzakatarisa kumabvazuva. gungwa rakanga rakagara pamusoro padzo uye shure kwadzo kwakanga kwakatarisa pakati. ukobvu hwaro hwakanga hwakaita sokufara kwechanza uye muromo waro wakanga wakaita somuromo womukombe, seruva rehapa. raizara namabhati zviuru zvitatu. akagadzirazve madhishi okusukira gumi akaisa mashanu kudivi rezasi, uye mashanu kudivi rokumusoro. zvinhu zvose zvaizoshandiswa pazvipiriso zvinopiswa zvaisukirwamo, asi gungwa raizoshandiswa navaprista pakushamba. akagadzira zvigadziko zvemwenje gumi zvegoridhe, sokurayirwa kwazvakanga zvaitwa akazviisa mutemberi, zvishanu akaisa zasi zvishanu kumusoro. akagadzira tafura gumi akadziisa mutemberi, shanu zasi uye shanu kumusoro. akagadzirawo mbiya dzegoridhe zana dzokusasa. akagadzira chivanze chavaprista, nechivanze chikuru nemikova yechivanze uye akafukidza mikova nendarira. akaisa gungwa kudivi rezasi, pakona yezasi yakadziva kumabvazuva. akagadzirazve hari nefoshoro nembiya dzokusasa. saka hurami akapedza basa raakaitira mambo soromoni mutemberi yaallah sezvinotevera: mbiru mbiri; misoro miviri yakanga yakaumbwa sembiya pamusoro pembiru; mimbure miviri yakanga yakashongedza misoro miviri yakanga yakaumbwa pamusoro pembiru; matamba mazana mana emimbure miviri nemimwe yakanga yakashongedza misoro yakanga yakaumbwa sembiya pamisoro yembiru; zvigadziko namadhishi azvo; gungwa nehando gumi nembiri pasi paro; hari, foshoro, forogo dzenyama, nemimwe midziyo yose. zvinhu zvose zvakagadzirwa nahurami-abhi zvamambo soromoni zvetemberi yayeahoh zvaiva zvendarira inobwinya. mambo akaita kuti zviumbwe nevhu mubani rejorodhani pakati pesukoti nezaretani. zvinhu izvi zvose zvakagadzirwa nasoromoni zvakanga zvakawanda kwazvo zvokuti uremu hwendarira yakashandiswa hwakanga husingaverengeki. soromoni akagadzirazve midziyo yose yakanga iri mutemberi yaallah yaiti: aritari yegoridhe; tafura dzaiva nechingwa chokuratidza; zvigadziko zvemwenje zvegoridhe nemwenje yazvo kuti ipfute pamberi penzvimbo tsvene yomukati sezvakarayirwa; maruva egoridhe nemwenje nembato (dzaiva dzegoridhe chairo); zvidzimiso zvemwenje, mbiya dzokusasa, madhishi nezvaenga zvomoto zvegoridhe yakaisvonaka namakonhi egoridhe, etemberi: makonhi omukati yapanzvimbo tsvene-tsvene namakonhi eimba huru.

5

basa rose rakaitwa nasoromoni patemberi yayeahoh rakati rapera, akauyisa zvinhu zvakanga zvakakumikidzwa nababa vake dhavhidhi, zvesirivha negoridhe nemidziyo yose akazviisa mudzimba dzokuchengetera dzetemberi yaallah. ipapo soromoni akadana vakuru veisraeri kujerusarema, vose vakuru vamarudzi navakuru vemhuri dzeisraeri, kuti vauyise areka yesungano yayeahoh kubva kuzioni guta radhavhidhi. uye varume vose veisraeri vakauya pamwe chete kuna mambo panguva yomutambo mumwedzi wechinomwe. vakuru vose vaisraeri pavakasvika, varevhi vakasimudza areka, uye vakauyisa areka netende rokusangana nemidziyo inoyera yaivamo. vaprista ava vaiva varevhi vakazvitakura vakakwira nazvo; uye mambo soromoni neungano yose yaisraeri yakanga yaungana paari vakanga vari pamberi peareka vachibayira makwai mazhinji kwazvo nemombe zhinji zvokuti zvaisagona kunyorwa kana kuverengeka. ipapo vaprista vakauya neareka yesungano yayeahoh panzvimbo yayo munzira tsvene yomukati metemberi, munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene vakaiisa pasi pemapapiro emakerubhi. makerubhi akanga akatambanudza mapapiro awo pamusoro penzvimbo yeareka uye akanga akafukidza areka namatanda ayo okutakurisa. matanda aya akanga akareba zvokuti miromo yawo, kubva paareka, aigona kuonekwa kubva nechemberi kwomukati menzvimbo tsvene, asi kwete uri kunze kwenzvimbo tsvene. uye achiripo nanhasi. muareka makanga musina chinhu kunze kwamahwendefa maviri akanga aiswamo namozisi pahorebhi, yeahoh pavakaita sungano neisraeri mushure mokunge vabuda muijipiti. ipapo vaprista vakabuda kubva munzvimbo tsvene. vaprista vose vakanga varipo vakanga vazvinatsa zvisinei kuti vaiva vamapoka api. varevhi vose vaiva vaimbi vaiti asafi, hemani, jedhutuni navanakomana vavo nehama dzavo, vakamira kumabvazuva kwearitari vakapfeka micheka yakaisvonaka vachiridza makandira, mitengeranwa nembira. vakanga vachiteverwa navaprista zana namakumi maviri vairidza hwamanda. varidzi vehwamanda navaimbi vakabatana pamwe chete sevane inzwi rimwe chete, vachirumbidza uye vachivonga yeahoh. zvichibatana nehwamanda makandira nezvimwe zviridzwa vakasimudzira manzwi avo vachirumbidza yeahoh vakaimba vachiti: “iye akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” ipapo temberi yayeahoh yakafukidzwa negore, uye vaprista vakatadza kuita basa ravo nokuda kwegore iroro, nokuti kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakanga kwazadza temberi yaallah.

6

ipapo soromoni akati, “yeahoh akati achagara mugore dema. ndakuvakirai temberi yakanaka kwazvo, nzvimbo yokuti mugare nokusingaperi.” ungano yose yaisraeri ichakamirapo, mambo akatendeukira kwavari akavaropafadza. ipapo akati: “ngaarumbidzwe yeahoh, allah waisraeri iye azadzisa namaoko ake zvaakavimbisa nomuromo wake kuna baba vangu dhavhidhi. nokuti akati, ‘kubva pazuva randakaburitsa vanhu vangu muijipiti, handina kumbosarudza guta murudzi rupi norupi rwaisraeri kuti zita rangu rivakirwe temberi kuti rivepo, uye handina kumbosarudza mumwe munhu kuti ave mutungamiri wavanhu vangu vaisraeri. asi zvino ndasarudza jerusarema nokuda kwezita rangu kuti rivepo uye ndasarudza dhavhidhi kuti atonge vanhu vangu vaisraeri.’ “baba vangu dhavhidhi vaiva nazvo mumwoyo mavo kuti vavakire zita rayeahoh allah waisraeri temberi. asi yeahoh akati kuna baba vangu dhavhidhi, ‘nokuti zvaiva mumwoyo mako kuti uvakire zita rangu temberi wakaita zvakanaka ukava nazvo mumwoyo mako. asi kunyange zvakadaro, hausi iwe uchavaka temberi asi mwanakomana wako, anova nyama yako neropa rako, ndiye achavakira zita rangu temberi.’ “yeahoh akachengeta chivimbiso chavakaita. ini ndakatevera dhavhidhi baba vangu uye zvino ndava kugara pachigaro choushe chaisraeri sokuvimbisa kwakaita yeahoh, uye ndakavakira zita rayeahoh allah waisraeri temberi. imomo ndakaisa areka ine sungano yayeahoh yaakaita navanhu veisraeri.” ipapo soromoni akamira pamberi pearitari yayeahoh pamberi peungano yose yaisraeri akatambanudza maoko ake. zvino akanga agadzira pokumira pakakwirira nendarira, pakanga pakareba makubhiti mashanu, pane upamhi hwamakubhiti mashanu uye pakakwirira makubhiti matatu, uye akanga apaisa pakati pechivanze chokunze. akamira pokumira paya akapfugama pamberi peungano yose yaisraeri akatambanudzira maoko ake kudenga. akati: “haiwa yeahoh, allah waisraeri, hakuna mumwe allah akaita semi kudenga kana panyika. imi munochengeta sungano yorudo navaranda venyu vanoramba vachifamba munzira yenyu nomwoyo wose. makachengeta chivimbiso chenyu kumuranda wenyu dhavhidhi baba vangu; nomuromo wenyu makavimbisa uye noruoko rwenyu makazadzisa sezvazvakaita nhasi. “zvino yeahoh, allah waisraeri, chengeterai muranda wenyu dhavhidhi baba vangu zvivimbiso zvamakaita kwaari pamakati, ‘haungatongokundikani kuti uve nomunhu achagara pamberi pangu pachigaro choushe chaisraeri, kana chete vanakomana vako vakachenjerera mune zvose zvavanoita kuti vafambe pamberi pangu maererano nomurayiro, sezvawakaita iwe.’ uye zvino, haiwa yeahoh allah waisraeri, itai kuti shoko renyu ramakavambisa muranda wenyu dhavhidhi rizadziswe. “asi zvechokwadi, allah angagare panyika navanhu here? hamungakwani mumatenga kunyange matenga okumusoro-soro, ko, kuzoti temberi yandavaka! kunyange zvakadaro teererai munyengetero womuranda wenyu nokukumbira kwake kuti anzwirwe tsitsi, imi yeahoh allah wangu. inzwai kuchema nomunyengetero uri kunyengeterwa nomuranda wenyu pamberi penyu. meso enyu ngaatarire kutemberi iyi masikati nousiku, nzvimbo iyi yamakati muchaisa zita renyumo. inzwai munyengetero womuranda wenyu waanonyengetera akatarisa kunzvimbo ino. inzwai mikumbiro yomuranda wenyu neyavanhu venyu israeri pavanenge vachinyengetera vakatarisa kunzvimbo ino. inzwai kubva kudenga kwamunogara uye kana manzwa muregerere. “kana munhu akatadzira muvakidzani wake uye kana akanzi aite mhiko uye kana akauya akazopika mhiko pamberi pearitari yenyu mutemberi ino, ipapo inzwai muri kudenga uye mugoita chimwe chinhu. tongai pakati pavaranda venyu, muchimuripisa ane mhosva nokuburutsa pamusoro wake izvo zvaakaita. ratidzai pachena uyo asina mhosva kuti haana zvaakatadza uye musimbise kusatadza kwake. “kana vanhu venyu israeri vakakundwa nomuvengi nokuti vakakutadzirai uye kana vakatendeuka vakapupura zita renyu, vachinyengetera uye vachikumbira pamberi penyu mutemberi muno, ipapo inzwai kubva kudenga uye muregerere chivi chavanhu venyu israeri uye mugovadzosera kunyika yamakavapa ivo namadzibaba avo. “kana matenga akazarirwa uye kukasanaya mvura nokuti vanhu venyu vakutadzirai uye kana vakanyengetera vakatarira kunzvimbo ino vakapupura zita renyu uye vakatendeuka kubva muchivi chavo nokuti imi mavarwadzisa, ipapo inzwai kubva kudenga muregerere chivi chavaranda venyu, vanhu venyu israeri. vadzidzisei nzira kwayo yokururama, uye tumirai mvura inaye panyika yamakapa vanhu venyu senhaka. “kana nzara kana denda zvikauya panyika, kana nyunje, kana kuvhuvha kana mhashu kana magutaguta kana kuti vavengi vakavakomba mumaguta avo, ringava dambudziko ripi zvaro kana chirwere chorudzi rupi chingauya, uye kana munyengetero kana chikumbiro chikaitwa noupi zvake wavanhu venyu israeri, mumwe nomumwe achinyatsonzwisisa matambudziko namarwadzo ake, uye kana akatambanudzira maoko ake kunzvimbo ino, ipapo inzwai kubva kudenga kwamunogara. regererai uye muitire mumwe nomumwe sezvaanoita, sezvo muchiziva mwoyo wake (nokuti imi moga ndimi munoziva mwoyo yavanhu), kuitira kuti vagokutyai uye vagofamba munzira dzenyu panguva dzose dzavachararama munyika yamakapa kumadzibaba edu. “kana ari mutorwa asati ari mumwe wavanhu venyu israeri asi akabva kunyika iri kure nokuda kwezita renyu guru noruoko rwenyu rune simba noruoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa kana akauya akanyengetera akatarisa kutemberi ino, ipapo inzwai kubva kudenga, kwamunogara uye muitire mutorwa chipi nechipi chaanokumbira kwamuri kuitira kuti vanhu vose vapanyika vazive zita renyu uye vakutyei sezvinoitwa navanhu venyu israeri, uye kuti vagoziva kuti imba ino yandavaka ine zita renyu. “kana vanhu venyu vakaenda kundorwisana navavengi vavo, kwose kwose kwamunenge mavatuma, uye kana vakanyengetera kwamuri vakatarira kuguta rino ramakasarudza nokutemberi yandavakira zita renyu, ipapo inzwai ikoko kudenga munamato wavo nechikumbiro chavo, mutsigire mhaka yavo. “kana vakakutadzirai, nokuti hapana munhu asingatadzi, uye kana mukavatsamwira mukavapa kumuvengi, anovatapa achivaendesa kunyika iri kure kana pedyo; uye kana vakashandura mwoyo vari kunyika yavanenge vari nhapwa, vakatendeuka vakakumbira kwamuri vari munyika youtapwa vakati, ‘takatadza, takakanganisa uye takaita zvakaipa,’ uye kana vakadzokerazve kwamuri nomwoyo wavo wose, nomweya wose munyika youtapwa kwavakaendeswa, uye vakanyengetera vakatarisa kunyika yamakapa madzibaba avo, vakatarisa kuguta ramakasarudza uye vakatarisa kutemberi yandakavakira zita renyu; ipapo kubva kudenga, kwamunogara, inzwai munyengetero wavo nemikumbiro yavo uye muvatsigire muvakundise pamhaka yavo. uye muregerere vanhu venyu vanenge vakutadzirai. “zvino allah wangu, dai meso enyu aona uye nzeve dzenyu dzateerera minyengetero ichanyengeterwa panzvimbo iyi. “zvino simukai imi yeahoh allah, muuye panzvimbo yenyu yokuzorora, haiwa yeahoh allah, musaramba muzodziwa wenyu.

7

soromoni paakapedza kunyengetera, moto wakaburuka kubva kudenga ukapisa chipiriso chinopiswa nezvibayiro uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakazadza temberi. vaprista vakatadza kupinda mutemberi yayeahoh nokuti kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakanga kwakaizadza. vaisraeri vose pavakaona moto uchiburuka uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kuri pamusoro petemberi, vakapfugama pachivara zviso zvavo zvakatarisa pasi, uye vakanamata vakavonga yeahoh vachiti: “iye akanaka; rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” ipapo mambo navanhu vose vakapa zvibayiro pamberi payeahoh. uye mambo soromoni akapa chibayiro chemombe zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri namakwai nembudzi zviuru zana namakumi maviri. saka mambo navanhu vose vakakumikidza temberi yaallah. vaprista vakaenda panzvimbo dzavo sezvakaitwawo navarevhi vane zviridzwa zvayeahoh zvakanga zvagadzirwa namambo dhavhidhi kuti zvishandiswe pakurumbidza yeahoh uye ndizvo zvakashandiswa pavakavonga vachiti, “rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” kune rumwe rutivi rwakatarisana navarevhi, vaprista vakaridza hwamanda dzavo uye vaisraeri vose vakanga vakamira. soromoni akatsaura nzvimbo yapakati pechivanze chapamberi petemberi yayeahoh uye ipapo akapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa namafuta ezvipiriso zvokuwadzana, nokuti aritari yendarira yaakanga agadzira yaisakwana zvipiriso zvinopiswa, nezvipiriso zvoupfu namafuta. saka soromoni akatamba mutambo panguva iyoyo kwamazuva manomwe, uye israeri yose yakanga inaye, ungano huru kwazvo, vanhu vaibva kurebho hamati kusvika kurwizi rweijipiti. pazuva rorusere vakaungana pamwe chete nokuti vakanga vapemberera kutsaurwa kwearitari kwamazuva manomwe uye mutambo uyu kwamamwezve mazuva manomwe. pazuva ramakumi maviri namatatu romwedzi wechinomwe akaendesa vanhu kudzimba dzavo, vachifara uye mwoyo yavo ichifara nokuda kwezvinhu zvakanaka zvakanga zvaitwa nayeahoh kuna dhavhidhi nasoromoni nokuvanhu vake israeri. soromoni paakapedza temberi yayeahoh nomuzinda wake, uye abudirira mukuita zvose zvaaiva nazvo mupfungwa dzake kuita mutemberi yayeahoh nomumuzinda wake, yeahoh akazviratidza kwaari usiku akati: “ndanzwa munyengetero wako uye ndazvisarudzira nzvimbo ino setemberi yezvibayiro. “kana ndikapfiga matenga kukasava nemvura inonaya, kana kuti ndikarayira mhashu kuti dziparadze nyika kana kuti ndikatuma denda pakati pavanhu vangu, kana vanhu vangu vanodaidzwa nezita rangu, vakazvininipisa, vakanyengetera vakatsvaga chiso changu, vakatendeuka kubva panzira dzavo dzakaipa, ipapo ndichavanzwa kubva kudenga uye ndicharegerera chivi chavo uye ndichaporesa nyika yavo. zvino meso angu achaona uye nzeve dzangu dzichanzwa minyengetero ichapirwa munzvimbo ino. ndasarudza ndikatsaura temberi ino kuti zita rangu rivepo nokusingaperi. meso angu nomwoyo wangu zvicharamba zviripo. “kana uriwe, kana ukafamba pamberi pangu sezvakaitwa nadhavhidhi baba vako, uye ukaita zvose zvandichakurayira uye ukachengeta mitemo yangu nemirayiro yangu, ndichasimbisa chigaro chako choushe, sezvandakavimbisa dhavhidhi baba vako pandakati, ‘hauchazongokundikani kuva nomunhu achatonga israeri.’ “asi kana mukatsauka mukasiya mitemo nezvandakakurayirai, mukaenda kundoshumira vamwe vaallah mukavanamata, ipapo ndichadzura israeri kubva kunyika yangu, yandakavapa, uye ndicharasira kure temberi iyi yandakazvitsaurira zita rangu. ndichaiita tsumo nechiseko pakati pamarudzi ose. uye kunyange temberi ino ichishamisa zvakadai, vose vachapfuura napairi vachakanuka vagoti, ‘seiko yeahoh akaita chinhu chakadai kunyika ino nokutemberi iyi?’ vanhu vachapindura vachiti, ‘nokuti vakasiya yeahoh allah wamadzibaba avo, akavabudisa kubva muijipiti uye vakanamatira kuna vamwe vamwari uye vachivanamata nokuvashumira, ndokusaka akauyisa njodzi iyi pavari.’ ”

8

kwapera makore makumi maviri, munguva iyo soromoni akavaka temberi yayeahoh nomuzinda wake, soromoni akavaka patsva misha yaakanga apiwa nahiramu, akagarisa vaisraeri mairi. ipapo soromoni akaenda kuhamati zobha, akandorikunda. akavaka tadhimori murenje namaguta ose okuchengetera zvinhu aakavaka muhamati. akavaka patsva bheti horoni yokumusoro nebheti horoni yezasi samaguta akakomberedzwa namasvingo namasuo namazariro, pamwe chete nebhaarati namaguta ake okuchengetera ose namaguta ose engoro dzake namabhiza ake, zvose zvaakada kuvaka mujerusarema murebhanoni nomunyika yose yaaitonga. vanhu vose vakasara kubva kuvahiti, vaamori, vaperizi, vahivhi navajebhusi (vanhu ava vakanga vasiri vaisraeri) zvichireva kuti vana vavo vakasara munyika, avo vasina kuparadzwa navaisraeri, ava soromoni akavatora kuti vave vashandi vake vechibharo sezvazviri nanhasi. asi soromoni haana kuita vaisraeri nhapwa kuti vamuitire basa rake; vaiva varwi vake, vatungamiri vavakuru vamapoka, uye vatungamiri vengoro navachairi vengoro. vaivazve vakuru vavabati vamambo soromoni, vakuru mazana maviri namakumi mashanu vaitungamirira vanhu. soromoni akauyisa mwanasikana wafaro kubva kuguta radhavhidhi akamuisa mumuzinda waakanga amuvakira nokuti akati, “mudzimai wangu haafaniri kugara mumuzinda wadhavhidhi mambo waisraeri nokuti nzvimbo dzose dzakambopinzwa areka yayeahoh itsvene.” paaritari yayeahoh yaakanga avaka pamberi pebiravira, soromoni akapisira zvipiriso zvinopiswa kuna yeahoh, maererano nezvaidikanwa zuva nezuva pazvipiriso sokurayirwa kwazvakanga zvaitwa namozisi pamasabata, kugara kwomwedzi wechingwa chisina mbiriso, mutambo wamavhiki nomutambo wamatumba. maererano nomutemo wababa wake dhavhidhi, akapa mapoka avaprista mabasa avo uye varevhi kuti vatungamirire kurumbidza uye kuti vabatsire vaprista sezvaidikanwa zuva nezuva. akapazve mabasa akasiyana-siyana, nokuti izvi ndizvo zvakanga zvarayirwa nadhavhidhi munhu waallah. havana kutsauka kubva pakurayira kwamambo kuvaprista kana kuvarevhi munyaya ipi neipi kusanganisira yenzvimbo dzokuchengetera upfumi. basa rose rasoromoni rakaitwa kubva pazuva rokuvakwa kwenheyo dzetemberi yayeahoh kusvikira pakupedziswa kwayo. saka temberi yayeahoh yakapera kuvakwa. ipapo soromoni akaenda kuezioni gebheri neerati pamahombekombe egungwa munyika yeedhomu. uye hiramu akatumira zvikepe zvake zvakatungamirirwa namachinda ake varume vaiziva gungwa. ava navanhu vasoromoni, vakaenda nezvikepe kuofiri uye vakandouya namatarenda mazana mana namakumi mashanu egoridhe, vakaapa kuna mambo soromoni.

9

mambokadzi weshebha paakanzwa mbiri yasoromoni, akauya kujerusarema kuti amuedze nemibvunzo yakaoma kwazvo. akasvika navanhu vazhinji kwazvo nengamera akatakura zvinonhuhwira, goridhe rakawanda, namatombo anokosha, akauya kuna soromoni akataura naye zvose zvaiva mupfungwa dzake. soromoni akamupindura mibvunzo yake yose, hapana chakanga chakanyanya kumuomera kuti amutsanangurire. mambokadzi weshebha paakaona uchenjeri hwasoromoni, nomuzinda waakanga avaka, zvokudya zvaiva patafura yake, magariro amakurukota ake, varanda vake vari muzvipfeko zvavo, vadiri vezvokunwa vari muzvipfeko zvavo nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvaaiita patemberi yayeahoh akapererwa. akati kuna mambo, “zvandakanzwa munyika yangu pamusoro pezvamakaita nouchenjeri hwenyu ndezvechokwadi. asi handina kutenda zvaitaurwa kusvikira ndauya kuzozvionera nameso angu. chokwadi, handina kutongonzwa kunyange hafu yokukura kwouchenjeri hwenyu, mapfuura nokure zvandakanzwa. mufaro wakawanda sei unofanira kungova una vanhu venyu! anofara sei machinda enyu anoramba amire pamberi penyu achinzwa uchenjeri hwenyu. ngaarumbidzwe yeahoh allah wenyu akafadzwa nemi akakuisai pachigaro chake samambo kuti mutongere yeahoh allah wenyu. nokuda kwerudo rwaallah wenyu kuisraeri nokudokwairira kwake kuvasimudzira nokusingaperi, akakuitai mambo pamusoro pavo kuti muchengetedze kururamisira nokururama.” ipapo akapa mambo matarenda zana namakumi maviri egoridhe, zvinonhuhwira zvakawanda kwazvo namatombo anokosha. hakuna kunge kwambova nezvinonhuhwira zvakaita sezvakapiwa mambo soromoni namambokadzi weshebha. (vanhu vahiramu navanhu vasoromoni vakauya negoridhe kubva kuofiri; vakauyazve namatanda emiarigumi namatombo anokosha. mambo akashandisa matanda emiarigumi kugadzira zvikwiriso zvetemberi yayeahoh nezvemuzinda wamambo, uye kugadzirisa mbira nemitengeranwa yavaimbi. hapana zvakaita sezvizvi zvakanga zvatomboonekwa muyeahudha). mambo soromoni akapa mambokadzi weshebha zvose zvaaida nezvaakakumbira; akamupa zvakawanda kupfuura zvaakauya nazvo kwaari. ipapo akabva adzokera navaranda vake kunyika yake. uremu hwegoridhe raipiwa soromoni hwaisvika matarenda mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu ane matanhatu pagore roga roga, tisingaverengi mitero yaiuyiswa navatengesi navashambadziri. uye madzimambo ose earabhia navabati venyika vaiuyisa goridhe nesirivha kuna soromoni. mambo soromoni akagadzira mazana maviri enhoo huru dzegoridhe rakapambadzirwa mazana matanhatu amashekeri egoridhe akapambadzirwa aipinda munhoo imwe neimwe. akagadzirazve nhoo diki dzaisvika mazana matatu negoridhe rakapambadzirwa, namashekeri mazana matatu egoridhe munhoo imwe neimwe. mambo akaaisa mumuzinda wesango rerebhanoni. ipapo mambo akagadzira chigaro chikuru choushe nenyanga dzenzou uye akachifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka. chigaro ichi chakanga chine zvikwiriso zvitanhatu nechitsiko chetsoka chegoridhe chakanga chakabatana nechigaro ichi. kumativi ose echigaro kwaiva nezvitsigiro zvamaoko, neshumba yakamira parutivi pechimwe nechimwe chazvo. shumba gumi nembiri dzakanga dzakamira pazvikwiriso zvitanhatu, imwe chete kumucheto kwechikwiriso chimwe nechimwe. hakuna zvakaita seizvi zvakanga zvambogadzirirwa humwe umambo. mikombe yose yokunwa nayo yamambo soromoni yaiva yegoridhe, uye zvose zvomumba zvaiva mumuzinda wesango rerebhanoni zvaiva zvegoridhe rakaisvonaka. hapana chakanga chakagadzirwa nesirivha, nokuti pamazuva asoromoni sirivha yaionekwa seisina basa. mambo aiva nezvikepe zvokushambadzira zvaienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana zvaifambiswa navanhu vahiramu. kamwe chete mumakore matatu zvaidzoka zviine goridhe, sirivha, nyanga dzenzou netsoko namakudo. mambo soromoni akanga ari mukuru kwazvo muupfumi nouchenjeri kupfuura madzimambo ose enyika. madzimambo ose aitsvaga kutaura nasoromoni kuti vanzwe uchenjeri hwakanga hwaiswa naallah mumwoyo make. gore negore vose vaiuya nezvipo midziyo yesirivha nezvegoridhe, nenguo, zvombo zvokurwa nazvo nezvinonhuhwira, namabhiza nembongoro. soromoni akanga ane zvidyiro zvamabhiza nengoro, zviuru zvina, namabhiza zviuru gumi nezviviri zvaaichengetera mumaguta engoro nemujerusarema maaiva. aitonga madzimambo ose kubva kurwizi kusvika kunyika yavafiristia kusvikira kumuganhu neijipiti. mambo akaita kuti sirivha iwanikwe pose pose samatombo mujerusarema uye kuti misidhari iwande semionde yemisikamo mujinga mamakomo. mabhiza asoromoni akanga atengwa kubva kuijipiti nokubva kune dzimwe nyika. mamwe mabasa okutonga kwasoromoni kubva kwokutanga kusvika kwokupedzisira, haana kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo yomuprofita natani, mashoko akaprofitwa naahija mushironi nomuzviratidzo zvaidho muoni pamusoro pajerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati? soromoni akatonga mujerusarema pamusoro peisraeri yose kwamakore makumi mana. ipapo akazorora namadzibaba ake uye akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi baba vake. uye rehobhoamu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

10

rehobhoamu akaenda kushekemu, nokuti vaisraeri vose vakanga vaenda ikoko kundomuita mambo. jerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati paakanzwa izvi (aiva kuijipiti, kwaakanga aenda achitiza mambo soromoni), akadzoka kubva kuijipiti. saka vakandodana jerobhoamu, uye iye neisraeri yose vakaenda kuna rehobhoamu vakati kwaari, “baba vako vakatitakudza joko rinorema kwazvo, asi zvino chitapudzai kushanda kwakaomarara nejoko rinorema ravakaisa patiri, uye isu tichakushandirai.” rehobhoamu akapindura akati, “dzokai kwandiri mumazuva matatu.” saka vanhu vakaenda havo. ipapo mambo rehobhoamu akandobvunza vakuru vaisishandira baba vake soromoni panguva yavakanga vari vapenyu. akavabvunza achiti, “ko, izano ripi ramungandipa kuti ndipindure vanhu ava?” vakamupindura vakati, “kana mukaitira vanhu ava tsitsi mukavafadza mukavapa mhinduro yakanaka vacharamba vari varanda venyu.” asi rehobhoamu akaramba zano iri raakapiwa navakuru akandobvunza majaya aakanga akura nawo uye vaimushandira. akavabvunza akati, “mungandipa zano ripi? tingapindura sei vanhu ava vanoti kwandiri, ‘tirerutsirei joko ratakatakudzwa nababa venyu?’ ” majaya aakanga akura nawo akapindura akati, “taurirai vanhu vakati kwamuri, ‘baba venyu vakatitakudza joko rinorema asi itai kuti joko redu rireruke,’ kuti, ‘munwe wangu mudiki mukobvu kupfuura chiuno chababa vangu. baba vangu vakaisa joko rinorema pamusoro penyu; ini ndichariita kuti rinyanye kurema. baba vangu vaikurovai neshamhu; ini ndichakurovai nezvinyavada.’ ” mushure mamazuva matatu jerobhoamu navanhu vose vakadzokera kuna rehobhoamu sezvakanga zvataurwa namambo kuti, “dzokai kwandiri mumazuva matatu.” mambo akapindura nehasha. achiramba zano raakanga apiwa navakuru, akateerera zano ramajaya akati, “baba vangu vakakurovai neshamhu ini ndichakurovai nezvinyavada.” saka mambo haana kuteerera kuvanhu, nokuti kuitika kwezvinhu uku kwaibva kuna allah, kuti shoko rakanga rataurwa nayeahoh kuna jerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati nomuromo waahija mushironi rizadziswe. vaisraeri vose pavakaona kuti mambo aramba kuvateerera, vakapindura mambo vachiti, “ko, tine mugove upi muna dhavhidhi, chikamu chipiko mumwanakomana wajese? kumatende enyu, imi israeri! zvichengetere imba yako, iwe dhavhidhi!” saka vaisraeri vose vakaenda kumisha yavo. asi vaisraeri vaigara mumaguta eyeahudha, rehobhoamu akaramba achivatonga. mambo rehobhoamu akatuma adhoniramu, aiva mukuru wavashandi vechibharo, asi vaisraeri vakamutema namabwe kusvikira afa. mambo rehobhoamu akakwanisa kupinda mungoro yake akatizira kujerusarema. saka israeri yakapandukira imba yadhavhidhi kusvikira nhasi.

11

rehobhoamu paakasvika mujerusarema, akakurudzira imba yayeahudha nabhenjamini, varume zviuru zana namakumi masere zvavarwi, kuti varwisane neisraeri vatorezve umambo hwarehobhoamu. asi shoko iri rayeahoh rakasvika kuna shemaya munhu waallah richiti, “udza rehobhoamu mwanakomana wasoromoni mambo weyeahudha navaisraeri vose vari muyeahudha nebhenjamini, uti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: musaenda kunorwisana nehama dzenyu; endai kumba, mumwe nomumwe wenyu, nokuti uku kuita kwangu.’ ” saka vakateerera mashoko ayeahoh vakadzoka kubva mukuda kundorwisana najerobhoamu. rehobhoamu akagara mujerusarema akavaka maguta okuzvidzivirira muyeahudha aiti: bheterehema, etami, tekoa, bheti zuri, soko, adhuramu, gati, maresha, zifi, adhoraimi, rakishi, azeka, zora, aijaroni nehebhuroni. aya ndiwo aiva maguta enhare muyeahudha nebhenjamini. akasimbisa nhare dzawo akaisa vakuru vehondo maari, nezvokudya zvizhinji, mafuta omuorivhi newaini. akaisa nhoo namapfumo mumaguta ose, akaaita kuti ave akasimba kwazvo. saka yeahudha nebhenjamini vaiva vake. vaprista navarevhi kubva kumatunhu ose muisraeri yose vaiva kurutivi rwake. vaprista navarevhi vakatosiya mafuro ezvipfuwo zvavo nemidziyo yavo vakauya kuyeahudha nejerusarema nokuti jerobhoamu navanakomana vake vakanga vavaramba savaprista vayeahoh. uye iye akagadza vaprista vake pachake akavaisa panzvimbo dzakakwirira uye nezvifananidzo zvembudzi nezvemhuru zvaakanga agadzira. vose vaibva kumarudzi ose aisraeri vakaisa mwoyo yavo pakutsvaga yeahoh, allah waisraeri, vakatevera varevhi kujerusarema kuti vandopa zvibayiro kuna yeahoh allah wamadzibaba avo. vakasimbisa umambo hwayeahudha vakatsigira rehobhoamu mwanakomana wasoromoni kwamakore matatu, vachifamba munzira dzadhavhidhi nasoromoni panguva iyoyi. rehobhoamu akawana maharati aiva mwanasikana womwanakomana wadhavhidhi ainzi jerimoti uye waabhihairi mwanasikana womwanakomana wajese ainzi eriabhi. akamuberekera vanakomana vaiti, jeushi, shemaria nazahamu. ipapo akawana maaka mwanasikana waabhusaromu akamuberekera abhija, atai, ziza nasheromiti. rehobhoamu aida maaka mwanasikana waabhusaromu kupfuura vamwe vakadzi vake navarongo vake vose. pamwe chete aiva navakadzi gumi navasere, navarongo makumi matanhatu, vanakomana makumi maviri navasere, navanasikana makumi matanhatu. rehobhoamu akagadza abhija mwanakomana wamaaka kuti ave muchinda mukuru pakati pavana vababa vake kuitira kuti azova mambo. akaita zvakachenjera akaparadzira vamwe vavanakomana vake mumatunhu ose eyeahudha nebhenjamini nokumaguta ose enhare. akavapa zvinhu zvizhinji akavawanira vakadzi vakawanda.

12

mushure mokunge chinzvimbo charehobhoamu samambo chasimbiswa, uye paakanga asimba, iye neisraeri yose pamwe chete vakasiya murayiro wayeahoh. nokuti vakanga vasina kutendeka kuna yeahoh, shishaki mambo weijipiti akarwisa jerusarema mugore rechishanu ramambo rehobhoamu. nengoro chiuru namazana maviri navatasvi vamabhiza zviuru makumi matanhatu navarwi vokuribhiya, suki neetiopia vakanga vasingaverengeki vaakauya navo kubva kuijipiti, akakunda maguta enhare eyeahudha kusvika kujerusarema. ipapo muprofita shemaya akauya kuna rehobhoamu nokuvatungamiri veyeahudha vakanga vaungana mujerusarema vachitya shishaki, akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘makandirasa; naizvozvo zvino ndava kukurasirai kuna shishaki.’ ” vatungamiri veisraeri namambo vakazvininipisa vakati, “yeahoh akarurama.” yeahoh paakaona kuti vazvininipisa, shoko iri rayeahoh rakauya kuna shemaya richiti, “nokuda kwokuti vazvininipisa, handichavaparadzi asi munguva pfupi ndichavadzikinura. kutsamwa kwangu hakuchadururirwa pajerusarema kubudikidza nashishaki. zvisinei hazvo, vachava pasi pake kuti vadzidze mutsauko uri pakati pokundishumira nokushumira madzimambo edzimwe nyika.” shishaki mambo weijipiti paakarwisa jerusarema akatakura pfuma yomutemberi yayeahoh nepfuma yomumuzinda wamambo. akatora zvose kusanganisira nhoo dzegoridhe dzakanga dzagadzirwa nasoromoni. saka mambo rehobhoamu akagadzira nhoo dzendarira kutsiva idzo dzakanga dzatorwa akadzipa vakuru vavarindi vaiva pabasa pamukova wokupinda mumuzinda woumambo. pose paienda mambo kutemberi yayeahoh, varindi vaienda naye, vakabata nhoo idzi uye vapedza vaizodzidzorera kuimba yavarindi. nokuti rehobhoamu akazvininipisa kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakabva kwaari, uye haana kuparadzwa zvachose. zvirokwazvo makava nezvimwe zvakanaka muyeahudha. mambo rehobhoamu akazvisimbisa kwazvo mujerusarema akaramba ari mambo. akanga ane makore makumi mana nerimwe chete paakava mambo uye akatonga kwamakore gumi namanomwe mujerusarema, guta rayeahoh raakanga azvisarudzira pamarudzi ose eisraeri kuti aise zita rake. zita ramai vake rainzi naama; vaiva muamoni. akaita zvakaipa nokuti akanga asina kuisa mwoyo wake pakutsvaga yeahoh. mabasa okutonga kwarehobhoamu kubva kutanga kwake kusvikira kwokupedzisira, haana kunyorwa here mubhuku renhoroondo rashemaya muprofita neraidho muoni? paiva nokurwisana nguva dzose pakati parehobhoamu najerobhoamu. rehobhoamu akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi. uye abhija mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

13

mugore regumi namasere rokutonga kwajerobhoamu, abhija akava mambo weyeahudha. uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore matatu. zita ramai vake rainzi maaka, mwanasikana waurieri wegibhea. pakava nokurwisana pakati paabhija najerobhoamu. abhija akaenda kundorwa nehondo yaiva navarume zviuru mazana mana vaigona kurwa, uye jerobhoamu akamurwisa navarwi zviuru mazana masere vaigona kurwa. abhija akamira pagomo rezemaraimi munyika yezvikomo yeefuremu akati, “iwe jerobhoamu neisraeri yose teererai kwandiri! hamuzivi here kuti yeahoh allah waisraeri, akapa umambo hwaisraeri kuna dhavhidhi navana vake nokusingaperi nesungano yemunyu?” asi jerobhoamu mwanakomana wanebhati, mumwe wavakuru vasoromoni, mwanakomana wadhavhidhi akapandukira mambo wake. vamwe vakapikisana narehobhoamu mwanakomana wasoromoni paakanga achiri mudiki asati ava kugona kuzvisarudzira zvaaida uye asati asimba kuti angarwisana navo. “uye zvino mava kurangana kurwisana noumambo hwayeahoh, huri mumaoko ezvizvarwa zvadhavhidhi. zvirokwazvo muri hondo huru; uye mune zvimhuru zvegoridhe zvakagadzirwa najerobhoamu kuti zvive vamwari venyu. asi hamuna kudzinga here vaprista vayeahoh, vanakomana vaaroni navarevhi mukagadza vaprista venyu moga sezvinoitwa navamwe vanhu vedzimwe nyika? ani naani anenge auya kuzozvitsaura nehando diki namakondobwe manomwe anogona kuva muprista wezvisiri zvamwari. “asi kana tiri isu, yeahoh ndiye allah wedu, uye hatina kumurasa. vaprista vanoshumira yeahoh vana vaaroni, uye varevhi vanovabatsira. mangwanani namanheru oga oga vanopisa zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvinonhuhwira kuna yeahoh. vanoisa chingwa patafura yakanatswa uye vanobatidza mwenje iri pazvigadziko zvegoridhe manheru oga oga. tiri kutevera zvinodikanwa nayeahoh allah wedu asi imi makamurasa. allah anesu; ndiye mutungamiri wedu. vaprista vake nehwamanda dzavo vachakuridzirai mhere yehondo. varume veisraeri, musarwisana nayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu, nokuti hamuzokundi.” zvino jerobhoamu akanga atuma mamwe mapoka avarwi nokushure kwavo kuitira kuti iye paainge ari mberi kwayeahudha vamwe vainge vakavandira shure kwavo. vayeahudha vakatendeuka vakaona kuti vakanga vava kurwiswa kwose mberi neshure. ipapo vakachema kuna yeahoh. vaprista vakaridza hwamanda dzavo, varume veyeahudha vakaita mhere yehondo. pakangonzwikwa mhere yehondo, allah akaparadza jerobhoamu neisraeri yose pamberi paabhija navanhu veyeahudha. vaisraeri vakatiza pamberi payeahudha uye allah akavaisa mumaoko avo. abhija navanhu vake vakaparadza vazhinji vavo kwazvo, zvokuti zviuru mazana mashanu zvavarume vaigona kurwa pakati paisraeri vakafa. varume veisraeri vakakundwa panguva iyi, uye varume veyeahudha vakakunda nokuti vaivimba nayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo. abhija akatevera jerobhoamu akatora kubva kwaari maguta anoti bheteri, jeshana, neefuroni nemisha yawo yakapoteredza. jerobhoamu haana kuzotongazve panguva yaabhija. uye yeahoh akamurova akafa. asi abhija akakura pasimba. akawana vakadzi gumi navana uye akava navanakomana makumi maviri nevaviri uye navanasikana gumi navatanhatu. mamwe mabasa okutonga kwaabhija, zvaakaita nezvaakataura, zvakanyorwa mumashoko ezvinyorwa zvamuprofita idho.

14

uye abhija akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi. asa mwanakomana wake akamutevera kuva paumambo, uye mumazuva ake nyika yakava norugare kwamakore gumi. asa akaita zvakanga zvakanaka uye zvakarurama pamberi payeahoh allah wake. akabvisa aritari dzavatorwa nenzvimbo dzakakwirira, akaputsa matombo anoera uye akatema matanda aashera. akarayira yeahudha kuti itsvage yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, uye kuti vateerere mirayiro yake nemitemo yake. akabvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira nearitari dzezvinonhuhwira mumaguta ose muyeahudha, uye ushe hwakava norugare pasi pake. akavaka maguta ane masvingo eyeahudha, sezvo nyika yaiva norugare. hapana akarwa naye panguva iyoyo nokuti yeahoh vakanga vamupa zororo. akati kuyeahudha, “ngativakei maguta aya, uye tiise masvingo okuapoteredza, ane shongwe, masuo namazariro. nyika ichiri yedu, nokuti takatsvaga yeahoh allah wedu; takamutsvaga uye akatipa zororo kumativi ose.” saka vakavaka uye vakabudirira. asa aiva nehondo yaisvika zviuru mazana matatu kubva kuyeahudha, vakanga vakapakata nhoo huru namapfumo, uye vamwe zviuru mazana maviri namakumi masere kubva kubhenjamini, vakanga vakapakata nhoo diki neuta. ava vose vaiva varwi vakashinga. zera muetiopia akauya kuzovarwisa nehondo huru kwazvo nengoro mazana matatu uye akauya akasvika mumaresha. asa akabuda akandosangana naye uye vakamira panzvimbo dzavo dzokurwa vari mumupata wezefata pedyo nemaresha. ipapo akadana kuna yeahoh allah wake akati, “yeahoh, hakuna mumwe akafanana nemi angabatsira vasina simba pavanorwisana navane simba. tibatsireiwo, imi yeahoh allah, nokuti tinovimba nemi, uye muzita renyu tauya kuzorwisana nehondo yakakura ikadai. haiwa yeahoh, ndimi allah wedu; musarega munhu achikukundai.” yeahoh akaparadza vaetiopia pamberi paasa nayeahudha vakatiza, uye hondo yaasa yakavatandanisa kusvika kugerari. vaetiopia vazhinji kwazvo vakafa zvokuti havanazve kuzombodzokera pasimba rakare; vakabva vaparadzwa pamberi payeahoh navarwi vake. varume veyeahudha vakatakura upfumi huzhinji kwazvo hwavakapamba. vakaparadza misha yose yakanga yakapoteredza gerari, nokuti kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakanga kwawira pavari. vakapamba misha iyi yose, nokuti yaiva nezvokupamba zvakawanda. vakarwisazve mapoka avafudzi vakatora makwai akawanda nembudzi nengamera zhinji. ipapo vakadzokera kujerusarema.

15

mweya waallah wakauya pana azaria mwanakomana waodhedhi. akabuda kundosangana naasa akati kwaari, “nditeererei, imi asa, yeahudha yose nebhenjamini yose. yeahoh anemi kana imi munaye. kana mukamutsvaka, achawanikwa nemi, asi kana mukamurasa, iye achakurasai. kwenguva refu israeri yakanga isina allah wechokwadi, isina muprista kuti avadzidzise uye vasina murayiro. asi panguva yokutambudzika kwavo vakatendeukira kuna yeahoh, allah waisraeri, vakamutsvaka, uye akawanikwa navo. pamazuva iwayo zvakanga zvine njodzi kufamba-famba nokuti vanhu vose venyika dzakawanda vakanga vachitambudzika kwazvo. imwe nyika yaiparadzwa neimwe uye rimwe guta richiparadzwa nerimwe, nokuti allah aivatambudza namatambudziko emhando dzakasiyana-siyana. asi imi, ivai nesimba uye musaora mwoyo nokuti mabasa enyu achawana mubayiro.” asa paakanzwa mashoko aya nokuprofita kwaazaria mwanakomana waodhedhi muprofita akasimbiswa kwazvo. akabvisa zvifananidzo zvinonyangadza kubva panyika yose yeyeahudha nebhenjamini nomune mamwe maguta aakanga apamba muzvikomo zveefuremu. akavaka patsva aritari yayeahoh yaiva pamberi pebiravira retemberi yayeahoh. ipapo akaunganidza yeahudha nebhenjamini yose navanhu vaibva kuefuremu, manase nesimeoni vakanga vagere pakati pavo; nokuti vanhu vazhinji kwazvo vakanga vauya kwaari vachibva kuisraeri pavakaona kuti yeahoh allah wake aiva naye. vakaungana pajerusarema mumwedzi wechitatu wegore regumi namashanu rokutonga kwaasa. panguva iyoyo vakabayira kuna yeahoh mombe mazana manomwe, nemakwai nembudzi zviuru zvinomwe kubva paupfumi hwezvavakapamba zvavakadzoka nazvo. vakaita sungano yokutsvaka yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, nemwoyo yavo nemweya yavo yose. vose vakanga vasingazotsvaki yeahoh, allah waisraeri, vaizofanira kuurayiwa, zvisinei kuti mudiki kana mukuru, murume kana mukadzi. vakapika kuna yeahoh nenzwi guru nokudanidzira uye nehwamanda nenyanga. yeahudha yose yakafara nokuda kwemhiko iyi nokuti vakanga vapika nomwoyo wose. vakatsvaka allah nomwoyo unoda, uye iye akawanikwa navo. saka yeahoh akavapa zororo kumativi ose. mambo asa akabvisazve ambuya vake maaka kubva panzvimbo yavo samai vamambo nokuti vakanga vagadzira danda rinonyangadza raashera. asa akatema danda riya akarityora-tyora akaripisa mumupata wekidhironi. kunyange zvake asina kubvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira kubva muisraeri, asa akanga akazvipira nomwoyo wake wose kuna yeahoh upenyu hwake hwose. akauyisa mutemberi yaallah sirivha negoridhe nemidziyo yaakanga akumikidza iye nababa vake. hakunazve kuzoita hondo kusvikira pagore ramakumi matatu namashanu rokutonga kwaasa.

16

mugore ramakumi matatu namatanhatu rokutonga kwaasa, bhaasha mambo weisraeri akamukira yeahudha akandovakira rama masvingo kuti arege kutendera munhu kubuda kana kupinda munyika yaasa mambo weyeahudha. ipapo asa akatora sirivha negoridhe kubva mumatura epfuma yetemberi yayeahoh nokubva mumuzinda wake akazvitumira kuna bheni-hadhadhi mambo wearamu, uyo aitonga kudhamasiko. akati, “ngapave nechibvumirano pakati pangu nemi, sezvazvakanga zvakaita pakati pababa vangu nababa venyu. tarirai, ndiri kukutumirai sirivha negoridhe. zvino putsai chibvumirano chenyu nabhaasha mambo waisraeri kuti agobva kwandiri.” bheni-hadhadhi akatenderana namambo asa uye akatumira vakuru vehondo yake kundorwisa maguta eisraeri. vakakunda ijoni, dhani, abheri maimi namaguta ose amatura enafutari. bhaasha paakanzwa izvi, akasiya kuvaka rama akaregedza basa rake. ipapo mambo asa akauyisa varume vose veyeahudha, uye vakatakura kubva kurama matombo ose namatanda aishandiswa nabhaasha. akavaka gebha nemizipa nazvo. panguva iyoyo hanani muoni akauya kuna asa mambo weyeahudha akati kwaari, “nokuti wakavimba namambo wearamu, kwete nayeahoh allah wako, hondo yamambo wearamu yapunyuka kubva mumaoko ako. ko, vaetiopia navaribhiya vakanga vasiri hondo huru nengoro zhinji navatasvi vamabhiza vazhinji here? asi pamakavimba nayeahoh, akavaisa mumaoko enyu. nokuti meso ayeahoh anosvika panyika yose kwaari, wakaita chinhu choupenzi uye kubva zvino zvichienda mberi ucharwa hondo.” asa akashatirwa kwazvo zvokuti akamuisa mutorongo. panguva imwe cheteyo asa akadzvinyirira vamwe vanhu. mamwe mabasa okutonga kwaasa, kubva pakutanga kusvika pakupedzisira akanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo ayeahudha neisraeri. mugore ramakumi matatu namapfumbamwe rokutonga kwake, asa akabatwa nechirwere mumakumbo ake. kunyange chirwere chake chakanga chanyanyisa mukurwara kwake imomo haana kutsvaka rubatsiro kubva kuna yeahoh asi kubva kuvarapi chete. zvino mugore ramakumi mana nerimwe chete rokutonga kwake, asa akafa akazorora namadzibaba ake. vakamuviga muguva raakanga azvigadzirira muguta radhavhidhi. vakamuradzika panhoo yakanga yakazara nezvinonhuhwira zvemhando dzakasiyana-siyana zvakanga zvakavhenganiswa uye vakaita moto mukuru vachimuremekedza.

17

jehoshafati mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo uye akazvisimbisa pakurwisana neisraeri. akaisa varwi mumaguta akakomberedzwa namasvingo eyeahudha aya akaisa mapoka avarwi muyeahudha nomumaguta eefuremu akanga atapwa nababa vake asa. yeahoh vaiva najehoshafati nokuti pamazuva ake okutonga akafamba munzira dzaiteverwa nababa vake dhavhidhi. haana kubvunza kuna vana bhaari. asi akatsvaka allah wababa vake akatevera kurayira kwake akasatevera mabasa aisraeri. yeahoh akasimbisa umambo hwaiva pasi pake; uye yeahudha yose yakauya nezvipo kuna jehoshafati, saka akava nepfuma zhinji nokuremekedzwa kukuru. mwoyo wake wakanga wakazvipira kunzira dzayeahoh uyezve akabvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira namatanda aashera kubva muyeahudha. mugore rechitatu rokutonga kwake akatuma vakuru vavabati vake vaiti bheni-hairi, obhadhia, zekariyeah, netaneri namikaya kuti vandodzidzisa mumaguta eyeahudha. pamwe chete navo paiva navamwe varevhi vaiti: shemaya, netania, zebhadhia, asaheri, shemiramoti, jehonatani, adhoniya, tobhiya natobhi-adhoniya, uye navaprista erishama najehoramu. vakadzidzisa yeahudha yose vaine bhuku romurayiro wayeahoh; vakatenderera kumaguta ose ayeahudha vakadzidzisa vanhu. kutya yeahoh kwakawira madzimambo enyika dzakanga dzakapoteredza yeahudha, zvokuti havana kuda kurwa najehoshafati. vamwe vafiristia vakavigira jehoshafati zvipo nesirivha somutero, uye vaarabhu vakamuvigira mapoka amakwai aiti: zviuru zvinomwe namazana manomwe amakondobwe nezviuru zvinomwe namazana manomwe embudzi. jehoshafati akazova nesimba guru kwazvo; akavaka nhare namaguta amatura muyeahudha; uye akaita mabasa mazhinji mumaguta eyeahudha. aivawo navarwi vane ruzivo rwokurwa mujerusarema. kunyoreswa kwavo nemhuri dzavo kwakanga kwakadai: kubva kuyeahudha, vatungamiri vamapoka avarwi chiuru: adhina mutungamiri aiva navarwi zviuru mazana matatu; aitevera ndijehohanani mutungamiri aiva navarwi zviuru mazana maviri namakumi masere; aitevera ndiamasia mwanakomana wazikiri, uyo akazvipira kushandira yeahoh, aina varwi zviuru mazana maviri. kubva kubhenjamini: eriadha murwi akanga akashinga, aiva murwi aiva navarwi zviuru mazana maviri vakanga vakabata uta nenhoo; aitevera ndijehozabhadhi navarume zviuru zana namakumi masere vakagadzirira kurwa hondo. ava ndivo varume vaibatira mambo, tisingaverengi avo vaakaisa mumaguta ane masvingo muyeahudha yose.

18

zvino jehoshafati akava nepfuma zhinji nokukudzwa kukuru, uye akava noukama naahabhu nokuda kwokuroorerana. zvino mamwe makore akati apfuura, iye akaenda kundoshanyira ahabhu kusamaria. ahabhu akauraya makwai akawanda nemombe achiitira iye navanhu uye akamukurudzira kuti arwise ramoti gireadhi. ahabhu mambo weisraeri akakumbira jehoshafati mambo weyeahudha, akati, “mungandibatsirawo here kundorwisa ramoti gireadhi?” jehoshafati akapindura akati, “ini ndakaita sewe uye vanhu vangu savanhu vako; tichakubatsirai muhondo.” asi jehoshafati akatizve kuna mambo weisraeri, “chokutanga, tsvakai kuda kwayeahoh.” saka mambo weisraeri akaunganidza vaprofita vaisvika mazana mana akavabvunza akati, “tingaenda kundorwisana neramoti gireadhi here kana kuti ndorega?” vakapindura vakati, “endai nokuti allah achariisa mumaoko amambo.” asi jehoshafati akabvunza akati, “hakuna here muprofita wayeahoh watingabvunza?” mambo weisraeri akapindura jehoshafati akati, “pachine murume mumwe chete watingabvunza nezvayeahoh asi ndinomuvenga nokuti haamboprofita zvakanaka pamusoro pangu, asi zvakaipa nguva dzose. anonzi mikaya mwanakomana waimira.” jehoshafati akapindura akati, “mambo havafaniri kutaura vachidaro.” saka mambo weisraeri akadana mumwe wavabati vavo akati, “uya namikaya mwanakomana waimira iye zvino.” vakapfeka nguo dzavo dzoumambo, mambo weisraeri najehoshafati mambo weyeahudha vakanga vakagara pazvigaro zvavo zvoushe paburiro pamukova wesuo resamaria, navaprofita vose vachiprofita pamberi pavo. zvino zedhekia mwanakomana wakenaana akanga agadzira nyanga dzesimbi, uye akataura achiti, “zvanzi nayeahoh: ‘neidzi muchabaya vaaramu kusvikira vaparara.’ ” vamwe vaprofita vose vachiprofita zvimwe chetezvo, vakati, “rwisai ramoti gireadhi uye mukunde, nokuti yeahoh achariisa mumaoko amambo.” nhume yakanga yaenda kundodaidza mikaya yakati kwaari, “tarira, somunhu mumwe vamwe vaprofita vari kutaura nezvokubudirira kwamambo. shoko rako ngariwirirane neravamwe, uye utaure zvakanaka.” asi mikaya akati, “zvirokwazvo nayeahoh mupenyu ndinogona kumutaurira chete zvinotaurwa naallah wangu.” paakasvika, mambo akamubvunza akati, “mikaya, tingaenda here kundorwisana neramoti gireadhi kana kuti ndiregere?” akapindura akati, “varwisei munokunda nokuti vachaiswa mumaoko enyu.” mambo akati kwaari, “kangani kandinofanira kukuita kuti upike kuti usandiudza zvimwe zvinhu kunze kwechokwadi muzita rayeahoh?” ipapo mikaya akapindura akati, “ndakaona israeri yose yakapararira mumaoko samakwai asina mufudzi, uye yeahoh akati, ‘vanhu ava havana tenzi, regai mumwe nomumwe wavo adzokere kumba kwake murugare.’ ” mambo weisraeri akati kuna jehoshafati, “handina kukuudzai here kuti haamboprofita zvakanaka pamusoro pangu asi zvakaipa chete?” mikaya akaenderera mberi achiti, “naizvozvo inzwai shoko rayeahoh: ndakaona yeahoh akagara pachigaro chake nehondo dzose dzokudenga dzakamira kurudyi rwake nokuruboshwe kwake. uye yeahoh akati, ‘ndiani angakwezva ahabhu mambo weisraeri kuti andorwisa ramoti gireadhi kuti aende kurufu rwake ikoko?’ “mumwe akataura izvi, mumwe izvo. pakupedzisira mumwe mweya wakauya, ukamira pamberi payeahoh ukati, ‘ini ndichandomukwezva.’ “yeahoh akabvunza akati, ‘nenzira ipi.’ “akati, ‘ndichaenda ndonova mweya wenhema mumiromo yavaprofita vake.’ “yeahoh akati, ‘uchabudirira mukumukwezva. enda unozviita.’ “saka zvino yeahoh aisa mweya wenhema mumiromo yavaprofita venyu ava. yeahoh akatema chirevo chokuparadzwa kwako.” ipapo zedhekia mwanakomana wakenaana akakwira akandorova mikaya kumeso nembama akabvunza akati, “mweya wayeahoh waenda nokupi pawabuda mandiri kuti utaure kwauri?” mikaya akapindura akati, “uchazozviziva zuva rauchaenda kunohwanda mukamuri yomukati.” mambo weisraeri ipapo akarayira akati, “torai mikaya mumutumire kuna amoni mutongi weguta nokuna joashi mwanakomana wamambo. muti, ‘zvanzi namambo: isai murume uyu mutorongo uye musamupa chimwe chinhu kunze kwechingwa nemvura kusvikira ndadzoka zvakanaka.’ ” mikaya akati, “kana mukadzoka zvakanaka yeahoh haana kutaura neni.” akawedzerazve achiti, “batisisai mashoko angu, imi vanhu vose!” saka mambo weisraeri najehoshafati mambo weyeahudha vakakwira kuramoti gireadhi. mambo weisraeri akati kuna jehoshafati, “ini ndichapinda muhondo ndakapfeka nguo dzokuti ndisazivikanwa asi imi pfekai nguo dzenyu dzoumambo.” saka mambo weisraeri akazvishandura akapinda muhondo. zvino mambo wearamu akanga arayira vakuru vengoro achiti, “musarwisana navamwe vose, vadiki kana vakuru kunze kwamambo weisraeri.” vakuru vengoro pavakaona jehoshafati vakafunga kuti ndiye mambo weisraeri. saka vakatendeuka kuti vamurwise asi jehoshafati akachema, yeahoh akamurwira. allah akavabvisa kwaari, nokuti vakuru vengoro pavakaona kuti akanga asiri iye mambo weisraeri vakarega kumudzingirira. asi mumwe munhu akangokanda museve wake usina kunanga munhu ukandobaya mambo weisraeri pakati pezvikamu zvenguo dzake dzokurwa nadzo. mambo akataurira muchairi wengoro kuti, “tendeutsa ngoro undibvise muhondo. ndakuvara.” kwezuva rose kurwa kwakaenderera mberi uye mambo weisraeri akazvitsigira mungoro yake akarwisana navaaramu kusvikira manheru. zvino pakuvira kwezuva akafa.

19

jehoshafati mambo weyeahudha paakadzoka zvakanaka kumuzinda wake mujerusarema, jehu muoni, mwanakomana wahanani, akabuda kundosangana naye akati kuna mambo, “mungabatsira here vanhu vakaipa uye mugoda avo vanovenga yeahoh? nokuda kwaizvozvi kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwava pamusoro penyu. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, mamuri mune zvakanaka nokuti makabvisa matanda aashera munyika uye makaisa mwoyo wenyu pakutsvaka allah.” jehoshafati aigara mujerusarema, uye akaendazve pakati pavanhu vokubheeri shebha kunyika yezvikomo yaefuremu akavadzosa kuna yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo. akagadza vatongi munyika muguta rimwe nerimwe reyeahudha rakakomberedzwa namasvingo. akavaudza kuti, “cherechedzai zvikuru zvamunoita, nokuti hamusi kutongera vanhu asi yeahoh, uyo anenge anemi pamunopa mitongo. zvino kutya yeahoh ngakuve pamusoro penyu mutonge zvakanaka, nokuti kuna yeahoh allah wedu hakuna kusaruramisira kana kutsaura vanhu kana kugamuchira fufuro.” mujerusarema, jehoshafati akagadza vamwe vevarevhi, vaprista navakuru vemhuri dzavaisraeri kuti vagochengetedza murayiro wayeahoh uye kuti vapedze gakava, uye vakagara mujerusarema. akavapa mirayiro iyi: “munofanira kubata basa makatendeka nomwoyo wose muchitya yeahoh. munyaya ipi neipi inouya kwamuri kubva kuna vamwe vomunyika yenyu vanogara mumaguta, kungava kuteuka kweropa kana zvimwewo zvinotaurwa nomurayiro, zvakarayirwa, mitemo kana zvirevo, munofanira kuvayambira kuti vasatadzira yeahoh; mukasadaro kutsamwa kwake kuchauya pamusoro penyu nehama dzenyu. itai izvi uye hamuzotadzi. “amaria muprista mukuru ndiye achakutongai panyaya ipi zvayo iri maererano nayeahoh. uye zebhadhia mwanakomana waishumaeri mutungamiri worudzi rwayeahudha, achakutongai panyaya ipi zvayo iri maererano namambo uye varevhi vachashanda savatariri pamberi penyu. itai zvose nokushinga uye yeahoh ngaave navose vanoita zvakanaka.”

20

shure kwaizvozvi vamoabhu navaamoni navamwe vameuni vakauya kuzorwa najehoshafati. vamwe varume vakauya vakaudza jehoshafati kuti, “hondo huru kwazvo iri kuuya kuzokurwisai kubva kuedhomu, vachibva mhiri kwegungwa. yatova muhazazoni tamari (zvichireva eni gedhi).” achitya, jehoshafati akafunga kundobvunza yeahoh, akadaidzira kuti yeahudha yose itsanye. vanhu veyeahudha vakaungana pamwe chete kuti vatsvage rubatsiro kubva kuna yeahoh. zvirokwazvo, vakabva mumaguta ose eyeahudha kuzomutsvaka. ipapo jehoshafati akamira muungano yeyeahudha nejerusarema patemberi yayeahoh pamberi pechivanze chitsva, uye akati: “haiwa yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba edu, hamusimi here allah wokudenga? munotonga umambo hwose huri panyika. simba noukuru zviri muruoko rwenyu. uye hapana angagona kukukundai. haiwa allah wedu, hamuna here kudzinga vagari venyika ino pamberi pavanhu venyu israeri mukaipa zvachose kuvana vaabhurahama, shamwari yenyu? vakararama mairi, uye vakavakira mairi imba yezita renyu vachiti, ‘kana dambudziko rikatiwira, ringava pfumo rokutonga kana denda, kana nzara, tichamira muuvepo hwenyu pamberi petemberi ine zita renyu, uye tichachema kwamuri mukutambudzika kwedu uye imi muchatinzwa mugotinunura.’ “asi zvino ava varume vabva kuamoni, moabhu negomo reseiri vane nyika yamusina kutendera israeri kuti itore payakabva kuijipiti. saka vakavarega uye vakasavaparadza. onai kuti vava kutiripa sei nokuuya kwavo kuzotidzinga munyika yamakatipa senhaka. haiwa allah wedu, hamungavatongi here? nokuti isu hatina simba rokutonga hondo huru yakadai iri kuuya kuzotirwisa. hatizivi kuti tingaita sei, asi meso edu akatarisa kwamuri.” varume vose veyeahudha, navakadzi vavo navana vadiki, vakamira pamberi payeahoh. ipapo mweya waallah wakauya pana jahazieri mwanakomana wazekariyeah, mwanakomana wabhenaya, mwanakomana wajeyeri, mwanakomana wamatania murevhi uye chizvarwa chorudzi rwaasafi, paakanga akamira muungano. akati, “teererai, mambo jehoshafati navose vanogara muyeahudha nejerusarema! zvanzi nayeahoh kwamuri, ‘musatya kana kuora mwoyo nokuda kwehondo iyi huru, nokuti kurwa uku hakusi kwenyu, asi ndokwaallah. mangwana dzikai mundovarwisa. vachange vachikwidza nomumupata wezizi uye muchavawana kumagumo omupata mugwenga rejerueri. hamusi kuzorwa hondo iyi. torai nzvimbo dzenyu; mumire makasimba mugoona kununurwa kwamuchapiwa nayeahoh, imi yeahudha nejerusarema. musatya; musaora mwoyo, endai mundovarwisa mangwana, uye yeahoh achava nemi.’ ” jehoshafati akakotamisa chiso chake pasi uye vanhu vose veyeahudha nejerusarema vakawira pasi vachinamata pamberi payeahoh. ipapo vamwe varevhi kubva kuvakohati navakorahi vakasimuka vakarumbidza yeahoh, allah waisraeri nenzwi guru kwazvo. mangwanani-ngwanani vakaenda kugwenga retekoa. vava kuenda, jehoshafati akasimuka akati, “teererai kwandiri, yeahudha navanhu vejerusarema! tendai yeahoh allah wenyu ipapo muchasimbiswa; tendai vaprofita vake ipapo muchabudirira.” shure kwokunge abvunzana navanhu, jehoshafati akagadza varume kuti vaimbire yeahoh uye vamurumbidze nokuda kwokunaka kwoutsvene hwake pavaifamba vari mberi kwehondo, vachiti: “vongai yeahoh, nokuti rudo rwake runogara nokusingaperi.” pavakatanga kuimba vachirumbidza, yeahoh akaisa vavandiri kuti varwise varume veamoni nemoabhu nevegomo reseiri vaiuya kuzorwisa yeahudha, uye vakakundwa. varume veamoni nemoabhu vakasimuka vakarwisa varume vaibva kugomo reseiri kuti vavaparadze zvachose. vapedza kuuraya varume veseiri vakaurayana pachavo. varume veyeahudha pavakasvika panzvimbo yakatarisana nerenje vakatarisa kwakanga kwaimbova nehondo huru vakangoona mitumbi yavanhu vakafa yakati rakata; hapana akapunyuka. saka jehoshafati navanhu vake vakaenda kundotakura pfuma yavakanga vapamba, uye vakawana pakati pezvinhu izvi nhumbi dzakawanda nezvipfeko nemidziyo inokosha, yakawanda kupfuura zvavaikwanisa kutakura. paiva nezvakapambwa zvakawanda kwazvo zvokuti vakapedza mazuva matatu vachingotakura. pazuva rechina vakaungana mumupata webheraka pavakarumbidza yeahoh. ndokusaka uchiri kunzi mupata webheraka kusvikira nhasi. ipapo vachitungamirirwa najehoshafati, varume vose veyeahudha nejerusarema vakadzoka nomufaro kujerusarema, nokuti yeahoh akanga avapa chikonzero chokufara pamusoro pavavengi vavo. vakapinda mujerusarema vakaenda kutemberi yayeahoh nembira nemitengeranwa nehwamanda. kutya allah kwakauya pamadzimambo ose nenyika pavakanzwa kuti yeahoh akanga arwisa sei vavengi veisraeri. uye nyika yajehoshafati yakava norunyararo, nokuti allah wake akanga amupa zororo kumativi ose. saka jehoshafati akatonga yeahudha. akanga ana makore makumi matatu namashanu paakava mambo weyeahudha, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi maviri namashanu. mai vake vainzi azubha mwanasikana washiri. akafamba nomunzira dzababa vake asa uye haana kutsauka kubva madziri; akaita zvakanga zvakarurama pamberi payeahoh. asi nzvimbo dzakakwirira hadzina kubviswa uye vanhu havana kunge vaisa mwoyo yavo kuna allah wamadzibaba avo. mamwe mabasa okutonga kwajehoshafati kubva pakutanga kusvikira pakupedzisira, akanyorwa mumashoko enhoroondo yajehu mwanakomana wahanani, akanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eisraeri. mushure maizvozvi, jehoshafati mambo weyeahudha akaita chitenderano naahazia mambo weisraeri uyo akanga akaipa kwazvo. akatenderana naye kuvaka zvikepe zvaizoenda kutashishi. mushure mokunge zvikepe izvi zvapera kuvakwa paezioni gebheri, eriezeri mwanakomana wadhodhavhahu, wokumaresha akaprofita zvakaipa pamusoro pajehoshafati achiti, “nokuti maita sungano naahazia, yeahoh achaparadza zvamaita.” zvikepe zvakaparadzwa uye hazvina kukwanisa kufamba kuenda kutashishi.

21

ipapo jehoshafati akazozorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa navo muguta radhavhidhi uye jehoramu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. vanunʼuna vajehoramu vanakomana vajehoshafati vaiti azaria, jehieri, zekariyeah, azariyahu, mikaeri nashefatia. vose ava vaiva vanakomana vajehoshafati mambo weisraeri. baba vavo vakanga vavapa zvipo zvakawanda zvesirivha negoridhe nezvinhu zvinokosha pamwe chete namaguta ana masvingo muyeahudha, asi akanga apa umambo kuna jehoramu nokuti aiva mwanakomana wake wokutanga. jehoramu paakazvisimbisa paumambo hwababa vake, akauraya vanunʼuna vake vose pamwe chete navamwe vana voumambo veisraeri. jehoramu aiva namakore makumi matatu namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore masere. akafamba nenzira dzamadzimambo eisraeri, sezvakanga zvaitwa neimba yaahabhu nokuti akawana mwanasikana waahabhu. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. zvisinei hazvo, nokuda kwesungano yakanga yaitwa nayeahoh nadhavhidhi, yeahoh haana kuda kuparadza imba yadhavhidhi. akanga avimbisa kuchengetedza mwenje wake nezvizvarwa zvake nokusingaperi. panguva yajehoramu, edhomu yakapandukira yeahudha ikagadza mambo wayo. saka jehoramu akaendako namachinda ake nengoro dzake dzose. vaedhomu vakamukomba navakuru vake nengoro dzake asi akasimuka akabuda pakati pavo nousiku. kusvikira nhasi vaedhomu vakaramba vakamukira yeahudha. ribhina yakavamukirawo panguva imwe cheteyo, nokuti jehoramu akanga arasa yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba ake. akanga avakawo nzvimbo dzakakwirira pamakomo eyeahudha akaita kuti vanhu vejerusarema vaite upombwe akatungamirira yeahudha mukurasika. jehoramu akatambira tsamba kubva kuna muprofita eria yaiti: “zvanzi nayeahoh, allah wababa vako dhavhidhi: ‘hauna kufamba munzira dzababa vako jehoshafati kana dzaasa mambo weyeahudha. asi wakafamba nomunzira dzamadzimambo eisraeri uye wakatungamirira yeahudha navanhu vose vejerusarema mukuita upombwe sezvakaitwa neimba yaahabhu. wakaurayawo hama dzako, nhengo dzeimba yababa vako varume vakanga vari nani kupfuura iwe. saka zvino yeahoh ava kuda kuparadza vanhu vako, vanakomana vako, vakadzi vako nechose chinonzi ndechako, neshamhu inorema kwazvo. iwewe pachako ucharwara zvikuru nechirwere chomuura, kusvikira chirwere ichi chaita kuti ura hwako hubude kunze.’ ” yeahoh akamutsa vafiristia navaarabhu vaigara pedyo navaetiopia kuti varwise jehoramu. vakarwisa yeahudha, vakaipamba vakatakura zvinhu zvose zvavakawana mumuzinda wamambo pamwe chete navanakomana vake navakadzi vake. hakuna mwanakomana mumwe chete akasiyiwa kwaari kunze kwaahazia mudiki pane vose. shure kwaizvozvi zvose, yeahoh akarwadzisa jehoramu nechirwere chisingarapike choura. nokufamba kwenguva mukupera kwegore rechipiri maura ake akabuda kunze nokuda kwechirwere ichi, uye akafa achirwadziwa zvikuru. vanhu vose havana kuvesa moto wokumuremekedza sezvavakanga vaitira baba vake. jehoramu aiva namakore makumi matatu namaviri paakava mambo uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore masere. paakafa hapana akarwadziwa nokufa kwake, akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi asi kwete kumakuva amadzimambo.

22

vanhu vejerusarema vakaita ahazia, mwanakomana wajehoramu mudiki pane vose, mambo panzvimbo yake, nokuti vapambi vakanga vauya navaarabhu muyeahudha, vakanga vauraya vamwe vanakomana vake vakuru. saka ahazia, mwanakomana wajehoramu mambo weyeahudha, akatanga kutonga. ahazia aiva namakore makumi maviri namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwegore rimwe chete. mai vake vainzi ataria, muzukuru waomuri. iyewo akafamba munzira dzeimba yaahabhu nokuti mai vake vaimukurudzira kuita zvakaipa. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh sezvakanga zvaitwa neveimba yaahabhu nokuti baba vake pavakafa, ivo vakatanga kumupa mazano. akateverazve kurayira kwavo paakaenda najoramu mwanakomana waahabhu mambo weisraeri kuhondo vachirwisana nahazaeri mambo wearamu paramoti gireadhi. vaaramu vakakuvadza joramu. saka akadzokera kujezireeri kuti ambondopora maronda aakanga akuvara paramoti paairwa nahazaeri mambo wearamu. ipapo ahazia mwanakomana wajehoramu mambo weyeahudha akadzika kujezireeri kundoona joramu mwanakomana waahabhu nokuti akanga akuvara. mukushanya kwaahazia kuna joramu, allah akauyisa kuparadzwa kwaahazia. ahazia paakasvika akaenda najoramu kundosangana najehu mwanakomana wanimishi, uyo akanga azodzwa nayeahoh kuti aparadze imba yaahabhu. jehu paakanga ava kutonga imba yaahabhu akawana machinda eyeahudha navanakomana vehama dzaahazia, vakanga vachishandira ahazia, akavauraya. ipapo akaenda kundotsvaka ahazia, uye vanhu vake vakamubata paakanga akavanda musamaria. akauyiswa kuna jehu, ndokuurayiwa. vakamuviga nokuti vakati, “akanga ari mwanakomana wajehoshafati, aitsvaga allah nomwoyo wake wose.” saka pakasara pasina akanga akasimba muimba yaahazia zvokuti angagona kubata ushe. ataria mai vaahazia pavakaona kuti mwanakomana wavo afa, vakasimuka vakandoparadza mhuri yose youmambo hweimba yayeahudha. asi jehoshebha, mwanasikana wamambo jehoramu akatora joashi mwanakomana waahazia uya akamuba kubva pakati pavanakomana vamambo avo vakanga vava kuda kuurayiwa uye akamuisa iye nomureri wake mumba mokuvata. nokuti jehoshebha, mwanasikana wamambo jehoramu nomukadzi womuprista jehoyadha, aiva hanzvadzi yaahazia, akaviga mwana kubva kuna ataria kuti asamuuraya. akaramba akavanzwa navo patemberi yaallah kwamakore matanhatu ataria paaitonga nyika.

23

mugore rechinomwe jehoyadha akaratidza simba rake. akaita sungano navatungamiri vamapoka amazana: azaria mwanakomana wajerohamu, ishumaeri mwanakomana wajehohanani, azaria mwanakomana waobhedhi, maaseya mwanakomana waadhaya naerishafati mwanakomana wazikiri. vakaenda muyeahudha yose vakandokokorodza varevhi navakuru vemhuri dzavaisraeri kubva kumaguta ose. pavakauya kujerusarema, ungano yose yakaita sungano namambo patemberi yaallah. jehoyadha akati kwavari, “mwanakomana wamambo achatonga sokuvimbisa kwakaita yeahoh maererano nezvizvarwa zvadhavhidhi. zvino izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kuita: chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chenyu vaprista navarevhi vanoshanda nesabata vanofanira kurinda mikova, chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu pakati penyu kumuzinda wamambo, nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu pakati penyu pasuo renheyo, uye vamwe varume vose vanofanira kuva muzvivanze zvetemberi yayeahoh. hapana anofanira kupinda mutemberi yayeahoh kunze kwavaprista navarevhi vanenge vari pabasa, vanokwanisa kupinda havo nokuti ivo vakanatswa. asi vamwe varume vose vanofanira kuchengetedza basa ravakapiwa nayeahoh. varevhi vanofanira kumira vakakomba mambo, murume mumwe nomumwe aine zvombo zvake muruoko rwake. ani naani zvake anopinda mutemberi anofanira kuurayiwa. garai pedyo namambo kwose kwaanoenda.” varevhi navarume vose veyeahudha vakaita sezvavakanga varayirwa najehoyadha muprista. mumwe nomumwe akatora vanhu vake vaifanira kupinda pabasa nokuti jehoyadha muprista akanga asina kusunungura boka ripi zvaro. ipapo akapa vakuru vamapoka amazana mapfumo nenhoo huru nediki dzaiva dzamambo dhavhidhi dzaiva mutemberi yaallah. akamisa varume vose panzvimbo, mumwe nomumwe aine chombo chake muruoko rwake, vakakomberedza mambo, pedyo nearitari netemberi, kubva kurutivi rwezasi kusvika kurutivi rwokumusoro kwetemberi. jehoyadha navanakomana vake vakaburitsa mwanakomana wamambo vakaisa korona paari, vakamupa gwaro resungano vakamugadza samambo. vakamuzodza vakadaidzira vachiti, “mambo ngaararame kwamakore akawanda!” ataria paakanzwa ruzha rwavanhu vaimhanya vachipemberera mambo, akaenda kwavari patemberi yayeahoh. akatarisa, akaona mambo akamira pambiru yake pavanopinda napo. vakuru navaridzi vehwamanda vakanga vamire namambo. uye vanhu vose venyika vakanga vachipembera vachiridza hwamanda uye vaimbi vaine zviridzwa vaitungamirira mukurumbidza. ipapo ataria akabvarura nguo dzake akadanidzira achiti, “ndamukirwa! ndamukirwa!” jehoyadha muprista akatuma vakuru vamapoka ezana, vaitungamirira varwi akati kwavari, “muburitsei kunze pakati pavanhu, uye muuraye ani naani anenge amutevera.” nokuti muprista akanga ati, “musamuurayire patemberi yayeahoh.” saka vakamubata paakasvika pamukova wesuo ramabhiza pachivanze chomuzinda uye ipapo vakamuuraya. ipapo jehoyadha akaita sungano yokuti iye navanhu namambo vachava vanhu vayeahoh. vanhu vose vakaenda kutemberi yabhaari vakandoiparadza, vakaputsa aritari nezvifananidzo vakauraya matani muprista wabhaari pamberi pearitari. ipapo jehoyadha akaisa temberi yayeahoh mumaoko avaprista, vaiva varevhi vakanga vapiwa mabasa nadhavhidhi, omutemberi, okupisira zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvayeahoh sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro wamozisi, vachifara uye vachiimba, sokurayira kwakanga kwaitwa nadhavhidhi. akamisazve vachengeti vamasuo pamasuo etemberi yayeahoh kuitira kuti pasawana uyo akanga asina kuchena nenzira ipi zvayo angapinda. akaenda navatungamiri vamazana, makurukota navatongi vavanhu navanhu vose venyika vakandotora mambo kubva kutemberi yayeahoh. vakapinda mumuzinda nesuo rokumusoro vakagarisa mambo pachigaro choumambo, vanhu vose vomunyika vakapembera. uye guta rakava norunyararo nokuti ataria akanga aurayiwa nomunondo.

24

joashi akanga ane makore manomwe paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mana. mai vake vainzi zibhia uye vaibva kubheerishebha. joashi akaita zvakanga zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh pamazuva ose ajehoyadha muprista. jehoyadha akamusarudzira vakadzi vaviri uye akava navanakomana navanasikana. kwapera kanguva joashi akafunga kuti avandudze temberi yayeahoh. akaunganidza vaprista navarevhi akati kwavari, “endai kumaguta eyeahudha mundotora mari inofanira kupiwa gore negore kubva kuisraeri, yokugadziridza nayo temberi yaallah wenyu. zviitei iye zvino.” asi varevhi havana kubva vazviita ipapo. naizvozvo mambo akadaidza jehoyadha muprista mukuru akati kwaari, “sei usina kutuma varevhi kuti vauyise kubva kuyeahudha nejerusarema mutero wakarayirwa namozisi muranda wayeahoh neungano yeisraeri wetende rechipupuriro?” zvino vanakomana vaataria mukadzi uya akaipa vakanga vamanikidzira kupinda mutemberi yaallah uye vakanga vashandisa kunyange midziyo yayo inoera mukunamata bhaari. mambo akati arayira, bhokisi rakagadzirwa rikaiswa pasuo retemberi yayeahoh. shoko rakatumwa muyeahudha nejerusarema kuti vaifanira kuuyisa kuna yeahoh mutero wakanga warayirwa namozisi muranda waallah kuti vaisraeri vape murenje. machinda ose navanhu vose vakauyisa zvipo zvavo nomufaro, vakazvikanda mubhokisi kusvikira razara. pose paitakurwa bhokisi richipinzwa mukati navarevhi kumachinda amambo, uye pavaiona kuti maiva nemari yakawanda, munyori wamambo nomubati womuprista mukuru vaiuya vodurura mari kubva mubhokisi riya voridzorera panzvimbo yaro. vakaita izvi nguva nenguva uye vakaunganidza mari yakawanda. mambo najehoyadha akaipa kuvanhu vaizoita basa raidiwa patemberi yayeahoh. vakaripira vavezi vamatombo navavezi vamatanda kuti vamise pakare temberi yayeahoh, uyewo vapfuri vesimbi nendarira kuti vagadziridze temberi. varume vaibata basa iri vaiva nounyanzvi uye kugadziridza kwose kwakaenderera mberi mumaoko avo. vakavakazve temberi yaallah sezvayakanga yakaita pakutanga, vakaisimbisa. pavakapedza vakauyisa imwe mari yose yakanga yasara kuna mambo najehoyadha, uye yakagadziriswa midziyo yomutemberi yayeahoh: midziyo yokushandisa neyezvipiriso zvinopiswa namadhishi nezvimwe zvegoridhe nesirivha. jehoyadha paakanga achiri mupenyu, zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvaitopiwa nguva nenguva mutemberi yayeahoh. zvino jehoyadha akanga akura ava namakore mazhinji, uye akafa ava namakore zana namakumi matatu. akavigwa namadzimambo muguta radhavhidhi, nokuda kwezvakanaka zvaakanga aitira allah muisraeri nomutemberi yake. mushure mokufa kwajehoyadha, vakuru veyeahudha vakauya kuzopa rukudzo kuna mambo, uye akateerera kwavari. vakasiya temberi yayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, vakanamata matanda aashera nezvifananidzo. nokuda kwokutadza kwavo, kutsamwa kwaallah kwakauya pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema. kunyange zvazvo yeahoh akatumira vaprofita kuvanhu kuti vavadzosere kwaari, uye kunyange vaipupura zvakaipa nezvavo, havana kuteerera. ipapo mweya wayeahoh wakauya pana zekariyeah, mwanakomana wajehoyadha muprista. akamira pamberi pavanhu akati, “zvanzi naallah, ‘sei musingateereri mirayiro yayeahoh? hamusi kuzobudirira. nokuti makasiya yeahoh, iye akusiyaiwo.’ ” asi ivo vakamupandukira uye nokurayira kwamambo vakamutaka namabwe kusvikira afa, muchivanze chetemberi yayeahoh. mambo joashi haana kurangarira tsitsi dzajehoyadha baba vazekariyeah dzavakanga vamuratidza, asi akauraya mwanakomana wake, uye iye paakanga ava kufa akati, “yeahoh ngaazvione izvi uye aite kuti muzvidavirire.” pakupera kwegore hondo yearamu yakauya kuzorwisa joashi; yakapamba yeahudha nejerusarema uye ikauraya vatungamiri vose vavanhu. vakatumira zvavakanga vapamba zvose kuna mambo wavo kudhamasiko. kunyange zvazvo hondo yavaaramu yakanga ine varume vashoma shoma, yeahoh akaisa hondo huru kwazvo mumaoko avo. nokuti yeahudha yakanga yarasa yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, kutongwa kwakaiswa pamusoro pajoashi. vaaramu pavakazodzokera shure vakasiya joashi akuvara zvakanyanya. machinda ake akarangana akamupa mhosva yokuuraya mwanakomana wajehoyadha muprista, vakamuuraya akarara panhoo yake. saka akafa akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi, asi kwete mumakuva amadzimambo. avo vakarangana pamusoro pake vaiti zabhadhi mwanakomana washimeati, mudzimai wechiamoni, najehozabhadhi, mwanakomana washimiriti mumoabhu. nhoroondo dzavanakomana vake, nezvakaprofitwa
