pamusoro pake nezvakanyorwa pamusoro pokuvandudzwa kwetemberi yaallah zvakanyorwa mubhuku renhoroondo dzamadzimambo. uye amazia mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

25

amazia aiva namakore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi maviri namapfumbamwe. mai vake vainzi jehoadhini, uye vaibva kujerusarema. akaita zvakanga zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh, asi kwete nomwoyo wose. paakapedza kusimbisa umambo hwake akauraya machinda akanga auraya baba vake. kunyange zvakadaro haana kuuraya vanakomana vavo asi akaita sezvazvakanga zvakanyorwa mumurayiro, mubhuku ramozisi, umo yeahoh akarayira achiti, “madzibaba havafaniri kuurayiwa nokuda kwavana vavo, uye kuti vana havafaniri kuurayiwa nokuda kwamadzibaba avo.” amazia akaunganidza vanhu veyeahudha akavaronga zvichienderana nemhuri dzavo pasi pavatungamiri vezviuru uye navatungamiri vamazana akaverengawo vaiva namakore makumi maviri naanopfuura akaona kuti vaisvika zviuru mazana matatu vakanga vakagadzirira kuenda kuhondo, vaigona kushandisa mapfumo nenhoo. akatorazve varwi zviuru zana kubva kuisraeri akavaripa matarenda zana esirivha. asi munhu waallah akauya kwaari akati, “haiwa mambo, ava varwi vabva kuisraeri havafaniri kuenda nemi nokuti yeahoh havasi kuisraeri, havasi kune upi zvake munhu wokuefuremu. kunyange mukaenda kundorwa nesimba rose, allah achakukundai pamberi pavavengi nokuti allah ane simba rokubatsira kana kuputsa.” amazia akabvunza munhu waallah akati, “asi, matarenda zana andakaripa kuvaisraeri anoitwa sei?” munhu waallah akapindura akati, “yeahoh anogona kukupa zvakawanda kupfuura izvi.” saka amazia akaregera varwi vose vakanga vabva kuefuremu vachienda uye akavati vaende zvavo kumba. vakatsamwa zvikuru nokuda kweyeahudha vakaenda kumba vachipopota zvikuru. ipapo amazia akatungamirira hondo yake kumupata wemunyu, kwaakandouraya varume veseiri zviuru gumi. hondo yeyeahudha yakabatazve varume zviuru gumi vakavatora vakaenda navo pamusoro pegomo pamawere vakavakanda pasi pakavhunika-vhunika. panguva imwe cheteyo varwi vakanga vadzoserwa naamazia pakurwa uku vakandopamba maguta ejudhea kubva kusamaria kusvika kubheti horoni. vakauraya zviuru zvitatu zvavanhu vakatakura zvinhu zvizhinji kwazvo zvavakapamba. amazia paakadzoka kundouraya vaedhomu, akadzosa vamwari vavanhu veseiri akavamisa, akavakotamira savamwari vake, akavapisira zvibayiro. kutsamwa kwaallah kwakauya pamusoro paamazia, akatuma muprofita kwaari, akati, “seiko uchibvunzira kuna vamwari vavanhu ava vakatadza kuponesa vanhu vavo kubva mumaoko ako?” achiri kutaura, mambo akati kwaari, “ko, takugadza kuti uve mupi wamazano wamambo here? mira! uchafireko?” saka muprofita akamira, asi akati, “ndinoziva kuti allah akagadzirira kukuparadza nokuti wakaita izvi, uye hauna kuteerera kurayira kwangu.” mushure mokunge amazia mambo weyeahudha abvunza vapi vake vamazano akatumira shoko rokudenha kuna jehoashi, mwanakomana wajehoahazi, mwanakomana wajehu, mambo weisraeri achiti, “uya tisangane chiso nechiso.” asi jehoashi mambo weisraeri akapindura amazia mambo weyeahudha akati, “rukato rwakanga rwuri murebhanoni rwakatuma shoko kumusidhari wakanga uri murebhanoni, rokuti, ‘ipa mwanasikana wako kumwanakomana wangu kuti ave mukadzi wake.’ ipapo imwe mhuka yomusango yaiva murebhanoni yakauya ikatsika-tsika rukato rwuya pasi petsoka dzayo. unozviti wakakunda vaedhomu uye zvino wava namanyawi nokuzvikudza. zvino gara kumba kwako! seiko uchikumbira matambudziko uye uchizviwisira pasi iwe neyeahudhawo?” kunyange zvakadaro, amazia haana kuteerera, nokuti allah akaita izvozvo kuti avaise kuna jehoashi nokuti vakanga vatsvaka vamwari veedhomu. saka jehoashi mambo weisraeri akavarwisa. iye naamazia vakatarisana pabheti shemeshi muyeahudha. yeahudha yakakundwa neisraeri uye munhu wose akatizira kumba kwake. jehoashi mambo weisraeri akatapa amazia mambo weyeahudha, mwanakomana wajoashi, mwanakomana waahazia pabheti shemeshi. ipapo jehoashi akauya naye kujerusarema akaputsa rusvingo rwejerusarema kubva pasuo raefuremu kusvika pasuo rapakona, nzvimbo yakareba makubhiti mazana mana. akatora goridhe nesirivha yose nemidziyo yose yakawanikwa mutemberi yaallah zvaichengetwa naobhedhi-edhomu, pamwe chete nepfuma yose yaiva mumuzinda navanhu vorubatso, uye vakadzokera kusamaria. amazia mwanakomana wajoashi mambo weyeahudha akararama kwamakore gumi namashanu mushure mokunge jehoashi mwanakomana wajehoahazi mambo weisraeri afa. zvimwe zvose zvakaitwa naamazia mukutonga kwake kubva pakutonga kusvikira pakupedzisira hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku ramadzimambo eyeahudha neisraeri? kubva panguva yakatsauka amazia kubva mukutevera yeahoh, vakamupandukira mujerusarema uye iye akatizira kurakishi vakandomuurayira ikoko. akandotorwa namabhiza akazovigwa pamwe chete namadzibaba ake muguta reyeahudha.

26

ipapo vanhu vose veyeahudha vakatora uzia akanga ane makore gumi namatanhatu, vakamuita mambo panzvimbo yababa vake amazia. ndiye akazovakazve erati akaridzorera kuyeahudha mushure mokunge amazia azorora namadzibaba ake. uzia aiva namakore gumi namatanhatu paakava mambo uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mashanu namaviri. mai vake vainzi jekoria uye vaibva kujerusarema. akaita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh sezvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake amazia. akatsvaka allah pamazuva azekariyeah, uyo aimurayira mukutya allah. pose paaitsvaka yeahoh, allah akaita kuti abudirire. akandorwisa vafiristia akaputsa masvingo egati, jabhine neashidhodhi. akavakazve maguta aiva pedyo neashidhodhi nokumwewo pakati pavafiristia. allah akamubatsira mukurwisa vafiristia navaarabhu vaigara muguri bhaari uye paakarwa navameuni. vaamoni vakavigira uzia mitero, uye mbiri yake yakandosvika kumucheto kweijipiti nokuti akanga asimba kwazvo. uzia akavaka shongwe mujerusarema pasuo repakona, pasuo rokumupata, napakona yorusvingo, akadzisimbisa. akavakazve shongwe murenje uye akachera matsime mazhinji, nokuti akanga ane zvipfuwo zvakawanda mujinga mezvikomo nomumapani. aiva navanhu vaishanda muminda yake nomuminda yemizambiringa mumakomo nomunyika yakaorera, nokuti aida ivhu kwazvo. uzia aiva navarwi vakadzidzira kwazvo kurwa, vakanga vakagadzirira kubuda vari mumapoka avo maererano nouwandu hwavo sokuunganidzwa kwavakanga vaitwa najeyeri munyori namaaseya jinda rakanga riri pasi pahanania mumwe wavakuru pamuzinda wamambo. uwandu hwavatungamiri vemhuri vaiva pamusoro pavarwi hwaisvika zviuru zviviri namazana matanhatu. pasi pavo paiva nehondo yaiva navarume zviuru mazana matatu nezvinomwe namazana mashanu, vakadzidziswa kurwa, hondo yakanga yakasimba kwazvo kuti itsigire mambo pakurwisana navavengi vake. uzia akavapa nhoo, mapfumo nguwani, nenguo dzamatare, uye uta namabwe okupfura nawo. mujerusarema akagadzira michina yakagadzirwa navarume vane umhizha kuti ishandiswe pamusoro peshongwe napamakona pakukanda miseve nokukanda matombo makuru. mbiri yake yakapararira kunzvimbo dziri kure, nokuti akabatsirwa zvikuru kusvikira ava nesimba. asi uzia paakava nesimba, kuzvikudza kwake kwakamutungamirira mukuwa kwake. haana kutendeka kuna yeahoh allah wake, uye akapinda mutemberi yayeahoh kundopisira zvinonhuhwira paaritari yezvinonhuhwira. azaria muprista navamwe vaprista vayeahoh makumi masere vakanga vasingatyi vakamutevera mukati. vakamutongesa vakati, “hazvina kufanira kwamuri imi, uzia, kuti mupisire zvinonhuhwira kuna yeahoh. izvozvo ndezvavaprista, vanakomana vaaroni, vakatsaurirwa kuti vapise zvinonhuhwira. budai munzvimbo tsvene, nokuti hamuna kutendeka, uye hamungazokudzwa nayeahoh allah.” uzia uyo akanga aine mbiya yokupisira zvinonhuhwira muruoko rwake, akatsamwa kwazvo. paakanga achakatsamwira vaprista pamberi pavo, pamberi pearitari yezvinonhuhwira mutemberi yayeahoh, maperembudzi akamera pahuma yake. azaria mukuru wavaprista, navaprista vose pavakatarisa kwaari, vakaona kuti akanga ava namaperembudzi pahuma yake, saka vakakurumidza kumuburitsamo. zvirokwazvo iyewo pachake akanga ava kuda kubuda nokuti yeahoh akanga amurova nechirwere. mambo uzia akava namaperembudzi kusvikira musi waakafa. aigara muimba yake oga asingabvumirwi kupinda mutemberi yayeahoh. jotamu mwanakomana wake ndiye aitonga mumuzinda uye nokutonga vanhu venyika. zvimwe zvakaitwa mukutonga kwauzia kubva pakutanga kusvika pakupedzisira zvakanyorwa nomuprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi. uzia akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa pedyo navo mumunda wemakuva waiva wamadzimambo, nokuti vanhu vakati, “aiva namaperembudzi.” jotamu mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

27

jotamu aiva namakore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi namatanhatu. amai vake vainzi jerusha mwanasikana wazadhoki. akaita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh sezvakanga zvaitwa nababa vake uzia, asi iye haana kuzopinda zvake mutemberi yayeahoh. kunyange zvakadaro, vanhu vakaramba vachiita zvakaipa zvavo. jotamu akavakazve suo rokumusoro retemberi yayeahoh akaita basa guru kwazvo parusvingo rwapagomo raoferi. akavaka maguta muzvikomo zvejudhea, nenhare neshongwe mumatondo. jotamu akarwa namambo wavaamoni akavakunda. mugore iroro vaamoni vakamuripa matarenda zana esirivha, nezviyero zvegorosi zviuru gumi, nezviyero zvebhari zviuru gumi. vaamoni vakauyisa zvimwe chetezvo mugore rechipiri nerechitatu. jotamu akava nesimba kwazvo nokuti aifamba akatendeka pamberi payeahoh allah wake. zvimwe zvakaitwa mukutonga kwajotamu pamwe chete nehondo dzake dzose dzaakarwa nezvimwe zvinhu zvaakaita, zvakanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eisraeri neeyeahudha. aiva namakore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi namatanhatu. jotamu akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta radhavhidhi. uye ahazi mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

28

ahazi aiva namakore makumi maviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi namatanhatu. haana kufanana nadhavhidhi baba vake, haana kuita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh. akafamba nomunzira dzamadzimambo eisraeri akagadzirawo zvifananidzo zvokunamatisa vabhaari. akapisa zvipiriso zvinopiswa mumupata webheni hinomi akabayira vanakomana vake mumoto, achitevedzera nzira dzinonyangadza dzendudzi dzakanga dzadzingwa nayeahoh pamberi pavaisraeri. akapa zvibayiro uye akapisira zvinonhuhwira panzvimbo dzakakwirira, pamusoro pezvikomo napasi pomuti wose wakapfumvutira. naizvozvo yeahoh allah wake akamuisa mumaoko amambo wearamu. vaaramu vakamukunda uye vakatora vanhu vake vazhinji senhapwa vakauya navo kudhamasiko. akaiswawo mumaoko amambo weisraeri uyo akauraya vanhu vazhinji kwazvo. pazuva rimwe chete, peka mwanakomana waremaria akauraya varwi zviuru zana namakumi maviri muyeahudha, nokuti yeahudha yakanga yarasa yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo. zikiri murwi wokuefuremu, akauraya maaseya mwanakomana wamambo, azirikami mutariri mukuru womuzinda naerikana, mutevedzeri wamambo. vaisraeri vakatapa kubva kuhama dzavo vakadzi navanakomana navanasikana zviuru mazana maviri. vakapambawo zvinhu zvakawanda, zvavakatakura vakadzokera nazvo kusamaria. asi muprofita wayeahoh ainzi odhedhi akanga aripo, uye akabuda kundosangana nehondo payakadzoka kubva kusamaria. akati kwavari, “nokuti yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu akanga atsamwira yeahudha, akavaisa muruoko rwenyu. asi mavauraya nehasha dzinosvika kudenga. uye zvino mava kuda kuita varume navakadzi veyeahudha nejerusarema nhapwa dzenyu. asi imiwo hamuna here mhosva dzezvivi zvamakaitira yeahoh allah wenyu? zvino chiteererai kwandiri! dzorerai kwakare hama dzenyu dzamatora savasungwa, nokuti kutsamwa kwaallah kunotyisa kuri pamusoro penyu.” ipapo vamwe vatungamiri vemuefuremu vaiti azaria, mwanakomana wajehohanani, bherekia mwanakomana wameshiremoti, jehizikia mwanakomana washarumi naamasa mwanakomana wahadhirai, vakandotongesa avo vakanga vachisvika vachibva kuhondo. vakati, “hamufaniri kuuyisa vasungwa ivavo kuno kuti tirege kuva nemhosva pamberi payeahoh. munoda kuwedzera here pamusoro pechivi chedu nemhosva yedu? nokuti mhosva yedu yatokura kare, uye kutsamwa kwake kunotyisa kwava pamusoro peisraeri.” saka varwi vakasiya vasungwa nezvose zvavakanga vapamba pamberi pavakuru neungano yose. varume varehwa namazita avo vakatora vasungwa uye kubva pane zvavakanga vapamba vakapfekedza vakanga vakashama. vakavapa nguo neshangu, zvokudya nezvokunwa, uye namafuta okuporesa. avo vose vakanga vasina simba vakavakwidza pambongoro. saizvozvo vakavadzorera kunyika yavo kujeriko, muguta remichindwe uye vakadzokera kusamaria. panguva iyoyo mambo ahazi akatsvaka rubatsiro kubva kuna mambo weasiria. vaedhomu vakanga vauyazve vakarwisa yeahudha uye vakaenda navasungwa. panguva imwe cheteyo vafiristia vakanga vapamba maguta omujinga mezvikomo nomunegevhi yeyeahudha. vakatora uye vakagara mubheti shemeshi, aijaroni negedheroti pamwe chete nesoko, timina negimizo nemisha yawo yose yakaapoteredza. yeahoh akaninipisa yeahudha nokuda kwaahazi mambo weisraeri, nokuti akanga akurudzira zvakaipa muyeahudha uye akanga anyanya kusatendeka kuna yeahoh. tigirati-pireseri mambo weasiria akauya kwaari, asi akamupa matambudziko pano kuti amubatsire. ahazi akatora zvimwe zvezvinhu zvaiva mutemberi yayeahoh, uye kubva mumuzinda wamambo nokumachinda amambo, akazvipa kuna mambo weasiria, asi izvi hazvina kumubatsira. munguva yake yokutambudzika mambo ahazi akatonyanya kusatendeka kuna yeahoh. akapa zvibayiro kuna vamwari vedhamasiko vakanga vamukunda; nokuti akafunga akati, “sezvo vamwari vemadzimambo earamu vakavabatsira ini ndichapa zvibayiro kwavari kuti vangondibatsira.” asi ndivo vakava kuwa kwake nokweisraeri yose. ahazi akaunganidza midziyo yose yomutemberi akaitakura akaenda nayo. akapfiga masuo etemberi yayeahoh akagadzira aritari pamakona ose emigwagwa yejerusarema. muguta rimwe nerimwe reyeahudha akavaka nzvimbo dzakakwirira kuti agopisira zvipiriso kuna vamwe vamwari uye zvikamutsa kutsamwa kwayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba ake. zvimwe zvaakaita pamazuva okutonga kwake nenzira dzake dzose kubva pakutanga kusvikira pakupedzisira zvakanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eyeahudha neisraeri. ahazi akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa muguta rejerusarema, asi haana kuradzikwa mumakuva amadzimambo eisraeri. uye hezekia mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo.

29

hezekia aiva namakore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi maviri namapfumbamwe. zita ramai vake rainzi abhija mwanasikana wazekariyeah. akaita zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvangoitwa nadhavhidhi baba vake. mumwedzi wokutanga wegore rokutanga kutonga kwake akazarura masuo etemberi akaagadziridza. akauyisa vaprista navarevhi akavaunganidza muchivara chokudivi rokumabvazuva. uye akati, “teererai kwandiri, varevhi! zvinatsei zvino uye munatse temberi yayeahoh, allah wamadzibaba enyu. mubvise kusvibiswa kwose munzvimbo tsvene. madzibaba edu akanga asina kutendeka; vakaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh allah uye vakamusiya. vakabvisa zviso zvavo panzvimbo inogara yeahoh, vakamufuratira. vakapfigawo mikova yebiravira uye vakadzima mwenje. havana kupisira zvinonhuhwira kana kupa zvipiriso zvinopiswa panzvimbo tsvene kuna allah waisraeri. naizvozvo, kutsamwa kwayeahoh kwakawira pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema, akavaita chinhu chinotyisa, chinovhundutsa nechinosekwa, sezvamunoona nameso enyu chaiwo. ndokusaka madzibaba edu akaurayiwa nomunondo uye vanakomana navanasikana vedu navakadzi vedu vava muutapwa. zvino ndinoda kuita mhiko nayeahoh, allah waisraeri; kuitira kuti kutsamwa kwake kunotyisa kubve kwatiri. vanakomana vangu, musava vanhu vasina hanya zvino, nokuti yeahoh akakusarudzai kuti mumire pamberi pake, uye mumushandire, kuti mushumire pamberi pake uye mupise zvinonhuhwira.” ipapo varevhi ava vakasimuka vakashanda: kubva kuvakohati, mahati mwanakomana waamasai najoere mwanakomana waazaria; kubva kuvamerari, kishi mwanakomana waabhidhi naazaria mwanakomana wajeharereri; kubva kuvagerishoni, joa mwanakomana wazima naedheni mwanakomana wajoa; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaerizafani, shimiri najeyeri; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvaasafi, zekariyeah namatania; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvahemani, jehieri nashimei; kubva kuzvizvarwa zvajedhutuni, shemaya nauzieri. pavakaunganidza hama dzavo vakazvinatsa, vakapinda mukati kuti vachenese temberi yayeahoh sokurayira kwakanga kwaitwa namambo, vachitevera shoko rayeahoh. vaprista vakaenda munzvimbo tsvene yayeahoh kuti vandoichenesa. vakabudisa kuchivanze chetemberi yayeahoh zvose zvakanga zvisina kuchena zvavakaona mutemberi yayeahoh. varevhi vakazvitora vakaenda nazvo kumupata wekidhironi. vakatanga kunatsa pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wokutanga uye pazuva rorusere romwedzi vakasvika pabiravira rayeahoh. kwamamwezve mazuva masere vakanatsa temberi yayeahoh pachayo, vakapedza nezuva regumi namatanhatu romwedzi wokutanga. ipapo vakaenda kuna mambo hezekia vakandomuzivisa kuti: “tachenesa temberi yayeahoh yose, aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nemidziyo yayo yose, netafura yekuisira chingwa chakatsaurwa, nemidziyo yayo yose. tagadzira uye tanatsa midziyo yose yakabviswa namambo ahazi mukusatendeka kwake paakanga ari mambo. zvino yava pamberi pearitari yayeahoh.” mangwanani ezuva raitevera mambo hezekia akaunganidza vakuru veguta pamwe chete vakakwira kutemberi yayeahoh. vakauya nehando nomwe, makondobwe manomwe, namakwai makono manomwe nembudzi hono nomwe sechibayiro chezvivi choushe, chenzvimbo tsvene necheyeahudha. mambo akarayira vaprista, zvizvarwa zvaaroni kuti vapisire zvibayiro izvi paaritari yayeahoh. saka vakauraya hando dziya, uye vaprista vakatora ropa vakarisasa paaritari mushure mezvo vakauraya makondobwe vakasasa ropa rawo paaritari; uye vakauraya makwayana vakasasa ropa rawo paaritari. mbudzi dzechipiriso chechivi dzakauyiswa pamberi pamambo neungano, uye vakaisa maoko avo pamusoro padzo. ipapo vaprista vakadziuraya vakaisa ropa radzo paaritari sechipiriso chechivi kuti vayananisire israeri yose, nokuti mambo akanga arayira kuti kuitwe chipiriso chinopiswa nechipiriso chechivi zvichiitirwa israeri yose. akaisa varevhi mutemberi yayeahoh vane makandira, nemitengeranwa nembira sezvaakanga arayirwa nadhavhidhi nagadhi muoni wamambo nanatani muprofita. izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza navaprofita vake. saka varevhi vakamira vakagadzirira vaine zviridzwa zvadhavhidhi uye vaprista vaine hwamanda dzavo. hezekia akarayira vanhu kuti vabayire chipiriso chinopiswa paaritari. chipiriso pachakatanga, kuimbira yeahoh kwakatangawo, kuchiteverwa nehwamanda nezviridzwa zvadhavhidhi mambo weisraeri. ungano yose yakakotama ichinamata, vaimbi pavaiimba uye varidzi vehwamanda vachiridza. zvose izvi zvakaenderera mberi kusvikira chibayiro chechipiriso chinopiswa chapera. pavakapedza kupa zvipiriso, mambo navose vaakanga anavo vakapfugama pasi vakanamata. mambo hezekia namachinda ake vakarayira varevhi kuti varumbidze yeahoh namashoko adhavhidhi neaasafi muoni. saka vakaimba nziyo dzokurumbidza nomufaro uye vakakotama vakanamata. ipapo hezekia akati, “imi iye zvino mazvikumikidza kuna yeahoh. uyai nezvipiriso zvokuvonga kutemberi yayeahoh.” saka ungano yose yakauyisa zvipiriso nezvipo zvokuvonga, uye vose vaiva nemwoyo inoda vakauyisa zvipiriso zvinopiswa. zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvakauyiswa neungano zvaiti hando makumi manomwe, namakondobwe zana, namakwayana makono mazana maviri, zvose izvi zvaiva zvokupisira kuna yeahoh. mhuka dzose dzakanga dzatsaurwa sezvipiriso dzaisvika hando mazana matanhatu namakwai nembudzi zviuru zvitatu. kunyange zvakadaro, vaprista vakanga vari vashoma kwazvo kuti vakwanise kuvhiya zvipiriso zvose izvi; saka hama dzavo varevhi vakavabatsira kusvikira basa iri rapera uye kusvikira vamwe vaprista vatsaurwa nokuti varevhi vakanga vakangwarira kwazvo kuzvigadza kupfuura zvaiita vaprista. paiva nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvakawanda kwazvo, pamwe chete namafuta ezvipiriso zvokuyanana, nezvipiriso zvokunwa zvaipiwa pamwe chete nezvipiriso zvinopiswa. saka temberi yayeahoh yakatanga kushanda zvakare. hezekia navanhu vose vakapemberera zvakanga zvauyiswa naallah kuvanhu vake nokuti zvakanga zvaitwa nokukurumbidza.

30

hezekia akatuma shoko kuisraeri yose neyeahudha yose akanyorera tsamba efuremu nemanase achivakoka kuti vauye kutemberi yayeahoh mujerusarema uye vazopemberera pasika kuna yeahoh, allah weisraeri. mambo namakurukota ake neungano yose mujerusarema vakasarudza kupemberera pasika mumwedzi wechipiri. vakanga vasina kukwanisa kutamba mutambo uyu panguva yaunositambwa nokuti vaprista vakanga vazvinatsa vakanga vari vashoma uye vanhu vakanga vasina kuungana mujerusarema. zano iri rakaita serakanaka kuna mambo nokuungano yose. vakasarudza kutuma shoko kuisraeri yose kubva bheerishebha kusvika kudhani, vachidaidza vanhu kuti vauye kujerusarema vazopemberera yeahoh allah weisraeri mutambo wepasika. haina kunge yambopembererwa navanhu vazhinji sezvakanga zvakanyorwa. sokurayira kwamambo, vanhu vakaenda muyeahudha neisraeri netsamba dzaibva kuna mambo nokumakurukota ake dzaiti: “vanhu veisraeri, dzokerai kuna yeahoh allah waabhurahama, isaka naisraeri kuti adzokere kwamuri imi masara, imi makapunyuka kubva muruoko rwamadzimambo easiria. musaita samadzibaba enyu nehama dzenyu vakanga vasina kutendeka kuna yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, zvokuti akavaita chakatukwa sezvamunoona. musaomesa mitsipa sezvakaita madzibaba enyu. zviisei pasi payeahoh. uyai kunzvimbo tsvene yaakatsaura nokusingaperi. shandirai yeahoh allah wenyu, kuti hasha dzake dzinotyisa dzibve kwamuri. kana mukadzokera kuna yeahoh, ipapo hama dzenyu navana venyu vachanzwirwa tsitsi nevakavatapa uye vachadzoka kunyika ino, nokuti yeahoh allah wenyu ane nyasha netsitsi. haangavanzi chiso chake kwamuri kana mukadzokazve kwaari.” vakatumwa vakaenda kuguta neguta muefuremu nemanase, kusvikira kuzebhuruni, asi vanhu vakavashora uye vakavaseka. kunyange zvakadaro, vamwe varume veasheri, manase nezebhuruni vakazvininipisa vakaenda kujerusarema. uye muyeahudha ruoko rwaallah rwakanga rwuri pavanhu kuti ruvape kubatana kwepfungwa kuti vaite zvakanga zvarayirwa namambo namachinda ake vachitevera shoko rayeahoh. vanhu vazhinji zhinji vakaungana mujerusarema kuti vazopemberera mutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso mumwedzi wechipiri. vakabvisa aritari mujerusarema vakaparadza aritari dzezvinonhuhwira vakadzikanda mumupata wekidhironi. vakauraya gwayana rechibayiro chepasika pazuva regumi neina romwedzi wechipiri. vaprista navarevhi vakanyara kwazvo vakazvinatsa vakauyisa zvipiriso zvinopiswa kutemberi yayeahoh. ipapo vakatora nzvimbo dzavo sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro wamozisi munhu waallah. vaprista vakasasa ropa ravakapiwa navarevhi. sezvo vazhinji muungano vakanga vasina kuzvinatsa, varevhi vakauraya makwayana epasika vachiitira vose vakanga vasina kucheneswa uye vasingakwanisi kunatsa makwayana avo kuna yeahoh. kunyange vazhinji, pakati pavanhu ava vakabva kuefuremu, manase, isakari nezebhuruni vakanga vasina kuzvichenesa, vakadya pasika, zvichipikisana nezvakanga zvakanyorwa. asi hezekia akavanyengeterera achiti, “yeahoh, iye akanaka, ngaaregerere hake munhu wose anoisa mwoyo wake mukutsvaka allah, yeahoh allah wamadzibaba ake kunyange zvake asina kucheneswa kana tichitevedza mitemo yapanzvimbo tsvene.” uye yeahoh akanzwa hezekia akaporesa vanhu. vaisraeri vaiva mujerusarema vakatamba mutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso kwamazuva manomwe nokufara kukuru, varevhi navaprista vachiimbira yeahoh zuva nezuva, pamwe chete nezviridzwa zvayeahoh zvokurumbidza. hezekia akataura achikurudzira kwazvo varevhi vose, avo vakaratidza kunzwisisa kwakanaka kwebasa rayeahoh. kwamazuva manomwe aya vakadya zvokudya zvavakanga vapiwa, vakapa zvipiriso uye vakarumbidza yeahoh allah wamadzibaba avo. ipapo ungano yose yakabvumirana kutamba mutambo uyu kwamamwe mazuva manomwe; saka kwamamwe mazuva manomwe vakapemberera vachifara. hezekia mambo weyeahudha akapa hando chiuru namakwai nembudzi zviuru zvinomwe kuungano uye machinda ake akapa hando chiuru namakwai nembudzi zviuru gumi. vaprista vazhinji vakazvinatsa. ungano yose yeyeahudha yakafara kwazvo, pamwe chete navaprista navarevhi uye vose vakanga vaungana kubva kuisraeri pamwe chete navatorwa vakanga vabva kuisraeri naavo vaigara muyeahudha. kwakava nomufaro mukuru kwazvo mujerusarema, nokuti kubva pamazuva asoromoni mwanakomana wadhavhidhi mambo weisraeri kwakanga kusina kumboitika zvakaita sezvizvi mujerusarema. vaprista navarevhi vakamira kuti varopafadze vanhu, allah akavanzwa, nokuti munyengetero wavo wakasvika kudenga, nzvimbo yake tsvene yokugara.

31

izvi zvose pazvakapera, vaisraeri vakanga varipo vakabuda vakaenda kumaguta eyeahudha vakaputsa matombo ose anoera uye vakatema matanda aashera. vakaparadza nzvimbo dzakakwirira nearitari muyeahudha yose nebhenjamini nomuefuremu nemanase. vapedza kuparadza zvose vaisraeri vakadzokera kumaguta avo nokuzvinhu zvavo. hezekia akaisa vaprista navarevhi mumapoka avo mumwe nomumwe wavo mumabasa avo savaprista kana kuti varevhi kuti vape zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipo zvokuyananisa kuti vashumire, kuti varonge uye kuti vaimbe nziyo dzokurumbidza pamasuo enzvimbo yayeahoh yokugara. mambo akapawo kubva mupfuma yake zvipiriso zvinoitwa mangwanani nemadekwana, nezvipiriso zvinopiswa zvamasabata, zvokugara kwomwedzi napane mimwe mitambo yakatarwa sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro wayeahoh. akarayira vanhu vaigara mujerusarema kuti vape zvakakodzera kupiwa vaprista navarevhi kuti ivo vazvipire kumurayiro wayeahoh. shoko parakangoenda, vaisraeri vakapa zvakawanda zvibereko zvokutanga zvezvirimwa zvavo, waini itsva, mafuta nouchi nezvose zvakabuda muminda yavo. vakauyisa zvakawanda, chegumi chezvose. varume veisraeri neyeahudha vaigara mumaguta eyeahudha vakauyisa chegumi chamatanga avo nechegumi chezvinhu zvitsvene zvakakumikidzwa kuna yeahoh allah wavo, uye vakazviisa mumatutu matatu. vakatanga kuita izvi mumwedzi wechitatu vakazopedza mumwedzi wechinomwe. hezekia namakurukota ake pavakauya vakaona matutu ezvinhu, vakarumbidza yeahoh uye vakaropafadza vanhu vake israeri. hezekia akabvunza vaprista navarevhi nezvamatutu aya. azaria muprista mukuru kubva kuimba yazadhoki akapindura achiti, “kubva zvakatanga vanhu kuuyisa zvipo zvavo kutemberi yayeahoh, takawana zvokudya zvakatiringana, nezvizhinji zvaisara, nokuti yeahoh akaropafadza vanhu vake, uye izvi zvizhinji ndizvo zvakasara.” hezekia akarayira kuti kugadzirwe matura okuchengetera zvinhu mutemberi yayeahoh, izvi zvikaitwa. ipapo vakauyisa zvipo zvavo vakatendeka, nezvegumi nezvipo zvakakumikidzwa. konania murevhi ndiye aiva mutariri wezvinhu izvi uye mununʼuna wake shimei ndiye aimutevera. jehieri, azazia, nahati, asaheri, jerimoti, jozabhadhi, erieri, isimakia, mahati, nabhenaya vaiva vatariri vari pasi pakonania nashimei mununʼuna wake, sokupiwa basa kwavakaitwa namambo hezekia naazaria muchinda aiona nezvetemberi yaallah. kore mwanakomana waimina murevhi, muchengeti wesuo rokumabvazuva, ndiye aichengeta zvipo zvokupa nokuzvisarudzira kuna allah achizogovera zvipo zvaipiwa kuna yeahoh pamwe chete nezvipo zvakatsaurwa. edheni, miniamini, jeshua, shemaya, amaria nashekania vakamubatsira vakatendeka mumaguta avaprista, vachigovera vamwe vaprista mumapoka avo, vakuru navadiki zvakafanana. pamusoro pezvo vakagovera kuvanhurume vaiva namakore matatu zvichikwira avo vaiva namazita avo akanyorwa mumagwaro enhoroondo, vose avo vaizopinda mutemberi yayeahoh kuti vaite mabasa ezuva nezuva akasiyana-siyana, zvichienderana nezvavakatarirwa kuti vaite uye namapoka avo. uye vakagovera kuvaprista sokunyorwa kwazvakaitwa munhoroondo yavo mumhuri dzavo, uye saizvozvowo kuvarevhi, vaiva namakore makumi maviri zvichikwira zvichienderana namabasa avo namapoka avo. vaisanganiswa vadiki vose, vakadzi, navanakomana navanasikana venzvimbo yose vakanyorwa munhoroondo nokuti vakanga vakatendeka pakuzvinatsa. kuvaprista, zvizvarwa zvaaroni vaigara mumaruwa akanga akakomberedza maguta avo kana mune mamwe maguta, varume vakapiwa mabasa namazita avo kuti vape migove kuno murume mumwe nomumwe aiva pakati pavo nokuna vose vakanga vakanyorwa mumabhuku enhoroondo dzavarevhi. izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa nahezekia muyeahudha yose achiita zvakanga zvakanaka uye zvakarurama uye zvakatendeka pamberi payeahoh allah wake. mune zvose zvaakaita mukushandira temberi yaallah uye mukutevera murayiro nezvakarayirwa, akatsvaka allah wake akashanda nomwoyo wose. saka akabudirira.

32

mushure mezvose zvakaitwa nahezekia nokutendeka kwakadai, senakeribhi mambo weasiria akauya akapamba yeahudha. akakomba maguta aiva namasvingo achifunga kuapamba kuti ave ake. hezekia paakaona kuti senakeribhi akanga auya uye kuti aida kurwisa jerusarema, akabvunza machinda ake navatungamiri vehondo nezvekuvharwa kwemvura yaibva muzvitubu zvaiva kunze kweguta uye vakamubatsira. hondo huru kwazvo yakaungana, vakavhara zvitubu zvose norukova rwaiyerera ruchipfuura nomunyika iyi. vakati, “ko, madzimambo easiria angauyirei achizowana mvura zhinji.” ipapo akashanda nesimba akagadziridza zvikamu zvose zvorusvingo zvakanga zvakoromoka akavaka shongwe parwizi. akavakazve rumwe rusvingo kunze kwerwakanga rwuripo akasimbisa miro yaitsigira guta radhavhidhi. akagadzirawo zvombo zvakawanda nenhoo. akagadza vakuru vehondo pamusoro pavanhu akavaunganidza pamberi pake pachivara chepasuo reguta akavakurudzira namashoko aya: “simbai mutsunge mwoyo. musatya kana kuora mwoyo nokuda kwamambo weasiria nehondo huru yaanayo, nokuti kune simba guru kwatiri kupinda raanaro. iye ane ruoko rwenyama chete, asi isu tina yeahoh allah wedu kuti atibatsire uye anotirwira hondo dzedu.” vanhu vakawana kusimbisiswa nokushinga kubva pane zvakanga zvataurwa nahezekia mambo weyeahudha. shure kwaizvozvo, senakeribhi mambo weasiria nehondo yake pavakanga vakakomba guta rerakishi, akatumira vakuru vehondo yake kujerusarema neshoko iri kuna hezekia mambo weyeahudha nokuvanhu vose veyeahudha vaivako achiti: “zvanzi nasenakeribhi mambo weasiria: munozvisimbisa neiko, kuti mungaramba muri mujerusarema rakakombwa? hezekia paanoti, ‘yeahoh allah wedu achatinunura kubva muruoko rwamambo weasiria,’ ari kukureverai nhema kuti mufe nenzara nenyota. hezekia haana here kubvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzamwari iyeyu nearitari achiti kuyeahudha nejerusarema, ‘munofanira kunamata pamberi pearitari imwe chete uye munofanira kubayira zvipiriso pairi’? “hamuzivi here zvandakaita namadzibaba angu kuvanhu vedzimwe nyika? vamwari venyika idzodzo vakagona here kununura nyika yavo kubva muruoko rwangu? ndoupi mwari wenyika dzose dzakaparadzwa namadzibaba angu akagona kuponesa vanhu vake kubva kwandiri? zvino mwari wenyu angagona sei kukununurai kubva muruoko rwangu? zvino musatendera hezekia kuti akureverei nhema uye akutsausei zvakadai. musamutende, nokuti hakuna mwari worudzi rupi kana umambo hupi zvahwo akagona kurwira vanhu vake kubva muruoko rwangu kana ruoko rwamadzibaba angu. allah wenyu achakundikana zvakadii kukurwirai kubva muruoko rwangu!” makurukota asenakeribhi akataurazve zvimwe zvakawanda achishora yeahoh allah uye achipikisana nahezekia muranda wake. mambo akanyorazve tsamba achituka yeahoh, allah weisraeri achitaura izvi pamusoro pake: “sokukundikana kwavamwari vedzimwe nzvimbo kununura vanhu vake kubva muruoko rwangu, saizvozvo mwari wahezekia achakundikana kununura vanhu vake kubva muruoko rwangu.” ipapo vakadaidzira muchihebheru kuvanhu vejerusarema vakanga vari parusvingo, vachivatyisidzira vachivaita kuti vatye kuti ivo vagopamba guta. vakataura pamusoro paallah wejerusarema zvavaiita pamusoro pavamwe vamwari namamwe marudzi enyika, mabasa amaoko avanhu. mambo hezekia nomuprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi vakachema mumunyengetero kudenga pamusoro penyaya iyi. uye yeahoh akatuma mutumwa akaparadza varwi vose navatungamiri navakuru pamisasa yamambo weasiria. saka akadzokera kunyika yake achinyara kwazvo uye paakapinda mutemberi yamwari wake vamwe vavanakomana vake vakamuuraya neminondo. saka yeahoh akanunura hezekia navanhu vejerusarema kubva muruoko rwasenakeribhi mambo weasiria uye kubva muruoko rwavamwe vose. akavachengeta kumativi ose. vazhinji vakavigira yeahoh zvipo kujerusarema nezvipo zvinokosha kuna hezekia mambo weyeahudha. kubva ipapa akatanga kuremekedzwa zvikuru nendudzi dzose. pamazuva iwayo hezekia akarwara akasvika pakuda kufa. akanyengetera kuna yeahoh iye akamupindura akamupa chiratidzo chechishamiso. asi mwoyo wahezekia wakazvikudza uye haana kugamuchira tsitsi dzaakanga aratidzwa. saka hasha dzayeahoh dzakava pamusoro pake napamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema. ipapo hezekia akatendeuka kubva mukuzvikudza kwomwoyo wake, sezvakaitawo vanhu vejerusarema, naizvozvo hasha dzaallah hadzina kuuya kwavari pamazuva ahezekia. hezekia akanga ane pfuma yakawanda kwazvo uye nokukudzwa, uye akavaka matura okuchengeta sirivha yake negoridhe namatombo anokosha, nezvinonhuhwira, nenhoo nezvimwe zvinokosha zvose. akavakawo matura okuchengetera zviyo zvaaikohwa, waini itsva, namafuta; uye akavaka matanga emombe dzamarudzi akasiyana-siyana namatanga amakwai. akavaka misha uye akatenga makwai nemombe zhinji nokuti allah akanga amupa pfuma yakawanda. hezekia ndiye akavhara mvura yaibuda muchitubu chepagihoni ichiyerera nokumusoro akaivhurira kuti iende nezasi kumavirazuva kweguta radhavhidhi. akabudirira mune zvose zvaiita. asi pakatumwa nhume navatongi vebhabhironi kuti vamubvunze pamusoro pechiratidzo chechishamiso chakanga chaitika munyika, allah akamusiya kuti amuedze uye kuti azive zvose zvaiva mumwoyo make. zvimwe zvakaitwa nahezekia panguva yokutonga kwake zvakanyorwa muchiratidzo chomuprofita isaya mwanakomana waamozi mubhuku ramadzimambo eyeahudha neisraeri. hezekia akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa pachikomo pane makuva ezvizvarwa zvadhavhidhi. yeahudha yose navanhu vejerusarema vakamuremekedza paakafa. uye mwanakomana wake manase akamutevera paumambo.

33

manase akanga ane makore gumi namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi mashanu namashanu. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, achitevedzera zvinonyangadza pamberi payeahoh zvaiitwa nendudzi dzakadzingwa nayeahoh pamberi pavaisraeri. akavakazve nzvimbo dzakakwirira dzakanga dzaparadzwa nababa vake hezekia. akavaka aritari dzabhaari uye akagadzira matanda aashera. akakotamira nyeredzi dzose dzokudenga akadzishumira. akavaka aritari mutemberi yayeahoh yakanga yanzi nayeahoh, “zita rangu richaramba riri mujerusarema nokusingaperi.” muzvivanze zvose zvetemberi yayeahoh akavaka aritari dzenyeredzi dzose dzedenga. akabayira vanakomana vake mumoto mumupata webheni hinomi akaita zvamashura, mazango, nouroyi, akandobvunzira kumasvikiro, navavuki. akaita zvakaipa zvizhinji pamberi payeahoh akamutsa hasha dzake. akatora chifananidzo chakavezwa chaakanga agadzira akachiisa mutemberi yaallah, yakanga yanzi naallah kuna dhavhidhi nokumwanakomana wake soromoni, “mutemberi ino nomujerusarema randakasarudza kubva mumarudzi ose eisraeri, ndichaisa zita rangu nokusingaperi. handichatenderizve kuti tsoka dzavaisraeri dzibude munyika yandakavimbisa madzitateguru enyu. kana chete vakachenjerera kuita zvose zvandakavarayira maererano nemirayiro yose, mitemo, nezvandakatema zvakapiwa kubudikidza namozisi.” asi manase akatungamirira yeahudha navanhu vejerusarema mukurasika, zvokuti vakaita zvakatonyanya kuipa kupfuura ndudzi dzose dzakanga dzaparadzwa pamberi pavaisraeri. yeahoh akataura kuna manase navanhu vake, asi ivo havana kuteerera. saka yeahoh akauyisa vatungamiri vehondo yavaasiria kuzovarwisa vakatora manase somusungwa, vakaisa chikokovonho mumhino yake, vakamusunga nengetani dzendarira vakaenda naye kubhabhironi. mukutambudzika kwake akatsvaka yeahoh allah wake akazvininipisa kwazvo pamberi paallah wamadzibaba ake. uye paakanyengetera kwaari, yeahoh akasundwa nokuzvininipisa kwake akateerera kudemba kwake. saka akamudzosa kujerusarema uye kuumambo hwake. ipapo manase akaziva kuti yeahoh ndiallah. mushure maizvozvi akavakazve rusvingo rwokunze rweguta radhavhidhi, kumavirira kwechitubu chepagihoni mumupata, kusvika pavanopinda napo pasuo rehove akakomberedza chikomo chaoferi; akachiitawo kuti chinyanye kukwirira. akamisa vakuru vehondo mumaguta ose ane masvingo muyeahudha. akaparadza vamwari vose vedzimwe nyika akabvisa chifananidzo kubva mutemberi yayeahoh nearitari dzaakanga avaka pachikomo chetemberi nomujerusarema akadzikanda kunze kweguta. ipapo akavakazve aritari yayeahoh akabayira zvipiriso zvokuwadzana nokuvonga pairi. uye akataurira yeahudha kuti ishumire yeahoh, allah weisraeri. zvisinei, vanhu vakaramba vachibayira panzvimbo dzakakwirira, asi kuna yeahoh allah wavo chete. zvimwe zvakaitwa namanase panguva yokutonga kwake, kusanganisira munyengetero wake kuna allah wake, namashoko akataurwa navaoni kwaari muzita rayeahoh allah waisraeri, zvakanyorwa munhoroondo dzamadzimambo eisraeri. munyengetero wake uye kuti allah akasundwa sei nokuzvininipisa kwake, nezvivi zvake zvose nokusatendeka kwake, nenzvimbo dzaakavakira nzvimbo dzakakwirira nokumisa matanda aashera nezvifananidzo asati azvininipisa, zvose zvakanyorwa munhoroondo dzavaoni. manase akazorora namadzibaba ake akavigwa mumuzinda wake. uye amoni mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. amoni akanga ava namakore makumi maviri namaviri paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore maviri. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh, sezvakanga zvaitwa namanase baba vake. amoni akashumira uye akapa zvibayiro zvakanga zvagadzirwa namanase. asi haana kuzoita sababa vake, haana kuzvininipisa pamberi payeahoh. amoni akawedzera mhosva yake. makurukota aamoni akarangana akamuuraya mumuzinda wake. ipapo vanhu venyika yose vakauraya vose vakanga varangana kuuraya mambo amoni. vakaita josia mwanakomana wake mambo panzvimbo yake.

34

josia aiva namakore masere paakava mambo uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore makumi matatu nerimwe chete. akaita zvakanga zvakanaka pamberi payeahoh akafamba munzira dzababa vake dhavhidhi, asingatendeukiri kurudyi kana kuruboshwe. mugore rorusere rokutonga kwake, paakanga achiri mudiki akatanga kutsvaka allah wababa vake dhavhidhi. mugore regumi namaviri akatanga kunatsa yeahudha nejerusarema achibvisa nzvimbo dzakakwirira, matanda aashera, zvifananidzo zvakavezwa nezvakaumbwa. pakurayira kwake aritari dzavanabhaari dzakaputsirwa pasi; akatema-tema aritari dzezvinonhuhwira dzaiva pamusoro padzo akaparadza matanda aashera, zvifananidzo nezviumbwa izvi akazviputsa kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu akazviparadzira pamakuva avanhu vaibayira kwazviri. akapisa mapfupa avaprista paaritari dzavo, uye saizvozvo akachenesa yeahudha nejerusarema. mumaguta amanase, efuremu nesimeoni kusvikira kunafutari, nomumatongo akaapoteredza, akaputsira pasi aritari namatanda aashera akaparadza zvifananidzo kusvikira zvaita upfu, akatema-tema kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu aritari dzose dzezvinonhuhwira muisraeri yose. ipapo akadzokera kujerusarema. mugore regumi namasere rokutonga kwajosia pakuchenesa nyika netemberi, akatuma shafani mwanakomana waazaria namaaseya mutongi weguta, vaina joa mwanakomana wajohazi munyori, kuti vagadziridze temberi yayeahoh allah wake. vakaenda kuna hirikia muprista mukuru vakamupa mari yakanga yauyiswa mutemberi yaallah, yakanga yaunganidzwa navarevhi vaiva vachengeti vamasuo, kubva kuvanhu vamanase, efuremu navose vakanga vasara veisraeri uye kubva kuvanhu vose veyeahudha nebhenjamini navagari vomujerusarema. ipapo vakaichengetesa varume vakanga vapiwa basa rokuva vatariri vebasa rapatemberi yayeahoh. varume ava vakaripira vashandi vakagadziridza uye vakavandudza temberi. vakapawo mari kuvavezi navavaki kuti vatenge matombo okuvakisa akavezwa namatanda okubatanidza nokuita mapango edzimba dzakanga dzaregererwa namadzimambo eyeahudha dzichiparara. varume ava vakaita basa zvakatendeka. vakanga vari vatungamiri vaiva jahati naobhadhia, varevhi vaiva zvizvarwa zvamerari, uye zekariyeah nameshurami zvizvarwa zvakohati. varevhi, vose vaigona kuridza zviridzwa, vaitungamirira vashandi vari vatariri vavashandi vose pamabasa akasiyana-siyana. vamwe varevhi vaiva vanyori, vatariri navachengeti vamasuo. pavakanga vachiburitsa mari yakanga yaiswa mutemberi yayeahoh, hirikia muprista akawana bhuku romurayiro wayeahoh wakanga wapiwa kubudikidza namozisi. hirikia akati kuna shafani munyori, “ndawana bhuku romurayiro mutemberi yayeahoh.” akaripa kuna shafani. ipapo shafani akatora bhuku riya akaenda naro kuna mambo akati, “machinda enyu ari kuita zvose zvaakanzi aite. vakapa mari yakanga iri mutemberi yayeahoh vakaiisa mumaoko avatariri navashandi.” ipapo shafani munyori akati kuna mambo, “hirikia muprista andipa bhuku.” uye shafani akaverenga kubva mariri pamberi pamambo. mambo paakanzwa mashoko omurayiro, akabvarura nguo dzake. akarayira hirikia, ahikami mwanakomana washafani, abhidhoni mwanakomana wamika, shafani munyori naasaya mushandi wamambo kuti, “endai munondibvunzira kuna yeahoh, mubvunzewo vakasara muisraeri neyeahudha pamusoro pezvakanyorwa mubhuku iri rawanikwa. hasha dzayeahoh zhinji kwazvo dzinodururirwa pamusoro pedu nokuti madzibaba edu haana kuchengeta shoko rayeahoh; havana kuita sezvakanyorwa mubhuku iri.” hirikia naavo vakatumwa naro namambo vakaenda kundotaura nomuprofitakadzi huridha, uyo aiva mukadzi washarumi mwanakomana watokati mwanakomana wahazira muchengeti wenguo. aigara mujerusarema, mudunhu rechipiri. akati kwavari, “zvanzi nayeahoh allah waisraeri: udza murume akutumirai kwandiri kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh: ndichauyisa zvakaipa munzvimbo iyi nomuvanhu vayo kutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubhuku raverengwa pamberi pamambo weyeahudha. nokuti vakandisiya vakapisira zvinonhuhwira kuna vamwe vamwari vakamutsa hasha dzangu nezvose zvakagadzirwa namaoko avo, hasha dzangu dzichadururirwa panzvimbo ino uye hadzizodzimurwi.’ taurirai mambo weyeahudha, akutumai kuti muzobvunza kuna yeahoh, kuti, ‘zvanzi nayeahoh, allah waisraeri, pamusoro pamashoko awanzwa: nokuti mwoyo wako wateerera uye wazvininipisa pamberi paallah pawanzwa zvaakataura pamusoro penzvimbo ino navanhu vayo zvakaipa, uye nokuti wazvininipisa pamberi pangu ukabvarura nguo dzako ukachema pamberi pangu, ndakunzwa ndizvo zvinotaura yeahoh. zvino iwe ndichakuuyisa kuna madzibaba ako, uye uchavigwa murunyararo. meso ako haachazooni zvakaipa zvose zvandichauyisa panzvimbo ino napane vose vanogara pano.’ ” saka vakatora mhinduro yake vakadzoka nayo kuna mambo. ipapo mambo akaunganidza vakuru vose veyeahudha nejerusarema. akaenda kutemberi yayeahoh navarume veyeahudha, vanhu vejerusarema, vaprista navarevhi, vanhu vose kubva kuno mudiki kusvika kuno mukuru. akaverenga vachinzwa mashoko ose ebhuku resungano, rakanga rawanikwa mutemberi yayeahoh. mambo akamira pashongwe yavo vakamutsiridza sungano pamberi payeahoh, kuti vatevere yeahoh uye vachengete mirayiro yake, zvaakatema nemitemo yake nomwoyo wake wose nomweya wake wose uye kuti ateerere mashoko esungano akanyorwa mubhuku iri. ipapo akaita kuti munhu wose womujerusarema nebhenjamini azvipire kwairi; vanhu vomujerusarema vakaita izvi maererano nesungano yaallah, allah wamadzibaba avo. josia akabvisa zvifananidzo zvose zvinonyangadza munyika yose yavaisraeri akaita kuti vose vaiva muisraeri vashumire yeahoh allah wavo. mazuva ake ose, havana kutsauka pakutevera yeahoh allah wamadzibaba avo.

35

josia akapemberera pasika kuna yeahoh mujerusarema, uye gwayana repasika rakaurayiwa pazuva regumi nemana romwedzi wokutanga. akagadza vaprista pamabasa avo akavakurudzira kuti vashumire mutemberi yayeahoh. akati kuvarevhi, vaidzidzisa israeri yose uye vakanga vakatsaurirwa kuna yeahoh, “isai areka yesungano mutemberi yakavakwa nasoromoni mwanakomana wadhavhidhi, mambo waisraeri. haifaniri kutakurwa pamapfudzi enyu. zvino shumirai yeahoh allah uye navanhu vake israeri. zvigadzirirei nemhuri dzenyu mumapoka enyu, maererano nezvakarayirwa zvakanyorwa nadhavhidhi mambo weisraeri nomwanakomana wake soromoni. “mirai munzvimbo tsvene neboka ravarevhi pachikamu chiduku cheboka chimwe nechimwe chemhuri dzehama dzenyu. urayai makwayana epasika muzvinatse mugadzirire makwayana kuitira hama dzenyu, muchiita zvakarayirwa nayeahoh kubudikidza namozisi.” josia akapa vamwe vanhu vose vakanga varipo makwai nembudzi zvaisvika zviuru makumi matatu sezvipiriso zvepasika, uyewo nemombe zviuru zvitatu, zvose izvi zvakabva mupfuma yamambo. machinda ake akapawo nokuda kwavo kuvanhu nokuvaprista navarevhi. hirikia, zekariyeah najehieri, mutariri mukuru wetemberi yaallah akapa vaprista zvipiriso zviuru zviviri namazana matanhatu nemombe mazana matatu. uyewo konania pamwe chete nashemaya nanetaneri vanunʼuna vake, nahashabhia, jeyeri najozabhadhi, vatungamiri vavarevhi, vakapa zvipiriso zvepasika zviuru zvishanu nemombe mazana mashanu zvavarevhi. nguva yokushumira yakati yarongwa, vaprista vakamira munzvimbo dzavo vaine varevhi mumapoka avo sezvakanga zvarayirwa namambo. makwayana epasika akaurayiwa, vaprista vakasasa ropa ravakapiwa, varevhi vachivhiya mhuka idzi. vakaisa parutivi zvipiriso zvinopiswa kuti vazvipe kuzvikamu zvamapoka emhuri dzavanhu kuti vazvipe kuna yeahoh sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku ramozisi. vakaita zvimwe chetezvo nemombe. vakagocha mhuka dzepasika pamoto nenzira yakarayirwa, vakabikira zvipiriso zvitsvene muhari, mumakate nomumakango uye vakapa vanhu vose nokukurumidza. vapedza izvi, vakatanga kugadzirira zvavo nezvavaprista, nokuti vaprista vezvizvarwa zvaaroni vakabayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa namafuta azvo kusvikira usiku. saka varevhi vakazvigadzirira ivo navaprista vorudzi rwaaroni. vaimbi, zvizvarwa zvaasafi, vakanga vari munzvimbo dzakanga dzarayirwa nadhavhidhi, asafi, hemani najedhutuni muoni wamambo. vachengeti vamasuo pasuo rimwe nerimwe vaisafanira kusiya nzvimbo dzavo nokuti dzimwe hama dzavo varevhi vaivagadzirirawo zvavo. saka panguva iyoyo basa rose rayeahoh rakaitwa kuti vapemberere pasika nezvipiriso zvinopiswa paaritari yayeahoh sezvakanga zvarayirwa namambo josia. vaisraeri vakanga varipo vakapemberera pasika panguva iyoyo vakacherechedza mutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso kwamazuva manomwe. pasika haina kunge yambocherechedzwa saizvozvi muisraeri kubva pamazuva omuprofita samueri; uye hakuna kana mumwe chete pamadzimambo eisraeri akanga apemberera pasika sezvakaitwa najosia navaprista, varevhi neyeahudha yose neisraeri vakanga varipo navanhu vejerusarema. pasika iyi yakapembererwa mugore regumi norusere rokutonga kwajosia. mushure maizvozvi zvose, josia paakanga agadziridza zvinhu mutemberi, neko mambo weijipiti, akakwidza kundorwa naye pakakemishi payufuratesi, uye josia akabudawo kundosangana naye kuti varwe. asi neko akatuma nhume kwaari achiti, “ibopoto ripiko riripo pakati pangu newe, nhai mambo weyeahudha? handina kuuya kuzorwa newe nhasi, asi neimba yandiri kurwisana nayo. allah andiudza kuti ndikurumidze; saka mira kurwisana naallah, ari kurutivi rwangu, kana kuti achakuparadza.” kunyange zvakadaro josia haana kubva kwaari asi akazvishandura kuti arwe naye muhondo. haana kuda kuteerera zvakanga zvataurwa naneko sokurayira kwaallah asi akaenda kundorwa naye pabani remegidho. vawemburi vouta vakapfura mambo josia, uye iye akati kumachinda ake, “ndibvisei pano; ndakuvara zvakaipisisa.” saka vakamutora vakamuburitsa mungoro yake vakamuisa mune imwe ngoro yaakanga anayo, vakauya naye kujerusarema, kwaakandofira. akavigwa mumakuva amadzibaba ake, uye yeahudha yose nejerusarema vakamuchema. jeremia akanyora dzimbo dzokuchema josia, uye kusvikira nhasi vaimbi vechirume nevechikadzi vose vanorangarira josia munziyo idzodzo dzokuchema. zvimwe zvakaitwa najosia panguva yokutonga kwake, namabasa okuzvipira kwake maererano nezvakanyorwa mumurayiro wayeahoh, zvose zvaakaita kubva pakutanga kusvikira pakupedzisira zvakanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eisraeri neyeahudha.

36

uye vanhu vomunyika iyi vakatora jehoahazi mwanakomana wajosia vakamuita mambo mujerusarema panzvimbo yababa vake. jehoahazi akanga ana makore makumi maviri namatatu paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwemwedzi mitatu. mambo weijipiti akamubvisa paumambo mujerusarema akatemera yeahudha kuti iripe matarenda zana esirivha netarenda regoridhe. mambo weijipiti akaita kuti eriakimu, mukoma wajehoahazi, ave mambo pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema akashandura zita raeriakimi kuti anzi jehoyakimi. asi neko akatora mununʼuna waeriakimi, jehoahazi, akaenda naye kuijipiti. jehoyakimi akanga aina makore makumi maviri namashanu paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi nerimwe chete akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh allah wake. nebhukadhinezari mambo webhabhironi akamurwisa akamusunga nengetani dzendarira kuti amutore aende naye kubhabhironi. nebhukadhinezari akatorawo midziyo yomutemberi yayeahoh akaenda nayo kubhabhironi akandoiisa mutemberi yake ikoko. zvimwe zvakaitwa panguva yokutonga kwajehoyakimi, zvinhu zvinonyangadza zvaakaita nezvose zvakawanikwa zvaakakanganisa, zvakanyorwa mubhuku ramadzimambo eisraeri neyeahudha. uye jehoyakini mwanakomana wake akamutevera paumambo. jehoyakini akanga ava namakore gumi namasere paakava mambo, uye akatonga mujerusarema kwemwedzi mitatu namazuva gumi. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh. pakupera kwegore, mambo nebhukadhinezari akatuma shoko rokuti auyiswe kubhabhironi pamwe chete nemidziyo inokosha kubva mutemberi yayeahoh, akaita mununʼuna wajehoyakini, zedhekia, mambo pamusoro peyeahudha nejerusarema. zedhekia akanga ava namakore makumi maviri nerimwe paakava mambo uye akatonga mujerusarema kwamakore gumi nerimwe. akaita zvakaipa pamberi payeahoh uye haana kuzvininipisa pamberi pomuprofita jeremia, akataura shoko rayeahoh. akamukirawo mambo nebhukadhinezari akanga amuita kuti ape mhiko muzita raallah. akaomesa mutsipa akaomesa mwoyo wake uye akaramba kutendeukira kuna yeahoh, allah weisraeri. uyezve vakuru vose vavaprista navanhu vakanyanya kutadza vachitevera zvinonyangadza zvose zvendudzi vakasvibisa imba yayeahoh yaakanga akudza kwazvo mujerusarema. yeahoh, allah wamadzibaba avo, akatuma shoko rake kubudikidza nenhume dzake nguva nenguva, nokuti akaitira tsitsi vanhu vake nenzvimbo yake yokugara. asi vakashora nhume dzaallah, vakazvidza mashoko ake vakadadira vaprofita vake kusvikira hasha dzaallah dzavamukira uye pasisina zvingagadziridzwa. akauyisa mambo wavabhabhironi kuti azovarwisa uye akauraya majaya avo nomunondo munzvimbo tsvene, uye hapana waakasiya, jaya kana mhandara, varume vakuru kana vatana. allah akavapa vose kuna nebhukadhinezari. akatakura midziyo yose yaiva mutemberi yaallah akaenda nayo kubhabhironi, zvose zvikuru nezvidiki nepfuma yomutemberi yayeahoh nepfuma yamambo namachinda ake. vakapisa temberi yaallah vakaputsa rusvingo rwejerusarema; vakapisa mizinda yose uye vakaparadza zvose zvaikosha imomo. akatakura vose vakanga vasara muutapwa avo vakanga vapunyuka kubva pamunondo uye vakava varanda vake nevevanakomana vake kusvikira pakutanga umambo hwepezhia kutonga. nyika yakava namasabata ayo ezororo; panguva yose yokuparadzwa kwayo yakazorora, kusvikira makore makumi manomwe apera kuti shoko rayeahoh rakataurwa najeremia rizadziswe. mugore rokutanga rasirasi mambo wepezhia, kuitira kuti shoko rayeahoh rakataurwa najeremia rizadziswe, yeahoh akasunda mwoyo wasirasi mambo wepezhia kuti aparadzire kuumambo hwake hwose uye kuti anyore achizivisa kuti: “zvanzi nasirasi mambo wepezhia: “ ‘yeahoh allah wedenga, andipa umambo hwose hwapanyika uye akandigadza kuti ndimuvakire temberi pajerusarema muyeahudha. ani naani wavanhu vake vari pakati penyu, yeahoh allah wake ave naye, uye ngaaende ikoko.’ ”

romans

1

pauro, muranda wayeahoshua kristu, akadanwa kuti ave mupostori uye akatsaurirwa vhangeri raallah, vhangeri raakavimbisa kare kubudikidza navaprofita vake mumagwaro matsvene pamusoro pomwanakomana wake, uyo pakuberekwa kwake somunhu akanga ari chizvarwa chadhavhidhi, uye akaratidzwa nesimba kubudikidza namweya mutsvene kuti ndiye mwanakomana waallah, nokumuka kwake kubva kuvakafa: yeahoshua kristu ishe wedu. kubudikidza naye uye nokuda kwezita rake, takagamuchira nyasha noupostori, kuti tidane vanhu kubva pakati pavahedheni vose kuti vave nokuteerera kunobva pakutenda. uye nemiwo muri pakati paavo vakadanwa kuti muve vayeahoshua kristu. kuna vose vari muroma vanodiwa naallah uye vakadanwa kuti vave vatsvene: nyasha norugare ngazvive nemi zvinobva kuna allah baba vedu, nokuna ishe yeahoshua kristu. pakutanga, ndinovonga allah wangu muna yeahoshua kristu pamusoro penyu mose, nokuti kutenda kwenyu kunoparidzwa panyika yose. allah, wandinoshumira nomwoyo wangu wose mukuparidza vhangeri romwanakomana wake, ndiye chapupu changu kuti ndinoramba sei ndichikurangarirai muminyengetero yangu nguva dzose; uye ndinonyengeterera kuti zvino pakupedzisira nokuda kwaallah ndizarurirwe mukana wokuti ndiuye kwamuri. ndinoshuva zvikuru kuti ndikuonei kuti ndigokupai chipo chomweya kuti mugova makasimbiswa, ndiko kuti, imi neni tikurudzirwe pamwe chete nokutenda kwomumwe nomumwe wedu. handidi kuti musaziva, hama, kuti ndakaronga kazhinji kuti ndiuye kwamuri (asi ndakatadziswa kuita saizvozvo kusvikira zvino) kuti ndive nezvibereko pakati penyu, sezvandakaita pakati pavamwe vedzimwe ndudzi. ndine mungava kuna vose vagiriki navasiri vagiriki, vose vakachenjera navasina kuchenjera. ndokusaka ndichida zvikuru kwazvo kuti ndiparidze vhangeri kwamuriwo imi vari kuroma. handina nyadzi pamusoro pevhangeri, nokuti isimba raallah rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda: kutanga kumuyeahudha, zvichizotevera wedzimwe ndudzi. nokuti muvhangeri, kururama kwaallah kunoratidzwa kuchibva pakutenda kuchienda kukutenda, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “akarurama achararama nokutenda.” kutsamwa kwaallah kunoratidzwa kuchibva kudenga pamusoro pokusada allah kwose nokusarurama kwose kwavanhu vanodzivisa chokwadi nokusarurama kwavo. nokuti izvo zvose zvingazivikanwa pamusoro paallah zviri pachena kwavari, nokuti allah akazviisa pachena kwavari. nokuti kubvira pakusikwa kwenyika izvo zvisingaonekwi zvaallah, iro simba rake rinogara nokusingaperi nouallah hwake, zvakanyatsoonekwa kwazvo, zvichizivikanwa kubva pazvinhu zvakaitwa, kuitira kuti vanhu varege kuva nepembedzo. nokuti kunyange zvavo vaiziva allah, havana kumukudza saallah kana kumuvonga, asi kufunga kwavo kwakava kusina maturo uye mwoyo yavo, isina zivo, yakasvibiswa. kunyange zvavo vachizviti vakachenjera, vakava mapenzi uye vakashandura kubwinya kwaallah asingafi vakakuita mifananidzo yakaitwa somunhu anofa, shiri, mhuka nezvinokambaira. naizvozvo allah akavaisa kuzvishuvo zvakaipa zvemwoyo yavo, zvokuzvisvibisa noupombwe kuti vazvidze miviri yavo pakati pavo. vakatsinhanisa zvokwadi yaallah nenhema, vakanamata uye vakashumira zvisikwa panzvimbo yomusiki, iye anokudzwa nokusingaperi. ameni. nokuda kwaizvozvo, allah akavaisa pakuchiva kwavo kunonyadzisa. kunyange navakadzi vavo vakashandura zvavakasikirwa kuti vaite, vakaita zvavasina kusikirwa. navarume vavo vakaitawo zvimwe chetezvo vakasiya zvavakasikirwa paukama hwavo navakadzi uye vakatsva noruchiva mumwe kuno mumwe murume. varume vakaita zvisakafanira navamwe varume, uye vakazviwanira mukati mavo mubayiro wakafanira kurasika kwavo. pamusoro pezvo, sezvavasina kufunga kuti zvakakodzera kuva noruzivo rwaallah, akavaisa kumurangariro wokurasika, kuti vaite zvisakafanira. vakazadzwa nokusarurama kworudzi rwose, kuipa, makaro nokurasika. vakazara negodo, umhondi, nokukakavara, unyengeri nokuvenga. vane makuhwa, vanochera vamwe, vanovenga allah, vanodada, vanozvikudza uye vanozvirumbidza; vanovamba nzira dzokuita zvakaipa; havateereri vabereki vavo; havafungi, havana kutenda, vane mwoyo wakaipa, havana tsitsi. kunyange zvavo vachiziva mutemo wakarurama waallah kuti avo vanoita zvakadai vakafanirwa norufu, havarambi vachiita zvinhu izvi bedzi, asi kuti vanotenderanawo navanozviita.

2

naizvozvo, iwe unotonga mumwe munhu hauna pembedzo, nokuti pachinhu chipi nechipi chaunotonga mumwe nacho, unozvipa mhosva iwe, nokuti iwe unotonga, unoita zvinhu zvimwe chetezvo. zvino tinoziva kuti kutonga kwaallah ndokwezvokwadi kuna vanoita zvinhu zvakadai. saka kana iwe munhuwo zvake uchitonga vamwe asi uchiita zvinhu zvimwe chetezvo, unofunga kuti ungapunyuka kutonga kwaallah here? kana kuti unozvidza pfuma younyoro hwake, mwoyo munyoro wake, nomwoyo murefu wake, usingazivi kuti unyoro hwaallah hunokuisa pakutendeuka? asi nokuda kwoukukutu hwako uye nomwoyo wako usingadi kutendeuka, uri kuzviunganidzira kutsamwa pazuva rokutsamwa kwaallah, pacharatidzwa kutonga kwake kwakarurama. allah “achapa mumwe nomumwe maererano nezvaakaita.” kuna avo vakatsungirira kuita zvakanaka vachitsvaka kubwinya nokukudzwa uye nokusafa, achavapa upenyu husingaperi. asi kuna avo vanotsvaka zvavo uye vanoramba chokwadi uye vachitevera zvakaipa, kuchavapo kutsamwa nehasha. kuchavapo kutambudzika nokudzungaira kumunhu mumwe nomumwe anoita zvakaipa: kutanga kumuyeahudha, tevere wedzimwe ndudzi; asi kubwinya, nokukudzwa uye norugare kuna vose vanoita zvakanaka: kutanga kumuyeahudha tevere wedzimwe ndudzi. nokuti allah haasi mutsauri wavanhu. vose vakatadza vasina murayiro vachaparadzwawo vasina murayiro, uye vose vakatadza vano murayiro vachatongwa nomurayiro. nokuti havasi vaya vanonzwa murayiro vakarurama pamberi paallah, asi vaya vanoita murayiro ndivo vachanzi vakarurama. zvirokwazvo, kana vedzimwe ndudzi, vasina murayiro vachiita sokuberekwa kwavo zvinhu zvinodiwa nomurayiro, wava murayiro wavo pachavo kunyange zvazvo vasina murayiro. sezvo vachiratidza kuti zvinodiwa nomurayiro zvakanyorwa pamwoyo yavo, hana dzavo dzichipupuriranawo nazvo, nezvavanofunga pakati pavo zvichivapa mhosva kana kuvapembedza. izvi zvichaitika pazuva iroro, allah raachazotonga zvakavanzika zvavanhu kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu, sezvinoreva vhangeri rangu. zvino iwe, kana uchiti uri muyeahudha; kana uchivimba nomurayiro uye uchizvirumbidza pamusoro poukama hwako naallah; kana uchiziva kuda kwake uye uchiziva kuti zvakanaka ndezvipi zvaunodzidziswa nomurayiro; kana uchiti uri mutungamiri wamapofu, chiedza chaavo vari murima, murairidzi wamapenzi, mudzidzisi wavacheche, nokuti zvauine, mumurayiro, mufananidzo woruzivo nechokwadi, zvino iwe, unodzidzisa vamwe, hauzvidzidzisewo here? iwe unoparidza kuti vanhu vasaba, unoba here? iwe unoti vanhu havafaniri kuita upombwe, unoita upombwe here? iwe unosema zvifananidzo, unoba mutemberi dzavo here? iwe unozvirumbidza pamusoro pomurayiro, unoshora allah nokudarika murayiro here? nokuti, sezvazvakanyorwa: “zita raallah rinomhurwa pakati pevedzimwe ndudzi nokuda kwenyu.” kudzingiswa kunokosha kana uchichengeta murayiro, asi kana uchidarika murayiro, wakangoita sousina kudzingiswa. kana vaya vasina kudzingiswa vakachengeta zvinodiwa nomurayiro, havangaonekwi savakadzingiswa here? uyo asina kudzingiswa panyama asi achichengeta murayiro achakutonga iwe, kunyange zvako une murayiro wakanyorwa uye wakadzingiswa, asi uchidarika murayiro. munhu haasi muyeahudha kana ari muyeahudha anoonekwa kunze chete, uye kudzingiswa hakuzi kwokunze kana kwapanyama chete. kwete, munhu anova muyeahudha kana ari muyeahudha mukati, uye kudzingiswa kwomwoyo, nomweya, kwete kwezvakanyorwa. kurumbidzwa kwomunhu akadaro hakubvi kuvanhu, asi kunobva kuna allah.

3

ko, muyeahudha anopfuura vamwe pakudii, uye kudzingiswa kunobatsireiko? zvizhinji nemitoo yose! pakutanga, ndivo vakapiwa mashoko aallah chaiwo. ko, kana vamwe vasina kutenda? kusatenda kwavo kungakonesa kutendeka kwaallah here? kwete, kwete! allah ngaave wechokwadi, asi vanhu vose vave venhema. sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “kuitira kuti munzi makarurama pamunotaura, uye mukunde pakutonga kwenyu.” asi kana kusarurama kwedu kuchiratidza kururama kwaallah zvinonyatsoonekwa, tichatiiko? kuti allah haana kururama here kana achiisa hasha dzake pamusoro pedu? (ndiri kutaura namatauriro avanhu). kwete kwete! dai zvanga zviri izvo, allah aizotonga nyika seiko? mumwe anogona kuti, “zvino kana nhema dzangu dzichiita kuti chokwadi chaallah chionekwe uye zvichizowedzera kukudzwa kwake, ko, sei ndichizotongwa somutadzi?” ticharegerereiko kutaura sezvatinopomerwa, uye sezvinoreva vamwe vachiti tinoti, “ngatiitei zvakaipa kuti zvakanaka zvibudepo”? kutongwa kwavo kwakavafanira. zvino tichatiiko? tinovapfuura here? kwete napaduku pose! nokuti tambopa vose mhosva, vayeahudha nevedzimwe ndudzi, yokuva pasi pechivi. sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “hakuna akarurama, kunyange nomumwe; hakuna anonzwisisa, hakuna anotsvaka allah. vose vakatsauka, vose pamwe chete vakava vasina maturo; hakuna kana mumwe anoita zvakanaka, kana mumwe zvake.” “huro dzavo makuva akashama; ndimi dzavo dzinotaura unyengeri.” “uturu hwenyoka huri pamiromo yavo.” “miromo yavo izere nokutuka nokuvava.” “tsoka dzavo dzinokurumidza kuteura ropa; kuparadza nenhamo zviri panzira dzavo, uye nzira yorugare havaizivi.” “kutya allah hakupo pamberi pavo.” zvino tinoziva kuti zvose zvinorehwa nomurayiro, unozvitaura kuna avo vari pasi pomurayiro, kuitira kuti miromo yose ishayiswe chokutaura uye kuti nyika yose ive nemhosva pamberi paallah. naizvozvo hapana achanzi akarurama pamberi pake nokuda kwokuchengeta murayiro; asi kuti, kubudikidza nomurayiro tichaziviswa chivi. asi zvino kururama kwaallah, kwakaratidzwa kunze kwomurayiro, kuchipupurirwa nomurayiro navaprofita. kururama uku kunobva kuna allah kunouya kubudikidza nokutenda muna yeahoshua kristu kuna vose vanotenda. hapana musiyano, nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaallah, uye vanoruramisirwa nenyasha dzake kubudikidza nokudzikinura kuri muna kristu yeahoshua. allah akamupa iye sechibayiro chokuyananisa kubudikidza nokutenda muropa rake. akaita izvi kuti aratidze kururamisira kwake, nokuti mukuita mwoyo murefu kwake akaregerera hake zvivi zvakaitwa kare. akazviita kuti aratidze kururamisira kwake panguva ino, kuitira kuti ave akarurama uye anoruramisira vaya vanotenda muna yeahoshua. zvino kuzvikudza kuripiko? kwabviswa. nomurayiro upiko? wokuchengetedza murayiro here? kwete, asi nomurayiro wokutenda. naizvozvo tinomira pakuti munhu anoruramisirwa nokutenda kwete nokuchengeta murayiro. ko, allah ndiallah wavayeahudha voga here? ko, haazi allah wevedzimwe ndudziwo here? hongu ndowevedzimwe ndudziwo, sezvo kuna allah mumwe chete uyo acharuramisira vakadzingiswa nokutenda uye vasina kudzingiswa kubudikidza nokutenda kumwe cheteko. zvino tinobvisa murayiro nokutenda uku here? kwete napaduku! asi, tinosimbisa murayiro.

4

zvino tichati abhurahama, tateguru wedu, panyama akawaneiko pazviri? nokuti dai abhurahama akaruramisirwa namabasa, angadai aine chinhu chokuzvirumbidza nacho, asi kwete pamberi paallah. ko, rugwaro runoti kudiniko? “abhurahama akatenda allah, uye kukanzi kwaari ndiko kururama.” zvino kana munhu achiita basa, mubayiro wake hautorwi sechipo chokungopiwa, asi somubayiro wakamufanira. asi kumunhu asingashandi, asi achitenda allah uyo anoruramisira munhu akaipa, kutenda kwake kuchanzi kwaari ndiko kururama. dhavhidhi anotaura pamusoro pechinhu chimwe chete ichi paanotaura zvokuropafadzwa kwomunhu anonzi naallah akarurama kunze kwamabasa, achiti: “vakaropafadzwa avo vakaregererwa zvakaipa zvavo, vakafukidzirwa zvivi zvavo. akaropafadzwa munhu ane chivi chisingazombobvunzwi naishe pamusoro pake.” ko, kuropafadzwa uku ndokwavakadzingiswa chete here? kana kuti navasina kudzingiswawo? nokuti tati kuna abhurahama kutenda kwake kwakanzi kwaari ndiko kururama. zvino zvakanzarwo seiko? akanga adzingiswa here, kana kuti asati? haana kunzarwo adzingiswa, asi kuti asati adzingiswa! uye akagamuchira chiratidzo chokudzingiswa, sechisimbiso chokururama kwaakawana nokutenda asati adzingiswa. saka naizvozvo ndiye baba wavose vanotenda, asi vasina kudzingiswa, kuitira kuti kururama kugopiwa kwavari. uye ndiyewo baba wavakadzingiswa, avo vasina kudzingiswa bedzi, asi vanofambawo mumakwara okutenda kwakanga kuna baba vedu abhurahama vasati vadzingiswa. nokuti abhurahama, nezvizvarwa zvake, haana kupiwa chipikirwa chokuti achava mugari wenhaka yenyika, kubudikidza nomurayiro, asi kubudikidza nokururama kunobva pakutenda. nokuti dai vaya vanorarama nomurayiro vari ivo vadyi venhaka, kutenda hakuna maturo uye nechipikirwa chinokoneswa, nokuti murayiro unouyisa kutsamwa. uye pasina murayiro hapanawo kudarika. naizvozvo chipikirwa chinouya nokutenda, kuitira kuti zvive zvenyasha uye kuti chisimbiswe kuzvizvarwa zvose zvaabhurahama, kwete avo vari vomurayiro voga, asi nokuna avo vari vokutenda kwaabhurahama. ndiye baba vedu tose. sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “ndakakuita baba vendudzi zhinji.” ndiye baba vedu pamberi paallah, uyo waakatenda kwaari, iye allah anopa upenyu kuvakafa uye anodana zvisipo sokunge zviripo. pasina kana tariro, abhurahama netariro akatenda uye akava baba vendudzi zhinji, sezvazvakanga zvarehwa kwaari zvichinzi, “zvizvarwa zvako zvichadarowo.” haana kushayiwa simba mukutenda kwake, paakaona kuti muviri wake wakanga watofa hawo, sezvo akanga ava namakore anenge zana okuzvarwa, uye kuti chizvaro chasara chakanga chafawo. asi haana kukahadzika nokuda kwokusatenda pamusoro pechipikirwa chaallah, asi akasimbiswa mukutenda kwake uye akakudza allah, achinyatsogutsikana kuti allah ane simba rokuita zvaakanga avimbisa. ndokusaka “zvakanzi kwaari ndiko kururama.” mashoko okuti, “zvakanzi kwaari,” haana kunyorerwa iye oga, asi kwatiriwo, kuna avo vachanzi naallah vakarurama, kunesu vanotenda kwaari iye akamutsa yeahoshua ishe wedu kubva kuvakafa. akaiswa kurufu nokuda kwezvivi zvedu uye akamutswa kuvapenyu nokuda kwokururamisirwa kwedu.

5

naizvozvo, zvatinoruramisirwa nokutenda, tino rugare naallah kubudikidza naishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, watakawana naye mapindiro, nokutenda, munyasha idzi dzatakamira madziri zvino. uye tinofara mutariro yokubwinya kwaallah. kwete izvozvo bedzi, asi tinofarawo mumatambudziko edu, nokuti tinoziva kuti kutambudzika kunouyisa kutsungirira, kutsungirira kunouyisa unhu uye unhu hunouyisa tariro. uye tariro hainyadzisi nokuti allah akadurura rudo rwake mumwoyo yedu kubudikidza namweya mutsvene, uyo waakatipa. munoona, panguva chaiyo yakafanira, patakanga tisina simba, kristu akafira vasingadi allah. hazviwanzoitika kuti munhu afire akarurama, kunyange zvazvo munhu angaedza kufira munhu akanaka. asi allah anoratidza rudo rwake kwatiri pakuti: tichiri vatadzi, kristu akatifira. zvino sezvo takaruramisirwa neropa rake, tichaponeswa zvikuru sei naye kubva pakutsamwa kwaallah! nokuti kana, patakanga tiri vavengi vaallah, takayananiswa naye kubudikidza norufu rwomwanakomana wake, tichaponeswa zvikuru sei kubudikidza norufu rwomwanakomana wake, tichaponeswa zvikuru sei kubudikidza noupenyu hwake, kana tayananiswa! nokuti hazvisizvo bedzi, asi kuti tinofarawo muna allah nokuna ishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, watakapiwa zvino naye kuyananiswa. naizvozvo, chivi sezvachakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe, norufu rukapinda nechivi, uye nenzira iyi rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose, nokuti vose vakatadza, nokuti murayiro usati wapiwa, chivi chakanga chava munyika. asi chivi hachiverengwi kana pasina murayiro. asi rufu rwakabata ushe kubva panguva yaadhamu kusvikira panguva yamozisi, kunyange pamusoro paavo vasina kutadza nokudarika murayiro, sezvakaitwa naadhamu, akanga ari mufananidzo wouyo akanga achazouya. asi chipo chokungopiwa hachifanani nokudarika. nokuti kana vazhinji vakafa nokudarika kwomunhu mumwe, zvikuru sei nyasha dzaallah nechipo chakauya nenyasha dzomunhu mumwe, yeahoshua kristu, dzakadururirwa kuvazhinji! uye chipo chaallah hachina kufanana nomubayiro wechivi chomunhu mumwe akatadza: nokuti kutongwa kwakauya nechivi chomunhu mumwe kuti vave nemhosva, asi chipo chokungopiwa chakatevera kudarika kuzhinji uye chikauyisa kururamisirwa. nokuti, kana nokudarika kwomunhu mumwe, rufu rwakabata ushe kubudikidza nomunhu iyeye, ko, kuzoti vaya vakagamuchira nyasha zhinji dzaallah uye nechipo chokungopiwa chokururama, vachabata ushe zvikuru sei muupenyu kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe, iye yeahoshua kristu. naizvozvo, nokuda kwokudarika kwomunhu mumwe mhosva yakapiwa kuvanhu vose, saka naizvozvowo nokuda kwechiito chimwe chokururama, kururamisirwa kunouyisa upenyu kwakavapo kuvanhu vose. nokuti vazhinji sezvavakaitwa vatadzi kubudikidza nokusateerera kwomunhu mumwe, saka naizvozvowo vazhinji vachaitwa vakarurama kubudikidza nokuteerera kwomunhu mumwe. murayiro wakaiswawo kuti kudarika kuwande. asi panowanda chivi, nyasha dzinowanda zvikuru nokupfuurisa, kuitira kuti sokubata ushe kwakaita chivi murufu, naizvozvowo nyasha dzibate ushe kubudikidza nokururama, kuti dziuyise upenyu husingaperi kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu, ishe wedu.

6

zvino tichatiiko? toramba tichiita zvivi here kuti nyasha dziwande? kwete napaduku pose! takafa kuzvivi; tingararama sei mazviri zvakare? ko, hamuzivi here kuti isu tose vaya vakabhabhatidzwa muna kristu yeahoshua takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? naizvozvo takavigwa naye kubudikidza nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti, sokumutswa kwakaitwa kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwababa, nesuwo tirarame upenyu hutsva. nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye zvakadai murufu rwake, zvirokwazvo tichabatanawo naye mukumuka kwake. nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wakare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye kuti muviri wechivi ushayiswe simba, kuti tirege kuvazve varanda vechivi, nokuti uyo anenge afa asunungurwa kubva kuchivi. zvino kana takafa nakristu, tinotenda kuti tichararamawo pamwe chete naye. nokuti sezvo tichiziva kuti kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, haachazofizve; rufu harusisina simba pamusoro pake. rufu rwaakafa, akafa kuchivi kamwe chete zvikabva zvapera; asi upenyu hwaanorarama, anoraramira allah. nenzira imwe cheteyo, nemiwo munofanira kuziva kuti makafa kuchivi, asi muri vapenyu kuna allah muna kristu yeahoshua. naizvozvo musatendera chivi kuti chibate ushe mumuviri wenyu unofa, kuti muteerere kuchiva kwacho. musapa mitezo yomuviri wenyu kuchivi, kuti ive nhumbi dzokuita zvisakarurama, asi zvipei kuna allah, savaya vakabviswa kurufu vachiiswa kuupenyu; uye ipai mitezo yomuviri wenyu kwaari ive nhumbi dzokururama. nokuti chivi hachichazovi nesimba pamusoro penyu, nokuti hamusi pasi pomurayiro, asi pasi penyasha. zvino tichatiiko? titadze here nokuti hatisi pasi pomurayiro asi pasi penyasha. kwete napaduku pose! hamuzivi here kuti kana mukazvipa kuno mumwe munhu kuti mumuteerere savaranda, muri varanda kuno uyo wamunoteerera, mungava varanda vechivi, chinoendesa kurufu kana vokuteerera, kunoendesa kukururama? asi allah ngaavongwe nokuti, kunyange zvenyu maimbova varanda vechivi, makateerera nomwoyo wenyu wose kurudzi rwedzidziso yamakanga mapiwa. makasunungurwa kubva kuchivi uye mava varanda vokururama. ndinotaura izvi nokutaura kwavanhu nokuda kwokushayiwa simba kwenyama yenyu. sezvamaingopa mitezo yemiviri yenyu kuuranda hwokusachena uye nokuipa kunoramba kuchingowanda, saka zvino ipei kuuranda hwokururama hunoendesa kuutsvene. pamakanga muri varanda vechivi, makanga makasununguka kubva pakutonga kwakarurama. zvino makawaneiko panguva iyoyo kubva pazvinhu zvamunonyadziswa nazvo, iye zvino? nokuti kuguma kwazvo ndirwo rufu! asi zvino makasunungurwa kubva kuchivi uye mava varanda vaallah, zvibereko zvamunokohwa zvinoisa kuutsvene, uye kuguma kwazvo ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna kristu yeahoshua ishe wedu. nokuti mubayiro wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaallah chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna kristu yeahoshua ishe wedu.

7

hamuzivi here, hama, nokuti ndiri kutaura kuvanhu vanoziva murayiro, kuti murayiro une simba pamusoro pomunhu panguva yose yaanenge ari mupenyu chete? somuenzaniso, mukadzi akawanikwa akasungwa nomurayiro kumurume wake panguva yose iyo murume wake anenge ari mupenyu, asi kana murume wake afa, anosunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wewaniso. saka zvino, kana akawanikwa nomumwe murume, murume wake achiri mupenyu, anonzi chifeve. asi kana murume achinge afa, asunungurwa kubva pamurayiro, uye haazi chifeve, kunyange zvake akawanikwa nomumwe murume. saka, hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurayiro kubudikidza nomuviri wakristu, kuti muve vomumwe, kuna iye akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, kuitira kuti tigobereka chibereko kuna allah. nokuti panguva yataitongwa nenyama, kuchiva kwechivi kwakamutswa nomurayiro kwaibata mumiviri yedu, kuti tibereke chibereko chorufu. asi zvino, nokufa kune izvo zvakanga zvakatisunga, takasunungurwa kubva pamurayiro kuitira kuti tishumire nenzira itsva yomweya, uye kwete nenzira yakanyorwa yekare. zvino tichatiiko? murayiro chivi here? kwete! zvirokwazvo ndingadai ndisina kuziva kuti chivi chii dai murayiro wakanga usipo. nokuti ndingadai ndisina kuziva kuti kuchiva chii kudai murayiro usina kuti, “usachiva.” asi chivi, chakawana mukana kubudikidza nomurayiro, chakaita mandiri mitoo yose yokuchiva. nokuti kunze kwomurayiro, chivi chakafa. ndaiva mupenyu kare kunze kwomurayiro; asi pakauya mutemo, chivi chakava noupenyu uye ini ndikafa. ndakaona kuti iwo mutemo waifanira kundipa upenyu, wakatozouyisa rufu. nokuti chivi chichitora mukana wachakawaniswa nomutemo, chakandinyengera, uye kubudikidza nomutemo chikandiuraya. saka naizvozvo, murayiro mutsvene, uye mutemo mutsvene, wakarurama uye wakanaka. ko, zvino chakanaka chakazova rufu kwandiri here? kwete napaduku pose! asi kuti chivi chionekwe sechivi, chakabereka rufu kubudikidza nechakanaka, kuitira kuti kubudikidza nomutemo chivi chive chakaipa kwazvo. tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya; asi ini handisi womweya, ndakatengeswa senhapwa kuchivi. handinzwisisi zvandinoita. nokuti zvandinoda kuita handizviiti, asi zvandinovenga ndizvo zvandinoita. uye kana ndikaita zvandisingadi kuita, ndinobvuma kuti murayiro wakanaka. saka zvino, handisiri ini ndinozviita, asi chivi chinorarama mandiri. ndinoziva kuti hapana chakanaka chinogara mandiri, imo munyama yangu. nokuti ndine chido chokuita zvakanaka, asi handigoni kuzviita. nokuti zvandinoita hazvisi zvakanaka zvandinoda kuita, kwete, asi zvakaipa zvandisingadi kuita izvo ndizvo zvandinoramba ndichiita. zvino kana ndichiita zvandisingadi kuita, handisini ndinozviita, asi chivi chinogara mandiri ndicho chinozviita. saka ndinoona murayiro uyu uchishanda: kana ndichida kuita zvakanaka, zvakaipa zviripo pandiri. nokuti mukatikati mangu ndinofarira murayiro waallah; asi ndinoona mumwe murayiro uchishanda mumitezo yomuviri wangu, uchirwisana nomurayiro wepfungwa dzangu uye uchindiita musungwa womurayiro wechivi uri kushanda mumitezo yangu. ndiri munhu ari pakutambudzika kwakadii! ndiani achandinunura kubva mumuviri uno worufu? allah ngaavongwe kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu ishe wedu! saka naizvozvo, ini pachangu, mupfungwa dzangu, ndiri muranda kumurayiro waallah, asi panyama muranda kumurayiro wechivi.

8

naizvozvo zvino, hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kuna vari muna kristu yeahoshua, nokuti kubudikidza nakristu yeahoshua murayiro womweya woupenyu wakandisunungura kubva pamurayiro wechivi norufu. nokuti zvakanga zvisingakwaniswi kuitwa nomurayiro pakushayiswa simba kwawo nomunhu wechivi, allah akazviita nokutuma mwanakomana wake mumufananidzo wemunhu wechivi kuti ave chipiriso chechivi. uye akapa mhosva kuchivi chiri mumunhu wechivi, kuitira kuti kururama kunodiwa nomurayiro kuzadziswe matiri, isu tisingafambi maererano nenyama asi maererano nomweya. nokuti vaya vanorarama namararamiro enyama, pfungwa dzavo dzinofunga zvinodiwa nenyama; asi vaya vanorarama namararamiro omweya, pfungwa dzavo dzinofunga zvomweya. nokuti kufunga kwomunhu wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi kufunga kunotongwa nomweya ndihwo upenyu norugare; nokuti kufunga kwenyama kunovenga allah. hakuzviisi pasi pomurayiro waallah, uye hakugoni kuzviita. avo vanotongwa nenyama havagoni kufadza allah. asi imi hamutongwi nenyama asi nomweya, kana mweya waallah achigara mamuri. uye kana munhu asina mweya wakristu, haazi wakristu, asi kana kristu ari mamuri, muviri wenyu wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya wenyu mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. uye kana mweya waiye akamutsa kristu kubva kuvakafa uchigara mamuri, iye akamutsa kristu kubva kuvakafa achapawo upenyu kumiviri yenyu inofa kubudikidza nomweya wake unogara mamuri. naizvozvo, hama, tine mungava, asi kwete wenyama, kuti tirarame maererano nezvainoda. nokuti kana muchirarama maererano nezvinodiwa nenyama, muchafa, asi kana muchirarama nomweya munouraya mabasa akaipa omuviri, uye muchararama, nokuti vaya vanotungamirirwa nomweya waallah ndivo vana vaallah. nokuti hamuna kugamuchira mweya wouranda kuti muitwezve varanda vokutya, asi makagamuchira mweya wokuitwa vana, uya watinodana naye tichiti, “abha, baba.” mweya amene anopupurirana nomweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaallah. zvino kana tiri vana, naizvozvo tiri vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naye kuitira kuti tigozokudzwawo pamwe chete nakristu, kana zvirokwazvo tichitambudzika pamwe chete naye kuitira kuti tigozokudzwawo pamwe chete naye. nokuti ndinoti matambudziko atinawo nguva ino haana kufanira kuenzaniswa nokubwinya kuchazoratidzwa kwatiri. nokuti zvisikwa zvinotarisira zvikuru zvichimirira kuratidzwa kwavanakomana vaallah. nokuti zvisikwa zvakaiswa pasi pokudzungaira kukuru, zvisingadi hazvo, asi nokuda kwaiye akazviisa pasi pokudzungaira, mutariro yokuti zvisikwa pachazvo zvichazosunungurwa kubva pauranda hwokuora uye zvigoiswa pakusunungurwa kwokubwinya kwavana vaallah. tinoziva kuti zvisikwa zvose zvinogomera sokurwadza kwokuzvara mwana kusvikira panguva ino. kwete izvozvo chete, asi nesuwo, vane zvibereko zvokutanga zvomweya, tinogomera mukati medu tichimirira zvikuru kuitwa kwedu vana, iko kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu. nokuti mutariro iyi takaponeswa. asi tariro inoonekwa haizi tariro zvachose. ndiani anotarisira chaanacho kare? asi kana tine tariro yechinhu chatisina, tinochimirira nokutsungirira. saizvozvowo, mweya anotibatsira mukusava nesimba kwedu. nokuti hatizivi zvatinofanira kunyengeterera, asi mweya amene anotinyengeterera nokugomera kusingatsananguriki namashoko. uye iye anonzvera mwoyo yedu anoziva kufunga kwamweya, nokuti mweya anonyengeterera vatsvene maererano nokuda kwaallah. uye tinoziva kuti muzvinhu zvose allah anoita kuti zviitire zvakanaka kuna avo vanomuda, vaya vakadanwa sezvaakafunga. nokuti avo allah vaakaziva kare, ndivo vaakatemerawo kare, kuti vafanane nomufananidzo womwanakomana wake, kuti agova dangwe pakati pehama dzake zhinji. uye vaya vaakatemera kare, ndivo vaakadanawo; vaya vaakadana, ndivo vaakaruramisirawo; vaya vaakaruramisira, ndivo vaakakudzawo. zvino tichatiiko pazvinhu izvi? kana allah ari kurutivi rwedu, ndiani angatirwisa? iye asina kuramba nomwanakomana wake, asi akamupa chose nokuda kwedu tose, angarega seiko kutipawo zvose, pamwe chete naye? ndianiko achapa mhosva avo vakasarudzwa naallah? allah ndiye anoruramisira. ndianiko achavapa mhosva? kristu yeahoshua, ndiye akafa pamusoro pezvo, ndiye akamutswa akava mupenyu, ari kurudyi rwaallah, uye anotinyengetererawo. ndianiko achatiparadzanisa norudo rwakristu? kutambudzika here, kana nhamo, kana kutambudzwa, kana nzara, kana kushayiwa zvokupfeka, kana njodzi, kana munondo? sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “nokuda kwenyu tinotarisana norufu zuva rose; tinoitwa samakwai anofanira kubayiwa.” kwete, pazvinhu zvose izvi tiri vakundi nokupfuurisa kubudikidza naiye akatida. nokuti ndinoziva kwazvo kuti kunyange rufu, kana upenyu, kana vatumwa, kana madhimoni, kana zvazvino, kana zvichauya, kana masimba api zvawo, kana kwakakwirira, kana kwakadzika, kana chimwe chinhuwo zvacho pazvisikwa zvose, hazvingagoni kutiparadzanisa norudo rwaallah, rwuri muna kristu yeahoshua ishe wedu.

9
