ndinotaura chokwadi muna kristu, handirevi nhema, hana yangu inondipupurira mumweya mutsvene ndino kusuwa kukuru kwazvo neshungu dzisingaperi mumwoyo mangu. nokuti ndinoshuva kuti dai ini pachangu ndaiva munhu akatukwa uye ndakaparadzaniswa nakristu nokuda kwehama dzangu, ivo vorudzi rwangu, ivo vanhu veisraeri. kuva vana ndokwavo; nokubwinya ndokwavo, nesungano, nokupiwa kwomurayiro, nokunamata allah mutemberi uye zvipikirwa ndezvavo. madzibaba ndeavo, uye nakristu akabva kwavari panyama, ari allah pamusoro pazvose, anokudzwa nokusingaperi! ameni. hazvirevi kuti shoko raallah rakakundikana. nokuti havasi vose vari zvizvarwa zvaisraeri vanova vaisraeri. uye nokuti zvavari vorudzi rwake, vose vana vaabhurahama. asi zvinonzi, “kuna isaka ndiko kuchatumidzwa rudzi rwako.” namamwe mashoko, havasi vana panyama vanova vana vaallah, asi vana vechipikirwa ndivo vanonzi vana vaabhurahama. nokuti aya ndiwo mashoko echipikirwa: “panguva yakatarwa ndichauya, uye sara achava nomwanakomana.” kwete izvozvo zvoga, asi kuti narabhekawo akava navana vomunhu mumwe uye baba vamwe, baba vedu isaka. asi mapatya asati azvarwa, vasati vaita chakanaka kana chakaipa, kuitira kuti kuda kwaallah pakusarudza kwake kusimbiswe, kwete nokuda kwamabasa asi nokuda kwake iye anodana, akaudzwa kuti, “mukuru achava muranda womuduku.” sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “yaqobho ndakamuda, asi esau ndakamuvenga.” zvino tichatiiko? allah haaruramisiri here? kwete napaduku! nokuti anoti kuna mozisi: “ndichanzwira ngoni wandichanzwira ngoni, uye ndichaitira tsitsi wandichaitira tsitsi.” naizvozvo, hazvibvi pashungu kana pamabasa omunhu, asi patsitsi dzaallah. nokuti rugwaro runoti kuna faro, “ndakakumutsira chikonzero ichochi, kuti ndiratidze simba rangu mauri uye kuti zita rangu rigoparidzwa panyika yose.” naizvozvo allah anonzwira ngoni waanoda kunzwira ngoni, uye anoomesa mwoyo wouyo waanoda kuomesa. mumwe wenyu angati kwandiri, “zvino sei allah achiramba achitipa mhosva? nokuti ndianiko acharamba kuda kwake?” zvino iwe munhu, ndiwe aniko, kuti upindure allah? “chakaumbwa chingati kune akachiumba, ‘wakandiitirei zvakadai?’ ” muumbi wehari haana simba pamusoro pevhu here, kuti nebundu rimwe chetero aite mimwe midziyo inokudzwa nemimwe midziyo isingakudzwi? ko, kana allah akasarudza kuratidza kutsamwa kwake, uye kuti azivise simba rake, akaita nomwoyo murefu zvikuru pamusoro pemidziyo yokutsamwira kwake, yakagadzirirwa kuparadzwa? kana akaita izvi kuti azivise kupfuma kwokubwinya kwake kumidziyo yengoni, avo vaakagadzirira kare kubwinya, kunyange isu, vaya vaakadana, kwete kubva kuvayeahudha chete asi nokubva kune vedzimwe ndudziwo? sezvaanotaura mubhuku rahosea achiti: “ndichavati ‘vanhu vangu’ vaya vakanga vasiri vanhu vangu; uye ndichamuti, ‘mudikanwi wangu’ iye akanga asiri mudikanwi wangu,” uye, zvichaitika kuti paya painzi kwavari, “hamusi vanhu vangu; vachanzi ‘vanakomana vaallah mupenyu.’ ” uye isaya anodanidzira pamusoro peisraeri, achiti: “kunyange kuwanda kwavaisraeri kwakaita sejecha regungwa, vakasara chete ndivo vachaponeswa. nokuti ishe achaisa mutongo wake panyika nokukurumidza uye achaupedzisa.” zvakaita sezvakarehwa kare naisaya achiti: “dai asiri yeahoh wamasimba ose akatisiyira zvizvarwa, tingadai takaita sesodhomu tingadai takaita segomora.” zvino tichatiiko? tichati vedzimwe ndudzi vasina kutsvaka kururama, ndivo vakakuwana, iko kururama kwokutenda; asi vaisraeri vakatevera murayiro wokurarama, havana kukuwana. seiko zvakadaro? nokuti havana kuutevera nokutenda asi sokunge namabasa avo. vakagumburwa neibwe “rinogumbusa.” sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “tarira, ndinoisa pazioni ibwe rinogumbusa kuvanhu, nedombo rinovapinganidza kuti vawe, uye uyo anotenda kwaari haazonyadziswi.”

10

hama, kuda kwomwoyo wangu nokunyengetera kwangu kuna allah pamusoro pavaisraeri ndekwokuti vaponeswe. nokuti ndinovapupurira kuti vanoshingairira allah, asi kushingairira kwavo havakuiti nokuziva. nokuti, sezvo vakanga vasingazivi kururama kunobva kuna allah uye vakatsvaka kumisa kururama kwavo pachavo, havana kuzviisa pasi pokururama kwaallah. nokuti kristu ndiye mugumo womurayiro, kuitira kuti mumwe nomumwe anotenda aruramiswe. mozisi anonyora pamusoro pokururama kwomurayiro, achiti, “munhu anoita zvinhu izvi achararamiswa nazvo.” asi kururama kunobva pakutenda kunoreva kudai, “usati mumwoyo mako, ‘ndianiko achakwira kudenga’ (ndiko kuburutsa kristu) kana, kuti, ‘ndianiko achaburukira kwakadzika?’ (ndiko, kubudisa kristu kubva kuvakafa).” asi iwo unoti chiiko? “shoko riri pedyo newe, mumuromo mako uye nomumwoyo mako,” ndiro shoko rokutenda ratinoparidza: kuti kana ukapupura nomuromo wako kuti, “yeahoshua ndiye ishe” uye ukatenda mumwoyo mako kuti allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uchaponeswa. nokuti unotenda nomwoyo wako ugoruramisirwa, uye unopupura nomuromo wako ugoponeswa. sezvinorehwa norugwaro ruchiti: “ani naani anotenda kwaari haanganyadziswi.” nokuti hapana musiyano pakati pomuyeahudha nowedzimwe ndudzi, nokuti ishe mumwe ndiye ishe wavose uye anovaropafadza kwazvo vose vanodana kwaari, nokuti “ani naani anodana kuzita rashe achaponeswa.” zvino, vachagodana seiko kuna iye wavasina kutenda kwaari? uye vangatenda sei kuna iye wavasina kumbonzwa? vanganzwa seiko kana kusina anovaparidzira? uye vangaparidza seiko kana vasina kutumwa? sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “dzakanaka sei tsoka dzavanouya namashoko akanaka!” asi havasi vaisraeri vose vakagamuchira mashoko akanaka. nokuti isaya anoti, “ishe, ndianiko akatenda zvatakaparidza?” naizvozvo, kutenda kunouya nokunzwa, uye kunzwa neshoko rakristu. asi ndinobvunza kuti: havana kunzwa here? zvirokwazvo vakanzwa, nokuti: “inzwi ravo rakasvika kunyika yose, namashoko avo kumigumo yenyika.” ndinobvunzazve kuti: israeri haina kunzwa here? pakutanga mozisi anoti, “ndichamutsa godo renyu norudzi rusati rwuri rudzi; ndichamutsa kutsamwa kwenyu norudzi rusinganzwisisi.” uye isaya, asingatyi anoti, “ndakawanikwa navasina kunditsvaka; ndakazviratidza kuna vaya vasina kunditsvaka.” asi pamusoro peisraeri anoti, “zuva rose ndakatambanudza maoko angu kuvanhu vasingateereri, uye vanokakavara.”

11

zvino ndinobvunza ndichiti: allah akarasa vanhu vake here? kwete napaduku pose! nokuti ini pachangu ndiri muisraeri, chizvarwa chaabhurahama, ndiri worudzi rwabhenjamini. allah haana kurasa vanhu vake, avo vaakaziva pakutanga. hamuzivi here zvinorehwa norugwaro pandima inotaura nezvaeria, kuti akakumbira sei kuna allah pamusoro peisraeri achiti, “ishe vakauraya vaprofita venyu uye vakaputsa aritari dzenyu; ndini ndoga ndasara, uye vari kuedza kundiuraya”? uye allah akamupindura achiti kudiniko? “ndakazvichengetera varume zviuru zvinomwe vasina kupfugamira bhaari.” saizvozvowo, panguva ino varipo vakasara, vakasanangurwa nenyasha. uye kana zvava zvenyasha, saka hazvichisiri zvamabasa; kana dai zvaiva zvakadaro, nyasha hadzaizova nyasha. zvino tichatiiko? zvakatsvakwa navaisraeri nokushingaira havana kuzviwana, asi vasanangurwa ndivo vakazviwana. vamwe vakaomeswa mwoyo, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “allah akavapa mweya wehope, meso kuti vasaona, nzeve kuitira kuti vasanzwa, kusvikira nanhasi uno.” uye dhavhidhi anoti: “tafura yavo ngaive musungo neriva, nechigumbuso uye nechinotsiva kwavari. meso avo ngaasvibirwe kuti vasaona; uye mukotamise misana yavo nokusingaperi.” zvakare ndinobvunza ndichiti: ko, vakagumbuswa vakawa zvokusazomukazve here? kwete napaduku pose! asi kuti nokuwa kwavo ruponeso rwakauya kune vedzimwe ndudzi kuti israeri ive negodo. zvino kana kudarika kwavo kuchipfumisa nyika, uye kurasikirwa kwavo kuchireva pfuma kune vedzimwe ndudzi, kuzara kwavo kuchauyisa pfuma yakakura zvakadii! ndiri kutaura kwamuri imi vedzimwe ndudzi. sezvandiri mupostori wevedzimwe ndudzi, ndinokudza ushumiri hwangu netariro yokuti zvimwe ndingamutsa godo kuvanhu vangu uye ndiponese vamwe vavo. nokuti kana kuraswa kwavo kuri kuyananiswa kwenyika, ko, kugamuchirwa kwavo kuchagoveiko, asi upenyu kubva kurufu? zvino kana chikamu chechikanyiwa chakapiwa sechibereko chokutanga chiri chitsvene, saka chikanyiwa chose chitsvene; kana mudzi uri mutsvene namatavi acho akadarowo. kana mamwe matavi akavhuniwa, uye imi, kunyange muri muorivhi wokudondo, wakabatanidzwa pakati pamamwe, zvino mava nomugove pamwe chete nawo kubva pamudzi womuorivhi, musazvikudza pamusoro pamatavi ayo. kana muchizvikudza murangarire izvi: hamuzimi makatakura mudzi, asi kuti mudzi ndiwo wakakutakurai. zvino iwe uchati, “matavi akavhuniwa kuti ini ndibatanidzwe.” ndizvozvo. asi akavhuniwa nokuda kwokusatenda, uye iwe unomira nokutenda kwako. usazvikudza, asi uve nokutya. nokuti kana allah asina kurega matavi okutanga, haangakuregi newewo. naizvozvo nyatsofunga pamusoro pounyoro nokukasharara kwaallah; kukasharara kuna vakawa, asi unyoro kwauri, kana ukaramba uchifamba muunyoro hwake. kana zvikasadaro newewo uchatemwa. uye kana vakasarambirira pakusatenda, vachabatanidzwa, nokuti allah anogona kuvabatanidza zvakare. nokuti, kana iwe wakatemwa kubva pamuorivhi womumunda pakusikwa kwawo, uye ukabatanidzwa pamuorivhi womumunda zvichipesana namasikirwo azvo, ko, kuzoti ayo agara ari epo achazofara sei kuti abatanidzwezve mumuti wawo womuorivhi? hama dzangu, handidi kuti musaziva, chakavanzika ichi, kuti murege kuva namanyawi: vaisraeri vakaomeswa mwoyo kusvikira vedzimwe ndudzi vakakwana vapinda. naizvozvo israeri yose ichaponeswa, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “pazioni pachabuda musununguri; achabvisa kusada allah kuna yaqobho. uye iyi ndiyo sungano yangu navo kana ndabvisa zvivi zvavo.” kana zviri zvevhangeri, ivo vavengi nokuda kwenyu; asi kana kuri kusanangurwa, vadikanwi nokuda kwamadzibaba, nokuti zvipo zvaallah nokudana kwake hazvishandurwi. nokuti sezvo imi makanga musingateereri allah pane imwe nguva magamuchira ngoni zvino nokuda kwokusateerera kwavo, saizvozvo naivowo zvino havachateereri kuitira kuti vagamuchire ngoni nokuda kwengoni dzaallah kwamuri. nokuti allah akapfigira vanhu vose pakusateerera kwavo, kuti avanzwire ngoni vose. haiwa, udzamu hwokupfuma kwouchenjeri noruzivo rwaallah! kutonga kwake hakunganzverwi, uye makwara ake haangarondwi! “ndianiko akaziva pfungwa dzashe? kana akava mupi wake wamazano?” “ndianiko akambopa kuna allah kuti allah angamuripirazve?” nokuti zvose zvinobva kwaari uye zviripo kubudikidza naye uye zvose ndezvake. ngaave nokubwinya nokusingaperi! ameni.

12

naizvozvo, ndinokumbira zvikuru kwamuri, hama dzangu, netsitsi dzaallah, kuti mupe miviri yenyu sechibayiro chipenyu, chitsvene uye chinofadza allah, uku ndiko kunamata kwenyu kwomweya. musaramba muchizvienzanisa namaitiro enyika ino, asi mushandurwe nokuvandudzwa kwepfungwa dzenyu. ipapo muchakwanisa kuti muedze uye mugoziva kuti kuda kwaallah ndokupi, kuda kwake kwakanaka, kunomufadza uye kwakakwana. nokuti nenyasha dzandakapiwa ndinoti kuno mumwe nomumwe wenyu: usazviisa pamusoro kupfuura paunofanira kunge uri, asi ufunge nokufunga kwakachenjera, maererano nechiyero chokutenda chawakapiwa naallah. nokuti sezvatino muviri mumwe une mitezo mizhinji, uye mitezo iyi yose haina basa rimwe chete, saizvozvowo muna kristu isu tiri vazhinji, tinoumba muviri mumwe chete, uye mutezo mumwe nomumwe mutezo wavamwe. tine zvipo zvakasiyana-siyana, maererano nepatakapiwa napo nyasha. kana chipo chomunhu kuri kuprofita, ngaachishandise maererano nokutenda kwake. kana kuri kushumira ngaashumire; kana kuri kudzidzisa, ngaadzidzise; kana kuri kukurudzira, ngaakurudzire; kana kuri kupa kuna vanoshayiwa, ngaape nomwoyo wose; kana kuri kutungamirira, ngaabate nokushingaira; kana kuri kunzwira ngoni, ngaaite nomufaro. rudo ngaruve rwechokwadi. vengai zvakaipa; namatirai pane zvakanaka. ivai norudo rukuru mumwe kuno mumwe savadikani. mumwe nomumwe wenyu ngaakudze mumwe kupfuura kuzvikudza kwaanozviita iye. musatomborega kushingaira, asi pisai pamweya, muchishumira ishe. farai mutariro, tsungirirai pakutambudzika, rambai muchinyengetera. goveranai navanhu vaallah vanoshayiwa. itirai vaeni rudo. ropafadzai vanokutambudzai; ropafadzai musatuka. farai navanofara; chemai navanochema. garai zvakanaka mumwe nomumwe. musazvikudza, asi muve nechido chokufambidzana navanhu vapasi pasi. musazviita vakachenjera. musatsiva munhu chakaipa nechakaipa. chenjererai kuti muite zvakanaka pamberi pavanhu vose. kana zvichibvira, napamunogona napo, ivai norugare navanhu vose. musatsiva, vadikani vangu, asi siyirai kutsamwa kwaallah mukana, nokuti kwanyorwa kuchinzi, “kutsiva ndokwangu; ini ndicharipira,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. asi: “kana muvengi wako ane nzara mupe zvokudya, kane ane nyota mupe chokunwa. mukuita izvi, uchatutira mazimbe anopisa pamusoro wake.” usakundwa nezvakaipa, asi ukunde zvakaipa nezvakanaka.

13

munhu wose anofanira kuzviisa pasi pavatungamiri venyika, nokuti hakuna simba risina kubva kuna allah. vane simba rokutonga vakaiswapo naallah. saka naizvozvo, anoramba kuteerera vari kutonga, ari kumukira zvakaiswapo naallah, uye vanoita izvi vanozvitsvagira kutongwa. nokuti vatongi havatyisi vaya vanoita zvakanaka, asi vanotyisa vaya vanoita zvakaipa. unoda kusunungurwa here kuti usatya ane simba rokutonga? ipapo ita zvakanaka uye achakurumbidza. nokuti iye muranda waallah anofanira kuti akuitire zvakanaka. asi kana ukaita zvakaipa, itya, nokuti iye haabati munondo pasina. nokuti iye ndiye muranda waallah, mutumwa wokutsamwa, anoranga vaiti vezvakaipa. naizvozvo, zvinokosha kuzviisa pasi pavabati, kwete nokuti tinotya kurangwa chete, asi nokuda kwehanawo. ndokusaka muchiripawo mitero, nokuti vabati varanda vaallah, vanopa nguva yavo yose pakutonga. ripirai vose vamunofanira kuripira: kana uri mutero, ripai mutero; kana iri miripo, ngairipwe, kana kuri kutya, kuna vanofanira kutyiwa, kana rwuri rukudzo, kuna vanofanira kukudzwa. musava nechikwereti kumunhu, kunze kwechikwereti chorudo mumwe kuno mumwe, nokuti anoda mumwe azadzisa murayiro. nokuti mirayiro inoti, “usaita upombwe,” “usauraya,” “usaba”, “usachiva,” uye kana mumwe murayiro upi noupi zvawo ungavako, zvakaunganidzwa pamutemo unoti, “ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe.” rudo haruitiri muvakidzani zvakaipa. naizvozvo rudo runozadzisa murayiro. uye itai izvi, muchinzwisisa nguva ino. nguva yasvika zvino yokuti mupepuke kubva kuhope, nokuti ruponeso rwedu rwava pedyo zvino kupfuura zuva ratakatanga kutenda. usiku hwava kutopfuura; kwava kutoedza. saka ngatirasei mabasa edu erima uye tipfeke nhumbi dzokurwa dzechiedza. ngatiraramei zvakafanira mararamiro apamasikati, tisingaiti kutamba kwakaipa uye nokudhakwa, kana upombwe, kana utere, kana gakava kana godo. asi pfekai ishe yeahoshua kristu, uye musatsvaka kufadza nyama pakuchiva kwayo.

14

mugamuchire uyo asina kusimba pakutenda kwake, musingamutongi kana kuita gakava naye pamusoro penyaya dzisingapindirani. kutenda kwomumwe kunomutendera kudya zvose, asi mumwe munhu ano kutenda kusina kusimba, anodya muriwo bedzi. munhu anodya zvose ngaarege kuzvidza asingadyi, uye munhu asingadyi zvose ngaarege kupa mhosva munhu anodya, nokuti allah akamugamuchira. iwe ndiwe aniko unopa muranda womumwe mhosva? iye anomira kana kuti anowa pamberi patenzi wake. uye achamira, nokuti ishe anokwanisa kuita kuti amire. mumwe munhu anokoshesa rimwe zuva kupfuura rimwe: mumwe munhu anoti mazuva ose akafanana. mumwe nomumwe ngaazvizivire kwazvo mumwoyo make. uyo anokoshesa zuva rimwe, anozviitira ishe. uyo anodya nyama, anodya nokuda kwashe, nokuti anovonga allah; uye naiye anorega kudya, anorega nokuda kwashe, uye anovonga allah. nokuti hakuna mumwe wedu anozviraramira pachake, uye hakuna mumwe wedu anozvifira iye pachake. kana tichirarama, tinoraramira ishe; uye kana tichifa tinofira ishe. saka, kana tichirarama kana kufa tiri vashe. nokuda kwaizvozvo, kristu akafa uye akamuka kuti ave ishe wavose vakafa navapenyu. naizvozvo, iwe, unopireiko hama yako mhosva? kana newewo unozvidzireiko hama yako? nokuti tose tichamira pamberi pechigaro chokutonga chaallah. “nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “ ‘zvirokwazo noupenyu hwangu,’ ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, ‘ibvi rimwe nerimwe richapfugama pamberi pangu; rurimi rumwe norumwe ruchareurura kuna allah.’ ” saka, naizvozvo mumwe nomumwe wedu achazvidavirira kuna allah. naizvozvo ngatiregei kuramba tichipana mhosva. asi munhu ngaarege kuisa chigumbuso kana chipinganidzo munzira yehama yake. somunhu ari muna ishe yeahoshua, ndinoziva kwazvo kuti hakuna chokudya chine tsvina. asi kana mumwe munhu akati chakasvibiswa, naizvozvo hachina kuchena kwaari. kana hama yako ichikanganiswa nokuda kwezvaunodya, iwe hauchafambi murudo. usaparadza hama yako, iyo yakafirwa nakristu, nokuda kwezvokudya. usatendera kuti zvaunoti zvakanaka zvinzi zvakaipa. nokuti umambo hwaallah hahuzi zvokudya kana zvokunwa, asi kururama norugare uye nomufaro mumweya mutsvene, nokuti ani naani anoshumira kristu nenzira iyi anofadza allah, uye anotendwa navanhu. naizvozvo ngatishingairirei kutsvaga izvo zvinouyisa rugare uye zvatingasimbisana nazvo. musaparadza basa raallah nokuda kwezvokudya. zvokudya zvose zvakachena, asi hazvina kunaka kuti munhu adye chinhu chipi zvacho chingagumbusa mumwe munhu. zviri nani kusadya nyama kana kusanwa waini kana kusaita chimwe chinhu chinoita kuti hama yako iwe. saka zvose zvaunotenda pamusoro pezvinhu izvi ngazvive pakati pako naallah. akaropafadzwa munhu asingazvipi mhosva pazvinhu zvaanotenda. asi munhu anonyunyuta ava nemhosva kana akadya nokuti kudya kwake hakusi kwokutenda; uye zvinhu zvose zvisingabvi pakutenda chivi.

15

isu tine simba tinofanira kutakura kukundikana kwavasina simba uye tisingazvifadzi. mumwe nomumwe wedu anofanira kufadza muvakidzani wake pane zvakanaka, zvinomuvaka. nokuti kunyange kristu haana kuzvifadza asi, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi, “kutuka kwaavo vakakutuka kwakawira pamusoro pangu.” nokuti zvose zvakanyorwa kare zvakanyorerwa kuti zvidzidzise isu, kuitira kuti, kubudikidza nokutsungirira nokukurudzira kwamagwaro, tive netariro. allah anopa kutsungirira nokukurudzira ngaakupei mweya wokuva nomwoyo mumwe pakati penyu pamunenge muchitevera kristu yeahoshua, kuti mukudze allah nababa waishe wedu yeahoshua kristu nomwoyo mumwe uye nomuromo mumwe. naizvozvo, gamuchiranai, sezvamakagamuchirwa nakristu, kuti allah arumbidzwe. nokuti ndinoti kwamuri kristu akava muranda wavayeahudha akamirira zvokwadi yaallah, kuti asimbise zvakapikirwa madzibaba kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vakudze allah nokuda kwengoni dzake, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “naizvozvo ndichakurumbidzai pakati pevedzimwe ndudzi; ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo.” uyezve zvinonzi, “farai imi vedzimwe ndudzi, pamwe chete navanhu vake.” uyezve, “rumbidzai ishe, imi mose vedzimwe ndudzi, uye muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi marudzi ose.” uyezve, isaya anoti, “mudzi wajese uchatunga, iye achamuka kuzotonga pamusoro pendudzi dzose; vedzimwe ndudzi vachava netariro maari.” allah wetariro ngaakuzadzei nomufaro wose norugare pamunovimba naye, kuti muve netariro izere, nesimba ramweya mutsvene. ini pachangu ndinoziva kwazvo, hama dzangu, kuti imi pachenyu muzere nokunaka, makakwana muruzivo uye munogona kudzidzisana. ndakunyorerai nokushinga kwazvo pamusoro pezvimwe zvinhu, sendinokuyeuchidzai zvakare, nokuda kwenyasha dzandakapiwa naallah kuti ndive mushumiri wakristu yeahoshua kune vedzimwe ndudzi, ane basa rouprista rokuparidza vhangeri raallah, kuitira kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vagova chipiriso chinogamuchirwa kuna allah, chakanatswa namweya mutsvene. naizvozvo ndinozvirumbidza muna kristu yeahoshua muushumiri hwangu kuna allah. nokuti handingatauri zvimwe zvinhu kunze kwezvinhu zvakaitwa nakristu kubudikidza neni mukutungamirira vedzimwe ndudzi kuti vateerere allah nokuda kwezvandakataura uye ndikaita, nesimba rezviratidzo nezvishamiso, kubudikidza nesimba romweya. saka kubva kujerusarema kusvika kwose kunyika yakapoteredza, kusvikira kuirikumi, ndakaparidza kwazvo vhangeri rakristu. chagara chiri chishuwo changu kuti ndiparidze vhangeri kunzvimbo dzisati dzaziva kristu, kuti ndisavaka pamusoro penheyo dzomumwe munhu. asi sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “avo, vakanga vasina kuudzwa nezvake vachaona, uye naivo vasina kunzwa vachanzwisisa.” ndokusaka ndakadziviswa kazhinji kuuya kwamuri. asi zvino hapasisinazve imwe nzvimbo yandingashanda mumatunhu aya, uye sezvo pava namakore mazhinji ndichida kuuya kwamuri, ndine urongwa hwokuita izvi pandichaenda kusipeini. ndinovimba kuti ndichakushanyirai pandichapfuura noko uye kuti muzondibatsira parwendo rwangu ikoko, mushure mokunge ndambofadzwa nokuva nemi kwechinguva. asi, zvino ndiri parwendo rwangu rwokuenda kujerusarema kundoshumira vatsvene variko. nokuti vemasedhonia neveakaya vakafadzwa kuti vagovane navarombo pakati pavatsvene vari mujerusarema. nokuti vakaona zvakanaka kuti vaite izvi, uye zvirokwazvo vane ngava kuti vavaitire izvi. nokuti kana vedzimwe ndudzi vakagovanawo pazvinhu zvomweya zvavayeahudha, vane ngavawo kuvayeahudha kuti vagoverane navo pazvinhu zvavo zvenyika ino. saka mushure mokunge ndapedza kuita basa iri uye ndaona kuti vagamuchira chibereko ichi, ndichaenda kusipeini uye ndichakushanyirai parwendo rwangu. ndinoziva kuti pandichauya kwamuri, ndichauya nokuropafadza kwakazara kwakristu. ndinokukumbirai zvikuru, hama dzangu, nashe wedu yeahoshua kristu uye norudo rwomweya, kuti murwe pamwe chete neni nokundinyengeterera kuna allah. nyengeterai kuti ndinunurwe kune vasingatendi vari mujudhea uye kuti ushumiri hwangu mujerusarema hugamuchirwe navatsvene variko, kuti ndiuye kwamuri nomufaro nokuda kwaallah uye kuti ndimutsiridzwe pamwe chete nemi. allah worugare ngaave nemi mose. ameni.

16

ndinoreverera kwamuri hanzvadzi yedu febhi, muranda wekereke iri paseniseria. ndinokukumbirai kuti mumugamuchire muna she sezvinofanira vatsvene uye mumubatsire pazvinhu zvose zvaangashayiwa, nokuti akabatsira zvikuru vanhu vazhinji, kusanganisira neniwo. kwazisai pirisira naakwira, vanobata neni muna kristu yeahoshua. vakaisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi nokuda kwangu. kwete ini ndoga asi kuti nekereke dzose dzavahedheni dzinovatenda zvikuru. kwazisaiwo kereke inosangana mumba mavo. kwazisai epenetasi mudikani wangu, ndiye akava chibereko changu chokutanga muna kristu munyika yeezhia. kwazisai miriamu, akakushandirai kwazvo. kwazisai adhironikasi najuniasi, hama dzangu vakanga vari mutorongo pamwe chete neni. vakakurumbira pakati pavapostori, uye vakanditangirawo kuva muna kristu. kwazisai amupiratasi, uyo wandinoda muna she. kwazisai uribhanusi, anobata nesu muna kristu, uye nasitakisi mudikani wangu. kwazisai aperesi, akaedzwa uye akaonekwa akakwana muna kristu. kwazisai vemhuri yokwaaristobhurusi. kwazisai herodhioni, hama yangu. kwazisai vari mumhuri yokwanakisasi vari muna she. kwazisai tirifena natirifosa, vakadzi vanobata nesimba muna she. kwazisai mudikani wangu wepamwoyo perisisi, mumwe mukadzi anobata nesimba muna she. kwazisai rufusi, akasanangurwa muna she uye namai vake, vakanga vari mai vanguwo. kwazisai asingiritasi, naferegoni, naherimesi, napatirobhasi, naherimasi, uye nehama dzavanadzo. kwazisai firorogasi najuria, nanerea nehanzvadzi yake naorimbasi uye navatsvene vose vavanavo. kwazisanai nokutsvodana kutsvene. kereke dzose dzakristu dzinokukwazisai. ndinokukumbirai zvikuru, hama dzangu, kuti muchenjerere vaya vanopesanisa uye vanoisa zvigumbuso pamberi penyu vanopikisana nedzidziso yamakadzidza imi. muve kure navo. nokuti vanhu vakadaro havasi kushumira ishe wedu kristu, asi dumbu ravo. nokutaura kwakanaka uye nokubata kumeso, vanonyengera vanhu vane pfungwa dzisina uchenjeri. vanhu vakanzwa zvokuteerera kwenyu, naizvozvo ndine mufaro mukuru pamusoro penyu; asi ndinoda kuti muve vakachenjera pane zvakanaka, uye muve vasina chavanopomerwa pane zvakaipa. allah worugare achakurumidza kupwanya satani pasi petsoka dzenyu. nyasha dzaishe wedu yeahoshua ngadzive nemi. timoti, anobata neni, anokukwazisai, sezvinoita rusiasi najasoni nasosipata, hama dzangu. ini teritiasi, ndanyora tsamba iyi ndinokukwazisai muna she. gayasi, uyo akandigamuchira ini nekereke yose iri kuno, anokukwazisai. erastasi mubati wehomwe yemari yeguta nehama yedu kwatosi vanokukwazisai. nyasha dzaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu ngadzive nemi mose. ameni. zvino kuna iye anogona kukusimbisai nevhangeri rangu, uye nokuparidzwa kwayeahoshua kristu, maererano nokuzarurwa kwechakanga chakavanzika kwamakore namakore akapfuura, asi zvino chakaratidzwa uye chikaziviswa kubudikidza nezvinyorwa zvavaprofita nokurayira kwaallah anogara nokusingaperi, kuti ndudzi dzose dzigomuteerera uye dzimutende, kuna iye oga allah akachenjera ngakuve nokubwinya nokusingaperi kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu. ameni.

1_corinthians

1

pauro, akadanwa nokuda kwaallah, kuti ave mupostori wakristu yeahoshua, nasositeni hama yedu, kukereke yaallah iri mukorinde, kuna vaya vakaitwa vatsvene muna kristu yeahoshua uye vakadanwa kuti vave vatsvene pamwe chete navose vari kwose kwose vanodana kuzita raishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, ishe wavo nowedu: nyasha norugare ngazvive nemi zvinobva kuna allah baba vedu nashe yeahoshua kristu. ndinogara ndichivonga allah nguva dzose nokuda kwenyasha dzake pamusoro penyu muna kristu yeahoshua. nokuti maari makapfumiswa pazvinhu zvose, mukutaura kwenyu kwose uye nomuruzivo rwenyu rwose, nokuti uchapupu hwedu pamusoro pakristu hwakasimbiswa mamuri. naizvozvo hapana kana chipo chomweya chamunoshayiwa pamunomirira nomwoyo wose kuratidzwa kwaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. achakusimbisai kusvikira kumagumo, kuti murege kuva nechamungapomerwa pazuva raishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. allah, iye akakudanai kuti muwadzane nomwanakomana wake yeahoshua kristu ishe wedu, akatendeka. ndinokukumbirai zvikuru, hama, muzita raishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, kuti imi mose mutaure chinhu chimwe, kuti pakati penyu parege kuva nokupesana uye kuti mubatanidzwe zvakanaka pamurangariro mumwe nomukufunga. hama dzangu, vamwe venyu vokwakirowe vakandiudza kuti pane gakava pakati penyu. zvandinoreva ndezvokuti: mumwe wenyu anoti, “ini ndiri wapauro,” mumwe oti, “ini ndiri waaporosi,” mumwewo oti, “ini ndiri wakefasi,” mumwe zvakare oti, “ini ndiri wakristu.” kristu akaparadzaniswa here? pauro akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwenyu here? makabhabhatidzwa muzita rapauro here? ndinovonga allah kuti handina kubhabhatidza kana mumwe wenyu, kunze kwakrispo nagayo, kuti kurege kuva nomumwe wenyu anoti akabhabhatidzwa muzita rangu. hongu, ndakabhabhatidzawo veimba yastefanasi; kunze kwaivavo, handirangariri kana ndakabhabhatidzazve mumwe munhu. nokuti kristu haana kundituma kuti ndinobhabhatidza asi kuti ndinoparidza vhangeri, kwete namashoko ouchenjeri hwavanhu, kuti muchinjikwa wakristu urege kupedzwa simba rawo. nokuti shoko romuchinjikwa upenzi kuna vari kuparara, asi kwatiri isu vanoponeswa isimba raallah. nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “ndichaparadza uchenjeri hwavakachenjera; ndichakonesa kuziva kwavanoziva.” akachenjera aripiko? akadzidza aripiko? muiti wenharo wenguva ino aripiko? ko, allah haana kuita uchenjeri hwenyika ino upenzi here? nokuti muuchenjeri hwaallah, nyika kubudikidza nouchenjeri hwayo, haina kumuziva, allah akafadzwa nazvo kuti vanotenda avaponese kubudikidza noupenzi hwezvakaparidzwa. vayeahudha vanoda zviratidzo uye vagiriki vanotsvaka uchenjeri, asi isu tinoparidza kristu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, chigumbuso kuvayeahudha noupenzi kune vedzimwe ndudzi. asi kuna avo vakadanwa naallah, zvose vayeahudha navagiriki, kristu isimba raallah nouchenjeri hwaallah. nokuti upenzi hwaallah hwakachenjera kupfuura uchenjeri hwomunhu, uye utera hwaallah hwakasimba kupfuura simba romunhu. hama dzangu, rangarirai zvamakanga muri pamakadanwa. havazi vazhinji venyu vaiva namasimba; havasi vazhinji vaikudzwa pakuzvarwa kwavo. asi allah akasarudza zvinhu zvoupenzi zvenyika ino kuti anyadzise vakachenjera; allah akasarudza zvisina simba zvenyika ino kuti anyadzise vane simba. akasarudza zvinhu zvepasi pasi zvenyika ino uye zvakazvidzwa, nezvinhu zvisipo, kuti ashayise simba zvinhu zviripo, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu angazvikudza pamberi pake. nokuda kwake, imi muri muna kristu yeahoshua, uyo akava kwatiri uchenjeri hunobva kuna allah, iko kururama, noutsvene uye norudzikinuro rwedu. naizvozvo, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi, “anozvikudza ngaazvikudze muna she.”

2

pandakauya kwamuri, hama, handina kuuya nokugona kutaura kana uchenjeri hwapamusoro, pandakaparidza kwamuri uchapupu hwezvaallah. nokuti ndakati handidi kuziva chinhu pandakanga ndiri pakati penyu, asi yeahoshua kristu, uye akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. ndakauya kwamuri muutera nokutya uye nokudedera kukuru. shoko rangu nokuparidza kwangu zvakanga zvisina mashoko okugombedzera nouchenjeri, asi nokuratidza kwesimba ramweya, kuti kutenda kwenyu kurege kuva kwouchenjeri hwavanhu, asi kuve kwesimba raallah. zvisinei, tinotaura mashoko ouchenjeri pakati pavanhu vakura, asi kwete uchenjeri hwenyika ino, kana hwavabati venyika ino vachashayiwa simba. kwete, tinotaura uchenjeri hwaallah hwakavanzika, uchenjeri hwakanga hwakafukidzwa uye hwakatemerwa kubwinya kwedu naallah nyika isati yavapo. hakuna kana nomumwe wavabati venyika ino akahunzwisisa, nokuti dai vakahunzwisisa vangadai vasina kuroverera ishe wokubwinya pamuchinjikwa. asi sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “hakuna ziso rakaona, hakuna nzeve yakanzwa; hakuna zvakapinda mumurangariro womunhu, zvakagadzirirwa naallah vaya vanomuda.” asi allah akazviratidza kwatiri isu nomweya wake. mweya anonzvera zvinhu zvose, kunyange nezvakadzika zvaallah. nokuti ndianiko pakati pavanhu anoziva ndangariro dzomunhu kunze kwomweya womunhu uri mukati make? saizvozvowo hakuna munhu anoziva ndangariro dzaallah kunze kwomweya waallah. hatina kugamuchira mweya wenyika ino asi mweya unobva kuna allah; kuti tinzwisise zvatakapiwa naallah pachena. izvi ndizvo zvatinotaura, tisingatauri namashoko atinodzidziswa nouchenjeri hwavanhu, asi namashoko atinodzidziswa namweya, tichidudzira zvokwadi zvomweya namashoko omweya. munhu asina mweya haangagamuchiri zvinhu zvinobva kumweya waallah, nokuti zvinonzwisisika nomweya. munhu ari mumweya anonzwisisa zvinhu zvose, asi iye pachake haanganzwisiswi nomunhu: “nokuti, ndianiko akaziva murangariro washe kuti amudzidzise?” asi isu tino murangariro wakristu.

3

hama, ndakanga ndisingagoni kutaura nemi savanhu vomweya asi savanhu venyama, vacheche zvavo muna kristu. ndakakupai mukaka, kwete zvokudya zvikukutu, nokuti makanga musingagoni kudya. zvirokwazvo, hamusati mava kugona kudya nazvino. nokuti muchiri venyama. nokuti sezvo pakati penyu pachine godo negakava, ko, hamusi venyika here? ko, hamusi kufamba savanhuwo zvavo here? nokuti kana mumwe achiti, “ini ndiri wapauro,” mumwe achiti, “ini ndiri waaporosi,” ko, hamusi vanhuwo zvavo here? aporosi chiiko? uye pauro chiiko? varanda bedzi; vamakatenda kubudikidza navo mumwe nomumwe sezvaakapiwa nashe. ini ndakasima, aporosi akadiridza, asi allah ndiye akameresa. saka naizvozvo anosima kana anodiridza haazi chinhu, asi allah chete, iye anomeresa zvinhu. munhu anosima nomunhu anodiridza vane chinangwa chimwe, uye mumwe nomumwe wavo achapiwa mubayiro maererano nezvaakabata pabasa rake. nokuti tiri vabati pamwe chete naallah; muri munda waallah, muri imba yaallah. nenyasha dzandakapiwa naallah, ndakaronga nheyo somuvaki akachenjera, uye mumwewo ari kuvaka pamusoro payo. asi mumwe nomumwe ngaachenjere kuti anovaka sei pamusoro payo. nokuti hakuna mumwe angaronga dzimwe nheyo kunze kwaiyo yakarongwa kare, inova ndiyo yeahoshua kristu. zvino kana munhu achivaka panheyo iyi achishandisa goridhe, kana sirivha kana mabwe anokosha, kana matanda, kana uswa, kana mashanga, basa rake richaonekwa kuti rakaitwa nei, nokuti zuva iro richazvibudisa pachena. richaratidzwa nomoto, uye moto uchaedza basa romumwe nomumwe. kana zvaakavaka zvikagara, iye achagamuchira mubayiro wake. kana zvikapiswa, iye acharasikirwa: asi iye pachake achaponeswa: asi souya abuda mumoto. ko, hamuzivi here kuti muri temberi yaallah uye kuti mweya waallah anogara mamuri? kana munhu achiparadza temberi yaallah, allah achamuparadza; nokuti temberi yaallah itsvene, ndimi temberi yacho. musazvinyengera. kana mumwe wenyu achizviti akachenjera namaonero enyika ino, ngaave “benzi” kuti ave akachenjera. nokuti uchenjeri hwenyika ino upenzi pamberi paallah. sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “anobata vakachenjera pamano avo,” uye zvakare, “ishe anoziva kuti mifungo yavakachenjera haina maturo.” naizvozvo ngakurege kuva nomunhu anozvikudza pamusoro pavanhu! zvinhu zvose ndezvenyu, angava pauro kana aporosi, kana kefasi, kana nyika, kana upenyu, kana rufu, kana zvazvino, kana zvinouya, zvose ndezvenyu, uye muri vanhu vakristu, uye kristu ndewaallah.

4

saka naizvozvo, vanhu vanofanira kutiona savaranda vakristu uye savaya vakaitwa vachengeti vezvakavanzika zvaallah. zvino zvakafanira kuti vaya vakapiwa utariri vave vakatendeka. chinhu chiduku duku kwandiri kana ndichitongwa nemi kana dare ripi zvaro romunhu; zvirokwazvo handizvitongi pachangu. hana yangu yakachena, asi izvi hazviiti kuti ndive munhu akarurama. ishe ndiye anonditonga. naizvozvo, regai kutonga chinhu nguva isati yasvika; chimbomirai kusvikira ishe auya. achaisa pachena zvakavanzwa murima uye acharatidza mifungo yemwoyo yavanhu. panguva iyoyo mumwe nomumwe acharumbidzwa naallah. zvino, hama dzangu, ndakaita zvinhu izvi kuupenyu hwangu uye nokuna aporosi nokuda kwenyu, kuitira kuti mudzidze kubva kwatiri zvinoreva chirevo chokuti, “usaita zvinopfuura zvakanyorwa.” ipapo hamungazvikudzi pamusoro pomumwe munhu muchimuenzanisa nomumwe. nokuti ndianiko akakutsaura iwe kubva kuno mumwe? chiiko chaunacho chausina kupiwa? zvino kana wakapiwa, seiko uchizvikudza sousina kupiwa? matova nezvose zvamunoda kare! makatopfumiswa kare! mava madzimambo, uye isu tisipo! ndinoshuva sei kuti dai makava madzimambo kuitira kuti tigova madzimambo pamwe chete nemi! nokuti ini ndinoona kuti allah akatigadza kuti tive vapostori vanoonekwa pakupedzisira, savanhu vakatongerwa rufu. takaitwa chiseko kunyika yose, kuvatumwa uyewo nokuvanhu. tiri mapenzi nokuda kwakristu, asi imi makachenjera kwazvo muna kristu! isu tinoshayiwa simba, asi imi mune simba! munokudzwa, isu tinozvidzwa! kusvikira panguva ino isu tine nzara, uye tine nyota, takapfeka mamvemve, tinorohwa zvakaoma kwazvo, hatina pokugara. tinoshanda nesimba namaoko edu. kana tikatukwa tinoropafadza; kana tichitambudzwa, tinotsungirira; kana tichipomerwa mhosva, tinopindura zvinyoronyoro. kusvikira panguva ino takaitwa setsvina yenyika, marara enyika. handisi kukunyorerai izvi kuti ndikunyadzisei, asi kuti ndikuyambirei, savana vangu vandinoda. kunyange zvazvo mune vachengeti vanosvika zviuru gumi muna kristu, hamuna madzibaba mazhinji, nokuti muna kristu yeahoshua ndakava baba venyu kubudikidza nevhangeri. naizvozvo ndinokukumbirai zvikuru kuti muve vateveri vangu. nokuda kwechikonzero ichi ndatuma timoti kwamuri, mwana wangu wandinoda, akatendeka muna she. achakuyeuchidzai mararamiro angu muna kristu yeahoshua, zvinoenderana nezvandinodzidzisa kwose kwose mukereke dzose. vamwe venyu vava kuzvikudza, sokunonzi handisi kuzouya kwamuri. asi ndichauya kwamuri nokukurumidza, kana ishe achida, uye handizotsvaki chete kuti vanhu ava vanozvikudza vari kutaura sei, asi kutiwo vane simba rakadii. nokuti umambo hwaallah hahuzi pakutaura bedzi asi pasimba. munodeiko? ndiuye kwamuri neshamhu here, kana norudo uye nomweya wounyoro?

5

zvinonzi pakati penyu pane upombwe, uye upombwe hworudzi rusakambonzwikwa kunyange pakati pavahedheni: munhu anorara nomukadzi wababa vake. uye munozvikudza! mungadai musingachemi here uye makatodzinga munhu anoita zvakadai kuti musayanana naye? kunyange zvangu ndisiri pakati penyu panyama, ndinemi mumweya. uye ndatotonga kare pamusoro pomunhu akaita izvi, sokunonzi ndiripo. pamunoungana pamwe chete muzita raishe yeahoshua, ndinemi mumweya, uye simba raishe yeahoshua riripo, isai munhu uyu kuna satani, kuti nyama iparadzwe uye mweya wake ugoponeswa pazuva rashe. kuzvikudza kwenyu hakuna kunaka. hamuzivi here kuti mbiriso shoma inovirisa chikanyiwa chose? bvisai mbiriso yakare kuti mugova chikanyiwa chitsva chisina mbiriso, sezvamuri chaizvo. nokuti kristu, gwayana redu repasika, akabayirwa. naizvozvo ngatiitei mutambo, tisingaiti nembiriso yakafa, mbiriso yoruvengo nokuipa, asi nechingwa chisina mbiriso, chingwa chokururama nezvokwadi. ndakunyorerai mutsamba yangu kuti murege kufambidzana nemhombwe, handisi kureva vanhu venyika ino vanoita upombwe, kwete, kana vano ruchiva namakororo, kana vanonamata zvifananidzo. nokuti kana zvadaro mungatobva panyika ino. asi zvino ndinonyora kwamuri kuti musafambidzana naani zvake anozviti ihama asi ari mhombwe, kana kuti ano ruchiva, anonamata zvifananidzo, kana kuti chidhakwa kana gororo. munhu akadaro musatombodya naye. nokuti ibasa rangu here kuti nditonge avo vari kunze kwekereke? hamufaniri kutonga avo vari mukereke here? allah ndiye achatonga avo vari kunze. “dzingai munhu akaipa uyu abve pakati penyu.”

6

kana mumwe wenyu ane mhosva nomumwe, angatsunga here kumukwirira kumatare avasakarurama pano kumukwirira kuvatsvene? hamuzivi here kuti vatsvene vachatonga nyika? zvino kana muchazotonga nyika, ko, hamungagoni kutonga mhosva duku duku here? ko, hamuzivi here kuti muchatonga vatumwa? ko, kuzoti zvinhu zvoupenyu huno! naizvozvo, kana mukapokana pamusoro pezvinhu zvakadai, gadzai savatongi kunyange vanhu vano kutenda kuduku vari mukereke. ndinodaro kuti munyadziswe. ko, pangashayikwa munhu akachenjera pakati penyu here anogona kutonga mhosva pakati pavatendi? asi panzvimbo yokuti mudaro, hama inokwirira hama kumatare avasingatendi! izvi zvokuti makatokwidzana kumatare pakati penyu zvinoreva kuti makatokundwa kare. munoregereiko kubvuma kukanganisirwa? munoregereiko kubvuma kubirwa? asi imi, pachenyu munoba uye munoita zvisakarurama, muchizviitira kuhama dzenyu. ko, hamuzivi here kuti vasakarurama havagari nhaka youmambo hwaallah? musanyengerwa: nokuti mhombwe kana vanonamata zvifananidzo, kana zvifeve, kana varume vanoita zvoufeve, kana varume vanodanana navamwe varume, kana mbavha, kana vana madyo, kana zvidhakwa, kana vanochera vamwe, kana makororo, havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaallah. uye izvozvo ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita vamwe venyu. asi makashambidzwa, mukaitwa vatsvene, mukaruramisirwa muzita raishe yeahoshua kristu, uye nomweya waallah. ndinotenderwa zvinhu zvose, asi hazvisi zvose zvinobatsira. kwandiri zvinhu zvose zvinotenderwa, asi handidi kutongwa kana nechimwe. zvokudya ndezvedumbu uye dumbu nderezvokudya, asi allah achaparadza zvose zviri zviviri. muviri hauzi woupombwe, asi ndowashe, uye nashe ndewomuviri. allah akamutsa ishe kubva kuvakafa nesimba rake uye achatimutsawo. hamuzivi here kuti miviri yenyu mitezo yakristu? zvino ndingatora here mitezo yakristu ndigoiita mitezo youpombwe? kwete napaduku pose! hamuzivi here kuti uyo anosangana nechifeve naiye ava muviri mumwe naye? nokuti zvinonzi, “vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe.” asi uyo akasanganiswa nashe ava mumwe naye mumweya. tizai upombwe. zvimwe zvivi zvose zvingaitwa nomunhu zviri kunze kwomuviri wake, asi uyo anoita chivi choupombwe anotadzira muviri wake. hamuzivi here kuti muviri wenyu itemberi yamweya mutsvene, ari mamuri, uyo wamakagamuchira kubva kuna allah? hamuzi venyu; makatengwa nomutengo. naizvozvo kudzai allah nomuviri wenyu.

7

zvino pamusoro pezvinhu zvamakandinyorera, ndinoti: zvakanaka kuti munhu arege kuwana mukadzi. asi nokuda kwoupombwe, murume mumwe nomumwe ngaave nomukadzi wake, nomukadzi mumwe nomumwe ngaave nomurume wake. murume ngaape mukadzi wake zvakafanira, uye nomukadzi adarowo kumurume wake. muviri womukadzi hauzi wake oga asi kuti ndewomurume wakewo. zvimwe chetezvo, muviri womurume hauzi wake oga asi kuti ndewomukadzi wakewo. musanyimana, kunze kwokunge matenderana uye kwenguva duku, kuti mumbova nenguva yokunyengetera. mushure mezvo mosanganazve kuitira kuti satani arege kukuedzai pakusazvidzora kwenyu. ndinotaura izvi ndichikutenderai, kwete somurayiro. ndinoshuva kuti dai vanhu vose vakaita seni. asi munhu mumwe nomumwe ane chipo chake chaakapiwa naallah; mumwe ane chipo ichi mumwe ane icho. zvino kune vasina kuwana nechirikadzi ndinoti: zvakanaka kwavari kuti vasawana, sezvandiri. asi kana vasingagoni kuzvidzora, vanofanira kuwana, nokuti zviri nani kuwana pane kutsva. kuna vakawana ndinopa murayiro uyu (kwete ini, asi ishe): mukadzi ngaarege kuparadzana nomurume wake. asi kana akabva, ngaarege kuzowanikwazve, kana kuti ngaayanane nomurume wake. uye murume haafaniri kuramba mukadzi wake. kuna vamwe vose ndinoti (ini kwete ishe): kana hama ino mukadzi asingatendi uye mukadzi achida hake kugara naye, haafaniri kumuramba. uye kana mukadzi ane murume asingatendi uye murume achida hake kugara naye, haafaniri kumuramba. nokuti murume asingatendi anoitwa mutsvene nokuda kwomukadzi wake, uye mukadzi asingatendi anoitwa mutsvene kubudikidza nomurume wake anotenda. vana venyu vaizova netsvina, asi zvino vava vatsvene. asi kana asingatendi akaenda, murege aende hake. murume kana mukadzi anotenda haana kusungwa pakadai; allah akatidana kuti tigare murugare. nokuti iwe mukadzi unoziva seiko, kana uchaponesa murume wako? kana, kuti iwe murume unoziva seiko, kana uchaponesa mukadzi wako? zvisinei hazvo, mumwe nomumwe ngaararame upenyu hwaakagoverwa naishe uye hwaakadanirwa naallah. izvi ndizvo zvandinorayira mukereke yose. ko, murume akadanwa atodzingiswa kare here? ngaarege kuitwa asina kudzingiswa. ko, murume akadanwa asina kudzingiswa here? ngaarege kudzingiswa. kudzingiswa hakuzi chinhu uye kusadzingiswa hakuzi chinhu. asi kuchengeta mirayiro yaallah ndiko kunokosha. mumwe nomumwe ngaagare ari zvaakanga ari paakadanwa naallah. wakanga uri muranda here pawakadanwa? ngazvirege kukudya mwoyo; kunyange zvakadaro, kana uchigona kuva wakasununguka, ita saizvozvo. nokuti uyo akadanwa nashe ari muranda, ava akasununguka muna she; zvimwe chetezvo, uyo akanga akasununguka paakadanwa ava muranda wakristu. makatengwa nomutengo; musava varanda vavanhu. hama, mumwe nomumwe, ngaarambe ari paakadanwa naallah ari. zvino pamusoro pemhandara: handina murayiro unobva kuna ishe, asi ndinokuudzai somunhu akapiwa ngoni nashe kuti ave akatendeka. nokuda kwenhamo yazvino, ndinofunga kuti zvakanaka kuti munhu agare akadaro. wakawana here? usatsvaka kurambana. hauna kuwana here? usatsvaka mukadzi. asi kana ukawana, hauna kutadza; asi kana mhandara ikawanikwa haina kutadza. asi vaya vachawana vachasangana namatambudziko mazhinji muupenyu uye ini handidi kuti musangane nawo. zvandinoreva hama dzangu, ndezvokuti nguva ipfupi. kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vana vakadzi ngavararame savasina; vaya vanochema, savasingachemi; vanofara savasingafari; vanotenga chinhu, sokunonzi hachizi chavo; navaya vane zvinhu zvenyika ino, savasingabatiriri pazviri. nokuti nyika ino sezvairi nhasi ichapfuura. ndinoda kuti murege kuva nokufunganya. murume asina kuwana anofunga zvashe, kuti angafadza ishe sei. asi murume akawana anofunga pamusoro pezvinhu zvenyika ino, kuti angafadza mukadzi wake sei, uye zvaanoda zvakapatsanurwa. mukadzi asina kuwanikwa kana mhandara anofunga nezvashe: chinangwa ndechokuzvipira kuna she panyama napamweya. asi mukadzi akawanikwa anofunga zvenyika ino kuti angafadza murume wake sei. ndiri kutaura izvi kuti zvikubatsirei, kwete kuti ndikudzivisei, asi kuti murarame munzira yakarurama muchizvipira kuna she zvizere. kana mumwe achifunga kuti ava kuita zvisina kunaka kumhandara yaakatsidzira, uye kana ava namakore akafanira kana achida kumuwana, ngaaite zvaanoda. haasi kutadza. vanofanira kuwanana. asi uyo munhu anenge azvifunga mupfungwa dzake, asina zvinomumanikidza iye kana achizvidzora, uye kana akatema mumwoyo make kuti haadi kuwana mhandara iyi, murume uyu aitawo chinhu chakanaka. saka naizvozvo, uyo anowana mhandara iyi anoitawo zvakanaka, asi uyo asingawani anoita chinhu chakatonakisa. mukadzi akasungwa nomurayiro kumurume wake kana achiri mupenyu. asi kana murume wake akafa, asununguka kuti awanikwe nomurume waanoda, asi anofanira kuva muna she. asi mukuona kwangu, angatonyanya kufara kana akagara akadaro, uye ndinofunga kuti neniwo ndino mweya waallah.

8

zvino, pamusoro pezvokudya zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo: tinoziva kuti tose tino ruzivo. ruzivo runouyisa kuzvikudza, asi rudo runovaka. munhu anofunga kuti anoziva chinhu achigere kuziva zvaanofanira kuziva. asi munhu anoda allah anozivikanwa naallah. saka naizvozvo, pamusoro pokudya zvokudya zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo: tinoziva kuti chifananidzo hachizi chinhu zvachose panyika uye kuti hakuna allah, asi iye mumwe chete. nokuti kunyange dai varipo vanonzi vamwari, kungava kudenga kana panyika (sezvavaripo zvirokwazvo “vamwari” vazhinji uye na“madzishe” mazhinji), asi isu tina allah mumwe chete, ivo baba, zvinhu zvose zvakabva kwavari uye ndivo vatinoraramira; uye tina she mumwe chete, yeahoshua kristu, zvinhu zvose zvakavapo kubudikidza naye, uye nesu tinorarama kubudikidza naye. asi havasi vose vanoziva izvi. vamwe vanhu vachakabatwa nezvifananidzo zvokuti kana vachidya zvakadai vanodya vachiti zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo, uye sezvo hana yavo isati yasimba, inoshatiswa. asi, zvokudya hazvingatisvitsi pedyo naallah; hatina kuipa kana tisina kudya uye hatinatswi kana tadya. asi chenjerai, kuti simba renyu iri rirege kuva chigumbuso kuna vasina simba. nokuti kana mumwe asina simba achikuona iwe uno ruzivo urwu uchidya uri mutemberi yechifananidzo, ko, hana yaiye asina simba haingatsungiswi kuti adye izvo zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo here? naizvozvo, hama iyi isina simba, iyo yakafirwa nakristu ichaparadzwa nokuziva kwako. kana mukatadzira hama dzenyu zvakadai uye muchikuvadza hana dzavo dzisina simba, munotadzira kristu. naizvozvo, kana zvandinodya zvichigumbusa hama yangu handichazodyizve nyama, kuti ndirege kuzomugumbusa.

9

handina kusununguka here? handizi mupostori here? handina kuona yeahoshua kristu ishe wedu here? imi hamusi chibereko chebasa rangu muna she here? kunyange zvangu ndisiri mupostori kuna vamwe, zvirokwazvo ndiri mupostori kwamuri! nokuti imi ndimi chisimbiso choupostori hwangu muna she. uku ndiko kuzvidavirira kwangu kuna avo vanondigarira matare. hatina kodzero yokuva nezvokudya nezvokunwa here? hatina kodzero yokufamba nomukadzi mutendi here sezvinoita vamwe vapostori navanunʼuna vashe nakefasi? kana kuti ini ndoga nabhanabhasi ndisu tinofanira kushanda kuti tirarame? ndianiko angandorwa muhondo achizviripira mubayiro? ndianiko angasima munda wamazambiringa uye akasadya mazambiringa acho? ndianiko angafudza makwai uye akasanwa mukaka wawo? ko, ndinotaura izvo nokutaura kwavanhu here? ko, murayiro haurevi zvimwe chetezvo here? nokuti zvakanyorwa mumurayiro wamozisi, zvichinzi, “usasunga muromo wenzombe kana ichipura zviyo.” ko, allah ane hanya nenzombe here? zvirokwazvo anotaura izvi kwatiri, hazvisizvo here? hongu, zvakanyorerwa isu, nokuti kana murimi achirima, nomupuri achipura, anofanira kuita izvi netariro yokuti achagoverwawo gohwo. kana isu takadyara zvinhu zvomweya pakati penyu, chingava chinhu chikuru here kana tikakohwa zvinhu zvenyu zvenyama? kana vamwe vane kodzero iyi yokuwana rubatsiro kubva kwamuri, hatifaniri kutowana zvikuru here? asi hatina kushandisa kodzero iyi. asi tinotambudzika pane zvose kuitira kuti tirege kukanganisa vhangeri rakristu. hamuzivi here kuti vaya vanoshumira mutemberi vanowana zvokudya zvavo mutemberi, uye vanoshumira paaritari vanodya zvearitari? saizvozvowo, ishe akarayira kuti vanoparidza vhangeri vanofanira kuwana zvinovararamisa kubva pavhangeri. asi handina kushandisa kana imwe yekodzero idzi. uye handisi kunyora izvi ndine tariro yokuti muchandiitira zvinhu zvakadai. zviri nani kuti ndife zvangu pano kuti mumwe munhu anditorere chinhu ichi chandinozvirumbidza nacho. asi kana ndichiparidza vhangeri, handingazvirumbidzi, nokuti ndinosungirwa kuti ndiparidze. ndine nhamo, kana ndisingaparidzi vhangeri! kana ndichiparidza nokuda kwangu, ndino mubayiro; kana ndichiita ndisingadi, ndiri kungoita chete izvo zvandakapiwa kuti ndiite. zvino mubayiro wangu ndoweiko? ndiwo uyu, kuti mukuparidza vhangeri ndizviite pasina muripo, uye ndisingashandisi kodzero dzangu mukuriparidza. kunyange zvangu ndakasununguka uye ndisiri muranda womunhu, ndakazviita muranda wavose, kuti ndiwane vazhinji kwazvo. kuvayeahudha ndakava somuyeahudha, kuti ndiwane vayeahudha. kuna vari pasi pomurayiro ndakava somunhu ari pasi pomurayiro (kunyange ini ndisiri pasi pomurayiro), kuti ndiwane vari pasi pomurayiro. kuna vasina murayiro, ndakava somunhu asina murayiro (kunyange zvangu ndisina kusununguka kubva pamurayiro waallah, ndiri pasi pomurayiro wakristu), kuti ndiwane vaya vasina murayiro. kuna vasina simba ndakava sendisina simba, kuti ndiwane vaya vasina simba. ndakava zvose kuvanhu vose kuitira kuti ndiponese vamwe nemitoo yose inogoneka. ndinoita zvose izvi nokuda kwevhangeri, kuti ndigovere maropafadzo aro. hamuzivi here kuti panhangemutange vanhu vose vanomhanya, asi mumwe chete ndiye anopiwa mubayiro? mhanyai zvokuti mugowana mubayiro. vanhu vose vanopinda mumutambo vanozvirovedza zvakaoma. vanoita izvi kuti vawane korona isingagari; asi isu tinozviita kuti tiwane korona inogara nokusingaperi. naizvozvo handimhanyi somunhu asina chinangwa; handirwi somunhu anorova mhepo. kwete, ndinorovedzera muviri wangu uye ndinouita muranda wangu kuitira kuti mushure mokunge ndapedza kuparidzira vamwe, ini pachangu ndirege kushayiwa mubayiro.

10

nokuti hama dzangu, handidi kuti murege kuziva kuti madzibaba edu ose akanga ari pasi pegore uye kuti vose vakayambuka gungwa. vose vakabhabhatidzwa muna mozisi mugore nomugungwa. vose vakadya zvokudya zvimwe chete zvomweya uye vose vakanwa zvokunwa zvimwe chete zvomweya; nokuti vakanwa kubva padombo romweya rakafamba navo, uye dombo iri raiva kristu. kunyange zvakadaro, allah haana kufadzwa navazhinji vavo; mitumbi yavo yakaparadzirwa murenje. zvino, zvinhu izvi zvakanga zviri semienzaniso kwatiri, kuti tirege kuisa mwoyo yedu pazvinhu zvakaipa sezvavakaita. musanamata zvifananidzo, sezvakaita vamwe vavo; sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “vanhu vakagara pasi vakadya, vakanwa, uye vakasimuka kuti vatambe.” hatifaniri kuita upombwe, sezvakaita vamwe vavo, uye vakafa zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu muzuva rimwe chete. hatifaniri kuedza ishe, sezvakaita vamwe vavo, uye vakaurayiwa nenyoka. uye murege kugununʼuna sezvakaita vamwe vavo, uye vakazourayiwa nomutumwa wokuparadza. zvinhu izvi zvakaitika kwavari semienzaniso kwatiri uye zvikanyorwa kuti zvive yambiro kwatiri, iyesu takasvikirwa nokuzadziswa kwokuguma kwenyika. saka, kana uchifunga kuti wakamira zvakasimba, chenjera kuti urege kuwa! hakuna muedzo wakakuwirai imi, kunze kwaiwo unowira munhu wose. uye allah akatendeka, haangatenderi kuti muedzwe kupfuura pamunogona napo. asi kana muchiedzwa, iye achakupai nzira yokubuda nayo kuti mugone kutsunga pairi. naizvozvo, shamwari dzangu dzinodikanwa, tizai kunamata zvifananidzo. ndiri kutaura kuvanhu vakachenjera; zvitongerei pachenyu pane zvandinotaura. ko, mukombe wokuvonga watinovonga, hakuzi kusangana neropa rakristu here? uye chingwa chatinomedura, hakuzi kusangana nomuviri wakristu here? nokuti pane chingwa chimwe chete, isu vazhinji tiri muviri mumwe, nokuti tinogovana tose pachingwa chimwe. cherechedzai vanhu veisraeri: ko, avo vanodya zvibayiro havagovani nearitari here? ko, ndinoreva kuti chibayiro chinobayirwa chifananidzo chinhu here, kana kuti chifananidzo chinhu here? kwete, asi zvibayiro zvavahedheni zvinopiwa kumadhimoni kwete kuna allah, uye ini handidi kuti mugovane namadhimoni. hamunganwi mukombe washe uye nomukombe wamadhimoniwo; hamungavi nomugove patafura yashe uye napatafura yamadhimoni. tiri kuedza kumutsa godo rashe here? takasimba kupfuura iye here? zvinhu zvose zvinotenderwa, asi hazvisi zvose zvinobatsira. zvinhu zvose zvinotenderwa, asi hazvisi zvose zvinovaka. munhu ngaarege kutsvaka zvakamunakira iye, asi zvakanakira vamwe. idyai zvose zvinotengeswa pamusika wenyama musingabvunzi chinhu nokuda kwehana, nokuti, “nyika ndeyashe, nokuzara kwayo.” kana mumwe asingatendi akakukoka kuzodya, uye kana uchida kuenda, udye zvose zvinenge zvaiswa pamberi pako usingabvunzi mubvunzo nokuda kwehana. asi kana mumwe akati kwauri, “ichi chipiriso chakabayirwa,” rega kudya, nokuda kwaiye akuratidza, uye nokuda kwehana, ndinoreva hana yomumwe, kwete yako. nokuti kusununguka kwangu kungatongerweiko nehana yomumwe? kana ini ndichidya ndavonga, ndingagotukirweiko nokuda kwechinhu chandavonga allah pamusoro pacho? naizvozvo, kunyange muchidya kana kunwa, chinhu chipi nechipi chamungaita, itai zvose kuti allah agokudzwa. musagumbusa munhu upi noupi zvake, angava muyeahudha, kana mugiriki kana kereke yaallah, kunyange sezvandinoedzawo kufadza munhu wose pazvinhu zvose. nokuti handitsvaki zvakandinakira ini asi zvakanakira vazhinji, kuitira kuti vagoponeswa.

11

teverai muenzaniso wangu, sezvandinotevera muenzaniso wakristu. ndinokurumbidzai nokuti munondirangarira pazvinhu zvose, uye muchichengeta dzidziso, sezvandakakudzidzisai. zvino ndinoda kuti muzive kuti musoro womurume wose ndikristu, uye musoro womukadzi murume, uye musoro wakristu ndiye allah. murume mumwe nomumwe anonyengetera kana kuprofita musoro wake wakafukidzwa, anoninipisa musoro wake. uye mukadzi mumwe nomumwe anonyengetera kana kuprofita musoro wake usina kufukidzwa, anoninipisa musoro wake, zvakangofanana nokuva nomusoro wakaveurwa. kana mukadzi asingafukidzi musoro wake, anofanira kugera bvudzi rake; asi kana zvichinyadzisa mukadzi kuti agerwe bvudzi rake, anofanira kufukidza musoro wake. murume haafaniri kufukidza musoro wake, sezvo ari mufananidzo nokubwinya kwaallah; asi mukadzi kubwinya kwomurume. nokuti murume haana kubva pamukadzi, asi mukadzi ndiye akabva pamurume; uye murume haana kusikirwa mukadzi, asi mukadzi ndiye akasikirwa murume. nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, uye nokuda kwavatumwa, mukadzi anofanira kuva nechiratidzo chesimba pamusoro wake. kunyange zvakadaro, muna she mukadzi haazi kunze kwomurume, nomurume haazi kunze kwomukadzi. nokuti mukadzi sezvaakabva pamurume, saizvozvowo murume anozvarwa nomukadzi asi zvose zvinobva kuna allah. tongai imi pachenyu kuti: zvakafanira here kuti mukadzi anyengetere kuna allah asina kufukidza musoro wake? ko, hamudzidziswi namasikirwo ezvinhu kuti kana murume ane bvudzi refu, anonyadziswa nazvo here, asi kuti kana mukadzi ane bvudzi refu, ndiko kubwinya kwake? nokuti bvudzi refu rakapiwa kwaari kuti rive chifukidzo. zvino kana pane anoda kuita gakava pazviri, hatina tsika dzakadaro kunyange kereke dzaallah. pane zvakarayirwa zvinotevera handikurumbidzei, nokuti hamuunganiri zvakanaka asi zvakaipa. chokutanga, ndakanzwa kuti pamunoungana pamwe chete sekereke, pane kupesana pakati penyu, uye ndingangozvitenda. nokuti dzidziso dzakatsaukana dzinofanira kuva pakati penyu, kuti zvionekwe kuti vakatendeka kuna allah ndavapi. pamunoungana, hachisi chirariro chashe chamunodya, nokuti kana modya, mumwe nomumwe wenyu anongotanga kudya asingamiriri vamwe. mumwe anosara ane nzara, mumwewo anodhakwa. ko, hamuna dzimba kwamungadyira nokunwira here? kana kuti munozvidza kereke yaallah nokunyadzisa vasina chinhu here? zvino ndichatiiko kwamuri? ndingakurumbidzai nokuda kwaizvozvi here? zvirokwazvo kwete! nokuti ndakagamuchira kubva kuna she icho chandakakupai kuti ishe yeahoshua, usiku hwaakapandukirwa, akatora chingwa, uye mushure mokunge avonga, akachimedura akati, “uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unomedurirwa imi; itai izvi muchindirangarira.” saizvozvowo, mushure mechirariro akatora mukombe, achiti, “mukombe uyu ndiwo sungano itsva muropa rangu; itai izvi nguva dzose kana muchiunwa, muchindirangarira.” nokuti nguva dzose kana muchidya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu, munoparidza rufu rwashe kusvikira achidzoka. naizvozvo ani naani anodya chingwa nokunwa mukombe washe nomutoo usina kufanira achabatwa nemhosva yokutadzira muviri neropa rashe. munhu anofanira kuti azviedze asati adya chingwa nokunwa mukombe. nokuti ani naani anodya nokunwa asingacherechedzi muviri washe anozvidyira nokuzvinwira kutongwa kwake. ndokusaka vazhinji pakati penyu vasina simba uye vachirwara, uye vamwe venyu vavete. asi kana tikazviedza pachedu, hatingazotongwi. kana tikatongwa nashe, tiri kurangwa kuitira kuti tirege kuzoraswa pamwe chete nenyika. saka naizvozvo, hama dzangu, kana muchiungana pakudya, miriranai. kana mumwe aine nzara, anofanira kudya kumba kwake, kuitira kuti pamunoungana pamwe chete murege kutongwa. uye kana ndichinge ndasvika ndichakudzidzisai zvimwe.

12

zvino pamusoro pezvipo zvomweya, hama, handidi kuti muve musingazivi. munoziva kuti pamakanga muri vahedheni, makanga muchitungamirirwa uye nokutsauswa muchiiswa kuzvifananidzo zvisingagoni kutaura. naizvozvo ndinokuudzai kuti hakuna munhu anotaura nomweya waallah anoti, “yeahoshua ngaatukwe.” uye hakuna munhu anoti, “yeahoshua ndiye ishe,” asi namweya mutsvene. kuna marudzi akasiyana ezvipo, asi mweya ndomumwe. kuna marudzi akasiyana oushumiri, asi ishe mumwe. kuna marudzi akasiyana amabasa, asi allah mumwe ndiye anoita zvose muvanhu vose. zvino mumwe nomumwe anopiwa kuratidzwa kwomweya kuti vose vabatsirwe. nokuti mumwe anopiwa nomweya shoko rouchenjeri, mumwe shoko rokuziva nomweya mumwe chete, mumwe kutenda nomweya mumwe chete, mumwe zvipo zvokuporesa nomweya mumwe chete, mumwe mabasa esimba, mumwe kuprofita, mumwe kuzivisisa mweya, mumwe kutaura nendimi dzakasiyana-siyana, uyezve mumwe kududzirwa kwendimi. zvose ibasa ramweya mumwe chete uye anopa mumwe nomumwe, sezvaanoda. muviri chinhu chimwe chete, kunyange une mitezo mizhinji; uye kunyange mitezo yawo iri mizhinji, inoumba muviri mumwe chete. ndizvowo zvakaita kristu. nokuti tose takabhabhatidzwa nomweya mumwe mumuviri mumwe, vangava vayeahudha kana vagiriki, varanda kana vakasununguka, uye tose tikapiwa kuti tinwe mweya mumwe. zvino muviri hauna kuumbwa nomutezo mumwe, asi mizhinji. kana rutsoka rukati, “nokuti handisi ruoko, saka handisi womuviri,” harungaregi kuva chikamu chomuviri nokuda kwechikonzero ichocho. uye kana nenzeve ikati, “nokuti handisi ziso, saka handisi chikamu chomuviri,” haringaregi kuva chikamu chomuviri nokuda kwechikonzero ichocho. kana kuti dai muviri wose waiva ziso, kunzwa kwaizovepiko? kana kuti dai muviri wose waive nzeve, ko, kunhuhwidza kwaizovepiko? asi zvino allah akaisa mitezo pamuviri, mumwe nomumwe wayo, sezvaakada kuti ive. kana dai yose waiva mutezo mumwe, ko, muviri waizovepiko? sezvazviri, kune mitezo mizhinji asi muviri mumwe. ziso haringati kuruoko, “handinei newe!” uye musoro haungati kurutsoka, “handinei newe!” asi kutoti mitezo yomuviri inenge isina simba, ndiyo inodikanwa, uye mitezo yatinofunga kuti haikudzwi ndiyo yatinokudza kwazvo, asi mitezo yakanaka haidi kushongedzwa. asi allah akabatanidza mitezo yomuviri uye akapa kukudzwa kukuru kumitezo iya isingakudzwi, kuitira kuti parege kuva nokupesana pamuviri, asi kuti mitezo ichengetane zvakaenzana. kana mumwe mutezo uchitambudzika, mitezo yose inotambudzika pamwe chete nawo; kana mutezo mumwe ukakudzwa, mitezo yose inofara pamwe chete nawo. zvino imi muri muviri wakristu, uye mumwe nomumwe wenyu mutezo wawo. uye mukereke, allah akagadza pakutanga vapostori, vechipiri vaprofita, vechitatu vadzidzisi, tevere vaiti vezvishamiso, uye navane zvipo zvokuporesa, navanobatsira vamwe, vaya vane zvipo zvokufambisa basa, uye navaya vanotaura nendimi dzakasiyana-siyana. vose vapostori here? vose vaprofita here? vose vadzidzisi here? vose vanoita zvishamiso here? vose vane zvipo zvokuporesa here? vose vanotaura nendimi here? vose vanodudzira here? asi shuvai kwazvo zvipo zvikuru. uye zvino ndichakuratidzai nzira yakanaka kupfuura dzose.

13

kunyange ndikataura nendimi dzavanhu nedzavatumwa, asi ndisina rudo, ndakaita sedare rinorira kana ndarira dzinongoti ngwerengwere. kana ndine chipo chokuprofita uye ndichinzwisisa zvakavanzika zvose noruzivo rwose, uye kana ndino kutenda kunofambisa makomo, asi ndisina rudo, handisi chinhu. kana ndikagovera zvose zvandinazvo kuvarombo uye kana ndikaisa muviri wangu kuti upiswe, asi kana ndisina rudo, hazvindibatsiri chinhu. rudo runo mwoyo murefu, rudo runo mwoyo munyoro. haruna godo, haruna manyawi haruzvikudzi. haruiti zvokuvirimira vamwe, harutsvaki zvarwo, harukurumidzi kutsamwa, haruna pfundi pfundi. rudo harufariri zvakaipa, asi runofarira chokwadi. runodzivirira nguva dzose, runovimba nguva dzose, rune tariro nguva dzose, runotsungirira nguva dzose. rudo harutongoperi. zvino kana kuri kuprofita, kuchapera; kana dziri ndimi, dzichagumiswa; kana rwuri ruzivo, ruchapfuura. nokuti tinoziva zvisakakwana uye tinoprofita zvisakakwana, asi kana zvakakwana zvasvika, zvisakakwana zvichabviswa. pandaiva mwana ndaitaura somwana, ndaifunga somwana, ndairangarira somwana. zvino zvandava murume, ndakabvisa zvinhu zvoumwana. nokuti zvino tinoona asi hationi zvakanaka somuchionioni; asi nenguva iyo tichaonana chiso nechiso. iye zvino ndinoziva zvisakakwana; asi ndichaziva zvizere, kunyange sezvandinozivikanwa zvizere. uye zvinhu zvitatu izvi ndizvo zvinogara, zvinoti kutenda, tariro norudo. asi chikuru pakati peizvi ndirwo rudo.

14

teverai nzira yorudo uye mushuve kwazvo zvipo zvomweya, zvikuru sei chipo chokuprofita. nokuti ani naani anotaura nendimi haatauri kuvanhu asi kuna allah. zvirokwazvo, hapana anomunzwa; anotaura zvakavanzika mumweya wake. asi anoprofita anotaura kuvanhu kuti vasimbiswe, vakurudzirwe uye kuti vanyaradzwe. uyo anotaura nendimi anozvisimbisa iye asi anoprofita anosimbisa kereke. ndinoda kuti mumwe nomumwe wenyu ataure nendimi, asi zvikuru kuti muprofite. anoprofita mukuru kuna anotaura nendimi, asi kunze kwokunge achidudzira, kuti kereke igosimbiswa. zvino hama, kana ndikauya kwamuri ndichitaura nendimi, ndingakubatsirai seiko, asi kuti kana ndichitaura nokuzarurirwa kana ruzivo kana chiprofita kana shoko rokurayira? kunyange zvinhu zvisina upenyu zvinorirawo wani, zvakaita senyere kana rudimbwa, munhu achaziva seiko kana zvisingasiyani pakurira kwazvo? uyezve kana hwamanda isingariri kwazvo, ndianiko angagadzirira kundorwa? zvakadaro nemi. kana musingatauri mashoko nendimi dzinonyatsozivikanwa, ko, pane anganzwa here zvamunotaura? nokuti muchangotaura henyu mumhepo. zvirokwazvo panyika pane mitauro mizhinji yakasiyana-siyana, asi hakuna kana mumwe usina zvaunoreva. zvino kana ndisinganzwisisi zvinotaurwa nomunhu, ndiri mutorwa kumutauri, uye naiyewo mutorwa kwandiri. zvakadarowo nemi. sezvo muchishuva zvipo zvomweya, edzai zvikuru kushingairira zvipo zvinovaka kereke. nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, ani naani anotaura nendimi anofanira kunyengetera kuti adudzirewo zvaanotaura. nokuti kana ndichinyengetera nendimi, mweya wangu ndiwo unonyengetera, asi kufunga kwangu hakuna zvibereko. zvino ndichaiteiko? ndichanyengetera nomweya wangu, ndichanyengeterawo nokufunga kwangu; ndichaimba nomweya wangu, asi ndichaimbawo nokufunga kwangu. kana uchirumbidza allah nomweya wako, ko, uyo agere pakati pavasingazivi achati, “ameni” seiko, pakuvonga kwako, sezvo asinganzwisisi zvauri kutaura? unogona kunge uchivonga zvako zvakanaka, asi mumwe munhu haasimbiswi. ndinovonga allah kuti ndinotaura nendimi zhinji kupfuura imi mose. asi mukereke ndingada zvangu kutaura mashoko mashanu nokufunga kwangu kuti ndidzidzise vamwe pano kutaura mashoko zviuru gumi norumwe rurimi. hama, regai kufunga savana. pazvinhu zvakaipa ivai savacheche, asi pakufunga kwenyu muve savanhu vakuru. mumurayiro makanyorwa muchinzi: “kubudikidza navanhu vedzimwe ndimi uye kubudikidza nemiromo yavatorwa, ndichataura kuvanhu ava, asi kunyange zvakadaro havanganditeereri,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. naizvozvo, ndimi hadzizi chiratidzo kuvatendi asi kuna vasingatendi; asiwo chiprofita ndechavatendi, kwete vasingatendi. saka kana kereke yose yaungana pamwe chete uye vose vakataura nendimi, uye vamwe vasinganzwisisi kana vasingatendi vakapinda, havangati mava kupenga here? asi kana asingatendi kana mumwe munhu asinganzwisisi akapinda vanhu vose vachiprofita, achabatwa nazvo akaziva kuti iye mutadzi uye kuti achatongwa nazvo, uye zvakavanzika zvomweya wake zvinoratidzwa. naizvozvo achawira pasi nechiso chake agonamata allah, uye agopupura kuti allah ari pakati penyu zvirokwazvo. zvino tichatiiko, hama? kana muchiungana, mumwe nomumwe ane rwiyo, kana shoko rokurayira, chaakazarurirwa, ndimi kana kududzira. zvose izvi ngazviitwe kuti zvisimbise kereke. kana mumwe achitaura nendimi, vaviri, kana vatowanda, vatatu, ngavataure mumwe mushure momumwe, uye mumwe ngaadudzire. kana pasina anodudzira, ari kutaura ngaanyarare mukereke uye ngaazvitaurire pachake uye nokuna allah. vaprofita vaviri kana vatatu ngavataure uye vamwe ngavanyatsoongorora zvaataura. uye kana kuzarurirwa kwasvika kuno mumwe munhu agere pasi, mutauri wokutanga ngaanyarare. nokuti mose munogona kuprofita muchitevedzana mumwe mushure momumwe, kuitira kuti vose varayirwe uye vakurudzirwe. mweya yavaprofita inozviisa pasi pavaprofita. nokuti allah haasi allah wenyonganyonga asi worugare. sezvinoitwa mune dzimwe kereke dzose dzavatsvene, vakadzi ngavanyarare mukereke. havatenderwi kutaura asi ngavazviise pasi sezvinoreva murayiro. kana vachida kubvunza chimwe chinhu, ngavabvunze varume vavo kumba; nokuti hazvina kufanira kuti mukadzi ataure mukereke. ko, shoko raallah rakatanga nemi here? kana kuti rakasvika kwamuri moga here? kana munhu achifunga kuti muprofita kana kuti ane chipo chomweya, ngaatende kuti zvandinokunyorerai murayiro washe. kana akasatenda izvi, iye pachake ngaasatendwe. naizvozvo, hama dzangu, ivai nechido chokuprofita, uye musadzivisa kutaura nendimi. asi zvinhu zvose ngazviitwe nomutoo wakafanira uye zvichitevedza mutemo.

15

zvino hama, ndinoda kukuyeuchidzai vhangeri randakakuparidzirai, iro ramakagamuchira uye ramakamira mariri. nevhangeri irori munoponeswa, kana mukabatirira kwazvo pashoko randakakuparidzirai. zvimwe makatenda pasina. nokuti zvandakagamuchira sezvinokosha pakutanga ndizvo zvandakakupaiwo: kuti kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa mumagwaro, kuti akavigwa, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa mumagwaro, uye kuti akazviratidza kuna petro, tevere kuna vane gumi navaviri. mushure mezvo akazviratidza kuhama dzaipfuura mazana mashanu panguva imwe chete, vazhinji vavo vachiri vapenyu, kunyange zvazvo vamwe vavete. ipapo akazozviratidza kuna yaqobho, mushure mezvo kuvapostori, uye pakupedzisira akazozviratidza kwandiriwo, sokuna akazvarwa nguva isati yasvika. nokuti ndiri muduku kuvapostori vose, uye handikodzeri kunzi mupostori, nokuti ndakatambudza kereke yaallah. asi nokuda kwenyasha dzaallah ndiri zvandiri uye nyasha dzake kwandiri hadzina kuva pasina. kwete, ndakashanda kupfuura vose, asi ndisiri ini, asi nyasha dzaallah dzaiva neni. ipapo kunyange dai ndiri ini kana ivo, izvi ndizvo zvatinoparidza, uye izvi ndizvo zvamakatenda. asi kana kuchiparidzwa kuchinzi kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, ko, vamwe venyu vangareva sei kuti hakuna kumutswa kwavakafa? kana kusina kumutswa kwavakafa, saka naizvozvowo kristu haana kumutswa. zvino kana kristu asina kumutswa, kuparidza kwedu hakuna maturo, saizvozvowo nokutenda kwenyu. pamusoro pezvo, tichaonekwa tiri zvapupu zvaallah zvenhema, nokuti takapupura kuti allah akamutsa kristu kubva kuvakafa. asi haana kumumutsa kana zvirokwazvo vakafa vasingamutswi. nokuti kana vakafa vasingamutswi, saizvozvowo kristu haana kumutswa kuvakafa. uye kana kristu asina kumutswa, kutenda hakubatsiri; muchiri muzvivi zvenyu. naizvozvowo vose vakafa muna kristu vakatorasikawo. kana tine tariro muna kristu nokuda kwoupenyu huno chete, tinonzwisa urombo kupfuura vanhu vose. asi, zvirokwazvo kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, akava chibereko chokutanga chavavete. nokuti sezvo rufu rwakauya kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe, kumuka kuvakafa kwakauyawo kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe. nokuti, sokufa kwakaita vanhu vose muna adhamu, naizvozvowo muna kristu vose vachaitwa vapenyu. asi mumwe nomumwe padzoro rake: kristu chibereko chokutanga; ipapo paanouya, tevere vose vanova vake. ipapo magumo achasvika, panguva yaachazopa umambo kuna allah baba mushure mokunge aparadza ushe hwose, ukuru hwose nesimba rose. nokuti anofanira kubata ushe kusvikira aisa vavengi vake vose pasi petsoka dzake. muvengi wokupedzisira achaparadzwa ndirwo rufu. nokuti akaisa zvinhu zvose pasi petsoka dzake. zvino kana achiti “zvinhu zvose” zvakaiswa pasi petsoka dzake, zviri pachena kuti izvi hazvisanganisiri allah pachake, iye akaisa zvinhu zvose pasi pakristu. kana achinge aita izvi, ipapo mwanakomanawo pachake achaiswa pasi paiye akaisa zvinhu zvose pasi pake kuti allah agova zvose mune zvose. zvino kana kusina kumuka, ko, vakabhabhatidzirwa vakafa vachazoiteiko? kana vakafa vasingamutswi, seiko vanhu vachivabhabhatidzirwa? uye kana tiri isu, tinozviisireiko panjodzi nguva dzose? ndinofa zuva nezuva, ndinorevesa hama dzangu, zvirokwazvo sezvandinozvirumbidza pamusoro penyu muna kristu yeahoshua ishe wedu. kana ndakarwa nezvikara paefeso nokuda kwezvikonzero zvapanyama, zvakandibatsireiko? kana vakafa vasingamutswi, “ngatidyei uye tinwe, nokuti mangwana tichafa.” musanyengerwa: “ushamwari hwakaipa hunoodza tsika dzakanaka.” dzokai pandangariro dzenyu sezvamakafanira, uye murege kutadza; nokuti kuna vamwe vasingazivi allah. ndinotaura izvi kuti munyadziswe. asi mumwe angabvunza achiti, “ko, vakafa vanomutswa sei? vachauya nomuviri wakaita seiko?” upenzi hwakadii! chaunodyara hachingameri kana chisina kufa. kana ukadyara haudyari muviri uchazovapo, asi tsanga bedzi, ingava yegorosi kana chimwe chinhuwo zvacho. asi allah anoipa muviri sezvaanoda, uye kumbeu imwe neimwe muviri wayo. nyama yose haina kufanana: vanhu vane rumwe rudzi rwenyama, mhuka dzinewo rumwe rudzi, shiri rumwewo, uye nehove dzinewo rumwe. kunewo miviri yokudenga, nemiviri yenyika; asi kubwinya kwemiviri yokudenga ndokumwe kubwinya, kwemiviri yapanyika ndokumwe. zuva rino kubwinya kwaro, mwedzi unewo kumwe, nenyeredzi dzinewo kumwe; uye nyeredzi haifanani neimwe nyeredzi pakubwinya. ndizvo zvazvichazova pakumuka kwavakafa. muviri unodyarwa uri unoparara, unomutswa usisaparari; unodyarwa pakuzvidzwa, unomutswa mukubwinya; unodyarwa muutera, unomutswa musimba; unodyarwa uri muviri wenyama, unomutswa uri muviri womweya. kana kune muviri wenyama, kune muviri womweyawo. naizvozvo kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “munhu wokutanga, adhamu, akava munhu mupenyu;” adhamu wokupedzisira akava mweya unopa upenyu. mweya hauna kuuya pakutanga, asi nyama, uye mushure mezvo mweya. munhu wokutanga akanga ari guruva renyika, munhu wechipiri akanga achibva kudenga. sezvakanga zvakaita munhu wapanyika, ndizvowo zvakaita vaya vari venyika; uyewo sezvakaita munhu akabva kudenga, ndizvo zvakaitawo vaya vari vokudenga. uye sezvatakanga tine mufananidzo womunhu wapanyika, saizvozvowo tichava nomufananidzo womunhu akabva kudenga. zvino, hama, ndinoti kwamuri nyama neropa hazvingagari nhaka youmambo hwaallah, uye zvinoparara hazvingagari nhaka yezvisingaparari. teererai, ndinokutaurirai chakavanzika: hatingafi tose, asi tose tichashandurwa, pakarepo, sokubwaira kweziso, pahwamanda yokupedzisira. nokuti hwamanda icharira, vakafa vachamutswa mukusaparara, uye tichashandurwa. nokuti chinoparara chinofanira kufuka kusaparara, uye chinofa chinofanira kufuka kusafa. kana chinoparara chikafuka kusaparara, uye chinofa chikafuka kusafa, ipapo tsumo yakanyorwa ichazadziswa yokuti: “rufu rwakamedzwa nokukunda.” “kuripiko kukunda kwako iwe rufu? rwuripiko rumborera rwako, iwe rufu?” rumborera rwerufu ndicho chivi, uye simba rechivi ndiwo murayiro. asi allah ngaavongwe! anotipa kukunda kubudikidza naishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. naizvozvo, hama dzangu dzinodikanwa, mirai makasimba. pashayiwe chinhu chingakuzungunusai. muchishandira ishe zvikuru nguva dzose, nokuti munoziva kuti kubata basa kwenyu muna she hakungavi pasina.

16

zvino pamusoro pezvipo zvakaunganidzirwa vanhu vaallah: itaiwo sezvandakarayira kereke dzavagaratia kuti dziite. nomusi wokutanga wevhiki roga roga, mumwe nomumwe wenyu ngaakamure mari kubva pamari yake zvichienderana napaanowana napo, muiunganidze pamwe chete, kuitira kuti pandinouya kurege kuzounganidzwa zvipo. zvino, kana ndasvika, ndichazopa matsamba okuzivisa kuvarume vamunenge masarudza uye ndichavatuma nechipo chenyu kujerusarema. kana zvakafanira kuti ndiendewo, vachaenda neni. mushure mokupfuura nokumasedhonia, ndichauya kwamuri, nokuti ndichapfuura nokumasedhonia. zvimwe ndichagara nemi kwechinguva, kana kutopedza nguva yechando, kuitira kuti mugondibatsirawo parwendo rwangu, kwose kwandinoenda. nokuti handidi kukuonai zvino nokukushanyirai ndichingopfuura bedzi; ndine tariro yokuva nemi kwechinguvana, kana ishe akatendera. asi ndichati garei paefeso kusvikira papendekosti, nokuti ndazarurirwa musuo mukuru wokuita basa guru, uyewo kune vazhinji vanondipikisa. kana timoti akauya, chenjerai kuti agare nemi asina chaangatya ari pakati penyu nokuti anobata basa rashe, sezvandinoita neniwo. naizvozvo, ngakurege kuva nomumwe anoramba kumugamuchira. muperekedzei parwendo rwake norugare kuti akwanise kuuya kwandiri. ndiri kumutarisira pamwe chete nehama. zvino pamusoro pehama yedu aporosi: ndakamukurudzira kwazvo kuti auye kwamuri pamwe chete nedzimwe hama. akanga asingadi kuuya iye zvino, asi achauya kana awana mukana. rindai; mirai nesimba mukutenda; ivai varume vakashinga; ivai nesimba. itai zvinhu zvose murudo. munoziva kuti mhuri yastefanasi ndivo vakava vatendi vokutanga muakaya, uye vakazvipira kushumira vatsvene. ndinokukurudzirai hama, kuti muzviise pasi pevakadai seava nepasi pavose vanobatana nesu pabasa, uye nevanoshingaira pariri. ndakafara pakasvika stefanasi, nafochunatusi naakayikasi, nokuti vakandiitira zvamakanga musingagoni kundiitira imi. nokuti vakazorodza mweya wangu neyenyuwo. varume vakadai vanofanira kukudzwa. kereke dziri mudunhu reezhia dzinokukwazisai. akwira napirisira vanokukwazisai zvikuru muna she, uyewo nekereke inoungana mumba mavo. hama dzose dziri kuno dzinokukwazisai. kwazisanai nokutsvoda kutsvene. ini pauro, ndanyora kwaziso iyi noruoko rwangu. kana mumwe munhu asingadi ishe, kutukwa ngakuve pamusoro pake. uyai, imi ishe! nyasha dzaishe yeahoshua ngadzive nemi. rudo rwangu ngaruve nemi mose muna kristu yeahoshua. ameni.

2_corinthians

1

pauro, mupostori wakristu yeahoshua nokuda kwaallah, natimoti hama yedu, kukereke yaallah iri mukorinde, pamwe chete navatsvene vose vari muakaya yose: nyasha norugare ngazvive kwamuri zvichibva kuna allah baba vedu naishe yeahoshua kristu. ngaarumbidzwe allah nababa vaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, ivo baba vengoni naallah wokunyaradza kwose, ivo vanotinyaradza pamatambudziko edu ose, kuti tigone kunyaradza avo vari mumatambudziko nokunyaradza kwatakawana isu kubva kuna allah. nokuti sokuwanda kunoita matambudziko akristu muupenyu hwedu, ndiko kuwandawo kunoita kunyaradzwa kwedu nakristu. kana tichitambudzika, zvinoitirwa kunyaradzwa kwenyu noruponeso rwenyu, kana tichinyaradzwa, zvinoitirwa kunyaradzwa kwenyu, kunobereka mamuri kutsungirira pamatambudziko iwayo atinotambudzika nawo. uye tariro yedu kwamuri yakasimba, nokuti tinoziva kuti sezvamunogoverana nesu mumatambudziko edu, saizvozvowo muchagoverana nesu mukunyaradzwa kwedu. hatidi kuti murege kuziva, hama, pamusoro pamatambudziko akatiwira tiri mudunhu reezhia. takaremerwa kwazvo, kupfuura zvatakagona kutsungirira, zvokuti takati takanga tofa. zvirokwazvo mumwoyo medu takanzwa kuti takanga tatongerwa rufu. asi izvi zvakaitika kuti tirege kuvimba nesimba redu asi naallah, anomutsa vakafa. akatidzikinura padambudziko guru rorufu rakadai, uye achatidzikinura. paari ndipo pane tariro yedu kuti acharamba achitidzikinura, imi muchitibatsirawo neminyengetero yenyu. ipapo vazhinji vachavonga pamusoro pedu nokuda kwenyasha zhinji dzatichapiwa pakupindurwa kweminyengetero yavazhinji. zvino uku ndiko kuzvirumbidza kwedu: hana dzedu dzinotipupurira: kuti takazvibata nokutendeka kunobva kuna allah, munyika uye kunyanya paukama hwedu nemi. hatina kuita izvi nouchenjeri hwenyama, asi maererano nenyasha dzaallah. nokuti hatikunyorerei zvinhu zvamusingagoni kuverenga kana kunzwisisa. uye ndinovimba kuti, sezvamakatinzwisisa pane zvimwe, muchazosvika pakunyatsotinzwisisa zvakazara zvokuti muchazvirumbidza matiri sezvatichazvirumbidza mamuri, pazuva raishe yeahoshua. nokuti ndaiziva chinhu ichi, ndakaronga kuti nditange kuuya kwamuri kuti mugoropafadzwa kaviri. ndakaronga kukushanyirai ndiri parwendo rwangu rwokuenda kumasedhonia, uye ndaizodzokazve nokwamuri kana ndobva kumasedhonia, uye kuti muzondiendesa parwendo rwangu kujudhea. pandakaronga izvi, ndakazviita ndisingarevesi here? kana kuti ndinoita urongwa hwangu nenzira yenyama here, zvokuti ndingati nenzira imwe cheteyo, “hongu, hongu” uye “kwete, kwete.” asi zvirokwazvo naallah akatendeka, shoko redu kwamuri harizi “hongu” kana “kwete.” nokuti mwanakomana waallah, yeahoshua kristu, uyo akaparidzwa pakati penyu neni nasirasi uye natimoti, akanga asiri, “hongu” kana “kwete”, asi maari zvakagara zviri “hongu.” nokuti hazvinei kuti allah akativimbisa zvinhu zvizhinji zvakadii, zvose i“hongu” muna kristu. uye kubudikidza naiye tinoti “ameni” kuti allah akudzwe. zvino ndiallah anoita kuti tose imi nesu timire takasimba muna kristu. akatizodza, akaisawo chisimbiso patiri chokuti tava vake, uye akaisa mweya wake mumwoyo medu kuti ave rubatso, achipa chisimbiso chezvichauya. ndinodana allah kuti ave chapupu changu kuti handina kuzouya kukorinde nokuti ndakakunzwirai tsitsi. kwete nokuti tinoda kuremedza kutenda kwenyu, asi kuti tinobatsirana nemi kuti muve nomufaro, nokuti makamira zvakasimba nokuda kwokutenda.

2

saka ndakati mumwoyo mangu handingaitizve rumwe rwendo kwamuri runokutambudzai. nokuti kana ndichikuchemedzai, ndianiko achasara kuti andifadze kunze kwenyu imi vandinochemedza? ndakanyora nenzira iyi kuitira kuti kana ndasvika ndirege kutsamwiswa navaya vaifanira kundifadza. ndakanga ndine tariro mamuri mose, kuti muchagoverana neni mumufaro wangu. nokuti ndakakunyorerai ndino kusuwa kukuru, nokurwadziwa mumwoyo uye nemisodzi mizhinji, kwete kuti ndikuchemedzei asi kuti ndikuzivisei udzamu hworudo rwangu kwamuri. kana mumwe akauyisa kuchema, haana kuchemedza ini sokuchemedza kwaakaita imi mose, ndisingatauri mashoko akawanda. kurangwa kwaakaitwa navanhu vazhinji kwakamuringana. asi zvino, munofanira kumuregerera nokumunyaradza, kuitira kuti arege kuodzwa mwoyo kwazvo neshungu dzakanyanya. ndinokukurudzirai, naizvozvo, kuti mumutsiridze rudo rwenyu kwaari. chikonzero chakaita kuti ndikunyorerei chaiva chokuti ndione kana makanga muchigona kumira nokuteerera muzvinhu zvose. kana muchiregerera munhu upi zvake neniwo ndinomuregerera. uye zvandakaregerera, kana pane chinhu chandingaregerera, ndakaregerera pamberi pakristu nokuda kwenyu, kuitira kuti satani arege kutinyengera. nokuti mano ake tinoaziva. zvino pandakaenda kutroasi kundoparidza vhangeri rakristu uye ndikaona kuti ishe akanga andizarurira musuo, ndakanga ndisina rugare mumwoyo mangu, nokuti handina kuwanako tito hama yangu. saka ndakaonekana navo ndikaenda kumasedhonia. asi allah ngaavongwe, anotikundisa nguva dzose pakufamba kwedu muna kristu uye kubudikidza nesu anoratidza kwose kwose kunhuhwirira kworuzivo rwake. nokuti isu tiri kunhuhwirira kwakristu kuna allah pakati peavo vari kuponeswa nevari kuparara. kuno mumwe tiri munhuwi worufu; kuno mumwewo tiri kunhuhwirira kwoupenyu. zvino ndianiko angakwanisa basa rakadai? nokuti hatina kufanana navazhinji vanokanganisa shoko raallah vachida kuwana mugove kubva pariri. asi, tinotaura muna kristu nokutendeka pamberi paallah, savanhu vakatumwa naallah.

3
