akaubvisa, achiuroverera pamuchinjikwa. uye akati abvisa ushe namasimba, akazvibudisa pachena, akazvikunda nomuchinjikwa. naizvozvo ngakurege kuva nomunhu anokutongai pamusoro pezvamunodya kana kunwa, kana nezvemitambo yechitendero, kupemberera kugara kwomwedzi kana zuva resabata. izvi mumvuri wezvinhu zvaizouya, kunyange zvakadaro, chokwadi chinowanikwa muna kristu. musarega munhu upi zvake anofarira kuzvininipisa kwenhema uye kunamata vatumwa achikutorerai mubayiro wenyu. munhu akadaro anorondedzera zvikuru pamusoro pezvaakaona, uye nokufunga kwake kwenyama anozvikudza pasina. akarasika kubva pamusoro, uyo kubva pauri muviri wose, wakasimbiswa uye wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete nemitezo yawo namarunda, unokura sezvinoda allah. sezvo makafa pamwe chete nakristu kune mitemo yenyika ino, seiko muchiita kunge muchiri vayo, muchizviisa pasi pemitemo yayo inoti: “usabata! usaravira! usagunzva!”? izvi zvose zvichaparadzwa nokubata kwazvo, nokuti zvakavakwa pamirayiro yavanhu nokudzidzisa kwavanhu. zvirokwazvo mitemo yakadai inoita seino uchenjeri, nokunamata kwavo kwokuzvipa, kuzvininipisa kwavo kwenhema uye nokurwadzisa kwavo muviri, asi zvisingagoni kudzivisa kuchiva kwomuviri.

3

sezvo, zvino, makamutswa pamwe chete nakristu, isai mwoyo yenyu pazvinhu zviri kumusoro, uko kugere kristu kuruoko rworudyi rwaallah. isai pfungwa dzenyu pazvinhu zviri kumusoro, kwete pazvinhu zvenyika. nokuti makafa, uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa zvino nakristu muna allah. panoonekwa kristu, iye upenyu hwenyu, ipapo nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. naizvozvo, urayai zvose zvenyu zvenyika zvinoti: upombwe, netsvina, nokusachena, nokuchiva, nokuda zvakaipa uye kukara, ndiko kunamata zvifananidzo. nokuda kwaizvozvi, kutsamwa kwaallah kuri kuuya. imi maimbofamba mazviri, muupenyu hwamaimborarama. asi zvino munofanira kuzvidzora pane zvose zvakadai sezvizvi zvinoti: kutsamwa, hasha, ruvengo, makuhwa, nokutaura zvakaora zvichibva pamiromo yenyu. musareverana nhema, sezvo makabvisa munhu wenyu wekare namabasa ake mukafuka munhu mutsva, ari kuvandudzwa mukuziva, mumufananidzo womusiki wake. apa hapachina mugiriki kana muyeahudha, kudzingiswa kana kusadzingiswa, mutorwa kana musitia, nhapwa kana akasununguka, asi kristu ndiye zvose, uye ari mune zvose. naizvozvo savasanangurwa vaallah, vatsvene uye vanodikanwa kwazvo, zvifukidzei netsitsi, nounyoro, nokuzvininipisa, nokupfava uye nomwoyo murefu. munzwirane tsitsi uye mukanganwirane pamhosva ipi zvayo yamunenge matadzirana. mukanganwire sezvamakakanganwirwa nashe. uye pazvinhu zvose izvi fukai rudo, runokusunganidzai pamwe chete muhumwe hwakakwana. rugare rwakristu ngarutonge mumwoyo yenyu, sezvo senhengo dzomuviri mumwe makadanirwa kurugare. uye munofanira kuvonga. shoko rakristu ngarigare zvakakwana mamuri pamunenge muchidzidzisana muchirayirana nouchenjeri hwose, uye muchiimba mapisarema, dzimbo nenziyo dzomweya muchivonga allah mumwoyo yenyu. uye zvose zvamunoita, mushoko kana mumabasa, itai zvose muzita raishe yeahoshua, muchivonga allah ivo baba kubudikidza naye. vakadzi, zviisei pasi pavarume venyu, sezvazvakafanira muna she. varume, idai vakadzi venyu musingavabati nehasha. vana, teererai vabereki venyu pazvinhu zvose, nokuti izvi zvinofadza ishe. madzibaba, musanetsa vana venyu, nokuti vanozoora mwoyo. varanda, teererai vatenzi venyu vapanyika muzvinhu zvose; uye muzviite, kwete kuti vakuonei chete uye kuti mudikanwe navo, asi nokutendeka kwomwoyo uye nokutya ishe. zvose zvamunoita, itai zvose nomwoyo wose, savanhu vanoshandira ishe, kwete munhu, sezvo muchiziva kuti muchagamuchira nhaka kubva kuna she somubayiro. ndiishe kristu wamunoshumira. ani naani anoita zvakaipa achatsiviwa nokuda kwezvakaipa zvake, uye hapana kutsaura vanhu.

4

vatenzi, ipai varanda venyu zvinhu zvakanaka uye zvakaenzana, nokuti munozviziva kuti nemiwo muna vatenzi kudenga. muzvipire pakunyengetera, makanyatsorinda uye muchivonga. uye mutinyengetererewo kuti allah azarure mukova weshoko redu, kuitira kuti tigoparidza chakavanzika chakristu, icho chandakasungirwa. nyengeterai kuti ndigone kuparidza zvakajeka, sezvandinofanira. muve vakachenjera pamafambiro enyu kuna vari kunze; mungwarire nguva yenyu. kutaura kwenyu ngakugare kwakazara nenyasha nguva dzose, kwakarungwa nomunyu, kuitira kuti muzive mapinduriro amunoita vanhu vose. tikikasi achakuudzai mashoko ose pamusoro pangu. iye ihama inodikanwa kwazvo, mushumiri akatendeka nomushandi pamwe chete neni muna she. ndiri kumutuma kwamuri nechinangwa ichi kuti muzive zvatiri uye kuti akurudzire mwoyo yenyu. ari kuuya pamwe chete naonesimasi, hama yedu yakatendeka uye inodikanwa, anova mumwe wenyu. vachakuudzai zvose zviri kuitika kuno. musungwa pamwe chete neni aristakusi anokukwazisai, namako, hama yabhanabhasi anokukwazisaiwo. (makarayirwa zvokuita naye; kana asvika kwamuri, mumugamuchire.) yeahoshua anonzi jastasi, anokukwazisaiwo. ava ndivo vayeahudha bedzi pakati pavamwe vandinoshanda navo muumambo hwaallah, uye vanondinyaradza. epafurasi, mumwe wenyu nomuranda wakristu yeahoshua, anokukwazisai. anogara achirwa muminyengetero nokuda kwenyu, kuti mumire makasimba mukuda kwose kwaallah, makura uye muzere nokuziva. ndinomupupurira kuti anokushandirai nesimba pamwe chete naavo vari paraodhikea, napahirapori. shamwari yedu inodikanwa ruka, chiremba, nadhemasi vanokukwazisai. ndikwazisirei hama dziri paraodhikea, nanimufa nekereke iri mumba make. mushure mokuverengwa kwetsamba kwamuri, muone kuti yaverengwawo mukereke yeraodhikea uye kuti nemiwo muverenge tsamba inobva kuraodhikea. muudze akipasi kuti, “ona kuti wapedza basa rawakagamuchira muna she.” ini, pauro ndanyora kwaziso iyi noruoko rwangu pachangu. rangarirai ngetani dzangu. nyasha ngadzive nemi.

1_thessalonians

1

pauro, sirasi natimoti, kukereke yavatesaronika muna allah baba naishe yeahoshua kristu: nyasha norugare ngazvive nemi. tinogara tichivonga allah nokuda kwenyu mose, tichikutaurai muminyengetero yedu. tinoramba tichirangarira pamberi paallah wedu nababa vedu, basa renyu rinobva pakutenda, nokushanda kwenyu kunobva parudo, uye nokutsungirira kwenyu kunobva patariro iri muna ishe yeahoshua kristu. nokuti tinoziva, hama dzinodikanwa naallah, kuti akakusarudzai, nokuti vhangeri redu harina kuuya kwamuri namashoko bedzi, asi nesimbawo, nomweya mutsvene uye nokuziva kwakadzama. munoziva kuti takagara sei pakati penyu nokuda kwenyu. makava vateveri vedu uye nevaishe; pakati pokutambudzika kukuru, makagamuchira shoko nomufaro unopiwa namweya mutsvene. nokudaro makava muenzaniso kuvatendi vose vari mumasedhonia neakaya. shoko rashe rakanzwika kubva kwamuri kwete mumasedhonia neakaya bedzi, kutenda kwenyu muna allah kwakazivikanwa kwose kwose. naizvozvo hatifaniri kutaura chinhu pamusoro pazvo, nokuti ivo pachavo vanozivisa kuti takagamuchirwa sei navo. vanotaura kuti makadzokera sei kuna allah muchibva kuzvifananidzo kuti mushumire allah mupenyu uye wechokwadi, uye kuti mumirire mwanakomana wake anobva kudenga, uyo waakamutsa kubva kuvakafa, yeahoshua, anotinunura kubva pakutsamwa kuchauya.

2

munoziva, hama, kuti kushanya kwedu kwamuri hakuna kuva pasina. takanga tambotambudzika uye tikatukwa mufiripi, sezvamunoziva, asi norubatsiro rwaallah wedu hatina kurega kukuparidzirai vhangeri rake pakati pokupikiswa kukuru. nokuti chikumbiro chatinoita hachibvi pakukanganisa kana pamufungo usina kunaka, uye hatisi kuedza kukunyengerai. asi, tinotaura savanhu vakatenderwa naallah kuti tipiwe vhangeri. hatisi kuedza kufadza vanhu asi allah, iye anoedza mwoyo yedu. munozviziva kuti isu hatibati kumeso, uye hatina kuisa chifukidzo chokufukidza kukarira pfuma, allah ndiye chapupu chedu. takanga tisingatsvaki kurumbidzwa kunobva kuvanhu, kwete kunobva kwamuri kana ani zvake. savapostori vakristu tingadai takava mutoro kwamuri, asi takanga tiri vanyoro pakati penyu, samai vanochengeta vana vavo vaduku. taikudai zvikuru zvokuti takafara kuti tigoverane nemi, kwete vhangeri raallah bedzi, asi noupenyu hweduwo, nokuti makanga madikanwa nesu kwazvo. zvirokwazvo munorangarira, hama, kutambudzika kwedu nokuomerwa kwedu; takashanda usiku namasikati kuti tirege kuremedza munhu upi zvake patakanga tichiparidza vhangeri raallah kwamuri. imi muri zvapupu, uye naallahwo, kuti takanga tiri vatsvene sei, vakarurama uye vasina chavangapomerwa pakati penyu imi vanotenda. nokuti munoziva kuti takabata mumwe nomumwe wenyu sababa vanobata vana vavo, tichikukurudzirai tichikunyaradzai uye tichikukurudzirai kuti murarame zvakafanira kuna allah, iye anokudanai kuumambo hwake nokukubwinya kwake. nesuwo tinotenda allah nguva dzose, nokuti pamakagamuchira shoko raallah, ramakanzwa kwatiri, makarigamuchira, kwete seshoko ravanhu, asi sezvariri, iro shoko raallah, riri kubata mamuri imi vanotenda. nokuti imi, hama, makava vateveri vekereke dzaallah dziri mujudhea, dziri muna kristu yeahoshua: makatambudzwa navanhu vomunyika menyu, saizvozvo kereke idzodzo dzakatambudzwawo navayeahudha, ivo vakauraya ishe yeahoshua uye navaprofita uye vakatidzinga nesuwo. havana kufadza allah uye vanorwa navanhu vose mukushinga kwavo kutidzivisa kuti titaure kuvahedheni kuti vaponeswe. nenzira iyi vanoramba vachiunganidza zvivi zvavo kusvikira kumagumo. kutsamwa kwaallah kwazosvika pamusoro pavo pakupedzisira. asi, hama, patakanga taparadzaniswa nemi kwechinguva chiduku (pakuonekwa, kwete mupfungwa), mukushuva kwedu kukuru takaedza chose kukuonai. nokuti takanga tichida kuuya kwamuri, chokwadi, ini pauro, ndakada kuita izvozvo, nguva nenguva, asi satani akatidzivisa. nokuti tariro yedu ndeipiko, mufaro wedu kana korona yatichazvirumbidza nayo pamberi paishe wedu yeahoshua paanouya? ko, hamusimi here? zvirokwazvo ndimi kubwinya kwedu nomufaro wedu.

3

saka patakanga tisingagoni kuramba takatsunga, takafunga kuti zvaiva nani kuti tisare toga paatene. takatuma timoti, anova ndiye hama yedu nomushandi waallah pamwe chete nesu pakuparadzira vhangeri rakristu, kuti akusimbisei nokukukurudzirai mukutenda kwenyu, kuti parege kuva nomunhu anozungunutswa nemiedzo iyi. munozviziva chose kuti takanga takanangana nayo. chokwadi ndechokuti, pataiva nemi, takaramba tichikuudzai kuti tichatambudzwa. uye zvakabva zvaita saizvozvo, sezvamunoziva kwazvo. nokuda kwaizvozvo, pandakanga ndisisagoni kutsunga, ndakatuma shoko kuti ndizive nezvokutenda kwenyu. ndakatya kuti zvimwe muedzi angadaro akakuedzai uye kubata kwedu kukava pasina. asi timoti achangosvika kwatiri zvino achibva kwamuri uye akauya namashoko akanaka ezvokutenda kwenyu norudo rwenyu. akatiudza kuti munogara muchifunga zvakanaka nezvedu uye kuti munoshuva kutiona, sezvatinoshuva nesuwo kukuonai. naizvozvo, hama, mukusuwa kwedu kwose uye nokutambudzwa kwedu, takakurudzirwa pamusoro penyu nokuda kwokutenda kwenyu. nokuti zvino tiri vapenyu chose, sezvo imi mumire nesimba muna she. tichavonga allah zvizere sei nokuda kwenyu kuti tidzorere mufaro wose watinawo pamberi paallah wedu nokuda kwenyu? usiku namasikati tinonyengetera zvikuru kuti tikuoneizve uye kuti tizadzise zvamusina pakutenda kwenyu. zvino allah wedu, baba pachavo naishe wedu yeahoshua ngavatizarurire nzira kuti tiuye kwamuri. ishe ngaakurise rudo rwenyu uye rupfachukire kuno mumwe nomumwe nokuvanhu vose, sezvinoita rwedu kwamuri. ngaasimbise mwoyo yenyu kuitira kuti mushayiwe chamunopomerwa uye muve vatsvene pamberi paallah wedu nababa vedu, pakuuya kwaishe wedu yeahoshua navatsvene vake vose.

4

pakupedzisira, hama, takakurayirai kuti munofanira kurarama sei kuitira kuti mugofadza allah, sezvamuri kurarama. zvino tinokukumbirai uye tinokukurudzirai muna she yeahoshua kuti murambe muchiita izvi uye muchiwedzera. nokuti munoziva zvatakakurayirai nesimba raishe yeahoshua. kuda kwaallah kuti muitwe vatsvene: kuti murege upombwe; kuti mumwe nomumwe wenyu adzidze kudzora muviri wake nenzira tsvene uye inokudzwa, asingaiti mukuchiva sezvinoitwa navahedheni, vasingazivi allah; uye kuti pane izvozvi parege kuva nomunhu anotadzira hama yake kana kumutorera chinhu. ishe acharanga vanhu nokuda kwezvivi zvakadaro zvose, sezvatakakuudzai kare uye tikakuyambirai. nokuti allah haana kutidanira kutsvina, asi kuti tirarame upenyu hutsvene. naizvozvo, uyo anoramba kurayira uku haasi kuramba munhu asi allah, iye anokupai mweya wake mutsvene. zvino kana rwuri rudo kuhama, hatitsvaki kukunyorerai, nokuti imi pachenyu makadzidziswa naallah kuti mudanane. uyezve, munoda hama dzose mumasedhonia yose. asi tinokukurudzirai, hama, kuti muite izvozvo uye muchiwedzera. shingairirai kuti mugare upenyu hworunyararo, muchibata basa renyu namaoko enyu, sezvatakakuudzai, kuitira kuti upenyu hwamazuva ose huwane kukudzwa navari kunze uye kuitira kuti murege kusendamira kuno mumwe munhu. hama, hatidi kuti muve vasingazivi pamusoro paavo vavete, kana kuchema savamwe vavo, vasina tariro. isu tinotenda kuti yeahoshua akafa uye akamukazve, nokudaro isu tinotenda kuti allah achauyisa pamwe chete nayeahoshua avo vakavata maari. samashoko ashe pachake, tinokuudzai kuti isu vachiri vapenyu, vachasara kusvikira pakuuya kwashe, zvirokwazvo hatizotangiri avo vakavata. nokuti ishe pachake achaburuka achibva kudenga, nokurayira kukuru, nenzwi romutumwa mukuru uye nokurira kwehwamanda yaallah, uye vakafa muna kristu vachatanga kumuka. shure kwaizvozvo, isu vachiri vapenyu uye vakasara, tichatorwa pamwe chete navo mumakore kuti tisangane nashe mudenga. nokudaro tichava nashe nokusingaperi. naizvozvo kurudziranai namashoko aya.

5

zvino, hama, kana dziri nguva kana misi hatifaniri kuti tikunyorerei, nokuti imi munoziva kwazvo kuti zuva rashe richauya sembavha usiku. vanhu pavanenge vachiti, “rugare norunyararo,” kuparadzwa kuchasvika pamusoro pavo nokukurumidza, somukadzi ane mimba worwadziwa, uye havangapunyuki. asi imi, hama, hamusi murima zvokuti zuva iri rikusvikirei sembavha. imi mose muri vanakomana vechiedza navanakomana vamasikati. hatizi vousiku kana verima. saka zvino, ngatiregei kuita savamwe vavete, asi ngatisvinurei uye tive vanozvidzora. nokuti avo vanovata, vanovata usiku, uye avo vanodhakwa, vanodhakwa usiku. asi sezvo tiri vamasikati, ngatizvidzorei, takapfeka kutenda norudo sechidzitiro chechipfuva, netariro yoruponeso senguwani. nokuti allah haana kutisarudza kuti tive vokutsamwirwa asi kuti tigamuchire ruponeso kubudikidza naishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. akatifira isu kuitira kuti, kunyange takasvinura kana tivete, tigare pamwe chete naye. naizvozvo kurudziranai uye muvakane, sezvamunoita zvino. zvino tinokukumbirai, hama, kuti muremekedze avo vanoshanda nesimba pakati penyu, vari pamusoro penyu muna she uye vanokurayirai. muvakudze zvikuru murudo nokuda kwebasa ravo. garai murunyararo nomumwe nomumwe wenyu. uye tinokukurudzirai, hama, kuti muyambire avo vano usimbe, mukurudzire vanotya, batsirai vasina simba, muite mwoyo murefu kuvanhu vose. muve nechokwadi kuti kurege kuva nomunhu anodzorera chakaipa nechakaipa, asi edzai kuva nomwoyo munyoro kuno mumwe nomumwe wenyu uye nokuna vose. farai nguva dzose; rambai muchinyengetera; vongai pazvinhu zvose, nokuti ndiko kuda kwaallah kwamuri muna kristu yeahoshua. musadzima moto womweya; musazvidza zviprofita. edzai zvinhu zvose. batirirai kune zvakanaka. regai zvakaipa zvose. allah pachake, iye allah worugare, ngaakuitei vatsvene kwazvo kwazvo. mweya wenyu wose, nomwoyo uye nomuviri zvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. iye anokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. hama, tinyengeterereiwo. kwazisai hama dzose nokutsvoda kutsvene. ndinokurayirai pamberi paishe kuti tsamba iyi iverengerwe hama dzose. nyasha dzaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu ngadzive nemi.

2_thessalonians

1

pauro, sirasi natimoti, kukereke yavatesaronika muna allah baba vedu naishe yeahoshua kristu: nyasha norugare zvinobva kuna allah ivo baba nokuna ishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. tinofanira kuramba tichivonga allah nguva dzose nokuda kwenyu, hama, uye zvakanaka izvozvo, nokuti kutenda kwenyu kuri kukura zvakanyanya, uye rudo rwamunarwo kuno mumwe nomumwe wenyu rwuri kukura. naizvozvo, pakati pekereke dzaallah tinozvirumbidza pamusoro pokutsungirira kwenyu uye nokutenda kwenyu nomukutambudzika kwose nokuedzwa kwamunotsunga makuri. zvose izvi ndizvo zvinoratidza kuti kutonga kwaallah kwakarurama, uye nokuda kwaizvozvi muchanzi makafanirwa noumambo hwaallah, ihwo hwamunotamburira. allah anoruramisira: achatsiva nokutambudza avo vanokutambudzai, uye agozorodza imi vari kutambudzika, uye nesuwo. izvi zvichaitika ishe yeahoshua paacharatidzwa kubva kudenga mumurazvo womoto unopfuta ane vatumwa vake vane simba. acharanga vaya vasingazivi allah uye vasingateereri vhangeri raishe wedu yeahoshua. vacharangwa nokuparadzwa kusingaperi, uye vachapfigirwa kunze pamberi paishe, uye napaukuru hwesimba rake, pazuva raanouya kuzokudzwa muvanhu vake vatsvene uye sechishamiso pakati paavo vose vakatenda. izvi zvinosanganisira imi, nokuti makatenda uchapupu hwedu kwamuri. nomurangariro uyu, isu tinoramba tichikunyengetererai, kuti allah wedu ati makafanira kudana kwake, uye kuti nesimba rake azadzise zvinangwa zvenyu zvose zvakanaka nebasa rose rakamutswa nokutenda kwenyu. tinonyengeterera izvi kuitira kuti zita raishe wedu yeahoshua rikudzwe mamuri, uye imi maari, maererano nenyasha dzaallah wedu naishe yeahoshua kristu.

2

pamusoro pezvokuuya kwaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu uye nokuungana kwedu kwaari, tinokukumbirai, hama, kuti murege kuzungunuswa kana kuvhundutswa nechimwe chiprofita, chiziviso kana tsamba inonzi yakabva kwatiri, ichiti zuva rashe ratosvika. musarega munhu upi zvake achikunyengerai nenzira ipi zvayo, nokuti zuva iro harisviki kusvikira kumukira kwaitika uye munhu wokutsauka aratidzwa, iye munhu akatongerwa kuparadzwa. achapikisa uye achazvisimudzira pamusoro pezvinhu zvinonzi allah kana zvinonamatwa, nokudaro anozvigadza mutemberi yaallah achizviita allah. hamurangariri here kuti pandaiva nemi ndaisikuudzai zvinhu izvi? uye iye zvino munoziva chinomudzivisa, kuti aratidzwe nenguva yakafanira. nokuti chakavanzika chesimba rokutsauka chotoshanda basa; asi uyo anomudzivisa zvino acharamba achiita izvozvo kusvikira iye abviswa. uye ipapo munhu wokutsauka achazoratidzwa, uyo achaparadzwa naishe yeahoshua nokufema kwomuromo wake, achimuparadza nokubwinya kwokuuya kwake. kuuya kwomunhu wokutsauka kuchaitika sebasa rasatani kuchiratidza nemhando dzose dzezvishamiso zvenhema, zviratidzo neminana, uye nokuipa kwose kunonyengera avo vanoparara. vanoparara nokuti vakaramba kuda chokwadi uti vagoponeswa. nokuda kwaizvozvi, allah anovatumira mweya une simba wokunyengera kuti vatende nhema uye kuti vose vagotongwa, avo vasina kutenda chokwadi, asi vakafarira zvakaipa. asi tinofanira kuvonga allah nguva dzose nokuda kwenyu, hama dzinodiwa naishe, nokuti kubva pakutanga allah akakusarudzai kuti muponeswe nebasa rokuchenesa romweya uye nokutenda chokwadi. akakudanirai izvi nevhangeri redu, kuti mugovane mukubwinya kwaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. saka zvino, hama mirai nesimba uye mubatirire kudzidziso dzatakakudzidzisai, neshoko romuromo kana netsamba. ishe wedu yeahoshua kristu pachake uye allah baba vedu, iye akatida uye nenyasha dzake akatipa upenyu husingaperi, kurudziro netariro yakanaka, ngaakurudzire mwoyo yenyu uye akusimbisei mumabasa nomumashoko ose akanaka.

3

pakupedzisira, hama, mutinyengetererewo kuti shoko rashe rikurumidze kuparadzirwa uye kuti rikudzwe, sezvazvakanga zvakaita kwamuri. uye munyengetere kuti tirwirwe kubva kune akaipa, nokuti havasi vose vanotenda. asi ishe akatendeka, uye achakusimbisai nokukudzivirirai kubva kune akaipa. tinotenda muna she kuti muri kuita uye mucharamba muchiita zvinhu zvatinokurayirai. allah ngaatungamirire mwoyo yenyu murudo rwaallah uye nomukutsungirira kwakristu. muzita raishe yeahoshua kristu, tinokurayirai hama, kuti mubve pahama imwe neimwe inoita zvousimbe uye isingararami maererano nedzidziso yamakagamuchira kubva kwatiri. nokuti imi pachenyu munoziva kuti munofanira kutevera sei muenzaniso wedu. takanga tisiri simbe patakanga tinemi, uye hatina kudya chokudya chomunhu tisingaripi. asi, takashanda usiku namasikati, tichishanda zvikuru uye tichitambudzika kuitira kuti tirege kuva mutoro kwamuri. takaita izvi, kwete nokuda kwokuti hatina kodzero yokuti tibatsirwe pakadaro, asi kuitira kuti tive muenzaniso kwamuri wokuti mutevere. nokuti kunyange pataiva nemi, takakupai murayiro uyu wokuti: “kana munhu asingashandi, ngaarege kudya.” tinonzwa kuti vamwe pakati penyu vane usimbe. havashandi; havaregi zvavamwe. vanhu vakadaro tinovarayira uye tinovakurudzira muna ishe yeahoshua kristu kuti vashande chinyararire vagodya chingwa chavanoshandira. uye kana murimi, hama, musaneta pakuita zvakanaka. kana pano munhu asingateereri kurayira kwedu mutsamba iyi, mumungwarire. musafambidzana naye, kuitira kuti anyare. asi musamutora somuvengi, asi mumuyambire sehama. zvino ishe worugare ngaakupei rugare nguva dzose nomunzira dzose. ini pauro, ndanyora kwaziso iyi noruoko rwangu, chinova ndicho chiratidzo mutsamba dzangu dzose. nyasha dzaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu ngadzive nemi mose.

1_timothy

1

pauro, mupostori wakristu yeahoshua nokurayira kwaallah muponesi wedu, nakristu yeahoshua, tariro yedu, kuna timoti mwanakomana wangu chaiye pakutenda: nyasha, ngoni norugare zvinobva kuna allah baba nakristu yeahoshua ishe wedu. sezvandakakumbira zvikuru kwauri pandakaenda kumasedhonia, gara paefeso kuitira kuti ugorayira vamwe varume kuti varege kudzidzisa dzidziso dzenhema, kana kuzvipira kungano nokunhoroondo dzamazita amadzitateguru dzisingaperi. izvi zvinongomutsa nharo panzvimbo yebasa raallah rinoitwa nokutenda. chinovavarirwa nomurayiro uyu ndirwo rudo runobva pamwoyo wakachena, hana yakanaka nokutenda kwechokwadi. vamwe vakarasika kubva pazvinhu izvi uye vakatsaukira mukutaura kusina maturo. vanoda kuva vadzidzisi vomurayiro, asi havazivi zvavari kutaura pamusoro pazvo kana izvo zvavari kushingira kusimbisa. tinoziva kuti murayiro wakanaka kana munhu achiushandisa zvakanaka. tinozivawo kuti murayiro hauna kuitirwa vakarurama asi vanodarika murayiro navanomukira, vasina umwari navatadzi, vasiri vatsvene navasina chinamato; vaya vanouraya vanababa vavo kana vanamai vavo, vanouraya vanhu, mhombwe navanopomba navamwe varume, navanotengesa vanhu kuti vave varanda, varevi venhema, navanopika nhema, uye kana chimwe chipi zvacho chinopesana nedzidziso yechokwadi inosimbisa vhangeri rokubwinya, raallah akaropafadzwa, iro raakapa kwandiri. ndinovonga kristu yeahoshua ishe wedu, akandipa simba, akati ndakatendeka, akandiisa pabasa rake. kunyange zvazvo ndaimbomhura allah ndiri mutambudzi nomunhu wokumanikidza, ndakaitirwa ngoni nokuti ndakazviita mukusaziva uye nomukusatenda. nyasha zhinji dzaishe wedu dzakadururwa pamusoro pangu, pamwe chete nokutenda norudo zviri muna kristu yeahoshua. herino shoko rezvokwadi rinofanira kutendwa kwazvo: kristu yeahoshua akauya munyika kuti aponese vatadzi, ini ndiri mukuru wavo. asi nokuda kwechikonzero ichochi ndakaitirwa ngoni kuitira kuti mandiri ini mutadzi mukuru, kristu yeahoshua aratidze mwoyo murefu wake usingaperi kuti ndive muenzaniso kuna avo vachatenda kwaari uye vagowana upenyu husingaperi. zvino iye ishe asingaperi, asingafi, asingaonekwi, iye allah oga, ngaave nokukudzwa nokubwinya nokusingaperi-peri. timoti, mwanakomana wangu, ndinokupa murayiro uyu maererano nezvakaprofitwa kare pamusoro pako, kuti kana ukautevera ucharwa kurwa kwakanaka, wakabata kutenda uye nehana yakanaka. vamwe vakaramba mirayiro iyi vakarasikirwa nokutenda kwavo. vamwe vavo ndihimenio naarekizanda, avo vandakaisa kuna satani kuti vadzidziswe kuti varege kumhura allah.

2

naizvozvo, pakutanga kwezvose, ndinokurayirai kuti vanhu vose vakumbirirwe, vanyengetererwe, varevererwe, vavongerwe, madzimambo navose vari kutonga, kuti tigare norugare uye norunyararo pakurarama muumwari hwose nomuutsvene. izvi zvakanaka uye zvinofadza allah muponesi wedu. anoda kuti vanhu vose vaponeswe uye kuti vazive chokwadi. nokuti kuna allah mumwe chete, nomurevereri mumwe chete pakati paallah navanhu, ndiye munhu kristu yeahoshua. uyo akazvipa sorudzikinuro kuvanhu vose, uchapupu hwakapiwa panguva yakafanira. uye nokuda kwechikonzero ichi ndakaitwa muparidzi nomupostori, ndinokuudzai chokwadi, handisi kureva nhema, uye ndiri mudzidzisi wokutenda kwechokwadi kune vedzimwe ndudzi. ndinoda kuti varume kwose kwose vasimudze maoko matsvene pakunyengetera, vasina kutsamwa kana nharo. ndinodawo kuti vakadzi vapfeke zvakafanira, zvakanaka zvino kuzvidzora, kwete nebvudzi rakarukwa kana negoridhe kana namaperera kana nguo dzemari zhinji, asi ngavave namabasa akanaka, sezvakafanira vakadzi vanoti vanonamata allah. mukadzi ngaadzidze akanyarara uye nokuzviisa pasi kwose. handitenderi kuti mukadzi adzidzise kana kuti ave nesimba pamusoro pomurume; anofanira kunyarara. nokuti adhamu ndiye akatanga kuumbwa, tevere evha. uye adhamu haasi iye akanyengerwa; mukadzi ndiye akanyengerwa akava mutadzi. asi vakadzi vachaponeswa nokubereka vana kana vachirambira mukutenda, murudo noutsvene, uye nokuzvidzora.

3

herino shoko rechokwadi: kana munhu achitsvaka basa romutariri, anoda basa rinokudzika. zvino mutariri anofanira kuva munhu asina chaangapomerwa, murume womukadzi mumwe chete, anozvidzora, anokudzwa, anoitira vaeni rudo, anoziva kudzidzisa, asingadhakwi, asingarwi uye ano unyoro, asina gakava, asingakariri mari. anofanira kubata imba yake zvakanaka nokuona kuti vana vake vanomuteerera uye vachimukudza zvakanaka. (kana munhu asingazivi kubata imba yake zvakanaka, angachengeta seiko kereke yaallah?) asava mutendi mutsva, nokuti angazozvikudza akazotongwa zvimwe chetezvo sadhiabhori. anofanirawo kupupurirwa zvakanaka navari kunze, kuitira kuti arege kuzvidzwa, uye agowira mumusungo wadhiabhori. saizvozvowo, madhikoni ngavave vanhu vanokudzwa, vanorevesa, vasinganwi waini zhinji, uye vasingatsvaki pfuma yakaipa. vanofanira kuchengetedza zvakadzikadzika zvokutenda nehana yakanaka. vanofanira kutanga vaedzwa, uye kana pasina chavangapomerwa, ngavashumire samadhikoni. nenzira imwe cheteyo, vakadzi vavo ngavave vanokudzwa, vasingacheri vamwe asi vanozvidzora, vakatendeka pazvinhu zvose. mudhikoni anofanira kuva murume ano mukadzi mumwe chete uye anofanira kugona kubata vana vake nemba yake zvakanaka. vaya vakashumira zvakanaka vanozviwanira zita rakanaka uye nokusimbiswa kukuru pakutenda kwavo muna kristu yeahoshua. kunyange zvazvo ndine tariro yokuuya kwauri nokukurumidza, ndinokunyorera dzidziso idzi kuitira kuti, kana ndikanonoka, uchaziva kuti vanhu vanofanira kuzvibata sei mumba maallah, inova kereke yaallah mupenyu, mbiru nenheyo yechokwadi. pasina kana mubvunzo, chakavanzika choumwari chikuru kwazvo: iye akaratidzwa panyama, akaruramiswa nomweya, akaonekwa navatumwa, akaparidzwa pakati pendudzi panyika vakatenda kwaari, akakwidzwa mukubwinya.

4

mweya anotaura pachena kuti panguva dzinouya vamwe vachatsauka kubva pakutenda vagotevera mweya inonyengera nedzidziso dzamadhimoni. dzidziso dzakadai dzinouya navaya vanoreva nhema, vane hana dzakapiswa sokunge nesimbi inopisa. vanodzivisa vanhu kuwanana uye vachivarayira kuti varege kudya zvimwe zvokudya, izvo zvakasikwa naallah kuti zvigamuchirwe nokuvonga naavo vanotenda uye vanoziva chokwadi. nokuti chose chakasikwa naallah chakanaka, uye hapana chinofanira kuraswa kana chichigamuchirwa nokuvonga, nokuti chinoitwa chitsvene neshoko raallah nokunyengetera. kana ukadzidzisa hama zvinhu izvi, uchava mushumiri akanaka wakristu yeahoshua, akarerwa muzvokwadi yokutenda uye nedzidziso yakanaka yawakatevera. siyana nengano dzisina umwari uye nengano dzechembere; asi uzvirovedzere paumwari. nokuti kurovedza muviri kunobatsira zvishoma hako asi umwari hunokosha pazvinhu zvose, hune vimbiso kune zvose muupenyu huno uye nomuupenyu hunouya. iri ishoko rechokwadi rinofanira kutendwa zvizere uye nokuda kwaizvozvi tinoshingaira nokurwa, nokuti takaisa tariro yedu muna allah mupenyu, anova ndiye muponesi wavanhu vose uye zvikuru sei vaya vanotenda. rayira uye udzidzise zvinhu izvi. ngakurege kuva nomunhu anokuzvidza nokuda kwouduku hwako, asi uve muenzaniso kuvatendi mukutaura, muupenyu, murudo, mukutenda uye napakuchena kwomwoyo. kusvikira ndauya, shingaira pakuverenga rugwaro kukereke, kuparidza nokudzidzisa. usarega kushandisa chipo chako, chakapiwa kwauri kubudikidza neshoko rechiprofita pawakaiswa maoko pamusoro navakuru. shingaira pazvinhu izvi, uzviite nomwoyo wako wose, kuitira kuti munhu wose aone kupfuurira mberi kwako. uzvichengete kwazvo iwe nedzidziso yako. utsungirire pazviri, nokuti kana ukazviita, uchazviponesa iwe navanokunzwa.

5

usatsiura murume mukuru nehasha, asi utaure naye sounotaura nababa vako. vaduku uvabate savanunʼuna vako. vakadzi vakuru savanamai, uye vakadzi vaduku sehanzvadzi, nokuchena kwose kwomwoyo. ipa rukudzo rwakafanira kuchirikadzi dziri chirikadzi chaidzo. asi kana chirikadzi ina vana kana vazukuru, ava ngavatange ivo kudzidza kurarama chinamato chavo kumhuri dzavo uye vadzosere zvakafanira kuvabereki vavo uye navakwegura, nokuti izvi zvinofadza allah. chirikadzi iri chirikadzi chaiyo uye yakasara ichingova yoga inoisa tariro yayo kuna allah uye inogara ichinyengetera nokukumbira kuna allah usiku namasikati. asi chirikadzi inoraramira kuzvifadza yakafa ichiri mhenyu. rayirawo vanhu zvinhu izvi, kuitira kuti kurege kuva nomunhu angapomerwa. kana munhu asingachengeti hama dzake, uye zvikuru sei veimba yake, arasa kutenda, uye akaipa kukunda asingatendi. hakuna chirikadzi inganyorwa pamazita echirikadzi kana isina makore anopfuura makumi matanhatu, yakanga yakatendeka kumurume wayo, uye ichinyatsozivikanwa pamabasa ayo akanaka, akafanana nokurera vana, nokubata vaeni zvakanaka, kushambidza tsoka dzavatsvene, kubatsira vaya vari mumatambudziko, uye yakazvipira kuita pamabasa ose akanaka. asi kana dziri chirikadzi duku usadzinyora pamazita aya. nokuti kana nyama yadzo yakunda kuzvipira kwadzo kuna kristu, dzichazotsvaka kuwanikwa. naizvozvo dzichazvivigira kutongwa, nokuti dzinenge dzaputsa kutenda kwadzo kwokutanga. pamusoro pezvo, dzinoita tsika dzokuva nousimbe uye dzichipota nedzimba. uye hadzizi simbe bedzi, asi vaitiwo vamakuhwa, uye vasina basa ravanoita, vachitaura zvisakafanira. naizvozvo ndinoti kuchirikadzi duku ngadziwanikwe, kuti dzibereke vana, dzichengete dzimba dzadzo uye kuti dzisapa muvengi mukana wokupomera nawo. vamwe vakatotsauka kare vachitevera satani. kana mukadzi upi zvake mutendi aine chirikadzi mumhuri yake, anofanira kudzibatsira uye arege kuita kuti kereke iremedzwe nadzo, kuitira kuti kereke igone kubatsira chirikadzi dziri kushayiwa zvechokwadi. vakuru vanobata kereke zvakanaka vakafanira kukudzwa zvakapetwa kaviri, zvikuru sei vaya vanoita basa rokuparidza nokudzidzisa. nokuti rugwaro runoti, “usasunga muromo wenzombe kana ichipura zviyo,” uye “mushandi akafanirwa nomubayiro wake.” usagamuchira mhaka inopomerwa mukuru kunze kwokunge yauyiswa nezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu. avo vanotadza vanofanira kutsiurwa pamberi pavanhu, kuitira kuti vamwe vagoyambirwa. ndinokurayira, pamberi paallah nakristu yeahoshua uye napamberi pavatumwa vakasanangurwa, kuti uchengete mirayiro iyi zvakanaka, uye usingaiti uchitsaura vanhu. usakurumidza kuisa maoko pamusoro pomunhu, uye usabatana nezvivi zvavamwe. zvichengete kuti uve wakachena. rega kunwa mvura yoga, uye unwe waini shoma nokuda kwomudumbu mako uye nokurwara-rwara kwako. zvivi zvavamwe vanhu zvinoonekwa pachena, zvichivatangira kusvika panzvimbo yokutongwa; zvivi zvavamwe zvinotevera mushure mavo. nenzira imwe cheteyo, mabasa akanaka anoonekwawo pachena, uye kunyange naasina kudaro haangavanziki.

6

vose varanda vari pasi pejoko rouranda vanofanira kukudza vatenzi vavo zvizere, kuitira kuti zita raallah nedzidziso yedu zvirege kumhurwa. avo vana vatenzi vanotenda ngavarege kuvazvidza nokuda kwokuti ihama. asi kutoti vanofanira kuvashumira zviri nani, nokuti vaya vanobatsirwa nebasa ravo vatendi, uye vadikanwi kwavari. izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvaunofanira kuvadzidzisa uye nokuvarayira. kana munhu achidzidzisa dzidziso dzenhema uye asingabvumi dzidziso yakanaka yaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu uye nedzidziso youmwari, anongozvikudza uye haazivi chinhu. anongofarira nharo nokukakavara pamusoro pamashoko asingabatsiri, anongomutsa godo, gakava, kutukana nokufungirana zvakaipa, uye nokupesana kusingaperi pakati pavanhu vane murangariro wakaora, vakabirwa zvokwadi uye vanofunga kuti umwari inzira yokuwana nayo mari. asi umwari nokugutsikana nezvatinazvo zvinopfumisa kwazvo. nokuti hatina kuuya nechinhu panyika, uye hatigoniwo kubuda nechinhu kubva mairi. asi kana tine zvokudya nezvokupfeka, tichagutsikana nazvo. vanhu vanotsvaka kupfuma vanowira mukuedzwa nomumusungo uye nomukuchiva kwoupenzi kuzhinji kunokuvadza uye kunoisa vanhu mukuparadzwa nokuraswa. nokuti kuda mari ndiwo mudzi wezvakaipa zvose. vamwe vanhu vanoda mari zvikuru, vakatsauka kubva pakutenda uye vakazvibaya neshungu zhinji. asi iwe, munhu waallah, tiza kubva pane izvi zvose, uye utevere kururama, umwari, kutenda, rudo, kutsungirira nounyoro. irwa kurwa kwakanaka kwokutenda. ubatisise upenyu husingaperi hwawakadanirwa kwahuri pawakapupura kupupura kwakanaka pamberi pezvapupu zvizhinji. ndinokurayira, pamberi paallah, anopa upenyu kuzvinhu zvose, napamberi pakristu yeahoshua akapupura zvakanaka paakapa uchapupu pamberi papondio pirato, kuti uchengete murayiro uyu, usina chinongo kana chaungapomerwa kusvikira pakuonekwa kwaishe wedu yeahoshua kristu, uyo achazoratidzwa naallah panguva yake iye allah, iye oga mutongi akaropafadzwa, mambo wamadzimambo naishe wamadzishe. iye oga ndiye asingafi uye agere pachiedza chisina angaswedera pachiri, uyo asina akambomuona kana angamuona. kukudzwa nesimba ngazvive kwaari nokusingaperi. ameni. rayira vapfumi panyika ino kuti varege kuzvikudza kana kuisa tariro yavo mupfuma, isingagari, asi kuti vaise tariro yavo kuna allah, anotipa zvose zvizhinji kuti tifare nazvo. varayire kuti vaite zvakanaka, uye kuti vafarire kupa vamwe uye nokugoverana. vachazviunganidzira pfuma senheyo yakasimba kunguva dzinouya, kuti vagobatisisa upenyu hunova upenyu kwechokwadi. timoti, chengeta icho chawakapiwa. furatira zvokutaura mashoko asina umwari nepfungwa dzinopikisa, dzezvinonzi pakutaura kwenhema zivo, idzo dzakapupurwa navamwe uye nokudaro vakatsauka kubva pakutenda. nyasha ngadzive newe.

2_timothy

1

pauro, mupostori wakristu yeahoshua nokuda kwaallah, maererano nechipikirwa choupenyu huri muna kristu yeahoshua, kuna timoti mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa: nyasha, ngoni norugare zvinobva kuna allah baba nakristu yeahoshua, ishe wedu ngazvive newe. ndinovonga allah, wandinoshumira sezvakaitwa namadzitateguru angu, nehana yakachena, sezvo ndichikurangarira muminyengetero yangu usiku namasikati. ndichirangarira misodzi yako, ndinoshuva kukuona, kuti ndigozadzwa nomufaro. ndinoyeuchidzwa kutenda kwako kusinganyengeri, kwakanga kuri muna mbuya vako roisi uye nomuna mai vako yunisi pakutanga, uye zvino ndinoziva kuti kunogarawo mauri. nokudaro ndinokuyeuchidza kuti ukuchidzire chipo chaallah chiri mauri nokuiswa kwamaoko angu pamusoro wako. nokuti allah haana kutipa mweya wokutya, asi mweya wesimba, neworudo newokuzvidzora. saka usanyadziswa nokupupura ishe wedu, kana kunyadziswa neni musungwa wake. asi utambudzike pamwe chete neni nokuda kwevhangeri, nesimba raallah, akatiponesa uye akatidanira kuupenyu hutsvene, kwete nokuda kwechinhu chatakaita asi kuti nokuda kwake iye, uye nenyasha. nyasha idzi takadzipiwa muna kristu yeahoshua nguva dzisati dzavapo, asi zvino dzakaratidzwa nokuonekwa kwomuponesi wedu kristu yeahoshua, akaparadza rufu uye akabudisa pachena upenyu nokusafa kubudikidza nevhangeri. uye ndakaitwa muparidzi, mupostori nomudzidzisi wevhangeri iri. ndokusaka ndichitambudzika sezvandiri kuita. asi handinyadziswi, nokuti ndinoziva wandakatenda, uye ndinoziva kwazvo kuti anogona kuchengeta chandakamupa kusvikira zuva iroro. zvawakanzwa kubva kwandiri, zvichengete sedzidziso yechokwadi, nokutenda norudo muna kristu yeahoshua. chengetedza chakanaka chiri mauri chawakapiwa, chichengetedze uchibatsirwa namweya mutsvene anogara matiri. unoziva kuti vose vari mudunhu reezhia vakandisiya, kusanganisirawo nafigerasi naherimogenesi. ishe ngaaitire imba yaonesiferasi ngoni, nokuti kazhinji anondisimbisa uye haana kunyadziswa nengetani dzangu. asi kutoti, paakanga ari muroma, akanditsvaga kwazvo kusvikira andiwana. ishe ngaamuitire chinhu ichi kuti awane ngoni kubva kuna ishe pazuva iro! iwe unoziva kwazvo kuti akandibatsira zvikuru sei muefeso.

2

zvino iwe mwanakomana wangu, iva nesimba munyasha dziri muna kristu yeahoshua. uye zvinhu zvawakanzwa ndichitaura pamberi pezvapupu zvizhinji zvipe kuvanhu vakatendeka avo vachazozvidzidzisawo vamwe. tsungirira pamwe chete nesu somurwi akanaka wakristu yeahoshua. hakuna munhu anoshanda somurwi anozviisa pazvinhu zvoupenyu hwavasiri varwi, nokuti anoda kufadza mukuru wake wehondo. zvimwe chetezvo, kana munhu achikwikwidza somumhanyi, haagoni kuwana korona yokukunda kunze kwokunge apedza nhangemutange sezvakarayirwa. murimi anoshanda nesimba ndiye anofanira kutanga kudya zvibereko. funga pamusoro pezvandinoreva, nokuti ishe achakupa kunzwisisa pane izvi zvose. rangarirai yeahoshua kristu, akamuka kubva kuvakafa, worudzi rwadhavhidhi. iri ndiro vhangeri rangu, randinotambudzikira kunyange kusvikira pakusungwa segororo. asi shoko raallah harina kusungwa. naizvozvo ndinotsungirira pazvinhu zvose nokuda kwavasanangurwa, kuti naivowo vawane ruponeso rwuri muna kristu yeahoshua, nokubwinya kusingaperi. herino shoko rechokwadi: kana takafa pamwe chete naye, tichararamawo pamwe chete naye; kana tikatsungirira, tichabata ushe pamwe chete naye. kana tikamuramba, iye achatirambawo; kana tikasava nokutenda, iye anoramba akatendeka, nokuti haangazvirambi. ramba uchivayeuchidza zvinhu izvi. uvayambire pamberi paallah kuti varege kuita nharo pamusoro pamashoko; hazvina maturo, zvinongoparadza chete vaya vanoteerera. shingaira kuti uzviratidze pamberi paallah, somunhu anogamuchirwa, mushandi asingafaniri kunyadziswa uye anonyatsoruramisa shoko rechokwadi. nzvenga kutaura kusinei naallah, nokuti vaya vanhu vanodaro vacharamba vachirasikirwa noumwari. dzidziso yavo ichanyenga seronda. pakati pavo pana himenayasi nafiretasi, vakatsauka kubva pazvokwadi. vanoti kumuka kwavakafa kwakatopfuura, uye vanoparadza kutenda kwavamwe. kunyange zvakadaro, nheyo dzakasimba dzaallah dzinomira, dzine chisimbiso ichi chinoti: “ishe anoziva vanhu vake,” uye, “ani naani anopupura zita rashe anofanira kubva pane zvakaipa.” muimba huru mune midziyo kwete yegoridhe kana yesirivha chete, asiwo yamatanda, neyevhu; mimwe inokudzwa, mimwe isingakudzwi. kana munhu achizvinatsa kwazvo pazvinhu izvi, achava mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene, wakawanirwa basa natenzi uye wakagadzirirwa basa rose rakanaka. tiza kuchiva kwose kwoujaya, uye utevere kururama, kutenda, rudo norugare navose vanodana kuna ishe nomwoyo wakachena. usava nechokuita nemibvunzo youpenzi isina maturo, nokuti unoziva kuti inongomutsa kukakavara. zvino muranda waishe haafaniri kukakavara; asi anofanira kuva munyoro kumunhu wose, achigona kudzidzisa, asingatsamwi. vaya vanomupikisa anofanira kuvadzidzisa nounyoro, aine tariro yokuti allah achavapa kutendeuka vagoziva chokwadi, uye kuti vachapengenuka vagopunyuka kubva mumusungo wadhiabhori, akavaita nhapwa kuti vaite kuda kwake.

3

asi uzive chinhu ichi: kuchava nenguva dzokutambudzika pamazuva okupedzisira. vanhu vachava vanozvida, vanoda mari, vanozvirumbidza, vanozvikudza, vanotuka, vasingateereri vabereki, vasingatendi, vasina utsvene, vasina rudo, vasingaregereri, vanochera vamwe, vasingazvidzori, vane utsinye, vasingadi zvinhu zvakanaka, vanomukira, vanoita manyawi, vanonyengera, vanoda kuzvifadza nezvenyika kupfuura allah; vane mufananidzo bedzi wokunamata allah asi vachiramba simba racho. siyana navanhu ivavo. nokuti ndivo vaya vanoverevedza vachipinda mudzimba vachitapa vakadzi vasingazvibati vakaremedzwa nezvivi zvizhinji, vanogara vachidzidza asi vasingatongosviki pakuziva chokwadi. sezvakaita janesi najambiresi vakadzivisa mozisi, varume avawo vanodzivisa zvokwadi, vanhu vane ndangariro dzakaora, kana pari pazvinhu zvokutenda, vakarasika. asi havangasviki kure, nokuti upenzi hwavo huchaonekwa navanhu vose. asi kunyange zvakadaro, iwe unoziva kudzidzisa kwangu kwose, mararamiro angu, chinangwa changu, kutenda kwangu, mwoyo murefu wangu, norudo, nokutsungirira, matambudziko, nhamo, nezvinhu zvose zvakaitika kwandiri muandioki, ikoniamu nomuristra, nokutambudzwa kwose kwandakasangana nako. asi ishe akandinunura kubva pazviri zvose. zvirokwazvo munhu wose anoda kurarama upenyu hwoumwari muna kristu yeahoshua achatambudzwa, asi vanhu vakaipa navanonyengera vachanyanyisa kuipa, vachinyengera nokunyengerwa. asi iwe, rambira pazvinhu zvawakadzidza uye ukatenda mazviri, nokuti unoziva kuti wakazvidzidza kubva kuna ani, uye kuti kubva pauduku wakaziva magwaro matsvene, anogona kukupa uchenjeri hunosvitsa kukuponeswa kubudikidza nokutenda muna kristu yeahoshua. rugwaro rwose rwakafemerwa naallah uye runobatsira pakudzidzisa, kurayira, kutsiura nokurayiridza mukururama, kuti munhu waallah akwaniswe kwazvo, agadzirirwa mabasa ose akanaka.

4

ndinokurayira pamberi paallah nakristu yeahoshua, achatonga vapenyu navakafa uye pamusoro pokuonekwa kwake noushe hwake kuti: paridza shoko; ugare wakagadzirira panguva yakafanira kunyange isakafanira; rayira, tsiura, uye ukurudzire nomwoyo murefu zvikuru uye nokudzidzisa zvakanaka. nokuti nguva ichasvika vanhu pavacharamba kuteerera dzidziso yakarurama. asi vachida zvinovafadza ivo, vachazviunganidzira vadzidzisi vazhinji kuti vadzidzise zvinodiwa nenzeve dzavo. vachafuratidza nzeve dzavo kuchokwadi uye vachatsaukira kungano. asi iwe, usvinure pazvinhu zvose, tsungirira pamatambudziko, uite basa romuvhangeri, uite mabasa ose oushumiri hwako. nokuti ini ndava kutodururwa sechipiriso chinonwiwa, uye nguva yangu yokuenda yasvika. ndarwa kurwa kwakanaka, ndapedza nhangemutange yangu, ndachengeta kutenda kwangu. zvino ndakachengeterwa korona yangu yokururama, yandichapiwa, naishe, mutongi akarurama pazuva iro, uye kwete ini ndoga, asiwo nokuna vose vanoshuva kuonekwa kwake. ita napaunogona napo pose kuti ukurumidze kuuya kwandiri, nokuti dhemasi akada nyika yazvino, akandisiya akaenda kutesaronika. kiresenzi akaenda kugaratia, uye tito akaenda kudharimatia. ruka oga ndiye aneni. tora mako uuye naye, nokuti anondibatsira kwazvo paushumiri hwangu. ndakatuma tikikasi kuefeso. paunouya, uuye nejasi randakasiya nakapasi patiroasi, uye uuye nebhuku rangu, zvikuru magwaro amatehwe. arekizanda, mupfuri wendarira, akandiitira zvakaipa zvizhinji. ishe achamutsiva pane zvaakaita. newewo umuchenjerere, nokuti akapikisa zvikuru mashoko edu. pakuzvidavirira kwangu kwokutanga, hapana munhu akandibatsira, asi vose vakandisiya. ngavarege kupiwa mhosva nokuda kwaizvozvo. asi ishe akamira neni uye akandipa simba, kuti kubudikidza neni shoko riparidzwe zvakakwana uye kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vose varinzwe. uye ndakarwirwa kubva pamuromo weshumba. ishe achandirwira kubva pakurwiswa kwose kwakaipa uye achandiuyisa murugare kuumambo hwake hwokudenga. kubwinya ngakuve kwaari nokusingaperi-peri. ameni. ndikwazisire pirisira naakwira neveimba yaonesiferasi. erastasi akasara kukorinde, uye ndakasiya tirofimasi pamiretasi achirwara. ita napaunogona napo pose kuti uuye kuno chando chisati chasvika. yubhurasi anokukwazisa, uyewo napudhenzi, rino, kiraudhiyo nehama dzose. ishe ngaave nomweya wako. nyasha ngadzive newe.

titus

1

pauro, muranda waallah nomupostori wayeahoshua kristu nokuda kwokutenda kwavasanangurwa vaallah nokuziva chokwadi chinotungamirira kuumwari, kutenda nokuziva kunobva patariro youpenyu husingaperi, hwakapikirwa naallah, iye asingatongonyepi, akavimbisa idzo nguva dzisati dzavapo, panguva yake yakatarwa akazivisa shoko rake nokuparidza kwandakapiwa nokurayira kwaallah muponesi wedu, kuna tito, mwanakomana wangu chaiye pakutenda kwedu tose: nyasha norugare zvinobva kuna allah baba nakristu yeahoshua muponesi wedu. ndakakusiya pakirete kuti upedzise zvakasara zvisina kupera uye kuti ugadze vakuru mumaguta ose, sezvandakakurayira. mukuru anofanira kuva munhu asina chaangapomerwa, murume womukadzi mumwe chete, munhu ane vana vanotenda uye vasingapiwi mhosva yokuti havazvidzori kana kuti havateereri. sezvo mutariri akapiwa basa raallah, anofanira kuva munhu asina chaangapomerwa, asingakurumidzi kutsamwa, asingadhakwi, asingarwi, asingafariri pfuma yakaipa. asi anoitira vaeni rudo, munhu anoda zvakanaka, anozvidzora, akarurama, mutsvene uye anozvibata. anofanira kubatisisa shoko rechokwadi sezvarakadzidziswa, kuitira kuti agokurudzira vamwe nedzidziso yakarurama uye agodzivisa vaya vanoipikisa. nokuti kune vazhinji vasingateereri vanongotaura zvisina maturo uye vanyengeri, zvikuru sei vaya veboka rokudzingiswa. vanofanira kunyaradzwa miromo yavo, nokuti vari kuparadza mhuri dzizere vachidzidzisa zvinhu zvavasingafaniri kudzidzisa, uye vachizviita kuti vawane pfuma yakaipa. kunyange mumwe wavaprofita wavo akati, “vakirete vanogara vachireva nhema, zvikara zvakaipa, simbe dzinokara.” uchapupu uhu ndohwechokwadi. naizvozvo vatsiure zvikuru, kuti varurame pakutenda uye kuti varege kuteerera ngano dzavayeahudha, kana kurayira kwavanhu vakaramba chokwadi. kune vakachena, zvinhu zvose zvakachena, asi kuna avo vakaora uye vasingatendi, hakuna chinhu chakachena. asi kutoti zvose pfungwa dzavo nehana dzavo zvakaora. vanoti vanoziva allah, asi vanomuramba namabasa avo. vanonyangadza, havateereri uye havana kufanirwa nokuita chinhu chakanaka.

2

unofanira kudzidzisa zviri maererano nedzidziso yakarurama. dzidzisa varume vakuru kuti vave vanozvibata, vakafanira kukudzwa, vanozvidzora, uye vakarurama mukutenda, murudo nomukutsungirira. saizvozvowo, dzidzisa vakadzi vakuru kuti vave nomufambiro wakafanira, vasingacheri, kana kuda waini zhinji, asi kuti vadzidzise zvakanaka. uye kuti vadzidzise vakadzi vaduku kuti vade varume vavo navana vavo, kuti vave vanozvidzora uye vakachena, vanoshanda kumba, vave vanyoro uye kuti vazviise pasi pavarume vavo, kuitira kuti pashayikwe angazvidza shoko raallah. zvimwe chetezvo, kurudzira majaya kuti azvidzore. pazvinhu zvose iwe uvaratidze somuenzaniso nokuita zvakanaka. pakudzidzisa kwako udzidzise zvakakwana, uchirevesa uye nokutaura kwakarurama kusingagoni kushorwa, kuitira kuti vaya vanokupikisa vanyadziswe nokuti havana chinhu chavangareva pamusoro pedu. udzidzise varanda kuti vazviise pasi pavanavatenzi vavo pazvinhu zvose kuti vavafadze, varege kupindurana navo, uye kuti varege kuvabira, asi kuti varatidze kuti vakatendeka zvikuru kwazvo, kuitira kuti vashongedze dzidziso yaallah muponesi wedu pazvinhu zvose. nokuti nyasha dzaallah dzinouyisa ruponeso dzakaratidzwa kuvanhu vose. dzinotidzidzisa kuti tirambe zvinhu zvisina umwari nokuchiva kwenyika, uye tirarame upenyu hwokuzvidzora, hwokururama uye hwoumwari munguva ino, takamirira tariro yakaropafadzwa, kuonekwa kwokubwinya kwaallah wedu mukuru nomuponesi, yeahoshua kristu, akazvipa nokuda kwedu kuti atidzikinure kubva pakuipa kwose, nokuzvinatsira vanhu vari vake chaivo, vanoshingaira kuita zvinhu zvakanaka. zvino, izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvaunofanira kudzidzisa. kurudzira uye utsiure nesimba rose. ngakurege kuva nomunhu anokuzvidza.

3

uyeuchidze vanhu kuti vazviise pasi pavatongi navane simba, kuti vave vanoteerera, kuti vave vanhu vakagadzirira kuita zvose zvakanaka, kuti varege kuchera vamwe, vagare murunyararo, vaitire vamwe zvakanaka, uye kuti varatidze kuzvininipisa kwechokwadi kuvanhu vose. pane imwe nguva nesuwo takanga tiri mapenzi, tisingateereri, takanyengerwa, takatapwa nokuchiva kwose uye nezvinofadza. taigara muruvengo negodo, tichivengwa nokuvengana. asi pakaratidzwa ngoni norudo rwaallah muponesi wedu, akatiponesa, kwete nokuda kwezvinhu zvakarurama zvatakaita, asi nokuda kwetsitsi dzake. akatiponesa kubudikidza nokuberekwa patsva nokuvandudzwa nomweya mutsvene, uyo waakadurura wakawanda kwazvo pamusoro pedu kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu muponesi wedu, kuitira kuti mushure mokunge taruramisirwa nenyasha dzake, tive vadyi venhaka tine tariro youpenyu husingaperi. iri ishoko rezvokwadi. uye ndinoda kuti usimbise kwazvo zvinhu izvi, kuitira kuti vaya vakatenda allah vachenjere kuti varambe vachiita mabasa akanaka. zvinhu izvi zvakanaka uye zvinobatsira munhu wose. asi unzvenge mibvunzo youpenzi nenhoroondo dzamazita amadzitateguru, negakava nokukakavara pamusoro pomurayiro, nokuti izvi hazvina maturo uye hazvibatsiri. yambira munhu anotsausa kokutanga uye ugomuyambirazve kechipiri. mushure mezvo usava nechokuita naye. uve nechokwadi chokuti munhu akadaro akatsauka uye mutadzi; akazvirasa iye amene. pandichatuma atema kana tikikasi kwauri, edza napaunogona napo pose kuti uuye kwandiri panikopori, nokuti ndichagarako panguva yechando. ita zvose zvaungagona kuti ubatsire zenasi mududziri womurayiro naaporosi parwendo rwavo uye uite kuti varege kushayiwa chinhu. vanhu vedu vanofanira kudzidza kuzvipira kuita zvakanaka, kuitira kuti vagone kutibatsira pazvinhu zvinodiwa mazuva ose uye kuti vasararama upenyu husina zvibereko. vose vari kwandiri vanokukwazisa. ukwazise vose vanotida mukutenda. nyasha ngadzive nemi mose.

philemon

1

pauro, musungwa wakristu yeahoshua, natimoti hama yedu, kuna firimoni shamwari yedu inodikanwa uye nomushandi pamwe chete nesu, kuna afia hanzvadzi yedu, kuna akipo murwi pamwe chete nesu uye nokukereke inosangana mumba mako: nyasha ngadzive nemi norugare zvinobva kuna allah baba vedu naishe yeahoshua kristu. ndinovonga allah wangu nguva dzose pandinokurangarira muminyengetero yangu, nokuti ndinonzwa nezvokutenda kwako muna ishe yeahoshua uye norudo rwako kuvatsvene vose. ndinokunyengeterera kuti ugovane navamwe nesimba, kuitira kuti uve noruzivo rwakazara pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvakanaka zvatinazvo muna kristu. rudo rwako rwakandipa mufaro mukuru nokukurudzirwa, nokuti iwe, hama yangu, wakazorodza mwoyo yavatsvene. naizvozvo, kunyange zvazvo ndisingatyi, muna kristu, kuti ndikurayire zvaunofanira kuita, asi ndinokukumbira nokuda kworudo. saka ini, sapauro mutana uye zvino musungwa wakristu yeahoshua ndinokumbira kwauri pamusoro pomwanakomana wangu onesimasi, akava mwanakomana wangu pakusungwa kwangu. akanga asingabatsiri kwauri kare, asi zvino ava kubatsira kwatiri tose iwe neni. ndiri kumudzosera kwauri, iye mwoyo wangu chaiwo. ndaida kuti iye agare neni kuti agotora nzvimbo yako pakundibatsira zvandiri muusungwa nokuda kwevhangeri. asi handina kuda kuita chinhu iwe usina kuchitendera, kuitira kuti zvose zvakanaka zvauchaita zvirege kuva zvokurovedzerwa asi nokuda kwako. nokuti zvimwe wakaparadzaniswa naye kwechinguva kuti ugozova naye nokusingaperi, asisiri somuranda, asi ava nani kupfuura muranda, sehama inodikanwa. munhu anodikanwa kwandiri, asi kutonyanya kwauri, zvose somunhu uye sehama muna she. saka kana uchindiona somumwe wako, mugamuchire sokugamuchira kwaungandiita. kana ane zvaakakutadzira kana kuti ane mungava newe, uzvireve kwandiri. ini, pauro, ndanyora izvi noruoko rwangu. ndichazviripira, ndisingarevi kuti iwe pachako uri mungava kwandiri. hama, ndinoshuva, kuti ndiwane rubatsiro kubva kwauri muna she; zorodza mwoyo wangu muna kristu. ndanyora kwauri ndichivimba nokuteerera kwako, ndichiziva kuti uchaita kunyange kupfuura zvandakukumbira. uye chimwe chinhuzve: ndigadzirirewo pokugara, nokuti ndinotarira kuti ndichapiwa kwamuri pakupindurwa kweminyengetero yenyu. epafurasi, musungwa pamwe chete neni muna kristu yeahoshua, anokukwazisai, uyewo mako, aristakusi, dhemasi, naruka, vashandi pamwe chete neni. nyasha dzaishe yeahoshua kristu ngadzive nomweya wako.

hebrews

1

kare, allah akataura kumadzitateguru edu kubudikidza navaprofita panguva zhinji, uye nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana, asi mumazuva ano okupedzisira akataura kwatiri nomumwanakomana wake, waakaita mudyi wenhaka yezvinhu zvose, uye naiyewo waakaita naye nyika. mwanakomana ndiye chadzera chokubwinya kwaallah uye ndiye mufananidzo wake chaiwo, anochengeta zvinhu zvose neshoko rake rine simba. mushure mokunge apedza kunatswa kwezvivi, akagara kurudyi rwamambo kudenga. saka akava mukuru kupfuura vatumwa sezvo zita raakapiwa nhaka yaro rakanyanya kunaka kupfuura ravo. nokuti ndoupi pakati pavatumwa, allah waakamboti kwaari: “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu; nhasi ndava baba vako?” kana kutizve, “ndichava baba vake, naiye achava mwanakomana wangu?” uyezve, allah paanouyisa dangwe rake munyika, anoti: “vatumwa vose vaallah ngavamunamate.” achitaura pamusoro pavatumwa anoti, “anoita vatumwa vake mhepo, varanda vake mirazvo yomoto.” asi pamusoro pomwanakomana anoti, “chigaro chenyu choushe, imi allah, chichagara nokusingaperi-peri, uye kururama kuchava tsvimbo youshe hwenyu. makada kururama uye mukavenga kusarurama; naizvozvo allah, allah wenyu, akakuisai pamusoro peshamwari dzenyu nokukuzodzai namafuta okufara.” anotizve, “pakutanga, imi ishe, makateya nheyo dzenyika, uye matenga ndiwo basa ramaoko enyu. zvichaparara, asi imi mucharamba muripo; zvichasakara zvose senguo. muchazvipeta sejasi; senguo zvichashandurwa. asi imi munoramba makadaro, uye makore enyu haatozogumi.” ndoupi pakati pavatumwa akambonzi naallah: “gara kurudyi rwangu kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako?” ko, vatumwa vose havasi mweya inoshumira yakatumwa kuzobatsira vaya vachadya nhaka yoruponeso here?

2

saka tinofanira kuteerera zvikuru, izvo zvatakanzwa, kuitira kuti tirege kutsauka. nokuti kana shoko rakataurwa navatumwa rakanga rakasimba, uye kana kudarika nokusateerera kwose kwakapiwa chirango chakafanira, ko, isu tichapunyuka sei kana tisina hanya noruponeso rwakakura zvakadai? ruponeso urwu rwakatanga kuziviswa naishe, rwakasimbiswa kwatiri naavo vakamunzwa. allahwo akarupupurira nezviratidzo, zvishamiso, mabasa esimba akasiyana-siyana, uye nezvipo zvomweya mutsvene nokuda kwake. hapazi pasi pavatumwa pakaiswa nyika inouya, yatiri kutaura nezvayo. asi mumwe akapupura kwazvo pane imwe nzvimbo achiti: “ko, munhu chii zvamunomufunga, kana mwanakomana womunhu zvamune hanya naye? makamuita muduku zvishoma kuvatumwa; makamushongedza korona yokubwinya nokukudzwa uye mukaisa zvinhu zvose pasi petsoka dzake.” pakuisa zvinhu zvose pasi pake, allah haana kusiya chinhu chimwe chete chisina kuiswa pasi pake. asi panguva ino hationi zvinhu zvose zvakaiswa pasi pake. asi tinoona yeahoshua, akaitwa muduku zvishoma kuvatumwa, zvino ashongedzwa korona yokubwinya nokukudzwa nokuti akatambudzika murufu, kuitira kuti nenyasha dzaallah anzwe rufu nokuda kwavose. mukuuyisa vanakomana vazhinji pakubwinya, zvakanga zvakafanira kuti allah iye akaitirwa zvinhu zvose uye akaita kuti zvinhu zvose zvivepo, aite muvambi woruponeso rwazvo rwakakwana nenzira yokutambudzika. vose, iye anoita kuti vanhu vave vatsvene uye avo vanoitwa vatsvene ndevemhuri imwe chete. saka yeahoshua haana nyadzi kuti avaidze hama. anoti, “ndichaparidza zita renyu kuhama dzangu; pamberi peungano ndichaimba nziyo dzokukurumbidzai.” uyezve anoti, “ndichavimba naye.” uyezve anoti, “ndiri pano, navana vandakapiwa naallah.” sezvo vana vane ropa nenyama, naiyewo akagovana navo pakuva nyama kwavo, kuitira kuti rufu rwake ruparadze iye ane simba rorufu, iye dhiabhori uye agosunungura vaya vakanga vakasungwa muuranda upenyu hwavo hwose nokutya kwavo rufu. nokuti zvirokwazvo havasi vatumwa vaakabatsira, asi zvizvarwa zvaabhurahama. nokuda kwemhaka iyi aifanira kuitwa sehama dzake munzira yose, kuitira kuti agova muprista mukuru ane tsitsi uye akatendeka muushumiri kuna allah, uye kuti ayananise vanhu nokuda kwezvivi zvavo. nokuti iye amene akatambudzika paakaedzwa, anokwanisa kubatsira vanoedzwa.

3

naizvozvo, hama tsvene, vagovani neni pakudanwa kunobva kudenga, isai pfungwa dzenyu pana yeahoshua, mupostori nomuprista mukuru uyo watinopupura nezvake. akanga akatendeka kuna iye akamugadza, samozisi akanga akatendeka muimba yose yaallah. yeahoshua akaonekwa kuti akafanira kukudzwa kupfuura mozisi, somuvaki weimba anokudzwa kupfuura imba yacho. nokuti imba imwe neimwe inovakwa nomunhu, asi allah ndiye muvaki wezvinhu zvose. mozisi akanga akatendeka somuranda muimba yose yaallah, achipupura pamusoro pezvaizotaurwa munguva yaizotevera. asi kristu akatendeka somwanakomana pamusoro peimba yaallah. uye isu tiri imba yake, kana tikabatisisa pakushinga kwedu netariro yatinozvirumbidza pamusoro payo. naizvozvo, sezvinotaura mweya mutsvene achiti: “nhasi, kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa mwoyo yenyu sezvamakaita panguva dzokumukira, panguva yokuedzwa murenje, mandakaedzwa namadzibaba enyu uye kwamakore makumi mana vakaona zvandakaita. ndokusaka ndakatsamwira rudzi irworwo, uye ndikati, ‘mwoyo yavo inogara ichitsauka, havana kuziva nzira dzangu.’ “naizvozvo ndakapika mhiko pakutsamwa kwangu ndikati, “ ‘havangazopindi pazororo rangu.’ ” hama dzangu, chenjererai kuti pakati penyu pasava nomunhu ano mwoyo usingatendi, une zvivi, unotsauka kubva kuna allah mupenyu. asi simbisanai zuva rimwe nerimwe, kana kuchinzi nhasi, kuitira kuti kusava nomumwe wenyu anoomeswa nokunyengera kwezvivi. takauya kuzogovana muna kristu kana tichibatisisa kuvamba kwokutenda kwedu kusvikira pakuguma. sezvazvakataurwa zvichinzi: “nhasi, kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa mwoyo yenyu sezvamakaita panguva dzokumukira.” ndivanaaniko vakanzwa uye vakamukira? havazivo here vaya vose vakatungamirirwa namozisi pakubuda muijipiti? uye ndivanaaniko vaakatsamwira kwamakore makumi mana? havazivo here vaya vakatadza, vane mitumbi yakawira murenje? uye ndivanaaniko vakapikirwa mhiko naallah kuti havangapindi muzororo rake kana vasiri ivo vaya vasina kuteerera? saka tinoona kuti havana kukwanisa kupinda, nokuda kwokusatenda kwavo.

4

naizvozvo, sezvo chipikirwa chokupinda muzororo rake chichiripo, ngatichenjerei kuti kurege kuva nomumwe wenyu angatadza kusvikako. nokuti nesuwo takanzwa vhangeri richiparidzwa kwatiri, saivo; asi shoko ravakanzwa harina kuvabatsira, nokuti ivo vakarinzwa havana kuribatanidza nokutenda. zvino isu tinotenda tinopinda muzororo iroro, sezvakareva allah achiti, “naizvozvo ndakapika mhiko mukutsamwa kwangu, kuti, ‘havazopindi muzororo rangu.’ ” uye kunyange zvakadaro basa rake akapedza kubva pakusikwa kwenyika. nokuti pane imwe nzvimbo akataura mashoko aya pamusoro pezuva rechinomwe. “zvino pazuva rechinomwe allah akazorora kubva pabasa rake rose.” uyezve mundima iri pamusoro anoti, “havazopindi muzororo rangu.” ichokwadi kuti vamwe vachapinda muzororo iroro, uye vaya vakatanga kuparidzirwa vhangeri kare havana kupinda, nokuda kwokusateerera kwavo. naizvozvo allah akaisazve rimwe zuva rinonzi nhasi, paakataura kare kubudikidza nadhavhidhi, sezvazvakataurwa pakutanga zvichinzi: “nhasi, kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa mwoyo yenyu.” nokuti dai yeahoshua akanga avapa zororo, allah angadai asina kuzotaurazve nezverimwe zuva. naizvozvo richiripo, zororo resabata ravanhu vaallah; nokuti ani naani anopinda muzororo raallah anozororawo pabasa rake, sezvakaita allah pane rake. naizvozvo ngatishingairirei kuti tipinde muzororo iro, kuitira kuti pashayikwe achawa nokuda kwokutevera muenzaniso wavo wokusateerera. nokuti shoko raallah ibenyu uye rine simba. rinopinza kukunda munondo unocheka kumativi maviri, rinobaya kunyange kusvikira panoparadzana mwoyo nomweya, namafundo nomongo; rinotonga mifungo nendangariro dzomwoyo. hakuna chisikwa chakavanzika pamberi paallah. zvinhu zvose zviri pachena uye zvakafukurwa pameso aiye watinofanira kuzvidavirira kwaari. naizvozvo, zvatino muprista mukuru kwazvo, akapinda napakati pamatenga, yeahoshua mwanakomana waallah, ngatibatisisei kutenda kwatinopupura. nokuti hatina muprista mukuru asingagoni kutinzwira tsitsi pautera hwedu, asi tinaye akaedzwa pazvinhu zvose, sesu, asi asina chivi. ngatiswederei tisingatyi pachigaro choushe chenyasha, kuitira kuti tigogamuchira ngoni uye tigowana nyasha, tibatsirwe panguva yokushayiwa.

5

muprista mukuru mumwe nomumwe anosarudzwa kubva pakati pavanhu uye anogadzwa kuti avamiririre pazvinhu zvaallah, kuti ape zvipo nezvibayiro pamusoro pezvivi. anogona kunzwira tsitsi vaya vasingazivi uye navaya vari kutsauka, sezvo iye pachake ari pasi poutera. ndokusaka achifanira kupa zvibayiro zvezvivi zvake, pamwe chete nezvezvivi zvavanhu. hapana munhu anozvipa kukudzwa uku; anofanira kudanwa naallah, sezvakaitwa aroni. saizvozvowo kristu haana kuzvitorera iye kubwinya kwokuva muprista mukuru. asi allah akati kwaari, “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu; nhasi ndava baba vako.” uye akati, pane imwe nzvimbo, “ndiwe muprista nokusingaperi, worudzi rwamerikizedheki.” pamazuva oupenyu hwayeahoshua panyika, akauya kuna iye akanga achigona kumurwira parufu neminyengetero nemikumbiro, achichema nokuchema kukuru nemisodzi, uye akanzwika nokuda kwokutya kwake allah. kunyange zvake akanga ari mwanakomana, akadzidza kuteerera kubva pakutambudzika kwake uye akati akwaniswa, akazova muvambi wokuponeswa kusingaperi kuna vose vanomuteerera uye akanzi naallah ave muprista mukuru worudzi rwamerikizedheki. tine zvizhinji zvokutaura pamusoro peizvi, asi zvinorema kuzvitsanangura kwamuri nokuti munononoka kunzwisisa. nokuti, kunyange maifanira kuva vadzidzisi pari zvino munotoda mumwe munhu kuti akudzidzisei zvakare zvokwadi yezvokuvamba zveshoko raallah. muchiri kuda mukaka, kwete zvokudya zvikukutu. mumwe nomumwe anoraramiswa nomukaka, achiri mucheche, haasati anzwisisa dzidziso pamusoro pokururama. asi zvokudya zvikukutu ndezvavakuru, avo vakazvidzidzisa nokuramba vachizviita, kutsaura zvakanaka kubva kune zvakaipa.

6

naizvozvo ngatisiyei dzidziso dzokutanga pamusoro pakristu uye tipfuurire mberi mukukura, tisingaisizve nheyo dzokutendeuka kubva pamabasa anotungamirira kurufu, uye nokutenda muna allah, dzidziso pamusoro pokubhabhatidzwa nedzokuisa maoko pamusoro, dzokumuka kubva kuvakafa, uye nedzokutongwa kusingaperi. uye kana allah achitendera, ndizvo zvatichaita. nokuti hazvigoni kuti vaya vakambovhenekerwa, vaya vakamboravira chipo chokudenga, vakagoverwa mweya mutsvene, vakaravira kunaka kweshoko raallah uye namasimba enyika inouya, kuti vatendeukezve mushure mokunge vatsauka, nokuti pakurasikirwa kwavo vanorovererazve mwanakomana waallah, vachimunyadzisa pachena. nyika inonwa mvura inonaya nguva nenguva pamusoro payo uye inobereka zvirimwa zvinobatsira avo vanoirima, ndiyo inoropafadzwa naallah. asi nyika inobereka minzwa norukato haibatsiri uye ine dambudziko rokuti ichatukwa. pakupedzisira ichapiswa. kunyange zvazvo tichitaura sezvizvi, hama dzinodikanwa, tinoziva kwazvo kuti kwamuri kuchabva zvinhu zviri nani, zvinhu zvinoshanda pamwe chete noruponeso. allah haazi asina kururama; haangakanganwi basa renyu norudo rwamakamuratidza pamaibatsira vanhu vake uye kuti muchiri kuramba muchivabatsira. tinoda kuti mumwe nomumwe wenyu ave nokushingaira kumwe cheteko kusvikira kumagumo, kuitira kuti muve nechokwadi chetariro yenyu. hatidi kuti muve simbe, asi kuti muve vateveri vaavo vanodya nhaka yakavimbiswa kubudikidza nokutenda nokutsungirira. allah paakaita vimbiso yake kuna abhurahama, sezvo kwakanga kusina mumwe mukuru kwaari wokuti angapika naye, akapika naiye amene, achiti, “zvirokwazvo ndichakuropafadza uye ndichakupa zvizvarwa zvizhinji.” uye mushure mokumirira nomwoyo murefu, abhurahama akagamuchira chipikirwa. vanhu vanopika nomukuru kwavari, uye mhiko ndiyo inosimbisa zvinenge zvataurwa, uye inopedza gakava rose. nokuti allah aida kuti aratidze pachena kusashanduka kwechido chake kuvadyi venhaka yakapikirwa, akakusimbisa nemhiko. allah akaita izvi kuitira kuti, nezvinhu zviviri zvisingashanduki, zvokuti allah haagoni kureva nhema, isu vakatiza tikandobatisisa tariro yatakapiwa, tichasimbiswa zvikuru. tine tariro iyi sechibatiso chomweya, chakasimba chisingazungunuswi. inopinda mukati mechidzitiro chomutemberi, makapinda yeahoshua akatitangira isu, akapinda akatimiririra. akava muprista mukuru nokusingaperi worudzi rwamerikizedheki.

7

merikizedheki uyu aiva mambo wesaremu, uye aiva muprista waallah wokumusoro-soro. akasangana naabhurahama pakudzoka kwake achibva kundokunda madzimambo, akamuropafadza, uye abhurahama akamupa chegumi chezvinhu zvose. kutanga zita rake rinoreva kuti, “mambo wokururama”; uyezve, “mambo wesaremu” zvinoreva kuti, “mambo worugare.” asina baba kana mai, asina madzitateguru, asina mavambo amazuva kana magumo oupenyu, somwanakomana waallah anoramba ari muprista nokusingaperi. chingofungai kuti akanga ari mukuru sei. kunyange natateguru abhurahama akamupa chegumi chezvaakanga apamba! zvino murayiro unoti avo vari zvizvarwa zvarevhi vakava vaprista kuti vatore chegumi kuvanhu, idzo hama dzavo, kunyange zvazvo hama dzavo dziri zvizvarwa zvaabhurahama. murume uyu, kunyange zvakadaro, akanga asina rudzi runobva pazvizvarwa zvarevhi, asi akatora chegumi kubva kuna abhurahama uye akaropafadza iye akanga ane zvipikirwa. uye hapana kukahadzika kuti muduku anoropafadzwa neakamupfuura paukuru. panyaya iyi yokutanga, chegumi chinotorwa navanhu vanofa; asi pane imwe nyaya iyi chinotorwa naiye anonzi mupenyu. mumwe angati revhi, anotora chegumi, akapawo chegumi kubudikidza naabhurahama, nokuti merikizedheki paakasangana naabhurahama, revhi akanga achiri muchiuno chatateguru vake. kana kukwaniswa kwaigona kuvapo nenzira youprista hwarevhi (nokuti vanhu vakapiwa murayiro nokuda kwahwo), ko, mumwe muprista aifanira kuzomuka sei, iye ari worudzi rwamerikizedheki, asiri worudzi rwaaroni? nokuti kana uprista huchishandurwa, kunofanirawo kushandurwa murayiro. iye anorehwa zvinhu izvi pamusoro pake ndeworumwe rudzi, uye hakuna mumwe worudzi urwu akamboshumira paaritari. nokuti zviri pachena kuti ishe wedu akabva kurudzi rwayeahudha uye pamusoro porudzi urwu mozisi haana kumbotaura zvavaprista. uye zvatataura zvinotova pachena kunyanya kana mumwe muprista akaita samerikizedheki achionekwa, uyo ava muprista kwete nokuda kwomurayiro wenhoroondo yamadzitateguru ake asi nokuda kwesimba roupenyu husingaparadziki. nokuti zvakataurwa zvichinzi: “iwe uri muprista nokusingaperi, worudzi rwamerikizedheki.” murau wokutanga wakaiswa padivi nokuti wakanga une utera uye usina maturo (nokuti murayiro hauna chinhu chawakaita kuti chive chakakwana), uye tariro iri nani inoziviswa, yatinoswededzwa nayo pedyo naallah. uye hazvina kuitwa pasina mhiko! vamwe vakava vaprista pasina kana mhiko zvayo, asi iye akava muprista ane mhiko, allah paakati kwaari: “ishe akapika uye haangashanduri murangariro wake: ‘iwe uri muprista nokusingaperi.’ ” nokuda kwemhiko yake, yeahoshua akava rubatso rwesungano inopfuura nokunaka. zvino kwakava navazhinji vavaprista, nokuti rufu rwakavatadzisa kupfuurira mberi paushumiri; asi yeahoshua, nokuti anogara nokusingaperi, ano uprista huchavapo nokusingaperi. naizvozvo anogona kuponesa zvizere vaya vanouya kuna allah kubudikidza naye, nokuti anorarama nokusingaperi achivanyengeterera. muprista mukuru akadai anotipa zvatinoshayiwa, iye mutsvene, asina chaangapomerwa, asina kusvibiswa, akatsaurwa kubva kuvatadzi, akasimudzirwa pamusoro pamatenga. asingafanani navaya vaprista, haafaniri kubayira zvipiriso zuva rimwe nerimwe, kutanga pamusoro pezvivi zvake, pashure pamusoro pezvivi zvavanhu. akabayira zvivi zvavo kamwe chete zvikapera paakazvipa iye. nokuti murayiro unogadza vanhu vano utera savaprista vakuru; asi mhiko yakauya shure kwomurayiro, yakagadza mwanakomana, uyo akakwaniswa nokusingaperi.

8

shoko guru pane izvozvi zvatiri kutaura ndiro iri rokuti: tino muprista mukuru akadai, akagara kurudyi rwechigaro chaishe kudenga, uye anoshumira muimba tsvene, iyo tabhenakeri chaiyo yakamiswa naishe, kwete nomunhu. muprista mukuru, mumwe nomumwe, akagadzwa kuti ape zvipo nezvibayiro kuna allah, naizvozvo zvakanga zvakafanira kuti uyu ave nechokubayirawo. dai akanga ari panyika, angadai asina kuva muprista, nokuti vaprista vakanga varipo kare vaibayira zvipo sezvakarehwa nomurayiro. vaishumira panzvimbo tsvene inova mufananidzo nomumvuri wezviri kudenga. nokuda kweizvi mozisi akayambirwa paakanga ava kuvaka tabhenakeri: “uve nechokwadi kuti waita zvose maererano nomufananidzo wawakaratidzwa mugomo.” asi ushumiri hwakapiwa yeahoshua hwakapfuura hwavo pakunaka sezvo ari murevereri wesungano inopfuura nokunaka pane sungano yakare, uye yakasimbiswa nezvipikirwa zviri nani. nokuti dai pakanga pasina chakaipa nesungano yokutanga pangadai pasina kuwanikwa mukana weimwe sungano. asi allah akaona kukanganisa kwavanhu ava akati: “nguva inouya, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, yandichaita sungano itsva neimba yaisraeri, uye neimba yayeahudha, haichazovi sesungano yandakaita namadzitateguru avo, pandakavabata noruoko kuti ndivabudise kubva muijipiti, nokuti havana kuramba vakatendeka kusungano yangu, neniwo ndakavasiya, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita neimba yaisraeri, mushure menguva iyoyo, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. ndichaisa mirayiro yangu mundangariro dzavo, uye ndichainyora pamwoyo yavo. ndichava allah wavo, uye vachava vanhu vangu. hakuna munhu achazodzidzisa muvakidzani wake, kana munhu kudzidzisa hama yake, achiti, ‘ziva ishe,’ nokuti vose vachandiziva, kubva kumuduku kusvikira kumukuru pakati pavo. nokuti ndichavaregerera zvakaipa zvavo uye handizorangaririzve zvivi zvavo.” nokuti akati sungano iyi “itsva,” ipapo akashayisa basa yokutanga; zvino chinhu chisisina basa uye chava chekare chichaparara nokukurumidza.

9

zvino sungano yokutanga yakanga ine mirayiro yokunamata allah uye neyeimba tsvene yapanyika. tabhenakeri yakamiswa. mukamuri rayo rokutanga makanga mune chigadziko chomwenje, netafura uye nezvingwa zvitsvene; iyi ndiyo yainzi nzvimbo tsvene. mberi kwechidzitiro chechipiri kwakanga kune kamuri yainzi nzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, yakanga ine ndiro yegoridhe yezvinonhuhwira uye neareka yesungano yakanga yakafukidzirwa negoridhe. muareka iyi ndimo makanga mune hari yegoridhe yakanga ine mana, netsvimbo yaaroni yakanga yatungira, uye namahwendefa esungano. pamusoro peareka pakanga paina makerubhi okubwinya, aidzikatidza chifunhiro chengoni. asi hatingatauri nezvezvinhu zvose izvi zvizere iye zvino. zvinhu zvose zvakati zvagadzirwa saizvozvi, vaprista vaizopinda mukamuri yokutanga nguva dzose vachiita ushumiri hwavo. asi muprista mukuru oga ndiye aipinda mukamuri yomukati, kamwe chete pagore, uye asingatongopindi asina ropa, raaizvibayira iye pachake nezvivi zvavanhu zvavakanga vaita mukusaziva. mweya mutsvene airatidza nechinhu ichi, kuti nzira inoenda kunzvimbo tsvene-tsvene yakanga isati yaratidzwa sezvo tabhenakeri yakanga ichimire. uyu mufananidzo wenguva ino, zvichireva kuti zvipo nezvibayiro zvaibayirwa zvakanga zvisingagoni kuchenesa hana yaiye ainamata. zvinongova zvokudya nezvokunwa uye nokushamba kuzhinji zvapanyama, zvavakatemerwa kusvikira panguva yokuvandudzwa. kristu paakauya somuprista mukuru wezvinhu zvakanaka zvatova pano kare, akapinda nomutabhenakeri yakapfuura pakukura uye napakukwana isina kugadzirwa nomunhu, zvichireva kuti yakanga isiri chikamu chokusikwa kuno. haana kupinda nokuda kweropa rembudzi neremhuru; asi akapinda munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene neropa rake chairo akatiwanira rudzikinuro rusingaperi. ropa rembudzi nerenzombe namadota etsiru zvaisaswa pamusoro paavo vakanga vakasvibiswa, zvaiita kuti vatsvene vanatswe panyama. ko, kuzoti zvino iro ropa rakristu, uyo kubudikidza nomweya unogara nokusingaperi, akazvipa, asina chaangapomerwa kuna allah, akachenesa hana dzedu kubva pamabasa ose anotungamirira kurufu, kuitira kuti tigoshumira allah mupenyu! nokuda kwaizvozvi kristu ndiye murevereri wesungano itsva, kuitira kuti vaya vakadanwa vagogamuchira chipikirwa chenhaka isingaperi zvino, sezvo akafa sedzikinuro kuti avasunungure kubva pazvivi zvavakaita vari pasi pesungano yokutanga. nokuti kana iri nhaka yakanyorwa, panofanira kuvapowo nechokwadi chorufu rwaiye akaiita, nokuti nhaka yakanyorwa ine simba chete kana munhu afa; haina simba kana akaiita achiri mupenyu. ndokusaka sungano yokutanga isina kushanda pasina ropa. mozisi paakaparidza mirayiro yose kuvanhu vose, akatora ropa remhuru, pamwe chete nemvura, neshinda tsvuku uye namapazi ehisopi, akasasa pabhuku rakapetwa uye napavanhu. akati, “iri iropa resungano, yamakarayirwa naallah kuti muchengete.” nenzira imwe cheteyo, akasasa neropa tabhenakeri nezvinhu zvose zvaishandiswa pakushumira mairi. zvirokwazvo, murayiro unoda kuti zvinhu zvinenge zvose zvinatswe neropa, uye pasina kuteurwa kweropa hapana kuregererwa. naizvozvo zvaifanira kuti mifananidzo yezvinhu zvokudenga inatswe nezvibayiro izvi, asi zvinhu zvokudenga zvacho zvaifanira kunatswa nechibayiro chinopfuura izvi. nokuti kristu haana kupinda panzvimbo tsvene yakagadzirwa nomunhu yakanga ichingova mufananidzo waiyo yechokwadi chaiyo; akapinda kudenga chaiko, kuti atimiririre pamberi paallah. uye haana kupinda kudenga kuti azviite chibayiro kakawanda, somuprista mukuru anopinda munzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, gore negore, neropa risiri rake. zvino kristu angadai akazotambudzika kakawanda kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika. asi zvino akaonekwa kamwe chete pamagumo enguva kuti aparadze chivi nokuzviita chibayiro iye pachake. sezvo munhu akatemerwa kufa kamwe chete uye shure kwaizvozvo agotongwa, saizvozvowo kristu akabayirwa kamwe chete kuti atakure zvivi zvavanhu vazhinji; uye achazoonekwa kechipiri, asingatakuri zvivi, asi kuti auyise ruponeso kuna avo vakamumirira.

10

murayiro unongova mumvuri chete wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya, kwete izvo chaizvo. nokuda kwaizvozvo haungagoni kuita kuti avo vanoswedera, kuti vanamate gore rimwe nerimwe, naizvo zvibayiro zvimwe chetezvo zvavanoramba vachibayira kuna allah, vakwaniswe. dai zvaigona kudaro, zvingadai zvisina kupera kubayirwa here? nokuti vanonamata vangadai vakanatswa kamwe chete zvikapera, uye vangadai vasina kuzonzwazve mhosva yezvivi zvavo gore roga roga, nokuti hazvigoni kuti ropa renzombe nerembudzi ribvise zvivi. naizvozvo kristu, paakauya munyika muno, akati: “chibayiro nechipo hamuna kuzvifarira, asi muviri wamakandigadzirira; zvibayiro zvinopiswa nezvibayiro zvezvivi hamuna kufadzwa nazvo. ipapo ini ndakati, ‘ndiri pano, mubhuku rakapetwa makanyorwa nezvangu, ndauya kuti ndiite kuda kwenyu, imi allah.’ ” pakutanga akati, “zvibayiro nezvipiriso, zvipiriso zvinopiswa, nezvipiriso zvezvivi hamuna kuzvida, kana kufadzwa nazvo (kunyange zvazvo murayiro waida kuti zviitwe).” ipapo iye akati, “ndiri pano, ndauya kuzoita kuda kwenyu.” akabvisa chokutanga kuti aise chechipiri. uye nokuda kwenyu ikoku, tichaitwa vatsvene kubudikidza nechibayiro chomuviri wayeahoshua kristu chakabayirwa kamwe chete zvikapera. zuva nezuva muprista mumwe nomumwe aimira achiita ushumiri hwake nokuramba achibayira zvibayiro zvimwe chetezvo, zvisingatongogoni kubvisa zvivi. asi muprista uyu akati abayira chibayiro chimwe chete chenguva dzose, akagara kurudyi rwaallah. kubva panguva iyoyo anomirira kusvikira muvengi wake aitwa chitsiko chetsoka dzake, nokuti nechibayiro chimwe chete akaita kuti vaya vari kuitwa vatsvene vakwaniswe nokusingaperi. mweya mutsvene anotipupurirawo pamusoro peizvi. kutanga anoti: “iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo mushure menguva iyoyo, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. ndichaisa mirayiro yangu mumwoyo yavo, uye ndichainyora mundangariro dzavo.” ipapo anotizve: “zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo handizozvirangarirezve.” zvino kana izvi zvaregererwa, hakuchisina chimwezve chibayiro chezvivi. naizvozvo, hama, zvatinotsunga kuti tipinde panzvimbo tsvene neropa rayeahoshua, nenzira itsva uye ino upenyu yatakazarurirwa kubudikidza nechidzitiro chinova muviri wake, uye sezvo tino muprista mukuru pamusoro pemba yaallah, ngatiswederei kuna allah nomwoyo wechokwadi nokutendeka kwakasimba kwazvo, nemwoyo yakasaswa kuti tinatswe kubva pahana yakaipa uye miviri yedu yakashambwa nemvura yakachena. ngatibatisisei tariro yatinopupura, tisingazungunuswi, nokuti iye akapikira akatendeka. uye ngatirangarirei kuti tingakurudzirana sei kuti tive norudo namabasa akanaka. tisarega kuungana sezvinoita vamwe, asi tikurudzirane, zvikuru sei sezvamunoona kuti zuva roswedera. nokuti kana tikaramba tichitadza tichida, kana takambogamuchira ruzivo rwechokwadi, hakuchisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi, asi kungomirira tichitya kutongwa nokutsamwa kunopfuta somoto, kuchapedza vavengi vaallah. munhu wose akaramba murayiro wamozisi akafa asinganzwirwi tsitsi pamberi pezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu. ko, munofunga kuti munhu, akatsika pasi petsoka dzake mwanakomana waallah uye akatora ropa resungano iri rakamuita mutsvene sechinhu chisiri chitsvene uye akatuka mweya wenyasha, anofanira kurangwa zvikuru sei? nokuti tinomuziva iye akati, “kutsiva ndokwangu; ini ndicharipira,” uyezve, “ishe achatonga vanhu vake.” chinhu chinotyisa kuwira mumaoko aallah mupenyu. rangarirai mazuva okutanga mushure mokugamuchira chiedza, amakatsunga pakurwa kukuru mukutambudzika. pane dzimwe nguva makatukwa uye mukatambudzwa pachena; pane dzimwe nguva makagovana navo vakaitirwawo izvozvo. makanzwira tsitsi avo vakanga vari mutorongo mukagamuchira nomufaro kupambwa kwenhumbi dzenyu, nokuti maiziva kuti imi pachenyu makanga mune pfuma yakapfuura nokunaka uye inogara. naizvozvo regai kurasa kusatya kwenyu, kuno mubayiro mukuru. munofanira kutsungirira kuitira kuti kana maita kuda kwaallah mugogamuchira zvaakavimbisa. nokuti kanguva kaduku duku kasara, “iye anouya, achauya, asinganonoki. asi akarurama wangu achararama nokutenda. uye kana akadzokera shure, handizofadzwi naye.” asi isu hatisi ivo vokudzokera shure, vanoparadzwa, asi tiri vokutenda vanoponeswa.

11

zvino kutenda ndiko kuva nechokwadi nezvinhu zvatinotarisira, nechiratidzo chezvinhu zvatisingaoni. nokuti izvi ndizvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vekare vapupurirwe zvakanaka. nokutenda tinonzwisisa kuti nyika yakaitwa nokurayira kwaallah, zvokuti zvinhu zvinoonekwa zvakaitwa kubva pane zvinhu zvisingaonekwi. nokutenda abheri akapa allah chibayiro chiri nani pane chakaini. nokutenda akapupurirwa kuti akanga ari munhu akarurama, allah paakataura zvakanaka pamusoro pezvipo zvake. uye nokutenda achiri kutaura nazvino kunyange zvake akafa. nokutenda enoki akatorwa kubva paupenyu huno, zvokuti haana kuona rufu; akasaonekwa, nokuti allah akanga amutora; nokuti asati atorwa, akanga achipupurirwa somunhu aifadza allah. uye pasina kutenda hazvibviri kufadza allah, nokuti ani naani anouya kwaari anofanira kutenda kuti ariko uye kuti anopa vanomutsvaka nomwoyo wose mubayiro wavo. nokutenda noa, akati anyeverwa pamusoro pezvinhu zvakanga zvichigere kuonekwa, akavaka areka nokutya allah kuti aponese mhuri yake. nokutenda kwake akapa nyika mhosva uye akava mugari wenhaka yokururama kunouya nokutenda. nokutenda abhurahama, akati adanwa kuti aende kunzvimbo iyo yaaizogamuchira kuti ive nhaka yake, akateerera akaenda, kunyange zvazvo akanga asingazivi kwaaienda. nokutenda akandogara somutorwa munyika yechipikirwa, saanogara munyika yavamwe; akagara mumatende, sezvakaita isaka nayaqobho, vakanga vari vadyi venhaka yechipikirwa pamwe chete naye. nokuti akanga achitarisira guta rine nheyo, allah ari mhizha nomuvaki waro. nokutenda abhurahama, kunyange zvake akanga apfuura zera, uye sara pachake akanga asingabereki, akapiwa simba rokuva baba, nokuti akati iye akamupikira akatendeka. uye nokudaro kubva pamunhu mumwe, akanga oita seafa, kwakava nezvizvarwa zvakawanda senyeredzi dzokudenga, zvisingaverengeki sejecha pamahombekombe egungwa. vanhu ava vose vakanga vachirarama nokutenda kusvikira panguva yokufa. havana kuwana zvinhu zvavakavimbiswa;
