wepfuma yake yose. asi ngatimboti muranda uyo akaipa uye oti mumwoyo make, ‘tenzi wangu achange asipo kwenguva refu,’ uye ipapo otanga kurova vamwe varanda uye nokudya nokunwa nezvidhakwa. tenzi womuranda uyo achauya pazuva raasingatarisire napanguva yaasingazivi. achasvikomugura-gura agomuisa panzvimbo imwe chete navanyengeri apo pachava nokuchema nokurumanya kwameno.

25

“panguva iyoyo umambo hwokudenga huchange hwakafanana navasikana gumi, vakatora mwenje yavo vakabuda kundochingamidza chikomba. vashanu vavo vakanga vari mapenzi uye vashanu vavo vakanga vakachenjera. mapenzi vaya vakatora mwenje yavo asi havana kuisa mafuta mairi. kunyange zvakadaro, vakachenjera vakatora mafuta mumidziyo pamwe chete nemwenje yavo. chikomba chakanonoka kusvika, vose vakabatwa nehope ndokuvata. “pava pakati pousiku vakanzwa mheremhere: ‘chikomba chauya! budai mumuchingamidze!’ “ipapo vasikana vose vakamuka uye vakagadziridza mwenje yavo. mapenzi akati kuna vakachenjera, ‘tipeiwo mamwe emafuta enyu; mwenje yedu yava kudzima.’ “vakapindura vakati, ‘kwete, zvimwe haangakwaniri isu nemi tose. asi endai kuna vaya vanotengesa mafuta mugondozvitengera mamwe.’ “asi vachiri munzira kundotenga mafuta, chikomba chakasvika. vasikana vakanga vakagadzirira vakapinda naye mumutambo wesvitsa uye musuo ukapfigwa. “pashure vamwe vaya vakadzokawo. vakati, ‘ishe! ishe! tizarurireiwo musuo!’ “asi akavapindura achiti, ‘ndinokuudzai chokwadi, handikuzivei.’ “naizvozvo garai makagadzirira nokuti hamuzivi musi kana nguva. “zvakare, zvichaita somurume akabuda kuti afambe rwendo, akadana varanda vake akavachengetesa pfuma yake. kuno mumwe akapa matarenda mashanu emari, kuno mumwe matarenda maviri, uye kuno mumwe tarenda rimwe chete, mumwe nomumwe maererano nokugona kwake. ipapo akaenda zvake parwendo rwake. murume akapiwa matarenda mashanu akaenda pakarepo akandoshandisa mari yake akawanazve mamwe mashanu. saizvozvo uya aiva namatarenda maviri akawana mamwe maviri. asi murume akanga apiwa tarenda rimwe chete akaenda akandochera gomba muvhu ndokuviga mari yatenzi wake. “shure kwenguva refu tenzi wavaranda vaya akadzoka akagadzirisa nezvemari idzi navo. murume akanga apiwa matarenda mashanu akauya namamwe mashanu, akati, ‘tenzi, makandipa matarenda mashanu. tarirai ndakawana mamwe mashanu.’ “tenzi wake akapindura akati, ‘waita zvakanaka iwe muranda akanaka, akatendeka! wanga wakatendeka pazvinhu zvishoma; ndichakuita mutariri wezvinhu zvizhinji. pinda mumufaro watenzi wako!’ “murume akanga apiwa matarenda maviri akauyawo. akati, ‘tenzi makandipa matarenda maviri, tarirai ndakawanazve mamwe maviri.’ “tenzi wake akapindura akati, ‘waita zvakanaka, iwe muranda akanaka, akatendeka! wanga wakatendeka pazvinhu zvishoma, ndichakuita mutariri wezvinhu zvizhinji. pinda mumufaro watenzi wako!’ “ipapo murume akanga apiwa tarenda rimwe chete akauya, akati, ‘tenzi, ndakaziva kuti muri munhu akaoma, munokohwa pamusina kudyara uye munounganidza pamusina kukusha mbeu. nokudaro ndakatya ndikandocherera tarenda renyu muvhu. tarirai, pfuma yenyu iyi.’ “tenzi wake akapindura akati, ‘iwe muranda akaipa, ano usimbe! saka wakanga uchiziva zvako kuti ndinokohwa pandisina kudyara nokuunganidza pandisina kukusha mbeu? zvino ungadai wakachengetesa mari yangu kune vamabhangi kuitira kuti pakudzoka kwangu ndaizoiwana yabereka. “ ‘mutorerei tarenda iri mupe kune uyo ane matarenda gumi. nokuti wose anazvo achapiwa zvimwe, agova nezvakawanda kwazvo. ani naani asina, kunyange nezvaanazvo achazvitorerwa. uye chikandai muranda uyo asingabatsiri kunze kurima, uko kuchava nokuchema nokurumanya kwameno.’ “mwanakomana womunhu paanouya nokubwinya kwake, navatumwa vose, achagara pachigaro chake choushe mukubwinya kwokudenga. ndudzi dzose dzichaunganidzwa pamberi pake, achatsaura vanhu mumwe kubva kuno mumwe somufudzi anotsaura makwai kubva kumbudzi. achaisa makwai kurudyi rwake, uye mbudzi kuruboshwe rwake. “ipapo mambo achati kuna avo vari kurudyi rwake, ‘uyai imi makaropafadzwa nababa vangu, mutore nhaka yenyu, umambo hwamakagadzirirwa kubva pakusikwa kwenyika. nokuti ndakanga ndine nzara mukandipa chokudya, ndakanga ndine nyota, mukandipa chokunwa, ndakanga ndiri mweni mukandipinza mumba, ndakanga ndisina zvokupfeka mukandipfekedza, ndakanga ndichirwara mukandipepa, ndakanga ndiri mutorongo mukandishanyira.’ “ipapo vakarurama vachamupindura vachiti, ‘ishe, takakuonai riniko mune nzara tikakupai chokunwa? takakuonai riniko muri mweni tikakupinzai mumba, kana musina zvokupfeka tikakupfekedzai? takakuonai riniko muchirwara kana muri mutorongo tikakushanyirai?’ “mambo achapindura achiti, ‘ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, chose chamakaitira mumwe wavaduku vehama dzangu idzi, makachiitira ini.’ “ipapo achati kune avo vari kuruboshwe rwake, ‘ibvai kwandiri imi makatukwa mupinde mumoto usingadzimi wakagadzirirwa dhiabhori navatumwa vake. nokuti ndakanga ndine nzara mukasandipa chokudya, ndakanga ndine nyota, mukasandipa chokunwa, ndakanga ndiri mweni mukasandipinza mumba, ndakanga ndisina zvokupfeka mukasandipfekedza, ndakanga ndichirwara uye ndiri mutorongo mukasandishanyira.’ “naizvozvo vachapindura vachiti, ‘ishe, takakuonai riniko mune nzara kana mune nyota kana muri mweni kana musina zvokupfeka kana muchirwara kana muri mutorongo tikasakubatsirai?’ “achapindura achiti, ‘ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, zvose zvamusina kuitira mumwe wavaduku ava, hamuna kuzviitira ini.’ “ipapo vachaenda mukurangwa kusingaperi, asi vakarurama vachipinda muupenyu husingaperi.”

26

yeahoshua akati apedza kutaura zvinhu zvose izvi, akati kuvadzidzi vake, “sezvamunoziva, pasika yasarirwa namazuva maviri kuti isvike, uye mwanakomana womunhu achaendeswa kuti andorovererwa pamuchinjikwa.” ipapo vaprista vakuru navakuru vavanhu vakandoungana mumuzinda womuprista mukuru ainzi kayafasi, uye vakarangana kuti vasunge yeahoshua namano vagomuuraya. vakati, “asi kwete panguva yomutambo nokuti pangaita bope pakati pavanhu.” yeahoshua paakanga ari mubhetani mumba momurume ainzi simoni wamaperembudzi, mumwe mukadzi akauya kwaari nechinu chamafuta anonhuhwira, omutengo mukuru, akasvikoadururira pamusoro wake, agere patafura. vadzidzi vakati vachiona izvi, vakatsamwa uye vakati, “kuparadza kwakadai kwaitirweiko? mafuta anonhuhwira aya angadai atengeswa nomutengo mukuru kwazvo uye mari yacho yapiwa varombo.” achiziva izvi, yeahoshua akati kwavari, “munotambudzireiko mukadzi uyu? andiitira chinhu chakanaka kwazvo. varombo munavo nguva dzose, asi ini hamuchava neni nguva dzose. paadira mafuta anonhuhwira pamuviri wangu, azviita kuti agadzirire kuvigwa kwangu. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, kwose kwose kuchaparidzwa vhangeri iri munyika yose, zvaaita izvi zvichange zvichitaurwawo kuti vamurangarire nazvo.” ipapo mumwe wavane gumi navaviri, ainzi yeahudhasi iskarioti, akaenda kuvaprista vakuru akandobvunza achiti, “muchandipei kana ndikamuuyisa kwamuri?” saka vakamuverengera makumi matatu esirivha. kubva ipapo zvichienda mberi yeahudhasi akamirira mukana wokuti amuise kwavari. pazuva rokutanga romutambo wezvingwa zvisina mbiriso, vadzidzi vakauya kuna yeahoshua vakasvikomubvunza vachiti, “ndokupi kwamunoda kuti tindokugadzirirai kuti mugodyira pasika?” akavapindura akati, “endai muguta kuno mumwe murume munosvikomuudza kuti, ‘mudzidzisi anoti: nguva yangu yakatarwa yava pedyo. ndichapemberera pasika navadzidzi vangu mumba mako.’ ” saka vadzidzi vakaita sokurayirwa kwavakanga vaitwa nayeahoshua vakandogadzira pasika. ava madekwana yeahoshua akagara patafura navane gumi navaviri. vari pakati pokudya akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti mumwe wenyu achandipandukira.” vakasuwa zvikuru uye vakatanga, mumwe nomumwe kuti, “chokwadi, ndini here, ishe?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “munhu aisa ruoko neni mundiro, ndiye achandipandukira. mwanakomana womunhu achaenda hake sokunyorwa kwazvakaitwa nezvake. asi ane nhamo munhu uyo anopandukira mwanakomana womunhu! zvingadai zvaiva nani kwaari dai asina kuberekwa.” zvino yeahudhasi uyo aizomupandukira akati, “chokwadi, ndini here, rabhi?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hongu, ndiwe.” vachiri kudya, yeahoshua akatora chingwa, akavonga akachimedura, uye akapa vadzidzi vake, achiti, “torai mudye; uyu ndiwo muviri wangu.” ipapo akatora mukombe, akavonga uye akavapa achiti, “inwai mose. iri iropa rangu resungano itsva rinodururirwa vazhinji kuti vagoregererwa zvivi zvavo. ndinokuudzai kuti, handichazonwi zvibereko zvomuzambiringa kubvira zvino kusvikira zuva iro randichazvinwa patsva nemi muumambo hwababa vangu.” vakati vaimba rwiyo, vakabuda vakaenda kugomo remiorivhi. ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “usiku huno imi mose muchatiza nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “ ‘ndicharova mufudzi, boka ramakwai rigopararira.’ asi mushure mokunge ndamuka, ndichafanotungamira kugarirea.” petro akapindura akati, “kunyange vamwe vose vakatiza nokuda kwenyu, ini handizoiti izvozvo.” yeahoshua akati, “ndinokuudza chokwadi kuti usiku huno chaihwo, jongwe risati rarira uchandiramba katatu.” asi petro akati kwaari, “kunyange ndichifanira kufa nemi, handingatongokurambai.” vamwe vadzidzi vose vakadarowo. ipapo yeahoshua akaenda navadzidzi vake kunzvimbo inonzi getsemani, uye akati kwavari, “garai pano ini ndichienda apo kundonyengetera.” akatora petro navanakomana vazebhedhi vaviri akaenda navo, uye akatanga kusuwa, uye akatambudzika. ipapo akati kwavari, “mweya wangu uri kushungurudzika kwazvo kusvika pakufa. garai pano uye murinde pamwe chete neni.” akaenda mberi zvishoma, akawira pasi nechiso chake akanyengetera achiti, “baba vangu, kana zvichibvira mukombe uyu ngaubviswe kwandiri. asi kwete kuda kwangu asi kuda kwenyu.” ipapo akadzokera kuvadzidzi vake akavawana vavata. akabvunza petro achiti, “varume, matadza kurinda neni kweawa imwe chete? rindai uye munyengetere kuti murege kupinda mukuedzwa. mweya unoda, asi muviri wakaneta.” akaendazve kechipiri akanyengetera achiti, “baba vangu, kana zvisingagoni kuti mukombe uyu ubviswe kwandiri kunze kwokutenge ndaunwa, kuda kwenyu ngakuitwe.” paakadzoka, akavawanazve vavata nokuti meso avo akanga azere nehope. saka akavasiya akaendazve uye akanyengetera kechitatu, achitaura zvimwe chetezvo. ipapo akadzokazve kuvadzidzi akati kwavari, “muchakavata uye muchakazorora here? tarirai, nguva yava pedyo, uye mwanakomana womunhu ari kupandukirwa achiiswa mumaoko avatadzi. simukai, ngatichiendai! anondipandukira uya ouya!” paakanga achiri kutaura kudaro, yeahudhasi, mumwe wevane gumi navaviri akasvika. akauya navanhu vazhinji vakanga vakabata minondo netsvimbo, vakanga vatumwa navaprista vakuru navakuru vavanhu. zvino uya akamupandukira ainge avaudza chiratidzo achiti, “uyo wandinotsvoda ndiye; mumusunge.” yeahudhasi akaenda pakarepo kuna yeahoshua akati, “kwaziwai, rabhi!” uye akamutsvoda. yeahoshua akamupindura achiti, “shamwari, ita zvawavinga.” ipapo varume vakaswedera pedyo vakabata yeahoshua, vakamusunga. ipapo mumwe waavo vaiva nayeahoshua akavhomora munondo wake ndokugura nzeve yomuranda womuprista mukuru. zvino yeahoshua akati kwaari, “dzorera munondo wako mumuhara mawo, nokuti vose vanovhomora munondo vachafa nomunondo. unofunga kuti handigoni here kukumbira kuna baba vangu, vakandipa iye zvino, vatumwa vanopfuura mapoka makuru gumi namaviri? asi magwaro angagozadziswa sei anoti zvinofanira kuitika saizvozvo?” panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akati kuvanhu vazhinji vaivapo, “ko, ndinotungamirira vapanduki here zvamauya neminondo netsvimbo kuzondibata? mazuva ose ndaigara mutemberi ndichidzidzisa uye hamuna kundisunga. asi izvi zvose zvaitika kuti zvakanyorwa navaprofita zvizadziswe.” ipapo vadzidzi vose vakamusiya uye vakatiza. vaya vakanga vasunga yeahoshua vakaenda naye kuna kayafasi, muprista mukuru, uko kwakanga kwakaungana vadzidzisi vomurayiro navamwe vakuru. asi petro akamutevera ari chinhambwe kusvikira paruvazhe rwomuprista mukuru. akapinda akagara pasi pamwe chete navarindi kuti aone maperero azvo. vaprista vakuru nedare rose ramakurukota vakanga vachitsvaka zvapupu zvenhema kuti zvipomere yeahoshua mhosva kuti vamuuraye. asi havana zvavakawana, kunyange zvazvo zvapupu zvenhema zvakauya pamberi. pakupedzisira, vaviri vakauya vakati, “munhu uyu akati, ‘ndinogona kuputsa temberi yaallah ndigoivakazve namazuva matatu.’ ” ipapo muprista mukuru akasimuka akati kuna yeahoshua, “ko, haupinduri here? uchapupu uhu hunorehwa navarume ava pamusoro pako ndohwei?” asi yeahoshua akaramba anyerere. muprista mukuru akati kwaari, “ndinokurayira, sezvo wapika naallah mupenyu, kuti, ‘tiudze kana uri iwe kristu, mwanakomana waallah.’ ” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hongu, ndizvo zvamataura. asi ndinoti kwamuri mose: munguva inouya muchaona mwanakomana womunhu agere kurudyi rwasamasimba uye achiuya ari mumakore okudenga.” ipapo muprista mukuru akabvarura nguo dzake akati, “ataura zvinomhura. tichagodirei zvimwe zvapupu? tarirai, zvino manzwa kumhura kwake. munofungei nazvo?” vakapindura vachiti, “anofanira kufa!” ipapo vakamusvipira mate kumeso uye vakamurova netsiva. vamwe vakamurova nembama uye vakati, “profita kwatiri, kristu. ndiani akurova?” zvino petro akanga agere panze muruvazhe, uye mumwe muranda wechisikana akauya kwaari akati, “newewo wakanga una yeahoshua wegarirea.” asi akaramba pamberi pavo vose achiti, “handizivi zvauri kutaura nezvazvo.” ipapo akabuda akandomira pasuo apo paakaonekwa nomumwe musikana uyo akati kuvanhu vose vaivapo, “murume uyu akanga ari pamwe chete nayeahoshua wenazareta.” akarambazve, akapika achiti, “murume uyu handimuzivi!” mushure mechinguva, vaya vakanga vamirepo vakaenda kuna petro vakasvikoti, “zvechokwadi uri mumwe wavo nokuda kwamatauriro ako.” ipapo akatanga kuzvituka uye akapika kwavari achiti, “murume uyu handimuzivi!” pakarepo jongwe rakarira. ipapo petro akarangarira shoko rakanga rataurwa nayeahoshua rokuti: “jongwe risati rarira uchandiramba katatu.” ipapo akabuda kunze akandochema zvikuru.

27

mangwanani-ngwanani vaprista vose vakuru navakuru vavanhu vakabvumirana kuti yeahoshua aurayiwe. vakamusunga, vakaenda naye vakandomuisa kuna pirato uyo aiva mubati. yeahudhasi uya akanga amupandukira akati aona kuti yeahoshua atongerwa rufu, akazvidemba kwazvo ndokubva adzosera makumi matatu esirivha aya kuvaprista vakuru navakuru. akasvikoti, “ndatadza, nokuti ndapandukira ropa risina mhosva.” vakamupindura vachiti, “zvinei nesu? ndezvako izvo.” saka yeahudhasi akakanda mari iya mutemberi akabva akaenda akandozvisungirira. vaprista vakuru vakanhonga mari iya vakati, “hazvitenderwi nomurayiro kuti tiise mari iyi mudura remari, sezvo iri mari yeropa.” saka vakazotenderana kuti vaishandise kutenga munda womuumbi wehari kuti ugova nzvimbo yokuviga vatorwa. naizvozvo wakanzi munda weropa kusvikira zuva ranhasi. ipapo zvakabva zvazadziswa zvakataurwa nomuprofita jeremia zvinoti, “vakatora makumi matatu esirivha, mutengo waakatengeswa nawo navanhu veisraeri, uye vakaashandisa kutenga nawo munda womuumbi wehari, sokurayirwa kwandakaitwa naishe.” panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akamira pamberi pomubati, uye mubati akamubvunza achiti, “ndiwe mambo wavayeahudha here?” yeahoshua akapindura achiti, “hongu, ndizvo zvamataura.” paakapomerwa navaprista vakuru navakuru vavanhu, haana chaakapindura. ipapo pirato akamubvunza achiti, “iwe haunzwi here uchapupu hwezvavari kukupomera izvi?” asi, yeahoshua akaramba anyerere, akasapindura kunyange chimwe zvacho, mubati akashamiswa kwazvo. zvino yaiva tsika yomubati pamutambo kusunungura musungwa mumwe chete anenge asarudzwa navanhu vazhinji. panguva iyoyo vaiva nomusungwa ainge anetsa kwazvo ainzi bharabhasi. saka vanhu vazhinji vakati vaungana, pirato akavabvunza akati, “ndoupi wamunoda kuti ndikusunungurirei: bharabhasi kana kuti yeahoshua anonzi kristu?” nokuti aiziva kuti vakanga vamuisa kwaari nokuda kwegodo. pirato akati agere pachigaro chokutonga mukadzi wake akamutumira shoko iri rokuti: “usawana chaunoita nomurume uyo asina mhosva, nokuti hope dzandarota nezvake usiku hwanhasi dzanditambudza kwazvo.” asi vaprista vakuru navakuru vavanhu vakakurudzira vanhu vazhinji kuti vakumbire bharabhasi uye kuti yeahoshua aurayiwe. mubati akabvunza akati, “ndoupi pavaviri ava wamunoda kuti ndikusunungurirei?” vakapindura vakati, “bharabhasi!” pirato akabvunza akati, “zvino ndichaiteiko nayeahoshua anonzi kristu?” vakapindura vakati, “ngaarovererwe pamuchinjikwa!” pirato akabvunzazve achiti, “nemhaka yei? mhosva yake ndeyei?” vanhu vazhinji vaya vakaramba vachidanidzira vachiti, “ngaarovererwe pamuchinjikwa!” pirato akati aona kuti hapana kwaaisvika, asi kuti bope rakanga rotanga, akatora mvura akashamba maoko ake pamberi pavanhu akati, “handina mhosva yeropa romunhu uyu. zvionerei.” vanhu vose vakapindura vachiti, “ropa rake ngarive pamusoro pedu napamusoro pevana vedu.” ipapo akavasunungurira bharabhasi, asi akaita kuti yeahoshua arohwe, uye akamupa kwavari kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa. ipapo varwi vomubati vakatora yeahoshua vakaenda naye mumuzinda womubati uye vakaunganidza hondo yose paari. vakamubvisa nguo dzake vakamupfekedza nguo tsvuku. vakaruka korona yeminzwa vakaiisa pamusoro wake. vakamubatisa mudonzvo muruoko rwake rworudyi vakapfugama pamberi pake uye vakamuseka vachiti, “kwaziwai, mambo wavayeahudha!” vakamusvipira mate vakamutorera tsvimbo iya uye vakamurova nayo mumusoro kakawanda. shure kwokumuseka, vakamupfekedza nguo dzake chaidzo ndokuenda naye kundomuroverera pamuchinjikwa. vakati vobuda, vakasangana nomurume aibva kusairini ainzi simoni, uye vakamumanikidza kuti atakure muchinjikwa. vakasvika panzvimbo inonzi gorogota, (zvinoreva kuti nzvimbo yedehenya). ipapo vakapa yeahoshua waini yakasanganiswa nenduru, kuti anwe, asi akati airavira akaramba kuinwa. vakati vamuroverera pamuchinjikwa, vakagovana nguo dzake vachiita zvokukanda mijenya. uye vakagara pasi, vakamurinda. pamusoro pake vakaisa rugwaro rwemhosva yake rwaiti: “uyu ndijesu, mambo wavajudha.” makororo maviri akarovererwawo pamwe chete naye, mumwe kurudyi mumwe kuruboshwe. vaya vaipfuura napo, vakamutuka vachidzungudza misoro yavo uye vachiti, “iwe uri kuzoputsa temberi uchizoivakazve mumazuva matatu, chizviponesa! buruka pamuchinjikwa kana uri mwanakomana waallah!” nenzira imwe cheteyo, vaprista vakuru, navadzidzisi vomurayiro navakuru vakamuseka vachiti, “akaponesa vamwe, asi haagoni kuzviponesa! ndiye mambo weisraeri! ngaaburuke zvino pamuchinjikwa tigotenda kwaari. anovimba naallah saka ngaachimununura iye zvino kana achimuda, nokuti akati, ‘ndiri mwanakomana waallah.’ ” nenzira imwe cheteyo makororo akanga arovererwa pamwe chete naye akamutukawo. kubva panguva yechitanhatu kusvika panguva yepfumbamwe rima rakavapo panyika yose. nenguva inenge yepfumbamwe, yeahoshua akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “eroi, eroi, rama sabhakitani?” zvichireva kuti, “allah wangu! allah wangu, mandisiyireiko?” vamwe vakanga vamirepo vakati vanzwa izvozvo, vakati, “ari kudana eria.” pakarepo mumwe wavo akamhanya akatora chipanje. akachizadza newaini yevhiniga ndokuchiisa pachimuti, achibva apa yeahoshua kuti anwe. vamwe vakati, “zvino musiyei ari oga. regai tione kana eria achiuya kuzomuponesa.” uye yeahoshua akati adanidzira nenzwi guru, akabudisa mweya wake. panguva iyoyo chidzitiro chomutemberi chakabvaruka napakati kubva kumusoro kusvika pasi. nyika yakadengenyeka, uye mabwe akatsemuka. makuva akazaruka, mitumbi yavatsvene vazhinji vakanga vakafa ikamutswa kuupenyu. vakabuda mumakuva, uye shure kwokumuka kwayeahoshua vakapinda muguta dzvene uye vakaonekwa navanhu vazhinji. mukuru wezana navaya vaakanga anavo vakarinda yeahoshua, pavakaona kudengenyeka kwenyika nezvose zvakanga zvaitika, vakatya kwazvo, uye vakati, “zvechokwadi, anga ari mwanakomana waallah!” vakadzi vazhinji vakanga varipo, vachitarira vari kure. vakanga vatevera yeahoshua kubva kugarirea kuti vamuriritire pane zvaaida. pakati pavo paiva namiriamu magadharena, miriamu mai vayaqobho nayosefa, namai vavanakomana vazebhedhi. kwakati kwovira, kwakauya mumwe murume mupfumi aibva kuarimatea, ainzi yosefa, akanga avawo mudzidzi wayeahoshua. akaenda kuna pirato akandokumbira mutumbi wayeahoshua, uye pirato akarayira kuti aupiwe. yosefa akatora mutumbi akauputira nomucheka wakachena, akauisa muguva rake idzva raakanga achera padombo. akakungurutsira ibwe guru pamuromo weguva ndokubva aenda. miriamu magadharena nomumwe miriamu vakanga varipo vagere pakatarisana neguva. mangwana acho, iro rakatevera zuva rokugadzirira, vaprista vakuru navafarisi vakaenda kuna pirato. vakasvikoti, “ishe, tinorangarira kuti achiri mupenyu, munyengeri uya akati, ‘mushure mamazuva matatu, ndichamukazve.’ saka rayirai kuti guva rake richengetedzwe kwazvo kusvika pazuva retatu. zvimwe vadzidzi vake vangauye vakaba mutumbi wake vakaudza vanhu kuti akamutswa kubva kuvakafa. kunyengera kwokupedzisira uku kuchaipa kukunda kwokutanga.” pirato akapindura akati, “torai, varindi. endai, mundochengetedza guva iroro semaziviro enyu.” saka vakaenda vakandoita kuti richengetedzwe nokuisa chisimbiso pabwe, uye nokuisa varindi.

28

mushure mesabata, ava mambakwedza nomusi wokutanga wevhiki, miriamu magadharena nomumwe miriamu vakaenda kundoona guva. pakava nokudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru nokuti mutumwa washe akabva kudenga akaenda paguva akasvikokungurutsa ibwe riya akagara pamusoro paro. kuonekwa kwake kwakanga kwakaita semheni uye nguo dzake dzakanga dzakachena sechando. varindi vakamutya kwazvo zvokuti vakadedera vakaita savanhu vafa. mutumwa akati kuvakadzi vaya, “musatya nokuti ndinoziva kuti muri kutsvaka yeahoshua uyo akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. haapo pano; amuka sokutaura kwaakaita. uyai muone panzvimbo paakanga avete. zvino kurumidzai muende kundoudza vadzidzi vake kuti, ‘amuka kubva kuvakafa uye kuti afanotungamira kugarirea. muchanomuona ikoko.’ zvino ndakuudzai.” saka vakadzi ava vakakurumidza kubva paguva vachitya asi vakazadzwa nomufaro, uye vakamhanya kundoudza vadzidzi vake. pakarepo yeahoshua akasangana navo, akati, “kwaziwai.” vakauya kwaari vakabata tsoka dzake uye vakamunamata. ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “musatya. endai mundoudza hama dzangu kuti vaende kugarirea; ikoko ndiko kwavachanondiona.” vakadzi vaya vachiri munzira, vamwe vevarindi vakaenda muguta vakandotaurira vaprista vakuru zvose zvakanga zvaitika. vaprista vakuru vakati vasangana navakuru, uye vafunga zano, vakapa varwi mari zhinji vakati kwavari, “imi munofanira kutaura muchiti, ‘vadzidzi vake vakauya usiku vakamuba isu tivete.’ kana mashoko aya akasvika munzeve dzomubati, isu tichaita kuti agutsikane uye imi musawira mudambudziko.” saka varwi vakatora mari iya vakaita sezvavakanga varayirwa. uye shoko iri rakaparadzirwa kwazvo pakati pavayeahudha kusvikira zuva ranhasi. ipapo vadzidzi gumi nomumwe vakaenda kugarirea, kugomo ravainge vaudzwa nayeahoshua kuti vaende. vakati vamuona, vakamunamata, asi vamwe vakakahadzika. ipapo yeahoshua akasvika pavari akati, “simba rose kudenga napanyika rakapiwa kwandiri. naizvozvo endai mudzidzise ndudzi dzose, muchivabhabhatidza muzita rababa, neromwanakomana neromweya mutsvene, uye muchivadzidzisa kuti vachengete zvose zvandakakurayirai. uye zvechokwadi ndinemi kusvikira pakuguma kwenyika.”

mark

1

kutanga kwevhangeri rayeahoshua kristu, mwanakomana waallah. kwakanyorwa muna isaya muprofita kuchinzi: “ndichatuma nhume yangu mberi kwako, uyo achagadzira nzira yako,” “inzwi rounodana murenje, richiti, ‘gadzirai nzira yashe, ruramisai migwagwa yake.’ ” uye saizvozvo yeahochani akauya, achibhabhatidza murenje uye achiparidza rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka kuti varegererwe zvivi. nyika yose yejudhea navanhu vose vejerusarema vakaenda kwaari. vachireurura zvivi zvavo, vakabhabhatidzwa naye murwizi rwejorodhani. yeahochani aipfeka nguo dzamakushe engamera, nebhanhire reganda muchiuno chake, uye aidya mhashu nouchi hwesango. uye iyi ndiyo yakanga iri mharidzo yake: “shure kwangu kuchauya mumwe ane simba kupfuureni wandisina kufanira kusunungura rukanda rweshangu dzake. ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura, asi iye achakubhabhatidzai nomweya mutsvene.” panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akauya achibva kunazareta mugarirea uye akabhabhatidzwa nayeahochani mujorodhani. yeahoshua paakanga ava kubuda mumvura, akaona denga richizarurwa uye mweya achiburukira pamusoro pake senjiva. uye inzwi rakauya richibva kudenga richiti, “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu, wandinoda, wandinofarira kwazvo.” pakarepo mweya akamutumira kurenje, uye akanga ari murenje kwamazuva makumi mana, achiedzwa nasatani. akanga ari pamwe chete nemhuka dzesango uye vatumwa vakamushandira. mushure mokunge yeahochani aiswa mutorongo, yeahoshua akaenda kugarirea, achiparidza vhangeri raallah. akati, “nguva yasvika. umambo hwaallah hwaswedera. tendeukai mutende vhangeri!” yeahoshua paakanga achifamba pamahombekombe egungwa regarirea, akaona simoni nomununʼuna wake andirea vachikanda usvasvi mugungwa, nokuti vakanga vari vabati vehove. yeahoshua akati, “uyai munditevere, uye ndichakuitai vabati vavanhu.” pakarepo vakasiya usvasvi hwavo vakamutevera. akati afamba chinhambwe zvishoma, akaona yaqobho mwanakomana wazebhedhi nomununʼuna wake yeahochani vari mugwa, vachigadzira usvasvi hwavo. haana kunonoka, akavadana, uye vakasiya baba vavo, zebhedhi, mugwa vaine vashandi vavo, vakamutevera. vakaenda kukapenaume, uye nomusi wesabata, yeahoshua akapinda musinagoge akatanga kudzidzisa. vanhu vakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake, nokuti akavadzidzisa somunhu ane simba, asingaiti savadzidzisi vomurayiro. pakarepo mumwe murume akanga ari musinagoge ravo akanga akabatwa nomweya wakaipa akadanidzira achiti, “munodeiko kwatiri, imi yeahoshua wenazareta? mauya kuzotiparadza here? ndinoziva kuti ndimi ani, imi mutsvene waallah!” yeahoshua akarayira akati, “nyarara! buda maari!” mweya wakaipa wakamuzunza-zunza ndokubva wabuda maari nenzwi guru. vanhu vose vakashamiswa kwazvo zvokuti vakabvunzana vachiti, “chiiko ichi? idzidziso itsva ine simba! anorayira kunyange mweya yakaipa, uye ichimuteerera.” mukurumbira wake wakapararira munyika yose yegarirea. vakati vachangobva musinagoge, vakaenda nayaqobho nayeahochani kumba kwasimoni naandirea. ambuya vasimoni vakanga vavete pamubhedha vachirwara nefivha, uye vakaudza yeahoshua nezvavo. saka akaenda kwavari, akabata ruoko rwavo akavabatsira kusimuka. fivha yakabva mavari vakatanga kuvashandira. manheru acho iwayo zuva ravira, vanhu vakauya kuna yeahoshua navose vairwara navakanga vakabatwa namadhimoni. guta rose rakaungana pamukova, uye yeahoshua akaporesa vazhinji vakanga vane zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana. akadzingawo madhimoni mazhinji, asi akanga asingatenderi madhimoni kuti ataure nokuti akanga achiziva kuti iye ndiani. mangwanani-ngwanani, kuchakasviba, yeahoshua akamuka akabuda mumba akaenda kunzvimbo yaakanga ari oga, ikoko akandonyengetera. simoni navamwe vake vakaenda kundomutsvaka, uye vakati vamuwana, vakati, “vanhu vose vanokutsvakai!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ngatiendei kune imwe nzvimbo, kumisha iri pedyo, kuti ndinoparidzawo ikoko. ndizvo zvandakauyira.” saka akafamba nomugarirea yose, achiparidza mumasinagoge avo uye achidzinga madhimoni. mumwe murume akanga ana maperembudzi akauya kwaari akapfugama, akamukumbira zvikuru achiti, “kana muchida, munogona kundinatsa.” yeahoshua akamunzwira ngoni, akatambanudza ruoko rwake akabata murume uya. akati, “ndinoda. chinatswa!” pakarepo maperembudzi akabva paari uye akaporeswa. yeahoshua akamuendesa pakarepo akamuyambira zvikuru achiti, “chenjera kuti urege kuudza mumwe munhu. asi enda, undozviratidza kumuprista ugobayira chipiriso chakarayirwa namozisi chokuporeswa kwako, chive chapupu kwavari.” asi iye akabuda akatanga kutaura akasununguka, achiparadzira shoko iro. nokuda kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua haana kuzogona kupinda muguta zviri pachena asi akagara kunze, kunzvimbo dzakanyarara. kunyange zvakadaro vanhu vakaramba vachiuya kwaari vachibva kumativi ose.

2

shure kwamazuva mashoma shoma, yeahoshua akati apindazve mukapenaume, vanhu vakanzwa kuti akanga auya kumusha. saka vazhinji vakaungana zvokuti mumba makasara musisina nzvimbo kunyange kunze kwomukova, uye akaparidza shoko kwavari. vamwe varume vakasvika, vakauya kwaari nomunhu akanga akafa mutezo, akatakurwa navarume vana. sezvo vakanga vasingagoni kusvika naye kuna yeahoshua nokuda kwokuwanda kwavanhu, vakazarura denga reimba pamusoro payeahoshua uye, vakati variputsa, vakaburutsa nhoo pakanga pavete uya munhu akanga akafa mutezo. yeahoshua akati aona kutenda kwavo, akati kuno uya akanga akafa mutezo, “mwanakomana, zvivi zvako zvaregererwa.” zvino vamwe vadzidzisi vomurayiro, vakanga vagere ipapo, vakafunga mumwoyo yavo vachiti, “munhu uyu anotaura sei achidaro? ari kumhura allah! ndianiko anoregerera zvivi asi allah oga?” pakarepo yeahoshua akazviziva mumweya wake kuti ndizvo zvavakanga vachifunga mumwoyo yavo, uye akati kwavari, “seiko muchifunga zvinhu izvi? ndezvipiko zvakareruka: kuti kuno wakafa mutezo, ‘zvivi zvako zvaregererwa,’ kana kuti, ‘simuka, tora nhoo yako ufambe’? asi kuti muzive kuti mwanakomana womunhu ane simba panyika rokuregerera zvivi.” akati kuna akanga akafa mutezo, “ndinoti kwauri, simuka, tora nhoo yako uende kumba.” akasimuka kubva panhoo yake, akatora nhoo yake akafamba akabuda vose vachizviona. izvi zvakashamisa munhu wose uye vakarumbidza allah vachiti, “hatina kumboona chinhu chakadai!” ipapo yeahoshua akabudazve akaenda kugungwa. vanhu vazhinji zhinji vakauya kwaari uye akatanga kuvadzidzisa. paaifamba achitevedza gungwa, akaona revhi mwanakomana waarifeasi agere paitererwa mutero. yeahoshua akati kwaari, “nditevere,” ipapo revhi akasimuka akamutevera. yeahoshua paakanga achidya kudya kwamanheru pamba parevhi, vateresi vazhinji na“vatadzi” vakanga vachidya naye, navadzidzi vake, nokuti kwaiva navazhinji vaimutevera. vadzidzisi vomurayiro, ivo vafarisi, vakati vachimuona achidya na“vatadzi” navateresi, vakabvunza vadzidzi vake vakati, “seiko achidya navateresi na‘vatadzi’?” anzwa izvozvo, yeahoshua akati kwavari, “vasingarwari havatsvaki chiremba, asi vanorwara. handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi.” zvino vadzidzi vayeahochani navafarisi vakanga vachitsanya. vamwe vanhu vakauya vakabvunza yeahoshua vakati, “sei vadzidzi vayeahochani navadzidzi vavafarisi vachitsanya, asi venyu vasingatsanyi?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “shamwari dzechikomba dzingatsanya seiko kana iye achinavo? havangadaro, kana iye achinavo. asi nguva ichasvika ichabviswa chikomba kwavari, uye pazuva iroro vachatsanya. “hakuna munhu anoisa chigamba chitsva panguo tsaru. kana akadaro, chigamba chitsva chichabvarura chitsaru, zvoita kuti buri racho rinyanye kukura. uye hakuna munhu anodira waini itsva muhombodo dzamatehwe tsaru. kana akaita izvozvo, waini ichaputitsa matehwe, uye zvose waini nedehwe rewaini zvichaparara. kwete, anodira waini itsva muhombodo itsva.” mumwe musi wesabata, yeahoshua akanga achipfuura nomuminda yezviyo, uye vadzidzi vake vakanga vachifamba naye, vakatanga kutanha hura dzezviyo. vafarisi vakati kwaari, “tarirai, seiko vachiita zvisingatenderwi nomusi wesabata.” akapindura akati, “hamuna kumboverenga here zvakaitwa nadhavhidhi navamwe vake pavakanga vashayiwa zvokudya uye vonzwa nzara? mumazuva aabhiatari muprista mukuru, akapinda mumba maallah akadya chingwa chakatsaurwa, chinongotenderwa kudyiwa navaprista chete. uye akapawo vamwe vaaiva navo.” ipapo akati kwavari, “sabata rakaitirwa munhu, munhu haana kuitirwa sabata. saka mwanakomana womunhu ndiye ishe kunyange wesabata.”

3

pane imwe nguva akapinda musinagoge, uye imomo makanga mune murume akanga ane ruoko rwakanga rwakakokonyara. vamwe vavo vakanga vachitsvaka mhosva yavangapomera yeahoshua, saka vakamutarisisa kuti vaone kana aizomuporesa nomusi wesabata. yeahoshua akati kumurume akanga ane ruoko rwakakokonyara, “simuka umire pamberi pavanhu vose.” ipapo yeahoshua akavabvunza akati, “ndezvipiko zvinotenderwa nomusi wesabata: kuita zvakanaka kana kuita zvakaipa, kuponesa munhu kana kuuraya?” asi vakaramba vanyerere. atsamwa, akatarisa vanhu vose vakanga vakamukomberedza, uye ashungurudzwa nokuda kwokusindimara kwemwoyo yavo akati kumurume uya, “tambanudza ruoko rwako.” akarutambanudza, uye ruoko rwake rukaporeswa. ipapo vafarisi vakabuda vakatanga kurangana navaherodhi kuti vangauraya sei yeahoshua. yeahoshua akabva kugungwa navadzidzi vake, uye vanhu vazhinji vaibva kugarirea vakamutevera. vakati vanzwa zvose zvaakanga achiita, vanhu vazhinji vakauya kwaari vachibva kujudhea, jerusarema, idhumea, uye namatunhu ari mhiri kwejorodhani, neakapoteredza tire nesidhoni. akaudza vadzidzi vake kuti vamutsvagire igwa duku, kuitira kuti vanhu varege kumutsikirira nokuda kwokuwanda kwavo. ainge aporesa vazhinji zvokuti vaya vakanga vane zvirwere vakanga vachisundana vachiuya mberi kuti vamubate. pose paaionekwa nemweya yakaipa, yaiwira pasi pamberi pake uye yaidanidzira ichiti, “ndimi mwanakomana waallah.” asi iye akairayira kwazvo kuti irege kutaura kuti akanga ari ani. yeahoshua akakwira pagomo akadana kwaari vaya vaaida, uye vakauya. akasarudza vane gumi navaviri akavati vapostori, kuti vagare naye uye kuti agozovatuma kuti vandoparidza uye kuti vave nesimba rokudzinga madhimoni. ava ndivo gumi navaviri vaakasarudza: simoni (uyo waakatumidza zita rokuti petro), yaqobho mwanakomana wazebhedhi nomununʼuna wake yeahochani (avo vaakatumidza zita rokuti bhoanerigesi, kureva kuti vanakomana vokutinhira), andirea, firipi, bhatoromeo, mateo, tomasi, yaqobho mwanakomana waarifeasi, tadheo, simoni muzeroti nayeahudhasi iskarioti, uyo akamupandukira. ipapo yeahoshua akapinda mune imwe imba, uye vazhinji vakaunganazve, zvokuti iye navadzidzi vake vakanga vasingagoni kunyange kudya. mhuri yake yakati yazvinzwa, vakaenda kundomubata, nokuti vakati, “ava kupenga.” uye vadzidzisi vomurayiro vaibva kujerusarema vakati, “akabatwa nomweya wabheerizebhubhi! ari kudzinga madhimoni nomuchinda wamadhimoni.” saka yeahoshua akavadana akataura kwavari nomufananidzo achiti, “ko, satani angadzinga sei satani? kana umambo huchizvipesanisa, umambo ihwohwo hahugoni kumira. kana imba ichizvipesanisa, imba iyoyo haigoni kumira. uye kana satani achizvipikisa pachake uye achizvipesanisa, haangagoni kumira; kuguma kwake kwasvika. zviripo ndezvokuti, hakuna munhu angapinda mumba momunhu ane simba agotakura zvinhu zvake, kana asina kutanga asunga murume wacho ane simba. ipapo angagona kupamba imba yake. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti zvivi zvose nokumhura kwavanhu kwose zvicharegererwa. asi ani naani anomhura mweya mutsvene haazomboregererwi; ane mhosva yechivi chisingaperi.” akataura izvozvo nokuti vakanga vachiti, “ano mweya wakaipa.” ipapo mai vayeahoshua navanunʼuna vake vakauya. vakatuma munhu kundomudana ivo vamire panze. vazhinji vakanga vagere vakamukomberedza, uye vakati kwaari, “mai venyu navanunʼuna venyu vari kukutsvakai panze.” iye akati, “vanamai vangu navanunʼuna vangu ndivanaaniko?” ipapo akatarisa kuna avo vakanga vagere vakaita denderedzwa vakamupoteredza akati, “ava ndivo mai vangu navanunʼuna vangu! ani naani anoita kuda kwaallah ndiye mununʼuna wangu nehanzvadzi, uye namai vangu.”

4

yeahoshua akatanga kudzidzisazve ari pagungwa. vanhu vakanga vakaungana vakamukomberedza vari vazhinji zhinji zvokuti akabva apinda mugwa akagara mariri ari mugungwa, asi vanhu vose vari kumahombekombe. akavadzidzisa zvinhu zvizhinji nemifananidzo, uye mukudzidzisa kwake akati, “teererai! murimi akabuda kundokusha mbeu yake. paakanga achikusha mbeu, dzimwe dzakawira munzira, uye shiri dzakasvika dzikadzidya. dzimwe dzakawira murukangarabwe, madzisina kuwana ivhu rakawanda. dzakakurumidza kumera, nokuti ivhu rakanga riri shoma. asi zuva rakati rabuda, mbeu dzakapiswa nezuva, uye dzikaoma nokuti dzakanga dzisina midzi. dzimwe dzakawira pakati peminzwa, minzwa ikakura ikavhunga mbeu, nokudaro hadzina kubereka zvibereko. uye dzimwe dzakawira pavhu rakanaka. dzakamera dzikakura uye dzikabereka kakapetwa makumi matatu, makumi matanhatu, kana kunyange zana.” ipapo yeahoshua akati, “ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe.” paakanga ava oga, vane gumi navaviri uye navamwe vakanga vakamukomberedza vakamubvunza pamusoro pomufananidzo uyu. akati kwavari, “chakavanzika choumambo hwaallah chakapiwa kwamuri. asi kuna avo vari kunze, zvinhu zvose zvinotaurwa nemifananidzo kuitira kuti, “ ‘zvimwe vangaramba vachiona, asi varege kuonesesa; uye vachinzwa, asi varege kunzwisisa; kana kuti vangatendeuka uye vakaregererwa!’ ” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “hamunzwisisi mufananidzo uyu here? munganzwisisa seiko mufananidzo upi zvawo? murimi anokusha shoko. vamwe vanhu vakaita setsanga yakawira munzira, munokushwa shoko. pavanongorinzwa, satani anouya otora shoko rakushwa mukati mavo. vamwe vakaita setsanga yakawira parukangarahwe, vanonzwa shoko uye nokukurumidza vorigamuchira nomufaro. asi sezvo vasina midzi, vanongotsungirira kwenguva pfupi. panongosvika nhamo kana kutambudzwa nokuda kweshoko, vanokurumidza kuwa. uye vamwe, setsanga yakawira pakati peminzwa, vanonzwa shoko; asi kufunganya nezvoupenyu huno, kunyengera kwoupfumi uye zvishuvo zvezvimwe zvinhu zvinopinda zvigovhunga shoko, zvichirishayisa zvibereko. vamwe vakaita setsanga yakawira pavhu rakanaka, vanonzwa shoko, vorigamuchira, uye vobereka zvibereko, kakapetwa makumi matatu, makumi matanhatu kana kunyange zana pane zvinenge zvakushwa.” akati kwavari, “munouya nomwenje kuzouisa pasi pedengu here kana pasi pomubhedha? handiti munouisa pachigadziko chawo here? nokuti hapana chakavigwa chisingazooneswi, uye hapana chakavanzika chisingazobudi pachena. munhu ane nzeve dzokunzwa ngaanzwe.” akaenderera mberi achiti, “chenjererai kwazvo zvamunonzwa. chiyero chamunoshandisa, ndicho chamuchayerwawo nacho kunyange zvakapfuurisa. ani naani anazvo achapiwa zvimwe; ani naani asina, achatorerwa kunyange nezvaanazvo.” akatizve, “umambo hwaallah hwakafanana nomunhu anokusha mbeu muvhu. usiku namasikati, kunyange akavata kana akamuka, mbeu inomera igokura, kunyange zvazvo asingazivi kuti zvinoitika sei. ivhu riri roga rinobereka zviyo, kutanga chipande, kwozoti hura, kwozoitawo tsanga dzakakora muhura. panongoibva zviyo, anozvicheka nejeko, nokuti kukohwa kwasvika.” akatizve, “umambo hwaallah tingahufananidza neiko kana kuti tingaita mufananidzo upiko kuti tihutsanangure? hwakafanana netsanga yemasitadhi, inova tsanga duku duku yaunodyara muvhu. asi kana yadyarwa, inokura igova muti mukuru kupfuura miti yose yomubindu, una matavi makuru zvokuti shiri dzedenga dzinogona kugara mumumvuri wawo.” nemimwe mifananidzo yakadai, yeahoshua akataura shoko kwavari, zvose sezvavaigona kunzwisisa. haana kutaura chinhu chimwe kwavari asingashandisi mufananidzo. asi paainge ari oga navadzidzi vake, aivatsanangurira zvose. zuva iroro ava madekwana, akati kuvadzidzi vake, “ngatiyambukirei kuno rumwe rutivi.” vakasiya vanhu vazhinji, vakaenda naye mugwa, sezvaakanga ari. pakanga pane mamwewo magwa aaiva nawo. dutu rinotyisa rakauya, uye mafungu akarova igwa, zvokuti rakanga rava pedyo nokunyura. yeahoshua akanga ari mushure megwa, avete pamutsago. vadzidzi vake vakamumutsa vakati kwaari, “mudzidzisi, hamuna hanya here kana tikanyura?” akamuka, akarayira mhepo uye akati kumafungu, “nyarara! dzikama!” ipapo mhepo yakapera uye kukadzikama zvikuru. akati kuvadzidzi vake, “munotyireiko zvakadai? hamusati mava nokutenda here?” vakatya uye vakabvunzana vachiti, “ndianiko uyu? kunyange mhepo namafungu zvinomuteerera!”

5

vakayambuka mhiri kwegungwa kunyika yavagerase. yeahoshua akati abuda mugwa, mumwe murume akanga ano mweya wakaipa akauya achibva kumakuva kuti azosangana naye. murume uyu aigara kumakuva, uye kwakanga kusisina munhu aigona kumusungazve, kunyange kana nengetani. nokuti kazhinji aisungwa maoko namakumbo, asi aidambura ngetani napakati uye achivhuna simbi dzaiva pamakumbo ake. hakuna munhu aiva nesimba rokumukunda. usiku namasikati aingochema uye achizvicheka-cheka namabwe ari pakati pamakuva uye nomuzvikomo. akati aona yeahoshua achiri chinhambwe, akamhanya akandowira namabvi ake mberi kwake. akadanidzira nenzwi riri pamusoro achiti, “munodeiko kwandiri, yeahoshua, mwanakomana waallah wokumusoro-soro? pikai kuna allah kuti hamuzonditambudzi!” nokuti yeahoshua akanga ati kwaari, “buda mumunhu uyu, iwe mweya wakaipa!” ipapo yeahoshua akamubvunza akati, “zita rako ndiwe ani?” akapindura akati, “zita rangu ndiregioni, nokuti tiri vazhinji.” uye akakumbira akumbirazve kuna yeahoshua kuti arege kuidzinga kubva munyika iyo. boka guru renguruve raifura riri pazvikomo zvaiva pedyo nenzvimbo iyi. madhimoni akakumbirisa kuna yeahoshua akati, “titumei henyu pakati penguruve, titenderei henyu kuti tinopinda madziri.” akaatendera, uye mweya yakaipa yakabuda ikaenda ikandopinda munguruve. boka rinenge zviuru zviviri pakuwanda, rakamhanya richiburukira kumawere rikapinda mugungwa uye rikanyuramo. vaya vakanga vachifudza nguruve vakatiza vakandozivisa izvi muguta nomumaruwa, uye vanhu vakabuda kuti vandoona zvakanga zvaitika. vakati vasvika kuna yeahoshua, vakaona murume uya akanga akabatwa neregioni ramadhimoni, agere ipapo, akapfeka uye ava munhu kwaye; uye vakatya. vaya vakanga vazviona vakavaudza zvakanga zvaitika kumunhu akanga ambobatwa namadhimoni, uye vakataura nezvenguruvewo. ipapo vanhu vakatanga kukumbira yeahoshua kuti abve munyika yavo. yeahoshua paakanga opinda mugwa, munhu akanga akabatwa namadhimoni akakumbira zvikuru kuti aende naye. yeahoshua haana kumutendera, asi akati kwaari, “chienda kumba kumhuri yako undovaudza zvawaitirwa nashe, uye kuti akunzwira ngoni sei.” saka murume uyu akabva akaenda uye akatanga kutaura mudhekapori zvinhu zvikuru zvaakanga aitirwa nayeahoshua. uye vanhu vose vakashamiswa. yeahoshua akati ayambukazve mhiri negwa kuno rumwe rutivi rwegungwa, vazhinji zhinji vakaungana vakamukomberedza paakanga ari pagungwa. ipapo mumwe wavabati vomusinagoge, ainzi jairosi, akasvikapo. paakaona yeahoshua akawira patsoka dzake uye akamukumbirisa zvikuru achiti, “mwanasikana wangu mudiki ava kufa. ndapota uyai muise maoko enyu pamusoro pake kuti agoporeswa uye ararame.” saka yeahoshua akaenda naye. vazhinji zhinji vakatevera vachimanikidzirana. uye pakanga pano mukadzi aiva nechirwere chokubuda ropa kwamakore gumi namaviri. akanga atambudzika zvikuru uye achirapwa navanachiremba vazhinji uye akanga apedza zvose zvaaiva nazvo, asi pachinzvimbo chokuva nani akatonyanyisa kurwara. akati anzwa nezvayeahoshua, akauya mushure make mukati mavazhinji uye akabata nguo yake, nokuti akati mumwoyo make, “kana ndikangobata nguo dzake, ndichaporeswa.” pakarepo tsime reropa rake rakapwa uye akanzwa mumuviri wake kuti akanga asunungurwa kubva pakutambudzika kwake. pakarepo yeahoshua akanzwa kuti simba rakanga rabuda maari. akatendeukira kuruzhinji rwavanhu akabvunza achiti, “ndianiko abata nguo dzangu?” vadzidzi vake vakati, “muri kuona vanhu vachikutsimbirirai, zvino moti, ‘ndianiko andibata?’ ” asi yeahoshua akaramba achitarisa-tarisa kuti aone kuti ndiani akanga aita izvozvo. ipapo mukadzi, achiziva zvakanga zvaitika kwaari, akauya akawira patsoka dzake, uye achidedera nokutya, akamuudza chokwadi chose. iye akati kwaari, “mwanasikana, kutenda kwako kwakuporesa. enda norugare uye usunungurwe pakutambudzika kwako.” yeahoshua achiri kutaura, vamwe varume vakauya vachibva kumba kwajairosi, mukuru wesinagoge. vakati, “mwanasikana wenyu afa. muchanetsereiko mudzidzisi?” asina hanya nezvavakanga vataura, yeahoshua akati kumukuru wesinagoge, “usatya; tenda bedzi.” haana kutendera mumwe munhu kuti amutevere kunze kwapetro, yaqobho nayeahochani mununʼuna wayaqobho. vakati vasvika pamba pomukuru wesinagoge, yeahoshua akanzwa mheremhere, vanhu vachichema nokuungudza zvikuru. akapinda akati kwavari, “ko, mheremhere ndeyeiko nokuungudza uku? mwana haana kufa asi avete.” asi vakamuseka. mushure mokunge avabudisa vose panze, akatora baba namai vomwana navadzidzi vaakanga anavo, akapinda makanga muno mwana. akamubata noruoko akati kwaari, “tarita kumi!” (zvichireva kuti, “musikana, ndinoti kwauri, muka!”) pakarepo musikana akasimuka akafamba-famba (akanga ana makore gumi namaviri okuberekwa). nokuda kwaizvozvi, vakashamiswa zvikuru. akarayira nokurayira kukuru kuti parege kuva nomunhu anoziva nezvazvo, uye akavaudza kuti vamupe zvokudya.

6

yeahoshua akabva ipapo akaenda kuguta rokwake, vadzidzi vake vachimutevera. sabata rakati rasvika, akatanga kudzidzisa musinagoge, uye vazhinji vakamunzwa vakashamiswa. vakabvunza vachiti, “murume uyu akawanepi zvinhu izvi? uchenjeri hupi uhu hwaakapiwa hwokuti anotoita zvishamiso? ko, haasiye muvezi here? ko, haasiye mwanakomana wamiriamu here nomukoma wayaqobho, yosefa, yeahudhasi nasimoni? ko, hanzvadzi dzake hadzisi pano nesu here?” uye vakagumburwa naye. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “muprofita haakudzwi muguta romunyika yokwake, pakati pehama dzake, nomumba make chete.” haana kugona kuita zvishamiso zvipi zvazvo imomo, kunze kwokuisa maoko ake pamusoro pavanhu vashoma vairwara uye nokuvaporesa. akashamiswa nokusatenda kwavo. ipapo yeahoshua akapota nemisha achidzidzisa. akadana kwaari vane gumi navaviri akavatuma vari vaviri vaviri uye akavapa simba pamusoro pemweya yakaipa. akavarayira achiti, “musatora chinhu parwendo kunze kwetsvimbo; musatora chingwa, kana hombodo, kana mari muzvikwama zvenyu. mupfeke shangu asi kwete nguo yechipiri. pose pamunopinda mumba, garai imomo kusvikira mabva muguta iroro. uye kana pane nzvimbo icharamba kukugamuchirai kana kukuteererai, muzunze guruva retsoka dzenyu pamunenge mobva, chive chapupu pamusoro pavo.” vakabuda vakaenda kundoparidza kuti vanhu vatendeuke. vakadzinga madhimoni mazhinji uye vakazodza mafuta vanhu vazhinji vairwara uye vakavaporesa. mambo herodhi akanzwa nezvazvo, nokuti zita rayeahoshua rakanga rozivikanwa kwazvo. vamwe vakanga vachiti, “yeahochani mubhabhatidzi akamutswa kubva kuvakafa; uye ndokusaka zviratidzo zvesimba zvichiitika.” vamwe vakati, “ndieria.” uye vamwezve vakati, “ndiye muprofita, akaita somumwe wavaprofita vekare.” asi herodhi akati anzwa izvozvo, akati, “yeahochani, murume wandakagura musoro, akamutswa kubva kuvakafa!” nokuti herodhi pachake akanga arayira kuti yeahochani asungwe, uye akaita kuti asungwe nengetani uye aiswe mutorongo. akaita izvi nokuda kwaherodhiasi mukadzi womununʼuna wake firipi waakanga awana. nokuti yeahochani akanga ati kuna herodhi, “hazvitenderwi kuti utore mukadzi womununʼuna wako.” saka herodhiasi akachengeta ruvengo mumwoyo make pamusoro payeahochani uye akada kumuuraya. asi akanga asingakwanisi kuita izvozvo, nokuti herodhi aitya yeahochani uye akamudzivirira, achimuziva somunhu akanga akarurama uye ari mutsvene. herodhi akati anzwa yeahochani, akakanganisika zvikuru; asi akanga achifarira kumuteerera. pakupedzisira mukana wakazovapo. pazuva rokuberekwa kwake, herodhi akaitira vabati vake vakuru, navakuru vamauto uye navarume vaitungamirira mugarirea mabiko. mwanasikana waherodhiasi akati apinda akatamba, akafadza herodhi navakanga vakokwa kuzodya. mambo akati kumusikana, “ndikumbire chipi zvacho chaunoda, uye ndichakupa chinhu ichocho.” uye akamuvimbisa nemhiko achiti, “chose chauchakumbira ndichakupa chinhu ichocho, kusvikira pahafu youmambo hwangu.” akabuda kunze akandoti kuna mai vake, “ndichakumbireiko?” ivo vakati, “musoro wayeahochani mubhabhatidzi.” pakarepo musikana akamhanya akapinda kuna mambo nechikumbiro akati, “ndinoda kuti mundipe iye zvino musoro wayeahochani mubhabhatidzi mundiro umu.” mambo akatambudzika zvikuru, asi nokuda kwemhiko yake uye nokuda kwevaakanga achidya navo, haana kuda kumurambira. saka pakarepo akatuma murwi akarayira kuti vauye nomusoro wayeahochani. murume akaenda akandogura musoro wayeahochani mutorongo, akadzoka nomusoro wake uri mundiro. akaupa kumusikana, uye musikana akaupa kuna mai vake. vadzidzi vayeahochani vakati vanzwa izvi vakauya vakatora mutumbi wake vakauviga mubwiro. vapostori vakaungana pana yeahoshua vakamuudza zvose zvavakanga vaita nezvavakanga vadzidzisa. zvino nokuda kwokuti vanhu vazhinji vakanga vachingouya nokuenda zvokuti havana kugona kuwana kunyange mukana wokudya, akati kwavari, “handei tose, imi neni chete, kunzvimbo yakanyarara kuti mumbondozorora.” saka vakaenda voga mugwa kunzvimbo yakanyarara. asi vazhinji vakavaona vakavaziva uye vakamhanya netsoka vachibva kumaguta ose vakavatangira kusvikako. yeahoshua akati aburuka uye achiona vanhu vazhinji zhinji, akavanzwira tsitsi, nokuti vakanga vakaita samakwai asina mufudzi. saka akatanga kuvadzidzisa zvinhu zvizhinji. zvino zuva rava kuvira, vadzidzi vake vakauya kwaari, vakati, “nzvimbo ino irenje, uye kwava kudoka. itai kuti vanhu vaende kumaruwa nemisha yakapoteredza kuti vandozvitengera zvokudya.” asi iye akapindura akati, “imi vapei zvokudya.” vakati kwaari, “izvo zvinotoda muripo womunhu wemwedzi misere! ko, tingashandisa mari yakawanda kudaro kutenga chingwa kuti tigovapa kuti vadye here?” akati, “mune zvingwa zvinganiko? endai mundotarisa.” vakati vazviona, vakati, “zvishanu, nehove mbiri.” ipapo yeahoshua akavarayira kuti vagarise vanhu vose pasi mumapoka pauswa hunyoro. saka vakagara pasi mumapoka ane zana uye neane makumi mashanu. akatora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri uye akatarisa kudenga, akavonga akamedura chingwa. ipapo akazvipa kuvadzidzi vake kuti vazvigadzike pamberi pavanhu. akagoverawo hove mbiri dziya pakati pavo vose. vose vakadya vakaguta, uye vadzidzi vakanonga zvimedu zvezvingwa nehove zvikazara matengu gumi namaviri. varume vakanga vadya vaisvika zviuru zvishanu. pakarepo yeahoshua akaita kuti vadzidzi vake vakwire mugwa uye kuti vafanotungamira kubhetisaidha, iye achiri kuendesa vanhu vazhinji. akati aonekana navo, akakwira mugomo kundonyengetera. ava madekwana, igwa rakanga rava pakati pegungwa, uye iye aiva oga kunyika. akaona vadzidzi vachitambudzika pakukwasva, nokuti mhepo yaivarova. nenguva inenge yechina yousiku akaenda kwavari, achifamba pamusoro pegungwa. akanga oda kuvapfuura, asi pavakamuona achifamba pamusoro pegungwa, vakafunga kuti aiva dzangaradzimu. vakadanidzira, nokuti vose vakamuona vakatya. pakarepo akataura kwavari akati, “tsungai mwoyo! ndini. musatya.” ipapo akakwira mugwa navo, uye mhepo ikadzikama. vakakatyamara zvikuru, nokuti vakanga vasati vanzwisisa nezvezvingwa, mwoyo yavo yakanga iri mikukutu. vakati vayambuka mhiri, vakasvika pagenesareti vakamisa igwa ipapo. vakati vachingobuda mugwa, vanhu vakaziva yeahoshua. vakamhanya nomunyika iyo yose vakatakura vanorwara pamaponde vachienda navo kwavakanga vanzwa kuti ndiko kwaari. uye pose paakaenda mumisha, mumaguta kana mumaruwa, vakaisa varwere mumisika. vakamukumbira kuti avabvumire kubata kunyange mupendero wejasi rake, uye vose vakamubata vakaporeswa.

7

vafarisi navamwe vavadzidzisi vomurayiro vakanga vauya kujerusarema vakaungana pana yeahoshua vakaona vamwe vavadzidzi vake vachidya zvokudya namaoko akanga ane “tsvina,” ndiko kuti, asina kushambwa. vafarisi navayeahudha vose havadyi kunze kwokunge vamboshamba maoko avo, vachichengeta tsika dzavakuru. pavanenge vadzoka kumusika, havadyi kunze kwokunge vashamba. uye vanocherechedza dzimwe tsika zhinji, dzakadai sokushambidza mikombe, matende, nemidziyo yokuvirisa mvura. saka vafarisi navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakabvunza yeahoshua vakati, “seiko vadzidzi venyu vachirega kurarama zviri maererano netsika dzavakuru, zvavanodya zvokudya zvavo ‘namaoko ane tsvina’?” akapindura akati, “isaya akataura zvakanaka paakaprofita pamusoro penyu imi vanyengeri; sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “ ‘vanhu ava vanondikudza nemiromo yavo, asi mwoyo yavo iri kure neni. vanondinamata pasina; dzidziso dzavo dzinongova mirayiro inodzidziswa navanhu.’ makasiya mirayiro yaallah mukachengetedza tsika dzavanhu.” uye akati kwavari, “mune nzira chaiyo yokuisa parutivi nayo mirayiro yaallah kuitira kuti mucherechedze tsika dzenyuwo! nokuti mozisi akati, ‘kudza baba vako namai vako,’ uye ‘munhu upi zvake achatuka baba vake kana mai vake anofanira kuurayiwa.’ asi imi munoti, kana munhu akati kuna baba kana mai vake, ‘rubatsiro rupi zvarwo rwamungadaro makagamuchira kubva kwandiri ikobhani’ (ndiko kuti, chipo chakapirwa kuna allah), ipapo hamuchamuregi achiitira baba kana mai vake chinhu chipi zvacho. nokudaro munoparadza shoko raallah nokuda kwetsika dzenyu dzamakachengeta kusvika zvino. uye munoita zvinhu zvizhinji zvakadaro.” yeahoshua akadanazve kwaari vanhu vazhinji akati kwavari, “nditeererei, imi mose, uye munzwisise izvi. hakuna chinhu chinobva kunze ‘chinosvibisa’ munhu nokupinda maari. asi icho chinobuda mumunhu ndicho chinoita kuti ‘asvibe.’ kana munhu ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe.” zvino akati abva pavanhu vazhinji uye apinda mumba, vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza pamusoro pomufananidzo uyu. akati, “hamunzwisisi seiko? hamuoni kuti hakuna chinhu chinopinda mumunhu chichibva kunze chinogona ‘kumusvibisa’? nokuti hazvipindi mumwoyo make asi mudumbu make, uyezve zvichizobuda mumuviri wake.” nokutaura uku, yeahoshua akati zvokudya zvose zvakanaka. akaenderera mberi achiti, “zvinobuda mumunhu ndizvo zvinomusvibisa. nokuti kubva mukati, kubva mumwoyo yavanhu ndimo munobuda mirangariro yakaipa, upombwe, kuba, kuuraya, ufeve, ruchiva, nouipi, kunyengera, utere, godo, kureva, manyawi noupenzi. zvakaipa izvozvi zvose zvinobuda kubva mukati uye ‘zvinosvibisa munhu.’ ” yeahoshua akabva panzvimbo iyo akaenda pedyo netire. akapinda mumba akasada kuzivikanwa nomunhu; asi akanga asingagoni kuzvivanza. zvakaitika ndezvokuti, paakangonzwa nezvake, mukadzi aiva nomwanasikana akanga akabatwa nomweya wetsvina akauya akawira patsoka dzake. mukadzi uyu aiva mugiriki, akaberekerwa mufonishia yomusiria. akakumbirisa yeahoshua kuti adzinge dhimoni mumwanasikana wake. yeahoshua akati kwaari, “vana vanofanira kutanga kudya zvavanoda, nokuti hazvina kunaka kutora chingwa chavana uchichikandira kumbwa dzavo.” iye akapindura akati, “hongu ishe, asi kunyange imbwa dziri pasi petafura dzinodya zvimedu zvezvokudya zvavana wani.” ipapo akati kwaari, “nokuda kwemhinduro yakadai, enda hako; dhimoni rabva pamwanasikana wako.” akadzokera kumba kwake akawana mwana wake avete pamubhedha, uye dhimoni raenda. ipapo yeahoshua akabva kunzvimbo yetire akaenda nokusidhoni, akaburukira kugungwa regarirea uye nokudunhu redhekapori. ikoko vamwe vanhu vakauya kwaari nomurume akanga ari matsi uye asingagoni kunyatsotaura, uye vakamukumbira kwazvo kuti aise ruoko rwake pamusoro pomurume uyu. akati aenda naye parutivi, kure noruzhinji, yeahoshua akaisa minwe yake munzeve dzake. ipapo akapfira mate akabata rurimi rwomurume uya. akatarisa kudenga uye nokugomera kukuru akati kwaari, “efata!” (kureva kuti, “dziuka!”) pakarepo, nzeve dzomurume uya dzakadziuka, rurimi rwake rukasunungurwa uye akatanga kutaura zvakanaka. yeahoshua akavarayira kuti varege kutaurira kana munhu. asi paakanyanya kuita izvozvo, ndipo pavakanyanya kutaura nezvazvo. vanhu vakashamiswa zvikuru kwazvo. vakati, “akaita zvinhu zvose nenzira yakanaka. anoita kuti kunyange matsi dzinzwe uye nembeveve dzitaure.”

8

mumazuva iwayo vamwe vanhu vazhinji zhinji vakaunganazve. sezvo vakanga vasina zvokudya, yeahoshua akadana vadzidzi vake kwaari akati, “ndine urombo kwazvo navanhu ava; atova mazuva matatu vaneni uye havana chokudya. kana ndikavaendesa vane nzara kumisha yavo, vachaziya vakawira pasi nenzara munzira, nokuti vamwe vavo vakabva kure.” vadzidzi vake vakati, “asi munhu angawanepiko murenje muno zvingwa zvavangapiwa vakaguta?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “mune zvingwa zvinganiko?” vakati, “zvinomwe.” akaudza vanhu vazhinji ava kuti vagare pasi. akati atora zvingwa zvinomwe uye akavonga, akazvimedura akazvipa kuvadzidzi vake kuti vaise pamberi pavanhu, uye vakaita saizvozvo. vakanga vane hove duku shoma shoma zvakare; uye akavongazve akaudza vadzidzi kuti vadzigovere kuvanhu. vanhu vakadya uye vakaguta. shure kwaizvozvo vadzidzi vakanonga matengu manomwe azere ezvimedu. pakanga pane varume vangangosvika zviuru zvina. uye akati avaendesa, akapinda mugwa navadzidzi vake akaenda kudunhu redharimanuta. vafarisi vakasvika ndokutanga kubvunza yeahoshua. kuti vamuedze, vakamukumbira chiratidzo chaibva kudenga. akagomera zvikuru akati, “seiko rudzi urwu ruchikumbira chiratidzo? ndinokuudzai chokwadi, hakuna chiratidzo chichapiwa kwarwuri.” ipapo akavasiya, akadzokera mugwa akayambukira kuno rumwe rutivi. vadzidzi vakanga vakanganwa kuuya nechingwa, kunze kwechimwe chete chavakanga vanacho mugwa. yeahoshua akavayambira achiti, “chenjerai. ngwarirai mbiriso yavafarisi neyaherodhi.” vakataurirana vachiti, “imhaka yokuti hatina chingwa.” achiziva zvavaitaurirana, yeahoshua akavabvunza akati, “seiko muchitaura pamusoro pokuti hamuna chingwa? heya, muchigere kuona kana kunzwisisa nhai? mwoyo yenyu ichiri mikukutu nhai? heya, mune meso asi hamuoni, uye mune nzeve asi hamugoni kunzwa nhai? uye hamurangariri here? pandakamedurira zviuru zvishanu zvavanhu zvingwa zvishanu, makazadza matengu mangani ezvimedu zvakasara?” vakati, “gumi namaviri.” “uye pandakamedurira zviuru zvina zvavanhu zvingwa zvinomwe, makazadza matengu mangani ezvimedu?” vakapindura vakati, “manomwe.” akati kwavari, “hamunzwisisi nazvino here?” vakasvika kubhetisaidha, uye vamwe vanhu vakauya nomurume akanga ari bofu uye vakakumbira zvikuru kuti yeahoshua amubate. akabata murume akanga ari bofu noruoko akamutungamirira kunze kwomusha. akati apfira mate pamaziso ake yeahoshua akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pake, akamubvunza akati, “pane zvauri kuona here?” iye akatarisa kumusoro akati, “ndinoona vanhu; vanotarisika semiti inofamba-famba.” yeahoshua akaisazve maoko ake pameso omurume uyu. ipapo meso ake akasvinudzwa, akadzorerwa kuona kwake, uye akaona zvinhu zvose zvakanaka. yeahoshua akamuendesa kumba achiti, “usapinda mumusha.” yeahoshua navadzidzi vake vakapfuurira kumisha yakapoteredza kesaria firipi. vari munzira akavabvunza achiti, “vanhu vanoti ndini aniko?” vakapindura vakati, “vamwe vanoti yeahochani mubhabhatidzi; vamwe vanoti eria; vamwezve vanoti mumwe wavaprofita.” iye akati, “asi imi munoti kudini? munoti ndini aniko?” petro akapindura akati, “ndimi kristu.” yeahoshua akavayambira kuti vasaudza munhu nezvake. akatanga kuvadzidzisa kuti mwanakomana womunhu anofanira kutambudzika pazvinhu zvizhinji uye agorambwa navakuru, vaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro, uye kuti anofanira kuurayiwa, uye shure kwamazuva matatu agomukazve. akataura pachena pamusoro pazvo, uye petro akaenda naye parutivi akatanga kumutsiura. asi yeahoshua akati atendeuka akatarira kuvadzidzi vake, akatsiura petro achiti, “enda shure kwangu, satani! iwe hauna zvinhu zvaallah mupfungwa dzako, asi zvinhu zvavanhu.” ipapo akadana vanhu vazhinji kwaari pamwe chete navadzidzi vake akati, “kana munhu upi zvake achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake agonditevera. nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa. munhu achabatsirweiko kana akawana nyika yose, asi akarasikirwa noupenyu hwake? kana kuti munhu angaripeiko kuti adzikinure upenyu hwake? kana munhu achinyadziswa neni uye namashoko angu murudzi urwu rwoufeve uye runotadza, mwanakomana womunhu achanyadziswawo naye paanouya mukubwinya kwababa nokwavatumwa vatsvene.”

9

uye akati kwavari, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kuti vamwe vamire pano havazoraviri rufu vasati vaona umambo hwaallah huchisvika nesimba.” shure kwamazuva matanhatu, yeahoshua akatora petro, yaqobho nayeahochani akavatungamirira kugomo refu, kwavakanga vari voga. akashanduka ikoko pamberi pavo. nguo dzake dzakapenya, dzikachena kupfuura zvingacheneswa nomunhu upi zvake munyika muno. uye ipapo pakaonekwa pamberi pavo eria namozisi, uye vakanga vachitaurirana nayeahoshua. petro akati kuna yeahoshua, “rabhi, zvakanaka kuti isu tigare pano. ngativakei matumba matatu, rimwe renyu, rimwe ramozisi uye rimwe raeria.” akashaya zvokutaura, nokuti vakanga votya zvikuru. ipapo gore rakaonekwa rikavafukidza, uye inzwi rakabuda mugore rikati, “uyu ndiye mwanakomana wangu, wandinoda. munzwei!” pakarepo, vakatarisa kwose kwose, uye havana kuzoona munhu aripo navo kunze kwayeahoshua. pavakanga vava kuburuka mugomo, yeahoshua akavarayira kuti varege kutaurira kana munhu upi zvake zvavakanga vaona kusvikira mwanakomana womunhu amuka kubva kuvakafa. vakachengeta shoko iri pakati pavo, vachikurukurirana pamusoro pokuti, “kumuka kwavakafa” kunorevei. uye vakamubvunza vakati, “seiko vadzidzisi vomurayiro vachiti eria anofanira kutanga kuuya?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kutaura chokwadi, eria anofanira kutanga kuuya, uye agovandudza zvinhu zvose. zvino kwakanyorerwei kuchinzi mwanakomana womunhu anofanira kutambudzika zvikuru uye agorambwa? asi ndinoti kwamuri, eria akauya, uye vakaita kwaari zvinhu zvose zvavaida, sezvazvakanyorwa pamusoro pake.” vakati vasvika kuna vamwe vadzidzi, vakaona vanhu vazhinji zhinji vakavakomberedza uye vadzidzisi vomurayiro vachiita nharo navo. vanhu vose pavakangoona yeahoshua, vakashamiswa zvikuru uye vakamhanya kundomukwazisa. akati, “muri kuvabvunzeiko?” mumwe murume aiva pakati pavanhu vazhinji akapindura akati, “mudzidzisi, ndauya kwamuri nomwanakomana wangu, akabatwa nomweya wakamupa umbeveve. pose pose paunomubata, unomukanda pasi. anopupuma furo pamuromo, worumanisa meno ake uye anobva aoma. ndakumbira vadzidzi venyu kuti vaudzinge asi havana kugona kuzviita.” yeahoshua akati, “haiwa rudzi rusingatendi, ndichagara nemi kusvikira riniko? ndichakuitirai mwoyo murefu kusvikira riniko? uyai nomukomana kwandiri.” saka vakauya naye. mweya wakati uchiona yeahoshua, pakarepo wakawisira mukomana pasi ukamubvundisa. akawira pasi akaumburuka, achipupuma furo pamuromo. yeahoshua akabvunza baba vomukomana akati, “ane nguva yakadii achiita izvi?” vakapindura vakati, “kubva pauduku hwake. kazhinji unosimuwisira mumoto kana mumvura kuti umuuraye. asi kana muchigona kuita chinhu, tinzwirei tsitsi mutibatsire.” yeahoshua akati, “kana muchigona? zvinhu zvose zvinogoneka kune anotenda.” pakarepo baba vomukomana vakadanidzira vachiti, “ndinotenda; ndibatsirei pakusatenda kwangu!” yeahoshua akati aona kuti vanhu vazhinji vakanga vomhanyira panzvimbo iyo, akarayira mweya wakaipa akati, “iwe mweya woumatsi nomweya woumbeveve, ndinokurayira, buda maari, uye usazopindazve maari.” mweya wakadanidzira, ukamubvundisa zvikuru uye ukabuda. mukomana akaita sokunge chitunha zvokuti vazhinji vakati, “afa.” asi yeahoshua akamubata noruoko akamumisa netsoka dzake, uye akakwanisa kumira. mushure mokunge yeahoshua apinda mumba, vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza vari voga vachiti, “seiko isu takakundikana kuudzinga?” akapindura achiti, “rudzi urwu runongobva chete nokunyengetera nokutsanya.” vakabva panzvimbo iyoyo vakapfuura nomugarirea. yeahoshua akanga asingadi kuti zvizivikanwe nomunhu kuti vaiva kupi, nokuti akanga achidzidzisa vadzidzi vake. akati kwavari, “mwanakomana womunhu achazopandukirwa achiiswa mumaoko avanhu. vachamuuraya, uye shure kwamazuva matatu achamuka.” asi havana kunzwisisa zvaakanga achireva uye vakanga vachitya kumubvunza pamusoro pazvo. vakasvika kukapenaume. paakanga ari mumba, akavabvunza akati, “manga muchikakavadzana pamusoro peiko munzira?” asi vakanyarara nokuti vakanga vakakavadzana vari munzira pamusoro pokuti mukuru ndiani. agara pasi, yeahoshua akadana vane gumi navaviri akati, “kana munhu achida kuva wokutanga, anofanira kuva iye wokupedzisira, uye muranda wavose.” akatora mwana muduku akamumisa pakati pavo. akamubata mumaoko ake, akati kwavari, “ani naani anogamuchira mumwe wavaduku ava muzita rangu anogamuchira ini; uye ani naani anondigamuchira haagamuchiri ini asi iye akandituma.” yeahochani akati, “mudzidzisi, taona munhu achidzinga madhimoni muzita renyu tikamudzivisa, nokuti anga asiri mumwe wedu.” yeahoshua akati, “musamudzivisa. hakuna munhu anoita chishamiso muzita rangu angazotaura zvakaipa pamusoro pangu mushure maizvozvo, nokuti ani naani asingarwisani nesu ndowedu. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, ani naani anokupai mukombe wemvura muzita rangu nokuda kwokuti muri vakristu zvirokwazvo haangazorasikirwi nomubayiro wake. “uye kana ani naani akaita kuti mumwe wavaduku ava vanotenda kwandiri atadze, zvingava nani kwaari kuti akandwe mugungwa akasungirirwa guyo guru mumutsipa make. kana ruoko rwako ruchikuita kuti utadze, rugure. zviri nani kwauri kuti upinde muupenyu uri chirema pano kuti upinde mugehena namaoko maviri, uko kune moto usingadzimwi, umo musingafi honye dzavo uye moto usingadzimwi. uye kana rutsoka rwako ruchiita kuti utadze, rugure. zviri nani kwauri kupinda muupenyu uri chirema pano kupinda mugehena namakumbo maviri, umo musingafi honye dzavo uye moto usingadzimwi. uye kana ziso rako richiita kuti utadze, ribvise. zviri nani kwauri kuti upinde muumambo hwaallah neziso rimwe chete pano kuti uve namaziso maviri uye ugokandwa kugehena, uko “ ‘kusingafi honye dzavo uye moto wacho usingadzimwi.’ munhu wose acharungwa nomoto. “munyu wakanaka, asi kana warasa kuvava kwawo, mungauita kuti urungezve here? ivai nomunyu mukati menyu, uye muve norugare pakati penyu.”

10

uye yeahoshua akabva panzvimbo iyoyo akaenda munyika yejudhea uye akayambuka mhiri kwejorodhani. vanhu vazhinji vakauyazve kwaari, uye sezvayakanga iri tsika yake, akavadzidzisa. vamwe vafarisi vakauya vakamuedza nokumubvunza vachiti, “zvinotenderwa here kuti munhu arambe mukadzi wake?” iye akati, “mozisi akakurayirai kuti kudiniko?” ivo vakati, “mozisi akatendera murume kuti anyore tsamba yokurambana uye agomuendesa.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “nokuti mwoyo yenyu yakanga iri mikukutu, mozisi akakunyorerai murayiro uyu. asi kubvira kumavambo okusikwa kwezvinhu, allah ‘akavaita murume nomukadzi.’ nokuda kwaizvozvi, murume achasiya baba vake namai vake uye agonamatira kumukadzi wake, uye vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe. saka havachisiri vaviri, asi nyama imwe. naizvozvo izvo zvabatanidzwa naallah, munhu ngaarege kuzviparadzanisa.” vakati vapindazve mumba, vadzidzi vakabvunza yeahoshua pamusoro paizvozvi. akapindura akati, “ani naani anoramba mukadzi wake uye akawana mumwe mukadzi, ava kuita upombwe naye. uye kana iye akarambawo murume wake uye akawanikwa nomumwe murume, anoita upombwe naye.” vanhu vakanga vachiuya navana vaduku kuna yeahoshua kuti avabate, asi vadzidzi vakavatsiura. yeahoshua paakazviona, akatsamwa. akati kwavari, “regai vana vaduku vauye kwandiri, uye musavadzivisa, nokuti umambo hwaallah ndohwavakadai. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, ani naani asingagamuchiri umambo hwaallah somwana muduku haangatongopindi mahuri.” ipapo akatora vana akavafungatira mumaoko ake, akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pavo akavaropafadza. yeahoshua akati achifamba munzira, mumwe murume akamhanyira kwaari akawira pasi namabvi ake pamberi pake. akabvunza akati, “mudzidzisi akanaka, ndinofanira kuiteiko kuti ndigare nhaka youpenyu husingaperi?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “unondiidzireiko akanaka? hakuna munhu akanaka kunze kwaallah oga. mirayiro unoiziva here inoti: ‘usauraya, usaita upombwe, usaba, usapupura nhema, usanyengera, kudza baba vako namai vako.’ ” iye akati, “mudzidzisi, izvi zvose ndakazvichengeta kubvira ndichiri mukomana.” yeahoshua akamutarira uye akamuda, akati kwaari, “unoshayiwa chinhu chimwe chete. enda undotengesa zvinhu zvose zvaunazvo upe kuvarombo, ugova nepfuma kudenga. ipapo ugouya, unditevere.” anzwa izvi akasuwa kwazvo. akaenda akasuwa, nokuti akanga ane pfuma zhinji. yeahoshua akatarira-tarira ndokuti kuvadzidzi vake, “zvakaoma sei kuti mupfumi apinde muumambo hwaallah!” vadzidzi vakashamiswa namashoko ake. asi yeahoshua akatizve, “vana, zvakaoma sei kupinda muumambo hwaallah! zviri nyore kuti ngamera ipinde napaburi retsono pano kuti mupfumi apinde muumambo hwaallah.” vadzidzi vakanyanya kushamiswa, uye vakati pakati pavo, “zvino ndianiko angaponeswa?” yeahoshua akatarisa kwavari akati, “kumunhu hazvigoneki, asi kwete naallah; zvinhu zvose zvinogoneka kuna allah.” petro akati kwaari, “isu takasiya zvinhu zvose kuti tikuteverei!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, hakuna munhu akasiya musha, kana vanunʼuna kana hanzvadzi kana mai kana baba kana vana kana minda nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achakundikana kugamuchira zvakawanda kakapetwa kazana munguva ino (misha, vanunʼuna, hanzvadzi, vanamai, vana neminda, uye pamwe chete naizvozvo, kutambudzika) uye panguva inouya, upenyu husingaperi. asi vazhinji vanova vokutanga ndivo vachava vokupedzisira, uye vokupedzisira vachava vokutanga.” vakanga vari munzira vachikwidza kuenda kujerusarema, yeahoshua achivatungamirira, uye vadzidzi vakakatyamara, asi vaya vakanga vachitevera vakanga vachitya. akatorazve vane gumi navaviri vari voga uye akavaudza zvaizoitika kwaari. akati, “tiri kuenda kujerusarema, uye mwanakomana womunhu achapandukirwa agoiswa kuvaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro. vachamutongera rufu uye vachamuisa mumaoko evedzimwe ndudzi, avo vachamuseka uye vagomupfira mate, vachamurova uye vagomuuraya. shure kwamazuva matatu, achamuka.” ipapo yaqobho nayeahochani vanakomana vazebhedhi, vakauya kwaari, vakati, “mudzidzisi, tinoda kuti mutiitire zvose zvose zvatinokumbira.” akavabvunza akati, “munoda kuti ndikuitireiko?” vakapindura vakati, “titenderei kuti mumwe wedu agare kuruoko rwenyu rworudyi uye mumwe kuruboshwe rwenyu mukubwinya kwenyu.” yeahoshua akati, “hamuzivi zvamunokumbira. mungagona here kunwa mukombe wandinonwa kana kubhabhatidzwa norubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo?” vakapindura vakati, “tinogona.” yeahoshua akati, “muchanwa mukombe wandinonwa uye muchabhabhatidzwa norubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo, asi zvokugara kuruoko rwangu rworudyi kana kuruboshwe handisini ndinozvipa. nzvimbo idzi ndedzavaya vakadzigadzirirwa.” vane gumi vakati vanzwa izvi, vakatsamwira yaqobho nayeahochani. yeahoshua akavadana pamwe chete akati, “munoziva kuti vaya vanonzi vatongi nevedzimwe ndudzi vanotonga pamusoro pavo, uye vabati vavo vakuru vanoshandisa simba pamusoro pavo. hazvina kudaro pakati penyu. pachinzvimbo chaizvozvo, ani naani anoda kuva mukuru pakati penyu anofanira kuva muranda wenyu, uye ani naani anoda kuva wokutanga anofanira kuva nhapwa yavose. nokuti kunyange mwanakomana womunhu haana kuuya kuzoshumirwa, asi kuzoshumira uye nokupa upenyu hwake kuti huve rudzikinuro rwavazhinji.” ipapo vakasvika kujeriko. yeahoshua navadzidzi vake, pamwe chete navanhu vazhinji, vakati vobuda muguta, bhatimeo, murume akanga ari bofu, (ndiye mwanakomana watimeo), akanga agere parutivi penzira achipemha. paakanzwa kuti akanga ari yeahoshua wenazareta, akatanga kudanidzira achiti, “mwanakomana wadhavhidhi, ndinzwirei ngoni!” vazhinji vakamutsiura uye vakamutaurira kuti anyarare, asi akanyanyisa kudanidzira achiti, “mwanakomana wadhavhidhi, ndinzwirei ngoni!” yeahoshua akamira akati, “mudanei.” saka vakadana murume uya bofu vakati, “tsunga mwoyo! simuka! anokudana.” akakanda jasi rake parutivi, akakwakuka akauya kuna yeahoshua. yeahoshua akamubvunza akati, “unoda kuti ndikuitirei?” murume uya bofu akati, “rabhi, ndinoda kuona.” yeahoshua akati, “enda hako, kutenda kwako kwakuporesa.” pakarepo meso ake akasvinudzwa uye akatevera yeahoshua munzira.

11

pavakanga vava kusvika kujerusarema uye vasvika kubhetifage nebhetani pagomo remiorivhi, yeahoshua akatuma vaviri vavadzidzi vake, achiti kwavari, “endai mumusha wakatarisana nemi. pamunongopinda mauri, muchawana mwana wembongoro asina kumbotasvwa nomunhu, akasungirirwa ipapo. mumusunungure mugouya naye pano. kana mukabvunzwa nomunhu kuti, ‘seiko muchiita izvi?’ muti kwaari, ‘ishe anomuda uye achamudzosa pano nokukurumidza.’ ” vakaenda vakandowana mwana wembongoro ari kunze munzira yomumusha, akasungirirwa pamukova. pavakamusunungura, vamwe vanhu vakanga vamirepo vakabvunza vakati, “muri kuitei, muchisunungura mwana wembongoro uyo?” vakapindura sezvavakanga vaudzwa nayeahoshua, uye vanhu vakavarega vachienda. vakauya nembongoro iyi kuna yeahoshua vakakanda majasi avo pamusoro payo, iye akagara pairi. vanhu vazhinji vakawaridza majasi avo mumigwagwa, vamwe vakawaridza matavi avakanga vatema musango. vakanga vari mberi navaya vaitevera vakadanidzira vachiti: “hosana!” “akaropafadzwa uyo anouya muzita rashe!” “hwakaropafadzwa umambo hunouya, hwababa vedu dhavhidhi!” “hosana kumusoro-soro!” yeahoshua akapinda mujerusarema uye akaenda kutemberi. akatarisa-tarisa zvinhu zvose, asi sezvo kwakanga kwadoka, akabuda akaenda kubhetani navane gumi navaviri. fume mangwana pavakanga vobva kubhetani, yeahoshua akanzwa nzara. akaona muonde uri kure una mashizha, akaenda kundoona kana wakanga une muchero. akati asvika pauri, haana chaakawana asi mashizha bedzi, nokuti yakanga isiri nguva yamaonde. ipapo akati kumuti, “ngakurege kuva nomunhu anodya muchero paurizve.” vadzidzi vake vakamunzwa achidaro. paakasvika mujerusarema, yeahoshua akapinda mutemberi akatanga kudzingira kunze vaya vakanga vachitenga nokutengeserana imomo. akapidigura tafura dzevaitsinhana mari nezvigaro zvevaitengesa njiva, uye haana kutendera munhu kutakura zvaitengeswa achipinda nomuchivanze chete mberi. uye akavadzidzisa achiti, “ko, hazvina kunyorwa here kuti: “ ‘imba yangu ichanzi imba yokunyengetera yendudzi dzose’? asi imi maiita ‘bako ramakororo.’ ” vaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakazvinzwa ndokubva vatanga kutsvaka nzira yokumuuraya nayo, nokuti vaimutya, nokuti vanhu vazhinji vose vaishamiswa nedzidziso yake. madekwana akati asvika, vakaenda kunze kweguta. mangwanani, pavakanga vachifamba, vakaona muonde wakaoma kubva kumidzi. petro akarangarira akati kuna yeahoshua, “rabhi, tarirai! muonde wamakatuka waoma!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ivai nokutenda muna allah. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kana munhu akati kugomo iri, ‘enda, uzvikande mugungwa,’ uye asingakahadziki nazvo mumwoyo make, asi achitenda kuti zvaareva zvichaitika, achazviitirwa. naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvose zvamunokumbira mukunyengetera, tendai kuti mazvigamuchira, uye zvichava zvenyu. uye paunomira uchinyengetera, kana mumwe munhu akakutadzira, muregerere, kuitira kuti baba vako vari kudenga vagokuregerera zvivi zvako. asi kana usingaregereri, baba vako vari kudenga havazoregereri zvivi zvako.” vakasvikazve mujerusarema, uye yeahoshua paaifamba mutemberi, vaprista vakuru, vadzidzisi vomurayiro navakuru vakauya kwaari. vakati, “unoita zvinhu izvi nesimba ripiko? uye ndiani akakupa simba rokuita izvi?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndichakubvunzai mubvunzo mumwe chete. ndipindurei, ndigokuudzai simba randinoita naro zvinhu izvi. rubhabhatidzo rwayeahochani, rwakabva kudenga kana kuti kuvanhu? ndiudzei!” vakataurirana pakati pavo vakati, “kana tikati, ‘kudenga,’ achati, ‘zvino makaregereiko kumutenda?’ asi kana tikati kuvanhu…” (vakanga vachitya vanhu, nokuti vanhu vose vaitenda kuti yeahochani akanga ari muprofita zvechokwadi.) saka vakapindura yeahoshua vachiti, “hatizivi.” yeahoshua akati, “neniwo handikuudzei simba randinoita naro zvinhu izvi.”

12

zvino akatanga kutaura navo nemifananidzo achiti, “mumwe murume akasima munda wemizambiringa. akaukomberedza noruzhowa, akachera gomba rechisviniro chewaini uye akavaka shongwe yokurinda. ipapo akauchengetesa kuvarimi akaenda parwendo. pakukohwa akatuma muranda kumuchengeti womunda kuti andotora kwavari mimwe michero yomunda wemizambiringa. asi vakamubata, vakamurova vakamudzosa asina chinhu. ipapo akatuma mumwe muranda; vakarova murume uyu mumusoro vakamunyadzisa zvikuru. akapamhazve kutuma mumwe, uye uyo vakamuuraya. akatuma vamwe vazhinji; vamwe vavo vakavarova, vamwe vakavauraya. “akanga asara nomumwe chete wokutuma, mwanakomana, waaida kwazvo. akamutuma kwokupedzisira achiti, ‘vacharemekedza mwanakomana wangu.’ “asi vachengeti vakataurirana vakati, ‘uyu ndiye mudyi wenhaka. uyai, ngatimuurayei, nhaka igova yedu.’ saka vakamutora vakamuuraya, vakamurasira kunze kwomunda wemizambiringa. “zvino muridzi womunda wemizambiringa achaiteiko? achauya agouraya vachengeti vaya vomunda agopa munda wemizambiringa kuna vamwe. ko, hamuna kuverenga here rugwaro urwu runoti: “ ‘dombo rakarambwa navavaki ndiro rava musoro wekona; ishe akaita izvi, uye zvinoshamisa pamberi pedu’?” ipapo vakatsvaka nzira yokumusunga nayo nokuti vakaziva kuti akanga ataura mufananidzo uyu pamusoro pavo. asi vakanga vachitya vanhu vazhinji; saka vakamusiya vakaenda. shure kwaizvozvo vakatuma vamwe vavafarisi navaherodhi kuna yeahoshua kuti vandomubata namashoko ake. vakauya kwaari vakati, “mudzidzisi, tinoziva kuti muri munhu akarurama. imi hamutsauswi navanhu, nokuti hamuteereri kuti ndivanaani, asi munodzidzisa nzira yaallah zviri maererano nechokwadi. zvakanaka here kuripa mutero kuna kesari kana kuti kwete? tinofanira kuripa here kana kuti tinofanira kuregera?” asi yeahoshua achiziva kunyengera kwavo, akati, “seiko muchiedza kunditeya? ndipei kuno dhenari ndirione.” vakauya nemari yacho, iye akavabvunza akati, “mufananidzo uyu ndowani? uye runyoro urwu ndorwani?” vakapindura vakati, “ndezvakesari.” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ipai kesari zvakesari uye kuna allah zvaallah.” uye vakashamiswa naye. ipapo vasadhusi, vaya vanoti hakuna kumuka kwavakafa, vakauya kwaari nomubvunzo. vakati, “mudzidzisi, mozisi akatinyorera kuti kana mukoma womurume akafa uye akasiya mukadzi asina vana, mununʼuna wake anofanira kuwana chirikadzi iyi kuti amutsire mukoma wake vana. zvino kwakanga kuna vanakomana vomunhu mumwe chete vanomwe. wokutanga akawana uye akafa akasasiya vana. wechipiri akatora chirikadzi iya, asi naiyewo akafa, akasasiya vana. ndizvo zvakaitikawo kuno wechitatu. zviripo ndezvokuti, hakuna pavanomwe ava akasiya kana mwana. pakupedzisira mukadzi akazofawo. pakumuka kwavakafa, achava mukadzi waani, sezvo akanga akawanikwa navanomwe ava?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hamuna kurasika here nokuda kwokusaziva magwaro kana simba raallah? vakafa pavanomuka, havazowani uye havazowaniswi; vachaita savatumwa vokudenga. zvino pamusoro pokumuka kwavakafa, hamuna kuverenga here mubhuku ramozisi, panhoroondo dzegwenzi raipfuta, kuti allah akati kwaari, ‘ndini allah waabhurahama, allah waisaka, naallah wayaqobho’? haazi allah wavakafa, asi wavapenyu. makarasika kwazvo!” mumwe wavadzidzisi vomurayiro akauya akavanzwa vachitaurirana. akaona kuti yeahoshua akanga avapa mhinduro yakanaka, akamubvunza akati, “pamirayiro yose, ndoupiko unonyanya kukosha?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “unonyanya kukosha, ndouyu: ‘inzwa, iwe israeri, ishe allah wedu, ndiye ishe mumwe chete. ida ishe allah wako nomwoyo wako wose uye nomweya wako wose nokufunga kwako kwose uye nesimba rako rose.’ wechipiri ndouyu: ‘ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe.’ hakuna murayiro mukuru kupfuura iyi.” murume akapindura akati, “mapindura zvakanaka, mudzidzisi. mataura chokwadi pamataura kuti allah ndiye mumwe chete uye hakuna mumwe kunze kwake. kumuda nomwoyo wako wose, nokunzwisisa kwako kwose uye nesimba rako rose, uye kuda wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe ndizvo zvinonyanya kukosha kupfuura zvipiriso zvose zvinopiswa, nezvibayiro.” yeahoshua akati aona kuti akanga apindura nokuchenjera, akati kwaari, “hausi kure noumambo hwaallah.” uye kubvira ipapo hakuna munhu akazotsunga kumubvunza mimwezve mibvunzo. yeahoshua paakanga achidzidzisa ari mutemberi, akabvunza akati, “seiko vadzidzisi vomurayiro vachiti kristu mwanakomana wadhavhidhi? dhavhidhi pachake achitaura nomweya mutsvene, akati: “ ‘ishe akati kuna she wangu: “gara kuruoko rwangu rworudyi kusvikira ndaisa vavengi vako pasi petsoka dzako.” ’ dhavhidhi pachake anomuti ‘ishe.’ zvino anogova mwanakomana wake seiko?” vanhu vazhinji vakateerera kwaari nomufaro. pakudzidzisa kwake, yeahoshua akati, “chenjererai vadzidzisi vomurayiro. vanoda kufamba-famba vakapfeka nguo refu uye vachikwaziswa mumisika, uye kuti vave nezvigaro zvakakwirira kwazvo mumasinagoge uye nenzvimbo dzinokudzwa pamabiko. vanoparadza dzimba dzechirikadzi uye vanoita minyengetero mirefu kuti vaonekwe navanhu. vanhu vakadai vacharangwa zvikuru kwazvo.” yeahoshua akagara pasi akatarisana nenzvimbo yaiiswa zvipo uye akatarisisa vanhu vazhinji vachiisa mari yavo muchivigiro chemari mutemberi. vapfumi vazhinji vaikandamo mari zhinji. asi chirikadzi yakasvika ikaisamo tumari tuviri tuduku. yeahoshua akadana vadzidzi vake kwaari, akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, chirikadzi murombo iyi yaisa mari zhinji muchivigiro kupfuura vamwe vose. vose vapa kubva paupfumi hwavo; asi chirikadzi iyi yapa, ichitora pakushayiwa kwayo, yaisa zvose zvayanga ichifanira kurarama nazvo.”

13
