paakanga ava kubuda mutemberi, mumwe wavadzidzi vake akati, “mudzidzisi, tarirai kukura kwakaita matombo! iko kunaka kwedzimba!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “uri kuona dzimba huru dzose idzi? hapana ibwe pano richasiyiwa riri pamusoro perimwe; ose achawisirwa pasi.” yeahoshua paakanga agere pagomo remiorivhi pakatarisana netemberi, petro, yaqobho, yeahochani naandirea vakamubvunza vari voga vakati, “tiudzei, kuti zvinhu izvi zvichaitika rini? uye chii chichava chiratidzo chokuti zvose zvava pedyo nokuzozadziswa?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “chenjerai kuti kurege kuva nomunhu anokutsausai. vazhinji vachauya muzita rangu, vachiti, ‘ndini iye,’ uye vachatsausa vazhinji. pamunonzwa nezvehondo uye neguhu rehondo, musavhunduka. zvinhu zvakadaro zvinofanira kuitika, asi kuguma kuchazosvika hako. rudzi ruchamukira rumwe rudzi, uye ushe huchamukira humwe ushe. pachava nokudengenyeka kwenyika munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana, uye nenzara. izvi ndizvo zvichava kutanga kwamarwadzo okusununguka. “munofanira kugara makarinda. muchaendeswa kumatare mugorohwa mumasinagoge avo. muchamira pamberi pavabati napamberi pamadzimambo nokuda kwangu, sezvapupu kwavari. uye vhangeri rinofanira kuparidzwa kundudzi dzose. pose pamunenge masungwa uye mamiswa pakutongwa, musatanga kufunganya pamusoro pezvamuchataura. taurai zvose zvose zvamunenge mapiwa panguva iyoyo, nokuti hamusimi munotaura, asi mweya mutsvene. “mukoma achaurayisa mununʼuna, uye baba vachadarowo mwana wavo. vana vachamukira vabereki vavo uye vachavaurayisa. vanhu vose vachakuvengai nokuda kwangu, asi uyo anotsungirira kusvikira kumagumo achaponeswa. “pamunenge moona nyangadzi yokuparadza yamira paisingafaniri, anoverenga ngaanzwisise, ipapo vari mujudhea ngavatizire kumakomo. ari pamusoro pedenga reimba ngaarege kuburuka kana kupinda mumba kuti abudise chinhu chipi zvacho chiri mumba. munhu ari kumunda ngaarege kudzokera kumba kuti andotora jasi rake. zvichava zvinotyisa zvakadiniko kuvakadzi vane mimba navanoyamwiswa mumazuva iwayo! nyengeterai kuti izvi zvirege kuitika munguva yechando, nokuti ayo achava mazuva okutambudzika asina kumbovapo kubva pakutanga, allah paakasika nyika, kusvikira zvino, uye haachazombovapozve. dai ishe akanga asina kutapudza mazuva iwayo, hakuna munhu airarama. asi nokuda kwavasanangurwa, avo vaakasarudza, akaatapudza hake. panguva iyo kana munhu akati kwamuri, ‘tarirai, houno kristu!’ kana kuti, ‘tarirai, uyo ari apo!’ musazvitenda. nokuti vanakristu venhema navaprofita venhema vachaonekwa uye vachaita zviratidzo nezvishamiso kuti vatsause vatsvene, kana zvaigoneka. saka mugare makarinda; ndagara ndakuudzai zvinhu zvose zvisati zvaitika. “asi mumazuva iwayo, shure kwokutambudzika ikoko, “ ‘zuva richasvibiswa, uye mwedzi hauchazovhenekeri; nyeredzi dzichawa kudenga, uye masimba okudenga achadengenyeka.’ “panguva iyoyo vanhu vachaona mwanakomana womunhu achiuya ari mumakore nesimba guru uye nokubwinya. uye achatuma vatumwa vake, vagounganidza vasanangurwa kubva kumhepo ina, kubva kumagumo enyika kusvikira kumigumo yamatenga. “zvino dzidzai chidzidzo ichi kubva pamuonde: paunongotanga kuva namatavi manyoro uye mashizha awo otungira, munoziva kuti zhizha rava pedyo. naizvozvo kana moona zvinhu izvi zvoitika, zivai kuti ava pedyo, atova pamukova. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, zvirokwazvo rudzi urwu harungapfuuri kusvikira zvinhu zvose izvi zvaitika. denga nenyika zvichapfuura, asi mashoko angu haangatongopfuuri. “hakuna munhu anoziva nezvezuva iro kana nguva iyo, kunyange vatumwa kudenga, kana mwanakomana, asi baba voga. rindai! svinurai! hamuzivi kuti nguva iyo inosvika rini. zvakaita somunhu anoenda kure: anosiya imba yake akaichengetesa varanda vake, mumwe nomumwe pabasa rake, uye agoudza ari pamukova kuti agare akarinda. “naizvozvo rindai nokuti hamuzivi musi unouya muridzi weimba, zvimwe madekwana, kana usiku, kana pakurira kwejongwe, kana mambakwedza. kana akakurumidza kuuya, musamurega achikuwanai muvete. zvandinotaura kwamuri, ndinozvitaura kuvanhu vose ndichiti, ‘rindai!’ ”

14

zvino kwakanga kwangosara mazuva maviri kuti pasika nomutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso zviitwe, uye vaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakanga vachitsvaka nzira yokuti vasunge yeahoshua nayo uye vamuuraye. vakati, “asi kwete panguva yomutambo, nokuti vanhu vangangoita bope.” uye paakanga ari mubhetani, agere pakudya mumba momumwe murume ainzi simoni wamaperembudzi, mumwe mukadzi akauya nechinu chamafuta chearabhasita, mafuta anokosha kwazvo, akanga akaitwa nenaridhi yakaisvonaka. akazarura chinu akadururira mafuta mumusoro wake. vamwe vakanga varipo pakati pavo vakatsamwa vakati, “seiko vachitambisa mafuta aya kudai? angadai atengeswa nomutengo uno mubayiro unopfuura wegore rose, uye mari yacho yapiwa kuvarombo.” uye vakatsiura mukadzi uyu nehasha. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “musiyei akadaro. munomunetsereiko? aita chinhu chakanaka kwandiri. varombo munavo nguva dzose, uye munogona kuvabatsira panguva ipi zvayo yamunoda. asi hamuzogari muneni nguva dzose. aita zvaanogona. adururira mafuta anonhuhwira pamuviri wangu nguva isati yasvika, kuti agadzirire kuvigwa kwangu. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kwose kunozoparidzwa vhangeri panyika yose, zvaaita izvi zvicharehwawo, vanhu vachimurangarira nazvo.” ipapo yeahudhasi iskarioti, mumwe wavane gumi navaviri, akaenda kuvaprista vakuru kuti andotengesa yeahoshua kwavari. vakafara kunzwa izvi uye vakavimbisa kumupa mari. saka akamirira mukana wokumuisa kwavari. pazuva rokutanga romutambo wechingwa chisina mbiriso, zvayakanga iri tsika yavo yokubayira gwayana repasika, vadzidzi vayeahoshua vakamubvunza vakati, “munoda kuti tiende kupi kwatingandokugadzirirai pasika kuti mudye?” saka akatuma vadzidzi vake vaviri akati kwavari, “endai muguta, uye muchasangana nomurume akatakura chirongo chemvura. mumutevere. muti kumwene weimba yaanopinda mairi, ‘mudzidzisi anobvunza kuti: imba yangu yavaeni, mandingadyira pasika navadzidzi vangu ndeipiko?’ achakuratidzai imba huru yapamusoro, yakatorongedzwa uye yakagadzirwa. mutigadzirire imomo.” vadzidzi vakabva, vakapinda muguta vakawana zvinhu zvakaita sezvavakanga vaudzwa nayeahoshua. saka vakagadzira pasika. ava madekwana, yeahoshua akasvika navane gumi navaviri. vakati vagere pakudya, akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, mumwe wenyu achandipandukira, mumwe ari kudya neni.” vakasuwiswa nazvo, mumwe nomumwe akati kwaari, “zvirokwazvo, kwete ini?” iye akapindura akati, “ndomumwe wavane gumi navaviri, iye anoseva chingwa chake mundiro neni. mwanakomana womunhu achaenda hake sezvazvakanyorwa pamusoro pake. asi ane nhamo munhu uyo anopandukira mwanakomana womunhu! zvaiva nani kwaari dai akanga asina kuzvarwa.” vakati vari pakudya, yeahoshua akatora chingwa, akavonga uye akachimedura, akapa vadzidzi vake achiti, “torai mudye, uyu ndiwo muviri wangu.” ipapo akatora mukombe, akavonga akaupa kwavari, uye vose vakanwa pauri. akati kwavari, “iri ndiro ropa rangu resungano, rinodururirwa vazhinji. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti handichazonwizve chibereko chomuzambiringa kusvikira pazuva randichazochinwa zvava zvitsva muumambo hwaallah.” vakati vaimba rwiyo, vakabuda vakaenda kugomo remiorivhi. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “imi mose muchapararira, nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “ ‘ndicharova mufudzi, makwai agopararira.’ asi mushure mokumuka kwangu, ndichatungamira kugarirea imi mozotevera.” petro akati, “kunyange dai vose vakakurambai, ini kwete.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudza chokwadi, nhasi, manheru ano chaiwo, jongwe risati rarira kaviri, iwe pachako uchandiramba katatu.” asi petro akaramba akasimbisisa achiti, “kunyange dai ndichifanira kufa nemi, handizombokurambai.” uye vamwe vose vakadarowo. vakaenda kunzvimbo inonzi getsemani, yeahoshua akati kuvadzidzi vake, “garai pano, ini ndichambondonyengetera.” akatora petro, yaqobho nayeahochani pamwe chete naye, akatanga kushungurudzika zvikuru uye akatambudzika. akati, “mweya wangu wazara neshungu kwazvo kusvikira pakufa. garai pano uye murambe makarinda.” akati aenda chinhambwe zvishoma, akawira pasi akanyengetera kuti kana zvichibvira nguva iyi ipfuure, ibve kwaari. akati, “abha, baba, zvinhu zvose zvinogoneka kwamuri. bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri. asi kwete kuda kwangu, asi kuda kwenyu.” ipapo akadzokazve kuvadzidzi vake akavawana vavete. akati kuna petro, “simoni, wavata here? hauna kugona kurinda kweawa imwe chete here? rindai munyengetere kuti murege kuwira mumuedzo. mweya unoda hawo, asi muviri hauna simba.” akaendazve kundonyengetera zvimwe chetezvo. paakadzoka, akawanazve vavete, nokuti meso avo akanga aremerwa nehope. havana kuziva chokutaura kwaari. achidzokerazve kechitatu akati kwavari, “muchakavata uye muchiri kuzorora here? zvaringana! nguva yasvika. tarirai, mwanakomana womunhu oiswa mumaoko avatadzi. simukai! ngatiendei! hoyo mutengesi wangu ouya!” achiri kutaura, yeahudhasi iskarioti, mumwe wavane gumi navaviri, akaonekwa. akanga ana vanhu vazhinji vakapakata minondo netsvimbo, vatumwa navaprista vakuru, vadzidzisi vomurayiro, uye navakuru. zvino mutengesi akanga aronga navo chiratidzo achiti, “munhu wandichatsvoda ndiye wacho; mumusunge mugoenda naye navarindi.” paakangosvika, yeahudhasi akaenda kuna yeahoshua, akati, “rabhi!” ndokumutsvoda. vanhu vakabata yeahoshua vakamusunga. ipapo mumwe akanga amire pedyo akavhomora munondo wake akatema muranda womuprista mukuru, akagura nzeve yake. yeahoshua akati, “ko, ndiri kutungamirira vapanduki here zvamauya neminondo netsvimbo kuti muzondibata? mazuva ose ndaiva nemi, ndichidzidzisa mutemberi, uye hamuna kundisunga. asi magwaro anofanira kuzadziswa.” ipapo vose vakamusiya vakatiza. rimwe jaya, rakanga rakapfeka nguo yakaisvonaka, rakanga richitevera yeahoshua. vakati varibata, rakatiza risina kupfeka, rikasiya nguo yaro mumashure. vakaenda nayeahoshua kumuprista mukuru, uye vamwe vaprista vose vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakaungana pamwe chete. petro akamutevera ari nechokure, kusvikira apinda muruvazhe rwomuprista mukuru. akagara navarindi achidziya moto. vaprista vakuru namakurukota ose vakanga vachitsvaka chavangapa yeahoshua mhosva nacho kuitira kuti vagomuuraya, asi havana kuwana chinhu. vazhinji vakamupupurira nhema, asi uchapupu hwavo hahuna kupindirana. ipapo vamwe vakasimuka vakapa uchapupu hwenhema uhu pamusoro pake vachiti, “takamunzwa achiti, ‘ndichaparadza temberi iyi yakavakwa navanhu uye shure kwamazuva matatu ndichavaka imwe, isina kuitwa navanhu.’ ” kunyange ipapozve uchapupu hwavo hahuna kupindirana. ipapo muprista mukuru akamira pamberi pavo akabvunza yeahoshua achiti, “ko, haupinduri here? uchapupu hwaunopomerwa navanhu ava ndohweiko?” asi yeahoshua akaramba anyerere akasapindura. muprista mukuru akamubvunzazve achiti, “ndiwe kristu here, mwanakomana waiye akaropafadzwa?” yeahoshua akati, “ndini. uye muchaona mwanakomana womunhu agere kuruoko rworudyi rwaiye wamasimba achiuya ari pamakore okudenga.” muprista mukuru akabvarura nguo dzake, akati, “tichatsvakireiko zvimwe zvapupu? manzwa kumhura kwake. munofungeiko?” vose vakamutonga vachiti aifanira kufa. ipapo vamwe vakatanga kumupfira mate; vakamusunga kumeso, vakamurova nezvibhakera, vachiti, “profita!” uye varindi vakamutora vakamurova. petro paakanga achiri muruvazhe, mumwe musikana, murandakadzi womuprista mukuru akasvikapo. akati aona petro achidziya moto akamucherechedza. akati kwaari, “newewo wakanga una yeahoshua, wenazareta.” asi iye akaramba akati, “handizivi kana kunzwisisa zvaunoreva.” akabuda akandomira pamukova wokupinda nawo. akati aonekwazve nomusikana uyu aiva murandakadzi, musikana akatizve kuna avo vakanga vamirepo, “munhu uyu ndomumwe wavo.” iye akarambazve izvozvo. mushure menguva pfupi, vaya vakanga vamirepo vakati kuna petro, “chokwadi, iwe uri mumwe wavo, nokuti uri mugarirea.” akatanga kutuka nokupika achiti, “handizivi munhu uyu wamunotaura nezvake.” pakarepo jongwe rakarira kechipiri. ipapo petro akarangarira shoko rayeahoshua raakanga ataura kwaari achiti, “jongwe risati rarira kaviri uchandiramba katatu.” akawira pasi uye akachema.

15

mangwanani-ngwanani, vaprista vakuru navakuru, vadzidzisi vomurayiro uye nedare guru rose, vakaita sarudzo. vakasunga yeahoshua, vakaenda naye vakandomuisa mumaoko apirato. pirato akamubvunza akati, “ndiwe mambo wavayeahudha here?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hongu, ndizvo sokutaura kwamaita.” vaprista vakuru vakamupomera zvinhu zvizhinji kwazvo. saka pirato akabvunzazve akati, “ko, haupinduri here? tarira kuwanda kwezvinhu zvavanokupomera.” asi yeahoshua haana kupindura, uye pirato akashamiswa nazvo. zvino yakanga iri tsika yapamutambo kuti asunungure musungwa anenge akumbirwa navanhu. murume ainzi bharabhasi akanga ari mutorongo pamwe chete navamwe vakanga vamutsa bope vakauraya munhu. vanhu vazhinji vakauya vakakumbira pirato kuti avaitire zvaaisiita. pirato akabvunza akati, “munoda kuti ndikusunungurirei mambo wavayeahudha here?” achiziva kuti zvaingova zvegodo ravaprista vakuru kuti vakaisa yeahoshua mumaoko ake. asi vaprista vakuru vakamutsa mwoyo yavazhinji kuti vaite kuti pirato asunungure bharabhasi pachinzvimbo chayeahoshua. pirato akabvunza akati, “ndichaiteiko, zvino, nouyo wamunoti mambo wavayeahudha?” vakadanidzira vachiti, “murovererei pamuchinjikwa!” pirato akavabvunza akati, “nemhaka yeiko? akapara mhosva yeiko?” asi vakanyanya kudanidzira vachiti, “murovererei pamuchinjikwa!” achida kufadza vanhu, pirato akasunungura bharabhasi. akaita kuti yeahoshua arohwe, uye akamuendesa kuti andorovererwa. varwi vakatora yeahoshua vakapinda naye mumuzinda, piritoriamu, uye vakaunganidza pamwe chete boka rose ravarwi. vakamupfekedza nguo dzepepuru, ipapo vakamurukira korona yeminzwa vakaigadzika pamusoro wake. uye vakatanga kudanidzira kwaari vachiti, “kwaziwaika, mambo wavayeahudha!” vakaramba vachingomurova mumusoro netsvimbo uye vachimupfira mate. vachipfugama namabvi avo, vakaita savanomunamata. uye vakati vamudadira, vakabvisa nguo yepepuru vakamupfekedza dzake. ipapo vakabuda naye kundomuroverera pamuchinjikwa. mumwe murume aibva kukurini, simoni baba vaarekizanda narufasi, akanga achipfuura achibva kumaruwa, vakamumanikidza kuti atakure muchinjikwa. vakaenda nayeahoshua kunzvimbo yainzi gorogota (kureva kuti nzvimbo yedehenya). ipapo vakamupa waini yakavhenganiswa nemura, asi haana kuinwa. uye vakamuroverera pamuchinjikwa. vakagovana nguo dzake, vakakanda mijenya kuti vaone kuti mumwe nomumwe angawanei. yakanga iri nguva yechitatu pavakamuroverera. zvakanga zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake zvaiti: mambo wavajudha. vakamuroverera pamwe chete namakororo maviri, mumwe kurudyi uye mumwe kuruboshwe. uye rugwaro rwakazadziswa runoti, “akaverengwa pamwe chete navadariki.” vaya vakanga vachipfuura vaimutuka, vachidzungudza misoro yavo vachiti, “saka! iwe uri kuzoputsa temberi nokuivaka mumazuva matatu, chiburuka pamuchinjikwa uzviponese!” nenzira imwe cheteyo vaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakamuseka pakati pavo, vakati, “akaponesa vamwe, asi haagoni kuzviponesa! kristu uyu, mambo wavaisraeri uyu, ngaaburuke iye zvino pamuchinjikwa, kuti tione tigotenda.” navaya vakanga vakarovererwa pamwe chete naye vakamutukawo. nenguva yechitanhatu rima rakauya pamusoro penyika yose kusvikira panguva yepfumbamwe. uye panguva yepfumbamwe, yeahoshua akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “eroi, eroi, rama sabhakitani?” zvinoreva kuti “allah wangu, allah wangu, mandisiyireiko?” vaya vakanga vamire pedyo vakati vanzwa izvi, vakati, “inzwai, ari kudana eria.” mumwe murume akamhanya, akazadza chipanje newaini yaivava, akachiisa parutanda, akachipa kuna yeahoshua kuti anwe, akati “zvino musiyei akadaro. regai tione kana eria achiuya kuzomuburutsa.” ipapo yeahoshua akadanidzira nenzwi guru, akabudisa mweya wake. chidzitiro chapatemberi chakabvaruka napakati kubva kumusoro kusvikira pasi. uye mukuru wezana, akanga amirepo, pamberi payeahoshua, akati anzwa kudanidzira kwake uye aona mafiro aakaita, akati, “zvirokwazvo murume uyu anga ari mwanakomana waallah!” vamwe vakadzi vakanga vachitarira vari kure. pakati pavo paiva namiriamu magadharena, miriamu mai vayaqobho, mununʼuna wajosesi, nasarome. vakadzi ava vomugarirea ndivo vaimutevera uye vachimushandira. vakadzi vazhinji vakanga vauya naye kujerusarema vakanga varipowo. rakanga riri zuva rokugadzirira (ndiro rinotangira sabata.) saka kwovira, yosefa wearimatea, nhengo yedare guru yaiva nomukurumbira, uyo akanga akamirirawo umambo hwaallah, akatsunga kuenda kuna pirato kundokumbira mutumbi wayeahoshua. pirato akashamiswa kunzwa kuti akanga atofa. akatuma mukuru wezana, akamubvunza kana yeahoshua akanga afa. akati anzwa kubva kumukuru wezana kuti zvakanga zviri izvo, akapa mutumbi kuna yosefa. saka akauya nemimwe micheka, akaburutsa mutumbi, akauputira nomucheka, akauisa muguva rakanga rakacherwa paruware. ipapo akakungurutsira ibwe pamuromo weguva. miriamu magadharena namiriamu mai vajosesi vakaona paakavigwa.

16

sabata rakati rapfuura, miriamu magadharena, miriamu mai vayaqobho, nasarome vakatenga zvinonhuhwira kuti vagondozodza mutumbi wayeahoshua. mangwanani-ngwanani pazuva rokutanga revhiki, zuva risati rabuda, vakanga vapinda munzira, uye vakabvunzana vachiti, “ndianiko achatikungurutsira ibwe pamukova weguva?” asi vakati vatarira, vakaona kuti ibwe rakanga rakungurutswa. pavakapinda muguva, vakaona jaya rakapfeka nguo chena rakagara kuruoko rworudyi, uye vakavhunduka. iye akati, “musavhunduka. muri kutsvaka yeahoshua wenazareta, uya akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. amuka! haapo pano. tarisai pavakanga vamuisa. asi chiendai mundoudza vadzidzi vake napetro, kuti, ‘afanotungamira kugarirea. muchandomuona ikoko sezvaakakuudzai.’ ” vachibvunda uye vachishamiswa, vakabuda vakatiza kubva muguva. havana chavakataura kuno munhu, nokuti vakanga vachitya. yeahoshua akati amuka mangwanani nezuva rokutanga revhiki, akatanga kuzviratidza kuna miriamu magadharena, uya waakanga abudisa kubva maari mweya yakaipa minomwe. akaenda akandoudza vaya vaimbova naye, vakanga vachiungudza uye vachichema. vakati vanzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga ari mupenyu, uye kuti miriamu akanga amuona, havana kuzvitenda. shure kwaizvozvo yeahoshua akaonekwazve neimwe nzira navaviri vavo pavakanga vachifamba kuruwa. ava vakadzoka vakandozivisa vakasara; asi naivowo havana kuvatenda. mushure maizvozvo yeahoshua akazviratidza kuna vane gumi nomumwe pavakanga vachidya; akavatsiura pamusoro pokusatenda kwavo uye nokusindimara kwemwoyo yavo pakuramba kutenda vaya vakanga vamuona mushure mokumuka kwake. akati kwavari, “endai munyika yose muparidze vhangeri kuzvisikwa zvose. ani naani anotenda uye akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa, asi asingatendi achatongwa. uye zviratidzo izvi zvichatevera vanotenda: vachadzinga mweya yakaipa muzita rangu, vachataura nendimi itsva; vachabata nyoka namaoko avo, uye kunyange vakanwa muchetura unouraya haungavakuvadzi napaduku; vachaisa maoko avo pamusoro pavarwere, uye vachapora.” mushure mokunge ishe yeahoshua ataura kwavari, akatorwa akakwidzwa kudenga uye akandogara kuruoko rworudyi rwaallah. ipapo vadzidzi vakabuda vakandoparidza kwose kwose, uye ishe akashanda navo, akasimbisa shoko rake nezviratidzo zvakatevera.

sluke

1

vazhinji vakaedza kurondedzera nhoroondo dzezvinhu zvakaitika pakati pedu,

luke

1

sokuturirwa kwazvakaitwa kwatiri neavo vakazviona kubva pakutanga naivozve vari varanda veshoko. naizvozvo, sezvo neniwo ndakanyatsoongorora zvose kubva pakutanga, ndakati zvakanakawo kuti ndikunyorerei imi tiofiro mune mukurumbira, nhoroondo ndichinyatsotevedzanisa, kuitira kuti mugoziva chokwadi chezvinhu zvamakadzidziswa. panguva yaherodhi mambo wejudhea kwakanga kuno muprista ainzi zekariyeah, akanga ari weboka rouprista hwaabhija; mukadzi wake erishebha akanga ari chizvarwa chaaroni. vose vakanga vakarurama pamberi paallah, vachichengeta mirayiro yashe yose nezvaakatema, vasina zvavangapomerwa. asi vakanga vasina vana, nokuti erishebha akanga asingabereki; uye vose vari vaviri vakanga vachembera kwazvo. mumwe musi zekariyeah akati ari pabasa reboka rake achibata somuprista pamberi paallah, akasarudzwa nomujenya, maererano netsika youprista, kuti aende andopisa zvinonhuhwira mutemberi yashe. uye nguva yokupisa zvinonhuhwira yakati yasvika, vanamati vose vakaungana panze vachinyengetera. ipapo mutumwa washe akazviratidza kwaari, akamira kurutivi rworudyi rwearitari yezvinonhuhwira. zekariyeah akati achimuona, akavhunduka uye akabatwa nokutya. asi mutumwa akati kwaari, “usatya, zekariyeah; munyengetero wako wanzwikwa. mukadzi wako erishebha achakuberekera mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti yeahochani. achava mufaro nokufarisisa kwamuri, uye vazhinji vachafara nokuda kwokuberekwa kwake, nokuti achava mukuru pamberi pashe. haafaniri kutongonwa waini kana zvinonwiwa zvose zvakaviriswa, uye achazadzwa nomweya mutsvene kunyange kubva pakuberekwa kwake. achadzorera vanhu vazhinji vaisraeri kuna she allah wavo. uye achafamba pamberi pashe, mumweya nomusimba raeria, kuti adzorere mwoyo yamadzibaba kuvana vavo uye kuti vasingateereri vadzokere kuuchenjeri hwavakarurama, kuti agadzirire vanhu vakagadzirirwa kugamuchira ishe.” zekariyeah akabvunza mutumwa akati, “ndichazviziva seiko izvi? ini ndava murume mutana uye mukadzi wangu achembera kwazvo.” mutumwa akapindura akati, “ndini gabhurieri. ndinomira pamberi paallah, uye ndatumwa kuti ndizotaura newe, ndizokuudza nhau dzakanaka idzi. uye iye zvino uchava chimumumu uye uchatadza kutaura kusvikira pazuva razvichaitika, nokuti hauna kutenda mashoko angu, iwo achaitika nenguva yawo.” zvichakadaro, vanhu vakanga vakamirira zekariyeah vakashamiswa kuti akanga atora nguva yakareba kudai seiko ari mutemberi. akati abuda, akasagona kutaura navo. vakazviona kuti akanga aona chiratidzo mutemberi, nokuti akaramba achitaura navo namaoko, uye akaramba ari chimumumu asingagoni kutaura. nguva yokushumira kwake yakati yapera, akadzokera kumba kwake. shure kwaizvozvo, mukadzi wake erishebha akava nemimba uye akazvivanza kwemwedzi mishanu. akati mumwoyo make, “ishe andiitira izvi. mumazuva ano akaratidza nyasha dzake uye akabvisa kunyadziswa kwangu pakati pavanhu.” mumwedzi wechitanhatu, allah akatuma mutumwa gabhurieri kunazareta, guta riri mugarirea, kumhandara yakanga yatsidzirwa kuwanikwa nomurume ainzi yosefa, chizvarwa chadhavhidhi. zita remhandara iyi rainzi miriamu. mutumwa akasvika kwaari akati, “kwaziwa, iwe wakanzwirwa nyasha zvikuru! ishe anewe.” miriamu akatambudzika zvikuru namashoko ake uye akashamiswa kuti kukwazisa kwakadai ndekworudzii. asi mutumwa akati kwaari, “usatya, miriamu, iwe wanzwirwa nyasha naallah. uchava nomwana uye uchazvara mwanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rokuti yeahoshua. achava mukuru uye achanzi mwanakomana wewokumusoro-soro. ishe allah achamupa chigaro choushe chababa vake dhavhidhi, uye achatonga pamusoro peimba yayaqobho nokusingaperi; umambo hwake hahungatongogumi.” miriamu akabvunza mutumwa akati, “ko, izvi zvichaitika seiko sezvo ini ndiri mhandara?” mutumwa akapindura achiti, “mweya mutsvene achauya pamusoro pako, uye simba rewokumusoro-soro richakufukidza. saka mutsvene achazvarwa achanzi mwanakomana waallah. kunyange hama yako erishebha achava nomwana pamazuva okukwegura kwake, uye mwedzi uno ndowechitanhatu kuna iye ainzi asingabereki. nokuti hakuna chinhu chisingagonekwi naallah.” miriamu akati, “ini ndiri muranda washe. ngazviitike hazvo kwandiri sezvamareva.” ipapo mutumwa akabva paari. panguva iyoyo miriamu akagadzirira ndokukurumidza kuenda kune rimwe guta romunyika yezvikomo yejudhea, uko kwaakasvikopinda mumba mazekariyeah akakwazisa erishebha. erishebha akati anzwa kukwazisa kwamiriamu, mwana akakwakuka mudumbu make, ipapo erishebha akazadzwa nomweya mutsvene. akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “wakaropafadzwa iwe pakati pavakadzi, uye akaropafadzwa mwana wauchazvara! asi ini ndanzwirwawo nyasha seiko, zvokuti mai vashe wangu vauye kwandiri? pangosvika inzwi rokukwazisa kwenyu munzeve dzangu mwana ari mudumbu mangu abva akwakuka nomufaro. akaropafadzwa iye akatenda kuti zvakataurwa kwaari nashe zvichaitika!” miriamu akati: “mwoyo wangu unokudza ishe uye mweya wangu unofara muna allah muponesi wangu, nokuti akanga ane hanya nokuninipiswa kwomurandakadzi wake. kubva zvino marudzi ose achanditi ndakaropafadzwa, nokuti iye wamasimba andiitira zvinhu zvikuru, zita rake idzvene. ngoni dzake dzinosvika kuna avo vanomutya, kubva kune chimwe chizvarwa kusvikira kune chimwe chizvarwa. iye akaita mabasa esimba noruoko rwake; akaparadzira avo vanozvikudza mundangariro dzemwoyo yavo. akabvisa vatongi pazvigaro zvavo, asi akasimudzira vanozvininipisa. akagutsa vane nzara nezvinhu zvakanaka, asi akadzinga vapfumi vasina chinhu. akabatsira muranda wake israeri, achirangarira kuva nengoni, kuna abhurahama nezvizvarwa zvake nokusingaperi, kunyange sezvaakareva kumadzibaba edu.” miriamu akagara naerishebha kwemwedzi inenge mitatu uye mushure maizvozvo akazodzokera zvake kumusha. nguva yakati yasvika yokuti erishebha ave nomwana, akazvara mwana mukomana. vavakidzani vake nehama dzake vakanzwa kuti ishe akanga amunzwira ngoni huru, vakafara pamwe chete naye. pazuva rorusere vakauya kuzodzingisa mwana, uye vakanga vachizomutumidza zita rababa vake zekariyeah, asi mai vake vakati, “kwete! anofanira kunzi yeahochani.” ivo vakati kwaari, “pakati pehama dzenyu hapana munhu ane zita iroro.” ipapo vakaninira namaoko kuna baba vake, kuti vazive zita raaida kupa mwana. akavakumbira pokunyorera, akanyora kuti “zita rake ndiyeahochani” uye vose vakashamiswa nazvo. pakarepo muromo wake wakazarurwa uye rurimi rwake rukasunungurwa, akatanga kutaura, achirumbidza allah. vavakidzani vose vakazadzwa nokutya, nomunyika yose yezvikomo yejudhea vanhu vakataura pamusoro pezvinhu izvi zvose. vanhu vose vakazvinzwa vakashamiswa nazvo, vakati, “mwana uyu achava akadiniko?” nokuti ruoko rwashe rwaiva naye. zekariyeah baba vake vakazadzwa nomweya mutsvene uye vakaprofita vachiti: “ishe, allah waisraeri ngaakudzwe, nokuti akauya akadzikinura vanhu vake. akatisimudzira runyanga rworuponeso muimba yomuranda wake dhavhidhi, sezvaakataura kubudikidza navaprofita vake vatsvene vekare, iko kuponeswa kubva kuvavengi vedu naparuoko rwavose vanotivenga, kunzwira madzibaba edu ngoni nokurangarira sungano yake tsvene, mhiko yaakapikira baba vedu abhurahama: kutinunura kubva muruoko rwavavengi vedu, uye kutigonesa kuti timushumire tisingatyi, muutsvene nokururama pamberi pake mazuva edu ose. “uye iwe, mwana wangu, uchanzi muprofita wewokumusoro-soro; nokuti uchatungamira pamberi pashe kuti umugadzirire nzira, kuti ape vanhu vake ruzivo rworuponeso kubudikidza nokuregererwa kwezvivi zvavo, nokuda kwomwoyo munyoro waallah wedu, naye zuva richatibudira richibva kudenga, kuti rivhenekere pamusoro paavo vagere murima nomumumvuri worufu, uye kuti usesedze tsoka dzedu munzira yorugare.” uye mwana akakura akava nesimba mumweya; uye akagara mugwenga kusvikira azoonekwa pachena kuvaisraeri.

2

mumazuva iwayo kesari ogasitasi akapa chirevo chokuti vagari vose venyika dzose dzaitongwa neroma vaverengwe. uku ndiko kwaiva kuverengwa kwokutanga kwakaitwa panguva yakuriniasi paakanga ari mubati wesiria. uye mumwe nomumwe akaenda kuguta rake kuti andonyoresa. saka yosefawo akakwidza achibva kuguta renazareta mugarirea achienda kujudhea, kubheterehema guta radhavhidhi nokuti akanga ari weimba yadhavhidhi neworudzi rwake. akaenda ikoko kundonyoresa namiriamu, waakanga atsidzira kuzowanana naye uye akanga ava napamuviri. vachiri ikoko, nguva yokuzvarwa kwomwana yakasvika, akazvara dangwe rake, mwanakomana. akamuputira nemicheka akamuisa muchidyiro chezvipfuwo, nokuti muimba yavaeni makanga musisina nzvimbo yavo. uye kwakanga kuna vafudzi vakanga vachigara kumafuro aiva pedyo naikoko, vachichengeta makwai avo usiku. mutumwa washe akazviratidza kwavari, uye kubwinya kwayeahoh kwakavakomberedza, uye vakatya kwazvo. asi mutumwa akati kwavari, “musatya. ndauya nenhau dzakanaka dzomufaro mukuru uchava wavanhu vose. nhasi muguta radhavhidhi mazvarwa muponesi; ndiye kristu ishe. ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo kwamuri: muchawana mwana akaputirwa nemicheka uye avete muchidyiro chezvipfuwo.” pakarepo hondo huru yokudenga yakaonekwa pamwe chete nomutumwa vachirumbidza allah vachiti: “allah ngaarumbidzwe kumusoro-soro, uye rugare panyika nokuvanhu vaanofarira.” vatumwa vakati vabva kwavari uye vaenda kudenga, vafudzi vakataurirana vachiti, “handei kubheterehema tindoona chinhu chaitika ichi, chataudzwa nezvacho nashe.” saka vakakurumidza kusimuka vakaenda vakandowana miriamu nayosefa, nomwana, akanga avete muchidyiro chezvipfuwo. vakati vamuona, vakaparadzira shoko maererano nezvakanga zvataurwa pamusoro pomwana uyu, uye vose vakazvinzwa vakashamiswa nezvavakataurirwa navafudzi. asi miriamu akachengeta zvinhu zvose izvi akazvifungisisa mumwoyo make. vafudzi vakadzokera vachikudza nokurumbidza allah pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zvavakanga vanzwa uye zvavakaona, zvakanga zvakangoita sezvavakanga vataurirwa. pazuva rorusere, nguva yokudzingiswa kwake yasvika, akatumidzwa zita rokuti yeahoshua, zita raakanga apiwa nomutumwa asati aumbwa mudumbu. nguva yokuzvinatsa kwavo maererano nomurayiro wamozisi yakati yakwana, yosefa namiriamu vakaenda naye kujerusarema kundomukumikidza kuna she sezvazvakanyorwa mumurayiro washe, kuti “mwanakomana wose wedangwe anofanira kutsaurirwa ishe,” uye kuti vabayire chibayiro maererano nezvinorehwa mumurayiro washe zvichinzi: “njiva mbiri kana hangaiwa duku mbiri.” zvino kwakanga kuno murume aiva mujerusarema ainzi simeoni, akanga akarurama uye aida allah. akanga akamirira kunyaradzwa kwavaisraeri, uye mweya mutsvene waiva pamusoro pake. zvakanga zvaratidzwa namweya mutsvene kuti haaizofa asati aona muzodziwa washe. akapinda mutemberi achisundwa nomweya mutsvene. vabereki vakati vauya nomwana yeahoshua kuti vazoita kwaari tsika yaidiwa nomurayiro, simeoni akamubata mumaoko ake akarumbidza allah achiti: “ishe tenzi, sezvamakavimbisa, zvino chiendesai henyu muranda wenyu norugare. nokuti meso angu aona ruponeso rwenyu, rwamakagadzirira pamberi pavanhu vose, chiedza chinovhenekera vedzimwe ndudzi uye nokukudzwa kwavanhu venyu israeri.” baba namai vomwana vakashamiswa nezvakataurwa pamusoro pake. ipapo simeoni akavaropafadza akati kuna miriamu, mai vake, “mwana uyu achaita kuti kuve nokuwa nokumutswa kwavazhinji muisraeri, uye achava chiratidzo chicharambwa, kuitira kuti ndangariro dzemwoyo mizhinji dzigoratidzwa. uye munondo uchabayawo mwoyo wako pachako.” kwaivawo nomuprofitakadzi, ana, mwanasikana wafanueri, worudzi rwaasheri. akanga akwegura kwazvo; akanga ambogara makore manomwe nomurume wake shure kwokuwanikwa kwake, ipapo akazova chirikadzi kusvikira ava namakore makumi masere namana. haana kumbobva mutemberi asi akanamata usiku namasikati, achitsanya nokunyengetera. akasvika pavari panguva iyoyo, akavonga allah uye akataura pamusoro pomwana kuna vose vakanga vakamirira kudzikinurwa kwejerusarema. yosefa namiriamu vakati vaita zvose zvaidikanwa nomurayiro washe, vakadzokera kugarirea kuguta ravo renazareta. uye mwana akakura akasimba; akanga azere nouchenjeri, uye nyasha dzaallah dzaiva pamusoro pake. gore negore vabereki vake vaienda kujerusarema kumutambo wepasika. akati ava namakore gumi namaviri, vakakwidza naye kumutambo, maererano netsika yavo. mutambo wakati wapera, vabereki vake pavakanga vodzokera kumusha, mukomana yeahoshua akasara mujerusarema, asi ivo vakanga vasingazvizivi. vakafamba kwezuva rose vachifunga kuti akanga ari pakati pavo. ipapo vakatanga kumutsvaka pakati pehama neshamwari dzavo. vakati vamushayiwa, vakadzokera kujerusarema kundomutsvaka. mushure mamazuva matatu vakamuwana ari mutemberi, akagara pakati pavadzidzisi achivateerera uye achivabvunza mibvunzo. mumwe nomumwe akamunzwa akashamiswa nokunzwisisa kwake uye nemhinduro dzake. vabereki vake vakati vamuwana, vakashamiswa kwazvo. mai vake vakati kwaari, “mwana, waitireiko zvakadai kwatiri? baba vako neni tanga tichikutsvaka kwazvo.” iye akati, “manga muchinditsvakireiko? manga musingazivi here kuti ndaifanira kunge ndiri mumba mababa vangu?” asi havana kunzwisisa zvaaireva kwavari. ipapo akaburuka navo kunazareta uye akavateerera. asi mai vake vakachengeta zvinhu zvose izvi mumwoyo mavo. uye yeahoshua akakura muuchenjeri nomumhu, achidiwa naallah uye navanhu.

3

mugore regumi nemashanu rokutonga kwatibheriasi kesari, pondio pirato paakanga ari mubati wejudhea, herodhi ari mubati wegarirea, mununʼuna wake firipi ari mubati weiturea netirakoniti, uye risania ari mubati weabhurini, panguva youprista hwaanasi nakefasi, shoko raallah rakasvika kuna yeahochani mwanakomana wazekariyeah mugwenga. akaenda munyika yose yakapoteredza jorodhani, achiparidza rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka kuti vanhu varegererwe zvivi. sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku ramashoko aisaya muprofita zvichinzi: “inzwi rounodana murenje richiti, ‘gadzirai nzira yashe, ruramisai migwagwa yake. mipata yose ichafushirwa, makomo ose nezvikomo zvichaderedzwa. migwagwa yakakombama ichatwasanudzwa, pasakaenzana pachaenzaniswa. uye marudzi ose avanhu achaona ruponeso rwaallah.’ ” yeahochani akati kuvanhu vazhinji vaiuya kuzobhabhatidzwa naye, “imi vana venyoka! ndianiko akuyambirai kuti mutize kutsamwa kuchauya? chiberekai zvibereko zvinoenderana nokutendeuka. uye musatanga kuti mumwoyo menyu, ‘abhurahama ndiye baba vedu.’ nokuti ndinoti kwamuri allah anogona kumutsira abhurahama vana pamabwe aya. demo ratoiswa pamidzi yemiti, uye muti mumwe nomumwe usingabereki zvibereko zvakanaka uchatemwa ugokandwa mumoto.” vanhu vazhinji vakati, “zvino toita seiko?” yeahochani akapindura akati, “munhu ane nguo mbiri ngaagovane neasina, uye ane zvokudya ngaaitewo saizvozvo.” vateresi vakauyawo kuzobhabhatidzwa. vakamubvunza vakati, “mudzidzisi, toita seiko?” akati kwavari, “musatora mari inopfuura mwero wamunofanira kutora.” ipapo vamwe varwi vakamubvunza vakati, “tinofanira kuita seiko?” iye akati, “musatorera vanhu mari nechisimba uye musapomera vanhu nhema, mugutsikane nomubayiro wenyu.” vanhu vakanga vakamirira vakatarisira, uye vose vakanga vachikahadzika mumwoyo mavo kuti zvimwe yeahochani akanga ari iye kristu. yeahochani akavapindura vose achiti, “ini ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura. asi shure kwangu kunouya mumwe ane simba kundipfuura zvokuti ini handina kukodzera kuti ndisunungure rukanda rweshangu dzake. achakubhabhatidzai nomweya mutsvene nomoto. rusero rwake rwuri muruoko rwake kuti apepete paburiro rake uye agounganidza gorosi mudura, asi hundi achaipisa nomoto usingadzimwi.” uye namamwe mashoko mazhinji, yeahochani akakurudzira vanhu akaparidza vhangeri kwavari. asi yeahochani akati atsiura herodhi mutongi nokuda kwaherodhiasi, mukadzi womununʼuna wake, uye nezvimwe zvinhu zvose zvakaipa zvaakanga aita, herodhi akawedzera pazviri zvose nokuita izvi: akapfigira yeahochani mutorongo. vanhu vose vakati vachiri kubhabhatidzwa, yeahoshua akabhabhatidzwawo. uye akati achinyengetera, denga rakazaruka, mweya mutsvene akauya pamusoro pake nomufananidzo wenjiva. uye inzwi rakabva kudenga richiti, “ndiwe mwanakomana wangu, wandinoda; ndiwe wandinofarira kwazvo.” zvino yeahoshua pachake akanga ava namakore anenge makumi matatu paakatanga ushumiri hwake. sokuonekwa kwazvo, akanga ari mwanakomana, mwanakomana waheri, mwanakomana wamatati, mwanakomana warevhi, mwanakomana wamereki, mwanakomana wajani, mwanakomana wayosefa, mwanakomana wamatatiasi, mwanakomana waamosi, mwanakomana wanahumi, mwanakomana waesiri, mwanakomana wanagai, mwanakomana wamaati, mwanakomana wamatatiasi, mwanakomana wasemeini, mwanakomana wajoseki, mwanakomana wajodha, mwanakomana wajoanani, mwanakomana waresa, mwanakomana wazerubhabheri, mwanakomana washearitieri, mwanakomana waneri, mwanakomana wamereki, mwanakomana waadhi, mwanakomana wakosamu, mwanakomana waerimadhami, mwanakomana waeri, mwanakomana wayeahoshua, mwanakomana waeriezeri, mwanakomana wajerimi, mwanakomana wamatati, mwanakomana warevhi, mwanakomana wasimeoni, mwanakomana wayeahudha, mwanakomana wayosefa, mwanakomana wajonami, mwanakomana waeriakimi, mwanakomana wamerea, mwanakomana wamena, mwanakomana wamatata, mwanakomana wanatani, mwanakomana wadhavhidhi, mwanakomana wajese, mwanakomana waobhedhi, mwanakomana wabhoazi, mwanakomana wasarimoni, mwanakomana wanahashoni, mwanakomana waaminadhabhi, mwanakomana warami, mwanakomana wahezironi, mwanakomana waperezi, mwanakomana wayeahudha, mwanakomana wayaqobho, mwanakomana waisaka, mwanakomana waabhurahama, mwanakomana watera, mwanakomana wanahori, mwanakomana waserugi, mwanakomana wareu, mwanakomana waperegi, mwanakomana waebha, mwanakomana washera, mwanakomana wakainani, mwanakomana waarifasadhi, mwanakomana washamu, mwanakomana wanoa, mwanakomana warameki, mwanakomana wametusera, mwanakomana waenoki, mwanakomana wajaredhi, mwanakomana wamaharareri, mwanakomana wakenani, mwanakomana waenoshi, mwanakomana waseti, mwanakomana waadhamu, mwanakomana waallah.

4

yeahoshua, azere nomweya mutsvene, akadzoka kubva pajorodhani akatungamirirwa nomweya mugwenga, umo maakaedzwa nasatani kwamazuva makumi mana. haana chaakadya pamazuva iwayo, uye pakupera kwamazuva iwayo akanzwa nzara. satani akati kwaari, “kana iwe uri mwanakomana waallah, rayira dombo iri kuti rive chingwa.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kwakanyorwa kuchinzi, ‘munhu haararami nechingwa bedzi, asi neshoko rimwe nerimwe rinobuda mumuromo maallah.’ ” satani akamutungamirira kunzvimbo yakakwirira uye akamuratidza munguva diki diki umambo hwose hwenyika. akati kwaari, “ndichakupa simba rahwo rose nokubwinya kwahwo, nokuti ndakahupiwa, uye ini ndinogona kuhupa kuna ani zvake wandinoda. saka kana ukandinamata, huchava hwako hwose.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kwakanyorwa kuchinzi, ‘namata ishe allah wako umushumire iye oga.’ ” satani akamutungamirira kujerusarema akamuita kuti amire pachiruvi chetemberi. akati kwaari, “kana uri mwanakomana waallah, zviwisire pasi uchibva pano. nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “ ‘acharayira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako kuti vakuchengete kwazvo; vachakusimudza mumaoko avo, kuti rutsoka rwako rurege kugumburwa padombo.’ ” yeahoshua akati, “zvinonzi, ‘usaedza ishe allah wako.’ ” satani akati apedza kuedza kwake kwose uku, akabva paari kusvikira pane imwe nguva. yeahoshua akadzokera kugarirea musimba romweya, uye shoko pamusoro pake rakapararira kumativi ose enyika. akadzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, uye munhu wose akamurumbidza. akaenda kunazareta, kwaakanga arerwa, uye nomusi wesabata akapinda musinagoge, setsika yake. akasimuka kuti averenge. rugwaro rwakapetwa rwaisaya rwakapiwa kwaari. pakurubhedhenura, akawana pakanga pakanyorwa kuti: “mweya washe uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti akandizodza kuti ndiparidze vhangeri kuvarombo. akandituma kuti ndiparidze rusununguko kuna vakasungwa uye kuti vasingaoni vaone, kuti ndisunungure vakamanikidzwa, kuti ndiparidze gore rakanaka rashe.” ipapo akapeta rugwaro, akarudzosera kumubati akagara pasi. meso avanhu vose vakanga vari musinagoge akanga akati nde-e kwaari, uye akatanga nokuti kwavari, “nhasi rugwaro urwu rwazadziswa munzeve dzenyu.” vose vakataura zvakanaka pamusoro pake uye vakashamiswa namashoko akanaka akanga achibuda mumuromo make. vakati, “ko, uyu haazi mwanakomana wayosefa here?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “zvirokwazvo muchataura tsumo iyi kwandiri muchiti: ‘murapi, chizvirapa! itawo muguta rako rino zvatakanzwa kuti wakaita mukapenaume.’ ” akaenderera mberi achiti, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti hakuna muprofita anogamuchirwa muguta rake. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti kwakanga kune chirikadzi zhinji muisraeri panguva yaeria, panguva yakadzivirwa denga kwamakore matatu nehafu uye nzara huru ikavapo munyika yose. asi eria haana kutumwa kuno mumwe wavo, asi kuchirikadzi yezerafati munyika yesidhoni. uye kwaiva navazhinji vaiva namaperembudzi panguva yaeria muprofita, asi hapana mumwe chete pakati pavo akanatswa kunze kwanaamani musiria.” vanhu vose vakanga vari musinagoge vakatsamwa kwazvo pavakanzwa izvi. vakasimuka, vakamubudisa muguta, vakamutora vakaenda naye kumucheto cheto kwechikomo chakanga chakavakirwa guta ravo, kuti vamusundidzire kumawere. asi akafamba napakati pemhomho yavanhu akaenda zvake. ipapo akaburuka zasi kukapenaume, guta riri mugarirea, akatanga kudzidzisa vanhu nomusi wesabata. vakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake, nokuti shoko rake raiva nesimba. musinagoge makanga muno murume akanga akabatwa nedhimoni, mweya wakaipa, uye akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “a! munodeiko kwatiri imi yeahoshua wenazareta? ko, mauya kuzotiparadza kanhi? ndinoziva kuti muri ani, muri mutsvene waallah!” yeahoshua akaurayira achiti, “nyarara! buda maari!” ipapo dhimoni rakaputsira murume uyu pasi pamberi pavo vose rikabuda risina kumukuvadza. vanhu vose vakashamiswa vakataurirana vachiti, “kudzidzisa uku ndokupi? anorayira mweya yakaipa nechikuriri uye nesimba, ichibva yabuda!” mukurumbira wake wakapararira munzvimbo dzose dzakapoteredza. yeahoshua akabva pasinagoge akaenda kumba kwasimoni. zvino mai vomukadzi wasimoni vairwara nefivha, uye vakakumbira yeahoshua kuti avabatsire. saka akakotamira kwavari akarayira fivha, ikabva pavari. vakasimuka pakarepo vakatanga kuvashandira. zuva rakati rodoka, vanhu vakauya kuna yeahoshua navose vakanga vana marudzi akasiyana-siyana ezvirwere, akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pomumwe nomumwe wavo akavaporesa. pamusoro paizvozvo, madhimoni akabuda muvanhu vazhinji, achidanidzira achiti, “ndiwe mwanakomana waallah!” asi iye akaatsiura akasaatendera kuti ataure, nokuti iwo aiziva kuti ndiye kristu. mangwanani-ngwanani, yeahoshua akaenda kunzvimbo yakanyarara ari oga. vanhu vakanga vachimutsvaka uye vakati vamuwana paakanga ari, vakaedza kumudzivisa kuti asabva kwavari. asi iye akati, “ndinofanira kuparidza vhangeri roumambo hwaallah kuna mamwewo maguta, nokuti ndizvo zvandakatumirwa.” uye akaramba achiparidza mumasinagoge ejudhea.

5

rimwe zuva yeahoshua zvaakanga amire pagungwa regenesareti, vanhu vakaungana vakamukomberedza vachiteerera kushoko raallah, uye akaona magwa maviri kumhenderekedzo dzegungwa, akanga asiyiwapo navabati vehove, vakanga vachisuka mambure avo. akakwira mune rimwe ramagwa acho, rakanga riri rasimoni, akamukumbira kuti ariswededze zvishoma kumahombekombe. ipapo akagara pasi akadzidzisa vanhu ari mugwa. akati apedza kutaura, akati kuna simoni, “chiriswededza kwakadzika ugokanda usvasvi ubate hove.” simoni akapindura akati, “tenzi, takashanda zvakaoma usiku hwose uye hatina kubata chinhu. asi sezvamadaro imi, ndichakanda hangu mambure.” vakati vaita saizvozvo, vakabata hove zhinji kwazvo uye mambure avo akatanga kubvaruka. saka vakaninira vamwe vavo vakanga vari mune rimwe igwa kuti vauye vazovabatsira, ivo vakauya vakazadza magwa ose ari maviri; akazara zvokuti akatanga kunyura. simoni petro akati achiona izvi, akawira pamabvi ayeahoshua akati, “ibvai kwandiri, ishe; ndiri mutadzi!” nokuti iye neshamwari dzake vakashama kwazvo nokuda kwehove dzavakanga vabata, uye vanayaqobho nayeahochani, vanakomana vazebhedhi, vamwe vasimoni, vakashamawo. ipapo yeahoshua akati kuna simoni, “usatya; kubva zvino uchava mubati wavanhu.” saka vakakwevera magwa avo kumahombekombe, vakasiya zvose uye vakamutevera. yeahoshua paakanga achiri mune rimwe ramaguta, mumwe murume akanga azere namaperembudzi akauya. akati achiona yeahoshua, akawira pasi nechiso chake akamukumbira zvikuru achiti, “ishe, kana muchida, munogona kundinatsa.” yeahoshua akatambanudza ruoko rwake akabata murume uyu akati, “ndinoda, chinatswa!” pakarepo maperembudzi akabva paari. ipapo yeahoshua akamurayira akati, “usaudza munhu, asi enda undozviratidza kumuprista ugopa zvibayiro zvakarayirwa namozisi zvokunatswa kwako, chive chapupu kwavari.” asi mukurumbira wake wakapararira kwazvo, zvokuti vanhu vazhinji zhinji vakauya kuzomunzwa uye kuti vaporeswe zvirwere zvavo. asi, kazhinji yeahoshua aizvitsaura achienda kusina vanhu kuti andonyengetera. rimwe zuva paaidzidzisa, vafarisi navadzidzisi vomurayiro, vakanga vabva mumisha yose yegarirea nejudhea uye nejerusarema, vakanga vagerepo. uye simba rashe rakanga riripo kuti aporese vanorwara. vamwe varume vakasvika vakatakura murume akanga akaoma mutezo parukukwe vakaedza kuti vamupinze mumba kuti vandomuradzika pamberi payeahoshua. vakati vashayiwa nzira yokupinda nayo nokuda kwokuwanda kwavanhu, vakakwira pamusoro pedenga vakamuburutsa ari parukukwe rwake nepamapfiriro, pakati pavanhu, pamberi payeahoshua chaipo. yeahoshua akati aona kutenda kwavo, akati, “shamwari, zvivi zvako zvaregererwa.” vafarisi navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakatanga kufunga vachiti, “ndianiko munhu uyu anotaura achimhura allah. ndianiko anoregerera zvivi kunze kwaallah chete?” yeahoshua aiziva zvavaifunga uye akabvunza achiti, “seiko muchifunga zvinhu izvi mumwoyo yenyu? ndezvipiko zvakareruka: kuti, ‘zvivi zvako zvaregererwa,’ kana kuti, ‘simuka ufambe’? asi kuti muzive kuti mwanakomana womunhu ane simba panyika rokuregerera zvivi.” akati kumurume akanga akaoma mutezo, “ndinoti kwauri, simuka, tora rukukwe rwako uende kumba.” pakarepo akasimuka pamberi pavo, akatora rukukwe rwaakanga avete parwuri akaenda kumba achirumbidza allah. munhu wose akashamiswa nazvo akarumbidza allah. vakazadzwa nokutya vakati, “taona zvinhu zvinoshamisa nhasi.” shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua akabuda akaona muteresi ainzi revhi akagara paimba yake yokuteresa. yeahoshua akati kwaari, “nditevere.” revhi akasimuka, akasiya zvinhu zvose akamutevera. ipapo revhi akaitira yeahoshua mabiko makuru pamba pake, uye vateresi vazhinji kwazvo navamwewo vakadya navo. asi vafarisi navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakanga vari veboka ravo vakagununʼuna vakati kuvadzidzi vake, “seiko muchidya navateresi navatadzi?” yeahoshua akavapindura akati, “vasingarwari havatsvaki chiremba, asi vanorwara. handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi kuti vatendeuke.” ivo vakati kwaari, “vadzidzi vayeahochani vanotsanya kazhinji uye vachinyengetera, uye vadzidzi vavafarisi vanodarowo, asi venyu vanoramba vachidya nokunwa.” yeahoshua akavapindura akati, “mungaite here kuti shamwari dzechikomba dzitsanye iye achinavo? asi nguva ichauya apo chikomba chichabviswa kwavari; mumazuva iwayo vachatsanya.” akavaudza mufananidzo uyu akati, “hakuna munhu anobvarura chigamba kubva panguo itsva achichisonera panguo tsaru. kana akadaro, anenge abvarura nguo itsva, uye chigamba chinobva panguo itsva hachibatsiri panguo tsaru. uye hakuna anodira waini itsva mumaguchu amatehwe matsaru. kana akadaro, waini itsva ichatsemura matehwe, waini itsva ichateuka uye maguchu ewaini achaparadzwa. kwete, waini itsva inofanira kudirwa mumaguchu amatehwe matsva. uye hakuna munhu anoti ambonwa waini tsaru ozoda waini itsva, nokuti anoti, ‘tsaru iri nani.’ ”

6

rimwe sabata yeahoshua akanga achifamba nomuminda yezviyo, uye vadzidzi vake vakatanga kunonga hura dzezviyo, vachidzipukuta mumaoko avo vachidya tsanga dzacho. vamwe vavafarisi vakati, “seiko muchiita zvisingatenderwi nomusi wesabata?” yeahoshua akavapindura akati, “hamuna kumboverenga here zvakaitwa nadhavhidhi paakanga ava nenzara, iye neshamwari dzake? akapinda mumba maallah, akatora chingwa chakatsaurwa, akadya zvaingobvumirwa kudyiwa navaprista chete. uye akapawo chimwe kushamwari dzake.” ipapo akati kwavari, “mwanakomana womunhu ndiye ishe wesabata.” rimwezve sabata akapinda musinagoge uye aidzidzisa, zvino pakanga pano murume akanga ano ruoko rwake rworudyi rwakanga rwakakokonyara. vafarisi navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakanga vachitsvaka mhosva yokupomera yeahoshua, saka vakamutarisisa kuti vaone kana aizoporesa nomusi wesabata. asi yeahoshua aiziva zvavaifunga uye akati kumurume akanga ano ruoko rwakakokonyara, “simuka umire pamberi pavanhu vose.” saka iye akasimuka akamira ipapo. ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ndinokubvunzaiwo kuti chiiko chinobvumirwa kuitwa nomusi wesabata: kuita zvakanaka kana kuita zvakaipa, kuponesa upenyu kana kuhuparadza?” akatarisa kwavari vose, ndokuti kumunhu uya, “tambanudza ruoko rwako.” iye akaita saizvozvo, uye ruoko rwake rukatwasanuka. asi ivo vakatsamwa kwazvo vakatanga kutaurirana zvavangaita kuna yeahoshua. nerimwe ramazuva iwayo, yeahoshua akabuda akaenda kugomo kuti andonyengetera, uye akapedza usiku hwose achinyengetera kuna allah. fume mangwana, akadana vadzidzi vake akasarudza gumi navaviri pakati pavo, avo vaakatumidza kuti vapostori: simoni (uyo waakatumidza kuti petro), mununʼuna wake andirea, yaqobho, yeahochani, firipi, bhatoromeo, mateo, tomasi, yaqobho mwanakomana waarifeasi, simoni ainzi muzeroti, yeahudhasi mwanakomana wayaqobho, nayeahudhasi iskarioti, uyo akazova mupanduki. akaburuka navo akandomira panzvimbo yakanga yakaenzana. ungano huru yavadzidzi vake yakanga iripo uye navanhu vazhinji vaibva mujudhea yose, vaibva kujerusarema, uye navaibva kumuganhu wetire nesidhoni, vakanga vauya kuzomunzwa uyewo kuti vazoporeswa pazvirwere zvavo. vaya vakanga vachimanikidzwa nemweya yakaipa vakaporeswa, uye vanhu vose vakaedza kumubata, nokuti simba rakanga richibuda maari richivaporesa vose. akatarira kuvadzidzi vake, akati: “makaropafadzwa imi varombo, nokuti umambo hwaallah ndohwenyu. makaropafadzwa imi vane nzara zvino, nokuti muchaguta. makaropafadzwa imi munochema zvino, nokuti muchaseka. makaropafadzwa imi kana vanhu vachikuvengai, vachikutsaurai uye vachikutukai, vachiramba zita renyu vachiti rakaipa, nokuda kwomwanakomana womunhu. “farai pazuva iro uye mupembere nomufaro, nokuti mubayiro wenyu mukuru kudenga. ndiwo matambudzirwo akaitwa vaprofita namadzibaba avo. “asi mune nhamo imi vapfumi, nokuti makatowana kunyaradzwa kwenyu kare. mune nhamo imi makaguta zvino, nokuti muchanzwa nzara. mune nhamo imi vanoseka zvino, nokuti muchaungudza uye muchachema. mune nhamo imi kana vanhu vose vachitaura zvakanaka pamusoro penyu, nokuti madzibaba avo akaitira vaprofita venhema zvakadaro. “asi ndinokuudzai imi munondinzwa kuti: idai vavengi venyu, itai zvakanaka kuna avo vanokuvengai, ropafadzai vanokutukai, nyengetererai vaya vanokunetsai. kana mumwe akakurova rimwe dama, mupezve rimwe racho. kana mumwe akakutorera nguo yako yokunze, usamudzivisa kutorawo nguo yomukati. upe vose vanokukumbira, uye kana ani zvake akatora chinhu chako, usagombedzera kuti chidzoke. itira vamwe zvaunoda kuti vakuitirewo iwe. “kana uchida vaya vanokuda, mubayiro wako uchagova weiko? kunyange navatadzi vanoda avo vanovada. uye kana uchiita zvakanaka kuna vaya vakanaka kwauri, mubayiro wako uchagova weiko? kunyange vatadzi vanoita izvozvo. uye kana uchikweretesa kuna vaya vaunotarisira kuti vagodzora, mubayiro wako uchagova weiko? kunyange vatadzi vanokweretesa kuvatadzi, vachitarisira kuzodzoserwa zvakakwana. asi idai vavengi venyu, muite zvakanaka kwavari, uye muvakweretese musingatarisiri kuwana kana chinhuzve. ipapo mubayiro wenyu uchava mukuru, uye muchava vanakomana vewokumusoro-soro, nokuti iye ano mwoyo munyoro kuna vasingavongi navakaipa. ivai netsitsi sababa venyu vane tsitsi. “musatonga, uye nemi hamuzotongwi. musapa mhosva, uye nemi hamuzopiwi mhosva. regererai, uye nemi muchazoregererwawo. ipai, uye nemi muchapiwa. muchapiwa mumaoko enyu chiyero chakanaka, chakatsindirwa, chakazunguzirwa uye chinopfachukira. nokuti nechiyero chamunoyera nacho, muchayererwawo nacho.” akavaudzawo mufananidzo uyu: “bofu ringatungamirira bofu here? havangawiri mugomba vose vari vaviri here? mudzidzi haapfuuri mudzidzisi wake, asi munhu wose anenge adzidziswa zvakakwana ndiye achaita somudzidzisi wake. “seiko uchitarisa rubanzu rwuri muziso rehama yako, asi usingatariri danda riri muziso rako pachako? ungareva seiko kuhama yako uchiti, ‘hama, rega ndikubvise rubanzu rwuri muziso rako, asi, iwe pachako uchitadza kuona danda riri muziso rako?’ iwe munyengeri, tanga wabvisa danda muziso rako, ipapo uchaonesesa kuti ubvise rubanzu muziso rehama yako. “hakuna muti wakanaka unobereka muchero wakaipa, uye muti wakaipa haungabereki muchero wakanaka. muti mumwe nomumwe unozivikanwa nomuchero wawo. vanhu havangatanhi maonde kubva mumakwenzi eminzwa, kana kutanha mazambiringa kubva parukato. munhu akanaka anobudisa zvinhu zvakanaka zvakachengetwa mumwoyo make. “sei muchiti, ‘ishe, ishe,’ kwandiri asi musingaiti zvandinoreva? ndichakuratidzai zvakaita munhu anouya kwandiri anonzwa mashoko angu uye achiaita. akaita somunhu anovaka imba, akachera zvakadzika akavaka hwaro paruware. mafashamu akati asvika, mafungu akarova imba iyo asi haana kugona kuizungunutsa, nokuti yakanga yakavakwa zvakanaka. asi munhu anonzwa mashoko angu akasaaita, akafanana nomunhu akavaka imba pavhu asina kuchera hwaro. mafungu paakangorova imba iyo, yakakoromoka uye kuparara kwayo kwakava kukuru.”

7

yeahoshua akati apedza kutaura zvose izvi vanhu vachizvinzwa, akapinda mukapenaume. imomo maiva nomuranda womukuru wezana, aidiwa chose natenzi wake, akanga achirwara uye ava kuda kufa. mukuru wezana akanzwa nezvayeahoshua uye akatuma vamwe vakuru vavayeahudha kwaari, achimukumbira kuti auye kuzoporesa muranda wake. vakati vasvika kuna yeahoshua, vakamukumbira zvikuru vachiti, “murume uyu akafanira kuti mumuitire izvi, nokuti anoda rudzi rwedu uye ndiye akavaka sinagoge redu.” naizvozvo yeahoshua akaenda navo. akanga asiri kure nomusha pakatumwa shamwari nomukuru wezana kuti dzinoti kwaari, “ishe, musazvinetsa zvenyu, nokuti handina kukodzera kuti imi mupinde mumba mangu. ndokusaka ndisina kumbofunga kuti ini ndive nekodzero yokuuya kwamuri. asi, taurai henyu shoko, uye muranda wangu achapora. nokuti ini pachangu, ndiri munhu ari pasi pavamwe, uye ndine varwi vari pasi pangu. ndinoti kuno uyu, ‘enda,’ uye anoenda, kuno mumwe, ‘uya’ uye anouya. ndinoti kumuranda wangu, ‘ita ichi,’ uye anochiita.” yeahoshua akati anzwa izvi, akashamiswa kwazvo naye, akatendeukira kuvanhu vazhinji vaimutevera akati, “ndinoti kwamuri, handina kumboona kutenda kwakadai kunyange muisraeri.” ipapo varume vaya vakanga vatumwa vakadzokera kumba vakawana muranda uya apora. pasina kupera nguva refu, yeahoshua akaenda kuguta rainzi naini, vadzidzi vake navanhu vazhinji kwazvo vakaendawo naye. kuzoti ave kuswedera pasuo reguta, munhu akafa akanga akatakurwa achiburitswa kunze, aingova mwanakomana mumwe chete wamai vake, uye vakanga vari chirikadzi. uye vanhu vazhinji kwazvo vaibva muguta vaiva navo. ishe akati achivaona, mwoyo wake wakavanzwira tsitsi, akati kwavari, “musachema.” ipapo akaswedera pedyo akabata hwanyanza, uye vaya vakanga vakamutakura vakamira. akati, “jaya, ndinoti kwauri, muka!” munhu uya akanga afa akamuka akagara akatanga kutaura, uye yeahoshua akamupa kuna mai vake. vose vakazadzwa nokutya vakarumbidza allah. vakati, “muprofita mukuru amuka pakati pedu. allah auya kuzobatsira vanhu vake.” shoko iri pamusoro payeahoshua rakapararira mujudhea yose nenyika dzose dzakapoteredza. vadzidzi vayeahochani vakamuudza pamusoro pezvinhu izvi zvose. akadana vaviri vavo, akavatuma kuna she kuti vandobvunza kuti, “ndimi here iye aifanira kuuya kana kuti tomirira mumwewo?” varume ava vakati vasvika kuna yeahoshua, vakati, “yeahochani mubhabhatidzi akatituma kwamuri kuti tizobvunza kuti, ‘ndimi here mainzi muchauya, kana kuti timirire mumwewo?’ ” panguva iyoyo yeahoshua akaporesa vazhinji vakanga vane zvirwere, matenda nemweya yakaipa uye akasvinudza vazhinji vakanga vari mapofu. saka akapindura nhume achiti, “dzokerai munoudza yeahochani zvamaona nezvamanzwa zvokuti: mapofu anosvinudzwa, zvirema zvinofamba, vaya vana maperembudzi vanoporeswa, matsi dzinonzwa, vakafa vanomutswa uye vhangeri riri kuparidzwa kuvarombo. akaropafadzwa munhu asingagumbuswi nokuda kwangu.” shure kwokubva kwenhume dzayeahochani, yeahoshua akatanga kutaura kuvanhu vazhinji pamusoro payeahochani achiti, “makabuda mukaenda kurenje kundooneiko? rutsanga rwaizungunuswa nemhepo here? kana zvisizvo, makabuda kundooneiko? munhu akanga akafuka nguo dzakanaka here? kwete, vaya vanopfeka nguo dzomutengo mukuru uye vanogara zvakanaka ndivo vari mumizinda. asi makabuda kundooneiko? muprofita here? hongu, ndinokuudzai, uyewo anokunda muprofita. ndiye uya akanyorwa nezvake zvichinzi: “ ‘ndichatuma nhume yangu pamberi pako, uyo achakugadzirira nzira yako pamberi pako.’ ndinokuudzai kuti, pakati paavo vose vakaberekwa navakadzi hakuna mukuru kuna yeahochani; asi muduku muumambo hwaallah mukuru kwaari.” vanhu vose, kunyange navateresi, vakati vanzwa mashoko ayeahoshua, vakabvuma kuti nzira yaallah yakarurama, nokuti vakanga vabhabhatidzwa nayeahochani. asi vafarisi nenyanzvi dzomurayiro vakaramba kuda kwaallah pamusoro pavo, nokuti vakanga vasina kubhabhatidzwa nayeahochani. “zvino, ndingafananidza rudzi rwakadai neiko? vakafanana neiko? vakaita savana vagere pamusika vachidanidzira kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo vachiti: “ ‘takakuridzirai hwamanda, asi hamuna kutamba; takaimba rwiyo rworufu, uye hamuna kuchema.’ nokuti yeahochani mubhabhatidzi akauya asingadyi chingwa uye asinganwi waini, imi mukati, ‘ane dhimoni.’ mwanakomana womunhu akauya achidya uye achinwa, imi mukati, ‘houno munhu wamadyo uye chidhakwa, shamwari yavateresi na“vatadzi”.’ asi uchenjeri hunoratidzwa navana vahwo vose.” zvino mumwe wavafarisi akakoka yeahoshua kuti azodya naye, saka akaenda kumba kwomufarisi uyu akandogara kuti adye. mumwe mukadzi womuguta umu akanga achirarama muzvivi akati anzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga agere pakudya mumba momufarisi, akauya nechinu chamafuta anonhuhwira chearabhasta, akamira shure kwake akatanga kuchema, uye akanyorovesa tsoka dzake nemisodzi yake. ipapo akadzipukuta nebvudzi romusoro wake, akadzitsvoda uye akadzizodza mafuta anonhuhwira. zvino mufarisi uya akanga amukoka akati achiona izvi, akati mumwoyo make, “dai munhu uyu anga ari muprofita, angadai aziva kuti mukadzi uyu amubata akaita sei, kuti mutadzi.” yeahoshua akamupindura akati, “simoni, ndine chinhu chandinoda kukutaurira.” iye akati, “ndiudzei henyu mudzidzisi.” “vamwe varume vaviri vakanga vane chikwereti kumunhu mumwe chete. mumwe akanga ane chikwereti chamadhenari mazana mashanu, uye mumwe madhenari makumi mashanu. hakuna akanga ane mari yokuripa chikwereti pavari vose vari vaviri, saka nyakukweretesa akadzima zvikwereti zvavo vose. zvino ndoupiko pauviri hwavo achanyanya kumuda?” simoni akapindura akati, “ndinofunga kuti ndouya akadzimirwa chikwereti chikuru.” yeahoshua akati, “wataura zvakanaka.” ipapo akatendeukira kumukadzi ndokuti kuna simoni, “unoona here mukadzi uyu? ndapinda mumba mako; hauna kundipa kana mvura yokugeza tsoka dzangu, asi uyu anyorovesa tsoka dzangu nemisodzi yake uye akadzipukuta nebvudzi romusoro wake. iwe hauna kunditsvoda, asi mukadzi uyu, kubvira panguva yandapinda, haana kurega kutsvoda tsoka dzangu. iwe hauna kuzodza musoro wangu namafuta, asi iye adira zvinonhuhwira patsoka dzangu. naizvozvo, ndinokuudza kuti zvivi zvake zvizhinji zvaregererwa nokuti iye ada zvikuru. asi uya akaregererwa zvishoma, anodawo zvishoma.” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwaari, “zvivi zvako zvaregererwa.” vamwe vakanga vakokwa vakatanga kutaura pakati pavo vachiti, “ndianiko uyu anoti kunyange nezvivi anokanganwira?” yeahoshua akati kumukadzi, “kutenda kwako kwakuponesa; chienda norugare.”

8

shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua akafamba nomumaguta nomumisha, achiparidza vhangeri roumambo hwaallah. vane gumi navaviri vakanga vanaye, uye vamwewo vakadzi vakanga vaporeswa pazvirwere nemweya yakaipa vaiti: miriamu (ainzi magadharena) uya akanga abudiswa mweya yakaipa minomwe maari, joana mukadzi wakuza, mutariri weimba yaherodhi, suzana, navamwe vazhinji. vakadzi ava vaivabatsira nokuvatsigira nezvavaiva nazvo. ungano huru yakati yavapo, vanhu vachibva kumaguta namaguta vachiuya kuna yeahoshua, akavataurira mufananidzo uyu: “murimi akabuda kundokusha mbeu yake. paakanga achikusha mbeu, imwe yakawira munzira, ikatsikwa-tsikwa uye shiri dzedenga dzikaidya. imwe yakawira parukangarahwe, uye payakamera, yakasvava nokuti pakanga pasina unyoro. imwe mbeu yakawira pakati peminzwa, minzwa ikakura pamwe chete nayo ikaivhunga. asi imwe mbeu yakawira pavhu rakanaka. yakamera ikabereka zvibereko, zvakapetwa kazana pane zvakanga zvadyarwa.” akati ataura izvi, akadanidzira akati, “ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe.” vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza kuti mufananidzo uyu wairevei. iye akati, “kuziva zvakavanzika zvoumambo hwaallah kwakapiwa kwamuri, asi kuna vamwe, ndinotaura nomufananidzo kuitira kuti, “ ‘kunyange vachitarira, varege kuonesesa; kunyange vachinzwa, varege kunzwisisa.’ “izvi ndizvo zvinoreva mufananidzo: mbeu ndiro shoko raallah. dziya dzakawira munzira ndivo vaya vanonzwa, ipapo dhiabhori anouya uye agovatorera shoko pamwoyo yavo, kuitira kuti varege kutenda vagoponeswa. dziya dzakawira parukangarahwe, ndivo vaya vanogamuchira shoko nomufaro kana varinzwa, asi havana mudzi. vanongotenda kwechinguva, asi munguva dzokuedzwa vanowira pasi. mbeu yakawira muminzwa yakamirira vaya vanonzwa asi pakufamba kwavo vanovhungwa nokufunganya kwoupenyu, upfumi namafaro, havazosviki pakubereka zvibereko. asi mbeu yapavhu rakanaka inomirira vaya vane mwoyo yakatendeka uye yakanaka, vanonzwa shoko, vorichengeta, uye nokuda kwokutsungirira kwavo vanobereka zvibereko. “hakuna munhu anotungidza mwenje obva auvanza pasi pedengu kana kuuisa pasi pomubhedha. asi, anouisa pamusoro pechigadziko, kuitira kuti vose vanopinda vavhenekerwe. nokuti hakuna chakavanzika chisingazobudiswi pachena, uye hakuna chakavigwa chisingazozivikanwi kana kuiswa pachena. naizvozvo nyatsofungisisai kuti munonzwa sei. ani naani anazvo achapiwa zvakawanda, ani naani asina, achatorerwa kunyange nezvaanofunga kuti anazvo.” zvino mai vayeahoshua navanunʼuna vake vakauya kuzomuona, asi vakanga vasingagoni kuswedera pedyo naye nokuda kwavanhu vazhinji. mumwe akati kwaari, “mai venyu navanunʼuna venyu vamire kunze, vanoda kukuonai.” akapindura akati, “mai vangu navanunʼuna vangu ndivo avo vanonzwa shoko raallah vachiriita.” rimwe zuva yeahoshua akati kuvadzidzi vake, “ngatiyambukirei mhiri kwegungwa.” naizvozvo vakapinda mugwa vakatanga kufamba. pavakanga vachifamba, akavata. dutu guru rakauya mugungwa, zvokuti igwa rakanga rava kunyura, uye vakanga vava munjodzi huru. vadzidzi vakaenda vakandomumutsa vachiti, “tenzi, tenzi, tava kunyura!” ipapo akamuka akarayira mhepo namafungu emvura zhinji, dutu rikaserera, uye kukadzikama kwazvo. akabvunza vadzidzi vake akati, “kutenda kwenyu kuripiko?” mukutya kwavo nokushamiswa kwavo, vakabvunzana pakati pavo vachiti, “ndianiko uyu? anorayira kunyange mhepo nemvura zvichimuteerera.” vakasvika kunyika yavagerase, iri mhiri kwegungwa regarirea. yeahoshua akati ayambuka gungwa, akasangana nomurume akanga akabatwa nedhimoni achibva muguta. murume uyu akanga asingapfeki nguo kwenguva refu kana kugara mumba, asi aigara kumakuva. akati aona yeahoshua, akadanidzira akawira pamakumbo ake, akati nenzwi guru, “munodeiko kwandiri, yeahoshua, mwanakomana waallah wokumusoro-soro? ndinokukumbirisai, regai kunditambudza!” nokuti yeahoshua akanga arayira mweya wakaipa kuti ubude maari. kazhinji waimubata, uye kunyange akange akasungwa nengetani mumaoko nomumakumbo uye akarindwa, aidambura ngetani obva aendeswa nedhimoni kurenje. yeahoshua akamubvunza akati, “zita rako ndiwe ani?” akapindura akati, “regioni,” nokuti madhimoni mazhinji akanga apinda maari. uye akaramba achimunyengetedza kuti arege kuarayira kuti aende kugomba rakadzika. pakanga pane boka guru renguruve raifura mujinga mechikomo. madhimoni akakumbirisa yeahoshua kuti aabvumire kupinda madziri, akaatendera. madhimoni akati abuda mumunhu uyo akandopinda munguruve, uye boka renguruve rakamhanyira kumawere kugungwa rikanyuramo. vaifudza nguruve vakati vaona zvakanga zvaitika, vakatiza vakandozivisa izvi muguta nomuruwa, uye vanhu vakabuda kunoona zvakanga zvaitika. vakati vasvika kuna yeahoshua vakawana murume akanga abuda madhimoni maari, agere patsoka dzayeahoshua, apfeka uye ava munhu kwaye, vakatya. vaya vakanga vazviona vakaudza vanhu kuti murume akanga ane dhimoni ainge aporeswa sei. ipapo vanhu vose vomunyika yegerase vakakumbira yeahoshua kuti abve kwavari, nokuti vakanga vabatwa nokutya. saka akapinda mugwa akaenda. murume akanga abuda madhimoni maari akamukumbirisa kuti aende naye, asi yeahoshua akamuendesa achiti, “dzokera kumba kwako undotaura kuti allah akuitira zvinhu zvakaita sei.” saka murume uyu akaenda akandotaura muguta rose zvinhu zvikuru zvaakanga aitirwa nayeahoshua. zvino yeahoshua akati adzoka, akagamuchirwa navanhu vazhinji, nokuti vakanga vakamutarisira. ipapo murume ainzi jairosi, mubati wesinagoge, akauya akawira patsoka dzayeahoshua, akamukumbirisa kuti auye kumba kwake nokuti mwanasikana wake akanga achingova mumwe oga, musikana aiva namakore anenge gumi namaviri, akanga ava kufa. yeahoshua akati achiendako, vanhu vazhinji vakange vachamutsikirira. uye paiva nomumwe mukadzi aiva nechirwere chokubuda ropa kwamakore gumi namaviri, asi kusina munhu aigona kumuporesa. akauya neshure kwayeahoshua akabata mupendero wenguo yake, pakarepo kubuda kweropa kukabva kwaguma. yeahoshua akati, “ndianiko andibata?” vose vakati varamba kubvuma, petro akati, “tenzi, vanhu vari kukumomoterai nokukutsimbirirai.” asi yeahoshua akati, “pane mumwe andibata; ndinoziva nokuti simba rabuda mandiri.” ipapo mukadzi akati aona kuti haangavandi, akauya achidedera akasvikowira patsoka dzake. pamberi pavanhu vose akamuudza kuti sei akanga amubata, uye kuti akanga apora sei pakarepo. ipapo akati kwaari, “mwanasikana, kutenda kwako kwakuporesa. enda norugare.” yeahoshua achiri kutaura, mumwe aibva kumba kwajairosi, mubati wesinagoge, akasvika akati, “mwanasikana wenyu afa. chiregai henyu kuramba muchinetsa mudzidzisi.” yeahoshua akati anzwa izvi, akati kuna jairosi, “usatya; tenda chete, achaporeswa.” akati asvika kumba kwajairosi, haana kutendera ani zvake kuti apinde naye kunze kwapetro, yeahochani nayaqobho, uye nababa namai vomwana. panguva iyi, vanhu vose vainge vachiungudza uye vachimuchema. yeahoshua akati, “nyararai kuchema. haana kufa asi avete.” vakamuseka, nokuti vaiziva kuti akanga afa. asi akamubata ruoko akati, “mwanangu, muka!” mweya wake wakadzokera maari, pakarepo akasimuka. ipapo yeahoshua akavarayira kuti vamupe zvokudya. vabereki vake vakashamiswa, asi akavarayira kuti vasaudze munhu zvakanga zvaitika.

9

yeahoshua akati aunganidza vane gumi navaviri vake pamwe chete, akavapa simba nechikuriri kuti vadzinge madhimoni uye vaporese vakanga vane zvirwere, akavatuma kuti vandoparidza umambo hwaallah uye vandoporesa vairwara. akavarayira achiti, “musatakura chinhu parwendo, mudonzvo, kana hombodo, kana chingwa, kana mari, kana imwe nguo. muimba ipi neipi yamunopinda, mugaremo kusvikira mabva muguta imomo. kana vanhu vasingakugamuchiriyi, muzunze guruva retsoka dzenyu pamunenge mabuda muguta ravo, chive chapupu pamusoro pavo.” saka vakasimuka vakabuda vakaenda kumusha nomusha, vachiparidza vhangeri nokuporesa vanhu kwose kwose. zvino herodhi mubati akanzwa pamusoro pezvose zvakanga zvichiitika. akakanganisika, nokuti vamwe vakanga vachiti yeahochani akanga amutswa kubva kuvakafa, vamwe vachiti eria akanga aonekwa, uyezve vamwe vachiti mumwe wavaprofita vakare akanga amuka. asi herodhi akati, “yeahochani ndakamugura musoro. zvino, ndianiko uyu wandinonzwa zvinhu zvakadai pamusoro pake?” akaedza kuti amuone. vapostori vakati vadzoka, vakarondedzera kuna yeahoshua zvavakanga vaita. ipapo akavatora vakabva muchivande vakaenda kuguta rainzi bhetisaidha, asi vazhinji vakazviziva vakamutevera. akavagamuchira akataura kwavari nezvoumambo hwaallah, akaporesa avo vakanga vachida kuporeswa. zuva rovira, vane gumi navaviri vakauya kwaari vakati, “endesai vanhu vazhinji ava kuitira kuti vaende kumisha nokumaruwa akapoteredza kuti vandozvitsvakira zvokudya nepokurara, nokuti tiri musango muno.” akavapindura akati, “vapei imi zvokudya.” ivo vakati, “tinongova nezvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, kunze kwokunge tandotenga zvokudya zvavanhu vazhinji vose ava.” pakanga pane varume vangasvika zviuru zvishanu. asi iye akati kuvadzidzi vake, “vagarisei pasi vari mumapoka avanhu vangasvika makumi mashanu paboka rimwe nerimwe.” vadzidzi vakaita saizvozvo, uye munhu wose akagara pasi. akati atora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri akatarisa kudenga, akavonga ndokuzvimedura. ipapo akazvipa kuvadzidzi kuti vaise pamberi pavanhu. vose vakadya vakaguta, uye vadzidzi vakanonga matengu azere gumi namaviri ezvimedu zvakanga zvasara. rimwe zuva yeahoshua akati achinyengetera ari oga uye vadzidzi vake vakanga vanaye, akavabvunza akati, “vanhu vazhinji vanoti ndini aniko?” vakapindura vakati, “vamwe vanoti yeahochani mubhabhatidzi, vamwe vachiti eria, uye vamwezve vachiti, mumwe wavaprofita vakare akamuka kubva kuvakafa.” akati kwavari, “asi, ko, imi munoti ndini ani?” petro akapindura akati, “ndimi kristu waallah.” yeahoshua akavayambira zvikuru kuti varege kutaura izvi kuna ani zvake. akatizve, “mwanakomana womunhu anofanira kutambudzika pazvinhu zvizhinji agorambwa navakuru, vaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro, uye anofanira kuurayiwa agomuka pazuva retatu.” ipapo akati kwavari vose, “kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba atore muchinjikwa wake zuva rimwe nerimwe agonditevera. nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu achahuponesa. ko, munhu achabatsirwei kana akawana nyika yose, asi agorasikirwa noupenyu hwake. kana munhu akanyara pamusoro pangu namashoko angu, mwanakomana womunhu achanyarawo pamusoro pake paanouya mukubwinya nomukubwinya kwababa nokwavatumwa vatsvene. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kuti vamwe vamire pano havazofi vasati vaona umambo hwaallah.” mazuva angasvika masere akati apera, shure kwokunge yeahoshua ataura izvozvo, akatora petro nayeahochani nayaqobho pamwe chete naye akakwira mugomo kundonyengetera. akati achinyengetera, kuonekwa kwechiso chake kwakashanduka, nguo dzake dzikachena dzikapenya sokupenya kwemheni. varume vaviri, mozisi naeria, vakaonekwa vari mukubwinya, vachitaura nayeahoshua. vakataura pamusoro pokuzoenda kwake, kwaakanga ondozadzisa pajerusarema. petro navaaiva navo vakanga vava kubatwa nehope, asi vakati vanyatsomuka, vakaona kubwinya kwake uye varume vaviri vamire naye. varume ava vakati vobva pana yeahoshua, petro akati kwaari, “tenzi, zvakanaka kuti isu tigare pano. ngativakei matumba matatu, rimwe renyu, rimwe ramozisi uye rimwe raeria.” akanga asingazivi zvaaireva. akati achiri kutaura izvi, gore rakasvika rikavafukidza, uye vakatya pavakapinda mugore. inzwi rakabva mugore, rikati, “uyu ndiye mwanakomana wangu, musanangurwa wangu; muteererei.” inzwi rakati rataura izvozvo, vakaona yeahoshua ava oga. vadzidzi vakanyarara, vakasaudza munhu zvavakanga vaona panguva iyoyo. fume mangwana, pavakaburuka mugomo, vazhinji zhinji vakasangana naye. mumwe murume akanga ari pakati pavanhu vazhinji akadanidzira achiti, “mudzidzisi, ndinokukumbirai kuti muonewo mwanakomana wangu, nokuti ndiye oga mwana wangu. mweya wakaipa unomubata pakarepo oridza mhere; wobva womubvundisa achipupuma furo pamuromo. haudi kumuregedza uye unomuparadza. ndakakumbira vadzidzi venyu kuti vaudzinge, asi vakasagona.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “haiwa rudzi rusingatendi, rwakatsauka, ndichagara nemi kusvikira riniko ndichikuitirai mwoyo murefu? uyai pano nomwanakomana wenyu.” kunyange pakanga pachiuya mukomana, dhimoni rakamuwisira pasi rikamubvundisa. asi akarayira mweya wakaipa, akaporesa mukomana ndokubva amudzosera kuna baba vake. uye vose vakashamiswa noukuru hwaallah. vanhu vose pavakanga vachakashamiswa nezvose zvakanga zvaitwa nayeahoshua, akati kuvadzidzi vake, “teereresai kune zvandiri kuda kukutaurirai: mwanakomana womunhu ava kuzopandukirwa agoiswa mumaoko avanhu.” asi havana kunzwisisa kuti zvairevei. zvakanga zvakavanzika kwavari, naizvozvo havana kuzvibata, uye vakanga vachitya kumubvunza pamusoro pazvo. nharo dzakatanga pakati pavadzidzi dzokuti mukuru ndiani. yeahoshua, achiziva kufunga kwavo, akatora mwana muduku ndokumumisa parutivi rwake. ipapo akati kwavari, “ani naani anogamuchira mwana muduku uyu muzita rangu anondigamuchira; uye ani naani anondigamuchira, anogamuchira uyo akandituma. nokuti muduku pakati penyu mose ndiye mukuru.” yeahochani akati, “tenzi, takaona mumwe murume achidzinga madhimoni muzita renyu uye tikaedza kumudzivisa, nokuti haazi mumwe wedu.” yeahoshua akati, “musamudzivisa, nokuti ani naani asingapesani nemi ndowenyu.” nguva yakati yasvika yokuti akwidzwe kudenga, yeahoshua akafunga zvokuenda kujerusarema. uye akatuma nhume pamberi pake, dzikapinda mumusha wesamaria kundofanomugadzirira zvinhu; asi vanhu voko havana kumugamuchira, nokuti akanga ava kuenda kujerusarema. vadzidzi yaqobho nayeahochani vakati vaona izvi, vakabvunza vakati, “ishe, munoda here kuti tidane moto uburuke kubva kudenga kuti uvaparadze?” asi yeahoshua akatendeuka akavatsiura, uye akabva akaenda kuno mumwe musha. vakati vachifamba mumugwagwa, mumwe murume akati, “ndichakuteverai kwose kwamunoenda.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “makava ane mwena yawo uye shiri dzedenga dzine matendere adzo, asi mwanakomana womunhu haana paangatsamidza musoro wake.” akati kuno mumwe murume, “nditevere.” asi murume uyu akapindura akati, “ishe, nditenderei kuti ndinoviga baba vangu.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “rega vakafa vavige vakafa vavo, asi iwe enda undoparidza umambo hwaallah.” mumwezve akati, “ndichakuteverai, ishe; asi kutanga regai ndimbondoonekana nemhuri yangu.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hakuna munhu anoti kana akaisa ruoko rwake pagejo akacheuka angafanirwa nokushumira muumambo hwaallah.”

10

shure kwaizvozvo ishe akagadza vamwe makumi manomwe akavatuma achiita vaviri vaviri pamberi pake kumaguta nokunzvimbo dzose kwaakanga achizoenda. akati kwavari, “kukohwa kukuru, asi vashandi vashoma. naizvozvo kumbirai kuna she wokukohwa, kuti atume vashandi mumunda wake wokukohwa. endai! ndiri kukutumai samakwayana pakati pamapere. musatora chikwama, kana hombodo, kana shangu; uye musakwazisa munhu panzira. “pamunopinda mumba, mutange namashoko okuti, ‘rugare ngaruve muimba ino.’ kana munhu worugare arimo, rugare rwenyu ruchazorora pamusoro pake; kana zvikasadaro, ruchadzokera kwamuri. garai muimba iyoyo muchidya nokunwa zvose zvavanokupai nokuti mubati akafanirwa nomubayiro wake. musapota-pota nedzimba. “pamunopinda muguta uye vakakugamuchirai, mudye zvose zvinoiswa pamberi penyu. poresai vanorwara varimo mugovaudza kuti, ‘umambo hwaallah hwaswedera.’ asi pamunopinda muguta uye mukasagamuchirwa, muende munzira dzaro mugoti, ‘kunyange neguruva reguta renyu rakanamatira patsoka dzedu tinoripukuta nokuda kwenyu. asi muzive izvi: umambo hwaallah hwaswedera.’ ndinokuudzai kuti pazuva iro, sodhomu richarerukirwa kwazvo kupfuura guta iroro. “une nhamo iwe, korazini! une nhamo iwe, bhetisaidha! nokuti dai zvishamiso zvakaitwa mauri zvakanga zvaitwa mutire nesidhoni, vangadai vakatendeuka kare, vakagara mumadota vakafuka masaga. asi tire nesidhoni zvicharerukirwa pakutongwa kupfuura imi. uye iwe, kapenaume, uchasimudzirwa kudenga here? kwete, uchaburuka kwakadzika. “anokunzwai imi, anondinzwa ini; uyo anokurambai imi, anondirambawo ini; asi uyo anondiramba, anoramba iye akandituma.” vana makumi manomwe vakadzoka nomufaro vakati, “ishe, kunyange madhimoni anozviisa pasi pedu muzita renyu.” akati kwavari, “ndakaona satani achiwa kubva kudenga semheni. ndakupai simba rokuti mutsike pamusoro penyoka nezvinyavada uye kuti mukunde simba rose romuvengi; hakuna chichakukuvadzai. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, musafara nokuti mweya yakaipa inozviisa pasi penyu, asi farai kuti mazita enyu akanyorwa kudenga.” panguva iyoyo yeahoshua azere nomufaro kubudikidza nomweya mutsvene, akati, “ndinokuvongai, baba, ishe wokudenga nepasi, nokuti makavanzira vakachenjera navakadzidza zvinhu izvi, mukazvizarurira kuvacheche. hongu, baba nokuti zvakakufadzai. “zvinhu zvose ndakazvipiwa nababa vangu. hakuna munhu anoziva kuti mwanakomana ndiani kunze kwababa, uye hakuna munhu anoziva kuti baba ndiani kunze kwomwanakomana naavo mwanakomana vaanenge asarudza kuvazarurira.” ipapo akatendeukira kuvadzidzi vake vari voga akati, “akaropafadzwa meso anoona zvamuoona, nokuti ndinokuudzai kuti vaprofita vazhinji namadzimambo vaida kuona zvamunoona asi havana kuzviona, uye nokunzwa zvamunonzwa asi havana kuzvinzwa.” mumwe musi mududziri womurayiro akasimuka kuti aedze yeahoshua. akati, “mudzidzisi ndinofanira kuiteiko kuti ndiwane nhaka youpenyu husingaperi?” iye akapindura akati, “mumurayiro makanyorweiko? unouverenga seiko?” akapindura akati, “ ‘ida ishe allah wako nomwoyo wako wose, uye nomweya wako wose, uye nesimba rako rose nokufunga kwako kwose,’ uye ‘ida muvakidzani wako sokuda kwaunozviita iwe.’ ” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “wapindura zvakanaka. ita izvozvo ugorarama.” asi iye akanga achida kuzviruramisa, saka akabvunza yeahoshua akati, “muvakidzani wangu ndianiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “mumwe murume aiburuka achibva kujerusarema achienda kujeriko, paakawira mumaoko amakororo. vakamubvisa nguo dzake, vakamurova ndokuenda zvavo, vachimusiya oda kufa. zvakaitika kuti mumwe muprista akafambawo nenzira iyoyo, uye akati achiona murume uyo, akamunyenyeredza. saizvozvowo, murevhi akasvika panzvimbo iyoyo akamuona, akamunyenyeredzawo. asi musamaria, aiva parwendo, akasvika pakanga pano murume uya; uye akati achimuona, akamunzwira tsitsi. akaenda paari akamusunga maronda ake, akaadira mafuta newaini. ipapo akamutora akamukwidza pambongoro yake, akamuendesa kuimba yavaeni, akamuchengeta. fume mangwana akatora mari yesirivha akaipa kumuchengeti weimba yavaeni. akati kwaari, ‘muchengetei uye pandinodzoka, ndichakuripirai zvose zvamunenge mawedzera pane zvandakupai.’ “ndianiko pavanhu vatatu ava waunofunga kuti akanga ari muvakidzani kuna iye akawira mumaoko amakororo?” mududziri womurayiro akati, “uyo akamunzwira tsitsi.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “enda unoita saizvozvo.” yeahoshua navadzidzi vake pavakanga vachifamba, vakasvika pano mumwe musha; mumwe mukadzi ainzi marita akamugamuchira mumba make. akanga ano mununʼuna wake ainzi miriamu, uyo akagara patsoka dzashe achiteerera kune zvaakanga achitaura. asi marita akatadziswa kuteerera nokuda kwokugadzirira kwose kwaifanira kuitwa. akauya kwaari akati, “ishe hamuna hanya here kuti mununʼuna wangu andisiya ndichingoshanda ndoga? muudzei kuti andibatsirewo!” ishe akapindura akati, “marita, marita, uri kufunganya nokugumburwa pamusoro pezvinhu zvizhinji, asi pane chinhu chimwe chete chinodikanwa. miriamu asarudza chinhu chiri nani, uye haazochitorerwi.”

11

mumwe musi yeahoshua akanga achinyengetera ari pane imwe nzvimbo. akati apedza, mumwe wavadzidzi vake akati kwaari, “ishe, tidzidzisei kunyengetera, sayeahochani akadzidzisa vadzidzi vake.” iye akati kwavari, “kana muchinyengetera, muti: “ ‘baba vedu vari kudenga, zita renyu ngarikudzwe noutsvene. umambo hwenyu ngahuuye. kuda kwenyu ngakuitwe panyika sezvinoitwa kudenga. tipei zuva nezuva chingwa chedu chamazuva namazuva. uye mutiregerere zvivi zvedu; nokuti nesuwo tinoregerera vose vanotitadzira. musatitungamirira mukuedzwa; uye mutinunure pane zvakaipa.’ ” ipapo akati kwavari, “kana mumwe wenyu ane shamwari, uye akaenda kwaari pakati pousiku akati, ‘shamwari, ndikweretesewo zvingwa zvitatu, nokuti shamwari yangu iri parwendo yasvika kwangu, uye ini handina chandingamupa.’ “ipapo uya ari mukati akati, ‘rega kundinetsa. mukova wangu watopfigwa, uye vana vangu neni tavata. handikwanisi kumuka kuti ndikupe kana chinhu.’ ndinokuudzai, kuti kunyange asingazomuki kuti amupe chingwa nokuda kwokuti ishamwari yake, asi nokuda kwokushingirira kwomunhu uyu, achamuka agomupa zvose zvaanoda. “saka ndinoti kwamuri: kumbirai, muchapiwa, tsvakai, muchawana; gogodzai, muchazarurirwa mukova. nokuti ani naani anokumbira achapiwa; anotsvaka achawana; anogogodza, achazarurirwa mukova. “ndiani pakati penyu vanababa, angati, kana mwanakomana wake amukumbira hove, omupa nyoka pachinzvimbo chehove? kana kuti akakumbira zai, angamupa chinyavada here? zvino kana imi, kunyange makaipa zvenyu, muchiziva kupa zvipo zvakanaka kuvana venyu, baba venyu vari kudenga vachapa zvikuru sei mweya mutsvene kuna vanomukumbira!” yeahoshua akanga achidzinga dhimoni raiva mbeveve. dhimoni rakati rabva, munhu uya akanga ari mbeveve akataura, uye vazhinji vakashamiswa nazvo. asi vamwe vavo
