munotarisireiko kwatiri sokunge taita kuti murume uyu afambe nokuda kwesimba redu kana nokuda kwokururama kwedu? allah waabhurahama, isaka nayaqobho, allah wamadzibaba edu, akudza muranda wake yeahoshua. makamuendesa kundourayiwa, uye imi makamuramba pamberi papirato, kunyange akanga afunga kumuregedza hake. makaramba iye mutsvene naiye akarurama oga uye mukakumbira kuti mhondi isunungurwe. makauraya muvambi woupenyu, asi allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa. isu tiri zvapupu zvezvinhu izvi. nokutenda muzita rayeahoshua, munhu uyu wamunoona uye wamunoziva, asimbiswa. izita rayeahoshua uye nokutenda kunouya kubudikidza naye kwauyisa kuporeswa uku kwaari, sezvamunoona imi mose. “zvino, hama dzangu, ndinoziva kuti makaita nokusaziva sezvakangoitawo vatungamiri venyu. asi ndiwo mazadzisiro akaita allah zvaakataura kare kubudikidza navaprofita vose, achitaura kuti kristu wake aizotambudzika. naizvozvo, tendeukai zvino, mudzokere kuna allah, kuitira kuti zvivi zvenyu zvidzimwe, kuti nguva dzokuvandudzwa dzinobva kuna she dzisvike uye kuti atume kristu, iye akagadzwa nokuda kwenyu, iye yeahoshua. anofanira kumboramba ari kudenga kusvikira nguva yokuti allah avandudze zvinhu zvose yasvika, sezvaakavimbisa kare kare kubudikidza navaprofita vake vatsvene. nokuti mozisi akati, ‘ishe allah wenyu achakumutsirai muprofita akafanana neni kubva pakati pavanhu venyu chaivo; munofanira kuteerera zvose zvaanokuudzai. ani naani zvake asingamuteereri achaparadzwa kwazvo pakati pavanhu vokwake.’ “zvirokwazvo, vaprofita vose kubva kuna samueri zvichienda mberi, vazhinji vavo vakataura, vakaprofita nezvamazuva ano. imi muri vadyi venhaka yavaprofita neyesungano yakaitwa naallah namadzibaba enyu. akati kuna abhurahama, ‘marudzi ose apanyika acharopafadzwa kubudikidza navana vako.’ allah akati amutsa muranda wake, akatanga kumutuma kwamuri kuti akuropafadzei nokukutendeutsai mumwe nomumwe wenyu kubva panzira dzenyu dzakaipa.”

4

vaprista nomukuru wavarindi vetemberi navasadhusi vakauya kuna petro nayeahochani pavakanga vachiri kutaura navanhu. vakakanganisika zvikuru nokuti vapostori vakanga vachidzidzisa vanhu uye vachiparidza kumuka kwavakafa muna yeahoshua. vakabata petro nayeahochani, uye nokuda kwokuti aiva manheru, vakavaisa mujeri kusvikira zuva raitevera. asi vazhinji vakanzwa shoko vakatenda, uye varume vakasvika zviuru zvinenge zvishanu pauwandu. fume mangwana, vabati, vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro vakasangana mujerusarema. anasi muprista mukuru aivapo, uye kayafasi yeahochani, arekizanda navamwe varume vemhuri yomuprista mukuru vaivapowo. vakaita kuti petro nayeahochani vauyiswe pamberi pavo vakatanga kuvabvunza vachiti, “makaita izvi nesimba raani kana kuti nezita raani?” ipapo petro azere nomweya mutsvene, akati kwavari, “imi vabati nemi vakuru vavanhu, kana tadanwa nhasi nokuda kwebasa rakanaka rakaitwa kuchirema uye tichibvunzwa kuti akaporeswa sei, zvino muzive izvi, imi navanhu vose veisraeri kuti: zvakaitwa nezita rayeahoshua kristu wenazareta, iye wamakaroverera pamuchinjikwa asi allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, ndiye aita kuti murume uyu amire pamberi penyu apora kudai. ndiye “ ‘ibwe ramakaramba imi vavaki, rakazova musoro wekona.’ ruponeso haruwanikwi kuna ani zvake, nokuti hakuna rimwe zita pasi pedenga rakapiwa kuvanhu ratingaponeswa naro.” vakati vachiona kusatya kwapetro nayeahochani uye vachiziva kuti vakanga vasina kudzidza, vachingova vanhuwo zvavo, vakakatyamara uye vakarangarira kuti varume ava vaiva nayeahoshua. asi vachiona murume akanga aporeswa amire navo ipapo, havana chavakagona kutaura. saka vakavarayira kuti vabve padare guru, uye ivo vakasara vachitaurirana. vakati, “tichaita seiko navarume ava? munhu wose anogara mujerusarema anoziva kuti vakaita chishamiso chikuru uye isu hatigoni kuzviramba. asi kuti chinhu ichi chirege kuramba chichipararira pakati pavanhu, tinofanira kuyambira varume ava kuti varege kutaura kuna ani zvake muzita iri.” ipapo vakavadanazve kuti vapinde ndokuvarayira kuti varege kutaura kana kutongodzidzisa muzita rayeahoshua. asi petro nayeahochani vakapindura vakati, “tongai henyu imi kana zvakarurama pamberi paallah kuti titeerere imi kupfuura allah. nokuti isu hatigoni kurega kutaura pamusoro pezvatakaona nezvatakanzwa.” shure kwokuvayambirazve vakavarega vakaenda. havana kugona kufunga kuti vangavaranga sei, nokuti vanhu vose vakanga vachirumbidza allah pamusoro pezvakanga zvaitika. nokuti murume akanga aporeswa nechishamiso akanga ana makore anodarika makumi mana. vakati vasunungurwa, petro nayeahochani vakadzokera kuvanhu vokwavo vakandovaudza zvose zvakanga zvarehwa navaprista vakuru navakuru. vakati vanzwa izvi, vakasimudza manzwi pamwe chete kuna allah vakanyengetera vachiti, “ishe allah, imi makaita denga nenyika negungwa, nezvose zvirimo. makataura nomweya mutsvene kubudikidza nomuromo womuranda wenyu, baba vedu dhavhidhi, muchiti: “ ‘ndudzi dzinoitireko hasha uye vanhu vanofungireiko zvisina maturo? madzimambo enyika azvigadzirira uye vabati vanoungana pamwe chete kuzorwa naishe uye nomuzodziwa wake.’ zvirokwazvo herodhi napondiasi pirato vakaungana pamwe chete nevedzimwe ndudzi uye navanhu veisraeri muguta rino kuzorangana kurwisa yeahoshua muranda wenyu mutsvene, iye wamakazodza. vakaita zvakanga zvatongwa nesimba renyu uye nokuda kwenyu kuti zvichaitika. zvino, ishe, tarirai kutyisidzira kwavo mugobatsira varanda venyu kuti vataure shoko renyu nokushinga kukuru. tambanudzai ruoko rwenyu kuti muporese uye muite zviratidzo nezvishamiso kubudikidza nezita rayeahoshua muranda wenyu mutsvene.” shure kwokunge vanyengetera, nzvimbo yavakanga vakaungana pairi yakazungunuswa. uye vose vakazadzwa nomweya mutsvene vakataura shoko raallah vasingatyi. vatendi vose vakanga vano mwoyo mumwe nendangariro imwe. hakuna aiti chimwe chezvaaiva nazvo ndechake oga, asi vakagovana zvose zvavakanga vanazvo. vapostori vakaramba vachipupura nesimba kumuka kwaishe yeahoshua, uye nyasha huru dzaiva pamusoro pavo. pakanga pasina vanoshayiwa pakati pavo. nokuti nguva nenguva vaya vakanga vane minda kana dzimba vakazvitengesa, vakauyisa mari yezvavakatengesa vakazviisa patsoka dzavapostori, uye yakagoverwa kuna ani zvake sokushayiwa kwake. yosefa, murevhi aibva kusaipurasi, uyo akatumidzwa navapostori kunzi bhanabhasi (kureva kuti mwanakomana wokukurudzira), akatengesa munda wake akauya nemari akaiisa pamberi pavapostori.

5

zvino mumwe murume ainzi ananiasi, pamwe chete nomukadzi wake safira, akatengesawo chikamu chepfuma yake. mukadzi wake achinyatsozvizivawo, akazvikamurira chimwe chikamu chemari, asi yakasara akauya nayo akaiisa pamberi pavapostori. ipapo petro akati, “ananiasi, satani azadzireiko mwoyo wako kudai, kuti usvike pakureva nhema kumweya mutsvene uye wazvikamurira imwe mari yawawana pakutengesa munda? ko, wakanga usiri wako here usati watengeswa? uye shure kwokunge wautengesa, mari yakanga isiri yako here? chiiko chakaita kuti ufunge kuita chinhu chakadai? hauna kureva nhema kuvanhu asi kuna allah.” ananiasi akati anzwa izvi, akawira pasi akabva afa. uye kutya kukuru kwakabata vose vakanga vanzwa zvakanga zvaitika. ipapo majaya akaswedera, akaputira muviri wake, akamutakura akaenda naye kunze vakandomuviga. shure kwamaawa anenge matatu mukadzi wake akasvikopinda, asingazivi zvakanga zvaitika. petro akamubvunza akati, “ndiudze, uyu ndiwo here mutengo wamakawana, iwe naananiasi, pamunda?” iye akati, “hongu, ndiwoyu mutengo.” petro akati kwaari, “matenderana seiko kuti muedze mweya washe? tarira! tsoka dzamajaya aviga murume wako dziri pamukova, uye vachakutakura newewo.” pakarepo akawira pasi, patsoka dzake akabva afa. ipapo majaya akapinda uye akamuwana afa, akamutakura akaenda naye kunze akandomuviga parutivi pomurume wake. kutya kukuru kwakabata kereke yose navose vakanzwa zvinhu izvi. vapostori vakaita zviratidzo zvizhinji nezvishamiso pakati pavanhu. uye vatendi vose vaiwanzosangana pamwe chete mubiravira rasoromoni. hakuna munhu akatsunga kubatana navo kunyange zvazvo vakanga vachikudzwa zvikuru navanhu. zvisinei zvazvo, varume vazhinji navakadzi vakatenda kuna she uye vakawedzera uwandu. nokuda kwaizvozvo, vanhu vakauya navairwara munzira dzomumisha vakavaradzika pamibhedha napahukwe vachiitira kuti mumvuri wapetro uwire pane vamwe vavo paainge ava kupfuura napavari. vanhu vazhinji zhinji vaibva mumaguta akapoteredza jerusarema vakaunganawo, vakauya navarwere vavo navaya vaitambudzwa nemweya yakaipa, uye vose vakaporeswa. ipapo muprista mukuru navamwe vose vaaiva navo, avo vakanga vari nhengo dzebato ravasadhusi, vakazadzwa negodo. vakasunga vapostori vakavaisa mujeri. asi mutumwa washe akauya usiku akazarura mukova wejeri akavabudisa, akati, “endai, mundomira muzvivanze zvetemberi, mugoudza vanhu mashoko ose oupenyu hutsva uhu.” vakapinda mutemberi mangwanani, sezvavakanga vaudzwa, vakatanga kudzidzisa vanhu. muprista mukuru navamwe vake vakati vasvika, vakaunganidza dare guru ramakurukota, ungano yose yavakuru, vakatumira vanhu kuti vandotora vapostori kujeri. asi vabati vakati vasvika pajeri, vakawana vasimo. saka vakadzokera vakasvikoti, “tawana jeri rakanyatsozarirwa, navarindi vamire pamikova; asi patazarura, hatina kuwana munhu mukati.” vakati vanzwa chiziviso ichi, mukuru wavarindi vetemberi navaprista vakuru vakakanganisika, vachishaya kuti chii chaizoitika. ipapo mumwe akasvika akati, “tarirai! varume vamakaisa mujeri vamire mutemberi vachidzidzisa vanhu.” paakazvinzwa, mukuru wavarindi akabva aenda navabati vake akandouya navapostori. havana kuzviita nokumanikidza, nokuti vaitya kuti vanhu vangavatake namabwe. vakati vauya navapostori, vakavamisa pamberi pedare guru kuti vabvunzwe nomuprista mukuru. akati, “takakurayirai zvakasimba kuti murege kudzidzisa muzita iri. asi mazadza jerusarema rose nedzidziso yenyu uye munoda kuti tive nemhosva yeropa romurume uyu.” petro navamwe vapostori vakapindura vachiti, “tinofanira kuteerera allah kukunda vanhu! allah wamadzibaba edu akamutsa yeahoshua kubva kuvakafa uyo wamakaita kuti aurayiwe nokumuturika pamuti. allah akamusimudzira kuruoko rwake rworudyi somuchinda nomuponesi kuti ape kutendeuka nokuregererwa kwezvivi kuvaisraeri. isu tiri zvapupu zvezvinhu izvi, uyewo nomweya mutsvene wakapiwa naallah kuna avo vanomuteerera.” vakati vanzwa izvi, vakashatirwa uye vakada kuvauraya. asi mumwe mufarisi ainzi gamarieri, mudzidzisi womurayiro, uyo aikudzwa navanhu vose, akasimuka pakati pedare akarayira kuti vanhu vambobudiswa panze kwechinguvana. ipapo akati kwavari, “imi varume veisraeri, nyatsofungai pamusoro pezvamuri kuda kuita kuvanhu ava. munguva yakapfuura, kwakambova natudhasi aizviti iye munhu mukuru, uye varume vanenge mazana mana vakamutevera. akaurayiwa, vose vaimutevera vakaparadzirwa, uye zvikaguma zvava pasina. shure kwake, yeahudhasi wegarirea akambovapowo pamazuva okuverengwa kwavanhu akatungamirira boka ravanhu mune zvokupanduka. naiyewo akaurayiwa, uye vose vaimutevera vakaparadzirwa. naizvozvo, panyaya iyi ndinokurayirai kuti: regai vanhu ava vakadaro! regai vaende! nokuti kana kufunga kwavo kuri kwomunhu, kuchaguma. asi kana kuchibva kuna allah, hamungagoni kukonesa vanhu ava; muchazoona kuti muri kurwa naallah.” kutaura kwake kwakavadzikamisa. vakadana vapostori kuti vapinde vakaita kuti varohwe. ipapo vakavarayira kuti varege kutaura muzita rayeahoshua, uye vakavaregedza. vapostori vakabva padare guru, vachifara nokuda kwokuti vakanga vanzi vakafanira kutambudzwa nokunyadziswa nokuda kwezita iri. zuva rimwe nerimwe havana kumborega kudzidzisa nokuparidza shoko rakanaka vari mutemberi nomudzimba nedzimba kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu.

6

mumazuva iwayo vadzidzi zvavakanga vachiwedzerwa pauwandu, vayeahudha vaitaura chigiriki vaiva pakati pavo vakagununʼuna pamusoro pavayeahudha vaitaura chihebheru nokuti chirikadzi dzavo dzaidarikwa pakugoverwa kwezvokudya zvemisi yose. saka vane gumi navaviri vakaunganidza vadzidzi vose pamwe chete vakati, “hazvingavi zvakanaka kwatiri kuti tirege ushumiri hweshoko raallah kuti tishande pamatafura. hama, sarudzai varume vanomwe pakati penyu vanozivikanwa kuti vakazadzwa nomweya nouchenjeri. isu tichaisa basa iri kwavari, uye ticharamba tiri pakunyengetera napaushumiri hweshoko.” shoko iri rakafadza boka rose. vakasarudza sitefani, murume akanga azere nokutenda uye nomweya mutsvene; uyezve firipi, pirokorasi, nikano, timoni, pamenasi, nanikorasi aibva kuandioki, akanga akatendeukira kuchitendero chechiyeahudha. vakaisa varume ava kuvapostori, ivo vakavanyengeterera vakaisa maoko pamusoro pavo. saka shoko raallah rakapararira. vadzidzi vakawanda kwazvo pajerusarema, uye boka guru ravaprista rakagamuchira kutenda. zvino sitefani, murume akanga azere nenyasha dzaallah nesimba, akaita zvishamiso zvikuru nezviratidzo pakati pavanhu. kusapindirana kwakamuka, kuchibva kunhengo dzesinagoge revokusununguka (ndiro raiva zita ravo), vayeahudha vokusairini nevokuarekizandiria pamwe chete namatunhu ekirikia neezhia. varume ava vakatanga kukakavadzana nasitefani, asi havana kugona kukunda uchenjeri hwake kana mweya waaitaura nawo. ipapo vakakurudzira vamwe varume muchivande kuti vati, “tanzwa sitefani achitaura mashoko okumhura mozisi naallah.” nokudaro vakamutsa mwoyo yavanhu navakuru uye navadzidzisi vomurayiro. vakabata sitefani vakamuuyisa pamberi pedare guru. vakabudisa zvapupu zvenhema, zvikati, “munhu uyu haamboregi kutaura zvakaipa pamusoro penzvimbo tsvene ino uye napamusoro pomurayiro. nokuti takamunzwa achiti yeahoshua uyu wenazareta achaparadza nzvimbo ino uye agoshandura tsika dzatakapiwa namozisi.” vose vakanga vagere mudare guru vakatarisisa sitefani vakaona kuti chiso chake chakanga chaita sechiso chomutumwa.

7

ipapo muprista mukuru akamubvunza akati, “izvi zvauri kupomerwa ndezvechokwadi here?” iye akapindura achiti, “hama dzangu nemi madzibaba, nditeererei! allah wokubwinya akazviratidza kuna baba vedu abhurahama paakanga achiri kumesopotamia, asati agara muharani. allah akati kwaari, ‘ibva munyika yako nokuhama dzako, uende kunyika yandichakuratidza.’ “saka akabva munyika yavakaradhea akandogara muharani. shure kwokufa kwababa vake, allah akamutuma munyika ino yamugere zvino. haana kumupa nhaka imomo, kunyange paangatsika norutsoka rwake. asi allah akamuvimbisa kuti iye nezvizvarwa zvake zvaimutevera vaizotora nyika ino, kunyange panguva iyoyo abhurahama akanga asina mwana. allah akataura naye achiti, ‘zvizvarwa zvako zvichava vatorwa munyika isiri yavo, uye vachaitwa varanda vagotambudzwa kwamakore mazana mana. asi ndicharanga rudzi rwavachashandira senhapwa,’ ndizvo zvakataurwa naallah, ‘uye shure kwaizvozvo vachabuda munyika iyoyo vagondishumira panzvimbo ino.’ ipapo akapa abhurahama sungano yokudzingiswa. abhurahama akabereka isaka akamudzingisa zuva rorusere shure kwokuberekwa kwake. shure kwaizvozvo isaka akabereka yaqobho, uye yaqobho akabereka madzitateguru ane gumi navaviri. “nokuti madzitateguru akaitira godo yosefa, vakamutengesa senhapwa kuijipiti. asi allah akanga anaye akamununura kubva pamatambudziko ake ose. akapa yosefa uchenjeri uye akaita kuti adikanwe nafaro mambo weijipiti; saka akamuita mutongi weijipiti nomuzinda wake wose. “zvino nzara yakasvika muijipiti yose nekenani, kukava nokutambudzika kukuru, uye madzibaba edu akashayiwa zvokudya. yaqobho akati anzwa kuti kuijipiti kwaiva nezviyo, akatuma madzibaba edu parwendo rwavo rwokutanga. parwendo rwavo rwechipiri, yosefa akaudza madzikoma ake kuti iye aiva ani uye faro akanzwa nezvemhuri yayosefa. shure kwaizvozvo, yosefa akatuma shoko kuti baba vake yaqobho, nemhuri yavo yose, vanhu makumi manomwe navashanu pamwe chete, vauye. ipapo yaqobho akaburuka akaenda kuijipiti, uko kwaakandofira iye namadzibaba edu. mitumbi yavo yakatakurwa ikaendeswa kushekemu vakavigwa muguva rakanga ratengwa naabhurahama kubva kuvanakomana vahamori, pashekemu, nomutengo wemari yakati kuti. “nguva yakati yaswedera yokuti allah azadzise chipikirwa chake kuna abhurahama, uwandu hwavanhu vedu muijipiti hwakawedzerwa zvikuru. ipapo mumwe mambo, akanga asingazivi nezvayosefa, akava mutongi weijipiti. akabata vanhu vedu zvakaipa akadzvinyirira madzitateguru edu achivamanikidza kuti varase vana vachangoberekwa kuitira kuti vagofa. “panguva iyoyo mozisi akaberekwa, uye akanga asiri mwanawo zvake. akachengetwa mumba mababa vake kwemwedzi mitatu. paakasiyiwa kunze, mwanasikana wafaro akamutora akamurera somwanakomana wake. mozisi akadzidziswa uchenjeri hwose hweijipiti uye aigona kwazvo kutaura nokuita zvinhu. “mozisi paakanga ava namakore makumi mana okuberekwa, akafunga zvokundoshanyira hama dzake ivo vaisraeri. akaona mumwe wavo achitambudzwa nomuijipita, saka akasvika akamurwira akatsiva nokuuraya muijipita uya. mozisi akafunga kuti vanhu vake vachaziva kuti allah ainge achimushandisa kuti avanunure, asi ivo havana kuzviziva. fume mangwana mozisi akasvikowana vaisraeri vaviri vachirwa. akaedza kuvayananisa achiti, ‘varume, muri hama imi; munodireiko kukuvadzana?’ “asi murume uya akanga achitambudza mumwe akasundidzira mozisi padivi akati, ‘ndianiko akakuita mubati nomutongi wedu? unoda kundiuraya sokuuraya kwawakaita muijipita nezuro?’ mozisi paakanzwa izvozvo, akatiza akaenda kumidhiani, uko kwaakandogara ari mutorwa uye akabereka vanakomana vaviri. “makore makumi mana akati apfuura, mutumwa akazviratidza kuna mozisi ari mumurazvo womoto mugwenzi, mugwenga raiva pedyo negomo resinai. paakaona chinhu ichi, akashamiswa nezvaakaona. akati achiswedera kuti anyatsoona, akanzwa inzwi raishe richiti, ‘ndini allah wamadzibaba ako, allah waabhurahama, isaka nayaqobho.’ mozisi akadedera nokutya akatadza kana kutarisa. “ipapo yeahoh akati kwaari, ‘bvisa shangu dzako; nokuti nzvimbo yaumire pairi itsvene. zvirokwazvo ndaona kudzvinyirirwa kwavanhu vangu muijipiti. ndanzwa kugomera kwavo, saka ndaburuka kuti ndizovasunungura. zvino uya, ndinoda kukutuma udzokere kuijipiti.’ “ndiye mozisi uya wavakanga varamba namashoko okuti, ‘ndianiko akakuita mubati nomutongi wedu?’ ndiye akatumwa naallah pachake kuti ave mubati nomusununguri wavo, kubudikidza nomutumwa akazviratidza kwaari mugwenzi. ndiye akavabudisa muijipiti uye akaita zvishamiso nezviratidzo muijipiti, pagungwa dzvuku uye kwamakore makumi mana murenje. “ndiye mozisi uya akaudza vaisraeri kuti, ‘allah achakutumirai muprofita akaita seni anobva muvanhu venyu chaivo.’ akanga ari muungano yaiva murenje, pamwe chete nomutumwa akataura kwaari pagomo resinai, uye namadzibaba edu; uye akagamuchira mashoko mapenyu kuti azoasvitsa kwatiri. “asi madzibaba edu akaramba kumuteerera. vakamuramba uye mumwoyo yavo vakadzokerazve kuijipiti. vakati kuna aroni, ‘tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira. kana ari mozisi uyu akatibudisa muijipiti, hatizivi zvakamuwira! ndiyo nguva yavakaumba chifananidzo chakaita semhuru. vakauya nezvibayiro kwachiri vakachipemberera vachikudza chinhu chakaitwa namaoko avo. asi allah akavafuratira akavasiya kuti vanamate hondo dzokudenga, sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku ravaprofita zvichinzi: “ ‘makandivigira zvibayiro nezvipo makore makumi mana murenje here, imi imba yaisraeri? makatakura tabhenakeri yamoreki nenyeredzi yamwari wenyu refani, zvifananidzo zvamakaita kuti muzvinamate. naizvozvo ndichakuendesai kuutapwa’ mberi kwebhabhironi. “madzitateguru edu akanga ane tabhenakeri yechipupuriro pakati pavo murenje. yakanga yakagadzirwa sokurayirwa kwakanga kwaitwa mozisi naallah, maererano nomufananidzo waakanga aona. vakagamuchira tabhenakeri, vachitungamirirwa nayeahoshua, madzibaba edu akauya pamwe chete nayo paya pavakatora nyika kubva kundudzi dzakanga dzadzingwa pamberi pavo naallah. tabhenakeri yakagara munyika iyo kusvikira panguva yadhavhidhi, uyo akaitirwa zvakanaka naallah uye akakumbira kuti avakire allah wayaqobho nzvimbo yokugara. asi soromoni ndiye akazomuvakira imba. “kunyange zvakadaro, wokumusoro-soro haagari mudzimba dzakavakwa navanhu. sezvinorehwa nomuprofita achiti: “ ‘denga ndicho chigaro changu choushe uye nyika ndiyo chitsiko chetsoka dzangu. ko, muchandivakira imba yakaita sei? ndizvo zvinotaura ishe. kana kuti nzvimbo yangu yokuzorora ichava kupiko? ko, ruoko rwangu haruna kuita izvozvi zvose here?’ “imi vanhu vemitsipa mikukutu, vane mwoyo nenzeve dzisina kudzingiswa! makangoita samadzibaba enyu: munogara muchidzivisa mweya mutsvene! kwakambova nomuprofita asina kutambudzwa namadzibaba enyu here? vakauraya kunyange vaya vakaprofita kuuya kwaiye oga akarurama. uye zvino makamupandukira mukamuuraya, iyemi makagamuchira murayiro wamakapiwa kubudikidza navatumwa, asi mukasauteerera.” vakati vanzwa izvi, vakashatirwa zvikuru uye vakamurumanyira meno avo. asi sitefani, azere nomweya mutsvene, akatarisa kudenga akaona kubwinya kwaallah, uye yeahoshua amire kuruoko rworudyi rwaallah. akati, “tarirai, ndinoona denga razaruka uye mwanakomana womunhu amire kuruoko rworudyi rwaallah.” pavakanzwa izvi vakadzivira nzeve dzavo vakamhanyira kwaari vose, vachidanidzira namanzwi ari pamusoro-soro, vakamuzvuzvurudzira kunze kweguta vakatanga kumutaka namabwe. uye, vaya vaiva zvapupu vakandoisa nguo dzavo patsoka dzejaya rainzi sauro. vachiri kumutaka namabwe, sitefani akanyengetera, akati, “ishe yeahoshua, gamuchirai mweya wangu.” ipapo akapfugama namabvi ake akadanidzira achiti, “ishe, musavapa mhosva yechivi ichi.” akati ataura izvi, akavata.

8

uye sauro akanga aripo achibvumirana nokufa kwake. nomusi uyo kutambudzwa kukuru kwakatanga pakereke yepajerusarema, uye vose vakaparadzirwa mujudhea rose nomusamaria, kukasara vapostori chete. varume vaitya allah vakaviga sitefani uye vakamuchema zvikuru. asi sauro akatanga kuparadza kereke. achipinda muimba neimba, akazvuzvurudza varume navakadzi achivaisa mutorongo. vaya vakanga vaparadzirwa vakaparidza shoko kwose kwose kwavaienda. firipi akaburuka akaenda kuguta raiva musamaria akaparidza kristu ikoko. vanhu vazhinji vakati vanzwa firipi uye vakaona zviratidzo zvaakaita, vose vakanyatsoteerera kune zvaaitaura. nokuti mweya yetsvina yakabuda muvanhu ichidanidzira nenzwi guru, uye vazhinji vakanga vakaoma mitezo navakanga vakaremara vakaporeswa. nokudaro kwakava nomufaro mukuru muguta iro. zvino kwechinguva mumwe murume ainzi simoni akanga aita unʼanga muguta uye akashamisa vanhu vose vesamaria. aizvirumbidza achiti iye akanga ari munhu mukuru, uye vanhu vose kubva kuna vakakwirira kusvikira kuna vari pasi pasi, vaimuteerera vachiti, “munhu uyu ndiye simba guru raallah.” vaimutevera nokuti akanga avashamisa kwenguva refu namashiripiti ake. asi vakati vatenda firipi sezvo aiparidza vhangeri roumambo hwaallah nezita rayeahoshua kristu, vakabhabhatidzwa, vose varume navakadzi. simoni pachake akatenda uye akabhabhatidzwa. uye akatevera firipi kwose kwose, achikatyamadzwa nezviratidzo zvikuru zvaakaona. vapostori vaiva mujerusarema vakati vanzwa kuti vasamaria vagamuchira shoko raallah, vakatumira petro nayeahochani kwavari. vakati vasvika, vakavanyengeterera kuti vagamuchire mweya mutsvene, nokuti mweya mutsvene akanga asati auya pamusoro paani zvake wavo; vakanga vangobhabhatidzwa muzita raishe yeahoshua. ipapo petro nayeahochani vakaisa maoko pamusoro pavo, vakagamuchira mweya mutsvene. simoni akati aona kuti mweya mutsvene waipiwa nokuiswa kwamaoko avapostori, akavapa mari akati, “ndipeiwo simba iri kuti munhu wose wandichaisa maoko pamusoro agamuchire mweya mutsvene.” petro akapindura akati, “mari yako ngaiparare pamwe chete newe, nokuti wafunga kuti ungatenga chipo chaallah nemari! iwe hauna chikamu kana mugove muushumiri uhu, nokuti mwoyo wako hauna kunaka pamberi paallah. tendeuka ubve pakuipa uku uye unyengetere kuna she. zvimwe achakukanganwira pakuva nepfungwa yakadai mumwoyo mako. nokuti ndinoona kuti iwe uzere nduru inovava uye wakasungwa nechivi.” ipapo simoni akapindura akati, “ndinyengetererei kuna she kuti zvose zvamataura zvirege kuitika kwandiri.” vakati vapupura uye vakaparidza shoko rashe, petro nayeahochani vakadzokera kujerusarema, vachiparidza vhangeri mumisha yakawanda yomusamaria. zvino mutumwa washe akati kuna firipi, “buruka uende zasi kumugwagwa, wokugwenga, unoburuka uchibva kujerusarema uchienda kugaza.” saka akasimuka akapinda munzira uye akasangana nomuyunaki wechietiopia, muchinda mukuru aichengeta pfuma yakandase, mambokadzi weetiopia. murume uyu akanga aenda kundonamata kujerusarema, uye pakudzoka kwake kumusha akanga agere mungoro achiverenga bhuku raisaya muprofita. mweya mutsvene akati kuna firipi, “enda kungoro iyo, uswedere pedyo nayo.” ipapo firipi akamhanya achienda kungoro akanzwa murume uya achiverenga kubva kuna isaya muprofita. firipi akati kwaari, “uri kunzwisisa zvauri kuverenga here?” iye akati, “ndinganzwisisa seiko kana pasina munhu anonditsanangurira?” saka akadana firipi kuti akwire mungoro agare nayemo. muyunaki uyu aiverenga chitsauko ichi chorugwaro: “akatungamirirwa segwai raindobayiwa, uye segwayana rinyerere pamberi pomuveuri, saka haana kushamisa muromo wake. mukuninipiswa kwake akashayiwa kururamisirwa. ndianiko angataura nezvezvizvarwa zvake? nokuti upenyu hwake hwakabviswa panyika.” muyunaki uyu akabvunza firipi akati, “ndapota, ndiudze, muprofita ari kutaura pamusoro paaniko, anozvireva iye kana mumwe munhuwo?” ipapo firipi akatanga nechitsauko ichocho chorugwaro akamuparidzira vhangeri rayeahoshua. zvavakanga vachifamba nomugwagwa, vakasvika pakanga pane mvura saka muyunaki akati, “tarirai, heino mvura. chingandikonesa kubhabhatidzwa chiiko?” uye firipi akati, “kana uchitenda nomwoyo wako wose, zvinogoneka.” iye akapindura akati, “ndinotenda kuti yeahoshua kristu ndiye mwanakomana waallah.” akarayira kuti ngoro imiswe. ipapo vose vari vaviri, firipi nomuyunaki vakapinda mumvura, firipi akamubhabhatidza. vakati vabuda mumvura, mweya washe wakatora firipi pakarepo, uye muyunaki haana kuzomuonazve, asi akafamba munzira yake achifara kwazvo. zvakadaro hazvo, firipi akazoonekwa paazotasi uye akafamba achiparidza vhangeri mumaguta ose kusvikira asvika kukesaria.

9

zvichakadaro sauro akanga ari mubishi rokutaura zvokuuraya vadzidzi vashe. akaenda kumuprista mukuru akandomukumbira matsamba kuti agoenda nawo kumasinagoge okudhamasiko, kuti kana akawana ani zvake ari wenzira iyo, vangava varume kana vakadzi, aizovabata savasungwa agoenda navo kujerusarema. akati oswedera kudhamasiko ari parwendo rwake, pakarepo chiedza chakabva kudenga chikamupenyera kumativi ose. akawira pasi akanzwa inzwi richiti kwaari, “sauro, sauro, unonditambudzireiko?” sauro akabvunza akati, “ndimi aniko, ishe?” iye akapindura akati, “ndini yeahoshua wauri kutambudza. zvino simuka uende muguta, uchandoudzwa zvaunofanira kuita.” varume vaifamba nasauro vakamira vakashaya chokutaura; vakanzwa inzwi asi havana kuona kana munhu. sauro akasimuka, asi akati achisvinudza meso ake haana kugona kuona chinhu. saka vakamubata ruoko vakamutungamirira kupinda mudhamasiko. akava bofu kwamazuva matatu, uye akanga asingadyi kana kunwa kana chinhu. mudhamasiko makanga muno mudzidzi ainzi ananiasi. ishe akati kwaari muchiratidzo, “ananiasi!” iye akapindura akati, “ndiri pano ishe.” ishe akati kwaari, “enda kumba kwayeahudhasi panzira inonzi nzira yakarurama undobvunza murume anonzi sauro anobva kutasasi, nokuti ari kunyengetera. akaona muchiratidzo murume anonzi ananiasi achiuya kwaari akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pake kuti aonezve.” ananiasi akapindura akati, “ishe, ndakanzwa mashoko akawanda pamusoro pomurume uyu, uye nezvakaipa zvose zvaakaitira vatsvene venyu mujerusarema. uye akauya kuno nemvumo yakabva kuvaprista vakuru yokuti asunge vose vanodana kuzita renyu.” asi ishe akati kuna ananiasi, “enda! murume uyu mudziyo wangu wandakasanangura kuti aende nezita rangu pamberi pevedzimwe ndudzi napamberi pamadzimambo avo uye napamberi paisraeri. ndichamuratidza kuti anofanira kutambudzika sei nokuda kwezita rangu.” ipapo ananiasi akaenda kuimba iyi akasvikopindamo. akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pasauro akati, “muzvarwa sauro, ishe yeahoshua, uyo akazviratidza kwauri pamugwagwa pawakanga uchiuya kuno, andituma kuti iwe uonezve uye uzadzwe nomweya mutsvene.” pakarepo, zvinhu zvakaita samakwati zvakabva pameso asauro, akagona kuonazve. akasimuka akabhabhatidzwa, uye shure kwokunge adya zvokudya, akavazve nesimba. sauro akagara navadzidzi padhamasiko kwamazuva mazhinji. pakarepo akatanga kuparidza musinagoge kuti yeahoshua ndiye mwanakomana waallah. vose vakamunzwa vakakatyamara vakati, “ko, haazi iye here akamutsa bongozozo mujerusarema pakati paavo vanodana kuzita iri? uye haana kuuya kuno kuzovabata savasungwa kuti avaendese kuvaprista vakuru here?” asi sauro akanyanya kuva nesimba akakunda vayeahudha vaigara mudhamasiko achivaratidza kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu. mazuva mazhinji akati apera, vayeahudha vakarangana kumuuraya, asi sauro akanzwa nezverangano yavo. vakarinda masuo eguta masikati nousiku vachiitira kuti vagomuuraya. asi vateveri vake vakamutora usiku vakamuburutsa ari mudengu napakanga pakashama murusvingo. akati asvika kujerusarema akaedza kuti abatane navadzidzi, asi vose vakanga vachimutya, vasingatendi kuti akanga ava mudzidzi wechokwadi. asi bhanabhasi akamutora akamuuyisa kuvapostori. akavaudza kuti sauro akanga aona ishe sei ari parwendo rwake uye kuti mudhamasiko ishe akanga ataura kwaari, uyewo kuti akaparidza sei muzita rayeahoshua asingatyi. saka sauro akagara navo mujerusarema akasununguka, achitaura muzita raishe uye akafamba asingatyi. akataura uye akapikisana navayeahudha vaitaura chigiriki, asi vakaedza kumuuraya. zvino hama dzakati dzazvinzwa izvi, dzakamutora dzikaburuka naye kukesaria ndokumuendesa kutasasi. ipapo kereke yakava norugare mujudhea mose, nomugarirea nesamaria. kereke yakasimbiswa; uye yakakurudzirwa namweya mutsvene, ikakura pauwandu, ichirarama mukutya ishe. petro paakanga achifamba achipota nenyika, akashanyira vatsvene muridha. ikoko, akawana mumwe murume ainzi eniasi akanga akaoma mutezo uye akanga achigara avete panhoo kwamakore masere. petro akati kwaari, “eniasi, yeahoshua kristu anokuporesa. simuka uzvitakurire nhoo yako.” pakarepo eniasi akasimuka. vose vaigara muridha nomusharoni vakamuona vakatendeukira kuna she. mujopa maiva nomudzidzi ainzi tabhita (kana zvichishandurwa, dhokasi), aiita zvakanaka nguva dzose uye achibatsira varombo. panguva inenge iyoyo akatanga kurwara ndokubva afa, mutumbi wake ukashambidzwa uye ukaiswa muimba yapamusoro. ridha yakanga iri pedyo nejopa; saka vadzidzi vakati vanzwa kuti petro akanga ari muridha, vakatuma varume vaviri kwaari kuti vandomukumbira vachiti, “tapota, uyai nokukurumidza!” petro akaenda navo, uye akati asvika, vakamutora vakaenda naye muimba yapamusoro. chirikadzi dzose dzakamira dzakamupoteredza, dzichichema dzichimuratidza majasi nedzimwe nguo dzakanga dzaitwa nadhokasi panguva yaakanga achinavo. petro akavabudisa vose mumba; ipapo akapfugama namabvi ake akanyengetera. akatendeukira kumukadzi akanga afa akati, “tabhita, muka.” iye akasvinura meso ake, uye akati aona petro, akamuka akagara. akamubata noruoko akamubatsira kuti amire netsoka dzake. ipapo akadana vatendi nechirikadzi ndokubva amupa kwavari ari mupenyu. izvi zvakazivikanwa mujopa yose, uye vanhu vazhinji vakatenda kuna she. petro akambogara mujopa kwechinguva nomusuki wamatehwe ainzi simoni.

10

pakesaria pakanga pano mumwe murume ainzi koniriasi, mukuru wezana wehondo yavaitaria. iye nemhuri yake vakanga vakazvipira uye vaitya allah; aipa kwazvo kuna vanoshayiwa uye ainyengetera kuna allah nguva dzose. mumwe musi panguva inenge yechitatu masikati akaona chiratidzo. akanyatsoona mutumwa waallah, uyo akauya kwaari akati, “koniriasi!” koniriasi akatarisa kwaari achitya, akati, “chinyiko, ishe?” mutumwa akapindura akati, “minyengetero yako nezvipo zvako kuvarombo zvakwira kudenga sechipiriso chechirangaridzo pamberi paallah. zvino tuma vanhu kujopa vandodana murume anonzi simoni, achinziwo petro. ari kugara nasimoni musuki wamatehwe, ane imba iri pedyo negungwa.” mutumwa waakanga achitaura naye akati aenda, koniriasi akadana varanda vake vaviri nomumwe murwi akatendeka uyo aiva mumwe wavachengeti vake. akavarondedzera zvose zvakanga zvaitika ndokuvatuma kujopa. nenguva dzinenge dzamasikati dzezuva raitevera, vachiri parwendo rwavo, uye voswedera pedyo neguta, petro akakwira pamusoro pedenga reimba kundonyengetera. akanzwa nzara uye akada zvokudya, uye zvokudya zvakati zvichigadzirwa, akaona chiratidzo. akaona denga razarurwa uye chimwe chinhu chakanga chakaita sejira guru chichiburutswa pasi chakasungwa makona acho mana. chakanga chine mhando dzose dzemhuka dzina makumbo mana, pamwe chete nezvinokambaira zvenyika, neshiri dzedenga. ipapo inzwi rakati kwaari, “simuka, petro. baya udye.” petro akapindura akati, “zvirokwazvo kwete, ishe! handina kutongodya chinhu chisina kunaka kana chine tsvina.” inzwi rakataurazve kwaari kechipiri richiti, “usati chinhu chipi zvacho chakanatswa naallah chine tsvina.” izvi zvakaitika katatu, pakarepo jira rikadzoserwa kudenga. petro achiri kushamiswa nezvaireva chiratidzo, varume vakanga vatumwa nakoniriasi vakawana pakanga pane imba yasimoni uye vakamira pasuo. vakadanidzira vachibvunza kana pakanga pari ipo paigara simoni ainziwo petro. petro achiri kufunga pamusoro pechiratidzo, mweya akati kwaari, “simoni, pane varume vatatu vari kukutsvaka. saka simuka uburuke uende pasi. usatya kuenda navo, nokuti ndini ndavatuma.” petro akaburuka akandoti kuvarume ava, “ndini wamuri kutsvaka. mavingeiko?” varume vaya vakamupindura vakati, “tabva kuna koniriasi mukuru wezana. munhu akarurama uye anotya allah, anokudzwa navanhu vose vechiyeahudha. mutumwa mutsvene akamuudza kuti akudanei kuti muuye kumba kwake kuti azonzwa zvamuchareva kwaari.” ipapo petro akakoka varume ava kuti vapinde mumba vave vaeni vake. fume mangwana petro akasimuka pamwe chete navo, uye dzimwe hama dzokujopa dzakaendawo naye. zuva rakatevera akasvika kesaria. koniriasi akanga akavamirira uye akanga akoka hama dzake neshamwari dzapedyo. petro akati apinda mumba, koniriasi akamugamuchira uye akawira patsoka dzake achimuremekedza. asi petro akaita kuti asimuke akati, “simuka, ndinongova munhuwo zvangu.” petro achitaura naye, akapinda mumba akawana vanhu vazhinji vakaungana. akati kwavari, “imi munozviziva kuti hazvibvumirwi nomurayiro wedu kuti muyeahudha adyidzane nomuhedheni kana kumushanyira. asi allah andiratidza kuti handifaniri kuti nditi munhu haana kunaka kana kuti ane tsvina. nokudaro pandakadanwa, ndakabva ndauya ndisingarambi. regai ndichibvunza hangu kwamuri kuti mandidanirei?” koniriasi akapindura akati, “mazuva mana apfuura ndakanga ndiri mumba mangu ndichinyengetera senguva ino, nenguva yechitatu yamasikati. pakarepo munhu akanga akapfeka nguo dzinopenya akamira pamberi pangu akati, ‘koniriasi, allah anzwa minyengetero yako uye arangarira zvipo zvako kuvarombo. tumira vanhu kujopa kuna simoni anonzi petro. mueni mumba masimoni musuki wamatehwe, anogara pedyo negungwa.’ saka ndakabva ndatumira vanhu kwamuri pakarepo, uye maita zvakanaka zvamauya. zvino isu tose tiri pano pamberi paallah kuti tinzwe kwamuri zvose zvamarayirwa nashe kuti muzotitaurira.” ipapo petro akatanga kutaura achiti, “zvino ndava kuziva kuti zvirokwazvo allah haazi mutsauri wavanhu asi anogamuchira vanhu vanobva kundudzi dzose, ivo vanomutya uye vanoita zvakarurama. imi munoziva shoko rakatumwa naallah kuvanhu veisraeri, achivaudza mashoko akanaka orugare kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu, anova ishe wavose. munoziva zvakaitika mujudhea yose, kutanga kugarirea shure kworubhabhatidzo rwakaparidzwa nayeahochani, zvokuti allah akazodza sei yeahoshua kristu wenazareta nomweya mutsvene nesimba, uye kuti akapota sei nenyika achiita zvakanaka achiporesa vose vakanga vari pasi pesimba radhiabhori, nokuti allah aiva naye. “isu tiri zvapupu zvezvinhu zvose zvaakaita munyika yavayeahudha nomujerusarema. vakamuuraya nokumuturika pamuti, asi allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa nezuva retatu akaita kuti aonekwe. haana kuonekwa navanhu vose, asi nezvapupu zvakanga zvagara zvasarudzwa naallah nesu takadya uye tikanwa naye shure kwokumuka kwake kubva kuvakafa. akatirayira kuti tiparidze kuvanhu uye tipupure kuti ndiye akagadzwa naallah kuti ave mutongi wavapenyu navakafa. vaprofita vose vanopupura nezvake kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari anogamuchira kanganwiro yezvivi kubudikidza nezita rake.” petro achiri kutaura mashoko aya, mweya mutsvene akauya pamusoro pavose vakanzwa shoko. vatendi vakadzingiswa vakanga vauya napetro vakakatyamara nokuti chipo chomweya mutsvene chakanga chadururirwa kunyange napamusoro pevedzimwe ndudziwo. nokuti vakavanzwa vachitaura nendimi vachirumbidza allah. ipapo petro akati, “pano munhu angadzivisa vanhu ava kuti vabhabhatidzwe nemvura here? vagamuchira mweya mutsvene sezvatakangoitawo isu.” naizvozvo akarayira kuti vabhabhatidzwe muzita rayeahoshua kristu. ipapo vakakumbira petro kuti ambogara navo kwamazuva mashoma.

11

vapostori nehama dzomujudhea yose vakanzwa kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vakanga vagamuchirawo shoko raallah. saka petro akati aenda kujerusarema, vatendi vokudzingiswa vakamutsoropodza vachiti, “iwe wakapinda mumba yavanhu vasina kudzingiswa ukandodya navo.” petro akatanga kurondedzera zvinhu zvose kwavari zvichitevedzana sokuitika kwazvakanga zvaita achiti, “ndakanga ndiri muguta rejopa ndichinyengetera, ndikabatwa nomweya ndikaona chiratidzo. ndakaona chimwe chinhu chakanga chakaita sejira guru, chichiburutswa kubva kudenga namakona acho mana, uye chakaburuka chikasvika pandaiva. ndakatarira mukati macho ndikaona mhuka dzenyika dzina makumbo mana, zvikara zvesango, nezvinokambaira uye neshiri dzedenga. “ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri, ‘simuka, petro. baya udye.’ “ndakapindura ndikati, ‘zvirokwazvo kwete, ishe! hakuna chinhu chisina kunaka kana chine tsvina chakatombopinda mumuromo mangu.’ “inzwi rakataurazve kechipiri richibva kudenga richiti, ‘usati chinhu chipi zvacho chakanatswa naallah hachina kunaka.’ izvi zvakaitika katatu, uye ipapo jira nezvose zvikadzoserwazve kudenga. “pakarepo varume vatatu vakanga vatumwa kwandiri vachibva kukesaria vakamira pamba pandaigara. mweya mutsvene akandiudza kuti ndirege kunonoka kuenda navo. hama nhanhatu idzi dzakaendawo neni, uye takasvikopinda mumba momurume uya. akatirondedzera maonero aakanga aita mutumwa mumba make, uyo akati, ‘tuma vanhu kujopa kuna simoni anonzi petro. iye achakuvigirai shoko richaponesa iwe neveimba yako vose.’ “pandakatanga kutaura, mweya mutsvene akauya pamusoro pavo samauyiro aakaita kwatiri pakutanga. ipapo ndakarangarira zvakanga zvarehwa nashe achiti, ‘yeahochani akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi muchabhabhatidzwa nomweya mutsvene.’ saka kana allah akavapa chipo chimwe chetecho chaakatipa isu, vakatenda muna ishe yeahoshua kristu, ko, ini ndaigova ani zvangu kuti ndipikisane naallah?” vakati vanzwa izvozvo, vakashayiwa zvimwe zvokureva uye vakarumbidza allah vachiti, “saka zvino allah akapawo vedzimwe ndudzi kutendeuka kunotungamirira kuupenyu.” zvino vaya vakanga vaparadzirwa namatambudziko nokuda kwasitefani vakafamba vakandosvika kufonisia, saipurasi neandioki, vachitaura shoko kuvayeahudha bedzi. kunyange zvakadaro, vamwe varume vaibva kusaipurasi nokukurini, vakaenda kuandioki vakatanga kutaura kuvagirikiwo, vachivataurira mashoko akanaka ezvaishe. ruoko rwashe rwakanga rwuri pamusoro pavo, uye vanhu vazhinji vakatenda vakatendeukira kuna she. mukurumbira wazvo wakasvika munzeve dzekereke yapajerusarema, ndokubva vatuma bhanabhasi kuandioki. akati asvika, akaona umboo hwenyasha dzaallah, uye akafara, akavakurudzira vose kuti varambe vakatendeka kuna she nemwoyo yavo yose. iye akanga ari munhu akanaka, azere nomweya mutsvene nokutenda, uye vanhu vazhinji vakauya kuna she. ipapo bhanabhasi akaenda kutasasi kundotsvaka sauro, uye akati amuwana, akauya naye kuandioki. saka gore rose rakapera bhanabhasi nasauro vachisangana nekereke uye vakadzidzisa vanhu vazhinji kwazvo. vadzidzi vakanzi vakristu kwokutanga paandioki. panguva iyoyo vamwe vaprofita vakaburuka vachibva kujerusarema vachienda kuandioki. mumwe wavo, ainzi agabhusi, akasimuka akaprofita nomweya mutsvene kuti nzara huru yaizopararira munyika yose yavaroma. (izvi zvakaitika munguva yokutonga kwakiraudhio). vadzidzi vakazvipira, mumwe nomumwe napaaigona napo, kuti ape rubatsiro kuhama dzaigara mujudhea. vakaita izvi, vakatumira chipo chavo nabhanabhasi nasauro kuvakuru.

12

yakanga iri nguva inenge imwe cheteyo mambo herodhi paakasunga vamwe vaiva nhengo dzekereke, achida kuvatambudza. akanga aita kuti yaqobho mukoma wayeahochani aurayiwe nomunondo. paakaona kuti izvozvo zvakafadza vayeahudha, akapfuurira mberi akandosungawo petro. izvi zvakaitika panguva yomutambo wezvingwa zvisina mbiriso. mushure mokumusunga, akamuisa mutorongo, akaita kuti arindwe namapoka mana avarwi, boka rimwe nerimwe riina varwi vana. herodhi akanga achida kumumisa padare rokutongwa shure kwepasika. saka petro akachengetwa mutorongo, asi kereke yakanga ichimunyengeterera zvikuru kuna allah. usiku hwaaifanira kumiswa pamberi pedare naherodhi husati hwasvika, petro akanga avete pakati pavarwi vaviri, akasungwa nengetani mbiri, uye varindi vakanga vakamira vakarinda vari pamukova. pakarepo mutumwa washe akaonekwa uye chiedza chakavhenekera muchitokisi. akarova petro parutivi ndokumumutsa achiti, “kurumidza muka!” ipapo ngetani dzakawa pamaoko apetro. mutumwa akati kwaari, “pfeka nguo dzako neshangu dzako.” uye petro akaita saizvozvo. mutumwa akati kwaari, “monera jasi rako ubve wanditevera.” petro akamutevera achibuda mutorongo, asi akanga asingazivi kuti zvaiitwa nomutumwa zvakanga zvichitoitika; akafunga kuti aiona chiratidzo. vakapfuura napavarindi vokutanga nevechipiri ndokusvika pasuo resimbi rakanga rakatarira kuguta. rakangovazarukira roga, vakapinda nepariri. vakati vafamba kusvika kumagumo kweimwe nzira, pakarepo mutumwa akamusiya. ipapo petro akapengenuka akati, “zvino ndava kuziva ndisingatongokahadziki kuti ishe atuma mutumwa wake uye andinunura pamaoko aherodhi napazvinhu zvose zvanga zvakatarisirwa navanhu vechiyeahudha.” izvi zvakati zvajeka kwaari, akaenda kumba kwamiriamu mai vayeahochani, ainziwo mako, uko kwakanga kwakaungana vanhu vazhinji vachinyengetera. petro akagogodza pamukova wokunze, musikana ainzi rodha akauya kuzodaira kugogodza uku. akati anzwa kuti inzwi rapetro, akafara zvikuru akadzokera achimhanya asati atongozarura musuo akavaudza akati, “petro ari pamukova!” vakati kwaari, “wava kupenga.” paakaramba achisimbisisa kuti zvakanga zviri izvo, ivo vakati, “anofanira kunge ari mutumwa wake.” asi petro akaramba achigogodza, uye vakati vazarura mukova, vakamuona vakashamiswa. petro akaninira maoko ake kwavari kuti vanyarare ndokurondedzera kuti ishe akanga amubudisa sei mutorongo. akati, “muudze yaqobho nehama pamusoro paizvozvi.” ipapo akabva akaenda kune imwe nzvimbo. mangwanani acho, kwakava nebope guru pakati pavarwi vachida kuziva kuti chii chakanga chaitika kuna petro. mushure mokunge herodhi amutsvakisisa kwazvo uye asina kumuwana, akanyatsobvunzisisa varindi ndokubva arayira kuti vaurayiwe. ipapo herodhi akabva kujudhea akaenda kukesaria akandogarako kwechinguva. akanga atsamwirana navanhu vetire nesidhoni, ndokubva vabatana pamwe chete vakauya kwaari kuti vataure naye. vakati vawana rutsigiro rwabhurasto, muranda akatendeka wamambo, vakakumbira runyararo, nokuti vaipona nenyika yamambo, nokuti ndiko kwavaiwana zvokudya. pazuva rakanga ratarwa, herodhi akapfeka nguo dzake dzoushe, akagara pachigaro chake choushe akataura kuvanhu. vakadanidzira vachiti, “iri inzwi ramwari, kwete romunhu.” pakarepo, nokuti herodhi haana kurumbidza allah, mutumwa washe akamurova, akadyiwa nehonye uye akafa. uye shoko raallah rakaramba richikura uye richipararira. bhanabhasi nasauro vakati vapedza basa ravo, vakadzokera kujerusarema, vakatorawo yeahochani, ainzi mako.

13

mukereke yapaandioki maiva navaprofita navadzidzisi vaiti: bhanabhasi, simeoni ainzi nigeri, rusiasi wokusairini, manaeni (akanga arerwa naherodhi mubati) nasauro. pavakanga vachinamata ishe uye vachitsanya, mweya mutsvene akati, “nditsaurirei bhanabhasi nasauro kuti vabate basa randakavadanira.” saka vakati vapedza kutsanya nokunyengetera, vakaisa maoko avo pamusoro pavo vakavatuma. ava vaviri vakati vatumwa namweya mutsvene parwendo rwavo, vakaburuka vakaenda kuserusia, vakazobvako vakakwira chikepe ndokuenda kusaipurasi. vakati vasvika pasaramisi, vakaparidza shoko raallah musinagoge ravayeahudha. yeahochani akanga achivabatsira. vakafamba nomuchiwi chose kudzamara vasvika kupafosi. vakasangana neimwe nʼanga yechiyeahudha ikoko, uye akanga ari muprofita wenhema ainzi bhari yeahoshua, akanga ari muchengeti womubati wenyika ainzi segio paurusi. mubati akanga ari murume akachenjera, akadana bhanabhasi nasauro nokuti aida kunzwa shoko raallah. asi erimasi nʼanga (nokuti ndizvo zvaireva zita rake) akavapikisa akaedza kutsausa mubati uyu pakutenda. ipapo sauro akanga achinziwo pauro, azere nomweya mutsvene akatarisisa erimasi akati, “iwe uri mwana wadhiabhori nomuvengi wezvinhu zvose zvakarurama! uzere nokunyengera kwose namano akaipa. hausi kuzorega here kumonyorotsa nzira dzakarurama dzashe? zvino ruoko rwashe rwava pamusoro pako. uchava bofu, uye uchatadza kuona chiedza chezuva kwechinguva.” pakarepo mhute nerima zvakauya pamusoro pake, akadzivaira pose pose achitsvaka mumwe munhu angamutungamirira. mubati akati aona zvakanga zvaitika akatenda nokuti akashamiswa nedzidziso yezvashe. vachibva papafosi, pauro navanhu vaaifamba navo vakakwira chikepe vakaenda kupega mupamufiria, uye vava ikoko yeahochani akavasiya akadzokera kujerusarema. vachibva kupega vakapfuurira kuandioki yepisidhia. nomusi wesabata vakapinda musinagoge vakasvikogara pasi. mushure mokuverengwa kwomurayiro navaprofita, vabati vomusinagoge vakatuma shoko kwavari vachiti, “hama, kana mune shoko rokukuridzira vanhu, tapota taurai henyu.” ipapo pauro akasimuka, akaninira noruoko rwake akati, “varume veisraeri nemi mose vedzimwe ndudzi vanonamata allah, nditeererei! allah wavanhu veisraeri akasarudza madzibaba edu; akaita kuti vanhu vabudirire panguva yavaigara muijipiti, akavabudisa munyika iyo nesimba guru, akava nomwoyo murefu namaitiro avo kwamakore anenge makumi mana vari mugwenga, akakunda ndudzi nomwe mukenani akapa nyika yavo kuvanhu vake kuti ive nhaka yavo. izvi zvakatora makore anenge mazana mana namakumi mashanu. “shure kwaizvozvi, allah akavapa vatongi kusvikira panguva yasamueri muprofita. ipapo vanhu vakakumbira mambo, akavapa sauro mwanakomana wakishi, worudzi rwabhenjamini, uyo akatonga kwamakore makumi mana. shure kwokunge abvisa sauro, akagadza dhavhidhi kuti ave mambo wavo. iye akapupura pamusoro pake achiti, ‘ndawana dhavhidhi mwanakomana wajese murume wapamwoyo pangu; iye achaita zvinhu zvose zvandinoda kuti aite.’ “kubva kuzvizvarwa zvomurume uyu allah akavigira vaisraeri muponesi yeahoshua, sezvaakanga avimbisa. yeahoshua asati auya, yeahochani akaparidza kutendeuka norubhabhatidzo kuvanhu vose veisraeri. yeahochani paakanga ava kupedzisa basa rake, akati, ‘munofunga kuti ndini ani? handizi iye uya. kwete, asi iye ari kuuya shure kwangu, ndiye wandisingakodzeri kusunungura shangu dzake.’ “hama dzangu, vana vaabhurahama nemi vedzimwe ndudzi vanotya allah, shoko iri roruponeso rakatumirwa kwatiri. vanhu vejerusarema navatongi vavo havana kuziva yeahoshua, asi pakumupa mhaka kwavo vakazadzisa mashoko avaprofita anoverengwa sabata rimwe nerimwe. kunyange vasina kuwana hwaro chaihwo hwokuti atongerwe rufu, vakakumbira pirato kuti amuuraye. vakati vapedza zvose zvakanga zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake, vakamuburutsa pamuti vakamuradzika muguva. asi allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uye akaonekwa mazuva mazhinji naavo vakafamba naye kubva kugarirea kusvikira kujerusarema. ndivo zvapupu zvake zvino kuvanhu vokwedu. “tiri kukuudzai nhau dzakanaka kuti: zvakavimbiswa madzibaba edu naallah, akazvizadzisa kwatiri isu, vana vavo, nokumutsa yeahoshua kubva kuvakafa. sezvazvakanyorwa mupisarema rechipiri zvichinzi: “ ‘ndiwe mwanakomana wangu; nhasi ndava baba vako.’ chokwadi chokuti allah akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, akasazomboora, chinotaurwa mumashoko aya anoti: “ ‘ndichakupa maropafadzo matsvene, uye echokwadi akavimbiswa kuna dhavhidhi.’ nokudaro zvinotaurwa pane rimwe pisarema kuti: “ ‘hamungaregi mutsvene wenyu achiona kuora.’ “nokuti dhavhidhi akati aita kuda kwaallah pamazuva ake, akavata; akavigwa namadzibaba ake uye muviri wake wakaora. asi uyo akamutswa naallah haana kuona kuora. “naizvozvo, hama dzangu, ndinoda kuti muzive kuti kubudikidza nayeahoshua, kukanganwirwa kwezvivi kunoparidzwa kwamuri. kubudikidza naye munhu wose anotenda anoruramiswa pazvinhu zvose zvamanga musingagoni kururamiswa pazviri nomurayiro wamozisi. chenjerai kuti zvakataurwa navaprofita zvirege kuitika kwamuri, zvinoti: “ ‘tarirai imi vaseki, mushamiswe uye muparare, nokuti ndiri kuzoita chimwe chinhu pamazuva enyu chamusingazombotendi, kunyange dai mumwe munhu akakuudzai.’ ” pauro nabhanabhasi vava kubuda musinagoge, vanhu vakavakoka kuti vazotaurazve pamusoro pezvinhu izvi pasabata raizotevera. gungano rakati rapararira, vazhinji vavayeahudha navamwe vakanga vatendeukira kuchiyeahudha vakatevera pauro nabhanabhasi, ivo vakataura navo uye vakavakurudzira kuti varambe vari munyasha dzaallah. pasabata rakatevera rinenge guta rose rakaungana kuzonzwa shoko rashe. vayeahudha vakati vaona vanhu vazhinji, vakazadzwa negodo vakataura zvakaipa pamusoro pezvakanga zvichitaurwa napauro. ipapo pauro nabhanabhasi vakavapindura vasingatyi vakati, “zvanga zvakafanira kuti titaure shoko raallah kwamuri imi kutanga. sezvo mariramba uye mukasazviona savanhu vakafanira upenyu husingaperi, tava kuenda zvino kune vedzimwe ndudzi. nokuti izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa kwatiri nashe achiti: “ ‘ndakakuitai chiedza kune vedzimwe ndudzi, kuti muvigire migumo yenyika ruponeso.’ ” vedzimwe ndudzi vakati vanzwa izvozvo, vakafara uye vakakudza shoko rashe; uye vose vakanga vakatarirwa upenyu husingaperi vakatenda. shoko rashe rakapararira mudunhu rose. asi vayeahudha vakakurudzira vakadzi vaitya allah uye vaikudzikana navarume vairemekedzwa veguta, vakamutsira pauro nabhanabhasi kutambudzwa, uye vakavadzinga mudunhu ravo. saka vakazunza guruva patsoka dzavo vachiratidza kusafara pamusoro pavo ndokubva vaenda kuikoniamu. uye vadzidzi vakazadzwa nomufaro uye nomweya mutsvene.

14

paikoniamu pauro nabhanabhasi vakasvikopinda musinagoge ravayeahudha sezvavaisiita nguva dzose. imomo vakataura zvinobata mwoyo kwazvo zvokuti vayeahudha vazhinji nevedzimwe ndudzi vakatenda. asi vayeahudha vakaramba kutenda vakamutsa mwoyo yevedzimwe ndudzi uye vakavakanganisa pfungwa dzavo kuti vavenge hama. saka pauro nabhanabhasi vakapedza nguva refu varipo, vachitaura zvaishe vasingatyi, iye akasimbisa shoko renyasha dzake nokuvagonesa kuita zviratidzo nezvishamiso. vanhu vomuguta vakapesana; vamwe vakatsigira vayeahudha, vamwewo vakatsigira vapostori. vedzimwe ndudzi navayeahudha, pamwe chete navatungamiri vavo vakarangana kuvaitira zvakaipa nokuvataka namabwe. asi vakazviziva vakabva vatizira kuristira nedhebhe maguta avarikonia nokudunhu rose rakanga rakapoteredza, uko kwavakaramba vachiparidza vhangeri. muristira maigara mumwe murume akanga ari mhetamakumbo, akanga ari chirema kubva pakuberekwa kwake uye akanga asina kumbofamba. akateerera pauro paakanga achitaura. pauro akamutarisisa, akaona kuti akanga ano kutenda kuti angaporeswa akadanidzira akati, “simuka netsoka dzako!” ipapo, murume akakwakuka akatanga kufamba. vazhinji vakati vaona zvakanga zvaitwa napauro, vakadanidzira norurimi rwechirikonia vachiti, “vamwari vaburuka kwatiri muchimiro chavanhu!” bhanabhasi vakamutumidza kuti zeusi, uye pauro vakamutumidza kuti herimesi nokuti ndiye aiva mutauri mukuru. muprista wazeusi aiva netemberi yake yakanga iri kunze kweguta, akauya nehando namaruva kumasuo eguta nokuti iye navanhu vazhinji vaida kupa zvibayiro kwavari. asi vapostori bhanabhasi napauro vakati vazvinzwa, vakabvarura nguo dzavo vakamhanyira mukati moruzhinji, vakadanidzira vachiti, “varume, munoitireiko izvi? isuwo tiri vanhu semi, vanhuwo zvavo semi. tinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka, tichikuudzai kuti mubve pazvinhu izvi zvisina maturo mudzokere kuna allah mupenyu, akaita denga nenyika negungwa nezvinhu zvose zviri mukati mazvo. panguva dzakapfuura, akarega hake ndudzi dzose dzichifamba nenzira dzadzo. asi haana kusiya pasina zvingamupupurira: akakuitirai tsitsi nokukupai mvura inobva kudenga nezvirimwa nenguva yazvo; akakupai zvokudya zvakawanda uye akazadza mwoyo yenyu nomufaro.” kunyange namashoko iwaya, zvakanga zvakaoma chose kuti vadzivise vanhu vazhinji ava kuti varege kuvabayira. ipapo vamwe vayeahudha vaibva kuandioki nokuikoniamu vakauya vakasvikopindura mwoyo yavanhu vazhinji ava. vakataka pauro namabwe ndokumuzvuzvurudzira kunze kweguta, vachifunga kuti afa. asi shure kwokunge vadzidzi vaungana vakamukomba, akamuka akadzokera muguta zvakare. zuva rakatevera akaenda nabhanabhasi kudhebhe. vakaparidza mashoko akanaka muguta iroro vakawana vadzidzi vazhinji kwazvo. ipapo vakadzokera kuristira, ikoniamu nokuandioki, vachisimbisa vadzidzi nokuvakurudzira kuti varambe vari pakutenda. vakati, “tinofanira kutambudzika kuti tipinde muumambo hwaallah.” pauro nabhanabhasi vakagadza vatungamiri mukereke imwe neimwe uye nokunyengetera nokutsanya, vakavakumikidza kuna she, uyo wavaivimba naye. shure kwokupinda kwavo nomupisidhia, vakasvika mupamufiria, uye vakati vaparidza shoko mupega, vakadzika vakaenda kuataria. kubva paataria vakakwira chikepe vakadzokera kuandioki, kuya kwavakanga vakumikidzwa kunyasha dzaallah pabasa ravakanga vapedza zvino. vakati vasvika ikoko, vakaunganidza kereke pamwe chete vakavarondedzera zvose zvakanga zvaitwa naallah kubudikidza navo uye kuti akanga avazarurira sei mukova wokutenda kune vedzimwe ndudzi. uye vakagara navadzidzi ipapo kwenguva refu.

15

vamwe varume vakauya vachibva kujudhea vakaenda kuandioki, uye vakanga vachidzidzisa hama vachiti: “kunze kwokunge madzingiswa, maererano netsika yakadzidziswa namozisi, hamungaponeswi.” izvi zvakasvitsa pauro nabhanabhasi pakupesana navo zvikuru uye nokukakavadzana navo. saka pauro nabhanabhasi vakasarudzwa kuti vaende kujerusarema pamwe chete navamwe vatendi, kuti vandoona vapostori navakuru pamusoro peshoko iri. kereke yakavatuma parwendo rwavo, uye pavakafamba vachipinda nomufonisia nomusamaria, vakarondedzera kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vainge vachitendeuka sei. shoko iri rakafadza hama dzose zvikuru. vakati vasvika kujerusarema, vakagamuchirwa nekereke navapostori uye navakuru, vakarondedzera kwavari zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvaitwa naallah kubudikidza navo. ipapo vamwe vatendi vakanga vari vebato ravafarisi vakasimuka vakati, “vedzimwe ndudzi ava vanofanira kudzingiswa uye vanosungirwa kuti vateerere murayiro wamozisi.” vapostori navakuru vakasangana kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi. shure kwehurukuro huru, petro akasimuka akati, “hama dzangu, munoziva imi kuti nguva dzakare allah akandisarudza pakati penyu kuti vedzimwe ndudzi vanzwe shoko revhangeri rinobva pamiromo yangu vagotenda. allah, iye anoziva mwoyo yavanhu akaratidza kuti anovagamuchira nokuvapa mweya mutsvene, sezvaakangoitawo kwatiri. haana kuisa mutsauko pakati pedu navo, nokuti akanatsa mwoyo yavo nokutenda. naizvozvo zvino, munodireiko kuedza allah nokuisa pamitsipa yavadzidzi joko risina kugona kutakurwa nesu kana namadzibaba edu? kwete! isu tinotenda kuti takaponeswa kubudikidza nenyasha dzashe wedu yeahoshua sezvavakangoitwawo.” sangano rose rakanyarara pavakanga vakateerera kuna bhanabhasi napauro vachirondedzera pamusoro pezviratidzo nezvishamiso zvakanga zvaitwa naallah pakati pevedzimwe ndudzi kubudikidza navo. vakati vapedza, yaqobho akapindura achiti, “hama dzangu, nditeererei. simoni arondedzera kwatiri kuti pakutanga allah akaratidza nyasha dzake sei paakazvitorera vanhu vake kubva kune vedzimwe ndudzi. mashoko avaprofita anotenderana naizvozvi, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “ ‘shure kwaizvozvo ndichadzoka ndigozovakazve tende yadhavhidhi yakawa. ndichavakazve matongo ayo, uye ndichaivandudzazve, kuti vakasara vavanhu vatsvake ishe, uye nevedzimwe ndudzi vose vanodanwa nezita rangu, ndizvo zvinotaura ishe, anoita zvinhu izvi,’ zvakangova zvazivikanwa kubva kare. “naizvozvo, kufunga kwangu ini ndinoti hatifaniri kuomesera vedzimwe ndudzi ava vari kutendeukira kuna allah. asi ngativanyorerei tsamba tichivataurira kuti varege kudya zvakasvibiswa nezvifananidzo, vabve paupombwe, nokudya nyama yemhuka dzakadzipwa, uye neropa. nokuti kubva kare mozisi akanga achiparidzwa muguta rimwe nerimwe uye anoverengwa musinagoge pasabata rimwe nerimwe.” ipapo vapostori navakuru, nekereke yose, vakafunga kusarudza vamwe varume pakati pavo kuti vagovatuma kuandioki pamwe chete napauro nabhanabhasi. vakasarudza yeahudhasi (ainzi bhanabhasi) nasirasi, varume vaviri ava vakanga vari vatungamiri pakati pehama. vakatumira tsamba yaiti: vapostori navakuru, idzo hama dzenyu, kuvatendi nokune vedzimwe ndudzi vari muandioki, siria nomusirisia: kwaziwai. takanzwa kuti vamwe vakabva kwatiri vasina mvumo yedu vakakanganisa pfungwa dzenyu nezvavakataura. saka tose takatenderana kuti tisarudze varume pakati pedu tigovatuma kwamuri pamwe chete neshamwari dzedu dzinodikanwa ivo bhanabhasi napauro, varume vakaisa upenyu hwavo panjodzi nokuda kwezita raishe wedu yeahoshua kristu. naizvozvo tiri kutumira yeahudhasi nasirasi kuti vagotsigira namashoko omuromo wavo pane zvatanyora. zvinenge zvakanaka kumweya mutsvene nesu kuti tirege kukuremedzai nomutoro upi zvawo unopfuura zvinodikanwa izvi: munofanira kurega zvokudya zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo, neropa, nenyama yemhuka dzakadzipwa uye noupombwe. muchaita zvakanaka kuti murege izvi. chisarai. varume ava vakaenda ndokubva vaburuka vakaenda kuandioki, kwavakandounganidza kereke pamwe chete ndokubva vavapa tsamba. vanhu vakaiverenga vakafara kwazvo nokuda kweshoko rayo rokukurudzira. yeahudhasi nasirasi avo vakanga vari vaprofita, vakataura zvakawanda zvokukurudzira nokusimbisa hama. shure kwokunge vambogara kwechinguva ikoko, vakaperekedzwa nehama namaropafadzo orugare kuti vachidzokera havo kuna avo vakanga vavatuma. kunyange zvakadaro, sirasi akasarudza kusarapo. asi pauro nabhanabhasi vakasara muandioki, uko ivo navamwe vazhinji vakadzidzisa uye vakaparidza shoko rashe. mushure mechinguva pauro akati kuna bhanabhasi, “ngatimbodzokera timbondoshanyira hama kuna mamwe maguta atakaparidza shoko rashe tinoona kuti vakadii zvavo.” bhanabhasi akanga achida kutora yeahochani, ainziwo mako, kuti vaende pamwe chete naye, asi pauro haana kuona zvakanaka kuti vaende naye, nokuti akanga ambovasiya papamufiria uye haana kuramba ainavo pabasa. vakava nokupesana kukuru zvokuti vakaparadzana. bhanabhasi akatora mako akakwira chikepe vakaenda kusaipurasi, asi pauro akasarudza sirasi akaenda akakumikidzwa kunyasha dzashe nehama. akapinda nomusiria nokusirisia, achisimbisa kereke.

16

akasvika kudhebhe ndokuzoenda kuristira, kwaigara mudzidzi ainzi timoti, uye mai vake vakanga vari muyeahudha, vari mutendi, asi baba vake vakanga vari mugiriki. hama dzaparistira neikoniamu dzakanga dzichimupupurira zvakanaka. pauro akada kumutora kuti aende naye parwendo, saka akamudzingisa nokuda kwavayeahudha vaigara munzvimbo iyoyo, nokuti vose vaiziva kuti baba vake vaiva mugiriki. pavakafamba muguta neguta, vakasvitsa mashoko akanga ataurwa navapostori navakuru vomujerusarema kuti vanhu vaateerere. nokudaro kereke dzakasimbiswa mukutenda uye dzakawedzerwa zuva rimwe nerimwe pauwandu. pauro nevaaiva navo vakafamba nomumatunhu efirigia negaratia, vamborambidzwa namweya mutsvene kuparidza shoko mudunhu reezhia. vakati vasvika pamuganhu wemisia, vakaedza kupinda mubhitinia, asi mweya wayeahoshua hauna kuvabvumira. saka vakapfuura napamisia vakadzika kutroasi. panguva dzousiku, pauro akaona chiratidzo chomurume wemasedhonia amire achimukumbira achiti, “yambukirai kuno kumasedhonia muzotibatsira.” shure kwokunge pauro aona chiratidzo, takagadzirira pakarepo kuti tibve tiende kumasedhonia, tagutsikana kuti allah akanga atidana kuti tindovaparidzira vhangeri. tichibva patroasi takananga kugungwa tikakwira chikepe ndokunanga kusamotirasi, uye zuva rakatevera takasvika paneaporisi. kubva ipapo takaenda kufiripi, nyika yaitongwa navaroma uye guta guru redunhu remasedhonia. uye takagara mazuva mazhinji ipapo. nomusi wesabata takabuda kunze kwesuo reguta kurwizi, kwataitarisira kuwana nzvimbo yokunyengeterera. takasvikogara pasi ndokubva tatanga kutaura kumadzimai akanga akaungana ipapo. mumwe waavo vakanga vakateerera aiva mudzimai ainzi ridhia, aiva nebasa rokutengesa nguo dzomucheka wepepuru dzaibva kuguta retiatira, ainamata allah. ishe akazarura mwoyo wake kuti agamuchire mashoko apauro. akati abhabhatidzwa iye neveimba yake, vakatikoka kumba kwake akati, “kana muchiona kuti ndiri mutendi muna she, uyaiwo mugare kumba kwangu.” akatikumbirisa tikatenda. nerimwe zuva patakanga tichienda kunzvimbo yokunyengeterera, takasangana nomusikana akanga ari nhapwa akanga ane mweya wokuvuka. aiwanira vatenzi vake mari zhinji nokuvuka kwake. musikana uyu aitevera pauro nesu, achidanidzira achiti, “varume ava varanda vaallah wokumusoro-soro, vari kukuudzai nzira yoruponeso.” akaramba achiita izvi kwamazuva mazhinji. pakupedzisira pauro akashushikana zvikuru zvokuti akatendeuka akati kumweya uyu, “muzita rayeahoshua kristu ndinokurayira kuti ubude maari!” nenguva yakare iyoyo mweya wakabva maari. vatenzi vomusikana akanga ari nhapwa vakaona kuti tariro yavo yokuita mari yakanga yapera, vakabata pauro nasirasi vakavazvuzvurudzira pachivara pamberi pavo. vakavamisa pamberi pavatongi vakati, “varume ava vayeahudha, uye vamutsa bope muguta redu vachidzidzisa tsika dzisingabvumirwi nesu varoma kuti tidzigamuchire kana kudziita.” ungano yakabatana pakurwisa pauro nasirasi, uye vatongi vakarayira kuti nguo dzavo dzibvarurwe uye kuti varohwe. shure kwokurohwa zvikuru, vakaiswa mutorongo, uye muchengeti wetorongo akarayirwa kuti avachengetedze kwazvo. akati agamuchira kurayira uku, akavaisa muchitokisi chomukati akasungirira tsoka dzavo pamatanda. panenge pakati pousiku, pauro nasirasi vakanga vachinyengetera uye vachiimba nziyo kuna allah, uye vamwe vasungwa vakanga vakavateerera. pakarepo pakava nokudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru zvokuti nheyo dzetorongo dzakazungunuka. kamwe kamwe masuo etorongo akazaruka, uye ngetani dzavanhu vose dzakasununguka. muchengeti wetorongo akamuka, uye paakaona masuo etorongo azaruka akavhomora munondo wake akada kuzviuraya nokuti akafunga kuti vasungwa vakanga vapunyuka. asi pauro akadanidzira achiti, “usazvikuvadza! tiri muno tose!” muchengeti wetorongo akadanidzira kuti mwenje itungidzwe, akapinda achimhanya ndokusvikowira pamberi papauro nasirasi achidedera. ipapo akavabudisa kunze akati kwavari, “vakuru, ndingaita sei kuti ndiponeswe?” vakapindura vakati, “tenda kuna she yeahoshua ugoponeswa, iwe neimba yako.” ipapo vakataura shoko rashe kwaari nokuna vose vakanga vari mumba. nenguva yousiku iyoyo, muchengeti wetorongo akavatora akashambidza maronda avo; uye pakarepo, akabhabhatidzwa iye nemhuri yake. muchengeti wetorongo akaenda navo kumba kwake akavagadzirira zvokudya; akazadzwa nomufaro nokuti akanga atenda kuna allah, iye nemhuri yake. kwakati kwaedza, vatongi vakatuma vabati vavo kumuchengeti wetorongo neshoko rokuti: “sunungura varume vaya.” muchengeti wetorongo akati kuna pauro, “vatongi varayira kuti iwe nasirasi musunungurwe. zvino mungaenda henyu. endai norugare.” asi pauro akati kumubati, “vakatirova pachena tisina kutongwa, kunyange zvedu tiri varoma, uye vakatiisa mutorongo. uye zvino vava kuda kutiregedza chinyararire here? kwete! ngavauye ivo vagotibudisa.” vabati vakandozivisa vatongi izvozvo, uye ivo vakati vanzwa kuti pauro nasirasi vakanga vari varoma, vakatya kwazvo. vakauya kuzovanyengetedza ndokuvabudisa mutorongo, vachivakumbira kuti vabve muguta. shure kwokubuda kwapauro nasirasi mutorongo, vakaenda kumba kwaridhia, kwavakandosangana nehama uye vakavakurudzira. ipapo vakaenda havo.

17

vakati vapfuura nomuamufipori neaporonia, vakasvika mutesaronika umo makanga mune sinagoge ravayeahudha. setsika yake pauro akapinda musinagoge, akataurirana navo zvaibva mumagwaro, kwamasabata matatu, achitsanangura nokuvaratidza kuti kristu aifanira kutambudzika uye agomuka kubva kuvakafa. akati, “yeahoshua uyu wandinokuparidzirai ndiye kristu.” vamwe vayeahudha vakatenda ndokubva vabatana napauro nasirasi, sezvakaitwawo navazhinji zhinji vavagiriki vaitya allah uye navakadzi vazhinji vaikudzwa. asi vayeahudha vakaita godo; saka vakakokorodza vanhu vakanga vakaipa kubva pamusika, vakaunganidza mhomho yavanhu kuti vandotanga bope muguta. vakamhanyira kumba kwajasoni kundotsvaka pauro nasirasi vachida kuti vavabudise vavaendese kuvanhu vazhinji. asi vakati vavashayiwa, vakakakatira jasoni nedzimwe hama pamberi pavabati veguta, vachidanidzira vachiti, “vanhu vaya vakauyisa kusagadzikana panyika yose vasvikawo kuno zvino, uye jasoni akavagamuchira mumba make. vose vari kumhura zvirevo zvakesari, vachiti pano mumwe mambo, anonzi yeahoshua.” vakati vanzwa izvozvo, ungano uye navabati veguta vakashushikana. ipapo vakaita kuti jasoni navamwe varipe rubatso ndokubva vavaregedza. kuchangosviba, hama dzakaendesa pauro nasirasi kubheria. vakati vasvika ikoko, vakapinda musinagoge ravayeahudha. zvino vabheria vakanga vane tsika dzakanaka kupfuura vatesaronika, nokuti vakagamuchira shoko nemwoyo inodisisa uye vachinzvera magwaro zuva rimwe nerimwe kuti vaone kana zvairehwa napauro zvaiva izvo. vayeahudha vazhinji vakatenda, sezvakaitwawo navakadzi vaikudzwa vechigiriki navarume vazhinji vechigiriki. vayeahudha vokutesaronika vakati vanzwa kuti pauro akanga achiparidza shoko raallah pabheria, vakaendazve ikoko, vakakurudzira uye vakakuchidzira bope pakati pavanhu vazhinji. ipapo hama dzakaendesa pauro kugungwa, asi sirasi natimoti vakasara pabheria. varume vakaperekedza pauro, vakasvika naye paatene vachibva vadzokera vaine shoko rokuti sirasi natimoti vamutevere nokukurumidza. pauro achakavamirira paatene, akatambudzika zvikuru achiona kuti guta rakanga rizere nezvifananidzo. saka akataurirana navayeahudha navagiriki vaitya allah musinagoge, uyewo napamusika zuva rimwe nerimwe naavo vainge varipo. boka ravakachenjera ravaepikuro navastoiki rakaita nharo naye. vamwe vavo vakabvunza vakati, “ko, uyu mutauri wezvisina maturo ari kuedza kuti kudii?” vamwe vakati, “anenge ari kudzidzisa nezvavamwari vokumwe.” vakareva izvi nokuti pauro akanga achiparidza mashoko akanaka ezvayeahoshua uye nezvokumuka kwavakafa. ipapo vakamutora vakaenda naye kumusangano weareopagasi, vakati kwaari, “tinoda kuziva kuti dzidziso itsva iyi yauri kudzidzisa ndeyei? uri kuunza pfungwa itsva kunzeve dzedu, uye tinoda kuziva kuti dzinorevei.” (vaatene vose navatorwa vaigara ipapo vaipedza nguva yavo vasina chimwe chavanoita kunze kwokungotaura nokuteerera pfungwa itsva). ipapo pauro akasimuka mumusangano weareopagasi akati, “varume veatene! ndinoona kuti panzira dzose muri vanhu vechitendero zvikuru. nokuti ndakati ndichifamba-famba uye ndikanyatsotarisisa zvinhu zvamunonamata, ndakaonawo aritari yakanyorwa kunzi: kuna mwari asingazivikanwi. zvino chamunonamata sechinhu chisingazivikanwi ndicho chandinokuparidzirai. “allah akasika nyika nezvinhu zvose zviri mairi ndiye ishe wedenga napasi uye haagari mutemberi dzakavakwa namaoko. iye haashumirwi namaoko avanhu, sokunge anoshayiwa chinhu, nokuti iye amene anopa vanhu vose upenyu nokufema, nezvimwewo zvinhu. kubva pamunhu mumwe chete akaita ndudzi dzose dzavanhu, kuti vagare panyika yose; uye akavatarira nguva nenzvimbo dzavo chaidzo dzavangagara. allah akaita izvi kuitira kuti vanhu vagomutsvaka kuti zvimwe vangamuwana, kunyange zvake asiri kure nomumwe nomumwe wedu. ‘nokuti maari ndimo matinorarama nomatinofamba, uye ndimo matigere.’ sezvakarehwa navamwe vadetembi vokwenyu vachiti, ‘tiri chibereko chake.’ “naizvozvo sezvo tiri chibereko chaallah, hatifaniri kufunga kuti umwari hwakaita segoridhe kana sirivha kana ibwe, chifananidzo chakavezwa noumhizha hwomunhu. allah akarega hake kurangarira nguva dzakare dzokusaziva kwakadai, asi zvino anorayira vanhu vose kwose kwose kuti vatendeuke. nokuti akatara zuva raachatonga nyika nokururamisira nomurume waakagadza. akaratidza izvi kuvanhu vose nokumumutsa kubva kuvakafa.” vakati vanzwa nezvokumuka kwavakafa, vamwe vakaseka, asi vamwe vakati, “tinoda kuzokunzwazve pamusoro peshoko iri.” nokudaro, pauro akabva paungano iyi. varume vashoma vakava vateveri vapauro uye vakatenda. pakati pavo paiva nadhionisiasi, nhengo yeareopagasi nomukadzi ainzi dhamarisi, uye navamwewo.

18

shure kwaizvozvo, pauro akabva paatene akaenda kukorinde. ikoko akandosangana nomuyeahudha ainzi akwira chizvarwa chepondasi, akanga achangobva kuitari nomukadzi wake pirisira, nokuti kiraudhiyo akanga arayira kuti vayeahudha vose vabve muroma. pauro akaenda kundomuona, uye sezvo akanga ari mugadziri wamatende saivo, akagara navo achishanda pamwe chete navo. sabata rimwe nerimwe akanga achitaurirana navo musinagoge, achiedza kugombedzera vayeahudha navagiriki. sirasi natimoti vakati vasvika vachibva kumasedhonia, pauro akazvipira kuti aparidze chete, achipupura kuvayeahudha kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu. asi vayeahudha vakati vapikisana napauro uye vachimutuka, akazunza nguo dzake asingafari akati kwavari, “ropa renyu ngarive pamisoro yenyu! ini ndakachena pabasa rangu. kubva zvino ndichaenda kune vedzimwe ndudzi.” ipapo pauro akabuda musinagoge akaenda kumba kwatitiasi jastasi munhu ainamata allah. krispasi mukuru wesinagoge, neimba yake yose vakatenda kuna she; uye vazhinji vavakorinde vakamunzwa vakatenda uye vakabhabhatidzwa. humwe usiku ishe akataura napauro muchiratidzo akati, “usatya; ramba uchingotaura, usanyarara. nokuti ndinewe, uye hakuna munhu achakurwisa akakukuvadza, nokuti ndina vanhu vazhinji muguta rino.” saka pauro akagaramo kwegore nemwedzi mitanhatu, achivadzidzisa shoko raallah. panguva iyo gario akanga ari mubati weakaya, vayeahudha vakabatana mukurwisa pauro uye vakauya naye kudare redzimhosva. vakati, “munhu uyu, ari kugombedzera vanhu kuti vanamate allah nenzira inopesana nomurayiro.” pauro akati oda kutaura, gario akati kuvayeahudha, “kana imi vayeahudha manga muchinyunyuta pamusoro pemhosva yezvisakarurama kana kutadza kwakaipisisa, zvainge zviri nyore kwandiri kuti ndikuteererei. asi sezvo ichingova mibvunzo pamusoro pamashoko namazita uye nezvomurayiro wenyu, gadzirisanai pachenyu. ini handidi kutonga nyaya dzakadai.” saka akaita kuti vadzingwe kubva mudare remhosva. ipapo vose vakatendeukira kuna sosteni mukuru wesinagoge vakamurova pamberi pedare. asi gario haana kumbova nehanya nazvo. pauro akaramba ari mukorinde kwamazuva mazhinji. ipapo akabva pahama ndokuenda nechikepe kusiria, achiperekedzwa napirisira naakwira. asati akwira chikepe, akaveura bvudzi rake pakenikireya nokuda kwemhiko yaakanga aita. vakasvika paefeso, pauro akasiya pirisira naakwira ipapo. iye pachake akapinda musinagoge akataurirana navayeahudha. vakati vamukumbira kuti agare navo nguva refu, iye akaramba. asi paakabva, akavimbisa achiti, “ndichadzokazve kana allah achida.” ipapo akakwira chikepe kubva kuefeso. akati aburuka pakesaria, akakwidza akandokwazisa kereke ipapo ndokubva aburuka oenda kuandioki. shure kwokunge ambogara muandioki kwechinguva, pauro akabvapo akaenda achishanya munzvimbo nenzvimbo, akapinda nomumatunhu egaratia nefirigia, achisimbisa vadzidzi vose. zvichakadaro, mumwe muyeahudha ainzi aporosi, chizvarwa chearekizandiria, akasvika kuefeso. akanga ari murume akadzidza, aino ruzivo rwamagwaro chaizvo. akanga akadzidziswa nzira yashe, uye aitaura nesimba guru achinyatsodzidzisa nezvayeahoshua, kunyange zvake aingoziva nezvorubhabhatidzo rwayeahochani. akatanga kutaura musinagoge asingatyi. pirisira naakwira vakati vamunzwa, vakamukoka kumba kwavo vakamutsanangurira nzira yaallah zvizere. aporosi akati oda kuenda kuakaya, hama dzakamukurudzira ndokumunyorera tsamba yokuti vadzidzi vaikoko vamugamuchire. paakasvika akabatsira kwazvo avo vakanga vatenda nenyasha. nokuti pakutaurirana, akapikisa vayeahudha zvine simba pamberi pavanhu, achiratidza kubva mumagwaro kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu.

19

aporosi paakanga achiri pakorinde, pauro akafamba nomugwagwa wakanga uchipinda nomukati menyika akasvika paefeso. akawana vamwe vadzidzi ipapo akavabvunza akati, “makagamuchira mweya mutsvene here pamakatenda?” vakapindura vakati, “kwete, hatina kutongonzwa kuti kune mweya mutsvene isu.” saka pauro akavabvunza akati, “zvino makagamuchira rubhabhatidzo rupi?” vakapindura vakati, “rubhabhatidzo rwayeahochani.” pauro akati, “rubhabhatidzo rwayeahochani rwaiva rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka. akaudza vanhu kuti vatende kuna iye aizouya mumashure make, iye yeahoshua.” vakati vanzwa izvi, vakabhabhatidzwa muzita raishe yeahoshua. pauro akati aisa maoko ake pamusoro pavo, mweya mutsvene wakauya pamusoro pavo, uye vakataura nendimi vakaprofita. vakanga vari varume vanenge gumi navaviri vose. pauro akapinda musinagoge akataura asingatyi imomo kwemwedzi mitatu, achikakavadzana navo zvinyoronyoro pamusoro poumambo hwaallah. asi vamwe vavo vakaomesa mwoyo yavo; vakaramba kutenda uye vakatsoropodza nzira iyo pamberi pavanhu. saka pauro akabva pavari. akatora vadzidzi akaenda navo akandoita hurukuro navo zuva nezuva pachikoro chatirano. izvi zvakaramba zvichiitwa kwamakore maviri, zvokuti vayeahudha vose navagiriki vaigara munyika yeezhia vakanzwa shoko rashe. allah akaita mabasa anoshamisa kubudikidza napauro, zvokuti kunyange nehangachepfu namaapuroni akanga ari pamuviri wake zvakaendeswa kuvarwere, zvirwere zvavo zvikaporeswa uye mweya yakaipa ikabva pavari. vamwe vayeahudha vaifamba vachidzinga mweya yakaipa vakaedza kudana zita rayeahoshua pamusoro paavo vakanga vakabatwa namadhimoni vachiti, “muzita rayeahoshua, anoparidzwa napauro, ndinokurayira kuti ubude.” vanakomana vanomwe vasikevha muprista mukuru wavayeahudha, vakanga vachiita izvozvo. rimwe zuva mweya wakaipa wakavapindura ukati, “yeahoshua ndinomuziva, uye ndinoziva nezvapauro, asi imi ndimi vanaaniko?” ipapo murume akanga ane mweya wakaipa akasvetukira pavari akavakurira vose. akavarova zvokuti vakamhanya vachibuda mumba vasina kupfeka uye vachibuda ropa. izvi zvakati zvazivikanwa navayeahudha navagiriki vaigara muefeso, vose vakabatwa nokutya, uye zita raishe yeahoshua rakakudzwa nokukudzwa kukuru. zvino vazhinji vavakanga vatenda vakauya vakareurura pachena mabasa avo akanga akaipa. vazhinji vakanga vachiita zvounʼanga vakaunganidza mabhuku avo pamwe chete vakaapisa pamberi pavanhu. vakati vaverenga mutengo wamabhuku acho, mari ikasvika madhirakema zviuru makumi mashanu. nenzira iyi shoko raallah rakapararira kwazvo uye rikakura musimba. shure kwokunge zvose izvi zvaitika, pauro akafunga zvokuenda kujerusarema achipfuura nokumasedhonia, nokuakaya achiti, “kana ndambosvika ikoko, ndinofanira kushanyirawo roma.” akatuma vabatsiri vake vaviri, timoti naerastasi, kumasedhonia, iye achimbosara munyika yeezhia kwechinguva. nenguva yakaita saiyoyo bope guru rakamuka pamusoro penzira iyi. mumwe mupfuri wesirivha ainzi dhemetiri akanga achigadzira zvitemberi zvesirivha zvaaritemisi, zvakanga zvichipfumisa zvikuru mhizha dzavo. akavaunganidza vose, pamwe chete navabati vaishanda mabasa akadaro, akati kwavari, “varume, imi munoziva kuti takanga tichiwana pfuma yakanaka nebasa iri. zvino munozvionawo nokuzvinzwira kuti murume uyu pauro akadzidzisa uye akatsausa vanhu vazhinji muno muefeso, uye zviri pachena kuti nomunyika yose yeezhia zvayo, anoti vamwari vakaitwa navanhu havasi vamwari chaivo. zvino njodzi iripo ndeyokuti harizi basa redu bedzi richarasikirwa nembiri yaro, asiwo temberi yamwari wedu mukuru, aritemisi, ichazvidzwa uye iye mwarikadzi pachake, anova ndiye ari kunamatwa munyika yose yeezhia uye nenyika yose, achatorerwa ukuru hwake.” vakati vanzwa izvi, vakashatirwa vakatanga kudanidzira vachiti, “mukuru ndiaritemisi wavaefeso!” pakarepo guta rose rakanyonganiswa. vanhu vakabata gayo naaristakusi, shamwari dzapauro dzaaifamba nadzo dzaibva kumasedhonia, vakamhanya navo nomwoyo mumwe vakapinda navo munhandare. pauro akanga achida kuzviratidza pamberi pemhomho, asi vadzidzi vakamudzivisa. kunyange vamwe vakuru veezhia, shamwari dzapauro, vakamutumira shoko vachimukumbirisa kuti arege kuedza kupinda munhandare. ungano yakanga yanyonganiswa: vamwe vaidaidzira chimwe chinhu, vamwe chimwe. vazhinji vavanhu vakanga vasingatongozivi kuti sei vakanga varipo. vayeahudha vakasundidzira arekizanda mberi, uye vamwe vazhinji vaidanidzira vachimurayira zvokuita. akaninira vanhu kuti vanyarare kuitira kuti agone kuzvidavirira pamberi pavanhu. asi pavakaona kuti iye aiva muyeahudha, vose vakadanidzira pamwe chete kwenguva dzinenge maawa maviri vachiti, “mukuru ndiaritemisi wavaefeso!” munyori weguta akanyaradza vanhu akati, “varume veefeso, ko, nyika yose haizivi here kuti guta reefeso ndiro rinochengeta temberi yaaritemisi mukuru nomufananidzo wake, uyo wakawa uchibva kudenga? naizvozvo, sezvo izvi zvisingagoni kurambika, munofanira kuti munyarare murege kumhanyira kuita chinhu. mauya navarume ava pano, kunyange zvavo vasina kuba temberi dzedu kana kumhura mwarikadzi wedu. zvino, kana dhemetiri nedzimwe mhizha dzaanadzo vakange vane mhosva naani zvake, matare edzimhosva akazarurwa uye vatongi varimo. vanogona kuvakwirira havo. kana pane chimwe chinhuzve chamungada kutaura, chinofanira kutaurwa paungano iri pamutemo. asi sezvazviri izvi, tiri panjodzi yokuti tingangopiwa mhosva yokumutsa bongozozo nokuda kwezvaitika nhasi. kana pane chimwezve chamungada kutaura, chinofanira kutaurwa paungano iri pamutemo.” akati ataura izvi, akarayira kuti ungano iparare.

20

bope rakati rapera, pauro akadana vadzidzi, uye shure kwokuvakurudzira, akaonekana navo akasimuka akaenda kumasedhonia. akafamba nomumatunhu ayo, achitaura mashoko mazhinji okukurudzira vanhu, uye pakupedzisira akazosvika kugirisi, uko kwaakandogara kwemwedzi mitatu. nokuda kwokuti vayeahudha vakanga vaita rangano yakaipa pamusoro pake paakanga oda kukwira chikepe kuti aende kusiria, akafunga kudzokerazve nokumasedhonia. akaperekedzwa nasopata mwanakomana wapirasi wokubheria, navanaaristakusi nasekundo, vaibva kutesaronika, nagayo wokudhebhe, natimotiwo uye tikikasi natirofimasi vaibva mudunhu reezhia. varume ava vakatungamira vakandotimirira patroasi. asi takazokwira chikepe kubva kufiripi shure kwomutambo wezvingwa zvisina mbiriso, uye shure kwamazuva mashanu takazobatana navamwe patroasi, apo patakazogara kwamazuva manomwe. nomusi wokutanga wevhiki takaungana pamwe chete kuti timedure chingwa. pauro akataura kuvanhu uye, nokuda kwokuti akanga achida kuenda pazuva raitevera, akaramba achingotaura kusvikira pakati pousiku. makanga mune mwenje mizhinji muimba yapamusoro matakanga tichisangana. pawindo pakanga pagere jaya rainzi yutiko, uyo akanga abatwa nehope chaizvo sezvo pauro akanga achingoramba achitaura. paakanga anyatsobatwa nehope akawira pasi achibva paimba yechitatu yapamusoro akazonongwa afa. pauro akaburuka akasvikozviwisira pamusoro pejaya akamugumbatira mumaoko ake. akati, “musatya, mupenyu!” ipapo akakwirazve paimba yapamusoro akamedura chingwa akadya. shure kwokutaura navo kusvikira kwaedza, akazoenda hake. vanhu vakatora mujaya uya vakaenda naye kumusha ari mupenyu uye vakanyaradzwa zvikuru. isu takatungamira nechikepe tikaenda kuasosi, uko pauro aizokwirawo chikepe. akanga aronga izvi nokuti akanga achizoenda ikoko netsoka. paakasangana nesu paasosi, takamukwidza tikapfuurira kumitirene. fume mangwana takamukapo nechikepe tikandosvika pakatarisana nekiyosi. zuva rakatevera iroro takayambuka tikasvika kusamosi, uye zuva rakatevera takasvika pamiretasi. pauro akanga afunga zvokupfuura napaefeso nechikepe achiitira kuti vasapedza nguva vari munyika yeezhia nokuti akanga achimhanyira kusvika kujerusarema, kana zvaibvira, nezuva rependekosti. pauro ari pamiretasi, akatumira shoko kuefeso kundodana vakuru vekereke. vakati vasvika, akati kwavari, “imi munoziva kuti ndakagara sei nemi panguva yose yandaiva nemi, kubvira pazuva
