rokutanga randakasvika munyika yeezhia. ndakashumira ishe nokuzvininipisa zvikuru uye nemisodzi, kunyange ndakaedzwa zvikuru nerangano dzavayeahudha. munozviziva kuti handina kuzeza kuparidza kana chinhu chaizokubatsirai imi, asi ndakakudzidzisai pachena uye muimba neimba. ndakapupura kuna vose vayeahudha navagiriki kuti vanofanira kudzokera kuna allah vagotendeuka uye vagotenda kuna ishe yeahoshua. “zvino ndamanikidzwa nomweya, ndiri kuenda kujerusarema, ndisingazivi hangu zvichaitika kwandiri. chandinongoziva ndechokuti muguta rimwe nerimwe mweya mutsvene anondiyambira kuti kusungwa nokutambudzika zvakandirindira. zvisinei hazvo, ini handioni upenyu hwangu sechinhu chinokosha, dai bedzi ndapedza nhangemutange yangu uye ndapedzisa basa randakapiwa naishe yeahoshua, basa rokupupura vhangeri renyasha dzaallah. “zvino ndinoziva kuti hakuna pakati penyu imi vandakafamba navo ndichiparidza vhangeri roushe achazondionazve. naizvozvo ndinotaura kwamuri nhasi kuti handina mhosva yeropa ravanhu vose. nokuti handina kuzeza kukuparidzirai kuda kwose kwaallah. zvichenjererei imi pachenyu neboka rose ramakaitwa vatariri varo namweya mutsvene. fudzai kereke yaallah, yaakatenga neropa rake pachake. ndinoziva kuti kana ndabva, mapere achapinda pakati penyu asingaregi boka. kunyange pakati penyu iyemi vanhu vachamuka vachiminamisa chokwadi vachiitira kuti vatape vadzidzi kuti vavatevere. saka rindai! rangarirai kuti makore matatu handina kumborega kukuyambirai mumwe nomumwe wenyu, usiku namasikati nemisodzi. “zvino ndinokuisai kuna allah nokushoko renyasha dzake, iro rinogona kukuvakai uye richikupai nhaka pakati paavo vakaitwa vatsvene. handina kumbochiva sirivha yomunhu kana goridhe kana nguo yomunhu. imi munoziva pachenyu kuti maoko angu aya akabatira kushayiwa kwangu nokushayiwa kwavandaiva navo. mune zvose zvandakaita, ndakakuratidzai kuti namabatiro akaoma aya, tinofanira kubatsira vasina simba, tichirangarira mashoko ashe yeahoshua pachake paakati, ‘kupa kwakaropafadzwa kupfuura kugamuchira.’ ” akati ataura izvi, akapfugama pamwe chete navo vose uye vakanyengetera. vose vakachema pavakamumbundikira uye vakamutsvoda. zvakanyanya kuvarwadza mashoko aakataura achiti havaizoona chiso chakezve. ipapo vakamuperekedza kuchikepe.

21

shure kwokuparadzana kwedu navo, takaenda kugungwa tikandokwira chikepe tikananga kukosi. zuva rakatevera takaenda kurhodzi uye tichibva ikoko takaenda kupatara. takawana chikepe chaiyambuka chichienda kufonisia, tikakwira machiri tikaenda. takati taona saipurasi takaipfuura nechezasi kwayo, tikaenda kusiria. takandoburuka chikepe patire, paiburutsa chikepe chedu nhumbi dzacho. takati tawana vadzidzi ipapo, takagara navo kwamazuva manomwe. vakakumbirisa pauro kubudikidza nomweya kuti arege kuenda kujerusarema. asi nguva yedu yakati yapera, takabvapo tikaenderera mberi norwendo rwedu. vadzidzi vose pamwe chete navakadzi vavo navana vakatiperekedza vakatisiya tava kunze kweguta, uye pamahombekombe ipapo takapfugama tikanyengetera. shure kwokuonekana kwedu, takabva taenda kundokwira chikepe, ivo vakadzokera kumusha kwavo. takapfuurira mberi norwendo rwedu tichibva kutire tikandoburuka chikepe patoremai, patakakwazisana nehama tikagara zuva rimwe chete navo. zuva rakatevera takabvapo, tikandosvika kukesaria tikandogara pamba pomuvhangeri firipi, mumwe wavaya vanomwe. akanga ana vanasikana vana vakanga vasati vawanikwa vaiprofita. shure kwokugara kwedu ipapo kwamazuva akati kuti, muprofita ainzi agabhusi akasvika achibva kujudhea. asvika kwatiri, akatora bhanhire rapauro, akabva azvisunga makumbo namaoko ake naro akati, “mweya mutsvene anoti, ‘nenzira imwe chete iyoyi, vayeahudha vokujerusarema vachasunga muridzi webhanhire vagomuisa mumaoko evedzimwe ndudzi.’ ” takati tanzwa izvi, isu navanhu voko takakumbirisa pauro kuti arege kukwidza kujerusarema. ipapo pauro akapindura akati, “seiko muchichema uye muchirwadzisa mwoyo wangu? ini ndakagadzirira kwete kusungwa kwoga, asi kufawo mujerusarema nokuda kwezita raishe yeahoshua.” paakaramba kudziviswa, isu takamurega tikati, “kuda kwashe ngakuitwe.” shure kwaizvozvo takagadzirira tikakwidza kujerusarema. vamwe vadzidzi vokukesaria vakatiperekedza vakatisvitsa kuimba yamunasoni, uko kwataifanira kundogara. akanga ari murume aibva kusaipurasi uye ari mumwe wavadzidzi vokutanga. takati tasvika pajerusarema, hama dzakatigamuchira nomufaro. zuva rakatevera pauro nesu tose takaenda kundoona yaqobho, uye vakuru vose vaivapo. pauro akavakwazisa uye akanyatsovarondedzera zvakanga zvaitwa naallah pakati pavahedheni kubudikidza noushumiri hwake. vakati vanzwa izvi, vakarumbidza allah. ipapo vakati kuna pauro, “unoona, hama, kune zviuru nezviuru zvavayeahudha vakatenda, uye vose zvavo vanoshingairira murayiro. vakaudzwa kuti iwe unodzidzisa vayeahudha vose vagere pakati pevedzimwe ndudzi kuti vatsauke kubva kuna mozisi, uchivaudza kuti varege kudzingisa vana vavo kana kuchengeta tsika dzedu. zvino toita seiko? vachanzwa zvirokwazvo kuti wauya, saka iwe chiita zvatinokuudza zvino. tina varume vana pano vakaita mhiko. tora varume ava, ubatane navo pakuzvinatsa kwavo, uye iwe ugovaripira kuti vaveurwe misoro yavo. ipapo munhu wose achaziva kuti hapana chokwadi pane zviri kurehwa pamusoro pako, asi kuti iwe pachako unoteerera murayiro. kana vari vatendi vokune vedzimwe ndudzi, takavanyorera pane zvatakatema kuti varege kudya zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo, uye ropa, nenyama yemhuka dzakadzipwa uye varege upombwe.” zuva rakatevera pauro akatora varume vaya uye akazvinatsa pamwe chete navo. ipapo akaenda kutemberi kundozivisa kupera kwamazuva okuzvinatsa uye kuti chipiriso chaizoitirwa mumwe nomumwe wavo rinhi. mazuva manomwe akati oda kupera, vamwe vayeahudha vaibva kuezhia vakaona pauro patemberi. vakamutsa vanhu vazhinji uye vakamubata, vachishevedzera vachiti, “varume veisraeri, tibatsirei! uyu ndiye murume anodzidzisa vanhu kwose kwose zvinopesana navanhu vokwedu, murayiro wedu uye nenzvimbo ino. zvisati zviri izvozvo zvoga, akapinza vagiriki muruvanze rwetemberi akasvibisa nzvimbo iyi tsvene.” (nokuti vakanga vamboona tirofimasi muefeso ari muguta pamwe chete napauro vakafunga kuti pauro akanga apinda naye mutemberi.) guta rose rakamutswa, uye vanhu vakauya vachimhanya vachibva kumativi ose. vakabata pauro, vakamukwevera kunze kwetemberi, pakarepo masuo akazarirwa. pavakanga vachiedza kumuuraya, shoko rakasvika kumukuru wehondo yeuto ravaroma richiti guta rose rejerusarema rakanga raita bope. pakarepo akatora mamwe machinda navarwi akamhanyira kuvanhu. vaiti vebongozozo vakati vachiona mukuru wamauto ana varwi vake, vakabva varega kurova pauro. mukuru wamauto akauya akasunga pauro uye akarayira kuti asungwe nengetani mbiri. ipapo akamubvunza kuti akanga ari ani uye kuti akanga aitei. vamwe vaiva pakati pavanhu vazhinji ava vakadanidzira, mumwe ichi, mumwe icho, uye sezvo mukuru wamauto akanga asingagoni kusvika pachokwadi chenyaya nokuda kwebope, akarayira kuti pauro aiswe kudzimba dzavarwi. pauro akati asvika pamatanho, bongozozo ravanhu rakanga rakurisa zvokuti akaita zvokutotakurwa navarwi. vanhu vazhinji vaimutevera vakaramba vachidanidzira vachiti, “ngaaurayiwe!” varwi pavakanga vava kuda kupinza pauro mudzimba dzavarwi, akakumbira mukuru wavarwi akati, “ndingataurawo nemi here?” iye akati, “unotaura chigiriki here? ko, hauzi uya muijipita akamutsa bope, akatungamirira zviuru zvina zvavapanduki mugwenga nguva dzakapfuura here?” pauro akapindura akati, “ini ndiri muyeahudha anobva kutasasi kusirisia, munhu weguta rakakurumbira. ndapota regai nditaure kuvanhu.” akati apiwa mvumo nomukuru wavarwi, pauro akamira pamatanho akaninira vanhu noruoko rwake. uye vakati vanyarara vose, akati kwavari nechihebheru:

22

“hama nemi madzibaba, teererai kuzvidavirira kwangu zvino.” pavakanzwa achitaura kwavari nechihebheru, vakanyanya kunyarara. ipapo pauro akati, “ini ndiri muyeahudha, akaberekerwa kutasasi yesirisia, asi ndakarerwa muguta rino. pasi pagamarieri ndakanyatsodzidziswa mutemo wamadzibaba edu uye ndakanga ndichishingairira allah sezvamunoita imi nhasi. ndakatambudza vateveri venzira iyi kusvikira pakufa kwavo, ndichisunga zvose varume navakadzi ndichivaisa mutorongo, sezvandingapupurirwawo nomuprista mukuru namakurukota ose. ndakapiwa matsamba aibva kwavari okuenda nawo kuhama dzavo dzaiva mudhamasiko, ndikaenda ikoko kuti ndinouya navanhu ava kujerusarema savasungwa kuti vazorangwa. “nenguva dzinenge dzamasikati pandakanga ndoswedera pedyo nedhamasiko, pakarepo chiedza chakabva kudenga chikandipenyera kumativi ose. ndakawira pasi ndikanzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri, ‘sauro! sauro! unonditambudzireiko?’ “ndakati, ‘ndimi aniko, ishe?’ “iye akati, ‘ndini yeahoshua wenazareta, wauri kutambudza.’ shamwari dzangu dzakaona chiedza, asi hadzina kunzwa inzwi raiye akanga achitaura neni. “ndakabvunza ndikati, ‘munoda kuti ndiiteiko ishe?’ “ishe akati, ‘simuka, upinde mudhamasiko. imomo ndimo mauchandoudzwa zvose zvawakatarirwa kuti uite.’ shamwari dzangu dzakandisesedza pakupinda kwangu mudhamasiko, nokuti kuvaima kwechiedza kwakanga kwandipofumadza. “murume ainzi ananiasi akauya kuzondiona. akanga akazvipira pakunamata allah nokucherechedza murayiro uye aikudzwa zvikuru navayeahudha vose vaigaramo. akamira neni akati, ‘hama pauro, chiona!’ uye nenguva yakare iyoyo ndakakwanisa kumuona. “ipapo akati, ‘allah wamadzibaba edu akusarudza iwe kuti uzive kuda kwake uone iye akarurama uye unzwe mashoko anobva mumuromo make. uchava chapupu chake kuvanhu vose, chezvawakaona nezvawakanzwa. saka zvino wakamirireiko? simuka ubhabhatidzwe usukwe zvivi zvako, udane kuzita rake.’ “pandakadzokera kujerusarema, uye ndichinyengetera ndiri mutemberi, ndakabatwa nomweya ndikaona ishe achitaura kwandiri achiti, ‘kurumidza kubva mujerusarema izvozvi, nokuti vanhu havangagamuchiri uchapupu hwako.’ “ndakapindura ndikati, ‘ishe, vanhu ava vanoziva kuti ndakanga ndichienda musinagoge rimwe nerimwe kuti ndinosunga uye ndirove vaya vaitenda kwamuri. uye pavakateura ropa rasitefani chapupu chenyu, ndakanga ndimirepo ndichitenderana nazvo uye ndakachengeta nhumbi dzaivo vaimuuraya.’ “ipapo ishe akati kwandiri, ‘enda, nokuti ndichakutuma kure kune vedzimwe ndudzi.’ ” vanhu vakamuteerera kusvikira ataura izvi. ipapo vakadanidzira vachiti, “mubvisei panyika! haafaniri kurarama!” pavakanga vachiita mheremhere vachikanda nguo dzavo pasi, uye vachikushira ivhu mudenga, mukuru wavarwi akarayira kuti pauro aendeswe kudzimba dzavarwi. akarayira kuti arohwe uye abvunzwe kuitira kuti vazive kuti nemhaka yei vanhu vakanga vachimupopotera kudai. pavakamusunga kuti vamurove, pauro akati kumukuru wezana akanga amirepo, “munotenderwa here nomutemo kuti murove muroma, asina kana kutombowanikwa ane mhosva?” mukuru wezana akati anzwa izvi, akaenda kumukuru wavarwi akandomuzivisa izvozvo, akati, “muchaita seiko zvino? munhu uyu muroma.” mukuru wavarwi akaenda kuna pauro akati, “nditaurire, uri muroma here iwe?” akapindura akati, “hongu, ndiri muroma.” mukuru wehondo akati, “ini ndakaita zvokutenga nomutengo mukuru kuti ndive muroma.” pauro akati, “ini ndakaberekwa ndiri muroma.” vaya vakanga voda kumubvunza vakabva varega pakarepo. mukuru wamauto pachake akatya paakaona kuti akanga asunga pauro, muroma, nengetani. zuva rakatevera, sezvo mukuru wavarwi aida kuziva chaizvoizvo kuti sei pauro akanga achipomerwa mhosva navayeahudha, akamusunungura akarayira kuti vaprista vakuru nedare guru ravayeahudha vaungane. ipapo akatora pauro akamumisa pamberi pavo.

23

pauro akatarisisa kudare guru ravayeahudha akati kwavari, “hama dzangu, ini ndakaita basa rangu kuna allah nehana yakanaka kusvikira zuva ranhasi.” ipapo muprista mukuru ainzi ananiasi akarayira vaya vakanga vamire pedyo naye kuti vamurove pamuromo. ipapo pauro akati kwaari, “allah achakurova, iwe chidziro chakacheneswa nependi! ugere ipapo kuti unditonge maererano nomurayiro, asi iwe pachako unodarika murayiro nokurayira kuti ndirohwe!” vaya vakanga vamire pedyo napauro vakati, “iwe uri kutotuka muprista mukuru waallah nhai?” pauro akapindura akati, “hama dzangu, ndanga ndisingazivi kuti ndiye muprista mukuru; nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: ‘usataura zvakaipa pamusoro pomubati wavanhu vako.’ ” ipapo pauro, achiziva kuti vamwe vavo vakanga vari vasadhusi uye kuti vamwe vakanga vari vafarisi, akadanidzira kudare guru akati, “hama dzangu, ini ndiri mufarisi, mwanakomana womufarisi. ndimire pano ndichitongwa nokuda kwetariro yangu yokumuka kwavakafa.” akati ataura izvozvo, nharo dzakamuka pakati pavafarisi navasadhusi, nokudaro ungano yakapesana. vasadhusi vanoti hakuna kumuka kwavakafa, uye kuti hakuna mutumwa kana mweya, asi vafarisi vanotenda izvozvo zvose. pakava nebope guru, uye vamwe vadzidzisi vomurayiro vainge vari vafarisi vakasimuka vakaita nharo zvikuru. vakati, “hatina chakaipa chatinoona pamunhu uyu. ko, kana ari mweya kana mutumwa akataura kwaari?” kupesana kwakava nemhirizhonga zvokuti mukuru wamauto akatya kuti pauro angangobvamburwa-bvamburwa navo. akarayira varwi kuti vaburuke vandomutora vamubvise kwavari nechisimba vagomuendesa kudzimba dzavarwi. usiku hwakatevera, ishe akamira pedyo napauro akati kwaari, “tsunga mwoyo! sezvawapupura pamusoro pangu mujerusarema, saizvozvo unofanira kundopupurawo muroma.” fume mangwana, vayeahudha vakaita rangano vakazvisunga nemhiko kuti varege kudya kana kunwa kusvikira vauraya pauro. varume vaipfuura makumi mana ndivo vakaita rangano iyi. vakaenda kuvaprista vakuru navakuru vakati, “isu tazvisunga nemhiko kuti tirege kudya kana chinhu kusvikira tauraya pauro. zvino imi nedare guru ravayeahudha kumbirai mukuru wavarwi kuti amuuyise pamberi penyu muchiita somunoda kubvunzisisa pamusoro penyaya iyi. isu takagadzirira kumuuraya asati asvika kuno.” asi, mwanakomana wehanzvadzi yapauro akati anzwa rangano iyi, akapinda mudzimba dzavarwi akandoudza pauro. ipapo pauro akadana mumwe wavakuru vezana akati kwaari, “tora jaya iri uende naro kumukuru wavarwi; ane zvaari kuda kumutaurira.” saka akaenda naye kumukuru wavarwi. mukuru wezana akati, “pauro, musungwa uya, andidaidza akandikumbira kuti ndiuye nejaya iri, kwamuri nokuti rine zvarinoda kukuudzai.” mukuru wavarwi akabata ruoko rwejaya, akaenda naye padivi akamubvunza akati, “chii chauri kuda kundiudza?” iye akati, “vayeahudha vakatenderana kukukumbirai kuti muuyise pauro pamberi pedare guru ravayeahudha mangwana vachiita sevanoda kunyatsobvunzisisa pamusoro pake. musavanzwa, nokuti pane vamwe vavo vanopfuura makumi mana vakamuvandira. vakatozvisunga nemhiko kuti varege kudya kana kunwa kusvikira vamuuraya. vakatogadzirira izvozvi, vakamirira kubvuma kwenyu chikumbiro chavo.” mukuru wavarwi akaita kuti jaya iri riende uye akamuyambira achiti, “usaudza munhu kuti wataura izvi kwandiri.” ipapo akadana vakuru vezana vaviri akavarayira achiti, “gadzirirai mazana maviri avarwi, navanotasva mabhiza makumi manomwe uye mazana maviri avarume vane mapfumo kuti vaende kukesaria nenguva dzepfumbamwe manheru. mutsvakirewo pauro bhiza rokutasva kuitira kuti andosvika zvakanaka kumubati ferikisi.” akanyora tsamba yaiti: kiraudhiyo risiasi, kuna changamire, mubati ferikisi: kwaziwai. murume uyu akabatwa navayeahudha uye vakanga voda kumuuraya, asi ini ndakabva ndasvika navarwi vangu ndikamununura, nokuti ndakanga ndanzwa kuti muroma. ndakada kuziva kuti sei vakanga vachimupomera mhosva, saka ndikamuendesa kudare ravo guru. ndakaona kuti aipomerwa mhosva pamusoro pamashoko omurayiro wavo, asi pakanga pasina mhosva ingafanira rufu kana kupfigirwa mutorongo. pandakanyeverwa pamusoro perangano yaakanga arongerwa, ndakabva ndamutumira kwamuri pakarepo. ndakazivisawo vapomeri vake kuti vazosvitsa kwamuri mhosva yavanomupomera. saka varwi vakaita sezvavakanga varayirwa, vakatora pauro vakaenda naye usiku vakandosvika naye kuandipatirisi. zuva rakatevera, vakarega vamabhiza vachienda naye, ivo vachibva vadzokera kudzimba dzavarwi. vatasvi vamabhiza vakati vasvika kukesaria, vakapa tsamba kumubati ndokubva vaisa pauro mumaoko ake. mubati akaverenga tsamba akamubvunza kuti akanga achibva kudunhu ripi. akati aziva kuti akanga achibva kusirisia, akati kwaari, “ndichazonzwa nyaya yako kana vanokupomera vasvika.” ipapo akarayira kuti pauro achengetwe navarindi vomumuzinda waherodhi.

24

mazuva mashanu akati apfuura, ananiasi muprista mukuru akaburuka kukesaria navamwe vakuru nerimwe gweta rainzi teturo, vakataura mhosva dzavo pamusoro papauro pamberi pomubati. pauro akati adaidzwa kuti apinde, teturo akasvitsa nyaya yake kuna ferikisi achiti, “isu takafadzwa nenguva refu yorugare pasi poutongi hwenyu, uye kunzwisisa kwenyu kwakashandura rudzi urwu. changamire ferikisi, izvi tinozvigamuchira nomufaro mukuru uye nemitoo yose kwose kwose. asi kuti tisakunetsaizve, ndinokumbira hangu kuti mutinzwire ngoni mungotinzwa henyu kwenguva duku. “takaona kuti murume uyu akaipa, anomutsa bope pakati pavayeahudha munyika yose. ndiye mutungamiri weboka ravanazareta uye akaedza kunyange kushatisa temberi; ndokusaka takamubata. asi risiasi mukuru wavarwi akauya akamutakanura mumaoko edu nechisimba. mukamubvunzisisa imi pachenyu muchakwanisa kuziva chokwadi chemhosva dzatiri kumupomera.” vayeahudha vakabvumirana nezvaakanga achipomerwa, vachisimbisa kuti zvinhu izvi zvaiva zvechokwadi. mubati akati amuninira kuti ataure, pauro akapindura, akati, “ndinoziva kuti manga muri mutongi worudzi urwu kwamakore mazhinji; saka ndinofara kuti ndizvidavirire. imi munogona kuziva nyore nyore kuti mazuva gumi namaviri haasati atombopera kubva pandakaenda kundonamata kujerusarema. vapomeri vangu havana kundiwana ndichiita nharo naani zvake mutemberi, kana kumutsa bope musinagoge kana papi zvapo muguta. uye havagoni kukubudisirai chokwadi chemhosva yavanondikwirira. zvisinei hazvo, ndinobvuma kuti ndinonamata allah wamadzibaba edu somuteveri wenzira, yavanoti yakatsauka. ini ndinotenda zvinhu zvose zvinobvumirana nomutemo uye nezvakanyorwa muvaprofita, uye ndine tariro imwe cheteyo muna allah savarume ava, kuti kuchava nokumuka kwavakafa vose zvavo vakarurama navakaipa. saka ndinoshingairira nguva dzose kuti hana yangu ive yakachena pamberi paallah navanhu. “shure kwamakore mazhinji ndisipo, ndakauya kujerusarema kuti ndizopa vanhu vokwangu zvipo zvavarombo uye kuti ndizopa zvipiriso zvangu. ndakanga ndakazvinatsa pavakandiwana ndiri mutemberi ndichiita izvi. pakanga pasina vanhu vazhinji vaiva neni, uye handina kumboita nyonganyonga. asi pane vayeahudha vanobva kuezhia, vaifanira kunge vari pano pamberi penyu, ndivo vaifanira kundipa mhosva kana vainge vane mhosva ipi zvayo neni. kana ivava vari pano vanofanira kutaura mhaka yavakawana mandiri pandakamira pamberi pedare guru ravayeahudha, kunze kwechinhu chimwe chete ichi chandakadanidzira pandakanga ndimire pamberi pavo kuti, ‘ndiri kutongwa maererano nokumuka kwavakafa; ndizvo zvaita kuti ndive pamberi penyu nhasi.’ ” ipapo ferikisi uyo akanga achizivisisa nezvenzira iyo, akambomisa dare. akati, “kana risiasi mukuru wavarwi auya, ndichatonga mhosva yenyu.” akarayira mukuru wezana kuti pauro achengetwe navarindi asi ave akasununguka uye shamwari dzake dzibvumirwe kuti dzimuvigire zvaanoda. mushure mamazuva mazhinji, ferikisi akauya nomukadzi wake dhurusira, uyo akanga ari muyeahudha. akadana pauro kuti auye vagozomunzwa sezvo aitaura pamusoro pezvokutenda muna kristu yeahoshua. pauro paakanga achidzidzisa pamusoro pokururama, kuzvidzora, nokutongwa kuchauya, ferikisi akatya akati, “zvakwana kwazvino! ungaenda hako. ndikange ndawana mukana, ndichazokudana.” panguva yacho iyoyo aifunga kuti pauro achamupa fufuro, saka aidana pauro nguva nenguva achitaura naye. makore maviri akati apfuura, poshiasi fesitasi akatora nzvimbo yaferikisi, asi nokuda kwokuti ferikisi aida kufadza vayeahudha, akasiya pauro ari mutorongo.

25

kwakati kwapera mazuva matatu mushure mokusvika kwake munyika iyo, fesitasi akakwira kubva kukesaria akaenda kujerusarema, vaprista vakuru navakuru vavayeahudha vakamira pamberi pake vakapira mhosva yapauro kwaari. vakakumbira zvikuru kuna fesitasi, sechinhu chinofadza kwavari, kuti pauro aendeswe kujerusarema, nokuti vakanga vachigadzirira kumuvandira kuti vagomuuraya munzira imomo. fesitasi akapindura akati, “pauro akachengetwa pakesaria, uye ini pachangu ndichaendako nokukurumidza. vamwe vavakuru venyu ngavaende neni vagondokwirira munhu uyu ikoko, kana akaita chinhu chipi zvacho chakaipa.” akati apedza mazuva masere kana gumi navo, akaburuka akaenda kukesaria, uye zuva rakatevera akaunganidza vedare akarayira kuti pauro auyiswe pamberi pake. pauro akati asvika, vayeahudha vakanga vabva kujerusarema vakamira vakamukomberedza, vachimupomera mhosva dzakaipisisa, dzavakanga vasingakwanisi kusimbisa. ipapo pauro akazvidavirira achiti, “ini handina kuita chinhu chakaipa pamusoro pomurayiro wavayeahudha kana temberi kana kesari.” fesitasi achida kufadza vayeahudha, akati kuna pauro, “unoda here kuenda kujerusarema kuti undomira pamberi pangu uchitongwa neni ikoko pamusoro pemhosva dzaunopomerwa idzi?” pauro akapindura akati, “iye zvino ndimire pamberi pedare rakesari, munova ndimo mandinofanira kutongwa. handina kuita chinhu chakaipa kuvayeahudha, sezvamunonyatsoziva imi pachenyu. kunyange zvakadaro hazvo, kana ndine mhosva yokuita chinhu chipi zvacho chinokodzera rufu, handingarambi kufa. asi kana mhosva dzandinopomerwa navayeahudha dzisina chokwadi, hakuna munhu ane mvumo yokundiisa kwavari. ndinozviisa kuna kesari!” shure kwokunge fesitasi ataurirana namakurukota ake, akati, “wazviisa kuna kesari. kuna kesari uchaenda!” shure kwamazuva mashoma, mambo agiripa nabhenisi vakasvika pakesaria kuti vandopa ruremekedzo rwavo kuna fesitasi. sezvo vakanga vachipedza mazuva mazhinji ikoko, fesitasi akakurukura nyaya yapauro namambo. akati, “pane murume ari pano akasiyiwa ari musungwa naferikisi. pandakaenda kujerusarema, vaprista vakuru navakuru vavayeahudha vakauya vachimupomera mhosva vakakumbira kuti atongwe. “ndakavaudza kuti haisi tsika yavaroma, yokuendesa munhu upi zvake kuti andofa asati asangana navapomeri vake, uye apiwa mukana wokuzvidavirira pamusoro pemhosva yavanomupomera. pavakauya pano neni, handina kunonotsa nyaya iyi, asi ndakadana dare pazuva rakatevera ndikarayira kuti munhu uyu apinzwe mudare. vaimupomera vakati vasimuka kuti vataure, havana kumupomera mhosva ipi zvayo yandaitarisira. asi, vaingova namashoko okukakavadzana naye pamusoro pechitendero chavo uye napamusoro pomurume akafa anonzi yeahoshua, uyo anonzi napauro mupenyu. ndakashaya ruzivo rwokuferefeta nyaya dzakadai; saka ndakabvunza kana aida hake kuenda kujerusarema kuti andotongwa ikoko pamusoro pemhosva idzi. pauro akati azvisarudzira kuti achengetwe kuti azotongwa pamberi pamambo kesari, ndakarayira kuti achengetwe kusvikira ndazomutumira kuna kesari.” ipapo agiripa akati kuna fesitasi, “ndingada kunzwa munhu uyu pachangu.” akapindura akati, “muchamunzwa mangwana.” zuva rakatevera, agiripa nabhenisi vakauya nokukudzwa kukuru vakapinda mumba maitambirwa mhaka vane machinda ezvigaro zvapamusoro uye navarume vaitungamirira guta. varayirwa nafesitasi, pauro akapinzwa mukati. fesitasi akati, “mambo agiripa nemi mose muri pano nesu, muri kuona murume uyu! ungano yose yavayeahudha yakandikumbira pamusoro pake mujerusarema uye nomuno mukesaria, vachidanidzira vachiti haafaniri kutongoramba ari mupenyu. ini ndakawana asina kuita chinhu chingafanira rufu, asi nokuda kwokuti akazviisa kuna kesari, ndakafunga kumutumira kuroma. asi handina chinhu chandinganyatsorondedzera chokuti ndinyorere kuna changamire pamusoro pake. naizvozvo ndamuuyisa pamberi penyu iyemi mose, kunyanya pamberi penyu, mambo agiripa, kuitira kuti zvichabuda pakuferefeta uku zvigondiwanisa zvokunyora. nokuti ndinofunga kuti hazvina ungwaru kutumira musungwa pasina rondedzero chaiyo yemhosva yake.”

26

ipapo agiripa akati kuna pauro, “unotenderwa kuzvidavirira.” saka pauro akaninira noruoko rwake akatanga kuzvidavirira achiti, “mambo agiripa, ndinoona kuti ndine rombo rakanaka kuti ndimire pamberi penyu nhasi ndichizvidavirira pamusoro pezvose zvandinopomerwa navayeahudha, uye zvikuru nokuti imi munonyatsoziva tsika dzavayeahudha uye namakakatanwa avo. naizvozvo ndinokukumbirai kuti munditeerere nomwoyo murefu chaizvo. “vayeahudha vose zvavo vanoziva nzira yandakararama nayo kubvira pandakanga ndiri mwana, kubva pakutanga kwoupenyu hwangu munyika yokwangu, nomujerusaremawo. vakandiziva kwenguva refu uye vanogona kupupura, kana vachida zvavo, kuti maererano nedzidziso yakasimba yechitendero chedu, ndakagara ini ndiri mufarisi. uye zvino ndiri kutongwa pano nhasi nokuda kwetariro yangu mune zvakavimbiswa madzibaba edu naallah. iyi ndiyo vimbiso yakamirirwa namarudzi edu gumi namaviri kuti isvike sezvavanoshumira allah kwazvo masikati nousiku. imi mambo, vayeahudha vari kundipa mhosva nokuda kwetariro iyi. seiko zvisingagoni kutendwa pakati penyu kuti allah anomutsa vakafa? “neniwo ndakanga ndichigutsikana ndichitoti ndinofanira kuita zvose zvandaigona kuti ndipikise zita rayeahoshua wenazareta. uye ndizvo chaizvo zvandakaita mujerusarema. nemvumo yandakanga ndapiwa navaprista vakuru, ndakaisa vazhinji vavatsvene mutorongo, uye pavainge vachiurayiwa, ndaitenderana nazvo. nguva zhinji ndaibva kune rimwe sinagoge ndichienda kune rimwe ndichiita kuti varangwe, uye ndakaedza kuvamanikidza kuti vamhure allah. noruvengo rwandaiva narwo pamusoro pavo, ndakaenda kunyange kuna mamwe maguta avatorwa kundovatambudza. “pane imwe yenzendo idzi ndakanga ndichienda kudhamasiko ndine mvumo uye ndatumwa navaprista vakuru. nenguva dzinenge dzamasikati, mambo, ndiri mumugwagwa, ndakaona chiedza chakabva kudenga, chaipenya kupfuura zuva, chikavaima chakandipoteredza ini navandaiva navo. tose takawira pasi, uye ndakanzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri norurimi rwechihebheru, ‘sauro, sauro, unonditambudzireiko? zvakakuomera iwe kuti ukave zvibayiso.’ “ipapo ndakati, ‘ndimi aniko, ishe?’ “ishe akapindura akati, ‘ndini yeahoshua waunotambudza. zvino chisimuka umire netsoka dzako. ndazviratidza kwauri kuti ndikugadze somuranda uye sechapupu chezvawaona kwandiri uye nezvandichakuratidza. ndichakununura kubva kuvanhu vokwako uye kubva kune vedzimwe ndudzi. ndiri kukutuma kwavari kuti usvinudze meso avo nokuvadzora kubva kurima kuti vauye kuchiedza, nokubva musimba rasatani kuti vauye kuna allah, kuti vagamuchire kanganwiro yezvivi uye vawane nzvimbo pakati paavo vakaitwa vatsvene nokutenda kwandiri.’ “saka ipapo, mambo agiripa, handina kuramba kuteerera kuchiratidzo chakabva kudenga. ndakatanga kuparidza kuna avo vaiva mudhamasiko, nokuna avo vaiva mujerusarema nomujudhea yose, uye nokune vedzimwe ndudziwo kuti vatendeuke vadzokere kuna allah vagoratidza kutendeuka kwavo namabasa avo. ndizvo zvakaita kuti vayeahudha vandibate mutemberi uye vaedze kundiuraya. asi ndakabatsirwa naallah kusvikira nhasi uno, uye ndimire pano kuti ndipupure kuvaduku nokuvakuru zvimwe chetezvo. handina kutaura zvinopfuura zvakataurwa navaprofita uye namozisi kuti zvichaitika, kuti kristu achatambudzika, uye, saiye wokutanga kumuka kubva kuvakafa achaparidza chiedza kuvanhu vake uye nokune vedzimwe ndudzi.” ipapo fesitasi akati kuna pauro nenzwi guru, “pauro, wava kupenga! kudzidza kwako kukuru kwava kukupengesa.” pauro akapindura akati, “handisi kupenga, changamire fesitasi. zvandiri kutaura ichokwadi uye zvinotendeka. mambo vanoziva zvinhu izvi, uye ndinogona kutaura ndakasununguka kwavari. ndinogutsikana kuti hapana chimwe chezvinhu izvi chichavapunyuka, nokuti hazvina kuitwa pakavanda. mambo agiripa munotenda vaprofita here? ndinoziva kuti munotenda.” ipapo agiripa akati kuna pauro, “unenge unoda kundiita mukristu nenguva duku.” pauro akapindura akati, “nguva pfupi kana refu, ndinonyengetera kuna allah kuti murege kuva imi bedzi asi vose ava vakateerera kwandiri nhasi kuti vave seni, kunze kwengetani idzi chete.” mambo akasimuka, pamwe chete nomubati nabhenisi uye navose vaakanga agere navo. vakabuda mumba, uye pavaitaurirana, vakati, “munhu uyu haasi kuita chinhu chinofanira rufu kana kupfigirwa mutorongo.” agiripa akati kuna fesitasi, “munhu uyu angadai asunungurwa dai akanga asina kuzviisa kuna kesari.”

27

kwakati kwarongwa kuti tiende nechikepe kuitari, pauro navamwe vasungwa vakaiswa mumaoko omukuru wezana ainzi juriasi akanga ari wehondo yaagasito. takakwira chikepe chaibva kuadhiramitiami chakanga chava kuenda nomunzvimbo dzaiva kumahombekombe enyika yeezhia, ndokubva taenda kugungwa. takanga tiina aristakusi, mumasedhonia aibva kutesaronika, pamwe chete nesu. zuva rakatevera takasvika pasidhoni; uye juriasi akanzwira pauro tsitsi akamutendera kuti aende kushamwari dzake kuti zvimwe vangamupa zvaaishayiwa. tichibva ipapo takaendazve kugungwa tikapfuura nezasi kwesaipurasi, nokuti mhepo yakanga ichitidzivisa. takati tayambuka gungwa resirisia nepamufiria, takandomira pamira murisia. mukuru wezana akawana chikepe chearekizandiria ipapo chaienda kuitari akatikwidzamo. takafamba zvishoma zvishoma mazuva mazhinji uye zvakanga zvakatiomera kusvikira panidhasi. sezvo mhepo yakanga ichitidzivisa kuti tifambe mugwara redu, takabva taenda nezasi kwekirete, kwakatarisana nesarimone. takafamba nokumahombekombe tichitambudzika tikasvika panzvimbo yainzi zororo rakanaka, pedyo neguta rerasea. takarasikirwa nenguva yakawanda kwazvo, uye kufambisa chikepe kwakanga kwava nenjodzi nokuti zvino nguva yokutsanya yakanga yatopfuura. saka pauro akavayambira akati, “varume, ndinoona kuti rwendo rwedu ruchava nenjodzi uye ruchauyisa kurasikirwa kukuru kuchikepe nokunhumbi, uyewo nokuupenyu hwedu chaihwo.” asi mukuru wezana, pachinzvimbo chokuti ateerere kune zvakanga zvataurwa napauro, akatevera zano romuchairi wechikepe uye neromuridzi wechikepe. sezvo panomira chikepe pakanga pasina kunaka kuti vanhu vagarepo munguva yechando, voruzhinji vakasarudza kuti tirambe tichifamba, vachitarisira kusvika kufonisia tigogarako panguva yechando. iyi ndiyo yaiva nzvimbo yomukirete yaimirira chikepe, yakatarisa kwose zasi kwakadziva kumavirira nokumusoro kwakadziva kumavirira. mhepo yakadzikama yaibva zasi yakati yotanga kuvhuvhuta, vakafunga kuti vawana zvavaida; saka vakakanga chimiso mumvura tikafamba takatevedza mahombekombe ekirete. kusati kwambopera nguva huru, mhepo huru ine simba, yainzi “yurakuro,” yakavhuvhuta ichibva nokuchitsuwa. chikepe chakabatwa nedutu chikatadza kupinda nomumhepo; saka takarega zvakadaro uye tikaramba tichingosairirwa. takati tapfuura nezasi kwechitsuwa chiduku chainzi kaudha, takanga tisisagoni kuchengetedza igwa rokununura upenyu. varume vakati varikwidza pamusoro pechikepe, vakapinza tambo napasi pechikepe kuti zvibate zvakasimba. vachitya kuti vangasairirwa kujecha rokusiritisi, vakaderedza zvimiso zvomugungwa ndokubva varega chikepe chichisairirwa. takanga tava kuvhungwa-vhungwa nedutu raiva nesimba zvokuti mangwana acho vakatanga kubudisa nhumbi muchikepe vachidzikanda mugungwa. pazuva retatu, vakakanda mimwe midziyo yaishandiswa muchikepe mugungwa namaoko avo. zuva kana nyeredzi pazvisina kuonekwa kwamazuva mazhinji, uye dutu parakaramba richipenga, takagumisira tarasikirwa netariro yose yokuponeswa kwedu. shure kwokunge vanhu vagara nguva refu vasina zvokudya, pauro akamira pamberi pavo akati, “varume, maifanira kunge makateerera zano rangu rokuti murege kubva pakirete; ipapo mungadai makazviponesa pakuparadza nokurasikirwa uku. asi zvino ndinokukurudzirai kuti mutsunge, nokuti hakuna mumwe wenyu acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake; asi chikepe ichi bedzi ndicho chichaparadzwa. madeko mutumwa waallah uyo wandiri wake uye wandinoshumira akamira neni akati kwandiri, ‘usatya, pauro. unofanira kutongwa pamberi pakesari; uye nenyasha allah akupa upenyu hwavose vanofamba newe muchikepe.’ saka tsungai mwoyo, varume, nokuti ndino kutenda muna allah kuti zvichaitika sezvaakandiudza. kunyange zvakadaro tichandokandwa hedu pane chimwe chitsuwa.” nousiku hwegumi nechina, takanga tichiri kungosundwa nemhepo tichiyambuka gungwa readhiria, panenge pakati pousiku vafambisi vechikepe vakaona kuti vakanga voswedera kunyika. vakashandisa zvokuyera kudzika kwemvura vakaona kuti pakanga pakadzika mamita makumi mana. shure kwenguva pfupi, vakayerazve vakawana kuti pakanga padzika namamita makumi matatu. vachitya kuti vangabondera pamatombo, vakadzikisa zvimiso zvina shure, ndokunyengetera kuti dai kwaedza. vachida kuedza kutiza kubva muchikepe, vafambisi vechikepe vakaburutsa igwa rokununura upenyu ndokurikanda mugungwa, vachiita sokunge vaizodzikisa zvimiso mberi kwechikepe. ipapo pauro akati kumukuru wezana nokuvarwi, “kana vanhu ava vakasagara muchikepe, hamungararami.” saka varwi vakadambura tambo dzakanga dzakabata igwa rokununura upenyu vakarirega richiwira mumvura. kwava kuda kuedza, pauro akavakurudzira kuti vadye achiti, “mazuva gumi namana apfuura, manga makangogara musingadyi, hamuna kutongodya kana chinhu. zvino ndinokukurudzirai kuti mudye. munofanira kudya kuti murarame. hakuna mumwe pakati penyu acharasikirwa nebvudzi romusoro wake.” shure kwokutaura kwake izvozvo, akatora chingwa akavonga kuna allah pamberi pavo vose. ipapo akachimedura akatanga kudya. vose vakakurudzirwa uye vakadya zvokudya. tose takanga tiri mazana maviri namakumi manomwe navatanhatu. vakati vadya pavaida napo, vakarerutsa chikepe nokukanda gorosi mugungwa. kunze kwakati kwaedza, havana kuziva nyika iyo, asi vakaona nzvimbo yaiva nejecha, apo pavakasarudza kuti vamise chikepe kana zvaigona. vakadambura zvimiso, vakazvisiya mugungwa uye nenguva yakare iyoyo vakadamburawo tambo dzakanga dzakasunga zvokudzoresa chikepe. ipapo vakasimudza sairi rechikepe kumhepo kuti risairirwe panodira makungwa maviri. asi chikepe chakarovera pajecha. muromo wacho wakabatirira kwazvo uye ukasagona kubvapo, nokudaro shure kwacho kwakapwanyika kukaita zvimedu zvimedu nokuda kwokurova kwamasaisai. varwi vakaronga kuuraya vasungwa kuti vatadzise kana mumwe chete wavo kushambira kuti apunyuke. asi mukuru wezana akanga achida kuponesa pauro, akavadzivisa kuita zvavakanga varonga. akarayira vaya vaigona kushambira kuti vashambire havo vatange kubuda muchikepe vaende kumahombekombe. vakasara vavo vainge vachizoyambutswa vari pamapuranga kana pazvidimbu zvechikepe. nenzira iyi, mumwe nomumwe akasvika pavhu rakaoma zvakanaka.

28

takati tasvika zvakanaka kumahombekombe, takazoziva kuti chitsuwa ichi chainzi marita. vanhu vomuchitsuwa ichi vakatiitira tsitsi dzinoshamisa. vakavesa moto vakatigamuchira tose nokuti kwakanga kuchinaya uye kuchitonhora. pauro akaunganidza svinga retutsotso. paakanga ava kutuisa mumoto, nyoka, yanzwa kupisa kwomoto, yakanamatira paruoko rwake. vanhu vomuchitsuwa ichi pavakaona nyoka yakarembera paruoko rwake, vakataurirana pakati pavo vakati, “munhu uyu anofanira kuva mhondi; nokuti kunyange apunyuka hake mugungwa, kururamisira hakuna kumubvumira kuti ararame.” asi pauro akazunzira nyoka mumoto uye haana kurwara. vanhu vakanga vakatarisira kuti achazvimba kana kuwira pasi pakarepo ofa, asi vakati varindira kwenguva refu uye vakasaona chakaitika kwaari, vakashanduka vakati aiva mwari. pakanga pano munda waiva pedyo ipapo wakanga uri wapabhuriosi, muchinda mukuru wechitsuwa icho. akatigamuchira kumba kwake akatichengeta zvakanaka kwamazuva matatu. baba vake vakanga vachirwara vavete pamubhedha, vachirwadziwa nefivha uye vane manyoka aibudisa ropa. pauro akapinda kuti andovaona, uye shure kwokunyengetera, akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pavo akavaporesa. izvi zvakati zvaitika, vairwara vose vomuchitsuwa vakauya vakaporeswa. vakatikudza nenzira zhinji uye patakanga tagadzirira kukwira chikepe, vakatipa zvinhu zvataida. mwedzi mitatu yakati yapfuura, takaenda kugungwa tikakwira muchikepe chakanga chapedza mwaka wechando chiri pachitsuwa apa. chakanga chiri chikepe chokuarekizandiria chakanga chine misoro miviri yavamwari mapatya, ivo kasitori naporukisi. takaenda pasirakuse tikandogarapo kwamazuva matatu. takabvapo tikakwira chikepe tikandosvika kuregiamu. zuva rakatevera, mhepo yaibva zasi yakatanga kuvhuvhuta, uye pazuva rechipiri takazosvika paputeori. ipapo takawana hama uye dzakatikoka kuti tipedze vhiki imwe tinavo. tichibva ipapo takaenda kuroma. hama dzaikoko dzakanga dzanzwa kuti takanga tichiuya, naizvozvo vakafamba kusvikira kumusika weapio napamahotera matatu kuti vazosangana nesu. pauro, paakaona varume ava, akavonga allah uye akakurudzirwa. takati tasvika kuroma, pauro akatenderwa kuti agare oga, ane murwi aimuchengeta. mazuva matatu akati apfuura, akakoka vatungamiri vavayeahudha. vakati vaungana, pauro akati kwavari, “hama dzangu, kunyange ndisina kuita chinhu chakaipa kuvanhu vokwedu kana pamusoro petsika dzamadzitateguru edu, ndakasungwa mujerusarema ndikaiswa mumaoko avaroma. vakandibvunzisisa uye vakada kundisunungura, nokuti ndakanga ndisina mhosva ipi zvayo yaikodzera rufu. asi vayeahudha vakati varamba ndakazvipira kuti ndizviise kuna kesari, kwete kuti ndakanga ndine mhosva ipi zvayo nehama dzangu. nokudaro ndakumbira hangu kuti ndikuonei uye nditaure nemi. nokuda kwetariro yaisraeri ndakasungwa nengetani iyi.” ivo vakati, “hatina kumbogamuchira kana tsamba zvadzo dzichibva kujudhea maererano newe, uye hakuna mumwe wehama dzakabvako akatizivisa kana kutaura chinhu chipi zvacho chakaipa pamusoro pako. asi tinoda kunzwa kuti pfungwa dzako ndedzei, nokuti tinoziva kuti kwose kwose vanhu vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro peboka iri.” vakaronga kuzosanganazve napauro pane rimwe zuva, uye vakauya kwaakanga ari vari vazhinji kwazvo. kubvira mangwanani kusvikira madekwana akavatsanangurira uye akavapupurira zvoumambo hwaallah, uye achiedza kwazvo kuti vatende nezvayeahoshua kutanga pamurayiro wamozisi kusvikira kuvaprofita. vamwe vakatendeswa nezvaaireva, asi vamwe havana kutenda. havana kutenderana pakati pavo ndokubva vatanga kuenda, shure kwokunge pauro ataura mashoko okupedzisira okuti: “mweya mutsvene akataura chokwadi kumadzitateguru enyu paakataura nomuromo waisaya muprofita achiti: “ ‘enda kuvanhu ava uti, “mucharamba muchinzwa asi musingatongonzwisisi; mucharamba muchiona asi musingaonesesi.” nokuti mwoyo yavanhu ava yava mikukutu; havanzwisisi nenzeve dzavo, uye vakatsinzina meso avo. zvimwe vangaona nameso avo, vanganzwa nenzeve dzavo, vakanzwisisa nemwoyo yavo, vagotendeuka, ndigovaporesa.’ “naizvozvo ndinoda kuti muzive kuti ruponeso rwaallah rwatumirwa kune vedzimwe ndudzi, uye vachanzwa!” shure kwokunge ataura izvi, vayeahudha vakabva, vachikakavadzana zvikuru pakati pavo. pauro akagara ikoko kwamakore maviri ose ari muimba yake yaairipira uye aigamuchira vose vaiuya kuzomuona. akaparidza zvoumambo hwaallah asingatyi, asingadziviswi uye akadzidzisa nezvaishe yeahoshua kristu.

john

1

pakutanga pakanga pane shoko, uye shoko rakanga riri kuna allah, uye shoko rakanga riri allah. iye aiva kuna allah kubva pakutanga. zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa kubudikidza naye; kunze kwake hakuna kana chinhu chakaitwa pane izvo zvakaitwa. maari maiva noupenyu, uye upenyu ihwohwo hwaiva chiedza chavanhu. chiedza chinovhenekera murima, asi rima harina kuchikunda. pakanga pano murume akatumwa achibva kuna allah; zita rake rainzi yeahochani. iye akauya sechapupu kuzopupurira chiedza chiya, kuitira kuti vanhu vatende kubudikidza naye. akanga asiri iye chiedza pachake; akauya chete ari sechapupu kuchiedza. chiedza chezvokwadi chinovhenekera vanhu vose chainge chichizouya munyika. akanga ari munyika, uye kunyange nyika yakaitwa kubudikidza naye, nyika haina kumuziva. akauya kuna avo vakanga vari vake, asi vokwake havana kumugamuchira. asi kuna vose vakamugamuchira, kuna avo vakatenda muzita rake, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaallah, vana vasina kuberekwa neropa kana nokufunga kwomunhu kana nokuda kwomurume, asi vakaberekwa naallah. shoko rakava nyama uye rakagara pakati pedu. takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya kwaiye mumwe oga, akabva kuna baba, azere nenyasha uye nechokwadi. yeahochani anopupura nezvake. anodanidzira achiti, “uyu ndiye uya wandakati, ‘anouya mumashure mangu anondipfuura ini nokuti akanditangira.’ ” kubva pakuzara kwake takagamuchira nyasha pamusoro penyasha. nokuti murayiro wakapiwa kubudikidza namozisi; nyasha nezvokwadi zvakauya kubudikidza nayeahoshua kristu. hakuna akamboona allah, asi mwanakomana iye mumwe oga, ari pachipfuva chababa, akaita kuti azivikanwe. zvino uku ndiko kwaiva kupupura kwayeahochani vayeahudha vejerusarema pavakatuma vaprista navarevhi kuti vanomubvunza kuti iye aimbova ani. haana kurega kupupura, asi akanyatsopupura pachena achiti, “handisini kristu.” vakamubvunza vakati, “zvino ndiwe aniko? ndiwe eria here?” iye akati, “handizi iye.” “uri muprofita here?” akapindura akati, “kwete.” pakupedzisira vakati, “ndiwe aniko? tipindure tigondotaurira vatituma. unozviti aniko?” yeahochani akapindura namashoko omuprofita isaya achiti, “ndini inzwi reanodana murenje, richiti, ‘ruramisai nzira yashe.’ ” zvino vamwe vafarisi vakanga vatumwa vakamubvunza vachiti, “seiko zvino uchibhabhatidza kana usiri kristu, kana eria kana muprofita?” yeahochani akapindura akati, “ini ndinobhabhatidza nemvura, asi pakati penyu pamire mumwe wamusingazivi. ndiye anouya shure kwangu, handikodzeri kusunungura rukanda rweshangu dzake.” izvi zvose zvakaitika pabhetani mhiri kwajorodhani, uko kwaibhabhatidzira yeahochani. chifume chamangwana yeahochani akaona yeahoshua achiuya kwaari akati, “tarirai, gwayana raallah, rinobvisa chivi chenyika! ndiye wandaireva pandakati, ‘murume anouya shure kwangu akandipfuura nokuti akanditangira.’ ini pachangu ndakanga ndisingamuzivi, asi zvandakauyira ndichibhabhatidza nemvura ndezvokuti iye aratidzwe kuisraeri.” ipapo yeahochani akapupura uchapupu uhu achiti, “ndakaona mweya achiburuka kubva kudenga akaita senjiva akamhara pamusoro pake. ndingadai ndisina kumuziva, asi uya akandituma kuti ndizobhabhatidza nemvura ndiye akandiudza achiti, ‘murume uyo waunoona mweya achiburuka achigara paari, ndiye achazovabhabhatidza nomweya mutsvene.’ ndazviona uye ndinopupura kuti uyu ndiye mwanakomana waallah.” chifume chamangwana yeahochani akanga aripozve navadzidzi vake vaviri. akati achiona yeahoshua achipfuura akati, “tarirai, gwayana raallah!” vadzidzi vaviri vakati vachimunzwa achitaura izvi, vakatevera yeahoshua. yeahoshua akatendeuka akavaona vachitevera akavabvunza akati, “munodeiko?” ivo vakati, “ ‘rabhi’ (ndiko kuti mudzidzisi), munogarepiko?” akapindura akati, “uyai muzokuona.” saka vakaenda vakandoona paaigara, vakaswera naye kwezuva rimwe chete. yakanga iri nguva inenge yegumi. andirea mununʼuna wapetro, ndiye mumwe wavaviri vakanga vanzwa zvakanga zvarehwa nayeahochani uye vakanga vatevera yeahoshua. chinhu chokutanga chakaitwa naandirea ndechokuti akatsvaka simoni mukoma wake akati kwaari, “tamuwana mesiya” (ndiko kuti kristu). uye akauya naye kuna yeahoshua. yeahoshua akatarisa kwaari akati, “ndiwe simoni mwanakomana wayeahochani. iwe uchanzi kefasi” (ndiko kuti, kana zvichishandurwa, petro). zuva rakatevera yeahoshua akafunga zvokuenda kugarirea. akati awana firipi akati kwaari, “nditevere.” firipi, aibvawo kuguta rebhetisaidha saandirea napetro, firipi akawana natanieri akati kwaari, “tamuwana uya akanyorwa nezvake namozisi mumurayiro, uyewo akanyorwa nezvake navaprofita, yeahoshua wenazareta, mwanakomana wayosefa.” natanieri akati, “nazareta! pane chinhu chakanaka chingabva kunazareta here?” firipi akati, “uya uone.” yeahoshua akati achiona natanieri achiuya, akati kwaari, “houno muisraeri wechokwadi, asina kunyengera maari.” natanieri akamubvunza akati, “mandiziva seiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndakuona pawanga uri pasi pomuonde firipi asati akudana.” ipapo natanieri akati, “rabhi, ndimi mwanakomana waallah; ndimi mambo weisraeri.” yeahoshua akati, “unotenda nokuti ndakuudza kuti ndakuona uri pasi pomuonde. uchaona zvinhu zvikuru kupinda izvozvo.” ipapo akatizve, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, muchaona denga richizaruka, uye vatumwa vaallah vachikwira nokuburuka pamusoro pomwanakomana womunhu.”

2

pazuva rechitatu muchato wakaitwa pakana yomugarirea. mai vayeahoshua vaivapo, uye yeahoshua navadzidzi vake vakanga vakokwawo kumuchato uyu. waini yakati yapera, mai vayeahoshua vakati kwaari, “havachina waini.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “nhai mai, munondipinzireiko mune izvi? nguva yangu haisati yakwana.” mai vake vakati kuvaranda, “itai zvose zvaanokuudzai.” pakare ipapo pakanga pane makate amabwe matanhatu, anoshandiswa navayeahudha patsika dzavo dzokushamba, rimwe nerimwe raizara namarita ari pakati pamakumi mapfumbamwe nezana namakumi mana. yeahoshua akati kuvaranda, “zadzai makate nemvura.” saka vakaazadza kusvikira pamuromo. ipapo akati kwavari, “chicherai imwe zvino mugoipa kumukuru womutambo.” vakaita saizvozvo. uye mukuru womutambo akaravira mvura yakanga yashandurwa ikava waini. haana kuziva kwayakanga yabva, kunyange zvazvo varanda vakanga vachera mvura vaiziva havo. ipapo akadana chikomba parutivi akati, “munhu wose anotanga kubudisa waini inonaka chose, zvino shure kwokunge vanhu vakakokwa vanwa zvakanyanyisa, ipapo anozobudisa isinganaki; asi iwe wachengeta yakaisvonaka kusvikira zvino.” yeahoshua akaita chiratidzo ichi chokutanga pakana yomugarirea. nokudaro akaratidza kubwinya kwake, uye vadzidzi vake vakatenda kwaari. shure kwaizvozvo akaburuka akaenda kukapenaume namai vake, navanunʼuna vake uye navadzidzi vake. vakagara ikoko kwamazuva mashoma. pasika yavayeahudha yakati yava pedyo, yeahoshua akakwira kujerusarema. muzvivanze zvetemberi akawana vanhu vachitengesa mombe, makwai nenjiva, uye vamwe vakanga vagere patafura vachitsinhana mari. saka akaruka tyava yerwodzi, akadzinga vose kubva panzvimbo yetemberi, zvose makwai nemombe; akarasa kwose kwose mari yavakanga vachitsinhana, uye akapidigura tafura dzavo. akati kuna avo vakanga vachitengesa njiva, “budisai zvinhu izvi muno! hamufaniri kushandura imba yababa vangu muchiita musika wokutengeserana!” vadzidzi vake vakarangarira kuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi, “kushingairira imba yenyu kuchandipedza.” ipapo vayeahudha vakati kwaari, “ungatipa chiratidzo chipi chingatiradza pachena kuti unoita zvinhu izvi zvose nesimba ripi?” yeahoshua akavapindura akati, “paradzai temberi iyi, uye ini ndichaivakazve mumazuva matatu.” vayeahudha vakapindura vakati, “zvakatora makore makumi mana namatanhatu kuti temberi iyi ivakwe, uye iwe uchaimutsa mumazuva matatu?” asi temberi yaaireva waiva muviri wake. shure kwokumuka kwake kubva kuvakafa, vadzidzi vake vakarangarira zvaakanga ambotaura. ipapo vakatenda magwaro namashoko akanga ataurwa nayeahoshua. zvino paakanga ari mujerusarema pamutambo wepasika, vanhu vazhinji vakaona zviratidzo zvaakanga achiita vakatenda muzita rake. asi yeahoshua haana kuvimba navo, nokuti aiziva vanhu vose. akanga asingatsvaki uchapupu hwomunhu pamusoro pomunhu nokuti akanga achiziva zvakanga zviri mumunhu.

3

zvino kwakanga kuno mumwe murume weboka ravafarisi ainzi nikodhimasi, nhengo yedare ravayeahudha raitonga. akauya kuna yeahoshua usiku akati, “rabhi, tinoziva kuti muri mudzidzisi akabva kuna allah. nokuti hakuna munhu angagona kuita zviratidzo zvamunoita kana allah asinaye.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudza chokwadi, hakuna munhu angaona umambo hwaallah kana asina kuberekwa patsva.” nikodhimasi akabvunza akati, “munhu angaberekwa seiko iye ava mukuru? zvirokwazvo haangagoni kupinda mudumbu ramai vake kechipiri kuti aberekwe patsva!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudza chokwadi, hakuna munhu angapinda muumambo hwaallah kana asina kuberekwa nemvura uye nomweya. nyama inobereka nyama, asi mweya anobereka mweya. haufaniri kushamiswa nezvandareva ndichiti, ‘unofanira kuberekwa patsva.’ mhepo inovhuvhuta ichienda kwainoda. unonzwa inzwi rayo, asi haugoni kuziva kwainobva kana kwainoenda. ndizvo zvakaitawo vose vakaberekwa nomweya.” nikodhimasi akati, “zvingaitika seiko izvi?” yeahoshua akati, “iwe uri mudzidzisi wavaisraeri, asi haunzwisisi zvinhu izvi? ndinokuudza chokwadi, tinotaura zvatinoziva, uye tinopupura zvatakaona, asi hazvo, imi vanhu hamutongogamuchiri uchapupu hwedu. ndataura kwauri pamusoro pezvinhu zvapanyika uye hautendi; zvino ungatenda sei kana ndikataura pamusoro pezvinhu zvokudenga? hakuna munhu akamboenda kudenga kunze kwaiye akabva kudenga, iye mwanakomana womunhu. mozisi sezvaakasimudza nyoka murenje, saizvozvo mwanakomana womunhu anofanira kusimudzwawo, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari ave noupenyu husingaperi. “nokuti allah akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa mwanakomana wake mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. nokuti allah haana kutuma mwanakomana wake panyika kuti atonge nyika, asi kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye. ani naani anotenda kwaari haatongwi, asi ani naani asingatendi atotongwa nokuti haana kutenda muzita romwanakomana mumwe oga waallah. kutongwa ndokuku: chiedza chakasvika munyika, asi vanhu vakada rima panzvimbo yechiedza nokuti mabasa avo akanga akaipa. mumwe nomumwe anoita zvakaipa anovenga chiedza, uye haapindi muchiedza nokuti anotya kuti mabasa ake angaiswa pachena. asi ani naani anorarama muchokwadi anouya muchiedza, kuitira kuti zvaakaita zvionekwe pachena kuti zvakaitwa kubudikidza naallah.” shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua navadzidzi vake vakabuda vakaenda kunyika yejudhea, uko kwaakandogara navo kwechinguva, uye akabhabhatidza. zvino yeahochaniwo aibhabhatidza paaenoni pedyo nesarimu nokuti pakanga pane mvura zhinji, uye vanhu vakanga vachiramba vachiuya kuti vazobhabhatidzwa. (panguva iyi, yeahochani akanga asati aiswa mutorongo.) nharo dzakamuka pakati pavamwe vadzidzi vayeahochani nomumwe muyeahudha pamusoro penyaya dzokuzvinatsa nokushamba. vakauya kuna yeahochani vakati kwaari, “rabhi, uya murume wamakanga muinaye mhiri kwajorodhani, iye wamakapupura nezvake, onai, ari kubhabhatidza, uye vanhu vose vari kuenda kwaari.” yeahochani akapindura achiti, “munhu anongogamuchira chete zvaanenge apiwa zvichibva kudenga. imi pachenyu mungandipupurira kuti ndakati, ‘ini handisini kristu, asi ndakatumwa mberi kwake.’ mwenga ndowechikomba. shamwari inoshandira chikomba inomira ichimunzwa uye inozara nomufaro painonzwa inzwi rechikomba. mufaro uyo ndowangu, uye iye zvino wakwana. anofanira kuva mukuru; ini ndinofanira kudukupiswa. “uyo anobva kumusoro ndiye ari pamusoro pavose; uyo anobva panyika ndowenyika, uye anotaura somunhu anobva panyika. uyo anobva kudenga ndiye ari pamusoro pavose. iye anopupura zvaakaona nezvaakanzwa, asi hakuna munhu anogamuchira uchapupu hwake. munhu anohugamuchira, anopupura kuti allah ndowechokwadi. nokuti uyo akatumwa naallah anotaura mashoko aallah, nokuti allah anopa mweya asingayeri. baba vanoda mwanakomana uye vakaisa zvose mumaoko ake. ani naani anotenda mumwanakomana ano upenyu husingaperi, asi ani naani anoramba mwanakomana haangaoni upenyu, nokuti kutsamwa kwaallah kunogara pamusoro pake.”

4

vafarisi vakanzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga achiteverwa navanhu vazhinji uye achibhabhatidza vadzidzi vakawanda kupfuura yeahochani, kunyange zvake akanga asiri yeahoshua aibhabhatidza, asi vadzidzi vake. ishe akati anzwa izvi, akabva kujudhea akadzokera kugarirea zvakare. zvino akanga achifanira kupfuura nomusamaria. saka akasvika paguta romusamaria rainzi saika, pedyo nomunda wakanga wapiwa kuna yosefa nababa vake yaqobho. tsime rayaqobho raiva ipapo, uye yeahoshua, aneta sezvo akanga achibva parwendo, akagara pasi patsime ipapo. yakanga iri nguva inenge yechitanhatu. mukadzi musamaria akati auya kuzochera mvura, yeahoshua akati kwaari, “ndipewo mvura yokunwa?” (vadzidzi vake vakanga vapinda muguta kuti vandotenga zvokudya.) mukadzi musamaria akati kwaari, “iwe uri muyeahudha uye ini ndiri musamaria. seiko uchikumbira kwandiri mvura yokunwa?” (nokuti vayeahudha havadyidzani navasamaria.) yeahoshua akamupindura akati, “dai waiziva chipo chaallah uye kuti ndiani anokumbira mvura kwauri, ungadai wakumbira kwaari uye angadai akupa mvura mhenyu.” mukadzi akati, “ishe, hamuna chamungacheresa nacho uye tsime rakadzika. ko, mvura mhenyu mungaiwanepi? ko, imi muri mukuru here, kuna baba vedu yaqobho, avo vakatipa tsime uye vakanwa pariri ivo pachavo, sezvakaitawo vanakomana vavo namakwai avo nemombe?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ani naani anonwa mvura iyi achava nenyotazve, asi ani naani anonwa mvura yandichamupa haangatongovi nenyota. zvirokwazvo, mvura yandichamupa ini ichava maari chitubu chemvura inoerera kuupenyu husingaperi.” mukadzi akati kwaari, “ishe, ndipei mvura iyi kuitira kuti ndirege kuzova nenyotazve uye ndirege kuramba ndichingouya kuzochera mvura pano.” iye akati, “enda, undodana murume wako ugodzoka pano.” akapindura akati, “handina murume.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “wareva zvakanaka pawati hauna murume. chokwadi ndeichi, wakava navarume vashanu, uye murume waunaye zvino haazi murume wako. zvawabva mukutaura ndicho chokwadi.” mukadzi akati, “ishe, ndinoona kuti muri muprofita. madzibaba edu ainamata pagomo iri, asi imi vayeahudha munoti, nzvimbo yatinofanira kunamata tiri ndimo mujerusarema.” yeahoshua akati, “mai, nditendei, nguva inouya yamuchanamata baba musiri pagomo rino kana mujerusarema. imi vasamaria munonamata chamusingazivi; isu tinonamata chatinoziva, nokuti ruponeso runobva kuvayeahudha. asi nguva inouya uye yatouya zvino apo vanamati vechokwadi vachanamata baba mumweya nomuzvokwadi, nokuti ndivo vanamati vanotsvakwa nababa kuti vamunamate. allah mweya, uye vanomunamata vanofanira kumunamata mumweya nomuzvokwadi.” mukadzi akati, “ndinoziva kuti mesiya, anonzi kristu, ari kuuya. paanouya, acharondedzera zvinhu zvose kwatiri.” ipapo yeahoshua akataura akati, “ini ndiri kutaura newe ndini iye.” pakarepo vadzidzi vake vakadzokera kwaari uye vakashamiswa vachiona achitaura nomukadzi. asi hapana akamubvunza kuti, “unodei?” kana kuti “munotaurireiko naye?” ipapo, asiya chirongo chake, mukadzi akadzokera kuguta akandoti kuvanhu, “uyai, muone murume anditaurira zvinhu zvose zvandakaita. kuti uyu angava iye kristu here?” vakabuda muguta vakapinda munzira yavo vakananga kwaari. vanhu vasati vasvika, vadzidzi vake vakafanomukurudzira vachiti, “rabhi, imbowanai chamungadya.” asi iye akati kwavari, “ndine chokudya chandinodya chamusingazivi.” ipapo vadzidzi vake vakati kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo, “asi pano munhu amuvigira zvokudya kanhi?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “zvokudya zvangu ndiko kuita kuda kwowakandituma uye nokupedza basa rake. ko, imi hamuti here, ‘kwasara mwedzi mina ipapo kucheka kwobva kwasvika?’ ndinoti kwamuri, svinurai meso enyu uye mutarise kuminda! yatoibva kuti ikohwewe. kunyange iye zvino mukohwi anopiwa mubayiro wake, kunyange izvozvi anokohwa zvibereko zvoupenyu husingaperi, kuitira kuti mukushi nomukohwi vagofara pamwe chete. nokuti tsumo inoti, ‘mumwe anokusha uye mumwe anokohwa ndeyezvokwadi.’ ndakakutumai kunokohwa zvamusina kushandira. vamwe vakaita basa rakaoma, uye imi makakohwa mubayiro wokubata kwavo.” vasamaria vazhinji vaibva muguta iro vakatenda kwaari nokuda kwouchapupu hwomukadzi hwokuti, “akanditaurira zvose zvandakaita.” saka vasamaria vakasvika kwaari, vakamukumbira kuti agare navo, nokudaro akagarapo kwamazuva maviri. uye nokuda kwamashoko ake vamwezve vazhinji vakava vatendi. vakati kumukadzi uya, “hatichatongotendi nokuda kwezvawataura chete; zvino tazvinzwira pachedu, uye tinoziva kuti murume uyu chokwadi ndiye muponesi wenyika.” mazuva maviri akati apfuura, akabva akaenda kugarirea. zvino yeahoshua pachake akanga ambopupura kuti muprofita haakudzwi munyika yokwake. akati asvika mugarirea, vagarirea vakamugamuchira. vakanga vaona zvose zvaakanga aita mujerusarema pamutambo wepasika, nokuti naivowo vaivapo. akashanyirazve kana yomugarirea, uko kwaakanga ashandura mvura ikava waini. uye ikoko kwakanga kuno mumwe mutariri wamambo akanga ane mwanakomana wake akanga avete achirwara pakapenaume. murume uyu akati anzwa kuti yeahoshua asvika mugarirea achibva kujudhea, akaenda kwaari akandomukumbira kuti auye azoporesa mwanakomana wake, uyo akanga ava pedyo nokufa. yeahoshua akati kwaari, “kana imi vanhu musina kuona zviratidzo nezvishamiso, hamungatongotendi.” mutariri wamambo akati, “ishe, burukai muuye mwana wangu asati afa.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “enda hako. mwanakomana wako achararama.” murume uyu akagamuchira shoko rayeahoshua akaenda. achiri munzira varanda vake vakasangana naye namashoko okuti mukomana akanga apora. akati abvunza nguva yakatanga mwana kunzwa zviri nani, ivo vakati kwaari, “fivha yakabva paari nezuro panguva dzechinomwe.” ipapo baba vaya vakayeuka kuti ndiyo yakanga iri nguva chaiyo paakanzi nayeahoshua, “mwanakomana wako achararama.” saka iye neimba yake yose vakatenda. ichi ndicho chakanga chiri chiratidzo chechipiri chakaitwa nayeahoshua, abva kujudhea ava kugarirea.

5

shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua akakwira kujerusarema kumutambo wavayeahudha. zvino mujerusarema mune dziva riri pedyo nesuo ramakwai, rinonzi bhetesdha nechihebheru, uye rakapoteredzwa namabiravira mashanu. imomo vanhu vazhinji vakaremara vaisivatamo, mapofu, zvirema navakafa mitezo. nguva nenguva mutumwa washe aiburukiramo achibvongodza mvura. munhu aitanga kupinda mudziva shure kwenguva ipi zvayo yainge yabvongodzwa mvura aiporeswa pachirwere chipi zvacho chaainge anacho. mumwe murume akanga arimo akanga arwara kwamakore makumi matatu namasere. yeahoshua akati amuona avete imomo, uye aiziva kuti akanga aita mararamiro iwayo kwenguva refu, akamubvunza akati, “unoda kuporeswa here?” murwere akati, “ishe, handina munhu anondibatsira kuti ndipinde mudziva mvura painenge yabvongodzwa. ndichiri kuedza kupinda, mumwe anonditangira.” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwaari, “simuka! tora rukukwe rwako ufambe.” pakarepo murume uyu akaporeswa; akatora rukukwe rwake akafamba. zuva rakaitika izvi raiva resabata. naizvozvo vayeahudha vakati kumurume uya akanga aporeswa, “nhasi isabata; murayiro unokurambidza kuti utakure rukukwe rwako.” asi iye akapindura akati, “murume andiporesa ati kwandiri, ‘takura rukukwe rwako ufambe.’ ” saka vakamubvunza vakati, “ndianiko murume uyu akutaurira kuti urutakure ufambe?” murume uya akanga aporeswa akanga asingazivi kuti ainge ari ani, nokuti yeahoshua akanga apinda mukati meungano yakanga iripo. shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua akamuwana ari mutemberi uye akati kwaari, “tarira, wapora. usatadzazve kuti urege kuwirwa nechimwe chinhu chakaipisisa.” murume akabva akaenda akandoudza vayeahudha kuti ndiyeahoshua akanga amuporesa. saka nokuda kwokuti yeahoshua akanga achiita zvinhu izvi nomusi wesabata, vayeahudha vakamutambudza. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “baba vangu vanoramba vari pabasa ravo kusvikira nhasi chaiye, uye neniwo, ndiri kushanda.” nokuda kwaizvozvi, vayeahudha vakaedza zvakanyanya kwazvo kuti vamuuraye; nokuti akanga asingaputsi sabata chete, asi akanga achitiwo allah ndibaba vake, achizvienzanisa naallah. yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, mwanakomana haagoni kuita chinhu ari oga; anongogona kuita zvaanoona baba vake vachiita, nokuti zvose zvinoitwa nababa, mwanakomana anozviitawo. nokuti baba vanoda mwanakomana uye vanomuratidza zvose zvavanoita ivo. hongu, kuti imi mushamiswe, vachamuratidza kunyange zvinhu zvikuru kwazvo kupfuura izvi. nokuti sezvo baba vachimutsa vakafa uye vachivapa upenyu, saizvozvo mwanakomana anopa upenyu kuno uyo waanofarira kuti ape. pamusoro paizvozvo, baba havatongi munhu, asi vakapa mwanakomana kutonga kwose, kuti vose vakudze mwanakomana sokukudza kwavanoita baba. uyo asingakudzi mwanakomana, haakudzi baba vakamutuma. “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, ani naani anonzwa shoko rangu uye achitenda uyo akandituma, ano upenyu husingaperi uye haachazotongwi, abva murufu uye aenda kuupenyu. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, nguva inouya uye yatosvika zvino yokuti vakafa vachanzwa inzwi romwanakomana waallah uye avo vanonzwa vachararama. nokuti sezvo baba vano upenyu mavari, saizvozvowo vakapa mwanakomana kuti ave noupenyu maari. uye vakamupa simba rokuti atonge nokuti ndiye mwanakomana womunhu. “musashamiswa pane izvi, kuti nguva inouya yokuti vose vari mumakuva avo vachanzwa inzwi rake uye vachamuka; vose vakaita zvakanaka vachamuka vachienda kuupenyu, uye avo vakaita zvakaipa vachamuka vachienda kukutongwa. ini ndoga handigoni kuita chinhu; ndinongotonga sezvandinenge ndanzwa, uye kutonga kwangu kwakarurama, nokuti handitsvaki kuzvifadza asi iye akandituma. “kana ndichizvipupurira, uchapupu hwangu hahuna maturo. pano mumwe anondipupurira, uye ndinoziva kuti uchapupu hwake pamusoro pangu ndohwechokwadi. “makatuma nhume kuna yeahochani naiye akapupurira chokwadi. hazvirevi kuti ndinogamuchira kupupura kwavanhu; asi ndareva izvi kuti muponeswe. yeahochani akanga ari mwenje waipfuta uye uchivhenekera, uye imi makasarudza kufara kwenguva duku muchiedza chake. “ndino uchapupu hukuru kupfuura hwayeahochani. nokuti iro basa chairo randakapiwa nababa kuti ndiripedze, uye randiri kuita, rinondipupurira kuti baba vakandituma. uye ivo baba vakandituma vakapupura pachavo pamusoro pangu. hamuna kutombonzwa inzwi ravo kana kuona chimiro chavo, uye shoko ravo harigari mukati menyu, nokuti hamutendi iye waakatuma. munoshingaira kunzvera magwaro nokuti munofunga kuti maari mune upenyu husingaperi. magwaro iwaya anopupura pamusoro pangu, asi imi munoramba kuuya kwandiri kuti muve noupenyu. “handigamuchiri kurumbidzwa kunobva kuvanhu, asi ndinokuzivai. ndinoziva kuti hamuna rudo rwaallah mumwoyo yenyu. ndakauya muzita rababa vangu, asi hamundigamuchiri; asi kana mumwewo zvake akauya muzita rake, muchamugamuchira. mungatenda seiko kana muchikudzana pachenyu asi musingashingairiri kuwana kurumbidzwa kunobva kuna allah oga? “asi musafunga kuti ndichakupomerai mhosva pamberi pababa. mupomeri wenyu ndimozisi, wamunoisa tariro yenyu maari. dai maitenda mozisi, mungadai maitendawo ini, nokuti akanyora nezvangu. asi sezvo musingatendi zvaakanyora, muchatenda seiko zvandinoreva?”

6

shure kwaizvozvi, yeahoshua akayambuka akaenda mhiri kumahombekombe egungwa regarirea (ndiro gungwa retibheriasi), uye vazhinji zhinji vakamutevera nokuti vakanga vaona zviratidzo zvaakanga aita pavarwere. ipapo yeahoshua akakwira pagomo akagara pasi navadzidzi vake. mutambo wavayeahudha wepasika wakanga wava pedyo. yeahoshua akati asimudza meso ake akaona vanhu vazhinji zhinji vachiuya kwaari, akati kuna firipi, “tichatenga chingwa kupiko chokuti vanhu ava vadye?” akabvunza izvi achida chete kumuedza, nokuti akanga atoziva kare mupfungwa dzake zvaakanga achizoita. firipi akamupindura akati, “mubayiro unoshandirwa kwemwedzi misere haugoni kutenga chingwa chinokwana mumwe nomumwe hake, kuti awane chimedu!” mumwe wavadzidzi vake, andirea, mununʼuna wapetro, akati, “houno mukomana ane zvingwa zviduku zvebhari nehove mbiri, asi zvingasvikepiko pakati pavanhu vakawanda zvakadai?” yeahoshua akati, “itai kuti vanhu vagare pasi.” panzvimbo iyo pakanga pano uswa huzhinji kwazvo, uye varume vakagara pasi vakanga vachikarosvika zviuru zvishanu. ipapo yeahoshua akatora zvingwa zviya, akavonga, uye akazvigovera kuna vaya vakanga vagara pasi mumwe nomumwe paaida napo. akaita zvimwe chetezvo nehove. vakati vadya vose, akati kuvadzidzi vake, “unganidzai zvimedu zvose zvasara. musarega zvichiraswa.” saka vakazviunganidza zvikazara matengu gumi namaviri nezvimedu zvezvingwa zvebhari zvishanu, zvakanga zvasiyiwa navaya vakanga vadya. vanhu vakati vaona chiratidzo chakanga chaitwa nayeahoshua, vakatanga kuti, “zvirokwazvo uyu ndiye muprofita aifanira kuuya panyika.” yeahoshua, akaziva kuti vaida kumumanikidza kuti vamuite mambo, akabvazve, akaenda kugomo ari oga. nguva yamadekwana yakati yasvika, vadzidzi vake vakaburuka vakaenda kugungwa, uko kwavakandopinda mugwa vakasimuka vakayambuka vakaenda mhiri kwegungwa vakananga kukapenaume. zvino kwakanga kwasviba, uye yeahoshua akanga asati ava pavari. mhepo ine simba yakanga ichivhuvhuta uye kukava namafungu ane hasha. vakati vakwasva igwa kwamakiromita angaita mashanu kana matanhatu, vakaona yeahoshua achiuya kuigwa, achifamba pamusoro pemvura; uye vakatya zvikuru. asi iye akati kwavari, “ndini; musatya.” ipapo vakafara kumugamuchira mugwa; pakarepo igwa rakasvika kumahombekombe kwavakanga vakananga. fume mangwana, vanhu vazhinji vakanga vasara mhiri kwegungwa vakatanga kuona kuti pakanga pachingova neigwa rimwe chete ipapo, uye kuti yeahoshua haana kunge apinda mariri kuti aende navadzidzi vake, asi kuti vakanga vaenda vari voga. ipapo mamwe magwa aibva kutibheriasi akasvika pedyo nenzvimbo yakanga yadyirwa chingwa navanhu shure kwokuvonga kwashe. vazhinji vakati vaona kuti yeahoshua navadzidzi vake vakanga vasisipo, vakapinda mumagwa ndokuenda kukapenaume vachitsvaka yeahoshua. vakati vamuwana ari mhiri kwegungwa vakamubvunza vakati, “rabhi, makauya kuno riniko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, muri kunditsvaka, kwete nokuda kwokuti makaona zviratidzo, asi nokuda kwokuti makadya zvingwa uye mukaguta. musashandira zvokudya zvinopera, asi shandirai zvokudya zvinogara kuupenyu husingaperi zvamuchapiwa nomwanakomana womunhu. allah baba vakaisa chisimbiso chavo paari.” ipapo vakamubvunza vakati, “tinofanira kuita seiko kuti tiite mabasa anodikanwa naallah?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “basa raallah nderiri: kuti mutende kuna iye waakatuma.” saka vakamubvunza vakati, “muchatiratidza chiratidzo cheiko chatingaona kuti tigokutendai? muchaiteiko? madzibaba edu akadya mana murenje; sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: ‘akavapa chingwa chakabva kudenga kuti vadye.’ ” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, haasi mozisi akakupai chingwa chakabva kudenga, asi kuti ndibaba vangu vanokupai chingwa chezvokwadi chinobva kudenga. nokuti chingwa chaallah ndiye anoburuka achibva kudenga uye anopa upenyu kunyika.” ivo vakati, “ishe, kubva zvino zvichienda mberi, tipei chingwa ichi.” ipapo yeahoshua akataura achiti, “ndini chingwa choupenyu. ani naani anouya kwandiri haangatongovi nenzara, uye ani naani anotenda kwandiri haangatongovi nenyota. asi sezvandakakuudzai, makandiona uye hamutendi nazvino. zvose zvandinopiwa nababa zvichauya kwandiri, uye ani naani anouya kwandiri handingatongomurasiri kure. nokuti handina kuburuka kubva kudenga kuti ndizoita kuda kwangu asi kuti ndizoita kuda kwaiye akandituma. uye uku ndiko kuda kwaiye akandituma, kuti ndirege kurasikirwa navose vaakandipa, asi kuti ndivamutse pazuva rokupedzisira. nokuti kuda kwababa vangu ndiko kuti ani naani anotarira kumwanakomana agotenda kwaari achava noupenyu husingaperi, uye ndichamumutsa pazuva rokupedzisira.” ipapo, vayeahudha vakatanga kugununʼuna pamusoro pake nokuti akati, “ndini chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga.” vakati, “ko, uyu haasi yeahoshua, mwanakomana wayosefa here, watinoziva baba vake namai vake? zvino anotaura sei achiti, ‘ndakaburuka kubva kudenga’?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “regai kugununʼuna pakati penyu. hakuna munhu angauya kwandiri kunze kwokunge baba vakandituma vamukweva, uye ndichamumutsa pazuva rokupedzisira. muvaprofita makanyorwa muchinzi: ‘vose vachadzidziswa naallah.’ ani naani anoteerera kuna baba uye anodzidza kubva kwavari anouya kwandiri. hakuna munhu akaona baba kunze kwouyo anobva kuna allah; ndiye chete akaona baba. zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uyo anotenda ndiye ano upenyu husingaperi. ndini chingwa choupenyu. madzitateguru enyu akadya mana mugwenga, asi vakafa. asi hechino chingwa chinobva kudenga, chinoti kana munhu akadya haangafi. ndini chingwa chipenyu chakaburuka kubva kudenga. kana munhu upi zvake akadya chingwa ichi, achararama nokusingaperi. chingwa ichi inyama yangu, yandichapa nokuda kwoupenyu hwenyika.” ipapo vayeahudha vakatanga kukakavadzana zvikuru pakati pavo vachiti, “munhu uyu angatipa nyama yake kuti tiidye seiko?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, kana musingadyi nyama yomwanakomana womunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu anogara mandiri, uye ini maari. nokuti nyama yangu ndicho chokudya chaicho. ani naani anodya nyama yangu uye anonwa ropa rangu anogara mandiri, neni maari. sezvo baba vapenyu vakandituma uye ndichirarama nokuda kwababa, saizvozvo uyo anodya pandiri achararama nokuda kwangu. ichi ndicho chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga. madzitateguru enyu akadya mana uye akafa, asi ani naani anodya chingwa ichi achararama nokusingaperi.” akataura izvi paakanga achidzidzisa ari musinagoge mukapenaume. pavakanzwa izvi, vadzidzi vake vazhinji vakati, “kudzidzisa uku kwakaoma. ndianiko angakugamuchira?” achiziva zvake kuti vadzidzi vake vakanga vachigununʼuna pamusoro paizvozvi, yeahoshua akati kwavari, “izvi zvinokugumburai here? muchaita sei kana mukaona mwanakomana womunhu achikwira achienda kwaaimbova kare! mweya ndiye anopa upenyu, nyama haina chainobatsira. mashoko andataura kwamuri ndiwo mweya, uye ane upenyu. asi vamwe venyu varipo vasingatendi.” nokuti yeahoshua akanga achiziva kubva pakutanga kuti ndivanaani pakati pavo vakanga vasingatendi uye kuti ndiani aizomupandukira. akaenderera mberi achiti, “ndokusaka ndakuudzai kuti hakuna munhu angauya kwandiri kunze kwokunge azvipiwa nababa.” kubva panguva iyi vadzidzi vake vazhinji vakadzokera shure uye vakasazomutevera. yeahoshua akabvunza vane gumi navaviri akati, “nemiwo hamusi kuda kuenda here?” simoni akati, “ishe, tichaenda kuna aniko? imi mune mashoko oupenyu husingaperi. tinotenda uye tinoziva kuti ndimi mutsvene waallah.” ipapo yeahoshua akati, “handina kukusarudzai, imi vane gumi navaviri here? asi mumwe wenyu ndidhiabhori!” akanga achireva yeahudhasi, mwanakomana wasimoni iskarioti, uyo, kunyange akanga ari mumwe wavane gumi navaviri, aizomupandukira.

7

shure kwaizvozvo, yeahoshua akafamba mugarirea, asingadi kuenda kujudhea nokuti vayeahudha vaikoko vakanga vachitsvaka kumuuraya. asi mutambo wamatumba wavayeahudha wakati wava pedyo, vanunʼuna vayeahoshua vakati kwaari, “munofanira kubva pano muende kujudhea, kuitira kuti vadzidzi venyu vagoona zvishamiso zvamunoita. hakuna munhu anoda kuva nomukurumbira anoita zvinhu zvake muchivande. sezvo muchiita zvinhu izvi, chizviratidzai imi kunyika.” nokuti kunyange vanunʼuna vake chaivo vakanga vasingatendi kwaari. naizvozvo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “nguva yangu yakanaka haisati yasvika; asi kwamuri, nguva ipi zvayo yakangonaka. nyika haigoni kukuvengai, asi ini inondivenga nokuti ndinopupura kuti zvainoita zvakaipa. endai henyu imi kumutambo. ini handisati ndoenda kumutambo uyu, nokuti nguva yakanaka kwandiri haisati yasvika.” akati areva izvi, akagara mugarirea. zvisinei hazvo, shure kwokuenda kwavanunʼuna vake kumutambo, iye akazoendawo, kwete pachena, asi muchivande. zvino vayeahudha vakamutsvaka uye vakabvunza pamutambo kuti, “murume uya aripiko?” vanhu vazhinji vaingozeverana nezvake kwose kwose. vamwe vaiti, “munhu akanaka,” vamwe vachiti, “kwete, anonyengera vanhu.” asi kwakanga kusina munhu aitaura izvozvo pachena nokuda kwokutya vayeahudha. mutambo wakati wava pakati, yeahoshua ndipo paakazokwidza kutemberi uye akatanga kudzidzisa. vayeahudha vakashamiswa uye vakabvunza vakati, “murume uyu akawana ruzivo rwakadai seiko iye asina kudzidza?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kudzidzisa kwangu hakuzi kwangu pachangu. kunobva kuna iye akandituma. kana munhu akasarudza kuita kuda kwaallah, achazoona kuti kudzidzisa kwangu kunobva kuna allah kana kuti ndinongotaura ndoga. uyo anotaura zvake anoita izvozvo kuti azviwanire kukudzwa, asi uyo anoshandira kukudzwa kwaiye akamutuma ndiye munhu wechokwadi; hapana zvokunyengera paari. ko, mozisi haana kukupai murayiro here? asi hapana kana mumwe wenyu anochengeta murayiro. seiko muchiedza kundiuraya?” vanhu vazhinji vakapindura vakati, “une dhimoni iwe. ndianiko anoda kukuuraya?” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ndakaita chishamiso chimwe chete, asi imi mose muri kushamiswa nazvo. asi nokuda kwokuti mozisi akakupai kudzingiswa (kunyange zvazvo kusina kubva kuna mozisi, asi kumadzibaba enyu), imi munodzingisa mwana nomusi wesabata. zvino kana mwana achigona kudzingiswa nomusi wesabata kuti murayiro wamozisi urege kuputswa, seiko muchinditsamwira nokuda kwokuti ndaporesa munhu nomusi wesabata? regai kutonga nezvinoonekwa zvomunhu, asi tongai zvakarurama.” panguva iyoyo vamwe vanhu vejerusarema vakatanga kubvunzana vachiti, “ko, uyu haasiye murume uya wavari kuedza kuuraya here? hoyu ari pano, ari kutaura zvake pachena, uye havatauri kana shoko kwaari. ko, vakuru vatenderana kanhi kuti ndiye kristu? asi tinoziva kunobva murume uyu; kristu paanouya, hakuna munhu achaziva kwaanobva.” ipapo yeahoshua, achiri kudzidzisa ari mutemberi, akadanidzira achiti, “hongu, munondiziva, uye munoziva kwandinobva. handisi pano nokuda kwangu, asi uyo akandituma ndiye wechokwadi. imi hamumuzivi, asi ini ndinomuziva nokuti ndinobva kwaari, uye ndiye akandituma.” ipapo vakaedza kumubata, asi hapana munhu akaisa ruoko paari, nokuti nguva yake yakanga ichigere kusvika. kunyange zvakadaro, vazhinji pakati pavanhu vakatenda kwaari. vakati, “kristu paanouya, achaita zviratidzo zvizhinji kupfuura murume uyu here?” vafarisi vakanzwa vanhu vazhinji vachiita zevezeve rezvinhu zvakadai pamusoro pake. ipapo vaprista vakuru navafarisi vakatuma varindi vomutemberi kuti vandomusunga. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ndinongova nemi kwechinguva chiduku, uye mushure maizvozvo ndichazoenda kuna iye akandituma. muchanditsvaka, asi hamuchazondiwani; uye pandinenge ndiri, hamugoni kusvikapo.” vayeahudha vakataurirana vachiti, “munhu uyu ari kuda kuenda kupiko kwatisingazomuwani? achaenda here kuvanhu vedu vakapararira pakati pavagiriki, agondodzidzisa vagiriki? anga achireveiko paati, ‘muchanditsvaka, asi hamuchazondiwani,’ uye ‘pandinenge ndiri, imi hamugoni kusvikapo’?” pazuva rokupedzisira uye zuva guru romutambo, yeahoshua akasimuka akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “kana pane munhu ane nyota, ngaauye kwandiri azonwa. ani naani anotenda kwandiri, sezvazvakarehwa murugwaro, hova dzemvura mhenyu dzichayerera dzichibva mukati make.” nokutaura uku, akanga achireva zvomweya mutsvene, uyo waizogamuchirwa navaya vanotenda kwaari. nokuti mweya wakanga usati wapiwa, sezvo yeahoshua akanga asati apinda mukubwinya kwake. vakati vanzwa mashoko ake, vamwe vanhu vakati, “zvirokwazvo murume uyu muprofita.” vamwe vakati, “ndiye kristu.” asi vamwe vakati, “kristu angabva seiko kugarirea? rugwaro harutauri here kuti kristu achabva kurudzi rwadhavhidhi uye nokubheterehema, guta raigara dhavhidhi?” nokudaro vanhu vakapesana nokuda kwayeahoshua. vamwe vakada kumubata, asi hapana akaisa ruoko paari. pakupedzisira varindi vetemberi vakadzokera kuvaprista vakuru nokuvafarisi, vakavabvunza vakati, “seiko musina kuuya naye kuno?” varindi vakati kwavari, “hakuna munhu akatombotaura nenzira inoitwa nomurume uyu.” vafarisi vakati, “munoreva kuti atokunyengerai nemiwo? pane mumwe wavatongi kana wavafarisi ava kutenda kwaari here? kwete! asi vanhu vazhinji ava vasingatongozivi murayiro, vakatukwa ava.” nikodhimasi, uya akanga amboenda kuna yeahoshua uye akanga ari mumwe wavo, akati, “ko, murayiro wedu unopomera munhu mhosva asina kutanga ambonzwikwa kuti zvionekwe kuti ari kuitei here?” vakapindura vakati, “newewo uri wegarirea? nzvera, uye uchaona kuti hakuna muprofita anobva kugarirea.” ipapo mumwe nomumwe akaenda kumba kwake.

8

asi yeahoshua akaenda kugomo remiorivhi. panguva dzamambakwedza akazviratidzazve mutemberi, vanhu vakamuunganira, uye akagara pasi kuti avadzidzise. vadzidzisi vomurayiro navafarisi vakapinda nomukadzi akanga abatwa achiita upombwe. vakamuita kuti amire pamberi peboka uye vakati kuna yeahoshua, “mudzidzisi, mukadzi uyu abatwa achiita upombwe. mumurayiro mozisi akatirayira kuti titake namabwe vakadzi vakadai. zvino imi munoti kudii?” vakanga vachishandisa mubvunzo uyu kuti vamuteye, vawane hwaro hwokumupa mhosva. asi yeahoshua akakotama akatanga kunyora pasi nomunwe wake. vakati varamba vachimubvunza, akatwasuka akati kwavari, “kana pane asina chivi pakati penyu, ngaave iye wokutanga kupotsera dombo kwaari.” akakotamazve akanyora pasi. vakati vanzwa izvi, vose vakatanga kubva vachiita mumwe mumwe, kutanga vakuru, kusvikira yeahoshua asara oga, uye mukadzi achakangomirapo. yeahoshua akatwasuka akati kwaari, “mai, varipiko vaya vanga vachikupomera mhosva? hapana akutonga here?” iye akati, “hapana, ishe.” yeahoshua akati, “neniwo handikupi mhosva. zvino chienda, uye usiye upenyu hwako hwechivi.” yeahoshua achitaurazve navanhu, akati, “ndini chiedza chenyika. ani naani anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza choupenyu.” vafarisi vakamupikisa vachiti, “hezvo, uri kuratidza wani kuti unozvipupurira pachako; uchapupu hwako hahuna maturo.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kunyange dai ndikazvipupurira pachangu, uchapupu hwangu ndohwechokwadi, nokuti ndinoziva kwandakabva uye nokwandinoenda. asi imi hamuzivi kwandinobva kana kwandinoenda. munotonga nameso enyama; ini handitongi munhu. asi kana ndikatonga, kutonga kwangu kwakarurama, nokuti handisi ndoga. ndinotonga nababa, vakandituma. mumurayiro wenyu makanyorwa kuti kupupura kwavanhu vaviri ndokwechokwadi. ini ndini ndinozvipupurira pachangu; mumwe anondipupurira ndibaba, vakandituma.” ipapo vakamubvunza vakati, “baba vako varipiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hamundizivi ini kana baba vangu. dai maindiziva mungadai maizivawo baba vangu.” akataura mashoko aya paakanga achidzidzisa ari mutemberi pedyo nenzvimbo yaiiswa zvipo. asi hapana munhu akamubata, nokuti nguva yake yakanga isati yasvika. yeahoshua akatizve kwavari, “ndiri kuenda, uye imi muchanditsvaka, uye muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. kwandinoenda, imi hamungauyiko.” izvi zvakaita kuti vayeahudha vabvunzane vachiti, “achazviuraya here? ndizvo zvaanoreva here zvaanoti, ‘kwandinoenda, imi hamungauyiko?’ ” asi akaenderera mberi achiti, “imi muri vapasi; ini ndinobva kumusoro. muri venyika ino; ini handisi wenyika ino. ndakuudzai kuti muchafira muzvivi zvenyu; kana musingatendi kuti ndini iye, zvirokwazvo muchafira muzvivi zvenyu.” vakati kwaari, “ndiwe aniko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “izvozvo zvandanguri ndataura kare kuti ndini iye. ndine zvizhinji zvandinoda kutonga pamusoro penyu. asi uyo akandituma akavimbika, uye zvandakanzwa kwaari ndizvo zvandinoudza nyika.” havana kunzwisisa kuti akanga achivaudza nezvababa. saka yeahoshua akati kwavari, “pamuchasimudza mwanakomana womunhu, ipapo ndipo pamuchaziva kuti ndini iye, uye kuti handina chinhu chandinoita ndoga asi ndinotaura zvandakadzidziswa nababa zvoga. uyo akandituma aneni; haana kundisiya ndiri ndoga, nokuti ndinogara ndichiita zvinomufadza.” kunyange panguva yaakanga achitaura, vazhinji vakatenda kwaari. yeahoshua akati kuvayeahudha vakanga vatenda kwaari, “kana muchiramba muri mudzidziso yangu, muri vadzidzi vangu zvirokwazvo. ipapo muchaziva zvokwadi, uye zvokwadi ichakusunungurai.” ivo vakamupindura vachiti, “isu tiri zvizvarwa zvaabhurahama uye hatina kumbova varanda vomumwe munhu. ungareva sei kuti tichasunungurwa?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, mumwe nomumwe anotadza ndiye muranda wechivi. zvino muranda haagari mumhuri nokusingaperi, asi mwanakomana ndiye anogaramo nokusingaperi. saka kana mwanakomana achikusunungurai, muchava vakasununguka kwazvo. ndinoziva kuti muri zvizvarwa zvaabhurahama. asi munotsvaka kundiuraya, nokuti shoko rangu harina nzvimbo mamuri. ndiri kukuudzai zvandakaona pamberi pababa vangu, uye imi munoita zvamakanzwa kuna baba venyu.” ivo vakati, “abhurahama ndivo baba vedu.” yeahoshua akati, “dai maiva vana vaabhurahama, maidai muchiita zvinhu zvakanga zvichiitwa naabhurahama. izvozvi muri kutsvaka kundiuraya, munhu akuudzai chokwadi chandakanzwa kuna allah. abhurahama haana kuita zvinhu zvakadai. muri kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nababa venyu.” vakapindura vakati, “isu hatisi vana vakaberekwa muupombwe. baba vatinavo isu ndiye allah bedzi.” yeahoshua akati kwavari, “dai allah aiva baba venyu, mungadai maindida, nokuti ndakabva kuna allah uye iye zvino ndiri pano. handina kungouya pachangu;
