asi ndivo vakandituma. seiko musinganzwisisi kutaura kwangu? nokuti hamugoni kunzwa zvandinotaura. imi muri vababa venyu, dhiabhori, uye munoda kuita kuda kwababa venyu. akanga ari muurayi kubva pakutanga, haamiri muzvokwadi, nokuti maari hamuna zvokwadi. kana achireva nhema, ndiwo mutauro wokwake iwoyo, nokuti ndiye murevi wenhema uye baba vadzo. asi nokuda kwokuti ndinotaura chokwadi, imi hamutendi kwandiri! ndiani pakati penyu angaratidza kukanganisa kwangu? kana ndichitaura chokwadi, seiko musinganditendi? uyo ari waallah anonzwa zvinorehwa naallah. chinoita kuti murege kunzwa ndechokuti imi hamusi vaallah.” vayeahudha vakamupindura vakati, “hatina kutaura chokwadi here patakati uri musamaria uye kuti une dhimoni?” yeahoshua akati, “handina kubatwa nedhimoni ini, asi ndinokudza baba vangu uye imi munondizvidza. handizvitsvakiri kukudzwa; asi aripo mumwe anotsvaka kukudzwa, uye ndiye mutongi. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kana munhu akachengeta shoko rangu, haangatongooni rufu.” ipapo vayeahudha vakati kwaari, “tinoziva zvino kuti une dhimoni iwe! abhurahama akafa navaprofita vakafawo, asi iwe unoti kana munhu akachengeta shoko rako, haangatongoraviri rufu. ko, iwe uri mukuru kuna baba vedu abhurahama here? ivo vakafa, uye vaprofita vakafawo. unofunga kuti iwe ndiwe ani?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kana ini ndichizvirumbidza, kuzvikudza kwangu hakuna maturo. baba vangu, avo vamunoti ndivo allah wenyu, ndivo vanondikudza. kunyange musingavazivi, ini ndinovaziva. dai ndanga ndati handivazivi, ndingadai ndava murevi wenhema semi, asi ndinovaziva uye ndinochengeta shoko ravo. baba venyu abhurahama vakafara pavakafunga kuti vachaona zuva rangu; vakariona uye vakafara.” vayeahudha vakati, “iwe hausati watombova namakore makumi mashanu okuzvarwa, asi unoti iwe wakaona abhurahama!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, abhurahama asati azvarwa ini ndiripo!” ipapo, vakanonga matombo kuti vamutake, asi yeahoshua akazvivanza, akabuda mutemberi.

9

akati achifamba, akaona murume akanga aberekwa ari bofu. vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza vakati, “rabhi, ndianiko akatadza, murume uyu kana kuti vabereki vake, zvaakaberekwa ari bofu?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “hakusi kutadza kwomurume uyu kana kwavabereki vake kwakaita kuti zvidai, asi izvi zvakaitika kuti basa raallah riratidzwe muupenyu hwake. kana achiri masikati kudai, tinofanira kubata basa raiye akandituma. usiku huri kuuya, husina munhu angagona kushanda basa nahwo. ndichiri munyika, ndiri chiedza chenyika.” akati ataura izvozvo, akapfira mate pasi, akakanya dope namate, uye akariisa pameso omurume uya. akati kwaari, “enda undoshamba mudziva resiroami” (shoko iri rinoreva kuti kutumwa). saka murume uya akaenda akandoshamba, akadzoka ava kuona. vavakidzani vake navaya vakanga vambomuona achipemha vakati, “ko, uyu haasi iye murume uya aisimbogara achipemha here?” vamwe vakati, “ndiye.” vamwe vakati, “kwete, anenge akangofanana naye chete.” asi iye pachake akaramba achiti, “ndini iye.” vakamubvunza vakati, “meso ako akasvinudzwa sei?” akapindura akati, “murume anonzi yeahoshua akakanya dope akarizora pameso angu. akandiudza kuti ndiende kusiroami ndinoshamba. saka ndakaenda ndikandoshamba, uye ipapo ndakagona kuona.” vakamubvunza vakati, “aripiko murume wacho?” iye akati, “handizivi.” vakauyisa murume uya aimbova bofu kuvafarisi. zvino zuva iro rakakanyiwa dope rikazorwa pameso omurume uya nayeahoshua, raiva zuva resabata. naizvozvo vafarisi vakamubvunzawo kuti akasvinudzwa sei. murume uya akapindura akati, “azora dope pameso angu uye ndikandoshamba, zvino ndava kuona.” vamwe vafarisi vakati, “murume uyu haabvi kuna allah, nokuti haachengeti sabata.” asi vamwe vakati, “ko, mutadzi angaita zviratidzo zvakadai seiko?” nokudaro vakabva vapesana. pakupedzisira vakadzokerazve kumurume uya akaberekwa ari bofu vakati, “ko, iwe unoti kudini naye, sezvo akasvinudza meso ako.” murume uya akapindura akati, “muprofita.” kunyange zvakadaro, vayeahudha havana kubvuma kuti akanga ari bofu uye kuti akanga asvinudzwa meso ake, kusvikira vadana vabereki vake. vakati kwavari, “mwanakomana wenyu here uyu? ndiye here wamunoti akaberekwa ari bofu? seiko ava kuona iye zvino?” vabereki vake vakati, “tinoziva kuti ndiye mwanakomana wedu, uye tinoziva kuti akaberekwa ari bofu. asi kuti ari kuona sei nhasi kana kuti ndiani asvinudza meso ake, isu hatizivi. mubvunzei. akura; achazvidavirira oga.” vabereki vake vakataura izvi nokuti vaitya vayeahudha, nokuti vayeahudha vakanga vatotenderana kuti ani naani anenge angopupura kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu aizofanira kubudiswa musinagoge. ndokusaka vabereki vake vakati, “akura mubvunzei iye.” vakadanazve murume uya akambenge ari bofu kechipiri. vakati kwaari, “ipa mbiri kuna allah. isu tinoziva kuti murume uyu mutadzi.” akapindura akati, “kana ari mutadzi kana asiri, ini handizvizivi. ndinoziva chinhu chimwe chete. ndakanga ndiri bofu asi zvino ndoona!” ipapo vakamubvunza vakati, “akaiteiko kwauri? akasvinudza meso ako seiko?” akapindura akati, “ndanguri ndakuudzai, asi hamuna kuteerera. munodireiko kuzvinzwazve? munoda kuva vadzidzi vakewo here?” ipapo vakamutuka vakati, “iwe hako ndiwe mudzidzi wake munhu uyu! isu tiri vadzidzi vamozisi! tinoziva kuti allah akataura namozisi, asi kana ari munhu uyu, hatimbozivi kwaanobva.” murume uya akapindura akati, “zvino, izvi zvinoshamisa chose! hamuzivi kwaanobva, asi iye akasvinudza meso angu. tinoziva kuti allah haanzwi vatadzi. anonzwa munhu anomutya uye anoita kuda kwake. hakuna munhu akatombonzwa nezvokusvinudzwa kwameso omunhu akaberekwa ari bofu. dai murume uyu asina kubva kuna allah, haaigona kuita chinhu.” ipapo vakapindura vakati, “iwe wakaberekerwa muchivi; unoda seiko kutidzidzisa!” ipapo vakamubudisa kunze. yeahoshua akanzwa kuti vakanga vamudzingira kunze, uye akati amuwana, akati kwaari, “unotenda here kumwanakomana womunhu?” murume uya akapindura akati, “iye ndianiko nhai, ishe? ndiudzei kuti ndigotenda kwaari.” yeahoshua akati, “wamuona zvino; uye ndiye ari kutaura newe.” ipapo murume uya akati, “ishe, ndinotenda,” akabva amunamata. yeahoshua akati, “kutonga ndiko kwandakavinga munyika ino, kuitira kuti mapofu aone uye avo vanoona vave mapofu.” vamwe vafarisi vaiva naye vakamunzwa achitaura izvi vakati, “watii? nesuwo tiri mapofu here?” yeahoshua akati, “dai maiva mapofu, mungadai musina mhosva yechivi; asi zvino zvamunoti munoona, mhosva yenyu inoramba iripo.”

10

“ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti munhu asingapindi mudanga ramakwai napamukova, asi anokwira kuti apinde naparutivi, imbavha uye igororo. munhu anopinda napamukova ndiye mufudzi wamakwai. murindi anomuzarurira musuo, uye makwai anonzwa inzwi rake. anodana makwai ake nezita agoatungamirira kunze. kana achinge abudisa makwai ake ose, anofamba ari mberi kwawo, uye makwai ake anomutevera nokuti anoziva inzwi rake. asi haatongoteveri mutorwa; asi anotomutiza nokuti haazivi inzwi romweni.” yeahoshua akataura mufananidzo uyu kwavari, asi havana kunzwisisa zvaakanga achivaudza. naizvozvo yeahoshua akatizve kwavari, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, ndini mukova wamakwai. vose vakanditangira vaiva mbavha namakororo, asi makwai haana kuvanzwa. ndini mukova; ani naani anopinda napandiri achaponeswa. achapinda agobuda, uye achawana mafuro. mbavha inongouya kuzoba nokuuraya nokuparadza; ini ndakauya kuti ave noupenyu, uye ave nohwakazara. “ndini mufudzi akanaka. mufudzi akanaka anorasira makwai ake upenyu hwake. mushandi haasi iye mufudzi nomwene wamakwai. saka paanoona bere richiuya, anosiya makwai obva atiza. ipapo bere rinobata boka ramakwai uye roaparadzira. munhu uyu anotiza nokuti mushandi zvake uye haana hanya namakwai. “ndini mufudzi wamakwai; ndinoziva makwai angu uye makwai angu anondiziva, baba sezvavanondiziva uye neni ndichiziva baba, uye ndinorasira makwai angu upenyu hwangu. ndina mamwe makwai asati ari edanga rino. naiwo ndinofanira kuauyisawo. naiwowo achanzwa inzwi rangu, uye achava boka rimwe nomufudzi mumwe chete. chinoita kuti baba vandide ndechokuti ndinorasira makwai angu upenyu hwangu, uye ndichahutorazve. hakuna munhu angahutora kwandiri, asi ndinohupa pachangu. ndine simba rokuhurasa uye ndine simba rokuhutorazve. uyu murayiro ndakaupiwa nababa.” ipapo vayeahudha vakapesanazve nokuda kwamashoko aya. vazhinji vavo vakati, “akabatwa nedhimoni uye anopenga. seiko muchimuteerera?” asi vamwe vakati, “aya haangavi mashoko omunhu ane dhimoni. ko, dhimoni ringasvinudza meso ousingaoni here?” ipapo mutambo wokukumikidzwa kwetemberi pajerusarema wakasvika. yainge iri nguva yechando, uye yeahoshua akanga ari mutemberi achifamba mubiravira rasoromoni. vayeahudha vakanga vakamukomba, vakati, “ucharamba uchitinetsa kusvikira riniko? kana uri kristu, tiudze pachena.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndakakuudzai, asi hamutendi. zvishamiso zvandinoita muzita rababa vangu zvinondipupurira, asi hamutendi nokuti hamusi makwai angu. makwai angu anonzwa inzwi rangu; ini ndinoaziva, uye anonditevera. ndinoapa upenyu husingaperi, uye haatongofi; hakuna munhu angaabvuta muruoko rwangu. baba vangu, ivo vakaapa kwandiri, vakuru kuna vose; hakuna munhu angaabvuta muruoko rwababa vangu. ini nababa tiri vamwe.” vayeahudha vakanongazve matombo kuti vamutake, asi yeahoshua akati kwavari, “ndakakuratidzai mabasa esimba mazhinji kubva kuna baba. nderipiko basa ipapa ramunoda kunditakira namabwe?” vakamupindura vachiti, “hatisi kukutakira basa ripi zvaro ipapa, asi nokuda kwokumhura allah, nokuti iwe, munhuwo zvake, unozviti uri allah.” yeahoshua akavapindura akati, “ko, hazvina kunyorwa here mumurayiro wenyu, kuti ‘ndakati muri vamwari’? kana akavaidza ‘vamwari,’ avo shoko raallah rakasvika kwavari, uye rugwaro harungaputswi, zvakadii kuno uyo akatsaurwa nababa saiye wavo chaiye uye wavakatuma panyika? seiko muchindipomera mhosva yokumhura, zvandati, ‘ndiri mwanakomana waallah’? musanditenda kana ndisina kuita zvinoitwa nababa vangu. asi kana ndichizviita, kunyange dai musinganditendi, tendai mabasa esimba, kuti mugoziva uye mugonzwisisa kuti baba vari mandiri, uye ini ndiri muna baba.” vakaedzazve kumubata, asi akavapunyuka. ipapo yeahoshua akayambuka jorodhani kunzvimbo yakanga ichibhabhatidzira yeahochani pamazuva okutanga. akagara ikoko uye vanhu vazhinji vakauya kwaari. vakati, “kunyange zvake yeahochani asina kumboita mabasa esimba, zvose zvakataurwa nayeahochani pamusoro pomurume uyu zvaiva zvechokwadi.” uye panzvimbo iyo, vazhinji vakatenda kuna yeahoshua.

11

zvino mumwe murume ainzi razaro akanga achirwara. aibva kubhetani, musha wamiriamu namarita mukoma wake. miriamu uyu, ane hanzvadzi yake razaro akanga avete achirwara, ndiye uya akadururira mafuta anonhuhwira pana ishe uye akapukuta tsoka dzake nebvudzi rake. saka hanzvadzi dzake dzakatuma shoko kuna yeahoshua, dzikati, “ishe, uya wamunoda ari kurwara.” akati anzwa izvozvo, yeahoshua akati, “kurwara uku hakumusvitsi kurufu. kwete, kune chokuita nokukudzwa kwaallah kuitira kuti mwanakomana waallah akudzwe kubudikidza naizvozvo.” yeahoshua aida marita, nomununʼuna wake uye narazaro. asi paakanzwa kuti razaro akanga achirwara, akagara paakanga ari kwamamwe mazuva maviri. ipapo akati kuvadzidzi vake, “ngatidzokerei kujudhea.” vakati kwaari, “asika rabhi, nguva pfupi ichangopfuura, vayeahudha vakanga vachiedza kukutakai namabwe, zvino munoda kudzokerazve ikoko here?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ko, nguva hadzizi gumi nembiri pazuva here? munhu anofamba masikati haagumburwi, nokuti anoona nechiedza chenyika ino. anogumburwa paanenge achifamba usiku, nokuti haana chiedza.” akati ataura izvi, akaenderera mberi achiti kwavari, “shamwari yedu razaro avata; asi ndiri kuenda ikoko kunomumutsa.” vadzidzi vake vakapindura vakati, “ishe, kana akavata, achaita zviri nani.” yeahoshua akanga achitaura nezvorufu rwake, asi vadzidzi vake vakafunga kuti akanga achireva kuvata hope chaidzo. saka ipapo akavataurira pachena akati, “razaro afa, uye nokuda kwenyu, ndinofara nokuti ndakanga ndisiko, kuitira kuti imi mugotenda. asi ngatichiendai kwaari.” ipapo tomasi dhidhimo akati kuvadzidzi vose, “ngatiendei, kuti tinofawo naye.” yeahoshua paakasvika akawana razaro anguva ava muguva kwamazuva mana. bhetani yaiva makiromita angangosvika matatu kubva mujerusarema, uye vayeahudha vazhinji vakanga vauya kuna marita namiriamu kuti vazovanyaradza pakurasikirwa kwavo nehanzvadzi yavo. marita akati anzwa kuti yeahoshua auya, akabuda kundomuchingamidza, asi miriamu akasara mumba. marita akati kuna yeahoshua, “ishe, dai maiva pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa. asi ndinoziva kuti kunyange izvozvi allah achakupai zvose zvamuchakumbira.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “hanzvadzi yako ichamukazve.” marita akati, “ndinoziva kuti achamukazve pakumuka kwezuva rokupedzisira.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “ndini kumuka noupenyu. uyo anotenda kwandiri achararama, kunyange dai akafa; uye ani naani anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haangatongofi. unotenda here izvi?” iye akati, “hongu, ishe, ndinotenda kuti ndimi kristu, mwanakomana waallah, uyo akanzi achauya panyika.” akati ataura izvozvo, akadzokera akandodana parutivi mununʼuna wake miriamu. akati, “mudzidzisi ari pano, uye ari kukubvunza.” miriamu akati anzwa izvozvo, akasimuka nokukurumidza akaenda kwaari. zvino yeahoshua akanga asati apinda mumusha, asi akanga achiri panzvimbo paya paakanga asangana namarita. vayeahudha vakanga vari mumba namiriamu, vachimunyaradza, vakati vachiona kuti akurumidza sei kusimuka achibuda kunze, vakamutevera, vachifunga kuti zvimwe akanga oenda kuguva kuti andochema ikoko. miriamu akati asvika panzvimbo pakanga pana yeahoshua uye akamuona, akawira patsoka dzake akati, “ishe, dai manga muri pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa.” yeahoshua akati achimuona achichema, uye vayeahudha vakanga vauya naye vachichemawo, akabatwa neshungu kwazvo mumweya make uye akatambudzika. akavabvunza akati, “mamuradzika kupiko?” vakati kwaari, “uyai muone, ishe.” yeahoshua akachema. ipapo vayeahudha vakati, “onai kuti aimuda sei!” asi vamwe vavo vakati, “ko, uyu akasvinudza bofu akanga asingagoni here kuita kuti munhu uyu arege kufa?” yeahoshua, akabatwa neshungu kwazvo, akasvika paguva. rakanga riri bako rine dombo rakanga rakaradzikwa rakachinjika mukova waro. akati, “bvisai ibwe.” marita, hanzvadzi yomurume akanga afa akati, “asika, ishe, pari zvino ava kunhuhwa, nokuti atova mazuva mana arimo.” ipapo yeahoshua akati, “ko, handina kukuudza here kuti kana ukatenda, uchaona kubwinya kwaallah?” saka vakabvisa ibwe. ipapo yeahoshua akatarisa kudenga akati, “baba, ndinokuvongai nokuti mandinzwa. ndinozviziva kuti munogara muchindinzwa, asi ndareva izvi nokuda kwavanhu vamire pano, kuti vatende kuti imi makandituma.” akati areva izvozvo, yeahoshua akadanidzira nenzwi guru akati, “razaro, buda!” murume akanga afa uya akabuda, maoko ake namakumbo zvakapombwa nemicheka, uye chiso chake chakafukidzwa nomucheka. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “mubvisei nguo dzomuguva mumurege aende.” naizvozvo vazhinji vavayeahudha vakanga vauya kuzoshanyira miriamu, uye vaona zvakanga zvaitwa nayeahoshua, vakatenda kwaari. asi vamwe vavo vakaenda kuvafarisi vakavaudza zvakanga zvaitwa nayeahoshua. ipapo vaprista vakuru navafarisi vakadana musangano wedare guru ravayeahudha. vakati, “tiri kuiteiko? hounoka murume ari kuita zviratidzo zvesimba zvizhinji. kana tikamurega achienderera mberi saizvozvi, munhu wose achatenda kwaari, uye varoma vachauya vakatitorera zvose nzvimbo yedu nenyika yedu.” ipapo mumwe wavo ainzi kayafasi, akanga ari muprista mukuru wegore iroro akataura achiti, “hamuna zvamunoziva imi! hamuzivi here kuti zviri nani kwamuri kuti munhu mumwe afire vanhu pano kuti rudzi rwose ruparare.” haana kungotaura izvi pachake, asi sezvaakanga ari muprista mukuru wegore iroro, akaprofita kuti yeahoshua aizofira rudzi rwavayeahudha, uye rusati rwuri rudzi irworwo bedzi asiwo vana vaallah vakapararira, kuti avaunganidze agovaita vamwe. saka kubva pazuva iroro zvichienda mberi, vakarangana kumuuraya. naizvozvo yeahoshua haana kuzofamba pachena pakati pavayeahudha. asi akabva akaenda kudunhu raiva pedyo nerenje, kumusha wainzi efuremu, kwaakandogara navadzidzi vake. pasika yavayeahudha yakati yoswedera, vazhinji vaibva munyika iyo vakakwidza kujerusarema kuti vandozvinatsa pasika isati yasvika. vakaramba vachitsvaka yeahoshua, uye pavakanga vamire mutemberi, vakabvunzana vakati, “munofungeiko? haasi kuzouya kumutambo here?” asi vaprista vakuru navafarisi vakanga varayira kuti kana paine anenge aziva kuna yeahoshua, aifanira kuvazivisa kuitira kuti vagomusunga.

12

kwakati kwasara mazuva matanhatu kuti pasika isvike, yeahoshua akasvika pabhetani, kuya kwaigara razaro, uyo akanga amutswa nayeahoshua kubva kuvakafa. ipapo vakamubikira kudya kwamanheru. marita akavashandira uye razaro akanga ari pakati pavanhu vakanga vari patafura naye. ipapo miriamu akatora chinu chamafuta anonhuhwira enaridho, omutengo unokosha kwazvo; akaadururira patsoka dzayeahoshua akapukuta tsoka dzake nebvudzi rake. uye imba yakazadzwa nokunhuhwira kwamafuta. asi mumwe wavadzidzi vake, yeahudhasi iskarioti, uyo akanga achizomupandukira, akazviramba izvozvo akati, “seiko mafuta aya asina kutengeswa uye mari yacho ikapiwa kuvarombo? anga achikwana mubayiro wegore rose.” haana kureva izvi nokuda kwokuti aiva nehanya navarombo, asi nokuti aiva mbavha; sezvo akanga ari mubati wehomwe, aimboba zvainge zvaiswa muhomwe yacho. yeahoshua akapindura akati, “muregei akadaro. zvakanga zvakagadzirirwa kuti iye achengetere mafuta aya zuva rokuvigwa kwangu. varombo munavo nguva dzose pakati penyu, asi ini hamuzorambi muneni.” zvichakadaro, vazhinji zhinji vechiyeahudha vakanzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga aripo vachibva vauya, kwete nokuda kwake bedzi asi kuti vazoonawo razaro, waakanga amutsa kubva kuvakafa. saka vaprista vakuru vakaronga kuurayawo narazaro, nokuti nokuda kwake, vayeahudha vazhinji vakanga vava kubva kwavari vachiisa kutenda kwavo kuna yeahoshua. zuva rakatevera ungano huru yavanhu vakanga vauya kumutambo yakanzwa kuti yeahoshua akanga ari munzira achiuya kujerusarema. vakatora mapazi emichindwe vakaenda kundosangana naye, vachidanidzira vachiti: “hosana! “akaropafadzwa uyo anouya muzita rashe! “akaropafadzwa mambo weisraeri!” yeahoshua akati awana mhuru yembongoro, akagara pamusoro payo, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “usatya iwe mwanasikana wezioni; tarira, mambo wako ari kuuya, akagara pamusoro pemhuru yembongoro.” vadzidzi vake havana kuzvinzwisisa pakutanga. vakazoyeuka shure kwokunge yeahoshua apinda mukubwinya kwake, kuti zvinhu izvi zvakanga zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake, uye kuti vakanga vaita izvozvo kwaari. zvino vanhu vazhinji vakanga vanaye paakadana razaro kubva muguva uye akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa vakaramba vachiparadzira shoko iri. vanhu vazhinji vakabuda kundosangana naye nokuda kwokuti vakanga vanzwa kuti akanga aita chiratidzo ichi. saka vafarisi vakataurirana vakati, “onai, hakuna kwatinosvika nazvo izvi. tarirai kuti nyika inomutevera sei!” zvino kwakanga kuna vamwe vagiriki pakati paavo vakanga vakwidza kumutambo kundonamata. vakauya kuna firipi, uyo akanga achibva kubhetisaidha mugarirea, vaine chikumbiro. vakati, “ishe, tinoda kuona yeahoshua.” firipi akaenda kundoudza andirea; andirea nafiripi vakazoudzawo yeahoshua. yeahoshua akapindura akati, “nguva yasvika yokuti mwanakomana womunhu akudzwe. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kana tsanga yegorosi ikasawira muvhu ikafa, inongoramba ichingova yoga. asi kana ikafa, inobereka mbeu dzakawanda. munhu anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo, asi munhu anovenga upenyu hwake munyika ino achahuchengetera upenyu husingaperi. ani naani anondishandira anofanira kunditevera; uye pandinenge ndiri, muranda wangu achavapowo ipapo. baba vangu vachakudza munhu uyo anondishandira. “zvino mwoyo wangu uri kurwadziwa, uye ndichati kudiniko? ‘baba, ndiponesei kubva panguva ino?’ kwete, ndizvo zvandakauyira panguva ino. baba, kudzai zita renyu!” ipapo inzwi rakabva kudenga richiti, “ndatorikudza, uye ndicharikudzazve.” vanhu vazhinji vaivapo uye vakarinzwa vakati kwatinhira; vamwe vakati mutumwa ataura kwaari. yeahoshua akati, “inzwi iri harina kuuya nokuda kwangu, asi nokuda kwenyu. zvino ndiyo nguva yokutongwa kwenyika ino; zvino muchinda wenyika ino achadzingwa. asi ini, pandinenge ndasimudzwa kubva panyika ino, ndichakwevera vanhu vose kwandiri.” akareva izvi kuti aratidze mafiro aaizoita. vanhu vazhinji vakati, “isu takanzwa kubva pamurayiro kuti kristu achagara nokusingaperi, saka sei muchiti, ‘mwanakomana anofanira kusimudzwa’? ndianiko uyu ‘mwanakomana womunhu’?” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwavari, “muchava nechiedza kwechinguva chiduku. fambai muchine chiedza, rima risati rasvika. munhu anofamba murima haazivi kwaanoenda. vimbai nechiedza muchinacho, kuti mugova vanakomana vechiedza.” akati apedza kutaura zvinhu izvi, yeahoshua akabvapo akazvivanza kwavari. kunyange zvazvo yeahoshua akaita zviratidzo zvose izvi pamberi pavo, havana kutongomutenda. uku kwaiva kuzadziswa kweshoko raisaya muprofita raakareva achiti: “ishe, ndianiko akatenda shoko redu, uye ruoko rwashe rwakaratidzwa kuna aniko?” nokuda kwaizvozvo havana kugona kutenda nokuti, pane imwe nzvimbo, isaya anoti: “akapofumadza meso avo uye akaomesa mwoyo yavo, kuti varege kuona nameso avo, varege kunzwisisa nemwoyo yavo, varege kudzoka ndigovaporesa.” isaya akataura izvi nokuti akaona kubwinya kwayeahoshua uye akataura nezvake. asi nenguva imwe cheteyo kunyange vazhinji pakati pavatungamiri vakamutenda. asi nokuda kwavafarisi, havana kupupura kutenda kwavo nokuti vaitya kudzingwa musinagoge; nokuti vaida kukudzwa kunobva kuvanhu kupfuura kukudzwa kunobva kuna allah. ipapo yeahoshua akadanidzira akati, “munhu anenge achitenda kwandiri, haatendi kwandiri bedzi, asiwo nokuna iye akandituma. paanonditarisa, anoona iye akandituma. ndakauya panyika sechiedza, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu anotenda mandiri angagara murima. “kana pane munhu zvake anonzwa mashoko angu, asi akasaachengeta, ini handimutongi. nokuti handina kuuya kuzotonga nyika, asi kuzoiponesa. pano mutongi achatonga munhu anondiramba uye asingagamuchiri mashoko angu; shoko riya chairo randakataura ndiro richamutonga pazuva rokupedzisira. nokuti handina kungozvipupurira pachangu, asi baba vakandituma ndivo vakandirayira zvokutaura namatauriro acho. ndinoziva kuti murayiro wavo unotungamirira kuupenyu husingaperi. saka zvose zvandinoreva ndizvo chaizvo zvandakanzi nditaure nababa.”

13

mutambo wepasika wakanga uchigere kusvika. yeahoshua akanga achiziva kuti nguva yakanga yasvika yokuti iye abve panyika uye kuti aende kuna baba. sezvo akanga achida vake avo vakanga vari munyika, akavaratidza zvino kuzara kworudo rwake. kudya kwamadekwana kwakanga kwava kugoverwa, uye dhiabhori akanga aisa mumwoyo mayeahudhasi iskarioti, mwanakomana wasimoni, pfungwa yokuti apandukire yeahoshua. yeahoshua akanga achiziva kuti baba vakanga vaisa zvinhu zvose pasi pesimba rake, uye kuti akanga abva kuna allah uye kuti aidzokerazve kuna allah, saka akasimuka pakudya, akabvisa nguo yake yokunze, uye akamonera tauro muchiuno chake. shure kwaizvozvo, akadira mvura mudhishi akatanga kushambidza tsoka dzavadzidzi vake, achidziomesa netauro rakanga rakamonerwa muchiuno chake. akasvika pana simoni petro, iye akati kwaari, “ishe muri kuda kushambidza tsoka dzangu here?” yeahoshua akapindura achiti, “iwe hausi kuziva zvandiri kuita iye zvino, asi uchazvinzwisisa pashure.” simoni petro akati, “kwete, imi hamungatongoshambidzi tsoka dzangu.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kana ndikasakushambidza, hauna mugove neni.” ipapo simoni petro akati, “ishe, ngadzirege kuva tsoka dzangu bedzi asi maoko angu nomusoro wanguwo!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “munhu anenge amboshamba muviri wose, anongoda bedzi kushamba tsoka dzake, muviri wake wose wakachena. imi makachena, kunyange zvazvo musiri mose vakachena.” nokuti aiziva kuti ndiani aizomupandukira, ndokusaka akati, havasi vose vakanga vakachena. akati apedza kushambidza tsoka dzavo, akapfeka nguo dzake akadzokera panzvimbo yake. akavabvunza akati, “munonzwisisa here zvandaita kwamuri? munondidaidza kuti ‘mudzidzisi’ uye ndizvozvo chaizvo, nokuti ndizvo zvandiri. zvino kana ini, ishe wenyu nomudzidzisi wenyu, ndashambidza tsoka dzenyu, nemiwo munofanira kushambidzana tsoka dzenyu. ndakupai muenzaniso kuti muite sezvandakuitirai imi. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, muranda haasi mukuru kuna tenzi wake, uye atumwa haasi mukuru kupfuura amutuma. zvino zvamava kuziva zvinhu izvi, mucharopafadzwa kana mukazviita. “handirevi izvi kwamuri mose; ini ndinoziva avo vandakasarudza. asi uku ndiko kuzadzisa rugwaro runoti, ‘uyo anogovana neni chingwa andisimudzira chitsitsinho chake kuti azorwa neni.’ “ndiri kukuudzai iye zvino zvisati zvaitika, kuitira kuti pazvinoitika mugozotenda kuti ndini iye. ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, ani naani anogamuchira ini anogamuchira iye akandituma.” shure kwokutaura izvozvo, yeahoshua akatambudzika mumweya uye akapupura achiti, “ndinokuudzai chokwadi, mumwe wenyu achandipandukira.” vadzidzi vake vakatarisana vachida kuziva kuti ndiani airehwa pakati pavo. mumwe wavo, mudzidzi aidikanwa nayeahoshua, akanga akasendamira paari. simoni petro akaninira kumudzidzi uyu akati, “vabvunzei kuti vanoreva ani.” akasendamirazve pana yeahoshua, akamubvunza akati, “ishe, ndianiko?” yeahoshua akati, “ndiye wandichapa chimedu chechingwa kana ndachiseva mundiro.” ipapo, akaseva chimedu chechingwa, akachipa kuna yeahudhasi iskarioti, mwanakomana wasimoni. yeahudhasi achangodya chingwa ichi, satani akabva apinda maari. yeahoshua akati kuna yeahudhasi, “zvaunoda kuita, ita nokukurumidza,” asi hapana munhu akanga ari pakudya akanzwisisa kuti sei yeahoshua akanga ataura izvozvo kwaari. sezvo yeahudhasi aiva mubati wemari, vamwe vakafunga kuti yeahoshua aimuudza kuti andotenga zvimwe zvaidikanwa pamutambo, kana kupa varombo chimwe chinhu. yeahudhasi akati achangodya chingwa, akabuda panze. uye hwaiva usiku. akati aenda, yeahoshua akati, “zvino mwanakomana womunhu akudzwa uye allah akudzwa maari. kana allah akudzwa maari, allah achakudza mwanakomana maari uye achamukudza pakarepo. “vana vangu, ndichava nemi kwechinguva chiduku chete. muchanditsvaka, uye sezvandaudza vayeahudha, saizvozvo ndinokuudzai zvino kuti: kwandinoenda, imi hamugoni kuuyako. “ndinokupai murayiro mutsva wokuti: dananai. sezvo ndakakudai, saizvozvo munofanira kudanana. nokuda kwaizvozvo, vanhu vose vachaziva kuti muri vadzidzi vangu kana mune rudo pakati penyu.” simoni petro akamubvunza akati, “ishe, muri kuendepiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kwandinoenda, imi hamugoni kutevera, asi muchazotevera pashure.” petro akati, “ishe seiko ndisingakwanisi kukuteverai iye zvino? ndichakufirai ini.” ipapo yeahoshua akapindura akati, “uchandifira here? ndinokuudza chokwadi kuti, jongwe risati rarira, uchandiramba katatu!”

14

“mwoyo yenyu ngairege kutambudzika. tendai kuna allah; mutendewo kwandiri. mumba mababa vangu mune nzvimbo zhinji dzokugara; dai zvaiva zvisizvo, ndingadai ndakuudzai. ndiri kuenda ikoko kundokugadzirirai nzvimbo. uye kana ndikaenda kundokugadzirirai nzvimbo, ndichadzoka ndozokutorai kuti muve neni, kuti nemiwo mugova kwandinenge ndiri. imi munoziva nzira yokuenda nayo kunzvimbo yandiri kuenda.” tomasi akati kwaari, “ishe hatizivi kwamuri kuenda, saka nzira yacho tingaiziva seiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndini nzira nechokwadi uye noupenyu. hakuna munhu angauya kuna baba kana asina kupfuura napandiri. dai maindiziva chaizvo mungadai maizozivawo baba vangu. kubvira zvino, munovaziva uye makavaona.” firipi akati, “ishe, tiratidzei baba kuti zvigotiringana.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “firipi, haundizivi iwe here, kunyange ndanga ndiri pakati penyu kwenguva refu yakadai? ani naani aona ini aona baba. unoreva seiko zvaunoti, ‘tiratidzei baba’ hamutendi here kuti ini ndiri muna baba, uye baba vari mandiri? mashoko andinotaura kwamuri haasi angu ndoga. asi, ndeababa, vanogara mandiri, avo vari kuita basa ravo. nditendei pandinenge ndichiti, ini ndiri muna baba uye baba vari mandiri; kana kuti mutende zviratidzo zvamunoona. ndinokuudzai kuti, ani naani anotenda kwandiri achaita zvandanga ndichiita. achaita kunyange zvinhu zvikuru kupfuura izvi, nokuti ndiri kuenda kuna baba. uye ndichaita zvose zvamunokumbira muzita rangu, kuitira kuti mwanakomana avigire baba kukudzwa. kana mukakumbira chinhu chipi zvacho muzita rangu, ndichachiita. “kana muchindida, muchateerera zvandinokurayirai. uye ini ndichakumbira baba, vagokupai mumwe munyaradzi kuti agare nemi nokusingaperi, iye mweya wechokwadi. nyika haigoni kumugamuchira, nokuti haimuoni uye haimuzivi. asi imi munomuziva, nokuti agere nemi uye achava mukati menyu. handingakusiyei muri nherera; ndichauya kwamuri. chinguva chiduku nyika haichazondionizve, asi imi muchandiona. nokuti ndiri mupenyu, nemiwo muchava vapenyu. pazuva iro muchaziva kuti ini ndiri muna baba, uye imi muri mandiri, uye ini ndiri mamuri. ani naani ane mirayiro yangu uye anoiteerera, ndiye anondida iyeye. uyo anondida achadikanwa nababa vangu, neniwo ndichamuda uye ndichazviratidza kwaari.” ipapo yeahudhasi, kwete yeahudhasi iskarioti, akati, “asi ishe, seiko muchida kuzviratidza kwatiri, musingazviratidzi kunyika?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kana munhu achindida, achateerera kudzidzisa kwangu. baba vangu vachamuda, uye tichauya kwaari toita ugaro hwedu naye. uyo asingandidi haateereri kudzidzisa kwangu. mashoko amunonzwa aya haasi angu; ndeababa vakandituma. “zvose izvi ndazvitaura ndichinemi. asi munyaradzi, mweya mutsvene, uyo achatumwa nababa muzita rangu, achakudzidzisai zvinhu zvose uye achakuyeuchidzai zvinhu zvose zvandakareva kwamuri. ndinokusiyirai rugare; ndinokupai rugare rwangu. handikupei sokupa kwenyika. mwoyo yenyu ngairege kutambudzika uye musatya. “makandinzwa ndichiti, ‘ndiri kuenda uye ndichadzokazve.’ dai maindida maifara kuti ndinoenda kuna baba, nokuti baba vakuru kupfuura ini. ndagara ndakuudzai zvichigere kuitika, kuitira kuti pazvinenge zvoitika mugozotenda. handichazotauri nemi kwenguva refu, nokuti muchinda wenyika ino ari kuuya. haana chinhu pandiri, asi nyika inofanira kudzidza kuti ndinoda baba uye kuti ndinoita chaizvo zvandinenge ndarayirwa nababa vangu. “uyai zvino; ngatibvei pano.

15

“ndini muzambiringa wechokwadi, uye baba vangu murimi. davi rimwe nerimwe riri mandiri risingabereki vanoritema, asi davi rimwe nerimwe rinobereka michero vanorichekerera kuitira kuti rigozobereka michero yakawanda. imi matonatswa nokuda kweshoko randataura kwamuri. garai mandiri, uye ini ndichagara mamuri. hakuna davi rinobereka michero riri roga; rinofanira kugara mumuzambiringa. nemi hamungabereki zvibereko kunze kwokunge magara mandiri. “ini ndiri muzambiringa; imi muri matavi. kana munhu akagara mandiri uye neni maari, achabereka zvibereko zvakawanda; kunze kwangu hamugoni kuita chinhu. kana munhu asingagari mandiri, akaita sedavi rakarasirwa kure rikaoma; matavi akadaro anotorwa, okandwa mumoto agopiswa. kana muchigara mandiri uye mashoko angu achigara mamuri, kumbirai zvose zvamunoda, uye muchazvipiwa. baba vangu vanokudzwa naizvozvo kuti mubereke zvibereko zvakawanda, muchizviratidza kuti muri vadzidzi vangu. “sezvo baba vakandida, neniwo ndakakudai, zvino, chigarai murudo rwangu. kana muchiteerera mirayiro yangu, muchagara murudo rwangu, sezvandakateerera mirayiro yababa vangu uye ndikagara murudo rwavo. ndakuudzai izvi kuitira kuti mufaro wangu uve mamuri uye kuti mufaro wenyu uve wakakwana. murayiro wangu ndouyu: dananai, sezvo ini ndakakudai. hakuna munhu ano rudo rukuru kuno urwu, kuti munhu ape upenyu hwake nokuda kweshamwari dzake. muri shamwari dzangu kana muchiita zvandinokurayirai. handichakuidzii varanda, nokuti muranda haazivi zvinoitwa natenzi wake. asi ndinokuidzai shamwari, nokuti zvose zvandakadzidza kubva kuna baba vangu ndakakuzivisai. imi hamuna kundisarudza, asi ndakakusarudzai uye ndikakugadzai kuti muende mugondobereka zvibereko, izvo zvibereko zvinogara. ipapo baba vachakupai zvose zvamuchakumbira muzita rangu. uyu ndiwo murayiro wangu: dananai. “kana nyika ichikuvengai, muyeuke kuti yakatanga kuvenga ini. dai manga muri venyika, ingadai ichikudai sezvainoda vayo. zvino, hamusi venyika, asi ini ndakakusarudzai kuti mubude munyika. ndokusaka nyika ichikuvengai. rangarirai mashoko andakataura kwamuri anoti, ‘hakuna muranda angava mukuru kuna tenzi wake.’ kana vakatambudza ini, vachakutambudzaiwo imi. kana vakateerera kudzidzisa kwangu, vachateererawo kudzidzisa kwenyu. vachakubatai nenzira iyi nokuda kwezita rangu, nokuti havazivi iye akandituma. dai ndakanga ndisina kuuya ndikataura kwavari, vangadai vasina mhosva yechivi ichi. zvino, kunyange zvakadaro, havana chikonzero chokuita chivi chavo. uyo anondivenga anovengawo baba vangu. dai ndanga ndisina kuita pakati pavo zvisina kutongoitwa nomunhu, vangadai vasina mhosva yechivi. asi zvino vakaona zviratidzo izvi, asi vakandivenga ini nababa vangu. asi uku ndiko kuzadziswa kwezvakanyorwa mumurayiro wavo zvinoti: ‘vakandivenga pasina chikonzero.’ “kana munyaradzi asvika, iye wandichatuma kwamuri achibva kuna baba, iye mweya wechokwadi anobuda achibva kuna baba, achapupura nezvangu. nemiwo munofanira kupupura, nokuti makanga muneni kubva pakutanga.

16

“ndakuudzai zvose izvi kuitira kuti murege kutsauka. vachakubudisai musinagoge; chokwadi ndechokuti, nguva iri kuuya yokuti munhu anokuurayai achafunga kuti ari kushandira allah. vachaita zvinhu zvakadai nokuti havana kuziva baba kana ini. ndakuudzai izvi, kuitira kuti kana nguva yacho yasvika, imi mucharangarira kuti ndakakuyambirai. handina kukutaurirai izvi pakutanga nokuti ndakanga ndinemi. “zvino ndava kuenda kune akandituma, asi hakuna mumwe wenyu anondibvunza kuti, ‘muri kuendepiko?’ nokuti ndataura zvinhu izvi, mwoyo yenyu yazara neshungu. asi ndiri kukutaurirai chokwadi kuti: zvakakunakirai kuti ini ndiende. kana ndikasaenda, munyaradzi haangauyi kwamuri; asi kana ndikaenda, ndichamutumira kwamuri. kana asvika achapa nyika mhosva pamusoro pechivi napamusoro pokururama nokutongwa: pamusoro pechivi, nokuti vanhu havatendi kwandiri; pamusoro pokururama, nokuti ndiri kuenda kuna baba, kwamusingazondionizve; uye pamusoro pokutongwa, nokuti muchinda wenyika ino atotongwa. “ndine zvizhinji zvokutaura kwamuri, zvakawanda zvokuti hamungagoni kuzvitakura iye zvino. asi kana iye, mweya wechokwadi, auya, achakutungamirirai muzvokwadi yose. haangazotauri zvake; achataura zvaanenge anzwa chete, uye achakuudzai zvichauya. achauyisa kukudzwa kwandiri nokutora pane zvangu achizvizivisa kwamuri. zvose zvababa ndezvangu. ndokusaka ndakati mweya achatora zvangu agozvizivisa kwamuri. “muchinguva chiduku, hamuchazondionizve, uyezve shure kwechinguva chiduku muchandiona.” vamwe vadzidzi vake vakataurirana vachiti, “anoreveiko kana achiti, ‘muchinguva chiduku hamuchazondioni, uyezve shure kwechinguva chiduku muchandiona,’ uye ‘nokuti ndiri kuenda kuna baba’?” vakaramba vachingobvunzana vachiti, “anoreveiko kana achiti, ‘chinguva chiduku’? hatinzwisisi zvaanoreva isu.” yeahoshua akaona kuti vaida kumubvunza pamusoro pazvo, saka akati kwavari, “ko, muri kubvunzana pamusoro pezvandanga ndichireva here pandati, ‘muchinguva chiduku hamuchazondionizve, uye shure kwechinguva chiduku muchandiona’? ndinokuudzai chokwadi, muchachema uye mugoungudza asi nyika ichifara. muchasuwa, uye kusuwa kwenyu kuchashanduka kukava mufaro. mukadzi anopona mwana anorwadziwa nokuti nguva yake yasvika; asi kana mwana wake azvarwa, anokanganwa kurwadziwa kuya nokuda kwomufaro wokuti mwana azvarwa munyika. naizvozvo nemiwo zvino inguva yenyu yokusuwa, asi ndichakuonai zvakare uye muchafara, uye hakuna achakutorerai mufaro wenyu. pazuva iro hamuzondibvunzizve kana chinhu. ndinokuudzai chokwadi, baba vangu vachakupai zvose zvamuchakumbira muzita rangu. kusvikira zvino hamusati matombokumbira kana chinhu muzita rangu. kumbirai uye muchapiwa, uye mufaro wenyu uchava wakazara. “kunyange ndanga ndichitaura nomufananidzo, nguva inouya yandisingazotauri nemifananidzo, asi ndichakuudzai pachena pamusoro pababa vangu. pazuva iro, muchakumbira muzita rangu. handisi kuti ndichakumbira baba panzvimbo yenyu. kwete, baba pachavo vanokudai nokuti makandida, uye makatenda kuti ndakabva kuna allah. ndakabva kuna baba ndikapinda munyika; zvino ndava kusiya nyika ndichidzokera kuna baba.” ipapo vadzidzi vayeahoshua vakati, “zvino mava kutaura pachena musingaiti nemifananidzo. zvino tava kuona kuti munoziva zvinhu zvose uye kuti hapana achafanira kuti akubvunzei mibvunzo. izvi zvinoita kuti titende kuti makabva kuna allah.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “mava kutenda here zvino? asi nguva iri kuuya, uye yatosvika, yamuchaparadzirwa, mumwe nomumwe achienda kumusha kwake. muchandisiya ndiri ndoga. asi handisi ndoga, nokuti baba vangu vaneni. “ndakuudzai zvinhu izvi, kuitira kuti muve norugare mandiri. panyika muchatambudzika. asi tsungai mwoyo! ini ndakakunda nyika.”

17

yeahoshua akati ataura izvi, akatarira kudenga akanyengetera achiti: “baba, nguva yasvika. kudzai mwanakomana wenyu, kuti mwanakomana wenyu akukudzei. nokuti makamupa simba pamusoro pavanhu vose kuti ape upenyu husingaperi kuna vose vamakamupa. zvino uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi: kuti vakuzivei imi, allah oga wechokwadi, nayeahoshua kristu wamakatuma. ndakauyisa kukudzwa kwamuri panyika nokuti ndakapedza basa ramakandipa kuti ndiite. zvino, baba, ndikudzei pamberi penyu nokukudzwa kwandaiva nako ndinemi nyika isati yavambwa. “ndakaratidza zita renyu kuna avo vamakandipa panyika. vakanga vari venyu; mukavapa kwandiri uye vakateerera shoko renyu. zvino vanoziva kuti zvinhu zvose zvamakandipa zvinobva kwamuri. nokuti ndakavapa mashoko amakandipa uye vakaagamuchira. vakaziva zvechokwadi kuti ndakabva kwamuri, uye vakatenda kuti makandituma. ndinovanyengeterera. handisi kunyengeterera nyika, asi avo vamakandipa nokuti ndevenyu. zvose zvandinazvo ndezvenyu, uye zvose zvamunazvo ndezvangu. uye kukudzwa kwakauya kwandiri kubudikidza navo. ini handichagarizve munyika, asi ivo vachiri munyika, uye ini ndiri kuuya kwamuri. baba vatsvene, vadzivirirei nesimba rezita renyu, zita ramakandipa, kuti vave vamwe sesu tiri vamwe. pandainge ndiinavo, ndakavadzivirira uye ndikavachengeta zvakanaka nezita ramakandipa. hakuna akarasika kunze kwouyo akatongerwa kuparadzwa kuitira kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe. “zvino ini ndiri kuuya kwamuri, asi ndiri kutaura zvinhu izvi ndichiri munyika, kuitira kuti vave nomufaro wangu wakazara mukati mavo. ndakavapa shoko renyu uye nyika yakavavenga, nokuti havachisiri venyika sezvandisiri wenyika. munyengetero wangu hausi wokuti muvabvise panyika asi kuti muvadzivirire pane akaipa. havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. vaitei vatsvene nechokwadi chenyu; shoko renyu ndiro chokwadi. sezvamakandituma munyika, neniwo ndakavatuma munyika. nokuda kwavo ndinozviita mutsvene, kuti naivowo vaitwe vatsvene muzvokwadi. “munyengetero wangu hausi waava voga. ndinonyengetererawo avo vachazotenda kwandiri kubudikidza nemharidzo yavo, kuti vose vave vamwe, baba, sezvo imi muri mandiri uye ini ndiri mamuri. naivowo ngavave matiri kuitira kuti nyika igotenda kuti makandituma. ndakavapa kubwinya kuya kwamakandipa, kuti vave vamwe sesu tiri vamwe: imi mavari uye imi mandiri. ngavakwaniswe muhumwe kuti nyika izive kuti makandituma uye makavada kunyange sezvamakandida ini. “baba, ndinoda kuti vaya vamakandipa vave neni pandinenge ndiri, uye kuti vaone kubwinya kwangu, iko kubwinya kwamakandipa nokuti makandida nyika isati yasikwa. “baba vakarurama, kunyange nyika isingakuziviyi, ini ndinokuzivai, uye ivo vanoziva kuti makandituma. ndakakuzivisai kwavari, uye ndicharamba ndichiita kuti vakuzivei kuitira kuti rudo rwamakandida narwo rwuve mavari uye kuti ini pachangu ndive mavari.”

18

akati apedza kunyengetera, yeahoshua akabva navadzidzi vake akayambuka mupata wekidhironi. parutivi penzvimbo iyi paiva nebindu remiorivhi, uye iye navadzidzi vake vakapindamo. zvino yeahudhasi uyo akamupandukira, aiziva nzvimbo yacho, nokuti yeahoshua aichimbosanganamo navadzidzi vake. saka yeahudhasi akasvika kubindu, achitungamirira boka ravarwi navamwe vatariri vaibva kuvaprista vakuru nokuvafarisi. vakanga vane mwenje namarambi uye nezvombo. yeahoshua, achiziva zvose zvakanga zvichizoitika kwaari, akabuda akaenda kwavari akati, “munotsvaka ani?” vakapindura vakati, “yeahoshua wenazareta.” yeahoshua akati, “ndini iye.” (uye yeahudhasi mupanduki uya akanga amire navo ipapo.) yeahoshua paakati, “ndini iye,” vakasudurukira shure vakawira pasi. akapamhazve kuvabvunza achiti, “ndianiko wamunoda?” uye ivo vakati, “yeahoshua wenazareta.” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “ndakuudzai kuti ndini iye. kana muchitsvaka ini, zvino chiregai varume ava vaende.” izvi zvakaitika kuti mashoko aakanga ataura azadziswe, okuti: “handina kurasikirwa nomumwe weava vamakandipa.” ipapo simoni, uyo akanga ano munondo, akauvhomora akacheka muranda womuprista mukuru, akagura nzeve yake yokurudyi. (zita romuranda uyo rainzi marikusi.) yeahoshua akarayira petro achiti, “isa munondo wako mumuhara! ko, ndicharega kunwa mukombe wandapiwa nababa here?” ipapo boka ravarwi navatariri vavayeahudha vakabata yeahoshua vakamusunga. uye vakatanga kuenda naye kuna anasi, uyo akanga ari tezvara wakayafasi, iye aiva muprista mukuru gore iroro. kayafasi uyu ndiye uya akapa vayeahudha zano rokuti zvainge zvakanaka kuti munhu mumwe chete afire vanhu. simoni petro nomumwe mudzidzi vainge vachitevera yeahoshua. nemhaka yokuti mudzidzi uyu aizivikanwa nomuprista mukuru uyu, akapinda nayeahoshua mudare redzimhosva romuprista mukuru, asi petro akasara kunze ari pamukova. mumwe mudzidzi, aizivikanwa nomuprista mukuru, akadzoka akandotaura nomusikana aichengeta pamusuo ndokupinza petro mukati. musikana akanga ari pamukova akabvunza petro akati, “iwe hausi mumwe wavadzidzi vake here?” iye akapindura akati, “handisi.” kwaitonhora, saka varanda nevatariri vakamira vakadziya moto wavakanga vavesa kuti vadziyirwe. petro akanga amirewo navo, achidziyawo moto. panguva iyoyo, muprista mukuru akabvunza yeahoshua pamusoro pavadzidzi vake uye nezvedzidziso yake. yeahoshua akapindura achiti, “ndakataura pachena kunyika. ndaigara ndichidzidzisa mumasinagoge kana patemberi, apo paiungana vayeahudha vose pamwe chete. handina kutaura chinhu muchivande. munondibvunzireiko? bvunzai avo vakandinzwa. zvirokwazvo vanoziva zvandakareva.” yeahoshua akati ataura izvi, mumwe wavatariri vakanga vari pedyo naye akamurova kumeso. akati, “ndiyo nzira yaunopindura nayo muprista mukuru here?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kana ndataura chimwe chinhu chakaipa, taura kuti chakaipa ndechipi. asi kana ndataura chokwadi, seiko wandirova?” ipapo anasi akamuendesa, akasungwa kuna kayafasi muprista mukuru. simoni petro achakamira achidziya moto, akabvunzwazve kuti, “iwe hausi mumwe wavadzidzi vake here?” akazviramba izvozvo, achiti, “handizi.” mumwe wavaranda vomuprista mukuru, hama youya akanga agurwa nzeve yake napetro, akamupikisa akati “ko, handina kukuona unaye mubindu here?” petro akazvirambazve izvozvo, uye panguva iyoyo jongwe rakatanga kurira. ipapo vayeahudha vakatungamirira yeahoshua kubva kuna kayafasi vakaenda naye kumuzinda womubati weroma. zvino akanga achiri mangwanani, uye kuti varege kusvibiswa, vayeahudha vakarega kupinda mumuzinda; vaida kuti vakwanise kuzodya pasika. saka pirato akabuda kwavari akavabvunza achiti, “mhosva yomurume uyu ndeyeiko?” vakapindura vachiti, “dai anga asiri mutadzi, tingadai tisina kuuya naye kwamuri.” pirato akati, “mutorei imi mumutonge nomurayiro wenyu.” vayeahudha vakaramba vachiti, “asika, isu hatina mvumo yokuuraya munhu.” izvi zvakaitika kuitira kuti mashoko akanga ataurwa nayeahoshua achiratidza mafiro aaizoita azadziswe. ipapo pirato akadzokerazve mumuzinda, akadana yeahoshua akamubvunza achiti, “ndiwe mambo wavayeahudha here?” yeahoshua akati, “kufunga kwako woga here kana kuti vamwe vataura newe pamusoro pangu?” pirato akapindura achiti, “ndiri muyeahudha here ini? vanhu vako navaprista vako vakuru vauya newe kwandiri. wakaiteiko?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “umambo hwangu hahusi hwenyika ino. dai zvanga zvakadaro, varanda vangu vaizorwa kuti ndirege kusungwa navayeahudha. asi zvino umambo hwangu hunobva kune imwe nzvimbo.” pirato akati, “saka uri mamboka!” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “wataura zvakanaka pawati ndiri mambo. chokwadi ndechokuti, ndizvo zvandakazvarirwa, uye nokuda kwaizvozvo ndakauya munyika, kuti ndizopupurira chokwadi. ani naani anoda chokwadi anonditeerera.” pirato akamubvunza akati, “chokwadi chiiko?” akati ataura izvozvo akabudazve kunze kuvayeahudha akati, “handiwani hwaro hwemhosva yomurume uyu. asi itsika yenyu imi kuti ini ndikusunungurirei musungwa panguva yepasika. munoda here kuti ndikusunungurirei mambo wavayeahudha?” vakadanidzira vachiti, “kwete, uyu! tipei bharabhasi!” zvino bharabhasi akanga ari gororo.

19

ipapo pirato akatora yeahoshua akaita kuti arohwe. varwi vakaita korona yeminzwa vakaidzika pamusoro wake. vakamupfekedza nguo dzepepuru vakaenda kwaari vaendazve vachiti, “kwaziwai, mambo wavayeahudha!” uye vakamurova kumeso. pirato akabuda akatizve kuvayeahudha, “tarirai, ndava kumuisa kwamuri kuti muzive kuti ndashaya mhosva paari.” yeahoshua akati abuda kunze akapfeka korona yeminzwa uye nenguo yepepuru, pirato akati kwavari, “hoyo munhu!” vaprista vakuru navatariri vavo vakati vachimuona, vakadanidzira vachiti, “ngaarovererwe! ngaarovererwe!” asi pirato akapindura achiti, “mutorei imi mumuroverere. kana ndirini, handiwani mhosva paari.” vayeahudha vakasimbirira vachiti, “isu tino murayiro, nomurayiro iwoyo, anofanira kufa, nokuti anozviti mwanakomana waallah.” pirato akati anzwa izvi akanyanyisa kutya, uye akadzokerazve mumuzinda. akasvikobvunza yeahoshua achiti, “unobvepiko iwe?” asi yeahoshua haana kupindura. pirato akati, “haudi kutaura neni here? hauzivi here kuti ndine simba rokukusunungura kana kukuroverera pamuchinjikwa?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “haungatongovi nesimba pamusoro pangu kana usina kuripiwa richibva kumusoro. naizvozvo uyo andiisa kwauri ane mhosva yechivi chikuru.” kubva ipapo zvichienda mberi, pirato akaedza kusunungura yeahoshua, asi vayeahudha vakaramba vachidanidzira vachiti, “kana ukasunungura murume uyu, zvoreva kuti hausi shamwari yakesari. ani naani anozviti mambo anopikisana nakesari.” pirato akati anzwa izvozvo, akabudisa yeahoshua kunze uye akagara pachigaro chokutonga panzvimbo inozivikanwa nokunzi: pakarongwa mabwe (nechihebheru pachinzi gabhata). rakanga riri zuva rokugadzirira vhiki yepasika, awa inenge yechitanhatu. pirato akati kuvayeahudha, “hoyu mambo wenyu.” asi vakadanidzira vachiti, “endai naye! endai naye! murovererei!” pirato akati, “ndoroverera mambo wenyu here?” vaprista vakuru vakapindura vachiti, “hatina mambo isu, asi kesari.” pakupedzisira pirato akamuisa mumaoko avo kuti arovererwe. saka varwi vakatora yeahoshua. akatakura muchinjikwa wake, akabuda akaenda kunzvimbo yedehenya (zvichireva kuti gorogota muchihebheru). ipapo ndipo pavakamuroverera pamuchinjikwa navamwe vaviri, mumwe kuno rumwe rutivi nomumwe kuno rumwe rutivi, uye yeahoshua ari pakati. pirato akanyora chiziviso akachiisa pamuchinjikwa. chaiva chakanyorwa kuti: jesu wenazareta, mambo wavajudha. vayeahudha vazhinji vakaverenga zvakanga zvakanyorwa pachikwangwani ichi, nokuti nzvimbo yakarovererwa yeahoshua yakanga iri pedyo neguta, uye chikwangwani ichi chaiva chakanyorwa nechihebheru, chiratini uye nechigiriki. vaprista vakuru vavayeahudha vakati kuna pirato, “musanyora kuti, ‘mambo wavayeahudha,’ asi kuti, ‘munhu uyu akazviti mambo wavayeahudha.’ ” pirato akapindura akati, “zvandanyora, ndanyora.” varwi vakati varoverera yeahoshua pamuchinjikwa, vakabvisa nguo dzake, vakadziita migove mina, mumwe chete kuno mumwe nomumwe wavo, nguo yomukati iriyo yakasara. nguo iyi yakanga isina pakasonwa, yakangorukwa kubva kumusoro kusvika pasi. vakataurirana vakati, “ngatiregei kuibvarura. ngatikandei mujenya tione kuti ndiani achaitora.” izvi zvakaitika kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe runoti: “vakagovana nguo yangu pakati pavo uye vakakanda mijenya pamusoro pechipfeko changu.” saka izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa navarwi. pedyo nomuchinjikwa wayeahoshua pakanga pamire mai vake, mununʼuna wamai vake, namiriamu mukadzi wakiropasi, namiriamu magadharena. yeahoshua akati aona mai vake ipapo, uye mudzidzi waaida amire pedyo navo, akati kuna mai vake, “mai, hoyu mwanakomana wenyu,” uye kumudzidzi akati, “ava mai vako.” kubva pazuva iro zvichienda mberi, mudzidzi uyu akavatora akaenda navo kumba kwake. shure kwaizvozvo, achiziva kuti zvose zvainge zvapera zvino, uye kuitira kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe, yeahoshua akati, “ndava nenyota.” pakanga pane mudziyo waiva nevhiniga ipapo, saka vakanyika chipanje imomo, vakaisa chipanje pachitanda chehisopi, vakachisimudzira kumuromo wayeahoshua. akati anwa yeahoshua akati, “zvapera.” nokudaro, akakotamisa musoro wake uye akabudisa mweya wake. zvino rakanga riri zuva rokugadzirira, uye mangwana acho, rakanga riri zuva rakasanangurwa resabata. nokuda kwokuti vayeahudha vakanga vasingadi kuti mitumbi isiyiwe iri pamuchinjikwa panguva yesabata, vakakumbira pirato kuti makumbo avo avhunwe uye kuti mitumbi ibviswe. naizvozvo varwi vakauya vakavhuna makumbo omunhu wokutanga uyo akanga arovererwa pamwe chete nayeahoshua, uye vakazovhuna omumwe wacho. asi vakati vasvika pana yeahoshua, uye vachiona kuti atofa, havana kuvhuna makumbo ake. asi, mumwe murwi akamubaya nepfumo parutivi, pakarepo ropa nemvura zvikabuda. murume akazviona ndiye akapa umboo, uye uchapupu hwake ndohwechokwadi. anoziva kuti ari kutaura chokwadi, uye anopupura kuitira kuti nemiwo mutende. zvinhu izvi zvakaitika kuitira kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe runoti: “hakuna kana bvupa rake rimwe richavhunwa,” uye sezvinoreva rumwe rugwaro runoti, “vachatarisa iye wavakabaya.” shure kwaizvozvo, yosefa wearimatea akakumbira pirato kuti apiwe mutumbi wayeahoshua. zvino yosefa akanga ari mudzidzi wayeahoshua, asi muchivande nokuti aitya vayeahudha. akati abvumirwa napirato, akauya akatora mutumbi wayeahoshua. akanga achiperekedzwa nanikodhimasi, murume uya akashanyira yeahoshua usiku. nikodhimasi akauya nezvakavhenganiswa zvemura negavakava, zvinenge makirogiramu makumi matatu namana. vakatora mutumbi wayeahoshua, vakauputira vari vaviri nomucheka pamwe chete nezvinonhuhwira. izvi zvaifambirana netsika dzokuviga dzavayeahudha. panzvimbo iyo pakarovererwa yeahoshua pamuchinjikwa, paiva nebindu, uye mubindu imomo, maiva neguva idzva, rakanga risina munhu akamboradzikwamo. nokuti rakanga riri zuva rokugadzirira ravayeahudha, uye sezvo guva raiva pedyo, vakaradzika yeahoshua imomo.

20

mangwanani, pazuva rokutanga revhiki, kuchakasviba, miriamu magadharena akaenda kuguva akaona kuti ibwe rakanga rabviswa pamukova. saka akauya achimhanya kuna simoni petro nokuno mumwe mudzidzi, uya aidikanwa nayeahoshua, akati, “vabudisa ishe muguva, uye hatizivi pavamuisa!” saka petro nomumwe mudzidzi vakabuda vakaenda kuguva. vose vari vaviri vaimhanya, asi mumwe mudzidzi akamhanya kukunda petro akatanga kusvika paguva. akakotama akatarira mukati pamicheka yakanga iri pasi asi haana kupinda. ipapo simoni petro, uyo akanga ari shure kwake, akasvikopinda muguva. akaona micheka iri pasi, pamwe chete nomucheka wokuvigwa nawo wakanga uri mumusoro wayeahoshua. mucheka uyu wakanga wakapetwa uri woga, wakaparadzaniswa nomumwe mucheka. pakupedzisira mumwe mudzidzi, uya akanga atanga kusvika paguva akapindawo. akaona akatenda. (vakanga vasati vanzwisisa kubva murugwaro kuti yeahoshua aifanira kumuka kubva kuvakafa.) ipapo vadzidzi vakadzokera kumusha kwavo, asi miriamu akaramba amire kunze kweguva achichema. achiri kuchema kudai, akakotama kuti atarire muguva akaona vatumwa vaviri vane nguo chena, vagere pakambenge pane mutumbi wayeahoshua, mumwe kumusoro uye mumwe kumakumbo. vakamubvunza vakati, “mai, munochemeiko?” akati, “vabvisa ishe wangu, uye handizivi kuti vamuisepi.” ipapo akatendeuka akatarira shure akaona yeahoshua amirepo, asi haana kuziva kuti akanga ari yeahoshua. akati, “mai, munochemeiko? munotsvaka aniko?” miriamu achifunga kuti aiva muchengeti webindu, akati, “ishe, kana mamutora, ndiudzei henyu kwamamuisa ndigomutora.” yeahoshua akati kwaari, “miriamu.” akatendeukira kwaari akadanidzira nechihebheru achiti, “rabhi!” (kureva kuti mudzidzisi). yeahoshua akati kwaari, “usandibata, nokuti handisati ndadzokera kuna baba. asi enda kuhama dzangu undovaudza kuti, ‘ndiri kudzokera kuna baba vangu nababa venyu, kuna allah wangu, naallah wenyu.’ ” miriamu magadharena akaenda kuvadzidzi akandovaudza kuti, “ndaona ishe!” uye akavaudza kuti yeahoshua akanga areva zvinhu izvi kwaari. madekwana ezuva rokutanga revhiki, vadzidzi pavakanga vari pamwe chete, mikova yakazarirwa nokuda kwokutya vayeahudha, yeahoshua akauya akasvikomira pakati pavo akati, “rugare ngaruve kwamuri!” shure kwokutaura izvi, akavaratidza maoko ake naparutivi pake. vadzidzi vakafara zvikuru pavakaona ishe. yeahoshua akatizve kwavari, “rugare ngaruve kwamuri! sezvo baba vakandituma, ndiri kukutumaiwo.” uye adaro akavafemera akati, “gamuchirai mweya mutsvene. kana muchiregerera ani zvake zvivi zvake, zvicharegererwa; kana musingavaregereri, havaregererwi.” zvino tomasi (ainzi dhidhimo), mumwe wavane gumi navaviri, akanga asiri pamwe chete navamwe vadzidzi, yeahoshua paakauya. saka vamwe vadzidzi vakamuudza kuti, “taona ishe!” asi iye akati kwavari, “kunze kwokunge ndaona mavanga ezvipikiri mumaoko ake uye ndikaisa munwe wangu pakanga pane zvipikiri, uye ndikaisa ruoko rwangu parutivi rwake, handingatendi.” vhiki yakati yapera, vadzidzi vake vakanga vari mumba zvakare, uye tomasi akanga anavo. kunyange zvazvo mikova yakanga yakapfigwa, yeahoshua akauya akamira pakati pavo akati, “rugare ngaruve kwamuri!” ipapo akati kuna tomasi, “isa munwe wako pano; ona maoko angu. tambanudza ruoko rwako uise parutivi rwangu. rega kukahadzika uye utende.” tomasi akati kwaari, “ishe wangu naallah wangu!” ipapo yeahoshua akati kwaari, “nokuda kwokuti wandiona, zvino watenda; vakaropafadzwa avo vasina kuona asi vakatenda.” yeahoshua akaita zvimwe zviratidzo zvizhinji pamberi pavadzidzi vake, zvisina kunyorwa mubhuku iri. asi izvi zvakanyorwa kuti mugotenda kuti yeahoshua ndiye kristu, mwanakomana waallah, uye kuti kana mukatenda muve noupenyu muzita rake.

21

shure kwaizvozvo yeahoshua akazviratidzazve kuvadzidzi vake, pagungwa retibheriasi. vakanga vakaungana ipapo vaiva vanasimoni petro, tomasi (ainzi dhidhimo), natanieri aibva kukana yegarirea, vanakomana vazebhedhi, pamwe chete navamwe vadzidzi vaviri. petro akati kwavari, “ndava kuenda kundoredza,” uye ivo vakati, “nesuwo tichaenda newe.” vakabuda vakapinda mugwa, asi usiku ihwohwo havana chavakabata. mangwanani-ngwanani, yeahoshua akamira pamahombekombe, asi vadzidzi havana kuziva kuti akanga ari yeahoshua. akadanidzira kwavari akati, “vana mune hove here?” vakapindura vakati, “kwete.” akati kwavari, “kandai mambure enyu kurutivi rworudyi rwegwa mugobata.” vakati vaita izvozvo, vakasagona kukweva mambure nokuda kwokuwanda kwehove. ipapo mudzidzi aidikanwa nayeahoshua akati kuna petro, “ndishe!” simoni petro paakangonzwa kuti, “ndishe,” akazvimonera nguo yake yokunze (nokuti akanga aibvisa) akabva asvetukira mumvura. vamwe vadzidzi vakatevera vari mugwa, vachikweva mambure akanga azara nehove, nokuti vakanga vasiri kure namahombekombe, asi makubhiti anenge mazana maviri. vakati vasvika kumahombekombe, vakaona moto wamazimbe uchipfuta une hove pamusoro pawo, uye nechingwa. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “uyai nedzimwe hove dzamuchangobva kubata.” simoni petro akakwira mugwa akakwevera mambure kumahombekombe. akanga azere nehove huru, zana namakumi mashanu nenhatu, asi kunyange zvazvo dzakanga dzakawanda, mambure haana kubvaruka. yeahoshua akati kwavari, “uyai mudye.” hapana kana mudzidzi mumwe chete akabvunza kuti, “ndimi aniko?” vakaziva kuti ainge ari ishe. yeahoshua akauya, akatora chingwa akavapa, akaita saizvozvo nehovewo. uku kwakava kuzviratidza kwayeahoshua kuvadzidzi vake kwechitatu shure kwokumuka kwake kubva kuvakafa. vakati vapedza kudya, yeahoshua akati kuna simoni petro, “simoni mwanakomana wayeahochani, unondida zvechokwadi kupfuura ava here?” akati, “hongu, ishe, munozviziva kuti ndinokudai.” yeahoshua akati, “fudza makwayana angu.” yeahoshua akatizve, “simoni, mwanakomana wayeahochani unondida zvechokwadi here?” akapindura akati, “hongu, ishe, munoziva kuti ndinokudai.” yeahoshua akati, “chengeta makwai angu.” akatizve kwaari kechitatu, “simoni mwanakomana wayeahochani, unondida here?” petro akarwadziwa nokuti yeahoshua akanga amubvunza kechitatu achiti, “unondida here?” akati, “ishe, imi munoziva zvinhu zvose; munoziva kuti ndinokudai.” yeahoshua akati, “fudza makwai angu. ndinokuudza chokwadi kuti, zvawakanga uchiri muduku waizvipfekedza uye uchienda kwaunoda; asi kana wakura, uchatambanudza maoko ako, uye mumwe zvake achakufukidza agokutungamirira kwausingadi kuenda.” yeahoshua akataura izvi achiratidza mafiro aizoita petro achikudza allah. ipapo akati kwaari, “nditevere!” petro akacheuka akaona mudzidzi uya aidikanwa nayeahoshua achivatevera. (ndiye uya akanga akasendamira pana yeahoshua panguva yechirariro uye akanga ati, “ishe ndianiko achakupandukirai?”) petro akati achimuona, akabvunza akati, “ishe, ko, uyuwo?” yeahoshua akapindura akati, “kana ndichida kuti arambe ari mupenyu kusvikira ndichidzoka, unei nazvo iwe? unofanira kunditevera iwe.” nokuda kwaizvozvo, shoko rakapararira pakati pehama kuti mudzidzi uyu haaizofa. asi yeahoshua haana kureva izvozvo kuti haaizofa; akangoti, “kana ndichida hangu kuti arambe ari mupenyu kusvikira ndichidzoka, unei nazvo iwe?” ndiyeyu mudzidzi anopupura zvinhu izvi, uye akazvinyora. tinoziva kuti kupupura kwake ndokwechokwadi. yeahoshua akaitawo zvimwe zvinhu zvizhinji. dai zvose zvainyorwa, ndinoti kunyange nyika yose hayaizova nenzvimbo yaikwana mabhuku aizonyorwa.

revelation

1

zvakazarurwa zvayeahoshua kristu, zvaakapiwa naallah kuti aratidze varanda vake zvinofanira kuitika nokukurumidza. akazvizivisa nokutumira kwaakaita mutumwa wake kumuranda wake yeahochani, iye anopupura zvose zvaakaona, iro shoko raallah uye nouchapupu hwayeahoshua kristu. akaropafadzwa uyo anoverenga mashoko ouprofita uhu, uye vakaropafadzwa avo vanohunzwa uye vagochengeta pamwoyo yavo zvakanyorwa imomo, nokuti nguva yava pedyo. yeahochani, kukereke nomwe dziri mudunhu reezhia: nyasha norugare ngazvive nemi zvinobva kuna iye aripo, uye akanga aripo, naiye achazouya, nokumweya minomwe iri pamberi pechigaro chake choushe, nokuna yeahoshua kristu, iye chapupu chakatendeka, dangwe kubva kuvakafa, nomutongi wamadzimambo enyika. kuna iye anotida uye akatisunungura kubva kuzvivi zvedu neropa rake, uye akatiita ushe nouprista kuti tishumire allah nababa vake, ngaave nokubwinya nesimba nokusingaperi-peri! ameni. tarirai, ari kuuya namakore, uye meso ose achamuona, kunyange naivo vakamubaya; uye marudzi ose enyika achachema nokuda kwake. “ndini arifa naomega,” ndizvo zvinotaura ishe allah, “iye aripo, akanga aripo, uye achazouya, wamasimba ose.” ini yeahochani, hama yenyu nomufambidzani wenyu mumatambudziko, muumambo, nomukutsungirira nomwoyo murefu wedu muna yeahoshua, ndakanga ndiri pachitsuwa chepatimosi nokuda kweshoko raallah uye nouchapupu hwayeahoshua. pazuva rashe, ndakanga ndiri mumweya, uye ndikanzwa mushure mangu inzwi guru rinenge rehwamanda, richiti, “nyora mubhuku rakapetwa zvaunoona ugozvitumira kukereke nomwe: dzokuefeso, simina, pegamo, tiatira, sadhisi, firadherifia neraodhikea.” ndakatendeuka ndikatarisa kuti ndione inzwi rakanga richitaura kwandiri. uye ndakatendeuka ndikaona zvigadziko zvemwenje, uye pakati pezvigadziko zvemwenje pakanga pano mumwe akanga “akaita somwanakomana womunhu,” akafuka nguo yaisvika kutsoka dzake uye ane bhanhire regoridhe pachipfuva chake. musoro wake nebvudzi rake zvakanga zvakachena samakushe, zvakachena sechando, uye meso ake akanga akaita somurazvo womoto. tsoka dzake dzakanga dzakaita sendarira inopenya muvira romoto, uye inzwi rake rakanga rakaita somubvumo wemvura zhinji. akanga akabata nyeredzi nomwe muruoko rwake rworudyi, uye mumuromo make makabuda munondo unopinza, unocheka mativi ose. chiso chake chakanga chakaita sezuva rinopenya nokupenya kwaro kwose. pandakamuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake kunge ndafa. ipapo akaisa ruoko rwake rworudyi pamusoro pangu akati, “usatya. ndini wokutanga newokupedzisira. ndini iye mupenyu; ndakanga ndafa, uye tarira, ndiri mupenyu nokusingaperi-peri! uye ndakabata kiyi dzorufu nehadhesi. “naizvozvo, nyora zvawaona, zviripo zvino nezvichazoitika shure kwaizvozvi. chakavanzika chenyeredzi nomwe dzawaona muruoko rwangu rworudyi nechezvigadziko zvinomwe zvemwenje ndechichi: nyeredzi nomwe ndivo vatumwa vekereke nomwe, uye zvigadziko zvinomwe zvemwenje ndidzo kereke nomwe.

2

“kumutumwa wekereke iri muefeso nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye akabata nyeredzi nomwe muruoko rwake rworudyi anofamba pakati pezvigadziko zvinomwe zvemwenje. ndinoziva mabasa ako, kubata kwako nesimba uye nokutsungirira kwako. ndinoziva kuti haudi kuonana navanhu vakaipa, uye kuti wakaedza avo vanozviti vapostori asi vasiri ivo, uye ukavawana vari venhema. wakatsungirira ukava nomwoyo murefu pakutambudzika nokuda kwezita rangu, uye ukasaneta. asi ndine mhosva iyi newe: wakasiya rudo rwako rwokutanga. rangarira pawakawa! tendeuka uite zvinhu zvawakanga uchiita pakutanga. kana usingatendeuki, ndichauya kwauri ndigobvisa chigadziko chako chomwenje panzvimbo yacho. asi chinhu ichi unacho: unovenga mabasa avanikoraiti, andinovenga neniwo. ane nzeve dzokunzwa ngaanzwe zvinoreva mweya kukereke. kuno uyo anokunda, ndichamutendera kuti adye zvinobva pamuti woupenyu, uri muparadhiso yaallah. “kumutumwa wekereke iri musimina nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye wokutanga newokupedzisira, akafa uye akararamazve. ndinoziva kutambudzika kwako nourombo hwako, asi uri mupfumi! ndinoziva kutuka kwaavo vanozviti vayeahudha uye vasiri ivo, asi vari vesinagoge rasatani. usatya izvo zvava kuda kuzokutambudza. ndinoti kwauri, dhiabhori achaisa vamwe venyu mutorongo kuti akuedzei, uye muchatambudzwa kwamazuva gumi. ivai vakatendeka, kunyange kusvika pakufa, uye ini ndichakupai korona youpenyu. ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe zvinoreva mweya kukereke. anokunda haazokuvadzwi norufu rwechipiri. “kumutumwa wekereke iri mupegamo nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye ano munondo unopinza, unocheka kumativi ose. ndinoziva paunogara, pachigaro choushe chasatani. asi wakaramba wakatendeka kuzita rangu. hauna kuramba kutenda kwako kwandiri, kunyange mumazuva aandipasi, chapupu changu chakatendeka, uyo akaurayiwa muguta renyu, munogara satani. kunyange zvakadaro, ndine zvinhu zvishoma zvandinovenga pauri: una vanhu ipapo vanobatisisa dzidziso yabharamu, uyo akadzidzisa bharaki kuti anyengere vaisraeri kuti vatadze vachidya zvokudya zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo uye nokuita upombwe. saizvozvowo, una vamwe vanobatirira kudzidziso yavanikoraiti. naizvozvo, tendeuka! zvikasadaro, ndichakurumidza kuuya kuzovarwisa nomunondo womuromo wangu. ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe zvinoreva mweya kukereke. kuno uyo anokunda, ndichamupa imwe mana yakavanzika. ndichamupawo ibwe jena rine zita idzva rakanyorwa pariri, rinongozivikanwa naiye anorigamuchira. “kumutumwa wekereke iri mutiatira nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko omwanakomana waallah, ane meso anenge murazvo womoto uye ane tsoka dzinopenya sendarira. ndinoziva mabasa ako, rudo rwako nokutenda kwako, kushumira kwako uye nokutsungirira kwako, uye kuti iye zvino uri kuita zvinopfuura zvawakaita pakutanga. kunyange zvakadaro, ndine mhosva iyi newe: uri kutendera mukadzi uya jezebheri, anozviti muprofitakadzi. nokudzidzisa kwake anotsausa varanda vangu kuti vaite upombwe uye kuti vadye zvakabayirwa kuzvifananidzo. ndakamupa nguva yokutendeuka paupombwe hwake, asi haana kutendeuka. saka ndichamuisa panhoo yokutambudzika, uye ndichaita kuti vaya vaiita upombwe naye vatambudzike zvikuru, kana vakasatendeuka munzira dzavo. ndicharova vana vake norufu. ipapo kereke dzose dzichaziva kuti ndini iye anonzvera mwoyo nendangariro, uye ndichatsiva mumwe nomumwe wenyu zvinoenderana namabasa ake. zvino ndinoti kwamuri mose imi muri patiatira, kunemi vasingabatiriri padzidziso yake uye vasina kudzidza zvinonzi zvakavanzika zvasatani (handichazoisi mimwe mitoro pamusoro penyu): batisisai chete icho chamunacho kusvikira ndauya. kuno uya anokunda uye achiita kuda kwangu kusvikira pakuguma, ndichamupa simba pamusoro pendudzi: ‘achavatonga netsvimbo yesimbi; achavaputsa-putsa sezvaenga zvehari’, sokugamuchira kwandakaita simba kubva kuna baba vangu. ndichamupawo nyeredzi yamangwanani. ane nzeve dzokunzwa ngaanzwe, zvinoreva mweya kukereke.

3

“kumutumwa wekereke iri musadhisi nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye akabata mweya minomwe yaallah nenyeredzi nomwe. ndinoziva mabasa ako; unonzi uri mupenyu, asi wakafa. muka! simbisa zvakasara zvoda kufa, nokuti handina kuwana mabasa ako akakwana pamberi paallah wangu. naizvozvo, rangarira zvawakagamuchira nezvawakanzwa; uzviteerere, uye utendeuke. asi kana usingapepuki, ndichauya sembavha, uye haungazivi nguva yandichauya nayo kwauri. asi una vanhu vashoma musadhisi vasina kusvibisa nguo dzavo. vachafamba neni, vakapfeka nguo chena, nokuti ndivo vakafanira. anokunda achaita saivo, achashongedzwa nguo chena. handingazodzimi zita rake kubva mubhuku roupenyu, asi ndichapupura zita rake pamberi pababa vangu navatumwa vavo. ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe zvinoreva mweya kukereke. “kumutumwa wekereke iri mufiradherifia nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye mutsvene wechokwadi, iye akabata kiyi yadhavhidhi. chaanozarura hakuna munhu anopfiga, chaanopfiga hakuna munhu anochizarura. ndinoziva mabasa ako. tarira, ndaisa pamberi pako mukova wakazaruka usingagoni kupfigwa nomunhu. ndinoziva kuti une simba shoma, asi wakachengeta shoko rangu uye hauna kuramba zita rangu. ndichaita kuti avo vari vesinagoge rasatani, vanozviti vayeahudha kunyange vasiri ivo, asi varevi venhema, ndichaita kuti vauye uye vawire pasi petsoka dzako uye vagoziva kuti ndakakuda. sezvo wakachengeta murayiro wangu kuti utsunge nomwoyo murefu, ndichakuchengetawo panguva yokuedzwa iri kusvika pamusoro penyika yose kuzoedza avo vanogara panyika. ndiri kukurumidza kuuya. batisisa icho chaunacho, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu anokutorera korona yako. uyo anokunda ndichamuita mbiru mutemberi yaallah wangu. haazombobudimo. ndichanyora paari zita raallah wangu nezita reguta raallah wangu, jerusarema idzva, riri kuburuka richibva kudenga kuna allah; uye ndichanyorawo paari zita rangu idzva. ane nzeve dzokunzwa ngaanzwe, zvinoreva mweya kukereke. “kumutumwa wekereke iri muraodhikea nyora kuti: aya ndiwo mashoko aiye ameni, chapupu chakatendeka uye chechokwadi, mutongi wezvisikwa zvaallah. ndinoziva mabasa ako, kuti hautonhori kana kupisa. ndaida kuti uve chimwe chaizvozvi! saka nokuda kwokuti unodziya zvishoma, haupisi kana kutonhora, ndava kuda kukusvipa kubva mumuromo mangu. unoti, ‘ndakapfuma; ndakawana pfuma uye handina chandinoshayiwa.’ asi hauzivi kuti une nhamo, unonzwisa urombo, uri murombo, uri bofu uye hauna kusimira. ndinokupa zano kuti utenge kwandiri goridhe rakanatswa nomoto, kuti upfume; uye uve nenguo chena dzokupfeka, kuitira kuti ufukidze nyadzi dzokusasimira kwako; nechizoro chokuisa mumeso ako, kuitira kuti ugone kuona. avo vandinoda ndinovatsiura uye ndinovaranga. saka shingaira, utendeuke. ndiri pano! ndimire pamusuo ndichigogodza. kana munhu akanzwa inzwi rangu akazarura musuo, ndichapinda ndigodya naye, uye iye neni. kuno uyo anokunda, ndichamutendera kuti agare neni pachigaro changu choushe, sezvandakakunda uye ndikagara nababa vangu pachigaro chavo choushe. ane nzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe zvinoreva mweya kukereke.”

4

shure kwaizvozvi ndakatarisa, uye ipapo pamberi pangu pakanga pano mukova wakanga wakazaruka kudenga. uye inzwi randakanzwa richitaura kwandiri rakanga rakaita sehwamanda, rakati, “kwira kuno, ndigokuratidza zvinofanira kuitika shure kwaizvozvi.” pakarepo ndakava mumweya, uye ipapo pamberi pangu pakava nechigaro choushe kudenga, nomumwe akanga agere pamusoro pacho. uye akanga agerepo akanga akaita sedombo rejasipa nekarineri. muraravungu, wakanga wakafanana nedombo reemaradhi, wakanga wakakomberedza chigaro choushe. zvimwe zvigaro zvoushe makumi maviri nezvina zvakanga zvakakomberedza chigaro choushe, uye vakanga vagere pamusoro pazvo vakanga vari vakuru makumi maviri navana. vakanga vakapfeka nguo chena uye vane korona dzegoridhe mumisoro yavo. pachigaro choushe pakabuda kupenya kwemheni, kudengenyeka uye namaungira okutinhira. pamberi pechigaro choushe, pakanga pane mwenje minomwe yaipfuta. iyi ndiyo mweya minomwe yaallah. pamberi pechigaro choushe paivawo nezvaitarisika segungwa regirazi, rakachena sedombo rekristaro. pakati, paipoteredza chigaro choushe, pakanga pane zvisikwa zvina, uye zvakanga zvakafukidzwa nameso, mberi neshure. chisikwa chipenyu chokutanga chakanga chakaita seshumba, chechipiri chakanga chakaita senzombe, chechitatu chakanga chine chiso sechomunhu, chechina chakanga chakaita segondo rinobhururuka. chimwe nechimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chakanga china mapapiro matanhatu uye chakanga chakafukidzwa nameso kumativi ose, kunyange pasi pamapapiro acho. masikati nousiku hazvina kumborega kuti: pose paipa zvisikwa zvipenyu mbiri, kukudzwa nokuvonga kuna iye anogara pachigaro choushe, iye anogara nokusingaperi-peri, vakuru makumi maviri navana vaiwira pasi pamberi pake iye anogara pachigaro choushe, uye vaimunamata iye anogara nokusingaperi-peri. vaikanda korona dzavo pamberi pechigaro choushe vachiti: “makafanira, ishe naallah wedu, kugamuchira kubwinya nokukudzwa, uye nesimba, nokuti makasika zvinhu zvose, nokuda kwenyu zvakasikwa, uye zviripo nokuda kwenyu.”

5

ipapo ndakaona muruoko rworudyi rwaiye akanga agere pachigaro choushe bhuku rakanga rakapetwa, rakanga rakanyorwa kumativi ose uye rakanamwa nezvisimbiso zvinomwe. uye ndakaona mutumwa ane simba achidanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “ndiani akafanira kusunungura chisimbiso nokuzarura bhuku rakapetwa?” asi hakuna munhu kudenga kana panyika kana pasi penyika aigona kuzarura bhuku rakapetwa kana kunyange kutarira mukati maro. ndakachema nokuchema kukuru nokuti hakuna munhu akawanikwa akanga akafanira kuzarura bhuku rakapetwa kana kutarira mukati maro. ipapo mumwe wavakuru akati kwandiri, “usachema! tarira, shumba yorudzi rwayeahudha, mudzi wadhavhidhi, akakunda. iye anogona kuzarura bhuku rakapetwa nezvisimbiso zvaro zvinomwe.” ipapo ndakaona pakati pechigaro choushe nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina napakati pavakuru, gwayana rakanga rimire uye rakaita serabayiwa, rine nyanga nomwe nameso manomwe, inova ndiyo mweya minomwe yaallah yakatumwa munyika yose. rakauya rikatora bhuku rakapetwa muruoko rworudyi rwaiye akanga agere pachigaro choushe. uye rakati raritora, zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina navakuru makumi mana navana vakawira pasi pamberi pegwayana. mumwe nomumwe akanga ano rudimbwa uye vakanga vakabata ndiro dzegoridhe dzakanga dzizere nezvinonhuhwira, inova ndiyo minyengetero yavatsvene. uye vakaimba rwiyo rutsva runoti: “ndimi makafanira kutora bhuku rakapetwa kuti muzarure zvisimbiso zvaro, nokuti ndimi makaurayiwa, uye neropa renyu makatengera allah vanhu kubva kumarudzi ose uye nendimi dzose, navanhu nendudzi. makavaita ushe navaprista kuti vashumire allah wedu, uye vachatonga panyika.” ipapo ndakatarira uye ndikanzwa inzwi ravatumwa vazhinji, zviuru nezviuru negumi rezviuru zvamazana. vakakomberedza chigaro choushe nezvisikwa zvipenyu uye navakuru. vakaimba nenzwi guru vachiti: “gwayana ndiro rakafanira, iro rakanga raurayiwa, kuti rigamuchire simba nepfuma nouchenjeri nesimba nokukudzwa nokubwinya uye nokurumbidzwa!” ipapo ndakanzwa zvisikwa zvose kudenga napanyika napasi penyika uye napamusoro pegungwa, nezvose zviri mazviri, zvichiimba zvichiti: “kuna iye anogara pachigaro choushe uye nokugwayana ngakuve nokurumbidzwa nokukudzwa nokubwinya uye nesimba, nokusingaperi-peri!” zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvakati, “ameni,” uye vakuru vakawira pasi vakanamata.

6

ndakatarisa gwayana paraizarura chimwe chezvisimbiso zvinomwe. ipapo ndakanzwa chimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chichiti nenzwi rainge rokutinhira, “uya!” ndakatarira, uye ipapo pamberi pangu pakanga pane bhiza jena! akanga akaritasva akanga akabata uta, uye akapiwa korona, akakwira akabuda somukundi kuti andokunda. gwayana rakati razarura chisimbiso chechipiri, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chichiti, “uya!” ipapo rimwe bhiza rakabuda, riri dzvuku kwazvo. mutasvi waro akapiwa simba rokubvisa rugare panyika nokuita kuti vanhu vaurayane. munondo mukuru wakapiwa kwaari. gwayana rakati razarura chisimbiso chechitatu, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chichiti, “uya!” ndakatarira, uye pamberi pangu ipapo pakanga pane bhiza dema! mutasvi waro akanga akabata zviyero zviviri muruoko rwake. ipapo ndakanzwa kurira kwainge inzwi pakati pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina richiti, “chiyero chegorosi ndicho mubayiro webasa rezuva rimwe chete, uye zviyero zvitatu zvebhari ndizvo mubayiro webasa rezuva rimwe chete, uye musakanganisa mafuta newaini!” gwayana rakati razarura chisimbiso chechina, ndakanzwa inzwi rechisikwa chipenyu chechina richiti, “uya!” ndakatarira, uye ipapo pamberi pangu pakanga pane bhiza rakanga rakacheneruka! mutasvi waro ainzi rufu, uye hadhesi rakanga richimutevera riri pedyo mumashure make. vakanga vapiwa simba pamusoro pechikamu chechina chenyika kuti vauraye nomunondo, nenzara nedenda, uye nezvikara zvenyika. akati azarura chisimbiso chechishanu, ndakaona pasi pearitari mweya yaavo vakanga vaurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raallah uye nokuda kwokupupura kwavakanga vaita. vakadanidzira nenzwi guru vachiti, “ishe tenzi, mutsvene wezvokwadi, mucharega kutonga vanogara panyika nokutsiva ropa redu kusvikira riniko?” ipapo mumwe nomumwe wavo akapiwa nguo chena, uye vakaudzwa kuti vamirire kwechinguva chiduku, kusvikira kuwanda, kwavamwe varanda pamwe chete navo nehama dzavo avo vaifanira kuurayiwa saivo, kwakwana. ndakatarira paaizarura chisimbiso chechitanhatu. pakava nokudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru. zuva rakasviba rikaita senguo dzamasaga dzakaitwa namakushe embudzi, mwedzi wose ukashanduka ukatsvuka seropa, uye nyeredzi dzomudenga dzakawira panyika, samaonde eshure azuka kubva mumuonde paunenge wazungunuswa nemhepo ine simba. denga rakabva sebhuku rinopetwa, uye makomo ose nezvitsuwa zvakabviswa panzvimbo dzazvo. ipapo madzimambo enyika, machinda, vatungamiri, vapfumi, vane simba, navaranda vose uye navanhu vakasununguka vakavanda mumapako napakati pamabwe amakomo. vakadanidzira kumakomo nokumabwe vachiti, “wirai pamusoro pedu uye mutivige kubva kuchiso chaiye anogara pachigaro choushe nepahasha dzegwayana! nokuti zuva guru rehasha dzavo rasvika, uye ndianiko anogona kumira?”

7

shure kwaizvozvi, ndakaona vatumwa vana vamire pamakona mana enyika, vakabata mhepo ina dzenyika kuti vadzivise mhepo ipi zvayo kuvhuvhuta panyika kana pamusoro pegungwa kana pamuti upi zvawo. ipapo ndakaona mumwe mutumwa achibva kumabvazuva, ane chisimbiso chaallah mupenyu. akadanidzira nenzwi guru kuvatumwa vana vakanga vapiwa simba rokuti vatadzire nyika negungwa akati: “musatadzira nyika kana gungwa kana miti kusvikira taisa chisimbiso pahuma dzavaranda vaallah.” ipapo ndakanzwa kuwanda kwaavo vakanga vaiswa chisimbiso: zviuru zana namakumi mana nezvina, kubva kumarudzi ose avaisraeri. kubva kurudzi rwayeahudha, zviuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa chisimbiso, kubva kurudzi rwarubheni, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwagadhi, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwaasheri, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwanafutari, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwamanase, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwasimeoni, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwarevhi, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwaisakari, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwazebhuruni, zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwayosefa zviuru gumi nezviviri, kubva kurudzi rwabhenjamini zviuru gumi nezviviri. shure kwaizvozvi ndakatarira uye ndikaona ipapo pamberi pangu vazhinji zhinji vakanga vasingagoni kuverengwa, vaibva kundudzi dzose, nokumarudzi ose, navanhu vemitauro yose, vamire pamberi pechigaro choushe napamberi pegwayana. vakanga vakapfeka nguo chena uye vakabata matavi emichindwe mumaoko avo. uye vakadanidzira nenzwi guru vachiti: “ruponeso ndorwaallah wedu, anogara pachigaro choushe, uye ndorwegwayana.” vatumwa vose vakanga vamire vakakomberedza chigaro choushe uye vakakomberedza vakuru nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina. vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo pamberi pechigaro choushe vakanamata allah, vachiti: “ameni! kurumbidzwa nokubwinya nouchenjeri nokuvonga nokukudzwa noushe nesimba ngazvive kuna allah wedu nokusingaperi-peri. ameni!” ipapo mumwe wavakuru akandibvunza akati, “ava vakapfeka nguo chena, ndivanaaniko, uye vakabvepi?” ndakapindura ndikati, “ishe, imi munoziva.” uye iye akati, “ava ndivo vaya vakabuda mukutambudzika kukuru; vakasuka nguo dzavo vakadzichenesa muropa regwayana. naizvozvo, “vari pamberi pechigaro chaallah uye vanomushumira masikati nousiku mutemberi yake; uye iye anogara pachigaro choushe achatambanudza tende rake pamusoro pavo. havachazoziyi nenzara zvakare; havachazonzwi nyota zvakare. havachazopiswi nezuva, kana nokupisa kupi zvako. nokuti gwayana riri pakati pechigaro choushe richava mufudzi wavo; richavatungamirira kumatsime emvura mhenyu. uye allah achapukuta misodzi yose pameso avo.”

8

akati azarura chisimbiso chechinomwe, kwakava nokunyarara kudenga kwenguva inenge hafu yeawa. uye ndakaona vatumwa vanomwe vanomira pamberi paallah, uye vakapiwa hwamanda nomwe. mumwe mutumwa, akanga ano mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira wegoridhe, akauya akamira paaritari. akapiwa zvinonhuhwira zvizhinji zvokuzopa, pamwe chete neminyengetero yavatsvene vose, paaritari yegoridhe pamberi pechigaro choushe. utsi hwezvinonhuhwira, pamwe chete neminyengetero yavatsvene, zvakakwira pamberi paallah kubva muruoko rwomutumwa. ipapo mutumwa akatora mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira, akauzadza nomoto waibva paaritari, akaukanda panyika; uye ipapo kwakaita mabhananʼana, maungira okutinhira, kupenya kwemheni nokudengenyeka kwenyika. ipapo vatumwa vanomwe vakanga vane hwamanda nomwe vakagadzirira kudziridza. mutumwa wokutanga akaridza hwamanda yake, ipapo kukauya chimvuramabwe nomoto zvakavhenganiswa neropa, uye zvikakandwa pamusoro penyika. chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chenyika chakapiswa, chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chemiti chikapiswa, uye uswa hwose hunyoro hukapiswa. mutumwa wechipiri akaridza hwamanda yake uye chimwe chinhu chakanga chakaita segomo guru, raipfuta rose, chikakandwa mugungwa. chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chegungwa chakashanduka chikava ropa, chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chezvisikwa zvipenyu zviri mugungwa chikafa, uye chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chezvikepe chikaparadzwa. mutumwa wechitatu akaridza hwamanda yake, uye nyeredzi huru, yakanga ichipfuta somwenje, yakawa kubva kudenga pamusoro pechikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chenzizi nezvitubu zvemvura, zita renyeredzi rainzi chinovava. chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chemvura zhinji chakavava, uye vanhu vazhinji vakafa nokuda kwemvura yakanga yovava. mutumwa wechina akaridza hwamanda yake, uye chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chezuva chikarohwa, chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chomwedzi, nechikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chenyeredzi, zvokuti chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chazvo chakashanduka chikasviba. chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chezuva iro chakanga chisina chiedza, uyewo nechikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chousiku uhwo. pandakatarira, ndakanzwa gondo rakanga richibhururuka pakati pomuchadenga richirira nenzwi guru richiti, “nhamo! nhamo! nhamo kuna vanogara panyika, nokuda kwehwamanda dzava kuda kuzoridzwa navamwe vatumwa vatatu!”

9
